Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ku̧u̧ nɛ̀ naŋ dee yiwese: nù duka so gee, mɔ bo sɛnɛ na, tum kpee so zu
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Sa̧a̧mɔ a̧ de!» Ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ de.
Sɔ̧ zɔka sa̧a̧mɔ duk nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kɛ̧ mgbara sa̧a̧mɔ in tum.
Sɔ̧ saa sa̧a̧mɔ «wese», ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin tum'e «zɛ». Hegɔ zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Gba̧a̧-yí-zan a̧ duk mgbara o yì mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara wa!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de hegɔ.
Sɔ̧ dee gba̧a̧-yí-zan, ɓɛɛ kɛ̧ mgbara yì mɛ ŋgɔn in yì mɛ ɗɔɔ.
Sɔ̧ saa nin gba̧a̧-yí-zan «yiwese». Zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «O yì mɛ́ ɗɔɔ yiwese a̧ mɔi̧ ŋmaa duk kpɔk fara ha̧ kora fara mɛ gbo!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de hegɔ.
Sɔ̧ saa nin kora fara «nu», ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin yì nɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa'e «gba-tɔp». Sɔ̧ zɔka'e mɔ‘i ɔ dee.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nu a̧ dɛm o bɔr-mɔ, o nyɔnɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kpar-a in o te nɛ wai wai nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpar-wa nɛ tɛ dɛm siti!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de hegɔ.
Ɓɛɛ nù de ha̧ o bɔr-mɔ mɛ dɛm in o nyɔnɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kpar-a, in o te nɛ wai wai nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpar-wa. Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ zɔka duka nɛ de-a.
Zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ taar ɔɔ-zɛ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «O sa̧a̧mɔ a̧ de sɛn yiwese wen kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara wese in zɛ, wa tɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ mgbara o gbaŋa, mgbara o wese in zɛ tɔra pɛ;
wa tɛ́ ya nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ sɛn yiwese wen nyɛka-a zu nù.» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de hegɔ.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ de gasa sa̧a̧mɔ yiitoo: gasa sa̧a̧mɔ wen nyɛka-a nɛ̀ wese, geɗek sa̧a̧mɔ wen nyɛka-a nɛ̀ zɛ.
Sɔ̧ ee o sa̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i sɛn yiwese wen nyɛka-a zu nù,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ́ ɔ wan zu wese in zɛ, in ha̧ wa mɛ́ kɛ̧ mgbara sa̧a̧mɔ in tum; ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɔ dee.
Zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ naar ɔɔ-zɛ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Yì a̧ dun nɛ o be mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔm ɔm, ɓɛɛ o nɔ̧́í̧ a̧ bu̧i nɛ yiwese see zu nù.»
Sɔ̧ dee o gasa ŋga saɗi-ɗɔɔ-yì, o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔm ɔm in nɛ fo mɔ foo nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa nɛ duna ɗɔɔ yì, in o nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa. Sɔ̧ zɔka mɔ‘i ɔ dee.
Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo zu wa, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɛ́m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́ɓí, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dún ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp in o nɔ̧́í̧ a̧ dɔ́k sɛn zu nù mbɛt!»
Zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nù a̧ dɛm o mɔ nɛ ɔm ɔm nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa; o gasa saɗi in o be saɗi, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de hegɔ.
Sɔ̧ dee o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa, o mɔ-dai nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa, in o be saɗi zu nù lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk-wa; ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ zɔka o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɔ dee.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé bíí hee ɛ́ɛ́ ga, nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in yɛɛ ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ́ kpa ŋgai zu o zoro ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, o nɔ̧́í̧, o gasa mɔ-dai, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, in o be saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nù!»
Sɔ̧ dee bíí hɔ ŋmaa in a̧ sɛn tɛ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-a; a̧ dee bíí, a̧ dee wiwii in okoo.
Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo zu wa; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kó, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́k siti, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dún nu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu a̧; ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu o zoro ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi zu nù lɛŋ.»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi ha̧a̧ nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ kpar-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ sɛn zu nù lɛŋ in o te nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ waya-a nɛ̀ dɛm dɛm h’ɛ́nɛ́; wa lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O saɗi in o nɔ̧́í̧ yiwese lɛŋ in o mɔ nɛ gbur zaŋ gbur nɛ nù, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ
Sɔ̧ zɔka mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, mɔ lɛŋ duka nɛ de-a nyɛmna. Zɛ dea ɓɛɛ mɔ sa̧; duka nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ɔɔ-zɛ.
Hegɔ dee yiwese in nù in o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ kaɗa.
Sɔ̧ kaɗa tom sɛn tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ; nɛ́ tɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ‘i a̧ Sɔ̧ ɔma nɛ̀ tɛ̀.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ e wese'i nɛtɛ; wen nɛ́ wese'i á̧ a̧ kaɗa nɛ tom lɛŋ n'aa dea.
Ku̧u̧naŋ yiwese in nù, ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ dee nɛ wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN dee nɛ nù in yiwese,
ŋma be te kpɔk tɛ bo so sɛn zaŋnu na, kóó ŋma be bɔr-mɔ tɛ hɔ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ zu nù hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, in bíí tɛ bo so wen waa fɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi'i dɔka yì gbo o nɛ ɗɔɔ nù pii zan, ɓɔ nɛ nù lɛŋ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ɓoo nɛ fuunu de nɛ bíí. A̧ ɔma si kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ ha̧ nɛ̀
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ dee fɔ sɛn Edɛn, nɛ war daŋa-wese; ɓɛɛ a̧ e bíí n'aa dea sɛnɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ o te nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ dee wen zɔka-a in wen nyɔŋa-a mbɛt mɛ dɛm sɛn kpɛɛfɔ‘i; te duka-kpasa a̧a̧ sɛn see fɔ, in te iŋa mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋma nana-yì gboa nɛ Edɛn wen ha̧ nù mɛ́ mɔk, ɓɛɛ gba er naar.
Nin kuti yì nɛ́ Pisɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ á̧ zika nú Hawila nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ lɔr nyɛmna.
Lɔr tɛ nù‘i ɔ dee nyɛmna, in sɔ̧ɔ̧-te nɛ‘i sa'e delium in o de tu̧ ta mbɛt.
Nin yiitoo-aa nɛ́ Gihɔŋ; a̧ fok zik nɛ nù Kus lɛŋ.
Nin taar yì nɛ́ Tigrɛ; a̧ fok ti Asur nɛ war daŋa-wese. Nin naar nana-yì nɛ́ Efrat.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ee bíí sɛn kpɛɛfɔ Edɛn wen waa a̧ in pɛma a̧ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ mbo nú wi’ɛi hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «O waya-te kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ, mɛ́ nyɛma nyɔŋa-a,
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ beka nyɔŋ waya-te iŋa mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ na; wen wese nɛ mɛ tɛ́ nyɔŋ, mɛ́ tɛ́ fe.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧: «Bó nɛ́ ɔ dee ha̧ wiwii mɛ duk ɛ̀nɛ̀-a na. Mi tɛ́ de ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ gbam in a̧ in nɛ tɛ gbak a̧.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ɓoo nù de nɛ saɗi in o nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kai tɛnɛ ha̧ wi’ɛi wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɛ a nɛ nin-wa ga. Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duk kpasa baa so kànà nɛ nin nɛ bíí aa ha̧ a̧.
A̧ aa nin ha̧ o gasa saɗi, o nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ war kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛ-a, a̧ kpa ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ gbam in a̧ mɛ gbak a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ de ha̧ gasa ya mɛ ba wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ ya. Sɔ̧ baa gba̧a̧ ŋgazi-a kpɔk, ɓɛɛ kpe oi-aa nɛ mur-tɛ-a.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ baa gba̧a̧ ŋgazi wiwii,
Wiwii tɔ̧a̧:
«Zɔ́k kinii gba̧a̧'ɛ nɛ́ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m
in mur’ɛ nɛ́ mur-tɛ‘m;
wi’ɛ wi tɛ́ sa a̧‘e okoo,
wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ wiwii a̧ wa dee nɛ a̧.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ wiwii tɛ e dáà in nàà kɔ‘i duk, ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ ndaɗi in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ wen ha̧ wa mɛ́ duk nɛ́ kiitɛ kpɔk.
Wa yiitoo lɛŋ yaa so nɛ̀ mgbii, wíì in kóò de foe yí ŋmaa na.
Okoo kifa nú ha̧ gɔ́k: «Ɛ́ɛ́ nyɛma mɛ́ nyɔŋ o waya-te sɛn kpɛɛfɔ'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ war ko waya-te nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn see fɔ‘i, Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧, k’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɔŋ na, k’ɛ́ɛ́ fo na mbɛt, wen k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛɛ fe.»
Gɔ́k tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ okoo: «Weyaa, ɛ́nɛ́ beka fe na!
Sɔ̧ iŋa'e wese n’ɛnɛ tɛ́ nyɔŋ, yí‘nɛ́ tɛ́ hì̧ì̧, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ ya hee Sɔ̧ ga, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ iŋ mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ.»
Okoo zɔka'e te'i ɔ dee wen nyɔŋa-a; tɛ̀ zɔka-a, a̧ taa'e te'i nyɛma mɛ́ ha̧ haya taamɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba waya-te'i nyɔŋ; a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma ha̧ wíì kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ duka in a̧, ɓɛɛ wíì kɔ̧-a̧ nyɔŋ mbɛt.
Wa yiitoo lɛŋ yí-wa hu̧i̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ kinii nde, wi ya nɛ̀ mgbii; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ wa sika wa̧a̧ mbɔra wen kpea-a nɛ tɛ-wa.
Mɛ́ ga̧a̧mɔ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ yara kpɛɛfɔ, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa zia tiger-a ga, wiwii in okoo hu̧sa̧ tɛ-wa ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ sɛn mgbara te kpɛɛfɔ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ saa wiwii, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Mɛ́ a̧a̧ dee?»
A̧ kifa nú: «Mi zia tiger'nɛ́ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ, kíì dea'm wen mi duk nɛ̀ mgbii, ɓɛɛ sa'm hu̧si.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Nɛ́ o'o tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ndé, mɛ́ duk nɛ mgbii o? Mɛ́ nyɔŋa nɛ́ waya-te n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e ká mɛ nyɔŋ na’ɛ gɔ?»
Ɓɛɛ wiwii kifi nú: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ okoo n’ɛnɛ ea sɛn katɛ‘m a̧ ha̧a̧ waya-te'i ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ sa'm nyɔŋ.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ okoo: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ dea’ɛ ge?» Ɓɛɛ okoo kifi nú: «Nɛ́ gɔ́k a̧ ɔra'm sa'm nyɔŋ waya-te'i.»

Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ gɔ́k: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee mɔ hegɔ ga, mgbara o be saɗi in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ, fom a̧ ba mɛ; mɛ́ tɛ́ gbur zaŋ-mɛ nɛ nù wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɛ́ nyɔŋ nɛ́ fuunu ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ-mɛ zaŋnu.
Mi tɛ e sɛnmɔ mgbara mɛ in okoo, mgbara o bezaŋ-mɛ in bezaŋ-aa; a̧ tɛ hɔ̧n zu-mɛ ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ dukui-naŋ-a.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ okoo: «Mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk tɛ gasa bɔnɛ; nɛ́ tɛ gɔfamɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ ko nɛ bem; mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ wíì kɔ-mɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu mɛ.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Adam: «Hee mɛ zia nɛ wen ko kóò kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nyɔŋ waya-te n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e ká mɛ nyɔŋ na ga, mi tɛ fom nù wen zu mɛ. Nɛ́ bɔnɛ-bɔnɛ a̧ mɛ tɛ kpa nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ tɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ wese lɛŋ.
Nù tɛ dɛm nɛ tɛn in o tɛn-dara ha̧ mɛ; mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ o nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ.
Sɛn tɛ sɔbɛɛ sɔnti-mɛ a̧ mɛ tɛ kpa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ, hegɔ hɔ wese nɛ mɛ tɛ si nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ nù, wen nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ mɛ gboo nɛnɛ. Nɛ́ kpasawen, mɛ tɛɛ nɛ tɛ fuunu, mɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ fuunu.»
Wiwii saa nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧‘e Ɛvɛ; wen a̧ duka nɛ nàà ko bíí lɛŋ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ dee laa ndàrá ha̧ Adam in kóò, ɓɛɛ pi̧ tɛ-wa.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Kinii, bíí duk hee ŋma kpɔk mgbara ɛ́ɛ́ ga sɛn tɛ iŋa mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ. Ɓɛɛ kinii a̧ beka ɓi waya-te duka-kpasa wen nyɔŋa-a ɓɔna, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ndak a̧ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ Edɛn yinɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ wa nù nɛ Sɔ̧ dee nɛ a̧.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Sɔ̧ ndaka wi’ɛi yinɛ kaɗi, a̧ ee o betom nɛ‘i sa'e
Wíì duka in kóò kɔ‘i Ɛvɛ, a̧ baa zaŋ ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Kain, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mi kpaa bíí nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m.»
A̧ koo mbe-a; nɛ́ Abɛl nya Kain. Abɛl duka só kɔ‘i nɛ́ wi-dai-mɔ, ɓɛɛ Kain nɛ́ wi-wa-fɔ.
Sɛn tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi Kain kaia o waya-te tɛnɛ wen ŋmara zu-a ha̧ GASA WAN.
Abɛl kaia kɔ‘i nɛ o kuti be-sami, ɓɛɛ kai o de mur-aa ha̧ nɛ zu mɔ-dai kɔ‘i; hegɔ GASA WAN kpɛka Abɛl in ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
GASA WAN kpɛk Kain in ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na. Kain kpaa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ zum zu-a.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Kain: «Wen ge sá mɛ kpa ɗaŋsee zum nɛ zu-mɛ ge?
Kà mɛ de so mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba zu-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn. Kà mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, ɗaŋmɔ tɛ ba fara nú tua kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ kpa ŋgai zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ kpá ŋgai zu a̧.»
Kain tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ nya-wi Abɛl: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ kpɛɛfɔ.» Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa a̧a̧ kpɛɛfɔ ga, Kain tika zu nya-wi Abɛl, ɓɛɛ gbɛ a̧.
GASA WAN aka Kain: «Nya-mɛ a̧a̧ dee?» A̧ kifa nú: «Mi iŋ na. Mi nɛ́ wi-pɛm nya'm nde?»
GASA WAN aka a̧ woyo: «Mɛ dee hee ge? Mi zia tiger tɔk-tɛ nya-mɛ nɛ hiɗi mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu pii sɛn tɛ‘m!
Kinii, fom baa mɛ sɛn zu nù nɛ nɔɔ tɔk-tɛ nya-mɛ nɛ mɛ gbaia a nù nɛ er-mɛ.
Mɛ́ tɛ́ wa fɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka dɛm mɔ siti ha̧ mɛ nɛ dɔka-a ɓɔna. Mɛ́ tɛ́ duk nɛ́ wi-yar-war, yambala-bíí sɛn zaŋnu.»
Kain tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Bɔnɛ kɔ‘m gana zu'm.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndak am sɔsɔɔ sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ beka iŋ oi-am ɓɔna; mi tɛ́ yar yambali nɛ zaŋnu nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ tɛ́ kpa'm, tɛ́ gbɛ‘m.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà ŋma bíí gbɛ Kain, kifa-er a̧a̧ sɛnɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN e mɔɔ-sedaako tɛ Kain, wen ká o nde nɛ tɛ kpa a̧ tɛɛ gbɛ a̧.
Kain nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ nyɛi̧ nɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak si sɛn nù Nod, nɛ war daŋa-wese ha̧ Edɛn.
Kain duka in kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò ba zaŋ ko nɛ Enɔk. Kain dee ye, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin ye'i nɛ nin bem kɔ̧-a̧ Enɔk.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Enɔk kòó Irad, ɓɛɛ Irad ko Mehiyaɛl. Mehiyaɛl kòó Metusaɛl, ɓɛɛ Metusaɛl ko Lamɛk.
Lamɛk baa kóò yiitoo, nin nana-gun-aa nɛ́ Ada, nin zɔŋa-a nɛ́ Sila.
Ada kòó Yabal, ɓɛɛ Yabal duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko wi ɔ kɔ̧ tua-laa in nɛ̀ dai nɛ́ o mɔ-dai.
Nin nya-a̧ nɛ́ Yubal, ɓɛɛ Yubal duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o wi-mbɛr-kunde in o wi-dɔm-fol.
Ɓɛɛ Sila ko kɔ‘i nɛ́ Tubal-Kain nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o wi-dui-dɔra. Boko-nya Tubal-Kain duka nɛ́ Naama.
Lamɛk tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o kóò kɔ̧-a̧:
«Ada in Sila, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ́ tɔ̧‘i!
O okoo ko Lamɛk, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m!
Mi gbɛɛ ŋma bíí wen n'aa ee da̧i̧ tɛ‘m;
mi gbɛɛ nɛ́ be-ŋgaiwi wen n'aa gusa'm.
Kifa-er a̧a̧ sɛnɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen zu Kain,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m Lamɛk,
nɛ́ war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.»
Adam duka in kóò kɔ‘i woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko nɛ̀ be-wiwii nɛ wa saa nin-a'e Sɛt, wen kóò tɔ̧a̧: «Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ ha̧a̧ mbe bezaŋ ha̧‘m oi Abɛl, wen Kain gbɛɛ so a̧.»
Sɛt kòó ŋma be-wiwii woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-a'e Enɔs; nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ wa ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ gasa nin GASA WAN.
Kalata pɛ́r-nam ko Adam nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. (Wese nɛ Sɔ̧ dee nɛ bíí, a̧ dee bíí hɔ ŋmaa in a̧.
A̧ dee wiwii in okoo; a̧ toka de yoŋgo zu wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-wa'e «bíí», wese n'aa dee nɛ wa.)
Ŋgimbi nɛ Adam kpaa pɛ 130, a̧ koo be-wiwii nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin bem’ɛi nɛ́ Sɛt.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Adam koo Sɛt kaɗi, a̧ duka zu nù pɛ 800; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Adam duka zu nù pɛ 930, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Sɛt kpaa pɛ 105, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Enɔs.
Ɗoŋ koo Enɔs, Sɛt duka pɛ 807; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Sɛt duka zu nù pɛ 912, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Enɔs kpaa pɛ 90, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Kenaŋ.
Ɗoŋ koo Kenaŋ, Enɔs duka pɛ 815; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Enɔs duka zu nù pɛ 905, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Kenaŋ kpaa pɛ 70, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Mahalalɛl.
Ɗoŋ koo Mahalalɛl, Kenaŋ duka pɛ 840; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Kenaŋ duka zu nù pɛ 910, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Mahalalɛl kpaa pɛ 65, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Yɛrɛd.
Ɗoŋ koo Yɛrɛd, Mahalalɛl duka zu nù pɛ 830; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Mahalalɛl duka zu nù pɛ 895, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Yɛrɛd kpaa pɛ 162, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Enɔk.
Ɗoŋ koo Enɔk, Yɛrɛd duka pɛ 800; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Yɛrɛd duka zu nù pɛ 962, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Enɔk kpaa pɛ 65, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Matusalɛm.
Ɓɛɛ Enɔk nɛ nɔ̀ in Sɔ̧ tɛ pɛ 300 ɗoŋ koo Matusalɛm; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Enɔk duka zu nù pɛ 365.
Enɔk nɛɛ nɔ̀ in Sɔ̧, hegɔ Sɔ̧ baa a̧ nɛ yí.
Matusalɛm kpaa pɛ 187, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Lamɛk.
Ɗoŋ koo Lamɛk, Matusalɛm duka zu nu pɛ 782; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Matusalɛm duka zu nù pɛ 969, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Lamɛk kpaa pɛ 182, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko be-wiwii kpɔk.
A̧ aa nin bem’ɛi Nɔe tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Wi’ɛ tɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi h’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ tom k’ɛɛ in tɛ bɔnɛ tom n’ɛɛ de nɛ er yɛ tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN baa fom so.»
Ɗoŋ koo Nɔe, Lamɛk duka pɛ 595; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Lamɛk duka zu nù pɛ 777, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Nɔe kpaa nɛ pɛ 500, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ bíí ku̧u̧ naŋ dɔka-a sɛn zaŋnu, nɛ wa ku̧u̧ naŋ kpaa o boko-bem kaɗi,
o bem ko Sɔ̧ zɔka o boko-bem ko bíí yora zɔŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa kai o wan nɛ wa kɔ̧a̧ nɛ kóò.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «
O kusa-wi yaa so zu nù ŋgimbi'i. Ŋgimbi nɛ o bem ko Sɔ̧ ndaɗa in o boko-bem ko bíí ko nɛ bem, o wi nɔ‘i yaa so nɛ o ŋgaŋa-wi, in nin-wa hura so mbɛt.
GASA WAN zɔka ɗaŋmɔ ko bíí zu nù dɔk dɔk siti; wese lɛŋ in ŋgimbi lɛŋ see bíí ta kànà nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ.
GASA WAN kpaia taamɔ, wen ge sa'i dee bíí e zaŋnu ge nde? See-aa nyima tɛ mɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mi tɛ kum bíí n'am dea, bíí, o gasa saɗi in o be saɗi gu nɛ o nɔ̧́í̧ yinɛ zu nù. Kà‘m iŋ so gáà, mi de wa na.»
Mɔ kpɔk, GASA WAN kpaa desee zu Nɔe.
Nɔe duka so nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ yɔ kaya mgbara o bíí ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ na. A̧ baa so nɛ yuwar ko Sɔ̧. O bem ko Nɔe nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ; a̧ koo nɛ be-wiwii taar: Sɛm, Kam, in Jafɛt.
Zaŋnu lɛŋ duna nɛ ɗaŋmɔ in ŋgayamɔ sɛn ti Sɔ̧.
Sɔ̧ zɔka zaŋnu lɛŋ duna nɛ ɗaŋmɔ, wen bíí lɛŋ ɗaŋa naŋanɔ kɔ‘i zu nù.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nɔe: «War kɔ‘m, sɔŋkur mɔ ko bíí lɛŋ hɔɔ kaɗi. Nɛ́ wen zu o bíí a̧ ŋgamɔ duna nɛnɛ zu nù, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ɗaŋ wa in nù lɛŋ yinɛ.
Mɛ̀ dé gasa kombon kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ nika-te; mɛ̀ gɔ́n bɛr-aa gɔn, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yɔ́k kɔ̧ a̧ in ɗoŋ-aa nɛ mɔɔ-dɔ̧i̧-mɔ.
Mɛ̀ dé zi̧a̧-a̧ mɛtrɛ 133; pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ 22; kusa-a mɛtrɛ 13.
Mɛ̀ bá ger-tua kombon'i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é be woi-aa mgbara zu-a in ká̧-a̧ tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ. Mɛ̀ é nú-a nɛ ká̧-a̧; ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé bɛr-aa taar zu ŋmaa.
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ de ha̧ ndiɓa-kórò mɛ hɔ zu nù, wen kuma mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese lɛŋ. Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔm ɔm, o mɔɔ nɔ‘i zu nù lɛŋ tɛ kum.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ; mɛ̀ yé kɔ̧ gasa kombon, mɛ in kóò kɔ-mɛ, o bem kɔ-mɛ in o kóò kɔ-wa.
Mgbara mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya kpasa, o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ
O nɔ̧́í̧ sɛn tɛ zuduk-wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, o gasa saɗi in o geɗek-a kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ zuduk-wa; o saɗi zu nù lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ zuduk-wa, wíì-a in kóò-a tɛ ye kombon in mɛɛ mɛ kpasi.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o nyɔŋmɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ a wen nyɔŋa-a kɔ-mɛ in wa.»
Nɔe dee kànà mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nɔe: «Mɛ̀ yé kombon, mɛ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, wen ɓàà wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mgbara o bíí ŋgimbi’ɛ nɛ́ mɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Mɛ tɛ kai o saɗi nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, wíì-a in kóò-a tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí o zuduk saɗi nɛ sa̧ na, wíì-a kpɔk in kóò-a,
gu nɛ o zuduk nɔ̧́í̧ mbɛt, wíì-a in kóò-a tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen ha̧ kpar-wa mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ zaŋnu.
Ɗoŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, mi tɛ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ sɛn zaŋnu tɛ zɛ ɓu-naar zɛ nɛ wese, ha̧‘m mɛ kum o mɔ n'am dee lɛŋ zu nù yinɛ.»
Nɔe dee kànà mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Nɔe a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ 600 ŋgimbi nɛ ndiɓa-kórò hɔɔ nɛnɛ.
Nɔe in kóò, in o bem ká bá nɛ̀ o kóò kɔ-wa yee kɔ̧ kombon wen zu gasa ha̧a̧-yì.
O sa̧a̧ saɗi in o wan nɛ sa̧ na, o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi lɛŋ nɛ yar nɛ mbɔɗɔnu,
kóò-a in wíì-a, yee kɔ̧ kombon in Nɔe hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ baa ha̧ nú sɛnɛ ga.
Ɗoŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ yì hur nù lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Nɔe kpaa nɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ fio-zɛ yiitoo nɛ zɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o kpút-kpút mɛ
Kórò zuɗa zaŋnu zɛ ɓu-naar zɛ nɛ wese.
Wese'i, Nɔe in kóò, o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Sɛm, Kam, Jafɛt ká bá nɛ̀ o kóò kɔ-wa taar yee kombon.
O saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ, o zuduk mɔ-dai lɛŋ, o zuduk be saɗi nɛ yar nɛ mbɔɗɔnu, o zuduk nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ in o mɔɔ-bu̧i̧-bu̧i̧ lɛŋ yee kombon in wa mbɛt.
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duk kpasa yee kombon in Nɔe, wíì-a in kóò-a.
Duka nɛ wíì-a in kóò-a tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔm ɔm a̧ yee kɔ̧ kombon, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Ndiɓa-kórò zuɗa tɛ zɛ ɓu-naar sɛn zaŋnu; yì ha̧a̧ ɓɛɛ gasa kombon kur zu yì.
Yì ha̧a̧ mbɛr mbayaŋga ɓɛɛ gasa kombon ba yì yaknɛ.
Yì ha̧a̧ siti siti zu nù kpe zu o kusa kaya zaŋnu lɛŋ.
Yì ha̧a̧ yak zu o kusa kaya tɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Hegɔ, o mɔ nɛ duka so ɔm ɔm lɛŋ kuma. O nɔ̧́í̧, o mɔ-dai, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, o be saɗi lɛŋ nɛ hai nɛ mbɔɗɔnu in o bíí lɛŋ kuma.
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duka so ɔm ɔm, mɔ nɛ‘i saa'e saɗi-zan lɛŋ kuma.
GASA WAN kuma mɔ lɛŋ zu nù, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o bíí hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o gasa saɗi, o be saɗi in o nɔ̧́í̧ mbɛt. Hegɔ o mɔ lɛŋ kuma zu nù, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɓɔna nɛ́ Nɔe in o wi nɛ yaa so in a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gasa kombon.
Ha̧a̧-yì duka hegɔ zu nù zɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Tɛ Sɔ̧ mbaŋa ɗoŋ Nɔe in o saɗi ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ kombon. A̧ dee ha̧ ŋma búk mɛ yu zu yì, ɓɛɛ yì ku̧naŋ ɔ̧sa̧-a̧.
O kpút-kpút mɛ
Yì daka ɔ̧si nɛnɛ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ tɛ́ ɔɔ-zɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Tɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, tɛ̀ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, kombon zira duk zu kaya Arara.
Yì ɔ̧sa̧ nɛnɛ hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ́ fio-zɛ ɓu, nɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o zu kaya ku̧naŋ gboa-a.
Ɗoŋ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-naar, Nɔe hu̧i̧a̧ woi gasa kombon n'aa dee so;
a̧ pi̧i̧ gba-kɔra ɓɛɛ gba-kɔra duk bu̧i nɛnɛ pii ɗoŋ na, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ yì ɔ̧sa̧ nɛnɛ zu nù lɛŋ.
A̧ pi̧i̧ gbaku̧i ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk kà yì nɛ ɔ̧sa̧ zu nù.
Gbaku̧i'i nɛa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa fara gua-a na, ɓɛɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Nɔe sɛn kɔ̧ gasa kombon wen zù nu lɛŋ hura nɛ yì; Nɔe nyɛi̧a er, ba a̧ woyo pii kɔ̧ gasa kombon.
A̧ pɛma mɔ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ gbaku̧i si zan woyo.
Gbaku̧i'i pia ɗoŋ mɛ́ ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ be gbaa-er te-nɔ̧́ nú; hegɔ Nɔe iŋa'e yì ɔ̧sa̧ zu nù kaɗi.
A̧ pɛma zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ e gbaku̧i yak, ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna.
Tɛ kuti wese, tɛ kuti fio-zɛ nɛ Nɔe kpaa nɛ pɛ 601, yì ɔ̧sa̧ e nɛ zɔma nù. Nɔe hu̧i̧a̧ mɔɔ-kpe-zu gasa kombon, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka'e nù zɔma kaɗi.
Tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ, tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, nù kora lɛŋ.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nɔe:
«Mɛ̀ gbó kɔ̧ kombon, mɛ́, kóò kɔ-mɛ, o bem kɔ-mɛ in o kóò kɔ-wa mbɛt.
O saɗi lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔm ɔm, mɔ nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e nɔ̧́í̧, o mɔ-dai in o be saɗi lɛŋ nɛ yar zu nù, mɛ̀ káí wa gbonɛ, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ nyɛɓi sɛn zaŋnu, wa a̧ ko siti, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ dɔk zaŋnu.»
Nɔe gboo in o bem kɔ‘i, koo kɔ̧-a̧ in o kóò ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧.
O gasa saɗi, o be saɗi lɛŋ, o nɔ̧́í̧ in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ yar zu nù dam nɛ ɗoŋ zuduk-wa kpɔk kpɔk zira nɛ kɔ̧ kombon a nù.
Nɔe mboo
Pɛr
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ nù tɛ duk nɛnɛ, guna nyɔnɔ in mɔi̧a-a, gɛ̧ɛ̧ in gbɛ̧ŋmɔ, bɛɛ in ɓar, wese in zɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo zu Nɔe in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kó o bem, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́k, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dún zu nù.
O saɗi zu nu lɛŋ in o nɔ̧́í̧ mbɛt tɛ yu'nɛ́; o mɔ nɛ yar yar nɛ mbɔɗɔnu in o zoro ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp tɛ ya ɗɔɔ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O mɔ lɛŋ nɛ yar yar nɛ duk kpasa tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Mi ha̧a̧ wa h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ha̧a̧ so nɛ nyɔnɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ kpoo nɛ oi tɔk-aa na, wen
Kà bó nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ‘nɛ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́
Kà bíí gbai tɔk-tɛ bíí a nù, bíí tɛ́ gbai tɔk-tɛ wi’ɛi a nù mbɛt; wen Sɔ̧ dee bíí hɔ ŋmaa in wìì.
«Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kó, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́k, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dún zu nù lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu a̧.»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nɔe in o bem kɔ̧-a̧:
«Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ,
gu nɛ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya kpasa in'nɛ̀ɛ́: o nɔ̧́í̧, o mɔ-dai, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ gboo nɛ kɔ̧ gasa kombon in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́. Mi beka ɗaŋ mɔ nɛ ɔm ɔm nɛ̀ gasa ha̧a̧-yì ɓɔna, gasa ha̧a̧-yì beka ɗaŋ nù ɓɔna.»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔ́k mɔɔ-sedaako
Mi ee ɓutu kɔ‘m sɛn mgbara tura-zan, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-sedaako
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ de ha̧ zan mɛ tur sɛn zu nù, ɓɛɛ nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk ɓutu mgbara tura-zan,
tɛ‘m tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ
Ŋgimbi nɛ ɓutu tɛ yɔr mgbara tura-zan, mi tɛ zɔk ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nɔe: «Mɔɔ-sedaako
Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt nɛ́ o bem ko Nɔe nɛ gboo nɛ kɔ̧ gasa kombon. (Kam nɛ dáà ko Kanaŋ.)
O bem ko Nɔe nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i taar'i, ɓɛɛ bíí gboo nɛ tɛ-wa dɔk nɛnɛ sɛn zu nù.
Nɔe duka so nɛ kuti wi-wa-fɔ; a̧ waa fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ gbɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ̀ mgbii kɔ̧ tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧.
Kam, dáà ko Kanaŋ zɔka dáà kɔ‘i nɛ mgbii, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ o nya kɔ‘i yiitoo zan mɛ.
Sɛm in Jafɛt baa gba-laa ko Nɔe pi̧ zu kóŋgó-ɓaa, wa nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ ɗoŋ-wa nɛ́ɛ̀ kpe nɛ tɛ dáà kɔ-wa. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa zika nɛ́ ɗoŋ-wa nɛ́ nɛnɛ ga, wa zɔk dáà kɔ-wa nɛ̀ mgbii na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ yí Nɔe gɔna oi dɔ̧ɔ̧, n'aa zia mɔ nɛ sɔŋkur bem kɔ̧-a̧ dea,
a̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«Fom a̧ ba Kanaŋ!
A̧ a̧ dúk nɛ́ sɔŋkur-wi mgbara o wi-de-tom ko o nya-a̧.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ woyo:
«Zɔnamɔ à̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko Sɛm,
ɓɛɛ Kanaŋ á̧ dúk nɛ́ bara kɔ̧-a̧.
Sɔ̧ à̧ há̧ kpaamɔ ha̧ Jafɛt,
à̧ à̧ dúk kɔ̧ tua-laa ko Sɛm,
ɓɛɛ Kanaŋ à̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-de-tom kɔ-wa!»
Nɔe duka ɗoŋ ha̧a̧-yì pɛ 350.
Zɛ duka-a ko Nɔe lɛŋ nɛ pɛ 950, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
O pɛ́r-nam ko Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt o bem ko Nɔe nɛ koo ɗoŋ ha̧a̧-yì nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
O bem ko Jafɛt nɛ Gɔmɛr, Magɔg, Madai, Yavaŋ, Tubal, Mɛsɛk in Tiras.
O bem ko Gɔmɛr nɛ Askenaz, Rifat in Togarma.
O bem ko Yavaŋ nɛ Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim in Rodanim.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ-wa a̧ dukbíí ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ gbina-a sitɛ o gasa see-kisi, kóó o nde baa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ duk kɔ‘i, nú-gara kɔ‘i in nú kɔ‘i.
O bem ko Kam nɛ́ Kus, Misraim, Put in Kanaŋ.
O bem ko Kus nɛ́ Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Rama, Sabteka; o bem ko Rama nɛ́ Seba in Dedaŋ.
Kus koo Nɛmrod nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kuti ŋgaŋa-wi sɛn zu nù.
Nɛmrod duka nɛ́ gasa ŋgaŋa wi-de-gia sɛn ti GASA WAN. Hegɔ tua-wen gboo nɛ nin-a'e: «GASA WAN a̧ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ́ gasa wi-de-gia hee Nɛmrod ga.»
O gasa ye tɛ nú kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Babɛl, Ɛrɛk in Akad, nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ o gasa ye nú Sinɛar.
A̧ kura tɛ nù‘i yak si Asur, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ye Ninivɛ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ o gasa bee-gara, sɛka Kala,
nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ gasa ye, in Rɛsɛn mgbara Ninivɛ in Kala.
Misraim koo o be Lud, o be Anɛm, o be Lehab in o be Naftua,
o be Patros, o be Kaftɔr in o be Kaslua, ye nɛ o be Filistii gboo nɛnɛ.
Kanaŋ koo Sidɔŋ, kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧, in Hɛt,
in o be Jebus, o be Amɔr, o be Girgas,
o be Hiv, o be Ark, o be Sin,
o be Arvad, o be Sɛmar in o be Hamat. Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o pɛ́r-nam ko o be Kanaŋ dɔka siti,
ɓɛɛ mgbara nù kɔ-wa ku̧ naŋ nɛ Sidɔŋ si sɛn Gerar, hɔ nɛnɛ Gaza si war Sɔdɔm, Gɔmɔr, Adma in Seboyim hɔ Lɛsa.
O bezaŋ Kam, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa, o nutua kɔ-wa, o nú nɛ wa tɔ̧ in nù kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Sɛm duka nɛ́ zɔmwi ko Jafɛt; a̧ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bem ko Ebɛr lɛŋ.
O bem ko Sɛm nɛ́ Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud in Aram.
O bem ko Aram nɛ́ Us, Hul, Gɛtɛr in Mas.
Arpaksad koo Sela, ɓɛɛ Sela ko Ebɛr.
Ebɛr koo be-wiwii yiitoo; nin kaya-a nɛ́ Pɛlɛg, wen nɛ́ tɛ́ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ nù, ɓɛɛ nin nya-a̧ nɛ́ Yoktaŋ.
Yoktaŋ koo Almɔdad, Selɛf, Hasarmavɛt, Yera,
Hadɔram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimaɛl, Saba,
Ofir, Hawila in Yobab; o bem ko Yoktaŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Nù kɔ-wa ku̧u̧ naŋ Mɛsa hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ kaya Sefar nɛ duk si daŋa-wese.
O bezaŋ Sɛm nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa, o nú-gara kɔ-wa, o nú nɛ wa tɔ̧ in nù kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
O nú-gara ko o bem ko Nɔe nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o bíí nutua kɔ-wa, tɛ o zuduk kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Kɛ̧ɛ̧ o tugun bíí zu nù'ɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ tɛ-wa ɗoŋ gasa ha̧a̧-yì.
O bíí lɛŋ duka tɔ̧ nɛ́ nú kpɔk in saa nin mɔ kpɔk.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí duka so yar yar si war daŋa-wese ga, wa kpaa ŋma de bɔkɔ-nu tɛ nú Sinɛar, ɓɛɛ wa de ye sɛnɛ.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o ŋmaa: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbɛ́r brik ɛ̀ɛ̀ dɔ.» Brik duka hee ta ga, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-dɔ̧i̧-mɔ dúk nɛ́ ɓɔtɛ.
Hegɔ wa tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbó gasa ye in kusa tua nɛ zu-a tɛ fo nɛ́ yiwese! Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé ha̧ nin dùk k’ɛɛ mɛ hur, wen k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛɛ pɛsi dam zu nù lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN zira tɛnɛ mɛ zɔk ye in kusa tua nɛ o bem ko Adam de'i,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Kinii wa lɛŋ duk nɛ́ tugun kpɔk, in tɔ̧ɔ̧ nú kpɔk; mɔ‘i nɛ́ kuti tom kɔ-wa; ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ dor wa tɛ́ mɔ nɛ wa tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ de beka bo na.
Hegɔ laŋ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ zír ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ záŋ nú-wen kɔ-wa wen ká wa tɛ́ɛ̀ zii nú ko o ŋmaa.»
GASA WAN pɛsa wa kpɔk kpɔk dam zaŋnu lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kaɗi mboo gasa ye'i.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa saa nɛ̀ nin fara'i'e «Babɛl»; mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ GASA WAN zaŋa nɛ o nú-wen zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ á̧ a̧ de nɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí mɛ́ pɛsi dam zu nù'ɛ.
O bezaŋ Sɛm nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Ŋgimbi nɛ Sɛm kpaa pɛ gɔmŋmaa, a̧ koo Arpaksad pɛ yiitoo ɗoŋ gasa ha̧a̧-yì.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Sɛm koo Arpaksad kaɗi, a̧ duka zu nù pɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Arpaksad a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa koo nɛ Sela.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Arpaksad koo Sela kaɗi, a̧ duka zu nù pɛ 403; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Sela a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko nɛ Ebɛr.
Ɗoŋ koo Ebɛr, Sela duka zu nù pɛ 403; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Ebɛr kpaa pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Pɛlɛg.
Ɗoŋ koo Pɛlɛg, Ebɛr duka zu nù pɛ 430; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Pɛlɛg kpaa pɛ ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Rɛhu.
Ɗoŋ koo Rɛhu, Pɛlɛg duka zu nù pɛ 29; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Rɛhu kpaa pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Serug.
Ɗoŋ koo Serug, Rɛhu duka zu nù pɛ 207; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Serug kpaa pɛ ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Nahɔr.
Ɗoŋ koo Nahɔr, Serug duka zu nù pɛ 200; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Nahɔr kpaa pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Tɛra.
Ɗoŋ koo Tɛra, Nahɔr duka zu nù pɛ 119; a̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Tɛra kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko Abram, Nahɔr in Haraŋ.
O bezaŋ Tɛra nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Tɛra koo Abram, Nahɔr in Haraŋ.
Haraŋ koo Lot. Haraŋ fee nɛti ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Tɛra tɛ nù ko o nam kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Ur, nù ko o be Kaldee.
Hegɔ Abram in Nahɔr baa kóò: nin kóò ko Abram nɛ Sarai; ɓɛɛ nin kóò ko Nahɔr nɛ́ Milka, boko-bem ko Haraŋ, nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Milka in Yiska.
Sarai duka so nɛ́ ko-yar-ndɔra, a̧ duka hegɔ bem bo na.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Tɛra mgbɔɔ bem kɔ‘i Abram in be koo-aa Lot, bem ko Haraŋ. A̧ mgbɔɔ be for-aa Sarai kóò ko Abram mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa kur sɛn ye Ur nú Kaldee wen nɛa-a si sɛn nú Kanaŋ. Wa hɔɔ sɛn Haraŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ ye hi̧i̧.
Tɛra duka zaŋnu nɛ́ pɛ 205, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe sɛn Haraŋ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram: «Mɛ e nù kɔ-mɛ, nam kɔ-mɛ in nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ duk, a̧ mɛ yak sitɛ nù n'am tɛ usi ha̧ mɛ‘i.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ́ gasa dukbíí. Mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ nin-mɛ mɛ hur; o bíí tɛ kpa de toka yoŋgo nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Mi tɛ́ tok de yoŋgo ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ́ fom o wi nɛ̀ fom mɛ. O tugun bíí zu nù lɛŋ tɛ kpa de toka yoŋgo nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ.»
Abram kura hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ Lot yak in a̧ mbɛt. Abram a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ 75 ŋgimbi n'aa kura nɛnɛ sɛn Haraŋ.
A̧ mgbɔɔ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Sarai, in bem ko nya-a̧ Lot, o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa kpaa so in o mɔ-dai gu nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Haraŋ; wa kura mɛ́ yak si sɛn nú Kanaŋ, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa hɔɔ hi̧i̧.
Abram ɓira yak nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ sɛn Sikɛm, sɛn ti gasa te sɛn fara nɛ wa sa'e Mɔre. (O bíí Kanaŋ a̧a̧ so tɛ nù‘i.)
GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧ Abram ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi tɛ ha̧ nù'ɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Abram mbo
A̧ kura nɛ̀ hi̧i̧ yak nɛnɛ si zu kaya nɛ war daŋa-wese ha̧ ye Bɛtɛl. A̧ dee tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Bɛtɛl nɛ war yee-wese e ye Ai nɛ war daŋa-wese. A̧ mboo
Abram nɛɛ hegɔ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ hɔ nɛnɛ Nɛgɛb nɛ war ɗɔɔ.
Gasa kaɓa tika nù, ɓɛɛ Abram zir si sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ duk hi̧i̧ zɛ tikiɗi, wen kaɓa'i.
Ŋgimbi n'aa hɛɗa mɛ ye tɛ nú Egiptɛ, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Sarai: «Mɛ zɔk, mi iŋa mɛ́ nɛ́ okoo nɛ̀ yora zɔŋa nyɛmna.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be Egiptɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk mɛ, wa tɛ tɔ̧‘e, mɛ́ nɛ́ kóò kɔ‘m; hegɔ wa tɛ gbɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa ee mɛ.
Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e wi nɛ boko-nya'm, wen ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk am nɛ de-a wen zu mɛ, in ha̧ wa mɛ e'm kpasa wen zu mɛ mbɛt.»
Mɔ dee hegɔ; ŋgimbi nɛ Abram hɔɔ sɛn Egiptɛ, o be Egiptɛ zɔka kóò‘i dee nyɛmna.
O gasawi ko wannu Egiptɛ zɔka Sarai, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ déè kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wannu. Hegɔ, wa mgbɔɔ a̧ nɛnɛ si kɔ̧ tua ko wannu.
Wa zɔka Abram nɛ de-a wen zu a̧. Wa ha̧a̧ o ndai in o sami, o tuifuu, o bara in o kó-de-tom, o nana tuifuu in o ŋgeloba ha̧ a̧.
GASA WAN pi̧i̧ gasa nyimmɔ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen zu Sarai kóò ko Abram.
Wannu saa Abram, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ dee in am’ɛ ge? Wen ge sa mɛ tɔ̧ so ha̧‘m'e a̧ nɛ́ kóò kɔ-mɛ na ge?
Wen ge sa mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e a̧ nɛ́ boko-nya-mɛ sa'm baa a̧ nɛ̀ kóò ge? Kinii, mɛ̀ bá kóò kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ yák hɛ̧ɛ̧.»
Wannu Egiptɛ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘i mɛ fo Abraham yaknɛ, in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duka nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧.
Abram yaka nú Egiptɛ si sɛn nú Nɛgɛb in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ gu nɛ o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ Lot nɛ́ in a̧.
Abram a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai, bu-mbɔi in lɔr nyɛmna.
Abram ɔɔ nɛ̀ yuwar nɛnɛ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Nɛgɛb hɔ Bɛtɛl, fara n'aa dee so gbagari kɔ̧-a̧ sɛnɛ mgbara Bɛtɛl in Ai.
Abram kɔfa Sɔ̧ sa nɛ nin-a'e GASA WAN fara n'aa dee so
Lot nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ́ so in Abram a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o sami, o ndai in o tua-laa mbɛt.
Nù nyɛm so wa lɛŋ na, wen wa a̧a̧ nɛ mbɔi nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm mɛ ya kpɔk fara in ŋmaa na.
Hegɔ ɓɛɛ kpɛri ye mgbara o wi-dai-mɔ-dai ko Abram in ko Lot. (O be Kanaŋ in o be Periz ɔɔ so tɛ nù‘i mbɛt.)
Abram tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Lot: «Bó nɛ́ ɔ dee ha̧ kpɛri mɛ ye mgbara yɛ in mɛɛ na, mgbara o wi-dai-mɔ kɔ‘m in kɔ-mɛ na, wen ɛɛ nɛ nya-wi.
Mɛ zɔk, bó nɛ́ nù nɛ̀ oi-aa a̧ duk ti mɛ'ɛ na nde? Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kɛ̧́ tɛ yɛ nɛ ŋmaa; kà mɛ á̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ-mɛ si gale, ɓɛɛ mi nɛɛ kɔ‘m si wiiko; kà mɛ á̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ-mɛ si wiiko ɓɛɛ mi nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ‘m si gale.»

Lot baa yí nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk zika-nú Jurdɛn; duka nɛ́ de fara nɛ yì a̧a̧ sɛnɛ. Nɛti ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ ɗaŋ Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr, fara'i duka so hɔ Sɔar hee kpɛɛfɔ ko GASA WAN ga; de fara'i hɔɔ ŋmaa in nú Egiptɛ.
Lot hoka kɔ‘i nɛ bɔkɔ-nú Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ a̧ kur yak si war daŋa-wese; nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wa ee nɛ ŋmaa duk.
Abram dee kɔ‘i ye sɛn nú Kanaŋ, ɓɛɛ Lot ɔ kɔ‘i tɛ o ye ká̧ zika-nu'i. A̧ ɔɔ ye sɛn Sɔdɔm.
O be Sɔdɔm yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɗaŋ in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram ɗoŋ nɛ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ nɛ ŋmaa in Lot kaɗi: «Mɛ̀ bá yí-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn tɛ fara nɛ mɛ duk sɛnɛ‘i a̧ mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, si daŋa-wese in yee-wese.
Nù'ɛ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ zɔk’ɛ, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ́ dɔk hee fuunu ga. Kà‘i nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ tɔr fuunu, ɓɛɛ wi nyɛma mɛ́ tɔr o bezaŋ-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ kur! Mɛ̀ yár zɔk nɛ zi̧a̧ nù in pɛsa-a wen mi tɛ ha̧ nù‘i ha̧ mɛ.»
Abram mɔi̧a tua-laa kɔ‘i kur si sɛn ti o gasa te sɛn Mambre ká̧ Hebrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo
Amrafɛl wannu Sinɛar, Ariɔk wannu Elasar, Kedɔr-Laomɛr wannu Elam, in Tideal wannu Goyim
nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ́ bi Bera wannu Sɔdɔm, in Birsa wannu Gɔmɔr, Sinɛar, wannu Adma in Sɛmɛbɛr wannu Seboyim in wannu Bɛla (nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ Sɔar).
O ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ'ɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa kpa kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sidim nɛ duk nɛ́ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ.
Sɛn tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, wa yaa so ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko Kedɔr-Laomɛr, ɓɛɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-taar pɛ, wa dee ŋgazu.
Hegɔ tɛ ɓu-zua-naar pɛ, Kedɔr-Laomɛr tɛ̀ɛ́ in o wannu nɛ yor ɗoŋ-aa. Wa tika zu o be Refaim sɛn Astarot-Karnaim, o be Zuzɛ sɛn Ha̧m, o be Emii sɛn Sawe-Kiriataim,
o be Hɔr sɛn zu kaya kɔ-wa sɛn Sɛir hɔ sɛn Ɛl-Paraŋ nɛ duk ká̧ ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ wa pii ɗoŋ pii Ɛn-Mispat, sɛn nú Kadɛs; wa ɗaŋa nù ko o be Amalɛk in o be Amɔr nɛ ɔɔ sɛn Hasasɔŋ-Tamar.
Hegɔ, o wannu Sɔdɔm, wannu Gɔmɔr, wannu Adma, wannu Seboyim in wannu Bɛla nɛ‘i sa'e Sɔar dika lɛŋ yor ɗoŋ ŋmaa nɛ biro in o wi nɛ duk mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ Sidim.
O wannu nɔ‘i nɛ́ Kedɔr-Laomɛr, wannu Elam, Tideal wannu Goyim, Amrafɛl wannu Sinɛar in Ariɔk wannu Elasar. O wannu nɔ‘i naar'i baa biro duk nɛ̀ o wannu nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ'ɛ.
O bíí za̧a̧ so o kɔ̧ hee kɔ̧ kam-gìì ga sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sidim nɛti, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o wannu Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr yuu nɛ mɔ, wa tika sɛnɛ. O oi wannu taar nɛ ɓɔna yuu mɔ si zu kaya.
Hegɔ, o wi-gbin-biro kaia demɔ nú Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr lɛŋ, gu nɛ o nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa yak nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wa ba Lot, bem ko nya Abram in o mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yak nɛnɛ; a̧ duka so ɔ sɛn Sɔdɔm.
Ŋma wi-yu-mɔ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen-aa ha̧ Abram be hébreu nɛ ɔ ti gasa te ko Mambre, be Amɔr nya Ɛskɔl in Anɛr; o wi nɔ‘i taar'i yora so ɗoŋ Abram.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Abram zia'e, wa baa bem ko nya-a̧ yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro, a̧ kaia o ŋgaŋa wi-de-tom 318, nɛ wa koo kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ndak ɗoŋ o wannu hɔ sɛn Dan.
A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ bi wa mɛ zɛ. A̧ bìí wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak ɗoŋ wa hɔ Hoba ɗoŋ Damas nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ.
A̧ kaia o mbɔi lɛŋ pii nɛ ɗoŋ, a̧ baa bem ko nya-a̧ Lot in o mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ ba nɛ o kóò gu nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ pii ɗoŋ.
Ɗoŋ pia-ɗoŋ ko Abram, ŋgimbi n'aa gbina nɛ biro ti Kedɔr-Laomɛr in o wannu nɛ yora so ɗoŋ-aa, wannu Sɔdɔm wee ti a̧ pii kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ «Save» wen nɛ tɔ̧ «Ɗɔŋgɔ ko Wannu.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Mɛlkisedɛk wannu Salɛm baa brɛt in o dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛnɛ ha̧ Abram. Mɛlkisedɛk duka so nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk si ŋgɔn mɛ.
A̧ toka de yoŋgo zu Abram tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Sɔ̧ nɛ duk si ŋgɔn mɛ, wan nɛ dee yiwese in nù a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu Abram!
Zɔnamɔ a̧ duk nɛ ko Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn mɛ nɛ aa o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ er-mɛ!» Ɓɛɛ Abram ha̧ zu-mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kpaa ha̧ a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Wannu Sɔdɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram: «Mɛ̀ há̧ nɛ́ o bíí ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí kɔ-mɛ nɛ o mbɔi.»
Abram kifa nú ha̧ wannu Sɔdɔm: «Mi baa er-am nɛ ŋgɔn ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn nɛ dee yiwese in nù,
kóó nɛ́ garaazi, kóó nyak-ndárà kpɔk, mi beka ba mɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ na, wen ká mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧‘e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu wi a̧ Abram kifa nɛ̀ wanmbɔi.
Mi beka ba ŋma mɔ er-mɛ na, kànà nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ko o ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ. Ɛskɔl, Anɛr in Mambre tɛ kai war mɔ ko o bíí nɛ nɛɛ in am.»
Ɗoŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Abram tɛ ɔɔ-zu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ká mɛ́ de kíì na, Abram. Mi nɛ ŋgee kɔ-mɛ, mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ gasa-a nyɛmna.»
Abram kifa nú: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ha̧ ha̧‘m ge? Mi tɛ fe, bem bo na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ tɛ́ kai mɔɔ-oi-am nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr be Damas.
Ɛ́nɛ́ há̧ ŋma bezaŋ ha̧‘m na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ géé bíí nutua kɔ‘m a̧ tɛ́ kai mɔɔ-oi-am.»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ́ kai mɔɔ-oi-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bezaŋ-mɛ a̧ tɛ́ kai mɔɔ-oi-mɛ.»
A̧ mgbɔɔ Abram si zan, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ zɔ́k yí-zan, mɛ̀ zɔ́k o sɔra; mɛ́ nyɛma mɛ́ tɔr wa nde? O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ́ dɔk hegɔ.»
Abram kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zɔk a̧ hee wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga wen zu mɔ‘i.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ baa mɛ gbonɛ nɛ Ur, nù ko o be Kaldee wen ha̧a̧ fara’ɛ ha̧ mɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ.»
Abram kifa nú: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ge a̧ tɛ usi'e nù'ɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m ge?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ há̧ be-zɔŋa ndai, zɔŋa gbadua, be vala sami lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ taar, gbaku̧i in be pola ha̧‘m.»
Abram kaia o saɗi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛnɛ ti Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gba wa tan see-a, ɓɛɛ kai a zɔk nɛ̀ ŋmaa; a̧ mbaŋ o nɔ̧́í̧ na.
O ŋga nɔ̧́í̧ aa zu wɔr, ɓɛɛ Abram ndak wa yinɛ.
Ŋgimbi yee-wese, Abram tika ya, ɓɛɛ ŋma gasa kíì in gasa tum tik zu a̧.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram: «Mɛ̀ íŋ nɛ de-a ndé, o bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ ɔ tɛ ŋma nù nɛ bo nɛ nù kɔ-wa na. Wa tɛ de bara, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa tɛ pɛ gɔŋmaa-naar.
Mi tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-gɔn-kita zu dukbíí nɛ tɛ de wa nɛ bara. Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbo yak nɛ̀ dɔka kpaamɔ nyɛmna.
War kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ nɛ de-a nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ o dáà kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ sɔk, ɓɛɛ wa baa mɛ gun nɛ de-a.
O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ ko ɗoŋ ŋmaa war taar, sɛka o mbe bezaŋ-mɛ pia ɗoŋ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ ko o be Amɔr tɛ kaɗi hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.»
Wese yea ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ nɛ tum baa nu, ŋma wee kɔ̧ lɔk in leɓe-wee yaka nɛ mgbara o kpoo saɗi n'aa gɔna'i.
Wese'i, GASA WAN nɔɔ tɔk in Abram, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ nana-yì Egiptɛ hɔ nɛnɛ ɗoŋ gasa yí Efrat.
Mi tɛ ha̧ nù ko o be Kɛn in o be Keniz, o be Kadmɔŋ,
o be Hit, o be Periz, o be Refaim,
o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, ko o be Girgas in o be Jebus ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ.»
Sarai kóò ko Abram duka so, bem bo na; a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ zɔŋa Egiptɛ kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧; nin-a nɛ Agar.
Sarai tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram: «GASA WAN dora'm tɛ koa-a; mɛ̀ dúk in kó-de-tom kɔ‘m, ŋmafara mi tɛ kpa bem nɛ ɗoŋ-aa.» Ɓɛɛ Abram zii wen nú Sarai.
Ɗoŋ pɛ ɓu nɛ Abram baa nɛ fara nú Kanaŋ, Sarai ha̧a̧ Agar zɔŋa Egiptɛ, kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Abram nɛ̀ kóò.
A̧ duka in Agar, ɓɛɛ Agar ba zaŋ. Ŋgimbi nɛ wa gbara zaŋ Agar kaɗi, ɓɛɛ Agar zɔk naa-wan-tua kɔ‘i hee geemɔ ga.
Sarai tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abram: «Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ dee ha̧ dara mɛ da̧‘m. Nɛ́ mi'i ha̧a̧ kó-de-tom kɔ‘m ha̧ mɛ; ɗoŋ n'aa baa nɛ zaŋ kaɗi, a̧ zɔk am hee geemɔ ga; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara war k’ɛɛ in mɛɛ.»
Abram kifa nú ha̧ Sarai: «Mɛ̀ zɔk, mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai zu kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ in a̧.» Sarai usa bɔnɛ ha̧ Agar nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak.
Betom ko GASA WAN kpaa Agar ká̧ gɔna-yì ŋga-gbárà yuwar nɛ̀ nɛ́ si sɛn nu Sur,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Agar, kó-de-tom ko Sarai, mɛ́ tɛ́ nɛ̀ dee? Mɛ́ nɛ́ si dee?» Agar kifa nú: «Mi yu nɛ Sarai, naa-wan-tua kɔ‘m.»
Ɓɛɛ betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ tɛ ko naa-wan-tua kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.»
Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk nɛ‘i beka nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.»
Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Agar: «Mɛ̀ zii, mɛ́ a̧a̧ nɛ zaŋ, mɛ́ tɛ́ ko nɛ̀ be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ sa nin-a nɛ́ Ismaɛl, wen GASA WAN iŋa bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ.
Bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk hee tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ ga, a̧ tɛ sɛn bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ tɛ sɛn a̧. A̧ tɛ duk nɛtɛ mgbara o nya-a̧.»
Agar taa mɔ, wi zɔka Sɔ̧ nɛ mbetɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i biti nɛ yí'ɛ nde? Ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔn GASA WAN nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen ha̧ a̧. A̧ saa nin GASA WAN'e Ɛl-Roi, nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zɔk am.»
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa saa nɛ nin gɔna-yì nɛ duk mgbara Kadɛs in Bɛrɛd'e, gɔna-yì ko Lahai, «wan nɛ duk kpasa nɛ zɔk am.»
Agar koo be-wiwii ha̧ Abram, ɓɛɛ Abram a nin-a'e Ismaɛl.
Abram a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ 86 ŋgimbi nɛ Agar koo nɛ Ismaɛl ha̧ a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Abram kpaa nɛ pɛ 99, GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀, dé nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ti'm.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk.»
Abram tika nù ba yí gu nù, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ wen in a̧:
Hegɔ, wa beka sa mɛ Abram ɓɔna, wa tɛ sa mɛ‘e, ‹Abraham›, wen mɛ nɛ dáà ko dɔka dukbíí.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk. Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ ko o dɔka dukbíí, ɓɛɛ o wannu tɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ.
«Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ nɛ tɛ́ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ.
Mi tɛ ha̧ nù nɛ mɛ duk sɛnɛ hee gɛnɛ ga ha̧ mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ nɛ tɛ́ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ; nú Kanaŋ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham: «Mɛ tɛ kasi
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́
O be-wiwii k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kpaa zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar tɛ
Wa tɛ
Wi tɛ fo wi-mbii yinɛ mgbara o nam kɔ̧-a̧ wen n'aa gbina
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham: «Ká mɛ́ sa nin kóò kɔ-mɛ, Sarai ɓɔna; nin-a tɛ duk nɛ Sara.
Mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧, mi tɛ ha̧ be-wiwii ha̧ mɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa. Mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ koo o dukbíí nɛ dɔka-a. O wannu ko o dukbíí tɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ-a.»
Abraham tika nù, ba yi gu nù; a̧ mama mami, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ nɛ kɔ̧ see-aa'e: «Bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa tɛ ko bem nde? In Sara nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar nyɛma mɛ ko nde?»
Abraham tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Ho! Ismaɛl a̧ kpa de sɔnti sɛn ti'nɛ́ na nde?»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Weyaa! Kóò kɔ-mɛ Sara tɛ ko be-wiwii ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ sa nin-a Izak. Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk nɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo in a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa nɛ tɛ́ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ.
Ko Ismaɛl, mi zia kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ; mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧. Mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ ko in ha̧ a̧ mɛ dɔk. A̧ tɛ ko o be-wan ɓu-zua-yiitoo, mi tɛ de ha̧ gasa dukbíí mɛ gbo nɛ tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in Izak nɛ Sara tɛ ko tɛ ŋgimbi hee mɔ'ɔ ga tɛ mbe pɛ.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ Sɔ̧ kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in Abraham kaɗi, a̧ ee a̧ duk.
Abraham mgbɔɔ Ismaɛl bem kɔ‘i, o bara lɛŋ nɛ wa koo kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ in o wan nɛ wa hi̧fa hi̧fi, o wiwii lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧; a̧
Abraham a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Ismaɛl pɛ ɓu-zua-taar ŋgimbi nɛ wa
Kpɔk wese'i, wa
O bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, o bara nɛ wa koo kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ in o wan nɛ wa hi̧fa hi̧fi nɛ sede sɛn gɔni fara
GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧ Abraham sɛn ɗɔɔ o gasa te sɛn Mambre, ɓɛɛ ká Abraham duk so nɛ nù sɛn ká̧ nú tua-laa, ŋgimbi gbɛ̧ŋmɔ mɛ wese.
A̧ baa yí-a nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk o wiwii taar nɛ yor nɛ be nyɛi̧a-a. Ŋgimbi n'aa zɔka wa, a̧ maa yì nɛ haya-a we nɛ̀ ti wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gu nù sɛn ti wa.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nyaa, mi gɔma er ti'nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧‘m, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓir yak tɛ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.

Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓira nɛ tɛ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, ɔ dee ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m mɔ ha̧ wa ba be yì tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ fɔr nɛ̀ naŋ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ɔma be tɛ‘nɛ́ sɛn ɗɔɔ te’ɛ kaŋ, ha̧‘m ha̧ be dɔ̧ brɛt mɛ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛ. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yaka mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wa kifa nú: «Mɛ̀ dé kànà hee mɛ tɔ̧a̧ ga.»
Abraham kpánà nɔ̀ nɛ haya-a sitɛ Sara sɛn kɔ̧ tua-laa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ bá be-ao fuu taar a̧ mɛ̀ vátí ha̧n nɛ makala.»
Ɓɛɛ Abraham ma yì si fara nɛ o mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, a̧ baa de be-ndai kpɔk ha̧ ŋma wi-de-tom mɛ gɔn nɛ haya-a.
A̧ baa kaŋa-yibere, in yibere ká bá nɛ̀ be-ndai nɛ wa gia'i kai a ti wa. Abraham yor kɔ‘i nɛ ŋgɔn sɛn katɛ wa sɛn ti te, ɓɛɛ wa nyɔŋ mɔ.
Wa aka Abraham: «Kóò kɔ-mɛ Sara a̧a̧ sɛn dee?» Abraham kifa nú: «A̧ a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua-laa mɛ‘i.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Bin-mgba-pɛ, mi tɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ hee ŋgimbi kinii ga, ɓɛɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ Sara tɛ kpa be-wiwii.» Sara duka sɛn ká̧ nú tua-laa ɗoŋ Abraham zii nɛ wen'i.
Abraham in Sara sɔka so nyɛmna, pɛ wa dɔka; Sara kaɗa so zɔka zɛ kaɗi.
Hegɔ, Sara mama mami nɛ kɔ̧ see tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Kinii hee mɔ'ɔ n'am sɔka kaɗi ga, mi a̧a̧ nɛ wɔ wiwii ɓɔ nde? Zɔk, dáa-wan-tua kɔ‘m nɛ́ gbɛ́rɛ́ mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham: «Wen ge sa Sara mam mami ge? In wen ge sa Sara ak mɔ ndé, wi sɔka kaɗi, wi nyɛma mɛ kpa bem ɓɔ, ndé, wó'ɛ ge?
Ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ tɛ gan GASA WAN nde? Sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ hɔ bin-mgba-pɛ, mi tɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ Sara tɛ kpa be-wiwii.»
Sara kafa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi mam mami na», wen kíì dee a̧; ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, mɛ mama mami.»
O wi nɔ‘i kura mɛ yak si sɛn Sɔdɔm, ɓɛɛ Abraham nɛ in wa mɛ e wa yuwar.
GASA WAN taa mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ n'am tɛ de, mi tɛ hu̧si nɛ̀ Abraham nde?
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mbɛt, Abraham tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya dukbíí nɛ ɔ gasa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí lɛŋ zu nù'ɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa.

Wen mi hoka so a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧, ha̧ wa mɛ kasi yuwar ko GASA WAN de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in de nɛ kpasamɔ. Hegɔ GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ mɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nú-a sɛnɛ ha̧ Abraham mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ mi tɛ nɛ ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa, kà nɛ́ nyɛma ɗoŋ mɔ n'am zia'i, ɓɛɛ kà nɛ́ bòò hegɔ, mi tɛ iŋ.»
O bíí yiitoo baa war yak si Sɔdɔm, ɓɛɛ Abraham ɓɔn kɔ‘i ti GASA WAN.
Abraham ɗɔla pii ti, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧́: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nde?
Ŋmafara o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓu-mɔɔrɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ saaye’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɗaŋ ye’ɛ nɛ mbetɛ nde? Ɛ́nɛ́ beka e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ ye’ɛ wen zu o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i na nde?

Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛm mɛ́ gbɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpɔk in o wi nɛ kita nyɛma mɛ tik na. Ɛnɛ nyɛm mɛ de hegɔ na. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpɔk in o wi nɛ kita nyɛma mɛ tik, ɓɛɛ mɔ bo hegɔ na. Bó nɛ́ wi-gɔn-kita zu nù lɛŋ tɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a na nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Kà‘m nɛ́ kpaa o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓu-mɔɔrɔ sɛn saaye Sɔdɔm, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí saaye Sɔdɔm lɛŋ wen zu wa.»
Abraham kifa nú: «Mi gee fuunu, gee bùk, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Gasa Wan kɔ‘m.
Ŋmafara zu bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, nɛ́ bíí mɔɔrɔ a̧ tɛ ɓɔn, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nyɛm ɗaŋa ye lɛŋ wen zu bíí mɔɔrɔ nɛ ɓɔna nde?» A̧ kifa nú: «Mi a̧ kpaa o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓu-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ sɛnɛ, mi beka ɗaŋ ye na.»
Abraham tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Ŋmafara wi tɛ kpa wa ɓu-naar.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú: «Mi nyɛm mɛ de ŋma mɔ na, wen zu bíí ɓu-naar.»
Abraham tɔ̧a̧: «Kà‘m nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ká Gasa Wan kɔ‘m kpa ɗaŋsee na. Ŋmafara wa tɛ ya nɛ́ bíí ɓu-taar.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Kà‘m nɛ́ kpaa bíí ɓu-taar, mi beka de ŋma mɔ na.»
Abraham tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Gasa Wan kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é kànà benaŋ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ be wen woyo. Ŋmafara ɛnɛ tɛ kpa wa nɛ́ bíí ɓu-yiitoo.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Mi beka ɗaŋ ye na, wen zu bíí ɓu-yiitoo.»
Abraham tɔ̧a̧: «Ká see Gasa Wan kɔ‘m tu̧ na, ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ sɔŋkur wen. Ɓɛɛ ka wa nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ bíí ɓu?» GASA WAN kifa nú: «Wen zu wa ɓu, mi beka ɗaŋ mɔ na.»
Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in Abraham kaɗi, a̧ yaka, ɓɛɛ Abraham si ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i.
O betom ko GASA WAN yiitoo hɔɔ sɛn Sɔdɔm mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ká Lot duk nɛ́ nù sɛn ká̧ nú garo. Ŋgimbi nɛ Lot zɔka wa, a̧ kura ŋgɔn we ti wa, nɛ́ɛ̀ gu nu sɛn ti wa.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nyaa, mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓír nɛ tɛ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen ɔa-a in fɔra naŋ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ ɛ́nɛ́ yaka.» Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Weyaa, ɛɛ tɛ ɔ k’ɛɛ zan hɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓɛɛ.»
A̧ aia nú ha̧ wa hegɔ, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ in a̧ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ gii nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa, a̧ gii
Nɛ̀ wa tɛ ɔ nù hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ o bíí saaye Sɔdɔm, mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e obem si kpa nɛ sɔkawi, o bíí saaye lɛŋ zika tua ko Lot kpa nú ŋmaa.
Wa saa Lot ɓɛɛ wa ak a̧: «O gɛnɛ nɛ hɔɔ tɛ-mɛ'ɛ, wa a̧a̧ sɛn dee? Mɛ̀ fó wa gbonɛ pii tɛ yɛ, h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɔ in wa.»
Lot gboo nɛ haya-a sitɛ wa nú tua mɛ, ɓɛɛ kpe nú tua ɗoŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi gɔma er ti'nɛ́, o nya'm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ na!

Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ be-zɔŋa yiitoo nɛ tɛ iŋ wiwii hɔ̧ɔ̧ na; mi tɛ kai wa tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ in wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in wa na, wen wa a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m.»

Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú: «Mɛ̀ yák siɓi!» Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ sitɛ ŋmaa: «Wi’ɛ nɛ́ gɛnɛ sɛn saaye k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ wi-gɔn-kita? Ɔ dee nyɛmna, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ in a̧ gan mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de in wa.» Wa ira Lot nɛ ŋgai, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ siti wen gbina nú tua.
Nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ o wi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i pi̧i̧ nɛ er si zan, ɓɛɛ wa dak Lot pii ɗoŋ pii kɔ̧ tua; wa kpee nú tua,
ɓɛɛ wa bom yí o bíí nɛ yaa nu tua, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ tɛ o obem hegɔɔ kpa nɛ o gasawi, ɓɛɛ wa kpa ŋgai wen zɔka nú tua ɓɔna.
O wi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Lot: «Mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋma bíí woyo sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧ nde? O be-for-mɛ, o be-wiwii, o be-okoo kɔ-mɛ, mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ saaye’ɛ, mɛ̀ káí gbonɛ.
Ɛɛ tɛ ɗaŋ ye’ɛ yinɛ, wen gasa ɗaŋmɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ ye’ɛ aa zer Sɔ̧. Mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa GASA WAN tom yɛ tɛnɛ wen ɗaŋa a̧ yinɛ.»
Lot gboo ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be-for: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ haya-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák saaye’ɛ, wen GASA WAN tɛ ɗaŋ ye’ɛ!» Ɓɛɛ o be-for-aa ba kɔ‘i wen kɔ̧-a̧ e tɛ zɛŋ.
Mɛ́ gɔna-ndaa-zan, o betom ko Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Lot: «Mɛ̀ kúr nɛ haya-a wen mgbɔɔ kóò kɔ-mɛ in o boko-bem kɔ-mɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó tɛ ye’ɛ, wen ká mɛ́ tɛɛ fe wen ɗaŋmɔ ko ye’ɛ.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Lot ɓɔna fara zika naŋ mɔ ga, o betom ko Sɔ̧ yiitoo tika er-a, er kóò kɔ̧-a̧ in o be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo'i, wen GASA WAN dee ko ha̧ a̧; o betom ko Sɔ̧ mgbɔɔ wa gbonɛ wen áá wa ɗoŋ ye.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa mgbɔ nɛ́ wa gbonɛ ga, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Lot: «Mɛ̀ yú mɔ yak wen kpasa tɛ-mɛ, ká mɛ zɔk mɔ si ɗoŋ na, in ká mɛ yor nɛ yuwar na mbɛt; mɛ̀ yú mɔ yak si mgbara kaya mɛ, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ fe.»
Lot kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Mɔ'ɔ dé hee GASA WAN kɔ̧a̧ ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ de yí; wen ɛ́nɛ́ dee gasa demɔ in am n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dee ha̧‘m mɛ́ kpasi’ɛ, ɓɛɛ mi nyɛm mɛ yu mɔ si mgbara kaya mɛ‘i nɛti ha̧ ŋgamɔ‘i mɛ tik zu'm ha̧‘m mɛ fe na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k be geɗek ye mɛ‘i nyɛi̧ batɛ na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si hi̧i̧. Nɛ́ be geɗek fara tikiɗi ɓɛɛ, ha̧‘m duk hi̧i̧ a̧‘m kpasi.»
Betom kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi tɛ de mɔ‘i nɛ mɛ aka'i, mi beka ɗaŋ ye nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'i na.
Mɛ̀ yú mɔ si hi̧i̧ nɛ haya-a, wen mi nyɛm mɛ de mɔ nɛti sɛka mɛ hɔɔ hi̧i̧ na.» Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ nɛ‘i sa nin ye'i Sɔar.
Nɛ́ mɛ́ daŋa-wese a̧ Lot hɔɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Sɔar.
GASA WAN toma baraadu nɛ̀ wee pii sɛn Gɔmɔr in Sɔdɔm. Mɔ‘i tɛɛ nɛ yiwese nɛ tɛ GASA WAN.
A̧ kuma o ye nɔ‘i gbuɗuk in o zika-nù in o bíí nù‘i lɛŋ gu nɛ o te lɛŋ.
Kóò ko Lot zɔka mɔ pii ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi ta-tɔŋ.
Mɛ tutuyɛ sut, Abraham nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn oi fara n'aa yora so sɛnɛ ti GASA WAN.
Sɛn hi̧i̧, Abraham baa zu nɛ ŋgɔn zɔk mɔ si sɛn Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr in o zika-nù‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk nɛ kura zi-wee ŋmák-ŋmák hee zi-wee gasa kɔ̧ lɔk ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa nɛ o gasa ye zika-nù‘i, tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ Abraham: nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a̧ baa nɛ Lot yinɛ sɛn tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i, ŋgimbi n'aa ɗaŋa nɛ o ye nɛ Lot duka so sɛnɛ.
Lot daŋa nɛ Sɔar wen ɔa-a sɛn zu kaya, ɓɛɛ o be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo nɛ in a̧. A̧ dee kíì ɔa-a sɛn Sɔar, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ di̧i̧ á̧ a̧ ɔɔ sɛnɛ in o be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kaya-bem tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ be-ɗoŋ: «Zɔ́k kinii dáà k’ɛɛ sɔka kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ŋma wiwii nɛ tɛ duk in yɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa de sɛn tɛ o nù lɛŋ ga bo na.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ há̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ ɔɔ in a̧, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa ŋma bezaŋ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ-a.»
Wa ee dɔ̧ɔ̧ nú dáà kɔ-wa mɛ zɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ kaya-be-okoo tɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ in dáà kɔ‘i; a̧ iŋ ŋgimbi nɛ be-okoo'i ɔɔ nɛ nù in n'aa kura nɛnɛ na.
Nɛ́ mɔ sa̧a̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ kaya-a tɔ̧ ha̧ be-ɗoŋ: «Mɛ zɛ'ɛ mi ɔɔ in dáà kɔ‘m; ɛ̀ɛ̀ há̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo sɔsɔɔ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ in a̧ wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa ŋma bezaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ-a.»
Mɛ zɛ‘i woyo, wa ha̧a̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ be-ɗoŋ si tua ɗoŋ dáà kɔ‘i. A̧ iŋ ŋgimbi nɛ be-okoo'i ɔɔ nɛ nù in n'aa kura nɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ Lot e zaŋ tɛ o bem kɔ‘i yiitoo lɛŋ.
Kaya-bem koo nɛ̀ be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin bem’ɛi nɛ Mɔab. Mɔab nɛ́ tugun o be Mɔab hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ.
Be-ɗoŋ koo nɛ be-wiwii mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-a nɛ Bɛn-Ami. A̧ nɛ tugun o be Amɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ.
Sɛn hi̧i̧ Abraham kura yak si sɛn nú Nɛgɛb; a̧ ɔɔ mgbara Kadɛs in Sur, ɓɛɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ tɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ Gerar.
Abraham tɔ̧a̧ ndé, kóò kɔ‘i Sara nɛ́ boko-nya-wi, ɓɛɛ Abimɛlɛk wannu Gerar tom ba Sara yaknɛ.
Hegɔ mɛ zɛ, Sɔ̧ hɔɔ zu ha̧ Abimɛlɛk, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e ndé: «Mɛ́ tɛ́ fe wen zu kóò'ɛ nɛ mɛ baa’ɛ, wen a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ wíì kɔ̧-a̧.»
Hee Abimɛlɛk tɛ duk in Sara hɔ̧ɔ̧ na ga, a̧ kifa nú: «Gasa Wan kɔ‘m, kóó dukbíí dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbɛ kànà wa mbɛt nde?
Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m nde, kóò'ɛ nɛ́ boko-nya-wi. Sara nɛ tɛ mbɛt tɔ̧a̧‘e wi’ɛ nɛ bu̧i̧-nya-wi. Mi dee mɔ‘i nɛ sa̧a̧-see, in nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt.»
Sɔ̧ kifa nú ha̧ a̧ tɛ hɔɔ-zu: «Mi mbɛt, mi iŋa, mɛ dee mɔ‘i nɛ sa̧a̧-see, mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi'i dora mɛ wen ká mɛ tɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ mbɛt, mi e war ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk in a̧ na.
Kinii, mɛ̀ há̧ kóò ko wi’ɛ ha̧ a̧, wen a̧ nɛ
Abimɛlɛk kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, a̧ wee ɗoŋ mɔ‘i ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ gasa kíì ba wa.
Abimɛlɛk saa Abraham ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ dee in yɛɛ'ɛ ge? Nɛ́ ge ɗaŋmɔ ge a̧‘m dee in mɛɛ, sa mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ pi̧ gasa ɗaŋmɔ zu'm in zu nù kɔ‘m’ɛ ge? Mɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ de na in am.»
Ɓɛɛ Abimɛlɛk tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ taa de nɛ pɛrti mɔ hegɔ ge?»
Abraham kifa nú: «Mi taa so kɔ‘m ndé, yuu-kíí Sɔ̧ tikiɗi bo sɛn fara’ɛ na, wa tɛ gbɛ‘m, wen zu kóò kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ kpasawen, a̧ nɛ boko-nya'm; ɛɛ nɛ́ dáà kpɔk, nàá nɛtɛ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am baa nɛ a̧ nɛ kóò.
Hegɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ yambali ɗoŋ-am nyɛi̧ nɛ o nam kɔ‘m, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ‘m'e fara lɛŋ n’ɛɛ tɛ nɛ sɛnɛ, a̧ a̧ gbak am tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, wi nɛ boko-nya'm.»
Abimɛlɛk kaia o sami in o ndai, o wiwii-de-tom, in o okoo-a mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ha̧ Abraham, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ Sara siɗoŋ mbɛt ha̧ Abraham.
Abimɛlɛk tɔ̧a̧ mbɛt: «Mɛ̀ zɔ́k nù kɔ‘m sɛn ti mɛ, mɛ̀ hók fara nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧, a̧ mɛ duk sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sara: «Mi ha̧a̧ kɔya bu-mbɔi booro ha̧ bu̧i̧-nya-mɛ, nɛ tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ yí o wi nɛ ya in mɛɛ lɛŋ ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ‘e, mɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na.»
Abraham aia nú ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kpasi Abimɛlɛk in kóò kɔ̧-a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ o kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ko bem.
Wen GASA WAN dee so ha̧ o okoo nutua ko Abimɛlɛk lɛŋ mɛ yar ndɔra wen zu Sara kóò ko Abraham.
GASA WAN dee demɔ in Sara hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nú-a wen dea-a ga.
Sara sɔka so kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba zaŋ ko nɛ̀ be-wiwii ha̧ Abraham, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ baa gɔn.
Abraham aa nin Izak ha̧ be-wiwii nɛ Sara koo ha̧ a̧‘i.
Izak kpaa zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ɓɛɛ Abraham
Abraham koo Izak ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa.
Ɓɛɛ Sara tɔ̧: «Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ nú‘m mɛ gɔn mami. O bíí lɛŋ nɛ tɛ zii mɔ'ɔ tɛ mam mami nɛ desee in am.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ mbɛt'e: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o'o tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ so ha̧ Abraham nde, Sara tɛ̀ɛ́ pi̧ so bere nú o bem o? Wen nɛ́ sɛn tɛ sɔki kɔ̧-a̧, a̧‘m koo nɛ bem ha̧ a̧.»
Bem gasa, in a̧ bɛ̧ɛ̧ bere; hegɔ Abraham dee gasa gbaŋa wese nɛ wa baa nɛ bere sɛn nu Izak yinɛ.
Sara zɔka be-wiwii nɛ Agar zɔŋa Egiptɛ koo ha̧ Abraham nɛ duk de nɛ saa in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Izak,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham: «Mɛ̀ ndák kó-de-tom’ɛ yinɛ in bem kɔ̧-a̧, wen bem ko kó-de-tom er yɛ beka kɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi in bem kɔ‘m Izak na.»
Wen'i ha̧a̧ ɗaŋsee ha̧ Abraham, wen nɛ́ bem kɔ̧-a̧.

Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ kpa ɗaŋsee zu wen nɛ Sara tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ wen bem nɛ mɛ koo in kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ na. Mɔ nɛ Sara ak er-mɛ lɛŋ, mɛ̀ kɔ̧́ ɗɔaa, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Izak a̧ pɛ́r-nam kɔ-mɛ tɛ ba nin-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mɔ kpɔk, mi tɛ de ha̧ dukbíí mɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ bem ko kó-de-tom mbɛt, wen a̧ nɛ bem kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.»
Abraham kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut, a̧ baa brɛt in yì há̧ há̧ Agar. Abraham baa bem’ɛi e gun ger nàà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa yaknɛ. Agar yaka yambali nɛ ŋga-gbárà Bɛrseba nɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ yì kɔ̧ dak kaɗa kaɗi, a̧ baa bem e ti ŋma be te.
A̧ nɛɛ duk kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ be nyɛi̧a-a hee naŋ gɔmŋmaa ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mi beka duk oi fio ko bem kɔ‘m na.» A̧ duka nù nɛ nyɛi̧a-a ɓɛɛ a̧ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ ŋgaya-a.
Sɔ̧ zia
Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ bá bem nɛ ŋgɔn in mɛ̀ kás'a nɛ er, wen mi tɛ de ha̧ gasa dukbíí mɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ-a.»
Sɔ̧ hu̧i̧a̧ yí Agar wen zɔka mɔ nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk gɔna-yì sɛn ti a̧. A̧ ɗuu yì‘i dun dak, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ha̧ bem mɛ nɔ.
Sɔ̧ duka in bem’ɛi, a̧ gasa, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ye sɛn ŋga-gbárà. A̧ duka nɛ gasa wi-pi̧-góò nyɛmna.
A̧ dee ye sɛn ŋga-gbárà Paraŋ, ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ ba nɛ zɔŋa Egiptɛ nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ a̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Abimɛlɛk in Pikɔl, gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham: «Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ sɛn tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ de.
Mɛ̀ kán mɔ sɛn ti'm kinii nɛ nin Sɔ̧, mɛ beka e ɗɔra tɛ‘m, o bem kɔ‘m in o bezaŋ-am na, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk am nɛ de-a hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ye nɛ mɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka nɛ̀ mɛ nɛ̀ de-a ga.»
Abraham kifa nú: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, mi tɛ de hegɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ Abraham wuli o ŋma wi-de-tom ko Abimɛlɛk wen zu gɔna-yí-nɔɔ nɛ o wi-de-tom ko Abimɛlɛk dora e nɛ kɔ‘i.
Abimɛlɛk kifa nú: «Mi iŋ wi nɛ dee mɔ‘i na. Mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m nɛti na, zia-a kɔ‘m nɛ mɔ‘i sɔsɔɔ‘i ɓɛɛ.»
Abraham kaia o geɗek mɔ-dai in o ndai ha̧ Abimɛlɛk, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo nɔ tɔk in ŋmaa.
Abraham kaia o zɔŋa sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo sɛn mgbara o dɔka-a e nɛtɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Abimɛlɛk ak Abraham: «O zɔŋa sami nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ mɛ hoka a hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛtɛ'ɛ nɛ́ wen ge?»
A̧ kifa nú: «Nɛ́ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa o zɔŋa sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ mɔɔ-er-am. Mɔ'ɔ tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-sedaako, nɛ usi'e nɛ́ mi a̧ gɔna yì'ɛ.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ sa wa saa nin fara'i «Bɛrseba» wen wa yiitoo kànà so mɔ sɛn hi̧i̧.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa nɔɔ tɔk sɛn Bɛrseba kaɗi, Abimɛlɛk kura in Pikɔl gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗɔŋ sitɛ nù ko o be Filistii.
Hegɔ Abraham guna ŋma be te
Abraham duka ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ tɛ nù ko o be Filistii.
Ɗoŋ o mɔ nɛ yaka, Sɔ̧ wee Abraham, ɓɛɛ sa ha̧ a̧: «Abraham!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ sara: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ!»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ bá kpɔk bem kɔ-mɛ Izak nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna a̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ si sɛn tɛ nù ko Mɔriya, nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ dɔ a̧ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧‘m sɛn zu kaya n'am tɛ usi ha̧ mɛ.»
Abraham kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut, a̧ hɛra tuifuu kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mgbɔɔ o ŋma wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Izak mbɛt; a̧ gbaa gua wen dɔa-a nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak si sɛn fara nɛ Sɔ̧ usa so ha̧ a̧.
Taar zɛ nɛɛ nɔ̀, Abraham baa yí nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk fara'i nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
Abraham tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ in tuifuu; ɛ́ɛ́ in bem, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ nɛ hɔ sɛn mɛ‘i, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ gasi Sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ pia ɗoŋ kpa'nɛ́.»
Abraham baa gua-ɗafi-sɔ̧ e sɛn zu bem kɔ̧-a̧ Izak, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba wee in paa, ɓɛɛ wa kai ŋmaa in bem yak.
Izak saa dáà kɔ‘i Abraham ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Baaba!» Abraham kifa nú: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ, bem kɔ‘m.» Izak aka dáà kɔ‘i: «Wee in gua nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ, ɓɛɛ
Abraham kifa nú: «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ tɛ ha̧
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ sɛn fara nɛ Sɔ̧ usa so ha̧ Abraham kaɗi, a̧ ɗafa
Abraham hu̧i̧a̧ er ɓɛɛ dak paa wen gɔna ger bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ betom ko GASA WAN saa a̧ nɛ yiwese, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Abraham! Abraham!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ sara: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ!»
Betom tɔ̧a̧: «Ká mɛ́ ba er-mɛ sitɛ bem kɔ-mɛ wen gɔna a̧ na! Ká mɛ́ de ŋma mɔ in a̧ na! Kinii, mi iŋa ndé, mɛ yu Sɔ̧ yuu wen mɛ bɛ̧ ha̧a̧ kpɔk bem kɔ-mɛ ha̧‘m na.»
Abraham baa yí nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zɔk vala sami, nɛ zak-a haka mgbara da̧a̧ be te, ɓɛɛ Abraham nɛ́ɛ̀ ba vala sami'i, nɛ́ɛ̀ gɔn oi nú bem kɔ̧-a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧.
Abraham aa nin fara'i'e: «GASA WAN ha̧a̧ mɔ!» Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ wi tɔ̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i: «GASA WAN ha̧a̧ mɔ sɛn zu kaya.»
Betom ko GASA WAN saa Abraham war yiitoo woyo nɛ yiwese,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mi kana tɛ‘m! Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee mɔ hegɔ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ e kpɔk bem kɔ-mɛ na ga,
mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra yiwese in nyɛmɛ ká̧ zaŋ gba-tɔp ga, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ gan o wisɛn kɔ-wa tɛ biro.
O dukbíí lɛŋ sɛn zu nù tɛ kpa
Abraham pia ɗoŋ kpa o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, wa kura si ɗoŋ si Bɛrseba, ɓɛɛ Abraham de ye hi̧i̧.
Ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wa tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Abraham ndé, Milka mbɛt koo o be-wiwii ha̧ nya-a̧ Nahɔr.
Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Us, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Buz, Kemuɛl dáà ko Aram,
Kɛsɛd, Hazɔ, Pildas, Yidlaf in Bɛtuɛl.
Bɛtuɛl koo Rebeka. O bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ Milka koo ha̧ Nahɔr, nya Abraham nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Nahɔr a̧a̧ so nɛ ŋma okoo, nin kóò‘i nɛ Reuma; a̧ koo so bem mbɛt; nin o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Teba, Gaham, Tahas in Maka.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Sara dee sɛn zu nù nɛ́ pɛ gɔŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
A̧ fea sɛn Kiriat-Arba, fara nɛ‘i sa'e Hebrɔŋ sɛn nú Kanaŋ. Abraham nɛɛ de gera hi̧i̧ nɛ fio mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ Abraham kur fara fio nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Hɛt'e:
«Mi nɛ́ gɛnɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ fara ha̧‘m sɛn nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen guna kóò kɔ‘m.»
O bezaŋ Hɛt kifa nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga ha̧ Abraham:
«Nyaa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen k’ɛɛ! Sɔ̧ ee'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wan mgbara yɛ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún fio k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn tɛ de kɔ̧ fio n’ɛnɛ hoka; ŋma bíí kpɔk beka bɛ̧ ha̧a̧ kɔ̧ fio h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen guna kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.»
Abraham kura ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ gu nù ti o bezaŋ Hɛt,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa wen baa fio kɔ‘m in guna a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m; ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú ha̧ Efrɔŋ, bem ko Sɔhar wen am,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ di̧i̧ Makpɛla nɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ká̧ nú fɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧‘m. A̧ a̧ ɗɔr ha̧‘m nɛ mgbák gɛnɛ, ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ fara-gun-fio kɔ‘m tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Efrɔŋ duka so nù mgbara o bezaŋ Hɛt mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kifi nú ha̧ Abraham nɛ yí o bezaŋ Hɛt in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ tɛa saaye kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«Nyaa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m nɛti sɛ! Fɔ in di̧i̧ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn fara'i, mi ha̧a̧‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yí o bíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún fio k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Abraham gu nù ti o be-nù,
a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Efrɔŋ nɛ yí o be-nù: «Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m; mi tɛ ha̧ sede fɔ‘i ha̧ mɛ. Mɛ̀ bá er-am, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧‘m tɛ gun fio kɔ‘m sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Efrɔŋ kifi nú ha̧ Abraham:
«Nyaa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m nɛti sɛ. Kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-naar mgbara ɛɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún fio k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Abraham ee nú in Efrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ we dɔka sede nɛ Efrɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛnɛ‘i ti o bezaŋ Hɛt. Duka nɛ kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-naar nɛ̀ o wi-de-gɛnɛ lɛŋ iŋa.
Hegɔ fɔ ko Efrɔŋ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn Makpɛla nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in Mambre, nù, in di̧i̧ nɛ duk sɛnɛ‘i, in o te lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn bɛɛ-nù‘i hɔ sɛn ká̧ a̧ lɛŋ,
duka nɛ ko Abraham, nɛ yí o bezaŋ Hɛt, in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ tɛa nú garo ye'i.
Ɓɛɛ Abraham ba Sara gun sɛn gasa kɔ̧ di̧i̧ fɔ Makpɛla nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in Mambre, sɛn Hebrɔŋ nú Kanaŋ.
O bezaŋ Hɛt ee fara-gun-fio kpɛɛfɔ‘i in di̧i̧ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i ha̧ Abraham.
Abraham duka nɛ sɔkawi nɛ kpaa pɛ nɛ dɔka-a kaɗi, nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ toka so de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧ zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Abraham tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kuti wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ duk zu mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ: «Mɛ̀ pí̧ er-mɛ ɗɔɔ ku'm,
mɛ̀ kán mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ dee yiwese in nù nde, mɛ beka ba zɔŋa Kanaŋ fara n'am duk sɛnɛ'ɛ ha̧ bem kɔ‘m na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ nɛ sɛn nù kɔ‘m, sɛn nutua kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ baa ŋma kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m Izak!»
Wi-de-tom kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ŋmafara kóò‘i beka kɔ̧ ɗɔaa mɛ tɛ in am pii sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧ na. Mi nyɛma mɛ mgbɔ bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛnɛ sitɛ nù fara n’ɛnɛ tɛɛ nɛnɛ nde?»
Abraham kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ we mgbɔɔ bem kɔ‘m nɛnɛ si hi̧i̧ na.

GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese nɛ baa'm gbonɛ nɛ kɔ̧ tua ko dáà kɔ‘m in sɛn nù kɔ‘m tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ kan mɔ ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mi tɛ ha̧ nù'ɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ›, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ tom betom kɔ̧-a̧ yak ti ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ ba kóò sɛnɛ ha̧ bem kɔ‘m.
Kà kóò‘i nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ndak ɗoŋ mɛ na, ŋma mɔ beka zɔk mɛ sɛn tɛ kanamɔ nɛ mɛ kana ha̧‘m'i na. Mɔ kpɔk, ká mɛ́ mgbɔ bem kɔ‘m nɛnɛ si hi̧i̧ na.»
Wi-de-tom pi̧i̧ er ɗɔɔ ku Abraham, wan kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kan mɔ ha̧ a̧ zu mɔ‘i.
Wi-de-tom hoka ŋgeloba ɓu sɛn mgbara o dɔka ŋgeloba ko wan kɔ‘i; a̧ kura nɔ̀, nɛ̀ o dɔka demɔ nɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba yuwar si nú Mesopotamii, si saaye ko Nahɔr.
A̧ kaia o ŋgeloba gu nù sɛn ɗoŋ ye, ká̧ gɔna-yì mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ŋgimbi nɛ o okoo gbo nɛnɛ mɛ tɛɛ ɗu nɛ yi.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko wan kɔ‘m Abraham, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m kpa demɔ sɔsɔɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí
Zɔk kinii mi yor ká̧ gɔna-yì; dekpaa, ɓɛɛ o boko-bem ko o bíí saaye’ɛ tɛɛ mɛ ɗu yi.

Boko-bem n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ wɛ́r kpáná-yì kɔ-mɛ ha̧‘m nɔ yi›, nɛ tɛ ha̧ kifa-nú ha̧‘m'e: ‹Mɛ̀ nɔ́ yì, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ yì ha̧ o ŋgeloba kɔ-mɛ mbɛt›, boko-bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ kóò n’ɛnɛ hoka ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Izak, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ iŋ‘e ndé, ɛ́nɛ́ usa
Nú-a tɛ zɔm tɛ wen na, ɓɛɛ Rebeka hɔ nɛ kpáná-yì sɛn zu kóŋgó-ɓaa; Rebeka nɛ́ boko-bem ko Bɛtuɛl, bem ko Milka; Milka duka nɛ kóò ko Nahɔr, nya Abraham.
Rebeka yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna, a̧ tɛ iŋ so wiwii hɔ̧ɔ̧ na. A̧ zira si nú gɔna-yì, ɗu yì dun kpáná-yì kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ.
Wi-de-tom wara yì tɛ́ɛ̀ yor ti a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi aia nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɔ ŋma be yì tikiɗi kɔ̧ kpáná kɔ-mɛ.»
Boko-bem’ɛi kifa nú: «Nyaa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ», ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ haya-a a̧ hira nɛ oi kpáná-yì kɔ̧-a̧ si ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ wi-de-tom nɔ yì‘i.
Ŋgimbi n'aa ha̧a̧ yì ha̧ wi-de-tom kaɗi, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi tɛ ɗu yì ha̧ o ŋgeloba k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɔ nyɛm wa mbɛt.»
A̧ gbaia yì nɛ haya-a si kɔ̧ kombon-nɔ-yì ko o ŋgeloba, ɓɛɛ a̧ ma yì si ɗoŋ mɛ ɗu mbe yì. A̧ ɗuu yì dam o ŋgeloba lɛŋ.
Wi’ɛi zɔka a̧ nɛ oi nú, ta nɛ mɔ nɛ kɔ̧ see'e: GASA WAN kpɛka nɔ̀ kɔ‘i náà, kóó kpɛk na nde?
Ŋgimbi nɛ o ŋgeloba nɔɔ yì kaɗi, wi-de-tom baa wele nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya pi̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧ boko-bem’ɛi in gasa káná yiitoo nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr mbɛt pi̧ er-a,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ boko-bem ko o nde? Mi aia nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m, ɛɛ tɛ kpa fara-ɔ sɛn tɛ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ nde?»
A̧ kifa nú ha̧ wi-de-tom: «Mi nɛ boko-bem ko Bɛtuɛl nɛ Milka koo ha̧ Nahɔr.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ siti woyo: «Hoe in hɛra yuɗu wen ɔa-a zu-a ko o saɗi ká bá nɛ̀ fara-ɔ ko o bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.»
Wi-de-tom gbɛɛ zugur nù, ɓɛɛ gu nù ti GASA WAN
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko wan kɔ‘m Abraham; ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN mgbɔɔ nɛ‘m si nutua ko o nya ko wan kɔ‘m, a̧ e deako in
Boko-bem’ɛi maa yì nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ yaka lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko nàà kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ.

Rebeka a̧a̧ so nɛ nya-wi nɛ nin-a nɛ Labaŋ; Labaŋ gboo ma yì si zan tɛ wi’ɛi ká̧ gɔna-yì. A̧ zɔka wele in o káná sɛn er boko-nya-a̧; a̧ zia so mɔ nɛ Rebeka wee ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ a̧ zu mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi dee so in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ma yì si katɛ wi’ɛi nɛ ɓɔna in o ŋgeloba kɔ‘i ká̧ gɔna-yì‘i.
Labaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tóká de yoŋgo ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ zu'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii ti. Wen ge s’ɛnɛ duk nɛ zan ge? Mi ɗafa fara-ɔ in fara-ɔ ha̧ o ŋgeloba mbɛt.»
Wi-de-tom yee tua, ɓɛɛ a̧ bur o tui ɗoŋ o ŋgeloba yinɛ. Wa ha̧a̧ hoe in hɛra-yuɗu ha̧ wa. Wa ha̧a̧ yì ha̧ wi-de-tom in o wi nɛ tɛɛ in a̧ ha̧ wa mɛ fɔr nɛ naŋ-wa.
Wa ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mi beka nyɔŋ mɔ na hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ n'am tɛ̀ɛ́ wen-aa sɛ.» Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧.»
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi nɛ wi-de-tom ko Abraham.
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ de sɔnti ha̧ wan kɔ‘m nɛ kifa nɛ gasa bíí nyɛmna. A̧ ha̧a̧ o sami in o ndai, bu-mbɔi in lɔr, o wi-de-tom in o kó-de-tom, o ŋgeloba in o tuifuu ha̧ a̧.
Sara, kóò ko wan kɔ‘m kòó tɛ sɔki kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt nɛ̀ be-wiwii; wan kɔ‘m ha̧a̧ o mbɔi kɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ bem’ɛi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ kan mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mɛ beka ba zɔŋa Kanaŋ n'am ɔ tɛ nù kɔ-wa’ɛ nɛ kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m na.
Mɛ̀ kán mɔ ndé, mɛ tɛ nɛ sɛn mgbara o nam kɔ‘m, nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m, mɛ́ ba kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m sɛnɛ.›
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wan kɔ‘m: ‹Ŋmafara, kóò‘i beka kɔ̧ mɛ tɛ in am na!›
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú: ‹GASA WAN n'am nɛɛ so nɔ̀ ti a̧ tɛ tom betom kɔ‘i nɛnɛ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ nɔ̀ kɔ-mɛ tɛ ba nɛ̀ mɛ. Mɛ tɛ ba nɛ be-zɔŋa nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko o bíí kɔ‘m na, mɛ beka yu ɗɔɔ kanamɔ nɛ mɛ kana ha̧‘m na; ɓɛɛ kà wa kɔ̧́ ha̧a̧ kóò ha̧ mɛ na, kanamɔ nɛ mɛ kana ha̧‘m'i tɛ yu zu mɛ.›
«Mi hɔɔ sɔsɔɔ sɛn ká̧ gɔna-yì'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko wan kɔ‘m Abraham, mi gɔma er ti'nɛ́; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ naŋanɔ mɛ ba nɛ‘m.
Mi duk sɛn ká̧ gɔna-yì; boko-bem nɛ tɛ gbo mɛ ɗu yì, ɓɛɛ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi aia nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ há̧ ŋma be yì kɔ̧ kpánà kɔ-mɛ ha̧‘m nɔ,»
nɛ tɛ kifi nú ha̧‘m: «Mɛ nɔ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ ko o ŋgeloba kɔ-mɛ mbɛt,» boko-bem’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ kóò nɛ GASA WAN hoka ha̧ bem ko wan kɔ‘m.›
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen na, Rebeka hɔɔ nɛ kpáná-yì kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn zu kóŋgó-ɓaa. Ɓɛɛ a̧ zir si sɛn nú yì ɗu nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: ‹Mɛ̀ há̧ yì ha̧‘m nɔ na nde?›
Nɛ̀ haya-a, a̧ baa kpáná-yì kɔ̧-a̧ e nù, hegɔ a̧ tɔ̧a̧: ‹Mɛ nɔ, mi tɛ ha̧ yì ha̧ o ŋgeloba kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.› Mi nɔɔ yì ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma ha̧ o ŋgeloba kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Mi aka a̧: ‹Mɛ́ nɛ́ boko-bem ko o?› Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: ‹Mi nɛ boko-bem ko Bɛtuɛl, bem nɛ Milka koo ha̧ Nahɔr.› Nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧‘m pi̧i̧ nɛ wele sɛn nú zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ in o káná sɛn er-a.
Ɓɛɛ mi gbɛ zugur-am nù, gu nù ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mi de osoko ha̧ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko wan kɔ‘m Abraham, nɛ usa de yuwar
Ɓɛɛ kinii, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ usi iŋa nam in
Labaŋ in Bɛtuɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ‘i tɛ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN, ɛɛ nyɛm mɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa kóó bɛ̧a̧-a̧ na mbɛt.
Rebeka a̧ duk sɛn ti mɛ'ɛ, mɛ̀ bá a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yak, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ duk kóò ko bem ko wan kɔ-mɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ wi-de-tom ko Abraham zia o wen nɔ‘i, a̧ gbɛɛ zugur-aa nù ti GASA WAN.
A̧ kaia o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in o laa, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ Rebeka in o mɔɔ-dɔka sede ha̧ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ in nya-a̧.
A̧ in o wi nɛ tɛɛ in a̧ nyɔŋa mɔ, wa nɔɔ mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ nù. Mɛ́ tutuyɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ wa kura, wi-de-tom tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yuwar ha̧‘m si tɛ wan kɔ‘m.»
Ɓɛɛ bu̧i̧-nya Rebeka in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧: «Ɔ dee ha̧ Rebeka mɛ́ duk in yɛɛ tikiɗi, kóó zɛ ɓu sɛka a̧ yaka.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ wa: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ zik mɔ ha̧‘m na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, GASA WAN dee ha̧ nɔ̀ mɛ ba nɛ‘m kaɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m yak si tɛ ko wan kɔ‘m.»
O bíí tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ sá be-zɔŋa tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ ák taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.»
Wa saa Rebeka, ɓɛɛ wa ak a̧: «Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ si in wi’ɛ?» Ɓɛɛ Rebeka kifi nú: «Ii, mi kɔ̧a̧.»
Ɓɛɛ wa e yuwar ha̧ boko-nya-wa Rebeka in be-sembaa kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ́ yak in wi-de-tom ko Abraham in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa toka de yoŋgo ha̧ Rebeka tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
«Boko-nya-ɛɛ, mɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ nàà ko o zɔm gíí dukbíí,
o bezaŋ-mɛ a̧ bi o ye ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́!»
Rebeka kura in o kó-de-tom kɔ‘i, wa daŋa zu o ŋgeloba duk ɗoŋ wi’ɛi. Wi-de-tom mgbɔɔ Rebeka ɓɛɛ a̧ yak.
Izak tɛɛ so ŋgimbi yee-wese sɛn nú gɔna-yì ko Lahai-Roi,
Ŋgimbi yee-wese, Izak yara benaŋ si zaŋbɛɛ, a̧ baa yi-a nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk o ŋgeloba fara tɛa-a.
Rebeka baa zu nɛ ŋgɔn, a̧ zɔka Izak, ɓɛɛ a̧ zir zu ŋgeloba.
A̧ aka wi-de-tom ko Abraham: «Wi’ɛ nɛ we ti ɛɛ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ'ɛ nɛ́ o?» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú: «Nɛ́ wan kɔ‘m.» Ɓɛɛ Rebeka ba mɔ kpe nɛ yí.
Wi-de-tom wee ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea ha̧ Izak.
Izak mgbɔɔ Rebeka si kɔ̧ tua-laa oi nàà kɔ‘i Sara. A̧ baa Rebeka nɛ kóò. Izak kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa ga̧a̧-see ɗoŋ fio ko nàà kɔ̧-a̧.
Abraham baa mbe kóò woyo, nin-a nɛ Kɛtura.
Kóò‘i koo Zimram, Yoksaŋ, Mɛdaŋ, Madiaŋ, Yisbak in Sua ha̧ a̧.
Yoksaŋ koo Saba, in Dedaŋ. O bem ko Dedaŋ duka nɛ o be Asur, o be Lɛtus in o be Lɛum.
O bem ko Madiaŋ nɛ́ Efa, Efɛr, Hanɔk, Abida in Elda. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ o bezaŋ Kɛtura.
Abraham ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi lɛŋ ha̧ Izak.
War ko o bem ko o zɔŋa kóò, Abraham ha̧a̧ o mɔ ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ fe na, a̧ foo wa nyɛi̧ nɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Izak, si war nú Kedɛm mɛ.
Pɛ Abraham nɛ duka nɛnɛ zu nù nɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Abraham fea, ɓɛɛ fio kɔ̧ a̧ duka nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ fio ko sɔkawi, nɛ kpaa pɛ nɛ dɔka-a, in nɛ zɔka wese ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
O bem kɔ̧-a̧, Izak in Ismaɛl guna a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ di̧i̧ Makpɛla sɛn ká̧ nú fɔ nɛ duka so nɛ ko Efrɔŋ, bem ko Sɔhar be nù Hit; fara'i zɔk ŋmaa in Mambre,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ nù nɛ Abraham hi̧fa so er o bezaŋ Hɛt: nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wa guna Abraham in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Sara sɛnɛ.
Ɗoŋ fio ko Abraham, Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo ha̧ Izak bem kɔ̧-a̧. Izak dee ye sɛn ká̧ gɔna-yì ko Lahai-Roi.
O bezaŋ Ismaɛl bem ko Agar zɔŋa Egiptɛ, kó-de-tom ko Sara nɛ̀ kòó ha̧ Abraham
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: kaya-bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ Nɛbayot; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ Kedar, Adbeɛl, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Masa,
Hadad, Tema, Yɛtur, Nafis in Kɛdma.
O bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Nin-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ wan kɔ-wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ gbagari kɔ-wa.
Ismaɛl duka zu nù pɛ gɔŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe. A̧ fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
O bezaŋ Ismaɛl dee ye sɛn Hawila hɔ sɛn Sur, ká̧ nú Egiptɛ si war Asur. Wa lɛŋ ɔɔ tan nɛ nya-wa, kà ɓan na ká wa tika zu wa nɛ biro.
Pɛ́r-nam ko Izak, bem ko Abraham nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Ɗoŋ nɛ Abraham koo Izak,
Izak kpaa pɛ ɓu-naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba Rebeka, bem ko Bɛtuɛl, be Aram sɛn bɔkɔ-nu Aram nɛ kóò; Rebeka duka nɛ boko-nya Labaŋ, be Aram.
Izak aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN wen zu kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yar nɛ ndɔra; GASA WAN dee ko ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Rebeka ba zaŋ. Duka nɛ o be-dan.
O bem nɔ‘i too ŋmaa nyɛmna sɛn kɔ̧ zaŋ Rebeka, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Kà mɔ de hegɔ, ɓɛɛ gana so a̧‘m fe.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ mɛ ak mɔ in GASA WAN.
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Kpar dukbíí yiitoo a̧a̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ-mɛ; mɛ tɛ ko giiwi, dùk-aa yiitoo, kpɔk tɛ ŋgai gan ɓii-aa. Kaya-wi tɛ de tom ha̧ be-ɗoŋ.»
Ŋgimbi koa-a hɔa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbai dan.
Tɛ wan nɛ gboo nɛti lɛŋ kpee nɛ bumu, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ hee buma saɗi ga; wa aa nin-a Esau.
Wan nɛ gboo nɛ ɗoŋ kasa dukui-naŋ Esau; wa aa nin-a nɛ Jakob. Izak kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ ŋgimbi koo Esau in Jakob.
O bem nɔ‘i gasa; Esau duka nɛ gasa wi-de-gia nɛ zaŋbɛɛ, Jakob duka kɔ‘i nɛ be-ta-mɔ nɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧ tua-laa.
Izak kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ Esau gan, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so kpoo-zaŋbɛɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ Rebeka kɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ Jakob.
Ŋma wese, Jakob hun nɛ kɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Esau pii nɛ kpɛɛfɔ; a̧ mbɔia nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Jakob: «Mi aia nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɔ ŋma gbɛ̧ yí kɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ'ɛ, wen mi mbɔia nyɛmna.» (Nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i a̧ wa aa nɛ nin-a'e, Edɔm; wen nɛ tɔ̧: «gbɛ̧-mɔ»).
Jakob kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ é‘m nɛ̀ kaya-wi sɔsɔɔ.»
Esau kifa nú: «Zɔk mi a̧‘m tɛ fe’ɛ; duka kaya-bem tɛ gbak am tɛ ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Jakob tɔ̧ woyo: «Mɛ̀ kán mɔ ha̧‘m sɔsɔɔ.» Ɓɛɛ Esau kan mɔ; a̧ ee Jakob nɛ kaya-wi.
Ɓɛɛ Jakob ha̧ brɛt in kɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. A̧ nyɔŋa mɔ, a̧ nɔɔ mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kur yak. Esau baa duka kaya-wi e tɛ geemɔ.
Kaɓa tika nù tɛ ŋgimbi'i, nɛ gana gan wan mɛ tɛ ŋgimbi ko Abraham, ɓɛɛ Izak nɛ sɛn tɛ ko Abimɛlɛk, wannu ko o be Filistii sɛn Gerar.
GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧ a̧ ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ká mɛ zir si Egiptɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dúk tɛ nù n'am tɛ usi ha̧ mɛ‘i.
Mɛ̀ dúk tɛ nù‘i; mi tɛ duk in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi toka de yoŋgo zu mɛ. Mi tɛ ha̧ nù‘i ha̧ mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ kanamɔ n'am kana so ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ Abraham.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk hee sɔra yiwese ga; mi tɛ ha̧ nù‘i lɛŋ ha̧ wa. O tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ kpa de toka yoŋgo nɛ ɗoŋ bezaŋ-mɛ,
wen Abraham zia so wen nú‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ kasi o
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Izak dee ye sɛn Gerar.
O bíí fara'i aka a̧ wen zu kóò kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ wa: «Nɛ́ boko-nya'm», wen kíì dee a̧, kà̧ a̧ tɔ̧ so'e nɛ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ wó, wa tɛɛ gbɛ a̧ wen Rebeka yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
Izak duka hi̧i̧ zɛ dɔk. Ŋma wese Abimɛlɛk wannu ko o be Filistii zɔka mɔ nɛ woi-tua, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk Izak fara de saa in Rebeka kóò kɔ̧-a̧.
Abimɛlɛk saa Izak ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «A̧ nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ nɛ mbetɛ; wen ge sa mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, a̧ nɛ boko-nya-mɛ ge?» Izak kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ wen ká‘m tɛɛ fe wen zu a̧.»
Ɓɛɛ Abimɛlɛk ak mɔ woyo: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ ge mɔ ge a̧ mɛ dee in yɛɛ ge? Ŋmafara kà ŋma bíí saaye’ɛ duk so in kóò kɔ-mɛ, bo nɛ mɛ tɛɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ mɛ tik zu yɛ na?»
Abimɛlɛk ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ‘e: «Wi nɛ tɛ fo wi’ɛ, in kóò kɔ̧-a̧, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧.»
Izak dɛma nyɔnɔ ti pɛ‘i tɛ nù ko o be Filistii nyɛmna. A̧ mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ nɛ dɔka-a war gɔmŋmaa gan mɔ n'aa guna, wen GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu a̧.
A̧ dee mbɔi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nɛ dita-bíí.
A̧ kpaa o sami in o ndai ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ o be Filistii a see mɔ in a̧.
O be Filistii tura nù kpe nɛ zu gɔna-yí-nɔɔ nɛ o wi-de-tom ko Abraham dáà ko Izak za̧a̧ so ŋgimbi nɛ Abraham ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kpasa.
Abimɛlɛk tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Izak: «Mɛ̀ yák nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛɛ, wen mɛ kpaa ŋgai gan zu yɛ kaɗi.»
Izak kura hi̧i̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ de gbagari kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Gerar; a̧ ɔɔ hi̧i̧.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Izak za̧a̧ ɗoŋ o gɔna-yì nɛ‘i za̧a̧ so ŋgimbi ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Abraham, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ o be Filistii kpee ɗoŋ fio kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ kale nin nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ aa so ha̧ o gɔna-yi nɔ‘i, a̧ Izak aa ha̧ wa woyo.
O wi-de-tom ko Izak gɔna yì sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa kpa de kpút-kpút.
O wi-dai-mɔ Gerar tɛɛ ku̧ naŋ kpɛri in o wi-dai-mɔ ko Izak woyo, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Yì'ɛ nɛ́ k’ɛɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Izak a nin gɔna-yì‘i Ezɛk «Kpɛri», wen o be-nù kpɛra in a̧ hi̧i̧.
Wa gɔna mbe kɔ̧-yì, ɓɛɛ kpɛri hɔ sɛnɛ woyo; a̧ aa nin i̧i̧ fara'i Sitna «Sɛnmɔ».
A̧ duka hi̧i̧ yak nɛɛ gɔn nɛ ŋma mbe yì nɛ wa kpɛr in a̧ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin i̧i̧ yi'i Rehobot «Ɛɛ ɔma», tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Kinii, GASA WAN ha̧a̧ fara h’ɛ́ɛ́ wen duka-a k’ɛɛ nɛ de-a tɛ nù'ɛ.»
A̧ duka hi̧i̧ daŋ nɛnɛ si Bɛrseba.
GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ Abraham, ká mɛ́ de kíì na. Mi a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ dɔk wen zu wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Abraham.»
Ɓɛɛ Izak mbo
Abimɛlɛk tɛɛ mɛ zɔk Izak sɛn Gerar. A̧ tɛɛ in Ahuzat wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧ in Pikɔl gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧.
Izak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen ge s’ɛnɛ tɛ sɛn tɛ‘m ge? Bo nɛ ɛnɛ sɛna so'm, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ndak am tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?»
Wa kifa nú-wa: «Ɛ́ɛ́ iŋa'e GASA WAN a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ s’ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, kanamɔ a̧ duk mgbara yɛ in mɛɛ, nɛ tɛ duk nɛ *nɔɔ-tɔk k’ɛɛ in ŋmaa.

Mɛ̀ kán mɔ ndé, mɛ́ beka de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpɔk in yɛɛ na. Ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt, ɛ́ɛ́ beka de ŋgamɔ in mɛɛ na hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ dee kànà nɛ demɔ in mɛɛ e nɛ mɛ yak gee’ɛ ga. Kinii, mɛ́ dúk nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu a̧.»
A̧ dee gasa gbaŋa ha̧ wa; wa nyɔŋa mɔ ɓɛɛ wa nɔ mɔ mbɛt.
Mɛ tutuyɛ sút, wa kana mɔ ha̧ nɛ nú ha̧ ŋmaa. Izak mgbɔɔ wa e yuwar, ɓɛɛ wa e ŋmaa duk zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Duka nɛ wese'i mbɛt a̧ o wi-de-tom ko Izak tɛɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ nde, wi kpaa yì.
A̧ saa nin gɔna-yì‘i Seba «Kanamɔ», nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧ wa sa nɛ nin ye'i Bɛrseba
Ŋgimbi nɛ Esau kpaa nɛ pɛ ɓu-naar, a̧ baa be-zɔŋa Hit yiitoo nɛ kóò. Kuti-a nɛ Yehudit boko-bem ko Bɛri; yiitoo-aa nɛ Basmat boko-bem ko Elɔŋ.
O kóò nɔ‘i ha̧a̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧ for-wa Izak in Rebeka nyɛmna.
Izak sɔka so kaɗi ɓɛɛ yí-a zɔk mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔna. A̧ saa kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ Esau hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bem kɔ‘m!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ baaba!»
Izak tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Mɛ zɔk, mi sɔka kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ wese nɛ fio tɛ ba nɛ‘m na.
Kinii'i, mɛ̀ káí o boi kɔ-mɛ, ɓaro-góò in kusaa kɔ-mɛ, a̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ gia wen gbɛɛ saɗi ha̧‘m.
Mɛ̀ dé nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m hee wan n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, ha̧‘m nyɔŋ, ha̧‘m mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ sɛka'm fea.»
Rebeka duka zii nɛ mɔ nɛ Izak tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Esau, ɓɛɛ Esau yak kɔ‘i zaŋbɛɛ wen gbɛɛ saɗi tɛnɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i.
Rebeka saa bem kɔ‘i Jakob, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi zia wen nɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Esau baka kɔ-mɛ.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧‘e Esau a̧ ba kpoo-zaŋbɛɛ tɛnɛ gi ha'i; kà‘i nɛ nyɔŋa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wi toka de yoŋgo zu a̧ sɛn ti GASA WAN nɛti sɛka'i fea.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ de.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn mgbara o mɔ-dai, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí o be gbadua yiitoo tɛnɛ ha̧‘m gi ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ hee wan n'aa kɔ̧a̧ ga.
Mɛ̀ bá nɛnɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ nyɔŋ, ha̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ nɛti sɛka a̧ tɛɛ fe.»
Jakob tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ nàà kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k baka kɔ‘m Esau a̧a̧ nɛ bumu nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi bo nɛ̀ bumu na.
Ŋmafara dáà kɔ‘m tɛ tam tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka'e mi nɛ wi-ndela; mɔ‘i tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ fom am, bó nɛ́ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tok nɛ de yoŋgo zu'm na.»
Ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Fom kɔ-mɛ a̧ tik nɛ zu'm, bem kɔ‘m! Mɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m a̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kai nɛ o be gbadua tɛnɛ ɓɛɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kur yak nɛ́ɛ̀ kai o be gbadua tɛnɛ ha̧ nàà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ gi nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ hee wan nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Rebeka kaia o de laa ko kaya-bem nɛ ɓɔna kɔ̧ tua a tɛ Jakob be-ɗoŋ.
Rebeka baa ndàrá gbadua gu ɓaa Jakob in gun ger-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba brɛt in nyɔŋmɔ n'aa ɗafa e er bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jakob.
Jakob yee mɔ sitɛ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Baaba!» Izak kɔ̧ɔ̧ sara: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ!» A̧ aka a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ ge bem ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Jakob tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i: «Nɛ mi Esau kaya-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi dee mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ de kaɗi. Mi kɔfi'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk nù, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔɔ-gia kɔ‘m, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'm.»
Izak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jakob: «Ho, bem kɔ‘m; mɛ kpaa mɔ nɛ haya-a gɔ!» Jakob kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ha̧a̧ de sɔnti ha̧‘m.»
Ɓɛɛ Izak tɔ̧ ha̧ Jakob: «Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti ha̧‘m tam tɛ-mɛ bem kɔ‘m, ha̧‘m iŋ nɛ de-a ka nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ kaya-bem kɔ‘m Esau nɛ mbetɛ.»
Hegɔ Jakob ɗɔŋa pii katɛ dáà kɔ‘i Izak nɛ tama tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Tiger nɛ́ tiger Jakob, ɓɛɛ te-er, nɛ́ ko Esau.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ yí-a na, wen te-er Jakob duka nɛ bumu nyɛmna hee te-er baka kɔ̧-a̧ ga. Hegɔ, ɓɛɛ Izak ak a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mɛ́ nɛ́ bem kɔ‘m Esau nɛ mbetɛ?» Ɓɛɛ Jakob kɔ̧ ɗɔaa.
Izak tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Mɛ̀ há̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧‘m nyɔŋ, ha̧‘m nyɔŋ kpoo saɗi ko bem kɔ‘m, ha̧‘m tok de yoŋgo nɛ tɛ‘m.» Jakob baa nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɔŋ. A̧ baa dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Izak tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti a̧ mɛ̀ dúí nú‘m, bem kɔ‘m!»
A̧ ɗɔŋa pii ti, ɓɛɛ a̧ dui nú-a. A̧ kpaa pɛr laa ko bem kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧, a̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«Pɛr-tɛ bem kɔ‘m duk hee pɛr fɔ
nɛ GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu-a ga.
Sɔ̧ a̧ ha̧ mbɛŋ mɛ yiwese ha̧ nù kɔ-mɛ mɛ dɛm nyɔnɔ!
A̧ a̧ ha̧ alkamaari in nyɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a ha̧ mɛ.
O bíí a̧ mbo zu ha̧ mɛ,
o dukbíí a̧ gu nù ti mɛ!
Mɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu o nya-mɛ,
o nya-mɛ a̧ gu nù ti mɛ!
Fom a̧ ba bíí nɛ tɛ fom mɛ,
ɓɛɛ de yoŋgo a̧ duk zu bíí nɛ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ!»
Ɗoŋ nɛ Izak toka de yoŋgo zu Jakob kaɗi, nɛ Jakob ee Izak duk, ɓɛɛ nya-a̧ Esau pii nɛ̀ tɛ gia.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt ba nɛnɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Baaba, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr wen nyɔŋa mɔɔ-gia ko bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'm.»
Dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Izak aka mɔ: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ o?» Esau kifa nú: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi, kaya-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́.»

Ɗɛɗɛ Izak gɔna hɔ tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o a̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ gia ká gi kpoo-zaŋbɛɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m’ɛ o? Mi nyɔŋa mɔ nɛti kaɗi sɛka mɛ biti hɔ. Mi toka de yoŋgo zu wi’ɛi. Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ wi nɛ toka-de-yoŋgo a̧a̧ zu a̧ hegɔ yaknɛ.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ Esau zia tiger wen ko dáà kɔ‘i, a̧ hiɗa mɔ nɛ ŋgaya-a nyɛmna in nɛ tu̧u̧-see, ɓɛɛ a̧ ai nú ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Baaba, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu'm mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Nya-mɛ tɛɛ nɛ̀ gɔn-ta, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba de sɔnti kɔ-mɛ kaɗi.»
Esau aka mɔ woyo: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nin Jakob'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m war yiitoo lɛŋ‘i nde? A̧ baa ŋgai ko kaya-bem yinɛ er-am; zɔk kinii, a̧ pia ɗoŋ tɛɛ ba de yoŋgo kɔ‘m mbɛt!»
Ɓɛɛ Esau ai nú woyo: «Ŋma be yoŋgo h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tok benaŋ zu'm tikiɗi bo na nde?»
Izak kifa nú ha̧ Esau: «Mi ee a̧ nɛ gasawi kɔ-mɛ kaɗi, mi ha̧a̧ o nya-a̧ mɛ ya o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧. Mi ha̧a̧ alkamaari in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ de wen mɛ ɓɔ ge, bem kɔ‘m?»
Esau aka dáà kɔ‘i woyo: «De yoŋgo nɛ kpɔk'i ɓɛɛ, baaba? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu'm mbɛt, dáà kɔ‘m!» Esau hiɗa mɔ ɓɛɛ a̧ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧.
Ɓɛɛ Izak dáà kɔ̧-a̧ kifi nú, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Fara kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ ŋga nù,
mbɛŋ beka duk hi̧i̧ na.
Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ gba-paa kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ tɛ de tom ha̧ nya-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ba zu-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn,
mɛ tɛ gbin kpáŋá kɔ̧-a̧ ger-mɛ yinɛ.»
Esau ee kiri in Jakob wen de sɔnti kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Jakob baa sɛn er dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Esau tɔ̧a̧: «Ɗoŋ fio ko dáà kɔ‘m nyɛi̧ ɓɔna. Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧‘m tɛ gbɛ nɛ nya'm Jakob yinɛ.»
Wa mbaŋa tɛ Rebeka wen mɔ nɛ Esau kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧a̧. Rebeka saa Jakob, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nya kɔ-mɛ Esau kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kifi er gbɛ nɛ mɛ.
Mɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m, bem kɔ‘m; kinii mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ yú mɔ yak si sɛn tɛ nya'm Labaŋ sɛn Haraŋ.
Mɛ́ tɛ duk in a̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ tikiɗi pɛm nɛ ŋgimbi nɛ see baka kɔ-mɛ tɛ ga̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ see nya-mɛ tɛ bi ɗoŋ mɛ wen zu mɔ nɛ mɛ dee in a̧, mi tɛ pi̧ tom sa nɛ mɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ yɔ yiitoo lɛŋ kpɔk kale wese ha̧‘m.»
Rebeka tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Izak: «Duka kpasa ɔ̧ nyɔɔ tɛ‘m ɓɔna wen zu o boko be Hɛt nɔ'ɔ. Kà Jakob á̧ baa ŋma kóò hee o ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ ga, gana so a̧‘m fe.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Izak saa Jakob, tok de yoŋgo zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ ba ŋma boko be Kanaŋ nɛ kóò na.
Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ yák si bɔkɔ-nú Aram sɛn tɛ ko Bɛtuɛl, dáà ko nàà kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba nɛ́ ŋma bem ko Labaŋ nya nàà kɔ-mɛ nɛ kóò.
Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ;
a̧ a̧ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ ko dɔk siti,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ tugun gíí bíí.
A̧ a̧ ha̧ de toka yoŋgo ko Abraham
ha̧ mɛ in ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ,
ha̧ nù nɛ mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ hee gɛnɛ ga,
mɛ zii nɛ mɛ;
wen nɛ́ nù nɛ GASA WAN baa ha̧ so ha̧ Abraham.»
Ɓɛɛ Izak e yuwar ha̧ Jakob mɛ kur yak si sɛn bɔkɔ-nu Aram, si tɛ ko Labaŋ, bem ko Bɛtuɛl, be Aram. Labaŋ nɛ nya Rebeka, naa ko Jakob in Esau.

Esau zɔka'e ndé Izak toka de yoŋgo zu Jakob, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ yaknɛ si sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Aram wen baa kóò, wen ŋgimbi nɛ Izak toka so de yoŋgo zu Jakob, a̧ baa ha̧ so nú ha̧ a̧ nde: «Mɛ beka ba boko be Kanaŋ nɛ kóò na.»
Esau zɔka ndé, Jakob zia wen nú dáà kɔ‘i in naa kɔ‘i, wen n'aa yaka so si bɔkɔ-nú Aram.
Esau zɔka'e ndé o boko be Kanaŋ nyɛm see dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Izak na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kur nɛ sɛn tɛ Ismaɛl, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba kóò sɛn hi̧i̧, e zu o wan nɛ duka so er-a nɛti. A̧ baa nɛ Mahalat, bem ko Ismaɛl, bem ko Abraham. Mahalat duka nɛ boko-nya Nɛbayot.
Jakob kura Bɛrseba wen yaka-a si nú Haraŋ.
A̧ hɔɔ ŋma fara hegɔ n'aa iŋ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ hi̧i̧ wen wese yee so kaɗi. A̧ baa ŋma ta sɛn mbɔɗɔnu fara'i ɛk nɛ zu-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ ya hi̧i̧.
A̧ ɔɔ zu fara n'aa zɔk sara-daŋ-mɔ zu nù hegɔɔ hɔ yiwese mɛ, ɓɛɛ o betom ko Sɔ̧ daŋ nɛnɛ in zir nɛnɛ mbɛt.
A̧ zɔka GASA WAN nɛ yor sɛn ti a̧ tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧ a̧‘e: «Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko Abraham, zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ, mi nɛ Sɔ̧ ko Izak; fara nɛ mɛ ɔ nù sɛnɛ kinii'i’ɛ, mi ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ mbɛt.
O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ ko dɔk hee fuunu ga, ɛnɛ tɛ dɔk si yee-wese, si daŋa-wese, si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí zu nù lɛŋ tɛ kpa de toka yoŋgo nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ.
Mi a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ mɛ hɔ fara lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ hɔ, mi tɛ ba mɛ piinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn tɛ nù'ɛ. Mi beka e mɛ duk na hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ.»
