«Ɓɛɛ nu tua zala tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar. Zɔ̧ laa-kpe-nú-a tɛ duk nɛ tu̧ laa, gbɛ̧ laa, gbɛ̧ laa zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛm-yɛm laa nɛ wi-tok-laa dee tom-aa, o mbiŋ-a tɛ ya naar, in gun-aa naar.
O mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-mbɔi tɛ mɔi̧ o mbiŋ lɛŋ e nu ŋmaa. O boi-kɔk-mɔ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ o gun-aa tɛ duk nɛ́ ndɛrɛ.

Zi̧a̧ nú-zala tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta. O zɔ̧-laa kpe-nú-a lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m toka-zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ o gun-aa tɛ duk nɛ́ ndɛrɛ.
O nyɛk-de-tom in o te-mgboi-tua e nu tɛ duk nɛ ndɛrɛ.»
«Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ e wee tɛ lamba sɛn kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa ti babir-laa nɛ kpe Kuɓa
«Moisɛ, mɛ̀ sá nya-mɛ Arɔŋ, in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, in Itamar, mgbara o be
Mɛ tɛ fur o laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ nya-mɛ Arɔŋ wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ tu̧ tɛ-a in mɛ yu a̧.
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-fur-laa n'am ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ wa, mɛ fur fura laa ko Arɔŋ, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk wen dee tom-ɗaf'am.
O laa nɛ wa tɛ fur'i nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: de toka laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi, de gasa laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod,
Wa tɛ de tom o laa nɔ‘i nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ laa zóŋ-zóŋ, in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
«Wa tɛ dè dé gasa laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod'i nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ laa zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa. Tom'i nɛ tom ko o wi-iŋ-toka-laa.
Wa tɛ fur nyak kasa a̧ yiitoo e nú-a.
Kanda-a tɛ duk nɛ kpɔk kale tom nɛ wa dee tɛ laa'i. Wa tɛ de nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Mɛ tɛ kai de toka ta kɛn-kɛn yiitoo, ɓɛɛ mɛ yɔra nin o bem ko
Mɛ̀ yɔ́r nin ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk’ɛ tɛ kuti ta, ɓɛɛ mɛ yɔra nin oi-aa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ yiitoo ta nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar kóó wa.
Mɛ̀ yɔ́r nin o bem ko
Mɛ̀ á o ta nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ nyak Efod wen usa o be
Mɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧ be lɔr de nɛ fara-kasi o ta nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé o be ɓaɓa nyak-lɔr yiitoo ga̧i̧ sɛnɛ.»
«Mɛ̀ fúr laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i fura nɛ Efod ga, wen tani. Mɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ lɔr in nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛm-yɛm zɔ̧-laa.
Wi tɛ goi a si zu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ dɔ̧-er.
Mɛ̀ ɗáfí fara a o be toka-ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, tɛ fara naar. Mɛ̀ á o ta-kui nɛ‘i sa'e sardɔan, ta nɛ yi-a ɔ tara nɛ‘i sa'e topaz in tu̧ ta mít-mít nɛ‘i sa'e emerod tɛ kuti nɛka-a.
Yiitoo nɛka-a tɛ duk nɛ gbɛ̧ ta yúŋú-yúŋú nɛ‘i sa'e ɛskarbuklɛ, tu̧ ta hee gba̧a̧-yí-zan ga nɛ‘i sa'e safir in toka ta nɛ‘i sa'e jaspɛ.
Tɛ taar nɛka-a, mɛ tɛ a nɛ ŋga ta nɛ‘i sa'e agat, gbɛ̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e kɔrnalin in ta nɛ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i sa'e ametist;
ɓɛɛ naar nɛka-a, mɛ̀ á nɛ mbui ta nɛ‘i sa'e krizolit, toka ta kɛn-kɛn nɛ‘i sa'e beril in tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e oniks. Mɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧ lɔr a wa sɛnɛ.
Nin o bem ko
Mɛ̀ ɓáɓí o be geɗek nyak-lɔr wen aa zu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
Mɛ̀ dé o kana yiitoo nɛ lɔr, ɓɛɛ mɛ à wá nu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ ŋgɔn.
Mɛ̀ kún nyak-lɔr yiitoo'i tɛ o kana yiitoo nɛ ya nu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kún o ɓii nu ɓaɓa nyak-lɔr nɔ‘i tɛ o mɔɔ-kasi-ta nɛ ya tɛ Efod nɛ war ti.
Mɛ̀ dúí mbe kana lɔr yiitoo, nɛ‘i tɛ ga̧i̧ nu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war fara nɛ ndaɗa ŋmaa in Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Mɛ̀ dúí káná lɔr yiitoo woyo, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gá̧í̧ tɛ ɓaa Efod nɛ war ɗɔɔ, nyɛm nɛ fara hɛra-a sɛn zu kanda Efod'i.
Mɛ̀ kún laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ o kana-a tɛ o kana Efod nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa ha̧ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi mɛ duk zu kanda Efod wen ká a̧ tɛɛ yu zu-a.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ Arɔŋ tɛ ye fara-gɔn-kita, a̧ tɛ pi̧ nɛ laa-kpe-tɛ nɛ‘i gɔna nin o bem ko
Mɛ tɛ a Urim in Tumim
«Mɛ tɛ fur gasa laa nɛ‘i tɛ pi̧ Efod zu-a'i nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa.
Mɛ̀ gɔ́n ger laa ha̧ duk tan see-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tók nú-a nɛ garaazi ha̧ duk nɛ ndota-a, wen ká tɛɛ a̧k.
Mɛ tɛ fur o ŋma be mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o be tu̧ waya kóɓò zik nɛ naŋ-a kpa lɛŋ nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa in nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, záŋ nɛ ŋmaa in o be mana nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr.
O fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o be tu̧ waya kóɓò, ká bá nɛ̀ o be mana nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr tɛ ya ŋgam ŋmaa zik ká̧ naŋ laa'i.
Arɔŋ tɛ pi̧ laa'i ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧. Wi tɛ zii giti mana ŋgimbi yea-a si
«Mɛ̀ dúí sa̧a̧ lɔr hɔ ŋmaa in do-te, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ zu a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i yɔr nɛ mɔ tɛ tumbal’ɛ ga: ‹Mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ wen GASA WAN.›
Mɛ tɛ kun lɔr'i zu zɔ̧-laa nɛ tu̧ nyak e tɛ mɛtɛwol nɛ war sɔnti.
Arɔŋ tɛ hɛr mɔ‘i e sɔnti wen zu o yɔɔ-kaya ko o be
«Mɛ tɛ tok gɔna be laa in mɛtɛwol nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa; mɛ tɛ tok kanda mbɛt. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ tom ko wi-iŋa-a.
«Mɛ̀ fúr o gɔna be laa, o kanda in o mɔɔ-hɛr-zu ha̧ o bem ko Arɔŋ ha̧ o bíí mɛ tu̧ tɛ-wa in mɛ yu wa.
Mɛ tɛ pi̧ o laa nɔ‘i tɛ nya-mɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ tɛ tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu-wa e nɛ wa nɛtɛ, mɛ tɛ e tom er-wa wen ɗafa'm.
Mɛ tɛ fur o laa-mɛ-ɗɔɔ ha̧ wa mɛ pi̧ wen ká'í tɛɛ zɔk zim-tɛ-wa. O laa nɔ‘i mɛ ɗɔɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa nɛ tɛ ba wa guntir-wa hɔ ku-wa.
Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ pi̧ o laa nɔ‘i ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ye kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, kóó ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ye si
«Do-mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ duk wi-ɗaf'am nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ̀ bá daŋa wiwii-ndai in vala-sami yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-wa na,
in o
Mɛ̀ káí wa lɛŋ a kɔ̧ gɛsɛ ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ há̧ wa ha̧‘m ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ daŋa wiwii-ndai in o vala-sami yiitoo.
«Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i nɛnɛ si nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zúí wa.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, mɛ̀ káí o laa á̧ mɛ̀ á tɛ Arɔŋ, mɛ̀ pí̧ be gɔna laa nɛti, sɛka ɗuka gasa laa zu a̧, in laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod, ba nɛ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ màrá kanda gasa laa sɛnɛ.
Mɛ tɛ hɛr mɛtɛwol zu a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ baa mɔ nɛ‘i yɔra'e, nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, gu sɛnɛ.
Sɛka mɛ baa nɔ̧́-wan tɛn a zu a̧.
«Mɛ̀ sá o bem ko Arɔŋ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ á o be gɔna laa tɛ-wa.

Mɛ̀ hɛ́r kanda ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ hɛ́r zu o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-hɛr-zu. Tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ heembea nɛ‘i beka gbin na, nɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo. Nɛ́ hegɔ‘i a̧ mɛ tɛ e nɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i ha̧ Sɔ̧.
«Mɛ tɛ ba daŋa wiwii-ndai'i e nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i aa er zu a̧.
Mɛ tɛ gɔn daŋa wiwii ndai'i ti GASA WAN mgbák nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa.
Mɛ tɛ di̧ tɔk-aa nɛ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ zak nɛ duk fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gbáí oi tɔk-aa a gun
Mɛ̀ káí nɔ̧́ nɛ yuɓuri zu nyak-zaŋ-aa in o wan mɛ ɗoŋ see-aa, o gbaazaa yiitoo nɛ oi nɔ̧́ ɗoŋ wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ dɔ̀ɔ́ sɛn
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko kpoo daŋa wiwii-ndai'i, in ndàrá-a, ká bá nɛ̀ ɗɔr-aa, mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ dɔ́ ɗoŋ ye mɛ, wen i̧i̧ nɛ kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ.
«Mɛ tɛ ba kuti vala-sami mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i aa er-wa zu a̧;
mɛ tɛ gɔn vala-sami'i, ɓɛɛ mɛ misa̧ tɔk-aa zik nɛ
Mɛ tɛ gba vala-sami'i tɛ fara naar; mɛ̀ fɔ́r zaŋ-aa, in o mbayo-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ á zu wan nɛ‘i gbaa, in zu-a.
Mɛ̀ dɔ́ kpoo sami'i lɛŋ zu
«Mɛ tɛ ba yiitoo vala-sami'i, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i aa er-wa zu-a.
Mɛ tɛ gɔn vala-sami'i; mɛ tɛ duɓi tɔk-aa e ndɔŋ nu zer Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i nɛ war wii-er; mɛ tɛ e tɔk'i tɛ gbogoto-er in gbogoto-naŋ-wa nɛ war wii-er mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ misa̧ oi tɔk'i zik
Mɛ tɛ ɗu tɔk nɛ duk zu
«Mɛ̀ káí mɔ nɛ nɔ̧́ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ tɛ vala-sami'i, dom-aa, nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ-aa, nɔ̧́ see-aa, o gbaazaa-a yiitoo in nɔ̧́-a̧, in ku-a mɛ wiiko, wen vala-sami'i usi'e tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ a̧a̧ er-wa.
Mɛ̀ bá brɛt alkamaari in makala kpɔk nɛ‘i ha̧na nɛ nɔ̧́, in be geɗek makala kpɔk kɔ̧ gɛsɛ nɛ duk ti GASA WAN.
Mɛ̀ é mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ er Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yɛ́k nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ti GASA WAN.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, mɛ̀ káí mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yinɛ er Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dɔ́ zu
«Mɛ̀ bá tote vala-sami ee-tom-er-wi, war ko Arɔŋ‘i, a̧ mɛ̀ yɛ́k ti GASA WAN; i̧i̧ tɛ duk nɛ war kɔ-mɛ.
«Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e nde, tote vala-sami ko Arɔŋ in o bem, in ku-a nɛ‘i kaia a nɛtɛ, ka'i yɛk ha̧ GASA WAN, nɛ́ sa̧a̧ kpoo.
Mɔ‘i nɛ ŋma heembea nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ. War mɔ nɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ kpa er o be
«Kà Arɔŋ bo na, wa tɛ kai laa kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ a, wen tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu wa, wen dee tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧.
Bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ tɛ ba tom oi-aa wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, kɔ̧
«Mɛ tɛ ba kpoo sami wen ee tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ er-wi, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ gìí kpoo-aa tɛ ŋmaa sa̧a̧ fara.
Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo sami in brɛt nɛ wa aa kɔ̧ gɛsɛ sɛn nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa.
Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ wa ɗafa nɛ war-tɛ-wa, ŋgimbi nɛ wa ee nɛ tom ɗafa-sɔ̧ er-wa, e nɛ wa ha̧ Sɔ̧. Bíí nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ na beka nyɔŋ na, wen mɔ‘i nɛ sa̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ.
Kà oi kpoo in brɛt ɔ mɔ sa̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbáí oi-aa a tɛ wee. Bíí beka nyɔŋ oi-aa na, wén nɛ sa̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ.
«Mɛ̀ dé mɔ‘i ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ n'am usa ha̧ mɛ ga. Mɛ tɛ de mɔ‘i hegɔɔ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen ee tom er-wa.
Wese kpɔk kpɔk, mɛ̀ gbɛ́ wiwii-ndai ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen dee do-mɔ nɛ usi kpaa-ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Hegɔ‘i, mɛ tɛ de do kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu
Tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, mɛ tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu
«Kpoo nɛ mɛ tɛ dɔ sɛn
Mɛ tɛ dɔ kpoo kuti sami'i mɛ tutuyɛ, ɓii-aa mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Mɛ tɛ ha̧ kpoo kuti be-sami'i in kilo fuu alkamaari naar nɛ‘i vata nɛ mbe nɔ̧́, litrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta, in zu-dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ litrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ yiitoo be-sami'i, mɛ dɔ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧ o kpɔk ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ mɛ ha̧a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ, in zu-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. Mɔ‘i nɛ de pɛr dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Yuwar
Mi tɛ kpa o be
Mi tɛ de ha̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa in ha̧
Mi tɛ duk mgbara o be
Wa tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ mgbɔɔ so wa gbonɛ nu Egiptɛ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.»
«Mɛ̀ ɗáfí fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama; mɛ̀ ɗáfí fara'i nɛ te akasia.
Dura-a in pɛsa-a tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk; o zak mɛ mgbii-aa tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in a̧ kpɔk.
Mɛ tɛ lati sa̧a̧ lɔr zik kpa nú-a in o zak sɛnɛ mbɛt lɛŋ.
Mɛ tɛ dui kana-lɔr mɛ́ à ka̧ nú-a yiitoo wen pi̧i̧ te sɛnɛ gɔ nɛnɛ.
Mɛ tɛ de te-gɔ-nɛnɛ‘i nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ mɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ wa.
Mɛ̀ bá fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama e ti babir-laa nɛ gɔna ti kuɓa
Arɔŋ tɛ dɔ fuu-nyama sɛnɛ mɛ tutuyɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ ɗafi o lamba.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ a o lamba mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, a̧ tɛ dɔ fuu-nyama woyo. Ha̧a̧mɔ dɔɔ-fuu-nyama'i tɛ duk mgbara o be
K’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔ ŋma fuu-nyama nɛtɛ zu a̧ na, kóó dɔɔ ŋma kpoo saɗi zu a̧ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ mɔ zu a̧, kóó tɛna dɔ̧ɔ̧ zu a̧ na mbɛt.
War kpɔk tɛ pɛ kpɔk, Arɔŋ tɛ de do kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu zak
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔr o be
Kóó o nde nɛ mɛ yɔra, a̧ ha̧ reeta kɔya-sede wan mɛ
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra, bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, kóó gana mbɛt, tɛ yoɓi kana sede'i ha̧ GASA WAN.
Garama ko o wanmbɔi in ko o wisan nɛ wa tɛ gbo ha̧ GASA WAN wen gɔna zu wa nɛ tɛ-wa beka yak ŋmaa na.
Sede gɔna-zu-bíí nɛ mɛ tɛ ba er o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧ ndɛrɛ ɓu nɛ kpánà in dek-a wen fɔra tɛ. Mɛ̀ bá a̧ e mgbara tua-kpa-ŋmaa in
wen ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i mɛ ɗu yì‘i wen taia-a nɛ er in fɔra-a nɛ naŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ye tua-kpa-ŋmaa kóó nɛa-a si
Wa a̧ tai er-wa in fɔr naŋ-wa nɛti sɛ, wen ká wa tɛɛ fe. Mɔ‘i nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk wen Arɔŋ in o bezaŋ-aa kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:

«Mɛ̀ hí̧fí o de pɛr nyama. Mɛ̀ hí̧fí yí-nyama nɛ‘i sa'e mir tɛ kilo mɔɔrɔ, in fuu-nyama nɛ‘i sa'e sinamɔn nɛ pɛr-aa nun nɛ de-a tɛ kilo yiitoo nɛ reeta, in de pɛr saɗa-te nɛ‘i sa'e kanɛl tɛ kilo yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Mɛ̀ hí̧fí nyama nɛ‘i sa'e kasɛ tɛ kilo mɔɔrɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ kilo wan mɛ
Mɛ tɛ mɔi̧ wa wen dea-a nɛ sa̧a̧ nɔ̧́-wan. Wi nɛ iŋa kpa̧i̧a̧ nɔ̧́ a̧ tɛ de mɔ‘i; nɔ̧́-nyama'i tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧ nɔ̧́-wan.
Mɛ̀ sɔ̧́ nɔ̧́‘i tɛ tua-kpa-ŋmaa in tɛ kuɓa
tɛ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ, ká bá nɛ̀ o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, in
fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, in kpáná-ndɛrɛ in dek-a mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ é wa nɛtɛ ha̧ GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ fo tɛ-wa lɛŋ tɛ sa̧.
Mɛ tɛ tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛtɛ wen dee tom ɗaf'am.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
wi beka sɔ̧ nɔ̧́‘i tɛ bíí nɛ nú-tum na, wi beka de ŋma pɛrti nɔ̧́‘i na mbɛt; nɔ̧́‘i duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Kóó o nde nɛ tɛ we dee pɛrti nɔ̧́‘i, kóó sɔ̧a̧-a̧ tɛ gee bíí, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ na, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.› »
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ bá o de pɛr nɔ̧́ nɛ‘i sa'e stɔrak, oniks, galbanum in o nyama nɛ pɛr-aa nun nɛ de-a ha̧ dɔka-a mɛ nyɛm ŋmaa.
Wi-de-nɔ̧́-nyama tɛ zaŋ wa nɛ ŋmaa in tɔŋ ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ de-a in nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Mɛ̀ tó be ŋma nɛ fuu-aa, mɛ̀ á̧ ti kuɓa
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma nɔ̧́-nyama mɛ sɔ̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ hee i̧i̧ ga na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ‘e nɔ̧́-nyama'i duk nɛtɛ wen GASA WAN ɓɛɛ.
Bíí nɛ tɛ ɗafi pɛrti nɔ̧́-nyama'i wen nuna pɛr-aa gee, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mi hoka Besalɛl, bem ko Urii, be-koo Hur tɛ zuduk ko Juda.
Mi ha̧a̧
Hegɔ, a̧ tɛ nyɛm iŋa mgbara duia mɔ nɛ lɔr, bu-mbɔi in ndɛrɛ;
a̧ tɛ iŋ mgbara sɛka o de ta nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya in sɛka te, in dee o tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Mi ha̧a̧ Oholiab, bem ko Ahisamak, be zuduk ko Dan ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbak a̧, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'am usa ha̧ mɛ mɛ de.
O mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ: tua-kpa-ŋmaa, kuɓa
taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ,
fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, kpáná-ndɛrɛ in dek-a,
o laa tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, laa nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Arɔŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o laa nɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ pi̧ wen dee tom-ɗafa'm,
nɔ̧́-wan in de pɛr nɔ̧́-nyama wen dɔa-a kɔ̧ sa̧a̧-fara-laa. Wa tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ de-a wen a̧ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ wen'nɛ́. Bíí nɛ gbin heembea wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ a̧ yinɛ; bíí nɛ de tom wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa tɛ duk nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ GASA WAN. Wi tɛ gbɛ kóó o nde nɛ de tom wese-ɔm-tɛ yinɛ.
O bem ko
Wese-ɔm-tɛ tɛ duk mgbara'm in o be
GASA WAN kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in Moisɛ sɛn zu kaya Sinai, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ta-heembea yiitoo n'aa yɔra mɔ sɛnɛ nɛ er-a ha̧ Moisɛ.

O bíí zɔka'e Moisɛ zir nɛ zu kaya nɛ haya-a na, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa mɔi̧a sitɛ Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ yak ti h’ɛ́ɛ́, wen ɛɛ iŋ k’ɛɛ mɔ nɛ kpaa Moisɛ nɛ mgbɔɔ so ɛɛ gbonɛ nɛ Egiptɛ na.»
Arɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o mɔɔ-zer ko o kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ wiwii in okoo-a nɛ wa dee nɛ lɔr tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.»
Dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ kaia o mɔɔ-zer nɛ a̧a̧ zer-wa tɛnɛ ha̧ Arɔŋ.
A̧ mɔi̧a mɔɔ nɔ‘i er-wa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ̧́í̧ dui nɛ be ndai. Ɓɛɛ wa gai mɔ: «
Arɔŋ zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ de
Mɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ kpoo ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ mbɛt; o bíí yaa nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ, sɛka wa biti kur mɛ de saa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ zír bee, wen o bíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ mgbɔɔ so gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ yɔɔ kɔya-tɛ-wa kaɗi.
Wa a̧ra̧ yuwar n'am usa so ha̧ wa mɛ ba'i! Wa duia be ndai nɛ lɔr, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa gbɛɛ zugur-wa nu ti a̧ gasi nɛ a̧. Wa dɔɔ kpoo ɗafi nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧‘e: ‹
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mi zɔka'e o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ŋgazu.
Kinii, ká mɛ́ tɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ wen na; mɛ̀ é‘m ha̧ nyimsea kɔ‘m kur in wa; mi tɛ kum wa a nu gbuɗuk! Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war kɔ-mɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ gasa dukbíí mɛ gbo nɛ tɛ-mɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ ga̧a̧ see GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN, nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kur zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ mgbɔɔ so gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ zaŋ ŋgayamɔ in ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen ge?

Bo nɛ o be Egiptɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, ɛnɛ mgbɔɔ wa gbonɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ gɔn-ta, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɔr wa si zu kaya mɛ kum wa yinɛ zu nu’ɛ na nde? K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in
Nɛ́ wen'i a̧ dee ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ kaɗi dee ŋgamɔ in o bíí kɔ‘i.
Moisɛ zira zu kaya mɛ si ɗoŋ sitɛ o bíí kɔ‘i, nɛ o sɛka-ta-heembea yiitoo er-a, nɛ o yɔramɔ a̧a̧ zu wa nɛ mgbɔɔr in nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
O sɛka-ta nɔ‘i, nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ dea; o yɔramɔ nɔ‘i, nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ yɔra.
Josue zia hiɗamɔ nɛ o bíí hiɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Hiɗimɔ-biro a̧ de mɔ kɔ̧ gbagari k’ɛɛ‘i!»
Moisɛ kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Bo nɛ giti gima gbina-biro na, bo nɛ
Nɛ̀ Moisɛ hɛɗa kɔ̧ gbagari, a̧ zɔka mboo be ndai in yɔyɛ nɛ o bíí yɔ. See Moisɛ nyima, ɓɛɛ siŋ o sɛka-ta-heembea nɔ‘i a nu gba ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ sɛn ká̧ naŋ kaya'i.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa mboo be ndai'i nɛ wa dea'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ, hɔ̧n fuu-aa a ɗɔɔ yì ha̧ o be
Moisɛ aka Arɔŋ: «O wi nɔ'ɔ dee nɛ ge in mɛɛ, sa mɛ fo gasa ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ pi̧ zu wa ge?»
Arɔŋ kifa nú: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpa tu̧u̧-see na, wen ɛnɛ iŋa, ɓan na, o wi nɔ'ɔ dee ɗaŋmɔ kaɗi.
Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛɛ ak am nde, a̧‘m de ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ yak ti ha'i wen wi iŋ mɔ nɛ kpaa ɛ̧ɛ̧ Moisɛ'ɛ, wi nɛ mgbɔɔ wi gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ mi ak wa woyo'e, lɔr a̧a̧ er o nde? Nɛ̀ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ o mɔɔ-zer-wa lɛŋ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi kai kɔ‘m a tɛ wee, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ be ndai’ɛ gboo nɛnɛ'ɛ.»
Moisɛ zɔka'e, Arɔŋ ee o bíí ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ nɛ see-wa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ya nɛ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
Moisɛ yora nu gbagari, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «O bíí ko GASA WAN a̧ tɛ pii tɛ‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧,» ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ Levii lɛŋ mɔi̧ pii katɛ a̧.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O be Levii dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Moisɛ; o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é tɛ‘nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN, kóó ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ nɛ bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó nya'nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́.»
Mɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «Ɛnɛ dee gasa ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna! Ɓɛɛ kinii, mi tɛ daŋ sitɛ GASA WAN; ŋmafara mi tɛ kii ha̧ a̧ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Moisɛ daŋa si ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «O wi nɔ'ɔ dee gasa ɗaŋmɔ, wen wa mboo ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ lɔr.
Mi gɔma er h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ bi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa yinɛ; kà bó hegɔ na, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí nin-am yinɛ zaŋ kalata n’ɛnɛ yɔra.»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ Moisɛ: «Nɛ́ bíí nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ in am'i a̧‘m tɛ bi nin-a yinɛ zaŋ kalata kɔ‘m.
Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ kinii, mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ o bíí si fara n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i; betom kɔ‘m tɛ yak ti ha̧ mɛ; ɓɛɛ wese n'am tɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o be
GASA WAN usa bɔnɛ ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ kúr fara’ɛ in o bíí nɛ mɛ mgbɔɔ so gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák sitɛ nu n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Abraham, Izak in Jakob kan nɛ mɔ‘e, mi tɛ ha̧ nu'i ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa.
Mi tɛ tom betom kɔ‘m yak ti ha̧ mɛ, mi tɛ ndak o be Kanaŋ, o be Amɔr, o be Hit, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus yinɛ;
hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ sitɛ nu nɛ yibere in nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ. War kɔ‘m, mi beka nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na, wen ɛnɛ nɛ o wi-ŋgazu, wen ká‘m tɛɛ kum'nɛ́ gbuɗuk a nu nɛ yuwar.»
O zuduk bíí zia ŋga wen'i, ɓɛɛ wa zim mɔ; ŋma bíí a mbɔi tɛ na.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o bem ko
Ɓɛɛ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ yak sitɛ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ kura yor nu tua kɔ-wa, mbaɗi nɛ ɗoŋ-aa hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ye nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ ye tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ tura-zan zira duk nu a̧; nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ wen in Moisɛ.
O bíí lɛŋ zɔka tura-zan nɛ zira duk zu nu Sa̧a̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa nu nú tua kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in Moisɛ gbaayí nɛ gbaayí hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí tɔ̧ nɛ nyɛrɛ in sɛm kɔ‘i’ɛ ga. Moisɛ sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi-gbak-a, ŋma be ŋgaiwi, Josue, bem ko Nun, duk kɔ‘i ɓɔn kɔ̧
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ mgbɔ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ daŋnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ usi bíí nɛ tɛ duk in am na wen ge? Ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so'e, wi iŋa'm nɛ nin-am, ɓɛɛ mi dee tɛ-wi batɛ.
Kà deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ mbetɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́; hegɔ‘i, mi tɛ iŋ‘nɛ́ kà dé ká‘m dee tɛ‘nɛ́ siti. Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, o bíí nɔ'ɔ nɛ zuduk bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
GASA WAN kifa nú: «Mi tɛ nɛ nɛ tɛ‘m ha̧‘m mɛ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ mɛ nde?»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yak fara’ɛ na.

Wen mɔ nɛ tɛ usi ha̧‘m in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, ɛɛ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ ge? Bo nɛ nɛa-a n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ in yɛɛ kpɔk'i na nde? Hegɔ‘i, mi in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ ya k’ɛɛ nɛtɛ mgbara o oi dukbíí nɛ ya zu nu’ɛ na nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mi tɛ de mɔ nɛ mɛ aka er-am'i, wen mɛ dee tɛ‘m, in wen mi iŋa nin-mɛ mbɛt.»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́!»
GASA WAN kifa nú: «Mi tɛ de ha̧ o demɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ mɛ ɓir sɛn ti mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi saa nin GASA WAN ti mɛ mbɛt. Mi de demɔ ha̧ wi n'am kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mi dee ko ha̧ wi n'am kɔ̧a̧ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Mɛ beka zɔk saŋa-yí‘m na, wen bíí beka zɔk yí‘m ɓɛɛ duka kpasa na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ zɔ́k fara ka̧tɛ‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧. Mɛ̀ dúk zu ta.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ gasamɔ kɔ‘m tɛ ɓir yak, mi tɛ e mɛ mgbara ta’ɛ, ɓɛɛ mi guu er-am yí-mɛ ŋgimbi yaka-a kɔ‘m.
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ ba er-am yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ-am ɓɛɛ; nɛ war ko saŋa-yí‘m, wi nyɛm mɛ zɔk na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ sɛ́k o ŋma ta yiitoo hee kuti-a ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dáŋ pii tɛ‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen ha̧‘m mɛ yɔr gba̧a̧-wen nɛ duka zu kuti-a, nɛ mɛ mbaŋa a nu'i sɛnɛ.
Mɛ̀ ɗáfí mɔ, wen mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ, mɛ tɛ daŋ zu kaya Sinai, ɓɛɛ mɛ pɛma'm hi̧i̧, mgbák zu-a'i.
Ká ŋma bíí daŋ in mɛɛ na; ká bíí nɛ si zu kaya'i na mbɛt. Kóó o gasa mɔ-dai in geɗek-a mbɛt beka nyɔŋ mbɔɗi zɔ̧ ká̧ kaya'i na.»
Moisɛ sɛka pɛsa ta yiitoo hee kuti-a ga, ɓɛɛ kai wa daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya'i tɛ gɔna ndaa-zan hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.
GASA WAN zira nɛ tura-zan duk in a̧, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN sa nin wi: «GASA WAN.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN ɓir yi-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Mi nɛ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ nɛ de demɔ in nɛ de ko. Mi de nyimsea nɛ haya-a na; mi yor ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m yor, o
Mi kasi
Soɓee, Moisɛ gbɛɛ zugur nu ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ gasi a̧,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN, kà‘m nɛ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ mbetɛ, mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ in yɛɛ. Dukbíí'ɛ nɛ o wi-ŋgazu; ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yɔɔ-kaya in ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in o be
Mɛ̀ kásí wen n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ sɔsɔɔ'ɛ. Mi tɛ ndak o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, o be Hit, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus yinɛ ti mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ nɔ tɔk in o bíí tɛ nu nɛ mɛ daŋ si sɛnɛ‘i na, wen mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ pɛr nɛ tɛ ba mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín
«Ká mɛ́ gu nu ti ŋma sɔ̧ na; wen nin GASA WAN nɛ ‹Wi-de-gɔya›, a̧ nɛ Sɔ̧-de-gɔya.
Ká mɛ́ nɔ tɔk in o be nu'i na, wen ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ gasi nɛ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa'i, ŋmafara wa tɛ sa mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nyɔŋa kpoo nɛ wa ɗafa nɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
Kà mɛ̀ ba o boko-bem kɔ-wa nɛ kóò ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ okoo nɔ‘i tɛ wor sɔ̧ kɔ‘i ga, ŋmafara wa tɛ kii ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ wor nɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i mbɛt.
«Ká mɛ́ dui o ŋma mɔ de nɛ o ŋma sɔ̧ na.
«Mɛ̀ kásí wese gbaŋa
«O kaya-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ kɔ‘m; kaya mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ gasa-a kóó geɗek-a nɛ́ kɔ‘m.
Mɛ̀ gɔ́n zu kuti be tuifuu nɛ sami; kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ gɔna zu a̧ na, mɛ̀ gbín ger-a. Mɛ tɛ gɔn zu o kaya-bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ. Mɛ beka tɛ tɛ‘m nɛ gee er-mɛ na.
«Mɛ̀ dé tom tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɔ́m tɛ-mɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, kóó nɛ ŋgimbi waa fɔ, kóó nɛ ŋgimbi mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ mbɛt.
«Mɛ̀ dé gbaŋa-zu-nyɔnɔ tɛ mɔi̧a kuti nyɔnɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ dee gbaŋa-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ tɛ kaɗa pɛ.
«Tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk, o wiwii lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ war taar ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o be
Mi tɛ ndak o ŋma tugun bíí yinɛ ti mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi dee ha̧ nu'i mɛ gasi siti, nɛ ŋma bíí beka a see nu kɔ-mɛ na; hegɔ‘i, mɛ tɛ nɛ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ war taar zaŋ pɛ kpɔk.
«Kà mɛ̀ ɗaf'am nɛ kpoo, ká mɛ́ ba brɛt nɛ hao a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ɗafi nɛnɛ na. Mɛ beka e oi nyɔŋmɔ
«Mɛ̀ bá kuti de zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ gi be gbadua nɛ yibere naa kɔ̧-a̧ na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ yɔ́r wen nɔ'ɔ, wen mɔ‘i duk nɛ gun
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ duk hi̧i̧ zɛ ɓu-naar in GASA WAN; a̧ nyɔŋ mɔ na, a̧ nɔ yi na mbɛt. Nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ a̧ yɔra nɛ wen
Ŋgimbi zira-a ko Moisɛ nɛ zu kaya Sinai, a̧ kaia o sɛka-ta-heembea yiitoo er-a zir nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ‘e sɔnti-a tok tok wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in GASA WAN na.
Arɔŋ in o be
Moisɛ saa wa, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o gasawi nú-gara lɛŋ tɛɛ pii tɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ wen ha̧ wa.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, o be
Moisɛ wee ɗoŋ wen ha̧ wa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpe ŋma laa nɛ yí-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ yee tua mɛ nɛɛ tɔ̧ wen in GASA WAN, a̧ baa laa'i yinɛ hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa gboo nɛnɛ kɔ̧ tua. Kà a̧ gbo kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ wee ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ o be
O be
Moisɛ mɔi̧a o be
Ɛɛ tɛ de tom zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ tɛ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ, wen nɛ́ wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ tɛ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN. Wi nɛ tɛ de tom wese'i, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɛnɛ beka ye wee wese-ɔm-tɛ na.»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o duk be
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ zu demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN; wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ desee mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nyɛma mɛ ha̧ lɔr, bu-mbɔi in ndɛrɛ,
o tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, o gbɛ̧ laa, o gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, o yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa in laa buma gbadua,
ndàrá vala sami nɛ‘i gbɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɛ̧ɛ̧, o ŋga ndàrá in o te akasia,
nɔ̧́-e-wee, nyama a ɗɔɔ nɔ̧́-wan, fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a,
de toka ta kɛn-kɛn in o de ŋga ta-a-nu laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod in nu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
«O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mgbara'nɛ́ a̧ gar tɛnɛ wen dee tom nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i:
in tua-kpe-zu-a, in mɔɔ-kpe-ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt, o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o mɔɔ-tɔna-a, o gaŋgala, o mbiŋ in o gun-wa,
kuɓa in o mɔɔ-gɔa-a, mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a in babir-laa;
taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ in o mɔɔ-gɔa-a, o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, in brɛt wen ha̧a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧,
in o nyɛk-a, o lamba in o nɔ̧́-a̧,
fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama in o mɔɔ-gɔa-a, nɔ̧́-wan, fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a in babir-laa kpe nu
fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, fana-ndɛrɛ yí-a, te-gɔa-a in o nyɛk-a, kpáná-ndɛrɛ in dek-a mbɛt;
o laa-nú-zala, o mbiŋ-a in o gun-wa, in laa-ga̧i̧-nu-a;
o te-mgboia-a, o te-mgboi nú-zala in o nyak-aa,
o laa ko o wi-de-tom sɛn
O be
Bíí nɛ kpɛka nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ ee see sɛnɛ mbɛt mɔi̧a mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN, wen dee tua-kpa-ŋmaa in o tom-aa lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ tom-fura-laa ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
O wiwii in o okoo maa yi nɛɛ kai o mɔɔ-zer, o wele, o mɔɔ-pi̧-ger, o kana-lɔr, in o mɔ nɛ wa dee nɛ lɔr nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, kóó o nde kaia mɔ‘i tɛnɛ wɛk ti GASA WAN.
O wi nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ laa zóŋ-zóŋ, yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, buma gbadua, ndàrá vala sami nɛ‘i gbɛ̧ɛ̧, o ŋga ndàrá, wa kaia tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN.
O wi nɛ tɛ ha̧ kɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi in ndɛrɛ ha̧ GASA WAN kaia tɛnɛ mbɛt. O wi-kai-te akasia kaia tɛnɛ wen o tom lɛŋ;
o okoo lɛŋ nɛ iŋa toka laa kaia o mɔ nɛ wa toka tɛnɛ; o tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, o gbɛ̧ laa, in o gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in o yɛ́m-yɛ́m-a.
O okoo lɛŋ nɛ iŋa mgbara toka buma gbadua toka.
O gasawi saaye kaia o ta nɛ tok tok kɛn-kɛn tɛnɛ, o ŋma ta wen aa-a nu laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod in laa kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
Wa kaia nɔ̧́-nyama in o nɔ̧́ lamba in o nɔ̧́-wan, ká bá nɛ̀ o fuu-nyama wan mɛ dɔa-a tɛnɛ.
O wiwii in o okoo, o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋa dee tom zu nu lɛŋ,
wen dee o de tom nɛ lɔr, nɛ bu-mbɔi, nɛ ndɛrɛ,
o tom-sɛka-ta wen aa-a nu laa, sɛka te, in o ŋma tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ iŋa usamɔ ha̧ a̧, in ha̧ Oholiab, bem ko Ahisamak zuduk ko Dan wen usa yuwar tom'i ha̧ o ŋma bíí.

A̧ ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ wa wen iŋa dee tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ: tom-sɛka-mɔ, tom-gɔna-dap-mɔ, tom-toka tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, in gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, tom toka yɛm-yɛm laa in o gee tom-toka-laa. Wa iŋa tom-sɛka-mɔ in gɔna-dap-mɔ lɛŋ.
«Besalɛl, Oholiab in o wi nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ ha̧ wa wen dee tom
Moisɛ saa Besalɛl, Oholiab in o wi-de-tom nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ wa; o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧a̧ tɛ wen dee tom'i.
Wa kaia o mɔ nɛ o be
O wi-iŋ-dee-tom'i nɛ yaa de nɛ tom-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ee tom duk nɛɛ kpa Moisɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «O bíí kai nɛ mɔ tɛnɛ nɛ dɔka-a gan mɔ nɛ GASA WAN aka ha'i mɛ ha̧.»
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ he mbe-a kɔ̧ gbagari: «Ká wiwii in o okoo ba ŋma mɔ tɛnɛ wen dee
O mɔɔ-de-tua nɛ wa kaia nɛnɛ nyɛma kaɗi, oi-aa ɓɔna mbɛt.
O wi-de-tom nɛ iŋa tom nɛ de-a dee fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɓu, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa in nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap
Zi̧a̧ laa'i kpɔk nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-naar, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo; o laa nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ ba nɛ kpɔk dura-a in pɛsa-a hee ŋmaa ga.
Ɓɛɛ wa fur o laa nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ mɔɔrɔ e nu ŋmaa.
Wa kpoo bolo-a nɛ tu̧ nyak e nu kuti mɔi̧a zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ wa de kalemɔ‘i mbɛt e nu yiitoo mɔi̧a zɔ̧-laa.
Wa kpoo o bolo ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nu yiitoo-aa. O bolo-a yaa nyɛm ŋmaa.
Wa dee boi-kɔk-mɔ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ lɔr ye nɛ o nu laa nɔ‘i ndaɗi nɛ ŋmaa wen ha̧ mɛ ndaɗi tua-laa'i mɛ duk kpɔk.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee o zɔ̧-laa nɛ buma gbadua wen kpea-a nɛ zu fara-duk ko Sɔ̧; o zɔ̧-laa nɔ‘i nɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk.
Dura zɔ̧-laa'i nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo; dura o laa nɔ‘i ɓu-zua-kpɔk'i in o pɛsa wa hee ŋmaa ga.
Wa fura o zɔ̧-laa nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ e nu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa fur oi zɔ̧-laa e nu ŋmaa mbɛt.
Wa kpoo bolo ɓu-mɔɔrɔ e nu kuti mɔi̧a zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ wa de kalemɔ‘i tɛ yiitoo mɔi̧a zɔ̧-laa.
Ɓɛɛ wa de boi-kɔk-mɔ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ wen kɔka-a nɛ laa'i ha̧ mɛ ndaɗi tua'i mɛ duk kpɔk.
Wa ɗafa gbɛ̧ ndàrá vala sami mɛ kpe nɛ zu tua'i in ŋma ŋga ndàrá wen pi̧a-a̧ ɗoŋ-aa.
Wa dee o gaŋgala nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ wa ba e ŋgɔn.
Dura o te nɔ‘i nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
Wa dee sara yiitoo nyɛm ŋmaa e ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam lɛŋ.
Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mɛ zɔk mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ war Nɛgɛb.
Wa dee gun-aa ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa a gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala kpɔk kpɔk dam nɛ sara lɛŋ.
Wa dee o gaŋgala ɓu-yiitoo mbɛt a nɛ mgbɔɔr si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ wa de o sara ɓu-naar nɛ bu-mbɔi a nɛnɛ yiitoo yiitoo ɗɔɔ o gaŋgala.
Wa aa o gaŋgala mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ndaa-tua nɛ war yee-wese.
Wa dee o ŋma o gbaŋ yiitoo wen pi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbii-aa.
O gbaŋ nɔ‘i nyɛi̧a nɛ ŋmaa nɛ gun-aa, ɓɛɛ wa yee ŋmaa nɛ war ŋgɔn kɔ̧ kuti koe. Wa dee hegɔ wen o gaŋgala nɔ‘i yiitoo'i.
O gaŋgala mɛ mgbii-aa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ‘i dee gun wa nɛ bu-mbɔi, gun-aa yiitoo yiitoo tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wa dee o be-saŋ mɔɔrɔ nɛ o te akasia wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr.
O ŋma mɔɔrɔ woyo wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ oi-aa mɔɔrɔ wen gita-a zu o gaŋgala mɛ ndaa tua si war yee-wese.
Wa gita ŋma kpaakpee see-a nɛ nú-a hegɔ gɔm ndaa-a mɛ.
Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa a o koe lɔr nú-a, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ o gaŋgala nɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧ o koe nɔ‘i mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee ŋma babir-laa nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap
Wa dee o mbiŋ naar nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ lɔr sɛnɛ, in o boi-kɔk-mɔ lɔr; bɛɛ wa dui bu-mbɔi de nɛ gun-aa naar mbɛt.
Wa dee laa-kpe-nú tua nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi-tok-laa a̧ dee tom-aa.
Wa dee o mbiŋ mɔɔrɔ in o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o gan-ndui, in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa. Wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de gun-aa mɔɔrɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Besalɛl dee kuɓa nɛ te akasia. Dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, kusa-a mbɛt nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr nɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
A̧ duia kana naar nɛ lɔr a dam naŋ kuɓa'i, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
A̧ ɗafa o ɓira-te akasia ɓɛɛ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ nɛ lɔr.
A̧ yura te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana ká̧ kuɓa wen gɔa-a.
A̧ ɗafa mɔɔ-gu-zu-a nɛ lɔr, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de o
A̧ ee
O
A̧ dee taŋe-e-nyɔŋ-mɔ nɛ te akasia. Dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk, pɛsa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.
A̧ yɔka ɗoŋ-aa nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo be lɔr zik nɛ nú-a lɛŋ.
A̧ dee o ndota nú-a nɛ lɔr, pɛsa-a hee ŋgɛɗɛ-er-wi ga si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo lɔr zik nɛ nú-a.
A̧ nɔi̧a lɔr de nɛ kana naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a dam mgbii-aa naar'i.
O kana nɔ‘i yaa mgbii-aa ha'i mɛ a o te sɛnɛ wen gɔa-a.
A̧ dee o ŋma dura te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa, wen gɔa-a nɛ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ.
A̧ dee o nyɛk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr wen aa-a zu taŋe-nyɔŋmɔ, o tasi, o be ɗele, o ɓii in o be yee wen tɛna-a nɛ zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nu.
Besalɛl dee
Gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, taar a̧ra̧ si mgbɔɔr, taar si mgbɔɔr.

Tɛ gbaa-er-a kpɔk, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a, in o dap-aa. Ɓɛɛ tɛ yiitoo gbaa-er-a, a̧ dee o be-yee taar hee gba̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ ga, nɛ o kpoi-a in o dap-aa, hegɔ dam nɛ o gbaa-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ.
Kiitɛ
Yuwar-a duka hee mɔ'ɔ ga: kpoi-a kpɔk duk ɗɔɔ kuti gbaa-er
O kpoi-a in o gbaa-er-a ndaɗa ŋmaa kpɔk in kiitɛ-a; a̧ mboɗa wa dui kpɔk nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
A̧ dee o lamba mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a sɛnɛ, gu nɛ o mɔɔ-ɓam-mɔ in o nyɛk-a-bùk, lɛŋ nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
A̧ baa nɛ kilo fuu lɔr ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ de nɛ
A̧ ɗafa fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ te akasia; dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ kusa-a duk nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk. Ɓɛɛ o zak ká̧ a̧ duk kpɔk in a̧.
A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧a̧ lɔr ɗoŋ-aa in kɔ̧ a̧ pii tɛ o zak nɔ‘i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓo ŋma lɔr nɛ nú-a hegɔɔ zik kpa.
A̧ duia o kana lɔr e ká̧ nu fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama'i nɛ mgbɔɔr nɛ mgbɔɔr, wen aa o te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
A̧ dee o te-gɔa-a nɔ‘i nɛ te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ lɔr.
A̧ ɗafa sa̧a̧-nɔ̧́, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛr fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a; mɔ‘i nɛ tom ko wi-de-nyama.
A̧ dee fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ te akasia, dura-a in pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta.
A̧ ɗafa o zak dam mgbii-aa naar, nɛ yaa ndaɗi ŋmaa in fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
A̧ duia o nyɛk lɛŋ wen
A̧ sina ŋma be háŋányáŋá-mɔ nɛ ndɛrɛ e mgbák ká̧ nu
Ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi o kana a nɛ mgbii-aa naar wen pi̧i̧ te gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
A̧ ɗafa te akasia, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ ndɛrɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
A̧ yura o te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ o kana nɛ duk ká̧
A̧ dee kpáná-ndɛrɛ in gun-aa nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ kaia nɛ o mɔɔ-zɔk-yí ko okoo nɛ de tom sɛn nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa de nɛnɛ.
A̧ ɗafa nú-zala, in zɔ̧-laa babir-a nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, dura-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
A̧ dee o mbiŋ-a ɓu-yiitoo in gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Dura babir-laa mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o mbiŋ-a nɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o gun-aa ɓu-yiitoo nɛ ndɛrɛ; a̧ dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Dura zɔ̧-laa-kpe-nú-zala nɛ war yee-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ; mbiŋ tɔna-a nɛ ɓu, gun-aa ɓu nɛ bu-mbɔi mbɛt. O boi-kɔk-mɔ in o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ ya tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi.
Dura babir-laa nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Sɛn ká̧ nu tua nɛ mgbɔɔr dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, mbiŋ tɔna-a taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
Nɛ̀ ɓii ká̧ nu tua, dura zɔ̧-laa kpea-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta, nɛ mbiŋ taar in gun-aa taar mbɛt.
O laa-babir nɛ zika ɗoŋ zala lɛŋ nɛ́ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
O gun mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-laa nɛ bu-mbɔi. Wa yɔka ɗoŋ o gan-ndui nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-mbɔi mɔi̧a o mbiŋ lɛŋ e nu ŋmaa.
Wa toka laa-kpe nu tua-zala tok nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa; pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta hee wan mɛ nú-zala ga.
O mbiŋ-a naar in o gun-aa lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ; wa dee o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ o mbiŋ nɔ‘i nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ wa sɔ̧ bu-mbɔi ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa mbɛt.
O te mgboia fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ in te-mgboi nú-zala lɛŋ nɛ ndɛrɛ.

Mɔ nɛ o bíí ndɛma mɛ de nɛ fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ fara e sɛka-ta-heembea nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ́ Moisɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ tɔr o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o be Levii a̧ tɔra tɔra-a. Gasa wi-zɔk-tom'i nɛ Itamar, bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ.
Besalɛl, bem ko Urii, be-koo Hur, zuduk ko Juda dee tom nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ de'i lɛŋ.
Wi nɛ gbaka a̧ tɛ tom nɛ́ Oholiab, bem ko Ahisamak, zuduk ko Dan; a̧ iŋa tom-sɛka-mɔ, tom-gɔna-dap-mɔ, in tom-toka-tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Dita lɔr lɛŋ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ wen tom
Dita bu-mbɔi nɛ o bíí mɔi̧a so ŋgimbi tɔra bíí duka nɛ kilo booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo
Kóó o nde ha̧a̧ nɛ reeta sule nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo
Wa nɔi̧a kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar de nɛ gun
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko oi kilo bu-mbɔi ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a, Besalɛl dee nɛ o boi-kɔk-mɔ tɛ mbiŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔk nɛ ɗoŋ o gan-ndui in o mɔɔ-ga̧i-laa nɛ mɔi̧a o mbiŋ e nu ŋmaa.
Ndɛrɛ nɛ bíí ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN kura nɛ kilo booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
Nɛ i̧i̧ a̧ a̧ dee nɛ o gun fara-yea-a si kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, in
a̧ dee o gun zala, in o gun nu tua yea-a si nú-zala in o te-mgboi-tua'i in o wan mɛ mgboi nú-zala mbɛt nɛ ndɛrɛ.
Wa fura laa nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa wen dee tom
Wa dee laa nɛ‘i sa'e Efod nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Wa ɗafa lɔr lɛfɛ-lɛfɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ɓir fan nɛ ŋmaa in tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bíí nɛ iŋa tom'i a̧ dee dea-a.
Wa fura nyak-kasa-a yiitoo e nú-a.
Nɛ́ kpɔk tom'i a̧ wa dee nɛ kanda-hɛr zu Efod; wa dea-a nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Wa sɛka de ta nɛ tok tok kɛn-kɛn, ɓɛɛ wa sakari lɔr e wa sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap hee gɔna dap-tumbal ga, nɛ nin o be
Wa ee o ta nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ nyak Efod wen ha̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o be
Wa fura laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa fura nɛ Efod ga; wa fura nɛ lɔr, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Nɛ́ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a. Wa goia laa'i si zu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛm ŋmaa tɛ dɔ̧-er.
Wa aa o be toka-ta sɛnɛ tɛ fara naar: tɛ kuti nɛka-a, wa aa nɛ ta-kui nɛ‘i sa'e sardɔan, ta nɛ yí-a ɔ tàrà nɛ‘i sa'e topaz, in tu̧ ta mít-mít nɛ‘i sa'e emerod.
Tɛ yiitoo nɛka-a, nɛ́ gbɛ̧ ta yúŋú-yúŋú nɛ‘i sa'e ɛskarbuklɛ, tu̧ ta hee yiwese ga nɛ‘i sa'e safir, in toka-ta nɛ‘i sa'e jaspɛ.
Tɛ taar nɛka-a, nɛ́ ŋga ta nɛ‘i sa'e agat, gbɛ̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e kɔrnalin in ta nɛ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i sa'e ametist.
Tɛ naar nɛka-a, nɛ́ mbui ta nɛ‘i sa'e krizolit, toka-ta kɛn-kɛn nɛ‘i sa'e beril in tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e oniks; wa lɛŋ ya kɔ̧ ɓoo lɔr.
O ta nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-yiitoo hee duk o be
Wa ɓaɓa sa̧a̧ lɔr e zu laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi.
Wa ɗafa mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo nɛ lɔr in kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa e o kana nɔ‘i sɛn mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ ŋgɔn yiitoo.
Wa pi̧i̧ nu ɓaɓa-lɔr'i sɛn nu kana nɛ ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war ŋgɔn.
Oi nu ɓaɓa-lɔr yiitoo'i wa hɛra tɛ o mɔɔ-ga̧i̧-kana yiitoo mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa lati tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Wa dee ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ga̧i̧ mgbii laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ war fara nɛ ndaɗa ŋmaa in Efod nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Wa duia o ŋma kana-lɔr yiitoo woyo e tɛ o nyak Efod nɛ war ɗɔɔ nɛ ti, nyɛm nɛ fara hɛra-a sɛn zu kanda Efod.
Ɓɛɛ wa kun laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi nɛ o kana-a tɛ o kana Efod nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa wen ha̧ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi mɛ duk zu kanda Efod wen ká a̧ tɛɛ yu zu-a. Wa dee mɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
O wi-tok-laa fura laa nɛ‘i tɛ pi̧ Efod zu a̧‘i nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa.
Wa gɔna ger laa'i tan see-a, ɓɛɛ wa tok nú-a zik lɛŋ nɛ̀ garaazi ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ ndota-a wen ká tɛɛ a̧k.
Wa fura o ŋma be mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o waya kóɓò zik nɛ naŋ-a kpa lɛŋ nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, in nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Wa duia o be mana nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ wa a zaŋ nɛ ŋmaa in o fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in be waya kóɓò zik ká̧ naŋ-a lɛŋ.
O fura be mɔɔ nɔ‘i in o be mana nɔ‘i nɛka naŋ gasa laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zik kpa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Wa toka ŋma gɔna be laa yɛ́m-yɛ́m ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i.
Wa dee mɛtɛwol in mɔɔ-hɛr-zu ká bá nɛ̀ laa mɛ ɗɔɔ nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa.
Wa dee o kanda nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, nɛ tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, nɛ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, in nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ. Nɛ wi-iŋ-tom-aa a̧ dee dea-a, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Wa duia sa̧a̧ lɔr hɔ ŋmaa in do-te mɛ usi'e mɔ‘i nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr mɔ zu-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i yɔr nɛ mɔ tɛ
ɓɛɛ wa kun tu̧ nyak sɛnɛ wen hɛra-a tɛ mɛtɛwol hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ tom tua-kpa-ŋmaa kaɗa nɛnɛ. O be
Ɓɛɛ wa gɔ tua-kpa-ŋmaa in o mɔ-aa lɛŋ sitɛ Moisɛ: kiitɛ tua in o mɔ-aa lɛŋ, o boi-kɔk-mɔ, o mɔɔ-tɔna-a, o gaŋgala, o mbiŋ in o gun-aa;
mɔɔ-kpe-zu-a nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá sami nɛ‘i gbɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɛ̧ɛ̧, mɔɔ-gu-zu-a nɛ‘i dee nɛ ŋga ndàrá, in babir-laa mɛ kɔ̧ a̧;
kuɓa
taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ brɛt nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧;
nɛ‘i dee nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr, o lamba, o mɔ-aa in nɔ̧́ wen ee wee sɛnɛ mbɛt;
nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, nɔ̧́-wan, fuu-nyama wen doa-a in babir-laa-kpe nu tua;
nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndɛrɛ, sina-ndɛrɛ yí-a, o te gɔa-a in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ kpáná-ndɛrɛ in dek-a;
o laa-kpe-nú-zala, o mbiŋ-a, o gun-aa, babir-kpe nu tua-zala, o nyak-aa, o te-mgboia-a in o nyɛk-de-tom kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa;
o laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen dee tom kɔ̧
O be
Moisɛ zɔka tom nɛ wa dee lɛŋ; a̧ zɔka'e wa dee kànà mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN usa. Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tok de yoŋgo zu wa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, mɛ̀ bá tua-kpa-ŋmaa nɛ duk nɛ́
Mɛ̀ bá
Mɛ̀ bá taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ mbɛt tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɗáfí mɔ zu-a. Mɛ̀ bá
Mɛ̀ bá
Mɛ̀ é fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ mgbák nu tua yea-a si kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa.
Mɛ̀ é kpáná-ndɛrɛ mgbara tua-kpa-ŋmaa in
Mɛ̀ é nu zala, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kpé nú-a nɛ babir-laa.
«Mɛ̀ tɛ́n nɔ̧́-wan a kɔ̧ tua'i in á tɛ o mɔ nɛ ya kɔ̧ a̧‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ee a̧ in o mɔ nɛ ya kɔ̧ a̧‘i lɛŋ nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧; hegɔ‘i, mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Mɛ̀ tɛ́n nɔ̧́ a fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ in a tɛ o nyɛk-a lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ee a̧ nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧; hegɔ‘i, fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nyɛmna.
Mɛ̀ tɛ́n nɔ̧́ a tɛ kpáná-ndɛrɛ in dek-a mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
«Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i si nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zúí wa.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, mɛ̀ pí̧ laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ Arɔŋ, mɛ̀ tɛ́n nɔ̧́ a zu-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ de tom-ɗafa'm.
Mɛ̀ sá o bem kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ á o gɔna-laa tɛ-wa;
mɛ̀ tɛ́n nɔ̧́ a zu-wa hee ko dáà kɔ-wa ga, wen ha̧ wa mɛ de tom-ɗafa'm, ɓɛɛ hegɔ tɛna-a zu-wa'i tɛ de ha̧ wa in o bezaŋ-wa mɛ ya nɛ wi-ɗaf'am kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Moisɛ dee kànà mɔ lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN usa ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ga.
A̧ baa tua'i e ŋgɔn tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, tɛ yiitoo pɛ gboa-a nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ.
Moisɛ baa tua e ŋgɔn, a̧ ee o gun-aa, in o mɔɔ-tɔna-a, a̧ gita gaŋgala, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o mbiŋ a ŋgɔn.
A̧ tata laa kpe nɛ zu tua'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ kpe ŋma mɔ zu laa'i woyo hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN usa ha̧ a̧ ga.
A̧ baa sɛka-ta-heembea e kɔ̧ kuɓa, a̧ yura o dura te ká̧ kuɓa'i wen gɔa-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ e mɔɔ-kpe-nú-a sɛnɛ.
A̧ baa kuɓa e kɔ̧ tua, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi babir-laa kpe nɛnɛ, wen hu̧sa̧ kuɓa
A̧ ee taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ti babir-laa.
A̧ aa brɛt-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zu-a ha̧ GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.
A̧ ee
ɓɛɛ a̧ e wee tɛ o lamba ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.
A̧ ee
a̧ dɔɔ fuu-nyama sɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpe nu tua nɛ babir-laa.
A̧ baa fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ e mgbák nu tua-kpa-ŋmaa, a̧ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ zu-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.
A̧ ee kpáná-ndɛrɛ mgbara tua-kpa-ŋmaa in fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a yì kɔ̧ a̧ wen fɔra tɛ.
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ‘i tai so er in fɔr naŋ sɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa de nɛnɛ mɛ ye kɔ̧ tua-kpa-ŋmaa, kóó ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ si
Moisɛ ɗafa nú-zala zik nɛ tua in
Tura-zan zira duk zu tua-kpa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN dun tua'i.
Moisɛ nyɛm so mɛ ye tua-kpa-ŋmaa na wen tura-zan kpee zu tua in gasamɔ ko GASA WAN duna tua'i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ tura-zan kur mɛ yak, ɓɛɛ o be
Kà tura-zan tɛ yak hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, wa pɛma kànà mɔ hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ ku̧naŋ yaka-a, sɛka wa kura mɛ yak ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt.
Mɛ wese ɓɛɛ tura-zan'i duka zu tua, ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ nɛ́ wee a̧ nyɛk tɛ tura-zan'i; o be
GASA WAN saa Moisɛ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ nɛ kɔ̧
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ o be
Kà dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ gasa mɔ-dai, wi’ɛi tɛ ha̧ nɛ wiwii-a nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa a̧ nɛnɛ e nú
Wi’ɛi tɛ e er zu saɗi'i, ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ kpɛk wen bíí ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ.
Wi tɛ gɔn saɗi'i ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ o bem ko Arɔŋ tɛ ba tɔk-aa ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa misa̧ a ɗoŋ
Kà‘i ɓa saɗi'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wi a̧ka̧.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ o bem ko Arɔŋ tɛ ye wee
Wa tɛ kai zu saɗi, in nɔ̧́-a̧, gu nɛ oi kpoo-aa lɛŋ a yí wee fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘i.
Wa tɛ fɔr zaŋ-aa gu nɛ o mbayo-a nɛ yì, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔɔ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ zu
«Kà
Wi tɛ gɔn saɗi'i ti GASA WAN sɛn
Wi tɛ a̧k saɗi'i, zu-a gu nɛ nɔ̧́-a̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kaia kpoo-aa a yí-wee-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi tɛ fɔr zaŋ-aa in o mbayo-a nɛ yì, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN sɛka a̧ dɔɔ zu
«Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ nɔ̧́í̧ a̧‘i kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ dɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, ha̧a̧mɔ‘i a̧ duk nɛ gbaku̧i̧, kóó pola.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ha̧ nɔi'i ha̧ GASA WAN zu
Wi tɛ a̧i̧ tua-nyɔnɔ nɛ oi-aa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wi pi̧i̧ taŋ ká̧
Wi tɛ mbaŋ nɔi'i tan see-a, ɓɛɛ wi beka kɛ̧ wa nɛ ŋmaa na, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔɔ nɔi'i zu
«Kà ŋma bíí ba ha̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN, ha̧a̧mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ fuu nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in nɔ̧́, ká bá nɛ̀ nyama.

Wi tɛ ba mɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ o bem ko Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kaia fuu nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in nɔ̧́ dun er, ká bá nɛ̀ nyama nɛ oi-aa a yí wee-ɗafi-sɔ̧ hee mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ ga. Mɔ‘i nɛ dɔɔ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ duk nɛ de pɛr nyama tɛ GASA WAN.
Oi ha̧a̧mɔ tɛ duk nɛ ko Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i. Mɔ‘i nɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna, wen nɛ́ oi dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.

«Kà ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ dɔɔ brɛt, a̧ duk nɛ́ fuu nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́, kóó a̧ duk nɛ́ makala nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́, ɓɛɛ ká hao duk sɛnɛ na; kóó a̧ duk nɛ́ makala nɛ‘i aa nɔ̧́ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
«Kà ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ mɔ nɛ‘i dɔɔ zu wee, ɓɛɛ ha̧a̧mɔ‘i a̧ duk nɛ́ fuu nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́, nɛ hao bo sɛnɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ gbin a̧ sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́, ɓɛɛ mɛ aa nɔ̧́ zu a̧; mɔ‘i nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ.
«Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧na kɔ̧ pɛsa tasi, wi tɛ vati nɛ fuu nɛ nɔ̧́.
Mɛ tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ mɛ ɗafa'i nɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ ba nɛnɛ si
Hegɔ‘i, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ‘i hee mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ ga mɛ dɔ zu
Oi ha̧a̧mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ko Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i. Mɔ‘i nɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna, wen nɛ́ oi dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.
«Hao beka bo tɛ dɔɔ brɛt n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN na; ɛnɛ beka dɔ hao, kóó gɔrɔ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN na.
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ ha̧ mɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN hee zu-nyɔnɔ ga, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wi tɛ dɔ zu-nyɔnɔ‘i zu
Mɛ̀ á tɔŋ tɛ ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ; ká mɛ mbosi aa tɔŋ tɛ ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ na, wen tɔŋ usi nɛ
Mɛ́ nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ zu-nyɔnɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, mɛ̀ há̧ nɛ ha̧na gba̧a̧-nyɔnɔ, koo hɔ̧na fuu-aa.
Mɛ̀ á nɔ̧́ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ aa fuu-nyama sɛnɛ mbɛt; mɔ‘i nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
Ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ dɔ mɔ‘i hee mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ ga: be fuu, be nɔ̧́, ká bá nɛ̀ fuu-nyama nɛ oi-aa. Mɔ‘i nɛ dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗafi sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ gasa mɔ-dai, kóó nɛ́ wiwii-a, kóó nɛ nana-a, a̧ a̧ ha̧ nɛ́ saɗi nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na ha̧ GASA WAN.
Wi’ɛi tɛ e er zu saɗi n'aa ha̧a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ wi gɔna a̧ sɛn nú
Wi tɛ dɔ nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ saɗi nɛ‘i ɗafi nɛ̀ GASA WAN wen gaŋmɔ‘i;
wi tɛ dɔ o gbaazaa-a yiitoo nɛ oi nɔ̧́-a̧ gu nɛ nɔ̧́ ká̧ ɔm-a, in nú-see-aa mbɛt.
O bem ko Arɔŋ tɛ dɔ kpoo'i zu
«Kà‘i ha̧ nɛ geɗek mɔ-dai ha̧ GASA WAN ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ wen ga̧a̧mɔ, wi tɛ ha̧ nɛ wiwii-a, kóó nana-a nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na.
Kà bó nɛ́
Wi tɛ e er zu saɗi'i, ɓɛɛ wi gɔna a̧ nu
Pɛrti yuwar-ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen ga̧a̧mɔ hegɔ‘i, wi tɛ dɔ kana nɛ de fara nɔ̧́-a̧ hee dom-aa nɛ oi-aa, nɔ̧́ zu gbazaŋ-aa in wan mɛ zu bezaŋ-aa,
ká bá nɛ̀ o gbaazaa-a nɛ oi nɔ̧́-a̧ gu nɛ nu see-aa mbɛt ga.
Ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ dɔ mɔ‘i zu
«Kà bó nɛ́ gbadua a̧‘i ba nɛnɛ, wi tɛ e ti GASA WAN.
Wi tɛ e er zu saɗi'i, ɓɛɛ wi gɔna a̧ nu
nɛ‘i tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ nɔ̧́ zu gbazaŋ-aa in wan mɛ zu bezaŋ-aa,
in o gbaazaa-a nɛ oi nɔ̧́-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ nu see-aa mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ dɔ kpoo'i zu
«Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk wen'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ. Mɔ nɛ‘i saa'e nɔ̧́ in tɔk, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
«Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ‘i, de nɛnɛ ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ‘i mɛ tik zu o dukbíí, a̧ tɛ ha̧ daŋa wiwii-ndai nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na ha̧ GASA WAN ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
A̧ tɛ ba ndai'i nɛnɛ si nú
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a'i tɛ ba tɔk ndai'i nɛnɛ si kɔ̧
a̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nu zɔ̧ɔ̧ er-a ɗɔɔ tɔk, ɓɛɛ a̧ misa̧ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a tɛ babir-laa nɛ kpe
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ sɔ̧ ŋma tɔk ndai'i tɛ o zak fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ duk kɔ̧
A̧ tɛ ɗafi de nɔ̧́ kpoo-ha̧a̧mɔ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ e nɛtɛ: nɔ̧́ zu gbazaŋ-aa in wan mɛ bezaŋ-aa,
o gbaazaa-a nɛ oi nɔ̧́-a̧ gu nɛ nu see-aa lɛŋ.
Wi tɛ kai mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ wiwii ndai wen ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kaia wa dɔ zu
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ndàrá ndai'i nɛ oi kpoo-aa lɛŋ, o zu-a gu nɛ o mbayo-a, zaŋ-aa gu nɛ ɗɔr-aa,
mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e oi kpoo-aa lɛŋ sitɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara ɗoŋ gbagari, fara nɛ‘i a bùk sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ mɔɔ nɔ‘i yí wee gua.
«Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ o be
ɓɛɛ kà ɗaŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ gboo zan, giiwi tɛ ha̧ daŋa wiwii-ndai ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa baa a̧ nɛnɛ e nú
O kuti be
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a tɛ ba ŋma tɔk-aa nɛnɛ si kɔ̧
A̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nu zɔ̧ɔ̧ er-a ɗɔɔ tɔk'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ misa̧ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a tɛ babir-laa ti GASA WAN;
ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋma tɔk'i tɛ o zak
A̧ tɛ mɔi̧ o de fara nɔ̧́ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ sɛn
A̧ tɛ de mɔ nɛ kpoo daŋa be ndai'i hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛ kpoo daŋa be ndai wan mɛ ea-ɗaŋmɔ ga. Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ dee mɔ nɛ usi ea ɗaŋmɔ zu giiwi, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ ee ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa.
A̧ tɛ kai kpoo daŋa be ndai gbonɛ kɔ̧ gbagari, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dɔɔ nɛ kuti-a ga. Yuwar-ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ ko giiwi nɛ mɔ‘i.
«Kà bó nɛ́ be-wan a̧ gbina ŋma heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ kà ɗaŋmɔ‘i tik zu-a,
kà‘i nɛ usa ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i ha̧ a̧, a̧ tɛ ba vala gbadua nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ.
A̧ tɛ e er-a zu vala gbadua'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔna a̧ fara nɛ‘i gɔn saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ‘i sɛn ti GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i nɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nu zɔ̧ɔ̧ er ɗɔɔ tɔk kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ o zak nɛ duk fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbaia oi tɔk-aa a gun fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧.
A̧ tɛ dɔ de nɔ̧́ kpoo-aa lɛŋ sɛn zu
«Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ŋma bíí mgbara dukbíí a̧ gbina ŋma heembea ko GASA WAN kpɔk de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ kà ɗaŋmɔ‘i tik zu a̧,
kà‘i nɛ usa ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i ha̧ a̧, a̧ tɛ ba nana gbadua nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na tɛnɛ nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i.
Wi’ɛi tɛ e er zu saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔna a̧ tɛ kpɔk fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er ɗɔɔ tɔk-aa sɔ̧ tɛ o zak fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbaia oi tɔk-aa a gun
A̧ tɛ mɔi̧ nɔ̧́ kpoo saɗi'i hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛ saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ zu
«Kà a̧ nɛ baa nɛ
A̧ tɛ e er-a zu saɗi'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔna a̧ wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ ea-ɗaŋmɔ sɛn fara gɔn saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er ɗɔɔ tɔk saɗi'i sɔ̧ tɛ o zak nɛ duk fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbaia oi tɔk-aa lɛŋ a gun
A̧ tɛ gɔn de nɔ̧́ kpoo-aa lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de nɛ be sami-ɗafi-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ sɛn zu
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ duka sedaako kan nɛ mɔ zu mɔ n'aa zɔka, kóó mɔ n'aa zia, kà a̧ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ n'aa iŋa'i na, a̧ dee nɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ‘i tɛ ɓɔn zu a̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí a̧ tama ŋma ndiŋmɔ n'aa iŋ na, hee wɔr ndiŋ saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ in wɔr ndiŋ mɔ-dai ga, kóó wɔr ŋma ndiŋ saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nu, war-tɛ-a ɗaŋa, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ‘i tika zu a̧.
Kà ŋma bíí a̧ foo ŋma ndiŋmɔ tɛ ŋma ɓii bíí, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ iŋ na, ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ iŋ, ɗaŋmɔ‘i tɛ tik zu a̧.
«Kóó kà ŋma bíí tɔ̧ wen, kan nɛ mɔ nɛ nú-tum tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ bíí tɛ kan mɔ sɛnɛ, kóó nɛ́ wen-gbak-bíí, kóó nɛ́ wen-tik-bíí, kà a̧ iŋ kaɗi, ɗaŋmɔ‘i tika zu a̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ gbar ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i,

ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ba zɔŋa mɔ-dai hee be-zɔŋa sami, kóó be-zɔŋa gbadua ga tɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ oi ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i; ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dee mɔ zu wi nɛ baa ha̧a̧mɔ nɛnɛ‘i mɛ usi'e Sɔ̧ ea ɗaŋmɔ ko wi’ɛi ha̧ a̧.»

«Kà ŋma bíí a̧ bòó nɛ̀ yuwar kpaa nana sami, kóó nana gbadua na, a̧ tɛ kai gbaku̧i yiitoo nɛnɛ; kóó pola yiitoo mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ sɛn ti GASA WAN wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧; kpɔk tɛ duk kɔ‘i wen ɗafa-sɔ̧-ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa duka kɔ‘i wen dɔa-a nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧.
A̧ tɛ kai o nɔ̧́í̧ nɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ wan mɛ ɗafi-sɔ̧-ea-ɗaŋmɔ nɛti. A̧ tɛ gbin ger nɔi'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka ŋman yinɛ na.
A̧ tɛ misi̧ tɔk nɔi'i a
A̧ tɛ ba ɓii nɔ̧́í̧ dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ yuwar-a. Ŋgimbi nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dee mɔ zu a̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i kaɗi, wi’ɛi kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ gbaku̧i̧ yiitoo, kóó pola yiitoo na, a̧ nyɛma mɛ ba nɛ kilo fuu naar nɛnɛ mɛ ha̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ. A̧ beka a nɔ̧́, kóó nɔ̧́-nyama zu a̧ na, wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
A̧ tɛ ba mɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kai be fuu dun er hee mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ ga, ɓɛɛ dɔɔ zu
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ de do-mɔ‘i hee wan mɛ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ ga.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:

«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN, a̧ tɛ ba vala sami nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na mgbara o geɗek mɔ-dai, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ sede sa̧a̧ fara, ɗafi nɛ mgbara a̧ in GASA WAN.
A̧ tɛ yoɓi mɔ n'aa ɗaŋa'i
«Kà ŋma bíí gbin ŋma heembea ko GASA WAN kpɔk nɛ bo nɛ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧a̧ na, tui ɗaŋmɔ‘i duk nɛ zu-a.

A̧ tɛ ba vala sami nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na mgbara o geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ‘i gɔna wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa. Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ de mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Mɔ‘i nɛ yuwar ɗafa mgbara wi’ɛi in GASA WAN; wi’ɛi dee nɛ ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN nɛ mbetɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:

«Kà ŋma bíí de ndela zu mɔ nɛ ŋma bíí nù kɔ̧-a̧ ee er-a, kóó zu mɔ n'aa gbaka gbak, kóó zu mɔ n'aa zu̧a̧, kóó kà a̧ nɛ baa mɔ nɛ gɔn-zaŋ er ŋma bíí nù kɔ̧-a̧, kóó a̧ nɛ́ dee nɛ ndela zu mɔ nɛ yɔa n'aa kpaa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ kana mɔ nɛ ndela zu mɔ‘i, a̧ dee nɛ ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN.
Wi nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ, nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ‘i tika zu a̧, tɛ kai mɔ n'aa zu̧a̧‘i, kóó mɔ n'aa kaia nɛ gɔn-zaŋ er bíí nù kɔ̧-a̧‘i, kóó mɔ nɛ‘i ee er-a in mɔ nɛ yɔa n'aa kpaa'i,
kóó mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kàná mɔ nɛ ndela zu-a'i si ɗoŋ. A̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔ‘i si ɗoŋ lɛŋ e nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a ha̧ wan-aa, wese n'aa tɛ iŋ‘e nɛ́ wi'i dee mɔ‘i
A̧ tɛ ba vala sami nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na mgbara geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ mgbara a̧ in GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ‘i gɔna wen ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa.
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ dee mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ ko wi’ɛi ti GASA WAN kaɗi, koo ɗaŋmɔ‘i tika so nɛ zu wi’ɛi, a̧ kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i; mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: kpoo tɛ duk yí wee mɛ zɛ hegɔɔ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ, wee tɛ nyɛk kànà nɛ nyɛka-a
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ pi̧ nɛ be yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa in yɛ́m-yɛ́m sir-laa mbɛt. A̧ tɛ kai bùk kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ bia wee sɛn
A̧ tɛ kpai laa kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ pi̧ nɛ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ sɛka a̧ tɛɛ kai bùk wee a ɗɔŋ ye tɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara.
Wee zu
Wee tɛ nyɛk
«Yuwar ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Nɛ́ o bem ko Arɔŋ a̧ tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ nɛnɛ
Wi tɛ kai fuu nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in nɔ̧́ dun er-wi, ká bá nɛ̀ nyama nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nɛ duk zu ha̧a̧mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi dɔɔ zu
Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ nyɔŋ oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna. Wa beka a hao sɛnɛ na nyɔŋ nɛnɛ sɛn tɛ sa̧a̧ fara. Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i sɛn nu zala kɔ̧
«Wí gí mɔ‘i nɛ̀ hao na. War kɔ-wa n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa zu dɔɔ-nyɔnɔ nɛ o bíí ha̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mɔ‘i. Mɔ‘i ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna hee oi ha̧a̧mɔ ɗafa-mgbara- ŋmaa ga.
O bezaŋ Arɔŋ lɛŋ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i. Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa zu dɔɔ-nyɔnɔ ko GASA WAN pɛ lɛŋ a̧‘i. Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ tɛ fo nyɔŋmɔ‘i tɛ kifi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɔ nɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN wese nɛ wa tɛ tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: wa tɛ ba kilo fuu naar hee ha̧a̧mɔ ga ɓɔnsɛnɛ; wa tɛ ha̧ reeta-a mɛ tutuyɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧a̧ oi-aa mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi tɛ gi a̧ nɛ nɔ̧́ kɔ̧ pɛsa nyɛk ɓɛɛ wi vata nɛ de-a ba nɛnɛ; wi tɛ ba gbina brɛt'i nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN, hee pɛr nyama ga.
Ŋma mgbara o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ‘i tɛ tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu-a mɛ duk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ oi-aa tɛ de kale mɔ‘i. Mɛ nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo. Wa tɛ dɔ mɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Ha̧a̧mɔ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ duk nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ, wi beka nyɔŋ na.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k yuwar ɗafa-sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ɗafi wen ɗaŋmɔ. Wí gɔn saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ sɛn fara nɛ‘i gɔn saɗi dɔ ha̧ GASA WAN sɛnɛ‘i, wen nɛ́ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
Nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk ti tɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧ a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-aa, ɓɛɛ wi nyɔŋ a̧ tɛ
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ fo kpoo'i tɛ kifi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Kà tɔk fok a tɛ laa, mɛ tɛ fɔr fara nɛ tɔk aa sɛnɛ‘i tɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara.
Mɛ tɛ gba kpánà nɛ mɛ gii nɛ kpoo'i. Kà mɛ nɛ gii so kpoo'i nɛ kpáná-ndɛrɛ, mɛ tɛ sɔ̧ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ yɛŋgɛsa nɛ yì.
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ ya nɛ o bíí ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo'i gee, wen nɛ kpoo nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nyɛmna.
Wi beka nyɔŋ saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ea-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ‘i baa tɔk-aa nɛnɛ si kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ fara kɔ̧
«Yuwar ɗafa-sɔ̧ ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ̀ nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn fara-gɔn-saɗi nɛ‘i dɔ ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧, a̧‘i gɔn saɗi ha̧a̧mɔ ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa in Sɔ̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ misa̧ tɔk-aa a ɗoŋ
A̧ tɛ ha̧ de nɔ̧́ kpoo-aa lɛŋ: dom-aa, nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ-aa,
gbaazaa-a yiitoo gu nɛ nɔ̧́-a̧; ɓɛɛ wi ee nu-see-aa zu gbaazaa-a mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔɔ kpoo nɔ‘i lɛŋ zu
Bíí lɛŋ nɛ ya nɛ o bíí ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nyɔŋ gee, ɓɛɛ wi nyɔŋ mɔ‘i tɛ sa̧a̧ fara; nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
«Ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ nyɛma ŋmaa in ɗafa-sɔ̧ ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa in Sɔ̧. Yuwar ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk nɛ kpɔk mɔ ɓɛɛ kpoo saɗi'i tɛ duk nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ ɗafa mɔ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ‘i.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ dɔɔ kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ ndàrá saɗi n'aa ha̧a̧‘i duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ‘i dɔɔ dɔɔ in o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ‘i gii gii nɛ̀ tasi, kóó nɛ̀ ŋma pɛsa mɔ duk nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ ha̧a̧ mɔ‘i ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Ha̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i gii nɛ nɔ̧́, kóó nɔ̧́ bo na mbɛt, o bezaŋ Arɔŋ tɛ kɛ̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa nyɛm ŋmaa.»
«Yuwar ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ mɔ'ɔ:

Kà‘i nɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, ŋgimbi dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, wi tɛ ha̧ nɛ makala nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́, nɛ hao bo sɛnɛ na, in ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ makala nɛ hao bo sɛnɛ na nɛ‘i gii nɛ nɔ̧́, ká bá nɛ̀ makala nɛ‘i vata fuu-aa nɛ nɔ̧́, ɓɛɛ nɛ hao bo sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Wi tɛ ba brɛt nɛ hao a̧a̧ sɛnɛ e zu makala nɔ‘i nɛnɛ war kpɔk in ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ nɛ‘i ɗafi ŋgimbi dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧‘i.
Wi tɛ ha̧ makala nɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk dam lɛŋ; mɔ‘i nɛ zu-mɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ tɛ duk nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ misa̧ tɔk ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ wi tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gaŋmɔ nɛ‘i ɗafa ŋgimbi dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ kpɔk wese nɛ‘i ɗafa nɛ sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ wi beka e oi-aa ŋgɔn hɔ sa̧a̧mɔ na.
«Kà ha̧a̧mɔ‘i nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wan mɛ
ɓɛɛ kà oi kpoo-sɔ̧‘i nɛ ɓɔna hɔ tɛ taar zɛ, wi tɛ dɔ yinɛ.
Kà‘i nɛ nyɔŋa kpoo nɛ‘i ɗafa nɛ Sɔ̧ wen ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ taar zɛ, Sɔ̧ beka kpɛk wi nɛ ha̧a̧ mɔ‘i na; wi beka zɔk kpoo'i hee kpoo-sɔ̧ ga ɓɔna. Kpoo'i kifa nɛ ɗaŋ kpoo, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ, dee ɗaŋmɔ ti Sɔ̧.
Kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ foo ndiŋ mɔ mbɛt kaɗi, wi beka nyɔŋ ɓɔna, wi tɛ dɔ dɔɔ yinɛ. Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ na, nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ nɛ‘i ɗafa ha̧ GASA WAN, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o be
Wi nɛ tɛ fo ŋma ndiŋmɔ hee bíí, kóó ndiŋ saɗi, kóó ŋma ndiŋ saɗi-zim mbɛt ga, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ nɛ‘i ɗafa ha̧ GASA WAN'i, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Ɛnɛ nyɛma baa nɔ̧́ kpoo fio saɗi kóó nɔ̧́ kpoo saɗi nɛ ŋma ŋga saɗi baa mbɛt, de nɛ o ŋma tom; mɔ kpɔk, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na.
Nɛ mbetɛ, kà ŋma bíí nyɔŋ nɔ̧́ saɗi n'aa ea wen dɔa-a ha̧ GASA WAN, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o be
Fara n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ lɛŋ, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk nɔi kóó tɔk saɗi na.
Koo o nde nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ tɔk, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ woyo:
«Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
A̧ tɛ ba nɛ war nɔ̧́ de kpoo nɛ wa tɛ dɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ er-a nɛnɛ. A̧ tɛ ba nɛnɛ in tote-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛɛ wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ dɔ o nɔ̧́-a̧ nɔ‘i zu
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ku saɗi mɛ wiiko n’ɛnɛ ɗafa nɛ sɔ̧ wen ga̧a̧mɔ hee zu mɔ ga ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi tɛ ha̧ ku saɗi'i mɛ wiiko ha̧ bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ tɛ ha̧ tɔk in nɔ̧́-kpoo'i ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen ga̧a̧mɔ.
Mi baa tote saɗi nɛ‘i wɛk in ku saɗi nɛ‘i ha̧ nɛ zu mɔ er o be
Mɔ nɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ kpa zu dɔɔ kpoo ko GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ku̧ naŋ dee tom ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ mɔ‘i;
mɔ nɛ GASA WAN gɔna ha̧ o be
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ yuwar dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ, yuwar-ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ, in wen ɗafa mgbara ŋmaa in Sɔ̧, yuwar baa tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ ká bá nɛ̀ ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ.
Mɛ nɛ yuwar'i a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ zu kaya sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ, usi nɛnɛ ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí o laa kɔ-wa in nɔ̧́-wan, daŋa wiwii-ndai nɛ‘i tɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ, vala-sami yiitoo, ká bá nɛ̀ be gɛsɛ brɛt nɛ̀ hao bó sɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ mɔi̧ o bíí lɛŋ si nú
Moisɛ dee mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ mɔi̧ si nú
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ de nɛ mɔ'ɔ.»
Moisɛ saa Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i piiti, ɓɛɛ a̧ zui wa.
A̧ pi̧i̧ be-laa tɛ Arɔŋ, hɛr kanda ha̧ a̧, pi̧ gasa laa tɛ-a in laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr kanda-a zu a̧.
A̧ pi̧i̧ laa-kpe-yí-ŋguɗi zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a mɔɔ-tan-mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e Urim in Tumim kɔ̧ a̧.
Moisɛ hɛra mɛtɛwol zu Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ e ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i duia nɛ lɔr hɔ ŋmaa in do-te tɛ mɛtɛwol'i nɛ war sɔnti-a nɛ usi'e, a̧ tɛ de nɛ tom ko GASA WAN, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ baa nɔ̧́-wan sɔ̧ kɔ̧
A̧ misa̧ nɔ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a zu
A̧ tɛna nɔ̧́‘i a zu Arɔŋ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧.
Moisɛ saa o bem ko Arɔŋ piiti, ɓɛɛ a̧ a be laa tɛ-wa, hɛr kanda guntir-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr mɔ zu wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ga.
A̧ baa daŋa wiwii ndai-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ piiti, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i e er zu a̧.
Moisɛ gɔna ndai'i, a̧ baa tɔk-aa, ɓɛɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er ɗɔɔ-aa sɔ̧ tɛ o zak nɛ ya
Moisɛ kaia nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ-aa lɛŋ, nu see-aa lɛŋ in o gbaazaa-a yiitoo gu nɛ nɔ̧́-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ lɛŋ
Wa kaia oi kpoo ndai'i, ndàrá-a, mur-aa gu nɛ ɗɔr-aa nɛɛ dɔ sɛn ɗoŋ ye hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
A̧ baa vala sami-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i e er zu a̧.
Moisɛ gɔna sami'i, ɓɛɛ misi̧ tɔk-aa a ɗoŋ
A̧ a̧ka̧ sami'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ zu-a in o tɛ-a gu nɛ o nɔ̧́-a̧.
Moisɛ fɔra zaŋ-aa in o mbayo-a; a̧ dɔɔ sami'i lɛŋ
A̧ baa yiitoo vala sami tɛnɛ; sami'i nɛ wan mɛ ee tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ er wa, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i e er zu a̧.
Moisɛ gɔna sami'i, ɓɛɛ ba tɔk-aa e ndɔŋ nu zer Arɔŋ mɛ wiiko, in gbokoto er-a mɛ wiiko, ká bá nɛ̀ gbokoto naŋ-a mɛ wiiko mbɛt.
Moisɛ saa o bem ko Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ e tɔk ndɔŋ zer-wa mɛ wiiko, gbokoto er-wa mɛ wiiko, ká bá nɛ̀ gbokoto naŋ-wa mɛ wiiko mbɛt; ɓɛɛ Moisɛ misi̧ oi tɔk-aa a ɗoŋ
A̧ kaia o war nɔ̧́ kpoo-aa, dom-aa, nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ-aa lɛŋ, nu see-aa in gbaazaa-a yiitoo nɛ oi nɔ̧́-a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ ku-a mɛ wiiko.
A̧ baa gɛsɛ
Moisɛ aa mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ kɔ̧ er Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ war-a.
Moisɛ kaia mɔɔ nɔ‘i er wa woyo, ɓɛɛ dɔ zu
Moisɛ baa tote saɗi'i, ɓɛɛ wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN; war kpoo ee tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ er wi ko Moisɛ nɛ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧‘i nɛ mɔ‘i.
Moisɛ baa nɔ̧́-wan in tɔk nɛ duka fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ misi̧ a tɛ Arɔŋ in o laa kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a̧ ee nɛ Arɔŋ in o laa kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ oi laa kɔ-wa mbɛt, nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gí kpoo'i sɛn nú
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́ oi kpoo nɛ tɛ ɓɔn in oi brɛt'i mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ beka yú nú
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i dea sɔsɔɔ ga. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha'i mɛ de nɛ mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ya nú
Ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú Moisɛ.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, Moisɛ saa Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ bá be-ndai in vala sami nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-wa na, mɛ̀ ɗáfí nɛ sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Mɛ̀ dɔ́ vala sami dɔɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ee wa lɛŋ ti GASA WAN.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá wiwii-ndai in vala sami wen ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN, in ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́, wen nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɛ usi tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́.› »
Wa kaia mɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i si nú
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de, ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ‘i.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ká̧
Arɔŋ ɗɔŋa pii ká̧
O bem ko Arɔŋ ha̧a̧ tɔk ha̧ a̧; a̧ pi̧i̧ ndɔŋ nu zɔ̧ɔ̧ er-a ɗɔɔ tɔk'i sɔ̧ tɛ o zak nɛ duk fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbai oi tɔk-aa a gun
A̧ dɔɔ nɔ̧́-kpoo'i sɛn
A̧ dɔɔ oi kpoo-aa in ndàrá-a sɛn ɗoŋ ye.
A̧ gɔna saɗi nɛ‘i tɛ dɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ba tɔk-aa nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ misi̧ a ɗoŋ
Wa kaia tɛ saɗi'i n'aa tɛ dɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ in zu-a mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ wa lɛŋ sɛn
A̧ fɔra zaŋ-aa in mbayo-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ sɛn
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, a̧ ha̧a̧ o ha̧a̧mɔ ko dukbíí ha̧ Sɔ̧; a̧ baa vala gbadua ha̧a̧mɔ wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa gɔn ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee nɛ be-ndai ga.
A̧ baa kpoo-sɔ̧ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ nɛ yuwar-a.
A̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ; a̧ kaia dun er-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ sɛn
Arɔŋ gɔna wiwii-ndai in vala sami nɛ dukbíí ha̧a̧‘i nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ; o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧a̧ tɔk-aa ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ misi̧ a ɗoŋ
War de nɔ̧́-kpoo ndai in vala sami'i, dom-aa, nɔ̧́ zu zaŋ-aa, o gbaazaa-a in nu-see-aa,
wa kaia a zu tote-a, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ zu
Arɔŋ ha̧a̧ tote saɗi nɔ‘i in ku-wa mɛ wiiko, ɓɛɛ a̧ wɛk ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ baa tɔ̧ ga.
Arɔŋ nyɛi̧a er zu dukbíí, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu wa. Ɗoŋ nɛ Arɔŋ kaɗa ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, wan mɛ
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ yee kɔ̧
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma wee gɔma nɛ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in nɔ̧́-kpoo sɛn
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Nadab in Abihu, o bem ko Arɔŋ aa wee kɔ̧ be nyɛk-dɔ-fuu-nyama, ɓɛɛ a fuu-nyama zu-a ba nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN. Wee'i bo nɛ wee ko GASA WAN na, wen n'aa ha̧ so nú ha̧ wa na.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma wee gɔma nɛ tɛ GASA WAN, dɔ wa a nu, ɓɛɛ wa fe ɓɔn ti a̧.
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧‘e:
‹Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧
nɛ̀ tɛ o bíí nɛ tɛ pii tɛ‘m,
in mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí mɛ gas'am.› » Ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ duk sɛ́ɛ́m.
Moisɛ saa Misaɛl in Elisafaŋ, o bem ko Oziɛl, nɔkɔ ko Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ piiti, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wɔr nya'nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ sa̧a̧ fara si ɗoŋ ye mɛ.»
Wa tɛɛ kai o wɔr nɔ‘i nɛ oi laa kɔ-wa yaknɛ si ɗoŋ ye hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.

Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Eleazar in Itamar: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpui zu'nɛ́ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧k laa tɛ‘nɛ́ na mbɛt, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ fe in k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ dak nyimsea ko GASA WAN pi̧ zu dukbíí lɛŋ. Nɛ́ o nya'nɛ́ lɛŋ, o be
K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu nú
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ:
«Mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧, koo ŋma mɔɔ-zik-zu-wi ŋgimbi nɛa-a si kɔ̧
Nɛ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ duk nɛ ko Sɔ̧ in mɔ nɛ bo nɛ ko Sɔ̧ na, ká bá nɛ̀ ndiŋmɔ in mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧,
wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ usi o geŋa nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ha̧ o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o oi bem kɔ‘i yiitoo Eleazar in Itamar ndé: «Ɗoŋ n’ɛnɛ dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN kaɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá oi-aa nyɔŋ ká̧
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i tɛ sa̧a̧ fara wen i̧i̧ nɛ war kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ zaŋ dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ ha̧ GASA WAN; heembea nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ tote in ku saɗi nɛ‘i wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN'i, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ wa tɛ sa̧a̧ fara; mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ wiwii-a ká bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ okoo-a; i̧i̧ nɛ war kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ zaŋ o ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ko o be

Ku saɗi'i nɛ‘i ha̧ nɛ zu-mɔ in tote-a nɛ‘i wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN'i, o wi ha̧a̧-a̧ tɛ kai nɛnɛ in o nɔ̧́-a̧ nɛ‘i tɛ dɔ dɔɔ; wi tɛ wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ o kpoo nɔ‘i duka nɛ kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.»
Moisɛ aka mɔ wen vala gbadua-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e, wa dɔɔ kpoo-aa kaɗi. Ɓɛɛ see Moisɛ kur zu Eleazar in Itamar, o oi bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ ɓɔna.

Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen ge s’ɛnɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-aa tɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara na ge? Wen nɛ́ sa̧a̧ kpoo. GASA WAN ee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɔŋ kpoo'i wen ha̧ war-tɛ dukbíí mɛ sa̧ in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wa.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ba tɔk-aa si kɔ̧

Arɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ zii, wese nɛ wa wɛka nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ dɔ ha̧ GASA WAN'i, mɔ nɛ hɔɔ zu'm nɛ mɔ'ɔ. GASA WAN tɛ kpɛk ha̧‘m mɛ nyɔŋ kpoo vala gbadua wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ pɛrti wese hegɔ nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ kpɛk mɔ n'aa zia'i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ saɗi nɛ sara naŋ-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, nɛ mgbuk mɔ mgbuk.
Hegɔ, mgbara o saɗi nɛ mgbuk mɔ mgbuk in o wan nɛ sara-naŋ-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, wan n’ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: ŋgeloba, wen a̧ mgbuk mɔ mgbuk ɓɛɛ sara-naŋ-a bo na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧ hee ndiŋ saɗi ga;
kpárɛ́ nɛ mgbuk mɔ mgbuk, ɓɛɛ nɛ sara-naŋ-a bo na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧ hee ndiŋ saɗi ga;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k dɔmɔ mbɛt hee ndiŋ saɗi ga, wen a̧ mgbuk mɔ mgbuk, ɓɛɛ sara-naŋ-a bo na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgɔya hee ndiŋ saɗi ga, wen sara-naŋ-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbuk mɔ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ o pɛrti saɗi nɔ‘i na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ fo wɔr-wa nɛ er'nɛ́ na mbɛt; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk wa lɛŋ hee o ndiŋ saɗi ga.
«Mgbara o saɗi-yì lɛŋ, wan n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɔ nɛ‘i saa'e saɗi-yì lɛŋ, o saɗi ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp in o wan mɛ ɗɔɔ nana-yì lɛŋ nɛ tɛn-aa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ in wan nɛ saɗa-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ.
Ɓɛɛ o saɗi ɗɔɔ tɔp in o wan mɛ ɗɔɔ nana-yì nɛ tɛn-aa bo na in o wan nɛ saɗa-a bo na, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ wa na.
Wa tɛ duk nɛ zim k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo; ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ kpoo-wa na, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk wɔr-wa hee ndiŋmɔ ga.
O saɗi-ɗɔɔ-yì lɛŋ nɛ tɛn-aa, kóó saɗa-a bo na nɛ́ zim k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Mgbara o nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ, wan n’ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na nɛ zua, gbakaɗa, hi̧i̧-kɔ̧a̧-ga̧a̧,
fambɛɛ, o tama nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
o gba-kɔra,
o ndao, sɔrɔrɔ, nɔ̧́í̧-ba-ká̧-ŋgere, o ndio nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
gba-diri, kiaŋko, gɔ̧tɔŋ,
diri-taŋ-kɔ̧a, gɔm-zaŋ, gbaradaa,
nɔ̧́í̧-gba-dɔya, gboozawaya, nɔ̧́í̧-zambɛrɛ ká bá nɛ̀ be-sa̧i̧.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ o kokoɗo-mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ɓaa in naŋ naar na.
Ɓɛɛ o kokoɗo-mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ɓaa nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ naŋ naar n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: o wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ naŋ in o gata-naŋ wen ndɔra-a nɛ mbɔɗɔnu.
O wan n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: gba-dɔya, diŋgo in o ŋma dɔya nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ o kokoɗo-mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ɓaa in naŋ naar ɓɛɛ na.
«O saɗi nɔ‘i tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kifi ndiŋ bíí, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fo wɔr wa nɛ er, tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ ba wɔr-aa tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o saɗi nɛ sara naŋ-wa bo na, kóó nɛ mgbuk mɔ na tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ saɗi wen'nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ fo wa tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí.
Kale-a mbɛt, o saɗi lɛŋ nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ nɛ kɔ̧-er tɛ duk nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́. Wi nɛ fo wɔr wa tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ tui wɔr-wa tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ, wen o saɗi nɔ‘i nɛ ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́.
Mgbara o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nu, wan nɛ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ɗuɗu-nu, zɔya in o gba-gbɔɗɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
gbɔɗɔ, gbɔɗɔ-wee, mbui-gbɔɗɔ, mbáráwárá ká bá nɛ̀ zɔn.
Saɗi nɛ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ wen'nɛ́ mgbara o saɗi lɛŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; kóó o nde nɛ fo wɔr wa nɛ er tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.

Kà ŋma saɗi nɔ‘i fe ɓɛɛ tik zu ŋma mɔ, mɔ‘i kifa nɛ ndiŋmɔ; kóó nɛ nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ te, kóó nɛ́ laa, kóó nɛ́ ndàrá, kóó nɛ́ ŋma bufu, kóó nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ tom lɛŋ, wi tɛ fɔr a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋmɔ hɔ̧ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛka a̧ sa̧a̧.
Kà ŋma saɗi nɔ‘i fe kɔ̧ ŋma kpánà, mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ kpánà‘i lɛŋ kifa nɛ ndiŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gba kpánà‘i yinɛ.
Kà‘i a yi nɛ duka kɔ̧ kpanà‘i tɛ nyɔŋmɔ, nyɔŋmɔ‘i tɛ kifi ndiŋmɔ. Kale-a mbɛt, kà ŋma mɔɔ-nɔ nɛ duka kɔ̧ kpanà‘i, kóó nɛ ge kpánà ge, mɔ‘i kifa nɛ ndiŋmɔ.
Kà wɔr ŋma saɗi nɔ‘i tik zu ŋma tui, tui'i tɛ kifi nɛ ndiŋmɔ; kóó nɛ wee kɔ̧ lɔk, kóó nɛ sar-kusi-wee, ɛnɛ tɛ gbin yinɛ wen wa kifa ndiŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk wa hee ndiŋmɔ ga.
War ko kpút-kpút in gɔna-yì duk kana nɛ de yì, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ fo wɔr saɗi nɛ tika ɗɔɔ yì‘i a̧ duk nɛ́ ndiŋ bíí.
Kà ŋma wɔr saɗi nɔ‘i tik zu ŋma kpar-nyɔnɔ, kpar-nyɔnɔ‘i tɛ ɓɔn nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ kà‘i nɛ aa yì zu kpar-mɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wɔr ŋma saɗi nɔ‘i tika zu a̧, kpar-mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ.
«Kóó nɛ ŋma saɗi-nyɔŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ fea, wi nɛ tɛ fo wɔr saɗi'i tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà ŋma bíí nyɔŋ kpoo wɔr saɗi'i, kóó kà a̧ tui mbɛt, a̧ tɛ fɔr laa kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
«O saɗi nɛ̀ gbur zaŋ nɛ̀ nu lɛŋ nɛ́ zim k’ɛ́nɛ́, wi nyɔŋ wa na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ̀ nu na, wan nɛ̀ gbur zaŋ nɛ̀ nu in o wan nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ naŋ naar, kóó gan mbɛt, nɛ́ zim k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ o saɗi nɔ‘i na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hee wa ga, kóó wen zu wa.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí war-tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧ bíí hee mi ga. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ̀ nu, e nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ ndiŋ na;
wen mi nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ kaia'nɛ́ gbonɛ nú Egiptɛ, ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ tɛ duk kana nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ wen mi ɔ sa̧a̧.»
Usamɔ zu o saɗi, o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi-ɗɔɔ-yì lɛŋ ká bá nɛ̀ wan mɛ zan nɛ mɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ usamɔ‘i a̧ de ha'i mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara ndiŋmɔ in mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ha'i mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara saɗi nɛ‘i tɛ nyɔŋ in o wan nɛ‘i beka nyɔŋ na.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gɔna mbii ko bem’ɛi.
Ɓɛɛ naa-wan-bem tɛ duk tɛ zima mɔ zɛ ɓu-taar-zua-taar woyo sɛka a̧ zuia yì oi tɔk-bea. A̧ beka fo ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧ na, kóó yee kɔ̧

«Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ koo nɛ be-okoo, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ ndiŋ bíí zaŋ alat yiitoo hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka nɛnɛ ŋgimbi zɔka zɛ ga; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, naa-wan-bem'i tɛ duk tɛ zɛma mɔ zaŋ zɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, sɛka a̧ zuia yì oi bea.
«Kà ŋgimbi zuia yi kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧ kaɗa ɗoŋ n'aa koo nɛ be-wiwii kóó nɛ be-okoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ ba sami nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ kpɔk in gbaku̧i̧, kóó pola nɛnɛ e nú
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ dee do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu kóò‘i kaɗi, tɛ kóò‘i sa̧a̧ oi tɔk-bea nɛ gboo a̧‘i.» Usamɔ zu okoo nɛ ko be-wiwii kóó be-okoo nɛ mɔ‘i.
«Kà kóó‘i nɛ kpaa
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ndé:
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ zɔka gbayamɔ a̧a̧ tɛ ŋma bíí, kóó lalamzi, kóó nɛ yiŋgamɔ a̧ duk tɛ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ kà nɛ́ kifa ŋma zɛɛ hee doko ga, ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ wi’ɛi sitɛ Arɔŋ, kóó sitɛ ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ kpɔk.

Ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kii mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ wi’ɛi. Kà wa nɛ́ zɔka yí mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ wi’ɛi fɛŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ yí da̧i̧-a̧ ɗuka, mɔ‘i nɛ́ ku̧u̧naŋ doko. Ɗoŋ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔka kaɗi, a̧ a̧ sa wi’ɛi nɛ́ ndiŋ bíí.
Kà tɛ wi’ɛi nɛ yiŋga fɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kà da̧i̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka na, in kà buma tɛ-a fara'i nɛ fɛŋa na, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi ŋma fara nɛtɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk tɛ wi’ɛi woyo; ɓɛɛ kà yí mɔ‘i nɛ pɛsa siti na, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi ŋma fara nɛtɛ, tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo.

Ɗoŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk a̧ woyo. Kà mɔ nɛ̀ yiŋga tɛ wi’ɛi nɛ́ tu̧a, nɛ nyɔŋ ndara tɛ-a siti na, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e a̧ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, nɛ́ lalamzi a̧ dee a̧; hegɔ wi’ɛi tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔka a̧ mɛ tɔ̧‘e, tɛ-a duka nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ kà lalamzi pɛsi tɛ wi’ɛi siti, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk wi’ɛi woyo.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk a̧; ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ lalamzi pɛsa tɛ-a siti ga, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e nɛ ndiŋ bíí, nɛ zɛɛ doko.
«Kà ŋma zɛɛ hee doko ga ba ŋma bíí, wa tɛ mgbɔ wi’ɛi nɛnɛ sitɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk a̧, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ zɔka'e, mɔ nɛ gbaia tɛ wi’ɛi dee ha̧ ndàrà tɛ-a mɛ fɛŋ kifi duk nɛ bu-a gu nɛ buma tɛ-a, kà‘i nɛ zɔka gbɛ̧ mur tɛ-a kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zɛɛ doko a̧ yee tɛ-a; hegɔ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí; a̧ beka e a̧ ŋma fara nɛtɛ ɓɔna, wen zɛɛ usa tɛ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ kaɗi.
Kà doko'i nɛ́ kpee tɛ wi’ɛi lɛŋ nɛ‘i zɔk woi tɛ-a na, ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ zu-a hɔ naŋ-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk ga,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk wi’ɛi; ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zɛɛ doko kpee tɛ-a lɛŋ ga, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ-a lɛŋ fɛŋa kaɗi ga, a̧ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Wese nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk gbɛ̧ mur-tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mur-tɛ-a'i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí. Gbɛ̧ mur-tɛ-wi nɛ duk nɛ zan nɛ ndiŋmɔ, mɔ‘i nɛ zɛɛ doko.
Kà gbɛ̧ mur-tɛ-wi nɛ fɛŋa woyo, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk tɛ-a; ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yí-da̧i̧‘i fɛŋa ga, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, zɛɛ‘i bo nɛ zɛɛ doko ɓɔna, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
«Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ kore a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ oi da̧i̧-a̧ wia,
ɓɛɛ kà ndɔla oi kore'i sui nɛ bu-a, kóó hɔɔ nɛ sayo nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ yerere, wi’ɛi tɛ nɛ tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk tɛ wi’ɛi.
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔk tɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ kà suyamɔ‘i de mɛ ɗuk, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ buma tɛ-a fɛŋa fara'i, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí; mɔ‘i nɛ zɛɛ doko a̧ ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ kore.
Ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔk ŋma buma tɛ-a fɛŋ na, in kà yí-da̧i̧ nɛ́ ɗuka siti na, kà nɛ́ ku̧u̧ naŋ wia-a, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi tɛ ŋma fara nɛtɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kà yí-da̧i̧ nɛ́ gɔna siti, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e wi’ɛi nɛ ndiŋ bíí, nɛ́ ŋma zɛɛ.
Kà suyamɔ‘i nɛ ɓɔna oi-aa, ɓɛɛ kà gasi siti na, nɛ́ ndɔla kore; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e tɛ-wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
«Kà wee a̧ dɔɔ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ kà oi fara nɛ̀ hɔa'i duk nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ kóó nɛ bu-a,

wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk tɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ zɔk buma te-a nɛ̀ kɛra ndɔla da̧i̧-wee'i fɛŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yí mɔ‘i ɗuk ɗuk mbɛt, mɔ‘i usi nɛ́ zɛɛ doko a̧ ku̧naŋ nɛ yí-da̧i̧-wee; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi’ɛi nɛ ndiŋ bíí; mɔ‘i nɛ ŋma zɛɛ hee doko ga.
Ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ zɔka buma tɛ-wi’ɛi fɛŋ fara'i na, kóó kà da̧i̧‘i nɛ́ ɗuka siti na, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ wia-a, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi ŋma fara nɛtɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk a̧, ɓɛɛ kà yí-da̧i̧‘i̧ nɛ́ gɔna siti, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi’ɛi nɛ ndiŋ bíí; mɔ‘i nɛ ŋma zɛɛ hee doko ga.
Kà fara wee nɛ hɔa'i nɛ ɓɔna nɛ oi-aa, kà gɔn siti na, kà nɛ́ wia, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ndɔla-wee; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, mɔ‘i nɛ ndɔla-wee.
«Kà mɔ de ŋma wiwii, kóó ŋma okoo tɛ zu, kóó tɛ yaŋgo,

wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk fara nyimmɔ‘i; kà fara'i nɛ dee mɛ ɗuk, kà buma tɛ-a nɛ́ gbɛ̧a̧, kà buma fara'i duk kpɔk kpɔk, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e wi’ɛi nɛ ndiŋ bíí; mɔ‘i nɛ laaloo, nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧‘e, doko-zu, kóó doko-nyaŋgo.
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ zɔka laaloo'i, ɓɛɛ kà nɛ́ nyɔŋa siti na, kà buma zu-a nɛ́ duka nɛ̀ tu̧-a̧ na, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi nɛ laaloo dea'i ŋma fara nɛtɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk nyimmɔ‘i woyo; kà laaloo nɛ́ nyɔŋa siti na, ɓɛɛ kà buma fara'i nɛ́ gbɛ̧ɛ̧ na, in kà laaloo'i nɛ́ nyɔŋa ndàrá tɛ-a ɗuk na,
wi’ɛi tɛ kpui zu, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka kpui zu fara laaloo'i na; hegɔ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e wi’ɛi ŋma fara nɛtɛ woyo tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk laaloo'i woyo; kà laaloo'i nɛ́ nyɔŋa siti ɗuk nɛnɛ na, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧; ɗoŋ nɛ wi’ɛi fɔra laa kɔ‘i kaɗi, tɛ-a duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɔ̧‘e, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ sɛka laaloo'i tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɔŋ a̧ siti,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk a̧ woyo. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ laaloo nyɔŋa siti ga, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ beka kii mɛ zɔk gbɛ̧ buma tɛ-a ɓɔna; wi’ɛi nɛ ndiŋ bíí.
Kà laaloo nɛ́ nyɔŋa siti na, ɓɛɛ kà buma tɛ-a hɔ sɛnɛ nɛ tu̧-a̧, laaloo'i kaɗa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
«Kà ŋma mɔ nɛ gbaia tɛ wiwii, kóó tɛ ŋma okoo nɛ bu-a,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk wi’ɛi: kà o gbayamɔ nɔ‘i tɛ-wa'i nɛ́ duka nɛ̀ bu-a fata-futu, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ gee mɔ a̧ aa tɛ-wa; tɛ o wi nɔ‘i duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
«Kà zu ŋma bíí nɛ́ zuɗa, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ gee er-wara, bo nɛ ŋma zɛɛ na, tɛ wi’ɛi duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Kà zu ŋma bíí nɛ́ zuɗa nɛ war sɔnti, sɔnti-a duk gee, i̧i̧ bo nɛ zɛɛ na, tɛ-a duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma mɔ nɛ́ gbaia nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ bɛɗɛ zu-a, kóó sɔnti-a, nɛ́ doko a̧ gbaia zu-a kóó sɔnti-a'i.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ kà gbayamɔ sɔnti-a'i nɛ́ fɛŋa gbɛ̧ hee doko ga,
wi’ɛi nɛ wi-doko, a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e a̧ nɛ bíí ndiŋ bíí nɛ̀ zɛɛ baa zu-a.
Wi-doko tɛ pi̧ nɛ a̧ka̧ laa, ɓɛɛ a̧ hiɗa mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ndiŋ bíí, ndiŋ bíí!›
A̧ tɛ duk kànà nɛ ndiŋ bíí ŋgimbi nɛ zɛɛ doko'i ɓɔna tɛ-a. A̧ tɛ o kɔ̧-a̧ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ fara kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk si ɗoŋ ye mɛ.»
«Kà mɔka laa, koo yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, laa-ulu, ndárà, kóó mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i fura nɛ ndàrá do ɓuki,
kà ŋma mbui-mɔ kóó gbɛ̧-mɔ ba tɛ laa kóó tɛ ndàrá, koo tɛ mɔka laa, kóó tɛ laa-ulu, kóó tɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɓuki, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk o mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ ɓuki doo sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee mɔ‘i ŋma fara nɛtɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, a̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ baa tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Kà mɔ‘i nɛ́ pɛsa siti tɛ mɔka laa, kóó tɛ laa-ulu, kóó tɛ ndàrá, kóó tɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, mɔ‘i nɛ ɓuki, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ ɓuki doo sɛnɛ‘i nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ.
Hegɔ wi tɛ dɔ mɔka laa, laa-ulu, kóó yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, kóó mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá nɛ ɓuki doo sɛnɛ‘i. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɓuki nɛ do doo siti ga, wi tɛ dɔ kànà mɔ‘i nɛ ɓuki doo sɛnɛ‘i.
«Ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔk'e mɔ nɛ aa tɛ mɔka laa, kóó tɛ laa-ulu, kóó tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, pɛsi siti na,
a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ fɔr mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee ŋma fara nɛtɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo.
Ɗoŋ fɔra mɔ‘i, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk, kà mɔ‘i kpai na, kóó kà pɛsi siti na mbɛt, mɔ nɛ ɓuki doo sɛnɛ‘i nɛ ndiŋmɔ. Mɛ tɛ dɔ a̧ wen nɛ́ laa nɛ̀ mɔ nyɔŋa nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, kóó nɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Ɗoŋ fɔra mɔ, kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔk'e, mɔ nɛ aa tɛ laa, kóó tɛ ndàrá, kóó tɛ mɔka laa, koo tɛ laa-ulu'i nɛ́ fɛŋa, a̧ tɛ a̧k mɔ‘i yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma mɔ a tɛ laa'i woyo, kóó tɛ mɔka laa, kóó tɛ laa-ulu, kóó tɛ mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, mɔ‘i nɛ ɓuki a̧ do siti; mɛ tɛ dɔ mɔ‘i a nu.
Ɓɛɛ laa'i, mɔka laa, laa-ulu, kóó mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, kà‘i fɔr o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ ndiŋ mɔ‘i mɛ yu sɛnɛ kaɗi, wi tɛ fɔr woyo, ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.»
O usamɔ wen ɓuki nɛ do tɛ mɔka laa, kóó tɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, kóó tɛ laa-ulu, kóó tɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ de ha'i mɛ iŋ mgbara ndiŋmɔ, in mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Yuwar
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mgbɔɔ wi’ɛi si ɗoŋ ye mɛ zɔk a̧; kà zɛɛ doko nɛ́ kaɗa tɛ wi’ɛi kaɗi,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ kai nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ duk kpasa, nɛ tɛ-wa duk nɛ de-a tɛnɛ yiitoo in te
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn kuti nɔi'i zu kpánà nɛ de gɛɗa-yì a̧a̧ kɔ̧ a̧.
A̧ tɛ ba nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ duk kpasa in te
A̧ tɛ misi̧ yì‘i a tɛ wi-doko war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, tɛ-a duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧; ɓɛɛ a̧ ee ha̧ nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ duk kpasa'i mɛ bu̧i̧ yaknɛ si zaŋbɛɛ.
Wi nɛ zui tɛ-wi’ɛi tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, kpuia buma tɛ lɛŋ, nɛɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ saaye, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka ɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ na tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi’ɛi tɛ kpui o buma tɛ a nu lɛŋ woyo: mui-zu, zera in buma zu yí-a. Mɛ ɗoŋ, a̧ tɛ fɔr o laa tɛ-a, a̧ tɛ zui yì mbɛt, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧.
«Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, wi’ɛi tɛ kai
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba kuti
A̧ tɛ gɔn
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba tɔk saɗi ɗafa-mgbara-ŋmaa in Sɔ̧ e ndɔŋ nú-zer wi nɛ tɛɛ mɛ
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba reeta litrɛ nɔ̧́ tɛn tikiɗi a kɔ̧ er mɛ gale.
A̧ tɛ pi̧ hɔ-ɗoŋ gbokoto er-a mɛ wiiko ɗɔɔ nɔ̧́ nɛ duk kɔ̧ er-a mɛ gale'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ misa̧ ti GASA WAN war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ sɔ̧ oi nɔ̧́ nɛ ɓɔna er-a'i ndɔŋ zer wi nɛ tɛɛ mɛ
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ sɔ̧ oi nɔ̧́ nɛ ɓɔna kɔ̧ er'i zu wi nɛ
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn kpoo ha̧a̧mɔ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wi nɛ
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kai kpoo-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ si
«Kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wisan nɛ nyɛm mɛ kpa mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ na, a̧ tɛ ba nɛ
ká bá nɛ̀ gbakui yiitoo, kóó pola yiitoo, mɔ n'aa nyɛma mɛ kpa lɛŋ. Ŋma kpɔk tɛ duk wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa duka wen dɔa-a.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, a̧ tɛ kai wa nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn nu
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba
A̧ tɛ gɔn
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɛn be nɔ̧́ a kɔ̧ er mɛ gale;
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧i̧ hɔ-ɗoŋ gbokoto-er-a mɛ wiiko ɗɔɔ nɔ̧́‘i misi̧ nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e ŋma nɔ̧́ nɛ duk kɔ̧ er'i ndɔŋ nú-zer wi nɛ tɛɛ mɛ
