Ɓɛɛ a̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ oi nɔ̧́ nɛ ɓɔna kɔ̧ er-a zu wi nɛ tɛɛ mɛ ɗafi war-tɛ‘i de nɛ do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu a̧ ti GASA WAN.
Kóó wi’ɛi baa so nɛ gbaku̧i̧ tɛnɛ, kóó pola, de ŋma mɔ na;
a̧ tɛ ba ŋma nɔ̧́í̧ kpɔk n'aa kpaa'i ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ dɔɔ ɓii-aa nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dee do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wi nɛ tɛɛ mɛ
Usamɔ zu wi-doko nɛ nyɛm mɛ kpa mɔ mɛ ha̧ wen ha̧ war-tɛ-a mɛ sa̧ na nɛ mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ye nɛ̀ nú Kanaŋ n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ kà‘m de ha̧ ŋma tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ do ɓuki,
wan-tua tɛ nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘e: ‹Duk hee tua kɔ‘m doo ɓuki ga.›

Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kai mɔɔ kɔ̧ tua gbonɛ sɛka a̧ nɛɛ mɛ ye tua mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ aa sɛnɛ‘i; hegɔ, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧ tua'i ya kɔ‘i nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Wa tɛ kai mɔɔ nɔ‘i gbonɛ kaɗi sɛka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yee tua mɛ zɔk.
A̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ aa tɛ tua'i; kà mɔ‘i nɛ́ dee be kɔ̧ nɛ mbui-a kóó nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ tɛ ŋgeŋ,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gbo kɔ̧ tua'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpee nu tua ha̧ mɛ duk hegɔ gee tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ zɔk mɔ‘i woyo; kà mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɗuka siti zaŋ ŋgeŋ tua,
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kai o ta nɛ̀ mɔ aa sɛnɛ‘i a zuku-paa ɗoŋ ye mɛ.
A̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛr yiŋgamɔ zaŋ ŋgeŋ kɔ̧ tua'i lɛŋ yinɛ a zuku-paa ɗoŋ ye mɛ mbɛt.
Wi tɛ kai o mbe ta kpai nɛ o kuti-a'i, ɓɛɛ wi kaia mbe nu dikiri nɛ tua.
«Kà yiŋgamɔ‘i nɛ́ ndaɗa o ŋma ta ɗoŋ nɛ‘i hu̧i̧a̧ kuti ta yinɛ gbɛr nɛ zaŋ ŋgeŋ yɔk nɛ ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛɛ zɔk tua'i woyo. Kà yiŋgamɔ pɛsi siti tɛ tua'i, tua'i do nɛ ɓuki, ɓɛɛ tua'i nɛ́ ndiŋ tua.
Hegɔ‘i wi tɛ gbin tua'i in o ta, o te ká bá nɛ̀ ŋgeŋ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wi kaia a zuku-paa si ɗoŋ ye mɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧ tua'i tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ‘i kpee nɛnɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi nɛ tɛ ɔ nu, kóó nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kɔ̧ tua'i tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i.
«Ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ ye tua, zɔk mɔ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa zɔka'e yiŋgamɔ zaŋ ŋgeŋ‘i pɛsi siti ɗoŋ dikira tua'i na, a̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, tua ɔ sa̧a̧ wen doo-ɓuki-mɔ‘i kaɗa kaɗi.
Hegɔ a̧ tɛ kai nɔ̧́í̧ yiitoo, te
A̧ tɛ gɔn kuti nɔ̧́í̧ zu kpánà nɛ de gɛɗa-yì a̧a̧ kɔ̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ baa te
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a̧ tɛ fɔr nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ tɛ tua nɛ tɔk nɔ́í̧, nɛ de gɛɗa-yì, nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ duk kpasa, te
A̧ tɛ e nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ duk kpasa mɛ bu̧i̧ yaknɛ si zaŋbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu tua'i; hegɔ‘i, war-tua'i sa̧a̧.»
Usamɔ zu pɛrti zɛɛ doko lɛŋ, laaloo,
doo ɓuki laa kóó doo ɓuti tua,
suyamɔ, lalamzi in yiŋgamɔ nɛ mɔ‘i.
O usamɔ nɔ‘i kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara ndiŋmɔ in mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Usamɔ zu zɛɛ doko nɛ mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Mɔ nɛ tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí tɛ foka-mɔ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: kóó mɔ foka nɛ ti-a, kóó sɔma nɛ war ti-a mbɛt.
Gado n'aa ɔɔ sɛnɛ in mɔ n'aa duka nɛnɛ lɛŋ nɛ ndiŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fo gado'i tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi nɛ tɛ duk zu mɔ nɛ wi-zɛɛ‘i duka nɛnɛ tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi nɛ tɛ fo tɛ wi-zɛɛ‘i tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà wi-zɛɛ‘i a̧ sap tɛ ŋma bíí nɛ war-tɛ-a duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, wi’ɛi tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kirki lɛŋ nɛ wi’ɛi tɛ duk zu a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ.
Kóó o nde nɛ tɛ fo ŋma mɔ nɛ wi-zɛɛ‘i duka zu-a tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ ba mɔ‘i tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i mbɛt, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà wi-zɛɛ‘i tai er na fo nɛ ŋma bíí, wi’ɛi tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà wi-zɛɛ‘i fo ŋma kpánà, wi tɛ gba kpánà‘i a nu, ɓɛɛ kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ kpongo, wi tɛ fɔr kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ yì.
«Kà zɛɛ-horso a kaɗa tɛ wi’ɛi, a̧ tɛ tɔr zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo sɛka war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧: a̧ tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ tɛ zui yi ɗɔɔ de gɛɗa-yì, ɓɛɛ tɛ-a sa̧a̧.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, wi’ɛi tɛ kai gbaku̧i̧ yiitoo, kóó pola yiitoo nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn nú
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ŋma pola kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ dɔɔ ɓii-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee do-mɔ zu wi’ɛi mɛ usi kaɗa zɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ti GASA WAN.
«Kà ti ŋma bíí nɛ foka, a̧ tɛ zui yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi tɛ fɔr o laa in mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndàrá lɛŋ nɛ yi mɔ‘i aa sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà ŋma okoo nɛ́ ɔɔ in ŋma wiwii, kóó o nde tɛ nɛɛ zui yi, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
«Kà ŋma okoo nɛ́ zɔka zɛ, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ okoo tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fo a̧ lɛŋ, tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Mɔ n'aa ɔɔ nɛnɛ in mɔ n'aa duka nɛnɛ lɛŋ ŋgimbi'i tɛ duk nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ.
Kóó o nde nɛ tɛ fo gado kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kóó o nde nɛ fo ŋma mɔ n'aa duka nɛnɛ tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, zuia yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ̧ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà ŋma mɔ duk gɔn gado kɔ̧-a̧, kóó zu ŋma mɔ n'aa duka sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ kà‘i fo mɔ‘i, wi tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà wiwii ɔ in kóò‘i nɛ oi zɔka-zɛ, ndiŋ ko kóò‘i tɛ ye tɛ-a, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ gado lɛŋ nɛ wi’ɛi tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ.

«Kà tɔk gbo ŋma okoo nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ŋgimbi zɔka-zɛ kɔ̧-a̧ na, kóó kà a̧ zɔk zɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ gan wan n'aa zɔk nɛti, a̧ tɛ duk kànà ndiŋ bíí, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ tɔk'i tɛ gɔn; a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí ŋgimbi'i hee ŋgimbi n'aa zɔk nɛ̀ zɛ ga.
Gado n'aa ɔ sɛnɛ in mɔ n'aa duk sɛnɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ ndiŋmɔ hee ŋgimbi n'aa zɔk nɛ zɛ ga.
Kóó o nde nɛ tɛ fo o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ er tɛ fɔr laa kɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kà nyim-tɛ ko kóò‘i nɛ́ gɔna, a̧ tɛ duk zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, kóò‘i tɛ kai gbaku̧i yiitoo, kóó pola yiitoo nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn nú

«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ŋma nɔ̧́í̧ kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔɔ ɓii-aa dɔɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧; wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ de do-mɔ zu kóò‘i ti GASA WAN mɛ usi'e, nyim-tɛ nɛ dee so ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí gɔna kaɗi.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Usamɔ zu wi nɛ baa horso, wi nɛ ti fok, ɓɛɛ ee a̧ tɛ ndiŋ,
okoo nɛ zɔk zɛ, wiwii, kóó okoo nɛ nyimi to a̧, kóó wiwii nɛ ɔ in okoo nɛ oi zɔka-zɛ nɛ mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Moisɛ ɗoŋ fio ko o bem ko Arɔŋ yiitoo nɛ fee so tɛ ɗaŋ yuwar-ɗafa GASA WAN.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ nya-mɛ Arɔŋ‘e, ká a̧ ye kɔ̧
Mɔ nɛ Arɔŋ tɛ kai ye nɛnɛ kɔ̧
«A̧ tɛ pi̧ be laa mɛ ŋgɔn in laa mɛ ɗɔɔ, a̧ tɛ hɛr zaŋ-aa nɛ kanda, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛra mɛtɛwol zu-a; mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ o laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧ laa. A̧ tɛ zui yì kaɗi sɛka a̧ aa wa.
«Ɓɛɛ o be
Arɔŋ tɛ ha̧ daŋa wiwii ndai nɛ mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu a̧ nɛ tɛ-a in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ kai o vala gbadua yiitoo'i e nú
Arɔŋ tɛ pi̧ tani zu o vala gbadua nɔ‘i yiitoo'i: kpɔk tɛ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa duka nɛ ko Azazɛl.
Arɔŋ tɛ ba vala gbadua nɛ tani baa ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN'i ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
A̧ tɛ e ɓii vala gbadua nɛ tani baa mɛ duk nɛ ko Azazɛl'i nɛ kpasa ti GASA WAN; a̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ foo a̧ yaknɛ si ŋga-gbárà mɛ ha̧ Azazɛl.
«Arɔŋ tɛ ha̧ daŋa wiwii ndai wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i; a̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu a̧ nɛ tɛ-a in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔna ndai'i ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
A̧ tɛ aŋ wee nɛ duk
A̧ tɛ dɔ fuu nyama ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ zi-wee-aa kpee zu gu-zu-nu
«A̧ tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nu zɔ̧ɔ̧ er-a ɗɔɔ tɔk daŋa wiwii ndai'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ misa̧ a gu-zu-nu
«Mɛ ɗoŋ a̧ tɛ gɔn vala gbadua
A̧ tɛ de do-mɔ ɗafi nɛ war-tɛ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ Arɔŋ tɛ ye nɛ kɔ̧
A̧ tɛ gbo si
A̧ tɛ misi̧ tɔk nɛ ndɔŋ nu-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er-a war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a
«Ɗoŋ n'aa kaɗa dea do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu
Arɔŋ tɛ gu er yiitoo zu vala gbadua'i gbar nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ ko o be
Vala gbadua'i tɛ kai ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ yak nɛnɛ si ŋga-gbárà.
«Kà Arɔŋ nɛ́ foo vala gbadua'i si ŋga-gbárà kaɗi,
a̧ tɛ nɛ si kɔ̧
A̧ tɛ zui yì tɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧i̧ o laa kɔ̧-a̧ gbo nɛnɛ wen dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in ko dukbíí; a̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu a̧ nɛ tɛ-a, in zu dukbíí.
A̧ tɛ dɔ de nɔ kpoo saɗi zu fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi nɛ gbura vala gbadua ha̧ Azazɛl tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, zuia yì, sɛka a̧ yee saaye.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko daŋa wiwii ndai in vala gbadua nɛ‘i ɗafa nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ kà‘i bá tɔk-aa si kɔ̧
Wi nɛ tɛ dɔ mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, zuia yi, sɛka a̧ yee saaye.»
«Mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ heembea n’ɛnɛ tɛ kasi kpoo nɛ kpoo; zɛ ɓu tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, ɛnɛ lɛŋ gu nɛ o gɔni-duk mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ zim yì wese'i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka fo tom nɛ er'nɛ́ na.
Nɛ́ wese'i a̧ wa tɛ de nɛ do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu'nɛ́ ha̧ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ sa̧. Hegɔ, ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ yua, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ ti GASA WAN.
Wese'i nɛ́ wese Sabat, wese-ɔm-tɛ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zim nɛ yì. Mɔ‘i nɛ heembea n’ɛnɛ tɛ kasi kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wi nɛ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ duk nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a, e nɛ a̧ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ o de yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧,
wen dee do-mɔ nɛ usi
Wese de do-mɔ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ ko o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Arɔŋ, ha̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in ha̧ o be
kà ŋma be
kà a̧ nɛ́ baa saɗi'i si nú
Hegɔ, o be
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ misi̧ tɔk saɗi nɔ‘i a
Hegɔ, o be
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mbɛt'e: kà ŋma be
kà a̧ nɛ́ baa mɔ-a nɛnɛ si nú
«Kà ŋma be
Wen duka-kpasa ko mɔ lɛŋ duk sɛn tɛ tɔk; ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi ee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbai tɔk a zu
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
«Kà ŋma bíí, kóó nɛ́ be
wen duka-kpasa ko mɔ lɛŋ duk sɛn tɛ tɔk. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
«Kóó nɛ be-nu, kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ nyɔŋ wɔr saɗi, kóó ŋma saɗi nɛ ŋma mɔ baa, wi’ɛi tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ zuia yì; a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ, sɛka tɛ-a sa̧a̧.
Ɓɛɛ kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ fɔra o laa kɔ‘i na in kà a̧ nɛ́ zuia yì na mbɛt, ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik zu a̧.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ duka so nɛnɛ Egiptɛ ga na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hee o be nu Kanaŋ n'am tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i ga na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ-wa na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ɗoŋ yuwar duka-a n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea kɔ‘m. Nɛ́ mi, GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ‘m in yuwar duka-a n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ́ tɛ kasa o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kpasi nɛnɛ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Ká ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ pi̧ naŋ zu nam kɔ‘i na. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu nàà kɔ-mɛ na, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ pi̧ búù zu dáà kɔ-mɛ. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ a̧ nɛ naa kɔ-mɛ ga, kà mɛ de hegɔ, mɛ pi̧i̧ buu zu a̧.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu ŋma kóò ko dáà kɔ-mɛ na; kà mɛ de hegɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ pi̧i̧ búù zu dáà kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu boko-nya-mɛ kɔ-mɛ na, kóó nɛ́ ŋma boko-nya-mɛ nɛ dáà nɛtɛ nɛtɛ na, kóó wa kòó a̧ kɔ̧ kira ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ zan mbɛt.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu be-koo-mɛ na, kóó nɛ bem ko be-wiwii, kóó nɛ bem ko be-okoo; kà mɛ de hegɔ, mɛ pi̧i̧ búù zu mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu boko-bem ko gɔya nàà kɔ-mɛ na; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ a̧ gboo nɛ tɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ ga, a̧ nɛ boko-nya-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu sembaa kɔ-mɛ na, wen a̧ nɛ kiitɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu o nya nàà kɔ-mɛ na, wen wa nɛ kiitɛ nàà kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu kóò ko nya dáà kɔ-mɛ na, ká mɛ tɛɛ pi̧ búù zu nya ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, wen kóò‘i nɛ ŋma nàà kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu be-for-mɛ mɛ kóò na, wen a̧ nɛ kóò ko bem kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ pi̧ naŋ zu kóò ko nya-mɛ na, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ pi̧ búù zu nya-mɛ.

Ká mɛ ɔ in ŋma okoo, ɓɛɛ sɛka mɛ tɛɛ ɔ in be-okoo kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt na; ká mɛ ɔ in be-koo-aa na mbɛt, kóó nɛ boko-bem ko bui-bem kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ be-koo boko-bem kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen wa lɛŋ nɛ kiitɛ-a. Deemɔ hegɔ nɛ ndiŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ ba nya-kóò kɔ-mɛ nɛ kóò, ŋgimbi nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ biti duk kpasa na, wen ká wa tɛɛ de gɔya.
«Ká mɛ ɔ in okoo ŋgimbi zɔka-zɛ kɔ̧-a̧ na; wen ŋgimbi'i, a̧ nɛ ndiŋ bíí.
Ká mɛ ɔ in gɔni kóò ko ŋma mɛ na, wen mɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋa war-tɛ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ ba bem kɔ-mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ Mɔlɛk na, wen ká mɛ ɗaŋ nin Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
Ká mɛ ɔ in ŋma-mɛ wiwii hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɔ nɛnɛ in okoo’ɛ ga na, wen mɔ‘i nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ ɔ in saɗi na, wen mɔ‘i tɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-mɛ, in ká ŋma okoo ba ŋma saɗi ɔ nɛnɛ na, wen mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɗaŋa war-tɛ.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ndiŋ pi̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ hegɔ na, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ɗaŋa war duka-a hegɔ‘i a̧ o tugun bíí n'am ndak yinɛ ti'nɛ́ dea ɗaŋ nɛ̀ war-tɛ-wa.
Ɗaŋ deemɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i dee ndiŋ pi̧ tɛ nù kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ mi GASA WAN de ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu nù‘i ndak nɛ o bíí lɛŋ a taŋ.
War k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea in yuwar duka-a n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma ndiŋmɔ nɔ‘i na, ɛnɛ o be-nu, kóó o gɔni-duk nɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ mbɛt.
Wen o bíí nɛ yaa so tɛ nù‘i dee o ndiŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nù ɗaŋ.
Hegɔ, mi beka ndak'nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ nù‘i hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ndaka nɛ o kuti bíí nɛ yaa so hi̧i̧ ti h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga na.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ de pɛrti mɔ hegɔ, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kasi o ɗaŋ heembea ko o bíí nɛ yaa so ti h’ɛ́nɛ́ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ dee o pɛrti mɔɔ nɔ‘i na. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Kóó o nde a̧ yu nàà kɔ‘i in dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wese-ɔm-tɛ kɔ‘m. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ndak ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dui o géé-sɔ̧ na mbɛt. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ gɔna ŋma saɗi nɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ war-a ha̧‘m mɛ kpɛk.
Wi tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-sɔ̧‘i kale wese'i, kóó mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ oi-aa nɛ tɛ ɓɔn hɔ sa̧a̧mɔ oi-aa, wi tɛ dɔ yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kà‘i nyɔŋ kpoo'i tɛ taar zɛ, kpoo'i mbɔra kaɗi, Sɔ̧ beka kpɛk mɔ‘i na.
Wi nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo'i, ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik zu a̧, wen a̧ fɛŋa mɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ fo wi’ɛi yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
«Ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔi̧ hɔ mgbii fɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔr oi-aa nɛ mbɔɗɔnu na mbɛt.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓi oi waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ɓɔna kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔr wan nɛ aia a nu na mbɛt; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ e i̧i̧ nɔ‘i ha̧ o wisan in ha̧ o gɛnɛ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ zu̧ mɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ndela na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔr o ŋma'nɛ na mbɛt.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kan mɔ nɛ ndela nɛ nin-am na, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ ɗaŋ nin Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Ká mɛ́ ɔr ŋma-mɛ kai nɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na, in ká mɛ́ zu̧ a̧ na; ká mɛ́ kasi mɔɔ-oi-tom ko wi-de-tom ɓɔn er-mɛ hɔ mɔɔsa̧ mɛ tutuyɛ na.
Ká mɛ́ da̧ wi-mgbee-zer na, ká mɛ́ e mɔ ti wi-boma-yí mɛ kɔ̧ naŋ na; nɛ́ hegɔ à̧ mɛ tɛ yu nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Mɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu o bíí nɛ yuwar-a: ká mɛ́ ye ɗoŋ wisan na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ ye ɗoŋ wanmbɔi na mbɛt; mɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu ŋma-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ká mɛ́ kai ndaa ŋma nam kɔ-mɛ na, ká mɛ́ e ɗɔra tɛ ŋma-mɛ ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ a̧ na mbɛt. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Ká mɛ́ kasi sɛnmɔ in nya-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧ gai nɛ a̧, ká ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛɛ tik zu mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ ŋma-mɛ na, in ká mɛ́ kasi sɛnmɔ in a̧ na; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ nɛ ŋma-mɛ hee kiitɛ-mɛ ga. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea kɔ‘m: ‹Ká mɛ́ de ha̧ o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ zuduk-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mɛ daŋ ŋmaa na. Ká mɛ́ gun kpar nyɔnɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-mɛ na. Ká mɛ́ pi̧ laa nɛ zɔ̧-a̧ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ na.›

«Kà ŋma bíí ɔ in ŋma okoo-bara, kà kóò‘i nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ kóò ko ŋma bíí nɛ̀ hara, ɓɛɛ n'aa tɛ gɔn zu-a na, in n'aa tɛ gbo a̧ tɛ bara na, wi’ɛi tɛ yoɓi mɔ; wa beka gbɛ wa na, wen bo nɛ koo'i kpaa so zu hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Wi’ɛi tɛ ba vala sami nɛnɛ si nú
Kà wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ ko wi’ɛi ti GASA WAN nɛ̀ vala sami'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ be tɛɛ ye nù‘i, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gun o te nɛ wai nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk waya-a hee ndiŋmɔ ga; o waya-te nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́ tɛ pɛ taar, wi beka nyɔŋ wa na.
Tɛ naar pɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ e o waya-te lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ a̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔrɔ pɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ o waya-te nɔ‘i. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ dɛm nɛnɛ gan kuti-a. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ tɔk ɓɔna sɛnɛ na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔɔ-gbánà in mɔɔ-kifi na mbɛt.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba ti zu'nɛ́ kpa ŋmaa na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpui ká̧ zera k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e da̧i̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ wen fio nɛ fea na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn dap tɛ‘nɛ́ na mbɛt. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Ká mɛ́ fo bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ okoo-a pi̧ tɛ dàlà-ɗafa-sɔ̧ na, wen ká nù tɛɛ dun nɛ pɛrti mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ká ndiŋmɔ dun nù.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ kii mɛ sa o sɔ̧-fio k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ duk nɛ o ndiŋ bíí hee wa ga. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Mɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ o sɔkawi, in mɛ̀ gásí wa; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ yu nɛ kíí Sɔ̧. Nɛ mi GASA WAN.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔr gɛnɛ nɛ tɛ mɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ kai nɛ mɔ er-a na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ zɔk gɛnɛ‘i hee be
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r mɔ nɛ yuwar-a; ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé zi̧a̧ mɔ in dita mɔ in gasa mɔ mbɛt nɛ yuwar-a.

O mɔɔ-we-dita-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk nɛ de-a, o kilo wen wea mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk nɛ yuwar-a. Mɔɔ-we-fuu k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk nɛ yuwar-a, in mɔɔ-we-nɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ foo'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea kɔ‘m lɛŋ, in o yuwar duka-a n'am ha̧a̧‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, wen a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ sɔ̧ Mɔlɛk, wen n'aa dee ndiŋ a sa̧a̧ fara kɔ‘m, in wen n'aa ɗaŋa sa̧a̧ nin-am mbɛt.
Kà o dɔka bíí kpe yí-wa zu mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi dea'i, ɓɛɛ kà wa gbɛ a̧ yinɛ na,
mi nɛ tɛ‘m, mi tɛ de ŋmaa in wi’ɛi, gu nɛ o bíí nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, in o wi nɛ de mɔ hee a̧ ga, é nɛ̀‘m duk ndak nɛ̀ ɗoŋ sɔ̧ Mɔlɛk.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ tɛ o wi-sa-sɔ̧-fio zɔk nɛ mɔ tɛ wa, pɛrti dee mɔ‘i duk nɛ ŋma gasa o géé-sɔ̧. Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí war-tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ o sa̧a̧ bíí, wen mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea kɔ‘m nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN nɛ de ha̧ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ sa̧.
«Hegɔ, kà ŋma bíí da̧ dáà kɔ‘i, kóó nàà kɔ‘i, wi tɛ gbɛ wi’ɛi yinɛ; ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik zu a̧ wen a̧ da̧a̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí de dàlà in kóò ko ŋma-a, wi tɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ, wiwii'i ká bá nɛ̀ kóò‘i mbɛt.
Kà ŋma wiwii ɔ in kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i, a̧ pi̧ nɛ búù zu dáà kɔ̧-a̧, wi tɛ gbɛ o wi-de-dàlà nɔ‘i yinɛ yiitoo lɛŋ. Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa.
Kà ŋma wiwii ɔ in be-for mɛ kóò, wi tɛ gbɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ, wa yɔɔ kɔya-tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa.
Kà ŋma wiwii ɔ in wiwii woyo, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɔ nɛnɛ in okoo ga, nɛ ndiŋmɔ a̧ wa dea yiitoo lɛŋ, wi tɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa.
Kà ŋma bíí ba boko-bem in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kóò, mɔ‘i nɛ iŋa nam na. Wi tɛ dɔ wa lɛŋ, wen ká pɛrti mɔɔ-búù hegɔ tɛɛ pɛsi dam mgbara'nɛ́.
Kà ŋma wiwii ɔ in ŋma saɗi, wi tɛ gbɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ wi gbɛɛ saɗi'i mbɛt.
Kà ŋma okoo ba ŋma saɗi ɔ nɛnɛ, wi tɛ gbɛ kóò‘i in saɗi'i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa.

«Kà ŋma wiwii ba boko nya-wi, boko-bem ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ ko náà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kóò, kà wa iŋ tɛ in ŋmaa, mɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-búù, wi tɛ fo wa yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ-wa; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi pi̧i̧ naŋ zu boko-nya-wi ga, ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik zu a̧.
Kà ŋma wiwii ɔ in okoo ŋgimbi zɔka zɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa zɔka a̧ nɛ oi tɔk ga, in hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kóò‘i iŋa'e wiwii'i yaka nɛ oi tɔk tɛ-wi ga, wi tɛ fo wa yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ-wa.
«Ká mɛ́ pi̧ naŋ zu nya-nàà kɔ-mɛ, kóó zu boko-nya dáà kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ pi̧i̧ naŋ zu mgbák nam kɔ-mɛ ga, ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tik zu'nɛ́ yiitoo lɛŋ.
Kà ŋma wiwii pi̧ naŋ zu kóò ko nɔkɔ kɔ‘i, kóó zu kóò ko ŋma dáà kɔ‘i, a̧ pi̧i̧ nɛ búù zu nɔkɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kóó zu ŋma dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘i. Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa yiitoo lɛŋ, wa beka kpa bem na fe nɛnɛ.
Kà ŋma bíí ba kóò ko nya-wi nɛ kóò, nɛ mɔɔ-ndiŋ, a̧ pi̧i̧ nɛ búù zu nya-a̧, wa beka kpa bem na.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea kɔ‘m lɛŋ in o yuwar duka-a n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ-aa, wen ká‘m tɛɛ fo'nɛ́ tɛ nù n'am tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i yinɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea ko o bíí n'am tɛ ndak yinɛ ti'nɛ́‘i na; nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa ndaka nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea nɔ‘i sa'm sɛn wa,
ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧ nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, nù kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mi a̧ ha̧ nù‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́; nù‘i duna nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ hoka'nɛ mgbara o tugun bíí.

Hegɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ mgbara o ndiŋ saɗi in o sa̧a̧ saɗi, o ndiŋ nɔ̧́í̧ in o sa̧a̧ nɔ̧́í̧, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ nyɔŋa o saɗi nɔ‘i, o nɔ̧́í̧ nɔ‘i in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ gbur zaŋ nɛ nu. Mɛ nɛ o mɔ n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɔk hee o ndiŋmɔ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ o bíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ hee mi GASA WAN nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ ga; mi hoka'nɛ mgbara o tugun bíí h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ o bíí kɔ‘m.
«Kà ŋma wiwii, kóó ŋma okoo dúk mɛ́ sa o sɔ̧ fio, wi tɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ, wi tɛ yo wa nɛ ta gbɛ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tik zu wa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bem ko Arɔŋ‘e, ká wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗaŋ war-tɛ tɛ hɔa-a fara-fio ko bíí kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ fio ko mgbák bíí kɔ̧-a̧ hee nàà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga, bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ be-wiwii-a kóó be-okoo-a ga, kóó hee nya-a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔɔ fara-a.
A̧ tɛ hɔ fara-fio ko boko-nya-a̧ nɛ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, nɛ̀ ɓɔna in a̧, nɛ̀ ŋma wiwii tɛ har na mbɛt.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duk nɛ gasawi mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ ga, a̧ beka de mɔɔ-ndiŋ ɗaŋ nɛ war-tɛ-a na.
«O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ beka kpui zu na, wa beka kpui ká̧ zera kɔ-wa na, wa beka gɔn dap tɛ-wa na mbɛt.
Wa tɛ ya nɛtɛ wen Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa beka ɗaŋ nin Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, wen nɛ́ wa a̧ ɗafi sɔ̧, e nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ti a̧ mbɛt, hegɔ wa tɛ ya nɛ o sa̧a̧ bíí.
Wa beka ba kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu, kóó kó-de-mɔɔ-búù na. Wa beka ba okoo nɛ wíì ndaka na, wen wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ duk nɛtɛ wen Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i ɓɛɛ.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ hee sa̧a̧ bíí ga, wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ wɛk nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ; mɛ tɛ zɔk a̧ hee sa̧a̧ bíí ga, wen mi ɔ sa̧a̧, mi GASA WAN nɛ de ha̧ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ sa̧.
Kà boko-bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ fɛŋ tɛ nɛ dee mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu, a̧ fɛŋ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ dɔ a̧ yinɛ.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk zu o nya-a̧, nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧, e nɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ er-a, pi̧ nɛ o laa tɛ-a'i, ká a̧ yai zu-a in ká a̧ a̧k laa tɛ-a wen ɗaŋsee na.
Ká a̧ hɔ fara-fio na, ká a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-a, kóó nɛ fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ fio ko nàà kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Ká a̧ gbo nɛ kɔ̧
Kóó n'aa tɛ ba, a̧ duk nɛ okoo nɛ tɛ iŋ wiwii na.
Ká a̧ ba ko-gera na, kóó okoo nɛ wa ndaka na, kóó okoo nɛ fɛŋa tɛ tɛ dee mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ ba nɛ ŋma be-zɔŋa mgbara dùk kɔ̧-a̧.
Hegɔ a̧ beka ɗaŋ war-tɛ o bezaŋ-aa na, wen nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Arɔŋ‘e ká ŋma bíí mgbara o bezaŋ-aa nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kum wɛk nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ká ŋma bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kum tɛ pii katɛ‘m na, kóó nɛ wi-boma-yí, kóó nɛ wi-nɛ̀-kum, kóó nɛ wan-gbɔsa-zɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma bíí nɛ o naŋ-a, kóó er-a de na,
wi nɛ̀ naŋ kóó ɓaa gbina,
wi nɛ̀ ŋgɔmba bira ɗoŋ-aa, sira-wi, wan-fɛŋa-yí, wan-tara, wan-lalamzi, kóó wi nɛ̀ gba̧a̧ fala-a mbaŋa.
Ká ŋma bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kum mgbara o bezaŋ Arɔŋ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, nɛ́ si katɛ GASA WAN mɛ wɛk nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ na. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ a̧ nɛ wi-kum ga, ká a̧ ɗɔŋ siti mɛ wɛk nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
A̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ nyɔŋmɔ ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ duk nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ in o wan nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, wi’ɛi beka hɔ ká̧ babir-laa na, in a̧ beka hɔ ká̧
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i lɛŋ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i'e, wa a̧ zɔk o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ o be
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, kà ŋma bíí mgbara o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ ndiŋ bíí nɛ́ si ká̧ o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ o be
«Ká ŋma bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ doko, kóó nɛ baa horso nyɔŋ o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛti sɛka a̧
Nɛ kalemɔ wen wi nɛ fo ndiŋ saɗi, kóó ndiŋ bíí de nɛ ndiŋ pi̧ tɛ.
Wi nɛ fo o pɛrti ndiŋmɔ nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ zui yì kaɗi sɛka a̧ nyɔŋa o sa̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ.
Kà wese ye kaɗi, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧ bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ nyɛm nyɔŋa o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ wen nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ká wi’ɛi nyɔŋ wɔr saɗi, kóó saɗi nɛ mɔ baa na, wen ká mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-a. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
«Wa a̧ kasi o wen kɔ‘m, wen ká wa tɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ tɛ nyɔŋa mɔ nɛ nú-tum; kà wa ɗaŋ war nyɔŋmɔ‘i, wa tɛ fe. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN nɛ de ha̧ war-tɛ-wa mɛ sa̧.
«Ká ŋma gee bíí nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ na; kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, kóó wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt beka nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bara nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna zu a̧, in wan nɛ wa kòó kɔ̧ kira ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ nyɔŋmɔ‘i.
Boko-bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ baa gee bíí beka nyɔŋ ŋma nyɔŋmɔ tɛ sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ na.

Ɓɛɛ kà wíì fe er ŋma boko-bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, kóó kà wíì nɛ́ ndaka a̧, kà a̧ nɛ́ kòó bem na, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ si ɗoŋ tɛ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ hee ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ nɛ zɔŋa ga, a̧ tɛ nyɛm nyɔŋa nyɔŋmɔ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ o gee bíí beka nyɔŋ so na'i.
«Kà ŋma bíí iŋ na, nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔ‘i sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, e nɛ ŋma zu-a woyo.
Ká o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗaŋ o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ ko o be
Kà wa nɛ́ nyɔŋa o sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i, ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dea'i tɛ tik zu o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o be
wi’ɛi tɛ ba nɛ wiwii ndai, kóó vala sami, kóó vala gbadua nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-wa na, sɛka Sɔ̧ tɛɛ kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ‘i.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ nɛ ŋma saɗi nɛ tɛ-a ɗaŋa ɗaŋ na, wen Sɔ̧ beka kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ‘i na.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ-gaŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ gasa mɔ-dai, kóó nɛ geɗek mɔ-dai, nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ oi

K’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ saɗi nɛ zɔk mɔ na, kóó wan nɛ nɛ kum, kóó wan nɛ naŋ-a ɓira ɓir, kóó wan nɛ mɔ aa tɛ-a, kóó wan nɛ tara aa tɛ-a in wan nɛ lalamzi baa na mbɛt; ɛ́nɛ́ beka ha̧ o pɛrti saɗi nɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN na; bé k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ pɛrti o saɗi nɔ‘i mɛ ha̧ nɛ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN na mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ ha̧ wiwii ndai, kóó sami, kóó gbadua nɛ ŋma naŋ-a dura, kóó dee dɔ̧-a̧ gan o oi-aa nɛ gee ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ‘i nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ oi
Saɗi nɛ‘i too fala-a, kóó wan nɛ‘i ɓira fala-a kai yinɛ, ɛnɛ beka ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ de pɛrti mɔ‘i tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba pɛrti o saɗi nɔ‘i er gɛnɛ mɛ ha̧ hee nyɔŋmɔ ga ha̧ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, wen Sɔ̧ beka kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ duk nɛ kuma saɗi nɛ tɛ-wa de na'i, na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Kà nana ndai, kóó nana sami, kóó nana gbadua mbɛt nɛ́ koa, o be-a tɛ ya in o nàà kɔ‘i tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, kà‘i dɔ́ wa nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, a̧ tɛ kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ‘i.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn nana ndai, kóó nana sami, ko náná gbadua in be-a kpɔk kale wese na.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ saɗi ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧, gasi nɛ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ yuwar-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpɛk.
Wi tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo saɗi'i kaɗi kpɔk kale wese'i, wi beka e oi-aa hɔ sa̧a̧mɔ na. Nɛ mi GASA WAN.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ-aa. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋ sa̧a̧ nin-am na, wen ha̧ war-tɛ‘m mɛ sa̧ mgbara o be
Wi nɛ foo'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ mi GASA WAN.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be

Wi tɛ de tom tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ nɛ́ wese Sabat; wese'i, ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom kpɔk na; ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ wen tu̧u̧ tɛ‘m. Wese'i nɛ́ wese-ɔm-tɛ ko GASA WAN fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ.
O wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN n’ɛnɛ tɛ gɔn wen mɔi̧a-a tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
«Kuti fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wese ye nɛnɛ, wese'i, nɛ wese
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ fio-zɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ gbaŋa
Kuti wese ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m; ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom wese'i na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ dɔ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN dam ɗoŋ zɛ nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i lɛŋ; tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m; ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom wese'i na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Mɔ tɛ sa̧ ɗoŋ wese-ɔm-tɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ kuti sika zu-nyɔnɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN, wen ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ kpɛk wa.
Wese n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ sika nyɔnɔ‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ dɔ
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ be fuu tɛ kilo mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in nɔ̧́ e zu-a; mɔ‘i nɛ́ dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee tɛ GASA WAN; ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ be dɔ̧ɔ̧ litrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta tɛn a nù nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ mbɛt.

Ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ brɛt, kóó ŋma ha̧na gba̧a̧-mɔ, kóó mbe gba̧a̧ nyɔnɔ, nɛti ha̧ wese n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN na.» Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́, n’ɛnɛ beka gbin na kpoo nɛ kpoo, fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔr alat mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ dama-a ɗoŋ wese-ɔm-tɛ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ nɛ sika-zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i.
Ɗoŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ tɔr zɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mbe zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ ba brɛt yiitoo nɛ‘i dee nɛ fuu, kilo mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ hao a̧a̧ sɛnɛ tɛnɛ wen wɛka-a; mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ o zu-nyɔnɔ wen GASA WAN.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ o
Ɛnɛ tɛ ba vala gbadua ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kaia
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ wɛk o
Wese'i, ɛnɛ tɛ sa ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ mɔi̧a tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m; ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom na. Mɔ‘i nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo wen ɛnɛ fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ.
«Ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔi̧ hɔ mgbii fɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔr wan nɛ aia a nu na mbɛt; ɛnɛ tɛ e i̧i̧ nɔ‘i ha̧ o wisan in o gɛnɛ. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom wese'i na, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ dɔɔ-nyɔnɔ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Zɛ ɓu tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, nɛ duk nɛ wese kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m, ɛnɛ tɛ zim yì, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom wese'i na, wen nɛ́ wese kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ; nɛ́ kale wese'i a̧‘i tɛ de nɛ do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu'nɛ́ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Hegɔ, wi nɛ beka zim yì wese'i na, wi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ de tom wese'i, mi tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma tom wese'i na; nɛ́ heembea nɛ tɛ duk wen'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo, fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ.
Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ zim yì wese'i. Ɛnɛ tɛ de kànà mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi-ɔma-tɛ‘i, ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ hɔ nɛnɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ ɓii-aa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Wi tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ gbaŋa'i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom na.

Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN dam ɗoŋ zɛ nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i lɛŋ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN. Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ sɔŋkur wese gbaŋa; ɛnɛ beka de ŋma tom na.
«Wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN n’ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a, ha̧ nɛ dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ wen ga̧ŋmɔ, kóó tɛna dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nu ha̧ GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i e zu o wese-ɔm-tɛ ko GASA WAN ká bá nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ in o ɗafa-sɔ̧ oi

«Tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de gbaŋa wen GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ gbaŋa'i tɛ de nɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Kuti wese in sɔŋkur wese tɛ ya nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ.
Kuti zɛ gbaŋa'i, ɛnɛ tɛ ɓi o de waya-te ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kaia o wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ in o da̧a̧ gbaa-er-te ká bá nɛ̀ o wa̧a̧ kusa te
Ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa gasi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ pɛ lɛŋ, tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea n’ɛnɛ beka gbin na kpoo nɛ kpoo: ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa'i tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ kɔ̧ tua-laa ŋgimbi gbaŋa'i tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; o be
wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ‘e, mi dee ha̧ o be
Nɛ hegɔ a̧ Moisɛ usa nɛ o yuwar gbaŋa ko GASA WAN ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Arɔŋ te e wee tɛ lamba, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa e ti babir-laa nɛ kpe
A̧ tɛ a o lamba nɔ‘i zu
«Mɛ ba fuu, ɓɛɛ mɛ gi brɛt ɓu-zua-yiitoo; kpɔk brɛt tɛ ba nɛ kilo fuu mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mɛ tɛ a o brɛt nɔ‘i zu fara-e-nyɔŋmɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ti GASA WAN: mɛ tɛ a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ mgbɔɔr, mɛ aa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk woyo nɛ mgbɔɔr.
Mɛ tɛ a de fuu-nyama zu o tua-brɛt nɔ‘i yiitoo'i ha̧ mɛ duk hee mɔɔ-mbaŋ-tɛ mɔ oi brɛt nɔ‘i ga; mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́ɔ́ nyɔŋmɔ wen GASA WAN.
Wese-ɔm-tɛ lɛŋ, wi tɛ nɛk o brɛt nɔ‘i ti GASA WAN; o be
O brɛt nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ ko Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i; wa tɛ nyɔŋ wa tɛ sa̧a̧ fara wen nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna wen wa nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ‘i baa mgbara dɔɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ko GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i nɛ war mɔ kɔ-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ŋma obem nɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ zɔŋa
Bem’ɛi nɛ̀ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ zɔŋa
Wa pɛma bem’ɛi nɛ de-a, zɛm nɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ zu a̧.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ fó wi nɛ da̧a̧ dara'i gbonɛ saaye; o wi nɛ zia a̧ fara da̧ dara'i lɛŋ a̧ e er zu-a nɛ sedaako, ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ a̧ yo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ.
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga ha̧ o be
Hegɔ wi tɛ gbɛ wi nɛ ɗaŋ nin GASA WAN yinɛ. Bíí lɛŋ tɛ yo a̧ nɛ ta; kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ, kóó nɛ́ be-nu mbɛt, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧ wen n'aa ɗaŋa nin Sɔ̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí gbɛ bíí, kóó wi nɛ fea'i so nɛ o, wi tɛ gbɛ wi nɛ gbɛɛ a̧‘i yinɛ.
Kà a̧ gbɛ saɗi ko ŋma bíí, a̧ tɛ yoɓi kànà nɛ̀ ŋma mbe saɗi nɛ duk kpasa.
«Kà ŋma bíí de ha̧ ŋma-a mɛ́ nɛ̀ kum, wi tɛ de kànà in a̧ hegɔ mbɛt.
Kà a̧ gbin ŋma bíí, wi tɛ gbin a̧ mbɛt: yí oi yí, nin oi nin; wi tɛ de kànà kum pi̧ tɛ-a hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee nɛnɛ pi̧ tɛ ŋma-a ga.
Wi nɛ gbɛ saɗi ko ŋma bíí tɛ yoɓi nɛ̀ ŋma mbe-a; wi tɛ gbɛ wi nɛ gbɛɛ bíí.
Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk nɛ kpɔk heembea wen gɛnɛ in be-nu, wen mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Moisɛ sɛn zu kaya Sinai hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
mɛ tɛ gun nyɔnɔ, ɗɛn nɛ o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ mɛ mɔi̧a waya-a.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ tɛ duk nɛ pɛ-ɔm-tɛ ko nù, wen tu̧u̧ tɛ GASA WAN; mɛ beka gun nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-mɛ na, mɛ beka ɗɛn nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ beka mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ nɛ maa nɛ ta-tɛ tɛ bìrì ti pɛ‘i na, mɛ beka ɓi waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ a̧a̧ poo zao na. Pɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ pɛ-ɔm-tɛ ko nù.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ nù dɛma nɛ ta-tɛ ti pɛ-ɔma-tɛ‘i: mɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ, kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ, wi-de-tom-sede, kóó gɛnɛ nɛ duk tɛ kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ nɛ ya nù kɔ-mɛ, wa tɛ nyɔŋ kɔ-wa nɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ gboo nɛ tɛ nù.»

«Mɛ tɛ tɔr pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i tɔr nɛ ɔɔ-zɛ zaŋ alat kpɔk’ɛ ga, mɛ tɛ tɔr wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; mɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ de nɛ́ pɛ ɓu-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
Ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, mɛ tɛ dɔm zak ha̧ bíí mɛ gai mɔ; wese ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ dɔm zak ha̧ mɛ wor dam nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk ɓu-mɔɔrɔ pɛ hee sa̧a̧ pɛ ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ dam nù‘e, bíí lɛŋ gboo tɛ bara; pɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ kpɔk pɛ gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́; kóó o nde tɛ si mgbák nù kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bíí kpɔk kpɔk sii mgbara nam kɔ‘i.
Ɓu-mɔɔrɔ pɛ tɛ duk nɛ pɛ-gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛnɛ beka gun mɔ na, ɛnɛ beka mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ nɛ maa nɛ ta-tɛ poo bìrì na, ɛnɛ beka ɓi waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ poo zao na mbɛt.
Wen pɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ pɛ gbaŋa, tɛ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ wen'nɛ́; ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ dɛma nɛ ta-tɛ.
«Tɛ pɛ-gbaŋa'i, nù kó o nde tɛ si ɗoŋ er mgbák wan-aa.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ dee nɛ gɛnɛ, kà mɛ nɛ́ ɗɔra nɛ mɔ ha̧ ŋma-mɛ, kóó kà mɛ nɛ́ hi̧fa nɛ ŋma mɔ er-a, ká mɛ́ kii mɛ kpa yí-mɔ zu-a na.
Mɛ tɛ ta nɛ ŋgimbi pɛ-gbaŋa nɛ yaka hi̧fi nɛ mɔ er ŋma-mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ta kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ pɛ-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ ɗɔr nɛ mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Kà oi pɛ ɓɔn nɛ dɔka-a ha̧ mbe ŋgimbi gbaŋa mɛ hɔ, gɛnɛ mɔ nɛnɛ tɛ hi̧fi tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ kà oi pɛ ɓɔn tikiɗi, gɛnɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ hi̧fi tɛ duk si ɗɔɔ, wen nɛ́ ŋma nú nyɔnɔ a̧ a̧ ɗɔr ha̧ mɛ.
Ká ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ ɔr ŋma-a kai nɛ mɔ er-a na, nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ yu nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, wen mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o yuwar-duka-a n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ ye nɛ de-a.
Nù tɛ dɛm nyɔnɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ ye nɛ de-a.
«Ŋma fara ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ ge tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ ge nɛ‘i beka gun ŋma mɔ in nɛ‘i beka mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ na’ɛ ge?
Mi tɛ tok de yoŋgo kɔ‘m zu'nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk pɛ, ha̧ pɛ‘i mɛ dɛm nyɔnɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen pɛ taar.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ gun mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kànà nɛ gba̧‘a̧ nyɔnɔ n’ɛnɛ mɔi̧a'i hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ mbe pɛ, kpa nɛ mbe ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ woyo.»
«Ɛ́nɛ́ beka ɗɔr nù ha̧ ŋma bíí wen ha̧ nù‘i mɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧ kpoo nɛ kpoo na, wen nù nɛ́ kɔ‘m; ɛ́nɛ́ ya hee o wi nɛ̀ èé nù kɔ‘i duk mɛ nɛɛ duk ŋma fara nɛtɛ, in hee o gɛnɛ kɔ‘m ga.
«Tɛ́ nù nɛ tɛ duk nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ e war ha̧ wi nɛ ɗɔra nù kɔ‘i mɛ hi̧fi nù‘i si ɗoŋ woyo.
Kà nya-mɛ nɛ́ ɗɔra ŋma nù kɔ‘i mɛ gbo nɛ nyamandoi, nɛ́ mgbák bíí kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ tɛ hi̧fi nù nɛ nya-a̧ ɗɔra'i si ɗoŋ.
Kà ŋma bíí bó nɛ̀ mgbák bíí kɔ‘i nɛ tɛ hi̧fi nù si ɗoŋ na, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ nyɛma kpaa yuwar mɛ hi̧fi nù‘i si ɗoŋ woyo,
a̧ tɛ tɔr o pɛ nɛ yaka ɗoŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɗɔra nɛ nù‘i kɛ̧ nɛ ŋma sede-a ha̧ wi nɛ hi̧fa so nù‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa nù kɔ̧-a̧ woyo.

Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ kpaa yuwar mɛ hi̧fi mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ si ɗoŋ nɛ tɛ-a na, mɔɔ-gɛnɛ‘i tɛ duk kànà er wi nɛ hi̧fa'i hɔ mbe pɛ-gbaŋa; ŋgimbi'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa nù kɔ̧-a̧ woyo, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ hi̧fa so nù‘i tɛ e i̧i̧ duk mɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ nù kɔ‘i.

«Kà ŋma bíí ɗɔr ŋma tua-ɔ-sɛnɛ tɛ ŋma ye nɛ wa mboo garo zik nɛnɛ, a̧ tɛ nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi nù kɔ̧-a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ woyo hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ pɛ tɛ yak kpɔk ɗoŋ wese n'aa ɗɔra n’ɛnɛ‘i. A̧ tɛ nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi tua si ɗoŋ tɛ pɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Kà wa nɛ́ hi̧fa tua'i si ɗoŋ zaŋ pɛ kpɔk na, tua saaye nɛ wa mboo garo zik nɛnɛ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ko wi-hi̧f'aa in o bezaŋ-aa hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ; tua'i beka yu er-a ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa na mbɛt.
O tua be ye nɛ wa mbo garo zik nɛnɛ na tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in fɔ. Wi nyɛma mɛ hi̧fi wa si ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa, wan-tua'i tɛ ba mɔ kɔ‘i woyo.
O bezaŋ Levii nyɛma mɛ hi̧fi tua nɛ duk saaye kɔ-wa si ɗoŋ ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
Wi nɛ hi̧fa so tua er o bezaŋ Levii, kóó wi-hi̧fa-a'i so nɛ bezaŋ Levii mbɛt, a̧ tɛ gbo kànà kɔ̧ tua saaye'i mbɛt ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa, wen nɛ́ tua-saaye ko o be Levii, nɛ́ nù kɔ-wa mgbara o be
War ko o fɔ nɛ ya ɗoŋ o ye kɔ-wa, wa beka nyɛm mɛ ɗɔr na, wen tɛ duk nɛ fɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
«Kà san bá ŋma-mɛ, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ zɔ́k bɔnɛ katɛ mɛ, mɛ tɛ gbak a̧. Mɛ tɛ de kalemɔ‘i in gɛnɛ nɛ tɛ duk nù kɔ-mɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ ye in mɛɛ.
Kà a̧ bá nyamandoi er-mɛ, mɛ beka tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ e mbe-a zu-a ha̧ nɛnɛ siɗoŋ na. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ yu nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋma-mɛ tɛ ɔ ye in mɛɛ.
Mɛ beka ha̧ sede ha̧ a̧ kii nɛ mbe-a zu-a na, mɛ beka ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ kii nɛ mbe-a zu-a na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ foo'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, mɛ ha̧ nú Kanaŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
«Kà ŋma-mɛ é ziŋina er-mɛ, kà a̧ ɗɔ́r tɛ-a ha̧ mɛ, mɛ beka e a̧ tɛ tom-bara na.
Mɛ tɛ zɔk a̧ hee wi-de-tom-sede, kóó gɛnɛ ga; a̧ tɛ duk nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ hɔ ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa.
Ŋgimbi'i, a̧ tɛ gbo tɛ kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ mgbara nam kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ si nù ko o dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
O wi n'am foo gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m. Wi beka ɗɔr wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɗɔr nɛ o bara’ɛ ga na.
Mɛ beka duk zu ŋma-mɛ de nɛ mɔ in a̧ nɛ ŋgai na; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ yu nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ hi̧fi o kó-bara in o wiwii-bara tɛ o nù nɛ ya zik'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ hi̧fi ŋma mgbara zuduk kɔ-wa nɛ tɛɛ mɛ duk nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo. Wa tɛ ya nɛ́ mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ e wa nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ mɔ kɔ-wa. Wa tɛ ya nɛ o bara k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ war k’ɛ́nɛ́ o be
«Kà ŋma gɛnɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ kɔ-mɛ kpa mbɔi, ɓɛɛ kà nya-mɛ ba nyamandoi er-a ɗɔr nɛ tɛ ha̧ a̧, kóó kà a̧ ɗɔr tɛ-a ha̧ bezaŋ ŋma bíí nɛ duk nɛ bíí nú-gara ko ŋma gɛnɛ,
ɗoŋ nɛ wa dee gɛnɛ-a kaɗi, wi nyɛma mɛ hi̧f'aa pii ɗoŋ;
nɔkɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kóó be-nɔkɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kóó ŋma nam kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛma mɛ hi̧f'aa pii ɗoŋ. Kóó kà yuwar-a nɛ bòó, a̧ nyɛma hi̧fa tɛ-a pii ɗoŋ mbɛt.

Hegɔ, kà wa é nú in wi-hi̧f'aa, wa tɛ tɔr pɛ mgbara wese ɗɔra a̧ in mbe ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa. Wa tɛ zɔk sede ko wi-de-tom nɛ ba tɛ pɛ kpɔk gɔn nɛ gɛnɛ-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ oi pɛ nɛ́ ɓɔna ha̧ mbe ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa mɛ hɔ.
Ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ hi̧fa a̧ pii ɗoŋ, kà oi pɛ nɛ́ ɓɔna nɛ dɔka-a, a̧ tɛ yoɓi sede nyɛm ɗoŋ dɔka pɛ nɛ ɓɔna.
Kà oi pɛ á̧ ɓɔna tikiɗi ha̧ mbe pɛ-gbaŋa mɛ hɔ, wi tɛ tɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ hi̧fa tɛ-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ pɛ nɛ ɓɔna.
Wi nɛ hi̧fa so a̧ tɛ zɔk a̧ hee wi-de-tom kɔ‘i ga pɛ nɛ pɛ. Mɛ beka e ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ de bɔnɛ in a̧ na.
Kà‘i kpá yuwar mɛ hi̧f'aa pii ɗoŋ nɛ ŋma yuwar mɔɔ nɔ‘i na, a̧ tɛ gbo tɛ bara in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ mbe ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa.
O be
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ dui o géé-sɔ̧ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbo géé-sɔ̧ in k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba ta e ŋgɔn mɛ gasi na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛk ta sɛn nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gasi na mbɛt wen mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ‘m, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kasi o wen kɔ‘m in k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa,
mi tɛ ha̧ kórò h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɓar, nù tɛ dɛm nyɔnɔ, ɓɛɛ o te kpɛɛfɔ tɛ wai.
Ɛ́nɛ́ be tɛ̀ɛ́ gusi alkamaari kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓii waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓi waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ hɔ ŋgimbi guna mɔ; ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yaa nɛ de-a tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Mi tɛ e gaŋmɔ tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ ya nɛ fee-see, ŋma mɔɔ-ndekeli'nɛ́ beka bo na. Mi tɛ ndak o ɗaŋ saɗi yinɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́, wi beka zii nyɛrɛ biro tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ndak o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ wa nɛ gba-paa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ nyɛma mɛ ndak o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa, ɓɛɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa nyɛma ndaka o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ booro-ɓu. Ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ wa nɛ gba-paa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ zik tɛ‘m sitɛ‘nɛ́; mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duna nù; mi tɛ kasi
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o nyɔnɔ hɔ mbe pɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kaia o gba̧‘a̧-a̧ yinɛ kpai nɛ mbe-a.
Mi tɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́; mi beka sɛn'nɛ́ na.
Mi tɛ nɛ nɔ in'nɛ, mi tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ya nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ foo'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ ya nɛ o bara kɔ-wa siti; nɛ́ mi a̧ gbina kpáŋá k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ ger'nɛ́, in nɛ́ mi a̧ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba zu'nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wen nú‘m na, in k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ siŋ o heembea kɔ‘m a nù, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ sɛn o yuwar duka-a n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́, de nɛ mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o wen kɔ‘m na, gbin nɛ

kɔ‘m n'am tɛ de in'nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mi tɛ tom o ŋga-zɛɛ pi̧ zu'nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ̧k, gɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ de'nɛ́ nɛ ŋgaya-a nɛ̀ tɛ ɗaŋ yí‘nɛ́ in nɛ̀ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɔk bɔnɛ. Ɛnɛ tɛ gun nyɔnɔ ba nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́; nɛ́ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ nyɔŋa-a.
Mi tɛ zik ɗoŋ-am e h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gusi'nɛ́, o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gan'nɛ, ɓɛɛ kóó kà wa ndak'nɛ́ na, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yu kànà mɔ ti wa.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wen kɔ‘m na siti, mi tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ŋga bɔnɛ gan kuti-a war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ ŋgai n’ɛnɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́‘i yinɛ; kórò beka hɔ na, ɓɛɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ŋgai hee ndɛrɛ ga.
Nù beka dɛm nyɔnɔ ɓɔna, te nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka wai ɓɔna, ɛnɛ tɛ ɗaŋ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋgazu in am, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧́ zia wen nú‘m na, mi tɛ usi ŋga bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo gan kuti-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ tom o ɗaŋ saɗi pi̧ mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ kai o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ tɛ ɗaŋ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ, in nɛ tɛ kum'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nɛ ŋga-gbárà.
«Kà o bɔnɛ nɔ‘i de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpai taamɔ na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de nɛ ŋgazu in am,
mi mbɛt, mi tɛ ba zu'm duk nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, mi tɛ pi̧ ɗaŋmɔ zu'nɛ́ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ pi̧ biro zu'nɛ́ mɛ de mɔɔ-oi-nɔɔ-tɔk n’ɛnɛ gbina in'nɛ̀ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa lɛŋ sitɛ gasa ye k’ɛ́nɛ́; mi tɛ tom ŋga-zɛɛ pi̧ mgbara'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu'nɛ́.
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ dor nyɔŋmɔ er'nɛ́, okoo ɓu tɛ dɔ brɛt k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpɔk fara; brɛt nɛ wa tɛ ba tɛnɛ‘i, wa tɛ kɛ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ, ɓɛɛ beka sur'nɛ́ na.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wen kɔ‘m na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ŋgazu siti,
mi tɛ ba zu'm duk nɛ ɛnɛ nɛ ŋga nyimsea; mi nɛ tɛ‘m, mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo oi ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-tɛ bui-bem in kpoo-tɛ boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ o fara gasi géé-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi tɛ gbin o
Mi tɛ gbin o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ a nù, mi tɛ ɗaŋ o
Mi nɛ tɛ‘m, mi tɛ ɗaŋ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛɛ mɛ duk tɛ nù‘i tɛ ya yemsele.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ dam nù, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ dak gba-paa kɔ‘m in'nɛ̀ɛ́. Nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi ŋga-gbárà, ɓɛɛ o gasa ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifa nɛ bɛɛ-oi.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ a̧a̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nù ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́, nù tɛ duk kɔ‘i tɛ ɔma-tɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ bo tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna ga, nù‘i tɛ kpa ɔma-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa tɛɛ kpa so ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ɓɔna so nɛnɛ sɛnɛ‘i.

«Mi tɛ gbin gba̧a̧-tɛ o bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ ɓɔn kpasa tɛ nù ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa. Wa̧a̧ tɛ fo mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa dee kíì, ma yi yak hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i yu nɛ gba-paa’ɛ ga; wa tɛ yo nù nɛ tɛ-wa, ŋma bíí ndak wa na mbɛt.
Wa tɛ tir a zu ŋmaa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i tir nɛnɛ a nù nú gba-paa’ɛ ga, ŋma bíí ndak wa na mbɛt. Ɛnɛ beka yor ti o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ fe sɛn gɔni-nù, ɓɛɛ nù ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gur'nɛ́.
O bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ ɓɔn kpasa tɛ fe tɛ nù ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa wen zu yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa in ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa mbɛt a̧ wa tɛ kum nɛnɛ.
«Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbar o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa in ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, wi dee ɗaŋmɔ in am, wi dee ŋgazu in am.
Wa tɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt'e mi baa zu'm duk nɛ wi in mi mgbɔɔ wi si nù ko o wisɛn kɔ‘i. Hegɔ, see-wa nɛ ɔ ŋgaya'i tɛ mɔk, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Tɛ‘m tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ
Wa tɛ e nù duk ha̧ nù mɛ kpa ɔma-tɛ kɔ‘i. Nù kɔ-wa tɛ kifi ŋga-gbárà. Wa tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ wen nɛ wa ee o yuwar-duka-a n'am usa ha̧ wa duk in wen nɛ wa sɛna o heembea kɔ‘m.
Wa tɛ ye nù ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi e wa duk na, mi sɛn wa mɛ kum wa, gbin nɛ
Tɛ‘m tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ
O geŋa, o yuwar-duka-a in o heembea nɛ GASA WAN ee mgbara wi in o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ sede kìì bíí nɛ‘i gɔn’ɛ. Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wiwii mgbara pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, wi tɛ gɔn zu a̧ nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kɔya sede sa̧a̧ fara.
Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ okoo, wi tɛ gɔn zu a̧ nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-taar;
be-wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, wi tɛ gɔn zu a̧ nɛ́ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ko be-okoo nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu.
Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ obem nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk hɔ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ, be-wiwii tɛ duk nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ be-okoo tɛ duk nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi taar.
Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, kóó gan mbɛt, sede nɛ‘i tɛ gɔn nɛ zu a̧, wiwii nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ko okoo nɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu.
«Kà ŋma wisan nyɛm mɛ ha̧ sede'i na, a̧ tɛ mgbɔ wi n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gɔn zu a̧‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ sede-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ ko wisan'i.
«Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ saɗi nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ ha̧ nɛ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, saɗi lɛŋ nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN kaɗi kifa nɛ sa̧a̧ saɗi.
Wi beka kpai saɗi ha̧a̧mɔ‘i na, wi beka kpai ɗaŋ-a nɛ̀ de-a na, in wi beka kpai de-a nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a na mbɛt; kà‘i nɛ́ kpaia saɗi nɛ ŋmaa, wa yiitoo lɛŋ kifa nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧.
Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ndiŋ saɗi nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN na, wi tɛ e saɗi'i ti wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk saɗi'i, kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ɗaŋ-a, kóó kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ de-a, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ yor nɛ zu mɔ n'aa tɛ gɔn'i.
Ɓɛɛ kà‘i nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hi̧fi saɗi'i si ɗoŋ, wi tɛ e ŋma sede zu wan nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna'i,
«Kà‘i ha̧ nɛ tua kɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN hee ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ ga, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk, kà tua'i nɛ́ ɔɔ dee, kóó nɛ́ dee na, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ yor tɛ mɔ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna'i.
Kà wi nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ tua kɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hi̧fi tua'i pii ɗoŋ woyo, a̧ tɛ e ŋma sede zu wan nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna, ɓɛɛ tua'i pia ɗoŋ er-a.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nɛ ŋma fɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN, sede-a tɛ nyɛm ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ gun kpɛɛfɔ‘i: wi tɛ ɗɔr bufu nyɔnɔ nɛ‘i guna kpɛɛfɔ‘i tɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ wen kilo nyɔnɔ gɔmŋmaa-naar.
Kà bíí nɛ́ ha̧a̧ fɔ kɔ‘i tɛ ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa, wi tɛ yor kana zu sede nɛ‘i gɔna'i.
Kà bíí nɛ́ ha̧a̧ fɔ kɔ‘i ɗoŋ ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn gɛnɛ-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ oi pɛ nɛ ɓɔna ha̧ mbe pɛ-gbaŋa mɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ gbɛ ŋma sede-a yinɛ.
Kà bíí nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ fɔ kɔ‘i nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hi̧fi fɔ‘i pii ɗoŋ woyo, a̧ tɛ e ŋma sede zu gɛnɛ fɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa fɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ hi̧fi fɔ kɔ̧-a̧ pii ɗoŋ na ɗɔr nɛnɛ ha̧ ŋma mbe bíí siti, a̧ beka nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa, wi nɛ hi̧fa fɔ‘i tɛ e fɔ‘i ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ wen GASA WAN: nɛ́ fɔ nɛ‘i ee ha̧ Sɔ̧ war kpɔk. Fɔ‘i tɛ kifi nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí ha̧ fɔ n'aa hi̧fa er ŋma bíí ha̧ GASA WAN, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ fɔ n'aa kpaa nɛ mɔɔ-oi na,
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn gɛnɛ fɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ oi dɔka pɛ nɛ ɓɔna ha̧ mbe ŋgimbi-pɛ-gbaŋa mɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ha̧ sede-a kpɔk kale wese'i; mɔ‘i nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ wen GASA WAN.
Tɛ pɛ-gbaŋa, fɔ‘i tɛ pii ɗoŋ er wi nɛ wa hi̧fa so er-a, fɔ‘i tɛ pii ɗoŋ er kuti wan-aa.
«Gɛnɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ nyɛm ɗoŋ o kɔya sede
«Ŋma bíí beka ha̧ o kaya be mɔ-dai kɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN na, wen o kaya mɔ-dai lɛŋ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN nɛti: kóó nɛ ndai, kòó nɛ sami, kòó nɛ gbadua, wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN.
Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ ndiŋ saɗi, wi nyɛma mɛ gɔn zu a̧, e nɛ mbe sede zu kuti gɛnɛ-a;

«Wi nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ war kpɔk pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna; kóó nɛ bíí, kóó nɛ saɗi, kóó nɛ fɔ; wi nyɛm mɛ ɗɔr mɔ‘i na mbɛt. Mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN war kpɔk, duk nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna wen GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ wi nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi bíí lɛŋ nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN war kpɔk pii ɗoŋ woyo na; wi tɛ gbɛ kana nɛ a̧.
«Zu-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ‘i guna gun, kóó nɛ o zu-nyɔnɔ, kóó nɛ waya-te, duk nɛ ko GASA WAN. Nɛ́ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ wen GASA WAN.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hi̧fi ŋma zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ‘i pii ɗoŋ, a̧ tɛ e ŋma sede zu-a woyo.
Zu-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ gasa mɔ-dai lɛŋ, kóó geɗek mɔ-dai, kà‘i tɔr wa ɓu, ɓɛɛ kpɔk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN.
Wi beka kii nɛ de-a, kóó nɛ ɗaŋ-a na, in wi beka kpai nɛ̀ ŋmaa na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ kà‘i kpai nɛ̀ ŋmaa, saɗi nɛ‘i kpaia'i in ɓii-aa mbɛt kifa nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧; wi nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi wa pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna.»
O geŋa nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧ Moisɛ wen o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Moisɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai kɔ̧
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r nin o wiwii dam lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o be
Gasawi tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ gasawi nutua tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Nin o wi nɛ tɛ gbak'nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: zuduk ko Rubɛn nɛ Elisur, bem ko Sedeur.
Ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ Selumiɛl, bem ko Surisadai.
Ko Juda nɛ Nasɔŋ, bem ko Aminadab.
Ko Isakar nɛ Nɛtanɛl, bem ko Suar.
Ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ Eliab, bem ko Elɔŋ.
Ko o bem ko Jozɛf in o bem ko Efraim nɛ Elisama, bem ko Amihud; ko bem ko Manase nɛ Gamaliɛl, bem ko Pedasur.
Ko Bɛnjamin nɛ Abidaŋ, bem ko Gideoni.
Ko Dan nɛ Ahiezɛr, bem ko Amisadai.
Ko Asɛr nɛ Pagiɛl, bem ko Okraŋ.
Ko Gad nɛ Eliasaf, bem ko Deuɛl.
Ko Nɛftalii nɛ Ahira, bem ko Enaŋ.»
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi nɛ‘i hoka mgbara o bíí. Wa yaa so nɛ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa; wa nɛ o gasawi zu duk-wi-biro
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ mɔi̧a o wi nɛ wa hoka'i a ká̧ tɛ.
Wa mɔi̧a o giiwi lɛŋ. Tɛ kuti wese tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ, o be
Moisɛ yɔra nin wa sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Rubɛn, kaya-bem ko
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 46.500.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kaɗi, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 59.300.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Gad nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i, nɛ nyɛma so mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 45.650.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Juda nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i, nɛ nyɛma so mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 74.600.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt, nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 54.400.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ tɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 57.400.
War ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf, ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Efraim nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 40.500.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Manase nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 32.200.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 35.400.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Dan tɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 62.700.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Asɛr, nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 41.500.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana pɛ‘i mbɛt nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro,
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 53.400.
O bíí nɛ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi
O be
wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ bíí 603.550.
Wa tɔr o bezaŋ Levii zaŋ ŋmaa in o dɔka be
wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Ká mɛ́ tɔr duk ko Levii na. Ká mɛ́ tɔr wa mgbara o be
Mɛ̀ yɔ́r nin wa wen ha̧ wa mɛ de tom sɛn kɔ̧ tua kuɓa
Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí tɛ kur mɛ gbin yak, o bezaŋ Levii tɛ yai tua'i, kai yaknɛ; fara nɛ wa tɛ yor sɛnɛ, nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ba ger tua'i e ŋgɔn woyo. Kà ŋma gɔni bíí ɗɔl si ká̧ tua'i, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.

O be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«O be
«O wi-biro ko o be Juda tɛ ɔ kɔ-wa nɛ war daŋa-wese. Nasɔŋ, bem ko Aminadab tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o be Juda.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 74.600.
Duk ko Isakar in ko Zabulɔŋ tɛ ɔ ye in wa. Natanɛl bem ko Suar tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o bem ko Isakar.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 54.400.
Nɛ́ Eliaf, bem ko Helɔŋ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o bem ko Zabulɔŋ.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 57.400.
O wi-biro ko Juda in Isakar ká bá nɛ̀ Zabulɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 186.400; nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ yak ti.
«O wi-biro ko Rubɛn tɛ ɔ kɔ-wa nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ Elisur bem ko Sedeur tɛ duk nɛ gasawi kɔ-wa.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 46.500.
Duk ko Simɛɔŋ in Gad tɛ ɔ ye in wa, ɓɛɛ Selumiɛl, bem ko Surisadai a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ bíí 59.300.
Nutua ko Gad, nɛ́ Eliasaf, bem ko Reuɛl a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi kɔ-wa.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.650.
O wi-biro ko Rubɛn in Simɛɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ Gad lɛŋ nɛ 151.450. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ yak ɗoŋ o
«Ɓɛɛ nutua ko Levii in
«Nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ́ tutuwal ko o be nutua ko Efraim in o wi-biro kɔ‘i. Gasawi ko o bezaŋ Efraim nɛ Elisama, bem ko Amihud.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 40.500.
Duk ko Manase in ko Bɛnjamin tɛ ɔ ye in wa. Nɛ́ Gamaliɛl, bem ko Pedasur a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o bezaŋ Manase.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 32.200.
Tɛ nutua ko Bɛnjamin, nɛ́ Abidaŋ, bem ko Gideoni a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 35.400.
O wi-biro ko Efraim in Manase ká bá nɛ̀ Bɛnjamin lɛŋ nɛ bíí 108.100. O taar duk wi-biro nɛ tɛ kur mɛ yak nɛ́ wa.
«Nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ́ tutuwal ko o be nutua ko Dan in o wi-biro kɔ‘i. Ahiezɛr, bem ko Amisadai tɛ duk nɛ gasawi kɔ-wa.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 62.700.
Duk ko Asɛr in ko Nɛftalii tɛ ɔ ye in wa. Pagiɛl, bem ko Okraŋ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi ko o be nutua ko Asɛr.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 41.500.
Tɛ nutua ko Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Ahira, bem ko Enaŋ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasawi.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ bíí 53.400.
O wi-biro ko Dan in Asɛr ká bá nɛ̀ Nɛftalii lɛŋ nɛ bíí 157.600. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ kur nɛ ɗoŋ, gbar nɛnɛ ɗoŋ ŋmaa.»
O be
Mɔ kpɔk, wa tɔr duk ko Levii mgbara o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
O bezaŋ Arɔŋ in Moisɛ ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ wen ha̧ Moisɛ zu kaya Sinai nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Nin o bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ: kaya-bem nɛ́ Nadab, sɛka Abihu in Eleazar ká bá nɛ̀ Itamar.
Nin o bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu wa ha̧ wa mɛ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.

Nadab in Abihu fee so ti GASA WAN wen nɛ wa baa so ŋma wee nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧ na e ti a̧. Wa ko bem kóó kpɔk na fe nɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ. Nɛ́ Eleazar in Itamar a̧ dee tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɛ yí dáà kɔ-wa Arɔŋ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ káí o duk ko Levii pii ti mɛ ha̧ wa mɛ gbak Arɔŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧. Wa tɛ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ in a̧.
Wa tɛ gbak a̧ tɛ tom n'aa tɛ de, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de tom ha̧ bíí lɛŋ nú
Wa tɛ ɗafi mɔ nɛ ya kɔ̧
Mɛ tɛ ha̧ zuduk ko Levii ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i; mɛ tɛ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ kpasa ha̧a̧mɔ, nɛ̀ war ko o be
Mɛ tɛ e Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i mɛ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧; kà ŋma géé bíí ɗɔŋ pii ti mɛ de tom'i, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ woyo:
«Kinii, o be Levii tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m. Mi kaia wa oi o kaya-bem ko o be
wen o kaya-bem lɛŋ so nɛ kɔ‘m. Ŋgimbi n'am gbɛɛ so nɛ o kaya-bem nú Egiptɛ, mi kaia so o kaya-bem nɛ wa koo sɛn
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ́r o bezaŋ Levii tɛ nutua in tɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk; mɛ̀ tɔ́r o wiwii lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk yak nɛnɛ.»
Moisɛ tɔra wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa ha̧ so nɛ nú ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ga.
Nin o bem ko Levii nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Gersɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
Nin o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ̀ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Libni in Simɛi.
O bem ko Kehat nɛ̀ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Amram, Yisekar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl.
O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ̀ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mali in Musi. O nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ‘i tɔra nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Nú-gara ko Libni in nú-gara ko Simɛi gboo nɛ tɛ Gɛrsɔŋ. Wa nɛ o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ.
O wiwii lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra, o wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk yak nɛnɛ, nɛ bíí 7.500.
O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ ɔɔ kɔ-wa ɗoŋ fara-duk ko GASA WAN nɛ war yee-wese.
Gasawi ko o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ Eliasaf, bem ko Laɛl.
O bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ dee kɔ-wa nɛ tom kɔ̧
laa nú
Nú-gara ko Amram, ko Yisear, ko Hebrɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ ko Uziɛl gboo nɛ tɛ Kehat. Wa nɛ o bezaŋ Kehat.
O wiwii mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat nɛ wa tɔra, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk yak nɛnɛ, nɛ bíí 8.600. Wa dee kɔ-wa nɛ tom tɛ
O bezaŋ Kehat ɔɔ kɔ-wa nɛ ká̧ tua ko GASA WAN nɛ war ɗɔɔ.
Gasawi nutua ko o bezaŋ Kehat nɛ Elisafaŋ, bem ko Uziɛl.
Wa dee kɔ-wa nɛ tom
Gasawi ko o bezaŋ Levii lɛŋ nɛ Eleazar, bem ko Arɔŋ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ duka zu o wi nɛ de tom
Nú-gara ko Mali in ko Musi gboo nɛ tɛ Mɛrari. Wa nɛ o bezaŋ Mɛrari.
O wiwii mgbara o bezaŋ Mɛrari, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk yak nɛnɛ nɛ bíí 6.200.
Gasawi nutua ko o bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ Suriɛl, bem ko Abihayil. Wa ɔɔ so kɔ-wa nɛ ká̧ tua ko GASA WAN nɛ war ŋgɔn.
Wa dee kɔ-wa nɛ tom mɔɔ-tɔn-tua, o gaŋgala, o mbiŋ, o gun-aa ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ-a lɛŋ. Tom kɔ-wa nɛ́ ɗafa o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Zu-a'i, wa dee tom o mbiŋ-zala in o gun-wa, o te mgboia-a ká bá nɛ̀ o nyak-aa.
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ ɔɔ kɔ-wa nɛ war daŋa-wese nɛ war ti
O be Levii nɛ Moisɛ tɔra nɛ̀ nú-gara kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ tɔ́r o kaya-be-wiwii ko o be
Mɛ tɛ e nɛ o be Levii ha̧‘m oi nú o kaya-bem ko o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔra o kaya-bem ko o be
O kaya-be-wiwii nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ̀ nin kpɔk kpɔk ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk yak nɛnɛ nɛ bíí 22.273.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ káí o be Levii oi nú kaya-bem ko o be
O kaya-bem ko o be
Mɛ tɛ kai sede'i ha̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i mɛ gɔn nɛ zu o kaya be
Moisɛ ndɛma sede-gɔn-zu o kaya-bem ko o be
A̧ mɔi̧a kɔya sede 1.365, oi nú o kaya-bem ko o be
Moisɛ kaia sede'i ha̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o bem ko Kehat mgbara o be Levii, nɛ̀ nú-gara, in nɛ̀ nutua kɔ-wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar, hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ de tom kɔ̧
Tom nɛ o bem ko Kehat tɛ de sɛn kɔ̧
«Ŋgimbi gbina-a yak, Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ ba babir-laa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛɛ kpe nɛ zu
Wa tɛ kpe zu a̧ nɛ ŋga ndàrá, wa baa gasa laa nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ bereŋ gu ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ wa aa o te-gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
«Wa tɛ tati zɔ̧ laa nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧ bereŋ sɛn zu fara-a-nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wa aa o tasi-nyɔŋ-mɔ, o be tasi-nɔ-mɔ, o be yèé-nɔ-mɔ, in o be yèé-a-zɛzɛ sɛnɛ. Brɛt tɛ duk zu fara-a-nyɔŋmɔ‘i ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wa tɛ kpe zu o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ gbɛ̧ laa zóŋ-zóŋ, wa baa ŋga ndàrá yuɓuri nɛ ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa aa o te-gɔa-a sɛnɛ.
«Wa tɛ ba gbɛ̧ laa bereŋ kpe nɛ zu
Wa tɛ ba ŋga ndàrá gu zu-a in o nyɛk-a, ɓɛɛ wa baa a̧ e zu mɔɔ-gɔa-a.
«Wa tɛ ba gbɛ̧ laa bereŋ kpe nɛ zu
Wa tɛ kai o nyɛk lɛŋ nɛ‘i de nɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧
Wa tɛ kai bùk fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kpee zu a̧ nɛ gbɛ̧ laa soi-soi.
Wa tɛ kai o nyɛk nɛ‘i de nɛ tom sɛnɛ lɛŋ a zu a̧: o mɔɔ-aŋ-wee, o mɔɔ-fo-wee, o mɔɔ-ɗu-bùk, ká bá nɛ̀ o kpoŋgo, wa tɛ gu zu a̧ nɛ ŋma ŋga ndàrá, ɓɛɛ wa aa o te-gɔa-a sɛnɛ.

Ŋgimbi nɛ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i tɛ kaɗi hɛra o sa̧a̧ nyɛk nɔ‘i in o mɔɔ-de-tom lɛŋ, wen gbina ye yak, o bem ko Kehat tɛ tɛ kɔ‘i wen tuia-a, ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, wa beka fo o sa̧a̧ nyɛk nɔ‘i na, wen ká wa tɛɛ fe. War mɔ nɛ o bem ko Kehat tɛ tui sɛn kɔ̧
«Eleazar, bem ko Arɔŋ tɛ zɔk kɔ‘i nɛ nɔ̧́-lamba, fuu-nyama wen dɔa-a, ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ nyɔnɔ nɛ‘i ha̧ dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ ká bá nɛ̀ nɔ̧́-wan; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ zɔk
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat mɛ yu mgbara o be Levii na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de wen wa, ká wa tɛɛ tɛ pii katɛ
Hegɔ, wa beka ye
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ́r o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ nú-gara in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa.
Mɛ̀ tɔ́r o bíí lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ de tom kɔ̧
Tom ko o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de in mɔ nɛ wa tɛ tui nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Wa tɛ tui o laa-ɓor-tua, o wan mɛ zan, o wan mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ŋga ndàrá mɛ zu a̧, laa nú
laa-kpe-ɗoŋ zala nɛ zika fara-duk ko GASA WAN in fara-ɗaf'aa, laa-kpe-nú-zala, ká bá nɛ̀ o nyak-aa in o nyɛk-a lɛŋ. O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ tɛ de tom o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ tɛ de tom nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Tom ko o be nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ tɛ de tɛ
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o bezaŋ Mɛrari, mɛ̀ tɔ́r wa nɛ nú-gara in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa.
Mɛ tɛ tɔr o wiwii lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ de tom kɔ̧
Mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧ wa mɛ tui tɛ dee tom kɔ-wa kɔ̧
o mbiŋ zala, in o gun-wa, o te mgboia-a, o nyak-aa, ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-de-tom-aa lɛŋ. Ɛnɛ tɛ usi tui kɔ-wa nɛ wa tɛ tui kpɔk kpɔk ha̧ wa.
O tom nɛ o bíí nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Mɛrari tɛ de sɛn kɔ̧
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi saaye tɔra o bem ko Kehat nɛ nú-gara in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Wa tɔra o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma dee tom kɔ̧
O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 2.750.
O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara ko bezaŋ Kehat nɛ de tom kɔ̧
O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara in o nutua kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Wa tɔra o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma dee tom kɔ̧
O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara in nutua kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 2.630.
O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ de tom kɔ̧
O bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara in nɛ nutua kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Wa tɔra o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar in o wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma dee tom kɔ̧
O bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 3.200.
O bíí nɛ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ tɔra nú-gara ko Mɛrari nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ Moisɛ nɛ mɔ‘i.
O be Levii nɛ Arɔŋ in Moisɛ ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi ko
Wa tɔra o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ de tom baa Tua-kpa-ŋmaa e ŋgɔn in tuia o mɔ-a.
Dɔka o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ bíí 8.580.
Wa usa mɔ nɛ bíí kpɔk kpɔk tɛ de in mɔ n'aa tɛ tui nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ Moisɛ. Bíí kpɔk kpɔk kpaa tom kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Kóó nɛ okoo, kóó nɛ wiwii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó gbonɛ kɔ̧ gbagari wen ká wa tɛɛ de ndiŋ a bee-gara n'am duk sɛnɛ mgbara o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
A̧ tɛ gbar ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea, ɓɛɛ a̧ yoɓa mɔ oi-aa, e nɛ ŋma mɔ zu-a.

Kà wi’ɛi nɛ̀ wa ɗaŋa mɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ fee kaɗi, kà ŋma nam kɔ̧-a̧ bó ha'i mɛ yoɓi mɔ‘i siɗoŋ ha̧ a̧ na, wi tɛ yoɓi mɔ‘i siɗoŋ ha̧ GASA WAN: nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, wi tɛ yoɓi mɔ‘i ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧. Zu-a'i wi’ɛi tɛ ha̧ vala sami wen ɗafa sɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ de mɔ nɛ usi'e Sɔ̧ ee ɗaŋmɔ ko wi’ɛi ha̧ a̧.
Zu-mɔ nɛ o be
Mɔ nɛ bíí e nɛtɛ ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; mɔ nɛ bíí ha̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ duk kànà nɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ha̧ o be
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma wiwii ɔɔ in a̧, ɗaŋ nɛ war-tɛ-a, wíì kɔ̧-a̧ iŋ na, ŋma wi-sedaako nɛ zɔka a̧ bo na, ŋma bíí nɛ baa a̧ tɛ mɔ‘i bo na mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ kà taamɔ́-gɔya nɛ́ hɔɔ zu wíì ko kóò‘i, ka a̧ ta'e, kóò kɔ̧-a̧ de nɛ dàlà, ɓɛɛ kà kóò‘i a̧ dee dàlà nɛ mbetɛ, kóó kà taamɔ́-gɔya nɛ́ hɔɔ zu wíì‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ de dàlà na,

tɛ taamɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i, wíì kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧. A̧ tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ wen a̧ nɛnɛ mbɛt. A̧ tɛ ba kilo fuu taar nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka a nɔ̧́ sɛnɛ na in a̧ beka a fuu-nyama sɛnɛ na mbɛt, wen mɛ nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ-dee-gɔya in bee-mɔ.
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ mgbɔ kóò‘i mɛ nɛɛ yor ti GASA WAN.
A̧ tɛ ba sa̧a̧ yì a kɔ̧ be yee, ɓɛɛ a̧ kaia fuunu kɔ̧ tua fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ a sɛnɛ.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ kóò‘i mɛ yor ti GASA WAN. A̧ tɛ ba kalaafi yinɛ zu kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ-bee-mɔ‘i, nɛ̀ duk nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ-dee-gɔya, e er kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ tɛ-a baa yì-bee-mɔ nɛ ɔ paŋa.

Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ kóò‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Kà mɛ nɛ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, kà ŋma wiwii nɛ ɔɔ in mɛɛ na, kà mɛ nɛ ɗaŋa war-tɛ-mɛ ɔr nɛ wíì kɔ-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ ká yí-fom’ɛ nɛ̀ ɔ paŋa’ɛ de ŋma ŋgamɔ in mɛɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, kà mɛ nɛ ɔɔ in ŋma gɔni wiwii, ɗaŋ nɛ war-tɛ-mɛ,
GASA WAN a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu mɛ, a̧ a̧ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ yar ndɔra, zaŋ-mɛ a̧ ndɔr, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kífí nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-tua-wen ko o bíí ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ be nɛ mɔ.
Yí-fom’ɛ tɛ ye zaŋ-mɛ wen ndɔra zaŋ-mɛ, ha̧ mɛ mɛ yar ndɔra.› Ɓɛɛ koo'i tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Ii! Mɔ'ɔ dé hegɔ!›
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ yɔr bee-mɔ‘i zu kalata, ɓɛɛ fɔra si ɗɔɔ paŋ yì.
A̧ tɛ ha̧ paŋ yì‘i nɛ fom a̧a̧ ɗɔa-a'i ha̧ kóò‘i mɛ nɔ; yí-fom'i tɛ ye tɛ kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka bɔnɛ nyimmɔ.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ-dee-gɔya'i er kóò‘i e ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ baa e zu
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kai ŋma be ha̧a̧mɔ‘i hee mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ ga dun kɔ̧ er; a̧ tɛ dɔ mɔ‘i zu
Kà kóò‘i nɛ́ dee so ŋgazu in wíì, ɗaŋ nɛ war-tɛ, yí-fom'i tɛ ye tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka bɔnɛ nyimmɔ. Zaŋ-aa tɛ ndɔr, a̧ tɛ yar ndɔra, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-tua-wen ko o bíí ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ be nɛ mɔ.
Kà kóò‘i nɛ́ ɗaŋa so war-tɛ na, kà a̧ nɛ duka nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ŋma mɔ beka de a̧ na; a̧ tɛ ko bem nɛ de-a.
«Heembea zu okoo nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, nɛ de ŋgazu in wíì ɗaŋ nɛ war-tɛ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Kà wiwii nɛ dee gɔya zu kóò kɔ‘i, ta nɛnɛ‘e kóò dee dàlà, a̧ tɛ ba a̧ e ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dee mɔ lɛŋ nɛ heembea usa zu kóò‘i.
Ŋma mɔ beka hɔ zu wíì na, ɓɛɛ kà kóò‘i nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mbetɛ, ɗaŋmɔ‘i tɛ tik zu a̧.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
a̧ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ kaia siɗi na mbɛt. A̧ beka nɔ ŋma yì waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ beka nyɔŋ tɔr waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó kora-a na mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi
«Ŋgimbi ee tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ yuwar-mɔɔ-nazir, wi’ɛi beka kpui zu-a na hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ wese kaɗa-a ko ŋgimbi'i; a̧ tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧ bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ e ha̧ mu̧i̧-zu-a mɛ hɔ nɛ dɔka-a.
Ŋgimbi n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛ tɛ-a ha̧ GASA WAN'i, a̧ beka hɔ ká̧ wɔr bíí na,
kóó nɛ́ wɔr dáà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ́ wɔr nàà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ́ wɔr nya-a̧, kóó nɛ́ wɔr boko-nya-a̧. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dɔka mu̧i̧-zu-a usi'e a̧ ee tɛ-a ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ ga, a̧ beka de ha̧ simbo mɛ ba a̧ na.
Ŋgimbi ee tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ yuwar-mɔɔ-nazir'i, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ wen GASA WAN.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ fee katɛ a̧ yek nɛ a̧, pi̧ nɛ simbo zu a̧, a̧ tɛ kpui zu-a tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar zɛ, a̧ tɛ kai gbaku̧i yiitoo, kóó pola yiitoo tɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú

Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba nɔ̧́í̧ kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ tɛ dɔ ɓii-aa nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wi’ɛi wen n'aa dee ɗaŋmɔ duk nɛnɛ ká̧ wɔr. Nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ a̧ tɛ e nɛ tɛ-a ha̧ Sɔ̧ woyo.
A̧ tɛ e tɛ-a woyo ha̧ GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kuti ŋgimbi n'aa gɔna so'i; a̧ beka tɔr kuti ŋgimbi nɛ yaka na, wen nɛ yuwar-mɔɔ-nazir kɔ̧-a̧ ɗaŋa so. A̧ tɛ ba
«Heembea zu wi nɛ e tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ yuwar-mɔɔ-nazir nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ŋgimbi nɛ ee tɛ-a ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ kaɗi, wa tɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ si nú

A̧ tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN; nɛ be-sami nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ kpɔk, nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na, wen dɔa-a nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧, zɔŋa sami nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ kpɔk, nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na, wen ɗafa sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, in vala sami nɛ ŋma mɔ ɗaŋ tɛ-a na, wen ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ.
A̧ tɛ ba gɛsɛ
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kai mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ a ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
War ko vala sami, a̧ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, in gɛsɛ
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ee tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ yuwar-mɔɔ-nazir'i tɛ kpui mu̧i̧-zu n'aa ee so ha̧ GASA WAN yinɛ sɛn nú
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba dɔɔ ɓaa sami in ŋma

Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ wɛk o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nɛ duk nɛ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧: ŋguɗi sami n'aa wɛka in ku-a n'aa baa'i nɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, á̧ wi nɛ ee tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nyɛma mɛ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧.

«Heembea wen wi nɛ ha̧a̧ nú mɛ e tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN, in o mɔ n'aa tɛ ha̧ tɛ ŋgimbi'i nɛ mɔ‘i; kà a̧ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ mbe mɔ, a̧ nyɛma mɛ ha̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de kànà mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ee-tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN n'aa yee sɛnɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i. Yuwar toka de yoŋgo zu o be
‹GASA WAN a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ pɛm mɛ;
GASA WAN a̧ de ha̧ sɔnti-a mɛ tok zu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ de ko ha̧ mɛ;
GASA WAN a̧ zɔk mɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ ha̧ mɛ!›
«Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ nin-am tɛ duk nɛnɛ mgbara o be
Wese nɛ Moisɛ kaɗa nɛ baa
O gasawi

Wa kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa tɛnɛ ti GASA WAN: o keekee-nyaŋa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ wa kpee zu wa kpee in o ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo. Keekee-nyaŋa kpɔk duka wen gasawi yiitoo, ɓɛɛ kìí ndai kpɔk wen gasawi kpɔk kpɔk. Wa foo mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ si fara-duk ko Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ kpɛ́k o ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i nɛ wa ha̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i, wen dee tom
Moisɛ kaia o keekee-nyaŋa in o ndai, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii.
A̧ ha̧a̧ keekee-nyaŋa yiitoo in ndai naar ha̧ o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
A̧ ha̧a̧ keekee-nyaŋa naar in ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ha̧ o bem ko Mɛrari nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa; Itamar bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ duka nɛ gasawi zu wa.
War ko o bem ko Kehat, a̧ ha̧ ŋma mɔ na, wen kɔ-wa, wa pɛm nɛ o sa̧a̧ tui nɛ wa tɛ tui nɛ kóŋgó-ɓaa.
O gasawi kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa tɛnɛ wen gbaŋa
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «O gasawi a̧ kai o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa tɛnɛ wen gbaŋa
Kuti wese, wi nɛ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ, nɛ́ Nasɔŋ bem ko Aminadab, be Juda.
Mɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu-nyama tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga.
A̧ baa wiwii ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in
Tɛ yiitoo zɛ, nɛ́ Netanɛl gasawi ko o bezaŋ Isakar bem ko Suar a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in o
Ha̧a̧mɔ ko Natanɛl bem ko Suar nɛ mɔ‘i.
Tɛ taar wese, nɛ́ Eliab gasawi ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ bem ko Elɔŋ a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ‘i duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga.
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea ɗaŋmɔ.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in o
Tɛ naar wese, nɛ́ Elisur gasawi ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn, bem ko Sedeur a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ‘i n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ‘i duka hee kilo kɔya-sede bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in o
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ wese, nɛ́ Selumiɛl gasawi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ bem ko Surisadai a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ‘i duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga.
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in o
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk wese, nɛ́ Eliasaf gasawi ko o bezaŋ Gad bem ko Deuɛl a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ‘i duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga.
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Zu-a'i, a̧ kaia ndai yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ, vala gbadua mɔɔrɔ in o
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wese, nɛ́ Elisama gasawi ko o bezaŋ Efraim bem ko Amihud a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
Ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa baa tɛnɛ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, gasa gba-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dita-a hɛɗa kilo kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kilo bu-mbɔi
A̧ baa mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu tɛnɛ. Dita mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ‘i duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga.
A̧ baa ndai, vala sami in
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba vala gbadua tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar wese, nɛ́ Gamaliɛl gasawi ko o bezaŋ Manase bem ko Pedasur a̧ baa ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ.
