O mɔ nɛ̀ o gasawi
O pɛsa-tasi nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, dita-wa kpɔk kpɔk hɛɗa kilo kpɔk nɛ reeta, ɓɛɛ dita o gba-yee kpɔk kpɔk hɛɗa kilo kpɔk. O tasi nɔ‘i lɛŋ, dita-wa nɛ kilo ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kɔya-sede
Wa ha̧a̧ o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ duna nɛ fuu-nyama; dita wa kpɔk kpɔk duka hee kilo kɔya-sede ɓu ga, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kɔya-sede
O saɗi wen dɔa-a lɛŋ nɛ wiwii ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo, vala sami ɓu-zua-yiitoo, o
O saɗi lɛŋ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ wen ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ nɛ ndai ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar, o vala sami ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, o vala gbadua ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ká bá nɛ̀ o
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ yee kɔ̧
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Arɔŋ‘e, ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ e wee tɛ o lamba, a̧ a̧ e ha̧ o lamba nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i mɛ nyɛk sɛn ti
Arɔŋ dee hegɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o lamba ha̧ mɛ nyɛk ti
Wa duia so
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ káí o be Levii yinɛ mgbara o be
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ
Wa tɛ ba wiwii ndai kpɔk gbam nɛ fuu nɛ‘i vai̧a nɛ nɔ̧́ nɛ wa tɛɛ́ ha̧ so kànà. Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ba ŋma wiwii ndai kpɔk woyo wen ɗafa sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Mɛ tɛ kai o be Levii tɛnɛ pii nú
Mɛ tɛ kai o be Levii pii nú tua'i nɛk ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o be
Arɔŋ tɛ ha̧ o be Levii ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nin o be
O be Levii tɛ e er zu o wiwii ndai. Mɛ tɛ ba ndai kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa mɛ tɛ dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ de do-mɔ zu o be Levii mɛ usi'e wa kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
«Mɛ tɛ kai o be Levii a ti Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧ wa ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara o be Levii in o be
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be Levii tɛ́ tɛ̀ mɛ de tom kɔ̧
wen nɛ‘i hà̧á̧ wa ha̧‘m nɛ kɔ‘m mgbara o be
wen kaya o be
Ɓɛɛ mi kpɛka o be Levii oi nú o kaya-bem ko o be
Mi ha̧a̧ wa ha̧ Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i. Mi kaia wa mgbara o be
Mɔ nɛ Moisɛ, Arɔŋ in o be
O be Levii
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be Levii tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii kɔ̧
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ heembea nɛ duk wen o be Levii. Kà ŋma be Levii nɛ́ kpaa pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ kaɗi, a̧ tɛ de kànà tom kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn kɔ̧
Kà a̧ nɛ́ kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ kaɗi, a̧ beka de tom ɓɔna.
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ tɛ duk gbak nɛ o nya-a̧ tɛ tom kɔ̧
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Moisɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai, sɛn tɛ kuti fio-zɛ tɛ yiitoo pɛ, ɗoŋ gboa-a kɔ-wa nú Egiptɛ. A̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«O be
Ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa'i sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ fio-zɛ‘i mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ. Ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa'i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea in yuwar-a.»
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Wa dee gbaŋa'i tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai. O be
O ŋma bíí nɛ dɔka-a nyɛm so mɛ de gbaŋa'i na, wen nɛ wa tama so wɔr nɛ er-wa wese'i, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ tɛ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ.
Wa aka mɔ: «War-tɛ-ɛɛ sa̧ na, wen ɛɛ foo wɔr nɛ er yɛ. Wen ge sɛk’ɛɛ beka nyɛm mɛ ha̧ mɔ k’ɛɛ ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ ŋgimbi-a hee o dɔka be
Moisɛ kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór ha̧‘m zii mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m zu mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i sɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de kɔ-wa gbaŋa'i tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ, mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ. Wa tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ
Wa beka e oi-aa ŋgɔn na, in wa beka gbin gba̧a̧ na. Wa tɛ de gbaŋa'i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea-a.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ̀ war-tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ dee gbaŋa
«Kà ŋma gɛnɛ nɛ́ hɔɔ mgbara'nɛ́, kà a̧ nɛ́ dee gbaŋa
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa baa nɛ tua nɛ
Dee kànà hegɔ siti ɓɔnsɛnɛ; tura-zan'i kpe nɛ zu fara-duk ko Sɔ̧ nɛ wese, ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ a̧ duka hee wee ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ tura-zan kur zu tua, ɓɛɛ o be
Kà GASA WAN ha̧ nú, ɓɛɛ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ tura-zan ɓɔn kana ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ zu tua'i, o be
Ŋma ŋgimbi ɓɛɛ tura-zan duk zɛ dɔk na; kà GASA WAN ha̧ nú, ɓɛɛ wa yaa kànà oi wa. Kà GASA WAN há̧ nú, ɓɛɛ wa gbina yak.
Ŋma wese tura-zan duk nɛ́ mɛ́ ga̧a̧mɔ hɔ mɛ tuyɛ, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ kur mɛ tuyɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gbina yak.
Kà tura-zan nɛ́ ɓɔna zu tua, kóó zɛ yiitoo, kóó fio-zɛ kpɔk, kóó ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ mbɛt, o be
Nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN a̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ dúí mbia yiitoo nɛ bu-mbɔi. Mɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧ wa nɛ bu-mbɔi. Wa tɛ gbak mɛ wen saa o bíí in wen gbina-a yak.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ dɔm nɛ o mbia nɔ‘i, o bíí lɛŋ tɛ tɛ pii katɛ mɛ, sɛn nú
Kà wa nɛ́ dɔma nɛ mbia kpɔk ɓɛɛ, nɛ́ o gasawi nú-gara ko o be
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ dɔm o mbia ndaa-ŋmaa, ndaa-ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ ya nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese a̧ tɛ kur mɛ yak.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia ndaa-ŋmaa, ndaa-ŋmaa woyo, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o wi nɛ ya nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, a̧ tɛ kur mɛ yak. Dɔma mɔ ndaa-ŋmaa, ndaa-ŋmaa tɛ usi nɛ́ kura-a yak;
ɓɛɛ dɔma mɔ gɔn hiɗi na, tɛ usi nɛ mɔi̧a bíí.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bem ko Arɔŋ a̧ tɛ dɔm dɔma mɔ! Mɔ‘i nɛ́ ŋma heembea nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ wen'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́.
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ biro sitɛ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ bi'nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ dɔm mbia ndaa-ŋmaa, ndaa-ŋmaa, ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́; ɓɛɛ hegɔ mi tɛ kpasi'nɛ́ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́.

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ be tɛɛ de yɔyɛ, kóó nɛ gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ, kóó nɛ gbaŋa lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ dɔm o mbia nɔ‘i mbɛt ŋgimbi dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ŋgimbi ɗafa sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ hegɔ, tɛ‘m tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́. Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Tɛ yiitoo pɛ sɛn tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-yiitoo tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ, tura-zan kura sɛn zu tua
O be
Kuti gbina-a ko o be
Nɛ́ tutuwal ko o bíí Juda a̧ kura ti in o wi-biro kɔ‘i. Nɛ́ Nasɔŋ, bem ko Aminadab a̧ duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Juda;
Netanɛl, bem ko Suar duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Isakar;
ɓɛɛ Eliab bem ko Elɔŋ duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ.
Wa yaia
Tutuwal ko o bíí ko Rubɛn kura in o wi-biro kɔ‘i yak ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Elisur, bem ko Sedeur a̧ duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn.
Salamiɛl, bem ko Surisadai duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ Eliasaf, bem ko Deuɛl duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Gad.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ o bem ko Kehat nɛ tui kɔ-wa nɛ o mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna a̧ yaka. O wi nɛ yaka baa
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ tutuwal ko o bíí ko Efraim in o wi-biro kɔ‘i a̧ kura yak, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Elisama bem ko Amihud a̧ duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Efraim.
Gamaliɛl bem ko Pedasur, duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Manase,
ɓɛɛ Abidaŋ bem ko Gedeɔŋ, duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin.
Sɔŋkur-aa, nɛ́ tutuwal ko o bíí ko Dan in o wi-biro kɔ‘i a̧ kpee ndaa-gɔtɔ ɓɛɛ kur yak. Nɛ́ Ahiezɛr bem ko Amisadai a̧ duka zu o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Dan.
War ko o wi-biro ko o bezaŋ Asɛr, nɛ́ Pagiɛl, bem ko Okraŋ a̧ duka zu wa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o bezaŋ Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Ahira, bem ko Enaŋ.
Yuwar gbina-a ko o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ for-wi Obab bem ko Reuɛl be Madiaŋ‘e: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ si fara nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú mɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́. Mɛ tɛ in yɛɛ; ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ́ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa demɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú mɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be
Obab kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi beka nɛ́ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na; mi tɛ si ye kɔ‘m mɛ duk in o bíí kɔ‘m.»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Mi aia nú ha̧ mɛ, ká mɛ e yɛ duk na; wen nɛ́ mɛ a̧ iŋa fara n’ɛɛ nyɛma ɔa-a sɛnɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà; nɛ́ mɛ́'ɛ tɛ duk wi-usi-war h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Kà mɛ nɛ tɛɛ́ in yɛɛ, mɛ́ tɛ kpa kànà demɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́‘i mbɛt.»
Wa dee nɛ zɛ taar tɛ naŋanɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa ee nɛ kaya Sinai duk. Tɛ nɔ̀ nɛ wa nɛɛ zɛ taar'i, Kuɓa
Tura-zan ko GASA WAN kpee zu wa mɛ wese ŋgimbi nɛ wa gbin nɛnɛ yak.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa gɔ
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa gɔ
Ŋma wese, o be
O giiwi hiɗa mɔ sitɛ Moisɛ; a̧ kɔfa mɔ in Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wee'i ga̧.
Wa saa nin fara'i nɛ Tabera, mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e «wee», wen wee ko GASA WAN kuma so o be
O ŋma gɔni bíí yaa so mgbara wa de nɛ wɔ kpoo; mɔ‘i dee ha̧ o be
Tɛ yɛ mbaŋa ɗoŋ o zoro, o gala, o saa, o war, ti̧i̧ri in o geɗek ti̧i̧ri nɛ de pɛr-aa nyɛmna n’ɛɛ nyɔŋ so sɔɔ géè sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ.
Kinii nú yɛ kora kpaa-kpaa, nyɔŋmɔ k’ɛɛ‘i kànà nɛ
Ŋgimbi nɛ dɔmbɔrɔ kpe nɛ zu gbagari mɛ zɛ, nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧
Moisɛ zia dukbíí fara aia nú; wa mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa nɛ nú-gara ya nɛnɛ nú tua-laa kɔ-wa. See GASA WAN nyima nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ Moisɛ iŋ zu mɔ nɛ tɛ de na.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Wen ge ɛnɛ de mɔ in wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ hegɔ ge nde? Gè ɗaŋmɔ ge a̧‘m dee ti'nɛ́, s’ɛnɛ mɔi̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ e nɛ tui zu'm ge?

Nɛ́ mi a̧‘m baa zaŋ dukbíí'ɛ nde? Nɛ́ mi a̧‘m koo wa, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e, à̧‘m bá wa e yí ŋguɗ‘am hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naa-wan-bem ba nɛ bem kɔ‘i e yí ŋguɗi’ɛ ga nde? Ɓɛɛ tui'i tɛ duk zu'm hɔ nɛnɛ fara n’ɛnɛ baa ha̧ so nú‘nɛ́ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa nde?
Mi tɛ kpa kpoo mɛ ha̧ ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ nɛ ndak ɗoŋ-am, hiɗi nɛ mɔ‘e a̧‘m ha̧ kpoo ha'i nyɔŋ wó'ɛ sɛn déè?
Mi beka nyɛm tuia o wi nɔ'ɔ ɛ̀n’ám na, wen wa dita gan am.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de mɔ in am hegɔ, ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ nɛ‘m yinɛ; mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, kà ko nɛ́ dee'nɛ́ ha̧‘m, ká‘m zɔk pɛrti bɔnɛ'ɛ ɓɔna.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o gasawi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo mgbara o be
Mi tɛ zir hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in mɛɛ. Mi tɛ ba ŋma be ŋgai kɔ-mɛ n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ ha̧ wa. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa tɛ ba nɛ dita tui yinɛ zu mɛ, nɛ mɛ beka tui ɛ̀nɛ̀-mɛ ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí ndé: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀
Bo nɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ wese kpɔk kóó yiitoo, kóó mɔɔrɔ, kóó ɓu, kóó ɓu-yiitoo ɓɛɛ na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ kii-zɛ kpɔk, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ pɛr-aa beka de tɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɔna in hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ tɛ de sɛ̧ɛ̧. Ɛnɛ ee GASA WAN nɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ku̧i̧ mɔ ti a̧‘e, wi gboo nú Egiptɛ wen ge?› »
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧a̧: «O wi-biro n'am duk mgbara-a nɛ bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ‘e ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ kpoo ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ kii-zɛ kpɔk!
Kóó wi gbɛɛ so nɛ o sami in o ndai, tɛ nyɛm so wa nde? Kóó bòò só nɛ́ o zoro ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp lɛŋ ká nyɛma wa nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Ŋgai kɔ‘m nyɛm wen dee mɔ‘i na nde? Mɛ tɛ zɔk kà wen kɔ‘m nɛ́ hɔɔ gba̧a̧ na!»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ gboo si zan, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧‘i ha̧ dukbíí. A̧ hoka o gasawi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; a̧ aa wa zik ká̧ tua.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN zira tɛ tura-zan, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Moisɛ; a̧ baa ŋma be nú
O ŋma bíí yiitoo ɓɔna so kɔ‘i kɔ̧ gbagari: nin-wa nɛ Ɛldad in Mɛdad. Wa hoka so wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ kɔ-wa kɔ̧
Ŋma be-ŋgaiwi maa yì nɛɛ mbaŋ tɛ Moisɛ: «Ɛldad in Mɛdad tɔ̧ nɛ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari!»
Ɓɛɛ Josue, bem ko Nun, wi nɛ de so tom ha̧ Moisɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ bem mɛ, tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Nyaa Moisɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dór wa!»
Moisɛ kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ a nɛ see mɔ oi nú‘m nde? Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m nyɛmna ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ e
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ pia ɗoŋ pii kɔ̧ gbagari in o gasawi ko o be

GASA WAN dee ha̧ hara-búk mɛ yu nɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp daŋnɛ ha̧ mɛ kai o kpaŋanaŋa tɛnɛ. O kpaŋanaŋa nɔ‘i a̧a̧ dam fara lɛŋ zik nɛ gbagari kpa ŋmaa. Wa mboɗa zu ŋmaa hee mɛtrɛ kpɔk ga delele; kóó wi nɛɛ so nɔ̀ tɛ zɛ kpɔk, wi tɛ kpa kànà nɛ kpaa wa yaknɛ.
O bíí kura kai nɛ o kpaŋanaŋa nɔ‘i mɛ wese in mɛ zɛ, hegɔ tɛ zɛ yiitoo. Wi nɛ kai kɔ‘i batɛ na, kaia gan kilo booro-taar ɓɛɛ. Wa kaia a wese zik kpa gbagari lɛŋ.
Kpoo biti kɔ̧ nú-wa, wa tɛ gur hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ see GASA WAN nyim zu wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ zɛɛ-geŋa mgbara wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa saa nin fara'i'e Kibrot-Taawa, wen nɛ tɔ̧ «Pɛsi Aa-see-mɔ», wen wa guna o wi-a-see-mɔ hi̧i̧ nɛ dɔka-a.
O bíí kura Kibrot-Taawa yak si Hasɛrot; ɓɛɛ wa ya hi̧i̧.
Moisɛ baa so nɛ zɔŋa Kus nɛ kóò, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Mariama in Arɔŋ kaia ndaa-a wen zu baa-ŋmaa kɔ-wa'i.
Wa tɔ̧a̧: «Wi nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in a̧, kànà nɛ́ Moisɛ ɓɛɛ nde? Bo nɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in yɛɛ mbɛt na nde?» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zii wen'i.
Moisɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma wi-mɔka-see gan o bíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ.
Ahai GASA WAN saa Moisɛ, Arɔŋ in Mariama ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ si nú
GASA WAN zira nɛ tɛ tura-zan, ɓɛɛ yor nú tua. A̧ saa Arɔŋ in Mariama, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ ɗɔŋ pii ti.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i nɛ de-a. Kà ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ duk nɛ
Ɓɛɛ war ko Moisɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m n'am ee mɔɔ-kɔ̧-tua kɔ‘m lɛŋ er-a, bo hegɔ na.
Mi tɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧ nɛ hee ger, ɓɛɛ mi dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk am; mi hu̧si yí-wen nɛ a̧ na. A̧ zɔka kiitɛ‘m; hee ge n’ɛnɛ tɛ kai ndaa Moisɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m ge?»
See GASA WAN nyima in wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak e wa duk.
Tura-zan yuu zu tua, ɓɛɛ soɓee, tɛ Mariama kpee nɛ zɛɛ doko kaɗi; tɛ-a lɛŋ kifa nɛ bu-a hee ɓɔrɔ ga. Arɔŋ zika tɛ ɓɛɛ zɔk'e, doko baa Mariama.
Arɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Nyaa, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛɛ dea mɛ tik zu yɛ na; ɛɛ nɛ o wi nɛ ta mɔ na, ɛɛ nɛ o ɗaŋwi.
Ká Mariama duk hee hɔɔ-bem nɛ ŋma war-tɛ-a ɗaŋa ɗaŋ ŋgimbi nɛ wa koo nɛ a̧ ga na.»
Moisɛ kɔfa GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ho! Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'a na nde?»

Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Kà bo so nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ mboɗa sap a yí-a, bo nɛ ziimɔ tɛɛ́ ba a̧ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo na nde? Wa a̧ ba a̧ nɛnɛ ɗoŋ gbagari, ha̧ a̧ duk hi̧i̧ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo kaɗi, sɛka a̧ pia ɗoŋ.»
Wa foo Mariama e ɗoŋ ye tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ o bíí gbin yak na hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa pia nɛ ɗoŋ.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o bíí gbina nɛ Haserot yak si ŋga-gbárà Paraŋ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tóm o bíí ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk nú Kanaŋ n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
Moisɛ toma o gasawi nɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, nɛ ŋga-gbárà Paraŋ yaknɛ. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ o gasawi mgbara o be
Nin-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: tɛ zuduk ko Rubɛn nɛ́ Samua, bem ko Zakur, a̧ wa toma.
Tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Safat bem ko Ori;
tɛ zuduk ko Juda nɛ́ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ;
tɛ zuduk ko Isakar nɛ́ Yigɛal bem ko Jozɛf;
tɛ zuduk ko Efraim nɛ́ Ozea bem ko Nun;
tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Palti, bem ko Rafu;
tɛ zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Gadiɛl, bem ko Sodi;
tɛ zuduk ko Jozɛf nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Manase, nɛ́ Gadi, bem ko Susi;
tɛ zuduk ko Dan nɛ́ Amiɛl bem ko Gemali;
tɛ zuduk ko Asɛr nɛ́ Setur bem ko Mikaɛl;
tɛ zuduk ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Nabi bem ko Vopsi;
ɓɛɛ tɛ zuduk ko Gad nɛ́ Geuɛl, bem ko Maki.
Nin o bíí nɛ Moisɛ toma wen kpee naŋ nù‘i nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ aa nin Josue ha̧ Ozea bem ko Nun.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ toma nɛ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpe nɛ naŋ mɔ tɛ nú Kanaŋ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ Nɛgɛb, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya,
wen zɔka nù‘i in o bíí nɛ ya sɛnɛ, kà wa nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, kóó o ɓɔsa-wi, kà wa nɛ́ dɔka, kóó kà wa dɔk na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k nù‘i nɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ‘i, kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ de nù, kóó nɛ́ ɗaŋ nù, in kà o ye nɛ yaa géè, kóó kà wa nɛ́ mboo nɛ garo zik nɛnɛ;

kà nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ nú-dɛm-nyɔnɔ, kóó nyɔnɔ beka dɛm sɛnɛ na, kà o te a̧ boo hi̧i̧, kóó bo na nde. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ŋma waya-te nù‘i piinɛ.» Ŋgimbi'i duka so nɛ ŋgimbi ku̧u̧naŋ-waia-a ko o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa yaka mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk nù‘i, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ ŋga-gbárà Sin hɔ nɛnɛ Rehob sɛn ká̧ Lebo-Hamat.
Wa nɛɛ́ nɛ̀ Nɛgɛb hɔ Ekrɔŋ, fara nɛ o bezaŋ Anak, Ahiman, Sesai in Tolman ɔɔ so sɛnɛ. Wa mboo so Hebrɔŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛti ha̧ ye Tanis sɛn Egiptɛ.
Wa hɔɔ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Ɛskɔl, ɓɛɛ wa ɓir ŋma gbaa-er nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ oi waya-a, hɛr tɛ te gɔ nɛnɛ. Wa ɓii o gbɛ̧ waya-te nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in waya kóɓò nɛ‘i sa'e grenad in o mbɔra mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa saa nin fara'i'e kɔ̧-ɗɔŋgɔ Ɛskɔl,
O wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ dee zɛ ɓu-naar, ɓɛɛ wa pii ɗoŋ tɛ naŋanɔ kɔ-wa.
Wa hɔɔ ɓɛɛ wa nɛ tɛ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ in o be
Mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛɛ nɛɛ hɔ fara n’ɛnɛ toma yɛ si sɛnɛ. Yibere in gɔrɔ fok fok hi̧i̧ nɛ mbetɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o waya-te n’ɛɛ kaia piinɛ.
Mɔ kpɔk, o bíí nù‘i nɛ o ŋga-wi, o ye ɔ gasa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa mboo garo mboo zik nɛnɛ lɛŋ; ɛɛ kpaa o bezaŋ Anak hi̧i̧ mbɛt.
O be Amalɛk ɔ kɔ‘i nú gbara Nɛgɛb; o be Hit in o be Jebus ká bá nɛ̀ o be Amɔr ɔ kɔ-wa zu kaya; ɓɛɛ o be Kanaŋ ɔ kɔ-wa mgbák ká̧ gba-tɔp in nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn.»
Kalɛb kpee nú o bíí nɛ yaa ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ katɛ Moisɛ, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛɛ nɛ! Ɛ̀ɛ̀ bí o ye nɔ‘i! Ɛɛ nyɛma mɛ ba nù‘i.»
Ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ nɛɛ in a̧ tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ bo nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ bi o wi nɔ‘i na, wen wa ŋgaia gan yɛ.»
Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nù nɛ wa zɔka'i ha̧ o be
Ɛɛ kpaa o bezaŋ Anak, nɛ tugun-wa nɛ o gba-tɛ-bíí nɛ̀ kusi. Ɛɛ yaa ti wa hee o dɔya ga, ɓɛɛ wa zɔka so ɛɛ hee o géé dɔya ga mbɛt.»
O bíí lɛŋ ku̧u̧ naŋ hiɗa mɔ. Wa yaa tɛ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ zɛzɛzɛ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ.
O be
Wen ge sa GASA WAN mgbɔ ɛɛ nɛnɛ tɛ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ fe ɗɔɔ gba-paa ge? O wisɛn tɛ kai o kóò k’ɛɛ in o bem k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ gana so h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ si ɗoŋ sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ na nde?»
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ nú ŋmaa: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ hók ŋma wan nɛ tɛ duk zu yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si Egiptɛ.»
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ hɔ̧fa̧ tik nù sɛn ti gii be
Josue bem ko Nun in Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ nɛ yaa so mgbara o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ nɔ‘i a̧ka̧ laa yinɛ tɛ.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o gii be
Kà GASA WAN nɛ yora ɗoŋ yɛ, a̧ tɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ye tɛ nù‘i; a̧ tɛ ha̧ nù‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́. Nɛ́ nù nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok fok sɛnɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋgazu in GASA WAN na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu o bíí nù‘i na. Ɛɛ tɛ de ŋmaa in wa war kpɔk ɓɛɛ. Wi zɔk géé zɔka gi̧ɔ̧ sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, GASA WAN a̧a̧ in yɛɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu wa na!»
O bíí lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so kɔ‘i mɛ yo nɛ wa nɛ ta, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN zir duk zu
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «O wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ e bɔɔ zɔka'm hee geemɔ ga duk mɛ gese ge? Nɛ́ mɛ gese ge a̧ wa tɛ e nɛ ta nɛ‘m tɛ o gasamɔ nɛ‘m dee ha̧ wa’ɛ ge?
Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋga-zɛɛ tɛ-wa, wa beka kpa mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kifi gasa dukbíí gan wa.»
Moisɛ kifa nú ha̧ GASA WAN: «O be Egiptɛ iŋa'e nɛ́ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gboo dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ er-wi,

ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ-a ha̧ o bíí nù'ɛ. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ iŋa'e, ɛnɛ a̧a̧ mgbara dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́. Wa iŋa'e ɛnɛ GASA WAN, ɛnɛ usi tɛ‘nɛ́ usi ha̧ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ̀ wese, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ ɛnɛ yaka ti ha̧ wa tɛ tura-zan; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ zɛ, ɛnɛ duka ti ha̧ wa tɛ wee.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ha̧ dukbíí nɔ'ɔ mɛ kum hee kpɔk bíí ga, o bíí nɛ tɛ zii hu̧ra nin'nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧:
‹GASA WAN gbɛɛ wa lɛŋ ŋga-gbárà, wen a̧ nyɛm so mɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ ye tɛ nù n'aa kana so mɔ‘e nde, wi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa'i na.›
Mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so'e,
wi nɛ GASA WAN, nɛ see nyim nɛ haya-a na, nɛ yor ɗoŋ
Hegɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko o bíí nɔ'ɔ ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ gasa
GASA WAN kifa nú: «Mi ee ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ aka ga.

Mɔ kpɔk, o kpar-wi nɔ'ɔ zɔka gasamɔ kɔ‘m in ŋgamɔ lɛŋ n'am dee so sɛn Egiptɛ in sɛn ŋga-gbárà; ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa wea'm war ɓu yak kaɗi, wa zii wen kɔ‘m na mbɛt. Tɛ mɔ‘i, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, in hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ gasamɔ kɔ‘m duna zaŋnu ga,
mi kana mɔ, ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara wa beka hɔ tɛ nù n'am ha̧a̧ so nú wen ha̧a̧ ha̧ o daa kɔ-wa na. Ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ ee so'm tɛ geemɔ beka hɔ hi̧i̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ war ko Kalɛb, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m nɛ̀ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛtɛ, nɛ̀ ník naŋ tɛ mboo zu ha̧‘m na, mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ hɔ tɛ nù n'aa nɛɛ hɔ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-aa tɛ ba nù‘i.
War ko o be Amalɛk in o be Kanaŋ, wa tɛ ɔ kɔ-wa tɛ bɔkɔ-nù. Mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ war ŋga-gbárà sinɛ̀ ɗoŋ si ká̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Mi zia ku̧i̧amɔ ko o ɗaŋ duk be
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa, mi kana mɔ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, mi tɛ de mɔ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ n'am zia.
O wɔr-wa tɛ a nù ŋga-gbárà hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen wa dee ŋgazu in am. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra so nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana mbɛt.
Mi kana mɔ, wa beka hɔ tɛ nù n'am kana so mɔ mɛ a wa sɛnɛ na. Nɛ́ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ in Josue bem ko Nun a̧ tɛ hɔ hi̧i̧ ɓɛɛ.
War ko o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e wa tɛ kai wa nɛ bara'i, mi tɛ mgbɔ wa hɔ hi̧i̧. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ iŋ nù‘i n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ so k’ɛ́nɛ́ na'i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wɔr'nɛ́ tɛ a nù ŋga-gbárà hɛ̧ɛ̧.
O bezaŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ dai mɔ nɛnɛ nɛ ŋga-gbárà tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ tui bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wɔr'nɛ́ lɛŋ tɛ a nù ŋga-gbárà'ɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naŋanɔ-kpe-naŋ-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee nɛ zɛ ɓu-naar ga, nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ya nɛnɛ zaŋ bɔnɛ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar, kà be de k’ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ sii kafɛ in am.
Mi GASA WAN, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m kaɗi, mi kana mɔ, nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m tɛ de nɛnɛ in ɗaŋ dukbíí'ɛ nɛ dee ŋgazu in am’ɛ. Wa tɛ kum mɛ kum kaɗi sɛn ŋga-gbárà'ɛ.»
War ko o wi nɛ Moisɛ toma so mɛ kpe naŋ mɔ nɛ pia ɗoŋ, we nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa zɔka tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ ká de ha̧ o dukbíí mɛ kur zu Moisɛ‘i,
o wi-ŋga-see nɔ‘i nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen zu nù‘i, kpaa ŋga fio fe ti GASA WAN nɛ bu wese.
Mgbara o wi nɛ nɛɛ kpe naŋ mɔ, nɛ́ Josue bem ko Nun, in Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ a̧ ɓɔna kpasa.
Moisɛ baa wen'i tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Mɔ sa̧a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ, wa daŋa si mgbara kaya, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ! Ɛɛ tɛ daŋ si fara nɛ GASA WAN usa. Nɛ́ kpasawen, ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ aka mɔ: «Nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ de hi̧i̧ ge? Ɛnɛ nyar nɛ ndaa-wen ko GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i beka gbak na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ daŋ si hi̧i̧ na, wen GASA WAN bo mgbara'nɛ́ na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ bi'nɛ́ na.
O be Amalɛk in o be Kanaŋ a̧a̧ ti'nɛ́‘i, wa tɛ kum'nɛ́ nɛ gba-paa. Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ee nɛɛ ɗoŋ GASA WAN duk ga, a̧ beka nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na.»
Wa kɔna ŋguɗi-wa, ɓɛɛ wa daŋ si mgbara kaya, ká
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Amalɛk in o be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔɔ so mgbara kaya'i zira tɛnɛ, de ŋmaa in wa, ɓɛɛ ndak wa hɔ nɛnɛ Ɔrma.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ tɛ mɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, kóó nɛ
wi nɛ tɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN'i tɛ ha̧ kilo fuu taar nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ litrɛ nɔ̧́ kpɔk nɛ reeta.
Ɓɛɛ ko dɔ̧ɔ̧, mɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ litrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta wen tɛna-a a nù in
Kà á̧ boo nɛ vala sami, mɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ kilo fuu mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in litrɛ nɔ̧́ yiitoo.
Mɛ tɛ ha̧ litrɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ yiitoo wen tɛna-a a nù. Mɛ tɛ ha̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee ha̧ GASA WAN.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nɛ wiwii ndai wen dɔa-a ha̧ GASA WAN, kóó wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ oi
mɛ tɛ ha̧ kilo fuu mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar nɛ‘i vata nɛ nɔ̧́ tɛ litrɛ taar e zu wiwii ndai'i.
Ɓɛɛ ko dɔ̧ɔ̧, mɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ litrɛ taar wen tɛna-a a nù; mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee tɛ GASA WAN.
«Mɛ nɛ kpɔk kalemɔ‘i a'i tɛ de ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ha̧ nɛ wiwii ndai, vala sami,
Ɛnɛ tɛ de kànà nɛ kpɔk mɔ‘i tɛ ha̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka mɔ-dai n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ lɛŋ.
O bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ tɛ de kànà nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i, ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ha̧ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee ha̧ GASA WAN.
Kà ŋma gɛnɛ nɛ́ yee mgbara'nɛ́, kóó kà tugun-aa nɛ́ dee ye in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, kà a̧ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee ha̧ GASA WAN, a̧ tɛ de kànà nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i hee ɛnɛ ga.
O dɔka bíí lɛŋ tɛ de kànà nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ hee ɛnɛ ga, kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ nɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ mbɛt. Nɛ́ heembea nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo wen'nɛ́ in wen o gɛnɛ nɛ ya mgbara'nɛ́.
Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ in yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ kpɔk mɔ in o gɛnɛ nɛ ya mgbara'nɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ku̧ naŋ nyɔŋa mɔɔ-nù‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ zu-nyɔŋmɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ kuti-brɛt n’ɛnɛ tɛ dɔ hee zu-nyɔŋmɔ ga ha̧‘m. Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de nɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ ga.
Ɛnɛ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ kuti zu-nyɔŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ gbina ŋma heembea mgbara o dɔka-a nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Moisɛ tɛ wese n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛnɛ hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ,
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ dee mɔ‘i, nɛ̀ bo nɛ́ o bíí a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ na, o wi nɔ‘i tɛ ha̧ wiwii ndai in dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛ ha̧ kànà nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ; wa tɛ ha̧ vala gbadua ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ usi'e, o be
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ko o be
«Kà á̧ boo nɛ bíí kpɔk a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ, nɛ̀ bo nɛ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de na, a̧ tɛ ha̧ nɛ gbadua nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ kpɔk, ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ de do-mɔ nɛ yí GASA WAN nɛ usi'e wi’ɛi kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ mɔ n'aa dea n'aa iŋ na'i. Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ de do-mɔ‘i zu wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN ee ɗaŋmɔ ko wi’ɛi ha̧ a̧.
Heembea'i tɛ duk nɛ kpɔk mɔ wen bíí nɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na, kóó nɛ be
«Ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ̀ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ saka-yí, kóó wi’ɛi nɛ́ be
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ee wen ko GASA WAN tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin heembea kɔ̧-a̧ ga, wa tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik zu a̧.»
Ŋgimbi'i, ká o be
O wi nɛ kpaa a̧‘i mgbɔɔ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ Moisɛ, Arɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o be
Wa pɛma a̧ nɛ de-a wen wa tɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de nɛ a̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ wi’ɛ yinɛ, o bíí lɛŋ à̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ yó a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ ɗoŋ ye mɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ mgbɔ a̧ gbonɛ si ɗoŋ ye, ɓɛɛ wa yo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be

Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok o sika mɔɔ nɔ‘i nu laa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk wa, tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o heembea ko GASA WAN lɛŋ. Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi wa nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka ndak ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ see'nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na, in o mɔ nɛ yí‘nɛ́ zɔk na mbɛt, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ e'm duk.
Hegɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ ta mɔ wen kasa o heembea kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ sa̧ yi Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ kaia'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, mɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kore bem ko Yisɛhar, be-koo Kehat, be Levii aa wen ha̧ Dataŋ in ha̧ Abiram bem ko Eliat, in ha̧ Ɔn, bem ko Pɛlɛt; wa taar'i lɛŋ nɛ o bezaŋ Rubɛn.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa in o be
Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa nɛ gii, ɓɛɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ de’ɛ za̧i̧a̧! O wi nɔ'ɔ ɔ sa̧a̧ lɛŋ, wen GASA WAN duk mgbara wa; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o'o ee'nɛ́ mɛ duk zu wa o?»
Moisɛ zia wen'i, ba yí gu nù,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Kore in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Sa̧a̧mɔ, GASA WAN tɛ usi wi nɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧, wi nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ in wi nɛ nyɛma mɛ ɗɔŋ si katɛ a̧. Wi n'aa tɛ hok'i, nɛ́ wi nɛ tɛ ɗɔŋ si katɛ a̧.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Kore in o bíí kɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí o mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee.
Mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ a kɛ̧i̧-wee kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ aa fuu-nyama zu a̧ ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ hok, nɛ wi’ɛi a̧ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Ɛnɛ dee mɔ za̧i̧, ɛnɛ o be Levii!»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Kore woyo: «O be Levii, ɛnɛ zii!
GASA WAN hoka'nɛ mgbara o dɔka bíí e nɛtɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɛ si katɛ a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de tom kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk oi nú bíí lɛŋ, ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ wor nɛ sɔ̧ oi nú wa; mɔ‘i nyɛm'nɛ́ na nde?
A̧ kpɛka h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ a̧, mɛ in o nya-mɛ; nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa mɛ in o bíí kɔ-mɛ de ŋgazu in GASA WAN! Arɔŋ nɛ ge bíí ge s’ɛnɛ ku̧i̧ a̧ ge?»
Moisɛ saa Dataŋ in Abiram, o bem ko Eliab, ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú: «Ɛɛ beka nɛ́ k’ɛɛ na.
Mɛ dee so h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ e de fara nɛ nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ in yibere fok sɛnɛ duk mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ fe sɛn ŋga-gbárà hɛ̧ɛ̧; mɔ‘i tɛ nyɛm tɛ mɛ na, sa mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu yɛ woyo nde?
Bo nɛ mɛ mgbɔ nɛ ɛɛ sitɛ nù nɛ nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ in yibere fok sɛnɛ na. Bo nɛ mɛ ha̧a̧ nɛ fɔ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ na. Mɛ tɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘e, wi nɔ'ɔ zɔk mɔ na? K’ɛɛ, ɛɛ beka nɛ na.»
See Moisɛ nyima, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa na. Mi de kɔ‘m ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in wa na, kà bó nɛ̀ baa ŋma tuifuu kɔ-wa na mbɛt.»
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Kore: «Mɛ in o bíí kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ Arɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ yor ti GASA WAN.

Kóó o ndé a̧ ba mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee kɔ‘i tɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ á fuu-nyama zu a̧, ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé a̧ ba tɛnɛ e ti GASA WAN; mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧‘e, mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. Mɛ in Arɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ mbɛt.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o nde baa mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee kɔ‘i tɛnɛ, e wee sɛnɛ, a fuu-nyama zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ yor ti GASA WAN sɛn nú
Kore mɔi̧a o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ, gbìsì nú
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mgbara o wi nɔ'ɔ, wen mi tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ kinii.»
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ guu nù ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi nɔ'ɔ mɛ yu fara ko Kore, Dataŋ in Abiram.»
Moisɛ kura nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Dataŋ in Abiram, ɓɛɛ o gasawi
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nyɛi̧ nɛ fara ko o wi-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ; k’ɛ́nɛ́ fo ŋma mɔ kɔ-wa na, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ kum wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bíí ɗɔŋa si ɗoŋ, e fara ko Kore, Dataŋ in Abiram nɛ nyɛi̧a-a. Dataŋ in Abiram gboo so ya nú tua-laa in o kóò kɔ-wa, o bem kɔ-wa gu nɛ o be-koo wa lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧: «Tɛ mɔ'ɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ ndé, bo nɛ mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ zu'm na; mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN toma'm tɛnɛ mɛ de.
Kà o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ fee nɛ́ géé fio kɔ-wa, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí lɛŋ fe nɛnɛ'ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ GASA WAN á̧ toma'm na.
Ɓɛɛ kà GASA WAN nɛ́ dee ŋma ŋgamɔ, kà nù hu̧i̧, nù gúr wa, wa in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ, kà wa zir nɛ kpasa si fara ko o fio mɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ ndé, o wi nɔ'ɔ ee so GASA WAN tɛ geemɔ.»
Moisɛ tɛ kaɗi so tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen na, ɓɛɛ nù mbaŋ ɗɔɔ naŋ-wa,
gur wa in o bíí kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí ko Kore gu nɛ mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Wa zira nɛ zu kpasa si fara ko o fio mɛ, wa in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nù kpe zu wa lɛŋ, wa bo mgbara bíí ɓɔna.
O be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN toma wee tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ dɔ o bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ lɛŋ nɛ duka so dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama'i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar bem ko Arɔŋ ndé, a̧ a̧ kai mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee yí wee yinɛ wen wa ɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ yai wee yinɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
Wa a̧ kai mɔɔ-a o kɛ̧i̧-wee ko o wi nɛ fee wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa, gusi ndaɗa-ndaɗa wen kpea-a nɛ zu
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar kaia o mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndɛrɛ, nɛ o bíí nɛ bia so wee ee ti GASA WAN'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gusi ndaɗa-ndaɗa mɛ kpe nɛ zu
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-mbaŋ tɛ o be
Mɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí kura zu Moisɛ in Arɔŋ, Moisɛ in Arɔŋ zika tɛ sitɛ
Wa nɛɛ si nú
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mgbara o wi nɔ'ɔ, wen mi tɛ kum wa yinɛ kinii.» Wa tika nù ba yí-wa gu nù ti GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ bá mɔɔ-a-kɛ̧i̧-wee sɛnɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ haya-a sitɛ o bíí, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu wa, wen see GASA WAN duia kaɗi. Ŋgamɔ tika nù kaɗi.»
Arɔŋ baa mɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ ye mgbara o bíí, ká ŋgamɔ ku̧u̧ naŋ kpaa o ŋma bíí mgbara o bíí kaɗi. A̧ aa fuu-nyama tɛ wee, ɓɛɛ a̧ de do-mɔ nɛ usi ea-ɗaŋmɔ zu o bíí.
A̧ nɛɛ yor mgbara o wɔr in o bíí nɛ tɛ fe na, ɓɛɛ ŋgamɔ‘i kaɗi.
Bíí lɛŋ nɛ fea nɛ bíí booro-ɓu-zua-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wi tɔr o wan nɛ fea ŋgimbi ko Kore na.
Ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ pii ɗoŋ tɛɛ kpa Moisɛ sɛn nú
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Mɛ tɛ yɔr nin Arɔŋ tɛ dɔra ko zuduk ko Levii, wen dɔra kpɔk tɛ duk wen gasawi tɛ zuduk kpɔk.
Mɛ tɛ kai o dɔra nɛ́ɛ̀ a nú
Wi nɛ dɔra kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɓɔ, nɛ́ wi’ɛi a̧‘m hoka. Hegɔ, mi tɛ fo ku̧i̧amɔ ko o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ kai o dɔra nɔ‘i a ti GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧
Mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, Moisɛ yee kɔ̧ tua fara nɛ
Moisɛ kaia o dɔra nɔ‘i ti GASA WAN gbonɛ mɛ usi ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ bá dɔra ko Arɔŋ e ti
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ de hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga.
O be
Bíí lɛŋ nɛ nɛ́ si ká̧ fara-duk ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ fe fee’ɛ! Ɛɛ tɛ kum kànà lɛŋ a nù nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ, gu nɛ o bíí kɔ-mɛ, ɗaŋmɔ nɛ o bíí tɛ de tɛ
Mɛ tɛ sa o nya-mɛ tɛ duk ko Levii, nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ ha̧ wa mɛ ndaɗi in mɛ, wen tom-sa̧a̧-fara. Wa tɛ ya nɛ wi-gbak-mɛ, wa tɛ yor ɗoŋ mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɛ yor nú tua nɛ
Wa tɛ de tom ha̧ mɛ, gbak nɛ mɛ tɛ tom lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧
Wa tɛ ndaɗi in mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de tom lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ tɛ de tom kɔ̧
Mi hoka o nya'nɛ́, o be Levii mgbara o be
Nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, in o bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ de k’ɛ́nɛ́ tom zu
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ zɔk nɛ zu-mɔ nɛ o be

Mɔ nɛ tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-mɛ mgbara o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna nɛ‘i dɔ na nɛ mɔ'ɔ: o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ nyɔnɔ, o kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, in o kpoo-ɗafa-mgbara'm in wa. O ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ
«O zu ha̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be
«Mi tɛ ha̧ kuti zu-nyɔnɔ nɛ o be
O kuti zu-nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa tɛ kai tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ye kɔ-wa ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-mɛ. Wi nɛ tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ nutua kɔ-mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ.
«O mɔ nɛ wa tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN war kpɔk sɛn nú
«O kaya-bem ko bíí lɛŋ in o kaya-mɔ-dai lɛŋ nɛ̀ o be
Kà wa de fio-zɛ kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɛ gɔna zu wa tɛ kɔya-bu-mbɔi mɔɔrɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kɔya-sede
Mɛ beka de ha'i mɛ gɔn zu kuti be ndai, kóó kuti
Kpoo-aa tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-mɛ, in tote-a ká bá nɛ̀ ku-a mɛ wiiko nɛ mɛ tɛ wɛk ha̧ GASA WAN.
«O ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Arɔŋ: «Mɛ beka bo nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi tɛ nù'ɛ, in mgbara o bíí na mbɛt. Mi tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔ kɔ-mɛ, in mɔɔ-oi kɔ-mɛ mgbara o be
«War ko o be Levii, mi tɛ ha̧ nɛ zu-mbɔi nɛ wa tɛ ndɛm ha̧‘m sɛn
wen ká o be
Nɛ́ o be Levii a̧ tɛ de tom kɔ̧
War mɔ n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii nɛ́ zu-mbɔi nɛ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be Levii: k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ baa zu-mbɔi nɛ o be
Ha̧a̧mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ha̧a̧mɔ ko wi-dɛm-nyɔnɔ nɛ ha̧ zu-nyɔnɔ nɛ alkamaari in mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Zu-mbɔi nɛ o be
Ha̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ war ko GASA WAN nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ. Ɛnɛ tɛ hok nɛ mɔ nɛ dee nyɛmna mgbara o ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN.
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ baa war ko GASA WAN yinɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ oi-aa nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dɔka be
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i in o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧, wen nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi-tom n’ɛnɛ de kɔ̧ Tua-kpa-ŋmaa.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ hoka de-a e ha̧ GASA WAN kaɗi, ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a; ɛ́nɛ́ ɗáŋ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ ko o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ:
«O geŋa nɛ GASA WAN yɔra h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar; wi tɛ gbur a̧ gbonɛ si ɗoŋ ye, ɓɛɛ wi nɛɛ gɔn a̧ nɛ yí Eleazar.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɛ pi̧ ndɔŋ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er ɗɔɔ tɔk-aa, ɓɛɛ misa̧ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo si war nú
Wa tɛ dɔ ndai'i ti a̧: wa tɛ dɔ ndàrá-a, mur-aa, tɔk-aa ká bá nɛ̀ ɗɔr-aa mbɛt.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba gua
Ɗoŋ-aa'i, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, zuia yi, ɓɛɛ sii ɗoŋ si saaye; mɔ kpɔk, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-simbo hegɔ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ dɔɔ ndai'i tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, zuia yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk kànà nɛ́ wi-simbo hegɔ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ a̧ tɛ kai bùk ndai'i nɛ́ɛ̀ a tɛ ŋma sa̧a̧ fara ɗoŋ ye mɛ, ɓɛɛ bùk'i duka hi̧i̧ wen dea-a nɛ zɔra-gaŋmɔ wen o be
Wi nɛ kaia bùk ndai'i tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ́ ndiŋ bíí hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wen o be
«Wi nɛ tɛ fo wɔr bíí tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-simbo tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
A̧ tɛ zui yì-zɔra'i tɛ taar zɛ in tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧. Kà a̧ nɛ zuia yì‘i tɛ taar zɛ, in tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ na, war-tɛ-a beka sa̧ na.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ foo wɔr bíí, kà a̧ nɛ
«Heembea nɛ mɔ'ɔ: kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ fee kɔ̧ ŋma tua-laa, kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ yee kɔ̧ tua'i, kóó kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ duka so kɔ̧ tua'i, wa lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-simbo tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Mɔɔ kɔ̧ o nyɛk nɛ wa kpe nú-a na tɛ ya nɛ ndiŋ-mɔɔ-simbo mbɛt.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ naŋ nɛ ŋma bíí nɛ wa gbɛɛ nɛ gba-paa, kóó nɛ́ géé wɔr bíí, kóó nɛ́ o gba̧a̧ fio, kóó nɛ́ zu pɛsi-fio, wi’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-simbo tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
«Wen

Ŋma bíí nɛ war-tɛ-a ɔ sa̧a̧ tɛ ba gbaa-er be-te pi̧ ɗɔɔ yì-zɔra'i, ɓɛɛ misa̧ a tɛ tua-laa in o nyɛk nɛ ya kɔ̧ a̧ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ ya kɔ̧ a̧, kóó wi nɛ foo gba̧a̧ fio, kóó wi nɛ foo wɔr nɛ wa gbɛɛ so nɛ gba-paa, kóó nɛ wi nɛ foo gee wɔr bíí, kóó pɛsi-fio.

Wi nɛ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧‘i tɛ misi̧ yì‘i a tɛ wi-simbo'i tɛ taar zɛ in mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ‘i, war-tɛ wi-simbo'i tɛ sa̧. A̧ tɛ fɔr o laa kɔ̧-a̧, zuia yì mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧a̧.
«Wi nɛ ɗaŋa war-tɛ, nɛ kɔ̧ mɛ ɗafi na, wa tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ mgbara dɔka o be
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ. War ko wi-misi̧ yì-zɔra'i, a̧ a̧ fɔr o laa kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fo yì-zɔra'i tɛ duk nɛ wi-simbo hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Mɔ nɛ wi-simbo tɛ fo, tɛ kifi nɛ́ mɔɔ-simbo, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fo mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-simbo mbɛt hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
O be
Yì bo so wen o bíí na, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa kura zu Moisɛ in Arɔŋ.
O bíí kia wen in Moisɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Gana ɛ̀ɛ̀ fé so hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o nya-yɛ fee so nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN’ɛ ga!
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ kaia o bíí ko GASA WAN pii ŋga-gbárà hɛ̧ɛ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ fe, ɛɛ in o mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ ge?
Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ kaia yɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ a fara-bɔnɛ nɛ̀ bo nɛ́ fara-dɛm-nyɔnɔ na’ɛ ge? Te-mbɔra bo na, waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ bo na, waya kóɓò
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ ee o giiwi duk, ɓɛɛ wa yak si nú
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ bá dɔra kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ sá o bíí lɛŋ, mɛ in nya-mɛ Arɔŋ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ ta nɛ yí-wa, ɓɛɛ ta tɛ ha̧ yì h’ɛ́nɛ́. Mɛ tɛ de ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ zaŋ ta'i ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ kpaa
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ saa o bíí pii ká̧ ta'i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O wi-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ, ɛnɛ zii! Ɛɛ nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ zaŋ ta’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nde?»
Moisɛ baa dɔra nɛ ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ gusi ta war yiitoo, ɓɛɛ yì suli nɛ zaŋ ta gbonɛ nɛ dɔka-a; o bíí nɔɔ yì‘i in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in Arɔŋ: «Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ e ta nɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de ha̧ gasamɔ kɔ‘m mɛ duk ɓɔn yí o be
Mɛ nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i a̧ wa sa nɛ nin yi'i Mɛriba, nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧ «Kpɛri», wen nɛ́ fara'i a̧ o be
Moisɛ toma o betom nɛ Kadɛs ha̧ wannu Edɔm tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ o nya'nɛ́ o be
O zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ zira so si Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ ɛɛ yaa sɛnɛ nɛ dɔka zɛ. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Egiptɛ usa bɔnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ in o dáà k’ɛɛ.
Ɛɛ aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii aia-nú k’ɛɛ. A̧ toma betom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gbo yɛ. Kinii ɛɛ a̧a̧ Kadɛs, ye nɛ duk ká̧ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɓir yak nɛ̀ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛɛ beka a̧r ye kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, kóó poo fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na; ɛɛ beka nɔ o gɔna-yì k’ɛ́nɛ́ na mbɛt. Ɛɛ tɛ ba nɛ gasa war, ɛɛ beka nɛ si wiiko kóó si gale na mbɛt hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ tɛ gbo nɛnɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ yak.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu Edɔm kifi nú: «Ɛnɛ beka ɓir nɛ tɛ nù kɔ‘m yak na; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ tɛ nù kɔ‘m, mi tɛ ba biro duk nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́.»
O be
Wannu Edɔm kifa nú: «Ɛnɛ beka ɓir yak na.» A̧ kaia o ŋga wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dɔka-a gɔn nɛ ti wa.
A̧ kpee yuwar ha̧ o be
O be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Arɔŋ in Moisɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Ɔr nyɛm nɛ
«Arɔŋ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ o dáà kɔ‘i; a̧ beka ye tɛ nù n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ Arɔŋ in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Eleazar si zu kaya Ɔr.
Mɛ tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa tɛ Arɔŋ yinɛ pi̧ tɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Eleazar, wen Arɔŋ tɛ fe kɔ‘i hi̧i̧.»
Moisɛ dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga. Wa taar daŋa nɛ yí bíí lɛŋ si zu kaya Ɔr.
Moisɛ kpɔ̧i̧a̧ laa tɛ Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ pi̧ laa'i tɛ Eleazar bem ko Arɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Arɔŋ fe ɓɔn zu kaya'i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ in Eleazar zira nɛ̀ zu kaya pii ɗoŋ.
O bíí lɛŋ iŋa'e Arɔŋ fea kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ hi̧i̧ a̧ zɛ ɓu-taar.
Wannu Arad be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔ nú Nɛgɛb zia'e o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
GASA WAN zia aia-nú ko o be
Wa kura ká̧ naŋ kaya Ɔr, ɓɛɛ wa ba nɛ yuwar nú Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ ɗoŋ nú Edɔm. Wa hɔɔ yuwar, ɓɛɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi bo ɓɔna.

O bíí ku̧u̧ naŋ ku̧i̧a mɔ zu Sɔ̧ in Moisɛ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge ɛnɛ kaia yɛ nɛ Egiptɛ mɛ gbonɛ pii ŋga-gbárà h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ fe ge? Nyɔŋmɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ bo na, yí-nɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ bo na mbɛt; nyɔŋmɔ-kaɓa’ɛ baa tɛ yɛ kaɗi.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN toma ɗaŋ gɔ́k, ɓɛɛ kum o bíí nɛ dɔka-a mgbara o be
Dukbíí tɛɛ tɛ Moisɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ tɛ ku̧i̧amɔ n’ɛɛ ku̧i̧a zu GASA WAN in zu'nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú ha̧ GASA WAN wen zu yɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ fo o ɗaŋ gɔ́k nɔ'ɔ yinɛ mgbara yɛ!» Moisɛ aia nú wen zu o bíí,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mɛ dui ŋma gɔk-ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá a̧ ga̧i̧ tɛ diŋa. Kóó o ndé nɛ̀ gɔ́k nyɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ gɔk-ndɛrɛ‘i tɛ kpasi.»
Moisɛ duia gɔk-ndɛrɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ba ga̧i̧ tɛ te'i. Ŋgimbi nɛ gɔ́k nyɔŋ ŋma bíí, kà wi’ɛi zɔk gɔk-ndɛrɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa.
O be
Wa kura sɛn Obot nɛɛ ɔ sɛn Ye-Abarim sɛn ŋga-gbárà ká̧ Mɔab nɛ war daŋa-wese.
Wa kura hi̧i̧ nɛɛ ɔ nú be-zer ko Zɛrɛd.
Wa yaka nɛ hi̧i̧ woyo ɔ nɛ kur Arnɔŋ. Yi'i fok nɛ nu ko o be Amɔr ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ ŋga-gbárà; nɛ́ Arnɔŋ a̧ gɔna mgbara nú Mɔab in nu ko o be Amɔr.
Nɛ wen hegɔ a̧ wa yɔra so mɔ zaŋ Kalata Biro ko GASA WAN zu yi Vahɛb in o gbaa-er-a sɛn Sufa, in Arnɔŋ
in o gbaa-er-a nɛ zir si ye Ar, ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ nú Mɔab.
Wa kura hi̧i̧ yak si Bɛr, nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧ «gɔna-yì»; ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ yì ha̧ wa.»
Ɓɛɛ o be
«Yi a̧ ŋmai̧ gbonɛ nɛ ɗɔɔ nù;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧!
O gasawi gɔna yì,
o be-wan za̧a̧ yì
nɛ̀ dɔ́rá-wan in nɛ̀ te kɔ-wa.»
Wa kura nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ́ si Matana. Wa kura Matana nɛ́ si Nahaliɛl.
Wa kura nɛ Nahaliɛl nɛ́ si Bamɔt. Wa kura nɛ Bamɔt hɔ nɛnɛ mgbara kaya nɛ ɓir hɔ nú Mɔab si ká̧ naŋ kaya Pisga nɛ kusa yak zu ŋga-gbárà lɛŋ.
O be

«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɓir yak nɛ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛɛ beka a̧r ye kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, kóó poo fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na; ɛɛ beka nɔ gɔna-yì k’ɛ́nɛ́ na mbɛt. Ɛɛ tɛ ba nɛ gasa war hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ tɛ gbo nɛnɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ yak.»
Ɓɛɛ Sihɔŋ e ha̧ o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
O be
Hɛsbɔŋ duka so nɛ gasa ye ko Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr. Sihɔŋ bíí so kuti wannu Mɔab, ɓɛɛ ba nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ hɔ nɛnɛ nú Arnɔŋ.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa o wi-yɔr-mɔ tɔ̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii Hɛsbɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó a̧ woyo!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí ye ko Sihɔŋ woyo!
Ŋma wee gɔma nɛ Hɛsbɔŋ,
ŋma leɓe-wee gboo nɛ ye ko Sihɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ dɔ Ar sɛn nú Mɔab in o gasawi zu kaya Arnɔŋ.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu mɛ Mɔab!
O bíí ko Kɛmɔs,
tɛ‘nɛ́ yɔa!
O bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ be-wiwii-a nɛ́ o wi-yu-mɔ yak,
o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ be-okoo-a kifa nɛ́ bara-biro ko Sihɔŋ,
wannu ko o be Amɔr.
Ɛɛ aa wa nɛ góò,
sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ Dibɔŋ;
mɔ ɗaŋa lɛŋ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Hɛsbɔŋ hɔ Dibɔŋ.
Ɛɛ ɗaŋa mɔ lɛŋ hɔ Nɛfa,
hɔ nɛnɛ Madaba mbɛt.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
Moisɛ toma bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpe naŋ ye Yazɛr. O be
O be

ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Ká mɛ yu wa na, wen mi ee wa in nù kɔ-wa, gu nɛ o bíí kɔ-wa lɛŋ er mɛ kaɗi. Mɛ tɛ de mɔ in Og hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee nɛnɛ in Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ ɔɔ so wan sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ ga.»
O be
O be
Balak, bem ko Sipɔr zɔka mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be
kíì dee wannu Mɔab in o bíí kɔ‘i ti o dɔka be
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o
A̧ toma o betom sitɛ Balam, bem ko Beɔr sɛn Pɛtɔr ká̧ zaŋ Efrat sɛn tɛ nù nɛ wa koo a̧ sɛnɛ mɛ sa a̧ tɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Zɔk, ŋma dukbíí gboo nɛ nú Egiptɛ, nɛ kpee zu nù lɛŋ; wa dee ye mgbák nú zɔ̧ɔ̧-am.

Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ tɛ, mɛ̀ fóm zuduk wi nɔ'ɔ, wen wa ŋgaia gan am. Ŋmafara mi nyɛma mɛ gan wa in mɛ ndak wa yinɛ nù kɔ‘m mbɛt, wen mi iŋa, wi nɛ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧ kpa nɛ de sɔnti, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ mɛ fom kpa nɛ ɗaŋ sɔnti.»
O
Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ nù; sa̧a̧mɔ mi tɛ kifi nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m.» Ɓɛɛ o gasawi Mɔab ɔ tɛ ko Balam.
Sɔ̧ tɛɛ pii tɛ Balam, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Nɛ́ o ge bíí ge a̧ ya tɛ kɔ-mɛ'ɛ ge?»
Balam kifa nú ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Nɛ́ o bíí nɛ Balak bem ko Sipɔr, wannu ko o be Mɔab toma mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e,
dukbíí nɛ gboo nɛ Egiptɛ kpee nù kɔ‘i lɛŋ, à̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ fóm wa ha'i; hegɔ, ŋmafara wi nyɛma mɛ bi wa, ɓɛɛ wi ndaka wa.»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Mɛ beka nɛ in o wi nɔ‘i na, mɛ beka fom dukbíí'ɛ na mbɛt, wen mi toka de yoŋgo zu wa.»
Mɛ tutuyɛ, Balam kura ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi ko Balak: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen GASA WAN kɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na.»
O gasawi nɔ‘i kura si ɗoŋ sitɛ Balak, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Balam bɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛa-a in yɛɛ.»
Balak toma o mbe gasawi nɛnɛ; wa duka nɛ o dita-bíí in wa dɔka so gan o kuti bíí.
Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ tɛ Balam, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Balak bem ko Sipɔr hee nde, wi kɔfa'nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ̧ nɛa-a tɛ wi na,
wen wi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa mbɔi nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ak lɛŋ, wi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ fóm dukbíí‘i ha'i.»
Balam kifa nú ha̧ o betom hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Kóó Balak ha̧a̧ nɛ tua kɔ‘i nɛ duna nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, mi beka yak zu wen ko GASA WAN tɛ geɗek mɔ, kóó tɛ gasamɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ sɔsɔɔ pɛm nɛ mɔ ha̧‘m zii mɔ nɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo sɛ.»
Sɔ̧ tɛɛ tɛ Balam mɛ zɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ mɛ a̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛɛ mɛ sa, mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ yák in wa, ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, mɛ tɛ de nɛ mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ de.»
Balam kura mɛ tutuyɛ, hɛr nana-tuifuu kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ yak in o gasawi Mɔab.
Yaka-a kɔ̧-a̧ dee ha̧ see GASA WAN mɛ nyim, ɓɛɛ betom ko GASA WAN gɔn ti a̧, kpe nɛ yuwar ha̧ a̧. A̧ daŋa so nɛ zu nana-tuifuu kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo nɛɛ so in a̧.
Nana-tuifuu zɔka betom ko GASA WAN nɛ yor ti a̧ nɛ gba-paa er, ɓɛɛ tuifuu a̧r ye zaŋbɛɛ. Balam gusa a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik yuwar woyo.
Betom ko GASA WAN kpee yuwar, mgbák kɔ̧ mbar-nyaŋa nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn poo fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Tuifuu zɔka betom ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓir ndaɗi ŋgeŋ mɛ yak. A̧ baa naŋ Balam kpor nɛ ŋgeŋ, ɓɛɛ Balam gusi a̧ woyo.
Betom ko GASA WAN yaka si ti woyo nɛ́ɛ̀ duk tɛ ɓɔɔŋ fara; ŋma fara mɛ ɓir nɛnɛ, kóó nɛ̀ war gale, kóó nɛ̀ war wiiko bo na.
Nana-tuifuu zɔka betom ko GASA WAN, a̧ guu nù nɛ oi Balam. See Balam nyima, ɓɛɛ ba te gusi nɛ a̧ mɛ gusi gbɛ.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN hú̧í̧ nú tuifuu mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m dee in mɛɛ sa mɛ gusa'm war taar ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Balam kifi nú ha̧ tuifuu: «Mɛ zɛkɛɗi nɛ‘m, kà‘m bo so nɛ̀ gba-paa er-am, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ gɔm mɛ gbɛ ɓɔn bɛɗɛ.»
Nana-tuifuu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Mi bo nɛ tuifuu kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ daŋa tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ hɔ kinii na nde? Mi dee so mɔ hegɔ in mɛɛ nɛti nde?» Ɓɛɛ Balam kifi nú ha̧ a̧‘e: «Weyaa.»
GASA WAN hu̧i̧a̧ yí Balam mɛ zɔk betom ko GASA WAN nɛ yor yuwar nɛ gba-paa er. Balam hɔ̧fa̧ tik nù, ba yi gu nù.
Ɓɛɛ betom ko GASA WAN ak a̧: «Wen ge mɛ gusa nana-tuifuu kɔ-mɛ war taar ge? Nɛ́ mi'i kpee yuwar ha̧ mɛ, wen mi iŋa'e kà mɛ nɛ́ nɔ̀‘i, mɛ tɛ fe.
Nana-tuifuu zɔka'm, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧r war taar. Kà a̧ a̧r so na, mi tɛɛ gbɛ mɛ ɓɔn bɛɗɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ee a̧ kpasa.»
Ɓɛɛ Balam kifi nú ha̧ betom ko GASA WAN: «Mi dee ɗaŋmɔ wen mi iŋ so'e ndé, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kpee yuwar kɔ‘m na; kà naŋanɔ kɔ‘m nɛ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ na, mi tɛ si ɗoŋ.»
Ɓɛɛ betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ in o wi nɔ'ɔ; mɔ kpɔk, ká mɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen yak zu mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ na.» Ɓɛɛ Balam yak in o gasawi ko Balak.
Balak zia'e Balam a̧ tɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ we ti a̧ nɛnɛ hɔ Ir-Mɔab nduti-nù kɔ̧-a̧, nú Arnɔŋ.
Balak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Bo nɛ mi toma so o bíí mɛ sa mɛ na nde? Wen ge sa mɛ tɛ na ge? Mi bo nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ ha̧ mbɔi ha̧ mɛ na nde?»
Balam kifa nú ha̧ Balak: «Mi hɔɔ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ge wen ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ ge? Mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ kànà nɛ́ wen nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ e nú‘m.»
Balak in Balam kura hɔ Kiriat-Husɔr.
Ɓɛɛ Balak gɔn o ndai in o geɗek mɔ-dai ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma kpoo-aa ha̧ Balam in o gasawi nɛ nɛɛ so in a̧.
Mɛ tutuyɛ, Balak mgbɔɔ Balam daŋ si zu kaya Bamɔt-Bal mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ya hi̧i̧ zɔk nɛ o ŋma duk be
Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balak: «Mɛ mbó
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balak dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ga, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ gɔn wiwii ndai kpɔk in vala sami kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ zu

Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balak: «Mɛ̀ yór ká̧ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ha̧‘m yor kɔ‘m nyɛi̧ nɛ mɛ; ŋmafara GASA WAN tɛ tɛ tɛ‘m. Wen n'aa tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m, kóó nɛ́ ge wen ge, mi tɛ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ mɛ.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ yak si yuwar.
Sɔ̧ tɛɛ ɓɛɛ Balam tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi mboo
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN ee wen nú Balam, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si katɛ Balak, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen'i ha̧ a̧.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balam sii ɗoŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Balak fara yora-a ká̧ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ‘i in o dita-bíí Mɔab lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Balak dee ha̧‘m mɛ tɛ nɛ Aram;
wannu Mɔab saa'm tɛnɛ nɛ mgbara o kaya daŋa-wese;
à̧‘m tɛ́, à̧‘m tɔ̧́ ɗaŋ wen zu Jakob ha'i;
à̧‘m dé ha̧ ŋgamɔ mɛ kpa
Hee ge a̧‘m tɛ fom nɛ bíí nɛ GASA WAN fom na ge?
Hee ge mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋgamɔ mɛ kpa bíí
nɛ GASA WAN de ŋgamɔ in a̧ na ge?
Kà‘m duk zu kusa kam-ta zɔk nɛ wa,
kà‘m duk zu kaya zɔk nɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ mi zɔka ŋma dukbíí nɛ ya nɛtɛ,
nɛ‘i tɔr wa mgbara o dɔka dukbíí na.
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ tɔr o gii be
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ tɔr o gii bezaŋ Jakob o?
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ fe nɛ fio ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ha̧ sɔŋkur mɔ kɔ‘m mɛ duk hee kɔ-wa ga!»
Balak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Nɛ ge a̧ mɛ dee in am ge? Mi saa mɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ fom o wisɛn kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ tok kɔ-mɛ nɛ de yoŋgo zu wa?»
Balam kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ŋgimbi n'am tɔ̧ wen, bo nɛ mi tɛ yor nɛ zu mɔ nɛ GASA WAN e nú‘m na nde?»
Balak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam woyo: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ si ŋma fara nɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk dukbíí‘i nɛ de-a, wen mɛ zɔk so kɔ-mɛ nɛ be reeta-a; mɛ zɔk so wa lɛŋ na. Sɛn fara'i, mɛ̀ fóm wa ha̧‘m.»
A̧ mgbɔɔ a̧ nɛnɛ tɛ ŋma fara-zɔk-mɔ sɛn zu kaya Pisga. A̧ mboo
Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balak: «Mɛ̀ dúk ká̧ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ pɛm mɔ mɛ‘i sɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɛɛ pii tɛ Balam, e wen nú-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si katɛ Balak, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen'i ha̧ a̧.»
Balam sii ɗoŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Balak fara yora-a ká̧ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in o dita-bíí Mɔab lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ Balak ak a̧: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ bɔɔ ha̧ mɛ hee ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Balam tɔ̧ wen hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ zii, Balak;
mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, bem ko Sipɔr.
Sɔ̧ bó nɛ́ bíí kà de ndela na;
a̧ bo nɛ bezaŋ Adam ka a̧ kpai taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Kà a̧ tɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka de mɔɔ-a na?
Kà a̧ ha̧ nú, a̧ beka de ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ na nde?
Mi kpɛka mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu wi nɔ'ɔ;
GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu wa,
ɓɛɛ mi nyɛm mɛ kpai ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na.
Wi zɔk ŋma ɗaŋmɔ ko Jakob na,
wi zɔk ŋma bɔnɛ ko
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ in a̧;
sumbura mɔɔ-wan wen-aa duk nú-wa.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbo nɛ Egiptɛ,
a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa hee bara-nam ga.
Zɔkamɔ bo tɛ Jakob na,
aa-ŋgala bo sɛn
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN de lɛŋ,
wa iŋa tɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Dukbíí'ɛ kur hee boko-nam ga,
a̧ misi̧ hee dila ga;
a̧ nyɔŋa kpoo ndai n'aa baa,
nɔ tɔk-aa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ nù.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Kà mɛ nɛ́ foma wa na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu wa na mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ Balam kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Bo nɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e nde, mi tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ de na nde?»
Balak tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balam: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ha̧‘m mgbɔ mɛ si mbe fara; ŋmafara Sɔ̧ tɛ e ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk hi̧i̧ fom nɛ wa ha̧‘m.»
Balak mgbɔɔ Balam si ɓɛ̧i̧a zu kaya Pɛɔr nɛ duk tan nɛ ŋga-gbárà.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Balak: «Mɛ̀ mbó
Balak dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga. A̧ dɔɔ wiwii-ndai kpɔk in vala sami kpɔk zu
Balam zɔka'e nde, GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o be
A̧ baa yí-a nɛ ŋgɔn, a̧ zɔka o be
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ wen ko Balam, bem ko Pɛɔr,
wen ko wi nɛ yí ɔ baa nyɛmna,
wen ko wi nɛ zii wen ko Sɔ̧,
wen ko wi nɛ zɔk mɔ
nɛ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ usi ha̧ a̧,
ŋgimbi nɛ gba-gbana ba a̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yí-a hu̧i̧.
Jakob, o tua-laa kɔ-mɛ ɔ dee,
Wa ya hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ foka-yì ga,
hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ o fɔ sɛn ká̧ zaŋ yì ga,
hee o ŋma gasa te nɛ GASA WAN guna so ga,
hee o gbatui
O nyɛk lɛŋ dun dun nɛ yì,
o bɔr-nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa duk duk nɛ yì zɔr-zɔr.
Wannu kɔ̧-a̧ gasa gan Agag,
mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ gasi gasi siti.
GASA WAN dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbo Egiptɛ;
a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai hee bara-nam ga.
A̧ nasi nɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina gba̧a̧ tɛ-wa;
a̧ a nɛ góò kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ-wa.
A̧ sui ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔɔ nù hee dila ga,
hee boko-nam ga.
O'o nyɛma mɛ fo a̧ pi̧ ŋgɔn o?
tɛ kpa toka de yoŋgo mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ fom mɛ,
tɛ kpa fom mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ see Balak kur in Balam, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbɛr er-a nɛ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ mi saa mɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ fom o wisɛn kɔ‘m na? Mɛ toka de yoŋgo zu wa war taar kaɗi’ɛ hee ge bɔɔ ge?
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee hegɔ ga, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si nù kɔ-mɛ. Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e mi tɛ ha̧ mbɔi ha̧ mɛ wó, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dora mɔ‘i er mɛ.»

Balam kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Kóó Balak ha̧a̧ nɛ tua kɔ‘i nɛ duna nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, mi beka yak zu wen ko GASA WAN, ba nɛ̀ demɔ kóó ɗaŋmɔ tɛnɛ nɛ ta-tɛ‘m na. Mi tɛ tɔ̧ kànà nɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɛ e nú‘m. Bo nɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɔ‘i ha̧ o kuti bíí nɛ mɛ toma so nɛnɛ sitɛ‘m’ɛ na nde?»
«Kinii, mi tɛ si tɛ o bíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ nɛti, mɛ tɛ, ha̧‘m tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɛ de in o bíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, a̧ mɛ zii!»
Ɓɛɛ Balam tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ wen ko Balam, bem ko Pɛɔr,
wen ko wi nɛ yí ɔ baa nyɛmna;
wen ko wi nɛ zii wen ko Sɔ̧,
ko wi nɛ iŋa mgbara mɔ ko Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
ko wi nɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ usi ha̧ a̧;
ŋgimbi nɛ gbana ba a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yi-a hú̧í̧.
Mi zɔk nɛ
mi mbaɗi nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ mi hɛɗi katɛ a̧ na.
Ŋma sɔra gboo nɛ̀ mgbara o bezaŋ Jakob;
ŋma dɔ́rá-wan gboo nɛ̀ mgbara o be
ɓɛɛ gbin ger Mɔab, kum o bem ko Sɛt lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ ba Sɛir nɛ duka so nɛ wisɛn kɔ-wa;
ŋma wan gboo nɛ̀ tɛ Jakob;
ɓɛɛ a̧ kum oi bíí nɛ ɓɔna saaye.»
Balam zɔka Amalɛk ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Amalɛk, wan-duk-ti ha̧ o dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ ŋgai,
mɔ nɛ zɛm mɛ nɛ́ yaia-a ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ.»
A̧ zɔka o be Kɛn, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ ŋgaya,
fara-ɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk zu kam-ta,
ɓɛɛ kóó hegɔ mbɛt,
ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ bìì wee,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Asur tɛ kai'nɛ́ nɛ bara.»
Sɔŋkur-aa, Balam tɔ̧ɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ!
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ duk kpasa tɛ deemɔ ko Sɔ̧ o nde?
O kombon tɛ nɛ Kitim,
wa tɛ nasi Asur in Ebɛr;
ɓɛɛ Kitim mbɛt tɛ yai.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Balam kura ɓɛɛ si tɛ nù kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Balak yak si nù kɔ‘i mbɛt.
O be
O boko-bem nɔ‘i saa wa mɛ ɗafi o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa; o be
O be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ káí o gasawi ko o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wan-gɔn-kita ko
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma bíí mgbara o be
Pinas, bem ko Eleazar, be-koo Arɔŋ zɔka mɔ‘i, a̧ kura mgbara o dɔka bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba sɛɛ;
a̧ ndaka ɗoŋ be
Bíí nɛ fee lɛŋ tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i duka nɛ bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Pinas, bem ko Eleazar, be-koo Arɔŋ foo nyimsea kɔ‘m yinɛ zu o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Pinas nde, mi
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ kpasa mɔ wen a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa wen ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wen n'aa dee gɔya oi nú Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɔ n'aa dea nɛ do-mɔ nɛ usi'e, o be
Nin be
Nin boko be Madiaŋ nɛ wa gbɛa'i nɛ Kosbi, boko-bem ko Suar, ŋma gasawi nú-gara ko o be Madiaŋ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tík o be Madiaŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúm wa lɛŋ,
wen nɛ́ wa a̧ ɔra'nɛ́ mɛ gasi sɔ̧ Bal-Pɛɔr in nɛ́ wa a̧ dee so ha̧ wen ko Kosbi, boko-bem ko ŋma gasawi Madiaŋ nɛ wa gbɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgamɔ yaka nɛnɛ sɛn Pɛɔr mɛ tik zu'nɛ́.»
Ɗoŋ ŋgamɔ‘i,
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ in ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar, bem ko Arɔŋ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o be
Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ o be
«Ɛɛ tɛ tɔr o be
O be
Kuti-a nɛ zuduk ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko
nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ.
Nú-gara ko Rubɛn nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa tɔra wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ wa kpaa nɛ 43.730.
Bem ko Palu nɛ Eliab;
o bem ko Eliab nɛ Nemuɛl, Dataŋ in Abiram. Nɛ́ Dataŋ in Abiram nɛ yaa so nɛ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa'i a̧ kura so zu Moisɛ in Arɔŋ. Wa yaa so in o bíí ko Kore ŋgimbi nɛ wa dee nɛ ŋgazu in GASA WAN.
Nù mbaŋa so, ɓɛɛ gur wa in Kore ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ kuma nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká wee dɔ nɛ bíí 250. Mɔ‘i duka so nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ o bíí.
Mɔ kpɔk, o bem ko Kore fe so kɔ‘i na.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk kɔ̧-a̧ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Nemuɛl, nú-gara ko Yamin, nú-gara ko Yakin,
nú-gara ko Zɛra in nú-gara ko Saul.
O nú-gara ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; wa lɛŋ nɛ o bíí 22.200.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Gad nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Gad gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sifiɔŋ, nú-gara ko Hagi, nú-gara ko Suni,
nú-gara ko Ozni, nú-gara ko Eri,
nú-gara ko Arodi, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Areli.
O bíí nú-gara ko Gad nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 40.500.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Juda nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Juda gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; nú-gara ko Sela, nú-gara ko Pɛrɛs, in nú-gara ko Zera; o ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧, Ɛr in Onaŋ fee so kɔ‘i sɛn nú Kanaŋ mɛ.
Nú-gara ko Pɛrɛs gbaa yiitoo: nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ in nú-gara ko Hamul.
O bíí nú-gara ko Juda nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 76.500.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Isakar gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Tola, nú-gara ko Pua,
nú-gara ko Yasub, in nú-gara ko Simrɔŋ.
O bíí nú-gara ko Isakar nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.300.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sɛrɛd, nú-gara ko Elɔŋ, in nú-gara ko Yaleɛl.
O bíí nú-gara ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 60.500.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. O bem ko Jozɛf kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ zuduk yiitoo, zuduk ko Manase in zuduk ko Efraim.
Manase koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir de nú-gara kɔ‘i; Makir tɛɛ ko Galad, ɓɛɛ Galad de nú-gara kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yezɛr, nú-gara ko Elɛk,
nú-gara ko Asriɛl, nú-gara ko Sikɛm,
nú-gara ko Semida, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Efɛr.
Selofehad, bem ko Hefɛr bo so nɛ̀ be wiwii na; a̧ koo kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o be okoo: nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
O bíí nú-gara ko Manase nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 52.700.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Efraim, nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Efraim gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sutɛla, nú-gara ko Bekɛr, in nú-gara ko Tahaŋ.
Sutɛla koo Ɛraŋ, ɓɛɛ Ɛraŋ de nú-gara kɔ‘i.
O bíí nú-gara ko Efraim nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 32.500. O bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ wa tɔra nɛ̀ nutua kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Bɛnjamin gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Bɛla, nú-gara ko Asbɛl, nú-gara ko Ahiram,
nú-gara ko Sefufam, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Hufam.
O nú-gara ko Bɛla kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ard, in nú-gara ko Namaŋ.
O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ nú-gara kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.600
Wa hɔɔ tɛ nú-gara ko Dan ɓɛɛ wa kpa nɛ zuduk kpɔk ɓɛɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ zuduk ko o be Suham.
O bíí nú-gara ko Suham nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.400.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Asɛr nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Asɛr gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yimna, nú-gara ko Yiswi, in nú-gara ko Beria.
Nú-gara ko Beria kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ebɛr in nú-gara ko Malkiɛl.
Nin boko-bem ko Asɛr nɛ Sɛra.
O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara ko Asɛr lɛŋ nɛ bíí 53.400.
Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Nɛftalii gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yaseɛl, nú-gara ko Guni,
nú-gara ko Yɛsɛr, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Silɛm.
O bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.500.
O bezaŋ
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ dukbíí nɔ'ɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka wa.
O wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔka nyɛmna, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa nɛ pɛsa-a, ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔk na, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa tikiɗi. Kóó o ndé tɛ kpa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí kɔ‘i.
Mɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù. Wa tɛ kpa pɛsa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí tɛ zuduk kɔ-wa nɛ ɗoŋ dáà.
Kóó bíí dɔka so nyɛmna, kóó bíí dɔk na mbɛt, nɛ́ tani a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o nde mɛ kpa fara-duk kɔ‘i.»
O bezaŋ Levii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ, nú-gara ko Kehat, in nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
O nú-gara ko Levii nɛ́ nú-gara ko Libni, ko Hebrɔŋ, ko Mali, ko Musi in ko Kore, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Kehat a̧ koo Amram.
Kóò ko Amram nɛ Yokɛbɛd, boko-bem ko Levii nɛ wa koo sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ. A̧ koo Arɔŋ, Moisɛ, in Mariama boko-nya-wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Arɔŋ koo Nadab, Abihu Eleazar in Itamar.
Nadab in Abihu fee so wen nɛ wa baa so ŋma wee nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ko GASA WAN na e ti a̧.
O bezaŋ Levii, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk in o wan nɛ gana lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar. Wa tɔr wa mgbara o be
O be
Mgbara o wi nɛ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ baa tɔr so ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ‘i, kóó kpɔk bo ɓɔna,
wen GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa nde, wa tɛ fe ɓɔn ŋga-gbárà mɛ. O wan nɛ ɓɔna nɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ in Josue bem ko Nun ɓɛɛ.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o boko-bem ko Selofehad hɔa. Wa so nɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ ŋma nú-gara ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf, wen nɛ́ Manase a̧ koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir ko Galad; Galad tɛɛ ko Efɛr, ɓɛɛ sɛka Efɛr ko Selofehad, dáà ko o boko-bem nɔ'ɔ. Nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
Wa tɛa yor ti Moisɛ in ti wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Dáà k’ɛɛ fea so ŋga-gbárà mɛ; bo nɛ a̧ duka so mgbara o bíí ko Kore nɛ kura so in GASA WAN na. A̧ fee nɛ́ fio ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ko so be-wiwii, kóó kpɔk na fe nɛnɛ.
Dáà k’ɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ko be-wiwii na, ɓɛɛ nin-a tɛ bi nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧ wen ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋma nù h’ɛ́ɛ́ mgbara o dáà k’ɛɛ.»
Moisɛ nɛɛ tɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«O boko-bem ko Selofehad tɔ̧ɔ̧ kpasawen. Mɛ tɛ ha̧ nù ha̧ wa hee ko o nya dáà kɔ-wa ga, in mɛ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi dáà kɔ-wa ha̧ wa.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Kà a̧ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ boko-bem na, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-aa lɛŋ ha̧ o nya-a̧.
Kà a̧ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ na, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ha̧ ha̧ o nya dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Kà dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ nya na, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ha̧ ha̧ ŋma mgbák bíí kɔ̧-a̧. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ ko wi’ɛi. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea ko o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Mɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya Abarim a̧ mɛ̀ zɔ́k nù n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
Mɛ tɛ zɔk kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ fe hee nya-mɛ Arɔŋ ga.
Wen sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sin, ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí kia so nɛ wen in am, ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu tɛ wen n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ ndé, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ kɔ‘m ha̧ mɛ duk ɓɔn yí o be
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN:
«GASA WAN, Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀
ha̧ mɛ duk ti, mɛ mgbɔ wa siti in mgbɔɔ wa piiɗoŋ mbɛt, wen ká dukbíí ko GASA WAN tɛɛ ya hee o mɔ-dai nɛ wi-dai-a bo na ga.»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ Moisɛ: «Josue bem ko Nun nɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ taamɔ kɔ‘m duk tɛ a̧; mɛ̀ sá a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é er-mɛ zu a̧.
Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ a̧ e ti wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar in ti o dɔka bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é tom er-a nɛ yí-wa.
Mɛ tɛ ha̧ ŋma ŋgai kɔ-mɛ ha̧ a̧, wen ha̧ o be
A̧ tɛ nɛ tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Eleazar a̧ tɛ zɔk Urim ha̧‘m mɛ usi mɔ nɛ o be
Moisɛ mboo zu tɛ wen ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ Josue tɛ́ɛ̀ e ti wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar in ti o bíí lɛŋ.
A̧ ee er zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ e tom lɛŋ er a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga.

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o be Madiaŋ wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dee in o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «O ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ a̧ kai o boi-biro kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ bi o be Madiaŋ; wa a̧ kifi er ha̧ wa oi nú GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o bíí booro kpɔk kpɔk dam zuduk o be
Wa hoka bíí booro tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk; bíí lɛŋ nɛ kaia boi mɛ nɛ biro nɛ booro-bu-zua-yiitoo.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ toma wa yaknɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi biro. Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Pinas, bem ko Eleazar duka kɔ‘i nɛ wi-tui o sa̧a̧ nyɛk in o mɔɔ-dɔm wen dɔma-a ku̧ nɛ biro.
Wa kaia ŋmaa yak mɛ bi o be Madiaŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ ga, ɓɛɛ wa kum o wiwii lɛŋ.
Zu o bíí nɛ wa kuma'i, wa gbɛɛ o wannu ko o be Madiaŋ mɔɔrɔ mbɛt. Nɛ́ Evi, Rɛkɛm, Sur, Hur in Rɛva. Wa gbɛɛ Balam, bem ko Bɛɔr mbɛt nɛ gba-paa.
Wa kaia o kóò in o bem ko o be Madiaŋ nɛ bara yaknɛ; wa kaia o saɗi-tui-mɔ, o gii mɔ-dai in o mbɔi kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Wa dɔɔ o ye gu nɛ o gbagari kɔ-wa a nù,
ɓɛɛ wa kai mbɔi, o bíí in o saɗi nɔ‘i n'aa baa so'i yaknɛ.
Wa kaia o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaknɛ si kɔ̧ gbagari nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Mɔab, sɛn ká̧ Jurdɛn nɛ duk tan nɛ Jeriko, wen usa-a ha̧ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar gu nɛ o be
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu be
See Moisɛ nyima in o gasa wi-biro, o wi-duk-zu o bíí booro, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-duk-zu o bíí gɔmŋmaa nɛ pia nɛ fara-biro.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen ge s’ɛnɛ gbɛ o okoo nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ na ge?
Bo nɛ wa a̧ zia so wen ko Balam, ɓɛɛ ka wa ɔr o be
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ o be-wiwii lɛŋ in o okoo nɛ iŋa tɛ in wiwii kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o be-zɔŋa nɛ tɛ iŋ tɛ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ wa na, wa nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ gbɛɛ bíí, kóó n’ɛnɛ foo wɔr nɛ er'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ ɗoŋ gbagari tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀
Kale-a mbɛt, ɛ̀nɛ̀
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ nɛɛ so biro: «O heembea nɛ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi in tuŋgu,
o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ bíí we na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧ wa ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ á wa ɗɔɔ yì-zɔra mbɛt ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. O mɔ lɛŋ nɛ bíí wee bìí, ɛnɛ tɛ fɔr wa nɛ yì ɓɛɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ fɔr laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧; ɓɛɛ sɛk’ɛnɛ pia ɗoŋ pii kɔ̧ gbagari.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi
Mɛ̀ kɛ̧́ o mɔ n’ɛnɛ kaia tɛ fara yiitoo, war ko o wi-biro in war ko o dɔka bíí.

Mɛ tɛ ba zu-mɔ er o wi-biro yoɓi ha̧ GASA WAN; zu o bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ, mɛ tɛ ba kpɔk; zu o ndai 500, mɛ tɛ ba kpɔk; zu o tuifuu gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ, mɛ tɛ ba kpɔk; zu o sami in o gbadua gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ, mɛ tɛ ba kpɔk mbɛt.
Mɛ tɛ kai o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar hee yoɓamɔ ha̧ GASA WAN ga.
Mgbara mɔ ko o be
Moisɛ in Eleazar dee mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
O mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ o wi-biro kaia piinɛ lɛŋ nɛ ɓɔna nɛ o sami 675.000;
o ndai 72.000,
in o tuifuu 61.000.
War ko o be-zɔŋa nɛ tɛ iŋ tɛ in wiwii na lɛŋ nɛ 32.000.
War ko o wi-biro nɛ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ sami in gbadua 337.500.
War ko GASA WAN nɛ wa yoɓa ha̧ a̧ nɛ sami in gbadua 675.
Ndai ko o wi-biro nɛ 36.000; war ko GASA WAN nɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo.
Tuifuu ko o wi-biro nɛ 30.500; war ko GASA WAN nɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-kpɔk.
O bíí nɛ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧ o wi-biro nɛ bíí 16.000; war ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ kaia o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar nɛ̀ yoɓamɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ GASA tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ.
War reeta mɔ nɛ Moisɛ kaia er o wi-biro kɛ̧ ha̧ o be
tuifuu 30.500,
in bíí 16.000.
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ ba bíí kpɔk mgbara o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, in saɗi kpɔk zu saɗi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, zu mɔɔ-oi-biro ko o be
O gasawi nɛ duka zu o wi-biro booro in o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa tɛɛ pii katɛ Moisɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɔra o wi-biro n’ɛɛ yaa zu wa lɛŋ, ŋma bíí kpɔk fe na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛɛ kai nɛ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, o kana-pi̧-er, o wele, o mɔɔ-pi̧-zer in o mɔɔ-a-ger nɛ kóó o ndé kpaa tɛnɛ, nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN, wen ha'i mɛ de do-mɔ zu yɛ nɛ usi'e ɛɛ kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ.»
Moisɛ in Eleazar kaia o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ wa dee nɛ lɔr'i; duka so nɛ o mbɔi-tɛ.
Dita lɔr lɛŋ nɛ o gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ kilo gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
War ko o wi-biro, kóó o ndé kaia nɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa baa yí biro mɛ.
Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar kaia o lɔr nɛ o gasa wi-biro nɔ‘i kaia tɛnɛ‘i nɛnɛ si kɔ̧
O bezaŋ Gad in o bezaŋ Rubɛn a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gii mɔ-dai. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa zɔka'e nú Yazɛr in nú Galad nɛ́ de fara nyɛmna wen daia mɔ-dai.
O bezaŋ Rubɛn in o bezaŋ Gad tɛa kpa Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧:
«Nù nɛ o ye Atarot, Dihɔŋ, Yazɛr, Nimra, Hɛsbɔŋ, Eleale, Sebam, Nɛbo in Bɛɔŋ ya sɛnɛ,
nù nɛ GASA WAN dee so ha̧ o be
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kpɛka, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nù‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ nù‘i mɛ duk nɛ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ku Jurdɛn yak na.»
Moisɛ kifa nú ha̧ o bezaŋ Gad in o bezaŋ Rubɛn: «O nya'nɛ́ tɛ nɛ biro, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yaa k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nde?
Wen ge ɛnɛ de ha̧ tɛ o be
Mɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee so ŋgimbi n'am toma nɛ wa nɛ Kadɛs-Barnɛa wen kpee naŋ nù nɛ mɔ‘i.
Wa daŋa so hɔ mgbara kaya Ɛskɔl, wa kpee naŋ nù‘i nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ tɔ̧ wen-gbin-tɛ o be
See GASA WAN nyima wese'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kan mɔ:
‹O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ gboo nɛ Egiptɛ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo kóó gan mbɛt, beka zɔk nù n'am ha̧a̧ so nú nde, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ Abraham, ha̧ Izak ká bá nɛ̀ Jakob na, wen wa nika naŋ-wa tɛ mboo zu ha̧‘m.›
Kànà nɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ, be Keniz in Josue bem ko Nun ɓɛɛ, wen wa ndaka pata GASA WAN nɛ see-wa lɛŋ.
See GASA WAN nyima, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ yambali nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛnɛ tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o wi nɛ dee so mɔ ɗaŋ see GASA WAN'i fee nɛnɛ lɛŋ.
Kinii, ɛnɛ kpar o ɗaŋwi nɔ'ɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ zɔ́k nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ aŋ nyimsea ko GASA WAN a ŋgɔn zu
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e mboo zu ha̧ a̧ duk, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ zɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk ŋga-gbárà siti, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen zu'nɛ́ a̧ o bíí nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ tɛ kum nɛnɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ɗɔŋa pii katɛ Moisɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɗafi fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o ndai k’ɛɛ in ye wen o bem k’ɛɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Ɓɛɛ ɛɛ nɛ tɛ yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ kai o mɔɔ-de-biro, mɛ ya ti ha̧ o dɔka be
Ɛɛ beka pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ k’ɛɛ nɛti ha̧ o be
Ɛɛ beka kɛ̧ nù in o be
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de hee mɔ‘i ga, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kaia boi-biro ti GASA WAN mɛ nɛ biro,
kà o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ kuu Jurdɛn ti GASA WAN hɔ fara n'aa tɛ ndak o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
kà nù‘i nɛ́ duka ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ pii ɗoŋ fara k’ɛ́nɛ́; hegɔ ŋma wen beka bo mgbara'nɛ́ in GASA WAN ká bá nɛ̀ o be
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ dee hegɔ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ɛnɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ kànà‘e, mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tik kànà zu'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó o ye wen o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí o fara wen o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ nú sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé kànà ŋgaɓo.»
Ɓɛɛ o bem ko Gad in o bem ko Rubɛn tɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Ɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de kànà mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O bem k’ɛɛ in o okoo k’ɛɛ, o mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ in o saɗi k’ɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ ya tɛ o ye nú Galad,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ kai o boi-biro k’ɛɛ mɛ yak biro ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko GASA WAN, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ‘i ha̧ Eleazar wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Josue, bem ko Nun in ha̧ o gasawi zuduk ko o be

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Kà o bezaŋ Gad, in o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ́ kaia boi-biro ku nɛ Jurdɛn mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi biro ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, kà nù‘i nɛ́ duka ɗɔɔ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nú Galad ha̧ wa nɛ kɔ-wa.
Kà wa nɛ́ nɛɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ bi biro na, ɓɛɛ nù kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ ŋma nú Kanaŋ mgbara'nɛ́.»
Ɓɛɛ o bem ko Gad in o bem ko Rubɛn kifi nú: «Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de kànà hegɔ.
Ɛɛ tɛ kai o boi-biro k’ɛɛ nɛ nɛnɛ si nú Kanaŋ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ war nù k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ tɛ kpa a̧a̧ nɛ kur Jurdɛn nɛ war hɛ̧ɛ̧.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ ha̧a̧ nù ko Sihɔŋ wannu ko o be Amɔr in nù ko Og wannu Basaŋ in o ye nɛ ya katɛ nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ ha̧ o bezaŋ Gad in o bezaŋ Rubɛn, in ha̧ reeta zuduk ko Manase bem ko Jozɛf.
O bem ko Gad ɗafa ɗoŋ o ye Dibɔŋ, Atarot, Arɔɛr,
Atrɔt-Sɔfaŋ, Yazɛr, Yɔgbɔha,
Bɛt-Nimra, in Bɛt-Araŋ. Wa ɗafa ɗoŋ o ŋga ye nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi o fara wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa mbɛt.
O bezaŋ Rubɛn ɗafa ɗoŋ o ye Hɛsbɔŋ, Eleale, Kiriataim,
Nɛbo, Bal-Mɛɔŋ, nɛ wa kpaia nin-a, sɛka Sibma. Wa ha̧a̧ mbe nin ha̧ o ye nɔ‘i nɛ wa ɗafa ɗoŋ-aa woyo'i.
O bezaŋ Makir bem ko Manase yaka si nú Galad, wa bìì o be Amɔr tɛ nù kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ndak wa yinɛ ba fara oi wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ ha̧a̧ nú Galad ha̧ nú-gara ko Makir bem ko Manase, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ ye hi̧i̧.
Yair, ŋma bem ko Manase nɛɛ ba o ŋma ye ko o be Amɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin fara'i nɛ «O ye ko Yair».
Nɔba nɛɛ ba ye Kɛnat in o ye nɛ ya zik a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbar nin fara'i Nɔba.
Nɔ̀ nɛ o be
Moisɛ yɔra nin o fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ wa dee gbagari sɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa ga zaŋ kalata. O fara nɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Wa kura Ramsɛs tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ, zɛ kpɔk ɗoŋ gbaŋa
ká ŋgimbi'i o be Egiptɛ gun so nɛ o kaya-bem kɔ‘i nɛ GASA WAN kuma so. GASA WAN kuma so wa mɛ usi gɔna kita kɔ‘i zu o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
O be
Wa kura Sukot ɔ sɛn Etam, nú ŋga-gbárà mɛ.
Wa kura Etam pii ɗoŋ pii sɛn Pi-Harirot nɛ duk tan nɛ Bal-Sɛfɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛn Migdɔl.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa kura sɛn Pi-Harirot daŋ hɔ ŋga-gbárà; wa kuu gba-tɔp, wa nɛɛ nɔ̀ zɛ taar sɛn ŋga-gbárà Etam, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛn Mara.
Wa kura Mara nɛ si sɛn Elim. Wa kpaa zu-zer ɓu-zua-yiitoo in gun ndɛŋgɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛn hi̧i̧.
Wa kura hi̧i̧, wa nɛɛ ɔ ká̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp.
Wa kura ká̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ ŋga-gbárà Sin.
Wa kura ŋga-gbárà Sin nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Dɔfka.
Wa kura Dɔfka nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Alus.
Wa kura sɛn Alus nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Rifidim, ɓɛɛ bíí kɔ-wa kpa yì mɛ nɔ hi̧i̧ na.
Wa kura Rifidim nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sinai.
Wa kura ŋga-gbárà Sinai nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Kibrot-Taawa.
Wa kura Kibrot-Taawa nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Hasɛrot.
Wa kura Hasɛrot nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Ritma.
Wa kura Ritma nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Rɛmɔnfɛrɛs.
Wa kura Rɛmɔnfɛrɛs nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Libna.
Wa kura Libna nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Risa.
Wa kura Risa nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Kɛhɛlata.
Wa kura Kɛhɛlata nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ ká̧ naŋ kaya Sefɛr.
Wa kura ká̧ naŋ kaya Sefɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Harada.
Wa kura Harada nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Makehelot.
Wa kura Makehelot nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Tahat.
Wa kura Tahat nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Tera.
Wa kura Tera nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Mitka.
Wa kura Mitka nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Hasmɔna.
Wa kura Hasmɔna nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Mɔsɛrot.
Wa kura Mɔsɛrot nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Beneyakaŋ.
Wa kura Beneyakaŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Horgidgad.
Wa kura Hɔrgidgad nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Yotbata.
Wa kura Yotbata nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Abrona.
Wa kura Abrona nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Isiɔŋ-Gebɛr.
Wa kura Isiɔŋ-Gebɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Kadɛs sɛn ŋga-gbárà Sin.
Wa kura Kadɛs nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn ká̧ naŋ kaya Ɔrka nu Edɔm mɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Arɔŋ daŋa zu kaya Ɔr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe hi̧i̧ sɛn tɛ kuti wese, tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-naar pɛ ɗoŋ gboa-a kɔ o be
Arɔŋ fea zu kaya Ɔr ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar.
O be Kanaŋ, nɛ wannu kɔ-wa nɛ́ Arad nɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Nɛgɛb zia'e o be
O be
wa kura Salmɔna nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Punɔŋ.
Wa kura Punɔŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Obot.
Wa kura Obot nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Iye-Abarim nú
Wa kura Iye-Abarim nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Dibɔŋ-Gad.
Wa kura Dibɔŋ-Gad nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Almɔŋ-Diblataima.
Wa kura sɛn Almɔŋ-Diblataima nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ mgbara kaya Abarim nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in Nɛbo.
Wa kura Abarim nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab, ká̧ nú Jurdɛn nyɛm nɛ Jeriko.
Wa ɔɔ ká̧ Jurdɛn ku̧u̧naŋ-a sɛn Bɛt-Ha-Yesimɔt hɔ nɛnɛ Abɛl-Sitim bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab mɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab ká̧ Jurdɛn nyɛm nɛ Jeriko mɛ ndé:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
ɛnɛ tɛ ndak o be nù‘i lɛŋ yinɛ ti'nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ ɗaŋ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ wa sɛka nɛ ta in o wan nɛ wa nɔi̧a boi dui nɛnɛ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gbina o
Ɛnɛ tɛ ba nù‘i nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ, wen mi ha̧a̧ fara'i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.

Ɛnɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù‘i nɛ er ŋmaa. Ɛnɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù nɛ pɛsa-a ha̧ o nú-gara nɛ o bíí ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ bíí dɔk sɛnɛ na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ kɔ-wa tikiɗi. Bíí lɛŋ tɛ kpa fara kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ tani tɛ usi: ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ndaka o be nù‘i lɛŋ yinɛ na, o wan nɛ tɛ ɓɔn hi̧i̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ya nɛ o tɛn nɛ tɛ tok yí‘nɛ́ in nɛ tɛ gak ɔm'nɛ́. Wa tɛ nasi'nɛ́ zu nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am taa so mɛ de in wa'i, mi tɛ de dea-a in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ ku̧ naŋ nɛ ŋga-gbárà Sin, ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ Edɔm. Nɛ war daŋa-wese;
ɓɛɛ ɓira nɛ ɗoŋ kaya Akrabim, yak nɛnɛ nɛ ŋga-gbárà Sin hɔ Kadɛs-Barnɛa nɛ war ɗɔɔ.
Nɛ war Asmɔŋ,
«Nɛ war yee-wese,
«Nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn,
Nɛ ká̧ kaya Ɔr,
ɓɛɛ tɛɛ yak si Zifɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ Asar-Enaŋ.
zir nɛnɛ si Nibla nɛ war daŋa-wese ká̧ Ain hɔ nɛnɛ nú ŋgere gba-tɔp Kinɛrɛt.
tɛ ba nɛ Jurdɛn zir nɛnɛ si ɗɔɔ, hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ.
«Nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o
Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko zuduk ko Rubɛn in o bíí nutua kɔ-wa, zuduk ko Gad in o bíí nutua kɔ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase, wa kpaa so war mɔ kɔ-wa kaɗi.
O zuduk nɔ‘i yiitoo'i in reeta zuduk kpɔk'i kpaa war nù kɔ‘i sɛn kur Jurdɛn nyɛm nɛ Jeriko nɛ war daŋa-wese mɛ kaɗi.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Nin o bíí nɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar in Josue bem ko Nun,
ɓɛɛ tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk, ɛnɛ tɛ ba ŋma gasawi gbam nɛ wa wen kɛ̧ɛ̧ nù.
Nin o wi nɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: zuduk ko Juda, nɛ́ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ;
zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ, nɛ́ Semuɛl bem ko Amihud;
zuduk ko Bɛnjamin, nɛ́ Elidad bem ko Kislɔŋ;
zuduk ko Dan, nɛ́ Buki bem ko Yogli;
zuduk ko Manase bem ko Jozɛf, nɛ́ Haniɛl bem ko Efod;
zuduk ko Efraim, bem ko Jozɛf, nɛ́ Kemuɛl bem ko Siftaŋ;
zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ, nɛ́ Elisafaŋ bem ko Parnak;
zuduk ko Isakar, nɛ́ Paltiɛl bem ko Azaŋ;
zuduk ko Asɛr, nɛ́ Ahihud bem ko Sɛlɔmi;
ɓɛɛ zuduk ko Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Pɛdahɛl bem ko Amihud.»
O wi nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kɛ̧ nu ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab ká̧ Jurdɛn nyɛm nɛ Jeriko mɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
O ye tɛ ya nɛ fara ɔɔ kɔ-wa; o nù tɛ duk wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa, in wen o saɗi kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
O nù ɗoŋ ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii'i tɛ ndaɗi o garo kɔ-wa zik nɛ ye e see-a, hee mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ ga.
Ɛnɛ tɛ we pɛsa-a nɛ war daŋa-wese tɛ mɛtrɛ booro, nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, mɛtrɛ booro mbɛt; ye tɛ duk kɔ‘i mgbák see-a, ɓɛɛ nù nɛ tɛ zik ye kɔ-wa kpa'i, nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
O ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii nɛ́ ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, wen hu̧sa̧-a̧ ko o wi nɛ gbɛ zu nɛ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ. Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ o mbe-a ɓu-naar-zua-yiitoo ha̧ wa e zu-a.
O ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ ye ɓu-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, in o nù ká̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa tɛ ba o ye nɔ‘i mgbara o ye ko o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
ɛnɛ tɛ hok o ŋma ye nɛ tɛ ya nɛ fara-hu̧si-sɛnɛ. Kà ŋma bíí gbɛ zu nɛ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ, a̧ tɛ hu̧si sɛn hi̧i̧.
O ye nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ fara-hu̧si wen o wi-kifi-er; kà wi-gbɛ-zu nɛ́ hu̧sa̧ hi̧i̧, wi beka gbɛ a̧ nɛti ha̧ o bíí mɛ gɔn kita zu a̧ na.
Mgbara o ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o be Levii, nɛ́ ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk a̧ tɛ ya nɛ o fara-hu̧si sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ e ye taar nɛ kur Jurdɛn, in taar sɛn Kanaŋ wen hu̧sa̧-a̧.
O ye nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɔ‘i tɛ ya wen o be
«Kà a̧ nɛ́ gusa bíí nɛ boi gbɛ, a̧ nɛ wi-gbɛ-zu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbɛ wi’ɛi yinɛ.
Kà a̧ nɛ́ yoo bíí nɛ ta gbɛ, a̧ nɛ wi-gbɛ-zu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Kà a̧ nɛ́ gusa bíí nɛ te gbɛ, a̧ nɛ wi-gbɛ-zu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ wi-kifi-er a̧ tɛ gbɛ wi-gbɛ-zu'i, ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ kpa nɛ a̧.
«Kà bíí nɛ́ gbɛɛ bíí nɛ̀ kiri, kóó kà a̧ pi̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ ɗaŋsee tok nɛ a̧ gbɛ,
kà a̧ nɛ sɔma nɛ a̧ nɛ tu̧u̧-see gbɛ, wa tɛ gbɛ wi’ɛi yinɛ, wen a̧ nɛ wi-gbɛ-zu. Nɛ́ wi-kifi-er a̧ tɛ gbɛ wi-gbɛ-zu'i ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ kpa nɛ a̧.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ gbɛɛ zu nɛ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ tu̧u̧-see na, kóó kà a̧ nɛ́ pi̧i̧ nɛ mɔ sitɛ a̧ nɛ̀ bò nɛ́ nɛ̀ sɛnmɔ na,
kóó a̧ nɛ́ zɔka so wi’ɛi na pi̧ nɛ ta yo nɛ a̧ gbɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wi’ɛi nɛ́ wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ na, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in wi’ɛi nɛti na,
o bíí tɛ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ heembea nɛ nyɛma ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ dea'i, gɔn nɛ kita mgbara-a in wi-kifi-er.
O bíí tɛ kpasi wi’ɛi er wi-kifi-er, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔɔ a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ saaye fara n'aa hu̧sa̧ so sɛnɛ. A̧ tɛ duk hi̧i̧ hɔ wese nɛ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a fee kaɗi sɛ.
Kà wi-gbɛ-zu'i kur tɛ ye n'aa hu̧si sɛnɛ‘i yak si ŋma fara,
kà wi-kifi-er kpa a̧ nɛ zan, kà a̧ gbɛ a̧, bo nɛ wi tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi-kifi-er'i gbɛɛ nɛ zu na.
Wi-gbɛ-zu tɛ duk kànà fara-hu̧si kɔ‘i hɔ fara nɛ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ fe sɛka a̧ sii ɗoŋ si saaye kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ heembea wen'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ sɛnɛ.
«Sɛn tɛ gbɛɛ-zu, mɛ nɛ wen ko o wi-sedaako a̧ tɛ de ha̧ kita-fio mɛ tik wi-gbɛ-zu, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wen ko wi-sedaako kpɔk ɛ̀nɛ̀ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ kita-fio mɛ tik wi-gbɛ-zu na.
Ɛnɛ beka ba mbɔi er wi-gbɛ-zu wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk kpasa na. A̧ tɛ fe kànà oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛnɛ beka ba mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ yu mɔ si ŋma ye fara-hu̧si sɛnɛ na, kóó pia ɗoŋ pii fara kɔ̧-a̧, pɛm nɛ fea-a ko wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ nù n’ɛnɛ duk sɛnɛ mɛ ɗaŋ na, wen gbɛɛ-zu nɛ mɔ nɛ ɗaŋ war-nù ɗaŋ. Wi nɛ de ha̧ tɔk-tɛ bíí mɛ a nù, wi tɛ de kànà ha̧ tɔk tɛ-a mɛ a nù mbɛt, sɛka war-nù sa̧a̧.
Ɛnɛ beka de ha̧ war-nù n’ɛnɛ ɔ sɛnɛ, n'am duk sɛnɛ mbɛt, mɛ ɗaŋ na, wen mi nɛ GASA WAN ɓɛɛ mi duk mgbara'nɛ́ o be
O gasawi nutua ko o bíí nú-gara ko Galad, bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase, pɛ́r-nam ko Jozɛf, tɛɛ ti Moisɛ in o gasawi zuduk ko o be
«GASA WAN baa ha̧ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pi̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ kà wa nɛ́ baa wíì tɛ ŋma zuduk
Ŋgimbi nɛ pɛ nɛ o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ kifa nú nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ o be
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o boko-bem ko Selofehad. Wa nyɛma mɛ ba wíì fara lɛŋ nɛ wa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, wa tɛ ba kànà wíì tɛ ŋma nú-gara zuduk ko dáà kɔ-wa.
Hegɔ nù ko o be
Boko be
Nù ko zuduk kpɔk beka ye er ŋma zuduk nɛtɛ na, ɓɛɛ o zuduk ko o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o boko-bem ko Selofehad dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Mala, Tirsa, Ogla in Milka ká bá nɛ̀ Nɔa, o boko-bem ko Selofehad baa o bem ko o nya dáà kɔ-wa nɛ wíì.
Wa baa nɛ o bíí tɛ pɛ́r-nam ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf nɛ wíì, ɓɛɛ nù kɔ-wa ɓɔn kànà nú-gara zuduk ko dáà kɔ-wa.
O heembea in o geŋa nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o be
Wen nɛ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be
(Ka'i kur sɛn Hɔrɛb nɛ yuwar nɛ ɓir nɛ zaŋ kaya Sɛir, wi ɔ zɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛka'i hɔɔ sɛn Kadɛs-Barnɛa.)
Tɛ ɓu-naar pɛ tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ zaŋ ɓu-zua-kpɔk fio-zɛ, Moisɛ wee ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ o be

Moisɛ wee ɗoŋ Heembea ha̧ wa ɗoŋ nɛ wa bìí nɛ Sihɔŋ wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ ɔ so sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ, in Og wannu Basaŋ nɛ ɔ so kɔ‘i sɛn Astarot. Wa bìí a̧ sɛn Edrɛi. Moisɛ wee ɗoŋ Heembea ha̧ wa sɛn kur Jurdɛn nu Mɔab.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ sɛn Hɔrɛb'e: ‹Zɛ‘nɛ́ dɔka zu kaya’ɛ kaɗi.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák si zu kaya ko o be Amɔr in sitɛ o wi nɛ ɔ zik wa, sɛn Araba, sɛn mgbara kaya, sɛn bɔkɔ-nù, sɛn mgbara Nɛgɛb, in ká̧ gasa nana-yì. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá nú Kanaŋ ba nɛ Libaŋ hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧ nana-yì Efrat.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, nù n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ‘i. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá nù nɛ Sɔ̧ kana so mɔ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in Jakob in o bezaŋ wa mɛ ɗoŋ.›
«Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́, mi nyɛm mɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ ɛ̀n’ám na,
wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee so h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra yiwese ga.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɛɓi siti war booro, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ ha̧ de sɔnti h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ tui so o kiri k’ɛ́nɛ́, o akamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o sii-kafɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀n’ám hee ge nde?
Mi tɔ̧a̧, tɛ o zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ iŋa tom nɛ de-a, sɛn mgbara dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧‘m mɛ e wa nɛ wan zu'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ kifa so nú ha̧‘m'e, wen n'am tɔ̧a̧‘i nɛ de wen.

Hegɔ mi kaia o wi-gɔn-kita tɛ zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ wen-tɛ-wa ɔ dee, ɓɛɛ mi e wa zu'nɛ́. O wi-ya-zu o bíí booro, ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, in zu o bíí ɓu; ɓɛɛ mi a o ŋma bíí nɛ o kapita mgbara o zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Mi ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o wi-gɔn-kita nɔ‘i, wa a̧ zii wen ko o nya-wa, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a mgbara o bíí in o nya-wa, mgbara o bíí in o gɛnɛ nɛ ɔ mgbara wa mbɛt.

Wa beka ye ɗoŋ bíí tɛ gɔna-kita na; wa tɛ zii wen ko geɗek bíí hee ko gasawi ga mbɛt. Wa beka yu kíí bíí na, wen gɔna-kita tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ Sɔ̧. Kà ŋma wen ŋgai gán wa, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ba pii tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zii mgbara-a.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m ha̧a̧ nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ zu mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de.»
«Ɛɛ kura sɛn Hɔrɛb, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɓir nɛ gasa ŋga-gbárà n’ɛnɛ zɔka'i; ɛɛ baa nɛ yuwar si zu kaya ko o be Amɔr hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ baa tɔ̧ so h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hɔ sɛn Kadɛs-Barnɛa.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e ɛnɛ hɔɔ sɛn zu kaya ko o be Amɔr nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ha̧a̧ so h’ɛ́ɛ́.

Mi tɔ̧a̧: ‹GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ mɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba nù‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ baa ha̧ so nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga. Ká kíì de'nɛ́ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de zɛŋ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ na mbɛt.›
«Ɛnɛ tɛɛ pii tɛ‘m lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ tóm o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ mɛ nɛɛ zɔk nù‘i, wa tɛ tɔ̧ yuwar n’ɛɛ tɛ nɛ nɛnɛ in o ye n’ɛɛ tɛ nɛ si sɛnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt.›
«Mɔ‘i dee tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi hok bíí kpɔk kpɔk mgbara'nɛ́ dam nɛ zuduk ɓu-zua-yiitoo lɛŋ.
Wa yaka, wa daŋa kaya ɓɛɛ wa zir si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Ɛskɔl, ɓɛɛ wa yar dam sɛnɛ.
Wa kaia o waya-te nù‘i piinɛ usi h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ wa zɔka h’ɛ́ɛ́. Wa tɔ̧a̧, nɛ́ de nù nyɛmna a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́.
«Ɛnɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ daŋa-a sitɛ nù‘i, ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛnɛ ku̧i̧a mɔ ká̧ tua-laa
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dáŋ bɔɔ si déè? O nya yɛ gbina gba̧a̧ tɛ-ɛɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, wa nɛ o bíí nɛ ɔ dɔka, nɛ ŋgaia gan yɛ mbɛt. Wa mbo nɛ o garo zik o ye kɔ-wa e yiwese mɛ. Ɛɛ zɔka o bezaŋ Anak hi̧i̧ mbɛt.›
«Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́: ‹Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ nak na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu wa na,
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yak ti h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i tɛ bi biro wen zu'nɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so sɛn Egiptɛ nɛ yí‘nɛ́ ga.
Ɛnɛ zɔka a̧ mbɛt sɛn ŋga-gbárà. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tuia'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma bíí tui nɛ bem kɔ‘i ga tɛ yuwar n’ɛnɛ baa hɔ nɛnɛ sɛn fara’ɛ.›
Ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ e ta nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Nɛ a̧ a̧ duka ti h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɛ mɛ usi war h’ɛ́nɛ́ in tɛ tura-zan mɛ wese usi nɛ war h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.»
«Sɔ̧ zia aia-nú k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ kan mɔ nɛ nyimsea'e:
‹Ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara o ɗaŋwi nɔ'ɔ beka zɔk de nù n'am kana so mɔ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa na;
kànà nɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ in o bem kɔ‘i a̧ tɛ zɔk nù‘i. Mi tɛ ha̧ nù n'aa i̧sa'i ha̧ wa wen a̧ mboo zu nɛ see kpɔk tɛ wen ko GASA WAN.›
See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa in am mbɛt wen zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: ‹Kóó nɛ́ mɛ mbɛt, mɛ beka hɔ tɛ nù‘i na.
Nɛ́ Josue, bem ko Nun, wi-gbak-am a̧ tɛ hɔ hi̧i̧. Mɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧, wen mɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ yor ɗoŋ o be
«O bem n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e o bíí tɛ kai wa nɛ bara-biro, be geɗek bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ iŋ so kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ na, nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ye nù‘i. Mi tɛ ha̧ nù‘i ha̧ wa nɛ kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík tɛ‘nɛ́ wen sii ɗoŋ woyo si ŋga-gbárà si yuwar Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp.

«Ɛnɛ kifa nú ha̧‘m: ‹Ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN. Ɛɛ tɛ daŋ si zu kaya mɛ bi biro hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga.› Ɛnɛ baa so mɔɔ-bi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ taa so mɛ daŋ si zu kaya hee geemɔ ga.
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m a̧‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́: ‹K’ɛ́nɛ́ daŋ si zu kaya mɛ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ɛ̀ bi biro na, wen mi bo mgbara'nɛ́ na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gan'nɛ na.›
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ mɛ zii na; ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ daŋ si zu kaya nɛ ŋgai tɛ‘nɛ́.
