Ɓɛɛ o be Amɔr nɛ ɔɔ so sɛn zu kaya gbo so mgbúzúk sitɛ‘nɛ́ hee mboɗa zi-gɔrɔ ga. Wa ndaka ɗoŋ‘nɛ́, wa pɛsa'nɛ́ nɛ̀ Sɛir hɔ Ɔrma.
Sɛn tɛ pia ɗoŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ sɛn ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii aia-nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ na; a̧ nyeŋ zer-aa sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ s’ɛnɛ ɓɔn sɛn Kadɛs ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ duka so nɛnɛ nɛti ga.»
«Ɛɛ zika tɛ yɛ mɛ nɛ si sɛn ŋga-gbárà yuwar Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ga. Ɛɛ zika nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Sɛir ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m hegɔ:
‹Ɛ́nɛ́ zika nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya’ɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík tɛ‘nɛ́ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Mɛ̀ há̧ nú-mɛ ha̧ o bíí hee mɔ'ɔ ga: Ɛnɛ tɛ ɓir nɛ nù ko o nya'nɛ́, o bem ko Esau nɛ ɔ tɛ nú Sɛir; wa tɛ yu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí zu'nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kii wen in wa na wen mi beka ha̧ ŋma mɔ tɛ nù‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ na, kóó géé be ká̧ nú nù‘i na mbɛt, wen nɛ mi a̧ ha̧a̧ kaya Sɛir ha̧ Esau ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ hi̧fi nyɔŋmɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ in yì lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɔ hi̧fi er-wa.›
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́ sɛn tɛ o tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, a̧ pɛma naŋanɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn ŋga-gbárà'ɛ. Nɛ́ pɛ ɓu-naar kinii a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛnɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́. Ŋma mɔ ɓan'nɛ na.
«Ɛɛ yaka nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ o nya-ɛɛ, o bem ko Esau nɛ ɔ sɛn Sɛir. Ɛɛ baa nɛ yuwar Araba nɛ daŋa nɛ Elat in Esiɔŋ-Gebɛr, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kpai yuwar daŋ nɛnɛ si ŋga-gbárà Mɔab.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ kii wen in o be Mɔab na, in ká mɛ de biro in wa na mbɛt, wen ŋma mɔ n'am tɛ ha̧ tɛ nù kɔ-wa ha̧ mɛ bo na. Mi ha̧a̧ Ar ha̧ o bem ko Lot ha̧ wa mɛ ya sɛnɛ.›
(Nɛti, o be Emit ɔɔ so hi̧i̧; wa ɔ ŋgaya, wa ɔ dɔka in wa ɔ kusa hee o bezaŋ Anak ga mbɛt.
O bíí duka so sa wa in o bezaŋ Anak'e nde, o be Refaim, ɓɛɛ o be Mɔab sa so kɔ‘i wa'e, o be Emit.
O be Hɔr ɔɔ so ɓeemɛ sɛn Sɛir nɛti. O bem ko Esau ndaka wa gbɛ wa yinɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ba fara kɔ-wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
«GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: ‹Kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú yí Zɛrɛd!› Ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kur ku yí Zɛrɛd.
Ɗoŋ nɔ̀ k’ɛɛ nyɛi̧a batɛ. Kura-a k’ɛɛ sɛn Kadɛs-Barnɛa hɔ nú yí Zɛrɛd dee nɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ kuti o wi-biro kuma lɛŋ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa kan so nɛ mɔ sɛn ti wa ga.
GASA WAN dee ŋmaa in wa kum nɛ wa lɛŋ.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ fio gbɛɛ o kuti wi-biro lɛŋ yinɛ kaɗi,
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
‹Sɔsɔɔ mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɓír nɛ Ar, nɛ nú Mɔab.
Mɛ tɛ hɔ ti o be Amɔŋ. Ká mɛ kii wen in wa na, in ká mɛ de biro in wa na mbɛt, wen mi beka ha̧ ŋma nù kɔ-wa ha̧ mɛ na; mi ha̧a̧ nù‘i ha̧ o bem ko Lot mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.› »
(O bíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e nù‘i duka so nɛ ko o be Refaim nɛti. Nɛ́ o be Refaim a̧ ɔɔ so hi̧i̧. O bem ko Amɔŋ sa so wa'e Zamzumim.
Wa ɔ dɔka, mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kpoo-tɛ in wa ɔ kusa hee o bezaŋ Anak ga. GASA WAN kuma wa yinɛ ti o be Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o be Amɔŋ ndak wa ɓɛɛ ba fara oi wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN dee so in o bem ko Esau nɛ ɔɔ so Sɛir, ŋgimbi n'aa kuma so nɛ o be Hɔr. O bem ko Esau ndaka o be Hɔr, ɓɛɛ ba fara kɔ-wa hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o be Av nɛ ɔɔ so ye hɔ Gaza, nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ Kaftɔr
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú yí Arnɔŋ wen mi e nɛ Sihɔŋ, wannu Hɛsbɔŋ be Amɔr in nu kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn er-mɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá biro duk nɛ̀ a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú̧ naŋ baa nù‘i.
Sɔsɔɔ, mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí nɛ ya zu nù lɛŋ mɛ yu'nɛ́. Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ zii nyɛrɛmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, tɛ-wa tɛ nak in gasa kíì tɛ de wa wen zu'nɛ́.»
«Mi toma o betom nɛ ŋga-gbárà Kɛdɛmɔt ha̧ Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ tɔ̧ o ga̧a̧ wen ha̧ a̧:
‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɓir yak nɛ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛɛ tɛ ba nɛ gasa yuwar yak nɛnɛ, ɛɛ beka nɛ si war wiiko, kóó si war gale na mbɛt.
Ɛɛ tɛ hi̧fi nyɔŋmɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ nyɔŋ in yì n’ɛɛ tɛ nɔ hi̧fi er'nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɓir ɓir yak,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bem ko Esau nɛ ɔ sɛn Sɛir in o be Mɔab nɛ ɔ sɛn Ar dee in yɛɛ ga. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ku Jurdɛn mɛ nɛ si fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́.›
«Ɓɛɛ Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ kpɛk h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ɓir nɛ tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ na; wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ see-aa mɛ ŋgai in ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ŋgazu, ha̧ a̧ mɛ e a̧ kɔ̧ er'nɛ́ wese'i.
«GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ zɔk, mi ku̧u̧ naŋ ee Sihɔŋ in nù kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ er-mɛ, mɛ̀ kú̧ biro in a̧, ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba nù kɔ̧-a̧.›
Ɓɛɛ Sihɔŋ gbo in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ gɔn ti yɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ bi yɛ sɛn Yahas.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ea a̧ kɔ̧ er yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ bi a̧, o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ɛɛ baa o ye kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kum o bíí saaye lɛŋ: o wiwii in o okoo gu nɛ o obem; ŋma bíí kpɔk ɓɔn na.
Ɛɛ ee o mɔ-dai nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kai o mbɔi tɛ ye nɔ‘i mbɛt.
Ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ̀ Arɔɛr sɛn kur yí Arnɔŋ in ye nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gboŋgo hɔ sɛn Galad, ŋma ye n’ɛɛ baa na bo na. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ee so mɔ lɛŋ kɔ̧ er yɛ.
Kana nɛ nù ko o bem ko Amɔŋ ɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ sɛnɛ na ɓɛɛ in kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Yabɔk, ká bá nɛ̀ o ye zu kaya in o fara lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN dora er yɛ.»
«Ɛɛ zika tɛ yɛ mɛ daŋ si war Basaŋ ɓɛɛ Og, wannu Basaŋ in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ gbo gɔn ti yɛ mɛ bi biro in yɛɛ sɛn Edrɛi.

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ yu a̧ na, wen mi ea a̧ kɔ̧ er-mɛ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, gu nɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ de mɔ in a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee so nɛnɛ in Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ duka so sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ ga.›
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN ee Og wannu Basaŋ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ kɔ̧ er yɛ. Ɛɛ kuma wa lɛŋ, ŋma bíí kpɔk ɓɔn na.
Ɛɛ baa o gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ŋma ye n’ɛɛ ee duk kóó kpɔk bo na. Nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, zika-nù Argɔb tɛ nú Basaŋ fara nɛ Og ɔ wan sɛnɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye nɛ‘i mboo kusa garo zik nɛnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ nú-a nɛ kpar-nú-a yiitoo nɛ‘i gɔm gɔm. Wi tɔr o be ye na.
Ɛɛ kuma o bíí lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ dee so in Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ ga. Ɛɛ kuma o bíí tɛ o gasa ye lɛŋ; ɛɛ kuma o wiwii in o okoo gu nɛ o obem lɛŋ.
Ɛɛ kaia o mɔ-dai in o mbɔi nɛ ɓɔna saaye nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro.
«Ɛɛ baa nù er o wannu ko o be Amɔr yiitoo nɛ war kur Jurdɛn mɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ k’ɛɛ; ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Arnɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ zu kaya Hɛrmɔŋ.»
(O be Sidɔŋ sa kɔ‘i nin Hɛrmɔŋ‘e Siriɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o be Amɔr saa kɔ-wa'e Sɛnir.)
Ɛɛ gbina biro zu o gasa ye nɛ yaa so sɛn bɔkɔ-nù sɛn Galad in sɛn Basaŋ lɛŋ hɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Salka in Edrɛi, o gasa ye nú Basaŋ fara nɛ Og ɔɔ so wan sɛnɛ.

(Sɔŋkur bíí kpɔk nɛ ɓɔna mgbara o be Refaim so nɛ Og, wannu Basaŋ ɓɛɛ. Gado kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ gado-boi nɛ‘i zɔk sɛn Raba ye ko o be Amɔŋ; dura gado'i nɛ mɛtrɛ naar, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nyɛm nɛ ɗɔŋ mɔɔ-we-mɔ.)
«Ɛɛ baa nù‘i, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ reeta kaya Galad in o gasa ye ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Arɔɛr sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Arnɔŋ ha̧ o bíí ko Rubɛn in Gad.
Mi ha̧a̧ ɓii reeta Galad in nù ko Og sɛn Basaŋ lɛŋ, nù ko Argɔb in nú Basaŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ ha̧ reeta zuduk ko Manase. (Nɛ́ fara nɔ‘i a̧ wa sa nde, nù ko o be Refaim.
Yair bem ko Manase baa nù ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Argɔb hɔ mgbara nù ko o be Gɛsur in o be Maka. Wa gbara nin-a ha̧ o ye nɔ‘i nɛ‘i sa sɔsɔɔ‘e gbagari ko Yair.)
«Mi ha̧a̧ nú Galad ha̧ Makir.
Mi ha̧a̧ nú ku̧u̧naŋ sɛn Galad hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ be-zer ko Arnɔŋ, mgbara be-zer nɛ duk nɛ
Araba in Jurdɛn duk nɛ
«Ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ nú‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́: ‹Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ o wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ laa-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ku nɛ yí Jurdɛn ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ ti o nya'nɛ́ o be
Kànà nɛ́ o kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́, o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o dɔka mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ ya sɛn saaye n'am ha̧a̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, wen mi iŋa, ɛnɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mɔ-dai nɛ dɔka-a.

Wa tɛ ya saaye hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ nɛ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ o nya'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, in ha̧ wa mɛ ba nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ kur Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ o ndé tɛ si ɗoŋ sitɛ nù kɔ‘i, sitɛ nù n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.›
«Ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ nú‘m ha̧ Josue tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Bo nɛ mɛ zɔka mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee in o wannu nɔ‘i yiitoo'i na nde? GASA WAN tɛ de hegɔ in o zika-nù lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ kpa nɛ war kur ɓi mɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu wa na, wen nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ a̧ de biro oi nú‘nɛ́.› »
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN:
‹GASA WAN Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ ku̧u̧ naŋ usa gasamɔ in ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ŋma sɔ̧ yiwese in mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ nɛ gana'nɛ́ nɛ̀ deemɔ in ŋgai bo na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧‘m ku yì a̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔk de nù sɛn kur Jurdɛn nɛ duk nɛ́ de kaya, ká bá nɛ̀ Libaŋ!›
«Ɓɛɛ see GASA WAN ɗaŋa in am wen zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen kɔ‘m na; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: ‹Nyɛma hegɔ, ká mɛ tɔ̧ wen mɔ‘i ha̧‘m ɓɔna.
Mɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya Pisga, mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si war yee-wese, si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, in si war daŋa-wese. Mɛ̀ zɔ́k nɛ de-a, wen mɛ beka ku Jurdɛn nɛ duk ti mɛ'ɛ na.
Mɛ̀ há̧ nú mɛ ha̧ Josue, mɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi in ŋgai ha̧ a̧, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ duk ti ha̧ o bíí ku nɛ Jurdɛn, in mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ ba nù nɛ mɛ zɔk’ɛ.›
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ́ɛ́ ɓɔna nɛnɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ mgbák ti Bɛt-Pɛɔr.»
«Kinii, o be
Ɛ́nɛ́ beka e ŋma mbe mɔ zu o gba̧a̧ heembea n'am tɛ usi h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i na, in ɛnɛ beka ba ŋma mɔ yinɛ sɛnɛ na mbɛt, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga.
Ɛnɛ baa zɔk mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dee sɛn Bal-Pɛɔr nɛ yí‘nɛ́; GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kuma o bíí lɛŋ nɛ ndaka ɗoŋ sɔ̧ Bal mɛ Pɛɔr mgbara'nɛ́;
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ ndaka ɗoŋ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ yá kpasa lɛŋ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nú ha̧‘m mɛ usi o heembea in o yuwar duka-a h’ɛ́nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ mɛ ba'i.

Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk wa ba nɛ wa de nɛ tom; mɔ‘i tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ in o wi-iŋ-mɔ yí o bíí nɛ tɛ zii o heembea nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧: ‹Gasa dukbíí'ɛ kànà nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ in o wi-iŋ-mɔ!›
«Nɛ́ ge gasa dukbíí ge a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ o sɔ̧ hee GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ de mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ŋgimbi lɛŋ n’ɛɛ kɔf'aa ga ge?
Nɛ́ ge gasa dukbíí ge a̧ kpaa o heembea in o yuwar duka-a nɛ ya nɛ̀ yuwar-a hee o heembea nɔ'ɔ n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ'ɛ ga ge?
Hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá zu'nɛ́. Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ o mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ yí‘nɛ́ na. Ká wa yu kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ na ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí wa ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o be-koo'nɛ́.

Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wese n’ɛnɛ yora so nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn Hɔrɛb, ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o bíí kɔ‘m a katɛ‘m. Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ zii wen kɔ‘m, ha̧ wa mɛ ku̧ naŋ yua'm ŋgimbi nɛ wa biti kpasa, in ha̧ wa mɛ usi wen kɔ‘m ha̧ o bem kɔ-wa.›
«Wese'i ɛnɛ ɗɔŋa pii ti, ɛnɛ yora ká̧ naŋ kaya; wee dama so zu-a, ɓɛɛ wee daŋ hɔ yiwese nɛ ti tum tura-zan in tum zɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yí wee, ɛnɛ zia tiger-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zɔk ŋma mɔ na, kànà nɛ tiger ɓɛɛ.
A̧ wee ɗoŋ
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ so ha̧‘m mɛ usi o heembea in o yuwar duka-a h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba'i.»
«Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔk ŋma sɔnti bíí wese nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ́ wee sɛn Hɔrɛb na ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k tɛ‘nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔr tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ mboo géé-sɔ̧, kóó ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in sɔ̧, kóó gi̧ɔ̧ wiwii, kóó okoo,
kóó ŋma saɗi nɛ duk sɛn mbɔɗɔnu, kóó ŋma nɔ̧́í̧,
kóó nɛ ŋma saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nù, kóó nɛ ŋma zoro ɗɔɔ yì na mbɛt.

K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba yí‘nɛ́ si ŋgɔn mɛ zɔk wese, nyaŋa-zɛ, o sɔra in o mɔ mɛ yiwese lɛŋ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbɛ zugur'nɛ́ nù, mɛ de tom ha̧ wa na, wen wa nɛ war mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bíí dam fara lɛŋ ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN kaia'nɛ́, a̧ gboo'nɛ́ sɛn tɛ wee kɔ̧ lɔk sɛn Egiptɛ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ya sɔsɔɔ ga.
See GASA WAN tu̧u̧ in am wen zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ kan mɔ‘e ndé, mi beka ku Jurdɛn na in mi beka ye sɛn tɛ de nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi na.
Mi tɛ fe tɛ nù'ɛ, mi beka ku Jurdɛn na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ ku, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ baa de nù‘i.
Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ
Wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋga wee-dɔ-mɔ, a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ de gɔya dee.

«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa o bem in o be-koo'nɛ́, nɛ̀ zɛ‘nɛ́ be tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔk tɛ nù‘i, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́r tɛ‘nɛ́ mbo nɛ ŋma géé-sɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma ge mɔ ge ndé, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋma ɗaŋmɔ yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tu̧ see-aa,
sɔsɔɔ mi baa yiwese in nù hee wi-sedaako kɔ‘m ga, ɛnɛ tɛ fe nɛ haya-a sɛn tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba nɛ kur Jurdɛn. Ɛnɛ beka ɔ hi̧i̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kum lɛŋ.
GASA WAN tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kpar'nɛ́ beka dɔk sɛn mgbara o bíí nɛ GASA WAN tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i na.
Sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛnɛ tɛ gasi o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ bíí dee nɛ er: o te, o ta nɛ nyɛm mɛ zii mɔ, kóó nɛ zɔk mɔ na, in nɛ nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, kóó mɛ zii pɛr-mɔ na mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ya fara'i kii nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kia a̧ nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ in nɛ sɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa a̧.
Sɛn tɛ ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ hɔ zu'nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ zii tiger-a.
Wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ de ko nyɛmna, a̧ beka e'nɛ́ duk na, in a̧ beka ɗaŋ‘nɛ́ yinɛ na mbɛt. Tɛ-a beka bi ɗoŋ
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák mɔ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zii mɔ nɛ yaka nɛti h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee nɛ bíí zu nù, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák mɔ dam mgbii zan lɛŋ, pɛrti gasamɔ hegɔ hɔɔ kaɗi nde? Wa zia pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti kaɗi nde?
Ŋma zuduk bíí zia tiger ŋma sɔ̧ hee k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga fara tɔ̧ wen nɛ yí wee, ɓɛɛ ka duk kpasa nde?

Kóó ŋma sɔ̧ wee so tɛa-a mɛ ba ŋma dukbíí mgbara o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ kɔ‘i, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee in'nɛ̀ɛ́ Egiptɛ mɛ ga nde? A̧ dee o ŋga weamɔ, o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi, o biro, o ŋgaŋamɔ, in o gasa mɔɔ-kíì nɛ yí‘nɛ́ kai nɛ̀ ɛnɛ gbonɛ nɛ̀ fara'i.
Ɛnɛ yaa so nɛ o wi-sedaako mɔ‘i wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ‘e, nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ duk nɛ Sɔ̧; Sɔ̧ kpɔk kànà nɛ́ a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ̀ yiwese, a̧ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zii tiger-a wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ mɔ; sɛn mbɔɗɔnu, a̧ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɔk leɓe-wee, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zia wen kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ wee.
Nɛ́ wen n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ sa a̧ hok o bezaŋ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ gasa ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ fo o gasa dukbíí in o ŋga dukbíí sɛn ti'nɛ́ yinɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ fo'nɛ́ ye nɛ nù kɔ-wa in ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ nù kɔ-wa h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí e kɔ̧ see'nɛ́: nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ sɛn yiwese in sɛn mbɔɗɔnu, Sɔ̧ kpɔk kànà nɛ́ a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ de-a, ɛnɛ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk zu nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.»
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ hok gasa ye taar nɛ kur Jurdɛn nɛ war daŋa-wese,
hee fara-hu̧si-tɛ ko wi nɛ gbɛ nya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ ga, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ sɛna so a̧ nɛti na. Kà a̧ hu̧si tɛ ŋma ye nɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ kpasi.
Ko o bíí ko Rubɛn nɛ́ Bɛsɛr sɛn ŋga-gbárà tɛ tɔyɛɛ-gɔn-see-nù, ko o bíí ko Gad nɛ́ Ramot sɛn nú Galad, ɓɛɛ ko o bíí ko Manase nɛ́ Golaŋ sɛn nú Basaŋ.
Heembea nɛ Moisɛ usa ha̧ o be
O usamɔ, o heembea in o yuwar duka-a nɛ Moisɛ usa ha̧ o be
sɛn kur Jurdɛn mgbara kaya mgbák ká̧ Bɛt-Pɛɔr nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ. Fara'i duka so nɛ nù ko Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ ɔ so sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ. Moisɛ in o be
Wa baa nù kɔ̧-a̧ in nù ko Og, wannu Basaŋ. O wi nɔ‘i yiitoo lɛŋ nɛ o wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ kur Jurdɛn, nɛ war daŋa-wese,
ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Arɔɛr nɛ duk kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Arnɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ zu kaya
gu nɛ Araba nɛ kur Jurdɛn, nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ gba-tɔp Araba
Moisɛ saa o be
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɔɔ tɔk in yɛɛ sɛn Hɔrɛb.
Bo nɛ GASA WAN nɔɔ tɔk’ɛ in o dáà k’ɛɛ na, a̧ nɔɔ in yɛɛ n’ɛɛ ya kpasa lɛŋ sɔsɔɔ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in yɛɛ nɛ yí, zu kaya, nɛ̀ tɛ́ wee.
Mi duka kɔ‘m mgbara'nɛ́ in GASA WAN, ha̧‘m mɛ kifi mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen kíì wee de'nɛ́ dee, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ daŋ so si zu kaya na.
«GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
« ‹Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ baa mɛ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ tua-bara.
« ‹Mɛ beka gasi ŋma sɔ̧ gan zu'm na.
« ‹Mɛ beka sɛk ŋma mɔ hee sɔ̧ ga, kóó ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in mɔ mɛ yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ, kóó nɛ mbɔɗɔnu hɛ̧ɛ̧ na, kóó nɛ ɗɔɔ yi na mbɛt.

Mɛ beka gbɛ zugur-mɛ nù ti o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i na, in mɛ beka de tom ha̧ wa na mbɛt, wen mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, mi nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ de gɔya, nɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà ha̧ o bem hɔ tɛ o bezaŋ taar in naar kà wa nɛ́ sɛna'm;
ɓɛɛ mi nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ de demɔ in o bezaŋ ɗoŋ ŋmaa hegɔ hɔ tɛ booro, kà wa nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧‘m in kà wa kasi o heembea kɔ‘m.
« ‹Mɛ beka ba nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ ndela géè na, wen GASA WAN beka e wi nɛ ba nin-a nɛ ndela géè na.
« ‹Tɛ-mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wese-ɔm-tɛ; mɛ̀ é a̧ nɛtɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ de tom kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ sɛn tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,

ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ nɛ́ wese-ɔm-tɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ wese ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ beka de ŋma tom wese'i na, kóó nɛ mɛ, kóó nɛ bem kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ boko-bem kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ ŋma ndai kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ tuifuu kɔ-mɛ, koo nɛ ŋma saɗi kɔ-mɛ gu nɛ gɛnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ ye kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ wi-de-tom in kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ mɛ ɔm tɛ-wa hee mɛ ga.
Tɛ-mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ bara nɛ mɛ dee so sɛn nú Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ gboo mɛ sɛnɛ yinɛ nɛ ŋgai er-a; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔm tɛ-mɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ.
« ‹Mɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ in nàà kɔ-mɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ mɛ ga, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ de-a in ha̧ zɛ-mɛ mɛ dɔk sɛn zaŋnu nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ.
« ‹Ká mɛ gbɛ zu na.
« ‹Ká mɛ de dàlà na.
« ‹Ká mɛ zu̧ mɔ na.
« ‹Ká mɛ ɓir wen ndela e nú ŋma-mɛ na.
« ‹Ká mɛ a see kóò ko ŋma-mɛ. Ká mɛ a see tua ko ŋma-mɛ na, in fɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, in kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, in ndai kɔ̧-a̧, in tuifuu kɔ̧-a̧ in o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ na.›
«O wen nɔ‘i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ sɛn zu kaya, nɛ̀ tɛ́ wee nɛ mgbara tura-zan in tɛ tum nɛ hee ger, ɓɛɛ a̧ e ŋma mɔ zu-a na. A̧ yɔra wa zu sɛka-ta yiitoo n'aa ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m.»
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ zia nɛ̀ tiger bíí sɛn tɛ gasa tum in ŋgimbi nɛ̀ gasa kaya lɛŋ baa nɛ wee, o wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o gasawi mgbara'nɛ́ ɗɔla pii katɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ usa gasamɔ kɔ‘i in ŋgai kɔ‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ zii tiger-a tɛ wee. Sɔsɔɔ ɛɛ zɔka'e Sɔ̧ nyɛma tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in bíí, ɓɛɛ ea a̧ ɓɔn kpasa.
Ɓɛɛ kinii ɛɛ tɛ e ha̧ gasa wee’ɛ mɛ dɔ yɛ gbɛ nde? K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ zia tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ tɛ fe.
Nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ zia tiger kpasa Sɔ̧ fara tɔ̧ wen nɛ yí wee, ɓɛɛ ká ɓɔn kpasa hee ɛɛ ga kaɗi o?
Nɛ́ mɛ'ɛ tɛ duk ti; ha̧ mɛ mɛ zii wen lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧; ɓɛɛ mɛ wee ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ. Ɛɛ tɛ zii, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ baa de nɛ tom.›
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ zia wen lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e, wi zia wen nɛ dukbíí'ɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'i ɔ dee nyɛmna.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: ‹Kà see-wa lɛŋ duk so kpɔk mɛ yu'm in mɛ zii heembea kɔ‘m dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, wa tɛ̀ɛ́ ya nɛ de-a in o bem kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa, wa a̧ si ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua-laa kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dúk hɛ̧ɛ̧ in am, mi tɛ tɔ̧ o heembea in o yuwar duka-a lɛŋ ha̧ mɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ usi ha̧ wa mɛ de nɛ tom tɛ nù n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ba nɛ kɔ-wa.
« ‹Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a; ɛnɛ beka a̧r si wiiko, kóó si gale na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ hee mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ de-a, in ha̧ zɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk zu nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ.› »
«O heembea in o yuwar duka-a nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m mɛ usi h’ɛ́nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ye sɛnɛ mɛ ba nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Mɛ̀ yú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ, o bem kɔ-mɛ in o be-koo-mɛ. Mɛ̀ kásí o heembea in o geŋa n'am ha̧ ha̧ mɛ wese lɛŋ nɛ mɛ duk kpasa, ha̧ zɛ-mɛ mɛ dɔk sɛn zaŋnu.

, mɛ tɛ zii o heembea nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ kaia wa mɛ de nɛ tom ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ de-a in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk gan kuti-a, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ baa ha̧ so nú ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ nù nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga.
Mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ see-mɛ lɛŋ, nɛ sɔ̧-tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ in nɛ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ.
O heembea n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ sɔsɔɔ tɛ duk sɛn kɔ̧ see-mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ wen-aa ha̧ wa ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ duk sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, in ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ yar, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ɔ nù in ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ kur.
Mɛ tɛ de ŋma mɔɔ-sedaako-a kun er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ dee ŋma mɔɔ-sedaako-a ga̧i̧ sɔnti-mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ yɔr wa sɛn tɛ o te-nú-tua in tɛ o kpar-nú-garo ye kɔ-mɛ.»
«Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ye sɛn tɛ nù n'aa kana mɔ sɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in Jakob, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa o de gasa ye nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ mboa na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kpa o tua nɛ duna nɛ o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ aa sɛnɛ na, o gɔna-yì nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ za̧a̧ na, o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ GASA WAN nɛ baa'nɛ gbonɛ kɔ̧ tua-bara nú Egiptɛ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ mɛ tɛ yu, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ de tom ha̧ a̧, in nɛ́ nin-a a̧ mɛ tɛ kan nɛ mɔ.
Ɛnɛ beka ndak ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ mgbara o sɔ̧ ko o bíí nɛ ya katɛ‘nɛ́ na,
wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ de gɔya zu'nɛ́ a̧a̧ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́. Ɛnɛ zɔk tɛ‘nɛ́ wen ká nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tɛɛ tik zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ gbɛ‘nɛ́ zu nù yinɛ.
«Ɛnɛ beka we GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ wee so nɛ a̧ sɛn Masa’ɛ ga na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi o wen o geŋa in o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a; nɛ́ mɔ n'aa yɔra h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ nɛ ɔ tana in mɔ nɛ ɔ dee sɛn yí GASA WAN, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ de-a, in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kana so mɔ sɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ndak nɛ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú ga.
«Ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ bem kɔ-mɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ak mɛ: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ yɔra o geŋa, o heembea in o yuwar duka-a nɔ'ɔ ge nde?›
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ‘e: ‹Ɛɛ yaa so nɛ bara ko wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gbo yɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘i.
GASA WAN dee so mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi nɛ yí yɛ ha̧ ŋgamɔ mɛ tik zu Egiptɛ, zu wannu in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, a̧ gboo yɛ nɛ̀ hi̧i̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ mgbɔ ɛɛ ye nɛ nu n'aa ha̧a̧ so nú-a ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kasi o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ de nɛ tom, in h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ de-a dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ in h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ ya sɔsɔɔ ga.
Ɛɛ tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ baa heembea'i lɛŋ de nɛ tom ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛ nú-a ga.› »

«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ mgbɔ mɛ hɔ tɛ nù nɛ mɛ tɛ duk sɛnɛ; a̧ tɛ ndak o dukbíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ ɔ dɔka in nɛ ŋgaia gan mɛ yinɛ ti mɛ: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be Hit, o be Girgas, o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ fo wa e kɔ̧ er-mɛ in nɛ mɛ tɛ bi wa kaɗi, mɛ tɛ kum wa yinɛ lɛŋ. Mɛ beka nɔ tɔk in wa na, mɛ beka de ko ha̧ wa na mbɛt.
Mɛ beka ba kóò tɛ-wa na, mɛ beka ha̧ o boko-bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ kóò ha̧ o bem kɔ-wa na, in mɛ beka ba o boko-bem kɔ-wa nɛ kóò ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ na;
wen ká wa tɛɛ e nɛɛ ɗoŋ-am duk mɛ gasi o ŋma sɔ̧ nɛtɛ. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de hegɔ, GASA WAN tɛ kpa ɗaŋsee sɛn zu'nɛ́ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kum.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de in o bíí nɔ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin o
wen ɛnɛ nɛ bíí nɛ dúk nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka mɛ duk nɛ́ war dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara o bíí lɛŋ nɛ ya zu nù.
«Bó nɛ́ GASA WAN hoka'nɛ wen n’ɛnɛ dɔka gan o oi dukbíí zaŋnu’ɛ na. Ɛnɛ iŋa mbɛt'e nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dɔk sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ na ɓɛɛ.
Kà GASA WAN nɛ́ foo'nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ ŋgai er-a nɛ kɔ̧ tua-bara er wannu Egiptɛ, gɔn nɛ zu'nɛ́, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ kasi
Ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ kànà‘e kpasa Sɔ̧ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; a̧ kasi
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ kifi ha̧ wi nɛ sɛn a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛa a̧; a̧ nik naŋ-a tɛ kifa er na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi o heembea, o
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii o yuwar duka-a nɔ‘i in k’ɛ́nɛ́ kai wa de nɛ tom, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kasi

A̧ tɛ kɔ̧‘nɛ́, a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ kpar'nɛ́ mɛ dɔk. A̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ in zu o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́; a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu fɔ-alkamaari k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu nana-ndai in zu o nana-sami k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nù n'aa kana mɔ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, wi tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
A̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gan zu o dɔka zuduk lɛŋ, o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka yar ndɔra na, kóó nɛ wiwii, kóó nɛ okoo, kóó nɛ mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɛ ndak o zɛɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ in o ɗaŋ zɛɛ-geŋa n’ɛnɛ zɔka so sɛn nú Egiptɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛnɛ. O zɛɛ nɔ‘i beka hɔ katɛ‘nɛ́ na; a̧ tɛ tom wa si zu o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ ɛ̧.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kum o bíí nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fo e kɔ̧ er'nɛ́ lɛŋ. Ɛnɛ beka zɔk wa nɛ ko na, in ɛnɛ beka gasi o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ tik sak lɛŋ.
«Ŋmafara mɛ tɛ ta mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹O dukbíí nɔ'ɔ dɔka gan am, hee ge a̧‘m tɛ ndak nɛ wa yinɛ ge?›
Ká mɛ yu wa na, tɛ-mɛ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ dee so pi̧ zu wannu Egiptɛ in nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,

o gasa weamɔ nɛ yí-mɛ zɔka, o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi, mɔɔ-oi ŋgai-te-er GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ŋgimbi n'aa mgbɔɔ nɛ mɛ gbonɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ de nɛnɛ in o wi nɛ nyɛma so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ-mɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ tom gba gíí dɛnɛ mɛ dɔ o wan nɛ ɓɔna in o wan nɛ tɛ yu mɔ hu̧si gbɛ.
Ká kíì de mɛ wen wa na, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ; a̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa in nɛ ɔ ŋgaya nyɛmna.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ ndak o dukbíí nɔ‘i yinɛ ti mɛ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ; mɛ beka gbɛ wa hegɔ lɛŋ war kpɔk na, wen ká o ɗaŋ saɗi zaŋbɛɛ tɛɛ dɔk gan zu mɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ fo wa a kɔ̧ er-mɛ, a̧ tɛ pi̧ gasa kíì tɛ-wa kum nɛ wa.
A̧ tɛ a o wannu kɔ-wa kɔ̧ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ bi nin-wa sɛn zaŋnu yinɛ. Ŋma mgbara wa kpɔk nɛ tɛ ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn ti mɛ bo na hɔ wese nɛ mɛ tɛ kum wa lɛŋ.
Mɛ tɛ dɔ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa wen ká mɛ tik sak tɛ kaia o laa kɔ-wa nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, wen mɔ‘i nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ beka ba ndiŋmɔ pi̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ na, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ kum in mɔ‘i mbɛt; mɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ‘i hee gasa ɗaŋmɔ in hee ndiŋmɔ ga mbɛt, wen nɛ́ mɔ nɛ fom baa baa.»
«Heembea lɛŋ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ ba wa de nɛ tom h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ye sɛn tɛ nù nɛ Sɔ̧ kana so mɔ ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́.

Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ yuwar lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mgbɔɔ nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar pi̧ nɛ san zu'nɛ́. A̧ we so nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ hegɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ in ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kasi o heembea kɔ̧-a̧, kóó k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kasi na.
A̧ pi̧i̧ san zu'nɛ́, a̧ dee ha̧ wɔ mɛ gbɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ dai'nɛ́ nɛ
Gba laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧k tɛ‘nɛ́ na in naŋ‘nɛ́ ha̧ sɛn tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar'i na mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ sɛn kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ nɛ de-a'e, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ usi nɛ mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà usi nɛ mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ndak nɛ pata-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yuu a̧ mbɛt.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mgbɔ nɛ ɛnɛ mɛ ye nɛnɛ tɛ de nù nɛ o be-zer a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dɔka-a in o kpút-kpút nɛ gbo nɛ bɔkɔ-nù in nɛ ɗɔɔ kaya.
Nù‘i nɛ fara nɛ o alkamaari in fon dɛm sɛnɛ; o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, o te-mbɔra in o te-kóɓò
Nɛ́ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ dɔka-a sɛnɛ, in nɛ̀ mɔ beka ɓan'nɛ na. Nɛ́ nù nɛ‘i tɛ kpa o sɔ̧ɔ̧-boi sɛnɛ, in nɛ̀‘i tɛ kpa sa̧a̧ ndɛrɛ tɛ o kaya mbɛt.»
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zɔna GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen de nu n'aa ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn tɛ heembea kɔ̧-a̧, o wen kɔ̧-a̧ in yuwar duka-a n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ na.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé o de tua h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ,
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpá geɗek mɔ-dai in o gasa mɔ-dai nɛ dɔka-a, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpa bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ dɔka-a in o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋmaŋ tɛ‘nɛ́ ha̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ bi ɗoŋ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gboo'nɛ́ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ kɔ̧ tua-bara.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ mgbɔɔ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ gasa ɗaŋ ŋga fara, fara nɛ o ɗaŋ gɔ́k in o tore a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, fara nɛ yí-nɔ bo na; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ zaŋ ŋga ta h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧a̧
K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧‘e nɛ́ ŋgai-tɛ-er'nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa nɛ̀ mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai kpaamɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧
Kà tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gasi wa mɛ gu nù sɛn ti wa, mi tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ ndé, ɛnɛ tɛ kum lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kum hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN kuma so nɛ o ŋma tugun bíí sɛn ti'nɛ́ wen wa zii so wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na ga.»
Mɛ tɛ bi o bezaŋ Anak nɛ duk nɛ ŋma dukbíí nɛ kpar-wa ɔ kusa. Mɛ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ ko o bezaŋ Anak, mɛ iŋa wa mbɛt. Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma so mɛ yor ti wa o nde?

Mɛ̀ íŋ sɔsɔɔ ndé, nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ duk ti mɛ ku nɛ Jurdɛn hee wee a̧ ndar mɔ ga. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ kum wa, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ gbin gba̧a̧ tɛ-wa ti mɛ. Mɛ tɛ ndak wa, ɓɛɛ mɛ kuma wa nɛ haya-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nɛ nú ha̧ mɛ ga.

«Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ ndak wa yinɛ ti mɛ, ká mɛ ta nɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ‘e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nɛ nù‘i ha̧ mɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa a̧ Sɔ̧ ndaka nɛ wa yinɛ ti mɛ.
Bo nɛ wen nɛ̀ mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in see-mɛ ɔ tana a̧ mɛ tɛ ye nɛ nù kɔ-wa ba nɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ deemɔ kɔ-wa de na a̧ GASA WAN ndaka nɛ wa yinɛ, wen ha̧
Mɛ̀ íŋ‘e ndé, bo nɛ wen deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ nɛ de nù'ɛ ha̧ mɛ na, wen ɛnɛ nɛ zuduk bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgazu.

«Tɛ-mɛ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋsee nɛ Sɔ̧ kpaa zu mɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ‘i. Ká tɛ-mɛ bi na. Ku̧u̧naŋ-a wese nɛ mɛ kura gbo nɛ nù Egiptɛ mɛ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ, mɛ́ é déé ŋgazu in GASA WAN duk na. Ɛnɛ yaa so de nɛ ŋgazu in GASA WAN.
Sɛn Hɔrɛb, ɛnɛ tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN; see-aa ɗaŋa zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ ta mɔ mɛ kum'nɛ́ yinɛ.
Ŋgimbi n'am daŋa nɛnɛ si zu kaya mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kai o sɛka-ta nɛ‘i yɔra o heembea
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ o sɛka-ta yiitoo n'aa yɔra o heembea sɛnɛ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ-a in o wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu kaya nɛ̀ tɛ́ wee h’ɛ́nɛ́ wese mɔi̧a-a nɛ er-a ha̧‘m.
Nɛ́ ɗoŋ zɛ in wese ɓu-naar a̧ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nɛ o sɛka-ta heembea
«Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ zír nɛ haya-a wen o bíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ mgbɔɔ gbonɛ nɛ Egiptɛ ɗaŋa kaɗi. Wa ee yuwar n'am usa ha̧ wa duk, wa nɔi̧a boi dui nɛ ŋma gee sɔ̧.›
«Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: ‹Mi zɔka o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ o wi-ŋgazu.
Mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m kum wa yinɛ, ha̧‘m bi nin-wa sɛn zaŋnu yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de mɛ nɛ̀ zuduk nɛ̀ ɔ ŋgaya in nɛ̀ dɔka gan wa.›
«Mi zika tɛ‘m mɛ zir nɛ zu kaya nɛ̀ wee dama zu-a lɛŋ‘i kasi nɛ sɛka-ta
Mi zɔka ɛnɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ ee tana war nɛ GASA WAN usa so h’ɛ́nɛ́ duk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nɔ̧́í̧ boi dui nɛ̀ be ndai.
Ɓɛɛ mi kai o sɛka-ta heembea yiitoo, yo nɛ nù nɛ er-am yiitoo; mi gbaa wa nɛ yí‘nɛ́.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am hɔ̧fa̧ woyo tik nù ti GASA WAN, tɛ zɛ in wese ɓu-naar, mi nyɔŋ mɔ na, mi nɔ yì na, wen zu ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ dea. Ɛnɛ ee tana war ko GASA WAN duk, de nɛ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-see-aa.
Mi dee kíì nyimsea in tu̧u̧-see ko GASA WAN nɛ see kura zu'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kum'nɛ́ lɛŋ. Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN dee ko ha̧‘m woyo.
See GASA WAN ɗaŋa nyɛmna zu Arɔŋ mɛ gbɛ a̧ gbɛɛ; mi kɔfa mɔ in a̧ mbɛt wen Arɔŋ.
Ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ dea'i, be ndai n’ɛnɛ mboa, mi baa pi̧ tɛ wee, mi gbina nduku-nduku, hɔ̧n lɛŋ kifi gee fuunu, ɓɛɛ mi kai a ɗɔɔ be-zer nɛ zir nɛ zu kaya.
«Ɛnɛ tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN sɛn Tabera, sɛn Masa in sɛn Kibrot-Taawa.

Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN toma nɛ ɛnɛ nɛ Kadɛs-Barnɛa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá nù n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́›, ɛ́nɛ́ dee ŋgazu tɛ wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa ha̧ a̧ na, ɛnɛ mbo zu tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ wese n'am iŋa nɛ ɛnɛ.
«Mi hɔ̧fa̧ tik nù ti GASA WAN tɛ zɛ in wese ɓu-naar wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, wi tɛ kum'nɛ́.
Mi kɔfa GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹GASA WAN Sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ kum dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ baa gɔn zu wa tɛ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, gbo nɛ wa nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ ŋgai-te-er'nɛ́.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in Jakob. K’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛm nɛ ŋgazu, ɗaŋ in ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ na,

wen ká o bíí nù n’ɛnɛ mgbɔɔ ɛɛ gbonɛ sɛn er wa tɛɛ tɔ̧‘e, GASA WAN bo so nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ mgbɔ ɛɛ hɔ tɛ nù n'aa ha̧a̧ so nú-a sɛnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na. Wa tɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt'e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ GASA WAN sɛna so ɛɛ nyɛmna sa a̧ mgbɔ ɛɛ gbonɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ ɛɛ sɛn gee ŋga-gbárà.
Bo nɛ wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́, n’ɛnɛ mgbɔɔ so gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ gasa ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ in ŋgai te-er'nɛ́ na nde?› »
«GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ sɛ́k o ta yiitoo hee o kuti-a ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dáŋ pii tɛ‘m zu kaya’ɛ; mɛ̀ sɛ́k kuɓa-te mbɛt.
Mi tɛ yɔr wen n'am yɔra so zu o kuti sɛka-ta nɛ mɛ gbaa a nù‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ a o mbe sɛka-ta nɔ‘i kɔ̧ kuɓa'i.›
«Mi sɛka ŋma kuɓa nɛ te-akasia, mi sɛka ta yiitoo hee o kuti-a ga, ɓɛɛ mi kai o sɛka-ta nɔ‘i yiitoo'i daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya.
GASA WAN yɔra mɔ sɛn zu o sɛka-ta nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa yɔra so zu o kuti-a ga; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wen ɓu n'aa baa tɔ̧ so sɛn zu kaya nɛ tɛ wee, wese mɔi̧a-a. GASA WAN ha̧a̧ o sɛka-ta nɔ‘i ha̧‘m.
Mi zika tɛ‘m ɓɛɛ mi zir nɛ̀ zu kaya; mi kaia o sɛka-ta nɔ‘i a kɔ̧ kuɓa n'am sɛka so, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧‘m ga, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn kɔ̧ kuɓa hi̧i̧.»
(O be
Wa kura hi̧i̧ si Gudgɔda; nɛ̀ Gudgɔda wa nɛɛ si sɛn Yotbata, nù nɛ be-zer ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ.
GASA WAN ee duk ko Levii nɛtɛ wen tuia
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa o bezaŋ Levii bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi, kóó nù hee o nya-wa ga na. Mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa nɛ́ GASA WAN, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so nɛ nú ha̧ wa ga.)
«Mi duka zu kaya hee mɔ'ɔ n'am de so nɛti ga, tɛ zɛ ɓu-naar. GASA WAN zia kɔfamɔ kɔ‘m woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ kum'nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ dúk ti ha̧ dukbíí, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ há̧ nú wen yaka-a, wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá nù n'am kana mɔ ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa'e nde, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa.› »
«Kinii,
in kasa o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ in o
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k yiwese nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, nù in mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN ndaɗa in o dáà kɔ-mɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ wa; oi wa, nɛ́ o bezaŋ-wa, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, ɛnɛ n'aa hoka mgbara o dɔka dukbíí lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk sɔsɔɔ ga.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kpai see'nɛ́, ɛnɛ beka de ŋgazu ɓɔna,
wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ gana o sɔ̧ lɛŋ. A̧ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o wan, Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai, nɛ‘i yu yuu, a̧ ye ɗoŋ bíí tɛ kita na, wi ɔr a̧ na.
A̧ gɔn kita gɔn nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ be-oi in ko-gera, a̧ kɔ̧ gɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ in laa ha̧ a̧.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kɔ̧ gɛnɛ, wen ɛnɛ yaa so nɛ gɛnɛ sɛn nú Egiptɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ yu nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dee tom ha̧ a̧; nɛ̀ a̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ndaɗi in a̧, ɛnɛ tɛ kan mɔ nɛ nin-a.
A̧ nɛ zɔnamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, a̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee o gasa mɔɔ-kifi nɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ yí‘nɛ́'ɛ.
O dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ zira si nú Egiptɛ, ká wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɓɛɛ. Kinii GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra sɛn yiwese ga.»
«Mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kasa mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ kasi: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧, o yuwar duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ kasi dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ.
Sɔsɔɔ ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na in mɔ nɛ wa tɛ zɔk hɔ̧ɔ̧ na; ɛnɛ iŋa usamɔ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, gasi kɔ̧-a̧, ŋgai-te-er-a in ŋgamɔ n'aa de.
Ɛnɛ zɔka o mɔɔ-sedaako in o tom kɔ̧-a̧, mɔ n'aa dea sɛn Egiptɛ in wannu'i gu nɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ n'aa dee in o wi-biro, o nyaŋa kɔ-wa gu nɛ o keekee-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ, hu̧r nɛ wa nɛ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp ŋgimbi nɛ wa ndaka nɛ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́. GASA WAN kuma wa yinɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ n'aa dee in'nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ hɔɔ nɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ n'aa dee in Dataŋ in Abiram, o bem ko Eliab, be-koo Rubɛn. Sɛn yí o be
Ɛnɛ zɔka gasamɔ nɛ GASA WAN dee lɛŋ nɛ yí‘nɛ́.»
«Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi heembea lɛŋ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi wen yea-a tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ nɛ mɛ nɛɛ ba'i,
ha̧ zɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN baa kan mɔ ha̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa; mɛ̀ nɛ́ nù nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok fok sɛnɛ.
Nù nɛ mɛ nɛ mɛ ba'i hɔ ŋmaa in nú Egiptɛ nɛ mɛ gboo nɛnɛ‘i na: mɛ́ gun so nyɔnɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ pi̧i̧ war-yì si sɛnɛ nɛ naŋ-mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i a nɛ yì tɛ fɔ-wa̧a̧-kpoo’ɛ ga.
Nù n’ɛnɛ ɓir mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba'i, nɛ́ o kaya in o ɗɔŋgɔ á̧ dɔka sɛnɛ; nɛ́ nu nɛ kórò hɔ hɔɔ sɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ zɔk zɔk nɛ de-a; yí-a ɓɔn sɛnɛ ku̧u̧naŋ pɛ hɔ tɛ kaɗa-pɛ.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ mboo zu tɛ o heembea n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ nɛ mbetɛ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ dee tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ see'nɛ́ kpɔk in nɛ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ sɛn hi̧i̧ nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a, mɛ bɛɛ in tɛ nú-kórò; ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ alkamaari, mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧, in nɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ zɔ̧ mɛ hɔ nɛ dɔka-a sɛn zaŋbɛɛ wen o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k tɛ‘nɛ́ ká wa tɛɛ ba see'nɛ́ sitɛ o ŋma sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ gasi wa gu nɛ nù ti wa.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ‘i, see GASA WAN tɛ tu̧ zu'nɛ́, a̧ tɛ kpe yiwese, ɓɛɛ kórò beka hɔ na, nù beka dɛm nyɔnɔ ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kum nɛ haya-a tɛ de nù nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wen nɔ'ɔ kɔ‘m’ɛ e kɔ̧ see'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋma mɔɔ-sedaako-a hɛr er'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋma gá̧í̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ usi wa ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wa ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ a̧a̧ tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ nɔ̀ yuwar, ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ nù in ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kur.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yɔr wa tɛ o te nú tua k’ɛ́nɛ́, in tɛ kpar-nú-garo ye k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ha̧ zɛ‘nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk zu nù nɛ GASA WAN kana so mɔ ha̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́. Zɛ duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ hi̧i̧ tɛ dɔk hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yiwese in nù'ɛ tɛ duk nɛnɛ ga.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kasi o heembea n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom, kɔ̧ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ nɛ̀ nɔ̀ tɛ o yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ndaɗi nɛnɛ in a̧,
GASA WAN tɛ ndak o tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ yinɛ ti'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ndak o dukbíí nɛ̀ gasa in nɛ̀ ŋgaia gan'nɛ.

Fara nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ i̧si̧ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Mgbara nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ duka nɛ nú Libaŋ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn; tɛ duk nɛ nana-yì Efrat nɛ war daŋa-wese ɓɛɛ duka nɛ gba-tɔp nɛ war yee-wese.
Ŋma bíí beka yor ti'nɛ́ na. GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ o bíí mɛ yu'nɛ́ tɛ nù nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ i̧si̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, sɔsɔɔ mi ee de yoŋgo in ɗaŋ yoŋgo ti'nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mbòó zu tɛ o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa nɛ́ de yoŋgo.

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ mbòó zu tɛ o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ na, in k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zika tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ yuwar n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ iŋ na, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa nɛ́ ɗaŋ yoŋgo.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ye sɛn tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɛ ba'i, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk zu kaya Garizim tok nɛ de yoŋgo, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duka zu kaya Ebal tok nɛ ɗaŋ yoŋgo.
(O kaya nɔ‘i a̧a̧ nɛ kur Jurdɛn nɛ kur war nɛ a̧a̧ si yee-wese, tɛ nù ko o be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ti Gilgal ká̧ o gasa te sɛn Mɔre.)
Ɛnɛ tɛ ku Jurdɛn h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛnɛ tɛ ba nù‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dee ye sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk o heembea in o yuwar duka-a n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom.»
«O heembea in o yuwar duka-a n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba de nɛ tom tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgimbi lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ duk kpasa zu nù'ɛ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.»
«Ɛnɛ tɛ ɗaŋ o
Ɛnɛ tɛ gba o
«Ɛ́nɛ́ beka gasi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi nɔ‘i gasi nɛ o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i ga na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kii GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn fara n'aa hoka mgbara o dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ mɛ e nin-a sɛnɛ. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ba
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ desee in o bíí kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yuwar mɔ lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ beka de mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ de kinii, nɛ̀ kóó o ndé de nɛ mɔ nɛ see kɔ̧a̧'ɛ ga na,
wen ɛnɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ nù, fara-ɔm-tɛ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ku Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ de ye sɛn tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi. A̧ tɛ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, gbo nɛ ɛnɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ hi̧i̧ tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Nɛ́ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka mɛ e nin sɛnɛ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kai o mɔ lɛŋ n'am ha̧a̧ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ zu-a'i tɛnɛ: o

Ɛnɛ tɛ ya nɛ̀ desee ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ, o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in be Levii nɛ duk ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen a̧ kpa ŋma war mɔ, kóó ŋma mɔɔ-oi in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na.
Ká mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ sɛn fara lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ kpa na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN hoka mgbara ŋma dukbíí kɔ-mɛ; nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.

«Mɔ kpɔk, mɛ nyɛma gbɛɛ o ŋma saɗi hee mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ nyɔŋa kpoo-aa dam tɛ o ye kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ de yoŋgo nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ toka zu mɛ. Wi nɛ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ in wi-simbo tɛ nyɔŋ hee mɛ nɛ kalamba in kɔɗɛ
Mɔ kpɔk, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk-aa na, ɛnɛ tɛ gbai tɔk'i a nù hee yì ga.

Mɛ beka nyɔŋ zu alkamaari, kóó zu mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó zu nɔ̧́, kóó kàyà geɗek mɔ-dai in gasa mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ, kóó o ha̧a̧mɔ akamɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧, kóó o gee ha̧a̧mɔ in o ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ ta-tɛ tɛ o ye kɔ-mɛ na.

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i sɛnɛ, sɛn fara n'aa hoka ɓɛɛ; mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i in bem kɔ-mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a, wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ, kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ in be Levii nɛ duk tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ tɛ duk nɛ desee ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ de.
Tɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ zu nù, ká mɛ er be Levii nɛ duk tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ na.

«Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ de ha̧ nù kɔ-mɛ mɛ gasi hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nú sɛnɛ ga, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nyɔŋ kpoo, wen nɛ̀ wɔ-a tɛ gbɛ mɛ wó, mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-mɛ kɔ̧a̧ ga.

Kà fara nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ hoka mɛ e nin-a sɛnɛ nɛ́ nyɛi̧a nɛ tɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ nyɛma mɛ gbɛ ŋma ndai, kóó sami kɔ-mɛ, wan nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ de nɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ ga.
Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ hee mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, hee mɔ nɛ‘i nyɔŋ nɛ kalamba in kɔɗɛ ga. Wi-simbo in wi nɛ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i in ŋmaa.
Mɔ kpɔk, mɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk-aa na, wen tɔk nɛ́ duka-kpasa; ɓɛɛ mɛ beka nyɔŋ duka-kpasa in kpoo-aa na.
Mɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk na; mɛ tɛ gbai gbai a nù hee mɛ nɛ yì ga.
Mɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk'i na; hegɔ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ de-a, mɛ́ nɛ̀ zu mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ lɛŋ, wen nɛ mɛ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɛn yí GASA WAN.
Ɓaa mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ kai si fara nɛ GASA WAN hoka'i nɛ́ o wan nɛ mɛ tɛ e nɛtɛ in o ha̧a̧mɔ akamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ dɔ o kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, mur-aa in tɔk-aa zu fara-ɗafi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ; mɛ tɛ gbai tɔk kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a zu fara-ɗafi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nyɔŋa kpoo-aa.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k in mɛ̀ mbó zu tɛ o gba̧a̧ heembea lɛŋ n'am ha̧ mɛ'ɛ; hegɔ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ de-a, mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ ɗoŋ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wen nɛ mɛ dee mɔ nɛ ɔ dee in nɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.»
«Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ o tugun bíí nɛ mɛ tɛ ye tɛ kɔ-wa mɛ ba nù kɔ-wa,
ká mɛ zɔk ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ-wa na, ká mɛ tɛɛ tik sak ɗoŋ nɛ wa kuma lɛŋ ti mɛ kaɗi. Ká mɛ kii o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹O tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ gasa so bɔɔ o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i hee ge, ha̧‘m zɔk ɗoŋ-aa náà ge nde› na.

Mɛ beka ba yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa, gasi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na, wen mɔ nɛ duk nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN, mɔ n'aa sɛn, nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ wa dee ha̧ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa: wa dɔɔ o bem kɔ-wa be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a ha̧ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.»
«Ɛnɛ tɛ ba o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ de nɛ tom. Ɛnɛ beka e ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na in ɛnɛ beka ba ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ yinɛ na mbɛt.
«Kà ŋma
ɓɛɛ kà mɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ nú-a sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i hɔ́ gba̧a̧, kà a̧ tɔ̧: ‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, ɛ̀ɛ̀ gásí wa›;

mɛ beka zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen nɛ́ o sɔ̧ nɛ mɛ iŋ na. Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ we'nɛ́ hee mɔ‘i ga, ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ o bíí nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ in nɛ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak nɛ́ pata GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yu nɛ́ a̧, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kasi nɛ́ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧; nɛ́ tiger-a ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ zii; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gasi nɛ́ a̧; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndaɗi in a̧.
«War ko

«Kà nya-mɛ kpɔk nyak-zaŋ-dua, kóó bem kɔ-mɛ, kóó boko-bem kɔ-mɛ, kóó kóò kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ baa see-mɛ, kóó sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ hee kiitɛ-mɛ ga nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧: ‹Ɛɛ ndak ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧,› o sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ iŋ nɛti in o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
mgbara o sɔ̧ ko o bíí nɛ ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ ɛnɛ, kóó nɛ ɔ zik nɛ ɛnɛ tɛ mgbii nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ,
ká mɛ kpɛk na, ká mɛ zii wen ko wi’ɛi na. Mɛ beka de ko ha̧ a̧ na, mɛ beka mɔk tɛ-mɛ ha̧ a̧ na, mɛ beka ye ɗoŋ-aa na mbɛt.
Mɛ tɛ gbɛ a̧; nɛ́ er-mɛ a̧ tɛ hɔ tɛ-a nɛti sɛka er o dɔka bíí foo a̧.
Mɛ tɛ yo a̧ nɛ ta ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara tɛ-mɛ in Sɔ̧ nɛ baa mɛ gbonɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ in nɛ gboo mɛ kɔ̧ tua-bara yinɛ.
«O be
Sɛn tɛ ŋma ye nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ, kà mɛ zii wa tɔ̧a̧‘e ndé,
o tula-bíí gboo nɛ̀ mgbara'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɔr bíí saaye kɔ-wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, a'i nɛ́ɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ iŋ na wó,
mɛ tɛ kii mɔ nɛ dea, mɛ tɛ ak mɔ, mɛ tɛ ak mgbara mɔ nɛ de-a. Kà mɛ nɛ́ iŋa'e pɛrti gasa ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ hɔɔ mgbara wi nɛ mbetɛ wó,
mɛ tɛ kum o wi saaye'i a nù lɛŋ nɛ gba-paa. Mɛ tɛ ɗaŋ ye'i in mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kuma o mɔ-dai a nù nɛ gba-paa.
Mɛ tɛ mɔi̧ o mɔɔ-oi-biro lɛŋ a bee-gara, ɓɛɛ mɛ dɔɔ ye in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ; ye'i tɛ duk nɛ bɛɛ-oi ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wa beka de a̧ woyo ɓɔna.
Mɛ beka fo ŋma mɔ nɛ fom baa na. Hegɔ see GASA WAN tɛ ga̧, a̧ tɛ usi gasa
wen nɛ mɛ zia wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, kasi nɛ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ n'am ha̧ mɛ sɔsɔɔ, de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yí a̧.»
«Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o bem ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ́nɛ́ beka gɔn tɛ‘nɛ́ a da̧i̧ sɛnɛ na, ɛnɛ beka ba ti zu'nɛ́ wen fio na mbɛt,
wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ bíí nɛ duk nɛtɛ wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ hoka'nɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ́ bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara o bíí lɛŋ sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ.»
«Ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ ndiŋmɔ na.
O saɗi n’ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: ndai, sami in gbadua,
o saɗi nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o kalamba, in o kɔɗɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o gbadua-zaŋbɛɛ in o sami-zaŋbɛɛ.
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ o saɗi lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kɔtɔ-naŋ yiitoo in nɛ mgbuk nyɔŋmɔ mgbuk.

Hegɔ, mgbara o saɗi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kɔtɔ-naŋ yiitoo in nɛ mgbuk nyɔŋmɔ mgbuk, o wan n’ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: ŋgeloba, dɔmɔ in kparɛ, wen wa mgbuk nyɔŋmɔ mgbuk, ɓɛɛ kɔtɔ-naŋ-wa bo na. Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk wa hee o ndiŋ saɗi ga.
Ŋgɔya tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋ saɗi wen'nɛ́ mbɛt, wen kɔtɔ-naŋ-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbuk mɔ na. Ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ kpoo-aa na, kóó foo wɔr-aa na mbɛt.
«Mgbara o mɔɔ-ɗɔɔ-yì, wan n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: zoro nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ tɛn in nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ saɗa-tɛ;
ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ tɛn in saɗa-tɛ na, ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na. Wa nɛ o ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́.
«Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ o de nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ o nɔ̧́í̧ n’ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ na nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: zua, gbakaɗa, hi̧i̧-kɔ̧a̧-ga̧a̧,
pɛfi-gbɔɗɔ, tama in o zuduk fambɛɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
o zuduk gba-kɔra nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
ndao, sɔrɔrɔ, nɔ̧́í̧-ba-ká̧-ŋgere in o zuduk ndio nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
gba-diri, gɔtɔŋ in diri-taŋ-kɔ̧a,
gɔm-zaŋ, kiaŋko, gbaradaa,
nɔ̧́í̧-gba-dɔya, o zuduk gboozawaya nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nɔi-zambɛrɛ in be-sa̧i̧ na mbɛt.
«Ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ o kokoɗo-mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ buma ɓaa na. Wa nɛ o ndiŋmɔ wen'nɛ́.
Saɗi lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ wor ɓaa, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, ɛnɛ nyɛma nyɔŋa-a.

«K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ wɔr saɗi na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ha̧ ŋma gɔni bíí nɛ ɔ tɛ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɔŋ, kóó ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́r ɗɔ̀r ha̧ a̧, wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ o bíí nɛ duk nɛtɛ wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ beka ba yibere nana-gbadua gi nɛ kpoo be-a na.»
«Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ gun kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ ha̧ zu-a ha̧ Sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk.

Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ zu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ sɛn ti GASA WAN sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ hoka ha̧ nin-a mɛ duk sɛnɛ. Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ zu alkamaari kɔ-mɛ, zu mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nɔ̧́ kɔ-mɛ ba nɛ kaya gasa mɔ-dai in kaya geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ yu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kà yuwar nɛ́ ɔɔ nyɛi̧a ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba zu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛnɛ, kà fara nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ hoka mɛ e nin-a sɛnɛ nɛ́ ɔɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ tɛ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ kà GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo zu mɛ,
mɛ tɛ kpai o zu-mɔ nɛ mɛ mɔi̧a'i nɛ sede; mɛ tɛ ɓur sede'i nɛ ŋgaya-a sɛn kɔ̧ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ yaka si fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ hoka.

Sɛn hi̧i̧ mɛ tɛ hi̧fi mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ sede'i: o ndai in o sami, o dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ see-mɛ kɔ̧a̧. Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ desee, mɛ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko be Levii nɛ duk tɛ kɔ-mɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ war mɔ in ŋma mɔɔ-oi in mɛɛ na, mɛ beka er a̧ na.
Ɗoŋ pɛ taar, mɛ tɛ mɔi̧ zu o nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ tɛ taar pɛ‘i, mɛ aa wa tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ.

Hegɔ be Levii nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ war mɔ, kóó mɔɔ-oi in mɛɛ na, tɛ tɛ; o gɛnɛ, o be-oi, o ko-gera nɛ ɔ ye kɔ-mɛ tɛ tɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ-wa sur wen ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ tɛ o tom kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.»
«Ɗoŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ lɛŋ, mɛ tɛ gbɛ nyamandoi yinɛ.
Yuwar gbɛɛ nyamandoi'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: wi nɛ ha̧a̧ nyamandoi ha̧ sɛm kɔ‘i tɛ gbɛ ha̧ a̧. A̧ beka de ŋma ŋgamɔ in sɛm kɔ̧-a̧, kóó in nya-a̧ na, wen nɛ́ ŋgimbi gbɛɛ nyamandoi nɛ nin GASA WAN.
Mɛ nyɛma mɛ ak o nyamandoi kɔ-mɛ er o gɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ e wan nɛ a̧a̧ er nya-mɛ duk.

«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́ tɛ nù n'aa ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i. San beka ba ŋma bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mboo zu ha̧ GASA WAN zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ heembea lɛŋ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, san beka ba ŋma bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk na.

GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nɛ nú-a ga; ɓɛɛ hegɔ o dukbíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ e ziŋina ba nɛ mɔ er'nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ beka e ziŋina ba nɛ mɔ er bíí na. Ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu o tugun bíí nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wa beka ɔ wan zu'nɛ́ na.
«Ŋma wisan nɛ́ bòó mgbara o nya-mɛ sɛn tɛ ŋma ye poo wan nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ, ká mɛ ŋgai see-mɛ na in ká mɛ de ŋgoko in a̧ na.
Mɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nɛ́ er-mɛ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ há̧ mɔ ha̧ a̧ zu ziŋina nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.

Mɛ̀ dór tɛ-mɛ tɛ taamɔ'ɛ: ‹Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ gbɛɛ nyamandoi hɛɗa,› ká mɛ zɔk nya-mɛ nɛ ɗaŋ yí, dɔ nɛ a̧, ba nɛ ɗaŋ taamɔ zu-a'e, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ, pɛ gbɛɛ nyamandoi hɛɗa kaɗi, na, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ ai nú sitɛ GASA WAN nɛ nin-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɔ‘i tɛɛ duk nɛ ɗaŋmɔ wen mɛ.
Mɛ̀ há̧ mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ sa̧a̧-see, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ ha̧ ha̧ a̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee na; hegɔ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ tɛ tom kɔ-mɛ in mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wisan beka nyaŋ tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ na ga, mi ha̧ nɛ heembea’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́: ‹Ɛnɛ tɛ hú̧í̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ pɛsa-a ha̧ o nya'nɛ́, ha̧ o wi-bɔnɛ in ha̧ o wisan nɛ ya tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́.›
«Mgbara o nya-mɛ be hébreu, kà ŋma wiwii, kóó ŋma okoo nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ ha̧ mɛ, kà a̧ nɛ́ dee tom ha̧ mɛ hee bara ga tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, mɛ tɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ yak géè tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa be tɛ̀ɛ́ yak, ká mɛ́ e a̧ yak nɛ gee er-a na;
mɛ tɛ ha̧ o mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ dɔka-a: o geɗek mɔ-dai, o nyɔnɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧. Mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧‘i tɛ nɛ tɛ de yoŋgo ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Tɛ mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, mɛ duka nɛ bara sɛn nú Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ gɔn zu mɛ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ sa'm ha̧ heembea’ɛ ha̧ mɛ sɔsɔɔ.
«Kà bara'i tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e, wi kɔ̧ mɛ gbo er-mɛ na, wen nɛ‘i duk nɛ de-a, in wen nɛ‘i kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ nyɛmna wó,
mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ a̧ si nú tua kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ bá zer-aa ndaɗi nɛ kpar-nú-tua, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɗɔ́í nɛ̀ ŋma ɓɛ̧i̧a nú mɔ; hegɔ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ bara kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Mɛ tɛ de kànà nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i in kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ.

«Ká mɛ zɔk kpaa-zu ko bara kɔ-mɛ hee ŋgayamɔ ga na, wen tom n'aa dee ha̧ mɛ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk gana tom ko wi-de-tom-sede war yiitoo; hegɔ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ ha̧ de sɔnti ha̧ mɛ tɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de lɛŋ.»
«Kaya wiwii-ndai kɔ-mɛ in kaya be vala sami kɔ-mɛ mbɛt, mɛ tɛ e nɛtɛ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ; mɛ beka ba kuti be wiwii-ndai kɔ-mɛ wa nɛ fɔ na, in mɛ beka gɔn buma-tɛ kuti be vala sami kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i nyɔŋ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ dam ɗoŋ pɛ lɛŋ fara n'aa hoka.
Kà kputu nɛ́ aa tɛ-a, kà a̧ nɛ́ nɛɛ kum, kóó kà a̧ zɔk mɔ na, kà ŋma tɛ-a nɛ́ ɗaŋa, mɛ beka ɗaf'aa nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ‘i tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ. O bíí nɛ war tɛ-wa sa̧ na in o bíí nɛ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i nyɔŋ nɛ kalamba in kɔɗɛ'ɛ ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, mɛ beka nyɔŋ tɔk-aa na, mɛ tɛ gbai a nu hee gee yi ga.»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k zɛ sɔi-woo, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé gbaŋa
Ɛnɛ tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧
Ɛnɛ beka nyɔŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ brɛt nɛ hao a̧a̧ sɛnɛ na. Tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ
Wi beka zɔk hao sɛn tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, kóó sɛn tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ na tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Kpoo-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ tɛ gɔn nɛ̀ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛn tɛ kuti wese, ɛnɛ beka e ŋgɔn na.
«Ɛnɛ beka ɗafi sɔ̧
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka ha̧ nin-a mɛ duk sɛnɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧
Ɛnɛ tɛ gi saɗi'i, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ a̧ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka, ɓɛɛ mɛ tutuyɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ o
«Ɛnɛ tɛ tɔr alat mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese nɛ‘i mɔi̧ nɛ nyɔnɔ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa alat

Ɛnɛ tɛ kpa desee ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, sɛn fara n'aa hoka mɛ e nin-a sɛnɛ, ɛnɛ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-a, o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, be Levii nɛ duk ye k’ɛ́nɛ́, o gɛnɛ, o be-oi in o ko-gera nɛ ya mgbara'nɛ́.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, ɛnɛ duka so nɛ bara sɛn nú Egiptɛ. Ɛnɛ tɛ ba o heembea nɔ‘i, de nɛ tom.»
«Ɛnɛ tɛ de gbaŋa tua-laa
Ɛnɛ tɛ duk tɛ desee yɔyɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a, o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, o be Levii, o gɛnɛ, o be-oi in o ko-gera nɛ ya tɛ o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́.

Ɛnɛ tɛ de yɔyɛ sɛn tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn fara n'aa hoka, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ; k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ desee ɓɛɛ.
«War taar sɛn tɛ pɛ kpɔk, o wiwii lɛŋ tɛ nɛ ti GASA WAN sɛn fara n'aa hoka wen gbaŋa
Kóó o ndé tɛ ha̧ mɔ n'aa kpaa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ de yoŋgo nɛ GASA WAN toka ha̧ a̧.»
«Ɛnɛ tɛ e o wi-gɔn-kita in o kapita dam tɛ o ye lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o zuduk, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gɔn kita zu o bíí nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛnɛ tɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a, ɛnɛ beka ye ɗoŋ bíí na, bíí beka ye'nɛ́ na mbɛt, wen yee ŋmaa bom nɛ yí o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ nɛ yuwar ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kii nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, kànà nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓɛɛ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk kpasa in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
«Ɛnɛ beka bɛ̧i̧ ŋma sɛka-te mbɔɗɔnu ká̧
Ɛnɛ beka ba ŋma ta e ŋgɔn mɛ gasi na, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛna mɔ‘i.
«Ɛnɛ beka ɗafi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ndai, kóó nɛ̀ sami nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kputu tɛ na, wen mɔ‘i nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Ŋmafara ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́, wiwii kóó okoo nɛ duk tɛ ye nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbin nɛ heembea
Ŋmafara wi’ɛi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gasi o ŋma sɔ̧, gu nɛ nù ti wa, kóó a̧ tɛ gu nù ti wese, kóó ti nyaŋa-zɛ, kóó ti o sɔra lɛŋ. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ n'aa dora.
Kà wa tɔ̧́ wen'i h’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii nyɛrɛ-a, ɛnɛ tɛ kii mɛ iŋ mgbara-a nɛ de-a. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ iŋa'e pɛrti ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ dee nù
ɛnɛ tɛ sa wiwii, kóó okoo nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ‘i si nú ye, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ yo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ.
Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ wen ko wi-sedaako yiitoo kóó taar ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ gbɛ nɛ wi’ɛi, bo nɛ tɛ wen ko wi-sedaako kpɔk ɓɛɛ na.
Nɛ́ wi-sedaako a̧ tɛ yo a̧ nɛti sɛka o gee bíí yoo kɔ‘i nɛ ɗoŋ. Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ fo nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ mgbara'nɛ́.»
«Kà gɔna-kita gbɛɛ-zu, in kpɛri, sɛka da̧i̧ in ŋma gɔna-kita tɛ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ gana mɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ ba yuwar daŋ si fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ hoka.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa o be Levii nɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in wi-gɔn-kita nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ tom wese'i. Ɛnɛ tɛ ak wa zu wen'i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara gɔna kita'i h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ o wi-gɔn-kita tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN hoka. Mɔ nɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, nɛ mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ in gɔna kita nɛ wa usa ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ beka nɛ si war wiiko, kóó si war gale sɛn tɛ o mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i na.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ gasi zu zii nɛ wen nú wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duk hi̧i̧ de nɛ tom ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na, kà a̧ nɛ́ zia wen ko wi-gɔn-kita na, wi’ɛi tɛ fe. Ɛnɛ tɛ fo ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ nú
O bíí lɛŋ tɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a; wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ kíì, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí beka ŋmaŋ tɛ hee mɔ‘i ga woyo na.»
«Ɛnɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ye tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ba nù‘i, ɛnɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ɔ sɛnɛ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ be tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧‘e wi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e ŋma wan zu wi hee ko o dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ ya katɛ wi ga,
wi n’ɛnɛ tɛ e nɛ wan zu'nɛ́‘i tɛ duk kànà nɛ bíí nɛ GASA WAN hoka. Nɛ́ mgbara o nya'nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ hok wi nɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu'nɛ́ sɛnɛ; gɛnɛ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ nya'nɛ́ na beka ɔ wan zu'nɛ́ na.
Mɔ kpɔk, ká o nyaŋa dɔk er-a na, in ká à̧ mgbɔ́ o bíí siɗoŋ Egiptɛ mɛ kii mɛ kpa nyaŋa nɛ dɔka-a na, wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, ɛnɛ beka ba yuwar'i woyo ɓɔna.
Wannu'i beka bo nɛ̀ kóò nɛ̀ dɔka-a na, wen kà see-aa tɛɛ yu tɛ GASA WAN; a̧ beka mɔi̧ bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ dɔka-a na mbɛt.
A̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ɔ wan, a̧ tɛ yɔr o heembea nɛ o be Levii nɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧‘i zaŋ kalata wen a̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
Yɔra heembea'i tɛ duk katɛ a̧, a̧ tɛ tɔr a̧ wese lɛŋ n'aa duk kpasa, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ yambi yuu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, kasi nɛ o wen heembea'i in o mɔ nɛ yɔra sɛnɛ de nɛ tom.
Ká a̧ gasi zu-a ti o nya-a̧ na in ká a̧ e heembea duk nɛ nɛnɛ si war gale, kóó si war wiiko na, ha̧ zɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ in ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ dɔk sɛn nú
«O be Levii nɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, dùk kɔ-wa nɛ oi zu lɛŋ beka bó nɛ̀ ŋma war mɔ, kóó ŋma war nù kɔ-wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi in o dɔka be
O be Levii bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi mgbara o nya-wa na; GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ga.
«War mɔ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kpa er o bíí, kóó er o wi nɛ gɔn ndai, kóó sami ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́: ɓaa-a, yaŋgo-a in gbazaŋ-aa.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ zu alkamaari k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu nɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in kuti buma-tɛ geɗek mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt,
wen nɛ́ a̧ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka mgbara o zuduk mɛ yor hi̧i̧ wese lɛŋ, de nɛ tom nɛ nin GASA WAN.
«Kà ŋma be Levii tɛ nɛ tɛ ŋma ye nù
A̧ tɛ de tom nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o nya-a̧ be Levii ya nɛnɛ hi̧i̧ ti GASA WAN ga.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ wa tɛ kpa, wa tɛ kɛ̧ nyɛm ŋmaa; mɔ kpɔk, mɔɔ-oi dáà kɔ-wa nɛ wa tɛ ɗɔr kpɔk beka ye zaŋ-aa na.»
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ye tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk ɗoŋ dee ɗaŋmɔ ko o dukbíí nù‘i na.
Ŋma bíí tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka dɔ bem kɔ‘i mɛ́ be-wiwii-a kóó okoo-a ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ na; wi beka nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔk wan-gbana, wi-a-ŋgala, wi-pi̧-tani, wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi,
kóó wi-de-nyina-ba-see na; wi beka sa sɔ̧-tɛ-bíí na, wi beka kii sɔ̧-fio na mbɛt.
Wen bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i duk nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen o pɛrti gasa ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ndak nɛ o tugun bíí yinɛ ti'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ndaɗi kànà in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
«O tugun bíí nɔ‘i n’ɛnɛ tɛ ndak'i zɔk nɛ o wi-a-ŋgala in o wan-gbana; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de pɛrti mɔ‘i na.
Nɛ́ ŋma
«Nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛ́nɛ́ aka so er GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn Hɔrɛb wese mɔi̧a-a ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, wi kɔ̧ mɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i ɓɔna, wi kɔ̧ mɛ zɔk gasa wee ɓɔna, wi kɔ̧ mɛ fe na mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Daden nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Nɛ́ ŋma
Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma bíí zíí o wen kɔ‘m nɛ
Ɓɛɛ kà
«Ŋmafara ɛnɛ tɛ ak mɔ: ‹Ɛɛ tɛ iŋ‘e ɛ̧ɛ̧ wen’ɛ bó nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧a̧ na hee ge?›
Kà mɔ nɛ
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum o tugun bíí n'aa tɛ ha̧ nu kɔ-wa h’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ndak wa h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba ye in tua kɔ-wa kaɗi,

ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛ̧ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘nɛ́ tɛ fara taar; ɛnɛ tɛ hok o ŋma gasa ye taar sɛn tɛ o kɛ̧ɛ̧-nù nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ɗafa yuwar nɛa-a sitɛ o ye nɔ‘i. Hegɔ o wi-gbɛ-zu lɛŋ tɛ kpa ŋma fara-hu̧si sɛnɛ.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ gbɛɛ zu nɛ̀ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ, in nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ a̧ sɛna so wi’ɛi sɛn nɛti na, a̧ nyɛma mɛ hu̧si tɛ ŋma ye nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa.

Hee kinii ga, kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ mɛ́ gɔm te in gbama-yari kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gɔma te, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-kpi̧i̧ kpɔ̧i̧ yo gbama-yari kɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ nù nɛ fio, wi-gɔm-te'i nyɛma mɛ yu mɔ si ŋma ye nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa,
kà yuwar nɛa-a si tɛ o ye nɔ‘i a̧ nyɛi̧a na, wen ká wi-kifi-er ndak pata wi-gbɛ-zu'i nɛ nyimsea mɛ gbɛ a̧ nɛ yuwar. Wen bó nɛ́ wi-gbɛ-zu'i sɛna so wi n'aa gbɛa'i nɛti ha'i mɛ ba a̧ gbɛ na.
Nɛ hegɔ sa'm ha̧ heembea’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́: ‹Ɛnɛ tɛ hok gasa ye taar a nɛtɛ.›

«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kasa o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá wa de nɛ tom, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ndak nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ wese lɛŋ, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gasi siti hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kana so mɔ sɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga; a̧ tɛ ha̧ nù lɛŋ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e wi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa h’ɛ́nɛ́. Hegɔ‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ a o mbe ye taar zu o kuti-a nɔ‘i.
Hegɔ tɔk tɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na beka a nù sɛn zu nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi na, wen ká tɔk tɛ wi’ɛi tɛɛ tik zu'nɛ́.
«Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma bíí sɛ́n ŋma-a, kà a̧ hai a̧, tik zu a̧, gusi a̧ gbɛ, kà wi-gbɛ-zu'i yu mɔ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ ŋma ye nɔ‘i,
o gasawi ye kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tom bíí nɛ́ɛ̀ ba a̧ ha̧ wi-kifi-er mɛ gbɛ a̧.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ko ha̧ a̧ na; ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ wi nɛ gbai tɔk tɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na a nù yinɛ nú
«Mɛ beka ɗoŋ mgbara-nù ko ŋma-mɛ nɛ o zɔmdáa ee so ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nɛnɛ ba e zu kɔ-mɛ tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i na.»
«Wi-sedaako beka duk ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ wen ko wi nɛ gbɛɛ zu, kóó wi nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ, kóó ŋma gɔɔmɔ na. Nɛ́ ɗoŋ wen ko wi-sedaako yiitoo, kóó taar sɛka wen'i sa̧a̧.
Kà ŋma wi-sedaako ɓír wen e nú ŋma bíí‘e, a̧ dee ŋgazu wó,
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ si kafɛ‘i tɛ nɛ si
O wi-gɔn-kita tɛ kii mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ‘i, wa tɛ zɔk'e wi-sedaako'i nɛ́ wi-ndela, a̧ ɓira nɛ wen e nú nya-a̧.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ in a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ de in nya-a̧ ga; ɛnɛ tɛ fo ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ mgbara'nɛ́.
O oi bíí tɛ zii nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, kíì tɛ de wa, ɓɛɛ bíí tɛ kaɗi dee pɛrti ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ mgbara'nɛ́.
Ko beka de'nɛ́ ha̧ wi’ɛi na: fio oi fio, yí oi yí, nin oi nin, er oi er, naŋ oi naŋ.»
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gbo mɛ bi o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o nyaŋa in o keekee-nyaŋa, in bíí nɛ dɔka-a gan'nɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu mɔ na, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ gboo'nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ hɛɗi mɛ bi biro, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ɗɔŋ piiti, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí:
‹O be
wen nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ nɛ nɔ̀ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ a̧ mɛ de biro in o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ oi nú‘nɛ́, ye nɛ̀ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́.›
«O kapita tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ o bíí hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Kà ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ́ dee tua n'aa tɛ si kɔ̧ a̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ a̧ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ fe yí biro, ká ŋma bíí si kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ oi-aa.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ guna nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓɛɛ n'aa ɓi kuti waya-a na, a̧ a̧ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ fe yi biro, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma bíí tɛɛ ɓi kuti waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ hara kóò, ɓɛɛ n'aa tɛ ba hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, a̧ a̧ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, ká a̧ tɛɛ fe yi biro, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma bíí tɛɛ ba kóò kɔ̧-a̧.›
«O kapita tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí woyo: ‹Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ dee kíì, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ bó nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi na, a̧ a̧ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, wen ká kíì tɛɛ de o ŋma-a hee a̧ ga.›
Ŋgimbi nɛ o kapita be tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ o bíí kaɗi, wa tɛ a o gasa wi-biro zu o dùk wi-biro kpɔk kpɔk.
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ hɛɗi ká̧ ŋma ye h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ bi a̧, mɛ tɛ ak ga̧a̧mɔ in o bíí ye'i.
Kà wa nɛ́ kpɛka ga̧a̧mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kà wa hú̧í̧ nú garo h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ bíí saaye'i lɛŋ tɛ de tom-bara h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kà wa nɛ́ kpɛka ga̧a̧mɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ kà wa bá nɛ́ biro duk nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛr ye'i e nù.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fo wa a kɔ̧ er'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gbɛɛ wa lɛŋ nɛ gba-paa.
Mɛ tɛ kai o okoo lɛŋ, o obem, mɔ-dai in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ tɛ duk saaye nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro; ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ-oi-biro er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de in o ye lɛŋ nɛ ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ ɛnɛ, o wan nɛ bo mgbara o ye ko o tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ na.
«Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ beka e ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ duk kpasa tɛ nù ko o dukbíí nɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi’ɛ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum o be Hit, o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus lɛŋ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ baa tɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga,
wen ká wa tɛɛ usi ɗoŋ ɗaŋ yuwar ɗafa o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa h’ɛ́nɛ́, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɛra ŋma ye e nù ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ bi nɛ a̧, ɛ́nɛ́ beka gɔm o te nɛ kpi̧i̧ yinɛ na, wen nɛ́ waya-te nɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nyɔŋ, wen te bó nɛ́ bíí, k’ɛ́nɛ́ bi biro in a̧ na.
Kànà nɛ́ te nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ te-wai-wai na ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ gɔm, wen ɗafa-a nɛ fara-duk bi nɛ biro, hɔ wese nɛ ye'i tɛ tik nɛnɛ.»
«Sɛn tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘nɛ́, kà‘i kpá ŋma wɔr bíí fara ɔɔ nù sɛn kpɛɛfɔ, kà‘i íŋ yi wi nɛ gbɛɛ a̧ na,
o
Wi tɛ zɔk ye nɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ wɔr'i na. O
wa tɛ ba be ndai'i si nú ŋma foka-yì, sɛn ŋma fara nɛ fɔ bo na, nɛ‘i tɛ gun mɔ sɛnɛ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbin ger be ndai'i sɛn ɗɔɔ foka-yì‘i.
O be Levii nɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nɛ si fara'i mbɛt, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka wen ɗafa sɔ̧ in
Ɓɛɛ o
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧a̧: ‹Bo nɛ er yɛ a̧ gbaia tɔk’ɛ a nù na, yí-ɛɛ mbɛt zɔk na.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko
Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ba nɛ simbo tɔk tɛ wi nɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na yinɛ mgbara'nɛ́, de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN.»
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó mɛ bi o wisɛn nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ aa kɔ er'nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o bara-biro,
ɓɛɛ kà mɛ zɔ́k ŋma de be-zɔŋa sɛn mgbara o bara-biro nɔ‘i, kà mɛ ndáɗí in a̧ mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò,
mɛ tɛ mgbɔ a̧ si kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ; a̧ tɛ kpui zu-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔna sɔ̧ɔ̧ er-a;
a̧ tɛ kpai laa n'aa pi̧a ŋgimbi nɛ‘i baa nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ. A̧ tɛ hi̧i̧ fio dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk; ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, mɛ tɛ nɛ si katɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ baa a̧ nɛ kóò.
Ɓɛɛ kà wɔ-a búsí tɛ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ yak hee mɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧ ga; mɛ beka ɗɔr a̧ wen sede na, mɛ beka usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧ na mbɛt, wen mɛ baa so a̧ baa nɛ kóò kaɗi.»
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ̀ baa kóò yiitoo, kà a̧ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓii-aa, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ sɛ́n ɓii-aa, kà wa yiitoo lɛŋ nɛ́ kòó be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ kà wi-hɔ-ti nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ bem ko kóò nɛ̀ wíì sɛn'i,
ɓɛɛ wese n'aa tɛ kɛ̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, be-kai-mɔɔ-oi beka duk nɛ kaya-bem ko kóò n'aa kɔ̧a̧‘i, e bem ko ɓii kóò n'aa sɛn'i duk na.
A̧ tɛ iŋ kànà‘e, be-kai-mɔɔ-oi nɛ́ bem ko kóò n'aa sɛn'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ a̧ war yiitoo, wen bem’ɛi nɛ́ kuti ŋgai nɛ gboo tɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ duk be-kai-mɔɔ-oi.»
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ bem nɛ̀ de nɛ ŋgazu, nɛ̀ mbo zu ha̧ dáà in nàà kɔ‘i na, kà wa nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ zii na,
dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ sitɛ o gasawi saaye, sɛn ká̧ nú-garo ye'i;
wa tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi nɔ‘i'e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k bem k’ɛɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ ŋma be-ŋgazu, a̧ zii mbɔrɔ k’ɛɛ na, a̧ nɛ́ wi-ɗaɗa in wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧.›
O wiwii saaye lɛŋ tɛ yo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ fo nɛ ɗaŋmɔ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́ yinɛ; o be
«Kà‘i gbɛ́ ŋma bíí wen ŋma ŋga ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea, ɓɛɛ kà‘i gá̧í̧ wɔr-aa tɛ te,
wɔr-aa beka ɔ tɛ te'i na. Ɛnɛ tɛ gun a̧ kpɔk kale wese'i, wen wɔr nɛ ga̧i̧ tɛ te dak nɛ fom ko Sɔ̧ pi̧ nù. Hegɔ mɛ beka pi̧ ndiŋ tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ nɛ mɔɔ-oi na.»
«Kà mɛ nɛ zɔka ŋma sami, kóó ŋma ndai ko ŋma-mɛ fara yambala-a, mɛ̀ bá a̧ pii nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ wan-aa.
Kà ŋma-mɛ wan saɗi'i nɛ́ bòò katɛ mɛ na, kóó kà mɛ íŋ a̧ na, mɛ tɛ ba saɗi'i e tɛ kɔ-mɛ hɔ wese nɛ wan-aa tɛ ak nɛ mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧a̧ a̧ siɗoŋ.
Mɛ tɛ de kale mɔ‘i in tuifuu kɔ̧-a̧, laa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yɔa in ŋma mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yɔa nɛ mɛ kpaa mbɛt; ká mɛ́ e mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk na.
«Kà mɛ zɔ́k ŋma ndai, kóó ŋma tuifuu ko ŋma-mɛ yoo nù sɛn yuwar, ká mɛ wɛr tɛ-mɛ yak na; mɛ̀ gbák wan-aa tɛ baa a̧ e ŋgɔn.»
«Okoo beka pi̧ laa ko wiwii na, in wiwii beka pi̧ laa ko okoo na, wen bíí lɛŋ nɛ de pɛrti mɔ‘i de nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Kà mɛ kpá yaa-nɔ̧́í̧ sɛn yuwar, kóó sɛn kɔ̧ ŋma te, kóó sɛn mbɔɗɔnu nɛ oi be-a, kóó nɛ oi kui-a, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ nana-a a̧a̧ zu a̧, mɛ beka kai nana-a in o be-a lɛŋ na.
Mɛ tɛ e nana-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ kaia kɔ-mɛ nɛ o be-a; hegɔ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ zɛ mɛ dɔka zu nù.
«Kà mɛ dé mbe tua, mɛ̀ dé ŋma mɔ ɓor nɛ zu-a zik kpa, wen kà ŋma bíí hɔ̧fi̧ nɛ zu tua'i, ɓɛɛ ká simbo tɔk tɛ-a bá tua kɔ-mɛ.
«Mɛ́ beka gun ŋma mbe te sɛn kpɛɛfɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na, wen kà mɛ gún nyɔnɔ a zu ŋmaa, waya-a lɛŋ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ mɔ nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
«Mɛ beka hɛr ndai in tuifuu kpɔk wa nɛ fɔ na.
«Mɛ beka pi̧ laa nɛ‘i dee zɔ̧-a̧ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ na.
«Mɛ tɛ sik mɔ naar kpo dam mgbii laa kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ gu zu mɛ.»
«Kà bíí á̧ baa kóò, kà a̧ nɛ́ duka in a̧, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ kɔ̧́ a̧ ɓɔna,
kà a̧ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu duka-a kɔ̧-a̧, kà a̧ nɛ́ pi̧i̧ búù zu a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Kóò'ɛ, mi baa a̧, mi duka in a̧, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ iŋa wiwii kaɗi› wo,
dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ba sedaako duka-a nɛ kpea-a kɔ̧-a̧ usi ha̧ o gasawi sɛn nú garo ye.
Dáà ko boko-bem’ɛi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi: ‹Boko-bem’ɛ nɛ bem kɔ‘m n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ wi’ɛ nɛ kóò, ɓɛɛ kinii a̧ kɔ̧ a̧ ɓɔna.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ wen zu duka-a kɔ̧-a̧‘e, wi kpa bem kɔ‘m nɛ kpea-a na. Kinii, mɔ nɛ usi'e bem kɔ‘m iŋ so wiwii nɛti na nɛ mɔ'ɔ.› Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yai zɔ̧-laa nɛ wa kpaa ŋmaa zu a'i ti o gasawi saaye.
Hegɔ o gasawi saaye'i tɛ ba wi’ɛi mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧;
wa tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ yoɓi kɔya bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa ha̧ dáà ko boko-bem’ɛi wen n'aa ɗaŋa nin zɔŋa
«Ɓɛɛ kà mɔ nɛ́ duka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧a̧ ga, kà kóò nɛ́ iŋa so wiwii nɛti kaɗi,
wa tɛ mgbɔ a̧ e nú tua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ o bíí ye kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ, wen a̧ dee mɔɔ-búù sɛn nú
«Kà‘i kpa ŋma wiwii fara dee dàlà in ŋma okoo nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ wíì, wi tɛ gbɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ, wi’ɛi in kóò‘i mbɛt. Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ fo nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ mgbara ɛnɛ o be
«Kà ŋma boko-bem nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, nɛ̀ wa hara kaɗi dé dàlà in ŋma wiwii sɛn saaye,

ɛnɛ tɛ kai wa si nú garo ye, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yoo wa nɛ ta gbɛ. War fio ko be-okoo'i, nɛ́ wen n'aa a̧a̧ so saaye ɓɛɛ a̧ hiɗi mɔ na. War ko wiwii'i nɛ́ wen n'aa ɔɔ in kóò ko ŋma-a. Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ fo nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ mgbara'nɛ́.
«Kà bo nɛ sɛn zaŋbɛɛ a̧ wiwii kpaa ŋma be-zɔŋa nɛ wa hara kaɗi, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ bá a̧ nɛ ŋgai ɔ nɛnɛ in a̧, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wi’ɛi a̧ tɛ fe ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko be-zɔŋa'i, ɛnɛ beka de ŋma mɔ in a̧ na, wen n'aa de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe fio-a na. Mɔ ko be-zɔŋa'i hɔɔ ŋmaa in mɔ ko ŋma bíí nɛ ŋma-a tika zu a̧ ɓɛɛ gbɛ a̧.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn zaŋbɛɛ a̧ wi’ɛi kpaa a̧ sɛnɛ. Be-zɔŋa'i hiɗa so mɔ takaɗi, ŋma bíí tɛ mɛ gbak a̧ na.
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ baa ŋma boko-bem nɛ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, nɛ wa tɛ har hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, kà a̧ ɔ́ in a̧, ɓɛɛ kà ŋma bíí kpá wa,
wi nɛ ɔɔ in boko-bem’ɛi tɛ ha̧ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ ha̧ dáà ko boko-bem’ɛi. Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ɗaŋa a̧ ga, a̧ tɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò; a̧ beka ndak a̧ na hɔ wese fio.
«Bíí beka ba ŋma koo ko dáà kɔ‘i na; a̧ beka hak yí mɔ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ na.»
«Wi nɛ wa too fala-a too in wi nɛ ti-a ɓira ɓir beka ye tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí ko GASA WAN na.
«Be-dàlà mbɛt beka ye mgbara giiwi ko GASA WAN na hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ-aa ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɓu.
«Bezaŋ Amɔŋ in bezaŋ Mɔab beka ye mgbara giiwi ko GASA WAN na, kóó hɔ tɛ o bezaŋ-wa ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɓu mbɛt,
wen bo nɛ wa baa brɛt in yì we nɛ ti'nɛ́ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gboo nɛnɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ na, in wen nɛ Mɔab yoɓa Balam, bem ko Beɔr be saaye Petɔr sɛn nú Mesopotamii, mɛ tok ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu'nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ so zia wen ko Balam na; a̧ tɛɛ kpai ɗaŋ yoŋgo ko Balam nɛ̀ de yoŋgo, wen n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ beka kii ha̧ wa mɛ kpa mɔ in ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ de-a na ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ duk kpasa.
«Ɛnɛ beka zɔk o be Edɔm hee o ɗaŋwi ga na, wen wa nɛ o nya'nɛ́. Ɛnɛ beka zɔk o be Egiptɛ hee o ɗaŋwi ga na, wen ɛnɛ yaa so nɛ gɛnɛ tɛ nù kɔ-wa.
O taar bezaŋ-wa tɛ ye mgbara o bíí ko GASA WAN.»
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba gbagari wen bíí o wisɛn k’ɛnɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na.
Kà war-tɛ ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ́ duka nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ na, wen nɛ ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpaa a̧ mɛ zɛ, a̧ tɛ gbo kɔ̧ gbagari, a̧ beka si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧ a̧ na.
Mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, a̧ tɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ tɛ yee-wese, a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧ gbagari woyo.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɗafi ŋma fara nyɛi̧ nɛ gbagari wen nɛɛ zaŋbɛɛ sɛnɛ.
Sɛn zaŋ tui k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ kasi ŋma mɔɔ-za̧-mɔ; ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ zaŋbɛɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ za̧ be kɔ̧; ɗoŋ n’ɛnɛ nɛɛ zaŋbɛɛ kaɗi, ɛnɛ tɛ tur nù a zu-a.

Wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yar yar nɛ kɔ̧ gbagari wen kpasa'nɛ́ in wen foo o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ a kɔ̧ er'nɛ́; ɔ dee ha̧ gbagari k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, wen ká GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔ́k ŋma mɔɔ-foe, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ zík ɗoŋ e h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
«Mɛ beka fo bara nɛ yuu mɔ yak pii tɛ-mɛ sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ dáa-bara kɔ̧-a̧ na.
A̧ tɛ duk in mɛɛ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́ sɛn ŋma ye n'aa hoka mgbara o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen de duka-a kɔ̧-a̧; mɛ beka de ŋma ŋgamɔ in a̧ na.»
«O ko-de-dàlà
Ɛ́nɛ́ beka ba mbɔi ko o ko-de-dàlà
«Kà mɛ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ sede, kóó nyɔŋmɔ, kóó ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ ha̧ nya-mɛ nɛ nyamandoi, ká mɛ́ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ e mbe mɔ zu a̧ ba nɛnɛ pii ɗɔŋ ha̧ mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧a̧ nyamandoi wen kpaa yí-a ha̧ gɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ ha̧ nya-mɛ na, wen ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, zu o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ nù nɛ mɛ nɛ mɛ ba'i.»
«Kà mɛ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nú-mɛ, mɛ́ hà̧ ŋma mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ nik naŋ-mɛ sɛka mɛ dee mɔ‘i na, wen ká GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛɛ ak mɛ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɔ‘i tɛɛ duk nɛ ɗaŋmɔ wen mɛ.
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ nú-mɛ wen ha̧a̧ mɔ na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ wen mɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nú-mɛ, mɛ̀ dé kana ha̧
«Kà mɛ yé kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko ŋma-mɛ, mɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka kai ŋma yak nɛnɛ na.
Kà mɛ yé kpɛɛfɔ alkamaari ko ŋma-mɛ, mɛ nyɛma mɛ hik alkamaari nɛ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ pɔi pɔi na.»
«Kà ŋma wiwii bá kóò, kà a̧ zɔ́k mɔ tɛ kóò‘i nɛ de tɛ-a na, kà a̧ kɔ̧́ a̧ ɓɔna, a̧ tɛ yɔr kalata-gbia-a ha̧ koo'i, ndak nɛ a̧.
Kà kóò‘i gbo yak tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba ŋma mbe wíì,
kà mbe wíì‘i mbɛt kɔ̧́ kɔ‘i ɓɔna, kà a̧ yɔ́r kalata-gbia-a e er-a ndak nɛ a̧, kóó kà mbe wíì‘i nɛ́ fea,

kuti wíì nɛ baa so kóò‘i beka ba a̧ nɛ kóò woyo ɓɔna. Kuti wíì‘i tɛ e a̧ hee okoo nɛ war-tɛ sa̧ na ga; kà a̧ nɛ baa a̧ siɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN. Mɛ beka ba nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ nɛ mɔɔ-oi pi̧ tɛ ɗaŋmɔ na.»
«Kà ŋma bíí nɛ baa kóò nɛ mbe-a, a̧ beka nɛ biro na, in bíí beka tɛ tɛ-a wen ŋma mɔ na. A̧ tɛ ɔm tɛ-a tɛ pɛ kpɔk ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ kóò n'aa baa nɛ mbe-a.»
«Bíí beka e ta-hɔ̧n-mɔ kɔ‘i, nana-a in be-a nɛ ziŋina na, wen duk hee wi e nɛ kiitɛ-wi nɛ ziŋina ga.»
«Kà ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ́ zu̧u̧ kìì-bíí, kà bó nɛ́ ŋma nya-a̧ be
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k tɛ‘nɛ́ wen o zɛɛ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in doko; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii tɛ usi h’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o wen n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa.
Tɛ-mɛ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ dee so in Mariama sɛn yuwar, ŋgimbi gboa-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ.»
«Kà mɛ gbák ŋma mɔ ha̧ ŋma-mɛ, mɛ beka ye kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ba ŋma mɔ oi-aa nɛ ziŋina na.
Mɛ tɛ duk zan, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi nɛ mɛ gbaka mɔ ha̧ a̧‘i a̧ tɛ ba ziŋina kɔ-mɛ gbonɛ ha̧ mɛ.
Kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wisan, ká mɛ dor mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ mɛ ɔ er-mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ ba mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ sinɛ nɛti sɛka wese yea; a̧ tɛ ɔ nɛ laa kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛ ziŋina'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ toka de yoŋgo zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ duka nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.»
«Mɛ beka de ŋgamɔ in wisan ká bá nɛ̀ wi-kɔsa nɛ de tom-sede mgbara'nɛ́, kóó nɛ́ nya-mɛ, kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ nɛ duk tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ, tɛ nù kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ̀ há̧ sede-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ nɛti ha̧ wese mɛ ye, wen a̧ nɛ wi-bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ pɛm; wen kà a̧ áí nú GASA WAN, mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ɗaŋmɔ wen mɛ.»
«Dáà beka fe fio ɗaŋmɔ ko bem na, bem beka fe fio ɗaŋmɔ ko dáà na mbɛt; kóó o ndé tɛ fe nɛ fio ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i.»
«Mɛ beka fo ŋma mɔ ko gɛnɛ, kóó mɔ ko be-oi na, in mɛ beka ba laa ko ko-gera nɛ ziŋina na mbɛt.
Tɛ-mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, mɛ duka so nɛ bara sɛn Egiptɛ. Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ gboo mɛ; nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm ha̧ nú ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba wen’ɛ de nɛ tom.

«Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ, kà tɛ-mɛ bí ɗoŋ ŋma sikila-a ɓɔn kpɛɛfɔ, mɛ beka si ɗoŋ mɛ ba na. I̧i̧ hi̧i̧ nɛ ko gɛnɛ, ko be-oi in ko ko-gera, wen ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ tɛ o tom kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ɓi o waya-te-nɔ̧́, ká mɛ́ si ɗoŋ ɓi oi-aa nɛ tɛ ɓɔn kɔ̧ te na; i̧i̧ nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ko gɛnɛ, ko be-oi in ko ko-gera.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɓi waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ́ si ɗoŋ mɛ ɓi oi-aa na, wen oi-aa nɛ tɛ ɓɔn nɛ ko gɛnɛ, ko be-oi in ko ko-gera.
Tɛ-mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, mɛ duka so nɛ bara sɛn Egiptɛ; nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm ha̧ nú‘m ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba wen’ɛ de nɛ tom.»
«Kà o ŋma bíí nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ wen in ŋmaa, wa tɛ nɛ si fara-gɔn-kita; wi-gɔn-kita tɛ kpa wi nɛ wen tika a̧ in wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ wen na.
Kà‘i nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ gusi wi nɛ wen tika a̧‘i, wi-gɔn-kita tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ba a̧ gu nù, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gusi a̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa tɛ gusi a̧ nyasi ɓu-naar, ɓɛɛ beka gan zu mɔ‘i na, wen ká‘i tɛɛ e gasa da̧i̧ tɛ-a, in ká ziimɔ tɛɛ ba a̧.»
«Ká mɛ hɛr nú ndai ŋgimbi n'aa duk tɛ ŋmáá gba̧a̧ alkamaari na.»
«Kà o nya-wi yá in ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ kà ɓii wi fe, bem bo na, kóò ko wan-fio beka ba ŋma gɔni bíí yak zu nam ko wíì na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ nya ko wan-fio a̧ tɛ ba a̧, oi nya-a̧ nɛ fea'i.
Kuti bem nɛ wa tɛ ko in ŋmaa tɛ ba nɛ nin wan-fio, wen ká nin-a tɛɛ bi sɛn nú
Kà wi’ɛi a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ baa kóò ko nya-a̧ na, kóò‘i tɛ nɛ ti o gasawi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: ‹Nya ko wíì kɔ‘m bɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧ nin nya-a̧ mɛ ɓɔn mgbara o be
O gasawi saaye tɛ sa nya wan-fio, wa tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧. Kà a̧ yór hi̧i̧, kà a̧ tɔ̧́‘e: ‹Mi kɔ̧ baa a̧ nɛ kóò na›,
ɓɛɛ kóò‘i tɛ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ a̧ sɛn mgbara o gasawi, a̧ tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ ndárà naŋ nya ko wíì kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ aa sap yi-a; a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mɔ nɛ‘i de in wiwii nɛ̀ kasi kira oi zɔmwi kɔ‘i na nɛ mɔ'ɔ.›
Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wa tɛ sa nin nutua ko wi’ɛi'e: ‹Nutua ko wi nɛ kpɔ̧i̧a̧ ndárà naŋ.› »
«Kà o ŋma bíí yiitoo nɛ́ mbɛra ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ kà kóò ko ŋma kpɔk nyɛi̧ er ba zim-tɛ ɓii wi ye nɛ ɗoŋ wíì kɔ‘i,
ɛnɛ tɛ ɓir er koo'i yinɛ; ko beka de'nɛ́ ha̧ a̧ na.»
«Mɛ beka a mɔɔ-we-dita-mɔ in wan nɛ diti na sɛn kɔ̧ ŋgoɓo kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ beka e gasa ao in geɗek-a sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ kilo kpɔk nɛ̀ nyɛma sɛnɛ, in ao kpɔk nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ, wen ha̧ zɛ mɛ mɛ dɔk tɛ nu nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Wen kóó o ndé nɛ we mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ na, nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a na, duk nɛ́ ɗaŋ bíí ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.»
«Tɛ-mɛ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ Amalɛk dee in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ŋgimbi gboa-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ wee so ti'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ o wi nɛ ɓɔna so ɗoŋ, ŋgimbi nɛ wa mbɔia nɛnɛ. A̧ yu so Sɔ̧ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ katɛ‘nɛ́ yinɛ lɛŋ, ha̧ nɛ ɔma-tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nù n'aa ea h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi, ɛnɛ tɛ bi nin Amalɛk sɛn zu nù yinɛ. Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ mɔ‘i na.»
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ-oi, ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba nù‘i kaɗi ɓɛɛ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba o kuti waya nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa lɛŋ sɛn tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i, a wa kɔ̧ gɛsɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hoka mɛ e nin sɛnɛ‘i.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom wese'i, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: ‹Sɔsɔɔ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m'e, mi hɔa tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN baa ha̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ kan nɛ mɔ‘e wi tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́.›
«Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba gɛsɛ er-mɛ ti

Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ: ‹Dáà kɔ‘m duka so nɛ be Aram nɛ yara so nɛ ŋgɔn. A̧ zira so si Egiptɛ ɓɛɛ a̧ duk hi̧i̧ hee gɛnɛ ga in o bíí tikiɗi nɛ nɛɛ so in a̧. Sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ kifa nɛ ŋgaya gasa zuduk.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Egiptɛ usa bɔnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́; wa pi̧i̧ yɛ tɛ san in wa usa ŋga tom-bara h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ɛɛ aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii tiger yɛ. A̧ zɔka san k’ɛɛ, kɔsa k’ɛɛ in o bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ.
GASA WAN gboo yɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ tɛ ŋgai-te-er-a in ɓaa-a n'aa guu zu yɛ tɛ zɔm mɔɔ-kíì, o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ.
A̧ mgbɔɔ yɛ tɛnɛ, hɔ fara’ɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nù'ɛ, nɛ gɔrɔ in yibere fok sɛnɛ'ɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN, zu-nyɔnɔ tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am ba tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.›
«Mɛ tɛ ba mɔ‘i e ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ guu nù ti a̧.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ de duka-a ha̧ mɛ in o bíí nutua kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ga, mɛ tɛ duk nɛ desee in o be Levii ká bá nɛ̀ o gɛnɛ nɛ ya mgbara'nɛ́.»
«Tɛ taar pɛ nɛ duk nɛ pɛ-ha̧a̧mɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ndɛm zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, nɛ̀ mɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋma ha̧ be Levii, ha̧ ɔ gɛnɛ, ha̧ be-oi in ko-gera tɛ ye kɔ-mɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔ zaŋ-wa sur,

mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘e: ‹Mi baa war mɔ ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m yinɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ ha̧ be Levii, gɛnɛ, be-oi in ko-gera nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m. Mi yak zu heembea'i na, mi er ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na mbɛt.

Mi nyɔŋ ŋma zu-mɔ‘i ŋgimbi nɛ fio fee er-am na, mi ba ŋma mɔ‘i ŋgimbi nɛ yuwar tɛ‘m sa̧ nɛnɛ na, na; mi ba ŋma mɔ zaŋ-aa ha̧ ha̧ sɔ̧-fio na mbɛt. Mi zia nɛ́ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m tɔ̧a̧ ha̧‘m, mi dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ tɛnɛ nɛ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn yiwese mɛ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu o be
«Sɔsɔɔ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba o heembea in yuwar duka-a n'aa usi h’ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ tom. Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi wa de nɛ tom nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ in nɛ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Sɔsɔɔ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́: k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Sɔsɔɔ mbɛt, ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛtɛ hee mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ so ga, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ, in zɔnamɔ gan o dukbíí lɛŋ n'aa dea, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ya nɛ́ sa̧a̧ dukbíí ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa ha̧ so nú-a sɛnɛ ga.»
Moisɛ in o gasawi
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ ku Jurdɛn si war nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ kai o gasa ta a ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓɔndɔ sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ yɔr o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea nɔ‘i lɛŋ sɛnɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ku nɛ Jurdɛn; hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ ye tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, nù nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Ɛnɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ku Jurdɛn kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kaia o ta nɔ‘i a ŋgɔn nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Sɛn hi̧i̧, ɛnɛ tɛ mbo
Ɛnɛ tɛ mbo a̧ nɛ o ta nɛ‘i sɛk na; nɛ́ zu mboo-mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ gaŋmɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ sɛn hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duka nɛ desee ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ yɔr o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ zu o ta. Ɛnɛ yɔr nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.»
Moisɛ in o be Levii nɛ ya nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Ɛnɛ tɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛnɛ tɛ ba o heembea in o
Wese'i, Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
«O wi nɛ tɛ ya zu kaya Garizim mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí ɗoŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ku Jurdɛn kaɗi, nɛ́ Simɛɔŋ, Levii, Juda, Isakar, Jozɛf in Bɛnjamin;
ɓɛɛ Rubɛn in Gad, Asɛr in Zabulɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ Dan in Nɛftalii tɛ ya kɔ‘i zu kaya Ebal mɛ fom nɛ wa.»
«O be Levii tɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ hee ger ha̧ o be
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ mbo mɔ in nɛ sɛk mɔ mɛ gasi nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧, wen GASA WAN sɛna o pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ er.›
«Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa'e: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ e dáà kɔ‘i in nàà kɔ‘i tɛ geemɔ.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ nyɔŋ nú nù ko ŋma-wi.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ ɔr wi-boma-yí, ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔ war.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ ɓar mɔ er gɛnɛ, koo er be-oi, kóó er ko-gera.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ tɛ ɔ in ŋma kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i, wen a̧ hak nɛ yí-mɔ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn.›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ tɛ ɔ in saɗi!› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ tɛ ɔ in boko-nya-wi, kóó nɛ́ bem ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, kóó nɛ́ bem ko nàà kɔ̧-a̧.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ tɛ ɔ in for-wi mɛ kóò.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi hu̧si gbɛ nɛ ŋma-wi.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ tɛ ba sede er bíí mɛ gbɛ wi nɛ duk zóóŋ.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!›
« ‹Fom a̧ ba wi nɛ mbo zu tɛ o heembea nɔ'ɔ mɛ ba wa de nɛ tom na.› Ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa: ‹Aamɛn!› »
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mbetɛ ba nɛ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ tom, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk ti ha̧ o dɔka tugun bíí tɛ nù'ɛ.
O de yoŋgo lɛŋ nɛ tɛ duk zu'nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ mboo zu tɛ zia tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«De yoŋgo tɛ duk zu'nɛ́ sɛn saaye in sɛn zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt.
«De yoŋgo tɛ duk zu o bezaŋ‘nɛ́, zu o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, zu o nana-ndai in o nana-sami k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«De yoŋgo tɛ duk zu gɛsɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bɔtɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«De yoŋgo tɛ duk zu yari k’ɛ́nɛ́.
