«GASA WAN tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa ŋgai zu o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn in'nɛ̀ɛ́. Wa tɛ gbo pii tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ kpɔk yuwar, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ pɛsi ti'nɛ́ yak nɛ yuwar mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
«GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ de yoŋgo mɛ duk zu'nɛ́, zu dam k’ɛ́nɛ́ in zu tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. A̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu nù n'aa ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
«GASA WAN tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛtɛ wen-aa, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kana so nɛ mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, wen n’ɛnɛ kasa o heembea kɔ̧-a̧, in n’ɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ̀ sɛn tɛ o yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
O dukbíí nù lɛŋ tɛ zɔk'e ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ dukbíí ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yu'nɛ́.
GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ de duka-a h’ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛnɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk, ha̧ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɛɓi in ha̧ o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɛm, tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN kana mɔ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, wi tɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN tɛ hú̧í̧ yiwese ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ zu nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ dam ɗoŋ ŋgimbi-a, in ha̧ a̧ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o tom k’ɛ́nɛ́. O ŋma dukbíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ gbak mɔ er'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka gbak mɔ na.
GASA WAN tɛ e'nɛ́ siti, a̧ beka e'nɛ́ si ɗoŋ na. Ɛnɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka duk si ɗɔɔ na, wen n’ɛnɛ zia o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi de nɛ tom,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧r si war wiiko kóó si war gale tɛ o yuwar n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ'ɛ na, in ɛ́nɛ́ ndak ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ de nɛ tom ha̧ wa na mbɛt.»
«Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ba nɛ o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ tom na, o fom nɛ tɛ ba'nɛ́ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
«Fom tɛ ba'nɛ́ sɛn saaye in sɛn zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt.
«Fom tɛ ba gɛsɛ in bɔtɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Fom tɛ ba o bezaŋ‘nɛ́, o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, o nana-ndai k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o nana-sami k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
«Fom tɛ ba'nɛ́ tɛ o yari k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ ziimɔ, bele in ŋgamɔ zu'nɛ́ tɛ o tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kum nɛ haya-a lɛŋ, wen zu ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ dea e nɛ‘m duk.
GASA WAN tɛ tom ŋga-zɛɛ-geŋa pi̧ zu'nɛ́ gbɛ nɛ ɛnɛ zu nù n’ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɛ ba'i yinɛ.
GASA WAN tɛ tom o zɛɛ-ɔ̧ki, zɛɛ-gɛ̧ɛ̧ in mbɔ-yí pi̧ zu'nɛ́; a̧ tɛ tom gbɛ̧ŋmɔ, ŋga-kaara, gbɛɛ-dua-mɔ in laambam pi̧ zu o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́. O ŋgamɔ nɔ‘i tɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kum.
Yiwese zu'nɛ́ tɛ kifi nɛ ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ nù ɗɔɔ naŋ‘nɛ́ kifa nɛ boi.
GASA WAN tɛ kpai kórò nɛ fuunu in bùk. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ zir nɛ yiwese pii zu'nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kum.
«GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ gan'nɛ; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbo si ti wa nɛ yuwar kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ yu mɔ ti wa nɛ yuwar mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa'nɛ́ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí nù lɛŋ.
Wɔr'nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi tɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́; ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ́ tɛ̀ mɛ́ ndak wa yinɛ beka bo na.
GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ gba-da̧i̧ in kore Egiptɛ tɛ‘nɛ́, a̧ tɛ pi̧ tara, in tárá-tɛ nɛ beka kaɗi na ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɛ‘nɛ́.
GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ dawa zu'nɛ́, ɛnɛ beka zɔk mɔ na, zu'nɛ́ tɛ zik mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ tɛ tam nɛ́ mɔ nɛ er'nɛ́ nɛ bu wese hee wi nɛ zɔk mɔ na ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa yuwar na; o bíí tɛ ɔr'nɛ́ kai nɛ mɔ er'nɛ́, zu̧ nɛ ɛnɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ ye ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ beka bo na.
«Kóò nɛ mɛ tɛ har, ŋma mbe bíí tɛ ɔ in a̧; tua nɛ mɛ tɛ de, mɛ beka ɔ kɔ̧ a̧ na; nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɛ tɛ gun, mɛ beka ɓi waya-a na.

Bíí tɛ gɔn ndai kɔ-mɛ nɛ yí-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka nyɔŋ kpoo-aa na. Wa tɛ ɓar tuifuu kɔ-mɛ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa beka ba a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ na. Wa tɛ ha̧ o sami kɔ-mɛ ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak mɛ beka bo na.
Ŋma dukbíí tɛ kai o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a; yí-mɛ tɛ mbɔi tɛ zɔka mɔ, pɛm nɛ pia ɗoŋ kɔ-wa.
Ŋma dukbíí nɛ mɛ iŋ na tɛ nyɔŋ o nyɔnɔ in o mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ; mɛ tɛ duk nɛ bíí nɛ wa ɔr kai nɛ mɔ er-a, in wi-bɔnɛ.
Dawa tɛ de zu-mɛ sɛn tɛ bɔnɛ nɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk.
GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ gba kore nɛ beka kaɗi na zugur-mɛ in ku-mɛ, kore tɛ ya tɛ-mɛ, tɛ naŋ-mɛ hɔ zu-mɛ.
«GASA WAN tɛ tom'nɛ́ in wannu n’ɛnɛ baa e zu'nɛ́ nɛnɛ sitɛ ŋma tugun bíí n’ɛnɛ iŋ so in o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ gasi nɛ o ŋma sɔ̧: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o sɛka-te in o sɛka-ta.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kifi nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr, in mɔɔ-tɔ̧-tua-wen ko o dukbíí; wa tɛ mam'nɛ́ fara lɛŋ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba'nɛ́ si sɛnɛ.
«Ɛnɛ tɛ gun nyɔnɔ nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ beka dɛm na, wen o gba-dɔya tɛ nyɔŋ yinɛ lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ gun o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɛnɛ tɛ de zao-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ na in ɛnɛ beka ɓi waya-a na, wen dɔk tɛ nyɔŋ yinɛ lɛŋ.
O te-nɔ̧́ tɛ dɔk sɛn nù k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ na, wen o waya-a tɛ ai a nù.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ko o be-wiwii in o be-okoo, ɓɛɛ wa beka ya in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na, wen bíí tɛ kai wa yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
O gba-dɔya tɛ dor te in nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ e nɛ kɔ‘i.
«Gɛnɛ nɛ tɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ kpa nɛ́ gásì, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ duk si ɗoŋ.
A̧ tɛ gbak mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbak ha̧ a̧ na. A̧ tɛ duk zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yaa k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔɔ-aa.
«O fom nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kum lɛŋ, wen n’ɛnɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kasi nɛ o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ zu'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ hee mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in mɔɔ-kifi ga ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ so dee tom ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tortɛ in nɛ gasa desee ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ duk so nɛnɛ tɛ bɔtɛ na ga,

ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ tom ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tom pi̧ zu'nɛ́. Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ-wɔ in wɔ-yì, ɛnɛ tɛ ya nɛ mgbii, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ ɓan'nɛ. GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ kpáŋá-boi ger'nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ kum'nɛ́ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ tom ŋma tugun bíí nɛ bu̧i hee zua ga, nɛ mgbii-zan mɛ, nɛ mɛ iŋ nú kɔ-wa na, pii zu'nɛ́.
Nɛ́ ŋma ŋga tugun bíí de saka-yí nɛ tu̧ tɛ sɔkawi na, in nɛ de ko ha̧ obem na.

Tugun bíí‘i tɛ nyɔŋ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ kum nɛnɛ lɛŋ. Wa beka e alkamaari k’ɛ́nɛ́, mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in nɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o nana-ndai in o nana-sami k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ gbɛ‘nɛ́.
Wa tɛ kɛr o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ o gasa garo n’ɛnɛ e nɛ ta'nɛ‘i tɛ gbin a nù. Wa tɛ kɛr ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ sɛn tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Zaŋ bɔnɛ in ɗaŋsee nɛ wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ e'nɛ́ sɛnɛ‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o mɔ nɛ gboo nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mur-tɛ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o be-wiwii in o be-okoo nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Wi nɛ duk so mgbara'nɛ́ hee de bíí ga, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ wi-bɔtɛ, tɛ zɔk o nya kɔ‘i, kóò kɔ‘i in o bem kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗaŋ yí,
wen ká a̧ tɛɛ ha̧ ŋma mur-tɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa tɛ gbɛ nyɔŋ lɛŋ ha̧ ŋma bíí. Mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛr nɛ o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ pi̧ nɛ ŋga bɔnɛ zu'nɛ́.
Okoo tɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ duk so hee de okoo ga, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ ko-bɔtɛ, wan nɛ fuunu ba so naŋ-a na, tɛ zɔk wíì n'aa hɛr so nɔ yí-see-aa in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a,
mɔ nɛ gboo nɛ sara-ku-a, tɛ zɔk a̧ nɛ ɗaŋ yí. Ŋgimbi nɛ nyɔŋmɔ tɛ ɓan nɛnɛ, a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ wa nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧. Mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛr nɛ o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́, pi̧ nɛ ŋga bɔnɛ zu'nɛ́.
«K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea nɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata lɛŋ de nɛ tom, yu nɛ gasa hura-nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
GASA WAN tɛ tom o ŋga da̧i̧ in o ŋga-zɛɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ beka kaɗi na pi̧ zu'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́.
A̧ tɛ tom o zɛɛ-geŋa lɛŋ nɛ dee so kíì pi̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ sɛn nú Egiptɛ pi̧ zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa ndaɗa ɗoŋ‘nɛ́.
Kóó o ŋma ŋga-zɛɛ lɛŋ in o da̧i̧ lɛŋ nɛ‘i yɔr zaŋ kalata heembea’ɛ na mbɛt, GASA WAN tɛ tom wa pi̧ zu'nɛ́ gbɛ nɛ ɛnɛ yinɛ.
Ɛnɛ dɔka so hee sɔra ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ, wen ɛnɛ zii so wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Nɛ́ kpɔk desee nɛ GASA WAN kpaa so de nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ de-a dɔk nɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ tɛ kpa de nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kum, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ yu tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ ye sɛnɛ mɛ ba'i.
«GASA WAN tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ dam mgbara o dukbíí zu nù lɛŋ. Sɛn hi̧i̧, ɛnɛ tɛ gasi nɛ́ o ŋma sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ iŋ so na, in o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ iŋ so na: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o sɛka-te in o sɛka-ta.
Mgbara o tugun bíí nɔ‘i, ɛnɛ beka ya nɛ de-a na, in ɛnɛ beka kpa fara-duk na. GASA WAN tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ta nɛ́ mɔ, ha̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ gbin; mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka bo ɓɔna.
Ɛnɛ beka iŋ zu duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna; tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ nak zɛ nɛ wese. Ŋma mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù beka bo ɓɔna.
Mɛ tutuyɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Mɔ tɛ ga̧ mɛ gese ge?› Ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e: ‹Mɔ tɛ sa̧ mɛ gese ge?› Wen ɗɛɗɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ gɔn tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk.

GASA WAN tɛ ba'nɛ́ sinɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ kombon si sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ, sitɛ nù n'am baa tɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, ɛnɛ beka zɔk ɓɔna. Sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɗɔr tɛ‘nɛ́ ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ bara, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ hi̧fi'nɛ́ beka bo na.»
Gba̧a̧-wen
Moisɛ saa o be
Bo nɛ ɛnɛ zɔka o gasa bɔnɛ, o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ n'aa dea nɛ yí‘nɛ́ na nde?
Ɓɛɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ, GASA WAN ha̧ taamɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ nɛ mgbara mɔ‘i na; a̧ ha̧ yí h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɔk nɛ mgbák mɔ‘i na, in zer h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zii nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ na mbɛt.
Tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar, mi mgbɔɔ‘nɛ́ yar nɛ ŋga-gbárà, laa a̧k tɛ‘nɛ́ na, ndárà war naŋ‘nɛ́ na mbɛt.
Bó nɛ́ brɛt ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋa na, bó nɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɛ́nɛ́ nɔɔ na: GASA WAN zɔka'nɛ́ nɛ de-a wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ‘e a̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ hɔɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓɛɛ Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ in Og, wannu Basaŋ wee ti ɛɛ tɛnɛ mɛ tɛɛ bi ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛɛ a̧ bìí wa;
ɛɛ baa nù kɔ-wa ha̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Rubɛn, in o bezaŋ Gad in ha̧ reeta zuduk ko Manase nɛ mɔɔ-oi.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kasi o wen nɔɔ-tɔk’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kai wa de nɛ tom ha̧ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de lɛŋ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.»
«Ɛnɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ yor ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, o wan k’ɛ́nɛ́, o zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́, o gasawi k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kapita k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ o be
o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o gɛnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́ kɔ̧ gbagari k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen kia gua, kóó wen ɗuu yi h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ a̧a̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ mɛ ye zaŋ
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ e'nɛ́ hee dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ ga in ha̧ a̧ nɛ tɛ-a mɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nɛ nú-a h’ɛ́nɛ́ in hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kana so mɔ sɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in Jakob ga.
n’ɛnɛ kana mɔ kpɛk nɛnɛ‘i bo in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓɛɛ na,
ɓɛɛ in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ yor hɛ̧ɛ̧ sɔsɔɔ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ in o wi nɛ bo mgbara yɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ sɔsɔɔ na mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ iŋa yaa-a k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ yaa so sɛn Egiptɛ mbɛt, in o dukbíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ n’ɛnɛ ɓira nɛ mgbara wa yak nɛnɛ.
«Ɛnɛ zɔka o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa in o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ kɔ-wa: mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛka-te, sɛka-ta, bu-mbɔi in lɔr mbɛt.
Ká ŋma wiwii, kóó ŋma okoo, kóó ŋma nú-gara, kóó ŋma dukbíí zik ɗoŋ e ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gasi o gee sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na; ká ŋma kunin-te-ma̧a̧da, kóó ŋma paŋ te dúk mgbara'nɛ́ na.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ zia wen
GASA WAN beka e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ na. Nyimsea ko GASA WAN in gɔya kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kur zu wi’ɛi. Ɗaŋ yoŋgo nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata’ɛ lɛŋ tɛ tik zu a̧, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ bi nin-a ɗɔɔ yiwese yinɛ.
GASA WAN tɛ e a̧ nɛtɛ mgbara zuduk o be
«Mɔ nɛ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ, in o gɛnɛ nɛ tɛ tɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a nù tɛ tɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ zɔk nɛ o da̧i̧ tɛ nù'ɛ in o zɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ pi̧ zu o bíí nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
‹Nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ géé baraadu, tɔŋ in wee. Nyɔnɔ in te bo na; ŋma te hɔ na hee sɛn Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr, sɛn Adma in sɛn Seboyim mbɛt nɛ GASA WAN kifa so gu nù wen nyimsea in ŋga-see kɔ‘i’ɛ ga,›
ɓɛɛ o dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ ai nú‘e: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN dee ŋgamɔ hegɔ in nu’ɛ ge? Wen ge sa gasa tu̧u̧-see hegɔ kura ge?›
O bíí tɛ kifi nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Nɛ́ wen nɛ wa ee
Wa nɛɛ de tom ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa gasi wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ wa iŋ so na in nɛ̀ GASA WAN usi so ha̧ wa na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa see GASA WAN ɗaŋ zu nu’ɛ, ɓɛɛ sa a̧ fo ɗaŋ yoŋgo nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ lɛŋ pi̧ zu a̧.
GASA WAN ndaka wa tɛ nù kɔ-wa yinɛ tɛ ɗaŋsee, ŋga-see in gasa tu̧u̧-see kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ a wa tɛ ŋma nù hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk sɔsɔɔ ga.›
«Mɔ nɛ duk nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧, nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ hu̧si na, nɛ k’ɛɛ in o bem k’ɛɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de wa nɛ tom.»
«Ŋgimbi nɛ de yoŋgo in fom n'am ee ti'nɛ́ tɛ hɔ zu'nɛ́ kaɗi, ɛnɛ tɛ ta mɔ zu-a kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ mgbara o tugun bíí fara nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ si sɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ zii tiger-a, ɛnɛ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ in nɛ̀ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am usi h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpai sɔnti'nɛ́, a̧ tɛ usi
Kóó wa kaia so nɛ ɛnɛ si nduti nù mɛ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔi̧ kana'nɛ́ nɛ hi̧i̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ; a̧ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba'nɛ́ hi̧i̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ piinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn tɛ nù nɛ o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́ baa so; nù‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́. A̧ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ de-a in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk gan o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpai taamɔ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ in nɛ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fo o fom nɔ‘i lɛŋ pi̧ zu o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ zii tiger GASA WAN woyo; ɛnɛ tɛ kai o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ tom.

GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa demɔ sɛn tɛ tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. A̧ tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk, ha̧ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɛɓi in ha̧ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɛm woyo. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kii de duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ woyo hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ in o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga,
wen n’ɛnɛ tɛ zii tiger-a, kasi nɛ o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata heembea’ɛ, in wen n’ɛnɛ pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ a̧, nɛ see'nɛ́ in nɛ kiitɛ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ.»
«Nɛ mbetɛ, heembea n'am ha̧‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ ŋgai gan ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ na; ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ kasi a̧.
Bo nɛ heembea'i duk yiwese mɛ kà de ká‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e: ‹Nɛ́ o'o tɛ daŋ si yiwese mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba a piinɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ zíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ dèé nɛ tom o nde›, na.
Heembea'i bó nɛ́ kur gba-tɔp mɛ kà‘i dé ká‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e: ‹Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ku gba-tɔp si kur mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́ k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ zíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ bàà de nɛ tom o nde›, na mbɛt.
Nɛ mbetɛ, wen ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ mgbák katɛ‘nɛ́; wen'i a̧a̧ kɔ̧ nú‘nɛ́ in kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba de nɛ tom.»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, mi ee duka-kpasa in bɔtɛ, fio in bɔnɛ ti'nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ,

mi ha̧a̧ nú‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kɔ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀ tɛ o yuwar kɔ̧-a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea, o geŋa in o yuwar duka-a kɔ̧-a̧. Ɓɛɛ hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya kpasa, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ dɔk mbɛt, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́ tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ ye sɛnɛ mɛ ba'i.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ e ha̧ a̧, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ŋgazu in a̧, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gasi o ŋma sɔ̧ de nɛ tom ha̧ wa,
mi tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ kum lɛŋ; zɛ‘nɛ́ beka dɔk zu nù n’ɛnɛ ye sɛnɛ mɛ ba nɛ kur Jurdɛn'i na.
«Nù in yiwese nɛ sedaako kɔ‘m sɔsɔɔ. Mi ee duka-kpasa in fio, sɛka de yoŋgo in fom ti'nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók nɛ́ duka-kpasa h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́;

ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɔ̧ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, zii nɛ̀ tiger-a, ndaɗi nɛnɛ in a̧. Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ya nɛnɛ kpasa, ɓɛɛ zɛ‘nɛ́ dɔka nɛnɛ tɛ nù nɛ GASA WAN kana so mɔ ha̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham, Izak in Jakob.»
Moisɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ o be
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Sɔsɔɔ, mi a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ 120, mi nyɛm mɛ de tom kɔ‘m nɛ de-a ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ beka ku Jurdɛn nɛ duk’ɛ na.›
Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ kum o tugun bíí nɔ‘i lɛŋ yinɛ ti'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndaka wa. Nɛ́ Josue a̧ tɛ duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
GASA WAN tɛ de mɔ in o tugun bíí nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ in Sihɔŋ ba nɛ Og, o wannu ko o be Amɔr in nù kɔ-wa ga. A̧ kuma wa yinɛ.
GASA WAN tɛ e wa kɔ̧ er'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de mɔ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór nɛ nɔa-a, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì na, ká tɛ‘nɛ́ nak ti wa na, wen nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ nɛ nɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́; a̧ beka ɗai er tɛ‘nɛ́ na, a̧ beka e'nɛ́ duk na mbɛt.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ saa Josue e ti o be
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ duk ti ha̧ mɛ, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ duk in mɛɛ. A̧ beka ɗai er tɛ-mɛ na, a̧ beka e mɛ duk na mbɛt. Ká mɛ́ de kíì na in ká mɛ́ e ha̧ tɛ-mɛ mɛ gbin na mbɛt.»
Moisɛ yɔra heembea’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ ya nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, nɛ tui kɔ-wa nɛ
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r heembea’ɛ tɛ kaɗa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ, ŋgimbi gbɛɛ nyamandoi ha̧ ŋmaa, tɛ gbaŋa tua-laa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ

Ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ o bíí lɛŋ, o wiwii, o okoo, o obem, o gɛnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ saaye k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wa mɛ zii ha̧ wa mɛ yambii heembea'i, ha̧ wa mɛ yu kíí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, in ha̧ wa mɛ kasi o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ nɛ iŋ kɔ-wa o heembea nɔ‘i na tɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wese lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ ya kpasa tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba nɛ kur Jurdɛn.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Ŋgimbi fio kɔ-mɛ hɛɗa kaɗi. Mɛ̀ sá Josue, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii kɔ̧
GASA WAN usa tɛ kɔ̧
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ: «Zɔk, mɛ hɛɗa mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ-mɛ kaɗi. Dukbíí'ɛ tɛ ye tɛ gasa o sɔ̧ ko o gɔni-duk tɛ nù nɛ wa tɛ ba'i; wa tɛ e'm duk, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɗaŋ

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wese'i a̧ see-am tɛ ɗaŋ in wa; mi tɛ e wa duk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ hu̧si yí‘m nɛ wa. O bíí tɛ kum wa, o ŋgamɔ in o bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu wa, ɓɛɛ wese'i wa tɛ tɔ̧: ‹Ŋgamɔ nɛ kpaa ɛɛ'ɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ bo mgbara yɛ ɓɔna gɔ.›
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, wese'i mi tɛ hu̧si kànà kɔ‘m nɛ yí‘m nɛ̀ wa, wen zu ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa dea tɛ zika tɛ-wa sitɛ o ŋma sɔ̧.
«Kinii, mɛ̀ yɔ́r gima’ɛ mɛ̀ úsí ha̧ o be

Nɛ mbetɛ, mi tɛ mgbɔ dukbíí'ɛ nɛnɛ tɛ nù n'am kana mɔ ha̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa; mɛ̀ nɛ́ nù nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ. Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ-wa sur, wa tɛ ŋmaŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zik tɛ-wa sitɛ o ŋma sɔ̧ mɛ de tom ha̧ wa; wa tɛ e'm tɛ geemɔ, wa tɛ ɗaŋ

Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o ŋgamɔ in o bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu wa kaɗi, gima’ɛ tɛ usi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-sedaako, wen tɛ o bezaŋ-wa beka bi ɗoŋ wee ɗoŋ-aa na. Nɛ mbetɛ, mi iŋa mɔ nɛ wa e zu-a sɔsɔɔ nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ mgbɔ wa ye nɛ nù n'am kana mɔ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa.»
Wese'i Moisɛ yɔra gima'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ yambii ha̧ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue bem ko Nun: «Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi in mɛ̀ yór nɛ nɔa-a, wen nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ tɛ mgbɔ o be
Ɗoŋ nɛ Moisɛ yɔra o gba̧a̧-wen tɛ heembea'i lɛŋ zaŋ kalata kaɗi,
a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii nɛ tui
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá kalata heembea’ɛ e sɛn ká̧
Wen kɔ‘m, mi iŋa ɗaŋ taamɔ in ŋgazu k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ de ŋgazu in GASA WAN ŋgimbi n'am tɛ fe na’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ fio kɔ‘m ɛnɛ tɛ de hee ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o gasawi zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o kapita k’ɛ́nɛ́ a katɛ‘m. Mi tɛ tɔ̧ o wen nɔ'ɔ zer-wa, ɓɛɛ o wi-sedaako kɔ‘m tɛ duk nɛ́ yiwese in nù.

Mi iŋa'e, ɗoŋ fio kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ tɛ tik tɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ee yuwar n'am usa h’ɛ́nɛ́ duk. Ɗoŋ-aa beka nyɛi̧ na, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ tika zu'nɛ́ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de yí GASA WAN in o ɗaŋ tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ tu̧ see-aa.»
Moisɛ wee ɗoŋ gba̧a̧-wen tɛ gima’ɛ lɛŋ zer o be
Yiwese, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ wen,
nù, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧‘i!
O usamɔ kɔ‘m a̧ pɛsi hee kórò ga,
wen kɔ‘m a̧ ai hee mbɛŋ ga,
hee gasa kórò zu nuŋui ga,
hee dɔmbɔrɔ tɛ zɔ̧ ga.
Mi tɛ zɔn nin GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ ndé Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ɔ gasa.
A̧ nɛ́ kam-ta, deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dee nyɛmna,
o yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ tana;
a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ yor ɗoŋ
Gɔɔmɔ bo sɛn tɛ-a na,
a̧ nɛ́ de-wi in a̧ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
War kɔ̧-a̧, wa nɛ́ wi-de-mɔɔ-gɔŋ-zaŋ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa mbo zu ha̧ a̧ na ga,
wa bó nɛ́ bem kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna,
wa nɛ́ dukbíí-de-ŋgamɔ nɛ ta mɔ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in GASA WAN a̧‘i ndé,
o wi-dawa in o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ na nɔ'ɔ!
A̧ bó nɛ́ dáà nɛ ha̧a̧ duka-kpasa h’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?
Bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi'nɛ́ e fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o kuti wese,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ sitɛ o pɛ nɛ yaka,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r tugun'nɛ́;
kóó o ndé a̧ ak dáà kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara-a ha̧ a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák o sɔkawi k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɓa ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
ha̧a̧ so nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ zuduk bíí lɛŋ,
ŋgimbi n'aa kɛ̧ɛ̧ so nɛ mgbara nù,
a̧ ee o zuduk bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o ŋma sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ war mɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ hoka mɛ̀ nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ Jakob nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ kpaa dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà fara hiɗi mɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀,
a̧ zɔka wa nɛ de-a, a̧ usa mɔ ha̧ wa.
A̧ zɔka wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk nɛ tú̧-yí-wí ga.
A̧ duk hee zúa nɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ o bem kɔ‘i ga,
a̧ bu̧i nɛ zu wa nyar nɛ ɓaa-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kaia o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a zu ɓaa-a.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ duk ti ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i,
ŋma gɔni sɔ̧ hɔ katɛ a̧ na.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba wa e nɛ o gasawi zu nù
ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ o nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ gɔrɔ kɔ̧ ta;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ waya-te-nɔ̧́ mɛ gbɛ̧ zu sɔkɔr-ta.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ nɔ̧́ ndai in yibere sami ha̧ wa,
gu nɛ o ŋmaŋa
in o vala gbadua ká bá nɛ̀ de fuu alkamaari;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ de yí-dɔ̧ɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ
a̧ ŋmaŋa, a̧ dita, a̧ ndota.
A̧ ee Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ dèé a̧ duk,
a̧ pi̧i̧ búù zu Kam-ta kɔ̧-a̧, mɔɔ-kpas'aa.
Wa baa o gɔni sɔ̧ we nɛ GASA WAN,
ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dea tu̧u̧ see-aa.
Wa ɗafa nɛ́ o ɗaŋ-sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ kpasa Sɔ̧ na;
wa ɗafa o gɔni sɔ̧ nɛ wa iŋ so na nɛ̀ gboo nɛ̀ mbe-a,
nɛ̀ o dáà kɔ-wa yu so kíí-wa na.
«Kam-ta nɛ̀ koo'nɛ́, ɛnɛ ee a̧ tɛ geemɔ,
tɛ‘nɛ́ bìí ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ dee'nɛ́ e zu nù.»
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ GASA WAN zɔka dee ha̧ see-aa mɛ nyim,
o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a tu̧u̧ see-aa.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi tɛ ba yí‘m hu̧si nɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zɔk duka-a kɔ-wa siti.
Wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma dukbíí nɛ mbo zu na,
wa nɛ o ŋma o bem nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ e nɛ ta na.
Wa baa o geemɔ nɛ bó nɛ́ kpasa Sɔ̧ na we nɛ‘m;
wa tu̧u̧ see-am nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ ba ŋma mɔ nɛ bó nɛ́ kpasa zuduk bíí na we nɛ wa mbɛt;
mi tɛ tu̧ see-wa nɛ̀ ŋma zuduk bíí nɛ̀ iŋ mgbara mɔ na.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ŋma wee nyɛka kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-am,
wee'i dɔɔ mɔ hɔ nduti fara ko o fio mɛ.
Wee'i dɔɔ nù gu nɛ o nyɔnɔ lɛŋ,
a̧ dɔɔ ká̧ naŋ kaya bíí wee gbuɗuk.
Mi tɛ mɔi̧ bɔnɛ dun zu wa,
mi tɛ a o góò kɔ‘m sitɛ wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ kaɓa tɛ ziɓi wa,
nɛ̀ kórò tɛ mbaŋ a zu wa,
nɛ̀ ma̧a̧da̧ kɔ‘m tɛ ye tɛ-wa,
mi tɛ tom o gba̧a̧-nin saɗi in ma̧a̧da̧
ko o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nù pi̧ zu wa.
Nɛ war zan, gba-paa tɛ kum o bem kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ war kɔ̧ tua, bele tɛ zar bíí.
Be-ŋgaiwi tɛ zɔk kpɔk bɔnɛ in be-zɔŋa,
be-zɔɗi tɛ fe kpɔk fio in wi nɛ mbui a̧a̧ zu.»
«Mi tɛɛ gbin wa nduku-nduku,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ de so ha̧ tɛ bíí mɛ bi ɗoŋ wa,
ɓɛɛ mi ta mɔ‘e, o wisɛn tɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ,
ɔr nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e,
nɛ́ wi a'i gana wa,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ GASA WAN na.
«Mɛ nɛ ŋma zuduk bíí nɛ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa yor na,
wa iŋ mɔ na.
Wa a̧ bó só nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ mgbara mɔ‘i;
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ mgbara duka-a kɔ-wa siti.
Hee ge bíí kpɔk tɛ ndak bíí booro,
sɛka bíí yiitoo pɛsa bíí booro-ɓu,
kà bó nɛ́ Kam-ta ko o bíí nɔ‘i a ɗɔɔ wa na,
kà bó nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ foo wa pi̧ er wisɛn kɔ-wa na ge nde?
«Wen kam-ta ko wisɛn k’ɛɛ bo hee Kam-ta k’ɛɛ ga na;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɛ-wa iŋa hegɔ.
Kpar nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛ́ nɛ̀ kpɛɛfɔ Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr;
waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa a̧a̧ nɛ ma̧a̧da̧,
sikila-a paŋ paŋ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ́ ma̧a̧da̧-ndiɓa,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋga ma̧a̧da̧-firi.
«Mɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN ɗafa é nɛ́ mɔ‘i;
mɔ n'am kasi duk nɛnɛ a̧‘i.
Kinii nɛ́ mi a̧ tɛ kifi er
in nɛ́ mi a̧ tɛ gbo nyamandoi,
ŋgimbi nɛ naŋ-wa tɛ yɔ kaya,
wen wese bɔnɛ kɔ-wa hɛɗa kaɗi,
mɔ nɛ ɗafa wen wa nyɛi̧ ɓɔna.»
GASA WAN tɛ gɔn kita zu dukbíí kɔ‘i,
a̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ zɔk'e ŋgai kɔ-wa kaɗa kaɗi,
nɛ̀ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara bara in gee bíí beka bo ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ tɔ̧: «O sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a̧a̧ dee nde?
Kam-ta nɛ̀ wa hu̧si so ɗoŋ-aa a̧a̧ dee?
O wi nɛ nyɔŋ so nɔ̧́-kpoo ɗafi o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i,
nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧-zɛzɛ a̧a̧ dee?
Wa à̧ kúr wa à̧ gbák'nɛ́,
wa à̧ kíí fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ̀k:
Nɛ́ mi, kànà nɛ́ mi kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
ŋma sɔ̧ bo katɛ‘m na;
nɛ́ mi a̧ de ha̧ bíí mɛ fe,
nɛ́ mi a̧ de ha̧ bíí mɛ duk kpasa mbɛt;
kà‘m ɗáŋ mɔ, ɓɛɛ mi a̧ ɗafi mɔ‘i.
Bíí kpɔk nyɛm mɛ kpasi ŋma bíí er-am na.
Kà‘m nyɛ́í̧ er-am si yiwese,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧a̧: ‹Mi duk kpasa kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Kà‘m bɛ́ŋ nú toka gba-paa kɔ‘m,
kà‘m bá er-am nɛ ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ mi kifa er-ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wisɛn kɔ‘m;
mi tɛ kifi er ha̧ o wi-sɛn-am.
Gba-paa kɔ‘m be tɛ̀ɛ́ ye tɛ mur-tɛ-wa,
ɓɛɛ o góò kɔ‘m tɛ kpe nɛ̀ tɔk o wɔr in o bara-biro,
gu nɛ o gasa wi-biro kɔ-wa.› »
O tugun bíí, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r er zu dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧,
wen a̧ tɛ kifi er oi tɔk-tɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ kifi er ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ko o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ baa nù kɔ̧-a̧ e ŋgɔn.
Moisɛ in Josue bem ko Nun tɛɛ we ɗoŋ gba̧a̧ gima'i, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ zii.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɔ‘i ha̧ o be
a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o wen lɛŋ n'am de nɛ sedaako h’ɛ́nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ e kɔ̧ see'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba o wen nɔ‘i de nɛ tom.
Bó nɛ́ géé wen a̧‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na; wen'i nɛ́ duka-kpasa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kpɔk wen'i a̧ tɛ de ha̧ zɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ dɔk sɛn tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba nɛ kur Jurdɛn.»
Kpɔk kale wese'i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
«Mɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya Abarim, zu kaya Nɛbo nɛ duk nú Mɔab, nɛ̀ zɔk ŋmaa in Jeriko, a̧ mɛ̀ zɔ́k nú Kanaŋ n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ fé zu kaya nɛ mɛ tɛ daŋ‘i, mɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ o nam kɔ-mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nya-mɛ Arɔŋ fee nɛnɛ zu kaya Ɔr, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ si nɛnɛ ɗoŋ o nam kɔ̧-a̧ ga,
wen ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu in am sɛn ti o be
Mɛ tɛ zɔk nù‘i ti mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka ye tɛ nù n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
De yoŋgo nɛ Moisɛ, bíí ko Sɔ̧ toka zu o be
GASA WAN tɛa nɛ Sinai;
a̧ daŋa tɛnɛ nɛ ndaa-zan nɛ Edɔm.
A̧ duka zu kaya Paraŋ mɛ tok nɛnɛ tɛnɛ,
a̧ tɛɛ nɛ Kadɛs pii Mɛriba,
nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ pii ká̧ naŋ kaya.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ o zuduk be
o sa̧a̧ bíí lɛŋ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er'nɛ́,
wa guu nù sɛn ti'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa zii wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Moisɛ yɔra heembea’ɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́
nɛ mɔɔ-oi ko o bem ko Jakob.
ŋgimbi nɛ o gasawi ko dukbíí
mɔi̧a nɛnɛ kpɔk in o dùk be
Rubɛn a̧ duk kpasa, ká a̧ fe na,
ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dɔk na'i a̧ duk siti.
Ɓɛɛ war ko Juda n'aa tɔ̧a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tiger Juda,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ tɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ a̧ ŋgai nɛ te-er-a,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ-aa sɛn ti o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Levii nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«GASA WAN, mɔɔ-tan-mɔ
dúk nɛ ko wi nɛ mbo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́,
n’ɛnɛ wee so sɛn Masa,
in tɛ kpɛri nɛ dee so sɛn Mɛriba.
Levii tɔ̧a̧ nde, wi zɔk dáà kɔ‘i in nàà kɔ‘i na,
a̧ bɛ̧ɛ̧ iŋa o nya-a̧ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt.
O bezaŋ Levii kasa nɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́
in
Wa usi nɛ o yuwar duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ Jakob,
in heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧
Wa dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wa ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ zu fara-ɗafi'nɛ.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu wa
ha̧ wa mɛ kpa mbe ŋgai siti;
tom kɔ-wa a̧ de tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín gba̧a̧-tɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wa mɛ kur ti wa woyo ɓɔna.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Bɛnjamin nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ́ nɛ́ wi nɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧a̧ nyɛmna;
a̧ ɔm nɛ tɛ-a,
e nɛ ta nɛ wi-pɛm-a nɛ duk in a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Jozɛf nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«GASA WAN a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu nù kɔ̧-a̧.
Kórò mɛ yiwese, mbɛŋ in yì mɛ
de waya-mɔ ko wese,
in demɔ nɛ hɔ tɛ mbe yí-zɛ lɛŋ,
o de ha̧a̧mɔ ko o kaya nɛ duk ɓeemɛ,
in o de ha̧a̧mɔ ko o zu-tɔ̧́ nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,
war demɔ lɛŋ nɛ duk tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧,
in
mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ a̧ zir duk nɛ́ zu Jozɛf,
wi nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka e nɛtɛ mgbara o nya-a̧.
A̧ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai hee kuti be wiwii-ndai kɔ̧-a̧ ga,
o zak-a nɛ́ o zak nam;
a̧ tɛ gbɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ zak-a
hɔ sɛn nduti nù war kpɔk.
O be gii ko Efraim nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i,
o be gii ko Manase nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Zabulɔŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Zabulɔŋ, mɛ̀ kpá desee tɛ o yari kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Isakar,
mɛ̀ kpá desee kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ.
Wa sa nɛ o bíí si zu kaya
mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ nɛ yuwar-a;
wa kpaa nɛ demɔ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp
in o demɔ nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧ ɗɔɔ nyɛmɛ.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Gad nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«De yoŋgo tɛ duk zu wi nɛ tɛ ndak Gad;
a̧ baa fara hee dila fara a̧k ɓaa saɗi,
kóó zu saɗi kɔ‘i ga.
A̧ baa o kuti de nù er o wan e nɛ war nù kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ yee poo o gasawi.
A̧ dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗafamɔ
hee gasawi zu o wi-biro ko GASA WAN zu o be
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Dan nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Dan nɛ ŋma be dila nɛ kpíɗí tɛnɛ nɛ Basaŋ.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Nɛftalii nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Nɛftalii a̧a̧ nɛ̀ de sɔnti nyɛmna,
a̧ duna nɛ de yoŋgo ko GASA WAN;
a̧ a̧ bá kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yee-wese in ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.»
Mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ zu Asɛr nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Asɛr a̧ dúk nɛ wi nɛ kpaa de yoŋgo mgbara wa lɛŋ,
a̧ a̧ kpá demɔ mgbara o nya-a̧
in a̧ a̧ pí̧ naŋ-a ɗɔɔ nɔ.
Mɔɔ-man-nú tua kɔ-mɛ a̧ dúk nɛ boi in ndɛrɛ,
mɛ̀ dúk nɛ oi ŋgai kɔ-mɛ hɔ wese fio kɔ-mɛ.
A̧ ŋgan nɛ mɔ nɛ yiwese nɛ mgbara o tura-zan
tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak nɛ mɛ nɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧.
Sɔ̧ duka so kànà nɛ́ fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
er-a nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo nɛ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ-mɛ.
A̧ ndaka o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ sɛn ti mɛ ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧:
‹Mɛ̀ kúm wa lɛŋ!›
kpút-kpút ko Jakob fok ɛ̀nɛ̀
sitɛ nù nɛ alkamaari in mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ yiwese hɔ kórò hɔɔ hi̧i̧.
Mɛ́, nɛ̀ GASA WAN gbak’ɛ,
nɛ́ o'o tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in mɛɛ o?
A̧ nɛ ŋgee-gui-mɔ kɔ-mɛ;
gba-paa-de-ŋgai kɔ-mɛ nɛ a̧.
O wisɛn kɔ-mɛ tɛ nasi mɛ takaɗi,
mɛ tɛ i̧si̧ kànà nɛ kusi kɔ-wa nɛ naŋ-mɛ.»
Moisɛ daŋa nɛ bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab si zu kaya Nɛbo, zu kaya Pisga tan nɛ Jeriko, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN de ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk nù lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Galad hɔ Dan,
Nɛftalii, nù ko Efraim in Manase, nù ko Juda lɛŋ hɔ ká̧ gba-tɔp si yee-wese,
Nɛgɛb in kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Jurdɛn, ɗɔŋgɔ Jeriko, ye-ndɛŋgɛ, hɔ nɛnɛ Sɔar.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nù n'am kana so mɔ nde, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ Abraham, Izak in Jakob, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Mi usa a̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ zɔk nɛ yí-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka ye sɛnɛ na.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN fea hi̧i̧ sɛn nú Mɔab hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gun a̧ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ nù Mɔab tan nɛ Bɛt-Pɛɔr. Ŋma bíí iŋ oi pɛsi kɔ̧-a̧ na hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Moisɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa fee nɛnɛ; yí-a ɗaŋ na, in ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗi na mbɛt.
O be
Josue bem ko Nun a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nyɛmna, wen nɛ Moisɛ ee so er zu a̧. O be
Ŋma
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ GASA WAN toma so mɛ de o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn nú Egiptɛ ti wannu, in o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧, in ti o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ Moisɛ‘i a̧ baa de so mɔ nɛ ŋgai de nɛ o gasa mɔɔ-kíì nɛ yí o be
Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN fea, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Josue bem ko Nun, wi-gbak Moisɛ:
«Moisɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m fea; kinii mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ́ in o dukbíí nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú Jurdɛn h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ye nù n'am ha̧ ha̧ o be
Fara lɛŋ nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ yar sɛnɛ, mi ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga.
Nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ku̧ naŋ-a tɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ hɔ Libaŋ nɛ war ŋgɔn hɔ sɛn tɛ gasa nana-yì nɛ‘i sa'e Efrat kpa nɛ̀ nù ko o be Hit hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Gba-tɔp nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ war yee-wese.
Tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ duk kpasa, ŋma bíí kpɔk beka yor ti mɛ na; mi tɛ duk in mɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duka so nɛnɛ in Moisɛ ga. Mi beka e mɛ duk na, mi beka e gbaka mɛ duk na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ ŋgáí tɛ-mɛ in mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi wen nɛ́ mɛ'ɛ tɛ mgbɔ dukbíí'ɛ ye nɛ̀ nù nɛ tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa; nɛ́ nù‘i a̧‘m kana so mɔ ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa ndé, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa.

Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ nɔa-a, mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi; mɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ Heembea lɛŋ nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m yɔra ha̧ mɛ. Ká mɛ́ a̧r si war gale, kóó si war wiiko na, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa de sɔnti tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ de.
Wen nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea'i beka yu nú-mɛ na; mɛ̀ yámbí a̧ nɛ ɗɔɔ nú-mɛ, mɛ zɛ in mɛ wese wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ de mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ-aa lɛŋ; mɛ tɛ kpa de sɔnti, ɓɛɛ hegɔ, mɛ tɛ kpa mɔ nɛ mɛ kii.
Bó nɛ́ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ndé, mɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ nɔa-a in mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi na nde? Ká tɛ-mɛ nak na, ká kíì dé mɛ na, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk in mɛɛ fara lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ nɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi nɛ duk zu o bíí hee mɔ'ɔ ga:

«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ yár dam kɔ̧ gbagari, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbea ha̧ o bíí: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí o nyɔŋmɔ-yuwar, wen zaŋ zɛ taar, ɛnɛ tɛ ku Jurdɛn’ɛ wen baa nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ nù‘i mɛ duk nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.› »
Ɓɛɛ Josue tɔ̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad ká bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase:
«Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wen ko Moisɛ, wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN, nɛ̀ baa tɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́; a̧ ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
O okoo in o obem gu nɛ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ nù nɛ Moisɛ ha̧a̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kur Jurdɛn. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o ŋga wi-biro lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák ti ha̧ o nya'nɛ́ nɛ̀ o boi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen gbaka wa

hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, in ha̧ wa mɛ kpa nù nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa mbɛt, sɛk’ɛnɛ pia ɗoŋ tɛ nù nɛ̀ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kur Jurdɛn nɛ war daŋa-wese.»
Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú ha̧ Josue hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ, ɛɛ tɛ de, in fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tom yɛ si sɛnɛ, ɛɛ tɛ nɛ.
Ɛɛ tɛ mbo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ mboo so nɛ̀ zu ha̧ Moisɛ ga; ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka so nɛnɛ in Moisɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ tɛ de ŋgazu, nɛ̀ beka zii wen k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ beka mbo zu tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ na, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ nɔa-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi!»

Josue bem ko Nun toma wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ yiitoo nɛ Sitim si Jeriko nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ tɛ nù‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k Jeriko mbɛt.» O wi nɔ‘i yaka, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ zir kɔ̧ tua ko ŋma okoo-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu, nin-a nɛ Rahab.
O ŋma bíí nɛɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ wannu Jeriko'e: «O ŋma be
Wannu toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Rahab hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ fó o wi nɛ hɔɔ tɛ kɔ-mɛ‘i gbonɛ, wen wa tɛɛ mɛ kpe nɛ́ naŋ nù k’ɛɛ lɛŋ.»
Rahab hu̧sa̧ o wi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ o betom: «Nɛ mbetɛ, wa hɔɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ so fara nɛ wa tɛɛ nɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ŋgimbi kpee nú garo-ye, wa gboo yak, mi iŋ fara nɛ wa nɛɛ si sɛnɛ na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ wa nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kpa wa.»
(Rahab foo so kɔ‘i wa si zu tua, ɓɛɛ hu̧si wa ɗɔɔ o kan-fon
O bíí ko wannu ndaka ɗoŋ wa si war nú-horo Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wa kpe nú garo-ye ɗoŋ wa.
Nɛti ha̧ o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ mɛ ɔ nù, Rahab daŋa si zu tua nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa wa;
a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi iŋa ndé, GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ dee kíì pi̧ tɛ o bíí nù'ɛ, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa nak nak sɛn ti'nɛ́,
wen ɛɛ zia ndé, GASA WAN dee ha̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp mɛ ɔ̧si̧ ti'nɛ́ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gboo nɛnɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gbɛ Og in Sihɔŋ, o wannu ko o be Amɔr kur Jurdɛn ɓi mɛ.
Ɛɛ zia mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧ tɛ-ɛɛ gbin lɛŋ: kóó hiɗi o ndé gɔna ti'nɛ́ wen Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese in see zu nù mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kán mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ nin GASA WAN ndé, ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ nɛ de-a in o bíí kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ n'am dea in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ga. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋma mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ tɛ usi nɛ mbetɛ‘e,
ɛnɛ tɛ e dáà kɔ‘m in nàà kɔ‘m, o nya'm in o boko-nya'm kpasa in o bíí kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɛnɛ beka e ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ yɛ na.»

Ɓɛɛ wi nɔ‘i kifi nú ha̧ Rahab: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndaa nɔ̀ k’ɛɛ ha̧ ŋma bíí na, ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ in mɛɛ nɛ de-a in nɛ yuwar-a; ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ dee hegɔ na, Sɔ̧ a̧ gbɛ yɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Rahab zir wa nɛ nyak a nù nɛ woi-tua kɔ̧-a̧, wen tua kɔ̧-a̧ ndaɗa so ŋmaa in garo-ye.
Rahab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ yuwar si mgbara kaya, wen ká o bíí nɛ kii'nɛ́ tɛɛ kpa'nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧sí hi̧i̧ zɛ taar hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ pii sɛk’ɛnɛ baa yuwar mɛ si.»
O wi nɔ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Rahab: «Mɔ nɛ tɛ de ha̧ kanamɔ nɛ mɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kan’ɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ tɛ ye nɛnɛ tɛ nù'ɛ, mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Mɛ tɛ ba be gbɛ̧ gba̧a̧-pɛr’ɛ e sɛn woi-tua kɔ-mɛ fara nɛ mɛ zira nɛ̀ ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ in nàà kɔ-mɛ in o nya-mɛ lɛŋ pii kɔ̧ tua'i.
Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ gbó nɛ̀ kɔ̧ tua'i si zan, tɔk tɛ-a tɛ tik zu-a woyo, ɓɛɛ i̧i̧ bo nɛ wen k’ɛɛ ɓɔna. Ɓɛɛ kà er yɛ nɛ́ tama tɛ ŋma bíí nɛ duk in mɛɛ sɛn kɔ̧ tua'i, tɔk tɛ-a tɛ tik zu yɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndaa nɔ̀ k’ɛɛ ha̧ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ kanamɔ nɛ mɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kan'i tɛ tik nù géè.»
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ a̧ de nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i.» A̧ ee ha̧ wa mɛ yak, ɓɛɛ a̧ kun be gbɛ̧ gba̧a̧-pɛr tɛ woi-tua'i.
O wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ yaka si mgbara kaya; wa yaa hi̧i̧ zɛ taar hɔ wese nɛ o wi-ndak-ɗoŋ-wa sia. O wi nɛ ndaka so ɗoŋ wa kia so wa nɛ̀ yuwar takaɗi; wa kpa wa na.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i zir nɛ̀ zu kaya; wa kuu Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wa nɛɛ kpa Josue bem ko Nun; wa wee ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ mbetɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ lɛŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́; o bíí nù‘i lɛŋ ya nɛ naka-tɛ ti yɛ.»
Josue kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut in o be
Tɛ taar zɛ, o gasawi yara dam kɔ̧ gbagari.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dukbíí hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka
Ɓɛɛ mgbara'nɛ́ in kuɓa tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ kpɔk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ a̧ na, hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ yuwar n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba, wen ɛnɛ tɛ ɓir nɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛti hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.»
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dukbíí: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Sɔsɔɔ mi tɛ ku̧ naŋ dee gásì ha̧ mɛ ti o be
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Sɛn tɛ mɔ'ɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ ndé, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kpasa a̧a̧ mgbara'nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ndak o be Kanaŋ, o be Hit, o be Hiv, o be Periz, o be Girgas, o be Amɔr in o be Jebus yinɛ sɛn ti'nɛ́ nɛ mbetɛ.
nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔɔ wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ tɛ ku Jurdɛn nɛti h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók o wiwii ɓu-zua-yiitoo mgbara o duk be
Wen ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
O bíí gbina nɛ kɔ̧ gbagari wen nɛa-a mɛ ku Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
Ŋgimbi'i duka nɛ ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ Jurdɛn ha̧ nɛnɛ hɔ nú ŋgere yiitoo lɛŋ. Ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ tui

yì nɛ fok tɛnɛ nɛ ŋgɔn gɔna, ɓɛɛ duk kpɔk oi hee gba-zu ga nɛ nyɛi̧a-a, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Adam, ye nɛ duk ká̧ Sartaŋ mɛ; yì nɛ fok si ɗɔɔ tɔp Araba nɛ‘i sa'e gba-tɔp Tɔŋ kaɗa foka-a, ɓɛɛ o bíí ku Jurdɛn tan nɛ Jeriko.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
Ŋgimbi nɛ dukbíí lɛŋ kuu Jurdɛn kaɗi, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók bíí ɓu-zua-yiitoo mgbara o zuduk be
ha̧ wa mɛ kai ta ɓu-zua-yiitoo mgbák fara nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yora sɛnɛ yaknɛ si fara n’ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ.»
Josue saa o bíí nɔ‘i ɓu-zua-yiitoo n'aa hoka mgbara o be
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák ti ha̧
wen ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ́ ŋma mɔɔ-mbaŋ tɛ-wi; ŋma wese, o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ak mɔ‘e: ‹O ta nɔ'ɔ usi nɛ ge nde?›
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kifi nú ha̧ wa: ‹Yí Jurdɛn kɛ̧ɛ̧ so ti
O be
Josue nɛka o ŋma ta ɓu-zua-yiitoo zu ŋmaa woyo sɛn see Jurdɛn oi naŋ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔɔ
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔɔ
Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí lɛŋ kuu yì kaɗi, kuɓa ko GASA WAN yaka ti ha̧ o bíí ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
O bem ko Rubɛn in ko Gad ká bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase kuu yì ti o be
Nɛ́ bíí hee booro-ɓu-naar ga a̧ hɛra tɛ wen biro ti GASA WAN yak si bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko.
Wese'i, GASA WAN dee gásì ha̧ Josue nɛ yí o be
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Josue:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
Josue tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ ɗɔɔ Jurdɛn pii zan.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ gɔ
Duka nɛ kuti fio-zɛ tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu a̧ dukbíí daŋa nɛnɛ ɗɔɔ Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wa ba gbagari sɛn Gilgal ká̧ Jeriko nɛ war daŋa-wese.
Josue nɛka o ta ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ wa kaia so ɗɔɔ Jurdɛn'i a ŋgɔn sɛn Gilgal.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ‘e, o be
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dea ha̧ yí Jurdɛn mɛ ɔ̧si̧ ti'nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ku, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee so tɛ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp nɛ yì ɔ̧sa̧ nɛnɛ k’ɛɛ ku so'i ga,
wen ha̧ zuduk bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ mɛ iŋ‘e, er GASA WAN ɔ nɔa, in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wese ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
O wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ yaa so kur Jurdɛn nɛ war yee-wese in o wannu ko o be Kanaŋ nɛ yaa tan nɛ Gba-tɔp zia'e GASA WAN dee ha̧ yí Jurdɛn mɛ ɔ̧si̧ ti o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Mɛ̀ dé paa nɛ ta-kórò, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀
Josue dee paa nɛ ta-kórò, ɓɛɛ a̧
Mɔ nɛ dee ha̧ Josue mɛ gɔn nɛ bɔr-wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: o wi nɛ gboo so nɛ Egiptɛ, o wiwii, o wi-biro lɛŋ fea so sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛ yuwar.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i nɛ gboo nɛ Egiptɛ‘i a̧ gɔna so ɓor. O wan nɛ wa koa sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛ yuwar tɛ gboa-a nɛ Egiptɛ tɛ gɔn so kɔ‘i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
O be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bem kɔ-wa a̧ yaa oi wa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bem nɔ‘i a̧ Josue gɔna bɔr-wa, wen bo nɛ wa
Ŋgimbi nɛ
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Sɔsɔɔ, mi baa mɔɔ-búù ko Egiptɛ yinɛ zu'nɛ́.» Wa aa nin fara'i'e Gilgal, nɛ̀ duk hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
O be
Ɔɔ mɔ sa̧ ɗoŋ
Kpɔk wese nɛ wa nyɔŋa nɛ nyɔnɔ nù‘i,
Josue hɛɗa ká̧ Jeriko, a̧ baa yí-a nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk ŋma bíí nɛ yor ti a̧ nɛ gba-paa nɛ‘i daka kɔ̧ koɓo-a er; Josue nɛɛ sitɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ bíí k’ɛɛ náà, kóó mɛ́ nɛ́ wisɛn k’ɛɛ nde?»

Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Weyaa, mi nɛ wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko GASA WAN ɛ̧; mi hɔa kinii ɓɛɛ.» Josue ba yí gu nù, gbɛɛ zugur nù ti a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Nyaa, nɛ́ ge ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ge?»
Ɓɛɛ wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko GASA WAN kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ kpɔ̧́í̧ ndárà naŋ-mɛ yinɛ, wen fara nɛ mɛ duk sɛnɛ‘i nɛ
Wa kpee so nú garo Jeriko nɛ ŋgaya-a wen zu o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Mɛ̀ zɔk, mi ee Jeriko in wan kɔ̧-a̧ in o haya wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ kɔ̧ er-mɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ zík Jeriko war kpɔk. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé hegɔ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ tui zak vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo yak nɛti ha̧
Kà wa nɛ́ dɔma zak vala sami, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wora zak'i, o bíí a̧ gai mɔ nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ garo saaye'i tɛ gbin; ŋgimbi'i o bíí a̧ tik biro, kóó o ndé tan ti.»
Josue bem ko Nun saa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík ye, ɓɛɛ o wí-nɛ̀-gɔ̀n-zù tɛ yak ti ha̧
Mɔ dee nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí; o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ kai zak vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛɛ nɔ̀ ti GASA WAN dɔm nɛ zak, ɓɛɛ
O wí-nɛ̀-gɔ̀n-zù yaka ti ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ dɔm zak, ɓɛɛ o wi-kpe-ndaa-gɔtɔ ya ɗoŋ ndak nɛ pata
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ dukbíí, ká wa hiɗi mɔ na, ká‘i zii ger-wa na, ká ŋma wen gbo nɛ nú-wa na mbɛt hɔ wese nɛ‘i tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa, wa a̧ gai mɔ sɛka wa gaia mɔ.
Wa baa
Josue kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔ
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ tui zak vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i yaka ti
Wa zika ye war kpɔk woyo tɛ yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧ gbagari. Wa dee kpɔk mɔ‘i hegɔɔ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, wa gboo mɛ tutuyɛ sut, mɛ gɔna mɔ, wa zika ye war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ‘i. Ɓɛɛ wese nɛ wa zika nɛ̀ ye war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zika ye, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ Josue tɔ̧ ha̧ o dukbíí: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáí mɔ, wen GASA WAN ee ye kɔ̧ er'nɛ́ kaɗi.
Jeriko in o mɔɔ-saaye lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Rahab kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu kpɔk in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ tɛ ya kpasa ɓɛɛ, wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ baa hu̧si so o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ n’ɛɛ toma so.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé see'nɛ́ wen ká aa-see-mɔ tɛɛ ir'nɛ́ mɛ zu̧ ŋma mɔ nɛ duk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zú̧ ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i ee ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ha̧ fom'i mɛ tik mgbara o be
O bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndɛrɛ in boi, o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN; wa tɛ ye mgbara mbɔi ko GASA WAN.»
Wa dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí zia wora-a, wa gaia mɔ nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ garo gbin a nù. Dukbíí gɔma a saaye, kóó o ndé bìí biro tan ti, ɓɛɛ wa ba ye.
Wa kuma o bíí saaye lɛŋ: o wiwii, o okoo, o ŋgaiwi gu nɛ o sɔkawi, o ndai, o sami in o tuifuu, wa gbɛɛ wa lɛŋ nɛ gba-paa.
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ yiitoo nɛ̀ nɛɛ so mɛ kpe naŋ nù‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé tua ko kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu so’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ a̧ gbonɛ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kana so nɛ mɔ ha̧ a̧ ga.»
O be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i nɛɛ ye tua, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ Rahab in dáà kɔ̧-a̧, nàà kɔ̧-a̧, o nya-a̧ in o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ gbonɛ. Wa mgbɔɔ o bíí nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ si ɗoŋ gbagari ko o be
Wa dɔɔ ye in o mɔɔ-saaye lɛŋ; mɔ nɛ wa fo na nɛ́ bu-mbɔi in lɔr in o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndɛrɛ in boi nɛ wa aa mgbara mbɔi kɔ̧ tua ko GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ Josue e Rahab kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ kpasa. O bezaŋ Rahab ɓɔna mgbara o be
Ŋgimbi'i, Josue kana mɔ hegɔ:
«Fom ko GASA WAN a̧ ba
wi nɛ tɛ mbo Jeriko e ŋgɔn woyo.
Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ fe ŋgimbi éé naŋ garo,
ɓɛɛ hɔ-ɗoŋ kaya-a tɛ fe ŋgimbi éé kpar-nú-a.»
GASA WAN duka in Josue, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur dam fara lɛŋ.
O be
Josue toma o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ Jeriko si Ai, ye nɛ duk ká̧ Bɛt-Avɛn, nɛ war daŋa-wese ha̧ Bɛtɛl, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpé naŋ nù.» Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i daŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpe naŋ Ai.
Wa pia ɗoŋ pii katɛ Josue kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká bíí lɛŋ daŋ si Ai na; bíí booro-yiitoo, kóó booro-taar a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ bi Ai ɓɛɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ tom bíí lɛŋ nɛnɛ géè na, wen o wi nɔ‘i dɔk na.»
Bíí hee booro-taar ga baa yuwar yak biro, ɓɛɛ wa nɛɛ yu mɔ ti o be Ai.
O be Ai gbɛɛ bíí hee ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ga mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ ndak wa yak nú garo ye hɔ sɛn Sɛbarim. Wa gbɛɛ wa sɛn tɛ zira kaya. Gba̧a̧-tɛ o be
Josue a̧ka̧ laa tɛ, hɔ̧fi̧ tik nù, ɓɛɛ ba yi gu nɛ nù ti
Josue tɔ̧a̧: «Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧, wen ge ɛnɛ foo o wi nɔ'ɔ ku nɛ Jurdɛn ge? Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ fo yɛ a kɔ̧ er o be Amɔr ha̧ wa mɛ kum yɛ nde? Gana so ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé so ye nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn ɓíì!
GASA WAN, mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́,
O be Kanaŋ in o bíí tɛ nù'ɛ tɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a, ɓɛɛ wa dika a zu yɛ mɛ bi nin yɛ yinɛ tɛ nù'ɛ. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de nɛ hura nin'nɛ́ ge?»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ Josue: «Mɛ̀ kúr ŋgɔn. Wen ge mɛ ba yí-mɛ gu nɛ nù ge?
O be
o be
Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀

Sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ nɛk nɛ̀ zuduk zuduk, ɓɛɛ zuduk nɛ GASA WAN tɛ usi nɛ tani, tɛ nɛk nɛ̀ nú-gara; ɓɛɛ nú-gara nɛ GASA WAN tɛ usi tɛ nɛk nɛ̀ nutua; ɓɛɛ nutua nɛ GASA WAN tɛ usi tɛ nɛk nɛ̀ bíí kpɔk kpɔk.
Wi-de-mɔɔ-fom nɛ tani tɛ ba, wì dɔ́ a̧ yí wee in o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen a̧ gbina
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut; a̧ mɔi̧a o be
A̧ saa o bíí tɛ o nú-gara ko Juda pii ti, ɓɛɛ tani ba nú-gara ko o be Zera. A̧ saa o bíí nú-gara ko Zera pii ti, ɓɛɛ tani ba nɛ nutua ko Zabdi.
A̧ saa o bíí nutua ko Zabdi kpɔk kpɔk pii ti, ɓɛɛ tani ba nɛ Akaŋ, bem ko Karmi, be-koo Zabdi, nú-gara ko Zera, zuduk ko Juda.
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Akaŋ: «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Akaŋ kifa nú ha̧ Josue: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko

mi zɔka ŋma laa, wan mɛ nú Sinɛar nɛ dee nyɛmna sɛn mgbara mɔɔ-oi-biro, kɔya bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo in lɔr tɛ reeta kilo. Wɔ-a gbɛa'm ɓɛɛ mi kai. Mi hu̧sa̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ɗɔɔ nù sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ bu-mbɔi a̧a̧ nɛ ɗɔɔ-aa mɛ.»
Josue toma o bíí, ɓɛɛ wa ma yì nɛnɛ hɔ kɔ̧ tua ko Akaŋ; wa nɛɛ kpa gasa laa n'aa hu̧sa̧, nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa'i kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa kaia mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛnɛ ti Josue in o be
Josue in o be
Ɓɛɛ Josue ak a̧: «Wen ge mɛ baa bɔnɛ pi̧ mgbara yɛ ge? GASA WAN a̧ tui bɔnɛ pi̧ zu mɛ sɔsɔɔ mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ o be
Wa mɔi̧a ta nɛ kusa-a a zu Akaŋ. Ta nɔ‘i a̧ ya hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i. See GASA WAN ga̧a̧. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ dea ha̧ wa mɛ sa fara'i ɗɔŋgɔ Akɔr.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Ká kíì de mɛ na, ká tɛ-mɛ gbin na. Mɛ̀ káí o wi-biro kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, mɛ̀ kúr mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bí Ai. Mi ee wannu Ai in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ in gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧, in nù kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ er-mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ de mɔ in Ai in wannu kɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee so nɛnɛ in Jeriko in wannu kɔ‘i ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ kai o mɔ in mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi biro. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm o ŋma wi-biro nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si ɗoŋ ye'i.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue in o wi-biro lɛŋ kura mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi Ai. A̧ hoka o ŋgaŋa wi-biro booro-ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom wa yak mɛ zɛ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk; ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hú̧sì ɗoŋ ye, bo nɛ́ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a gan na, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk tɛ pɛma mɔ.
K’ɛɛ in o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ in am, ɛɛ tɛ ɗɔŋ siti si saaye Ai, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ gbo mɛ bi yɛ hee kuti-a ga, ɛɛ tɛ yu mɔ ti wa.
Wa tɛ ndak ɗoŋ yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɔra wa nyɛi̧ nɛ saaye, wen wa tɛ ta kɔ-wa ndé, ɛɛ yuu mɔ ti wi hee kuti-a ga;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ gbo nɛnɛ nɛ fara hu̧sa̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ baa ye nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ e kɔ̧ er'nɛ‘i.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ baa ye kaɗi, ɛnɛ tɛ pi̧ wee sɛnɛ; ɛnɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN. Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ‘i.»
Josue foo wa yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yak si fara-hu̧sa̧-a̧; wa nɛɛ hu̧si mgbara Bɛtɛl in Ai, nɛ ká̧ Ai nɛ war yee-wese. Josue ɔɔ kɔ‘i wese'i mgbara o dukbíí.
Josue kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr o bíí lɛŋ. A̧ duka ti ha̧ gíí wi-biro, a̧ in o gasawi
O wi-biro nɛ yaa in a̧ daŋa ɓɛɛ nɛ si mgbák ká̧ ye. Wa ɔɔ ká̧ Ai nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ gboŋgo a̧ gɔna mgbara wa in Ai.
Josue hoka so o ŋma bíí hee booro-mɔɔrɔ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ hu̧si wa mgbara Bɛtɛl in Ai nɛ ká̧ Ai si war yee-wese.
Ɗoŋ nɛ o dɔka wi-biro baa gbagari nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ ye, in nɛ̀ o ŋma hu̧sa̧ kɔ‘i nɛ war yee-wese kaɗi, Josue zira si bɔkɔ-nù mɛ zɛ‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Ai zɔka mɔ‘i, a̧ kura in o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ nɛ haya-a mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi
Josue in o be
O bíí nɛ yaa saaye lɛŋ ndaka ɗoŋ wa nɛ̀ zɔm gayamɔ; ɓɛɛ ndáká ɗoŋ Josue nɛ wa ndak'i, ɗoŋ wa a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ ye'i.
Sɛn Ai in Bɛtɛl, ŋma wiwii nɛ gbo mɛ ndak o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Mɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ sɛ́ɛ̀ er-mɛ‘i si saaye Ai, wen mi tɛ e a̧ kɔ̧ er-mɛ.» Josue nyɛi̧a sɛ́ɛ̀ nɛ a̧a̧ er si war saaye.
Ŋgimbi n'aa nyɛi̧a er-a, o wi nɛ hu̧sa̧ so gboo nɛ haya-a nɛ fara kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ma yì ye saaye; wa baa ye, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ wee sɛnɛ.
O bíí Ai zika tɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk zi-wee nɛ tur nɛ saaye kɔ-wa si yiwese. Wa iŋ fara nɛ wa tɛ yu mɔ si sɛnɛ na. O be
Ŋgimbi nɛ Josue in o be
O wan nɛ yee so saaye Ai mbɛt gboo mɛ bi wa. O wisɛn duka see-a, ɓɛɛ o be
War ko wannu Ai, wa baa a̧ nɛ̀ kpasa, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ Josue.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ wa gbɛa sɛn saaye wese'i nɛ́ bíí booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wiwii in o okoo saaye Ai lɛŋ.
Josue nyɛi̧a kànà nɛ́ er nɛ oi sɛ́ɛ̀ hegɔɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa kuma o be Ai lɛŋ.
Mɔɔ-oi biro nɛ
Josue dɔɔ ye Ai lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ye'i kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi, fara nɛ̀ bíí bo sɛnɛ na hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
War ko wannu Ai, a̧ ga̧i̧a a̧ tɛ ŋma te hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ tɛ yee-wese, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ zir wɔr-aa tɛ te. Wa baa a̧ pi̧ nú ye, ɓɛɛ wa yumbi ta zu a̧. Ta nɔ‘i a̧ ya hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i.
Josue mboo
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o be
Josue yɔra Heembea nɛ Moisɛ yɔra so ha̧ o be
O be
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Josue tɔra o gba̧a̧ wen lɛŋ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea, a̧ tɔra de yoŋgo in fom mbɛt.
Josue tɔra mɔ nɛ Moisɛ yɔra so lɛŋ ti gíí be
O wannu lɛŋ nɛ ɔ kur Jurdɛn sɛn zu kaya, sɛn hira-nù in ká̧ ŋgere Gba-tɔp hɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Libaŋ, o be Hit, o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus zia mɔ‘i.
Wa ee nú wa kpɔk mɛ ba biro duk nɛ̀ Josue in o be
Ɓɛɛ o be Gabaɔŋ nɛ zia so nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ Josue dee sɛn Jeriko in Ai kaɗi,
dee gɔn-ta mɛ ɔr o be
Wa aa a̧ka̧ ndárà nɛ wa fura fur naŋ-wa. Wa aa o a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kai kora brɛt in o ɓusu-a.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa nɛɛ kpa Josue sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari Gilgal, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ in o be
O be
Wa kifa nú ha̧ Josue: «Ɛɛ nɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.» Josue aka wa: «Ɛnɛ nɛ o, ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ déè?»
Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a fara wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛɛ zia nyɛrɛ hura nin-a in mɔ n'aa dee sɛn Egiptɛ lɛŋ,
in mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dee in o wannu Amɔr yiitoo nɛ ɔɔ so nɛ kur Jurdɛn: Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ in Og wannu Basaŋ nɛ ɔ so sɛn Astarot.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ, o gasawi k’ɛɛ in o bíí nù k’ɛɛ tɔ̧a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́‘e, ɛɛ mɔi̧ nyɔŋmɔ wen yuwar, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kpá‘nɛ́; ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ndé, ɛɛ nɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in yɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k brɛt k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ kaia nɛ mbe wee-aa ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ ɗafa nɛ mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ tua k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ kura sɛnɛ mɛ tɛ pii tɛ‘nɛ́; zɔk kinii, kora kor kútú-kútú.
O dak dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ aa dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ mbe-a, kinii wa gboo gboo; laa k’ɛɛ in o ndárà k’ɛɛ ɗaŋa wen nyɛi̧a naŋanɔ n’ɛɛ nɛa.»
O be
Josue kpɛka wa tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɔ tɔk in wa ndé, wi beka gbɛ wa na. O gasawi
Zɛ taar ɗoŋ
O be
O be
O gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛɛ kana mɔ ha̧ wa nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de in wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ɛɛ beka gbɛ wa na, wen k’ɛɛ tɛɛ fo nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ pii zu yɛ, wen zu kanamɔ n’ɛɛ kana so ha̧ wa.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí‘e wi nɔ‘i tɛ ya kpasa ga, o wi nɔ‘i kifa nɛ o wi-gɔm-gua in o wi-ɗu-yì ha̧ o dɔka be
Josue saa o be Gabaɔŋ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen ge ɛnɛ ɔra yɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ndé, ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a fara ge? Bo nɛ ɛnɛ ɔ mgbara yɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ na nde?
Kinii, fom baa'nɛ. O bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ o wi-de-tom: o wi-gɔm-gua in o wi-ɗu-yì wen tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.»

Wa kifa nú ha̧ Josue: «Ɛɛ zia so nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ nù'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ o bíí nú'ɛ yinɛ lɛŋ. Kíí tɛ‘nɛ́ dee yɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ s’ɛɛ de gɔn-ta in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Kinii, ɛɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ in yɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see'nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ga.»
Josue dee mɔ in wa hee mɔ‘i ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo wa ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o be
Wese'i Josue ee wa nɛ̀ o wi-gɔm-gua in o wi-ɗu-yì ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ in si
Adonisedɛk wannu Jerusalɛm zia'e, Josue baa Ai ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ a̧ lɛŋ, gbɛ wannu e sɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ in Jeriko ká bá nɛ̀ wannu kɔ‘i ga. A̧ zia mbɛt'e o be Gabaɔŋ
Kíì dee a̧ batɛ wen Gabaɔŋ duka so nɛ gasa ye hee ŋma ye-wan ga, nɛ̀ gana Ai; bíí saaye lɛŋ nɛ o ŋgaŋa wi-biro.
Adonisedɛk wannu Jerusalɛm toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Hoham wannu Hebrɔŋ, ha̧ Piream wannu Yarmut, ha̧ Jafia wannu Lakis in ha̧ Debir wannu Eglɔŋ nde,
wa a̧ gár tɛnɛ pii tɛ-wi, wa a̧ gbák wi mɛ bi Gabaɔŋ wen n'aa nɔɔ tɔk in Josue ká bá nɛ̀ o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wannu Amɔr mɔɔrɔ, wannu Jerusalɛm, wannu Hebrɔŋ, wannu Yarmut, wannu Lakis in wannu Eglɔŋ, ee nú kpɔk mɛ yak in o wi-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ mɛ bi Gabaɔŋ.
Wa kɛra ye'i mɛ bi,

ɓɛɛ o be Gabaɔŋ tom ha̧ Josue kɔ̧ gbagari sɛn Gilgal'e: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ e o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ haya-a pii tɛ yɛ mɛ kpasi yɛ in mɛ gbak yɛ, wen o wannu Amɔr lɛŋ nɛ ɔ zu kaya mɔi̧a ŋmaa mɛ bi yɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue in o gii wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋgaŋa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ daŋa nɛ̀ Gilgal.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Ká mɛ́ yu wi nɔ‘i na, wen mi aa wa kɔ̧ er-mɛ kaɗi, ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa nɛ tɛ yor ti mɛ bo na.»
Josue daŋa nɛ Gilgal nɛ zɛ nɛ zɛ, a̧ kpàŋá wa nɛ biro.
GASA WAN dee ha̧ o wannu nɔ‘i mɛ yu mɔ ti
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa yu nɛ mɔ ti
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wese'i a̧ GASA WAN ee nɛ o be Amɔr kɔ̧ er o be
«Wese, mɛ̀ yór zu Gabaɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ nyaŋa-zɛ,
mɛ̀ yór kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Ayalɔŋ!»
Wese in nyaŋa-zɛ yora hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ dukbíí kifa er ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘i. Mɔ‘i yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a. Wese yora sɛn see yiwese, ɓɛɛ ye nɛ haya-a na hee zɛ kpɔk ga.
Kóó nɛti, kóó nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt, ŋma wese nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in wese'i nɛ GASA WAN mboo nɛ̀ zu ha̧ bíí hegɔ bo na, wen GASA WAN dee biro zu
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Josue in o be
O wannu nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ‘i yuu so mɔ, ɓɛɛ hu̧si kɔ̧ di̧i̧ sɛn Makeda.
Wa tɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Josue ndé, wa kpaa wannu nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ‘i fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ̧ di̧i̧ sɛn Makeda.
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kín o gasa ta kpe nɛ nú di̧i̧‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ á o ŋma bíí nú a̧ mɛ pɛm mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yor na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n nú wa, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wa mɛ ye saaye kɔ-wa na, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ee wa kɔ̧ er'nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ Josue in o be
O bíí pia ɗoŋ nɛ de-a lɛŋ pii kɔ̧ gbagari katɛ Josue sɛn Makeda.
Ŋma bíí tɛ nù‘i hu̧i̧ nú sitɛ o be
Ɓɛɛ Josue tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú di̧i̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o wannu nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ‘i gbonɛ ha̧‘m.»
Wa dee hegɔ, ɓɛɛ wa kai o wannu nɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ‘i gbonɛ nɛ kɔ̧ di̧i̧: mɛ̀ nɛ́ wannu Jerusalɛm, wannu Hebrɔŋ, wannu Yarmut, wannu Lakis in wannu Eglɔŋ.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa kaia o wannu nɔ‘i tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ kaɗi, a̧ saa o be
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì na, ká tɛ‘nɛ́ nak na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór nɛ nɔa-a wen nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɛ de in o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ tɛ bi.»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Josue gusa o wannu nɔ‘i, a̧ gbɛɛ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ ga̧i̧ wa tɛ te mɔɔrɔ. A̧ ee wa hi̧i̧ hɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Ŋgimbi yee-wese, Josue ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ zir o wɔr tɛ te in ha̧ wa mɛ a wa kɔ̧ di̧i̧, fara nɛ wa hu̧sa̧ so sɛnɛ. Wa aa gasa ta nú di̧i̧‘i. Ta nɔ‘i a̧ ya hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i.

Kale kpɔk wese'i, Josue baa Makeda, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ o bíí saaye lɛŋ in wannu nɛ gba-paa. A̧ kuma wa in o bíí lɛŋ; a̧ e ŋma bíí kóó kpɔk kpasa na. A̧ dee mɔ in wannu Makeda hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ in wannu Jeriko ga.
Josue in o be
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ Libna in wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧
Josue in o be
GASA WAN ee Lakis kɔ̧ er o be
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Horam, wannu Gezɛr daŋa mɛ gbak Lakis, ɓɛɛ Josue gbɛ a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ e ŋma bíí kóó kpɔk kpasa na.
Josue in o be
Mɛ nɛ kpɔk kale wese'i a̧ wa baa nɛ ye'i, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ o bíí saaye in mɔ nɛ duk kpasa lɛŋ nɛ gba-paa. Wa kuma o bíí ye'i lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee so nɛnɛ sɛn Lakis ga.
Josue in o be

Wa baa ye'i ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wanye in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ gba-paa; wa baa o be ye nɛ yaa zik a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ o wi-saaye nɔ‘i mbɛt; wa e ŋma bíí kpɔk kpasa na, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee so nɛnɛ in Eglɔŋ ga. Wa kuma mɔ in o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ lɛŋ.
Josue in o be

A̧ baa ye in wan kɔ̧-a̧ in o be geɗek ye kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ wa nɛ gba-paa. A̧ kuma o bíí nɛ ya saaye'i lɛŋ. Ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ ɓɔna kpasa bo na. A̧ dee mɔ nɛ Debir in wan kɔ‘i hee mɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ in Hebrɔŋ in wan kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ Libna in wan kɔ‘i ga mbɛt.
Josue bìí nù‘i lɛŋ: o wi zu kaya, o wi ŋga-gbárà, o wi bɔkɔ-nù, o wi ká̧ naŋ kaya in o wannu kɔ-wa lɛŋ, a̧ e bíí kpɔk kpasa na. A̧ kuma mɔ nɛ ɔm ɔm lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Josue baa nɛ zika-nù lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Kadɛs-Barnɛa hɔ Gaza, in zika-nú Gɔsɛn lɛŋ hɔ Gabaɔŋ.
Josue bìì nú nɔ‘i in o wan kɔ-wa lɛŋ war kpɔk, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Josue in o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ Yabin wannu Asɔr zia nyɛrɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, a̧ toma o betom ha̧ Yobab wannu Madɔŋ, ha̧ wannu Simrɔŋ, ha̧ wannu Aksaf,
ha̧ o wannu nɛ ɔ mgbara kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, o wan nɛ ɔ ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn nɛ ɗoŋ Tɔp Kinarot nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ha̧ o wan mɛ hira-nù, ká bá nɛ̀ o wan mɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Dɔr nɛ war yee-wese.
A̧ toma ha̧ o be Kanaŋ nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ war daŋa-wese in yee-wese, o be Amɔr, o be Hit, o be Periz, in o be Jebus sɛn zu kaya, ká bá nɛ̀ o be Hiv ká̧ naŋ kaya Hɛrmɔŋ nù Mispa mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa tɛɛ in o wi-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa yaa so nɛ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a hee nyɛmɛ ɗɔɔ Gba-tɔp ga, wa in o dɔka nyaŋa, in o keekee-nyaŋa mbɛt.
O wannu nɔ‘i lɛŋ ee zu-a mɛ kpa ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ ba gbagari ká̧ yí Mɛrɔm wen bíí biro in
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue: «Ká mɛ yu wa na, wen mɔɔsa̧ hee ŋgimbi kinii ga, mi tɛ e wa lɛŋ nɛ wɔr kɔ̧ er o be
Josue in o wi-biro kɔ‘i kpàŋá wa nɛ biro sɛn ká̧ yí Mɛrɔm.
GASA WAN ee wa kɔ̧ er o be
Josue dee mɔ in wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ ga. A̧ ɓira ɗaɗi naŋ o nyaŋa kɔ-wa ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ wee tɛ o keekee-nyaŋa kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Ɗoŋ pia-a ko Josue sɛn tɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i, a̧ baa Asɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ wannu kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ gba-paa wen Asɔr duka so nɛti nɛ́ gasa ye sɛn tɛ nù‘i.
Wa gbɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ sɛn saaye'i nɛ gba-paa; wa kuma wa lɛŋ, wa e ŋma mɔ kpɔk kpasa na, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ ye kɔ-wa a nù.
Josue baa ye ko o wannu nɔ‘i nɛ mɔi̧a so ŋmaa'i, a̧ kaia o wanye mbɛt, a̧ gbɛɛ wa nɛ gba-paa; a̧ kuma wa lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
Ɓɛɛ o be
O be
O heembea nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, Moisɛ ha̧a̧ so kànà ha̧ Josue lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ Josue de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ e ŋma mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ duk na.
Hegɔ Josue baa nù‘i nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ. A̧ baa zu kaya, nù Nɛgɛb, nú Gɔsɛn lɛŋ, hira-nù, ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn, o kaya
A̧ baa nù ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ zu kaya Halak nɛ yor si war Sɛir hɔ sɛn Bal-Gat, sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Libaŋ ɗɔɔ kaya Hɛrmɔŋ. A̧ kaia o wannu kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum wa lɛŋ.
Ɗoŋ biro nɛ Josue bìí nɛ o wannu nɔ‘i nyɛi̧a.
Ŋma ye nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ duka mgbara a̧ in o be
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ so, nɛ́ ha̧ see o bíí mɛ ŋgai wen bíí biro in o be
Ŋgimbi'i, Josue daŋa, ɓɛɛ kum o be Anak nɛ ɔ zu kaya, nɛ ɔ sɛn Hebrɔŋ, sɛn Debir, sɛn Anab, sɛn mgbara kaya Juda in
Ŋma be Anak ɓɔn sɛn nù ko o be
Josue baa nù‘i lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ ga. A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ nù ɔm tɛ tɛ biro.
O wannu nɛ o be
wa bìí Sihɔŋ wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ ɔɔ so sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ; nu kɔ̧-a̧ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Arɔɛr ká̧ gboŋgo Arnɔŋ nɛ kur yì yiitoo lɛŋ, in reeta Galad hɔ kɔ̧ gboŋgo Yabɔk,
A̧ ɔɔ wan zu ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn nɛ war daŋa-wese, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Gba-tɔp Kinɛrot hɔ tɛ Gba-tɔp Araba nɛ‘i sa'e Gba-tɔp Tɔŋ si war Bɛt-Yesimɔt in nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ ɗɔɔ kaya Pisga mbɛt.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, wa bìí nù ko Og wannu Basaŋ, ŋma wi nɛ duka kpasa mgbara o sɔŋkur be Refaim nɛ ɔ so sɛn Astarot in Edrɛi.
Nù kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ zu kaya Hɛrmɔŋ, Salka, Basaŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ
Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN in o be
O wannu nɛ Josue in o be
O nú nɔ‘i duka nɛ́ zu kaya in hira-nù, ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn, ká̧ naŋ kaya, in ŋga-gbárà nɛ war ɗɔɔ. O nú nɔ‘i duka so nɛ nù ko o be Hit, o be Amɔr, o be Kanaŋ, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus.
O wannu nɛ biro baa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: wannu Jeriko in wannu Ai ká̧ Bɛtɛl,
wannu Jerusalɛm, wannu Hebrɔŋ,
wannu Yarmut in wannu Lakis,
wannu Eglɔŋ in wannu Gezɛr,
wannu Debir in wannu Gedɛr,
wannu Ɔrma in wannu Arad,
wannu Libna in wannu Adulam,
wannu Makeda in wannu Bɛtɛl,
wannu Tapua in wannu Hefɛr,
wannu Afɛk in wannu Lasarɔŋ,
wannu Madɔŋ in wannu Asɔr,
wannu Simrɔŋ-Mɛrɔŋ in wannu Aksaf,
wannu Tanak in wannu Mɛgido,
wannu Kɛdɛs in wannu Yoknɛam sɛn Karmɛl,
wannu Dɔr sɛn zu kaya Dɔr in wannu Goyim sɛn ká̧ Gilgal ká bá nɛ̀
wannu Tirsa. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ wannu ɓu-taar-zua-kpɔk.
Josue sɔka kaɗi in pɛ-a dɔka kaɗi mbɛt, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ sɔka kaɗi in pɛ-mɛ dɔka kaɗi mbɛt; ɓɛɛ oi nù nɛ ɓɔna wen baa-a ɔ gasa.
O oi nù nɛ ɓɔna nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: nù ko o be Filistii, nu ko o be Gɛsur,
ká bá nɛ̀ nù ko o be Av. Nu'i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ be yì nɛ‘i sa'e Sihɔr nɛ ndaɗa in Egiptɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ
Oi nù nɛ ɓɔna nɛ war ɗɔɔ wen baa-a mbɛt nɛ nù ko o be Kanaŋ lɛŋ in Meara nɛ duk nɛ́ ko o be Sidɔŋ hɔ Afɛka hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ
sɛka nù ko o be Gebal gu nɛ Libaŋ nɛ oi-aa nɛ war daŋa-wese, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Bal-Gat ká̧ naŋ kaya Hɛrmɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ nú Lebo-Hamat.
Wi tɛ ba nù ko o wi-ɔ-mgbara kaya mbɛt, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Libaŋ hɔ Misrefot-Maim in nù ko o be Sidɔŋ lɛŋ; nɛ́ mi a̧ tɛ ndak wa yinɛ ti o be
Kinii, mɛ̀ kɛ̧́ nù'ɛ ha̧ duk nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi ko o zuduk be
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko ɓii reeta zuduk ko Manase, wa in zuduk ko Rubɛn in ko Gad, wa a̧a̧ so kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-oi nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa nɛ war kur Jurdɛn ɓi, si war daŋa-wese kaɗi.
Nù‘i ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ Arɔɛr nɛ duk sɛn ká̧ gboŋgo Arnɔŋ in ye nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ gboŋgo'i tɛ tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù lɛŋ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Madaba hɔ nɛnɛ Dibɔŋ.
O ye ko Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr, nɛ ɔɔ so wan sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ, ɓir nɛ
hɔ nɛnɛ Galad tɛ nù ko o be Gɛsur in ko o be Maka, daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya Hɛrmɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ Basaŋ lɛŋ nɛ oi-aa hɔ Salka.
Sɛn Basaŋ nù ko Og nɛ ɔɔ so wan sɛn Astarot in sɛn Edrɛi nɛ́ kɔ-wa mbɛt. Og duka nɛ́ ŋma sɔŋkur wi nɛ ɓɔna kpasa sɛn mgbara o be Refaim. Moisɛ bìì so o wannu nɔ‘i yiitoo'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba wan er-wa yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ zuduk ko Levii kpɔk a̧ kpa mɔɔ-oi na. O mɔ nɛ o bíí ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Moisɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ so nù ha̧ zuduk ko Rubɛn nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Nù kɔ-wa ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ Arɔɛr nɛ duk sɛn ká̧ gboŋgo Arnɔŋ in ye nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gboŋgo mbɛt in tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù ká̧ Madaba.
Hɛsbɔŋ in o ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nu, Dibɔŋ, Bamɔt-Bal, Bɛt-Bal-Mɛɔŋ,
Yahas, Kɛdɛmɔt, Mefat,
Kiriataim in Sibna, nɛ́ kɔ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛrɛt-Has-Sahar nɛ duk zu kaya kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ,
in Bɛt-Pɛɔr, o ká̧ naŋ kaya Pisga, sɛka Bɛt-Ha-Yesimɔt mbɛt.

O ye mɛ tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù lɛŋ in nù ko Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr nɛ ɔɔ so wan sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ lɛŋ, duka nɛ́ kɔ-wa. Moisɛ bìì so wannu Sihɔŋ in o be-wan Madiaŋ: Evi, Rekɛm, Sur, Hur in Rɛba. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o be-wan ko Sihɔŋ nɛ ɔɔ so tɛ nù‘i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko Balam, wi-zɔk-mɔ, bem ko Beɔr, o be
ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn duka nɛ́ Jurdɛn in ká̧ a̧. Mɔɔ-oi nɛ zuduk Rubɛn kpaa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o gasa ye in o geɗek-a nɔ‘i.
Moisɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ so nù ha̧ zuduk ko Gad nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Nù nɛ wa kpaa nɛ Yazɛr, o ye Galad lɛŋ, reeta nù ko o be Amɔŋ hɔ sɛn Arɔɛr nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in Raba.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa ku̧ naŋ nɛ Hɛsbɔŋ hɔ sɛn Ramat-Mispɛ in Betonim; sɛka ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Mahanayim hɔ
hɔ nɛnɛ ɗɔŋgɔ tɛ o ye Bɛt-Haram, Bɛt-Nimra, Sukot in Safɔŋ nɛ duka so nɛ oi nù ko Sihɔŋ, wannu Hɛsbɔŋ. Jurdɛn duk nɛ
Mɔɔ-oi nɛ zuduk ko Gad kpaa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o gasa ye in o geɗek-a nɔ‘i.
Moisɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nù ha̧ reeta zuduk ko Manase nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Nù kɔ-wa ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ Mahanayim; nɛ́ Basaŋ nɛ oi-aa nɛ Og ɔɔ so wan sɛnɛ, in o be ye ko Yair lɛŋ sɛn nú Basaŋ; nɛ́ ye ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Reeta Galad in Astarot in Edrɛi, o ye nù ko Og sɛn Basaŋ, duka nɛ ko o bem ko Makir, bem ko Manase wen nɛ tɔ̧, ko reeta o bem ko Makir nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Moisɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ nù nú gbárà Mɔab nɛ kur Jurdɛn mgbák ti Jeriko si war daŋa-wese.
Ɓɛɛ Moisɛ ha̧ so mɔɔ-oi ha̧ zuduk ko Levii na. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ duka nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ga.
Mɔɔ-oi nɛ o be
Wa pi̧i̧ nɛ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù ha̧ zuduk mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in ha̧ reeta zuduk ko Manase nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ.
Moisɛ ha̧a̧ so mɔɔ-oi ha̧ zuduk yiitoo in ha̧ ŋma reeta zuduk nɛ war kur Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma ha̧ be Levii na.

O bem ko Jozɛf duka so nɛ́ zuduk yiitoo: zuduk ko Manase in zuduk ko Efraim. Ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ ŋma mɔɔ-oi ha̧ o be Levii na. Wa ha̧a̧ nɛ ŋma ye ha̧ wa mɛ ya sɛnɛ, in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko mɔ-dai wen mɔ-dai kɔ-wa in o mbɔi kɔ-wa.
O be
O bezaŋ Juda tɛɛ kpa Josue sɛn Gilgal, ɓɛɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ be Keniz tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ bíí ko Sɔ̧ wen zu'm in wen zu mɛ sɛn Kadɛs-Barnɛa.
Mi a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ ɓu-naar ŋgimbi nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN toma so nɛ‘m nɛ Kadɛs-Barnɛa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpe naŋ nù, ɓɛɛ mi pii ɗoŋ we ɗoŋ mɔ‘i ha̧ a̧ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
O bíí nɛ daŋa so in am gbina gba̧a̧-tɛ dukbíí, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi de so kànà nɛ́ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m kɔ̧a̧.
Wese'i, Moisɛ kana mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mi kana mɔ‘e nù nɛ naŋ-mɛ tɛ fo tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi, mɛ in o bezaŋ-mɛ, wen mɛ dee mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m kɔ̧a̧.›
Kinii, GASA WAN ee ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Ŋgai a̧a̧ kànà tɛ‘m sɔsɔɔ hee wese nɛ Moisɛ toma so nɛ‘m ga. Mi a̧a̧ kànà nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m hɔ sɔsɔɔ wen dee biro in wen yara-a nɛnɛ in pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.

Ŋgimbi hɔa ha̧ mɛ mɛ ha̧ kaya nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú sɛnɛ wese'i ha̧‘m kaɗi. Mɛ zia so wese'i ndé, o be Anak a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasa ŋga ye. Ŋmafara GASA WAN tɛ duk in am, ɓɛɛ mi baa nù‘i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.»
Josue toka de yoŋgo zu Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ Hebrɔŋ ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa wa ha̧ Hebrɔŋ ha̧ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ be Keniz hɔ sɔsɔɔ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen n'aa dee kànà mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Nin Hebrɔŋ duka nɛti nɛ́ Kiriat-Arba wen Arba duka nɛ nin gasawi mgbara o be Anak. Ŋgimbi'i, nù duka tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Nù ko zuduk Juda nɛ kpaa nyɛm nɛ́ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ̀ mɔ'ɔ: ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ
kɔ-wa mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ ndɔŋ nú Gba-tɔp Tɔŋ nɛ gbaa er si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn e Nɛgɛb nɛ ɗɔɔ,
ɓir si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ war ká̧ kaya Akrabim, gɔm nɛ Sin, ɓɛɛ daŋ si Kadɛs-Barnɛa, yak nɛ Hɛsbɔŋ daŋ nɛnɛ si Adar, ɓɛɛ zik hi̧i̧ si Karka,
ɓir nɛ Asmɔŋ kpa nɛ be-zer Egiptɛ tik nɛnɛ ɗɔɔ Gba-tɔp.
Nɛ war daŋa-wese,
daŋa hɔ Bɛt-Hogla ɓir nɛ Bɛt-Araba nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ nɛnɛ hɔ tɛ Ta ko Bohan bem ko Rubɛn.
daŋa si Debir, nɛ war ɗɔŋgɔ Akɔr zik nɛnɛ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn si war Gilgal nɛ duk ti kaya Adumim nɛ ɗɔɔ ha̧ be-zer.
baa gboŋgo Bɛn-Hinɔm daŋnɛ, e Jerusalɛm, ye ko o be Jebus nɛ war ŋgɔn, yak nɛnɛ si zu kaya nɛ duk ti gboŋgo Hinɔm nɛ war yee-wese; fara'i nɛ́ ndɔŋ nú ɗɔŋgɔ ko o be Refaim nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Nɛ war zu kaya,
zika nɛ Bala, ɓɛɛ wɛr si ká̧ naŋ kaya Sɛir nɛ war yee-wese ba nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Yarim nɛ‘i sa'e Kɛsalɔŋ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, zir si Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, ɓir nɛnɛ si Timna,
hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧ Ekrɔŋ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zik si Sikarɔŋ ɓir nɛ zu kaya Bala si Yabnɛl, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ kaɗi ká̧ Gba-tɔp.
nɛ war yee-wese duka nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Gba-tɔp.
Wa ha̧a̧ war nù ko Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ ha̧ a̧ mgbara zuduk ko Juda nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ Josue. Nù kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Kiriat-Arba nɛ‘i sa'e Hebrɔŋ. Arba duka so nɛ dáà ko Anak.
Kalɛb ndaka nú-gara ko Anak taar yinɛ sɛn hi̧i̧: mɛ̀ nɛ́ nú-gara ko Sesai, ko Ahinam in ko Talmai.
Ɓɛɛ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ baa zu duk nɛ̀ o be Debir. Nin Debir nɛti duka so nɛ Kiriat-Sefɛr.
Kalɛb tɔ̧a̧: «Wi nɛ tɛ bi Kiriat-Sefɛr, ɓɛɛ baa a̧, mi tɛ ha̧ boko-bem kɔ‘m Aksa ha̧ a̧ nɛ kóò.»
Wi nɛ baa ye'i duka nɛ Otniɛl bezaŋ Kɛnaz nya Kalɛb. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Kalɛb ha̧a̧ boko-bem kɔ‘i Aksa ha̧ a̧ nɛ kóò.
Wese n'aa hɔɔ kɔ̧ tua-wíì kaɗi, wíì kɔ̧-a̧
Aksa kifa nú: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ŋma be demɔ ha̧‘m. Hee ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ gbárá Nɛgɛb ha̧‘m ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ o gɔna-yì ha̧‘m mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ Kalɛb ha̧ o gɔna-yì mɛ ŋgɔn in mɛ ɗɔɔ ha̧ a̧.
Mɔɔ-oi ko zuduk ko Juda nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
O ye nɛ ya ndɔŋ nù ko zuduk ko Juda si war
Kina, Dimɔna in Adeada;
Kɛdɛs, Asɔr in Yitnaŋ;
Zif, Tɛlɛm in Bealot;
Asɔr-Adata in Keriot-Ɛsrɔŋ nɛ wa sa'e Asɔr;
Amam, Sema in Mɔlada;
Hasargada, Hɛsemɔŋ in Bɛt-Pɛlɛt;
Hasar-Sual, Bɛrseba in Biziotia,
Bala, Iyim in Esɛm;
Ɛltolad, Kezil in Ɔrma;
Siklag, Madmana in Sansana;
Lebaot, Silɛhim, Ain in Rimɔŋ; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa.
O ye mɛ hira-nù, nɛ́ Ɛstaɔl, Sorea in Asna;
Zanɔa, Ɛn-Ganim, Tapua in Ɛinam;
Yarmut, Adulam, Soko in Asɛka;
Saraim, Aditaim, Gedera in Gederotayim: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Senaŋ, Hadasa in Migdalgad;
Dilean, Mispɛ in Yokteɛl;
Lakis, Boskat in Eglɔŋ;
Kabɔŋ, Lamas, in Kitlis;
Gederot, Bɛt-Dagɔŋ, Nama ká bá nɛ̀ Makeda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
O ŋma nɛ́ Libna, Etɛr in Asaŋ;
Yifta, Asna in Nɛsib;
Kɛila, Akzib in Marɛsa: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Ekrɔŋ in o be ye nɛ zii nɛ̀ a̧,
in o ye lɛŋ nɛ duk ká̧ Asdod gu nɛ o geɗek-a mbɛt, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Ekrɔŋ hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Gba-tɔp nɛ war yee-wese;
ká bá nɛ̀ Asdod in Gaza in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa zir nɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Gba-tɔp hɔ nɛnɛ be-zer Egiptɛ.
Sɛn mgbara kaya, mɛ̀ nɛ́ Samir, Yatir in Soko;
Dana in Kiriat-Sana nɛ‘i sa'e Debir;
Anab, Ɛstɛmɔ in Anim;
Gɔsɛn, Hɔlɔŋ in Gilo; o gasa ye ɓu-zua-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Ara, Duma, in Eseaŋ;
Yanum, Bɛt-Tapua in Afɛka;
Humɛta, Kiriat-Arba, wen nɛ tɔ̧ Hebrɔŋ in Siɔr: gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
Ŋma nɛ́ Maɔŋ, Karmɛl, Zif in Yut;
Yizreɛl, Yokdeam in Zanɔa;
Kayin, Gibea in Timna: o gasa ye ɓu in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Halul, Bɛt-Sur in Gedɔr;
Marat, Bɛt-Anɔt in Ɛltekɔŋ: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Ŋma nɛ́ Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim, in Raba: gasa ye yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛ́ Bɛt-Araba, Midin in Sekaka;
Nibsaŋ, Ye Tɔŋ in Ɛn-Gedi: o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ Juda nyɛm so mɛ ndak o be Jebus nɛ ɔ Jerusalɛm na. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be Jebus ɔ nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm mgbara o bezaŋ Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa ku̧u̧ naŋ ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn mgbák ká̧ Jeriko, e be-zer Jeriko nɛ war yee-wese. Fara'i duka nɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ daŋ nɛ Jeriko si zu kaya Bɛtɛl.
nɛ́ Bɛtɛl hɔ Luz ɓir si war
ɓɛɛ zum si war yee-wese sitɛ
Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf: Manase in Efraim, duka hee mɔ‘i ga.
Nɛ war yee-wese,
gɔm nɛ Yanɔa si Atarot in Narata hɔ sɛn Jeriko si kpa nɛ Jurdɛn.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war Tapua,
Wi tɔr o ye nɛ wa ee ha̧ zuduk ko Efraim sɛn mgbara mɔɔ-oi ko Manase na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o gasa ye in o ye nɛ zik wa lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ wa ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn Gezɛr na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ nɛ o be Kanaŋ ɔ nɛnɛ mgbara o be Efraim hɔ sɔsɔɔ de nɛ ŋga tom-bara.

Nù nɛ tani baa ha̧ zuduk ko Manase nɛ duka nɛ kaya-bem ko Jozɛf nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Makir duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Manase, a̧ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Galad mbɛt, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ nú Galad ha̧ a̧, wen a̧ duka so nɛ ŋgaŋa wi-biro.

Nù ko o ŋma bem ko Manase nɛ tani baa ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. O bem nɔ‘i nɛ o bem ko Abiezɛr, o bem ko Helɛk, o bem ko Azriɛl, o bem ko Sɛkɛm, o bem ko Hefɛr, in o bem ko Semida, wen nɛ tɔ̧ o be wiwii ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf lɛŋ.
Sɛlɔfɛhad, bem ko Hɛfɛr, be-koo Galad nɛ duka nɛ́ bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase, bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na. Kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ; nin be-okoo nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.

Wa nɛɛ tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar, ti Josue bem ko Nun in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ mɛ ha̧ ŋma mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ mgbara o nya yɛ.» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mgbara o nya ko dáà kɔ-wa.
Wa ha̧a̧ zika-nù ɓu ha̧ Manase e zu Galad in Basaŋ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn.
O be-okoo ko Manase kpaa mɔɔ-oi mgbara o bu̧i̧-nya-wa, ɓɛɛ nú Galad duk nɛ́ ko o ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Nú Tapua duka so nɛ́ ko Manase, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ye Tapua duk nɛ zu
zira tik zu be-zer Kana nɛ ká̧ zaŋ-aa nɛ war ɗɔɔ. Mɔ kpɔk, ye nɛ ya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ha̧ be-zer'i tɛ nù ko Manase duka nɛ́ ko o be Efraim.
Efraim a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ Manase a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn. Gba-tɔp duka nɛ́
Manase a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o ye tɛ zika-nù ko Isakar in ko Asɛr mbɛt: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Yiblɛam, Dɔr, wan mɛ ká̧ zaŋ yì, Ɛn-Dɔr, Tanak in Mɛgido, in o ye lɛŋ nɛ zii nɛ̀ wa, in o zu-kaya taar.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bezaŋ Manase ba so ye nɔ‘i ga na, o be Kanaŋ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
O bezaŋ Jozɛf tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ ge? Bo nɛ bíí k’ɛɛ ɔ dɔka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ toka so nɛ de yoŋgo h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga na nde?»
Josue kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si zika-nù nɛ te ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɔ́í kombo sɛn nù ko o be Periz in ko o be Refaim, wen nɛ kaya Efraim gasi wen'nɛ́ na.»

O bezaŋ Jozɛf kifa nú woyo: «Kaya beka nyɛm yɛ na, in mbɛt, o be Kanaŋ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa-boi, o wan nɛ ɔ Bɛt-Seaŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o ye nɛ zii nɛ a̧, in o wan nɛ ɔ bɔkɔ-nú Yizreɛl mbɛt.»
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be nutua ko Jozɛf, ha̧ Efraim in Manase: «Zuduk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka in ɛnɛ ɔ ŋgaya mbɛt, ɛnɛ beka kpa nù kpɔk ɓɛɛ na.
Kaya nɛ duk nɛ kombo tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m te a nù, ɓɛɛ bɛɛ-aa lɛŋ duka nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak o be Kanaŋ nɛ oi keekee-biro kɔ-wa in ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ.»
O be
Ɓɛɛ sɛn mgbara o be
Josue tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ tɛ pɛm mɔ hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge sɛk’ɛnɛ nɛɛ mɛ́ bà nù nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧‘nɛ́ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók bíí taar tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tom wa ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ yar tɛ nù, wa tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ nyɛma yí-wa tɛ nu'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛ̧ nù tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. O bezaŋ Juda tɛ duk tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ bezaŋ Jozɛf duka tɛ nù kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i nyɛm nɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧. Mi tɛ pi̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧.

War ko o bezaŋ Levii, wa beka kpa kɔ-wa ŋma mɔ mgbara'nɛ́ na, wen tom-ɗafa GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Gad in Rubɛn sɛka reeta zuduk ko Manase, wa kpaa mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa nɛ war kur Jurdɛn ɓi si war daŋa-wese; nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa kaɗi.»

O wi nɛ wa hoka ɗafa mɔ mɛ yak wen kpee naŋ nù. Josue ha̧a̧ nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yár tɛ nù‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ kpa'm, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ tani h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yí GASA WAN sɛn Silo hɛ̧ɛ̧.» Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i kur yak.
O wi nɔ‘i yaka, wa yara tɛ nù‘i; wa yɔra mɔ nɛ wa zɔka tɛ o ye nɔ‘i tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba pii ɗoŋ ha̧ Josue sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari sɛn Silo.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Josue pi̧i̧ tani ha̧ o be
Tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Nù kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda in nù ko o bezaŋ Jozɛf.
kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ku̧u̧ naŋ nɛ̀ Jurdɛn daŋ si ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ Jeriko daŋ nɛ mgbara kaya si war yee-wese, haɗi nɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà sɛn Bɛt-Avɛn.
Sɛn hi̧i̧
zira si ɗɔɔ ɓɛɛ zik si yee-wese nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ kaya nɛ duk ti Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ haɗi sɛn Kiriat-Bal nɛ‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim gasa ye ko o bezaŋ Juda;
nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Kiriat-Yearim, yak si war yee-wese si war zu-zer Nɛftoa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ si ndɔŋ nú kaya nɛ duk ti gboŋgo Hinɔm nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ bɔkɔ-nù ko o be Refaim.
zira si ɗɔɔ woyo nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn haɗi sɛn Ɛn-Sɛmɛs in Gelilot nɛ duk tan nɛ yuwar daŋa-a si Adumim, ɓɛɛ zir sitɛ Ta ko Bohan bem ko Rubɛn.
ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tan nɛ ɗɔŋgɔ Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ zir woyo si nú Jurdɛn.
ɓira nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya Bɛt-Hogla nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ nɛnɛ nú gba-tɔp Tɔŋ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, fara nɛ Jurdɛn a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ sɛnɛ.
nɛ war daŋa-wese duka nɛ́ Jurdɛn. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa ká bá nɛ̀ mgbii-aa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ‘i.
O gasa ye ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ Jeriko, Bɛt-Hogla, Emɛk-Kesis,
Bɛt-Araba, Semaraim, Bɛtɛl,
Abim, Para, Ofra,
Kefar-Amɔna, Ofni in Geba. Nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Gabaɔŋ, Rama, Bɛrot,
Mispɛ, Kefira, Mɔsa,
Rekɛm, Yirpɛl, Tareala,
Sela, Elɛf ye ko o be Jebus nɛ‘i sa'e Jerusalɛm, in Gibea-Kiriat: o gasa ye ɓu-zua-naar in o geɗek-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Yiitoo nù nɛ tani baa duka nɛ ko Simɛɔŋ, ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa duka mgbara nù ko o bezaŋ Juda.
Mɔ nɛ wa kpaa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi nɛ́ Bɛrseba, Seba, Mɔlada,
Hasar-Sual, Bala, Esɛm,
Ɛltolad, Betul, Ɔrma,
Siklag, Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susa,
Bɛt-Lebaot in Saruhɛn: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-taar in o geɗek-a.
Sɛka Ain, Rimɔŋ, Etɛr in Asaŋ: nɛ́ gasa ye naar in o geɗek-a.
Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wi tɛ kai o be geɗek ye nɛ ya ká̧ o gasa-a nɔ‘i hɔ sɛn Balat-Bɛr nɛ‘i sa'e Ramat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ a zu-a. Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Wa baa mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ tɛ ko o bezaŋ Juda wen nɛ̀ war ko o bezaŋ Juda duka nɛ gasa-a nyɛmna wen wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o bem ko Simɛɔŋ kpaa nɛ war mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘i tɛ nù ko o bem ko Juda.
Tani baa taar nù ha̧ o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
kɔ-wa daŋa si yee-wese si war Marala tan nɛ̀ Pabɛsɛt in be-zer nɛ duk mgbák ti Yoknɛam.
duka Sarid zik nɛnɛ si war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ
Ɓɛɛ
O ye nɛ duka tɛ nu kɔ-wa nɛ́ Katat, Nahatal, Simrɔŋ, Yideala in Bɛtlɛhɛm: nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
War naar-a, tani baa nù ko Isakar ha̧ o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Pɛsa nù kɔ-wa hɔɔ Yizreɛl, Kezulot, Sunɛm,
Hafarayim,
Rabit, Kisiɔŋ, Ebɛs,
Remɛt, Ɛn-Ganim, Ɛn-Hada in Bɛt-Pasɛs.
kɔ-wa hɔɔ Tabɔr, Sahasima in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, tik nɛnɛ Jurdɛn: nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o geɗek-a.
Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Isakar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
War mɔɔrɔ-a, tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko o bezaŋ Asɛr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
O ye nɔ'ɔ duka tɛ nù kɔ-wa: Hɛlkat, Hali, Betɛn, Aksaf,
Alamɛk, Amead in Miseal.
zika si daŋa-wese si Bɛt-Dagɔŋ tan nɛ Zabulɔŋ in ɗɔŋgɔ Yifta-Ɛl nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ Bɛt-Emɛk in Nɛiɛl, nɛ́ɛ̀ haɗi sɛn Kabul nɛ war gale.
yaka woyo si Hebrɔŋ, Rehob, Hamɔŋ in Kana hɔ nɛnɛ Gasa-Sidɔŋ.
zika woyo si war Rama hɔ tɛ ŋgárá Tir, ɓɛɛ zik si Hosa, haɗi nɛnɛ nú gba Tɔp, tɛ nù ko Akzib.
O ye Uma, Afɛk in Rehob a̧a̧ tɛ nù‘i mbɛt. O gasa ye lɛŋ dee ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo in o geɗek-a.
Mɔɔ-oi ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Asɛr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
War mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a, tani baa nù ha̧ o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
kɔ-wa ku̧u̧naŋ sɛn Helɛf, hɔ tɛ gasa te
ɓira si war yee-wese si Azanot-Tabɔr ɓɛɛ nɛ́ si Ukɔt hɔ nɛnɛ nú Zabulɔŋ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, e nú Asɛr nɛ war yee-wese ká bá nɛ̀ Juda,
O ŋga ye duka nɛ́ Sidim, Ser, Hamat, Rakat, Kinɛrɛt,
Adama, Rama, Hasɔr,
Kɛdɛs, Edrɛi, Ɛn-Hasɔr,
Yirɛɔŋ, Migadal-Ɛl, Horɛm, Bɛt-Anat in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs: nɛ́ o gasa ye ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in o geɗek-a.
Mɔɔ-oi ko o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ gasa ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
War mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa, tani baa nù ha̧ zuduk ko o bezaŋ Dan nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa.
kɔ-wa duka nɛ́ Sorea, Ɛstaɔl, Ir-Sɛmɛs,
Salabin, Ayalɔŋ, Yitla,
Elɔŋ, Timnata, Ekrɔŋ,
Ɛlteke, Gibetɔŋ, Balat,
Yehud, Bene-Berak, Gat-Rimɔŋ,
o foka-yì Yarkɔŋ, Rakɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ nù nɛ duk mgbák ti Jope.
Ɓɛɛ nù ko o bezaŋ Dan nyaŋ wa. Hegɔ wa daŋa ba zu duk nɛ̀ Lesɛm; wa baa ye'i, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ o mɔɔ saaye lɛŋ nɛ̀ gba-paa. Wa yaa hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa a nin zɔmdáa kɔ-wa Dan ha̧ ye'i.
Mɔɔ-oi ko zuduk ko o bezaŋ Dan nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ́ o gasa ye nɔ‘i in o geɗek-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
Wa ha̧a̧ ye n'aa aka nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: nɛ́ Timnat-Sɛra, mgbara kaya Efraim. A̧ ɗafa ye'i woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk sɛn hi̧i̧.
Kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar in Josue bem ko Nun in o gasawi nutua ko o be
Gasa Wan tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josue:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ wi-gbɛ-zu nɛ gbɛɛ bíí, nɛ̀ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ, nyɛma mɛ yu mɔ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si sɛnɛ; o ye nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ fara-hu̧sa̧-a̧ wen o wi-kifi-er ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi-gbɛ-zu tɛ yu mɔ sitɛ ŋma ye nɔ‘i kpɔk. A̧ tɛ yor nú garo ye, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ o gasawi fara'i. O wi nɔ‘i tɛ kpɛk ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ in wa.
Ɓɛɛ kà wi-kifi-er ndak pata a̧, wa beka ha̧ wi-gbɛ-zu'i ha̧ a̧ na, wen bó nɛ́ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ ŋma-a na, in bó nɛ́ a̧ ee so ŋma sɛnmɔ kɔ̧ see-aa nɛti na.

Wi-gbɛ-zu tɛ duk saaye'i hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ gɔn kita zu a̧ ti o bíí, hegɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ŋgimbi'i tɛ fe. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ wi-gbɛ-zu tɛ nyɛm mɛ siɗoŋ saaye kɔ‘i, sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i, sɛn saaye n'aa duka sɛnɛ yu nɛ mɔ yak'i.»
O ye nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ wen mɔ‘i nɛ́ Kɛdɛs sɛn Galilee mgbara kaya ko Nɛftalii, Sikɛm mgbara kaya ko Efraim, Kiriat-Arba nɛ duk nɛ́ Hebrɔŋ sɛn mgbara kaya ko Juda.
Nɛ́ kur Jurdɛn, mgbák ti Jeriko nɛ war daŋa-wese, wa hoka nɛ Besɛr sɛn ŋga-gbárà tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, Ramot nú Galad ko zuduk ko Gad in Golaŋ sɛn Basaŋ ko zuduk ko Manase.
O ye nɛ wa hoka wen hu̧sa̧-a̧ ko o be
O gasawi zuduk ko o be Levii tɛɛ kpa Eleazar wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, Josue bem ko Nun in o gasawi zuduk ko o be
Ŋgimbi'i ká wa a̧a̧ so sɛn Silo sɛn nú Kanaŋ. Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú Moisɛ ndé, wa a̧ é ye in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya sɛnɛ.»
O be
Tani baa nɛ o bíí nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat nɛti. Mgbara o wi nɔ‘i, o bezaŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ kpaa gasa ye ɓu-zua-taar tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Juda, ko Simɛɔŋ in ko Bɛnjamin.
O oi bem ko Kehat kpaa kɔ‘i nɛ ye ɓu tɛ nù ko Efraim, Dan in reeta zuduk ko Manase, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Tani baa ye ɓu-zua-taar sɛn Basaŋ tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Isakar, Asɛr, Nɛftalii in reeta zuduk ko Manase ha̧ o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ.
O bezaŋ Mɛrari kpaa kɔ‘i nɛ ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, zuduk ko Gad in zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
O be
Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Juda in ko zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ, o ye nɛ wa ha̧a̧
ha̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nú-gara ko Kehat mgbara o be Levii nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ, wen nɛ̀ tani baa nɛ́ wa nɛti.
Wa ha̧a̧ nɛ Kiriat-Arba nɛ‘i sa'e Hebrɔŋ mgbara kaya ko Juda in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ yaa ká̧ a̧ ha̧ wa. Arba baa duk so nɛ́ dáà ko Anɔk.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko zaŋbɛɛ nɛ a̧a̧ ká̧ gasa ye'i in o be ye nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, wa ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ.
Wa ha̧a̧ Hebrɔŋ, ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ ko o wi-gbɛ-zu in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ ya ká̧ a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ Libna,
Yatir, Ɛstɛmɔa,
Hɔlɔŋ, Debir,
Ain, Yuta in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ a̧a̧ ká̧ wa. Nɛ́ ye mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar a̧ wa baa tɛ nù ko o zuduk nɔ‘i yiitoo'i.
Nɛ̀ war ko zuduk ko Bɛnjamin, nɛ́ Gabaɔŋ, Geba,
Anatot, in Almɔŋ, gasa ye naar in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ a̧a̧ ká̧ wa.
Dɔka ye ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o oi nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat, bem ko Levii, tani usa nɛ́ o ye tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Efraim ha̧ wa.
Ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ ko o wi-gbɛ-zu nɛ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ Sikɛm in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai mgbara kaya Efraim. Wa ha̧a̧ Gezɛr,
Kibsayim, in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai. Nɛ́ gasa ye naar.
Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Dan, nɛ́ Ɛlteke, Gibetɔŋ,
Ayalɔŋ, in Gat-Rimɔŋ in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai a̧ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa. Nɛ́ gasa ye naar.
Tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase, nɛ́ Tanak, in Gat-Rimɔŋ
Lɛŋ nɛ́ gasa ye ɓu nɛ o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai wen oi o bíí nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat nɛ̀ ɓɔna so.
