David aka GASA WAN: «Mi tɛ nɛ biro'i, ɓɛɛ mi gbina biro ti o be Filistii nde?» GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ̀, mɛ tɛ gbin biro ti o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ mɛ kpasa Kɛila.»
O bíí ko David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kíì de yɛ sɛn Juda hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ wan n’ɛɛ tɛ nɛ sɛn Kɛila kpa nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro ko o be Filistii’ɛ, ɛɛ tɛ de hee ge nde?»
David sii ɗoŋ mɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ak Sɔ̧ woyo, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́, mɛ̀ zír si Kɛila, mi ee o be Filistii kɔ̧ er mɛ.»
David in o bíí kɔ‘i zira si Kɛila, ɓɛɛ a̧ bi o be Filistii; a̧ kaia o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ, a̧ bìí wa nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a nyɛmna. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ David kpasa nɛ̀ o bíí Kɛila.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Abiatar bem ko Ahimɛlɛk yuu so nɛ mɔ sitɛ David, a̧ zira si Kɛila nɛ oi laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Saul'e David a̧a̧ sɛn Kɛila, ɓɛɛ Saul tɔ̧: «Sɔ̧ foo a̧ pi̧ kɔ er-am kaɗi, wen a̧ kpee nú-a nɛ̀ tɛ-a ye nɛ̀ saaye nɛ̀ kpar-nú-a in mɔɔ-mana-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.»
Saul mɔi̧a o bíí lɛŋ ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpe nú David in o bíí kɔ‘i e ɓɔn sɛn Kɛila.
David zia'e Saul ɗafi nɛ ŋma ŋgamɔ wen wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar: «Mɛ̀ bá gba laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ.»
David tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O gasawi saaye Kɛila tɛ e'm er a̧ nde? Saul tɛ tɛ kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ zia ga nde? GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
David aka mɔ woyo: «O gasawi saaye Kɛila tɛ ba'm in o bíí kɔ‘m e er Saul nde?» GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Wa tɛ kai'nɛ́ ha̧ ha̧ a̧.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David in o bíí kɔ‘i, hee gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ga gboo saaye Kɛila yak. Bíí nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Saul'e, David bo sɛn Kɛila ɓɔna. Ɓɛɛ Saul e toma o wi-biro duk.
David duka ŋga-gbárà mgbara o ta. A̧ ɓɔna zu kaya ŋga-gbárà Zif. Ŋgimbi'i lɛŋ Saul kii nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ e a̧ kɔ̧ er Saul na.
David zɔka'e, Saul kii mɛ gbɛ nɛ wi.
Ŋgimbi'i, David a̧a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Zif sɛn Hɔrɛsa.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔnataŋ bem ko Saul tika yuwar mɛ nɛ sitɛ David sɛn Hɔrɛsa. A̧ tɛɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ David nɛ nin Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ de kíì na, er dáà kɔ‘m Saul beka tam tɛ-mɛ na. Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu
Wa yiitoo lɛŋ
O bíí Zif daŋa si Gibea katɛ Saul mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bo nɛ David hu̧sa̧ ɓɔn tɛ k’ɛɛ sɛn Hɔrɛsa zu kaya Hakila nɛ duk nú gbárà nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ na nde?
Ɓɛɛ kà wannu nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zir si hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ zír nɛnɛ; nɛ́ ɛɛ a̧ tɛ ba David ha̧ wannu.»
Saul tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «GASA WAN a̧ tók de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ zɔka'm nɛ ko.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ̀, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpe naŋ mɔ nɛ de-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɛ zɔk oi pat'a. Ŋma bíí zɔk a̧ sɛn hi̧i̧ na nde? Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndé, kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa ɔ gɔna nyɛmna.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o fara n'aa nyɛma mɛ hu̧si sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí tɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m ɗoŋ n’ɛnɛ kpee naŋ mɔ nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ bòò tɛ nù‘i, mi tɛ kii mɔ dam nú-gara Juda lɛŋ ha̧‘m mɛ kpa a̧.»
Wa baa yuwar yak ti ha̧ Saul si war Zif. David in o bíí kɔ‘i a̧a̧ kɔ‘i sɛn bɔkɔ-nu nú ŋga-gbárà Maɔŋ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
Saul in o bíí kɔ‘i yaka mɛ kii a̧ nɛnɛ. Wa mbaŋa tɛ David, ɓɛɛ a̧ zir si ká̧ kaya, nɛ́ɛ̀ duk sɛn ŋga-gbárà Maɔŋ. Saul zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ndak ɗoŋ David si ŋga-gbárà Maɔŋ.

Saul in o bíí kɔ‘i ba nɛ ká̧ naŋ kaya nɛ mgbɔɔr, David in o bíí kɔ‘i tɛɛ ba kɔ-wa nɛ́ ɓii-aa. David kpàná nɔ̀ mɛ yu mɔ yak er Saul. Saul in o bíí kɔ‘i hɛɗa so kpaa David in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kɛr wa wen kaia wa kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ ŋma betom tɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Saul: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ haya-a, o be Filistii hura nù kaɗi.»
Saul kaɗa ndaka pata David, ɓɛɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ zik tɛ mɛ ndak nɛ o be Filistii. Nɛ́ hegɔ sa wa a nin fara'i'e Ta-kɛ̧-mgbara-ŋmaa.
David daŋa nɛ̀ hi̧i̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si ŋga-gbárà Ɛn-Gedi.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Saul pia ɗoŋ nɛ tɛ ndaka o be Filistii kaɗi, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «David a̧a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà Ɛn-Gedi.»
Saul kaia o ŋga wi-biro booro-taar sɛn mgbara o be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa hɔɔ ká̧ ɓoramɔ ko o sami nɛ̀ duka so ká̧ war. Ŋma di̧i̧ duka so hi̧i̧; nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Saul yee kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ zaŋbɛɛ. David in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so kɔ‘i ndaa di̧i̧‘i.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí ko David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wese nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so: ‹Mi ee wisɛn kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧ er-mɛ; mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de nɛ̀ a̧ lɛŋ.› » David kura gɛ́ɗɛ́k nɛ́ɛ̀ gɔn nú gba-laa ko Saul.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, ɗɛɗɛ-a̧ gɔna wen n'aa ɓira nú gba-laa ko Saul.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧: «GASA WAN a̧ dor am tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ in wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a. Mi beka tam tɛ-a na, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a.»
Wen nɛ David tɔ̧a̧‘i, dora o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tik zu Saul na. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Saul gboo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ di̧i̧‘i, ɓɛɛ ba yuwar kɔ‘i yak.
David kura gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ di̧i̧ si zan, ɓɛɛ a̧ hiɗi mɔ ha̧ Saul. Saul gira tɛ zɔk mɔ si ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ David hir gbɛ zugur nù, ba yí gu nù.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Saul: «Wen ge ɛnɛ zii wen nɛ o bíí tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ge?
Ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ yí‘nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, GASA WAN ee'nɛ́ kɔ̧ er-am sɛn kɔ̧ di̧i̧. Wa tɔ̧ so nɛ́ wen gbɛɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ko dea'm h’ɛ́nɛ́; mi tɔ̧a̧: er-am beka fo wan kɔ‘m na, wen a̧ nɛ́ wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a.

Ho, dáà kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, nú-laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ duk er-am’ɛ. Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ɓira nú-laa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ n'am gbɛ‘nɛ́ na ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ‘e, mi bó nɛ́ wi-ɗaŋsee, kóó wi-de-ŋgazu na. Mi de ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ kii nɛ yuwar mɛ gbɛ‘m.
GASA WAN a̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-gɔn-kita mgbara'nɛ́ in am; GASA WAN a̧ kífí er oi nú‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́; ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, er-am beka fo'nɛ́ na.
Gba̧‘a̧ tua-wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e: ‹Ɗaŋmɔ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o wi-ɗaŋ,› ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, er-am beka tam'nɛ́ na.
Wannu
GASA WAN a̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-sedaako mgbara yɛ, a̧ a̧ gɔ́n kita zu'm in zu'nɛ́. GASA WAN a̧ zɔ́k mgbara mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ gɔ́n kita ha̧‘m nɛ̀ yuwar-a; a̧ a̧ kpás'am er'nɛ́ yinɛ.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ David kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Saul, Saul tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ger-mɛ nde, bem kɔ‘m David?» Ɓɛɛ Saul ŋma nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a gan am, wen nɛ̀ mɛ dee demɔ in am, ɓɛɛ mi de kɔ‘m nɛ ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ.
Sɔsɔɔ, mɛ usa dee demɔ kɔ-mɛ ha̧‘m, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN foa'm pi̧ kɔ̧ er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ gbɛ‘m na.
Kà ŋma bíí kpa wisɛn kɔ‘i, a̧ e so a̧ ee mɛ ba yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ yak sɔɔ géè nde? GASA WAN a̧ gbák mɛ tɛ demɔ nɛ mɛ dee in am sɔsɔɔ.
Kinii, mi iŋa nɛ mbetɛ‘e, mɛ tɛ ɔ wan, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-wan ko
Kinii, mɛ̀ kán mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN ndé, mɛ beka gbɛ o bezaŋ-am ɗoŋ fio kɔ‘m na, in mɛ beka bi nin-am yinɛ nú-gara ko dáà kɔ‘m na.»
David kàná mɔ hegɔ ti Saul.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Saul sii kɔ‘i si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ David in o bíí kɔ‘i daŋ si fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ‘i.
Samuɛl fea, ɓɛɛ o be

Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ so sɛn Maɔŋ; wi’ɛi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nù kɔ‘i sɛn Karmɛl. A̧ duka so nɛ́ ŋma gasa wanmbɔi; a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o sami booro-taar in o gbadua booro mbɛt. A̧ nɛɛ duk Karmɛl wen gɔna o buma-tɛ mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧.
Nin wi’ɛi nɛ́ Nabal; ɓɛɛ nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ Abigail. Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ iŋa mɔ batɛ; a̧ yora so zɔŋa mbɛt; ɓɛɛ war ko wíì kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ duka so nɛ́ wi-ŋgazu in wi-ɗaŋ; a̧ duka so nɛ́ bezaŋ Kalɛb.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ David duka ŋga-gbárà zii nɛnɛ‘e, Nabal gɔn nɛ buma tɛ o sami kɔ‘i ga,
a̧ toma o ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu nɛnɛ sitɛ Nabal; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si Karmɛl, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ sitɛ Nabal, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ fán a̧ nɛ nin-am.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Nabal nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk zu o bíí nutua k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Kinii, mi zia'e, wa gɔn nɛ buma tɛ o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛti, o wi-kɔr mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ duka so in yɛɛ, ɛɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in wa na; ŋma mɔ kɔ-wa kóó kpɔk yɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa duka nɛnɛ sɛn Karmɛl na.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k o ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m nɛ̀ de-a wen nɛ̀ ɛɛ tɛɛ mɛ wese yɔyɛ. Mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mɔ'ɔ er'nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́, o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, in ha̧‘m, bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ David.› »
O ŋgaiwi ko David hɔa, ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ tom nɛ David toma nɛ̀ wa ha̧ Nabal, ɓɛɛ wa pɛm mɔ tikiɗi.
Nabal kifa nú ha̧ o ŋgaiwi ko David: «David nɛ́ o? Bem ko Jɛse nɛ́ o? Sɔsɔɔ o bara ɔ dɔka nɛ yu mɔ er o wan kɔ-wa yak;
ɓɛɛ a̧‘m há̧ brɛt kɔ‘m, yì kɔ‘m in kpoo kɔ‘m n'am gbɛɛ ha̧ o wi-gɔn-buma tɛ mɔ-dai kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧‘m bá ha̧ a̧ o ŋma bíí nɛ tɛɛ nɛ ŋma fara n'am iŋ na nde?»
O ŋgaiwi ko David sii ɗoŋ; nɛ̀ wa hɔa, wa wee ɗoŋ wen nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ David.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘i: «Kóó o ndé a̧ hɛ́r gba-paa kɔ‘i.» Bíí lɛŋ hɛra gba-paa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ David hɛr kɔ‘i mbɛt. Bíí hee gɔmŋmaa-naar ga yaka in David, ɓɛɛ bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo ya kɔ‘i ká̧ o tui.
Ŋma kpɔk mgbara o wi-de-tom ko Nabal mbaŋa so tɛ Abigail kóò kɔ̧-a̧ ndé: «David toma o betom tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà mɛ fan gasawi k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ gasawi k’ɛɛ kpɛk wa nɛ̀ de-a na.
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ tɛa'i dee so demɔ in yɛɛ. Wa duka nɛ̀ de-a in yɛɛ; ŋma mɔ k’ɛɛ yɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ yaa nɛnɛ in wa sɛn zaŋbɛɛ na.
Zɛ nɛ wese, wa duka zik yɛ hee garo ga ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ duka dai nɛ̀ o sami in wa.
Mɛ̀ íŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de kinii, wen fio ko wan k’ɛɛ in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ɗafa kaɗi'i; war kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ nɛ́ ŋma wi-ŋgazu nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen ha̧ a̧ na.»

Abigail kaia brɛt gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, dak dɔ̧ɔ̧ yiitoo, sami mɔɔrɔ n'aa gii gii; kilo hana gba̧a̧-nyɔnɔ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, sikila kora waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ gɔmŋmaa, makala waya te-mbɔra gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai a zu o tuifuu.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák ti, mi a̧‘m ndak pata'nɛ‘i.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ mbaŋ tɛ Nabal wíì kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ n'aa be daŋ zu tuifuu zir nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ká̧ naŋ kaya, David in o bíí kɔ‘i a̧ zir tɛnɛ'ɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kpa ŋmaa.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, demɔ nɛ‘i dee in Nabal sɛn ŋga-gbárà lɛŋ, Nabal iŋ kɔ‘i mɔ‘i na; o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ‘i zɔka wen ká̧ ŋma mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kpɔk tɛɛ yɔ wó‘i, a̧ zɔk i̧i̧ na; a̧ kifa er demɔ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ.
Sɔ̧ a̧ gbɛ́ wi ka'i nɛ ee ŋma wiwii kpasa tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ sɔsɔɔ hɔ sa̧a̧mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ Abigail zɔka David, a̧ zira zu tuifuu nɛ haya-a tik nù, gu yi nɛ nù ti David.
A̧ tika ti naŋ David tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Nyaa, ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ kɔ‘m! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Ká nyaa zii wen ko géé ɗaŋ tum Nabal’ɛ

Kinii, hee GASA WAN duk kpasa in ɛnɛ mbɛt duk kpasa ga, mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dora'nɛ́ tɛ gbaia tɔk a nù, in tɛ kifa er ɗaŋmɔ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́. Mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ kpa Nabal a̧ kpá o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kii mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Nɛ̀ war ko nyɔŋmɔ'ɛ nɛ̀ mi, bara k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí ha̧ o ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ ɗoŋ ɛnɛ‘i.

Mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ a̧! GASA WAN tɛ ɗafi de ŋga tua ha̧ nyaa, wen biro nɛ nyaa bi ŋgimbi lɛŋ, nɛ́ biro ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ká‘i kpa ŋma ɗaŋmɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ zaŋnu na.

Kà ŋma bíí kur zu'nɛ́ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN tɛ ɗafi'nɛ́ e tɛ de fara mgbara o wi nɛ ya kpasa katɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi-sɛn'nɛ́, a̧ tɛ pi̧ duka-kpasa kɔ-wa taŋ hee ta birndiŋ ga.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ de mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu'nɛ́‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, a̧ tɛ e'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wan zu
Ká see'nɛ́ tu̧ in k’ɛ́nɛ́ ta mɔ wen tɔk n’ɛnɛ gbaia so a nù tɛ kia war wen kpasa tɛ‘nɛ́ na! Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ de demɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, nyaa, ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na!»
David kifa nú ha̧ Abigail: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ wen zu de taamɔ kɔ-mɛ; mɛ̀ kpá ga̧a̧mɔ wen nɛ̀ mɛ dora'm ka'm tɛɛ gbɛ zu in wen nɛ̀ mɛ dora er-am tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Ɓɛɛ mi kan mɔ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
David kaia o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ Abigail kaia tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ-mɛ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ. Mi zia wen kɔ-mɛ, mi kpɛka mbɛt.»

Ŋgimbi nɛ Abigail sii ɗoŋ, a̧ nɛɛ kpa Nabal fara yɔɔ yɔyɛ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i; duka nɛ́ gasa yɔyɛ hee yɔyɛ ko wan ga. Nabal a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gasa desee, in dɔ̧ɔ̧ gbɛ so nɛ́ a̧ mbɛt. Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧ na, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mɔ sa̧a̧.
Nɛ̀ mɔ sa̧a̧ kaɗi, dɔ̧ɔ̧ gɔna yí Nabal; ɓɛɛ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ we ɗoŋ o mɔ nɛ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧. Tɛ-a mɔka, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk zíŋ-zíŋ.
Duka ɗoŋ-aa'i zɛ ɓu, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gusi Nabal gbɛ nɛ̀ fio.

Nɛ̀ David zia'e Nabal fea, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, wen n'aa gɔna foe yí‘m, tɛ da̧a̧‘m nɛ Nabal da̧a̧‘i. GASA WAN kɔ̧ ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kia nɛ war wen ha̧ ɗaŋ ko Nabal mɛ tik nɛ zu Nabal woyo.» Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, David toma nɛ́ɛ̀ ak Abigail mɛ ba nɛ̀ kóò.
O wi-de-tom ko David tɛɛ kpa Abigail sɛn Karmɛl, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «David toma yɛ tɛnɛ tɛ mɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba mɛ nɛ̀ kóò.»
Abigail kura gu yi nɛ nù, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ́ kó-de-tom nɛ duk nɛ bara kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mi duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ fɔr naŋ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.»
Abigail kura nɛ haya-a ɓɛɛ daŋ zu tuifuu, ɓɛɛ o kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ gbar ɗoŋ-aa. Abigail kura duk ɗoŋ o betom ko David, ɓɛɛ David ba a̧ nɛ̀ kóò.
David baa so ŋma kóò nɛti, nin-a nɛ́ Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ ya nɛ́ kóò kɔ̧-a̧.
Saul baa so be-okoo kɔ‘i Mikal n'aa ha̧a̧ so nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ David ha̧ ha̧ Palti, bem ko Layis be Galim.
O bíí Zif tɛɛ kpa Saul sɛn Gibea, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bo nɛ David hu̧si sɛn zu kaya Hakila nyɛm nɛ nú gbárà na nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Saul ba yuwar zir si ŋga-gbárà Zif in o ŋga wi-biro
Saul baa gbagari ká̧ kaya Hakila nɛ duk nú ŋga-gbárà ká̧ war. David duka so sɛn ŋga-gbárà nɛti. A̧ zɔka'e Saul ndak nɛ ɗoŋ wi tɛnɛ;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David toma o wi-kpe-naŋ-mɔ nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ‘e Saul hɔɔ nɛ mbetɛ.
David baa yuwar yak, ɓɛɛ hɔ fara nɛ Saul de gbagari sɛnɛ. A̧ zɔka fara nɛ Saul in wan ko wi-biro Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr ɔ sɛnɛ. Saul ɔ see-gara, ɓɛɛ dɔka wi-biro ɔ kɔ-wa zik a̧ kpa nú ŋmaa.
David aka Ahimɛlɛk, be Hit in Abisai, bem ko Sɛruya nya Jɔab: «Nɛ́ o mgbara'nɛ́ a̧ tɛ zir in am kɔ̧ gbagari hɔ tɛ Saul o nde?» Abisai tɔ̧a̧: «Nɛ́ mi'i tɛ zir in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
Ɓɛɛ David in Abisai zir nɛnɛ mɛ zɛ si fara nɛ o wi-biro ko Saul ɔ sɛnɛ; wa nɛɛ kpa Saul fara ɔ ya. Sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧ zu̧ kɔ‘i zu̧u̧ sɛn ká̧ nú yara kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ Abnɛr in o dɔka wi-biro ɔɔ kɔ-wa zik a̧.
Abisai tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Sɔ̧ foo wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ kɔ̧ er'nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m tok a̧ nɛ sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔn mbɔɗɔnu war kpɔk, bó nɛ́ war yiitoo na.»
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abisai: «Ká mɛ́ gbɛ a̧ na! Bíí nɛ tɛ gbɛ wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧, ká kifa-er tik zu a̧ na, bo na.»
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ gbɛ a̧; ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ fea, kóó kà a̧ zir si yí biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ fea mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m, GASA WAN a̧ dór am tɛ gbɛɛ wi n'aa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧. Kinii, mɛ̀ bá sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nú yara kɔ̧-a̧ in dak-nɔ-yì kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yák k’ɛɛ.»
David baa sɛ́ɛ̀ in dak-nɔ-yì ɗɔɔ zu Saul, ɓɛɛ wa yak; ŋma bíí zɔk na, ŋma bíí iŋ na, ŋma bíí tun na mbɛt. Wa lɛŋ ɔ nɛ ya, wen ŋma gasa ya nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN tika so zu wa.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David ɓira nɛ̀ war mgbɔɔr, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ daŋ zu kaya nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a yor sɛnɛ.
A̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ saa mɔ sitɛ o wi-biro in Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ kɔ̧́ sara nú‘m na nde, Abnɛr?» Ɓɛɛ Abnɛr kifi nú: «Mɛ́ wi nɛ mɛ hiɗi mɔ zer wannu’ɛ, mɛ́ nɛ́ o nde?»
David kifa nú ha̧ Abnɛr: «Mɛ́ bó nɛ́ wiwii na nde? Ŋma bíí nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in mɛɛ sɛn

Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɛ de-a'i de na. Hee GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, ɛnɛ lɛŋ nyɛma so kànà mɛ kum, wen ɛnɛ pɛm wan k’ɛ́nɛ́, wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ na. Kinii, sɛ́ɛ̀ ko wannu in dak-nɔ-yì kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ a̧a̧ so ɗɔɔ zu-a a̧a̧ déè nde?»
Saul iŋa tiger David, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tiger-mɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ nde, bem kɔ‘m David?» David kifa nú: «Ii, nɛ́ tiger-am, nyaa wannu.»
Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ siti ha̧ a̧: «Nyaa, wen ge s’ɛnɛ ndak pata wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ge nde? Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m dee ge? Nɛ́ ge ɗaŋmɔ ge ɛnɛ zɔka tɛ‘m ge?
Kinii, nyaa wannu a̧ zíí wen ko wi-de-tom kɔ‘i; nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ de ha̧ see'nɛ́ mɛ kur sɛn zu'm, wi tɛ ga̧ see-aa nɛ̀ de pɛr
Kinii, ká tɔk tɛ‘m gbai a nù nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ yí GASA WAN na, wen wannu yee zaŋbɛɛ mɛ gbɛ‘m, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ndak nɛ gbafɔ zu kaya ga.»
Saul tɔ̧a̧: «Mi dee ɗaŋmɔ, mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ, bem kɔ‘m David; mi beka de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ ɓɔna, wen duka-a kɔ‘m duka nɛ́ gasamɔ sɛn yí-mɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i; mi dee mɔ hee mgbelewi ga in mi yɔɔ kaya nyɛmna nɛ mbetɛ.»
David kifa nú: «Zɔ́k sɛ́ɛ̀ ko wannu hɛ̧ɛ̧; ŋma ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ba.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN kpɔk a̧ nyɛma kifa er demɔ ha̧ bíí! Sɔsɔɔ, GASA WAN ee'nɛ́ kɔ̧ er-am, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi kɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ duka nɛ́ gasamɔ sɛn yí‘m sɔsɔɔ ga, kale-a mbɛt, duka-a kɔ‘m a̧ dúk nɛ gasamɔ sɛn yí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ kpás'am tɛ ŋgamɔ lɛŋ.»
Saul tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «
David yaka kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Saul si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i.
David taa mɔ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see: «Ŋma wese, kóó ge, mi tɛ fe er Saul. Ŋma mɔ n'am tɛ de gan yuu mɔ si nù ko o be Filistii bo na. Saul tɛ e kia'm nú
David in o bíí kɔ‘i gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk kaia ŋmaa yak si tɛ ko Akis, bem ko Maɔk wannu Gat.
David in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛɛ ɔ ye sɛn katɛ Akis sɛn Gat; wa lɛŋ nɛɛ kànà in o kóò kɔ-wa. David nɛɛ in kóò kɔ‘i yiitoo mbɛt: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Ahinɔam zɔŋa Yizreɛl ká bá nɛ̀ Abigail, ko-oi Nabal nɛ̀ ɔ so sɛn Karmɛl.
O bíí nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Saul ndé, David yuu mɔ si Gat kaɗi; ɓɛɛ Saul e kia a̧ duk.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Akis: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋma be fara ha̧‘m sɛn tɛ ŋma ye nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ, ha̧‘m duk sɛnɛ. Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ gasa ye-wan hee ge nde?»
Wese'i Akis ha̧a̧ Siklag ha̧ a̧. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Siklag duk nɛ́ ko o wannu Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
David duka sɛn nù ko o be Filistii pɛ kpɔk nɛ fio-zɛ naar.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David in o bíí kɔ‘i yaka mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi o be Gɛsur, o be Girzi in o be Amalɛk wen wa nɛ o dukbíí nɛ ɔ tɛ nu'i ɓee, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Sur hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ nú Egiptɛ.

David duka ɗaŋ nɛ̀ mɔ sɛn hi̧i̧ lɛŋ; ŋma mɔ n'aa e duk nɛ kpasa bo na; wiwii in okoo lɛŋ a̧ gbɛɛ wa. A̧ kaia o geɗek mɔ-dai in o gasa mɔ-dai hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ tuifuu in o ŋgeloba, ká bá nɛ̀ o laa. Kà a̧ pii, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛɛ tɛ ko Akis.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Akis ak mɔ: «Ɛnɛ bìì nɛ́ o sɔsɔɔ o nde?» Ɓɛɛ David kifa nú‘e, wi nɛɛ bi nɛ́ Nɛgɛb nú Juda, kóó sɛn Nɛgɛb nú Yerameɛl, kóó mana sɛn Nɛgɛb nù Kɛn.
David ba so ŋma okoo, kóó ŋma wiwii nɛ̀ kpasa piinɛ sɛn Gat na; a̧ dee hegɔ wen ka wa tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa ndaa wa. Yuwar deemɔ ko David nɛ dee ŋgimbi n'aa duka nɛnɛ sɛn nú Filistii nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Akis ee ta nɛ̀ David tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «O be
Ŋgimbi'i, o be Filistii mɔi̧a o wi-biro kɔ‘i mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi
David kifa nú ha̧ Akis: «Ɔ dee, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de.»
Akis tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Nɛ́ bòò hegɔ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e mɛ nɛ wi-pɛm-am ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Samuɛl fee so; o be
O be Filistii mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛ́ɛ̀ ba gbagari sɛn Sunɛm. Saul mbɛt mɔi̧a o be
Saul zɔka gbagari ko o be Filistii, kíì dee a̧, ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗɛ-a gɔn nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a.
A̧ aka mɔ in GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú ha̧ a̧ na. GASA WAN hɔ zu ha̧ a̧ na, kifi nú ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ Urim na, kóó nɛ̀ nú
Saul tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí ŋma ko-sa-sɔ̧-fio tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ zɔ́k mɔ ha̧‘m.» O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e, ŋma ko-sa-sɔ̧-fio a̧a̧ sɛn Ɛn-Dɔr.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Saul kpaia tɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ pi̧ nɛ́ o ŋma mbe laa, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak in ŋma bíí yiitoo; wa hɔɔ tɛ ko kóò‘i mɛ zɛ. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò‘i: «Mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ ha̧‘m; wi n'am tɛ sa nin-a ha̧ mɛ‘i, mɛ̀ sá a̧ ha̧‘m.»
Kóò‘i kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ, mɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ Saul dea. A̧ ndaka o wi-sa-sɔ̧-fio tɛ nù'ɛ yinɛ; wen ge mɛ tui pɛr-fio ha̧‘m ge?»
Saul kànà mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ nin GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Hee GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, ŋma ŋgayamɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu mɛ bo na.»
Kóò‘i aka mɔ: «Wi n'am tɛ sa ha̧ mɛ‘i nɛ o?» Saul kifa nú: «Mɛ̀ sá nɛ́ Samuɛl ha̧‘m.»
Kóò‘i zɔka Samuɛl; a̧ hiɗa mɔ nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ Saul: «Wen ge ɛnɛ ɔr am ge? Bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Saul na nde?»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ yu mɔ na; nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ zɔka ge?» Ɓɛɛ kóò‘i kifi nú ha̧ Saul: «Mi zɔk nɛ ŋma sɔ̧-fio nɛ gbo nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ nù.»
Saul aka a̧: «Sɔ̧‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in o?» Kóò‘i kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma sɔkawi a̧ daŋ tɛnɛ; a̧ pi̧i̧ nɛ́ gasa laa tɛ a̧.» Ɓɛɛ Saul iŋ‘e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ Samuɛl; ahai a̧ guu nù ba sɔnti-a hikiɗi nɛ nù.
Samuɛl aka Saul: «Wen ge mɛ nukur'am sa nɛ‘m gbonɛ ge?» Saul kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ dita-see nyɛmna; o be Filistii baa biro dúk nɛ̀‘m, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ ea'm duk. A̧ kifi nú ha̧‘m nɛ nú o
Samuɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Wen ge mɛ ak am ge? Kà GASA WAN a̧ zika ɗoŋ e ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ kifi nɛ́ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ kaɗi, wen ge sa mɛ ak am ge?
GASA WAN dee mɔ in mɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ mɛ nɛ nú‘m ga. A̧ ɓara wan er-mɛ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, ha̧ David.
GASA WAN dee mɔ hegɔ in mɛɛ wen nɛ mɛ zii wen nú-a na, in mɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu Amalɛk na.
GASA WAN tɛ e mɛ in
Ɗɛɗɛ Saul gɔna nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu nù. Bele zara a̧ tɛ wen nɛ Samuɛl tɔ̧a̧‘i; tɛ-a mɔka mbɛt wen n'aa nyɔŋ so mɔ na mɛ tutuyɛ hegɔɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
Kóò‘i tɛɛ pii katɛ Saul; a̧ zɔka'e ŋgai bo tɛ-a na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mboo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́. Mi ee tɛ‘m tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ mi mbo zu tɛ
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m ha̧ brɛt h’ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa ŋgai wen sii ɗoŋ.»
Saul bɛ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ kóò‘i: «Mi beka nyɔŋ ŋma mɔ na.» O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ in kóò‘i dee a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen kɔ-wa. A̧ kura mbɔɗɔnu, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk zu kiti.
Kóò‘i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ ŋma be ndai n'aa dai nɛ̀ de-a. A̧ gɔna be ndai'i nɛ̀ haya-a, a̧ baa fuu, ɓɛɛ a̧ gi nɛ
A̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ Saul in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ; wa lɛŋ nyɔŋa, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ mɛ zɛ‘i.
O be Filistii mɔi̧a o wi-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ sɛn Asɛk; o be
O wannu Filistii yaka ti ha̧ o wi-biro, dùk-aa gɔmŋmaa, in o wi-biro, duk-aa booro. David in o bíí kɔ‘i wee kɔ‘i naŋ biro kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ndaa-gɔtɔ in Akis.
O gasawi Filistii aka mɔ: «O be Hebreu nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ o nde?»
Akis kifa nú ha̧ o gasawi Filistii: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ David wi-de-tom ko Saul, wannu

See o gasawi Filistii nyima zu Akis, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ fó wi’ɛ sinɛ ɗoŋ fara nɛ̀ mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧‘i. Ká a̧ nɛ biro in yɛɛ na, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ zik tɛ-a mɛ bi yɛ. Bo nɛ a̧ nyɛma mɛ gbɛ o bíí k’ɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ ko wannu kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ na nde?
Bo nɛ David nɛ̀ wa e so nɛ̀ gima'e ndé: ‹Saul gbɛɛ bíí booro nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ David gbɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ dɔka-a, nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na’ɛ,› na nde? »

Akis saa David, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ mɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ e'm fara biro, wen nɛ‘m kpa ŋma ɗaŋmɔ sɛn tɛ mɛ na, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese nɛ mɛ tɛɛ nɛnɛ sɛn tɛ kɔ‘m hɔ sɔsɔɔ. Mɔ kpɔk, o dɔka gasawi lɛŋ zɔk mɛ nɛ̀ de yí na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, wen ká o wannu Filistii nɔ‘i tɛɛ kpa ɗaŋsee zu mɛ.»
David aka Akis: «Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m dee ge, nɛ́ ge a̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ɗaŋ yí‘nɛ́ ŋgimbi n'aa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ sɔsɔɔ sa a̧ beka nɛ biro ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ o wisɛn ko nyaa wannu na ge?»
Akis kifa nú ha̧ David: «David, mɛ ɔ dee tɛ‘m hee betom ko Sɔ̧ ga; mɔ kpɔk, o gasawi Filistii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, ká mɛ́ nɛ́ biro in yɛɛ na.
Mɛ in o wi-de-tom ko wan kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ in mɛɛ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr mɛ tutuyɛ sut, kà mɔ be tɛ̀ɛ́ sa̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ sia.»
David in o bíí kɔ‘i kura mɛ gɔnamɔ wen yaka-a mɛ tutuyɛ sut, ha̧ wa mɛ si si nú Filistii, ɓɛɛ o be Filistii daŋ kɔ‘i si Yizreɛl.
Tɛ taar zɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ David in o bíí kɔ‘i hɔɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Siklag, o be Amalɛk ɓara mɔ sɛn Nɛgɛb in sɛn Siklag; wa ɗaŋa ye Siklag, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ wee sɛnɛ.
Wa kaia o okoo, o obem in o gasawi lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ ŋma bíí kpɔk na. Wa kaia wa lɛŋ yak nɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ David in o bíí kɔ‘i pia hɔ saaye, wa zɔka ndé, ye bia wee lɛŋ; wa kaia o kóò kɔ-wa, o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a yaknɛ.
David in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ ku̧u̧ naŋ hiɗa mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a; wa hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧, ŋgai kaɗa tɛ-wa lɛŋ fara hiɗa mɔ.
Wa kaia o kóò ko David yiitoo lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ. Nin o kóò nɔ‘i nɛ́ Ahinɔam zɔŋa Yizreɛl in Abigail, ko-oi Nabal, be Karmɛl.

See David ɗaŋa nyɛmna wen o bíí lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ wen yoo a̧ nɛ ta gbɛ yinɛ. Nú o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ paŋ paŋ; o ndé ta nɛ o bem kɔ‘i mɛ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-a. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David kpaa mbe ŋgai wen zu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abiatar wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bem ko Ahimɛlɛk: «Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ; mɛ̀ bá laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.» Ɓɛɛ Abiatar ba laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
David nɛ̀ɛ̀ ak mɔ in GASA WAN; a̧ aka mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Kà‘m ndak pata o wi nɔ'ɔ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kpa wa nde?» GASA WAN kifa nú: «Mɛ̀ ndák pata wa, mɛ tɛ kpa wa, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ gbo o bíí kɔ-mɛ.»
David kura in o bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ nú be-zer Bezɔr, ɓɛɛ o ŋma bíí kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔn kɔ‘i hi̧i̧.
O bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo ɓɔna kɔ‘i hi̧i̧ wen wa mbɔia so nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm mɛ ku be-zer Bezɔr na. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David in o bíí gɔmŋmaa-naar ndaka ɗoŋ o wi-ɓar-mɔ yaknɛ.
Wa nɛɛ kpa ŋma be Egiptɛ poo zɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa ba a̧ tɛnɛ ha̧ David. Wa ha̧a̧ brɛt ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɔŋ; wa ha̧a̧ yì ha̧ a̧, a̧ nɔ mbɛt.
Wa ha̧a̧ makala waya-mbɔra ha̧ a̧ in sikila kora waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ yiitoo; a̧ nyɔŋa, ɓɛɛ zu-a pii ɗoŋ. A̧ nyɔŋ so mɔ in nɔ yì na tɛ zɛ taar.
David aka a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ bíí ko o? Mɛ́ tɛ́ nɛ̀ déè?» A̧ kifa nú: «Mi nɛ́ be-ŋgai Egiptɛ, bara ko ŋma be Amalɛk. Wan kɔ‘m ea'm duk wen nɛ tɛ‘m nyim nyim zɛ taar kinii.
Nɛ́ ɛɛ a̧ ɓara mɔ sɛn Nɛgɛb, nù ko o be Kɛrɛt, Nɛgɛb wan mɛ Juda in sɛn Nɛgɛb, nù ko Kalɛb. Ɛɛ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ ye Siklag mbɛt.»

David aka a̧: «Mɛ tɛ mgbɔ‘m nɛnɛ ɗoŋ o wi-ɓar-mɔ nɔ‘i nde?» A̧ kifa nú: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kán mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ nin GASA WAN ndé, ɛnɛ beka gbɛ‘m na, in ɛnɛ beka ha̧‘m si ɗoŋ ha̧ wan kɔ‘m na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ nɛnɛ ɗoŋ o wi-ɓar-mɔ.»
A̧ mgbɔɔ David nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká o be Amalɛk pɛsa so pɛsi dam fara lɛŋ nyɔŋ nɛ̀ mɔ, nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ, de nɛ̀ gbaŋa nɛ̀ o dɔka mɔ nɛ̀ wa kaia so piinɛ nɛ̀ nù ko o be Filistii in nɛ̀ nú Juda.
David gbɛɛ wa ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ gɔna-ndaa-zan hegɔ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ; ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara wa nɛ duka kpasa bo na; kànà nɛ́ o be-ŋgaiwi gɔmŋmaa-naar nɛ̀ daŋa ŋgeloba yu nɛ̀ mɔ yak ɓɛɛ.
David kaia o mɔ nɛ o be Amalɛk kaia so lɛŋ. A̧ kaia o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo'i mbɛt.

Ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ ɓɔna mgbara o bem in o gasawi bo na. O geɗek mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ o wi-ɓar-mɔ kaia so hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ gasa mɔ lɛŋ, o mbɔi, o bem kɔ-wa mɛ wiwii hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o be-okoo-a lɛŋ, mɔ nɛ o wi nɔ‘i kaia so lɛŋ, David kaia si ɗoŋ.
David kaia o geɗek mɔ-dai hɔ tɛ o gasa-a lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ ya ti kɔr nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai nɔ‘i tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔk mɔɔ-oi-biro ko David!»

David pia ɗoŋ kpa o oi bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ mbɔia so, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kpa so ŋgai mɛ nɛ in a̧ na, o wan n'aa ee so ká̧ be-zer Bezɔr. Wa gboo we ti David in o bíí nɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so in a̧; David ɗɔŋa pii ti in o wi-biro kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ fan wa.

Ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ in o wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ na nɛ nɛɛ so in David tɔ̧ nɛ̀ hee ger: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa nɛ in yɛɛ na ga, ɛɛ beka ha̧ o ŋma mɔɔ-oi-biro n’ɛɛ kaia piinɛ, yak zu kóò kɔ-wa in o bem kɔ-wa ha̧ wa na. Wa a̧ káí nɛ́ wa, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ yák.»
Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧: «O nya'm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hegɔ zu mɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na. A̧ gbaka yɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo o wi nɛ ɓara mɔ k’ɛɛ a kɔ̧ er yɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ o nde? Wi nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ́ biro in wi nɛ pɛma tui tɛ kpa mɔ nyɛm ŋmaa. Wa tɛ kɛ̧ mɔ in o ŋmaa.»
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese'i, yuwar kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ‘i kifa nɛ́ heembea in yuwar duka-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ nɛ̀ duk hɔ sɔsɔɔ sɛn

Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ sɛn Siklag kaɗi, David toma war mɔɔ-oi-biro ko o gasawi Juda ha̧ wa, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye kɔ-wa. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen e zu mɔɔ-oi-biro'i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ n'am kaia tɛ ɓaramɔ sɛn er o wisɛn ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am tom war k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i.»
A̧ toma ŋma ha̧ o wi Bɛtɛl, ha̧ o wi Ramot sɛn Nɛgɛb in o wi Yatir,
ha̧ o wi Arɔɛr, ha̧ o bíí Sifɛmɔt, ha̧ o bíí Ɛstɛmɔa;
ha̧ o bíí Rakal, ha̧ o bíí mɛ saaye Yerameɛl, ha̧ o bíí tɛ o ye ko o bezaŋ Kɛn,
ha̧ o bíí Ɔrma in o bíí Bɔr-Asaŋ, ha̧ o bíí Atak,
in ha̧ o bíí sɛn Hebrɔŋ. A̧ toma mɔ dam fara n'aa duka so sɛnɛ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
O be Filistii baa biro dúk nɛ̀
O be Filistii nasa Saul in o bem kɔ‘i. Wa gbɛɛ Jɔnataŋ, Abinadab ká bá nɛ̀ Malki-Sua; wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ bem ko Saul.
Biro kinii mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ nasi nɛ Saul. O wi-pi̧-góò kɔɓa a̧; ɓɛɛ kíì ba a̧ tɛ zɔka wa.

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧: «Mɛ̀ dák gba-paa kɔ-mɛ tok nɛ‘m gbɛ yinɛ, wen ká o wi-mbii-bɔr nɔ'ɔ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ ká wa mam am.» Ɓɛɛ baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧‘i kɔ̧ na, wen kíì dee a̧ nyɛmna. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Saul daka gba-paa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ hɔ̧fi̧ tik yí-a.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ baka-nyaŋa'i zɔka'e, Saul fea ga, a̧ mbɛt daka gba-paa kɔ̧-a̧ gbɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe in a̧ mbɛt.
Saul in o bem kɔ‘i taar in baka-nyaŋa kɔ‘i gu nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ fee kpɔk wese'i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be
Ɔɔ mɔ sa̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ o be Filistii tɛ mɛ zɔk o wɔr wen ha̧ wa mɛ kai o mɔ kɔ-wa. Wa tɛɛ kpa Saul in o bem kɔ‘i taar nɛ̀ fea zu kaya Gilboa.
Wa ɓira zu Saul, wa kaia o boi-biro kɔ̧-a̧; wa kaia o mɔɔ-de-biro nɔ‘i usi nɛnɛ dam nú Filistii lɛŋ. Wa hura nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in o dukbíí kɔ-wa.
Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ a o mɔɔ-de-biro ko Saul sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa Astarte, ɓɛɛ ko wɔr-aa, wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ mgboi zaŋ garo ye Bɛt-Seaŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o bíí saaye Yabɛs sɛn nú Galad zia nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ o be Filistii dee in Saul'i,
o ŋgaŋa wi-biro lɛŋ baa yuwar yak, mɛ zɛ mɛ zɛ; wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ kai wɔr Saul in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ŋgeŋ Bɛt-Seaŋ yinɛ pii sɛn Yabɛs, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ́ɛ̀ dɔ.
Wa kaia o gba̧a̧-tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gun sɛn ɗɔɔ ŋma be te
Ɗoŋ nɛ Saul fea, David pia nɛ̀ fara n'aa nɛ̀ɛ̀ bi o be Amalɛk sɛnɛ. A̧ duka sɛn Siklag zɛ yiitoo.
Tɛ taar zɛ, ŋma bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ gbagari ko Saul; laa kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ka̧ a̧k, ɓɛɛ zu-a lɛŋ nɛ́ fuunu. A̧ hɔa katɛ David, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔ̧fi̧ gu yí-a nù.
David aka a̧: «Mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ déè nde?»
Wi’ɛi kifa nú: «Mi yu mɔ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be
David aka a̧ woyo: «Mɔ yaka hee ge? Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m!»
Wi’ɛi kifa nú: «O be
David aka betom'i: «Mɛ dee hee ge iŋ nɛnɛ‘e Saul in bem kɔ‘i Jɔnataŋ fea ge?»
Betom'i kifa nú: «Mi yara so kɔ‘m nɛnɛ sɔɔ géè si zu kaya Gilboa; mi zɔka Saul nɛ ɛk tɛ nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o keekee-biro in wi-daŋ-nyaŋa nasi nɛ́ a̧.
A̧ zika tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk am. A̧ saa'm, ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ sara.
A̧ aka'm'e, mi nɛ́ ge bíí ge? Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e, mi nɛ́ be Amalɛk.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mi ai nú‘m ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ dúk katɛ‘m, a̧ mɛ̀ gbɛ́‘m wen yí‘m zik zik, kóó nɛ̀ oi ŋgai nɛ ɓɔna tɛ‘m'i.›
Mi ɓɔna katɛ a̧ ɓɛɛ mi gbɛ a̧, wen mi iŋa a̧ beka kpasi ɗoŋ yoo nù kɔ̧-a̧ na. Mi baa
David a̧ka̧ laa tɛ a nù; o bíí nɛ yaa in a̧ lɛŋ dee hegɔ mbɛt.
Wa hi̧a̧ fio, ɓɛɛ wa zim yì mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ wen zu Saul in bem kɔ‘i Jɔnataŋ, wen dukbíí ko GASA WAN in o bíí nutua ko
David aka betom'i woyo: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ be ge ye ge?»
Betom'i kifa nú ha̧ David: «Mi nɛ́ bem ko ŋma be Amalɛk nɛ duk nɛ́ gɛnɛ.»
David aka a̧ woyo: «Mɛ dee hee ge sa kíì de mɛ tɛ baa er-mɛ gbɛ nɛ wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́-wan a zu a̧ na ge nde?»
David saa ŋma ŋgaiwi kɔ‘i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti, a̧ mɛ̀ gbɛ́ a̧.» Ɓɛɛ be-ŋgaiwi'i gbɛ a̧.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu a̧: «Tɔk tɛ-mɛ a̧ sí ɗoŋ zu mɛ, wen nɛ́ nú-mɛ a̧ gbɛɛ mɛ, wen nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, nɛ́ wi a̧ gbɛɛ wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧.»
Gima nɛ David dee zu fio ko Saul in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔnataŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ usi gima'i ha̧ o bezaŋ Juda. Mɛ nɛ́ «Aia-nú zu kusaa.» Wa yɔra gima'i zaŋ Kalata ko Wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a. Gima'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Oee mi,
O gasawi kɔ-mɛ fee zu o kaya kɔ-mɛ!
O ŋgaŋa-wi aa nù kaɗi!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ-a hɔ sɛn nú Gat na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ-a nɛ̀ yuwar Askelɔŋ nɛnɛ na;
«wen ká tortɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ ba o be-zɔŋa Filistii,
wen ká o be-zɔŋa ko o mbii-bɔr tɛ̀ɛ́ de nyɛŋɛ.
«O kaya Gilboa, ká mbɛŋ wai zu'nɛ́ na,
ká kórò hɔ a zu'nɛ́ na mbɛt,
ká nyɔnɔ dɛm kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna,
wen ŋgee ko o ŋgaŋa-wi baa ndiŋ sɛn hi̧i̧;
Saul sɔ̧ nɔ̧́ tɛ ŋgee kɔ‘i ɓɔna.
Nɔ̧́-sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgee kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧
in nɔ̧́-tɛ o ŋgaŋa-wi;
kusaa ko Jɔnataŋ e so o wisɛn kɔ‘i géè na;
gba-paa ko Saul pii so ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ́ biro sɔɔ géè na.
«Ho! Saul in Jɔnataŋ,
o bíí n’ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so,
wa kɛ̧ tɛ nɛ̀ ŋmaa na tɛ duka-kpasa kɔ-wa hɔ tɛ fio;
wa haia gan zua, wa ŋgaia gan dila.
«O be-zɔŋa
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ Saul nɛ̀ duka so a nɛ́ gbɛ̧ laa,
in mbɔi-tɛ tɛ‘nɛ́,
nɛ̀ duka so wai laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ lɔr.
O ŋgaŋa-wi aa nù sɛn yí biro!
Jɔnataŋ ɔ nù zu kaya mɛ!
«Nya'm! Jɔnataŋ!
Fio kɔ-mɛ nyima tɛ‘m.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ nyɛmna;
gana
Ho! O ŋgaŋa-wi aa nù,
o boi-biro ɗaŋa kaɗi!»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, David aka GASA WAN: «A̧‘m nɛ́ si ŋma ye nú Juda nde?»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧. «Mɛ̀ nɛ̀.»
David aka GASA WAN woyo: «A̧‘m nɛ́ si déè nde?»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Si Hebrɔŋ.»
David in o kóò kɔ‘i yiitoo, Ahinɔam zɔŋa Yizreɛl, in Abigail zɔŋa Karmɛl, ko-oi Nabal, kaia ŋmaa si hi̧i̧.
O bíí ko David in o nam kɔ-wa daŋa in a̧, ɓɛɛ wa de ye sɛn Hebrɔŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Juda tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu David ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu wa.
Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ David'e, nɛ́ o be Yabɛs nú Galad a̧ guna Saul.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David toma o betom ha̧ o be Yabɛs nú Galad'e, GASA WAN a̧ tók de yoŋgo ha̧ wa, wen gasa demɔ nɛ wa dea gun nɛ̀ Saul wannu kɔ-wa;
GASA WAN a̧ zɔ́k wa nɛ de yí, a̧ a̧ gbák wa, ɓɛɛ wi mbɛt, wi tɛ de demɔ in wa, wen mɔ nɛ wa dea'i.
Wa a̧ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, wa a̧ yór nɛ̀ nɔa-a; Saul wannu kɔ-wa fee kaɗi, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘i, wa a̧ íŋ mbɛt'e, o bíí nutua ko Juda tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-wi ha'i mɛ ɔ wan zu wa.
Nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi'i, Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr, wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko Saul baa Isbosɛt, bem ko Saul yu nɛ mɔ yak si Mahanayim,
ɓɛɛ de ha̧ Isbosɛt mɛ ɔ wan zu Galad, zu o be Asɛr, zu Yizreɛl, zu Efraim, zu Bɛnjamin in zu
Isbosɛt, bem ko Saul kpaa so pɛ ɓu-naar ŋgimbi nɛ wa dee nɛ wan ha̧ a̧ zu
War ko o bíí nutua ko Juda, wa kpɛka kɔ-wa nɛ́ David mɛ ɔ wan zu wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ David ɔɔ nɛ wan zu nutua Juda sɛn Hebrɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Abnɛr, bem ko Nɛr in o ŋma bíí ko Isbosɛt bem ko Saul gboo biro nɛ̀ Mahanayim si Gabaɔŋ.
Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya in o bíí ko David gboo biro mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa wa ká̧ tɔp Gabaɔŋ. Wa hɔa, ɓɛɛ wa yor: o bíí ko Isbosɛt nɛ̀ kur, o bíí ko David nɛ̀ kur.
Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «O ŋgaiwi a̧ kúr, wa a̧ bí ŋmaa ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔk.»
Jɔab kifa nú: «Wa a̧ kúr.»
Wa kura ɓɛɛ wa tɔr wa. O wi-biro ko Bɛnjamin ɓu-zua-yiitoo kura nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Isbosɛt bem ko Saul, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro ɓu-zua-yiitoo kur nɛ̀ ɗoŋ David mbɛt.

Kóó o ndé tika ger bíí kɔ‘i. Wa kasa nɛ ger ŋmaa yiitoo yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa yur gba-paa ɔm ŋmaa nyɛm ŋmaa. Wa kaia ŋmaa a nù lɛŋ nɛ fio. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧ wa saa nɛ̀ nin fara'i ndé: «Fara ko o wi-duk-zu nɛ̀ ŋmaa.»
Biro baa dik wese'i. O bíí ko David gbina biro ti Abnɛr in o be
O bem ko Sɛruya taar a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧: mɛ nɛ́ Jɔab, Abisai in Asahɛl. Asahɛl duka so nɛ́ wi-ma-yì hee kalamba ga.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Asahɛl duka ɗoŋ Abnɛr nɛ̀ maa yì; a̧ a̧r si wiiko kóó si gale na.
Abnɛr zika tɛ, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Asahɛl, nɛ́ mɛ́ nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Asahɛl kifi nú: «Nɛ́ mí.»
Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ war wiiko, kóó nɛ̀ war gale, mɛ̀ bá ŋma wi-biro, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kɔ-mɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Asahɛl kɔ̧ mɛ e a̧ duk na.
Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Asahɛl woyo: «Mɛ̀ yú siɓi katɛ‘m, ká mɛ ndak am na, ká‘m tok mɛ pi̧ nù. Kà‘m tok mɛ gbɛ, mi tɛ hú̧í̧ yí‘m zɔk yí zɔmwi kɔ-mɛ Jɔab hee ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Asahɛl kɔ̧ yua-a na. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr toka zaŋ-aa nɛ̀ ndaa sɛ́ɛ̀ sar, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔ̧fi̧ yo nù fe. Kóó o ndé nɛ hɔ fara nɛ Asahɛl yoo nù fe sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ yora.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab in Abisai ndaka ɗoŋ Abnɛr. Wa hɔɔ zu kaya Ama, ɓɛɛ ká wese a̧ ye'i. Kaya'i duk nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese ko Gia, yuwar ŋga-gbárà Gabaɔŋ.
O be Bɛnjamin mɔi̧a ŋmaa kpɔk duk ɗoŋ Abnɛr, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ yor zu ŋma kaya.
Abnɛr saa Jɔab, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Gba-paa beka kaɗi gbɛɛ bíí ɓɔna nde? Mɛ́ íŋ ndé mɔ‘i tɛ kaɗi nɛ ɗaŋ-a na nde? Mɛ pɛm nɛ ge mɛ dor o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ ndaka o nya-wa gbɛ nɛnɛ ge nde?»
Jɔab kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ duk kpasa ga, kà mɛ tɔ̧ so wen'i na, bó nɛ́ o wi-biro kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi ndaka o nya-wa na mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ.»
Jɔab dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro yor, wa kaɗa ndaka o be
Abnɛr in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ nɛ̀ zɛ ɓir nɛ Araba, ku nɛ Jurdɛn, ɓir nɛ Bitrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ Mahanayim.
Jɔab kaɗa ndaka Abnɛr ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. O bíí ko David nɛ fee nɛ́ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ká bá nɛ̀ Asahɛl.
O wi-biro ko David gbɛɛ o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in o bíí ko Abnɛr gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Wa baa Asahɛl sinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun a̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm. Jɔab in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ zɛ nɛ zɛ, kà mɔ tɛ́ sa̧, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ sɛn Hebrɔŋ.
Biro duka ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in o bíí nutua ko David. David ŋgai ŋgai siti, ɓɛɛ o bíí nutua ko Saul tir kɔ‘i tir si ɗɔɔ.
David koo o bem sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Kaya-bem nɛ́ Amnɔŋ; nɛ́ Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl a̧ koa a̧.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Kilɛab; nɛ́ Abigail ko-oi Nabal be Karmɛl a̧ koo a̧. Taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm; nɛ́ Maka boko-bem ko Talmai, wannu Gɛsur a̧ koo a̧.
Naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias; nɛ́ Hagit a̧ koo a̧. Mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sefatia; nɛ́ Abital a̧ koo a̧.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam; nɛ́ Egla kóò ko David a̧ koo a̧. O bem nɛ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Mɔ nɛ̀ yaka ŋgimbi biro mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in ko David nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ŋgai ko Abnɛr daŋ daŋ siti zu o bíí ko Saul.
Ŋma kóò ko Saul duka so, nin-a nɛ́ Rispa, boko-bem ko Aya. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Isbosɛt nɛɛ ak Abnɛr zu kóò‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge mɛ ɔɔ in kóò ko dáà kɔ‘m ge?»

Abnɛr kpaa ɗaŋsee tɛ wen'i ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ toyo ko Juda sɛka'm de mɔ hegɔ nde? Sɔsɔɔ, mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ mboozu sitɛ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ Saul, sitɛ o nya-a̧ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Mi e mɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ tik kɔ̧ er David na. Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m wen zu kóò'ɛ!
GASA WAN kana so mɔ‘e, wi tɛ ba wan yinɛ er o bíí nutua ko Saul, bá nɛ́ David e zu damti
Isbosɛt hu̧i̧ géé nú ha̧ Abnɛr na, wen kíí Abnɛr de nɛ a̧.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr toma o betom nɛnɛ ha̧ David nɛ̀ nin wi. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nù nɛ́ ko o? Mɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in am, ɓɛɛ mi gbaka mɛ mɔi̧ nɛ̀ o be
David kifa nú: «Ɔ dee, mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ak nɛ mɔ kpɔk er mɛ. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tɛ mɛ zɔk am, kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ baa Mikal, boko-bem ko Saul tɛ nɛnɛ na, ká mɛ́ tɛ na.»
David toma o betom ha̧ Isbosɛt, bem ko Saul hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tóm kóò kɔ‘m Mikal n'am ha̧a̧ mbɔi-a nɛ mbii ko o be Filistii gɔmŋmaa piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧‘m.»
Isbosɛt toma nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kóò‘i tɛ ko wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Paltiɛl bem ko Lais.
Wíì kɔ̧-a̧ nɛɛ in a̧. A̧ nɛa ɗoŋ-aa hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ hɔ Bahurim. Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ yák, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr ee zu-wen in o gasawi
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ kinii ŋgaɓo! Zɔ́k, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu David'e, wi tɛ gbo dukbíí kɔ‘i, o be
Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ o be Bɛnjamin, ɓɛɛ yak si Hebrɔŋ tɛ David mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be
Abnɛr in o bíí ɓu-yiitoo nɛɛ tɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ mɛ; ɓɛɛ David de gasa nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ in o bíí nɛ nɛɛ in a̧.
Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o be
O wi-biro ko David in Jɔab pii so kɔ‘i pii nɛ̀ yí biro, kai nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a piinɛ. Abnɛr bo so kɔ‘i in David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ɓɔna, wen nɛ̀ David ee so a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Jɔab in o wi-biro kɔ‘i hɔa, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr tɛɛ hɔ oi'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔk nɛ wannu David, ɓɛɛ wannu David e war ha̧ a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
Jɔab nɛɛ kpa wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ ge ɛnɛ dea’ɛ ge? Abnɛr tɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wen ge ɛnɛ ee a̧ yak hegɔ ge?
Ɛnɛ iŋ Abnɛr, bem ko Nɛr na nde? A̧ tɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔr'nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpe naŋ nɛɛ-nɔ̀ in pia-ɗoŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ de!»
Jɔab gboo nɛ̀ tɛ́ David, ɓɛɛ tom o betom nɛnɛ ɗoŋ Abnɛr. Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa a̧ ká̧ gɔna-yì Sira, ɓɛɛ wa sa a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ; David iŋ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Abnɛr pia ɗoŋ hɔ Hebrɔŋ, Jɔab mgbɔɔ a̧ yaknɛ si ká̧ nú garo hee a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ ŋma ga̧a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok a̧ tɛ zaŋ, kifi nɛ̀ er tɔk-tɛ nya-a̧ Asahɛl.
Ŋgimbi nɛ David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi in mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m lɛŋ, ɛɛ bo k’ɛɛ ɗɔɔ fom ti GASA WAN wen tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr na.
Tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr a̧ tík nɛ zu Jɔab in o bíí nutua kɔ‘i! Zɛɛ tɔk in doko a̧ bá o bíí nutua ko Jɔab. Wa a̧ ɓɔ́sí, kóó wa a̧ fé nɛ́ fio gba-paa, kóó san a̧ bá wa.»
Jɔab in nya-a̧ Abisai gbɛɛ Abnɛr, wen n'aa gbɛɛ so nya kɔ-wa Asahɛl tɛ biro Gabaɔŋ.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ duk in a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ á̧k laa tɛ‘nɛ́ a nù; ɛ̀nɛ̀ á nɛ laa-bufu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím fio ko Abnɛr.» Wannu David duka ɗoŋ mɔɔ-gɔ-fio.
Wa guna Abnɛr sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Wannu taŋa kɔ̧a̧-fio Abnɛr zik nɛ pɛsi, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧ mbɛt.
Wannu dee gima-fio’ɛ zu Abnɛr:
«Abnɛr tɛɛ fe so nɛ́ ŋga fio hegɔ nde?
Bo nɛ wa hɛra so nɛ er-mɛ na,
bo nɛ wi aa so nɛ nyak-boi naŋ-mɛ na!
Mɛ tika nù fe hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i fe nɛnɛ ti o wi-gbɛ-zu’ɛ ga!»
Ɓɛɛ dukbíí a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio siti.
Dukbíí ɗafa mɔ ha̧ David mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, ká zɛ tɛ de na, ɓɛɛ David kan mɔ; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Sɔ̧ a̧ dé ŋgamɔ in am, a̧ a̧ dé mbe-a woyo kà‘m nɛ́ foo nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ nú‘m sɔsɔɔ nɛti ha̧ yee-wese!»
Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ zɔka mɔ nɛ wannu dea, ɓɛɛ kpa desee, wen mɔ nɛ wannu dea'i lɛŋ, o bíí kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa.
Wese'i, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ in o be
Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i: «Ɛ́nɛ́ íŋ ndé ŋma gasa wi-duk-ti fee sɛn
War kɔ‘m, sɔsɔɔ, kóó nɛ̀ oi nɔ̧́-wan nɛ wa tɛna a zu'm'i, mi nɛ́ ziɓa-wi. O bem ko Sɛruya ŋgaia gan am, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ ko wi’ɛi.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ Isbosɛt bem ko Saul zia'e, Abnɛr fea sɛn Hebrɔŋ, tɛ-a gbina, ɓɛɛ o be

Isbosɛt bem ko Saul a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gasawi ko o wi-biro yiitoo. Nin kuti-a nɛ́ Baana; nin ɓii-aa nɛ́ Rekab. Wa nɛ́ o bem ko Rimɔŋ, ŋma bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ duka sɛn Bɛrot, wen Bɛrot duka so nɛ́ ŋma ye tɛ nú Bɛnjamin.
O kuti be Bɛrot yuu so mɔ hu̧si sɛn Gitayim, ɓɛɛ wa de ye hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.

Ŋma bem ko Jɔnataŋ, be-koo Saul duka so nɛ̀ ku yiitoo mɔka mɔk. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ nyɛrɛ fio ko Saul in Jɔnataŋ hɔɔ nɛnɛ nɛ Yizreɛl. Kó-dai-bem’ɛi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ ba a̧ yu nɛ mɔ yak, ɓɛɛ tɛ maa yì yu nɛ mɔ, bem’ɛi tika nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa kum. Nin bem’ɛi nɛ́ Mɛfibosɛt.
O bem ko Rimɔŋ be Bɛrot, Rekab in Bana yaka, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi kpɔra wese sɛn nutua ko Isbosɛt, ká a̧ ɔ nɛ́ ya-wese.

Rekab in nya-wi Bana yee kɔ̧ tua hee wa ba nɛ alkamaari nɛnɛ ga; ŋgimbi nɛ wa yee kɔ̧ tua, Isbosɛt nyafa so gɔn gado bɛr tua-ɔɔ kɔ̧-a̧. Wa toka a̧ tɛ zaŋ-aa gbɛ; wa ɓira ger-a ba zu-a yak. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa baa yuwar Araba yak nɛ zɛ nɛ zɛ.

Wa baa zu Isbosɛt nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu David sɛn Hebrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k zu Isbosɛt bem ko Saul, wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ‘nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧. GASA WAN ee war ha̧ wannu mɛ kifi er zu Saul in o bezaŋ-aa sɔsɔɔ.»
David kifa nú ha̧ Rekab in nya-wi Bana, o bem ko Rimɔŋ, be Bɛrot; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk kpasa nɛ̀ gboo am tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ lɛŋ,
wi nɛ̀ baa nyɛrɛ fio ko Saul tɛnɛ ha̧‘m, zia so kɔ‘i'e, wi baa nɛ́ de nyɛrɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m. Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi baa a̧ gbɛ sɛn Siklag yoɓi nɛ̀ de nyɛrɛmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-gbɛ-zu nɛ kura nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ wi nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ na, nɛ̀ ɔ nɛ́ nù kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i géè, mi beka ak tɔk tɛ-a er'nɛ́ na nde? Mi beka gbɛ‘nɛ́ yinɛ na nde?»
Ɓɛɛ David ha̧ nú ha̧ o ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ. Wa ɓira er-wa in naŋ-wa, ga̧i̧ ká̧ tɔp Hebrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko gɔɔ-zu Isbosɛt, wa baa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun kɔ̧ pɛsi ko Abnɛr sɛn Hebrɔŋ.
O zuduk be
Nɛti, ká Saul ɓɔna tɛ wan zu yɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ duka so mgbɔ nɛ̀ o be
O gasawi
David a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛna nɛ̀ nɔ̧́ a zu-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-naar.
A̧ ɔɔ wan zu Juda sɛn Hebrɔŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu

David in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛɛ mɛ bi Jerusalɛm in o bíí Jebus nɛ yaa so sɛn hi̧i̧. Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «David, mɛ beka nyɛm mɛ ye hɛ̧ɛ̧ na; kóó nɛ o wi-boma-yí in o wi-kum tɛ ndak mɛ.» Mɔ‘i nɛ́ yuwar tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ David'e a̧ beka nyɛm mɛ ba ye na.
Ɓɛɛ kóó hegɔ‘i, David baa ŋgárá
Wese'i, David tɔ̧a̧: «Wi nɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ gusi o be Jebus a̧ a̧ bá nɛ́ yuwar yì nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ nù nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ̀ wa. Wa nɛ́ géé o wi-kum in o wi-boma-yí géè. Mi sɛna wa pi̧-er tɛ wee.
David baa fara kɔ̧ ŋgárá‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin fara'i'e: «
Ŋgai ko David gasi gasi siti; ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o gíí wi-biro duka so in a̧.
Hiram wannu Tir toma o betom ha̧ David nɛ̀ o te
David zɔka'e GASA WAN ee a̧ nɛ̀ wan zu
David kaia o ŋma mbe kóò woyo sɛn Jerusalɛm ɗoŋ n'aa hɔɔ nɛnɛ Hebrɔŋ. A̧ koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Nin o bem n'aa koo sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Samua, Sobab, Nataŋ, Salomɔŋ,
Yibar, Elisua, Nɛfɛg, Yafia,
Elisama, Elyada in Elifɛlɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be Filistii zia ndé, wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu David ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu
O be Filistii hɔa, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi dam kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Refaim lɛŋ.
David aka GASA WAN: «A̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ bi o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ a wa kɔ̧ er-am nde?»
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ David: «Mɛ̀ nɛ̀, mi tɛ a wa kɔ̧ er mɛ.»

David kura yak si Bal-Pɛrasim, tik wa nɛ̀ biro; a̧ gbina biro ti wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN hu̧i̧a̧ war ha̧‘m mgbara o wisɛn kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yì gbin nɛ̀ gba-zu’ɛ ga.» Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ wa saa nɛ̀ nin fara'i'e «Bal-Pɛrasim»; nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧, «Wi-gbin-gba-zu.»
O be Filistii siŋa o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ‘i e duk yu mɔ yak, ɓɛɛ David in o bíí kɔ‘i kai o mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O be Filistii tɛɛ woyo, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi dam kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Refaim.
David aka GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ nɛ́ nɛ̀ war sɔnti wa, bi nɛ wa na; mɛ̀ háí nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa nɛ̀ ti te-nyama.
Kà mɛ zii giti naŋ bíí fara nɛ nɔ zu te-nyama, mɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ nɔa-a; nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ duk ti ha̧ mɛ wen bíí o wi-biro ko o be Filistii.»
David dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum o be Filistii sɛn Geba hɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Gesɛr.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David mɔi̧a o ŋgaŋa wi-biro nú
David in o wi-biro nɛ̀ nɛ́ in a̧‘i yee yuwar mɛ yak si Baala nù Juda, wen ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba
Wa nɛɛ ba kuɓa'i kɔ̧ tua ko Abinadab nɛ̀ duk zu kaya e zu mbe keekee ba yaknɛ. Nɛ́ o bem ko Abinadab yiitoo, Uza in Ahio a̧ bàà báá mbe keekee-gɔ-kuɓa'i.
Wa baa kuɓa gbonɛ kɔ̧ tua ko Abinadab nɛ̀ duk zu kaya yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Ahio a̧ duk ti.
David in o be
Wa hɔɔ fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Nakɔŋ, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o ndai foo mɔ, ɓɛɛ Uza nyɛi̧ er mɛ kasi kuɓa wen ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tik nù.
Nyimsea ko GASA WAN kura zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ a̧ wen zu yɔɔ-kaya'i; a̧ fee ká̧ kuɓa ko GASA WAN.
See David ɗaŋa wen nɛ Sɔ̧ dee ŋgayamɔ in Uza, ɓɛɛ wa a nin fara'i'e Pɛrɛs-Uza,
Kíí GASA WAN dee David wese'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Kuɓa ko GASA WAN tɛ tɛ pii tɛ kɔ‘m hee ge?»
David bɛ̧ɛ̧ baa Kuɓa ko GASA WAN si tɛ kɔ‘i sɛn
Kuɓa ko GASA WAN dee fio-zɛ taar sɛn tɛ ko Obɛd-Edɔm be Gat, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tok de yoŋgo zu Obɛd-Edɔm in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu David ndé, GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu Obɛd-Edɔm in o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen zu kuɓa ko Sɔ̧. David nɛa tɛ ko Obɛd-Edɔm, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ piinɛ pii tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ tortɛ.
Kà o wi-ba-kuɓa ko GASA WAN hu̧i̧ naŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ David gbɛɛ wiwii ndai kpɔk in ŋmaŋa be ndai kpɔk ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧.
David yɔ kɔ‘i nɛ yɔyɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai-tɛ lɛŋ zik nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN; a̧ pii so nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod tɛ-a.
David in o be
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kuɓa ko GASA WAN ye nɛ saaye ko David ga, Mikal, boko-bem ko Saul, kóò ko David zɔka mɔ nɛ̀ woi-tua. A̧ zɔka wannu David nɛ kpíɗí zik nɛnɛ ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba a̧ e tɛ geemɔ.
Wa baa kuɓa ko GASA WAN ye nɛ̀ tua, ɓɛɛ wa e a̧ sɛn fara kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ David ɗafa so nɛti sɛn see tua. David dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in a̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ wen kpaa ga̧a̧mɔ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ David kaɗa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ɗafa sɔ̧ wen kpaa ga̧a̧mɔ kaɗi, a̧ toka de yoŋgo zu o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o gíí wi-biro.
A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ, ha̧ o gíí be

Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ David si nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i wen toka de yoŋgo zu o bíí nutua kɔ‘i ga, Mikal boko-bem ko Saul wee ti a̧ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ tortɛ nɛ̀ pi̧ wannu sɔsɔɔ'ɛ, ho! Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wannu a̧ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ géé zaŋ ti o kó-de-tom ko o ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧, hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma géé bíí a̧ de mɔ ga’ɛ nde?»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David kifa nú ha̧ Mikal: «Mi yɔ yɔyɛ ti GASA WAN, nɛ̀ hoka'm e dáà kɔ-mɛ in o bíí nutua kɔ‘i lɛŋ duk, mɛ́ ba'm e nɛ̀ wan zu
War kɔ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m, mi tɛ duk si ɗɔɔ gan kuti-a, mi tɛ de ko nɛ̀ tɛ‘m mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o kó-de-tom nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i, wa tɛ tu̧ tɛ‘m.»
Ɗoŋ wese'i, Mikal bem ko Saul yara kànà nɛ ndɔra hegɔ kpa fe nɛnɛ.
Kinii, David duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i nɛ desee; GASA WAN gboo a̧ yinɛ er o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yaa so zik a̧ lɛŋ.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nataŋ,
Nataŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ ta mɛ de, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ dea-a, wen GASA WAN a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
Mɛ zɛ‘i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Nataŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David: ‹Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Bo nɛ mɛ a̧ tɛ de Tua ha̧‘m sɛka'm ɔɔ kɔ̧ a̧ na.
N'am gboo nɛ̀ o be
Zɛ ɔ dɔka n'am yar nɛnɛ in o be
«Kinii, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ hegɔ ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David: ‹Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o gii wi-biro nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Nɛ́ mi'i baa mɛ nɛ̀ poo zɔ̧ ɗoŋ o mɔ-dai ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu
Mi duka in mɛɛ fara lɛŋ nɛ mɛ nɛɛ sɛnɛ. Mi gbɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ yinɛ ti mɛ lɛŋ. Mi tɛ de ha̧ nin-mɛ mɛ hur hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nin o gasawi hur nɛnɛ zaŋnu’ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋma fara ha̧
ŋgimbi n'am ee nɛ o wi-gɔn-kita zu wa ga ɓɔna. Mi tɛ de ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk tɛ kɔ-mɛ fo nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ mɛ. GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ndé, wi tɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ ha̧ mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wese kɔ-mɛ tɛ dam ha̧ mɛ mɛ si kpa o dáà kɔ-mɛ, mi tɛ ba bezaŋ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ e ŋgɔn oi mɛ, ɓɛɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ de Tua ha̧‘m; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ damti kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ yor nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ duk nɛ́ dáà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nɛ́ bem kɔ‘m. Kà a̧ nɛ́ dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ, mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ oi-aa ha̧ a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáa-wan-bem usi nɛ bɔnɛ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ bem’ɛ ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, mi beka e a̧ duk hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ee nɛ̀ Saul duk, fo nɛ̀ a̧ yinɛ ti mɛ ga na.
Nutua kɔ-mɛ in wan kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk ti'm hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wan kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ nɔa-a hegɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.› »
Nataŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ David nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o mɔ n'aa zia tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i.
Wannu David tɛɛ duk nù ti GASA WAN kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua-laa, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Gasa Wan, Sɔ̧, mi nɛ́ o? Mi nɛ́ bíí nutua ko o, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba nɛ‘m e fara’ɛ o?
Zu-a'i, mɔ‘i duka nɛ geɗek mɔ yí‘nɛ́ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧. Ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ nú zu o bezaŋ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ɓeemɛ. Zu-a'i woyo, ɛnɛ mbaŋa tɛ‘m tɛ mɔ‘i, mi nɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ géé bíí géè.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ge wen ge a̧ David tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, n’ɛnɛ iŋa wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ge, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen wen k’ɛ́nɛ́, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ dee nɛ̀ gasa tom’ɛ lɛŋ, usi nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ gasa, ŋma wi nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ bo na; ŋma sɔ̧ gan'nɛ bo na, kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zia nɛ̀ zer yɛ ga ɓɛɛ.
Ŋma dukbíí zu nù'ɛ nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
Ɛnɛ ɗafa
«Kinii, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ zu wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga;
hegɔ nin'nɛ́ tɛ hur ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN ko o gíí wi-biro nɛ́ Sɔ̧ ko
Wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN ko o gíí wi-biro, Sɔ̧ ko
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧. O wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ kpasawen, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen gasa demɔ'ɛ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu o bíí nutua ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk yí‘nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wen kà bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, David bìì o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ ɔ wan zu wa. A̧ foo o mɔɔ-wan er o gasawi nɛ duka so zu nù kɔ-wa yinɛ.
A̧ bìì o be Mɔab, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa gu nù. A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ wa tɛ dùk-aa taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum o ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ yiitoo’ɛ. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Mɔab yaa ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa duk gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ a̧.
David bìí Hadadɛzɛr bem ko Rehob wannu Soba, ŋgimbi nɛ Hadadɛzɛr nɛɛ so mɛ ba nɛ nana-yì Efrat pii ɗoŋ e tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ David kai o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in o wi-nɛ-biro nɛ̀ naŋ tɛ booro-ɓu-yiitoo. A̧ ɓira ɗaɗi-naŋ o nyaŋa lɛŋ e oi nyaŋa nyɛm nɛ̀ keekee gɔmŋmaa ɓɛɛ.
O be Aram nɛ ya Damas tɛɛ gbak Hadadɛzɛr wannu Soba, ɓɛɛ David gbɛ o bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo mgbara wa.
David aa o gasawi dam Aram nú Damas, ɓɛɛ o be Aram ya ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko David, gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ a̧. GASA WAN dee ha̧ David mɛ gbin biro fara lɛŋ n'aa nɛ.
David kaia o ŋgee ko o wi-biro ko Hadadɛzɛr nɛ wa dee nɛ̀ lɔr piinɛ Jerusalɛm.
Wannu David kaia ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a sɛn Bɛta in Bɛrotai, o ye ko Hadadɛzɛr.
Toi, wannu Hamat zia'e David bìì o wi-biro ko Hadadɛzɛr lɛŋ,

nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa toma bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yoram nɛ̀ haya-a sitɛ wannu David, mɛ fan a̧, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧ wen n'aa bìí biro in Hadadɛzɛr, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan a̧, wen Hadadɛzɛr duka so nɛ́ wisɛn ko Toi. Yoram kaia nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, lɔr in ndɛrɛ nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu David.
Wannu David ee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN e zu bu-mbɔi in lɔr n'aa kaia so nɛti er o dukbíí n'aa bìì so.
A̧ kaia so o mɔɔ nɔ‘i er o be Aram, o be Mɔab, o be Amɔŋ, o be Filistii in o be Amalɛk gu nɛ̀ o mɔ n'aa kaia so er Hadadɛzɛr bem ko Rehob wannu Soba.
Nin David hura siti ŋgimbi n'aa pia nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ bíí o be Aram mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ Tɔŋ. Bíí n'aa gbɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
A̧ aa o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ dam nú Edɔm lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o be Edɔm lɛŋ ya ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧. Fara nɛ̀ David nɛ́ lɛŋ, GASA WAN dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbin biro.
David ɔɔ wan zu nú
Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya duka zu o wi-biro; Yehosafat bem ko Ahilud duka nɛ́ wan-kalata.
Sadɔk bem ko Ahitub in Ahimɛlɛk bem ko Abiatar yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; Sɛraya nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ,
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada ɔɔ wan zu o be Kɛrɛt in o be Pɛlɛt. O bem ko David yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
David aka mɔ: «Ŋma bíí ko Saul kpɔk nɛ̀ duk kpasa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧‘m mɛ de mɔ in a̧ nɛ̀ de-a wen zu Jɔnataŋ nde?»
Ɓɛɛ ŋma wi-de-tom nutua ko Saul a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ, nin-a nɛ́ Siba. Wa saa a̧ tɛnɛ ha̧ David, ɓɛɛ a̧ ak a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ Siba nde?»
Siba kifa nú: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.»
Wannu aka a̧: «Ŋma bíí nutua ko Saul, kóó kpɔk bo ha̧‘m mɛ de demɔ in a̧ nɛ̀ war ko Sɔ̧ na nde?»
Siba kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «Ŋma bem ko Jɔnataŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ ku yiitoo mɔka mɔk.»
Wannu aka a̧: «Wi’ɛi a̧a̧ déè?» Siba kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «A̧ a̧a̧ tɛ ko Makir, bem ko Amiɛl, sɛn nú Lo-Dabar.»
Wannu David toma Siba ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ wi’ɛi sɛn tɛ ko Makir bem ko Amiɛl sɛn Lo-Dabar tɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Mɛfibosɛt bem ko Jɔnataŋ, be-koo Saul hɔɔ ti David. A̧ tika nù gu yí-a nɛ nù. David saa mɔ: «Mɛfibosɛt!» Mɛfibosɛt kɔ̧ɔ̧ sara: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.»
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ de kíì na; mi saa mɛ wen ha̧‘m mɛ de demɔ in mɛɛ wen zu dáà kɔ-mɛ Jɔnataŋ. Mi tɛ ha̧ nù ko zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ Saul siɗoŋ ha̧ mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in am kpɔk.»
Mɛfibosɛt guu nù, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o s’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ géé wɔr-toyo hee mi ga o?»
Wannu saa Siba wi-de-tom ko Saul, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ duka so nɛ́ ko Saul in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, mi ha̧a̧ ha̧ bem ko wan kɔ-mɛ.

Mɛ tɛ de tom-nyɔnɔ ha̧ a̧, mɛ, bem kɔ-mɛ in o wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ tɛ mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ tɛnɛ dai nɛ̀ bem ko wan kɔ-mɛ. Ɓɛɛ Mɛfibosɛt bem ko wan kɔ-mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in am.» Siba a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bem ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ in o wi-de-tom ɓu-yiitoo.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Siba tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ nyaa wannu tɛ ha̧ nú sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Mɛfibosɛt duk nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ kpɔk fara in wannu hee ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Mɛfibosɛt a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ ŋma be-wiwii, nin-a nɛ́ Mika, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya so tɛ ko Siba de so nɛ tom ha̧ Mɛfibosɛt.
Mɛfibosɛt ɔ so kɔ‘i sɛn Jerusalɛm, wen a̧ duka so nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in wannu. Ku-a yiitoo mɔka mɔk.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, wannu Amɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Hanun ɔ wan oi-aa.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David tɔ̧a̧: «Mi tɛ de mɔ in Hanun bem ko Nahas nɛ̀ yuwar-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so nɛnɛ in am ga.» David toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ tɛ Hanun oi fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom ko David hɔɔ tɛ nù ko o be Amɔŋ,

o gasawi ko o be Amɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Hanun wan kɔ-wa: «Ɛnɛ ta k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e David tu̧ nɛ tɛ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen n'aa toma o bíí mɛ hɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ oi fio ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ nde? Bo nɛ wen kpee naŋ mɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbin ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ a̧ toma nɛ̀ wa tɛnɛ na nde?»
Hanun kaia o betom ko David, a̧ kpuia reeta zera kɔ-wa, ɓir laa kɔ-wa hɔ tɛ tua ndaa-wa, ɓɛɛ fo wa sinɛ.
David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom ŋma bíí we nɛ̀ ti wa, wen foe dee wa nyɛmna; a̧ toma tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i ndé, wa a̧ ɓɔ́n sɛn Jeriko pɛm nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ zera kɔ-wa tɛ hɔ lɛŋ kaɗi, sɛka wa pia ɗɔŋ saaye.

O be Amɔŋ zɔka'e David kifa nɛ́ wisɛn kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa yoɓi o be Aram mɛ Bɛt-Rehob in o be Aram mɛ Soba: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wi-nɛ-biro nɛ̀ naŋ booro-ɓu-yiitoo. Wa kaia o wi-biro er wannu Maka tɛ bíí booro, in o bíí ko Tob booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom Jɔab in o ŋgaŋa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛnɛ.
O be Amɔŋ gboa, ɓɛɛ nɛk naŋ biro nú garo ye. O be Aram mɛ Soba in Rehob in o bíí ko Tob gu nɛ̀ o bíí ko Maka ya so kɔ-wa nɛtɛ sɛn zaŋbɛɛ.
Jɔab zɔka'e wi tɛ̀ɛ́ bi biro nɛti in nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa hoka o bíí mgbara o ŋgaŋa wi-biro
A̧ ee o oi wi-biro ha̧ nya-a̧ Abisai, ɓɛɛ wa nɛk kɔ-wa tan ti o be Amɔŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ nya-a̧: «Kà o be Aram nɛ́ gana'm, mɛ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak am; ɓɛɛ kà o be Amɔŋ nɛ́ gana mɛ, mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbak mɛ.
Mɛ̀ ŋgáí gba̧a̧ tɛ-mɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a wen o bíí k’ɛɛ in wen o ye ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab in o wi-biro kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ̀ ba zu dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa in o be Aram, ɓɛɛ o be Aram yu mɔ ti wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be Amɔŋ zɔka'e, o be Aram yuu mɔ yak kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa mbɛt yuu mɔ ti Abisai si saaye mɛ. Jɔab pia ɗoŋ nɛ yí biro n'aa bìì in o be Amɔŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm.
O be Aram zɔka'e, o be
Hadadɛzɛr toma o betom mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mɔi̧ o be Aram nɛ̀ ya nɛ̀ kur Efrat a tɛ biro. O wi nɔ‘i hɔɔ Helam; wi nɛ duka so zu wa nɛ́ Sobak gasawi ko o wi-biro ko Hadadɛzɛr.
Nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i aa zer David; a̧ mɔi̧a o be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Aram yuu mɔ ti o be
Ɗoŋ nɛ o be-wan ko Hadadɛzɛr lɛŋ zɔka'e ndé, o be
Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ pɛ nú kórò, ŋgimbi nɛ o wannu bi nɛ biro, David toma Jɔab in o wi-biro kɔ‘i gu nɛ̀ o be
Ŋma wese mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, David kura, ɓɛɛ yar nɛ̀ zu tua-wan. A̧ duka hi̧i̧ zɔk nɛ̀ ŋma okoo fara zuia yì. Kóò‘i yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
David toma ak mɔ wen zu kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e, nɛ́ Bɛtseba, boko-bem ko Eliam, kóò ko Urii be Hit.
David toma o betom nɛ́ɛ̀ mgbɔ a̧. Kóò‘i tɛɛ tɛ ko David, ɓɛɛ David ɔ in a̧. Kóò‘i sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i. Ŋgimbi'i, a̧ zuia so nɛ́ yì oi zɔka-zɛ.
Zaŋ yee tɛ kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ tom ha̧ David'e, wi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ zaŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «Mɛ̀ tóm Urii be Hit tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.» Ɓɛɛ Jɔab tom Urii tɛnɛ ha̧ David.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Urii hɔɔ ti David, David aka nyɛrɛ mɔ ko Jɔab in o wi-biro lɛŋ in nyɛrɛ biro mbɛt.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Urii: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, a̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔm tɛ-mɛ.» Urii gboo kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu tom o ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
Mɔ kpɔk, Urii ɔɔ kɔ‘i ɓɔn nú garo ko wan kɔ‘i in o dɔka ŋgaiwi ko wannu; a̧ si ɗoŋ hɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ David'e, Urii si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i na; nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David aka Urii: «Bo nɛ mɛ pia nɛ̀ gɛnɛ na? Wen ge sa mɛ si bɔɔ hɔ tɛ kɔ-mɛ na ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Urii kifi nú ha̧ David: «
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Urii: «Mɛ̀ ɔ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ sɔsɔɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ mi foo mɛ sinɛ.» Urii ɓɔna Jerusalɛm wese'i hɔ mɔɔsa̧.
David saa a̧; a̧ nyɔŋa mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ mɔ. David nɔsa̧ a̧ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧. Urii gboo mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɔ nù gɔn gado kɔ‘i in o ŋgaiwi ko wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Nɛ̀ mɔ sa̧a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ, David yɔra kalata ha̧ Jɔab, ɓɛɛ ba e er Urii.
Mɔ n'aa yɔra zaŋ kalata'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó Urii e ti sɛn yí biro, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ biro gbɛ a̧.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Jɔab iŋa fara nɛ̀ o ŋga wisɛn kɔ-wa tɛ biro yor sɛnɛ ga, a̧ foo Urii e nɛ̀ fara'i ŋgimbi kɛra ye.
O wi saaye gboo a zu Jɔab; o ŋma wi-biro ko David fea in o ŋma gasawi kɔ-wa, Urii be Hit fea mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab toma nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ yaka tɛ biro lɛŋ ha̧ David.
Mɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ betom mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka tɛ biro ha̧ wannu kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ kà wannu nɛ́ kura nɛ nyimsea mɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Wen ge s’ɛnɛ nɛa hɛɗi nɛ̀ saaye mɛ bi biro ge, bo nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'e wi a boi nɛ̀ zu garo pii ɗɔɔ na nde?

Wi nɛ gbɛɛ Abimɛlɛk, bem ko Yerubal duka so nɛ́ o? Bo nɛ okoo a̧ pii so gasa ta-hɔ̧n-mɔ tik zu a̧ sɛn Tebɛs na nde? Wen ge s’ɛnɛ ɗɔŋa si ká̧ garo ge?› Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: ‹Gasa wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ Urii be Hit fea mbɛt!› »
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ betom yaka nɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ ti David, ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ Jɔab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ lɛŋ.
Betom'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «O wi nɔ‘i ŋgaia gan yɛ; o wi nɔ‘i gboo nɛ̀ ŋgai pii tɛ yɛ pii zaŋbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ nasi wa hɔ nú garo.
O wi-pi̧-góò yaa nɛ̀ zu garo pi̧ nɛ̀ o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́, o bíí fee mgbara o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́. Urii be Hit, gasa wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ fee mbɛt.»

Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ betom'i: «Mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ká see-mɛ ɗaŋ tɛ mɔ nɛ yaka'i na; wen gba-paa gbɛ bíí siɓi, siɓi’ɛ mbɛt. Mɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ tɛ biro siti, a̧ mɛ̀ gbín ye'i.› Mɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ Jɔab hee mɔ‘i ga.»
Kóò ko Urii zia'e, wíì kɔ‘i fea. A̧ hi̧a̧ wíì kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ̀ ŋgimbi zima gera kaɗa, David toma mgbɔ kóò‘i tɛnɛ sɛn tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba a̧ nɛ̀ kóò. Kóò‘i kòò be-wiwii ha̧ a̧. Ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ David dea'i tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN.
GASA WAN toma
Wanmbɔi a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o sami in o ndai nɛ̀ dɔka-a.

Mɔ nɛ̀ wisan'i a̧a̧ nɛnɛ nɛ́ be-zɔŋa sami kpɔk ɓɛɛ. Sami'i nɛ́ be geɗek-a n'aa hi̧fa so. A̧ daia a̧ ɓɛɛ sami'i duk gasi nɛnɛ tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧. Sami'i nyɔŋ nɛ́ kpɔk nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ wan kɔ̧-a̧ nyɔŋ; a̧ nɔ mɔ nɛ̀ kpɔk bera-nɔ-mɔ ko wan kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ɔ in wan kɔ̧-a̧ kpɔk mbɛt; sami'i duk so hee boko-bem kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Ŋma wese ŋma gɛnɛ hɔa tɛ ko wanmbɔi, ɓɛɛ wanmbɔi kɔ̧ so mɛ ɗaŋ o dɔka mɔ kɔ‘i na. A̧ nɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓar nɛ́ kpɔk sami ko wisan'i mɛ gbɛ ha̧ gɛnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ.»
See David nyima in wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Nataŋ: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, wi-de-mɔ‘i nyɛma so mɛ fe yinɛ!
A̧ nyɛma so mɛ yoɓi zɔŋa sami'i nɛ̀ mbe-a naar, wen n'aa dee pɛrti yí-tom'i, ɓɛɛ n'aa de ko na.»
Nataŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Wi’ɛi nɛ́ mɛ! Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mi ha̧a̧ kira ko wan kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ; mi ha̧a̧ o kóò ko wan kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ lɛŋ, mi ha̧a̧
Wen ge mɛ ee wen ko GASA WAN tɛ geemɔ, de nɛ̀ mɔ n'aa kɔ̧ na ge? Mɛ gbɛɛ Urii be Hit wen nɛ mɛ dee ha̧ o be Amɔŋ mɛ gbɛ a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa, ɓɛɛ mɛ ba kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ kóò e kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ.
Gba-paa beka nyaŋ nutua kɔ-mɛ na ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wen nɛ̀ mɛ ee am tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ba kóò ko Urii be Hit nɛ̀ kóò e kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ.›
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: ‹Mi tɛ de ha̧ bɔnɛ mɛ gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ kpa nɛ̀ mɛ. Mi tɛ kai o kóò kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ gbaa yí-mɛ ha̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɛ ɔ in wa nɛ̀ bu-wese.
Kɔ-mɛ, mɛ dee nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ kifi er mɔ‘i nɛ̀ gbaayí o be
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nataŋ: «Mi dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN!»
Ɓɛɛ Nataŋ tɔ̧ ha̧ David: «GASA WAN kpee yí zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i, mɛ beka fe na.
Mɔ kpɔk, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN batɛ tɛ mɔ‘i ga, bem’ɛi nɛ̀ wa kòò ha̧ mɛ‘i tɛ fe.»
Ɓɛɛ Nataŋ si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ tɛ bem nɛ̀ kóò ko Urii kòò ha̧ David'i.
David kɔfa mɔ in Sɔ̧ wen zu bem’ɛi; a̧ zima yì mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ɔ nù, a̧ ɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu.
O gasawi nutua kɔ̧-a̧ mɔi̧a ya katɛ a̧ mɛ ba a̧ e ŋgɔn takaɗi; a̧ bɛ̧a̧ nyɔŋa mɔ in wa mbɛt.

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, bem’ɛi fea. Kíì tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen fio'i ha̧ David dee o wi-de-tom. Wa taa so nde: «Ŋgimbi nɛ bem’ɛi ɓɔna so kpasa, ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii na. Kinii ɛɛ tɛ de hee ge tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧‘e, bem fea ge nde? Bo nɛ a̧ tɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na nde?»
David zɔka'e, o wi-de-tom fu̧i̧ nɛ wen, ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ ndé, bem’ɛi fea kaɗi: A̧ aka o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧: «Bem’ɛi fea nde?» Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ii, a̧ fea!»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David kura mbɔɗɔnu, zui yì, a nɔ̧́-nyama tɛ, ɓɛɛ kpai laa pi̧ mbe-a, yak si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ gbɛ zugur nù. A̧ sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ aka ha̧ wa mɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɔŋ.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ de’ɛ ge nde? Ŋgimbi nɛ bem ɓɔna kpasa, ɛnɛ zima mɔ, hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ kinii nɛ̀ bem fea, ɛnɛ kura, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nyɔŋ mɔ.»
David kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Mi zima yì, hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ bem ɓɔna so kpasa, wen mi taa so kɔ‘m, ŋmafara Sɔ̧ tɛ de ko ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ bem duka kpasa ha̧‘m.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, a̧ fea, mi tɛ zim yì wen ge? Mi tɛ ba so nɛ́ a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ? Nɛ́ mi a̧ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, bo nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ́ɛ̀ kpa'm na.»
David ha̧a̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Bɛtseba. David sii tua ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ duk in a̧; a̧ baa zaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ wa a nin-a Salomɔŋ. GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ Salomɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ tom Nataŋ,
Jɔab bìí Raba, ye-wan ko o be Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba.
Jɔab toma o betom ha̧ David: «Mi bìí Raba, ɓɛɛ mi ba ye nɛ̀ war ɗɔɔ.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ oi o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kɛr ye e nù ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá, wen ká tɛɛ duk hee mi a̧‘m baa ye ga, wen ká tɛɛ hur nɛ̀ nin-am.»
David mɔi̧a o wi-biro lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ daŋ si Raba; a̧ bìì ye'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba.

Mɔɔ-gu-zu nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr tɛ kilo ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ, nɛ de toka ta a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt, a̧a̧ so zu Milkɔŋ, géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Amɔŋ; David baa mɔ‘i yinɛ, gu zu-a nɛ̀ tɛ a̧. A̧ kaia o mɔɔ-oi-biro saaye'i nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.

Nɛ̀ ko o bíí saaye'i, a̧ nɛ̀ɛ̀ usi tom-ɓira-te, tom-za̧a̧-nù nɛ wara in tom-gɔma-te ha̧ wa. A̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ de tom brik. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ dee in o bíí tɛ ye ko o be Amɔŋ lɛŋ. Ɓɛɛ David in o wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ pii ɗoŋ pii Jerusalɛm.
Mɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Absalɔm bem ko David a̧a̧ so nɛ́ boko-nya-wi nɛ̀ yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna. Nin-a nɛ́ Tamar. Ɓɛɛ Amnɔŋ bem ko David de wɔ a̧.
Amnɔŋ dee wɔ boko-nya-wi nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ pi̧ zɛɛ tɛ-a. Tamar tɛ iŋ so tɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Amnɔŋ iŋ so yuwar mɔ n'aa tɛ de in a̧ na.
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ ŋma sɛm kɔ̧-a̧, nin-a nɛ́ Yonadab, bem ko Simɛa nya David. Yonadab duka so nɛ́ ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nyɛmna.
A̧ aka Amnɔŋ: «Bem ko wannu, wen ge sa mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ, mɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a na’ɛ ge? Mɛ beka nyɛm so mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ mɔ‘i nɛ̀ de mɛ‘i ha̧‘m na nde?»
Amnɔŋ kifa nú: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ Tamar, boko-nya nya'm Absalɔm.»

Yonadab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ ɔ́ nù, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gɔ́n tɛ-mɛ de nɛ̀ zɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ mɛ zɔk mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ boko-nya'm Tamar mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧‘m. A̧ a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ gí nyɔŋmɔ nɛ yí‘m ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa tɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-a sɛka'm nyɔŋa.› »
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Amnɔŋ gɔna tɛ ɔ zɛɛ.
Wannu tɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ zɔk Amnɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Amnɔŋ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ boko-nya'm Tamar mɛ tɛ a̧ gí be makala yiitoo nɛ̀ yí‘m ha̧‘m nyɔŋ.»
David toma sa Tamar kɔ̧ kira mɛ: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ bu̧i̧-nya-mɛ Amnɔŋ, mɛ̀ gí nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧.»
Tamar nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko bu̧i̧-nya-wi Amnɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ ɔ nɛ nù. Tamar ɗuu fuu, ɓɛɛ vati, de nɛ̀ o be makala nɛ̀ yí Amnɔŋ ɓɛɛ han.
Tamar kaia o makala nɛ kɔ̧ nyɛk-hana-a a ti a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧ nyɔŋa a̧. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó o bíí lɛŋ katɛ‘m gbonɛ!» Ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ yaa katɛ a̧ lɛŋ gbo.
Amnɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Tamar: «Mɛ̀ bá nyɔŋmɔ pii kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua, mɛ̀ há̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi nyɔŋa.» Tamar kaia o makala n'aa dee nɛ er-a nɛnɛ ha̧ Amnɔŋ bu̧i̧-nya-a si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Tamar ha̧ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ Amnɔŋ ga, Amnɔŋ tika er-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Boko-nya'm, mɛ̀ tɛ́ ha̧‘m ɔ in mɛɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Tamar kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Bo hegɔ na, bu̧i̧-nya'm; ká mɛ́ de ŋgayamɔ in am na, wen wi de pɛrti mɔ hegɔ sɛn
Kà pɛrti mɔ hegɔ de, mi tɛ ba foe kɔ‘m pi̧ déè? Kɔ-mɛ mbɛt, búù tɛ ba mɛ sɛn
Amnɔŋ kɔ̧ zia-a na. A̧ baa a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai, ɓɛɛ ɔ in a̧.
Tɛ kale ŋgimbi'i, Amnɔŋ ku̧u̧ naŋ sɛna Tamar pi̧-er-tɛ-wee; sɛnmɔ‘i ŋgaia gan kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so, ɓɛɛ Amnɔŋ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ yák!»
Tamar kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Bo hegɔ na, bu̧i̧-nya'm. Kà mɛ̀ ndak am kinii, ɓɛɛ tɛ ɗaŋ gan gan kuti mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ dea'i.»
Amnɔŋ kɔ̧ zia wen nú Tamar na.
Amnɔŋ saa wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ fó be-okoo’ɛ yinɛ katɛ‘m; mɛ̀ fó a̧ gbonɛ, a̧ mɛ̀ kpé nú tua.»
Laa nɛ Tamar duka so pi̧ nɛ gasa laa nɛ zi̧a̧ ɓaa-a, wen pi̧i̧-laa ko o boko-bem ko wannu nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii na nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Wi-de-tom ko Amnɔŋ foo Tamar pi̧ zan, ɓɛɛ kpe nú tua.
Ɓɛɛ Tamar ŋma nú tɛ
Bu̧i̧-nya-a̧ Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ nya-mɛ Amnɔŋ a̧ ɔɔ in mɛɛ nde? Mɛ̀ kàɗì, boko-nya'm, nɛ́ bu̧i̧-nya-mɛ a̧ dee mɔ‘i. Ká mɛ́ ta i̧i̧ ɓɔna.» Ɓɛɛ Tamar ɓɔn kɔ̧ tua ko bu̧i̧-nya-a Absalɔm.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Wannu David zia wen'i, a̧ kpaa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛm so mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in Amnɔŋ na, wen Amnɔŋ so nɛ kaya-bem n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna.
Absalɔm tɔ̧ ŋma wen sitɛ Amnɔŋ zu mɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ Absalɔm e kànà nɛ́ kiri ha̧ Amnɔŋ, wen ɗaŋa boko-nya-a̧ Tamar n'aa ɗaŋa.
Duka pɛ yiitoo ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Absalɔm sa o be-wan lɛŋ si Bal-Hasɔr sɛn ká̧ Efraim, wen o wi-gɔn-buma-sami kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧.
Absalɔm nɛɛ tɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́; wa gɔn nɛ buma sami tɛ̀ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́. Wannu in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ e'm.»
Wannu kifa nú ha̧ Absalɔm: «Weyaa, bem kɔ‘m, k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ lɛŋ na, wen ká bɔnɛ-ɗafa-mɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba tɛ mɛ.» Absalɔm aia kànà nú ha̧ wannu; wannu bɛ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ tok nɛ́ de yoŋgo zu a̧.
Ɓɛɛ Absalɔm tɔ̧: «Kà nɛ́ bòò hegɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧ nya'm Amnɔŋ mɛ nɛ in yɛɛ na nde?» Wannu kifa nú: «Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ in mɛɛ wen ge?»
Absalɔm aia kànà nú siti ha̧ wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu e ha̧ Amnɔŋ in oi o dɔka bem kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɛ nɛ in a̧.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ̀ de-a; k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ndé dɔ̧ɔ̧ pi̧i̧ Amnɔŋ tɛ tortɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ kà‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e ndé, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ Amnɔŋ wó, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ a̧. Ká kíì de'nɛ́ na, nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ‘m. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí‘e ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgaŋa-wi.»
O wi-de-tom ko Absalɔm dee mɔ in Amnɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ga. O be-wan lɛŋ kaia o tuifuu kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ pɛsi yak.
Wa ɓɔna fara pia-a, ká wen mɔ‘i aa so zer David kaɗi ndé, Absalɔm gbɛɛ o bem ko wannu lɛŋ, ŋma kpɔk ɓɔn na.
Wannu kura, a̧k laa tɛ a nù, ɔ nù gbutu-nù. O gasawi lɛŋ nɛ yaa so katɛ David a̧ka̧ laa tɛ a nù mbɛt.

Yonadab bem ko Simɛa, nya David tɔ̧a̧: «Ká nyaa tɔ̧‘e, wa gbɛɛ o be-ŋgaiwi, o bem ko wannu lɛŋ na, wen wa gbɛɛ nɛ́ Amnɔŋ kpɔk ɓɛɛ. Akamɔ ko Absalɔm wese nɛ̀ Amnɔŋ ɔɔ nɛnɛ in boko-nya-a̧ Tamar usa so'e, a̧ tɛ de pɛrti mɔ hegɔ.
Ká nyaa wannu ta'e o bem kɔ‘i lɛŋ kuma na, nɛ́ Amnɔŋ kpɔk a̧ fee ɓɛɛ.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Absalɔm yuu mɔ yak. Wi-biro nɛ̀ duka so kɔ‘i pɛm nɛ̀ mɔ pi̧i̧ yí, ɓɛɛ zɔk o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a fara zira-a tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ká̧ naŋ kaya.
Ɓɛɛ Yonadab tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «O bem ko wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ kaɗi’ɛ, mɔ yaka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.»
A̧ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ o bem ko wannu hɔ. Ɓɛɛ wa ku̧ naŋ hiɗa mɔ, hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧. Wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i lɛŋ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a mbɛt.
Absalɔm yuu mɔ sitɛ Talmai, bem ko Amihud, wannu Gɛsur, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk hi̧i̧ pɛ taar. Ŋgimbi'i lɛŋ, David zim so nɛ́ bem kɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, ɗaŋsee kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa zu Absalɔm, wen see-aa ga̧a̧ oi fio ko Amnɔŋ kaɗi.
Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya zɔka'e, see wannu kifa sitɛ Absalɔm,

ɓɛɛ Jɔab tom nɛ́ɛ̀ sa ŋma haya okoo sɛn saaye Tɛkɔa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi ai nú ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ gɔ́n tɛ-mɛ hee mɛ zim nɛ mɔ ga; mɛ̀ á laa-zima-mɔ tɛ-mɛ, ká mɛ sɔ̧ nɔ̧́-nyama tɛ-mɛ na. Mɛ̀ dúk hee ŋma okoo nɛ̀ zim nɛ́ fio nɛ̀ zɛ-a dɔka kaɗi ga.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ a̧.» Ɓɛɛ Jɔab we ɗoŋ wen n'aa tɛ tɔ̧‘i ha̧ a̧.
Okoo Tɛkɔa'i nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa wannu, ba yí gu nù, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am!»
Wannu aka a̧: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ de mɛ ge?» Ɓɛɛ kóò‘i kifi nú: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ̀k, mi nɛ́ ko-gera, wíì kɔ‘m fea.
Kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bem yiitoo. Wa kia nú ŋmaa sɛn zaŋbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí mɛ am wa bo na; ɛ̧ɛ̧ kpɔk’ɛ gbɛɛ ɓii-aa;

ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ‘m dik wen a zu'm kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, wa tɔ̧a̧: ‹Mɛ̀ úsí wi nɛ gbɛɛ nya-wi h’ɛ́ɛ́ gbɛ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa gbɛɛ nɛ̀ nya-a̧ ga. Hegɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ gbɛɛ wi-kai-mɔɔ-oi yinɛ.› Wa tɛ gbɛ oi bem nɛ̀ ɓɔna ha̧‘m'i, ɓɛɛ nin wíì kɔ‘m in bezaŋ-aa bìí zaŋnu’ɛ.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò‘i: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ-mɛ; mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen zu mɛ.»
Ko Tɛkɔa'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Nyaa wannu kɔ‘m, ɗaŋmɔ a̧ tík tika-a zu'm in o bíí kɔ‘m. Wannu in damti kɔ‘i bo nɛ̀ yɔɔ-kaya zu mɔ‘i na.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ bíí nɛ tɛ de nana-gore in mɛɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ woyo ɓɔna.»
Ɓɛɛ kóò‘i gɔm er woyo: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wór GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m, wen ká wi-kifi-er oi tɔk-tɛ‘i tɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ zu siti, ká wa tɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ oi bem kɔ‘m'i.»
Ɓɛɛ Wannu tɔ̧: «Mi kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ duk kpasa, mui̧-zu bem kɔ-mɛ kóó kpɔk beka tik nù na.»
Kóò‘i aka mɔ woyo: «Mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen kpɔk.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu kifi nú: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧̀.»
Kóò‘i tɔ̧a̧: «Wen ge ɛnɛ ee pɛrti zu-mɔ hegɔ wen o bíí ko Sɔ̧ ge? Tɛ gɔna kita'i, wannu iŋa'e, wi yɔɔ kaya, wen nɛ‘i sa wi nɛ‘i ndaka piinɛ ɗoŋ na.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ fe, ɛ́ɛ́ duk hee yì nɛ̀ gbaia a nù nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ ɗu woyo ɓɔna ga. Sɔ̧ ba fio e ŋgɔn na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafa kànà mɔ wen ká wi nɛ‘i ndaka tɛ́ɛ̀ duk nyɛi̧ nɛ́ wi.

Kinii, mi tɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ nyaa wannu kɔ‘m, wen nɛ̀ o bíí pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧, mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu; ŋmafara, wannu tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ak,
kà wannu nɛ kpɛka mɛ ɓar am yinɛ er wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ tɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi in bem kɔ‘m mgbara o bíí nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka mɛ duk nɛ́ bíí kɔ‘i.»
Koo'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Wannu a̧ tɔ̧́ ŋma wen-ga̧-see, wen gasa wan kɔ‘m wannu duk hee betom ko Sɔ̧ ga, tɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu kifa nú ha̧ kóò‘i: «Kà‘m nɛ́ aka mɛ, ká mɛ hu̧si ŋma mɔ nɛ‘m na.»
Kóò‘i tɔ̧a̧: «Nyaa wannu kɔ‘m a̧ ák mɔ.»

Wannu aka mɔ: «Nɛ́ Jɔab a̧ usi war ha̧ mɛ tɛ mɔ‘i nde?» Kóò‘i kifa nú: «Hee nyaa wannu kɔ‘m duk kpasa ga, ŋma bíí nyɛm mɛ a̧r si wiiko, kóó si gale tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ nyaa wannu tɔ̧ na. Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, nɛ́ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Jɔab a̧ ha̧a̧ nú, in nɛ́ a̧ a̧ wee ɗoŋ wen lɛŋ nɛ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧.
Jɔab dee mɔ‘i, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpai mɔ lɛŋ. Nyaa wannu kɔ‘m iŋa mgbara mɔ hee betom ko Sɔ̧ ga. Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ lɛŋ nɛ yak zu nù'ɛ.»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «Mi kpɛka mɔ‘i. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mgbɔ daŋa-ŋgaiwi Absalɔm piinɛ ɗoŋ.»
Jɔab guu nù ti wannu, gbɛɛ zugur nù, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu a̧; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'e, ɛnɛ dee ko ha'i, wen nɛ̀ wannu dee mɔ nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ aka'i.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab kura yak si Gɛsur, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ mgbɔ Absalɔm piinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «A̧ a̧ nɛ́ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ wen mi kɔ̧ mɛ zɔk a̧ na.» Absalɔm sii ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wannu zɔk yí-a̧ na.
Sɛn
Tɛ pɛ lɛŋ, a̧ kpui nɛ́ zu-a, wen mui̧-zu-a dita so nyɛmna. A̧ kpui zu-a kà‘i wé dita-a, nɛ́ kilo yiitoo nyɛm nɛ dita kilo ko wannu.
Absalɔm koo be-wiwii taar in be-okoo kpɔk. Nin boko-bem’ɛi nɛ́ Tamar. Nɛ́ be-okoo nɛ̀ yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
Absalɔm dee pɛ yiitoo sɛn Jerusalɛm, a̧ zɔk wannu na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa saa Jɔab mɛ tom a̧ nɛnɛ tɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ Jɔab kɔ̧ so mɛ nɛ tɛ ko Absalɔm na. Absalɔm toma sa Jɔab woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧ nɛa-a.
Ɓɛɛ Absalɔm tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i: «Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ zɔka fɔ be-fon
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom ko Absalɔm nɛɛ pi̧ wee tɛ fɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Jɔab nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Absalɔm kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Wen ge sa o wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ pi̧ wee tɛ fɔ kɔ‘m ge?»

Absalɔm kifa nú ha̧ Jɔab: «Nɛ́ wen n'am saa so mɛ mɛ tom sitɛ wannu mɛ ak a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Wen ge s'am pia nɛ̀ Gɛsur ge? Gana so ha̧‘m mɛ duk hi̧i̧ kaŋ. Kinii, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ tɛ wannu. Kà mi a̧ dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ a̧ gbɛ́‘m yinɛ.› »
Jɔab nɛɛ tɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ we ɗoŋ wen'i ha̧ a̧. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu saa Absalɔm, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ tɛ a̧. A̧ guu nù ti a, ba sɔnti gu nɛ nù, ɓɛɛ wannu hɛr Absalɔm.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Absalɔm ba keekee in o nyaŋa gu nɛ̀ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ mɛ duk ti ha̧ a̧.

Mɛ tutuyɛ sut, Absalɔm kura, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ yor ká̧ yuwar nú garo ye. Ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ̀ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ kita nɛ́ tɛ wannu wen gɔna kita kɔ‘i, Absalɔm saa a̧, ɓɛɛ aka a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ bíí ge ye ge?» Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kifa nú: «Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋma bíí mgbara o zuduk be
Ɓɛɛ Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k! Wen kɔ-mɛ ɔ dee in nɛ̀ yuwar-a; mɔ kpɔk, ŋma mgbák bíí ko wannu nɛ tɛ zii wen kɔ-mɛ bo na.»
Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Ho! Kà‘m bó so nɛ́ wi-gɔn-kita zu nù'ɛ, nɛ́ sɛn tɛ‘m a̧ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wen tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ, ɓɛɛ mi gɔna kita ha̧ wa nɛ̀ yuwar-a.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ bíí tɛ mɛ gu nù ti a̧, a̧ baa wi’ɛi e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛra ŋmaa in a̧.
Absalɔm ɔra o be
Absalɔm duka pɛ naar, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧‘m nɛ sɛn Hebrɔŋ ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ de mɔ n'am ha̧a̧ so nú‘m wen dea-a ha̧ GASA WAN.
Wen ŋgimbi n'am duka Gɛsur sɛn Aram, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Kà GASA WAN mgbɔ‘m sinɛ hɔ Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɛ de tom ha̧ a̧!› »
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ,» ɓɛɛ Absalɔm ba yuwar yak si Hebrɔŋ.
Ahai a̧ toma o betom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛnɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o zuduk be
Wese'i, Absalɔm yaka so in o bíí Jerusalɛm gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo; wa nɛ́ o bíí nɛ wa saa saa tɛnɛ. Wa lɛŋ iŋ mgbara mɔ nɛ yak na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Absalɔm ɓɔna fara ɗafa sɔ̧, a̧ toma tom si Gilo mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ sa Ahitɔfɛl be Gilo nɛ duk nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko David. Kpɛra wan ko Absalɔm ŋgaya so nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ dɔka-a.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ŋma bíí tɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ David hee ndé: «See o be

David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi kɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ ya in a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ bá war ɛ̀ɛ̀ yú mɔ wen Absalɔm beka e yɛ na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpán nɔ, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ kpa yɛ, ká a̧ bi yɛ, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ kum o bíí saaye lɛŋ nɛ gba-paa.»
O gasawi ko wannu kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ nyaa wannu hoka; ɛɛ nɛ́ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Wannu gboo tik zan nɛ̀ naŋ in o bíí nutua kɔ‘i lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ wannu e o zɔŋa-kóò ɓu wen pɛma kira.
Wannu gboo nɛ̀ naŋ in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ yor sɛn tɛ sɔŋkur tua.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ gbara ti a̧: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be Kɛrɛt, o be Pɛlɛt nɛ̀ pɛm so wannu, sɛka o be Gat gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ tɛa so ɗoŋ-aa.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Itai gasawi ko o wi-biro Gat: «Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ in yɛɛ mbɛt ge? Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ mɛ̀ dúk in ɓii wannu wen mɛ́ nɛ́ gɛnɛ. Wa ndaka so mɛ ndak nɛ̀ nù kɔ-mɛ yinɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ hɔɔ kɔ-mɛ mɛ mboyɛɛ, ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ mi tɛ mgbɔ mɛ yak nɛnɛ n'am yar kɔ‘m nɛ̀ nú-tum nɛnɛ'ɛ nde? Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ in o nya-mɛ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dúk in mɛɛ; a̧ a̧ dé ko ha̧ mɛ mbɛt.»
Itai kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «Mi kan mɔ sɔsɔɔ sɛn ti GASA WAN nɛ duk kpasa in sɛn ti'nɛ́ wannu kɔ‘m. Fara lɛŋ nɛ wannu tɛ nɛ, kóó nɛ́ fio, kóó nɛ́ duka-kpasa, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Itai: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yàk.» Ɓɛɛ Itai be Gat yak in o bíí kɔ‘i gu nɛ̀ obem kɔ-wa.
Bíí lɛŋ hi̧i̧ so nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a ŋgimbi nɛ wa gbar nɛnɛ yaknɛ. Wannu kuu be-zer Sɛdrɔŋ in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ba war si ká̧ ŋga-gbárà.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ mbɛt in o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ tui nɛ́
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sadɔk: «Mɛ̀ bá
A̧ kà a̧ nɛ́ tɔ̧a̧, mi de tɛ wi na wó, a̧ a̧ dé mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ in am.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sadɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k! Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ saaye zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ. Bem kɔ-mɛ Ahimas in Yɔnataŋ bem ko Abiatar, o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ yiitoo'i a̧ yá in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, mi tɛ nik naŋ-am ɓɔn nɛnɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ, zɛm nɛ nyɛrɛmɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tom tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sadɔk in Abiatar gɔɔ
David hi̧i̧ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ daŋ nɛ̀ kaya Te-nɔ̧́. A̧ kpee zu-a nɛ̀ laa, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ géé naŋ. O bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ nɛ́ in a̧ kpee nɛ́ zu nɛ̀ laa; wa daŋ nɛ́ kaya, hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ mbɛt.
Wa tɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Ahitɔfɛl a̧a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ ee nú in Absalɔm.» Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧: «GASA WAN a̧ ɗáŋ o tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko Ahitɔfɛl.»
David hɔɔ zu kaya fara nɛ‘i gu nù ti Sɔ̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ Husai be Ark nɛ̀ duk in a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ hɔ kpa a̧ nɛ̀ a̧ka̧ laa in nɛ̀ fuunu zu.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà mɛ tɛ in am, mɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ ŋma tui wen am.

A̧ kà mɛ si ɗoŋ si saaye, kà mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Absalɔm: ‹Wannu, mi tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́; nɛti, mi duka so nɛ́ wi-de-tom ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ kinii, mi nɛ́ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,› hegɔ‘i, mɛ tɛ gbak am ɗaŋ nɛ̀ o tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko Ahitɔfɛl.
Bo nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in Abiatar tɛ ya katɛ‘nɛ́ na nde? Mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ zii lɛŋ nú o bíí nutua ko wannu, mɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in Abiatar.
Wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa yiitoo: Ahimas bem ko Sadɔk in Yɔnataŋ bem ko Abiatar. Nyɛrɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zii lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ tom nɛ̀ wa tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Husai sɛm ko David sii ɗoŋ si saaye ŋgimbi nɛ Absalɔm ye nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm.

Ŋgimbi nɛ David yaka si ɗoŋ kaya tikiɗi, a̧ kpaa ŋmaa in Siba, wi-de-tom ko Mɛfibosɛt fara kai tuifuu yiitoo tɛnɛ; wa tui nɛ́ o brɛt gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, sikila kora waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ gɔmŋmaa, o de gbɛ̧ waya-te gɔmŋmaa ká bá nɛ̀ dak dɔ̧ɔ̧ kpɔk.
Wannu aka Siba: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ kai’ɛ ge?»
Ɓɛɛ Siba kifi nú: «O tuifuu nɔ'ɔ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-daŋ ko o nam ko wannu; brɛt in o waya-te nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o ŋgaiwi; dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-nɔ ko bíí nɛ tɛ mbɔi sɛn ŋga-gbárà.»
Wannu aka a̧ siti: «Bem ko wan kɔ-mɛ a̧a̧ dee?»
Ɓɛɛ Siba kifi nú ha̧ wannu: «A̧ ɓɔna kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, wen a̧ taa so kɔ̧-a̧‘e, o bíí nutua ko
Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ Siba: «Mɔ nɛ Mɛfibosɛt a̧a̧ nɛnɛ lɛŋ zii nɛ̀ mɛ sɔsɔɔ.» Siba kifa nú: «Mi gbɛɛ zugur-am nù ti'nɛ́, ɛnɛ dé ko ha̧‘m, nyaa wannu kɔ‘m.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu David hɔɔ Bahurim, Simɛi bem ko Gera, ŋma nam ko Saul gboo kpa a̧, da̧ nɛ̀ a̧.
A̧ duka yo nɛ wannu David, in o gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ ta. Wannu duka so kɔ‘i see-a, ɓɛɛ o ŋgaŋa-wi in o wi-biro ya zik a̧.
Gba̧a̧ dara ko Simɛi nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mɛ̀ yák siɓi, mɛ̀ yák siɓi; mɛ wi-gbɛ-zu nɛ gba̧a̧ mɔ kɔ-mɛ bo na’ɛ!
GASA WAN foo tɔk tɛ o bíí nutua ko Saul nɛ̀ mɛ ɔɔ wan oi-aa’ɛ pi̧ zu mɛ. GASA WAN ha̧a̧ wan ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ Absalɔm, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ kinii mɛ a̧a̧ tɛ bɔnɛ, wen mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-gbɛ-zu!»
Abisai bem ko Sɛruya tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Wen ge sa géé ɗaŋ fio toyo’ɛ da̧ nyaa wannu ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ ɓir zu-a pi̧ nù.»
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ so mgbara'm in'nɛ̀ɛ́, bem ko Sɛruya nde? A̧ nɛ́ da̧a̧ dara, in kà bó nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧, a̧ a̧ dá̧‘m wó, nɛ́ o a̧ nyɛma mɛ ak a̧, wen ge a̧ dee mɔ‘i ge nde, o?»

Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ Abisai in o wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ: «Bem n'am koo nɛ zaŋ-am nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m mbɛt’ɛ, kà bó nɛ̀ bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nde! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ a̧ da̧‘m, kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ a̧.
Ŋmafara GASA WAN tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ha̧a̧ bɔtɛ ha̧‘m gan dara kɔ̧-a̧ sɔsɔɔ.»
David in o bíí kɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ nɔ̀ kɔ-wa siti, ɓɛɛ Simɛi e wa duk na; a̧ baa ká̧ zaŋ kaya nɛnɛ, da̧ nɛ̀ David, pi̧ nɛ̀ ta, a nɛ̀ fuunu sitɛ wa mbɛt.
Wannu in o bíí nɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ in a̧ hɔɔ nú Jurdɛn. Wa mbɔia so nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa ɔm tɛ-wa hi̧i̧.
Absalɔm yee ye Jerusalɛm in gíí o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ Husai be Ark, sɛm ko David hɔɔ ti Absalɔm, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí a̧!»
Absalɔm aka Husai: «
Husai kifa nú ha̧ Absalɔm: «Bo hegɔ na; wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN in dukbíí ká bá nɛ̀ gíí o be
Kóó bòò so hegɔ na, nɛ́ o a̧‘m tɛ de tom ha̧ a̧ o? Bo nɛ ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ na? Mi tɛ de tom h’ɛ́nɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am dee so nɛ̀ tom ha̧ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga.»
Absalɔm tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Ahitɔfɛl: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen zu mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de.»
Ahitɔfɛl kifa nú ha̧ Absalɔm: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ in o zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ-mɛ n'aa ee kɔ̧ kira mɛ pɛm mɔ. Hegɔ o be
Wa yaia tua-laa e nù ha̧ Absalɔm zu gasa tua-wan, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ fara'i a̧ Absalɔm duk sɛnɛ, ɔ nɛnɛ in o zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yí o be
Mbɔrɔ nɛ Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi nɔ‘i lɛŋ duka hee wen ko Sɔ̧ ga. David in Absalɔm mbɛt duka so mbo nɛ̀ zu tɛ o mbɔrɔ nɔ‘i.
Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Absalɔm: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é war ha̧‘m hok o wi-biro booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ha̧‘m kai wa ndak nɛ̀ ɗoŋ David mɛ zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Mi tɛ hɔ kpa a̧ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ mbɔi, ɓɛɛ mi pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ-a; o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɛ yu mɔ, ɓɛɛ mi gbɛɛ wannu ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ ɓɔn ɛ̀nɛ́-a.
Hegɔ mi tɛ fo o bíí lɛŋ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́. K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛ wi n’ɛnɛ kii'i, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ pii ɗoŋ. O bíí lɛŋ tɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
Wen'i dee tɛ Absalɔm in o gasawi
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Absalɔm tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ sá Husai be Ark, ɛ̀ɛ̀ zíí mɔ n'aa a̧a̧ nɛnɛ mɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt.»
Husai nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ Absalɔm, ɓɛɛ Absalɔm tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wen nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé nɛ mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧‘i nde? Kà a̧ bòò hegɔ na, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ kɔ-mɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ zìì.»
Husai kifa nú ha̧ Absalɔm: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ mbɔrɔ nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧a̧'ɛ de na.»
Ɓɛɛ Husai tɔ̧ siti: «Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o bíí kɔ‘i; wa nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi, ɓɛɛ wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ hee ŋma bókó-nam
