Dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧sa̧ kinii, kóó kɔ̧ ŋma kɔ̧, kóó sɛn ŋma fara. Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí be tɛɛ ku̧ naŋ fea-a mgbara yɛ, ŋma bíí tɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧a̧: ‹O bíí kuma mgbara o bíí nɛ nɛ́ in Absalɔm;›
ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ́ ŋga bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ see dila, tɛ-a tɛ gbin wen o be
Mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m n'am tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: o be
Ɛɛ tɛ kpa a̧, kóó a̧ hu̧sa̧ déè. Ɛɛ tɛ ai a zu a̧, hee mɔ nɛ mbɛŋ ai nɛnɛ a nù'ɛ ga. Ɛɛ beka e a̧, kóó ŋma bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ duk kpasa na.
Kà a̧ nɛ́ yuu mɔ hu̧si tɛ ŋma ye, o be
Absalɔm in o be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Husai nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in Abiatar: «Mɔ nɛ Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Absalɔm in o gasawi

Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm mbaŋ tɛ David nɛ̀ haya-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧, ká a̧ yor nú ŋga-gbárà mɛ zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ na; kà nɛ́ nyɛma, a̧ a̧ ɓír ɓir yak; kà bó hegɔ na, wa tɛ kum wannu in o bíí nɛ̀ nɛ́ in a̧ yinɛ war kpɔk.»
Yɔnataŋ in Ahimas yaa so sɛn Ɛn-Rogɛl zɛm nɛ̀ ŋma kó-de-tom, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kó-de-tom'i a̧ duk so we nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ wa, sɛka wa nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu David, wen wa nyɛm so mɛ ye saaye na, ka bíí tɛɛ zɔk wa.
Ŋma wese, ŋma be-ŋgaiwi zɔka wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ dali ha̧ Absalɔm. Wa yuu mɔ wa yiitoo lɛŋ nɛ haya-a si tɛ ko ŋma bíí saaye Bahurim. Kɔ̧-yì duka so bee-gara kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ye hu̧si sɛnɛ.
Kóò ko wi’ɛi baa ndàrá kpe nɛ nú kɔ̧-yì‘i, ɓɛɛ tati o gba̧a̧-nyɔnɔ sɛnɛ. Wi iŋ‘e ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o ŋgaiwi ko Absalɔm tɛɛ ye kɔ̧ tua ko kóò‘i, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Ahimas in Yɔnataŋ a̧a̧ déè nde?»
Kóò‘i kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Wa kuu yì yak kaɗi.»
Wa kia mɔ fara'i lɛŋ, wa kpa wa na, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm.

Ɗoŋ nɛ o wi-kii-mɔ ko Absalɔm yaka kaɗi, Yɔnataŋ in Ahimas gboa nɛ kɔ̧-yì nɛ́ɛ̀ mbaŋ tɛ wannu David. Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yak! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú yì nɛ̀ haya-a, wen mbɔrɔ nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu'nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.»
David baa yuwar in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ku Jurdɛn. Mɛ gɔna ndaa-zan, ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ kuu yì kaɗi.

Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl zɔka'e, bíí ba mbɔrɔ kɔ‘i de nɛ̀ tom na, a̧ hɛra tuifuu kɔ̧-a̧, daŋ ɓɛɛ a̧ ba war yak si saaye kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ga̧i̧ tɛ-a nɛ nyak. Ɗoŋ fio kɔ̧-a̧, wa guna a̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
David hɔɔ sɛn Mahanayim, ɓɛɛ ká Absalɔm in o be
Absalɔm ee so Amasa hee gasawi ko o wi-biro ga oi Jɔab. Amasa nɛ́ bem ko ŋma bíí nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ Yitra be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be

Ŋgimbi nɛ David hɔɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Mahanayim, o bíí taar tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ zɔk a̧: kuti-a nɛ́ Sɔbi, bem ko Nahas be Raba ye-wan ko o be Amɔŋ; yiitoo-aa nɛ́ Makir, bem ko Amiɛl be Lo-Dabar; sɛka Barzilai be Rogɛlim sɛn nú Galad.
Wa kaia o mɔɔ-ɔ-nɛnɛ, o mɔɔ-gu-tɛ, o nyɛk-nyɔŋ-mɔ, alkamaari, be-fon,
gɔrɔ, nɔ̧́, o sami in kpoo-ndai tɛnɛ ha̧ David in o bíí nɛ ya in a̧, wen wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so, o bíí mbɔia, wa zɔka bɔnɛ wɔ in wɔ-yì sɛn ŋga-gbárà.
David tɔra o wi-biro nɛ̀ yaa in a̧. A̧ ee gasawi zu bíí booro-booro, in zu bíí gɔmŋmaa-gɔmŋmaa.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ nú wen yaka-a. A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ bíí tɛ fara taar, a̧ ha̧a̧ dùk-aa kpɔk ha̧ Jɔab, kpɔk ha̧ Abisai bem ko Sɛruya nya Jɔab, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ kpɔk ha̧ Itai be Gat. Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ kànà mɛ yak biro in'nɛ̀ɛ́ mbɛt.»

O wi-biro kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ biro na. K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ yu mɔ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ŋma mɔ na; kóó reeta ɛɛ kuma, beka de ŋma mɔ na mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma ŋmaa in wi-biro booro-ɓu; gana so ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk k’ɛ́nɛ́ saaye wen gbaka yɛ.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi tɛ de nɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ yor ká̧ nú garo ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-biro gbo nɛnɛ tɛ fara gɔmŋmaa-gɔmŋmaa in tɛ fara booro-booro.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab, Abisai in Itai hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ mɔktɛ in Absalɔm bem kɔ‘m.» O wi-biro lɛŋ zia wannu fara ha̧a̧ heembea'i ha̧ o gasawi wen zu Absalɔm.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa gboo a zaŋbɛɛ, we nɛ̀ ti o be
O wi-biro ko David gbina biro'i ti o be
Biro bìì dam zu nù‘i lɛŋ; o bíí nɛ̀ fee ɓɔn kɔ̧ kombo gana wan nɛ fee nú gba-paa.
Absalɔm nɛ̀ɛ̀ tó zu nɛ̀ o wi-biro ko David. A̧ daŋa so nɛ́ sunda, ɓɛɛ sunda ye ɗɔɔ da̧a̧ gbaa-er ŋma gasa te
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ŋma bíí zɔka a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «Mi zɔka Absalɔm fara ga̧i̧a-a tɛ ŋma gasa te mɛ‘i.»
Jɔab kifa nú ha̧ wi nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ a̧‘i: «Mɛ zɔka a̧ nɛ gbaayí-mɛ, sa mɛ gɔm a̧ gbɛ ɓɔn bɛɗɛ na wen ge? Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ so kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu in kanda ha̧ mɛ gɔ.»

Wi’ɛi kifa nú ha̧ Jɔab: «Kóó ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ so nɛ́ kɔya bu-mbɔi booro ha̧‘m, bo nɛ mi tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɛm mɛ ba er-am gbɛ nɛ̀ bem ko wannu na! Wen wen nɛ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ in ha̧ Abisai ká bá nɛ̀ Itai'i, ɛɛ lɛŋ zia; a̧ tɔ̧a̧ ndé, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí zu'nɛ́ ká ŋma bíí tam tɛ bem kɔ‘i Absalɔm na.
Kà‘m de so ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ ga, bo nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ hu̧si hu̧si na; wen ŋma mɔ nɛ ɓɔn nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nɛ wannu iŋ na bo na. Ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kafi k’ɛ́nɛ́ e zu'm.»
Ɓɛɛ Jɔab tɔ̧: «Mi beka ɗáŋ ŋgimbi in mɛɛ na.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kai sɛ́ɛ̀ taar, tok nɛ̀ yí-see Absalɔm fara ga̧i̧a-a nɛ kpasa tɛ te.
O baka-nyaŋa ko Jɔab ɓu kɛra Absalɔm, ɓɛɛ gɔm a̧ gbɛ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ biro kaɗi ndaka pata o be
Wa baa Absalɔm pi̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gasa gboŋgo sɛn kɔ̧ kombo hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa kin o ta nɛ̀ dɔka-a a zu a̧. O be

Ŋgimbi nɛ Absalɔm ɓɔna so nɛ̀ kpasa, a̧ mboo so ŋma ta-zu-nù nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko Wannu, wen a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so: «Mi kpa be-wiwii ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.» Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa aa nin-a ha̧ ta-zu-nù‘i, nɛ wa sa hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘e, «Ta-zu-nù ko Absalɔm.»
Ahimas bem ko Sadɔk tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m ma yì nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ de nyɛrɛ ha̧ wannu ndé, GASA WAN kifa er oi nú-a zuɗi nɛ a̧ yinɛ er o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.»
Jɔab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ beka duk wi-tɔ̧-de nyɛrɛ sɔsɔɔ na. Mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ŋma wese, wen sɔsɔɔ‘i beka duk nɛ de nyɛrɛ na, wen nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio ko bem ko wannu.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ ŋma be Kus:

Ahimas bem ko Sadɔk tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab woyo: «Mɔ nɛ tɛ de a̧ dé. Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m ma yì nɛnɛ ɗoŋ be Kus'i mbɛt.» Jɔab tɔ̧a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ tɛ ma yì wen ge? Bo nɛ ŋma de nyɛrɛmɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ kpa ŋma mɔɔ-oi-aa kpaa na.»
Ahimas kifa nú: «Mɔ nɛ tɛ de a̧ dé! Mi tɛ nɛ kànà!» Hegɔ Jɔab tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ̀!» Ɓɛɛ Ahimas ba war bɔkɔ-nú Jurdɛn nɛ wara yì, ɓɛɛ nɛ gan be Kus'i.
David duka so nù mgbara nú garo yiitoo. Wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ̀ɛ̀ si fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn sɛn zu garo. A̧ baa yí-a nɛ̀ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk ŋma bíí fara maa yì tɛnɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀.
Wi-pɛm-mɔ hiɗa mɔ nɛnɛ sitɛ David; ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧: «Kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ duka ɛ̀nɛ̀, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba nɛ de nyɛrɛmɔ tɛnɛ.» Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi hɛɗi nɛ mɔ tɛnɛ ga,
wi-pɛm-mɔ zɔka ŋma ɓii bíí fara maa yì tɛnɛ woyo. Wi-pɛm-mɔ hiɗa mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wi-pɛm-nú tua: «Ŋma mbe bíí a̧ ma yì tɛnɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀‘i.» Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Wi’ɛi ba nɛ de nyɛrɛmɔ tɛnɛ woyo mbɛt.»
Wi-pɛm-mɔ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi iŋa naŋ wara yì ko
Ɓɛɛ wannu kifi nú: «Wi’ɛi nɛ́ wi-de-demɔ; a̧ ba nɛ de nyɛrɛmɔ tɛnɛ!»
Ahimas tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ hee ger ha̧ wannu: «Mɔ yaka nɛ̀ de-a.» A̧ guu nù ti wannu ba yi-a gu nù, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ aa o wi nɛ dee so ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ̧ er yɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu ak mɔ: «Bem kɔ‘m Absalɔm duk nɛ̀ de-a nde?»
Ahimas kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «Mi zɔka gasa foo mɔ ŋgimbi nɛ Jɔab toma nɛ̀ ɛɛ in ŋma bíí pii tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mgbák mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, mi iŋ na.»
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɛ̀ dúk mɛ‘i.» A̧ yaka nɛ́ɛ̀ yor nɛ ɗoŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ be Kus'i hɔa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Dáà wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí de nyɛrɛ n'am tɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́: GASA WAN dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a in'nɛ̀ɛ̀ sɔsɔɔ, tɛ dea-a h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbo ɗɔɔ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wannu aka be Kus: «Bem kɔ‘m Absalɔm duk nɛ́ de-a nde?»
Be Kus'i kifa nú: «Mɔ nɛ kpaa be-ŋgaiwi'i a̧ kpá o wisɛn ko nyaa, wannu kɔ‘m in o wi-ba-zu we nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kpa so'nɛ́‘i.»

Ɗɛɗɛ wannu ŋmana. A̧ daŋa si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua zu nú-garo-ye, ɓɛɛ a̧ ŋma nú-a tɛ kɔ̧a̧. A̧ taŋa kɔ̧a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Oee bem kɔ‘m Absalɔm, oee bem kɔ‘m wa! Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ fe so oi nú mɛ ɓɛɛ wa. Oee Absalɔm bem kɔ‘m, oee bem kɔ‘m wa!»
Wa mbaŋa tɛ Jɔab ndé, wannu ai nɛ́ nú, hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ Absalɔm.
Gbina-biro wese'i kifa nɛ́ zima-fio, wen bíí lɛŋ zia wese'i ndé, wannu duk nɛ̀ tu̧u̧-see nyɛmna, wen zu bem kɔ‘i.
O wi-biro lɛŋ sii nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧-a̧ si saaye, hee o wi-biro nɛ̀ yuu biro ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ foe ba ga.
Wannu kpee so mɔ yí, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a: «Oee Absalɔm bem kɔ‘m! Oee bem kɔ‘m wa!»

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab yee tua sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ foe zu o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ foo fio zu'nɛ́ yinɛ sɔsɔɔ. Wa kpasa'nɛ́, wa kpasa o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a ká bá nɛ̀ o kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.

Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ o wi nɛ sɛn'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ sɛn o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́. Mɔ n’ɛnɛ usa h’ɛ́ɛ́ sɔsɔɔ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧‘e, o gasawi in o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ sɛn ti'nɛ́. Mi iŋa sɔsɔɔ‘i, kà Absalɔm a̧ duk so kpasa, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ fee k’ɛɛ lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔ‘i nɛ́ demɔ nyɛmna.

Ɓɛɛ kinii, mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbo na, mi kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN ndé, ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ tɛ ɓɔn in'nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ bo na, ɓɛɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ gasa bɔnɛ gan o dɔka-a nɛ̀ kpaa'nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu kura nɛ́ɛ̀ duk nù sɛn nú garo, ɓɛɛ wa mbaŋ tɛ o wi-biro lɛŋ‘e: «Wannu gboo zan duk nú garo.» Ɓɛɛ o wi-biro lɛŋ mɔi̧ pii ti wannu.
O bíí lɛŋ yuu so mɔ, o ndé si kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i.
Mgbara zuduk o be
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Absalɔm n’ɛɛ tɛna nɔ̧́-wan a zu a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu yɛ, a̧ fea tɛ biro mɛ kaɗi. Ɛnɛ zɛm nɛ ge h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ wan k’ɛɛ piinɛ ge?»
Wannu David toma nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, Sadɔk in Abiatar: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o gasawi Juda ndé, mɔ nɛ o be
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o nya'm, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ‘m; wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn nɛ́ o sɔŋkur wi nɛ̀ tɛ kur mɛ mgbɔ wannu piinɛ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ak Amasa'e, a̧ bo nɛ tɔk-tɛ‘m na nde? Sɔ̧ a̧ dé ŋgamɔ in am, kà‘m nɛ́ baa a̧ e oi Jɔab hee wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kɔ‘m ga na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
David kpaia taamɔ ko o bíí Juda lɛŋ hee taamɔ ko kpɔk bíí ga, ɓɛɛ wa tom tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ in o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.»
Wannu pia ɗoŋ hɔ nú Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ ká o bíí Juda hɔɔ so kɔ-wa sɛn Gilgal mɛ we ti a̧ kaɗi, wen mgbɔɔ a̧ ku nɛ̀ Jurdɛn.
Simɛi bem ko Gɛra, bezaŋ Bɛnjamin saaye Bahurim zira nɛ̀ haya-a in o be Juda mɛ we ti wannu David.

O bíí nù ko Bɛnjamin nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ in a̧ nɛ́ bíí booro-kpɔk. Ɓɛɛ Siba wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua ko Saul kur in o bem kɔ‘i ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ gu nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu-yiitoo mbɛt. Wa yaka mɛ we ti wannu si nú Jurdɛn,
ɓɛɛ ka kombon ku nɛ́ yì mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kai o bíí nutua ko wannu, in ha̧ o wi-ba-kombon mɛ de o tom lɛŋ nɛ̀ wannu tɛ kɔ̧. Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu kuu Jurdɛn kaɗi, Simɛi bem ko Gɛra tika nù ti a̧,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká nyaa pi̧ nú tɛ yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m na! Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m n'am dee in'nɛ̀ɛ́ wese n’ɛnɛ gboo nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm yak na. Ká wannu e mɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ see na.
«Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea. Mi dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ, mi yaka ti ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Jozɛf lɛŋ ha̧‘m mɛ we ti nyaa wannu kɔ‘m.»
Abisai bem ko Sɛruya gɔna nú a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ Simɛi nyɛma so mɛ fe wen n'aa da̧a̧ so wi nɛ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ na nde?»
David tɔ̧a̧: «Ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ mgbara mɛ in am, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kii war mɛ duk nɛ wisɛn kɔ‘m sɔsɔɔ nde, bem ko Sɛruya? Wi tɛ gbɛ ŋma bíí sɔsɔɔ sɛn
Hegɔ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Simɛi: «Mɛ beka fe na.» Ɓɛɛ wannu kan mɔ ha̧ a̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Mɛfibosɛt bem ko Saul zira mɛ we ti wannu; a̧ fɔr naŋ-a na, a̧ kpui zera na, a̧ fɔr laa kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ wese nɛ̀ wannu yaka nɛnɛ hɔ wese n'aa pia nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, mɔ kpa wannu na.
Ŋgimbi n'aa wee nɛ ti wannu hɔ Jerusalɛm, wannu aka a̧: «Mɛfibosɛt, wen ge sa mɛ yak so in am na ge?»
Mɛfibosɛt kifa nú: «Nyaa wannu, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m ɔra'm. Mi wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ taa so: ‹Mi tɛ hɛr nana tuifuu kɔ‘m mɛ daŋ yak nɛnɛ in wannu,› wen mi nɛ wi-kum.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nyaa wannu, ɛ́nɛ́ duk hee betom ko Sɔ̧ ga. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.

«Ko nyaa wannu kɔ‘m, o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m lɛŋ nyɛma so mɛ fe; mɔ kpɔk, ɛnɛ kpɛka ha̧‘m, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, mɛ ye mgbara o bíí nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́. Ŋma mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ́ ge ɓɔ ge? Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ ak er wannu woyo ɓɔ ge?»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wi dɔk wen de nɛ ge ɓɔ ge? Ɛnɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù in Siba.»
Mɛfibosɛt tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «A̧ a̧ bá kɔ̧-a̧ nù nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ, wen nɛ̀ nyaa wannu pia, ŋma mɔ kpa a̧ na.»
Barzilai be Galad zira so tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Rogɛlim; a̧ mgbɔɔ wannu ku nɛ Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak kɔ̧-a̧ e a̧ hi̧i̧.
Barzilai sɔka so nyɛmna, a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ zɔka so wannu nɛ̀ de-a ŋgimbi nɛ wannu nɛ̀ɛ̀ so nɛnɛ si Mahanayim; wen Barzilai duka so nɛ́ ŋma wanmbɔi.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Barzilai: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yák in mɛɛ; mi tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ̀ de-a katɛ‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm.»
Barzilai kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «Oi ŋgimbi ɓɔna ha̧‘m géè sa'm tɛ nɛ in wannu si Jerusalɛm ge?

Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar sɔsɔɔ, mi nyɛm mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ ɓɔna. Mi nyɛma so mɛ kpa nyɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ n'am nyɔŋ in mɔ n'am nɔ nde? Mi nyɛma so mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara tiger o wiwii in o okoo-bii-gima nde? Ɓɛɛ wen ge mi tɛ nɛ kɔ‘m ha̧ nɛ̀ ŋma dita tui h’ɛ́nɛ́ ge nde?
Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ku nɛ́ Jurdɛn in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓɛɛ; wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de er-demɔ hegɔ ha̧‘m ge?

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yuwar ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ si kɔ‘i ɗoŋ. Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ fe ɓɔn ye kɔ‘m sɛn ká̧ pɛsi-fio ko dáà kɔ‘m in nàà kɔ‘m. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k bem kɔ‘m Kimham; a̧ tɛ nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, nyaa wannu kɔ‘m; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de in a̧.»
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Kimham a̧ sí in am, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ hok ha̧‘m mɛ de ha̧ mɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ.»
O bíí lɛŋ kuu Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wannu ku mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr ŋmaa in Barzilai, tok de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ Barzilai si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu baa war yak si Gilgal, ɓɛɛ Kimham yak in a̧. O be Juda lɛŋ in reeta duk be
O be
O bíí Juda lɛŋ kifa nú ha̧ o be
O be
Ɓɛɛ nú wen ko o be Juda a̧ ŋgaya gan nú wen ko o be
Ŋma wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ na duka so sɛn hi̧i̧; nin-a nɛ́ Seba, bem ko Bikri ŋma bezaŋ Bɛnjamin. A̧ dɔma zak ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Ŋma war mɔ k’ɛɛ bo er David na. Ɛ́ɛ́ bó k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi in bem ko Jɛse na. O be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be

David sii ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu n'aa aa so mɛ pɛm kira, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa kɔ̧ ŋma tua nɛ‘i pɛm pɛm. A̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk in wa na. Wa yaa hi̧i̧ hee o ko-gera nɛ̀ wíì kɔ-wa tɛ fe na ga hɔ nɛnɛ wese fio kɔ-wa.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Amasa: «Mɛ̀ sá o be Juda tɛnɛ ha̧‘m zaŋ zɛ nɔ'ɔ taar’ɛ, a̧ mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ dúk hɛ̧ɛ̧.»
Amasa yaka mɛ sa o be Juda, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓɔn gan zu ŋgimbi nɛ David gɔna so ha̧ a̧.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Abisai: «Kinii, Seba, bem ko Bikri tɛ de mɔ in yɛɛ ɗaŋ gan ko Absalɔm. Mɛ̀ káí o wi-biro ko wan kɔ-mɛ a̧ mɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ Seba, wen ká a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ye tɛ o ye-ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ yak er yɛ.»
O wi-biro ko Jɔab in o be Kɛrɛt, o be Pɛlɛt in o ŋgaŋa-wi lɛŋ kaia ŋmaa a ɗoŋ Abisai, wen yaka biro. Wa kura Jerusalɛm ndak ɗoŋ Seba bem ko Bikri nɛ̀ biro.

Nɛ̀ wa hɛɗa nɛ̀ gasa ta nɛ̀ duk Gabaɔŋ mɛ kaɗi, wa kpaa ŋmaa in Amasa. Jɔab pi̧i̧ so nɛ́ laa-biro nɛ̀ gba-paa kɔ̧ koɓo-a guntir sɛn zu laa. Ŋgimbi n'aa gboo siti, gba-paa hɔ̧fa̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ koɓo-a ɓɛɛ tik nù.
Jɔab aka Amasa: «Nya'm, mɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a nde?» Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa pi̧i̧ er-a mɛ wiiko kasi zera ko Amasa mɛ hɛr a̧.
Amasa zɔk so kɔ‘i gba-paa nɛ duk ɓii er Jɔab'i na. Jɔab toka zaŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ nyak zaŋ-aa gbo a nù. Ɓɔna nɛ̀ toka a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ Amasa fe ɓɔn oi.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔab in nya-wi Abisai ndaka ɗoŋ Seba bem ko Bikri yaknɛ.
Ŋma ŋgaiwi ko Jɔab ɓɔna kɔ‘i hi̧i̧ mɛ pɛm wɔr Amasa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «O wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ Jɔab nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ o bíí ko David a̧ ndak pata Jɔab!»
Ŋgimbi'i, ká wɔr Amasa a̧a̧ mbɔɗɔnu see war; tɔk kpee tɛ-a lɛŋ. Ŋgaiwi'i zɔka'e, dukbíí lɛŋ yor yor zɔk nɛ wɔr Amasa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbur a̧ yinɛ yuwar si zaŋbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ba laa kpe nɛ̀ zu a̧.
Ŋgimbi n'aa gbura Amasa yinɛ yuwar kaɗi, o bíí lɛŋ nɛ hɔ, ɓir ɓir yak si ɗoŋ Jɔab wen ndaka pata Seba bem ko Bikri.
Seba nɛ̀ɛ̀ dam ɗoŋ o duk be
O wi-biro ko Jɔab gɔna nú-a e sɛn Abɛl-Bɛt-Maka, ɓɛɛ wa a mɔ daŋ hɔ zu garo. O wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛɛ in Jɔab sɔkɔɗa garo wen ha̧ mɛ tik nù.
Ŋma haya okoo duka kɔ̧ garo hiɗi nɛ mɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Jɔab a̧ a̧ ɗɔŋ piiti ha̧‘m tɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧.»
Jɔab ɗɔŋa piiti, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ak a̧: «Jɔab nɛ́ mɛ́ nde?» Ɓɛɛ Jɔab kifi nú: «Nɛ́ mí.» Ɓɛɛ kóò‘i tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ zíí wen ko kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ.» Ɓɛɛ Jɔab kifi nú: «Mi a̧‘m zii'i.»
Kóò‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti: «Ɓeemɛ, ɛɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ tua-wen ndé: ‹Mɛ̀ ák Abɛl-Bɛt-Maka,› ɓɛɛ wen kaɗa.
Ŋma ye sɛn
Jɔab kifa nú: «Gasa ɗaŋmɔ a̧ tík zu'm ka'm nɛ ɗaŋa mɔ.
Bo nɛ mɔ‘i ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí na. Ŋma be zu-kaya Efraim, nin-a nɛ́ Seba bem ko Bikri dee ŋgazu in wannu David. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó a̧ ɛ̀nɛ́-a gbonɛ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi ee ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk.»
Ɓɛɛ kóò‘i tɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «Ɛɛ tɛ pi̧ gɔɔ-zu-a nɛ̀ zu garo ha̧ mɛ.»

Kóò‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧. Wa gɔna ger Seba bem ko Bikri, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ gɔɔ-zu-a nɛ zu garo ha̧ Jɔab. Jɔab dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ wa e ye'i duk si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa. Jɔab sii kɔ‘i ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm si katɛ wannu.
Jɔab duka so zu o wi-biro
Adoram duka so kɔ‘i zu o bara, Yehosafat, bem ko Ahilud duka so kɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ-geŋa.
Sɛwa so nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ; Sadɔk in Abiatar so nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ Ira be Yair so nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko David mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi wan ko David, kaɓa tika so nù tɛ pɛ taar. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David nɛ̀ɛ̀ ak mɔ in GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Simbo tɔk a̧a̧ zu Saul in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧, wen a̧ gbɛɛ so o be Gabaɔŋ.»
Wannu saa o be Gabaɔŋ: o be Gabaɔŋ nɔ‘i bó so nɛ́ o be
David aka o be Gabaɔŋ: «Mɔ n'am tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ge? Mi tɛ ɗafi mɔ hee ge h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí ko GASA WAN ge?»
O be Gabaɔŋ kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Bo nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, kóó gbɛɛ ŋma be
David tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ lɛŋ, mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
O be Gabaɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ kum yɛ, nɛ̀ taa so kɔ‘i, ɛɛ kuma sɛn nú
ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ bezaŋ-aa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ga̧i̧ tɛ te ti GASA WAN sɛn saaye Gibea ko Saul, wannu nɛ GASA WAN hoka so.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧: «Mi tɛ ha̧ wa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wannu ee Mɛfibosɛt, bem ko Jɔnataŋ, be-koo Saul wen zu kanamɔ nɛ̀ David in Jɔnataŋ kànà so mgbara ŋmaa ti GASA WAN.

A̧ kaia o be-wiwii ko Rispa yiitoo, boko-bem ko Aya n'aa koo so ha̧ Saul. Nin-wa nɛ Armɔni in Mɛfibosɛt. A̧ kaia o bem ko Mikal, boko-bem ko Saul n'aa koo so ha̧ Adriɛl bem ko Barzilai be Mɛhɔla mɔɔrɔ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa er o be Gabaɔŋ. Wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ ga̧i̧ wa tɛ te zu kaya ti GASA WAN. Wa fee mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i lɛŋ. Wa gbɛɛ wa tɛ kuti ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ mɔi̧a be-fon.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Rispa boko-bem ko Aya kaia laa-zim-fio tati zu ta ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ ŋgimbi mɔi̧a alkamaari hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ kórò aa nɛ̀ nù. A̧ kɔ̧ so ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ nyɔŋ wɔr mɛ wese in ha̧ o saɗi mɛ nyɔŋ wɔr mɛ zɛ na mbɛt.
Wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ Rispa boko bem ko Aya, kóò ko Saul dea'i ha̧ David,

ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa nɛ̀ɛ̀ kai o gba̧a̧ Saul in o gba̧a̧ Jɔnataŋ bem kɔ̧-a̧ er o wanmbɔi Yabɛs nú Galad. O wanmbɔi nɔ‘i zu̧u̧ so o gba̧a̧ nɔ‘i sɛn bee-gara Bɛt-Seaŋ, fara nɛ o be Filistii ga̧i̧a so wa sɛnɛ, wese nɛ wa gbɛɛ nɛ Saul sɛn Gilboa.
David kaia o gba̧a̧ Saul in o gba̧a̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔnataŋ sɛn nú Bɛnjamin sɛn Yabɛs yinɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ a zu ko o wi nɛ wa ga̧i̧a so.

Wa guna o gba̧a̧ Saul in o gba̧a̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔnataŋ sɛn nú Bɛnjamin sɛn Sela, kɔ̧ pɛsi ko Kis dáà ko Saul. Ɗoŋ nɛ wa dee mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de'i kaɗi, Sɔ̧ zɔka nù‘i nɛ̀ de yí.
Biro ku̧u̧ mgbara o be Filistii in o be
Isbi-Benɔb nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ bezaŋ Harafa, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ nɛ̀ dita-a nɛ́ kilo taar nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ zu-a, in nɛ̀ hɛra so mbe gba-paa, gasi nɛ́ zu'e, wi tɛ gbɛ David.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abisai bem ko Sɛruya tɛ̀ɛ̀ gbak David, ɓɛɛ gbɛ be Filistii'i nɛ̀ gba-paa. Hegɔ, o bíí ko David ha̧a̧ nú, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛnɛ beka nɛ biro in yɛɛ ɓɔna, wen o be
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, biro ku̧u̧ naŋ sɛn Gob mɛ in o be Filistii; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Sibɛkai be Husa gbɛɛ nɛ Saf ŋma bezaŋ Harafa.
Biro ku̧u̧ naŋ woyo sɛn Gob mɛ in o be Filistii; ɓɛɛ Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Yair be Bɛtlɛhɛm gbɛ Goliat be Gat; te-sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧ ndota so hee te-mgboi-laa ko wi-de-laa ga.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ biro baa woyo sɛn Gat. Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧, waza-er-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, waza-naŋ-a mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk mbɛt. O waza-er-a in o waza-naŋ-a lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar. A̧ mbɛt duka so nɛ́ ŋma bezaŋ Arafa.
A̧ pɛra wen in o be
Wa lɛŋ naar'i yaa so nɛ́ o bezaŋ Harafa sɛn Gat, ɓɛɛ David in o wi-biro kɔ‘i kum wa lɛŋ.
David bia gima’ɛ ha̧ GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN kpasa nɛ̀ a̧ er Saul in er o dɔka wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧:
GASA WAN nɛ́ ta-ɛk-tɛ‘m,
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m;
a̧ nɛ́ wan-gbo'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m.
Mi hu̧si ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧ tɛ-a,
wen a̧ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m;
a̧ nɛ́ ŋgee kɔ‘m in zak-gbin-biro kɔ‘m.
A̧ nɛ́ ŋgárá kɔ‘m in fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ‘m.
Wan-kpas'am, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kpas'am
er o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN;
kà‘m sa a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m.
Fio aa mbul kɔ‘i zik nɛ‘m;
kin-yì ɗaŋmɔ pi̧i̧ bele tɛ‘m.
Yɔk yukuta'm mɛ zuɗ‘am pi̧ fara ko o fio;
fio za̧a̧ lim gɔn nɛ̀ ti'm.
Mi saa GASA WAN tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ kɔ‘m'i,
mi hiɗa mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀
aa zer-aa kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zii tiger-am.
Nù foo mɔ ɗirr,
ɓɛɛ o gun yiwese nak.
Nɛ́ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dee ha̧ mɔ mɛ fo mɔ.
Zi-wee tura nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ gbonɛ nduɗɛɛ,
wee baa kɔ̧ nú-a mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ o kɛ̧i̧-wee nyɔŋ yoŋgoŋgo.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gira yiwese
ɓɛɛ a̧ zir tɛnɛ nɛ̀ tu̧-zan ɗɔɔ naŋ-a.
A̧ daŋa zu
ɓɛɛ búk ba a̧ bu̧i̧ nɛnɛ faoo tɛnɛ.
A̧ baa tum kpe nɛ̀ tɛ-a;
a̧ dee ha̧ tum-kórò mɛ duk nɛ́ tua kɔ̧-a̧;
Sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ yaka ti ha̧ a̧ pi̧i̧ lai-lai.
GASA WAN tuɓa nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ;
Dáà Wan nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
dee ha̧ bíí mɛ zii tiger-a.
A̧ pi̧i̧ góò ndak nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ pi̧i̧ kórò pɛsi nɛ̀ wa a taŋ sót-sót.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ nyimsea,
búk gboo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́
nɛ̀ dee ha̧ yi mɛ ɔ̧si gɔn mgbót-mgbót,
in ha̧ o ta ɗɔɔ nù mɛ gbo a zan.
A̧ nyɛi̧a er tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ
ba nɛ‘m yinɛ zɛɓɛn;
a̧ daka'm ɗɔɔ gasa yì gbonɛ.
A̧ gboa'm er ŋga wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ;
a̧ kpasa'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m nɛ̀ ŋgaia gan am.
Wa kura so zu'm wese bɔnɛ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN yee ɗoŋ am.
A̧ ɓara'm er wa yinɛ ha̧‘m mɛ yak mɔ kɔ‘m;
a̧ kpasa'm wen n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ am nyɛmna.
GASA WAN ha̧ mɔ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ yuwar-a;
a̧ de demɔ dee ha̧‘m nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ‘m,
wen mi ndak pata yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ de-a;
mi zik ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m na.
O heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ duk ɓɔn yí‘m;
mi e o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ duk na.
A̧ iŋa ndé, ŋma ɗaŋmɔ bo tɛ‘m na,
wen mi kasi nɛ zu'm ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ.
GASA WAN de demɔ dee in am
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
wen yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘m ɔ sa̧a̧ sɛn ti a̧.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-yor-ɗoŋ wi-mbo-zu;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ
ha̧ o wi-de-mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ sa̧a̧
sitɛ wi nɛ̀ yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ sa̧a̧;
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ de mɔ tan na,
ɛ́nɛ́ dé kànà nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-zaŋ in a̧ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpásí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-mɔka-see,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ wi-gasi-zu mɛ pofi.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ lamba kɔ‘m;
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ nyɛk gɔn zik am.
Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ gbak am
mɛ gɔm zu̧ mgbara o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ gbak am
mɛ kpíɗí yak zu garo sitɛ wa mbɛt.
Wi nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ wen zu tom ko Sɔ̧ na;
wen ko GASA WAN bo nɛ́ ndela na.
A̧ nɛ́ ŋgee ko bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
Ŋma Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ yak zu GASA WAN nde?
Ŋma ta-hu̧si-tɛ k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ gana GASA WAN nɛ́ o nde?
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ bíí nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ wen tɛ mɔ n'am de na.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ de-a
hee zambɛrɛ
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ yor mitak zu kusa kaya.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi bíí biro ha̧‘m;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi ŋgaŋa kusaa-ndɛrɛ ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgee-gbin-biro ha̧‘m;
dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧‘m mɛ gasi.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧‘m mɛ ma yì nɛ ŋgaya-a,
ɓɛɛ naŋ-am mbali ŋmaa na.
Kà‘m ndak pata o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi kpaa wa;
mi kum wa lɛŋ kaɗi sɛka'm pia ɗoŋ.
Kà‘m yo wa a nù,
wa kur ɓɔna;
wa aa nù gbuɗuk,
ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ wa a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ naŋ-am.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m tɛ biro;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wi-nas'am
mɛ tir a nu gbéyéŋ sɛn ti'm.
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m
mɛ zik tɛ yu mɔ yak,
ɓɛɛ mi kum o wi-kur-zu'm nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Wa hiɗa mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi-kpasi-wa bo na;
wa hiɗa mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ kifa-nú bo ha̧ wa na.
Mi hɔ̧na wa kifi nɛ́ kutumu̧i̧;
mi i̧sa wa gɔn lekete
hee ɓɔtɛ yuwar ga.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa'm
er dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ̀ kura so zu'm;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ea'm zu o dukbíí,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ ŋma dukbíí n'am iŋ na
ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu wa mbɛt.
O gɔni dukbíí nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ tɛ‘m
mɛ tɔ̧ yɔka wen ha̧‘m;
kà‘m he mbea ha̧ wa war kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ wa zia kaɗi.
Tɛ o gɔni dukbíí nɔ‘i mɔka lɛŋ;
wa gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ ŋga tua-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ naka-tɛ.
GASA WAN a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ ko wi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m!
O bíí a̧ gásí Sɔ̧, wi-gbin-biro ha̧‘m!
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ ha̧ ŋgai
mɛ kifi er ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ e ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbíí.
GASA WAN,
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ gbo'm er o ŋga wisɛn kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ba'm e ŋgɔn zu o wi-kur-zu'm;
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ gbo'm er o wi-de-ŋgamɔ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm gasi'nɛ́
mgbara o dukbíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na.
Mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ de ha̧ wannu n'aa hoka
mɛ gbin o biro;
a̧ yor ɗoŋ wi n'aa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧,
ɗoŋ David in o bezaŋ-aa hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
O sɔŋkur wen ko David nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ko David bem ko Jɛse,
wen ko wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN baa e ŋgɔn,
nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko Jakob tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧,
wen ko wi nɛ̀ yɔra so o gima
nɛ̀ o be
ɓɛɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ gɔn leɓ‘am.
Sɔ̧ ko
kam-ta ko
«Wi nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu bíí nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
wi nɛ̀ ɔ wan tɛ yuu kíí Sɔ̧,
duk hee sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wese daŋ nɛnɛ ga,
mɛ tutuyɛ nɛ̀ tura-zan bo na,
ɓɛɛ ká wese dee ha̧ nuŋui
mɛ dik gɛrɛm oi kórò ga.»
Bo nɛ kpɔk mɔ‘i a̧ de in o bíí
nutua kɔ‘m nɛ̀ ndaɗi in Sɔ̧ na nde?
Wen
nɛ̀ yuwar-a in nɛ̀ de-a.
Gbina-biro kɔ‘m a̧a̧ zu mɔ lɛŋ n'am kɔ̧a̧;
bo nɛ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ na nde?
O wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ-na lɛŋ
ya hee tɛn-ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀‘i kai a taŋ ga;
wi fo wa nɛ̀ er na.
Wi nɛ̀ fo wa, fo nɛ́ boi in te-sɛ́ɛ̀,
ɓɛɛ wi dɔɔ wan ɓɔn kpɔk fara.
Nin o ŋgaŋa wi-biro ko David nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Isbosɛt be Takemɔŋ duka so nɛ́ gasawi zu o ŋgaŋa-wi taar. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ toka so o bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ a nù kpɔk ŋgimbi.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Eleazar bem ko Dodo, be Ahɔ; a̧ nɛ́ ŋma kpɔk mgbara o ŋgaŋa wi-biro taar nɛ̀ duka so in David ŋgimbi nɛ o be Filistii mɔi̧a so nɛ ŋmaa mɛ bi biro, ɓɛɛ ká o be

ɓɛɛ war kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ yora nɛ̀ nɔa-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔm o be Filistii hɔ fara nɛ̀ er-a mbɔia koŋgi ɓɔn tɛ tuzu gba-paa. GASA WAN dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbin biro wese'i, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro gbin si ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kai nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-oi-biro.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Sama bem ko Age be Harar. O be Filistii mɔi̧a so ŋmaa ya sɛn Lehi; ŋma fɔ-zawa duka so hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ o wi-biro
Sama dora so kɔ‘i gari ɓɔn see fɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum o be Filistii. GASA WAN dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbin biro wese'i.
Bíí taar mgbara o bíí ɓu-taar kura, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sitɛ wannu David kɔ̧ di̧i̧ Adulam tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ, ká o ŋma dɔka o be Filistii baa so gbagari sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Refaim.
David duka so sɛn fara hu̧sa̧-a̧, ká o be Filistii a̧a̧ so sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
Ŋma wese, ɗɛɗɛ David gɔna duk tɛ ye kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ai nú: «Ba bɔɔ ŋma bíí ha̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗu gɔna-yì nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm ha̧‘m nɔ ndé-oo!»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i gbaa war gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Filistii nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗu gɔna-yì nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm, ɓɛɛ wa ba sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ David. David nɔ so yì‘i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛn a nù ha̧ GASA WAN.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN a̧ dór am tɛ dee mɔ hegɔ; yì‘i nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ ee tɛ tɛ́ fio.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ nɔ yì‘i na. Mɔ nɛ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i dea nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Abisai nya Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya duka so gasawi ko o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ bìì so o bíí gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ kpɔk sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur mgbara o bíí Ɓu-Taar;
a̧ duka gasawi kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛm ŋmaa in o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na.
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada, be Kabsɛl nɛ́ ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ dee o mɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbɛɛ so o ŋgaŋa-wi Mɔab yiitoo a nù. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbɛɛ so dila kɔ̧ gɔna-yì wese gasa ɓɔrɔ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbɛɛ so ŋma kusa be Egiptɛ mbɛt. Be Egiptɛ‘i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ er, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɓira-te. A̧ ɓara sɛ́ɛ̀‘i yinɛ er be Egiptɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ba sɛ́ɛ̀‘i tok nɛ̀ a̧ gbɛ woyo.
Mɔ nɛ Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada dee ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur nɛnɛ mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
A̧ dee ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur gan o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na. David ee a̧ nɛ̀ gasawi mgbara o wi-pɛm-tɛ.
O ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i Ɓu-Taar'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Asahɛl, nya Jɔab, Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Dodo be Bɛtlɛhɛm,
Sama be Harod, Ɛlika be Harod,
Hɛlɛs be Palti, Ira bem ko Ikɛs be Tɛkɔa,
Abiɛzɛr be Anatot, Mɛbunai be Husa,
Salmɔŋ be Ahɔ, Marai be Nɛtɔfa,
Hɛlɛb bem ko Bana be Nɛtɔfa, Itai bem ko Ribai, be Gibea ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin,
Bɛnaya be Pirɛatɔŋ, Hidai be ká̧ zaŋ yì Gas,
Abi-Albɔŋ be Bɛt-Ha-Araba, Azmavɛt be Bahurim,
Ɛliaba be Salbɔŋ. Yɔnataŋ bem ko Yasɛn,
in Sama be Harar, Ahiam bem ko Sarar be Arar,
Elifɛlɛt bem ko Asbai be-koo ŋma be Maka, Ɛliam bem ko Ahitɔfɛl be Gilo,
Hɛsrai be Karmɛl, Pari be Arab,
Yigɛal bem ko Nataŋ be Soba, Bani be Gad,
Sɛlɛk, be Amɔŋ, Narai be Bɛrot baka-nyaŋa ko Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya,
Ira be Yatir, Garɛb be Yatir,
sɛka Urii be Hit. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
See GASA WAN tu̧u̧ zu o be
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ duka in a̧: «Mɛ̀ yár dam mgbara o zuduk be
Jɔab kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dé ha̧ bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk war gɔmŋmaa, ha̧ nyaa wannu mɛ zɔk nɛ̀ yí. Wen ge s’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔr wa ge nde?»
Wannu yora kànà ɗoŋ
Wa kuu Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wa ba gbagari sɛn Arɔɛr, nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ha̧ ye nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ be-zer ko Gad, ɓɛɛ wa yak si war Yazɛr.
Wa nɛɛ hɔ Galad in sɛn bɔkɔ-nú sɛn Hodsi. Wa nɛɛ hɔ Dan-Yan, ɓɛɛ wa ɓir hɔ Sidɔŋ.
Wa yee Ŋga-ye-Tir ɓɛɛ wa yar dam tɛ o ye ko o be Hiv, in o be Kanaŋ lɛŋ. Wa yaka si Nɛgɛb nú Juda sɛn Bɛrseba mbɛt.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa yara dam nù lɛŋ tɔr nɛ̀ bíí kaɗi, wa pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm ɗoŋ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar nɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-yiitoo.
Ɓɛɛ Jɔab tɔ̧ dɔka bíí nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ ha̧ wannu: o be

Ɗɛɗɛ David ku̧u̧naŋ gɔna-a ɗoŋ n'aa tɔra nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Nɛ́ gasa ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna a̧‘m dea! Kinii, GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ a̧, wen mi dee mɔ hee mgbelewi ga nɛ̀ mbetɛ.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ David kura mɛ tutuyɛ, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so kɔ‘i wen ha̧
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ David'e, GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: ‹Mi aa ŋga bɔnɛ taar ti mɛ; mɛ̀ hók kpɔk, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ i̧i̧ a̧‘m tɛ de.› »

Gad nɛɛ kpa David, ɓɛɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ‘i ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kaɓa mɛ tik zu nù kɔ-mɛ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo náà, kóó yuu mɔ ti o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɛ ndak pata-mɛ tɛ fio-zɛ taar náà, kóó mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ zɛɛ-geŋa ha̧ mɛ tik tɛ nù kɔ-mɛ tɛ zɛ taar nde? Kinii, mɛ̀ tá mɔ a̧ mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m, wen ha̧‘m mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ wi nɛ̀ toma'm tɛnɛ.»
David kifa nú ha̧ Gad: «Mi a̧a̧ tɛ dita-see nyɛmna. Gana so ha̧‘m mɛ tik sɛn kɔ̧ er GASA WAN, wen deako kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ gasa, ba nɛ̀ tika-a kɔ̧ er o bíí.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN toma zɛɛ-geŋa pi̧ sɛn

Betom ko Sɔ̧ nyɛi̧a er si zu Jerusalɛm mɛ kum o bíí, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kpai taamɔ tɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ betom-ɗaŋ-mɔ‘i: «Kaɗa! Mɛ̀ dák er-mɛ.» Betom ko Sɔ̧ duka so fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Aravna, be Jebus.

Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David zɔka betom ko Sɔ̧ fara kuma o bíí, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Nɛ́ mi'i yɔɔ kaya; wi nɛ̀ dee ɗaŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ mi nɛ̀ tɛ‘m. Ɓɛɛ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zɔk bɔnɛ'ɛ, wa duk hee o sami ga, wa dee kɔ-wa nɛ́ ge? Gana so ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí nɛ́ bɔnɛ ha̧‘m in o bíí nutua kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ.»
Wese'i, Gad nɛɛ David, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ dáŋ si fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Aravna, be Jebus, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ mbó
David daŋa si hi̧i̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Gad tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN.
Aravna pi̧i̧ yí, ɓɛɛ zɔk wannu in o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i fara tɛa-a pii tɛ-a. Aravna gboo, gu nù ti wannu, baa yí hikiɗi nù.
A̧ aka mɔ: «Nyaa wannu tɛ́ tɛ ko wi-de-tom kɔ‘i wen ge?»
David kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi tɛ mɛ hi̧fi fara-gusi-alkamaari kɔ-mɛ er-mɛ, ha̧‘m mɛ mbo
Aravna kifa nú ha̧ David: «Nyaa wannu a̧ káí mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ dee tɛ-a, ha̧ mɛ dɔ nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧: o ndai tɛ ya wen dɔa-a nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧; mɔɔ-gbur-mɔ in te-keekee tɛ ya kɔ‘i nɛ́ gua.»
A̧ ha̧a̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ kpɛ́k ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i.»

Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ Aravna: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ kànà mɛ hi̧fi hi̧fi nyɛm ɗoŋ gɛnɛ-a; mi kɔ̧ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ mɔ n'am baa géè na.» Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David hi̧fa fara-gusi-alkamaari in o ndai tɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
David mboo
Wannu David sɔka kaɗi, pɛ-a dɔka so nyɛmna. Kà‘i kpe laa nɛ̀ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ tɛ-a ba wee na.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wi tɛ kii ŋma be-zɔŋa nɛ tɛ iŋ tɛ na ha̧ nyaa wannu k’ɛɛ, wen dee tom ha̧ a̧ hee kóò kɔ̧-a̧ ga. A̧ tɛ kpe gɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɛ nyaa wannu baa wee.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa kia ŋma de be-zɔŋa nú
Boko-bem’ɛi yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna; a̧ duka hee kóò ko wannu ga, de nɛ tom ha̧ a̧. Mɔ kpɔk, wannu duk in a̧ na.
Adonias, bem ko David in Hagit, taa so kɔ‘i nɛ́ wi a̧ tɛ ba wan, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ mi a̧ tɛ ɔ wan.» A̧ baa keekee-biro kpɔk, o nyaŋa in bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ mɛ nɛ in a̧.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a n'aa duka nɛ̀ bem gasi nɛnɛ, dáà kɔ̧-a̧ gai a̧ ndé, «Mɛ de mɔ hegɔ wen ge nde?» na. In mbɛt a̧ yora so ŋgaiwi nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gboo ɗoŋ Absalɔm.
A̧ ee nú in Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar, ɓɛɛ wa ye ɗoŋ-aa;
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk, in Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada, in
Adonias ɗafa sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o sami, o ndai in o ŋmaŋa be ndai sɛn ká̧ gasa ta ko Zohɛlɛt zu-zer Ɛn-Rogɛl, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa o bem ko wannu, o nya-a̧ lɛŋ, in o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ de tom ha̧ wannu.
Ɓɛɛ o wi n'aa sa na, nɛ́ Nataŋ
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Nataŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Bɛtsabee, nàà ko Salomɔŋ ndé: «Mɛ zii kɔ-mɛ‘e Adonias, bem ko Hagit baa wan, ɓɛɛ wannu David iŋ na, na nde?
Kinii, mɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ. Mɛ̀ kpásí kiitɛ-mɛ in bem kɔ-mɛ Salomɔŋ.

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɛ̀ yé tɛ ko wannu David, a̧ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Bo nɛ nyaa wannu kànà so mɔ ha̧ kó-de-tom kɔ‘i'e, bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ tɛ ɔ wan oi-wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka nù zu damti kɔ‘i na nde? Wen ge sa Adonias baa wan ge?›
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in wannu, mi tɛ ye tua, ɓɛɛ mi yora ɗoŋ wen nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘i.»
Bɛtsabee yee tɛ ko wannu si fara-ɔ kɔ̧-a̧. Wannu sɔka so nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ Abisak boko-be Sunɛm de so nɛ tom ha̧ a̧.
Bɛtsabee guu nù, gbɛ zugur nù ti wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu ak mɔ: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ge?»
Bɛtsabee kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Nyaa, bo nɛ ɛnɛ kànà so mɔ ha̧ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e: bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ tɛ ɔ wan oi'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ daŋ zu damti oi'nɛ́ na nde?
Ɓɛɛ kinii nɛ́ Adonias a̧ ɔɔ wan oi'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ nyaa wannu iŋ kɔ‘i na!
A̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o wiwii ndai, o ŋmaŋa be ndai in o sami nɛ̀ dɔka-a; a̧ saa o bem ko wannu lɛŋ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar in gasa wi-biro Jɔab; ɓɛɛ a̧ sa wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Salomɔŋ na.
War k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyaa wannu, gbaayí o be
Kà bo hegɔ na, ŋgimbi nɛ wannu tɛ si ɗoŋ kpa o dáà kɔ‘i, wa tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m in bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ hee ŋma wen a̧a̧ so zu yɛ ga.»
A̧ biti tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ wannu, ɓɛɛ Nataŋ
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu'e: «Nataŋ
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Nyaa wannu, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú‘e, Adonias a̧ ɔ wan oi'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka zu damti oi'nɛ́ nde?

Wen a̧ zira sɔsɔɔ si zu-zer Ɛn-Rogɛl; a̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o wiwii ndai in o ŋmaŋa be ndai gú nɛ̀ o sami nɛ dɔka-a. A̧ saa o bem ko wannu lɛŋ, o gasa wi-biro in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar. Kinii wa nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ hiɗi nɛ mɔ‘e: ‹Nyaa Adonias, wannu kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ!›
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk, in Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada, ká bá nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Salomɔŋ, a̧ sa yɛ na.
Nɛ́ nyaa wannu a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ‘i hegɔ nde? Hɔ kinii, ɛnɛ tɛ usi mgbák wi nɛ tɛ duk oi'nɛ́ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.»
Wannu David kifa nú: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá Bɛtsabee ha̧‘m.» Bɛtsabee yee tua pii tɛ wannu;
ɓɛɛ wannu kan mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN duk kpasa in n'aa kpasa'm tɛ bɔnɛ lɛŋ ga,
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am kànà so mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Bɛtsabee baa yí gu nù ti wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Nyaa wannu David a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!»
Wannu David tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in Nataŋ
ɓɛɛ wannu David tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o wi-de-tom ko wan k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ e zu sunda kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ a̧ si nú yí Gihɔŋ.
Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in
Ɛnɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ in a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ daŋ zu damti kɔ‘m, wen ɔɔ wan oi-am, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧‘m hoka wen ɔɔ wan zu
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada kifa nú ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ'ɔ dé hegɔ! Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko nyaa wannu a̧ tɔ̧a̧ wen'i.
GASA WAN tɛ duk in Salomɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka nɛnɛ in nyaa wannu ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ bá damti ko Salomɔŋ nɛ tɛ de'i e ŋgɔn gan ko nyaa wannu David!»
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk yee si fara-duk ko GASA WAN, ba dak nɔ̧́ tɛn a zu Salomɔŋ, de nɛ̀ wan ha̧ a̧. Wa dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ gai mɔ: «Nyaa Salomɔŋ, wannu kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ!»
Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ daŋa si ɗoŋ, dɔm nɛ̀ mɔ, yɔ nɛ̀ yɔyɛ, de nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ, ɓɛɛ nù nak tɛ o giti mɔ nɛ wa de'i.
Adonias in o wi n'aa saa zia gasa gitimɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa kaɗa nɛ̀ nyɔŋa mɔ. Jɔab zia giti zak, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ giti ge mɔ ge saaye’ɛ ge?»
Jɔab ɓɔna tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i, ɓɛɛ Yɔnataŋ bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar hɔ; Adonias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ tɛ pii ti; mɛ́ nɛ́ kpasa bíí. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ de nyɛrɛ a̧ mɛ ba tɛnɛ gɔ!»
Jonataŋ kifa nú ha̧ Adonias: «Bo nɛ de nyɛrɛ na; nyaa wannu David ee wan ha̧ Salomɔŋ kaɗi.
O bíí nɛ wannu toma nɛnɛ in a̧ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk,
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk in
Salomɔŋ duka nù zu damti kaɗi.
O gasawi saaye nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔn nyaa wannu David tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e ndé: ‹Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dé ha̧ nin Salomɔŋ mɛ hur gan k’ɛ́nɛ́! Wan kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ gasi gan k’ɛ́nɛ́!› Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu nyafa tɛ gɔn gado kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: ‹Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O bíí nɛ Adonias saa so lɛŋ pɛsa sót-sót nɛ gasa kíì, kóó o ndé ba nɛ yuwar kɔ‘i.
Adonias dee kíí Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kasi zak nɛ̀ duk zu
Wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ Salomɔŋ‘e: «Kíí wannu Salomɔŋ dee Adonias, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kasi zak
Salomɔŋ kifa nú: «Kà a̧ nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a, kóó mui̧-zu-a kpɔk beka tik nù na. Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ nɛ́ dee ŋma be ɗaŋmɔ tikiɗi, a̧ tɛ fe.»
Wannu Salomɔŋ toma o bíí mɛ mgbɔ a̧ yinɛ
Ŋgimbi fio ko David hɛɗa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ mɛ tɔ̧ o sɔŋkur
«Mi tɛ ba yuwar nɛ o bíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ ba so'i. Mɛ̀ yór a̧ nɔ́, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ wiwii.

Mɛ̀ kásí heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ bá nɛ́ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧; mɛ̀ kásí o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧, o wen kɔ̧-a̧, o yuwar duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ in o mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ ga; hegɔ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de in mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ kii, mɛ tɛ kpa.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧
«Mɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ Jɔab, bem ko Sɛruya dee so in am, mɔ n'aa dee so in o gasa wi-biro ko
Mɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ sɔk sɛka a̧ yee kɔ̧ fio tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ na.
«Mɛ̀ dé demɔ in o bem ko Barzilai be Galad; mɛ̀ é ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in mɛɛ, wen nɛ́ kpɔk demɔ‘i, a̧ wa dee in am ŋgimbi n'am yuu nɛ̀ mɔ ti zɔmwi kɔ-mɛ Absalɔm.

«Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ katɛ mɛ, nɛ́ Simɛi bem ko Gɛra; a̧ nɛ bezaŋ Bɛnjamin sɛn Bahurim; a̧ foma so'm nɛ̀ ɗáŋ-a wese yuu mɔ kɔ‘m si Mahanayim, ɓɛɛ tɛ pia ɗoŋ kɔ‘m, a̧ wee ti'm, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kpa ŋmaa nú Jurdɛn. Mi kana mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN'e ndé, mi beka gbɛ a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ e a̧ na; mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, mɛ́ tɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de, wen ha̧ zu-a nɛ̀ oi mbui mɛ ɔ ɗɔɔ tɔk.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David sii ɗoŋ kpa o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn saaye kɔ̧-a̧.
David ɔɔ wan sɛn
Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan ko dáà kɔ‘i David, ɓɛɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Adonias bem ko Hagit tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Bɛtsabee nàà ko Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Bɛtsabee ak a̧: «Mɛ́ tɛ́ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ nde?» A̧ kifa nú a̧: «Ii,
ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ we ɗoŋ ŋma be wen h’ɛ́nɛ́.» Bɛtsabee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧̀.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ ndé, mɔɔ-wan duk so nɛ́ kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ o be
Kinii, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ak nɛ́ mɔ kpɔk er'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔ nɛ‘m na.» Nàà ko Salomɔŋ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ àk.»
A̧ kifa nú: «Mi kɔfi ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ wen a̧ nyɛm mɛ dɔ‘nɛ́ na; a̧ a̧ há̧ Abisak boko-be Sunɛm ha̧‘m nɛ̀ kóò.»
Bɛtsabee kifa nú: «Ɔ dee, mi tɛ we ɗoŋ wen kɔ-mɛ ha̧ wannu.»

Bɛtsabee nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko wannu Salomɔŋ mɛ we ɗoŋ wen ko Adonias'i ha̧ a̧. Wannu wee ti a̧, gbɛ zugur nù, ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ duk zu damti kɔ‘i woyo; wa baa mɔɔ-duk-nɛnɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ nàà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nù nɛ̀ war wii-er wannu.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ak ŋma mɔ tikiɗi er mɛ; ká mɛ́ dɔ nɛ‘m na.» Wannu kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák géè, nàá, mi beka dɔ‘nɛ́ na.»
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Wi nyɛma mɛ ha̧ Abisak, boko-be Sunɛm ha̧ Adonias, zɔmwi kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ kóò nde?»

Wannu Salomɔŋ kifa nú ha̧ nàà kɔ‘i: «Wen ge ɛnɛ ak nɛ Abisak boko-be Sunɛm nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ Adonias ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák nɛ́ mɔɔ-wan ha̧ a̧ wen a̧ nɛ zɔmwi kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ na nde? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák wan ha̧ a̧, in ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar in ha̧ Jɔab, bem ko Sɛruya ɓɛɛ gɔ!»
Wannu Salomɔŋ kàná mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «GASA WAN a̧ dé ŋgayamɔ in am ka Adonias nɛ yoɓa wen’ɛ nɛ̀ fio kɔ‘i na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN duk kpasa ɓɛɛ ba'm mitak e tɛ wan ko dáà kɔ‘m David ga, in n'aa ea'm mgbara pɛ́r-nam ko wannu, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga, sɔsɔɔ, Adonias tɛ fe.»
Wannu toma Bɛnaya, bem ko Yehoyada, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ Adonias yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar, wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ sɛn Anatot, fara kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ nyɛma so mɛ fe mbɛt; ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ mi beka gbɛ mɛ na, wen mɛ tuia so
Salomɔŋ foo a̧ yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, ha̧ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Elii sɛn Silo mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Jɔab yee so nɛ́ ɗoŋ Adonias; bo nɛ Absalɔm na; ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa zia nyɛrɛ‘i, a̧ yuu mɔ ye fara-duk ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ kasi zak
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ‘e, Jɔab yuu mɔ ye fara-duk ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ duk mgbák ká̧
Bɛnaya yee fara-duk ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab: «Wannu hee ndé, mɛ̀ gbò.» Ɓɛɛ Jɔab tɔ̧: «Weyaa, mi tɛ fe hɛ̧ɛ̧.» Bɛnaya wee ɗoŋ mɔ tɛ yuwar tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen in kifa-nú ko Jɔab ha̧ wannu.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ dé hee a̧ tɔ̧a̧ ga. Mɛ̀ gbɛ́ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gún a̧ wen ká simbo-bíí n'aa gbɛɛ so géè tɛɛ ba'm in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ simbo ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a yiitoo n'aa gbɛɛ so nɛ̀ gba-paa, ká dáà kɔ‘m iŋ na'i, mɛ ba a̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr gasa wi-biro sɛn
Simbo ko wi nɔ‘i tɛ tik zu a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa kpoo nɛ kpoo; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko David, bezaŋ-aa, o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ in damti kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpa kɔ‘i nɛ́ desee ko GASA WAN yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧.»
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada sii ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua, ɓɛɛ gbɛ Jɔab; ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà.
Wannu hoka Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada mɛ duk gasa wi-biro oi-aa, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sadɔk kpai kɔ‘i nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Abiatar.
Wannu Salomɔŋ saa Simɛi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ dé tua kɔ-mɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm; mɛ beka gbo mɛ nɛ si ŋma fara na.
Wese nɛ mɛ tɛ gbo saaye ku gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ‘e ndé, mɛ tɛ fe nɛ mbetɛ. Tɔk tɛ-mɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ zu mɛ.»
Simɛi kifa nú ha̧ wannu: «Wen'i ɔ dee; wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyaa wannu tɔ̧a̧ ga.» Ɓɛɛ Simɛi ɔ Jerusalɛm zɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ pɛ taar, bara ko Simɛi yiitoo yuu mɔ si tɛ ko Akis bem ko Maka, wannu Gat. Ɗoŋ nɛ wa mbaŋa nɛ tɛ Simɛi ndé, o bara kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ nù ko Gat wó,
Simɛi kura hɛr tuifuu kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ Akis, wen kaia o bara kɔ‘i piinɛ ɗoŋ. Simɛi nɛ̀ɛ̀ war kpɔk ɓɛɛ, kai nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i piinɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Gat.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Salomɔŋ‘e, Simɛi kura Jerusalɛm nɛ sɛn nù Gat; nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa pia ɗoŋ kaɗi wo.

Wannu saa Simɛi, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Bo nɛ mi dee so ha̧ mɛ mɛ kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mi mbaŋ tɛ-mɛ ndé, wese nɛ mɛ tɛ gbo saaye mɛ nɛ si ŋma fara, mɛ̀ íŋ‘e ndé, wi tɛ fe na nde? Wese'i bo nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e, wen nɛ‘i zia'i ɔ dee na nde?
Wen ge nɛ mɛ mbo zu tɛ kanamɔ nɛ̀ mɛ kànà ti GASA WAN in wen n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ na ge?»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Simɛi woyo: «Mɛ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mɛ dea in dáà kɔ‘m David nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧; hegɔ GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ mɛ tik zu mɛ.
GASA WAN tɛ tok de yoŋgo ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ damti ko David tɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a ti GASA WAN ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada mɛ gbɛ Simɛi; ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo ba a̧ gbɛ. Oi mɔ‘i, mɔɔ-wan ko Salomɔŋ yora nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Salomɔŋ kifa be-for Faraɔŋ wannu Egiptɛ tɛ báá boko-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ kóò. Wa mgbɔɔ kóò‘i e kɔ̧ tua tɛ
Mɔ kpɔk, o bíí ɓɔna tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ sɛn zu o
Salomɔŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ kasi heembea ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David; zu-a'i, a̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama sɛn zu o
Wannu Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn Gabaɔŋ mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma
Sɛn Gabaɔŋ mɛ zɛ, GASA WAN hɔɔ zu ha̧ Salomɔŋ; ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ ák mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ mɛ.»
Salomɔŋ kifa nú: «Ɛ́nɛ́ usa so gasa
Kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ ee wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ wannu oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David; ɓɛɛ mi nɛ daŋa ŋgaiwi géè, mi iŋ dee tom-wan na.
Wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ hoka, mɛ̀ nɛ́ giiwi nyɛmna nɛ‘i beka tɔr pi̧ nù na.
Hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yuwar-a in ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ; kà bó hegɔ na, nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ ɔ wan zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka hegɔ'ɔ o?»
Akamɔ ko Salomɔŋ dee tɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ aka mɛ kpa nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, wen ɔɔ wan nɛ yuwar-a, bo nɛ mɛ aka nɛ́ duka-a zaŋnu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na, kóó nɛ́ kpaa dɔka mɔ na, kóó nɛ́ fio ko wisɛn kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt ga,
mi tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ akamɔ kɔ-mɛ. Mi ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ ha̧ mɛ nɛ̀ bíí nɛ̀ wa kòò ti ha̧ mɛ, in wan nɛ̀ wa tɛ ko nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mbɛt beka kpa na.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ ak na mbɛt, mi ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ. Mgbara o wan lɛŋ, wi nɛ nin-a tɛ hur ká kpaa dɔka mɔ in zɔnamɔ hee mɛ ga bo tɛ ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ-mɛ zu nù'ɛ na.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ nɔ̀ tɛ yuwar kɔ‘m, kà mɛ kásí o heembea in o geŋa kɔ‘m hee dáà kɔ-mɛ David dee so ga, mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk zu nù ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.»
Salomɔŋ tuna tɛ ɔɔ-zu'i. A̧ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ yor ti
Ŋma wese, o ŋma kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu yiitoo tɛɛ tɛ wannu.
Kuti-a tɔ̧a̧: «Nyaa, mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧‘i: kóò'ɛ in am, ɛɛ ɔ kɔ̧ tua kpɔk, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am kòó nɛ̀ gbaa yí-a.
Dee zɛ taar, ɓɛɛ kóò'ɛ ko bem mbɛt; ɛɛ duk kpɔk in ŋmaa, ŋma bíí hɔ kɔ̧ tua k’ɛɛ na; kànà nɛ́ ɛɛ yiitoo ɓɛɛ.
Bem ko kóò'ɛ fea wen n'aa ɔɔ zu a̧;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kura mɛ ɗuka-zɛ, ba bem kɔ‘m sɛn katɛ‘m ŋgimbi nɛ kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna fara ɔ ya. A̧ baa bem kɔ‘m gu yí ŋguɗi-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba wɔr bem kɔ̧-a̧ gu yí ŋguɗ‘am.
Mi kura mɛ gɔnamɔ mɛ e bere nú bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk a̧ fea. Nɛ̀ mɔ sa̧a̧, mi mbaɗa a̧, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ bem kɔ‘m n'am koa'i na.»
Ɓii kóò‘i tɔ̧a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ duk kpasa'i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ fea'i.»
Ɓii sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nú: «Bo nɛ kpasa wen na, bem’ɛi nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ‘m nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ duk kpasa’ɛ.»
Wa kpɛra hegɔ ti wannu.

Wannu Salomɔŋ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kóò'ɛ hee, bem kɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ duk kpasa'i, bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fea'i; ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa mbɛt'e, bó nɛ́ kpasawen na, bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fea'i, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘i nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ duk kpasa'i ɛ̧!
Kaɗa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ŋma gba-paa tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.» Ɓɛɛ wa ba gba-paa tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓír bem’ɛ nɛ̀ duk kpasa’ɛ tan see-a, ha̧ okoo nɔ'ɔ bá ɓira-a kpɔk kpɔk.»

See mgbák nàà ko bem nɛ̀ duk kpasa'i ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Wen ge nde dáà, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ bem’ɛ nɛ̀ kpasa ha̧ a̧; k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ a̧ na.» Ɓɛɛ ɓii kóò‘i tɔ̧: «Bem’ɛi beka duk nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ na, a̧ bo nɛ́ kɔ‘m na mbɛt; ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ a̧.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu Salomɔŋ e zu wen: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ bem’ɛi ha̧ okoo nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, ká‘i gbɛ a̧ na'i; k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓir bem’ɛi ɓɔna, mgbák nàà kɔ̧-a̧ a̧‘i.»
O bíí
Wannu Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan sɛn nú
O gasa wi-duk-zu tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Azaria bem ko Sadɔk duka nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Eliɔrɛf in Ahiya, o bem ko Sisa nɛ́ o wi-yɔr-kalata; Josafat bem ko Ahilud nɛ́ wi-we-ɗoŋ mɔ.
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada nɛ́ wi-duk-zu o wi-biro. Sadɔk in Abiatar nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Azaria bem ko Nataŋ nɛ́ wi-duk-zu o gasawi. Zabud bem ko Nataŋ nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in sɛm ko wannu.
Gasa wi-zɔk-kira ko wannu nɛ́ Ahisar, ɓɛɛ Adoneram bem ko Avda nɛ́ wi-duk-zu o ŋga-tom.
Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù ɓu-zua-yiitoo sɛn nú
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Bem ko Hur nɛ̀ zu kaya Efraim;
bem ko Dɛkɛr nɛ̀ nú Makas in Salɛbim, nú Bɛt-Sɛmɛs in nú Elɔŋ sɛn Bɛtanaŋ;
bem ko Hesɛd nɛ̀ nú Arubot; kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ nú Soko in nú Hefɛr lɛŋ;
bem ko Abinadab: kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ zu kaya Dɔr lɛŋ; a̧ baa so nɛ́ Tafat be-okoo ko Salomɔŋ;

Bana bem ko Ahilud ndɛma kɔ‘i nyɔŋmɔ sɛn nú Tanak in Mɛgido in Bɛt-Seaŋ nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ hɔ sɛn Yoknɛam; nú Bɛt-Seaŋ a̧a̧ katɛ Sartaŋ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ ha̧ nú Yizreɛl, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Bɛt-Seaŋ gɔm Abɛl-Mɛhola, hɔ́ ɗoŋ Yokmɛam nɛ̀ ɓii.

Bem ko Gebɛr mɔi̧a kɔ‘i nyɔŋmɔ saaye Ramot nú Galad; o be ye ko Yair bem ko Manase zii nɛ̀ a̧, in nú Argɔb sɛn Basaŋ mbɛt, gasa ye ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ o garo nɛ‘i man nú wa man nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧.
Ahinadab bem ko Ido mɔi̧a kɔ‘i nyɔŋmɔ sɛn Mahanayim.
Ahimas mɔi̧a kɔ‘i nyɔŋmɔ sɛn nú Nɛftalii; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ baa so Basmat be-okoo ko Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ kóò.
Bana bem ko Husai mɔi̧a nyɔŋmɔ sɛn nú Asɛr in Bealot.
Josafat bem ko Parua mɔi̧a kɔ‘i sɛn nú Isakar.
Simɛi bem ko Ela mɔi̧a kɔ‘i sɛn nú Bɛnjamin.
Gebɛr bem ko Urii mɔi̧a so kɔ‘i nyɔŋmɔ sɛn nú Galad nɛ̀ duka so nɛti nɛ́ nù ko Sihɔŋ, wannu ko o be Amɔr in ko Og, wannu Basaŋ. Zu-a'i ŋma gasawi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ woyo nɛ̀ duka so zu nù Juda nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi'i, o be Juda in o be
Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan zu nù lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ foka-yí Efrat hɔ saaye ko o be Filistii hɔ nɛnɛ nú Egiptɛ mɛ. O wan fara nɔ‘i duka yoɓi nɛ garama ha̧ a̧, de nɛ tom ha̧ a̧ hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Sɛn tɛ wese kpɔk, nyɔŋmɔ ko o bíí ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ kilo mɔka fuu booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in kilo fuu nɛ̀ mɔk gan na booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, kpánà géé nyɔŋmɔ booro-ɓu,
ŋmaŋa ndai ɓu, o gee ndai ɓu-yiitoo, sami gɔmŋmaa, sɛka o saɗi nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in zambɛrɛ, o kalamba, o kɔɗɛ gú nɛ̀ o gasa nɔ̧́í̧-yì nɛ̀ dee nɔ̧́ nyɛmna.
Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan zu nù lɛŋ ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ̀ Tifsak ye mgbák nú yí Efrat gɔm Gaza; mɔ duka nɛ̀ ga̧a̧-a̧ mgbara a̧ in o bíí nɛ̀ ɔ zik a̧ lɛŋ.
O be Juda in o be
Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ fara-a nyaŋa-keekee booro-ɓu-naar, ɓɛɛ o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa nɔ‘i nɛ́ booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Zaŋ fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk, o gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù tɛ ba nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ in o bíí nɛ̀ ya in a̧ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ wen ká ŋma mɔ tɛɛ ɓan wa.
O wi nɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk ba nɛ nyɔŋmɔ in o hoe tɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi-a ha̧ o nyaŋa-keekee in o saɗi-de-tom sɛn fara nɛ̀ wannu duk sɛnɛ.
Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ in ɗuka taamɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ na ha̧ Salomɔŋ.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko Salomɔŋ gana ko o bíí mɛ daŋa-wese in o bíí Egiptɛ lɛŋ.
Bíí kpɔk kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ hee a̧ ga na. A̧ iŋa mgbara mɔ gan Elam be Ɛzra in Heman, Kalkɔl in Darda o bem ko Mahɔl. Nin-a hura mgbara o dukbíí nɛ̀ ɔɔ zik a̧ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ tua-wen booro-taar, ɓɛɛ o gima n'aa yɔra dee nɛ́ booro-nɛ-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko o te, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ te
O zuduk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛɛ tɛ Salomɔŋ wen zia iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, o wannu zaŋnu lɛŋ nɛ̀ zia nyɛrɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i toma o betom kɔ‘i tɛnɛ tɛ a̧ mbɛt.
Hiram wannu Tir zia'e, wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu Salomɔŋ de nɛ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom wi-de-tom tɛnɛ tɛ a̧, wen Hiram in wannu David yaa so nɛ́ o de sɛm.
Salomɔŋ toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Hiram hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ iŋa nɛ̀ de-a'e, dáà kɔ‘m David de Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen o biro nɛ̀ wisɛn nɛtɛ nɛtɛ dee in a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN ee o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ɗɔɔ naŋ-a.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ká̧ zika-nù kɔ‘m lɛŋ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧‘m; o wisɛn bo ɓɔna, kíì ŋgayamɔ nɛ̀ tɛ hɔ bo na mbɛt.
Mi ta nɛ mɔ mɛ de Tua wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ n'am tɛ e zu damti oi mɛ‘i a̧ tɛ de Tua ha̧‘m.›
Kinii, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mɛ gɔm o
Ŋgimbi nɛ Hiram zia wen nɛ Salomɔŋ tɔ̧a̧‘i, a̧ kpaa desee nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, wen n'aa ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ bem ko David mɛ ɔ wan zu zɔm dukbíí hegɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tom kifa-nú ha̧ Salomɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi zia tom kɔ-mɛ; mi tɛ ha̧ o

O wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɛ kai nɛ̀ Libaŋ si ká̧ gba-tɔp mɛ. Mi tɛ hɛr o te nɔ‘i a ɗɔɔ yì hɔ fara nɛ mɛ tɛ usi ha̧‘m'i; kà wa nɛ́ hɔɔ hi̧i̧ kaɗi, mi tɛ gbur a zan, ɓɛɛ mɛ kaia wa. Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ tom ha̧‘m nɛ́ o nyɔŋmɔ wen o bíí nutua kɔ‘m.»
Hegɔ Hiram toma o
Ɓɛɛ Salomɔŋ tom kɔ‘i nɛ́ kilo fuu alkamaari miliɔŋ-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in dak mbe nɔ̧́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Hiram. Mɔ nɛ Salomɔŋ toma ha̧ Hiram dam ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Salomɔŋ kpaa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú sɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ ga. Salomɔŋ in Hiram yaa nɛ́ o de sɛm, ɓɛɛ wa
Wannu Salomɔŋ hoka o ŋma wi-de-tom booro-ɓu-taar sɛn nú
Sɛn tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk, a̧ tom nɛ wi-de-tom booro-ɓu nɛnɛ Libaŋ kpai nɛ̀ ŋmaa wen dee tom hi̧i̧ tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa pia de fio-zɛ yiitoo ye kɔ-wa. Nɛ́ Adoniram a̧ duk zu o wi-de-tom nɔ‘i.
O wi-tui-tui ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o wi nɛ̀ gba kɔ‘i nɛ́ tá-tua sɛn zu kaya nɛ́ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wi tɔr o gasawi nɛ̀ o gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù ko Salomɔŋ hoka so wen duka-a zu tom na: wa nɛ́ booro-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-taar.
Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ hok nɛ́ gasa ta, ɓɛɛ wa sɛka wen mboo naŋ-tua ko GASA WAN.
O wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ in ko Hiram gú nɛ̀ o be Gebal sɛka te in ta wen dee Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Pɛ yaka gɔmŋmaa-naar-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɗoŋ gboa-a ko o be
Zi̧a̧ Tua nɛ Salomɔŋ dee ha̧ GASA WAN duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar, pɛsa-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu, ɓɛɛ kusa-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Zi̧a̧ zala nɛ̀ duk nú gasa bɛr-tua nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu nyɛm nɛ̀ ŋmaa in pɛsa tua, ɓɛɛ zala'i ɔ ɗuka tɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ ee woi-tua ɓɛɛ a̧ fan boi e sɛnɛ.
Wa dee ŋma geɗek tua taar zu ŋmaa ndaɗi nɛ̀ ŋgeŋ gasa bɛr-tua'i in wan mɛ ndaa tua.

Pɛsa geɗek tua mɛ ɗɔɔ‘i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta; yiitoo tua'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ taar, ɓɛɛ taar-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ taar nɛ reeta. Wannu Salomɔŋ nyɛkɛ̧ɗa ŋgeŋ tua nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ daŋnɛ wen ká gaŋgala o geɗek tua nɔ‘i tɛɛ ye zaŋ ŋgeŋ gasa bɛr-tua.
Ta Tua'i, wa gba zaŋbɛɛ mɛ lɛŋ; hegɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa de nɛ̀ Tua'i, wi zii gee giti dɔnɔ kà bá nɛ̀ kpi̧i̧, kóó giti boi na mbɛt.
Nú Tua mɛ ɗɔɔ‘i duk nɛ̀ war wii-er; fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sɛka'i hɔɔ kɔ̧ bɛr-tua mɛ see-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ. Wi hɔ tɛ bɛr-tua see-a kaɗi, sɛka'i daŋa sitɛ taar-a mɛ ŋgɔn.
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ dee Tua kaɗi lɛŋ, a̧ kpee zu a̧ nɛ̀ o pɛsa gbáá-te
A̧ dee o geɗek tua zik gasa-a kpa. O tua nɔ‘i zu ŋmaa taar'i, kusa wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta. Gaŋgala te
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Salomɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:

«Tua nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ de’ɛ; kà mɛ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ‘m, kà mɛ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o yuwar duka-a kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ kà mɛ kásí o geŋa kɔ‘m de nɛ̀ mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ, mi tɛ de ha̧ wen kɔ‘m n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ David mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Mi tɛ duk mgbara o be
Salomɔŋ mboo Tua kaɗi lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn o bɛr-aa mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ o gbáá-te
A̧ gɔna ŋma bɛr-tua nɛ̀ te
Dura bɛr-tua nɛ̀ duk ti sa̧a̧-fara'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo.
Wa ɗafa tɛ te nɛ̀ wa aa kɔ̧ tua'i nɛ̀ yɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wa gɔn dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ hee mira o do-te
A̧ ɗafa gasa bɛr-tua mɛ ndaa tua wen ee
nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀
Salomɔŋ kpee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ kun nyak boi nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr nú
A̧ kpee tɛ Tua'i lɛŋ nɛ̀ lɔr. A̧ kpee
A̧ dee o
Dura ɓaa kuti
Dura wɔr-ɓaa yiitoo
Kusa kuti
A̧ kaia o
A̧ yɔka tɛ o
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ŋgeŋ-tua, nɛ̀ kɔ̧ a̧ in nɛ̀ zan, a̧ gɔna dap o
A̧ yɔka mbɔɗɔnu nɛ̀ kɔ̧ Tua in nɛ̀ zan lɛŋ nɛ̀ lɔr.
A̧ dee kpar-nú tua
A̧ gɔna dap
Nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ dee sɛn tɛ gasa nú Tua: a̧ dee o te ká̧ nú Tua nɛ̀ te-nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ mgbii-wa naar.
A̧ dee kpar-nú tua yiitoo nɛ̀ te
A̧ gɔna dap o
A̧ mboo ŋgeŋ zik nɛ̀ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ sɛka-ta zu ŋmaa, in sɛka-te-gbatui kpe nɛ̀ zu-a.
Wannu Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan nɛ́ pɛ naar, ɓɛɛ wa e naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN tɛ fio-zɛ Zif.
Nɛ́ tɛ̀ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Salomɔŋ tɛ zɛ Bul nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar fio-zɛ a̧ tom Tua ko GASA WAN kaɗa nɛnɛ lɛŋ; tom Tua'i dee nɛ́ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Salomɔŋ dee mgbák tua kɔ‘i mbɛt tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-taar sɛka biti kaɗi lɛŋ.
Wa saa nin tua'i Kombo Libaŋ
Nɛka mbiŋ kpɔk kpɔk ba nɛ kpaakpee ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ; kpaakpee nɔ‘i lɛŋ dee nɛ́ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ. A̧ kpee zu tua'i nɛ̀ o te

Nɛ̀ ká̧ ɔm tua yiitoo, nɛka woi-tua a̧a̧ sɛnɛ taar nɛ̀ zɔk nɛ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ woi-tua nɔ‘i a̧a̧ nɛ̀ mgbii wa naar; o nú tua nɛka so kànà tɛ fara taar hee ko o woi-tua ga, ɓɛɛ wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ mgbii-wa naar mbɛt.
A̧ dee ŋma tua nɛ̀ wa sa'e Tua-mbiŋ nɛ̀ dura-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, in pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ. Fara ye nɛnɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o mbiŋ in zala mbɛt.
A̧ dee ŋma tua wen damti, ɓɛɛ tua'i nɛ́ fara-ɓa-kita mbɛt. Wa ɗafa kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ te
Mgbák tua-ɔɔ ko Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tua-ɓa-kita, ɓɛɛ o tua nɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa; a̧ dee pɛrti tua'i ha̧ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ boko-bem ko wannu Egiptɛ mbɛt.
O tua nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ naŋ-a hɔ tɛ o gan-ndui, o ɗoŋ tua hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ gasa bee-gara mbɛt, wa sɛka nɛ̀ ká̧-yí-ta nɛti in nɛ̀ ɗoŋ hee ŋmaa ga de nɛnɛ.
Wa dee o naŋ tua nɔ‘i nɛ̀ o gasa ta nɛ‘i hoka hok, dura o ŋma nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, o ŋma nɛ́ mɛtrɛ naar.
Wa aa o de ta nɛ̀ wa sɛka sɛk in o te
Wa nɛka ta zu ŋmaa taar in te
Wannu Salomɔŋ aka mɔ mɛ ba Hiram be Tir tɛ tom.

A̧ duka so nɛ́ bem ko ŋma ko-gera tɛ zuduk ko Nɛftalii, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ be Tir. Hiram duka nɛ́ wi-de-tom-ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ iŋa tom'i in nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ haya taamɔ zu tom'i. A̧ tɛɛ tɛ ko wannu Salomɔŋ ha̧ a̧ mɛ de tom ndɛrɛ lɛŋ.
A̧ dee mbiŋ-ndɛrɛ yiitoo: kusa kuti-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ yoo-ɔm-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; ɓii-aa kànà hee kuti-a ga.
A̧ nɔi̧a gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ yiitoo nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ. Kusa wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
A̧ fana boi a zu gan-ndui yiitoo nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ. Fanamɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a̧a̧ zu o gan-ndui kpɔk kpɔk.
A̧ nɔi̧a ndɛrɛ hee waya kóɓò
War ko o gan-ndui nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ nú zala, wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in o gba-dɛŋ; kusa-wa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo.
Ŋma gɔna-keɗemɔ a̧a̧ mgbák zu o gan-ndui. Gɔna-keɗe mɔ‘i a̧a̧ zu o fanamɔ in o nɔi̧a-ndɛrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo hee waya kóɓò nɛ‘i nɛka wa a zu o gan-ndui kpɔk kpɔk ga.
Hiram kaia o mbiŋ-ndɛrɛ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i a ŋgɔn ká̧ nú zala Tua ko GASA WAN. A̧ ee ŋma kpɔk nɛ̀ war wiiko, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin-a'e Yakin; a̧ ee ɓii-aa nɛ̀ war gale, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa nin i̧i̧‘e Boaz.
O zu o mbiŋ ya hee o gba-dɛŋ ga. Hegɔ tom mbiŋ kaɗa nɛ̀ de-a.
Hiram nɔi̧a boi de nɛ̀ gba-kpáná-yì. Ɗuka-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ zika nú-a kpa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ nɔi̧a o be mɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in mira do-te, ɓɛɛ nɛk nú zer gba-kpánà‘i kpa ŋmaa ɗɛ́kɛ́t, ɓu-yiitoo tɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk kpɔk. Wa nɔi̧a o be mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ nɛka-a yiitoo kpɔk in gba-kpánà‘i.

Gba-kpánà‘i duka zu ndai-ndɛrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo; mgbara o ndai nɔ‘i ɓu-zua-yiitoo'i, ŋma taar zɔka mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, o ŋma taar zɔka kɔ‘i mɔ si yee-wese, taar woyo zɔka mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ taar zɔk mɔ si daŋa-wese. Gba-kpánà‘i duk nɛ zu wa; ɓɛɛ goto ndai lɛŋ zɔk nɛ ŋmaa ɗɔɔ gba kpanà‘i.
Ndota-a hee bɔ̧i̧a̧ wii-see er-wi ga, ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi nú-zer-aa hee yèé-nɔ-mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in mira gba-dɛŋ ga. Gba-kpánà nyɛma mɛ ba litrɛ yì booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wa dee o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà ɓu nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ: dura wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo; pɛsa wa nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ kusa wa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta.
Wa dee mɔɔ-tui-kpáná nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ká̧-yí-a in mgbii-aa lɛŋ wa duia nɛ́ o pɛsa ndɛrɛ de nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa gɔn o dap dila, in o wiwii ndai in o

O mɔɔ-tui-kpáná nɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ nɛ̀ koe-naŋ naar kirkiti nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ. O naŋ nɔ‘i naar'i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ kasi wa zik nɛnɛ. O mɔɔ-kasi-wa a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ kpánà, e o zika-ndɛrɛ hee mbɛɗum ga nɔ‘i nɛ zan.
Fara-e-ndaa kpánà sɛnɛ ɔ zika nɛ̀ kusa-a hee reeta mɛtrɛ ga, ɓɛɛ ɗuka-a hɛɗa ká̧ tɛ mɛtrɛ; wa gɔna dap zik ká̧-nú-a kpa. Ɓɛɛ ká̧-yí mɔɔ-tui-kpáná nɔ‘i in pɛsa-wa hee ŋmaa ga.
O koe-naŋ naar a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ ká̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-kasi-wa gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ a̧. Pɛsa o naŋ-a hɛɗa si ká̧ mɛtrɛ kpɔk.
A̧ dee o naŋ-a nɛ̀ zika-a hee naŋ keekee-nyaŋa ga, o boi-kasi-naŋ-a, o boi-koe-naŋ-a, in o boi mɛ see-aa lɛŋ, wa nɔi̧a nɛ́ ndɛrɛ de nɛnɛ.
O mɔɔ-kasi-wa naar dama ɗoŋ mgbii-aa naar lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa kpɔk in mɔɔ-tui-kpánà.
Ŋma zika-ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ zu mɔɔ-tui-kpánà, kusa-a de reeta mɛtrɛ na; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ zu-a o mɔɔ-ira-a a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nɛ̀ ndaɗa kpɔk in o ká̧-yí-a.
Tɛ yɔka ɗoŋ-aa, in o mɔɔ-ira-a, gú nɛ̀ o ká̧-yí-a, Hiram gɔna dap o
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a̧ dee nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-tui-kpáná nɔ‘i ɓu; wa dee wa nɛ̀ kpɔk boi, wa lɛŋ hee ŋmaa ga.
A̧ dee gasa kpánà ɓu nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ ba litrɛ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; pɛsa-wa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo; ɓɛɛ wa kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ zu mɔɔ-tui-kpánà.
Sɛn ká̧ Tua'i, a̧ aa mɔɔ-tui-kpánà mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war wiiko, mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war gale, ɓɛɛ a̧ e gba-kpánà mgbii Tua nɛ̀ war wiiko nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ si daŋa-wese.
Hiram dee o gasa kpánà, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, in o yèé-gaŋmɔ. A̧ dee tom nɛ wannu Salomɔŋ usa ha̧ a̧ mɛ de tɛ Tua ko GASA WAN kaɗi lɛŋ.
A̧ dee o mbiŋ yiitoo, o ká̧ nú-gan-ndui nɛ̀ ya zu mbiŋ, in o fanamɔ yiitoo mɛ kpe ká̧ nú-gan-ndui yiitoo nɛ̀ gu zu o mbiŋ.
A̧ nɔi̧a ndɛrɛ hee waya kóɓò ga gɔmŋmaa-naar a tɛ fana-boi yiitoo, nɛka-a yiitoo zu o fana boi kpɔk kpɔk wen kpee ká̧ nú-gan-ndui yiitoo zu o mbiŋ.
A̧ dee mɔɔ-tui-kpánà ɓu, in o gasa kpánà ɓu nɛ̀ ya zu wa;
gba-kpánà kpɔk ɓɛɛ in o ndai ɓu ɗɔɔ-aa,
o gasa kpánà, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o pɛsa tasi in o oi nyɛk lɛŋ. Mɔ nɛ Hiram dee ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ lɛŋ, sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, duka nɛ́ yɔka ndɛrɛ.
Wannu nɔi̧a ndɛrɛ de nɛ̀ o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ ɗɔɔ gìì sɛn nú Jurdɛn mgbara Sukot in Sartaŋ.
Salomɔŋ ee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i sɛn fara-a; dɔka-a nyɛmna ɓɛɛ wi nyɛm mɛ tɔr kilo ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ yaka na.
Salomɔŋ dee o mɔ lɛŋ wen Tua ko GASA WAN:
mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ wiiko in nɛ̀ gale nɛ‘i ee ti sa̧a̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua, wa dee kànà nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr. O be mira do-te, o lamba, o be mɔɔ-ɓam-mɔ kànà nɛ́ lɔr lɛŋ.
O be tasi, o paa, o yèé-gaŋmɔ, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o be-tasi dɔ fuu-nyama in o boi kpar-nú Tua kànà nɛ́ lɔr.
Ŋgimbi nɛ tom nɛ wannu Salomɔŋ dee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN kaɗa nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, a̧ kaia mɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ee so nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧ tɛnɛ, bu-mbɔi, lɔr in o nyɛk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, a fara-a-mbɔi Tua ko GASA WAN.
Wannu Salomɔŋ mɔi̧a o gasawi
O be
Ŋgimbi nɛ o gasawi
Wa gɔɔ
Wannu Salomɔŋ in o be
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔɔ
Wɔr-ɓaa o
O te-gɔ-kuɓa'i dura nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wi duk sɛn
Ŋma mɔ bo so kɔ̧ Kuɓa'i na, kànà nɛ́ sɛka ta yiitoo nɛ̀ Moisɛ aa so kɔ̧ a̧ sɛn Hɔrɛb, ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gboo nɛ̀ kɔ̧
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm so mɛ ya hi̧i̧ wen tom kɔ-wa na, wen zu tura-zan'i, wen gasamɔ ko GASA WAN duna kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Salomɔŋ tɔ̧a̧:
«GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e,
wi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk zaŋ tum!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu'nɛ́ a̧‘m dee nɛ̀ gba de Tua’ɛ,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk sɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Wannu zika tɛ, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o be
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese n'am gboo nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ, mi hok ŋma ye kóó kpɔk mgbara o zuduk be
«Dáà kɔ‘m David taa so mɔ wen dee Tua wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m David'e: ‹Taamɔ kɔ-mɛ mɛ de Tua wen nin-am'i ɔ dee.
Mɔ kpɔk, bo nɛ mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ a̧ tɛ de Tua'i ha̧‘m na, mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ mɛ koa a̧ tɛ de dea-a.›
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i hɔɔ gba̧a̧. Mi ɔɔ wan oi dáà kɔ‘m David, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am duka zu damti
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am ɗafa fara-e-kuɓa
Salomɔŋ yora ti
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛnɛ kasa o
Kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ ko
«Nɛ mbetɛ, Sɔ̧ nyɛma so mɛ ɔ zu nù'ɛ nde? Yiwese’ɛ in o wan mɛ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ nyɛm'nɛ́ na’ɛ, sɛka bó nɛ̀ Tua’ɛ n'am mboa’ɛ nde?
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ gɔma-er in aia-nú ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sara in mɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ak er'nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k Tua’ɛ mɛ wese in mɛ zɛ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si fara n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, nin-wi tɛ duk sɛnɛ wó‘i; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ak in'nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Kà wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
«Kà ŋma bíí de ɗaŋmɔ in ŋmá-a, kà‘i dé ha̧ a̧ mɛ kan mɔ nɛ̀ fom, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ kan mɔ‘i ti

ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese mɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ pi̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ usa wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a, de nɛ̀ mɔ in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a mbɛt.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ wisɛn tɛ gan
ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen'i sɛn yiwese mɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko
«Ŋgimbi nɛ yiwese tɛ kpe, nɛ̀ kórò beka hɔ na, wen nɛ dukbíí dee ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, kà wa kɔfi mɔ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧ gasi nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ kà wa kifi see-wa wen n’ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ bɔnɛ zu wa,
ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ-wa sɛn yiwese mɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́

«Kóó nɛ́ kaɓa a̧ tika, kóó nɛ́ zɛɛ-geŋa, kóó nɛ́ mɔ a̧ baa doko, kóó nɛ́ laambam, kóó nɛ́ kooŋa̧i̧ a̧ tika nù, kóó nɛ́ gba-dɔya, kóó nɛ́ wisɛn a̧ kɛra o ye e nù, kóó nɛ́ ge ŋgamɔ ge, kóó nɛ́ ge zɛɛ ge,
kà ŋma be

ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese fara n’ɛnɛ duk sɛnɛ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen n’ɛnɛ iŋa kɔ̧ see-aa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk a̧ iŋa kɔ̧ see bíí ɓɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé hegɔ wen ha̧ o be
«Kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ nɛ̀ bo nɛ́ be
wen wa tɛ zii nyɛrɛ hura nin'nɛ́, ŋga er'nɛ́ in ɓaa'nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ nyai̧a, kà a̧ kɔfi mɔ pii tɛ Tua’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese fara n’ɛnɛ ɔ sɛnɛ‘i; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ aka er'nɛ́ wen ha̧ o dukbíí zu nù lɛŋ mɛ iŋ nin'nɛ́, ha̧ wa mɛ yu'nɛ́ hee
«Ŋgimbi nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ wisɛn kɔ-wa sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ tom wa si sɛnɛ‘i, kà wa kɔfi mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN zik nɛ̀ tɛ-wa pii Jerusalɛm n’ɛnɛ hoka in pii tɛ Tua n'am mboo wen nin'nɛ́'ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ-wa sɛn yiwese mɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák wa.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
kà wa ta mɔ tɛ nù nɛ wa de bara sɛnɛ‘i, kà wa kifi see-wa ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nù ko o wi-gan-wa'i, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ ndé, wi nɛ́ ɗaŋwi, wi yɔɔ kaya, wi iŋa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i wó,

kà wa pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ see kpɔk, nɛ̀ kiitɛ-wa lɛŋ tɛ nù ko o wisɛn nɛ̀ wa kaia wa si sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ kà wa kɔfi mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ si war nù kɔ-wa, nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa, sitɛ ye n’ɛnɛ hoka in sitɛ Tua n'am mboo wen nin'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese, fara n’ɛnɛ duk sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dee ti'nɛ́‘i ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ kaia wa nɛ̀ bara mɛ de ko ha̧ wa,
wen wa nɛ́ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, in mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; wa nɛ̀ o wi n’ɛnɛ foo gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ, nɛ̀ kɔ̧ lɔk.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́

GASA WAN Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ hoka wa mgbara o dukbíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e wa nɛtɛ hee mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ Moisɛ, ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gboo nɛ̀ o dáà k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ mɛ ga.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ Salomɔŋ kaɗa kɔfa-sɔ̧ lɛŋ in aia-nú sitɛ GASA WAN kaɗi, a̧ kura sɛn
A̧ yora ŋgɔn, a̧ toka de yoŋgo nɛ̀ hee ger sitɛ o be
«Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ ŋma fara-ɔm-tɛ ha̧
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ a̧ dúk in yɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka so nɛnɛ in o dáà k’ɛɛ ga: ká a̧ siŋ yɛ a nù na, ká a̧ e yɛ duk na.
A̧ a̧ zík see yɛ sitɛ a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ o yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ in h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kasi, o geŋa, o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ in o yuwar duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen n'am tɔ̧ ai nɛ̀ nú‘m ha̧ GASA WAN'i a̧ dúk mɛ́ wese in mɛ́ zɛ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ gbák wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧
ha̧ o dukbíí zu nù lɛŋ mɛ iŋ ndé, GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧, ŋma mbe-a bo na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí, see'nɛ́ a̧ dúk tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ de sɔsɔɔ ga.»
Wannu in o be
Salomɔŋ ɗafa sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ nɛ ndai booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo, o sami in o gbadua booro-gɔmŋma-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wannu in o be
Wese'i wannu ee bee-gara nɛ duk ti Tua ko GASA WAN nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧; nɛ́ sɛn fara'i a̧ a̧
Wannu Salomɔŋ dee gasa gbaŋa ŋgimbi'i. O be

Ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ, Salomɔŋ foo o bíí lɛŋ si ɗoŋ fara kɔ-wa. Wa fana wannu, ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ gasa tortɛ. Wa lɛŋ duka nɛ̀ desee wen demɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i David in dukbíí kɔ‘i
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Salomɔŋ kaɗa tom Tua ko GASA WAN in tua-wan, in n'aa dee mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so kaɗi,
GASA WAN hɔɔ zu ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so Gabaɔŋ ga.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi zia akamɔ in aia-nú kɔ-mɛ‘i; mi ee Tua nɛ̀ mɛ dee ha̧‘m'i wen zɔna nin-am ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Yí‘m in see-am tɛ duk tɛ Tua'i kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, kà mɛ nɛ́ nɛɛ nɔ̀ ti'm hee dáà kɔ-mɛ David nɛɛ so ga, kà mɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ de, kà mɛ kasi o heembea in o yuwar duka-a kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ de ha̧ damti kɔ-mɛ zu
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ bɛ̧a̧‘m in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kasi o
mi tɛ ndak o be
Ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir ká̧ zɔm Tua’ɛ tɛ gɔn. Wa tɛ tɔ̧: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN dee mɔ nɛ̀ nù'ɛ in Tua’ɛ hegɔ ge nde?›

Bíí tɛ kifi nú: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, nɛ̀ gboo so o dáà kɔ-wa sɛn nú Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧, wa gbɛɛ zugur-wa nù, de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ wa, sa GASA WAN fo ŋgayamɔ'ɛ pi̧ zu wa.› »
Mboo Tua ko GASA WAN in tua-ɔɔ ko Salomɔŋ dee nɛ́ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo sɛka kaɗi.
Hiram wannu Tir ha̧a̧ so te
Wannu Hiram kura Tir mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk ye nɛ Salomɔŋ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ o ye nɔ‘i de tɛ-a na.
Hiram tɔ̧a̧: «Nya'm, nɛ́ ge ye ge a̧ mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m’ɛ ge?» Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese'i, wi sa nin o ye nɔ‘i nɛ́ Nú Kabul.
Hiram toma so kilo lɔr booro-taar-nɛ-reeta ha̧ Salomɔŋ.
Wannu Salomɔŋ kaia o bíí nɛ̀ mgbánà wen dee tua kɔ̧-a̧ in Tua ko GASA WAN. Nɛ́ kpɔk o wi nɔ‘i a̧ hura gboŋgo Milo, mbo nɛ̀ garo Jerusalɛm, ɗafi nɛ̀ o ye Hazɔr, Mɛgido in Gezɛr mbɛt.
Wannu Egiptɛ nɛɛ bi so Gezɛr; a̧ dɔɔ ye'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ o be Kanaŋ nɛ̀ ɔɔ sɛnɛ‘i. A̧ ha̧a̧ ye'i nɛ̀ mɔɔ-desee baa-ŋmaa ha̧ boko-bem kɔ̧-a̧ kóò ko Salomɔŋ.
Hegɔ, wannu Salomɔŋ ɗafa ye Gezɛr woyo in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ,
gú nɛ̀ o ye Balat in Tamar sɛn ŋga-gbárà nù Juda.
Salomɔŋ ɗafa ye nɛ̀ o dam a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, in o ye nɛ̀ keekee-nyaŋa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, in o ye ko wan-daŋ-nyaŋa mbɛt. Salomɔŋ dee mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so sɛn Jerusalɛm, sɛn Libaŋ in tɛ o nù lɛŋ n'aa ɔɔ wan zu wa.
O oi duk ko o be Amɔr, o be Hit, o be Periz in o be Hiv gú nɛ̀ o be Jebus, nɛ̀ dùk kɔ-wa bo nɛ Juif na, ɓɔna so kɔ‘i.
Salomɔŋ kaia o oi bem kɔ-wa, wan nɛ̀ o bezaŋ
O be
O wi-duk-zu tom ko wannu Salomɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ gɔmŋma-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Boko-bem ko wannu Egiptɛ nɛ̀ baa wannu Salomɔŋ kura
Sɛn tɛ pɛ kpɔk, wannu Salomɔŋ ɗafa sɔ̧ war taar,
Wannu Salomɔŋ sɛka o dɔka kombon sɛn Eziɔŋ-Gebɛr, nɛ̀ duk ká̧ Elat ká̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp sɛn nú Edɔm.
Hiram toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i nɛ̀ iŋa tom-yì nɛ̀ de-a nɛ̀ kombon mɛ nɛ in o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ.
Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ Ofir, ɓɛɛ wa kai lɔr tɛ kilo booro ɓu-zua-yiitoo piinɛ ha̧ Salomɔŋ.
Wannu-okoo Seba zia nyɛrɛ hura nin Salomɔŋ wen zu nin GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɛ a̧ mɛ we a̧ nɛ̀ o sumgba.

O bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a nɛɛ́ in a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ o ŋgeloba nɛ̀ tui nɛ o nɔ̧́-nyama, in lɔr in o ŋma de ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya nɛ̀ dɔka-a. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ n'aa ta kɔ̧ see-aa lɛŋ ha̧ Salomɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ Salomɔŋ kifi nú tɛ o akamɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ. Ŋma ɗuka akamɔ nɛ̀ wannu kifi nú sɛnɛ na bo na.
Wannu-okoo Seba zɔka iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko Salomɔŋ, tua n'aa mboo so,
nyɔŋmɔ sɛn zu fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, fara-ɔɔ ko o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, de laa-pi̧i̧ ko o wi-ha̧-nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, in o kpoo-sɔ̧ n'aa dɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN; a̧ zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ hiɗ‘a gɔn.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Nyɛrɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am zia tɛ nù kɔ‘m mɛ‘i nɛ́ kpasawen nɛ̀ mbetɛ.
Mi kɔ̧ so ɗɔɔ o wen nɔ‘i na, wen n'am tɛ so mɛ zɔk nɛ yí‘m na. Kóó be reeta-a tikiɗi, wa we so ɗoŋ-aa ha̧‘m na. Ɛnɛ gana de duka-a in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ n'am zia so nyɛrɛ-a'i.
O bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ya katɛ‘nɛ́ wese lɛŋ zii nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, a̧a̧ nɛ̀ de sɔnti.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ee'nɛ́ zu damti

A̧ ha̧a̧ kilo lɔr booro-taar-nɛ-reeta, o dak nɔ̧́-nyama nɛ̀ dɔka-a in o de toka-ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ha̧ wannu. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i hɔ sɔsɔɔ wi zɔk pɛrti dɔka dak nɔ̧́-nyama hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu-okoo Seba kaia tɛnɛ ha̧ Salomɔŋ ga na.
O kombon ko Hiram nɛ̀ baa so lɔr mɛ Ofir tɛnɛ‘i kaia o te-nyama
Wa dee mɔɔ-tɔn Tua ko GASA WAN in ko wannu nɛ̀ o ŋga te nɔ‘i. Wa sɛka koloŋ in o kunde nɛnɛ mbɛt wen o wi-bii-gima. Wi zɔk o pɛrti ŋga te nɔ‘i ɓɔna hɔ sɔsɔɔ.

Wannu Salomɔŋ ha̧a̧ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ okoo-wannu Seba kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧; zu i̧i̧ nɔ‘i n'aa ha̧a̧‘i, see-aa e mɔ na, a̧ ha̧a̧ mbe-a woyo nɛ̀ dɔka-a e zu-a, ɓɛɛ okoo-wannu zik tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ nù kɔ‘i in o bíí kɔ‘i.
Tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk, lɔr nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ kpa nɛ́ kilo booro-ɓu-yiitoo,
wi tɔr wan nɛ̀ o wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ, o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ, o wannu mɛ yee-wese lɛŋ ba nɛ o gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù kai tɛnɛ na.
Wannu Salomɔŋ nɔi̧a lɔr de nɛ̀ gasa ŋgee gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo; kpɔk ŋgee ba nɛ kilo lɔr mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
A̧ dee o geɗek ŋgee gɔmŋmaa-taar; kpɔk ŋgee ba nɛ kilo lɔr yiitoo. A̧ kaia wa a kɔ̧ tua nɛ‘i sa'e Kombo-Libaŋ.
Wannu dee gasa damti gba̧a̧-nin-fɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔk ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ de lɔr.
Fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ damti'i a̧a̧ ɗoŋ ŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, fara-ɛk-ɗoŋ duk nɛ̀ zika-a, in o fara-e-tui-er a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ká̧ a̧ yiitoo mbɛt; wa dee o dila yiitoo a fara-e-er,
ɓɛɛ wa de dila ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛk tɛ o fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk'i. Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ wa tɛ de tɛ ŋma mɔɔ-wan hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Wa dee o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ ko Salomɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ̀ lɔr; o nyɛk nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧ tua Kombo-Libaŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ sa̧a̧ lɔr. Wa de ŋma mɔ kpɔk nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi na, wen ŋma bíí pi̧ so nú tɛ bu-mbɔi tɛ ŋgimbi ko Salomɔŋ na.
Wannu a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o kombon mɛ Tarsis nɛ̀ yar nɛ̀ zu yì kpɔk in ko Hiram. Kombon Tarsis kai so nɛ lɔr, bu-mbɔi, o nin-fɔrɔ, o dawa in o nɔ̧́í̧-gɔ-tɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ war kpɔk ɗoŋ pɛ taar.
Wannu Salomɔŋ gana o wannu zaŋnu lɛŋ nɛ̀ kpaamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ.
O bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ kii so mɛ zɔk nɛ́ Salomɔŋ wen zia iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Kóó o ndé ba nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i tɛnɛ: o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi in o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr, laa, o boi-biro, o nɔ̧́-nyama, o nyaŋa in o sunda ti pɛ nɛ̀ yak lɛŋ.

Salomɔŋ mɔi̧a o keekee in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo. A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ wa a tɛ o ye-a-boi-biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi-aa katɛ a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Wannu dee ha̧ bu-mbɔi mɛ dɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm hee gee ta ga, in ha̧ o te-gbatui mɛ dɔk hee te-mbɔ́ra
Kpar nyaŋa ko Salomɔŋ tɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ in Silisii; o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ ko wannu nɛ́ɛ̀ hi̧fi so wa sɛn Silisii.

Gɛnɛ keekee-nyaŋa Egiptɛ kpɔk nɛ́ kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ gɛnɛ nyaŋa nɛ́ kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. O wannu Hit in o wannu Aram hi̧fi so kana nɛ́ nyaŋa nɔ‘i tɛ kpɔk gɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ ko wannu Salomɔŋ.
Wannu Salomɔŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so okoo gɔni nù nɛ̀ dɔka-a: o boko-be Mɔab, o boko-be Amɔŋ, o boko-be Edɔm, o boko-be Sidɔŋ in o boko-be Hit, ba boko-bem ko wannu Egiptɛ n'aa baa so'i e sɛnɛ.
Tugun wa nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o be o
A̧ kaia o boko be-wan gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in o ŋma kóò mbɛt gɔmŋmaa-taar. O kóò kɔ̧-a̧ zika see-aa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Salomɔŋ sɔka kaɗi, o kóò nɔ‘i ɔra a̧ sitɛ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ e see-aa lɛŋ tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ga na.
Salomɔŋ ndaka ɗoŋ Astarte
Salomɔŋ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak ɗoŋ GASA WAN nɛ̀ see kpɔk hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ga na.
Hegɔ Salomɔŋ mboo
A̧ dee kpɔk mɔ‘i wen o sɔ̧ ko o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gɔni nù lɛŋ. Wa dɔ so nɛ fuu-nyama ɗafi nɛ̀ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
See GASA WAN kura zu Salomɔŋ wen a̧ e see-aa tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
in nɛ dora so a̧ tɛ ndaka ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ na. Salomɔŋ de mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Salomɔŋ: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ de mɔ hegɔ, in nɛ̀ mɛ kasi
Bo nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ-mɛ kpasa a̧‘m tɛ ɓar nɛnɛ yinɛ na, wen zu dáà kɔ-mɛ David; mi tɛ ɓar ɓara-a yinɛ er bem kɔ-mɛ.
Mi beka ɓar mɔɔ-wan yinɛ lɛŋ na; mi tɛ ha̧ ŋma zuduk bíí kpɔk ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ, wen zu dáà kɔ-mɛ David in wen zu Jerusalɛm n'am hoka!»
GASA WAN foo ŋma wisɛn pii zu Salomɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma be-wan Edɔm, nin-a nɛ́ Hadad.
Ŋgimbi nɛ David bìì so nɛ̀ Edɔm, Jɔab, gasawi ko o wi-biro daŋa so mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gun o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ fee yí biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ o wiwii in o be wiwii sɛn Edɔm lɛŋ.
Jɔab in o be
Hadad yuu so mɔ yak si Egiptɛ in o ŋma be Edɔm nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ o wi-de-tom ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Ŋgimbi'i, Hadad so nɛ́ géé daŋa ŋgaiwi.
Wa kura Madiaŋ hɔ Paraŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kur in o ŋma wi ye'i yak nɛnɛ hɔ tɛ wannu Egiptɛ. Wannu Egiptɛ usa tua ha̧ Hadad; a̧ ɗafa mɔ wen nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ usi ŋma nù ha̧ a̧.
Wannu Egiptɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so Hadad nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nya ko kóò kɔ̧-a̧, nya ko Tapɛnɛz ko-wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ Hadad nɛ̀ kóò.
Nya ko Tapɛnɛz koo be-wiwii, nin-a nɛ́ Genubat ha̧ Hadad, ɓɛɛ Tapɛnɛz dai a̧ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu; a̧ duk so kɔ̧ tua ko wannu Egiptɛ, mgbara o bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Hadad duka Egiptɛ zii nɛnɛ‘e ndé, David fea in gasa wi-duk-zu-biro kɔ‘i Jɔab, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m si nù kɔ‘m.»
Wannu Egiptɛ aka a̧: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ ɓan mɛ katɛ‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧, sa mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ yak tɛ nù kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ haya-a ge?» A̧ kifa nú: «Ŋma mɔ bo na, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é kànà ha̧‘m yak.»
GASA WAN dee ha̧ mbe wisɛn mɛ kur in Salomɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Rɛzɔŋ, bem ko Eliada. A̧ yuu so mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ ko Hadadɛzɛr wannu Soba, wan kɔ̧-a̧ yak.
A̧ mɔi̧a o ŋma bíí pii tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu wa. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David gbɛ so nɛ wa ga, wa yaka so si Damas, wa baa ye, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ wan sɛn hi̧i̧.
Rɛzɔŋ duka nɛ́ wisɛn ko
Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat duka nɛ́ be Efraim, nú Serada. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Sɛruya; Sɛruya duka so nɛ́ ko-gera. Jeroboam duka nɛ́ wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kur zu a̧.
Mɔ nɛ̀ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ kur zu wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Salomɔŋ hur so nɛ gboŋgo Milo, kpe nɛ̀ gbina ŋgeŋ ye ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David mbɛt.
Jeroboam so nɛ́ ŋgaiwi, a̧ so nɛ́ dita-bíí mbɛt. Wannu Salomɔŋ mbaɗa daŋa ŋgaiwi'i ŋgimbi n'aa de nɛ̀ tom, ɓɛɛ e a̧ zu o wi-de-tom ko Efraim in Manase.
Ŋma wese, Jeroboam gboo so saaye Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Ahiya baa mbe gba-laa nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧k tɛ fara ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeroboam: «Mɛ̀ káí a̧ka̧ laa’ɛ ɓu, wen wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ zuduk kpɔk nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn in a̧‘i, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, in wen zu Jerusalɛm n'am hoka mgbara o zuduk be

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ea'm nɛ̀ wa ee duk, yak nɛ́ɛ̀ gu nɛ̀ nù ti Astarte sɔ̧ ko o be Sidɔŋ, ti Kɛmɔs, sɔ̧ ko o be Mɔab in ti Milkɔm, sɔ̧ ko o be Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ nɔ̀ tɛ o yuwar kɔ‘m, de nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ tan yí‘m, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o heembea in yuwar duka-a kɔ‘m hee dáà kɔ-wa David ga na.
Mi beka ba ŋma mɔ tɛ mɔɔ-wan yinɛ er Salomɔŋ na, wen mi ee a̧ nɛ̀ wan ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ kpasa lɛŋ, wen zu David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m n'am hoka, nɛ̀ kasa o geŋa in o heembea kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ɓar mɔɔ-wan yinɛ er bem kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ: mɛ̀ nɛ́ zuduk ɓu a̧‘m tɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋma zuduk kpɔk ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ wen ha̧ ŋma pɛ́r-nam kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ duk ti'm ɓɔnsɛnɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm n'am hoka ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk sɛnɛ.
« ‹Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jeroboam, mi tɛ ba mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ɔ wan fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ kɔ̧; mɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu

Kà mɛ zii mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, kà mɛ ba o yuwar kɔ‘m, kà mɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a yí‘m, kasi nɛ̀ o heembea in o geŋa kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ David, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m dee so ga, mi tɛ duk in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ pɛ́r-nam kɔ-mɛ mɛ yor tɛ mɔɔ-wan nɛ̀ nɔa-a, hee wan n'am dee so in David ga; mi tɛ ha̧
Mi tɛ pi̧ búù zu duk ko David tɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.› »
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ kia mɛ gbɛ Jeroboam, ɓɛɛ a̧ kur yu mɔ yak sitɛ Sisak wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk hi̧i̧ hɔ ŋgimbi fio ko Salomɔŋ.
Oi o tom ko Salomɔŋ, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko Salomɔŋ.
Pɛ-wan ko Salomɔŋ zu
Salomɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ tɛ
Roboam nɛɛ si Sikɛm, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat zia nɛ̀ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧-a̧ Egiptɛ wen a̧ yuu so mɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ duk nɛnɛ hi̧i̧.
Wa toma sa Jeroboam, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ in o be
«Dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ee so gasa bɔnɛ zu yɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ŋma nú ŋga tom-bara ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dita kpáŋá n'aa pi̧i̧ ger yɛ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ de tom h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yàk, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ‘m ɗoŋ zɛ taar.» Hegɔ wa yaka.
Wannu Roboam aka mbɔrɔ er o gasawi nɛ̀ dee so tom ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kpasa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m kifi nú ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ hee ge?»
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e tɛ‘nɛ́ hee wi-de-tom ga ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ sɔsɔɔ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de tom ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kifi nú ha̧ wa nɛ̀ de-a, wa tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Roboam ee mbɔrɔ nɛ̀ o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ak mbɔrɔ ko o gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ de tom ha̧ a̧‘i;
a̧ aka wa: «Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee ge? Kifa-nú n’ɛɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndè, a̧‘m bà ŋma nú ŋga tom nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘m aa wi sɛnɛ yinɛ wó'ɛ, hee ge?»
O gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ee so ŋga tom zu wi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ŋma nú-a yinɛ wó‘i, ndé: ‹Bekete-er wi gana guntir dáà kɔ‘i;

ku̧u̧naŋ-a kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘i pi̧i̧ dita kpáŋá ger-wa ga, kɔ‘i, wi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ diti diti siti; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘i usa so mɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ o géé nyasi ga, kɔ‘i, wi tɛ gusi wa nɛ̀ o ndoi nɛ̀ boi a̧a̧ nú-a.› »
Jeroboam in dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛɛ kpa Roboam ɗoŋ taar zɛ hee mɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ga. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e, wa a̧ píí ɗoŋ tɛ-wi ɗoŋ taar zɛ.
Wannu kifa nú nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a ha̧ dukbíí, e nɛ̀ wen nɛ o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧ tɛ geemɔ.

A̧ zia nɛ́ mbɔrɔ ko o gbama-yari kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ dukbíí ndé: «Dáà kɔ‘m ee so ŋga tom zu'nɛ́, kɔ‘m mi tɛ e mbe-a zu-a; dáà kɔ‘m usa so mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ o géé nyasi, kɔ‘m, mi tɛ usi mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ o ndoi nɛ̀ boi a̧a̧ nú-a.»
Wannu kɔ̧ so mɛ zii wen ko dukbíí na. Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧-a̧ ha̧ wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat nɛ̀ nú Ahiya wi Silo mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ o be
Mɔ kpɔk, Roboam ɔɔ kànà wan zu o be
Wannu Roboam hoka wi-duk-zu tom-bara; wi’ɛi nɛ́ Adoram, ɓɛɛ o be
O be
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
Roboam hɔɔ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o bíí nutua ko Juda in zuduk ko Bɛnjamin; o ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar wen bíí o bíí nutua ko
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ bíí kɔ‘i Sɛmaya hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Roboam bem ko Salomɔŋ, wannu Juda, ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Juda lɛŋ in o bíí nutua ko Bɛnjamin ba nɛ̀ oi dukbíí lɛŋ‘e ndé,
tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ o nya'nɛ́ o be
Jeroboam mboo garo zik nɛ̀ Sikɛm zu kaya Efraim, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ hi̧i̧. A̧ kura hi̧i̧ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ mbo garo zik nɛ̀ Pɛnuɛl mbɛt.
Jeroboam taa mɔ ndé, tɛ mɔ n'aa zɔk kinii’ɛ, mɔɔ-wan nyɛma mɛ si ɗoŋ er bíí nutua ko David.
Kà o wi nɔ‘i ɓɔn kànà tɛ daŋa-a ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, see-wa tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ wan kɔ-wa Roboam, wannu Juda. Kɔ‘i, wa tɛ gbɛ wi, ɓɛɛ wa sii ɗoŋ sitɛ a̧.
Wannu Jeroboam taa mɔ, ɓɛɛ dui o be ndai yiitoo nɛ̀ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí: «
A̧ ee ŋma be ndai kpɔk sɛn Bɛtɛl, ɓii-aa sɛn Dan.
Ku̧u̧naŋ ɗaŋmɔ a̧‘i. O bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a gbara gasi nɛ̀ be ndai'i yaknɛ hɔ Dan mɛ.
Jeroboam mboo o
Jeroboam saa gasa gbaŋa tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar fio-zɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa de so sɛn Juda ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si
A̧ aa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ n'aa hoka so sɛn
Ŋma bíí ko Sɔ̧ tɛɛ nɛ̀ Juda pii Bɛtɛl tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ká Jeroboam dɔ so nɛ́ o ha̧a̧mɔ zu
Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi hiɗi mɔ zu
Kpɔk kale wese'i, bíí ko Sɔ̧ dee mɔɔ-usi-mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Zɔ́k,
Tɛ zia wen nɛ̀ bíí ko Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu
