Kà wa zɔk sede dɔka kɔ̧ kuɓa'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wi-yɔr-kalata ko wannu in gasa wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛɛ kai mɛ tɔr mɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kà wa tɔr kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa ee er o wi-duk-zu tom Tua ko GASA WAN, wen yoɓa-a nɛ̀ o wi-mgboi-tua, o wi nɛ̀ de tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN'i,
o wi-mbo-tua in o wi-sɛk-ta, in wen hi̧fa-a nɛ̀ o mbiŋ, in o sɛka-ta wen ɗafa Tua ko GASA WAN in wen o dɔka mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ kpa wen tom Tua'i.
Mɔ nɛ̀ wa hi̧fi nɛ sede'i a kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN na, nɛ́ o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, paa, yèé-gaŋmɔ, mbia in o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi in lɔr.
Wa ha̧a̧ so o sede nɔ‘i ha̧ o wi-de-tom wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Wa ak ndaa sede nɛ̀ o wi-kasi-sede ha̧ ha̧ o wi-duk-zu tom wen yoɓa-a nɛ̀ o bíí‘i na, wen wa de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Sede ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ in sede ɗafa sɔ̧ wen ea-ɗaŋmɔ ye tɛ tom Tua ko GASA WAN na; duka so nɛ́ ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Hazaɛl wannu Aram bìì ye Gat, ɓɛɛ ba; ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi mɔ mɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm mbɛt.

Jɔas wannu Juda kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ Josafat, Yoram in Akazias nɛ̀ ɔɔ so wan nɛti ha̧ a̧ ee so kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN e zu war kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a, gú nɛ̀ o lɔr mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu tom nɛnɛ ha̧ Hazaɛl wannu Aram, ɓɛɛ Hazaɛl e bíí Jerusalɛm duk.
Oi o tom ko Jɔas, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
O wi-de-tom ko Jɔas baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn yuwar nɛ̀ nɛ́ si Bɛt-Milo, ká a̧ zir zir si Sila.
Mɛ nɛ́ Yozakar bem ko Simɛat in Yehozabad bem ko Sɔmɛr o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ gbɛɛ a̧. Wa guna a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ saaye ko David, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia ɔ wan oi-aa.
Tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar pɛ-wan ko Jɔas bem ko Akazias wannu Juda, Jɔakaz bem ko Jɛhu ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ ndaka ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat kaia so o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ. A̧ e ɗaŋmɔ‘i duk na.
See GASA WAN ɗaŋa zu o be *Israɛl, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa kɔ̧ er Hazaɛl wannu Aram in Bɛn-Hadad bem ko Hazaɛl ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
Jɔakaz ga̧a̧ see GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zii aia-nú kɔ̧-a̧ wen bɔnɛ nɛ̀ wannu Aram usi ha̧ o be *Israɛl'i.
GASA WAN toma ŋma wi-kpasi-wi ha̧ *Israɛl; o be *Israɛl gboo ɗɔɔ bɔnɛ ko o be Aram, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ hee nɛti ga.
Zu-a'i, wa e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ o bíí nutua ko Jeroboam foo so wa a sɛnɛ duk na. Wa duka tɛ dea-a siti; sɛka-te nɛ‘i gasi gasi yora kànà ɓɔn sɛn Samarii.

O oi wi-biro nɛ̀ ɓɔna ha̧ Jɔakaz nɛ́ o wan-nyaŋa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, keekee-nyaŋa ɓu in o wi-biro-nɛ-nɔ̀ nɛ̀ naŋ booro-ɓu, wen wannu Aram kuma so o dɔka-a. A̧ dee so mɔ in wa hee fuunu nɛ‘i i̧si̧ nɛ̀ naŋ-wi’ɛ ga.
Oi o tom ko Jɔakaz, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea in o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Jɔakaz fee si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Samarii. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔas ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Jɔas wannu Juda, Jɔas bem ko Jɔakaz ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN. A̧ e ŋma ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat foo so o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ kpɔk duk na. A̧ duka tɛ dea-a siti.
O oi tom ko Jɔas, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, o biro kɔ̧-a̧ in Amasia wannu Juda yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Jɔas fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Jeroboam daŋ zu damti oi-aa. Wa guna Jɔas sɛn Samarii in o wannu *Israɛl.
Zɛɛ-fio baa Elisee, ɓɛɛ Jɔas wannu *Israɛl nɛ́ mɛ zɔk a̧. Jɔas zika yí sitɛ a̧, hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Naa-oo, dáà kɔ‘m! Dáà kɔ‘m! Naa-oo, keekee-nyaŋa ko *Israɛl in o wi-daŋ-aa!»
Elisee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ káí góò.» Jɔas kaia góò,
ɓɛɛ Elisee tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ ŋgáŋ kusuaa.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ ŋgaŋ. Elisee aa er zu er-a,

ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ hú̧í̧ woi-tua nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ si daŋa-wese.» Ɓɛɛ Jɔas hu̧i̧. Elisee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ pì̧ gɔ!» Ɓɛɛ Jɔas pi̧. Elisee tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ góò-gbin-biro ko GASA WAN! Góò-gbin-biro ti o be Aram! Mɛ́ tɛ́ bi Aram sɛn Afɛk, ɓɛɛ mɛ kuma wa lɛŋ.»
Elisee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔas: «Mɛ̀ káí o góò.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kai. Elisee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu *Israɛl: «Mɛ̀ gúsí nɛ̀ nù.» Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gusa nɛ̀ nù war taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ kaɗi.
See bíí ko Sɔ̧ nyima in a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Kà mɛ gusi so nù war mɔɔrɔ koo mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kum o be Aram lɛŋ; kinii, mɛ tɛ gbin biro ti o be Aram war taar ɓɛɛ.»
Elisee fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧.
Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ pɛ, o gii wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ tɛ tɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ Mɔab pii nú *Israɛl.

Ŋma wese, o ŋma bíí gun nɛ fio, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk o ŋma gíí wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ Mɔab. Wa siŋa wɔr'i pi̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio ko Elisee nɛ̀ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa yu mɔ yak. Wɔr'i hɔŋa gba̧a̧ Elisee; wi’ɛi kpasa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kur yor ŋgɔn.
Hazaɛl wannu Aram dee so bɔnɛ in o be *Israɛl tɛ duka-a ko Jɔakaz zu nù.
GASA WAN usa *kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ o be *Israɛl, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ko ha̧ wa. A̧ zika tɛ-a sitɛ wa wen *nɔɔ-tɔk n'aa nɔɔ so in Abraham, Izak in Jakob. A̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ kum wa na; a̧ e wa duk na hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi'i.
Hazaɛl wannu Aram fea, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Bɛn-Hadad ɔ wan oi-aa.
Hegɔ, Jɔas baa o ye ko dáà kɔ‘i Jɔakaz nɛ̀ Bɛn-Hadad bem ko Hazaɛl baa so er dáà kɔ̧-a̧ pii ɗoŋ. Jɔas bìí Bɛn-Hadad war taar, ɓɛɛ kai o ye *Israɛl piinɛ ɗoŋ.
Tɛ yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Jɔas bem ko Jɔakaz wannu *Israɛl, Amasia bem ko Jɔas wannu Juda ɔɔ wan.
Ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ wan, a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ zɔŋa Jerusalɛm; nin-a nɛ́ Jɔadin.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ́ hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ga na. A̧ dee kànà mɔ hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔas ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, o *kusa-fara kaɗi na; dukbíí ɓɔn kànà tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ in dɔɔ fuu-nyama zu o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Amasia mgbita tɛ wan kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ o gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ gbɛɛ so dáà kɔ̧-a̧ wannu lɛŋ a nù.

A̧ gbɛ o bem ko o wi nɛ̀ gbɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘i na, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ, nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nɛ̀ nú‘e: «Dáà beka fe oi nú bem na; bem nyɛm mɛ fe oi nú dáà na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé tɛ fe nɛ́ fio ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i.»
Nɛ́ Amasia a̧ gbɛɛ so o be Edɔm booro-ɓu sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Tɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba Sɛla tɛ biro'i; a̧ aa nin ye'i ndé Jokteɛl. Nin ye'i ɓɔna hegɔ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Amasia toma bíí nɛnɛ tɛ Jɔas bem ko Jɔakaz bezaŋ Jɛhu, wannu *Israɛl, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ bí ŋmaa!»

Jɔas wannu *Israɛl toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Amasia wannu Juda hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Tɛn-ga̧a̧ Libaŋ toma ha̧ *gbatui Libaŋ‘e: ‹Mɛ̀ há̧ boko-bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ bem kɔ‘m!› Ɓɛɛ ŋma saɗi zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ Libaŋ ɓir yak hi̧i̧, i̧si̧ tɛn-ga̧a̧‘i e nù.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɛ gana o be Edɔm, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ dúk nɛ̀ desee. Mɛ̀ zɔ́n tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, mɛ̀ dúk tɛ kɔ-mɛ. Wen ge mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ye géé tum biro ha̧ mɛ mɛ fe in o be Juda lɛŋ ge?»
Amasia zii wen nú-a na; hegɔ Jɔas wannu *Israɛl daŋa, ɓɛɛ wa ba zu dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs nú Juda.
*Israɛl gana zu o be Juda tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ-wa.

Jɔas wannu *Israɛl baa Amasia wannu Juda, bem ko Jɔas, be-koo Akazias nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, ɓɛɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, gbin garo-biro a nù, nyɛi̧a ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo, ku̧u̧-naŋ-a nɛ̀ nú garo ko Efraim hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa.
A̧ kaia o lɔr in bu-mbɔi, o mɔɔ-de-tom n'aa kpaa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, in o ŋma dɔka mɔ mgbara mbɔi, kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, a̧ kaia o bara-biro mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ sɛn Samarii.
Oi o tom ko Jɔas, mɔ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ in Amasia wannu Juda yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Jɔas fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Samarii in o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jeroboam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Amasia bem ko Jɔas, wannu Juda duka zu nù pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas, bem ko Jɔakaz, wannu *Israɛl.
Oi o dɔka tom ko Amasia yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ nyaŋa sinɛ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, sɛn *Ye ko David.
Azaria
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa ye Elat woyo, ɓɛɛ ha̧ siɗoŋ ha̧ Juda, ɗoŋ fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
Amasia bem ko Jɔas ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii. A̧ dee pɛ ɓu-naar-zua-kpɔk tɛ wan.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i kóó kpɔk duk na.

Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa mɔ sɛn nú *Israɛl lɛŋ woyo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Lɛbo-Hamat hɔ ká̧ gba-tɔp Araba mɛ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú Jɔnas *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, bem ko Amitai, be Gat-Hefɛr.
GASA WAN zɔka gasa bɔnɛ nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ‘i; kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ gbak *Israɛl bo so na.
Ɓɛɛ bo nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so, wi tɛ bi nin *Israɛl yinɛ zu nù na; hegɔ, a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas mɛ kpasi wa.
Oi o tom ko Jeroboam, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in o biro kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl. A̧ baa Damas in Hamat nɛ̀ Juda baa so piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ *Israɛl.
Jeroboam fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, o wannu *Israɛl. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Jeroboam wannu *Israɛl ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ Azaria bem ko Amasia wannu Juda ɔ wan.
A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jeruslaɛm.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ de-a yí GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia dee so ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, o *kusa-fara kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ o bíí ɓɔn tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama fara-gasi o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ-doko tɛ wannu Azaria hegɔ hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam, gasa wi-pɛm-kira ɔ wan oi nú-a tɛ ŋgimbi zɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Oi o tom ko Azaria, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Azaria fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ *Ye ko David in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ɓɛɛ Zakarii bem ko Jeroboam ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Zakarii dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i duk na.
Salum bem ko Yabɛs baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧; a̧ gbɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nù nɛ̀ gbaayí o bíí, ɓɛɛ ba wan oi-aa.
Oi o tom ko Zakarii yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Hegɔ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Jɛhu hee mɔ'ɔ ga hɔɔ gba̧a̧: «O bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ daŋ zu damti *Israɛl hɔ tɛ bezaŋ taar!» Ɓɛɛ mɔ de kànà hegɔ.
Azaria ɔɔ wan Juda pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs ɔ wan tɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk sɛn Samarii.
Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi daŋa kɔ‘i nɛ̀ Tirsa, ɓɛɛ hɔ Samarii. A̧ gbɛɛ Salum bem ko Yabɛs pi̧ nù hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ ɔ wan oi-aa.
Oi o tom ko Salum in ɗaŋ keta n'aa baa so yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Tɛ̀ daŋa-a nɛ̀ Mɛnahɛm daŋa nɛ̀ nú Tifsa, a̧ tika zu ye Tirsa gbɛ nɛ̀ o bíí saaye'i in o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik fara'i mbɛt, wen nɛ̀ wa hu̧i̧ so nú garo ye ha̧ a̧ na. A̧ kaka zaŋ o nàá-zaŋ lɛŋ a nù.
Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm bem ko Gadi ɔ wan zu *Israɛl; a̧ ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; a̧ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ duk na.
Pul, wannu Asirii tɛɛ mɛ bi nù, ɓɛɛ Mɛnahɛm ha̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-ɓu-taar ha̧ a̧, wen ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧ zu nù‘i ha̧ wan mɛ yor er-a nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Mɛnahɛm gɔna sede pi̧ zu o wanmbɔi *Israɛl, ha̧ wa kpɔk kpɔk mɛ ha̧ kɔya bu-mbɔi ɓu-mɔɔrɔ ha̧ wannu Asirii. Wannu Asirii baa sede'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i. A̧ ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i na.
Oi o tom ko Mɛnahɛm, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Mɛnahɛm fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛkaya ɔ wan oi-aa.
Azaria dee pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ tɛ wan sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ Pɛkaya bem ko Mɛnahɛm ɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii tɛ pɛ yiitoo.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN; nɛ́ kpɔk kale ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.

Baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ Pɛka, bem ko Rɛmalia baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧. A̧ gbɛɛ Pɛkaya ká bá nɛ̀ Argɔb in Ariya sɛn Samarii fara pɛm mɔ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu. O be Galad n'aa kaia tɛnɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ Pɛkaya nɛ́ bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan oi-aa.
Oi o tom ko Pɛkaya in o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Azaria wannu Juda kpaa pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan kɔ‘i kaɗi, Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia ɔɔ wan *Israɛl sɛn Samarii pɛ ɓu-yiitoo.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN. Nɛ́ kpɔk ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat dee so, kai nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ dea mbɛt.

Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Pɛka, wannu *Israɛl, Tiglat-Pilesɛr wannu Asirii nɛɛ ba o ye Iyɔŋ, Abɛl-Bɛt-Maka, Yanɔa, Kɛdɛs, Hasɔr, Galad, Galilee, ká bá nɛ̀ nú Nɛftalii lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o wi ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro si Asirii mɛ.
Osee bem ko Ela baa ɗaŋ keta zu Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia, ɓɛɛ gbɛ a̧ pi̧ nù; a̧ baa wan oi-aa tɛ ɓu-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Yotam bem ko Azaria.
Oi o tom ko Pɛka in o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu *Israɛl.
Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia dee pɛ yiitoo tɛ wan sɛn *Israɛl kaɗi, ɓɛɛ Yotam bem ko Ozias wannu Juda ɔ wan.
A̧ baa wan ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ. A̧ ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Yɛrusa, boko-bem ko Sadɔk.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN; a̧ dee kànà mɔ hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Mɔ kpɔk, o *kusa-fara kaɗi na. O bíí ɓɔna kànà tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ in dɔɔ fuu-nyama zu o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ mboo nú Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ si ŋgɔn.
Oi o tom ko Yotam in o mɔ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ GASA WAN ku̧u̧ nɛ̀ naŋ toma Rɛsin wannu Aram in Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia nɛnɛ mɛ bi Juda.
Yotam fee si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn saaye ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David; bem kɔ̧-a̧ Ahaz ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia, Ahaz bem ko Yotam wannu Juda ɔɔ wan.
Ahaz a̧a̧ so nɛ pɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. A̧ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zɔmdáà kɔ̧-a̧ David dee so ga na.
A̧ baa nɛ́ yuwar ko o dɔka wannu *Israɛl; a̧ dɔɔ bem kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ ko o dukbíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka so yinɛ ti o be *Israɛl.
A̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama zu o *kusa-fara, zu o kaya in ɗɔɔ o da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te lɛŋ.
Rɛsin wannu Aram in Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia wannu *Israɛl daŋa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi Ahaz sɛn Jerusalɛm; wa kɛra ye, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm so mɛ ku̧ biro na.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Edɔm baa Elat woyo. A̧ ndaka o be Juda sɛn Elat lɛŋ; o be Edɔm baa fara, ɓɛɛ wa ya sɛnɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Ahaz toma bíí nɛnɛ tɛ Tiglat-Pilesɛr wannu Asirii mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mi nɛ bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbó‘m er wannu Aram in wannu *Israɛl nɛ̀ kur zu'm’ɛ yinɛ.»
Ahaz kaia bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu lɛŋ tom nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Asirii nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ.
Wannu Asirii kpɛka ha̧a̧mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ bi Damas ba; a̧ kaia o wi ye'i lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro si Kir, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ Rɛsin.

Wannu Ahaz nɛɛ kpa ŋmaa in Tiglat-Pilesɛr wannu Asirii sɛn Damas. A̧ zɔka *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk sɛn Damas, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom yuwar mboo fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧‘i in yuwar ɗafa-a ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Uria, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk de nɛnɛ.
Uria wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mboo *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ wannu Akaz toma tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Damas. Tom'i kaɗa nɛti sɛka wannu Ahaz be tɛ̀ɛ́ pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Damas.
Wannu zɔka *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ pia-a kɔ‘i nɛ̀ Damas, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ si ká̧ a̧.
A̧ *dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ mɔ mbɛt. A̧ aa zɛzɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ misi̧ tɔk saɗi ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ a zu-a.
A̧ baa *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ duk ti GASA WAN yinɛ wen duka so mgbara mbe *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba e nɛ̀ war mgbɔɔr nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.

Wannu Ahaz ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Uria hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ dɔ́ kpoo-sɔ̧ mɛ tutuyɛ in ha̧a̧mɔ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ; mɛ̀ dɔ́ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧mɔ ko wannu, gú nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ in o zɛzɛ ko bíí lɛŋ sɛn zu gasa *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ gbáí tɔk o saɗi, dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ, in tɔk o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a zu-a; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, mi tɛ zɔk mɔ n'am tɛ de nɛnɛ.»
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Uria dee mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ *ha̧a̧nú ko Ahaz.
Wannu Ahaz yaia o ká̧-yí mɔɔ-tui-kpánà, kai o gasa kpánà nɛ̀ ya zu-a'i yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ba gba kpánà nɛ‘i dee nɛ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ duk so zu o ndai-ndɛrɛ e zu nɛka-ta.
A̧ kpaia mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ Gɔna-bɛr-tua Sabat kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, in nú tua ko wannu nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war zan mbɛt mɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ wannu Asirii.
Oi o tom ko wannu Ahaz in mɔ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Ahaz fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn *Ye ko David. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Ezɛkias ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Ahaz wannu Juda ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ Osee bem ko Ela ɔ wan sɛn Samarii nú *Israɛl tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ hee ko o wi nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan ti ha̧ a̧ sɛn *Israɛl ga na.
Salmanasar wannu Asirii baa biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧; Osee duka ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ a̧.

Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, wannu Asirii iŋa'e, Osee baa ɗaŋ keta zu wi, wen nɛ Osee toma so kɔ‘i o betom ha̧ Sais wannu Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo garama ha̧ wannu Asirii hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa de so nɛti ga ɓɔna. Wannu Asirii baa Osee, ɓɛɛ hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-boi pi̧ kɔ̧ zɔbɔ.
Wannu Asirii bìí nù nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ; a̧ kpee ye Samarii e nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ bi tɛ pɛ taar sɛka a̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ba.
Nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Osee a̧ a̧ baa nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o be *Israɛl lɛŋ si Asirii nɛ̀ bara-biro. A̧ ee ha̧ wa mɛ ɔ kɔ-wa sɛn Hala, ká̧-zaŋ Habɔr, foka-yì Gozaŋ in sɛn tɛ o ye Mɛdii.
Mɔ‘i dee hegɔ wen o be *Israɛl yuu nɛ́ o ŋma sɔ̧, de nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ gboo so wa nú Egiptɛ er wannu Egiptɛ.
Wa ndaka ɗoŋ heembea ko o dukbíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka so ti wa in o heembea nɛ̀ o wannu *Israɛl gɔna so.
O be *Israɛl in o wannu dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa kɔ̧ so ha̧ wa mɛ de na. Wa mboo o *kusa-fara tɛ ye kɔ-wa lɛŋ, sɛn fara-pɛm-mɔ in tɛ o ŋga ye kɔ-wa mbɛt lɛŋ.
Wa sɛka o ta-zu-nù in te nɛ‘i gasi gasi a dam zu o be kusa kaya in ɗɔɔ o da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te lɛŋ.
Wa dɔɔ fuu-nyama zu o *kusa-fara nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ ko o dukbíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka ti wa. Tɛ ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa'i, wa tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN.
Wa gasa o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ndé, ká wa gasi na wó‘i.

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o be *Israɛl in Juda nɛ̀ nú o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ in o wi-zɔk-mɔ lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o heembea in o geŋa kɔ‘m nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea n'am yɔra ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m.»
Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ mboo zu, wa dee ŋgazu hee o dáà kɔ-wa nɛ̀ e so ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na'i ga.

Wa ee o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ in *nɔɔ-tɔk n'aa nɔɔ so in o dáà kɔ-wa lɛŋ duk. A̧ mbaŋa tɛ-wa tɛ mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ so, ɓɛɛ wa zii na. Wa gasa nɛ́ o géé-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa kifi nɛ́ o geemɔ. Wa zɔka ɗoŋ deemɔ ko o dukbíí nɛ̀ ɔ so zik wa; ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa ndé: ká wa de mɔ hee kɔ-wa ga na.
Wa ee o heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ lɛŋ duk, ɓɛɛ wa mbo be ndai yiitoo. Wa sɛka Asɛra, sɔ̧-okoo, wa gbɛɛ zugur-wa nù ti o sɔra, ɓɛɛ wa de tom ha̧ sɔ̧ Bal.
Wa dɔɔ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧. Wa zɔka o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi in o wan-gbánà, wa pi̧i̧ tɛ-wa tɛ ɗaŋmɔ mɛ tu̧ see GASA WAN.
See GASA WAN tu̧u̧ zu o be *Israɛl nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa yinɛ yí-a; kànà nɛ́ zuduk ko Juda a̧ ɓɔna kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
O be Juda mbɛt kasi o geŋa ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, ɓɛɛ wa ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl gɔna so.
GASA WAN bɛ̧ɛ̧ duk be *Israɛl lɛŋ; a̧ pi̧i̧ búù zu wa, e nɛ̀ wa er o wi-ɓar-mɔ er wi, ha̧ wa mɛ ndak wa nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN foo nɛ̀ *Israɛl yinɛ mgbara o bíí nutua ko David, *Israɛl hoka Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat hee wannu ga. Jeroboam dee ha̧ *Israɛl mɛ ar nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ pi̧ tɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ.
O be *Israɛl ndaka ɗoŋ o ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Jeroboam dee so'i; wa e yuwar-a duk na,
ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN e wa nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ wi hee mɔ n'aa baa tɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ga; wa kaia o be *Israɛl nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Asirii, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Wannu Asirii saa o be Babilɔŋ, o be Kut, o be Awa, o be Hamat in o be Sɛfarvaim tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa tɛ o ye Samarii oi o be *Israɛl. Wa baa Samarii, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ tɛ o ye.
Tɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɔɔ ye kɔ-wa hi̧i̧, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa yu so GASA WAN na ga, GASA WAN toma o dila gbɛ nɛ̀ wa.

O bíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Asirii: «O tugun bíí n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wa a̧ ɔ́ Samarii wó'ɛ iŋ kɔ‘i yuwar tu̧u̧ tɛ sɔ̧-nù‘i na. Sɔ̧‘i toma o dila, ɓɛɛ gbɛ o ŋma mgbara wa yinɛ wen wa iŋ kɔ-wa yuwar tu̧u̧ tɛ sɔ̧-nù‘i na.»
Wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Samarii kpɔk mgbara o dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ kaia nɛ̀ bara’ɛ nɛnɛ mɛ usi yuwar tu̧u̧ tɛ sɔ̧-nù‘i ha̧ wa.»
Ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mgbara o wan nɛ wa kaia so nɛ̀ bara sɛn Samarii nɛɛ ɔ Bɛtɛl; a̧ usa mgbara yuu GASA WAN ha̧ wa.
O tugun bíí kpɔk kpɔk mbo nɛ́ sɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ gasi so'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ e kɔ̧ tua tɛ o *kusa-fara nɛ̀ o be Samarii dee so'i; tugun bíí dee kànà hegɔ tɛ ye nɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ‘i.
Nin sɔ̧ ko o be Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ dea'i nɛ́ Sukot-Bɛnot; ko o be Kut nɛ́ Nɛrgal; o be Hamat gasi kɔ‘i nɛ́ Asima.
O be Awa gasi nɛ́ Nihaz in Tartak; o be Sɛfarvaim dɔ kɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem kɔ‘i ha̧ Adramɛlɛk in Anamɛlɛk.
Wa yuu GASA WAN mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa e kànà o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mɛ de tom oi nú-wa sɛn kɔ̧ tua tɛ o *kusa-fara.
Wa yuu GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa gasi kànà o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa siti mbɛt, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar duka-a ko o tugun bíí tɛ nù nɛ̀ wa kaia wa nɛ̀ bara sɛnɛ tɛnɛ‘i.

Hɔ sɔsɔɔ mbɛt, wa de nɛ o do gba̧‘a̧ mɔ‘i. Wa yu GASA WAN na; wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ geŋa, o do-mɔ, in o yuwar duka-a nɛ̀ kifa nɛ́ kɔ-wa'i na. Wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea in wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN yɔra ha̧ o bem ko Jakob, wi n'aa saa nin-a'e Israɛl’ɛ na.
GASA WAN *nɔɔ tɔk in wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ́nɛ́ beka yu ŋma sɔ̧ na; ɛ́nɛ́ beka gbɛ zugur'nɛ́ nù ti wa na mbɛt; k’ɛ́nɛ́ de tom ha̧ wa na in k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafi wa na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ baa gbo'nɛ́ yinɛ nú Egiptɛ tɛ ŋgai mɛ er-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ yu in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ gu nù ti a̧. Nɛ́ a̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ ɗafi.
O geŋa in o do-mɔ, heembea in o tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen n'aa usa h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ tom wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu o ŋma sɔ̧ na.
Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ *nɔɔ-tɔk n'aa nɔɔ so in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu o ŋma sɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ yu. Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ gbo'nɛ́ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ!»
Wa kɔ̧ mboo zu na, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn tɛ deemɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ do gba̧‘a̧ yuwar duka-a kɔ-wa.
O tugun bíí nɔ‘i yuu kíí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn kànà tɛ gasa o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mbɛt. Mɔ nɛ̀ o zɔmdáà kɔ-wa dee so, o dáà kɔ-wa dea, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i a̧ o bem kɔ-wa de hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i mbɛt.
Tɛ taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Osee bem ko Ɛla wannu *Israɛl, Ezɛkias bem ko Ahaz wannu Juda ɔɔ wan.
A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Abi boko-bem ko Zakarii.
A̧ dee so mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a yí GASA WAN, kànà hee ko zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David ga.

A̧ gbina o *kusa-fara in o ta-zu-nù a nù, a̧ gɔma te nɛ‘i gasi gasi pi̧ nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin gɔk-ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ Moisɛ dee so'i a nù, wen o be *Israɛl dɔɔ so fuu-nyama ti gɔk ndɛrɛ‘i hɔ ŋgimbi'i; wa sa so nin-a'e, Nɛhustaŋ.
Ezɛkias ee ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl. Ɗoŋ n'aa fee kaɗi, ŋma wannu Juda nɛ‘i tɛ we nɛ̀ a̧ nɛti, kóó nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, bo na mbɛt.
A̧ ndaɗa kànà in GASA WAN; a̧ zik tɛ-a na, a̧ kasa o geŋa nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ nɛ̀ de-a.
GASA WAN duka so in a̧, ɓɛɛ o mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ hɔ nɛ́ gba̧a̧. A̧ dee ŋgazu in wannu Asirii, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna.
A̧ bìì o be Filistii hɔ Gaza in nù nɛ̀ zii nɛ̀ a̧; a̧ ɗaŋa o kusa fara-pɛm-mɔ in o ŋga-ye-biro mbɛt.
Tɛ naar pɛ-wan ko Ezɛkias, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa ko Osee bem ko Ɛla wannu *Israɛl, Salmanasar wannu Asirii baa zu dúk nɛ̀ Samarii, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpe ye e nu.
O be Asirii baa ye'i ɗoŋ pɛ taar. Ezɛkias dee pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ wan, Osee wannu *Israɛl dee kɔ‘i mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar sɛka wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ ba Samarii.
Wannu Asirii kaia o be *Israɛl yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ wa si Hala, si ká̧ zaŋ yí Habɔr, foka-yì Gozaŋ, in sitɛ o ye Mɛdii.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa zii wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, gbin nɛ̀ *nɔɔ-tɔk kɔ̧-a̧; mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN yɔra so'i, wa zii géé zia-a, kà bó nɛ̀ kasa-a de nɛ̀ tom na mbɛt.
Ezɛkias ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-naar, ɓɛɛ wannu Asirii Sɛnakɛrib ba zu dúk nɛ̀ o ŋga-ye Juda lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kai.

Ezɛkias wannu Juda pi̧i̧ tom ha̧ wannu Asirii sɛn Lakis hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ! K’ɛ́nɛ́ bi'm na! Mi tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ de!» Wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias wannu Juda mɛ yoɓi kilo bu-mbɔi booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar in kilo lɔr gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
Ezɛkias ha̧a̧ sede nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN'i in wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu ha̧ a̧.
Nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ Ezɛkias gbina nɛ̀ o nú Tua ko GASA WAN in kpar nú-a nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a baa yɔk so ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ lɔr. A̧ kaia wa ha̧ wannu Asirii.

Wannu Asirii toma gasa wi-biro, gasawi ko o kpàná in gasa betom kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋma gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ Lakis sitɛ wannu Ezɛkias sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ kaɗi, wa yora ká̧ fara-e-yì nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war ŋgɔn yuwar fara-mgbɔ-laa.
Wa aka mɔ wen wannu, ɓɛɛ Ɛliakim bem ko Hilkia nɛ̀ duk zu tua-wan, in wi-yɔr-kalata Sɛbna, in Yɔa bem ko Asaf nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ wi-he-mbea gbo pii tɛ-wa.
Gasa betom tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias ndé, gasa wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, mɛ́ é ta-mɛ nɛ̀ o nde?
Mɛ́ é ta-mɛ nɛ̀ o ha̧ mɛ mɛ de nɛ̀ ŋgazu in am o?
Mɛ́ é ta-mɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ ɗaŋ nuka-tòrò sɔɔ géè, kà ŋma bíí de mɛ ba, ɓɛɛ gbina yur er-wi’ɛ nde? Wannu Egiptɛ duk hegɔ in o wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ a̧ lɛŋ!

«Ŋmafara ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndé, wi e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ á̧ Ezɛkias gbina o *kusa-fara kɔ̧-a̧ in o fara-ɗaf'aa, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm ndé, a'i gbɛ́ zugur-wi nù ti *fara-ɗaf'aa sɛn Jerusalɛm wó'ɛ gɔ!
Mɛ̀ é nú mɛ in nyaa wannu Asirii, ha̧‘m ha̧ o nyaŋa booro-yiitoo ha̧ mɛ, kà mɛ nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ kpa o wi-daŋ-aa!

Kóó mɛ́ e ta-mɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa o keekee-nyaŋa in o wi-daŋ-aa! Héé ge mɛ tɛ zik ɗoŋ-mɛ e ha̧‘m, mi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ geɗek wi-duk-zu zika-nù ko gasa wan kɔ‘m, mi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ geɗek-wi mgbara o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, ge nde?
Mɛ́ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e, ye kɔ-mɛ n'am tɛ ɗaŋ yínɛ́'ɛ, bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgai ko GASA WAN na nde? GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e, a̧‘m tɛ́ɛ̀ bi ye’ɛ, a̧‘m ɗáŋ a̧ yinɛ!»
Ɛliakim bem ko Hilkia in Sɛbna bá nɛ̀ Yoa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ gasa betom: «Ɛ́ɛ́ aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ̀ nú aram sɛk’ɛɛ zia gba̧a̧-a̧; k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ nú hébreu na, wen ká o bíí nɛ ya zu garo tɛɛ zii.»
Gasa betom kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Nyaa toma'm ha̧ wan kɔ-mɛ in mɛɛ nde? Bo nɛ a̧ toma'm ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɔ ini in nyɔŋa ɗɔr ndaa'nɛ́ in o ŋmaa’ɛ na nde?»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gasa betom yora ŋgɔn tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen nɛ̀ hee-ger nɛ̀ nú hébreu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko gasa wannu Asirii nɛ tɔ̧‘i.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, k’ɛ́ɛ́ e ha̧ Ezɛkias mɛ ɔr'nɛ́ géè na, wen a̧ nyɛm mɛ gbo'nɛ́ yinɛ er-am na.
Ká Ezɛkias de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹GASA WAN tɛ gbo yɛ nɛ mbetɛ, wannu Asirii nyɛm mɛ ba ye’ɛ na wó,› na!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen ko Ezɛkias na, wen wannu Asirii tɔ̧a̧: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nyɔŋ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in waya-te-mbɔra k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɔ yì k’ɛ́nɛ́

hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kai'nɛ́ sitɛ ŋma nù nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in k’ɛ́nɛ́, nù nɛ̀ alkamaari in nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, nù nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ in nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, nù nɛ̀ o te-nɔ̧́ in gɔrɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ ya kpasa, ɛnɛ beka fe na.› K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii ɔramɔ ko Ezɛkias na! Wen'i n'aa tɔ̧‘e, GASA WAN tɛ gbo'nɛ́ wó‘i, nɛ́ ndela!
O sɔ̧ ko o tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ gboo so o bíí kɔ‘i er wannu Asirii nde?
O sɔ̧ ko o be Hamat in ko be Arpad a̧a̧ déè? O sɔ̧ ko o be Sɛfarvaim, ko o be Hɛna in Iwa a̧a̧ déè? Wa gboo Samarii yinɛ er-am nde?
Mgbara o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, nɛ́ o'o gboo nù kɔ‘i yinɛ er-am, sá nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ gbo Jerusalɛm yinɛ er-am o?»
O wi nɔ‘i yaa selele, wa kifi nú-wen kpɔk na, wen wannu ha̧a̧ so nú‘e ndé, ká wa kifi nú na.
Ɛliakim bem ko Hilkia nɛ̀ duk zu tua-wan, in wi-yɔr-kalata Sɛbna, bá nɛ̀ Yɔa bem ko Asaf wi-he-mbea a̧ka̧ laa tɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ ti Ezɛkias mɛ we ɗoŋ wen ko gasa betom ha̧ a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Ezɛkias zia wen kɔ-wa'i, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa kɔ̧-a̧, pi̧ laa bufu, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
A̧ toma Ɛliakim wi-duk-zu tua-wan, Sɛbna wi-yɔr-kalata in o gasa wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; ɓɛɛ wa a laa bufu nɛ́ nɛnɛ tɛ Esaii bem ko Amɔs,
mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ndé, «Ezɛkias tɔ̧a̧: ‹Wese’ɛ nɛ́ wese-ŋgamɔ, wese-bɔnɛ in wese-ziimɔ! Bem ee zu war kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ŋgai gɔfa a̧ bo na.

Ŋmafara GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ zii wen nɛ̀ wannu Asirii toma nɛ̀ gasa betom kɔ‘i da̧ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ dee bɔnɛ in a̧, wen o wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ zia'i! Mɛ̀ kɔ́fí sɔ̧ wen o oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna'i.› »
O betom ko wannu Ezɛkias hɔɔ tɛ Esaii,
ɓɛɛ Esaii tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wan k’ɛ́nɛ́; GASA WAN'e ndé: ‹Ká mɛ́ de kíì wen mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ zia'i na; ká mɛ́ de kíí dara nɛ̀ o bíí ko wannu Asirii da̧ nɛ‘m'i na.
Mi tɛ e ŋma taamɔ kɔ‘m tɛ-a, a̧ tɛ zii ŋma nyɛrɛ, a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ mi dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa tɛ mgbák nù kɔ̧-a̧.› »
Gasa betom zia'e wannu Asirii yaka si Lakis, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa a̧ sɛn Libna, fara n'aa bi biro sɛnɛ‘i.
Wannu zia nyɛrɛ ko Tiraka wannu Etiopii nɛ̀ tɛ de biro in a̧, ɓɛɛ wannu Asirii tom mɔ sitɛ Ezɛkias woyo hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Ezɛkias wannu Juda hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Ká Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ mɛ e ta nɛnɛ ɔr mɛ ndé, wannu Asirii nyɛm mɛ ba Jerusalɛm na,› na!
Mɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ̀ o wannu Asirii dee in o nù lɛŋ; wa kuma o bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ‘e ndé, ŋma mɔ beka fo wi na!
Nɛ́ ge gbakamɔ ge a̧ o sɔ̧ ko o zuduk nɛ̀ o dáà kuma so’ɛ gbaka nɛ̀ wa ge? Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye Gozaŋ, Haraŋ, Rɛsɛf in o be Edan nɛ̀ ɔ so sɛn Tɛlasar.
O wannu Hamat, Arpad, Lair, Sɛfarvaim, Hɛna in wannu Iwa a̧a̧ déè nde?»
Ezɛkias baa kalata er o betom, ɓɛɛ tɔr; a̧ daŋa si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN; a̧ yaia kalata'i ti GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔfi sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl, ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk zu o *keribim, ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk zu o mɔɔ-wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ, wen nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ́ dee yiwese in nù.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí dara nɛ̀ Sɛnakɛrib toma da̧ nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kpasa’ɛ!
GASA WAN, o wannu Asirii kuma so o zuduk bíí, ɗaŋ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ mbetɛ.
Wa kaia o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a tɛ wee, ɓɛɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i bo nɛ́ o kpasa sɔ̧ na; wa nɛ́ o tom-er-bíí nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ te in ta, ɓɛɛ sa o wannu Asirii ɗaŋ wa yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ er Sɛnakɛrib, ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ tɛ iŋ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.»
Esaii bem ko Amɔs toma tom ha̧ Ezɛkias hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi zia kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ zu Sɛnakɛrib wannu Asirii.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ a zu a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Zɔŋa *Siɔŋ mam nɛ mɛ,
a̧ zɔk mɛ hee geemɔ ga;
Jerusalɛm yàà-de-zɔŋa,
sɔr nɛ mɛ, zɛkɛɗi nɛnɛ!
Nɛ́ o a̧ mɛ da̧a̧ zɛkɛɗi nɛnɛ'ɛ o?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋga wen zu a̧,
ŋmaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ'ɛ o?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sa̧a̧-wi ko *Israɛl.
«Mɛ́ ee tom nú o betom kɔ-mɛ da̧ nɛ GASA WAN.
Mɛ tɔ̧a̧: ‹Tɛ̀ báá naŋanɔ ko o keekee-nyaŋa kɔ‘m,
mi daŋa zu o kaya.›
Mɛ ŋmaŋa tɛ-mɛ‘e ndé,
wi gɔma o kusa te *gbatui in o *zawaya,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wi yee kɔ̧ ɗuka kombo.
Wi gɔna kɔ̧ yì gɔni nù,
ɓɛɛ wi nɔ;
wi i̧sa o gɔna-yí Egiptɛ lɛŋ ɔ̧si.
«Mɛ́ íŋ kɔ-mɛ mɔ n'am ee so zu-a ɓeemɛ na nde?
Mɔ n'am taa so mɛ de ɓeemɛ‘i
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ de kinii'i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ tɛ de
ha̧ o ta ŋga-ye nɔ‘i mɛ tir a nù.
O wi ye nɔ‘i bo nɛ̀ ŋgai na,
tɛ-wa gbina, búù baa wa,
wa ya hee zɔ̧ in nuŋui kpɛɛfɔ ga.
Wa ya hee o mbɔɗimɔ nɛ̀ hɔ zu tua ga,
hee alkamaari nɛ laambam baa nɛti ha̧ mɛ sɔk ga.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ duk nù,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ gbo,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ ye tua, mi iŋa,
in ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ nak nɛ̀ tu̧u̧-see zu'm mbɛt.
Mɛ kura zu'm
ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋ wen kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ aa zer-am;
hegɔ, mi tɛ pi̧ káná zɔ̧ɔ̧-mɛ
in nú-mɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ mgbɔ mɛ sinɛ ɗoŋ
nɛ̀ yuwar nɛ̀ mɛ tɛɛ nɛnɛ‘i.
«Mɔ'ɔ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ ha̧ mɛ, Ezɛkias:
wi tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ nyɔnɔ mɛ pɛ'ɛ,
mɛ bin-mgba-pɛ,
wi tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ hɔɔ nɛ ta-tɛ;
ɓɛɛ tɛ taar pɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ nyɔnɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ o waya-a.
O be nutua ko Juda nɛ̀ ɓɔna,
nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa,
tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma te
nɛ̀ kunin-a yee nù nɛ̀ ɗuka-a,
ɓɛɛ wai woyo.
Oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ gbo nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm;
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ tɛ zir nɛ̀ zu kaya *Siɔŋ mɛ.
Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ de
tɛ gasa *kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧
zu wannu Asirii'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
‹A̧ beka ye saaye-ɛ na;
a̧ beka pi̧ góò si hi̧i̧ na,
a̧ beka kai ŋgee bi nɛ̀ ye'i na;
a̧ beka mbo mɔ mɛ hu̧si ɗoŋ-aa ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ si nɛ̀ kpɔk yuwar
n'aa tɛɛ so nɛnɛ‘i;
yéé kɔ̧-a̧ saaye bo na;
nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧a̧.
Mi tɛ pɛm ye’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi kpasa a̧ wen nin-am
in wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David.› »
Ŋma betom ko GASA WAN tɛɛ mɛ zaŋzɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ gbɛ bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Asirii. Wa kura mɛ tutuyɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk nɛ o wɔr mbɔɗɔnu nɛnɛ!
Wannu Asirii Sɛnakɛrib kura ɓɛɛ gbin gbagari. A̧ sii ɗoŋ, ɓɔn sɛn Ninivɛ.
Ŋma wese, a̧ nɛɛ ye kɔ̧ tua ko sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ Nisrɔk mɛ gas'aa, ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Adramɛlɛk in Saresɛr gbɛ a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa pi̧ nù; wa yuu mɔ yak si nú Ararat, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Asaradɔŋ ɔ wan oi-aa.

Ŋma wese, zɛɛ-fio baa Ezɛkias. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Esaii *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ bem ko Amɔs tɛɛ kpa a̧ ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «GASA WAN'e ndé: ‹Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ sɔŋkur wen ha̧ o bíí nutua kɔ-mɛ ŋgaɓo, wen mɛ tɛ fe; mɛ beka kpasi na.› »
Ezɛkias zika tɛ si zaŋ ŋgeŋ, ɓɛɛ wor GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ-am wen mi nɛ̀ɛ̀ so nɔ̀ ti'nɛ́ nɛ̀ yuwar-a, nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see; ɓɛɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ̀ de tɛ‘nɛ́.» Ezɛkias hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ nyɛmna.
Esaii tɛ gbo kɔ̧ gasa bee-gara ko Ezɛkias hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:

«Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias, wan ko dukbíí kɔ‘m'e, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáà kɔ-mɛ David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, mi zia kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Mi tɛ kpas'a. Ɗoŋ zɛ taar ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ.
Mi aa mbe pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ zu duka-a kɔ̧-a̧. Mi tɛ gbo a̧ in o wi ye’ɛ er wannu Asirii; mi tɛ pɛm ye’ɛ, wen nin-am in wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David.»
Esaii tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá makala waya-te-mbɔra tɛnɛ.» Wa baa tɛnɛ sɔ̧ nɛ̀ fara nɛ̀ nyim'i, ɓɛɛ tɛ wannu hai.
Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Esaii: «Mɔ nɛ̀ usi'e, GASA WAN tɛ kpas'am, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ zɛ taar, mi tɛ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ge?»
Esaii kifa nú: «Mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ usi'e, GASA WAN tɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ nú sɛnɛ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ gi̧ɔ̧-mɔ mɛ dur tɛ naŋ ɓu náà, kóó mɛ de dɔ̧-a̧ tɛ naŋ ɓu nde?»
Ezɛkias kifa nú: «Zi̧a̧-a̧ ko gi̧ɔ̧-mɔ tɛ naŋ ɓu bo nɛ ŋgayamɔ na; ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nɛ dɔ̧-a̧ tɛ naŋ ɓu.»
*Wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ Esaii kɔfa GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ gi̧ɔ̧ mɛ de dɔ̧-a̧ tɛ naŋ ɓu, zu fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ si nú zala ko Ahaz.
Ŋgimbi'i, Mɛrodak-Baladaŋ, bem ko Baladaŋ wannu Babilɔŋ toma kalata ha̧ Ezɛkias in o ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ, wen a̧ zia so'e, tɛ wannu Ezɛkias hai na.

Ezɛkias kpaa desee nyɛmna tɛ hɔa-a ko o betom, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ wa usi nɛ̀ o fara-a-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ: bu-mbɔi, lɔr, yí-nyama, nɔ̧́-nyama, o boi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧. Ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ Ezɛkias usi ha̧ wa tɛ kɔ‘i na, bo na.
*Wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ Esaii nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa wannu Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «O wi nɔ'ɔ tɛɛ nɛ̀ déè? Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee ge?» Ezɛkias kifa nú: «Wa tɛa nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ mɛ.»
Esaii aka mɔ woyo: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ wa zɔka kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ ge?»
Ezɛkias kifa nú: «Mi usa mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m lɛŋ ha̧ wa; ŋma mɔ mgbara mbɔi kɔ‘m n'am usi ha̧ wa na, bo na.»
Ɓɛɛ Esaii tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN:
‹Ŋma wese, wa tɛ kai mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ tua k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ in mɔ nɛ̀ o dáà k’ɛnɛ mɔi̧a so e hɔ sɔsɔɔ si Babilɔŋ; ŋma mɔ beka ɓɔn na.
Wa tɛ kai o bem k’ɛnɛ n’ɛnɛ koa yaknɛ. Wa tɛ ya nɛ́ o kpàná kɔ̧ tua ko wannu Babilɔŋ.› »
Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Esaii: «Wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘i ɔ dee,› wen a̧ taa nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see-aa'e, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i a̧a̧ tɛ wan, nù tɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
«Oi o tom ko Ezɛkias, o ŋgaŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, mɔ n'aa dea, gɔna kɔ̧-yì n'aa gɔna in war-yì n'aa ɗafa ba nɛ̀ yì si saaye yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Ezɛkias fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ɔ wan oi-aa.
Manase a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-mɔɔrɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Ɛfsi-Ba. A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN, wen a̧ zɔka ɗoŋ o ɗaŋ tom ko o tugun bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka so ti o be *Israɛl'i.
A̧ mboo o *kusa-fara nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Ezɛkias ɗaŋa so woyo. A̧ mboo fara-ɗafi Bal, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɛk te nɛ‘i gasi gasi hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Akab wannu *Israɛl dee so ga. A̧ gbɛɛ zugur-aa nù ti o sɔra, ɓɛɛ a̧ gasi wa.
A̧ mboo fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen zu-a ndé: «Mi tɛ e nin-am sɛn Jerusalɛm.»
A̧ mboo o *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ o sɔra sɛn bee-gara Tua ko GASA WAN yiitoo'i.
A̧ dɔɔ bem kɔ̧-a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧. A̧ pi̧i̧ tani ɓɛɛ a̧ de mɔɔ-kifi mbɛt. A̧ aa o wi-zɔk-sɔ̧-fio in o wan-gbánà. A̧ tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN tɛ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí-a.

A̧ sɛka géé-sɔ̧ Asɛra e kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so nɛnɛ ha̧ David in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ‘e: «Nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua’ɛ in sɛn Jerusalɛm n'am hoka mgbara o zuduk be *Israɛl a̧ nin-am tɛ duk sɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi beka de ha̧ o be *Israɛl mɛ yambali nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ nù n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa na; wa a̧ dé nɛ́ mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧a̧, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea lɛŋ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Moisɛ yɔra so ha̧ wa.»
Ɓɛɛ wa mbo zu na; Manase mgbɔɔ wa yɔ nɛ̀ kaya nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a gan ko o tugun bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN kuma so ti o be *Israɛl.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Manase wannu Juda dee ndiŋmɔ batɛ; ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i gana ko o be Amɔr; a̧ ɔra o be Juda pi̧ tɛ gasa géé-sɔ̧ mbɛt,
sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl'e ndé, wi tɛ de ha̧ bɔnɛ mɛ tik zu Jerusalɛm in Juda, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a tɛ ya yemsele.
Ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ kpaa Samarii in o bíí nutua ko Akab tɛ kpa Jerusalɛm. Mi tɛ di̧ Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i di̧ nɛ̀ nyɛk zik gu nù'ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ e oi mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m duk; mi tɛ e wa kɔ̧ er o wisɛn kɔ-wa. Wa tɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-kɔ̧-er in mɔɔ-oi-biro ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
wen wa dee ɗaŋmɔ sɛn ti'm, ɓɛɛ wa kaɗi tu̧u̧ see-am na ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ́ wese nɛ̀ o zɔmdáà kɔ-wa gboo so nɛnɛ Egiptɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.»
O wi nɛ̀ de ɗaŋmɔ na, Manase gbɛɛ kànà wa; tɔk tɛ-wa foka dam Jerusalɛm lɛŋ. Wi tɔ̧ ɗaŋmɔ n'aa mgbɔɔ Juda pi̧ sɛnɛ de nɛ̀ mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN na.
Oi o tom ko Manase, mɔ n'aa dea lɛŋ, hɔ tɛ ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dee so, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Manase fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ kpɛɛfɔ ko Uza ká̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amɔŋ ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Amɔŋ baa wan ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo; ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛ yiitoo tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Mɛsulɛmɛt, boko-bem ko Harus be Yotba.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ga.
A̧ dee mɔ tɛ gasa o géé-sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ gu nù ti wa.
A̧ bɛ̧ɛ̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáà kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ ba yuwar ko GASA WAN na.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ giiwi gbɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ keta zu wannu Amɔŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa de wan ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Josias oi-aa.
Oi o tom ko wannu Amɔŋ, o mɔ n'aa dea lɛŋ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Wa guna a̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ ko Uza, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Josias ɔ wan oi-aa.
Josias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-kpɔk; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Jɛdida, boko-bem ko Adaya be Boskat.
Josias dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN; a̧ nɛɛ nɔ̀ tɛ yuwar ko zɔmdáà kɔ̧-a̧ David nɛ̀ baa so'i, a̧ e yuwar'i duk mɛ nɛ̀ si wiiko kóó si gale na mbɛt.
Ɗoŋ nɛ Josias dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar tɛ wan kaɗi, a̧ toma wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ bem ko Asalia be-koo Mɛsulam nɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia; a̧ a̧ tɔ́r mbɔi nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ o wi-pɛm-tua mɔi̧a so er dukbíí;
a̧ a̧ há̧ há̧ o wi-duk-zu tom Tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ yoɓi nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ ɗafa o fara nɛ̀ Tua'i ɗaŋa sɛnɛ‘i:
o wi-mgboi-tua, o wi-de-tom tua, o wi-mbo-tua in ha̧ wa mɛ hi̧fi nɛ̀ o mbiŋ in o sɛka-ta wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Tua.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ak ndaa sede nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa'i na, wen wa de nɛ tom nɛ̀ yuwar-a.»
Gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ: «Mi kpaa kalata Heembea sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata'i ha̧ Safaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr.
Safaŋ wi-tɔr-kalata nɛ̀ɛ̀ we ɗoŋ wen'i ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa mbɔi sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ ha̧ o wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.»
Wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu woyo: «Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia ha̧a̧ ŋma kalata ha̧‘m.» Ɓɛɛ Safaŋ tɔr kalata'i ha̧ wannu.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu zia gba̧a̧ wen nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea'i kaɗi, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-a a nù.
A̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia in Ahikam bem ko Safaŋ, Akbɔr bem ko Mikaya, ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ, in ha̧ Asaya wi-de-tom ko wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga:

«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k GASA WAN wen am in o be Juda lɛŋ, wen wen zaŋ Kalata’ɛ n’ɛɛ kpaa’ɛ. Nyimsea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ kura zu yɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, wen bó nɛ́ o dáà k’ɛɛ mboo so zu tɛ wen nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ na, in wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ-aa'i na.»

Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia in Ahikam, Akbɔr, Safaŋ in Asaya nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Hulda okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, kóò ko Salum wi-pɛm-laa, bem ko Tikwa be-koo Haras. A̧ ɔ tɛ mbe ye sɛn Jerusalɛm. Ɗoŋ nɛ wa wee ɗoŋ wen'i ha̧ a̧ kaɗi,
a̧ kifa nú ha̧ wa: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wi nɛ̀ toma'm tɛnɛ‘i:
Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋgamɔ fara'i in zu o bíí ye'i lɛŋ, wen ha̧ wen zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ wannu Juda tɔra'i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ lɛŋ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa bɛ̧a̧‘m, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧, tu̧ nɛ̀ see-am tɛ o tom nɛ̀ wa de nɛ̀ er-wa'i ga, nyimsea kɔ‘m kura zu fara'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wee nyimsea'i beka bi ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu Juda nɛ̀ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ mɛ zɔk GASA WAN ndé, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko *Israɛl nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ́ zia o wen nɔ‘i nɛ̀ de-a,

wen nɛ̀ see-mɛ ŋmana. Mɛ́ mɔka see-mɛ ti GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ zia nɛ̀ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu fara’ɛ in o wi-ɔ-sɛnɛ ndé, fara’ɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ fara-búù in fara-fom. Mɛ́ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ ti'm. Hegɔ, mi zia. Nɛ́ mí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ e mɛ kpɔk in o dáà kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ kpa wa tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka zɔk o bɔnɛ n'am tɛ pi̧ zu nù'ɛ nɛ̀ yí-mɛ na.› »
Ɓɛɛ o betom ba kifa-nú si ɗoŋ ha̧ wannu.
Wannu toma sa o gasawi Jerusalɛm in Juda lɛŋ tɛnɛ pii katɛ wi.

Wannu nɛɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in wa lɛŋ: o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, o bíí saaye lɛŋ, kóó ge bíí ge ndé lɛŋ. A̧ tɔra gba̧a̧ wen nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata *nɔɔ-tɔk nɛ̀ wa kpaa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN'i ha̧ wa.

Wannu yora zu mɔ nɛ̀ kusa-a ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú ti GASA WAN ndé, wi kpɛka *nɔɔ-tɔk n'aa nɔɔ in wi'i; wi tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ wi kasa o usamɔ in o geŋa, o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ see-wi lɛŋ in kiitɛ-wi lɛŋ, ha̧ deemɔ kɔ‘i mɛ nyɛm ɗoŋ o gba̧a̧ wen nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata nɔɔ-tɔk'i, ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ kpɛk nɔɔ-tɔk'i.

Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia, ha̧ o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in ha̧ o wi-pɛm-tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ kai o mɔ nɛ̀ wa ɗafa so wen gasa sɔ̧ Bal, Asɛra in o sɔra gbonɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Wa dɔɔ wa lɛŋ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ Sɛdrɔŋ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa kai bùk-aa yaknɛ si Bɛtɛl mɛ.

A̧ gbɛɛ o wi-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o wannu Juda hoka so mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama zu o *kusa-fara tɛ o ye Juda in ká̧ Jerusalɛm yinɛ; a̧ gbɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ dɔ fuu-nyama gasi nɛ̀ Bal, gasi nɛ̀ wese, gasi nɛ̀ nyaŋa-zɛ in o sɔra lɛŋ a nù.
A̧ baa te nɛ‘i gasi gasi gbonɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm si kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ hi̧i̧. Wa kaia bùk-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbai a fara-gun o bíí.
A̧ gbina fara-ɔɔ ko o wiwii-de-dàlà *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ya so tok nɛ̀ laa ko Asɛra sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ a nù.

A̧ saa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ saaye Juda lɛŋ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ o *kusa-fara nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i dɔɔ so fuu-nyama sɛnɛ‘i lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a sɛn Geba hɔ Bɛrseba; a̧ gbina o *kusa-fara wan mɛ nú garo-ye, nɛ̀ duk nú garo ko wanye Josue, in o wan nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war gale nú-garo lɛŋ tɛ yee ye.
O wi-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ nyɛm so mɛ daŋ si zu fara-ɗafi GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm na. Wa nyɔŋ kànà kɔ-wa nɛ *brɛt nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na mgbara o nya-wa.
A̧ ɗaŋa fara-dɔ-bíí
A̧ gbɛɛ o nyaŋa nɛ̀ o wannu Juda ha̧a̧ so ha̧ sɔ̧-wese mgbák nú Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ war zan ká̧ gɔna bɛr-tua ko kpàná Nɛtaŋ-Mɛlɛk, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ o keekee-nyaŋa nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ so ha̧ sɔ̧-wee mbɛt.

Wannu gbina o *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o wannu Juda mboo so e zu tua ko Ahaz mɛ ŋgɔn, in o wan nɛ̀ Manase mboo so sɛn bee-gara Tua ko GASA WAN yiitoo lɛn a nù; a̧ kaia oi bia wee-aa yinɛ, nɛ́ɛ̀ á bùk-aa kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.

Wannu ɗaŋa o *kusa-fara nɛ̀ yaa so tan nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ ha̧ kaya te-nɔ̧́; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o kusa-fara nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ wannu *Israɛl mboo so mɛ gasi nɛ̀ Astarte, okoo-sɔ̧ ko o be Sidɔŋ, Kɛmɔs géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Mɔab in Milkɔm ɗaŋ sɔ̧ ko o be Amɔŋ.
A̧ gbina o ta-zu-nù ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔm o sɛka-te nɛ‘i gasi gasi a nù; a̧ kaia o gba̧a̧ bíí a oi-aa.

Josias gbina *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk sɛn Bɛtɛl, *kusa-fara nɛ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat mboo so, mgbɔ nɛ̀ o be *Israɛl a tɛ ɗaŋmɔ; a̧ gbina fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧‘i in *kusa-fara-a; a̧ dɔɔ kusa-fara'i kifi bùk, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ te nɛ‘i gasi gasi.

Josias zika tɛ ɓɛɛ zɔk o pɛsi-fio nɛ̀ ya so zu kaya'i; a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kai gba̧a̧ nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧ o pɛsi nɔ‘i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ zu *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧; a̧ dee hegɔ fɛŋ nɛ̀ fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧‘i nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ bíí ko Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so.
A̧ zɔka ŋma mboo-mɔ ɓɛɛ a̧ ak mɔ: «Nɛ́ ge mboo-mɔ ge n'am zɔk mɛ‘i ge?»
O wi saaye kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ pɛsi-fio ko ŋma bíí ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ tɛɛ so nɛ̀ Juda; nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu mɔ n’ɛnɛ de kinii zu *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Bɛtɛl’ɛ.»
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é pɛsi'i! K’ɛ́nɛ́ fo gba̧a̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ a̧ na!»
Wa ee o gba̧a̧ nɔ‘i oi-aa in gba̧a̧ ŋma *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ tɛɛ so nɛ̀ Samarii mbɛt.
Josias gbina o tua *kusa-fara nɛ̀ o wannu *Israɛl mboo so tu̧ nɛ̀ see GASA WAN sɛn tɛ o ye Samarii a nù. A̧ dee kànà mɔ in wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so nɛnɛ sɛn Bɛtɛl ga.
A̧ gɔna o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ de tom zu o *kusa-fara sɛn *fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ gba̧a̧ bíí sɛnɛ. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i a̧ pia ɗoŋ pii Jerusalɛm.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé gbaŋa *Paska ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata *nɔɔ-tɔk ga.»
Tɛ ŋgimbi ko o wi-gɔn-kita nɛ̀ duka so nɛnɛ *Israɛl hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi ko o wannu *Israɛl in o wannu Juda lɛŋ, wa tɛ de ŋma gbaŋa *Paska hee mɔ‘i ga na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-ɔɔ-wan ko Josias a̧ wa dee nɛ̀ gbaŋa Paska'i ha̧ GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm.

Josias kuma o wi-zɔk-sɔ̧-fio, o wan-gbánà, o wi-zɔk-mɔ, ɗaŋ nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ in o mɔɔ-ndiŋ nɛ‘i zɔk sɛn Juda in sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ yinɛ, wen ha̧ gba̧a̧ heembea nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ Hilkia wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kpaa so kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ.
Ŋma wi nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan nɛti nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ see, kiitɛ nɛ̀ oi-aa in ŋgai kɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Josias dea ga, bo na. Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mbɛt, ŋma bíí nɛ̀ dee hegɔ, bo na.
Ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ GASA WAN ee kifa-er tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘i ha̧ Juda nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-see-aa nɛ̀ Manase dee so'i duk na.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Kóó nɛ́ Juda, mi tɛ fo yinɛ ti'm hee mɔ'ɔ n'am foo so nɛ̀ *Israɛl yinɛ ti'm ga; mi tɛ bɛ̧ Jerusalɛm, ye n'am hoka so'i, in Tua n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé, nin-am tɛ duk sɛnɛ wo'i mbɛt.»
Oi o tom ko Josias, o mɔ n'aa dea lɛŋ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.

Tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko Josias, Nɛko, wannu Egiptɛ kura mɛ nɛɛ ye ɗoŋ wannu Asirii sɛn ká̧ zaŋ Efrat. Wannu Josias kura we ti a̧ nɛ̀ biro, ɓɛɛ tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ biro hegɔ, wannu Egiptɛ gbɛɛ a̧. Duka nɛ́ sɛn Mɛgido.

O gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ keekee-nyaŋa nɛ̀ Mɛgido pii Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsi kɔ̧-a̧. O bíí-nù baa Jɔakaz bem ko Josias, wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a, ɓɛɛ wa de wan ha̧ a̧ oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Jɔakaz a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Hamutal, boko-bem ko Yirmɛya, be Libna.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.

Nɛko, wannu Egiptɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ ba a̧ hɛr nɛ̀ nyak-boi sɛn Ribla, nú Hamat ha̧ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kaɗi sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn sede garama ha̧ o bíí nù ko Josias mɛ yoɓi tɛ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar in kilo lɔr ɓu-taar.
Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ dee wan ha̧ Ɛliakim oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Josias, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn mbe nin ha̧ a̧ ndé «Jɔakim.» War ko Jɔakaz, wa baa a̧ nɛ̀ bara-biro pii Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe sɛn hi̧i̧.
Jɔakim gɔna sede ha̧ o bíí nù kɔ‘i mɛ yoɓi wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ. Duka nɛ́ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, kóó o ndé kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ Nɛko.
Jɔakim a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Zɛbida, boko-bem ko Pɛdaya, be Ruma.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ku̧u̧ biro tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko Jɔakim. Jɔakim duka ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ pɛ taar, ɓɛɛ de ŋgazu in a̧ woyo.

GASA WAN toma o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee, ko o be Aram, ko o be Moab in ko o be Amɔŋ si zu a̧. A̧ toma wa si zu nù Juda ha̧ wa mɛ ɗaŋ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú o *wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN a̧ mɔ‘i hɔɔ nɛnɛ zu o be Juda, wen ká GASA WAN tɛɛ zɔk wa yí wi. Nɛ́ wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ ko Manase, o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea,
in wen zu tɔk tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ na n'aa gbaia so fok nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm dam fara lɛŋ, à̧ GASA WAN kɔ̧ nɛnɛ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ Juda na.
Oi o tom ko Jɔakim, mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata nyɛrɛ ko o wannu Juda.
Jɔakim fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Jɔakin ɔ wan oi-aa.
Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Egiptɛ gbo tɛ nù kɔ‘i ɓɔna, wen wannu Babilɔŋ baa so nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ be-zer Egiptɛ hɔ tɛ nana-yí Efrat.
Jɔakin a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Nɛhusta boko-bem ko Ɛlnataŋ be Jerusalɛm.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o wi-biro ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa zu dúk nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm; wa kɛra ye e nù,
ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ́ mɛ bi ye nɛ̀ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ kpee e nù kaɗi'i.

Jɔakin wannu Juda in nàà kɔ‘i, o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, o gasawi nú kira kɔ̧-a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt gboo, ɓɛɛ nɛ sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa nɛ̀ bara-biro. Ŋgimbi'i, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr dee pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar tɛ wan kaɗi.
A̧ kaia o mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in o wan mɛ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. A̧ gbina o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ wannu *Israɛl dee so nɛ̀ I̧or e wen Tua ko GASA WAN a nù.
A̧ kaia o wi Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasa wi saaye in o wanmbɔi, wa lɛŋ dee hee booro-ɓu ga; o kela, in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua mbɛt; kànà nɛ́ o wisan a̧ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i ɓɛɛ.
A̧ baa Jɔakin nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ; a̧ baa nàà ko wannu, o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ in o gasa wi-biro gú nɛ̀ o be-wan mbɛt; a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm yaknɛ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wannu Babilɔŋ kaia o wanmbɔi lɛŋ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o kela in o wi-dui boi-nú-tua booro, ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋga wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
Wannu Babilɔŋ ee ŋma geɗek dáà ko Jɔakin nɛ̀ wan oi-aa. Nin geɗek dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ Matania, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn mbe nin ha̧ a̧‘e Sedekias.
Sedekias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Hamutal boko-bem ko Yirmɛya be Libna.
A̧ dee mɔ ɗaŋ yí GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jɔakin dee so ga.
See GASA WAN nyima nyɛmna zu o be Juda in Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa yinɛ yí a̧. Duka ŋma ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ Sedekias de ŋgazu in wannu Babilɔŋ.

Sedekias kura zu wannu Babilɔŋ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedekias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ ti Jerusalɛm in o wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ. A̧ baa fara nú Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo nù zik nɛnɛ.
Wa kɛra ye'i duk nɛnɛ hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ-wan ko Sedekias.
Tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, kaɓa tika, ɓɛɛ o bíí kpa mɔ mɛ nyɔŋ na.
Garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ oi kɛra ye nɛ̀ o be Kaldee kɛra e nù‘i, o wi-biro lɛŋ yuu mɔ nɛ̀ nú garo nɛ̀ duk mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo mgbák ká̧ be fɔ ko wannu; wa baa nɛ́ yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka ɗoŋ wannu, ɓɛɛ wa kpa a̧ tɛ bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ yuu so mɔ e a̧ duk.
O be Kaldee baa wannu nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla mɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn kita zu a̧.
Wa gɔna ger o bem ko Sedekias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr o yí Sedekias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
Zɛ yaka mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu Babilɔŋ ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi'i ká Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ dee pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar tɛ wan kaɗi.
A̧ dɔɔ Tua ko GASA WAN, tua ko wannu in o tua sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ; a̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ tua ko o gasawi lɛŋ.
O wi-biro Kaldee lɛŋ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so in gasawi kɔ‘i gbina garo nɛ̀ zika Jerusalɛm a nù.
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ, in o wan nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ, in oi o dɔka bíí mbɛt.
Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu ee o ŋma gee bíí mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o géé fɔ.
O be Kaldee gbina mbiŋ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, wa gbina o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà in gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ yaa so kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN a nu, ɓɛɛ wa kai ndɛrɛ-a yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o paa, o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ yaknɛ mbɛt.
Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o *dek-e-wee, o daaro wen misa̧ gaŋmɔ, o be yèè nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi mbɛt lɛŋ.
War ko o mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko GASA WAN, in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ, wi nyɛm mɛ iŋ dita-a na.

Kusa kuti mbiŋ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, nɛ̀ gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu a̧. Kusa gan-ndui'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta. Fanamɔ, in o be waya kóɓò nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ a̧a̧ so zu gan-ndui'i mbɛt. O mbiŋ yiitoo lɛŋ hee ŋmaa ga.
Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sɛraya, in Sɛfania, yiitoo wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in o wi-pɛm Tua ko GASA WAN taar.

A̧ baa ŋma gasawi sɛn saaye nɛ̀ duka so zu o wi-biro in o ŋma bíí mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ duk katɛ wannu saaye'i; a̧ kaia ŋma gasa wi-yɔr-kalata ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ hok o bíí tɛ nù‘i in o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ ɓɔna saaye mbɛt.
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro tom nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
Ɓɛɛ wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa kaia nɛ̀ o be Juda yak nɛnɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa.
Ko o oi bíí nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ee ɓɔn Juda, a̧ hoka nɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam be-koo Safaŋ mɛ duk zu wa.

Ŋgimbi nɛ o gasa wi-biro in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, nɛ́ Gedalias a̧ wannu Babilɔŋ hoka mɛ ɔ wan wó, wa tɛɛ kpa a̧ sɛn Mispa, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa. O wi nɛ̀ tɛa'i nɛ́ Ismaɛl bem ko Mɛtania, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt be Nɛtɔfa, in Yazania bem ko Maka.
Gedalias kàná mɔ ti wa'e ndé, ká wa ya nɛ̀ kíì wen duka-a mgbara o wi-de-tom ko o be Kaldee na. Wa a̧ ɔ́ tɛ nù‘i, wa a̧ dé tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a.

Gedalias dee fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ Ismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania be-koo Ɛlisama, ŋma be-wan mbɛt kai o ŋma bíí ɓu in a̧, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Gedalias gú nɛ̀ o be Juda in o be Kaldee nɛ̀ dee so ye in a̧ sɛn Mispa.
Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa, o ge bíí ge ndé lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro yuu o be Kaldee, ɓɛɛ wa yak si Egiptɛ mɛ.

Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ nɛ̀ wa baa nɛ̀ Jɔakin wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee kó ha̧ Jɔakin wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ de wen zu a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de fara ha̧ a̧ gan ko o wannu nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ in a̧ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
Jɔakin kpɔ̧i̧a̧ o laa-bara a nù ɓɛɛ duk nyɔŋ mɔ in wannu wese lɛŋ.
Wannu ha̧a̧ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧ wese kpɔk kpɔk wen duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Adam koo Sɛt, Sɛt koo Enɔs;
Enɔs koo Kɛnaŋ, Kɛnaŋ koo Mahalalɛl, ɓɛɛ Mahalalɛl ko Yɛrɛd.
Yɛrɛd koo Enɔk, Enɔk koo Mɛtusela, Mɛtusela koo Lamɛk,
Lamɛk koo Nɔe, ɓɛɛ Nɔe ko Sɛm, Kam in Jafɛt.
O bem ko Jafɛt nɛ́ Gɔmɛr, Magɔg, Madai, Yabaŋ, Tubal, Mɛsɛk in Tiras.
O bem ko Gɔmɛr nɛ́ Askenaz, Difat in Tɔgarma.
O bem ko Yabaŋ nɛ́ Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim in Rodanim.
O bem ko Kam nɛ́ Kus, Misraim, Put in Kanaŋ.
O bem ko Kus nɛ́ Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Ragma in Sabteka. O bem ko Raɛma nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
Kus koo Nɛmrod mbɛt nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kuti ŋgaŋa-wi zu nù.
Misraim nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Lud, o be Ɛinam, o be Lɛhab, o be Naftua,
o be Patros, o be Kaslua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ tugun o be Filistii, ká bá nɛ̀ o be Kaftɔr.
Kaya-bem ko Kanaŋ nɛ́ Sidɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hɛt;
Kanaŋ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o be Jebus, o be Amɔr, o be Girgas,
o be Hiv, o be Ark, o be Sin,
o be Arbad, o be Sɛmar in o be Hamat.
O bem ko Sɛm nɛ́ Elam, Asur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Us, Hul, Getɛr in Mɛsɛk.
Arpaksad koo Sɛla, ɓɛɛ Sɛla ko Ebɛr.
Ebɛr koo bem yiitoo; nin kaya-a nɛ́ Pɛlɛg
Yoktaŋ koo Almɔdad, Sɛlɛf, Hasarmavɛt, Yera,
Hadɔram, Uzal, Dikla,
Ɛbal, Avimaɛl, Saba,
Ofir, Hawila in Yobab. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ bem ko Yɔktaŋ lɛŋ.
Pɛ́r-nam ko Sɛm hɔ tɛ Abram nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Sɛm, Arpaksad, Sɛla,
Ebɛr, Pɛlɛg, Rɛu,
Serug, Nahɔr, Tɛra,
in Abram nɛ‘i sa'e Abraham.
O bem ko Abraham nɛ́ Izak in Ismaɛl.
O nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ Nɛbayot, sɛka Kɛdɛr, Adbeɛl, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tɛma,
Yɛtur, Nafis in Kɛdma; o bem ko Ismaɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O bem ko Kɛtura zɔŋa-kóò ko Abraham nɛ́ Zimram, Yoksaŋ, Mɛdaŋ, Madiaŋ, Yisbak in Sua. O bem ko Yoksaŋ nɛ́ Saba in Dɛdaŋ.
O bem ko Madiaŋ nɛ́ Eifa, Efɛr, Hanɔk, Abida in Ɛlda; o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kɛtura lɛŋ.
Abraham koo Izak. O bem ko Izak nɛ́ Esau in
O bem ko Esau nɛ́ Elifaz, Reuɛl, Yɛus, Yaɛlam in Kɔra.
O bem ko Elifaz nɛ́ Teman, Omar, Sɛfi, Gɛtam, Kɛnaz, Timna in Amalɛk.
O bem ko Reuɛl nɛ́ Nahat, Zɛra, Sama in Miza.
O bem ko Sɛir nɛ́ Lɔtaŋ, Sɔbal, Sibɛɔŋ, Ana, Disɔŋ, Esɛr in Disaŋ.
O bem ko Lɔtaŋ nɛ́ Hɔri in Hɔmam. Timna nɛ́ boko-nya Ɔtaŋ.
O bem ko Sɔbal nɛ́ Aliaŋ, Manahat, Ebal, Sɛfi in Onam. O bem ko Sibɛɔŋ nɛ́ Aya in Ana.
Bem ko Ana nɛ́ Disɔŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Hamaraŋ, Ɛsbaŋ, Yitraŋ in Kɛraŋ.
O bem ko Esɛr nɛ́ Bilaŋ, Zaawaŋ in Yakaŋ. O bem ko Disɔŋ nɛ́ Us in Araŋ.
O wi nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan sɛn Edɔm nɛti sɛka ŋma bezaŋ
Bɛla bem ko Bɛɔr; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Dinaba.
Bɛla fea, ɓɛɛ Yobab bem ko Zɛra be Ɔsra ɔ wan oi-aa.
Yɔbab fee kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Husam be nú Teman ɔ wan oi-aa.
Husam fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad bem ko Bɛdad ɔ wan oi-aa. A̧ bìí Madiaŋ sɛn nú Mɔab; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Avit.
Hadad fea, ɓɛɛ Samla be Masrɛka ɔ wan oi-aa.
Samla fea, ɓɛɛ Saul be Rehobot ká̧ Efrat ɔ wan oi-aa.
Saul fea, ɓɛɛ Bal-Hanaŋ bem ko Akbɔr ɔ wan oi-aa.
Bal-Hanaŋ fea, ɓɛɛ Hadad ɔ wan oi-aa; nin gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ Pai. Nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Mɛhɛtabɛl boko-bem ko Matrɛd be-koo Mɛzahab.
Hadad fea mbɛt. O wanye Edɔm nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ Timna, Alia, Yɛtɛt,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinɔŋ,
Kɛnaz, Teman, Mibsar,
Magdiɛl in Iram. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wanye Edɔm.
O bem ko
Dan, Jozɛf, Bɛnjamin, Nɛftalii, Gad in Asɛr.
O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, Onaŋ in Sɛla. Nɛ́ boko-bem ko Sua zɔŋa Kanaŋ a̧ koo wa taar'i lɛŋ. Ɛr, kaya-bem ko Juda, yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gbɛ a̧.
Juda duka in Tamar be-for ko nɛ̀ Pɛrɛs in Zɛra. O bem ko Juda lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
O bem ko Pɛrɛs nɛ́ Hɛsrɔŋ in Hamul.
O bem ko Zɛra nɛ́ Zimri, Etaŋ, Heman, Kalkɔl in Dara; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ.
Bem ko Karmi nɛ́ Akar nɛ̀ daka so fom pi̧ zu
Bem ko Etaŋ nɛ́ Azaria.
O bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Yerameɛl, Ram in Kɛlubai.
Ram koo Aminadab; Aminadab koo Nasɔŋ gasawi ko o bezaŋ Juda.
Nasɔŋ koo Salma, Salma koo Boaz,
Boaz koo Obɛd, ɓɛɛ Obɛd ko Jɛse.
Jɛse koo kaya-bem kɔ‘i Eliab, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abinadab, taar-a nɛ́ Simɛa,
naar-a nɛ́ Nɛtanɛl, mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Radai,
mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Osɛm, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ David.
O boko-nya-wa so nɛ́ Sɛruya in Abigail.
O bem ko Sɛruya yaa so nɛ́ taar: Absai, Jɔab in Asahɛl.
Abigail koo Amasa; nin dáà ko Amasa nɛ́ Yɛtɛr, bezaŋ Ismaɛl.
Kalɛb bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ koo o bem naar in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Azuba: be-okoo kpɔk, nin-a nɛ́ Yɛriot; be-wiwii taar, nin-wa nɛ́ Yɛsɛr, Sɔbab, in Ardɔŋ.
Azuba fea, ɓɛɛ Kalɛb ba Efrat nɛ̀ kóò, ko nɛ̀ Hur.
Hur koo Uri, ɓɛɛ Uri ko Bɛsalɛl.
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Hɛsrɔŋ duka in boko-bem ko Makir, dáà ko Galad. A̧ baa a̧ nɛ̀ kóò, ŋgimbi'i ká Hɛsrɔŋ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; boko-bem’ɛi koo Sɛgub ha̧ a̧.
Sɛgub koo Yair nɛ̀ ɔɔ wan zu ye ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar sɛn nú Galad.
Gɛsur in Aram ɓara o be ye ko Yair er-a, wa baa Kɛnat in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt; ye lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. O wi nɔ‘i yaa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Makir, dáà ko Galad.
Ɗoŋ fio ko Hɛsrɔŋ, Kalɛb duka in Efrat zɔŋa-kóò ko dáà kɔ‘i Hɛsrɔŋ ko nɛ̀ Asɛhur wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ ye Tɛkɔa.
O bem ko Yerameɛl kaya-bem ko Hɛsrɔŋ nɛ́ Ram nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ kaya-bem, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Buna, Orɛŋ, Osɛm in Ahiya.
Yerameɛl baa mbe kóò, nin-a nɛ́ Atara; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ koo Onam.
O bem ko Ram kaya-bem ko Yerameɛl nɛ́ Maas, Yamin in Ekɛr.
O bem ko Onam nɛ́ Samai in Yada, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Samai nɛ́ Nadab in Abisur.
Nin kóò ko Abisur nɛ́ Abihai. A̧ koo Abaŋ in Mɔlid.
O bem ko Nadab nɛ́ Sɛlɛd in Apaim. Sɛlɛd fea, bem bo na.
Bem ko Apai nɛ́ Yisɛi; bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Sɛsaŋ; ɓɛɛ bem ko Sɛsaŋ nɛ́ Alai.
O bem ko Yada nya Samai nɛ́ Yɛtɛr in Yɔnataŋ. Yɛtɛr fea, bem bo na.
O bem ko Yɔnataŋ nɛ́ Pɛlɛt in Zaza. O bezaŋ Yerameɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Sɛsaŋ bo so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ be-wiwii na, kànà nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ. Sɛsaŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bara be Egiptɛ, nin-a nɛ́ Yara.
Sɛsaŋ ha̧a̧ boko-bem kɔ‘i nɛ̀ kóò ha̧ Yara bara kɔ‘i, kó nɛ̀ Atai.
Atai koo Nataŋ, Nataŋ koo Zabad,
Zabal koo Ɛflal, ɓɛɛ Ɛfla ko Obɛd.
Obɛd koo Yɛhu, Yɛhu koo Azaria,
Azaria koo Hɛlɛs, Hɛlɛs koo Ɛlɛasa,
Ɛlɛasa koo Sismai, Sismai koo Salum,
Salum koo Yekamia, ɓɛɛ Yɛkamia ko Elisama.
O bem ko Kalɛb nya Yerameɛl nɛ́ Mɛsa, kaya-bem nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Zif, in Marɛsa, dáà ko Hebrɔŋ.
O bem ko Hɛbrɔŋ nɛ́ Kɔra, Tapua, Rɛkɛm in Sɛma.
Sɛma koo Raham dáà ko Yɔrkɛam; Rɛkɛm koo Samai.
Bem ko Samai nɛ́ Maɔŋ; ɓɛɛ Maɔŋ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Bɛt-Sur.
O bem nɛ̀ Kalɛb koo in zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Eifa nɛ́ Haraŋ, Mɔsa in Gazɛz; Haraŋ koo bem, ɓɛɛ gbar nin Gazɛz ha̧ a̧.
O bem ko Yadai nɛ́ Rɛgɛm, Yɔtam, Gɛsaŋ, Pɛlɛt, Eifa in Saf.
Ɓii zɔŋa-kóò ko Kalɛb, Maka koo Sɛbɛr in Tirana.
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, a̧ koo Saaf dáà ko Madmana, in Sɛwa dáà ko Makbɛna in Gibea. Boko-bem ko Kalɛb duka so nɛ́ Aksa.
Wa nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bem ko Kalɛb.
O bem ko Hur kaya-bem ko Efrata nɛ́ Sɔbal, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim,
Salma, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm, in Harɛf, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Bɛt-Gadɛr mbɛt.
Sɔbal duka so nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Kiriat-Yearim; a̧ nɛ́ dáà ko Harɔe, in zɔmdáa o ko reeta be Mana,
in zɔmdáa ko o be nú-gara Kiriat-Yearim: mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be Yitri, o be Put, o be Suma in o be Misrai. O be Sɔrɛa in o be Ɛstaɔl gboo nɛ̀ tɛ wa.
O bezaŋ Salma nɛ́ o be Bɛtlɛhɛm, o be Nɛtɔfa, o be Atrɔt-Bɛt-Yɔab, reeta o be Mana, o be Sorɛi,
in o be nú-gara Sɔfri nɛ̀ ɔ ye Yɛbɛs, o be Tirat, o be Simɛa, o be Sukat. Wa nɛ́ o be Kɛn, o bezaŋ Hamat nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nutua ko Rɛkab.
O bem nɛ̀ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kaya-a nɛ́ Amnɔŋ bem ko Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Daniɛl bem ko Abigail, zɔŋa Karmɛl;
taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm, bem ko Maka, boko-bem ko Talmai wannu Gɛsur; naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias bem ko Hagit;
mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sɛfatia bem ko Abital; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam, bem ko Ɛgla nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ ŋma kóò kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Wa koo wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn Hebrɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan hi̧i̧ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ reeta. A̧ ɔɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-taar.
O bem n'aa koo sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Simɛa, Sɔbab, Nataŋ in Salomɔŋ; wa naar lɛŋ nɛ́ bem ko Bat-Sua, boko-bem ko Amiɛl.
O ŋma o bem ko David mbɛt nɛ́ Yibar, Elisua, Elifɛlɛt,
Nɔga, Nɛfɛg, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliada in Elifɛlɛt; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
O be-wiwii nɛ̀ David koo nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wi tɔr o bem ko o zɔŋa-kóò na. Tamar duka nɛ́ boko-nya-wa.
O bem ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ Roboam, Abiya, Asa, Josafat,
Yoram Akazias, Jɔas,
Amasia, Azaria, Yɔtam,
Ahaz, Ezɛkias, Manase,
Amɔŋ in Josias.
Kaya-bem ko Josias nɛ́ Jɔhanaŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yoyakim, taar-a nɛ́ Sedekias, naar-a nɛ́ Salum,
ɓɛɛ o bem ko Yoyakim nɛ́ Yekonia in Sedekias.
Nin o bem ko Yɛkɔnia nɛ̀ wa baa so nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Saltiɛl,
Malkiram, Pɛdaya, Sɛnasar, Yekamia, Hɔsama in Nedabia.
O bem ko Pɛdaya nɛ́ Zorobabɛl in Simɛi; o bem ko Zorobabɛl nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Hanania in boko-nya-wa Sɛlɔmit.
O bem ko Mɛsulam nɛ́ Hasuba, Ohɛl, Berekia, Hasadia in Yusab-Hɛsɛd; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ.
O bem ko Hanania nɛ́ Pɛlatia in Yɛsaya; o bem ko Rɛfaya, o bem ko Arnaŋ, o bem ko Obadia, in o bem ko Sɛkania nɛ́ o bezaŋ-aa mbɛt.
Sɛkania koo Sɛmaya, ɓɛɛ o bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Hatus, Yigɛal, Baria, Nɛaria in Safat; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
O bem ko Nɛaria nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Hizkia in Azrikam; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ taar.
O bem ko Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ Hɔdavia, Eliasib, Pɛlaya, Akub, Yohanaŋ, Delaya in Anani; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
O bem ko Juda nɛ́ Pɛrɛs, Hɛsrɔŋ, Karmi, Hur in Sɔbal.
Rɛaya bem ko Sɔbal koo Yahat, ɓɛɛ Yahat ko Ahumai in Lahad; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sɔrɛa.
O bem ko Hur nɛ́ Etam, Yizreɛl, Yisma in Yidbas; nin boko-nya-wa duka nɛ́ Hasɛlɛlpɔni;
a̧ koo Pɛnuɛl, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Gɛdɔr, in Ezɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Husa mbɛt. Nin o bem ko Hur nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. A̧ nɛ́ kaya-bem ko Efrata, ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧‘i a̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Bɛtlɛhɛm.
Asɛhur, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Tɛkɔa, baa so kóò yiitoo; Hɛlɛa in Naara.
Naara koo Ahuzam, Hɛfɛr, Teman in o bezaŋ, bá nɛ̀ Ahastar in o bezaŋ mbɛt. O bem ko Naar-a nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O bem ko Hɛlɛa nɛ́ Sɛrɛt, Sɔhar in Ɛtnaŋ.
Kos koo Anub in Hasɔbɛba; a̧ nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko o bíí nú-gara ko Aharɛl bem ko Harum mbɛt.
Yabɛs duka so nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ bíí mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ sa nin-a Yaebɛs, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧: «Kòò-tɛ́-bɔnɛ.»
Yaebɛs kɔfa Sɔ̧ ko
Kɛlub nya Suha koo Mɛhir nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Ɛstɔŋ.
Ɛstɔŋ koo Bɛt-Rafa, Pasɛa in Tɛhina, wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Nahas. Wa nɛ́ o bíí Hɛka.
O bem ko Kɛnaz nɛ́ Otniɛl in Sɛraya. Bem ko Otniɛl nɛ́ Hatat;
Mɛɔnatai koo Ofra, ɓɛɛ Sɛraya ko Yɔab zɔmdáa ko o wi-dui-mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-dui-mɔ.
Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ koo Iru, Ela in Naam, ɓɛɛ Ela ko Kɛnaz.
O bem Ko Yɛhalɛlɛl nɛ́ Zif, Zifa, Tiria in Asareɛl.

O bem ko Ɛzra nɛ́ Yɛtɛr, Mɛrɛd, Efɛr in Yalɔŋ. Mɛrɛd baa Bitia boko-bem ko wannu Egiptɛ ko nɛ̀ Miriam, Samai in Yisba, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Ɛstɛmɔa. A̧ baa so ŋma zɔŋa Juda nɛ kóò mbɛt, ko nɛ̀ Yɛrɛd, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Gɛdɔr, in Hɛbɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Sɔkɔ, ba nɛ̀ Yɛkutiɛl, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Zanɔa.
Hɔdia baa boko-nya Naham nɛ̀ kóò; o bezaŋ-wa so nɛ́ o be Garmi nɛ̀ yaa so Kɛila in o be Maka nɛ̀ yaa so Ɛstɛmɔa.
O bem ko Simɔŋ nɛ́ Amnɔŋ, Rina, Bɛn-Hanaŋ in Tilɔŋ. O bem ko Yisɛi nɛ́ Zɔhɛt in Bɛn-Zɔhɛt.
O bezaŋ Sɛla, bem ko Juda nɛ́ Ɛr, wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Lɛka, Lada wi nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ ye Marɛsa, in o bíí nú-gara ko o wi-tok yɛm-yɛm-laa sɛn Bɛt-Asebɛa.
Sɛla nɛ́ zɔmdáa ko Yokim, in zɔmdáa ko o wi Kɔzɛba, ká bá nɛ̀ Yoas in Saraf nɛ̀ kaia so o zɔŋa Mɔab nɛ̀ kóò nɛti kaɗi sɛka wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ pìì píí Lekɛm mbɛt. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka so ɓeemɛ.
O bezaŋ-wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-ɓu-kpánà sɛn Nɛtaim in Gɛdɛra;
O bem ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ Nɛmuɛl, Yamin, Yarib, Zɛra, Saul.
Saul koo Salum, Salum koo Mibsam, ɓɛɛ Mibsam ko Misma.
Misma koo Hamuɛl, Hamuɛl koo Zakur, ɓɛɛ Zakur ko Simɛi.
Simɛi koo so be-wiwii ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; o nya-a̧ ko so kɔ‘i dɔk na. O bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa dɔk so hee ko o bezaŋ Juda ga na.
Wa dee so ye sɛn Bɛrseba, Mɔlada, Hasar-Sual,
Bilha, Ɛsɛm, Tɔlad,
Bɛtuɛl, Hɔrma, Siklag,
Bɛt-Markabot, Hasar-Susim, Bɛt-Birɛi in Saraim. O gasa ye kɔ-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O ŋma ye kɔ-wa nɛ́ Etam, Ain, Rimɔŋ, Tɔkɛn in Asaŋ, gasa ye mɔɔrɔ,
in o geɗek ye nɛ̀ ya ká̧ o gasa ye nɔ‘i hɔ Baalat. O ye kɔ-wa in o pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.

Nin o gasawi nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Mɛsobab, Yamlɛk, Yɔsa bem ko Amasia, Jɔɛl in Yɛhu; Asiɛl koo Sɛraya, Sɛraya koo Yosibia, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Yosibia a̧ koo Yɛhu'i; sɛka Ɛlyɔnai, Yakɔbab, Yɛsɔhaya, Asaya, Adiɛl, Yɛsimiɛl, Bɛnaya, in Ziza. Dáà ko Ziza nɛ́ Sifɛi, zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Alɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ bezaŋ Yɛdaya, Simri in Sɛmaya. O pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa dɔka nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yak si ká̧ Gɛdɔr nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese kur ɗoŋgɔ mɛ, kii nɛ̀ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
Wa kpaa o de mbɔɗi zɔ̧; fara'i duk nɛ́ de ga̧a̧ fara nɛ̀ pɛsa-a. Nɛ́ o bezaŋ Kam a̧ yaa so hi̧i̧ nɛti.

O wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀‘i tɔra kinii'i tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ́ ŋgimbi wan ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda. Wa ɗaŋa o fara-duk in o tua-laa ko o bíí fara'i, kum nɛ̀ wa nɛ̀‘i iŋ géé oi-wa sɔsɔɔ ɓɔna. Wa dee ye oi wa, wen o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ wen o geɗek mɔ-dai kɔ-wa.
O ŋma bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ nɛɛ kɔ‘i si zu kaya Sɛir. O gasawi kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Pɛlatia, Nɛaria, Rɛfaya in Uziɛl; wa nɛ́ o bem ko Yisɛi.
Wa bìí oi o be Amalɛk nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa de ye hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Rubɛn duka nɛ́ kaya-bem ko
Juda duka nɛ́ gasawi mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋma bezaŋ-aa a̧ ɔɔ wan
O bem ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko
O bezaŋ Jɔɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Jɔɛl koo Sɛmaya, Sɛmaya koo Gɔg, Gɔg koo Simri,
Simri koo Mika, Mika koo Rɛaya, Rɛaya koo Bal.
Ɓɛɛ Bal ko Beɛra nɛ̀ Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr, wannu Asirii baa so yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara; a̧ duka nɛ́ be-wan ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn.
O nya Beɛra nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ gasawi nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nin-wa yɔra zaŋ kalata nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: kuti bíí nɛ́ Yɛyɛl, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Zakarii,
ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Bɛla, bem ko Azaz. Bɛla nɛ́ be-koo Sɛma bem ko Jɔɛl. O bezaŋ Rubɛn duka ɔ, e Arɔɛr nɛ̀ war ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ e kaya Nɛbo in ye Bal-Mɛɔŋ nɛ̀ war ŋgɔn.
Wa ɔɔ ye hɔ nú ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ a̧a̧ mgbara wa in nana-yí Efrat si daŋa-wese wen nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa ɔ dɔka sɛn tɛ nú Galad'i.
Ŋgimbi wan ko Saul, wa bìí biro in o be Hagri, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa, ba nù nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ Galad nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese lɛŋ.
O bezaŋ Gad ɔɔ tan ŋmaa in o bezaŋ Rubɛn sɛn nú Basaŋ hɔ Salka.
Kuti nú-gara nɛ́ ko Jɔɛl, yiitoo-aa nɛ́ ko Safam, sɛka ko Yaɛnai in ko Safa.
O ŋma nú-gara nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nya-wa nɛ́ ko Mikaɛl, Mɛsulam, Seba, Yɔrai, Yakaŋ, Zia in Ebɛr; wa lɛŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Kuti zɔmdáa nɛ̀ koo o bem nɛ̀ o nú-gara nɔ‘i gboo sɛnɛ nɛ́ Bihail; a̧ nɛ́ sɔŋkur bezaŋ Buz nɛ̀ koo Yaro; Yaro koo Yesisai, Yesisai koo Mikaɛl, Mikaɛl koo Galad, Galad koo Yatɔa, Yatɔa koo Huri, ɓɛɛ Huri ko Abihaɛl.
Ahi bem ko Abdiɛl, be-koo Guni nɛ́ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa.
Wa duka ɔ nú Galad in sɛn nú Basaŋ in tɛ o be ye nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ká̧ fara'i, hɔ nɛnɛ Sarɔŋ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Wa yɔra nin-wa lɛŋ tɛ ŋgimbi wan ko Yɔtam wannu Juda in ko Jeroboam wannu

O bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-ba-ŋgee, o wi-hɛr-gba-paa in o wi-pi̧-góò nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro. O bíí kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ nɛ̀ biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-naar-zua-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Wa bìì o be Hagri in bezaŋ Yatur, Nafis in Nɔdab.
Sɔ̧ gbaka wa, ɓɛɛ wa bi o be Hagri. A̧ aa o be Hagri er wa in o wi nɛ̀ yee so ɗoŋ wa. A̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi biro'i wen wa e so ta nɛ̀ a̧.
Wa kaia o mɔ-dai ko o wi nɔ‘i: duka nɛ́ ŋgeloba booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o geɗek mɔ-dai booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, o tuifuu booro-yiitoo, in o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa mbɛt.
O bíí kuma nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen duka so nɛ̀ biro ko Sɔ̧. O bezaŋ Rubɛn in Gad bá nɛ̀ reeta zuduk ko Manase baa fara oi o wi nɔ‘i hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kaia wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ.
O reeta bezaŋ zuduk ko Manase ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Basaŋ nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ Bal-Hɛrmɔŋ, Sɛnir in kaya Hɛrmɔŋ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn. Wa dɔka so nyɛmna.
O gasawi nutua kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Efɛr, Yisɛi, Eliɛl, Azriɛl, Yirmɛya, Hɔdavia in Yadiɛl. Wa duka so nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ nin-wa ɔ hura nyɛmna.
O bezaŋ Rubɛn, Gad, in reeta zuduk ko Manase dee so ŋgazu in Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gasi o sɔ̧ ko o bíí tɛ nù nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa so nɛ̀ yí-wa.
Hegɔ, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii, Pul in Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr mɛ kur zu wa, ɓɛɛ kai wa nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ si Hala, Habɔr, in Hara in si ká̧ nana-yí Gozaŋ hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
O bem ko Levii nɛ́ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
O bem ko Kehat nɛ́ Amram, Yisɛhar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl.
O bem ko Amram nɛ́ Arɔŋ, Moisɛ in Miriam. O bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ́ Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar in Itamar.
Eleazar koo Pinas, Pinas koo Abisua,
Abisua koo Buki, Buki koo Uzi,
Uzi koo Zɛraya, Zɛraya koo Mɛrayot;
Mɛrayot koo Amaria, Amaria koo Ahitub;
Ahitub koo Sadɔk, Sadɔk koo Ahimas,
Ahimas koo Azaria, Azaria koo Yohanaŋ;
ɓɛɛ Yohanaŋ ko Azaria. Nɛ́ Azaria’ɛ a̧ duka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Azaria koo Amaria, Amaria koo Ahitub;
Ahitub koo Sadɔk, Sadɔk koo Salum;
Salum koo Hilkia, Hilkia koo Azaria;
Azaria koo Sɛraya, ɓɛɛ Sɛraya ko Yɛhɔsadak.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee nɛnɛ ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ kai o bíí Jerusalɛm in o be Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, Yɛhɔsadak duka so mgbara wa mbɛt.
O bem ko Levii nɛ Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
Nin o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Libni in Simɛi.
O bem ko Kehat nɛ Amram, Yisɛhar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl.
O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ Mali in Musi. O nú-gara ko Levii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Gɛrsɔŋ koo Libni, Libni koo Yahat, Yahat koo Zima,
Zima koo Yɔa, Yɔa koo Ido, Ido koo Zɛra, ɓɛɛ Zɛra ko Yeotrai.
Kehat koo Aminadab, Aminadab koo Kore, Kore koo Asir,
Asir koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Ebiasaf, Ebiasaf koo Asir,
Asir koo Tahat, Tahat koo Uriɛl, Uriɛl koo Uziɛl, Uziɛl koo Uzia, ɓɛɛ Uzia ko Saul.
O ŋma bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ Amasai in Ahimot.
Ahimot koo Ɛlkana, Ɛlkana koo Sofai, Sofai koo Nahat,
Nahat koo Aliab, Aliab koo Yeroam, Yeroam koo Ɛlkana, ɓɛɛ Ɛlkana ko Samuɛl.
Kaya-bem ko Samuɛl nɛ́ Jɔɛl ɓɛɛ hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Abiya.
Mɛrari koo Mali, Mali koo Libni, Libni koo Simɛi, Simɛi koo Uza,
Uza koo Simɛa, Simɛa koo Hagiya, ɓɛɛ Hagiya ko Asaya.
David ee so tom-bia-gima er o ŋma bezaŋ Levii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ee nɛ̀
O wi nɔ‘i duka nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima nú
O wi-bii-gima nɔ‘i in o bezaŋ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat, nɛ́ Heman, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Samuɛl,
bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Eliɛl, bem ko Toa,
bem ko Suf, bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Mahat, bem ko Amasai,
bem ko Ɛlkana, bem ko Jɔɛl, bem ko Azaria, bem ko Sɛfania,
bem ko Tahat, bem ko Asir, bem ko Ebiasaf, bem ko Kore,
bem ko Yisɛhar, bem ko Kehat, bem ko Levii, bem ko
Hɔ-ɗoŋ Heman nɛ́ nya-a̧ Asaf nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war wii-er-a. A̧ nɛ́ bem ko Bɛrɛk-Yahu, bem ko Simɛa,
bem ko Mikaɛl, bem ko Basɛa, bem ko Malkia,
bem ko Ɛtni, bem ko Zɛra, bem ko Adaya,
bem ko Etaŋ, bem ko Zima, bem ko Simɛi,
bem ko Yahat, bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ, bem ko Levii.
Sɔŋkur-aa nɛ́ Etaŋ tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari nɛ̀ yor kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war gale in o bíí kɔ‘i. Etaŋ nɛ́ nya o Heman in Asaf, a̧ nɛ́ bem ko Kísí, bem ko Abdi, bem ko Maluk,
bem ko Hasafia, bem ko Amasia, bem ko Hilkia,
bem ko Amsi, bem ko Bani, bem ko Sɛmɛr,
bem ko Mali, bem ko Musi, bem ko Mɛrari, bem ko Levii.
Wa foo o nya kɔ-wa, o bezaŋ Levii a tɛ tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Arɔŋ in o bem kɔ‘i dɔ so kɔ-wa nɛ́ o kpoo-sɔ̧ in nyama sɛn zu
O bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Arɔŋ koo Eleazar, Eleazar koo Pinas, Pinas koo Abisna,
Abisna koo Buki, Buki koo Uzi, Uzi koo Zɛraya,
Zɛraya koo Mɛrayot, Mɛrayot koo Amaria, Amaria koo Ahitub,
Ahitub koo Sadɔk, ɓɛɛ Sadɔk ko Ahimas
O fara-duk ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa tɛ nú
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko fara-wa-fɔ in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Hebrɔŋ, wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ.
O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Hebrɔŋ, Libna, Yatir, Ɛstɛmɔa,
Hilɛz, Ɛbir,
Asaŋ in Bɛt-Sɛmɛs gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ o ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin wa ha̧a̧ Geba, Alɛmɛt in Anatot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ o ye nɔ‘i. O gasa ye ko o bíí nú-gara kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
Tani usa ye ɓu ha̧ o ŋma bem ko Kehat nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa mbɛt. O ye nɔ‘i duka so nɛ́ ko zuduk ko Efraim, ko zuduk ko Dan in reeta zuduk ko Manase.
O bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ kpaa kɔ‘i ye ɓu-zua-taar nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Isakar, ko Asɛr, ko Nɛftalii in ko reeta zuduk ko Manase sɛn Basaŋ.
Tani usa ye ɓu-zua-yiitoo ha̧ o bezaŋ Mɛrari nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, ko Gad in ko Zabulɔŋ.
O ye in o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ o be
Nɛ́ tani á̧ wa pi̧i̧ kànà ha̧ nɛ̀ o ye tɛ nù ko Juda, ko Simɛɔŋ in ko Bɛnjamin ha̧ wa nɛ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ‘i mbɛt.
O oi nú-gara ko o bezaŋ Kehat kpaa ye kɔ-wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Efraim.
O ye-hu̧si-sɛnɛ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ Sikɛm zu kaya Efraim, Gezɛr,
Yokmɛam, Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ,
Ayalɔŋ in Gat-Rimɔŋ gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase, nɛ́ Anɛr in Bilɛam gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa. O ye nɔ‘i lɛŋ duka nɛ́ ko o ŋma nú-gara ko o ŋma bezaŋ Kehat.
Wa ha̧a̧ Gɔlaŋ sɛn nú Basaŋ in Astarot gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko reeta zuduk ko Manase ha̧ o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa.
Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Isakar nɛ́ Kɛdɛs, Dabɛrat,
Ramot in Anɛm gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Asɛr nɛ́ Masal, Abdɔŋ,
Hukɔk in Rehob gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Nɛftalii, nɛ́ Kɛdɛs sɛn nú Galilee, Hamɔŋ in Kariataim gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Wa ha̧a̧ Rimono in Tabɔr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ ha̧ oi bezaŋ Levii nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
Nɛ̀ kur Jurdɛn nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese ká̧ Jeriko, tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Rubɛn, nɛ́ Besɛr ŋga-gbárà mɛ, Yahas,
Kɛdɛmɔt in Mɛfat gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ nù ko zuduk ko Gad, nɛ́ Ramot nú Galad, Mahanayim,
Hɛsbɔŋ in Yazɛr gú nɛ̀ o fara-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ wa á̧ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
O bem ko Isakar nɛ́ Tola, Pua, Yasub in Simrɔŋ; wa lɛŋ naar.

O bem ko Tola nɛ́ Uzi, Rɛfaya, Yɛriɛl, Yamai, Yibsam in Sɛmuɛl nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko Tola; wa so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko David nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Bem ko Uzi nɛ́ Yisrahia, ɓɛɛ Yisrahia ko Mikaɛl, Obadia, Jɔɛl in Isia. Wa mɔɔrɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua.
Nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o bezaŋ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro tɛ booro-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ o okoo in o obem a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nyɛmna mbɛt.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Isakar lɛŋ, dɔka o ŋga-wi nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
O bem ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Bɛla, Bɛkɛr in Yɛdiaɛl; wa taar.
O bem ko Bɛla nɛ́ Ɛsbɔŋ, Uzi, Uziɛl, Yɛrimɔt in Iri; wa mɔɔrɔ‘i nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ o ŋga-wi, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-naar.
O bem ko Bɛkɛr nɛ́ Zɛmira, Yoas, Eliɛzɛr, Ɛlyɔnai, Ɔmri, Yɛrɛmɔt, Abia, Anatot ká bá nɛ̀ Alɛmɛt. O bem ko Bɛkɛr lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ dɔka o bezaŋ gasawi nutua nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa tɔra nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɛ́ Bilaŋ; o bem ko Bilaŋ nɛ́ Yɛus, Bɛnjamin, Ehud, Kɛnana, Zɛtaŋ, Tarsis in Ahisahar.
O bem ko Yɛdiaɛl nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua; o ŋga-wi kɔ-wa nɛ̀ iŋa biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
O bem ko Ir nɛ́ Supim in Hupim; bem ko Ahɛr nɛ́ Husim.
O bem ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yasiɛl, Guni, Yɛsɛr in Salum. Wa so nɛ́ be-koo Bilha.
O bem ko Manase nɛ̀ zɔŋa-kóò kɔ̧-a̧, boko be Aram, koa nɛ́ Asriɛl in Makir dáà ko Galad.
Makir baa kóò ha̧ Hupim in Supim; nin boko-nya-a̧ so nɛ́ Maka. Nin hɔ-ɗoŋ kaya-bem ko Makir nɛ́ Sɛlɔfɛhad; Sɛlɔfɛhad koo so kɔ‘i nɛ́ o be-okoo ɓɛɛ.
Maka kóò kó Makir koo o ŋma bem nɛ̀ nin-wa so nɛ́ Pɛrɛs in Sɛrɛs. Sɛrɛs koo Ulam in Rɛkɛm,
ɓɛɛ Ulam ko Bedaŋ. O bem ko Galad, bem ko Makir, be-koo Manase nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Mɔlɛkɛt boko-nya Galad koo Isɛhod, Abiɛzɛr in Mala.
O bem ko Sɛmida so nɛ́ Ahiaŋ, Sɛkɛm, Liki in Aniam.
O bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sutɛla koo Bɛrɛd, Bɛrɛd koo Tahat, Tahat koo Eleada, Eleada koo Tahat,
Tahat koo Zabad, ɓɛɛ Zabad ko Sutɛla. O ŋma bem ko Efraim, Ɛzɛr in Elɛad zira so wen ɓara o mɔ-dai tɛ nù ko o bíí Gat, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gbɛ wa.
Dáà kɔ-wa Efraim zima fio ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Efraim duka in kóò kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kóò‘i ba zaŋ, kó nɛ̀ ŋma bem n'aa saa nin-a nɛ́ Bɛria,
Efraim koo so ŋma boko-bem nɛ̀ nin-a so'e Sɛra; nɛ́ boko-bem’ɛi a̧ dee ye Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ bá nɛ̀ Uzɛn-Sɛra.
O bezaŋ Bɛria nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rɛfa koo Rɛsɛf, Rɛsɛf koo Tɛla, Tɛla koo Tahaŋ,
Tahaŋ koo Ladaŋ, Ladaŋ koo Amihud, Amihud koo Elisama,
Elisama koo Nun, Nun koo Josue.

O nù kɔ-wa in o fara-duk kɔ-wa so nɛ́ Bɛtɛl in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧. Ye Naraŋ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, in Gezɛr nɛ̀ war yee-wese gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧, bá nɛ̀ Sikɛm in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ hɔ Aia gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt so nɛ́ kɔ-wa.
War ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Bɛt-Seaŋ, Tanak, Mɛgido, in Dɔr gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ o ye nɔ‘i a̧ o bezaŋ Jozɛf, bem ko
O bem ko Asɛr nɛ́ Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi, Bɛria, in boko-nya-wa Sɛra.
O bem ko Bɛria nɛ́ Hɛbɛr in Malkiɛl nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ dáà ko Birzait.
Hɛbɛr koo Yaflɛt, Sɔmɛr, Hɔtam in boko-nya-wa Sua.
O bem ko Yɛflɛt nɛ́ Pasak, Bimal in Aswat. O bem ko Yaflɛt nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O bem ko Sɛmɛr nɛ́ Ahi,
O bem ko Hɛlɛm
O bem ko Sɔfa nɛ́ Sua, Harnɛfɛr, Sual, Bɛri, Yimra,
Bɛsɛr, Hɔd, Sama, Silsa, Yitraŋ in Bɛra.
O bem ko Yɛtɛr nɛ́ Yefunɛ, Pispa in Ara.
O bem ko Ula nɛ́ Ara, Haniɛl in Risia.
O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bezaŋ Asɛr, o gasawi nutua, o ŋgaŋa wi-biro, o gasawi ko o be-wan, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra lɛŋ mgbara o gii wi-biro nɛ́ booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Bɛnjamin koo bem mɔɔrɔ: Bɛla nɛ́ kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Asbɛl, taar-a nɛ́ Ara,
naar-a nɛ́ Nɔha, ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Rafa.
Bɛla koo Adar, Gɛra, dáà ko Ehud,
Abisua, Namaŋ, Ahɔa,
Gɛra, Sɛfufan in Huram.

O bem ko Ehud nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Namaŋ, Ahiya in Gɛra. Wa yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko o bíí saaye Geba, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wa á̧ dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ kur si Manahat. Tɛ̀ gbina-a yak, nɛ́ Gɛra dáà ko Uza in Ahihud a̧ duka so ti ha̧ wa.
Nɛ́ sɛn nú Mɔab a̧ Saharaim koo nɛ̀ o bem ɗoŋ n'aa ndaka nɛ̀ o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ yiitoo, Husim in Bara yaknɛ.
O bem n'aa koo in mbe kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Hɔdɛs nɛ́ Yobab, Sibia, Mɛsa, Malkam,
Yɛus, Sakia in Mirma. O bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Husim kóò n'aa ndaka so kòó Abitub in Ɛlpal ha̧ a̧.
O bem ko Ɛlpal nɛ́ Ebɛr, Misɛam in Sɛmɛd. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛmɛd a̧ mboo ye Ɔnɔ bá nɛ̀ Lod in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧.
Bɛria in Sɛma yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko o be saaye Ayalɔŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ ndaka o bíí saaye Gat yaknɛ.
O nya-wa so nɛ́ Sasak in Yɛrɛmɔt.
Zɛbadia, Arad, Edɛr,
