Mikaɛl, Yispa in Yɔha nɛ́ o bem ko Bɛria.
Zɛbadia, Mɛsulam, Hizki, Hɛbɛr,
Yismɛrai, Yizlia in Yɔbab nɛ́ o bem ko Ɛlpal.
Yakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Ɛliɛnai, Silɛtai, Eliɛl,
Adaya, Bɛraya in Simrat nɛ́ o bem ko Simɛi.
Yispaŋ, Ebɛr, Eliɛl,
Abdɔŋ, Zikri, Hanaŋ,
Hanania, Elam, Anɛtotia,
Yifdɛya in Pɛnuɛl nɛ́ o bem ko Sasak.
Samsɛrai, Sɛharia, Atalia,
Yarɛsia, Ɛlia in Zikri nɛ́ o bem ko Yeroam.
O gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Nɛ́ Yɛiɛl
Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Sur, sɛka Kis, Bal, Nadab,
Gɛdɔr, Ahio, Zɛkɛr,
in Miklot dáà ko Simɛa. Wa dee so ye sɛn Jerusalɛm hee o nya-wa ga mbɛt.
Nɛr koo Kis, Kis koo Saul, ɓɛɛ Saul ko Jɔnataŋ, Malki-Sua, Abinadab in Ɛsbal.
Bem ko Jɔnataŋ duka nɛ́ Mɛribal, ɓɛɛ Mɛribal ko Mika.
O bem ko Mika nɛ́ Pitɔŋ, Mɛlɛk, Tarɛa in Ahaz.
Ahaz koo Yehoyada, Yehoyada koo Alɛmɛt, Azmavɛt in Zimri; Zimri koo Mɔsa,
Mɔsa koo Binɛa, Binɛa koo Rafa, Elɛasa, ɓɛɛ Elɛasa ko Asɛl.
Asɛl koo bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk; nin-wa nɛ́ Azrikam, Bɔkru, Ismaɛl, Sɛaria, Obadia in Hanaŋ. O bem ko Asɛl lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O bem ko Esɛk nya kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Ulam, kaya-wi; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yɛus, taar-a nɛ́ Elifɛlɛt.
O bem ko Ulam yaa so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa pi̧i̧ góò nyɛmna. Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o bem in o be-koo nɛ̀ dɔka-a, lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bíí zuduk ko Bɛnjamin.
Wa tɔra o be
Wa kaia so o be Juda nɛ̀ bara si Babilɔŋ wen ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
O kuti bíí nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ tɛ o nù kɔ‘i in o ye kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ bá nɛ̀ o dɔka géé be
O ŋma bezaŋ Juda, o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin, o bezaŋ Efraim in ŋma bezaŋ Manase pia ɗoŋ de ye sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Tɛ zuduk ko Juda, nɛ́ Utai bem ko Amihud, bem ko Ɔmri, bem ko Imri, bem ko Bani, bem ko Pɛrɛs a̧ pia ɗoŋ ɔ ye Jerusalɛm.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Sela nɛ́ Asaya kaya-wi in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Zɛra nɛ́ Yɛuɛl a̧ pia ɗoŋ. O bezaŋ Juda nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar.
Tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Saul, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Hɔdavia, bem ko Ha-Sɛnua,
in Yibnɛa, bem ko Yeroam, bá nɛ̀ Ela, bem ko Uzi, bem ko Mikri; sɛka Mɛsulam, bem ko Sɛfatia, bem ko Reuɛl, bem ko Yibnia á̧ pia ɗoŋ.
O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa. O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ Yɛdaya, Yɛhɔyarib, Yakin,
in Azaria, bem ko Hilkia, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Sadɔk, bem ko Mɛrayot, bem ko Ahitub, wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧ pia ɗoŋ.
Adaya bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Pasɛhur, bem ko Malkia, in Masai bem ko Adiɛl, bem ko Yazɛra, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Mɛsilɛmit, bem ko Imɛr pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
O gasawi nutua in o nya-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ Sɛmaya bem ko Hasub, bem ko Azrikam, bem ko Hasabia a̧ pia ɗoŋ. A̧ so nɛ́ bíí nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
Bakbakar, Hɛrɛs, Galal in Matania bem ko Mika, bem ko Zikri, bem ko Asaf pia ɗoŋ.
Obadia bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Galal, bem ko Yedutun in Berekia bem ko Asa, bem ko Ɛlkana nɛ̀ ɔɔ so tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa pia ɗoŋ mbɛt.
O wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ nɛ́ Salum, Akub, Talmɔŋ, Ahiman, in o nya-wa. Salum duka so nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa.
O bezaŋ-wa ɓɔna kànà tɛ tom-pɛma-nú tua ko wannu nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese hɔ sɔsɔɔ. O zɔmdáa kɔ-wa so nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-nú tua ko o be Levii.
Salum bem ko Kore, bem ko Ɛbiasaf, bem ko Kore in o nya-a̧ kpɔk nutua, de so nɛ́ tom-pɛma-nú
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i Pinas bem ko Eleazar so nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa. GASA WAN duka so in a̧.
Zakarii bem ko Mɛsɛlɛmia duka so nɛ́ ŋma wi-pɛm-nú
O wi-pɛm o nú tua nɛ̀ wa hoka so lɛŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-zua-yiitoo; wa tɔra so wa sɛn saaye kɔ-wa. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ David in Samuɛl
Wa in o bem kɔ-wa yaa so wen pɛma nú Tua ko GASA WAN.
O wi-pɛm-mɔ dama so nú tua naar lɛŋ, nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, nɛ̀ yee-wese, nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
O nya-wa nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i saaye duka so mɛ tɛ tɛ-wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo gbak nɛ̀ wa;
ɓɛɛ o gasa wi-pɛm-nú tua naar ya kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ. O be Levii yaa so kɔ-wa wen pɛma o gɔna bɛr-tua in o mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Wa ɔ so kɔ-wa zik Tua ko Sɔ̧ pɛm nɛ̀ mɔ ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wa a̧ hu̧i̧ hu̧i̧a̧ nú-a mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ.
O ŋma bezaŋ Levii yaa so kɔ‘i wen tɔra o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kai gbonɛ in nɛ̀ wa kai si ɗoŋ mbɛt.
O ŋma mgbara wa mbɛt yaa so kɔ‘i wen zɔka o nyɛk, o kpáná-ɗafi-sɔ̧, fuu alkamaari, dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɔ̧́, fuu-nyama in nyama.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ mɔi̧ so o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ wen gíí nyama.
Matitia kaya-bem ko Salum, nú-gara ko Kore, mgbara o be Levii duka so wen gíí makala.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat, o ŋma nya-wa yaa so kɔ‘i wen gíí brɛt nɛ̀‘i ha̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ kpɔk kpɔk.
O gasawi nutua ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima ɔ so kɔ-wa kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa de ŋma tom na, wen tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ bia gima mɛ zɛ in mɛ wese.
O gasawi nutua ko o be Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa ɔ so kɔ-wa sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Yɛiɛl ku̧u̧ so naŋ ye Gabaɔŋ; nin kóò kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Maka.
Kaya-bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Abdɔŋ, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Sur, sɛka Kis, Bal, Nɛr, Nadab,
Gɛdɔr, Ahio, Zakarii in Miklot,
ɓɛɛ Miklot ko Simɛam. Wa ɔɔ so Jerusalɛm hee o nya-wa ga mbɛt.
Nɛr koo Kis, Kis koo Saul, Saul koo Jɔnataŋ, Malki-Sua, Abinadab in Ɛsbal.
Mɛribal duka nɛ́ bem ko Jɔnataŋ; nɛ́ a̧ á̧ koo Mika.
O bem ko Mika nɛ́ Pitɔŋ, Mɛlɛk, in Tarɛa.
Ahaz koo Yaɛra; Yaɛra koo Alɛmɛt, Azmavɛt in Zimri; Zimri koo Mɔsa;
Mɔsa koo Binɛa, Rɛfaya, Ɛlɛasa in Asɛl,
ɓɛɛ Asɛl ko bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Nin-wa nɛ́ Azrikam, Bɔkru, Yismaɛl, Sɛaria, Obadia in Hanaŋ. O bem ko Asɛl nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Duka, ɓɛɛ o be Filistii ba biro dúk nɛ̀ o be
O be Filistii nasa Saul in o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa gbɛɛ Jɔnataŋ, Abinadab bá nɛ̀ Malki-Sua, o bem ko Saul,
ɓɛɛ biro mɔi̧ pii ɗoŋ zɔk nɛ́ Saul kpɔk. O wi-pi̧-góò kɔɓa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ a̧.

Saul tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ baka-nyaŋa kɔ‘i: «Mɛ̀ dák gba-paa kɔ-mɛ tok nɛ̀‘m gbɛ, wen ká o wi-mbii nɔ'ɔ tɛɛ gbɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ ká wa mam am.» Ɓɛɛ baka-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧‘i kɔ̧ na, wen kíì dee a̧ nyɛmna. Saul daka gba-paa kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ hɔ̧fi̧ tik yí-a.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ baka-nyaŋa zɔka'e Saul fea ga, a̧ tika yí gba-paa kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ a̧ fe mbɛt.
Saul gú nɛ̀ o bem kɔ‘i taar fee kpɔk wese; o bíí nutua-wan kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa wese'i lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be
Nɛ̀ mɔ sa̧a̧ kaɗi, o be Filistii tɛɛ mɛ kai mɔ ko o wi nɛ̀ wa gbɛa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa wɔr Saul in o bem kɔ‘i mbɔɗɔnu sɛn zu kaya Gilboa.
Wa kaia mɔɔ-tɛ-a, ba gɔɔzu-a in o boi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tom nyɛrɛ-a dam sɛn nú Filistii tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in dukbíí kɔ-wa.
Wa aa o boi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ tua ko sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa mgboi gɔɔzu-a kɔ̧ tua ko Dagɔŋ.
O bíí Yabɛs nú Galad lɛŋ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ o be Filistii dee in Saul.
O ŋgaŋa wi-biro lɛŋ kura nɛ́ɛ̀ kai wɔr Saul in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ piinɛ sɛn Yabɛs. Wa guna wɔr-wa ti ɗɔɔ gasa te sɛn Yabɛs, ɓɛɛ wa zim yì tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Saul fea wen ŋgazu n'aa dee so in GASA WAN; a̧ mbo so zu tɛ wen ko GASA WAN na. A̧ aka so mɔ in sɔ̧-fio,
ɓɛɛ a̧ e aka mɔ in GASA WAN duk. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ sa GASA WAN gbɛ a̧ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ha̧ wan ha̧ David, bem ko Jɛse.
Nɛti ká Saul ɓɔna tɛ wan zu yɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ kai so o be
O gasawi
David in o be
ɓɛɛ o be Jebus tɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Mɛ beka ye hɛ̧ɛ̧ na.» Ɓɛɛ David ba ŋgárá

David ha̧a̧ so nú nde: «Wi nɛ tɛ duk ti gbin nɛ̀ biro ti o be Jebus tɛ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o wi-biro.» Kuti wi nɛ̀ baa biro dúk nɛ̀ o be Jebus nɛ́ Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya, ɓɛɛ David e a̧ nɛ́ gasawi zu o wi-biro.
David baa fara kɔ̧ ŋgárá‘i; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ wa saa fara'i nɛ́
Ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo garo woyo zik nɛnɛ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Milo hɔ ká̧ ye, ɓɛɛ Jɔab ɗafi oi ye.
Ŋgai ko David gasi gasi siti wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ duka so in a̧.
O ŋgaŋa wi-biro in o be
Nin o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Yasobam, bem ko Hakmɔni gasawi zu o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Eleazar bem ko Dodo, be Ahɔa, ŋma kpɔk mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi taar.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ à̧ á̧ duka so in David sɛn Pas-Damin, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ ŋmaa hi̧i̧ wen biro. O wi-biro
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Eleazar in o bíí kɔ‘i hu̧sa̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ndak o be Filistii kum nɛ̀ wa a nù. GASA WAN dee ha̧ wa mɛ gbin biro wese'i.
Ŋma wese, o ŋma bíí taar mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar zira pi̧i̧ tɛ David zu ta ká̧ di̧i̧ ko Adulam ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii baa nɛ̀ gbagari kɔ‘i kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o be Refaim.
David a̧a̧ fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma fara-pɛm-mɔ ko o be Filistii a̧a̧ so sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm.
David taa mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Nɛ́ o'o tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗu gɔna-yì nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm ha̧‘m nɔ o?»
O ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i gbaa war gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Filistii, nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗu yì kɔ̧ gɔna-yì nú garo Bɛtlɛhɛm, ɓɛɛ wa ba sinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ David. David nɔ so yì‘i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛn a nù ha̧ GASA WAN,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «GASA WAN a̧ dór am tɛ dee mɔ hegɔ. Yì'ɛ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ ee tɛ tɛ fio!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ nɔ yì‘i na. Mɔ nɛ̀ o ŋgaŋa-wi nɔ‘i taar'i dea nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ Abisai nya Jɔab a̧ duka so gasawi ko o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar; nɛ́ à̧ á̧ bìì so o bíí gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ kpɔk sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar
Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ-a gan o bíí ɓu-taar. A̧ duka gasawi kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛm ŋmaa in o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na.
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada be Kabsɛl nɛ́ ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ dee o mɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so o ŋgaŋa-wi Mɔab yiitoo a nù, nɛ́ à̧ á̧ gbɛɛ so dila kɔ̧ gɔna-yì wese gasa ɓɔrɔ;
nɛ́ kpɔk a̧‘i mbɛt a̧ gbɛɛ so ŋma zɔm kusa be Egiptɛ. Be Egiptɛ‘i a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gba gasa sɛ́ɛ̀ er, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɓira te. A̧ ɓara sɛ́ɛ̀ er be Egiptɛ‘i yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba tok nɛ̀ a̧ gbɛ woyo.
Mɔ nɛ̀ Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoyada dea ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur nɛnɛ mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
A̧ dee ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur gan o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan o ŋgaŋa-wi taar na. David ea a̧ mgbara o wi-pɛm-wi.
O oi ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Asahɛl nya Jɔab, Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Dodo be Bɛtlɛhɛm;
Samɔt be Harɔr; Hɛlɛs be Pɛlɔŋ,
Ira bem ko Ikɛs be Tɛkɔa; Abiɛzɛr be Anatot;
Sibɛkai be Husa; Ilai be Ahɔa;
Marai be Nɛtɔfa, Hɛlɛd bem ko Bana be Nɛtɔfa mbɛt;
Itai bem ko Ribai be Gibea tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin, Bɛnaya be Pirɛatɔŋ;
Hurai be ká̧ zaŋ Gas, Abiɛl be Arbat;
Azmavɛt be Bahurim; Ɛliaba be Salbɔŋ;
Bɛnɛ-Hasim be Gisɔŋ; Yɔnataŋ bem ko Sage, be Harar;
Ahiam bem ko Sakar be Harar mbɛt; Ɛlifal bem ko Ur;
Hɛfɛr be Mɛkara; Ahiya be Pɛlɔŋ;
Hesro be Karmɛl; Narai bem ko Ɛsbai;
Jɔɛl nya Nataŋ; Mibar bem ko Hagri;
Sɛlɛk be Amɔŋ; Narai be Bɛrot baka-nyaŋa ko Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya;
Ira be Yitri; Garɛb be Yitri
bá nɛ̀ Urii be Hit.
O ŋma ŋgaŋa wi-biro nɔ‘i mbɛt nɛ́ Zabad bem ko Alai;
Adina bem ko Ziza bezaŋ Rubɛn; a̧ nɛ̀ ŋma gasawi ko o bezaŋ Rubɛn nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu-taar;
Hanaŋ bem ko Maka in Yɔsafat be Mɛtɛn;
Uzia be Astɛrot, Sama in Yɛiɛl o bem ko Hɔtam be Arɔɛr.
Yɛdiaɛl bem ko Simri in Yɔha nya kɔ̧-a̧ be Tis;
Eliɛl be Mahawa, Yɛribai in Yɔsarbia o bem ko Ɛlnam, Yitma be Mɔab;
Eliɛl, Obɛd in Yasiɛl be Soba.

Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David yuu so nɛ̀ Saul bem ko Kis si Siklag, o ŋma wi-biro nɛɛ ɗoŋ-aa. Mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa so nɛ̀ góò in birndiŋ; wa iŋa so pi̧i̧ mɔ nyɛmna, kóó nɛ̀ er mɛ wiiko, kóó nɛ̀ gale mbɛt. Nin o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ. Tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin tɛ mgbák nú-gara ko Saul nɛ́
Ahiezɛr gasawi zu wa, in o nya-a̧ Yoas bem ko Sɛma be Gibea, sɛka Yɛziɛl in Pɛlɛt o bem ko Azmavɛt, Bɛraka in Yɛhu be Anatot,
Yismaya be Gabaɔŋ, kpɔk mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-Taar, a̧ nɛ́ ŋma wan kɔ-wa mbɛt,
sɛka Yirmɛya, Yahaziɛl, Yohanaŋ in Yɔzabad be Gedar,
Ɛluzai, Yɛrimɔt, Bɛalya, Sɛmaria in Sɛfatia be Haruf,
Ɛlkana, Isia, Azarɛl, Yɔɛzɛr, Yasobam, o bezaŋ Kore,
ká bá nɛ̀ Yɔɛla in Zabada, o bem ko Yeroam, nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o be Gɛdɔr.

O ŋma bezaŋ Gad nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ mbɛt. Wa yaa nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ yamba bíí biro; mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ ŋgee in sɛ́ɛ̀; see-wa nɛ́ see dila; ɓɛɛ yì mɛ naŋ-wa kànà nɛ́ kalamba mɛ zu kaya.
Gasawi duka nɛ́ Ezɛr; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Obadia; taar-a nɛ́ Eliab;
naar-a nɛ́ Mismana; mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya;
Atai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa nɛ́ Eliɛl;
mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a nɛ́ Yohanaŋ; mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a nɛ́ Ɛlzabad,
ɓu-a nɛ́ Yirmɛya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Makbanai.
O gasawi ko o wi-biro mgbara o bezaŋ Gad nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Mgbara o wi nɔ‘i, geɗek wi tɛ biro tɛ bi bíí gɔmŋmaa, ɓɛɛ gasa-a, kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ bíí booro.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa á̧ kuu so Jurdɛn mɛ ɓar tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ yì ha̧a̧ so nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ka wa ndak o bíí nɛ̀ ɔɔ so kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese in yee-wese.
O ŋma bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in Juda nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ David fara n'aa hu̧si sɛnɛ mbɛt.

David gboo pii tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbak am, mi tɛ kpa desee nyɛmna wen duka-a in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛɛ wen ɔra'm ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am de kɔ‘m mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai na ga, Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ a̧ zɔ́k, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ dúk nɛ́ wi-kɛ̧-mgbara mɔ‘i!»
Ɓɛɛ
«Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ David,
ɛ́ɛ́ a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, bem ko Jɛse!
Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́
in ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ̀ gbak'nɛ́!
Wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gbák'nɛ́!»
David kpɛka wa, ɓɛɛ e wa mgbara o gasawi ko o wi-biro kɔ‘i.

O bezaŋ Manase yee biro ɗoŋ David ŋgimbi n'aa nɛɛ nɛnɛ in o be Filistii mɛ bi Saul. Mɔ kpɔk, David in o bíí kɔ‘i gbak so o be Filistii na, wen nɛ̀ o be-wan Filistii mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta, ɓɛɛ wa ndak David sinɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «A̧ tɛ zik tɛ-a ye ɗoŋ Saul, wan kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ yɛ!»
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David yaka nɛnɛ si Siklag, o be Manase nɛ̀ nɛɛ in a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Adna, Yɔzabad, Yɛdiaɛl, Mikaɛl, Yɔzabad, Elihu in Silɛtai; wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-duk-zu bíí booro sɛn nù ko Manase.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ gbaka David in o gíí wi-biro, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ e wa nɛ́ o gasa wi-ya-zu o wi-biro.
Dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, o bíí a̧a̧ tɛ tɛa-a wen gbaka David tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ gbagari kɔ̧-a̧ gasi hee ko Sɔ̧ ga.
O bíí tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ wa tɔra, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ boi wen bíí biro, nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ sitɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ ba wan ko Saul ha̧ ha̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
O wi-biro tɛ zuduk ko Juda nɛ̀ mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ̀ in ŋgee nɛ́ bíí booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Tɛ zuduk ko Simɛɔŋ, o ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa.
Tɛ zuduk ko Levii nɛ́ bíí booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
in Yehoyada wi-duk-zu o bezaŋ Arɔŋ, a̧ in o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ booro-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
bá nɛ̀ Sadɔk, ŋgaŋa be-ŋgaiwi, in o gasawi nutua kɔ̧-a̧ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo.
Tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin, mgbák nú-gara ko Saul nɛ́ bíí booro-taar nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ-wa nɛti pɛm nɛ̀ tua ko Saul.
Tɛ zuduk ko Efraim nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro booro-ɓu-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, nɛ̀ nin-wa hura so nyɛmna nutua kɔ-wa.
Tɛ reeta zuduk ko Manase nɛ́ bíí booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ wa hoka so mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de wan ha̧ David.
Tɛ zuduk ko Isakar nɛ́ o gasa wi-duk-zu biro gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo bá nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ-wa nɛ̀ iŋa ŋgimbi ha̧ o be
Tɛ zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ bíí booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ ya zu naŋ nɛ̀ oi boi-biro lɛŋ mɛ bi biro nɛ̀ see kpɔk.
Tɛ zuduk ko Nɛftalii nɛ́ o gasawi duk-zu-biro booro bá nɛ̀ o wi-biro booro-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ̀ in ŋgee.
Tɛ zuduk ko Dan nɛ́ bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ ya zu naŋ wen biro.
Tɛ zuduk ko Asɛr nɛ́ bíí booro-ɓu-naar nɛ̀ ya zu naŋ wen yaka biro.
Tɛ zuduk ko Rubɛn, Gad, in reeta ɓii zuduk ko Manase nɛ̀ war kur Jurdɛn nɛ́ bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-yiitoo nɛ̀ oi boi-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
O wi-biro nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ya zu naŋ wen biro tɛɛ nɛ̀ kpɔk kale see sɛn Hebrɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ e David nɛ̀ wan zu
Wa dee zɛ taar hi̧i̧ in David nyɔŋ nɛ̀ mɔ, nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ wen o nya-wa ɗafa so mɔ zɛm nɛ̀ wa.

O bíí zika-nù‘i hɔ nɛnɛ Isakar, Zabulɔŋ in Nɛftalii kaia so o nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ mbɛt nɛ̀ o tuifuu, o ŋgeloba, o sunda in o ndai. Mɔ nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ nɛ́ fuu, makala, waya mbɔra, o kora waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɔ̧́, o gasa mɔ-dai in o geɗek-a nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen gasa desee a̧a̧ so sɛn
David baa keta in o gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in zu o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa gú nɛ̀ oi o gasawi lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o gíí be
Hegɔ, ɛɛ tɛ de ha̧ kuɓa ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ yɛ, wen n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ pi̧ nú ɗoŋ-aa ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Saul ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan na.»
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a kpɛka ha̧ wa mɛ de hegɔ, wen wa zɔka mɔ‘i duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
David mɔi̧a o be
A̧ daŋa si Baala nɛ̀‘i sa'e Kiriat-Yearim, sɛn nú Juda in o be
Wa baa kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ e zu mbe keekee sɛn nú tua ko Abinadab. Nɛ́ Uza in Ahio a̧ zɔk keekee'i nɛ́ nɛ̀nɛ́.
David in o be
Wa hɔɔ fara gusi alkamaari ko Kidɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Uza nyɛi̧ er mɛ kasi kuɓa wen nɛ̀ o ndai dee mɛ fo pi̧ nù.
Nyimsea ko GASA WAN kura zu a̧, ɓɛɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ wen n'aa nyɛi̧a er-a si zu kuɓa. A̧ fea yí Sɔ̧ hi̧i̧.
See David ɗaŋa tɛ zɔka-a'e, GASA WAN gbɛɛ Uza pi̧ nù, ɓɛɛ wa a nin fara'i'e, Pɛrɛs-Uza
Wese'i, kíí Sɔ̧ dee David, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Mi tɛ ba kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ pii tɛ kɔ‘m hee ge?»
David ba
nɔɔ-tɔk ko GASA WAN duka sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko Obɛd-Edɔm fio-zɛ taar, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tok de yoŋgo zu o bíí nutua in zu o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ŋma wese, Hiram wannu Tir toma o betom ha̧ David nɛ̀ o te
David zɔka'e GASA WAN ee wi nɛ̀ wan zu
David kaia o ŋma mbe kóò woyo sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko o be-wiwii in o be-okoo.
Nin o bem nɔ‘i n'aa koo Jerusalɛm'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Samua, Sobab, Nataŋ in Salomɔŋ;
Yibar, Elisua in Ɛlpalɛt;
Nɔga, Nɛfɛg in Yafia;
Elisama, Beɛliad in Elifɛlɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii zia'e, wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu David ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu
O be Filistii hɔa, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi dam kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ Refaim lɛŋ.
David aka Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «A̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ bi o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ a wa kɔ̧ er-am nde?» GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ̀, mi tɛ a wa kɔ̧ er-mɛ!»

David kura yak si Bal-Pɛrasim, ɓɛɛ tik o be Filistii nɛ biro. A̧ gbina biro ti wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Sɔ̧ hu̧i̧a̧ war ha̧‘m mgbara o wisɛn kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yì gbin nɛ̀ gba-zu’ɛ ga.» Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧ wa saa nɛ̀ nin fara'i «Bal-Pɛrasim».
O be Filistii siŋa o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i a nù fara'i, ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧: «Wi dɔ́ wa dɔɔ!»
Mɛ ɗoŋ, o be Filistii tɛɛ hur kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Refaim ɓɛɛ ba.
David aka Sɔ̧ woyo, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ nɛ́ nɛ̀ war sɔnti wa bi nɛ̀ wa na; mɛ̀ háí nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa nɛ̀ ti te-nyama.
Kà mɛ zii giti naŋ bíí fara nɛ̀ nɔ̀ zu te-nyama, mɛ̀ gbó biro wen Sɔ̧ yaka ti ha̧ mɛ mɛ bi o wi-biro ko o be Filistii kaɗi.»
David dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum o be Filistii sɛn Gabaɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ sɛn Gezɛr.
Nin David hura dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN de ha̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ mɛ yu a̧.
David dee o tua sɛn fara nɛ‘i sa'e
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «O wi nɛ̀ tɛ tui kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ o be Levii ɓɛɛ, wen GASA WAN hoka wa wen gɔɔ kuɓa kɔ̧-a̧ in wen dee tom-aa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
David mɔi̧a o bíí
A̧ mɔi̧a o bezaŋ Arɔŋ in o be Levii mbɛt.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Kehat a̧ saa nɛ́ Uriɛl gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Mɛrari, nɛ́ Asaya gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ, nɛ́ Jɔɛl gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Elisafaŋ, nɛ́ Sɛmaya gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ, nɛ́ Eliɛl gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Uziɛl, nɛ́ Aminadab gasawi kɔ-wa in o nya-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
David saa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, Sadɔk in Abiatar bá nɛ̀ Uriɛl, Asaya, Jɔɛl, Sɛmaya, Eliɛl in Aminadab, o be Levii.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko be Levii. Ɛ̀nɛ̀
Hee ɛnɛ bo so k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛti na ga, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ gusa yɛ wen n’ɛɛ kii a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a na.»
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii
O be Levii tuia kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ e zu kóŋgó-ɓaa nɛ̀ o te-gɔa-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Moisɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN ga.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi zu o be Levii mɛ a o nya-wa tɛ tom-aa, o wi-bii-gima nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-de-saa, o koloŋ, o kunde in o sɔkɔ, ha̧ wa mɛ mbɛr nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a de nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ.
O wi nɛ̀ o be Levii foo a tɛ tom kɔ‘i nɛ́ Heman bem ko Jɔɛl in Asaf, ŋma nya-a̧, bem ko Berekia, bá nɛ̀ Etaŋ bem ko Kusaya tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
O ŋma nya-wa woyo nɛ́ Zakarii, Bɛn, Yaziɛl, Sɛmiramɔt, Yehiɛl, Uni, Eliab, Bɛnaya, Masɛya, Matitia, Eliflɛhu, Miknɛya, Obɛd-Edɔm in Yɛiɛl nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-nú tua.
Mgbara o wi-bii-gima nɛ́ Heman, Asaf in Etaŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ o kuŋge nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ wen mbɛra-a.
Zakarii, Aziɛl, Sɛmiramɔt; Yehiɛl, Uni, Eliab, Mɛsɛya in Bɛnaya a̧a̧ so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ o kunde wen de ger-bii-gima.
Matitia, Eliflɛhu, Miknɛya, Obɛd-Edɔm, Yɛiɛl in Azazia a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o ɗuka ger kunde wen duka ti tɛ gima.
Kɛnania duka nɛ́ gasawi zu o be Levii wen gɔɔ kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ zɔk nɛnɛ, wen nɛ́ a̧ á̧ iŋa so tom-aa nyɛmna.
Berekia in Ɛlkana yaa so kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-nú tua kuɓa;
nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ wen Obɛd-Edɔm in Yɛhia mbɛt. O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sabana, Yɔsafat, Nɛtanɛl, Amasai, Zakarii, Bɛnaya in Eliɛzɛr dɔm so kɔ‘i nɛ́ mbia ti kuɓa ko Sɔ̧.
Zaŋ desee, David in o gasawi
Wa gɔna wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in o vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɗafi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbak o be Levii nɛ̀ gɔ
David pi̧i̧ so nɛ́ gba-laa nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa in o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ tui kuɓa, bá nɛ̀ o wi-bii-gima in Kɛnaya gasa wi-duk-zu tui; David pi̧i̧ so yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod mbɛt.
O be
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa gɔɔ
Wa baa kuɓa ko Sɔ̧ si kɔ̧ tua-laa nɛ́ɛ̀ é bɛr-tua nɛ̀ David ɗafa wen-aa, ɓɛɛ wa
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David kaɗa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ɗafa sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ kaɗi, a̧ toka de yoŋgo zu dukbíí nɛ nin GASA WAN,
kɛ̧ nɛ̀ dura brɛt, makala waya-ndɛŋgɛ
David ee o ŋma be Levii nɛ̀ de tom ti
mɛ̀ nɛ́ Asaf gasawi in hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa Zakarii, sɛka Aziɛl, Sɛmiramɔt, Yehiɛl, Matitia, Eliab, Bɛnaya in Obɛd-Edɔm; Yɛiɛl a̧a̧ so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ o kunde in o koloŋ, ɓɛɛ Asaf yak so kɔ‘i nɛ́ o sɔkɔ.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Bɛnaya in Yahaziɛl dɔm so kɔ-wa nɛ́ o mbia zu
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wese'i a̧ David ee nɛ̀ tom zɔna GASA WAN er Asaf in o nya-wi mɛ de gbaŋa ko GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ gasa deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o bíí!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ o gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ nin-a,
tortɛ a̧ bá o wi nɛ̀ kii GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí GASA WAN in ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɔ́í tɛ kia sɔnti-a na!
Ɛ́nɛ́, pɛ́r-nam ko Abraham wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bem ko Jakob, o wi n'aa hoka,
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dea
in dɔka mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ ká bá nɛ̀ gɔna kita kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
A̧ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ;
kita kɔ̧-a̧ dama zu nù lɛŋ.
Tɛ-a bi ɗoŋ
ɓɛɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk siti kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Tɛ-a bi ɗoŋ
ká bá nɛ̀ kanamɔ n'aa kànà so ha̧ Izak na mbɛt.
ɓɛɛ
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so: «Mi ha̧a̧ nú Kanaŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
wa dɔk na,
wi nyɛma so mɛ tɔr wa nɛ̀ bekete er-wi;
Wa yaa so hee o gɛnɛ ga
yambali nɛnɛ nɛ̀ mgbara o tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ e ha̧ ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ nukuri wa na;
a̧ dee bɔnɛ in o ŋma wannu wen zu wa.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ fo tɛ o wi n'am hoka na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ in o
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima ha̧ GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa dee kpasi nɛ̀ ɛnɛ wese lɛŋ!
Wen GASA WAN ɔ gasa
in wi zɔn a̧ nyɛmna mbɛt,
a̧ ɔ ŋgaya nyɛmna,
a̧ gana o sɔ̧ lɛŋ.
O mɔ nɛ̀ bíí zɔk hee sɔ̧ ga,
nɛ́ o geemɔ ko o dukbíí sɔɔ géè!
Sa̧a̧mɔ in gasamɔ a̧a̧ ti a̧,
nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dee yiwese;
ŋgai in demɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧
Ɛ́nɛ́ o pɛ́r-nam ko o dukbíí,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́
in ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ e ti a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ si ti a̧,
ɛnɛ gu nu ti GASA WAN,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛk.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ nák ti a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí zu nù lɛŋ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɗafa nù mɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a
in ŋma mɔɔ-fo-a mɛ nak bo na.
Yiwese a̧ dúk nɛ̀ desee,
nù a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ!
«GASA WAN nɛ wannu!»
Nù a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ!
Gba-tɔp in o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ a̧ dík,
o mɔɔ-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ a̧ dé gbaŋa!
O te kɔ̧ kombo lɛŋ a̧ gáí mɔ nɛ̀ desee,
wa a̧ yá nɛ̀ desee ti GASA WAN,
wen a̧ tɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu nù.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee,
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́:
«GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí yɛ gbonɛ mgbara tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN,
Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧: «Aamɛn!»
in «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN!»
David ee Asaf in o nya-a̧ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ dè tom ɓɔnsɛnɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk sɛn hi̧i̧, sɛn ká̧
ɓɛɛ Obɛd-Edɔm in o nya-a̧ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ká bá nɛ̀ Obɛd-Edɔm bem ko Yedutun in Hɔsa nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-nú tua.
David ee Sadɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o nya-a̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mbɛt sɛn ti
wen
Heman in Yedutun a̧a̧ so in wa in oi o wi nɛ̀ wa hoka so, wen dee gbaŋa ha̧ GASA WAN, wen «
Heman in Yedutun bá nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so in wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o mbia, o wora sɔkɔ in o dɔka mɔɔ-de-saa wen bia gima ko Sɔ̧. O bem ko Yedutun pɛm so kɔ-wa nɛ́ nú Tua.
O bíí lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ kpɔk kpɔk si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ David si kɔ‘i mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu tua kɔ‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David duk sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nataŋ
Nataŋ kifa nú ha̧ David: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ ta mɛ de lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ dea-a, wen Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.»
Ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ‘i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Nataŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m'e, nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: ‹Bo nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ tɛ de Tua ha̧‘m sɛka'm ɔɔ kɔ̧ a̧ na.
Ŋgimbi n'am gboo nɛ̀ o be
Zɛ ɔ dɔka n'am yar nɛnɛ in o be
«Kinii mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ hegɔ ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David: ‹Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi a̧‘m baa mɛ nɛ̀ poo zɔ̧, ɗoŋ o mɔ-dai ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu
Mi duka in mɛɛ fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ nɛɛ sɛnɛ; mi gbɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ yinɛ ti mɛ lɛŋ; mi tɛ de ha̧ nin-mɛ mɛ hur, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ nin o gasawi hur nɛnɛ zu nù'ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋma fara ha̧
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi n'am ee nɛ̀ o wi-gɔn-kita zu
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wese kɔ-mɛ tɛ dam, ha̧ mɛ mɛ si ɗoŋ kpa o dáà kɔ-mɛ, mi tɛ ba ŋma bezaŋ-mɛ e ŋgɔn oi mɛ. Wi’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ ŋma bíí mgbara o bem kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ damti kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ de Tua ha̧‘m; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e damti kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ nɔa-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ duk nɛ́ dáà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ bem kɔ‘m. Mi beka e
Mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m in tɛ wan kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ damti kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.› »
Nataŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ David nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o mɔ n'aa zia tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i.
Wannu David tɛ̀ɛ̀ duk nù ti GASA WAN ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧, mi nɛ o, mi nɛ bíí nutua ko o, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ̀‘m hɔ fara’ɛ o?
Zu-a'i, mɔ‘i duka nɛ́ geɗek mɔ yí‘nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m; ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu o bezaŋ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ nɛti kaɗi. Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka'm hee gasa bíí ga, GASA WAN Sɔ̧!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ge a̧ David tɛ tɔ̧ zu gasamɔ n’ɛnɛ dee ha̧ a̧ ge? K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in tɛ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ dee nɛ̀ gasa tom’ɛ lɛŋ ha̧ o bíí mɛ iŋ o gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, ŋma bíí nɛ̀ nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ bo na; tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛɛ zia nɛ̀ zer yɛ, Sɔ̧ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Ŋma tugun bíí zu nù'ɛ nɛ̀ nyɛma ŋmaa in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
Ɛ́nɛ́ dora
«Kinii, GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧! Wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in zu o bezaŋ-aa a̧ dúk nɛ́ kpasawen ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wen'i a̧ dúk kpasa; nin'nɛ́ a̧ húr ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ha̧ o bíí mɛ tɔ̧: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ ko
Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, o bezaŋ-aa tɛ ɔ wan oi-aa; nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpa nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi mɛ kɔfi mɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen gasa demɔ'ɛ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu o bíí nutua ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen ha̧ bezaŋ-aa mɛ duk yí‘nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ! Wen ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ tok nɛ́ de yoŋgo, ɓɛɛ zɔnamɔ duk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, David bíí o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ ɔ wan zu wa. A̧ baa ye Gat in o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ er o be Filistii.
A̧ bìì o be Mɔab, ɓɛɛ wa duk o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ a̧.
David bìí Hadadɛzɛr, wannu Sɔba nɛ̀ duk si war Hamat ŋgimbi n'aa nɛɛ so mɛ ba nɛ́ nana-yí Efrat e tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧.

David kaia keekee-biro ko Hadadɛzɛr booro in o wi-biro nɛ̀ nyaŋa booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-nɛ-biro nɛ̀ naŋ booro-ɓu-yiitoo. A̧ ɓira ɗaɗi naŋ o nyaŋa-keekee-biro lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi-aa gɔmŋmaa ɓɛɛ.
O be Aram nɛ̀ ya Damas tɛɛ mɛ gbak Hadadɛzɛr wannu Sɔba, ɓɛɛ David gbɛ o bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo mgbara wa.
David aa o gasawi kɔ‘i dam Aram nú Damas. O be Aram kifa wi-de-tom ko David, gbo nɛ̀ garama ha̧ a̧. Fara nɛ̀ David nɛ́ lɛŋ, GASA WAN dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbin biro sɛnɛ.
David kaia o ŋgee ko o wi-de-tom ko Hadadɛzɛr nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ lɔr piinɛ Jerusalɛm.
A̧ kaia ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a sɛn Tibat in sɛn Kun, tɛ ye ko Hadadɛzɛr. Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, Salomɔŋ nɔi̧a ndɛrɛ‘i de nɛ̀ gba-kpánà, o mbiŋ in o nyɛk.
Tou, wannu Hamat zia'e David bìì o wi-biro ko Hadadɛzɛr wannu Sɔba.

A̧ toma bem kɔ̧-a̧ Hadɔram nɛ̀ haya-a sitɛ wannu David mɛ fan a̧ zɔn nɛ̀ a̧, tɛ bíí Hadadɛzɛr n'aa bia, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan a̧‘i, wen Hadadɛzɛr duka so nɛ́ wisɛn ko Tou. Hadɔram kaia o mɔ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr, bu-mbɔi in nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu David,
ɓɛɛ David e mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN e zu bu-mbɔi in lɔr n'aa kaia nɛti er o zuduk bíí n'aa bìì so. A̧ kaia so o mɔɔ nɔ‘i er o be Edɔm, o be Mɔab, o be Amɔŋ, o be Filistii in o be Amalɛk.
Absai bem ko Sɛruya gbɛɛ o be Edɔm tɛ booro-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Tɔŋ.
A̧ aa o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ dam nú Edɔm, ɓɛɛ o be Edɔm lɛŋ ya wi-de-tom ko David. Fara nɛ̀ David nɛ́ lɛŋ, GASA WAN dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbin biro sɛnɛ.
David ɔɔ wan zu
Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-biro; Yɛhɔsafat bem ko Ahilud duk so kɔ‘i nɛ́ wan-kalata.
Sadɔk bem ko Ahitub in Abimɛlɛk bem ko Abiatar yaa kɔ-wa nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; Sausa duka kɔ‘i nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ;
Bɛnaya bem ko Yehoda duka zu o be Kɛrɛt in o be Pɛlɛt; ɓɛɛ o bem ko David ya kɔ-wa nɛ́ o gasawi katɛ wannu.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Nahas wannu ko o be Amɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ wan oi-aa.

David tɔ̧a̧: «Mi tɛ de mɔ in Hanun bem ko Nahas nɛ̀ yuwar-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so nɛnɛ in am ga.» David toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ Hanun oi fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧; ɓɛɛ o wi-de-tom ko David nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ tɛ ye ko o be Amɔŋ tɛ Hanun mɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.

O gasawi ko o be Amɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Hanun: «Ɛnɛ ta k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e David tu̧ nɛ tɛ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen n'aa toma o bíí tɛnɛ tɛ fio ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ nde? Bo nɛ wen kpee naŋ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ o fara-pɛm-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, in wen ɗaŋa ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ á̧ à̧ toma nɛ̀ wa tɛnɛ na nde?»
Hanun dee ŋmaa in o wi-de-tom ko David; a̧ kpuia zera kɔ-wa, ɓir laa kɔ-wa hɔ tɛ tua ndaa-wa, ɓɛɛ e wa mɛ si.

Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ kpaa wi nɔ‘i ha̧ David, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom ŋma bíí mɛ we ti wa, wen foe gana so zu wa. Wannu toma tɔ̧ ha̧ wa ndé, wa a̧ ɓɔ́n sɛn Jeriko pɛm nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ zera kɔ-wa tɛ hɔ lɛŋ kaɗi sɛka wa yee ye.

O be Amɔŋ zɔka'e, wi dee ɗaŋmɔ ti David, ɓɛɛ Hanun in o be Amɔŋ tom kilo bu-mbɔi booro-ɓu-taar-zua-naar ha̧ o be Aram nɛ̀ ɔ si ger nana-yì yiitoo in o be Aram mɛ Maka in mɛ Sɔba, wen ha̧ wa mɛ kai o keekee-biro kɔ-wa in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa kɔ-wa tɛnɛ.
Wa yoɓa wannu Maka gú nɛ̀ bíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, bá nɛ̀ keekee-biro booro-ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ́ɛ̀ ba gbagari kɔ-wa ká̧ Madaba; o be Amɔŋ gboo nɛ̀ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i, mɔi̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ fara-biro.
David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom Jɔab in o ŋgaŋa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛnɛ.
O be Amɔŋ gboa, nɛk naŋ biro sɛn nú garo ye, ɓɛɛ o wannu nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ ye ɗoŋ wa nɛka kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ɗoŋ si zaŋbɛɛ.
Jɔab zɔka'e wi tɛ bi biro nɛti in nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mbɛt; a̧ hoka o bíí mgbara o ŋgaŋa wi-biro
A̧ ha̧a̧ o oi wi-biro ha̧ nya-a̧ Absai, ɓɛɛ wa nɛk kɔ-wa tan ti o be Amɔŋ.
Jɔab tɔ̧a̧: «Kà o be Aram nɛ́ ŋgaia gan am, mɛ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak am; ɓɛɛ kà o be Amɔŋ nɛ́ ŋgaia gan mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbak mɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ úsí ŋgai k’ɛɛ wen dukbíí k’ɛɛ in wen o ye ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.»
Jɔab in gii wi-biro kɔ‘i ɗɔla siti wen bíí o be Aram, ɓɛɛ o be Aram yu mɔ ti a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Amɔŋ zɔka o be Aram yuu mɔ, wa mbɛt, wa yuu mɔ ti Absai, nya Jɔab, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ si ye kɔ-wa. Jɔab sii kɔ‘i si Jerusalɛm.
O be Aram zɔka'e o be
Nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i aa zer David. A̧ mɔi̧a o be
O be Aram yuu mɔ ti
O wi-de-tom ko Hadadɛzɛr zɔka'e

Mɛ nú kórò, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wannu bi nɛ̀ biro, Jɔab kaia o gíí wi-biro nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ sɛn nù ko o be Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ ba gbagari sɛn ká̧ Raba, ká David ɓɔna so kɔ‘i sɛn Jerusalɛm. Jɔab bìí Raba, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ ye a nù lɛŋ.
David kpɔ̧i̧a̧ mɛtɛwol nɛ̀ duka zu Milkɔm
A̧ foo o bíí saaye'i yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa a tɛ tom-gbaa-te, tom-gbaa-ta in mbaŋa-gua. David dee pɛrti mɔ‘i dam sɛn ye ko o be Amɔŋ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ pii Jerusalɛm.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ŋma biro tika nù sɛn Gezɛr mgbara o be
Ŋma biro tika nù woyo in o be Filistii, ɓɛɛ Ɛlhanaŋ bem ko Yair gbɛ Lami, nya Gɔliat be Gat. Te-sɛ́ɛ̀ ko Lami duka so hee gasa mboɗa te ko wi-de-laa nduu ga.
Ŋma mbe biro tika nù woyo mgbara
A̧ kɔna ŋguɗi ti o be
O wi nɛ̀ wa gbɛa'i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bezaŋ Harafa sɛn Gat; ɓɛɛ David in o wi-biro kɔ‘i gbɛ wa lɛŋ.
Ŋma ŋgimbi Satan kura zu
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab in o gasawi hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o be
Jɔab kifa nú: «GASA WAN a̧ dé ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ dɔk war gɔmŋmaa. Nyaa wannu, wa lɛŋ bo nɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde? Wen ge sa wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔr bíí ge?
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wen ko wannu gana zu mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Jɔab taa ga, Jɔab yaka nɛ́ɛ̀ yar dam nú
Jɔab tɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔka bíí n'aa tɔra ha̧ David. Dɔka be
Jɔab tɔr so o be Levii in o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin na, wen wen ko wannu tu̧u̧ so see Jɔab nyɛmna.
Tɔra bíí duka nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ yí Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu o be
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Nɛ́ gasa ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna a̧‘m dea! Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ a̧, wen mi dee mɔ hee mgbelewi ga nɛ̀ mbetɛ!»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Gad wi-zɔk-mɔ ko David hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ David'e, GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: ‹Mi aa mɔ taar ti mɛ; mɛ̀ hók kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mi dee mɔ‘i.› »
Gad nɛɛ kpa David, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧, mɛ̀ hók mɔ kpɔk mgbara mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ taar’ɛ:

kóó nɛ́ pɛ kaɓa taar, kóó nɛ́ fio-zɛ taar nɛ̀ biro tɛ tik mɛ, nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tik yi gba-paa ko o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ́ zɛ taar ɗɔɔ gba-paa ko GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa nɛ̀ betom ko GASA WAN tɛ kum nɛ̀ bíí sɛn
David kifa nú ha̧ Gad: «Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ dita-see nyɛmna! Gana so a̧‘m tík kɔ̧ er GASA WAN, wen deako kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ gasa nyɛmna; mi kɔ̧ mɛ tik kɔ̧ er bíí na!»
Hegɔ GASA WAN toma ŋga zɛɛ pi̧ zu o be

Sɔ̧ toma betom kɔ‘i tɛnɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa de nɛ̀ mɔ‘i, GASA WAN zɔka, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i nyim tɛ-a. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom-ɗaŋ-mɔ: «Kaɗa! Mɛ̀ dák er-mɛ!» Ŋgimbi'i, betom ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ so ká̧ fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Ornaŋ be Jebus.
David baa yí nɛ̀ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zɔk betom ko GASA WAN sɛn mgbara yiwese in nù nɛ̀ gba-paa er n'aa nyɛi̧ si zu Jerusalɛm. David in o gasawi nɛ̀ mara so nɛ́ laa-bufu guu yí nù,

ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Bo nɛ mi a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e, wa a̧ tɔr dukbíí na nde? Nɛ́ mi a̧ yɔɔ kaya, nɛ́ mi a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o sami nɔ'ɔ, wa dee kɔ-wa nɛ́ ge? GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, er'nɛ́ a̧ tík zu'm in o bíí nutua kɔ‘m; ká tik zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.»
Betom ko GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Gad mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ David'e David a̧ dáŋ si fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Ornaŋ be Jebus, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ mbó
David daŋa si hi̧i̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Gad tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN.
Ŋgimbi'i, Ornaŋ mgbɔ so nɛ alkamaari; kà a̧ zɔk wó, betom ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧, ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ naar nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧ hu̧si.
David tɛɛ pii tɛ Ornaŋ; Ornaŋ baa yi nɛ̀ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ zɔk David nɛ̀ tɛ pii tɛ a̧. A̧ gboo nɛ̀ fara-gusi-alkamaari, ɓɛɛ a̧ gu nù ti David, gu yí-a nɛ̀ nù.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ há̧ fara’ɛ ha̧‘m mɛ mbo
Ornaŋ kifa nú ha̧ David: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́; wannu kɔ‘m a̧ dé mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ. Mi ha̧a̧ o ndai wen
Wannu David kifa nú ha̧ Ornaŋ: «Weyaa! Mi tɛ hi̧fi hi̧fi nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gɛnɛ-a. Mi beka ba mɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN géè na!»
Hegɔ David hi̧fa fara'i er Ornaŋ nɛ̀ kɔya lɔr gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
David mboo
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ betom kɔ‘i mɛ pi̧ gba-paa kɔ‘i kɔ̧ koɓo-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David zɔka'e, GASA WAN kifa nú ha'i sɛn fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Ornaŋ be Jebus, a̧ ɗafa sɔ̧ sɛn fara'i.
Zu-a'i,
Ɓɛɛ David nyɛm so mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ak mɔ in Sɔ̧ sɛn hi̧i̧ na, wen gba-paa ko betom ko GASA WAN dee so kíì pi̧ tɛ-a.
David tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ ko
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ mɔi̧ o gɛnɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn nú
David ɗafa boi nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen o mɔɔ-mgboi kpar-nú tua in o mɔɔ-lati ɗɔɔ-aa, ndɛrɛ nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ we dita-a na,
in o te-gbatui nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt wen o be Sidɔŋ in o be Tir kaia so

David tɔ̧a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ ɓɔna nɛ̀ bem, in ŋgai tɛ bo tɛ-a hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Tua nɛ̀‘i tɛ de ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a, wen ha̧ nyɛrɛ Tua'i mɛ hur dam zu nù lɛŋ wen de-a in gasa-a; hegɔ, mi tɛ ɗafi mɔ oi nú-a.» David ɗafa mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe.
A̧ saa bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ak bem mɛ de Tua ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Salomɔŋ: «Bem kɔ‘m, mi taa so mɔ mɛ de Tua wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m;
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mɛ gbaia tɔk a nù nyɛmna in mɛ dee o gasa biro mbɛt. Mɛ beka de Tua wen nin-am na, wen mɛ gbaia tɔk a nù nɛ̀ dɔka-a sɛn ti'm.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k bem nɛ̀ mɛ koa’ɛ, a̧ tɛ duk kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɔma-tɛ. Mi tɛ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ a̧ sɛn yí o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ zika a̧ kpa, wen nin-a tɛ duk nɛ́ Salomɔŋ,
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ de Tua wen nin-am. A̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ́ dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Mi tɛ de ha̧ wan kɔ̧-a̧ zu
«Bem kɔ‘m, kinii, GASA WAN a̧ dúk in mɛɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ de Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ de-a, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛnɛ zu mɛ ga!
Mɔ kpɔk, GASA WAN a̧ dè ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ́ kpa kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ e mɛ zu
Kà mɛ kasi o heembea in o geŋa ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ usa ha̧ Moisɛ wen

Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, nɛ̀ oi kpaamɔ n'am kpa na'i, mi ee lɔr gan kilo booro-taar in bu-mbɔi gan kilo booro-ɓu-taar wen Tua ko GASA WAN. Ko ndɛrɛ in boi, wi nyɛm mɛ we dita-wa na, wen dɔka-a nyɛmna. Mi ee o te in ta mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kii mbe-a a zu-a.
Mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom nɛ̀ dɔka-a, o wi-gba-ta, o wi-sɛk-ta in o wi-gba-te, o bíí nɛ̀ iŋa yí-tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
War ko lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ in boi, wi nyɛm mɛ tɔr na. Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ dé mɔ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dúk in mɛɛ!»
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be-wan
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na nde? Bo nɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ fara lɛŋ na nde? A̧ foo o bíí tɛ nù'ɛ pi̧ er-am, ɓɛɛ wa mbo zu ha̧ GASA WAN in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é see'nɛ́ in duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kia GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó
David sɔka in pɛ-a dɔka kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ e bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ wannu
A̧ mɔi̧a o gasawi
Wa tɔra o be Levii nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar in o wan nɛ̀ gana mbɛt. Gíí wa nɛ̀ wa tɔra kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ dee nɛ́ booro-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mgbara wa'i, bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar duka kɔ‘i wen zɔka tom Tua ko GASA WAN, in bíí booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk wen yɔra mɔ in gɔna kita,
bíí booro-naar mɛ pɛm nú Tua, sɛka bíí booro-naar wen gasa Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ David dee so wen GASA WAN.
David kɛ̧ɛ̧ wa nɛ̀ dùk-aa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ dùk kɔ-wa, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o bem ko Levii: Gɛrsɔŋ, Kehat in Mɛrari.
Ko o bem ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ́ Ladaŋ in Simɛi.
O bem ko Ladaŋ nɛ́ Yehiɛl, gasawi, sɛka Zɛtam in Jɔɛl; wa taar.
O bem ko Simɛi nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit, Haziɛl in Haraŋ; wa taar. Wa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua ko Ladaŋ.
O bem ko Simɛi nɛ́ Yahat, Ziza, Yɛus in Bɛria: o bem ko Simɛina nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i naar'i.
Yahat duka nɛ́ kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Ziza; Yɛus in Ɓɛria kpa kɔ‘i dɔka bem na, ɓɛɛ wa tɔr wa tɛ nutua kpɔk wen dee tom kpɔk.
O bem ko Kehat nɛ́ Amram, Yisɛhar, Hebrɔŋ in Uziɛl; wa lɛŋ naar.
O bem ko Amram nɛ́ Arɔŋ in Moisɛ. Wa ee Arɔŋ nɛtɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ wi-de-tom sɛn
Moisɛ duka nɛ́ bíí ko Sɔ̧, wa tɔra o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a mgbara duk ko Levii.
O bem ko Moisɛ nɛ́ Gɛrsɔm in Eliɛzɛr.
Bem ko Gɛrsɔm nɛ́ Sɛbuɛl gasawi.
Bem ko Eliɛzɛr nɛ́ Rɛhabia gasawi. Eliɛzɛr kpa mbe bem na, ɓɛɛ Yɛhabia koo kɔ‘i nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Bem ko Yisɛhar nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit gasawi.
O bem ko Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Yɛria kaya-a, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Amaria, taar-a nɛ́ Yahaziɛl, naar-a nɛ́ Yɛkamɛaŋ.
O bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika, kaya-a in Isia hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa.
O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali in Musi. O bem ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar in Kis.
Eleazar fea kpa be-wiwii na, a̧ koo nɛ́ o be-okoo, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o nya kɔ-wa o bem ko Kis, a̧ kaia wa nɛ̀ kóò.
O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr sɛka Yɛrɛmɔt; wa lɛŋ taar.

O bezaŋ Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa, o gasawi nutua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɔra-bíí nutua kpɔk kpɔk usa ga nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Tom kɔ-wa duka nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti.
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti'e: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Hegɔ, o be Levii beka tui
O be Levii nɛ̀‘i tɔra nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ sɔŋkur wen ko David nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ siti nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Wa tɛ ya ɗɔɔ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wen tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN: ɗafamɔ nú-zala, in kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr-tua, ɗafa war o nyɛk-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o ŋma tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ɗafi o brɛt wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧, in fuu wen ha̧a̧mɔ. Wa tɛ ɗafi o makala nɛ̀ hao bo sɛnɛ na, o hana makala sɛka o makala nɛ‘i aa mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ sɛnɛ in o nyɛk-we-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ŋgimbi gasa GASA WAN in zɔna a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mbɛt, wa tɛ ya oi-aa,
wa tɛ
Hegɔ, wa tɛ de tom sɛn kɔ̧
Dùk o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ. O bem ko Arɔŋ nɛ́ Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar in Itamar.
Nadab in Abihu fee nɛti ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa, be-wiwii bo na; hegɔ, wa ha̧a̧ tom ɗafa-sɔ̧ ha̧ Eleazar in Itamar.
David in Sadɔk bezaŋ Eleazar bá nɛ̀ Ahimɛlɛk bezaŋ Itamar kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
Wiwii dɔka so mgbara o bezaŋ Eleazar gan ko Itamar. Tɛ bezaŋ Eleazar wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ nutua ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ o gasawi zu wa, ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Itamar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wa pi̧i̧ tani kɛ̧ nɛ̀ wa wen o gasawi

Sɛmaya, ŋma be Levii bem ko Nɛtanɛl wi-yɔr-mɔ yɔra nin-wa sɛn ti wannu, ti o gasawi, ti Sadɔk wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ti Ahimɛlɛk bem ko Abiatar in ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Wa pi̧i̧ tani war yiitoo ba nɛ̀ bíí yiitoo nutua ko Eleazar, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ tani war kpɔk ba nɛ̀ bíí kpɔk nutua ko Itamar.
Kuti tani baa Yɛhɔyarib, yiitoo tani baa Yɛdaya,
taar-a baa Harim, naar-a baa Sɛɔrim,
mɔɔrɔ-a baa Malkia, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a baa Miyamin,
mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa baa Hakɔs, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a baa Abia,
mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a baa Yesua, ɓu-a baa Sɛkania,
ɓu-zua-kpɔk-a baa Eliasib, ɓu-zua-yiitoo-aa baa Yakim,
ɓu-zua-taar-a baa Hupa, ɓu-zua-naar-a baa Yɛsɛbɛab;
ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-a baa Bilga; ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a baa Imɛr,
ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa baa Hɛzir, ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a baa Hapisɛs,
ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a baa Pɛtaya, ɓu-yiitoo-aa baa Ezekiɛl,
ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk-a baa Yakin, ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-aa baa Gamul,
ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar-a baa Delaya; ɓɛɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar-a ba Mazia.
Kɛ̧ɛ̧ bíí a tɛ tom wen yee Tua ko GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O ŋma bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ ɓɔna nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
mgbara o bezaŋ Amram duka nɛ́ Subaɛl, ɓɛɛ mgbara o bezaŋ Subaɛl nɛ́ Yɛdaya.
Ko Rɛhabia in o bezaŋ-aa nɛ́ Isia gasawi.
Ko o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Sɛlɔmɔt, ko o bezaŋ Sɛlɔmɔt nɛ́ Yahat;
ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ duka nɛ́
Bem ko Uziɛl nɛ́ Mika; mgbara o bezaŋ Mika nɛ́ Samir.
Nya Mika duka nɛ́ Isia; mgbara o bezaŋ Isia nɛ́ Zakarii.
O bem ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Mali, Musi in Yazia.
O bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ̀ ɗoŋ bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Sɔham, Zakur in Ibri.
Ko Mali nɛ́ Eleazar nɛ̀ kpa so kɔ‘i be-wiwii na,
in Kis nɛ̀ ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Yerameɛl.
O bem ko Musi nɛ́ Mali, Edɛr in Yɛrimɔt.
O be Levii nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.

Wa mbɛt, wa pi̧i̧ tani, hee o nya-wa o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ga ti wannu David, ti Sadɔk, ti Ahimɛlɛk, ti o gasawi nutua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in ti o bezaŋ Levii. Tɛ mɔ‘i, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo wen nutua ko kaya-wi in nutua ko be-ɗoŋ na.
David in o gasawi zu o wi-biro hoka o bezaŋ Asaf, o bezaŋ Heman, in o bezaŋ Yedutun nɛ̀ tɔ̧ so wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o kunde, o koloŋ in o sɔkɔ wen tom'i. Nin o wi-de-tom'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
War ko o bem ko Asaf nɛ́ Zakur, Jozɛf, Nɛtania in Asarɛla. Asaf duka so zu o bem kɔ‘i tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.

War ko Yedutun nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, Gɛdalia, Sɛri, Yɛsaya, Hasabia, Matitia in Simɛi, wa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Nɛ́ dáà kɔ-wa Yedutun a̧ duk zu wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kunde, gasi nɛ̀ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.
War ko Heman, nɛ́ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ Bukia, Matania, Uziɛl, Sɛbuɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Gidalti, Rɔmamti-Ezɛr, Yɔsbɛkasa, Maloti, Hɔtir in Mahaziot;
wa nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ o bem ko Heman, wi-zɔk-mɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ we so ɗoŋ wen ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ wannu, ha̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai ha̧ a̧. Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so o be-wiwii ɓu-zua-naar in o be-okoo taar ha̧ Heman.
Dáà kɔ-wa duka so zu wa lɛŋ wen gima kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o koloŋ in o kunde wen tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɗɔɔ
Dɔka o wi nɔ‘i in o nya-wa nɛ̀ yamba bia gima ti GASA WAN nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wa pi̧i̧ tani usi nɛ̀ yuwar tom ha̧ bíí kpɔk kpɔk, kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo mgbara geɗek-wi in gasawi na, kóó mgbara wi-iŋ-gima in wi-yamba-a na mbɛt.
Kuti tani baa nɛ́ Jozɛf, bem ko Asaf. Yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Gɛdalia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa lɛŋ ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Taar-a baa nɛ́ Zakur in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Naar-a baa nɛ́ Yisɛri in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Mɔɔrɔ-a baa nɛ́ Nɛtania in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a baa nɛ́ Bukia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Yɛsarɛla in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a baa nɛ́ Yɛsaya in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a baa nɛ́ Matania in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-a baa nɛ́ Simɛi in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-kpɔk-a baa nɛ́ Azarɛl in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Hasabia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-taar-a baa nɛ́ Subaɛl in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-naar-a baa nɛ́ Matitia in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-a baa nɛ́ Yɛrɛmɔt in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a baa nɛ́ Hanania in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Yosbɛkasa in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a baa nɛ́ Hanani in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-a baa nɛ́ Maloti in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Eliyata in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk-a baa nɛ́ Hɔtir in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo-aa baa nɛ́ Gidalti in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar-a baa nɛ́ Mahaziot in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓɛɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar-a ba nɛ́ Romamti-Ezɛr in o nya-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧; wa ɓu-zua-yiitoo mbɛt.
Yuwar kɛ̧́ɛ̧́ tom ha̧ o bezaŋ Levii nɛ̀ de tom-pɛma-nú tua nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Bíí nú-gara ko Kore duka nɛ́ Mɛsɛlɛmia, bem ko Kore, be-koo Abiasaf.
O bem ko Mɛsɛlɛmia nɛ́ kaya-wi Zakarii, hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa Yɛdiaɛl, Zɛbadia nɛ́ taar-a; Yatniɛl nɛ́ naar-a,
Elam nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a, Yehohanaŋ nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Ɛlyɔnai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa.
O bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ Sɛmaya kaya-bem, Yehozabad be-ɗoŋ; Yɔa nɛ́ taar-a, Sakar nɛ́ naar-a, Nɛtanɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-a;
Amiɛl nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a; Isakar nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa; Pɛulɛtai nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-a, wen Sɔ̧ toka so de yoŋgo zu a̧.
Sɛmaya kaya-bem ko Obɛd-Edɔm koo o be-wiwii nɛ̀ yaa o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa, wen wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
O bem ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Otni, Rɛfaɛl, Obɛd, Ɛlzabad in o nya-wa, Elihu in Sɛmakia nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o bezaŋ Obɛd-Edɔm; wa in o bem kɔ-wa in o nya-wa yaa so nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí wen ŋgai nɛ̀ wa ha̧ so tɛ tom kɔ-wa. O bíí ko Obɛd-Edɔm nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo.
Mɛsɛlɛmia a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o nya in o bem ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí.
Hɔsa, ŋma bezaŋ Mɛrari a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bem. Kuti-a nɛ́ Simri nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ gasawi; a̧ bó só nɛ́ kaya-bem na, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ de kànà ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o nya-a̧.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Hilkia, taar-a nɛ́ Tɛbalia, naar-a nɛ́ Zakarii: o bem ko Hɔsa in o nya-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ ɓu-zua-taar.
O wi nɔ‘i dee nɛ́ tom-pɛma-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧. Wa in o gasawi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o tom nyɛm ŋmaa in ko o nya-wa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Wa pi̧i̧ tani ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o geɗek-wi hɔ tɛ o gasawi nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa wen pɛma o nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpɔk kpɔk.
Nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese, tani baa nɛ́ Sɛlɛmia wen pɛma mɔ. War ko bem kɔ̧-a̧ Zakarii nɛ̀ duka nɛ́ de wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, tani baa nɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ha̧ a̧.
War ko Obɛd-Edɔm duka nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ; o bem kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ.
Ko Supim in Hɔsa duka nɛ́ nú garo mɛ si yee-wese in nú tua ko Salɛkɛt nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ si fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ. Zuduk tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ duka so hee mɔ'ɔ ga:

mɛ daŋa-wese, o be Levii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ ya nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk; nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ́ bíí naar dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi-pɛm tua-a-mɔ nɛ́ bíí yiitoo yiitoo.
Nɛ̀ war Parbar mɛ si yee-wese nɛ́ bíí naar wen fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ, in bíí yiitoo wen kiitɛ Parbar.
O duk wi-pɛm-nú tua mgbara o bezaŋ Kore in o bezaŋ Mɛrari nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
O ŋma be Levii, nya-wi nɔ‘i, duka nɛ́ wi-zɔk-mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in wan nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧.
O bezaŋ Ladaŋ, tɛ nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o gasawi nutua kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ Yehiɛl,
in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, bá nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ Zɛtam in Jɔɛl. Tom kɔ-wa so nɛ́ zɔka mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
War ko o bezaŋ Amram, o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ in o bezaŋ Uziɛl,
nɛ́ Sɛbuɛl, bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ bem ko Moisɛ, a̧ duk so zu mbɔi.
Nya Sɛbuɛl nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Eliɛzɛr nya Gɛrsɔŋ, wen Eliɛzɛr koo so Rɛhabia, Rɛhabia koo Yɛsaya, Yɛsaya koo Yoram, Yoram koo Zikri, ɓɛɛ Zikri ko Sɛlɔmit.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-wi a̧ duka so nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-mbɔi in mɔ nɛ̀ wannu David, o gasawi nú tua, o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro in gɔmŋmaa bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu o wi-biro ee so ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Wa kaia so o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mgbara mɔɔ-oi-biro e nɛtɛ wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Wa kaia o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Samuɛl wi-zɔk-mɔ, Saul bem ko Kis, Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr in Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ee so nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɛlɔmit in o nya-a̧ wen zɔka-a.
War ko o bezaŋ Yisɛhar, Kɛnania in o bem kɔ‘i yaa so kɔ‘i tɛ tom-zɔka-nù in kita sɛn
War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ nɛ́ Hasabia in o nya-a̧. Wa nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí, wa lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ bíí booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; wa yaa so kɔ-wa wen zɔka tom ko o be
War ko o bezaŋ Hebrɔŋ, Yɛria duka so nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa; wa kia so tugun-wa tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ David kpaa nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ wa kpa o kpasa-bíí mgbara wa sɛn Yazɛr nú Galad.

Yɛria in o nya-wi lɛŋ nɛ́ o kpasa-bíí in o gasawi nutua; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Wannu David ee so wa zu o bezaŋ Rubɛn, o bezaŋ Gad in reeta zuduk ko Manase, wen zɔka o tom ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ, in ko wannu mbɛt.
O be
O dùk wi nɔ‘i dama kànà ɗoŋ fio-zɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ya ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o wi nɔ'ɔ:
Tɛ kuti fio-zɛ nɛ́ Yasobam, bem ko Zabdiɛl, tɛ nú-gara ko Pɛrɛs; a̧ duka nɛ́ gasawi zu wi-biro lɛŋ zaŋ fio-zɛ‘i.
Tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ́ Dɔdai be Ahɔ; gasa wi-gbak-a nɛ́ Miklot.
Tɛ taar fio-zɛ nɛ́ Bɛnaya bem ko wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada; a̧ duka nɛ́ ŋma ŋgaŋa-wi mgbara o ŋgaŋa-wi Ɓu-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi duk nɛ́ gasawi kɔ-wa. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amizabad duka nɛ́ gasa wi-gbak-a.
Tɛ naar fio-zɛ nɛ́ Asahɛl nya Jɔab, sɛka Zɛbadia bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ duka oi-aa.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ nɛ́ Samut be Izra.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk fio-zɛ nɛ́ Ira, bem ko Ikɛs be Tɛkɔa.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ́ Hɛlɛs be Pɛlɔŋ tɛ zuduk ko Efraim.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar fio-zɛ nɛ́ Sibɛkai be Husa tɛ nú-gara ko Zera.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar fio-zɛ nɛ́ Abiɛzɛr be Anatot tɛ zuduk ko Bɛnjamin.
Tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ nɛ́ Marai be Nɛtɔfa tɛ nú-gara ko Zɛra.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk fio-zɛ nɛ́ Bɛnaya be Pirɛatɔŋ, tɛ zuduk ko Efraim: duka nɛ́ o bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ́ Hɛldai be Nɛtɔfa tɛ nú-gara ko Otniɛl.
O gasawi nɛ duka zu o dùk be
ko o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ Hasabia bem ko Kemuɛl; ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ́ Sadɔk;
ko o bezaŋ Juda nɛ́ Elihu ŋma nya David; ko o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ́ Ɔmri, bem ko Mikaɛl;
ko o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ́ Yismaya bem ko Obadia; ko o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ́ Yɛrimɔt bem ko Azriɛl;
ko o bezaŋ Efraim nɛ́ Osee bem ko Azazia; koo reeta zuduk ko o bezaŋ Manase nɛ́ Jɔɛl bem ko Pɛdaya;
ko ɓii reeta zuduk o bezaŋ Manase nɛ̀ ya Galad nɛ́ Ido bem ko Zakarii; ko o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Yasiɛl bem ko Abnɛr;
ɓɛɛ ko o bezaŋ Dan nɛ́ Azarɛl bem ko Yeroam. O gasawi nɛ̀ yaa so zu o dùk be
David tɔr so o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo, in o wan nɛ̀ tɛ kpa pɛ hegɔ na, na, wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, wi tɛ de ha̧ o be
Jɔab bem ko Sɛruya ku̧u̧ so naŋ tɔra wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr kaɗi na, wen gasa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tika zu

Wi nɛ̀ duka so zu mbɔi ko wannu nɛ́ Azmavɛt, bem ko Adiɛl; ɓɛɛ ko Yɔnataŋ bem ko Uzia, a̧ duka so kɔ̧-a̧ zu o nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ wa ndɛma e ŋgɔn kɔ̧ o dam sɛn nú fɔ, sɛn tɛ o gasa ye in geɗek ye, in tɛ o fara-pɛm-mɔ mbɛt.
Ezri bem ko Kɛlub duka zu o wi-wa-fɔ.
Simɛi be Rama duka zu o wi-gun-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Zabdi be Sifmi duk kɔ‘i zu o wi-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
War ko o te-nɔ̧́ in o te-mbɔra,
Sitrai be Sarɔŋ duka zu o ndai nɛ̀ wa dai hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ Safat bem ko Adlai duk kɔ‘i zu o ndai mɛ kɔ̧ ɗoŋgɔ.
War ko o ŋgeloba, nɛ Obil bezaŋ Ismaɛl a̧ duk zu wa, ko o nana-tuifuu nɛ́ Yɛdaya be Mɛrɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ ko o sami in o gbadua nɛ́ Yaziz be Hagri. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaa so nɛ́ gasa wi-duk-zu mɔ ko wannu David.
Yɔnataŋ nɔkɔ ko David duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ duka so nɛ́ gasa wi-iŋ-mɔ in wi-yɔr-mɔ mbɛt. Yehiɛl bem ko Hakmɔni duka so nɛ́ wi-usi-mɔ ha̧ o bem ko wannu.
Ahitɔfɛl duka so nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Husa be Ark duk nɛ́ sɛm ko wannu.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ahitɔfɛl fea, nɛ́ Yehoyada bem ko Bɛnaya in Abiatar a̧ baa fara oi-aa. Gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro ko wannu duka nɛ́ Jɔab.
David mɔi̧a o gasawi
Wannu David kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya'm in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì. Mi taa so mɔ mɛ mbo Tua wen ee
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ beka mbo Tua wen nin-am na, wen mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-biro in mɛ gbaia tɔk-tɛ bíí a nù mbɛt.›
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mgbara o bem kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m, a̧ hoka nɛ́ Salomɔŋ mɛ duk zu damti ko GASA WAN zu
«Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ Salomɔŋ a̧ tɛ mbo Tua kɔ‘m in bee-gara-a, wen mi hoka a̧ nɛ̀ bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ war kɔ̧-a̧, mi tɛ duk nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Mi ɗafa yuwar mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kà a̧ nɛ́ yora nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a tɛ kasa o geŋa in o heembea kɔ‘i de nɛ̀ tom-aa.›
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, sɛn yí o be

«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ, mɛ̀ íŋ Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk nɛ̀ fee-see, wen GASA WAN we nɛ́ see-wi ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara taamɔ ko bíí lɛŋ mbɛt. Kà mɛ kii a̧, a̧ tɛ e ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ kà mɛ e a̧ duk, a̧ tɛ pi̧ mɛ nù kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, kinii, GASA WAN hoka mɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ mbo Tua nɛ̀ duk nɛ́
David tɔ̧ɔ̧ yuwar deemɔ nɛ̀ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ tɛ de lɛŋ: nú-zala, o tua nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, o fara-a-mɔ, o bɛr-tua mɛ ŋgɔn, o gɔna-bɛr-aa mɛ see-a in bɛr-tua e kuɓa mbɛt.
A̧ usa yuwar deemɔ lɛŋ n'aa taa so mɛ de tɛ bee-gara Tua ko GASA WAN, in o gɔna-bɛr-tua mɛ ká̧ a̧, fara-a-mbɔi ko Tua ko GASA WAN, in o fara-a-mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mbɛt.
A̧ usa yuwar tom ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, yuwar zɔka nyɛk in yuwar tom lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
O nyɛk nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom-aa;
o
O fara-e-brɛt ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a; yuwar dee fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr in kilo-a,
o mɔɔ-tok-kpoo, o be yèé-misi̧-yí gaŋmɔ in o ɓii nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr, sɛka o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, a̧ usa kilo-a.
A̧ usa kilo fara-dɔ-fuu nyama, yuwar dee keekee, in o
David tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m. Kalata'i usi nɛ́ ɗoŋ yuwar-tom nɔ‘i.»

Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i Salomɔŋ: «Mɛ̀ ŋgáí gba̧a̧ tɛ-mɛ. Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi mbɛt! Ká mɛ de kíì na. Ká tɛ-mɛ nak na mbɛt, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m a̧a̧ in mɛɛ. A̧ beka e mɛ duk na, in tɛ-a beka bi ɗoŋ mɛ na hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tom Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ tɛ kaɗi.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ ya wen ɗafa sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ de taamɔ nɛ̀ iŋa mgbara mɔ tɛ tom lɛŋ tɛ gbak mɛ mbɛt. O gasawi in dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ mbo zu ha̧ mɛ.»
Wannu David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ hoka, nɛ́ be-ŋgaiwi nɛ̀ kpa ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ tom-dee ɔ gasa, wen tua-wan’ɛ bo nɛ́ ko bíí na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧.

Mi ha̧a̧ ŋgai tɛ‘m lɛŋ ɗafi nɛ̀ mɔ e wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m: lɔr wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, bu-mbɔi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, boi wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ boi, te wen o mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ te, o de toka gbɛ̧ ta, in o tu̧ ta nɛ̀ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya in de ŋga ta mbɛt.
Hee mi kpaa desee sɛn tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ga, lɔr in o bu-mbɔi nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m, mi ha̧a̧ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m e zu mɔ n'am ɗafa wen sa̧a̧ tua'i.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr mɛ Ofir booro-gɔmŋmaa, in kilo sa̧a̧ bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-naar wen sɔ̧a̧-a̧ ɗoŋ o ŋgeŋ tua,
in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ lɔr, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, in wen yoɓa o wi-de-tom mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kinii mgbara'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ o a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ mɔ sɔsɔɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN o?»
Ɓɛɛ o gasawi nutua, o gasawi ko o zuduk be

wen tom ko Sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kilo lɔr booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, kɔya lɔr booro-ɓu, kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar, kilo ndɛrɛ hee booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ga, bá nɛ̀ kilo boi miliɔŋ taar.
O wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ha̧a̧ ha̧ Yehiɛl bezaŋ Gɛrsɔŋ.
Ɓɛɛ dukbíí kpa desee wen de ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ta-tɛ, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ gasa desee kɔ-wa a̧ wa ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ mɔ‘i ha̧ GASA WAN. Hegɔ, wannu David kpaa desee nyɛmna mbɛt.
David zɔna GASA WAN nɛ̀ yí giiwi lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo, zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ
Gasamɔ, ŋgai, gasa demɔ, mɔɔ-wan in hura-nin a̧ dúk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN, wen o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ yiwese in mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ɔɔ wan zu o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ duk kpasa.
Dɔka kpaamɔ in gasamɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk zu o mɔ lɛŋ. Ŋgai in ŋgayamɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er'nɛ́; ŋgai-baa-mɔ e ŋgɔn in dea-a ha̧ mɛ yor nɛ̀ nɔa-a a̧a̧ er'nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ zɔ́n nɛ ɛnɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ gásí nɛ nin'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɔ hura.
«Mi in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ ò h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa ŋgai mɛ ha̧ mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ ga o? Mɔ lɛŋ tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, hegɔ o mɔ n’ɛɛ ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́.
Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ gɛnɛ sɛn yí‘nɛ́ hee o dáà k’ɛɛ ga. Zɛ-ɛɛ zu nù'ɛ duk hee gi̧ɔ̧ ga, ŋma mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta k’ɛɛ bo na.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, o dɔka mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ n’ɛɛ ɗafa wen mboa-a nɛ̀ Tua wen sa̧a̧ nin'nɛ́, o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́.

Mi iŋa, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ we see bíí, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpɛka deemɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a. Nɛ̀ ta-tɛ, mi ha̧a̧ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see, ɓɛɛ kinii, o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ya hɛ̧ɛ̧, mi zɔka wa ha̧ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ, nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ Abraham, Izak in
War ko bem kɔ‘m Salomɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kasi o heembea, o geŋa in o
Ɓɛɛ David tɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́!» Ɓɛɛ giiwi lɛŋ zɔn GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa. Wa guu nù ti GASA WAN in ti wannu mbɛt.
Ɔɔ mɔ-sa̧ ɗoŋ wese'i, ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN,
Wa nyɔŋa mɔ nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ sɛn ti GASA WAN wese'i nɛ̀ gasa desee.
War yiitoo woyo, wa dee wan ha̧ Salomɔŋ, bem ko David, ɓɛɛ wa tɛn nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN; wa dee kpɔk mɔ‘i e nɛ̀ Sadɔk nɛ̀ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
Salomɔŋ duka zu damti ko GASA WAN hee wannu ga oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David, ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ siti. O be
O gasawi lɛŋ, o ŋgaŋa-wi in o bem ko wannu David lɛŋ mboo zu ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ.
GASA WAN dee ha̧ Salomɔŋ mɛ gasi ti gíí o be
David bem ko Jɛse ɔɔ wan zu gíí o be
Pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ zu o be
Tɛ sɔki, a̧ fee nɛ́ dé fio zaŋ mbɔi in zɔnamɔ, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ ɔ wan oi-aa.
O tom ko wannu David, o kuti-a gú nɛ̀ o sɔŋkur-aa lɛŋ yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko Samuɛl wi-zɔk-mɔ, in zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko
Ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ in o wee-mɔ nɛ kpaa a̧, o wan nɛ̀ kpaa
Salomɔŋ bem ko David yora nɛ̀ nɔa-a tɛ wan. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ duka so in a̧, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ wannu.
Salomɔŋ saa o be
A̧ yaka in giiwi lɛŋ si
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko kuɓa ko Sɔ̧, David foo so daŋnɛ nɛ̀ Kiriat-Yearim si fara n'aa ɗafa so e wen-aa, wen a̧ dee so tua-laa ha̧ a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Ɓɛɛ
Sɛn hi̧i̧, Salomɔŋ daŋa si
Mɛ zɛ‘i, Sɔ̧ hɔɔ zu ha̧ Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ ák mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ er-am.»
Salomɔŋ kifa nú ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ usa so gasa
Kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧, wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m David a̧ hɔ́ gba̧a̧, wen nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu dukbíí'ɛ nɛ̀ ɔ dɔka hee fuunu ga’ɛ.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in de taamɔ ha̧‘m, ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ nɛ́ɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti dukbíí'ɛ. Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ ɔ wan zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka hegɔ'ɔ o?»

Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Salomɔŋ: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ‘i ga, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ ak mbɔi, o kpaamɔ, kóó gasamɔ na, mɛ ak fio ko wisɛn kɔ-mɛ na, kóó duka-a zaŋnu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ aka kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in de taamɔ wen duka-a zu dukbíí kɔ‘m n'am ee mɛ zu wa ga,
mi ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in de taamɔ ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ mbɔi, o kpaamɔ in gasamɔ ha̧ mɛ, nɛ̀ o wannu nɛ̀ yaa nɛti in nɛ̀ ɗoŋ beka kpa na.»
Salomɔŋ pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀

Salomɔŋ mɔi̧a o keekee in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo n'aa kɛ̧ɛ̧ si tɛ o ye-a-mbɔi biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi-aa katɛ a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
A̧ dee ha̧ bu-mbɔi in lɔr mɛ dɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm hee ta ga, in ha̧ o te-gbatui mɛ dɔk hee o te-mbɔra ká̧ gba-tɔp
Kpar nyaŋa ko Salomɔŋ tɛ́ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ in Silisii. O wi-ɗɔr-mɔ ko wannu nɛ̀ɛ̀ hi̧fi so wa sɛn Silisii.
Gɛnɛ keekee-nyaŋa Egiptɛ nɛ̀ wa hi̧fi so piinɛ nɛ́ kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ gɛnɛ nyaŋa kpɔk nɛ́ kɔya sede gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. O wannu Hit in o wannu Aram hi̧fi so kànà kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa.
Salomɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de ŋma Tua wen nin GASA WAN in ŋma tua-wan wen kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a.
Salomɔŋ hoka o wi-tui-mɔ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o wi-gba-ta booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar mɛ de tom zu kaya in o wi-zɔk-tom booro-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Salomɔŋ toma tɔ̧ ha̧ Hiram wannu Tir hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ dee so tom in dáà kɔ‘m David, tom nɛ̀ o te-gbatui ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nɛ̀ tua-ɔɔ kɔ̧-a̧.

Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ de Tua wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ha̧‘m mɛ e ha̧ a̧, ha̧‘m mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama mɛ tur sɛn ti a̧; ha̧‘m mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ dɔ nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ, mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, mɛ wese Sabat, o wese gbaŋa, hɔɔ-yí-zɛ in o wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ; mɔ‘i tɛ de ɓɔnsɛnɛ sɛn
Ɓɛɛ Tua n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de'i ɔ gasa nyɛmna wen Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ gasa gan o sɔ̧ lɛŋ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai mɛ de ŋma Tua ha̧ a̧, nɛ̀ yiwese’ɛ in o wan mɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛm a̧ na’ɛ o? Ɓɛɛ mi so nɛ́ o sɛ́kà‘m de Tua ha̧ a̧ o? Tɛ́ duk nɛ́ géé fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ a̧ géè.

Kinii, mɛ̀ tóm ŋma bíí nɛ̀ iŋa tom-lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi, tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧, in gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, nɛ̀ iŋa sɛka mɔ mbɛt; a̧ tɛ de tom in o wi-iŋ-tom nɛ̀ a̧a̧ katɛ‘m sɛn nú Juda in sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘m David mɔi̧a so a.
Mɛ̀ tóm o te-gbatui,
ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi o te ha̧‘m nɛ̀ dɔka-a, wen Tua n'am tɛ de ɔ gasa in tɛ de nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ gɔm o te nɔ‘i, nyɔŋmɔ n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ fuu-alkamaari tɛ kilo miliɔŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, be-fon
Hiram wannu Tir yɔra mɔ tom si ɗoŋ ha̧ Salomɔŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ee nɛ̀ mɛ zu wa nɛ̀ wan.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Kinii, mi toma ŋma bíí-iŋ-tom nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ iŋamɔ ha̧ mɛ; nin-a nɛ́ Hiram-Abi,

bem ko ŋma zɔŋa Dan; dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ be Tir. A̧ iŋa dee tom lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi, ta, te, tu̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa. A̧ iŋa sɛka mɔ lɛŋ in dee tom lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ e er-a; a̧ tɛ de tom'i in o wi-iŋ-tom kɔ-mɛ, bá nɛ̀ o wi-iŋ-tom ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, Nyaa David.
Alkamaari in be-fon, nɔ̧́ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ Nyaa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ tóm tɛnɛ kinii ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
K’ɛɛ, ɛɛ tɛ gɔm o te Libaŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧; ɛɛ tɛ kai wa a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hɛra wa ba nɛ̀ yì hɔ Jafa, sɛk’ɛnɛ kaia wa daŋnɛ si Jerusalɛm.»
Salomɔŋ tɔra o gɛnɛ nɛ̀ yaa so tɛ nú
A̧ hoka o wi-tui-mɔ booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, o wi-gba-ta booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar mɛ de tom si zu kaya, in o wi-zɔk-tom booro-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ha̧ wa mɛ duk zu o gíí wi-de-tom.
Salomɔŋ ku̧u̧ naŋ mboo Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm, zu kaya Mɔriya, fara nɛ̀ GASA WAN usa so tɛ sɛnɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David sɛn fara nɛ̀ David ɗafa so, sɛn fara-gusi-alkamaari ko Ornaŋ be Jebus.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ yiitoo fio-zɛ, tɛ naar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, á̧ Salomɔŋ ku̧u̧ nɛ̀ naŋ mboo Tua'i.
Naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ yɔra wen mboa-a nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar; pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu.
Zi̧a̧ zala nyɛma ŋmaa in pɛsa tua, nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk;
A̧ aa gbáá
A̧ ɗafa gasa bɛr-tua'i nɛ̀ o de ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya. Lɔr nɛ̀ wa dee nɛnɛ nɛ́ lɔr wan mɛ Parwaim.
A̧ yɔka o kpaakpee, o te-ka̧-nú Tua, o ŋgeŋ gɔna-bɛr-tua, in o kpar-nú bɛr-tua'i nɛ̀ lɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn dap
A̧ ɗafa ŋma bɛr-tua mɛ duk nɛ́ fara nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna. Dura-a in pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu nyɛm nɛ̀ pɛsa Tua. A̧ yɔka kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ de lɔr tɛ kilo booro-ɓu-yiitoo.
O pɔndi mgboia-a yaa so kànà nɛ́ lɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ dita-wa hee reeta kilo ga. A̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr-tua mɛ́ ŋgɔn
A̧ nɔi̧a boi dui nɛ̀
Dura wɔr-ɓaa o
Ŋma wɔr-ɓaa yiitoo
Dura wɔr-ɓaa o
A̧ dee babir-laa nɛ̀ gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa, gbɛ̧-a̧ zóŋ-zóŋ, tu̧ zɔ̧-laa in yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok o
A̧ dee mbiŋ yiitoo e nú Tua: kusa-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ o gan-ndui nɛ̀ ya zu wa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
A̧ fana o kirkiti-mɔ a kɔ̧ fara nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna,
A̧ kaia o mbiŋ a ŋgɔn nú Tua: kpɔk nɛ̀ war wiiko, ɓii-aa nɛ̀ war gale; a̧ saa nin wan mɛ wiiko'e, Yakim, ɓɛɛ nin wan mɛ gale nɛ́ Boaz.
Salomɔŋ dee
A̧ nɔi̧a boi de nɛ̀ gba-kpáná-yì nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ zika-a; pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, ɗuka-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta; zika nú-a kpa ŋmaa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ dee dap ndai ká̧ zaŋ gba-kpánà‘i kpa nú ŋmaa, ndai ɓu tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ. A̧ nɔi̧a o ndai nɔ‘i katɛ ŋmaa yiitoo yiitoo kpɔk in gba-kpánà‘i.
Gba-kpánà‘i duka zu ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo: taar zɔk nɛ́ mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, taar si yee-wese, taar si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ taar si daŋa-wese. Goto-ndai lɛŋ zɔk nɛ́ ŋmaa.
Ndota gba-kpánà‘i hee bɔ̧i̧a̧ wii-see er-wi ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi nú zer-aa hee yèé-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in gba-dɛŋ ga. Kpánà‘i nyɛma mɛ ba litrɛ yì booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-yiitoo.
A̧ dee o gasa kpánà ɓu: mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war wiiko, mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war gale wen fɔra mɔ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ wa fɔr o mɔɔ-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ fɔr kɔ‘i tɛ̀ ɗɔɔ gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ.
A̧ dee o
A̧ dee fara-a-brɛt ɓu kai a kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧; a̧ ee mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war wiiko, mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ war gale. A̧ dee be ɗele-gaŋmɔ gɔmŋmaa nɛ̀ lɔr.
A̧ dee bee-gara ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in gasa bee-gara nɛ̀ o kpar-nú-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔk ɗoŋ-wa nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko gba-kpánà, a̧ baa e mgbii Tua nɛ̀ war wiiko, nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ si daŋa-wese.
Hiram dee o gasa kpánà, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ in o yèé-gaŋmɔ. A̧ kaɗa tom n'aa tɛɛ mɛ de ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧:
mbiŋ yiitoo, o kirkiti gan-ndui yiitoo nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ, o fanamɔ yiitoo wen kpee zu o gan-ndui nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ;
o waya kóɓò gɔmŋmaa-naar, nɛka-a yiitoo yiitoo wen fana-mɔ kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ kpee zu o gan-ndui nɛ̀ ya zu o mbiŋ.
A̧ dee o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà in o gasa kpánà zu wa;
gba-kpánà kpɔk nɛ̀ o ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo ya ɗɔɔ-aa,
o gasa kpánà, o mɔɔ-ɗu-mɔ, o mɔɔ-fo-kpoo in o nyɛk lɛŋ. Hiram-Abi dee mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ yɔka ndɛrɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ, wen dea-a nɛ̀ tom kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ká̧ Jurdɛn, mgbara Sukot in Sɛraedata a̧ wannu nɔi̧a o boi-de-tom nɔ‘i lɛŋ sɛnɛ ɗɔɔ gìì.
Salomɔŋ dee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ dɔka-a, wi nyɛm mɛ tɔr kilo ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ yaka na.
Salomɔŋ dee mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧:
in o lamba wen nyɛka-a ti gɔna bɛr-tua nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea; mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ a̧ dee nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr.
O do-te, o lamba, o be boi-ɓam-mɔ, lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr;
o paa, o yèé-gaŋmɔ, o be yèè, o be tasi-dɔ-fuu-nyama, a̧ dee wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr; o kpar-nú Tua, o wan mɛ bɛr

Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tom nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ dee wen Tua ko GASA WAN kaɗa nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ kai o mɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ee ha̧ Sɔ̧ tɛnɛ a fara-a-mɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧: mɛ̀ nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, lɔr in o nyɛk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Salomɔŋ mɔi̧a o gasawi
O be
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o gasawi
Wa gɔɔ kuɓa in
Wannu Salomɔŋ in o be
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔɔ
Wɔr-ɓaa o
O te-gɔ kuɓa'i dura nyɛmna; nɛ́ tɛ yora-a mgbara kuɓa in nú tua sɛka'i zɔka ndɔŋ nú-wa, nɛ bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ zan na. O te nɔ‘i a̧ ya kànà hi̧i̧ hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i.
Ŋma mɔ bo so kɔ̧ kuɓa'i na, kànà nɛ́ ta yiitoo nɛ̀ Moisɛ aa so kɔ̧ a̧ sɛn Hɔrɛb, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ gboo nɛ̀ kɔ̧
O be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima, Asaf, Heman, Yedutun, o bem kɔ-wa in o nya-wa nɛ̀ pi̧i̧ o yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa kaia kɔ-wa nɛ́ o kuŋge, o kunde in o koloŋ ya ti
O tiger o wi-bii-gima in o wi-dɔm-mbia lɛŋ yee ŋmaa gasi nɛ̀ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ giti mbia kur, kà giti ger o kuŋge in o mɔɔ-de-saa nɔ̧́í̧, ɓɛɛ wa zɔna GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«A̧ ɔ dee,
Tura-zan duna Tua ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm so mɛ ya hi̧i̧ wen tom kɔ-wa na, wen zu tura-zan'i, wen nɛ̀ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN duna kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Salomɔŋ tɔ̧a̧:
«GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e wi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk zaŋ tum!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu'nɛ́ a̧‘m dee nɛ̀ gba de Tua’ɛ
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk sɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Wannu zika tɛ, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o be
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ wese n'am gboo nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ, mi hok ŋma ye kóó kpɔk mgbara zuduk be
Mi hoka nɛ́ Jerusalɛm ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk sɛnɛ, in David mɛ ɔ wan zu
Salomɔŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Dáà kɔ‘m David taa so mɔ mɛ de Tua wen nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m David'e: ‹Taamɔ kɔ-mɛ mɛ de Tua wen nin-am'i ɔ dee.
Mɔ kpɔk, bo nɛ mɛ a̧ tɛ de Tua'i ha̧‘m na, mɛ̀ nɛ́ bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ mɛ koa a̧ tɛ de dea-a.›
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i hɔɔ gba̧a̧. Mi ɔɔ wan oi dáà kɔ‘m David, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am duka zu damti
ɓɛɛ mi ba kuɓa fara nɛ̀
Salomɔŋ yora ti
A̧ mboo so ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ bee-gara'i, zi̧a̧-a̧ in pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta hee ŋmaa ga, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta. A̧ daŋa yor sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ zugur-aa nù ti o be
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ́nɛ́ kasa o
Kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
«Nɛ mbetɛ Sɔ̧ nyɛma mɛ de ye in o bíí zu nù'ɛ nde? Yiwese’ɛ in o wan mɛ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ nyɛm'nɛ́ na’ɛ, sɛ́kà bó nɛ̀ Tua’ɛ n'am mboa’ɛ nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ gɔma-er in aia-nú ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sara in mɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ak er'nɛ́ sɔsɔɔ‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k Tua’ɛ zɛ nɛ̀ wese; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ sitɛ fara n’ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so'e, nin-wi tɛ duk sɛnɛ wó‘i! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ak in'nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn hɛ̧ɛ̧!
Kà wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
«Kà ŋma bíí de ɗaŋmɔ in ŋma-a, kà‘i de ha̧ a̧ mɛ kan mɔ nɛ̀ fom, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ kán mɔ‘i ti

ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese mɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, pi̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ usa wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a de nɛ̀ mɔ in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a mbɛt.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wisɛn tɛ gan
ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen'i sɛn yiwese mɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko o be
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ yiwese tɛ kpe, nɛ̀ kórò beka bo na, wen nɛ̀ dukbíí dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́, kà wa kɔfi mɔ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧, gasi nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́, kà wa e ɗaŋmɔ duk wen n’ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ bɔnɛ zu wa,
ɓɛɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ-wa sɛn yiwese mɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́

«Kóó nɛ́ kaɓa a̧ tika nù, kóó nɛ́ ŋga-zɛɛ-geŋa, kóó nɛ́ mɔ a̧ gbɛɛ dua, kóó nɛ́ laambam, kóó nɛ́ kooŋa̧i̧ in gba-dɔya a̧ tika nù, kóó nɛ́ wisɛn a̧ kɛra ye e nù, kóó nɛ́ ge ŋgamɔ ge, kóó nɛ́ ge zɛɛ ge,
kóó nɛ́ ge kɔfa-sɔ̧ ge in aia-nú ko ŋma bíí, kóó nɛ́ ko ŋma be
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese, fara n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk sɛnɛ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧, wen n’ɛnɛ iŋa kɔ̧ see-aa; mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk a̧ iŋa kɔ̧ see bíí ɓɛɛ.
Hegɔ‘i, wa tɛ yu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa baa yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ wese lɛŋ tɛ duka-a zu nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ.
«Kóó nɛ́ gɛnɛ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ be
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese fara n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk sɛnɛ‘i; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ gɛnɛ aka er'nɛ‘i, wen ha̧ o dukbíí zu nù lɛŋ mɛ iŋ nin'nɛ́, ha̧ wa mɛ yu'nɛ́ hee
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ-wa sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ tom wa si sɛnɛ‘i, kà wa kɔfi mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ zik nɛ̀ tɛ-wa sitɛ ye n’ɛnɛ hoka in sitɛ Tua n'am mboo wen nin'nɛ́‘i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ-wa sɛn yiwese mɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák wa.

«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ de ɗaŋmɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́, wen ŋma bíí nɛ̀ de ɗaŋmɔ na, bo na; ŋgimbi nɛ̀ see'nɛ́ tɛ tu̧ zu wa, ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ e wa kɔ̧ er o wisɛn kɔ-wa, in ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ-wa tɛ kai wa nɛ̀ bara sitɛ ŋma nù nɛ̀ ɔ nyɛi̧a, kóó nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ na mbɛt,
kà wa ta mɔ tɛ nù nɛ̀ wa de bara sɛnɛ‘i, kà wa kifi see-wa, ai nɛ̀ nú, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɛɛ yɔɔ kaya, ɛɛ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ,›

kà wa pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ see kpɔk in nɛ̀ kiitɛ-wa lɛŋ tɛ nù ko o wisɛn nɛ wa kaia wa si sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ kà wa kɔfi mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́, si war nù kɔ-wa, nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa, kà wa zik tɛ-wa sitɛ ye n’ɛnɛ hoka in sitɛ Tua n'am mboo wen nin'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sɛn yiwese, fara n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ in aia-nú kɔ-wa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák wa, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dee ti'nɛ́‘i ha̧ wa.
«Kinii, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ o kɔfa-sɔ̧ nɛ̀‘i kɔfi fara’ɛ.
Hegɔ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii fara-ɔm-tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ in kuɓa fara nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk sɛnɛ‘i!
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, yuwar-kpasa-a a̧ dúk tɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́
hee laa-pi̧-tɛ ga;
o wi-mbo-zu h’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ kpa nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ̧ zɔka sɔnti wi
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ demɔ n’ɛnɛ dee in David wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ kɔfa sɔ̧ kaɗi, ŋma wee tika nù nɛ̀ yiwese tɛ́ɛ̀ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in o ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN dun Tua.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm so mɛ ye Tua ko GASA WAN na, wen gasamɔ ko GASA WAN duna Tua'i.
O be
Wannu in o be
Wannu Salomɔŋ ɗafa sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ndai booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo, o sami in o gbadua booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-yiitoo. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wannu in o be
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yaa so fara-tom kɔ-wa. O be Levii a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-mbɛr ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ wannu David ɗafa so, usi nɛ̀ gima wen zɔna-a nɛ̀ a̧‘e: «
Salomɔŋ ee bee-gara nɛ̀ duk ti Tua ko GASA WAN nɛtɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧; nɛ́ hi̧i̧ á̧ à̧
Salomɔŋ dee gbaŋa tɛ ŋgimbi'i. O be
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ a̧ wa dee nɛ̀ gasa yɔyɛ káɗá gbaŋa, wen nɛ̀ wa dee so gbaŋa

Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ zɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar yaka tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Salomɔŋ foo dukbíí lɛŋ si ɗoŋ fara kɔ-wa; kóó o ndé sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ga̧a̧-see, wa lɛŋ duka nɛ̀ desee wen demɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee so in David, in Salomɔŋ, gú nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘i,
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ kaɗa nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN in tua-wan, in mɔ n'aa taa so mɛ de sɛn kɔ̧ o tua nɔ‘i yiitoo'i kaɗi,
mɛ zaŋzɛ, GASA WAN hɔɔ zu ha̧ Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi zia kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi hok fara’ɛ ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ tua-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Kà‘m kpe yiwese, ɓɛɛ kà kórò hɔ na, kà‘m ha̧ nú‘m ha̧ o gba-dɔya mɛ ɗaŋ nù, kà‘m tom ŋga-zɛɛ-geŋa pi̧ zu dukbíí kɔ‘m,
kà o bíí kɔ‘m n'am saa nin-am zu wa mɔk see, kà wa kɔfi sɔ̧, kà wa kii sɔnti'm, e nɛ̀ o ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa duk, kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk yiwese mɛ zii nɛnɛ, mi tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ mi kpasa nù kɔ-wa.
Kinii, yí‘m beka yu tɛ-wa na, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ yeŋ zer-am tɛ kɔfa'm nɛ̀ wa kɔfi fara’ɛ.
Kinii, mi hoka Tua’ɛ, mi ea a̧ nɛtɛ mbɛt ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk sɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo; yí‘m in see-am tɛ duk sɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, kà mɛ nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ̀ ti'm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ-mɛ David nɛ̀ɛ̀ so ga, kà mɛ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ mboozu in nɛ̀ yuwar-a, kà mɛ kasi o heembea in o yuwar duka-a kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ de ha̧ damti kɔ-mɛ mɛ yor hee mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛnɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ David'e, ŋma bíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk zu damti
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zik tɛ‘nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e o geŋa in o heembea kɔ‘m n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ duk, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ gasi o ŋma sɔ̧ gbɛ nɛ̀ zugur'nɛ́ nù ti wa,
mi tɛ zuɗi'nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ nù n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́; mi tɛ ba yí‘m yinɛ zu Tua n'am hoka mɛ e nin-am sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ mi dea a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-zɛŋ in mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o dukbíí lɛŋ.
«Ɗɛɗɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir ká̧ kusa Tua’ɛ tɛ gɔn, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN dee mɔ nɛ̀ nù'ɛ in Tua’ɛ hegɔ ge?›

Bíí tɛ kifi nú ha̧ wa'e: ‹Nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa ee GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kaia wa gbonɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ duk; wa ndaɗa in o ŋma sɔ̧, wa gbɛɛ zugur-wa nù ti wa, gasi nɛ̀ wa mbɛt; nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i sa GASA WAN fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu wa.› »
Ɗoŋ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo nɛ̀ Salomɔŋ mboo nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN in kiitɛ tua kɔ‘i kaɗi,
a̧ ɗafa o gasa ye nɛ̀ Hiram ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ e ha̧ o be
Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ɛ̀ bi Hamat-Soba, ɓɛɛ ba.
A̧ ɗafa Tadmɔr sɛn ŋga-gbárà in o ye-a-mɔ lɛŋ n'aa mboo so nú Hamat mɛ.
Salomɔŋ mboo ye Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ŋgɔn in Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ mɛ ɗɔɔ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye-ŋgárá nɛ̀ o gasa garo zika so kpa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa kpee nú-a nɛ̀ o ŋga kpar-nú-a.
Salomɔŋ mboo Balat in o ye-a-mɔ sɛnɛ, o gasa ye wen aa o keekee-nyaŋa, in o ye ko o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa. Salomɔŋ mboo mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ de sɛn Jerusalɛm mbɛt, sɛn Libaŋ in tɛ nù nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ a̧ lɛŋ.
O ŋma bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna so nɛ́ o be Hit, o be Amɔr, o be Periz, o be Hiv in o be Jebus nɛ̀ bo so nɛ́ o be
Salomɔŋ kaia bezaŋ dukbíí nɔ‘i nɛ̀ o be
Salomɔŋ e ŋma be
O gasa wi-duk-zu o gasa bíí ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. Nɛ́ wa a̧ ya zu o bíí lɛŋ.
Salomɔŋ foo kɔ‘i boko-bem ko wannu Egiptɛ gbonɛ tɛ
Ɓɛɛ Salomɔŋ
Dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk, Salomɔŋ ɗafi kànà nɛ́ sɔ̧ nɛ̀

A̧ ɗafa dùk o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ e tɛ tom kɔ-wa, o be Levii tɛ tom-pɛma-mɔ wen zɔna mɔ in dee tom nɛ̀ yí o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk, sɛka o wi-pɛm-nú tua nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ dùk-wa tɛ nutua kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt hee taamɔ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David usa so ga. Geŋa ko David bíí ko Sɔ̧ duka so hee mɔ‘i ga.
Wa yak zu geŋa ko David zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, zu o be Levii, zu mɔ lɛŋ in zu mbɔi na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ tom ko Salomɔŋ lɛŋ hɔɔ nɛ̀ gba̧a̧, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ́ wese n'aa baa nɛ̀ naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ kaɗa nɛnɛ.
Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ɛ̀ si Ɛsiɔŋ-Gebɛr in si Elat sɛn ká̧ gba-tɔp nú Edɔm.

Hiram toma o gasa kombon gú nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ iŋa tom-yì nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i ha̧ Salomɔŋ. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ̀ in o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ hɔ Ofir, ɓɛɛ wa kai lɔr hee kilo booro-ɓu-zua-taar ga piinɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ.

Wannu-okoo Saba zia nyɛrɛ hura-nin Salomɔŋ, ɓɛɛ kur tɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ we a̧ nɛ̀ o sumgba. A̧ kura tɛ nɛ̀ zɔm mbɔi nyɛmna: o ŋgeloba nɛ̀ tui nɛ́ o nɔ̧́-nyama, lɔr in o de ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ɔ dɔka nyɛmna. A̧ tɛɛ in o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen ee a̧. Ŋgimbi n'aa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ko Salomɔŋ kaɗi, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ o mɔ n'aa ta kɔ̧ see-aa lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.
Salomɔŋ kifa nú tɛ akamɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ. Ŋma ɗuka akamɔ nɛ̀ wannu kifi nú sɛnɛ na, bo na.
Wannu-okoo Saba zɔka iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko Salomɔŋ, tua n'aa mboo so,

o nyɔŋmɔ sɛn zu fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, fara-ɔɔ ko o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, yuwar duka-a ko o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ in laa kɔ-wa, o kpoo-sɔ̧ n'aa ha̧ so nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN; a̧ zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ hiɗ‘a gɔn.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Nyɛrɛ mɔ zu tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n'am zia tɛ nù kɔ‘m mɛ‘i nɛ́ kpasawen nɛ̀ mbetɛ!
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk nɛ̀ gbaayí‘m, ɓɛɛ sɛka'm kpɛka. Wa tɔ̧ so géé be reeta iŋamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m na! Duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ gana hura nin'nɛ́ n'am zia so nyɛrɛ-a.
Sɔnti o bíí in o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ya katɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ zii nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dee.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ee'nɛ́ zu damti hee wannu ga, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧
A̧ ha̧a̧ kilo lɔr booro-taar nɛ reeta, o dak nɔ̧́-nyama nɛ̀ dɔka-a in o de toka-ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya ha̧ wannu. Wi tɛ zɔk so pɛrti dɔka nɔ̧́-nyama hegɔ nɛti na.
O wi-de-tom ko Hiram in ko wannu Salomɔŋ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so Ofir kaia lɔr, o te-nyama in o ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya piinɛ mbɛt.
Wannu kaia o ŋga te nɔ‘i de nɛ̀ gaŋgala Tua ko GASA WAN in ko wannu; a̧ dee nɛ̀ o koloŋ in o kunde ha̧ o wi-mbɛr-mɔ mbɛt. Wi tɛ zɔk so pɛrti mɔ hegɔ sɛn nú Juda hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Wannu Salomɔŋ ha̧a̧ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ dee tɛ wannu-okoo Saba gan mɔ n'aa kaia tɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ. Wannu-okoo Saba sii ɗoŋ in o bíí kɔ‘i si nù kɔ‘i.
Tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk, lɔr nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ kpa nɛ́ kilo booro-ɓu-yiitoo.
Wi tɔr o lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ̀ o wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ, o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ, o wannu Arabii in o wannu zu zika-nù kai tɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Salomɔŋ na.
Wannu Salomɔŋ nɔi̧a lɔr de nɛ̀ o gasa ŋgee-biro tɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo; kpɔk ŋgee ba nɛ́ kilo lɔr mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
A̧ duia o geɗek ŋgee-biro tɛ gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ lɔr lɛŋ; kpɔk ŋgee kpɔk ba nɛ́ kilo lɔr taar. Wannu kaia a kɔ̧ gɔna bɛr-tua nɛ‘i sa'e Kombo-Libaŋ.
A̧ dee ŋma gasa damti gba̧a̧-nin fɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ wa nɔ̧́í̧ lɔr a ɗoŋ-aa.
Fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ damti'i a̧a̧ ɗoŋ ŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ lɔr. Wa dee fara-a-er in fara-a-tui-er nɛ̀ ká̧ damti'i, ɓɛɛ wa mbo o dila yiitoo nɛ̀ lɔr e ká̧ fara-a-tui-er nɔ‘i.
O dila ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛk nɛ̀ war wiiko in nɛ̀ war gale ká̧ damti. Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ tɛ de tɛ ŋma mɔɔ-wan hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Wa dee mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ ko wannu Salomɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ̀ lɔr; o nyɛk kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua Kombo-Libaŋ, wa duia so lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ lɔr, ŋma bíí nɛ̀ pi̧ so kɔ‘i nú ɗoŋ bu-mbɔi tɛ ŋgimbi ko wannu Salomɔŋ bo so kɔ‘i na.

Wannu Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o kombon nɛ̀ duka kai mɔ si Tarsis, ɓɛɛ nɛ ó wi-de-tom ko Hiram a ba baa wa. Ɗoŋ pɛ taar lɛŋ, o kombon nɔ‘i kai nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ̀ Tarsis mɛ piinɛ: nɛ́ tui lɔr, bu-mbɔi, nin-fɔrɔ in o dawa bá nɛ̀ o nɔ̧́í̧-gɔ-tɛ.
Wannu Salomɔŋ gana so dɔka wannu zaŋnu lɛŋ nɛ̀ kpaamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ.
O dɔka wannu kia so mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk Salomɔŋ wen zia iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧.
Kóó o ndé ba nɛ war ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ta-tɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧: o mɔ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, in lɔr, o laa, o boi-biro, o nɔ̧́-nyama, o nyaŋa in o sunda ti pɛ nɛ̀ yak lɛŋ.
Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ fara wen aa o nyaŋa tɛ booro-naar, o keekee in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo n'aa kaia a sɛn tɛ ye-a-boi-biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi-aa katɛ a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
