A̧ gana so dɔka wannu lɛŋ ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ̀ Efrat mɛ si hɔ nù ko o be Filistii hɔ
Ŋgimbi wan ko Salomɔŋ, bu-mbɔi yaa Jerusalɛm hee géé ta ga,
Kpar nyaŋa ko Salomɔŋ tɛ so nɛ̀ Egiptɛ in nɛ̀ o ŋma nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Oi nyɛrɛ ko Salomɔŋ tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko Nataŋ
Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan pɛ ɓu-naar sɛn Jerusalɛm zu o be
Salomɔŋ fea siɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn ye ko Dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Roboam ɔ wan oi-aa.
Roboam nɛɛ si Sikɛm, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat zia nɛ̀ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧-a̧ Egiptɛ, wen a̧ yuu so mɔ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ duk nɛnɛ hi̧i̧.
Wa pi̧i̧ tom sa a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ in o be
«Dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ee so gasa bɔnɛ zu yɛ. K’ɛɛ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ŋma nú ŋga tom-bara ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dita kpáŋá n'aa pi̧i̧ ger yɛ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ de tom h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ‘m ɗoŋ zɛ taar.» Hegɔ wa yaka.
Wannu Roboam aka mbɔrɔ er o gasawi nɛ̀ dee so tom ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kpasa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m kifi nú ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ hee ge?»
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e tɛ‘nɛ́ hee wi-de-tom ga ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ sɔsɔɔ, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de tom ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kifi nú ha̧ wa nɛ̀ de-a, wa tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!»
Roboam ee mbɔrɔ nɛ̀ o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ak mbɔrɔ ko o gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ de tom ha̧ a̧;
a̧ aka wa: «Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hee ge? Kifa-nú n’ɛɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m, a̧‘m bá ŋma nú ŋga tom nɛ dáà kɔ‘m aa wi sɛnɛ yinɛ wó'ɛ hee ge?»

O gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nú ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ee so ŋga tom zu wi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ŋma nú-a yinɛ wó‘i ndé, bekete er'nɛ́ gana guntir dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́;

ku̧u̧naŋ-a kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘i pi̧i̧ dita kpáŋá ger-wa ga, kɔ‘i, wi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ diti diti siti; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ‘i usa so mɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ géé nyasi ga, kɔ‘i, wi tɛ gusi wa nɛ̀ o ndoi nɛ̀ boi a̧a̧ nú-a.»
Ɗoŋ zɛ taar, Jeroboam in dukbíí lɛŋ mɔi̧a kpa ŋmaa ti Roboam nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen n'aa ba tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e, wa a̧ píí ɗoŋ tɛ-wi ɗoŋ zɛ taar wó‘i.
Wannu Roboam kifa ɗaŋ nú ha̧ wa, e mbɔrɔ ko o gasawi duk.

A̧ kifa nú ha̧ wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mbɔrɔ ko o gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ hegɔ: «Dáà kɔ‘m ee so ŋga tom zu'nɛ́; kɔ‘m, mi tɛ e mbe-a zu-a; dáà kɔ‘m usa so mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ o géé nyasi, kɔ‘m, mi tɛ usi mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ o ndoi nɛ̀ boi a̧a̧ nú-a.»
Wannu kɔ̧ so mɛ zii wen ko dukbíí na, wen nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dee hegɔ, ha̧ wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Jeroboam nɛ̀ nú Ahiya be Silo mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ so mɛ zii wen nú dukbíí na ga, o be
Ɓɛɛ o be
Mɔ kpɔk, Roboam ɔɔ kànà wan zu o be
Wannu Roboam toma Adoram wi-duk-zu tom-bara si sɛn zu o be
Tugun dee ŋgazu ko o be
Roboam hɔɔ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o bíí nutua ko Juda in ko Bɛnjamin; o ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar wen bíí o be
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen ha̧ bíí kɔ‘i Sɛmaya hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Roboam bem ko Salomɔŋ, wannu Juda, ha̧ o bíí Juda in o bíí nutua ko Bɛnjamin bá nɛ̀ o gíí be
tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ o nya'nɛ́ o be
Roboam duka sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo o ye-ŋgárá sɛn nù Juda.
A̧ ɗafa o ye nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ de-a: Bɛtlɛhɛm, Etam, Tɛkɔa,
Bɛt-Sur, Soko, Adulam,
Gat, Marɛsa, Zif,
Adɔrayim, Lakis, Azɛka,
Sɔrɛa, Ayalɔŋ in Hebrɔŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o ye-ŋgárá sɛn nù Juda in Bɛnjamin.
A̧ dee ha̧ o ye nɔ‘i mɛ ŋgai nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o gasawi zu wa. A̧ mɔi̧a o nyɔnɔ, o nɔ̧́ in o dɔ̧ɔ̧ a sɛnɛ.
Ye nɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o ŋgee in o sɛ́ɛ̀. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu o ye-ŋgárá nɔ‘i a̧ Juda in Bɛnjamin duka nɛnɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa sɛn
O be Levii kura e o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa in o nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ duk, kur pii sɛn Juda de ye Jerusalɛm, wen Jeroboam in o bem kɔ‘i lɛŋ dora wa tɛ tom ɗafa GASA WAN.
Jeroboam hoka so o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ‘i mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ tɛ o
O wi nɛ̀ ndaka pata o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ́ o be
Wa dee ha̧ nù Juda mɛ kpa ŋgai ɓɛɛ wa yor ɗoŋ Roboam bem ko Salomɔŋ tɛ pɛ taar, wen a̧ ndaka so ɗoŋ tom ko David in Salomɔŋ tɛ pɛ taar nɔ‘i.
Kóò nɛ̀ Roboam baa nɛ́ Mahalat boko-bem ko Yɛrimɔt, bem ko David. Nàà kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Abihayil, boko-bem ko Eliab, bezaŋ Jɛse.
Mahalat koo o bem taar ha̧ a̧; nin-wa nɛ́ Yɛus, Sɛmaria in Zaham.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ Mahalat, a̧ baa nɛ́ Maka boko-bem ko Absalɔm ko nɛ̀ Abiya, Atai, Ziza in Sɛlɔmit.

Maka boko-bem ko Absalɔm baa so see Roboam nyɛmna gan oi o dɔka kóò kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ n'aa baa, gú nɛ̀ o kóò-mɛ-zan mbɛt. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ kóò ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, o kóò-mɛ-zan ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko be-wiwii ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, in be-okoo ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Roboam ee Abiya bem ko Maka zu o bem kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ bem’ɛi mɛ ɔ wan.
Roboam a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ taamɔ mɛ a o bem kɔ‘i dam zu nù Juda, in zu nú Bɛnjamin gú nɛ̀ o ye-ŋgárá lɛŋ. A̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai okoo ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Roboam iŋa'e, er-wi nɔa nɛ̀ de-a, in wi mgbita tɛ wan nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, a̧ bɛ̧ɛ̧ heembea ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o be
Zaŋ mɔɔrɔ pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Roboam, Sisak wannu Egiptɛ tɛɛ bi Jerusalɛm, wen wa tu̧u̧ so see GASA WAN.
Wannu Egiptɛ tɛɛ bi Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ keekee tɛ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk gú nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro, o be Libii, o be Suki in o be Etiopii nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na;
a̧ baa o ye-ŋgárá nù Juda, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔ Jerusalɛm.
O be-wan zu o be

Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN zɔka'e, wa guu nù ti wi de nɛ̀ ko nɛ̀ tɛ-wa, a̧ kifa nú ha̧ Sɛmaya hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wa guu nù ti'm, mi beka bi wa ɓɔna, mi tɛ kpasi wa; ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m beka kur in Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ er Sisak ɓɔna.
Mɔ kpɔk, wa tɛ kifi wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧; hegɔ tɛ mɔ‘i, wa tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ, kóó mɛ̀ nɛ́ dee tom ha̧‘m, kóó dee tom ha̧ o ŋma gɔni nù a̧ dea nde.»
Sisak wannu Egiptɛ bìí Jerusalɛm, a̧ kaia mbɔi kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, in ko wannu; a̧ e mɔ kpɔk duk na. A̧ kaia kànà o ŋgee lɔr nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ duia so mbɛt.
Wannu Roboam tɛɛ dui nɛ́ o ŋgee ndɛrɛ ha̧ o wi-biro kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ-wa wen pɛma nú tua-wan a oi o ŋgee nɔ‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu mɔi̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, o wi-biro tɛɛ kai o ŋgee nɔ‘i nɛnɛ, sɛka wa kaia piinɛ ɗoŋ woyo e fara-pɛm-mɔ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Roboam dee ko nɛ̀ tɛ, gɔm nɛ̀ er ga, nyimsea ko GASA WAN kaɗa. Bo nɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ ŋgimbi biro nɔ‘i a̧ ɗaŋa na, wen o ŋma demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna kànà sɛn Juda.

Wannu Roboam mgbita tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm ɓɛɛ kpa ŋgai. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-naar ŋgimbi n'aa baa nɛ̀ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ duka tɛ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo sɛn Jerusalɛm, ye nɛ̀ GASA WAN hoka mgbara o zuduk be
Roboam dee ɗaŋmɔ wen a̧ e so see-aa tɛ kia GASA WAN na.
O tom ko Roboam tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Tom ko Sɛmaya
Roboam fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ katɛ o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ
Tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ wan ko Jeroboam, Abiya ɔɔ wan Juda.
A̧ ɔɔ wan pɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin naa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Mikaya boko-bem ko Uriɛl be Gibea.
Abiya in Jeroboam bìí ŋmaa.
O ŋga wi-biro nɛ yaa ɗoŋ Abiya nɛ booro-gɔmŋmaa-naar, ɓɛɛ ko Jeroboam nɛ o ŋgaŋa wi-biro booro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ iŋa biro nyɛmna.
Abiya daŋa yor zu kaya Sɛmaraim mgbara kaya Efraim ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Jeroboam in o be
Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋ‘e nde, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ Jeroboam bem ko Nɛbat wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ bem ko David kur de ŋgazu in wan kɔ‘i.
Wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ na in o wi-zuzu mɔi̧a yor ɗoŋ Abiya, ɓɛɛ wa de ŋgazu in Roboam bem ko Salomɔŋ nɛ duka so nɛ be-ŋgaiwi nɛ taamɔ ɗuk so na; Roboam nyɛm mɛ yor ti wa na.
Hegɔ kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ ba nɛ zu duk nɛ mɔɔ-wan nɛ GASA WAN ee er bezaŋ David. Ɛnɛ nɛ o gba gii wi-biro, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ a̧a̧ nɛ o mboo be ndai nɛ Jeroboam dee nɛ lɔr h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gasi hee Sɔ̧ ga.

Ɛ́nɛ́ ndaka o kpasa wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bem ko Arɔŋ, o be Levii, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ hok nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ hee o ŋma nu de ga. Bíí nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ be ndai in vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ hoka a̧ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kpasa sɔ̧ na.
«War k’ɛɛ, GASA WAN nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ e a̧ duk na. O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ in o be Levii nɛ ya tɛ tom kɔ-wa.

Mɛ tutuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ, wa ha̧ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ in fuu-nyama, wan mɛ dɔa-a ha̧ GASA WAN; o brɛt wan mɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ya zu fara-e-nyɔŋmɔ; ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ, wa e nɛ wee tɛ o lamba nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr. Ɛɛ ndak k’ɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ o usamɔ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ ee a̧ duk.
Ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ wan k’ɛɛ, o wi-ɗaf'aa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ duk zu naŋ mɛ dɔm mɔ wen bíí‘nɛ́. O be
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Jeroboam aa so o ŋma wi-biro nɛ gbaa mbaŋtol zik wa, o be Juda nɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ o be
O be Juda kpee naŋ mɔ ɓɛɛ zɔk'e biro a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ti in nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt. Wa aia nu ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔma o mbia kaɗi.
O be Juda gaia mɔ-biro; ŋgimbi nɛ wa hiɗi nɛ mɔ, Sɔ̧ gusa Jeroboam in o be
O be
Abiya in o bíí kɔ‘i gbɛɛ o be
Tɛ o be
Abiya ndaka ɗoŋ Jeroboam, ɓɛɛ kai o gasa ye kɔ̧-a̧: Bɛtɛl, Yesana bá nɛ̀ Efrɔŋ gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ zii nɛ wa.
Jeroboam kpa ŋgai woyo hee kuti-a ga tɛ ŋgimbi ko Abiya na. Mɛ ɗoŋ, GASA WAN gusa a̧ gbɛ.
Nɛ war ko Abiya, ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ dɔk dɔk siti. A̧ kaia okoo ɓu-zua-naar ko nɛ o be-wiwii ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo in o be-okoo ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Oi o tom ko Abiya, o mɔ n'aa dea, o yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in o tom kɔ̧-a̧ yɔra zaŋ kalata ko Ido
A̧ fea ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ tɛ
Asa dee mɔ nɛ̀ de-a in nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i.
A̧ dee ha̧ gasa gɔni sɔ̧ mɛ kaɗi; a̧ gbina o kusa
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Juda mɛ kii GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáa kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ bá o heembea in o geŋa de nɛ̀ tom.
Asa ɗaŋa o fara gasi géé-sɔ̧ in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama yinɛ tɛ o ye Juda lɛŋ; hegɔ nù duka tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ŋgimbi-wan kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i, ŋma bíí ba biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧ na, wen GASA WAN nɛ̀ ta-tɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ so ga̧a̧mɔ ha̧ a̧.

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Juda: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗáfí ye-ŋgárá nɔ'ɔ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbó o garo zik nɛ̀ wa kpa in o gasa tua-pɛm-mɔ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé o nú-a in o mɔɔ-mana-a wen nù a̧a̧ tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛn ti yɛ, wen ɛɛ mboo zu ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; tɛ mboozu k’ɛɛ‘i, ɛɛ kpaa ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ fara lɛŋ.» Hegɔ wa dee tom'i hɔ gba̧a̧.

Asa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ o be Juda tɛ booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ kai nɛ́ o gasa ŋgee in o sɛ́ɛ̀, in o wi-biro be Bɛnjamin booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; wa yaa nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ boi-biro kɔ-wa nɛ́ geɗek ŋgee in o góò. Wa lɛŋ so nɛ́ o ŋga wi-biro.
Zɛra be Etiopii baa biro dúk nɛ̀ wa; a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ bíí miliɔŋ kpɔk in o keekee-biro gɔmŋmaa-taar, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ hegɔ hɔ sɛn Marɛsa.
Asa gboo yor ti a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ba biro dúk nɛ̀ ŋmaa sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sefata sɛn ká̧ Marɛsa.

Asa aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN, ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara ɓɔsa bíí in ŋga bíí yak zu'nɛ́, bo na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; wen ɛɛ ɛk tɛ yɛ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ nɛnɛ mɛ bi gíí wi-biro nɔ'ɔ. Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ ŋma bíí mɛ gan'nɛ na.»
GASA WAN dee ha̧ biro mɛ ba o be Etiopii ti Asa in ti o be Juda, ɓɛɛ wa yu mɔ.
Asa in o bíí kɔ‘i ndaka wa hɔ Gerar; wa kuma lɛŋ, ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa kpasi na, wen ŋgai biro kɔ-wa gbina so ti GASA WAN in ti o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧. O bíí ko Asa pia nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Wa bìì o ye lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya zik Gerar wen GASA WAN pi̧i̧ so gasa kíì tɛ o bíí ye nɔ‘i; wa kaia o mɔ saaye nɔ‘i lɛŋ wen mbɔi a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ ɔ dɔka.
Wa gbina o ɓoramɔ mbɛt, kai nɛ̀ o ndai, o sami in o ŋgeloba nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ si sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Azaria bem ko Odɛd nɛ̀

gboo yor ti Asa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu Asa in o be Juda gú nɛ̀ o be Bɛnjamin, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m! GASA WAN a̧a̧ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ in a̧. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kii a̧, a̧ tɛ e h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e a̧ duk, a̧ tɛ e'nɛ́ duk mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi yaka nɛ̀ dɔka-a
Hegɔ, sɛn tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ kɔ-wa, wa pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi'i, ga̧a̧mɔ bo so kà‘i yar nɛnɛ na, wen o foomɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ o bíí.
O zuduk bíí in o ye bi so nɛ́ o ŋmaa wen Sɔ̧ pi̧i̧ so o ŋgamɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zu wa.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɔi na, wen ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Asa zia wen ko
Asa mɔi̧a o be Juda in o be Bɛnjamin, o be Efraim, o be Manase in o be Simɛɔŋ wen o dɔka be
Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛ taar fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Asa sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Wa ɗafa sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN wese'i nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ wa kaia so piinɛ: o ndai gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in o sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Wa yora zu
Ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé nɛ̀ kii GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wa kàná mɔ ti GASA WAN nɛ̀ hee ger, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ, dɔm nɛ̀ mbia in zak.
Ɓɛɛ o be Juda lɛŋ kpa desee tɛ kanamɔ‘i. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa kàná mɔ‘i nɛ̀ see-wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ desee wen kia GASA WAN ga, GASA WAN ee ha̧ wa mɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ ha̧ wa sɛn tɛ
Wannu Asa foo nàà kɔ‘i Maka tɛ tom nàá-wannu yinɛ, wen a̧ ɗafa so ŋma géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ Asɛra. Asa ɗaŋa géé-sɔ̧‘i yinɛ gbin nduku-nduku a nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai nɛɛ dɔ sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sɛdrɔŋ.
Zu-a'i, fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ kaɗi mgbara o be
A̧ kaia o bu-mbɔi in lɔr gú nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ee so in war kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a tɛnɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Asa ɔɔ wan tɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ, biro bo na.
Asa ɔɔ wan tɛ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ Baɛsa wannu
Asa kaia lɔr in bu-mbɔi, o mbɔi-tua ko GASA WAN in mbɔi-tua ko wannu tom ha̧ Bɛn-Hadad wannu Aram sɛn Damas tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
Bɛn-Hadad zia wen ko wannu Asa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ sitɛ o ye
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Baɛsa zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ kaɗa mboo garo ye Rama ɓɛɛ a̧ e tom-aa duk.
Wannu Asa saa o be Juda, ɓɛɛ wa kai o ta in o te nɛ̀ Baɛsa mbo so nɛ garo Rama yaknɛ, nɛ́ɛ̀ mbó nɛ̀ o garo Geba in Mispa.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i,

Bo nɛ o be Egiptɛ in o be Libii mɔi̧a so kpa ŋmaa ɓɛɛ duk nɛ́ ŋga o wi-biro nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o keekee-biro in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa nɛ̀ dɔka-a na nde? Zu-a'i, bo nɛ GASA WAN aa wa er-mɛ wen nɛ̀ mɛ ɛka so tɛ-mɛ nɛ̀ a̧ na nde?
GASA WAN zɔk nɛ mɔ zu nù lɛŋ, wen gbaka o wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ a̧. Hegɔ tɛ mɔ‘i, mɛ dee mɔɔ-mgbele. Kinii, mɛ tɛ de biro wese lɛŋ.»
See Asa nyima in wi-zɔk-mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ a̧ zɔɓɔ, wen see-aa nyima in a̧ sɛn tɛ mɔ‘i. Asa usa kànà bɔnɛ ha̧ o ŋma bíí tɛ ŋgimbi'i mbɛt.
Nyɛrɛ ko Asa tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ kalata ko o wannu Juda in
Asa baa ŋma ŋga zɛɛ-nyima-naŋ tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧. Tɛ nyimmɔ‘i, a̧ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ma nɛ yì sitɛ o wan-nyina.
Asa fea, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɓu-naar-zua-kpɔk pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa guna a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ fio n'aa za̧a̧ so sɛn
Josafat bem ko Asa ɔɔ wan oi-aa. Josafat ɗafa wan kɔ‘i wen baa zu dúk nɛ̀
A̧ aa o dùk wi-biro dam tɛ o ye-ŋgárá Juda lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o gasawi zu zika-nù sɛn nù Juda in tɛ o ye Efraim nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Asa baa so.
GASA WAN duka so in Josafat wen a̧ ndaka so nɛ́ ɗoŋ kuti naŋanɔ ko zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David. A̧ ɗafi o sɔ̧ Bal na;
a̧ kia nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ geŋa ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ a̧ ndaka ɗoŋ deemɔ ko o be
GASA WAN dee ha̧ wan mɛ nɔ er-a, ɓɛɛ nù Juda lɛŋ mɔi̧ zu-ye tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧; hegɔ, a̧ duka nɛ̀ mbɔi in tu̧u̧-tɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
A̧ ee see-aa tɛ baa yuwar ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ o
Sɛn tɛ taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ toma o gasawi nɔ'ɔ: Bɛn-Hail, Obadia, Zakarii, Nɛtaneɛl in Mikaya wen usa mɔ tɛ o gasa ye Juda.
O be Levii nɛ̀ ee wa nɛ́ Sɛmaya, Nɛtania, Zɛbadia, Asahɛl, Sɛmiramɔt, Yonataŋ, Adɔnia in Tob-Adonia bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Elisama in Yoram.
Wa kaia o kalata heembea ko GASA WAN usi nɛ̀ mɔ yaknɛ si nù Juda. Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ dam saaye lɛŋ usi nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o bíí.
Gasa mɔɔ-kíì nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ GASA WAN tika tɛ o mɔɔ-wan ká̧ Juda lɛŋ; ŋma bíí kpɔk bi biro in Josafat na.

O be Filistii kaia bu-mbɔi, ha̧a̧mɔ in zu-mɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ Josafat. War ko o be Arab, wa kaia o mɔ-dai tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt: o vala sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in o vala gbadua booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Mɔɔ-wan ko Josafat gasi gasi siti, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo garo zik nɛ̀ o ye in o ŋga tua-a-mɔ sɛnɛ sɛn Juda mbɛt.
A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a sɛn saaye nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nù Juda in o ŋgaŋa wi-biro saaye Jerusalɛm.
Kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ tɛ nutua kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: nutua ko Juda, gasawi zu o wi-biro booro nɛ́ Adna, nɛ̀ duka so zu o ŋga wi-biro booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Jɛhohanaŋ wi-duk-zu o wi-biro booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar,
sɛka Amasia bem ko Zikri nɛ̀ yee tom nɛ̀ ta-tɛ wen zu GASA WAN; a̧ duka kɔ̧-a̧ zu o ŋga wi-biro booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Ko Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Eliada ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ duka zu o wi-kai-góò in o ŋgee; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Yozabad nɛ̀ duka zu o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ iŋa bíí biro.
O wi nɛ̀ dee so tom ha̧ wannu nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wi tɔr o wan nɛ̀ wannu aa so tɛ o ye-ŋgárá nù Juda lɛŋ na.
Josafat kpaa mbɔi nɛ̀ dɔka-a in hura-nin mbɛt. A̧ kpaa nam in wannu Akab nɛ̀ ɗoŋ kóò.
Ɗoŋ pɛ tikiɗi, a̧ zira mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk Akab sɛn Samarii ɓɛɛ Akab gbɛ o sami in o ndai nɛ̀ dɔka-a ha̧ a̧ in o bíí nɛ̀ yaa in a̧. Akab yee ɗɛɗɛ-a wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ e a̧ wen bíí Ramot nú Galad.
Akab wannu
Josafat tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu
Wannu
Josafat tɔ̧a̧: «Ŋma
Wannu
Wannu
Wannu
Sidekia bem ko Kɛnana ɗafa ŋma zak nɛ̀ boi e zu ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «GASA WAN'e ndé, ɛnɛ tɛ gɔm Aram gbɛ nɛ̀ o zak nɔ'ɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ o
Betom nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so mɛ sa Michee tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «O
Michee tɔ̧a̧: «Hee GASA WAN duk kpasa ga, nɛ́ wen n'aa tɛ tɔ̧ a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt.»
A̧ hɔɔ katɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu ak a̧: «Michee, ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bí Ramot nú Galad náà, kóó k’ɛɛ nɛ na nde?»
A̧ kifa nú: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́! Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin biro, GASA WAN tɛ e ye'i kɔ̧ er wannu.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ war géè a̧‘m tɛ de nɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ kan mɔ tɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasawen nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN ha̧‘m ge?»
Michee kifa nú:
«Mi zɔka o be
hee o sami nɛ̀ wi-dai-a bo na ga;
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
‹O wi nɔ'ɔ bó nɛ̀ wan-dai-wa ɓɔna!
Kóó o ndé a̧ sí ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.› »
Wannu
Michee tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN: ‹Mi zɔka GASA WAN fara duk zu damti kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o gíí wi-biro mɛ yiwese ya ŋgɔn katɛ a̧ nɛ̀ war gale in nɛ̀ war wiiko mbɛt,›
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN ak wa: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o'o tɛ ɔr Akab wannu
Ɓɛɛ ŋma
A̧ kifa nú: ‹Mi tɛ nɛ ɓɛɛ mi duka nɛ́
«Kà GASA WAN a̧ ee
Sidekia bem ko Kɛnana ɗɔŋa siti, mbɛr ká̧ yí Michee, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «
Michee tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ tɛ zɔk, wese nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ hu̧si nɛnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛnɛ.»
Wannu
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, wen ko wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ wi’ɛ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɛ́ be brɛt in yì kɛ̧́ɛ̧́ ha̧ a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ pii, ŋma mɔ kpa'm na.› »
Michee tɔ̧a̧: «Kà mɛ nɛ́ pia nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ŋma mɔ kpa mɛ na, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ nú‘m na.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ woyo: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen'i, ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí lɛŋ!»
Wannu
Wannu
Wannu Aram ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ o wi-duk-zu o wan keekee-nyaŋa kɔ‘i'e, ká wa gbɛ o bem, kóó gasawi na; ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ wannu
Hegɔ o wan ko o wi-daŋ keekee-nyaŋa zɔka Josafat, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wannu
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wan ko o wi-daŋ keekee zɔka a̧ bo nɛ́ wannu
Ŋma bíí pi̧i̧ kɔ‘i góò nɛ̀ nú tum, ɓɛɛ tok wannu
Wese'i biro ŋgaia batɛ, ɓɛɛ wannu
Josafat wannu Juda sii ɗoŋ nɛ de-a si tɛ kɔ‘i Jerusalɛm.
Ŋma wi-zɔk-mɔ nɛ̀ nin-a'e Jɛhu bem ko Hanani wee ti wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wen ge mɛ gbak o wi-ɗaŋ in mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ o wisɛn ko GASA WAN ge? Nyimsea ko GASA WAN tɛ tik zu mɛ tɛ mɔ‘i.
Mɔ kpɔk, wi kpaa so kànà ŋma demɔ sɛn tɛ-mɛ, wen mɛ dɔɔ so o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi yinɛ sɛn zaŋnu. Mɛ ee see-mɛ wen kia Sɔ̧.»
Fara-duk ko Josafat mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn Jerusalɛm. Tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi, a̧ yara tɛ nù mgbara dukbíí, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Bɛrseba hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ zu kaya Efraim, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be
A̧ aa o wi-gɔn-kita zu nù kɔ̧-a̧ in sɛn tɛ o ye-ŋgárá kpɔk kpɔk nù Juda lɛŋ.
Wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-gɔn-kita nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ̀ de-a, wen bo nɛ wen yí bíí ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ gɔn nɛ̀ kita na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn tɛ tom-gɔna-kita'i.
Hegɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ tom nɛ̀ yuwar-a wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ kpɛk ɗaŋ gɔna-kita, yee-ŋmaa in zɔka-ŋmaa-nɛ-ɗoŋ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ na.»
Kóó sɛn Jerusalɛm mbɛt, Josafat ee o ŋma be Levii in o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ bá nɛ̀ o ŋma gasawi nutua
A̧ hee mbéá ha̧ wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ̀ o nya'nɛ́ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ye kɔ-wa tɛ ba ŋma wen tɛnɛ sɛn ti'nɛ́ hee wen gbɛɛ-zu, wen zu heembea, wen zu

Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Amaria tɛ duk zu'nɛ́ wen o wen nɛ̀ zɔk nɛ́ GASA WAN lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ war ko Zɛbadia bem ko Ismaɛl gasawi zu nutua ko Juda, a̧ tɛ duk kɔ̧-a̧ zu o wen nɛ̀ zɔk nɛ́ mɔɔ-wan. Ko o be Levii, wa tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-yɔr-mɔ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dúk in wi nɛ̀ tɛ de demɔ!»
Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o bem ko Mɔab in o bem ko Amɔŋ yaka in o bezaŋ Maɔŋ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi Josafat.
Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ Josafat hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «O ŋma zɔm gíí wi-biro tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ kur gba-tɔp, nɛ̀ war Edɔm mɛ bi mɛ; kinii wa a̧a̧ sɛn Hasasɔŋ-Tamar, wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧ Ɛn-Gedi.»
Josafat dee kíì; a̧ taa mɔ mɛ ak mɔ in GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí mɛ zim yì sɛn nù Juda lɛŋ.
O bíí gara tɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ o ye Juda lɛŋ mɛ kɔfi GASA WAN.
Josafat yora mgbara gíí o be
«GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ sɛn yiwese nɛ̀ duk zu nù lɛŋ na nde? Ŋgai in ŋgayamɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er'nɛ́, ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ba zu dúk nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ gbina gba̧a̧-tɛ bíí nù'ɛ ti dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
Wa dee ye hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ wa mbo

‹Kà ŋma ɗaŋmɔ tik zu yɛ, kóó nɛ́ gba-paa, kóó nɛ́ bɔnɛ oi dee ɗaŋmɔ, kóó nɛ́ ŋga-zɛɛ-geŋa, kóó nɛ́ kaɓa; k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ yor sɛn nú Tua’ɛ sɛn ti'nɛ́, wen nin'nɛ́ a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua’ɛ, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ ai nú sitɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ kifi nú in ɛnɛ tɛ kpasi yɛ.›
Ɓɛɛ kinii, zɔ́k o bem ko Amɔŋ in ko Mɔab gú nɛ̀ ko Edɔm nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ɔ mgbara kaya Sɛir, n’ɛnɛ ha̧ so yuwar ha̧ o be
Kinii o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ ba nù k’ɛɛ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so h’ɛ́ɛ́'ɛ!
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛnɛ beka gɔn kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu wa na nde? Ɛɛ bo nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ yor ti zɔm giiwi nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ bi yɛ'ɛ na, ɛɛ iŋ mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de na mbɛt; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ s’ɛɛ zik yí-ɛɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́.»
O be Juda lɛŋ in o kóò gú nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa yor so nɛ́ ŋgɔn sɛn ti GASA WAN.
Sɛn mgbara gíí o be

Yaziɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛnɛ o be Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm bá nɛ̀ wannu Josafat, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ nɛ̀ de-a! Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹K’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu mɔ ti zɔm giiwi nɔ'ɔ na, wen biro'i bó nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ biro ko Sɔ̧.
Mɔɔsa̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zír, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí wa. Wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ daŋ nɛ̀ war Sɔs tɛnɛ'ɛ; ɛnɛ tɛ kpa wa mgbák nú gboŋgo ŋga-gbárà Yɛruɛl.

Bo nɛ ɛnɛ a̧ tɛ bi biro na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k gbina biro nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ gbin see zu'nɛ́. Juda in Jerusalɛm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu mɔ na! Mɔɔsa̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ si ti wa, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́!› »
Josafat gbɛɛ zugur nù, ba yí gu nù; Juda nɛ̀ oi gun lɛŋ in o be Jerusalɛm gbɛɛ zugur nù ti GASA WAN gasi nɛ̀ a̧.
O be Levii, pɛ́r-nam ko o bem ko Kehat in ko o bem ko Kore kura mɛ gasi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko

Mɛ bin, dukbíí kura mɛ tutuyɛ sut mɛ yak si ŋga-gbárà Tɛkɔa. Ŋgimbi yaka-a, Josafat yora ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «O be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa ŋgai! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta mbɛt nɛ̀ o
Josafat in dukbíí hoka o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ yak ti ha̧ o wi-biro gasi nɛ̀ GASA WAN, zɔn nɛ̀ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN, wen
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ku̧u̧naŋ aa nú-wa tɛ gima zɔnamɔ, GASA WAN dee ha̧ sii-kafɛ mɛ kur mgbara o be Amɔŋ, o be Mɔab in o be mgbara kaya Sɛir nɛ̀ tɛɛ so wen bíí Juda, ɓɛɛ wa ye tɛ bíí ŋmaa.
O bem ko Amɔŋ in o bem ko Mɔab duka zù nɛ̀ o be mgbara kaya Sɛir ɓɛɛ kum wa lɛŋ. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kuma o be Sɛir kaɗi, wa yee tɛ gbɛɛ ŋmaa siɗoŋ woyo.
O be Juda hɔɔ sɛn zu-tɔ̧́ fara nɛ̀‘i duk sɛnɛ zɔk nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà; wa zika tɛ-wa zɔk mɔ si zu gíí o wi-biro, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ géé wɔr a̧ gbisi nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu sinɛ, ŋma bíí kpɔk duk kpasa na.
Josafat in o wi-biro kɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ̀ kai o mɔɔ tɛ-wa, wa kpaa o mɔ-dai nɛ̀ dɔka-a, o mbɔi, o laa in o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ. Zaŋzɛ taar, wa a̧a̧ tɛ kaia mɔ, wen mɔ dɔka so nyɛmna; hegɔ wa gana oi-aa e duk.
Zɛ naar ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Beraka
O be Juda gú nɛ̀ o be Jerusalɛm lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ in Josafat sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ desee, wen GASA WAN ha̧a̧ desee ha̧ wa sɛn ti o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
Wa yɔɔ yɔyɛ ye nɛ̀ saaye Jerusalɛm, mbɛr nɛ̀ koloŋ in o kunde, dɔm nɛ̀ mbia hɔ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Kíí GASA WAN dee o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ zia nyɛrɛ biro nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee in o wisɛn ko
Wan ko Josafat duka zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ a̧ tɛ fara lɛŋ.
Josafat bem ko Asa ɔɔ wan zu Juda; a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ wan'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk tɛ wan pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Azuba boko-bem ko Sili.
A̧ zɔka ɗoŋ mɔ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Asa, a̧ e ŋma mɔ duk na; a̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN.
Mɔ kpɔk, o fara-gasi géé-sɔ̧ mɛ
Oi tom ko Josafat nɛ̀ dea, o wan mɛ ti in o wan mɛ ɗoŋ yɔra zaŋ tom ko Jɛhu bem ko Hanani, nɛ̀‘i ee zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Josafat wannu Juda ee nú in Ahazia wannu
Wa ee nú in ŋmaa mɛ de o kombon wen nɛa-a si Tarsis mɛ. Wa dee o kombon nɔ‘i sɛn Ɛsiɔŋ-Gebɛr.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eliɛzɛr bem ko Dɔdawa be Marɛsa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Josafat hegɔ: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ ee nú in Ahazia ga, GASA WAN tɛ ɗaŋ tom kɔ-mɛ yinɛ.» Hegɔ o kombon mbaŋa ye yì lɛŋ, wa hɔ sɛn Tarsis na.
Josafat fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ in wa sɛn
O nya Yoram nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o bem ko Josafat wannu
Dáà kɔ-wa Josafat ha̧a̧ so mɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a: bu-mbɔi, lɔr in o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ in o ŋma ye-ŋgárá sɛn nù Juda; ɓɛɛ war ko Yoram, a̧ ha̧a̧ wan ha̧ a̧, wen a̧ duka nɛ́ kaya-bem.
Yoram ɔɔ wan oi dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kpa ŋgai siti; hegɔ a̧ gbɛɛ o nya-a̧ lɛŋ gú nɛ̀ o ŋma wan sɛn
Yoram a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan; ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
A̧ ndaka ɗoŋ mɔ ko o wannu
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧ so mɛ ɗaŋ nutua ko David na, wen zu
Ŋgimbi wan ko Yoram, o be Edɔm dee ŋgazu in wannu Juda, ɓɛɛ hok ŋma wannu e see zu.
Yoram kura in o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i in o keekee-biro lɛŋ. Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kura nɛ̀ zaŋzɛ ga, a̧ gbina biro ti o be Edɔm nɛ̀ zika so a̧ in o gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ e see-a.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o be Edɔm dee nɛ́ ŋgazu in wannu Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ. Ŋgimbi'i mbɛt, Libna dee ŋgazu in Yoram wannu Juda, wen n'aa ee GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ duk.
Yoram mboo o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ mɛ
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ ko o wannu
kinii, GASA WAN tɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu dukbíí kɔ-mɛ, zu o bem kɔ-mɛ, zu o kóò kɔ-mɛ gú nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-er-mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ ɔ zɛɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ hegɔ sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o nyak zaŋ-mɛ a zan; zɛɛ‘i tɛ ŋgai ŋgai siti.»
GASA WAN aa wen ha̧ o be Filistii in o be Arab nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn Kus mɛ bi biro in Yoram.
Wa daŋa ba zu dúk nɛ̀ Juda, wa yee ye, ɓɛɛ wa kai o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so kɔ̧ tua ko wannu gú nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in o kóò kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ; bem nɛ̀ ɓɔna ha̧ a̧ nɛ́ sɔŋkur-aa Ahazia.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ-nyima-zaŋ nɛ̀ kaɗi na tɛ Yoram.
Zɛ dɔka, ɓɛɛ sitɛ kaɗa yiitoo pɛ, nyak zaŋ-aa gboo a zan; a̧ fea zu gasa nyimmɔ. O bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ dɔ fuu nyama zu a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa duka so de nɛti zu o dáà kɔ-wa ga na.
Yoram a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar. A̧ fea, ɓɛɛ bíí ai nú wen-aa na. Wa guna a̧ sɛn

O wi Jerusalɛm dee wan ha̧ Ahazia sɔŋkur bem ko Yoram oi-aa, wen o gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ so in o be Arab yee so kɔ̧ gbagari ko o be Juda, ɓɛɛ gbɛ o zɔmwi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ, Ahazia bem ko Yoram wannu Juda ɔɔ wan.
Ahazia a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ kpɔk. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ Atalii boko-bem ko Ɔmri.
Ahazia mbɛt zɔka nɛ́ ɗoŋ mɔ ko o bíí nutua ko Akab, wen nàà kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ wi tɔ̧ ɗaŋ mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧.
Hegɔ a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN hee ko o bíí nutua ko Akab ga, wen o bezaŋ Akab yaa so nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɗoŋ fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔ kaya.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ zia mbɔrɔ kɔ-wa a̧ a̧ yaka nɛnɛ in wannu Yoram, bem ko Akab mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi Hazaɛl wannu Aram sɛn saaye Ramot nú Galad. Tɛ biro'i, o be Aram ee da̧i̧ tɛ Yoram,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ pii Yizreɛl mɛ hɛr da̧i̧ n'aa baa yí biro sɛn Ramot. Hegɔ, Ahazia bem ko Yoram wannu Juda zira si Yizreɛl mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk Yoram bem ko Akab nɛ̀ baa da̧i̧.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ Ahazia mɛ yɔ tɛ nɛa-a kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ zɔk Yoram. Ŋgimbi n'aa hɔa, Yoram kura ɓɛɛ wa yak in ŋmaa sitɛ Jɛhu bem ko Nimsi, wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a wen kuma o bíí nutua ko Akab.
Jɛhu dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gɔna kita ko GASA WAN zu nutua ko Akab. A̧ kpaa o be-wan Juda in o ŋma nya Ahazia, ɓɛɛ a̧ kum wa.

A̧ toma bíí mɛ kii Ahazia; wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa a̧ sɛn Samarii fara n'aa duka so hu̧si sɛnɛ; wa mgbɔɔ a̧ tɛnɛ ha̧ Jɛhu, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧. Wa guna a̧ wen wa duka so tɔ̧‘e ndé, a̧ nɛ́ ŋma bezaŋ Josafat wannu nɛ̀ kia GASA WAN nɛ̀ see kpɔk. Ŋma bíí nutua ko Ahazia nɛ̀ nyɛma so mɛ ɔ wan bo ɓɔna.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Atalii nàà ko Ahazia zɔka'e, bem kɔ‘i fea, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ o bezaŋ wannu nutua Juda lɛŋ.

Ɓɛɛ Yoseba boko-bem ko wannu Jɔas, ŋma bem ko Ahazia mgbara o dɔka-a nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘i in okoo-dai-a hu̧si sɛn kɔ̧ ŋma gɔna-bɛr-tua, fara-a o gado. Hegɔ Yoseba, boko-bem ko wannu Yoram kóò ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada, boko-nya Ahazia, baa bem’ɛi yinɛ ɗɔɔ yí Atalii, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa yuwar mɛ gbɛ a̧ na.
Bem’ɛi duka in a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ká Atalii ɓɔna so tɛ wan.

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada kaia o gasawi zu o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Azaria bem ko Yeroam, Ismaɛl bem ko Yohanaŋ, Azaria bem ko Obɛd, Masɛya bem ko Adaya, Elisafat bem ko Zikri wen ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ tɔk in a̧.
Wa yara dam nù Juda, mɔi̧ nɛ̀ o be Levii tɛ o geɗek ye nù Juda lɛŋ in o gasawi nú-gara
O bíí nɛ̀ mɔi̧a'i ee nú in wannu sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Yoyada tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Zɔ́k bem ko wannu hɛ̧ɛ̧; ɔ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so zu o bezaŋ David.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: o ŋma mgbara'nɛ́, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ de tom tɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ ya k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-nú tua.
O ŋma tɛ ya kɔ‘i wen pɛma tua ko wannu, ɓɛɛ sɛka oi bíí pɛma kɔ-wa mɔ si nú tua nɛ‘i sa'e Naŋ-tua; dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ ya kɔ‘i nú zala Tua ko GASA WAN.

Ŋma bíí beka ye Tua ko GASA WAN na; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ tom a̧ tɛ ye Tua ɓɛɛ. Wa nyɛma mɛ ye kɔ-wa Tua, wen wi ee tom er wa, ɓɛɛ o géé bíí lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-mɔ ko GASA WAN.
O be Levii tɛ mɔi̧ zik wannu, kóó o ndé nɛ̀ boi-biro er. Kóó o ndé nɛ̀ tɛ ye Tua, wi tɛ gbɛ a̧; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk in wannu fara n'aa tɛ́ nɛ̀ lɛŋ.»

O be Levii in o be Juda lɛŋ dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada baa tɔ̧ so ga. Kóó o ndé kaia bíí kɔ‘i, o wan nɛ̀ ku̧u̧ naŋ tom wese-ɔm-tɛ sɛka o wan nɛ̀ gbo kɔ‘i gboo, wen Yoyada e ŋma wi-de-tom kpɔk duk na.
A̧ ha̧a̧ so sɛ́ɛ̀ in o ŋgee ko wannu David nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ yaa so sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa.
A̧ nɛka o géé bíí, kóó o ndé nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ er, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ká̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ war wiiko hɔ nɛnɛ ɓii ká̧-a̧ nɛ̀ war gale, in si ká̧
Wa foo bem ko wannu gbonɛ, wa guu
Atalii zia giti maa yì nɛ̀ o bíí ma ha̧ nɛ̀ er ha̧ wannu; a̧ gɔma nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa dukbíí sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.

Kà a̧ zɔk wó, wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ duk zu mɔ nɛ̀ kusa-a ká̧ mbiŋ ká̧ nú Tua mɛ‘i’ɛ; o gasawi in o wi-dɔm-mbia a̧a̧ so katɛ a̧. O bíí lɛŋ de so nɛ́ tortɛ nɛ̀ desee; o mbia a̧ dɔm'i, o wi-mbɛr-mɔ a̧ mbɛr kɔ‘i mɔ bíí nɛ̀ gima, gai nɛ̀ mɔ mbɛt'i. Atalii a̧ka̧ laa tɛ, ɓɛɛ hiɗi mɔ: «Wa ɗɔa'm! Wa ɗɔa'm!»

Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada foo o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa gbonɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó kóò'ɛ gbonɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧! Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ-aa tɛ fe fio gba-paa!» Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hego wen a̧ baa tɔ̧ so'e, «K’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ a̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN na.»
Wa baa Atalii nɛnɛ sitɛ tua ko wannu, tɛ nú tua nɛ̀‘i sa'e nú tua ko o Nyaŋa, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
Yoyada
Wa lɛŋ nɛɛ sitɛ tua-ɗafi Bal; wa gbina tua'i a nù, gú nɛ̀ o
Yoyada ee tom-pɛma Tua ko GASA WAN er o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii. David kɛ̧ɛ̧ so wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ a zu tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra so sɛn zaŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ, wen
A̧ ee so o wi-pɛm-nú-tua sɛn nú Tua ko GASA WAN wen ká ŋma ndiŋmɔ tɛɛ ye Tua'i.

Yoyada kaia o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro gɔmŋmaa, o gasawi saaye, o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zu dukbíí in o bíí lɛŋ. A̧ foo wannu Jɔas gbonɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, wa yee tua-wan nɛ̀ fara nɛ̀‘i sa'e Nú tua mɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ wa e a̧ sɛn zu damti.
Bíí lɛŋ duka nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ saaye duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ. War ko Atalii, wa gbɛɛ so a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa kaɗi.
Jɔas a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan; ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-naar. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Sibia zɔŋa Bɛrseba.
Jɔas dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada ɓɔna nɛ̀ yí.
Yoyada baa kóò yiitoo ha̧ Jɔas, ɓɛɛ wa ko o be-wiwii in o be-okoo ha̧ a̧.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Jɔas taa mɔ mɛ ɗafi Tua ko GASA WAN.
A̧ mɔi̧a o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ dam ye nù Juda, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí mbɔi sɛn er o be
hegɔ, wannu saa gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wen ge mɛ yor ɗoŋ o be Levii nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a ha̧ wa mɛ kai garama nɛ̀ Moisɛ wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ in o be
Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ Atalii in o bíí kɔ‘i ee so Tua ko Sɔ̧ ɗaŋ lɛŋ. Wa kaia so o sa̧a̧ nyɛk lɛŋ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ Bal mbɛt.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de ŋma kuɓa-a-mɔ e sɛn ká̧ nú Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ zan,
in ha̧ wa mɛ he mbéá dam nù Juda in Jerusalɛm wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ kai garama nɛ̀ Moisɛ, wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ baa tɔ̧ so nɛnɛ zu
O be-wan in o bíí lɛŋ kpaa desee, ɓɛɛ wa kai mbɔi tɛnɛ dun kɔ̧ kuɓa-a-mɔ.

Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Levii tɛ̀ɛ́ ba nɛ̀ kuɓa-a-mbɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu mɛ hu̧i̧, wa kpaa mbɔi kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a; wi-duk katɛ wannu in wi-tɔr-sede ko gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ gbai mbɔi'i, ɓɛɛ ba kuɓa-a-mbɔi'i piinɛ ɗoŋ e oi-aa. Wa dee hegɔ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kpa mbɔi nɛ̀ dɔka-a.

Wannu in Yoyada ha̧a̧ mbɔi'i ha̧ wi-duk-zu tom Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa yoɓi nɛ̀ o wi-gbɛr-te, o wi-sɛk-ta in o wi-de-tom ɗafa Tua ko GASA WAN gú nɛ̀ o wi-iŋ-tom-boi in tom-ndɛrɛ wen ɗafa ɗoŋ Tua'i mbɛt.
O wi-de-tom nɔ‘i ku̧u̧ naŋ dee tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tom'i nɛ́ nɛ̀ haya-a kɔ̧ er-wa. Wa ɗafa Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a woyo.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kaɗa tom'i kaɗi, wa kaia oi sede piinɛ a ti wannu in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada, ɓɛɛ wa de nɛ̀ o nyɛk wen Tua ko GASA WAN: o nyɛk wen aa mɔ in wen
Yoyada sɔka, ɓɛɛ wɔ duka-a zaŋnu gbɛ a̧ ɓɔna, hegɔ a̧ fea, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-taar.
Wa guna a̧ sɛn
Ɗoŋ fio ko Yoyada, o wanye sɛn nù Juda lɛŋ gara tɛ́ɛ̀ fan wannu Jɔas zɔn nɛ̀ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpɛk wen kɔ-wa.
Duka, ɓɛɛ o be
GASA WAN toma o

ko Sɔ̧ yee tɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Zakarii bem ko Yoyada; see-aa kura zu dukbíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Sɔ̧‘e ndé, wen ge ɛnɛ ee heembea kɔ‘m duk ge? Ɛnɛ beka kpa mɔɔ-oi na. Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ea'm duk ga, mi mbɛt, mi ee'nɛ́ duk!»
Wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu Zakarii, ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ yo a̧ nɛ̀ ta gbɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn nú zala Tua ko GASA WAN.
Tɛ wannu Jɔas bìí ɗoŋ dee demɔ nɛ̀ Yoyada dáà ko Zakarii dee so in a̧; hegɔ, a̧ gbɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛti ha̧ Zakarii mɛ fe, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN a̧ zɔ́k mɔ'ɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ kífí er ha̧ mɛ.»
Tɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ pɛ, gíí wi-biro Aram dee ŋgazu in Jɔas; wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ hur nù Juda in saaye Jerusalɛm. Wa gbɛɛ o wanye fara nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tom o mɔ nɛ̀ wa kaia lɛŋ nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu kɔ-wa sɛn Damas.
Zu-a nɛ̀ o wi-biro Aram nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ so dɔk na'i, GASA WAN foo o gíí wi-biro ko Juda a kɔ̧ er-wa, wen o be Juda ee war ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ-wa duk. War ko Jɔas, wa usa bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ wa yak e a̧ nɛ̀ oi gasa nyimmɔ. O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, wen kifa er oi tɔk tɛ bem ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Yoyada nɛ̀ aa nu, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn gɔn gado kɔ̧-a̧. Wa guna a̧ sɛn
O wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ nɛ́ Zabad bem ko Simɛat zɔŋa Amɔŋ in Yozabad bem ko Simrit zɔŋa Mɔab.
Nin o bem kɔ̧-a̧, yɔramɔ zu tom nɛ̀ yaa er-a, nyɛrɛ mɔ zu tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko o
Amasia yee wan ŋgimbi n'aa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ Yoadan zɔŋa Jerusalɛm.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ́ nɛ̀ see-aa lɛŋ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wan nɔɔ er-a nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, a̧ gbɛɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, o wan nɛ̀ gbɛɛ so dáà kɔ̧-a̧ wannu Jɔas.

Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ gbɛ o bem kɔ-wa na, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra so zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ, wen GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé: «Dáà beka fe oi nú bem na, in bem beka fe oi nú dáà na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé tɛ fe nɛ́ fio ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i.»

Amasia mɔi̧a bíí tɛ nù kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ e o wan nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ pɛ́r-nam zu o bíí booro in bíí gɔmŋmaa, zaŋnu Juda in nú Bɛnjamin lɛŋ. A̧ tɔra o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ̀ gana lɛŋ: wa kpaa o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ̀ iŋa bíí biro nɛ sɛɛ in ŋgee.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ yoɓi kilo sede booro-taar, kai nɛ o ŋga wi-biro booro-gɔmŋmaa sɛn
Ŋma
Wen kà wa nɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́, kóó ɛnɛ ŋgaia so tɛ biro hee ge, Sɔ̧ tɛ fo'nɛ́ pi̧ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha'i mɛ gbin biro, kóó ha̧ biro mɛ ba wi.»
Amasia aka
Hegɔ Amasia foo o wi-biro nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn sinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn nù kɔ-wa. O wi nɔ‘i kura si ɗoŋ ye kɔ‘i nɛ̀ zɔm nyimsea kɔ̧ see-wa zu nù Juda.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia kpaa ŋgai nɛ̀ de-a kaɗi, a̧ kaia o gíí wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Tɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bi o wi Sɛir, gbɛ wa tɛ bíí booro-ɓu.
O be Levii nù Juda kaia bíí booro-ɓu nɛ̀ kpasa, ɓɛɛ kai wi nɔ‘i si zu kaya; wa ira wa nɛ̀ zu kaya ŋgɔn mɛ a nù, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gbin kɛsɛ-kɛsɛ.
O wi-biro nɛ̀ Amasia dora so ká nɛ́ biro in wi'i na tika zu o ye Juda, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Samarii hɔ nɛnɛ Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ; wa gbɛɛ bíí booro-taar, ɓɛɛ wa kai mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ bíí o be Edɔm, a̧ kaia o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Sɛir piinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ gasa wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ wa mbɛt.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, see GASA WAN kura zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tom ŋma
A̧ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Amasia gɔn wen nú-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Nɛ́ o a̧ ee mɛ nɛ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ wannu o? Kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha'i mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ na, mɛ̀ kpé nú mɛ tɛ wen'i!»
Amasia zia nɛ́ o ŋma mbɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ tom mɔ si zu Jɔas wannu
Jɔas wannu
Mɛ‘e ndé, wi gana o be Edɔm, ɓɛɛ mɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-mɛ zɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, gana so mɛ̀ dúk tɛ kɔ-mɛ! Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ye gee tum biro ha̧ mɛ mɛ fe in o be Juda lɛŋ ge?»
Amasia zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen mɔ‘i tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ fo a̧ in o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ er wi nɔ‘i, wen zu gasa o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Edɔm nɛ̀ wa gasa.
Jɔas wannu
Wa bìí ŋmaa ɓɛɛ o wi-biro ko Jɔas wannu
Jɔas wannu
A̧ kaia lɔr in o bu-mbɔi ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ yaa so sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Obɛd-Edɔm duka so pɛm, o mbɔi-tua ko wannu in o ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ si sɛn Samarii.
Amasia bem ko Jɔas wannu Juda duka zaŋnu pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ woyo ɗoŋ fio ko Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas, wannu
Oi o tom ko Amasia tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu Juda in
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Amasia ee nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ́ ɗoŋ GASA WAN duk, wa baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Lakis. Wa toma o bíí ndak ɗoŋ-aa si Lakis, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ hi̧i̧.
Wa baa wɔr-aa nɛ̀ keekee-nyaŋa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ ŋma ye nù Juda.
O dukbíí Juda baa Ozias nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk pi̧ tɛ wan oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Amasia.
Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ bìì ye Elat ɓɛɛ ba piiɗoŋ ha̧ Juda ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa guna nɛ̀ wannu si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i kaɗi.
Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-yiitoo sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ Yɛkɔlia zɔŋa Jerusalɛm.
Ozias dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Amasia dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga.
A̧ kia Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zakarii wi nɛ̀ usa yuwar yuu Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ yí in ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ tɛ mboozu ha̧ GASA WAN mbɛt. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gasi gasi siti.
A̧ baa biro dúk nɛ̀ o be Filistii ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin garo Gat, in wan mɛ Yabne bá nɛ̀ wan mɛ Asdod mbɛt. A̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ o ye tɛ zika nú Asdod in sɛn nú Filistii mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ gbaka a̧ tɛ bíí o be Filistii, in o be Arab nɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Gur-Bal gú nɛ̀ o be Mɛɔnii mbɛt.
Hegɔ o be Mɛɔnii gboo garama ha̧ Ozias, ɓɛɛ nin-a hur hɔ si nú Egiptɛ mɛ, wen a̧ kpaa so ŋgai nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Ozias mboo kusa ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm sɛn zu nutua mɛ Mgbii-aa in wan mɛ si kɔ̧ Gboŋgo in see zu fara nɛ̀ garo suia si zan

A̧ mboo ŋma ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, ɓɛɛ a̧ za̧ o kɔ̧-yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o gíí mɔ-dai nyɛmna. A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wi-wa-fɔ mbɛt sɛn ká̧ nù mɛ ɗɔɔ in sɛn tɔyɛɛ gɔn-see-nù, bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn zu kaya in sɛn Karmɛl, wen a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so tom-fɔ nyɛmna.

Ozias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ iŋa dee biro in wen nɛ́ɛ́ biro mbɛt, tɛ dùk-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o tom nɛ̀ wi-yɔr-mɔ Yeiɛl in ŋma wi-gɔn-kita Masɛya yɔra so. Nɛ́ Hanania, ŋma gasawi ko wannu a̧ duka so zu o wi-biro nɔ‘i.
Dɔka o gasawi nú-gara lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so zu o ŋga wi-biro nɔ‘i nɛ́ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
O ŋga wi-biro nɛ́ booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ nɛ̀ nyɛma so mɛ bi biro nɛ̀ ŋgai in nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi wen pɛma wannu wen o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ́ɛ́ biro, Ozias ha̧ so nɛ́ o ŋgee, o sɛ́ɛ̀, o laasɔ̧i̧-boi, o laa-boi, o kusaa in o ta-birndiŋ ha̧ wa.

Sɛn Jerusalɛm, a̧ dee o ŋma boi-biro nɛ̀ ya kɔ‘i sɛn zu garo zu tua-pɛm-mɔ in nɛ̀ war mgbii-aa wen pi̧i̧ góò in o gasa ta. Nin-a hura dam fara lɛŋ, wen Sɔ̧ gbaka so a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a; hegɔ a̧ kpaa ŋgai nɛ̀ de-a.
Ozias kpaa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ ku̧ naŋ gasa zu. A̧ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔ kɔya-tɛ-a. Ŋma wese, a̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama sɛn zu
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria yee Tua ɗoŋ-aa in o ŋma dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko GASA WAN ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi.

Wa nɛka ti wannu Ozias, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu, ɛnɛ bo nɛ̀ yuwar mɛ dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ na; mɔ‘i nɛ́ tom ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀‘i hoka wa wen-aa. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó kɔ̧ sa̧a̧-fara’ɛ, wen ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ ndiŋ a sɛnɛ! Mɔ‘i beka duk nɛ́ zɔnamɔ wen'nɛ́ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ na.»

See Ozias nyima, ɓɛɛ ká mɔɔ-dɔ-fuu-nyama ɓɔna so kɔ̧ er-a. Ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, zɛɛ doko ku̧u̧naŋ gboa-a sɛn sɔnti-a nɛ̀ yí-wa sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ká̧ fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama.
Gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria in o dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zɔka mɔ sitɛ-a, ɓɛɛ zɛɛ doko kpee sɔnti-a lɛŋ. Wa ira a̧ gbonɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo nɛ̀ haya-a wen a̧ iŋa'e GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zɛɛ doko tɛ-wi.

Zɛɛ doko ɓɔna tɛ wannu Ozias hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧. Hegɔ wen zu zɛɛ‘i, a̧ ɔ so kɔ̧ ŋma tua ɛ̀nɛ́-a, wen wa foo a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN. Bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ gasawi zu o bíí nutua ko wannu ɔɔ wan zu nù.
Wa guna Ozias in o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ sɛn fara gun o wannu na, wen wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé, a̧ nɛ́ wi-doko; ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yotam ɔ wan oi-aa.
Yotam a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ de pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk tɛ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Yɛrusa, boko-bem ko Sadɔk.
Yotam dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Ozias dee so ga; a̧ yɔ kaya mɛ ye Tua ko Sɔ̧ na. Mɔ kpɔk, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ yaa kànà tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ siti.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yotam a̧ mboo nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ ŋgɔn. A̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ garo nɛ̀ dɔka-a tɛ fara nɛ̀ wa sa'e garo Ofɛl.
A̧ dee o gasa ye sɛn zu kaya ko Juda in o be ŋga tua gú nɛ̀ o fara-pɛm-mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ o kombo.

Yotam bìì o wannu ko o be Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan wa; wa ha̧a̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar, kilo alkamaari miliɔŋ taar in kilo be-fon miliɔŋ taar mbɛt ha̧ a̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kale mɔ a̧ wa ha̧a̧ tɛ yiitoo in taar pɛ mbɛt.
Yotam kpaa ŋgai siti, wen n'aa e so see-aa tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Oi mɔ nɛ̀ Yotam dea, o biro kɔ̧-a̧ in o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ n'aa dea yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu
A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Yotam fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn
Ahaz a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David dee so ga na.
A̧ zɔka nɛ́ ɗoŋ deemɔ ko o wannu
A̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a dɔɔ fuu-nyama kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Hinɔm, dɔ nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ɗaŋmɔ ko o tugun bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka so yinɛ ti o be
A̧
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ ee a̧ er wannu Aram; wa bìí a̧, ɓɛɛ wa kai o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ bara-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a yaknɛ si Damas. Wannu
Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia nduka o bíí booro-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-booro-ɓu-yiitoo kpɔk kale wese. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o be Juda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasa wi-biro. Mɔ‘i dee hegɔ wen nɛ̀ wa ee so GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa duk.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Zikri ŋga wi-biro Efraim, kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ gbɛɛ Masɛya bem ko wannu Azrikam, gasa wi-duk-zu tua ko wannu in Ɛlkana mgbák wi nɛ̀ ndaɗi in wannu.
O be
Ŋma
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kinii, ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e o wiwii in o okoo Juda in Jerusalɛm nɛ bara! K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de hegɔ, bo nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ dak nɛ ɗaŋmɔ pi̧ zu'nɛ́ sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm o bara-biro n’ɛnɛ kaia sinɛ ɗoŋ, wen ká gasa nyimsea ko GASA WAN tɛ́ɛ̀ tik zu'nɛ́.»

O ŋma gasawi zu o bezaŋ Efraim kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen'i; duka nɛ́ Azaria bem ko Yohanaŋ, Berekia bem ko Mɛsilɛmɔt, Yɛhiskia bem ko Salum in Amasa bem ko Hadlai; wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ pia nɛ̀ fara-biro hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ kai o bara-biro piinɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ na, wen k’ɛɛ tɛɛ ya nɛ́ o wi de gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN. K’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ ŋma mbe ɗaŋmɔ zu o wan mɛ ti na, wen ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ ɔ dita, ɓɛɛ nyimsea ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ see zu
O wi-biro ee o bara-biro in o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ wa kaia so duk ɓɔn yí o gasawi in gíí o be

Hegɔ, o bíí nɛ̀ wa hoka wen mɔ‘i, ha̧a̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ o bara-biro. Wa kaia o laa nɛ̀ wa kpaa mgbara mɔɔ-oi-biro in o ndárà a tɛ o bara-biro nɛ̀ ya so nɛ̀ géé tɛ in géé naŋ; wa nyɔŋa mɔ, nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ, wa dee nyina ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ baa so da̧i̧, wa kaia o wi-kum a zu o tuifuu, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ wa sinɛ e Jeriko, ye-ndɛŋgɛ katɛ o nya-wa, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i si ɗoŋ Samarii.
Ŋgimbi'i, wannu Ahaz pi̧i̧ tom ha̧ o be Asirii mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak wi
wen nɛ̀ o be Edɔm pia so ɗoŋ, tɛ́ɛ̀ bi Juda woyo, ɓɛɛ kai o bara-biro yaknɛ.
O be Filistii mbɛt tɛɛ hur o ye mɛ Hira-nù in o ye mɛ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ nù Juda. Wa baa so Bɛt-Sɛmɛs, Ayalɔŋ, Gederot, Soko, Timna, Gimzo gú nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ.
GASA WAN pi̧i̧ búù zu nù Juda wen zu Ahaz wannu
Wannu Asirii Tilgat-Pilnɛzɛr, wi nɛ̀ tɛɛ so pii tɛ a̧ mɛ gbak a̧, tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpé nɛ́ a̧ e nù.
Ahaz kaia so ŋma o mbɔi Tua ko GASA WAN in ko wannu bá nɛ̀ ko o gasawi sí nɛ̀ mɔɔ-ha̧ wannu Asirii, ɓɛɛ ha̧a̧mɔ‘i gbak a̧ na.
Zu-a nɛ̀ wa kpee nɛ̀ Ahaz e nù‘i, a̧ e dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN duk na.
A̧ duka tɛ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ Damas nɛ̀ dea ha̧ wa mɛ gan so a̧ tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «O sɔ̧ ko o wannu Aram gbaka wa ɓɛɛ wa gbin biro; hegɔ mi tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ ha̧ wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak am.»
Ahaz mɔi̧a o sa̧a̧ nyɛk kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ to ɗaŋ lɛŋ; a̧ mana o nutua
A̧ mboo o
Oi o nyɛrɛ tom in o oi deemɔ ko Ahaz lɛŋ, tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu Juda in
Ahaz fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn saaye Jerusalɛm; mɔ kpɔk, wa gun a̧ kɔ̧ fio ko o wannu
Ezɛkias ɔɔ wan, ka a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar. Nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ Abi, boko-bem ko Zakarii.
Ezɛkias dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David ga.
Tɛ kuti pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, a̧ hu̧i̧a̧ o kpar-nú Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi.
A̧ saa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii tɛnɛ a ká̧ nú tua nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O be Levii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m! Ɛ̀nɛ̀
wen o dáà k’ɛɛ dee ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ wa de ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; wa ee a̧ duk, wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔka mɔ sitɛ
Wa kpee o nú Tua ko Sɔ̧, e nɛnɛ ha̧ lamba mɛ bi, wa kaɗa dɔɔ fuu-nyama in
Mɔ‘i dee ha̧ see GASA WAN mɛ tu̧ zu Juda in Jerusalɛm; hegɔ a̧ siŋa dukbíí pi̧ tɛ gasa bɔnɛ in mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔk nɛ̀ yí‘nɛ́'ɛ ga.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu mɔ‘i a̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ fee nɛnɛ yí-biro, ɓɛɛ wa kai o bem k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ.
«Kinii, kɔ‘m, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wiyɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ o nya'm, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ir tɛ‘nɛ́ ir de nɛ̀ mɔ na, wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ GASA WAN hoka mɛ yor ti a̧, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɗafi a̧, dɔ nɛ̀ fuu-nyama, zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.»
Tɛ wen'i o be Levii nɛ̀ gboo yor nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Tɛ nú-gara ko Kehat nɛ́ Mahat bem ko Amasai in Jɔɛl bem ko Azaria.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari nɛ́ Kis bem ko Abdi in Azaria bem ko Yehalɛl.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ nɛ́ Yɔa bem ko Zima in Edɛn bá nɛ̀ bem ko Yɔa.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Elisafaŋ nɛ́ Simri in Yeiɛl.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Asaf nɛ́ Zakarii in Matania.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Heman nɛ́ Yehiɛl in Simɛi.
Tɛ nú-gara ko Yedutun nɛ́ Sɛmaya in Uziɛl.
Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú-gara kɔ-wa, wa

O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ yee kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ bur war-a, ɓɛɛ wa pɛ o ndiŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa kɔ̧ gasa bɛr-tua ko GASA WAN gbonɛ si nú zala. O be Levii kaia mɔɔ nɔ‘i gbonɛ saaye nɛ́ɛ̀ a kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ.
Wa ku̧u̧ so naŋ
O be Levii nɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ ko wannu Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛɛ bura war Tua ko GASA WAN lɛŋ, fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, taŋe e brɛt zu-a ha̧ Sɔ̧, in o mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
gú nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ wannu Ahaz ɗaŋa war-a ŋgimbi n'aa ee nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ duk. Ɛɛ kaia wa a si ɗoŋ woyo, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɗafi wa; mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ ti fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN.»
Mɛ bin mɛ tutuyɛ sut, wannu Ezɛkias mɔi̧a o gasawi saaye, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
Wa kaia o wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa gɔna o ndai, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗu tɔk-aa gbai a zu
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o vala gbadua wen kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ, wa kaia wa nɛnɛ a ti wannu in ti gíí o be
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gɔna o gbadua nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ gbai tɔk-aa a zu
A̧ kaia o be Levii a kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ o sɔkɔ, o kunde, in o koloŋ er-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko David, in ko o
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Levii baa fara nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ David dee so, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kaia mbia kaɗi,
Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn
Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a lɛŋ hira si ɗɔɔ gú nù, ɓɛɛ ká o wi-bii-gima a̧ bíí gima dɔm nɛ̀ mbia'i hegɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kaɗa nɛnɛ.
Ɗoŋ kaɗa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧, wannu in o bíí nɛ̀ yaa in a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nú bá yí-wa gu nù.
Wannu Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii mɛ bìì gima nɛ̀ David in wi-de-tom oi nú Sɔ̧ Asaf dee so wen zɔna GASA WAN. Wa bia gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ̀ desee, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa nù, ba yí-wa gu nù.

Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ giiwi woyo: «Kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ mɛ ha̧ a̧a̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN ga, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́lí pii ti, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ in o ha̧a̧mɔ-zɔnamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» O bíí lɛŋ kaia o ha̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ. O wi nɛ̀ see-wa hu̧i̧a̧ ha̧a̧ o kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
Kpoo-sɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kaia tɛnɛ duka nɛ́ ndai ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, vala sami gɔmŋmaa,
O oi saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nɛ́ o ndai gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk in o sami booro-taar.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dɔk so wen ɓaa o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ na ga, o nya-wa, o be Levii gbaka wa hɔ ŋgimbi kaɗa tom, pɛm nɛ̀
Wi ha̧ so kànà o nɔ̧́ kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛn zu fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ mbɛt e see zu o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ, bá nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa ɗafa nɛ̀ yuwar gasa GASA WAN sɛn kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ woyo.
Ezɛkias in dukbíí kpaa desee wen nɛ Sɔ̧ dea ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ̀ haya-a, zik mɔ na.
Wannu Ezɛkias baa keta in o gasawi kɔ‘i sɛn Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, ɓɛɛ pi̧ tom mbaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ o be Efraim in Manase wen ha̧ wa mɛ gar pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O betom kaia o kalata nɛ̀ wannu in o gasawi yɔra, ɓɛɛ pɛsi dam nú
«Ɛnɛ o be
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o zɔmwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ dee so ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ de ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ mbɔli wa hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ iŋa’ɛ ga na.
Kinii, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋgazu hee o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii tɛ

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN, o wi nɛ kaia so o nya'nɛ́ in o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ de ko ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ee wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ nù'ɛ, wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-e-ɗaŋmɔ in wan-de-ko, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka e'nɛ́ duk na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ a̧.»
O betom nɛ̀ɛ̀ dam tɛ ye nú Efraim in nú Manase kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ nú Zabulɔŋ mɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí mam wa, zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ wen kɔ-wa.
Mɔ kpɔk, wen'i yee tɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ zuduk ko Asɛr in ko Manase bá nɛ̀ ko Zabulɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i gar pii Jerusalɛm.
Sɛn nù Juda mbɛt, GASA WAN dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ mbo zu tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko wannu nɛ̀ o gasawi tɔ̧ wen-aa.
Bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧a sɛn Jerusalɛm wen dee gbaŋa
Wa yee tɛ gbina o
Wa dee gbaŋa
Kóó o ndé duk nɛ́ fara-tom kɔ‘i nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ, bíí ko Sɔ̧. O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gbai kɔ‘i nɛ́ tɔk saɗi nɛ̀ o be Levii ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ a zu
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mgbara giiwi
Dɔka o bíí mgbara o be Efraim, o be Manase, o bíí ko Isakar in o be Zabulɔŋ
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ; nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó nɛ̀ oi war-tɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ sa̧ na’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa, wen wa ha̧a̧ see-wa nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ wen kia mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.»
GASA WAN kpɛka akamɔ ko Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu dukbíí na.
O be
O wen ko Ezɛkias baa see o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ desee zu GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ-gaŋmɔ, gasi nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
Giiwi nɛ̀ mɔi̧a kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa mɛ de gbaŋa siti tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo. Duka nɛ́ mɔɔ desee nyɛmna zaŋ zɛ nɔ‘i,
wen wannu Ezɛkias ha̧a̧ so wiwii ndai booro in o sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ giiwi; ɓɛɛ o dita-bíí ha̧ kɔ‘i wiwii ndai booro mbɛt in o sami booro-ɓu. O dɔka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧
O bíí nù Juda lɛŋ kpaa desee gu nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, in o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn wen gbaŋa'i, sɛka o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ pia nù Juda mbɛt.
Gasa desee batɛ duka nɛ́ ko o bíí Jerusalɛm, wen sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi ko Salomɔŋ, bem ko David, wannu
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔ kaɗa lɛŋ kaɗi, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí. Kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa daŋa hɔ yiwese tɛ
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ gbaŋa kaɗa lɛŋ, o be
Ezɛkias kɛ̧ɛ̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ dùk-aa, ɓɛɛ usi yuwar tom kɔ-wa ha̧ wa. War ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii, kɔ-wa nɛ́
Wannu mbɛt baa ŋma mbɔi kɔ‘i e wen ɗafa sɔ̧ wan mɛ tuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛka wan mɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ in wan mɛ gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ bá nɛ̀ o géé gbaŋa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yɔra so zaŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN ga.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Jerusalɛm mɛ ha̧ war mɔ ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ha̧ wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpa war mɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-wa tɛ tom nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ Heembea ko GASA WAN.
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o be
O bíí tɛ geɗek ye Juda in o be
Sɛn tɛ taar fio-zɛ, wa ku̧u̧ naŋ mɔi̧a dùk-aa a nɛ̀ war-a, ɓɛɛ wa kaɗi tom-aa tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias in o gasawi tɛɛ zɔk mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ‘i, wa zɔna GASA WAN in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧
Ezɛkias aka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii zu mɔi̧a o ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i,

ɓɛɛ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria, tɛ nutua ko Sadɔk kifi nú ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ndɛma zu-nyɔnɔ pii kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɛɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ yɛ sur nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ oi-aa ɓɔna nɛ̀ dɔka-a mbɛt, wen GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu dukbíí kɔ‘i. O wan nɛ̀ ya mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ, nɛ́ oi-aa nɛ̀ ɓɔna.»
Ezɛkias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi de fara-a-nyɔŋmɔ sɛn ká̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa ɗafa fara kaɗi,
wa kaia o zu-nyɔnɔ in o ŋma dɔka ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nɛnɛ a hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a. Nɛ́ Kɔnania ŋma be Levii á̧ duka zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i in nya kɔ̧-a̧ Simɛi, gbama wi-de-tom in a̧ zu mɔ‘i.
Wannu Ezɛkias in gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Azaria wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧ hoka Kɔnania in Simɛi mɛ duk zu Yehiɛl, Azaria, Nahat, Asahɛl, Yɛrimɔt, Yozabad, Eliɛl, Ismakia, Mahat in Bɛnaya.
Kore ŋma be Levii, bem ko Imna wi-pɛm-nú garo nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese duk so kɔ‘i zu o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧, kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀‘i ha̧a̧ ha̧ GASA WAN in o mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.

Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ Edɛn, Miniamin, Yesua, Sɛmaya, Amaria in Sɛkania duka kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o nya-wa nɛ̀ see kpɔk, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa. Kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ bo na, kóó nɛ́ gasawi, kóó nɛ́ obem.

Bo nɛ wa duka kɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, in o wi nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa ɓɛɛ na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ taar in o wan nɛ̀ de tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Wi yɔr so nin o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nutua kɔ-wa; war ko o be Levii, o wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yaknɛ siti, wi yɔra nin-wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gíí-wa in dùk-wa.
Yɔra nin bíí duka so nɛ́ mɔ wen bíí nutua nɛ̀ oi-aa: okoo, be-wiwii in be-okoo gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ in wa nɛ̀ war-tɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ sa̧a̧ ha̧a̧mɔ in wa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ nɛ̀ ɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ sɛn ká̧ o ye-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wa hoka so o ŋma bíí wen tom kɛ̧ɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa, in ha̧ o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i yɔra nin-wa kaɗi mbɛt.
Ezɛkias dee mɔ hegɔ dam nù Juda lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ̀ de-a, in nɛ̀ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ kpɛk.
Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗafa Tua ko GASA WAN, a̧ kia mɛ de nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ see kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Ɗoŋ mboozu ko Ezɛkias ha̧ GASA WAN, Senakerib wannu Asirii baa zu dúk nɛ̀ o ye-ŋgárá nù Juda wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ezɛkias zɔka'e Senakerib tɛɛ mɛ bi Jerusalɛm,
a̧ baa keta in o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o gasa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ wen kpee zu-zer nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye. Wa kpɛka,
ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɔi̧ mɛ kpe o be-zer in o yì nɛ̀ fok zu nù‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ o wannu Asirii mɛ hɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ wa kpaa yì nɛ̀ dɔka-a na.»
Ezɛkias yee tɛ mboo o garo in o fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ̀ gbina'i nɛ̀ kin-tɛ. A̧ mboo o wan mɛ zu garo, a̧ ɗafa Milo sɛn
A̧ aa so o gasa wi-biro mɛ ya zu dukbíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ wa pii katɛ a̧ sɛn nú garo saaye'i ha̧ nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ́ ŋga-wi in o wi-kpee-see! K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu mɔ in k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì ti wannu Asirii gú nɛ̀ gíí wi-biro nɛ̀ a̧a̧ in a̧ na, wen wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ yɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai gan wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ-aa.
Kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ géé ŋgai-tɛ ko bíí a̧ duk in a̧, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ a̧a̧ in yɛɛ mɛ gbak yɛ in mɛ de biro in yɛɛ!» Dukbíí kpaa ŋgai tɛ wen ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Senakerib wannu Asirii nɛ̀ ɓɔna so sɛn Lakis in o wi-biro kɔ‘i toma wa sitɛ Ezɛkias wannu Juda, in o wi Juda nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so in a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa:
«Senakerib wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, wi n’ɛnɛ e nɛ̀ ta'nɛ́, s’ɛnɛ ya nɛnɛ sɛn saaye Jerusalɛm'i nɛ́ o?
Zɔ́k Ezɛkias ɔr nɛ́ ɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ fe wɔ in wɔ-yì, tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ n'aa tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e ndé, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘i tɛ gbo wi er-am wó‘i.
Bó nɛ́ Ezɛkias a̧ gbina o
Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋ so mɔ nɛ̀ mi in o dáà kɔ‘m dee in oi o dɔka dukbíí zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ na nde? O sɔ̧ ko tugun bíí zu nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ kpasa o bíí kɔ-wa yinɛ er am nde?
Nɛ́ ge sɔ̧ ge mgbara o sɔ̧ ko o tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m kuma’ɛ a̧ foo bíí kɔ‘i gbonɛ er-am ge?

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii, ká Ezɛkias ɔr'nɛ́ hegɔ ɓɔna! K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen sɔ̧ ko ŋma tugun bíí, kóó sɔ̧ ko ŋma wan nyɛm mɛ gbo bíí kɔ‘i kɔ̧ er o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m in kɔ̧ er-am yinɛ na. Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛm mɛ gbo'nɛ́ er-am na.»
O betom ko Senakerib tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Senakerib wannu Asirii yɔra kalata wen báá tɛ̀ wé nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O betom ko Senakerib duka tɔ̧ wen nɔ‘i nɛ̀ hee ger nɛ̀ nú hébreu ha̧ o be Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ yaa zu garo wen pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ-wa in ha̧ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ mɛ ba wa wen kpaa yuwar mɛ ba ye.
Wa duka tɔ̧ wen tɛ Sɔ̧ Jerusalɛm hee wen-tɛ géé-sɔ̧ ko oi o dɔka dukbíí nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ géé sɛka-te nɛ̀‘i dee dee nɛ̀ er ga.
Zu mɔ‘i, wannu Ezɛkias in

Hegɔ, GASA WAN toma ŋma betom mɛ yiwese ɓɛɛ gbɛ o ŋgaŋa wi-biro, o gasa wi-duk-zu biro in o dita-bíí sɛn kɔ̧ gbagari ko wannu Asirii. A̧ sii ɗoŋ si nù kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ foe; ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa yee tua ko sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, o bem kɔ̧-a̧ gɔma a̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa gbɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN kpasa nɛ Ezɛkias in o bíí Jerusalɛm er Senakerib wannu Asirii in er o ŋma wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ ee ga̧a̧mɔ mgbara wa in o nu nɛ ya zik wa lɛŋ.
Zu mɔ nɛ yaka'i, o bíí nɛ dɔka-a kaia ha̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm ha̧ GASA WAN in ha̧ Ezɛkias wannu Juda nɛ kpaa so hura-nin ti o tugun bíí lɛŋ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Ezɛkias ɔɔ gasa zɛɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ a̧; a̧ aia nú ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zii kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kpasi nɛ̀ a̧.
Mɛ ɗoŋ, Ezɛkias mbo zu ha̧ GASA WAN na. Hegɔ a̧ gasa zu a̧ ɓɛɛ deemɔ‘i aŋ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ pi̧ zu a̧, pi̧ zu nù Juda in zu Jerusalɛm mbɛt.
Mɔ kpɔk, Ezɛkias in o bíí Jerusalɛm iŋa yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ nyimsea ko GASA WAN tik zu wa ŋgimbi-wan ko Ezɛkias na.
Ezɛkias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ mbɔi in a̧ kpaa hura-nin nɛ̀ dɔka-a; a̧ ɗafa o fara-a-bu-mbɔi, o lɔr, o ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya, o nɔ̧́-nyama, o ŋgee in o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ sede-a ɔ ŋgaya.
A̧ dee o dam wen aa alkamaari kɔ̧-a̧, fara-a-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nɔ̧́, o ɓoramɔ wen o mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ in o fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ-wa.
A̧ dee o ye, a̧ kpaa o sami, o gbadua in o ndai nɛ̀ dɔka-a wen Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ mbɔi ha̧ a̧ nyɛmna.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Ezɛkias a̧ gera be-zer Gihɔŋ ɓɛɛ yì mbaŋ si ɗɔɔ nɛ̀ war yee-wese hɔ tɛ
Hegɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o betom nɛ̀ wa toma so nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ nɛnɛ tɛ a̧ wen iŋa mɔ zu gasamɔ nɛ̀ dee zu nù kɔ̧-a̧ hɔa, GASA WAN wee Ezɛkias, ɓɛɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ-a.
Oi nyɛrɛ mɔ ko Ezɛkias nɛ̀ dea yɔra sɛn zaŋ Kalata zɔka mɔ ko

Ezɛkias fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ nɛ̀ war ŋgɔn sɛn ká̧ pɛsi-fio ko o bezaŋ David. O bíí Juda nɛ̀ oi zu in o bíí Jerusalɛm mɔi̧a hi̧i̧ fio kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ zɔnamɔ, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ɔ wan oi-aa.
Manase a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a sɛn yí GASA WAN tɛ ndaka ɗoŋ ndiŋ ɗaŋmɔ ko o ŋma zuduk bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN ndaka so yinɛ ti o be
A̧ ɗafa o
A̧ mboo o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ baa tɔ̧ so'e: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn Jerusalɛm hɛ̧ɛ̧ a̧ nin-am tɛ duk sɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo» wó'ɛ.
A̧ mboo o fara-gasi o sɔra sɛn nú zala Tua ko GASA WAN yiitoo lɛŋ.
A̧ dɔɔ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Bɛn-Hinɔm; a̧ dee mɔɔ-gbánà, o mɔɔ-kifi in o mɔɔ-dua; a̧ nɛɛ tɛ o wi-sa-sɔ̧-fio in o wi-a-ŋgala; a̧ tu̧u̧ see GASA WAN tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ siti sɛn yí-a.
A̧ baa ŋma géé-sɔ̧ n'aa duia e sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧; zu-a'i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ David in bem kɔ‘i Salomɔŋ‘e: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua’ɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm mgbara o dɔka ye sɛn
Hegɔ, kà o be
Tɛ mɔ‘i, Manase dee ha̧ o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ gan ko o ŋma zuduk bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN kuma yinɛ ti o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Manase in ha̧ dukbíí nù kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na.
GASA WAN foo o gasa wi-biro ko wannu Asirii pi̧ zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ káná nú Manase; wa gbama nyak-ndɛrɛ hɛr nɛ̀ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ba a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ bɔnɛ gana zu a̧ kaɗi, a̧ aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, gu nɛ̀ nù ti Sɔ̧ ko o dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ kɔfa GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ see GASA WAN ga̧. GASA WAN zia kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ ɔ wan woyo. Hegɔ Manase iŋa'e, GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Manase mboo gasa kusa garo zik nɛ̀
A̧ kaia o gɔni sɔ̧, o géé-sɔ̧ gbonɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin o fara-ɗafi-wa nɛ wa dee so zu kaya, fara nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i in o wan mɛ saaye Jerusalɛm lɛŋ kai a taŋ.
A̧ mboo
Zu-a'i, o giiwi duka kànà tɛ ɗafa sɔ̧ sɛn zu o
Oi nyɛrɛ tom ko Manase, kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in o wen ko o
Nyɛrɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in ee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ee ha̧ a̧, o nyɛrɛ zu dee ɗaŋmɔ in o ŋgazu kɔ̧-a̧, o
Manase fea si ɗoŋ o dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧; hegɔ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Amɔŋ ɔɔ wan oi-aa.
Amɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan sɛn Jerusalɛm pɛ yiitoo.
A̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ sɛn yí GASA WAN hee dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase ga. Amɔŋ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Manase mboo so ɓɛɛ a̧ gasi wa.
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ gbar ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ dee so ga na. Ɗaŋmɔ ko Amɔŋ gana zu ko dáà kɔ‘i.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ baa ɗaŋ keta zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɛ ɗoŋ, o be Juda gbɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ keta zu Amɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de wan ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Josias.
Josias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-taar-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
A̧ dee mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ti GASA WAN, kànà hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David dee so ga; a̧ ba ŋma yuwar si wiiko kóó si gale na.
Sɛn ɗoŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Josias, ká a̧ ɓɔna nɛ̀ be-ŋgaiwi, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ kia mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ David kɔ̧a̧. Ɗoŋ n'aa kpaa pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo tɛ wan, a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗaŋa o
Wa gbina o tua-ɗafi Bal a nù nɛ̀ gbaayí-a in o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ Sɔ̧ Bal a nù mbɛt. Wa gbina o mɔɔ nɔ‘i a nù nduku-nduku, ɓɛɛ wa kai o oi gbina-a a zu pɛsi-fio ko o wi nɛ̀ yaa so ɗafi nɛ̀ Bal.
Wa dɔɔ gba̧a̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Bal sɛn zu mgbák fara nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i ɗafi so a̧ sɛnɛ‘i. Mɔ nɛ̀ Josias dee ɗafi nɛ̀ war nù Juda in ye Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ kpɔk kale mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ dee sɛn nú Manase, nú Efraim, nú Simɛɔŋ, nú Nɛftalii gú nɛ̀ o be ye katɛ wa lɛŋ.
Josias ha̧a̧ nú, ɓɛɛ wa gbin o fara-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧, o te nɛ̀‘i gasi gasi in o géé-sɔ̧ yinɛ; a̧ gbina wa nduku-nduku a nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ o fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn nú

Ɗoŋ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan ko Josias, ŋgimbi n'aa ɗafa war nù in war Tua ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi, a̧ toma Safaŋ bem ko Asaliya sitɛ Masɛya, gasawi zu zika-nù, sitɛ Jɔas bem ko Jɔakas betom ko wannu wen ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗafi Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa nɛɛ kpa Hilkia gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ wa baa tɛnɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ mbɔi nɛ̀ o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-tua ko Sɔ̧ mɔi̧a so er o bíí nú Manase, nú Efraim, er o be

Wa kaia o mbɔi nɔ‘i ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ ha̧ o wi-duk-zu tom nɛ̀ ya wen zɔka tom Tua ko GASA WAN; ɓɛɛ o wi-duk-zu tom Tua ko GASA WAN kai o sede nɔ‘i wen ɗafa Tua in yoɓa-a nɛ̀ o wi-mgboi-tua in o wi-mbo-tua, gú nɛ̀ oi o dɔka wi-de-tom in wen hi̧fa o sɛka-ta in o gaŋgala-tua, in wen ɗafa o ŋma tua nɛ̀ o wannu Juda ee so gbin a nù.

O wi nɔ‘i dee tom kɔ-wa nɛ̀ de-a. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yahat in Obadia, o be Levii tɛ nú-gara ko Mɛrari ká bá nɛ̀ Zakarii in Mɛsulam, tɛ nú-gara ko Kehat a̧ yaa zu tom nɔ‘i. O ŋma be Levii nɛ̀ ya so nɛ́ o wi-mbɛr-mɔ,
yaa so zu o wi-tui-mɔ in oi o wi-de-tom lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa. Mgbara o be Levii, o ŋma nɛ́ o wi-yɔr-kalata, o mɔ-geŋa in o wi-pɛm-tua.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ɓɔna fara kaia o mbɔi wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ kuɓa, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia kpaa kalata Heembea ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ Moisɛ ee so.
Hilkia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi kpaa kalata Heembea sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.» Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata'i ha̧ Safaŋ,
ɓɛɛ Safaŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kalata'i ha̧ ha̧ wannu, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ tɛ dee mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ de'i.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ mbɔi nɛ̀ duka wen tom Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duka so kɔ̧ kuɓa ha̧ o wi-de-tom.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ siti ha̧ wannu woyo: «Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia ha̧a̧ kalata’ɛ ha̧‘m mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ ku̧naŋ tɔra kalata'i ti wannu.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zia wen nƐ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea'i kaɗi, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-a a nU.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Hilkia in Ahikam o bem ko Safaŋ, ha̧ Abdɔŋ bem ko Mika, ha̧ wi-yɔr-kalata Safaŋ in ha̧ Asaya o wi-de-tom ko wannu hegɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ wór GASA WAN wen am in wen o be

Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Hilkia gú nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ wannu hoka so nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Hulda okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, kóò ko Salum wi-pɛm-laa, bem ko Tokehat, bezaŋ Hasra nɛ̀ ɔ so ndɔŋ nú mbe ye Jerusalɛm. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧‘i,
a̧ kifa nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
mi tɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o fom nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ wa tɔra ha̧ wannu Juda'i.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o be Jerusalɛm ea'm duk, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧, tu̧ nɛ̀ see-am, ha̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee ha̧‘m mbɛt ga, tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m ɔ dita zu ye'i ɓɛɛ beka kaɗi na.›
War ko wannu Juda nɛ toma'nɛ́ tɛnɛ sɛn ti'm'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e: ‹Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mɛ iŋa mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de in Jerusalɛm gú nɛ̀ o bíí saaye mbɛt; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ mɛ dee ko nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ ti'm. Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ mɛ dea'i yee tɛ‘m, mi GASA WAN;
hegɔ, mi tɛ e mɛ tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ̀ o dáà kɔ-mɛ. Wa tɛ gun mɛ nɛ̀ de-a sɛn kɔ̧ fio kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ beka zɔk ŋgamɔ n'am tɛ fo pi̧ zu Jerusalɛm in bíí saaye na.› »
Ɓɛɛ o betom ba kifa-nú siɗoŋ ha̧ wannu.
Wannu Josias saa o gasawi Juda in Jerusalɛm lɛŋ tɛnɛ pii tɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa yak si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN in o wi nɔ‘i, bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii gú nɛ̀ o bíí saaye Jerusalɛm lɛŋ, kóó ge bíí ge ndé mbɛt; a̧ tɔra mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kalata
Wannu kura yor zu mɔ nɛ̀ kusa-a, ɓɛɛ a̧
Wannu dee ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya sɛn Jerusalɛm in sɛn nú Bɛnjamin mɛ nɔ tɔk'i mbɛt. Ɗoŋ-aa'i o bíí nɛ̀ ɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm mboo zu tɛ
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Josias dee nɛnɛ ha̧ gasa géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa duka so gasi zu nù
Josias dee gbaŋa
A̧ ee tom ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ er-wa ha̧ nɛ̀ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ wa mɛ de tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ de-a.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii nɛ̀ ya so wen usa mɔ ha̧ o be
Wa a̧ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa nɛ̀ nú-gara in nɛ̀ dùk tom nɛ̀ wa de, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yɔramɔ ko David wannu
O be Levii a̧ nɛ́k sɛn ká̧
Wa a̧ dé gbaŋa
Josias ha̧a̧ o mɔ-dai, o
O dita-bíí nɛ̀ ya katɛ wannu ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ dukbíí, ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ̀ desee: Hilkia, Zakarii in Yehiɛl nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ o gasawi kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ o
Kɔnania in o nya-a̧ Sɛmaya bá nɛ̀ Nɛtaneɛl sɛka Hasabia, Yehiɛl in Yozabad, o gasawi zu o be Levii ha̧a̧ kɔ-wa nɛ́ o be sami booro-mɔɔrɔ in o ndai gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ ha̧ o be Levii wen gbaŋa
Yuwar ɗafa gbaŋa'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ya kɔ‘i fara kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o be Levii yaa nɛ̀ dùk-aa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko wannu.
Oi o dɔka bíí gɔna o saɗi gbaŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ba kɔ‘i nɛ́ tɔk gbai a zu
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ha̧ war ko o zuduk be
Wa gii kpoo

Wa gii war kɔ-wa in ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ɓɔna so kɔ-wa tɛ dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in o nɔ̧́-a̧ hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o be Levii gi nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘i in ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bem ko Arɔŋ.

O wi-bii-gima, o bezaŋ Asaf yaa so kɔ-wa fara kɔ-wa, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ geŋa ko David in Asaf ká bá nɛ̀ Heman in Yedutun, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ wannu. O wi-pɛm-tua yaa so kànà fara kɔ-wa dam lɛŋ. O ndé yu fara tom kɔ‘i yak si ŋma fara na, wen o nya-wa, o be Levii gii so nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ ha̧ wa mbɛt.
Wa ɗafa yuwar tom ko GASA WAN ha̧ wa mɛ de gbaŋa
Hegɔ o be
Wa de so ŋma gbaŋa
Nɛ́ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan ko Josias a̧ gbaŋa'i dee nɛnɛ.
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wannu Josias ɗafa ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi, Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ kura biro si Karkɛmis, ku nɛ̀ Efrat in o wi-biro kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Josias we ti a̧ mɛ bi a̧.

Nɛko toma o betom mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Josias hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ mgbara yɛ sa mɛ gɔn nú‘m’ɛ nde, wannu Juda? Bó nɛ́ mi tɛ mɛ́ bi nɛ́ mɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i na, mi tɛ mɛ́ bi nɛ́ ŋma wisɛn kɔ‘m nɛtɛ. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndé, a̧‘m dé mɔ nɛ̀ haya-a. Ká mɛ we zu mɛ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk in am na, ká a̧ tɛɛ gbɛ mɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Josias kɔ̧ so mɛ e war ha̧ a̧ na. A̧ kii so nɛ́ ŋma war mɛ bi ŋmaa in a̧. A̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ zii wen ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ Nɛko tɔ̧‘i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧ ká̧ ta-mbar-nyaŋa sɛn Mɛgido.
O wi-pi̧-góò pi̧i̧ Josias, ɓɛɛ Josias tɔ̧ ha̧ baka-nyaŋa kɔ‘i: «Mɛ̀ bá‘m yaknɛ, mi baa da̧i̧ nyɛmna.»

Ɓɛɛ o wi-de-tom ko Josias ba a̧ kɔ̧ keekee-nyaŋa-biro kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ e sɛn kɔ̧ ŋma keekee kɔ̧-a̧ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ba a̧ yaknɛ si Jerusalɛm. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Josias nɛɛ fe sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn fara nɛ̀ wa guna so o dáà kɔ̧-a̧. O bíí Juda in Jerusalɛm gara hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Oi o nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ Josias dea in o ŋma demɔ n'aa dea so a̧a̧ zaŋ Kalata Heembea ko GASA WAN.
O mɔ n'aa dee so tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ sɔŋkur-aa yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu
O giiwi saaye lɛŋ baa Jɔakas bem ko Josias e tɛ wan. Wa dee wan ha̧ a̧ oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Ŋgimbi yee wan ko Jɔakas, a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ ndaka a̧ tɛ wan yinɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gbo garama ha'i tɛ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar in kilo lɔr ɓu-taar.
Wannu Egiptɛ dee wan Juda in wan Jerusalɛm ha̧ Eliakim nya Jɔakas, ɓɛɛ gɔn mbe nin Eliakim nɛ́ Jɔakim. War ko Jɔakas nya Jɔakim, Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ baa a̧ yaknɛ si sɛn nú Egiptɛ.
Jɔakim yee wan ká̧ a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧; a̧ baa a̧ hɛr nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ ba a̧ yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ,
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia o nyɛk kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN si Babilɔŋ wen ɗafa tua-wan kɔ̧-a̧.
Oi o tom ko Jɔakim, o ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea in o mɔ nɛ̀ kpaa a̧ yɔra zaŋ Kalata ko o wannu
Jɔakin yee wan ká̧ a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan fio-zɛ taar nɛ̀ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu sɛn Jerusalɛm. A̧ yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN.
Tɛ mbe pɛ, wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr tɛ̀ɛ̀ ba a̧ yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ, gú nɛ̀ o mɔɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ. Ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr de wan Juda in Jerusalɛm ha̧ Sedekias, nya Jɔakin.
Sedekias yee wan ká̧ a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk. A̧ ɔɔ wan Jerusalɛm pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk.
A̧ yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧ nɛa-a mɛ gɔm er ti
A̧ dee so ŋgazu in wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr nɛ̀ dee so ha̧ a̧ mɛ kan mɔ ti GASA WAN. A̧ mbo zu na, see-aa ŋgaia, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ kpai see-aa wen ndaka pata GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Kale-a mbɛt, o geɗek wanye Juda lɛŋ, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ gú nɛ̀ dukbíí lɛŋ yaa so de nɛ̀ kale ɗaŋmɔ‘i sɛn ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa de ndiŋ a tɛ Tua nɛ̀ GASA WAN ee so nɛtɛ wen tɛ-wi sɛn Jerusalɛm.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa ee so tom nú o
ɓɛɛ wa zɛkɛɗi o
GASA WAN dee ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ mɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ wa; a̧ kuma o daŋa ŋgaiwi hegɔ hɔ sɛn kɔ̧
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia o mɔɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ, in mbɔi-tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm mbɛt; a̧ kaia o mbɔi kɔ̧ tua ko wannu gú nɛ̀ o dita-bíí lɛŋ. Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr di̧i̧ mɔ lɛŋ kai si Babilɔŋ.
Wa dɔɔ Tua ko Sɔ̧, gbin garo Jerusalɛm, pi̧ wee tɛ o tua-wan, ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋ o demɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so saaye lɛŋ yinɛ.
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia o wi nɛ̀ ɓɔna kpasa lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro, ɓɛɛ wa ya nɛ́ bara kɔ̧-a̧ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ kaɗa wan ko o bíí Pɛrsɛ.
Hegɔ, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú
Tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ, GASA WAN hu̧i̧a̧ taamɔ ko Sirus ha̧ wen’ɛ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀ nú

«Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ tɔ̧a̧: ‹GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ yiwese ha̧a̧ o mɔɔ-wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ de Tua ha̧ a̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm sɛn nù Juda. Kóó o ndé mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dúk in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ sí ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm.› »
Sirus ɔɔ so nɛ wan Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr wen’ɛ tɛ kuti pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i ha̧ o bíí nù lɛŋ mɛ tɔr, ha̧ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú
Wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan zu nù lɛŋ ha̧‘m. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m mbó Tua ha'i sɛn Jerusalɛm, nù Juda.
GASA WAN a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si Jerusalɛm nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Fara nɛ oi dukbíí ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ, o bíí fara nɔ‘i a̧ há̧ kànà bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o de mɔ, o mɔ-dai, in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ Jerusalɛm.»
O gasawi nutua ko Juda in o gasawi nù ko Bɛnjamin gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii, ge bíí ge ndé nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ kura yak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mbo Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ duk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
O bíí nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ wa lɛŋ gbaka wa nɛ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o demɔ, o mɔ-dai, ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya; wi tɔr o mɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ ta-tɛ e zu-a na.
Wannu Sirus kaia o nyɛk Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia so yaknɛ Jerusalɛm a kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i gbonɛ.
Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Mitredat wi-zɔk-mbɔi mɛ kai wa, ɓɛɛ Mitredat tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛsbasar be-wan Juda mɛ tɔr tɔra-a.
Mɔ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ: nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi booro; paa ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar;
mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa-naar-nɛ-ɓu; in o ŋma géé nyɛk booro.
O mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar. Sɛsbasar kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o bara-biro daŋa nɛnɛ nɛ Babilɔŋ si Jerusalɛm.
O bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ pia ɗoŋ nɛ dɔka-a mɛ ba nù kɔ-wa. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ pia ɗoŋ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Wa pia in o gasawi kɔ-wa Zorobabɛl, Josue, Nehemii, Sɛraya, Relaya, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispar, Bigvai, Rɛhum in Baana.
Dùk be
Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
ko Sɛfatia nɛ́ 372;
ko Ara nɛ́ 775;
ko Pahat-Mɔab, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua in Yɔab nɛ́ 2.812;
ko Elam nɛ́ 1.254;
ko Zatu 945;
ko Zakai nɛ́ 760;
ko Bani nɛ́ 642;
ko Bebai nɛ́ 623;
ko Azgad nɛ́ 1.222;
ko Adɔnikam nɛ́ 666;
ko Bigvai nɛ́ 2.056;
ko Adin nɛ́ 454;
ko Atɛr, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yɛhiskia nɛ́ 98;
ko Besai nɛ́ 323;
ko Yɔra nɛ́ 112;
ko Hasum nɛ́ 223;
ko Gibar nɛ́ 95.
O be Bɛtlɛhɛm nɛ́ 123;
o be Nɛtɔfa nɛ́ 56;
o be Anatot nɛ́ 128;
o be Asmavɛt nɛ́ 42;
o be Kiriat-Yearim, Kefira in Bɛrot nɛ́ 743;
o be Rama in Geba nɛ́ 621;
o be Mikmas nɛ́ 122;
o be Bɛtɛl in Ai nɛ́ 223;
o be Nɛbo nɛ́ 52;
o be Magbis nɛ́ 156;
nú-gara ko ŋma Elam nɛ́ bíí 1.254;
ko Harim 320;
o be Lod in Hadid in Ɔnɔ nɛ́ 725;
o be Jeriko nɛ́ 345;
o be Sɛnaa 3.630
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bíí nú-gara ko Yɛdaya; mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧ o bezaŋ Josue nɛ́ 973;
nú-gara ko Imɛr nɛ́ bíí 1.052;
ko Pasɛhur nɛ́ 1.247;
ko Harim nɛ́ 1.017.
Tɛ zuduk ko Levii, tɛ nú-gara ko Yesua in Kadmiɛl, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Hɔdavia nɛ́ bíí 74.
O wi-bii-gima kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Asaf nɛ́ 128.
O wi-pɛm-nú tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Salum, ko Atɛr, ko Talmɔŋ, ko Akub, ko Hatita ká bá nɛ̀ ko Sɔbai nɛ́ bíí 139.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Siha, ko Hasufa, ko Tabaot;
ko Keros, ko Siaha, ko Padɔŋ,
ko Lebana, ko Hagaba, ko Akub;
ko Hagab, ko Salmai, ko Hanaŋ,
ko Gidɛl, ko Gahar, ko Reaya;
ko Rɛsin, ko Nɛkɔda, ko Gazam;
ko Uza, ko Pasɛa, ko Besai;
ko Asna, ko Mɛhunim, ko Nɛfusim;
ko Bakbuk, ko Hakufa, ko Harur;
ko Baslut, ko Mɛhida, ko Harsa;
ko Barkos, ko Sisɛra, ko Tama;
ko Nɛsia ká bá nɛ̀ ko Hatifa.
O bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sotai, ko Soferɛt, ko Pɛruda;
ko Yala, ko Darkɔŋ, ko Gidɛl;
ko Sɛfatia, ko Hatil, ko Pokɛrɛt-Hasɛbayim, ká bá nɛ ko Ami.
Dɔka wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ 392.
O wi nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adaŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ
nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobiya in ko Nɛkɔda: dɔka wa nɛ́ 652.
Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, tɛ nú-gara ko Hobaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bó nɛ́ mgbák nin-a na. A̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
Wi-duk-zu-nù dora nyɔŋmɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
Giiwi nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ 42.360.
O wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na. Wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337. O wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 200.
O dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, o sunda nɛ́ 245,
o ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435, ɓɛɛ o tuifuu nɛ́ 6.720.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm, o ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko GASA WAN, wen ɗafa-a e oi-aa.
Wa ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom ko Sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-wa; duka nɛ́ kilo lɔr 61.000, kilo bu-mbɔi 5.000 ká bá nɛ̀ gba-laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ 100.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o ŋma bíí sɛn mgbara dukbíí, o wi-pɛm-tua in o wi-de-tom sii ɗoŋ de ye mgbák kuti ye kɔ-wa so nɛti. Hegɔ,
Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ girwɔ hɔɔ nɛnɛ, ká o be
Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-a̧ nɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Zorobabɛl bem ko Saltiɛl in o nya-a̧ kura, ɓɛɛ wa mbo
Kíì o bíí nù‘i de wa dee mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ mboo fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i sɛn oi fara'i. Wa wɛka
Wa dee gbaŋa Tua-laa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra ga, wɛk nɛ
Wa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ wan mɛ wese lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, wa tɛɛ dɔ wan mɛ mbe yí-zɛ in o wan mɛ wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN, ká bá nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ bíí ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ta-tɛ.
Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ dɔɔ kpoo ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ ko girwɔ; ká ŋgimbi'i wa tɛ e géé naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.

Wa ha̧a̧ sede ha̧ o wi-sɛk-ta in o wi-gba-te ká bá nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ in o dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o nɔ̧́ ha̧ o be Sidɔŋ in Tir wen ha̧ wa mɛ kai te-gbatui Libaŋ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ zu yì hɔ Jafa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ.

Wa hɔɔ fara Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm dee pɛ yiitoo nɛ fio-zɛ yiitoo kaɗi, sɛka Zorobabɛl, bem ko Saltiɛl in Josue bem ko Yosadak biti ku̧ naŋ tom Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ o nya-wa in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii bá nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara pii Jerusalɛm gbak wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa a o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in gan mbɛt mgbara o be Levii zu tom Tua ko Sɔ̧‘i.

Nɛ̀ war ko Josue in o bem kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o nya-wi gú nɛ̀ Kadmiɛl in o bem kɔ‘i nɛ duk nɛ́ o bezaŋ Juda, wa nɛka wen usa ɗoŋ tom ha̧ wi-de-tom kpɔk kpɔk nɛ de tom Tua ko Sɔ̧, wi tɔ̧ ko o bem ko Henadad, in o bem kɔ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ nya-wa o be Levii na.
O wi-de-tom a̧ e naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN'i, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ pi̧ de laa kɔ‘i, kai o mɔɔ-dɔm kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ gasi Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ David wannu
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɔ‘i bia gima gasi nɛ Sɔ̧‘e:
«Sɔ̧ nɛ́ de wi,
Bíí lɛŋ gaia mɔ, gasi nɛ Sɔ̧, wen zu naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ wa e'i.

O ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o ŋma be Levii in o ŋma gasawi nutua nɛ sɔka nɛ zɔka so kuti Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duka nɛti zɔka mbe naŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ zu gba̧‘a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ ger gbo, ɓɛɛ o ŋma bíí gai kɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ nɛ desee.
Hegɔ, wi nyɛm mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara gaia mɔ desee in hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ ko o bíí na, wen giti ger bíí nɛ̀ de mɔ nyɛmna. Wi duk nɛ nyɛi̧a-a zii nɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wisɛn ko Juda in Bɛnjamin zia'e, o wi nɛ wa kaia so yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro mbo nɛ́ Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
wa tɛɛ kpa Zorobabɛl in o gasawi nutua
Zorobabɛl in Josue gú nɛ̀ o gasawi nutua
O bíí nù‘i pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ o be Juda, ha̧ gba̧a̧ tɛ-wa mɛ gbin, wen ká tom'i tɛɛ nɛ siti.
Wa aa wen ha̧ o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu mɛ dor tom Tua'i; wa dora tom'i tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ Sirus ɔɔ nɛ wan Pɛrsɛ hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ Darius baa nɛ wan Pɛrsɛ mbɛt.
Zɛrzɛs baa wan, ɓɛɛ tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i, o wi nɔ‘i wula o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm ha̧ a̧.

Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, Artazɛrzɛs baa wan Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ Biselam, Mitredat in Tabeɛl ká bá nɛ̀ o sɛm kɔ-wa yɔr kalata ha̧ a̧, wuli nɛ o be Jerusalɛm. Kalata'i, wa yɔra yɔra-a nɛ nú aram in yɔramɔ-a nɛ́ yɔramɔ aram mbɛt.
Rɛhum wannu Samarii in mɔ-geŋa Simsai yɔra kalata’ɛ ha̧ wannu Artazɛrzɛs wuli nɛ o be Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ ga:

«Ɛɛ o wi-yɔr-kalata’ɛ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Rɛhum wannu Samarii in Simsai mɔ-geŋa, in o gbama wi-de-tom in wa lɛŋ; o wi-gɔn-kita in o betom, o gasawi Pɛrsɛ in o be Urak, o be Babilɔŋ, in o be Susa, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧ o be Elam,
ká bá nɛ̀ oi bíí lɛŋ nɛ gasa wannu Asurbanipal kaia so tɛnɛ a sɛn Samarii in nɛ kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese.»
Kalata nɛ wa yɔra so tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Wannu Artazɛrzɛs, nɛ́ ɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ya nɛ kur Efrat a̧ tom kalata’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́!
