«Ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ tɛ wannu ndé, o be Juif nɛ pia so nɛ nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ pii Jerusalɛm tɛ yɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ mbo nɛ́ ye-ŋgazu’ɛ in ɗaŋ ye’ɛ woyo. Wa mbo nɛ́ garo-a woyo, wa ee naŋ-a kaɗi mbɛt.

Nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ tɛ‘nɛ́ ndé, kà wa nɛ́ dee ye'i kaɗi, kà wa nɛ́ mboo garo'i kusi kaɗi, wa beka gbo garama ɓɔna, wa beka yoɓi mɔ ha̧ wannu na, wa beka yoɓi yuwar na mbɛt. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ ye'i tɛ de ha̧ wannu mɛ ziɓi.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zíí nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ n’ɛɛ kpɛk mɛ zii'e wa zɛkɛɗa wannu na ga, ɛɛ mbaŋ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ ndé,

ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ iŋa ndé, ye’ɛ nɛ́ ye-ŋgazu nɛ mbetɛ. Nɛ́ ye nɛ̀ de so nɛ ŋgamɔ in o wannu in o zika-nù nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ a̧. Ɓeemɛ o bíí ye’ɛ a nɛ wen ha̧ o bíí ha̧ ŋgazu mɛ dɔk. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa ye’ɛ ɗaŋ.
Ɛɛ mbaŋ tɛ wannu ndé, kà wa nɛ́ dee ye’ɛ kaɗi, in kà wa nɛ́ mboo garo-a kusi kaɗi, dekpaa ɛnɛ beka ɔ wan zu ŋma nù kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese na.»
Kifa-nú ko wannu nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi yɔr kalata’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́; Rɛhum in Simsai mɔ-geŋa, ká bá nɛ̀ o gbama wi-de-tom in wa lɛŋ nɛ ya Samarii in nɛ kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese. Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
«Kalata n’ɛnɛ toma ha̧‘m, wa tɔra sɛn ti'm nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Mi toma bíí mɛ kii mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ zɔka ndé, ɓeemɛ ye'i kura so in o wannu nyɛmna; duka nɛ́ ye-fo-mɔ in ye-ŋgazu.
O ŋgaŋa wannu ɔɔ so wan Jerusalɛm, wa ɔɔ wan zu nù kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o bíí gbo garama ha̧ wa, o bíí yoɓi mɔ ha̧ wa, yoɓi nɛ yuwar ha̧ wa mbɛt.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wa a̧ dór tom ko o wi nɔ‘i. Ká wa mbó ye'i woyo ɓɔna hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ ha̧ nú‘m ha̧ wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé hakilo tɛ mɔ‘i wen ká wa tɛɛ ɗaŋ war wen ko wannu siti.»

Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔra kalata ko wannu Artazɛrzɛs ti Rɛhum wannu Samarii in ti Simsai mɔ-geŋa in ti o sɛm kɔ-wa kaɗi, wa nɛɛ sitɛ o be Juif sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa de ŋgamɔ in wa, dor nɛ tom kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa dora nɛ tom Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm. Wa de tom'i na hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Darius wannu Pɛrsɛ.
O
Hegɔ, Zorobabɛl bem ko Saltiɛl in Josue bem ko Yosadak kura ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ ku̧ naŋ dee tom Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo. O

Ŋgimbi'i, Tatenai wi-duk-zu zika-nù kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese in Sɛtar-Boznai ká bá nɛ̀ o gbama wi-de-tom in wa nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa wa, ɓɛɛ ak mɔ: «Nɛ́ o'o ha̧a̧ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de Tua’ɛ o? Nɛ́ o'o tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gba te ɗafi nɛ ŋgeŋ o?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá nin o wi nɛ̀ mbo mɔ'ɔ!»
Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ so in o gasawi ko o be Juif, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i dor wa tɛ dee tom na, pɛm nɛ mɔ ha̧ kifa-nú tɛ kalata nɛ wa toma nɛnɛ ha̧ Darius mɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛ.
Kalata nɛ Tatenai wi-duk-zu zika-nù kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese in Sɛtar-Boznai, ká bá nɛ̀ o gbama wi-de-tom in wa, o gasawi kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese toma ha̧ wannu Darius nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Wannu Darius, ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́!
Ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ tɛ wannu ndé, ɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ Juda sitɛ Tua ko gasa Sɔ̧; wa de nɛ tom-aa sɛk nɛ gasa ta, gba nɛ te ɗafi nɛ ŋgeŋ. Wa de nɛ tom-aa nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ tom-aa'i nɛ́ nɔ̀ nyɛmna.
«Ɛɛ aka o gasawi kɔ-wa nde: ‹Nɛ́ o'o tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ mbo Tua'i o? Nɛ́ o'o tɔ̧ɔ̧ wa a̧ gba te ɗafi nɛ ŋgeŋ o?›
Ɛɛ aka nin-wa h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yɔr nin o wi nɛ duk zu wa tɛ tom'i.
«Wa kifa nú h’ɛ́ɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese in nù. Ŋma gasa wannu
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ dee so mɔɔ nyim see Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese ga, a̧ aa wa er Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr be Kaldee wannu Babilɔŋ; a̧ tɛɛ ɗaŋ kuti Tua’ɛ, ɓɛɛ kai o bíí yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ.
Sirus wannu Babilɔŋ ha̧a̧ nú tɛ kuti pɛ-wan kɔ‘i mɛ mbo Tua ko Sɔ̧ woyo.

Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia so o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in o wan nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi yinɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm sinɛ a kɔ̧ tua ko sɔ̧ kɔ‘i sɛn Babilɔŋ mɛ. Wannu Sirus kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i gbonɛ woyo, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ Sɛsbasar n'aa ee so nɛ́ gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: Mɛ̀ káí o nyɛk nɔ'ɔ sinɛ á kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mɛ mbo Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn oi gba̧‘a̧ fara-a woyo.
Sɛsbasar tɛɛ e naŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ ŋgimbi'i hɔ kinii, tom Tua'i a̧ de'i, ɓɛɛ tɛ kaɗi hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.›

«Wen hegɔ, kà wannu nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kii mɔ kɔ̧ tua-a-mbɔi k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn Babilɔŋ mɛ zɔk mɔ zaŋ o kalata. Wannu Sirus ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ mbo Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo nɛ mbetɛ nde? Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm kifa-nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔ‘i piinɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́.»
Wannu Darius tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ zaŋ o gba̧‘a̧ kalata kɔ̧ o tua-a-mbɔi sɛn Babilɔŋ mɛ;
ɓɛɛ ŋma ye-ŋgárá a̧a̧ so sɛn zika-nù Mɛdii; nin ye'i nɛ́ Ekbataŋ. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wa kpaa nɛ ŋma kara-kalata nɛ yɔramɔ zaŋ-aa hee ndé:
«Mɔɔ-mbaŋ-tɛ-wi:
«Tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko Sirus, a̧ ha̧a̧ nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga: Wa a̧ mbó Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ fara nɛ‘i ɗafi sɔ̧ sɛnɛ. Kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar; pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar mbɛt.
Sɛka-ta tɛ nɛk katɛ ŋmaa fara-a taar, ɓɛɛ nɛka gbaŋ-te-a kpɔk. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wannu a̧ tɛ yoɓi sede tom'i lɛŋ.
Wa a̧ káí mɔ lɛŋ á oi-aa sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo; wa a̧ káí o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa kai so si Babilɔŋ ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ e fara kɔ-wa woyo.»
«Kinii, Tatenai wi-duk-zu nù kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese in Sɛtar-Boznai, ká bá nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ o gbama wi-de-tom in wa, ɛ́nɛ́ o gasawi kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é wen'i duk.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ gasa wi-duk-zu nù Juda in o gasawi ko o Juif mɛ de tom Tua'i. Wa a̧ dé Tua'i sɛn oi gba̧‘a̧ fara-a.
O
O mɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm tɛ ak wese kpɔk kpɔk mɛ dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ha̧ wa; ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ o be-wiwii ndai in o vala sami ká bá nɛ̀ o
kà de ká wa ha̧a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ-gaŋmɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese in ha̧ wa mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ wen duka-a ko wannu in o bem kɔ‘i.
O

Sɔ̧ nɛ de ha̧ nin-wi mɛ duk sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ ɗáŋ ŋma wannu, kóó ŋma dukbíí nɛ tɛ si kafɛ tɛ wen kɔ‘m’ɛ, nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛɛ ɗaŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi Darius a̧ gɔn geŋa. Mɔ a̧ dé kànà hee mɔ‘i ga.»
Tatenai wannu kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese, in Sɛtar-Boznai, ká bá nɛ̀ o gbama wi-de-tom in wa dee kànà mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ wannu Darius tɔ̧a̧.
O gasawi ko o be Juif dee tom mboo Tua'i nɛ̀ de-a nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ ko Agee in Zakarii bem ko Ido. Wa mboo Tua'i kaɗi nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Sɔ̧ ko
Tom tua'i kaɗa tɛ zɛ Adar, tɛ taar ɔɔ-zɛ, ká Darius ɔɔ wan dee pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk kaɗi.
O be
Wa ha̧a̧ wiwii ndai gɔmŋmaa, vala sami gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo in o
Wa aa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa wen dee tom ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata ko Moisɛ ga.
O bíí nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara dee gbaŋa
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii lɛŋ
O be
Wa dee gbaŋa
Hɔ-ɗoŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, ŋgimbi ɔɔ-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs sɛn Pɛrsɛ, ŋma bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nin-a nɛ́ Ɛsdras. A̧ n bem ko Sɛraya, bem ko Azaria, bem ko Hilkia,
bem ko Salum, bem ko Sadɔk, bem ko Ahitub,
bem ko Amaria, bem ko Azaria, bem ko Mɛrayot,
bem ko Zɛraya, bem ko Uzi, bem ko Buki,
bem ko Abisua, bem ko Pinas, bem ko Eleazar, bem ko gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ.
Ɛsdras daŋa nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ; a̧ nɛ́ ŋma wi-yɔr-kalata nɛ iŋa Heembea ko Moisɛ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wannu Artazɛrzɛs ɔɔ wan tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o ŋma be
Ɛsdras hɔɔ Jerusalɛm tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ; ká nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs,
wen Ɛsdras gɔna so nɛ́ kuti wese tɛ kuti zɛ ha̧ wa mɛ kur nɛnɛ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ́ kuti zɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ a̧ a̧ hɔɔ nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm mbɛt, wen Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ guu so er zu a̧ nɛ mbetɛ.
Ɛsdras ee so see tɛ yamba Heembea ko GASA WAN, ba nɛnɛ de nɛ̀ tom, usi nɛ̀ o heembea in yuwar duka-a ha̧ o be
Gba̧a̧ kalata nɛ wannu Artazɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ ha̧ Ɛsdras nɛ duka so nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in wi-yɔr-kalata nɛ iŋa o
«Nɛ́ mi Artazɛrzɛs, wannu zu o wannu a̧ yɔr kalata’ɛ ha̧ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Ɛsdras nɛ iŋa o Heembea ko Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese. Mi fana mɛ!
Wen nɛ́ wannu in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a̧ tom mɛ wen zɔka mɔ nɛ yak sɛn Juda in sɛn Jerusalɛm nyɛm ɗoŋ Heembea nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ̀ káí bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ wannu in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ ta-tɛ nɛnɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko
Mɛ̀ káí bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ mɛ tɛ kpa sɛn nú Babilɔŋ lɛŋ in o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ dukbíí in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ha̧ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa sɛn Jerusalɛm.
«Sede nɛ mɛ tɛ ba'i, mɛ̀ bá hí̧fí nɛ̀ o wiwii ndai in o vala sami in o
Nɛ̀ ko bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ tɛ ɓɔn'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ, mɛ in o nya-mɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧.
Ko o nyɛk nɛ wa tɛ kai ha̧ mɛ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘i, mɛ tɛ kai wa a ti Sɔ̧ mɛ Jerusalɛm.
Nɛ̀ ko o ŋma mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kɔ̧ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá sede-a sɛn fara-a-sede ko wannu.
«Mi, wannu Artazɛrzɛs, mi ha̧a̧ heembea ha̧ o wi-pɛm-mbɔi sɛn kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese lɛŋ‘e mɔ nɛ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Ɛsdras wi-iŋ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese tɛ ak lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ha̧ a̧:
kóó hɔ tɛ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-taar, kóó tɛ kilo alkamaari booro-ɓu-taar, litrɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ booro-naar, litrɛ nɔ̧́ booro-naar in tɔŋ hee wi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese tɛ tɔ̧ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ mboozu wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, wen ká nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tik zu mɔɔ-wan ko wannu in zu o bem kɔ‘i.
Mi mbaŋ tɛ‘nɛ́ nde, wi beka ak ha̧a̧mɔ na, wi beka ba garama na, wi beka ba sede-yuwar er o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o wi-bii-gima, o wi-pɛm-tua ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ na mbɛt.

«Ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ-mɛ Ɛsdras, nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ é o gasawi in o wi-gɔn-kita nɛ tɛ gɔn kita ha̧ o bíí kur Efrat, nɛ war yee-wese lɛŋ zu o wi nɛ iŋa o heembea ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ. Nɛ̀ ko o wi nɛ iŋ heembea nɔ‘i na, mɛ̀ úsí ha̧ wa.
Wi nɛ beka mbo zu tɛ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ in heembea ko wannu na, wa a̧ gɔ́n kita zu a̧: kóó wa gbɛɛ a̧, kóó wa foo a̧ yinɛ mgbara o dɔka bíí, kóó wa dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ yoɓi mɔ, kóó pi̧i̧ a̧ zɔɓɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ Ɛsdras tɔ̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ, wen a̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ wannu mɛ tu̧ tɛ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm!
GASA WAN zika tɛ pii tɛ‘m sɛn yí wannu, yí o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ in o gasa wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ wen zu yora ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧; hegɔ, mi nɔɔ ŋgiɗi wen er GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m duka zu'm, ɓɛɛ mi mɔi̧ o ŋma gasawi
Nin o gasawi tɛ nutua kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ daŋa in am nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ tɛ ŋgimbi wan ko Artazɛrzɛs nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Mgbara o bezaŋ Pinas nɛ́ Gɛrsɔm; mgbara o bezaŋ Itamar nɛ́ Daniɛl; mgbara o bezaŋ David nɛ́ Hatus,
bem ko Sɛkania. Mgbara o bezaŋ Parɔs nɛ́ Zakarii; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ wa nɛ‘i tɔra nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Pahat-Mɔab nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai bem ko Zɛraya; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Zatu nɛ́ Sɛkania bem ko Yahaziɛl; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Adin nɛ́ Ebɛd bem ko Yɔnataŋ; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Elam nɛ́ Yɛsaya bem ko Atalia; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Sɛfatia nɛ́ Zɛbadia bem ko Mikaɛl; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Yɔab nɛ́ Obadia bem ko Yehiɛl; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani nɛ́ Sɛlɔmit bem ko Yosifia; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bebai nɛ́ Zakarii bem ko Bebai; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Asgad nɛ́ Yohanaŋ bem ko Hakataŋ; o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Adɔnikam nɛ́ o be hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa a̧ kura; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Ɛlifɛlɛt in Yeiɛl ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛmaya, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, o bíí nɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ in wa, o wiwii nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bigvai nɛ́ Utai bem ko Zabud; ɓɛɛ o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ in a̧ nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Mi mɔi̧a wa lɛŋ si ká̧ nana-yì nɛ fok si Ahava, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɔ hi̧i̧ zɛ taar. Mi zɔka o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, o géé bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ŋma be Levii bo na kóó kpɔk.
Mi hoka o ŋma gasawi: Eliɛzɛr, Ariɛl, Sɛmaya, Ɛlnataŋ, Yarib, Ɛlnataŋ, Nataŋ, Zakarii ká bá nɛ̀ Mɛsulam, in o wi-usi-mɔ Yoyarib in Ɛlnataŋ.
Mi toma wa nɛnɛ tɛ wannu Ido tɛ zika-nù Kasifia. Mi ee wen nú wa, wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ ak a̧ in o nya-a̧ ndé, wa a̧ tom wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́.

Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ guu er zu yɛ nɛ mbetɛ, ɓɛɛ Ido in o nya-a̧ tom Sɛrɛbia ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mgbara o bezaŋ Mali, be-koo Levii bem ko Jakob tɛnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́. A̧ tɛa in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in o nya-a̧ mbɛt; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ wiwii ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Hasabia tɛɛ mbɛt in Yɛsaya bezaŋ Mɛrari, in o nya-a̧ gú nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa mbɛt; o wiwii nɛ́ ɓu-yiitoo.
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wannu David in o gasawi kɔ‘i aa so mɛ gbak o be Levii tɛɛ mbɛt; o wiwii nɛ́ bíí gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yɔr nin-wa lɛŋ.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí ndé, ɛ̀ɛ̀ zím yì ka nana-yì Ahava hɛ̧ɛ̧ sɛ. Ɛ̀ɛ̀ mɔ́k see yɛ ti Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ kɔ́fí a̧ mɛ pɛm yɛ in o bem k’ɛɛ gú nɛ̀ o mɔ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ nɔ̀ k’ɛɛ.

Foe dee so'm mɛ ak wannu wen ha̧a̧ o wi-biro in nyaŋa mɛ bi biro zu yɛ nɛ yuwar in o wisɛn k’ɛɛ, wen mi baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wannu ndé, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ gú nɛ́ er zu bíí lɛŋ nɛ kii a̧, ɓɛɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tik tik zu bíí lɛŋ nɛ e a̧ duk.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ́ɛ́ zima yì, kɔfi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ zu mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpɛk kɔfa-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am hoka gasawi ɓu-zua-yiitoo mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mi hok Sɛrɛbia in Hasabia ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋma nya-wa ɓu.
Bu-mbɔi in lɔr gú nɛ̀ o nyɛk nɛ wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o be
Mi wee kilo bu-mbɔi booro-ɓu-yiitoo in nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, kilo-a booro taar, lɔr tɛ kilo booro-taar;
o nyɛk ɓu-yiitoo nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr tɛ kilo booro-taar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar in o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ de toka ndɛrɛ nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya hee lɔr ga.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ duk nɛtɛ wen GASA WAN; o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ mɔ ko Sɔ̧: ɓɛɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wa á nɛ̀ de-a hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ we dita-wa ti o gasawi ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ti o be Levii, in ti o gasawi ko o be
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii kaia bu-mbɔi in lɔr in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ wa wee lɛŋ‘i ha̧ wa mɛ kai si Jerusalɛm si kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, ɛɛ kura ká̧ nana-yì Ahava mɛ nɛ si Jerusalɛm. Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ guu er zu yɛ batɛ wen o wisɛn k’ɛɛ in o wi-zuzu bí yɛ́ nɛ yuwar na.

Ɛɛ hɔɔ Jerusalɛm ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ɔm tɛ yɛ hi̧i̧ zɛ taar. Tɛ naar ɔɔ-zɛ, ɛɛ wee bu-mbɔi, lɔr in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kai a er wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Mɛrɛmɔt bem ko Uria in Eleazar bem ko Pinas, ká o be Levii, Yozabad bem ko Josue in Nɔadia bem ko Binui a̧a̧ oi-aa mbɛt.
Ɛɛ tɔra o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɛɛ wee lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ ya nɛ̀ dama-a. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ yɔra dɔka-a lɛŋ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i o wi nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko
Wa wee ɗoŋ wen ko wannu ha̧ o be-wan in ha̧ o gasawi zu nù nɛ war kur Efrat, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i yor ɗoŋ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i kaɗa, o gasawi tɛɛ tɛ‘m ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndé: «O be
O be
Zia wen'i n'am zia hegɔ, mi a̧ka̧ gba-laa kɔ‘m in geɗek-a mɛ ɗɔɔ mbɛt. Mi zuɗa mui̧-zu'm in zera kɔ‘m a nù, ɓɛɛ mi duk nù tɔkɔrɔ.
Tɛ mɔ nɛ o wi nɛ pia nɛ Babilɔŋ dea'i, o wi nɛ dee kíí wen ko Sɔ̧ ko
Tɛ ŋgimbi ha̧a̧mɔ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, mi kura oi deako kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m, mi gbɛɛ zugur-am nù nɛ oi a̧ka̧ gba-laa kɔ‘m in geɗek-a mɛ ɗɔɔ; mi nyɛi̧a er-am sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, foe de'm dee nyɛmna, ziimɔ baa'm mbɛt. Hegɔ, mi nyɛm mɛ ba yí‘m sitɛ‘nɛ́ na, wen ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ dɔka zu yɛ batɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgazu k’ɛɛ hɔɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt.

Ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ ŋgimbi ko o dáà k’ɛɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ, ŋgazu k’ɛɛ gasa nyɛmna; ɛɛ, o wannu k’ɛɛ in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o ŋma wannu, gba-paa a̧a̧ ndaa yɛ, ɛɛ a̧a̧ tɛ bara, ɛɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er o wi-ɓar-mɔ er-wi, in ɗɔɔ foe mbɛt, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ de sɔsɔɔ ga, wen zu ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii,

Ɛɛ nɛ bara nɛ mbetɛ; ɓɛɛ tɛ tom-bara k’ɛɛ‘i, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ e yɛ duk na. Sɛn ti wannu Pɛrsɛ, a̧ zika tɛ-a pii tɛ yɛ wen zu yora ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧, de nɛnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa wen baa Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ e ŋgɔn woyo, in o gbina-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ garo h’ɛ́ɛ́ sɛn Jerusalɛm nù Juda mbɛt.
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, nɛ́ ge ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ tɔ̧ oi mɔ nɛ hɔa'i ge? Ɛɛ gbina o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́
n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so nɛ nú o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, o

Kinii, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o bem kɔ-wa nɛ kóò na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba o boko-bem kɔ-wa ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kóò na mbɛt. K’ɛ́nɛ́ kii mɛ kpa ga̧a̧mɔ in de duka-a ko o wi nɔ‘i na. Hegɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o demɔ tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.›
Ɗoŋ o mɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ zu yɛ oi ɗaŋ tom k’ɛɛ in gasa ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ, nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, èè o ŋma yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ dúk, é nɛ̀ oi o ŋma bíí h’ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt kaɗi'i,
ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ si so ɗoŋ tɛ̀ gbina o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ in tɛ̀ yéé ŋmaa in o ɗaŋwi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ yuwar-báá-ŋmaa nde? Bó nɛ́ see'nɛ́ tɛ ŋgai zu yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kuma be oi yɛ yinɛ lɛŋ na nde?
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛsdras ɔɔ nù hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ nú Tua ko Sɔ̧, kɔfi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧, gbar nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ gíí be
Sɛkania bem ko Yehiɛl, ŋma bezaŋ Elam tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛsdras: «Báá ko-gɔni-duk n’ɛɛ baa tɛ o bíí nù hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ ŋgazu ɛɛ dee ti Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ zu mɔ‘i, ŋma be mɔ ha̧ o be
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk há̧ nɛ̀ nú ti Sɔ̧ ndé, ɛɛ tɛ ndak o ko-gɔni-duk n’ɛɛ baa in o bem n’ɛɛ kòó in wa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mbɔrɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o wi nɛ mbo zu tɛ o geŋa ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. A'i dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ Heembea.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr wen wen’ɛ zɔk nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́! Ɛɛ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi wen dee tom!»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Ɛsdras kura, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii gú nɛ̀ o bíí
Ɛsdras kura nú Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ yak si tɛ ko Yohanaŋ bem ko Eliasib. N'aa hɔɔ hi̧i̧, a̧ nyɔŋ mɔ na, a̧ nɔ yì na mbɛt, wen a̧ zim nɛ mɔ wen zu ŋgazu ko o wi nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara.
Wa hee mbea sɛn Juda in sɛn Jerusalɛm ha̧ o bíí nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara mɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa si Jerusalɛm.
O gasawi in o

Hegɔ, wiwii nù Juda in Bɛnjamin mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm zaŋ zɛ nɔ‘i taar'i. Duka nɛ́ ɓu-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar fio-zɛ. O bíí lɛŋ yaa bee-gara nú Tua ko Sɔ̧; tɛ-wa nak nak tɛ wen'i nɛ kpaa wa'i in wen kórò nɛ̀ ŋma wa'i mbɛt.
Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kura ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ŋgazu ɓɛɛ báá o ko-gɔni-duk n’ɛnɛ baa dee ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ ko o be
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbár ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ mɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ o bíí nù'ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ o ko-gɔni-duk nɔ‘i mbɛt.»
Bíí lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa nɛ hee ger: «Nɛ mbetɛ! Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí ɔ dɔka in nɛ́ ŋgimbi-ɓar ga, ɛɛ beka ya wan zan na, ɓɛɛ tom'i bó nɛ́ tom-dee zɛ kpɔk, kóó zɛ yiitoo na, wen o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ mɔ‘i ɔ dɔka.

O gasawi k’ɛɛ a̧ yá hɛ̧ɛ̧ oi nú dukbíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ̀ ye k’ɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ kaia o ko-gɔni-duk a̧ tɛ́ tɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i gɔna in o gasawi tɛ o ye kpɔk kpɔk ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-gɔn-kita, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ yu zu yɛ wen zu wen’ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Yɔnataŋ bem ko Asahɛl in Yazɛya bem ko Tikwa kpɛk mɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ Mɛsulam in Sabtai ŋma be Levii, yor ɗoŋ wa.
O wi nɛ pia so nɛ tɛ bara dee mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga. Ɛsdras hoka o gasawi nɛ nin dám nutua kpɔk kpɔk; wa mɔi̧a tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ wen kia mgbara mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, wen ko o wi nɛ kaia so o ko-gɔni-duk kaɗa.
Mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o wi nɛ kaia o ko-gɔni-duk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Masɛya, Eliɛzɛr, Yarib ká bá nɛ̀ Gɛdalia; wa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-wi.
Wa ha̧a̧ nú mɛ ndak o kóò kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ vala sami ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Imɛr, nɛ́ Hanani in Zɛbadia.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Masɛya, Elia, Sɛmaya, Yehiɛl in Uzia.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Pasɛhur, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Masɛya, Yismaɛl, Nɛtanɛl in Yozabad ká bá nɛ̀ Elɛasa.
Mgbara o be Levii, nɛ́ Yozabad in Simɛi in Kelaya nɛ‘i sa'e Kelita mbɛt, in Pɛtaya in Yehuda in Eliɛzɛr.
Mgbara o wi-bii-gima, nɛ́ Eliasib.
Mgbara o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ Salum, Tɛlɛm in Uri.
War ko o dɔka o be
Mgbara o bezaŋ Elam, nɛ́ Matania, Zakarii, Yehiɛl, Abdi, Yɛrɛmɔt ká bá nɛ̀ Elia.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Zatu, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Eliasib, Matania, Yɛrɛmɔt, Zabad ká bá nɛ̀ Aziza.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bebai, nɛ́ Yohanaŋ, Hanania, Zabai ká bá nɛ̀ Atlai.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasub, Yisal, Yɛrɛmɔt.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Pahat-Mɔab, nɛ́ Adna, Kɛlal, Bɛnaya, Masɛya, Matania, Besalɛl, Binui ká bá nɛ̀ Manase.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr, Isia, Malkia, Sɛmaya, Simɛɔŋ,
Bɛnjamin, Maluk ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛmaria.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Hasum, nɛ́ Matɛnai, Matata, Zabad, Ɛlifɛlɛt, Yeremai in Manase ká bá nɛ̀ Simɛi.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Madai, Amram, Uɛl,
Bɛnaya, Badia, Kɛluli,
Vania, Mɛrɛmɔt, Eliasib,
Matania, Matɛnai, Yasai,
Bani, Binui, Simɛi,
Sɛlɛmia, Nataŋ, Adaya,
Maknadebai, Sasai, Sarai,
Azarɛl, Sɛlɛmia, Sɛmaria,
Salum, Amaria in Josɛf.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Nɛbo, nɛ́ Yeiɛl, Matitia, Zabad, Zɛbina, Yadai, Jɔɛl ká bá nɛ̀ Bɛnaya.
O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ kaia so nɛ́ o ko-gɔni-duk, ɓɛɛ wa ndak wa in o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ wee ɗoŋ mɔ ko Nehemii, bem ko Hakalia.
Tɛ kuti zɛ Kislɛu,
Hanani, ŋma nya'm tɛɛ in o ŋma bíí nɛ Juda, ɓɛɛ mi ak mɔ wen oi o be Juif nɛ ɓɔna ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ sii ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm, in wen zu ye'i mbɛt.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «O wi nɛ pia ɗoŋ nɛ tɛ bara pii nù kɔ-wa sɛn Palɛstin a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ bɔnɛ in foe. Garo Jerusalɛm ɔ ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ, ɓɛɛ o kpar-nú-a bia wee lɛŋ.»

Ŋgimbi n'am zia wen'i, mi duka nù, mi hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mi zim mɔ hegɔɔ zɛ nɛ dɔka-a. Mi zima yì, ɓɛɛ mi ai nú ti Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese, Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa nɛ‘i yu’ɛ; ɛ́nɛ́ e
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́. Zɛ nɛ wese mi ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen zu o be
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɛɛ tu̧u̧ see'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kasi o
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ wen nɛ Moisɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ ɗoŋ
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ‘m, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí o geŋa kɔ‘m de nɛ tom, kóó wa kaia so'nɛ́ nɛ̀ bara hɔ ndaa-zan, mi tɛ mɔi̧‘nɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛn fara n'am hoka so ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk sɛnɛ.›
«Wa nɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ gɔna zu wa nɛ gasa ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ in ŋgai mɛ te-er'nɛ́.

Ho! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ in tɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ desee wen tu̧u̧ tɛ‘nɛ́. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k ha̧ deemɔ ko wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ sɔsɔɔ in ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti-a mɛ de sɛn ti wannu.»
Mi duka so nɛ́ wi-ha̧-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu.
Tɛ zɛ Nisaŋ,
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am kai so sɔnti'm ti a̧ nɛti ga na, a̧ aka'm: «Wen ge sa mɛ kai sɔnti-mɛ ge? Nɛ́ tɛ-mɛ'ɛ nyim nde? Nɛ́ ŋma mɔ náà, kóó nɛ́ see-mɛ a̧ ɗaŋ nde?»
Gasa kíì dea'm,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ! Mi beka kai bɔɔ sɔnti'm na hee ge? Ye nɛ̀ o pɛsi ko o dáà kɔ‘m a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ɗaŋa; o kpar-nú garo ye'i bia wee lɛŋ.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu ak am: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ge?»
Mi kɔfa Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese nɛ kɔ̧ see-am,
ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Kà nɛ́ dee tɛ wannu, kà wannu nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ tóm am si Juda, sɛn saaye nɛ o pɛsi ko o dáà kɔ‘m a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, ha̧‘m mɛ mbo ye'i woyo.»
Kóò ko wannu duk so katɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Zɛ nɔ̀ kɔ-mɛ‘i tɛ de gee? Mɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ gese ge?» Wannu kpɛka mɛ ha̧ yuwar ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi gɔn ŋgimbi n'am tɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ a̧.

Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu woyo: «Kà wannu nɛ́ zɔka'e ɔ dee, wannu a̧ há̧ o kalata ha̧‘m wen ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ o wi-duk-zu o zika-nù nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese ha̧ wa mɛ e yuwar ha̧‘m mɛ ɓir yak si nú Juda,

in ŋma kalata ha̧ Asaf, wi-pɛm-kombo ko wannu, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ o te ha̧‘m wen ɗafa-a nɛ nú-ŋgárá mgbák ká̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in nú-garo ye, ká bá nɛ̀ nú tua n'am tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ wannu ha̧ o kalata nɔ‘i ha̧‘m wen nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m guu so er zu'm.
Mi hɔɔ sɛn ti o wi-duk-zu o zika-nù mɛ kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ o kalata ko wannu ha̧ wa. Wannu toma so o gasa wi-biro in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa mɛ mgbɔ‘m nɛnɛ.
Sanbalat be Hɔrɔŋ in Tobia be Amɔŋ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa kpa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna, tɛ zia-a'e, ŋma bíí tɛa wen ɗafa mɔ ha̧ o be
Mi hɔɔ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ mi duk hi̧i̧ zɛ taar.
Mi kura mɛ zɛ in o ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ee kɔ̧ see-am wen dea-a sɛn Jerusalɛm ha̧ ŋma bíí kpɔk na. Saɗi n'am baa nɛnɛ, kànà nɛ́ tuifuu kɔ‘m n'am daŋ ɓɛɛ.

Mɛ zɛ, mi gboo nɛ̀ nú garo nɛ zɔk mɔ si kɔ̧ Gboŋgo, ɓɛɛ mi nɛɛ hɔ sɛn nú yì ko Ndiɓa in nú Garo-a-yɔsɛ. Sɛn hi̧i̧, mi duka zɔk nɛ o garo Jerusalɛm nɛ gbina in o kpar-nú-wa nɛ bia so wee lɛŋ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Mi ɓira si nú garo zu-zer hɔ nɛnɛ ka gɔna-yì ko wannu, ɓɛɛ tuifuu n'am daŋ so'i kpa yuwar yaka-a na.
Kpɔk zaŋ zɛ‘i, mi daŋa nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gboŋgo Sɛdrɔŋ zɔk nɛ o garo nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi si ɗoŋ nɛ nú garo nɛ zɔk mɔ si kɔ̧ gboŋgo, ɓɛɛ mi pii ɗoŋ oi-am.

O gasawi iŋ fara n'am nɛɛ sɛnɛ na, in mɔ n'am nɛɛ mɛ de na mbɛt. Ŋgimbi'i, mi tɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen kpɔk ha̧ o be Juif na, kóó ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, kóó ha̧ o dita-bíí, kóó ha̧ o gasawi, kóó ha̧ o wi-duk-zu tom na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka bɔnɛ n’ɛɛ ya sɛnɛ'ɛ: Jerusalɛm gbina a nù lɛŋ, o kpar-nú-a bia wee mbɛt. Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mbó garo Jerusalɛm woyo, ba nɛ foe yinɛ zu yɛ.»
Mi wee ɗoŋ guu er nɛ GASA WAN guu so zu'm, we nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧‘m ha̧ wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ de!» Hegɔ, wen dee tom'i, wa ɗafa mɔ wen dea-a.

Nɛ̀ Sanbalat be Hɔrɔŋ, Tobia be Amɔŋ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ in Gesɛm be Arab zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, wa mama yɛ, ba nɛ yɛ e tɛ geemɔ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Nɛ́ ge ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ge? Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de nɛ́ ŋgazu in wannu nde?»

Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese a̧ tɛ de ha̧ tom k’ɛɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, ɛɛ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, ɛɛ tɛ de kànà. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ bó nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na, kóó ŋma ŋgai zu ye'i na; tɛ-wi a̧ bí ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ mɔ ko Jerusalɛm!»

Eliasib wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kura in o nya-a̧, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa mbo nú garo ko o Sami. Wa dee gbaŋa-a, ɓɛɛ wa a o kpar-nú-a. Wa mboo garo siti hɔ fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e Gɔmŋmaa. Wa dee gbaŋa-a, ɓɛɛ wa mbo siti woyo hɔ nɛnɛ fara-pɛm-mɔ ko Hananeɛl.
Sɛn katɛ o wi nɔ‘i, nɛ́ o be Jeriko a̧ mbo mɔ, ɓɛɛ katɛ o be Jeriko nɛ́ Zakur bem ko Imri.
O bíí Sɛnaa mboo kɔ‘i nɛ́ nú garo Zoro. Wa aa o gaŋgala, o kpar-nú-a, o dor-toyo in o mɔɔ-mana-a lɛŋ.
O wi nɛ dee tom katɛ wa nɛ́ Mɛrɛmɔt bem ko Uria, be-koo Hakɔs, ɓɛɛ nɛ war katɛ a̧ nɛ́ Mɛsulam, bem ko Berekia, be-koo Mɛsezabɛl; ɗoŋ kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ Sadɔk bem ko Baana.
Ɗoŋ ko Sadɔk nɛ́ o be Tɛkɔa; ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, o gasawi ko o be Tɛkɔa kɔ̧ so mɛ mbo zu ha̧ wi-duk-zu tom na.
Yoyada bem ko Pasɛa in Mɛsulam bem ko Bɛsɔdia dee kɔ‘i tom nú garo ko Yesana;
Katɛ wa nɛ́ Melatia be Gabaɔŋ in Yadɔŋ be Mɛrɔm gú nɛ̀ o bíí Gabaɔŋ in Mispa a̧ de tom ká̧ fara-duk ko wi-duk-zu zika-nù mɛ kur Efrat nɛ war yee-wese.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Uziɛl bem ko Harhaya wi-nɔi̧-lɔr a̧ de tom, ɓɛɛ sɛn katɛ a̧ nɛ́ Hanania, wi-gi-nyama. Tom kɔ-wa kaɗa sɛn Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ fara nɛ garo ɔ pɛsa sɛnɛ.
Katɛ wa nɛ́ Rɛfaya bem ko Hur, wi-duk-zu reeta Jerusalɛm.
Siti nɛ́ Yɛdaya bem ko Harumaf a̧ de kɔ‘i sɛn mgbák nú tua kɔ‘i; katɛ a̧ nɛ́ Hatus bem ko Hasabnɛya.
Nɛ̀ ŋma fara woyo, Malkia bem ko Harim in Hasub bem ko Pahat-Mɔab dee kɔ‘i tom sɛnɛ si kpa nɛ Fara-dɔ-brɛt.
Katɛ wa nɛ́ Salum bem ko Ha-Lɔhɛs, wi-duk-zu ŋma reeta Jerusalɛm in o boko-bem kɔ‘i a̧ de tom.
Hanun in o bíí Zanɔa mbo kɔ‘i nɛ nú garo mɛ si kɔ̧ gboŋgo; nɛ́ wa a̧ mboo fara'i, a o kpar-nú-a, o dor-toyo in o mɔɔ-mana-a; zi̧a̧ garo nɛ wa mboo nɛ́ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ si hɔ nɛnɛ nú Garo-a-yɔsɛ.
Malkia bem ko Rɛkab wi-duk-zu nú Bɛt-Ha-Kɛrɛm mbo kɔ‘i nɛ́ nú Garo-a-yɔsɛ; a̧ aa o kpar-nú-a, o dor-toyo in o mɔɔ-mana-a.

Salum bem ko Kol-Hɔzɛ wi-duk-zu nù Mispa de tom nú garo zu-zer. A̧ mboa, a̧ nyia zu-a, a nɛ́ o kpar-nú-a, o dor-toyo in o mɔɔ-mana-a. A̧ mboo garo ká̧ gɔna-yí Siloe ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ kpɛɛfɔ ko wannu hɔ fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Nehemii bem ko Azbuk, wi-duk-zu reeta nú Bɛt-Sur a̧ de tom, tan nɛ o pɛsi ko David, hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ gɔna-yì nɛ wa za̧a̧ za̧a̧ nɛ er, si kpa nɛ tua ko o ŋgaŋa-wi.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ o be Levii a̧ de tom. Rɛhum bem ko Bani a̧a̧ sɛnɛ; sɛn katɛ a̧ nɛ́ Hasabia wi-duk-zu reeta nú Kɛila a̧ de tom fara kɔ‘i.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ nya-wa Bavai bem ko Hɛnadad, wi-duk-zu reeta nú Kɛila a̧ de tom.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Ezɛr bem ko Yesua, wi-duk-zu Mispa a̧ de tom tan nɛ fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ si fara-a-boi-biro hɔ nɛnɛ mgbii garo mɛ.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Baruk bem ko Zabai a̧ ha̧ ŋgai-tɛ tɛ tom. A̧ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ mgbii garo hɔ nú tua ko Eliasib, gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ Baruk, nɛ́ Mɛrɛmɔt, bem ko Uria, be-koo Hakɔs a̧ de tom; ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ́ nú tua ko Eliasib hɔ nɛnɛ mgbii tua.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ o be ye nɛ a̧a̧ ká̧ Jerusalɛm a̧ de tom.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-wa, nɛ́ Bɛnjamin in Hasub a̧ de tom fara nɛ duk tan nɛ tua kɔ-wa. Hɔ-ɗoŋ-wa, nɛ́ Azaria bem ko Masɛya be-koo Anania a̧ de tom nɛ war ká̧ tua kɔ‘i.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Binui bem ko Hɛnadad a̧ de tom, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ tua ko Azaria hɔ nɛnɛ fara nɛ mgbii garo suia si zan sɛnɛ.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Palal bem ko Uzai a̧ de tom ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ suia-garo hɔ nɛnɛ kusa fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ duk tan nɛ tua-wan, ká̧ bee-gara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Pɛdaya bem ko Parɔs
in o geɗek wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ si Ofɛl a̧ de tom hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ kusa fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ duk ká̧ nú Garo-yì nɛ war daŋa-wese.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ Pɛdaya, nɛ́ o be Tɛkɔa a̧ de tom tan nɛ gasa fara-pɛm-mɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧ garo wan mɛ si Ofɛl.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ de tom ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ nú garo ko o Nyaŋa, kóó o ndé tan nɛ tua kɔ‘i.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Sadɔk bem ko Imɛr a̧ de tom tan nɛ nú tua kɔ‘i. Hɔ-ɗoŋ Sadɔk nɛ́ Sɛmaya bem ko Sɛkania, wi-pɛm nú-garo nɛ zɔk mɔ si daŋa-wese a̧ de tom.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Hanania bem ko Sɛlɛmia in Hanun, mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk bem ko Salaf, a̧ de tom.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Mɛsulam bem ko Berekia a̧ de tom tan nɛ gɔna-bɛr-tua kɔ‘i.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Malkia wi-nɔi̧-lɔr a̧ de tom hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ tua ko geɗek wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in ko o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ tan nɛ nú garo ko Mifkad, si hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧ kusa gɔna-bɛr-tua mgbii garo mɛ.
O wi-nɔi̧-lɔr in o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ, dee kɔ‘i tom mgbara kusa gɔna-bɛr-tua mɛ mgbii garo si hɔ nɛnɛ nú garo ko o Sami.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Sanbalat zia ndé, ɛ́ɛ́ mbó nɛ́ garo Jerusalɛm woyo, see-aa ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ de nyimsea. A̧ zɛkɛɗa o be Juif,

tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ti o nya-a̧ in ti o wi-biro Samarii hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ o ziɓa be Juif nɔ'ɔ de’ɛ ge? Wi tɛ e ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ‘i siti? Wa tɛ ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ nde? Wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kaɗi tom’ɛ kpɔk kale wese nde? Wa nyɛma mɛ kai o ta nɛ‘i dɔra nɛ ɗɔɔ fuunu-gbina-ŋgeŋ, nɛ bia wee mbɛt’ɛ de nɛ kpasa mɔ woyo nde?»
Tobia be Amɔŋ duka katɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wa a̧ mbó gɔ! Kóó nɛ́ géé gba-toyo a̧ daŋa garo-ta kɔ-wa'i, ɓɛɛ gbina a nù.»
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ nɛ hee ger: «Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì, wa e nɛ yɛ tɛ geemɔ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ foe-dara kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu wa. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é wa tɛ geemɔ, tɛ ŋma nù ha̧ wa de bara sɛnɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa na. Ká ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa bí sɛn ti'nɛ́ na mbɛt, wen wa tu̧u̧ see o bíí-mbo-garo’ɛ.»
Dukbíí ee see tɛ tom'i, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ mbo garo kusi hɔ bin-see-a kpa nú ŋmaa lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Sanbalat, Tobia, o be Arab, o be Amɔŋ in o be Asdod zia'e, mboo garo Jerusalɛm nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ siti, in n’ɛɛ ku̧u̧naŋ kpee o woi-aa mbɛt, wa kpaa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ a nú ŋmaa ha̧ wa mɛ tɛ mɛ bi Jerusalɛm ha̧ wa mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ.
Ɛɛ kɔfa Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ a o wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ wese in zɛ wen wa.
Mɔ nɛ o be Juda tɔ̧ so nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ŋgai ko wi-de-tom bo ɓɔna,
fuunu dɔka nyɛmna!
Ɛɛ nyɛm mɛ mbo garo na!»
Taamo ko o wisɛn k’ɛɛ‘e, ɛɛ beka iŋ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i tɛ tɛ na, in ɛɛ beka zɔk wi na hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i tɛ ye mgbara yɛ; wi tɛ gbɛ yɛ, ɓɛɛ wi gɔna nú tom k’ɛɛ.
O be Juif nɛ ɔ sɛn katɛ wa tɛɛ tɛ yɛ mɛ de war ɓu mbaŋ nɛ tɛ yɛ zu o ɗaŋ taamɔ ko o wi-sɛn-ɛɛ.
Mi ɗafa ŋma fara nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ

Ŋgimbi n'am yara zɔk mɔ lɛŋ kaɗi, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dita-bíí, ha̧ o gasawi in oi dukbíí lɛŋ: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu wa na! Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ GASA WAN nɛ ɔ gasa, nɛ‘i yu yuu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí biro wen zu o nya'nɛ́, o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kóò k’ɛ́nɛ́ in wen zu o tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi'i, o wisɛn k’ɛɛ zia'e, wen'i aa zer yɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk'e Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa kaɗi. Hegɔ, ɛɛ sii ɗoŋ lɛŋ sitɛ tom garo, o ndé si fara kɔ‘i.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ wese'i, ŋma reeta bíí kɔ‘m de so nɛ tom, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o sɛ́ɛ̀, o ŋgéé, o góò in o laa-biro. O gasawi a̧a̧ so ɗoŋ o be Juda lɛŋ.
O wi nɛ mbo kɔ‘i nɛ́ garo in o wi nɛ tui kɔ‘i nɛ́ o dita tui de tom nɛ̀ ɓii er, ɓɛɛ kasa boi-biro nɛ̀ ɓii-aa.
O wi-mbo-garo lɛŋ hɛra so kànà gba-paa kɔ-wa guntir de nɛ tom; ŋma wi-dɔm-zak yora so katɛ‘m.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dita-bíí, o gasawi in oi dukbíí lɛŋ: «Tom’ɛ nɛ́ kpasa tom in ɔ gasa nyɛmna. Ɛ́ɛ́ ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ̀ ŋmaa kpɔk kpɔk dam zu garo lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ dɔm zak, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ pii katɛ yɛ, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ bi biro wen zu yɛ.»
Ɛɛ dee tom siti; reeta bíí k’ɛɛ kasa so kɔ‘i nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ̀ er nɛ tutuyɛ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
Nɛ tɛ kpɔk kale ŋgimbi'i a̧‘m tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ dukbíí ndé: «O ndé a̧ ɔ́ sɛn Jerusalɛm in wi-de-tom kɔ‘i; ɛ̀ɛ̀ pɛ́m mɔ mɛ zɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé tom nɛ wese.»
Kóó mi, kóó o nya'm, kóó o bíí kɔ‘m, kóó o wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ duk in am, ɛ́ɛ́ kpɔ̧i̧ laa k’ɛɛ yinɛ na. O ndé a̧a̧ so nɛ boi-biro kɔ‘i kɔ̧ er mɛ wiiko.
See o be Juda in o kóò kɔ‘i ɗaŋa zu o nya kɔ-wa, o be Juif.
O ŋma bíí tɔ̧a̧: «O bem k’ɛɛ be-wiwii-a, o bem k’ɛɛ mɛ be-okoo-a in kiitɛ yɛ mbɛt, ɛ́ɛ́ ɔ dɔka. Ɛ́ɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa alkamaari wen nyɔŋa-a h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa.»
O ŋma tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i: «Ɛ́ɛ́ e nɛ o fɔ k’ɛɛ, o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o tua k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ ziŋina sɛk’ɛɛ kpaa alkamaari ŋgimbi kaɓa.»
O ŋma tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i woyo: «Ɛ́ɛ́ e nɛ o fɔ k’ɛɛ in o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ ziŋina sɛk’ɛɛ kpaa sede yoɓa garama ko wannu.

Zu-a'i tɔk tɛ yɛ kpɔk in o nya k’ɛɛ nɔ'ɔ, o bem k’ɛɛ nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ in o bem kɔ-wa mbɛt, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ kaia o bem k’ɛɛ mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a ha̧ ha̧ wa nɛ bara; o ŋma boko-bem k’ɛɛ a̧a̧ tɛ bara kaɗi; ŋma mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de bo na. Fɔ k’ɛɛ in o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛɛ duk nɛ́ ko o ŋma bíí.»
Ŋgimbi n'am zia nɛ o aia-nú kɔ-wa in o wen nɔ‘i, see-am ɗaŋa nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ mí nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ ŋga wen a zu o dita-bíí in o gasawi; mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ́ɛ́ é nɛ gasa tui zu o ŋmaa!»
Ɓɛɛ mi sa wa tɛ gasa mɔi̧a-a.

Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ŋgai k’ɛɛ ɛɛ gɔna nɛ zu o nya k’ɛɛ be Juif nɛ ɗɔra so tɛ ha̧ o ŋma gɔni-duk piinɛ ɗoŋ; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ ɗɔr nɛ o nya k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ ɗɔr nɛ wa h’ɛ́ɛ́ woyo!» Wa kpee nú-wa, wa bó nɛ̀ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ na.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ de'i de na; bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ yu kíí Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, wen ká o gɔni-duk nɛ sɛn yɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ pi̧ foe tɛ yɛ, na nde?
Mi in o nya'm in o bíí kɔ‘m mbɛt, ɛɛ ha̧a̧ so sede in alkamaari nɛ nyamandoi ha̧ wa; kinii, ɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛ́ nyamandoi nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ fɔ, o fɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, o te-nɔ̧́ in o tua kɔ-wa siɗoŋ ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é sede, alkamaari in nɔ̧́ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so nɛ nyamandoi ha̧ wa duk sɔsɔɔ!»
Wa kifa nú wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛɛ tɛ e o mɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ beka ak ŋma mɔ er-wa ɓɔna, ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘i.»
Mi saa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ sedaako ɓɛɛ mi de ha̧ o bíí mɛ kan mɔ wen dee mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
Mi ŋmasa laa kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Sɔ̧ tɛ ŋmasi nɛ wi nɛ beka kasi wen’ɛ na yinɛ tɛ tua ko wi’ɛi in ká̧ o demɔ kɔ̧-a̧; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Sɔ̧ tɛ ŋmasi nɛ a̧ yinɛ, a̧ beka kpa mɔ na.»
O bíí lɛŋ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ'ɔ dé hegɔ!» Wa zɔna GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa de mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛnɛ‘i.

Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese nɛ wannu Artazɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ nɛ nú ha̧‘m mɛ duk zu zika-nù Juda tɛ ɓu-yiitoo pɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, lɛŋ dee nɛ́ pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, mi in o bíí kɔ‘m, ɛɛ ba so zu-mɔ nɛ wi-duk-zu nù tɛ̀ɛ́ ba so er bíí na.

O be-wan nɛ ɔɔ wan nɛti ha̧‘m usa bɔnɛ ha̧ dukbíí, kai nɛ brɛt in dɔ̧ɔ̧ er wa. Zu-a'i, wa duka ba nɛ sede er wa wese lɛŋ tɛ kɔya-sede ɓu-naar. O wi-de-tom ko o be-wan nɔ‘i mbɛt usa bɔnɛ ha̧ dukbíí. Kɔ‘m, mi de hegɔ na, wen mi yu nɛ kíí Sɔ̧.
Mi duka tɛ tom mboo garo nɛ tɛ‘m. Mi hi̧fi fɔ na; o bíí kɔ‘m a̧a̧ so tɛ tom hɛ̧ɛ̧ lɛŋ.
O be Juif in o gasawi nɛ kɛr so kam in am nɛ bíí gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in o gɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o ŋma nù katɛ yɛ.

Wese lɛŋ, wa tɛ gɔn ndai kpɔk, de ŋmaŋa sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, in o kɔra mbɛt nɛ gbo nɛ er-am, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ zɛ ɓu lɛŋ, wa tɛ gi dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a. Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, mi ak war zu-mɔ kɔ‘m er dukbíí na, wen tom garo baa so nú wa nyɛmna.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ am, wen zu mɔ lɛŋ n'am dea wen o bíí nɔ'ɔ.
Mi tɛ a o kpar-nú garo hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ Sanbalat, Tobia, Gɛsɛm be Arab in oi dɔka wisɛn k’ɛɛ zia'e, mi mboo garo siɗoŋ woyo, nɛ ŋma woi-aa bo ɓɔna.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sanbalat in Gɛsɛm toma tom ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ be nyɛrɛ sɛn Kɛfirim, mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ Ɔnɔ.» Wa ta so nɛ mɔ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am.
Mi toma o betom nɛ kifa-nú kɔ‘m ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɔ n'am de'i nɛ́ gasa tom, mi nyɛm mɛ zir si hi̧i̧ na. Kà‘m yák, ɓɛɛ tom beka nɛ siti na.»
Wa toma kpɔk betom'i pii tɛ‘m war naar, ɓɛɛ mi kifi kànà nɛ kpɔk nú‘m ha̧ wa.
Sanbalat toma mbe kalata nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i tɛnɛ woyo, wa lati so nú kalata'i na.
Mɔ n'aa yɔra sɛnɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «O tugun bíí tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, mɛ in o be Juif, ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ŋgazu; nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i sa mɛ mbo garo ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu wa. Gɛsɛm mbɛt tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Mɛ aa o
Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú ha̧ Sanbalat: «Wen nɔ‘i nɛ mɛ tɔ̧‘i lɛŋ nyɛm sɛnɛ na. Nɛ mɛ'ɛ gɔn tɛ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ.»
O wi nɔ‘i kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ yɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Tɛ-wa tɛ ga̧, ɓɛɛ tom'i beka de siti na.» Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m!

Mi nɛa tɛ ko Sɛmaya bem ko Delaya, be-koo Metabeɛl wen ŋma mɔ dora so a̧. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ in ŋmaa sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn mgbák kɔ̧ bɛr-tua mɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ kpé nú tua e zu yɛ wen wa tɛ tɛ mɛ gbɛ mɛ; wa tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ mɛ mɛ zɛ.»
Mi kifa nú: «Wiwii hee mi ga tɛ yu mɔ hee ge? Nɛ́ ge bíí ge hee mi ga a̧ tɛ ye sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ duka kpasa ge nde? Mi beka ye na.»
Mi iŋa ndé, bo nɛ Sɔ̧ a̧ tom a̧ na. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen zu'm wen Sanbalat in Tobia ha̧a̧ so nɛ́ sede ha̧ a̧.
Wa ha̧a̧ sede ha̧ a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘m, ha̧‘m mɛ de mɔ n'aa tɛ tɔ̧, de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ. Hegɔ, wa tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ nin-am, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e, mi nɛ́ wi-ɗaŋ-nin Sɔ̧.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ deemɔ ko Tobia in Sanbalat! Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ o tom kɔ-wa! Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ Nɔadia, ko-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧, in o dɔka
Tom mboo garo kaɗa tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ zɛ Elul;
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wisɛn k’ɛɛ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, kíì dee o dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ ɔ zik yɛ; foe dee wa. Wa iŋa'e tom'i hɔɔ gba̧a̧ wen nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o dita-bíí Juda tom so nɛ o kalata ɓɔnsɛnɛ ha̧ Tobia, kpa nɛ kifa-nú kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
O bíí nɛ dɔka-a sɛn nù Juda ndaɗa so in a̧ nyɛmna wen n'aa duka so nɛ́ be-for Sɛkania bem ko Ara; ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Yohanaŋ baa so nɛ́ boko-bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Berekia.
Wa duka so zɔn nɛ a̧ sɛn ti'm, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ́ɛ̀ ba wen oi nú‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Ko Tobia tom so kɔ‘i nɛ o kalata ha̧‘m wen pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ‘m.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa mboo garo kaɗi, mi aa o kpar-nú-a, ɓɛɛ o wi-pɛm-nú tua, o wi-bii-gima in o be Levii ba tom kɔ‘i.
Mi ee ye Jerusalɛm er nya'm Hanani, in Hanania, wi-duk-zu ŋgárá Jerusalɛm. A̧ nɛ́ wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mboozu in nɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧ nyɛmna gan o ŋma dɔka-a.

Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wi beka hú̧í̧ nú garo Jerusalɛm nɛti ha̧ daŋa-wese na; ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-pɛm-nú garo tɛ hɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, o nú garo tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ̀ kpea-a keŋ. O bíí Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛm mɔ, kpai nɛ ŋmaa, o ŋma sɛn mgbák fara-pɛm-mɔ, ɓɛɛ o ŋma woyo sɛn nú tua kɔ‘i.»
Jerusalɛm duka so nɛ́ gasa ye nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bíí dɔk sɛnɛ na; wa tɛ mbo o tua woyo hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ha̧a̧ ŋma taamɔ ha̧‘m mɛ mɔi̧ o dita-bíí, o gasawi in dukbíí, ha̧‘m mɛ tɔr wa. Mi kpaa kalata-tɔra-bíí ko o wi nɛ hɔɔ so nɛ ti. Mɔ nɛ wa yɔra sɛnɛ n'am tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
«O ŋma bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro pia ɗoŋ. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i.
Wa pia in Zorobabɛl, Yesua, Nehemii, Azaria, Ramia, Nahamani, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispɛrɛt, Bigbai, Nɛhum in Baana. Dɔka o be
«Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
ko Sɛfatia nɛ́ 372;
ko Ara nɛ́ 652;
ko Pahat-Mɔab, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua in Yɔab nɛ́ 2.818;
ko Elam nɛ́ 1.254;
ko Zatu nɛ́ 845;
ko Zakai nɛ́ 760;
o bem ko Binui nɛ́ 648;
ko Bebai nɛ́ 628;
ko Azgad nɛ́ 2.322;
ko Adɔnikam nɛ́ 667,
o bem ko Bigbai nɛ́ 2.067;
ko Adin nɛ́ 655;
ko Atɛr, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Hiskia nɛ́ 98;
ko Hasum nɛ́ 328;
ko Bɛsai nɛ́ 324;
ko Harif nɛ́ 112;
o be Gabaɔŋ nɛ́ 95;
o be Bɛtlɛhɛm in Nɛtɔfa nɛ́ 188;
o be Anatot nɛ́ 128;
o be Bɛt-Azmavɛt nɛ́ 42;
o be Kiriat-Yearim, Kɛfira in Bɛrot nɛ́ 743;
o be Rama in Gɛba nɛ́ 621;
o be Mikmas nɛ́ 122;
o be Bɛtɛl in Ai nɛ́ 123;
o be ŋma ɓii ye Nɛbo nɛ́ 52;
nú-gara ko ŋma Elam nɛ́ bíí 1.254;
ko Harim nɛ́ 320;
o be Jeriko nɛ́ 345;
o be Lod in Hadid in Ɔnɔ nɛ́ 721;
o bíí Sɛnaa nɛ́ 3.930.
«O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bíí nú-gara ko Yɛdaya, wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua nɛ́ 973;
nú-gara ko Imɛr nɛ́ bíí 1.052;
ko Pasɛhur nɛ́ 1.247;
ko Harim nɛ́ 1.017.
«Tɛ zuduk ko Levii, tɛ nú-gara ko Yesua in Kadmiɛl, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Haɔdeba nɛ́ 74.
«O wi-bii-gima kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nú-gara ko Asaf nɛ́ 148.
«O wi-pɛm-nù Tua ko Sɔ̧ nú-gara ko Salum, ko Atɛr, ko Talmɔŋ, ko Akub, ko Hatita ká bá nɛ̀ ko Sɔvai nɛ́ 138.
«O wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Siha, ko Hasufa, ko Tabaot;
ko Kɛros, ko Sia, ko Padɔŋ;
ko Lɛbnana, ko Hagaba, ko Salmai;
ko Hanaŋ, ko Gidɛl, ko Gahar;
ko Rɛaya, ko Rɛsin, ko Nɛkɔda;
ko Gazam, ko Uza, ko Pasɛa;
ko Bɛsai, ko Mɛhunim, ko Nɛfusɛsim;
ko Bakbuk, ko Hakufa, ko Harur;
ko Baslit, ko Mɛhida, ko Harsa;
ko Barkos, ko Sisɛra, ko Tama;
ko Nɛsia, ká bá nɛ̀ ko Hatifa.
«O bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sotai, ko Sɔfɛrɛt, o bem ko Pɛrida;
ko Yaala, ko Darkɔŋ, ko Gidɛl;
ko Sɛfatia, ko Hatil, ko Pokɛrɛt-Hasɛbayim, ká bá nɛ̀ ko Amɔŋ.
«O geɗek wi-de-tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in o bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ bíí 392.
«O wi nɛ tɛɛ nɛ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adɔŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ́
nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobia in ko Nɛkɔda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 642.
«Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nú-gara ko Hɔbaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bo nɛ mgbák nin-a na; a̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ, ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
Wi-duk-zu nù dora mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
«O bíí nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí 42.360;
o wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na: wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337; wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 245.
Dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, sunda nɛ́ 245, ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435 ɓɛɛ o tuifuu 6.720.
«O ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom. Wi-duk-zu nù ha̧a̧ kɔya-lɔr booro, yee ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in laa gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-taar wen o wi-dafi-sɔ̧.
«Mɔ nɛ o gasawi nutua nɔ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa;
ɓɛɛ oi mɔ nɛ o bíí ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro, sɛka laa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-nú-tua, o wi-bii-gima, o ŋma oi bíí hee o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ga in o be
O be
Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ baa Heembea e ti gii o be

Ɛsdras tɔra mɔ sɛn zaŋ kalata Heembea'i sɛn fara nɛ duk ká̧ Nú Garo Yì, ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tutuyɛ hɔ nɛnɛ wese see zu. A̧ tɔra ha̧ o wiwii in o okoo, in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma mɛ zii gba̧a̧ Heembea'i, ɓɛɛ dukbíí lɛŋ yeŋ zer mɛ zii wen'i.

Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-kalata daŋa so nɛ́ zu taŋaɗa nɛ wa dee so wen mɔ‘i, yor sɛnɛ. Matitia, Sɛma, Anania, Uria, Hilkia in Masɛya yora katɛ a nɛ war wiiko, ɓɛɛ nɛ war gale nɛ́ Pɛdaya, Misaɛl, Malkia, Hasum, Hasbadana, Zakarii in Mɛsulam.
Ɛsdras hu̧i̧a̧ kalata nɛ yí dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ, wen a̧ yor nɛ́ zu kusa fara see zu dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ. Ŋgimbi n'aa hu̧i̧a̧ kaɗi, o bíí kura yor ŋgɔn lɛŋ.
Ɛsdras zɔna GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa, ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nyɛi̧ er si ŋgɔn tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Aamɛn! Aamɛn!» Wa guu nù, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa mbɔɗɔnu sɛn ti GASA WAN, ba yí-wa hikiɗi nɛ nù.
Wa kura yor ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ Yesua, Bani, Sɛrɛbia, Yamin, Akub, Sabetai, Hɔdia, Masɛya, Kɛlita, Azaria, Yɔzabad, Hanaŋ in Pɛlaya nɛ yaa so nɛ́ o be Levii we ɗoŋ Heembea ha̧ wa.
Wa tɔr so nɛ́ mɔ zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ nɛ sa̧a̧‘a̧, we nɛ ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o bíí mɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Nehemii, wi-duk-zu nù in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duka nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii nɛ usi mɔ ha̧ dukbíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wese’ɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ zim mɔ na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ na mbɛt!» Dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ hi̧i̧ so nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ŋgimbi nɛ wa zii nɛ o gba̧a̧ Heembea'i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Ɛsdras tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo:

«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ o de mɔ in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm ŋma nɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí nɛ bo nɛnɛ na, wen sɔsɔɔ'ɛ nɛ́ wese ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ; ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na, wen desee ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
O be Levii gaia dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kàɗì, wen wese’ɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ yaka mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in mɛ nɔ mɔ, in ha̧ wa mɛ tom mɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa, de nɛ gasa gbaŋa wen wa zia wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
Tɛ yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, o gasawi nutua ko dukbíí, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn katɛ Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-mɔ, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ Heembea wen zia gba̧a̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ wa kpa zaŋ kalata Heembea nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ‘e: «O be
in wa a̧ tɔ̧́ wen-aa ha̧ bíí lɛŋ sɛn saaye kɔ-wa in sɛn Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí o wa̧a̧-te-nɔ̧́ nɛ‘i guna in o wan nɛ hɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, wa̧a̧ be-te nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee,

Dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ kii o mɔɔ-de-tua, ɓɛɛ wa de o tua-ŋgui kɔ-wa, o ŋma sɛn zu tua kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Tua ko Sɔ̧, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara nɛ duk Nú Garo Yì in o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Nú Garo ko Efraim.
Giiwi lɛŋ nɛ mɔi̧a, o wi nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara dee tua-ŋgui, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ. Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Josue bem ko Nun hɔ sɔsɔɔ, o be
Wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ Kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese gbaŋa'i lɛŋ, hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur-aa. Gbaŋa'i duka tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧ kaɗi nɛnɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra so.
Tɛ kpɔk fio-zɛ‘i tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be
O mgbák be

Wa kura yor ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ wa zii tɔra mɔ zaŋ kalata Heembea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ tɛ ŋgimbi taar; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, wa gbara ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gu yí-wa nù sɛn ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi taar woyo.
Yesua, Bani, Kadmiɛl, Sɛbania, Buni, Sɛrɛbia, Bani in Kɛnani daŋa zu fara-yor ko o be Levii ya sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa sa mɔ nɛ hee ger sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ o be Levii, Yesua, Kadmiɛl, Bani, Hasabnɛya, Sɛrɛbia, Hɔdia, Sɛbania ká bá nɛ̀ Pɛtahia tɔ̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo!
GASA WAN, bíí a̧ gásí nin'nɛ́ nɛ ɔ hura,
in nɛ ɔ gasa gan de yoŋgo in zɔnamɔ!
«GASA WAN nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee zɔm yiwese in o sɔra lɛŋ,
nù in o mɔ nɛ ya sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
o gba-tɔp in o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ;
ɛ́nɛ́ á̧ ha̧a̧
ɓɛɛ o mɔ mɛ yiwese gu nɛ́ nù ti'nɛ́.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ hoka Abram,
in nɛ dea ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbo saaye Ur nú Kaldee yak,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ aa nin Abraham ha̧ a̧.
Ɛnɛ zɔka see-aa ɔ sa̧a̧ sɛn ti'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nɔ tɔk in a̧,
ha̧ nɛ nú‘e, wi tɛ ha̧ nù ko o be Kanaŋ
in nù ko o be Hit, in ko o be Amɔr,
ko o be Periz, ko o be Jebus
in ko o be Girgas ha̧ a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ yora ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka mɔɔ-ko ko o dáà k’ɛɛ sɛn nú Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zii
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ
in o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ,
ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ in dukbíí nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'e o wi nɔ‘i ŋmaŋa tɛ
de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ in o dáà k’ɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk sɔsɔɔ ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ mbaŋa war ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp sɛn ti wa,
ɓɛɛ wa ku nɛ kora naŋ;
ɛ́nɛ́ ira o wi-ndak-pata wa
a ɗɔɔ ɗuka yì hee ŋma géé kii-ta ga.
Mɛ wese, ɛ́nɛ́ duka ti ha̧ wa nɛ̀ tura-zan,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ leɓe-wee usi nɛ̀ yuwar ha̧ wa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zira sɛn zu kaya Sinai,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa nɛ yiwese mɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ o mgbák geŋa, kpasa heembea,
in o de
Ɛ́nɛ́ dea ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ sa̧a̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ yɔr o
o geŋa in o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ wa nɛ ɗoŋ Moisɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nɛ yiwese mɛ
ŋgimbi nɛ wɔ gbɛ wa,
in ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ ta ha̧ wa
ŋgimbi nɛ wɔ-yì gbɛɛ nɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ba nù n’ɛnɛ kànà so mɔ‘e,
wi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa in o dáà k’ɛɛ,
wa ŋmaŋa tɛ-wa, wa dee ŋgazu,
wa mbo zu tɛ o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
«Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ mboo zu
in tɛ-wa bíí ɗoŋ mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so in wa.
Wa dee ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ zaŋ dee ŋgazu kɔ-wa'i,
wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ bara sɛn Egiptɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧, wan-e-ɗaŋmɔ,
Sɔ̧ wan-kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ wan-de-ko ha̧ bíí,
nɛ̀ de nyimsea nɛ haya-a na,
in nɛ̀ de dɔka demɔ ha̧ bíí;
tɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛ́nɛ́ e wa duk na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa mboo nɛ ŋma be ndai nɛ lɔr,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Sɔ̧ nɛ gboo yɛ nɛ Egiptɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ,›
de nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ,
ɛ́nɛ́ e wa duk sɛn ŋga-gbárà na,
wen deako k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ gasa;
tura-zan nɛ duk so ti wa
usi nɛ yuwar ha̧ wa mɛ wese, kaɗi na,
in wee nɛ duk so ti ha̧ wa
usi nɛ yuwar ha̧ wa mɛ zɛ, bi na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧
wen ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ;
ɛ́nɛ́ dor
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ yì ha̧ wa wen wɔ-yì nɛ gbɛ wa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ daia wa tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar sɛn ŋga-gbárà:
ŋma mɔ ɓan wa na;
o laa kɔ-wa a̧k na,
naŋ-wa ha̧ na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ee o mɔɔ-wan in o dukbíí ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-wa,
ɛ́nɛ́ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nù nɛ ya zik wa ha̧ wa;
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa baa nɛ nù ko Sihɔŋ wannu Hɛsbɔŋ,
in ko Og wannu Basaŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ dɔk
hee sɔra mɛ yiwese ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kai wa ye nɛ nù
n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa mɛ ba.
Hegɔ, o bem kɔ-wa yee tɛ nù‘i,
ɓɛɛ wa ba;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o be Kanaŋ
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ o be-nù‘i
mɛ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-wa;
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kai o wannu kɔ-wa
gú nɛ̀ o bíí nù‘i lɛŋ a er o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ nɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ in wa.
Wa baa o ye ŋgárá in o de nú-dɛm-nyɔnɔ,
wa baa o tua nɛ duna nɛ demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
o gɔna-yì, o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
o te-nɔ̧́, in o te wai wai nɛ dɔka-a.
Wa nyɔŋa mɔ, zaŋ-wa sura,
wa ŋmaŋa, ɓɛɛ wa duk zaŋ bɔtɛ
wen zu dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wa:
«Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ baa zu-wa nɛ ŋgɔn
de nɛ ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́;
wa ee Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk,
wa gbɛɛ o
nɛ gai so wa wen pia ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ wa de o gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ siŋa wa
a sɛn er o wisɛn kɔ-wa nɛ̀ bíí wa.
Ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ-wa,
wa saa so mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ duka yiwese zii nɛ ger-wa;
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ nɛ ko nyɛmna ga,
ɛ́nɛ́ toma o bíí nɛnɛ mɛ gbo wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ nɛ wa kpasi kaɗi,
wa ku̧u̧ naŋ dee ɗaŋmɔ sɛn ti'nɛ́ woyo;
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ siŋa wa a sɛn kɔ̧ er o wi-kur-zu-wa;
hegɔ o wi nɔ‘i usa bɔnɛ ha̧ wa.
Sɛka wa hiɗa mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ woyo;
ɛ́nɛ́ duka yiwese zii nɛ ger-wa,
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ nɛ ko nyɛmna ga,
ɛ́nɛ́ gboo wa tɛ bɔnɛ yinɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa de so nɛ́ ŋgazu,
wa mbo zu-wa sɛn tɛ o usamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na;
wa gbina o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ ba de nɛ tom wen duka kpasa.
Wa kaia ɓaa-wa nɛ ŋgɔn,
wa dee ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ wa zii wen na.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa pɛ nɛ dɔka-a;
ɛ́nɛ́ mbaŋa tɛ-wa nɛ
nɛ ɗoŋ o
ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ mɛ zii na;
hegɔ ɛ́nɛ́ siŋa wa a kɔ̧ er o gɔni-duk,
ɓɛɛ tɛ gasa
ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wa mɛ kum wa na,
ɛ́nɛ́ e wa duk na,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ko,
ɛ́nɛ́ duna nɛ
«Kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa, nɛ‘i yu yuu,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-kasi-nɔɔ-tɔk
in wi-yor-ɗoŋ
k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk o bɔnɛ nɛ tika zu yɛ,
ɛɛ in o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi k’ɛɛ,
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
o
o dáà k’ɛɛ gú nɛ̀ dukbíí k’ɛɛ lɛŋ,
ku̧u̧naŋ-a ŋgimbi ko o wannu Asirii hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ
hee geɗek mɔ ga na.
Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo tɛ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ hɔɔ zu yɛ na,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ mbo zu na.
Nɛ̀ war ko o wannu k’ɛɛ,
o gasawi k’ɛɛ in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
gú nɛ̀ o dáà k’ɛɛ,
wa ba Heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ tom na,
wa mbo zu tɛ o
n’ɛnɛ mbaŋ so ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.
Tɛ ŋgimbi-wan kɔ-wa,
in tɛ ŋgimbi kpaa o dɔka mɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa
tɛ gasa nú-dɛm-nyɔnɔ n’ɛnɛ ee ti wa,
wa de tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
in wa e ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa duk na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ zɔ́k, sɔsɔɔ ɛɛ nɛ́ bara;
ɛɛ nɛ́ bara sɛn tɛ nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ,
ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ waya-mɔ-a in demɔ-a.
Ɓɛɛ o demɔ nù‘i lɛŋ yaka si er o gɔni wannu
n’ɛnɛ ee zu yɛ wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ.
Wa duk zu yɛ in o mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ a̧a̧ tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ nyɛmna.»
Ɛɛ ha̧a̧ nú wen zu mɔ nɛ hɔɔ so zu yɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yɔr. Nin o gasawi, o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ duka tɛ yɔramɔ‘i.
Nin o bíí nɛ‘i yɔra zaŋ kalata nɛ
Sɛraya, Azaria, Irmeya;
Pasɛhur, Amaria, Malkia;
Hatus, Sɛbania, Maluk;
Harim, Mɛrɛmɔt, Obadia;
Daniɛl, Ginɛtɔŋ, Baruk;
Mɛsulam, Abia, Miyamin;
Maazia, Bilgai, in Sɛmaya.
O be Levii nɛ́ Yesua bem ko Azania, Binui tɛ nú-gara ko Hɛnadad, Kadmiɛl;
in o nya-wa Sɛbania, Hɔdia, Kɛlita, Pɛlaya, Hanaŋ;
Mika, Rehob, Hasabia;
Zakur, Sɛrɛbia, Sɛbania;
Hɔdia, Bani in Bɛninu.
O gasawi zu dukbíí nɛ Parɔs, Pahat-Mɔab, Elam, Zatu, Bani;
Buni, Azgad, Bebai;
Adɔnia, Bigbai, Adin;
Atɛr, Hiskia, Azur;
Hɔdia, Hasum, Bɛsai;
Harif, Anatot, Nebai;
Magpias, Mɛsulam, Hesir;
Mɛsezabɛl, Sadɔk, Yadua;
Pɛlatia, Hanaŋ, Anania;
Osee, Hanania, Hasub;
Alɔhɛs, Pila, Sɔbɛk;
Rɛhum, Hasabena, Masɛya;
Ahia, Hanaŋ, Anaŋ;
Maluk, Harim in Baana.

Oi dukbíí, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-nù Tua ko Sɔ̧, o wi-bii-gima in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, gú nɛ̀ oi o dukbíí nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ nɛ o bíí ŋma nù mɛ ndak ɗoŋ Heembea ko Sɔ̧, o kóò kɔ-wa, o be-wiwii in o be-okoo kɔ-wa, in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma so mɛ zii mɔ,

yora ɗoŋ o tu̧u̧-tɛ nya-wa, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú kan nɛ mɔ mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ n'aa ha̧a̧ so nɛ ɗoŋ Moisɛ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧. Wa ha̧a̧ nú mɛ kasi o wen, o geŋa, in o usamɔ ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ de nɛ tom.
Ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ha̧ nú mbɛt'e, ɛɛ beka ha̧ o boko-bem k’ɛɛ ha̧ o bíí nù‘i na, in ɛɛ beka ba boko-bem kɔ-wa nɛ kóò ha̧ o bem k’ɛɛ na mbɛt.
Kà o bíí nù‘i kai o mɔɔ-gɛnɛ in o nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗɔr wese-ɔm-tɛ in wese-gbaŋa, ɛɛ beka hi̧fi na. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ, ɛɛ tɛ e fɔ k’ɛɛ mɛ duk biri, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ gbɛɛ ge nyamandoi ge ndé lɛŋ yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war k’ɛɛ mɛ tɛ yɛ, ɛɛ ha̧a̧ nú yɛ ndé, ɛɛ tɛ ha̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ geɗek kɔya bu-mbɔi tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk wen gbaka tom Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
wen brɛt nɛ‘i wɛk, wen ha̧a̧mɔ wese lɛŋ, wen
K’ɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii in dukbíí, ɛɛ pi̧i̧ tani wen mɔ ko gua n’ɛɛ tɛ kii tɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o bíí nú tua k’ɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i hoka tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk, wen yea-a nɛ wee
Ɛɛ tɛ ŋmar zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛɛ, in o zu waya-te lɛŋ dam ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk ha̧ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
Ɛɛ tɛ kai o kaya bem k’ɛɛ in o mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ nɛnɛ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ Heembea ga; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o kuti be ndai, o kuti

Ɛɛ tɛ ha̧ zu de fuu, o zu-mɔ k’ɛɛ, o waya-te, o ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ o gɔna-bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ in h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ha̧ zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛɛ ha̧ o be Levii nɛ tɛ ndɛm o zu-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɗoŋ ye, fara n’ɛɛ de tom sɛnɛ.
Ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ bem ko Arɔŋ tɛ duk in o be Levii ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ndɛm nɛ mɔ; ɓɛɛ o be Levii tɛ kai zu o mɔ nɛ wa ndɛma tɛnɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; wa tɛ kai si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ mbɔi duk sɛnɛ.
O be
Hegɔ ɛɛ beka e Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ duk na.
O gasawi zu dukbíí ɔ so kɔ‘i sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ oi dukbíí pi̧ tani wen baa bíí kpɔk zu bíí ɓu mɛ ɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧ ye, ɓɛɛ o oi bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɓɔna kɔ‘i ɗoŋ o ŋma ye.
Dukbíí toka de yoŋgo ha̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ ta-tɛ.
O gasa wi-duk-zu zika-nù ɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ oi dɔka o be

O ŋma be Juda in o ŋma be Bɛnjamin ɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm mbɛt. Mgbara o bezaŋ Juda nɛ́ Ataya bem ko Uziya, bem ko Zakarii, bem ko Amaria, bem ko Sɛfatia, bem ko Mahalalɛl, sɛka Masɛya bem ko Baruk, bem ko Kol-Hɔzɛ, bem ko Hazaya, bem ko Adaya, bem ko Yɔyarib, bem ko Zakarii, bem ko Ha-Siloni.
Dɔka o bezaŋ Pɛrɛs lɛŋ nɛ yaa Jerusalɛm nɛ́ o wiwii 468; wa so nɛ́ o wi-biro.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ́ Salu bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Yɔɛd, Yɔɛd bem ko Pɛdaya, bem ko Kolaya, bem ko Masɛya, bem ko Itiɛl, bem ko Yɛsaya;
sɛka Gabai in Salai; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 928.
Jɔɛl bem ko Zikri duka so wan zu o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Yɛhuda bem ko Hasɛnua nɛ́ yiitoo gasawi saaye.
Mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ Yɛdaya bem ko Yɔyarib, Yakin;
Sɛraya bem ko Hilkia, bem ko Mɛsulam, bem ko Sadɔk, bem ko Mɛrayot, bem ko Ahitub nɛ̀ wa hoka so mɛ duk gasawi zu Tua ko Sɔ̧,
sɛka o nya-wa nɛ de tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 822. Mbe bíí woyo nɛ́ Adaya bem ko Yeroam, bem ko Pɛlalia, bem ko Amsi, bem ko Zakarii, bem ko Pasɛhur, bem ko Malkia,
gú nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ nɛ duk nɛ́ o gasawi nutua. Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 242. Ŋma bíí woyo nɛ́ Amasesai, bem ko Azarɛl, bem ko Azai, bem ko Mɛsilɛmɔt, bem ko Imɛr,
gú nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ 128 nɛ yaa nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi. Wi nɛ duka so wan zu wa nɛ́ Zabdiɛl bem ko Ha-Gɛdɔlim.
Mgbara o bezaŋ Levii nɛ́ Sɛmaya bem ko Hasub, bem ko Azrikam, bem ko Hasabia, bem ko Buni;
sɛka Sabetai in Yɔzabad mgbara o gasawi zu o be Levii nɛ zɔk tom ko Sɔ̧ nɛ zan;

in Matania, bem ko Mika, bem ko Zabdi, bem ko Asaf; a̧ nɛ́ wi nɛ ku̧ so naŋ gima-gasi-sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi kɔfa-sɔ̧; sɛka Bakbukia, nya-a̧ nɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa tɛ tom'i in Abda bem ko Samua, bem ko Galal, bem ko Yedutun.
O be Levii lɛŋ nɛ yaa so Jerusalɛm nɛ́ 284.
Mgbara o wi-pɛm-nú-tua nɛ́ Akub in Talmɔŋ ká bá nɛ̀ o nya-wa lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ so tɛ tom'i in wa; wa nɛ́ 172.
Oi o be
O wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ɔ so kɔ‘i sɛn ŋma fara Jerusalɛm nɛ‘i sa Ofɛl; ɓɛɛ gasawi kɔ-wa nɛ́ Siha in Gispa.
Gasawi ko o be Levii sɛn Jerusalɛm so nɛ́ Uzi bem ko Bani, bem ko Hasabia, bem ko Matania, bem ko Mika tɛ nú-gara ko Asaf; wa nɛ́ o wi-bii-gima sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Ŋma heembea ko wannu a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ zu o wi-bii-gima nɛ usi so yuwar tom kɔ-wa wese kpɔk kpɔk.
Pɛtahia bem ko Mɛsezabɛl tɛ nú-gara ko Zɛra, bem ko Juda, duka so katɛ wannu wen wee ɗoŋ mɔ ko dukbíí ha̧ a̧ oi nú wa.
Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye si zaŋbɛɛ, o bezaŋ Juda ɔɔ sɛn Kiriat-Arba, gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧; sɛn Dibɔŋ, gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧; sɛn Yɛkabseɛl gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
sɛn Yesua, Mɔlada, Bɛt-Pɛlɛt;
Hasar-Sual, sɛn Bɛrseba gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
sɛn Siklag, sɛn Mɛkɔna gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
sɛn Ɛn-Rimɔŋ, Sɔra, Yarmut;
Zanɔa, sɛn Adulam gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ katɛ wa; sɛn Lakis in katɛ a̧ lɛŋ; in sɛn Azɛka gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧. Wa ɔɔ sɛn Bɛrseba hɔ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Hinɔm.
O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Gɛba, Mikmas, Aya, Bɛtɛl gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
in Anatot, Nɔb, Anania,
Hasɔr, Rama, Gitayim,
Hadid, Sɛboim, Nɛbalat;
Lod, Ɔnɔ sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-de-tom-nɛ-er.
O ŋma be Levii nɛ ɔɔ so ye tɛ nù Juda nɛɛ de ye sɛn nú Bɛnjamin.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ pia so in Zorobabɛl, bem ko Sealtiɛl, in Yesua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sɛraya, Irmeya, Ɛsdras;
Amaria, Maluk, Hatus;
Sɛkania, Rɛhum, Mɛrɛmɔt;
Ido, Ginɛtɔi, Abia;
Miyamin, Madia, Bilga;
Sɛmaya, Yɔyarib, Yɛdaya;
Salu, Amɔk, Hilkia, Yɛdaya. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in zu o be Levii tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yesua.
O be Levii nɛ́ Yesua, Binui, Kadmiɛl, Sɛrɛbia, Yehuda in Matania. Matania in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ba-ger gima-gasi Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ Bakbukia in Uni nɛ duka so nɛ́ o ŋma be Levii mbɛt yora tan ti wa kɔ̧ nɛ gima nú wa.
Yesua kòó Yoyakim, Yoyakim kòó Eliasib, Eliasib kòó Yoyada,
Yoyada kòó Yɔnataŋ, ɓɛɛ Yɔnataŋ kó Yadua.
Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: tɛ nutua ko Sɛraya nɛ́ Mɛraya, ko Irmeya nɛ́ Hanania,
ko Ɛsdras nɛ́ Mɛsulam, ko Amaria nɛ́ Yohanaŋ,
ko Mɛliu nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ, ko Sɛbania nɛ́ Jɔzɛf,
ko Harim nɛ́ Adna, ko Mɛrayot nɛ́ Hɛlkai,
ko Ido nɛ́ Zakarii, ko Ginɛtɔŋ nɛ́ Mɛsulam,
ko Abia nɛ́ Zikri, ko Miniamin nɛ́...
ko Bilga nɛ́ Samua, ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ,
ko Yɔyarib nɛ́ Matɛnai, ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Uzi,
ko Salai nɛ́ Kalai, ko Amɔk nɛ́ Ebɛr,
ko Hilkia nɛ́ Hasabia, ɓɛɛ ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Nɛtaneɛl.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Eliasib, Yoyada, Yohanaŋ in Yadua duka nɛ́ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗoŋ ŋmaa, wa yɔra nin o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ́ gasawi nutua zaŋ kalata hɔ ŋgimbi-wan ko Darius be Pɛrsɛ.
Wa yɔra nin o gasawi nutua ko o be Levii zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yohanaŋ be-koo Eliasib.

O gasawi zu o be Levii nɛ́ Hasabia, Sɛrɛbia in Yesua, bem ko Kadmiɛl, bá nɛ́ o nya-wa nɛ ya tan ti wa, wen bia gima nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko David, bíí ko Sɔ̧; o ndé nyɛm nɛ̀ ŋgimbi kɔ‘i, gasi nɛ́ Sɔ̧, de nɛ́ osoko ha̧ a̧.
O wi-pɛm-nù tua nɛ́ Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mɛsulam, Talmɔŋ in Akub; wa ya so pɛm nɛ o fara-a-mɔ mgbák nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Wa dee so tom sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim bem ko Yesua, be-koo Yosadak in sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Nehemii wi-duk-zu nù, in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in wi-yɔr-kalata mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi dee gbaŋa garo Jerusalɛm, wa saa o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ fara nɛ wa ya sɛnɛ mɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, wen dee gbaŋa nɛ desee, nɛ zɔnamɔ, nɛ gima, ba sɔkɔ, koloŋ in kunde.
O wi-bii-gima mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm nɛ tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa,
nɛ Bɛt-Gilgal in nɛ ká̧ Geba in Azmavɛt, wen o wi-bii-gima dee so kɔ-wa ye nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii
Mi dee ha̧ o gasawi nù Juda mɛ daŋ zu garo. Mi mɔi̧a o wi-bii-gima nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ mi kɛ̧ wa tɛ fara yiitoo. Kuti-a gbara kɔ‘i nɛ zu garo nɛ war wiiko si nú garo nɛ‘i sa'e Zuku-paa,
ɓɛɛ Hɔsaya in reeta gasawi Juda gbar ɗoŋ wa.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Azaria, Ɛsdras, Mɛsulam;
Yehuda, Bɛnjamin, Sɛmaya in Irmeya.
Mɛ ɗoŋ woyo, nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ kaia mbia, ɓɛɛ Zakarii, bem ko Yɔnataŋ, bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Matania, bem ko Mikaya, bem ko Zakur, bem ko Asaf,
in o nya-a̧ Sɛmaya, Azarɛl, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nɛtaneɛl, Yehuda in Hanani kai kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-de-gima ko David bíí ko Sɔ̧. Nɛ́ Ɛsdras, wi-yɔr-mɔ a̧ duk ti ha̧ wa.
Nɛ̀ nú garo Zu-zer, wa gbara nɛ fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ
Yiitoo-aa baa kɔ‘i nɛ́ zu garo nɛ war gale; mi duka so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ wa in oi reeta o gasawi; ɛɛ ɓira zu Fara-dɔ-brɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hɔ tɛ Pɛsa Garo.
Ɛɛ ɓira zu nú garo ko Efraim, ko Yesana, nú garo ko o Zoro, tɛ fara-pɛm-mɔ ko Hananeɛl in wan nɛ‘i sa'e Gɔmŋmaa, hɔ sɛn nú garo ko o Sami, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yor zu nú Garo-pɛm-mɔ.
Mɛ ɗoŋ, o duk wi-bii-gima yiitoo nɔ‘i yee kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in mi nɛ tɛ‘m mbɛt, o reeta gasawi nɛ yaa so in am,
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eliakim, Masɛya, Miniamin, Mikaya in Ɛlyɔnai, Zakarii in Hanania nɛ̀ o mbia,
sɛka Masɛya, Sɛmaya, Eleazar, Uzi, Yohanaŋ, Malkia, Elam ba nɛ Ezɛr. Izrahia, wi-duk-zu gima ŋmaa nú tɛ gima in o wi-bii-gima kɔ‘i.
Wa ɗafa Sɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a wese'i, ɓɛɛ wa de nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, wen nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ kpa gasa desee hegɔ. O okoo in o obem dee nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wi zii gayamɔ desee ko o bíí Jerusalɛm nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.

Wese'i, wa ee o wi-pɛm-mɔ nú o gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ wa a zu-nyɔnɔ in o zu-mɔ sɛnɛ. Nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ kai mɔ nɛ o bíí kai tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Heembea gɔna wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ga, wen o be Juda kpaa so desee nyɛmna zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ tom.
Wa duka so de nɛ tom ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in tom
Ɓeemɛ tɛ ŋgimbi ko David in Asaf, o gasawi ko o wi-bii-gima a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ wen bia gima-gasi-sɔ̧ in gima-dee-osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Zorobabɛl in Nehemii, o be
Ŋgimbi'i, wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ kalata ko Moisɛ ti dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa kpa'e be Amɔŋ in be Mɔab beka ye zaŋ dukbíí ko Sɔ̧ na,
wen wa ha̧ so yì in brɛt ha̧ o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí zia heembea'i kaɗi, wa foo o gɛnɛ yinɛ mgbara o be
Nɛti ha̧ mɔ‘i, wa hoka Eliasib wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ de tom bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; a̧ nɛ́ nam ko Tobia.

Eliasib ɗafa so fara ha̧ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsa bɛr-tua nɛ wa mɔi̧ so o ha̧a̧mɔ, fuu-nyama, o nyɛk, o zu alkamaari, zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ in zu nɔ̧́ si sɛnɛ. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ war mɔ nɛ o be Levii, o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú tua gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kpa.
Mi bo so kɔ‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi'i na, wen mi sii so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ sɛn katɛ Artazɛrzɛs wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ ɗoŋ tikiɗi, mi aka ɔma-tɛ er-a,
ɓɛɛ mi si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm. Mi zɔka ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Eliasib dea tɛ ɗafa fara-ɔɔ ha̧ Tobia kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Mɔ‘i tu̧u̧ see-am nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ mi kai o mɔ ko Tobia nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ Tua'i lɛŋ a zan.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ bur war bɛr-tua'i ha̧ mɛ sa̧; ɓɛɛ mi kai o nyɛk Tua ko Sɔ̧, o ha̧a̧mɔ in o fuu-nyama nɛ duka hi̧i̧ sinɛ ɗoŋ a kɔ̧ a̧ woyo.
Mi zia woyo'e, war mɔ nɛ o be Levii in o wi-bii-gima nɛ de so tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa so, wa kpa na; hegɔ wa sii mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ si tɛ̀ kɔ-wa zaŋbɛɛ mɛ.
Mi baa wen-aa kpa nɛ o gasawi, ɓɛɛ mi ak wa: «Nɛ́ ge á̧ dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ pɛsi e tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ duk ge?» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am mɔi̧a o be Levii in o wi-bii-gima pii ɗoŋ sɛn yí tom kɔ-wa woyo.
Hegɔ, nù Juda lɛŋ kaia zu alkamaari, zu nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in zu nɔ̧́ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi kai a fara-a.

Mi ee nɛ́ Sɛlɛmia wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, Sadɔk wi-yɔr-mɔ, in Pɛdaya ŋma be Levii ká bá nɛ̀ Hanaŋ bem ko Zakur, be-koo Matania ha̧ wa mɛ pɛm Tua ko Sɔ̧ wen o bíí lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, wa nɛ́ o wi-mboo-zu. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ kɛ̧ mɔ ha̧ o nya-wa.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ am wen zu mɔ n'am dea'i; ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ mboozu kɔ‘m wen Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ in wen tom mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ na.

Nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧‘m zɔka nɛ o be Juda tɛ ɓara yí dɔ̧ɔ̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ. Mi zɔka wa fara kaia sikila alkamaari si kɔ̧ dam; wa hɛra o dak dɔ̧ɔ̧, o waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, o waya te-mbɔra in o tui nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zu tuifuu kɔ-wa mɛ kai yaknɛ si Jerusalɛm wese-ɔm-tɛ. Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a zu wa wese nɛ wa de nɛ gɛnɛ kɔ-wa'i.
O wi Tir nɛ ya sɛn Jerusalɛm mbɛt kaia o zoro in o mɔɔ-gɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛnɛ ɗɔr nɛnɛ ha̧ o be Juda sɛn Jerusalɛm wese-ɔm-tɛ.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a zu o gasawi Juda hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ de e nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ tɛ geemɔ‘i ɔ dee nde?
Mɔ nɛ o dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee so bó a̧‘i na? Bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ pi̧i̧ so ŋga bɔnɛ zu yɛ in zu ye’ɛ na? Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ aŋ nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ pi̧ ŋgɔn, zu o be

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kpe nú garo Jerusalɛm nɛti ha̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ, in ha̧ wa mɛ hu̧i̧, ɗoŋ nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ yaka kaɗi! Mi ee o ŋma wi-de-tom kɔ‘m sɛn nú garo-ye mɛ dor o tui ká yé saaye Jerusalɛm wese-ɔm-tɛ na.
Hegɔ, mɔ‘i dee ha̧ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ in o wi-de-gɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mɛ ɔ zan ká̧ Jerusalɛm war kpɔk in war yiitoo.
Mi mbaŋa tɛ-wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ sɛn ká̧ garo nɛ zan wen ge? K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé hegɔ woyo, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ zɔk.» Ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese'i, wa kaɗa tɛa-a wese-ɔm-tɛ.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be Levii mɛ
Nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i mbɛt a̧‘m zɔka nɛ o be Juif nɛ baa so o zɔŋa Asdod, o zɔŋa Amɔŋ in o zɔŋa Mɔab nɛ kóò.
Díkìn bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ nú Asdod; wa iŋa nɛ́ nú ko o gɔni-duk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ nú ko o Juif na.

Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a zu wa, ɓɛɛ mi fom wa; mi gusa o ŋma, mi zuɗa mui̧-zu o ŋma, ɓɛɛ mi de ha̧ wa mɛ kan mɔ nɛ nin Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛɛ beka ha̧ be-okoo k’ɛɛ ha̧ o be-wiwii kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kóò na; ɛɛ beka ba o be-okoo kɔ-wa ha̧ o bem k’ɛɛ, kóó nɛ̀ war k’ɛɛ mɛ tɛ yɛ na mbɛt!»
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Bó nɛ́ tɛ mɔ‘i à Salomɔŋ wannu
Ɓɛɛ war-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt, ɛɛ kɔ̧ mɛ zii'e ɛnɛ de nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ hegɔ sɛn ti Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, bá nɛ̀ o gɔni-duk nɛ kóò na.»
Ŋma bem ko Yoyada, bem ko Eliasib gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ baa so nɛ boko-bem ko Sanbalat be Hɔrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mi ndak a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ o wi nɔ‘i; wen zu dee ndiŋ nɛ wa dee pi̧ tɛ tom ɗafa-sɔ̧ in tɛ
Mi ndaka o gɛnɛ katɛ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mi usi tom ko o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo, o ndé tɛ tom kɔ‘i.
Mi usa yuwar tom-ha̧a̧-gua tɛ ŋgimbi-a in ha̧a̧ zu-nyɔnɔ mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ am nɛ̀ de-a!
Duka so nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zɛrzɛs ɔɔ so nɛ̀ wan zu o zika-nù gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Indɛ hɔ nɛnɛ Etiopii mɛ.
Ɗoŋ baa wan ko wannu Zɛrzɛs, a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ duk zu damti nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ́ taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧ a̧ dee nɛ̀ gbaŋa ha̧ o gasawi in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, o gasa wi-biro Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o be-wan in o gasawi zu zika-nù mbɛt. Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ kpa ti a̧.
A̧ usa dɔka mbɔi in gasa mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wa tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu dee mbe gbaŋa sɛn bee-gara tua-wan kɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí ŋgárá Suzɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o geɗek wi lɛŋ. Gbaŋa'i ɔɔ nɛ́ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Wa kuna o de yí-laa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ de toka gbɛ̧ nyak, ɓɛɛ wa ba kun tɛ o de káná nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, e tɛ o mbiŋ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu ta. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aa o gado nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi zu fara nɛ̀‘i yɔka nɛ̀ o de ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ kpaa-a ɔ ɓana.
Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ́ o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr, yí-a
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɔ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wan-duk-zu nyɔŋmɔ mɛ ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
Ko-wan Vasti dee war gbaŋa kɔ‘i in o okoo sɛn kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu mbɛt.

Sɛn tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, dɔ̧ɔ̧ pi̧i̧ wannu tɛ tortɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o kpàná kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ ya ɓɔn mgbák katɛ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Mɛhuman, Bizɛta, Harbona, Bigta, Abgata, Zɛtar ká bá nɛ̀ Karkas,
ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ sa ko-wan Vasti tɛnɛ nɛ̀ oi mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan, mɛ usi déè kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o gasawi in o dukbíí nɛ̀ mɔi̧a, wen a̧ yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ ko-wan Vasti bɛ̧ sara nú o betom nɛ̀ wannu toma'i. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see wannu ɗaŋa, see-aa tu̧u̧ nyɛmna, bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧ na.
Zu mɔ‘i, a̧ saa o wan-ba-keta zu o heembea in yuwar duka-a ko o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ a̧.
O ŋma gasawi mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ko o bíí Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ wannu nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Karsɛna, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Mɛrɛs, Marsena, ká bá nɛ̀ Mɛmukan. O wi nɔ‘i a̧a̧ so mgbara o
Wannu aka wa: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ko-wan Vasti mbo zu tɛ saa-sara ko wannu nɛ̀ toma nɛ̀ o kpàná kɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ na ga’ɛ, nɛ́ ge a'i tɛ de in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea ko nù k’ɛɛ ge?»
Mɛmukan kifa nú ti wannu in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ Vasti ee nɛ́ wannu ɛ̀nɛ̀-wi tɛ geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee nɛ́ o gasawi in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ geemɔ mbɛt.
O okoo lɛŋ tɛ zii nyɛrɛmɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e o wíì kɔ-wa mbɛt tɛ geemɔ. Wa tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Wannu Zɛrzɛs baa tom so sa ko-wan Vasti, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.›

Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i yak nɛnɛ, o kóò ko o gasawi nù Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, tɛ de ŋgazu in o gasawi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ee wíì kɔ-wa tɛ geemɔ; hegɔ mɔ‘i tɛ aŋ nɛ́ nyimsea ko o wiwii a ŋgɔn.

Kà wannu nɛ kɔ̧a̧, a̧ a̧ há̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ yɔr mɔ zaŋ heembea ko Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ nɛ̀‘i beka kpai na mɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Vasti beka pii ɗoŋ tɛ wannu mɛ duk ko-wan ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ wannu tɛ ba nɛ́ ŋma mbe kóò nɛ̀ dee gan a̧ e oi-aa.›
Hegɔ, bíí tɛ iŋ heembea ko wannu dam zu o dɔka nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i tɛ de ha̧ o okoo lɛŋ mɛ tu̧ tɛ o wíì kɔ‘i, kóó nɛ́ o gasawi, kóó nɛ́ o geɗek wi.»
Wen'i dee tɛ wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak ɗoŋ wen ko Mɛmukan'i.

Wannu toma o kalata dam tɛ nù kɔ‘i lɛŋ, ha̧ o zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar yɔramɔ kɔ-wa, ha̧ o dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa, ha̧ o wan-kóò lɛŋ mɛ duk wan zu kira kɔ‘i, usi nɛ̀ nú kɔ‘i ha̧ o bem kɔ‘i.
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ nyimsea ko wannu Zɛrzɛs ga̧a̧ kaɗi, tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ Vasti in mɔ nɛ̀ Vasti dea, in keta nɛ̀ wa baa wen a̧.
O wi-de-tom ko wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí nɛ́ o gba de be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii nɛti na ha̧ wannu.

Wannu a̧ hók o bíí dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù tɛ wan kɔ‘i lɛŋ, mɛ kii o be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yora zɔŋa nyɛmna, ha̧ mgbɔ wa si fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu. Wa a̧ yá ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko Ege, kpàná-pɛm o kóò ko wannu sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ; ɓɛɛ a'i há̧ gba de nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ ha̧ wa.
Ɓɛɛ be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ de tɛ wannu nyɛmna'i tɛ duk ko-wan oi Vasti.»
Taamɔ‘i dee tɛ wannu nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ de hegɔ.

Ŋma be Juif a̧a̧ so sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ‘i, nin-a nɛ̀ Mardochee. A̧ so nɛ́ bem ko Yair, be-koo Simɛi, bem ko Kis, bezaŋ Bɛnjamin. A̧ a̧a̧ so mgbara o bíí Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, baa kai so nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ in Jɔakim wannu Juda.

Nɛ́ Mardochee a̧ duka so dai Adasa nɛ̀ wa sa'e Ɛstɛr, bem ko nya dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Dáà in nàà ko Ɛstɛr fee so kɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ fio kɔ-wa a̧ Mardochee baa nɛ̀ a̧ hee bem kɔ‘i ga. Boko-bem’ɛi yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna, saŋa-yí-a dee so nyɛmna mbɛt.

Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa toma heembea ko wannu dam fara lɛŋ kaɗi, wa mɔi̧a o gba dùk be-zɔŋa si ŋgárá Suzɛ, ɓɛɛ wa e Ege zu wa. Hegɔ, wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr si kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu hee o dɔka-a ga ha̧ Ege, wi-pɛm-okoo mɛ zɔk a̧ mbɛt.

Boko-bem’ɛi dee tɛ Ege nyɛmna, a̧ baa see-aa mbɛt. Ege ha̧a̧ o nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ in o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. A̧ ha̧a̧ o boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ be-tua ha̧ Ɛstɛr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de gɔna-bɛr-tua tɛ tua ko o okoo ha̧ a̧.
Ɛstɛr sa so nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee dora so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧.
Wese lɛŋ, Mardochee yara zik fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu mɛ iŋ mgbara haya-tɛ in duka-a ko Ɛstɛr.

Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ be-zɔŋa dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar-mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra wen o kóò ko wannu tɛ fio-zɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔa a̧ si ɗoŋ wannu. Tɛ́ kuti fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ nɔ̧́-nyama, ɓɛɛ tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk mɛ siti woyo, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ o ŋma gba de nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ pɛr-aa ɔ dee in o nɔ̧́-yɔk-tɛ ko okoo mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ yuwar mɔ nɛ tɛ de tɛ nɛa-a ko be-zɔŋa sitɛ wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: wa tɛ ha̧ o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ ba nɛnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ tua-yaa ko o okoo si fara ko wannu.

Kóò‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ wannu mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tutuyɛ a̧ gboo pii ɗoŋ ye nɛ́ ŋma ɓii tua nɛtɛ nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Sasgaz, kpàná nɛ̀ wa hoka e zu o zɔŋa-kóò ko wannu. A̧ beka si ɗoŋ, ɗoŋ wannu woyo ɓɔna, kà á bòò nɛ́ wannu nɛ̀ tɛ-wi a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ sa a̧ nɛ̀ nin-a sɛ́.

Nɛ̀ ŋgimbi ko Ɛstɛr boko-bem ko Abihayil nɛ̀ Mardochee baa so gasi nɛnɛ hɔa mɛ si tua ɗoŋ wannu, a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ ŋma mɔ yak zu mɔ nɛ̀ Ege, wan-duk-zu o okoo usa ha̧ a̧ na. Mɔ ko Ɛstɛr dee tɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ zɔka a̧.
Wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr nɛnɛ si fara-duk ko wannu Zɛrzɛs tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧ zɛ ko «Tebɛt», tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.
See wannu baa Ɛstɛr gan o dɔka okoo; Ɛstɛr dee tɛ-a nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ nɛ̀ ko-wan oi Vasti.
Wannu dee gasa gbaŋa wen Ɛstɛr ha̧ o gasawi in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma wese-ɔm-tɛ kpɔk ha̧ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧,
Ŋgimbi mɔi̧a o be-zɔŋa hɔɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ tom ko Mardochee so nɛ́ duka nù kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu.
Ɛstɛr sa nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee baa dor so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧. Ɛstɛr duka tɛ mboo zu ha̧ Mardochee siti hee ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kɔ̧́ tua kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Tɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Mardochee duk nɛnɛ nú tua ko wannu'i, o ŋma kpàná-pɛm-nú tua ko wannu yiitoo, Bigtaŋ in Tɛrɛs kpaa ɗaŋsee zu wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e nú in ŋmaa mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Wen'i aa zer Mardochee, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ba kɔ‘i wen-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu.
Wa kia mgbara mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk'e nɛ́ kpasawen; nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ga̧i̧a o kpàná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ te, gbɛ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.
Ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wannu Zɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ gasa fara tom ha̧ Haman, bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag. A̧ baa a̧ e nɛ́ gasawi zu o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nutua-wan kɔ̧-a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nù, gú nɛ̀ nù ti Haman, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so zu mɔ ko Haman. Ɓɛɛ Mardochee de kɔ‘i hegɔ na.
O wi-de-tom ko wannu nɛ̀ yaa so nú tua-wan'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee: «Wen ge sa mɛ gbin heembea ko wannu ge?»
Wa duka mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ hegɔ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen nú wa na. Ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yak'i ha̧ Haman ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk mgbara taamɔ ko Mardochee, wen Mardochee baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e, wi nɛ́ be Juif.
Haman zɔka'e Mardochee gbɛ zugur nù na, gú nù ti a̧ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ see-aa nyim nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,

ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ Mardochee ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɔk ɓɛɛ na, wen wa baa tɔ̧ so dùk ko Mardochee ha̧ a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia yuwar mɛ kum dukbíí ko Mardochee, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o be Juif lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn zaŋnu ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.

Sɛn tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Nisaŋ», tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Zɛrzɛs, wa pi̧i̧ tani nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Purim» ti Haman, sa nɛ̀ nin wese kpɔk kpɔk in fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt, hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Adar», ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zu Adar a̧ tani baa.

Haman nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Zɛrzɛs: «Ŋma dukbíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ̀ de mɔ hee ko o dɔka-a ga na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ pɛsa dam tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. O heembea kɔ-wa duk nɛtɛ mgbara o dɔka heembea ko o dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o heembea ko wannu na. Ká wannu é wa géè na.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha'i mɛ kum wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mɔi̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-nɛ-booro-ɓu-naar a er o wi-kasi-sede wen tom-nù.»
Wannu kpɔ̧i̧a̧ wele kɔ‘i mɛ er, ɓɛɛ ba ha̧ Haman bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag wi-kur-zu o be Juif.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Haman: «O wi nɔ‘i in mbɔi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ er-mɛ. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ́ de in wa.»

Nɛ̀ kuti fio-zɛ hɔɔ zɛ ɓu-zua-taar, wa saa o wi-yɔr-mɔ ko wannu tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Haman, ha̧ o be-wan in o gasawi zu nù tɛ zika-nu-wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk. Wa yɔra mɔ ha̧ zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa. Wa yɔra mɔ‘i nɛ̀ nin wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e dap-wele kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o betom kaia o kalata nɔ‘i, pɛsi dam tɛ o zika-nù lɛŋ, ha̧ wa mɛ kum o be Juif, o be-ŋgaiwi gú nɛ̀ o sɔkawi, o obem in o okoo, kpɔk kale wese lɛŋ, sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Adar», in wen kaia o mbɔi kɔ-wa lɛŋ mbɛt.
Kalata'i tɛ duk nɛ́ heembea nɛ̀‘i tɛ tɔr ha̧ o bíí dam tɛ zika-nu-wan ko Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, wen ha̧ kóó o ndé mɛ ɗafi mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ wese'i.
Sɛn tɛ
Mardochee zia mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧k o laa tɛ yinɛ, pi̧ laa-bufu, a bùk zu, gɔm ye saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ bee-gara yaknɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ nú garo ko wannu fara nɛ̀ bíí nyɛm so mɛ ye sɛnɛ nɛ̀ laa-bufu tɛ̀ na.
Tɛ zika-nù lɛŋ, fara nɛ̀
O boko-be-tua in o kpàná ko Ɛstɛr baa wen'i nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Ko-wan zia wen'i, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ gbin, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o laa nɛnɛ ha̧ Mardochee mɛ a tɛ, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-bufu yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.
Ɛstɛr saa Hatak, kpɔk mgbara o kpàná nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧ wen dee tom ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom a̧ sitɛ Mardochee, mɛ ak gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka in mɔ nɛ̀ dea.
Hatak nɛɛ tɛ Mardochee bee-gara nú garo ko wannu.
Mardochee tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ sede nɛ̀ Haman tɛ̀ɛ́ a fara-a-mbɔi ko wannu oi kuma o be Juif.

A̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma kalata heembea nɛ̀ wa pɛsa dam saaye Suzɛ, wen kuma wa'i ha̧ a̧ mbɛt, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi ha̧ Ɛstɛr, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ mgbara-a ha̧ a̧, in ha̧ Ɛstɛr mɛ nɛ si katɛ wannu, mɛ ak deako kɔ̧-a̧, kɔfi nɛ̀ a̧ wen zu dukbíí kɔ‘i.
Hatak baa wen ko Mardochee nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr;
ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr e wen nú Hatak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee ndé:

«O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ iŋa nɛ̀ de-a'e, kóó o ndé, kóó nɛ́ wiwii, kóó nɛ́ okoo, nɛ̀ tɛ ye si tɛ wannu fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ à̧ á̧ saa wi’ɛi na, heembea zu wi’ɛi nɛ́ gbɛa a̧ gbɛɛ yinɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɛɛ kà wannu nɛ́ nyɛi̧a dɔ́rá-lɔr kɔ‘i sitɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa. Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ zɛ ɓu-taar kinii nɛ̀ wa sa'm si katɛ wannu na.»
Wa baa wen ko Ɛstɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee,
ɓɛɛ kifa-nú ko Mardochee ha̧ Ɛstɛr nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ká mɛ ta'e wen nɛ̀ mɛ́ a̧a̧ kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira-wan'i, nɛ́ mɛ́ kpɔk mgbara o be Juif a̧ tɛ kpasi ɓɛɛ na.

Kà mɛ̀ kpé yí-mɛ́ tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ de kinii’ɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpe nú-mɛ́, gbakamɔ tɛ tɛ nɛ ŋma fara mɛ kpasi o be Juif, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum lɛŋ; ŋma fara, nɛ́ wen kpasa yɛ a̧ mɛ yèé nɛnɛ fara-wan'i ndé, o'o iŋa o?»
Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr kifi nú ha̧ Mardochee:

«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔi̧ o be Juif sɛn Suzɛ'ɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím yì wen am zɛ nɛ wese, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ yì na zaŋ zɛ taar. Mi tɛ zim yì in o boko-be-tua kɔ‘m mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ̀ heembea a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, mi tɛ́ nɛ̀ kànà ti wannu; kà bó nɛ́ fio, ha̧‘m fe ɓɛɛ.»
Mardochee yaka, ɓɛɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i lɛŋ.
Ɗoŋ zɛ taar'i, Ɛstɛr aa laa ko ko-wan tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ gbo si bee-gara nɛ̀ duk mgbák nú fara-duk ko wannu. Wannu duka so zu damti kɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧́ tua-wan, zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ si nú tua mɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zɔka ko-wan Ɛstɛr fara yora-a zan, a̧ zɔka a̧ nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛi̧ dɔra-lɔr er-a'i sitɛ Ɛstɛr. Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ɗɔŋ siti, tam nú dɔra'i.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu aka a̧: «Nɛ́ ge á̧ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ge, ko-wan Ɛstɛr? Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧‘m. Kóó nɛ́ reeta mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m a̧ mɛ aka, mi tɛ ha̧ mɛ!»
Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i in Haman tɛ gbaŋa n'am ɗafa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu toma bíí mɛ sa Haman nɛ̀ haya-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr aka, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo mbɛt nɛ́ in ŋmaa tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ɗafa'i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa nɔ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗoŋ nyɔŋmɔ, wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr: «Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ ak'i, mɛ́ tɛ́ kpa. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧; kóó bòò só nɛ́ reeta mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m, mi tɛ ha̧ mɛ!»
Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Mɔ n'am kɔfi n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka'm nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kpɛka kɔfamɔ kɔ‘m mɛ ha̧ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ in Haman tɛ gbaŋa n'am tɛ de wen'nɛ́ mɛ mɔɔsa̧‘i. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ̀ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wese'i Haman gboo nɛ̀ desee; ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa zɔka nɛ̀ Mardochee fara duk nù nú tua-wan, nɛ̀ kɔ̧ mɛ kur ŋgɔn na, in nɛ̀ tu̧ géé tu̧u̧ tɛ-a na mbɛt, see-aa kura zu Mardochee.
Haman nyɔŋa kànà nin hegɔ, si nɛ̀ ɗoŋ sɛn tɛ̀ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o bíí nɛ́ɛ̀ sá o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ in Zɛrɛs kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɛnɛ!
A̧ wee ɗoŋ dɔka mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧, in dɔka o bem mbɛt, in mɔ nɛ̀ wannu dee e nɛ̀ a̧ siti tɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘i, e nɛ̀ a̧ zu o dɔka gasawi in oi o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Haman tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti: «Tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ko-wan dea, nɛ́ mí in wannu a̧ a̧ saa ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔsa̧'ɛ, kànà nɛ́ wannu in am a̧ a̧ tɛ sa woyo ɓɛɛ.
Mɔ kpɔk, ŋgimbi n'am zɔk Mardochee be Juif fara duka nú tua-wan, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ n'am kpaa'i lɛŋ de ŋma mɔ ha̧‘m na.»

Ɓɛɛ Zɛrɛs kóò kɔ̧-a̧ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «A'i ɗáfí te nɛ̀ kusa-a mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu ha'i mɛ ba Mardochee ga̧i̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ dé gbaŋa in wannu nɛ̀ desee.» Wen'i dee tɛ Haman, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi te'i.
Mɛ zɛ‘i, yá hɔ yí wannu na. A̧ aka ha̧ wa mɛ ba Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu tɛnɛ; ɓɛɛ wa tɔr ti wannu.
Wa kpaa yɔramɔ zu Mardochee nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen mɔ ko Bigtaŋ in Tɛrɛs, o kpàná-pɛm-nú tua ko wannu yiitoo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ wannu Zɛrzɛs.
Wannu aka mɔ: «Ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ̀ Mardochee dea'i, ge demɔ ge a̧ wa dee ha̧ a̧ ge? Nɛ́ ge zɔnamɔ ge a̧ a̧ kpaa oi-aa ge?»
Ɓɛɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ kifi nú: «A̧ kpa ŋma mɔ na.»
Wannu aka mɔ: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o a̧ a̧a̧ bee-gara mɛ‘i o?» Ŋgimbi'i, Haman hɔɔ so kɔ‘i bee-gara mɛ zan wen tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wannu mɛ ba Mardochee ga̧i̧ tɛ te nɛ̀ wa ɗafa so wen a̧‘i,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-tom ko wannu kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ Haman a̧ a̧a̧ bee-gara. Haman a̧a̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ pɛm nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɔk'nɛ́.» Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧: «A̧ a̧ yé mɔ!»
Aman yee mɔ, ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ ge a̧‘i tɛ de ha̧ bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn ge?»
Taamɔ ko Haman'e, nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ wannu tɛ zɔn yak zu wi ge?
Ɓɛɛ Haman kifi nú: «Wi nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn,
wi tɛ ba nɛ́ laa-wan nɛ̀ wannu pi̧i̧ so tɛ kaɗi'i, in nyaŋa nɛ̀ wannu daŋ nɛ̀ wa baa kara-mɔɔ-wan gu zu a̧.

Wi tɛ ba laa, in nyaŋa'i e er ŋma gasawi ko wannu, ɓɛɛ wi pi̧i̧ laa'i tɛ wi nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn'i. A̧ tɛ daŋ nyaŋa'i, ɓɛɛ wi mgbɔɔ a̧ yar nɛnɛ ɓir nɛ o gasa yuwar saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ti a̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘i de nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn!› »

Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ Haman: «Mɛ̀ bá laa in nyaŋa tɛnɛ nɛ̀ haya-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, á̧ mɛ̀ dé hegɔ ha̧ Mardochee, be Juif nɛ̀ duk nù nú tua-wan'i; ká mɛ́ er ŋma mɔ kpɔk sɛn tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘i na.»
