Haman baa laa in nyaŋa, ɓɛɛ pi̧ laa'i tɛ Mardochee, ba a̧ e zu nyaŋa, mgbɔ a̧ yar nɛnɛ, ɓir nɛ̀ o gasa yuwar saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ti a̧: «Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘i dé nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn!»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Mardochee sii ɗoŋ si nú tua-wan, ɓɛɛ Haman kpan kɔ‘i nɔ̀ si tɛ̀ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ zuma zu nɛ̀ foe.

Haman wee ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ Zɛrɛs kóò kɔ‘i in ha̧ o sɛm kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɔ‘i in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà Mardochee nɛ̀ mɛ́ ku̧u̧naŋ tika-a ti a̧‘i nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ be Juif, ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ de in a̧ kpɔk bo ɓɔna. Takaɗi, mɛ tɛ tik nù ti a̧.»
Wa ɓɔna so fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in Haman, ɓɛɛ o kpàná ko wannu hɔ, mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ɗafa.
Wannu in Haman nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ gbaŋa ko kó-wan Ɛstɛr

war yiitoo-aa, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa nɔ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗoŋ nyɔŋmɔ, wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr woyo: «Ko-wan Ɛstɛr, mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ ak'i, mɛ tɛ kpa. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧; kóó bòò só nɛ́ reeta mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m, mí tɛ́ ha̧ mɛ.»
Ko-wan Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Wannu, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka'm nɛ̀ de yí, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am in dukbíí kɔ‘m. Mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.

Wa ɗɔra yɛ ha̧ fio, mi in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn ger yɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ kum yɛ yinɛ. Wa á̧ kaia so nɛ́ yɛ ɗɔr hee bara ga bɛɛ, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ duk nɛ oi nú‘m, bó nɛ́ mɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ de so ha̧‘m mɛ ndekeli so ɛnɛ na.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu Zɛrzɛs ak ko-wan Ɛstɛr: «Wi nɛ̀ ta mɛ de pɛrti mɔ‘i nɛ́ o? Wi’ɛi a̧a̧ de?»
Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Wisɛn k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ de bɔnɛ in yɛɛ‘i nɛ́ Haman, ɗaŋ wi’ɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ see yiitoo nɛ̀ duk’ɛ!» Zɔm kíì baa Haman ti wannu in ko-wan.
Wannu ee gbaŋa duk, ɓɛɛ gbo yak nɛ̀ tu̧u̧-see si bee-gara tua-wan kɔ‘i. Haman ɓɔna kɔ‘i fara aia nú ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpasi, wen a̧ iŋa'e taamɔ ko wannu zu wi nɛ́ fio kɔ‘i ɓɛɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ bee-gara tua-wan kɔ‘i pii fara gbaŋa, a̧ zɔka Haman tika zu gado nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr duk sɛnɛ‘i. Soɓee ká wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧: «Mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɔ in ko-wan sɛn fara kɔ‘m ɓɔ?»
Tɔ̧a̧-a̧ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ, ɓɛɛ ká wa bàà so Haman hɛr yí-a kaɗi.

Ɓɛɛ Harbona, ŋma kpàná tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ɓɛɛ a zer wannu: «Haman nɛ̀ tɛ-wi ɗafa so te mɛ ga̧i̧ Mardochee, wi nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen kpasi nɛ̀ wannu. Te'i duk nú tua ko Haman, ɓɛɛ kusa-a nɛ́ mɛɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá Haman gá̧í̧ sɛnɛ!»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa baa Haman ga̧i̧ tɛ te n'aa ɗafa so wen Mardochee'i, ɓɛɛ see wannu ga̧.
Kale kpɔk wese'i, wannu Zɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ o mɔ ko Haman wi-kur-zu o Juif ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ wannu sa Mardochee, wen Ɛstɛr ɓaa so mgbara nàm kɔ‘i in Mardochee ha̧ a̧.
Wannu kpɔ̧i̧a̧ wele n'aa ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Haman, ɓɛɛ ba ha̧ Mardochee; ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ba kɔ‘i nɛ́ Mardochee e zu o mɔ ko Haman.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Ɛstɛr nɛ̀ɛ̀ ti wannu mɛ tɔ̧ wen in a̧ woyo. A̧ tika nù ti wannu, hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧, ai nɛ̀ nú ha̧ a̧ mɛ dor ɗaŋ ee-zu-mɔ ko Haman bezaŋ Agag nɛ̀ ee so mɛ de in o be Juif.
Wannu nyɛi̧a dɔra-lɔr kɔ‘i sitɛ Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr kur yor ti a̧.

Ɛstɛr tɔ̧a̧: «K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka'm nɛ̀ de yí, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka'e mɔ n'am tɛ kɔfi'i dee tɛ‘nɛ́, in kà‘m nɛ́ dee yí‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ wen dora o kalata nɛ̀ Haman, bem ko Hamdata bezaŋ Agag yɔra so, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ kum o Juif dam o zika-nù ko wannu lɛŋ.
Héé ge a̧‘m tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ ko dukbíí kɔ‘m ge? Héé ge wa tɛ kum o nàm kɔ‘m nɛ̀ yí‘m ge?»
Wannu Zɛrzɛs kifa nú ha̧ Ɛstɛr, ko-wan, in Mardochee, be Juif: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì, wa ga̧i̧a Haman tɛ te wen n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ kum o be Juif, ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ ha̧ Ɛstɛr.
Ɓɛɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de kinii'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ ha̧ o be Juif hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga nɛ̀ nin wannu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é dap-wele ko wannu sɛnɛ nɛ̀

Tɛ̀ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i, wa saa wi-yɔr-mɔ ko wannu tɛnɛ. Duka nɛ́ tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko taar fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Sivan». Wa yɔra mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Mardochee ha̧ o be Juif, ha̧ be-wan, ha̧ o gasawi in ha̧ o wi-duk-zu o zika-nù gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ko wannu nɛ̀ duk mgbara nù Indɛ in Etiopii. Wa yɔra mɔ ha̧ zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar yɔramɔ kɔ-wa in ha̧ dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa, in ha̧ o Juif nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa in yuwar yɔramɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Wa yɔra mɔ nɛ̀ nin wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e dap wele kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀

Gba̧a̧ wen kalata nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o Juif sɛn gasa ye kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ mɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa ya kpɔk wen pɛma mɔ. Wa tɛ gbɛ o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ tik wa, kum wa, gú nɛ̀ o kóò in o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o Juif mɛ kai o mɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Mɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ de tɛ kpɔk wese, dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e ‹Adar›.
Kalata'i tɛ duk nɛ́ geŋa nɛ̀‘i tɛ tɔr ha̧ o bíí tɛ zika-nu-wan ko Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, ha̧ o Juif mɛ ɗafi mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ wese'i wen kifa er ha̧ o wisɛn wa.»
Sɛn tɛ
Mardochee gboo nɛ̀ tɛ̀ ko wannu nɛ̀ tu̧ laa-wan in bu-a, nɛ̀ ŋma gbɛ̧ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa zu a̧, in nɛ̀ mɔɔ-gu-zu ko wannu nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr mbɛt. Saaye Suzɛ lɛŋ duka tɛ nyɛŋɛ.
Ŋgimbi'i duka nɛ́ ŋgimbi desee, tortɛ, nyɛŋɛ in gasamɔ wen o Juif.

Wa yaa nɛ̀ desee, nɛ̀ tortɛ de nɛ̀ gbaŋa, yɔ nɛ̀ yɔyɛ dam o zika-nù in o saaye kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ fara nɛ̀ wa tɔra geŋa ko wannu sɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a tɛ nù‘i bá tɛ̀ nɛ̀ Juif, wen mɔ ko o Juif pi̧i̧ so kíì tɛ wa nyɛmna.

Sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Adar», ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ̀ɛ́ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ geŋa in heembea ko wannu, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wisɛn ko o Juif taa so'e, wi tɛ̀ɛ́ gan wa wó‘i, wa zɔka'e mɔ kpaia, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o Juif a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kúr zu o wi nɛ̀ sɛna so wa.
O Juif mɔi̧a ŋmaa kpa sɛn o saaye kɔ-wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, wen kuma o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in wa. Ŋma bíí yor ti wa na, wen o bíí yuu so wa nyɛmna.
O gasa wi-duk-zu o zika-nù lɛŋ, o be-wan, o wi-ya katɛ wannu in o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ yora so ɗoŋ o be Juif wen kíí Mardochee.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, Mardochee a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ ŋgai kɔ̧́ tua ko wannu, ɓɛɛ nin-a hura so dam tɛ o zika-nù lɛŋ. A̧ duka so nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ daŋa siti siti.
O Juif gɔma o wisɛn kɔ-wa nɛ̀ gba-paa, gbɛ wa, kum wa lɛŋ a nù. Wa dee mɔ in o wi nɛ̀ sɛna so wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kɔ̧a̧ ga.
Sɛn ŋgárá ye Suzɛ, o Juif gbɛɛ o wiwii gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ.
Wa gbɛɛ Parsandat, Dalfɔn, Aspatat;
Pɔrata, Adalia, Aridata;
Parmasta, Arizai, Aridai ká bá nɛ̀ Waizata mbɛt.
O wi nɔ‘i ɓu'i nɛ́ o bem ko Haman, bem ko Hamdata, nɛ̀ sɛn so o be Juif. Mɔ kpɔk, o Juif kai mɔɔ-oi-wa na.
Kale kpɔk wese'i, wannu zia nyɛrɛ dɔka bíí nɛ̀ wa gbɛɛ sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ.

Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr: «Kà o Juif nɛ́ gbɛɛ o wiwii gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ, gú nɛ̀ o bem ko Haman ɓu hegɔ, ɓɛɛ ko o wan mɛ ɗoŋ o zika-nù lɛŋ, wi tɛ ak nɛ́ ge? Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mbe mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧; mí tɛ́ ha̧ mɛ. Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ tɛ ak, mɛ́ tɛ́ kpa.»
Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Wannu, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, mɔɔsa̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ yuwar ha̧ o Juif mɛ saaye Suzɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ mɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ kpɔk geŋa mɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i woyo, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ gá̧í̧ wɔr o bem ko Haman ɓu tɛ te mbɛt.»
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ'ɔ dé hegɔ.» Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔra geŋa'i dam saaye Suzɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ga̧i̧ wɔr o bem ko Haman ɓu lɛŋ tɛ te.
O be Juif sɛn Suzɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa woyo tɛ ɓu-zua-naar zɛ ko «Adar», ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ o wiwii gɔmŋmaa-taar sɛn saaye Suzɛ; mɔ kpɔk, wa kai mɔɔ-oi-wa na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o oi Juif mɛ wan nɛ̀ yaa so dam o zika-nù ko wannu, mɔi̧a ŋmaa ya kpɔk wen pɛma mɔ; wa kuma o wi-sɛn-wa booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔm. Mɔ kpɔk, wa kai mɔɔ-oi-wa na.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i dee sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-taar zɛ ko «Adar»; tɛ zɛ ɓu-zua-naar-a, o Juif ɔma tɛ, ɓɛɛ wa de wese'i nɛ̀ wese gbaŋa in wese desee.
O be Juif mɛ saaye Suzɛ nɛ̀ mɔi̧a so ŋmaa tɛ ɓu-zua-taar in ɓu-zua-naar zɛ ko «Adar» ɔma tɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ zɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa de wese'i nɛ̀ wese gbaŋa in wese desee.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa o be Juif mɛ ɗoŋ o be ye ba ɓu-zua-naar zɛ ko «Adar» e nɛ̀ wese gbaŋa, de nɛ̀ yɔyɛ, tom nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa.
Mardochee yɔra nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o kalata ha̧ o Juif dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, ha̧ o wan nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ na, in o wan nɛ̀ ɔ nyɛi̧a mbɛt.
A̧ yɔra mɔ‘i ha̧ wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ de gbaŋa dam ɗoŋ ɓu-zua-naar in ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ zɛ ko «Adar», tɛ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk yaknɛ,

wen wese nɔ‘i nɛ́ wese nɛ̀ o Juif ɔma nɛnɛ tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ-wa dee so in wa. Nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i à̧ duka-a kɔ-wa kpaia nɛnɛ: bɔnɛ kɔ-wa kpaia nɛ̀ desee, hi̧a̧-fio kpaia nɛ̀ tortɛ. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ e o wese nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wese gbaŋa in wese desee, tom nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa, ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o wisan mbɛt.
O be Juif kpɛka mɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee yɔra, ɓɛɛ ba mɔ nɛ̀ wa dee so war kpɔk'i e tɛ yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa siti.
Wee-ɗoŋ-mɔ ko Mardochee ha̧ wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Haman bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag, wi-kur-zu o be Juif ee so nú mɛ kum wa; a̧ pi̧i̧ tani nɛ̀‘i sa'e Purim kii nɛ̀ yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ wa, kum nɛ̀ wa gbuɗuk yinɛ;
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr nɛ̀ɛ̀ ti wannu ga, wannu ha̧a̧ nú nɛ̀ yɔramɔ ha̧ wa mɛ fo ɗaŋ taamɔ ko Haman zu o be Juif pi̧ zu a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a woyo, in ha̧ wa mɛ ga̧i̧ a̧ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ te.

Nɛ́ wen hegɔ sa wa sa wese'i'e «Purim», mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧, «tani». O Juif baa o wese nɔ‘i yiitoo'i mɛ kasi siti pɛ nɛ pɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, tɛ ŋgimbi-a, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra. Wa tɛ de hegɔ, gú nɛ̀ o bezaŋ-wa, in o bíí nɛ̀ ndaɗa in wa mbɛt, zu mɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee yɔra so ha̧ wa, in zu mɔ nɛ̀ wa zɔka in mɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ so zu wa mbɛt.

Tɛ-wi tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wese nɔ‘i de nɛ̀ gbaŋa-a nɛnɛ, hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ, nɛ̀ nutua kpɔk kpɔk, tɛ zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk in gasa ye kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt. Tɛ o be Juif beka bi ɗoŋ wese Purim na, ɓɛɛ gbaŋa-a beka kaɗi tɛ pɛ́r-nàm ko o be Juif na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ko-wan Ɛstɛr, boko-bem ko Abihayil, in Mardochee be Juif yɔra mɔ nɛ̀ haya-a woyo, wen yora ɗoŋ kalata «Purim» nɛ̀ Mardochee yɔra so ha̧ o be Juif,
ɓɛɛ wa tom ha̧ o be Juif dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo: duka nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ in mboozu.

Kalata'i mbaŋa tɛ o be Juif wen dee gbaŋa Purim tɛ ŋgimbi-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee be Juif in ko-wan Ɛstɛr yɔra so ha̧ wa. Ee-zu-mɔ‘i duka nɛ́ wen wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa in o bezaŋ-wa, hee mɔ ko zima yì in aia-nú ga.
Ɛstɛr yora ɗoŋ geŋa nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o be Juif wen gbaŋa «Purim»; wa yɔra mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata.
Wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔna ŋma garama ha̧ bíí zu nù kɔ̧-a̧, in o bíí see-kisi.
O ŋgayamɔ in o gasamɔ n'aa dee lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ báá Mardochee n'aa baa e nɛ̀ gasawi, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ.

Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, Mardochee be Juif duka so kànà nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ hɔɔ ɗoŋ wannu Zɛrzɛs. A̧ duka nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ o be Juif zɔna so in nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna, wen a̧ kia so nɛ́ yuwar de duka-a ko dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, ye nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa ha̧ wa mɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Ŋma bíí duka so sɛn nù Us, nin-a nɛ Job. A̧ nɛ de bíí in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt. A̧ nɛ wi-yu-kíí Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kɔ‘i nyɛi̧ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
A̧ koo bem, be-wiwii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in be-okoo taar.
A̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ sami booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ŋgeloba booro-taar, ndai-de-tom booro, nana tuifuu gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ in o wi-de-tom nɛ dɔka-a. A̧ nɛ wi nɛ kpaa mɔ gan o bíí mɛ si daŋa-wese lɛŋ.
O bem kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nɛ́ tɛ ko o ŋmaa, de nɛ be gbaŋa, ɓɛɛ toma sa o boko nya-wa taar mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ in wa mbɛt.
Kà wa dé yɔyɛ dam wa lɛŋ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ Job saa o bem kɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ a̧ mɛ
Ŋma wese, o betom
GASA WAN aka a̧: «Mɛ tɛ nɛ déè?» Wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi kifa nú: «Mi yara so zɔk nɛ nù nɛnɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN aka a̧ woyo: «Mɛ zɔka wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Job nde? Ŋma bíí hee a̧ ga zu nù bo na. A̧ nɛ́ de bíí in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧, in nɛ duk kɔ‘i nyɛi̧ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.»
Wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi kifa nú ha̧ GASA WAN: «Job yu so kíí GASA WAN géè nde?
Bó nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ dee kira ɓor nɛ ɗoŋ tua kɔ̧-a̧ in o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ na nde? O mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa dee lɛŋ, ɛnɛ toka de yoŋgo zu a̧, ɓɛɛ o mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ to nɛnɛ hukɛ-hukɛ.
Mi ee mɔ: ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ; kà a̧ nɛ́ foma'nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ mi a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i na!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi zia. O mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-mɛ; mɔ kpɔk, ká mɛ́ tam gee tama tɛ-a na.» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi kura ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ yak.
Ŋma wese, o bem ko Job mɛ wiwii-a in be okoo-a nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ tɛ ko zɔmwi kɔ-wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma betom tɛa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Job: «O ndai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ya wa nɛ fɔ, ɓɛɛ o nana tuifuu nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ katɛ wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Sabee hɔa, ɓar wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kum o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt. Wi nɛ gboo mgbara wa kpɔk, nɛ́ mi n'am tɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.»

Wi’ɛi biti fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ ŋma mbe bíí tɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Job woyo: «Wee ko Sɔ̧ hɔ̧fa̧ nɛ yiwese, tik zu o sami in o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, dɔ wa gbɛ. Wi nɛ gboo mgbara wa kpɔk, nɛ́ mi n'am tɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.»

Nú wi’ɛi tɛ zɔm tɛ wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ ŋma mbe bíí gɔm ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «O be Kaldee kɛ̧a̧ tɛ́ fara taar tik zu o ŋgeloba k’ɛ́nɛ́, kai wa yaknɛ. Wa kuma o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ mbɛt; wi nɛ gboo mgbara wa kpɔk, nɛ́ mi n'am tɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.»
A̧ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ mbe bíí hɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «O bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔi̧a ya nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ tɛ ko zɔmwi kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ hara-búk yu nɛ ŋga-gbárà mɛ tɛnɛ gbin tua a zu wa; wa fea lɛŋ, wi nɛ gboo mgbara wa kpɔk, nɛ́ mi n'am tɛɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Job kur ŋgɔn, a̧k gba laa tɛ a nù, kpui zu lɛŋ, hɔ̧fi̧ tik nù, ba yi gu nù,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi gboo nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m nɛ mgbii, mi tɛ si kànà ɗoŋ nɛ mgbii mbɛt. Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN baa ha̧ so, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ siɗoŋ; bíí lɛŋ a̧ zɔn nin GASA WAN.»
Tɛ mɔ‘i lɛŋ, Job de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na, a̧ tɔ̧ ŋma ɗaŋ wen zu Sɔ̧ na.
Ŋma wese, o betom ko GASA WAN tɛɛ tɛ a̧ mɛ we ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa ha̧ a̧ woyo, ɓɛɛ wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi tɛ kana in wa mbɛt.
GASA WAN aka a̧: «Mɛ tɛ nɛ déè nde?»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú: «Mi yara so zɔk nɛ nù nɛnɛ.»

Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN ak a̧‘e: «Mɛ zɔka wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Job nde? Ŋma bíí hee a̧ ga zu nù bo na. A̧ nɛ de bíí in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧ in nɛ duk kɔ‘i nyɛi̧ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ. Mɛ kia war ha̧‘m mɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik sɔɔ géè; kóó hegɔ mbɛt, a̧ yora nɛ nɔa-a nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen zu a̧ na.»
Ɓɛɛ wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi kifi nú ha̧ GASA WAN: «Nɛ́ kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧
Mi ee mɔ: kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó mur tɛ-a in o gba̧a̧ tɛ-a; kà a̧ nɛ́ foma'nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ mi a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i na!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi: «Mi zia. A̧ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-mɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, ká mɛ́ fo
Wi-ɓir-wen e nú-wi kura ti GASA WAN yak ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ pi̧ ŋma ɗaŋ zɛɛ-tara tɛ Job nɛ de nɛ da̧i̧ nɛ kɔ naŋ-a hɔ zu-a.
Ɓɛɛ Job ba gbàrà-kpánà kpor nɛ tɛ; fara duk kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ zuku-paa.
Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ndé: «Mɛ tɛ ɓɔn kànà tɛ ee ta nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘i siti nde? Mɛ̀ fóm Sɔ̧‘i, a̧ mɛ̀ fé yinɛ ɓaɗi!»
Job kifa nú ha̧ kóò: «Mɛ́ tɔ̧ wen hee wi-dawa ga! K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ kpɛka demɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ wen ge, ɛ́ɛ́ beka kpɛk bɔnɛ na ge?» Tɛ́ bɔnɛ nɛ Job zɔk'i, a̧ tɔ̧ ŋma ɗaŋ wen zu Sɔ̧ na.
O sɛm ko Job taar zia nyɛrɛ bɔnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Elifaz be Teman, Bildad be Sua, in Sofar be Naama. Wa ee nú ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ ai nú in a̧ in ha̧a̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.
Tɛ zɔka Job nɛ wa zɔka nɛ nyɛi̧a-a, wa yɔɔ yí-a. Wa lɛŋ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ ŋgaya-a, wa a̧ka̧ gba laa kɔ-wa tɛ-wa a nù, wa aa fuunu si yiwese ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ a zu-wa.
Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ ya nù katɛ a, wa kur na tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara wa hu̧i̧ nú tɔ̧ wen sitɛ Job na, wen bɔnɛ ko Job nɛ wa zɔka bó nɛ́ mɔ ha̧ nú-wi mɛ tɔ̧ na.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job hu̧i̧a̧ nú, fom wese nɛ wa kòó nɛ̀ wi,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Fom a̧ ba wese nɛ wa koo nɛ‘m,
in zɛ nɛ naa kɔ‘m baa nɛ zaŋ-am!
Wese'i a̧ ba tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧!
Tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ‘i
a̧ bi ɗoŋ wese'i ɓɔn ndo-ndo-ndo;
ká sa̧a̧mɔ nyɛk wese'i na.
Gasa tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ in gi̧ɔ̧ a̧ kpe zu wese'i,
o tu̧-zan a̧ kpe zu a liŋgɔm;
zɛ a̧ gur wese'i nɛ ɗaŋ-a!
Zɛ‘i a̧ ba tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧;
ká‘i tɔr a zaŋ o dɔka zɛ
zaŋ fio-zɛ kóó tɛ pɛ na mbɛt.
Zɛ‘i a̧ duk nɛ ɗaŋ zɛ,
ká mɔɔ-nyɛŋɛ bo tɛ zɛ‘i na!
O wi-fom-wese nɛ sa ndiɓa
a̧ fom zɛ‘i.
Tɛ zɛ‘i, o sɔra-tuyɛ a̧ ba tum;
ká zɛ‘i e ta'e sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ nyɛk na,
ká a̧ ta'e ndaa-zan tɛ gɔn na,
wen n'aa kpe so nú tua nɛ wa kòó nɛ̀‘m na.
Kà a̧ dé so hegɔ,
bó nɛ́ mi tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk so bɔnɛ'ɛ na.
Gana so a̧‘m fe so ɓɔn kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m,
kóó a̧‘m fe so ɓɔn ti pɛr.
Duka-a gɔn ku bíí dee nɛ ge ha̧‘m ge?
Ama-bere dee nɛ ge ha̧‘m ge?
Kà‘m fé so fee gáà,
mana mi tɛɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsi mɛ;
tɛ fea-a'i, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ ɔ ya, ɔm nɛ tɛ
in o wannu ba nɛ o gasawi zu nù'ɛ
nɛ mboo so o mɔ nɛ ɗàŋá e ŋgɔn woyo;
kóó in o be-wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ lɔr
in mbɔi nɛ duna tua kɔ-wa.
Kà‘m hɔ́ so hɔɔ gaa,
bó nɛ́ wi tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ so oi-am na,
hee o obem nɛ zɔk wese na si nɛ ɗoŋ'ɛ ga.
Ɗaŋ ko o wi-ɗaŋ kaɗi fara'i;
nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ o wi nɛ ŋgai kaɗa ɔm tɛ sɛnɛ.
O wi-zɔɓɔ ya mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ desee hi̧i̧,
wa zii tuɓa da̧ ko o wi-pɛm-wa ɓɔna;
o bara bo ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko dáa-bara kɔ-wa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ wi’ɛ nɛ́ gasawi,
kóó, i̧i̧ wi’ɛi nɛ́ obem wó, bó fara'i na.
Sɔ̧ ha̧ sa̧a̧mɔ ha̧ o wi-kɔsa de nɛ ge?
A̧ de ha̧ wan-ɗaŋ-see mɛ duk kpasa wen ge?
Wa pɛm fio takaɗi, fio ba wa na;
wa kia fio gan mbɔi.
Wa a̧ bo so kɔ̧ pɛsi fio gáà,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ ya nɛ desee, de nɛ tortɛ.
Wi ha̧ duka-kpasa ha̧ bíí nɛ iŋ yuwar kɔ‘i na de nɛ ge?
Nɛ́ wi’ɛi a̧ Sɔ̧ ɓora so mɔ pɛm nɛnɛ!
Mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ‘m nɛ́ taŋa-kɔ̧a̧;
hiɗimɔ-bɔnɛ kɔ‘m gɔn na hee yì nɛ fok’ɛ ga.
O mɔ n'am dee so kíí-a kpaa'm kaɗi,
mɔ n'am yuu so tika zu'm kaɗi.
Kɔ‘m, ga̧a̧mɔ, duka-a keɗeŋ in ɔma-tɛ bo na,
kànà nɛ́ dita see ɓɛɛ.
Elifaz be Teman baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Géé wéé mɛ́
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ tika kaɗi’ɛ!
Kà‘i tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ mɛ, mɛ tɛ kpɛk?
Ɓɛɛ wi tɛ duk nɛ oi nú-wi hee ge?
Mɛ duka nɛ wi-usi-mɔ ha̧ o bíí,
mɛ duka so nɛ wi-ha̧-ŋgai ha̧ o bíí nɛ kpa ŋgai na.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ-mɛ duka so ba o bíí nɛ yo nù e ŋgɔn,
ha̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧ o wi nɛ zugur mɔk.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ war kɔ-mɛ hɔɔ zu mɛ ga,
mɛ́ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi ɓɔna;
mɔ kpaa mɛ, ɓɛɛ kíì ba nɛ mɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ mboo so zu ha̧ Sɔ̧ ga,
in hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee so mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga,
bó nɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ ŋgiɗi e nɛ ta nɛ Sɔ̧ na nde?
Mɛ̀ íŋ ndé,
nɛ́ ge bíí ge nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen zu a na
a̧ nyɛma mɛ fe ge?
Nɛ́ ge wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ge a̧ nyɛma mɛ yɔ ge?
Mɔ n'am iŋa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
o wi-wa-fɔ-ɗaŋmɔ
in o wi-pɛ-kpar-bɔnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ kànà nyɔnɔ-a.
Géé búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú Sɔ̧
nɛ yu a tɛ wa géè, ɓɛɛ wa fea,
in géé ɔma-a nɛ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ sitɛ wa géè mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa kuma.
Dila hiɗi mɔ gbo ɓɔna,
o nin bao-dila gbina.
Dila fee wɔ,
ɓɛɛ o be dila pɛsi sót-sót.
Ŋma wen yee zer-am nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧,
zer-am kɔɓa ŋma ku̧i̧amɔ.
Mɛ zɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ɔ nɛ zu,
ŋgimbi nɛ ya ba nɛ o bíí,
ŋma gasa kíì baa'm,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m lɛŋ nak.
Ŋma búk yuu a yí‘m,
ɓɛɛ o buma tɛ‘m lɛŋ kur.
Wi’ɛi hɔɔ yor, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ ti a na;
a̧ ɓɔna kànà fara yora-a yí‘m.
Mɔ duka selele, ɓɛɛ ŋma tiger tɔ̧:
«Bíí nɛ̀ ɔm ɔm nyɛma mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gan Sɔ̧ nde?
Bíí nyɛma mɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧ a̧ gan wi nɛ dee a̧ nde?
O wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ e nɛ ta na,
o betom kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa zɔk de mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ na mbɛt’ɛ,
kà bó nɛ̀ géé bíí n'aa dee nɛ nù,
nɛ mur tɛ-wa nɛ fuunu sɔɔ géè,
nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ mbɔli hee géé kokoɗo mɔ ga’ɛ nde!
Kuma-a kɔ-wa nɛ́ gɔma-yí,
ɓɛɛ wa yambala, wi iŋ oi wa ɓɔna.
Bó nɛ́ wi daka te-tɔn-tua kɔ-wa yinɛ na nde?
Wa fea, wa iŋ mgbara mɔ na.»
Kà mɛ sá mɔ, bíí tɛ́ kifi nú ha̧ mɛ?
Nɛ́ o mgbara o sa̧a̧ betom a̧ mɛ tɛ ak o?
Wi-bɔkɔ fe nɛ fio ŋga see,
ɓɛɛ aa-see-mɔ gbɛɛ mgbelewi.
Mi zɔka so ŋma mgbelewi baa fara nɛ dea,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m mi fom fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ŋma wi-gbak o bem kɔ̧-a̧ à̧ ká bò na,
bíí à̧ núkúrí wa fara-kita,
nɛ̀ ŋma wi-yor-ɗoŋ wa beka bo na.
O ŋma bíí a̧ nyɔŋ nyɔnɔ n'aa mɔi̧,
kóó nɛ̀ oi ŋgárá-tɛn n'aa dee zik ɗoŋ-aa'i;
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-wɔ-mɔ a̧ kai o mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧.»
Bó nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ gbo nɛ tɛ nù na,
in bɔnɛ hɔ tɛ fuunu géè na mbɛt;
wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ bíí a̧ de ha̧ bɔnɛ mɛ́ hɔ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ fú̧ú̧-wee
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ ak nɛ Sɔ̧
ha̧‘m mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ‘m ha̧ a̧.
A̧ nɛ wan-de-gasamɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa-a na,
in mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ a zu nù lɛŋ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tom kórò a kpɛɛfɔ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ ya si ɗɔɔ mɛ ya nɛ ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ o wi-hi̧i̧-fio mɛ ya nɛ desee.
A̧ ɗaŋ nɛ ee-zu-mɔ ko o wi nɛ e nú mɛ de ŋgamɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm mɛ de ŋma mɔ ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ
mɛ tik lim kɔ-wa nɛ wa hura,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ o ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa mɛ yambali.
Kóó nɛ̀ bu wese mbɛt yuwar kɔ-wa ba nɛ tum,
mɛ bu wese kerere wa tam nɛ tum.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasi o ɓɔsa-wi er-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gboo o wi-kɔsa yinɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Ziɓa-wi kpaa mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta;
o ɗaŋwi kpa nú-tɔ̧-wen ɓɔna.
Wi nɛ Sɔ̧ gai a̧ duk nɛ desee.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Job, ká mɛ e tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ
ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ geemɔ na.
Wen kà GASA WAN e da̧i̧ tɛ bíí ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ hɛr da̧i̧‘i̧,
kà a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wi’ɛi mbɛt.
A̧ tɛ kpasi mɛ tɛ dita see war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa, ɗaŋmɔ beka kpa mɛ na.
A̧ tɛ kpasi mɛ tɛ fio ŋgimbi kaɓa,
a̧ tɛ kpasi mɛ nú gba-paa ŋgimbi biro.
Ŋgimbi nɛ bíí tɛ ɓir wen e nú mɛ, a̧ tɛ pɛm mɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgamɔ be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ, kíì beka de mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ mam ŋgamɔ in kaɓa,
ɓɛɛ kíí ɗaŋ saɗi zaŋnu beka de mɛ na.
O ŋga saɗi beka ɗaŋ mɔ kɔ-mɛ na,
o sɔkɔr-ta beka bo kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-mɛ na
wen
Ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ;
tɛ yara-a zɔk nɛ o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ tɛ kpa'e mɔ lɛŋ duk nɛ dea.
O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ dɔk dun nù,
wa tɛ dɔk hee zɔ̧ sɛn zaŋbɛɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ sɔk kaɗi sɛka mɛ yee kɔ̧ fio,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyɔnɔ sɔk kaɗi sɛka'i mɔi̧a’ɛ ga.
Mɔ‘i nɛ́ kpasawen n’ɛɛ kia mɔ sɛnɛ;
mɛ̀ zíí wen'i bá zer-mɛ.
Job kifa nú ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Kà bo so ha'i mɛ we dita see kɔ‘m,
in kà bo so ha'i mɛ we bɔnɛ kɔ‘m,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ diti gan o nyɛmɛ ɗɔɔ o gba-tɔp lɛŋ;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i sa'm iŋ zu wen n'am tɔ̧ na.
O góò ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ pi̧a'm,
ɓɛɛ mi ɔm nɛ ma̧a̧da̧-a̧;
o mɔɔ-kíì ko Sɔ̧ kɛra'm e see-a.
Tuifuu zaŋbɛɛ tɛ hiɗi mɔ
kà a̧ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ mbɔɗi zɔ̧ mɛ nyɔŋ nde?
Ndai nyɛma so mɛ dɔm kà a̧ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ zɔ̧ mɛ nyɔŋ nde?
Wi nyɛma mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ tɔŋ bó sɛnɛ na pulem nde?
Pulem wa̧a̧-kpoo ɔ so nyɔ̧ɔ̧ ɔɔ nde?
Mi ɔ̧i̧ nɛ wa a nù,
wa nɛ o ŋma ɗaŋ nyɔŋmɔ.
Ho! Wora Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m a̧ kpa yí-a na nde!
Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ kifi nú ha̧‘m tɛ mɔ n'am pɛm na nde!
Ha̧‘m zɔk ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ baa'm yinɛ géè na nde!
A̧ a̧ nyɛi̧ er-a ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ gbɛ‘m yinɛ na nde!
Hegɔ, see-am tɛ̀ɛ́ ga̧,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpíɗí yɔyɛ nɛ oi zɔm bɔnɛ n'am duk sɛnɛ'ɛ
wen n'am gbin heembea ko Sa̧a̧ Wi na fe nɛnɛ.
Mi a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧‘m mɛ e ta'm nɛ ŋma mɔ nde?
Sɔŋkur mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ́ ge sa'm tɛ ɓɔn nɛ yí siti ge?
Mi ŋgaia so hee ta ga?
Mur tɛ‘m so nɛ ndɛrɛ nde?
Gbaka mɔ n'am pɛm’ɛ nɛ geemɔ nde?
Mɔ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak so'm lɛŋ, yaka er-am.
Kà mɛ bɛ̧́ dee ko ha̧ sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɛ bɔnɛ tika zu a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ e yuu kíí Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ duk.
O nya'm ɔra'm hee zér-ɗiŋgi ga,
wa ɔra'm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ be-zer ɔ̧si̧ nɛnɛ e lembe zan’ɛ ga.
Mɛ ɗuka zaŋ ɓar,
wa mbɛra mbayaŋga;
ɓɛɛ kà tiger bɛɛ hɔ́, wa ku̧u̧ naŋ ɔ̧sa̧-a̧,
kà bɛɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ wii, wa ɔ̧sa̧ ndaɗi kpaa-kpaa.
O wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ zɔk zu-zer-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ra̧ si sɛnɛ;
wa ye ŋga gbárà, ɓɛɛ wa yɔɔ mɔ ɓɔn.
O wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ Tema e yí si sɛnɛ,
o wi-ba-gbárà mɛ Saba e ta nɛnɛ.
Kà wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ tɛ zer'i, wa kpa yì na,
ɓɛɛ foe baa wa wen wa ee so ta'e, wi tɛ kpa yì hi̧i̧.
Duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ in am kinii nɛ́ mɔ‘i;
ɛnɛ zɔka bɔnɛ n'am duk sɛnɛ‘i ɓɛɛ bele zar'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ zɔka mi aka'nɛ́ mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧‘m nde?
Mi aka'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáŋ mbɔi k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen zu'm nde?
Mi tɔ̧‘e, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár am er wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ na,
kóó ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m er wi-nas'am na mbɛt.
Mi dee nɛ́ ge ɗaŋmɔ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ ha̧‘m kpe nú‘m!
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ yí-wen ha̧ ŋmaa ha̧ ɗaŋsee na,
ɓɛɛ báá wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu'm tɛ gbak tɛ ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ zu wen kɔ‘m nde?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ zaŋa-nú ko wi-bɔnɛ.
Ɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ bi be-oi nɛ mbaɗi!
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ ɗɔr sɛm k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk,
mi beka de ndela nɛ gbaayí h’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tá mɔ nɛ dea, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ kpasawen,
wen-ndela a̧a̧ kɔ̧ nú‘m'i?
Mi iŋ mgbara demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ na?
Kɔ‘m, ŋma mɔ bó zu'm na.
Duka-a ko bíí zu nù'ɛ kànà nɛ́ bɔnɛ,
duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ yak ŋmaa in ko wi-de-ŋga tom na.
A̧ duk hee bara nɛ de tom ɗɔɔ wese nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ gi̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa ga,
hee ŋma wi-de-tom nɛ pɛm mɔ mɛ ba sede kɔ‘i ga.
War mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ́ o fio-zɛ nɛ yak, mi kpa mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ kpa'm mɛ zɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ bɔnɛ.
Kà‘m ɔ́ nù ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ a̧ sa̧ bee,»
kà‘m kúr, ɓɛɛ mi'e ndé: «Mɔ'ɔ ga̧ bee,»
ɓɛɛ mi duk kànà nɛ̀ dita see hegɔ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ.
Dɔk in ŋgo-da̧i̧ aa mur tɛ‘m lɛŋ,
ndàrá tɛ‘m ora, ɓɛɛ mbɔr.
Zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m yak nɛ haya-a hee gɔma yí ga,
wa hɔɔ nduti, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ ha̧‘m mɛ e nɛ ta woyo bo ɓɔna.
GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa ndé,
duka-a kɔ‘m nɛ́ búk sɔɔ géè,
mi beka duk tɛ bɔtɛ ɓɔna.
Yí‘nɛ́ beka zɔk am ɓɔna,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kìì mɛ zɔk am, ɓɛɛ ká‘m bó kɔ‘m ɓɔna.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ tura-zan yambali nɛnɛ ɓɔn sɔɔ géè'ɛ ga,
hegɔ mbɛt, wi nɛ ye kɔ kɔ̧ kaɗi daŋ ɓɔna.
A̧ pii ɗoŋ mɛ ɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna,
o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ beka iŋ oi-aa ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm beka kpe nú‘m na,
mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ gɔna hiɗi;
mi tɛ duk nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee ai nɛ nú‘m.
Mi nɛ́ gba-tɔp náà, kóó ndiɓa ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pɛm am pɛm nde, GASA WAN?
Kà‘m tɔ̧́‘e ndé, mi tɛ ɔ nu, ɓɛɛ see-am ga̧a̧,
fara-ɔ kɔ‘m tɛ de ha̧ aia-nú kɔ‘m mɛ kaɗi wó,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ‘m tɛ ɔɔ zu,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ usa tɛ hɔɔ-zu ha̧‘m dee ha̧ bele mɛ zar am.
Bíí a̧ nɔkɔɗi so ger-am gbɛ‘m yinɛ gáà,
tɛ̀ɛ́ gan duka-a n'am duk nɛ́ géé gba̧a̧'ɛ.
Wen kɔ‘m bo na, mi beka ɓɔn zan na,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é‘m, duka-a kɔ‘m nɛ́ búk sɔɔ gee.
Bíí só nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ ɗaŋ ŋgimbi k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa,
s’ɛnɛ tá mɔ wen-aa ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ zɔk a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
s’ɛnɛ we a̧ tɛ ŋgimbi kpɔk kpɔk ge nde?
Ɛnɛ tɛ kaɗi bɔɔ haia'm mɛ gese ge?
Ɛnɛ tɛ e bɔɔ ha̧‘m mɛ gur sap mɛ gese ge?
Kà‘m nɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ge a̧‘m dee in'nɛ̀ɛ́, wi-kpe-naŋ bíí ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ e'm nɛ̀ mbélé k’ɛ́nɛ́ ge?
Mi nɛ ŋma gasa tui wen'nɛ́ nde?
Wen ge ɛnɛ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m ha̧‘m,
ha̧ yɔɔ kaya kɔ‘m mɛ yak géè na ge?
Dekpaa mi tɛ ye ɗɔɔ nu,
ɛnɛ tɛ kii am takaɗi, mi bo ɓɔna.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Bildad be Sua baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mɛ tɛ kaɗi zɔm wen kɔ-mɛ nɔ'ɔ
nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ hee gba búk a̧ yu ga’ɛ mɛ gese ge?
Sɔ̧ de gɔɔmɔ dee?
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ yɔ kaya tɛ gɔna kita kɔ‘i na.
Ŋmafara o bem kɔ-mɛ dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ ti a̧,
ɓɛɛ sa mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ‘i tik zu wa.
Kɔ-mɛ, kà mɛ kíí Sɔ̧,
kà mɛ áí nú ha̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
kà mɛ bó nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-kpasawen in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ pɛm mɛ;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ duka so nɛnɛ nɛti ga,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ dɔka mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ kpaa so lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ geɗek mɔ,
katɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ kpa nɛ ɗoŋ.
Mɛ̀ ák mɔ in o kuti bíí ɓeemɛ,
mɛ̀ kíí ha̧ mɛ mɛ iŋ mgbara duka-a ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa.
Ɛɛ nɛ o mbaŋa bíí mɛ mboyɛɛ,
ɛɛ iŋ k’ɛɛ mgbara mɔ na,
wen duka-a k’ɛɛ zaŋnu hɔɔ ŋmaa in gi̧ɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ;
wa tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ mɛ;
tɛ iŋa mgbara mɔ kɔ-wa, wa tɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɓoɓo hɔ tɛ ŋga nù na!
Kà yì bo na, toro gbo na!
Kà yì ɓan ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ̧ka̧ kor nɛti ha̧ o oi dɔka zɔ̧,
kóó ŋma mɔ nyɔŋ so kunin-a na mbɛt.»
Mɔ nɛ hɔ zu bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ bi ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Ee-ta ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ de geemɔ.
Ee-ta kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ géé garaazi,
mɔɔ-duk-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ géé mbul wanto.
Kà a̧ ɛ́k tɛ nɛ te-see-tua kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ gbina,
kà a̧ gá̧í̧ sɛnɛ ɓɛɛ yor na.
A̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma te-yor-wese
nɛ̀ tɔk-aa ɔ dɔka,
nɛ̀ gbaa-er-a ɓɔɔ kpe zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Kunin-a ye nù nɛ ɗuka-a
hɔ mgbara ta mɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kà bíí zúɗ‘a yinɛ tɛ fara n'aa duk sɛnɛ‘i,
fara'i tɛ kaf'a'e: «Mi tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛti na.»
Hegɔ ŋma mbe te tɛ hɔ oi-aa.
Desee mɔ nɛ̀ kpa a̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i,
mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa pɛr bíí hegɔ, nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, Sɔ̧ e wi nɛ̀ ŋma wen bo zu a̧ na tɛ geemɔ na;
a̧ gbak o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na mbɛt.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ nú-mɛ mɛ gɔn mami,
in ha̧ mɛ mɛ gai mɔ nɛ desee.
Foe tɛ de o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o tua-laa ko o wi-ɗaŋ beka bo ɓɔna.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Nɛ mbetɛ, mɔ hegɔ de dee.
Ɓɛɛ kita ko bíí tɛ ba Sɔ̧ hee ge?
Bíí nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɓa wen in a̧,
a̧ beka kifi nú war kpɔk tɛ o ɓaa kita kɔ̧-a̧ booro na.
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ;
o'o kia mɛ gan a̧, kà zɔ́k bɔnɛ na o?
A̧ ba o kaya e ŋma fara;
wa iŋ wi nɛ de mɔ tɛ nyimsea hegɔ in wa'i na.
A̧ yɛkɛsi gun-nù nɛ̀ oi-aa,
ɓɛɛ o mbiŋ tɔna-a naka.
A̧ ha̧ nú ɓɛɛ wese daŋ na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpee yí o sɔra mbɛt.
A̧ ɛ̀nɛ́-à a̧ tati yí-zan,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛɛ nɔ̀ zu kin-yì mbɛt.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee o zuduk sɔra nɛtɛ nɛtɛ:
o Gasa Sɔra, o Hɛr-paa, o Gbaayí-be-zɔŋa, in o Gɔm-ndaa.
A̧ de nɛ gasamɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa-a na;
a̧ de nɛ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.
A̧ ɓir katɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk a̧ na;
a̧ ɓir yak, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ géé iŋa mgbara-a na.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ dor a̧ tɛ baa mɔ nɛ ŋgai o?
O'o tɛ ak a̧‘e: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ n’ɛnɛ de’ɛ nɛ́ ge?» wó'ɛ, bo na.
Sɔ̧ dor nyimsea kɔ‘i na;
o wi-gbak Rahab lɛŋ ɔ nɛ nù ha̧ a̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mi a̧‘m tɛ ɓa wen kɔ‘m ti a̧ nde?
Nɛ́ ge wen ge a̧‘m tɛ kpa mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ge?
Kóó wen kɔ‘m a̧ dee so, ŋma wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ bo na;
kànà nɛ́ aia-nú ha̧ wi-gɔn-kita zu'm ɓɛɛ.
Kóó mi saa sara, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧,
bo nɛ mi ta'e nde, a̧ zia tiger-am na.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tom gba búk tɛnɛ gbin nɛ gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ dɔka da̧i̧ mɛ a tɛ‘m sɔɔ géè.
A̧ e ha̧‘m mɛ ɔm tɛ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dea-a ha̧ see-am mɛ tu̧.
Kà bó nɛ́ ko ŋgai wó, a̧ nɛ tɛ-a'i nɛ́ ŋgai,
kà bó nɛ́ ko ɓaa-wen wó,
ɓɛɛ nɛ o'o tɛ ɓa wen in a̧ o?
Kóó wen kɔ‘m dee so hee ge,
wen kɔ‘m tɛ ba'm nɛ tɛ‘m;
mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ lɛŋ tɛ pii ɗoŋ zu'm woyo.
Kóó war wen kɔ‘m ɔ sa̧a̧ mbɛt, mi iŋ mgbara-a ɓɔna.
Wɔ duka kpasa gbɛ‘m ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm tɔ̧ ndé, lɛŋ nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ:
kóó nɛ́ wi nɛ wen bo zu a na,
kóó nɛ́ wi nɛ wen a̧a̧ zu a mbɛt,
kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ gbɛɛ wa a zu ŋmaa.
Kà ŋma zɛɛ geŋa tik nù kúm nɛ bíí,
bɔnɛ ko wi nɔ‘i de kɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-mami ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Kà o wi-ɗaŋ bá nù,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ o wi-ɓa-kita mɛ kpe yí sɛnɛ.
Kà bó nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de mɔ‘i na,
nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ tɛ de yak zu a ge?
Zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m maa yì gan o wi a yaa-gan-ŋmaa;
wa yaka wa iŋ bɔtɛ na.
Wa yaka hee ŋma be kombon
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zua ɗum nɛnɛ mɛ ba nɛ saɗi’ɛ ga.
Kà‘m tɔ̧́ ndé, mi tɛ e aia-nú kɔ‘m duk,
ha̧ sɔnti'm mɛ bur ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ desee wó,
ɓɛɛ kíí bɔnɛ kɔ‘m baa'm,
wen mi iŋa ndé, ɛnɛ beka e'm géè na.
Wen tɛ ba'm;
a̧‘m ɗaŋ tɛ‘m sɔɔ géè wen ge?
Kóó mi zuia nɛ yí-ɓɔrɔ,
kóó mi taia er-am nɛ sa̧-ndiŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba'm pi̧ ɗɔɔ ɓɔtɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-ɔ̧i̧ wen o laa kɔ‘m.
Wen Sɔ̧ bó nɛ́ bíí hee mi ga, kà‘m kífí nú ha̧ a̧ na,
k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé k’ɛɛ dee kita in ŋmaa na mbɛt.
Kà ŋma wi nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ gɔn kita
mgbara yɛ, bá bòò so,
Sɔ̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba nyasi kɔ‘i yinɛ ka̧ tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-kíì kɔ̧-a̧ beka pi̧ so kíì tɛ‘m ɓɔna.
Kíì beka de so'm tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in a̧ na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bó hegɔ na ga,
taamɔ kɔ‘m ɓɔna kɔ̧ see-am.
Duka-a siti nyɛm am ɓɔna,
mi beka dor aia-nú kɔ‘m ɓɔna;
mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ tu̧u̧-see:
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧‘e,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ in am hee wi nɛ̀ wen tika ga na,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧ kpaa-a n’ɛ̀nɛ́ kpaa in am’ɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpá nɛ́ desee tɛ dee ŋgamɔ in am,
é nɛ̀ mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ er'nɛ́ tɛ geemɔ,
yor nɛ ɗoŋ ee-zu-mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nde?
Gbaayí‘nɛ́ zɔk mɔ hee ko bíí ga nde?
Zɔkamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ gan ko bíí na?
Duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ so hee ko bíí nɛ fe fee’ɛ ga?
Pɛ duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ pɛ duka-a ko bíí nde?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ kii yɔɔ kaya kɔ‘m ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ kíí ndaa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m wen ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ de-a'e, mi de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí mɛ ɓar am er'nɛ́ yinɛ bo na mbɛt.
Er'nɛ́ mana'm e nù,
ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛnɛ kpaia taamɔ mɛ ɗaŋ am yinɛ!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa ndé,
ɛ́nɛ́ ɓoo am hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɓo nɛ gii’ɛ ga;
hegɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ kifi fuunu woyo?
Bo nɛ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ fok hee yibere ga,
ha̧‘m mɛ kaŋ hee kaŋa yibere ga na nde?
Ɛnɛ dea'm nɛ gba̧a̧ in ɗaɗi,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpe tɛ‘m nɛ ndàrá in mur.
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa,
ɛnɛ zɔka'm nɛ de yí,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ pɛm
Ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ,
mɔ n’ɛnɛ ta nɛ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ wen dea-a in am nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Kà‘m dé ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ baa'm ɓɔn nú-a;
kà‘m yɔ́ kaya, ɛnɛ e'm gee na.
Kà wen tík am, búù baa'm;
kà‘m dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, mi ba zu'm nɛ ŋgɔn na mbɛt,
foe baa'm dík-dík, bɔnɛ kɔ‘m gbɛ‘m hee dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Kà‘m kúr, ɛnɛ ndaka'm hee dila ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ foo o ŋgaŋamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a zu'm woyo.
Ɛnɛ nasa'm woyo,
nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ kura zu'm woyo,
o wi-biro kpai nɛ̀ ŋmaa pii zu'm.
Wen ge ɛnɛ foo am gbonɛ nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m ge?
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ fe, bó nɛ́ yí bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk so'm na.
Tɛ̀ɛ́ duk so hee wa ko'm na ga,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ ba'm nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ pi̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi.
Oi zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m zu nù dɔk na ɓɛɛ kaɗi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m ɔm benaŋ à̧‘m kpá be desee,
nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ yak ɓɔn
si ɗɔŋgɔ-gba-tum mɛ;
sɛn hi̧i̧ gɔna-ndaa-zan nɛ́ ti-tum,
nɛ́ ɗuka tum a̧ kpe zu o yukuta mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ hi̧i̧,
ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ fara'i nɛ́ tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔfar be Naama baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Wi beka kifi nú ha̧ wi nɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ dɔka-a na?
Nɛ́ iŋa-war-wen a̧ de ha̧ wen ko bíí mɛ tan nde?
Bura wen kɔ-mɛ tɛ de ha̧ bíí mɛ kpe nú nde?
Mɛ tɛ mam bíí, ɓɛɛ wi beka gai mɛ na nde?
Mɛ tɔ̧a̧: «Wen kɔ‘m’ɛ nɛ́ kpasawen,
wi nɛ́ sa̧a̧-bíí yi Sɔ̧!»
Kà Sɔ̧ tɔ̧́ so wen ha̧ mɛ,
kà a̧ hú̧í̧ so nú-a mɛ kifi nú ha̧ mɛ,
kà a̧ úsí so hu̧sa̧mɔ nɛ duk tɛ iŋa mgbara mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ mɛ,
mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ìŋ ndé, Sɔ̧ de mɔ in mɛɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ na.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko Sɔ̧ ɔ gasa gan zu taamɔ ko bíí.
Mɛ nyɛma so mɛ iŋ ndaa ɗukamɔ ko Sɔ̧,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ iŋ ndaa gasamɔ ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nde?
Gasamɔ‘i kusa gan yiwese: ŋma mɔ̀ɔ́ de bo na.
A̧ ɔ ɗuka gan fara nɛ o bíí nɛ fea ya sɛnɛ:
ge a'i tɛ iŋ sɛnɛ ge?
Gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ gasa gan nù,
a̧ pɛsa gan gba-tɔp mbɛt.
Kà Sɔ̧ gbó mɛ ba bíí pi̧ zɔɓɔ,
kà a̧ sá bíí ti kita, o'o tɛ si kafɛ o?
Wen kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ iŋa o wi-de-ndela;
bó nɛ́ a̧ mbaɗi nɛ mɔ sɛka a̧ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ nɛ bíí de na.
Kà wi-iŋ-mɔ-na nɛ́ iŋa mɔ,
ɓɛɛ tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ-mɛ, Job,
mɛ̀ kífí see-mɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧,
mɛ̀ gɔ́m er ha̧ a̧.
Kà ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ baa er-mɛ, mɛ̀ síŋ pi̧taŋ;
mɔɔ-ɗaŋ a̧ ká duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt.
Hegɔ, mɛ tɛ ba zu-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn,
mɛ tɛ yor mitak, kíì beka de mɛ na.
Tɛ-mɛ tɛ bi ɗoŋ bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ tɛ zɔk wa hee yì a̧ foka so yak ga.
Duka-a kɔ-mɛ tɛ de hee nyɛka-a ko wese-bɛɗɛ-zu ga;
tum tɛ duk nɛ́ gɔna ndaa-zan ti mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ iŋ nɛ dea'e, ŋma mɔɔ-e-nɛ ta a̧a̧ sɛnɛ;
mɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ katɛ mɛ lɛŋ ɔ dee,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ɔ nù nɛ ga̧a̧-see.
Mɛ tɛ ɔm tɛ-mɛ ɓɛɛ bíí beka fo tɛ-mɛ na;
o bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ kii ha̧ mɛ mɛ zɔk wa nɛ de yí.
Yí o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ ba tum,
wa beka kpa fara hu̧sa̧-a̧ na;
mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ-wa nɛ́ fio ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job kifa nú:
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́ nɛ wen oi nú bíí nù lɛŋ,
iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ fe kànà in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Mi mbɛt mi iŋa taa mɔ nɛ de-a hee ɛnɛ ga,
ŋma mɔ n’ɛnɛ gana nɛ‘m bo na!
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ hee k’ɛ́nɛ́ na ga nɛ o?
Mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o sɛm kɔ‘m nɛ‘m.
Mi hiɗa mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ zii so aia-nú kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na,
kifa duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o bíí.
Búù à̧ bá wi-bɔnɛ!
Taamɔ ko wi-bɔtɛ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ zu bíí
nɛ́ naŋ mbali ŋmaa nɛ mɔ‘i.
Tua ko o wi-ɓar-mɔ er-wi ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ;
o wi nɛ kii nú Sɔ̧ ya kɔ‘i nɛ de-a
wen wa iŋa'e Sɔ̧ tɛ gbak wi.
Kà mɛ ák o saɗi, wa tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ,
kà mɛ ák o nɔ̧́í̧, wa tɛ yambii mɔ ha̧ mɛ,
kà mɛ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ in nù, a̧ tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ;
o zoro ɗɔɔ yì tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mbɛt.
Mgbara o saɗi nɔ‘i,
nɛ́ o'o iŋ‘e nɛ́ er GASA WAN a̧ de mɔ lɛŋ na o?
Sɛn tɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ kasi nɛ
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kasi
Bíí‘e «Zer-wi iŋa kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara wen,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kɔ̧ nú-wi kpa nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔŋmɔ'ɛ ga.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ mɔ ko o sɔkawi;
wi kpa iŋamɔ tɛ duka-a ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.»
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m n'am iŋa,
iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgayamɔ nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧;
tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ in iŋamɔ mbɛt nɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Kà a̧ yáí mɔ a nù kaɗi,
ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ ɗafi mɔ‘i woyo bo na;
kà a̧ pí̧ bíí zɔɓɔ kaɗi, ŋma wi gbo wi’ɛi pi̧ nù bo na.
Kà a̧ dór kórò, gasa kaara yora;
kà a̧ dák er tɛ yì, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋa nù lɛŋ.
Ŋgai in de sɔnti nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧,
o wi-ɔr-bíí in o wi nɛ wa ɔr lɛŋ duk kɔ̧ er-a.
A̧ dee ha̧ o gasawi mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ géé naŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ mgbélé tɛ o wan-gɔn-kita.
A̧ kpɔ̧i̧a̧ laa-wan tɛ o wannu yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ mar nɛ túí ndaa-wa.
A̧ dee ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ géé naŋ;
a̧ dee ha̧ mɔ nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo mɛ yambali.
A̧ dora leɓe wi-iŋ-tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen;
a̧ ɗaŋa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko o sɔkawi.
A̧ dee ha̧ bíí mɛ e o tu̧u̧-tɛ-bíí tɛ geemɔ,
a̧ dee ha̧ ŋgai ko o gasa wannu mɛ kaɗi.
A̧ kpɔ̧i̧a̧ laa-tum tɛ ɗuka fara yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ yaa ti-tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ya tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ.
A̧ dee ha̧ dukbíí mɛ kpa ŋgai,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ wa mɛ tik;
a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ ba nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ zik e wa nɛ bara woyo.
A̧ dee ha̧ taamɔ ko o wan mɛ gbo zu nù kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ wa mɛ yambali pofi nɛnɛ nɛ ŋga-gbárà.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ tam mɔ nɛ ti-tum nɛnɛ, sa̧a̧mɔ bo na,
naŋ-wa mbali nɛ ŋmaa hee wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Yí‘m zɔka mɔ‘i lɛŋ,
zer-am zia mɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ mgbara-a mbɛt.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ iŋa, mi iŋa kànà mbɛt;
ŋma mɔ n’ɛnɛ gana nɛ̀‘m bo na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ wen
ha̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ;
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ si kafɛ in Sɔ̧.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ nɛ́ o wi-de-ndela ɔr nɛ bíí;
ɛnɛ nɛ́ o wi-de-nyina nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-a̧ bo na.
Ŋma wi-kpe-nú‘nɛ́ war kpɔk a̧ bo so gáà,
mɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ duk nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí war wen kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ gba̧a̧ wen kɔ‘m n'am tɛ ɓa'i.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yor ɗoŋ Sɔ̧,
de nɛ ndela nɛ nin-a nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ yé nɛ ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɓa wen oi nú-a nde?
Kà a̧ kíí mɔ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ tɛ́ de wen'nɛ́ nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ ɔr a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɔr nɛ bíí'ɛ ga nde?
A̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ŋga wen h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen n’ɛnɛ yee ɗoŋ-aa nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧.
Gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘nɛ́ na nde?
Kíì tɛ-a de'nɛ́ na nde?
O gba̧‘a̧ tua-wen nɔ‘i k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i nɛ géé bùk-wee;
wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ géé bú-kpánà.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé nú‘nɛ́! Nɛ́ mi'i tɛ tɔ̧ wen kinii!
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ tɛ kpa'm a̧ kpá‘m!
Mi duk zu naŋ-am wen mɔ lɛŋ,
mi tɛ we; kà‘m nɛ́ fea, ɓɛɛ kaɗa.
A̧ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, a̧ a̧ gbɛ‘m, wen kɔ‘m bó na;
mɔ kpɔk, mi tɛ ɓa kànà wen kɔ‘m ti a̧!
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ tɛ kpas'am,
wen wi-hu̧si-ɗaŋmɔ yor ti a̧ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ gba̧a̧ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧‘i.
Mi nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: mi tɛ ɓa wen kɔ‘m kinii;
mi iŋa ndé, wen kɔ‘m tɛ yor.
Ŋma bíí nɛ́ bòò mɛ́ ba wen zu'm, a̧ a̧ tɔ̧;
kà wen kɔ‘m a̧ ɗaŋa, ha̧‘m kpe nú‘m a̧‘m fé.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ mɔ yiitoo a̧‘m ak er'nɛ́.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k, ɓɛɛ mi hu̧si tɛ‘m ti'nɛ́ ɓɔna:
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá er'nɛ́ yinɛ zu'm,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘m ɓɔna;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú̧ naŋ wen, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kifi nú h’ɛ́nɛ́;
kóó mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kifa nú ha̧‘m.
Yɔɔ kaya kɔ‘m in ɗaŋmɔ n'am dee ti'nɛ́ bɔɔ géè?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí heembea n'am gbina in ɗaŋmɔ n'am dea ha̧‘m iŋ.
Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ bá yí‘nɛ́ hu̧si nɛ‘m ge nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ bá‘m hee wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, wen ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nasi géé wa̧a̧ nɛ búk ba yaknɛ'ɛ,
kóó ndaka ɗoŋ géé kora zɔ̧ nde?
Wen ge ɛnɛ gɔn ŋga kita zu'm ge?
Wen ge ɛnɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m
oi o ɗaŋmɔ n'am dee nɛ̀ bem mɛ ge?
Wen ge ɛnɛ pi̧ naŋ-am kɔ̧ poka,
zɔk nɛ o naŋanɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ ge?
Duka-a ko bíí duk hee ɓuka gua ga;
kóó hee ŋma laa nɛ zɛmɛ yii ga.
Bíí nɛ̀ okoo koa,
kànà nɛ́ bɔnɛ a̧ gan zu a,
ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zu nù nyɛi̧ na.
Bíí duk hee do-mɔ nɛ mir, ɓɛɛ ɓan na ɔ̧ka̧'ɛ ga;
a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in gi̧ɔ̧ nɛ yambali’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ hu̧i̧ yí‘nɛ́ zu a hee ge?
Ɛnɛ tɛ mgbɔ a e ti kita hee ge?
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧
mɛ gbo nɛ tɛ ndiŋmɔ o?
Ŋma wi-a bo kɔ‘i na!
Ɛnɛ gɔna ŋgimbi duka-a ko bíí gɔn,
ɛnɛ tɔra fio-zɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ tɔr,
a̧ nyɛm mɛ gan zu ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ea ha̧ a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yí‘nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é a̧ geɗek,
ha̧ a̧ kaɗi be wese-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ga̧a̧-see na nde?
Te a̧a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘i;
kà bíí gɔ́m a̧ pi̧ nu, a̧ nyɛma mɛ ɓɔ woyo,
ɓɛɛ o gbaia-a gboo siti.
Kóó nɛ́ o kunin-a a̧ fee ɗɔɔ nù,
kóó nɛ́ ŋginda-a a̧ ɓɔna ɗɔɔ nù;
kà yì hɔ́ sɛnɛ ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓɔa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gbaa er-a hee be daŋa-te ga.
Ɓɛɛ ko bíí, kà a̧ fé, ɓɛɛ ɓaa kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ kaɗa'i!
Kà bíí pɛ́ see kaɗi, wi iŋ oi-aa ɓɔna.
Yì gboo tɛ gba-tɔp yak;
zer ɔ̧si̧, ɓɛɛ kora ndaɗi kpáá-kpáá;
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ bíí fe nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ kur ɓɔna.
Ŋgimbi nɛ yiwese biti duka-a kaŋ,
bíí beka tun tɛ ɔɔ ŋgírí-ya kɔ‘i na.
Ho! Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ hu̧si so'm sɛn fara ko o fio,
ha̧‘m duk hi̧i̧ hɔ ŋgimbi
nɛ nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ga̧ zu'm na nde?
Ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gɔn so ŋma ŋgimbi
nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ mbaŋ nɛ ɗoŋ-am na nde?
Mɔ kpɔk, kà bíí fe kaɗi, a̧ kur ŋgɔn woyo ɓɔna.
Wen kà bó só hegɔ na, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ pɛm mɔ,
hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ mɛ ba'm e ŋgɔn.
Ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ sa'm, ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ sara,
ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa desee zu tom n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ er'nɛ́.
Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓá nɛ oi naŋ-am;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ kii mɛ zɔk ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r nú o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m e kɔ̧ ŋgoɓo;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é
Kaya mbaŋ mbaŋ ɓɛɛ gbina a nù;
kam-ta kin kin yak fara kɔ‘i e duk,
yi ɗɔkɔri ta ɗɔkɔri,
yì-kórò aŋ mɔka nù aŋ;
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ ɛnɛ ɗaŋ nɛ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ko bíí.
Ɛ́nɛ́ yó bíí nɛ̀ nù, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi kur ɓɔna;
ɛnɛ kpaia saŋa yí-a, ɓɛɛ ndak a̧ yaknɛ.
Kóó bíí tɛ tu̧ tɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ndé, a̧ iŋ kɔ̧-a̧ na;
kóó wa tɛ e wa tɛ geemɔ nde, a̧ iŋ na mbɛt.
Kànà nɛ war bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a a̧ a̧ zɔk,
in gɔfa mɔ zu dita see kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Elifaz be Teman baa wen woyo, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Job:
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ záŋ nú záŋ nde?
Géé tum-wen tɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú-a nde?
A̧ tɔ̧ so ya-zu-wen tɔ̧ɔ̧?
A̧ tɔ̧ so wen nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ bo na tɔ̧ɔ̧?
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ dor nɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ taa mɔ wen yuu kíí Sɔ̧;
mɛ ɗaŋ nɛ taamɔ ko bíí sitɛ Sɔ̧.
Nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ mɛ dea a̧ ba mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɔ'ɔ;
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɔ̧́ wen hee wi-ɔr-wi ga.
Nɛ́ nú-mɛ a̧ de ha̧ wen mɛ ba mɛ, bo nɛ mi na,
nɛ́ ndàrá nú-mɛ a̧ de sedaako zu mɛ.
Kuti bíí nɛ̀ wa koo nɛ́ mɛ nde?
Wa koo mɛ nɛti ha̧ o be kaya nde?
Mɛ duka oi ee-zu-mɔ ko Sɔ̧,
sɛka mɛ kpa nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nde?
Mɔ nɛ mɛ iŋa n’ɛɛ iŋ k’ɛɛ na nɛ ge?
Ŋma mɔ nɛ mɛ yambaia n’ɛɛ yambii k’ɛɛ na nɛ ge?
Mgbara yɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ zu fɛŋa kaɗi;
pɛ wa dɔka zu nù'ɛ gan ko dáà kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ taa gaia mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ gai
tɛ o ga̧a̧ wen n’ɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ nyɛm mɛ na nde?
Nɛ́ ge a̧ ŋgai see-mɛ ge?
Gba̧a̧ ko zɔka yɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ yí hee ge?
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ mɛ de nyimsea in a̧,
tɔ̧ nɛ zɔm wen hegɔ'ɔ nde?
Bíí nɛ́ ge sa tɛ tɔ̧‘e wi ɔ sa̧a̧ ge nde?
Bem ko okoo nɛ́ ge kà tɔ̧́‘e,
wi dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ge?
Sɔ̧ e ta nɛ o betom kɔ‘i na,
yiwese sa̧ yí-a na mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ yera pi̧ nù duk nɛnɛ,
nɛ̀ yí-nɔɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ'ɛ, a̧ Sɔ̧ tɛ e nɛ ta nde?
Mɛ̀ zii, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ,
mi tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'am zɔka ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ usamɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ usi ha̧ bíí,
nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ o dáà kɔ-wa usa so ha̧ wa.
Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so nù ha̧ wa ɛ̀nɛ́-wa ɓɛɛ,
ŋma gɔni bíí ye so mgbara wa na.
Duka-a ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ dita see ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
Sɔ̧ gɔna pɛ duka-a ko wi-de-ŋgamɔ gɔn.
A̧ zii nɛ giti mɔɔ-kíì ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi n'aa duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋga-wi tɛɛ tik zu a̧.
A̧ iŋ yuwar kpasa-a tɛ tum na;
gba-paa hai nɛ a̧.
Tama pɛm nɛ wɔr-aa mɛ nyɔŋ;
a̧ iŋa'e wese bɔnɛ hɛɗa kaɗi.
Ɗaŋsee in dita-see nɛ́ mɛ́ tik zu a̧,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma wannu nɛ́ nɛ̀ biro’ɛ ga.
Mɔ nɛ hɔ zu wi-de-ŋgazu in Sɔ̧,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
in nɛ̀ we zu nɛ̀ a̧, nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Wi’ɛi gu ɗɔɔ ndota ŋgee kɔ‘i,
gbo nɛ biro sitɛ Sɔ̧.
Zɔ́k de saŋa yí-a,
in de bɔɗa tɛ-a!
A̧ duka de ye sɛn bɛɛ-oi,
kɔ̧ o tua nɛ bíí nyɛm so mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ ɓɔna,
nɛ̀ gbin so kɔ‘i gbin a nù.
A̧ beka kpa mɔ na, mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ beka yor na mbɛt;
nin-a beka hur zu nù ɓɔna.
A̧ beka gbo ɗɔɔ tum na;
a̧ tɛ duk hee ŋma te nɛ búk kaia o do-a a taŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wee dɔɔ o gbaa er-a kor lɛŋ ga.
A̧ yɔ nɛ kaya wen n'aa e ta nɛ ɔramɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
wen mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ ɔramɔ.
Mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ nɛti sa a̧ fea,
hee ŋma gbaa-er-te nɛ̀ kora ga.
Mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ̀ tɛ sɔk na ai nɛnɛ a nù,
kóó hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ do te-nɔ̧́ ai nɛnɛ a nù'ɛ ga.
Nɛ mbetɛ, o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ yar ndɔra;
wee tɛ dɔ tua ko wi-de-mɔ lɛŋ wen sede.
Wi nɛ̀ bá zaŋ ɗaŋmɔ ko nɛ̀ bɔnɛ pi̧ nù,
ɓɛɛ waya-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ́ ɔramɔ à̧ à̧ tɛ́ kpa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job kifa nú ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Pɛr wen nɔ‘i mi zia war géè ndé kaɗi!
Ɛ́nɛ́‘e wi nɛ́ wi-ga̧-see wó, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ há̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dita-see.
Ɛnɛ‘e mi tɛ kaɗi zaŋa nú mɛ gese ge?
Ge a̧ ir am mɛ kifi nú hegɔ ge?
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk so fara n'am duk'i,
ha̧‘m mɛ duk fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ gáà,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ pɛrti wen nɔ‘i zu'nɛ́,
zɔk nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, mi̧i̧ nɛ̀ zu mbɛt.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ bur wen zu'nɛ́,
tɔ̧ nɛ géé tum-wen, ha̧ nɛ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ga̧ nɛ see'nɛ́ nɛ gba wen mɛ ndàrá nú‘m.
Kɔ‘m, kóó mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, bɔnɛ kɔ‘m kaɗi na;
kà‘m dúk nɛ oi nú‘m, bɔnɛ‘i kaɗi na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɔ gana zu'm;
Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ‘m lɛŋ yinɛ.
A̧ dee ha̧ sɔnti'm mɛ nik kai siɗi,
mɛ usi'e wen a̧a̧ zu'm;
ɔ̧ka̧-a̧ kɔ‘m ba nɛ wen zu'm mbɛt.
Nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ-am mɛ gbɔs'am,
nin-a bɛŋ nɛ ŋmaa pii tɛ‘m.
Yí o wisɛn kɔ‘m gbo nɛ géé wee pii tɛ‘m.
Nú-wa ɓa kpooŋ pii tɛ‘m,
dara kɔ-wa ye nɛ tɛ‘m hee nyasi ga;
wa mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa pii zu'm.
Sɔ̧ ee am nɛ̀ mɔɔ-de-saa ko obem,
a̧ pi̧i̧ am er o ɗaŋwi.
Mi duka so keɗeŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ sakala'm;
a̧ baa ger-am nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, gbin nɛ̀ gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m nduku-nduku;
a̧ ee am nɛ́ mbélé kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ ŋgasa'm nɛ̀ góò;
ko de a̧ tɛ pi̧i̧ am ti-gun na,
a̧ maa pa̧i̧-am a nù.
A̧ ee da̧i̧ tɛ‘m zɛlɛgbɛk,
a̧ nasa'm hee ŋma wi-biro ga.
Mi fura bufu kpe nɛ ndɔla tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi sɔ̧ tɛ‘m nɛ nù.
Yí‘m gbɛ̧ɛ̧ fara hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ ndàrá yí‘m to ɓurɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, ŋma mɔ n'am dee bo na;
kɔfa Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Nù, ká mɛ kpe zu tɔk tɛ‘m na;
ká sara kɔ‘m yambali na.
Kinii, mi a̧a̧ nɛ wi-sedaako kɔ‘m sɛn yiwese,
wi-yor-ɗoŋ-am a̧a̧ sɛn ŋgɔn mɛ.
O sɛm kɔ‘m mam nɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧‘m hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ sitɛ-a.
Wi-sedaako kɔ‘m a̧ kɛ̧ mgbara wen k’ɛɛ in Sɔ̧,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí ye nɛ ɗoŋ ŋmaa tɛ kita’ɛ ga;
wen pɛ duka-a kɔ‘m bɔ̧i̧ ɓɔna:
fara n'am nɛ si sɛnɛ‘i, pia-ɗoŋ bo na.
Mi bo nɛ̀ ŋgai ɓɔna;
ŋgimbi kɔ‘m hɛɗa yaka-a kaɗi;
oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna ha̧‘m nɛ́ yee kɔ̧-fio ɓɛɛ.
O wi-zɛkɛɗi-wi kɛra'm e see-a;
mi ɔ yá mɛ zɛ tɛ da̧a̧‘m nɛ wa da̧‘i na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am, GASA WAN.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧ na, ŋma wi-yor-ɗoŋ-am nɛ́ o?
Ɛnɛ dora o sɛm kɔ‘m mɛ iŋ kpasawen,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wa mɛ gan am na.
Hee ŋma bíí nɛ̀ sa o sɛm kɔ‘i mɛ kɛ̧ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ pɛma war kɔ-wa takaɗi’ɛ ga,
ɛ́nɛ́ ee am nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-tua-wen ko o bíí,
ɓɛɛ o bíí a nɛ sap yí‘m.
Dita-see kpee yí‘m,
kiitɛ‘m lɛŋ nɛ́ géé hɔɔ-tɛ bíí.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ya ɗékéyéké,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na kpa nɛ ɗaŋsee zu ɗaŋwi.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ ndak kànà nɛ́ ɗoŋ tom kɔ‘i siti,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na a̧ e nɛ see sɛnɛ siti gan kuti-a mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ;
mi beka kpa ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ poo'nɛ́ na.
O wese duka-a kɔ‘m yak yak,
ɓɛɛ o mɔ n'am taa so mɛ de ɗaŋa lɛŋ,
o mɔ n'am ee so zu-a mɛ de kifa geemɔ.
O sɛm kɔ‘m zɔk zɛ zu'm nɛ́ wese;
ŋgimbi nɛ tum ba nù, wa'e mɔ hɛɗa sa̧a̧-a̧ kaɗi.
A̧‘m é ta'm nɛ̀ ge?
Ye ko o fio nɛ́ fara-duk kɔ‘m;
mi ɗafi nɛ fara-ɔ kɔ‘m sɛn ti-tum mɛ.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ pɛsi: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ dáà kɔ‘m!»
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o dɔk: «Ɛnɛ nɛ́ nàà kɔ‘m in boko-nya'm!»
Mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m a̧a̧ déè nde?
Nɛ́ o'o iŋa oi-aa o nde?
A̧ tɛ zir in am si ye ko o fio
Ɛɛ tɛ ba fara-yaa in ŋmaa lɛŋ ɗɔɔ nù mɛ?
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Bildad be Sua baa wen, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mɛ tɛ kaɗi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen kɔ-mɛ mɛ gese ge?
Mɛ beka e war h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ k’ɛɛ na nde?
Wen ge mɛ e yɛ hee saɗi ga ge?
Mɛ zɔk yɛ hee mgbelewi ga, wen ge?
Kɔ-mɛ, nyimsea kɔ-mɛ sakali nɛ mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ!
Mɛ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e nɛ́ wen zu-mɛ a̧ nù tɛ kifi nɛ ŋga-gbárà
kóó a̧ kam-ta tɛ kin nɛnɛ yinɛ fara kɔ‘i nde?
Sa̧a̧mɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ tɛ bi,
wee kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ beka ba ɓɔna;
kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ba tum,
lamba tɛ bi zu a̧.
A̧ beka nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ de-a ɓɔna,
a̧ tɛ tik tɛ o ee-zu-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Naŋ-a tɛ ba a pi̧ yí yɔk,
a̧ tɛ tik lim;
pɛ́r tɛ ba naŋ-a,
a̧ tɛ ba mbala;
bolo-pɛr-ba a̧‘i a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ nù,
sak a̧a̧ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧.
O mɔɔ-kíì ndak nɛ ɗoŋ-aa,
pi̧ nɛ̀ kíì tɛ-a dam fara lɛŋ.
Wɔ tɛ wɔi a̧ mgbélé ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna nɛ̀ ŋgai,
bɔnɛ tɛ ba fara katɛ a̧.
Ŋga zɛɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o naŋ-a in er-a,
ɓɛɛ ndàrà-tɛ-a kaɗa lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ zuɗ‘a nɛ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa e nɛ ta-a'i,
ba a̧ sitɛ wan ko o fio.
Ŋma bíí tɛ ba tua oi-aa,
wa tɛ suk bumui̧ fara kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma te nɛ kunin-a fee nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ nù,
ɓɛɛ o gbaa er-a kor nɛ̀ ŋgɔn.
Bíí beka ta mɔ wen-aa tɛ kao’ɛ ɓɔna,
ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ ba nin-a e ŋgɔn zu nù'ɛ bo ɓɔna.
Wa tɛ ndak a̧ zu nù'ɛ yinɛ,
wa tɛ ir a̧ nɛ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ pi̧ ti-tum.
Nú-bere kɔ̧-a̧ beka nɛ siti ɓɔna;
ŋma bezaŋ beka ɓɔn oi-aa na.
Mɔ nɛ kpaa a̧‘i tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí mɛ yee-wese,
bele tɛ ba o bíí mɛ daŋa-wese,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧: «Mɔ nɛ kpa tua ko wi-ɗaŋ,
fara ko wi-iŋ Sɔ̧ na, a̧‘i.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job kifa nú, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Ɛnɛ tɛ kaɗi ha̧a̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m mɛ gese ge?
O dɔka wen n’ɛnɛ nukuri nɛ‘m’ɛ tɛ kaɗi mɛ gese ge?
War ɓu a̧ ɛnɛ da̧a̧ nɛ‘m kinii;
foe de'nɛ́ tɛ dee bɔnɛ in am na?
Kóó mi dee so nɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mbetɛ,
ɗaŋmɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk nɛ‘m ɛ̀n’ám.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gasi zu'nɛ́ zu'm,
usi nɛnɛ ndé, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu ŋma mɔ n'am dea,
a̧ búù ba'm wen-aa,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ nde, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ dee hegɔ in am,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ yukuta'm nɛ̀ yɔk kɔ̧-a̧.
Kà‘m híɗí mɔ wen ŋgamɔ nɛ kpaa'm,
ŋma bíí kifi nú ha̧‘m na;
kà‘m kíí ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn kita nɛ de-a,
mɔ‘i de hegɔ na mbɛt.
A̧ kpee yuwar gɔn nɛ̀ ti'm,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ yuwar kɔ‘m mɛ ba tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧.
A̧ baa gasamɔ kɔ‘m yinɛ,
a̧ ɗaŋa de hura-nin-am mbɛt.
A̧ gbina gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m lɛŋ, mi tika;
a̧ zuɗa mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m yinɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zuɗi nɛ te’ɛ ga.
Nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ kura in am,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk am hee wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɔi̧a ŋmaa,
wa wɛna war hɔ tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa kɛr tua kɔ‘m e see-a.
A̧ ndaka o nya'm nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m,
o wi nɛ iŋa so'm yu nɛ‘m.
O bíí ɗoŋ-am pɛsa lɛŋ,
tɛ o mgbák sɛm kɔ‘m bìí ɗoŋ-am mbɛt.
O bíí n'am kpɛka so kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m
in o kó-de-tom kɔ‘m zɔk am hee gɔni bíí ga;
o kó-de-tom kɔ‘m zɔk am hee ŋma gɛnɛ ga,
wa kɔ̧ mɛ zɔk am yí-wa ɓɔna.
Kà‘m sá wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, a̧ kɔ̧ sara nú‘m na,
kóó mi aia nú ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Kóò kɔ‘m kɔ̧ pɛr nú‘m na,
mi de yí o bem kɔ‘m ɓɔna.
Kóó nɛ́ o geɗek bem mbɛt, zɛkɛɗi nɛ́‘m;
kà‘m kúr, ɓɛɛ wa mama'm.
Kà o gasa sɛm kɔ‘m zɔ́k am, ɓɛɛ kíì dee wa;
o bíí n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna kifi nɛ nú tɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ wen ha̧‘m.
Ndàrá tɛ‘m in mur tɛ‘m ndaɗa kpaa-kpaa,
mi zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ hɔ tɛ gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m mɛ.
O sɛm kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m,
wen er Sɔ̧ gusa'm.
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ ndak ɗoŋ-am hee Sɔ̧ de ga,
wɔ tɛ‘m busi'nɛ́ na ge?
Ho! Mi tɛɛ́ kɔ̧ so ha̧ wa yɔr o wen kɔ‘m,
a zaŋ kalata.
Wa a̧ yɔr nɛ̀ boi zu tuŋgu,
ha̧ ɓɔn zu ta ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi iŋa wi-kundi-ari
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ sɔŋkur wen zu'm zu nù'ɛ.
Ɗoŋ nɛ ndàrá-tɛ‘m tɛ́ mbɔr or a nù lɛŋ,
mi tɛ́ duk kànà nɛ̀ géé mur-tɛ‘m mbaɗi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧.
Mi nɛ tɛ‘m a̧ tɛ mbaɗi a̧,
yí‘m tɛ zɔk a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka bó nɛ́ gɛnɛ wen am na,
see-am gbɛŋ gbɛŋ kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ, tɛ pɛma-mɔ.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ úsí nɛ́ ge bɔnɛ ge ha̧ a̧ ge,
gbákná, ɛ́ɛ́ kpaa war ha̧ kita a̧ tik a̧ ge?» ndé,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú gba-paa, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́,
wen mɔɔ-oi nyimsea kànà nɛ́ gba-paa;
hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ ndé, gɔna-kita a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sofar be Naama baa wen, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mi zia, hegɔ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kifi nú,
tɛ‘m nak nak mɛ tɔ̧ wen.
Mi zia dara tɛ o kifa nú nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ taamɔ kɔ‘m hee kifa-nú ga, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
Mɛ́ íŋ'è,
ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ dee nɛ bíí e zu nù hɔ kinii,
gana-zu-mɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na,
ɓɛɛ desee ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ, na nde?
Kóó zu-a too so yiwese,
kóó a̧ kusa so hee ge,
a̧ tɛ de geemɔ hee ɗɔr n'aa sɔ̧ pi̧ taŋ ga,
ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ̀ iŋa so a̧ beka iŋ oi-aa ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ yambali hee ɔɔ-zu ga,
a̧ tɛ yak hee hɔɔ-zu nɛ tɛ ha̧ bíí ɓɛɛ yaka’ɛ ga.
Gbaayí nɛ̀ zɔka so a̧ nɛti beka zɔk a̧ ɓɔna,
wi zɔk a̧ nú tua kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ yoɓi nɛ mɔ piiɗoŋ,
ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpe mɔ ko o wisan siɗoŋ ha̧ wa.
Ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧, ŋgai a̧a̧ so tɛ-a nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ kinii, a̧ tɛ ɔ nɛ ɗɔɔ nù nɛ̀ oi ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧‘i.
Kà ɗaŋmɔ a̧ ɔɔ so nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nú-a,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mana e ɗɔɔ leɓe-a,
kasi nɛnɛ, a̧ e duk na,
kpa nɛ̀ nyɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ gɔn leɓe-a,
nyɔŋmɔ‘i tɛ kpai,
ɓɛɛ kifa ma̧a̧da̧ ko kóró sɛn kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa mɛ.
A̧ gura so o dɔka kpaamɔ,
ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ̧i̧ gbonɛ.
A̧ zɔɓi só nɛ ma̧a̧da-firi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ leɓe kóró a̧ tɛ gbɛ a̧.
Wi’ɛi beka zɔk foka nɔ̧́,
kà bó nɛ̀ nɔ̧́ gɔrɔ in yibere na mbɛt.
A̧ beka nyɔŋ mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ̧-a̧ na;
a̧ beka kpa zɔm bɔtɛ mɔɔ-oi gɛnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee bɔnɛ in o wisan,
e nɛ wa duk, zu̧ nɛ̀ tua,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ mbo mboo bo na,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wɔ-mɔ gana zu a̧ ga,
a̧ beka ba ŋma mɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna er-a na.
Ŋma mɔ n'aa kpa so tɛ wɔ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na, bo na;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ ɗoŋ bɔtɛ kɔ̧-a̧ beka nyɛi̧ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ kpaamɔ tɛ gan zu a̧,
a̧ tɛ duk tɛ dita see,
ɓɛɛ gasa bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu a̧.
Mɔ n'aa tɛ nyɔŋ zaŋ-aa sur nɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Sɔ̧ tɛ fo ŋga wee nyimsea kɔ‘i pi̧ zu a̧,
hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ a̧ ai a zu-a ga.
Kà a̧ yú mɔ nú boi,
ɓɛɛ góò-ndɛrɛ pi̧i̧ a̧ sar.
Góò tɛ pi̧ yí-see-aa sar nɛ ɗoŋ-aa;
kà a̧ dák góò yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ kíí-fio tika zu a̧.
Tum tɛ ndak ɗoŋ-aa hɔ fara hu̧si mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ lɛŋ;
ŋma wee nɛ‘i ye na tɛ dɔ a̧,
ɓɛɛ dɔɔ oi mɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ bíí wee lɛŋ.
Yiwese tɛ gba ndaa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ nù misa̧ in a̧.
Ŋga foka-yì tɛ ba zu duk nɛ tua kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ tua'i baa yì yak wese nyimsea ko Sɔ̧.
Mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ɗafi pɛm nɛ wi-ɗaŋ, a̧‘i;
mɔɔ-oi nɛ Sɔ̧ e pɛm nɛ a̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ Job kifi nú hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ha̧ ŋma be ga̧a̧-see ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nin'nɛ́ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ wen,
kà‘m nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mam am, ɛnɛ mama.
Bó nɛ́ mi ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ zu bíí na,
mi nak tɛ‘m géè na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k am; kíì tɛ ba'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ee er nú‘nɛ́.
Kà‘m tá mɔ zu mɔ'ɔ, ɓɛɛ kíì dee am,
tɛ‘m lɛŋ nak nak:
Wen ge sa o wi-ɗaŋ ya kpasa,
sɔk nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgai kɔ-wa dɔk nɛnɛ siti ge?
O bem kɔ-wa gasi de gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ gbaayí-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔka o be-koo-wa mbɛt.
Tua kɔ-wa duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ kíì bo na,
wen dɔra ko Sɔ̧ fo wa na.
O wiwii ndai kɔ-wa daŋ nɛ o nana-a,
ɓɛɛ wa koa, zaŋ-wa hɔ na.
O wi nɔ‘i e o bem mɛ de saa kpíɗí nɛnɛ,
hɔ nɛ zaŋgule hee o sami ga,
ɓɛɛ o geɗek-a yaa kɔ-wa yɔ nɛ yɔyɛ.
Wa bíí nɛ gima nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ bi̧ɔ̧ in kunde,
wa zii nɛ giti fol de nɛ saa.
Wa ya kɔ-wa tɛ bɔtɛ wese lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wa zira si fara ko o fio mɛ ɔm tɛ-wa.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ yú katɛ yɛ,
wen ɛɛ kɔ̧ mɛ ba yuwar kɔ-mɛ na.
Wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ ge bíí ge
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧ ge?
K’ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ wora a̧, nɛ́ ge a̧ ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ kpa ge?»
Nɛ́ wa a̧ kii bɔtɛ kɔ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa,
ɓɛɛ ee-zu-mɔ
Lamba ko o wi-ɗaŋ bi na,
bɔnɛ kpa wa nɛ haya-a na;
nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tik zu wa bee na mbɛt.
Zu-a'i, bíí a̧ tɔ̧ mbɛt'i:
«Hara-búk a̧ kai wa yaknɛ hee puɗu ga,
gba-búk-kórò a̧ ɓoɓi wa kai si ŋgɔn hee wa̧a̧ ga.»
Bíí‘e ɗaŋmɔ ko dáà tik nɛ́ zu bem,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ úsí bɔnɛ‘i ha̧ wa nɛ tɛ-wa ha̧ wa zɔk.
Wa a̧ zɔ́k tika-a kɔ-wa nɛ̀ yí-wa,
ɓɛɛ nyimsea ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tík zu wa.
Ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ-wa nɛ́ kaɗa kaɗi,
tua kɔ-wa tɛ de nɛ́ ge ha̧ wa ɓɔ ge?
Wi tɛ yambi iŋamɔ ha̧ Sɔ̧,
a̧ n'aa gɔn kita zu o betom yiwese’ɛ nde?
Mgbara o bíí, o ŋma fe kɔ‘i zaŋ kpaamɔ,
tɛ bɔtɛ in tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ;
nɛ̀ oi ŋmaŋa-a,
in nɛ̀ oi ŋgai gba̧a̧-tɛ-wa mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ o ŋma fee kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee,
wa iŋ bɔtɛ na.
Wa tɛ ɔ nù in ŋmaa kpɔk ɗɔɔ nù,
ɓɛɛ dɔk aa tɛ-wa yiitoo lɛŋ.
Kɔ‘m mi iŋa mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́,
mi iŋa mɔ n’ɛnɛ ta see zu'm.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́‘e ndé, «Tua ko ŋga-wi’ɛ a̧a̧ déè,
tua nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ ɔ so sɛnɛ'ɛ a̧a̧ déè?»
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ ak o wi-ɓir-war,
ha̧ wa mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ wa zɔka h’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?
Wese bɔnɛ, wi-ɗaŋ kpasa;
wese nyimsea, nyimsea tik zu a̧ na.
Nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ ak mɔ zu naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ o?
O'o tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧ oi mɔ n'aa dee so o?
Ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧, o bíí mgbɔ nɛ a̧ e nú kɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ wa yaa ka̧ pɛsi pɛm nɛnɛ;
wa gar nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa,
wi tɔr o bíí-nɛ̀-fio na.
Nú-fio mbɛt kpɛk nɛ́ a̧ nɛ̀ de-a.
Nɛ́ bòò hegɔ, ga̧a̧-see n’ɛnɛ ha̧ ha̧‘m'i nɛ búk,
kifa nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ geemɔ lɛŋ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Elifaz be Teman baa wen, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ bíí nyɛma dea-a ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ́ ge?
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ iŋ nɛ mɔ wen tɛ ɓɛɛ.
Wen ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ ge?
Mɔ n'aa kpa tɛ de naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ ge?
Mɛ taa mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu mboo zu kɔ-mɛ
a̧ a̧ usi nɛ̀ bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ,
gɔn nɛ̀ kita zu mɛ nde?
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ ɔ gasa,
ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ bó nɛ̀ nduti-a na.
Mɛ duka ɓar mɔ er o nya-mɛ nɛ ziŋina;
mɛ duka kpɔ̧i̧ laa tɛ o wi-kɔsa yinɛ.
Mɛ kɔ̧ so mɛ ha̧ yì ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ yì gbɛ wa na;
mɛ kɔ̧ so ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí nɛ wɔ gbɛ na mbɛt.
Nù duka so nɛ́ ko wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai-te-er,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧a̧ a̧ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ fara hi̧i̧.
Mɛ ndak so nɛ o ko-gera nɛ̀ géé er,
kai nɛ mɔ ko o be-oi er-wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i sa pɛ́r ba mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-kíì nɛ mɛ iŋ mgbara-a na pi̧ kíì tɛ-mɛ.
Sa̧a̧mɔ kifa tum, ɓɛɛ mɛ zɔk mɔ ɓɔna;
ɓɛɛ gasa ha̧a̧-yì hur zu-mɛ lɛŋ.
Bíí lɛŋ iŋa Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ yiwese mɛ.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ sɔra ɔ kusa ga.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ́‘e: «Sɔ̧ iŋa nɛ́ ge?
A̧ nyɛma mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ mgbara tura-zan hɔ tɛ-wi nde?
O tura-zan kpee yí-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk mɔ na,
a̧ yar kɔ̧-a̧ zik nɛ yiwese mɛ ɓɛɛ.»
Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ba nɛ́ gba̧‘a̧ yuwar
nɛ o ɗaŋwi baa so nde?
Wa lɛŋ fee so nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi kɔ-wa,
hee naŋ-tua nɛ yì aŋ a taŋ'ɛ ga.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ dúk nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ ɛɛ,
nɛ́ ge a̧ Wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nyɛma mɛ de in yɛɛ ge?»
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧a̧ so demɔ dun tua kɔ-wa;
zu-a'i, ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa duk nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ a̧.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ zɔk tika-a kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ kpaa desee;
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ bo zu-a na tɛ zɛkɛɗi wa, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
«O wisɛn k’ɛɛ kuma kaɗi,
mbɔi kɔ-wa bia wee lɛŋ!»
Mɛ̀ ɗáfí mgbara mɛ in Sɔ̧ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ bɔtɛ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ pii ɗoŋ.
Mɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
mɛ̀ kásí wen kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ see-mɛ.
Kà mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
kà mɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ tua kɔ-mɛ mbɛt,
mɛ́ tɛ́ kpà ŋgai woyo.
Kà mɛ̀ síŋ o kìì-lɔr a nù,
in de sa̧a̧ lɔr mɛ nú Ofir a ɗɔɔ yì si mgbara ta mɛ,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ lɔr kɔ-mɛ,
in dɔka bu-mbɔi kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ o gba demɔ kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ba yí-mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn sitɛ a̧.
Mɛ tɛ kɔf'aa, a̧ tɛ kpɛk,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ déé mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ ha̧a̧ nú wen-aa ɓɛɛ.
O ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ nyɛk yuwar kɔ-mɛ.
Wen Sɔ̧ ɗaŋ nɛ o ee-zu-mɔ ko wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wi-mɔka-see.
A̧ kpasi nɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na,
er-mɛ a̧ dúk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧,
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job kifa nú:
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna mɛ nyɔŋ nin-am zu gɔfamɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ aia-nú kɔ‘m
Kà‘m íŋ so fara n'am tɛ kpa Sɔ̧ sɛnɛ,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ hɔ ti damti kɔ̧-a̧.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ ba tɛ‘m'i ha̧ a̧;
ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔk.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ zii so kifa-nú kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ;
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ zii mɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m!
A̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba so nɛ ŋgai duk nɛ̀ zu in am nde?
Weyaa, a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ yeŋ nɛ́ zer-aa tɛ wen kɔ‘m ɛ̧.
Hegɔ, nɛ́ wi de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen in a̧,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpasi tɛ wen nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba'm ti wi-gɔn-kita zu'm.
Ɓɛɛ kà‘m nɛ́ si daŋa-wese, a̧ bo hi̧i̧ na,
kà‘m nɛ́ si yee-wese, mi zɔk a̧ na mbɛt.
A̧ de nɛ ŋma tom si zu-zan mɛ nde?
Mi kpa a̧ hi̧i̧ na.
A̧ hu̧sa̧ hu̧si sɛn ndaa-zan nde?
Mi zɔk a̧ hi̧i̧ na mbɛt.
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ iŋa yuwar n'am ba lɛŋ;
kà a̧ wé‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ gbo nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ hee lɔr ga.
Naŋ-am ɓaa so nɛ́ oi pata naŋ-a,
ɓɛɛ mi ndak kànà nɛ́ ɗoŋ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧,
mi a̧r na mbɛt.
Mi e geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ geemɔ na;
mi kasa so o wen nɛ gboo nɛ nú-a kɔ̧ see-am.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧, mɔ n'aa hoka a̧a̧ sɛnɛ;
nɛ́ o'o tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ e mɔ‘i duk o?
A̧ de nɛ mɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧.
A̧ ɗafa mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ e pɛm nɛ mɔ;
war kɔ‘m n'aa ɗafa mɛ de in am'i, a̧ tɛ de kànà.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ kà a̧ dúk katɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ kíì de'm dee;
kà‘m tá mɔ sitɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m naka.
Sɔ̧ gbina gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ‘m.
Zu-a'i, mi fe nɛti ha̧ zaŋzɛ mɛ de na;
mɔ kpɔk, a̧ dor gba-tum mɛ́ tik zu'm na.
Wen ge sa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ e ŋma ŋgimbi wen gɔna kita,
ha̧ o wi nɛ mbo zu ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk wese'i na ge?
O bíí ɗɔŋ nɛ
ɓɛɛ o ŋma daia kɔ‘i nɛ́ o mɔ-dai-zuzu.
Wa ba nɛ tuifuu ko o be-oi yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa baa ndai ko ko-gera nɛ ziŋina.
Wa ndak nɛ o wi-kpa-mɔ-na yinɛ yuwar;
ŋma mɔ nɛ o wi-kɔsa tɛ de bo na,
kànà nɛ hu̧sa̧ tɛ ɓɛɛ.
Wa gbo si ŋga-gbárà nɛ tutuyɛ sut
hee tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ ga,
wen kia nyɔŋmɔ mɛ dai nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa.
Wa gɔn nɛ hoe kpɛɛfɔ wen nyɔŋa-a,
ɓɛɛ wa ɓii waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko o wi-ɗaŋ.
Wa ɔ nù mɛ zɛ nɛ géé tɛ, laa bo tɛ-wa na,
borgo mɛ kpe nɛ tɛ-wa wen gɛ̧ɛ̧ bo na mbɛt.
Kórò zu kaya ŋma nɛ wa;
fara-hu̧si bo na, ɓɛɛ wa ɛk nɛ tɛ-wa nɛ ta.
O bíí ɓar nɛ be-oi nú bere nàà kɔ-wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa kaia mɔ ko o wisan nɛ ziŋina.
Wa e wa mɛ yar nɛ géé tɛ, laa bo na;
ɓɛɛ wa dee ha̧ wa mɛ tui sika-nyɔnɔ nɛ mgbaɓa-nú,
ɓar nɛ nɔ́ fara-vati-nɔ̧́ ko o ŋma bíí,
vati nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wa beka nɔ na.
O wi-zɔk-bɔnɛ gɔfi nɛ mɔ sɛn saaye,
o wi-ba-da̧i̧ hiɗi nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ zii aia-nú tɛ pɛrti ŋgayamɔ nɛ de'i na.
O wi-de-ŋgayamɔ nɔ‘i kɔ̧ kɔ‘i sa̧a̧mɔ na;
wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ sa̧a̧mɔ, wa kɔ̧ nɛɛ nɔ̀ sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Wi-gbɛ-zu kur kɔ‘i mɛ gɔna mɔ,
gbɛ nɛ wi-kɔsa in wi-kpa-mɔ-na;
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ a̧ yara zu̧ nɛ mɔ.
Wi-de-dàlà pɛm nɛ yee-wese;
a̧ hu̧si nɛ tɛ-a yak nɛnɛ,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, ŋma wi-zɔk-wi bo na.
Wi-zuzu kom nɛ tua nɛ ti-tum,
ɓɛɛ mɛ wese a̧ hu̧sa̧;
a̧ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧mɔ na.
War ko o wi nɔ‘i, gɔnamɔ-tuyɛ nɛ́ tum-fio;
kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa iŋa nɛ́ o mɔɔ-kíì mɛ ti-tum fio.
Wi-ɗaŋ ba nɛ yì yaknɛ;
fom tika zu fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ beka ba yuwar fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓɔna.
Fara ko o fio gur wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kora nú-gbɛŋmɔ nɔ nɛ yì-kórò ɓɔrɔ'ɛ ga.
Tɛ wi-ko-a bíí ɗoŋ-aa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nɛ mɔɔ-de-tortɛ ko o dɔk;
wi iŋ oi-aa ɓɔna.
Ɗaŋmɔ kaɗa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ te gbin nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
A̧ usa so bɔnɛ ha̧ ko-yar-ndɔra,
a̧ de demɔ in ko-gera na.
Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai mɛ ɗaŋ wan-ŋgai yinɛ;
a̧ kura in a̧, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi ta'e wi beka duk siti ɓɔna.
Mɔ kpɔk, Sɔ̧ e nɛ a̧ mɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ yí-a mbaɗi nɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ko wi’ɛi, nɛ́ tɛ ŋma be ŋgimbi tikiɗi
a̧ a̧ duk nɛnɛ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ kaɗa;
a̧ tika hee kan-mboŋgo nɛ‘i gbin’ɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kor hee sunu nɛ‘i zuɗi’ɛ ga.
Kà nɛ́ bòó a̧‘i na,
o'o tɛ e wen kɔ‘m tɛ geemɔ o?
Wi nɛ tɛ kifi nú‘e mi nɛ wi-ndela nɛ́ o?
Bildad be Sua baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mɔɔ-wan in ŋgayamɔ nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk tɛ kusa fara kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ.
Wi nyɛma mɛ tɔr o gii betom kɔ̧-a̧ nde?
Nɛ́ o a̧ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛk zu a̧ na o?
Bíí tɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ti Sɔ̧ hee ge?
Bíí nɛ̀ okoo koa nyɛma mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ yi Sɔ̧ nde?
Nyaŋa-zɛ nɛ tok yi-a na’ɛ,
in o sɔra nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ yí-a na mbɛt’ɛ,
kà bó nɛ̀ kokoɗo bezaŋ Adam
hee dɔk ga’ɛ nde?
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Job baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mɛ iŋa wán gbáká wi-ziɓa,
in ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ wi nɛ̀ ŋgai bo na, na nde?
Mɛ iŋa kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi nɛ̀ iŋ mgbara mɔ na,
in usa yuwar deemɔ nɛ de-a na nde!
Mɛ́ tɔ̧́ kɔ-mɛ dɔka wen nɔ'ɔ ha̧ o nde?
Mɛ́ kpá wen nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ́ o tɔ̧ nɛnɛ o?
O wi nɛ fea ya ɗuka fara nɛ gana gan ɗuka gba-tɔp
nɛ̀ o mɔ ya ɗɔɔ-aa mɛ nak nɛnɛ,
wen fara ko o fio hu̧si yí Sɔ̧ na;
ŋma mɔɔ-kpe
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ tati ká̧-zan mɛ ŋgɔn see zu géé fara;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ga̧i̧ nù e zu geemɔ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpe yì e kɔ̧ tura-zan,
ɓɛɛ dita-a de ha̧ tura-zan mɛ ai na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpe damti
A̧ zika gba-tɔp nɛ kirkiti-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ kirkiti-mɔ‘i a̧ sa̧a̧mɔ in tum kpa ŋmaa sɛnɛ.
O mbiŋ-tɔn-yiwese nak nak,
wen kíì baa wa tɛ tuɓa da̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ gba-tɔp;
nɛ́ tɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ gana nɛ zu Rahab.
er-a toka ndiɓa sar.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ o géé be ka̧-nú tom kɔ̧-a̧,
n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ zii nɛ́ be giti-a tikiɗi ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbák ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ o?
Job tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti woyo:
Nɛ̀ nin Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpasa,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
nɛ̀ bɛ̧ gɔna kita zu'm in nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m,
ŋgimbi n'am bítí ɔm,
nɛ̀
ndàrá-nú‘m beka tɔ̧ ŋma ɗaŋ wen na,
ɓɛɛ leɓ‘am beka de ndela na mbɛt.
Kóó ge, mi beka kpɛk wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na!
Mɔ n'am de na, mi beka kpɛk'e mi dea na
hɔ wese fio kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ yor kànà zu kpasawen kɔ‘m,
mi beka e duk na;
taamɔ kɔ‘m usi ŋma ɗaŋmɔ n'am dea tɛ duka-a kɔ‘m na.
Mɔ a̧ kpa wisɛn kɔ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɔ kpa nɛ̀ wi-ɗaŋ'ɛ ga!
Mɔ a̧ kpa wi-de-ŋmaa in am
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɔ kpa nɛ̀ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ'ɛ ga!
Ɛnɛ‘e, ge a̧ ɗaŋwi tɛ e nɛ ta,
ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ ba
Sɔ̧ tɛ zii aia-nú kɔ̧-a̧,
ŋgimbi nɛ ŋga bɔnɛ tɛ tik nɛnɛ zu a̧ nde?
A̧ bó nɛ́ bíí-duk nɛ desee
wen zu Sɔ̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ na,
kóó bíí-e-see tɛ kɔfa Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi lɛŋ na mbɛt.
War-a kɔ‘m, mi usi nɛ ŋgai deemɔ ko Sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi hu̧si taamɔ ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɛnɛ lɛŋ zɔka mɔ‘i kaɗi ga,
wen ge s’ɛnɛ wor mɔ sɔɔ géè ge?
Mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ e
wen wi-ɗaŋ in wi-de-ŋgamɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Kà o bem kɔ-wa nɛ́ dɔka,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ha̧ gba-paa mɛ kum wa,
o bezaŋ-wa beka kpa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ na.
Ŋga zɛɛ tɛ kum oi o bezaŋ-wa,
ɓɛɛ o ko-gera kɔ-wa beka hi̧i̧ wa na.
Kà wi-ɗaŋ in wi-de-ŋgamɔ nɛ́ kpaa mbɔi hee fuunu ga,
kà wa nɛ́ kpaa zɔm dɔka laa hee zɔ̧́
wa a̧ mɔi̧ kànà: nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ tɛ pi̧ pi̧a-a̧;
war ko sede kɔ-wa, nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ a̧ tɛ kai.
Tua kɔ-wa nɛ́ géé mbul wanto,
nɛ́ géé tua-duk-nɔ̧́í̧-fɔ.
O wanmbɔi nɔ‘i ɔ nù mɛ zɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ kaɗa;
kà wa bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tùn, ɓɛɛ yàà, ŋma mɔ bo ɓɔna.
Gasa kíì ba wa hee mbɛŋ a̧ hu̧ra wa ga,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ hara-búk tɛɛ ba wa yinɛ;
gba-búk nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ daŋa-wese
kaia wa yaknɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ fara kɔ-wa.
Sɔ̧ pi̧ nɛ wa, kó bó na,
ɓɛɛ wa ye tɛ yuu ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɛ́ fara kɔ-wa mɛ a̧ o bíí duk sɛnɛ,
ɓu nɛ̀ er, dɔm nɛ̀ fɔ̧i̧-desee zu tika-a kɔ-wa.
Fara kpa bu-mbɔi,
in fara fɔr lɔr a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
Wi kpa boi ɗɔɔ nù;
wi nɔ̧́í̧ ta, ɓɛɛ wi kpaa ndɛrɛ.
Wi e wee ti-tum ɗɔɔ ɗuka nù kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧,
mɛ kii nɛ ta.
Wan-za̧-lɔr ga̧i̧ tɛ nyak
mii nɛnɛ de nɛ tom nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ fara-duk ko o bíí,
tɛ ɗuka fara nɛ bíí iŋ na.
Zu nù dɛm kɔ‘i nɛ nyɔnɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɗɔɔ nù ɗaŋ lɛŋ ŋa̧a̧ er-wa hee wee a̧ dɔɔ ga.
Tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e Safir a̧a̧ kɔ̧ o ta fara'i,
ɓɛɛ fuu lɔr a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ mbɛt.
Yí o tama kɔɓi fara'i na,
o nɔ̧́í̧-ba-mɔ iŋ yuwar si sɛnɛ na;
dila ɓir sɛnɛ na,
o saɗi-ba-mɔ ba yuwar'i na mbɛt.
Bíí mbaŋ nɛ o ŋga ta;
wa za̧ nɛ o gasa kaya hɔ ɗɔɔ-aa mɛ.
Kɔ̧ ta mɛ lɛŋ yuwar kɔ-wa aa ŋmaa,
ŋma de mɔ nɛ yí-wa yaka zu a bo na.
Zu-zer gɔna wen zu wa;
hegɔ, wa baa mɔ nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧-a̧ e zan.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, wi kpa de?
Iŋamɔ duk de?
Mɔ nɛ bíí tɛ ha̧ mɛ kpa nɛnɛ wi iŋ na;
kpaa-a zu nù fara nɛ bíí ya sɛnɛ bo na.
ɓɛɛ gba-tɔp mbɛt'e, a̧ bo ɗɔɔ wi na.
Kóó nɛ̀ kii lɔr, wi nyɛm mɛ hi̧fi nɛnɛ na,
kóó nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi na mbɛt.
Wi beka ba lɔr mɛ nú Ofir
kóó gbɛ̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e kɔrnalin,
kóó tu̧ ta hee gba̧a̧-yí-zan ga nɛ‘i sa'e safir
mɛ we nɛ̀ a̧ na.
Wi beka ba lɔr,
kóó ŋma de toka-mɔ zar-zar ŋgɛ́lɛ́lɛ́
kpánà nɛ‘i dee nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr nyɛm a̧ na,
kà bó nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-nyaŋa in bu bereŋ ta na mbɛt.
Kia-a mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana de kísí.
Ta nɛ ɔ tara mɛ nú Etiopii nɛ‘i sa'e topaz
nyɛm géé nyɛma ŋmaa in a̧ na;
de sa̧a̧ lɔr hɛɗi ka̧ tɛ a na.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ́ bɔɔ nɛ̀ de?
Iŋamɔ duk de?
Bíí nyɛm mɛ zɔk a̧ na;
o nɔ̧́í̧ zɔk a̧ na mbɛt.
zer-wi zia kɔ‘i nɛ́ nyɛrɛ-a ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ iŋa yuwar n'aa tɛ nɛnɛ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ iŋa fara n'aa duk sɛnɛ;
wen a̧ zɔk mɔ hɔ nduti nù,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi n'aa wee nɛ búk,
in dɔka yì,
ŋgimbi n'aa ha̧a̧ nɛ heembea ha̧ kórò,
in n'aa mbaŋa nɛ yuwar ha̧ pi̧i̧-kórò,
a̧ zɔka iŋa-mgbara-mɔ; a̧ wee a̧,
a̧ mbaɗa a̧, a̧ kia mɔ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ bíí:
«Yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ;
yuu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ iŋamɔ.»
Job tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti woyo:
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ba'm pi̧ tɛ ŋgimbi n'am duka so sɛnɛ nɛti,
ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN pɛma so nɛ‘m,
ŋgimbi nɛ lamba kɔ̧-a̧ duka so nyɛk nɛnɛ zu'm,
nɛ̀ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mgbɔ so nɛ‘m nɛnɛ nɛ ti-tum o?
Ŋgimbi'i mi so nɛ bíí tɛ mɔ lɛŋ,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ duka so in am,
o be wiwii kɔ‘m ya so zik am.
Gɔtɔ naŋ-am lɛŋ so nɛ fara-kok ko yibere;
nɔ̧́ fok so nɛ zaŋ ta gbonɛ ha̧‘m.
Ŋgimbi n'am gbo so si nú ye,
mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ duk sɛn nú gara,
kà o be-ŋgaiwi zɔ́k am,
ɓɛɛ wa ee yuwar ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ o sɔkawi kura yor;
o gasawi kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen,
kpe nɛ nú-wa nɛ er,
ɓɛɛ ger o be-wan kpee si̧nyɔm,
leɓe-wa fo mɔ ɓɔna.
Wi nɛ zii so'm fara tɔ̧ wen zɔn nɛ‘m,
bíí nɛ zɔk am lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ de wen kɔ‘m.
Mi kpasi so nɛ́ wi-kɔsa nɛ̀ ai nú ak nɛ gbakamɔ,
in be-oi nɛ́ bo so nɛ̀ bíí-ɗoŋ-wa na.
Mi dee ha̧ see o ko-gera mɛ de,
ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ hɛɗa mɛ ga̧ tok so nɛ de yoŋgo zu'm.
Dee deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a duka so nɛ laa-kpe-tɛ kɔ‘m,
deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a so nɛ gba laa kɔ‘m,
in mɛtɛwol kɔ‘m.
Mi so nɛ gbaayí o wi-zɔk-mɔ na,
in naŋ o wi-kum.
Mi so nɛ dáà ko o wi-kɔsa,
mi gɔn so kita zu o bíí n'am iŋ na nɛ yuwar-a.
Mi so nɛ wi-gbin-gba̧a̧-nin wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ,
ɓar nɛ mɔ nɛ wa ba yinɛ nú-wa.
Taamɔ kɔ‘m so'e mi tɛ sɔk kaɗi sɛka'm fea,
zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m tɛ dɔk hee nyɛmɛ ga.
Mi duka so hee ŋma te nɛ kunin ye ɗɔɔ yì,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ mbɛŋ waia tɛ gbaa er-a’ɛ ga.
Gásì kɔ‘m tɛ duk siti,
ɓɛɛ ŋgaŋa kusaa kɔ‘m tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ ŋgaya-a.
Ŋgimbi'i bíí duka so pɛm nɛ‘m mɛ zii mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧;
wa zii so wen kɔ‘m nɛ oi nú wa.
Kà‘m tɔ̧́ wen kaɗi, ŋma bíí mɛ kifi nú sɛnɛ bo na;
wen kɔ‘m ye so zer-wa mɔktɛ mɔktɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mbɛŋ ai nɛnɛ kóɗóŋ-kóɗóŋ'ɛ ga.
Bíí duka so pɛm am
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i pɛm nɛ kórò'ɛ ga;
nú-wa ɓa pɛm nɛ̀ wen kɔ‘m hee yì-kórò a̧ wa pɛm ga.
Wa ya so pɛm nɛ mɔ n'am tɛ de lɛŋ sitɛ wa nɛ desee;
kà‘m mám mami sitɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa ta kɔ-wa'e nɛ ɔrmɔ.
Mi duka nɛ́ gasawi usi nɛ yuwar ha̧ wa;
mi duka mgbara wa hee ŋma wannu mgbara o wi-biro kɔ‘i ga,
hee wi-ga̧-see o wi-bɔnɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ kinii mi kifa nɛ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi
ko o géé obem mɛ ɗoŋ,
n'am beka kpɛk so ha̧ dáà kɔ-wa
mɛ duk mgbara o toyo pɛm nɛ̀ mɔ-dai kɔ‘m na.
Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ pɛm so tɛ o wi nɔ‘i
nɛ ŋgai kɔ-wa kaɗa kaɗi’ɛ ge?
Bɔnɛ in kaɓa baa ŋgai kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa yak si ŋga-gbárà mɛ, kii nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ.
Ŋma mɔ bo hi̧i̧ na, kànà nɛ fara dita-see ɓɛɛ.
Wa ɓi nɛ wa̧a̧-zɔ̧ nɛ tɔŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ká̧ tɛn,
wa nder nɛ wa̧a̧ be-te,
aŋ nɛ ŋma kunin-te
O dɔka bíí ndaka wa yinɛ mgbara wi;
gai nɛ mɔ a zu wa hee o wi-zuzu ga.
Wa ɔ nɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgere gboŋgo,
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ o gbamgba in kɔ̧ o di̧i̧-ta nɛnɛ.
Wa zaŋ nɛ nú-wa hiɗi nɛ mɔ nɛ ti mɔ,
gbisi nɛnɛ zu ŋmaa ɗɔɔ tɛn-dara.
Wa nɛ́ o be-búù nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ nin na,
nɛ‘i ndaka tɛ nù yinɛ nɛ̀ ɓira-te.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kinii, mi kifa nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-gima kɔ-wa,
mi nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧ tua-wen kɔ-wa.
Mi nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛr yí-wa ɓɛɛ wa yu'm yuu;
aa sap yí‘m de ŋma mɔ tɛ-wa na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dɔmgba hɔkɔ-góò kɔ‘m pi̧ nɛ búù zu'm ga,
wa dor tɛ-wa tɛ dee mɔ nɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ in am na.
Nɛ̀ war wii-er-am wa nɛ oi gii lɛŋ kɛr nɛ‘m,
pi̧ nɛ̀ ndɔra ha̧‘m;
wa ba nɛ zu duk nɛ̀‘m ha̧‘m mɛ yɔ.
O nde wa gɔna ɗoŋ-am lɛŋ;
bíí lɛŋ kii nɛ war mɛ ɗaŋ am yinɛ;
ŋma wi-dor-wa bo na.
Wa gbina garo kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa zuɗi nɛ̀ zu o gbina ŋgeŋ mgbúzúk pii tɛ‘m.
Gasa zɔm kíì baa'm,
ɓɛɛ ndak mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m yinɛ hee búk ga;
bɔtɛ kɔ‘m yambala hee tura-zan ga.
Kinii, bɔnɛ yee tɛ‘m kaɗi;
mi a̧ ga̧ tɛnɛ‘i.
Mɛ zɛ gba̧a̧ tɛ‘m lɛŋ gbina ko bɔnɛ,
o nik tɛ‘m ɔm tɛ ko nyimmɔ na.
Sɔ̧ mɔi̧a laa kɔ‘m kasi nɛ‘m nɛ̀ ŋgai,
a̧ nɔmɔi̧a̧ ger gba laa kɔ‘m nɔ nɛ ger-am;
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba'm pi̧ nù ɗɔɔ ɓɔtɛ
hee mi nɛ fuunu in bùk ga.
Sɔ̧, mi hiɗa mɔ ai nɛ̀ nú sitɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kifi nú ha̧‘m na;
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧‘m kinii;
ɛ́nɛ́ tika zu'm nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ búk mɛ ba'm yaknɛ
hee nyaŋa a̧ tui am ga;
ɓɛɛ gba búk-kórò pi̧‘m si hi̧i̧ si hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Mi iŋa ɛnɛ ba nɛ‘m nɛnɛ ha̧ fio,
fara nɛ o bíí lɛŋ kpa ŋmaa sɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi n'aa nyɛi̧ er-a mɛ de mɔ,
aia-nú beka gbak ɓɔna,
wen gɔfamɔ nɛ̀ gbo kɔ̧ nú-wi’ɛi
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ŋgamɔ n'aa de in a̧.
Zu-a'i, bo nɛ mi hi̧a̧ so kɔ̧a̧ wen bɔnɛ-ɓɔsi
ko o wi-bɔnɛ na nde?
Ko de so'm ha̧ wi-kɔsa na nde?
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'am pɛm so nɛ́ bɔtɛ, nɛ́ bɔnɛ a̧ hɔa;
mi pɛm so nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ tum hɔ.
See-am gɔn ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa,
wese-bɔnɛ hɔɔ zu'm.
Mi nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ oi tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tu̧u̧ ɗaŋ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ wese a̧ dee hegɔ na;
kóó sɛn mgbara bíí mbɛt,
mi yor ai nɛ̀ nú, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ.
Kinii mi nɛ́ gba-toyo;
mi kifa nɛ́ wi-gbam-yari in o dìrí.
Ndàrá tɛ‘m tu̧a ɓɛɛ or;
tɛ‘m nɛ̀ kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ́ géé wee.
Ger koloŋ kɔ‘m nɛ́ aia-nú;
fol kɔ‘m bíí nɛ́ gima taŋ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧.
Mi ha̧a̧ so nú tɛ káná mɔ‘e,
gbaayí‘m a̧ ká yeŋ be-zɔŋa na.
Nɛ́ ge mɔ ge a̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ ge?
Ge a̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ɗafa
e nɛ̀ yiwese wen bíí ge?
Ɛnɛ‘e a̧ ee bɔnɛ wen o wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na,
in ŋgamɔ wen wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, a̧ iŋa naŋanɔ kɔ‘m,
a̧ iŋa oi naŋ-am lɛŋ.
Mi nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ̀ zu ndela nde?
Naŋ-am kpàná nɔ̀ wen zu̧u̧ mɔ nde?
Sɔ̧ a̧ we'm tɛ de mɔɔ-we-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ iŋ ndé, mi de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na.
Kà‘m nɛ́ a̧ra̧ tɛ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧,
kà see-am nɛ́ dee wɔ-mɛ nɛ yí‘m zɔk,
kà ŋma ndiŋ a̧ baa er-am,
mi nɛ́ guna mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ à̧ nyɔ́ŋ nyɔŋa-a;
wa a̧ zuɗi o be-te n'am ŋmaa.
Kà wɔ kóò ko ŋma'm nɛ́ dea'm,
kà‘m nɛ́ pɛma a̧ ɗoŋ nú tua kɔ̧-a̧,
kóò kɔ‘m a̧ de tom hɔ̧na fuu ha̧ ŋma bíí,
ɓɛɛ bíí à̧ ɔ́ in a̧ mbɛt,
wen mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɗaŋ mɔɔ-búù,
nɛ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ gɔn kita zu-a.
Mɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ duk nɛ́ ŋma wee nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ am ɗaŋ yinɛ,
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ waya-mɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ hɔ gun-aa mɛ.
Kà‘m nɛ́ bìì so zu wen ko wi-de-tom,
in ko kó-de-tom kɔ‘m ŋgimbi nɛ wa a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ wen in am,
nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ de ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ kur in am ge?
A̧ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ ak mɔ, nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ kifi nú sɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ ge?
Sɔ̧ nɛ dee am pi̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ á̧ dee wa mbɛt;
nɛ́ kpɔk a̧‘i a̧ ɓoo yɛ lɛŋ.
Mi bɛ̧ɛ̧ so kɔfamɔ ko o wi-kɔsa nde?
Mi dee so ha̧ yí ko-gera mɛ́ gar nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ nde?
Só nɛ́ ɛ̀n’ám a̧‘m nyɔŋ so nɛ mɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ be-oi kpa war kɔ‘i na nde?
Weyaa, ká‘m bítí nɛ̀ bem mɛ, a̧‘m dai nɛ̀ a̧;
koa'm pi̧ nù hegɔ a̧‘m kù̧ú̧ nɛ̀ naŋ gbaka ko-gera.
Wi-kɔsa nɛ̀ bo so nɛ̀ laa na,
in wisan nɛ̀ mɔɔ-kpe-tɛ bo so na
tok so de yoŋgo zu'm,
wen laa-buma-sami kɔ‘m n'am kpe so nɛ tɛ-wa na nde?
Kà‘m nɛ́ nasa be-oi,
wen n'am iŋa'e o bíí-yor-ɗoŋ-am ti kita a̧a̧ sɛnɛ wó,
tɔlɔ-ɓaa'm a̧ nyun,
ɓɛɛ ɓaa'm a̧ gbin nyɛm nɛ gbɛŋgɛlɛ-a.
Wen mi yu so nɛ́ usa bɔnɛ ko Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ mi nyɛm mɛ yor ti gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Kà‘m é so ta nɛ̀ lɔr,
kà‘m tɔ̧́ so a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ-duk-tɛ kɔ‘m,
kà desee kɔ‘m lɛŋ dúk so zu dɔka mbɔi kɔ‘m
in o kpaamɔ kɔ‘m,
kóó kà‘m zɔk so de nyɛka wese,
in de daŋa-a ko nyaŋa-zɛ,
ha̧ see-am mɛ ba wa,
ha̧‘m mɛ́ gbɛ zugur-am
mɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ duk nɛ yɔɔ-kaya nɛ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ gɔn kita zu-a,
wen nɛ́ káfá Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ.
Mi dee so tortɛ wen tika-a ko wi-sɛn-am nde?
Mi dee so nyɛŋɛ ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ kpaa a̧ nde?
Leɓ‘am de ɗaŋmɔ,
fom nɛ a̧ gbákná a̧ fee na mbɛt.
Ge gɛnɛ ge nɛ tɛ so kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e
wi nyɔŋ kpoo zaŋ sur na nɛ́ o?
Mi e so ha̧ o gɛnɛ mɛ ɔ ɓɔn zan na;
nú tua kɔ‘m duk so nɛ hu̧i̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ o wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ.
Mi hu̧si so ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m hee o ŋma bíí ga
mi hu̧si so yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m kɔ̧ see-am na,
wen mi de so kíì giiwi na;
mi yu so zɛkɛɗa-wi ko o bíí
ha̧‘m mɛ kpe nú‘m hu̧si nɛ̀ tɛ‘m kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m na.
Ho! O'o tɛ zii am o?
Sɔŋkur wen kɔ‘m nɛ mɔ‘i.
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ kifi nú ha̧‘m.
Nɛ̀ war ko baa-wen zu'm'i,
mi kpɛka mɛ tui tui-a;
mi tɛ hɛr mɔ‘i zu'm hee mɔɔ-wan ga.
Mi tɛ we ɗoŋ naŋanɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ ha̧ Sɔ̧;
mi tɛ yor ti a̧ nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ hee be-wan ga.
Mi nɛ́ dee so ha̧ fɔ kɔ‘m mɛ ku̧i̧ mɔ zu'm,
mi nɛ́ dee ha̧ nù nɛ‘i gaia mɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧,
mi nɛ́ nyɔŋa waya-tom er o wi-de-tom sɛnɛ géè,
gbɛ nɛ̀ wa kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ nù‘i à̧ dɛ́m nɛ o ɗaŋ tɛn-te in o sɛ̧ɛ̧-zɔ̧,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ alkamaari in be-fon
Sɔŋkur wen ko Job nɛ́ mɔ‘i!
O bíí nɔ‘i taar'i ee kifa nú ha̧ Job duk, wen nɛ̀ Job tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e ndé, wi nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
See Elihu bem ko Barakɛl be Buz, nú-gara ko Ram nyima. A̧ dee nyimsea in Job wen nɛ̀ Job ta'e, wi dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gan Sɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ see-aa ɗaŋ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ nɔ‘i taar'i mbɛt, wen nɛ̀ wa iŋ so kifa nú ha̧ Job nɛ de-a na, ɓɛɛ dúk hee Sɔ̧
Elihu tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Job nɛti na wen nɛ̀ o dɔka-a nɔ‘i taar'i gana so a̧ nɛ̀ pɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Elihu zɔka'e, o wi nɔ‘i bo nɛ̀ kifa-nú ɓɔna, see-aa nyima.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Elihu baa wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mi nɛ́ be-ŋgaiwi, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o gasawi;
hegɔ, kíì de so nɛ‘m,
mi yu so nɛ mɔ mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'am iŋa h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi taá so, nɛ́ gasawi a̧ tɛ́ tɔ̧ wen,
nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka pɛ a̧ tɛ usi iŋa-mgbara-mɔ;
mɔ kpɔk, nɛ̀
nɛ́
Bo nɛ́ kpaa dɔka pɛ a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ na,
kóó sɔki a̧ de ha'i mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ
nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a ɓɛɛ na.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm tɔ̧‘e, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ usi mɔ n'am iŋa.
Mi pɛma so nɛ́ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́,
mi yeŋa zer-am tɛ o taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi ga̧a̧ tɛ‘m zii nɛ̀ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ kifa kpasa nú ha̧ Job bo na;
ŋma bíí kifi nú nyɛm yí wen kɔ̧-a̧ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́‘e, wi kpaa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́‘e nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ nyɛma kifa nú ha̧ a̧,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ bíí na, na.
Bó nɛ́ Job tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na,
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ kpɔk kifa nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧‘m tɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen ha̧ a̧ na.
Wen bó nú-wa ɓɔna, wa kifi nú ɓɔna,
wen kaɗa kɔ̧ nú-wa.
Mi pɛma mɔ ha̧ wa tɔ̧ wen wó, takaɗi;
ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɛ́ tɔ̧ wa iŋ ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ mi a̧‘m tɛ ha̧ war kifa nú kɔ‘m kinii;
mi mbɛt, mi tɛ usi mɔ n'am iŋa.
Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ dɔka-a mɛ tɔ̧;
wen daŋ nɛ‘m kinii.
Kɔ̧ zaŋ-am mɛ dúk hee dɔ̧ɔ̧́ a'i kpee nú-a e sɛnɛ ga,
duk hee mbe kpáná-dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ ga.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ ga̧;
mi tɛ hu̧i̧ nú‘m mɛ kifi nú.
Ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ mi tɛ ye nɛ́ ɗoŋ ŋma bíí na;
mi beka mbɔŋgɔli bíí na.
Wen mi iŋ mbɔŋgɔla bíí na;
à̧ bó só hegɔ, wi nɛ̀ dee am gbɛɛ so'm yinɛ kaɗi.
Kinii, Job, mɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧;
mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ o wen kɔ‘m lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ hu̧i̧ nú‘m
ha̧ wen mɛ gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ war ger-am kinii.
Nɛ́ mɔ nɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-am a̧‘m tɛ́ tɔ̧;
kànà nɛ́ kpasawen a̧‘m tɛ́ tɔ̧ ɛ̧́.
Nɛ́
nɛ́
a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ́ kifi nú ha̧‘m,
mɛ̀ ɗáfí tɛ-mɛ nɛ̀ de-a, a̧ mɛ̀ kifi!
Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, ti Sɔ̧ mi nyɛma ŋmaa in mɛɛ;
nɛ́ nù a̧ wa dee nɛ‘m mbɛt.
Hegɔ, ká kíí tɛ‘m de mɛ na;
ká mɛ ta'e mi tɛ nasi nɛ mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai kɔ‘m na.
Wen'i nɛ̀ mɛ́ tɔ̧a̧,
nɛ̀ ɓɔna wora-a kɔ̧ zer-am'e,
wi nɛ sa̧a̧ bíí, wi bo nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ na;
war-tɛ-wi ɔ sa̧a̧, ŋma ɗaŋmɔ bo zu-wi na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ gɔn tɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ wen e nú-wi,
zɔk nɛ̀ wi hee wisɛn ga,
pi̧ nɛ̀ poka naŋ-wi,
mbaɗi nɛ̀ o naŋanɔ kɔ‘i lɛŋ wó‘i,
mi tɛ kifi nú sɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ‘e,
mɛ́ yɔɔ kaya, wen Sɔ̧ gana bíí.
Ɓɛɛ wen ge mɛ pi̧ wen zu a̧,
a̧ n'aa bó nɛ́ wi-ha̧-kifa nú zu o deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na ge?
Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen kɔ‘i nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bíí a̧ kɔɓi na ɛ̧́.
A̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ bíí nɛ̀ ɔɔ-zu in nɛ̀ hɔɔ-zu mɛ zɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ɗuka ya ba nɛ̀ bíí gɔn yara,
ɓɛɛ a̧ hu̧i̧a̧ nú tua zer-aa
mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-a pi̧ nɛ kíì tɛ-a,
wen ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ e yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘i duk,
in ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ ŋmaŋ tɛ-a mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Sɔ̧ dor nɛ a̧ kɔ̧ war-ger-fio,
in tɛ nɛa-a si nú kɔ̧-fio.
Ŋma ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ usa mɔ ha̧ bíí
tɛ nyimmɔ-zɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ ba tɛ wi’ɛi gɔn yara,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o gba̧a̧ tɛ-a lɛŋ nyim nɛnɛ.
Kɔ̧ nú wi’ɛi ɔ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
de nyɔŋmɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti de tɛ-a ɓɔna.
A̧ ɔ̧k nɛ gbaayí gbaayí,
o gba̧a̧ ŋgazi-a lɛŋ ya zan.
Duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ hɛɗa ká̧ nú kɔ̧-fio;
duka-kpasa kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er o wi-gbɛ-bíí.
Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma betom mɛ yiwese kpɔk
mgbara o dɔka-a booro nɛ́ bòò mɛ́ àm mɔ,
usi nɛ yuwar mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi tɛ de,
de nɛ̀ ko ha̧ a̧, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧‘e:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ zir si kɔ̧ fio na,
mi kpaa mɔ mɛ gɔn nɛ̀ zu a,»
ɓɛɛ kpoo-tɛ wi’ɛi tɛ kpa ŋgai,
tɛ-a tɛ pii ɗoŋ hee wan mɛ ŋgimbi daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Kà a̧ áí nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kpɛka;
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpiɗa nɛ̀ desee sɛn ti Sɔ̧
nɛ̀ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ pii ɗoŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a woyo.
A̧ tɛ bìì gima ti o bíí tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mi dee so ɗaŋmɔ, mi yɔɔ kaya deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
zu-a'i, Sɔ̧ de mɔ in am hee war kɔ‘m ga na.
A̧ baa'm yinɛ nú kɔ̧ fio,
ɓɛɛ duka-a kɔ‘m a̧a̧ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ.»
War ɔ dɔka,
Sɔ̧ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ bíí
dak nɛ bíí yinɛ nú kɔ̧ fio,
ba nɛ a̧ e tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ ko o wi nɛ ya kpasa.
Job, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m,
mɛ̀ dúk nɛ̀ oi nú-mɛ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ wen.
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ bòó nɛ̀ ŋma wen mɛ̀ tɔ̧, mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m;
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna ha̧ wen kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ yor.
Ɓɛɛ wen nɛ́ bòò nú-mɛ ɓɔna,
mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ wen kɔ‘m;
mɛ̀ dúk nɛ oi nú-mɛ ha̧‘m usi iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Elihu tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti:
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mɔ.
Wen nɛ́ zer-wi a̧ kɛ̧ mgbara wen,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kɔ̧ nú-wi kpa nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔŋmɔ'ɛ ga.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a;
mi in'nɛ̀ɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ duk nɛ de-a.
Job'e wi de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ de mɔ in wi nɛ yuwar-a na.
Tɛ kia deemɔ kɔ‘i nɛ yuwar-a,
wa ba wi e tɛ wi-ndela,
wi de ɗaŋmɔ na, zu-a'i, góò pi̧i̧ wi sar.
Ŋma bíí hee Job ga a̧a̧ sɛnɛ?
A̧ tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen hee yì a̧ a̧ nɔ ga.
A̧ nɛ́ nɔ̀ kpɔk in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ;
kpɔk yuwar ko o wi-ɗaŋ a̧ a̧ ba.
A̧‘e, «Ŋma mɔ nɛ bíí kpa
oi duka-a nɛ de-a in Sɔ̧ bo na.»
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-zii-mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m!
Sɔ̧ de ɗaŋ na! Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ de gɔɔmɔ na!
A̧ de mɔ in bíí nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom ko wi’ɛi;
a̧ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí nyɛm nɛ mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi de.
Nɛ mbetɛ, Sɔ̧ bó nɛ́ wi-de-ɗaŋ na,
Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ yɔ́ kaya deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛ ee nù er-a nde?
Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ee nɛ tom zɔka kao er-a nde?
Kà a̧ tá so nɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ wen zu-a mɛ tɛ-a ɓɛɛ,
dak nɛ
mɔ nɛ ya kpasa lɛŋ tɛ̀ɛ́ kum war kpɔk;
bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ si ɗoŋ tɛ fuunu.
Job, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mɔ ga,
mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ wen kɔ‘m.
Wi-sɛ̀n-dee-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɛma mɛ ɔ wan nde?
Hee ge mɛ tɛ ba wen zu zɔm gasa bíí ko wan-aa,
Wan-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ge?
Wi nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu:
«Hoo! Yokoɗo-o!» nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk.
Nɛ́ a̧ á̧ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi:
«Ɛnɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-gbɛ-zu.»
A̧ ye ɗoŋ o be-wan na;
a̧ kɛ̧ mgbara wanmbɔi in wisan na,
wen wa lɛŋ nɛ́ a̧ á̧ dea.
Kóó mɛ ɗuka zaŋzɛ, bíí a̧ fe'i.
Kà o bíí kúr, ɓɛɛ gasawi yɔa;
kóó wi foo o ŋga wan na mbɛt, wa tika.
Sɔ̧ zɔk nɛ deemɔ ko bíí;
a̧ mbaɗi nɛ naŋanɔ kɔ-wa.
Kóó nɛ́ gba tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ hee tum-fio ga
nyɛm mɛ hu̧si o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ yí-a na.
Sɔ̧ ɓa ɗoŋ bíí nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
sɛka wi’ɛi hɔɔ ti a̧ ti kita na.
A̧ beka kii ndaa-mɔ kaɗi sɛka a̧ ndaka o gasawi yinɛ
e nɛ mbe bíí oi wa na.
A̧ iŋa tom kɔ-wa;
tɛ zɛ kpɔk a̧ ira wa á nù,
ɓɛɛ ɓaa kɔ-wa á̧ kaɗa'i.
A̧ gusi wa sɛn yí-bíí lɛŋ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ ga.
O wi nɔ‘i kɔ̧ so mɛ ndak ɗoŋ-aa ɓɔna;
wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
a̧ zii aia-nú ko o bíí nɛ wa nasi zii.
Zu-a'i, kà ŋma wen ko Sɔ̧ bó só kɔ‘i sɛnɛ na,
nɛ́ o'o tɛ tɔ̧ wen zu a̧ o?
Kà a̧ bá yí-a hu̧si, nɛ́ o'o tɛ zɔk a̧ o?
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ zɔk nù nɛ de-a in bíí mbɛt;
a̧ kpɛk ha̧ o wi-iŋ-sɔ̧-na mɛ ɔ wan na,
wen ká wa tɛ̀ɛ́ tui pɛ́r ha̧ gii wi.
Kà ŋma bíí tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧‘e,
wi zɔka bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i, wi beka de woyo ɓɔna;
Sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ-a, a̧ a̧ usi o wan nɛ‘i iŋ na,
kà‘i nɛ́ dee mɔ de na, ha'i e duk wó,
tɛ taamɔ kɔ-mɛ, Sɔ̧ a̧ usi bɔnɛ oi-aa nde?
Mi iŋa mɛ kpɛk na,
ɓɛɛ hee mɛ a̧ tɛ hok, bo nɛ mi na ga,
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ iŋa.
O wi-zii-mɔ tɛ kifi nú ha̧‘m,
in o wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ zii wen n'am tɔ̧‘i tɛ tɔ̧:
«Job tɔ̧ wen nɛ tum;
gba̧a̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧ bo na.»
Kɔ‘m, wa a̧ we Job hɔ sɔŋkur-aa
ha̧ a̧ kifi taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ piiɗoŋ,
wen zu tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧ hee ɗaŋwi ga.
Zu yɔɔ-kaya kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ dee ŋgazu e sɛnɛ,
pi̧ nɛ̀ sii-kafɛ mgbara yɛ,
ba nɛ̀ wen zu Sɔ̧ siti.
Elihu tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti woyo:
Mɛ‘e, wen kɔ‘i ɔ sa̧a̧
tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧‘e, wi dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gan Sɔ̧, nde?
Wen mɛ‘e, kóó wi dee ɗaŋmɔ,
kóó wi de ɗaŋmɔ na, nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ yí-a.
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ kifi nú h’ɛ́nɛ́,
in o sɛm kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ mbáɗí yiwese mɛ̀ zɔ̀k;
bó nɛ́ o tura-zan kusa gan mɛ nyɛmna na nde?
Kà mɛ̀ dé ɗaŋmɔ, mɔ‘i ba nɛ tɛ Sɔ̧ nde?
O ŋgazu kɔ-mɛ de kɔ‘i nɛ́ ge ha̧ a̧ ge?
Ŋma mɔ n'aa kpa in nɛ̀ gbak a̧
tɛ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ́ ge?
Nɛ́ o ŋma-mɛ a̧ zɔk bɔnɛ ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ;
deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a gbak nɛ o bíí hee mɛ ga.
Gɔfamɔ tɛ nasa ŋmaa
in
Ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí mɛ tɔ̧‘e,
Sɔ̧-e-wi nɛ̀ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ bìì gima mɛ zaŋzɛ,
nɛ̀ usi mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́ gan o saɗi zu nù,
in nɛ̀ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ gan o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese,
a̧a̧ déè ndé wó'ɛ, bo na.
Hegɔ, kóó ɛɛ aia nú sitɛ a̧, a̧ beka kifi nú na,
wen zu saka-yí ko o wi-ɗaŋ.
Nɛ́ o géé tum-wen a̧ Sɔ̧ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
zii mɛ kifi nú sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ.
Mɛ‘e, wen kɔ‘i lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti a,
wi pɛm kànà nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ wi iŋ oi-aa na;
kifa-er-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ bo na,
a̧ pi̧ nú tɛ ɗaŋmɔ ko bíí na.
Bura wen ko Job nɛ́ géé búk;
gba̧a̧ wen-aa bo na.
Elihu tɔ̧ɔ̧ siti:
Mɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ-mɛ a̧ mɛ̀ pɛ́m mɔ tikiɗi ha̧‘m usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ;
ŋma wen a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ wen Sɔ̧.
Mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kii iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
