mɛ si kafɛ oi nú wi nɛ dee am.
Wen kɔ‘m bó nɛ́ ndela na;
mɔ n'am yor zu a mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i, mi iŋa.
Sɔ̧ ɔ gasa, a̧ e bíí tɛ geemɔ na;
a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai, a̧ kpai taamɔ
A̧ e ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ mɛ duk kpasa na;
a̧ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ wi-kɔsa.
A̧ zik ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na;
a̧ e wa kpɔk fara in o wannu zu damti,
mɛ ya tɛ gasamɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kà poka nɛ́ yee naŋ bíí,
kà ŋgamɔ nɛ́ kpaa wa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ usi tom kɔ-wa nɛ wa dee so ha̧ wa hegɔ,
wen wa ŋmaŋa so tɛ-wa ti a̧.
A̧ tuɓi nɛ da̧ mbaŋ nɛ tɛ-wa,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e wa a̧ é ɗaŋmɔ dúk.
Kà wa nɛ́ zia wen'i mbo nɛ zu,
wa tɛ fe tɛ bɔtɛ,
ɓɛɛ pɛ kɔ-wa kaɗa zaŋ desee.
Kà bó hegɔ na, wa tɛ kum;
wa tɛ fe lɛŋ, wa iŋ mgbara-a na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o ɗaŋwi nɛ̀ nyimsea kɔ-wa ŋgaia see-wa,
wa gɔm er ha̧ Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi n'aa usi nɛ̀ bɔnɛ ha̧ wa
Wa fee nɛ̀ ŋgaiwi;
mɔ kpaa wa hee fio ko wi-de-dàlà
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bɔnɛ á̧ Sɔ̧ bá gbó nɛ̀ wi nɛ zɔk bɔnɛ;
nɛ́ tɛ usa bɔnɛ a̧ a̧ dak nɛ zer wi-kɔsa.
Mɛ mbɛt, a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ ba mɛ yinɛ fara-bɔnɛ,
e tɛ gasa fara-yɔli
ha̧ o de nyɔŋmɔ mɛ kpe zu taŋge kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ dák kita pi̧ zu mɛ,
wen nɛ tɛ́ ba mɛ‘i tɛ kai o mɔɔ nɔ‘i yinɛ er-mɛ.
Ká ɗaŋsee-bɔnɛ ír mɛ pi̧ tɛ ŋgazu na;
ká mɛ ɔr tɛ-mɛ yɔ nɛ kaya'e mbɔi kɔ-mɛ tɛ gbo mɛ na.
O mbɔi in o kìì lɔr,
kóó nɛ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ beka nyɛm na.
Ká mɛ e tɛ-mɛ pɛm nɛ zɛ
nɛ̀ o dukbíí tɛ yɔ nɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Ká mɛ zik tɛ-mɛ sitɛ ɗaŋmɔ na;
nɛ́ wen ká mɛ tɛ tik sɛnɛ à̧ mɛ zɔ́k nɛ̀ bɔnɛ.
Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k! Sɔ̧ ɔ gasa in ŋgayamɔ kɔ̧-a̧;
ge wi-usi-mɔ ge a̧ tɛ gan a̧ ge?
O a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ wen zu duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ o?
Ge bíí ge a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e, a̧ de mɔ de na, ge?
Ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ zɔna tom kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ o bíí gasi e nɛ gima na.
Bíí lɛŋ zɔk nɛ tom'i;
wa ya nɛ nyɛi̧a-a mbaɗi nɛnɛ.
Sɔ̧ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ iŋ gasa-a kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ ndaa-a na;
bíí nyɛm mɛ tɔr pɛ-a na.
Nɛ a̧ a̧ mɔi̧ yì,
de nɛnɛ mɛ kifi tura-zan,
mɛ hɔ nɛ kórò
a zu o bíí zaŋnu.
Tura-a ko zan in tuɓa-kórò,
nɛ́ o a̧ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbara-a o?
Mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ de ha̧ kórò mɛ pi̧ zu wa,
in nɛ́ a̧ a̧ hura ndaa o gba-tɔp nɛ yì.
Nɛ́ wa a̧ a̧ ba gɔn nɛ kita zu o dukbíí,
ha̧ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ dɔka-a mbɛt.
Kɔ̧ er-a yiitoo lɛŋ nɛ́ pi̧i̧-kórò a̧ duk sɛnɛ;
fara n'aa kɔ̧a̧ lɛŋ a̧ toma wa si sɛnɛ.
Dika-kórò usi nɛ tɛa-a kɔ̧-a̧;
o gii mɔ-dai mbɛt iŋa ŋgimbi n'aa hɛɗi mɛ tɛ.
Yí see-am to too kpɛl-kpɛl,
ɓɛɛ ŋmana kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí dika ger-a;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí géé tuɓa-a n'aa tuɓi.
A̧ dik dam yiwese lɛŋ,
pi̧i̧-kórò kɔ̧-a̧ gɔma hɔ nduti nù mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ tiger-a mgbimgbi;
wi zii nɛ tuɓa ger-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ giti a̧ de mɔ,
a̧ dor o mbaŋa-kórò ɓɔna.
Sɔ̧ túɓí, ɓɛɛ hiɗi-wi gɔna;
a̧ de nɛ o gasamɔ n’ɛɛ iŋ mgbara-a na.
Ŋgimbi n'aa tɔ̧ ha̧ ɓɔrɔ mɛ ai a nù,
ŋgimbi n'aa de ha̧ zɔm kórò mɛ zuɗi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dora o bíí tɛ tom kɔ-wa;
hegɔ ɓɛɛ o bíí n'aa dea kpa mɔɔ-de na.
O boko-nam mbɛt sii ɗoŋ si fara kɔ‘i;
ɓɛɛ wa hu̧sa̧ kɔ̧ di̧i̧ kɔ-wa.
Gba búk-kórò gbo nɛ̀ fara kɔ‘i mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧ yuu yírírí nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Kà Sɔ̧ ɔ́m, ɓɛɛ yì kifa ɓɔrɔ;
ɓɛɛ zu yì ŋgaia hee boi ga.
A̧ a̧ de ha̧ kórò mɛ kok tɛ o tura-zan;
ɓɛɛ a̧ pɛsa wa dam fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ oi pi̧i̧-kórò,
tur nɛnɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'aa usa ha̧ wa zu nù.
Kóó nɛ́ pi̧i̧ bɔnɛ,
kóó nɛ́ dea-a ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ a zu nù,
kóó nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo zu a̧, nɛ́ wa à̧ à̧ tóm.
Job, mɛ̀ tá mɔ tɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i;
mɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ-mɛ, mɛ̀ zɔ́k o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ ko Sɔ̧.
Mɛ́ iŋa hee ge Sɔ̧ tom nɛ wa,
de nɛnɛ ha̧ pi̧i̧-kórò mɛ tok mgbara tura-zan ga nde?
Mɛ́ iŋa yuwar tom n'aa de ha̧ o bu-zan mɛ ga̧i̧ ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ tik nù na’ɛ nde?
O mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɔ‘i kana nɛ́ ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kpasa iŋamɔ.
Mɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ ɓan na gbɛŋa ɗɔɔ laa
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wee-búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ yu nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ká gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa nɛ nù'ɛ.
Mɛ gbaka a tɛ ɗafa gba̧a̧-yí-zan nɛ ŋgaya-a
hee boi nɛ ɔ yɔka ha'i mɛ zɔk yí-wi sɛnɛ ga nde?
Mɛ̀ úsí mɔ n’ɛɛ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧‘m.
Ɛɛ bó nɛ̀ kifa nú mɛ ha̧ na wen ɛɛ ya ti-tum.
Wi mbaŋ tɛ-a sɛka a̧ iŋa'e, mi tɔ̧ nɛ wen, na;
wi beka tɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ sɛka a̧ iŋa na mbɛt.
Hee gɔma-yí ga, wi zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ ɓɔna,
wen tura-zan kpee yiwese;
kà búk yú ɓɛɛ ndaka tura-zan yinɛ.
Sa̧a̧mɔ tok nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ zar-zar
hee lɔr ga;
gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ mɔɔ-kíì nyɛmna zika a.
Ɛɛ nyɛm mɛ hɔ katɛ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ na;
gásì kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ ŋgai in tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ de ŋgamɔ in wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ, o bíí tɛ yu a̧;
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nú tɛ o wi nɛ tɔ̧‘e,
wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, na.
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧ Job nɛ ti gba búk-kórò hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ ɗaŋ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ‘m,
tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɛ bíí iŋ zu-a na’ɛ ge?
Mɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ wiwii;
mi tɛ ak mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m.
Mɛ́ duka so déè ŋgimbi n'am dee nɛ nù ge?
Kà mɛ nɛ́ iŋa, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m, wen mɛ́ iŋa mɔ nyɛmna.
Nɛ́ o'o wee naŋ nù o, mɛ iŋa nde?
Nɛ́ o'o pi̧i̧ nyak yɔr nɛ naŋ-a o?
O naŋ nù duk zu ge?
Nɛ́ o'o ee ta-mgbii-aa,
ŋgimbi nɛ o sɔra-tuyɛ a nɛ nú tɛ gima,
in o betom ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ bíí nɛ gima nɛ desee o?
Nɛ́ o'o kpee nú tua e zu tɔp
ŋgimbi n'aa ŋmai̧a nɛnɛ gbonɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ o?
Nɛ́ mi a̧ pi̧i̧ kutu tɛ-a hee laa ga,
in mi a̧ kpee tɛ-a nɛ tura-zan hee kúfa ga.
Mi a̧ gɔna so heembea dor nɛ ŋgai-kin-tɛ-a,
mi a̧ mana so o nú tua-a,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Mɛ tɛ́ tɛ hɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧,
ɓɛɛ mɛ beka yak siti na;
ŋmaŋa-tɛ kɔ-mɛ
Nɛ̀ mɛ̀ dúk nɛnɛ‘i,
mɛ ha̧a̧ nú kóó war kpɔk ha̧ wese mɛ kur nde?
Mɛ usa fara ha̧ gɔna ndaa-zan
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kasi nù nɛ ka̧ nú-a,
ŋmɛkɛsi nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ nde?
Nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ nù gbo nɛnɛ,
hee dap nɛ‘i gɔn zaŋ kpáná-gìì ga;
ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ zu nù gboo a zan hee de goia-laa ga.
Ŋgimbi'i sa̧a̧mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ bia,
ɓɛɛ er nɛ wa hu̧i̧a̧ nɛ ŋgɔn gbina.
Mɛ hɔɔ fara nɛ gba-tɔp gbo nɛnɛ tɛnɛ nde?
Mɛ yara hɔ nduti
Mɛ zɔka nú tua ko fio nde?
Mɛ zɔka nú tua gba tum-fio kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ nde?
Mɛ iŋa gasa nù nde?
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen-aa, wen mɛ́ iŋa o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Fara ko sa̧a̧mɔ a̧a̧ si de?
Ye ko tum a̧a̧ déè?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kíí wa fara kɔ-wa mɛ tɛnɛ
kà mɛ nɛ́ iŋa yuwar-nɛ sitɛ kɔ-wa.
Mɛ́ tɛ iŋ mɔ‘i lɛŋ wen wa baa ko so mɛ kaɗi;
zɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ dɔka batɛ.
Mɛ yee fara ko o ɓɔrɔ
Mi ɗafa so wa e wen ŋgimbi bɔnɛ,
wen wese ŋgamɔ in wese biro.
Sa̧a̧mɔ gbo tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ge fara ge?
Búk mɛ ndaa-zan yu tɛnɛ nɛ̀ déè nde?
Nɛ́ o'o mbaŋa yuwar ha̧ yì-kórò o?
Nɛ́ o'o pi̧i̧ war ha̧ dika-zan o?
Nɛ́ o'o de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ a zu nù nɛ bíí bo sɛnɛ na o,
in a zu ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ fara-duk ko bíí na o?
Kórò‘i de ha̧ nù fara'i mɛ mɔk,
ha̧ o mɔ mɛ hɔ in ha̧ o zɔ̧ mɛ ɓɔ hi̧i̧.
Kórò a̧a̧ nɛ dáà kɔ‘i nde?
Nɛ́ o'o de ha̧ mbɛŋ mɛ hui o?
Nàà ko ɓɔrɔ nɛ o?
Mbɛŋ nɛ ba gɛ̧ɛ̧ kifi ɓɔrɔ, nɛ́ o'o dea o?
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ de ha̧ yì mɛ ŋgai hee ta ga,
ɓɛɛ zu yì ɔ kpoe-kpoe.
Mɛ nyɛma mɛ hɛr Gbaayí-be-zɔŋa
kóó bura Hɛr-paa nde?
Mɛ nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ o zuduk sɔra mɛ gbo tɛ́ ŋgimbi-a,
in foo o gasa sɔra gú nɛ̀ o be-a gbonɛ nde?
Mɛ iŋa heembea mɔ mɛ́ yiwese?
Nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ o sɔra zu nù nde?
Mɛ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ tura-zan
ɓɛɛ gba kórò hɔɔ a zu mɛ nde?
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ de ha̧ kórò mɛ pi̧,
ɓɛɛ o pi̧i̧-kórò tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ: «Ɛɛ a̧a̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧» nde?
Nɛ́ o'o ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ gata-kɔra o?
Nɛ́ o'o ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ desa
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mɔi̧ o tura-zan
gbai nɛ̀ o dak-yì mɛ yiwese,
ha̧ fuunu mɛ kifi ɓɔtɛ,
ɓɛɛ o kìí-nù
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ gbɛ saɗi ha̧ nana dila nde?
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o be dila,
nɛ̀ wa mgbuti nù kɔ̧ kɔ-wa,
hu̧si nɛnɛ ti mɔ nde?
Nɛ́ o'o kii nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o gba-kɔra,
ŋgimbi nɛ o bem kɔ-wa ai nɛ nú sitɛ Sɔ̧, tik nɛ̀ ŋgata o?
Mɛ iŋa ŋgimbi nɛ o gbadua zu kaya ko nɛnɛ?
Mɛ zɔka o zambɛrɛ
Mɛ tɔra zɛ zaŋ kɔ-wa dam lɛŋ?
Mɛ iŋa ŋgimbi nɛ wa ko nɛnɛ nde?
Wa gu ko nɛ̀ bem,
ɓɛɛ zaŋ-wa kaɗa nyima-a.
Kà gba̧a̧-tɛ o bem kɔ-wa ŋgáí,
kà wa gásí mɔ kɔ-wa ɛ̀nɛ́-wa kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ wa yaka, wa pii ɗoŋ tɛ nàà kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ o'o bura tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ
ha̧ a̧ mɛ yak yar nɛnɛ sɔɔ géè o?
Gbárà nɛ́ fara n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧;
nù tɔŋ nɛ́ fara-ɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ mam kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o gasa giti mɔ mɛ saaye;
a̧ zii tuɓa da̧ ko wan-tuifuu na.
A̧ yar nɛ mgbara kaya kii nɛ be mbɔɗi zɔ̧ wen nyɔŋa-a:
fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Nám tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ de tom ha̧ mɛ,
kóó ɔa-a kɔ̧ tua nɛ̀ mɛ̀ á o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ sɛnɛ nde?
Mɛ tɛ pi̧ kpáŋá ger-a,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ wa fɔ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ha̧ mɛ nde?
Mɛ tɛ e ta nɛ a̧ wen nɛ a̧ ɔ ŋgaya,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ee tom kɔ-mɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nde?
Mɛ tɛ e ta-mɛ nɛ a̧
ha̧ a̧ mɛ mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ a kɔ̧ dam nde.
Ndao gɔm ɓaa nɛ desee,
ɓɛɛ wɔr-ɓaa-a in buma tɛ-a de hee war ko nɔ̧́í̧-gba-dɔya ga na.
A̧ pi̧ o kui kɔ̧-a̧ mbɔɗɔnu,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ee ha̧ wee-nù mɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ mbaŋ.
A̧ ta'e naŋ bíí nyɛma mɛ gba wa,
kóó saɗi zaŋbɛɛ nyɛma mɛ i̧si̧ wa mbaŋ na mbɛt.
A̧ de mɔ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ hee gɔni nàà ga;
wen kɔ̧-a̧ bo tɛ bɔnɛ n'aa zɔka géè na.
Wen nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dɔɔ a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ;
a̧ kɛ̧ ŋma iŋamɔ ha̧ a̧ na.
Mɔ kpɔk, kà a̧ kúr mɛ ma yí,
nyaŋa in wan kɔ‘i nɛ geemɔ ti a.
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ nyaŋa?
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ de ha̧ dɛdɛ mɛ hɔ gun ger-a?
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpíɗí hee gbarŋgaɗi ga nde?
A̧ nɔn nù zu ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ desee kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ,
ma nɛ yì si nú boi-biro.
Wen kɔ̧-a̧ bo nɛ̀ kíì in bele na;
a̧ yu mɔ ti gba-paa na.
Yi gba-paa in labo tok see zu a,
giti ɓaro de mɔ gɔn see-aa.
Kà a̧ zíí dɔma mbia, a̧ yor ɓɔna;
tɛ-a nak, ɓɛɛ a̧ bu̧i̧ bu̧i̧.
Tɛ giti mbia, a̧ ufa zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧;
ɓɛɛ só ɓéé nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a, a̧ kɔɓa biro,
in tuɓa da̧ ko o gasawi bá nɛ̀ gayamɔ-biro kaɗi.
Nɛ́ tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ a̧ fambɛɛ hu̧i̧ nɛ ɓaa-a
si ka̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ,
wen ha̧ mbe buma tɛ-a mɛ hɔ woyo nde?
Nɛ́ tɛ
in a̧ a̧ de nɛ yaa kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara ta zu kaya mɛ nde?
A̧ ɔ kɔ̧ ta;
fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ndɔŋ zu kaya mɛ.
A̧ duk hi̧i̧ zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
kii nɛ̀ saɗi n'aa tɛ ba.
O bem kɔ̧-a̧ nyɔŋ nɛ tɔk-saɗi zaŋ sur;
fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ wɔr-mɔ
GASA WAN saa Job, ɓɛɛ ak a̧:
Wi nɛ̀ si kafɛ in Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ'ɛ
a̧a̧ nɛ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ zu'm nde?
Wi nɛ̀ kpɛr in Sɔ̧'ɛ a̧ kífí nú!
Ɓɛɛ Job kifi nú ha̧ GASA WAN:
Mi só nɛ́ ò mɛ kifi nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ o?
Mi mana nú‘m.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen nɛti,
ɓɛɛ mi beka tɔ̧ mbe-a ɓɔna;
mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen nɛ dɔka-a,
ɓɛɛ mi nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ siti na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú ha̧ Job nɛ ti gba búk-kórò mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Mɛ̀ yór nɛ̀ wiwii;
mi tɛ ak mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m.
Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e gɔna kita kɔ‘m hee geemɔ ga,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba wen zu'm ha̧ wen kɔ-mɛ yor nde?
Te er-mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai hee kɔ‘m ga nde?
Ger-mɛ mgbimgbi mgbimgbi hee kɔ‘m ga nde?
Mɛ̀ gáɓí tɛ-mɛ nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in gásì;
mɛ̀ pí̧ gasamɔ in zɔnamɔ tɛ-mɛ.
Nyimsea kɔ-mɛ à̧ kúr,
mɛ̀ zɔ́k yí o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ ha̧ gba̧a̧ tɛ-wa gbin;
mɛ̀ mbáɗí o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ ha̧ foe ba wa;
mɛ̀ mbɔ́lí o wi-ɗaŋ ɓɔ́n bɛɗɛ.
Mɛ̀ á wa lɛŋ ɗɔɔ fuunu war kpɔk,
mɛ̀ kár wa nɛ dere.
Hegɔ mi nɛ tɛ‘m tɛ zɔn mɛ,
wen mɛ gana wa nɛ ŋgai te er-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgùɓú:
Mi dee a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am dee nɛ mɛ ga;
a̧ nyɔŋ nɛ zɔ̧ hee ndai ga.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgai nɛ a̧a̧ zu goto-a,
in wan nɛ duk kpiikisi-a!
Dom-aa ɔ hee ŋga te
ku-a lɛŋ nɛ́ gee ɗaɗi a̧ mbali zu ŋmaa.
O gba̧a̧-tɛ-a, mɛ̀ zɔ́k kànà nɛ́ ndɛrɛ,
ɓɛɛ o gba̧a̧-ŋgazi-a kànà nɛ́ ŋga boi.
A̧ duk nɛ̀ gasa tom kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ a̧
A̧ nyɔŋ mɔ zu o zu-tɔ̧́,
o saɗi zaŋbɛɛ de saa nɛ katɛ a̧.
A̧ ɔ nu ti o kɔŋgɔvale;
ɓɛɛ o toro-yí-mbuu kpee zu a̧.
O kɔŋgɔvale de nɛ gi̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ o gasa te ká̧ zaŋ yì ya zik a̧.
Kin-yì de kíì pi̧ tɛ-a na;
kóó yí Jurdɛn ŋmai̧a nɔ nú-a,
kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ duka-a.
Nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ ba zu duk nɛ̀ a̧,
ɓɛɛ gboo zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ pi̧ nyak sɛnɛ o?
Mɛ nyɛma mɛ tui gɛ̧i̧-ŋgando ba nɛ ndiɓa
Mɛ tɛ pi̧ gba-paa leɓ‘a nde?
Kóó ɗɔia zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ pi̧ ga̧u̧ sɛnɛ,
kóó toka yaŋgara-a sar nde?
A̧ tɛ ai nú ha̧ mɛ,
kóó tɔ̧ɔ̧ de ga̧a̧ wen ha̧ mɛ nde?
A̧ tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ,
mɛ duk nɛ bara kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Mɛ tɛ de saa nɛ̀ a̧ hee nɔ̧́í̧ ga nde?
Mɛ tɛ pi̧ nyak naŋ-a ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ be-okoo-a
mɛ de nɛ saa nde?
O wi-gbɛ-zoro tɛ pɛr gɛnɛ-a nde?
O wi-ɗɔr-mɔ tɛ a̧k a̧ wen ɗɔra-a nde?
Mɛ tɛ ŋgasi góò tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ mɛ toka zu-a nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ nde?
Mɛ̀ wé géé tama tɛ-a;
tɛ-mɛ beka bi ɗoŋ-aa kà mɛ dé nɛnɛ woyo na.
Duka-tɛ kɔ-mɛ‘e wi tɛ gan a̧, nɛ́ ɔra tɛ;
géé zɔka a̧ hegɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ a̧a̧ mbɔɗɔnu.
Ŋma bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ see mɛ kii nú-a bo na;
kà bó nɛ‘m, o'o tɛ ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn ti'm o?
Nyamandoi ko o a̧a̧ zu'm o?
Mɔɔ ɗɔɔ yiwese lɛŋ nɛ́ kɔ‘m.
Mi beka kpe nú zu o boi tɛ-a,
ŋga tɛ-a in bɔɗa tɛ-a na.
Nɛ o'o hu̧i̧a̧ yí-see laa kɔ̧-a̧ o?
Nɛ́ o'o gboo mgbara nin-a o?
Nɛ́ o'o hu̧i̧a̧ mana nú-a
fara nɛ o gba̧a̧ nin-a ya nɛ mɔɔ-kíì sɛnɛ o?
Ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ nɛ géè ŋgee
a̧ nɛk ye ŋmaa;
wa yɛk nɛ ŋmaa,
búk ɓir mgbara wa na;
wa fura ŋmaa ndaɗi,
ŋma mɔɔ-nyun-wa nú ŋmaa yinɛ bo na.
Kà a̧ záfí, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ gɔma;
gbaa yí-a ɔ hee gɔna ndaa-zan ga.
Leɓe-wee in tuɓa-wee
gɔm nɛ̀ kɔ̧ war ger-a.
Zi-wee tur nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ gbonɛ
hee zi-wee-yì-kpánà nɛ̀ kpa̧i̧ ga.
Wee gɔm nɛ̀ kɔ̧ war ger-a
ɓɛɛ búk kɔ̧ nú-a ufa kɛ̧i̧-wee gɔn yoŋgoŋgo.
Ŋgai tɛ gun ger-a bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧ na;
ɓɛɛ sùm-sùm tɛ-a ba nɛ bíí.
Zɔm goia ndara-tɛ-a yee ŋmaa
ɓɛɛ ŋgai kpoe-kpoe tɛ-a.
See-aa nɛ́ ta;
kànà hee ŋga ta-hɔ̧n-mɔ ga.
Kà a̧ kúr ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ kíì dee o gasawi;
kà a̧ mísí̧ dom-aa, ɓɛɛ bele zara wa.
Gba-paa nyɛm mɛ tok a ye,
kóó sɛ́ɛ̀ in góò na mbɛt.
Boi nɛ́ zɔ̧ ti a̧;
ndɛrɛ nɛ́ ɓuka te wen-aa.
A̧ yu pia-a ko gbaayí-góò pii tɛ-a na;
ta nɛ‘i pi̧ mɛ yo nɛ a̧ nɛ mbula zɔ̧ wen-aa.
Ɓira-te nɛ géé kan sɛn tɛ a;
giti za
Ɗɔɔ zaŋ-aa nɛ ɓɛ̧i̧a tɔ̧ɔ̧ nú gbàrà-kpánà
n'aa gbur nɛ zu ɓɔtɛ hee boi-wa-fɔ ga.
A̧ ye ɗɔɔ yì ɓɛɛ yì nɔi̧a hee wee yì ga;
ɓɛɛ gba-tɔp tura hee zi-wee fuu-nyama
nɛ gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ kpánà-a ga.
Duia-yì oi-aa ɔ hee fɛŋa ndàrá saɗi ga,
ɓɛɛ oi mbaŋa yì kɔ̧-a̧ pɛŋa tok nɛnɛ.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in a̧ zu nù'ɛ bo na;
tɛ̀ dee a̧, kíì bo kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa na.
A̧ zɔk o wan-ŋgai hee geemɔ ga;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu o ŋga saɗi lɛŋ.
Job kifa nú ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
Mi iŋa'e ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ de mɔ lɛŋ;
ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaia gan'nɛ bo na.
Ɛnɛ‘e mi ɗaŋ nɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́,
tɔ̧ nɛ wen tɛ mɔ n'am iŋ na.
Ii, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu ɗukamɔ nɛ gana'm,
n'am iŋ mgbara-a na nɛ mbetɛ.
Ɛnɛ‘e, à̧‘m zíí wen kɔ‘i, à̧‘m é ha'i tɔ̧ wen;
wi tɛ ak am, ɓɛɛ mi kifa nú ha'i wo.
Kɔ‘m, mi zia so nɛ nyɛrɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧‘m nɛti,
ɓɛɛ kinii, mi zɔka nɛ yí‘m.
Ziimɔ baa'm, hegɔ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti, mi kaɗa;
mi kiŋgila tɛ‘m tɛ bùk in fuunu.
Ɗoŋ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ Job kaɗi, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Elifaz be Teman: «See-am nyim nyim in mɛɛ ka ba nɛ o sɛm kɔ-mɛ yiitoo, wen ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ wen tɛ‘m nɛ de-a hee Job wi-de-tom kɔ‘m ga na.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpá wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Job. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́ wa nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧ wen zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ tɛ kpɔk kale ŋgimbi'i, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Job a̧ ai nú ha̧‘m wen zu'nɛ́ mbɛt. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu a̧ a̧‘m beka de ha̧ ziimɔ mɛ ba'nɛ́ na, wen ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ de wen zu'm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Job tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ ga na.»
Ɓɛɛ Elifaz be Teman in Bildad be Sua ka ba nɛ Sɔfar be Naama nɛ́ɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ wa mɛ de, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN yeŋ zer tɛ wora Sɔ̧ ko Job.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Job biti wora Sɔ̧ wen o sɛm kɔ‘i, GASA WAN dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa o mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ siɗoŋ woyo war yiitoo.

O boko nya-a̧ in o nya-a̧ gú nɛ̀ o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ só nɛti tɛɛ lɛŋ mɛ zɔk a̧, ɓɛɛ wa nyɔŋ mɔ in a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧. Wa aia nú, ɓɛɛ wa ga̧ see-aa tɛ ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zu a̧, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ ha̧ kɔya-sede kpɔk kpɔk
GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu sɔŋkur ŋgimbi ko Job gan wan mɛ ti. Job kpaa sami booro-ɓu-zua-naar, ŋgeloba booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ndai-de-tom booro-yiitoo in nana tuifuu booro.
A̧ koo be wiwii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in be okoo taar.
A̧ aa nin o be okoo nɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: kuti-a nɛ Jɛmina,
Zu nù lɛŋ wi beka nyɛm so mɛ kpa o ŋma okoo nɛ yora zɔŋa gan o boko bem ko Job na. Dáà kɔ-wa ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ wa hee ko o bu̧i nya-wa ga mbɛt.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Job duka siti tɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-naar, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk o bezaŋ-aa ɗoŋ ŋmaa naar.
A̧ duka zu nù ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧; a̧ sɔka so nyɛmna ɓɛɛ a̧ fe.
Wi nɛ̀ kpe zer tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ
nɛ kɔ‘i nɔ̀ nɛ̀ desee.
Wi’ɛi yor gba-war ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na;
a̧ duk nù kpɔk in o wi-zɛkɛɗi Sɔ̧ na.
Desee kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ kasa heembea ko GASA WAN,
kii nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ zɛ nɛ wese.
Wi’ɛi hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma te nɛ wa guna ká̧ yì
nɛ̀ wai tɛ ŋgimbi-a, nɛ̀ wa̧a̧-a̧ kor na.
Mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ hɔ gba̧a̧ hɔɔ.
Ko wi-ɗaŋ bo hegɔ na kòò tikiɗi.
A̧ duk hee pumyulu sunu
nɛ̀ búk pɛsi dam fara lɛŋ'ɛ ga.
Wese-gɔna-kita, wen ko o wi-ɗaŋ beka yor na,
o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ beka ya mgbara
o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na mbɛt,
wen GASA WAN iŋa yuwar deemɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ war deemɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ yɔɔ-war.
Wen ge sa o dukbíí dik gɛrɛm zu ŋmaa in o ŋmaa ge?
Wen ge sa o tugun bíí tuɓi da̧ a zu ŋmaa ge?
Wen ge sa o wannu zu nù'ɛ kur zu GASA WAN ge?
Wen ge sa o be-wan e nú mɛ bɛ̧ GASA WAN
in wi n'aa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧ ge nde?
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀ɛ̀ ŋmán nyak-zɔɓɔ kɔ-wa tɛ yɛ yinɛ,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ kpɔ̧́í̧ kpáŋá kɔ-wa ger yɛ pi̧ taŋ.
Wi nɛ duk kɔ‘i yiwese mɛ‘i mam kɔ‘i nɛ wa;
wi-mam wa'i nɛ́ GASA WAN,
a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa nɛ ɗaŋsee,
a̧ tuɓa da̧ a zu wa ɓɛɛ bele zar wa a nù.
Nɛ́ mi'i ee wannu kɔ‘m zu
Mi tɛ we ɗoŋ geŋa ko GASA WAN,
nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ bem kɔ‘m,
mi a̧ koo mɛ sɔsɔɔ.
«Mɛ̀ ák am, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ o tugun bíí ha̧ mɛ nɛ mɔɔ-oi;
o nduti-nù lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ.
«Mɛ tɛ bi o nduti-nú nɔ‘i nɛ dɔ́rá-boi.
Mɛ tɛ ɗaŋ wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gba nɛ kpánà
a nù ɗɛ́sɛ́-ɗɛ́sɛ́'ɛ ga.»
Ɓɛɛ kinii, o wannu, kɔ̧ zaŋ‘nɛ́ a̧ gɔn;
o wi-gɔn-kita zu nù'ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ GASA WAN, tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a,
in ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú kíí a̧ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r ti-bee-a nɛ naka-tɛ;
kà see-aa nyim, ɛnɛ tɛ kum,
wen tɛ mɔ tikiɗi nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ kura kaɗi!
O wi nɛ hu̧si ɗoŋ GASA WAN ya kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
Gima ko David ŋgimbi n'aa yuu so nɛ mɔ yak ti bem kɔ̧-a̧ Absalɔm.
GASA WAN, o wi-nas'am dɔka nyɛmna;
o wi-kur-zu'm dɔka yak zale;
o wi nɛ tɔ̧ wen a zu'm dɔka nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ wen nɛ wa tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i beka kpasi kɔ‘i a̧ ɓɔna!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ́ ŋgee kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ zɔn am,
ɛnɛ'ɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ ba zu'm nɛ ŋgɔn.
Kà‘m sá mɔ nɛ̀ hee ger sitɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa nú nɛ̀ tɛ̀ sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.
Kinii mi ɔ nù nɛ fee-see;
mi ɔ ya ɓɛɛ mi tuna mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m
wen nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ pɛm am.
Mi yu kɔ‘m o gba giiwi nɔ‘i
nɛ̀ kɛr am mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am'i na.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr!
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpas'am na nde?
Ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan-mbɛr yí o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan-gbin gba̧a̧-nin o wi-ɗaŋ!
Yuwar-kpasa-a duk tɛ GASA WAN.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tok de yoŋgo zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ kunde.
Kà‘m sá mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m,
Sɔ̧, wan-gɔn-kita kɔ‘m!
Kà mɔ bá tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásá‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
O bíí, ɛ́nɛ́ é bɔɔ gasamɔ kɔ‘m tɛ geemɔ
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ hegɔ'ɛ wen ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ ndak ɗoŋ geemɔ in ɔramɔ hegɔ'ɛ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ nde, GASA WAN nɛ́ wan-yor-ɗoŋ o sɛm kɔ‘i!
GASA WAN zii saa-sara kɔ‘m zii.
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ nak ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ ɓɔna!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ nù gɔn gado k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛ́ɛ́m ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tá mɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí sɔ̧ nɛ yuwar-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a hee ge nde:
«Nɛ́ o'o tɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk tɛ bɔtɛ o?
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k yɛ nɛ̀ de yí.»
Desee n’ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ kɔ̧ see-am gana
tortɛ-nyɔŋmɔ in mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ ya nɛnɛ lata lata'i.
Mi ɔ nù nɛ fee-see ɓɛɛ ɓan na ya baa yí‘m
wen GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ pɛm am.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ o mɔɔ-dɔm.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tá mɔ zu gɔfamɔ kɔ‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ sara kɔ‘m zii nɛ tiger-am,
Wannu kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m!
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧‘m kɔfi!
Mi iŋa ɛnɛ zii tiger-am zii ɓɔnsɛnɛ mɛ tutuyɛ!
Mɛ gɔna-ndaa-zan mi ɗafa mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ ɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi zɛma'nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ kɔ̧ ɗaŋmɔ na!
O wi-ɗaŋ bó nɛ́ bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ beka yor ti'nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ sɛna o wi-de-mɔ de na lɛŋ!
Ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ o wi-ndela gbɛɛ.
GASA WAN sɛna o wi-gbɛ-zu
in o wi-ɔr-mɔ kai nɛ̀ mɔ er bíí.
Kɔ‘m, nɛ́ tɛ̀ gasa
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am yuu kíí‘nɛ́ gu nù ti'nɛ́ sɛn kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, tɛ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m,
wen o wisɛn kɔ‘m pɛm nɛ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn ti'm.
Ŋma kpasawen bo kɔ̧ nú o wi nɔ‘i na;
mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ gbɛɛ-zu,
kɔ̧ war ger-wa nɛ́ pɛsi-fio mgbóm-mgbóm,
wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa lɛŋ nɛ géé yɔka-wen.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu wa
ha̧ ee-nú kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu-wa woyo;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndák wa yinɛ wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale,
in wen kura-a nɛ wa kur zu'nɛ́‘i.
O wi nɛ hu̧si ká̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ ya nɛ desee,
wa a̧ de tortɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
O wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nin'nɛ́ de nɛ́ nyɛŋɛ
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ wan-pɛm-wa.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ tok de yoŋgo
zu o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛnɛ ɓora wa nɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋgee kpe nɛ ɗoŋ wi’ɛ ga.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ nyak-aa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, kà see'nɛ́ á̧ nyima in am,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de wen in am
ŋgimbi nɛ see'nɛ́ biti ɗaŋ in am na mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, GASA WAN; ŋgai bo tɛ‘m ɓɔna;
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m mɔka lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am.
Gba-gbana baa'm;
ɛnɛ tɛ tɛ bɔɔ mɛ kpas'am mɛ gese ge?
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m tɛ bɔnɛ na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am wen
Wen kà bíí nɛ́ fee kaɗi, a̧ iŋa so oi'nɛ́ ɓɔ?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ gasi'nɛ́ fara ko o fio mɛ o?
Mi gɔfa mɔ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧,
mi mbɔia wan kaɗi na nde?
Mɛ zɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ gado nɛ̀ oi mɔɔ-ɔ-nɛnɛ kɔ‘m
ɓɔɔ zɔɓɔk nɛ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ kɔ‘m.
Yí‘m fɛŋa tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ̧a̧;
yí‘m too ɓurɛ ɓɛɛ o wi-kur-zu'm kɛr kànà nɛ‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú siɓi katɛ‘m, ɛnɛ o wi-de-mɔ de na,
wen GASA WAN zia taŋa kɔ̧a̧ kɔ‘m.
A̧ zia aia-nú kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpɛk kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
Zu o wisɛn kɔ‘m lɛŋ a̧ zik!
Mɔ kɔ-wa a̧ ɗaŋ nɛ oi!
Wa a̧ pɛsi a taŋ sót-sót!
Gima nɛ David bia ha̧ Sɔ̧ wen Kus, bezaŋ Bɛnjamin.
GASA WAN, fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m nɛ́ tɛ‘nɛ́;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi nɛ nukur'am,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m er-wa yinɛ,
ká wa tɛɛ ba'm yaknɛ mɛ a̧k am pɛ́sɛ́-pɛ́sɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dila a̧k nɛ mɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ wi-kpas'am beka bo na.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
kà‘m nɛ́ ɔra bíí mɛ kai mɔ er wa ndé,
kà‘m nɛ́ kifa er ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ de demɔ in am ndé,
kà‘m nɛ́ ee ŋma wi-kur-zu'm mɛ yak géè ndé,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wisɛn kɔ‘m a̧ ndak am ba,
a̧‘a̧ i̧sa'm nɛ̀ zu kpasa,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-duk-tɛ kɔ‘m a̧ zakati fuunu.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ nyimsea!
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n ti o wi-kur-zu'm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk katɛ‘m, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gɔn gɔna kita.
O dukbíí nɛ ya zaŋnu’ɛ a̧ zik'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ sɛn zu damti k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ ɔ wan zu wa.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gɔn kita zu o tugun bíí.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu'm
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in duka-a kɔ‘m zóóŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ gbo kɔ̧ see-wi,
nɛ̀ mbaɗi taamɔ ko bíí mbɛt’ɛ, Sɔ̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ kóó-ta ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kaɗi;
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a!
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ ŋgee-kpe-ɗoŋ-am,
a̧ nɛ́ wan-kpasi o wi nɛ see ɔ tana.
Sɔ̧ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a,
a̧ de nyimsea nɛ haya-a na, ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk,
o wi nɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ a̧ na,
ɓan na see-aa nyima zu wa kaɗi.
Wisɛn a̧ bɛŋ nú gba-paa kɔ‘i,
a̧ a̧ ŋgaŋ kusaa kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ a̧ dak góò e ɗoŋ kusaa'i,
ɓɛɛ o boi-gbɛ-wi nɔ‘i kɔ̧-a̧‘i lɛŋ tɛ gbɛ kànà nɛ a̧.
O góò kɔ̧-a̧‘i tɛ kifi nɛ́ géé kan-du-wee.
Zɔ́k a̧ wo! Duk hee a̧ baa nɛ zaŋ-ɗaŋmɔ ga;
a̧ baa nɛ zaŋ-bɔnɛ ɓɛɛ ko nɛ ɗaŋmɔ pi̧ nù.
Kɔ̧ n'aa za̧a̧, nɛ́ lim a̧ a̧ gɔna;
zɔk a̧ n'aa tɛ tik lim kɔ̧-a̧‘i!
Gbɛɛ-zu kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ pii kànà ɗoŋ zu a̧ woyo;
dee ŋgamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tik kànà bɛɗɛ zu-a.
Mi tɛ de osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a;
mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; ger gima'i ndak nɛ ɗoŋ tiger gima ko Gat.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
nin'nɛ́ ɔ hura zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ!
O be geɗek bem in o zɔɗi-bem
bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ mboo ŋga fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn nɛ ti o wi-kur-zu'nɛ́
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gan o wisɛn in o wi-de-ŋgazu.
Kà‘m ba yí‘m si yiwese, kà‘m zɔk tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ dea,
kà‘m zɔk o sɔra in nyaŋa-zɛ n’ɛnɛ aa nɛ war-a,
ɓɛɛ mi taa mɔ:
Bíí nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ ta mɔ wen-aa’ɛ ge?
Bem ko Adam so nɛ́ o s’ɛnɛ yɔ ŋgimbi k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa ge?
Ɛnɛ dee bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɛm ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓɔn,
wen ɛnɛ zika a̧ nɛ̀ zɔnamɔ in gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ ea a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ er'nɛ́;
ɛnɛ ee o mɔ lɛŋ ɗɔɔ ŋgai
O sami in o ndai lɛŋ,
ká bá nɛ̀ o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ,
o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese gu nɛ o zoro
nɛ̀ yar nɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, ɛnɛ aa wa lɛŋ ɗɔɔ naŋ-a.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
nin'nɛ́ ɔ gasa zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ̀ mɔɔ-dɔm in kunde.
Mi tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ see-am lɛŋ, GASA WAN,
mi tɛ zɔn o demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Mi de nɛ nyɛŋɛ wen desee kɔ‘m duk tɛ‘nɛ́;
mi bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ.
O wisɛn kɔ‘m yu nɛ mɔ yak;
wa tira yɔɔ-mɔ ɓɛɛ wa fe ti'nɛ́‘i.
Ɛnɛ duka so zu damti-ɓa-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́
kɛ̧ nɛ̀ mgbara wen kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a
wen gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ yuwar-a.
Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ nasa o wi nɛ iŋ‘nɛ na,
ɛ́nɛ́ kuma o wi-de-ŋgazu,
ɛ́nɛ́ bìì nin-wa yinɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ŋgai ko o wisɛn kaɗa kaɗi, mɔ kɔ-wa ɗaŋa nɛ oi;
ɛnɛ ɗaŋa o gasa ye kɔ-wa
nɛ̀ tɛ-wi beka mbaŋ ɗoŋ o ye nɔ‘i ɓɔna.
GASA WAN tɛ duk zu damti kɔ‘i ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
a̧ ɗafa damti wen gɔna kita kaɗi.
A̧ tɛ ɓa wen zu nù'ɛ tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o dukbíí nɛ yuwar-a.
GASA WAN a̧ duk nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ ko o wi-bɔnɛ;
a̧ a̧ duk nɛ́ de ŋga fara-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ-wa tɛ ŋgimbi-bɔnɛ.
O wi-iŋ-nin'nɛ́ a̧ e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN;
wen k’ɛ́nɛ́, bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ e o wi-kii'nɛ́ ee duk na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ GASA WAN nɛ duk kɔ‘i zu
Kaya
ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ o gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o dukbíí.
A̧ e ha̧ tɔk-tɛ bíí mɛ a nù sɔɔ géè na;
tɛ-a bi ɗoŋ aia-nú ko o wi-kɔsa na mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k bɔnɛ kɔ‘m.
Ɛ́nɛ́ baa'm nú fio yinɛ
ha̧‘m mɛ zɔn gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn nú tua ko boko be
mi duk nɛ̀ desee wen n’ɛnɛ kpasa'm.
O wi nɛ̀ iŋ Sɔ̧ na aia a kɔ̧ lim nɛ̀ wa gɔna nɛ̀ tɛ-wa;
wa baa pɛ́r kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa tuia nɛ̀ er-wa.
GASA WAN dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ iŋ a̧ tɛ gɔna kita kɔ̧-a̧;
wi-ŋgazu dee tom kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN dee ha̧ tom'i mɛ hɛr a̧ woyo.
O wi-ŋgazu, o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ Sɔ̧'ɛ,
wa a̧ si ɗoŋ si ye ko o fio;
wen tɛ-wi beka bi ɗoŋ o wisan na ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ee-ta ko o wi-kɔsa nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ beka ɓɔn sɔɔ géè na mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mísí̧ in wa ɓɛɛ ká ŋma bíí gan zu'nɛ́ na!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu o wi-iŋ‘nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ gasa kíì tɛ o wi-iŋ‘nɛ́ na,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ha̧ wa ndé, wa nɛ́ géé bíí sɔɔ géè.
GASA WAN, wen ge s’ɛnɛ yor nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ‘m ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ hu̧si tɛ‘nɛ́ wese ŋga bɔnɛ kɔ‘m ge?
Wisan zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ tɛ ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko wi-ɗaŋ;
a̧ tika yí pɛ́r gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ nɛ̀ wi-ɗaŋ tuia ha̧ a̧.
Wi-ɗaŋ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ tɛ o mɔ nɛ̀ see-aa kɔ̧a̧;
wi-de-wɔ-mɔ ɗaŋ kɔ‘i nɛ́ nin Sɔ̧;
wi-ɗaŋ zɔk kɔ‘i Sɔ̧ hee geemɔ ga.
Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hee ndé:
«Nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ kɔ‘i ŋgɔn mɛ,
a̧ nyɛm mɛ de ŋma mɔ in am na.»
A̧‘e nde: «Sɔ̧ bo kɔ‘i na.»
Ko wi’ɛi kànà nɛ́ dee mɔ kɔ‘i yaknɛ;
ŋma mɔɔ-dor-a bo na.
Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ndé, gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ kita'i beka de ŋma mɔ in wii na.
Ko wi’ɛi kànà nɛ́ zɛkɛɗa o wi-kur-zu-a nɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ̀ tɛ-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ŋma mɔɔ-de'm bo na,
ŋma ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ tɛ kpa'm bo na.»
Kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ foma o ŋma-a nɛnɛ.
Kɔ̧ nú-a duna nɛ́ ɔramɔ in ŋgamɔ;
mɔɔ ɗɔɔ leɓe-a nɛ́ saka-yí in ɗaŋ wen.
A̧ hu̧si ká̧ o be ye tik nɛnɛ zu wi nɛ duk zóóŋ géè
mɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ;
a̧ duk kɔ̧-a̧ hi̧i̧ mbaɗi nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na.
A̧ hu̧sa̧ tɛ-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dila mgbuti nɛnɛ ti da̧a̧ zɔ̧'ɛ ga;
a̧ hu̧sa̧ mbɛɛr nɛ̀ de-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na.
Kà a̧ nɛ́ yuɓura wa nɛ̀ yɔk kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbura wa yaknɛ.
A̧ hira gu nù ndaɗi mbɛɛr hai nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na tika kɔ̧ er-a.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see-aa ndé:
«Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ kɔ‘i’ɛ,
tɛ-a ɓan nɛ̀ bìí ɗoŋ mɔ na.»
Ko Sɔ̧ kànà nɛ́ kpee yí kà a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ zɔk mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn,
tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o wi-kɔsa.
Wen ge sa wi-ɗaŋ e Sɔ̧ hee geemɔ ga ge?
Wen ge sa a̧ tɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ ndé,
Sɔ̧ beka kii mɛ de ŋma mɔ in wi na ge?
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka wan ɗaŋsee
in
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wa ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kásí wa kɔ̧ er'nɛ́.
O wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na e kɔ‘i ta nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-gbak o be-oi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín ɓaa o wi-ɗaŋ in o ɗaŋwi;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ násí wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa'i kaɗa lɛŋ.
GASA WAN tɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O wi nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na lɛŋ tɛ yambali zu nù kɔ̧-a̧'ɛ.
GASA WAN, mi iŋa ɛnɛ zii kɔfamɔ ko o wi-mɔka-see zii;
ɛnɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gɔn kita zu o be-oi in o wi-bɔnɛ nɛ yuwar-a
wen ká o bíí zaŋnu tɛ́ɛ̀ pi̧ bele tɛ wa siti.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m.
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘e,
a̧‘m yu mɔ yak hee nɔ̧́i̧ ga si zu kaya mɛ, ge?
Ɛnɛ‘e à̧‘m zɔ́k o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ŋgasi ti tum mɛ zɛk-zɛk
nɛ̀ góò mɛ pi̧ nɛ̀ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a wó‘i,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧ woyo ndé, kà naŋ tua nɛ́ gbina,
ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ de nɛ̀ tɛ hee ge nde wó‘i,
gba̧a̧ wen'i bɔɔ hee ge?
GASA WAN a̧a̧ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua kɔ‘i;
damti kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ yiwese mɛ.
Yí-a kɛ̧i̧ nɛ mɔ pii mbɔɗɔnu zu o bezaŋ Adam.
Yí GASA WAN a̧a̧ zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in wi-ɗaŋ mbɛt;
a̧ sɛna wi-ɗaŋ pi̧ er tɛ wee.
A̧ tɛ gbai kɛ̧i̧-wee nɛ oi baraadu a zu o wi-ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ ŋga wee gba-búk tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-nɔ kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a tɛ zɔk sɔnti-a.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ̀ kunde nɛ̀ nyak-aa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ, GASA WAN!
O wi-mbo-zu h’ɛ́nɛ́ bo ɓɔna;
kpasawen bo mgbara bíí ɓɔna.
Bíí lɛŋ nɛ́ wi-ndela ɗulugbuk a zu ŋmaa;
wen kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ ndàrá-nú géè ɓɛɛ;
wa nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ see yiitoo.
GASA WAN a̧ ɓir ndàrá-nú-tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen nɔ‘i pi̧ nù;
a̧ a̧ ŋman leɓe-tɔ̧-wen ŋmaŋ-tɛ nɔ‘i yinɛ mbɛt.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko o wi-duk-tɛ nɛ̀ leɓe ndé,
ŋgai kɔ‘i nɛ́ leɓe, ndàrá-nú nɛ́ mɔ kɔ‘i,
o'o tɛ gan wi o?
Sa GASA WAN tɔ̧ ndé:
o wisan nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa kai nɛ́ mɔ er wa’ɛ;
o wi-mɔka-see nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ai nɛ̀ nú'ɛ;
kinii mi tɛ kur mɛ ye ɗoŋ wa.
Mi tɛ kpasi o wi nɛ̀ kii mɛ kpasi.
Wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna;
wen kɔ̧-a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in bu-mbɔi nɛ‘i nɔi̧a
war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ ndiŋ mɛ yu sɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ pɛm yɛ nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ
wen ká deemɔ ko o ɗaŋ tugun bíí nɔ‘i tɛɛ ndaɗi yɛ.
O wi-ɗaŋ yar kpamdal dam fara lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnu ndak nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-wa'i.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ bi ɗoŋ am hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge,
kànà hegɔ yaknɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧i̧ nde?
Ɛnɛ tɛ hu̧si sɔnti'nɛ́ nɛ̀‘m hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge?
Ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m nɛ̀ dɔk dɔk siti’ɛ tɛ kaɗi mɛ gese ge?
Mi tɛ duk kànà nɛ́ duka-a nɛ̀ dita-see mɛ tutuyɛ
hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Wisɛn kɔ‘m tɛ gan zu'm hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge?
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mgbara mɔ‘i ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘m ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧
ká‘m tɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ ya-fio,
wen ká wisɛn kɔ‘m tɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ kɔ‘i nde, wi gana'm kaɗi,
wen ká o wi-kur-zu'm tɛ́ɛ̀ ya nɛ̀ tortɛ wen tika-a kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m mɛ tɛ‘m'i,
mi e ta nɛ̀ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN;
mi tɛ de nyɛŋɛ wen n’ɛ̀nɛ́ kpasa'm,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ bìì gima ha̧ GASA WAN wen demɔ n'aa dee in am!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
O wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ta kɔ‘i ndé, Sɔ̧ bo na.
Ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-wa ɗaŋa wa lɛŋ;
ŋma wi-de-demɔ bó géé boa-a ɓɔna.
GASA WAN duk yiwese mɛ mbaɗi nɛ mɔ pii zu o bezaŋ Adam
ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ̀ kii Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ bòó sɛnɛ wó,
ɓɛɛ kóó kpɔk bo na.
Wa lɛŋ a̧ra̧, deemɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ ɗaŋa,
ŋma wi-de-demɔ bo géé boa-a kpɔk na.
O wi-de-mɔ de na nyɔŋ kɔ‘i nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m
hee kam-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa ga.
Wa sa nin GASA WAN na.
Wa iŋ mɔ na nde?
Bele tɛ zar wa nɛ̀ wa beka iŋ zu-a na
wen Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛ́nɛ́ é k’ɛ́nɛ́ taamɔ ko o wi-kɔsa tɛ geemɔ,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN nɛ́ gi̧ɔ̧-hu̧si tɛ-wa.
O'o tɛ tɛ nɛ̀
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ gbo dukbíí kɔ‘i yinɛ tɛ bara,
tortɛ tɛ ba Jakob ɓɛɛ o be
Gima ko David.
Ho! GASA WAN, wi nɛ̀ nyɛma mɛ ye tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o?
O'o nyɛma mɛ ɔ ye zu sa̧a̧ kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́ o?
Kànà nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ tana,
nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
nɛ̀ tɔ̧ kpasawen nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ taamɔ mɛ kɔ̧ see-aa;
n'aa kai ndaa-wi nɛ ɗoŋ na,
nɛ̀ de ɗaŋmɔ in nya-a̧ na,
nɛ̀ pi̧ foe tɛ ŋma-a na mbɛt;
wi’ɛi e kɔ‘i wi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ bɛ̧a̧ hee geemɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tu̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ tɛ o wi-yu GASA WAN.
Kà a̧ kán mɔ kaɗi, kóó ge mɔ ge,
a̧ tɛ de mɔ‘i, a̧ kafi ɓɔna;
a̧ ha̧ nyamandoi ha̧ o bíí wen kpaa yí-mɔ e zu-a na,
a̧ kpɛk ha̧ bíí mɛ ye a̧ nɛ̀ sede
ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk wi-sedaako ndela na.
Wi nɛ de mɔ hegɔ tɛ yor nɛ nɔa-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko David; gima ha̧ Miktam.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN: «Ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan kɔ‘m;
de duka-a kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ sɛn katɛ‘nɛ́,
ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ yaka zu'nɛ́ bo na.»
O sa̧a̧-bíí nɛ ya zu nu’ɛ nɛ de bíí nyɛmna;
wa nɛ́ desee kɔ‘m.
O wi-ɗafi-gee-sɔ̧ ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa'i.
Mi tɛ tɛn tɔk saɗi-wor-sɔ̧ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i
nɛ er-am nde?
Ndó-ndó-ndó!
Mi tɛ hú̧í̧ nú‘m mɛ sa nin-wa nde?
Ndó-ndó-ndó!
GASA WAN, mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m in be ɗele-nɔ-mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ́ ɛnɛ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ pɛm duka-kpasa kɔ‘m.
Ɛnɛ gbaa fɔ ha̧‘m tɛ de mɔka nù;
kɔ‘m, nɛ́ de mɔɔ-oi a̧‘m kpaa.
Mi tu̧ tɛ GASA WAN, wan-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧‘m;
mɛ zɛ lɛŋ see-am ɓɔn tɛ mɔ n'aa usi ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wan-duk-ti kɔ‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
kà à̧ nɛ́ duka nɛ̀ war wii-er-am,
mi beka kɔ̧ naŋ-am na.
Hegɔ mi duk nɛ̀ desee, mi de nɛ́ nyɛŋɛ,
ɓɛɛ kiitɛ‘m tɛ duk kànà nɛ̀ de-a mbɛt,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ beka e ha̧‘m mɛ ɓɔn ye ko o fio na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ beka e ha̧ wi n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ tik kɔ̧ gombo-kɔ̧ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ usi yuwar duka-kpasa ha̧‘m;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧‘m mɛ kpa desee,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ e'm nɛ̀ war wii-er'nɛ́
ha̧‘m mɛ kpa demɔ nɛ̀ beka kaɗi na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko David.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mgbák wen mɛ nú‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí saa-sara kɔ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
wen bó nɛ́ zɛŋ à̧‘m de na.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ gɔn kita zu'm;
yí‘nɛ́ a̧a̧ tɛ deemɔ nɛ̀ tana-a ko bíí.
Ɛ́nɛ́ wé nɛ see-am, mɛ zɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔk am;
ɛ́nɛ́ kia mɔ tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kpa ŋma mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zii ku̧i̧amɔ kɔ‘m na mbɛt.
Nú‘m tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen hee o ŋma bíí ga na;
mi kasa wen nɛ̀ gboo nɛ̀ nú‘nɛ́ nɛ de-a.
Mi ba nɛ war n’ɛnɛ baa ɗafi so'i,
mi ndak nɛ oi pata naŋ‘nɛ́
wen ká naŋ-am tɛɛ mbali ŋmaa.
Mi nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am sa'nɛ́'ɛ, Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m.
Wan-kpasi o wi-yu-mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasa dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am ti o wi-nasi-bíí.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k am hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk nɛ tu̧ gbaayí-wi’ɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧s'am ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧ er'nɛ́
wen o wi-ɗaŋ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ yukut'am'i.
O wisɛn kɔ‘m kɛra'm ɔm nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ.
Zɔ́k yora-a nɛ̀ wa yor tɛnɛ vɔtɔk wo!
Nú-wa duna nɛ̀ wen-ŋmaŋ-tɛ.
Wa a̧ mboɗi tɛnɛ ɗoŋ-am zununu'i;
ɓaa mɔ nɛ wa kii kpɔk nɛ́ fio-tɛ‘m ɓɛɛ.
Wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in dila nɛ̀ ɓɛkɛti mɔ mɛ ba;
wa duk hee daŋa-ŋgai-dila
nɛ̀ hai saɗi mɛ ba’ɛ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, GASA WAN! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n ti wisɛn kɔ‘m nɛnɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ túí wa gusi nɛ̀ nù!
Gba-paa k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ kpas'am er o wi-ɗaŋ!
GASA WAN, er'nɛ́'ɛ kpas'am er o bíí nɔ'ɔ zaŋnu’ɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mɔɔ-zaŋnu nɛ wa kii’ɛ ha̧ wa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa mɛ ko bem a nù nɛ dɔka-a;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa mɛ kpa kpɔk mɔ‘i mbɛ́t.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mɔɔ-oi deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ zɔka sɔnti'nɛ́.
Kà‘m bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tun, zɔka gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ n'am tɛ zɔk'i,
ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧-a̧ a̧ see-am ga̧a̧‘i.
Gima ko wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. David bia gima’ɛ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN gboo nɛ̀ a̧ er Saul in o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́, GASA WAN, wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m.
Wan-kpas'am, ɛ́nɛ́ kpàsa'm tɛ ŋgamɔ nɛ kpaa'm.
GASA WAN nɛ́ ta-ɛk-tɛ‘m,
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m;
wan-gbo'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m nɛ Sɔ̧.
Mi hu̧si ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-a, wen a̧ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m;
a̧ nɛ́ ŋgee kɔ‘m in zak-kpas'am
a̧ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ duk nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧!
Kà‘m sá GASA WAN ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m.
Fio aa mbul kɔ‘i zik nɛ̀‘m;
kin-yì ɗaŋmɔ pi̧i̧ bele tɛ‘m.
Yɔk yukuta'm mɛ zuɗ‘am pi̧ fara ko o fio;
fio za̧a̧ lim gɔn nɛ̀ ti'm.
Mi saa GASA WAN tɛ ŋmana-see kɔ‘m'i,
mi aia nú sitɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ aia-nú kɔ‘m'i aa zer-aa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zii tiger-am nɛ̀ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ.
Nù foo mɔ ɗirr,
ɓɛɛ o gun kaya zuɗi ɓut.
Nɛ́ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dee ha̧ mɔ mɛ fo mɔ.
Zi-wee tura nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ gbonɛ nduɗɛɛ,
wee baa kɔ̧ nú-a mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ o kɛ̧i̧-wee nyɔŋ yoŋgoŋgo.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gira yiwese
ɓɛɛ a̧ zir tɛnɛ nɛ̀ tu̧-zan ɗɔɔ naŋ-a.
A̧ daŋa zu keribim
ɓɛɛ búk ba a̧ bu̧i̧ nɛnɛ faoo yaknɛ.
A̧ baa tum kpe nɛ̀ tɛ-a;
a̧ dee ha̧ tum-kórò mɛ duk nɛ́ tua kɔ̧-a̧;
sa̧a̧mɔ sɔnti-a dee ha̧ ɓɔrɔ in kɛ̧i̧-wee mɛ ba wee gɛlɛm.
GASA WAN tuɓa nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ;
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ dee ha̧ bíí mɛ zii tiger-a.
A̧ pi̧i̧ góò ndak nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ toma pi̧i̧-kórò pɛsi nɛ̀ wa a taŋ sót-sót.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ nyimsea,
búk gboo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́
nɛ̀ dee ha̧ yì mɛ ɔ̧si̧ gɔn mgbót-mgbót,
in ha̧ o ta nɛ̀ gun-nù duk zu-a mɛ gbo a zan.
A̧ nyɛi̧a er-a tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ ba nɛ̀‘m yinɛ zɛɓɛn;
a̧ daka'm ɗɔɔ gasa yì gbonɛ.
A̧ gboa'm er ŋga wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ;
a̧ kpasa'm er o wi-kur-zu'm nɛ̀ ŋgaia gan am.
Wa kura so zu'm wese bɔnɛ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN ye ɗoŋ-am.
A̧ ɓara'm er wa yinɛ ha̧‘m mɛ yak mɔ kɔ‘m;
a̧ kpasa'm wen n'aa kɔ̧a̧‘m nyɛmna.
GASA WAN ha̧ mɔ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a;
a̧ de demɔ dee in am nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ‘m,
wen mi ndaka pata yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ de-a,
mi zik ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ a̧ na mbɛt.
O heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ duk ɓɔn yí‘m;
ɓɛɛ mi e o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ duk na.
A̧ iŋa ndè, ŋma ɗaŋmɔ bo tɛ‘m na,
wen mi kasi nɛ zu'm ká‘m tɛɛ yɔ kaya.
GASA WAN de demɔ dee in am
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a,
wen er-am duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ sɛn ti a̧.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-yor-ɗoŋ wi-mbo-zu;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ in bíí nɛ̀ de mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ sɛn yí wi nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧;
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ see yiitoo in'nɛ̀ɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ de kànà nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-zaŋ in a̧ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ dukbíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ mɔka-see,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ dee ká wi-gasi-zu ba yí nɛ̀ ŋgɔn na.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ́ lamba kɔ‘m;
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ nyɛk gɔn zik am.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gbak am mɛ ye mgbara o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gbak am mɛ kpíɗí yak zu garo sitɛ wa mbɛt.
Wi nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ wen zu tom ko Sɔ̧ na;
wen ko GASA WAN bó nɛ́ ndela na.
A̧ nɛ́ ŋgee ko bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ ɗoŋ-aa.
Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ gana Sɔ̧ nɛ́ o?
Ŋma ta-hu̧si-tɛ k’ɛɛ yak zu GASA WAN nɛ́ o nde?
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am de lɛŋ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ nɛ̀ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ de-a hee zambɛrɛ ga;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ yor mitak zu kusa kaya;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi bíí biro ha̧‘m;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi ŋgaŋa kusaa-ndɛrɛ ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgee-gbin-biro ha̧‘m;
wii-er'nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m.
Ɛnɛ usa mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ̀ de-a.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ ma yì nɛ ŋgaya-a,
ɓɛɛ ŋgɛɗɛ-naŋ-am mbɔi na.
Kà‘m ndák pata o wisɛn kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ mi kpaa wa;
mi kum wa lɛŋ kaɗi sɛka'm pia ɗoŋ.
Kà‘m yó wa a nù, wa kur ɓɔna;
wa aa nù gbuɗuk, ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ wa a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ naŋ-am.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m tɛ biro;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wi-nas'am mɛ tir a nù gbéyéŋ sɛn ti'm.
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m mɛ zik tɛ, yu mɔ yak,
ɓɛɛ mi gbɛ o wi-kur-zu'm nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Wa hiɗa mɔ ɓɛɛ wi-ye-ɗoŋ-wa bo na;
wa hiɗa mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ kifa-nú bo ha̧ wa na.
Mi hɔ̧na wa kifi nɛ kutumu̧i̧;
mi i̧sa wa gɔn lekete hee ɓɔtɛ yuwar ga.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa'm er dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ̀ kura so zu'm;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ea'm zu o tugun bíí,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ ŋma dukbíí n'am iŋ na ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu wa mbɛt.
O gɔni-duk nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ tɛ‘m ha̧‘m mɛ de demɔ ha̧ wa;
kà‘m hé mbea ha̧ wa war kpɔk ɓɛɛ wa zia kaɗi.
Tɛ o gɔni-duk nɔ‘i mɔka lɛŋ;
wa gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ ŋga tua-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ naka-tɛ.
GASA WAN kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ!
Mi tɛ de osoko ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m!
Mi tɛ gasi Sɔ̧, wan-kpas'am!
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ kifi er ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ e ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbíí.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gbo'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ba'm e ŋgɔn ha̧‘m mɛ gan zu o wi-nas'am;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gbo'm er o wi-de-ŋgamɔ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm gasi'nɛ́
mgbara o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na.
Mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́ mbɛt.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-gbak-wannu n'aa ea mɛ gbin biro;
a̧ yor ɗoŋ wi n'aa hoka,
ɗoŋ David in o bezaŋ-aa hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Yiwese we nɛ́ ɗoŋ gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧;
gba̧a̧-yí-zan usi nɛ́ tom nɛ̀ er-a dea.
Wese kpɔk kpɔk we nɛ́ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧‘i ha̧ ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ zɛ kpɔk kpɔk tɔ̧ kànà nɛ́ wen-aa ha̧ o wan mɛ ɗoŋ yaknɛ.
Ŋma gba̧a̧-wen kɔ-wa bo na,
ŋma tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ-wa bo na,
ŋma tiger-wa ha'i mɛ zii bo na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ duk tɛ-wa dee sedaako ha̧ o bíí dam zu nù lɛŋ.
Usamɔ kɔ-wa hɔɔ kànà nduti-nù mɛ.
GASA WAN dee tua e zu wese ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wese gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ bɛr-tua'i nɛ̀ tortɛ
hee wi-ba-kóò nɛ̀ mbe-a ga;
ma nɛ yì yaknɛ ndɔɔŋ
hee ŋma wi-a-yaa-gan-ŋmaa ga.
Wese kur kura-a nɛ̀ nduti-zan mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛɛ kànà hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ɓii nduti-zan mɛ;
ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ iŋ kpɔra-a kɔ̧-a̧ na bo na.
Heembea ko GASA WAN dee nyɛmna,
nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧ duka-kpasa ha̧ bíí.
Usamɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta nyɛmna;
usamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i gbak nɛ́ géé bíí mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ.
O geŋa ko GASA WAN ɔ tana,
nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧-desee ha̧ bíí.
Heembea ko GASA WAN ɔ ŋgɛ́lɛ́lɛ́;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Yuu-kíí GASA WAN ɔ sa̧a̧
mɔ‘i beka kaɗi na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gɔna-kita ko GASA WAN nɛ́ kpasawen;
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i lɛŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a.
Gɔna-kita kɔ̧-a̧ dee tɛ bíí
gan de lɔr, kóó de sa̧a̧ lɔr;
wen kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ gan mbe nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ yaa-bu-sap.
Nɛ́ usamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i a̧ duk nɛ́ de mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́;
wi nɛ̀ kasi o usamɔ nɔ‘i tɛ kpa zɔm yí-mɔ oi-aa.
Nɛ́ o'o iŋa yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɛ-wi o?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é o yɔɔ-kaya n'am yɔa n'am iŋ na'i ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dór wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gasa-zu
wen ká gasa-zu'i tɛɛ ɔ wan zu'm;
ɓɛɛ hegɔ wen beka bo zu'm na,
ɓɛɛ mi beka de gasa ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́ na mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ŋgimbi n'am duk ti'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wen mɛ nú‘m in taamɔ mɛ kɔ̧ see-am lɛŋ
mɛ nyɛm yí‘nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m in wan-kpas'am!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN a̧ zii saa-sara k’ɛ́nɛ́ wese dita-see;
nin Sɔ̧ ko Jakob a̧ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́nɛ́!
A̧ a̧ tom gbakamɔ nɛ̀
a̧ a̧ yor ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀
Tɛ-a a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧mɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧ lɛŋ;
a̧ a̧ kpɛk
A̧ a̧ ha̧ mɔ nɛ̀ see'nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́;
a̧ a̧ yor ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ sumburi a̧ nɛ̀ desee
ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ kpasi nɛ̀ mɛ;
ɛɛ tɛ ba tutuwal nɛ ŋgɔn nɛ̀ nin Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
GASA WAN a̧ ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ak er-a h’ɛ́nɛ́!
Kinii mi iŋa GASA WAN tɛ kpasi wi n'aa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a;
a̧ kifi nɛ nú ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀
mɛ kpas'a nɛ̀ ŋgai te-er-a mɛ wiiko.
O ŋma bíí e kɔ‘i ta nɛ̀ o keekee kɔ‘i,
o ŋma e kɔ‘i ta nɛ̀ o nyaŋa kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ, mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta k’ɛɛ
nɛ́ nin GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Kɔ-wa nɛ́ hɔ̧fa̧-a̧ tik nù samgbaŋ,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ yora-a keŋ.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí wannu!
Ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ sa'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ sara nú yɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN, ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ desee ko wannu.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa a̧! Oee nyɛŋɛ n'aa de wa!
Mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧;
mɔ n'aa kɔfa er'nɛ́ lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ dɔ nɛ̀ a̧ na.
Ɛnɛ toka de yoŋgo zu a̧,
ɛnɛ guu
a̧ kɔfa duka-kpasa er'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧ duka-a ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ zu nù'ɛ ha̧ a̧.
Gasamɔ n'aa kpaa tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ́ gana zu mɔ n’ɛnɛ gana'i;
ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ gasamɔ in zɔnamɔ ha̧ a̧,
ɛnɛ toka de yoŋgo nɛ̀ nduti-a bo na zu a̧,
ɛnɛ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa desee tɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ ti'nɛ́.
Wannu e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN;
dee demɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ yor keŋ.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa ndaa o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ;
wii-er'nɛ́ tɛ gbɔsi o wi-kur-zu'nɛ́.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ usi tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛnɛ tɛ ir wa a kɔ̧ wee kɔ̧ lɔk.
GASA WAN tɛ gur wa tɛ nyimsea kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wee tɛ dɔ wa kór-kór yinɛ!
Ɛnɛ tɛ kum o bezaŋ-wa zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ yinɛ;
kpar-wa beka duk mgbara o tugun bíí ɓɔna.
Wa ee nú mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́,
wa ɗafa yuwar-a lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ee-nú kɔ-wa'i tɛ de geemɔ mbulɛɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kom wa nɛ góò mɛ pi̧ wa gbɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kifi tɛ, yu mɔ yak.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ bìì gima-ŋgan-mɔ zɔn nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ tiger gima: Nana-zambɛrɛ mɛ gɔna-ndaa-zan.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m wa,
wen ge s’ɛnɛ ea'm duk ge?
Mi ai nú‘m sitɛ‘nɛ́ takaɗi’ɛ,
wen ge nde?
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, kà‘m sá‘nɛ́ mɛ wese mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kifi nú ha̧‘m na;
kóó mɛ zɛ mbɛt mi ɔm tɛ‘m na.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sa̧a̧-wi;
wan nɛ̀
O dáà k’ɛɛ ee so ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ;
wa ee ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpasi wa.
Wa saa so mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ wa kpasi;
wa yaa so e nɛ̀ ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ
ɓɛɛ ziimɔ ba wa na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m kinii, mi bó nɛ́ bíí ɓɔna;
mi nɛ́ kokoɗo-dɔk,
mi nɛ́ mɔɔ-da̧ ko bíí, wa e'm tɛ geemɔ.
O wi-zɔk-am lɛŋ mam nɛ‘m
wɛr nɛ̀ nú mi̧i̧ nɛ̀ zu-wa pii tɛ‘m;
ɓɛɛ wa'e: «Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN ga,
GASA WAN'i a̧ kpasi kànà a̧ ŋgaɓo!
GASA WAN nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ nɛ mbetɛ a̧ a̧ kpasi a̧, h’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk!»
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ baa'm nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m mɛ pi̧ nù,
ɛnɛ'ɛ ea'm yí-ŋguɗi-a;
tɛ̀ gboa-a kɔ‘m nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ
a̧ wa pi̧i̧ nɛ̀‘m er'nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ.
Kinii ŋgamɔ hɛɗa nɛ‘m dɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m ɓɔna;
ŋma wi-gbak-am bo na.
O wi-kur-zu'm zika'm kpa nú ŋmaa
hee o wiwii-ndai ga,
o ŋgazu wiwii-ndai nú Basaŋ kɛra'm e see-a
hee wan-da̧i̧-nam ga;
wa ɓaa nú-wa pii tɛ‘m
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dila sati nɛnɛ zu saɗi tuɓi nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
O gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m yela lɛŋ hee yì ga,
tɛ‘m mɔka pútú-pútú kifi nɛ́ mbɔndɔ;
see-am duk hee ndíá nɛ̀ yeli lɛtɛtɛ'ɛ ga.
Kɔ̧ war ger-am kora kútú-kútú hee gbàrà-kpánà ga,
leɓ‘am lata kɔ̧ war-ger-am.
Ɛnɛ pi̧a'm tɛ fuunu-fio.
O wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ kɛra'm e see-a
hee gba gíí toyo ga;
wa hɛra er-am in naŋ-am mbɛt.
Mi ɔ̧ka̧ ba gba̧a̧;
kɔ-wa, wa kɛ̧i̧ nɛ̀‘m ŋmaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ zu bɔnɛ kɔ‘m;
wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ laa kɔ‘m nɛ̀ er ŋmaa,
wa bìí mbaɗi gbɛ nɛ̀ laa kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m na!
Ɛnɛ nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak am nɛ̀ haya-a na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nú gba-paa ko o wi nɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nú o toyo nɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nú o dila nɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nú zak bara-nam nɔ'ɔ!
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur mgbara o nya'm;
mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ ti gba gíí bíí.
Ɛnɛ o wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧!
ɛnɛ o bezaŋ Jakob lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí a̧!
Ɛnɛ o bezaŋ
Sɔ̧ e bɔnɛ ko wi-kɔsa tɛ geemɔ na,
a̧ hu̧si sɔnti-a nɛ̀ a̧ na mbɛt;
ŋgimbi n'aa saa sara sitɛ a̧, a̧ kifa nú ha̧ a̧.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧‘m gasi ti gba gíí bíí;
mi tɛ de mɔ n'am baa ha̧ nú wen-aa ti o wi-yu-kíí‘nɛ́.
O wi-mɔka-see tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ-wa sur;
o wi-kíì GASA WAN tɛ gasi kànà a̧,
ɓɛɛ duka-kpasa a̧ duk hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Tɛ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ GASA WAN;
wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ a̧.
O pɛ́r-nam tɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ gu nù ti a̧
wen wan nɛ́ ko GASA WAN kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu o tugun bíí.
O bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna ɔɔ ya ɗɔɔ nù lɛŋ tɛ gu nù ti a̧;
o fio tɛ gbɛ zugur nù ti a̧ mbɛt.
GASA WAN e ha̧ wa mɛ duk kpasa kpoo nɛ kpoo na;
o bezaŋ-am tɛ de tom ha̧ a̧.
Bíí tɛ tɔ̧ wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa;
wa tɛ we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧
ha̧ dukbíí mɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀‘i tɛ ko hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dea.
Gima ko David.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-dai-am;
ŋma mɔɔ-ɓan-am bo na.
A̧ mgbɔ‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ e fara de mbɔɗi zɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ ɔm tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔa'm si ká̧ ga̧a̧ gɛɗa-yì mbɛt;
nɛ́ fara nɔ‘i a̧ a̧ ha̧ nɛ̀ mbe ŋgai ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔa'm nɛnɛ tɛ tana war wen zu nin-a.
Kà‘m kú gba gboŋgo-tum, kíì dé‘m na, GASA WAN,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ-am;
ɓira-te in dɔ́rá k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧-nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafa taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ ha̧‘m ti o wi-kur-zu'm;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛna nɔ̧́-nyama a zu'm,
ɓɛɛ ɗele-nɔ-mɔ kɔ‘m dun zɛ́rɛ́rɛ́.
Nɛ mbetɛ, demɔ in
ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'am biti duk kpasa,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk kɔ‘m kɔ̧ tua ko GASA WAN kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Gima ko David.
Kiitɛ nù'ɛ in mɔɔ-zaŋ-aa
ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN.
A̧ ee nù nɛ war-a;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee nù e zu gba-tɔp in zu yì mɛ ɗɔɔ nù.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ daŋ kaya ko GASA WAN
mɛ yor kɔ̧
Kànà nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ in nɛ̀ see-aa ɔ sa̧a̧,
nɛ̀ ndak ɗoŋ géé tum-mɔ na,
nɛ̀ kan mɔ nɛ̀ ndela na mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɛ tok de yoŋgo ha̧ wi’ɛi;
Sɔ̧ wan-kpas'aa tɛ sa a̧ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Sɔ̧ ko Jakob, nɛ́ o pɛrti wi nɔ‘i
a̧ kii'nɛ́ mɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Nú-garo, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ pɛsa-a!
O gba̧‘a̧ nú tua, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú‘nɛ́ e booŋ
wen ha̧ Wan ko gasamɔ mɛ ye mɔ!
Wan ko gasamɔ‘i nɛ́ o nde?
Nɛ́ GASA WAN ko ŋgayamɔ, ŋgaŋa wi-biro.
Nú-garo, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ pɛsa-a!
O gba̧‘a̧ nú tua, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú‘nɛ́ e booŋ
wen ha̧ Wan ko gasamɔ mɛ ye mɔ!
Wan ko gasamɔ bɔɔ nɛ́ o nde?
Kànà nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ;
Wan ko gasamɔ nɛ́ a̧.
Ko David.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mi gɔma er h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ foe mɛ de'm na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘m mɛ gan zu'm na,
wen wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, foe beka de a̧ na,
ɓɛɛ ziimɔ tɛ ba nɛ o wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ‘nɛ́.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí war k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m nɛnɛ tɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí mɔ ha̧‘m wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kpas'am.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN;
tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ demɔ in yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ duka nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ.
Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ in o yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m
n'am dee so tɛ ŋgimbi daŋa-ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ tɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN ɔ dee in deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ tana nyɛmna;

mi tɔ̧ so kɔ‘m ndé,
ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧a'm taŋ wó;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zia aia-nú kɔ‘m
ŋgimbi n'am hiɗa nɛ̀ mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧ lɛŋ!
A̧ nɛ́ wi-pɛm o wi-ndak-pata a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ wi-kifi-er ha̧ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wan-e-ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpá ŋgai! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi!
Gima ko David.
Wi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ee yɔɔ-kaya in ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧
duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee;
wi nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ gee yí GASA WAN
in nɛ̀ ŋma ɗaŋ taamɔ bo tɛ-a na,
duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee!
Ŋgimbi n'am kpee nú‘m zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m,
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m mɔka
tɛ gɔfamɔ kɔ‘m wese lɛŋ;
er'nɛ́ dita zu'm ɗɔŋ-ɗɔŋ hee dɔnɔ ga zɛ nɛ wese;
ŋgai-tɛ‘m ɔ̧sa̧ hee yì nɛ ɔ̧sa̧ gɔn mgbót-mgbót mɛ bɛɛ'ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi tɛ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN mɛ gbar ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m,»
ɓɛɛ sa'm gbar ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ ti'nɛ́;
mi hu̧si yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m nɛ̀ ɛnɛ na,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ baa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m yinɛ,
ɛnɛ ee yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m ha̧‘m mbɛt.
Wen hegɔ o wi-mbo-zu h’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ
tɛ ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgimbi dita-see kɔ-wa;
kóó nɛ́ yì a̧ ha̧a̧ so nyɛmna,
yì‘i beka hɔ tɛ-wa na.
Ɛnɛ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ‘m,
ɛnɛ pɛm am wese nɛ̀ mɔ ba tɛ‘m;
tɛ kpasa'm n’ɛnɛ kpasa'i,
ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ bìì gima desee ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Mi tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ,
mi tɛ usi yuwar nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ ba;
yí‘m tɛ ɓɔn tɛ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ-mɛ.
«Ká mɛ́ duk hee nyaŋa in sunda nɛ̀ mbɔ-zu-wa dam na’ɛ ga na,
wen kà‘i pi̧ káná nú-wa na,
wa mbo zu ha'i mɛ hɔ katɛ wa na.»
Bɔnɛ nɛ̀ pɛm wi-ɗaŋ nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ
Tortɛ'ɛ bá‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN!
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ!
O wi nɛ̀ see ɔ sa̧a̧ a̧ bíí gima nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN!
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ̀ desee sitɛ GASA WAN!
Zɔnamɔ baa nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ see ɔ tana.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ mɔɔ-mbɛr,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r kunde nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-aa ɓu ha̧ a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima ha̧ a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ díkíɗí kunde sumburi nɛ̀ a̧!
Wen ko GASA WAN ɔ tana,
o tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ kpasamɔ;
a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in gɔna-kita nɛ̀ de-a.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ɓɛɛ yiwese de tɛ̀ nɛ̀ tɛ̀;
a̧ dee o mɔ nɛ̀ ya sɛnɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a.
A̧ mɔi̧a yì e kpɔk fara
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɗu nɛ̀ yi a kɔ̧ dak’ɛ ga;
a̧ mɔi̧a o gba-tɔp kpe hee gba-zu ga e nɛ̀ war-a.
O bíí zu nù lɛŋ a̧ yu kíí GASA WAN,
o bíí nù'ɛ a̧ ya nɛ naka-tɛ ti a̧;
kà a̧ tɔ̧ wen laŋ, ɓɛɛ wi zɔka mɔɔ-oi-aa.
Kà a̧ tɔ̧‘e mɔ'ɔ dé wó, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i dea.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-yai ee-zu-mɔ ko o dukbíí,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dora mɔ nɛ̀ bíí kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de mbɛt.
Ee-zu-mɔ ko GASA WAN duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
o deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧ see-aa
duk kɔ‘i nɛnɛ hegɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Tugun bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ya nɛ̀ desee;
dukbíí n'aa hoka nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
GASA WAN oŋgi nɛ̀ ŋgɔn ɓíì
zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ pii zu o bezaŋ Adam;
a̧ duk nɛ́ fara kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ
zɔk nɛ̀ o bíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee see bíí lɛŋ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ zɔk tom ko o bíí kpɔk kpɔk.
Bo nɛ tɛ ŋgai ko o dɔka wi-biro
a̧ wannu tɛ kpasi nɛnɛ na;
ŋga-wi beka kpasi tɛ ŋgai-tɛ na.
Ee-ta nɛ̀ nyaŋa bó nɛ́ kpasa ŋgai na,
wen kóó nyaŋa'i ŋgaia so héé ge,
a̧ beka kpasi wan-aa na.
Yí GASA WAN a̧a̧ zu o wi nɛ yu kíí a̧;
a̧ zɔk nɛ o wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀
ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpasi wa tɛ fio in tɛ ŋgimbi kaɓa mbɛt.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ é yí-ɛɛ si tɛ GASA WAN;
a̧ nɛ́ wan-gbak-ɛɛ, a̧ nɛ́ ŋgee k’ɛɛ.
Desee mɛ kɔ̧ see yɛ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ-a;
ɓɛɛ ee-ta k’ɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu sa̧a̧ nin-a.
GASA WAN, yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dúk in yɛɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ e nɛ̀ ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ ga.
Zɔnamɔ ko David ŋgimbi n'aa dee nɛ̀ mɔ hee wi-dawa ga ti Abimɛlɛk, ɓɛɛ Abimɛlɛk siŋ kɔ‘i a̧ pi̧ nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ wɛr tɛ yu mɔ yak.
Mi tɛ de osoko ha̧ GASA WAN ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
nú‘m beka bɛr tɛ zɔna a̧ na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧‘m duk nɛ̀ tɛ‘m;
o wi-mɔka-see a̧ zii, wa a̧ de nyɛŋɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN in am!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ gásí nin-a, ɛ́ɛ́ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ mbɛt!
Mi kia so GASA WAN ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧‘m;
a̧ kpasa'm tɛ o mɔɔ-kíì nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ hɛra'm.
Wi nɛ̀ e yí sitɛ Sɔ̧,
sɔnti wi’ɛi tɛ tok lak-lak,
foe beka de a̧ na;
ŋma wi-kɔsa aia so nú
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zii aia-nú kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ kpas'a tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Betom mɛ yiwese pɛm nɛ o wi-yu-kíí Sɔ̧,
kpasi nɛ̀ wa nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé GASA WAN
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk a̧ nɛ́ de-wi nyɛmna;
o wi nɛ̀ hu̧si ɗoŋ GASA WAN duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú kíí GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ o sa̧a̧-bíí kɔ̧-a̧,
wen o wi nɛ yu kíí a̧, mɔ ɓan wa na;
kóó nyɔŋmɔ nyɛma so mɛ ɓan o daŋa-dila,
ɓɛɛ war ko o wi nɛ̀ kii GASA WAN,
mɔ beka ɓan wa na.
O bem kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ha̧‘m usi ɗoŋ yuu kíí GASA WAN h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ duk zu nù'ɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧,
mɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ sɔnti-mɛ mɛ de,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dór leɓe-mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen ŋgaɓo!
Mɛ dór ndàrá-nú-mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ géé wen-ɔr-mɔ!
Mɛ̀ yú ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé nɛ́ demɔ;
mɛ̀ kíí nɛ́ ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ mɛ̀ ndák ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt.
GASA WAN gɔna nú deemɔ ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ
ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ bi ɗoŋ wa zu nù'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ yí-a a̧a̧ zu o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
zer-aa zii nɛ́ saa-sara kɔ-wa.
Kà wa sá mɔ, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN zia sara kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wa tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
GASA WAN a̧a̧ katɛ o wi-dita-see;
a̧ nɛ́ wi-kpasi o wi nɛ̀ see ŋmana mbɛt.
Bɔnɛ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɔ dɔka,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ kpasi kànà a̧ tɛ bɔnɛ nɔ‘i lɛŋ;
GASA WAN pɛm nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
wen ká ŋma gba̧a̧-tɛ-a gbin.
Ɗaŋ tɛ gbɛ wi-ɗaŋ;
ŋgamɔ tɛ kpa o wi-sɛn o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
GASA WAN tɛ kpasi o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wen beka bo zu wi nɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ ɗoŋ-aa na.
Ko David.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ wen zu o wi-kur-zu'm;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá zu'nɛ́ duk nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ de ŋmaa in am!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r zaŋ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ŋgee k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nák sɛ́ɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yí o wi nɛ̀ ndak am tɛnɛ'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ sɛn kɔ̧ see-am ndé,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-kpas'am.
Foe in ziimɔ a̧ tík zu o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am'i,
wa a̧ zik tɛ-wa, wa a̧ yak, wa a̧ pɛsi sót-sót!
Betom k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ndak wa yaknɛ
hee pumyulu sunu nɛ búk kai yaknɛ'ɛ ga;
betom ko GASA WAN a̧ ndak pata wa,
ɓɛɛ yuwar kɔ-wa a̧ duk nɛ́ tum in yɔɔ-mɔ.
Ŋma mɔ n'am dee in wa bo na,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tuia pɛ́r ha̧‘m;
wa za̧a̧ lim ha̧‘m gbak na mi tika sɛnɛ wó,
ɓɛɛ wa iŋ kɔ-wa bɔnɛ nɛ̀ hai wa tɛnɛ‘i na.
Pɛ́r nɛ̀ wa tuia ha̧‘m tɛ ba kànà nɛ́ wa;
lim nɛ̀ wa hura'i, kànà nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ tik sɛnɛ!
Mi tɛ zɔn GASA WAN nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ
bíí nɛ̀ gima-tortɛ wen n'aa kpasa'm,
ɓɛɛ kiitɛ‘m tɛ tɔ̧:
«GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan-ba-wi-ɓɔsa yinɛ er o ŋga-wi,
ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan-gbo-wisan yinɛ er o wi-nyɔŋ-yí-wa;
o'o tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ o?»
O wi-sedaako-ndela kur nɛ zu'm
ak nɛ̀‘m tɛ mɔ n'am iŋ na;
wa kifi er ha̧‘m nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a,
zu demɔ n'am de in wa;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ de ha̧ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ mɛ ba'm tɛ duka-a kɔ‘m zu nu’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, tɛ ŋgimbi zɛɛ kɔ-wa'i,
mi pi̧i̧ laa-zim-mɔ;
mi mɔka tɛ‘m si ɗɔɔ, mi zima yì,
ɓɛɛ mi kɔfi Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see-am
hee ŋma sɛm kɔ‘m kóó ŋma nya'm a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ bɔnɛ
sa'm kɔfi Sɔ̧ wen-aa ga;
ɓɛɛ mi nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ dita-see
hee ŋma bíí nɛ̀ kpo er a gba̧a̧-zu gar nɛ̀ fio ko nàà kɔ‘i ga.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ, wa mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa mam nɛ̀ tika-a kɔ‘m,
wa mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀‘m;
o ŋma gɛnɛ n'am iŋ so nɛti na
gai nɛ mɔ a zu'm.
Wa we nɛ‘m mam nɛnɛ nin-wa nyɛr,
wa nyɔŋ nɛ goko-wa zu'm.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ yor bɔɔ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ
e nɛ‘m ɛ̀n'am’ɛ héé ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o ŋga-wi nɔ'ɔ
nɛ̀ de mɔ in am hee dila ga’ɛ!
Mi tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ ti gba gíí bíí,
mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ ti giiwi.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ o wi-sɛn-am nɔ‘i
nɛ̀ ndela kɔ-wa nyɛmna'i mɛ mam am na;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ sɛn am géè‘i
a̧ ká'í nyɔŋ yí ha̧ ŋmaa na mbɛt.
Bó nɛ́ wa tɔ̧ nɛ ga̧a̧ wen zu o ga̧a̧-wi
nɛ̀ ya zu nu’ɛ na;
mɔ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndiŋ wen
zu bíí nɛ̀ tum nɛnɛ géè ɓɛɛ.
Wa ɓa nɛ zɔm nú ɓir nɛ̀ wen ndela
e nú‘m sɔɔ géè tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ndé:
«Hee heyei! Ɛɛ zɔka mɛ!
Ɛɛ zɔka mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ dea'i!»
GASA WAN,
bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ zɔka mɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa de in am'i na?
K’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ̀ oi-nu'nɛ́ na!
GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nyɛi̧ nɛ̀‘m na!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr bee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m!
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu'm nɛ yuwar-a,
Gasa Wan, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ká o wi nɔ‘i tɛɛ mam am,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Kinii a̧ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ er yɛ!»
In ká wa tɛɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt'e:
«Ɛɛ gana a̧ kaɗi!»
Foe in ziimɔ a̧ tik zu o bíí
nɛ̀ kpa desee tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ‘m;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ zu'm'i, búù a̧ bá wa!
Zu-wa a̧ dítí!
Ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ye-ɗoŋ-am nɛ́ yaa-a nɛ̀ desee
wèn wen nɛ̀ ba'm na'i;
wa a̧ mam mami nɛ̀ desee, tortɛ'ɛ bá wa,
wen kɔ-wa, kànà nɛ́ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ ndé:
«Sɔ̧ nɛ́ gasamɔ!
A̧ duk nɛ desee tɛ de duka-a ko wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧».
Ɓɛɛ nú‘m tɛ we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi tɛ zɔn'nɛ́ hegɔ wese lɛŋ.
Gima ko David, wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧, ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Nɛ́ ɗaŋ taamɔ nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ see wi-ɗaŋ a̧ usi ɗaŋ war ha̧ a̧;
tɛ zɔkamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ŋma mɔ mɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧ sɛnɛ, bo na.
Kɔ̧-a̧ kànà nɛ́ zɔna tɛ-a nɛ̀ tɛ-a;
a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ iŋ ɗaŋmɔ n'aa de'i ha̧ a̧ mɛ e duk na.
Wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a nɛ́ ɔrmɔ in saka-yí,
tɛ-a bìí kɔ‘i ɗoŋ dee demɔ kaɗi;
mɔ n'aa ta ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kóó hɔ fara-ɔ-nù kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt,
kànà nɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i;
a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ duk na kóó tikiɗi.
GASA WAN, dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ fara lɛŋ,
hɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt,
yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà hegɔ hɔ tɛ tura-zan;
deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ fo tɛ na
hee gasa kaya ga,
ɓɛɛ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ ɗuka nyɛmna.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ́ wan-dai-bíí in o saɗi lɛŋ.
Sɔ̧, dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dee nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ o bezaŋ Adam hu̧si nɛ tɛ ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́.
Zaŋ-wa tɛ sur nɛ̀ demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ́nɛ́ dé ha̧ see-wa mɛ ga̧ tɛ dɔka demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yì ga̧ nɛ see-wi’ɛ ga.
Duka-kpasa tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́;
nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ nyɛk a̧ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
ká naŋ o wi-ɗaŋ mbɔl'am na,
ká o wi-ɗaŋ ndak am pi̧ taŋ na mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k tika-a nɛ̀ o wi-de-mɔ de na tik'i,
gba̧a̧ tɛ-wa mɔka lɛŋ,
wa kpa ŋgai mɛ kur na.
Ko David.
Ká see-mɛ tu̧ zu o wi-ɗaŋ na,
ká mɛ a see mɔ ko o wi-gbɛ-zu na;
ɓan na wa ɔ̧ka̧ kaɗi hee zɔ̧ ga,
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na, wa kora hee zɔ̧ yí-mbuu ga.
Mɛ̀ é ta nɛ GASA WAN, mɛ̀ dé demɔ;
mɛ́ tɛ duk zu nù'ɛ nɛ̀ de-a,
ŋma mɔɔ-de-mɛ bo na.
Tortɛ kɔ-mɛ a̧ duk tɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ see-mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɛ.
Mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ kpa mɛ lɛŋ, mɛ̀ é er GASA WAN,
mɛ̀ é ta nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de mɔ ha̧ mɛ;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ-mɛ mɛ duk ɓɔn yí bíí,
dee demɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ nyɛk ɓɔn yí bíí hee wese ga.
Mɛ̀ dúk nɛ̀ oi nú-mɛ ti GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é ta nɛ a̧;
ká see-mɛ tu̧ zu o wi nɛ̀ mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ de-a na,
in zu o wi nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ gɔna kɔ̧ zaŋ na.
Ká see-mɛ dui na,
ká see-mɛ ɗaŋ na mbɛt;
mɛ̀ é nyimsea duk wen ɗaŋsee beka gbak mɛ na.
Wa tɛ ndak o wi-ɗaŋ yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-e-ta nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ba nù ko o wi nɔ‘i.
Dekpaa tikiɗi ɓɛɛ wi beka zɔk o wi-ɗaŋ ɓɔna;
ɛnɛ tɛ kii mɛ zɔk wa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka iŋ oi-wa ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ o wi-mɔka-see a̧ tɛ ba nù oi-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ desee tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
O wi-ɗaŋ e nú mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
wa nyɔŋ nɛ goko zu a̧
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN mam kɔ‘i wa mam,
wen a̧ iŋa wese fio ko o wi nɔ‘i hɛɗa kaɗi.
Kà o wi-ɗaŋ dak gba-paa kɔ-wa,
mɛ gɔm nɛ̀ o wisan in o wi-kɔsa,
kà wa ŋgaŋ góò kɔ-wa mɛ gbɛ nɛ̀ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
gba-paa kɔ-wa'i tɛ gɔn nɛ́ ger-wa woyo,
ɓɛɛ kusaa kɔ-wa tɛ gbin a nù ŋgɛrɛm-ŋgɛrɛm.
Be kpaamɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tikiɗi
gana dɔka kpaamɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ,
wen ɓaa wi-ɗaŋ tɛ gbin
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ yor ɗoŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
GASA WAN pɛm kɔ‘i nɛ duka-a ko o wi-de-mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
foe beka de wa ŋgimbi bɔnɛ na,
wɔ beka ba tɛ-wa ŋgimbi kaɓa na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ fe kɔ‘i
wen wa nɛ́ o wi-sɛn GASA WAN;
wa tɛ ɔ̧k kɛsi hee mbɔɗi zɔ̧ nɛ̀ kor nɛnɛ'ɛ ga,
wa tɛ yambali hee zi-wee ga.
Kà wi-ɗaŋ ba nyamandoi er ŋma bíí kaɗi,
a̧ ha̧ mɔ‘i si ɗoŋ ha̧ wan-aa woyo ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
kànà nɛ́ dee ko in ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí,
o wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo ha̧ wa tɛ ba nù,
ɓɛɛ o wi n'aa foma tɛ yɔ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ yak ti ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘i;
wa ya nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ yuwar nɔ̀ kɔ-wa dee tɛ-a mbɛt.
Kà wa yó nù, ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn fara-a na
wen GASA WAN kasi nɛ er-wa.
Mi duka so nɛ ŋgaiwi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am sɔka kaɗi’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zɔk kɔ‘m ŋma wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ era e duk sɔɔ géè ɓɔn na,
kóó bezaŋ-aa fara kɔfi nyɔŋmɔ nɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kànà nɛ́ dee ko in ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí,
ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tok nɛ́ de yoŋgo ha̧ o bezaŋ-aa nɛnɛ.
Mɛ̀ yú ɗaŋmɔ, mɛ̀ dé nɛ́ demɔ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kpa fara-duk nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
wen GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
a̧ e o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧ duk na.
A̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o wi-de-mɔ de na ɓɔn sɔɔ géè,
a̧ tɛ zuɗi o bezaŋ wi-ɗaŋ a nù lɛŋ;
o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ ba nù,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya tɛ nù‘i ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wen ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ,
wen n'aa tɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ kpasawen;
heembea ko Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-aa,
ɓɛɛ naŋ-a beka mbali ŋmaa na.
Wi-ɗaŋ mbaɗi nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
kii nɛ̀ war mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN e ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a'i
mɛ tik kɔ̧ er wi-ɗaŋ‘i na,
a̧ e ha̧ wen mɛ tik a̧ na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ é ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN,
mɛ̀ bá nɛ́ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbo mɛ er wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ;
a̧ tɛ ba mɛ e ŋgɔn ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba nù'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ zuɗi o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ.
Mi zɔka so ŋma wi-ɗaŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋga-see nyɛmna
nɛ̀ kura yor zéŋ hee
Duka, ha̧‘m ɓir yak fara'i woyo wó,
yàà, a̧ bo ɓɔna;
mi kia a̧ takaɗi, mi kpa a̧ na.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k ɗoŋ mɔ ko wi-de-demɔ,
mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ai!
Ga̧a̧-wi tɛ kpa bezaŋ nɛ dɔka-a,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ kum kɔ‘i lɛŋ;
GASA WAN tɛ zuɗi o bezaŋ wi-ɗaŋ a nù yinɛ.
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ wi-kpasi o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ-wa ŋgimbi bɔnɛ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ gbak wa, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbo wa;
kà wa hu̧si ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wa er o wi-ɗaŋ.
Gima ko David wen ee bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ti Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN, kà see'nɛ́ á̧ nyima in am,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de wen in am
ŋgimbi nɛ see'nɛ́ biti ɗaŋ in am na mbɛt.
Góò k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧a'm tɛ ɗaŋ fara,
ɓɛɛ er'nɛ́ gbɔsa'm ndaɗi nù fa̧i̧;
nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tika zu'm,
ɓɛɛ ŋgai kaɗi tɛ‘m lɛŋ;
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m mɔka pútú-pútú oi ɗaŋmɔ n'am dea.
Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m gana'm
hee ŋma zɔm dita tui a̧ gana'm ga;
tɛ‘m mbɔr nɛ̀ ŋgɔn nun nɛnɛ
wen dee mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ‘m.
Ɗoŋ-am suta, tɛ‘m kata hɔ tɛ fio;
mi hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio tik nɛnɛ hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
Ti-gun-am duk hee wee ga,
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m bo na;
mí bó nɛ̀ ŋgai ɓɔna,
tɛ‘m kata hɔ tɛ fio,
see-am gbɛŋ gbɛŋ zɛ̀k-zɛ̀k,
mi gɔfi nɛ mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a.
GASA WAN, ŋma mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ yɔɔ‘nɛ́ bo na;
mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ n'am pɛ see-am zu-a'i lɛŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa.
See-am to too ɓɛɛ ŋgai bo tɛ‘m ɓɔna,
mi zɔk mɔ tamtuɗum géè.
O sɛm in o gbama-yari kɔ‘m pɛsa e'm duk
wen pɛ̀r nuna da̧i̧ kɔ‘m;
o nya'm ya nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am za̧ nɛ lim ha̧‘m,
o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ mɛ tik zu'm e nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ‘m nɛnɛ,
wa e nɛ́ nú in o ŋmaa mɛ de ŋgamɔ in am.
Mi duk hee wi-mgbee-zer in mukɛ̧ ga:
mi zii mɔ na, mi tɔ̧ wen na mbɛt.
Mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma bíí nɛ̀ duk kɔ‘i yekere
tɛ wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ n'aa nyɛm mɛ kifi nú zu-a na ga.
GASA WAN, mi e ta nɛ ɛnɛ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ kifi nú ha̧‘m, GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa'm wor'nɛ́ ká wa tɛɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ zu'm;
kà‘m nɛ́ tira yɔɔ-mɔ mɛ yo nù,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wa mɛ gan am na,
wen kɔ‘m, ɓan na mi tika kaɗi!
Bɔnɛ kɔ‘m kaɗi so bɔɔ kaɗi?
Mi gbara ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́
wen see-am gɔna zu yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m'i.
O wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ in am dɔk dɔk siti,
o wi-sɛn-am géè dɔka yak zale;
demɔ n'am de sitɛ wa,
wa kifi er-a nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a pii tɛ‘m
tɔ̧ nɛ̀ ŋga wen zu'm wen demɔ n'am kii mɛ de in o bíí.
GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e'm duk na!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nyɛi̧ nɛ̀‘m na, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am bee,
GASA WAN, wi-kpas'am!
Gima ko David ha̧ Yedutun, wan-duk-zu-gima.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ndé, mi tɛ zɔk naŋanɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ de-a.
Nú‘m beka tɔ̧ wen si hɛ̧ɛ̧ si hi̧i̧ na;
ŋgimbi n'am tɛ kpa nɛ̀ ŋmaa in ŋma wi-ɗaŋ,
mi tɛ gu er nú‘m n'am beka tɔ̧ wen na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm kpe nú‘m, sa'm duk nɛ̀ oi-nú‘m sɛ́ɛ́m,
see-am gbɛŋa gan kuti-a.
See-am duka hee wi aŋa nɛ́ wee a sɛnɛ ga,
mi taa mɔ nyɛmna ɓɛɛ see-am kur búk,
ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN ndé:
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ŋgimbi fio kɔ‘m ha̧‘m.
Oi-zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m ɓɔna bɔɔ géè?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ‘e fio nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ bíí na.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk;
ɛ́nɛ́ ee ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘m zu nù'ɛ ŋgólók ɓɛɛ;
pɛ duka-a kɔ‘m zaŋnu’ɛ nɛ́ geemɔ yí‘nɛ́.
Bíí n’ɛnɛ zɔk nɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ nɛ́ géé búk géè.
Bíí nɛ̀ duk’ɛ nɛ́ geemɔ hee gi̧ɔ̧ ga,
gba̧a̧ mɔ bo tɛ-a na.
A̧ pɔkɔsi nɛ tɛ-a mɔi̧ nɛ̀ mbɔi e;
kà a̧ fe kaɗi, a̧ iŋ wi-nyɔŋa-a na.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ pɛm bɔɔ kinii ɓɔ ge?
Mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ɗaŋmɔ n'am dea lɛŋ yinɛ zu'm.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ o mgbelewi mɛ mam am na.
Mi kpee nú‘m, mi hú̧í̧ nú‘m nɛ̀ ŋgɔn ɓukui na
wen kànà nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nyasi k’ɛ́nɛ́ e nyɛi̧ nɛ̀‘m,
wen mi zɔk nɛ́ bɔnɛ nyasi k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i nyɛmna.
Gaia bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ kpa bíí'ɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi ɗaŋ mɔɔ-desee ko bíí
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dɔya ɗaŋ nɛ̀ laa’ɛ ga.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, bíí nɛ́ géé búk géè.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ saa sara kɔ‘m.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpe zer'nɛ́ tɛ aia-nú kɔ‘m na,
wen mi nɛ́ gɛnɛ ti'nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà kɔ‘m yaa so ndɛn nɛ̀ zu kao nɛnɛ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yí‘nɛ́ tɛ‘m yinɛ ha̧‘m ɔm benaŋ
hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ fe ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ‘m kaɗa.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Mi ee ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧,
ɓɛɛ kinii a̧ zika tɛ pii tɛ‘m,
a̧ zia sara kɔ‘m.
A̧ daka'm gbonɛ kɔ̧ ɗaŋ gboŋgo,
a̧ daka'm gbonɛ ɗɔɔ gba ɓɔtɛ-bin-be-zɔŋa,
a̧ baa'm e zu kam-ta,
a̧ dee ha̧ naŋ-am mɛ nɔ nù.
A̧ ee mbe gima kɔ̧ nú‘m:
gima'i nɛ́ gima zɔna Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a tɛ zɔk mɔ‘i, kíì tɛ de wa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e see-wa tɛ GASA WAN.
O bíí nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN,
nɛ̀ zik tɛ sitɛ o wi-ŋgazu in o wi-ndela na,
ya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
gasamɔ n’ɛnɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɔ dɔka nyɛmna;
ɛnɛ gbaa war mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a nyɛmna,
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ bo na.
Kóó mi a̧ taa so mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ ɓɛɓɛt n’ɛnɛ dea,
bó nɛ́ mi tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔr so tɔr pi̧ nù na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ hu̧i̧a̧ zer-am ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ndé,
bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ ɗafa-sɔ̧ in ha̧a̧mɔ na,
bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kii nɛ́ ɗafa-sɔ̧ in
wen ea ɗaŋmɔ h’ɛɛ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧: «Mi'i tɛ‘i ha̧‘m mɛ de mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kara kalata k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga.»
Mi kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de nɛ́ mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧,
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ dua-see-am.
Mi wee ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́
ti mɔi̧a-a ko gba gíí bíí,
mi kpe nú‘m na, GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa hegɔ mbɛt.
Mi hu̧si deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ see-am na;
mi wee ɗoŋ demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in gbakamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi hu̧si yora-ɗoŋ-wen in kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́
ti mɔi̧a-a ko gba gíí bíí na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, ká demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyaŋ am na;
yora-ɗoŋ-wen in kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpas'am ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Bɔnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na zika'm e see-a,
dɔka yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m tika zu'm,
ɓɛɛ yí‘m zɔk mɔ ɓɔna,
wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m dɔka gan mu̧i̧-zu'm;
ŋgai bo tɛ‘m ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nik naŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ gbaka'm na, GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am wa!
GASA WAN, foe a̧ ba o wi nɛ kii mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ‘i,
búù a̧ ba wa!
O wi nɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m, hi̧i̧ye, hi̧i̧ye,
mɔ'ɔ ba tɛ‘m hegɔ wó‘i,
bele'e zar wa wen taamɔ-saka-yí kɔ-wa'i!
O wi-kii-sɔnti'nɛ́ a̧ ya nɛ desee!
Tortɛ a̧ ba wa ti'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ é ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ e see tɛ‘nɛ́‘i mɛ tɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ:
«GASA WAN ɔ gasa!»
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m kinii, mi nɛ́ wi-kɔsa in wi-bɔnɛ,
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ bee!
Wi-gbak-am in wi-kpas'am nɛ́ ɛnɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nik naŋ‘nɛ́ na!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Wi nɛ̀ ta mɔ wen o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na,
duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
Ŋgimbi ŋgayamɔ GASA WAN tɛ kpasi wi’ɛi;
GASA WAN tɛ pɛm a̧, GASA WAN tɛ kpas'a;
wi’ɛi tɛ kpa desee zaŋnu’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN beka e ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik er o wi-sɛn-a
ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧a̧ in a̧ na.
GASA WAN tɛ gbak a̧ gɔn gado zɛɛ,
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ nyimmɔ ko wi’ɛi mɛ ga̧ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am wen mi dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́».
O wisɛn kɔ‘m tɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋ wen zu'm,
wen nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«A̧ tɛ fe bɔɔ mɛ gese ge
ha̧ nin-a mɛ bi zu nù yinɛ ge?»
Kà o wisɛn kɔ‘m tɛ́ mɛ zɔk am,
mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ ha̧‘m nɛ́ o gee-yà-zu-wen nɛ̀ ŋgɔn géè;
see-wa duna nɛ̀ sɛnmɔ zu'm,
ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi nɛ́ ɗaŋ nyɛrɛ-tɛ‘m yaknɛ.
O wi-sɛn-am nɔ‘i fu̧i̧ nɛ wen a zer ŋmaa;
wen nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Hi̧i̧ye, mɔ'ɔ ba tɛ-a hegɔ!
Nɛ́ zɛɛ-fio'o ba a̧‘i!
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ n'aa ɔɔ nù kaɗi’ɛ, kura-a bo ɓɔna!»
Kóó gba de gbama-yari kɔ‘m,
wan n’ɛɛ e so zu mɔ k’ɛɛ kpɔk in ŋmaa'i,
wan nɛ nyɔŋ so mɔ in am kpɔk'i,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ hu̧i̧ kɔ‘i nɛ́ dukui naŋ-wi ŋma nɛ‘m mbɛt!
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ ko ha̧‘m!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá‘m e ŋgɔn ha̧‘m kifi er ha̧ wa!
Kà o wisɛn kɔ‘m nɔ‘i nɛ́ gana'm mɛ gai mɔ a zu'm na,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ iŋ ndé, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ sɛm kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m n’ɛnɛ yor ɗoŋ-am'i zaŋ duka-a kɔ‘m zóóŋ‘i,
mi tɛ yor ɓɔnsɛnɛ sɛn ti'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
wan nɛ duk kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo'i!
Aamɛn! Aamɛn!
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wɔ yì gbɛ nana zambɛrɛ
ɓɛɛ ká a̧ kia yì mɛ nɔ'ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m de nɛ̀ wɔ‘nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
See-am de wɔ Sɔ̧ dee nyɛmna;
Sɔ̧, wan nɛ̀ dúk kpasa,
mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk bɔɔ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ gese ge?
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘m zɛ nɛ̀ wese nɛ́ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧.
O wisɛn kɔ‘m ŋgii nɛ̀‘m nɛ̀ wen ak nɛ̀‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ ndé:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘i duk kɔ‘i si déè?»
Tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ de duka-a kɔ‘m nɛti,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m ga̧ zíŋ-zíŋ ŋgimbi n'am taa mɔ
hɔ fara nɛ̀ o giiwi mɔi̧ so sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi gɔma duk ti ha̧ wa daŋ nɛnɛ si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧
nɛ̀ gima-tortɛ in zɔnamɔ gbaŋa ko giiwi nɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ sa'm ak tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m ndé:
kinii mi tɛ duk bɔɔ nɛ̀ dita-see siti wen ge?
Mi tɛ pɛ bɔɔ see-am zu ge mɔ ge ɓɔ ge?
Mi tɛ e Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m;
mi tɛ zɔn a̧ woyo wen a̧ nɛ́ wi-kpas'am,
a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Mi duka zu Jurdɛn mgbara kaya Hɛrmɔŋ in Mitsar nɛ dita-see,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m mbaŋ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́.
Dir-yì sa nɛ ŋmaa, wi zii nɛ giti som-yì nɛnɛ;
ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m duka zu'm hee mi a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ yì
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ pɛŋa-yì in kin-yì k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaka zu'm ga.
GASA WAN a̧ usi
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ zɛ a̧ a̧ usi gima-bìì ha̧‘m mɛ bìì zɔn nɛ̀ a̧,
ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ kɔfa a̧ wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa!
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kam-ta kɔ‘m; mi tɛ ak a̧:
«Tɛ‘nɛ́ bi bɔɔ ɗoŋ am wen ge?
A̧‘m dúk nɛ́ duka-a nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee nɛnɛ
tɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr nɛ o wisɛn kɔ‘m de in am'i nde?»
Zɛkɛɗ‘am nɛ̀ o wi-kur-zu'm zɛkɛɗi'i
duk tɛ‘m hee wi wɔŋga nɛ̀‘m ga.
Wa gɔm nɛ ɗálá zu'm ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ndé:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘i duk kɔ‘i si déè?»
Kinii mi tɛ duk bɔɔ nɛ́ dita-see siti wen ge?
Mi tɛ pɛ bɔɔ see-am zu ge mɔ ɓɔ ge?
Mi tɛ e nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m;
mi tɛ zɔn a̧ woyo wen a̧ nɛ wan-kpas'am,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ mgbara wen’ɛ ha̧‘m na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi nɛ̀ de ko na’ɛ
in er o wi-ɔr-wi in o wi-gbɛ-zu nɔ'ɔ mbɛt.
Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m;
héé ge s’ɛnɛ siŋ bɔɔ mi pi̧ taŋ'ɛ ge?
Wen ge mi tɛ yar nɛ̀ dita-see
zu bɔnɛ nɛ̀ o wisɛn de in am’ɛ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm sa̧a̧mɔ in kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m
wen ha̧ wa mɛ mgbɔ‘m nɛnɛ sitɛ sa̧a̧ kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́,
in fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ nɛ si fara-ɗafi'nɛ,
Sɔ̧ wan-ha̧-desee ha̧‘m,
mi tɛ de nyɛŋɛ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ kunde,
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
Kinii mi tɛ duk bɔɔ nɛ dita-see siti wen ge?
Mi tɛ pɛ bɔɔ see-am zu ge mɔ ge ɓɔ ge?
Mi tɛ e nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m;
mi tɛ zɔn a̧ woyo wen a̧ nɛ́ wan-kpas'am,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ wee so ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ
n’ɛnɛ dee so ŋgimbi kɔ-wa ɓeemɛ;
wen-aa ɛɛ zia nɛ̀ zer yɛ.
Ɛnɛ ndaka o tugun bíí yinɛ tɛ nù'ɛ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧ fara kɔ-wa ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ,
ɛnɛ usa bɔnɛ ha̧ o dukbíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpa fara,
wen bó nɛ́ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ baa nù nɛ̀ gba-paa kɔ-wa na,
bó nɛ́ ŋgai mɛ er-wa a̧ kpasa wa na mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋga er'nɛ́ mɛ wiiko in sa̧a̧mɔ sɔnti'nɛ́ a̧ kpasa wa,
wen ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so wa nyɛmna.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ baa ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ Jakob mɛ gan o wisɛn kɔ‘i;
ɛnɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yo o wi-kur-zu yɛ nɛ̀ nù,
ɓɛɛ nin'nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ i̧si̧ o wi-kur-zu yɛ nɛ̀ naŋ mbɛt.
Mi e ta nɛ kusaa-góò
ká bá nɛ̀ gba-paa kɔ‘m na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ gan o wisɛn k’ɛɛ;
ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ ziimɔ zu wa mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wese'i ɛɛ dee nyɛŋɛ nɛ̀ nin Sɔ̧
zɔn nɛ̀ nin-a hegɔɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ ee yɛ duk;
ɛ́nɛ́ ee yɛ hee geemɔ ga,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ biro in o wi-biro k’ɛɛ ɓɔna.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yu mɔ yak ti o wi-kur-zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa kaia demɔ k’ɛɛ yaknɛ
hee see-wa kɔ̧a̧ ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kaia ɛɛ ha̧ wa
hee saɗi nɛ̀‘i kai nɛnɛ mɛ gɔn’ɛ ga,
ɛ́nɛ́ pɛsa yɛ sót-sót dam mgbara o tugun bíí.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔra dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
hee ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ gasamɔ yí‘nɛ́ na ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wi nɛ ya zik yɛ mɛ da̧ yɛ,
zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ ɛɛ, mam nɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ee yɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-tua-wen ko o tugun bíí;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-sɔr ko o bíí mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ mi yar nɛ̀ zuma zu
wen ziimɔ nɛ ba'm,
ɓɛɛ foe kpee yí‘m wen dara ko o bíí;
wa ɗaŋa nin-am, wa sɛn nɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa kii nɛ wen in am mbɛt.
O mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tika zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ-ɛɛ bi ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na,
ɛɛ yak zu
see yɛ kifi si ɗoŋ na,
naŋ yɛ e yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ a̧ka̧ yɛ a nú di̧i̧ ko gboo,
ɛnɛ kpee zu yɛ nɛ̀ tum-fio.
Kà tɛ-ɛɛ a̧ bí so ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nyɛi̧ so er yɛ sitɛ ŋma gɔni sɔ̧ gáà,
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ iŋa ndaa hu̧sa̧mɔ kɔ̧ see-wi lɛŋ'ɛ
tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ so na nde?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ fio zu'nɛ́ a̧ ɛɛ fe nɛnɛ wese lɛŋ'ɛ;
wa de mɔ in yɛɛ hee o sami nɛ̀‘i tɛ gɔn ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún, GASA WAN! Wen ge s’ɛnɛ ɔ ya ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr! K’ɛ́nɛ́ e yɛ wɔkɔrɔ na!
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ hu̧si sɔnti'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɛ́ɛ́ ge?
Wen ge sa tɛ‘nɛ́ bi bɔɔ ɗoŋ bɔnɛ in kɔsa k’ɛɛ'ɛ ge?
Wen ɛɛ yoo nù tɛ fuunu,
nyak zaŋ yɛ lata ɓɔn tɛ nù.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr ŋgɔn! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ wen zu dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Gima-kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: O gba-dɛŋ
See-am he nɛ yílí wen gba de wen;
mi tɛ bìì de gima kɔ‘m ha̧ wannu.
Leɓ‘am tɛ bìì gima kinii nɛ haya-a hee mɔɔ-yɔr-mɔ ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ yora ŋgaiwi gan o bem ko o bíí zu nù lɛŋ;
kɔ̧ nú‘nɛ́ duna nɛ̀ de ɔ̧ɔ̧-nyɔ̧ɔ̧-wen,
wen Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo kpoo nɛ kpoo zu'nɛ́.
Gbin-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r gba-paa guntir'nɛ́
tɛ gasamɔ in ŋgayamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ nyaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ gbín biro
wen zu kpasawen in kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔɔwen in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ŋgáŋ kusaa k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ góò k’ɛ́nɛ́;
nú-góò k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ tɔ̧a̧ pɛ́ɗɛ́ŋ-pɛ́ɗɛ́ŋ.
O dukbíí tɛ tik nù ɗɔɔ naŋ‘nɛ́,
o wisɛn ko wannu bó nɛ̀ ŋgai ɓɔna.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, damti k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk hegɔɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo;
dɔ́rá-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́rá-tanamɔ.
Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ sɛna gɔɔmɔ;
nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
tɛna nɛ́ nɔ̧́-tortɛ a zu'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ nyɛm'nɛ́ bo na.
Laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nun nɛ de pɛr nyama nɛtɛ nɛtɛ;
o wi-mbɛr-kunde ya kɔ̧ tua-nin-fɔrɔ
bíí nɛ̀ gima-desee h’ɛ́nɛ́.
O boko-bem ko wannu a̧a̧ mgbara o wi nɛ̀ ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧;
kóò ko wannu ɗafa tɛ̀ nɛ̀ de goe-lɔr mɛ Ofir zar-zar,
ɓɛɛ yor kɔ‘i nɛ̀ war wii-er'nɛ́.
Mɛ̀ zii, boko-bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ,
tɛ-mɛ'ɛ bi ɗoŋ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ in nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wannu tɛ de wɔ tɛ-mɛ.
A̧ nɛ wan kɔ-mɛ kinii, mɛ̀ gú nù ti a̧.
O bíí Tir, o gasa wanmbɔi nɔ‘i,
tɛ ha̧ o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ mɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kɔ̧ wa.
Boko-bem ko wannu ɗafa tɛ nɛ̀ de-a nyɛmna,
a̧ aa o gba de kísí-lɔr tɛ a̧;
a̧ pi̧ nɛ de sa̧a̧ laa ndáká-ndáká,
ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ nɛ a̧ si kɔ̧ kira ha̧ wannu;
o gbama-zɔŋa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa
mgbɔ nɛ̀ a̧ nɛnɛ tululu sitɛ‘nɛ́;
wa nɛ́ nɛ̀ desee in tortɛ si kɔ̧ kira ko wannu mɛ.
O bezaŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ ya oi o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛnɛ tɛ e wa nɛ̀ o be-wan dam zaŋnu fara lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur
hɔ tɛ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ nɛ tɛ ko ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o dukbíí tɛ gasi'nɛ́ hegɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ̀ mɔɔ-dɔm.
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si k’ɛɛ in ŋgai k’ɛɛ mbɛt;
a̧ duk katɛ yɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbak yɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ.
Kóó nù naka so,
kóó o kaya naka so gbin a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp,
kóó o som-yì kura so in pɛŋa-yì
mɛ́ de ha̧ o gasa kaya mɛ nak mɛ mbaŋ a nù,
kíì beka de ɛɛ na,
wen GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko o gii wi-biro a̧a̧ in yɛɛ;
Sɔ̧ ko Jakob nɛ́ ŋga-fara-duk k’ɛɛ.
Ŋma yì a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ foka-a ko gbaa er-a
ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ o bíí ye ko Sɔ̧,
nɛ̀ de ha̧ fara-duk ko GASA WAN nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ̀
mɛ́ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧.
Sɔ̧ duk kɔ‘i see ye'i, ɓɛɛ ye'i beka yai na.
Sɔ̧ tɛ gbak ye'i mɛ gɔna-ndaa-zan.
O tugun bíí dika gɛrɛm,
o mɔɔ-wan yukuta ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ hee ger,
ɓɛɛ zaŋnu ɗaŋ lɛŋ,
wen GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko o gíí wi-biro a̧a̧ in yɛɛ;
Sɔ̧ ko Jakob nɛ́ ŋga-fara-duk k’ɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔk o zɔm mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN dea;
a̧ dee mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi dam zaŋnu lɛŋ.
A̧ dee ha̧ biro mɛ kaɗi hɔ nduti nù mɛ,
a̧ gbina kusaa-góò, nukuri te-sɛ́ɛ̀ kɔ-wa
a nù ŋgɛrɛm-ŋgɛrɛm,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ o ŋgee-biro kɔ-wa bíí wee kór-kór.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá keɗeŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ nde, mi nɛ́ Sɔ̧!
Nɛ́ mi'i ɔ wan zu o dukbíí,
nɛ́ mi'i ɔ wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko o gii wi-biro a̧a̧ in yɛɛ;
Sɔ̧ ko Jakob nɛ́ ŋga-fara-yaa k’ɛɛ.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
O bíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓú er'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n Sɔ̧ nɛ desee,
wen GASA WAN, wan nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
bó nɛ́ wi nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ̀ zɛŋ na!
A̧ nɛ GASA WAN zu nù lɛŋ!
A̧ ee yɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbíí,
a̧ dee ha̧ o tugun bíí mɛ ya ɗɔɔ naŋ yɛ;
a̧ hoka nù h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya sɛnɛ.
Nù‘i nɛ gasamɔ ko Jakob, wi n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna.
Sɔ̧ daŋa si zu damti kɔ‘i
ŋgimbi sumbura a̧ in dɔma zak ha̧ a̧.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ́lí mɔɔ-dɔm ha̧ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ́lí nɛ̀ de-a!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ́lí mɔɔ-dɔm ha̧ wannu k’ɛɛ,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔli nɛ̀ de-a!
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wannu zu nù lɛŋ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndíkírí gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧!
A̧ duk zu sa̧a̧ damti kɔ̧-a̧
ɔ nɛ̀ wan zu o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na mbɛt.
O be-wan ko o dukbíí mɔi̧a ŋmaa
in o bíí ko Sɔ̧ ko Abraham,
wen o ŋgee-biro zaŋnu lɛŋ nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore.
GASA WAN nɛ́ zɔm mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nyɛma so kànà ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ ya
saaye ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ mɛ̀ mɛ́ zɔn a̧;
ye'i duk zu sa̧a̧ kaya
Nɛ́ kaya'i a̧ ha̧ desee ha̧ bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ.
ɓɛɛ ye ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ zu kaya'i.
Sɔ̧ duk kɔ̧ tua-wan kɔ‘i nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si ko o bíí ye'i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k, o wannu mɔi̧a ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ nɔsi ŋmaa tɛnɛ mɛ bi ye'i;
wa hɔa zɔk ye'i ŋmɛk, ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗɛ-wa gɔn!
Bele zara wa,
ɓɛɛ wa gbin gɔɗɛ̧ɛ̧ yu mɔ yak.
Tɛ-wa naka, ɓɛɛ wa bi nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu
hee nàá-zaŋ nɛ̀ de mɛ ko bem ga.
Ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ búk-daŋa-wese
nɛ̀ mbaŋ o gasa kombon Tarsis ɓɔnsɛnɛ‘i
a̧ dee ŋmaa in wa.
Mɔ n’ɛɛ zia so nɛti,
nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛɛ zɔka nɛ̀ yí-ɛɛ mbɛt.
Mɔ‘i dea sɛn gasa ye ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ye ko GASA WAN ko o gíí wi-biro.
Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ ye'i mɛ yor keŋ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ yá kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́
ɓɛɛ tɛ-ɛɛ mbaŋa ɗoŋ
Sɔ̧, nin'nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ hura dam zaŋnu lɛŋ;
o bíí tɛ gasi kànà ɛnɛ hegɔ hɔ nduti-nù mɛ mbɛt.
Wii-er'nɛ́ duna nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Kaya
o boko-bem ko Juda ya nɛ̀ tortɛ tɛ gɔna kita k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yár zík ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o kusa ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o garo nɛ̀ zika ye'i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbáɗí o tua-wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye'i mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ ɗoŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa ndé:
Sɔ̧‘i nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, wan nɛ̀ duk kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo;
a̧ nɛ́ wi-duk-ti k’ɛɛ.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ o dukbíí lɛŋ!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí zaŋnu,
o gasawi in o géé bíí,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wanmbɔi in o wisan, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́!
Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋma iŋa-mgbara-mɔ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́
wen ŋma gasa iŋamɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-am'i,
n'am tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tua-wen;
mi tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ sumgba h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ gima-kunde.
Ŋgimbi-bɔnɛ tɛ‘m tɛ nak bɔɔ wen ge?
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ sɛnmɔ ko bíí tɛ ndak am mɛ kɛr am e see-a,
tɛ‘m tɛ nak wen ge?
O wi nɔ‘i e ta nɛ̀ mbɔi kɔ-wa;
wa ŋmaŋ tɛ zu dɔka mbɔi kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ wi beka ha̧ mɔ mɛ gɔn nɛ̀ zu-wi nɛ̀ tɛ-wi na.
Wi beka gɔn zu duka-kpasa er Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbɔi na mbɛt,
wen mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ ha̧ gɔn nɛ̀ zu duka-kpasa er Sɔ̧ bó kóó kpɔk na;
mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ ha̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ lɛŋ beka nyɛm yí-a na.
Ŋma ɓɔn-zan-bíí so sɛnɛ?
Bíí beka fe so na?
O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fe mbɛt’ɛ!
O wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na in o ŋga-wi
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fe kànà fee mbɛt’ɛ!
Ɓɛɛ wa ee mbɔi kɔ-wa ɓɔn ha̧ o bíí mɛ ɗoŋ.
O pɛsi kɔ-wa tɛ ya nɛ́ fara-duk kɔ-wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kóó wa gbara so nin ye kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nin-wa,
sɔŋkur fara-duk kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ̧ pɛsi kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Kà bíí nɛ́ ku̧u̧ naŋ kpaa mɔ kaɗi,
ɓan na, ɓɛɛ wa ee iŋa-mgbara-mɔ duk.
O wi nɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in mɔ-dai nɛ‘i ba nɛnɛ mɛ gɔn;
hegɔ mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ ee ta nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ wa de.
Kà wa tɔ̧́ be wen laŋ,
ɓɛɛ o bíí ndaka pata wa kaɗi.
Fio tɛ dai wa hee o sami nɛ̀‘i kai nɛnɛ mɛ gbɛ ga;
kà mɔ sá̧ kaɗi, wi zɔk oi-wa ɓɔna.
Fara-duk kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ ye ko o fio mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ gan wa.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧ tɛ kpas'am sɛn ɗɔɔ ŋga er fio;
a̧ tɛ kpɛk am.
Kà ŋma bíí nɛ́ kpaa dɔka mbɔi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ nyɛrɛ mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧‘i hura yaknɛ mbɛt,
ká ɗɛɗɛ‘nɛ́ gɔn na!
Ŋgimbi fio wi’ɛi beka ba ŋma mɔ nɛnɛ si fara-a mɛ na,
gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ beka zir si ɗɔɔ mɛ in a̧ na mbɛt.
A̧ duka so mɛ tɔ̧ ndé:
wi tɛ zɔk kɔ‘i tɛ-wi nɛ de-a
ha̧ o bíí mɛ zɔn wi wó,
tɛ-a n'aa zɔna so ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ̧-a̧‘i
tɛ yak kànà sóróm si ɗoŋ o zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ
nɛ̀ wa beka zɔk kɔ-wa wese nɛ̀ yí-wa woyo ɓɔna!
Kà bíí nɛ́ ku̧u̧ naŋ kpaa mɔ kaɗi,
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na, ɓɛɛ wa ee iŋa-mgbara-mɔ duk.
O wi nɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in mɔ-dai nɛ̀‘i ba nɛnɛ mɛ gɔn.
Gima ko Asaf.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ gana o ŋma sɔ̧ lɛŋ
tɔ̧ nɛ́ wen sa nɛ̀ o bíí zaŋnu;
nɛ̀ tɛ daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ yee-wese
sɔnti Sɔ̧ tok ŋgol-ŋgol nɛ̀ gba de ye
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ à̧ tɛ́! Ká a̧ duk nɛ oi-nú ɓɔna!
Gasa wee-dɔ-wi a̧a̧ ti ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ duk zik a̧ nɛ́ gba búk-kórò.
A̧ sa nɛ o mɔ mɛ yiwese in o mɔ mɛ zaŋnu mbɛt;
Sɔ̧ sa wa mɛ zii gɔna-kita zu dukbíí kɔ‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o wi-mbo-zu nɛ̀ nɔɔ so tɔk in am
tɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m.
Yiwese a̧ we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Sɔ̧,
wen wan-gɔn-kita nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ!
Dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i!
O be
«Mi nɛ́ Sɔ̧, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́!»
Bó nɛ́ mi tɔ̧ wen a zu'nɛ́ wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
bó nɛ́ dɔɔ kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m a̧ ɗaŋ see-am na mbɛt;
bó nɛ́ mi kii nɛ gasa wiwii-ndai k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
kóó vala gbadua k’ɛ́nɛ́ na mbɛt,
wen o saɗi zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ ya’ɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ-dai kɔ‘m.
O saɗi nɛ̀ gbisi zu o gíí kaya nɛnɛ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ kɔ‘m.
Mi iŋa o nɔ̧́í̧ ɗɔɔ yiwese lɛŋ;
ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ yar nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kɔ‘m na bo na.
Kóó so nɛ́ wɔ'ɔ gbɛɛ so'm,
mi beka tɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
wen nù in mɔ nɛ ya zaŋ-aa lɛŋ nɛ́ kɔ‘m;
kpoo wiwii-ndai nɔ‘i,
mi nyɔŋ so kɔ‘m nyɔŋ,
kà bó nɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔk vala gbadua nɔ‘i k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i?
Ɗafa-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ duk nɛ́ dee osoko ɛ̧,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so nú‘nɛ́ mɛ de
ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ‘i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé kànà ŋgaɓo!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá‘m wese bɔnɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi tɛ kpasi'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tu̧ tɛ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ ndé:
Mɛ́ we bɔɔ ɗoŋ o tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ‘m wen ge?
Mɛ́ tɔ̧ bɔɔ wen
nɛ̀ ndàrá-nú-mɛ sɔɔ géè wen ge?
