Wen bó nɛ́ mɛ́ zii mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m zii na;
bó nɛ́ mɛ́ kasi wen kɔ‘m kasi na mbɛt.
Kɔ-mɛ, kà mɛ zɔ́k wi-zuzu,
ɓɛɛ mɛ gbama yari in a̧,
mɛ́ bá nɛ́ sɛm in o wi-de-dàlà mbɛt;
kɔ̧ nú-mɛ duna nɛ̀ ɗaŋ wen,
ɓan na ɓɛɛ leɓe-mɛ dee ndela kaɗi.
Fara nɛ̀ mɛ duk nù sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
kɔ-mɛ kànà nɛ́ ɓira wen ndela e nú nya-mɛ,
kai nɛ̀ ndaa o gbo-ɗoŋ-mɛ mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ de'i, mɛ ta kɔ-mɛ ndé,
mi beka tɔ̧ wen á zu mɛ na?
Mɛ́ zɔka mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in mɛɛ?
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ Sɔ̧'ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá zu'nɛ́
wen ká‘m tɛɛ gbɔsi'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wi-kpasi'nɛ́ beka bo na.
Wi nɛ̀ ɗafi Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ déé osoko gasi nɛ̀‘m,
ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ ndak pata yuwar demɔ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ iŋ ndé,
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ wi-kpas'aa.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima;
ŋgimbi nɛ
Tɛ̀ demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, GASA WAN;
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m yinɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fɔ́r ndiŋmɔ kɔ̧ see-am yinɛ ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m yinɛ.
Mi iŋa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m
wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m'i duk ɓɔn yí‘m;
ɗaŋmɔ n'am dea'i, mi dee kànà h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɔ nɛ̀ de tɛ‘nɛ́ na, nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧‘m dea.
Hegɔ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu'm duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a
nɛ̀ ŋma kafɛ bo sɛnɛ na.
Nɛ̀ nàà kɔ‘m baa nɛ̀ zaŋ-am kó nɛ‘m,
mi kànà nɛ́ wi-ɗaŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kpasawen mɛ duk kɔ̧ see-wi;
hegɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ɗuka iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fɔ́r see-am nɛ̀ sa̧-ndiŋ
ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ hee talum
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zúí am ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ sa̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ kpa desee
ha̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m nɛ gbina so tɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i
mɛ nak yɔyɛ nɛ̀ tortɛ woyo.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wɛ́r yí‘nɛ́ si mgbɔɔr zu yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ yinɛ.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ see-am mɛ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mbe taamɔ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ndak am yinɛ sɛn ti'nɛ́ na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba Sa̧a̧
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am wen ha̧‘m mɛ kpa desee
tɛ gbaka mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ woyo;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ taamɔ ha̧‘m wen ha̧‘m mɛ mbo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ usi yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi-de-ŋgazu,
ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ a̧ra̧ so tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Sɔ̧, wan-kpas'am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ fio,
ɓɛɛ leɓ‘am tɛ zɔn deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú‘m ha̧‘m mɛ bìì gima-zɔn'nɛ́.
Wen bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ ɗafi nɛ́ ɛnɛ na;
kóó kà bó só ha̧‘m mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt gáà,
bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɛk so kpɛk na.
Sɔ̧, ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ́ see-am nɛ̀ ŋmana'i,
wen k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ e see-wi nɛ̀ ŋmana tɛ geemɔ na.
Tɛ desee k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé demɔ ha̧
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn woyo nɛ oi garo lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɗafi'nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ tɛ kpa desee sɛnɛ.
Wa tɛ dɔ kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wa tɛ dɔ ŋma nɛ̀ oi kii-aa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gɔn wiwii-ndai zu
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima;
ŋgimbi nɛ Dowɛg, be Edɔm, nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Saul ndé, David a̧a̧ tɛ ko Ahimɛlɛk.
Wi-ŋgai’ɛ, mɛ́ zɔn tɛ-mɛ zu ɗaŋmɔ wen ge?
Taamɔ kɔ-mɛ duk kànà nɛ́ zu ɗaŋa mɔ ɓɛɛ gɔ?
Mɛ wi-ruŋgu’ɛ, leɓe-mɛ duk hee tɔ̧́ɔ̧́-nú-pai ga!
Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋmɔ gan demɔ,
mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ndela gan kpasawen;
mɛ wi-ruŋgu’ɛ, wen kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ́ wen-yɔ-bíí!
Sɔ̧ tɛ mbɔli mɛ wen mɔ‘i;
a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ mɛ mbulɛɛ yinɛ war kpɔk,
a̧ tɛ zuɗi mɛ gbonɛ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ,
a̧ tɛ zuɗi mɛ yinɛ zu nù ko o wi nɛ̀ ya kpasa.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a tɛ zɔk mɔ‘i;
kíì tɛ de wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ mam wi’ɛi, wa tɛ tɔ̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wi nɛ e so kɔ‘i GASA WAN
nɛ̀ fara-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ‘i na'i!
A̧ ee so ta nɛ̀ dɔka mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ ee so see-aa tɛ dee ŋgazu mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi duk hee te-nɔ̧́
nɛ̀ ɓɔ sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e ta'm nɛ̀ yora-ɗoŋ-wen ko Sɔ̧,
hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nɛ̀ nduti-a beka bo na.
Mi tɛ zɔn'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ wen mɔ‘i n’ɛnɛ dee ha̧‘m'i,
ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mi a̧a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ̀ mbo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́,
mi tɛ e ta'm nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́ wen nin'nɛ́ ɔ dee.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima, ŋgimbi dita-see.
O wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ta kɔ‘i ndé, Sɔ̧ bo na.
Ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-wa ɗaŋa wa lɛŋ;
ŋma wi-de-demɔ bo géé boa-a ɓɔna.
Sɔ̧ duk yiwese mɛ pi̧ nɛ̀ yí pii zu o bezaŋ Adam
ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ̀ kii Sɔ̧ nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ wó,
ɓɛɛ kóó kpɔk bo na.
Wa lɛŋ a̧ra̧, deemɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ ɗaŋa,
ŋma wi-de-demɔ bo géé boa-a kpɔk na.
O wi-de-mɔ de na nyɔŋ kɔ‘i nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m
hee brɛt-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa ga.
Wa sa nin GASA WAN na.
Wa iŋ mɔ na nde?
Bele tɛ zar wa nɛ̀ wa beka iŋ zu-a na,
wen Sɔ̧ tɛ pɛsi gba̧a̧-tɛ o wi-kɛr-am nɔ‘i;
o bíí tɛ zɛkɛɗi wa wen Sɔ̧ siŋa wa a nù kaɗi.
O'o tɛ tɛ nɛ̀
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ gbo dukbíí kɔ‘i yinɛ tɛ bara,
tortɛ tɛ ba Jakob ɓɛɛ o be
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima nɛ̀ o kunde pɛ́r-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Zif tɛɛ ak Saul ndé: «Bo nɛ David hu̧sa̧ bɔɔ mgbara yɛ na nde?»
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́.
Tɛ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m wa!
O wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ kura zu'm;
o wi-kii-wen nɔ‘i nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ‘i
e Sɔ̧ hee geemɔ ga.
Zɔk Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ gbak am'i!
A̧ nɛ́ wi-ha̧-nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi-nas'am nɔ‘i a̧ tík zu wa woyo!
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáŋ wa lɛŋ yinɛ nɛ̀ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tortɛ;
mi tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen nin'nɛ́ ɔ dee nyɛmna,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa'm tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ‘m lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi zɛkɛɗa o wisɛn kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima nɛ̀ o kunde pɛ́r-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ wora'nɛ́ n'am wor'i;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpe zer'nɛ́ tɛ aia-nú kɔ‘m na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m.
Taamɔ kɔ‘m yɔa tɛ aia-nú.
Kà‘m zii ger o wisɛn kɔ‘m in tuɓa da̧ ko o wi-ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m naka.
O wi nɔ‘i pi̧a'm tɛ kɔsa,
wa tɔ̧ nɛ ŋga-wen a zu'm nɛ̀ nyimsea.
See-am to too kpɛl kpɛl,
bele-fio zara'm pi̧ nù;
gasa kíì hɛra'm,
gba-gbana-bele baa'm mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧:
«Kà‘m kpá so wɔr-ɓaa'm hee wɔr-ɓaa gbaku̧i ga,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ bu̧i̧ so yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧ a̧‘m ɔ́m.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ yu mɔ yak nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a
mɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɔ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa so fara-hu̧si sɛnɛ
wen ká gba búk-kórò tɛɛ ɗaŋ am.»
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ sákálí ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ-wa,
wen mi zɔka dee ŋgamɔ in kpɛri dɔka saaye kɔ-wa nyɛmna;
bɔnɛ in gɔɔmɔ a̧a̧ saaye'i mbɛt.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i zik nɛ̀ mgbara kira nɛnɛ nyɛŋtɛŋ zɛ nɛ̀ wese.
Mɔɔ-ɗaŋ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa'i mbɛt;
nasa ŋmaa in wula ŋmaa nyaŋ bee-gara kɔ-wa na.
Kà bó só nɛ́ ŋma wisɛn kɔ‘m a̧ da̧‘m wó,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ ŋgiɗi mɛ ga̧ see-am;
kà bó só nɛ́ ŋma wi-kur-zu'm a̧ kura zu'm gáà,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ hu̧si;
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ̀ mɛ́, mgbák gbama-a kɔ‘m,
gba de sɛm kɔ‘m'i,
wan n’ɛɛ ya so in ŋmaa kpɔk sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧
mgbara o giiwi mɛ‘i, nɛ́ mɛ a̧ de mɔ‘i.
Fio'o tik zu wa!
Wa a̧ zir nɛ̀ zu-kpasa si ye ko o fio mɛ
wen mɔ nɛ̀ duk tɛ-wa nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, kà‘m sá mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa'm.
Mɛ tutuyɛ, mɛ wese see-zu, in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ,
mi ai nɛ́ nú gɔfi nɛ̀ mɔ sitɛ a̧
ha̧ a̧ mɛ zii tiger-am.
A̧ gɔna zu'm nɛ̀ ga̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ biro
nɛ̀ wa kii in am'i;
oee bíí nɛ̀ dɔka zu'm wa!
Sɔ̧ tɛ zii tiger-am;
nɛ́ a̧ nɛ̀ duk zu damti kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ‘i
a̧ tɛ yo wa nɛ̀ nù.
O wi nɔ‘i beka kifi see-wa ha̧ Sɔ̧ na
wen yuu-kíí Sɔ̧ bo tɛ-wa na.
Gbama-yari so'i nyɛi̧a er mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in ŋma-a,
a̧ ɗaŋa
wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a yɔka gan nɔ̧́,
ɓɛɛ mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ see-aa nɛ́ biro;
wen ko wi’ɛi ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ gan gɔrɔ,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ duk ɗɔɔ wen kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧-nu-za.
Mɛ̀ síŋ tui-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ pi̧ zu GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbak mɛ;
a̧ beka e ha̧ naŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ mbali ŋmaa na.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ Sɔ̧, ɛnɛ tɛ ir wa lɛŋ a kɔ̧ ɗuka gboŋgo;
zɛ duka-kpasa ko wi-gbɛ-zu
in o wi-ndela nɔ‘i beka dɔk zu nù'ɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Miktam, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o be Filistii bá só nɛ̀ David sɛn Gat. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Gbaku̧i zu o gasa te mɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m Sɔ̧,
wen bɔnɛ nɛ̀ o bíí de nɛ‘m’ɛ,
o wi-nukur'am de nɛ́ ŋmaa in am hegɔɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ;
wese kpɔk kpɔk o wisɛn kɔ‘m nasi nɛ‘m,
o wi-tik-zu'm ɔ dɔka nyɛmna.
GASA WAN, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ kíì ba'm,
mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ.
Mi zɔn Sɔ̧ tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧;
mi e ta nɛ̀ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ kíì de'm na.
Ge a̧ bíí tɛ de nɛ‘m ge?
Wa ɗaŋ nɛ́ wen tɛ‘m wese lɛŋ;
ɓaa taamɔ kɔ-wa kana nɛ́ kia war mɛ gbɔs'am ɓɛɛ;
wa ba nɛ́ keta'm nɛ̀ hu̧sa̧-a̧ ɓa nɛ̀ pata'm nɛnɛ
kii nɛ̀ war mɛ gbɛ‘m.
Wa beka zɔk so bɔnɛ oi ŋga-see kɔ-wa'i na?
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tik zu o wi nɔ‘i.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka bia-a kɔ‘m na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧-ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m lɛŋ a kɔ̧ dak,
ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk.
Wese n'am sa sara sitɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ nyɛɛm, o wisɛn kɔ‘m zika tɛ si ɗoŋ.
Kɔ‘m, mi iŋa kànà Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ am;
mi zɔn Sɔ̧ tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧,
mi e ta'm nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Mi e ta nɛ̀ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ kíì de'm na.
Ge a̧ bíí tɛ de nɛ‘m ge?
Sɔ̧, mɔ n'am ha̧a̧ so nú mɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i,
mi tɛ de kana;
mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧a̧mɔ-dee-osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa'm tɛ fio ha̧‘m mɛ duk ti'nɛ́
tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ duka-kpasa.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Miktam. Ŋgimbi n'aa yuu so nɛ̀ mɔ ti Saul hu̧si nɛnɛ kɔ̧ di̧i̧. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha'i mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m wa,
wen nɛ́ ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧‘m hu̧si sɛnɛ.
Mi hu̧sa̧ tɛ‘m ɗɔɔ‘nɛ́ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ
nɛ̀ duk zu'm'i tɛ yak lɛŋ.
Mi saa sara sitɛ Sɔ̧,
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
wi nɛ̀ dee mɔ ha̧‘m lɛŋ;
Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ tóm yuwar-kpasa-a kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ.
A̧ a̧ pí̧ búù zu wi-ɗaŋ-nin-am;
a̧ a̧ tóm kpasawen kɔ̧-a̧ tɛnɛ,
yor nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Mi a̧a̧ mgbara o ŋga dila-kum-bíí;
gba̧a̧ nin-wa nɛ́ labo in góò,
nú-wa nɛ́ pa̧i-toro.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ ha̧ wa zɔk,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ;
wa tuia pɛ́r dam fara-yar kɔ‘m lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi zum zu'm nɛ̀ dita-see.
Wa za̧a̧ lim ti'm,
ɓɛɛ kana nɛ́ wa a̧ tika lim'i.
Sɔ̧, see-am ga̧a̧ wa,
see-am ga̧a̧ kànà war kpɔk;
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kuli mɔɔ-mbɛr bíí nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ha̧‘m kúr bɔɔ kɔ‘m sɛ!
Kunde in koloŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧!
Baa dik kaɗi!
Wese tɛ daŋ yɛ sɔsɔɔ!
GASA WAN, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o dukbíí,
mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ mgbara o tugun bíí mbɛt.
Zɔm dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ fara lɛŋ hɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ dama tɛ tura-zan;
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù lɛŋ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Miktam. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Ká mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ na.
O gasawi, gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma sɛnɛ nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn kita gɔn zu o bíí nɛ yuwar-a nde?
Weyaa, wen nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ mɛ‘i,
bo nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̀nɛ̀ kii na,
wen tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ zaŋnu’ɛ
kànà nɛ́ nasa bíí mɛ de ŋgamɔ in wa ɓɛɛ.
Wa kànà nɛ́ wi-ɗaŋ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ-wa mɛ tɛnɛ;
a̧ra̧-a̧ ko o wi-ndela nɔ‘i
ku̧u̧ naŋ-a nɛ̀ tɛ kóó wa mɛ tɛnɛ.
Ma̧a̧da̧ a̧a̧ tɛ-wa hee ma̧a̧da̧-gɔ́k ga;
wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in firi nɛ̀ kpe zer
wen ká a̧ tɛɛ zii dɔmamɔ
ko wan-sa-gɔ́k nɛ̀ yɔ́k a̧ mɛ ba a̧.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín gba̧a̧-nin-wa yinɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dák o gake-nin o dila nɔ‘i yinɛ mbɛt,
GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa yak hee yì nɛ fok yaknɛ'ɛ ga,
wa a̧ gbín hee zɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɛsi
ɓɛɛ wi i̧sa̧ gbin nduku-nduku’ɛ ga!
Wa a̧ yák hee laɓan nɛ̀ gbo lɔti̧ɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ yar nɛnɛ ga;
wa a̧ hɔ ŋmaa in hɔɔ-bem nɛ̀ wa ko nɛ̀ wɔr
nɛ̀ zɔk tɛ wese na ga.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ tík zu wa hee gasa hara-búk ga;
a̧ a̧ dí̧ wa yaknɛ hotoŋ-hotoŋ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zuɗi nɛ̀ naakɔɓa a taŋ'ɛ ga.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa desee
tɛ zɔka kifa-er k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i;
wa tɛ fɔr naŋ-wa nɛ̀ tɔk-tɛ o wi-ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ bíí tɛ tɔ̧ ndé:
«Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa demɔ nɛ̀ mbetɛ,
wen Sɔ̧, wan-gɔn-kita a̧a̧ sɛnɛ zu nù'ɛ.»
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Miktam. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Ká mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ na, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Saul toma so nɛ o bíí kɔ‘i mɛ nɛɛ kpe David e nù kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am er o wi nɛ̀ nas'am;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m yinɛ er o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi-gbai-tɔk tɛ-wi a nù.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa kii mɛ gbɛ‘m yínɛ́'ɛ ga.
O wi-ŋgai nɔ‘i mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa bá nɛ̀ keta'm;
GASA WAN, bó nɛ́ mi dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ
kóó ŋma yɔɔ-kaya na mbɛt.
Mi de ŋma mɔ in wa na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ma nɛ̀ yì pii tɛ‘m nduɗɛɛ
kɛr nɛ‘m sɛɗɛɗɛ tɛnɛ'ɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am!
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko o gii wi-biro,
Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé bɔnɛ in o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na’ɛ!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ko ha̧ o wi-sáká-yí in o wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ‘m nɔ‘i na.
Ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ wa pii nɛ ɗoŋ woyo,
yar nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye,
de nɛ̀ da̧ hee o toyo ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí ɗaŋ wen kɔ-wa!
Nú-wa ɔ baa hee tɔ̧́ɔ̧́-nú-pai ga
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ sitɛ ŋmaa nde:
«Ŋma wi-zii-wen k’ɛɛ so bɔɔ sɛnɛ?»
GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ wa,
ɛ́nɛ́ mam nɛ o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na'i.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m,
yí‘m a̧a̧ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ tɛ Sɔ̧.
Sɔ̧, wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧‘m nyɛmna'i a̧ tɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk tika-a
ko o wi nɛ̀ hai am tɛnɛ‘i.
Sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ wa yinɛ na,
ká tɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m tɛɛ bi ɗoŋ gbina biro k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ndák wa pɛsi sót-sót nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ-wa mɛ gbin,
GASA WAN, ŋgee-gui-mɔ k’ɛɛ,
wen mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ,
mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ lɛŋ kànà nɛ́ ɗaŋ wen;
ŋmaŋa-tɛ kɔ-wa a̧ sí ɗoŋ zu wa.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ kúm wa lɛŋ
ká‘i zɔk géé zɔka oi-wa ɓɔna,
wen ɗaŋa nin'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wa ɗaŋ‘i
in wen-ndela mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa za̧i̧a̧!
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ gbɛ́ wa ha̧ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ mɛ iŋ ndé:
kànà nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu o bíí ko Jakob.
Ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ wa píí nɛ ɗoŋ woyo,
yar nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ye,
de nɛ̀ da̧ hee o toyo ga.
Zɔ́k wa wo! Kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ dee da̧ nɛnɛ
kii nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ hɔ fara nɛ̀ zaŋ-wa tɛ sur!
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ mi sumburi nɛ́ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m;
ŋgimbi bɔnɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m,
mi kuli nɛ mɔɔ-mbɛr h’ɛ́nɛ́;
ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ tɛ Sɔ̧,
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ yor ɗoŋ-am'i.
Gima nɛ David yɔra ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Miktam mɛ usi ha̧ o bíí. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Geŋa
Ŋgimbi'i ká David bi nɛ biro in Aram Naharayim ká bá nɛ̀ Aram be Soba; kale ŋgimbi'i Jɔab pia so kɔ‘i ɗoŋ mɛ pati nú o bíí Edɔm booro-ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ̀ mɔi̧a so kpa ŋmaa kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Tɔŋ.
GASA WAN, see'nɛ́ nyima so zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kai yɛ a taŋ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛɛ kaɗa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ yɛ kinii.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dee ha̧ nù mɛ nak,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dee ha̧ nù mɛ bin mbɛt;
nù a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ‘i!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé o bina-nù nɔ‘i bee!
Ɛ́nɛ́ ee ha̧ wa mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ́ nɔ ŋma ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧-zik-zu-wi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tutuwal nɛ̀ ŋgɔn ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ yu'nɛ́ mɛ zɔk,
ha̧ wa mɛ yu mɔ yak nú-góò.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú h’ɛ́ɛ́!
Wii-er'nɛ́ a̧ kpasi yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ.
Sɔ̧ baa ha̧ so nú nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ‘i mɛ ndé:
«Mi Gbin-biro, nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ nú Sikɛm ha̧ o bíí,
kànà nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sukot ha̧ o bíí mbɛt.
Galad in Manase tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m,
Efraim tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-gu-zu'm,
Juda tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́rá-wan kɔ‘m;
Mɔab tɛ duk nɛ́ gba kpáná-zui-yì kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ siŋ ndárà kɔ‘m pi̧ zu Edɔm.
O be Filistii a̧ yambali sót-sót hiɗi nɛ mɔ!»
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m ye nɛ̀ ŋga ye'i o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m hegɔɔ ye nɛ̀ nú Edɔm o?
Sɔ̧, bɔɔ nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ nɛ́ bɔɔ biro
in o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna’ɛ ge?
O'o mɔ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ kaia nɛ́ ɛɛ a taŋ kaɗi ɛ̧ gɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ tɛ bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ
wen gbakamɔ ko bíí nɛ́ geemɔ!
Kà Sɔ̧ nɛ́ yee ɗoŋ yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ de gasamɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mbɔli o wi-kur-zu-ɛɛ nɔ‘i yinɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima, nɛ̀ kunde pɛ́r-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ kɔfa'nɛ́ n'am kɔfi'i.
Mi duk nduti-nù mɛ sa nɛ̀ mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́
wen tɛ‘m lɔmgba lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá‘m e zu kam-ta nɛ̀ kusa gan am'i,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋga tua nɛ̀ gɔna ti o wisɛn.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ kpe zu'm
wen ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi n’ɛnɛ ha̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ yu'nɛ́,
nɛ́ kpɔk yí mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ pɛ wannu mɛ dɔk siti,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ duk siti ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧;
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ ɔ wan ti'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pɛm a̧.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ mi tɛ bìì gima gasi nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
mɔ n'am ha̧a̧ nú sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi,
mi tɛ de kànà mɔ‘i dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Yedutun.
Fara-ɔm-tɛ kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ katɛ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
a̧ nɛ́ wi-kpas'am;
a̧ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m, a̧ a̧ kpás'am;
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m,
naŋ-am beka mbali ŋmaa na.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-sɛn-am nɔ'ɔ,
kɔ‘m n'am wɛra wɔkdɔk hee gbina garo ga’ɛ,
n'am duk hee gbina ŋgeŋ ga’ɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ e bɔɔ nas'am duk mɛ gese ge?
Ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ géé ɔramɔ,
ɔra bíí nɛ́ desee kɔ-wa;
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see-wa mɛ wa fom nɛ́ bíí.
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ ɛ́k tɛ-mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧
wen a̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘m;
a̧ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpas'am;
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m,
naŋ-am beka mbali ŋmaa na;
a̧ ha̧a̧ gasamɔ ha̧‘m ɓɛɛ a̧ kpas'am,
a̧ nɛ́ kam-ta-ha̧-ŋgai ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN nɛ́ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m,
Ɛ́nɛ́ dukbíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ̀ a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ ha̧ a̧;
wen a̧ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si k’ɛɛ.
O bem ko Adam nɛ́ geemɔ géè hee buk ga,
o bem ko bíí nɛ́ géé faɓa mɔ géè;
kóó wi ga̧i̧a̧ so wa mɛ zɔk dita wa,
búk nɛ̀ yu’ɛ dita gan wa.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ dee ŋgamɔ na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ pɔkɔsi tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ zu̧u̧ mɔ géè na;
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kpaa mɔ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e see'nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i na.
Mi zia wen nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧ war yiitoo;
gba̧a̧ wen'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ŋgai nɛ́ ko Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-ha̧-mɔɔ-oi-tom
ha̧ o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
Gima ko David ŋga-gbárà Juda mɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
mi kii nɛ́ ɛnɛ,
mi de nɛ́ wɔ‘nɛ́,
mi ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́;
mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in kora nu nɛ̀ yì bo sɛnɛ na.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ kɔ̧
ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk ŋgayamɔ in gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
mi tɛ zɔn kànà ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn'nɛ́ ŋgimbi lɛŋ
n'am biti duk kpasa;
mi tɛ ha̧ er zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́.
Mi tɛ kpa desee ɓɛɛ see-am tɛ ga̧
hee mi nyɔŋa nɛ́ de zɔr-zɔr nɔ̧́-kpoo in mbɔ-gba̧a̧ ga;
mi tɛ de nyɛŋɛ bíí nɛ̀ gima-zɔn'nɛ́.
Mi ta mɔ wen ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgimbi n'am ɔ nù gɔn gado kɔ‘m;
kà‘m tun mɛ zɛ, mi ta kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́
wen nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ yee ɗoŋ am,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ hu̧si ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ de nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ;
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m duk kɔ‘i katɛ‘nɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wii-er'nɛ́ a̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m.
Hegɔ o wi nɛ̀ ndak am mɛ gbɛ‘m'i,
wa a̧ zír si fara ko o fio mɛ;
wa a̧ gɔ́m wa nɛ gba-paa gbɛ lɛŋ,
o ɓoŋgo a̧ nyɔ́ŋ wɔr-wa zakati nɛ nù;
ɓɛɛ wannu tɛ kpa kɔ‘i desee tɛ Sɔ̧;
wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɛ kpa zɔnamɔ
ŋgimbi nɛ nú o wi-ndela nɔ‘i tɛ kpe.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am wen mɔɔ-kíì nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ‘m de in am'i;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧s'am nɛ̀ o wi-ɗaŋ nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kɛr am’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧s'am nɛ̀ gba o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i.
Ndara nú-wa dir wi de na,
nú-wa nɛ́ pa̧i-toro;
o wi nɔ‘i hu̧si ɓútútú
a nɛ̀ wen zu wi nɛ̀ wen bo zu-a na
hee ŋma wi-pi̧-ɗaŋ-góò ga;
kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa ya nɛnɛ‘i, tɛ-wa de nyir na,
ɓan na wa pi̧i̧ góò kaɗi.
Wa som nɛ́ o ŋmaa tɛ ɗaŋ baa keta kɔ-wa,
wa kii nɛ́ fara-tui-pɛr ha̧‘m;
wa tɔ̧ kɔ-wa'e ndé,
ŋma wi-kpa-ndaa-wa bo na,
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ zɔk oi naŋ-wa bo kɔ‘i na wó,
ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧, wi-iŋ-ndaa-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ zɔk kɔ‘i nɛ́ see wi’ɛ,
kpaa ndaa mɔ kɔ-wa kaɗi.
Sɔ̧ pi̧i̧ góò ha̧ wa, soɓee góò‘i baa wa kaɗi;
a̧ kuma wa lɛŋ wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndiŋ wen kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ zɔka wɔr mi̧a zu.
Kíì tɛ de o bíí lɛŋ;
wa tɛ pɛsi nyɛrɛ tom nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea,
ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ zii mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea'i.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa desee tɛ GASA WAN,
wa tɛ hu̧si tɛ sɛn tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ o de-wi tɛ zɔn tɛ̀ tɛ-a.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Sɔ̧, o bíí a̧ zɔn'nɛ́ nɛ̀
mɔ nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ so nú sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi,
wa a̧ dé kànà ŋgaɓo,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-zii-kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko bíí.
O bíí lɛŋ tɛ tɛ tɛ‘nɛ́,
nɛ̀ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ;
o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ dɔka gan zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi-bia-a yinɛ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Wi n’ɛnɛ hoka mɛ duk nɛ́ bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee nú zala k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ sur nɛ o demɔ mɛ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ.
Sɔ̧, wi-kpasi-ɛɛ, kifa-nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́
nɛ́ gasamɔ n’ɛnɛ de tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́;
o wi nɛ ya nduti-nù
in o wi nɛ ɔ nɛ nyɛi̧a-a si see-kisi mɛ e ta nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́.
Ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔm gasamɔ
wen nɛ́ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i a̧ kasi o kaya mɛ́ ya kpɔk oi;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧ kura-a ko gba-tɔp
in zɔm pɛŋa-yì lɛŋ mɛ ga̧.
Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gai giti foomɔ ko dukbíí mbɛt.
Tɛ zɔka o gasamɔ n’ɛnɛ dea,
kíì dee o bíí hɔ nduti-nù mɛ;
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ daŋa-wese gɔm yee-wese mɛ,
tortɛ ba nɛ wa.
Kà dé, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛɛ zɔk nù;
ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ kórò, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duna nù nɛ̀ demɔ,
yì k’ɛ́nɛ́ foka a gun nyɔnɔ dɛm nɛnɛ yaknɛ.
Ɓɛɛ tom-dee k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Ɛ́nɛ́ a nɛ yì tɛ o mbùkù-nyɔnɔ,
ɛ́nɛ́ gba nɛ kii-nù,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ ha̧ nù mɛ mɔk nɛ̀ de-a,
ha̧ bɔr-mɔ mɛ dɛm nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ nyɔnɔ mɛ dɛm dam ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk kpɔk;
mɔ dɛm oi pata naŋ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Zɔ̧ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko ndai ŋga-gbárà mɛ ɓɔɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ká̧ naŋ o kaya nɛ́ fara-de-ɓɔlɔ
in fara-kpiɗi-zaŋgule ko o saɗi.
O mɔ-dai hura fara-dai-wa,
o bɔkɔ-nù kpee nɛ̀ alkamaari
ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ ya nɛ̀ tortɛ bíí nɛ̀ gima.
Gima ko wan-duk-zu-gima.
Bíí zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ a̧ súmbúrí Sɔ̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧ ndé:
«GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi nyɛmna!
«Tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma ŋmaa in ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́;
o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifa duk nɛ́ wi-sumburi'nɛ́.»
O bíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ gu nɛ́ nù ti'nɛ́,
bíí nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k deemɔ ko Sɔ̧;
tom lɛŋ n'aa dee mgbara bíí nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi.
Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ gba-tɔp mɛ ɔ̧sa̧ ta̧i-ta̧i̧ kifi nɛ́ ŋga nù,
ɓɛɛ wa ku nana-yì nɛ̀ naŋ daŋ kur mɛ.
Desee k’ɛɛ a̧ dúk tɛ Sɔ̧,
wen a̧ ɔ wan nɛ̀ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Yí-a a̧a̧ zu o tugun bíí;
ká o wi-ŋgazu ba zu nɛ̀ ŋgɔn na ŋgaɓo!
O dukbíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima gasi nɛ̀ a̧
wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ pɛm yɛ k’ɛɛ tɛɛ kɔ̧ naŋ yɛ.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ wee taamɔ k’ɛɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɔi̧a ɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ̀ boi
ha̧ boi mɛ sa̧'ɛ ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ tik yí pɛ́r,
ɛ́nɛ́ ee dita tui zu yɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ ee ha̧ o bíí mɛ i̧si̧ zu yɛ yak nɛnɛ,
ɛɛ yee yí wee in ɗɔɔ yì,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ mgbɔ yɛ gbonɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa demɔ.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ̀ píí kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ n'am baa ha̧ nú sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́
ŋgimbi ŋga bɔnɛ kɔ‘m'i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧‘m de h’ɛ́nɛ́ kinii'i.
Mi dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ zi-wee vala sami n'am dɔ‘i tɛ tur daŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́.
Mi dɔ nɛ wiwii-ndai in o vala gbadua h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-yu-kíí Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ha̧‘m we ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa dee ha̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii.
Mi saa sara
sitɛ Sɔ̧ zɔn nɛ a̧;
kà ŋma ɗaŋmɔ a̧ bòò so kɔ̧ see-am gáà,
bó nɛ́ GASA WAN tɛ̀ɛ́ zii so sara kɔ‘m zii na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN zia aia-nú kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Mi zɔn nɛ́ Sɔ̧ wen a̧ bɛ̧ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m na;
a̧ ba
Gima ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima nɛ̀ o kunde pɛ́r-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tók de yoŋgo zu yɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ tok zu yɛ
wen ha̧ o bíí zu nù lɛŋ mɛ iŋ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ha̧ o tugun bíí mɛ iŋ ndé,
ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ kpasi bíí.
O dukbíí a̧ zɔ́n nin'nɛ́, Sɔ̧!
O dukbíí nù lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n nin'nɛ́!
O tugun bíí lɛŋ a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ,
wa a̧ bíí gima,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn kita zu nù nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn kita zu o bíí nɛ̀ de-a,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ɔ wan zu o tugun bíí.
O dukbíí a̧ zɔ́n nin'nɛ́, Sɔ̧!
O dukbíí nù lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n nin'nɛ́!
Nù'ɛ dɛma nyɔnɔ nyɛmna;
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ toka de yoŋgo h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ tók de yoŋgo h’ɛ́ɛ́ siti,
ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnu dam fara lɛŋ a̧ yu kíí a̧!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ kúr ɓɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ pɛsi sót-sót,
o wi-sɛn-a a̧ yu mɔ ti a̧ yak.
Ko o wi-ɗaŋ kànà nɛ́ pɛsa-a nduɗɛɛ yak
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zi-wee pɛsi nɛnɛ dam fara lɛŋ'ɛ ga;
kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ yela-a
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ndíá yeli nɛnɛ ká̧ wee’ɛ ga,
kɔ-wa nɛ́ kuma-a mbɔlɔlɔ ti Sɔ̧ mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
ya kɔ‘i ti Sɔ̧ mɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ;
wa bíí nɛ gima-tortɛ kpíɗí nɛ̀ yɔyɛ-desee.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kuli mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yuwar ha̧ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ duk zu bu-zan zir nɛnɛ tɛnɛ‘i!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ ti GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧!
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ‘i mɛ
nɛ́ dáà ko o be-oi in wi-ye-ɗoŋ o ko-gera;
Sɔ̧ nɛ́ wi-ha̧-fara ha̧ o wi nɛ ya gba̧a̧ zu-wa ɛ̀nɛ́-wa.
A̧ gboo o wi-zɔɓɔ yinɛ ɓɛɛ wa ya nɛ̀ desee,
ɓɛɛ ko o wi-de-ŋgazu nɛ́ pofa-a nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà nɛnɛ.
Sɔ̧, nù naka so ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ mgbɔɔ nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
ɓir nɛnɛ yak nɛ ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ kórò zuɗi ɓululu tɛ tɛa-a k’ɛ́nɛ́,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dee so sɛn Sinai ga, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ dɔka demɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́
hee kórò nɛ̀ hɔ a zu nyɔnɔ k’ɛɛ'ɛ ga;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ faɓa so'i mɛ dɔk siti,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yaa so nɛ́ o wisan
dee ye sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ ɗafa so ha̧ wa tɛ
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ wen kɔ‘i ha̧ o betom kɔ‘i
mɛ okoo-a mɛ tɔ̧:
«Sɔ̧, wan-ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ndaka o gii wi-biro a taŋ sót-sót.
O wannu in o wi-biro kɔ-wa pɛsa pamyala yu mɔ yak
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o okoo a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi-wa nɛ̀ er ŋmaa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɗafi tɛ-wa nɛ̀ mbɔi-tɛ
duk nɛnɛ kɛɗu-kɛɗu hee tɛndɛɛ
wa aa de ŋgol-ŋgol kísí tɛ-wa
hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɓɔrɔ nɛ̀ gbisi zu kaya Tum
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ ɓɔn kɔ̧ tua-ŋgui nde?»
Kaya Basaŋ só nɛ́ kaya ko Sɔ̧?
Bó nɛ́ géé kaya-ŋmaŋ-tɛ na?
K’ɛ́nɛ́ o kaya-ŋmaŋ-tɛ nɔ'ɔ,
wen ge s’ɛnɛ e kaya
nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka mɛ duk sɛnɛ tɛ geemɔ géè ge?
GASA WAN tɛ duk kànà zu kaya'i kpoo nɛ kpoo.
GASA WAN tɛɛ nɛ zu kaya Sinai
pii kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua kɔ‘i
nɛ̀ o dɔka keekee kɔ‘i nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ kaia o bara nɛnɛ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́
daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya mɛ;
wa ha̧a̧ kii-bíí h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-gɔm-er,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kai o wi-ŋgazu nɛnɛ si fara k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i mbɛt.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ
wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ zɔk yɛ, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasi yɛ mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧-kpasi-bíí;
kànà nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ‘i a̧ kpasi bíí tɛ fio,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mbɔli zu o wi-sɛn-a;
a̧ tɛ mbaŋ zu o wi nɛ̀ ŋmaŋ tɛ zu ɗaŋmɔ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi tɛ kai wa nɛ̀ zu kaya Basaŋ mɛ pii ɗoŋ,
mi tɛ kai wa nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ ɗuka gba-tɔp mɛ gbonɛ,
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ pi̧ naŋ-mɛ ɗɔɔ tɔk tɛ o wi-sɛn-mɛ
in ha̧ o toyo kɔ-mɛ mɛ ndal tɔk'i mbɛt.»
O bíí zɔka gbara-a ko o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧,
wa zɔka gbara-a ko o bíí ko Sɔ̧, wannu kɔ‘m,
nɛ̀ gbar nɛnɛ si kɔ̧
O wi-bii-gima nɛka nɛti,
o wi-mbɛr-mɔ nɛka ndaa-gɔtɔ,
ɓɛɛ o be-zɔŋa nɛk kɔ-wa see-a mbɛt nɛ̀ be bi̧ɔ̧.
Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-kɔ̧-gima, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n Sɔ̧,
ɛ́nɛ́, o bezaŋ
Bɛnjamin, be-ɗoŋ duka so hi̧i̧ mbɛt,
nɛ́ à̧ á̧ duka ti ha̧ wa;
o bezaŋ-wan ko Juda nɛka kɔ‘i nɛ̀ de dap-laa kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wan ko Zabulɔŋ in Nɛftalii
yaa so kànà in wa mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ duka so kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́
zu kaya Jerusalɛm gbak nɛ̀ ɛɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ kinii ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n geŋa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ o wannu mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɛ ha̧ ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ násí boko-nam nɛ̀ duk poo toro'i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ násí o bíí nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ya
hee o wiwii-ndai in o be-ndai ga'i;
wa a̧ mɔ́k see-wa,
wa a̧ káí o lɔr in bu-mbɔi tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́sí o dukbíí nɔ‘i
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ biro hegɔ‘i sót-sót a taŋ.
O gasawi mɛ Egiptɛ tɛ gar tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o be Etiopii tɛ gɔm er sitɛ Sɔ̧ mbɛt.
O wannu zu nù'ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ Sɔ̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r o bi̧ɔ̧ zɔn nɛ̀ a̧!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ŋgan nyaŋa
sɛn yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo;
a̧ a̧ tɛ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí dika tiger-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧!
Gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ zu
ɓɛɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ dama tɛ tura-zan lɛŋ;
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kɔ̧
wi de zɛŋ in a̧ na!
A̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ ko
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ ŋgai in ŋgayamɔ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n Sɔ̧!
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Gba-dɛŋ.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am!
Yì daŋa'm hɔ tiger-am kaɗi!
Mi yee ɓɔtɛ-bin-be-zɔŋa,
fara-e-naŋ-am bo na;
mi yee nɛ́ zɔm ɗuka yì yak zu'm lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ kin-yì ba'm yaknɛ.
Tɛ‘m mbɔia tɛ saa sara sitɛ Sɔ̧,
ger-am fara kaɗi;
yí‘m ɗuka tɛ pɛma Sɔ̧, gbakna a̧ tɛɛ kpas'am.
O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ sɛn am géè'ɛ,
dɔka wa gana mu̧i̧-zu'm;
o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɔ mɛ ba tɛ‘m sɔɔ géè‘i ya mgbiɗiɗi;
mɔ n'am ba er wa na,
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ wa ak er-am.
Sɔ̧, mɔɔ-mgbele n'am dee so'i, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa;
o yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti'nɛ́.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ foe mɛ de o wi-e-ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ wen zu'm na;
Sɔ̧ ko
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ ziimɔ mɛ ba o wi-kii'nɛ́ na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu'nɛ́ a̧‘m zɔk nɛ̀ bɔnɛ dara’ɛ;
dara nɔ‘i pi̧ nɛ foe tɛ‘m nyɛmna.
Mi kifa gɔni bem mgbara o nya'm,
ɓɛɛ o mgbák bem ko nàà kɔ‘m iŋ yí‘m ɓɔna.
Wɔ duka-a kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ‘m gbɛɛ lɛk-lɛk,
ɓɛɛ dara nɛ̀ wa da̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ‘i pii ɗoŋ tik nɛ́ zu'm.
Kà‘m tɔ̧‘e ha̧‘m de bɔnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ‘m nɛ̀ zima-yì wó,
wa puta'm kpút-kpút gu zu te;
kà‘m tɔ̧‘e ha̧‘m pi̧ laa-zim-mɔ tɛ‘m ha̧ wa zɔk wó,
ɓɛɛ wa zɛkɛɗa'm mɛ fe e sɛnɛ.
O wi nɛ̀ ya bee-gara saaye zɔk am
hee mɔɔ-de-zɛŋ kɔ-wa ga;
ko o wi-nɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kànà nɛ́ ea'm nɛ̀ gima ɓɔnsɛnɛ
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ nin-am.
GASA WAN, mi ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de ŋgimbi’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m tɛ gasa
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am ɗɔɔ gba ɓɔtɛ'ɛ
ká‘m tɛɛ ye yak nɛ̀ oi zu'm;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wisɛn kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am ká‘m tɛɛ fe yì.
Ká o pɛŋa-yì kpe zu'm na,
ká‘m tik kɔ̧ gboŋgo na,
ká wa gbɛ‘m nɛ̀ zu-kpasa na.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m
tɛ
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ pii tɛ‘m tɛ gasa dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si sɔnti'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Mi a̧a̧ tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m bee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii katɛ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er oi nú‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wisɛn kɔ‘m.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka da̧a̧‘m nɛ̀ wa da̧‘i!
O wi-nukur'am nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa wa.
Dara nɛ̀ wa da̧ nɛ‘m'i gbina gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m lɛŋ.
Ŋma nyina nɛ̀ tɛ kpas'am tɛ foe
in ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m'i bo na.
Mi taa so kɔ‘m ndé,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa ŋma wi-de-ko ha̧‘m wó,
ɓɛɛ bo na, ŋma wi-ga̧-see-am bo na kóó kpɔk.
War nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ wa ha̧‘m nɛ́ ɔ̧nɔ̧;
wɔ-yì gbɛa'm ɓɛɛ wa ɗu nɛ́ kpa̧i̧a̧-dɔ̧ɔ̧ e nú‘m.
Fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ-wa a̧ dúk nɛ́ lim ha̧ wa;
kpaamɔ kɔ-wa a̧ dúk nɛ́ sak nɛ̀ tɛ tik wa.
Yí-wa a̧ bá tum, ká wa zɔk mɔ na,
ɗoŋ-wa a̧ bír ɓɔn kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ tík zu wa,
a̧ dɔ wa hee wee ga;
ye kɔ-wa a̧ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà,
o tua kɔ-wa a̧ ya nɛ́ o gɛ̧ɛ̧ tua,
wen wa nukuri kɔ-wa nɛ́ bíí n’ɛnɛ gusa kaɗi.
Wa usi nɛ́ bɔnɛ ha̧ wi n’ɛnɛ dee mɔ ba tɛ-a kaɗi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓá ɗoŋ yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa lɛŋ;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ in wa nɛ yuwar-a ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí nin-wa yinɛ zaŋ kalata duka-kpasa;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔr wa mgbara o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧, kɔ‘m yaa-bira-ɗoŋ'ɛ, mi wan-da̧i̧'ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá‘m e ŋgɔn.
Mi tɛ zɔn nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ gima,
mi tɛ zɔn nin-a nɛ̀ dee osoko
wen mɔɔ nɔ‘i dee tɛ-a gan wiwii-ndai
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ zak in gbaa sara-naŋ.
O wi-mɔka-see zɔka mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ wa de nyɛŋɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ kii Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ ŋgiɗi!
GASA WAN zii aia-nú ko o wisan zii,
a̧ e o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ wa kaia nɛ̀ bara tɛ geemɔ na.
Yiwese in nù a̧ súmbúrí a̧!
Gba-tɔp in mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ a̧ súmbúrí a̧!
Wen GASA WAN tɛ kpasi
a̧ tɛ ba nù ko Juda e ŋgɔn woyo,
nɛ́ fara'i a̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ba fara ye kɔ‘i sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɔ ye nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗoŋ,
o wi-kɔ̧-ɗɔɔ nú-a tɛ ya hi̧i̧.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima wen ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka so.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kpás'am bee!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nik naŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ gbaka'm na, GASA WAN!
Foe a̧ bá o wi nɛ kii mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ‘i,
búù a̧ bá wa!
O wi nɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m ndé, hi̧i̧ye, hi̧i̧ye,
mɔ'ɔ bá tɛ‘m hegɔ wó‘i,
bele'e zár wa wen taamɔ-saka-yí kɔ-wa'i!
Wa a̧ sí ɗoŋ nɛ̀ ziimɔ!
O wi-kii-sɔnti'nɛ́ a̧ ya nɛ̀ desee,
tortɛ a̧ ba wa ti'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ é ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ e see tɛ‘nɛ́‘i mɛ tɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ ɔ gasa!»
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m kinii, mi nɛ́ wi-kɔsa in wi-bɔnɛ,
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ bee!
Wi-gbak-am in wi-kpas'am nɛ́ ɛnɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nik naŋ‘nɛ́ na!
GASA WAN,
fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m nɛ́ tɛ‘nɛ́,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ ziimɔ mɛ ba'm na.
Tɛ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ-am,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am!
Ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ́ ta-ɛk-tɛ‘m in fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m in ŋga fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m er o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi-ɔr-wi in o wi-de-ŋgamɔ nɔ'ɔ,
wen mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, GASA WAN.
Nɛ̀ bem mɛ hɔ nɛnɛ kinii, mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́,
nɛ̀ tɛ koa-a kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ,
mi ɛk tɛ‘m nɛ̀ ɛnɛ;
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ hɔ nɛnɛ kinii,
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
O bíí nɛ̀ ya’ɛ
iŋ kɔ-wa mgbara duka-a kɔ‘m n'am duk’ɛ na,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋga fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m nɛ mbetɛ;
mi bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ,
mi zɔn nɛ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧‘m taŋ tɛ sɔki kɔ‘m na;
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ŋgai tɛ‘m ku̧u̧ naŋ kaɗa-a’ɛ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e'm duk na
wen kinii o wisɛn kɔ‘m ɗaŋ nɛ wen tɛ‘m nɛnɛ;
o wi-kii-am gbɛgbɛri kii nɛ‘m e nɛ̀ ɗɔra tɛ‘m mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ o ŋmaa:
«Sɔ̧ ea a̧ duk kaɗi, ɛ̀ɛ̀ násí a̧ ŋgaɓo!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ bá a̧, ŋma wi-gbak a̧ bo kɔ‘i na!»
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ dúk katɛ‘m bee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am!
Foe a̧ tik zu o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m'i,
wa a̧ kum kum lɛŋ!
Ziimɔ'ɔ ba o bíí nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in am,
búù a̧ ba wa lɛŋ!
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ
mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ gan kuti-a;
mi tɛ we ɗoŋ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a,
tɛ̀ kpas'am n’ɛnɛ kpasa'i hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ zɔn ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ we ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen demɔ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ usa so mɔ ha̧‘m
ŋgimbi n'am biti so nɛ̀ bem mɛ,
ɓɛɛ hɔ kinii mi we kànà nɛ́ ɗoŋ gasamɔ n’ɛnɛ dea.
Kóó nɛ̀ oi sɔki in mbui zu'm'i,
Sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e'm duk na;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧‘m mɛ we ɗoŋ o gasamɔ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dea ha̧ o bíí
in ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o bezaŋ mɛ ɗoŋ.
Deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a ɔ gasa, Sɔ̧;
o mɔ n’ɛnɛ dea nɛ́ o zɔm mɔ;
nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ o?
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧‘m mɛ duk nɛ̀ dita-see,
in ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk bɔnɛ mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ kpas'am,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ dak am gbonɛ kɔ̧ ɗuka kɔ̧-fio zaŋnu’ɛ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ duk siti,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ ga̧ see-am mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ,
mi tɛ mbɛr kunde de nɛ̀ osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́
tɛ yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i;
mi tɛ kuli koloŋ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mi tɛ de nyɛŋɛ ɔli nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́
wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kpasa'm;
mi tɛ we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́
hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ foe in ziimɔ a̧ tik zu o bíí lɛŋ
nɛ̀ yeŋ nɛ̀ bɔnɛ kɔ‘m!
Gima ko Salomɔŋ.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é gɔna kita er wannu,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ bezaŋ-aa,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ gɔn kita zu o dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɛ̧ mgbara wen ko o wi-mɔka-see nɛ̀ de-a mbɛt.
O gasa kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí ga̧a̧mɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ dukbíí;
a̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o wisan nɛ yuwar-a,
a̧ tɛ kpasi bem ko o wi-kɔsa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi-de-ŋgamɔ, a̧ tɛ hɔ̧n zu-wa.
A̧ tɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wese in nyaŋa-zɛ
duk nɛnɛ pɛ gɔmŋmaa gɔmŋmaa’ɛ ga;
demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk hee kórò
nɛ̀ hɔ a zu mbɔɗi zɔ̧ nɛ̀ gbai mbɛlɛlɛ'ɛ ga,
hee kórò nɛ̀ ai mbul-mbul a zu nù
mɛ ɓɔ kora-nù'ɛ ga.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ dɔk tɛ ŋgimbi-wan kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ duk zu o bíí kɔ̧-a̧
hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ kaɗa-a ko nù;
nù kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yiŋga-nù mgbara o gba-tɔp yiitoo’ɛ,
nú-wan kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ nana-yì Efrat hɔ nɛnɛ nduti-nù mɛ.
O boko-nam tɛ hai nɛ mbɔɗɔnu ti naŋ-a,
ɓɛɛ o wi-sɛn-a tɛ gbur zaŋ nɛ̀ nù ti a̧;
o wan mɛ nú Tarsis in o wan nɛ ɔ see-kisi mɛ
tɛ kai ha̧a̧mɔ-gɔm-er kɔ‘i tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
O wannu Saba in Seba tɛ kai o ha̧a̧mɔ-gɔm-er kɔ‘i
tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt;
o wannu lɛŋ tɛ gu nù ti naŋ-a,
ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí tɛ mbo zu ha̧ a̧.
A̧ tɛ kpasi o wi-kɔsa lɛŋ nɛ tɛ ai nú sitɛ a̧
in o wi-kɔsa nɛ̀ wi-gbak-wa bo na mbɛt;
a̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ o ziɓa-wi in o wi-bɔnɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kpasi o ɓɔsa-wi mbɛt.
A̧ tɛ kpasi wa er o wi-nasi-wa in o wi-de-ŋgamɔ in wa;
a̧ beka e ha̧ tɔk tɛ-wa mɛ fok a nù géè na.
Wannu kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ!
Ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ha̧ lɔr nu Saba ha̧ a̧!
Wa a̧ wor Sɔ̧ wen-aa ɓɔnsɛnɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ tok de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧ zɛ de nɛnɛ hegɔɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Nyɔnɔ a̧ dɛm nɛ́ kpasa dema-a
dam fara lɛŋ hɔ nɛnɛ zu kaya mɛ!
O be mboŋgo a̧ gasi hee o be mboŋgo nú Libaŋ mɛ ga.
O bɔr nyɔnɔ a̧ dɛm hee zɔ̧ ga!
Bíí a̧ zɔn nin wannu hegɔɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
nin-a a̧ hur ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo!
O bíí zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ tɛ kpa
o tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ tu̧ tɛ-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Kànà nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ dee o gasa mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n de nin-a hegɔɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dun zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ!
Aamɛn! Aamɛn!
Nduti kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko David, bem ko Jɛse nɛ mɔ‘i.
Gima ko Asaf.
Kpasawen, Sɔ̧ nɛ́ wi-de-demɔ ha̧ o be
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-de-demɔ ha̧ o wi-sa̧a̧-see.
Oi-aa ɓɔna ŋgɛlɛk ɓɛɛ naŋ-am tɛ̀ɛ́ mbali ŋmaa;
ŋma mɔ de'm na, mi tira nɛ́ yɔɔ-mɔ sɔɔ géè
wen mi dee so wɔ-mɔ ko o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ
ŋgimbi n'am zɔka so nɛ̀ de duka-a ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɔ‘i.
Yaa-a kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa ya'i,
mɔ ba tɛ-wa na hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi fio kɔ-wa.
Wa ya nɛ̀ haya-tɛ nɛ̀ de-a nɛ̀ ŋmaŋa-a sɛn-sɛn nɛnɛ.
Wa zɔk bɔnɛ hee o ŋma bíí ga na;
mɔ ba tɛ-wa hee oi o dɔka bíí ga na mbɛt.
Wen hegɔ, gasa-zu kɔ-wa duk hee kísí-pi̧-ger-wa ga;
dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa duk hee laa-pi̧-tɛ ga.
Sɛnmɔ gbo nɛ̀ sɔnti-wa gboloŋ hee nɔ̧́ ga;
taamɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ ruŋgu.
Wa zɛkɛɗi nɛ o bíí sukuɗi nɛ̀ wen ha̧ wa nɛnɛ;
wa ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-wa zɔn nɛ̀ ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ wa de.
Kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ kpoko-wen si yiwese
ha̧ nɛ o zɔm heembea nɔ‘i kɔ-wa'i ha̧ o bíí zu nù.
Nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧ de ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘m
mɛ gbin yak sitɛ wa
wen wen kɔ-wa baa zer-wa,
wen wa ta kɔ-wa hee ge ndé:
«Sɔ̧ tɛ de héé ge iŋ nɛ̀ ndaa mɔ k’ɛɛ ge?
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ iŋa so mɔ lɛŋ?»
O wi-ɗaŋ nɔ'ɔ ɓɔn!
O wanmbɔi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ ɓan wa na’ɛ!
Zɔ́k wa wo!
Mi pɔkɔsi bɔɔ kɔ‘m tɛ‘m tɛ duka-a nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see
dor nɛ̀ tɛ‘m tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ wen ge?
Yí-mɔ n'am kpa oi-aa kànà nɛ́ gus'am n’ɛnɛ gusi
nɛ̀ tuyɛ hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ‘i ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ̀ tuyɛ lɛŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ usa bɔnɛ ha̧‘m.
Kà bó só ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ wen
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i ga,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ e so ɗɔra tɛ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi taa mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i hegɔɔ ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ mgbara-a wó,
ɓɛɛ mɔ-aa ŋgaia gan am.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi n'am yee nɛnɛ kɔ
a̧‘m kpaa nɛ̀ ndaa mɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i.
Kpasawen, ɛ́nɛ́ ee wa mgbák zuma kaya mɛ kaɗi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sɔ́mgbí wa si ɗaŋ fara mɛ!
Ɓɛɛ hee gɔma-yí ga,
wa tɛ kifi duk nɛ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi;
bele tɛ gbɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yɔ lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi tuna-a k’ɛ́nɛ́, tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ bi ɗoŋ wa
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ-wi bi nɛ ɗoŋ géé tum zu nɛ̀‘i ɔ'ɛ ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ see-am duka nɛnɛ zɛkɛkɛ‘i,
a̧ ŋma mɔ toka nɛ̀ gbaaza'm sar;
mi duka so nɛ́ ŋma mgbelewi nɛ̀ iŋ mɔ na
hee ŋma saɗi ga ti'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi ɓɔn kànà ti'nɛ́‘i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ baa'm e ŋgɔn;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mgbɔ‘m nɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbɔrɔ ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ba'm e tɛ gasamɔ.
Ŋma bíí kɔ‘m sɛn yiwese nɛ̀ yaka zu'nɛ́ bo na,
ɓɛɛ kà‘m duk katɛ‘nɛ́ kaɗi,
wɔ mɔɔ-nù gbɛ‘m ɓɔna;
see-am baa'nɛ́ nyɛmna
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ̀ tɛ dak zu tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ yɔ;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ e'nɛ́ duk,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mgbák mɔ nɛ̀ see-am hoka
nɛ́ duka-a katɛ Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN, mi hu̧sa̧ tɛ‘nɛ́
ha̧‘m mɛ we ɗoŋ o tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Gima ko Asaf.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, wen ge s’ɛnɛ pi̧ yɛ taŋ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ tuɓi bɔɔ da̧ a zu o bíí
nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ge?
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ dukbíí
n’ɛnɛ baa hok so nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ,
n’ɛnɛ baa gɔn zu wa mɛ ya nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́,
bɛɛ ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ kaya
fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i, na mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ naŋ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii gba bɛɛ-oi’ɛ
wen o wisɛn ɗaŋa o mɔ
kɔ̧
o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ yaa hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ kɔ̧ fara-gasi'nɛ́ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa yɔr kpoko-wen
nɛ‘i tɛ iŋ nɛti na zu nú tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ndura o de yɔka-te kɔ̧ tua'i
nɛ̀ kpi̧i̧ in dɔnɔ a nù lɛŋ;
wa pi̧i̧ wee tɛ
dɔ a nù gbuɗuk.
Mɔ nɛ wa dea'i pi̧i̧ ziimɔ zu nin'nɛ́, GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kúm wa a nù war kpɔk ŋgaɓo!»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa dɔɔ o fara-kpa-ŋmaa in Sɔ̧ zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ yinɛ.
Kinii Sɔ̧ usi mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́ hee kuti-a ga ɓɔna;
o
ŋma bíí mɛ iŋ ŋgimbi
nɛ̀ bɔnɛ'ɛ tɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ zu yɛ bo na mbɛt.
GASA WAN, o wi-kur-zu yɛ tɛ duk kànà
tɛ ɗaŋa nin'nɛ́ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
O wi nɔ‘i tɛ fɛŋ kànà nin'nɛ́ yaknɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧i̧ nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ daka bɔɔ er'nɛ́ si ɗoŋ wen ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si bɔɔ wii-er'nɛ́ ɗɔɔ ti-kɔ-ɓaa'nɛ́ wen ge?
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wannu kɔ‘m nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-kpasi o bíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ mbaŋa so gba-tɔp tɛ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ mbɔla zu ndiɓa ɗɔɔ yì.
Ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ̧na zu ndiɓa'i,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ wɔr-aa ha̧ o gba-toyo mɛ nyɔŋ;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee o be-zer in o foka gbar-gbar-yì.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o gasa nana-yì nɛ ɔ̧si̧ so na
mɛ ɔ̧si̧ kor kútú-kútú.
Wese in zɛ nɛ́ mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ee wese in sa̧a̧mɔ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gɔna mgbara nù lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ dee ŋgimbi bɛɛ in ŋgimbi ɓar mbɛt.
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋa nin'nɛ́
nɛ̀ o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ ɗaŋ‘i,
in dara nɛ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ da̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ‘i mbɛt;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ gbaku̧i̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nù
ha̧ boko-nam mɛ gbɛ na,
ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ o wi-kɔsa k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔn sɔɔ na.
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ
wen mɔ gana yɛ kaɗi,
wen o be hu̧sa̧ fara nù k’ɛɛ'ɛ lɛŋ
nɛ́ fara-de-ŋgamɔ ko o bíí;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ wi nɛ̀ o bíí nukuri’ɛ
mɛ si ɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ foe na,
ɓɛɛ o wisan in o wi-kɔsa a̧ zɔn nin'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgaɓo!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o wi-dawa nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ nin'nɛ́
hegɔɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ'ɛ!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen-dawa ko o wi-sɛn'nɛ́
in dee gitimɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ daŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́‘i mbɛt!
Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋ mɔ na.
Ɛ́ɛ́ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧;
ɛ́ɛ́ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ saa nin'nɛ́
n’ɛɛ sa we nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔ be tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɛm sɛnɛ,
mi nɛ̀ tɛ‘m tɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a.
Kóó nù'ɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ bin so nɛ̀ oi o bíí nɛ̀ ya zu-a lɛŋ,
mɔ beka de hegɔ na wen nɛ́ mi'i ee o mbiŋ-a.»
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋmaŋ tɛ na,»
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗaŋ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn tɛ geemɔ na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ su̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ da̧ nɛ̀ dara na.»
Bó nɛ́ gɔna-kita tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ ti daŋa-wese
kà bó nɛ̀ yee-wese na,
bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà,
kóó nɛ̀ ká̧ naŋ kaya na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ gɔna-kita tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ Sɔ̧.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ ŋma bíí mɛ gasi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ ŋma mɛ sir.
Ɗele ŋga kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧a̧ er GASA WAN;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ tɛn ha̧ o wi-ɗaŋ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa nɔ́ nɛ̀ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ oi mbiɗi ndaa-a lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ we ɗoŋ tom ko Sɔ̧ nɛnɛ,
mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko Jakob;
mi tɛ de ha̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ o wi-ɗaŋ nɔ‘i mɛ gbin,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa ŋgai siti.
Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima nɛ̀ kunde pɛ́r-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Wa iŋa Sɔ̧ zaŋnu ko Juda,
nin-a ɔ hura zaŋnu ko
Wa dee tua kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Salɛm,
fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ á̧ à̧ gbina nɛ̀ biro
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ góò in ŋgee
ká bá nɛ̀ o gba-paa kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔm gasa sa̧a̧mɔ
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi;
tɛ mɔ‘i ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wisɛn
mɛ siŋ o zɔm dɔka mɔ kɔ-wa a nù
ha̧ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kai nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa mɛ tir a nù
nɛ̀ fio gbéyéŋ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ oi ndaa o wi-biro mɔk gbɛlɛsuwɛɛ.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko Jakob,
nɛ́ tuɓa da̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ dee
ha̧ o nyaŋa in o keekee kɔ-wa
mɛ gbasi yumbi a zu ŋmaa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔm mɔɔ-kíì;
wi nɛ tɛ yor ti'nɛ́ ŋgimbi nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o?
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o bíí
mɛ zii gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ;
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ kur mɛ gɔn kita
kpasi nɛ̀ o wi-mɔka-see,
nù duk nɛ̀ kíì selele.
Nyimsea ko bíí tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-zɔn'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔi̧ oi ndaa bíí nɛ̀ tɛ kpasi
ɗɔɔ nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ sitɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nú‘nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya zik Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧,
wan nɛ‘i tɛ yu dɔ-zu-nɛ-wee!
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba
a̧ nɛ́ zɔm mɔɔ-pi̧-kíì tɛ o wannu zu nù'ɛ.
Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima Yedutun.
Mi ai nú sa nɛ̀ sara sitɛ Sɔ̧;
kà‘m sa mɔ ai nɛ̀ nú ɓɛɛ a̧ zia tiger-am.
Mi kia GASA WAN wese nɛ̀ mɔ baa so nɛ tɛ‘m,
mi nyɛi̧a er-am sitɛ a̧ nɛ̀ zɛ hegɔ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ,
mi mbɔi na.
Kóó hegɔ mbɛt, see-am kɔ̧ mɛ ga̧ na.
Tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ mi gɔfi mɔ;
mi taa mɔ mbɛt ɓɛɛ see-am gɔn.
Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ saŋa-seŋge mɛ ba'm,
see-am dita nyɛmna ɓɛɛ wen bu̧i̧ nú‘m yak.
Mi taa mɔ zu ŋgimbi nɛ̀ yaka,
tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ o gba̧‘a̧ pɛ
nɛ̀ yaka so ɓeemɛ mbɛt.
Mi ku̧i̧a mɔ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ see-am
ta nɛ̀ mɔ hegɔɔ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ;
mi kia mɔ ɓɛɛ mi ak tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m ndé:
GASA WAN pi̧a'm pi̧i̧ taŋ wɔsɔsɔ kaɗi nde?
A̧ beka de demɔ ha̧‘m ɓɔna?
hɔ tɛ o bezaŋ-am mɛ lɛŋ nde?
Tɛ́ Sɔ̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ dee ko kɔ‘i ɓɔna?
Kóó nɛ́ nyimsea a̧ ŋgaia see-aa yak zale hegɔ‘i nde?
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧: «Mgbák yí-mɔ nɛ ba tɛ‘m’ɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
er-deemɔ nɛ̀ Dáà wan nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
de so in am'i kpaia».
Ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m mbaŋ ɗoŋ gasamɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN dee so,
tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-kifi
n'aa dee so nɛti ɓeemɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi we ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ sɛn kɔ̧ see-am,
ɓɛɛ mi ta mɔ zu o gasa mɔɔ nɔ‘i n'aa dee so'i.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧, yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ nyɛmna,
ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ so bɔɔ sɛnɛ?
Ɓaa Sɔ̧ kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ, wan-de-gasamɔ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ mgbara o dukbíí;
ɛ́nɛ́ gɔna zu dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́,
o bezaŋ Jakob in Jozɛf, nɛ̀ ŋga er'nɛ́.
Géé zɔka'nɛ́ nɛ̀ nana-yì zɔka,
soɓee, a̧ zika tɛ si zu pata-a tɔmiyɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɗuka dir gba-tɔp ŋmai̧a buka̧i̧;
o bu-zan nɛ́ yeli a nù,
aŋgasa nɛ́ pi̧ ger nù,
o góò k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ gɔm pamyala;
gba-ìì k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mgbimgbi,
kórò nɛ́ pi̧ yí gɔm ti-zan lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nù nak ɗirr.
Yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓira yak nɛ̀ see gba-tɔp,
gba-war k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaka nɛ̀ zu o nana-yì
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí beka iŋ oi pata naŋ‘nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ daia dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ er Moisɛ in Arɔŋ hee gíí sami ga.
Gima ko Asaf.
O bíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ heembea kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m;
mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ lizaŋ,
mi tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara o hu̧sa̧mɔ
nɛ̀ dee so ɓeemɛ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́.
O mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o mɔ n’ɛɛ zia so,
n’ɛɛ iŋa so mgbara-a mbɛt
wen o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ wee so ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛti,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ beka hu̧si o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ o bezaŋ-wa na.
Ɛɛ tɛ we kànà ɗoŋ-aa
ha̧ o bezaŋ mɛ ɗoŋ nɛ tɛ tɛ.
Ɛɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧
in ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ in o demɔ lɛŋ n'aa dea.
A̧ gɔna geŋa ha̧ Jakob,
a̧ ee heembea sɛn mgbara o be
zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dáà k’ɛɛ
mɛ we kànà ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa,
wen ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa mɛ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ tɛ‘i
mɛ iŋ mgbara-a,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ wa mɛ we ɗoŋ o mɔ nɛ̀ dee so'i
ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa mbɛt.
Hegɔ wa a̧ é ta nɛ Sɔ̧,
ká tɛ-wa bi ɗoŋ gasamɔ n'aa dee so na,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ kásí kànà nɛ́ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ká o bezaŋ-wa yá o wi-ŋgazu in o wi-ŋgoo-zer
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o dáà kɔ-wa yaa so nɛti ga na,
nɛ̀ see-wa duk tɛ Sɔ̧ kpɔk na,
ɓɛɛ wa mbo zu ha̧ a̧ na mbɛt.
O bezaŋ Efraim, o wan-pi̧-góò gbina
zik tɛ si ɗoŋ wese biro;
wa kasi
wa kɔ̧ ndaka ɗoŋ heembea kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt.
Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ o zɔm gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧
in o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ n'aa dee sɛn yí wa,
wen a̧ dee so mɔɔ-kifi ti o dáà kɔ-wa
sɛn Tanis, nú Egiptɛ mɛ.
A̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ yì ɔ̧si̧ daŋ kur kai nɛ̀ wa ku nɛnɛ;
a̧ dee ha̧ foka-yì mɛ gɔn híɗáŋ ɓɔn kpɔk fara
hee gba-zu a'i kpee ga.
A̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ mɛ wese nɛ̀ bu-zan,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ a̧ dee ha̧ sa̧a̧mɔ-wee mɛ yak duk ti ha̧ wa.
A̧ mbaŋa o kam-ta ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
yì gboo sɛnɛ yor zɔra dɔŋgɔrɔɔ,
o bíí gar nɔ hegɔɔ takaɗi;
a̧ dee ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ ta fok nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɔi̧ de gasa nana-yì.
Zu demɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa'i,
wa dee ɗaŋmɔ siti gan kuti-a;
wa dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà,
wa wee Sɔ̧ tɛ kɔfa nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ-wa.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kura zu Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ nyɛma mɛ gi nyɔŋmɔ e ti yɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà hɛ̧ɛ̧?
Zɔk, a̧ gusa kam-ta,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yì gboo fok nɛnɛ sululu,
o be-zer mɛ zaŋ-aa kɛ̧ɛ̧ kɔ‘i
fok pɛsi nɛnɛ lata-lata,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko kam-nyɔŋ,
a̧ tɛ nyɛm mɛ ha̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ nde?
Kóó nɛ́ ha̧a̧ kpoo ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ tɛ gan a̧ nde?»
Ɓɛɛ wen nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧a̧‘i aa zer GASA WAN;
ɓaa a̧ŋa nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ á̧ wa aŋa a ŋgɔn kaɗi'i,
ɓɛɛ leɓe-wee nɛ́ kur nɛ́ kura-a zu Jakob,
nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ kur zu
wen wa e ta nɛ̀ a̧ na.
Wa kɔ̧ ɗɔaa'e a̧ tɛ kpasi wa na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ bu-zan mɛ ŋgɔn
ɓɛɛ a̧ hú̧í̧ nú yiwese;
hee ɓɔrɔ ga a nù ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ.
Nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ mɛ yiwese á̧ à̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
nyɔŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o betom ko Sɔ̧.
A̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a nɛ̀ sura zaŋ-wa.
A̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ kur nɛ̀ ti daŋa-wese,
a̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ
mɛ yu daŋnɛ tɛ ŋgai mɛ tɛ-a;
a̧ ha̧a̧ kpoo ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a lata-lata,
a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ zir zu wa nɛ dɔka-a
hee nyɛmɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp ga;
a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ nɔ‘i mɛ ai a nù
zu gbagari kɔ-wa zik fara-yaa kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔɔ nɔ‘i,
nɔ́ yì sur wa nɛ̀ de-a;
a̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ dee see-wa ha̧ wa gan zu-wa,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sur yí-wa na.
Bó nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ‘i kaɗa kɔ̧ nú-wa kaɗi na,
á̧ wa a̧ŋa nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo;
nɛ̀ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kuma nɛ o gasawi mgbara wa a nù ŋgokoko,
yo nɛ̀ o daŋa ŋgaiwi ko
Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wa dee ɗaŋmɔ woyo;
wa e ta nɛ̀ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa na,
ɓɛɛ hee gɔma-yí ga a̧ kuma wa a nù riɓiti.
Duka-kpasa kɔ-wa kaɗa war kpɔk.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o ŋma mgbara wa hegɔ kaɗi'i
á̧ oi dɔka-a zika nɛ̀ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ soɓee, tɛ-wa mbaŋa ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, kam-ta kɔ-wa,
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wan-kpasi-wa.
Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ndara nú-wa,
wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa nɛ́ ndela sɔɔ géè;
wa e see-wa tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ na,
wa e ta nɛ̀
Ɓɛɛ tɛ déé ko ko Sɔ̧,
a̧ bìì yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ,
a̧ de ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik zu wa na mbɛt.
Tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa,
nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ mur-tɛ géè,
wa nɛ búk nɛ̀ yu nɛnɛ
ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ zu pata na’ɛ.
War ɔ dɔka o bíí ŋgoo zer in Sɔ̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà,
wa tu̧u̧ see-aa mbɛt ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa yaa nɛnɛ hi̧i̧,
wa wee Sɔ̧ war nɛ̀ dɔka-a,
wa ɗaŋa see Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ ŋga er-a
n'aa kpasa so nɛ̀ wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
A̧ dee so mɔɔ-usi-mɔ sɛn Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn Tanis mbɛt.
A̧ kifa o yì lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɔk dekpe dekpe
wen ká bíí tɛɛ nɔ,
a̧ toma o zi̧-bia mɛ nyɔŋ wa,
in o yaa-gbazal mɛ pi̧ mɔɔ-nyɛr tɛ-wa;
a̧ dee ha̧ o diŋgo mɛ ɗaŋ nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa,
in ha̧ o gba-dɔya mɛ ɗaŋ o fɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
A̧ ɗaŋa o te-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kóró-ɓɔrɔ hú̧s-hú̧s,
a̧ toma ŋga gɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɛ nɛ̀ o gasa te-mbɔra kɔ-wa ŋgokoko.
A̧ toma o ŋga zɛɛ kum nɛ̀ o ndai kɔ-wa,
a̧ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ mbaŋ kai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa a nù lɛŋ.
A̧ pi̧i̧ kpɔra wee-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu wa;
a̧ dee ha̧ ŋga nyimsea in ɓaa-wen ká bá nɛ̀ gasa bɔnɛ
mɛ tik zu wa nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-yí-zan mɛ nɛ̀ er o betom kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ ee ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ de ŋmaa in wa,
a̧ wɔka ŋga-zɛɛ pi̧ zu wa,
a̧ kpasi wa tɛ fio na.
A̧ gusa o kaya-bem ko o be Egiptɛ gbɛ lɛŋ,
a̧ kuma o ŋga-wi mgbara bezaŋ Kam mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kaia dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧
gbo nɛ̀ fara'i hee o sami ga,
a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ si ŋga-gbárà mɛ;
a̧ zɔka wa nɛ̀ de-á, kíì de wa na.
Gba-tɔp kpee zu o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ war ko o bíí kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ ye nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧
zu kaya n'aa ɓara so nɛ̀ wii-er-a.
A̧ ndaka o wi nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na ti wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ nù ko o wi nɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi;
nɛ́ fara'i á̧ à̧ ee ha̧ o zuduk be
mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa wee Sɔ̧,
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, woyo.
Wa dee ŋgazu in a̧.
Wa a̧ra̧ e a̧ duk hee o dáà kɔ-wa dee so nɛti ga.
Deemɔ kɔ-wa gɔɔ hee ŋma ɗaŋ gɔɔ kusaa ga.
Wa ɗaŋa see Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗáfá o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zu kaya nɛnɛ.
See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa zu wa wen ɗáfá géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa dea'i a̧ŋa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧
A̧ ee fara n'aa duka so sɛnɛ
mgbara o bíí sɛn Silo mɛ duk.
A̧ ee ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ ɓar Kuɓa
nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ ŋgai in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ er-wa yinɛ.
A̧ ee ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik yí gba-paa
wen see-aa ɗaŋa zu mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧.
O daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa bia wee lɛŋ,
o be-zɔŋa zii kɔ‘i gima-baa-wíì ɓɔna;
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tika yí gba-paa,
ɓɛɛ o ko-gera kpa fara hi̧i̧-kɔ̧a̧-fio ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tuna yerem
hee ŋma wi-ɔ-ya ga,
hee ŋma ŋga-wi nɛ̀ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ yee tɛ-a ga;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa pi̧i̧ zɛɛ gba-mira-mɔ tɛ o wi-sɛn-a,
a̧ dee ha̧ búù mɛ ba wa nɛ̀ nduti-a bo na.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ o bíí nutua ko Josɛf taŋ,
a̧ hok zuduk ko Efraim na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ a̧ hoka nɛ́ zuduk bíí ko Juda
in kaya
ɓɛɛ a̧ de
A̧ dee tua'i nɛ̀ nɔa-a hee nù nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
A̧ hoka David nɛ̀ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ baa a̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ fara-dai-sami mɛ;
a̧ saa a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ daia sami mɛ tɛnɛ
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ dai Jakob, dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧,
in o be
ɓɛɛ David dai wa nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see in nɛ̀ de er mbɛt.
Gima ko Asaf.
Sɔ̧, o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na hura mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́;
wa dee ndiŋ a kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wa dee ha̧ Jerusalɛm mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi.
Wa ha̧a̧ wɔr o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese mɛ nyɔŋ,
in mur-tɛ o wi-yu-kíí‘nɛ́
ha̧ o boko-nam mɛ zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt;
tɔk tɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ fok nɛ̀ nù
hee yi ga ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm mɛ,
bíí-gun-wa bo na.
O wi nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ da̧ nɛ ɛɛ
zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ ɛɛ mam nɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn kànà
nɛ́ ɓɔna-a zu yɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ?
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kànà tɛ dee gɔya tɛ yɛ si ti
hee wee ga nde?
See'nɛ́ a̧ ɗáŋ zu o wi nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na'i,
in zu o tugun bíí nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗafi'nɛ́ na mbɛt'i,
wen wa kɛra o bezaŋ Jakob kum nɛ̀ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋ o mɔɔ-nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e wen kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ in yɛɛ
wen yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ na.
wen kinii ŋgai-tɛ-ɛɛ kaɗa nɛ̀ oi.
Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-ɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur;
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ yinɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ tɛ
Wen ge sa o wi-iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ tɔ̧ ndé:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè ndé‘i» ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er ha̧ wa oi tɔk tɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ wa gbaia so a nù.
Gɔfamɔ aia-nú ko o bara a̧ daŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár o wi nɛ̀ wa kaia so mɛ gbɛ yinɛ nɛ̀ ŋga er'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ ba nú o wi nɛ ya zik yɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
GASA WAN, oi gasa dara nɛ̀ wa da̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ‘i;
ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ, dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛɛ tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ bíí nɛ gima-zɔn'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Geŋa
Wi-dai-Israɛl, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii!
Ɛ́nɛ́ wi-mgbɔ-Israɛl hee mɔ-dai ga,
wan nɛ̀ duk zu damti nɛ̀ o keribim
ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́k ti Efraim, Bɛnjamin in Manase,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak yɛ.
GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro,
see'nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ nyima-a zu o wi-wor'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Kam-nyɔŋ in yí-nɔɔ
n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-zaŋ-wen
ko o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wisɛn k’ɛɛ mam nɛ ɛɛ.
GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zuɗa so ŋma gun nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ mɛ,
nɛ́ɛ̀ gun tɛ ŋma de nù
n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ndaka so o tugun bíí sɛnɛ yinɛ.
Nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i ɓɔa ɓɛɛ yu nɛnɛ dumgba-dumgba dam zu nu lɛŋ;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gi̧ɔ̧ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i kpee zu o gasa kaya lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ o gbaa-er-a kaɓali daŋ kpe zu o gbatui
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gbaa er-a hegɔɔ hɔ nú gba-tɔp,
ɓɛɛ o be gbaa-er-a yu hegɔɔ hɔ nú nana-yì mɛ.
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ gbina bɔɔ mɔ nɛ ɓora a̧ yínɛ́'ɛ ge,
sa o wi-ɓir-war lɛŋ nɛ̀ yak fara'i
ɓi nɛ́ waya-a yaknɛ'ɛ ge?
O ŋgake nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ daŋ kɔ‘i nɛ́ kɔ̧́ kombo mɛ
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti’ɛ,
o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ gar nyɔŋ nɛnɛ hú̧s-hú̧s.
GASA WAN ko o gii wi-biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ pii tɛ ɛɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ yí‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧'ɛ a'i!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
n’ɛnɛ guna so nɛ̀ wii-er'nɛ́'ɛ;
o bíí zuɗa nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i pi̧ tɛ wee bíí wee gbulɛɛ
hee kora ɗɔr ndai ga.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kai sɔnti'nɛ́ zɔk nɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kum gbuɗuk.
Er'nɛ́ a̧ pɛ́m wi nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ war wii-er'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m bem ko Adam n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so ŋgai ha̧ a̧'ɛ;
ɓɛɛ kinii ɛɛ beka yak nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ sa nin'nɛ́!
GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ tiger gima ko Gat.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáí gima nɛ̀ desee ha̧ Sɔ̧,
wi-ha̧-ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́'ɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ súmbúrí Sɔ̧ ko Jakob!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ díkíɗí bi̧ɔ̧! Yɔyɛ a̧ bá dik!
Er'nɛ́'ɛ wii zu kunde in koloŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia gbaŋa Mbe yí-zɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia tɛ toka mgbal-mgbal nyaŋa-zɛ gbaŋa k’ɛɛ'ɛ!
Mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ heembea sɛn mgbara o be
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Sɔ̧ ko Jakob mbɛt
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ geŋa n'aa gɔna so ha̧ Jozɛf
ŋgimbi n'aa gboo so mɛ́ bi o bíí Egiptɛ.
Mi zia ŋma gɔni-nú n'am tɛ zii so nɛti na,
ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Mi baa dita tui zu kóŋgó-ɓaa-mɛ yinɛ,
mɛ gboo ɗɔɔ bara kaɗi.
Mɛ saa'm ŋgimbi bɔnɛ nɛ tika zu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi kpasi mɛ.
Mi duka ɗɔɔ tum-kórò kifi nɛ̀ nú ha̧ mɛ,
mi wee mɛ nú yí Mɛriba.
mɛ́ nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m!
Mɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m!
Ká mɛ́ ba ŋma géé-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ e mgbara mɛ na.
Ká mɛ́ ɗafi ŋma gɔni sɔ̧ na mbɛt!
Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ;
nɛ̀ baa mɛ gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ mɛ.
Mɛ̀ ɓá nú-mɛ nɛ̀ pɛsa-a ha̧‘m a mɔ sɛnɛ dun.
Ɓɛɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m zii wen nú‘m na,
kóó ŋma be
ɓɛɛ sa'm e wa tɛ dee mɔɔ-ŋga-see kɔ-wa'i nɛnɛ.
Wa ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m a̧ bo so nɛ́ wi-zii-wen nú‘m,
ha̧ o be
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ so o wisɛn kɔ-wa a nù hee geemɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kifi er ha̧ o wi-nasi-wa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-sɛn-am tɛ̀ɛ́ de ko nɛ̀ tɛ̀ pii ká̧ naŋ-am,
bó nɛ́ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi so kaɗi na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ ko o be
in nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ yaa-bu-sap ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ zaŋ-wa sur.
Gima ko Asaf.
Sɔ̧ duk kɔ‘i tɛ baa-keta yiwese mɛ
gɔn nɛ̀ kita zu o sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kaɗi bɔɔ ɗaŋ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gese ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kaɗi yee ɗoŋ o wi-ɗaŋ mɛ gese ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita nɛ tana-a
zu o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na in o be-oi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in o wisan
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-kɔsa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó o wisan in o wi-kɔsa tɛ bɔnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó wa er o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ mbɛt.
«Wa iŋ mɔ na, wa zii mɔ na mbɛt;
wa nɛ nɔ tɛ tum,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ nù naka dam fara lɛŋ.
«Mi baa tɔ̧ so kɔ‘m'e ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o sɔ̧;
ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ o bem ko GASA WAN nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fe lɛŋ wen ŋma ɓɔn-zan-bíí ko fio bo na;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tik hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be-wan tik nɛnɛ'ɛ ga mbɛt.»
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu nù'ɛ
wen nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ɔ wan zu o tugun bíí zu nù lɛŋ.
Gima ko Asaf.
Sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ̀ oi nú‘nɛ́ na!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kur, k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk sɛ́ɛ́m ɓɔna!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ nɛ̀ dika gɛrɛm
tuɓi nɛ̀ da̧ a zu'nɛ́'ɛ!
Wa ee nú mɛ de ŋgamɔ in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wa ba nɛ ɗaŋ ŋga keta zu o bíí n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛm;
gba̧a̧ keta nɛ̀ wa ba'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ kúm wa yinɛ mgbara o tugun bíí;
ká‘i zii géé zia nin
Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa gbol-gbol mboɗi zu wen-aa kpɔk,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
O wi-ba-ɗaŋ-keta nɔ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
o be Edɔm, o be Ismaɛl, o be Mɔab in o be Hagri,
nú Gebal, Amɔŋ, Amalɛk, in o be Filistii,
ká bá nɛ̀ o be Tir,
ɓɛɛ kinii o be Asirii mbɛt mɔi̧a ŋmaa a zu wa
mɛ gbak o bezaŋ Lot.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé kale kpɔk mɔ n’ɛnɛ baa de so in Madiaŋ
in Sisɛra ká bá nɛ̀ Yabin, nú yì ko Kisɔŋ in wa;
wen ɛ́nɛ́ baa kum so wa sɛn Ɛn-Dɔr,
ɓɛɛ ká wɔr-wa mbɔr ɓuk ɓɔn mbɔɗɔnu sɔɔ géè.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé kale kpɔk mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so in Hɔrɛb
ká bá nɛ̀ Zɛb in o gasawi kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kale kpɔk mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so in Zɛba in Salmuna'i
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de kànà in o be-wan kɔ-wa mbɛt,
wen wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e nde:
«Fara-duk ko Sɔ̧‘i, ɛ̀ɛ̀ bá yinɛ er wa,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ wan sɛnɛ!»
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa mɛ ya
hee kora wa̧a̧ in yɔsɛ nɛ búk kai pɛsi yaknɛ'ɛ ga;
nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ tík zu wa hee wee-gba-zɔ̧ ga,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ in wa hee wee zɔ̧ nɛ̀ daŋ kaya leɓaa’ɛ ga.
Zɔm nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ ndák wa pɛsi sót-sót,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ zɔm ndiɓa búk mɛ pi̧ bele tɛ-wa!
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ foe zu wa
wen ha̧ wa mɛ kii'nɛ́!
Foe a̧ tík zu wa,
bele'e zár wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Búù a̧ bá wa,
fio'o zɔk ɗoŋ wa
ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ ndé,
GASA WAN nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ɔ wan zu nù lɛŋ.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ tiger gima ko Gat.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro,
fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee tɛ‘m nyɛmna.
GASA WAN, mi de wɔ‘nɛ́ nyɛmna
wen mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk bee-gara k’ɛ́nɛ́;
see-am in kiitɛ‘m sa nɛ sara
nɛ̀ tortɛ sitɛ kpasa Sɔ̧.
Kóó nɛ́ soŋdɔya nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kpasamɔ na
a̧a̧ nɛ̀ tua-ɔɔ kɔ‘i,
gbiiwara in o be-a mbɛt a̧a̧ nɛ̀ fara-ɔ kɔ‘i;
wa de tua nɔ‘i ká̧ fara-ɗafi'nɛ.
GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wannu kɔ‘m in Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt.
O wi-ɔ-kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ ya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee,
wa zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo;
o wi nɛ̀ kpa ŋgai tɛ‘nɛ́ ya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee
tɛ̀ éé see-wa tɛ daŋa-a si
Wa gboa nɛ̀ war ɗɔŋgɔ-yì nɛ̀ kora kútú-kútú,
ɓɛɛ yì kok sɛn oi naŋ-wa luŋgum;
kuti kórò dee ha̧ mɔ mɛ ɓɔ fara'i.
Ŋgai kɔ-wa tɛ dɔk dɔk siti siti
hɔ nɛnɛ ti Sɔ̧ sɛn
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wora'nɛ́ n'am wor’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, Sɔ̧ ko Jakob.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgee k’ɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ pii tɛ yɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧ wi nɛ̀ wa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a.
Duka-a fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɛ kpɔk
gana duka-a ŋma géé fara zɛ booro,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi hoka nɛ́ duka-a nú zala-tua k’ɛ́nɛ́
gan duka-a kɔ̧ tua ko wi-ɗaŋ;
wen GASA WAN nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m in ŋgee kɔ‘m.
A̧ usi nɛ
GASA WAN bɛ̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro,
wi-e-ta nɛ ɛnɛ duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ dee demɔ ha̧ nù'ɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o bem ko Jakob
nɛ̀ wa kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro mɛ pii ɗoŋ;
ɛ́nɛ́ bìì o yɔɔ-kaya ko dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kpe zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ga̧,
ɓɛɛ see'nɛ́ ga̧ zu yɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ ɛɛ pii ɗoŋ, Sɔ̧ wan-kpasi-ɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ see'nɛ́ mɛ ga̧ zu yɛ.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn kànà zu yɛ siti hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk zu yɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo nde?
Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́
ha̧ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de tortɛ ti'nɛ́ na nde?
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ!
Ha̧‘m zii a'i! Nɛ́ ge wen ge a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧‘i ge?
A̧ tɔ̧ nɛ wen ga̧a̧mɔ wen dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɔ kpɔk, ká wa si ɗoŋ tɛ dee mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ-wa so'i ɓɔna!
A̧ duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpasi o wi nɛ̀ yu kíí a̧,
ɓɛɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk zu nù k’ɛɛ'ɛ;
mboozu in kpasawen tɛ kpa ŋmaa,
ga̧a̧mɔ in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ ye ŋmaa;
kpasawen tɛ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ́ nù,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ zir kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ-a a̧ ha̧ demɔ,
ɓɛɛ nù k’ɛɛ dɛm kɔ‘i nɛ́ nyɔnɔ.
Deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a tɛ yak ti ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ ɓa kɔ‘i nɛ́ oi pata naŋ-a nɛnɛ.
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko David.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m wen mi nɛ́ wi-kɔsa in wisan.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am wen mi nɛ́ sɛm k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m, GASA WAN.
Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧‘m sa zɛ nɛ̀ wese.
Mi gɔm er h’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ wan-e-ɗaŋmɔ
in wan-de-demɔ ha̧ bíí;
dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ sa'nɛ́ ɔ gasa.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ aia-nú kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔ ba tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi saa mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́,
wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kifi nú ha̧‘m, GASA WAN.
Mgbara o sɔ̧ lɛŋ,
ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ̀ nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ bo na;
ŋma deemɔ nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in tom n’ɛnɛ dea bo na.
Tugun bíí n’ɛnɛ dea lɛŋ tɛ tu̧ tɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN,
wa tɛ tɛ mɛ zɔn nin'nɛ́
wen ɛnɛ ɔ gasa.
Kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ de gasamɔ.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m
wen ha̧‘m mɛ de mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ see-am mɛ mboɗi duk tɛ‘nɛ́.
Mi de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ see-am lɛŋ,
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ zɔn nin'nɛ́ wese ɓɔnsɛnɛ
wen ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧‘m nyɛmna;
Ɛ́nɛ́ daka'm gbonɛ nɛ̀ ɗuka fara ko fio.
Ɓɛɛ kinii Sɔ̧, o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ kura zu'm;
o wi-kii-wen nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ‘i
e'nɛ́ hee geemɔ ga.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
see'nɛ́ kur zu bíí nɛ haya-a na
wen
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík tɛ‘nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí bem ko kó-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ŋma nú
wen ha̧ o wi-sɛn-am mɛ zɔk ɓɛɛ ha̧ foe mɛ ba wa,
wen nɛ́ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN, a̧ gbak am,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ga̧ see-am.
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Sɔ̧ dee ye kɔ‘i zu o sa̧a̧ kaya;
ye'i nɛ́ dua-see-aa!
A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nú tua
A̧ zɔn nɛ́ mɛ nɛnɛ wen mɛ́ nɛ́ ye ko Sɔ̧:
«Mi tɔra Rahab in Babilɔŋ mgbara o wi nɛ̀ iŋa'm;
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wa koo o be Tir, o be Filistii,
in o be Etiopii tɛ ye kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk;
ɓɛɛ ko
wen nɛ̀ bíí lɛŋ gboo nɛ̀ hi̧i̧.
«Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ de ha̧ ye'i mɛ yor mitak.»
A̧ yɔra nin-wa lɛŋ zaŋ kalata-nin o dukbíí
wen wa nɛ́ o be-nù‘i,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wan tɛ bìì gima;
«Bíí lɛŋ kpa fara-de-ye kɔ‘i sɛn
Gima ko o bem ko Kore ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima; gima’ɛ ha̧ Heman be-nù‘i.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ wan-kpas'am,
mi sa'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wese,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zɛ mi gɔfa mɔ ti'nɛ́.
Aia-nú kɔ‘m a̧ daŋ hɔ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ kɔ‘m,
wen bɔnɛ tika zu'm,
mi hɛɗa fio kaɗi;
wa tɔra'm mgbara o fio kaɗi,
mi bó nɛ́ bíí ɓɔna.
Wa pi̧a'm mgbara o fio hee o wɔr bíí nɛ̀ ɔ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀'ɛ ga;
tɛ‘nɛ́ bìí ɗoŋ wa wen wa bo kɔ̧ er'nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧a'm kɔ̧ ɗuka kɔ̧ ti tum ndaa di̧i̧ mɛ;
nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ dita zu'm
ɓɛɛ kpe zu'm hee pɛŋa-yì ga.
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛr
ti o gbama-yari kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa pɛsa e'm duk;
wa kpee am ɓɛɛ fara ha̧‘m mɛ gbo
bó géé boa-a na.
Yí‘m ɗuka ba gba̧a̧.
Wese lɛŋ mi sa nɛ́ ɛnɛ, GASA WAN;
mi nyɛi̧ nɛ er-am sitɛ‘nɛ́.
Gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ o wi nɛ fea;
nɛ́ o wɔr a̧ tɛ kur mɛ gasi'nɛ́ nde?
Wa tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ so nyɛrɛ
sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio mɛ
kà bó nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ fara tum mɛ?
Bíí iŋa so kɔ‘i gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i fara tum'i
kà bó nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ ye ko o fio mɛ‘i?
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi sa nɛ mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN,
mi kɔfi'nɛ́ nɛ̀ tuyɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
wen ge s’ɛnɛ ndak am ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si bɔɔ sɔnti'nɛ́ nɛ̀‘m wen ge?
Bɔnɛ in fio duk ɗoŋ-am dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ bem mɛ tɛnɛ;
mi nyɔŋa nin ɗɔɔ mɔɔ-kíì k’ɛ́nɛ́ hegɔɔ takaɗi,
ɓɛɛ kinii mɔ‘i gbɔsa ba'm.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ gana zu'm;
o ŋgayamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧‘m mɛ tik ɓɔn mbulɛɛ.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i zika'm nyɛŋtɛŋ hee yì ga,
ɓɛɛ wa kpe zu'm liŋgɔm.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o sɛm kɔ‘m in o nya'm mɛ pɛsi e'm duk;
ɓaa gbama-yari kɔ‘m nɛ́ tum ɓɛɛ.
Gima ko Etaŋ, be-nù‘i.
Mi tɛ bìì gima
zɔn nɛ̀ yora-ɗoŋ-wen ko GASA WAN wese ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
mi tɛ we ɗoŋ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ o bezaŋ yɛ mɛ ɗoŋ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi'e ndé:
ɓɛɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yiwese duk nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.»
Wen Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e:
«Mi
nɛ̀ kanamɔ ha̧ David, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m:
Ŋma bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ ɔ wan ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
damti kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
GASA WAN, yiwese zɔn nɛ gasamɔ
in kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o sa̧a̧-wi.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ we zu nɛ̀ ɛnɛ ŋgɔn mɛ o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in GASA WAN mgbara o sɔ̧ o?
Tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o sa̧a̧-wi,
wi de zɛŋ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ na, wen a̧ ɔ gasa;
o wi-ya-katɛ-a ya nɛ̀ kíì.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro,
o'o nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛ̀ɛ́ o?
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ,
mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ kànà nɛ́ kpasawen.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧ kura-a ko gba-tɔp
in zɔm pɛŋa-yì mɛ ga̧;
ɛ́nɛ́ nukura Rahab gbin gbɔlɔdɔk
hee ŋma wɔr bíí a̧ wa gbɛa ga;
ɛ́nɛ́ pɛsa o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ sót-sót nɛ̀ ŋga er'nɛ́.
Yiwese nɛ̀ duk’ɛ nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nù mbɛt nɛ mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee nù in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya sɛnɛ,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.
O kaya Tabɔr in Hɛrmɔŋ sa nin'nɛ́ nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgaŋa-wi,
ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ te-er'nɛ́;
mɔɔ-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in dee demɔ,
yora-ɗoŋ-wen in kpasawen ya ti'nɛ́.
Dukbíí nɛ̀ iŋa sumbura'nɛ́ ya nɛ̀ desee,
o wi nɔ‘i tɛ nɛ kɔ‘i nɔ̀ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ sɔnti'nɛ́.
Wese lɛŋ wa de nɛ nyɛŋɛ tɛ nin'nɛ́,
wa ya nɛ̀ tortɛ zu deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa.
Tɛ
wen ŋgee k’ɛɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN;
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Ɛ́nɛ́ hɔɔ so zu,
tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen ha̧ o wi-mbo-zu h’ɛ́nɛ́;
gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi ee mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m zu ŋma wi-gbin-biro,
mi hoka nɛ́ be-ɗoŋ mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m mɛ ɔ wan.
«Wi’ɛi nɛ́ David, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɛna sa̧a̧ nɔ̧́ kɔ‘m a zu-a;
mi tɛ yor kànà ɗoŋ-aa ŋgoor,
ɓɛɛ er-am tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧.
«Wisɛn beka ɔr a̧ na,
wi nɛ̀ de mɔ de na beka de ŋgamɔ in a̧ na;
mi tɛ mbɔli o wi-kur-zu-a ɓɔn gbaayí-a,
mi tɛ mbɛr o wi-sɛn-a kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ gbɛ yinɛ.
«Kpasawen in
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba sɔnti-a nɛ̀ ŋgɔn wen zu nin-am;
mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu gba-tɔp
in o nana-yì mbɛt.
«A̧ tɛ sa'm'e: ‹Dáà kɔ‘m,
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m in kam-ta-kpas'am!›
Mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ kaya-bem kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ e a̧ nɛ́ gasawi zu o wan zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ.
«Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ-aa ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
mi ta de ha̧ o bezaŋ-aa mɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo
hee zɛ duka-a ko yiwese nɛ̀ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
«Kà o bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ heembea kɔ‘m,
kà wa nɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ tana-a yuwar kɔ‘m na,
kà wa nɛ́ gbina geŋa kɔ‘m
mbo nɛ̀ zu tɛ heembea kɔ‘m na mbɛt,
mi tɛ gusi wa nɛ̀ nyasi.
«Mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa oi ŋgazu kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, mi beka bɛ̧ yora ɗoŋ-aa na,
mi beka e
«Mi beka e
nú‘m beka kpai tɛ wen kɔ‘m na mbɛt.
Mi kana so mɔ a tɛ‘m tɛ sa̧a̧ duka-a kɔ‘m
n'am beka ɔr David na!
«O bezaŋ-aa tɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ damti kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk yí‘m
hee wese nɛ duk zu-wi ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ga;
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyaŋa-zɛ
duk nɛ̀ kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo tɛ bu-zan’ɛ ga.
Damti kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-sedaako hegɔ mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ̧a̧‘m,
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ea'm duk,
ɛ́nɛ́ dee nyimsea in wan n’ɛnɛ tɛna so nɔ̧́ a zu-a;
ɛ́nɛ́ yaia
ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋa mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ́nɛ́ gbina garo kɔ̧-a̧ a nù,
ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋa o ŋga fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧;
o wi-ɓir-war kaia mɔ er a lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ a̧ ya kɔ‘i zɛkɛɗi nɛ a̧.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kpa ŋgai zu a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o wi-kur-zu-a mɛ ya nɛ̀ desee;
ɛ́nɛ́ baa gba-paa kɔ̧-a̧ gusi nɛ̀ ta gbin kezeŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ye ɗoŋ-aa tɛ biro na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ baa dɔ́rá-wan er-a yinɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ gbina damti kɔ̧-a̧ a nù;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ sɔk nɛ̀ haya-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ ziimɔ zu-a.
GASA WAN, nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́
tɛ ɓɔn nɛ ɓɔna-a zu yɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kànà tɛ dee gɔya tɛ yɛ
hee wee ga ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ am
wen ɗoŋ ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘m zu nù'ɛ nyɛi̧ na;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee bezaŋ Adam pi̧ nù sɔɔ géè?
Ɓɔn-zan-bíí so sɛnɛ?
Ŋma wi-zin-tɛ er fio so nɛ́ o?
O kuti demɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so h’ɛ́ɛ́
a̧a̧ déè kinii ge, GASA WAN?
yora-ɗoŋ kanamɔ n’ɛnɛ kana so ha̧ David’ɛ
dee bɔɔ hee ge?
GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ dara
nɛ̀ wa da̧a̧ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi nyɔŋ kànà nɛ́ nin-am duk nɛnɛ
tɛ dara nɛ̀ dukbíí'ɛ da̧ nɛ‘m’ɛ!
O wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ da̧ nɛ dara;
fara n'am nɛ́ lɛŋ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ da̧a̧‘m nɛnɛ.
Sɔ̧ ko
Aamɛn! Aamɛn!
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko Moisɛ, bíí ko Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ duka so nɛ́ ŋga fara-hu̧si k’ɛɛ pɛ nɛ pɛ.
Nɛti h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de o kaya in nù'ɛ
in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya zaŋ-aa,
ɛ́nɛ́ so kànà nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ
nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e ndé,
o bezaŋ Adam a̧ pii ɗoŋ wó,
ɓɛɛ mbulɛɛ, wa kifa fuunu;
ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk k’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛ booro sɛn yí‘nɛ́
hee ɔɔ-zɛ kpɔk ga.
Pɛ booro yak kɔ‘i yí Sɔ̧ ɓɛlɛm
hee zɛ mɛ mboyɛɛ nɛ̀ yaka’ɛ ga.
Bíí sɛ̀n yí‘nɛ́ nɛ́ geemɔ;
wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in zɔ̧ nɛ̀ hɔ'ɛ:
mɛ tutuyɛ wa ɓɔa, wa doa,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ wa ɔ̧ka̧ ai a nù.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔɔ yɛ hee wee ga;
ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ yɛ
wen ɛ́nɛ́ ee yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ ti'nɛ́.
Hu̧sa̧mɔ k’ɛɛ duka ɓɔn yí‘nɛ́.
Nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔma ŋgimbi k’ɛɛ de dɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ pɛ duka-a k’ɛɛ yak nɛ haya-a hee gɔma-yí ga.
Pɛ duka-a ko bíí de nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
o wi nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai nyɛma duk
hɔ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar mbɛt.
Duka-a ko bíí kànà nɛ́ bɔnɛ in san;
ɓan na pɛ nɔ‘i yaka, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ bo ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ o'o iŋa ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ o?
Nɛ́ o'o iŋa bele nɛ tuɓa da̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ tɛ-wi o?
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ ndé,
wese duka-a k’ɛɛ dɔk na
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧ see yɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ GASA WAN;
ge n’ɛnɛ ɓɔn hegɔɔ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dún yɛ nɛ̀
mɛ tuyɛ wese kpɔk kpɔk h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ̀ tortɛ
bíí nɛ̀ gima wese ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgimbi desee h’ɛ́ɛ́
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi dita-see bɔnɛ
n’ɛnɛ usa so h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛti.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́
in gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ o bezaŋ-wa mbɛt.
Ga̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ a̧ dúk in yɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-tom k’ɛɛ.
Wi nɛ̀ duk kɔ‘i ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
duk ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧ wan-ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ;
wi’ɛi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋga fara-hu̧si in ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, wan n'am e nɛ̀ ta.»
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ bur mɛ tɛ pɛ́r ko wan-ɗaŋmɔ,
kpasi nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa.
A̧ tɛ pɛm mɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nana-kɔra gu nɛnɛ zu o be-a’ɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ kpa de fara-hu̧si ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-a.
Yora-ɗoŋ-wi ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ŋgee in laa-biro.
Kíì mɔɔ-zɛ beka de mɛ na,
kà bó nɛ̀ kíì góò wese na mbɛt;
mɛ beka de kíì ŋga zɛɛ nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ̀ ti tum na,
kóó ŋma ŋga mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-wi mɛ bu wese na mbɛt.
Kóó o bíí booro a̧ tira so a nù
katɛ mɛ mbɔlɔlɔ wese kpɔk,
kóó nɛ́ bíí booro ɓu a̧ tira a nù
nɛ̀ war wii-er-mɛ mbɛt,
mɔ beka fo tɛ-mɛ na,
wen kpasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ laa-biro in ŋgee kɔ-mɛ.
Kà mɛ bá yí-mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ tɛ tik zu o wi-ɗaŋ.
Kà mɛ é GASA WAN, wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
nɛ̀ fara-duk in fara-hu̧si kɔ-mɛ,
bɔnɛ beka tik zu mɛ na,
ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋga zɛɛ beka ɗɔŋ pii ká̧ tua kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt
wen a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o betom mɛ yiwese lɛŋ
ha̧ wa mɛ pɛm mɛ tɛ yuwar nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ ba lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ tɔi mɛ nɛ̀ er
wen ká mɛ tɛɛ kɔ̧ naŋ-mɛ nɛ̀ ta.
Mɛ tɛ i̧si̧ dila in kóró,
mɛ tɛ mbɔli gɔ̧ in ndiɓa.
Mi tɛ kpasi wi nɛ ndaɗi in am,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pɛm a̧ wen a̧ nɛ wi nɛ iŋa nin-am.
Kà a̧ sá‘m, ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ sara nú-a.
Kà bɔnɛ nɛ́ kpaa a̧, mi tɛ duk in a̧.
Mi tɛ gbo a̧ tɛ bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zɔn a̧.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ zɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zu nù'ɛ mɛ dɔk,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ‘e mi nɛ wan-kpasi-wi kɔ̧-a̧.
Gima wen wese-ɔm-tɛ.
Dee osoko ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ́ demɔ nyɛmna,
ndikira gima nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ dee nyɛmna.
Wee ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tutuyɛ
in gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ zaŋzɛ dee nyɛmna;
bia gima nɛ̀ kunde nɛ̀ nyak-aa ɓu
in koloŋ dee nyɛmna mbɛt.
GASA WAN, tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ desee ha̧‘m nyɛmna;
kà‘m zɔ́k tom nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dea, ɓɛɛ tortɛ baa'm.
GASA WAN, tom n’ɛnɛ dea ɔ gasa nyɛmna;
oee ɗuka taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wa!
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na iŋ kɔ‘i mɔ‘i na,
wi-ta-mɔ ɗuk na iŋ kɔ‘i mgbara mɔɔ nɔ‘i na mbɛt.
Kóó o wi-ɗaŋ dɛma so hee zɔ̧ ga,
kóó o wi-de-mɔ de na dɔka so siti,
dɔka-a kɔ-wa'i kànà nɛ́ wen fio,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ wan ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
O wi-sɛn'nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kum’ɛ,
o wi nɛ̀ de mɔ de na
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ pɛsi nɛnɛ sót sót’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m
hee zak bara-nam ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛna mbe nɔ̧́ a zu'm.
Yí‘m kɔɓa o wi-sɛn-am nɛ̀ kpe naŋ-am'i.
Mi zia wen nɛ̀ o wi-ɗaŋ tɔ̧‘i mbɛt.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk kɔ‘i hee ndɛŋgɛ ga;
a̧ tɛ gasi nɛnɛ hee
Wa guna o te nɔ‘i kɔ̧ tua ko GASA WAN;
wa tɛ gasi kɔ̧ bee-gara ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Kóó wa a̧ sɔk'i, wa a̧ wai kànà nɛnɛ‘i;
wa duk nɛ̀ de-a ɓɔ nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ
wen ha̧ wa mɛ usi ndé,
GASA WAN de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
A̧ nɛ́ kam-ta kɔ‘m;
mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ nɛ demɔ.
GASA WAN ɔɔ wan;
a̧ pi̧i̧ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kpe tɛ-a,
ŋgayamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kpee tɛ-a lɛŋ.
Sɔ̧, ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafa nù e zɛɓɛn nɛ̀ fo mɔ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafa so damti k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, o nana-yì a̧ de mɔ tɛnɛ‘i,
giti-wa a̧ de mɔ tɛnɛ‘i;
giti som-yì a̧ de mɔ tɛnɛ‘i.
GASA WAN ɔ kɔ‘i wan ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧ gana pɛŋa-a ko gba-tɔp,
ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ gana o gasa pɛŋa-yì lɛŋ.
O geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ dee nyɛmna;
GASA WAN, tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧ fara kpoo nɛ kpoo.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧-kifi-er!
Sɔ̧-kifi-er, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, wi-gɔn-kita zu nù,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom ko o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ ha̧ wa.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ zɔk o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ̀ yí géè hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ?
O wi-ɗaŋ tɛ kpa ŋgai nɛnɛ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
O wi-de-mɔ de na tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɛ̀ hee ger,
ŋmaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ, de nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ ŋgai.
GASA WAN, bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa mbɔli’ɛ,
mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ɗaŋ'ɛ;
wa gɔn nɛ ger o ko-gera in o gɛnɛ,
gbɛ nɛ̀ o be-oi yinɛ mbɛt.
Wa tɔ̧ kɔ-wa ndé,
GASA WAN zɔk kɔ‘i mɔ na,
Sɔ̧ kɔ Jakob pɛm kɔ‘i mɔ na mbɛt!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o tira-wi nɔ'ɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá zu'nɛ́!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ta-mɔ ɗuk na’ɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ bɔɔ mɔ mɛ gese ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ ta k’ɛ́nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ dee zer-wi
beka zii kɔ‘i mɔ na?
Wi nɛ̀ dee yí-wi beka zɔk mɔ na hee ge?
A̧, wi-gai o tugun bíí,
a̧ beka gai wa na hee ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi iŋamɔ ha̧ bíí.
GASA WAN iŋa taamɔ ko bíí,
ɓɛɛ taamɔ ko bíí nɛ́ geemɔ.
GASA WAN, wi n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
n’ɛnɛ usi heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ a̧ duk kɔ‘i nɛ́ desee;
ŋgimbi bɔnɛ, GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ wi’ɛi,
ɓɛɛ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ fio.
GASA WAN bɛ̧ bíí kɔ‘i na;
a̧ e mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ duk na mbɛt.
Gɔna-kita tɛ ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
tɛ mɔi̧ duk ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ye ɗoŋ-am mɛ bi biro in o wi-ɗaŋ o?
O'o tɛ gbak am mɛ bi biro in o wi-de-mɔ de na o?
Kà GASA WAN yé so ɗoŋ-am na,
ɓɛɛ mi fee so kɔ‘m kaɗi.
GASA WAN, kà‘m tɔ̧́ nde,
naŋ-am a̧ mbali ŋmaa'i,
ɓɛɛ yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m.
Tɛ gasa dita-see nɛ̀ bir am'i,
kànà nɛ́ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ga̧ see-am ɓɛɛ.
Ŋma mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ so kpɔk in o ɗaŋ wi-gɔn-kita nɔ'ɔ,
nɛ̀ e heembea tɛ geemɔ dak nɛ̀ bɔnɛ pi̧ nù'ɛ!
Wa mɔi̧ ŋmaa tik nɛ̀ zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
gbɛ nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ wen bo zu wa.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m!
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ́ kam-ta-hu̧si-tɛ kɔ‘m!
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa mɛ si ɗoŋ zu wa,
a̧ tɛ gbɛ wa yinɛ tɛ ɗaŋ kɔ-wa'i;
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ kpe nú-wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ híɗí mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN nɛ desee!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔ́n kam-ta-kpasi-ɛɛ!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ sitɛ a̧ nɛ̀ dee osoko!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔ́n nin-a nɛ̀ mɔɔ-mbɛr k’ɛɛ!
GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ gasa nyɛmna;
a̧ nɛ́ wannu nɛ̀ gana o ŋma sɔ̧ lɛŋ.
O
in o kusa kaya lɛŋ ya kɔ̧ er-a;
gba-tɔp nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧ wen nɛ́ à̧ á̧ dee a̧.
Kora-nù'ɛ nɛ́ à̧ á̧ dee nɛ̀ er-a mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gú nù,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ zugur'nɛ́ ti GASA WAN
wen nɛ́ à̧ á̧ dee yɛ,
wen a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔ-dai nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧ er-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ sɔsɔɔ.
Gba̧a̧ mbɔrɔ‘i a̧a̧:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgai see'nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ dee so sɛn Mɛriba ga na,
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ dee so sɛn Masa
ŋga-gbárà mɛ‘i’ɛ ga na mbɛt.
O zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́ wee so'm,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔk tom n'am dee so kànà‘i mbɛt.
«Tɛ pɛ ɓu-naar deemɔ kɔ-wa dee ha̧ wɔ-tɛ-wa mɛ bus'am,
nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm tɔ̧‘e,
wa nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ see a̧ra̧,
wa iŋ yuwar kɔ‘m ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ mi kan mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee ti wa ndé,
wa beka ye fara-ɔm-tɛ kɔ‘m na ndó-ndó-ndó.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima ha̧ GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa dee kpasi nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ wese lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ n'aa dea mgbara o dukbíí lɛŋ!
GASA WAN nɛ́ zɔm mɔ,
wi zɔ́n a̧ nɛ̀ kpasa zɔnamɔ.
A̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi wen a̧ gana o sɔ̧ lɛŋ.
O sɔ̧ ko o dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN á̧ dee yiwese;
sa̧a̧mɔ in gasamɔ a̧a̧ ti a̧,
ŋgai in demɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ fara kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o pɛ́r-nam ko o dukbíí,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
in ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ e ti a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ bee-gara kɔ̧-a̧;
nù lɛŋ a̧ dúk nɛ̀ naka-tɛ ti a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ dam mgbara o tugun bíí nɛnɛ‘e:
«GASA WAN nɛ́ wannu;
nɛ́ à̧ á̧ ɗafa nù mɛ duk nɛ̀ nɔa-a,
nɛ̀ fo mɔ na,
nɛ́ à̧ á̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o bíí nɛ̀ tana-a.»
Yiwese a̧ dúk nɛ̀ desee!
Nù a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ!
Gba-tɔp in o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ a̧ dik,
o mɔɔ-zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ a̧ dé tortɛ,
o te-kombo lɛŋ a̧ gáí mɔ nɛ̀ desee!
Wa a̧ yá nɛ̀ desee ti GASA WAN,
wen a̧ a̧ tɛ‘i,
a̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu nù,
a̧ tɛ ɔ wan nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
A̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o dukbíí nɛ̀ tana-a.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ɔ wan,
bíí lɛŋ zu nù a̧ yá nɛ̀ tortɛ!
O see-kisi lɛŋ a̧ dé nɛ́ nyɛŋɛ!
Tum in bu-zan zika a̧ e see-a,
deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in nɛ̀ tana-a
nɛ́ naŋ damti kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma wee yaka ti ha̧ a̧
dɔ nɛ̀ o wi-sɛn-a yinɛ katɛ a̧;
kórò pi̧a nyɛk dam zu nù lɛŋ;
nù zɔka mɔ‘i nɛ̀ naka-tɛ.
O kaya yela hee ndíá ga
ti Wan nɛ ɔ wan zu nú lɛŋ;
yiwese we nɛ́ ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧,
o dukbíí lɛŋ zɔka gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Foe a̧ bá o wi-gasi-gee-sɔ̧,
o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ tɛ geemɔ nɔ‘i!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ zugur'nɛ́ ti a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ!
o be-zɔŋa Juda ya nɛ̀ tortɛ zu gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́,
GASA WAN,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ GASA WAN,
Wan nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu nù'ɛ,
nɛ̀ gana o sɔ̧ lɛŋ!
GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ o wi-sɛn-ɗaŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pɛm nɛ o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbo wa er o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ.
Sa̧a̧mɔ tok zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
wi nɛ̀ see ɔ tana duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ wen zu nin GASA WAN!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Sa̧a̧ Wi'i dee h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí a̧ wen a̧ ɔ sa̧a̧.
Gima.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima ha̧ GASA WAN
wen a̧ dee mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi!
Kpasamɔ duk tɛ wii-er-a
wen te-er-a nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧.
GASA WAN usa ŋgai-kpasi-bíí,
ɓɛɛ a̧ usi deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a
gbaayí o wi nɛ̀ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na.
Tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ dee demɔ in yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧
zu nutua ko
O wi nɛ̀ ya nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a hɔ nduti-nù mɛ lɛŋ
zɔka kpasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
O bíí zu nù lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
O bíí lɛŋ a̧ yá nɛ̀ tortɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ koloŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ ɔ wora.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-dɔm in zak,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ súmbúrí wannu, GASA WAN k’ɛɛ!
O gba-tɔp in o mɔ nɛ̀ ya ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ a̧ dík ɗirr;
nù a̧ fó mɔ in o bíí nɛ̀ ya zu a̧ lɛŋ.
O nana-yì lɛŋ a̧ ɓú er,
o kaya lɛŋ a̧ bíí gima nɛ tortɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN wen a̧ a̧ tɛ‘i!
A̧ tɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu nù,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ wan nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
A̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o bíí nɛ̀ tana-a mbɛt.
GASA WAN ɔɔ wan ɓɛɛ o bíí ya nɛ̀ naka-tɛ;
a̧ daŋa duk zu o
GASA WAN ɔ gasa sɛn
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu dukbíí lɛŋ.
O bíí a̧ zɔ́n nin'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɔ gasa
in nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔm mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧.
A'i zɔ́n ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Wannu nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ gɔna kita nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gɔn nɛ̀ kita,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de tom tɛ Jakob.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gú nù ti mɔɔ-e-ɗɔɔ naŋ-a wen a̧ ɔ sa̧a̧!
Moisɛ in Arɔŋ yaa so mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧,
ká bá nɛ̀ Samuɛl nɛ̀ saa so nin-a'i;
wa lɛŋ saa so mɔ sitɛ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ wa.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa tɛ bu-zan,
ɓɛɛ wa kasi o yuwar-duka-a
in heembea n'aa ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ kifa nú ha̧ wa,
ɛ́nɛ́ so nɛ́ Sɔ̧-e-ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ kà wa dé ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gaia wa mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ súmbúrí GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gú nù ti sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ̧-a̧,
wen GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɔ sa̧a̧!
Gima dee osoko.
Bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ a̧ súmbúrí GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tortɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima nɛ̀ desee nɛnɛ sitɛ a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ ndé, GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧!
Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ dee yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé garo sitɛ a̧ de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé bee-gara kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ gima!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin-a!
GASA WAN nɛ́ de wi;
dee demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ɔ tana kaɗi ná kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Gima ko David.
GASA WAN, mi tɛ bìì gima h’ɛ́nɛ́;
gima'i tɛ we nɛ́ ɗoŋ dee demɔ in yora-ɗoŋ-wi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ bà nɛ́ war deemɔ nɛ̀ nyɛma sɛnɛ;
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɛ bɔɔ pii tɛ‘m mɛ gese ge?
Mi tɛ duk kɔ̧ kira kɔ‘m nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see;
mi beka kɔ̧ kɔ‘m zɔka ɗaŋmɔ katɛ‘m na.
Mi bɛ̧ɛ̧ tom ko o bíí nɛ̀ a̧ra̧ tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔɔwen
wen tom kɔ-wa de tɛ‘m na kóó tikiɗi.
Mi sɛna wi-ndela;
mi beka duk kɔ‘m kpɔk in wi-ɗaŋ na.
Mi tɛ kpe nú o wi-tɔ̧ kpɔl-kpɔl wen;
mi beka gbam yari in o wi-gɔ-tɛ
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ na.
Mi tɛ zɔk nɛ́ ɗoŋ tom ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
wen ha̧ wa mɛ duk in am;
wi nɛ̀ bá yuwar deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-gbak-am.
Wi-ɔr-mɔ beka kpa fara-duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m na;
mi beka zɔk wi-ndela yí‘m na.
Mɛ tutuyɛ mi tɛ kpe nú o wi-ɗaŋ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya zaŋnu’ɛ;
mi tɛ ndak o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ saaye ko GASA WAN yinɛ.
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko wi-bɔnɛ nɛ̀ ai nú sitɛ GASA WAN.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
sara kɔ‘m a̧ dáŋ hɔ tɛ‘nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si yí‘nɛ́ nɛ̀‘m na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m wese ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m;
wese n'am tɛ sa'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ sara nú‘m nɛ̀ haya-a.
Wen wese kɔ‘m yak hee tura-zi-wee ga;
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m nyɔŋ nɛ́ wee hee nú-gua ga.
See-am kora kɛsi hee zɔ̧-yí-sɔŋ ga,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ nú‘m ɓɔna;
mi ɔ̧ka̧ ba gba̧a̧ tɛ aia-nú kɔ‘m.
Mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in nɔ́i̧-gbara;
mi duk hee ɔ̧ka̧ diri
nɛ̀ gu zu ŋma gbina-tua ga.
Saŋa-seŋge baa'm tɛ hiɗa mɔ ɛ̀n'am
hee ŋma nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ̀ gu zu tua hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ'ɛ ga.
Wese lɛŋ o wisɛn kɔ‘m da̧ nɛ‘m;
o wi nɛ̀ yaa so zɔn nɛ̀‘m bá nɛ́ bɔnɛ kɔ‘m
fom nɛ̀ o ŋma bíí.
Mi sam nɛ́ búk-wee duk nɛnɛ,
yí-nɔɔ kɔ‘m zaŋa ŋmaa in mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧
wen nyimsea in ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu'm,
ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧i̧a̧‘m nɛ̀ ŋgɔn
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ siŋ am pi̧ nù woyo.
Duka-a kɔ‘m hɔɔ ŋmaa in gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-wi;
mi ɔ̧ka̧ kor hee zɔ̧-bɛɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo;
tɛ o bíí beka bi ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na pɛ nɛ̀ pɛ.
Hɔ tɛ pɛ́r-nam zu o pɛ́r-nam nɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr ŋgɔn,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen ŋgimbi dee ko hɔɔ kaɗi,
ŋgimbi-a nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
O wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ́ o ta
nɛ̀ wa mboo nɛ
