ɓɛɛ ko de nɛ wa wen bɛɛ-oi ye'i.
O wi nɛ̀ iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ yu a̧ dɔ zu nɛ̀ wee,
ɓɛɛ o gasa wannu lɛŋ tɛ zɔn nɛ́ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ ba ye kɔ‘i
bíí tɛ zɔk a̧ tɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ zik tɛ-a mɛ zii kɔfamɔ ko o wi-kɔsa,
a̧ beka e kɔfamɔ kɔ-wa tɛ geemɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea zu yɛ
ha̧ o bíí nɛ tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɛ tɔr
ha̧ wa mɛ gasi a̧.
GASA WAN oŋga zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ pii mbɔɗɔnu
nɛ̀ kusa sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ‘i yiwese mɛ
ha̧ a̧ mɛ zii gɔfamɔ ko o bara,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbo o bíí nɛ̀ wa gɔna kita-fio zu wa.
O bíí tɛ pɛsi nin'nɛ́ dam saaye
wa tɛ zɔn GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm,
ɓɛɛ o dukbíí in o wannu
tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa mɛ gasi a̧ mbɛt.
Ŋgai-tɛ‘m kaɗa;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ be oi ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘m zu nù'ɛ;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba'm nɛti gɔn oi ŋgimbi kɔ‘m é dúk na.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee nù nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ,
ɓɛɛ yiwese nɛ́ tom nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dea;
o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Duka-a ko o mɔɔ nɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in laa nɛ̀‘i pi̧ tɛ-wi,
ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na a̧ka̧ a nu’ɛ ga;
ɛ́nɛ́ kpai wa kpai hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i kpai nɛ̀ laa ga.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kpai na;
nduti duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo na hegɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O bem ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa fara-duk sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa tɛ ya in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gima ko David.
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ tɛ‘m lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n sa̧a̧ nin-a.
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Ká tɛ-mɛ bí ɗoŋ demɔ lɛŋ n'aa de ha̧ mɛ na.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ e yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ mɛ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasi mɛ tɛ zɛɛ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba mɛ yinɛ kɔ̧ fio,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ko ha̧ mɛ tɛ
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo tɛ-mɛ tɛ pɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ ɗoŋ pɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ mɛ nyɛi̧
hee pɛ ko zúá
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ye ɗoŋ o wi-bɔnɛ;
a̧ usa taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ Moisɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ usi ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o bem ko
GASA WAN nɛ́ wan-de-ko in wi-zɔk-bíí nɛ̀ de-a,
a̧ nɛ́ wi-yor-ɗoŋ wi nɛ̀ de nyimsea nɛ̀ haya-a na;
A̧ bó nɛ́ wi-nyiŋgɔ̧rɔ̧ na;
a̧ e kiri ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na mbɛt.
A̧ de bɔnɛ in yɛɛ
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ na;
a̧ kifi er h’ɛ́ɛ́
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ na mbɛt.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yiwese kusa nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ nù ga,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧
zu o wi-yu-kíí a̧ lɛŋ;
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ daŋa-wese nyɛi̧a nɛ̀ ŋmaa in yee-wese ga,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a̧ bá nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ yinɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ̀ ɛɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáà-wan-bem de nɛ̀ ko ha̧ o bem kɔ‘i ga,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN de nɛ̀ ko ha̧ o wi-yu-a mbɛt.
A̧ iŋa mɔ n'aa ɓoo nɛ̀ ɛ́ɛ́,
a̧ iŋa kànà ndé, ɛɛ nɛ́ fuunu.
Duka-a ko bíí yak ŋmaa in duka-a ko zɔ̧ na;
ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ gan duka-a ko do-te na.
Kà búk yu fɛɛɛ, ɓɛɛ gbéyéŋ wa aia a nù kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ wi iŋ fara nɛ̀ wa duka so sɛnɛ ɓɔna.
duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ hegɔ yaknɛ;
ɓɛɛ kà o bezaŋ-wa kásí
kà wa kásí
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de kànà demɔ ha̧ wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN ee damti kɔ‘i yiwese
ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN, o betom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ o yaa-ŋgo-biro,
o wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ heembea kɔ̧-a̧ usi,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-mbo-zu tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-de-tom ha̧ a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-de-mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o tom mɛ er-a sɛn fara lɛŋ n'aa ɔ wan sɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna,
ɛ́nɛ́ aa gasamɔ in zɔnamɔ zik'nɛ́;
ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ hee gasa laa ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tata yiwese gu zu nù hee tua-laa ga;
ɛ́nɛ́ dee fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu yì,
bu-zan nɛ́ keekee-nɛ-nɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ nɔ̀ ɗɔɔ gba-búk;
búk nɛ́ o betom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nyɛka-wese nɛ́ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ee nù zu gɔtɔ-a
ɓɛɛ nù fo mɔ na pɛ nɛ̀ pɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ kpee nù nɛ yì
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ laa kpe nɛ̀ tɛ-wi’ɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ yì kpe zu o gasa kaya mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tuɓa-da̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ yì mɛ kɛ̧ ŋmaa,
giti mbaŋa-kórò k’ɛ́nɛ́ ndaka yì yaknɛ;
yì kpiɗa yak zu o kaya
zir o gboŋgo yak nɛnɛ
si fara n’ɛnɛ ɗafa so ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn
mɛ hur nù woyo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ yì mɛ gbo nɛ̀ zu-zer
fok nɛ mgbara o kaya yaknɛ;
o saɗi in o tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ
nɔ nɛ yi'i ya nɛnɛ;
o nɔ́í̧ ya ɗɔɔ wa̧a̧-te ká̧ yì‘i
bíí nɛ̀ gima nɛ̀ desee.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ha̧ yì ha̧ o kaya
nɛ̀ fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgɔn mɛ;
zaŋnu lɛŋ duna nɛ̀ demɔ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧ mbɔɗi-zɔ̧ mɛ ɓɔ
ha̧ o mɔ-dai mɛ nyɔŋ;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧ nyɔnɔ mɛ dɛm
ha̧ bíí mɛ kpa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ tɛ nù.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧-tortɛ
nɛ̀ de ha̧ saŋa-yi-bíí mɛ tok hee nɔ̧́ ga,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧-ŋgai ha̧ bíí mbɛt.
O gbatui
n'aa guna sɛn nú Libaŋ tɛ kpa yì nyɛm wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ɗɔɔ da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te nɔ́‘i
a̧ o geɗek nɔ́i̧ de tua kɔ‘i sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o nɔ́i̧-gba-dɔya ɔ kɔ‘i
sɛn mgbák ndɔŋ zu
O ban
ɓɛɛ o kparɛ ɔ kɔ‘i kɔ̧ ta nyɛŋtɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee nyaŋa-zɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-usi-ŋgimbi ha̧ bíí;
wese iŋa ŋgimbi yea-a kɔ‘i,
tum ba nù ha̧ zɛ mɛ de;
o saɗi-kombo lɛŋ yar nɛ̀ ti tum'i,
o daŋa-ŋgai-dila hiɗi nɛ́ mɔ
ɗoŋ saɗi-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa
kii nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa er'nɛ́ Sɔ̧.
Ká wese dáŋ ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ,
nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ nù kɔ di̧i̧-ta kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ bíí gboo kɔ‘i
mɛ de tom hegɔɔ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dɔka nyɛmna!
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
zaŋnu lɛŋ duna nɛ̀ mɔ n’ɛnɛ dea.
Gba-tɔp nɛ́ ɔ fa̧a̧fi̧i̧ nɛ‘i zɔk ŋgere-a na
duna nɛ̀ o mɔ ɗɔɔ-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ:
o gasa-a in geɗek-a mbɛt;
o kombon yar kɔ‘i serere-serere nɛ̀ zu yì nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dee ndiɓa ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp nɛ̀ mɔɔ-desee k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɔ lɛŋ pɛm nɛ ɛnɛ
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa tɛ ŋgimbi-a.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ, ɓɛɛ ko bíí nɛ́ kaia-a;
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ er'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ zaŋ-wa sura.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧sí sɔnti'nɛ́, bele zara wa;
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá
ɓɛɛ wa fee si ɗoŋ tɛ fuunu;
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́m á tɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa kpasa woyo,
ɓɛɛ
kifi duk nɛ o mbe mɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Zɔnamɔ ko GASA WAN a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
tortɛ'ɛ bá GASA WAN zu mɔ n'aa dea.
Kà GASA WAN zɔ́k mɔ sitɛ nù,
ɓɛɛ nù naka;
kà a̧ tám tɛ o kaya,
ɓɛɛ zi-wee gboa.
Mi tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ̀ GASA WAN
ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘m lɛŋ zaŋnu’ɛ;
mi tɛ zɔn nin GASA WAN hegɔ hɔ wese fio kɔ‘m.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ desee ha̧‘m ga,
wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú‘m a̧ há̧ desee ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
O wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ a̧ yù zaŋnu;
ká‘i zii nyɛrɛ ko o wi-ɗaŋ ɓɔna!
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Aleluya!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ zɔm mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ dukbíí!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ o gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ nin-a,
tortɛ'ɛ bá o wi nɛ̀ kii GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí GASA WAN in ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɔi tɛ kia sɔnti-a na!
Ɛ́nɛ́ pɛ́r-nam ko Abraham, wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bem ko Jakob, o wi n'aa hoka,
tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ n'aa dea
in dɔka mɔɔ-kifi ká bá nɛ̀ gɔna-kita kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
A̧ nɛ́ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ;
kita kɔ̧-a̧ dama zu nù lɛŋ.
Tɛ-a bi ɗoŋ
ɓɛɛ
kànà nɛ́ kpɔk
á̧ à̧ kana nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ Izak mbɛt.
sɛn zu o be
«Mi tɛ ha̧ nú Kanaŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be
wa dɔk na,
wi nyɛma so mɛ tɔr wa nɛ̀ bekete er-wi;
wa yaa so hee o gɛnɛ ga yambali nɛnɛ
nɛ̀ mgbara o tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ e ha̧ ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ nukuri wa na;
a̧ dee bɔnɛ in o ŋma wannu wen zu wa,
wen a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ fo tɛ o wi n'am hoka na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ in o
Sɔ̧ toma kaɓa pi̧ zu nù‘i;
a̧ gbíná dɔ́rá
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa toma ŋma bíí ha̧ wa;
wi’ɛi nɛ Jozɛf nɛ̀ wa ɗɔra so nɛ̀ bara.
Wa pi̧i̧ poka naŋ-a,
wa pi̧i̧ nyak-zɔɓɔ ger-a;
duka hegɔɔ, ɓɛɛ wen ko Jozɛf hɔ gba̧a̧;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN
a̧ dee ha̧ wen'i mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ.
Wannu toma bíí mɛ bur Jozɛf pi̧ nù;
gasawi ko o dukbíí gboo a̧ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ yinɛ;
a̧ ea a̧ nɛ̀ wan zu kira kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ Jozɛf duk nɛ́ wan zu mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu ea a̧ nɛ̀ wan-usi-mɔ ha̧ o bezaŋ-wan,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi mɔ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ ga,
in ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Jakob nɛɛ de ye nù ko Kam.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i mɛ ko bem nɛ̀ dɔka-a,
a̧ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa gan ko o wi-ɔ-wan zu wa;
nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, a̧ dee ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i mɛ sɛn dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧
in ha̧ wa mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ toma Moisɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
in Arɔŋ, wi n'aa hoka so,
mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ de mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in mɔɔ-kifi
sɛn nù ko Kam ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i.
Sɔ̧ toma tum, ɓɛɛ tum ba nù kpɔ̧ɔ̧ kpɔ̧ɔ̧;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi nɔ‘i ŋgoo zer;
a̧ dee ha̧ yì kɔ-wa mɛ kifi tɔk dekpe dekpe,
ɓɛɛ o zoro kum lɛŋ.
Nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ duna nɛ̀ yaa-gbazal
hɔ kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko wannu kɔ-wa mɛ mbɛt;
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ɓɛɛ o kokoɗo-mɔ
in o zifa hur nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
A̧ ha̧a̧ ɓɔrɔ ha̧ wa oi kórò,
nyɛka leɓe-wee tika zu nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ;
a̧ ɗaŋa o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o te-mbɔra kɔ-wa,
a̧ gbina o te sɛn tɛ nù kɔ-wa a nù lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ o diŋgo
in o gba-dɔya nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na hur wa,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋ zɔ̧ in o bɔr-nyɔnɔ nù‘i mgbót-mgbót;
ɓɛɛ a̧ kum o kaya-bem ko o wi nù‘i;
o daŋa-ŋgaiwi zuduk kɔ-wa fee lɛŋ.
A̧ dee ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kur tɛ nù‘i yak
nɛ̀ oi lɔr in bu-mbɔi ko o zuduk bíí nù‘i lɛŋ;
ŋma mɔ fo tɛ-wa na.
Kíì dee so o bíí Egiptɛ nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ kinii wa ya nɛ̀ desee tɛ gbina-a ko o wi nɔ‘i yak,
Sɔ̧ kpee zu dukbíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ bu-zan,
a̧ dee ha̧ wee mɛ nyɛk ti wa mɛ zɛ.
Wa kɔfa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ er-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom kpaŋanaŋa
in nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ aa nù nɛ̀ yiwese ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa nyɔŋ zaŋ-wa sur.
Yí-nɔɔ maa tus nɛ̀ kɔ̧ ta n'aa hu̧i̧a̧ ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ yì fok yaknɛ nɛ̀ tɛ ndaɗa-nù hee nana-yì ga.
Tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ
wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ gboo dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tortɛ ba wa;
o bíí n'aa hoka so'i gboo yak nɛ̀ gima desee.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa nù
er o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa kpa kɔ-wa nyɔnɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i sɔɔ géè.
Sɔ̧ dee hegɔ wen ha̧ wa mɛ kasi geŋa
in heembea kɔ̧-a̧.
Aleluya!
Aleluya!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee!
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ we ɗoŋ ŋgayamɔ ko GASA WAN o?
O'o nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zɔnamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ o?
O wi-de-demɔ in o bíí nɛ̀ ndak ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
wese lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ am
wen
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am, wan-kpasi-wi!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ kpa kpɔk de sɔnti
nɛ̀ dukbíí n’ɛnɛ hoka kpaa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m kpa kale desee
nɛ̀ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpa'i,
ha̧‘m mɛ kpa kpɔk mɔɔ-oi
nɛ̀ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpa'i mbɛt.
Ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ dee so
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ de nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ mbɛt’ɛ;
ɛ́ɛ́ a̧ra̧ tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓɛɛ wen a̧a̧ zu yɛ.
O zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ zii kɔ‘i gba̧a̧ mɔɔ-kifi
nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee so Egiptɛ mɛ na;
tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ dee demɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa kii wen in a̧ ká̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp.
Zu-a'i a̧ kpasa kànà wa wen ká nin-a tɛɛ ɗaŋ;
GASA WAN dee hegɔ ha̧ bíí mɛ iŋ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp,
ɓɛɛ tɔp'i ɔ̧si̧ kor kútú-kútú,
ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ wa ku nɛnɛ;
GASA WAN ɓara wa er o wi-sɛn-wa,
a̧ kpasa wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yì nɛ ɔ̧sa̧ so'i
gbina kpe zu o wi-kur-zu wa;
kóó bíí kpɔk kpasi mgbara wa na.
Tɛ mɔ‘i o be
wa bia gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na
tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa dea,
wa ga̧ tɛ-wa ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ de mɔ
n'aa ee zu-a lɛŋ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ na;
wɔ-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ gbɛɛ wa lɛk-lɛk zaŋbɛɛ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa we Sɔ̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà‘i.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧a̧‘i ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tom ŋga zɛɛ-gɛ̧ɛ̧ gu nɛ̀ wa lɛŋ ɗukup.
Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ ku̧i̧a Moisɛ in Arɔŋ,
sa̧a̧-bíí ko GASA WAN,
kɔ̧ gbagari nɛ̀ wa ɔɔ sɛnɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nù hu̧i̧ gur Dataŋ mɛrɛm
kpe zu o bíí ko Abiram lɛŋ;
wee baa gɛlɛm dɔ o bíí nɛ̀ mboɗa ŋmaa'i,
dɔ o wi-ŋgazu nɔ‘i bíí wee kór-kór.
Wa ɓoo ŋma be-ndai ba e ŋgɔn sɛn Hɔrɛb,
ɓɛɛ wa gu nù gasi nɛ̀ ɓóó lor kɔ-wa'i;
wa ee gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ duk
mɛ gasi nɛ́ géé gi̧ɔ̧ ndai-nyɔŋ-zɔ̧.
Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-wa,
wan nɛ dee so gasamɔ sɛn Egiptɛ,
wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-kifi nù ko Kam,
wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi
ti wa nú Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ taa so mɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ daden nɛ̀ Moisɛ, wi n'aa hoka so,
yora kànà ŋgoor ti a̧ kii nɛ̀ war mɛ ga̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ de nù,
wa kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen ko Sɔ̧ na;
wa yaa kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ,
wa kɔ̧ mɛ zii wen ko GASA WAN na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kana mɔ ti wa'e
wa tɛ kum sɛn ŋga-gbárà‘i lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ndak o bezaŋ-wa
pɛsi nɛ̀ nù yaknɛ sót-sót
ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ wi na mɛ kpa ŋgai zu wa.
Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ wora Bal-Pɛɔr,
wa nyɔŋa saɗi-wor-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa gbɛɛ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧.
See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa tɛ ɗaŋ tom'i nɛ̀ wa dea'i
ɓɛɛ gasa bɔnɛ tik zu wa.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Pinas kura gɔn kita zu wa,
ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ‘i kaɗi;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa o tugun bíí we ɗoŋ
deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Pinas ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
O be
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see Moisɛ tu̧a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ɗulugbuk dam nù,
ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ tik zu a̧.
GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ndé,
wa a̧ kum o dukbíí nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ o be
wa hura ŋmaa in o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na,
wa zɔka ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.
O be
ɓɛɛ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk ti wa hee pɛ́r-ba-wa ga,
wa gbɛɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-aa
ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
Wa gbaia tɔk-tɛ nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè a nù,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a,
ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Kanaŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ simbo tɔk'i baa nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
O tom kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ ndiŋ tɛ-wa,
deemɔ kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ búù zu wa;
ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN kura zu dukbíí kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nyɛr mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ de a̧.
A̧ ee wa er o ŋma tugun bíí
ɓɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa kifi ɔ wan zu wa;
o wi-sɛn-wa kpee wa e nù,
ɓɛɛ e wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nukuri kɔ-wa.
Ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasa o be
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ dee ŋgazu in a̧,
yɔ nɛ̀ kaya siti siti.
Sɔ̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ de ko ha̧ wa,
wen tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ
tɛ-a gbina yɔsɛ tɛ gasa
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ kaia so wa nɛ̀ bara
mɛ zɔk wa nɛ̀ ko.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí yɛ gbonɛ mgbara o gɔni tugun bíí,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧́:
«Aamɛn! Aleluya!»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee;
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
O wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN kpasa
er o wi-kur-zu wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
O bíí n'aa mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ tɛ o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ
ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ daŋa-wese si yee-wese,
nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ lɛŋ,
wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
Wa duka pofi nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà
nɛ̀ fo-mɔ-bíí bo sɛnɛ na;
wɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kum wa ɓɔn,
in ŋgai kaɗa so tɛ-wa lɛŋ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i.
A̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛ̀ tana-a zeeŋ nɛnɛ
hɔ fara nɛ̀ bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
Wa dee osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen
in wen gasamɔ n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
A̧ ha̧a̧ yì ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ-yì gbɛ,
ɓɛɛ zaŋ o wi nɛ̀ wɔ gbɛ sur.
O yaa-gan-mbɔrɔ mbo zu
ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ na,
ɓɛɛ sa a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu wa gbɔsi nɛ̀ wa ndaɗi nù,
ɓɛɛ wa ya ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-fio
de nɛ̀ kɔsa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa tɛ nyak-zɔɓɔ;
ŋma wi-gbak-wa bo na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i;
GASA WAN daka wa gbonɛ ti tum ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-fio,
a̧ gbina poka naŋ-wa yinɛ.
Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧
in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
A̧ gbina nú tua-boi,
a̧ mboɓa kìí-boi difi a nù lɛŋ.
O ŋma bíí a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ yera wa pi̧ nù,
nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ dita zu wa,
ɓɛɛ nú-wa ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓɔna
wen wa hɛɗa in fio dɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i.
GASA WAN toma wen kɔ‘i wen kpasa wa,
ɓɛɛ dak wa nɛ̀ kɔ̧ ɗuka kɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa tika'i gbonɛ.
Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧
in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Wa a̧ ɗáfí Sɔ̧ de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ a̧,
wa a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ we nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧.
O ŋma bíí duka so yar kɔ‘i nɛ̀ gasa kombon
nɛ̀ zu yì de nɛ̀ gɛnɛ kɔ-wa nɛnɛ;
o wi nɔ‘i zɔka tom ko GASA WAN,
wa zɔka o mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee nɛ̀ zu gba-tɔp nɛnɛ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ gba búk-kórò mɛ yu,
ɓɛɛ gba búk'i ɓoɓi nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a;
yì pɛŋa nɛ̀ ŋgai fo kombon kpaŋkuleŋ si ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ hɔ̧fi̧ mbɛr yì si
hiɗi-wa gɔna bɛlɛm, hee wa tɛ fe fee ga;
zu-wa zika yelewele,
wa pi̧i̧ giɗi-giɗi hee ŋma zura wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
wa iŋ oi deemɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i.
A̧ dee ha̧ ŋga búk mɛ ga̧ dezeŋ,
ɓɛɛ o pɛŋa-yì ga̧ mbɛt.
Wa zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ga̧a̧ lɛŋ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tortɛ ba wa,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ si nú mbaŋ
fara nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i.
Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧
in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Wa a̧ tú̧ tɛ-a tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko giiwi mbɛt.
Ŋma, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN dee ha̧ nana-yì
mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoroo,
ɓɛɛ zu-zer kifa kɔ‘i nɛ́ kora nù kútú-kútú;
ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa de nù nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ dɛm nyɔnɔ na.
A̧ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ oi ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i.
Ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ yí-fuk,
a̧ dee ha̧ ndaɗa-nù kpál-kpál mɛ kifi zu-zer,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ fara'i ha̧ o wi-wɔ mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
Wa guna nyɔnɔ tɛ nù‘i,
wa guna nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ fara'i mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nyɔnɔ dɛm ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu o wi nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wa nyɛɓi in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Wa sira so, wa dɔk ɓɔna sɔgbɔrɔ
tɛ bɔnɛ in ŋgayamɔ nɛ̀ tika zu wa,
wen Sɔ̧ zɔk o be-wan sur yí na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ yambali wa ɓɔn zaŋbɛɛ.
GASA WAN kpasa o wisan tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ dɔka bem ha̧ wa hee dɔka mɔ-dai ga.
Kà o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a zɔk mɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tortɛ baa wa;
ko wi-ndela nɛ́ duka-a nɛ̀ oi nú selele.
Kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ,
a̧ a̧ zɔ́k mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea'i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ iŋ nɛ̀ mgbara dee demɔ ko GASA WAN.
Gima ko David.
Sɔ̧, see-am ga̧a̧;
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kuli mɔɔ-mbɛr bíí nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ha̧‘m kur bɔɔ kɔ‘m sɛ!
Kunde in koloŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧!
Baa dik kaɗi, wese tɛ daŋ yɛ sɔsɔɔ!
GASA WAN, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o dukbíí,
mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o tugun bíí!
Dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ fara lɛŋ hɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ dama tɛ tura-zan.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú h’ɛ́ɛ́!
Wii-er'nɛ́ a̧ kpásí yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ!
GASA WAN baa ha̧ so nú nɛ̀
«Mi Gbìn-biro, nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ nú Sikɛm,
kànà nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sukot mbɛt.
«Galad tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m,
in Manase tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m mbɛt;
Efraim tɛ duk nɛ́ laasɔ̧i̧-boi zu'm.
Juda tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́rá-wan kɔ‘m.
Mɔab tɛ duk nɛ́ ɗɔŋgɔ fara-zui-yì kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ siŋ ndárà kɔ‘m pi̧ zu Edɔm;
hegɔ mi bíí nɛ gima-biro zu o be Filistii!»
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m ye nɛ̀ ye-ŋgárá‘i o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m hegɔɔ ye nɛ̀ nú Edɔm o?
GASA WAN, bɔɔ nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ nɛ́ bɔɔ biro
in o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna’ɛ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ tɛ bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ
wen gbakamɔ ko bíí nɛ́ geemɔ.
Kà Sɔ̧ nɛ́ yee ɗoŋ yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ de gasamɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mbɔli o wi-kur-zu yɛ nɔ‘i yinɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
Sɔ̧, wi n'am zɔn’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ oi nú‘nɛ́ selele ɓɔna!
O wi-ɗaŋ-wen tɛ bíí in o wi-tɔ̧-yɔka-wen suɓa ŋmaa
tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen ndela zu'm;
wa zika'm kpa ŋmaa ɗɛ́kɛ́t nɛ̀ see-sɛn-mɔ
e nɛ̀ ɗɔra tɛ‘m nɛnɛ géè.
Mɔɔ-oi demɔ n'am de ha̧ wa
nɛ́ ɗɔa'm nɛ̀ wa ɗɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tom-dee kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ kɔfa-sɔ̧;
kà‘m dé demɔ in wa,
wa kifa er ha̧‘m nɛ ɗaŋ-a;
kà‘m dé sɛm in wa,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛna'm.
Wen-tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa sitɛ ŋmaa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí ŋma ɗaŋ wi-gɔn-kita pi̧ zu a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir wen e nú-a e katɛ a̧,
ɓɛɛ wen a̧ bá a̧ wese-ɓa-wen;
kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dák wen pi̧ zu a̧.
«Wese duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu a̧ hɔ́ yiri,
ŋma bíí a̧ bá fara oi-aa;
o bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ kífí be-oi,
ɓɛɛ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ duk nɛ́ ko-gera.
«O bem kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ pófí kɔfi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu nɛnɛ,
bíí a̧ ndák wa nɛ̀ kɔ̧ gbɔsa tua
tɛ kɔfamɔ-búù kɔ-wa nɛnɛ;
wi-gbak-gɔni-mɔ a̧ kpé nú mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kai lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ gɛnɛ a̧ ŋmákpárí mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ yaknɛ.
«Ká ŋma bíí kpɔk ha̧ mɔ ha̧ a̧ na,
ká ŋma bíí de ko ha̧ o be-oi-aa na mbɛt,
gbakna o bezaŋ-aa kuma lɛŋ
wen ká‘i tɛɛ zii nin-wa mgbara tugun bíí mɛ ɗoŋ.
«Ká tɛ-wi bi ɗoŋ yɔɔ-kaya ko o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ na,
ká ɗaŋmɔ ko nàà kɔ̧-a̧ bi yinɛ na mbɛt;
o ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i a̧ yor ɓɔn yí GASA WAN mgbemgbaa
ha̧ a̧ gɔn kita zu wa ha̧ tɛ-wi bi ɗoŋ wa war kpɔk!
«Wen bó nɛ́ wi’ɛi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so dee demɔ tɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ na;
yí-tom kɔ̧-a̧ so kànà nɛ́ ndaka o wisan in wi-kɔsa a taŋ
gbɛ nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ see ŋmana a nù.
Tom-dee kɔ̧-a̧ so nɛ́ foma bíí;
ɓɛɛ fom kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧ sí ɗoŋ zu a̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko ga̧a̧mɔ n'aa kɔ̧ so ha̧ ŋma-a mɛ kpa na'i,
ga̧a̧mɔ‘i a̧ yú a̧ ŋgal-ŋgal.
«A̧ zɔk so kɔ̧-a̧ fom'i hee laa-pi̧-tɛ ga;
fom'i a̧ yérí a dɔkbɔɗɔk,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ gá̧ hɔ̧fi̧ɔ̧ɔ̧ hee mbɔ-gba̧a̧ ga.
Kpɔk fom'i a̧ dúk nɛ́ kanda
nɛ̀ tɛ nyɛkɛ̧ɗi zaŋ-aa kpɛ́m duk nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
O mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ a̧ dúk nɛ́ kifa-er ko GASA WAN
ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ ɗaŋ wen-tɛ‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yora-ɗoŋ-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am wen gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dee nyɛmna.
See-am gbɛŋ gbɛŋ zɛk-zɛk
tɛ san n'am duk in kɔsa n'am de nɛ̀ tɛ‘m;
mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in gi̧ɔ̧,
wa pɛra'm pi̧ nù hee gba-dɔya ga.
Zugur-am fee gbɛŋɛnyɛŋɛ tɛ duka-a nɛ̀ mgbaɓa-nú;
mi ɔ̧ka̧ ba gba̧a̧.
Mi kifa mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi kɔ-wa,
bíí nɛ̀ zɔk am lɛŋ mi̧i̧ nɛ zu.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ ndé,
nɛ́ er'nɛ́'ɛ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ gbak am!
Kóó wa foma so'm,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo zu'm;
kóó wa kia so nɛ́ wen in am,
ziimɔ tɛ ba nɛ́ wa;
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
mi tɛ duk kɔ‘m nɛ̀ desee.
Búù a̧ bá o wi-ɓir-wen e nú‘m;
ziimɔ a̧ bá wa diti dík-dík hee gba-laa ga.
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ de nɛ́ osoko ha̧ GASA WAN;
mi tɛ zɔn nɛ́ a̧ mgbara o giiwi
wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ye ɗoŋ wi-kɔsa mɛ kpas'a er o bíí
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gɔn ɗaŋ kita zu a̧ mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Gima ko David.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wan kɔ‘m;
«Mɛ̀ dúk nɛ̀ war wii-er-am,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa ŋgai zu o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ.»
GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa ŋgai tɛ dɔ́rá-wan
n'aa ha̧a̧ mɛ sɛn
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ wan zu o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.
Wese nɛ̀ mɛ mɔi̧ o wi-biro kɔ-mɛ wen biro
ɓɛɛ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛɛ ɗoŋ mɛ;
o be-ŋgaiwi mbɛt tɛ̀ɛ̀ píí tɛ-mɛ nɛ̀ gasa sa̧a̧mɔ
hee dɔmbɔrɔ mɛ́ gɔna-ndaa-zan ga.
GASA WAN kana mɔ;
a̧ beka kpai nú sɛnɛ na tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ
hee Mɛlkisedɛk ga.»
GASA WAN a̧a̧ nɛ̀ war wii-er-mɛ;
wese nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ tɛ mbɔli o wannu;
wese n'aa tɛ gɔn kita zu o tugun bíí,
o wɔr tɛ ya ŋgoɗoso;
a̧ tɛ mbaŋ gɔɔ-zu bíí zaŋnu.
A̧ gai yì a kɔ̧ nú-a nɛ̀ ŋgɔn nɛ̀ ŋgɔn yak nɛnɛ;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa a̧ kpa ŋgai mɛ gbin biro.
Aleluya!
Mi de osoko ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ̀ see-am lɛŋ
tɛ baa-keta ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ̀ mɔi̧a!
O tom nɛ GASA WAN dea ɔ gasa nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ kpɛka o tom nɔ‘i tɛ zɔk mɔɔ-oi-aa.
Tom mɛ er-a nɛ́ ŋgiri mɔ, bó nɛ́ kpɛksɛ tom na;
deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ e ha̧ tɛ-ɛɛ mɛ bi ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-kifi kɔ̧-a̧ na;
GASA WAN nɛ́ de-wi nɛ̀ duna nɛ̀ ko.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ yu kíì a̧;
ta-a duk tɛ
A̧ usa o kin tom kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ baa nù ko o ŋma tugun bíí ha̧ wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi.
O tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in kpasamɔ;
o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nyɛma ha'i mɛ e nɛ̀ ta.
Kpasawen in deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ́ gun heembea nɔ‘i;
wa tɛ ya kànà kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ kpasa dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
Nin-a ɔ sa̧a̧ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-de-zɛŋ ko bíí na.
Ku̧u̧naŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ yuu kíí GASA WAN.
O ndé lɛŋ nɛ̀ yu kíí a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ,
ɓɛɛ bíí tɛ zɔn a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Aleluya!
Wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN dúk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee!
Nɛ́ wi’ɛi a̧ kpa desee tɛ kasa geŋa ko Sɔ̧.
Pɛ́r-nam kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu nù nɛ̀ wa duk sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa
A̧ tɛ kpa demɔ, ɓɛɛ mbɔi tɛ dun tua kɔ̧-a̧;
deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ nyɛk nɛ̀ ti tum si zu o wi nɛ̀ see ɔ tana;
a̧ nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, a̧ de ko nyɛmna, a̧ ɔ tana mbɛt.
Ɓan na de-wi dee ko, gbak nɛ̀ bíí kaɗi;
a̧ de mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ tanamɔ.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ yor mitak,
tɛ bíí bí ɗoŋ-aa na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Tɛ-a nak tɛ zia ɗaŋ nyɛrɛ bɔnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ hɔ na,
wen a̧ nɛ́ wi-kpee-see, a̧ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN.
A̧ nɛ́ wi-nɔɔ-see, a̧ de kíì na,
a̧ tɛ mam o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ sɔŋkur-aa.
A̧ nɛ́ wi-ha̧-mɔ ha̧ o wisan ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo;
a̧ tɛ duk tɛ-a bá nɛ̀ sɔnti-a nɛ̀ ŋgɔn.
O wi-ɗaŋ zɔk kɔ‘i a̧ suɓi nɛ̀ nú,
see nyim nɛnɛ ba nɛ̀ tɛ sɔɔ géè;
wa tɛ ɔ̧k kɔ́ŋgɔ́ɗi fe nɛ̀ oi aa-see-mɔ kɔ-wa.
Aleluya!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN
ku̧u̧naŋ-a sɔsɔɔ yak nɛnɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧.
O bíí mɛ daŋa-wese hɔ yee-wese lɛŋ
a̧ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN!
GASA WAN ɔɔ wan zu o tugun bíí lɛŋ,
gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duna yak zu yiwese pét-pét.
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma ŋmaa in GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
nɛ̀ ɔ wan ŋgɔn mɛ‘i
pi̧ nɛ̀ yí mɛ zɔk mɔɔ-yiwese in nù'ɛ o?
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba o wi-ɓɔsa nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ fuunu e ŋgɔn,
in dak o wisan nɛ̀ zu bùk yinɛ,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ e wa kpɔk fara
in o be-wan mgbara dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o ko-yar-ndɔra mɛ ko bem,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ ya kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa nɛ̀ desee.
Aleluya!
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀
ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Jakob mɛ gbo nɛnɛ er o gɔni-wi,
Juda zika duk nɛ́
ɓɛɛ
Gba-tɔp zɔka kɔ‘i mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ yu mɔ yak;
nana-yì Jurdɛn zika kɔ‘i tɔ̧mi̧ɔ̧ɔ̧ si zu pata;
o kaya, ɛ́nɛ́ aa tɛ kpiɗa-a hee o vala sami ga,
ɓɛɛ o zu-tɔ̧́ lɛŋ kur kɔ‘i
a tɛ kpiɗa zaŋgule hee o
Gba-tɔp’ɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gun mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ yuu nɛ̀ mɔ yak’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Jurdɛn, gun gira-tɛ kɔ-mɛ si ɗoŋ'ɛ nɛ́ ge?
K’ɛ́nɛ́ o kaya,
ɛ́nɛ́ aa tɛ kpiɗa-a hee o vala sami ga wen ge?
O zu-tɔ̧́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wan gun kpiɗa zaŋgule k’ɛ́nɛ́
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpíɗí nɛnɛ hee o
Nù'ɛ, tɛ-mɛ'ɛ nák ti Wan kɔ-mɛ!
Tɛ-mɛ'ɛ nák ti Sɔ̧ ko Jakob,
wan nɛ̀ kifi ta nɛ̀ gɔna-yì
in kam-ta nɛ̀ kpút-kpút’ɛ.
Bó nɛ́ ha̧ nin yɛ mɛ hur na, GASA WAN,
bó nɛ́ ha̧ nin yɛ mɛ hur na,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur ɛ̧,
zaŋ yora-ɗoŋ-wen in gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
wen ká o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na tɛ́ɛ̀ mam yɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa ndíkírí nin-a'i a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè?»
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ yiwese
de nɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.
O géé-sɔ̧-ɓoo-lɔr in bu-mbɔi kɔ-wa
nɛ́ géé mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ̀ er sɔɔ géè.
O sɔ̧ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ nɛ̀ nú, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ wen na,
gbaayí-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk mɔ na,
zer-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zii mɔ na,
zɔ̧ɔ̧-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ nun pɛr mɔ na mbɛt.
Er-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tam mɔ na,
naŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ nɔ̀ na,
kóó be ku̧i̧amɔ gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ war ger-wa na.
O wi-dui o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i
in o wi nɛ e ta nɛ wa
tɛ hɔ kànà ŋmaa in wa.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, o bezaŋ
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ GASA WAN!
Nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ́ wi-gbak'nɛ́
in ŋgee-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bezaŋ Arɔŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN!
Nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ́ wi-gbak'nɛ́
in ŋgee-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN,
see'nɛ́ a̧ dúk tɛ GASA WAN!
Nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ́ wi-gbak'nɛ́
in ŋgee-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɛ GASA WAN bi ɗoŋ yɛ na;
a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu yɛ,
a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o bezaŋ
a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o bezaŋ Arɔŋ,
a̧ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o wi-yu-kíí a̧,
o bem gu nɛ̀ o gasawi mbɛt.
GASA WAN a̧ dé h’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛɓi
in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ lɛŋ;
GASA WAN nɛ̀ dee yiwese in nù
a̧ tók de yoŋgo zu'nɛ́.
Yiwese nɛ́ ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ nù'ɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Bó nɛ́ o fio nɛ̀ nú-wa kpea si ɗɔɔ nù mɛ
a̧ tɛ zɔn GASA WAN na,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ zɔn nɛ GASA WAN,
ku̧u̧naŋ-a kinii hegɔ yaknɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Aleluya!
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ GASA WAN
wen a̧ zii aia-nú kɔ‘m zii;
a̧ yeŋ zer pii tɛ‘m yeŋ;
ŋgimbi n'am biti kpasa,
mi tɛ sa sara sitɛ a̧.
O nyak-fio hɛra so'm,
o yɔk-fio yuɓura so'm mbɛt,
dita-see in kíì bira so'm e nù;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am saa GASA WAN nɛ̀ nin tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am!»
GASA WAN nɛ́ wan-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
nɛ̀ duna nɛ
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ wan-de-ko;
GASA WAN nɛ́ wan-yor-ɗoŋ o geɗek-wi;
mi duka so nɛ́ ziɓa-wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpas'am.
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ fara-ɔm-tɛ kɔ-mɛ,
wen GASA WAN dee demɔ in mɛɛ.
A̧ kpasa mɛ tɛ fio,
a̧ dii mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ yí‘m yinɛ,
a̧ baa naŋ-am nɛ̀ ŋgɔn ká‘m tɛɛ yo nù.
Mi tɛ nɛ nɔ̀ ti GASA WAN
zu nù mgbara o bíí nɛ ya kpasa.
Mi nɛ́ mgbák wi-kɔsa;
mɔ kpɔk, mi e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN.
Tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ‘m mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ndé:
«Bíí nɛ̀ duk’ɛ, bó nɛ́ mɔ ha'i mɛ e nɛ̀ ta na.»
Ge demɔ ge n'am tɛ de si ɗoŋ ha̧ GASA WAN
oi dɔka demɔ n'aa dee ha̧‘m’ɛ ge?
Mi tɛ ba bera-gan-zu-mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ ŋgɔn sa nɛ̀ nin-a,
de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ a̧ wen n'aa kpasa'm.
Mi tɛ de mɔ n'am baa ha̧ so nú wen-aa ha̧ a̧
sɛn ti dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
GASA WAN nyim tɛ
tɛ fio ko o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧ nyɛmna.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ mi, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nɛ́ mi, bem ko okoo-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nɛ́ mi ɛ́nɛ́ gboo tɛ yɔk-fio.
Mi tɛ ɗafi Sɔ̧
de nɛ̀ osoko sa nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ nin;
mi tɛ de mɔ n'am baa ha̧ so nú wen-aa ha̧ GASA WAN
sɛn ti dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ de mɔ‘i ti mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí
kɔ̧ bee-gara ko GASA WAN see Jerusalɛm mɛ.
Aleluya!
O tugun bíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
O bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ a̧ gásí nin-a!
Yora-ɗoŋ-ɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ gasa nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ gɔna-kita ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ yuwar-a
duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Aleluya!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN
wen a̧ ɔ dee nyɛmna;
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Nutua ko
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Nutua ko Arɔŋ a̧ tɔ̧́‘e,
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
O wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧́‘e,
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Mi saa sara sitɛ GASA WAN zaŋ dita-see kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ sara nú‘m ba'm e nyaŋan.
Ŋma mɔɔ-pi̧-kíì tɛ‘m bo na
wen GASA WAN a̧a̧ ɗoŋ-am;
ge a̧ bíí tɛ de nɛ̀‘m ge?
GASA WAN yor kɔ‘i ɗoŋ-am gbak nɛ̀‘m tɛ mɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa'm zɔk o wisɛn kɔ‘m sur yí‘m na.
Hu̧sa̧-a̧ katɛ GASA WAN
gana ee ta nɛ̀ bíí;
hu̧sa̧-a̧ katɛ GASA WAN
gana ee ta nɛ̀ o ŋgaya wannu mbɛt.
O bíí nɛ̀ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na zika'm kpe e nù,
ɓɛɛ mi gɔm wa yai nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN;
wa kɛra'm kpe e nù hi̧ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi gɔm wa yai nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN.
Wa kɛra'm hee o dɛnɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ wa bi lip hee wee poo tɛn ga;
mi gɔma wa yai nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN.
Wa nasa'm mɛ gbɛ‘m yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN gbak am.
Ŋgai kɔ‘m nɛ́ GASA WAN;
mi bíí nɛ gima ha̧ a̧ wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasa'm.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ya kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i
bíí nɛ̀ gima nɛ̀ tortɛ wen wa kpasa kaɗi:
«Wii-er GASA WAN dee ŋgamɔ,
wii-er GASA WAN kpaa ŋgai gan zu mɔ lɛŋ,
wii-er GASA WAN dee ŋgamɔ.»
Kɔ‘m, mi beka fe na, mi tɛ duk kpasa
ha̧‘m mɛ we ɗoŋ tom ko GASA WAN ha̧ o bíí;
GASA WAN usa bɔnɛ ha̧‘m batɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, a̧ gbɛ‘m na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ nú tua ko Sɔ̧
ha̧‘m ye a̧‘m de osoko ha̧ a̧.
Nú tua ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ;
kànà nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ tɛ ye sɛnɛ ɓɛɛ.
Mi de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen ɛ́nɛ́ zia aia-nú kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kpas'am, GASA WAN.
Ta nɛ̀ o wi-mbo-tua pi̧i̧ so taŋ‘i,
nɛ́ ta'i a̧ kifa duk nɛ́ de kina-ta-e mgbii-tua.
Mɔ‘i nɛ́ deemɔ ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ duk nɛ́ gasamɔ yí-ɛɛ lɛŋ.
Wese’ɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ dea;
ɛ̀ɛ̀ yá nɛ desee de nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ, GASA WAN! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ gbin biro! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ!
ɛ́ɛ́ yá kɔ̧ tua ko GASA WAN tok nɛ̀ de yoŋgo kɔ̧-a̧ zu'nɛ́.
GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ sa̧a̧mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Er'nɛ́ a̧ wáí nɛ̀ o gbaa-er-te hɔ nɛnɛ ká̧
Mi de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mi zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee;
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
O wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ na,
nɛ̀ ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ heembea ko GASA WAN,
ya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee.
O wi nɛ̀ e see lɛŋ
tɛ geŋa ko Sɔ̧,
nɛ̀ bá nɛ́ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧,
nɛ̀ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na,
ya kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ geŋa
ha̧ bíí mɛ kasi nɛ̀ de-a;
yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘m
a̧ zɔ́k nɛ́ ɗoŋ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ hegɔ foe beka de'm
tɛ kasa o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa nɛ̀ desee.
Mi tɛ zɔk nɛ́ ɗoŋ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de nɛ̀ mɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e'm wɔkɔrɔ na.
Nɛ́ ge a̧ ŋgaiwi tɛ de ha̧ yuwar duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ sa̧ ge?
A̧ tɛ kasi kànà nɛ́ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Mi kii ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ see-am lɛŋ, GASA WAN,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧‘m mɛ a̧r tɛ yuwar heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Mi kasa o tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ see-am
wen ká‘m tɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Mi zɔn nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m.
Ndàra-nú‘m wee ɗoŋ o geŋa
n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ nú‘nɛ́ lɛŋ.
Ndaka ɗoŋ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ha̧a̧ desee ha̧‘m gan dɔka kpaamɔ.
See-am ɓɔn tɛ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen ha̧‘m mɛ bà nɛ́ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ́ usamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ha̧ o demɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ ha̧‘m;
tɛ‘m beka bi ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé demɔ ha̧‘m, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kasi wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘m ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ gasa demɔ
zaŋ o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀‘m na
wen mi nɛ́ gɛnɛ zu nù'ɛ.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ mi yeŋ kɔ‘m
nɛ́ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ
in o wi nɛ̀ fom baa wa
tɛ a̧ra̧-a tɛ yuwar heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá wen-foe in gee tum wen
nɛ̀ bíí pi̧ zu'm yinɛ
wen mi kasi nɛ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O be-wan mɔi̧ ya kpɔk fara bá nɛ̀ keta'm,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
mi e kɔ‘m see-am tɛ dee mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ demɔ nyɛmna sɛn tɛ‘m;
nɛ́ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ usi de yuwar ha̧‘m.
Mi yoo nù tɛ fuunu kpul;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nɛ̀ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi wee ɗoŋ yuwar tom kɔ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kifi nú ha̧‘m.

Yí‘m fok nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ kata-kata
wen o bíí kasi heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ̀ mbetɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a!
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ yuwar-a
in duk nɛ́ kpasa gɔna-kita nyɛmna.
See-am nyima batɛ
wen tɛ o wi-kur-zu'm bìí ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ hɔ gba̧a̧ fara lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wen'i dee tɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɛ ɔ̧ka̧-a̧ n'am ɔ̧ka̧ láɓá-líɓí
in tɛ fɛŋa'm nɛ̀ wa fɛŋ‘i,
tɛ‘m bi ɗoŋ o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko GASA WAN,
nɛ́ kpasa deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɛmna;
heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ kpasawen ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Dita-see in bɔnɛ tika zu'm,
ɓɛɛ demɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN,
tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ mgbara-a ha̧‘m duk kpasa.
GASA WAN, mi sa sara sitɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ see-am lɛŋ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ‘nɛ́.
Mi sa nɛ ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kasi o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛti gɔna-ndaa-zan ɓɛɛ mi wora'nɛ́ kaɗi
wen mi e ta nɛ̀ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi ɓur yí‘m mɛ zɛ na mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ;
mi ta nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, tɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tiger-am!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɗaŋ o wi-kii-wen in am nɔ‘i a̧ hɛɗi tɛnɛ‘i;
wa bo yuwar heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ dúk dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀‘m;
o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ kpasawen.
Nɛti ɓeemɛ mi iŋa so tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k kɔsa kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am
wen tɛ‘m bi ɗoŋ heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór ɗoŋ-am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ-am;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́!
O wi-ɗaŋ beka kpasi kɔ‘i na ndó-ndó-ndó
wen wa kɔ̧ mɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN, dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔka nyɛmna;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O wi-nukur'am in o wi-kur-zu'm dɔka nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ mi wɛr tɛ‘m tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Mi zɔka o wi nɛ̀ bɛ̧ɛ̧ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ see-am kur in wa wen wa kasi tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛmna;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ kànà nɛ́ kpasawen nyɛmna,
gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O be-wan nukura'm sɔɔ géè,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧‘m yu ɓɛɛ.
Tortɛ nɛ̀ ba'm tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i
bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-na;
duk hee zɔm mbɔi a̧‘m kpaa ga.
Mi sɛna ndela pi̧-er-tɛ-wee,
ɓɛɛ heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ dua-see-am.
War mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ,
mi zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ wen o gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Mi iŋa wi nɛ̀ duk tɛ bɔtɛ,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ de mgbɛlɛ heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ ha̧ wa mɛ tir yɔɔ-aa bo na.
GASA WAN, mi zɛm nɛ ɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpas'am;
tom kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ ndaka ɗoŋ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
See-am duk tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
see-am ɓɔn sɛnɛ lɛk-lɛk.
Mi kasi nɛ o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́;
zɔk, yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti'nɛ́.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sara kɔ‘m;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧‘m.
O aia-nú kɔ‘m a̧ dáŋ hɔ tɛ‘nɛ́;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nú‘m a̧ pɛ́sí nyɛrɛ zɔnamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧
wen ɛ́nɛ́ usa mɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ ha̧‘m mɛ de.
Nú‘m a̧ wé ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen mi iŋa o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ duk nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er'nɛ́ tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am
wen mi hoka kɔ‘m nɛ́ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpas'am;
demɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ heembea k’ɛ́nɛ́.
See-am a̧ ɓɔ́n tɛ zɔna'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ gɔna-kita k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ gbák am.
Mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in sami nɛ̀ yɔa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kíí wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́
wen tɛ‘m bi ɗoŋ o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ na kóó tikiɗi.
Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Ŋgimbi dita-see kɔ‘m mi saa mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ ndiŋ wen nɛ̀ o bíí tɔ̧ zu'm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am tɛ ndela nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ zik nɛ‘m’ɛ.
Nɛ́ ge a̧ Sɔ̧ tɛ ha̧ mɛ
oi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndiŋ wen ndela kɔ-mɛ'ɛ ge?
A̧ tɛ kifi er ha̧ mɛ
nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ɔ̧́-nú-góò-biro in yoŋgoŋgo wee.
Duka-a mgbara o wi-ndela nɔ'ɔ
ɗaŋa gan ɔɔ ye in o be Mɛsɛk,
kóó ɔa-a mgbara o be Kedar.
Mi duka mgbara o wi-sɛn-ga̧a̧mɔ
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
Kɔ‘m nɛ́ ga̧a̧mɔ a̧‘m kɔ̧a̧;
kà‘m tɔ̧́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ́ biro in am.
Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kà‘m zɔ́k mɔ sitɛ o kaya,
ɓɛɛ mi taa mɔ,
wi-gbak-am tɛ tɛ bɔɔ nɛ̀ déè?
Wi-gbak-am nɛ́ GASA WAN,
wan nɛ̀ dee yiwese in nù.
A̧ beka e ha̧ naŋ-mɛ mɛ mbali ŋmaa na;
wi-pɛm-mɛ zur ya na!
Wi-pɛm-Israɛl zur kɔ‘i ya
kà bó nɛ̀ ɔɔ ya na mbɛt.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-pɛm-mɛ.
A̧ nɛ́ gi̧ɔ̧-kpe-zu-mɛ;
GASA WAN duk nɛ̀ war wii-er-mɛ.
Wese beka dɔ zu-mɛ na;
nyaŋa-zɛ beka zar yí-mɛ mɛ zɛ na mbɛt.
GASA WAN pɛm nɛ mɛ wen ká ŋma ɗaŋmɔ tɛɛ fo tɛ-mɛ,
a̧ pɛm nɛ́ duka-a kɔ-mɛ;
a̧ pɛm mɛ tɛ yara-a kɔ-mɛ in tɛ pia-ɗoŋ kɔ-mɛ,
kinii in yaknɛ mbɛt hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gima ko David, gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Mi kpaa desee nyɛmna ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ndé:
«Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.»
Ɛ́ɛ́ hɔɔ kaɗi, Jerusalɛm,
ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ yor nú garo kɔ-mɛ'ɛ.
Wa mboo Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ de-a
ɓɛɛ garo zik ye kpa nú ŋmaa nɛ̀ de-a mbɛt.
O zuduk bíí lɛŋ gar si hi̧i̧;
o zuduk bíí nɔ‘i nɛ́ zuduk bíí ko GASA WAN.
Wa gar nɛnɛ mɛ bìì gima nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea sɛn
wen damti-gɔn-kita a̧a̧ hi̧i̧
in damti ko David mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ́fí ga̧a̧mɔ wen Jerusalɛm
ha̧ o bíí ye'i mɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ,
ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk zu garo
in zu o ŋga tua ye'i mbɛt.
O nya'm in o sɛm kɔ‘m dee ye hi̧i̧;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa'm tɔ̧ ndé,
Jerusalɛm a̧ dúk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Tua ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ mbɛt;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa'm ak mɔ ha̧ ye'i mɛ duk tɛ bɔtɛ.
Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Mi ba yí‘m nɛ̀ ŋgɔn
zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ sitɛ damti k’ɛ́nɛ́ yiwese mɛ.
Ɛɛ pɛm nɛ ɗoŋ er GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ko h’ɛ́ɛ́,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wiwii-bara
pɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ er o dáa-bara kɔ-wa’ɛ ga;
kóó hee o kó-bara
pɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ er o naa-wan-bara kɔ-wa mbɛt’ɛ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́, GASA WAN!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́ wen o bíí zɛkɛɗa ɛɛ batɛ;
gana ɛɛ kaɗi!
O wi-kpa-mɔ gai nɛ mɔ a zu yɛ,
o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ mam yɛ zɛkɛɗi nɛnɛ.
Gima ko David. Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kà GASA WAN yé so ɗoŋ yɛ na,
kà GASA WAN yé so ɗoŋ yɛ
wese nɛ̀ o bíí baa nɛ zu duk nɛ̀ yɛ'ɛ na,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ gur yɛ nɛ̀ zu kpasa
tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ-wa;
yì tɛ̀ɛ́ kpe zu yɛ liŋgɔm,
kin-yì tɛ̀ɛ́ ba yɛ yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ́
fe tɛ ŋga pɛŋa-yì.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN
wen a̧ e ha̧ gake-nin-wa mɛ ba yɛ na;
a̧ kpasa yɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ nɔ̧́í̧ kpasi nɛnɛ
er wi-sa-nɔ̧́í̧'ɛ ga;
a̧ ŋmana pɛ́r naŋ yɛ yinɛ ɓɛɛ ɛɛ kpasi.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ dee yiwese in nù
nɛ́ wan-gbak-ɛɛ.
Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN hɔɔ ŋmaa in Kaya
nɛ̀ fo mɔ na duk nɛ̀ kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O kaya zika Jerusalɛm e see-a;
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN zik nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘i duk nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ɗaŋ wannu beka ɔ wan
zu o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na,
wen ká wa tɛɛ yuɓuri tɛ-wa
nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ ɗak-ɗuk.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé demɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ de demɔ
in o wi nɛ̀ ndak pata deemɔ nɛ̀ tana-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN a̧ ír o wi-de-gɔɔmɔ in o wi-mbo-zu-na
á zan lɛŋ in o wi-de-mɔ de na.
Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ dúk zu
Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN kaia so
nɛ̀ o bara
ŋgimbi'i duka tɛ-ɛɛ hee ɔɔ-zu ga;
nú yɛ nyaŋ nɛ̀ mami na,
gima-bìì k’ɛɛ nɛ́ gima-desee.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-iŋ-kpasa Sɔ̧ na tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé:
«Oee gasamɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa, wa!»
GASA WAN dee so zɔm mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ya nɛ́ tortɛ.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o bíí
nɛ̀ wa kaia so nɛ̀ bara piinɛ
hee pia-a ko yí Nɛgɛb
O wi-pɛ-nyɔnɔ puta mɔ nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧ mɔ nɛ̀ gima-desee.
Wa yaka nɛ̀ tui-kpar-nyɔnɔ zu hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ tɛ pia-a kɔ-wa,
wa pia nɛ̀ o sikila nyɔnɔ er wa bíí nɛ̀ gima.
Gima ko Salomɔŋ; gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua kɔ Sɔ̧.
GASA WAN nɛ́ mboo tua na,
o wi-de-tom-tua de nɛ tom ba nɛ̀ tɛ-wa géè;
GASA WAN nɛ́ pɛma ye na,
o wi-pɛm-mɔ pɔkɔsi nɛ tɛ pɛm nɛ̀ mɔ géè.
Ŋma gba̧a̧ mɔ bo tɛ gboo tom-tuyɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́
de nɛ̀ tom hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ɗuka zɛ,

wen war ko o bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN kɔ̧a̧,

a̧ a̧ ha̧ kànà demɔ ha̧ wa'i.
Bem nɛ̀‘i ko nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN;

Kóó bem nɛ̀ gbɛ̧-naŋ
hɔɔ ŋmaa in góò ko wi-biro.
Wi nɛ ɓaro-góò kɔ̧-a̧ duna hee mɔ‘i ga
duk nɛ̀ desee;

Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.

Nɛ́ tom mɛ́ er-mɛ a̧ tɛ dai mɛ,

Kóò kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ

o bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ ya ká̧ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ-mɛ
hee o be te-nɔ̧́
Nɛ́ o wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN
a̧ tɛ kpa o pɛrti
GASA WAN a̧ tók de yoŋgo zu mɛ nɛ̀

Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.
ɛ̀ɛ̀ zii!
Wa nukura'm nɛ̀ tɛ daŋa-ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ,
wa nukura'm batɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa gan am na.
Wa wɔŋga'm, ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m wai wɔsɔkɔɗɔ
hee ŋma mbùkù-nyɔnɔ
a̧ ŋma bíí gbɛra rɔtɛ-rɔtɛ ga.
GASA WAN, yaa-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a
gbina kpáŋá ko o wi-ɗaŋ ger-am yinɛ.
O wi-sɛn
wa a̧ pɛ́sí yak sót-sót!

ɓɛɛ ká búk-bɛɛ gbɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbaoo’ɛ ga!
O wi-pɔi-zɔ̧ nyɛm mɛ ɓur wa dun er
kà sik nɛ̀ wa na.
O wi nɛ̀ ɓir yak beka tɔ̧‘e,

Gima daŋa-a si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧.

ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'm kaɗi.
O deemɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ duk mgbák yí‘nɛ́;
mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yɔra zaŋ kalata k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛti sɛka wa biti ko'm,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɔra zɛ duka-a kɔ‘m zu nù'ɛ dam lɛŋ kaɗi.
Sɔ̧, ɔ ŋgaya ha̧‘m mɛ kpa ndaa taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ nduti-a,
wen wa dɔka gan iŋamɔ ko bíí.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔr wa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wa dɔka gan nyɛmɛ;
kóó mi tɔra so wa lɛŋ hɔ nduti-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ duk’ɛ!
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kum o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ gbuɗuk na nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-gbɛ-zu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m!
Sɔ̧, wa sa nin'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɔrmɔ sɔɔ géè;
wa sa nin'nɛ́ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ.
GASA WAN, mi tɛ sɛn wan o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ na nde?
See-am tɛ tu̧ zu o wi nɛ̀ de ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na nde?
Mi tɛ sɛn wa pi̧-er-tɛ-wee
wen wa nɛ́ o wisɛn kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ tɛ‘m hɔ kɔ̧ see-am mɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé‘m wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ taamɔ kɔ‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k naŋanɔ kɔ‘m ká‘m tɛɛ ba ɗaŋ war;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m e tɛ de war nɛ̀ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m er wi-de-mɔ-de-na yinɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am wen ká o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai tɛɛ de ŋgamɔ in am;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi-kii-wen-ari nɔ'ɔ
nɛ̀ kii kɔ‘i nɛ́ biro ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ;
wa pi̧ leɓe hee gɔ́k ga,
wen kɔ̧ nú-wa duk hee ma̧a̧da̧ ko kóró ga.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am er o wi-ɗaŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ am wen o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai nɔ'ɔ
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ naŋ-am mɛ mbali ŋmaa.
Wa tui nɛ́ pɛr a nɛ̀ yɔk ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ŋgazu hur kɔ‘i nɛ lim nɛ̀ yuwar nɛnɛ ha̧‘m.
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa'm tɔ̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nde:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m!»
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wora'nɛ́ n'am wor'i!
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgai-kpas'am;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kpe zu'm pɛm nɛ̀‘m wese biro.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ taamɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu'm na.
Ká o wi-kur-zu'm kpá ŋgai zu'm na;
o ɗaŋ wen nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ zu'm lɛŋ a sí ɗoŋ zu wa.
O yoŋgoŋgo wee a̧ á zu wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wa yur ɗɔɔ ɗuka kɔ̧-fio;
ká wa kúr ɓɔna!
Ɗaŋmɔ a̧ ndák pata o wi-de-ŋgamɔ gbɛ wa yinɛ;
o wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ-wi a̧ kúm zu nù lɛŋ!
Mi iŋa ndé,
GASA WAN tɛ gɔn kita zu o wisan nɛ yuwar-a;
a̧ tɛ gbo o wi-kɔsa tɛ bɔnɛ.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ de osoko nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́, GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ tana-a tɛ ya in'nɛ̀ɛ́.
Gima ko David.
GASA WAN, mi sa nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m bee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sara n'am sa sitɛ‘nɛ́‘i.
Kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m a̧ dáŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́
hee de pɛr nyama ga,
a̧ dúk nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi'nɛ́ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dór nú‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m ndàrá-nú‘m
wen ká‘m tɛɛ tɔ̧ ndiŋ wen;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ é ha̧ see-am mɛ wɛr sitɛ ɗaŋmɔ na,
kóó ha̧‘m mɛ gbam yari in o wi-de-mɔ de na, na.
Mi beka fo demɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nú‘m na kóó tikiɗi.
Kà wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛr am,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ úsí ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ ká nɔ̧́ ko wi-ɗaŋ hɔ́ zu'm na ndó-ndó-ndó.
Mɔ kpɔk, kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m wen zu ɗaŋ kɔ-wa'i a̧ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wa kaia o wi-gɔn-kita kɔ-wa ndusi mgbara ta,
ɓɛɛ kinii wa iŋa wen n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'i nɛ́ kpasawen.
Wen-aa nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kpánà gba nɛnɛ mbɔɗɔnu ɗɛ́sɛ́-ɗɛ́sɛ́'ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ-ɛɛ sɔti nɛnɛ kɔ̧-fio mɛ.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, yí‘m a̧a̧ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Mi hu̧si katɛ‘nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧‘m taŋ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m am tɛ pɛ́r nɛ̀ wa tuia ha̧‘m
in o sak nɛ̀ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɔna e ŋgɔn ha̧‘m'i.
O wi-ɗaŋ nɔ‘i a̧ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa a kɔ̧ yɔk kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa aa'i,
mi kpaa a̧‘m ɓir kɔ‘m yak.
Gima ko David. Kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko David ŋgimbi nɛ̀ a̧ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ di̧i̧.
Mi sa nɛ mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN nɛ̀ aia-nú;
mi sa nɛ mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN nɛ̀ gɔma-er!
Mi wee ɗoŋ bɔnɛ kɔ‘m lɛŋ ha̧ a̧;
mi ee dita-see kɔ‘m ti a̧ mbɛt.
Hiɗ‘am bo ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa yuwar n'am ba.
Wa tuia pɛ́r yuwar kɔ‘m.
Kà‘m zɔ́k mɔ nɛ̀ war wii-er-am,
ŋma wi-ye-ɗoŋ-am bo na;
fara-hu̧si-tɛ‘m bo na,
ŋma wi-gbak-am bo na.
Mi ai nú sitɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN,
wen mi iŋa ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m.
Gasamɔ kɔ‘m zaŋnu’ɛ kànà nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ gɔfamɔ kɔ‘m
wen bɔnɛ gana'm kaɗi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am er o wi-nukur'am wen wa ŋgaia gan am.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m tɛ bɔnɛ'ɛ ha̧‘m mɛ de osoko nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́;
o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ gar pii tɛ‘m
wen demɔ n’ɛnɛ de in am'i.
Gima ko David.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m.
Wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ yor ɗoŋ
in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓa wen in wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
wen ŋma bíí zu nù'ɛ nɛ̀ wen bo zu-a na bo na.
Wisɛn ndak nɛ‘m mɛ mbɔl'am yinɛ;
a̧ pi̧a'm kɔ̧ gba-tum pɛsi-fio kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧.
See-am gɔna lasak,
ɓɛɛ mi ŋgai kaŋiŋi nɛ̀ kíì.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ o kuti mɔ nɛ̀ yaka so,
ɓɛɛ mi ta mɔ zu tom n’ɛnɛ dee so nɛti lɛŋ
in zu mɔ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dee so.
Mi nyɛi̧ nɛ er sitɛ‘nɛ́ wen sɔ̧-tɛ‘m de wɔ‘nɛ́
hee kuɗusu nú-yo-tua nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɔ yì'ɛ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧‘m nɛ̀ haya-a, GASA WAN,
wen hiɗ‘am gɔna kaɗi;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si sɔnti'nɛ́ nɛ̀‘m na
wen ká‘m tɛɛ zir si mgbara o bíí nɛ̀ fea so.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧
wen mi e ta nɛ̀ ɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ yuwar n'am tɛ ba,
wen ŋgai-tɛ‘m nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN, mi yu mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m er o wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí yuwar deemɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ ha̧‘m de
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m;
de
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ.
Tɛ
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáŋ o wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúm o wi-kur-zu'm gbuɗuk,
wen kɔ‘m, mi nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Gima ko David.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN, kam-ta kɔ‘m,
wen a̧ nɛ wi-gbak-am tɛ ɗafa mɔɔ-biro;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ usi ɗoŋ bíí biro ha̧‘m.
A̧ nɛ́ wi-e-ta kɔ‘m in ŋga fara-duk kɔ‘m,
a̧ nɛ́ ŋga fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m in wi-kpas'am;
a̧ nɛ́ ŋgee-biro kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi hu̧si ɗoŋ-aa.
A̧ nasa o dukbíí a ɗɔɔ naŋ-am.
GASA WAN, bíí so nɛ́ ge h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ta mɔ wen-aa ge?
Bíí so nɛ́ ge ha̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa ge?
Bíí nɛ̀ duk’ɛ nɛ́ géé búk sɔɔ géè;
ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ yak hee wara-a ko gi̧ɔ̧ ga.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ búr yiwese, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zír tɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó o kaya nɛ̀ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧-er'nɛ
ha̧ zi-wee mɛ tur nduɗɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ kórò mɛ pi̧
ha̧ o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ mɛ pɛsi sót-sót,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ góò k’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛsi nɛ̀ wa a taŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dák am gbonɛ ɗɔɔ yì,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó‘m yinɛ er o gɔni-duk,
nɛ̀ nú-wa duna nɛ̀ ndela,
in er-wa nɛ̀ wa kana so nɛ̀ mɔ mbɛt.
GASA WAN, mi bíí nɛ mbe gima zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ
nɛ̀ mɔɔ-mbɛr nɛ̀ nyak-aa ɓu.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-ha̧-ŋgai ha̧ o wannu-gbin-biro;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ kpasi wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, David.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am nú gba-paa-ari’ɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár'am er o gɔni-duk,
yaa-tɔ̧-gɔni-wen nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kan mɔ nɛ̀ ndela sɔɔ géè'ɛ.
O bem k’ɛɛ ya hee nyɔnɔ
nɛ̀ gasi nɛnɛ nɛ̀ haya-a’ɛ ga;
saŋa-yí o zɔŋa k’ɛɛ duk nɛ̀ yɔka-a kpɛ́ɗɛ́-kpɛ́ɗɛ́
hee o de sɛka-ta mɛ nú garo ko wannu ga.
O dam k’ɛɛ duna nɛ̀ nyɔnɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ;
o geɗek mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ nyɛɓa̧ dam zaŋbɛɛ
nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.
O mɔ-dai k’ɛɛ ɔ ŋmaŋa;
ŋma mɔɔ-ba-tɛ-wa kà bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-wa yinɛ bo na.
Fara k’ɛɛ nɛ́ de ga̧a̧ fara yɔlɔlɔ.
Dukbíí nɛ̀ duk hee mɔ‘i ga
duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ desee!
Dukbíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa
duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee mbɛt!
Gima ko David.
Mi bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, wannu, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m;
mi zɔn nɛ nin'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn'nɛ́ wese kpɔk kpɔk;
mi tɛ gasi nin'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
GASA WAN ɔ gasa,
wi zɔn a̧ nɛ kpasa zɔnamɔ;
a̧ ɔ gasa nyɛmna nɛ̀‘i beka we zu nɛ̀ a̧ na.
GASA WAN, o bezaŋ a̧ wé ɗoŋ zɔm mɔ
n’ɛnɛ dea ha̧ o ŋmaa;
wa a̧ zɔ́n o tom nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dea.
Wa tɛ zɔn'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ nin'nɛ́ tɛ hur,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ we ɗoŋ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m mbɛt.
Wa tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ́ nyɛrɛ ŋgaya mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi n’ɛnɛ dea,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ́ nyɛrɛ gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
tɛ bíí beka bí ɗoŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
wa tɛ sumburi ɛnɛ wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ de-a,
a̧ nɛ wan-de-ko;
a̧ de nyimsea nɛ̀ haya-a na,
dee demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dɔka nyɛmna.
GASA WAN ɔ dee in bíí lɛŋ;
a̧ de demɔ ha̧ o mɔ n'aa dee lɛŋ.
GASA WAN, o mɔ n’ɛnɛ dee lɛŋ a̧ dé osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́;
o sɛm k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ zɔ́n'nɛ́.
Wa a̧ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ gasa mɔɔ-wan
in ŋgayamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ha̧ o bíí mɛ iŋ ŋgayamɔ
in gasa mɔɔ-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo;
mɔɔ-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk pɛ nɛ̀ pɛ.
Wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ kpasawen;
yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ.
GASA WAN tɛ ba o wi nɛ̀ tika nù e ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ nyafi ɗoŋ o wi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ bira.
Yí o bíí lɛŋ a̧a̧ tɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ ŋgimbi-a;
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ hú̧í̧ er'nɛ́ ha̧ nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ
ha̧ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kpasa.
Deemɔ ko GASA WAN lɛŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a;
yora-ɗoŋ-ha̧a̧nú kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ.
GASA WAN a̧a̧ katɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ kɔfi a̧;
bó nɛ́ o géé bíí nɛ̀ nú-tum na,
nɛ́ o kpasa wi-wor-a.
Mɔ nɛ̀ o wi-yu-kíí a̧ kɔ̧a̧,
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ de ha̧ wa;
kà a̧ zii aia-nú kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wa.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-pɛm o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o wi-ɗaŋ lɛŋ yinɛ.
Nú‘m a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kpasa a̧ zɔ́n sa̧a̧ nin-a hegɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Aleluya!
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn GASA WAN
ŋgimbi n'am biti duk kpasa;
mi tɛ bìì gima ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m
ŋgimbi n'am biti nɛ yi.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ta nɛ̀ o be-wan
kà bó nɛ̀ o bíí zaŋnu na
wen wa bo nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ kpasi bíí na.
Kà
ɓɛɛ wa sii ɗoŋ tɛ fuunu;
nɛ́ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i a̧ taamɔ kɔ-wa fe nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Wi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko Jakob gbak duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee;
wi’ɛi e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dee yiwese in nù
gu nɛ̀ o gba-tɔp in o mɔ nɛ̀ ya ɗɔɔ-aa lɛŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ nɛ kpasawen ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
a̧ gɔn kita zu o wi-bɔnɛ nɛ yuwar-a,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi-wɔ;
kànà nɛ́ a̧ a̧ bur o wi nɛ̀ ya tɛ nyak-zɔɓɔ yinɛ.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-hu̧i̧-yí o wan-boma-yí;
a̧ nɛ́ wi-nyafi-ɗoŋ o wi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ bira.
A̧ nɛ́ wi-pɛm o gɛnɛ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbak o be-oi in o ko-gera mbɛt.
GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
a̧ nɛ́ wi-yai o ee-zu-mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ.
beka bo na ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Aleluya!
Aleluya!
Bia gima zɔn nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ demɔ;
zɔna a̧ nɛ́ demɔ nyɛmna.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-mbo Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ mbe-a!
Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ mɔi̧a o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ pii nɛ ɗoŋ.
Nɛ́ à̧ á̧ kpasa o wi nɛ̀ see-wa ŋmana;
nɛ́ à̧ á̧ ɓara nyina a yí-da̧i̧ kɔ-wa.
A̧ tɔra o sɔra yiwese dam lɛŋ
ɓɛɛ a̧ a nin-wa kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ɔ gasa in a̧ ɔ ŋgaya mbɛt;
wi nyɛm mɛ ba iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧
we nɛ̀ iŋamɔ ko bíí na.
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-gbak o wi-mɔka-see,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ wi-tir o wi-ɗaŋ a ɗɔɔ fuunu.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ GASA WAN;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima nɛ̀ koloŋ ha̧ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ tura-zan mɛ kpe yí-zan,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ zɔ̧ mɛ hɔ zu o kaya,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ bɔr-nyɔnɔ mɛ dɛm;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o ndai in o be gba-kɔra
ŋgimbi nɛ wa hiɗi mɔ.
Ŋgai ko nyaŋa
in ŋgai ko ŋga wi-biro de tɛ-a na;
nɛ́ o wi-yu-kíí GASA WAN
in o wi-e-ta nɛ̀
Jerusalɛm, mɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN!
A̧ ŋgasa ɗoŋ nú tua kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ de-a,
a̧ toka de yoŋgo ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk zu nù kɔ-mɛ,
in ha̧ zaŋ-mɛ mɛ sur nɛ̀ kam-gɔrɔ mbɛt.
A̧ toma wen kɔ̧-a̧ pii zu nù,
ɓɛɛ wen'i dam zaŋnu lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tom ɓɔrɔ mɛ kpe zu nù
hee nduu-gera ga;
a̧ toma ɓɔrɔ tɛnɛ kpe zu nù lɛŋ.
A̧ toma ɓɔrɔ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a;
wi nɛ tɛ nyɛm mɛ yor ti gɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓɔrɔ‘i nɛ o?
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa toma wen kɔ̧-a̧ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɓɔrɔ yeli dam fara lɛŋ;
a̧ toma búk yu a zu ɓɔrɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɓɔrɔ‘i yeli fok yaknɛ.
A̧ usa wen kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ Jakob,
a̧ usa geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧
Ŋma tugun bíí n'aa dee mɔ ha̧ wa hegɔ bo na,
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ iŋa gɔna-kita kɔ̧-a̧ bo na,

Aleluya!
Aleluya!
O mɔ mɛ yiwese a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN,
o mɔ nɛ̀ ya si ŋgɔn mɛ a̧ zɔ́n a̧,
o betom mɛ yiwese lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́ŋ a̧,
o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n a̧!
Wese in nyaŋa-zɛ a̧ zɔ́n a̧,
o nyɛka sɔra yiwese lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n a̧,
gba̧a̧-yí-zan a̧ zɔ́n a̧,
yì mɛ ɗoŋ yiwese mɛ a̧ zɔ́n a̧!
O mɔ lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN,
wen nɛ́ à̧ á̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen sɛka mɔɔ nɔ‘i be tɛ̀ɛ́ de;
a̧ ee wa mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ
ɗɔɔ heembea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ beka kpai na.
Sɛn mbɔɗɔnu ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN,
o ndiɓa in o ɗuka dir,
wee in ɓɔrɔ,
kutu in ŋga búk-kórò nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ betom kɔ̧-a̧,
o kaya in zu-tɔ̧́ lɛŋ,
o te nɛ‘i nyɔŋ waya-a nyɔŋ in o
o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ in o mɔ-dai,
o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nù in o nɔ̧́í̧,
o wannu in o dukbíí lɛŋ,
o be-wan in o wi-gɔn-kita zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ,
o ŋgaiwi in o be-zɔŋa,
o gbɛ́rɛ́ ká bá nɛ̀ o obem a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Wa a̧ zɔ́n nin GASA WAN
wen kànà nɛ́ nin-a kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ gasa.
Gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ zu nù in yiwese mbɛt.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧,
in
mɛ duk tɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kpaa zɔnamɔ.
Aleluya!
Aleluya!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ mɔi̧a’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima zɔn nɛ̀ a̧!
GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧-de-wi nɛ̀ dee mɛ'ɛ;
o bem ko
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ̀ desee ti wan k’ɛ́nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́ yɔyɛ zɔn nɛ̀ nin-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r bi̧ɔ̧ in koloŋ ha̧ a̧!
Wen GASA WAN dee demɔ in dukbíí kɔ‘i;
a̧ kpasa o wi-mɔka-see.
O wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧ dé nɛ́ nyɛŋɛ gasa deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
wa ya fara-ɔɔ kɔ-wa mɛ zɔn nɛ̀ a̧.
Wa lɛŋ ŋgan nɛ mɔ ti GASA WAN
nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧-nú gba-paa,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ gɔna-kita ko GASA WAN:
wa tɛ kifi er ha̧ o tugun bíí,
wa tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o dukbíí,
wa tɛ hɛr o wannu nɛ̀ nyak-boi,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ pi̧ poka naŋ o dita-bíí mgbara wa mbɛt.
Gasamɔ nɛ̀ o wi-mbo-zu ha̧ a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Aleluya!
Aleluya!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n Sɔ̧ kɔ̧
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ si yiwese, ŋga fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ mɔ n'aa dea,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m zak zɔn nɛ̀ a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r kunde in koloŋ zɔn nɛ̀ a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r bi̧ɔ̧ yɔ nɛ̀ yɔyɛ ha̧ a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r yaa-koŋgoŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m fol zɔn nɛ̀ a̧!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r kuŋge ha̧ a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n a̧ nɛ̀ o kuŋge nɛ̀ ɔ wora nyɛmna!
O mɔ nɛ̀ ya kpasa lɛŋ a̧ zɔ́n GASA WAN!
Aleluya!
Mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ nɛ o tua-wen ko Salomɔŋ, bem ko David, wannu
Wa tɛ gbak bíí wen iŋa mgbara mɔ, wen ha̧a̧ mboozu in wen iŋa gba̧a̧ ɗuka mbɔrɔ;
wa tɛ gbak bíí mɛ yambi mɔ nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ ha'i mɛ iŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, in dee tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ ká bá nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ de-a.
Wa tɛ usi yuwar-kasa-zu ha̧ o wi nɛ taamɔ tɛ ɗuk hɔ̧ɔ̧ na; wa tɛ usi iŋamɔ in kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ kia mɔ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ n'aa tɛ kpa sɛnɛ‘i tɛ dɔk siti: wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ́ kia mɔ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ iŋ yuwar-mgbɔɔ-bíí.
O tua-wen nɔ'ɔ duk wen ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara o ŋma tua-wen in o sumgba, o ee-zu-mɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ in o sumgba kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ́ ku̧u̧ naŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ; nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na a̧ mam iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in yambamɔ.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ mbó zu tɛ mbɔrɔ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ e usamɔ ko naa kɔ-mɛ tɛ geemɔ na mbɛt,
wen mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ de
Bem kɔ‘m, kà o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɔr mɛ, ká mɛ kpɛk na.
Kà wa nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e: «Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yár yaknɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ hú̧sí wen gbɛɛ-zu kóó yoŋgo bo na, ɛ̀ɛ̀ pɛ́m kana wi nɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ gur a̧ nɛ zu kpasa nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ hee kɔ̧ fio ga, hee o wi-zir si kɔ̧ pɛsi ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ kpa o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ɛɛ tɛ dun o tua k’ɛɛ nɛ mɔ-aa.
Mɛ tɛ kpa war-a kɔ-mɛ, wen ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ kpɔk nɛ gii.»
Bem kɔ‘m, ká'í gbam in o wi nɔ‘i na: mɛ e o be yuwar kɔ-wa duk nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
wen naŋ-wa kpan nɛ nɔ sitɛ ɗaŋmɔ, wa kpan nɛ nɔ wen gbɛɛ-zu.
Nɛ mbetɛ, nɔ̧́í̧ zɔk pɛ́r kaɗi, ba pɛ́r ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ-wa nɛ wa hu̧si'i nɛ́ wen gbaia tɔk tɛ-wa a nu; wa hu̧si zɛm nɛ tɛ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa woyo.
Mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa wi-ɓar-mɔ er-wi nɛ mɔ‘i. Ɓara-mɔ-er-wi tɛ gbɛ nɛ wi-ɓar-mɔ er-wi nɛ tɛ-wi.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ he nɛ mbéá nɛ zan nɛnɛ; a̧ sa nɛ mɔ nɛ hee ger nɛ tɛ o gasa war nɛnɛ.
A̧ yar nɛ o sasa-war sa nɛ mɔ. A̧ he nɛ mbéá saaye nɛ ká̧ nu garo'e:
«O mgbelewi nɔ'ɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ de mgbélé hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge? O wi nɛ zaŋ gɔn na tɛ e zɛkɛɗa-wi kɔ-wa duk mɛ gese ge?
Ɛnɛ zii mbɔrɔ n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i! Mi tɛ ha̧
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am saa mɔ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ na, kà‘m nyɛi̧ er-am, ká ŋma bíí pi̧ nu sɛnɛ na ga,
hee ɛnɛ siŋa o mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ a taŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpɛk o wen kɔ‘m na ga,
kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m, mi tɛ mam'nɛ́ wese bɔnɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi tɛ zɛkɛɗi'nɛ ŋgimbi nɛ gasa mɔɔ-kíì tɛ tik nɛnɛ zu'nɛ́.
Ŋgimbi nɛ gasa mɔɔ-kíì tɛ tik zu'nɛ́ utuk hee gba-búk-kórò ga, nɛ bɔnɛ tɛ ɓoɓi nɛ ɛnɛ hee hara-búk ga, ŋgimbi nɛ dita-see in ŋga bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu'nɛ́,
ɛnɛ tɛ sa'm, ɓɛɛ mi beka kɔ̧ sara na, ɛnɛ tɛ kii am, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa'm na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ baa sɛn so iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ yuu kíí GASA WAN na,
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kpɛk so mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m na, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e o wen kɔ‘m tɛ geemɔ ga,
ɛnɛ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́: nɛ́ ee-zu-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ tɛ sur zaŋ‘nɛ́.
Nɛ́ ŋgazu ko o wi-iŋ-mɔ-na a̧ gbɛ wa in duka-tɛ ko o wi nɛ bo nɛ kpasa taamɔ na a̧ yɔ wa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ zii wen nú‘m duk kɔ‘i tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, a̧ duk mgbitiŋ, kíì bɔnɛ de a̧ na.»
Bem kɔ‘m, kà mɛ̀ kpɛ́k o wen kɔ‘m,
kà o geŋa kɔ‘m dúk nɛ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ,
kà mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ,
kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara mɔ nɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ,
nɛ mbetɛ, kà mɛ̀ kii iŋamɔ,
kà mɛ̀ e ta-mɛ nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ,
kà mɛ̀ kii mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i kii nɛ bu-mbɔi ga,
kà mɛ̀ kii mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i za̧ nɛ nu kii nɛ mbɔi ga,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ zii mgbara yuu kíí GASA WAN;
mɛ tɛ kpa yuwar iŋa Sɔ̧,
wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ;
iŋamɔ in iŋa kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú-a.
Nɛ a̧ a̧ yor ɗoŋ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ha̧ deemɔ kɔ-wa mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧;
a̧ nɛ ŋgee ko wi nɛ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dee.
A̧ nɛ wi-pɛm-wi nɛ nɛ́ nɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a;
a̧ ɔ ya zu o wi nɛ mbo zu ha̧ a̧ na.
Hegɔ ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
dee tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in deemɔ nɛ ɔ dee;
mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ duk nɛ mɔɔ-mgbɔ-wi nɛnɛ sitɛ bɔtɛ.
Hegɔ, iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ ye kɔ̧ see-mɛ,
iŋamɔ tɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ mɛ,
kia-mgbara-mɔ tɛ pɛm mɛ,
kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ tɛ kpasi mɛ,
mgbɔ nɛ mɛ yinɛ tɛ ɗaŋ naŋanɔ,
in tɛ ɗaŋ sɛm-ɔr-ŋmaa,
in o wi nɛ e baa tana yuwar duk,
wen baa ɗaŋ yuwar.
Desee kɔ-wa nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ;
nyɛŋɛ pi̧ nɛ wa tɛ dee ndiŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa ɗaŋa;
yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa gɔɔ gɔɔ.
Hegɔ, mɛ tɛ e yuwar ko kó-dàlà duk,
in yuwar ko gɔni okoo-ɔr-wi nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen,
wen kóò‘i ee kaya-wíì kɔ‘i duk,
tɛ-a bìí ɗoŋ
naŋ-a ya nu kɔ̧ fio,
nɛ́ yuwar ko o fio a̧ a̧ ba.
O wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ kóò‘i lɛŋ pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna,
ŋma kpɔk nɛ tɛ kpasi bo na.
Nɛ hegɔ a̧ naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ
tɛ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ ko o kpasa bíí;
mɛ tɛ zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ naŋanɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ duk tɛ nu’ɛ,
o wi nɛ wen bo zu wa na tɛ ɓɔn sɛnɛ;
ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ yu tɛ nu’ɛ,
wi tɛ zuɗi o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ sɛnɛ.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ usamɔ kɔ‘m na, ɓɛɛ mɛ e see-mɛ tɛ o geŋa kɔ‘m.
Wa tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, ha̧ pɛ-mɛ mɛ dɔk in ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ duk in mɛɛ.
Ká mɛ́ e dee demɔ nɛ yuwar-a in mboozu duk na. Mɛ̀ hɛ́r wa ger-mɛ, mɛ̀ yɔ́r wa kɔ̧ see-mɛ;
hegɔ mɛ tɛ kpa deako ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ de-a sɛn ti Sɔ̧ in ti o bíí mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ há̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ see-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e ta-mɛ nɛ̀ iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ na.
Tɛ-mɛ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ GASA WAN tɛ yuwar nɛ mɛ tɛ ba lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɗafi yuwar naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ de-a.
Ká mɛ́ ta nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ‘e mɛ nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ na; mɛ̀ yú GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ duk.
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ nyina-tɛ-mɛ in mɔɔ-ha̧-ŋgai ha̧ o gbaagur-tɛ-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ GASA WAN nɛ o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ in nɛ o zu-kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ o dam kɔ-mɛ tɛ dun nɛ alkamaari, dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ dun o gba-kpánà kɔ-mɛ yɛtɛtɛ.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ pi̧ usamɔ ko GASA WAN taŋ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ mbɔi tɛ o mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen mɛ̀ nɛ̀ bíí nɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧ nyɛmna a̧ a̧ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáa-wan-bem de nɛnɛ in bem n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna’ɛ ga.
Nyɛŋɛ a̧ pi̧ bíí nɛ kpaa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ɓɛɛ kpa iŋamɔ mbɛt,
wen kpaa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana kpaa mbɔi: mɔ nɛ‘i kpa sɛnɛ gana mɔ nɛ‘i kpa tɛ lɔr.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ dee gan kísí nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya; mgbara o mɔ nɛ‘i kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ, ŋma nɛ tɛ de nyɛm ŋmaa in a̧ bo na.
Duka-a ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ a̧a̧ nɛ kɔ̧ er-a mɛ wiiko, ɓɛɛ nɛ war er-a mɛ gale, nɛ́ o kpaamɔ in zɔnamɔ.
O yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ o de war, ɓɛɛ o geɗek war kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
A̧ nɛ te-duka-kpasa wen wi nɛ kasi a̧ nɔ er kpɔk; bíí nɛ ndaɗi in a̧ tɛ duk tɛ bɔtɛ.
GASA WAN dee nù nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, a̧ dee yiwese tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ hu̧i̧a̧ nɛ o gba
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ kásí zɔka mɔ nɛ de-a in kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ; ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ wa na.
Wa tɛ ya nɛ mɔɔ-kpasi-mɛ; wa tɛ ya hee kísí ger-mɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ ba yuwar kɔ-mɛ sɛ́ɛ́m, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka kɔ̧ naŋ-mɛ na.
Kà mɛ̀ ɔ nu, kíì beka de mɛ na; kà mɛ̀ ɔ ya, ya tɛ ɔ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ yí-mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ de kíì ŋma ŋgamɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ yek nɛ mɛ na, kóó nasa wi ko o wi-ɗaŋ a̧ ka'i de kíì pi̧ tɛ-mɛ na mbɛt,
wen GASA WAN tɛ pɛm mɛ, a̧ tɛ zɔk naŋ-mɛ ká mɛ tɛɛ ba pɛ́r.
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ boo nɛ̀ ŋgai wen dee demɔ in wi nɛ ak mɛ, ká mɛ́ bɛ̧ dea-a ha̧ a̧ na.
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ boo nɛ̀ mɔ mɛ gbak nɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e: «Mɛ̀ é kaŋ, sa̧a̧mɔ sɛka'm ha̧a̧ mɛ,» na.
Ká mɛ́ e zu mɔ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ in sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ duk nɛ see kpɔk in mɛɛ na.
Kà ŋma bíí de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ na, ká mɛ́ kpɛr in a̧ gee na.
Ká mɛ́ yeŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ ba er deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ de nɛ kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt.
Wen GASA sɛna o ɗaŋwi, a̧ ndaɗi kɔ̧-a̧ in o wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Fom ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ zu bíí kɔ̧ tua ko wi-ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok nɛ de yoŋgo zu o bíí kɔ̧ tua ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
A̧ zɛkɛɗi kɔ̧-a̧ o wi-kai-ndaa-wi zɛkɛɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ko ha̧ o wi-mbo-zu.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ kpa gasamɔ, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi ko wi-ŋgazu nɛ búù.
O bem, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí usamɔ ko dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e iŋamɔ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, nɛ́ ŋma de yuwar mɔ a̧‘m ha̧a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ̧ usamɔ kɔ‘m na.
Mi duka so nɛ be-mbo-zu ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m mbɛt, ɓɛɛ naa kɔ‘m kɔ̧ɔ̧ so'm nyɛmna hee kpɔk bem ga.
Dáà kɔ‘m usa mɔ ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ kásí wen kɔ‘m e kɔ̧ see-mɛ, mɛ̀ kásí o geŋa kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk siti.
Mɛ̀ kpá iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, mɛ̀ kpá iŋamɔ; ká mɛ́ er o ee-zu-mɔ kɔ‘m na, ká mɛ́ e wa duk na.
Kà mɛ̀ e iŋa-mgbara-mɔ duk na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ pɛm mɛ: mɛ̀ kɔ̧́ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ zɔk mɛ.
Kuti iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mɛ̀ íŋ mgbara mɔ, mɛ̀ kpá iŋamɔ gan oi o mɔ nɛ mɛ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ lɛŋ!
Mɛ̀ kásí a̧ nɔ er-mɛ kà de ká a̧ baa mɛ e ŋgɔn; a̧ tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-tu̧-tɛ-mɛ, kà mɛ nɛ hɛra a̧ ndaɗi tɛ-mɛ.
A̧ tɛ duk nɛ de mɛtɛwol zu mɛ in de
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ zìì, mɛ̀ kásí wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ pɛ-duka-a kɔ-mɛ zu nu tɛ dɔk siti.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ yuwar iŋa-mgbara-mɔ a̧‘m mgbɔɔ mɛ e sɛnɛ; mi mgbɔɔ mɛ usi nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ mɛ.
Ŋma mɔ beka e bɔnɛ tɛ naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ na; ŋma mɔɔ-kɔ̧ naŋ-mɛ fara maa yi beka bo na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ kásí mɔ nɛ mɛ yamba nɛ de-a, ká mɛ́ e duk na; mɛ̀ kás’à, a̧ nɛ duka-kpasa kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ bá yuwar ko o wi-ɗaŋ na, ká mɛ́ nɛ́ kpɔk in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ é yuwar kɔ-wa duk, ká mɛ́ bá na, mɛ̀ yú yuwar'i yuu, mɛ̀ mbáŋ kɔ-mɛ nɛ ká̧ a̧;
wen kà wà de ɗaŋmɔ na, wa ɔ ya na; kà wà gbɛ ŋma bíí na, ya ba yí-wa na mbɛt.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ-zuzu, in dɔ̧ɔ̧-nɔɔ kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-oi-ŋgai.
Ɓɛɛ yuwar ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ gɔna-ndaa-zan nɛ̀ nyɛk nɛnɛ hegɔ wese ŋgai nɛnɛ'ɛ.
Yuwar ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ tum, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ mɔ nɛ wa tɛ kɔ̧ nɛ̀ naŋ-wa'i na.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ wen kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ o ee-zu-mɔ kɔ‘m.
Ká mɛ́ ba yí-mɛ yinɛ tɛ-wa na, mɛ̀ é wa kɔ̧ ɗuka see-mɛ!
Wen wa nɛ mɔɔ-kpasi-wi ko o wi-kasi-wa, in mɔɔ-ha̧-haya-tɛ wen kpoo-tɛ-wi lɛŋ.
Mɛ̀ dé hakilo nɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ ta kɔ̧ see-mɛ lɛŋ, wen kpasamɔ, mɔɔ-gɔn nú duka-kpasa lɛŋ gbo nɛ tɛ-a.
Mɛ̀ é tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen nyɛi̧ nɛ mɛ, ká nú-mɛ tɔ̧ ndiŋ wen na.
Yí-mɛ a̧ ba, zɔka mɔ kɔ-mɛ a̧ duk tan ti mɛ.
Mɛ̀ ɗáfí ɗoŋ yuwar nɛ mɛ tɛ ba, ɓɛɛ yuwar'i a̧ duk nɛ mgbák yuwar.
Ká mɛ́ nɛ́ si wiiko, koo si gale na, mɛ̀ é yuwar ɗaŋmɔ duk nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ‘m,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ndàrá-nú kó-dàlà tɔ̧ nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, nú-a baa tɛ-wi gan nɔ́,
ɓɛɛ mgbák mɔɔ ɗɔɔ o wen nɔ‘i nɛ paŋmɔ; nú-a ɔ tɔ̧a̧ hee gba-paa nɛ nú-a yiitoo ga.
Naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ba nɛ yuwar-fio, a̧ mgbɔ nɛ wi si fara-fio mɛ.
Yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa ba'i nɛ yambala-a si fara n'aa iŋ na, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ yuwar kpasa-a na.
Kinii, o bem, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m; k’ɛ́nɛ́ é wen kɔ‘m tɛ geemɔ na.
Mɛ̀ é yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ duk, ká mɛ hɛɗi si ká̧ nu tua kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen ká tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ kɔ-mɛ de geemɔ, in ká ŋma wi-de-ko-na gbɛ mɛ,
wen ká kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛɛ duk nɛ mɔ ko ŋma bíí si zan, in ká mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ si er ŋma gɔni bíí,
wen ká mɛ tɛɛ bembi ŋgimbi nɛ kiitɛ-mɛ in kpoo-tɛ-mɛ tɛ mbɔi.
Kà mɔ nɛ́ dee hegɔ, mɛ tɛ ai nú-mɛ‘e: «Mi sɛna usamɔ wen ge? See-am ee o mbɔrɔ tɛ geemɔ wen ge?
Mi zii so mbɔrɔ ko o wan kɔ‘m na, mi yeŋ so zer mɛ zii usamɔ ko o wi nɛ usi mɔ ha̧‘m na, wen ge?
Nɛ mɔ‘i sa'm kpa bɔnɛ oi-aa ti o gii bíí lɛŋ!»
Mɛ̀ nɔ́ nɛ́ yi kɔ̧ kpánà kɔ-mɛ, in wan nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ gɔna-yì kɔ-mɛ.
Ká o gɔna-yì kɔ-mɛ fok si zan na, in ká o foka-yì kɔ-mɛ nɛ si mgbara kira na mbɛt.
Wa a̧ ya wen mɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wen o gɔni bíí mbɛt na!
Mɛ̀ kpá desee in kóò kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dúk nɛ de-a in ko-gbɛ̧-naŋ kɔ-mɛ!
Yaa-ger-kɔɗɛ kɔ-mɛ, zɔŋa-zambɛrɛ; ká wɔ tɛ-a busi tɛ-mɛ na ɓɔnsɛnɛ, wɔ-a a̧ gbɛ mɛ hee dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká wɔ gɔni okoo gbɛ mɛ na, ká mɛ́ tam ber gɔni okoo na mbɛt,
wen yí GASA WAN ɓɔn tɛ naŋanɔ ko bíí lɛŋ; a̧ zɔk nɛ o yuwar kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Ɗaŋmɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ tɛ pi̧ a̧ tɛ pɛ́r, o nyak ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ hɛr a̧.
A̧ tɛ fe fio-ŋgazu, gba mgbélé kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yɔ a̧.
Bem kɔ‘m, kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ baa er
kà wen mɛ nú-mɛ nɛ pi̧i̧ mɛ tɛ yɔk, kà wen mɛ nú-mɛ nɛ baa mɛ pi̧ yi pɛ́r,
mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ de ha̧ wen mɛ yu zu mɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Bem kɔ‘m, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ tika kɔ̧ er ŋma-mɛ kaɗi ga, mɛ nɛ tɛ a̧, mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ áí nú ha̧ a̧ nɛ kpasa-a.
Ká mɛ́ é ha̧ ya hɔ yí-mɛ na, ká mɛ́ ɓur ndàrá-yi-mɛ na mbɛt;
mɛ̀ kpɔ̧́í̧ pɛ́r yinɛ tɛ-mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kɔɗɛ de nɛnɛ'ɛ ga, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nɔí̧ kpɔ̧i̧ nɛ bolo-pɛr yínɛ́'ɛ ga.
Wi-tɛɛri’ɛ, mɛ̀ zɔ́k gba-mii; mɛ̀ zɔ́k tom kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ-mɛ a̧ gɔn.
A̧ bó nɛ̀ wi-pɛm-a, kóó bíí nɛ duk zu a̧, kóó wan-tom kɔ̧-a̧ na;
tɛ ŋgimbi-a ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ nɛ nyɔnɔ kɔ̧-a̧ e ŋgɔn; tɛ ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧a nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ e.
Wi-tɛɛri’ɛ, mɛ tɛ ɔ nu hɔ ge ŋgimbi ge? Mɛ tɛ tun tɛ ya kɔ-mɛ mɛ gese ge?
Kana nɛ be ɔɔ ya, kana nɛ be zura ya, kana nɛ mɔi̧a er nyafi nɛ tɛ:
san tɛ ba mɛ hee wi-zɔk-oi-mɔ ga, kaɓa tɛ ba mɛ hee wi-kɔfi-mɔ ga.
Wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ nɛ ndela ká nú nɛ́ wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ na, a̧ nɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ;
a̧ pi̧ nɛ yi-a, a̧ sɔr nɛ naŋ-a, aŋ nɛ er-a.
Ɗaŋmɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-aa, a̧ e nɛ zu mɔ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, a̧ dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu.
Nɛ hegɔ sa kpaa sɔn-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk hee gɔma-yí ga, a̧ tɛ fe hee gɔma-yí ga, ŋma mɔɔ-gbak-a bo na.

Mɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ GASA WAN sɛna: zɔkamɔ-gɔ-tɛ, leɓe-de-ndela, o er gbai tɔk-tɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ-na a nu, see nɛ ba nɛ keta-ɗaŋmɔ, o naŋ-kpan-nɔ sitɛ ɗaŋmɔ, wi-de-sedaako nɛ ndela; ɓɛɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo-aa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt: mɛ̀ nɛ́ wi-ruŋgu nɛ dak kpɛri pi̧ mgbara o nya-a̧.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ kásí o geŋa ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ e usamɔ ko naa kɔ-mɛ tɛ geemɔ na.
Mɛ̀ é ha̧ wa duk kɔ̧ see-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, mɛ̀ kpó wa ger-mɛ.
Wa tɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛnɛ fara yari kɔ-mɛ; ŋgimbi ɔɔ ya kɔ-mɛ, wa tɛ pɛm mɛ, ɓɛɛ kà mɛ be tɛɛ tun, wa tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in mɛɛ.
Wen geŋa nɛ́ lamba, usamɔ nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ o mbɔrɔ nɛ́ yuwar-kpasa-a;
wa tɛ dor mɛ tɛ yuwar ko ɗaŋ okoo, in tɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko gɔni okoo.
Ká mɛ́ pɛm nɛ déè kɔ̧-a̧ na, ká mɛ́ pɛm nɛ zɔkamɔ-ɔr-wi kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt,
wen ŋgonda brɛt, ɓɛɛ nyɛma kɔ‘i wen kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu; ɓɛɛ baa kóò-wàn-wíì nɛ̀ dàlà nɛ́ gbɛɛ tɛ nɛ gbaayí.
Wi nyɛma so mɛ hu̧si wee ɗɔɔ laa, ká laa bíí wee na nde?
Wi nyɛma so mɛ nɛ nɔ zu kɛ̧i̧-wee, ká wee dɔ naŋ-wi na nde?
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wi-ndak-ɗoŋ kóò ko sɛm kɔ‘i duk nɛnɛ; wi nɛ pi̧ tɛ sɛnɛ beka gbo gee na.
Wi e wi-zuzu tɛ geemɔ tɛ mɔ n'aa zu̧a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ wen wɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ kà wa nɛ baa a̧, a̧ tɛ yoɓi mɔ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ba kóò-wàn-wíì nɛ̀ dàlà bó nɛ̀ zu na; mɛ nɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ yɔ tɛ a̧ de mɔ hegɔ.
A̧ tɛ kpa bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ, ziimɔ tɛ ba a̧, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-búù kɔ̧-a̧ beka bi na,
wen gɔya pi̧ nɛ dawa zu wiwii, ɓɛɛ ko bo yí-a wese kifa-er na.
Wen kɔ̧-a̧ bó tɛ yoɓa mɔ na; ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ dɔka-a'i beka de ŋma mɔ tɛ-a na.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ kásí wen kɔ‘m, o geŋa kɔ‘m a̧ duk nɛ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ kpasi, mɛ̀ kásí o geŋa kɔ‘m, o usamɔ kɔ‘m hee tu̧ gbaayí-mɛ ga.
Mɛ̀ kásí wa nɔ er-mɛ, mɛ̀ bá wa e kɔ̧ see-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ‘e: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ boko-nya'm.» Ɓɛɛ mɛ sa iŋamɔ‘e, nam kɔ-mɛ,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ dor mɛ tɛ kó-dàlà, in gaia mɛ wen gɔni okoo-ɔr-wi nɛ̀ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen.
Ŋma wese, mi duka so nú woi-tua kɔ‘m kɛ̧i̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ mgbara fana boi,
ɓɛɛ mi kɔɓi ŋma mgbélé ŋgaiwi. Mi mbaɗa ŋma be-ŋgaiwi mgbara o dɔka-a, nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na;
a̧ ɓira nɛ̀ yuwar ká̧ fara ko koo'i nɛ́ nɛnɛ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Duka nɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wese ye nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ ká mɔ dee nɛnɛ ndiyiŋ'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kóò‘i wee ti a̧ tɛnɛ, hee ŋma gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ be zɔŋa-duk-gee ga.
A̧ a̧a̧ nɛ gɔna-yí, a̧ yu bíí na; a̧ duk kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ na:
kinii a̧ a̧a̧ yuwar, kinii a̧ a̧a̧ bee-gara pɛm nɛ mɔ dam mgbii mɔ lɛŋ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tika ger be-ŋgaiwi'i hɛr nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ foe bo yí-a na ga, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Mi ha̧a̧ so nú mɛ́ ɗafi sɔ̧ de nɛ osoko, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ
Nɛ mɔ‘i sa'm we ti mɛ tɛnɛ mɛ kii mɛ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am kpaa mɛ'ɛ.
Mi ɗafa gado kɔ‘m nɛ borgo, mi tata de zɔ̧-laa Egiptɛ yí a,
mi misa̧ de yí-nyama in o ŋma de pɛr nyama
Mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé wɔ tɛ ŋmaa hegɔ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ! Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ tɛ ŋmaa,
wen wíì kɔ‘m bo kɔ̧ tua na, a̧ yaka ŋma nyɛi̧a nɔ.
A̧ baa ŋgoɓo sede kɔ̧-a̧ yak nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ pii sɛn tɛ mbe yí-zɛ.»
Kóò‘i ɔra a̧ nɛ de wen; a̧ ɔra a̧ nɛ de nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen mɛ ndara nú-a,
ɓɛɛ be-ŋgaiwi'i ndak ɗoŋ-aa, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ndai nɛ nɛnɛ si fara-gɔn ger-a’ɛ ga, hee ŋma mgbelewi a̧ wa hɛr mɛ gusi ga,
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ gba̧a̧ goo tɛ tok see-aa sar; a̧ duk hee nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ tik yí yɔk’ɛ ga, a̧ iŋ‘e nɛ́ fio kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ kii na.
Kinii, o bem kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ wen nɛ tɛ gbo nɛ nú‘m.
Ká see-mɛ ba yuwar ko pɛrti kóò‘i na, ká mɛ a̧r mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ-aa na,
wen a̧ dee ha̧ bíí nɛ dɔka-a mɛ ba da̧i̧ ɓɛɛ tik; a̧ kuma o ŋga bíí nɛ dɔka-a.
Tua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ yuwar fio, nɛ zir si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o fio mɛ.
Bó nɛ́ Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ sa nɛ sara,
in iŋamɔ tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɛ hee ger mbɛt na nde?
Sɛn zu kaya nɛ kusa gan zu yuwar
in sɛn sasa-war a̧ Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ yor sɛnɛ,
hee mɛ nɛ okoo ga.
Sɛn ká̧ nu garo ye,
in nɛ ɗoŋ kpar-nú tua garo ye'i
a̧ a̧ yor sɛnɛ sa nɛ mɔ‘e:
«O ŋgaŋa bíí, nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧‘m sa,
mi hiɗi nɛ mɔ sa nɛ o bíí.
O wi nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ gɔn na,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yámbí taa mɔ,
o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yámbí kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ wen mi a̧a̧ nɛ gasamɔ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen mɛ ndàrá-nú‘m nɛ́ demɔ nyɛmna.
Nú‘m tɔ̧ nɛ kpasawen,
wen ɗaŋ nɛ ndiŋmɔ nyɛmna wen ndara nú‘m.
Wen nɛ̀ gbo nɛ nú‘m lɛŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a,
ŋma yɔɔ-mɔ koo ŋma gɔɔmɔ bo sɛnɛ kpɔk na.
Wa ɔ sa̧a̧ wen wi nɛ zii mgbara mɔ,
in zia mgbara wa duk yɛkɛɗɛ wen wi nɛ kpaa iŋamɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k usamɔ kɔ‘m gan bu-mbɔi
in ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛk iŋamɔ gan sa̧a̧ lɔr.
Wen Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ dee gan de kísí,
a̧ gana o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i kɔ̧a̧.»
«Mi nɛ Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ,
tua kɔ‘m nɛ fara iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ,
in mi iŋa yuwar deemɔ.
Yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ́ sɛna ɗaŋmɔ:
ŋmaŋa-tɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen, baa ɗaŋ yuwar
in tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ nú-wen nɛ o mɔ n'am sɛn.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ in kpaa yi-mɔ, nɛ mɔ kɔ‘m;
iŋamɔ in ŋgai nɛ mɔ kɔ‘m!
Nɛ́ wen zu'm sa o wannu ɔ wan,
ɓɛɛ o be-wan gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a.
Nɛ́ wen zu'm sa o wanye ɔ wan,
ɓɛɛ o gasawi zu nu lɛŋ nɛ o wi-gɔn-kita nɛ yuwar-a.
Kɔ‘m, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ kii am tɛ kpa'm.
Kpaa mbɔi in duka-a tɛ bɔtɛ,
kpaamɔ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ in kpaa yi-mɔ mbɛt a̧a̧ er-am.
Waya-mɔ kɔ‘m gana lɔr,
gana de sa̧a̧ lɔr;
ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘m gana sa̧a̧ bu-mbɔi.
Mi nɛ nɔ tɛ yuwar deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
in tɛ yuwar demɔ.
Mi ha̧ nɛ mɔ ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ kɔ̧‘m,
mi dun nɛ ŋgoɓo kɔ-wa nɛ o mbɔi.
«GASA WAN dea'm nɛti ha̧ dɔka mɔ lɛŋ,
in nɛti ha̧ o kuti o deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ fara ɓeemɛ nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nu,
a̧ ea'm.
Nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ de o gba
in o fara nɛ yi fok gbo nɛnɛ,
wa koo so'm kaɗi.
Mi a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ ɓeemɛ nɛti
ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ de o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́;
in nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nu in o yiwese,
gu nɛ o mɔɔ-tɛ nu lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi ɗáfá yiwese, ŋgimbi n'aa yɔra nɛ kirkiti-mɔ
zu gba
Ŋgimbi n'aa aa nɛ o tura-zan yiwese,
in nɛ o kpút-kpút ɗɔɔ
ká‘m a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi n'aa kpee nɛ gba tɔp,
wen ká yi tɛɛ daŋ gan nu ŋgere-a,
in ŋgimbi n'aa dee nɛ gun-nù, mi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ.
Mi duka so de nɛ tom katɛ a̧,
ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ a̧ wese lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi duk de nɛ saa katɛ a̧.
Mi dee so saa zu nu kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ desee kɔ‘m so nɛ duka-a mgbara o bíí.»
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, o bem, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
o wi nɛ ba yuwar kɔ‘m duk nɛ desee.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí usamɔ ha̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ‘nɛ́ mɛ gɔn;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e tɛ geemɔ na.
Bíí nɛ̀ zii wen kɔ‘m,
nɛ̀ pɛm nu tua kɔ‘m wese lɛŋ,
nɛ̀ pɛm dadaa nu tua kɔ‘m duk nɛ desee,
wen wi nɛ kpaa'm, kpaa de duka-a,
a̧ kpaa deako ko GASA WAN mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tu̧ see-am, e nɛ da̧i̧ sɛn tɛ siɗoŋ woyo;
o wi nɛ sɛn am lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ fio.»
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ dee tua kɔ‘i; a̧ sɛka o mbiŋ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
A̧ gɔna o saɗi, gi dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ɗafi taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ mbɛt.
A̧ toma okoo-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ si kusa-fara saaye, a̧ hee mbéá‘e:
«Wi-iŋ-mɔ-na a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nde? Wa a̧ gbo nɛ war hɛ̧ɛ̧!» A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-nɛ-zu-bo-na'e:
«Ɛ̧̀nɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ brɛt kɔ‘m; ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ n'am gia.
Ɛ̧̀nɛ̀ é mgbélé taamɔ duk h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa; ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ yuwar iŋamɔ.»
Wi nɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-si-kafɛ ba nɛ tɛ e tɛ geemɔ; wi nɛ sa wi-ɗaŋ ha̧ a̧ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk, kpa nɛ dara e zu.
Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-si-kafɛ na, ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ sɛn mɛ́; kà mɛ̀ gai wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ.
Mɛ̀ há̧ mɔ ha̧ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ha̧ a̧ iŋ mgbara mɔ gan kuti-a; mɛ̀ úsí mɔ ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ha̧ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ gasi.
Yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ; tu̧u̧ tɛ-a mbɛt nɛ mɔ ko o sa̧a̧ bíí.
Wen nɛ́ Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ zɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ mɛ dɔk siti, in ha̧ pɛ-mɛ mɛ dɔk siti mbɛt.
Kà kɔ̧ zaŋ-mɛ nɛ gɔna, nɛ́ wen zu-mɛ; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ́ nɛ́ boo nɛ́ wi-si-kafɛ, nɛ́ mɛ́ ɛnɛ-mɛ kpɔk a̧ mɔɔ-oi-aa tɛ kpa.
Mgbélé nɛ́ okoo-fo-mɔ nɛ̀ de mɔɔ-bɔkɔ, taamɔ bo zu na.
A̧ duk ká̧ nu tua kɔ̧-a̧, sɛn gɔn kiti zu o ɓoramɔ saaye
mɛ sa nɛ o wi-ɓir-war, nɛ ɓir mɔ kɔ‘i ɓir yak'e:
«O wi-iŋ-mɔ-na a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nde? Wa a̧ gbo nɛ war hɛ̧ɛ̧!» Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-nɛ-zu-bo-na'e:
«O yi nɛ‘i zu̧ zu̧u̧ ɔ dee, o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ‘i zu̧ zu̧u̧ ɔ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna.»
Ɓɛɛ wa iŋ kɔ-wa'e, fio a̧a̧ fara'i na, wa iŋ‘e o wi nɛ kóò‘i saa ba nɛ war si ɗoŋ fio na.
O tua-wen ko Salomɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Bem nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na tu̧ nɛ see naa kɔ‘i.
O kpaamɔ nɛ yuwar-a na gbak na, ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ba wi baa yinɛ tɛ fio.
GASA WAN e ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ ɔ wɔ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ e ha̧ o wi-ɗaŋ mɛ kpa mɔ nɛ wa de wɔ-a na.
Er-de-mɔ nɛ tɛɛri kpa mbɔi na, ɓɛɛ haya er-demɔ ha̧ mbɔi ha̧a̧.
Wi nɛ mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ e ŋgɔn tɛ ŋgimbi-a nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɔ kɔ‘i nɛ ya ŋgimbi-mɔi̧-nyɔnɔ nɛ pofa-bíí.
De toka yoŋgo a̧ duk zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ wen-ŋgai a̧ mɔi̧a ŋmaa dun kɔ̧ nú-wa.
Tɛ-wi mbaŋ ɗoŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɗoŋ fio kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ nin o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ bi.
Wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ kpasa taamɔ kpɛk o geŋa kpɛk, ɓɛɛ wi-wor-mɔ nɛ̀ zu bo na ba nɛ yuwar fio kɔ‘i.
Wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kana hɔ ti, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ gɔa-a tɛ kpa bɔnɛ oi-aa.
Wi nɛ hu̧si kpasawen nɛ̀ o ŋma-a usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ wi-wor-mɔ nɛ̀ zu bo na, ba nɛ yuwar fio kɔ‘i.
Nú wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ kpút-kpút yì-duka-kpasa, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ wen-ŋgai a̧ mɔi̧a ŋmaa dun kɔ̧ nú-wa.
Sɛnmɔ fo nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ
O wi-iŋ-mɔ tɔ̧ wen nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ-na kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ bɔnɛ.
O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ɗafi kɔ‘i nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ wen ko wi-dawa nɛ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-mɔ.
Kpaamɔ ko wanmbɔi nɛ́ ye-ŋgárá kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tika-a ko wi-bɔnɛ nɛ́ san kɔ-wa.
Dee demɔ nɛ́ wen ha'i mɛ kpasi, ɓɛɛ yi-mɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ yɔa-a.
Wi nɛ tɛ-a mbaŋ ɗoŋ mbɔrɔ ba nɛ yuwar kpasa-a, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ zia mbaŋa-tɛ-mɔ na gbɛ nɛ tɛ.
Wi nɛ sɛnmɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-aa tɔ̧ wen nɛ see yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wi-de-ruŋgu nɛ mgbelewi.
Ɗaŋmɔ nyaŋ fara-dɔk-wen na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kom sɛka tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Leɓe wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ gba de bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ taamɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ gee tum-mɔ.
Wen ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga̧ nɛ see o giiwi; o wi nɛ zu bo na fe wen wa bo nɛ̀ iŋamɔ na.
Nɛ́ de yoŋgo ko GASA WAN a̧ ha̧ kpaamɔ ha̧ bíí, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kia mɔ ko bíí nɛ zu-wi a̧ tɛ ha̧ ŋma mbe-a e zu a na.
Ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ mɔɔ-de-saa ko wi nɛ zu bo na, ɓɛɛ gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ nɛ mɔ ko wi-ta-mɔ.
Nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ wi-ɗaŋ yu kíí a̧ a̧ kpa kànà wi-ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧a̧, a̧ tɛ kpa.
Tika-a ko wi-ɗaŋ hɔɔ ŋmaa in hara-búk, ɓɛɛ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ duka-a kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wi-tɛɛri ti wan kɔ‘i duk hee kpa̧i̧a̧-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn gba̧a̧ nin-wi in zi-wee sɛn gbaayí-wi ga.
Yuu kíí GASA WAN de ha'i mɛ duk ɗoŋ wi nyɛi̧ zaŋnu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gɔn ŋma nu pɛ duka-a ko wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ.
Zɛmamɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-desee, ɓɛɛ ee-ta ko wi-ɗaŋ beka hɔ gba̧a̧ na.
Yuwar ko GASA WAN hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋgárá wen wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ mɔɔ-kɔ̧-naŋ-wa.
Ŋma mɔ beka fo wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ beka duk zu nu na.
Nú wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɔ̧ nɛ mbɔrɔ-iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɓir leɓe-tɔ̧-ɗaŋ-wen pi̧ nu.
Ndàrá-nú wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɔ̧ nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ nú wi-ɗaŋ tɔ̧ nɛ ndiŋ wen.
GASA WAN sɛna ɗaŋ mɔɔ-we-dita-mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wan nɛ we mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ a̧ dee tɛ-a.
Ŋgimbi-gɔ-tɛ nɛ ŋgimbi-foe, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ duk mɔ kɔ‘i in o wi-mɔka-see.
Nɛ́ dee demɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ ba wa siti, ɓɛɛ gɔn-ta ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ yɔ wa.
Ŋgimbi gásá nyimsea, mbɔi beka gbak wi ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpasi wi tɛ fio.
Er deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɗafi nɛ yuwar ti a̧, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗaŋ tɛ fe zaŋ ɗaŋ kɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ er deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko o de bíí a̧ tɛ kpasi wa, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ tik yi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i woyo.
Wi-ɗaŋ fe kana in mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ee-ta kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ fee mbɛt.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpasa tɛ dita-see, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi-ɗaŋ a̧ tika fara'i.
Nɛ́ ɗaŋ nú-wen ko wi-iŋ-sɔ̧-na a̧ yɔ ŋma-a, ɓɛɛ nɛ iŋamɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ ba wen yinɛ zu wa.
Bɔtɛ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ desee ko bíí saaye, ɓɛɛ fio ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ desee kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ toka de yoŋgo zu o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ ba ye e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nú-wen ko o wi-ɗaŋ yai nɛ ye.
Wi nɛ e ŋma-wi tɛ geemɔ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ duk kɔ‘i nɛ oi nú.
Wor-wen e wen kɔ̧ zaŋ na, ɓɛɛ kpasawi e kɔ‘i ee kɔ̧ zaŋ.
Kpasa wi-kasi-ye bo na, ye tika, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ baa keta ko o dɔka gasawi a̧ ye duk nɛnɛ mgbitiŋ.
Wi-yoɓi-ziŋina oi nú ŋma-wi ɔr nɛ tɛ siɗoŋ woyo, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ de hegɔ na duk mɔ kɔ‘i keɗeŋ.
Ko-ha̧-mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ kpa nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ; ɓɛɛ wi-de-tom nɛ kin kpa kana nɛ mbɔi oi-aa.
Wi-de-demɔ de mɔ ha̧ tɛ, ɓɛɛ wi-de-ŋgamɔ yɔ nɛ kɔya-tɛ.
Wi-ɗaŋ kpa nɛ mbɔi-ɔr-tɛ, ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa kana mɔɔ-oi deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ‘i.
Wi nɛ e see tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ wi-ndak ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ ba nɛ yuwar-fio.
GASA WAN sɛna o wi nɛ see-wa sa̧ na, a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ de naŋanɔ.
Nɛ́ kpasawen nɛ mbetɛ, wi-ɗaŋ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bezaŋ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpasi.
Ŋma de okoo nɛ̀ zu bo na, hɔɔ ŋmaa in de kana lɔr sɛn zɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋgɔya.
Mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ demɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ zɛm wi-ɗaŋ nɛ nyimsea.
Wi-ha̧-mɔ nɛ desee tɛ kpa gan kuti-a, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ mɔi̧ mbɔi kɔ‘i e ti yak zale nɛ siti na mbɛt.
Mɔ ko wi-ha̧-mɔ ha̧ bíí tɛ dɔk piiɗoŋ; wi nɛ ha̧ yí-nɔɔ ha̧ ŋma bíí, wa tɛ ha̧ yí-nɔɔ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Dukbíí tok nɛ ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ be-fon, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ ɗɔra-a na, ɓɛɛ de yoŋgo a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ ɗɔr fon ha̧ bíí!
Wi nɛ de demɔ kii mɛ kpa deako; wi nɛ kii nɛ ɗaŋmɔ tɛ kpa nɛ̀ yí.
Wi nɛ ha̧ tɛ lɛŋ ha̧ mbɔi kɔ‘i duk hɔ ti na, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in de ɓɔɔ wa̧a̧-te ŋgimbi mbɔŋgi.
Wi nɛ dak kpɛri pi̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i, mɔɔ-oi-aa nɛ búk, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗaŋ tɛ duk nɛ bara ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Deemɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a hɔɔ ŋmaa in te duka-kpasa; mɛ nɛ sɛn tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ a̧ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ duk nɛnɛ zu o ŋma bíí.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kpa mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ‘i kpaa zu nu’ɛ, ɓɛɛ a'i iŋ kana'e o wi-ɗaŋ in o wi-iŋ-sɔ̧ na tɛ kpa kana mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha'i mɛ gai a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ zia wen ko ŋma-a na nɛ mgbelewi.
Deako ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ zu wi-de-demɔ, ɓɛɛ ko wi-ta-ɗaŋmɔ GASA WAN usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧.
Deemɔ nɛ ŋga-see nɛ́ hɔ ti na, ɓɛɛ wi beka za̧ kunin wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a zan na.
Kpasa okoo nɛ́
Ee-zu-mɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ wen dee demɔ, ɓɛɛ taamɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ wen ɔramɔ.
Wen kɔ̧ nú wi-ɗaŋ nɛ pɛr-gbɛ-bíí, ɓɛɛ wen mɛ nú wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-kpasi-wa.
Wi-ɗaŋ tik kaɗi kur ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ tua ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a fu̧ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wi zɔn bíí wen iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wi ee wi nɛ̀ taamɔ bo na tɛ geemɔ.
Gana so a'i duk nɛ geɗek bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ wi-de-tom kpɔk ɓɛɛ, bá nɛ̀ wi-kɔn-ŋguɗi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ na.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a zik o mɔ-dai kɔ‘i zik ká mɔ tɛɛ ɓan wa, ɓɛɛ mɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ dee ŋgamɔ.
Wi nɛ gɔm nù kɔ‘i tɛ kpa nyɔŋmɔ zaŋ sur, ɓɛɛ wi-ndak ɗoŋ geemɔ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na.
Ɗaŋwi yeŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ ɓar, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kunin mɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ tɛ ɓɔ.
Wi-ɗaŋ ba nɛ pɛr-wen kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gboo kɔ‘i, dita-see bo na.
Mɛ nɛ sɛn tɛ wen mɛ nú-wi a'i kpa nɛ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i kpa nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom’ɛ ga.
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na tɔ̧ kɔ‘i'e, wi ba nɛ kpasa tana war, ɓɛɛ wi-zii-mbɔrɔ nɛ́ gɔna kɔ̧-zaŋ bíí.
Mgbelewi usi nyimsea kɔ‘i ɓɔn bɛɗɛ, ɓɛɛ wi-mbo-zu nɔ nɛ ŋgiɗi zu dara nɛ wa da̧ nɛ a̧.
Wi-tɔ̧-kpasawen ba nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a e ti, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ wi-de-sedaako ba nɛ ndela e ti mbɛt.
Wen ko
Nú-tɔ̧-kpasawen duk kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi ko wi-ndela nyɛi̧ na.
Ɔramɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ desee a̧a̧ in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ.
Ŋma bɔnɛ kpa wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ dɔk dɔk siti.
Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ ndàrá-nú-de-ndela na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ o wi-tɔ̧-kpasawen.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ nú-tum na usi iŋamɔ kɔ‘i nɛ zan na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na usi nɛ mgbélé kɔ‘i.
Er-de-tom nɛ̀ haya-a tɛ ɔ wan, ɓɛɛ ko er-tɛɛri nɛ́ duka bara.
Hɛrɗɛŋ-see gbɛ wan-aa gbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ de wen a̧ ha̧ desee ha̧ a̧.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a usi nɛ tana war ha̧ ŋma-wi, ɓɛɛ er deemɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ mgbɔ nɛ ŋma-wa yɔ nɛ kaya.
Wi-tɛɛri kpa kpoo kà de ká a̧ dɔɔ na, ɓɛɛ kpasa kpaamɔ ko bíí nɛ dee tom.
Baa yuwar deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a de ha'i mɛ duk kpasa: fio bo tɛ̀ yuwar'i na.
Bem nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ zii nɛ mbɔrɔ ko dáà, ɓɛɛ wi-ŋga-see zii mbɔrɔ na.
Bíí nyɔŋ hɔ ti wen de wen nɛ gbo nɛ nú-a, ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ dee ŋgamɔ.
Bíí nɛ iŋ mgbara wen nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú zɔk nɛ duka-a kɔ‘i: wan-baa-nu gbɛ nɛ tɛ.
Mɔ nɛ wi-tɛɛri kɔ̧a̧, a̧ kpa na, ɓɛɛ o kpasa wi-de-tom tɛ kpa mɔ nɛ wa kɔ̧a̧.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɛn kɔ‘i nɛ wen-ndela, ɓɛɛ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ kaia ndaa-bíí in dee mɔɔ-foe.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a gbak nɛ bíí nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ tana yuwar, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ dee ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ mɛ tik.
