O ŋma bíí ba tɛ‘e wi nɛ wanmbɔi, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ na; o ŋma e tɛ hee wisan ga, ɓɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mbɔi.
Nɛ́ mbɔi ko bíí a̧ kpasi bíí zu nu, ɓɛɛ war ko wisan, wi kii wen in a̧ wen zu mbɔi na.
Sa̧a̧mɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ nyɛk nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ lamba ko o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ bi.
Mɔɔ-oi ŋmaŋa-tɛ nɛ kpɛri, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ duk tɛ o wi-zii-mbɔrɔ.
Kpaamɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai nɛ́ hɔ ti na, ɓɛɛ wi-kusi-mɔ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ tɛ kpa gan kuti-a.
Tika-a ko mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ha̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee; kpaa mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ha̧ nɛ desee.
Wi nɛ e mbɔrɔ tɛ geemɔ tɛ yɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kasi geŋa tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa.
Usamɔ ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ de ha'i mɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ dee ha'i mɛ gba pɛ́r nɛ a̧a̧ yuwar ko fio e duk.
Iŋa-mgbara-wen de nɛ demɔ ha'i, ɓɛɛ yuwar ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ́ doe-ŋgɛ́zɛ́.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ nú-tum na ta mɔ kaɗi sɛka a̧ dea, ɓɛɛ wi-bɔkɔ usi nɛ mgbélé kɔ‘i yaknɛ.
Ɗaŋ betom tɛ tik tɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ de betom nɛ nyina-haya-tɛ.
San in foe nɛ ko wi nɛ siŋ usamɔ pi̧ taŋ; zɔnamɔ a̧a̧ in bíí nɛ kasi mbɔrɔ.
Kpaa mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ha̧ nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ zɔk ea-ɗaŋmɔ duk nɛ ɗaŋmɔ sɛn yi wa.
Zaŋ wi-gbam-yari in wi-gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ tɛ gɔn, ɓɛɛ wi-gbam-yari in wi-bɔkɔ tɛ de ɗaŋ mbɛt.
Ɗaŋmɔ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ duka-a tɛ bɔtɛ.
O bezaŋ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpa nɛ mɔɔ-oi zɔmdáa kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ mbɔi ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ kpa kpaa.
Fɔ ko wisan dɛm nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ o ŋma bíí fe wen dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
Wi-deli-bem de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ in bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ bem kɔ‘i tɛ gusi kana a̧.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ sur, ɓɛɛ zaŋ wi-ɗaŋ sur na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Okoo-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ zɔk kɔ̧ kira kɔ‘i nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ mgbélé-a yaia kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ta-tɛ a nu.
Wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yu nɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ba nɛ gɔɔ-war e nɛ a̧ tɛ geemɔ.
Gasa zu a̧a̧ kɔ̧ nú wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, ɓɛɛ wen ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-pɛm-wa.
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ndai-wa-fɔ na bó nɛ̀ nyɔnɔ kɔ̧ dam na.
Kpasa wi-sedaako de ndela na, ɓɛɛ ko ɗaŋ wi-sedaako nɛ ndela a̧ dɔka kɔ̧ nú-a.
Wi-kai-ndaa kii mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ takaɗi, ɓɛɛ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, iŋamɔ tɛ́ héé yì ga.
Mɛ̀ yú katɛ wi-bɔkɔ, wen mɛ beka kpa ŋma kpasa taamɔ tɛ a̧ na kóó kpɔk.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko wi nɛ zaŋ ɔ gɔna, nɛ kia-a ha̧ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɔra ŋmaa nɛ deemɔ ko wi nɛ kpasa taamɔ bo na.
O wi-bɔkɔ zɔk kɔ-wa yɔɔ-kaya hee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ ga na, ɓɛɛ dee demɔ a̧a̧ mgbara o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɗaŋsee in desee nɛ́ wan-aa a̧ iŋ mɔ kɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀-wí, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ nyɛm mɛ iŋ na.
Tua ko wi-ɗaŋ beka yor na, ɓɛɛ war-a ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ŋma yuwar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ŋma bíí tɔ̧ kɔ‘i'e ɔ dee wen wi, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ, mgbɔ nɛ a̧ sitɛ fio.
Ŋma mami a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ nú-wi gɔn mami nɛ zan, ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ̧ see-wi mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ a'i hi̧i̧; ŋma ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi desee tɛɛ kpai nɛ ɗaŋsee mbɛt.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ zaŋ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ sur nɛ dee demɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ zaŋ gɔn na kɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ ɗɔɔ wen lɛŋ nɛ nú-tum, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ kɔ‘i nɔ nɛ gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ zɔk ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ wɛra tɛ, ɓɛɛ ko mgbelewi nɛ kina-a si sɛnɛ nɛ desee.
Wan-ŋga-see ɓan na dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ; wi-kii-wen aŋ nɛ sɛnmɔ a zu.
War mɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mɔ-na nɛ mgbélé, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ta-mɔ, iŋamɔ nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ wen wa.
O wi-ɗaŋ tɛ gu nu sɛn ti o wi-de-demɔ, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ gu nu nu tua ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Wisan nɛ geemɔ sɛn yí sɛm kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ sɛm ko wanmbɔi ɔ dɔka.
Wi-e-ŋma-wi tɛ geemɔ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ de sɔnti a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ de ko ha̧ wisan.
Dee ɗaŋmɔ mɛ nɛ yɔɔ-kaya, ɓɛɛ dee demɔ in mboozu nɛ ko o wi nɛ ba kɔ‘i nɛ keta demɔ.
Tom lɛŋ nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-yí-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi wora wen nɛ kaɓa.
Kpaa mbɔi nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ ko wi-bɔkɔ kana nɛ dee mɔɔ-mgbele.
Kpasa wi-sedaako kpasi wi kpasi, ɓɛɛ ko wi-ɔr-wi, ba nɛ wi yɔ nɛ kaya.
Mboozu ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ mgbák mɔ nɛ tɛ kpasi wi, wen a̧ nɛ fara-hu̧si-tɛ ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Mboozu ha̧ GASA WAN de ha'i mɛ duk kpasa; nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ ba pɛ́r ko fio yinɛ zu-wi.
Zɔm dɔka dukbíí nɛ zɔnamɔ wen wannu; dɔka-a ko bíí na nɛ tika-a ko be-wan.
Wi-nɔɔ-see nɛ kpasa wi-iŋ-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ see nɔ na usi nɛ mgbélé kɔ‘i.
Mgbitiŋ-see ha̧ nɛ haya-tɛ, ɓɛɛ aa-see-mɔ nɛ ɓuki ko gba̧a̧-tɛ-wi.
Wi-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisan da̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ dee wa, ɓɛɛ wi-de-ko ha̧ o wi-kɔsa tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
Nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ a̧ ba wi-ɗaŋ yo nɛ nu, ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧a̧ nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi koo ti fio mbɛt.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see wi nɛ ta mɔ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ hee ge wi tɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧ see o wi-bɔkɔ ge?
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-gasi-nu, ɓɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mɔɔ-búù wen o zuduk bíí.
Desee ko wannu duk zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ ɔ gɔna, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋsee kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ zu wi-e-foe yí-a.
De kifa-nú-wen gbɔsi nɛ nyimsea e nu, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ-nú-wen dak nɛ nyimsea pi̧ nu.
Leɓe wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɔ̧ nɛ wen-gbak wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zii, ɓɛɛ nú wi-bɔkɔ tɔ̧ nɛ mgbélé-wen.
Yí GASA WAN dama fara lɛŋ, zɔk nɛ o ɗaŋwi in o de-wi.
Leɓe-ga̧-wen hɔɔ ŋmaa in te duka-kpasa, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ-nú-wen tok nɛ see-wi sar.
Mgbelewi e nɛ usamɔ ko dáà kɔ‘i tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ wi-kasi-mbɔrɔ nɛ haya bíí.
Dɔka kpaamɔ suɓi ŋmaa suɓi kɔ̧ tua ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ see wi-ɗaŋ ɔ nu zu kpaamɔ kɔ‘i na.
Ndàrá-nú wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ usi nɛ iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ see wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ!
Ɗafa-sɔ̧ ko wi-ɗaŋ de tɛ GASA WAN na, ɓɛɛ wora sɔ̧ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɔ nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ a̧.
Yuwar deemɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yí GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ bíí nɛ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Wí úsí ŋga bɔnɛ ha̧ wi nɛ a̧r tɛ tana war, ɓɛɛ wi-bɛ̧̀-mbaŋa-tɛ mɔ tɛ fe.
Kɔ̧-fio in gba gboŋgo kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ya bùù ti GASA WAN’ɛ, kà bó nɛ̀ see bíí!
Wi-kai-ndaa-wi kɔ̧ ha'i mɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧ na; a̧ gbam in wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ na.
Desee usi tɛ sɛn sɔnti-wi, ɓɛɛ kà see-wi tu̧, taamɔ ziɓa lɛŋ.
Wi-ta-kpasamɔ kii nɛ iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ nú wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbélé-wen.
Wese ko wisan lɛŋ nɛ wese bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ wese ko wi-bɔtɛ lɛŋ nɛ wese gbaŋa.
Gana so kpaa mbɔi tikiɗi yu nɛ kíí GASA WAN, bá nɛ̀ kpaa dɔka mbɔi zaŋ tu̧u̧-see.
Gana so nyɔŋa wa̧a̧-kpoo fara nɛ
Wi nɛ see kura dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ wi-ga̧a̧-see gbɔsi nɛ kpɛri e nu.
Yuwar ko wi-tɛɛri ɔ hee ɓoramɔ-tɛn ga, ɓɛɛ yuwar ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɔ yɔka.
Be-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bem nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na e nɛ naa kɔ‘i tɛ geemɔ.
Mɔɔ-mgbele nɛ desee ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ ba nɛ tana war kɔ‘i.
Kà ee-zu-mɔ hɔ gba̧a̧ na, mɛ nɛ wen keta nɛ‘i ba na, ɓɛɛ kà o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ dɔk, ee-zu-mɔ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Desee a̧a̧ sɛnɛ wen bíí nɛ kifi nú zu wen nɛ nú-tum na; kifa-nú nɛ de-a nɛ gba demɔ nyɛmna.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ba nɛ yuwar kpasa-a si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ gira tɛ e fara ko o fio nɛ duk si ɗɔɔ duk.
GASA WAN gbin nɛ tua ko wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ a nu, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba nɛ mɔɔ-kɛ̧-mgbara-nù ko ko-gera e ŋgɔn.
GASA WAN sɛna ɗaŋ taamɔ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧ wen ɔ dee nyɛmna sɛn ti a̧.
Wi nɛ ɓar mɔ nɛ ŋgai bó nɛ̀ ga̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ bɛ̧ ha̧a̧mɔ-ye-wi tɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ zu nu.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ta wen sɛka kifa nú, ɓɛɛ nú o wi-ɗaŋ ɔ̧i̧ nɛ́ ɗaŋ wen.
GASA WAN ndaɗi in o wi-ɗaŋ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii nɛ kɔfamɔ ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Zɔka bíí nɛ de yí ha̧ nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ de nyɛrɛmɔ ha̧ nɛ ŋgai.
Wi nɛ yeŋ zer tɛ kpasa tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ tɛ duk mgbara o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Wi nɛ e usamɔ tɛ geemɔ e nɛ tɛ tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ zii mbɔrɔ kpa nɛ kpasa taamɔ.
Yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ́ ku̧u̧naŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛti ha'i mɛ kpa gasamɔ, wi tɛ duk nɛ mɔka-see.
Ko bíí nɛ́ ee-zu-mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ a̧ ha̧ kifa-nú.
Bíí zɔk yuwar mɔ kɔ‘i lɛŋ ɔ dee, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ we see-wi.
Mɛ̀ é deemɔ kɔ-mɛ er GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
O mɔ nɛ GASA WAN taa de nɛnɛ lɛŋ a̧a̧ nɛ tom kɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk; wi-ɗaŋ mbɛt duk wen wese bɔnɛ.
GASA WAN sɛna wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ; nɛ mbetɛ, wi’ɛi tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i.
Nɛ́ tɛ dee demɔ in mboozu a̧ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i bi nɛnɛ; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ yuu kíí GASA WAN a'i bɛ̧ nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ.
Kà GASA WAN kpɛk naŋanɔ ko ŋma bíí kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ see o wisɛn ko wi’ɛi mɛ ga̧ zu a̧.
Gana so kpaa mɔ tikiɗi tɛ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, bá nɛ̀ kpaa mɔ nɛ dɔka tɛ zuzu.
See bíí ndak nɛ pata mɔ n'aa ta, ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ usi yuwar ha̧ a̧.
Kpasawen a̧a̧ ndàrá-nú wannu; ŋgimbi-gɔn-kita a̧ beka kɛ̧ mgbara bíí na.
O de mɔɔ-we-mɔ nɛ ko GASA WAN; o dita mɔɔ-we-mɔ kɔ̧ ŋgoɓo lɛŋ nɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ sɛn ti o wannu, wen damti yor nɛ nɔa-a tɛ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Desee ko wannu a̧a̧ zu
Nyimsea ko wannu nɛ mɔɔ-gbɛ-fio, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nyɛma mɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧.
Mami ko wannu ha̧ nɛ duka-kpasa, ɓɛɛ deako kɔ̧-a̧ duk hee kórò-ŋma-puɗu ga.
Kpaa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana kpaa de lɔr, in kpaa iŋamɔ gana kpaa bu-mbɔi.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a e nɛ yuwar ɗaŋmɔ duk, wen wi nɛ zɔk naŋanɔ kɔ‘i nɛ de-a, zɔk nɛ duka-kpasa kɔ‘i nɛ de-a mbɛt.
Tika-a nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi-ŋmaŋa-tɛ, mɔɔ-oi-gɔɔ-tɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ naŋ.
Gana so a'i duk in o wi-ya-si-ɗɔɔ nɛ mɔka-see, bá nɛ̀ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom in o wi-gasi-zu.
Wi nɛ zii ŋma wen ɓɛɛ taa mɔ sɛnɛ nɛ de-a, duk kɔ‘i nɛ de-a; wi-e-ta nɛ GASA WAN tɛ duk tɛ bɔtɛ.
Nɛ́ wi nɛ kɛ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ de-a a'i sa'e, wi-iŋ-mɔ; nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ nɛ̀
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ nɛ tugun duka-kpasa ko o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ sap mgbélé ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na á kana nɛ́ yí-see wan-aa.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ta mɔ nɛti sɛka tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen; nɛ́ hegɔ sa wen kɔ̧-a̧ tik nu gee na.
De nú-wen nɛ́ ɔ̧ɔ̧-nyɔ̧ɔ̧-mɔ hee gɔrɔ ga; a̧ nɛ́ ɔ̧ɔ̧-nyɔ̧ɔ̧-mɔ kɔ̧ nú-wí in mɔɔ-hai-tɛ.
Ŋma yuwar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ŋma bíí ta kɔ‘i'e, ɔ dee wen wi, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ, ba nɛ a̧ sitɛ fio.
Nɛ́ wɔ a̧ de ha̧ wi-de-tom mɛ de tom; nɛ nú-a a̧ ir a̧ si sɛnɛ.
Ee-zu-mɔ ko wi-tɛɛri nɛ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ndara nú-a nɛ gee wee-dar-zɔ̧.
Wi-ɗaŋ dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ wi-ruŋgu kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara o sɛm.
Wi-de-ŋgamɔ ɔr nɛ sɛm kɔ‘i, wen mgbɔɔ a̧ pi tɛ ɗaŋ war.
Wi nɛ gu er yí kii mɛ de nɛ mɔɔ-búù, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ nyɔŋ er nú dee ɗaŋmɔ kaɗi.
Mbui nɛ̀ hɔ́ zu bíí usi nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a'i kpa nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ see nyim nɛ haya-a na gana wi-gbin-biro; wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ see gana wi-bi-ye.
Wi pi̧ tani wen iŋa mɔ mɛ siti,
Gana so nyɔŋa wa̧a̧-kpoo
Wi-de-tom nɛ̀ zaŋ ɔ gɔna tɛ ɔ wan zu o be-wan-tua nɛ de nɛ mɔɔ-mgbele; a̧ tɛ kɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi in nya kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ wee a'i nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr ha̧ mɛ sa̧, ɓɛɛ war ko see-wi nɛ GASA WAN a̧ we.
Wi-ɗaŋ yeŋ nɛ zer tɛ ɗaŋ wen; zer wi-ndela ɓɔn ŋgɔn wen kɔɓa o ndiŋ wen.
Wi nɛ mam wisan mam nɛ Wi nɛ dee a̧ mbɛt; wi nɛ mam wi-kɔsa tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa zɔ̧i̧i̧.
Mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ko o sɔkawi nɛ o be-koo-wa, ɓɛɛ tɛ̀ bem tu̧ wen dáà in naa kɔ‘i.
De nú-wen bo nɛ mɔ ko wi-bɔkɔ na, ɓɛɛ nú gasawi bá nɛ̀ ndela na.
Mbɔi nɛ mɔ hee nyina-pɛm-tɛ ga, wen wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ; kóó nɛ ge fara ge n'aa tɛ nɛ sɛnɛ ge, a̧ tɛ kpa mɔ.
Wi to nɛ zɔ̧ a zu ɗɔr dɔr nɛ̀ doe; ká tɛ-wi mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗɔr'i ha̧ nyɛr mɛ de wi ɓɔna.
Gaia wi nɛ zaŋ ɔ gɔna dee gan gusa wi-bɔkɔ tɛ nyasi gɔmŋmaa.
Wi-ɗaŋ kii kana kɔ‘i nɛ dee ŋgazu ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ betom nɛ tɛ we ti a̧ nɛ́ wi-de-ŋgamɔ.
Gana so kpaa ŋmaa in naa-koe-nam nɛ‘i gbɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, gan kpaa ŋmaa in wi-bɔkɔ ŋgimbi de mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ‘i.
Ɗaŋmɔ beka yu kɔ̧ tua ko wi nɛ kifi er demɔ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ na.
Aa naŋ kpɛri nɛ mɔ hee gbina gba-zu ga; mɛ̀ wɛ́r kɔ-mɛ tɛ-mɛ nɛti sɛka kpɛri tika.
Baa wi-ɗaŋ hee wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga, kóó wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a hee wi-ɗaŋ ga, nɛ mɔ yiitoo nɛ de tɛ GASA WAN na.
Ŋma san ko wi-bɔkɔ tɛ mbɔi nɛ ge? Ha̧ a̧ mɛ hi̧fi nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ naa kóó ha̧ a̧ mɛ de nɛ ge? Zɔk a̧ bo kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ iŋamɔ na.
Nduti
Nɛ́ mgbelewi a̧ ba er kan nɛ mɔ ɓɛɛ ee ziŋina oi nú nyamandoi ko ŋma-a.
Wi-kɔ̧-kpɛri nɛ wi-kɔ̧-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wi-gasi-zu kii nɛ tika-a.
Wi-ruŋgu beka kpa de duka-a na, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ tɛ tik zu wi-tɔ̧ ɗaŋ nú-wen.
Wi nɛ ko wi-bɔkɔ tɛ kpa nɛ dita-see; ɓɛɛ desee ko dáà ko wi nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ gɔn na, bo na.
Desee ha̧ nɛ haya-tɛ, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧-see pi̧ nɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ-wi.
Wi-ɗaŋ kpɛk nɛ mɔ nɛ‘i ye nɛ a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ gɔn kita nɛ ɗaŋ-a.
Wi zɔk iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko bíí sɛn sɔnti-a, ɓɛɛ yí wi-bɔkɔ zɔk kɔ‘i mɔ a zu ŋmaa.
Be-bɔkɔ tu̧ nɛ see dáà kɔ‘i, ha̧ nɛ dita-see ha̧ naa kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Usa bɔnɛ ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a de na, in gusa o tu̧u̧-tɛ-bíí nyɛm yi mɔɔ-dee na.
Zaŋ wi-kom-wen tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ɔ gɔna, in wi nɛ nak tɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen na, nɛ kpasa bíí.
Kóó nɛ wi-bɔkɔ mbɛt, kà à̧ duk nɛ oi nú-a, a̧ tɔ̧ wen na, wi nyɛma mɛ zɔk a̧ hee wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ga, kóó hee wi-gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ ga mbɛt.
Wi-ŋgoko kii nɛ mɔ kɔ‘i ɓɛɛ; ɓɛɛ see-aa kur kur zu tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ko o bíí ha̧ a̧.
Wi-bɔkɔ kii gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ bíí mɛ zii nɛ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Ɗaŋ nɛ́ kana kɔ‘i in fɛŋa-zu, ɓɛɛ dara mbɛt in búù.
Wen nɛ‘i tɔ̧'ɛ nɛ ɗuka dir-yì; mɛ nɛ ŋma foka-yì nɛ nyɛma mɛ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ.
Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha'i mɛ gbak wi-ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ wi gɔna kita nɛ ɗaŋ-a zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na.
Ndàrá-nú wi-bɔkɔ dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ nú-a dee ha̧ biro mɛ tik.
Nú wi-bɔkɔ dak nɛ fio pi̧ zu wan-aa, ɓɛɛ ndara-nú-a nɛ pɛ́r-ba-a̧.
Wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú wi-kai-ndaa-wi nɛ mɔɔ-ɔ-nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nú-wí, ɓɛɛ zira hɔ kɔ̧ pɛr ɗɔtɔ-wi mɛ.
Wi nɛ e tom kɔ‘i tɛ geemɔ in wi nɛ ɗaŋ tom kɔ‘i yak ŋmaa na, wa nɛ o nya-wi.
GASA WAN nɛ ŋgárá-hu̧si-sɛnɛ. Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ si katɛ a̧ ɓɛɛ duka keɗeŋ.
Ɓɛɛ war ko wanmbɔi e kɔ‘i ta nɛ mbɔi kɔ‘i hee o bíí saaye nɛ‘i za̧a̧ gaŋa
Nɛti ha̧ bíí mɛ tik, a̧ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ duka-a nɛ mɔka-see nɛ mɔ nɛ yak ti ha̧ gasamɔ.
Wi nɛ kifi nú wen nɛti sɛka tɛɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗoŋ, fɛŋ nɛ tɛ, pi̧ nɛ ziimɔ zu.
Taamɔ‘e wi tɛ kpasi ha̧ nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ bíí tɛ ɔɔ zɛɛ, ɓɛɛ kà taamɔ‘i nɛ́ ziɓa kaɗi, nɛ o a̧ tɛ ba e ŋgɔn woyo o?
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ ɔ gɔna kii nɛ iŋamɔ, in zer wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kii nɛ iŋamɔ mbɛt.
Mbɔi ko bíí nɛ mɔɔ-hu̧i-yuwar ha̧ a̧, mgbɔ nɛ a̧ si katɛ o gasawi.
Wen ko kuti wi-ɓa-kita ɔ tana hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ɓii-aa be tɛɛ ɓa kɔ‘i kaɗi sɛka'i iŋa mgbák kpasawen.
Nɛ́ tani a̧ de ha̧ kpɛri mɛ kaɗi, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kɛ̧ mgbara wen ko o ŋga bíí.
Hɔa-a katɛ ŋga-wi nɛ see tu̧a ŋgaya gan baa ye-ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ kpɛri ɔ hee ŋga mɔɔ-man nu ŋgárá ga.
Zaŋ-wi sur wen wen mɛ nú-wí, in nɛ́ tɛ́ tom ko ndàrá-nú-wi a'i ŋmaŋ nɛnɛ.
Mɛ nɛ ndàrá-nú-wi a̧ kpasi wi kóó gbɛɛ wi mbɛt; o bíí nɛ nú bá nɛ̀ wen nyɛmna tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa.
Kpaa kpasa kóò nɛ kpaa bɔtɛ; wan-kóò‘i kpaa nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN.
Wisan ai nɛ nú tɔ̧ nɛ wen, ɓɛɛ kifa-nú ko wanmbɔi ɔ kpaŋkaraŋ.
Wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ dɔka gbama-yari kii nɛ tika-a, ɓɛɛ ŋma kpasa sɛm gana ŋma nya-gbo-ɗoŋ-ŋmaa nɛ
Gana so a'i de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk nɛnɛ nɛ san, bá nɛ̀ dee ndela de nɛ mɔɔ-bɔkɔ.
Deemɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ geemɔ sɔɔ gee, ɓɛɛ naka-tɛ de nɛ mɔ, ɓan na wi yɔɔ kaya kaɗi.
Ŋgimbi nɛ sap-mgbele ko bíí a yí-see bíí kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ zu GASA WAN a̧ see-aa nyim sɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ wanmbɔi ba nɛ mbe sɛm, ɓɛɛ be kpɔk sɛm ko wisan e nɛ a̧ duk.
Ɗaŋ wi-sedaako tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa, ɓɛɛ wi-ndela beka gbo ɗɔɔ bɔnɛ na mbɛt.
Wi-mbɔŋgɔli-gasawi ɔ dɔka, ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ nɛ sɛm ko wi-ha̧-mɔ.
O nya ko wisan lɛŋ sɛn a̧ sɛn, ɓɛɛ o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ pɛsa e a̧ duk. Ŋgimbi n'aa de mɛ tɔ̧ wen in wa, wa bo katɛ a̧ ɓɔna.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbak tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ tɛ duk nɛ de-a.
Ɗaŋ wi-sedaako tɛ kpa kana mɔɔ-oi-aa, ɓɛɛ wi-ndela tɛ kpa sɔn-tɛ.
Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ mɛ duk tɛ bɔtɛ na, kà bó nɛ̀ bara mɛ ɔ wan zu o be-wan na.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ iŋa nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi tɛ nyimsea kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ee kia-wen ko bíí tɛ geemɔ.
Nyimsea ko wannu pi̧ nɛ kíì tɛ-wi hee tuɓa-a ko dila ga, ɓɛɛ deako kɔ̧-a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa hee waia-a ko mbɛŋ tɛ zɔ̧ ga.
Bem nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ha̧ nɛ gasa ɗaŋsee ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kia-wen ko okoo nɛ huia-gɔn.
Wi nyɛma mɛ kpa tua in mbɔi nɛ mɔɔ-oi dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kpaa kpasa okoo-mbo-zu nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN.
Nɛ́ tɛɛri a̧ de ha'i mɛ zur, ɓɛɛ duk-oi kpa wɔr mɔ na.
Wi nɛ kasi o geŋa tɛ kpasi, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ mboo zu na to nɛ fuu-tɛ a kɔ̧ gɔŋ.
Wi-de-ko ha̧ wisan kusi nɛ mɔ a er GASA WAN, wen a̧ tɛ kifi er mɔ‘i piiɗoŋ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋgimbi ɓɔna kaŋ ga, mɛ̀ úsí yuwar mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ de nɛ mɔɔ-ba-te-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe na.
Wi-de-ŋgamɔ tɛ yoɓi kana mɔ n'aa ɗaŋ: kà'ì e a̧ gee, wi fo nɛ a̧ pi̧ yuwar ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ siti.
Mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ mbɔrɔ in mɛ kpɛk usamɔ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ.
Ee-zu-mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ gbii oi ndaa mɔ lɛŋ.
Mɔ nɛ‘i kii tɛ bíí nɛ mboozu, ɓɛɛ gana so wisan bá nɛ̀ wi-ndela.
Nɛ́ yuu kíí GASA WAN a̧ de ha'i mɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ wi ɔɔ ya nɛ de-a, ŋma ɗaŋmɔ fo tɛ-wi na.
Wi-tɛɛri pi̧ er kɔ̧ bera kam, ɓɛɛ nyɛm mɛ ba er pii ɗoŋ pii kɔ̧ nu na.
Kà'ì mbɛr wi-kai-ndaa-wi, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i tɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ. Kà'ì gai wi nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ ɔ gɔna, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ iŋ mɔ siti.
Wi nɛ e o dáà kɔ‘i tɛ bɔnɛ, wi nɛ ndak naa kɔ‘i nɛ́ bem-pi̧-foe zu bíí, nɛ̀ see-wi beka ga̧ zu a̧ na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Bem kɔ‘m, kà mɛ siŋ mbɔrɔ pi̧ nu, mɛ tɛ yambali.
Ɗaŋ wi-sedaako-ndela mam kɔ‘i deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mam; nú o wi-ɗaŋ duna nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Nyasi duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen o wi-kai-ndaa-wi, in o mbɛri wen ɗoŋ o wi-bɔkɔ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔɔ-mam-wi, in deemɔ nɛ woi a̧a̧ tɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧; wi nɛ gbɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ beka iŋ mgbara mɔ na.
Nyimsea ko wannu pi̧ kíì tɛ-wi hee mgbimgba-a ko dila ga; wi nɛ de ha̧ see wannu mɛ kur, ba nɛ tɛ e kɔ̧ er fio.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ kpɛri na de nɛ mɔɔ-tu̧-tɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓan na mgbelewi yee tɛ kpɛra-a kaɗi.
Ŋgimbi gɛ̧ɛ̧, wi-tɛɛri wa kɔ‘i fɔ na, ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ, a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ mɔi̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa na.
Taamɔ kɔ̧ see bíí nɛ́ ɗuka dir-yì, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ gɔna iŋa kɔ‘i ɗuu yi'i.
O bíí nɛ dɔka-a ŋmaŋ nɛ dee demɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ kpa kpasa bíí sɛn dee?
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ba nɛ de yuwar kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ de yoŋgo tɛ duk zu o bem kɔ̧-a̧ oi-aa.
Ŋgimbi gɔna kita, zɔkamɔ ko wannu kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara mɔ, fo nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma tɔ̧a̧-a̧‘e nde: «Mi fɔra see-am sa̧, mi ɔ sa̧a̧, ɗaŋmɔ bo tɛ‘m na,» o?
Mɔɔ-we-mɔ in kilo nɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ na, nɛ ɗaŋmɔ sɛn yi GASA WAN.
Wi zɔk be-mbo-zu in be-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dee zer-zii-mɔ in gbaayí-zɔk-mɔ lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ́ pɛm nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ ya na, wen ká san tɛɛ ba mɛ; mɛ̀ gbó gboo mɛ tutuyɛ sut ɓɛɛ zaŋ-mɛ tɛ sur.
Wen ko wi-bi-gɛnɛ‘e: «Gɛnɛ mɔ‘i de na, gɛnɛ mɔ‘i de na!» Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ hi̧fi mɔ‘i yak kaɗi, see-aa fea.
Lɔr in de kísí ɔ dɔka, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ gana wa lɛŋ nɛ ndàrá-nú-tɔ̧-kpasawen.
Kà ŋma bíí ha̧ nú mɛ gɔn zu nyamandoi ko ŋma gɔni bíí, mɛ̀ bá laa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ziŋina, wen nɛ̀ mɛ́ iŋ yi wi-nyamandoi'i na.
Mɔɔ-zuzu ɔ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nú-wí nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ, mɔ‘i kifa nɛ paŋɓoka
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ee-zu-mɔ nɛ de-a, a'i de nɛ mɔ hɔ gba̧a̧. Mɛ̀ ɗáfí mɔ nɛti kaɗi sɛka mɛ yaka biro.
Wi-fu̧i̧-wen tɔ̧ nɛ ndaa mɔ a zan; ká mɛ gbam in wi-bur-wen na.
Wee ko wi-tok-ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu dáà in naa kɔ‘i tɛ bi ti tum.
Kà‘i de mɔ nɛ haya-a kpa nɛ mɔ, de yoŋgo beka duk zu a̧ nɛ ɗoŋ na.
Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi tɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dee in am» na: mɛ̀ é ta nɛ GASA WAN, nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ kpasi mɛ.
GASA WAN sɛna mɔɔ-we-dita-mɔ in mɔɔ-we-mɔ nɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ mgbɔ bíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ bíí tɛ iŋ yuwar kɔ‘i nɛ ba hee ge?
Haya wannu gba ndaa o wi-ɗaŋ gbaa, wen ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu wa.
Demɔ in mboozu, nɛ o mɔ nɛ pɛm wannu: damti kɔ̧-a̧ kpa ŋgai wen dee demɔ.
Ŋgai nɛ́ mbɔi-tɛ ko daŋa ŋgaiwi, ɓɛɛ mbui nɛ mɔɔ-tu̧-tɛ ko sɔkawi.
Da̧i̧ nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, in nyasi nɛ sa̧-ndiŋ wen ɗuka mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ see-wi.
See wannu nɛ foka-yì sɛn kɔ̧ er GASA WAN; a̧ nyɛma mɛ kpai see wannu si fara lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.
Taamɔ ko bíí‘e mɔ nɛ‘i de lɛŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ we see bíí.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in dee demɔ á̧ dee tɛ GASA WAN gan ɗafa-sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧.
Zɔkamɔ-gasi-zu, taamɔ́-ŋmaŋ-tɛ, in de duka-a ko wi-ɗaŋ lɛŋ usi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
O ee-zu-mɔ ko kpasa bíí ha̧ nɛ yí-mɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ ɓan na wi-de-mɔ nɛ naka-tɛ tika kaɗi.
Kpaamɔ zu ndela nɛ mɔ ko o wi-bɔkɔ, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ nɛ wa si yi fio.
Dee ŋgamɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ yɔ wa, wen wa bɛ̧ nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Yuwar ko o wi-ɗaŋ tan na, ɓɛɛ war-a ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɔ tana zéŋ.
Gana so ɔa-a ɗɔɔ wɛɛ-tua bá nɛ̀ ɔa-a kɔ̧ tua kpɔk in ko-kii-wen.
Kiitɛ wi-ɗaŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna, kóó nɛ sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt, a̧ zɔk a̧ nɛ de yí na.
Kà'ì kuli ɔm wi-si-kafɛ, zaŋ wi-bɔkɔ tɛ gɔn; ɓɛɛ kà'ì usi mɔ ha̧ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, a̧ tɛ iŋ mɔ.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ pɛm nɛ mɔ nú-gara ko o wi-ɗaŋ, wen foo wa pi̧ tɛ bɔnɛ.
Wi nɛ kpe zer tɛ
Ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ ŋmaa nɛ ti fu̧i̧ nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-ga̧a̧-see; yee ŋmaa nɛ be mɔ nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-ga̧-nyimsea mbɛt.
Gɔna kita nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-desee ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-pi̧-bele zaŋ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ baa kpasa yuwar na tɛ nɛɛ ɔm tɛ fara ko o fio mɛ.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dee saa tɛ tik tɛ san; wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in de nyɔŋmɔ beka kpa mbɔi na.
Wi-ɗaŋ nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-wen ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a; wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-wen ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ tana-a.
Gana so duka-a ŋga-gbárà mɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀, bá nɛ̀ duka-a in ko-kii-wen, tu̧ nɛ see-wi.
Demɔ in bɔtɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ tua ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, nɛ ɗaŋa mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɓɛɛ.
Wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in mboozu tɛ kpa duka-kpasa in tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ bá nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ daŋ si ye ko o ŋga wi-gbin-biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbin ŋgárá nɛ wa e so nɛ ta'i.
Wi nɛ dor ndàrá-nú in leɓe, zɔk nɛ tɛ wen ɗaŋsee.
Wi-gasi-zu ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ, zɛkɛɗi kɔ‘i nɛ bíí lɛŋ in deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ gasa zu.
Aa-see-mɔ ko wi-tɛɛri tɛ gbɛ a̧, wen a̧ kɔ̧ ha̧ er-a mɛ fo tom na.
Wese lɛŋ see-aa ɓɔn tɛ aa-see-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ mɔ e oi er na.
Ɗafa-sɔ̧ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ nyɛmna, gan gan wen nɛ wa a̧a̧ nɛ ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ̧ see-wa.
Wi-sedaako-ndela tɛ fe, ɓɛɛ kpasa wi-de-sedaako beka de kíì tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ n'aa iŋa na.
Ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ kaia sɔnti kpórós, ɓɛɛ mɔ ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ ɗafa yuwar duka-a kɔ‘i.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, zɔka mɔ, taamɔ bó nɛ́ gasamɔ ti GASA WAN na.
Wí hɛ́r nyaŋa pɛm nɛ wese biro, ɓɛɛ gbina-biro tɛ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN.
De hu̧ra-nin dee gan kpaa zɔm mbɔi, in
Wanmbɔi in wisan yak ŋmaa na: mɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ dee wa yiitoo lɛŋ.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ zɔk ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ hu̧sa̧, ɓɛɛ o wi-si-kafɛ ɗɔŋ kɔ‘i ɗɔŋ siti mɛ tik tɛ bɔnɛ.
Mɔɔ-oi mɔka-see nɛ yuu kíí GASA WAN, nɛ kpaamɔ in zɔnamɔ ká bá nɛ̀ duka-kpasa.
O tɛn in o pɛr a̧a̧ sɛn yuwar ko o ɗaŋwi, ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ duk kpasa yu kɔ‘i mɔ‘i yuu.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mbɔrɔ ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a, hegɔ kóó a̧ sɔka so, a̧ beka e duk na.
Nɛ́ wanmbɔi a̧ ɔ wan zu wisan, ɓɛɛ wi-ba-nyamandoi nɛ bara ko wan-ha̧-nyamandoi'i.
Wi-de-ɗaŋ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ nɛ yí,
De yoŋgo a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ zɔk bíí nɛ de-a, wen n'aa gbak nɛ wisan nɛ nyɔŋmɔ.
Mɛ̀ ndák wi-zɛkɛɗi-wi, ɓɛɛ ndaa kpɛri gɔna: ndaa dara in o zaŋa-wen tɛ gɔn lɛŋ.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ba sɛm in wannu a̧ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-see in nɛ
Gbaayí GASA WAN duk zu iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yai nɛ wen ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ a nu.
Wi-tɛɛri'e: «Ŋma dila a̧a̧ zan sɛn yuwar'i; a̧ tɛ gbɛ‘m!»
Nú o ɗaŋ okoo nɛ́ ɗuka lim; wi nɛ see GASA WAN nyim zu wa tɛ tik sɛnɛ.
See obem nɛ see-mgbele, ɓɛɛ mbɔrɔ-nyasi tɛ ba see-aa yinɛ tɛ mgbélé taamɔ.
Nukura wisan nɛ ha̧a̧ mbɔi ha̧ a̧; ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ wanmbɔi nɛ pi̧i̧ san zu-wi nɛ tɛ-wi woyo.
Mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é see-mɛ sɛnɛ, a̧ mɛ zii mgbara-a.
Mɛ tɛ kpa desee tɛ kasa a̧ e kɔ̧ see-mɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ duk nú-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ e ta nɛ GASA WAN; nɛ mɔ‘i sa'm mbaŋ tɛ-mɛ sɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ.
Mɛ nɛ wen mɛ a̧‘m yɔra nɛ o tua-wen nɔ'ɔ ɓu-taar’ɛ, wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ in usa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Mi yɔra wa wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ iŋ gba̧a̧ kpasawen in kifa-nú nɛ de-a tɛ akamɔ ko o wi nɛ tom mɛ.
Ká mɛ ɓɔŋ mɔ ko wi-kɔsa wen nɛ a̧ nɛ wisan na; ká mɛ nukuri wi-bɔnɛ tɛ kita na mbɛt.
Wen GASA WAN tɛ ye ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ba duka-kpasa tɛ o wi-kai-mɔ er-wa yinɛ.
Ká mɛ gbam yari in wi-nyimsea na, kóó wi-de-ŋgamɔ na mbɛt,
wen ká mɛ tɛɛ ndak ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa, ká mɔ‘i tɛɛ duk nɛ pɛ́r wen duka-kpasa kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ ba er kan nɛ mɔ, e nɛ ziŋina oi nú wi-ba-nyamandoi na,
ŋmafara wen ká mɛ tɛɛ kpa mɔɔ-yoɓi nɛnɛ na, ká wa tɛɛ zuɗi gado ɗɔɔ mɛ yinɛ.
Ká mɛ ɗɔŋ gba̧‘a̧ gbìsí-nu nɛ o zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ ee so yinɛ ba e siti na.
Mɛ́ zɔka ŋma gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ bíí fara de tom kɔ‘i kaɗi? A̧ nyɛma mɛ nɛɛ dee tom ha̧ o wannu, bá nɛ̀ duka-a hee ŋma tum gee wi-de-tom ga.
Kà mɛ̀ nyɔŋ mɔ in ŋma gasawi, mɛ̀ mbó zu mɛ ti wi nɛ a̧a̧ ti mɛ.
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ boo nɛ́ wi-ɗaɗa, mɛ̀ dák nú-ɗaɗa
Ká mɛ́ yeŋ war nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na; wen nɛ nyɔŋmɔ-ɔr-wi.
Ká mɛ́ ɗaŋ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ kii nɛ mbɔi na; mɛ̀ é taamɔ kɔ-mɛ wen-aa duk.
Yí-mɛ be tɛɛ zɔk mbɔi, ɓɛɛ ɓɛlɛm, a̧ bo na, wen mbɔi iŋa dea-a ha̧ wɔr-ɓaa mɛ hɔ. A̧ tɛ bu̧i̧ yak si yiwese hee zua ga.
Ká mɛ́ nyɔŋ kam ko wi-a-see-mɔ na; ká mɛ́ yeŋ war nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt,
wen a̧ duk hee wi nɛ ee zú wen kɔ‘i kaɗi ga. A̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ: «Mɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ, mɛ̀ nɔ́ mɔ wa!» Ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ see-aa bo kɔ‘i in mɛɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ ɔ̧i̧ mɔ nɛ mɛ nyɔŋa'i lɛŋ a nu, ɓɛɛ wɔ tɛ-mɛ busa tɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i.
Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ na, wen a̧ beka iŋ mgbara de taamɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i na.
Ká mɛ́ ɗɔŋ gba̧‘a̧ gbìsí-nu e siti na, in ká mɛ ye kpɛɛfɔ ko o be-oi na,
wen wi-yor-ɗoŋ-wa ɔ ŋgaya; nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ kur in mɛɛ ye nɛ ɗoŋ wa.
Mɛ̀ é see-mɛ tɛ usamɔ, in mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ.
Ká mɛ́ ɓu kaara e ndaa o bem na; mɛ̀ gúsí wa nɛ nyasi, wa beka fe na.
Tɛ gusa wa nɛ mɛ gusi nɛ nyasi'i, mɛ kpasi nɛ wa tɛ fio.
Bem kɔ‘m, kà kɔ̧ zaŋ-mɛ nɛ gɔna, ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, tortɛ tɛ ba'm.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ yuwar-a, kiitɛ‘m lɛŋ tɛ de nyɛŋɛ.
Ká mɛ́ a see mɔ ko o ɗaŋwi nɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yú kɔ-mɛ nɛ GASA WAN wese lɛŋ.
Wen nɛ mbetɛ, ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ee-ta kɔ-mɛ beka tik nu gee na.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m, zaŋ-mɛ a̧ gɔn, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ba yuwar kɔ-mɛ tan ti mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ duk mgbara o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, in o wi-de-wɔ mur-kpoo na,
wen san tik tik zu o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o wi-de-wɔ mur-kpoo, ɓɛɛ tɛɛri de dee ha'i mɛ pi̧ a̧ka̧ laa.
Mɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ nɛ kóó mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e naa kɔ-mɛ tɛ geemɔ wen n'aa sɔka kaɗi na.
Mɛ̀ kásí kpasawen, ká mɛ́ ɗɔr a̧ siti na; nɛ́ kalemɔ mbɛt wen iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, usamɔ in iŋamɔ.
Dáà ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ de nyɛŋɛ kpíɗí nɛnɛ nɛ desee; wi nɛ ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ kpa desee.
See dáà in naa kɔ-mɛ a̧ de zu mɛ; naa kɔ-mɛ a̧ duk zaŋ desee.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ é ta-mɛ nɛ‘m; mɛ̀ zɔ́k ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ kpasawen'e, kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu nɛ gasa lim, ɓɛɛ gɔni okoo nɛ ɗuka gɔna-yi nɛ nú-a ɔ mɔi̧a.
Kóò‘i mbɛt pɛm nɛ mɛ hee wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ ga; a̧ nyɛɓi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ mgbara bíí.
«Ho!» nɛ̀‘i tɔ̧'ɛ, wi tɔ̧ zu o? «Iŋ so!» mbɛt nɛ̀‘i tɔ̧'ɛ, wi tɔ̧ wen o? O aia-nú nɛ́ wen o? Zaŋa tum-wen siti siɗoŋ nɛ́ wen o? Gbaayí nɛ zɔk mɔ sa̧ na tiɗiɗi nɛ́ wen o?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen o wi nɛ fara-duk kɔ-wa nɛ ká̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ wéé mbe ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ká mɛ́ pɛm nɛ gbɛ̧ yi dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ dui nɛ de-a sɛn kɔ̧ ɗele in nɛ fok war ger-wi nɛ de-a'i na!
Wen mɛ ɗoŋ, a̧ gɔm wi hee gɔ́k ga, da̧-a̧ kana hee da̧ kóró ga.
Yí-mɛ tɛ zɔk o ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ see-mɛ tɛ ta mɛ e nɛ zu o mɔ nɛ sa̧ na.
Mɛ tɛ duk hee ŋma bíí a̧ ɔ nu kɔ̧ kombon zu gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ yi duk pi̧ nɛnɛ nɛ oi-aa ga.
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Wa gusa'm, ɓɛɛ nyim tɛ‘m na! Wa wɔŋga'm, ɓɛɛ mi zii kɔ‘m ŋma mɔ na! Yí‘m tɛ gɔn bɔɔ mɛ gese ge ha̧‘m ak mbe-a a̧‘m nɔ woyo ge?»
Ká mɛ́ e see-mɛ tɛ o wi-ɗaŋ na; in ká mɛ́ gbam yari in wa na,
wen see-wa ta nɛ ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ, nú-wa mbɛt tɔ̧ kana nɛ ɗaŋ wen.
Wi nyɛma mɛ mbo tua nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ; wi nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ tua'i mɛ nɔ nɛ yuwar taamɔ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ iŋamɔ a'i nyɛma mɛ dun nɛ o gɔna-bɛr-tua'i nɛ o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ bíí kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ in wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ́ bíí nɛ duna nɛ ŋgai, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ iŋamɔ kpa nɛ ŋgai gan kuti-a war yiitoo.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ taa mɔ nɛ de-a a̧ mɛ tɛ gbin nɛ biro, in mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ko o dɔka bíí a'i gbin nɛ biro.
Kia-a mɛ kpa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ɔ gasa hee zɔm kaya ga wen wi-bɔkɔ; sɛn nu garo ye a̧ nyɛm mɛ hú̧í̧ nú tɔ̧ wen ɓukui ŋgimbi ba keta na.
Wi nɛ ba nɛ keta ɗaŋmɔ, wa sa nin-a'e wi-ɔr-wi.
Taamɔ́-bɔkɔ nɛ́ ɗaŋwi, in wi-zɛkɛɗi-wi nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ yí bíí lɛŋ.
Kà mɛ̀ nɔ ŋgiɗi wese tu̧u̧-see na, mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧, ŋgai bo gee boa-a tɛ mɛ na.
Mɛ̀ gbó o wi nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ-fio yinɛ; mɛ̀ kpásí o wi nɛ wa gbur yaknɛ mɛ gbɛ,

ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi iŋ so kɔ‘m mɔ nɛ yaka'i na,» na. Bo nɛ wi nɛ zɔk kɔ‘i nɛ mɔ kɔ̧ see-wi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ na? War kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ zɔka taamɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋa. Nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom ko bíí kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ‘i dea.
Bem kɔ‘m, gɔrɔ ɔ dee mɛ nyɔŋ; be nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ tɛ ɔ ga̧a̧ kɔ̧ war ger-mɛ.
Nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ duk nɛnɛ wen mɛ: kà mɛ kpa a̧, sɔnti-mɛ tɛ sa̧ wen mɔ mɛ siti, ɓɛɛ ee-ta kɔ-mɛ beka tik nu sɔɔ gee na.
Ká mɛ́ de mɔɔ-gɔn-zaŋ hee wi-ɗaŋ ga wen baa tua ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, ká mɛ́ ɗaŋ fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen kóó wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yoo so nù war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, a̧ tɛ kur kana ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-ɗaŋ, ŋgamɔ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ tik.
Ká tortɛ ba mɛ wen nɛ̀ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ yoo nu na, in ká nyɛŋɛ pi̧ mɛ wen n'aa tira yɔɔ-mɔ na mbɛt,
wen ká GASA WAN tɛɛ zɔk, ká see-aa ɗaŋ, ká nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tɛɛ yu zu wi’ɛi.
Ká see-mɛ kur zu o wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na; ká mɛ́ a see mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ na;
wen mɔ ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ bo siti na; in lamba ko o wi-ɗaŋ tɛ bi.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ yú GASA WAN in wannu, ká mɛ́ ye ɗoŋ o bíí nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpai mɔ nɛ mbe-a na;
wen kifa-er zu wa nɛ́ hee gɔma-yí ga, ɓɛɛ nɛ o'o iŋa bɔnɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ in wannu tɛ pi̧ zu wa o?
O ŋma usamɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ woyo: Yee-ɗoŋ-bíí tɛ kita de na.
Wi-gɔn-kita nɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ wen baa a̧‘e: «Wen bo zu mɛ na,» fom ko giiwi tɛ ba a̧; o tugun bíí tɛ pi̧ búù zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a zu wi nɛ wen baa a̧ tɛ ya nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ de yoŋgo in de zɔnamɔ tɛ duk zu wa.
Kifa-nú nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see usi nɛ kpasa deemɔ ko kpasa sɛm.
Mɛ̀ dé tom kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ zan nɛti; mɛ̀ wá fɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛti; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dé tua kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ́ de sedaako-ndela zu ŋma-mɛ na; mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wen kɔ-mɛ mɛ duk nɛ ɔramɔ nde?
Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e: «Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee hegɔ in am ga, mi tɛ de in a̧ hegɔ mbɛt, mi tɛ kifi er mɔ ha̧ bíí nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom ko wi’ɛi,» na.
Mi ɓira nɛ̀ ká̧ fɔ ko wi-tɛɛri, in nɛ̀ ká̧ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wi nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi bo na;
ɓɛɛ fɔ‘i kpee nɛ̀ tɛn-dara, tɛn hura fɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ be ɓoramɔ-ta gbina a nu mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi n'am zɔka mɔ‘i, mi taa mɔ, mi mbaɗa mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ taamɔ ha̧‘m:
mɛ nɛ wen zu be ɔɔ ya, be zura ya mɔi̧ nɛ er a zu ŋmaa nyafi nɛ tɛ ɗɔɗɔɗɔ;
kà mɛ de hegɔ ɓɛɛ san tɛ tik zu mɛ hee wi-yar-gee ga, in kaɓa mbɛt tɛ tik zu mɛ hee ŋma wi-ɓar-mɔ ga.
O ŋma tua-wen ko Salomɔŋ nɛ o bíí ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda yɔra nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Gasamɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa-a na, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko o wannu nɛ́ deemɔ ɗoŋ nɛ wa kia mɔ kaɗi.
Yiwese nɛ oi kusa-a kɔ‘i, nù nɛ oi ɗuka-a kɔ‘i, in kɔ̧ see o wannu mbɛt, wi nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa-wa na.
Mɛ̀ nɔ̧́i bu-mbɔi ha̧ ɗɔr-aa yu sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ be yee tɛ gbo ha̧ wan-aa.
Mɛ̀ fó wi-ɗaŋ yinɛ ti wannu, ɓɛɛ damti kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yor nɛ nɔa-a zaŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ká mɛ́ usi'e, wi ɔ gasa ti wannu na, in ká mɛ ba zu-mɛ we nɛ ɔ gasawi na,
wen gana bíí a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e: «Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧,» bá nɛ̀ pi̧i̧ foe zu mɛ ti be-wan.
Mɔ nɛ gbaayí-mɛ zɔka,
ká mɛ́ ba e ti kita nɛ haya-a na, wen kà wen ko ŋma-mɛ ba mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ ge a̧ mɛ tɛ de ɓɔ ge?
Kà mgbara-mɛ nɛ ɗaŋa in ŋma-mɛ, mɛ̀ ɗáfí mgbara-mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ gba ndaa ŋma bíí na;
wen kà wi’ɛi zii, a̧ tɛ ak mɛ, ɓɛɛ nin-mɛ tɛ hur nɛ ɗaŋ-a.
De wen nɛ‘i tɔ̧ nɛ yuwar-a duk hee mɛ nɛ ŋma de mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, ɓɛɛ wi a bu-mbɔi ɗoŋ-aa ga.
Mbɔrɔ ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ba see wi-zia-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wele in kana nɛ‘i dee nɛ sa̧a̧ lɔr ba nɛ see wan-aa’ɛ ga.
Betom duk ti wi-tom-a, hee gɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓɔrɔ ŋgimbi gbɛ̧ŋmɔ ga; a̧ ha̧ nɛ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ wan kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ zɔn tɛ tɛ ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa ha̧ na duk kɔ‘i hee tura-zan in búk-kórò nɛ hɔ na ga.
Gba̧a̧-tɛ wi-gɔn-kita gbin gbin tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko bíí nɛ ɓa wen kɔ‘i nɛ munyal, nyɔ̧ɔ̧-wen mbɛt de ha̧ ŋga-see ko bíí mɛ ga̧.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ kpaa gɔrɔ, mɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nyɛm nɛ yi wɔ kɔ-mɛ, wen kà mɛ̀ nyɔŋ yak zale, mɛ tɛ ɔ̧i̧.
Ká naŋ-mɛ ɓɔn nu tua ko sɛm kɔ-mɛ wese lɛŋ na, wen dekpaa ɓɛɛ wɔ tɛ-mɛ busa tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ pi̧ búù zu mɛ.
Wi-de sedaako-ndela zu ŋma-a duk hee kóŋgó, gba-paa in ɓɛ̧i̧a nu goo ga.
Ee-ta nɛ wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ bíí hɔɔ ŋmaa in nyɔŋa mɔ nɛ gba̧a̧-nin nɛ yak yak ga, kóó hee nɛɛ nɔ nɛ naŋ nɛ mbali nɛ ŋmaa ga.
Bia gima-desee ha̧ wi-bɔnɛ yak ŋmaa in kpɔ̧i̧a̧ laa yinɛ tɛ-wi ŋgimbi gɛ̧ɛ̧, kóó hee aa ŋga nyina yí-da̧i̧ ga na.
Kà wɔ gbɛ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ há̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ nyɔŋ; kà wɔ-yí gbɛ a̧, mɛ̀ há̧ yi ha̧ a̧ nɔ,
wen mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ kɛ̧i̧-wee a̧ mɛ a zu a̧, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-aa ha̧ mɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ba nɛ̀ kórò tɛnɛ'ɛ ga, bura-wen mbɛt ba nɛ kpɛri tɛnɛ.
Gana so ɔa-a ɗɔɔ wɛɛ-tua, bá nɛ̀ ɔa-a kɔ̧ tua kpɔk in ko-kii-wen.
De nyɛrɛ nɛ tɛ nɛ nyɛ̧i̧a nu hɔɔ ŋmaa in de gɛ̧ɛ̧ yi kɔ̧ war ger nɛ kora.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ̀ tɛ̀ nak ti wi-ɗaŋ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ɓuta kpút-kpút yi, koo ɓutuŋguluŋ zu-zer-yì.
Nyɔŋa gɔrɔ yak zale de na, ɓɛɛ kia-a mɛ iŋ mgbara o gasamɔ nɛ́ kpasamɔ.
Wi nɛ iŋ kasa zu na hɔɔ ŋmaa in ye nɛ bó nɛ̀ ŋgárá na.
Tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ nɛ‘i tu̧ nɛ tɛ wi-bɔkɔ yak ŋmaa in kutu mɛ bɛɛ, koo kórò ŋgimbi mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ na.
Fom nɛ yoŋgo-a bo na tɛ tik nu gee hee mɛ nɛ bu̧i̧a̧-a̧ ko soŋdɔya kóó gbiiwara ga.
Ɓira-te a̧a̧ sɛnɛ wen kula ɔm wi-bɔkɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyasi duk nɛnɛ wen nyaŋa, kóó nyak-mbale wen tuifuu’ɛ ga.
Ká mɛ́ kifi nú ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔɔ-bɔkɔ na, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ hɔ ŋmaa in a̧ mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ bɔkɔ kɔ̧-a̧, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ ta'e, wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Wi nɛ e tom nú wi-bɔkɔ de nɛ mɔɔ-mgbele hee a̧ ɓir nɛ ku-a nɛ ta-tɛ-a ga.
Tua-wen ko wi-bɔkɔ yak ŋmaa in mɔka naŋ wi-kum ga na.
Tu̧u̧ tɛ wi-bɔkɔ hɔɔ ŋmaa in baa gasa kii-ta hɛr e tɛ ndamba-yo-nɔ̧́í̧.
Tua-wen duk kɔ̧ nú wi-bɔkɔ hee ŋma ɓira kan-te-baŋa-biŋi nɛ wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mi̧i̧ ká̧ tɛ ga.
Wi nɛ ba wi-bɔkɔ kóó wi-ɓir-wen nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma wi-pi̧-góò nɛ pi̧ bíí nɛ nú-tum.
Wi-bɔkɔ pii ɗoŋ tɛ mɔɔ-bɔkɔ kɔ‘i, hee ŋma toyo nɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ ɔ̧i̧ kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
Mɛ zɔka wi nɛ ta'e wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ? Gana so a'i e ta nɛ wi-bɔkɔ gan pɛrti bíí hegɔ‘i.
Wen ko wi-tɛɛri nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «Boko-nam a̧a̧ sɛn yuwar'i; dila a̧a̧ sɛn bee-gara'i!»
Kpar-nú tua zik sɛn ɗoŋ dor-toyo, ɓɛɛ wi-tɛɛri mbɛt zik nɛ́ tɛ̀ nyafi nɛnɛ gɔn gado kɔ‘i.
Wi-tɛɛri pi̧ nɛ er kɔ̧ bera kam, ɓɛɛ nyɛm mɛ ba er pii ɗoŋ pii kɔ̧ nu na.
Wi-tɛɛri ta kɔ‘i'e wi iŋa mgbara mɔ gan kpasa taamɔ ko bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Pi̧i̧ nú tɛ gɔni wen, hɔɔ ŋmaa in baa zer ŋma toyo nɛ ɓir mɔ kɔ‘i ɓir yak ga.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-dawa pi̧ nɛ nú-wee, koo goo nɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-gbɛ-wi ga,
nɛ hegɔ a̧ wi-ɔr-ŋma-wi tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɔrmɔ kɔ‘m nɛ zɛŋ ɓɛɛ!»
Gua bo na, wee bia; wi-ruŋgu bo na, kpɛri ga̧a̧.
Nɛ́ kɛ̧i̧-wee a̧ de ha̧ wee mɛ nyɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nú-gua mbɛt dee ha̧ wee mɛ ba; nɛ kalemɔ mbɛt a̧ wi-a-wen de nɛnɛ ha̧ kpɛri mɛ kur.
Wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú wi-kai-ndaa-wi nɛ mɔɔ-ɔ-nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nú-wi, nɛ̀ ye tɛ-wi hegɔ hɔ pɛr ɗɔtɔ-wi mɛ.
De wen nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ see nɛ sa̧ na hɔɔ ŋmaa in bu-mbɔi nɛ‘i lata doŋ gii.
Wi-kiri tɔ̧ nɛ yɔka wen, ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ see-aa nɛ ɗaŋ taamɔ a̧ duna sɛnɛ.
Kà a̧ gbɛ ger-a tɔ̧ nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ká mɛ zii na, wen gasa ɗaŋ kifa-er a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ɗoŋ.
Sɛnmɔ nyɛma hu̧sa̧ tɛ ɗɔɔ mɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋma wese a̧ tɛ gbo zan ti bíí.
Wi-za̧-lim tɛ tik lim kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi-kin-ta tika ɗɔɔ ta kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Leɓe-de-ndela kɔ̧ wi n'aa ɔr na; nú-de-ndela kii kana nɛ yuwar tika-a ko bíí ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ká mɛ́ ŋmaŋ tɛ-mɛ wen mɔ mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ na, wen mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ na.
Nɛ́ ŋma bíí a̧ tɛ zɔn mɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ na; gɔni bíí ɛ̧́, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ndara nú-mɛ́ na!
Ta ɔ dita, nyɛmɛ ɔ ɗɔŋ-ɗɔŋ; ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧-see ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ taamɔ na gana mɔɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ.
Kura-see nɛ́ gbɛɛ-zu, nyimsea mbɛt nɛ́ ha̧a̧-yì, ɓɛɛ nɛ o a̧ nyɛma mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi zu aa-see-mɔ o?
Gana so tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen e yí ŋmaa, bá nɛ̀
Mbɔrɔ nɛ̀ sɛm tɔ̧ ha̧ ɓii wi ɓɛɛ a̧ kpaa ɗaŋsee sɛnɛ‘i usi nɛ de yaa-a, ɓɛɛ duia nú-wí ko wisɛn nɛ ɔramɔ gee.
Wi nɛ zaŋ sur hɔ ti ger kaɗi bó nɛ̀ wɔ nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ na, ɓɛɛ ko wan-wɔ, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧.
Ŋma bíí nɛ yar nyɛi̧ nɛ nu kɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in soŋdɔya nɛ yar nyɛi̧ nɛ tua kɔ‘i.
Pɛr nɔ́ in pɛr nyama ha̧ nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ
Ká mɛ́ bɛ̧ sɛm kɔ-mɛ in war ko daa kɔ-mɛ na, in ká mɛ́ ye tua ko nya-mɛ wese bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ na; gana so bíí nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ wi bá nɛ̀ ŋma nya-wi nɛ ɗoŋ-aa ɔ nyɛi̧a.
Mɛ̀ íŋ mgbara mɔ, bem kɔ‘m, ha̧ nyɛŋɛ mɛ ba'm, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ iŋ kifa nú ha̧ wi-e'm tɛ geemɔ.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ zɔk ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ hu̧sa̧, ɓɛɛ o wi-si-kafɛ ɗɔŋ kɔ‘i ɗɔŋ siti mɛ tik tɛ bɔnɛ.
Kà ŋma bíí ha̧ nú ha̧ mɛ zu nyamandoi ko gɔni wiwii, kóó gɔni okoo, mɛ̀ bá laa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ziŋina wen nɛ mɛ iŋ wi-nyamandoi'i na.
Wi nɛ tɛ fan ŋma-a nɛ̀ hee ger mɛ tutuyɛ sut, fanamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i tɛ duk hee fom ga.
Ko-kii-wen yak ŋmaa in huia-kórò kóɗóŋ-kóɗóŋ nɛ gɔn bee na’ɛ ga,
wen gaia a̧ ɔ hee wi gai nɛ búk kóó wi ɗu nɛ nɔ nɛ er-wi ga.
Nɛ́ boi a̧ bɛ̧ŋ nu boi; nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ bíí nɛ ndaɗi in ŋmaa gbak nɛ ŋmaa mbɛt.
Wi nɛ a nù gun te-mbɔra tɛ nyɔŋ waya-a, in wi nɛ zɔk wan kɔ‘i nɛ de-a tɛ kpa zɔnamɔ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yì duk nɛ mɔɔ-zɔk-yí-wi ga, nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ see bíí duk nɛnɛ wen bíí.
Kɔ̧ fio in gba
Nɛ́ wee a̧‘i nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, ɓɛɛ hu̧ra-nin duk wen bíí.
Kóó mɛ baa so nɛ wi-bɔkɔ pi̧ kɔ̧ duk in o gba̧a̧ mboŋgo to nɛnɛ, mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ̧-a̧ beka yu tɛ-a na.
Mɛ̀ íŋ duka-a ko mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ zɔ́k gii mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ nɛ de-a,
wen mbɔi duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ na,
Mɛ̀ pɔ́í zɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mbe-a ɓɔ nɛnɛ oi-aa'i, mɛ̀ mɔi̧ hoe mɛ zu kaya.
Mɛ̀ pír laa nɛ buma-sami ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɗɔ́r o gbadua mɛ hi̧fi nɛ mbe fɔ.
Mɛ̀ dúk nɛ yibere nana gbadua nɛ dɔka-a wen daia-a nɛ tɛ-mɛ in o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ gu nɛ o kó-de-tom kɔ-mɛ.
Wi-ɗaŋ yu mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, ŋma wi nɛ ndak a̧ bo na; ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk mɔ kɔ‘i mgbitiŋ hee sɔŋɔi-dila ga.
Kà ye yai, ɓɛɛ o wanye ɔ dɔka, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ haya wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ a̧ mɔi̧ bíí.
Ŋma dáa-bara-san nɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wi-kɔsa hɔɔ ŋmaa in kórò-ɗàŋ-nyɔnɔ nɛ pi̧ nɛ kaɓa nù.
O wi nɛ kɔ̧ mboo zu tɛ Heembea na zɔn nɛ wi-ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ mbo zu sɛnɛ sɛn kɔ‘i nɛ wa.
O ɗaŋwi iŋ kɔ‘i mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e dee demɔ na, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ kii kɔ‘i nɛ GASA WAN iŋa kɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Gana so wisan nɛ̀ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ yuwar-a, bá nɛ̀ ŋma wanmbɔi nɛ naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tan na.
Wi-kasi-heembea nɛ be-iŋ-mɔ, ɓɛɛ bem nɛ gbam yari in o be-ɗaŋ-mɔ e nɛ foe yi dáà kɔ‘i.
Wi nɛ ha̧ nyamandoi ha̧ ŋma bíí wen kpaa yí-mɔ zu-a nɛ dɔka-a ha̧ kpaamɔ kɔ‘i mɛ dɔk siti ndɛm nɛ mɔ wen ŋma wi-de-ko ha̧ o wisan.
Sɔ̧ sɛna kɔfa-sɔ̧ ko wi nɛ kpe zer nɛ kɔ̧ mɛ mbo zu tɛ Heembea na.
Bíí nɛ kai o wi-de-demɔ a̧r nɛnɛ tɛ yuwar kɔ-wa tɛ tik lim n'aa za̧a̧ nɛ er-a woyo; ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ ŋma wen bo zu wa na tɛ kpa nɛ bɔtɛ.
Wanmbɔi tɔ̧ kɔ‘i'e wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wisan nɛ iŋa mgbara mɔ tɛ kpa ndaa-a.
Kà wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a gan zu mɔ, ɓɛɛ desee a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗaŋ ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn, o nde hu̧si nɛ tɛ.
Wi nɛ hu̧si ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i beka nɛ siti na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i nɛ ta-tɛ, nɛ̀ gbar wa mbɛt tɛ kpa deako.
Desee a̧a̧ zu bíí nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ pɛma mɔ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋga-see tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ.
Ŋma ŋga bíí nɛ ɔ wan zu duk wisan hɔɔ ŋmaa in mgbimgba-a ko dila kóó hee kpiɗa-a ko baŋgiiɗoŋ
Be-wan nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ sɛna dee ŋgamɔ tɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ba wi-gbɛ-zu na, wen a̧ tɛ ma yi si kɔ̧ fio nɛ ta-tɛ-a.
Wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ yuwar-a tɛ kpasi, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ba war yiitoo tɛ pii ɗoŋ tik tɛ ŋma kpɔk.
Zaŋ-wi nɛ wá fɔ kɔ‘i tɛ sur, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ndak kɔ‘i nɛ ɗoŋ geemɔ tɛ duk tɛ san.
Wi-mbo-zu tɛ kpa
Kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara bíí de na; ŋma bíí nyɛma mɛ de mɔ‘i wen zu gee ŋgonda brɛt.
Wi-a-see-mɔ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa mbɔi nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ‘e a̧ tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ nɛ ɗoŋ na.
Wi nɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ ŋma-wi tɛ kpa demɔ er-a nɛ ɗoŋ, gan wi-ɔr-wi nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen.
Wi nɛ zu̧ mɔ ko dáà kɔ‘i, kóó ko naa kɔ‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Bo nɛ ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na,» yak ŋmaa in wi-kai-mɔ er-wi na.
Wi-de-wɔ-mɔ dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ wi-e-ta nɛ GASA WAN tɛ kpa dɔka mɔ siti.
Wi nɛ e ta nɛ tɛ-wi nɛ wi nɛ̀ zù bo na, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ kpasi.
Kaɓa beka ba wi nɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ wisan na, ɓɛɛ fom a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ ɓur yi tɛ zɔka wa.
Kà wi-ɗaŋ ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn, o nde hu̧si nɛ tɛ; kà wa fe ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a dɔka.
Wi nɛ‘i gai takaɗi, nɛ de kana nɛ ŋga-see siti, tɛ gbin nduku-nduku hee gɔma-yí ga nɛ nyina-a beka bo na.
Ɔɔ-wan ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ desee ko dukbíí; ɓɛɛ ɔɔ- wan ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ ɗaŋsee kɔ-wa.
Wi nɛ kii nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wi-ndak-ɗoŋ o kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu ɗaŋ nɛ mbɔi kɔ‘i.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ wannu ɗafi nɛ nù kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wan nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘i nɛ sede garama yai nɛ ye a taŋ.
Wi-ɔr-ŋma-wi tui nɛ pɛ́r ti ɗɔɔ naŋ-a.
Ɗaŋmɔ ko wi-ɗaŋ nɛ pɛ́r wen-aa, ɓɛɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk kɔ‘i nɛ tortɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ.
Wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a iŋa mgbara bɔnɛ ko wisan, ɓɛɛ wi-ɗaŋ bó nɛ̀ iŋamɔ mɛ iŋ mgbara-a na.
Wi-kai-ndaa-wi pi̧ nɛ wee tɛ ye, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ dee ha̧ nyimsea mɛ deŋi.
Kà wi-ta-mɔ de kita in wi nɛ zu bo na laŋ, a̧ nyɛma mɛ kpa tu̧u̧-see, kóó mɛ mam mami, ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧mɔ beka hɔ na mbɛt.
O wi-gbɛ-zu sɛn nɛ wi nɛ wen bo zu a̧ na, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-demɔ kii kɔ‘i mɛ gbam yari in wa.
Wi-bɔkɔ nɔ ŋgiɗi zu nyimsea kɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kii nɛ yuwar ha̧ nyimsea kɔ‘i mɛ ga̧.
Kà ŋma wan yeŋ zer tɛ wen ndela laŋ, oi o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ o wi-ndela mbɛt.
Wisan in wi-zuzu nyɛma ŋmaa tɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ de ha̧ yí-wa yiitoo lɛŋ mɛ zɔk mɔ.
Wannu nɛ gɔn kita zu o wisan nɛ yuwar-a tɛ kpa duka-a tɛ wan siti ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Nyasi in tuɓa da̧ ha̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ bem nɛ‘i e mɛ de mɔ nɛ zu, nɛ́ be-e-foe yí naa kɔ‘i.
Kà o wi-ɗaŋ ɔ wan, ɗaŋmɔ dɔk dɔk siti, ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ ya nɛ́ sedaako tika-a kɔ-wa.
Kà mɛ̀ usi kpasa mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ, a̧ beka e foe yí-mɛ na, a̧ tɛ gbak nɛ mɛ batɛ ɛ̧.
Kà hɔɔ-zu ko
Wí úsí mɔ ha̧ bara nɛ̀ wen mɛ nú-wí na; a̧ tɛ zii kana wen'i ɓɛɛ a̧ beka de mɔ-aa na.
Mɛ zɔka ŋma
Kà‘i deli bara nɛ bem mɛ tɛnɛ, a̧ be tɛɛ gasi kaɗi, a̧ beka mbo zu ha̧ dáa-bara kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Wi-ŋga-see dak nɛ kpɛri pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ wan-kura-see de ɗaŋmɔ dee nyɛmna.
Ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko bíì tɛ pi̧ buu zu a̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mɔka-see tɛ tu̧.
Wi nɛ nyɔŋ kpɔk in wi-zuzu sɛn nɛ tɛ; a̧ a̧ zii bee-mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbar wi-zuzu'i na mbɛt.
Kíì tui nɛ pɛ́r ha̧ bíí, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ e ta nɛ GASA WAN duk kɔ‘i keɗeŋ.
O dɔka bíí kii nɛ zɔnamɔ ko wan kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom ko bíí kpɔk kpɔk ha̧ wan-aa.
See o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tu̧ see zu o wi-ɗaŋ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ see wi-ɗaŋ tɛɛ tu̧ see zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ wen ko Agur, bem ko Yake. Mɛ nɛ wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Itiɛl, ha̧ Itiɛl in Ukal:
«Mi nɛ gee ɗaŋ tira-wi mgbara o dɔka bíí,
iŋamɔ kɔ‘m nyɛm ŋmaa in ko bíí na.
Mi yambi iŋa-mgbara-mɔ na,
mi iŋ mgbara mɔ ko GASA WAN na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ o'o nɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ yiwese ká pii ɗoŋ kaɗi o?
Nɛ́ o'o ɓura búk kɔ̧ er kaɗi o?
Nɛ́ o'o hɛra yì nɛ laa kɔ‘i kaɗi o?
Nɛ́ o'o dee o nduti nu o?
Nin wi’ɛi nɛ o; nin bem kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o?
Kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ iŋa, nɛ̀ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m.
«Wen ko GASA WAN lɛŋ hɔɔ gba̧a̧, ɓɛɛ duk nɛ ŋgee ko wi nɛ hu̧si sɛn ɗoŋ-aa.
Ká mɛ́ e ŋma mɔ zu wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen ka a̧ tɛɛ gai mɛ, e nɛ mɛ nɛ wi-ndela.»
«Nɛ mɔ yiitoo a̧‘m ak er'nɛ́ Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɔ wa nɛ‘m nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ fe na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ndela in gɔɔmɔ nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧‘m duk san batɛ kóó kpaa mbɔi gan na mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɛ war nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘m ha̧‘m ɓɛɛ,
wen ká zaŋ-am tɛɛ sur gan kere ká‘m kafi'nɛ́, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹GASA WAN nɛ o?› Kóó ká wɔ tɛɛ ba'm, ká‘m tɛɛ zu mɔ ɗaŋ nɛ nin Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.»
Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧ ndaa wi-de-tom ti wan kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen ká a̧ tɛɛ fom mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká ɗaŋmɔ-a tik zu mɛ.
O ŋma kpar-bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ fom nɛ dáà kɔ‘i, in nɛ gasi naa kɔ‘i na.
O ŋma kpar-bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ta kɔ‘i'e, wi ɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ kii mɛ zui simbo ɗaŋmɔ mɛ tɛ-wa na.
O ŋma kpar-bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ zɔka mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ zɔkamɔ-gasi-zu in foe bo ndara yí-wa na.
O ŋma kpar-bíí mbɛt a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ gba̧a̧ nin-wa ɔ hee gba-paa ga, in nyaŋgara-wa ɔ hee nú pai ga mbɛt, wen nyɔŋa o wisan zu nu’ɛ, in o wi-kɔsa mgbara dukbíí.
Duɓen a̧a̧ nɛ boko-bem yiitoo; nin wa'e: «Mɛ̀ há̧ tɛnɛ, mɛ̀ há̧ tɛnɛ.» Ŋma mɔ taar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ zaŋ sur na, nɛ̀ beka tɔ̧‘e: «Nyɛma hegɔ,» na kpoo nɛ kpoo; mɛ̀ nɛ́:
Fara ko o fio,
ko-yar-ndɔra,
ŋma nù nɛ kórò hɔ zu-a na;
ɓɛɛ naar-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt:
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wee nɛ kaɗi dɔɔ mɔ na.
Kà ŋma bíí mam dáà kɔ‘i, kóó mbo zu ha̧ naa kɔ‘i na, o gba-kɔra gba-for-yì tɛ gɔm yi-a ó, ɓɛɛ o zua nyɔŋa a̧.
O ŋma mɔ taar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ gana'm, n'am zii mgbara-a na; mɛ̀ nɛ́:
yuwar ko zua sɛn yiwese,
yuwar ko gɔ́k sɛn zu ta,
yuwar ko kombon sɛn zu gba-tɔp,
ɓɛɛ naar-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt:
mɛ̀ nɛ́ yuwar ko wiwii sitɛ be-zɔŋa.
Ko-de-dàlà de dàlà kaɗi, zuia yì mɔi̧ tɛ duk sɛ́ɛ́m, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e: «Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ n'am dee kɔ‘m bo na,» hee mɛ nɛ gee nú-a a̧ a̧ di̧i̧ ɗoŋ nyɔŋmɔ ga.
O ŋma mɔ taar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ sakali bíí nɛ‘i iŋ zu-a na in nɛ nyɛm ha'i mɛ kpɛk na; mɛ̀ nɛ́:
Bara nɛ ɔ wan,
wi-bɔkɔ nɛ kpa nyɔŋmɔ nyɔŋ zaŋ sur,
tula be-zɔŋa nɛ ba wíì;
ɓɛɛ naar-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ kó-de-tom nɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi ko naa-wan-tua kɔ‘i.
O ŋma be kpɔra be saɗi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ zu nu’ɛ naar nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ; mɛ̀ nɛ́:
o gba-mii: wa nɛ ŋma dukbíí nɛ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ nɛ iŋa ɗafa nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘i e ŋgɔn ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ;
kparɛ: wa nɛ ŋma dukbíí nɛ bó nɛ̀ ŋma ŋgai na, ɓɛɛ nɛ iŋa dee tua kɔ‘i e mgbara ta;
o gba-dɔya nɛ bó nɛ̀ wan na, ɓɛɛ nɛ gbo nɛ̀ gii yar nɛnɛ;
in gbɔɗɔ nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ ba nɛ er-wi gee, nɛ ye bɔɔ fara ko wannu’ɛ!
O ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ taar mbɛt nɛ iŋa duka-a, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ de naŋanɔ mbɛt; mɛ̀ nɛ́:
dila, saɗi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ see mgbara oi o dɔka-a lɛŋ, nɛ yu mɔ ti ŋma mɔ na,
toyo nɛ guntir ɔ ŋgaya,
in vala gbadua;
ɓɛɛ naar-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt:
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wannu nɛ duk ti ha̧ o wi-biro kɔ‘i.
Kà mɛ́ nɛ́ dee mɔɔ-mgbele bá nɛ̀ zu-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ kà tɛ-mɛ nɛ mbaŋa ɗoŋ-aa, mɛ̀ gú er-mɛ nú-mɛ́;
wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ̀ sukpa yibere a̧‘i kpa nɛ nɔ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ̀ sɔma zɔ̧ɔ̧-wi a̧ tɔk-zɔ̧ɔ̧ hɔ nɛnɛ; nɛ kia-wen a̧ dak kpɛri pi̧ nu mbɛt.
Mbɔrɔ ko Lemuɛl, wannu Masa
«Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ge, bem kɔ‘m? Ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ ge, yaa-kpɔk!
Ká mɛ́ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ sitɛ okoo na, in yuwar deemɔ kɔ-mɛ si kɔ̧ er okoo nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai mɛ de ha̧ o wannu mɛ tik na.
Lemuɛl, bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ wannu mɛ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na; de ha̧ o be-wan mɛ kɔ̧ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
wen kà wà gbɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧, tɛ-wa tɛ bi ɗoŋ o heembea, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gɔn kita zu o geɗek bíí nɛ ɗaŋ-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ bi fio, in ha̧ wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee,
ha̧ wa nɔ, ha̧ tɛ-wa bi ɗoŋ bɔnɛ in san kɔ-wa'i.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen, mɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ o wi nɛ nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ wen na, in oi nú o wi-kɔsa.
Mɛ̀ hú̧i nú-mɛ, mɛ̀ gɔ́n kita nɛ yuwar-a; mɛ̀ yór ɗoŋ o wi-mɔka-see in o wisan.»
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma kpaa kpasa kóò o? Kpasa kóò gana kísí nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya!
Wíì kɔ̧-a̧ e ta nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɔ beka ɓan a̧ na.
Kóò‘i de mɔ ha̧ wíì kɔ‘i nɛ de-a, nɛ bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a na dam ɗoŋ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
A̧ kii nɛ de zɔ̧-laa in de zɔ̧ goe, ɓɛɛ er tom kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dee nyɛmna.
A̧ pɛ o mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛnɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a fara hee kombon-de-gɛnɛ ga.
A̧ kur ŋgɔn nɛti ha̧ gɔna-ndaa-zan, mɛ gbai kam ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ in mɛ usi tom ha̧ o kó-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ ta mɔ wen fɔ ɓɛɛ a̧ hi̧fa; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ n'aa kpa tɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ gun nɛ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀nɛ́.
A̧ iŋa nyɔŋa nin-a, in dee tom nɛ ŋgai er-a mbɛt.
A̧ zɔka'e tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ lamba kɔ̧-a̧ bi mɛ zaŋzɛ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ pi̧ nɛ er-a kɔ̧ mɔɔ-pir-garaazi, fan nɛ laa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
Er-a nik sitɛ o wi-kɔsa na; a̧ hú̧í̧ nɛ er-a ha̧ o wisan.
Kíì gɛ̧ɛ̧ de a̧ wen o bíí kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen wa lɛŋ a̧a̧ nɛ laa zu ŋmaa yiitoo.
A̧ iŋa dee o borgo ɓɛɛ o laa-pi̧ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ de zɔ̧-laa nɛ duk nɛ gbɛ̧-a̧.
Mgbara o gasa bíí saaye, wa tu̧ nɛ tɛ wíì kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka bá nɛ̀ keta in o
Kóò‘i fan nɛ zɔ̧-laa ɗɔr nɛnɛ, a̧ de nɛ o ndota mɔɔ-hɛr-zaŋ ha̧ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ.
Ŋgai in tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ duk nɛ o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧; kíì mɔ mɛ siti de a̧ na.
A̧ tɔ̧ wen nɛ nú-tum na, ɓɛɛ leɓe-a tɔ̧ nɛ mbɔrɔ
A̧ zɔk mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ de-a, in a̧ kɔ̧ duka-a hegɔ gee, de tom na, na.
O bem kɔ̧-a̧ zɔn nɛ a̧ nɛ hee ger, ɓɛɛ wíì kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Okoo ɔ dɔka de nɛ kpasamɔ, ɓɛɛ war kɔ-mɛ, mɛ gana wa lɛŋ!»
Mgbɔɗɔmgbɔŋ kpoo-tɛ nɛ geemɔ, déè mbɛt yak yak, ɓɛɛ nɛ okoo nɛ yu kíí GASA WAN a'i tɛ zɔn.
Ɔ dee ha̧ kóò‘i mɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ a̧ zɔn a̧ tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
Wen nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ Ekleziastɛ,
Ŋma mɔ bo na! Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ.
Tom nɛ bíí de ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ lɛŋ, nɛ́ ge a̧ a̧ kpa oi-aa ge?
Pɛ duka-a ko o bíí yak ɓɛɛ wi koo o mbe bíí a oi wa woyo; mɔ kpɔk, nù duk kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wese daŋ ɓɛɛ yea; kà a̧ ye kaɗi, a̧ sii ɗoŋ nɛ haya-a si fara n'aa daŋ nɛnɛ‘i.
Búk yu si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ zika si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn; búk ɓoɓi, yaka, ɓɛɛ zika pii ɗoŋ.
Nana-yì lɛŋ fok si ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ gba-tɔp dun na mbɛt. Nana-yì fok kana nɛ́ foka-a si kpɔk fara.
Wen nɛ‘i tɔ̧, dee gba̧‘a̧ mɔ kaɗi, wi kɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔna; mɔ nɛ yí-wi zɔka sur yí-wi na, mɔ nɛ zer-wi zia nyɛm a̧ na mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ duka so nɛti kaɗi, nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i a̧ tɛ duk woyo. Mɔ nɛ dee so nɛti kaɗi, nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ tɛ de kana woyo. Ŋma mbe mɔ beka de woyo ɗɔɔ yiwese na.
Kà ŋma mɔ nɛ́ dea, ɓɛɛ kà bíí tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ mbe mɔ!» wó, mɔ‘i bó nɛ́ mbe mɔ na. Mɔ‘i duka so kɔ‘i nɛti, ɓɛɛ ká wa tɛ ko ɛɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Tɛ-wi mbaŋ ɗoŋ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ na; mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ woyo'i, tɛ o bíí mɛ ɗoŋ beka mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Mi Ekleziastɛ, mi ɔɔ so wan
Mi ee see-am tɛ kia-a mɛ iŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ dee ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m; nɛ mbetɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ nɛ́ tom bɔnɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam mɛ de!
Mi zɔka mɔ nɛ yak ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Mɔ nɛ gɔɔ kaɗi, bíí beka nyafi tan ɓɔna; mɔ nɛ bo na, wi beka tɔr na.
Mi taa mɔ: «Ho! Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m gana taamɔ ko o wi nɛ ɔɔ so wan sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛti ha̧‘m lɛŋ. Mi kia mgbara iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ batɛ.»
Mi kia ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ mgbara iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in mgbélé mɔ, in ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ mgbara iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in bɔkɔ. Ɓɛɛ kia mɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ batɛ ba nɛ gasa ɗaŋsee tɛnɛ; wi nɛ̀ kíí mɛ iŋ mɔ batɛ de ha̧ see-aa mɛ ɗaŋ batɛ mbɛt.
Mi taa mɔ ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ndé, mi tɛ pi̧ tɛ‘m tɛ desee in de duka-a wo! Mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧, mami nɛ́ mɔɔ-mgbélé sɔɔ géè; desee de kɔ‘i nɛ ge?

Mi tɔ̧a̧ mi tɛ e tɛ‘m tɛ nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mi beka e iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m so'i duk na mbɛt, mi beka de mgbélé mɔ na mbɛt. Mi tɔ̧a̧ mi tɛ de nɛ́ zɛŋ ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk kana mɔ nɛ o bezaŋ Adam nyɛma mɛ de sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa biti duk kpasa.
Mi dee o gasa tom. Mi mboo o tua, mi guna o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Mi waa o fɔ nyɔnɔ, ɓɛɛ mi wa o fɔ gún nɛ o te nɛ‘i nyɔŋ waya-a nyɔŋ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ dɔka-a.
Mi za̧a̧ o gɔna-yì ha̧‘m mɛ ɗu a tɛ o bɔr-te kɔ‘m.
Mi hi̧fa o bara okoo in wiwii nɛ dɔka-a mbɛt. Mi a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom in o gasa mɔ-dai kɔ‘m in o geɗek-a nɛ dɔka-a gan o bíí lɛŋ nɛ ɔɔ wan nɛti ha̧‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Mi ndɛma bu-mbɔi in lɔr; o mbɔi ko o wannu in o wan mɛ zika-nù. Mi a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ o wiwii in o kó-bii-gima bá nɛ̀ o okoo nɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-ha̧-desee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Mi gana o wi nɛ ɔɔ so wan nɛti ha̧‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m a̧ gbaka'm.
Mɔ nɛ yí‘m zɔka lɛŋ, kà mɔ‘i nɛ dee tɛ‘m kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi dee mɔ‘i. Mi bɛ̧ ŋma mɔ nɛ see-am kɔ̧a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mi kpaa desee tɛ tom kɔ‘m n'am dee so'i lɛŋ. Mɔ n'am kpaa oi tom kɔ‘m nɛ mɔ‘i.
Mi taa mɔ sɛn tɛ tom n'am dee so nɛ er-am'i in bɔnɛ n'am zɔka so tɛ dee tom'i, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ; nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè. Ŋma kpasamɔ nɛ‘i kpa ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ bo kɔ‘i na.
Mi zɔka mɔ sitɛ o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, mgbélé in bɔkɔ; nɛ́ ge a̧ mbe wan nɛ kpaia gba̧‘a̧-a̧ tɛ de ge? A̧ tɛ de nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ nɛ bíí dee so nɛti kaɗi.
Mi zɔka kɔ‘m'e iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana bɔkɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ gana nɛ tum’ɛ ga.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ iŋa yuwar n'aa ba, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ́ kɔ‘i nɔ nɛ̀ nú-tum, zu-a'i wa yiitoo lɛŋ tɛ fe kana.
Mi taa mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: «Mɔ nɛ kpaa wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na’ɛ tɛ kpa kana mi mbɛt; ɓɛɛ dɔka iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m'i tɛ de nɛ ge ha̧‘m ge? Mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.»
Kpɔk fea-a nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ fe’ɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na fe mbɛt’ɛ, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi bìí ɗoŋ wa yiitoo lɛŋ. Wen ge sa mɔ de hegɔ ge?
Nyɛr duka-a kpasa dea'm, wen mɔ nɛ yak ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ lɛŋ de na. Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Wɔ o tom n'am dee sɛn mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ gbɛ‘m ɓɔna, wen mi tɛ e lɛŋ ha̧ bíí nɛ tɛ duk oi-am.
Kóó wi’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ́ wi-iŋa-mgbara mɔ náà, kóó wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ndé, o'o iŋa o? Mɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ n'am dee nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ. Mɔ‘i kana nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.
See-am ɗaŋa tɛ zɔm tom n'am dea lɛŋ sɛn mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ.
Wi nɛ̀ dee tom nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, nɛ̀ iŋamɔ, nɛ̀ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nɛ́ gba̧a̧ tɛ́ e kana mɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí nɛ de tom-aa kóó tikiɗi na. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ in gasa ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ ge a̧ tɛ ɓɔn ha̧ wi’ɛi oi tom lɛŋ n'aa dea nɛ see kpɔk zaŋnu’ɛ ge?
O wese kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ wese nyimmɔ, ɓɛɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dita-see; kóó mɛ zɛ, see wi’ɛi ga̧ na; mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.
Ŋma demɔ ko bíí nɛ gana nyɔŋa mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ bá nɛ̀ kpaa desee zu tom kɔ‘i bo na, wen mi zɔka'e, o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ nɛ kɔ̧ er Sɔ̧ nɛ mbetɛ.
Sɔ̧‘e ndé, nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpa nɛ desee, nɛ wi Sɔ̧, wi iŋ na ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, iŋamɔ in desee ha̧ bíí nɛ dee tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ dea ha̧ o wi nɛ de tɛ-a na mɛ kii mbɔi, mɔi̧ nɛnɛ e ha̧ wi nɛ dee tɛ-a'i. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Mɔ lɛŋ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgimbi kɔ‘i; tom nɛ‘i de zaŋnu lɛŋ, ŋgimbi-a a̧a̧ kana sɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi wen kóó bem a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi fio a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi guna mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi zuɗa mɔ nɛ‘i guna a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi gbɛɛ bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi wen aa nyina yí-da̧i̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi gbina tua a nu a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi wen mboa-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi mama mami a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi aia-nú a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi yɔɔ yɔyɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi kaia ta a taŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi wen mɔi̧a ta a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi hɛra ŋmaa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ‘i hɛr ŋmaa na a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi kia mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi ha̧ mɔ mɛ yɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi kasa mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi baa mɔ pi̧ taŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi a̧ka̧ mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi fura mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi duka-a nɛ oi-nú a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋmaa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi sɛna ŋmaa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi biro a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi ga̧a̧mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ ge mɔ ge a̧ wi-de-tom kpa oi tom kɔ‘i ge?
Mi zɔka tom nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam mɛ de;
tom lɛŋ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgimbi-a. Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ bíí mɛ iŋ yaka-a nɛ ŋgimbi yak mbɛt, ɓɛɛ bíí nyɛm mɛ iŋ tugun deemɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ-a hɔ tɛ sɔŋkur-aa na.
Mi iŋa'e ŋma demɔ ko bíí, yak zu desee nɛ‘i kpa duk nɛnɛ tɛ bɔtɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i biti nɛ̀ kpasa, bo na.
Mɔ nɛ‘i nyɔŋ in mɔ nɛ‘i nɔ, sɛka desee nɛ‘i kpa tɛ tom nɛ‘i de, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Mi iŋa'e mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ de lɛŋ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ pi̧ zu tom kɔ̧-a̧, bo na, in ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ ba tɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ, bo na mbɛt. Sɔ̧ de mɔ‘i hegɔ ha̧ bíí mɛ yu a̧.
Mɔ nɛ duk kinii duka so nɛti kaɗi; mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ, hɔɔ so kaɗi mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ baa mɔ nɛ yaka kaɗi pii ɗoŋ woyo.
Ŋma mɔ n'am zɔka zu nu’ɛ woyo nɛ mɔ'ɔ: nɛ́ fara-gɔn-kita in fara nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ̀ɛ́ duk so sɛnɛ à̧ ɗaŋ dúk sɛnɛ.
Nɛ mɔ‘i sa'm tɔ̧‘e, Sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn kana kita zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in wi-ɗaŋ mbɛt, wen ŋgimbi mɔ lɛŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tom lɛŋ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Ɓɛɛ mi ta mɔ woyo zu o bezaŋ Adam ndé: «Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ we nɛ wa ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ‘e, wi ya hee saɗi ga.»
Kpɔk mɔ nɛ kpa bíí'ɛ nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ‘i a̧ kpa saɗi mbɛt: i̧i̧ nɛ́ fea, ɛ̧ɛ̧ fea mbɛt. Wa a̧a̧ nɛ kpɔk
Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ si kpɔk fara; mɔ lɛŋ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ́ fuunu, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ si kana ɗoŋ tɛ fuunu.
Nɛ́ o'o iŋa'e war
Mi iŋa kɔ‘m'e, ŋma demɔ nɛ bíí kpa, gan zu kpaa desee zu tom n'aa de, bo na; wen war mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ‘i. Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ba a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ, wen zɔka mɔ nɛ tɛ de oi-aa woyo o?

Mi zɔka ŋgamɔ lɛŋ nɛ bíí de in ŋmaa sɛn zu nu’ɛ. Kɔ̧̀à̧ ko o wi nɛ zɔk bɔnɛ ɔ ŋgúr-ŋgúr, ɓɛɛ ŋma wi-ga̧-see-wa bo na. O wi-nasi-bíí a̧a̧ kɔ-wa nɛ ŋgai nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ bó nɛ̀ wi-ga̧-see-wa na.
Mi zɔna o fio nɛ fee kaɗi gan o wi nɛ biti duk kpasa.
Zu-a woyo, nɛ́ bíí nɛ wa tɛ ko hɔ̧ɔ̧ na à̧ dúk nɛ desee gan, wen a̧ tɛ zɔk ɗaŋ tom nɛ de zu nù'ɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Mi zɔka tom nɛ bíí de nɛ ŋgai wen kpaa mɔ; wa de wen aa-see-mɔ in o ŋmaa. Ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ̀ mɔi̧ er kɔ̧ dee tom na, gbɛ nɛ tɛ;
kɔ̧ er-wi kpɔk nɛ̀ duna nɛ̀ ga̧a̧mɔ gana er yiitoo nɛ de tom ndak nɛ ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Mi zɔka ŋma geemɔ sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ woyo:

ŋma bíí duk ɛ̀nɛ̀, sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ bo na, bem bo na, ŋma nya-a̧ bo na mbɛt. A̧ beka ɔm tɛ-a tɛ tom na; kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛm yi-a na mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ak tɛ-a'e, wi zɔk bɔɔ bɔnɛ-tom hegɔ wen o ndé wo’ɛ, bo na mbɛt. Mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ in tom-takaɗi mbɛt.
Duka-a in ŋmaa yiitoo gana duka-a ɛ̀nɛ̀; bíí yiitoo tɛ kpa mɔ tɛ tom kɔ-wa nɛ wa de in ŋmaa nɛ de-a.
Wen kà ɓii bíí nɛ tika, bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ duk ɛ̀nɛ̀. Kà a̧ tik, wi-ba-a̧ e ŋgɔn bo na.
Kà wa ɔ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa baa wee. Kà bíí ɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀, tɛ-a tɛ ba bɔɔ wee hee ge?
Kà bíí nɛ duka ɛ̀nɛ̀, ŋma bíí tɛ nyɛm mɛ gan zu-a; a̧ kà wa nɛ yaa yiitoo kaɗi, kpɔk bíí nyɛm mɛ gan zu wa na.
Ŋma be-ŋgaiwi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, kóó a̧ so nɛ́ wisan, a̧ gana wannu nɛ oi sɔki kɔ‘i nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, nɛ̀ kɔ̧ mɛ zii mbɔrɔ na.
Kòò bem’ɛi gboo so nɛ kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ mɛ ye tɛ wan, kòò a̧ so nɛ wisan nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ɔ̀ɔ́ nɛ̀ wan,
mi zɔka'e bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ bem’ɛi ŋgimbi n'aa baa nɛ fara oi kuti wi’ɛi.
A̧ duk zu bíí nɛ dɔka-a, bo nɛ mɔɔ tɔr na, ɓɛɛ ŋma wese see dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ zu a̧ mbɛt. Mɔ lɛŋ kana nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.

Mɛ̀ zɔ́k naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ nɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti, mɛ̀ zíí wen, bo nɛ wen ɗafa-sɔ̧ hee o ŋma wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ga na, wen o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na iŋ ndé, nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ a̧ wa de na.
Ká mɛ nak tɛ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen na. Ká see-mɛ yak ti tɔ̧ nɛ ŋma wen ha̧ Sɔ̧ na, wen Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ kɔ‘i yiwese, ɓɛɛ mɛ a̧a̧ kɔ-mɛ mbɔɗɔnu; ká mɛ dɔk wen na.
Kà taamɔ dɔk zu-wi nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wi ɔɔ ɗaŋ zu; ka'i bur wen nɛ dɔka-a, ɓan na wi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen hee wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ga kaɗi.
Kà mɛ̀ há̧ nú-mɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧, mɛ̀ dé ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ haya-a, wen wí dé ko ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, na. Kà mɛ̀ há̧ nú mɛ, mɛ̀ dé mɔ‘i hɔ gba̧a̧.
Gana so ká mɛ ha̧ nú-mɛ́ na gan ha̧ mɛ mɛ hà̧ nú-mɛ́ ɓɛɛ mɛ de mɔ-aa hɔ gba̧a̧ na.

Ká mɛ e ha̧ nú-mɛ mɛ ba kiitɛ-mɛ nɛ oi-aa pi̧ tɛ ɗaŋmɔ na, in ká mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ betom ko Sɔ̧ ndé, wii yɔɔ kaya tɛ mɔ nɛ‘i dea'i na mbɛt. Wen ge sa mɛ de ha̧ see Sɔ̧ mɛ nyim tɛ wen kɔ-mɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɗaŋ tom kɔ-mɛ ge?
Dɔka ɔɔ-zu yak ŋmaa in geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ bura-wen nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt. Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ mɛ̀ yú kíí Sɔ̧.

Kà mɛ zɔk ndé, wa de nɛ bɔnɛ in wi-kɔsa sɛn tɛ zika-nù, kà mɛ nɛ zɔka ndé gbina heembea in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a na a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, ká ɗɛɗɛ-mɛ gɔn na, wen gasawi a̧a̧ nɛ gasawi kɔ‘i mɛ ye ɗoŋ wi, ɓɛɛ gasawi kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧a̧ nɛ o gasawi kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Nù ha̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wannu mbɛt kpa duka-a kɔ‘i wen zu nyɔnɔ.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ sede nyɛmna kpa sede dɔk yí-a na; wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ demɔ nyɛmna, demɔ nyɛm yí-a na; mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.
Kà demɔ dɔk nyɛmna, wi nyɔŋa-a ɔ dɔka nyɛmna mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wan-aa tɛ kpa nɛ ge sɛnɛ ge? Kɔ̧-a̧ kana nɛ zɔka-a nɛ yí ɓɛɛ.
Wi-de-tom ɔ kana kɔ‘i ya nɛ de-a, kóó a̧ nyɔŋa mɔ tikiɗi, kóó a̧ nyɔŋa mɔ nɛ dɔka-a mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ sura-zaŋ ko wanmbɔi de ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ ya na.
Ŋma gasa ɗaŋmɔ n'am zɔka mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mbɔi nɛ wan-aa mɔi̧ e, nɛ́ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ in tɛ-a nɛ tɛ-a.
Mbɔi ɗaŋ tɛ geemɔ; kà wan-aa nɛ koo bem, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ n'aa tɛ e ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧‘i bo na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa koo a̧ nɛ mgbii ga, a̧ tɛ si kana nɛ mgbii; a̧ ba géé ŋma mɔ er-a oi tom kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa dee so'i na kóó tikiɗi.
Mɔ‘i nɛ́ ŋma gasa ɗaŋ mɔɔ-ba-tɛ-wi: wi’ɛi tɛ si ɗoŋ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɛɛ so kana nɛnɛ ga. Ŋma mɔ n'aa kpaa oi dee tom hee ndaka ɗoŋ búk ga nɛ́ ge?
Tɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu, a̧ duk ti-tum, dita-see in gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ, bá nɛ̀ nyimsea duna kɔ̧ see-aa.
Kɔ‘m, mɔ n'am zɔka nɛ duk nɛ de-a nɛ mɔ'ɔ: nɛ́ nyɔŋa mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ bá nɛ̀ kpaa desee zu tom nɛ‘i de ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ, wen war mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ bíí ŋgimbi nɛ‘i biti duk kpasa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ kà Sɔ̧ ha̧ demɔ in kpaamɔ ha̧ ŋma bíí, ɓɛɛ kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ kpaa desee sɛnɛ, kà à nɛ́ kpaa desee tɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt, mɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ ha̧a̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi n'aa duk tɛ desee nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧, a̧ ta mɔ tɛ zɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ n'am zɔka nɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna wen bíí lɛŋ.

Ŋma bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧ nɛ gasa kpaamɔ in mbɔi bá nɛ̀ zɔnamɔ ha̧ a̧; ŋma mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi tɛ ak woyo bo na, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i na; nɛ́ ŋma gɔni bíí a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ nyɔŋa-a. Ŋma geemɔ in ŋma ŋga bɔnɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i mbɛt.
Kóó kà ŋma bíí a̧ bòó nɛ̀ bem gɔmŋmaa, kà wi’ɛi nɛ́ sɔka nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ kpa desee tɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na, kà fara-gun-a̧ bo na mbɛt, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, ŋma hɔɔ-bem gana wi’ɛi.
Wen ŋma gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ hɔɔ-bem tɛɛ wen-aa bo na; a̧ sii ɗoŋ ti-tum, nin-a ɓɔna kana ti-tum mbɛt.
A̧ iŋ wese na, a̧ zɔk géé zɔka-a na, ɓɛɛ a̧ gana kana ɓii bíí nɛ ɔma-tɛ.
Kóó wi’ɛi dee pɛ booro-yiitoo, a̧ beka duk so tɛ bɔtɛ na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ a̧ in hɔɔ-bem mbɛt nɛ si kpɔk fara na nde?
Tom nɛ bíí de, a̧ de kana mɛ kpa nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wɔ kaɗi kɔ‘i na.
Nɛ́ ge a̧ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ gana nɛ wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ge? Nɛ́ ge a̧ wisan nɛ iŋa dee mɔ gbak nɛ̀ tɛ-wi kpa tɛ duka-kpasa ge?
Zɔkamɔ nɛ yi gana ndaka ɗoŋ o wɔ-mɔ kɔ‘i. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ, nɛ́ géé ndaka ɗoŋ búk sɔɔ géè.
Mɔ nɛ duka so kaɗi, nin-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ; ɛɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ‘i sa'e bíí. A̧ nyɛm mɛ de wen in wi nɛ ŋgaya gan a̧ na.
Kà wen dɔk, geemɔ dɔka mbɛt; nɛ ge a̧ bíí tɛ kpa gan zu mɔ‘i ge?
O'o iŋa mɔ nɛ duk nɛ de-a wen bíí ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na'i o? Mɛ nɛ ŋma duka-a nɛ yak hee gi̧ɔ̧ ga. Hee ge bíí tɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ yak oi-aa ŋgimbi n'aa fea kaɗi ge?
De hu̧ra-nin gana de nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ; wese-fio gana wese-ko-bem.
Nɛɛ fio gana nɛa-a fara gbaŋa, wen mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa bíí lɛŋ nɛ fio. O wi nɛ ya kpasa a̧ e see tɛ mɔ‘i.
Duka-a nɛ ɗaŋsee gana duka-a nɛ mami, wen wi nɛ kai sɔnti nyɛma mɛ duk nɛ desee.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí fara-fio; nɛ̀ war taamɔ ko o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ́ fara-de-saa.
Zia mbɔrɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ gana zia gima ko o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na.
Mami ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na duk hee zɔ̧ a̧ fu̧ tɛ wee ɗɔɔ kpánà ga; ŋma geemɔ nɛ́ mɔ‘i mbɛt.
Kpaa ŋgai mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ bíí nɛ mɔɔ-pi̧-dawa zu wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ; ɓɛɛ yee bíí nɛ̀ sede nɛ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-taamɔ ko bíí.
Kaɗa mɔ gana ku̧u̧ naŋ mɔ; de nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi gana ŋmaŋa-tɛ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ see-mɛ mɛ nyim nɛ haya-a na, wen nyimsea nɛ mɔ ko o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na.
Ká mɛ ak mɔ‘e ndé, wen ge o wese nɛ yaka so dee gan ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ ge nde, na, wen pɛrti akamɔ hegɔ bó nɛ́ akamɔ ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ na.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma de mɔɔ-oi; iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ mɔɔ-gbak-bíí lɛŋ nɛ ya ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gbak wi gbak hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ sede gbak nɛ wi’ɛ ga. Demɔ ko iŋamɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kpasi wi kpasi.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k tom ko Sɔ̧. Nɛ o'o tɛ nyafi mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ bira o?
Kà wese desee nɛ hɔa, nɛ̀ mɛ̀ dúk nɛ desee; kà wese ɗaŋsee nɛ hɔa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tá mɔ ndé, Sɔ̧ dee ɛ̧ɛ̧ wese’ɛ in ɓii-aa mbɛt, wen ká bíí tɛɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ.
Tɛ duka-a kɔ‘m mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-a̧ bo na’ɛ, mi zɔka mɔ lɛŋ: wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a yɔ yɔɔ nɛ oi deemɔ kɔ‘i nɛ yuwar-a, in wi-ɗaŋ nɛ̀ dúk dúk kpasa nɛ gɔn-ta kɔ‘i.
Ká mɛ́ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a batɛ na; ká mɛ́ kii mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ batɛ na mbɛt, ká mɛ tɛɛ gbɛ tɛ-mɛ géè.
Ká mɛ usi ndé, mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-ɗaŋ batɛ na; ká mɛ duk nɛ wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na, na mbɛt, ká mɛ tɛɛ fe nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi kɔ-mɛ.
Mi zɔka kɔ‘m ndé, a'i kasi mɔɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i, ɓɛɛ ká'í e duk na wen wi nɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧ beka de mɔ yak zale na.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧a̧ ha̧ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ gan ŋgai ko o ŋma wan ɓu nɛ ɔ wan tɛ ŋma kpɔk gasa ye.
Ŋma bíí nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a zu nu’ɛ ɓɛɛ nɛ de kɔ‘i ɗaŋmɔ na, bo na.
Ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ zii wen ko o wi-dali-wen na; ŋma ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ndé, wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ da̧a̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ iŋa nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ see-mɛ ndé, mɛ da̧a̧ o ŋma bíí nɛ dɔka-a mbɛt.
Mi wee mɔ lɛŋ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, mi usa tɛ‘m ndé, mi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mi kia iŋa-mgbara-mɔ takaɗi.
Mi kia gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ takaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi kpa na, wen gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ́ ɗuka mɔ nyɛmna nɛ‘i beka nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa-a na.
Mi ee see-am tɛ kia mɔ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in tɛ taamɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt hɔ tugun-aa mɛ, in ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ndé, ɗaŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ-mgbélé nɛ ɗáŋ taamɔ ko bíí.
Mi zɔka ndé okoo nɛ duk nɛ pɛ́r ha̧a̧ ɗaŋsee ha̧ bíí gan ɗaŋsee-fio;
Ɓɛɛ sa mi Ekleziastɛ tɔ̧: mɔ n'am kpaa tɛ-wa ha̧‘m mɛ kpa taamɔ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Mi kia mgbara o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ mi kpa ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na. Mgbara o wiwii booro, mi kpaa nɛ kpasa-bíí kpɔk ɓɛɛ; ɓɛɛ mgbara o okoo lɛŋ, mi kpa ŋma kpasa-a na, kóó kpɔk.
Mɔ kpɔk n'am kpaa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Sɔ̧ dee bíí nɛ de-a, ɓɛɛ nɛ bíí a̧ kia dɔka sakala-mɔ a zu.
Nɛ́ o a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ o? Wi nɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ wen nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e: «Nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ a̧ de ha̧ sɔnti-wi mɛ tok, ɓɛɛ dee ha̧ sɔnti-a nɛ kaia so'i mɛ kpai mbɛt,» wó‘i, nɛ́ o?
Mi tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ndé, mɛ̀ kásí
Ká mɛ gbin heembea kɔ̧-a̧ géè na; ká mɛ de ŋgazu tɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ de tɛ-a na, na, wen wannu nyɛma mɛ de mɔ lɛŋ n'aa kɔ̧a̧.
Wen ko wannu ɔ ŋgaya; nɛ́ o'o tɛ ak a̧‘e: «Mɛ de nɛ ge nde,» o?
Ŋgamɔ beka kpa wi nɛ kasi heembea na; wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ iŋa ndé, ŋgimbi in gɔna-kita tɛ hɔ.
Ŋgimbi in gɔna-kita a̧a̧ sɛnɛ wen mɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ gasa bɔnɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ wen bíí.
Bíí iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ na. Nɛ́ o'o tɛ tɔ̧ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma mɔ tɛ hɔ nɛnɛ‘i ha̧ a̧ o?
Ŋma bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai zu
Mi zɔka mɔ nɛ yak ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ lɛŋ; mi zɔka hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí kpa nɛ ŋgai zu ŋma-wi ɓɛɛ usa nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ ɓii bíí ga;
mi zɔka wi-ɗaŋ nɛ wa gɔ si fara-gun-fio, ɓɛɛ o bíí gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ gɔn kita zu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ haya-a ga na, see o bezaŋ Adam duna nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ war gɔmŋmaa biti kana kɔ‘i duka kpasa. Ɓɛɛ mi iŋa kana mbɛt'e: «Nɛ́ wi nɛ yu kíí Sɔ̧ a̧ tɛ kpa demɔ wen yuu Sɔ̧ n'aa yu'i,
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗaŋ beka kpa demɔ na; a̧ beka duk siti na, ɓɛɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu’ɛ duk hee gi̧ɔ̧ ga, wen a̧ yu Sɔ̧ na.»
Ɓɛɛ ŋma geemɔ a̧a̧ zaŋnu’ɛ woyo mbɛt: mɔɔ-oi-tom ko wi-ɗaŋ tika zu wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom ko o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ o ɗaŋ bíí a̧ kai. Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi, mɔ‘i nɛ́ geemɔ mbɛt.

Nɛ́ desee a̧‘m zɔn kinii, wen ŋma demɔ ko bíí zaŋnu’ɛ nɛ gana nyɔŋa mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ ká bá nɛ̀ dee saa, bo na. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ gbak bíí tɛ tom kɔ‘i tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧ n'aa biti duk kpasa sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ.
Ŋgimbi n'am ee see-am tɛ kia iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, mi zɔka tom nɛ o bíí de zu nu’ɛ, mi zɔka ndé, o bíí ɔm tɛ na, kóó mɛ wese, kóó mɛ zɛ mbɛt.
Mi zɔka tom ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ mbɛt; nɛ mbetɛ bíí beka kpa ndaa mɔ nɛ yak sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ na; kóó bíí kia mɔ mɛ iŋ ndaa-a, wa tɛ kii takaɗi. Kóó wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɔ̧a̧‘e, wi iŋa wó, a̧ beka iŋ ndaa-a na.
Mi taa mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mi zɔka'e, tom ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ in o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧a̧ er Sɔ̧. Bíí iŋ mgbara

Nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ wen bíí lɛŋ. Mɔ nɛ kpa wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpa wi-ɗaŋ mbɛt; mɔ nɛ kpa de bíí kóó bíí nɛ war-tɛ-a ɔ sa̧a̧ kpa bíí nɛ war-tɛ-a sa̧ na mbɛt. Mɔ nɛ kpa wi nɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ kpa wi nɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ na mbɛt; mɔ nɛ kpa de wi kpa ɗaŋwi mbɛt. Mɔ nɛ kpa wi nɛ kan mɔ nɛ nin Sɔ̧, kpa wi nɛ de kíì káná mɔ mbɛt.
Ɗaŋmɔ a̧a̧ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ yak zaŋnu’ɛ; nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ a̧ kpa bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ duna kɔ̧ see o bezaŋ Adam. Wa de nɛ mgbélé mɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa duk kpasa; mɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ wi yaka si mgbara o fio.
Nɛ o a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ be mɔɔ-e-nɛ ta o? Nɛ́ o a'i tɛ hok o? Ŋma be mɔɔ e nɛ ta a̧a̧ kana sɛnɛ wen o wi nɛ ya kpasa: toyo nɛ biti kpasa gana wɔr-dila.
O wi nɛ ya kpasa iŋa'e, wi tɛ fe, ɓɛɛ o fio iŋ kɔ‘i ŋma mɔ na, kóó tikiɗi. Ŋma mɔ nɛ wa tɛ kpa oi tom kɔ-wa, bo na, wen tɛ-wi bìí ɗoŋ wa kaɗi.
Wa fee nɛ oi
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ desee, mɛ̀ nɔ́ mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ desee, wen Sɔ̧ kpɛka o mɔ nɛ mɛ dea'i kaɗi.
O laa kɔ-mɛ à̧ dúk nɛ bu-a ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ká mɛ́ mbosi sɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔ zu-mɛ na.
Mɛ̀ dúk nɛ desee in kóó kɔ-mɛ tɛ ŋgimbi geemɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ, wen war mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ sɛn tɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ in sɛn tɛ tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ de sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de, mɛ̀ dé nɛ́ dea-a ɓɛɛ; wen géè na, kóó tom, kóó gɔna-kita, kóó taamɔ, kóó iŋa-mgbara-mɔ bo ye ko o fio nɛ mɛ nɛ si sɛnɛ‘i na.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i mbɛt: Bó nɛ́ ŋmaŋa bíí a̧ iŋa aa yaa-gan-ŋmaa na; wi-gbin-biro bó nɛ́ ŋga bíí na. Nyɔŋmɔ bó nɛ́ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ ɓɛɛ na; mbɔi bó nɛ́ ko o wi-iŋ-mɔ na; bó nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mɔ batɛ a'i zɔk nɛ de yi na; o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ kana nɛ desee in bɔnɛ a̧ tik zu wa.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zoro ba nɛ yɔk’ɛ ga, kóó hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be nɔ̧́í̧ ba nɛ pɛ́r’ɛ ga, hegɔ bíí iŋ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ‘i na. Bɔnɛ tik zu o bezaŋ Adam kaɗi sɛka wa naka.
Mi zɔka ŋma mɔ sɛn ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ ɔ gasa yí‘m.
Ŋma ye duka so ɓɛɛ bíí ye'i dɔk na; nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma gasa wannu tɛa kɛr ye'i e nu mɛ bi, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbo mɔ kpe nɛ ɗoŋ ye'i.
Ŋma ziɓa-wi a̧a̧ so saaye'i, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ; a̧ kpasa o wi saaye'i nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, tɛ ŋma bíí mbaŋ ɗoŋ wi’ɛi ɓɔna.
Mi'e ndé, iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana ŋgai, ɓɛɛ kà wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ bòò nɛ́ ŋma ziɓa-wi, ɓɛɛ wi ee a̧ tɛ geemɔ, wi kɔ̧ mɛ zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Wí zíí wen ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ gan ŋga ger ko ŋma wannu mgbara o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ gana o boi-de-biro, ɓɛɛ yɔɔ-kaya war kpɔk ɗaŋ mɔ nyɛmna.
O fio zi̧ de ndiŋ dee, ɓɛɛ wa dee ha̧ nɔ̧́ ko wi-de-nɔ̧́-nyama mɛ kpa̧i̧; kale-a mbɛt, mɔɔ-mgbele tikiɗi gana zu iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in hura-nin.
Taamɔ ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mgbɔ wan-aa mgbɔɔ nɛnɛ sitɛ de fara, ɓɛɛ taamɔ ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na mgbɔ nɛ wan-aa si ɗaŋ fara.
Kà wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na nɛ nɔ yuwar, ɓɛɛ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ dee ha̧ bíí lɛŋ mɛ iŋ‘e a̧ nɛ wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na.
Kà see wannu nyim in mɛ̀ɛ́, ká mɛ́ e fara-tom kɔ-mɛ duk na, wen nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi dor wi dor tɛ dee o gasa ɗaŋmɔ.
Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ n'am zɔka ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ nɛ ŋma yɔɔ-kaya ko o wannu;
o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na ya kɔ-wa tɛ gasa fara, ɓɛɛ o wanmbɔi yaa si ɗɔɔ;
bara daŋ kɔ‘i nɛ nyaŋa, ɓɛɛ be-wan nɛɛ kɔ‘i nɔ nɛ naŋ hee bara ga.
Wi nɛ za̧ kɔ̧, ŋma ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ tik kɔ̧ n'aa za̧a̧‘i; wi nɛ gbin gasa ŋgeŋ, kana nɛ a̧ a̧ gɔ́k tɛ nyɔŋ.
Wi nɛ hú̧í̧ ta, kana nɛ o ta nɔ‘i a̧ e da̧i̧ tɛ-a; wi nɛ mbaŋ nɛ gua a̧ kasi zu wen ká a̧ tɛɛ ba da̧i̧.
Kà nu kpi̧i̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ kà'ì nɛ́ bɛŋa nú-a na, mɛ́ tɛ́ dè tom nɛ ŋgaya-a; kà'ì de tom nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wi kpaa mɔɔ-oi-aa.
Kà gɔ́k nɛ́ nyɔŋa wi-ɔr-gɔ́k, nɛ́ ge a̧ wi-ɔr-gɔ́k'i tɛ kpa oi tom kɔ‘i ge?
Wen nɛ gbo nɛ nú wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ bíí nyɛmna; ɓɛɛ wen nɛ gbo nɛ nú wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na de ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔ.
Ku̧u̧naŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mgbélé in sɔŋkur wen kɔ̧-a̧ duna nɛ ɗaŋ mɔɔ-mgbélé.
Wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na bur wen nɛ nú-tum géè; bíí íŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ́ hɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ o'o tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ oi-aa ha̧ a̧ o?
Tom ko wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na mbɔi nɛ a̧ sɔɔ géè; a̧ iŋ géé iŋa yuwar mɛ nɛ nɛnɛ si saaye na.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu ŋma nù nɛ̀ wannu'i nɛ́ géé obem in o be-wan mɛ sɛnɛ ya kɔ-wa de nɛ gbaŋa nɛ tuyɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, nù, nɛ̀ wannu kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ-bíí'ɛ, nɛ̀ o be-wan kɔ-mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ ŋgimbi-a ha̧ wa mɛ kpa ŋgai, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wɔ-nɔɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ gbɛ nɛ́ wa na’ɛ, desee a̧a̧ zu mɛ.
Kà‘i de tom nɛ tɛɛri, kpaakpee-tua tɛ gbin; kà‘i ɗafi zu tua na, tua'i tɛ hui.
Ɓɛɛ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ nɛ́ fara mami, nɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ pi̧ desee tɛ-wi, nɛ́ sede a̧ ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ bíí.
Kóó nɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ, ká mɛ́ fom wannu na; kóó nɛ kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua-ɔɔ kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ́ fom wanmbɔi na; wen ŋma be nɔ̧́í̧ tɛ ba wen-aa yaknɛ, ŋma be nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ bu̧i nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ tɛ dali wen-aa nɛnɛ ha̧ bíí.
Mɛ̀ pí̧ brɛt kɔ-mɛ zu yì, kà dé ká mɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ̀ bá woyo.
Mɛ̀ kɛ̧́ ŋma mɔ nɛ mɛ́ kpaa ha̧ bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, kóó ha̧ bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar, wen mɛ iŋ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu nù na.
Kà zan tu̧ kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi, mɛ́ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ kórò hɔa. Kà ŋma te mbii tik nu si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, kóó si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, a̧ ɓɔn kana fara n'aa tika nù sɛnɛ‘i.
Kà ŋma bíí pɛm mɔ ha̧ búk yu kaŋ sɛ wó, a̧ beka pɛ mɔ na; kà ŋma bíí tɔ̧‘e ha'i pɛm mɔ ha̧ tura-zan a̧ yak sɛ wo, a̧ beka mɔi̧ mɔ na.
Wi iŋ fara nɛ

Mɛ̀ pɛ́ kpar-mɔ kɔ-mɛ mɛ tutuyɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ká mɛ́ duk géè na mbɛt, wen mɛ iŋ tom nɛ tɛ gbak mɛ na, mɛ iŋ wan nɛ̀ tɛ gbak mɛ mgbara wa yiitoo'i na; ŋmafara wa yiitoo'i lɛŋ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ ndé, mɛ iŋ na.
Sa̧a̧mɔ dee tɛ bíí nyɛmna; zɔka wese nɛ de mɔ nyɛmna.
Kà zɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛ dɔka zaŋnu’ɛ, wi’ɛi a̧ duk nɛ desee ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ iŋ‘e wese ɗaŋsee ɔ kana dɔka mbɛt; mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ.

Ŋgaiwi, mɛ̀ dúk nɛ desee ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ biti nɛ ŋgai; mɛ̀ kpá desee ŋgimbi daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ see-mɛ kɔ̧a̧ lɛŋ in mɔ nɛ yí-mɛ́ zɔka nɛ dee tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ kana ndé, Sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ see-mɛ mɛ ɗaŋ na, mɛ̀ fó ɗaŋmɔ tɛ-mɛ yinɛ, wen ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ nɛ mui̧-zu-mɛ biti nɛ tu̧-a̧ nɛ́ geemɔ lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ, tɛ-mɛ'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wi nɛ dee mɛ nɛti sɛka wese bɔnɛ hɔa in nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Wɔ duka-kpasa gbɛ‘m ɓɔna.»
Wen ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ wese, sa̧a̧mɔ, nyaŋa-zɛ in o sɔra tɛ bi, ɓɛɛ tu̧-zan tɛ pii ɗoŋ oi kórò mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ tɛ o wi-pɛm-tua tɛ nak, nɛ ɗoŋ o ŋga bíí tɛ bir, nɛ o okoo beka hɔ̧n fuu ɓɔna, wen nɛ wa dɔk na; nɛ déè ko o okoo-zɔk-mɔ nɛ woi-tua beka bo ɓɔna;
ŋgimbi nɛ nu tua tɛ kpe kaɗi, nɛ‘i beka zii giti o mɔɔ-hɔ̧n-mɔ ɓɔna, nɛ
ŋgimbi'i, kíì daŋa kaya tɛ de wi, wí tɛ́ nɛ̀ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ kíì; ŋgimbi'i ɓɛɛ te-amande
Ŋgimbi'i, nyak hɛr bu-mbɔi tɛ bur, be-yee nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr tɛ mbaŋ, kpánà tɛ gba fara ɗu yi, mɔɔ-ba-yi tɛ ɗaŋ nú gɔna-yì;
fuunu tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ nù hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duka so nɛti ga, ɓɛɛ
Ekleziastɛ hee ndé, oee zɔm geemɔ wa! Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ geemɔ!
Ŋma mɔ mɛ e zu iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko Ekleziastɛ woyo mɛ nɛ wen n'aa usa iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ dukbíí. Ɗoŋ n'aa kia o gba̧a̧ tua-wen kaɗi, a̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ wa nɛ de-a.
A̧ kia ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr o mɔ nɛ yɔka-a, a̧ kia ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr kpasawen ha̧ bíí mɛ zii nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Nɛ́ o kpasawen nɛ mbetɛ.
Wen ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ duk hee sɛɛ-gɔrɔ ga, in o wi-yɔr-kalata ya hee o be-te nɛ wa mgboia ga; mɛ nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ko ŋma wi-dai-mɔ kpɔk.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ e ŋma mɔ zu-a na. Tom yɔra kalata nɛ́ ŋma tom nɛ kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ yambaia mɔ nɛ ŋgaya-a de ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ mbɔi mbɛt.
Sɔŋkur wen zu mɔ nɛ‘i tɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ̀ yú kíí Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kásí o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧, wen ɓaa mɔ ko bíí nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu mɔ lɛŋ nɛ bíí dea; kóó nɛ́ demɔ, kóó nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ gba de ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ gima ko Salomɔŋ nɛ gana o dɔka gima lɛŋ.
Mɛ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti mɛ dúí nú‘m!
Mɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ hɛr am a'i,
wɔ-mɛ gbɛa'm gan dɔ̧ɔ̧,
gana gan de pɛr nɔ̧́-nyama nɛ mɛ sɔ̧a̧.
Wɔ-mɛ gbɛ wi hee de pɛr nɔ̧́-nyama ga;
nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ o be-zɔŋa tɛ gbɛ nɛ tɛ wen zu mɛ‘i!
Mɛ kasi er-am, ɛɛ ma yi!
Mɛ nɛ wannu kɔ‘m,
mɛ mgbɔ‘m si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua kɔ-mɛ
h’ɛ́ɛ́ de tortɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ tɛ ŋmaa,
ɛɛ yiitoo lɛŋ.
Ɛɛ de tortɛ
nyɛma-a a̧ nyɛm na
ɓɛɛ sa o be-zɔŋa tɛ gbɛ tɛ wen zu mɛ!
O boko-be Jerusalɛm,
kɔ‘m, ndàrá-tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tu̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ mi nɛ gba de be-zɔŋa;
ndàrá-tɛ‘m ɔ ɓɔ́í̧ɔ̧m hee tua-laa ko o be Kedar ga,
nɛ de-a hee laa-kpe-nú tua ko Salomɔŋ ga.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk nɛ tu̧ tɛ‘m na,
wen nɛ wese a̧ dɔɔ am.
Nɛ o nya'm a̧ dee ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ tu̧;
wa ee am mɛ pɛm nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ war nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m mi pɛm na.
Mɛ yaa-dua-see-am’ɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m;
mɛ tɛ dai o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ si dee?
Mɛ tɛ a wa mɛ ɔm tɛ wese-see-zu’ɛ si dee?
Mɛ tɛ dai o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ si dee?
Wen ka'm tɛ̀ɛ́ yambali
nɛ ɗoŋ o mɔ-dai ko o sɛm kɔ-mɛ.
Daŋ-ká-wese-bia kɔ‘m,
kà mɛ nɛ iŋa fara'i na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ɓa nɛ ɗoŋ o mɔ-dai nɛnɛ;
mɛ kai o be gbadua kɔ-mɛ nɛnɛ
ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ ká̧ ɓoramɔ ko o wan-dai-mɔ.
Sɛm kɔ‘m, tɛ zɔkamɔ kɔ‘m,
mɛ duk hee gba de nyaŋa ko Faraɔŋ ga.
Mɔɔ-a-zer-mɛ baa nɛ mɛ,
mɛ yaa ger-ba-nɛ-kisi’ɛ.
Ɛɛ tɛ de kísí nɛ lɔr,
a nɛ bu-mbɔi sɛn mgbara-a ha̧ mɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu kɔ‘m duk fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ de pɛr nɔ̧́-nyama kɔ‘m kura ɓisisi.
Yaa-dua-see-am duk hee de dak nɔ̧́-nyama,
nɛ ɔ mgbara ber-am ga.
Yaa-dua-see-am'i hɔɔ ŋmaa in sikila do-te,
nɛ duk kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ká̧ gɔna-yi Ɛn-Gedi.
Daŋ-ká-wese-bia, yaa-wiyɛ kɔ‘m,
mɛ yora zɔŋa batɛ!
Zɔk gba de gɛɗa yí-mɛ wo!
Yaa-dua-see-am’ɛ, mɛ mbɛt,
yora ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ bo nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-na;
yara k’ɛɛ nɛ de ɓɔɔ wa̧a̧-te.
O kpaakpee-tua k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ o gbaa-er
ɓɛɛ wi gɔn o babir-aa nɛ̀ o gbaa-dɛ̧ɛ̧.
Kɔ‘m, mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in do-te bɔkɔ-nu Sarɔŋ mɛ;
mi duk hee gba-dɛŋ mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ ga.
Sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ́ dúk mgbara o dɔka zɔŋa
hee gba-dɛŋ mgbara tɛn ga.
Yaa-dua-see-am duk mgbara o dɔka be-ŋgaiwi
hee ndìà
Duka ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-a̧ pi̧ nɛ tortɛ tɛ‘m;
waya-a ɔ nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ nú‘m.
A̧ mgbɔa'm nɛ́ɛ̀ yé nɛ fara-nɔ-mɔ k’ɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ yɔra fara'i usa'e, «
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɛ makala waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m,
ha̧ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m ŋgai;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɛ gbɛ̧ waya-ndìà
ha̧ see-am ga̧;
wen zɛɛ
A̧ ee er-a mɛ gale ɗɔɔ zu'm,
ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr am nɛ wii-er-a!
«O boko-be Jerusalɛm,
mi kana mɔ nɛ nin kalamba in zambɛrɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ aŋ wee
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgimbi-a tɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ sɛ.»
Tiger yaa-dua-see-am a̧ de mɔ‘i!
Zɔk a̧ n'aa tɛ mɛ‘i!
A̧ ndɔr nɛ̀ zu o kaya,
kpíɗí nɛ̀ zu o zu-tɔ̧́ tɛ nɛnɛ.
Yaa-dua-see-am hɔɔ ŋmaa
in kalamba ká bá nɛ̀ daŋa yoŋga zambɛrɛ.
A̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ; a̧ yor ɗoŋ ŋgeŋ k’ɛɛ,
zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛ woi-tua;
a̧ gɛɗi nɛ mɔ nɛ mgbara mɔɔ-kpe-woi-tua.
Yaa-dua-see-am bíí nɛ gima tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'e:
«Yaa-wiyɛ, dua-see-am,
mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yak!
Ŋgimbi gɛ̧ɛ̧ yaka kaɗi;
kórò gɔna mbɛt kaɗi.
Wi zɔk nɛ o do-te sɛn fara lɛŋ,
ŋgimbi haya-tɛ hɔɔ kaɗi;
ɓɛɛ wi zii nɛ
O mbui waya-mbɔra
pɛr do waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kur nɛ de-a tɛnɛ ɓisisi.
Yaa-wiyɛ, dua-see-am,
mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yak wa!
Mɛ́ dé mɔ hee gbaku̧i nɛ hu̧si
nɛ mgbara ta in o kaya nɛnɛ'ɛ ga;
mɛ̀ gbó pii zan ha̧‘m zɔk yí-mɛ,
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧‘m zii tiger-mɛ a'i,
wen tiger tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ-mɛ ɔ dee nyɛmna,
saŋa yí-mɛ dee tɛ‘m nyɛmna mbɛt.»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kái o gba-toyo nɔ'ɔ,
wa nɛ o be saɗi-ɗaŋ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛɛ
nɛ biti doa-a’ɛ!»
Yaa-dua-see-am duk nɛ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ dai mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ poo o gba-dɛŋ nɛnɛ.
Mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ nɛ oi ndaa wese, ká tum ba nu!
Yaa-wiyɛ, dua-see-am,
mɛ̀ dúk hee kalamba in yoŋga zambɛrɛ,
nɛ hɔ zaŋgule nɛ zu o kaya nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
Mɛ zaŋzɛ gɔn gado kɔ‘m,
mi kii nɛ wi nɛ see-am baa.
Mi kii a̧ takaɗi, mi kpa a̧ na.
Mi tɛ kur ha̧‘m mɛ yar nɛ yuwar
in nɛ bee-gara dam saaye lɛŋ,
kii nɛ wi nɛ see-am baa'i;
mi kii a̧ takaɗi, mi kpa a̧ na.
O wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ yar nɛ saaye
zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛnɛ kpaa'm,
ɓɛɛ mi ak wa:
«Ɛnɛ zɔk yaa-dua-see-am na nde?»
Mi ɓira wa yak hegɔ,
ɓɛɛ mi kpa yaa-dua-see-am'i;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tika tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ mi ba a̧.
Mi beka ɗai er tɛ-a ɓɔna,
hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ ye nɛ tua ko naa kɔ‘m,
si kɔ̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua,
fara nɛ naa kɔ‘m baa so zaŋ-am sɛnɛ.
«O boko-be Jerusalɛm,
mi kana mɔ nɛ nin kalamba in zambɛrɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ aŋ wee
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgimbi-a tɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ sɛ.»
Nɛ́ ge a̧ kur nɛ ŋga-gbárà daŋnɛ,
hee zi-wee ga,
koo hee pɛr de nɔ̧́-nyama in fuu-nyama
ko o wi-de-gɛnɛ a̧ wa dɔ,
ɓɛɛ sa de pɛr-aa kur tɛnɛ ga’ɛ ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ tipoe ko Salomɔŋ,
nɛ̀ o yaa-ŋgo-biro ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk ya zik;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o yaa-ŋgo-biro
Gba-paa a̧a̧ sɛn er-wa,
wa lɛŋ yamba dee biro;
kóó o nde a̧a̧ nɛ gba-paa kɔ‘i ká̧ tir,
wen pɛma tɛ-wi tɛ o ŋga mɔɔ-zɛ.
Wannu Salomɔŋ dee tipoe kɔ‘i
nɛ te Libaŋ.
A̧ dee o mɔɔ-tɔn-tua-a nɛ bu-mbɔi,
a lɔr tɛ mɔɔ-duk-nɛnɛ,
ɗafi kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ gbɛ̧ laa,
ɓɛɛ o be-zɔŋa Jerusalɛm ɗafi kɔ̧ tipoe'i nɛ
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛnɛ o boko-be
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wannu Salomɔŋ nɛ oi
nɛ naa kɔ̧-a̧ guu zu-a,
wese baa kóò kɔ̧-a̧;
wese'i duka nɛ wese-tortɛ kɔ̧-a̧.»
Daŋ-ká-wese-bia, yaa-wiyɛ kɔ‘m!
Gbaayí-mɛ ɔ kàlàkùlɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗɔɔ laa-kpe yí-mɛ.
O mu̧i̧-zu-mɛ duk hee gii gbadua
nɛ gbin piinɛ fɔɗɛɛ nɛ zu kaya Galad mɛ ga.
O gba̧a̧-nin-mɛ ɔ ndáká-ndáká hee gii sami nɛ‘i zuia,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ daŋ nɛ̀ fara-zui-wa’ɛ ga.
Wa lɛŋ gbama yiitoo yiitoo,
kóó ŋma kpɔk mɛ duk ɛnɛ-wi bo na.
Zɔ́k de be tu̧ ndàrá-nú-mɛ
Zɔk gba de leɓe-mɛ wo!
Nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ laa-kpe-yí-mɛ mɛ tɛnɛ,
o zaɗa-mɛ ya hee reeta kìì-kóɓò
Gba de bɔ̧i̧a̧ ger-mɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in tua-pɛm-mɔ ko David
n'aa dee nɛ yɔka-a in nɛ zika-a;
ɓɛɛ kísí ga̧i̧ sɛnɛ hee o ŋgee
ko o yaa-ŋgo-biro booro ga.
Tua ber-mɛ duk hee o gbama be kalamba
nɛ naa kɔ-wa gbaia nɛ dan,
nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ poo o gba-dɛŋ'ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ nɛ si zu kaya nɔ̧́-nyama,
si zu kaya fuu-nyama,
nɛ oi ndaa-wese, ká tum ba nu!
Mɛ yora zɔŋa batɛ, yaa-wiyɛ kɔ‘m!
Ŋma gee ndɔla bo tɛ-mɛ na.
Kóò n'am hara, mɛ̀ kúr ɛ̀ɛ̀ é Libaŋ duk,
mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yak k’ɛɛ e Libaŋ duk;
mɛ̀ é kaya Amana duk,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá yí-mɛ pii ɗɔɔ;
ká mɛ zɔk mɔ si zu o kaya Senir in Hɛrmɔŋ,
nɛ duk nɛ fara-yaa ko o dila
in o gɔ̧ na.
Mɛ́ pi̧i̧ dawa zu'm, boko-nya'm!
Kóò n'am hara, tɛ gee zɔka mɔ kɔ-mɛ pii tɛ‘m,
in tɛ gee zɔka o kísí nɛ ya ger-mɛ n'am zɔk'i,
ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗ‘am gɔn gɔn baram-baram!
kóò n'am hara!
in de pɛr nyama nɛ kur tɛ-mɛ gana o dɔka nyama lɛŋ.
Kà‘m dui nú-mɛ, ɓɛɛ o ndara nú-mɛ ɔ ɓisisi;
leɓe-mɛ ɔ dɔk-dɔk hee gɔrɔ in yibere ga.
Nyama nɛ mɛ aa tɛ o laa kɔ-mɛ
nun hee pɛr kombo Libaŋ mɛ ga.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ mgbák fɔ kɔ‘m,
boko-nya'm, kóò n'am hara!
Mɛ́ nɛ́ gɔna-yi kɔ‘m;
mɛ nɛ kpút-kpút-yì kɔ‘m ɛn'am.
Mɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in fɔ nɛ̀ kóɓò dɛm sɛnɛ nɛ de-a,
nɛ o gba waya-te a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ,
nɛ o kímbá in o masoro a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ká bá nɛ̀ nyama-gi-kpoo,
in o gba de nyama-a-tɛ in nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ zu-zer-yì a̧ de ha̧ o fɔ‘i mɛ dɛm,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ kpút-kpút-yì nɛ fok nɛ Libaŋ mɛ tɛnɛ!
Búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, mɛ kur!
Búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, mɛ tɛ mbɛt!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú pii zu fɔ kɔ‘m,
ha̧ o pɛr mɔɔ-kpɛɛfɔ kur dam fara lɛŋ.
Yaa-dua-see-am a̧ ye kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘i,
a̧ a̧ nyɔŋ o gba de waya-te kpɛɛfɔ-a.
Boko-nya'm, kóò n'am hara,
mi yee kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi mɔi̧ o nyama in o de pɛr do-te kɔ‘m,
nyɔŋ nɛ toka ŋgee-gɔrɔ kɔ‘m,
nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in yibere kɔ‘m mbɛt!
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ mɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧
Mi ɔɔ nu, ɓɛɛ yá ba yí‘m na;
kà‘m zii wo, ɓɛɛ yaa-dua-see-am a̧ kɔn nu tua'i!
«Boko-nya'm, yaa-dua-see-am,
yaa-kpɔk, mbe-a-bo-na,
kúr hú̧í̧ nu tua ha̧‘m na nde!
Zu'm ɓɔɔ nɛ mbɛŋ lɛŋ,
buma zu'm ɔ ɗùkùyùkù gee.»
«Mi kpɔ̧i̧a̧ kɔ‘m laa tɛ‘m yinɛ kaɗi,
mi de i̧i̧ mɛ kur mɛ pi̧ laa woyo ɓɔna!
Mi fɔra naŋ-am kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mi de i̧i̧
ha̧ naŋ-am mɛ ba ndiŋ woyo ɓɔna!»
Yaa-dua-see-am pi̧i̧ er nɛ woi-tua tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ see-am to mgbut-mgbut gee.
Soɓee, mi kura mɛ hú̧í̧ nu tua ha̧ yaa-dua-see-am kaɗi.
Mi sɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɔ̧́-nyama er-am,
ɓɛɛ nɔ̧́-nyama nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ o waza er-am'i
ba tɛ kpar nu tua n'am foa'i.
Mi hu̧i̧a̧ nu tua ha̧ yaa-dua-see-am;
ɓɛɛ yaa, a̧ bo na.
Mi gɔma gbo, ɓɛɛ mi ndak ɗoŋ-aa,
kii nɛ a̧ takaɗi, mi kpa a̧ na.
Mi saa mɔ ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ sara nú‘m na.
O wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ yar zik nɛ garo kpaa'm,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa mbɛra'm, e da̧i̧ tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa ɓar gba-laa tɛ‘m ba yaknɛ.
Nɛ́ o wi-pɛm-ŋgárá a̧ dee mɔ‘i.
«Mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́,
o boko-be Jerusalɛm:
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ kpaa yaa-dua-see-am'i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ge wen ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e, zɛɛ
«Yaa gba de be-zɔŋa’ɛ,
