yaa-dua-see-mɛ gana o ŋma-a nɛ ge?
Yaa-dua-see-mɛ‘i gana bɔɔ o dɔka bíí nɛ ge mɔ ge,
sa mɛ ai nú hegɔ'ɛ ge?»
Yaa-dua-see-am'i nɛ gbɛ̧-wi boɗoe;
kóó sɛn mgbara gba gii wiwii booro ɓu,
kana nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk a̧‘i zɔk ɓɛɛ.
Zu-a nɛ gba de sa̧a̧ lɔr;
o mui̧-zu-a ɔ dura ye ŋmaa síp-síp nɛ̀ tu̧-a̧ ɓɔ́tɔ́tɔ́.
O gbaayí-a ɔ gɛɗa ŋgɛlɛlɛ
hee o yol nɛ gu zu yì'ɛ ga;
gbaayi-a dúk nɛ bu-a kàlàkùlɛ̀ɛ̀ hee duk ɗɔɔ yibere ga.
O zaɗa-a duk hee gba de be fɔ,
nɛ‘i guna o te-nyama nɛ pɛr-aa kur sɛnɛ nɛ de-a ga;
o ndara nú-a duk hee o gba-dɛŋ nɛ do-a mir,
ɓɛɛ nɛ pɛr-aa nun ɓisisi’ɛ ga.
O yí-er-a ɔ reɓete hegɔ kini-kini
hee kana lɔr nɛ‘i aa o de ta nɛ tok tok mgbara-a ga;
zaŋ-aa nɛ gee mbɔɗa nin-fɔrɔ
nɛ‘i kpee nɛ o gba de tu̧ ta lɛŋ.
O ku-a duk hee mbiŋ-tua nɛ‘i sɛka nɛ ŋga ta,
ɓɛɛ ká‘i mbo mɔ nɛ gba de lɔr, bá zú kɔ̧ a̧ ga;
a̧ baa yí-wi hee kaya Libaŋ ga;
a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in gbatui
Wen mɛ́ kɔ̧ nú-a nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ;
o boko be Jerusalɛm,
mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ-a lɛŋ baa see-am.
Yaa-dua-see-am, sɛm kɔ‘m'i, nɛ́ mɔ‘i!
Yaa gba de be-zɔŋa’ɛ,
yaa-dua-see-mɛ‘i yaka bɔɔ si dee,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ kii a̧ in mɛɛ ge nde?
Yaa-dua-see-am tɛ zir si kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘i,
si fara n'aa guna o de te-nyama sɛnɛ‘i,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ dai mɔ kpɛɛfɔ‘i,
in ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɓi o mira do gba-dɛŋ.
Mi duk nɛ ko yaa-dua-see-am,
ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ kɔ‘m;
nɛ́ sɛn fara'i a̧ a̧ dai mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ poo o gba-dɛŋ nɛnɛ.
Daŋ-ká-wese-bia, yaa-wiyɛ kɔ‘m,
mɛ́ yora zɔŋa hee ye Tirsa ga;
mɛ́ duk hee Jerusalɛm ga;
mɛ́ nɛ́ mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi.
Mɛ̀ bá yí-mɛ tɛ‘m yinɛ,
wen tɛ‘m mɔk mɔk tɛ zɔka'm nɛ mɛ zɔk'i.
O mui̧-zu-mɛ duk hee gii gbadua
nɛ gbin piinɛ nɛ zu kaya Galad mɛ ga.
O gba̧a̧-nin-mɛ ɔ ndáká-ndáká hee gii sami
nɛ daŋ nɛ fara-zui-wa’ɛ ga.
Wa lɛŋ gbama yiitoo-yiitoo,
kóó ŋma kpɔk mɛ duk ɛnɛ-wi bo na.
Nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ laa-kpe-yí-mɛ mɛ tɛnɛ,
o zaɗa-mɛ ya hee reeta kii kóɓò ga.
Kóó wannu kaia so ko-wan ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
in o ŋma okoo
ká bá nɛ̀ o be-zɔŋa nɛ‘i beka tɔr pi nu na,
daŋ-ká-wese-bia, yaa-tɛ-pondo kɔ‘m kpɔk'i nyɛma'm.
A̧ nɛ kpɔk-bem, yaa-dua-see naa kɔ̧-a̧,
nɛ o boko-bem zɔn tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e,
«Mɔ a̧ bá nɛ a̧!»
Nàao wannu in o kóò kɔ̧-a̧
zɔn nɛ kóò‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mɔɔ, koo'i nɛ̀ daŋ ká mɔ gɔna mbɛliyɛ,
nɛ̀ nyɛk hee nyaŋa-zɛ ga,
in nɛ̀ ba hee wese ga,
ɓɛɛ kà a̧ zɔk mɔ pii tɛ‘nɛ́,
tɛ‘nɛ́ mɔka gbɛlɛsuwɛɛ‘i, duk hee ge?»
Mi zira si kpɛɛfɔ-te,
ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk o be te nɛ hɔ sɛn mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ,
ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk mɔ kà o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ ɓɔa,
in kà o kóɓò nɛ́ doa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee ha̧ taamɔ kɔ‘m mɛ sakali,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘m mɔk;
boko be-wan!
«Mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ, mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ, boko be Sulam!
Mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ, mɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk yí-mɛ!»
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔk boko be Sulam
fara yɔ yɔyɛ-e-ha̧-ŋmaa wen ge?
Boko be-wan,
naŋ-mɛ baa nɛ ndara’ɛ batɛ!
Guntir-mɛ duk hee ŋma de kana nɛ‘i duia dui ga.
Kɔn-mɛ
duk hee be ɗele-nɔ-mɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nyaŋ kɔ̧ a̧ na ga;
zaŋ-mɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in duk gba̧a̧ alkamaari
nɛ gba-dɛŋ zika kpa nu ŋmaa.
Saŋa ber-mɛ duk hee o gbama be kalamba
nɛ naa kɔ-wa gbaia nɛ dan ga.
Ber-mɛ duk hee zika tua-pɛm-mɔ
nɛ wa sa'e Gba̧a̧-nin-fɔrɔ ga;
o gbaayí-mɛ ɔ gɛɗa hee o gɔna-yi mɛ Hɛsbɔŋ
nɛ a̧a̧ ká̧ nu garo gasa ye'i ga;
ɓɛɛ zɔ̧ɔ̧-mɛ duk gɔ́mɔ́mɔ́ hee tua-pɛm-mɔ mɛ Libaŋ
nɛ zɔk mɔ si Damas mɛ ga mbɛt.
Zu-mɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in kaya Karmɛl;
o mui̧-zu-gba-waka nɛ mɛ ɗafa'i nɛ mɔɔ-ba-see wannu.
Yaa-wiyɛ, daŋ-ká-wese-bia kɔ‘m,
dua-see-am, mɛ yora zɔŋa batɛ!
Zɔ́k de be yora-a kɔ-mɛ ɗɛ́ŋɛ́n hee ndɛŋgɛ ga wo,
sáŋá ber-mɛ duk hee waya kóɓò
Nɛ mɔ‘i sa'm tɔ̧‘e, «Mi tɛ daŋ kana kóɓò‘i
mɛ ɓi o waya-a.»
O ber-mɛ a̧ ya hee o waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
pɛr kɔ̧ nú-mɛ a̧ nun ɓisisi hee pɛr de waya-te ga;
kɔ̧ nú-mɛ a̧ ga̧ hee nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧...!
...nɛ‘i baa e ha̧ yaa-dua-see-am,
ɓɛɛ fók a kɔ̧ nú-ɛɛ, o wan-ɔ-ya ga.
Mi duk nɛ ko yaa-dua-see-am,
ɓɛɛ kintɛ-a a̧a̧ pii tɛ‘m.
Yaa-dua-see-am, mɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ yák si zaŋbɛɛ,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɔ tɛ ŋma be ye;
mɛ tuyɛ sut, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ yaka si kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zɔk mɔ kà o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ɓɔa,
kà wa nɛ doa,
in kà o kóɓò nɛ doa mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧‘m tɛ usi nɛ
Pɛr yiŋgi-nyɔnɔ
o de waya-te a̧a̧ nu tua k’ɛɛ:
o mbe-a in o gba̧‘a̧-a̧ mbɛt;
mi ee wa ha̧ mɛ, yaa-dua-see-am.
Mɛ̀ bo so nɛ bu̧i-nya'm,
kpɔk nu bere kɔ‘m,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa so ŋmaa zan,
ha̧‘m mɛ hɛr mɛ nɔ yí-see-am ga,
bíí beka ku̧i̧ so'm na.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ mɛ́ si kɔ̧ tua ko naa kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ á̧ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ usi mɔ ha̧‘m.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ de há̧ mɛ́ mɛ́ nɔ de pɛr dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ mi ha̧a̧ nɛ́ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ yí-waya-kóɓɔ̀
A̧ ee er-a mɛ gale ɗɔɔ zu'm,
ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr am nɛ wii-er!
«Mi kana mɔ ti'nɛ́,
o boko be Jerusalɛm,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ aŋ wee
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgimbi-a tɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ sɛ.»
Nɛ́ ge okoo ge
a̧ daŋ kɔ‘i nɛ ŋga-gbárà,
ɛk nɛ tɛ nɛ yaa-dua-see-aa tɛnɛ'ɛ ge?
Mi tuna mɛ́ ti ndìà,
fara nɛ naa kɔ-mɛ baa so zaŋ-mɛ,
ko nɛ mɛ ɗɔɔ-a'i.
Mɛ̀ hɛ́r am ndaɗi yí-see-mɛ hee dap nɛ‘i gɔn,
ɓɛɛ ká̧ bi na’ɛ ga;
mɛ̀ bá‘m ndaɗi ɓaa-mɛ hee dap ga mbɛt;
wen
Gɔya zu
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ fio e nɛ bíí na’ɛ ga.
O gasa yi beka nyɛm mɛ bi wee
kin nana-yì beka ba a̧ bin nɛ yi na mbɛt.
Kóó wi ha̧a̧ so mɔɔ-kɔ̧-tua kɔ‘i lɛŋ wen
mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ kpa oi-aa nɛ zɛkɛɗa-wi ko o bíí.
Boko nya-ɛɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ biti nɛ geɗek-a,
ber-aa tɛ sui hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Nɛ ge ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ de ha̧ a̧
wese nɛ wii tɛ tɛ mɛ har a̧ ge?
Kà à̧ à̧ duk so nɛ ŋgárá gaa,
ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ de so fara-pɛm-mɔ nɛ bu-mbɔi e zu a̧;
a̧ kà à̧ à̧ bo so nɛ nú-garo gaa,
ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kai so nɛ o gasa te
Kɔ‘m, mi nɛ ŋgárá,
ɓɛɛ o ber-am nɛ fara-pɛm-mɔ;
ɓɛɛ sɛn yi-a mi duk nɛ wi-ga̧-see-aa.
Salomɔŋ a̧a̧ so nɛ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i
sɛn Bal-Hamɔŋ;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ee er o wi-de-tom-aa,
ɓɛɛ kóó o nde tɛ ha̧ sede
n'aa kpaa zu ɗɔra o waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i ha̧ a̧,
tɛ kɔya bu-mbɔi booro.
Kɔya bu-mbɔi booro'i nɛ kɔ-mɛ, Salomɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
kɔya bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ ko wi-de-tom;
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
nɛ́ mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m.
Yaa-wiyɛ, mɛ́ nɛ̀ duk nu see fɔ'ɛ,
o sɛm kɔ‘m yeŋ nɛ zer sitɛ mɛ;
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧‘m zii tiger-mɛ!
«Yaa-dua-see-am, mɛ̀ yú mɔ yak!
Mɛ̀ dúk hee kalamba in yoŋga zambɛrɛ
nɛ hɔ zaŋgule nɛ zu o kaya
nɛ de pɛr do-te nun sɛnɛ'ɛ ga.»
Mɔ nɛ Esaii bem ko Amɔs zɔka tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ha̧ a̧ zu Juda in Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi ko o wannu Ozias, Yotam, Ahaz in Ezɛkias nɛ ɔɔ so wan zu Juda nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Yiwese a̧ zii, ɓɛɛ nu a̧ yeŋ zer
tɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧‘i.
Gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi daia o bem gasi kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa zika tɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ de ŋgazu in am.
Ndai iŋa wan kɔ‘i,
tuifuu mbɛt iŋa fara nɛ wan-dai-a
a nyɔŋmɔ sɛnɛ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ
dukbíí kɔ‘m zii mɔ na.»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu'nɛ́, ɛnɛ o tugun bíí de ɗaŋmɔ;
yí-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ gbɛɛ zu,
ɔr nɛ o bíí nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ er-wa sɔɔ gee!
GASA WAN nɛ duk nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ea a̧ duk,
e a̧ tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ zik ɗoŋ e ha̧ a̧.
Ɛnɛ o yaa-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ,
gè tɛ‘nɛ́ ge a'i tɛ gusi ɓɔ ge?
Wen zu'nɛ́ kpee nɛ da̧i̧,
ŋgai bo yí-see'nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Nɛ̀ naŋ‘nɛ́ hɔ nɛnɛ bɛɗɛ zu'nɛ́ mɛ,
ŋma oi tɛ‘nɛ́ duk na,
kana nɛ da̧i̧ in o mɔ nɛ sui tɛ‘nɛ́
fok nɛnɛ nɛ mam in o gba-da̧i̧.
Wi fɔr yi da̧i̧‘i na;
wi hɛr na, kà bó nɛ̀ aa nɔ̧́ sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifa bɛɛ-oi, o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ bia wee.
O gɛnɛ ɗaŋa nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔn gbaayí‘nɛ́,
gɔni bíí ɗaŋa nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifi geemɔ;
ɓɛɛ ye Jerusalɛm tɛ duk
hee ŋma be tua-pɛm-mɔ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
kóó hee ŋma gbáksák sɛn kpɛɛfɔ-gala ga;
a̧ tɛ duk hee ŋma ye nɛ biro kɛra ga.
Kà GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
nɛ́ kpasa so o ŋma bíí na,
ɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ ŋmaa in o bíí Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN,
ɛnɛ o gasawi Sɔdɔm;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yeŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ usamɔ ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ɛnɛ o bíí Gɔmɔr.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ŋma demɔ n'am kpa tɛ zɔm ɗafa-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo na.
O kpoo vala gbadua in nɔ be ndai k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋgia'm kaɗi;
tɔk wiwii-ndai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ká bá nɛ̀ tɔk o sami
in o gbadua k’ɛ́nɛ́ de tɛ‘m ɓɔna.
Ɛnɛ o wi nɛ de ɓɛɛ tɛɛ tɛ‘m’ɛ,
nɛ o'o saa'nɛ́ mɛ tɛɛ i̧si̧ nú-zala Tua kɔ‘m nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́ o?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káɗí baa kokoɗo ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m;
zi-wee ha̧a̧mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i de tɛ‘m na.
Gbaŋa mbe yí-zɛ, o wese-ɔm-tɛ
in o gasa wese-mɔi̧a-a,
ká bá nɛ̀ o wese-ɓɔɔ-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi kɔ̧ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Mi sɛna o gbaŋa mbe yí-zɛ in o wora-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
tɛ‘m mbɔia tɛ mɔ‘i kaɗi!
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ nyɛi̧ er'nɛ́ si ŋgɔn
wor nɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi wɛra yí‘m si mgbɔɔr;
ɛ́nɛ́ kɔfa Sɔ̧ bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-na, ɓɛɛ mi zii na,
wen er'nɛ́ duna nɛ tɔk.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zúi tɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí war-tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ yí‘m;
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ káɗí dee ɗaŋmɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yámbí dee demɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák o wi nɛ bíí de ŋgamɔ nɛ saka-yí in wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in o be-oi;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé ɗoŋ o ko-gera.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ bá keta ɛɛ zɔk,
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Kà o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ̧ kerere,
wa tɛ fɛŋ hee ɓɔrɔ ga;
kà wa nɛ gbɛ̧ɛ̧ hee tɔk ga,
wa tɛ fɛŋ ndáká-ndáká hee talum ga.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧ mɛ mbo zu ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o gba de nyɔnɔ tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔn tɛ dee ŋgazu,
gba-paa tɛ gɔm'nɛ́ a nu.»
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kifa nɛ ɗaŋ-a hee kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu ga.
Kasa heembea in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a duka so tɛ ye'i,
ɓɛɛ kinii nɛ o wi-gbɛ-zu a̧ ɔɔ wan sɛnɛ.
Bu-mbɔi kɔ-mɛ kifa nɛ duia-yì;
gba de dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ gɔna yì.
O gasawi kɔ-mɛ nɛ o wi-ŋgazu,
wa nɛ o gbama-yari ko o wi-zuzu.
Wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa nɛ mɔ er o bíí;
wa de demɔ nɛ yuwar-a in o be-oi na,
ɓɛɛ wa ye ɗoŋ o ko-gera na mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ŋga-wi ko
«Bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu o wi-kur-zu'm,
mi tɛ kifi er-am ha̧ wa ɓɛɛ sɛka see-am ga̧a̧.
Mɛ tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ er-am;
mi tɛ dɔ mɛ tɛ wee dɔra
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i dɔ nɛ kpáná-wii
wen ha̧ ndiŋmɔ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ bìì wee nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧'ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o wi-gɔn-kita kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ duk nɛ de-a hee kuti-a ga;
mi tɛ de kalemɔ‘i in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ-mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ wa tɛ sa nɛ mɛ‘e:
‹Ye-mbo-zu› in ‹Ye-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.› »
ɓɛɛ o wi-gbar-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ kpasi wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt.
O wi-ŋgazu in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ kum gbuɗuk lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ o wi bɛ̧ GASA WAN tɛ yambali.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ o bíí-gasi o gasa te,
búù tɛ ba'nɛ́ zu o te nɛ see'nɛ́ duk sɛnɛ‘i;
ɓɛɛ foe tɛ ba'nɛ́ zu o fɔ n’ɛnɛ hoka nɛ ɔr'nɛ́‘i mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ tɛ duk hee ŋma gasa te nɛ wa̧a̧-a̧ aia a nu ga,
ɛnɛ tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma fɔ nɛ yi bo sɛnɛ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ŋga bíí tɛ kifi de geemɔ;
o tom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk hee fu̧u̧-wee ga,
ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ tɛ bìì wee,
ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ tɛ bi wee'i bo na.
Mɔ nɛ Esaii bem ko Amɔs zɔka tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ha̧ a̧ zu Juda in Jerusalɛm nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Ŋma wese tɛ hɔ
nɛ GASA WAN tɛ de Tua kɔ‘i
sɛn mgbák zu kaya mɛ,
nɛ tɛ kusi gan o kaya lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa si hi̧i̧.
O dɔka dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ nɛ hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ dáŋ si zu kaya ko GASA WAN,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ dáŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ko Jakob,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ ba.»
Wen usamɔ tɛ tɛ nɛ
ɓɛɛ wen ko GASA WAN tɛ tɛ nɛ Jerusalɛm.
A̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu o tugun bíí lɛŋ;
a̧ tɛ duk nɛ wi-gɔn-kita mgbara o dɔka dukbíí.
O dukbíí nɔ‘i tɛ kai o gba-paa kɔ‘i dui nɛ o wara,
ɓɛɛ wa kaia o sɛɛ kɔ-wa dui nɛ o ada mbɛt.
O tugun bíí beka ba gba-paa sitɛ o ŋmaa ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ biro beka bo mgbara wa in o ŋmaa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nutua ko Jakob,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN.
Nɛ mbetɛ GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ ee dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, o be nutua ko Jakob dúk,
ɓɛɛ o wan-gbana in o wi-a-tani ko o be daŋa-wese
ká bá nɛ̀ o be Filistii dun mgbara wa,
ɓɛɛ wa si tɛ dee mɔ ko o gɔni-duk.
Nu'i duna nɛ o bu-mbɔi in lɔr;
ɓɛɛ kpaamɔ kɔ-wa dɔka yak zale mbɛt.
Nu'i duna nɛ o nyaŋa in o keekee
nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr pi̧ nu na.
O géé-sɔ̧ duna zu nu'i,
ɓɛɛ o bíí gbɛ zugur nu ti mɔ nɛ wa dee nɛ er,
ɗaŋ geemɔ sɔɔ gee nɛ wa mboo nɛ er.
Kóó o bíí guu so nu de nɛ ko nɛ tɛ-wi,
Sɔ̧, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wa na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ si kɔ̧ ta, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ‘nɛ́ ɗɔɔ fuunu,
yu nɛ ŋgamɔ ko GASA WAN in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛ‘i.
Wi-gasi-zu beka ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn na,
ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ o wi-de-ŋgazu tɛ gbin.
Ɓɛɛ wese'i wi tɛ iŋ‘e nɛ́ GASA WAN kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ gasa.
Ŋma wese tɛ hɔ
nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ ba zu duk nɛ̀ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ,
o wi-gasi-zu, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-gɔ-tɛ,
mɛ de ha̧ wa lɛŋ mɛ kifi geemɔ.
A̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o
in o gasa te nú Basaŋ mbɛt,
gu nɛ o kusa kaya
in o gasa zu-tɔ̧́ lɛŋ,
ká bá nɛ̀ o kusa tua-pɛm-mɔ
in o garo nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ daŋ na,
sɛka o zɔm kombon
in o gba de-a mɛ Tarsis lɛŋ.
Wi-gasi-zu beka ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn na,
ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ o wi-de-ŋgazu tɛ gbin.
Wese'i nɛ́ GASA WAN kpɔk ɓɛɛ a'i tɛ gasi.
Ɓɛɛ o géé-sɔ̧ lɛŋ tɛ yambali de geemɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧sí kɔ̧ o ta,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé nɛ ɗuka-a si ɗɔɔ nu,
wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yu ŋgamɔ in gasamɔ ko GASA WAN,
ŋgimbi n'aa be tɛɛ kur mɛ de ha̧ nu mɛ nak.
Wese'i o bíí tɛ siŋ o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr ka'i gbɛ zugur nu ti wa gasi nɛnɛ‘i ha̧ o zai in o doŋge.
Wa tɛ kai ŋmaa hu̧si kɔ̧ ta in o mgbara ta nɛnɛ wen yuu ŋgamɔ in gasamɔ ko GASA WAN ŋgimbi n'aa be tɛɛ kur mɛ de ha̧ nu mɛ nak.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ta nɛ bíí nɛ ɔm ɔm’ɛ na;
ŋma gba̧a̧ mɔ ko bíí a̧a̧ dee nde?
Ɛnɛ zɔk, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ dɔ o be Jerusalɛm in o be Juda nɛ nyɔŋmɔ in yi,
ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋma gbakamɔ lɛŋ:
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o ŋga bíí in o yaa-ŋgo-biro,
o wi-gɔn-kita in o
o wi-de-mɔɔ-gbana in o
o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro in o dita-bíí,
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-zɔk-mɔ in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi.
«Mi tɛ ha̧ nɛ gee o be geɗek bem mɛ duk zu wa,
wen zu dee ŋgazu kɔ-wa;
wa tɛ ɔ wan zu wa.»
O bíí tɛ de mɔ ba nú ŋmaa in o ŋmaa;
kóó o nde tɛ de bɔnɛ in ŋma-wi,
be-ŋgaiwi tɛ de ŋmaa in gbɛ́rɛ́,
ɓɛɛ gee wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ na dee ŋmaa in dita-bíí.
O ŋma bíí tɛ nɛɛ ba ger nya-wi kɔ̧ tua ko daa kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e:
«Mɛ a̧a̧ nɛ gasa laa, mɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu yɛ!
Mɛ̀ ɔ́ wan zu oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna’ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ wese'i, nya-a̧‘i tɛ kifi nú‘e:
«Mi bó nɛ́ wi-de-nyina na,
mi bó nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ in gasa laa kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m na mbɛt,
hegɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧‘m mɛ ɔ wan zu o bíí na.»
Jerusalɛm ɗaŋa kifi bɛɛ-oi,
Juda yoo nu wen wen mɛ nú-wa
in deemɔ ko o bíí tɛ ye'i duk hee dara
a̧ wa da̧a̧ nɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN ga.
Mɔ nɛ sɔnti-wa usi nɛ mɔ mɛ tɛ-wa;
wa dee ɗaŋmɔ ɓɔn yí o bíí
hee ko o bíí Sɔdɔm ga, wa hu̧si na.
Nɛ mɔ‘i nɛ wa de'i a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e nde, wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee,
wen a̧ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi de tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi-ɗaŋ nɛ wi-bɔnɛ,
wen ɗaŋmɔ a̧a̧ zu a̧.
GASA WAN tɛ de mɔ in a̧
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ be geɗek bem a̧ duk wi-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m;
ɓɛɛ nɛ o okoo a̧ ɔ wan zu wa.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m, nɛ́ o gasawi k’ɛ́nɛ́
a̧ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ pi̧ tɛ ɗaŋ war n’ɛnɛ nɛ sɛnɛ'ɛ.
GASA WAN kura mɛ de kita,
a̧ kura mɛ gɔn kita zu o dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧.
GASA WAN ɓa nɛ wen in o gasawi,
ká bá nɛ̀ o be-wan ko o bíí tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wa'e:
«Mɛ nɛ ɛnɛ'ɛ ɗaŋ o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
kai nɛ mɔ ko o wisan dun nɛ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ mbɔli dukbíí kɔ‘m,
e nɛ o wisan tɛ geemɔ ge?
Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«O boko be
gbin nɛ ger, pi̧ nɛ yí ɔr nɛ wiwii;
wa dɔɓi dɔɓi nɛ́ nɛ nɔ
wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ zii giti kana nɛ to ŋmaa naŋ-wa'i.
GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ kputu mɛ a zu o boko be
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ba mɔɔ-kpe-zu-wa yinɛ
wen ha̧ foe mɛ de wa.»
Wese'i GASA WAN tɛ kai o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ nɔ‘i tɛ-wa yinɛ lɛŋ: o kana, o kalaafi, o kísí-ger,
o mɔɔ-a-zer, o kana-yí-er, ká bá nɛ̀ goe-gu-zu,
o mɔɔ-ɓam-zu, o geɗek kísí nɛ tok tok, o fura-nyina-pɛm-tɛ,
o wele-pi̧-er in wan mɛ pi̧ zɔ̧ɔ̧,
o de laa-de-gbaŋa, o gasa laa, o gba laa in o ŋgoɓo;
o mɔɔ-zɔk-yí
Wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpa nɛ de fuu-nyama wo,
wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpá nɛ mbɔra mɔ.
Ha̧ wa mɛ kpa nɛ kanda wo,
wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpá nɛ gba̧a̧-pɛr;
ha̧ wa mɛ de zu-wa wo,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpúí kpui a nu.
Ha̧ wa mɛ mar de goe wo,
wa tɛ mar nɛ a̧ka̧ goe.
Ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi tɛ-wa wo,
ɓɛɛ wa dir nɛ tɛ nɛ wee-boi.
Wa tɛ kum o bíí kɔ-mɛ a nu nɛ gba-paa,
ɓɛɛ o ŋga-wi kɔ-mɛ tɛ tir a nu yi biro.
O bíí kɔ-mɛ tɛ gɔfi mɔ, hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧;
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ a er-mɛ bɛɗɛ zu-mɛ.
Wese'i o okoo mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo
tɛ kpa ŋmaa zu kpɔk wiwii,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Nɛ́ ɛɛ a̧ tɛ kii nyɔŋmɔ k’ɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hi̧fa laa k’ɛɛ nɛ tɛ-ɛɛ mbɛt;
mɛ̀ é h’ɛ́ɛ́ bá nɛ́ mɛ́ nɛ̀ wíì
wen ká foe tɛɛ de yɛ tɛ yaa-a n’ɛɛ ya nɛ sayo'i.»
Wese'i, GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ bɔr-mɔ mɛ ɓɔ nɛ tɛ duk nɛ zɔnamɔ in gasamɔ, ɓɛɛ o mɔ nɛ tɛ wai tɛ nu'i, tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-tortɛ in mɔɔ-nyɛŋɛ ko o be
Hegɔ, wi tɛ sa o oi ndaa bíí mɛ
Ŋgimbi'i, GASA WAN tɛ zui o boko be
GASA WAN tɛ tɛ mɛ duk zu kaya
a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ de gi̧ɔ̧-ɔm-tɛ wen wese, ŋga fara-hu̧si kórò in ŋga búk mbɛt.
E ha̧‘m bíí gima ha̧ sɛm kɔ‘m, gima kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ-tortɛ zu fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Sɛm kɔ‘m a̧a̧ so nɛ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i
tɛ de mɔka nu sɛn zu-tɔ̧́ mɛ.
A̧ gbuta nu nɛ de-a
dɔr kii-ta yinɛ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gun o de be nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛnɛ.
A̧ dee taŋaɗa-pɛm-mɔ see fɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ za̧ kɔ̧ see fɔ‘i mbɛt.
A̧ taa so kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kpa nɛ de o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ fara'i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛɛ wai nɛ ɗaŋ gee siɗimɔ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛnɛ o be Jerusalɛm in o be Juda,
mi ai nu h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧ mgbara wen kɔ‘m in fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m.
Ŋma mɔ n'am tɛ̀ɛ́ de ha̧ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m
n'am de na’ɛ nɛ ge?
Mi taa so kɔ‘m mɛ kpa nɛ waya nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ wen ge fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧'ɛ
tɛɛ dɛm nɛ gee paŋ siɗimɔ ha̧‘m ge?
Ɓɛɛ kinii mi tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'am tɛ de
nɛ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi tɛ yai o ɓoramɔ n'am ɓora so nɛ a̧‘i a nu,
wen ha̧ mɔ mɛ nyɔŋ a̧.
Mi tɛ gbin ŋgeŋ wen ha'i mɛ i̧si̧ a̧ ɗaŋ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti.
Kinii, mi tɛ ɗaŋ a̧ ɗaŋ yinɛ,
ŋma mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ ɗafi tɛ-a bo na,
kà bó nɛ̀ dee zao-a na mbɛt;
o tɛn in o tɛn-dara tɛ da̧ kpe zu a̧;
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ dor kóró ká tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ a zu fɔ‘i na mbɛt.
Fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
nɛ nutua ko
Ɓɛɛ o be Juda nɛ o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ n'aa hoka gun;
a̧ taa so kɔ̧-a̧‘e, wa tɛ ya nɛ de-a in o ŋmaa wo,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ kuma ŋmaa.
A̧ taa so kɔ̧-a̧‘e,
wa tɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a sitɛ o ŋmaa wo,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ hiɗimɔ-ɗaŋsee.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi
nɛ ba tua ko ŋma-wi nɛ ŋgai e zu kɔ‘i,
in o wi nɛ ba fɔ ko ŋma bíí e nú kɔ‘i.
Ɛnɛ baa fara lɛŋ
hee ɓaa o bíí nɛ ɔ ye'i nɛ ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ
a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«O zɔm gasa gba de tua nɔ'ɔ tɛ gbin a nu,
o bíí beka ɔ sɛnɛ na.
Fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ pɛsa-a nɛ naŋ booro-taar
tɛ ha̧ yí-dɔ̧ɔ̧́ dun litrɛ ɓu-naar;
kóó wi waa so nɛ zɔm fɔ,
mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ mɔi̧ kpɛɛfɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ bufu kpɔk ɓɛɛ.»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ kur kɔ‘i nɛ tutuyɛ
nɔ nɛ ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ kà zɛ tɛ de hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
ɓɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ gbɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nu!
Koloŋ, zaŋa, bi̧ɔ̧ in dɔma zak
nɛ yee ɗoŋ nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa'i
de ha̧ wa mɛ ta mɔ wen tom nɛ GASA WAN de na,
in wa zɔk o mɔ n'aa dea na.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ nɛ wa tɛ kai
dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ,
wen zu-wa bo na;
wɔ tɛ kum o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ gba dukbíí tɛ kum nɛ wɔ yi.
Kɔ̧-fio ɓaa nú yoŋgolo mɛ gur
o gasawi in o gba giiwi Jerusalɛm
nɛ ya nɛ desee in tortɛ‘i.
O bíí beka ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn ɓɔna,
wa lɛŋ tɛ duk si ɗɔɔ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ tɛ zum zu nɛ foe.
Hegɔ wi tɛ zɔn GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
wen zu gɔna kita kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a;
ɓɛɛ nin Sɔ̧ tɛ hur wen zu deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a.
O
hee fara-dai-wa ga,
ɓɛɛ o ŋmaŋa saɗi in o
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi nɛ dak bɔnɛ pi̧ zu-wi,
ba nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yuɓuri nɛ tɛ hee nyak-ndai ga!
Wa'e: «Sɔ̧ a̧ de tom kɔ‘i
nɛ haya-a ɓɔn gbaayí-ɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk!
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
h’ɛ́ɛ́ iŋ mgbara-a!»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi nɛ sa ɗaŋmɔ‘e, demɔ,
ɓɛɛ saa demɔ‘e, ɗaŋmɔ;
wa zɔk tum hee sa̧a̧mɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ hee tum ga.
Wa sa paŋmɔ‘e, nyɔ̧ɔ̧-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa saa nyɔ̧ɔ̧-mɔ‘e, paŋmɔ.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o bíí nɛ zɔk tɛ-wa'e,
wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ wa ta mbɛt'e, wi nɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o ŋga wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
in o ŋga-wi nɛ záŋ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ŋmaa nɔ nɛnɛ.
Kà o bíí ye wa nɛ mbɔi kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ wa foo wen zu o wi nɛ dee mɔ nɛ ɗaŋ-a yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ pi̧ pi̧i̧ wen zu o wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ leɓe-wee ndal nɛ zɔ̧,
in hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zɔ̧ bíí nɛ wee kór-kór’ɛ ga,
a̧ kunin-wa tɛ mbɔr nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-wa yambala hee puɗu-zɔ̧ ga,
wen wa pi̧i̧ so heembea ko GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ taŋ,
e nɛ wen ko Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa see GASA WAN
nyim zu dukbíí kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ ba er nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ mbɛr wa;
o kaya naka,
o wɔr ya nɛ mbɔɗɔnu sinɛ,
hee o yɔsɛ nɛ ya nɛ ká̧ yuwar ga.
Ɓɛɛ see-aa tɛ ga̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
er-a ɓɔna tɛ-wa.
A̧ dee mɔɔ-usi-mɔ sa nɛ o tugun bíí
nɛ tɛ o nyɛi̧a fara mɛ;
a̧ dɔma fɔ̧i̧ si nduti nu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bíí gar nɛ haya-a tɛnɛ mɛ̧tɛ̧ɛ̧-mɛ̧tɛ̧ɛ̧.
Kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara wa nɛ mbɔia,
kà bó nɛ̀ gbura naŋ nɛ nu bo na;
ŋma bíí nɛ zur ya,
kà bó nɛ̀ ɔɔ ya, bo na mbɛt.
Kanda bur guntir-wa na,
in nyak-ndárà ŋman naŋ-wa na mbɛt.
Wa bɛŋa nu goo kɔ-wa pɛ́ɗɛ́ŋ-pɛ́ɗɛ́ŋ;
ɓɛɛ wa ŋgaŋ o kusaa kɔ-wa ya nɛnɛ;
o sɔ̧ɔ̧-naŋ nyaŋa kɔ-wa duk hee ta-sawara ga,
ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee kɔ-wa ma yi hee gba-búk ga.
A̧ bembi hee nana-dila ga,
a̧ mgbimgbi hee be-dila ga mbɛt.
Kà a̧ tuɓi da̧ ba nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ baa mɔ‘i yaknɛ,
ŋma bíí mɛ ɓar mɔ‘i er-a yinɛ, bo na.
Ɓɛɛ wese'i, wa tɛ tuɓi da̧
a zu o be Juda in o be
ká'í zɔk mɔ si mbɔɗɔnu,
mɔ lɛŋ nɛ gba-tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ in dita-see,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ‘i zɔk nɛ gba-kutu nɛ kpee zu sa̧a̧mɔ hirip.
Nɛ́ ti pɛ‘i a̧ wannu Ozias fee nɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ tɛ hɔɔ-zu mi zɔk GASA WAN fara duk zu ŋma damti, ɓɛɛ nu gba-laa kɔ̧-a̧ duna so kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
O ɔmi
Ɓɛɛ wa hiɗi mɔ tɔ̧ nɛ wen sitɛ o ŋmaa'e:
«A̧ ɔ sa̧a̧, a̧ ɔ sa̧a̧, a̧ ɔ sa̧a̧,
mgbák Sa̧a̧ Wi ɓɔnsɛnɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ɛ̀nɛ̀-wí ɓɛɛ,
gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ duna nu’ɛ lɛŋ.»
Nu Tua ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ naka ŋgimbi nɛ o wi nɔ‘i hiɗi nɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Tua'i dun nɛ zi-wee.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: «Oee mi wa! Mi yɔɔ kaɗi; nú‘m de na wen mi a̧a̧ mgbara dukbíí-tɔ̧-ɗaŋ-wen, ɓɛɛ yí‘m zɔka Wannu, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.»
Ɓɛɛ ŋma
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa kɛ̧i̧-wee'i dir nɛ nú‘m, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ zɔk; mɔ'ɔ nɛ foo ndara nú-mɛ́'ɛ, ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ bia, ndiŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ foo yinɛ!»
Ɓɛɛ mi zii tiger GASA WAN nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e:
«Mi tɛ tom nɛ o?
Bíí n’ɛɛ tɛ tom nɛ o?»
Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm am.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ dukbíí‘e nde:
‹Ɛnɛ tɛ yeŋ zer'nɛ́ mɛ zii mɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka zii gba̧a̧-a̧ na;
ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ hee wan-boma-yí ga.›
Mɛ̀ dé ha̧ see dukbíí'ɛ mɛ ŋgai,
mɛ de ha̧ zer-wa mɛ kpe,
in ha̧ yí-wa mbɛt mɛ kpe,
wen ká wa tɛɛ zɔk mɔ,
in ká wa tɛɛ zii mɔ,
ká wa tɛɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔaa,
ká‘m kpasi wa.»
Ɓɛɛ mi ak mɔ:
«GASA WAN! Mɔ‘i tɛ de te ge ŋgimbi ge?»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nu ha̧‘m:
«Ŋgimbi nɛ o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ
tɛ ɗaŋ kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi,
nɛ o tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nɛ o gɛ̧ɛ̧ tua,
ɓɛɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifa duk nɛ ŋga-gbárà.»
GASA WAN tɛ ndak o bíí tɛ nu'i yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ nu'i tɛ duk sɔɔ gee,
ŋma mɔ beka bo sɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ oi bíí nɛ ɓɔna benaŋ nyɛm nɛnɛ‘i
duk hee o gasa te
oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna nɛ́ ŋginda gun-aa:
ŋginda gun-aa'i nɛ́ kpar-mɔ nɛ̀ ɔ sa̧a̧.
Duka nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi ko Ahaz bem ko Yotam, be-koo Ozias wannu Juda, in wannu Aram nɛ‘i sa'e Rɛsin, ká bá Pɛkaŋ bem ko Rɛmalia, wannu
Ɓɛɛ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i a zer o bíí nutua ko David'e nde, Aram baa Efraim. See wannu in o bíí saaye kɔ‘i ku̧u̧ naŋ naka-a hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa̧a̧-te kɔ̧ kombo nak nɛnɛ ŋgimbi nɛ búk yu nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Esaii: «Mɛ̀ kúr in bem kɔ-mɛ Sɛar-Yasub, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpá Ahaz sɛn ká̧ gɔna-yi fara-zui-yi nɛ duk ka̧ fɔ fara-fɔr-mɔ mɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧ nde: ‹Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ká tɛ-mɛ nak na; ká kíì de mɛ na, ká see-mɛ to wen zu ŋga nyimsea ko Rɛsin be Sirii in bem ko Rɛmalia na, wen wa nɛ o gee nú-wee yiitoo nɛ tur sɔɔ gee.›
Mi iŋa'e Aram in Efraim ká bá nɛ̀ bem ko Rɛmalia ee nú-wa mɛ nɛɛ bi mɛ; wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nde:
‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ́ bí Juda pi̧ nɛ kíì tɛ-a, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ ba a̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ èè bem ko Tabeɛl nɛ wannu zu nu'i.›
Ɓɛɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
‹Ee-zu-wen kɔ-wa'i beka yor na,
mɔ‘i beka de na,
wen Damas nɛ́ gasa ye zu nu Sirii,
ɓɛɛ Rɛsin nɛ wanye Damas ɓɛɛ;
Samarii nɛ gasa ye zu nu Efraim,
ɓɛɛ Pɛka nɛ wanye Samarii mbɛt ɓɛɛ;
hegɔ oi-aa ɓɔna nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi beka zii nin dukbíí Efraim ɓɔna.›
Mɔ kpɔk, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e ta nɛ‘m na,
ɛ́nɛ́ beka duk hɔ ti na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Ahaz woyo:
«Mɛ ak mɔɔ-usi-mɔ er GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, kóó mɔ‘i duka so nɛ ɗuka-a si ɗɔɔ nu mɛ, kóó mɔ‘i kusa so to yiwese mɛ.»
Ahaz kifa nú: «Weyaa! Mi beka ak mɔ na! Mi beka we GASA WAN na.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ woyo: «O bíí nutua ko David ɛnɛ zii! Dee bɔnɛ n’ɛnɛ de nɛ bíí‘i tɛ nyɛm tɛ‘nɛ́ na nde? Wen ge s’ɛnɛ kii mɛ sakali Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ge?
Kinii, mɛ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ tɛ-wi a̧ tɛ de mɔɔ-usi-mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Zɔk kinii, ŋma be-zɔŋa baa zaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ko nɛ be-wiwii, a̧ tɛ a nin-a'e Emmanuɛl.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ iŋ bɛ̧a̧ ɗaŋmɔ wen dee demɔ.
Nɛti ha̧ bem’ɛi mɛ siŋ ɗaŋmɔ pi̧ nu mɛ de nɛ demɔ‘i, nu ko o wan nɔ'ɔ yiitoo nɛ mɛ de kíí wa'i tɛ kifi nɛ geemɔ.

«GASA WAN tɛ fo ŋma ŋgamɔ tɛnɛ pii zu mɛ, pii zu dukbíí kɔ-mɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ tua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ; mɔ‘i n'aa tɛ fo tɛnɛ‘i nɛ ŋma ɗaŋ wese nɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk nɛti na, ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ Efraim kɛ̧̀ɛ̧́ nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ Juda wannu Asirii.
Wese'i GASA WAN tɛ tom
o zifa tɛnɛ nɛ sara-ku Nil, yi ko o be Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ o zi-gɔrɔ tɛ tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ nu Asirii mɛ.
Wa tɛ tɛ lɛŋ mɛ hur o gboŋgo
in o mgbara ta,
hur nɛ o kásà,
in o fara-nyɔŋmɔ ko o mɔ-dai lɛŋ.
«Wese'i, GASA WAN tɛ kpui buma tɛ-mɛ
in mui-zu-mɛ ká bá nɛ̀ zera kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ
a nu nɛ ŋma pai mɛ kúr gasa yì mɛ.
Pai'i nɛ wannu Asirii.
«Wese'i, kóó o nde
tɛ dai nana-ndai kpɔk in sami yiitoo;
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o saɗi nɔ‘i
tɛ ha̧ yibere nɛ dɔka-a ga,
oi bíí nɛ ɓɔna tɛ ye'i
tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ kaŋa-yibere in gɔrɔ.
Nɛ́ kaŋa-yibere in gɔrɔ a̧ wa tɛ dai nɛ tɛ-wa.
«Sɛn wese'i,
o de fara nɛ wa dɛma so o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛnɛ
nɛ nyɛma so mɛ ha̧ sede ha̧ wa'i
tɛ kifi nɛ o tɛn-dara in o tɛn.
O bíí tɛ kai o goo mɛ nɛɛ de gia sɛn fara'i,
wen o tɛn-dara in o tɛn da̧a̧ kpe zu wa lɛŋ.
O bíí beka nɛ zu o kaya nɛ‘i gbuta so nu sɛnɛ‘i na;
wen nɛ o tɛn-dara in o tɛn da̧a̧ kpe fara'i lɛŋ;
fara'i kifa nɛ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o ndai
in fara-dai o sami.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ bá de sɛka-ta, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yɔ́r wen’ɛ ‹Mahɛr-Salal-Has-Baz›
Ɓɛɛ mi usi sɛka-ta'i ha̧ o kpasa wi-sedaako yiitoo, Uria wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Zakarii bem ko Yeberekia.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am duka in kóò kɔ‘m, okoo-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ mɛ zɛ wese'i; a̧ baa zaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ko nɛ be-wiwii, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e, a̧‘m sa nin-a'e Kpan-nɔ-Tik-zu-mɔ,
wen nɛti ha̧ bem’ɛi mɛ iŋ saa «dáà», kóò «naa», wa tɛ kai o dɔka mɔ nɛ Damas in o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ Samarii mɛ tɛnɛ ti wannu Asirii.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m woyo:
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí'ɛ bɛ̧a̧ yi Siloe
nɛ fok nɛ ga̧a̧-a̧,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ-wa duk nak nɛnɛ nɛ kíì
wen zu Rɛsin in Pɛka bem ko Rɛmalia ga,
GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ nana-yì mɛ ha̧ hur wa,
kpe zu wa gu nɛ wannu Asirii nɛ oi ŋgayamɔ kɔ‘i,
nana-yì‘i tɛ ha̧ yak nu ŋgere;
a̧ tɛ ha̧ hur Juda lɛŋ nɛ‘i beka zɔk zu ye'i na.
Yi tɛ ha̧ ba ger-wa,
ɓɛɛ tɛ kpe zu nu kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, Emmanuɛl!»
O dukbíí, tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ nak,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ kum'nɛ́ a nu gbuɗuk!
Ɛnɛ o zika-nù mɛ nyɛi̧a fara, ɛnɛ zii,
kóó ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafi o boi-de-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́,
biro tɛ yai'nɛ́ ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ;
kóó ɛ́nɛ́ saŋa so tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ o boi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ,
wa tɛ mbɔli'nɛ́ tɛ biro'i.
Kóó ɛ́nɛ́ ee nɛ zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ndaa mɔ‘i beka tu̧ na,
kóó ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧ nɛ ŋma de wen,
gba̧a̧-wen'i tɛ gbo zan,
wen Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ in yɛɛ.
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ŋgimbi n'aa foo nɛ‘m wen ká‘m tɛɛ ba yuwar ko dukbíí'ɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ ye tɛ ɗaŋ baa keta kɔ-wa na;
mɔ nɛ wa yu, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu k’ɛ́nɛ́ na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì na mbɛt.»
Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ tu̧ tɛ-a,
nɛ́ a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a'i tɛ yu,
ɓɛɛ kana nɛ́ a̧‘i nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ zɔm-mɔ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ duk nɛ́ Sa̧a̧ Fara,
ta-kɔ̧-naŋ in fara-yo-nu
wen nutua ko Juda in
A̧ duk nɛ sak in pɛ́r mbɛt
ha̧ o wi Jerusalɛm.
Dɔka bíí tɛ kɔ̧ naŋ nɛ ta'i;
wa tɛ tir a nu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gbin.
Pɛ́r tɛ ba wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai wa
yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro.
Mi dee sedaako hɔɔ-zu in usamɔ ha̧ o ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m; mɔ‘i nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ usa ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi mbo nú-wa ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ ɓɔn kɔ̧ see-wa.
Mi zɛm nɛ GASA WAN nɛ zik ɗoŋ e ha̧ o be nutua ko Jakob'i, wen mi e ta nɛ a̧.
Mi in o bem nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ha̧‘m, ɛ́ɛ́ ya nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ zu mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ hɔ zu
Ɓɛɛ kà wa nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e nde: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k o wi-sa-sɔ̧-fio, koo nɛ o wi-a-tani nɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ ɗɔɔ nu. Bo nɛ dukbíí zaŋnu’ɛ tɛ kii nɛ sɔ̧ kɔ‘i in sɔ̧-fio wen zu o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ ya kpasa na nde?»
Kà wa nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nú‘e nde: «Nɛ́ tɛ usamɔ in sedaako ko Sɔ̧ a'i tɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛnɛ ɛ̧.» Wi nɛ kpɛk wen'i na beka zɔk gɔna-ndaa-zan na.
Tɛ yara-a tɛ nu'i
mɔ tɛ ba tɛ-wa nyɛmna
in kaɓa tɛ ba wa mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wɔ be tɛɛ gbɛ wa
a̧ see-wa tɛ ɗaŋ nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa foma wannu in Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Wa tɛ ba yí-wa mɛ zɔk mɔ si ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ kà wa zɔk mɔ si ɗɔɔ,
mɔ nɛ wa tɛ zɔk'i nɛ gasa bɔnɛ,
zɔm tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧ in tu̧u̧-see!
Kinii tum bo zu nu
nɛ duka so zaŋ bɔnɛ-dita-see ɓɔna,
wen tɛ kuti ŋgimbi,
GASA WAN dee so ha̧ foe
mɛ ba nu ko Zabulɔŋ in Nɛftalii.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ tɛ‘i,
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in zɔnamɔ
mɛ duk zu o ye si war nu gba-tɔp
si kur Jurdɛn nu Galilee mɛ,
fara ko o gɔni-duk.
Dukbíí nɛ duka so zaŋ tum
zɔka gasa sa̧a̧mɔ,
o bíí nɛ yaa so ti tum
in ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-fio zɔka sa̧a̧mɔ.
Ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ desee ha̧ wa gan kuti-a,
bíí zɔka tortɛ nɛ wa de'i.
Wa de nɛ nyɛŋɛ ti'nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí de nɛ nyɛŋɛ ŋgimbi-mɔi-nyɔnɔ'ɛ ga,
kana hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de nɛ tortɛ
wese kɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ er ŋmaa’ɛ ga.
Kpáŋá nɛ duka so mɛ diti a̧'ɛ,
zɔm gasa mboɗa boi nɛ duka so zu kóŋgó-ɓaa-a'i,
in nyasi ko wan-nasi a̧‘i,
ɛnɛ gbina mɔɔ nɔ‘i a nu
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ gbina so nɛ o boi ko o bíí Madiaŋ ga.
O ŋga ndárá-de-biro lɛŋ,
gu nɛ o gasa laa nɛ duna nɛ tɔk lɛŋ,
wa dɔɔ nɛ wee.
Wen wa koo ŋma bem h’ɛ́ɛ́,
bem’ɛi nɛ be-wiwii.
Mɔɔ-wan lɛŋ duk zu koŋgó-ɓaa-a;
nin nɛ wa aa ha̧ a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
De wan-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ,
Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai,
dáà nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, Wan ko ga̧a̧mɔ.
Mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gasi, ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ duk hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ
zu damti mɔɔ-wan ko David n'aa ɗafa,
wen kpaa ŋgai tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in kpasawen,
ku̧u̧naŋ-a kinii hegɔɔ yaknɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nɛ́ tɛ gasa
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ mɔ‘i tɛ de nɛnɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋma wen zu Jakob,
ɓɛɛ wen'i tik zu
Dukbíí nɛ oi gun lɛŋ tɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ de'i.
Efraim in o bíí Samarii lɛŋ
nɛ duk-tɛ nɛ ŋmaŋa-tɛ kɔ‘i tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«O mboo tua nɔ'ɔ gbina a nu,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ mbo mbe-a nɛ o ŋga ta.
O te-mbɔra
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ gun nɛ o
GASA WAN dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ kur zu wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a wen ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i mɛ sɛn wa.
Aram duka kɔ‘i nɛ war daŋa-wese,
o be Filistii duk kɔ‘i nɛ ɗoŋ-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ nasi
Tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ,
nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ga̧ na.
See-aa ɓɔna kana tɛ kura-a zu wa.
Zu mɔ‘i, dukbíí pii ɗoŋ
tɛ wi nɛ gusa wa'i na;
wa kii mɛ iŋ GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ na.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ nɛ GASA WAN
ɓira zu
ɓɛɛ tɛ kale kpɔk wese'i,
a̧ gɔna ndɛŋgɛ in toro mbɛt.
O
O wi-duk-ti ko dukbíí nɔ'ɔ
usi yuwar ha̧ wa nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ na,
ɓɛɛ sa o wi nɔ'ɔ yɔ.
Mɛ nɛ wen mɔ‘i
a̧ GASA WAN beka de ko
ha̧ o daŋa-ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa na.
A̧ beka de ko ha̧ o be-oi
in o ko-gera na mbɛt,
wen wa lɛŋ nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Mɔ nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa lɛŋ nɛ ɗaŋ wen-búù;
ɓɛɛ zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ga̧ na,
see-aa ɓɔna kana tɛ kura-a zu wa.
Dee ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ duk
hee wee nɛ dɔ o tɛn-dara in o tɛn,
ká bá nɛ̀ da̧a̧ kombo’ɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ wi nyɛma zɔka zi-wee-aa fara daŋa-a.
Ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ dee
ha̧ nu lɛŋ mɛ bíí wee.
Wee'i tɛ dɔ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ.
Ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ iŋ‘e ɛ̧ɛ̧ wi’ɛ
nɛ́ nya kɔ‘i bo na.
Kà‘i gɔn mur-tɛ nya-a̧‘i mɛ wiiko nyɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ wɔ kaɗi na;
kà‘i gɔn mɛ gale nyɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ zaŋ-wi sur na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde tɛɛ zik tɛ
nyɔŋ nɛ tɛ-wi nɛ tɛ-wi woyo.
Manase nyɔŋa Efraim gur nɛ kpasa,
ɓɛɛ Efraim tɛɛ tik zu Manase nyɔŋ a̧ gur nɛ kpasa,
ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo lɛŋ tɛɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa tik zu Juda.
Zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ga̧ na;
see-aa ɓɔna kana tɛ kura-a zu wa.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi ha̧ ɗaŋ heembea,
geŋa nɛ yɔr o ɗaŋ geŋa
wen usa bɔnɛ ha̧ o bíí.
Wa kɔ̧ gɔna kita zu o wisan nɛ yuwar-a na,
ɓɛɛ wa kai nɛ mɔ ko o wisan
nɛ duk mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m yinɛ;
o ko-gera nɛ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa.
Wa kai nɛ mɔ nɛ ŋgai er o be-oi.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ de hee ge wese kita ge nde?
Ŋgimbi nɛ bɔnɛ tɛ hɔ nɛnɛ‘i,
bíí n’ɛnɛ tɛ yu mɔ sitɛ a̧ mɛ gu ɗoŋ-aa nɛ o?
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ a o kpaamɔ nɔ‘i k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i dee?
Oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna wen wa nɛ guu nu mgbara o bara,
in tika-a mgbara o wi nɛ wa tɛ gbɛ.
Ɓɛɛ zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ, nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ga̧ na,
see-aa ɓɔna kana tɛ kura-a zu wa.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi Asirii
nɛ duk nɛ ŋga nyasi kɔ‘m;
wen nyasi nɛ duk er-a'i nɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ tom a̧ si zu o ɗaŋ tugun bíí
nɛ aŋ nyimsea kɔ‘m a ŋgɔn
wen ha̧ dukbíí‘i mɛ ɗaŋ o mɔ kɔ-wa kai yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa i̧sa̧ wa nɛ naŋ gɔn rɔ́kɔ́tɔ́-rɔ́kɔ́tɔ́ hee ɓɔtɛ yuwar ga.
Ɓɛɛ taamɔ ko wannu Asirii bo a̧‘i na,
bo nɛ a̧ taa so mɔ kɔ̧ see-aa hegɔ na;
a̧ taa so kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kum
nɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ a nu,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ o gasawi kɔ‘m lɛŋ
nɛ o wannu na nde?
Bo nɛ Kalno kifa duk hee Karkɛmis ga na?
Hamat bo hee Arpad ga,
ɓɛɛ Samarii kifi duk hee Damas mbɛt ga na nde?
Kà er-am nɛ kpaa ŋgai zu o dukbíí nɛ mboo so o géé-sɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ o sɛka-mɔ kɔ-wa gana war ko Jerusalɛm in Samarii,
bo nɛ mi tɛ ɗaŋ Jerusalɛm
in o sɛka-mɔ kɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ɗaŋa so
nɛ Samarii in o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧'ɛ ga na.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN be tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi tom kɔ‘i zu kaya
wen n'aa duk-tɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mi de mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ tɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m
in tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m;
wen mi nɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ;
mi ɗaŋa gbisi ko o dukbíí,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am kaia o kpaamɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgai tɛ‘m,
mi gbo o wannu kɔ-wa a nu.
Mi kaia o mbɔi ko o dukbíí
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ba nɛ tua-nɔ̧́í̧'ɛ ga,
kóó hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i kai nɛ o kui-nɔ́í
nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ gbonɛ'ɛ ga.
Mi ɗaŋa mɔ zu nu yinɛ lɛŋ
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí mɛ fo mɔ
kóó mɛ́ hú̧í̧ nú tɔ̧́ wen, bó na.»
GASA WAN'e nde,
kpi̧i̧ tɛ́ zɔ̀n tɛ̀ zu bíí
nɛ ba a̧ de nɛ tom nde?
Mɔɔ-gɔn-mɔ tɛ gasi zu
in wi nɛ ba a̧ gɔn nɛ mɔ nde?
Nɛ nyasi a̧ ba er-wi
nɛ ba a̧ gusi nɛ mɔ nde?
So nɛ te a̧ usi war ha̧ wi-tui-a?
Kóó so nɛ dɔra a̧ ba bíí yar nɛnɛ nde?
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ nɛ GASA WAN,
Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ tom ɔ̧ki̧
pii zu o ŋmaŋa-wi kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ kɛ̧i̧-wee tɛ nyɔŋ ɗɔɔ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naa-wan-wee nyɔŋ nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ ko
tɛ kifi nɛ wee nɛ tɛ dɔ
o tɛn in o tɛn-dara a nu tɛ wese kpɔk.
O de kombo in o de te tɛ bìì wee ɗaŋ lɛŋ ŋgɛrɛm-ŋgɛrɛm
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zɛɛ ɗaŋ nɛ bíí'ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ oi o te nɛ tɛ ɓɔn kɔ̧ kombo,
tɔra wa beka ŋgai na,
kóó nɛ be geɗek obem tikiɗi nyɛma mɛ tɔr wa.
Wese'i, oi o be
O oi bíí ko Jakob tɛ pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ Sɔ̧ Waŋ-ŋgai.
, kóó dukbíí kɔ-mɛ dɔka hee nyɛmɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp ga, nɛ́ o bíí tikiɗi a̧ tɛ kpasi ɓɛɛ. GASA WAN ee zu mɔ mɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ wen ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ee-zu ɗaŋa wa nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ea'i, a̧ tɛ de kana mɔ‘i dam nu'i lɛŋ.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧‘e nde: «Dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ ɔ sɛn
Oi-aa ɓɔna benaŋ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m tika zu a̧ mɛ ɗaŋ a̧ yinɛ.»
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ gusi o be Asirii hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa gusa so nɛ o be Madiaŋ zu ta Orɛb ɓeemɛ ga, in a̧ tɛ ba te kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgɔn zu tɔp hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa baa so nɛnɛ zu Egiptɛ ga.
Wese'i, tui kɔ̧-a̧ beka diti zu ɓaa-mɛ
in mɔɔ-ba-tui kɔ̧-a̧ beka diti
gun ger-mɛ na mbɛt.
Wisɛn yaka nɛɛ hɔ Ayat;
a̧ kuu Migrɔŋ sɛn Mikmas,
ɓɛɛ a̧ á o ŋma wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ hi̧i̧!
Wa gbara nɛ kɔ̧ ɓɔ̧ɔ̧ŋ yuwar tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa kai ŋmaa ɔ sɛn Geba.
Kíì baa o wi Rama,
ɓɛɛ o bíí ko wannu Saul
nɛ ɔ Gibea yu mɔ pɛsi yak.
Bat-Galim hiɗi nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ Laisa zii tiger-a.
Anatot, mɛ̀ kífì nú!
Madmɛna yuu mɔ,
ɓɛɛ o bíí Gebim pɛsi yu mɔ yak mbɛt.
Sɔsɔɔ, wa tɛ yor sɛn Nɔb;
wa tɛ ba er-wa nɛ ŋgɔn zu kaya
nɛ duk nɛ kaya Jerusalɛm.
Kinii GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
pɔi o gbaa-er-te a nu,
a̧ tɛ gɔm o tɛ nɛ ɔ kusa
in o zɔm kusa-a mbɛt a nu,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pɔia o da̧a̧-mɔ a nu lɛŋ nɛ ada.
Libaŋ in demɔ kɔ‘i tɛ ɗaŋ lɛŋ.
Be te tɛ gbo nɛ gun Jɛse,
ɓɛɛ kunin-te'i tɛ gbai nɛ de-a.
Tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ usa mɔ
ha̧ o bíí mɛ yu GASA WAN;
a̧ beka gɔn kita zu bíí nɛ nú-tum na.
A̧ beka tɔ̧ mɔ n'aa zii tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧ nɛnɛ na.
A̧ tɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ o bíí nɛ zɔk bɔnɛ;
a̧ tɛ gɔn kita ko o wi-kɔsa zaŋnu’ɛ nɛ yuwar-a.
Wen mɛ nú-a tɛ duk nɛ nyasi-gusi o bíí tɛ nu'i,
búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-gbɛ o wi-ɗaŋ.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ mɔɔ-mar guntir-aa;
deemɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea nɛ́ kanda-hɛr-zaŋ kɔ̧-a̧.
Gbóò tɛ duk kpɔk in
ɓɛɛ gɔ̧ tɛ ɔ kpɔk fara in o be-gbadua mbɛt.
Be-ndai tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in be-dila,
ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ ŋma geɗek bem a̧ tɛ dai wa nɛnɛ.
Ndai in baŋgiiɗoŋ
o bem kɔ-wa tɛ ɔ katɛ ŋmaa;
dila in ndai tɛ nyɔŋ zɔ̧.
Be zɔɗi-bem tɛ de saa sɛn nu kɔ̧ ko firi;
o bem tɛ pi̧ er kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko kóró mbɛt.
Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kóó ŋgamɔ beka bo zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m na,
wen kinii nu lɛŋ duna nɛ iŋamɔ ko GASA WAN,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ gba-tɔp mɔi̧ nɛ o nana-yì a ɗɔɔ a̧'ɛ ga.
Wese'i, bezaŋ Jɛse tɛ kur yor
nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ ha̧ o dukbíí zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ;
tugun bíí tɛ kii a̧,
ɓɛɛ fara kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ zɔm gasamɔ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, GASA WAN tɛ ba er nɛ ŋgɔn war yiitoo-aa woyo
mɛ gbo o oi bíí kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ ɓɔna tɛ bara er Asirii in Egiptɛ,
ká bá nɛ̀ Patros, Kus, Elam, Sinɛar,
Hamat in o wan mɛ see-kisi ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.
A̧ tɛ de mɔɔ-usi-mɔ ha̧ o tugun bíí,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mɔi̧ o be
nɛ wa kaia so nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ
in o be Juda nɛ pɛsa so
dam mgbii-zan naar lɛŋ piiɗoŋ mbɛt.
Aa-see-mɔ ko Efraim tɛ kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ o wisɛn ko Juda tɛ kum lɛŋ.
Efraim beka a see mɔ ko Juda ɓɔna,
in Juda beka sɛn Efraim ɓɔna mbɛt.
Wa tɛ tir si zu o be Filistii mɛ yee-wese,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai o kpaamɔ ko o be-daŋa-wese.
Wa tɛ usi ŋgai kɔ-wa zu Edɔm in Mɔab,
ɓɛɛ o be Amɔŋ tɛ mbo zu ha̧ wa.
GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ zɔm yi Egiptɛ mɛ ɔ̧sa̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ nyɛi̧ er-a zu nana-yì Efrat.
Ŋgai ko búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a tɛ de
ha̧ yi'i mɛ kɛ̧ gba tɛ fara mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ ku yi'i nɛ oi ndárà naŋ-wa.
Ŋma yuwar tɛ gbo wen oi dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ɓɔna sɛn Asirii,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
kpaa nɛ yuwar ɓeemɛ
tɛ ŋgimbi gboa-a kɔ-wa sɛn nu Egiptɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ wese'i nde:
«Osoko, GASA WAN,
wen see'nɛ́ nyima so zu'm,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧‘m.
«Ɛnɛ zɔk, Sɔ̧ Wan-kpas'am,
mi e ta nɛ ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ kíì de'm na,
wen ŋgai kɔ‘m in gima kɔ‘m,
nɛ́ GASA WAN;
a̧ nɛ Wan-kpas'am.»
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɗu yi-kpasi-bíí
nɛ̀ ɔ̧sa̧ na nɛ desee.
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ wese'i'e nde:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n nin-a,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ o gasamɔ
nɛ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ o dukbíí;
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e, nin-a ɔ gasa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ Sɔ̧ wen a̧ dee gasamɔ,
wen ha'i mɛ iŋ dam zu nu’ɛ lɛŋ.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ desee in tortɛ, ɛnɛ o wi
wen a̧ ɔ gasa mgbara'nɛ́;
a̧ nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Wen ko GASA WAN zu Babilɔŋ, nɛ Esaii bem ko Amɔs ɔɔ zu zɔk nɛnɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔɔ-usi-mɔ
zu kaya nɛ mɔ bo sɛnɛ na,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáí mɔ biro;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ áŋ er'nɛ́ ha̧ wa gar pii nu tua ko o be-wan.
Kɔ‘m, mi ha̧ nɛ heembea kɔ‘m
ha̧ o sa̧a̧ wi-biro kɔ‘m,
in o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ‘m n'am hoka.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí gasa gitimɔ zu kaya mɛ
hee tiger o gba giiwi ga;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí o dukbíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ wor mɔ‘i;
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
a̧ ɓir yak ti ha̧ o wi-biro kɔ‘i wen biro.
Wa tɛ́ nɛ nyɛi̧a nu mɛ,
nɛ ndaa-zan mɛ nɛ oi o mɔɔ-biro
ha̧ wa mɛ ya in GASA WAN,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ ɗaŋ nu lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ tɛ‘nɛ́
wen wese ko GASA WAN hɛɗa kaɗi,
wese'i tɛ tɛ hee wese
ko Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ga.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ
sa ɓaa bíí lɛŋ tɛ mɔk;
nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi beka bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Bele zara wa a nu,
ɓɛɛ wa bi nɛ mbɔɗɔnu
hee naa-zaŋ nɛ hɛɗa mɛ ko bem ga.
Wa zika tɛ zɔk yí ŋmaa in o ŋmaa nɛ kíì,
ɓɛɛ yí-wa gbɛ̧ kerere hee wee ga.
Wese ko GASA WAN a̧ tɛ‘i,
wese'i nɛ ŋga wese nyimsea in ŋgamɔ,
nɛ́ wese n'aa tɛ de ha̧ zaŋnu mɛ kifi ŋga-gbárà,
in ha̧ a̧ mɛ kum o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ yinɛ.
O sɔra mɛ yiwese in o zuduk-aa beka tok ɓɔna;
wese tɛ daŋ, ɓɛɛ baa tum;
nyaŋa-zɛ beka tok ɓɔna.
«Mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o bíí zaŋnu,
wen ɗaŋ kɔ-wa,
in ha̧ o wi-ɗaŋ,
wen gbɛɛ-zu kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋmaŋa-tɛ
ko o wi-tɔ̧-ɗaŋ-wen mɛ hɔ nduti,
ɓɛɛ duka-tɛ ko o wi-ŋgazu tɛ kaɗi.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí mɛ ɓan
hee fuu lɔr mɛ Ofir ga.»
Wese nɛ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ be tɛɛ ba,
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ yiwese mɛ nak,
in ha̧ nu mbɛt mɛ fo mɔ hɔ gun-aa mɛ.
Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ wese kura-see kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ wese'i,
o bíí tɛ duk hee ŋma kalamba a'i ndak ga,
wa tɛ duk hee ŋma duk sami
nɛ pɛsa sót-sót dam ti mɔ ga.
Kóó o nde tɛ si ɗoŋ sitɛ dukbíí kɔ‘i,
kóó o nde tɛ yu mɔ si mgbák nu kɔ‘i.
Bíí lɛŋ nɛ‘i tɛ kpa,
wi tɛ tok wa tok nɛ sɛɛ;
ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ‘i tɛ kai,
wi tɛ gɔm wa nɛ gba-paa.
Wa tɛ mbɔli o bem kɔ-wa ɓɔn yí-wa,
wa tɛ kai o mɔɔ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa yaknɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wa ɔɔ in o kóó kɔ-wa mbɛt.
«Mi tɛ de ha̧ o wi Mɛd
nɛ bo nɛ wɔ sede na,
nɛ e lɔr tɛ geemɔ mɛ de ŋmaa in wa.
Wa tɛ gbɛ o be-ŋgaiwi lɛŋ nɛ goo,
ká bá nɛ̀ o bezaŋ.
Ko beka bo yí-wa ha̧ o zɔɗi bem na mbɛt.»
Babilɔŋ nɛ dee gan o dɔka nu lɛŋ,
nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ duk nɛ mɔɔ-duk-tɛ ko o be Kaldee.
Sɔ̧ tɛ ɗaŋ a̧ hee Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr ga.
Babilɔŋ tɛ kifi duk nɛ bɛɛ-oi
nɛ o bíí beka ɔ sɛnɛ ɓɔna kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O Arab beka de tua-laa kɔ-wa hi̧i̧
kà bó nɛ̀ yora-a ko o wi-dai-mɔ hi̧i̧ na mbɛt.
Nɛ o kóŋgóló-dɔmɔ a̧ tɛ ya hi̧i̧,
ɓɛɛ o diri tɛ dun tua lɛŋ.
O ndao tɛ ya hi̧i̧,
ɓɛɛ o gbadua-zaŋbɛɛ tɛ kpíɗí zaŋgule hi̧i̧.
O ɓoŋgo tɛ mɔi̧ si kɔ̧ o gasa tua kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ o gbóò tɛ yar nɛ kɔ̧ o gasa tua nɔ‘i;
ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ tɛ‘i,
zɛ kɔ̧-a̧ dɔk ɓɔna.
GASA WAN tɛ de ko ha̧ Jakob, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ hok
O ŋma dukbíí tɛ kpɛk mɛ kai o be
mɛ tɛ bìì gima’ɛ zu wannu Babilɔŋ:
Ŋga-wi dee bɔɔ hee ge kinii’ɛ ge?
Ŋga-wi kifa geemɔ!
GASA WAN gbina nyasi
ko o wi-ɗaŋ in te ko o wi-duk-zu bíí.
Ŋga-wi duka so usi nɛ bɔnɛ
ha̧ o bíí mbɛr nɛ wa nɛ ŋga nyimsea,
nɛ ko bo na, de nɛ ŋgamɔ in wa.
Ɓɛɛ nu lɛŋ duk kɔ‘i sɛ́ɛ́m
hiɗi nɛ mɔ nɛ desee.
O
«Dika nɛ mɛ yee nɛ ɗɔɔ nu,
ŋma bíí tɛ mɛ gɔm yɛ ɓɔna.»
Fara ko o fio ɗɔɔ nu mɛ fo nɛ tɛ,
mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɛk mɛ;
a̧ tuna o ŋga-wi nɛ fee so,
ɓɛɛ o wan ko o dukbíí nɛ fee so
kura ŋgɔn zu damti kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ a nú tɛ wen'e nde:
«Oo nɛ mɛ'ɛ tɛɛ kpa yɛ'ɛ?
Ɛɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in mɛɛ kinii kaɗi!»
Mɔɔ-wan kɔ-mɛ in koloŋ nɛ wa mbɛr so,
bíí nɛ gima ha̧ mɛ'ɛ zira
si fara ko o fio mɛ kaɗi;
o dɔk mɔi̧a ŋmaa mboɗi tɛ-mɛ ɓɛɛ kpe zu mɛ.
Wannu Babilɔŋ, mɛ duk so kɔ-mɛ
tok nɛnɛ hee sɔra ga;
dee hee ge sa wa baa mɛ gɔn pi̧ taŋ pii mbɔɗɔnu’ɛ ge?
Mɛ yaa-gan so o tugun bíí'ɛ!
Mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e, wi tɛ daŋ si yiwese mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi ɔɔ wan si ŋgɔn zu o sɔra nɛ Sɔ̧ dea;
wi tɛ ɗafi damti kɔ‘i
nɛ́ɛ̀ e zu kaya fara mɔi̧a-a nɛ war zu-zan mɛ;
wi tɛ daŋ duk zu tu̧-zan,
wen ha'i mɛ hɔ ŋmaa in
Wan nɛ duk kɔ‘i ŋgɔn mɛ‘i’ɛ.
Dee bɔɔ hee ge sa mɛ zira
si fara ko o fio kɔ̧ ɗuka kɔ̧ mɛ‘i ge?
O wi nɛ mbaɗi mɛ
ta nɛ mɔ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Wi’ɛ nɛ dee so
ha̧ nù mɛ nak, ɗaŋ nɛ o wan,
de so nɛnɛ ha̧ nu mɛ kifi ŋga-gbárà,
in ha̧ o ye kɔ-wa mɛ ɗaŋ kifi bɛɛ-oi,
wi’ɛ nɛ kɔ̧ so mɛ gbo
o wi-zɔɓɔ na’ɛ, nɛ mɛ nde?»
O wannu ko o tugun bíí nɛ fee so lɛŋ ɔm nɛ tɛ,
kóó o nde kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war kɔ-mɛ,
wa pi̧i̧ mɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ pɛsi-fio kɔ-mɛ,
hee ŋma ndiŋmɔ ga;
hee o wi nɛ wa gbɛɛ nɛ gba-paa ga,
hee gee fio-mɔ ga;
wa siŋa mɛ pi̧ zu sɔkɔr-ta
hee ŋma ɗaŋ wɔr-mɔ mɛ i̧si̧ ga.
Mɛ beka ndaɗi in wa kɔ̧ pɛsi ɓɔna,
wen mɛ ɗaŋa so nu kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ kum dukbíí kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ;
wi beka'i zii nin pɛrti
o wi-ɗaŋ hegɔ ɓɔna ndo ndo ndo.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí war mɛ kum o bem lɛŋ
wen zu ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà kɔ-wa,
wen ká wa tɛɛ kur mɛ bi nu,
de nɛ ye, nyɛɓi nɛnɛ dam zu nu’ɛ ɓɔna.
«Mi tɛ misi̧ in wa, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ! Mi tɛ ɗaŋ nin Babilɔŋ in oi o bíí yinɛ, bezaŋ beka bo na, pɛ́r-nam kɔ-wa beka bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Fara kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ yí-ɓɔtɛ in fara-yar ko desa; mi tɛ mbii Babilɔŋ nɛ gbɛ̧; GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ!»
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
kana mɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
«Mɔ‘i n'am taa so'i tɛ de kana;
mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ Asirii yinɛ tɛ nu kɔ‘m,
mi tɛ mbɔli a̧ zu o kaya kɔ‘m.
Mɔɔ-ba-tui kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yu zu o bíí kɔ‘m,
tui beka duk zu kóŋgó-ɓaa ɓɔna.»
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN taa mɛ de zu nu’ɛ lɛŋ,
in ŋgamɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de in o tugun bíí lɛŋ a̧‘i.
Kà GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ ee zu mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ o'o tɛ ɗaŋ ee-zu-mɔ‘i o?
Kà a̧ nɛ nyɛi̧a er-a,
ɓɛɛ nɛ o'o tɛ dak er-a'i si ɗoŋ o?
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋgimbi fio ko wannu Ahaz nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Ɛnɛ o be Filistii lɛŋ,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de nyɛŋɛ wen nɛ nyasi
nɛ usi so bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ gbina na;
wen kà ŋma gɔ́k fe,
ɓɛɛ kui gɔ́k'i tɛ mbaŋ nɛ ndiɓa nɛ bu̧i bu̧i.
O wi-kɔsa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ tɛ kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ o wisan ɔma tɛ̀ nɛ̀ de-a.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ-mɛ mɛ zɔk bɔnɛ-wɔ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ gbɛ o oi-aa nɛ tɛ ɓɔn.
Nu tua, mɛ̀ áí nú ŋgaɓo,
ye, mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ!
O be Filistii lɛŋ,
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ nak nɛ kíì!
Wen zi-wee tɛ kur nɛ zu-zan mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ yor ti o dɔka wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ bo na.
Wi tɛ kifi nú ha̧ o betom
nɛ tɛɛ nɛ Filistii, hee ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ mboo
wen ha̧ o wisan mgbara dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ ya si ɗɔɔ nɛ ga̧a̧-a̧ mɛ ya nɛ de-a.
Wen nɛ tɔ̧a̧ zu Mɔab nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Saaye Ar-Mɔab kifa geemɔ,
mɛ zaŋzɛ nɛ wa bìí nɛ a̧.
Kir-Mɔab kifa geemɔ mbɛt,
zaŋzɛ nɛ wa bìí nɛ a̧.
Wa daŋa si kɔ̧ tua ko Dibɔŋ
zu kusa-fara mɛ wen hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧,
zu Nɛbo in Mɛdɛba, wen Mɔab kifa geemɔ kaɗi;
wa kpuia zu o bíí in zera kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ.
O bíí lɛŋ a nɛ laa bufu tɛ
ya nɛnɛ ká̧ yuwar;
o ŋma ya zu tua hiɗi nɛ mɔ dam fara lɛŋ,
ai nɛ nu hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Hɛsbɔŋ in Eleale hiɗi nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi zii ger-wa hɔ Yahas mɛ.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa o wi-biro
ko Mɔab hiɗi mɔ mbɛt,
wen nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi bo tɛ-wa ɓɔna.
See-am ɔ dita zu Mɔab,
wen o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ yuu mɔ yak si Sɔr,
Eglat in Sɛlisiyal.
Wa ba nɛ ká̧ ŋgere Luh hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧,
hiɗi nɛ mɔ beel-beel
nɛ yuwar Horonaim yaknɛ.
Yi-Nimim ɔ̧sa̧ kor lɛŋ,
o zɔ̧ kora, ɓɛɛ hɔ ɓɔna,
gee wa̧a̧-te bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa wa kai
o demɔ in o mɔ kɔ-wa si kur be-zer ko o gasa te mɛ.
Hiɗimɔ‘i zik nɛ nu Mɔab,
ɓɛɛ wi zii
hɔ sɛn Eglayim, in Bɛr-Elim mɛ.
O yi Dibɔŋ lɛŋ duna nɛ tɔk.
«Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋma ŋgamɔ woyo zu Dibɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tom dila si zu o be Mɔab
nɛ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa,
in o oi bíí nɛ ɓɔna tɛ nu'i.»
«O be Mɔab, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm
O boko be Mɔab tɛ bu̧i̧
nɛ nu horo Arnɔŋ hee o nɔ̧́í̧
nɛ‘i ndaka kɔ̧ yaa kɔ-wa yinɛ
nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ tua na ga.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Mɔab aka Jerusalɛm:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mbɔrɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in yɛɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé zu yɛ nɛ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ‘nɛ́
hee gi̧ɔ̧-te mɛ wese ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ ndaa o wi nɛ pɛsa,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ usi oi o wi-yu-mɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ o be Mɔab mɛ yu mɔ,
mɛ ɔ tɛ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór ɗoŋ wa,
wen o wi-gbɛ-wa,
wen ŋgimbi nɛ dee ŋgamɔ be tɛɛ kaɗi,
o wi-dea-a tɛ kaɗi mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ wi-de-ŋgayamɔ zu nu'i tɛ yambali mbɛt.
Damti'i tɛ kpa ŋgai tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ;
wi’ɛi tɛ ɔ wan zu damti ko David nɛ see kpɔk,
a̧ tɛ duk nɛ bíí nɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a.»
Ɛɛ zia so nyɛrɛ ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko Mɔab,
ŋmaŋa-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ yaka zale,
ŋga-see, gɔɔ-tɛ in ŋgazu,
mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ geemɔ.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa o be Mɔab
ai nú wen zu Mɔab;
wa lɛŋ ai nɛ nú
wen ha̧na waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ Kir-Hɛrɛs;
wa ya bembi nɛnɛ nɛ ɗaŋsee.
O fɔ mɛ Hɛsbɔŋ kora ɗaŋ lɛŋ,
o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Sibna nɛ
o wannu duka so nɔ gbɛ nɛ wa ɗaŋa.
O nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ yuu so hɔ Yazɛr,
ɓɛɛ gbaa-er-wa yu hɔ ŋga-gbárà mɛ
yaknɛ hɔ kur gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.
Mi mbɛt, mi hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ in Yazɛr
nɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ wen zu fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Sibna.
Miikɔ̧a kɔ‘m foka a zu Hɛsbɔŋ in Eleale,
wen wi zii
zu mɔi̧a nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
in ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Desee in tortɛ bo sɛn kpɛɛfɔ ɓɔna,
bíí beka hiɗi mɔ bíí nɛ gima
kpɛɛfɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na;
bíí beka vati dɔ̧ɔ̧
kɔ̧ mɔɔ-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓɔna,
Mi ta mɔ nɛ tu̧u̧-see wen zu Mɔab;
nyak zaŋ-am nɔ̧́í̧ hee nyak koloŋ ga,
ɓɛɛ mi gɔfi nɛ mɔ wen zu Kir-Hɛrɛs.
Mɔab pɔkɔsa tɛ nɛa-a
sitɛ kusa-fara mɛ,
mɛ nɛɛ ai nú kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ fara kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i gan a̧.
Mɔ‘i nɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛti ɓeemɛ zu Mɔab.
Kinii, GASA WAN'e nde: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ bíí tɔ̧ nɛ́ ŋgimbi é nɛ̀ nú in ŋmaa wen dee tom ga, zaŋ pɛ taar ŋgai ko Mɔab nɛ oi gba giiwi kɔ‘i tɛ gbɔsi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na a̧ tɛ ɓɔn.»
Wen nɛ tɔ̧a̧ zu Damas nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Damas beka duk nɛ ye ɓɔna;
a̧ tɛ kifi nɛ́ gee bɛɛ-oi.
O be ye mɛ katɛ a̧ lɛŋ tɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi,
fara'i tɛ kifi duk nɛ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o ndai.
Wa tɛ ɔm tɛ-wa hi̧i̧
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí beka ndak wa na.
O ŋga tua lɛŋ nɛ ya sɛn Efraim
tɛ ɗaŋ in mɔɔ-wan ko Damas mbɛt;
bíí tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ oi o bezaŋ Aram
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa usa so ha̧ o be
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ hegɔ.
Ŋgai ko Jakob tɛ kaɗi wese'i;
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ̧k nɛ oi ŋmaŋi kɔ̧-a̧‘i.
Wese'i tɛ duk hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gbin nɛ kan-te mboŋgo,
ɓɛɛ wi nuka kiitɛ-a’ɛ ga,
kóó hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i pɛfi
nɛ gba̧a̧ fon mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ Refaim’ɛ ga.
O oi bíí tɛ ɓɔn,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ɓi nɛ waya-te-nɔ̧́
ɓɛɛ ká o waya-a ɓɔna kɔ̧ te-a’ɛ ga:
o waya-a yiitoo kóó taar ɓɔna kɔ̧ te-a,
koo waya-a naar kóó mɔɔrɔ ɓɔna kɔ̧ gbaa-er-a’ɛ ga.
Mɛ nɛ mi GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
Sɔ̧ ko
Wese'i bíí tɛ zik tɛ mɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ Wi-de-a, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
ɓɛɛ a̧ beka zɔk mɔ si o fara-dɔ-ha̧a̧mɔ n'aa dee nɛ er-a ɓɔna; a̧ beka mbaɗi mɔ n'aa dee nɛ er-a hee o sɛka-te nɛ duk nɛ sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, in fara-dɔ-fuu-nyama na.
Wese'i, o bíí tɛ gbin e ye kɔ-mɛ duk hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be Amɔŋ in o be Hiv dee so ti o be
in Kam-ta ɛk tɛ-mɛ mbɛt!
Wen mɛ duka mɛ gun nɛ de te,
ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔ‘i mɛ guna te ko o gɔni-duk.
Wese nɛ mɛ guna nɛ wa,
a̧ mɛ dee ha̧ wa gasi nɛnɛ,
kà mɔ tɛ sa̧ mɛ tutuyɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ do;
kà ŋgimbi-mɔi̧-nyɔnɔ tɛ hɔ,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ yambali lɛŋ,
e nɛ ŋga nyimmɔ nɛ nyina-a bo na.
Ho! Oi zɔm tiger o gba giiwi nɛ de mɔ tɛnɛ
hee giti som gba-tɔp ga!
Giti naŋ o tugun bíí nɔ̧́í̧ tɛnɛ
hee nana-yì nɛ fok nɛ ŋgai ga!
O tugun bíí mgbimgbi hee nana-yì ga!
A̧ de nɛ ŋmaa in wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak wa pɛsi nduɗɛɛ,
hee fuunu zu kaya mɛ ga,
in hee gba-búk kórò ga mbɛt.
Kà zɛ de, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ-wi,
mɛ gɔna ndaa-zan, ɓɛɛ wa yaka!
Mɔɔ-oi ko o wi nɛ kai mɔ zu̧ nɛ mɔ k’ɛɛ a̧‘i.
Nu nɛ‘i zii giti biro sɛnɛ
kur nana-yì Kus mɛ‘i,
mɛ̀ tóm o betom nɛ zu gba-tɔp
nɛ o be kombon nɛ zu yi nɛnɛ,
o haya betom, ɛ̀nɛ̀ má yi nɛ haya-a
sitɛ o kusa bíí nɛ tɛ-wa ɔ yɔka,
sitɛ o ŋga zuduk bíí nɛ‘i yu hɔ sɔŋkur nu mɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ sitɛ o yaa-ŋgo-biro,
si fara nɛ yi kɛ̧ɛ̧ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ zu nu'i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k GASA WAN nɛ duk zu kaya mɛ‘i,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí dɔma zak nɛ wa dɔm'i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Fara n'am duk sɛnɛ‘i,
mi zɔk mɔ hee kutu tɛ ŋgimbi-gbɛŋa-tɛ
ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ ga.»
Ŋgimbi-mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ, nɛ nyɔnɔ dɛma kaɗi,
nɛ o do-a be tɛ̀ɛ́ ai a nu ha̧ waya-a mɛ gbɛ̧,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ɓir o gbaa-er-a nɛ mɔɔ-gɔn-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi kaia yinɛ.
O bíí tɛ bɛ̧ wɔr-wa,
ha̧ o ŋga nɔ̧́í zu kaya in o saɗi zu nu mɛ nyɔŋ wa.
O nɔ̧́í-bɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɔŋ wɔr-wa zakati nɛ nu,
ɓɛɛ o saɗi nyɔŋa wɔr-wa mɛ ɓar mbɛt.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, a̧ dukbíí nɔ‘i tɛ ba nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛnɛ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ. Dukbíí‘i ɔ kusa in tɛ-wa ɔ yɔka. Wa nɛ́ dukbíí nɛ‘i yu yuu hɛ̧ɛ̧ hegɔ hɔ nduti-nu mɛ; mɛ nɛ nu nɛ‘i zii gba̧a̧-wen kɔ̧-a̧ na nɛ mbɔli nɛ wisɛn kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o nana-yì hura nu'i mbɛt. Wa tɛ ba ha̧a̧mɔ‘i nɛnɛ si fara nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ duk sɛnɛ zu kaya
Wen nɛ tɔ̧a̧ zu Egiptɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
GASA WAN daŋa zu tura-zan mɛ nɛ si Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ o géé-sɔ̧ wan mɛ nu Egiptɛ nak ti a̧.
Gba̧a̧ tɛ o be Egiptɛ gbina lɛŋ.
«Mi tɛ de ha̧ o be Egiptɛ
mɛ kur zu ŋmaa in o ŋmaa;
o nya-wi tɛ bi ŋmaa,
o sɛm tɛ bi ŋmaa;
o ye tɛ bi ŋmaa,
o wan tɛ bi ŋmaa mbɛt.
Zu Egiptɛ tɛ zik,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ɗaŋ war deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Wa tɛ nɛ tɛ o géé-sɔ̧ in o wan-gbana,
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-zɔk-mɔ,
gu nɛ o wi sa o sɔ̧-fio.
Mi tɛ e Egiptɛ er ŋma ŋga wan
nɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu wa.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Yi gba-tɔp tɛ ɔ̧sa̧
gu nɛ o nana-yì mbɛt kútú-kútú.
O be-zer tɛ ɔ̧si̧,
Nana-yì Nil mɛ Egiptɛ tɛ ɔ̧sa̧ kor kútú-kútú mbɛt.
O gba-kan tɛ kor lɛŋ,
o zɔ̧ mɛ nu-ŋgere Nil in o nyɔnɔ tɛ kor lɛŋ,
wa tɛ yambali ɓɛɛ wi beka zɔk oi-wa ɓɔna.
O wi-pi̧-gɛ̧i̧ tɛ gɔfi mɔ,
o wi-pi̧-gɛ̧i̧ ɗɔɔ Nil lɛŋ tɛ ai nú,
o wi-pi̧-yɔk zu yi tɛ ai nú mbɛt.
Gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ ba o wi-wa-fɔ-nduu,
in o okoo-pir-garaazi ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-fan-laa mbɛt.
Bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu o wi-fan-laa,
wen o wi-de-tom-aa tɛ ya nɛ tu̧u̧-see.
O be-wan ko Sɔaŋ nɛ́ o mgbelewi,
o haya wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu Egiptɛ
mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa tɔ̧ nɛ gee tum wen.
Nɛ ge'e de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ‘e:
«Mi nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, mi nɛ bezaŋ gba̧‘a̧ wannu ge?»
Wannu Egiptɛ, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɔ‘i kɔ-mɛ‘i a̧a̧ dee nde?
Wa a̧ iŋ, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ we ɗoŋ mɔ
nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu Egiptɛ‘i ha̧ mɛ zii.
O be-wan ko Sɔaŋ nɛ o mgbelewi;
o be-wan ko Nɔf fɛŋ nɛ tɛ;
wa ɗaŋ nɛ Egiptɛ hee o wan-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ ɔ̧i̧ ɗaŋ nɛ tɛ'ɛ ga.
GASA WAN dee ha̧ zikti mɛ de wa,
wen ha̧ o bíí Egiptɛ mɛ ɗaŋ;
o be Egiptɛ tɛ yambali tɛ yuwar dee tom kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma wi-nɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɔ̧i̧ nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
Nɛ̀ zu-a hɔ dom-aa,
nɛ̀ tɛ́ ndɛŋgɛ hɔ tɛ toro,
ŋma mɔ beka de sɛn Egiptɛ ɓɔna.
Wese'i, Egiptɛ tɛ kifi duk hee okoo ga, nɛ naka-tɛ in nɛ kíì mbɛt ti GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, ŋgimbi n'aa be tɛɛ de ŋmaa in a̧.
Nu ko Juda tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-pi̧-kíì tɛ Egiptɛ. Ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ̀ be wen be tɛɛ ye mgbara wa, tɛ Egiptɛ tɛ nak ti Juda wen ee-zu-mɔ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ee so mɛ de in Egiptɛ.
Wese'i, o ye mɔɔrɔ nɛ tɔ̧ nú Kanaŋ tɛ kan mɔ ha̧ nɛ er ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ. Ir-Hahɛrɛs tɛ duk nɛ kpɔk ye mgbara o ye nɔ‘i.
Wese'i, fara-dɔ-ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ mgbák bin-see nú Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ mboo-mɔ ko GASA WAN tɛ duk sɛn gbisi mbɛt.

O mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in mɔɔ-sedaako ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ sɛn nu Egiptɛ. Kà bɔnɛ‘i be tɛɛ tik zu wa, á̧ kà wa nɛ hiɗa mɔ sitɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tom wan-kpasi-wa tɛnɛ nɛ tɛ ye ɗoŋ wa in nɛ tɛ gbo wa mbɛt.

GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ o be Egiptɛ mɛ iŋ a̧. Ɓɛɛ wese nɛ o be Egiptɛ be tɛɛ iŋ a̧ kaɗi, wa tɛ de tom ha̧ a̧. Wa tɛ ɗaf'a in wa tɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt. Wa tɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
Kà GASA WAN nɛ gusa o be Egiptɛ nɛ ŋgaya-a, kana nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ kpasi wa mbɛt. Wa tɛ kifi see-wa ha̧ a̧, a̧ tɛ kpɛk aia-nú kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa wa.
Wese'i, ŋma yuwar tɛ gbo nɛ Egiptɛ si Asirii. O be Asirii tɛ yar hɔ Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ o be Egiptɛ yara hɔ Asirii mbɛt. O bíí Egiptɛ in o bíí Asirii tɛ mɔi̧ gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ in ŋmaa kpɔk.
Taar bíí nɛ tɛ ndaɗi in Egiptɛ ká bá nɛ̀ Asirii nɛ
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ tok de yoŋgo zu wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «De yoŋgo a̧ duk zu Egiptɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m, in Asirii n'am dee nɛ er-am, ká bá nɛ̀
Ti pɛ‘i, Sargɔŋ wannu Asirii toma ŋma gasa wi-biro si Asdod. A̧ bìì ye Asdod ɓɛɛ a̧ ba.

Ká ŋgimbi'i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen ha̧ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i Esaii bem ko Amɔs hee nde: «Mɛ̀ kpɔ̧́í̧ laa tɛ-mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ kpɔ̧i̧a̧ o ndárà naŋ-mɛ yinɛ mbɛt.» Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Esaii dee hegɔ, ɓɛɛ yar nɛ gee tɛ in nɛ gee naŋ.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Esaii yara nɛ gee tɛ in nɛ gee naŋ tɛ pɛ taar ga, mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ yí‘nɛ́ in mɔɔ-mbaŋ-tɛ‘nɛ zu mɔ ko Egiptɛ in Etiopii.

Mɛ nɛ hegɔ a̧ wannu Asirii tɛ kai nɛ o wi Egiptɛ nɛ bara, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi Etiopii nɛ Kus kaia so, o be-ŋgaiwi in o gbɛ́rɛ́ nɛ gee tɛ in gee naŋ, in o wan nɛ ɗoro duk zan; mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-búù wen Egiptɛ.
Wen Kus n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ e so nɛ ta tɛ pi̧ foe in kíì zu'nɛ́ mbɛt, ká bá nɛ̀ Egiptɛ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk so hee gasamɔ ga'i.

Ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ ya fara'i tɛ tɔ̧ wese'i'e nde: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgamɔ nɛ hɔɔ zu wi n’ɛɛ ee so nɛ ta in wi n’ɛɛ duka so kii fara-hu̧si-tɛ ɛɛ tɛ a̧, wen ká wannu Asirii tɛɛ de mɔɔ-ba tɛ yɛ wo’ɛ. Kinii a̧ a̧a̧ dee? Ɛɛ tɛ de nɛ tɛ yɛ hee ge?› »
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen zu Babilɔŋ nɛ‘i sa'e «Ŋga-gbárá-gba-tɔp.».
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ gba-búk ŋga-gbárà
ɓoɓi nɛ Nɛgɛb ga,
wisɛn tɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma ŋga nù nɛ‘i yu yuu.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN hɔ ŋma ɗaŋ zu ha̧‘m'e:
«O wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ-wi
a̧ e ɗɔra tɛ o bíí nɛnɛ‘i,
o wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ nɛnɛ.
Elam, mɛ̀ dáŋ in Mɛd
mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bí Babilɔŋ;
mi tɛ de ha̧ aia-nú ko Babilɔŋ mɛ kaɗi.»
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa tɛ‘m lɛŋ nak nɛ kíì,
mi zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zaŋ ŋma okoo nyim nɛnɛ
wen koo bem’ɛ ga.
Mɔ n'am zii zik nɛ zu'm,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am zɔk pi̧ nɛ kíì tɛ‘m.
See-am gɔn gɔn,
naka-tɛ pi̧ nɛ kíì tɛ‘m,
yɔlɔlɔ-gɛ̧ɛ̧ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ n'am kɔ̧ so nyɛmna’ɛ
kifa duk nɛ mɔɔ-kíì ha̧‘m mbɛt.
Wi ɗafi nɛ taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi nyɔŋa mɔ nɔ nɛ mɔ zu a̧.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛnɛ o wi-yak-ti tɛ biro!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sɔ̧́ nɔ̧́ tɛ o ŋgee k’ɛ́nɛ́!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é ŋma wi-pɛm-mɔ,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'aa tɛ zɔk h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kà a̧ nɛ zɔka keekee-nyaŋa
nɛ o nyaŋa yiitoo gbur tɛnɛ,
kà a̧ nɛ zɔka ŋma bíí zu tuifuu,
in ka a̧ nɛ zɔka ŋma bíí zu ŋgeloba,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ mbo ta-a, a̧ a̧ mbaɗi mɔ nɛ de-a.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-pɛm-mɔ‘i hiɗa mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Nyaa, mi ɓɔn kana kɔ‘m sɛn fara-pɛm-mɔ'ɛ,
pɛm nɛ mɔ wese lɛŋ,
in mi yor nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ zɛ lɛŋ mbɛt».
Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ wo,
ŋma bíí nɛ duk zu keekee-nyaŋa
nɛ o nyaŋa yiitoo gbur nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi hiɗa mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Babilɔŋ tika! Babilɔŋ tika kaɗi wo!
O géé-sɔ̧ nɛ wa dee so gbina a nu lɛŋ.»
Mɛ́, nɛ̀ GASA WAN gusa hee gba̧a̧-fon ga,
mɔ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
Sɔ̧ ko
nɛ mɔ‘i a̧‘m tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen zu Duma.
O bíí hiɗi nɛ mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ Sɛir mɛ tɛnɛ‘e:
«Wi-pɛm-mɔ, zɛ a̧a̧ dee?
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧‘m, zɛ a̧a̧ dee?»
Ɓɛɛ wi-pɛm-mɔ kifi nú:
«Kà mɔ sa̧, ɓɛɛ zɛ dea.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ak mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ ak mɔ.»
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ zaŋbɛɛ ŋga-gbárà Arabii,
ɛ́nɛ́ o be Dedaŋ o wi-yar-war nɔ'ɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yi nɛnɛ ha̧ o wi
nɛ wɔ yi gbɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ o be nu Tɛma,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nyɔŋmɔ nɛnɛ ha̧ o wi-yu-mɔ.
Wen wa yu nɛ o gba-paa,
wa yu nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nu gba-paa,
in kusaa nɛ‘i ŋgaŋa,
wa yu nɛ mɔ ti ŋga biro.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Oi pɛ kpɔk woyo, ɓɛɛ dee ŋgamɔ in gasamɔ ko Kedar yambala kifi geemɔ.
Oi o kpasa wi-pi̧-góò mgbara o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɓɔn tikiɗi ɓɛɛ.» Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wen nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ see zu ɗɔŋgɔ Hinɔn.
Jerusalɛm, nɛ ge a̧ dea
ha̧ o bíí nɛ oi gun mɛ daŋ zu tua ge?
Ye fo mɔ, de nɛ giti mɔ,
de nɛ tortɛ wen ge?
Wa gɔma o bíí ye kɔ-mɛ
nɛ gba-paa a nu,
o bíí ye kɔ-mɛ kuma yi biro.
O gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kɔ-wa yuu mɔ yak,
wa pi̧ gee pi̧i̧ goo na,
hegɔ o wisɛn kaia wa nɛ bara-biro.
Wa kaia o bíí nɛ wa kpaa lɛŋ nɛ bara,
kóó nɛ o wan nɛ yuu so mɔ yak nɛ nyɛi̧a-a mbɛt.
Mɛ nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i sa'm tɔ̧‘e:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk mɔ pii tɛ‘m na,
ha̧‘m hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ tu̧u̧-see.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ga̧ see-am zu tika-a
ko boko-bem ko dukbíí kɔ‘m na.
Wen wese’ɛ nɛ́ wese dita-see,
wese tika-a in mɔɔ-kíì.»
Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
a̧ dee ha̧ wese'i mɛ hɔ.
Wese'i, garo tɛ gbin,
ɓɛɛ
O wi-biro Elam kaia o ɓaro in kusaa-goo kɔ‘i,
wa daŋa o keekee in o nyaŋa,
ɓɛɛ o wi-biro Kir kai kɔ‘i nɛ o ŋgee.
O de bɔkɔ-nu kɔ-mɛ hura nɛ o keekee,
ɓɛɛ o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa zɔk nɛ nu tua tan ti-wa tɛnɛ.
Ŋgárá-e-nɛ-ta ko Juda gbina.
Wese'i, ɛnɛ tɛ zik tɛ‘nɛ́
ma yi si fara-a-boi biro nɛ‘i sa Kombo.
Ɛnɛ zɔka o gbina ŋgeŋ
nɛ wa gbina dɔka nyɛmna.
Ɛnɛ mɔi̧a yi dun kɔ̧ yì-mɛ-ɗɔɔ,
ɛnɛ tɔra o tua Jerusalɛm,
ɛnɛ gbina o ŋma tua ɗafi nɛ ŋga fara-pɛm-mɔ.
Ɛnɛ za̧a̧ kɔ̧ mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo
ha̧ yì mɛ yor kɔ̧ gba̧‘a̧-a̧.
Mɔ kpɔk, ɛnɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ wi de mɔɔ nɔ‘i na.
Ɛnɛ iŋ wi nɛ de
ha̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mɛ de nɛ ti mɛ tɛnɛ na.
Wese'i, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
saa so'nɛ́ mɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ ai nɛ nú,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpui zu'nɛ́
in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pi̧ laa bufu,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ duka-a nɛ desee,
gbɛ nɛ o ndai, gɔn nɛ o sami,
nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɔ́ mɔ ŋgaɓo,
wen mɔɔsa̧, ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ fio.»
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
kana mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'e:
«Ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dea'i,
mi beka e ha̧ wa na
hɔ wese fio kɔ-wa!»
Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ Sɛbna, ŋma gasawi nɛ duk zu tua-wan ko wannu, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ŋma mɔ kɔ-mɛ fara’ɛ nɛ ge?
Ŋma pɛ́r-nam kɔ-mɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ za̧ kɔ̧-fio kɔ-mɛ
sɛn zu kaya,
in pɛsi-gun-mɛ kɔ̧ ta hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ o?
GASA WAN tɛ nɔmɔi̧ mɛ,
a̧ tɛ hɛr mɛ
gɔn pi̧ taŋ hee kii-ta ga
si ŋma ɗuka nu mɛ;
mɛ tɛ fe ɓɔn hi̧i̧,
gu nɛ o zɔm keekee kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ yaa-pi̧-búù zu nutua ko wan kɔ-mɛ'ɛ.
Mi tɛ ndak mɛ,
fo mɛ yinɛ fara kɔ-mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kpɔk wese'i,
mi tɛ sa wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Eliakim
bem ko Hilkia e oi mɛ.
Mi tɛ pi̧ gba-laa kɔ-mɛ tɛ-a,
mi tɛ mar kanda kɔ-mɛ guntir-aa,
ɓɛɛ mi ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.
A̧ tɛ duk nɛ dáà ko o be Jerusalɛm
in o bíí nutua ko Juda mbɛt.
Mi tɛ e mɔɔ-hu̧i̧-nu tua ko David
zu kóŋgó-ɓaa-a;
kà a̧ hu̧i̧ nu tua kaɗi,
wi-kpea-a bo na,
ɓɛɛ kà a̧ kpe kaɗi,
wi-hu̧i̧-aa bo na mbɛt.
Mi tɛ mgboi a̧ hee pɔndi ga zu ŋga fara,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ bíí
nɛ‘i zɔn zu damti nutua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧.»
O pɛ́r-nam mɛ ɗoŋ dáà kɔ̧-a̧, o gasa-a in o geɗek-a gu nɛ o nyɛk, ku̧u̧naŋ tɛ o yee hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o ɓii nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ tui zu a̧.
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a̧: «Wese'i, pɔndi nɛ‘i mgboia so zu ŋga fara'i tɛ wɔkɔɗi dak, ɓɛɛ gbina tik nu; hegɔ o mɔ n'aa duka so tui'i tɛ ɗaŋ.» Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ŋga wen nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu Tir nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«O kombon mɛ Tarsis,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú wen zu ye nɛ duk nú-mbaŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋa!»
Nɛ́ tɛ̀ pia ɗoŋ nɛ see-kisi Chipre
a̧ wa zia nɛ nyɛrɛ-a.
O wi-ɔ-nu ŋgere,
kíì a̧ de'nɛ́,
ɛnɛ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ saaye Sidɔŋ,
nɛ yar nɛ zu gba-tɔp nɛnɛ,
hiɗi'nɛ́ a̧ gɔn.
Nyɔnɔ nɛ wa gun nɛ ká̧ zaŋ Nil,
mɛ nɛ Sidɔŋ a̧ mɔi̧ so kpa nɛ yi-mɔ sɛnɛ;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ̀ ye'i a̧ o nu nɛtɛ nɛtɛ de so gɛnɛ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Oee búù wa, Sidɔŋ,
ŋga ye mɛ nu gba-tɔp!
Wen gba-tɔp tɛ ba wen ɓɛɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e:
«Zaŋ-am nyim ka'm ko nɛ bem na;
mi dai kɔ‘m o be-wiwii
ká bó nɛ̀ o be-okoo na mbɛt.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o be Egiptɛ tɛ zii wen'i
in nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ hɔɔ zu Tir mbɛt,
tɛ-wa tɛ gar.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kú yi si Tarsis,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ɔ-nu ŋgere;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú!
Ye tortɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ so’ɛ nɛ mɔ‘i!
Ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ɓeemɛ nɛ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ
kur so sɛnɛ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ de nɛ gɛnɛ'ɛ a̧a̧‘i!
Wi nɛ dee ha̧ ŋgamɔ mɛ tik zu Tir
ye-de-wan ha̧ bíí,
nɛ̀ o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ mɛ sɛnɛ nɛ o be-wan,
in o wi-de-gɛnɛ sɛnɛ nɛ o gasawi zu nu’ɛ nɛ o?
Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
a̧ dee mɔ‘i,
wen ha̧ gasa-zu mɛ de geemɔ,
in ha̧ búù mɛ ba o gasawi zu nu lɛŋ.
Boko be Tarsis,
mɛ̀ wá fɔ kɔ-mɛ hee wan mɛ ká̧ zaŋ Nil ga,
wen ye mɛ nu mbaŋ bo ɓɔna.
GASA WAN nyɛi̧a er
de nɛ ŋgamɔ zu gba-tɔp;
a̧ ɗaŋa o mɔɔ-wan,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gbin o ŋga ye Kanaŋ a nu.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Boko be Sidɔŋ,
mɛ́ nɛ̀ wa ɗaŋa kaɗi,
kɔ-mɛ in mɔɔ-nyɛŋɛ kaɗa.
Kóó mɛ yaka so si Chipre,
mɛ beka kpa ɔma-tɛ sɛn hi̧i̧ na mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si nu Kaldee,
dukbíí nɛ yaa so fara'i bo ɓɔna.
Asirii ndaka wa a zaŋbɛɛ
hee kóŋgóló-dɔmɔ ga;
wa dee so o ŋgárá-pɛm-mɔ
mbo nɛ o ŋga ye,
ɓɛɛ tom nɔ‘i lɛŋ kifi nɛ gee bɛɛ-nu puturu.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú, o kombon Tarsis,
wen ŋga-fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋa.»
Wese'i, tɛ-wi tɛ bi ɗoŋ Tir zaŋ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, nɛ duk nɛ pɛ-wan ko wannu. Ɓɛɛ sɛn ɗoŋ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo'i, mɔ tɛ hɔ zu Tir hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ gima ko okoo-ɔr-wi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga:
Mɛ̀ bá koloŋ kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ mbɛ́r zik nɛ ye,
mɛ kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu
nɛ tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ mɛ'ɛ.
Mɛ̀ mbɛ́r ha̧ ger-a nɔ̧́í̧ nɛ de-a,
mɛ ɔli gima nɛ dɔka-a
wen ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Ɗoŋ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, GASA WAN tɛ tɛ mɛ zɔk Tir, ɓɛɛ Tir tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-dàlà kɔ‘i woyo. A̧ tɛ de dàlà in o wan zu nu’ɛ lɛŋ.

Mɔ kpɔk, yi-mɔ in mɔ n'aa tɛ kpa oi-aa tɛ duk ha̧ GASA WAN; bo nɛ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ndɛm o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mɔi̧ e na. Mɔ n'aa tɛ kpa lɛŋ tɛ duk wen ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí nɛ ya ti GASA WAN, ha̧ zaŋ-wa mɛ sur in wen pi̧i̧ laa nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya sɛn tɛ-wa mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɛ ɗaŋ nu lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti;
a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ mɔ zu nu lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ndaka o bíí pɛsi á taŋ, kɛ̧́ɛ̧́ mgbara-a bo na:
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ hee gee bíí ga,
wan-tom hee wi-de-tom ga,
naa-wan-tom hee kó-de-tom ga,
wi-ɗɔr-mɔ hee wi-hi̧fi̧-mɔ ga,
wi-ha̧-mɔ hee wi-gbak-mɔ ga,
wi-ha̧-nyamando hee wi-ba-nyamandoi ga mbɛt.
Nu tɛ ɗaŋ nɛ oi-aa,
mɔ tɛ ɗaŋ nɛ ndaa-zan hɔ zu-zan lɛŋ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Nù zim nɛ mɔ ɗaŋ nɛnɛ;
nù nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tik tik ɗaŋ nɛnɛ!
O bíí ɗaŋa nù lɛŋ,
wen wa gbina heembea,
wa yaka zu o geŋa;
wa gbina
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa fom ba nù,
nɛ mɔ‘i sa bɔnɛ-oi-aa kpa o bíí zaŋnu,
sa o bíí bíí wee, ɓɛɛ oi-wa dɔk ɓɔna.
Mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔk ɓɔna,
o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɔ̧ka̧ kor ɗaŋ lɛŋ.
O wi nɛ ya so nɛ desee, pɛ nɛ see, gɔfi nɛ mɔ.
Giti bi̧ɔ̧ kaɗa,
ger desee kaɗa, wi zii giti koloŋ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ bíí nɛ̀ gima bo ɓɔna;
ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ kifa nɛ paŋmɔ kpírírí
sɛn nú o wi-nɔa-a.
Gee tum ye tika,
nu tua lɛŋ kpea, wi nyɛm mɛ ye ɓɔna.
O bíí kii nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ yuwar nɛnɛ;
tortɛ bo na,
desee kaɗa zu nu lɛŋ.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ ɓɔna saaye bo na,
nu garo gbina a nu mutu-mutu.
Sɛn zu nu in mgbara o dukbíí,
mɔ duk hee oi fɔ-te-nɔ̧́,
kóó hee oi fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ‘i ɓii waya-a kaɗi ga.
O bíí nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa
bíí nɛ gima zɔn nɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN.
Wa de nɛ nyɛŋɛ si kur gba-tɔp mɛ.
Wi zii nɛ zɔna nin GASA WAN
nɛ wa zɔn si daŋa-wese;
wa sa nɛ nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
sɛn see-kisi mɛ.
Wi zii nɛ gima
nɛ nduti-nu mɛ tɛnɛ‘e:
«Zɔnamɔ a̧ duk nɛ ko Sɔ̧ Wan-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.»
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧:
«Oee mi, oee mi wa!
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu'm!»
O wi-e-ɗɔra yee tɛ ee ɗɔra,
o nde e nɛ ɗɔra tɛ bíí lɛŋ!
Bele a̧ zar'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tík lim ɓɛɛ pɛ́r a̧ ba'nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí zu nu’ɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ yu mɔ
wen hiɗimɔ-kíì tɛ tik lim,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ daŋ nɛ kɔ̧ lim
tɛ ba pɛ́r.
O woi yiwese tɛ hú̧í̧,
ɓɛɛ naŋ-nu, foo mɔ.
Nu tɛ fo mɔ,
gbaa, ɓɛɛ mbaŋa ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ.
Nu tɛ pi̧ liki-liki hee wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga;
a̧ tɛ pi̧ hee dana-nyak
Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ dita zu-a,
a̧ tɛ yo nu ɓɛɛ a̧ beka kur ŋgɔn ɓɔna.
Wese'i, GASA WAN tɛ gɔn kita zu o wi-biro mɛ ŋgɔn mɛ, in zu o wannu zaŋnu’ɛ.
Wa tɛ mɔi̧ wa nɛ bara-biro a kɔ̧ lim, ɓɛɛ wa kpee nú wa e kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ. Tɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧, ɓɛɛ wa kifa nú zu mɔ nɛ wa dea.
Ziimɔ tɛ ba nyaŋa-zɛ,
ɓɛɛ búù baa wese;
hegɔ, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ ɔ wan zu kaya
nɛ oi gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧
sɛn ti o kuti bíí.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
hegɔ mi gasi nɛ ɛnɛ zɔn nɛ nin'nɛ́,
wen ɛnɛ dee o gba demɔ
nɛ duk nɛnɛ tɛnɛ ɓeemɛ ɗaŋ na.
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ ye mɛ kifi duk nɛ duk-ta,
ha̧ ŋga ye mɛ kifi nɛ gee bɛɛ-oi;
ŋga ye ko o wi-de-ŋgamɔ tɛ gbin a nu
nɛ‘i beka mbo ɓɔna ndo ndo ndo.
Mɛ nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i sa ŋga dukbíí gasi nin'nɛ́;
sa ye ko o dukbíí-de-ŋgamɔ, yu'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ nɛ fara-hu̧si ko o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na,
Wan nɛ o wi-kɔsa e nɛ ta, ŋgimbi bɔnɛ.
Ɛnɛ nɛ fara-hu̧si wen ŋga búk-kórò,
in ti gi̧ɔ̧, ŋgimbi gbɛ̧ŋmɔ;
wen búk nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú o wi-de-ŋgamɔ
duk hee ŋga búk-kórò a yo ŋgeŋ ga,
kóó hee ŋga gbɛ̧ŋmɔ mɛ nú-kórò ga.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kpe kura-a ko o wi-de-ŋgamɔ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ tura-zan kpe nɛ yiwese’ɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ wi beka zii ger-wa ɓɔna.
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ ɗafi nyɔŋmɔ sɛn zu kaya’ɛ;
a̧ tɛ ha̧ de nɔ-kpoo,
dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ baa yi nɛ de-a,
bá nɛ̀ dé zɔr-zɔr kpoo
in mbiɗi-mbiɗi dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o dukbíí lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-zim-fio tɛ o bíí zu kaya’ɛ
in ndɔmbɔ nɛ kpee zu o dukbíí yinɛ lɛŋ mbɛt.
Fio beka bo ɓɔna,
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɛ di̧ miikɔ̧a yinɛ yí o bíí lɛŋ;
a̧ tɛ ba mɔɔ-búù zu nu in zu dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ!
Wese'i, bíí tɛ tɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wi’ɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
n’ɛɛ e ta nɛnɛ nɛ kpasa yɛ.
A̧ nɛ GASA WAN n’ɛɛ e nɛ ta.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé tortɛ
wen n'aa kpasa yɛ!»
GASA WAN tɛ nyɛi̧ er si zu kaya’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ mbɔli o be Mɔab
ɓɔn bɛɗɛ hee zɔ̧ nɛ‘i i̧si̧ zuku-paa’ɛ ga.
Sɛn fara'i, wa tɛ nyɛi̧ er-wa
misi̧ nɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zui nɛ yi’ɛ ga.
Kóó nɛ oi bia-a kɔ-wa'i,
GASA WAN tɛ gbɔsi wa ha̧ gasa-zu kɔ-wa mɛ kaɗi.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o ŋgárá k’ɛ́nɛ́ o be Mɔab,
GASA WAN tɛ gbin wa,
a̧ tɛ ndur wa a mbɔɗɔnu kifi nɛ gee fuunu.
Wese'i, wi tɛ bìì gima’ɛ nu Juda:
«GASA WAN ha̧a̧ ŋga ye h’ɛ́ɛ́!
A̧ mboo garo in ŋgárá zik ye'i kpa nu ŋmaa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ o nu garo ha̧ o dukbíí-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
nɛ yor ɗoŋ
Yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dee,
a̧ kii kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ,
wen a̧ e ta nɛ ɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ta nɛ GASA WAN ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
wen a̧ nɛ kam-ta nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ dee ha̧ o wi nɛ ɔ zu kusa-fara mɛ zir si ɗɔɔ;
a̧ ɗaŋa gee tum ye nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ ye sɛnɛ na'i gbuɗuk a mbɔɗɔnu,
ɓɛɛ fara'i kifi nɛ mɔɔ-i̧si̧
ko o wisan in o wi-kɔsa.»
Yuwar ko wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar ɔ tana;
ɛnɛ ɗafa yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yɔka-a.
Ɛ́ɛ́ bá nɛ yuwar nɛ geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ usa h’ɛ́ɛ́,
wen ɛnɛ nɛ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta k’ɛɛ GASA WAN;
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ see yɛ gbɛŋ wen-aa
mɛ nɛ saa nin'nɛ́.
Sɔ̧-tɛ‘m de nɛ wɔ‘nɛ́ mɛ zɛ
ɓɛɛ
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gɔn kita zu nu’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ yamba deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Kà'í de ko ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a na;
a̧ ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ zu nu’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk kɔ̧-a̧ gasi ko GASA WAN na.
GASA WAN, er'nɛ́ nɛ ŋgamɔ,
ɓɛɛ o bíí zɔk na;
o bíí be tɛɛ zɔk
n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ foe baa wa!
Ɓɛɛ wee n’ɛnɛ ɗafa so e
wen wi-sɛn'nɛ́ tɛ dɔ wa.
GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́;
mɔ n’ɛɛ de lɛŋ,
nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ de ha̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
o ŋma wan ɔɔ so wan zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ nin'nɛ́ kpɔk a̧ duk ɓɔn nú yɛ ɓɛɛ!
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ fio fe ɓɛɛ kpasi ɓɔna,
in wɔr mbɛt kur ŋgɔn na ga’ɛ,
ɛnɛ kuma wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ de ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ bi ɗoŋ wa ɓɔn.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ dee ha̧ tugun bíí k’ɛɛ mɛ dɔk,
ɛnɛ dee ha̧ tugun bíí mɛ gasi;
ɛnɛ usa gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ɗɔŋ o gbisi e siti.
GASA WAN, zaŋ dita-see k’ɛɛ,
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ nɛ bɔnɛ zu yɛ,
ɛɛ aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́,
hee naa-zaŋ nɛ hɛɗa mɛ ko bem
ɓɛɛ nɛ bi ai nɛ nú'ɛ ga.
Duka-a k’ɛɛ ti'nɛ́ hee mɔ‘i ga, GASA WAN.
Ɛɛ baa zaŋ, zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ nyima-a
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ko nɛ geemɔ;
ŋma mɔ n’ɛɛ dee nɛ tɛ gbak nu bo na;
mbe bíí n’ɛɛ koo a zu nu’ɛ bo na mbɛt.
O wɔr tɛ kur ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ o fio kɔ-mɛ kpasa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima nɛ desee,
ɛnɛ o wi nɛ ɔ nu tɛ fuunu.
Wen mbɛŋ sa̧a̧mɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ tok tok tɛ ɓɔ nu,
ɓɛɛ dee ha̧ o fio mɛ kur.
O bíí kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé nu tua e zu'nɛ́,
hu̧si nɛnɛ tikiɗi
ha̧ ŋgimbi nyimsea ko GASA WAN yak sɛ,
wen a̧ tɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧
mɛ ɓa ndaa gbɛɛ-zu ko o bíí zu nu,
ɓɛɛ nu tɛ e ha̧ tɔk mɛ fok
n'aa beka hu̧si wɔr ɓɔna.
Wese'i, GASA WAN tɛ ba gasa zɔm tɔ̧́ɔ̧́ nú gba-paa kɔ‘i wen dee ŋmaa in ndiɓa, dɔwɔk yɔɔ gɔ́k nɛ duk ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛɛ a̧.
Wese'i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima
zɔn nɛ gba de fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mi GASA WAN,
mi nɛ Wan-pɛm-a,
mi a nɛ yì gun-aa wese lɛŋ,
wen ká wa̧a̧-a̧ tɛɛ ai;
mi pɛm a̧ zɛ nɛ wese.
Mi de nyimsea ɓɔna;
kà tɛn-dara in o tɛn gbo sɛnɛ,
mi tɛ zuɗi wa,
ɓɛɛ mi dɔɔ wa a nu lɛŋ.
Wi nɛ e'm nɛ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘i,
ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ duk mgbara'm in wi’ɛi,
ɓɛɛ ga̧a̧mɔ tɛɛ duk mgbara a̧ in am mbɛt.»
Ŋma wese, ku̧nin Jakob tɛ hɔ,
ɓɛɛ o waya-a tɛ dun zu nu’ɛ lɛŋ.
GASA WAN gusa
hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa gusa nɛ o wi nɛ gusa so a̧ ga nde?
GASA WAN gbɛɛ wa hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa gbɛɛ nɛ o wi nɛ gbɛɛ so wa ga nde?
Kita kɔ̧-a̧ tika wa;
a̧ ndaka wa yaknɛ ɓɛɛ wa kifi bara-biro.
Búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a kaia wa yaknɛ
hee búk-kórò mɛ ti daŋa-wese ga.
Sɔ̧ tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ Jakob,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi ee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ e ha̧ a̧‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
GASA WAN tɛ mbaŋ o ta
nɛ‘i mbuti kifi fuunu’ɛ ga.
Bé kà'ì zɔk o ta-zu-nu,
in o sɔ̧-wese fara yor ɓɔna.
Ŋga ye tɛ kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi,
nɛ o bíí beka duk sɛnɛ ɓɔna;
ye'i tɛ kifi nɛ ŋga-gbárà,
fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o ndai,
wa tɛ ɔ nu nyɔŋ nɛ mbɔɗi zɔ̧ ɓɔn fara-a mbɛt.
Kà o gbaa er-te kor,
ɓɛɛ gbina a nu;
ɓɛɛ o okoo tɛ̀ɛ́ kai wa mɛ a tɛ wee.
Nɛ mbetɛ, dukbíí'ɛ iŋ mɔ na,
mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa wi nɛ dee wa
de ko ha̧ wa, kà a̧ kɔ̧ wa na mbɛt.
Wese'i, GASA WAN tɛ gusi fon kɔ‘i
ku̧u̧naŋ nɛ nana-yì Efrat hɔ nɛnɛ
tɛ gbar-gbar-yì Egiptɛ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛnɛ o be
a'i tɛ dɔr kpɔk kpɔk.
Wa tɛ dɔm mbia wese'i,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ yambala so si nu Asirii
in o wi nɛ wa ndaka so si sɛn nu Egiptɛ
tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ gasi GASA WAN
sɛn zu sa̧a̧ kaya sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu Efraim!
Gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa
in gba de mɛtɛwol ko o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Efraim,
nɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ wen déè kɔ-wa,
nɛ duk kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧.
GASA WAN tɛ tom ŋma ŋga-wi,
wi-de-ŋgamɔ tɛnɛ hee kórò ɓɔrɔ,
kóó hee ŋga búk-ɗaŋ-mɔ ga,
hee yì-kórò nɛ hɔ nɛ dɔka-a
ha̧ yi mɛ ha̧'ɛ ga;
a̧ tɛ gan wa lɛŋ,
a̧ tɛ i̧si̧ wa nɛ naŋ,
a̧ tɛ i̧si̧ gba de mɛtɛwol ko o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ Efraim mbɛt.
O be Efraim nɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ wen déè kɔ-wa’ɛ,
wa duk mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ hee te-mbɔra mɛ bɛɛ,
kà bíí zɔk, ɓɛɛ tɛɛ ɓi waya-a mɛ nyɔŋ'ɛ ga.
Wese'i, GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ gba de
A̧ tɛ ha̧ taamɔ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ o wi-gɔn-kita, ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ o wi nɛ ndak o wisɛn yinɛ sɛn nu garo ye.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋa zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧
in o
ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ gana wa,
ɓɛɛ wa hui hui kɔɗɔŋ-kɔɗɔŋ.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ gana ŋgai kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ zu wa lɛŋ.
O
iŋ zu wen nɛ wa tɔ̧
tɛ mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ usi ha̧ wa na;
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ iŋ yuwar gɔna kita nɛ yuwar-a na mbɛt,
wen dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋa zu-wa lɛŋ.
Zu taŋe-nyɔŋ-mɔ lɛŋ
duna nɛ ɗaŋ ɔ̧i̧ kɔ-wa;
ŋma de fara bo na!
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ wen’ɛ zu'm:
«Nɛ o a̧ a̧ tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ a̧ o?
A̧ tɛ we ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o?
Ha̧ o bem nɛ‘i gɔna bere nú-wa kinii naa,
kóó ha̧ o be zɔɗi bem nɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ bere kinii’ɛ nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ̧-a̧:
S-A-S-A, S-A-S-A, T-A-T-A, T-A-T-A,
wen nɛ tɔ̧: kuti-a hegɔ, yiitoo-aa hee mɔ‘i ga.»
Hego, GASA WAN tɛ ha̧m nɛ́ gúgúma,
nɛ́ ŋma gɔni nú ko o ŋma bíí
a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ.
A̧ baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e nde:
«Ɔma-tɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ wi nɛ mbɔia ɔm tɛ!
Zɔk ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ!»
Ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ so mɛ zii na.

Hegɔ wen ko GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ ŋma wen nɛ wa beka zii gba̧a̧-a̧ na, hee «S-A-S-A, S-A-S-A, T-A-T-A, T-A-T-A» ga, wen nɛ tɔ̧: kuti-a hegɔ, yiitoo-aa hee mɔ‘i ga. Nɛ̀ sɔŋkur-aa wa tɛ hɔ̧fi̧ yo nu nɛ zaŋ-kpasa, goto-wa tɛ mbaŋ, naŋ-wa tɛ mbar mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa kimia daka-a yinɛ takaɗi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN,
ɛnɛ o wi-de-zɛŋ,
ɛnɛ o wi-ɔ-wan zu dukbíí nɛ a̧a̧ Jerusalɛm.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dúk tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛɛ nɔɔ tɔk in fio,
hɔ nɛnɛ fara ko o fio mɛ mbɛt;
hegɔ ɛ́ɛ́ ee nú yɛ in ŋmaa kaɗi,
ŋgimbi nɛ ɗaŋ mɔɔ-kum-wi be tɛɛ hɔ,
mɔ‘i beka ba yɛ na,
wen ndela nɛ fara-hu̧si k’ɛɛ
in ɔramɔ nɛ fara-duk k’ɛɛ.»
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧‘e:
«Zɔk mi ee ŋma ta nɛ mɔɔ-sedaako sɛn
a̧ tɛ duk nɛ yɔka ta-e-mgbii-tua
nɛ duk gun naŋ-tua.
Wi nɛ tɛ ɛk tɛ nɛ a̧
beka tir yɔɔ-mɔ na.
Hegɔ, kpasawen tɛ duk nɛ dɔ́rá-nɛ-nɔ kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ mɔɔ-we-mɔ mbɛt.»
Ɓɔrɔ tɛ ɗaŋ fara-hu̧si ko ndela,
ɓɛɛ yì tɛ ha̧ kai fara-hu̧si k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaknɛ.
ká bá nɛ̀ ee-zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in fara ko o fio mbɛt tɛ ɗaŋ;
ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋga mɔɔ-kum-wi be tɛɛ ɓir yak,
a̧ tɛ mbɔli'nɛ́ nɛ gasa mɔɔ-mbɔli-mɔ.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'aa tɛ ɓir yak fara'i, a̧ tɛ i̧si̧ zu'nɛ́ yak nɛnɛ; a̧ tɛ ɓir fara'i mɛ tutuyɛ in mɛ gira-wese, mɛ wese in mɛ zɛ mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-kíì tɛ zia-a!
Wi beka ɔ nu gɔn gado na,
wen gado zi̧i̧ ɓɔna;
borgo beka pɛsi nyɛm mɛ kpe zu-wi ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ kur
hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so zu kaya Perasim ga.
Ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kur zu wa
hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Gabaɔŋ ga.
A̧ tɛ kur ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ŋga tom
nɛ‘i iŋ zu-a na;
tom'i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-gɔn ɗɛɗɛ-wi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káɗí zɛkɛɗa bíí wen ká nyak tɛɛ nɔ ger'nɛ́ siti, wen mi zia ŋma nyɛrɛ wen ɗaŋa nu’ɛ lɛŋ. Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m hegɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ya keɗeŋ, ɛnɛ zii gba̧a̧ wen kɔ‘m:
Mɔ'ɔ, ko wi-wa-fɔ nɛ duk nɛ kɔ‘i’ɛ,
nɛ́ wáá fɔ, gbuta nu
in kaia zɔ̧ yinɛ wese lɛŋ ɓɛɛ nde?
Bo nɛ kà a̧ nɛ ɗafa nu kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ guna o wa̧a̧-kpoo hee mɛ̧ɛ̧wa in zima
nɛti sɛka a̧ pɛɛ alkamaari in fon na nde?
Nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ usa yuwar guna mɔ ha̧ wi-wa-fɔ
yambi nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Wi nyɛm mɛ gusi mɛ̧ɛ̧wa wen ha̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ mɛ sɔti na,
in wi zuɗi zima nɛ oi gun, na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wi hɔ̧n nɛ mɛ̧ɛ̧wa nɛ ta-hɔ̧n-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi ɓii wa̧a̧-zima ɓii wen gia-a nɛ nyɔŋmɔ.
Wi mbɛr nɛ alkamaari,
ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ na;
wi ba nɛ keekee i̧si̧ nɛ saɗa-a
ha̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ mɛ sɔti a nu,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wi ɗaŋ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ na.
Mɔ‘i tɛ nɛ tɛ GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dee,
wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ‘i de nɛ gasamɔ.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu Ariɛl,
ye nɛ David ɔɔ so sɛnɛ!
Koo ɛnɛ duk tɛ dee gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́
pɛ yak ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa,
mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ Ariɛl,
o bíí tɛ ai nu gɔfi nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ ye'i tɛ duk nɛ kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ bi ye'i hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ David dee so ga,
mi tɛ kɛr a̧ e see-a, kpe a̧ e nu,
ɓɛɛ sɛka'm bìí a̧.
Mɛ tɛ hɔ̧fi̧ tik mbɔɗɔnu,
ɓɛɛ wi zia tiger mɛ nɛ ɗɔɔ nu mɛ tɛnɛ;
wi beka zii gba̧a̧-a̧
nɛ de-a na wen fuunu;
tiger-mɛ tɛ gbo tikiɗi hee tiger hɔɔ-bíí ga,
tiger'i tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ fuunu mɛ tɛnɛ
hee dɔma-fɔ̧i̧ ga.
O wi-sɛn-mɛ tɛ dɔk hee fuunu ga,
o dɔka ŋga bíí nɛ tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ
tɛ duk hee kora-zɔ̧ nɛ bu̧i gaɗaguɗaa’ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ haya-a hee gɔma-yí ga,
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ tɛ mɛ ye ɗoŋ mɛ nɛ mbaŋa-kórò in naka-nù,
ŋga-kórò ká bá nɛ̀ gba-búk-kórò
in leɓe-wee mɛ dɔ mɔ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ gba duk o tugun bíí
nɛ ba so biro duk nɛ Ariɛl,
gu nɛ mɔɔ-de-biro kɔ-wa,
in o ŋga bíí nɛ usa bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧,
wa lɛŋ tɛ duk hee ɔɔ-zu
in hɔɔ-zu mɛ zaŋzɛ ga.
A̧ tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma wi-tik-ŋgata nɛ ɔɔ zu'e,
wi nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ;
kà a̧ tun, ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ bo kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa na ga.
A̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma bíí nɛ wɔ yi gbɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɔɔ zu'e,
wi nɔ nɛ yi;
kà a̧ kur, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbɔia,
war ger-a mbɛt ɔ kora kútú-kútú'ɛ ga.
Mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu o dɔka tugun bíí
nɛ tɛ bi kaya
Kíì a̧ de'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ sákálí;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí wan-boma-yí,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk mɔ na.
Zu'nɛ́ a̧ zik bo nɛ wen nɔɔ kpɔra-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
naŋ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbali ŋmaa,
bo nɛ wen nɔɔ ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt,
wen GASA WAN ee taamɔ-kíì tɛ‘nɛ́,
a̧ kpee yí‘nɛ́ o
a̧ kpee yí‘nɛ́ o wi-zɔk-mɔ.
Zia gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu wen'nɛ́ zu mɔ‘i tɛ duk hee ŋma kalata nɛ‘i ee
Koo wi ha̧a̧ so kalata'i ha̧ wi nɛ iŋ tɔra mɔ na, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧‘e, «mɛ̀ tɔ́r mɔ'ɔ», ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kifi kana nú mbɛt'e: «Mi iŋ kɔ‘m tɔra mɔ na» mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e:
«Dukbíí kɔ‘m iŋa nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gee wen nɛ ndàrá-nú ɓɛɛ,
see-wa ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ‘m,
yuwar gasa'm nɛ wa gasi'i
nɛ́ heembea ko bíí nɛ wa yamba so.
Kinii, mi tɛ ku̧ naŋ dee gasamɔ
in mɔɔ-kifi ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m;
iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-wa tɛ ɗaŋ,
iŋamɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mɔ kɔ-wa tɛ yambali mbɛt.»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi nɛ hu̧si
yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘i nɛ GASA WAN,
de nɛ hu̧sa̧mɔ nɛ ti tum,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Nɛ o'o zɔk ɛɛ,
sɛka iŋ nɛ ndaa-mɔ k’ɛɛ o?» wo'i.
Nɛ ge ɗaŋ taamɔ ge n’ɛnɛ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ'ɛ ge!
Wi-ɓu-kpánà hɔɔ ŋmaa in gii
wen ha̧ tom n'aa dee nɛ er-a mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e nde:
«Bo nɛ mɛ'ɛ dea'm na»,
in ha̧ kpánà mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɓu-a'e:
«Zu-mɛ bo na,» nde?
Bo nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi tikiɗi,
Libaŋ kifa de fara-gun-te na nde?
Ɓɛɛ fara-gun-te'i tɛɛ kifi nɛ kombo na nde?
Wese'i, o wi-mgbee-zer tɛ zii wen kɔ̧ kalata,
ɓɛɛ o wan-boma-yí gboo ti tum ɓɛɛ wa zɔka mɔ.
O wi-mɔka-see tɛ de nyɛŋɛ ti GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
tɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ o wi-kɔsa.
O wi-de-ŋgamɔ in o wi-zɛkɛɗi-wi
gu nɛ o wi nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ tɛ kum,
ká bá nɛ̀ o wi nɛ ɓir wen ndela
pi̧ nɛ wen zu ŋma bíí tɛ kita,
ɓɛɛ nɛ de ha̧ kita mɛ tik
wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɔɔ gee mbɛt.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
nɛ kpasa so Abraham tɔ̧‘e:
«Foe beka ba Jakob na,
in búù beka ba a̧ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa, kóó o bem kɔ-wa,
tɛ zɔk mɔ n'am dee sɛn mgbara wa,
wa tɛ tu̧ tɛ nin-am,
wa tɛ tu̧ tɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko Jakob,
ɓɛɛ wa dee kíì sɛn ti Sɔ̧ ko
O wi nɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa sakala so
tɛ ta mɔ nɛ de-a,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ŋgazu tɛ kpa desee mɛ yambi mɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o be ŋgazu,
nɛ de mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ zu, e'm duk.
Wa nɔ nɛ tɔk in o ŋmaa
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mi a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
ɓɛɛ wa dee ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa mɛ dɔk zu ŋmaa.
Wa zira si Egiptɛ mɛ, wa ak am na,
kà be de ká wannu Egiptɛ yee ɗɔŋ wa tɛ biro,
in ha̧ wa mɛ duk ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ Egiptɛ mbɛt.
Pɛma wa nɛ wannu Egiptɛ pɛm'i
tɛ pi̧ foe zu wa,
ɓɛɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ kɔ-wa ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko Egiptɛ‘i
tɛ pi̧ búù zu wa mbɛt.
O be-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔɔ sɛn Sɔaŋ mɛ,
in o betom k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔɔ sɛn Hanɛs mɛ kaɗi mbɛt.
Gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ ba wa ɗoŋ gbula dukbíí nɛ wa e nɛ ta'i,
wen gbula dukbíí beka de ŋma kpasamɔ ha̧ wa,
kà bó nɛ̀ gbaka wa na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ búù zu wa.»
Wa ɓir yak nɛ tɛ nù,
fara nɛ ɗaŋsee in dita-see a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
nɛ fara'i a̧ o nana-dila in o dila ya sɛnɛ,
ká bá nɛ̀ o kóró in o ndiɓa-bu̧i̧-bu̧i̧ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa tui o demɔ in o mbɔi kɔ-wa yaknɛ
nɛ tuifuu in ŋgeloba ha̧ o gbula dukbíí
nɛ beka de gba̧a̧-mɔ ha̧ wa na'i.
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ o wi Egiptɛ
nɛ duk nɛ gee gbula mɔ,
nɛ gba̧a̧-mɔ mɛ tɛ-a bo na;
mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa'm sa nin-a'e,
«Rahab nɛ de gba̧a̧ mɔ na.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kinii, mɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ'ɔ zu sɛka-ta,
mɛ̀ yɔ́r kale mɔ'ɔ zaŋ kalata tɛ fara yiitoo,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-sedaako,
wen wa in o bezaŋ-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ o wi-ŋgazu,
in o bezaŋ wi-ndela,
nɛ kɔ̧ mɛ zii usamɔ ko GASA WAN na.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-zɔk-mɔ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk mɔ na»,
in ha̧ o
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ kpasa wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ na,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧-wen,
in wen-ɔr-mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é kpasa yuwar duk,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á̧r e kpasa yuwar duk,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ wen ko Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ,
sa Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
«Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ pi̧i̧ wen kɔ‘m taŋ
e nɛ ta nɛ dee ŋgamɔ
in dee ɗaŋmɔ ga,
ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk
hee ŋma ŋgeŋ nɛ mbaŋa,
nɛ hɛɗa mɛ tir a nu ga.
A̧ tɛ gba ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ a nu hee kpánà
nɛ‘i beka ba be ŋma gbaa-a mɛ a̧ŋ nɛ wee
kà bó nɛ̀ ɗua-a nɛ yi na mbɛt ga.»
Wen nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mi tɛ kpasi'nɛ́,
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m
in n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk keɗeŋ.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ duk sɛ́ɛ́m
in n’ɛnɛ tɛ e ta nɛ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kpa nɛ ŋgai,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ mɔ‘i na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́‘e: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dáŋ nyaŋa,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ yú mɔ yak!»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ gɔ!
Wen, kóó ɛ̀nɛ̀ daŋ nɛ keekee-nyaŋa nɛ ma yi nyɛmna,
o wi-ndak-ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ ma yi nɛ haya-a gan'nɛ.
Ɓɛɛ bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ booro tɛ yu mɔ ti wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk;
o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɔɔrɔ
tɛ gba'nɛ́ nɛ nu,
hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ pɛsi yu mɔ yak lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ oi mɔ nɛ tɛ ɓɔn,
nɛ te n’ɛnɛ zu̧u̧ so
nɛ̀ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ sɛn zu kaya mɛ‘i ɓɛɛ.
GASA WAN pɛm mɛ́ ha̧ mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ta-tɛ;
mɛ nɛ hegɔ n'aa tɛ́ mɛ de ko h’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧
nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
O wi nɛ e ta nɛ a̧ duk kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
O bíí
ɛnɛ beka hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ ɓɔna;
a̧ tɛ zii aia-nú k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ko h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kà a̧ zii
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi dita-see,
a̧ tɛ ha̧ yi h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wan-usi-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka hu̧si tɛ nɛ ɛnɛ na,
gbaayí‘nɛ́ tɛ zɔk a̧.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ si war wiiko, kóó si war gale,
zer'nɛ́ tɛ zii wen nɛ wa tɔ̧ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́‘e:
«Yuwar nɛ mɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ i̧i̧.»
O mɔɔ-kpe-zu o géé-sɔ̧
nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-mbɔi
tɛ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ yí‘nɛ́
in lɔr nɛ wa sɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ tɛ kai o mbula-a a taŋ hee ndiŋmɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kai wa a taŋ si zan.
Hegɔ GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ kórò
mɛ hɔ a zu kpar-nyɔnɔ nɛ mɛ guna;
nyɔnɔ tɛ nu'i tɛ dɛm nɛ dɔka-a,
in tɛ duk nɛ de-a mbɛt.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i o mɔ-dai kɔ-mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ
de mbɔɗi zɔ̧ tɛ gba de fara-dai-wa.
O ndai in o tuifuu-wa-fɔ
tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ de zɔ̧
nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ ŋmaa in tɔŋ.
O yi tɛ fok nɛ zu kusa kaya
in nɛ zu o zu-tɔ̧́ mɛ tɛnɛ
wese nɛ gasa biro tɛ kum o bíí,
ɓɛɛ tɛ kale ŋgimbi'i,
o zɔm kusa tua-pɛm-mɔ tɛ gbin a nu.
Nyaŋa-zɛ tɛ tok hee wese ga,
ɓɛɛ wese tɛ kpɔr war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo gan kuti-a.
Nɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ GASA WAN
tɛ a nɛ nyina yí-da̧i̧ ko dukbíí kɔ‘i,
hɛr nɛnɛ ha̧ da̧i̧‘i mɛ wii.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí nin GASA WAN
nɛ hu̧r nɛ nyɛi̧a nu mɛ tɛnɛ‘i;
nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ kpɔra in ɔ ŋgaya.
Sɔnti-a kaia, kpo rot nɛ nyimsea;
leɓe-a duk hee wee nɛ bíí mɔ'ɛ ga.
Búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú-a duk hee mbeŋ-yì ga
nɛ tɛ ha̧ daŋ hɔ tiger-a.
A̧ tɛ zɛk o tugun bíí
tɛ mɔɔ-zɛk-mɔ nɛ tɛ kum bíí,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧i̧ kana-yɔa-a sɛn nu o dukbíí lɛŋ.

Ɛnɛ tɛ bìì gima hee wan nɛ‘i bíí mɛ zɛ, wese gbaŋa ŋgimbi nɛ‘i duk nɛ tortɛ'ɛ ga. Ɛnɛ tɛ kpa desee hee ko ŋma bíí nɛ nɛ́ nɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ger fol nɛ wa dɔm mɛ daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya ko GASA WAN, sitɛ kam-ta ko
GASA WAN tɛ de
ha̧ o bíí mɛ zii tiger-a;
a̧ tɛ usi er-a n'aa tɛ ba nɛ ŋgɔn
mɛ gusi nɛ wa tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧,
nɛ duk hee wee nɛ dɔ zɔ̧
in ŋga búk-kóro-ɓɔrɔ ga.
Tɛ Asirii tɛ nak tɛ zia tiger GASA WAN.
GASA WAN tɛ gus'aa nɛ nyasi kɔ‘i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ gusi nɛ a̧ nɛ nyasi'i, o bíí tɛ mbɛr bi̧ɔ̧ in koloŋ mbɛt yɔ nɛ yɔyɛ. GASA WAN tɛ fo er nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ dee biro in a̧.
Wa ɗafa fara-dɔ-wɔr kaɗi;
wa za̧a̧ kɔ̧ nɛ ɗuka-a in nɛ pɛsa-a,
o zɔ̧ in o gua a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dɔka-a,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ búk kɔ̧ nú GASA WAN
