a̧ tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i
hee naa-wan-wee ga.
Bɔnɛ tɛ kpa o wi nɛ zir si Egiptɛ
mɛ kii gbakamɔ,
wen wa e ta nɛ dɔka keekee,
in o gba gii nyaŋa,
ɓɛɛ wa e ta nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
kà bó nɛ̀ zɔka mɔ sitɛ a̧ na mbɛt.
A̧ nɛ ŋga-wi,
nɛ nyɛma mɛ dak ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu bíí;
mɔ n'aa tɔ̧a̧ kaɗi,
a̧ tɛ de kana mɔ‘i.
See-aa tɛ kur nɛ ŋgaya-a zu o wi-ɗaŋ,
in o wi nɛ ye ɗoŋ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt.
O bíí Egiptɛ nɛ bíí,
wa bó nɛ́ sɔ̧ na;
o nyaŋa kɔ-wa a̧a̧ nɛ mur-tɛ,
ŋgayamɔ ko
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN be tɛɛ nyɛi̧ er,
o wi-pɛm-wa tɛ tir a nu,
mɔɔ-pɛm-wa tɛ tik,
ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ tɛ de geemɔ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nana-dila nɛ̀ ko be dila
nyɛm mɛ yu mɔ zu wɔr saɗi kɔ‘i
wen
mɛ nɛ kalemɔ in am GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ŋgimbi n'am tɛ zir mɛ nɛɛ bi biro
zu kaya
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ pɛm Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ
o nɔ̧́í̧ nyar nɛ ɓaa kpe nɛ zu o kui kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
A̧ tɛ pɛm a̧, a̧ tɛ kpas'a,
a̧ tɛ fo o ŋgamɔ yinɛ zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gboo a̧ mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ o be
Wese'i, ɛnɛ tɛ kai o géé-sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr k’ɛ́nɛ́ a taŋ, wen wa nɛ o mɔɔ-simbo nɛ er'nɛ́ dea.
O be Asirii tɛ tik nu
nú gba-paa ko Sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ kum wa lɛŋ,
wa tɛ pɛsi yu mɔ yak nú gba-paa'i,
ɓɛɛ o daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa
tɛ ya o bara-biro.
Bele zara kam-ta-ɛk-tɛ kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak.
Tɛ o be-wan kɔ̧-a̧ naka,
ɓɛɛ wa yu mɔ e tutuwal kɔ-wa duk mbɛt.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ wee kɔ̧-a̧ duk
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ lɔk
Mbe wannu tɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ o wan mbɛt tɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a.
Kóó o nde tɛ duk nɛ̀ fara-hu̧si tɛ-wi wen búk,
tua-hu̧si-kórò, kóó hee foka-yì zu ŋga nu ga;
wa tɛ duk hee gi̧ɔ̧ gasa ta
zu kora nu sɛn ŋga-gbárà ga.
Hegɔ gbaayí o wi nɛ zɔk mɔ
beka kpe ɓɔna;
o wi-zii-mɔ tɛ yeŋ zer mɛ zii mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧.
O wi nɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ hakilo na
tɛ kii mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧;
leɓe o wi-guguma tɛ bur,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ haya-a in nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Bíí beka sa mgbelewi'e, gasawi na,
ɓɛɛ wi beka tu̧ tɛ wi-ndela na mbɛt,
wen yí-tom ko wi-iŋ-mɔ na
nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbélé wen nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ see-aa duk tɛ ɗaŋmɔ,
de nɛ ɗaŋ, tɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋ wen nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zu GASA WAN;
a̧ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ tik ŋgata,
kà bó nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ yí-nɔɔ
ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ yi gbɛ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko wi-ndela,
tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ gbɛɛ-zu,
a̧ ɓir nɛ wen-ndela nɛtɛ nɛtɛ
wen pi̧i̧ bɔnɛ zu o wi-kɔsa,
kóó war wen ko o wi-kɔsa nɔ‘i
duka so nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ war ko kpasa bíí,
mɔ n'aa ta lɛŋ nɛ kpasamɔ,
ɓɛɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧ duk nɛ kpasamɔ mbɛt.
O okoo nɔ'ɔ nɛ ta mɔ na’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m!
Ɛnɛ o zíŋ-zíŋ zɔŋa nɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i:
«Ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk nɛ̀ ŋma be ŋgimbi zu-a tikiɗi,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ nak,
ɛnɛ o okoo nɔ'ɔ nɛ taamɔ bo na’ɛ,
wen kà ŋgimbi-mɔi̧-nyɔnɔ yak kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ nyɔnɔ kaɗa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ nak,
ɛnɛ o zíŋ-zíŋ zɔŋa nɔ'ɔ.
Gba-gbana a̧ ba'nɛ́,
ɛnɛ o okoo nɔ'ɔ nɛ ta mɔ na’ɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɔ̧́í̧ mɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ mgbii.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ laa-zim-mɔ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r yí-see'nɛ́,
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ de so
ŋgimbi nɛ tortɛ ba nɛ ɛnɛ
tɛ dɛma-a nɛ fɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dɛm’ɛ ga,
in nɛ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́
gasi nɛnɛ nɛ de-a’ɛ ga.
Nu ko dukbíí kɔ‘m
gu nɛ zu tua-de-tortɛ lɛŋ,
in zu o ye-de-nyɛŋɛ kɔ-wa,
kpee nɛ o tɛn in o tɛn-dara.
Bíí bo zu damti ɓɔna,
o bíí gbina tɛ ye-de-ŋgamɔ‘i yak lɛŋ.
Ofɛl in ŋga tua-pɛm-mɔ
kifa duk nɛ gee fara kpoo nɛ kpoo,
fara nɛ o tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ
nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ nɛ ga̧a̧-see
in fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o mɔ-dai.
«Nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tikiɗi,
Sa̧a̧
hegɔ ŋga-gbárà tɛ kifi duk nɛ fara-dɛm-nyɔnɔ,
ɓɛɛ fara-dɛm-nyɔnɔ
tɛ kifi kɔ‘i nɛ́ kombo.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ duk kɔ̧ kombo'i,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ duk tɛ de fara-dɛm-nyɔnɔ mbɛt.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ;
kpɔk deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a'i
tɛ de ha̧ bíí mɛ kpa
de duka-a nɛ de-a kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m tɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
ŋma mɔ beka fo wa na,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ de-a mbɛt.
«Ɓɔrɔ tɛ gbin te kɔ̧ kombo'i a nu lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ye tɛ tik.
Ɛnɛ tɛ ya tɛ demɔ,
wen ɛnɛ tɛ gun mɔ sɛn ká̧ yi,
ɓɛɛ o ndai in o tuifuu k’ɛ́nɛ́
tɛ kpa de duka-a.»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu mɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ,
nɛ ŋma bíí tɛ ɗaŋ mɔ kɔ-mɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
in mɛ wi-ɔr-wi nɛ wa tɛ ɔr mɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na!
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ be tɛɛ kaɗi ɗaŋa mɔ ko ŋma bíí,
nɛ́ tɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ ŋma bíí tɛ ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ be tɛɛ kaɗi ɔra bíí,
a̧ wa tɛ ɔr nɛ mɛ mbɛt.
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́!
Ɛ́ɛ́ é ta nɛ ɛnɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ.
Kà o dukbíí zii giti mbaŋa-kórò,
ɓɛɛ wa pɛsa yu mɔ yak;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ kur ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ pɛsa sót-sót.
O bíí ŋmakpari mɔɔ-oi
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ba nɛ o gba-dɔya’ɛ ga;
ɛ́ɛ́ tik zu mɔ‘i
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o gba-dɔya tik nɛ zu o nyɔnɔ'ɛ ga mbɛt.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN nɛ ɔ wan ŋgɔn mɛ;
a̧ ee deemɔ nɛ tana-a in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a zu
Gasa kpaamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ́ duka-a nɛ de-a tɛ kpasamɔ;
iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ,
ká bá nɛ̀ yuu kíí GASA WAN
tɛ duk nɛ mbɔi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o bíí ko Ariɛl
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ gba-war nɛnɛ,
o betom ko ga̧a̧mɔ hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee mbɛt.
O yuwar lɛŋ duk keŋgeŋge,
ŋma wi-ɓir-war bo na,
bíí da̧ nɛ o wi-sedaako kinii,
wi zɔk ŋmaa sur yi ɓɔna.
Nù hí̧í̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio nɛ ɗaŋsee,
Libaŋ hí̧í̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧-foe, kor nɛnɛ;
bɔkɔ-nu Sarɔŋ kifa ŋga-gbárà;
ŋma mɔ bo zu Basaŋ in Karmɛl ɓɔna.
GASA WAN'e: «Mi tɛ kur ŋgɔn kinii,
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ yor ŋgɔn nɛ de-a kinii,
bíí tɛ zɔk ŋgai kɔ‘m kinii mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ baa zaŋ zɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ko nɛ yuɗu;
búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú‘nɛ́ nɛ duk nɛ wee'i
tɛ dɔ‘nɛ́ gbɛ lɛŋ.
O dukbíí tɛ bìì wee ɗololo kifi nɛ ɓɔndɔ;
wa tɛ kifi dúk nɛ́ tɛnmɔ
nɛ‘i gɔma a nu wen dɔa-a nɛ wee.
Ɛnɛ o wi nɛ ya nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ n'am dea,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ ya katɛ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ ŋgai kɔ‘m mbɛt.»
O ɗaŋwi ya zu
gasa gba-gbana ba nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ!
«Nɛ́ o mgbara yɛ nɛ tɛ yor ti ŋga-wee'i o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ yor ti gba kɔ̧ wee
nɛ bi na kpoo nɛ kpoo'i o?»
Nɛ́ wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
nɛ̀ duk tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ kpasawen;
nɛ̀ ba mɔ er o bíí nɛ ɔrmɔ na,
nɛ̀ pɛr er bɛ̧ nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ gee,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kpe zer tɛ baa ɗaŋ keta ko o wi-gbɛ-zu,
nɛ̀ kpe yí wen ka a̧ tɛɛ zɔk ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi’ɛi tɛ ɔ wan zu o kusa-fara,
a̧ tɛ hu̧si kɔ̧ ŋga tua-hu̧si-tɛ
nɛ wa dea zu kam-ta,
a̧ tɛ kpa kam,
ɓɛɛ yi beka ɓan a̧ na.
Yí-mɛ́ tɛ zɔk wannu tɛ déè kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zɔk pɛsa nu nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Tɛ-mɛ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ŋga mɔɔ-kíì!
Wi nɛ duka so mɛ kpe naŋ mɔ a̧a̧ dee?
Wi nɛ duka so mɛ mɔi̧ garama a̧a̧ dee?
Wi nɛ duka so mɛ tɔr o tua-pɛm-mɔ mbɛt a̧a̧ dee nde?
Mɛ beka zɔk ŋga dukbíí
nɛ tɛ gan mɛ na,
in mɛ beka zɔk dukbíí
nɛ tɔ̧ ŋma nú nɛ mɛ beka zii gba̧a̧-a̧ na,
kà bó nɛ̀ ŋma ŋga nú nɛ‘i iŋ mgbara-a na, na mbɛt.
Mɛ mbaɗi mɔ si
gba de ye de o gbaŋa k’ɛɛ;
yí-mɛ tɛ zɔk Jerusalɛm,
gba de ga̧a̧ ye,
nɛ duk nɛ́ tua-laa
nɛ‘i beka yai yinɛ na,
kà bó nɛ̀ bura o nyak-aa yinɛ na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ GASA WAN
tɛ usi nɛ gasamɔ kɔ‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́.
Zika-fara'i duna nɛ o zɔm pɛsa nana-yì nyɛmna
in o pɛsa gbáá-yì
ɓɛɛ o kombon-biro beka bir hi̧i̧ na,
kóó o zɔm gasa-a mbɛt
beka yak fara'i na.
GASA WAN nɛ Wan-gɔn-kita k’ɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ Wan-ha̧-heembea h’ɛ́ɛ́.
GASA WAN nɛ wannu k’ɛɛ,
in a̧ nɛ Wan-kpasi-ɛɛ mbɛt.
O nyak-kun-kombon kɔ-mɛ bura,
wi beka kun làá-bà-búk,
kóó tutuwal sɛn tɛ te-kombon'i ɓɔna.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ ɛɛ tɛ kɛ̧ o mɔɔ-oi-biro
nɛ dɔka-a nɛ er ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ o wi-kum tɛ kai war kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Ŋma bíí Jerusalɛm nɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e,
kɔ‘i, wi nɛ wi-zɛɛ wo, bo na;
ɓɛɛ o bíí mɛ Jerusalɛm tɛ kpa ea ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɛnɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́lí pii ti,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ o dukbíí,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ tɛ wen'i.
Nu in o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ
a̧ zii wen kɔ‘m.
Zaŋnu nɛ oi o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ a̧ duk wi-sedaako kɔ‘m.
Ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN
kura zu o tugun bíí lɛŋ
gu nɛ o wi-biro kɔ-wa nɛ oi gun.
A̧ bee mɔ-fio a zu wa
nɛ tɛ kum wa gbuɗuk a nu lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ kai wɔr-wa a nɛ ká̧ yuwar,
pɛr mbɔra wɔr-wa tɛ nun dam fara lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ tɔk tɛ-wa tɛ fok nɛ zu kaya mɛ a nu,
ɓɛɛ wese in zɛ,
ká bá nɛ̀ o sɔra mɛ yiwese tɛ yeli,
yiwese tɛ kar tɛ-wi
hee kara-kalata ga,
ɓɛɛ o sɔra tɛ ai nɛ yiwese a nu
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa̧a̧ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
in wa̧a̧ te-mbɔra ai nɛnɛ a nu’ɛ ga.
GASA WAN'e:
Yí gba-paa kɔ‘m yiwese mɛ ɔ mgbekeyeke-kéréré
hee yí wi-gbɛ-ɗɔ̧ɔ̧ ga;
a̧ tɛ tik zu Edɔm in dukbíí n'am foma
ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk bɔnɛ.
Tɔk in nɔ kpee yí gba-paa ko GASA WAN;
mɛ nɛ tɔk o sami in gbadua,
ká bá nɛ̀ o vala sami,
wen mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko GASA WAN
a̧a̧ Bosra mɛ,
ɓɛɛ fara-kum-bíí a̧a̧ kɔ‘i sɛn Edɔm.
Tɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i,
o nam tɛ kum
gu nɛ o wiwii-ndai,
in o be-wiwii-a mbɛt;
nù kɔ-wa tɛ kpe nɛ tɔk in nɔ tɛ-wi.
Kinii'i, ŋgimbi kifa-er ko GASA WAN hɔa,
pɛ yéé ɗoŋ
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ de mɔ ba nú o wi-sɛn
O ŋga foka-yì mɛ Edɔm tɛ kifi yì-ŋgoŋgoe,
o fuunu tɛ kifi baraadu,
ɓɛɛ nu kɔ-wa tɛ bìì wee hee sɔ̧́ɔ̧́-bírí ga.
Wee'i beka bi na zɛ nɛ wese,
ɓɛɛ zi-wee-aa tɛ tur nɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
fara'i tɛ kifi nɛ ŋga-gbárà
nɛ bíí beka ɓir nɛnɛ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ duk nɛ fara ko o diri in o ŋgɛzɛ,
ká bá nɛ̀ o gbakaɗa in o gba-kɔra mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ de ha̧ nu'i
mɛ ŋgai kotoro kifi gee fara
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ duka so nɛ ti ga.
Ŋma gasa wi-de-wan nɛ tɛ de wan
ha̧ ŋma wannu mɛ ɔ ye fara'i, bo na;
o be-wan yambala yak lɛŋ.
O tɛn-dara in o tɛn-ga̧a̧
ká bá nɛ̀ naakɔɓa tɛ hɔ kɔ̧ ŋga tua-pɛm-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ kifi duk
nɛ fara-ya ko o gbóò in o ndao.
O kóŋgóló-dɔmɔ tɛ kpa ŋmaa in o ɓoŋgo,
ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ duk nɛ fara-duk
ko o ɗaŋ-sɔ̧ in o gba-nyɔŋ-wi,
wa tɛ ɔm tɛ sɛn hi̧i̧.
Gɔ́k tɛ gɔm bɔk pi̧ kui a sɛnɛ,
bɛɛ ɔɔ zu-a ha̧ kui'i mɛ mbaŋ o be-a;
ɓɛɛ o tama tɛ mɔi̧ lɛŋ kpa ŋmaa fara'i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí wen’ɛ zaŋ kalata ko GASA WAN, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa wen’ɛ nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e:
«Ŋma kóó kpɔk mgbara wa yɔ na,
o nde beka de kíì wen ɓii-aa na;
wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧,
wen mɛ nɛ mɔ nɛ nú GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧.
Mɛ nɛ tɛ
a̧ a̧ mɔi̧a nɛ wa.
Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN
a̧ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa,
wen ha̧ o nde mɛ kpa fara kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya fara'i in o bezaŋ-wa
nɛ tɛ hɔ ɗoŋ ŋmaa nɛnɛ;
fara'i tɛ duk nɛ fara kɔ-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ŋga-gbárà in kora-nu a̧ ya nɛ desee,
ndaɗa-nu a̧ de nyɛŋɛ,
ɓɛɛ de mbɔɗi zɔ̧ a̧ hɔ kpe sɛnɛ lɛŋ.
A̧ a̧ de nyɛŋɛ hiɗi nɛ mɔ nɛ desee;
gasamɔ mɛ Libaŋ hɔɔ kaɗi,
zɔnamɔ mɛ Karmɛl in Sarɔŋ hɔɔ mbɛt kaɗi;
ɛɛ tɛ zɔk gasamɔ ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ zɔka zɔnamɔ ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ er'nɛ́ nɛ mbɔia so kaɗi
mɛ kpa ŋgai in zugur'nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi nɛ see ŋmana'e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu mɔ na.
Ɛnɛ zɔk, mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́
a̧ tɛ mɛ kifi er ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́,
zu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa de so h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mɛ nɛ a̧ nɛ tɛ-a a̧ tɛ mɛ kpasi'nɛ́.»
Ɓɛɛ yí o wi-boma-yí nɛ zɔk mɔ na tɛ zɔk mɔ,
zer o wi-mgbee-zer tɛ gbo ha̧ wa mɛ zii mɔ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-kum tɛ kpíɗí hee gbin-te ga,
mukɛ̧ tɛ hiɗi mɔ nɛ desee,
wen yì tɛ kok nɛ ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o ŋga foka-yì tɛ fok nɛ tɛ sira-nu mɛ tɛnɛ.
Nù nɛ bia so wee lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ yí-fuk,
ɓɛɛ zika-nù nɛ wɔ yi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ
tɛ kifi nɛ kpút-kpút-yì zu-zer.
O di̧i̧ ko o gbóò lɛŋ
tɛ kifi nɛ da̧a̧ mbufu-gba-toro in púmbú.
Wa tɛ de ŋma gba de yuwar sɛn hi̧i̧
nɛ̀ wa tɛ sa'e, sa̧a̧ war.
Ŋma ndiŋwi beka ɓir zu yuwar'i na,
wen nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ-wi a̧ hu̧i̧ yuwar'i;
o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ-na beka yɔ kaya tɛ war'i na mbɛt.
Dila beka duk hi̧i̧ ɓɔna,
o ŋga saɗi-ba-mɔ beka ba war'i ɓɔna mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ o wi nɛ Sɔ̧ gɔna zu wa a̧ tɛ ba war'i.
O bíí nɛ́ GASA WAN gɔna zu wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ hɔ
Saŋa-yi-wa tɛ tok nɛ desee
nɛ̀ beka kaɗi na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ in desee;
nyimmɔ in aia-nú beka hɔ tɛ-wa ɓɔna.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-naar pɛ-wan ko Ezɛkias wannu Juda, Senakerib wannu Asirii bìì o ŋga-ye Juda, ɓɛɛ ba.
Wannu Asirii toma betom nɛ Lakis mɛ nɛnɛ sitɛ wannu Ezɛkias sɛn Jerusalɛm. Betom'i nɛ Rabsake in o gba gii wi-biro. A̧ yora mgbák nu-ŋgere nɛ o bíí za̧a̧, yuwar fara-fɔr-laa.
Eliakim, bem ko Hilkia, wan-duk-zu tua ko wannu nɛɛ kpa a̧; wa nɛa in Sɛbna, bem ko Yɔa bem ko Asap sitɛ a̧.
Rabsake tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias'e, mɔ nɛ mi gasa wannu Asirii tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mɔ nɛ mɛ e nɛ ta kinii’ɛ nɛ ge?
Mɛ tɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ‘e, nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen tikiɗi, ɓɛɛ wi kpaa tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ in ŋgai tɛ biro nde? Wi nɛ mɛ e nɛ ta, de nɛ ŋgazu in am’ɛ nɛ o?
Mɛ́ é ta nɛ Egiptɛ, nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ɓui nɛ‘i ba ɓɛɛ gbaa a er wi’ɛ ga. Mɔ nɛ wannu Egiptɛ de in o wi nɛ e ta nɛ a̧, a̧‘i.

«Mana ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹Ɛɛ e ta nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,› ɓɛɛ bo nɛ kale Sɔ̧‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Ezɛkias ɗaŋa o gasa fara-gas'aa gu nɛ o fara-ɗaf'aa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm'e, wa a̧ gu nu sɛn ti ɛ̧ɛ̧ fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧'ɛ, na nde?
«Ɔ dee mɛ e nú mɛ in gasa wan kɔ‘m wannu Asirii, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ o nyaŋa booro-yiitoo ha̧ mɛ, kà mɛ a̧ nyɛma kpaa o wi-daŋ-aa.
Mɛ nyɛm mɛ zik ɗoŋ mɛ e ha̧ wi-duk-zu zika-nù ko wan kɔ‘m nɛ duk nɛ geɗek wi-de-tom ti a̧ na, wen mɛ e ta nɛ Egiptɛ mɛ ha̧ o keekee-nyaŋa in o wi-daŋ-aa ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e bo nɛ GASA WAN a̧ gbak am nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am kpa nɛ ŋgai mɛ ɗaŋ ye kɔ-mɛ yínɛ́'ɛ na nde? Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m, a̧‘m bi ye kɔ-mɛ, a̧‘m ɗaŋ ye'i lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti yinɛ!»

Ɓɛɛ Eliakim, Sɛbna, ká bá nɛ̀ Yɔa tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-pɛm-gbagari'i: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ nú arameɛn ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen nɛ́ nú‘i ɛ̀ɛ̀ zii, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ nú ko o be Juda na, wen o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ya zu garo biro’ɛ.»

Rabsake kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ ta k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, mɛ nɛ wen ɛnɛ in wannu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ a̧ wan kɔ‘m toma nɛ‘m tɛnɛ mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ? Weyaa, mi tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ ya zu tua-pɛm-mɔ'ɔ. Nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ ɗɔr kɔ-wa in nɔɔ ini mɛ yí-ndaa-wa nɛ tɛ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ ɛnɛ mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ Rabsake tɔ̧ wen nɛ nú ko o be Juda nɛ hee ger ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ gasa wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
A̧‘e nde, ká Ezɛkias ɔr'nɛ́ na; a̧ beka kpasi'nɛ́ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen ko Ezɛkias nɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, ɛ̀nɛ̀ e ta nɛ GASA WAN, a̧ tɛ kpasi'nɛ́, a̧ beka e ha̧ o wi-biro ko wannu Asirii mɛ ba ye k’ɛɛ na wo'i, na.

K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen ko Ezɛkias na. Mɔ nɛ wannu Asirii tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in am, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín pii tɛ‘m; ɓɛɛ kóó o nde mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ nyɔŋ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in te-mbɔra kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘i, in wa tɛ nɔ yi kɔ̧ gɔna-yi kɔ-wa nɛ ga̧a̧-see mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai'nɛ́ si gba de nù nɛ duk hee nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga, nu nɛ duna nɛ alkamaari in dɔ̧ɔ̧, ká bá nɛ̀ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ zii ɔramɔ ko Ezɛkias nɛ ɔr nɛ ɛnɛ‘e nde, GASA WAN tɛ kpasi'nɛ́‘i na. Ɛnɛ zɔka o géé-sɔ̧ ko o tugun bíí kpasa so o bíí kɔ‘i er wannu Asirii ŋma wese, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zii?
O sɔ̧ ko Hamat in Arpad a̧a̧ de? Ɛnɛ zɔka o sɔ̧ ko Sefarvaim a̧a̧ dee? O sɔ̧ ko Samarii ya dee? Wa kpasa Samarii er-am ŋma wese, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk kaɗi?
Mgbara o sɔ̧ ko nu nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya hɛ̧ɛ̧, ge sɔ̧ ge ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka nɛ̀ kpasa nù kɔ‘i er-am kaɗi, sɛka GASA WAN kpasi nɛ Jerusalɛm ge?› »
Wa lɛŋ yaa nɛ oi-nú selele, ŋma bíí mɛ kifi nú bo na, wen mɛ nɛ heembea nɛ wannu Ezɛkias ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa'e, ka'i kifi nú na.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Eliakim, bem ko Hɛlkia, gasawi kɔ̧ kira ko wannu in Sɛbna wi-yɔr-kalata ko wannu, ká bá nɛ̀ Jɔas bem ko Asaf, wan-kasi-kalata-nyɛrɛmɔ nu'i tɛɛ tɛ Ezɛkias nɛ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ wen ko Rabsake lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.
Nɛ̀ wannu Ezɛkias zia wen'i, a̧ a̧ka̧ laa tɛ-a, pi̧ bufu tɛ, ɓɛɛ yak si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN.
A̧ toma Eliakim gasawi zu kira ko wannu, ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛbna, wi-yɔr-kalata in o gasa wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ laa-bufu tɛ-wa sitɛ
mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wannu Ezɛkias a̧ tom ɛɛ tɛnɛ‘e nde: Sɔsɔɔ nɛ wese ɗaŋsee, wese de ko nɛ tɛ yɛ, wese nɛ búù tɛ ba yɛ, wen o bem sɔka mɛ ko kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ŋgai mɛ gɔfi o bem nɔ‘i bo na.

Mana GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zia mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wannu Asirii toma nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘i Rabsake da̧ nɛ kpasa Sɔ̧; ŋmafara GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu a̧ oi ɗaŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧‘i! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ai nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen oi o bíí nɛ ɓɔna.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o gasawi ko wannu Ezɛkias nɛɛ tɛ Esaii, Esaii kifa nú ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu'e nde, mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧ a̧a̧: ‹Ká mɛ́ de kíì wen ɗaŋ wen nɛ wannu Asirii toma nɛ o bíí da̧ nɛ‘m'i na;
mi tɛ e ŋma taamɔ tɛ-a nɛ tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ si nu kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ sɛn tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧‘m tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe nú gba-paa.› »
Rabsake sii ɗoŋ tɛ wannu Asirii, ɓɛɛ kpa a̧ tɛ bíí Libna wen Rabsake zia so nɛti'e nde, wannu Asirii kura Lakis yak kaɗi.
Ŋma nyɛrɛmɔ tɛɛ a zer wannu Asirii'e nde, Tirbaka wannu Etiopii kaia o wi-biro Egiptɛ mɛ bi nɛ wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ wannu Asirii zia mɔ‘i, a̧ toma o betom nɛ haya-a sitɛ wannu Ezɛkias nɛ wen’ɛ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Ezɛkias, wannu Juda'e nde: ‹Ká Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ e nɛ ta zik zu'nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧‘e, wannu Asirii beka ba Jerusalɛm na wo'i, na.
Mɛ zia nyɛrɛmɔ nɛ wannu Asirii dee in o nu lɛŋ n'aa ta mɛ ɗaŋ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e nde, mɔ tɛ hɔ yɔɔ zu-mɛ?
O sɔ̧ ko o bíí ye Gozaŋ, Haraŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ Rɛsɛf, o tugun bíí ko Beledɛn nɛ ya Tɛlasar nɛ wa kuma, nɛ̀ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa kpasi wa na’ɛ, kà bó nɛ̀ mɛ?
O wannu Hamat, Arpad, Lair, Sefarvaim, ká bá nɛ̀ o wannu Hena in Iwa a̧a̧ dee?› »
Wannu Ezɛkias baa kalata'i er betom, ɓɛɛ tɔr. Ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ nɛɛ ba kalata'i daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ tati kalata'i ti GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ Ezɛkias gu nu ti GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ai nú ha̧ a̧ hegɔ:
«GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú k’ɛɛ, GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ pii tɛ yɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí o ɗaŋ wen nɛ Sɛnakɛrib tom da̧ nɛ ɛnɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpasa’ɛ.
Mɛ nɛ kpasawen, GASA WAN, ɛɛ iŋa'e wannu Asirii ɗaŋa o tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ gu nɛ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
A̧ gbina o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a tɛ wee, wen o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i bo so nɛ́ kpasa Sɔ̧ na, nɛ o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ er-wi dea, nɛ o te in ta; mɛ nɛ wen mɔ‘i sa wa ɗaŋ wa yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ er-a; mi ai nu h’ɛ́nɛ́, wen ha̧ oi o wannu zaŋnu’ɛ mɛ iŋ‘e, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN.»
Esaii bem ko Amɔs toma nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Kifa-nú ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
Boko be
Sɛnakɛrib wannu Asirii,
boko be Jerusalɛm mir nɛ nú sitɛ mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ o mɛ da̧ GASA WAN,
tɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋ wen ha̧ a̧ o?
Mɛ́ hú̧í̧ nú-mɛ tuɓi nɛ da̧ a zu ge bíí ge?
Mɛ kura zu Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mɛ toma o ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ da̧ nɛ GASA WAN,
wen mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e:
‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ o dɔka keekee-nyaŋa kɔ‘m
a̧‘m daŋa nɛ kusa kaya hɔ zu-a mɛ,
mi hɔɔ mgbák ɗata zu kaya Libaŋ mɛ;
mi gɔma o kusa
mi tɛ ye kombo kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nduti-a mɛ.
Mi gɔna yi,
ɓɛɛ mi nɔ o yi nɔ‘i.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o yi mɛ Egiptɛ lɛŋ
mɛ ɔ̧sa̧ wen zu naŋ-am.›
«Mɛ́ íŋ‘e nde, o mɔ nɛ dee kinii lɛŋ,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ o mɔ n'am ɗafa so nɛti,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ kinii a̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ na nde?
Mɛ ta mɛ ɗaŋ o gasa ye yinɛ
ha̧ wa mɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi.
O bíí tɛ ye'i lɛŋ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai na,
kíì de wa dee,
ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa nak nak;
wa ya hee bɔr-nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ ga,
hee zɔ̧ tua, koo hee alkamaari a̧ gbɛɛ dua ga.
«Mi iŋa ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ yor nɛ ŋgɔn
in nɛ mɛ duk nɛ nù mbɛt;
ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ gbo nɛnɛ
in ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ye nɛ mɔ mbɛt;
mi iŋa o ŋgimbi nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
See-mɛ nyima zu'm,
hegɔ o ɗaŋ wen kɔ-mɛ aa zer-am.
Mi tɛ pi̧ boi zɔ̧ɔ̧-mɛ
in káná kɔ‘m nú-mɛ,
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ zik tɛ-mɛ
ba yuwar siɗoŋ fara nɛ mɛ tɛɛ so nɛnɛ.

«Ɓɛɛ nɛ war kɔ-mɛ wannu Ezɛkias, mɔ'ɔ tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ ha̧ mɛ: tɛ pɛ'ɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o kpar-nyɔnɔ n’ɛnɛ guna; pɛ mɛ ɗoŋ-aa, ɛnɛ tɛ mɔi̧ kana hegɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ tɛ taar pɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ gun mbe mɔ, ɛnɛ mɔi̧a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛɛ gun o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o waya-a mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ oi o bíí nú-gara ko Juda nɛ duk kpasa tɛ dɛm woyo, kunin-wa tɛ gbai, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ wai woyo.
Oi o bíí tɛ gbo nɛ Jerusalɛm, in nɛ zu kaya
«Mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ wen’ɛ zu wannu Asirii: A̧ beka ye saaye’ɛ mɛ bi a̧ na; a̧ beka pi̧ goo kóó kpɔk na, a̧ beka e ŋgee-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ti ye'i na, kà bó nɛ̀ mboo mɔ zik nɛ ye’ɛ na mbɛt.
Yuwar n'aa tɛ̀ɛ̀ so nɛnɛ‘i, a̧ a̧ tɛ si kana nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt, a̧ beka ye saaye’ɛ na. Nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Mi tɛ pɛm ye’ɛ kpasi nɛ a̧, nɛ ŋma mɔ beka fo a̧ na, wen zu'm nɛ tɛ‘m, in wen zu David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m mbɛt.»
Mɛ zɛ‘i, betom ko GASA WAN gboo, ye gbagari biro ko o bíí Asirii, ɓɛɛ gbɛ bíí booro-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ. Nɛ mɔ sa̧a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ, tɛ tuna ya, wa zɔka o wɔr nɛ ya nu sinɛ hegɔ riɓiti.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Senakerib wannu Asirii kura, ɓɛɛ gbin yak si ɗoŋ duk sɛn Ninivɛ.

Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa biti gu nu kɔ̧ tua ko Misrok sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, Adramɛlɛk in Saresɛr o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛɛ tik zu a̧ gɔm a̧ nɛ gba-paa gbɛ yinɛ; ɓɛɛ wa yu mɔ yak si nu Ararat mɛ. Ɓɛɛ Asaradɔŋ, ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ ba wan oi-aa.
Ŋgimbi'i, ŋga zɛɛ baa Ezɛkias ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe, ɓɛɛ Esaii
Ɓɛɛ Ezɛkias zik tɛ zɔk mɔ si zaŋ ŋgeŋ, ɓɛɛ kɔfi GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ̀ mbaŋ ɗoŋ tom n'am dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ see kpɔk nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ mi kia mɛ de nɛ mɔ nɛ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ mbɛt.» Ɓɛɛ Ezɛkias hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ dɔka-a.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Esaii woyo:

«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias'e, mi GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David, mi zia kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧; mi zɔka mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Mi tɛ ha̧ haya-tɛ ha̧ a̧. Ɗoŋ zɛ taar, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ dáŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Mi tɛ ha̧ mbe duka-a ha̧ a̧ siti zaŋnu mɛ de pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ woyo.
Mi tɛ kpasi a̧ sɛn er wannu Asirii, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de mɔ mɛ kpasi ye’ɛ mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ Esaii kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «Mɔ nɛ tɛ usi ha̧ mɛ mɛ iŋ‘e, mɔ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nú wen-aa tɛ de kpasamɔ ha̧ mɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ wannu Ezɛkias nɛ zira so si ɗɔɔ mɛ‘i mɛ daŋ duk oi-aa si ɗoŋ tɛ naŋ ɓu.» Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wese daŋa duk oi-aa hee naŋ ɓu ga tɛ gi̧ɔ̧-mɔ nɛ zira so.
Gima ko Ezɛkias, wannu Juda ŋgimbi n'aa kura nɛnɛ tɛ zɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧:
Ŋgimbi n'am biti so nɛ gba de bozo-wi,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ ye tua ko o fio;
nɛ́ fara'i a̧‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ duk sɛnɛ kaɗi nɛ oi pɛ duka-a kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧ siti woyo:
Mi iŋa nɛ mbetɛ‘e
mi beka zɔk GASA WAN nɛ yí‘m
mgbara bíí zu nu’ɛ ɓɔna,
mi beka zɔk yí ŋma bíí
mgbara o bíí nɛ ya zu nu’ɛ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Wa baa fara-duk kɔ‘m pi̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m
hee gbaksak ko wi-dai-ndai ga;
ɛnɛ kara duka-kpasa kɔ‘m
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wan-fan-bale
kar nɛ yipol-bale’ɛ ga.
Mɔ tɛ ga̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ mɔ kɔ‘m kaɗa, GASA WAN.
Mi gɔfi mɔ ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ zɛ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ;
dúk hee dila a̧ gbin gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m lɛŋ ga,
ɓaa kɔ‘m nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kaɗa'i.
Tɛ‘m mbɔia fara hiɗi mɔ
hee gbiiwara a̧ bu̧i hiɗi nɛ mɔ ga;
ger-am fara tɛ gɔfa mɔ
ai nɛ nú hee gbaku̧i ga;
yí‘m mbɔia tɛ kɛ̧i̧a̧ mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ ŋgɔn mɛ,
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás’ám tɛ ŋgamɔ'ɛ.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ bɔɔ nɛ ge?
Ge mɔ ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ bɔɔ ha̧ a̧ ge?
Mɛ nɛ deemɔ ko GASA WAN;
mi tɛ duk kana zaŋnu'e nɛ dita-see,
wen war mɔ kɔ‘m hɔ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi nɛ mɔ‘i,
hɔ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘m zaŋnu’ɛ.
GASA WAN duk ka̧ tɛ o bíí kɔ‘i;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ ya kpasa,
ɓɛɛ
a̧ tɛ ba'm e ŋgɔn de nɛnɛ ha̧‘m mɛ duk kpasa woyo mbɛt.
Kimni dita-see kɔ‘m kpaia kifi nɛ desee,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa'm ka'm tɛ́ɛ̀ ye kɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ pi̧ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ taŋ nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛnɛ.
Wa gasi'nɛ́ fara ko o fio mɛ na,
o fio beka zɔn nin'nɛ́ na;
o wi nɛ ya kɔ̧ fio ɗɔɔ mɛ‘i
e ta nɛ dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Kana nɛ o bíí nɛ ya kpasa
hee mi ga a̧ gasi'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ;
o dáa-wan-bem we nɛ ɗoŋ demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o bem kɔ‘i.
GASA WAN, tɛ kpas'am n’ɛnɛ kpasa’ɛ,
ɛɛ tɛ dikiɗi o mɔɔ-mbɛr k’ɛɛ
sɛn nu kira k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wese lɛŋ dam ɗoŋ zɛ duka-a k’ɛɛ zaŋnu’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Esaii tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ bá mbɔɗa mbɔra yi gba-da̧i̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ tɛ wii.»
Ɓɛɛ Ezɛkias tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɔɔ-usi-mɔ nɛ tɛ usi ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ‘e, mi tɛ daŋ si kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ ge?»
Ŋgimbi'i, Mɛrodak-Baladaŋ bem ko Baladaŋ wannu Babilɔŋ toma o kalata in o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Ezɛkias, wen a̧ zia so nyɛrɛ zɛɛ n'aa ɔɔ so in haya-tɛ n'aa kpaa mbɛt.

Ezɛkias kpaa desee nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ usi mbɔi kɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ o betom: bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o de pɛr fuu-nyama in o nɔ-a̧, o tua-e-mɔɔ-wan ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Ŋma mɔ kpɔk nɛ Ezɛkias usi sɛn kɔ̧ tua in tɛ nu kɔ‘i ha̧ wa na, bo na.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Esaii
Ɓɛɛ Esaii tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Ge mɔ ge a̧ wa zɔka tɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ-mɛ ge?» Ezɛkias kifa nú: «Wa zɔka o mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m lɛŋ; ŋma mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ tua-e-mɔ kɔ‘m n'am usi ha̧ wa na bo na.»
Ɓɛɛ Esaii tɔ̧ ha̧ Ezɛkias: «Mɛ̀ zíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ:

‹Ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ wa tɛ kai o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ kira-wan kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ, gu nɛ o mɔ nɛ o zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ mɔi̧a e hɔ wese sɔsɔɔ‘i, wa tɛ kai wa yaknɛ er-mɛ lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ. Ŋma oi mɔ nɛ tɛ duk er-mɛ bo na; mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.
Wa tɛ kai o mgbák bezaŋ-mɛ nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wa dee wa nɛ o kpàná-pɛm-kira-wan ko wannu Babilɔŋ.› »
Ɓɛɛ Ezɛkias tɔ̧ ha̧ Esaii: «Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ tɔ̧‘i dee nyɛmna.» Ezɛkias ta kɔ‘i'e, Sɔ̧ ee nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, yor nɛnɛ ɗoŋ wi zu ŋgimbi duka-a kɔ‘i zu nu’ɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛm mɔ na, Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gá̧ see Jerusalɛm;
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e, tom-bara kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa,
bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa,
GASA WAN usa mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧ kaɗi.
Ɓɛɛ ŋma tiger tɔ̧‘e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí yuwar ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́r war'i gbara mɛ nɛ de-a;
mɛ nɛ yuwar ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Gboŋgo lɛŋ a̧ dun,
o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́ lɛŋ a̧ hir.
O be kusa-mɔ lɛŋ a̧ hir nyɛm ŋmaa,
o gboŋgo lɛŋ a̧ dun nyɛm ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ o kaya kifa bɔkɔ-nu.
Hegɔ, gasamɔ ko GASA WAN tɛ gbo zan,
ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ tɛ zɔk a̧.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧ nɛ mɔ‘i.»
Ŋma tiger tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen!»
Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú:
«Nɛ ge wen ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ ge?»
Tiger'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e duka-a ko bíí hɔɔ ŋmaa in zɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ kiitɛ bíí duk hee do-te ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ búk kɔ̧ nú GASA WAN yu,
ɓɛɛ zɔ̧ kora, do-a ai a nu.
Nɛ mbetɛ, o bíí zu nu’ɛ
hɔɔ ŋmaa in zɔ̧.
Zɔ̧ kor kor, ɓɛɛ do-a aia,
ɓɛɛ wen ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
nɛ mɔ nɛ duk kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
mɛ́ yaa-tɔ̧ gba de nú-tom’ɛ!
Jerusalɛm, mɛ́ yaa-tɔ̧ nú-tom tortɛ'ɛ,
ká kíí de mɛ na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nɛ hee ger
ha̧ o ye nu Juda'e:
«Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ!
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɛ‘i,
a̧ tɛ tɛ nɛ ŋgai.
Mɔɔ-wan duk tɛ ŋgai mɛ te er-a.
A̧ hɔɔ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ̧-a̧;
ɓɛɛ kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ya ti a̧.
A̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma wi-dai-mɔ
nɛ dai o mɔ-dai mɔi̧ nɛ wa,
kai nɛ o be-a a zu kóŋgó-ɓaa
ɓɛɛ mgbɔɔ o nana-a nɛ ɓɔna fara ha̧ bere nɛnɛ mɔktɛ.»
Nɛ o'o mɔi̧a yi gba-tɔp
dun kɔ̧-er mɛ zɔk o?
O'o wee pɛsa yiwese nɛ ŋgɛɗɛ-er o?
Nɛ o'o wee dita mbɔɗa-nu nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ kɔ̧ yee o?
Nɛ o'o wee o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́ mɛ iŋ dita-wa o?
Nɛ o'o wee
Nɛ o'o duka nɛ wi-ba-keta in a̧ o?
Ŋma bíí nɛ ba keta in a̧ wen kpaa de taamɔ,
wen gɔna kita nɛ yuwar-a,
wen yuwar iŋamɔ
sɛka wen kpaa iŋamɔ nɛ o?
O tugun bíí sɛn yí Sɔ̧
duk hee be nu yi nɛ kɛ̧ a nu nɛ kɔ̧ kpánà,
kóó hee ɗikɗik fuunu nɛ ya kɔ̧ mɔɔ-we-mɔ'ɛ ga.
O zuduk bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara duk hee ɗikɗik-mɔ ga,
wa diti na.
O te mɛ nu Libaŋ
nɛ oi gun nyɛm mɛ de gua,
kóó o saɗi mɛ sɛnɛ mbɛt
nyɛm wen kpoo-sɔ̧ wen-aa na.
O zuduk bíí zu nu’ɛ lɛŋ duk nɛ geemɔ ti a̧;
ŋma gba̧a̧-mɔ bo tɛ-wa na.
Ɛnɛ nyɛma mɛ we Sɔ̧ nɛ ge?
Tɛ zɔka mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ge mɔ ge?
A̧ nɛ géé-sɔ̧
nɛ̀ wi-nɔi̧-boi nɔi̧a,
yɔk ɗoŋ-aa ɓɛɛ a lɔr sɛnɛ?
Wisan nɛ kpa mɔ
wen mboo sɔ̧ nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi hegɔ‘i na
tɛ kii kɔ‘i nɛ de be ŋga te ha̧ wi-sɛk-te,
ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi sɛka nɛ sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧.
Ɛnɛ iŋ so na?
Ɛnɛ zii so na?
Wa usi so a̧ nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a h’ɛ́nɛ́ na?
Ɛnɛ iŋ so wi-de-nù na nde?
Fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ si ŋgɔn see zu nu,
ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnu ya ti ɗɔɔ-aa
hee o gba-dɔya ga.
A̧ tata yiwese hee ŋma zɔ̧-laa ga,
hee ŋma tua-laa nɛ‘i nyɛma ɔɔ ɗɔɔ-aa ga.
A̧ dee ha̧ o wannu in o wan-gɔn-kita
zu nu’ɛ mɛ kifi geemɔ.
Ɗoŋ-wa tɛ nyɛi̧ tɛ baa fara, ɔ nɛ wan,
kà naŋ-wa nɔ nɛ nu na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ kà ŋga búk mɛ kɔ̧ nú GASA WAN yo wa,
wa kora, ɓɛɛ búk'i ɓoɓa wa kai yaknɛ hee kora zɔ̧ ga.
«K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ tɛ we'm nɛ o?
Mi hɔɔ ŋmaa in o?»
Sɔ̧, Sa̧a̧ Wi a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yí‘nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ́ kɛ̧́í̧ mɔ si yiwese!
Nɛ o'o dee o sɔra o?
Ɛnɛ zɔk, wa ya hee o wi-biro
nɛ duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen biro
ɓɛɛ nɛ hɛra zaŋ ga.
Wa lɛŋ ya wen dee tom ha̧ a̧.
Ŋgai in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ gasa.
Ŋma nin kpɔk mgbara wa nɛ tɛ yɔ a̧ bo na.
Ɛnɛ o be
wen ge s’ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘e:
«GASA WAN zɔk mɔ nɛ hɔ zu yɛ,
Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ iŋ yuwar mɔ k’ɛɛ na, ge?»
Ɛnɛ iŋ na?
Ɛnɛ zii so wen-aa na mbɛt?
GASA WAN nɛ dee nu nɛ oi gun
nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
A̧ mbɔi na in a̧ wɔi na mbɛt;
ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ iŋ ndaa ɗukamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ bo na.
Mɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ wi nɛ mbɔia,
in ha̧ wi nɛ wɔia mbɛt.
O ŋgaiwi mbɔi ɓɛɛ wɔia;
o ŋga-wi tir yɔɔ-mɔ tir ɓɛɛ yoo nu.
Ɓɛɛ ko o wi-e-ta nɛ GASA WAN,
wa kpa nɛ ŋgai siti.
Hiɗi-wa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ
ɓɛɛ wa duk hee zua ga;
wa war yi ɗoŋ-wa nyɛi̧, wa mbɔi na,
wa nɛ siti ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa wɔi na mbɛt.
O bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk nɛ oi nú ti'm;
o dukbíí lɛŋ a̧ kpa nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi!
Wa a̧ ɗɔŋ pii ti wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen;
ɛɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓá kita in o ŋmaa.
Wi nɛ dee ha̧ wi-gɔn-kita
nɛ yuwar-a mɛ daŋa-wese,
mɛ gan biro zu nu,
tir nɛ o wannu a nu,
gɔm nɛ o bíí nɛ gba-paa a mbɔɗɔnu,
yai nɛ wa nɛ goo a taŋ
hee búk a̧ pɛsi kora zɔ̧ ga’ɛ nɛ o,
bo nɛ mi na?
Wi’ɛi ndaka ɗoŋ wa nasi nɛ wa nɛnɛ,
ŋma mɔ fo tɛ-a na,
ɓɛɛ naŋ-a ndɔ nu na mbɛt.
Nɛ o'o dee mɔɔ nɔ‘i o?
Mɛ nɛ Wi nɛ sa o bíí nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ.
Mi GASA WAN, mi duka so nɛ kuti-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk kana tɛ sɔŋkur mɔ mbɛt.
O bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara zɔka so mɔɔ nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ kíì de wa;
o bíí mɛ si ndaa-zan mɛ
gara tɛnɛ nɛ naka-tɛ.
O bíí gbak nɛ ŋmaa
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi!»
Wi-sɛk-te ha̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧ wi-nɔi̧-lɔr;
wi-nɔi̧-lɔr ha̧ nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ wi-dui-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔn nɛ tom ko o ŋmaa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɔ dee!»
Wa kaia o mɔɔ-nɔ‘i a kɔ̧ ŋmaa, ŋgai,
ɓɛɛ ba e ŋgɔn mɛ duk nɛ sɔ̧.
Jakob, mɛ́ bíí n'am hoka,
bezaŋ sɛm kɔ‘m Abraham!
Mi mgbɔɔ mɛ tɛnɛ nɛ nduti nu mɛ,
nɛ sɔŋkur nu mɛ a̧‘m saa nɛ mɛ.
Mɛ wi n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ a̧‘e:
«Mɛ nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m.
Mi hoka mɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ mi siŋa mɛ pi̧ nu na.»
Ká kíì de mɛ na, wen mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ;
ká yí-mɛ gɔn kɔ̧a̧ na,
wen mi nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ mɛ, gbak nɛ mɛ,
kasi nɛ mɛ nɛ war wii er-am
nɛ duk nɛ te-er-gbin-biro.
Ziimɔ in búù tɛ ba o wi nɛ see kur zu mɛ‘i,
wa beka ba zu nɛ ŋgɔn na.
O wi-kii-wen in mɛɛ nɔ‘i
tɛ yambali kifi geemɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa kuma lɛŋ.
Mɛ tɛ kii wisɛn kɔ-mɛ nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mɛ beka kpa wa ɓɔna;
mi tɛ sakali o wi nɛ ha̧m biro pii tɛ-mɛ‘i,
wa tɛ de geemɔ,
wen mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
kasi mɛ nɛ er-am mɛ wiiko,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ‘e: «Ká mɛ de kíì na,
mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ.»
ŋma be dɔk ha̧ wa mɛ mbɔli ga’ɛ,
mi tɛ ye ɗoŋ mɛ.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mɔ nɛ wa dee in mɛɛ‘i ɓɔna kɔ̧ see-am.
Sɔ̧, Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk hee mbe mɔɔ-gusi-alkamaari
nɛ o nin-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ŋgaya-a ga.
Mɛ tɛ gak zu o kaya ɗaŋ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ hɔ̧na o zu-tɔ̧́ mɔk
hee pumyulu alkamaari ga.
Mɛ tɛ pɛfi wa, ɓɛɛ búk kaia wa pɛsi a taŋ;
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ de nyɛŋɛ wen zu GASA WAN,
mɛ tɛ duk tɛ-mɛ nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wisan in o wi-kɔsa tɛ kii yì takaɗi,
nɛ war ger-wa tɛ kor kútú-kútú,
ɓɛɛ mi GASA WAN tɛ zii aia-nú kɔ-wa;
mi Sɔ̧ ko
mi tɛ de ha̧ nana-yì mɛ fok zir nɛ zu kaya mɛ,
ɓɛɛ yi tɛ fok sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋga-gbárà mɛ kifi nɛ gɔna-yì,
in sira-nu mɛ kifi duk nɛ yí-mbuu.
Mi tɛ gun
ká bá nɛ̀ be te nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee
in te-nɔ̧́ sɛn ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ mi guna
ká bá nɛ̀ dɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ kpɔk fara katɛ ŋmaa,
wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ zɔk,
ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ,
ha̧ wa mɛ ta mɔ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa iŋa mgbara-a mbɛt'e,
nɛ́ er GASA WAN,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o sɔ̧ ko o tugun bíí:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbonɛ.
Wannu ko Jakob'e: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧ mgbák yi wen'i;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mgbara mɔ nɛ tɛ‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ yaka,
wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ‘i h’ɛ́ɛ́,
sɛk’ɛɛ iŋa wan nɛ yaka.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́,
ɓɛɛ sɛk’ɛɛ iŋa'e nɛ mbetɛ‘e ɛnɛ nɛ o sɔ̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé kana ŋma be mɔɔ-usi-mɔ,
kóó nɛ ŋma ŋgamɔ, koo ŋma mɔɔ-kíì,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zɔk nɛ yí-ɛɛ sɛ!
Kà bó hegɔ na, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧ mɔ bo tɛ‘nɛ́ na,
tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ geemɔ mbulɛɛ gee;
kóó o nde nɛ hok'nɛ, kifa nɛ mɔɔ-búù hee ɛnɛ ga.
Mi hoka ŋma bíí nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ,
a̧ hɔɔ kaɗi;
si war daŋa-wese mɛ‘i,
wi sa nɛ nin-a.
Wi’ɛi i̧sa̧ o wannu hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i ŋma nɛ ɓɔtɛ,
kóó hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-ɓu-kpánà va̧i̧ nɛ gii’ɛ ga.
Wi nɛ wee so ɗoŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛti h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ nɛ o?
Wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen-aa h’ɛ́ɛ́,
k’ɛɛ tɔ̧‘e wen'i duk nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ o?
Ŋma bíí tɔ̧ wen-aa h’ɛ́ɛ́,
kà bó nɛ̀ wee ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́ɛ́ na mbɛt.
Ŋma bíí mɛ mgbara'nɛ́
nɛ‘i zia wen-aa nú-a, bo na.
Kuti bíí nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa ha̧
ɓɛɛ mi tom nyɛrɛ-a nɛ betom ha̧ Jerusalɛm.
Mi pi̧i̧ yí‘m sitɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mi zɔk ŋma bíí na;
ŋma wi-ba-keta mgbara wa bo na.
Ŋma bíí n'am tɛ ak
ɓɛɛ ká kifa nú ha̧‘m, bo na.
Wa lɛŋ hee o ŋmaa ga, ŋma mɔ bo na;
tom kɔ-wa nɛ gee tum mɔ.
O sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɔ‘i nɛ gee búk
in geemɔ sɔɔ ge!
Wi’ɛ nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m n'am yor ɗoŋ-aa,
a̧ nɛ wi n'am hoka, nɛ see-am lɛŋ duk zu a̧.
Mi ee
nɛ́ wi’ɛi a̧ tɛ ba usamɔ nɛnɛ ha̧ o dukbíí,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu o tugun bíí nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
A̧ beka tɔ̧ wen nɛ ŋgai na;
wi beka zii ger-a na.
Ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ zii ger-a bee-gara bo na mbɛt;
a̧ beka gbin toro nɛ difa na,
a̧ ufi wee lamba nɛ ga̧ tɛnɛ mɛ bi na;
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ usi nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
A̧ beka mbɔi na,
ɓɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ beka ba a̧ na mbɛt
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
tɛ ɔ wan zu nu’ɛ,
in sɛn see zu o bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ lɛŋ.
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ tata yiwese mgbalak
in nu nɛ oi o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ha̧
in o mɔ mɛ zu-a, tɔ̧, nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Nɛ́ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a
a̧ mi GASA WAN saa nɛ mɛ,
nɛ́ mi'i yora ɗoŋ mɛ kasi nɛ er-mɛ;
mi usa mɔ ha̧ mɛ
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ́ yuwar
in sa̧a̧mɔ ko o tugun bíí.
Mɛ tɛ hú̧í̧ yí o wi nɛ boma,
mɛ tɛ gbo o wi-zɔɓɔ yinɛ,
in o bíí nɛ ya ti-tum mbɛt.»
Mi nɛ GASA WAN,
nin-am nɛ mɔ‘i;
ɓɛɛ mi beka e ha̧ ŋma bíí,
kóó ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ mɛ ba hu̧ra-nin kɔ‘m na.
O kuti-mɔ hɔɔ yak kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ mi mbaŋ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́
zu o wan nɛ tɛ‘i nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ hɔ.
Ɛnɛ o bíí-yar-nɛ-zu gba-tɔp
in o mɔ mɛ ɗɔɔ-aa,
ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí mbe gima zɔn nɛ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima zɔn nɛ a̧ hɔ nduti nu mɛ.
O ye mɛ si ŋga-gbárà in o bezaŋ Kedar
a̧ bíí gima nɛ hee ger;
o bíí mɛ si zu kaya a̧ gai mɔ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ,
wa a̧ de tortɛ nɛ desee!
O bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara
a̧ zɔn gasamɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ hee ger.
GASA WAN a̧ gbo tɛnɛ hee ŋga bíí ga'i,
a̧ a̧ kpɔ̧ tɛnɛ hee ŋma wi-biro ga'i.
A̧ tuɓi nɛ da̧ a zu o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
Ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧a n'am nyɔŋ nɛ nin-am,
mi kɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen na,
mi de ŋma mɔ na mbɛt.
Hee ŋma naa-zaŋ nɛ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko’ɛ ga,
kinii, mi tɛ gɔfi mɔ nɛ ŋgai, hiɗ‘am gɔn.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ mɔ zu o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti,
o ɓɔɔ-mɔ mɛ zu wa tɛ kor;
o nana-yì tɛ gɔn kifi nɛ o be ɗuŋgum-yì,
ɓɛɛ o tɔp ɔ̧sa̧ ndaɗi ta̧i̧-ta̧i̧.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o wi-boma-yí
mɛ ba yuwar nɛ wa tɛ ba so nɛti na;
mi tɛ mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ sɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ kpai tum nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ sɛn ti wa,
ɓɛɛ o gɔɔ-war kifa duk nɛ tana-a.
Mɔ‘i, mi tɛ de hɔ gba̧a̧,
mi beka e duk na.
Zɔk n’ɛnɛ tɛ ɓɔn ɗoŋ ɓɛɛ foe baa'nɛ,
ɛnɛ o wi nɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧, ɗaŋ o mboo-mɔ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ nɛ ɛnɛ'ɛ!»
Ɛnɛ o wi-mgbee-zer nɔ'ɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ;
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-boma-yí nɔ'ɔ
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ!
Wi-boma-yí‘i nɛ o?
Bo nɛ mɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m na?
Wi-mgbee-zer nɛ betom kɔ‘m.
Wi-boma-yí, nɛ̀ zer mgbea'i,
yak zu wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN, nɛ o?
Yí-mɛ zɔka mɔ nɛ dɔka-a,
ɓɛɛ mɛ kasi ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ na;
zer-mɛ gboa, ɓɛɛ mɛ zii mɔ na!
GASA WAN yora ɗoŋ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ‘i
usi nɛnɛ‘e Heembea kɔ‘i nɛ gba demɔ nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ kinii wa bìí dukbíí'ɛ,
kai nɛ mɔ er-wa;
wa kifa nɛ o wi-zɔɓɔ
nɛ‘i kaia a kɔ kɔ̧
sɛn kɔ̧ tua zɔɓɔ mɛ.
Wa nɛ o bíí nɛ wa bia kai nɛnɛ,
nɛ ŋma wi-kpasi-wa bo na;
ŋma bíí mɛ tɔ̧‘e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó wa a nu», bo na mbɛt.
Mɛ nɛ o mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ zii wen’ɛ o?
Nɛ ge bíí ge a̧ tɛ kasi yaknɛ siti mɛ o?
Wi nɛ dee ha̧ wa mɛ bi Jakob
kai nɛ mɔ er
Bo nɛ GASA WAN,
wi n’ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti a̧,
bɛ̧ nɛ baa yuwar kɔ̧-a̧,
e nɛ Heembea kɔ̧-a̧ duk’ɛ na?
Mɛ nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i a̧ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧
kura nɛnɛ zu
hegɔ a̧ daka biro pi zu a̧,
dɔ nɛ a̧ nɛ wee,
ɓɛɛ
Wee nyimsea'i dɔɔ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ta mɔ sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Kinii,
wen nɛ GASA WAN wi nɛ dee mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ká kíì de mɛ na, mi gɔna zu mɛ;
mi sa mɛ nɛ̀ nin-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ‘m.
Koo mɛ kuu nɛ gasa yi, mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ,
kóó mɛ kuu nɛ nana-yì, mɛ beka fe yi na;
kóó mɛ gɔma nɛ yí-wee,
leɓe-wee beka ba mɛ na,
wen mi GASA WAN nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
«Mi tɛ ha̧ Egiptɛ gɔn nɛ̀ zu mɛ;
Etiopii in Seba tɛ duk oi nu mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ gasamɔ sɛn yí‘m;
see-am duk ɓɔn tɛ-mɛ, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nyɛmna.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa'm ha̧
o bíí oi nú mɛ,
in o ye gɔn nɛ̀ zu mɛ.
«Ká kíì de mɛ na, mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ;
mi tɛ kai o bezaŋ-mɛ nɛ war daŋa-wese piinɛ ɗoŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi mɔi̧a o bíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ a̧a̧ si yee-wese pii ɗoŋ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn:
‹Mɛ̀ é ha̧ wa pii ɗoŋ›,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ:
‹Ká mɛ dor wa na.›
O bem kɔ‘m be-wiwii-a nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ nyɛi̧a nu mɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ,
O nde lɛŋ nɛ‘i sa nin-am zu wa a̧ pii ɗoŋ.
Mɛ nɛ mi a̧ mboo wa, de nɛ wa mbɛt,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ zɔn gasamɔ kɔ‘m.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ gbaayí ɓɛɛ zɔk mɔ na,
in nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ zer, ɓɛɛ zii mɔ na’ɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.
O tugun bíí a̧ mɔi̧,
o zuduk bíí a̧ mɔi̧ ya kpɔk fara.
Mgbara o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ŋma nɛ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ yaka a̧a̧ sɛnɛ?
Wi’ɛi nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ we ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́ɛ́,
a̧ a̧ kai o wi-sedaako nɛ yaa so oi-aa a ti yɛ
ha̧ wa ɓa wen mɔ nɛ yaka so
in ha̧ mɛ kpɛk'e, mɔ‘i nɛ kpasawen.
War kɔ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ;
ɛnɛ nɛ o bíí n'am hoka wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ am,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ e ta nɛ‘m,
in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ nɛ mbetɛ‘e,
Sɔ̧ kana nɛ mi'i.
Ŋma sɔ̧ bo nɛti ha̧‘m na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt, ŋma sɔ̧ beka bo na.
Kana nɛ mi, kpɔk ɓɛɛ, mi'i nɛ GASA WAN,
ŋma wan-kpasi-wi yak zu'm, bo na.
Nɛ́ mi'i baa yuwar-kpasa-a tɛnɛ,
nɛ́ mi'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa de nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ yuwar'i;
ŋma gɔni sɔ̧ tɛ de pɛrti mɔ hegɔ mgbara'nɛ́ nɛti na.
Ɛnɛ nɛ o wi-sedaako'e, mi nɛ Sɔ̧,
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, mi tɛ duk kana nɛ Sɔ̧ siti;
ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ ɓar mɔ er-am yinɛ bo na;
ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ dor am tɛ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de, bo na mbɛt.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN, Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Wan-gɔn-zu'nɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ nɛ wen zu'nɛ́ a̧‘m tom nɛ bíí nɛnɛ si Babilɔŋ,
wen gbina nutua zɔɓɔ a nu,
ɓɛɛ
tɛ kifi nɛ kɔ̧a̧ fio ŋgúr-ŋgúr.
«Mi nɛ GASA WAN, Sa̧a̧ Wi k’ɛ́nɛ́,
Wan nɛ dee
GASA WAN á̧ pi̧i̧ yuwar ku nɛ gba-tɔp;
mɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ mbaŋa yuwar ku nɛ ŋga kin-yì mbɛt.
A̧ dee ha̧ o keekee-biro in o nyaŋa
ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋga wi-biro mɛ yak biro,
ɓɛɛ wa tir a nu hee mɛ nɛ bùk-wee
Ká tɛ‘nɛ́ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka so nɛti na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ta mɔ wen gba̧‘a̧ mɔ ɓɔna mbɛt.
Kinii, mi tɛ de mbe mɔ;
mɔ‘i ku̧u̧ naŋ kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ mɔ‘i.
Mi tɛ pi̧ war sɛn ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ yi foka sɛnɛ mbɛt.
O saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ,
o gbóò in o ndao tɛ zɔn am,
wen n'am dee ha̧ nana-yì mɛ fok sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
ha̧ nana-yì mɛ fok fara nɛ yi bo so sɛnɛ na,
wen ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m n'am hoka mɛ kpa mɛ nɔ.
Wa nɛ o bíí n'am dee wen mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m
wen ha̧ wa mɛ gas'am.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧‘e:
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́, o bezaŋ Jakob a̧ ea'm duk ɛ̧!
Bó nɛ́ wen zu'm a̧ mɛ dɔ so nɛ o
mɛ de so mɔ‘i wen tu̧u̧ tɛ‘m na mbɛt.
Mi de so mɛ nɛ ŋgai wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ ha̧ ha̧a̧mɔ,
dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧‘m,
sɛka tɛ-mɛ de ka mbɔia nɛnɛ na.
Bo nɛ wen zu'm a̧ mɛ hi̧fi so nɛ yí-nyama
nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya na,
in a̧ mɛ dɔ so nɛ nɔ-saɗi kɔ-mɛ
wen ha̧‘m mɛ nyɔŋ zaŋ-am sur na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ a̧ dita zu'm
mi mbɔia tɛ zɔka o mɔɔ-gbɛ-zu kɔ-mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m,
mi tɛ bi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ yinɛ wen zu nin-am;
tɛ‘m tɛ bi ɗoŋ-aa.
«Mɔ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ wen a zu'm sɛnɛ‘i, mɛ̀ bá gbonɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓá,
wen ha̧ kpasawen nɛ mɛ yor zu-a'i mɛ gbo.
Zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ mɛ ti mɛ̀, yɔɔ so kaya,
o gasawi nɛ duk zu mɛ dee ŋgazu in am;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧‘m pi̧i̧ nɛ búù
zu o wi-duk-zu Tua ko Sɔ̧,
mi dee ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ ɗaŋ o bezaŋ Jakob yinɛ,
mi de ha̧
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, Jakob wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, mɛ zii,
Wen nɛ GASA WAN nɛ ɓoo mɛ,
nɛ dee mɛ pi̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ-mɛ
in nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbak mɛ, tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Ká kíì de mɛ na, Jakob wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
Yesurun,
Mi tɛ de ha̧ yi mɛ a zu nu,
yi tɛ fok zu kora nu.
Mi tɛ ha̧
ɓɛɛ mi toka de yoŋgo zu o pɛ́r-nam k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
Wa tɛ ɓɔ hee mbɔŋgi-nu-kórò ga,
gasi nɛnɛ hee gasa te ká̧ yi ga.
Ŋma mgbara wa tɛ tɔ̧‘e:
‹Mi nɛ bíí ko GASA WAN›,
ɓɛɛ ŋma tɛɛ tɔ̧ kɔ‘i'e,
wa a̧ sa nin-wi'e, Jakob.
Ŋma woyo tɛ gɔn dap te-er tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Mi duk nɛ ko GASA WAN›,
ɓɛɛ a̧ duka tɛ̀ nɛ̀ nin
Wen nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
wannu ko
«Mi nɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ in sɔŋkur-mɔ;
ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'm, bo na.
Ŋma bíí hee mi ga a̧a̧ sɛnɛ?
Wi’ɛi a̧ ba wen,
ɓɛɛ a̧a̧ usi wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ
zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ,
in a̧ a̧ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt.
«Ká kíì de'nɛ́ na, in ká tɛ‘nɛ́ nak na mbɛt;
bó nɛ́ mi wee so ɗoŋ mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti na nde?
Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ‘i nɛ de-a;
ɛnɛ nɛ o wi-sedaako kɔ‘m;
ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'm, bo na,
ŋma Kam-ta yak zu'm, bo na mbɛt.»
O wi-sɛk géé-sɔ̧ nɛ o gee tum bíí;
mɔ nɛ wa de bó nɛ́ kpasamɔ na.
Gbaayí o mɔ nɛ wa dea zɔk mɔ na;
wa iŋ mɔ na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e foe yí o wan-de-wa.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ba-tɛ
wen o wi-dui géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i!
Foe baa o wi-nɛ-ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i,
o wi-dui-wa nɛ gee o bíí sɔɔ gee!
O wi nɔ‘i a̧ mɔi̧ ŋmaa lɛŋ ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓá kita;
kíì tɛ de wa ɓɛɛ ziimɔ baa wa.
Wan-dui-mɔ ba nɛ boi pi̧ tɛ wee
mbɛr nɛ dɔnɔ ɗafi nɛnɛ nɛ ŋgai-tɛ lɛŋ.
Kà a̧ kpa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ na,
ɓɛɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa;
kà a̧ nɔ yi na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ tɛ-a mɔka.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko wi-sɛk-te,
a̧ we te kaɗi sɛka a̧ sɛka nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ-aa;
mɛ́ ɗoŋ ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛra yɔk ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ de-a
wen ha̧ mɛ́ hɔ ŋmaa in bíí,
ɓɛɛ a̧ baa e kɔ̧ tua mɛ́ gasi.
Wa zɔk nɛ́ oi o
hok nɛ̀ o
ɓɛɛ wa ee há̧ wa mɛ́ gasi mgbara o te kɔ̧ kombo.
Ŋma ɓɛɛ wa guna nɛ́ sumbu
nɛ̀ kórò tɛ hɔ a zu a̧ ɓɛɛ gasa.
Mɛ́ ɗoŋ, o te nɔ‘i kifa nɛ gua-ye-wee,
nɛ̀ bíí tɛ́ yè nɛ̀ wee wen ɔa-a,
in wen dɔa-a nɛ brɛt mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kpɔk te'i a̧ bíí sɛk nɛ sɔ̧ kɔ‘i,
gbɛ nɛ zugur nu ti a̧ gasi nɛnɛ nɛ see lɛŋ.
Ŋginda-gua nɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-ye-wee kɔ̧-a̧,
gi nɛ o kpoo zu a̧ wen nyɔŋa-a zaŋ-aa sur.
Ŋma ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔɔ nɛ wee-aa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Oee gba de wee wa,
gɛ̧ɛ̧ yuu tɛ‘m kaɗi!»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ baa ɓii oi ŋginda-a sɛk de nɛ sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧,
gbɛ nɛ zugur ti a̧, kɔfi nɛ a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mɛ́ nɛ́ sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ kpás'am!»
O wi nɔ‘i iŋ mɔ na,
wa zii mɔ na;
gbaayí-wa zɔk mɔ na,
in wa iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ na mbɛt.
See-wa mbɛt nɛ kalemɔ, wa ta mɔ na.
Ŋma bíí mɛ ta mɔ‘e,
kpɔk ŋginda-te’ɛ a̧‘i yee nɛ wee gi nɛ kpoo,
dɔ nɛ brɛt zu-a nyɔŋ zaŋ-wi sur;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kpɔk oi ŋginda-te'i
a̧‘i sɛka de nɛ̀ sɔ̧ nɛ‘i gu nu ti a̧ gasi nɛnɛ wo’ɛ, bo na?
A̧ ndaɗi tɛ a nɛ mɔ nɛ duk gee bùk-wee;
ŋga see kɔ̧-a̧ ɗaŋa taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧‘i beka kpas'a na,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧‘e,
mɔ nɛ duk er-wi’ɛ nɛ gee tum-mɔ wo’ɛ, bo na mbɛt.
«Jakob, tɛ-mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'e,
nɛ́ mi a̧ ɓoo mɛ;
Tɛ‘m beka bi ɗoŋ mɛ na.
Mi foo ɗaŋmɔ in o ŋgazu kɔ-mɛ yinɛ;
wa yuu hee tura-zan ga.
Mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m,
wen mi gɔna zu mɛ kaɗi.»
Yiwese, mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ-tortɛ
wen GASA WAN dee mɔ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáí mɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ ya ɗɔɔ nu mɛ!
O kaya, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɛ́r er gai nɛ mɔ nɛ desee;
kombo in o te sɛn kɔ̧ a̧ lɛŋ
a̧ gai mɔ nɛ desee,
wen GASA WAN gɔna zu Jakob;
a̧ usa gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kpasi nɛ
Wan nɛ ɓoo mɛ pi̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ dee mɔ lɛŋ,
nɛ́ mi ɛ̀n’ám a̧ tata yiwese in nu ɓɛɛ,
nɛ́ o a̧ gbaka'm tɛ tom-aa o?
Mi'i de ha̧ deemɔ ko wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi
mɛ duk nɛ geemɔ;
ɓɛɛ mi'i de ha̧ o wi-zɔk-mɔ
mɛ kifi nɛ o mgbelewi.
Mi dee ha̧ mɔ ko o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ
mɛ sir kifi gee tum-mɔ.
Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ wen nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɔ̧ɔ̧ so,
mi tɛ de ha̧ wen ko o betom kɔ‘m mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ zu Jerusalɛm nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
‹O bíí tɛ ɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo,
ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o gasa ye nu Juda,
o bíí tɛ mbo o ye nɔ‘i,
ɗafi nɛ o mɔ nɛ ɗaŋa so nɛ̀ mbe-a.›
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dir gba-tɔp: ‹Mɛ ɔ̧si̧,
mi dee ha̧ o nana-yì kɔ-mɛ mɛ ɔ̧si̧ lɛŋ mbɛt.›
Ɓɛɛ war ko Sirus, mi tɔ̧a̧:
‹Mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-dai-mɔ kɔ‘m;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ see-am kɔ̧a̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
A̧̧ tɛ tɔ̧ zu Jerusalɛm'e:
Wa a̧ mbó a̧ in wa a̧ bá Tua kɔ‘m e ŋgɔn woyo.› »
Wen’ɛ, nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN ha̧ Sirus,
n'aa tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu a̧
in n'aa kasa a̧ nɛ er-a mɛ wiiko
mɛ de ha̧ o tugun bíí mɛ duk nɛ geemɔ ti a̧,
kpɔ̧i̧ nɛ laa-wan yinɛ tɛ o wannu,
gbin nɛ o nutua yinɛ ti a̧,
hegɔ, o nu garo ye lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ hu̧i̧a̧-a̧:
«Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ nɛ nɔ ti mɛ,
ɗafi nɛ zu o kusa kaya nɛ de-a,
mi tɛ gbin o nu tua nɛ wa dee nɛ boi,
gu nɛ o mɔɔ-mana-a lɛŋ yinɛ.
Mi tɛ usi oi mbɔi nɛ wa hu̧sa̧
tɛ ɗuka fara ha̧ mɛ,
ha̧ nɛ kpaamɔ ha̧ mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e nde,
mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
nɛ sa mɛ nɛ̀ nin.
Mi de mɔ‘i wen zu wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Jakob,
Mi sa mɛ nɛ̀ nin tu̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔ‘i, mɛ tɛ iŋ am hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
ŋma bo na.
Ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'm, bo na!
Mi ee ŋgai kɔ‘m tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ iŋ am na.
O bíí tɛ iŋ nɛ zu-zan gɔm ndaa-zan mɛ‘e nde,
ŋma sɔ̧ bo na, kana nɛ mi kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN;
ŋma mbe-a bo na.
Nɛ́ mi'i dee sa̧a̧mɔ in tum,
nɛ́ mi'i ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ
in nɛ́ mi'i ha̧ ŋgamɔ ha̧ bíí mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ dee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
«Yiwese, mɛ̀ há̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛnɛ
hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ mbɛŋ a̧ wai ga,
o tu̧-zan, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ hɔ
hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ kórò a̧ hɔ ga;
nù a̧ kpɛk mɔ‘i wen ha̧ yuwar-kpasa-a mɛ gasi,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ ɓɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ dee mɔ‘i.»
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ de biro in wi-de-a,
wen a̧ nɛ kpánà mgbara o dɔka-a!
Gii nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɓu-a'e nde,
nɛ ge mɔ ge a̧ a̧ de’ɛ ge?
Tom mɛ er-a nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e nde,
er-a kpɔk bo na, nde?
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i'e:
«Nɛ́ ge pɛrti bem ge ɛnɛ koa hegɔ'ɛ ge?»
In wi nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ naa kɔ‘i'e:
«Nɛ́ ge ɛnɛ koa’ɛ ge?»
Nɛ GASA WAN, Sa̧a̧ Wi nɛ dee
«Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ ak am zu mɔ ko o bem kɔ‘m nde?
Nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ usi mɔ n'am tɛ de ha̧‘m nde?
Nɛ́ mi'i dee nu,
ɓɛɛ mi de bíí e zu a̧.
Nɛ́ mi'i tata yiwese nɛ er-am;
nɛ́ mi'i ɔ wan zu o sɔra lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ mi'i saa wi’ɛ,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba kpasamɔ kɔ‘m gbonɛ.
Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ-aa tɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ de.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧‘i a̧ tɛ ba ye kɔ‘m Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn woyo,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbo o bíí kɔ‘m
nɛ wa kaia so nɛ bara-biro siɗoŋ nu kɔ-wa,
nɛ̀ wa beka gɔn zu wa nɛ mbɔi na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
O mbɔi ko o bíí Egiptɛ
in o mɔɔ-gɛnɛ ko o bíí Kus,
ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí Seba,
o gba kusa-wi nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ kɔ-mɛ,
wa tɛ ya ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-mɛ.
Wa tɛ hɛr wa nɛ nyak-boi,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gu nu ti mɛ,
wor nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Kpasa Sɔ̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'm bo na.»
Nɛ kpasawen, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧;
Sɔ̧ ko
Ziimɔ in búù tɛ ba o wi-ɗafi géé-sɔ̧;
wa tɛ zum zu-wa yaknɛ nɛ foe;
GASA WAN kpasa
ziimɔ in búù beka ba a̧ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ dee yiwese a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
A̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ dee nu, ɓɛɛ ɗafi e;
bo nɛ a̧ dee nu wen ha̧ nu mɛ duk gee na;
a̧ dee nu wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ ɔ zu a̧.
«Mi nɛ GASA WAN,
ŋma sɔ̧ bo na.
Mi tɔ̧ wen nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ na;
mi tɔ̧ wen tɛ ŋma fara-tum na mbɛt.
Mi tɔ̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ Jakob mɛ kii am nɛ nú-tum na.
Mi GASA WAN, kɔ‘m nú‘m tɔ̧ wen nɛ yuwar-a;
wen n'am tɔ̧ ɔ tana!»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa lɛŋ tɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa yá kpɔk fara,
ɛnɛ o tugun bíí nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu'nɛ́.
O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ tui o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sɛka nɛ te’ɛ iŋ mɔ na;
wa kɔfi nɛ o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ kpasi bíí na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ war wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ sa̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́i̧ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá keta in o ŋmaa.
Nɛ́ o'o tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti o?
Nɛ́ o'o usa wen-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ɓeemɛ o?
Bo nɛ mi GASA WAN na?
Ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'm, bo na.
Ŋma sɔ̧-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpasi nɛ bíí, bo na,
kana nɛ mi kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Ɛnɛ o bíí mɛ mgbii-nu lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zík tɛ‘nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ kpasi,
wen mi nɛ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ, ŋma mbe-a bo na.
Mi kana mɔ a tɛ‘m,
wen mɔ nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú‘m lɛŋ nɛ kpasawen,
ɓɛɛ wen kɔ‘m n'am tɔ̧ lɛŋ beka kpai na,
wen o bíí lɛŋ tɛ gbɛ zugur nu ti'm,
ɓɛɛ leɓe o nde lɛŋ tɛ kan mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Kpasamɔ in ŋgai nɛ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.»
O bíí nɛ kura so zu'm lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ ti'm,
ɓɛɛ foe tɛ ba wa.
GASA WAN tɛ gbo o bezaŋ
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de nyɛŋɛ tɛ mɔ‘i.
Sɔ̧ Bal gbina, ɓɛɛ Nɛbo tik nu;
wa hɛra tui o géé-sɔ̧ a zu o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa;
o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk nɛ zɔm dita tui
nɛ wa ee zu o saɗi nɔ‘i nɛ mbɔia'i.
Ɗoŋ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i difa in ger-wa gɔa tɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi;
wa nyɛm mɛ kpasi o gee sɛka-te kɔ-wa nɔ‘i na,
ɓɛɛ o bíí kai wa nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ.
Ɛnɛ o bezaŋ Jakob,
in oi o be nú-gara ko
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m.
Nɛ mi'i tuia'nɛ́, dai nɛ ɛnɛ
nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛnɛ.
Mi beka kpai er deemɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ́ na,
hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi sɔki k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ hegɔ mbui hɔ nɛnɛ zu'nɛ́.
Mi dee mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi.
Mi tɛ ba'nɛ́ e ŋgɔn, mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kpasi'nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ tɛ we'm nɛ o?
Nɛ o'o hɔɔ ŋmaa in am o?
Nɛ o ɛ̀nɛ̀ ta tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, a̧ nyɛma ŋmaa in am o?
O dukbíí hu̧i̧ nɛ ŋgoɓo kɔ-wa sɛ nɛ o lɔr gbonɛ,
we nɛ sede tɛ mɔɔ-we-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa gɔna zu wi-dui-mɔ mɛ dui sɔ̧ ha̧ wa,
gbɛ nɛ zugur ti sɔ̧‘i gasi nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wa gɔɔ a̧ e zu kóŋgó-ɓaa tui yaknɛ,
nɛ́ɛ̀ é sɛn fara nɛ wa tɛ e a̧ sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ fara nɛ wa ee a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ yor ɓɔn oi-aa,
a̧ fo gee foo tɛ-a na.
Wa ya hiɗi nɛ mɔ ai nɛ nú sitɛ a̧,
a̧ kifi nú ha̧ wa na,
sɛka bó nɛ̀ kpasa wa tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa na mbɛt.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ duk sɛnɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpá mbe ta,
ɛnɛ o yaa-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o mɔ nɛ yaka so ɓeemɛ;
mi nɛ Sɔ̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
ŋma mbe-a yak zu'm, bo na.
Mɔ nɛ tɛ de nɛ sɔŋkur-aa mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ;
mɔ nɛ tɛ de hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛti ɓɛɛ mɛ mɛ kaɗi.
Ee-zu-mɔ kɔ‘m duk nɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo;
mɔ n'am taa mɛ de, mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ kana gba̧a̧.
Mi saa zua nɛ war ndaa-zan,
nɛ tɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ tɛnɛ.
Wi’ɛi tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am taa!
Mɔ n'am taa kɔ̧ see-am mɛ de,
mi tɛ de kana mɔ‘i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ o yaa-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ,
wen ɛnɛ biti nɛ nyɛi̧a-a tɛ mɔ n'am ha̧a̧ nú zu-a.
Ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ ɓɔna ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gan zu mɔ,
kpasa-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛɗa dɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi;
mi tɛ kpasi
ɓɛɛ mi ha̧a̧ zɔnamɔ ha̧
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
Mɛ́ boko be Babilɔŋ,
mɛ́ tika kaɗi, mɛ̀ dúk nu tɛ fuunu;
mɛ̀ dúk nu mbɔɗɔnu,
wen damti yɔɔ er-mɛ kaɗi!
Wi beka sa mɛ‘e: «Gba de be-zɔŋa»
in «zɔŋa-bɔtɛ» ɓɔna.
Mɛ̀ bá alkamaari si fara-hɔ̧n-fuu a̧ mɛ hɔ̧n!
Mɛ̀ bá laa-kpe-yí-mɛ yinɛ,
mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ nu goe kɔ-mɛ nɛ ŋgɔn, a̧ mɛ ku yi!
O bíí tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ mgbii ha̧ foe mɛ de mɛ!
Mi tɛ kifi er ha̧ mɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma wi-dor-am beka bo na!
Wi nɛ gɔna zu yɛ, nin-a nɛ GASA WAN,
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Mɛ̀ kpé nú-mɛ́, boko be Kaldee,
mɛ̀ hú̧sí tɛ-mɛ ti-tum;
wi beka sa nin-mɛ‘e: «Boko be-wan zu o nu» ɓɔna.
See-am ɗaŋa so zu dukbíí kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi ɗaŋ o bíí kɔ‘m nɛ duk nɛ mɔ kɔ‘m.
Mi ee wa er-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ de ko ha̧ wa na,
de nɛ ŋgamɔ in o sɔkawi mbɛt.
Mɛ taa so kɔ-mɛ‘e mɛ tɛ duk tɛ wan hegɔɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
mɛ ta so mɔ zu mɔ nɛ de'i na,
mɛ ta mɔ zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ̀ zíí mɔ'ɔ sa̧ zer-mɛ,
mɛ zɔŋa de gee tum mɔ
nɛ mɔ ba tɛ-mɛ na’ɛ,
mɛ́'è, ŋma wi-gan-wi, bo na,
kana nɛ wi kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Wi beka duk ko-gera na,
o bem beka ɓan wi na mbɛt.
O ŋga mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ yiitoo’ɛ
tɛ tir a zu mɛ war kpɔk tɛ kale wese!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hee gɔma-yí ga a̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ kum nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kifi ko-gera nɛ bu-wese,
nɛ oi o wi-a-tani in o wan-gbana kɔ-mɛ‘i.
Mɛ́ dúk tɛ-mɛ nɛ ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ŋma wi nɛ zɔk am tɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am de’ɛ, bo na.»
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ'ɛ kpee yí-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ duk tɛ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e nde:
«Ŋma bíí nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in am bo na.»
Bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu mɛ nɛ mɛ beka gui na.
Ŋgamɔ tɛ kpa mɛ nɛ nyina-kpasi-mɛ beka bo na.
Mɔɔ-kum-wi tɛ tik zu mɛ hee gɔma-yí ga,
nɛ mɛ ɔ zu-a na.
Mɛ̀ yór zu o mɔɔ-gbánà in o mɔɔ-pɛm-tɛ kɔ-mɛ,
nɛ mɛ duk de tom ha̧ wa nɛ zɔŋa mɛ tɛnɛ‘i;
ŋmafara o mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ gbak mɛ,
kóó ŋmafara mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ̀ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i
a̧ mɛ tɛ gan nɛ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ́ ɗáŋ nɛ tɛ-mɛ tɛ zɔka mɔ nɛnɛ;
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o wi-zɔk-mɔ nɔ‘i,
o wan-zɔk-mɔ tɛ wese in sɔra,
nɛ tɔ̧ wen zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ fio-zɛ lɛŋ‘i,
wa a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ kpasi mɛ ɛɛ zɔk.
O wi nɔ‘i tɛ duk hee kora zɔ̧ nɛ wee bíí'ɛ ga;
wa beka kpasi tɛ zɔm yoŋgoŋgo-wee'i na.
Mɔ‘i beka duk nɛ kɛ̧i̧-wee mɛ ɔ wee-aa na,
kóó wee mɛ duk ká̧ a̧ na mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ kpa o wan-gbana nɛ mɛ yɔɔ so ŋgimbi kɔ-mɛ,
zɔk nɛ mɔ tɛ-wa nɛ geɗek bem hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ zɔŋa nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Wa tɛ pɛsi kpɔk kpɔk yak,
ɓɛɛ ŋma nɛ tɛ kpasi mɛ bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o be nutua ko Jakob,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ sa nin'nɛ́‘e o be
ɛ́nɛ́ o bezaŋ Juda,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ kan mɔ nɛ nin GASA WAN,
gasi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ ko o be
kóó nɛ̀ yuwar-a na mbɛt’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ:
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧‘e: Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o bíí tɛ Sa̧a̧ Ye ko Sɔ̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ e ta nɛ Sɔ̧ ko
wan nɛ nin-a nɛ GASA WAN
nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Nɛti ɓeemɛ, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen mɔ nɛ dee so h’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen'i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú‘m,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mi a̧ dee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i hee gɔma-yí ga.
Mi iŋa'e, mɛ́ nɛ́ wi-ŋgazu;
gun ger-mɛ ɔ ŋgaya hee mboɗa boi ga,
ɓɛɛ sɔnti-mɛ duk hee ndɛrɛ ga mbɛt.
Wen hegɔ, mi mbaŋa tɛ-mɛ nɛti zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ;
mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen-aa ha̧ mɛ kaɗi,
wen ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e ndé mɛ̀ nɛ́ o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ‘i,
nɛ‘i dee nɛ te in boi a̧ de mɔ'ɛ.
Mɛ zia in mɛ zɔka o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ nyɛm ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpɛk mɔɔ nɔ‘i hɔ̧ɔ̧ na nde?
Kinii, mi usi nɛ mbe mɔ ha̧ mɛ,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma mɔ nɛ duk nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ nɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ na.
Nɛ́ kinii ɓɛɛ a̧‘m dee nɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mbe-a;
ŋma pɛrti mɔ hegɔ bo so nɛti na,
sɛka mɛ zii nyɛrɛ-a ka mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e,
wi iŋa so nɛti na.
Mɛ̀ zíí so nyɛrɛmɔ hegɔ nɛti na,
mɛ́ íŋ so o ŋma mɔ hegɔ nɛti na mbɛt,
zer-mɛ hu̧i̧ so mɛ zii wen-aa nɛti na;
mi iŋa'e mɛ́ nɛ́ mgbák kpasa wi-de-ŋgazu,
ká mɛ ɓɔna kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ-mɛ mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ wen ká nin-am tɛɛ ɗaŋ,
mi ga̧a̧ see-am zu nyimsea kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi beka ɗaŋ mɛ yinɛ na.
Mi nɔi̧a mɛ tɛ wee-dɔra
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ hee bu-mbɔi ga na,
mi wee mɛ tɛ wee-bɔnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mɔ n'am dea, mi dea wen tɛ‘m nɛ tɛ‘m;
mi beka e ha̧ bíí mɛ ɗaŋ nin-am na;
mi beka e ha̧ ŋma bíí mɛ ba gasamɔ kɔ‘m na mbɛt.
Jakob, mɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m;
mi nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ kuti mɔ in sɔŋkur mɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ er-am a̧ dee nu,
ɓɛɛ mi tati yiwese nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m.
Kà‘m sa mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ tɛa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa, ɛnɛ lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m.
Ŋma sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti nɛ o?
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛm kɔ‘m n'am hoka'i,
a̧ tɛ de mɔ nɛ see-am kɔ̧a̧
zu Babilɔŋ in dukbíí Kaldee.
Nɛ́ mi nɛ tɛ‘m a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i,
nɛ́ mi a̧ saa a̧ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mi'i a̧ tɛ de
ha̧ tom n'am sa a̧ wen-aa'i mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii katɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧'ɛ:
Nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ,
mi tɛ tɔ̧ ŋma wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧ nɛti na;
ŋgimbi nɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i dee nɛnɛ,
mi a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ.
(Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧
ɓɛɛ tom am tɛnɛ.)
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN wi-gɔn-zu mɛ,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
«Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
wan nɛ usi mɔ nɛ tɛ gbak mɛ ha̧ mɛ;
nɛ́ mi'i usi yuwar nɛ mɛ ba'i ha̧ mɛ.
A̧ bo so'e mɛ kasa o heembea kɔ‘m gaa,
ɓɛɛ de yoŋgo in ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ fok nɛ ɗoŋ-mɛ hee nana-yì ga!
O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔk hee nyɛmɛ ga,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔk hee nyɛmɛ ga nɛ wi tɔra-a beka bo na.
Ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔɔ-bi-nin-wa,
kóó ɗaŋa nin-wa yinɛ sɛn yí‘m bo na!»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó saaye Babilɔŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú o be Kaldee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ tortɛ yaknɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen-aa ha̧ o bíí nɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́sí nyɛrɛ mɔ'ɔ hɔ nduti nu mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e:
«GASA WAN gɔna zu wi-de-tom kɔ‘i Jakob!»
Ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN kaia
nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘i si ŋga-gbárà zaŋbɛɛ mɛ‘i,
wɔ yi ba tɛ-wa na.
A̧ dee ha̧ yi mɛ suli nɛ kɔ̧ ta gbonɛ ha̧ wa;
a̧ gusa ta mbaŋ, ɓɛɛ yi fok yaknɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧‘e,
o wi-ɗaŋ bó nɛ̀ ga̧a̧mɔ na.
Ɛnɛ o see-kisi,
gu nɛ o bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ mbɛt,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN saa'm, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ kɔ̧-zaŋ naa kɔ‘m mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ saa nin-am tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa koo nɛ‘m mbɛt.
A̧ bɛŋa nú‘m tɔ̧ hee pai-toro ga,
a̧ kpee zu'm nɛ gi̧ɔ̧ er-a.
A̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ duk hee tɔ̧ɔ̧-nú goo ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧‘m kɔ ɓaro kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
mi tɛ usi gasamɔ kɔ‘m nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧‘e mi ɗaŋ nɛ tɛ‘m,
yɔ nɛ ŋgimbi kɔ‘m sɔɔ gee,
in mi de ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ mbɔi sɔɔ gee mbɛt.
Wen mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ‘m a̧a̧ er GASA WAN;
mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ‘m gu nɛ yí-mɔ kɔ‘m mbɛt a̧a̧ er GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN dea'm pi̧ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ‘m,
wen ha̧‘m mɛ duk wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ha̧‘m mɛ mgbɔ Jakob siɗoŋ tɛ a̧,
in wen ha̧‘m mɛ mɔi̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ zu mɔ‘i, GASA WAN tɛ ba'm e ŋgɔn,
wen Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ-mɛ,
bó nɛ́ duka wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
wen mgbɔɔ Jakob pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m,
mɔi̧ nɛ̀ o be
ɓɛɛ mi dee mɛ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧mɔ ha̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ,
wen ha̧ yuwar-kpasa-a kɔ‘m mɛ pɛsi dam zaŋnu lɛŋ,
hɔ nɛnɛ nduti nu mɛ.»
Nɛ́ GASA WAN, Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
wan-gɔn-zu dukbíí kɔ‘i,
a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ̀ o bíí e tɛ geemɔ'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa zɔk mɛ hee ɗaŋmɔ ga’ɛ,
mɛ, bara ko o ŋga-wi nɔ'ɔ,
ŋgimbi nɛ o wannu be tɛɛ zɔk mɛ,
wa tɛ kur yor ŋgɔn ti damti kɔ-mɛ,
in be-wan mbɛt tɛ zɔk mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kiŋgili tɛ-wa nɛ nu ti mɛ,
wen zu GASA WAN,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
wan nɛ hoka mɛ in nɛ yor ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«Mi kpɛka kɔfa mɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ de ŋgimbi,
mi gbaka mɛ wese kpasa-a, wen nɛ́ mi'i dee mɛ,
wen ha̧‘m mɛ nɔ tɔk in o bíí nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba ye e ŋgɔn,
kɛ̧ nɛ fara nɛ wa baa so ha̧ o bíí.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-zɔɓɔ,
in o wi nɛ ya zaŋ tum'e;
‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó pii tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ!›
Wa tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma duk sami,
nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ yuwar nɛnɛ zu o zu-tɔ̧́ mɛ.
Wɔ nyɔŋmɔ in wɔ yi beka gbɛ wa na,
kpɔra wee nu in wese beka dɔ wa na mbɛt;
wen nɛ Wi nɛ zɔk wa nɛ ko,
a̧ tɛ mgbɔ wa yaknɛ si ka̧ foka-yì.
Mi tɛ pi̧ o yuwar nɛ zu o kaya nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o yuwar nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ̀ tana-a.
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ'ɛ!
Wa tɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ;
o ŋma tɛ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn,
o ŋma nɛ yee-wese,
ɓɛɛ o ŋma mbɛt tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ ka̧ Egiptɛ nɛ war ɗɔɔ.»
Yiwese a̧ bíí gima nɛ desee,
nù a̧ de nyɛŋɛ;
o kaya a̧ de tortɛ,
wen GASA WAN ga̧a̧ nɛ see o bíí kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ko ha̧ o wi-bɔnɛ.
Siɔŋ‘e: «GASA WAN ea'm duk,
tɛ GASA WAN bìí ɗoŋ-am mbɛt.»
Tɛ naa-wan-bem tɛ bi so ɗoŋ bem kɔ‘i nde?
A̧ beka usi
Kóó tɛ-a bìì so ɗoŋ bem kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, tɛ‘m beka bi ɗoŋ mɛ na.
Mi yɔra nin-mɛ kɔ̧ er-am,
ɓɛɛ garo kɔ-mɛ duk ɓɔn yí‘m.
O wi-mbo-mɛ woyo a̧ kpan nɔ tɛnɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ-mɛ in o wi-de-mɔ ba tɛ-mɛ a̧ yak kɔ-wa'i.
Mɛ̀ pí̧ yí-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ zik kpa katɛ mɛ.
O bíí kɔ-mɛ mɔi̧ nɛ ŋmaa pii katɛ mɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧,
Mi kan mɔ nɛ tɛ‘m,
wa tɛ ya nɛ o mbɔi-tɛ nɛ mɛ tɛ pi̧ ger-mɛ,
mɛ tɛ ɗafi tɛ-mɛ nɛ o mbɔi-tɛ nɔ‘i,
hee ŋma zɔŋa nɛ‘i hara ga.
Nù kɔ-mɛ ɗaŋa lɛŋ kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi;
kinii, fara beka nyɛm o bíí kɔ-mɛ ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗaŋ-nù kɔ-mɛ tɛ pɛsi yak.
O bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ taa so kɔ-mɛ‘e wa yɔɔ wo’ɛ,
tɛ fu̧i̧ wen zer-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Fara’ɛ nyɛm yɛ na,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí ŋma mbe fara h’ɛ́ɛ́ duk sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ta nɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
«O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ ò'ó kòó wa ha̧‘m o,
bó nɛ́ mi yara so nɛ ndɔra na?
Bó nɛ́ wa baa so'm yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro si ŋma fara na?
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ,
nɛ o'o dee ha̧ wa mɛ gasi o?
Mi duka so kɔ‘m ɛn'am,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ,
wa yaa so kɔ-wa dee?»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧:
«Mi tɛ de mɔɔ-usi-mɔ ha̧ o tugun bíí,
ɓɛɛ mi baa tutuwal kɔ‘m e ŋgɔn ti o dukbíí;
wa tɛ tui o bui-bem kɔ-mɛ
nɛ zu kóŋgó-ɓaa pii ɗoŋ ha̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa ɓuka o boko-bem kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
O wannu tɛ ya nɛ o wan-dai-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o boko-bem ko wannu tɛ ya o wi-ha̧-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ mɛ;
wa tɛ gu yí-wa nú, gu nɛ nú ti mɛ.
Wa tɛ ndal fuunu naŋ-mɛ yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e nde, mi nɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ foe beka de o wi-e-ta nɛ‘m na.
«Wa tɛ ɓar mɔɔ-oi-biro er ŋga wi-biro yinɛ nde?
Kóó wa tɛ kai o bara-biro er-a yinɛ mbɛt nde?»
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Wa tɛ ɓar o bara-biro yinɛ er ŋga wi-biro,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ yaa-ŋgo-biro kaia so tɛ yu er-a.
Mi tɛ kifi nú ha̧ o wi nɛ kii wen in mɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mi nɛ tɛ‘m a̧ tɛ kpasi o bem kɔ-mɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o wi-nukuri-mɛ,
mɛ nyɔŋ kpoo tɛ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa;
tɔk tɛ-wa tɛ gbɛ wa hee ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ iŋ‘e nde,
mi, GASA WAN, nɛ́ wan-kpasi-mɛ;
ŋga-wi ko Jakob nɛ́ wan-gɔn-zu-mɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e nde,
kalata-ndaka naa k’ɛ́nɛ́,
n'am ha̧a̧ ndak nɛ a̧ a̧a̧ dee?
Ŋma bíí n'am ɗɔra'nɛ́ ha̧ a̧,
gbo nɛ nyamandoi kɔ‘m, nɛ o?
Nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk bara;
nɛ́ ŋgazu ko naa k’ɛ́nɛ́
a̧ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbii.
Wen ge mi hɔa, ɓɛɛ mi kpa bíí na ge?
Mi saa'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ sara nú‘m na wen ge?
Ŋgai mɛ te-er-am
Ŋgai kɔ‘m nyɛm kpasa'nɛ́ na?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ gba-tɔp ɔ̧sa̧ ndaɗi ta̧i̧-ta̧i̧;
kà‘m kɔ̧, ɓɛɛ o zɔm nana-yì ɔ̧sa̧ kifi nɛ ŋga-gbárà.
O zoro mɛ ɗɔɔ-aa kuma kor nɛ zan nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Mi nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ yiwese mɛ kifi tum,
ɓɛɛ mi pi̧i̧ laa-zim-mɔ tɛ-a.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ usa yuwar tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ha̧‘m,
wen ha̧‘m mɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ o wi-kɔsa.
GASA WAN nɛ wan-tun-am mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ yeŋ zer-am,
zii nɛ̀ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋgaiwi zii nɛ̀ wen’ɛ ga.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ hu̧i̧a̧ taamɔ kɔ‘m,
wen ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ mgbara usamɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ mi de ŋgazu kà bó nɛ̀ zika yí‘m yinɛ tɛ-a na.
Mi zika ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ o wi nɛ mbɛr am,
ɓɛɛ mi zik zaɗa'm e ha̧ o wi nɛ zuɗi zera kɔ‘m.
Mi zik yí‘m si mgbɔɔr wen zu da̧a̧‘m nɛ wa da̧,
in sap nɛ wa a yí‘m na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ gbak am,
wen hegɔ o dara kɔ-wa pi̧ foe tɛ‘m na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ zu mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ sa'm kai sɔnti'm ŋgai hee ta ga,
wen mi iŋa'e foe beka de'm na.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ wan-yor-ɗoŋ-am;
wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de kita in am nɛ o?
Wi’ɛi a̧ tɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ in ŋmaa ti wi-gɔn-kita!
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de wen in am nɛ o?
A̧ a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ŋgaɓo!
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ wan-ye-ɗoŋ-am;
wi nɛ kita kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tika'm nɛ o?
O wi-sɛn-am tɛ ɗaŋ hee a̧ka̧ laa nɛ zɛmɛ nyɔŋa a nu ga.
Ŋma wi yu GASA WAN a̧ boo mgbara'nɛ́'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wi’ɛi a̧ zii wen ko wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
O wi nɛ nɛ́ nɔ zaŋ tum nɛ kpa sa̧a̧mɔ na,
a̧ e ta nɛ nin GASA WAN;
wi’ɛi a̧ e ta nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ye-wee nɛ tusi nu gua nɛ ŋmaa’ɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tik yi wee'i!
Nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m a̧ tɛ de mɔ‘i in'nɛ̀ɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ fara bɔnɛ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɗoŋ yuwar-kpasa-a,
nɛ̀ kii deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kii GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yí‘nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn,
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ta nɛ wa sɛka de nɛ ɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o kɔ̧ ta fara n’ɛnɛ gboo nɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Abraham in Sara, wi nɛ koo'nɛ́;
ŋgimbi n'am saa nɛ Abraham,
a̧ bó só nɛ̀ bem na;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am toka de yoŋgo zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ko o bem dun nù.»
GASA WAN tɛ de ko ha̧
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧,
nɛ duk so nɛ ŋga-gbárà'ɛ mɛ kifi duk nɛ fɔ Edɛn,
ɓɛɛ fara-ŋga-nu tɛ kifi duk nɛ fɔ ko GASA WAN.
O bíí tɛ ya nɛ tortɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ sɛn tɛ ye'i,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ bìì gima zɔn nɛ‘m,
de nɛ osoko ha̧‘m mbɛt.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ yéŋ zer'nɛ́
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧‘i;
ɛ́nɛ́, tugun bíí kɔ‘m,
wen nɛ́ mi'i tɛ ha̧ heembea,
ɓɛɛ gɔna kita kɔ‘m tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ ko o dukbíí lɛŋ.
Gɔna-kita kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ,
yuwar-kpasa-a kɔ‘m hɔɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ kaɗi.
Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu o dukbíí kɔ‘m;
O see-kisi tɛ e ta nɛ‘m,
wa a̧ e ta nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yí‘nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k yiwese,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si mbɔɗɔnu mbɛt.
Yiwese tɛ yeli tur yak hee zi-wee ga,
ɓɛɛ nu a̧ka̧ gbɛzɛ-gbɛzɛ hee ŋma a̧ka̧ laa ga.
O bíí mɛ zaŋ-aa tɛ kum hee o kokoɗo-mɔ ga,
ɓɛɛ yuwar-kpasa-a in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ‘m
tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo nɛ nduti-a beka bo na.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí kɔ‘m nɛ iŋa deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛnɛ dukbíí-kasi-heembea kɔ‘m,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛm nɛ zɛkɛɗa'nɛ́ nɛ wa zɛkɛɗi'i na,
ká tɛ‘nɛ́ mbɔi wen o dara nɛ wa da̧ nɛ ɛnɛ‘i na!
Wen zɛmɛ tɛ yi wa hee laa ga;
dɔk tɛ a tɛ-wa hee ndárá sami ga,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in yuwar-kpasa-a kɔ‘m
tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ;
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ tɛ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́;
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kpasa so nɛ o kuti bíí mɛ ti ga!
Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ baa gɔm so Rahab,
pɔi nɛ ndiɓa ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp a nu pɛ́sɛ́-pɛ́sɛ́'ɛ́ na nde?
Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ dee so ha̧ gba-tɔp,
in o yi mɛ gba
mɛ ɔ̧si̧ kor mbɛt’ɛ na nde?
Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ baa pi̧ war nɛ ndaa-lembe ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp,
ha̧ o bíí n’ɛnɛ gɔna zu wa mɛ ku yak’ɛ na?
O bíí nɛ GASA WAN gɔna zu wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ,
wa tɛ bìì gima nɛ tortɛ ye nɛnɛ
sɔnti-wa tɛ tok nɛ desee
nɛ beka kaɗi na kpoo nɛ kpoo;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nɛ tortɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ,
wen gɔfamɔ in bɔnɛ yaka kaɗi.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Nɛ́ mi a̧ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́nɛ́;
ɛ́nɛ́ yú bíí nɛ fe fee’ɛ wen ge?
Ŋma ɓɔn-zan-bíí bo na,
o bíí zaŋnu hɔɔ ŋmaa in zɔ̧.
Tɛ-mɛ bìí ɗoŋ GASA WAN, wan-de-mɛ,
nɛ tata yiwese, ɓɛɛ ká de nu’ɛ?
Tɛ-mɛ nak wese lɛŋ
sɛn ti wi-de-ŋgamɔ in mɛɛ,
nɛ kii mɛ gbɛ mɛ yinɛ wen ge?
Nyimsea ko wi’ɛi tɛ de nɛ ge in mɛ ge?
Ɗoŋ gboo wi-zɔɓɔ yinɛ nyɛi̧ ɓɔna;
wa beka fe kɔ̧ fio'i na,
ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ beka ɓan wa na mbɛt.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ;
wan nɛ de ha̧ gba-tɔp mɛ kur in mɛ pɛŋi’ɛ.
Nin-am nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ mi a̧ ee wen kɔ‘m kɔ̧ nú-mɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi kpe zu-mɛ nɛ gi̧ɔ̧ er-am.
Mi tata yiwese e ŋgɔn mɛ;
mi a̧ dee nu, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ Siɔŋ‘e,
‹Mɛ́ nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m.› »
Jerusalɛm, mɛ̀ tún, mɛ̀ kúr!
Mɛ́ nɔɔ ɗele dɔ̧ɔ̧-nyimsea er GASA WAN;
mɛ́ nɔɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ zik zu mɛ'ɛ.
Mgbara o bem nɛ mɛ koa lɛŋ,
ŋma nɛ mgbɔɔ mɛ bo na;
kóó nɛ o wan nɛ mɛ daia mbɛt gbak mɛ na.
O ŋgamɔ nɔ'ɔ yiitoo’ɛ tɛ tik zu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ de ko ha̧ mɛ nɛ o?
Nù kɔ-mɛ tɛ ɗaŋ kifi bɛɛ-oi,
sɛka kaɓa in gba-paa tɛ kum o bíí kɔ-mɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ ga̧ see-mɛ nɛ o?
O bem kɔ-mɛ tira a nu;
wa ya nɛ mgbara mɔ sinɛ hee ban a̧ baa pɛr ga.
Nɛ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ tika zu wa,
nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ de ŋmaa in wa.
Ɛnɛ o wi-bɔnɛ mɛ Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ zu'nɛ́ zik hee mɛ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ gbɛ‘nɛ́ ga’ɛ.
Mɛ nɛ Wan kɔ-mɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
wan nɛ yor ɗoŋ mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
«Zɔk mi baa ɗele-zik-zu
in ɗele-nyimsea kɔ‘m
n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ mɛ yinɛ er-mɛ;
mɛ beka nɔ a̧ woyo ɓɔna!
Mi tɛ ba ɗele'i ŋma er o wi-de-ŋgamɔ in mɛɛ,
o wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ mɛ‘e,
‹Mɛ̀ gú nu h’ɛ́ɛ́ isi mɛ yak nɛ zu mɛ,›
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ sútí ɗoŋ-mɛ ŋunɛŋ
ha̧ wa isi yak nɛnɛ hee yuwar ga.»
Ŋgai a̧ pii ɗoŋ tɛ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ pí̧ gba de laa kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ Jerusalɛm, gba de sa̧a̧ ye,
wi-mbii in o wi nɛ war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na,
beka hɔ tɛ-mɛ ɓɔna ndo-ndo-ndo.
Mɛ Jerusalɛm be bara’ɛ, mɛ̀ kúr,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ŋmásí fuunu tɛ-mɛ yinɛ.
Mɛ be bara, boko be Siɔŋ'ɛ,
mɛ̀ búr nyak ger-mɛ yinɛ mbɛt!
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Wa kaia so ɛnɛ gee, hegɔ mi tɛ gbo'nɛ́ gee mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Nɛti dukbíí kɔ‘m zira so si Egiptɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ duk hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ Asirii usa bɔnɛ ha̧ wa nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mi tɛ kpa nɛ ge? Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ, wa kaia dukbíí kɔ‘m yaknɛ gee, ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ kaia wa'i de nɛ ŋgamɔ, tuɓi nɛ da̧ a zu wa. Wa ɗaŋ nɛ nin-am wese lɛŋ.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ, o bíí kɔ‘m tɛ iŋ nin-am, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e nde, wi tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: ‹Nɛ mi’ɛ.› »
Naŋ o yaa-ba-de mbe wen nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ dee nyɛmna;
wa ba nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, bɔtɛ in yuwar-kpasa-a tɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Siɔŋ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ Wan ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tiger o wan-pɛm-mɔ
nɛ hiɗi mɔ nɛ tortɛ,
wen wa lɛŋ zɔka GASA WAN fara pia ɗoŋ
Ɛnɛ o bɛɛ-oi Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ tortɛ ŋgan nɛ mɔ,
wen GASA WAN ha̧a̧ mbe ŋgai ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasa Jerusalɛm mbɛt.
GASA WAN dee sa̧a̧ tom kɔ̧-a̧
yí o tugun bíí lɛŋ nɛ ŋgai mɛ te-er-a.
Hegɔ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ zɔk
yuwar kpasa-a ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ hɔ nduti-nu mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbo, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó fara'i ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ yak!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ fo ŋma ndiŋmɔ nɛ er'nɛ́ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó mgbara o be Babilɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí war-tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-tui o tasi-ɗafi GASA WAN.
Bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ tɛ ir nɛ ŋmaa nɛ ŋgai gbo nɛnɛ na,
wen mɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́;
nɛ́ Sɔ̧ ko
Gasa Wan'e: «Wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɛ kpa de sɔnti,
a̧ tɛ gasi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Gba giiwi zɔka a̧ ɓɛɛ bele zar wa,
wen sɔnti-a kpaia nɛtɛ;
a̧ hɔ ŋmaa in bíí na.
Hegɔ ɗɛɗɛ o giiwi tɛ gɔn zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ nú o wannu tɛ kpe ti a̧,
wen wa zɔka mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ so nyɛrɛ-a ha̧ wa na,
in wa mbaɗa mɔ nɛ wa tɛ zii so nyɛrɛ-a nɛti na mbɛt.»
Nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ kpɛka mɔ n’ɛɛ zia o?
Nɛ́ o'o zɔka ŋgai ko GASA WAN tɛ mɔ n'aa dea o?
Wi-de-tom'i gasa yi GASA WAN hee de mbɔɗi-te ga,
hee kunin-te nɛ hɔ zu ŋga nu ga.
Ŋma déè in demɔ mɛ tɛ-a bo na;
a̧ de yí o bíí sɛka be de ká'í zɔka mɔ sitɛ a̧ na mbɛt.
O bíí ee a̧ hee geemɔ ga, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ a̧ taŋ;
a̧ nɛ wi-nyimmɔ in wi-bɔnɛ mbɛt,
a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma bíí nɛ‘i zɔk,
ɓɛɛ wi kpee yí-wi tɛ zɔka a’ɛ ga;
o bíí ee a̧ tɛ geemɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔk mɔ sitɛ a̧ na.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ, ŋga nyimmɔ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tik so zu yɛ‘i tika zu a̧,
bɔnɛ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tik so zu yɛ tika zu a̧ mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ taa k’ɛɛ‘e,
Sɔ̧ gusa a̧, usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧,
e nɛ a̧ tɛ geemɔ.
Mɛ nɛ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ a̧ wa toka nɛ a̧,
mɔ baa tɛ-a wen gbɛɛ-zu k’ɛɛ.
Bɔnɛ n'aa zɔka dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa ga̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ o da̧i̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpasi.
Ɛɛ lɛŋ yaa so yambali nɛnɛ hee o sami ga,
kóó o nde ba nɛ yuwar kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN dee
ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ mɛ tik zu a̧.
Wa usa bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧ nɛ ŋgaya-a;
a̧ mɔka see-aa.
A̧ hú̧í̧ nú-a kóó tikiɗi na,
kànà hee
hee sami nɛ duk ti wan-gɔn-buma tɛ-a’ɛ ga.
A̧ hú̧í̧ gee nú-a tikiɗi tɔ̧ wen na.
Wa gɔna kita zu a̧ ba nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ a̧ mbɛt;
nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ pi̧i̧ nú tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ ge?
Wa baa a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí nɛ ya kpasa;
wa gbɛɛ a̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ ko dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa ɗafa pɛsi kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara o wi-ɗaŋ;
wa guna a̧ mgbara o wanmbɔi;
bó nɛ́ a̧ dee ŋma ɗaŋmɔ,
kà bó nɛ̀ dee ndela na mbɛt.
GASA WAN usa bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ duka-kpasa kɔ̧-a̧ wen gɔna zu ɗaŋmɔ ko bíí.
O bezaŋ-aa tɛ dɔk,
in zɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ dɔk zu nu’ɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ n'aa zɔka'i,
a̧ tɛ kpa o bezaŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ a̧ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga,
wi-de-tom kɔ‘m'i tɛ de ha̧ o dɔka bíí
mɛ ya nɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
wen a̧ nɛ tɛ-a tuia o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa'm e a̧ mgbara o gasawi,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi in o ŋga bíí,
wen a̧ kpɛka mɛ fe ɓɛɛ wa tɔr a̧ mgbara o wi-gbin-heembea.
A̧ gɔna zu o ɗaŋmɔ ko o giiwi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ am mɔ zu o ɗaŋwi.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
Jerusalɛm, mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ desee,
mɛ́ ko-yar-ndɔra nɛ ko so bem na’ɛ,
mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ tortɛ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ,
mɛ́ nɛ̀ mɛ̀ iŋ kɔ-mɛ nyimmɔ koo bem na’ɛ,
war kɔ-mɛ okoo nɛ wii ee duk’ɛ,
o bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ dɔk gan ko wan-wíì.
Mɛ̀ dé ha̧ bɛr tua-laa kɔ-mɛ mɛ pɛsi,
mɛ̀ dé ha̧ tua'i mɛ gasi siti,
ká mɛ ta mɔ wen sede-a na.
Mɛ̀ dák nyak tua'i nɛ ŋgaya-a,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zú̧ te-a nɛ nɔa-a.
Mɛ̀ dé ha̧ nù kɔ-mɛ mɛ pɛsi nɛ war wiiko in nɛ gale;
o bezaŋ mɛ tɛ ba fara oi o tugun bíí,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de zɔm ye bɛɛ-oi nɛ o bíí gbina so sɛnɛ yak.
Ká kíí de mɛ na,
wen foe beka de mɛ na;
ká búù ba mɛ na mbɛt,
wen mɛ beka zɔk bɔnɛ ɓɔna.
Tɛ-mɛ tɛ bi ɗoŋ foe nɛ baa so mɛ
ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ɓɔna so nɛnɛ nɛ zɔŋa;
ká mɛ́ kpa ɗaŋsee na,
wen búù beka ba mɛ ɓɔna,
ziimɔ nɛ baa so mɛ ŋgimbi gera kɔ-mɛ bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Wen wíì nɛ mɛ tɛ ba
tɛ duk nɛ wi nɛ dee mɛ,
nin wi’ɛi nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
a̧ nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
nɛ‘i sa'e, Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ wan zu nu lɛŋ.
GASA WAN saa mɛ piinɛ ɗoŋ,
hee ŋma okoo nɛ‘i ee duk
nɛ̀ duk de nɛ̀ ko nɛ̀ tɛ ga.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nde:
«Wi tɛ ndak bɔɔ koo nɛ‘i baa so nɛ gbɛ̧-naŋ hee ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ŋma be ŋgimbi a̧‘m siŋa so nɛ mɛ pi̧ nu,
ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ gasa
mi saa mɛ piinɛ ɗoŋ tɛ‘m.
Mi zika so ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ mɛ
nɛ nyimsea tɛ ŋma be ŋgimbi,
ɓɛɛ tɛ gasa
mi zɔka mɛ nɛ de yí.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN Wan-gɔn-zu-mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Mi tɛ de kalemɔ hee tɛ ŋgimbi ko Nɔe ga,
wen mi kana so mɔ‘e yi beka ha̧ hur kpe zu nu
hee tɛ ŋgimbi ko Nɔe ga ɓɔna,
Mi kana mɔ woyo sɔsɔɔ
nɛ̀ see-am beka kur zu mɛ
wen ha̧‘m mɛ nasi mɛ hegɔ ɓɔna.
Kóó o kaya yuu so fara kɔ‘i,
kóó o zu-tɔ̧́ mbaŋa so mbɛt,
Nɛ mi GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ
GASA WAN'e:
«Jerusalɛm! Mɛ ye-bɔnɛ nɛ gba búk gbina a nu,
nɛ̀ wi-ga̧-see-mɛ bo na’ɛ!
Mi tɛ mbo mɛ woyo nɛ o de be dap ta,
mi tɛ e naŋ-mɛ nɛ de tu̧ ta
nɛ duk hee gba̧a̧-yí-zan ga.
Mi tɛ gbɛ nu garo-a nɛ gbɛ̧ ta,
mi tɛ e o nutua-yè-nɛnɛ
nɛ̀ o de sa̧a̧ ta hee ta-kórò ga,
ɓɛɛ mi ɗafa o fara-hu̧si-sɛnɛ zaŋ garo'i lɛŋ,
nɛ̀ o de ta nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya.
O bezaŋ-mɛ tɛ ya nɛ o ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa yaa tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ nyɛɓi nɛnɛ nɛ de-a.
Mɛ tɛ duk nɛ nɔa-a tɛ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a;
ŋma ŋgamɔ beka kpa mɛ na,
mɛ beka yu mɔ ɓɔna mbɛt;
mɛ tɛ yu sɛn ɗɔɔ mɔɔ-kíì,
a̧ beka de ŋma mɔ in mɛɛ na.
Kà ŋmà bíí nɛ́ bíí mɛ́, bó nɛ́ mi'i toma a̧ na,
wen o nde nɛ tɛ bi mɛ tɛ tik nu ti mɛ.
Mɛ̀ íŋ‘e nɛ mi'i dee wi-dui-mɔ,
nɛ ufi wee wen ha̧ kɛ̧i̧-wee mɛ nyɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ wi-dui-mɔ‘i duia nɛ boi-biro nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi mbɛt a̧ dee wi nɛ ɗaŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kóó nɛ ge boi-biro ge nɛ‘i tɛ dui,
wen dee ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ, beka de ŋma mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ ba wen zu mɛ, kita tɛ tik a̧.
«Yí-mɔ n'am ɗafa e wen o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
in mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa nɛ mɔ‘i.»
Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
A̧i̧yoo, ɛnɛ o wi nɛ wɔ-yí gbɛ lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in yibere mbɛt;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá gée, ɛ́nɛ́ beka hi̧fi hi̧fi na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák gba̧a̧ alkamaari, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔŋ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ yi;
ɛ́nɛ́ beka hi̧fi dɔ̧ɔ̧ in yibere na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋ sede in ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́
zu mɔ nɛ sur zaŋ-wi na wen ge?
Ɛ́nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nɛ demɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nɛ gba de nyɔŋmɔ
nɛ tɛ ha̧ desee h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpasi.
Mi tɛ ha̧ o gba demɔ
n'am ha̧a̧ so nú wen-aa ha̧ David h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ
Mi ee a̧ nɛ sedaako mɔɔ-ŋgai kɔ‘m o nú-gara dukbíí;
a̧ nɛ wan in gasawi zu nu.
Hegɔ
nɛ mɛ iŋ so wa na,
in nɛ wa iŋ so mɛ na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɛ pii tɛ mɛ,
wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
Nɛ mbetɛ, Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí GASA WAN ŋgimbi n'aa biti e tɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa a̧‘i;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá a̧ ŋgimbi n'aa biti katɛ‘nɛ́.
Wi-ɗaŋ a̧ e yuwar n'aa ba'i duk,
ɓɛɛ wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ a̧ e ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ‘i duk mbɛt.
Wa a̧ kifi see-wa ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ wa;
wa a̧ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
wen a̧ tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN'e nde:
«Taamɔ kɔ‘m nyɛm ŋmaa in k’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
in yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ bo hee kɔ‘m ga na mbɛt.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yiwese ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ nu’ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ o deemɔ in o taamɔ kɔ‘m
duk nɛnɛ in war k’ɛ́nɛ́.
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kórò in ɓɔrɔ
hɔ nɛ yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ pii mbɔɗɔnu ɓɔ nɛ nu,
ha̧ nyɔnɔ mɛ gasi
in ha̧ wi-gun-nyɔnɔ mɛ dɛm nyɔnɔ kaɗi,
sɛka daŋa siɗoŋ'ɛ ga,
hegɔ mbɛt wen nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ kɔ̧ nú‘m
beka pii ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m sɔɔ gee na,
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ tɛ de,
in mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa'i tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ kaɗi sɛ.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kur Babilɔŋ siɗoŋ nɛ desee,
ŋma mɔ beka de'nɛ́ na;
o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́ tɛ hiɗi mɔ nɛ desee ti'nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ o te zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ ɓu er zu'nɛ́.
O
be te nɛ̀ pɛr-aa ɔ́ dee tɛ́ hɔ oi tɛn-ga̧a̧,
ha̧ nin GASA WAN mɛ́ hur
hee ŋma mɔɔ-usi-mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ-wi beka bi na ga kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a in nɛ tana-a,
wen kpasamɔ in deemɔ kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a hɛɗa kaɗi.
Mi tɛ ha̧ de sɔnti ha̧ o wi nɛ tɛ de mɔ n'am tɔ̧a̧‘i,
kasi nɛnɛ, zɔk nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ de-a,
ɓɛɛ nɛ pi̧ tɛ tɛ ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na mbɛt!»
Ká ŋma gɔni-duk nɛ ndak pata GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e,
GASA WAN tɛ fo wi yinɛ mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘i na,
ɓɛɛ ká kpàná tɔ̧‘e,
kɔ‘i, wi nɛ kora te na!
Wen GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«O kpàná nɛ tɛ kasi wese-ɔm-tɛ kɔ‘m nɛ de-a,
nɛ de mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ duk nɛnɛ zaŋ
mi tɛ e ta-zu-nu kɔ̧ Tua in zaŋ ŋgeŋ kɔ‘m
nɛ̀ tɛ ba nin-wa e ŋgɔn,
nɛ̀ gana koo o be-wiwii in o be-okoo;
mi tɛ ha̧ nin ha̧ wa
nɛ tɛ-wi beka bi ɗoŋ-aa na kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o gɔni-duk nɛ tɛ ndak pata'm,
ya nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, zɔn nɛ nin-am,
zɔk nɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ de-a, tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a,
duk nɛnɛ zaŋ
mi tɛ mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ si zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ kpa desee kɔ̧ Tua-wor-am.
«Mi tɛ kpɛk o dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧
in o ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa zu fara-ɗaf'am,
ɓɛɛ nin Tua kɔ‘m tɛ duk nɛ Tua-kɔfi-sɔ̧ wen o dukbíí lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi mɔi̧a so o be
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mɔi̧ o mbe-a woyo piinɛ ɗoŋ.»
O saɗi mɛ zaŋbɛɛ in o wan mɛ kɔ̧ kombo lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gár tɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ.
O gasa wi-duk-zu o be
wa iŋ mgbara mɔ na.
Wa nɛ o ŋga bafa-toyo nɛ mgbu mɔ na;
wa zur nɛ ya, ɔ nɛ ya, ɔ nɛ zu.
Mɔ kpɔk, wa nɛ o ŋga bafa-toyo nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ sur na;
koo o nde kii nɛ war mɔ kɔ‘i mɛ tɛ-wi,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ sa wa'e wi-dai-mɔ hee ge?
Wa iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ-wa:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gár tɛnɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɔ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋmaa!
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ wan mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ gan wan mɛ sɔsɔɔ'ɛ!»
O wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a fe
ɓɛɛ fio kɔ-wa'i de ŋma mɔ tɛ bíí na;
o kpasa bíí mbɛt tik nu fe,
ɓɛɛ bíí ta mɔ sɛnɛ na.
Mɛ nɛ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a fe nɛnɛ.
Ga̧a̧mɔ tɛ pii ɗoŋ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɔɔ nu gɔn gado kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
Ɛnɛ o bem ko kó-dua’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧,
ɗaŋ o be-dàlà, in o bezaŋ kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu!
Ɛ́nɛ́ pí̧ leɓe'nɛ́, mir nɛ nú‘nɛ́ mam nɛ ge bíí ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧‘e, ɛnɛ bó nɛ́
o be ŋgazu, o bezaŋ wi-ndela na?
Mɛ nɛ sɛn ti ɗɔɔ o gasa te in o da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ in o ŋmaa sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gbɛɛ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ ká̧ ŋgere-yi
in sɛn kɔ̧ di̧i̧ mbɛt.
Yí-tom kɔ-mɛ
nɛ ɗafa o de yɔka ta gasi nɛnɛ hee Sɔ̧ ga,
tɛn nɛ zu dɔ̧ɔ̧, a nɛ zɛzɛ nu ha̧ wa,
in o zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ taa mi tɛ duk nɛ desee zu o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nde?
Mɛ nɛ sɛn zu kusa-fara a̧ mɛ daŋ nɛɛ ɔ sɛnɛ;
mɛ nɛ sɛn fara'i a̧ mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Sɛn zu nu tua in ɗoŋ kpar-nú tua,
mɛ kuna o layuru kɔ-mɛ sɛnɛ,
kpɔ̧i̧ nɛ laa yinɛ duk nɛnɛ nɛ mgbii,
ɓɛɛ mɛ daŋ ɔ nu gɔn gado kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ gɔna zu o dàlá nɔ‘i kɔ-mɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wɔ ɔa-a in wa gbɛ nɛ mɛ;
mɛ yeŋ nɛ zim tɛ-wa.
Mɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔ̧́-nyama, a nɛ yi-a tɛ-mɛ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ mɛ kur yak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gasi Mɛlɛk.
Ɓɛɛ wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa sɔ̧ mɛ gasi,
mɛ toma o betom yaknɛ si nyɛi̧a fara mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ zir hɔ fara ko o fio mɛ mbɛt.
Tɛ yara-a kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɛ mɔ nɛnɛ‘i,
mɛ mbɔia ɓɛɛ mɛ e duk na mbɛt.
Mɛ kpaa nɛ mbe ŋgai siti,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mbɔia-a na.
Nɛ́ o a̧ mɛ yu dɔ zu nɛ wee,
sa mɛ ɔr nɛ‘m hegɔ‘i o?
Tɛ-mɛ bìí ɗoŋ-am, ɓɛɛ mɛ ta mɔ wen am ɓɔna.
Zɛ dɔka mi tɔ̧ ŋma wen na;
hegɔ mɛ nɛ wen zu mɔ‘i a̧ mɛ yu nɛ‘m ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ gba ndaa-mɛ ha̧ o bíí,
wen zu tɔ̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e,
wi dúk zóóŋ gee'i,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ de'i lɛŋ beka gbak mɛ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ai nú-mɛ,
o dɔka géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i kɔ-mɛ‘i tɛ kpasi mɛ k’ɛɛ zɔka!
Gba-búk in hara-búk a̧ ɓoɓi wa,
kai yaknɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o wi-e-ta nɛ‘m,
nù in sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí yuwar nɛ haya-a,
gbɛr nɛnɛ nɛ de-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ta yinɛ,
wen ká dukbíí kɔ‘m tɛɛ kɔ̧ naŋ nɛnɛ.»
Mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧, Wi nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
in nɛ̀ fara-duk kɔ‘m duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,
nɛ̀ nin-am ɔ sa̧a̧ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
mi a̧a̧ in o wi-zɔk-bɔnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mɔka-see,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kpasi o bíí nɛ duk si ɗɔɔ
gú nɛ̀ o wi-kɔsa mbɛt.
Mi beka duk tɛ kia wen,
kpa nɛ ɗaŋsee ɓɔnsɛnɛ na,
wen ká
Yɔɔ-kaya ko
ɓɛɛ mi gus'a zik nɛ ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Zu-a'i, a̧ dee ŋgazu,
de nɛ mɔ hee see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Mi iŋa duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ de-a!
«Kóó hegɔ mbɛt, mɔ n'am tɛ de ha̧ a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
mi tɛ kpas'a, mi tɛ usi war ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ mi ga̧a̧ see-aa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o wi-zim-mɔ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ nú-wa mɛ gɔn mami.
O bíí nyɛi̧a fara in o wan mɛ saŋa hɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ kpasi lɛŋ.
Nɛ mbetɛ mi tɛ kpasi dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.»
O wi-ɗaŋ ya kɔ-wa
hee gba-tɔp a̧ pɛŋi
ɓɛɛ nyɛm mɛ duk keɗeŋ ga na,
wen o yi-a ŋmai̧ ŋmai̧ o ndiŋmɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ
nɛ a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ-aa a taŋ.
GASA WAN'e:
«O wi-ɗaŋ beka kpa ga̧a̧mɔ na!»
Mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ hee-ger yaknɛ;
ger-mɛ a̧ wor hee mbia ga;
mɛ̀ úsí ŋgazu ko dukbíí kɔ‘m ha̧ wa,
mɛ̀ úsí yɔɔ-kaya ko o bíí
nutua ko Jakob ha̧ wa.
Wa duk tɛ kia'm wese lɛŋ;
desee kɔ-wa mɛ nɛ wen iŋa mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧,
hee ŋma dukbíí nɛ e see tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
nɛ́ e deemɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧ duk na ga,
Wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ gɔn kita nɛ yuwar-a;
desee kɔ-wa mɛ nɛ yaa-a kpɔk in Sɔ̧; wa'e:
«Kà zima-yì k’ɛɛ a̧ dee tɛ‘nɛ́ na,
in k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ zɔka gɔma-er k’ɛɛ na,
mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ kpa sɛnɛ nɛ ge?»
Zaŋ zima-yì k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i,
ŋma mɔ nɛ dor'nɛ́ tɛ kia mbɔi bo na;
ɛ́nɛ́ nasi nɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ mbɛt.
Zaŋ zima-yì k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kii nɛ wen,
sɔm nɛ ŋmaa sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Pɛrti zima-yì hegɔ‘i de tɛ‘m,
sɛka'm kpɛk nɛ̀ kɔfa-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i na.
Só nɛ́ zima-yì mɛ i̧i̧ hegɔ,
nɛ‘i duk usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ tɛ-wi sɛnɛ‘i
a̧‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɛk so!
Zuma-zu kɔ̧ɔ̧sɔ̧ɔ̧ hee ɓoɓo ga,
ɔ nɛnɛ nɛ bufu zu bùk-paa nɛnɛ,
nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ ɛnɛ sa'e zima-yì nɛ tɛ de tɛ‘m?
Zima-yì wan n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ búr o bíí n’ɛnɛ hɛra nɛ nyak-ɗaŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá kpáŋá ger-wa yinɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ o bara mɛ gbo tɛ bɔnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbín o kpáŋá a taŋ lɛŋ.
Mɛ̀ há̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ gbɛ,
mɛ̀ zír o wisan kɔ̧ kira kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ̀ pí̧ laa tɛ o wi nɛ ya nɛ gee tɛ,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ zik ɗoŋ e ha̧ nya-mɛ
nɛ duk nɛ́ mgbák mur-tɛ-mɛ na.
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ wen mɛ,
hee daŋa-wese-tuyɛ ga;
tɛ ɓan na mɛ kpaa de duka-a woyo nɛ haya-a;
deemɔ nɛ yuwar kɔ-mɛ tɛ yak ti ha̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN
tɛ duk nɛ wi-kpe-ɗoŋ-mɛ.
Hegɔ, kà mɛ sa sara,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ kɔ̧ sara nú-mɛ́;
kà mɛ hiɗi mɔ ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kifi nú ha̧ mɛ‘e,
wi nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Kà mɛ gbo o bara yinɛ,
kà mɛ e usa er yí bíí
in ɓira ɗaŋ wen e nú bíí duk,
ɓɛɛ kà mɛ ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ
ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ gbɛ in o wisan mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ gba-tum tɛ kifi nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ ti mɛ,
ɓɛɛ tum gɔna duk hee wese-see-zu ga wen mɛ.
GASA WAN tɛ yak ti ha̧ mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
a̧ tɛ dai mɛ sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ mbɛt,
a̧ tɛ ha̧ mbe ŋgai ha̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk hee nyɔnɔ
nɛ yì a̧a̧ gun-aa ga,
hee kpút-kpút yi zu-zer
nɛ̀ gɔn na kpoo nɛ kpoo’ɛ ga.
Hegɔ mɛ tɛ ba tua nɛ gbina so'i e ŋgɔn,
zu gba̧‘a̧ naŋ-tua mɛ ti,
ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ sa nin-mɛ‘e:
«Wan-ba-gbina tua e ŋgɔn.»
«Kà mɛ bɛ̧ dee tom wese-ɔm-tɛ,
e nɛ kia mbɔi duk tɛ sa̧a̧ wese kɔ‘m,
kà mɛ e wese'i nɛ wese-tortɛ,
ha̧ mɛ duk nɛ wese-zɔn nin-am
tu̧ nɛ tɛ‘m sɛnɛ,
e nɛ dee tom in dee gɛnɛ sɛnɛ kpɛr nɛnɛ mbɛt duk,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ wi-ha̧-desee ha̧ mɛ;
mi GASA WAN tɛ zɔn mɛ,
ba nɛ mɛ si ŋgɔn e zu kusa-fara mɛ;
mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk
tɛ nu ko zɔmdáa kɔ-mɛ Jakob
nɛ̀ kpaa so nɛ mɔɔ-oi.
Mɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN ha̧ nú zu-a sɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ nɛ mɔ‘i.»
Taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, ɓaa GASA WAN zi̧i̧ wen kpasa'nɛ́ na,
kóó zer-aa ba wen zia wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na nde?
Weyaa, mɛ̀ nɛ́ yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́
a̧ gɔn mgbara'nɛ́ in Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ de
ha̧ a̧ mɛ wɛr yi-a si mgbɔɔr,
ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na mbɛt.
Wen waza-er'nɛ́ in kiitɛ er'nɛ́ lɛŋ
kpee nɛ̀ tɔk wen gbɛɛ zu in dee ŋgamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ hu̧i̧ nú‘nɛ́,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen dee ndela tɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋ wen.
Wen n’ɛnɛ ba nɛnɛ ti kita,
bó nɛ́ kpasawen na;
ɛnɛ gɔn nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ ɓir nɛ wen;
o wen nɔ‘i nɛ gee tumui̧-wen, gba̧a̧-a̧ bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ bá nɛ zaŋ ɗaŋmɔ
ɓɛɛ bem n’ɛnɛ ko nɛ́ bɔnɛ.
O ee-zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ ɗaŋa hee o kui gɔ́k ga;
kóó o nde nɛ tam tɛ fe nú-wi'i;
wen mbaŋa-a ko kui hegɔ ɓɛɛ kóró gboa.
O nduu n’ɛnɛ tak duk nɛ yɔk ko wanto,
bo nɛ wen pi̧a-a̧ mɛ kpe tɛ-wi na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen usa bɔnɛ.
Tom nɛ er'nɛ́ de kana nɛ ɗaŋa mɔ.
Ɛnɛ ma nɛ yi wen dee ɗaŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tika zu ŋma bíí
nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ na wen gbɛɛ a̧.
O ee-zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́
kana nɛ́ wen dee ɗaŋmɔ in o ŋma bíí.
Nɛ́ dee ŋgamɔ in ɗaŋmɔ a̧ duk yuwar n’ɛnɛ ba.
Ɛ́nɛ́ íŋ yuwar sitɛ ga̧a̧mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ fara n’ɛnɛ nɛ sɛnɛ lɛŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ i̧si̧ nɛ deemɔ nɛ ɔ tana.
Nɛ́ o gɔɔ-war ɛ̀nɛ̀ ba,
ɓɛɛ koo o nde,
nɛ ba o yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ‘i beka kpa ga̧a̧mɔ na.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa Sɔ̧ kɔ̧
mɛ ye ɗoŋ yɛ nɛ haya-a na,
in sa a̧ e ha̧ mɔ n'aa ha̧ so nú-a sɛnɛ
mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ haya-a na mbɛt.
Ɛɛ taa so'e mɛ nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ zɔk,
ɓɛɛ fara lɛŋ nɛ́ tum.
Ɛnɛ pɛma so ha̧ ndaa-zan mɛ gɔn,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗuka-zɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ nɔ sɛnɛ.
Ɛ́ɛ́ bá nɛ ká̧ ŋgeŋ tam nɛ mɔ nɛnɛ
hee wi nɛ zɔk mɔ na ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ taa mɔ hee o wi-boma-yí ga mbɛt.
Mɛ́ bu-wese, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tira yɔɔ-mɔ hee mɛ ɗuka-zɛ ga.
Ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ haya-tɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yak ŋmaa in o fio na.
Ɛ́ɛ́ pɛ́ nɛ see yɛ hee dila
ai nɛ nú hee gbaku̧i ga mbɛt.
Ɛɛ ee so ta'e Sɔ̧ tɛ gbak yɛ wo,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ŋma mɔ na.
Ɛɛ pɛm so nɛ kpasa-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ yɛ.
Nɛ mbetɛ GASA WAN,
ɛɛ dee so ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
hegɔ o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ ɓa nɛ wen in yɛɛ,
o ŋgazu k’ɛɛ ndaɗa tɛ yɛ,
nɛ mbetɛ ɛɛ iŋa yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ mbɛt.
Ɛɛ dee ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́,
ɛɛ ee ɗɔra tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ ndaka ɗoŋ‘nɛ́, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Nyɛrɛ-tɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen usa bɔnɛ in dee ŋgazu.
Mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn tɛ yɛ in tɛ taamɔ k’ɛɛ lɛŋ,
kana nɛ ndela ɓɛɛ.
Hegɔ deemɔ nɛ tana-a ɓɔna si ɗoŋ,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ɓɔn kpɔk oi nɛ nyɛi̧a-a,
wen kpasawen tira yɔɔ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ tana-a kpa fara na.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ kpasawen bo ɓɔna;
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ bɛ̧ dee ɗaŋ,
wa tika zu-a ɗaŋ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ va̧i̧-va̧i̧.
GASA WAN zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ see-aa tu̧,
wen nɛ̀ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a bo na.
A̧ zɔka'e ŋma bíí tɔ̧ wen tɛ mɔ‘i na;
ɗɛɗɛ-a gɔna wen
ŋma bíí de ŋma mɔ na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa a̧ pi̧ tɛ-a sɛnɛ nɛ kiitɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa;
ɓɛɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ laa-boi-pi̧-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧,
