yuwar kpasa-a duk nɛ laasɔ̧i̧-gu-zu kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ pi̧i̧ laa-kifa-er tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gaɓi gɔ̀yá tɛ-a hee gba-laa ga.
A̧ tɛ kifi er ha̧ o bíí nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa:
O wi-kur-zu-a tɛ kpa kɔ‘i nɛ ari!
A̧ tɛ kifi er hegɔ see-kisi mɛ mbɛt!
Hegɔ wa tɛ yu GASA WAN in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ daŋa-wese hɔ yee-wese,
ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ nɛ ŋgai
hee kin-yì a̧ gba-búk pɛŋi ga.
GASA WAN tɛ tɛ mɛ kpasi Jerusalɛm
in o be
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
GASA WAN'e: «Ɓɛɛ nɛ war-a kɔ‘m, yuwar
Mɛ̀ kúr Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tók kɛɗu-kɛɗu,
wen sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ hɔɔ kaɗi;
gasamɔ ko GASA WAN dee
ha̧ mɛ mɛ tok hee wese a̧ daŋ ga.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k, tum kpee zu nu,
ɓɛɛ zɛ de zu o dukbíí lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, gasamɔ ko GASA WAN
nyɛka zu mɛ hee wese a̧ daŋ ga.
Hegɔ o tugun bíí tɛ gar tɛnɛ pii tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ o wannu mbɛt tɛ tɛ wen zu sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɛk tɛ-mɛ‘i.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ zik katɛ mɛ,
mɛ́ tɛ zɔk o bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ gar tɛnɛ.
Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn katɛ mɛ.
O bem nɔ‘i píí nɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ;
o bíí tɛ ɓuk o boko-bem kɔ-mɛ piinɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ kpaa desee,
see-mɛ tɛ to ɓɛɛ tɛ-mɛ gara,
wen o dɔka mbɔi ɗɔɔ o gba-tɔp lɛŋ tɛ gar pii tɛ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o kpaamɔ ko o tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ tɛ pii tɛ-mɛ mbɛt.
O ŋgeloba tɛ dun zu nu kɔ-mɛ nɛ dɔka-a,
o wi-de-gɛnɛ nɔ‘i nɛ́ o be Madiaŋ in o be Efa,
o bíí Seba tɛ tɛ lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ kai nɛ́ lɔr in fuu-nyama tɛnɛ,
bíí nɛ̀ gima zɔn nɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN.
O mɔ-dai ko o bíí Kedar lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ sɛn ti mɛ,
o vala sami ko o be Nɛbayot tɛ ya nɛ kɔ-mɛ;
wa tɛ dɔ wa zu fara-ɗafi GASA WAN.
Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ de kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧
nɛ ɔ dee nyɛmna wen-aa;
hegɔ a̧ tɛ usi gasamɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ Tua kɔ̧-a̧.
O giiwi nɔ'ɔ nɛ o ge bíí ge?
Wa ya hee tura-zan ga,
kóó hee gii gbaku̧i nɛ bu̧i si fara-ɔɔ kɔ‘i ga.
O kombon gar tɛnɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ kur gba-tɔp mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o gasa kombon mɛ Tarsis a̧ ya ti ha̧ wa,
kai nɛ o bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ ya nɛ nyɛi̧a-a piinɛ ɗoŋ,
nɛ oi sede in lɔr kɔ-wa
wen zɔna nin GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
in wen zɔna nin Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
wen a̧ ha̧a̧ gasamɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Nɛ́ o gɛnɛ a̧ tɛ mbo ŋgeŋ kɔ-mɛ woyo,
ɓɛɛ o wannu kɔ-wa yaa nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ-mɛ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Zaŋ nyimsea kɔ‘m, mi gusa so mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ usi
wen see-am dee kinii.
Kóó nɛ̀ wese, kóó nɛ̀ zɛ,
nú garo ye kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk booŋ,
wa beka kpe na,
wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ kai o mbɔi ko o tugun bíí
in ko o wannu tɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa.
Tugun bíí in o nu lɛŋ nɛ tɛ bɛ̧ dee tom ha̧ mɛ tɛ kum lɛŋ; tugun bíí nɔ‘i tɛ ɗaŋ lɛŋ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti.
Gasamɔ ko Libaŋ tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ;
wa tɛ kai o
gú nɛ̀ o dɛ̧ɛ̧
wen ɗafa-a nɛ̀ Sa̧a̧ Tua kɔ‘m.
Hegɔ mi tɛ usi gasamɔ nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ fara n'am duk sɛnɛ.
O bezaŋ o bíí nɛ usa so bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ tɛ zum zu sɛn ti mɛ,
o bíí nɛ zɛkɛɗa so mɛ tɛ gu nu sɛn ti ɗɔɔ naŋ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ sa nin-mɛ‘e: «Ye ko GASA WAN»,
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa siŋa so mɛ pi̧ nu,
wa kɔ̧ mɛ na, wa nɛ mɛ zɔk mɛ ɓɔna mbɛt ga,
kinii, mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk nɛ mɔ
nɛ‘i tɛ zɔn pɛ nɛ pɛ,
in mɔɔ-ha̧-desee ha̧ o bezaŋ ɗoŋ ŋmaa yaknɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mɛ tɛ nɔ yibere ko o tugun bíí,
ɓɛɛ mɛ kaia mbɔi ko o wannu;
hegɔ, mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e,
Wi-kpasi-mɛ, mi GASA WAN,
in Wan-gɔn-zu-mɛ nɛ́ Wan-ŋgai ko Jakob.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ kai lɔr tɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ,
oi nú ndɛrɛ,
in bu-mbɔi tɛnɛ,
oi nú gee boi.
Wa tɛ kai nɛ ndɛrɛ tɛnɛ,
oi nú te,
in boi tɛnɛ,
oi nú ta mbɛt.
Mi tɛ e nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ ɔ wan zu mɛ
in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ duk zu mɛ.
Wi beka zii nyɛrɛ dee ŋgamɔ zu nu kɔ-mɛ,
kóó gbina mɔ in ɗaŋa mɔ tɛ gbìsí-nu kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ tɛ sa nin ŋga-fara-duk kɔ-mɛ‘e «Yuwar kpasa-a»
ɓɛɛ mɛ saa kpar-nú-garo kɔ-mɛ‘e «Zɔnamɔ».
Sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ tɛ nyɛk zu mɛ mɛ bu-wese
beka duk nɛ wese ɓɔna,
in sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ tɛ tok zu mɛ mɛ zaŋzɛ
bo nɛ nyaŋa-zɛ ɓɔna mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo,
nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ gasa nyɛka sa̧a̧mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Yee-wese in yee-tum ko nyaŋa-zɛ
beka duk nɛ ŋma mɔ wen mɛ na,
wen GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ
nɛ tɛ nyɛk zu mɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ zima-fio kɔ-mɛ tɛ kaɗi mbɛt.
Dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ oi-aa
tɛ duk nɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ba nu'i nɛ mɔɔ-oi kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wa nɛ o bíí n'am dee nɛ er-am,
wen usa gasamɔ kɔ‘m.
Wa tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in bɔr-nyɔnɔ,
nɛ hɔɔ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘m.
Nú-gara nɛ duka so tikiɗi tɛ nyɛɓi nɛ dɔka-a,
ɓɛɛ geɗek nutua tɛ gasi kifi nɛ zɔm ŋgaya tugun bíí.
Mɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN tɛ de nɛ haya-a
nɛ ŋgimbi-a tɛ hɔ nɛnɛ, nɛ mɔ‘i.
wen a̧ tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu'm.
A̧ toma'm ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ de mbe wen ha̧ o wisan,
ha̧‘m mɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta na,
in ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o bara-biro in ha̧ o wi-zɔɓɔ‘e,
wa tɛ gbo ɓɛɛ poka tɛ gbin yinɛ naŋ-wa;
ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ pɛ nɛ̀ GASA WAN
tɛ de nɛ ko ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘i,
in wese nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛ kifi nɛ er ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘i,
ha̧ nɛ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ o wi-zim-fio.
Wa zim nɛ fio sɛn
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kpai ɗaŋsee nɛ desee:
bùk nɛ a̧a̧ so zu wa tɛ kifi nɛ
mi tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ de nɔ̧́-nyama tɛ-wa,
ɓɛɛ zima-fio beka bo ɓɔna.
Wa tɛ pi̧ nɛ laa-gbaŋa,
nɛ bó nɛ́ deeko nɛ tɛ-wa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Hegɔ wa tɛ duk nɛ gasa te-zɔn-nin Sɔ̧,
wa tɛ duk nɛ fɔ wen usa gasamɔ ko GASA WAN.
Wa tɛ ɗafi o bɛɛ-oi ba e ŋgɔn,
wa tɛ mbo o tua nɛ gbina tɛ ŋgimbi ko o zɔmdáa,
ɓɛɛ wa ɗafa o ye nɛ ɗaŋa so ɓeemɛ pɛ nɛ pɛ e ŋgɔn woyo.
O gɛnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ dai o geɗek mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́,
o gɛnɛ nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ o wi-wa-fɔ in fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
K’ɛ́nɛ́, wa tɛ sa'nɛ́‘e: «O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ko GASA WAN»,
in «O wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ».
Mbɔi ko o dukbíí
in gasamɔ kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Sɛn oi nú búù in dara,
ɛnɛ tɛ kpa nɛ nù ko wi nɔ‘i zu ŋmaa war yiitoo;
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ duka tɛ nyɛŋɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Wen kɔ‘m GASA WAN, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
mi sɛna zuzu in gbɛɛ-zu.
Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m ha̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi nɔɔ tɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo mbɛt.
O tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ sɛn fara lɛŋ tɛ iŋ o bezaŋ‘nɛ́,
o dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ iŋ kpar'nɛ́;
kóó o nde nɛ tɛ zɔk wa tɛ iŋ‘e,
wa nɛ bezaŋ nɛ GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu wa.
Nyɛŋɛ pi̧ nɛ‘m wen zu GASA WAN,
sɔ̧-tɛ‘m de nɛ tortɛ wen zu Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
wen a̧ pi̧i̧ laa-duka-kpasa sɛn tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gu gba-laa deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ‘m mbɛt
hee ŋma wi-ba-kóò, kóó ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧
nɛ guu de laasɔ̧i̧ zu ga.
Desee kɔ‘m duk hee ko zɔŋa nɛ ɗafa tɛ mɛ ba wii ga.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nù de nɛnɛ ha̧ kpar-mɔ mɛ gbo,
in nɛ fɔ dɛm nɛ kpar-mɔ'ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɛ de nɛnɛ
ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in zɔnamɔ mɛ dɛm,
sɛn ti o tugun bíí lɛŋ.
Mi beka kpe nú‘m zu
mi beka duk keɗeŋ zu mɔ ko Jerusalɛm na mbɛt
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gɔn hee sa̧a̧mɔ ga,
in yuwar-kpasa-a kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ nyɛk hee hɛra-kan ga.
O tugun bíí tɛ zɔk deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ-mɛ,
in o wannu lɛŋ tɛ zɔk gasamɔ kɔ-mɛ mbɛt;
wa tɛ sa mɛ nɛ̀ mbe nin nɛ GASA WAN tɛ a ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ duk nɛ
tok nɛnɛ kɛɗu-kɛɗu;
mɛ tɛ duk nɛ mɛtɛwol sɛn kɔ̧ er Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Wi beka sa mɛ‘e «ye nɛ‘i ee duk» ɓɔna,
wi sa nù kɔ-mɛ‘e «nù-nɛ-ɗaŋa» ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wi tɛ sa nin-mɛ‘e «Dua-see GASA WAN»,
in nù kɔ-mɛ‘e «ko-wan-wíì»,
wen GASA WAN tɛ de wɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nu kɔ-mɛ tɛ ba wii.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ be-ŋgaiwi ba nɛ be-zɔŋa ga,
nɛ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɛ mbo nɛ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ duka hee wíì kɔ-mɛ ga.
A̧ tɛ de wɔ-mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ be-ŋgaiwi
de nɛ wɔ kóò kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
Jerusalɛm, mi ee wi-pɛm-mɔ zu garo kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ zɛ in wese lɛŋ wa beka ɔ ya na.
«Ɛnɛ o wi-mbaŋ-tɛ GASA WAN zu mɔ ko Jerusalɛm,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔm tɛ‘nɛ́ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ duk keɗeŋ na,
hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ ɗafi nɛ Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn,
de nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ gasamɔ zu nu’ɛ.»
GASA WAN kana so ti-bee-wi tɔ̧ nɛnɛ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mi kana mɔ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m'e:
mi beka ha̧ alkamaari nɛ mɛ guna
ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ ɓɔna ndo-ndo-ndo;
bezaŋ o gɛnɛ beka nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ̀ mɛ zɔka bɔnɛ tom-aa na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ nyɔŋ alkamaari zɔn nɛ GASA WAN
tɛ ya nɛ o wi nɛ mɔi̧a so;
o wi nɛ tɛ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn bɛr Tua kɔ‘m,
tɛ ya nɛ o wi nɛ ɓii so waya-a.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó, o bíí Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó saaye nɛ haya-a,
wen ɗafa yuwar ti dukbíí!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ o kɔ̧ mɛ dun,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zá̧ o ta yinɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tutuwal e ŋgɔn ti o dukbíí.
GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ dam mgbii-zan lɛŋ,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be Siɔŋ‘e;
«Wi-kpasi'nɛ́ a̧ tɛ‘i,
a̧ kai nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ̧-a̧ piinɛ,
o mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ ti a̧.»
Wi tɛ sa wa'e «sa̧a̧ dukbíí»,
«O wi nɛ GASA WAN gɔna zu wa»,
ɓɛɛ wi saa mɛ Jerusalɛm'e «Dua-see GASA WAN»,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ «Bɛɛ-oi» ɓɔna.
Nɛ́ ge bíí ge a̧ tɛ nɛ Edɔm,
si war Bɔsra nɛ o gbɛ̧-mɔ a̧a̧ tɛ laa kɔ̧-a̧‘i ge?
Wi’ɛi ɓer nɛ yí-ŋguɗi sɛn ɗɔɔ gba-laa,
e nɛ ta nɛ ŋgai kɔ‘i.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɛ wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
mɛ́ bi biro in o bíí wen kpasa dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Wen ge o gbɛ̧-mɔ a̧a̧ tɛ laa kɔ-mɛ
hee ko wi-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mi vata dɔ̧ɔ̧ ɛ̀n’ám,
ŋma bíí mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m gbak am na;
sɛn zaŋ nyimsea kɔ‘m,
mi i̧sa wa mbɔti ɓɛɛ tɔk-wa kpíɗí a tɛ o laa kɔ‘m;
tɛ ŋga nyimsea'i mi ŋmaa wa,
ɓɛɛ tɔk-wa ndɔr ɗaŋ nɛ o laa kɔ‘m lɛŋ.
Sɛn kɔ̧ see-am, mi taa wese kifa-er hɔa,
ŋgimbi kpasa dukbíí kɔ‘m hɔɔ kaɗi mbɛt.
Mi kɛ̧i̧a̧ mɔ gbakna mi zɔka ŋma bíí wen gbaka'm wo, takaɗi.
Ɗɛɗ‘am gɔna tɛ zɔka-a'e ŋma bíí mɛ gbak am bo na.
Nɛ́ hegɔ s'am de mɔ‘i nɛ tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m ha̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m.
Sɛn tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m mi mbɔla o dukbíí,
tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m gbɛɛ wa hee dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ mi gbai tɔk tɛ-wa a nu.
Tɛ‘m tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o demɔ ko GASA WAN,
mi tɛ zɔn a̧ wen zu o tom n'aa dee wen yɛ,
in gasa
GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ wa, de nɛ demɔ in wa.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ zu o be
«O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ mbetɛ,
wa nɛ o bem nɛ beka e foe yí‘m na.»
Hegɔ a̧ duka nɛ Wan-kpasi-wa.
Tɛ ŋgimbi dita-see kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
bó nɛ́ ŋma betom a̧ a̧ toma na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ nɛ tɛ-a a̧ kpasa wa.
Sɛn tɛ
a̧ nɛ tɛ-a gɔna zu wa,
a̧ tuia wa, ɓuk nɛ wa nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ tɛnɛ ɓeemɛ.
Zu-a'i, wa dee ŋgazu,
ɓɛɛ wa tu̧ see sa̧a̧
Hegɔ a̧ kifa duk nɛ wisɛn kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba biro duk nɛ̀ wa.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, tɛ dukbíí mbaŋa ɗoŋ nyɛrɛ mɔ
nɛ yaka so tɛ ŋgimbi ko Moisɛ‘e:
«Wi nɛ mgbɔɔ so dukbíí kɔ‘i ku nɛ gba-tɔp,
wan-dai o mɔ-dai a̧a̧ dee?
Wi nɛ ha̧a̧ so
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋgai te er-a a̧ duk so nɛ̀ war wii-er Moisɛ.
A̧ dee ha̧ yì mɛ kɛ̧ sɛn ti dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i de ha̧ nin-a mɛ hur kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ ku gba-tɔp nɛ ndaa-lembe,
ɓɛɛ wa duk hee ŋma nyaŋa nɛ‘i toŋgi na ga.
Wa duk hee ŋma gii mɔ-dai
nɛ zir si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ga.
Nɛ́ hegɔ, a̧ ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN mgbɔɔ so nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́,
de nɛnɛ ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur.
Sɛn yiwese nɛ̀ kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɔ dee nyɛmna mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧i̧ yi'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ hɔ zu yɛ'ɛ.
Gɔya tɛ-ɛɛ in wɔ tɛ-ɛɛ n’ɛnɛ de so nɛ ŋgai’ɛ, a̧a̧ dee?
K’ɛ́nɛ́ dor tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ usa
Dáà k’ɛɛ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́,
zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ Abraham iŋ kɔ‘i yɛ na,
Jakob mbɛt, iŋ yí yɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dáà k’ɛɛ,
nin'nɛ́ nɛ́ Wan-kpasi yɛ hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ ee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yambali,
yɔ nɛ mɔ nyɛi̧ nɛ o yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ŋgai nɛ see yɛ, yu nɛ̀ kíí‘nɛ́ na wen ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ wen zu yɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́,
wen dukbíí nɛ duk nɛ́ mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ oi-aa.
Sa̧a̧ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa nù nɛ mɔɔ-oi ɗoŋ-aa tɛ nyɛi̧ na;
o wisɛn k’ɛɛ dee so ndiŋ a tɛ sa̧a̧ Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, zɛ ɔ dɔka n’ɛnɛ ɔ wan zu yɛ,
ɛɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɔna;
ɛɛ dukbíí nɛ wa sa so nin'nɛ́ zu wa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Kà bó só h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ a̧k yiwese zir nɛnɛ tɛnɛ ga,
o kaya tɛ̀ɛ́ nak ɓɛɛ mbaŋa sɛn ti'nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ duk hee wee nɛ dɔ kora zɔ̧,
kóó nɛ̀ de ha̧ yì mɛ kpa̧i̧'ɛ ga.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ usi ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e,
ɛ́nɛ́ Sɔ̧‘i nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ bele tɛ̀ɛ́ zar o dɔka dukbíí.
O kaya tɛ̀ɛ́ nak mbaŋ a nu
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ de nɛ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ
tɛ zira-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ‘i.
Nɛti ŋma bíí nɛ zia, kóó nɛ‘i tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧,
kóó nɛ zɔka nɛ gbaayí‘e,
ŋma sɔ̧ yak zu'nɛ́ nɛ dee pɛrti mɔ hegɔ,
wen zu o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ e ta nɛ wi, bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ we nɛ ti o wi nɛ de mɔ nɛ see'nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧,
nɛ ba yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́ in nɛ tɛ bi ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na.
See'nɛ́ ɗaŋa wen zu ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛɛ dea;
mɔ kpɔk, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ pii ɗoŋ mɛ ba o gba̧‘a̧ yuwar k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ kpasi.
Ɛɛ yaa so hee o wi-simbo ga,
ɓɛɛ o deemɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt duka nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr
hee tui-mar ko okoo-zɔk-zɛ ga.
O yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yambali,
hee kora wa̧a̧ a̧ búk kai yaknɛ ga.
Ŋma bíí mɛ sa mɔ sitɛ‘nɛ́ bo na,
kóó nɛ ta mɔ mɛ ndaɗi in'nɛ̀ɛ́ bo na mbɛt.
Wen ɛnɛ zika ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ e h’ɛ́ɛ́,
siŋ nɛ yɛ pi̧ nu wen ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kpa ŋgai zu yɛ.
Zu-a'i, GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ dáà k’ɛɛ,
ɛɛ nɛ gìì, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nɛ wi-ɓu-kpánà,
ɓɛɛ ɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ tom n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ er'nɛ́.
Ká see'nɛ́ nyim batɛ na GASA WAN,
ká tɛ‘nɛ́ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.
Ɛnɛ zɔk, ɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́.
O sa̧a̧ saaye k’ɛ́nɛ́ kifa bɛɛ-oi,
Jerusalɛm kifa ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ
nɛ mɔ ɗaŋa sɛnɛ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti.
Wa dɔɔ sa̧a̧ Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɔ dee nyɛmna,
nɛ̀ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ wor só‘nɛ́ sɛnɛ.
Fara n’ɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna'i gbina ɗaŋ lɛŋ kifi geemɔ.
GASA WAN, mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗaŋa lɛŋ‘i
de ŋma mɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ na nde?
Ɛnɛ beka de ŋma mɔ oi-aa na,
ha̧ búù mɛ ba yɛ nde?
Mi duka so dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen kifa nú in gbaka bíí,
ɓɛɛ bii ak am na;
mi duka dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen gbaka bíí,
ɓɛɛ wa kii gbakamɔ‘i na.
Mi usa tɛ‘m'e «Mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ»
ha̧ ŋma dukbíí nɛ iŋ so nin-am na.
Mi nyɛi̧a er-am wese lɛŋ
sitɛ dukbíí ŋgazu nɛ ba kɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋ war,
de nɛ mɔ nɛ see kɔ̧a̧.
Wa nɛ ŋma dukbíí nɛ de mɔ hu̧si na,
tu̧ nɛ see-am ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
wa ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ,
dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama see zu
Fara-ɔɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio in kɔ̧ di̧i̧;
wa nyɔŋ nɛ kpoo ŋgɔya,
ɓɛɛ wa aa o ndiŋ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧ o nyɛk kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Wen nɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí nɛ wa kpa nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ nyɛi̧a-a, k’ɛ́nɛ́ fo tɛ yɛ na,
wen ká simbo tɛ́ɛ̀ ba'nɛ́.»
Kà‘m zɔk yí-tom'i, ɓɛɛ see-am bíí nɛ wee tu̧ nɛnɛ.
Mi kasa
mi beka e duk na,
hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ kifi er sɛnɛ ha̧ wa nɛ de-a.
Mi tɔr o gbɛɛ-zu ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa tɔr
in war kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wɛn’ɛ.
O zɔmdáa kɔ-wa nɔ‘i dɔ so nɛ fuu-nyama
ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ see zu o kaya,
zɛkɛɗi nɛ‘m see zu o zu-tɔ̧́ mbɛt.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, mi tɛ kifi er de nɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ tok see-wa sar,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ wa dee so.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
Bo nɛ ka'i kpa de sikila waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ga̧i̧ kɔ̧ te-a,
ɓɛɛ wi tɔ̧a̧‘e: «K’ɛ́ɛ́ ɗáŋ a̧ na,
wen de be dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ-a» na nde?
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m tɛ de nɛnɛ in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m mbɛt,
ká‘m tɛɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ nɛ oi gun.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ nutua ko Jakob mɛ kpa o bezaŋ;
wi nɛ tɛ kpa o kaya kɔ‘m nɛ mɔɔ-oi tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ Juda.
O kaya nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ko o wi n'am hoka,
ɓɛɛ wa dee ye zu a̧.
Bɔkɔ-nu Sarɔŋ tɛ duk nɛ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ko o geɗek mɔ-dai,
ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Akɔr duka wen o gasa mɔ-dai
ko dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ kii am.
Ɓɛɛ war k’ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ ee GASA WAN duk,
ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar sitɛ sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗafi nɛ̀ fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ ha̧ Gad sɔ̧-ha̧-de-sɔnti,
á nɛ̀ zɛzɛ ha̧ Meni sɔ̧-e-zu-mɔ'ɛ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ fio k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ ŋga fio-gba-paa.
Ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ zugur'nɛ́ nu wen ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn ger'nɛ́,
wen mi saa so'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ sara na,
mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ zia-a na.
Ɛnɛ dee nɛ́ mɔ nɛ de tɛ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ na'i, ɛ́nɛ́ hoka.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧‘e:
Ŋgimbi nɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya nɛ wɔ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa a̧a̧ kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-nɔ,
ɓɛɛ war k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fe wɔ-yì;
ŋgimbi nɛ búù tɛ ba'nɛ́,
o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɛ ya nɛ desee.
Wa tɛ de nyɛŋɛ, gai nɛ mɔ nɛ desee,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ hiɗi nɛ mɔ nɛ ɗaŋsee,
ai nɛ nú, see'nɛ́ ŋman nɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m tɛ kan mɔ fom nɛ bíí,
wa tɛ sa nɛ nin'nɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Sɔ̧ a̧ gbɛ mɛ hee ko o wi nɔ‘i ga.»
Ɓɛɛ war ko o wi-de-tom ha̧‘m,
wi tɛ a nɛ mbe nin ha̧ wa.
Kóó o nde nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa toka de yoŋgo zaŋnu’ɛ,
tɛ tok yoŋgo nɛ nin kpasa Sɔ̧.
Kóó o nde zaŋnu’ɛ nɛ tɛ kan mɔ
tɛ kan mɔ nɛ nin kpasa Sɔ̧ mbɛt,
wen tɛ‘m tɛ bi ɗoŋ bɔnɛ nɛ yaka so,
mi beka iŋ wa ɓɔna.
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Mi tɛ de mbe yiwese in mbe nu,
ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi beka mbaŋ ɗoŋ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ nɛ yaka kaɗi ɓɔna;
taamɔ-a beka bo kɔ̧ see-wi ɓɔna mbɛt.
Bíí lɛŋ a̧ kpa nɛ desee,
de nɛ tortɛ wen zu mɔ n'am tɛ de'i,
wen mi tɛ mbo Jerusalɛm in dukbíí woyo,
nɛ tɛ duk de nɛ nyɛŋɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ de nyɛŋɛ Jerusalɛm,
ɓɛɛ mi kpaa desee zu dukbíí kɔ‘m mbɛt!
Wi beka zii giti hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ in
Fara'i, be-zɔɗi beka fe nɛ haya-a na,
pɛ ko gbɛ́rɛ́ tɛ dam kana kaɗi sɛka a̧ fea.
Kà wí nɛ kpaa pɛ gɔmŋmaa fe, a̧ fee nɛ ŋgaiwi,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ fe nɛti ha̧ pɛ gɔmŋmaa,
wi tɛ tɔ̧‘e, mɛ nɛ fom a̧ baa wi’ɛi.
Sɛn fara'i, o bíí nɛ tɛ mbo tua,
wa tɛ ɔ kana kɔ̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ wa fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ nyɔŋ kana waya-a.
Wa beka mbo tua ɓɛɛ ŋma gɔni bíí ɔɔ kɔ̧ a̧ na,
kóó guna mɔ, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma bíí nɛtɛ nyɔŋa na mbɛt.
Zɛ duka-a ko o bíí kɔ‘m tɛ dɔk hee ko te ga.
Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ-oi-tom nɛ wa dee nɛ er-wa.
Wa beka de tom ba nɛ̀ tɛ-wa ɓɔna,
wa beka ko o bem nɛ tɛ fe fee gee na,
wen wa tɛ ya nɛ o bezaŋ o bíí
nɛ GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu wa,
wa in o bezaŋ-wa.
Kɔ‘m, wa tɛ sa sara hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
ɓɛɛ mi kifa nú ha̧ wa kaɗi;
wa tɛ tɔ̧ wen kaɗi hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
ɓɛɛ mi zia kaɗi.
O ɓoŋgo in o sami tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk;
dila tɛ nyɔŋ zɔ̧ hee ndai ga,
ɓɛɛ war ko gɔ́k, nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ fuunu.
Bíí beka de ɗaŋmɔ in ŋgamɔ
sɛn zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ ɓɔna.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Yiwese nɛ damti kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ nù nɛ mɔɔ-e-ɗɔɔ naŋ-am.
Nɛ́ ge tua ge ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ de ha̧‘m ge?
Ge fara ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ ɔm tɛ‘m sɛnɛ ge?
Mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ nɛ tom nɛ er-am dea,
ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ nɛ kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ wi n'am kɔ̧a̧,
mɛ nɛ wisan in wi-kɔsa
nɛ zii wen kɔ‘m ɓɛɛ see ŋmana.
«Kà wa gɔn ndai ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ wa gbɛɛ bíí mbɛt;
kà wa gɔn
ɓɛɛ wa gbɛɛ toyo mbɛt.
Wa ha̧ fuu-alkamaari nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa ha̧a̧ tɔk ŋgɔya mbɛt.
Wa dɔ fuu-nyama ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔna o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
O wi nɔ‘i kpɛka mɛ ba nɛ yuwar nɛ see-wa kɔ̧a̧,
kpa nɛ desee tɛ mɔɔ-ndiŋ nɛ wa de'i.
Kɔ‘m, mi hoka ha̧ wa mɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋgamɔ nɛ wa yu'i mɛ tik zu wa,
wen mi saa so wa, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí kóó kpɔk kɔ̧ sara na;
mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ zia-a na.
Wa dee nɛ mɔ nɛ de tɛ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ na, a̧ wa hoka.»
O wi nɛ zia wen ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ká see'nɛ́ ŋman’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'aa tɔ̧:
Wen nɛ o nya k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧‘nɛ́
ndak nɛ ɛnɛ mgbara wa yinɛ,
wen zu nin-am tɔ̧, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«GASA WAN a̧ usi gasamɔ kɔ‘i
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa desee de nɛ gbaŋa-a h’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wa a̧ foe tɛ ba.
Gitimɔ a̧ de mɔ tɛnɛ nɛ saaye'i,
gitimɔ‘i tɛ nɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ‘i.
Jerusalɛm koo bem nɛti ha̧ zaŋ mɛ i̧si̧,
a̧ kóó be-wiwii nɛti ká zaŋ tɛ nyim hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Nɛ o'o zia pɛrti mɔ hegɔ kaɗi o?
O'o zɔka pɛrti mɔ‘i o?
Ŋma ye nyɛma mɛ gasi kpɔk wese,
koo ŋma nu hee gɔma-yí ga nde?
Mɔ nɛ hɔɔ zu
Zaŋ-aa tɛ nyim gee nyima-a na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ko bem.
«Ka'm nɛ hu̧i̧a̧ yuwar ha'i mɛ ko,
ɓɛɛ mi beka e ha̧ bem-a mɛ gbo na nde?
Mi nɛ dee ha'i mɛ ko bem,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ dor woyo nde?»
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Ɛnɛ o bíí nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpá desee de nɛ nyɛŋɛ in a̧.
Ɛnɛ o wi-zim-mɔ wen ŋgamɔ nɛ kpaa so a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tortɛ in a̧.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naa-wan-bem ha̧ nɛ bere ha̧ be-zɔɗi,
ɓɛɛ ká ama nɛ desee’ɛ ga,
ɛnɛ tɛ am ber-aa zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur
ɓɛɛ see'nɛ́ ga̧a̧.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi tɛ tom ga̧a̧mɔ si Jerusalɛm hee yi a̧ fok ga,
in mbɔi ko o zuduk bíí hee ha̧a̧-yì a̧ pii ga.
A̧ tɛ pi̧ bere nú‘nɛ́ hɛr nɛ ɛnɛ ɗoŋ-aa,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naa-wan-bem de nɛnɛ in bem kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ ga̧ see'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpa desee mbɛt
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ naa-wan-bem de kana nɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
See'nɛ́ tɛ ga̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm nɛ mbetɛ,
ɓɛɛ o gba̧a̧-tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ kpa ŋgai
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mbɔŋgi ɓɔ nɛnɛ nú kórò'ɛ ga.»
GASA WAN tɛ duk zu o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tika zu o wi-sɛn-a.
GASA WAN a̧ tɛ‘i,
a̧ duk mgbara leɓe-wee,
ɓɛɛ keekee kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ hara-búk.
A̧ tɛ mɛ yoɓi nyamandoi-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tu̧u̧-see,
in nyamandoi-nasa-bíí kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ leɓe-wee.
GASA WAN tɛ gɔn kita zu bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ wee in gba-paa,
ɓɛɛ ɓaa-wen tɛ tik zu o bíí nɛ dɔka-a.
O wi nɛ tɔ̧‘e wi nɛ sa̧a̧-wi,
war-tɛ-wi ɗaŋ na kóó tikiɗi
ŋma ndiŋ bo tɛ-wi na kóó tikiɗi,
ɓɛɛ yee kpɛɛfɔ yor nɛnɛ ɗoŋ kuti bíí nɛ yor see-a,
nyɔŋ nɛ kpoo ŋgɔya in o ŋma ndiŋ saɗi,
gu nɛ o zɔya, tɛ kum lɛŋ.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Mi iŋa yí-tom kɔ-wa in mɔ nɛ wa ta kɔ̧ see-wa. Mi tɛ tɛ mɛ mɔi̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk gasamɔ kɔ‘m.

Mi tɛ e ŋma mɔɔ-usi-mɔ mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ mi toma o ŋma bíí nɛ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu sitɛ o tugun bíí: mɛ nɛ o bíí Tarsis, Pul in Lud, nɛ ya nɛ o ŋga wi-pi̧-góò; wa tɛ nɛ sitɛ o bíí Tubal in Yavaŋ mbɛt, gu nɛ o see-kisi nɛ ɔ nyɛi̧a lɛŋ nɛ tɛ zii nyɛrɛ kɔ‘m hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, kà wa zɔk nɛ gasamɔ kɔ‘m na mbɛt. O betom kɔ‘m tɛ usi gasamɔ kɔ‘m ha̧ o tugun bíí nɔ‘i,

ɓɛɛ wa kaia o nya'nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ pɛsa so dam ɗoŋ o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ piinɛ sɛn zu o nyaŋa, o keekee in o mɔɔ-gɔ-wi, o tuifuu in o ŋgeloba hɔ nɛnɛ zu sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m Jerusalɛm. GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ ɗaf'am, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kpɛk, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
Mi tɛ hok o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii mgbara wa mbɛt. GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mbe yiwese in mbe nù n'am tɛ de tɛ duk nɛ nɔa-a ti'm ga, bezaŋ‘nɛ́ in nin'nɛ́ tɛ duk sɛn ti'm hegɔ mbɛt. GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
«Dam ɗoŋ mbe yí-zɛ lɛŋ in wese-ɔm-tɛ mbɛt,
bíí lɛŋ tɛ tɛɛ gbɛ zugur nu ti'm!
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Tɛ gboa-a, wi tɛ zɔk wɔr o bíí,
nɛ dee so ŋgazu in am;
o dɔk nɛ aa tɛ wa beka fe na,
in wee nɛ dɔ wa'i mbɛt bi na,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr wen bíí lɛŋ.»
Wen’ɛ nɛ́ wen ko Jeremii, bem ko Hilkia, ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duka so saaye Anatot, nù ko Bɛnjamin.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii ŋgimbi wan ko Josias, bem ko Amɔŋ wannu Juda tɛ ɓu-zua-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧.

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧ woyo tɛ ŋgimbi ko Joakim, bem ko Josias wannu Juda, hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ-wan ko Sedesias, ŋma ɓii bem ko Josias wannu Juda. Nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ wa kaia nɛ̀ o bíí Jerusalɛm yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Nɛti ká nàà kɔ-mɛ tɛ ba zaŋ mɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, mi iŋa so mɛ kaɗi. Nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ ko mɛ, mi hoka so mɛ kaɗi mbɛt; mi ee mɛ nɛ̀
Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Ho! Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, mi tɛ iŋ yuwar tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, wen mi ɓɔna nɛ́ obem!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Ká mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e, mɛ́ ɓɔna nɛ́ obem na! Fara lɛŋ n'am tɛ tom mɛ si sɛnɛ, kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ nɛa-a; mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɔ̧a-a ɓɛɛ mbɛt.
Ká mɛ́ de kíí bíí na. Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ mɛ, wen kpasa mɛ. GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ!»
GASA WAN nyɛi̧a er, tam nú‘m, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mi ee wen kɔ‘m sɛn kɔ̧̀ nú-mɛ́.
Mɛ̀ íŋ sɔsɔɔ‘i'e mi ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ mɛ zu o tugun bíí in o mɔɔ-wan, wen zuɗa mɔ yinɛ in ira mɔ a nù, wen gbina mɔ in ɗaŋa-a, wen mboo mɔ in guna mɔ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Jeremii, nɛ́ ge mɔ ge a̧ mɛ zɔk ge?» Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Nɛ́ gbaa-er te
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ zɔka mɔ‘i sa̧ yí-mɛ́! Mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m wen ha̧ wen kɔ‘m mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧!»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m war yiitoo-aa woyo: «Nɛ́ ge mɔ ge a̧ mɛ zɔk ge?» Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Nɛ́ gba kpánà a̧ duk tɛ wee nɔi̧ nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ nú-a wɛr pii tɛ‘m nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Ŋgamɔ tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn
mɛ tik zu o bíí nù'ɛ.
Mi tɛ sa o bíí nú-gara tɛ mɔɔ-wan
mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛnɛ lɛŋ;
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
O wi nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ‘i;
wa tɛ a o gado-wan kɔ-wa
dam nú o garo yea-a si Jerusalɛm;
wa tɛ kɛr garo Jerusalɛm kpa nú ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ wa bìì o gasa ye nù Juda lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu o bíí Juda
wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa dea:
wa ea'm duk, ɓɛɛ wa dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ ɗafi nɛ̀ o ŋma sɔ̧,
gbɛ nɛ̀ zugur ti o mɔ nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ er, gasi nɛ̀ wa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ hɛ́r zaŋ-mɛ,
mɛ̀ kúr, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ha̧ wa;
ká kíì de mɛ ti wa na,
wen ká‘m tɛɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ-mɛ sɛn ti wa.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a sɔsɔɔ‘i,
mi dee mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a hee ŋma ŋga-fara ga,
hee mbiŋ-boi in ŋgárá-ndɛrɛ ga
sɛn yí o bíí nù Juda nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ,
in o wannu, o gasawi,
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa
ká bá nɛ̀ o be-nù‘i lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ kur zu mɛ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ wa tɛ de in mɛɛ bo na,
wen mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ wen kpasa mɛ.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hé mbéá'ɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm hee ndé:
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ ɓɔna so nɛ̀ zɔŋa,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ̀‘m,
tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ baa-ŋmaa k’ɛɛ in mɛɛ ga;
mɛ ndaka so ɗoŋ-am sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
sɛn tɛ ŋma mbimbi-nù.
mɛ duka nɛ́ kuti zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ‘m;
kóó o ndé nɛ̀ foo mɛ, kpaa wen kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ŋgamɔ kpaa wa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
O bezaŋ Jakob,
o bíí nutua ko
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN.
Gba̧a̧ wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Nɛ́ ge ɗaŋmɔ ge a̧ o dáà k’ɛnɛ kpaa tɛ‘m,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ e nɛ‘m duk ge?
Wa ndaka ɗoŋ o geemɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa kifi geemɔ!
Wa ak géé aka mɔ‘e:
‹GASA WAN nɛ̀ gboo yɛ nú Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ ká dúk ti h’ɛɛ si ŋga-gbárà,
fara ndaɗa-nù in o gbóŋgó,
nù kaɓa in fara-fio,
nɛ̀ bíí ɓir sɛnɛ,
kà bó nɛ̀ duka-a sɛnɛ na mbɛt'i,
a̧a̧ déè ndé?› wó na.
Zɔ́k, mi kaia'nɛ́ nɛ́ɛ̀ a tɛ gba de nú-dɛm-nyɔnɔ,
wen h’ɛnɛ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ de-a.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ yea-a k’ɛnɛ sɛn hi̧i̧,
ɛnɛ ɗaŋa nù kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ de ha̧ nù‘i mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ak géé aka mɔ‘e:
‹GASA WAN a̧a̧ déè ndé?› na.
O wan-usi-heembea iŋ am na,
o wi-dai-sami de nɛ́ ŋgazu in am,
ɓɛɛ o
tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɛ̀ nin sɔ̧ Bal,
ndak nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o géé tum sɔ̧.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu'nɛ́ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ mbɛt.»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ si ka̧ ŋgere Kitim,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm o bíí sitɛ o be Kedar,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák mgbara mɔ in wa'e,
pɛrti mɔ hegɔ dee so hi̧i̧ nɛti kaɗi nde?
Ŋma tugun bíí mɛ kpai o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i bo na,
kóó nɛ̀ sɔ̧ kɔ-wa bo nɛ́ o kpasa sɔ̧ na mbɛt'i,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko dukbíí kɔ‘m,
wa ba nɛ́ gasamɔ kɔ-wa
kpai nɛ̀ geemɔ nɛ̀ gbak wi na.
Sɛn tɛ mɔ‘i, ɗɛɗɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ gɔ́n!
Ɛ́nɛ́ o mɔ-mɛ-yiwese,
kíì a̧ bá‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ nák mbɛt!
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ!
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘m dea,
daŋa zu ŋmaa yiitoo.
Wa ea'm nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kpút-kpút geɗa-yì duk,
nɛ́ɛ̀ za̧ nɛ gɔna-yì nɛ̀ yì yor sɛnɛ na.»
Wa kòó a̧ sɛn zaŋ bara nde?
Wen ge sa wa de a̧ nɛ̀ bara ge?
O daŋa-dila tuɓi nɛnɛ a zu a̧,
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti,
dɔ nɛ̀ o ye kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ o bíí saaye gbin yu mɔ yak lɛŋ ge?
Kóó nɛ́ o be Mɛmfis in o be Dafne mbɛt
kpuia zu-mɛ de nɛ̀ mɛ nɛ̀ bara.
Bó nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ kpaa mɛ
wen nɛ̀ mɛ ee GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ duk,
ŋgimbi n'aa duka so mgbɔ nɛ̀ mɛ nɛnɛ na nde?
Báá yuwar Egiptɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ gbaa-er Nil
tɛ de nɛ́ ge ha̧ mɛ ge?
Báá yuwar Asirii mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ yí Efrat
tɛ de nɛ́ ge ha̧ mɛ mbɛt ge?
Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ a̧ pí̧ bɔnɛ zu mɛ!
Nyimmɔ in tu̧u̧-see a̧ tík zu mɛ nɛnɛ hɔ sɔŋkur-aa.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, kinii mɛ́ yú kíí tɛ‘m ɓɔna;
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
«Zɛ ɔ dɔka, mɛ́ mbo zu ha̧‘m ɓɔna,
mɛ́ de nɛ ŋgazu in am tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Mi kɔ̧ kɔ‘m duka bara ɓɔna,›
ɓɛɛ mɛ gasi nɛ́ o géé-sɔ̧
nɛ zu o kaya in ɗɔɔ o da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te lɛŋ.
Mi guna mɛ hee gba de nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga;
wen ge sa mɛ kpaia duk nɛ́ ŋma gɔni nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ̀ waya-a de na’ɛ ge?
Kóó mɛ̀ zui so tɛ-mɛ nɛ́ yì wese lɛŋ héé ge,
kóó mɛ̀ zui nɛ́ yì nɛ̀ gba zɔm sa̧-ndiŋ mbɛt,
ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk ɓɔn yí‘m.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Hee ge mɛ tɔ̧‘e, mɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-mɛ
tɛ nɛɛ ɗoŋ o sɔ̧ Bal na, ge?
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ wan mɛ kɔ̧̀ ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ kafi mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ dea na.
Mɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma zɔŋa ŋgeloba
nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɔ̀ kɔ‘i si ti, si ɗoŋ ga.
Nana tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ nɛ̀ iŋa duka-a kɔ‘i gbárà mɛ‘i,
kà ŋgimbi-daŋ-ŋmaa kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ kaɗi,
a̧ dee pɛr wiwii nɛ̀ ti búk nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ tɛ dor a̧ tɛ ŋgimbi'i nɛ́ o?
Kóó nɛ́ ge wiwii-a ge nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ daŋ a̧
tɛ kpa a̧ ɓan na tɛ ŋgimbi'i.
mɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ wi-nɛ-nɔ̀ nɛ̀ géé naŋ,
ɓɛɛ war ger-mɛ tɛ kor wen wɔ-yì!
Mɔ kpɔk, mɛ́ tɔ̧́ kɔ-mɛ‘e:
‹Ŋma mɔɔ-de bo ɓɔna,
mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m nɛ́ o géé-sɔ̧,
mi tɛ nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɗoŋ wa.›
Ziimɔ tɛ ba o be
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ziimɔ ba nɛ̀ wi-zuzu
nɛ̀‘i ba fara zu mɔ'ɛ ga.
Ziimɔ tɛ ba o wannu kɔ-wa,
o gasawi, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧
gu nɛ̀ o
«Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ te'e: ‹Mɛ́ nɛ́ dáà k’ɛɛ!›
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ ta: ‹Nɛ́ mɛ́'ɛ kòò yɛ!›
Wa zika kɔr-zu e ha̧‘m,
wa zɔk mɔ pii tɛ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ŋgamɔ kpa wa kaɗi,
sɛka wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ.›
Ɓɛɛ kifa nú kɔ‘m nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
O sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ dee nɛ̀ er a̧a̧ déè?
Kà wa nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ kpasi'nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ k’ɛnɛ,
wa a̧ kúr, wa a̧ kpásí‘nɛ́ gɔ!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda, o sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ dɔka
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye k’ɛnɛ.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ dik wen a zu'm wen ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ kura zu'm.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mi gusa o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ takaɗi;
wa kpɛk usamɔ kɔ‘m na.
Gba-paa k’ɛnɛ kum nɛ́ o
nɛ̀ duk mgbara'nɛ́ hee dila-ɗaŋ-mɔ ga.
(Ɛ́nɛ́ o be-kinɛɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧'ɛ!)
Mi kifa nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà wen o be
Mi kifa nɛ́ nù nɛ̀ duk zaŋ tum nde?
Wen ge sa dukbíí kɔ‘m tɔ̧‘e,
wi yak kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yaka-a si fara nɛ‘i kɔ̧a̧,
nɛ̀‘i beka pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m ɓɔna ge?
Tɛ zɔŋa bi so ɗoŋ o mbɔi-tɛ kɔ‘i bii?
Tɛ wan-wíì bi so ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ kɔ‘i bii nde?
Ɓɛɛ war ko dukbíí kɔ‘m,
tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ-am zɛ ɔ dɔka.
«Ho! Mɛ iŋa so yuwar kia-a ha̧ o bíí mɛ kɔ̧ mɛ wa!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ ɓɛɛ sa yuwar gbɛɛ-zu hir tɛ-mɛ.
Tɔk-tɛ o wisan nɛ̀ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na
a̧a̧ naŋ laa kɔ-mɛ‘i!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ laa nɔ‘i a̧‘m kpaa nɛ̀ tɔk'i,
bó nɛ́ mɛ kpaa nɛ́ wa fara koma tua na.
Ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, mɛ tɔ̧a'e,
ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i bo na,
nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ beka tik zu wi na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ,
wen nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a'e, mɛ de gɔɔmɔ na.
«Mɛ yɔ nɛ kaya siti siti de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ;
mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ ziimɔ,
nɛ̀ tɛ ba mɛ yí Egiptɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ziimɔ baa so nɛ̀ mɛ yí Asirii’ɛ ga.
Mɛ tɛ a er gba̧a̧ zu-mɛ gbo nɛnɛ sɛn fara'i mbɛt,
wen mi GASA WAN zɔk kɔ‘m yuwar-pɛma-tɛ kɔ-mɛ‘i
hee geemɔ ga;
bo nɛ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ de nɛ̀ mɔ hɔ gba̧a̧ na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Kà ŋma wiwii ndak kóò kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ kà kóò‘i yak nɛ́ɛ̀ ba mbe wíì,
kuti wíì‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ kóò‘i woyo ɓɔ nde?
Kà wi’ɛi de hegɔ, fom tɛ ba nù‘i;
ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ
ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu nɛnɛ'ɛ,
mɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m woyo ɓɔ nde?
Mɛ̀ bá yí-mɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn si zu kaya,
a̧ mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ a̧‘i!
Nɛ́ ge fara ge a̧ mɛ de dàlà sɛnɛ na ge?
Mɛ duka so ka̧ o yuwar pɛm nɛ̀ o dàlà kɔ-mɛ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o Arab yaa so nɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà ga.
Mɛ fɛŋa nù nɛ̀ ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ-mɛ
in ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ gɔn,
ɓɛɛ kuti kórò a nù nɛ haya-a na.
Zu-a'i mɛ duk kànà ɓɔn tɛ deemɔ nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu kɔ-mɛ nɛnɛ‘i;
mɛ kpɛk'e mɛ de nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ́ sá nɛ́ mɔ pii tɛ‘m'e:
‹Mi nɛ́ dáà kɔ-mɛ, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ sɛm kɔ-mɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ duka nɛ̀ bem.
Mɛ ta mɔ‘e mi beka kpa ɗaŋsee zu mɛ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧ na;
mɛ‘e mi beka kasi kiri kɔ̧ see-am in mɛɛ siti na mbɛt.›
Ɓɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧a-a nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ hegɔ‘i,
mɛ e yuwar dee ɗaŋmɔ‘i duk na.
Ɓɛɛ wan nɛ̀ mɛ de siti'i tɛ̀ɛ̀ yak zale.»
Ŋgimbi wan ko wannu Josias, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ zɔka mɔ nɛ̀
Mi taa so kɔ‘m'e, ɗoŋ o dee mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ pii so ɗoŋ tɛ‘m woyo wó, ɓɛɛ a̧ pii ɗoŋ na. Juda nya-a nɛ̀ mbo zu ha̧ Sɔ̧ na zɔka mɔ‘i mbɛt.
Mi zɔka mbɛt; mi ndaka
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ, a̧ ɗaŋa nù kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ dee mɔɔ-búù de nɛ̀ dàlà, gasi nɛ̀ ta in te mbɛt.
Sɛn zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ, Juda nɛ̀ mbo zu ha̧‘m na'i pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m nɛ̀ see lɛŋ na. Kpaa-mbe-ta kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ɔrmɔ. GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ!»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mgbara Juda nɛ mbo zu ha̧‘m na in
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ hé mbéá'ɛ:
Mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ,
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ hegɔ.
Mi beka kai sɔnti'm zu mɛ ɓɔna,
wen mi nɛ́ wi-de-ko ha̧ bíí.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Mi kasi kiri zu bíí ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ iŋ kànà ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ̀ íŋ‘e mɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ;
ɛ́nɛ́ pɛsa dam ti o da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te lɛŋ kii nɛ̀ o gɔni sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen nú‘m na.»
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ hegɔ!
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ o be-yàà-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ! GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ, wen mi nɛ́ wan k’ɛnɛ. Mi tɛ kai'nɛ́, bíí kpɔk tɛ ye kpɔk, bíí yiitoo tɛ nú-gara kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt, wen ha̧‘m mɛ kai'nɛ́ siɗoŋ si
Mi tɛ ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ see-am hoka, mɛ dai'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɛ dai'nɛ́ nɛ̀ yuwar kpasa iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ mboozu.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔk sɛn zu nù‘i kaɗi, wese'i, wi beka ak mɔ‘e: ‹

Ŋgimbi'i, wa tɛ sa nin Jerusalɛm'e ‹Damti ko GASA WAN›. Nɛ́ sɛn fara'i a̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀‘i gbara ha̧ Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa beka nɛ́ ɗoŋ o ɗaŋ taamɔ-ŋgazu kɔ-wa mɛ ti ɓɔna.
Ŋgimbi'i o be Juda in
«Mi taa so kɔ‘m mɛ́ dè kpasa mɔ ha̧ mɛ
mgbara o dɔka o bem,
ha̧‘m mɛ ha̧ gba de fara-duk ha̧ mɛ,
nɛ̀ tɛ de gan ko o dɔka tugun bíí!
Mi taa so'e, ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ sa'm'e ‹Dáà!›
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ beka zik so ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ e ha̧‘m ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ okoo de nɛ̀ ŋgazu in wíì'ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ́nɛ́ o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Mi zii nɛ́
mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be
wen wa baa nɛ́ ɗaŋ war;
tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ am,
mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ o be-yàà-ŋgazu nɔ'ɔ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋgazu k’ɛnɛ mɛ kaɗi!»
«Íì, ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ,
wen ɛnɛ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ zu o kaya tɛnɛ‘i nɛ́ ɔrmɔ.
Wa de nɛ́ géé gitimɔ sɔɔ géè;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ
a̧
Mɔɔ-búù nɛ̀ o dáà k’ɛɛ duka so de,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ ɓɔna nɛ̀ bem,
nyɔŋa o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
o be mɔ-dai in o gasa-a,
gu nɛ̀ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ziimɔ nyɛma so kànà mɛ ba yɛ!
Búù‘i a̧ tík zu yɛ,
wen ɛɛ yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
ɛɛ in o dáà k’ɛɛ, ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ ɓɔna nɛ̀ bem hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Ɛɛ zii so wen ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
nɛ́ sɛn tɛ‘m a̧ mɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ sɛnɛ.
Kà mɛ nɛ kaia o ndiŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ yinɛ yí‘m,
ɓɛɛ mɛ beka yambali nɛnɛ ɓɔna.
Kà mɛ nɛ́ kàná mɔ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk kpasa,
kà kanamɔ‘i nɛ́ duka nɛ́ kpasa mɔ,
nɛ̀ yuwar-a, in nɛ̀ de-a,
ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí tɛ kpa
in zɔnamɔ mbɛt nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-am.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbútí fɔ, ɓɛɛ k’ɛnɛ gun mɔ nɛ̀ poo tɛnmɔ ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀
ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ɗaŋmɔ yinɛ kɔ̧́ see'nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda in o be Jerusalɛm;
kà bó hegɔ na, ɗaŋsee kɔ‘m tɛ kur
hee wee ga mɛ bìì mɔ yaknɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma wi-bia-a yinɛ beka bo na,
wen zu ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛnɛ.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbéá sɛn Juda,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ o bíí Jerusalɛm mɛ zii mbɛt!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́, wa a̧ dɔ́m o zak dam zu nù lɛŋ,
wà a̧ híɗí mɔ nɛ̀ hee-ger.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́, wa a̧ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa si ye-ŋgárá!
Wa a̧ bá tutuwal-biro nɛ̀ ŋgɔn si war
Wa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si!
Ká wa yor nɛ̀ yuwar na!
Nɛ́ gba ŋgamɔ a̧‘m fo tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ,
nɛ́ gasa ɗaŋmɔ!
Dila a̧ gbó nɛ̀ ti kasa kɔ‘i mɛ tɛnɛ‘i;
wi-kum o tugun bíí a̧a̧ yuwar,
a̧ kur nɛ̀ war fara kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛnɛ
ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɗaŋ nù k’ɛnɛ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti kifi bɛɛ-oi;
o gasa ye k’ɛnɛ tɛ bìì wee,
ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ gbin yak.
Wen mɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ á laa-bufu tɛ‘nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ áí nɛ̀ nú,
wen ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN beka yak zu yɛ na.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ŋgai ko wannu in ko o be-wan tɛ gbin;
gba̧a̧-tɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gbin,
o
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧: «Ho GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ dee mɔ ba tɛ dukbíí'ɛ,
in o bíí Jerusalɛm tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ wa'e,
wa tɛ kpa ga̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gba-paa kum nɛ́ ɛɛ'ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, GASA WAN tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ,
in ha̧ o bíí Jerusalɛm'e ndé:
«Ŋma ŋga búk tɛ yu nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà,
ba nɛ̀ yuwar sitɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m,
bó nɛ́ a̧ tɛ mɛ pɛfi mɔ na,
bó nɛ́ a̧ tɛ mɛ mbii mɔ na mbɛt.
Tɛ ha̧a̧nú kɔ‘m, ŋma ŋga búk a̧ yu tɛnɛ nɛ̀ hi̧i̧‘i;
kinii, mi tɛ gɔn kita zu wa.»
«Wisɛn tika zu yɛ hee tura-zan ga,
o keekee-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ ya hee wan-wee ga,
o nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ haia gan o ndio.
Ho! Ɛɛ fea, ɛɛ kuma kaɗi!»
«Jerusalɛm, mɛ̀ fɔ́r o ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ
sɛn kɔ̧ see-mɛ yinɛ lɛŋ,
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpasi;
mɛ tɛ e o ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i duk mɛ gese ge?
Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ hee mbéá nɛ̀ Daŋ mɛ.
Nyɛrɛ ŋgamɔ tɛ nɛ̀ zu kaya Efraim mɛ.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbáŋ tɛ o tugun bíí,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa, ɛ́nɛ́ o be Jerusalɛm;
o wi-biro a̧ tɛ nɛ̀ ŋma nyɛi̧a gɔni-nù tɛnɛ‘i;
wa gai nɛ́ mɔ a zu o ye Juda.
Wa tɛ kɛr Jerusalɛm kpa nú ŋmaa
hee o wi-pɛm-fɔ ga, GASA WAN,
wen wa dee ŋgazu in am.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ in o deemɔ kɔ-mɛ
nyɛma so kànà ha̧ mɔ mɛ kpa mɛ hegɔ.
Mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ;
ɔ paŋa nɛ́ mbetɛ.
Mɔ‘i tɛ ba nɛ́ mgbák yí see-mɛ.
Zaŋ-am! Zaŋ-am wa! Mɔ'ɔ ba tɛ‘m'i!
Yí-see-am gɔn gɔn baram-baram,
to nɛnɛ mgbut-mgbut!
Mi nyɛm mɛ kpe nú‘m ɓɔna,
wen mi zia dɔma mbia, in gayamɔ-biro.
O bíí hiɗi nɛ́ mɔ‘e, mɔ ɗaŋa yak zale!
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, nù ɗaŋa lɛŋ;
o be tua-nú-fɔ kɔ‘m ɗaŋa hee gɔma-yí ga,
o tua-laa kɔ‘m mbɛt.
Mi tɛ kaɗi zɔka tutuwal-biro mɛ gese ge?
Mi tɛ kaɗi zia mbia-biro mɛ gese ge?
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, dukbíí kɔ‘m iŋ mɔ na;
wa iŋ am na.
Wa ya hee o bem ga, taamɔ bo na.
Wa iŋ mgbara mɔ na;
mɔ nɛ̀ wa iŋa nɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ,
wa iŋ dee demɔ na.»
Mi zɔka mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nù nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ duk puturu,
mɔ bo sɛnɛ na’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ bo yiwese na mbɛt.
Kà‘m zɔk o kaya wó,
wa lɛŋ nak nak;
o zu-tɔ̧ lɛŋ pi̧ pi̧i̧ liki-liki-liki.
Mi zɔka mɔ woyo,
ɓɛɛ bíí kóó kpɔk bo na,
o nɔ̧́í̧ lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak mbɛt.
Mi zɔka mɔ nɛ̀ de-a,
ɓɛɛ nù nɛ̀ duka so mɛ dɛm o waya-te,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kifa ŋga-gbárà kotoro’ɛ;
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN dɔ o ye lɛŋ
nɛ̀ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Nù lɛŋ tɛ kifi geemɔ,
ɓɛɛ bo nɛ mi tɛ ɗaŋ a̧ nɛ̀ oi gun yinɛ lɛŋ na.
Nɛ́ zu mɔ‘i sa nù duk tɛ zima mɔ,
ɓɛɛ yiwese ba tum ŋgɔn mɛ mbɛt;
mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧,
mi beka e wen kɔ‘m'i duk na,
mi beka kpai nú‘m na mbɛt.»
Tɛ gitimɔ nɛ̀ o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa
in o wi-pi̧-góò de,
o bíí saaye lɛŋ yuu mɔ pɛsi yak:
o ŋma maa kɔ‘i si ti mɔ,
o ŋma maa kɔ‘i si mgbara ta;
wa pɛsa lɛŋ e ye duk wékéké.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jerusalɛm,
mɔ nɛ mɛ de’ɛ nɛ́ ge?
Mɛ́ pi̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ o gbɛ̧ laa tɛ-mɛ,
a nɛ̀ de kísí lɔr ger-mɛ,
pi̧ nɛ̀ o finaari yí-mɛ́ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ ɗafa-tɛ kɔ-mɛ tɛ ba tɛ-mɛ sɔɔ géè.
O wi-de-wɔ-mɛ e nɛ́ mɛ tɛ geemɔ,
wa kii mɛ gbɛ nɛ́ mɛ yinɛ.
Mi zii nɛ́ aia-nú ko ŋma be-zɔŋa
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ko kuti bem kɔ‘i.
ko de ye Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ hiɗi gɔn,
nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ nɛ́ er tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Oi mi wa!
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ mi yee kɔ̧̀ er o wi-gbɛ-zu kaɗi!»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yár dam mgbara kira Jerusalɛm lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ dam fara lɛŋ sɛn beegara ye Jerusalɛm,
ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma kpaa ŋma kpasa bíí hi̧i̧ nde?
Ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a nɛ̀ de-a a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nde?
Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ wi-tɔ̧-kpasawen a̧a̧ sɛnɛ?
Kà ŋma bíí a̧ bòó sɛnɛ hegɔ,
ɓɛɛ mi beka ɗaŋ ye'i ɓɔna.»
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, kóó wa á̧ kàná mɔ‘e:
«Ti-bee
kanamɔ kɔ-wa duk nɛ́ ɔrmɔ.
GASA WAN, bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔk nɛ́ mboozu na nde?
Ɛ́nɛ́ gusi wa, ɓɛɛ nyim tɛ-wa na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ kum wa mɛ kum kaɗi'i,
wa zii mbɔrɔ k’ɛnɛ na;
wa ŋgaia see-wa hee ta ga,
wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ pia ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ mi taa kɔ‘m'e,
wa nɛ́ o ŋma geɗek bíí hegɔ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ gɔn na,
wa iŋ o yuwar ko GASA WAN na,
wa iŋ yuwar duka-a ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na mbɛt.
Mi tɛ nɛ sitɛ o gasawi wen ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in wa,
wen war kɔ-wa, wa iŋa yuwar ko GASA WAN,
in yuwar duka-a ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa hee o ŋmaa ga:
wa mbo zu ha̧ a̧ na,
wa de nɛ́ ŋgazu e nɛ̀ a̧ duk.
Hegɔ‘i, wa tɛ kifi mɔɔ-nyɔŋ ko o dila-zaŋbɛɛ,
o gbóò mɛ́ ndaɗa-nù tɛ a̧k wa nɛ̀ er ŋmaa.
O gɔ̧ tɛ kɛr o ye kɔ-wa;
ŋgimbi nɛ‘i be tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧‘e ha'i gbó wó,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ a̧k wa wen ŋgazu
in ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ dɔk dɔk siti siti'i.
«Ɓɛɛ tɛ yuwar'i, mi tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ mɛ héé ge, Jerusalɛm?
O bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ e nɛ‘m duk,
kan nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ nin o géé-sɔ̧'ɛ!
Mi duna wa nɛ̀ demɔ,
zu-a'i, wa nɛ́ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧;
wa ir nɛ́ o ŋmaa zu kó-de-mɔ nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu.
Wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in daŋa ŋgai-nyaŋa
nɛ̀ wɔ daŋa ŋmaa gbɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ma yì hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ, ndak nɛ̀ ɗoŋ kóò ko ŋma-a.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
Mi beka usi so bɔnɛ ha̧ wa na?
Mi beka kifi er ha̧ pɛrti wi nɔ'ɔ na nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ zu o garo kɔ-wa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáŋ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗaŋ mɔ lɛŋ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓír o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nù,
wa bó nɛ́ kɔ‘m na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
o bíí nù ko
dee ŋgazu in am nɛ̀ mbetɛ.»
O be Juda kafa GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«A̧ bo na, ɗaŋmɔ beka tik zu yɛ na;
ɛɛ beka iŋ k’ɛɛ gba-paa, kóó kaɓa na mbɛt.
Wen ko o
bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa na.
Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧a'i a̧ sí ɗoŋ zu wa.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ ga,
Jeremii, wen kɔ‘m n'am ee kɔ̧̀ nú-mɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ́ wee,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ duk nɛ́ kora gua
nɛ̀ wee'i tɛ dɔ a nù.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ woyo:
«Ɛnɛ o be
mi tɛ fo ŋma tugun bíí nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a fara pi̧ zu'nɛ́;
nɛ́ ŋma ŋga tugun bíí nɛ̀ mbɔi na,
nɛ̀ tugun-wa dúk tɛnɛ ɓeemɛ,
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ iŋ nú kɔ-wa,
kà bó nɛ̀ gba̧a̧ wen kɔ-wa na mbɛt.
Ɓaro-góò kɔ-wa nɛ́ kɔ̧́-fio
nɛ̀ nú-a kpe na;
wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa wi-biro.
Wa tɛ nyɔŋ o nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛnɛ,
in o brɛt k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ nyɔŋ o bem k’ɛnɛ
mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a;
wa tɛ nyɔŋ o be mɔ-dai
in o gasa mɔ-dai k’ɛnɛ,
gu nɛ̀ o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o te-mbɔra k’ɛnɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ
nɛ̀ gba-paa kɔ-wa,
wa tɛ gbin o ye-ŋgárá k’ɛnɛ
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ é nɛ̀ ta'i.»
GASA WAN'e ndé: «Kóó tɛ ŋgimbi'i mbɛt, mi beka kum'nɛ́ a nù lɛŋ na.

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ ak mɔ‘e ndé: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu yɛ hegɔ‘i ge nde?› ɓɛɛ Jeremii, mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e ndé: Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa ee am duk mɛ gasi nɛ́ o sɔ̧ ko o gɔni-duk sɛn nù k’ɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧; nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ̀ kànà mɛ de bara ha̧ o ŋma gɔni-duk tɛ gɔni-nù mɛ.»
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ Jakob,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm wen-aa ha̧ wa si Juda mɛ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ bɛɗɛ-zu bo na,
nɛ̀ taamɔ k’ɛnɛ ɗuk na’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì: wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ yí,
ɓɛɛ wa zɔk mɔ na;
wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ zer,
ɓɛɛ wa zii mɔ na mbɛt.
GASA WAN'e ndé:
Ɛ́nɛ́ yú kíí tɛ‘m na,
tɛ‘nɛ́ nak ti'm na nde?
Mi Wan nɛ̀ ee nyɛmɛ nɛ̀
mgbara gba-tɔp in nù,
nɛ̀ yì beka yak zu a̧ na’ɛ.
Yì tɛ pɛŋi ɓɛɛ a̧ beka de ŋma mɔ na;
o gasa pɛŋa-yì tɛ kur
nɛ̀ beka yak zu
Ɓɛɛ see o wi nɔ'ɔ ɔ ŋgaya,
wa nɛ́ o wi-ŋgazu;
wa a̧ra̧ e'm duk, ba yuwar kɔ-wa yak.»
Wa tɔ̧ géé tɔ̧a-a'e:
«Ɛ̀ɛ̀ yú kíí GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ,
wan nɛ̀ ha̧ kórò nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi-a,
in nɛ̀ e ŋgimbi mɔi̧a-nyɔnɔ h’ɛɛ mbɛt’ɛ na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛnɛ a̧ ɗaŋ yuwar nɔ'ɔ,
o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛnɛ a̧ kpe o yuwar demɔ nɔ'ɔ;
wen o ɗaŋwi a̧a̧ mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m;
wa pɛm mɔ hee wi-tui-pɛr be nɔ̧́í̧ ga;
wa tui nɛ́ pɛr,
ɓɛɛ bàà nɛ́ o bíí.
O tua kɔ-wa duna nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-zuzu
hee gɛsɛ a̧ duna nɛ̀ o nɔ̧́í̧ ga;
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa kifa duk nɛ́ o gasawi in o gasa wan-mbɔi.
Wa ɔ ŋmaŋa in tɛ-wa ɔ dee;
ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale:
wa yu kíí gɔni mɔ,
in mɔ ko be-oi na mbɛt.
Yuwar kpaamɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Wa ta mɔ wen o wisan na.»
GASA WAN'e ndé:
«Mi beka usi so bɔnɛ ha̧ wa na?
Mi beka kifi er ha̧ pɛrti zuduk bíí'ɛ na nde?
«Nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù in mɔɔ-kíì
a̧ de zu nù'ɛ.
O
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kai nɛ́ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i dee tɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ mbe mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de ɗoŋ mɔ‘i nɛ́ ge nde?»
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ si ŋma fara,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia sɛn Tɛkoa!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tutuwal-biro e ŋgɔn sɛn zu ye Bɛt-Kɛrɛm.
Ŋma ɗaŋmɔ a̧ hai'nɛ́ tɛnɛ
nɛ̀ zu o kaya nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn'i:
mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma gasa ŋgamɔ.
Mɛ́,
mɛ́ kpá nú mɛ́ tɔ̧ wen ɓɔna.
O bíí tɛ tɛ pii zu ye'i,
hee mɛ nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ
a̧ kai o mɔ-dai kɔ‘i tɛnɛ ga.
Wa tɛ a o tua-laa kɔ-wa zik a̧ e see-a,
kóó o ndé nɛ̀ war fara kɔ‘i.
Wa tɛ hiɗi mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí wa!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tík wa nɛ̀ gba bu-wese’ɛ!
Ɛ́nɛ́ kuma kaɗi, wese a̧ gir tɛnɛ'ɛ!
O gi̧ɔ̧-te a̧ zi̧i̧‘i mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀ɛ̀ tík wa mɛ biŋgi-zɛ,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗáŋ o gba de tua kɔ-wa!»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m o te,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ si saaye Jerusalɛm,
wen Jerusalɛm nɛ́ ye nɛ̀ ɗaŋa kaɗi;
mɔ nɛ̀ duk tɛ ye'i nɛ́ ŋgamɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gɔna kɔ̧-yì ŋmai̧ nɛ̀ yì gbonɛ'ɛ ga,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa ŋmai̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ kɔ-wa a zan mbɛt;
mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ŋgai in ɗaŋ;
ɓɔnsɛnɛ kànà nɛ́ dee ŋgamɔ,
de nɛ̀ mɔ ba tɛ o bíí;
ɓɛɛ zɔka bɔnɛ ko bíí, nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ tu̧ see-am.
Mɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ'ɛ ŋgaɓo, Jerusalɛm!
Kà bó hegɔ na, mi tɛ kɛ̧ tɛ‘m nɛ̀ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ géé zaŋbɛɛ buu,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí beka de ye sɛnɛ na.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«A'i ɓí oi o be
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i ɓi nɛ̀ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧'ɛ ga!
Mɛ̀ pí̧ er-mɛ si gun sikila-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wi-de-tom fo nɛ̀ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
ɓi nɛ̀ waya’ɛ ga.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o'o tɛ zii wen
in wee ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ‘m o?
Ho! Zer-wa mgbea;
wa nyɛm mɛ zii mɔ na,
wa ba kɔ-wa wen ko GASA WAN
e nɛ̀ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi kɔ-wa,
wa kɔ̧ zia-a na.
Nyimsea ko GASA WAN duna see-am,
n'am beka duk nɛ̀ oi-aa siti na.
«Mɛ̀ gbáí nyimsea kɔ‘m'i a zu o obem
mgbara kira nɛnɛ in zu o bem lɛŋ;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ kalemɔ in o wiwii gu nɛ̀ o okoo,
sɔka-wi in gbɛrɛ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«O tua, o fɔ in o okoo tɛ ye er o ŋma bíí.
Mi tɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu o bíí nù'ɛ.
Wa lɛŋ, o gasawi in o obem mbɛt,
kii nɛ̀ yuwar kpaamɔ kɔ‘i,
o
in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ de nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ ɔrmɔ.
Wa tɔ̧ wen ŋgamɔ
nɛ̀ tɛ kpa dukbíí kɔ‘m hee geɗek mɔ ga,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Mɔ duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ de-a!
Ŋma mɔ bo na!›
Ɓɛɛ zu-a'i,
ŋma mɔ kpɔk nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ de-a bo na.
Zu ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ wa de'i,
foe de wa dee nde?
Foe de wa na kóó tikiɗi.
Wa iŋ géé iŋa foe-a na!»
Ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e:
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wa tɛ tir a nù hee o oi bíí ga,
ŋgimbi n'am bé tɛ̀ɛ́ de ŋmaa in wa.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ woyo:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór sɛn yuwar,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tá mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák mɔ sitɛ o ŋmaa zu mɔ ko o kuti yuwar
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk so ba ɓɔnsɛnɛ‘i.
De yuwar nɛ́ wan mɛ ge-a ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ́ de yuwar'i, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa ɔma-tɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú‘e:
«Ɛɛ beka ba k’ɛɛ yuwar'i na!»
«Mi ee o wi-pɛm-mɔ mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-wa,
wa a̧ zíí dɔma mbia!»
Ɓɛɛ wa a̧ kífí nú:
«Ŋma wen k’ɛɛ bo tɛ mɔ‘i na!»
«Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ o tugun bíí, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì;
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ mɔ n'am tɛ de in o wi nɔ'ɔ!
O bíí nù'ɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zìì!
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ fo ŋga bɔnɛ pi̧ zu dukbíí'ɛ
oi ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ mbo zu tɛ wen kɔ‘m na,
ɓɛɛ yuwar mɔ n'am usi ha̧ a̧,
a̧ ba e tɛ geemɔ.
Ge a̧‘m tɛ de nɛ̀ fuu-nyama,
nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ̀ Saba mɛ‘i ge,
ká bó nɛ̀ de te-nyama mɛ́ nyɛi̧a fara ge?
Wɔ o kpoo-sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ gbɛ‘m na;
o ɗafa-sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ ha̧‘m de tɛ‘m na mbɛt.»
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«Mi tɛ e mɔɔ-kɔ̧-naŋ yuwar ko dukbíí'ɛ,
nɛ̀ o dáà in o bem tɛ tik sɛnɛ;
o wi-ɔ katɛ wa in o sɛm kɔ-wa tɛ fe sɛnɛ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ŋma dukbíí a̧ tɛ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn'i;
ŋma gasa tugun bíí kura nɛ̀ nduti-nù mɛ.
Kusaa-góò nɔɔ er-wa in o za;
wa nɛ́ o ŋgazu bíí nɛ̀ kó bó yí-wa na.
Giti-wa nɔi̧ hee giti kura-a ko gba-tɔp ga;
wa daŋa o nyaŋa, nɛk nɛnɛ
hee o gíí wi-biro ga,
wen bíí mɛ, gba de ye
«Ɛɛ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧ tɛ yɛ gbin lɛŋ;
zɔm kíì baa yɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ ba nɛ̀ okoo
ŋgimbi koa-a’ɛ ga.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ gbo yak si nú fɔ na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ yar si yuwar na mbɛt,
wen gba-paa ko wisɛn dama fara nɔ‘i lɛŋ.»
«K’ɛ́nɛ́, dukbíí kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáɓí bufu tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíŋgílí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ nù,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ fio
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kpɔk bem’ɛ ga;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,
wen wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ tɛ hɔ, kpáŋí nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́.»
«Jeremii, mi ee mɛ
wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ we dukbíí kɔ‘m
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i we nɛ boi’ɛ ga.
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k naŋanɔ kɔ-wa,
in deemɔ kɔ-wa.»
Wa gana o wi-ŋgazu lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ;
wa nɛ́ o wi-kai-ndaa-wi,
wa ɔ ŋgaya hee ndɛrɛ kóó ŋga boi ga,
wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ.
Mɔɔ-ufi-wee-dɔra ko wan-dui-mɔ
ufi tuŋgu wen ha̧ ɗɔr-aa mɛ gbo;
ɓɛɛ wan-fo-wee-dɔra fo wee takaɗi,
o ndiŋ yu tɛ̀ o wi nɔ'ɔ na.
Kinii, wi tɛ sa wa nɛ́:
«Géé tum bu-mbɔi» nɛ̀‘i ee tɛ geemɔ,
wen GASA WAN ee wa tɛ geemɔ.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ;
«Mɛ̀ yór nú Tua kɔ‘m a̧ mɛ̀ hé mbéá‘e: Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ ye Tua nɛ̀ o nú tua nɔ'ɔ mɛ gasi GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔr tɛ‘nɛ́ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Tua ko GASA WAN, Tua ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧› na.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí yuwar naŋanɔ in deemɔ k’ɛnɛ; ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ yí o gɛnɛ, o be-oi in o ko-gera na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ o bíí nɛ̀ wen bo zu wa na sɛn fara’ɛ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ na, wen k’ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa bɔnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ, mi tɛ duk in'nɛɛ sɛn fara’ɛ, tɛ́ nù n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o dáà k’ɛnɛ mɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
«Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ duk tɛ nɛ́ɛ́ ɗoŋ wen ndela nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-a̧ bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zú̧ nɛ́ mɔ, gbɛ nɛ̀ zu, de nɛ̀ dàlà, kan nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ndela, dɔ nɛ̀ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧ Bal, ndak nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ iŋ na mbɛt.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ yor ti'm kɔ̧ Tua nɛ̀ nin-am duk sɛnɛ'ɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛɛ kpasa kaɗi,› ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔn tɛ o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛnɛ nɔ‘i siti’ɛ!
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: Ɛ́nɛ́ ba k’ɛnɛ Tua’ɛ nɛ̀ nin-am duk sɛnɛ'ɛ e nɛ̀ di̧i̧ ko o wi-kai-mɔ er wi. Kɔ‘m, mi zɔka mɔ‘i hegɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn Silo, fara nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ fara kɔ‘m, fara n'am dee so ha̧ nin-am mɛ duk sɛnɛ nɛti, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ n'am dee in a̧ wen zu ɗaŋ ko
GASA WAN'e, zɔ́k, zu o ɗaŋmɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ dea’ɛ, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen h’ɛnɛ war nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kɔ̧ zia-a na; mi saa'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kifi nú na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ, Tua nɛ̀ nin-am duk sɛnɛ, wan n’ɛnɛ e nɛ̀ ta'i, in fara n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛnɛ in o dáà k’ɛnɛ‘i, kànà nɛ́ kalemɔ n'am dee in Silo a̧‘m tɛ de in fara’ɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ pi̧‘nɛ́ taŋ nyɛi nɛ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ n'am pi̧i̧ so nɛ̀ o nya'nɛ́, o bezaŋ Efraim taŋ ga.»
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jeremii, ká mɛ́ am mɔ mgbara'm in o wi nɔ'ɔ na, ká mɛ́ ai nú kɔfi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ wen wa na; ká mɛ́ yɔ ŋgimbi kɔ-mɛ gɔm nɛ̀ er ha̧‘m na, wen mi beka zii aia-nú kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ́ zɔ́k kɔ-mɛ mɔ nɛ wa de nɛ̀ saaye Juda in nɛ̀ o mgbara kira Jerusalɛm nɛnɛ‘i na:
o bem kii kɔ‘i nɛ́ gua, o dáà kɔ-wa ye kɔ‘i nɛ́ wee, ɓɛɛ o kóò vata kɔ‘i nɛ́ fuu wen gíí makala ha̧ sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa sa'e ‹Ko-wan mɛ́ yiwese›.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: Mɔ‘i, nɛ́ mi a̧ wa tu̧ see-aa náà, kóó wa tu̧ nɛ́ see-wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa nde? Foe tɛ̀ɛ́ de so nɛ́ wa ɛ̧!»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧: «Nyimsea in tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tɛ tik zu fara’ɛ, zu o bíí in o saɗi, gu nɛ̀ o te in o nyɔnɔ: nɛ́ ŋma wee nɛ̀ beka bi na.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Ŋgimbi n'am kaia nɛ̀ o dáà k’ɛnɛ gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ, mi ak ɗafa-sɔ̧ in kpoo-sɔ̧ er wa na.
Mɔ n'am aka er-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ kpɔk ɓɛɛ: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá nɛ́ yuwar n'am usi h’ɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a!›
Wa zii wen nú‘m na, wa yeŋ zer pii tɛ‘m na, ɓɛɛ wa dee nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kɔ̧a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ ŋgazu kɔ-wa. Wa tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk nɛ́ mɔ pii tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa zika nɛ́ ɗoŋ e ha̧‘m.
Ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o dáà kɔ-wa gboo nɛnɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ mɛ‘i hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i, mi mbosi toma o wi-de-tom, o
Ɓɛɛ wa zii wen nú‘m na, wa yeŋ zer pii tɛ‘m na mbɛt; wa ŋgaia see-wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ́ɛ̀ ɗaŋ gan ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
«Mɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara wen nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ wa beka zii wen kɔ-mɛ na; mɛ tɛ sa wa, wa beka kɔ̧ sara nú-mɛ́ na mbɛt.
Hegɔ‘i, mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa ndé, wa nɛ́ dukbíí nɛ̀ zii wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, wa kpɛk usamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt; kpasawen yɔa, ɓɛɛ ŋma géé taamɔ wen kpasawen bo tɛ-wa na mbɛt.»
«Juda, mɛ̀ gɔ́n mui̧-zu-mɛ
nɛ̀ zi̧a hegɔ‘i a taŋ,
mɛ̀ bíí gima ai nɛ̀ nú
nɛ̀ zu o kaya
mɛ́ nɛ́ tugun bíí tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ
nɛ̀ a̧ŋa nyimsea kɔ‘m a ŋgɔn,
mɛ́ dé tɛ‘m ɓɔna, sa'm pi̧ mɛ taŋ.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e: «O be Juda dee ɗaŋmɔ n'am sɛna, wa kaia nɛ́ o ndiŋmɔ a kɔ̧ Tua nɛ̀ nin-am duk sɛnɛ, fɛŋ nɛ̀ Tua'i.
Wa mboo
GASA WAN'e, «Ŋma ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ̀ wa beka sa fara'i'e ‹Tafɛt› kóó ‹Ɗɔŋgɔ Bɛn-Hinɔm› ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ sa a̧ nɛ́ ‹Ɗɔŋgɔ-gbɛ-wi›, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fara beka bo na ga, Tafɛt'i tɛ kifi nɛ́ fara-gun-fio.
Wɔr o bíí nɔ'ɔ tɛ dɔk fara'i nɛ̀ tɛ duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ndak o saɗi nɔ‘i yinɛ bo na.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ger gima-tortɛ in nyɛŋɛ mɛ kpe sɛn Juda hɔ mgbara o kira Jerusalɛm mɛ; wi beka zii gima-desee ko wi-ba-kóò, kà bó nɛ̀ gima-tortɛ-baa-wíì ɓɔna, wen nù‘i tɛ kifi nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi sɔɔ géè.»
GASA WAN'e, «Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wa tɛ a̧ŋ o gba̧a̧-fio o wannu in o gasawi Juda, o gba̧a̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o

Wa tɛ kai wa a wese, a ti nyaŋa-zɛ in o sɔra nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so, ɓɛɛ ká wa de tom ha̧ wa, nɛ̀ wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ so ɗoŋ wa, nɛ̀ wa zɔka so mɔ tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ ká wa gu nù ti wa mbɛt; wa beka kai o gba̧a̧ nɔ‘i mɛ gun woyo ɓɔna; wa tɛ ɓuk kifi nɛ́ geemɔ mbulɛɛ.»
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a: «O oi bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn nɛ̀ yí mgbara ɗaŋ dukbíí'ɛ tɛ kɔ̧ nɛ́ fio gan duka-kpasa, sɛn fara lɛŋ n'am tɛ ndak wa pɛsi si sɛnɛ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, wi yo nù,
ɓɛɛ wi kur ŋgɔn na nde?
Wi yɔ kaya, ɓɛɛ wi pii ɗoŋ na nde?
Jerusalɛm, wen ge sa o bíí nɔ'ɔ
ɓɔn tɛ yɔɔ kaya de nɛ̀ ŋgazu siti siti’ɛ ge?
Wa kasi nɛ́ taamɔ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ nɔa-a,
ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ pia ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na.
Mi yeŋa zer-am nɛ̀ de-a sitɛ wa,
o ee-zu-mɔ kɔ-wa de na.
Ŋma bíí mgbara wa mɛ nyim tɛ zu ɗaŋ kɔ‘i,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, mɔ nɛ̀‘i de’ɛ duk bɔɔ héé ge ndé? wó,
ɓɛɛ ká ee ɗaŋ deemɔ‘i duk, bo na.
Kóó o ndé ba nɛ́ yuwar kɔ‘i nɛ̀ nú-tum,
hee nyaŋa fara biro ga.
Kóó nɛ́ o nɔ̧́í̧-gba-dɔya iŋa ŋgimbi kura-a kɔ‘i;
o kerŋgeɗe, o gbiiwara in o sɔkɔyɔkɔ
iŋa ŋgimbi pia-ɗoŋ kɔ‘i mbɛt;
ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ‘m iŋ o geŋa kɔ‘m na.
Héé ge ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧‘e:
‹Ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ
wen nɛ̀ Heembea ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ mgbara yɛ,› ge?
Wen o wi-yɔr-kalata mgbara'nɛ́
ɗaŋa wen-tɛ Heembea nɛ̀ o ndela kɔ-wa!
«Búù baa o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ;
wa iŋ mɔ mɛ de siti na,
ɓɛɛ wa tik nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a
wen wa ee wen ko GASA WAN tɛ geemɔ.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-wa tɛ gbak wa hee ge?»
Zu mɔ‘i, GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ ha̧ o kóò kɔ-wa ha̧ o ŋma bíí,
in fɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ tɛ duk zu wa,
wen wa lɛŋ, o gasawi in o obem mbɛt
kii nɛ yuwar kpaamɔ kɔ‘i;
o
Wa tɔ̧ wen tɛ ŋgamɔ nɛ kpa dukbíí kɔ‘m
hee geɗek mɔ ga, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Mɔ duk kɔ‘i nɛ̀ de-a! Ŋma mɔ bo na!›
Ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, ŋma mɔ kpɔk nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ de-a bo na.
Zu ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ wa de'i, foe de wa dee nde?
Foe de wa na kóó tikiɗi!
Wa iŋ géé iŋa foe na!
Ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e,
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wa tɛ tir a nù hee o dɔka bíí ga,
ŋgimbi n'am bé tɛ̀ɛ́ de ŋmaa in wa zu mɔ‘i.»
«Taamɔ kɔ‘m kinii'i
mɛ̀ nɛ́ ha̧‘m mɛ nduk wa kaɗi;
wen wa duk hee nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ waya-a bo na ga,
hee te-mbɔra nɛ̀ waya-a bo na ga mbɛt;
wa duk hee ŋma te nɛ̀ wa̧a̧-a̧ fee lɛsuu ga,
hegɔ mi tɛ e ha̧ o bíí mɛ i̧si wa yak nɛ̀ zu wa.»
«Wen ge s’ɛɛ ya keɗeŋ'ɛ ge?
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa, ɛ̀ɛ̀ yé saaye-ŋgárá,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ fo tɛ yɛ hi̧i̧ ɓɔna,
wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ kpee yɛ e nù,
ɔn nɛ̀ yɛ nɛ̀ yì.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛɛ yɔɔ kaya ti GASA WAN.
Ɛɛ yaa so k’ɛɛ e nɛ̀ ta'e,
mɔ tɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a h’ɛɛ wó,
ɓɛɛ ŋma demɔ bo na.
Ɛɛ yaa so k’ɛɛ pɛm nɛ̀ wese
nɛ̀ bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ tɛ kaɗi wó,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋga mɔɔ-kíì a̧ tɛɛ kpa yɛ.
O wisɛn hɔɔ Daŋ kaɗi;
wi zii nɛ giti gɔna búk ko o nyaŋa nɛ̀ gɔn tɛnɛ;
géé
Wa tɛ mɛ ɗaŋ nù in o mɔ mɛ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ,
gu nɛ̀ ye in dukbíí nɛ̀ ya sɛnɛ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN'e, «Mi tɛ tom o ɗaŋ gɔ́k,
o kóró nɛ̀ bíí beka nyɛm mɛ ɔr na
a mgbara'nɛ́ mɛ gɔm'nɛ́.»
Nyina nyimmɔ kɔ‘m bo na;
see-am ŋmana nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a.
Wi zii nɛ sara-bɔnɛ ko dukbíí kɔ‘m
nɛ̀ tɛ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ tɛnɛ‘e:
«GASA WAN bo
Wannu kɔ̧-a̧ bo hi̧i̧ na nde?»
«Wen ge sa wa tu̧ see-am nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧,
in o géé tum mɔ kɔ-wa mɛ gɔni-fara ge?»
Mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ kaɗa,
ŋgimbi-ɓar nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yaka mbɛt’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ŋma mɔɔ-kpasi-yɛ tɛ bo hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina wen gasa ɗaŋmɔ
nɛ̀ kpaa dukbíí kɔ‘m;
yí‘m baa tum, ɓɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ ba'm mbɛt.
Ŋma nyina-ga̧-nyimmɔ bo sɛn Galad ɓɔna?
Ŋma wi-de-nyina bo hi̧i̧ na nde?
Wen ge dukbíí kɔ‘m kpa daama na ge?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ kpai zu'm nɛ̀ gɔna-yì,
in yí‘m nɛ̀ kpút-kpút-mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧
wen hi̧a̧ o fio mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m o?
Ho! A̧‘m kpá so ŋma fara
mɛ hu̧si tɛ‘m sɛnɛ ŋga-gbárà mɛ
hee o wi-ba-war ga,
mi tɛ̀ɛ́ yak dukbíí kɔ‘m e ɓɔn hi̧i̧!
Wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wi-nɛ-ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧;
wa lɛŋ nɛ́ o wi-e-ɗɔra tɛ ŋmaa.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Leɓe-wa ɔ hee kusaa a'i ŋgaŋa ga;
mɔ nɛ̀ wa de zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ,
nɛ́ ndela, kpasawen bo na.
Wa de kànà nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ siti siti,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, wa iŋ am na!
Kóó o ndé a̧ mbó ta nɛ̀ o gbama-sɛm kɔ‘i,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ta nɛ̀ ŋma nya'nɛ́ kóó kpɔk na;
wen k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ k’ɛnɛ‘e a̧ nɛ́ nya'nɛ́ wó,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧‘i a̧ tɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛɛ;
kóó nɛ́ gbama-sɛm k’ɛnɛ mbɛt,
a̧ kai ndaa'nɛ́‘i.
O ndè lɛŋ ɔr nɛ̀ sɛm kɔ‘i;
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɔ̧ kpasawen bo na.
Ndela hira tɛ wa kaɗi,
ɗoŋ wa nyɛi̧a tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ kaɗi,
wa nyɛm mɛ pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna.
GASA WAN'e,
mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ-ŋgai in ɔra ŋmaa;
wa kɔ̧ mɛ iŋ am na.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi tɛ we wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i nɔi̧ nɛ̀ boi nɛ̀ wee’ɛ ga;
hegɔ‘i mi tɛ ba zu'm dúk nɛ̀
dukbíí kɔ‘m wen zu ɗaŋ kɔ-wa.
Ndàrà-nú o wi nɔ‘i duk nɛ́ góó-gbɛ-wi;
mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ ɔrmɔ.
Wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa nɛ́ gba de ɔ̧ɔ̧-nyɔ̧ɔ̧-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wan mɛ kɔ̧ see-wa,
nɛ́ tuia-pɛr ha̧ o sɛm kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN'e,
mi beka de ŋmaa in o wi nɔ'ɔ na?
Mi beka kifi er ɗaŋmɔ
ha̧ o pɛrti tugun bíí'ɛ na nde?»
«Mi tɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ zu o kaya nɛnɛ,
mi tɛ ai nú zu fara-dai o mɔ-dai
nɛ̀ mɔ bia wee sɛnɛ ŋgai kotoro,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí ɓir sɛnɛ ɓɔna,
nɛ̀‘i zii
O mɔ nɛ̀‘i sa'e o nɔ̧́í̧
in o saɗi lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak,
ŋma oi-mɔ duk na.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ Jerusalɛm mɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi,
in fara-yaa ko o gba-toyo,
ɓɛɛ o ye mɛ nù Juda
tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ géé zaŋbɛɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí beka duk sɛnɛ na.
Kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ,
a̧ a̧ zíí mgbara mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧
tɛ ha̧a̧nú kɔ‘i ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ wé ɗoŋ-aa yaknɛ‘e:
mɔ nɛ dee ha̧ nù mɛ bìì wee ɗaŋ ŋgai kotoro,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí ɓir sɛnɛ ɓɔna’ɛ nɛ́ ge?»
GASA WAN'e: «Wa ee usamɔ kɔ‘m n'am ee ti wa duk. Wa tɛ̀ɛ́ zii so nɛ tiger-am, mɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ɓɔna tɛ ŋgaia see-wa, ndaɗi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o sɔ̧ Bal nɛ̀ o dáà kɔ-wa usa so ha̧ wa.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Mi tɛ pɛsi wa dam zaŋnu mgbara o tugun bíí nɛ̀ wa iŋ nɛti na, in nɛ̀ o dáà kɔ-wa iŋ so na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e gba-paa ɗoŋ wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ kum lɛŋ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o okoo-hi̧i̧-fio pii ti!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hók o wan-ɗekeri-gima-fio!
Wa a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ dé gima-fio!
Wa a̧ tɛ́ nɛ̀ haya-a;
wa a̧ hí̧í̧ kɔ̧a̧-fio zu yɛ.
Mi̧i̧kɔ̧a a̧ gár yí-ɛ́ɛ́,
ha̧ yí-ɛ́ɛ́ a̧ fók nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a.»
Wi zii nɛ ŋma aia-nú nɛ̀
«Ho! Ɛɛ kuma, búù baa yɛ kaɗi!
Ɛɛ tɛ e nù k’ɛɛ duk!
Wa gbina o tua k’ɛɛ a nù.»
O okoo, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN;
wen kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ yé zer'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí hi̧a kɔ̧a̧, áí nɛ̀ nú
ha̧ o sɛm k’ɛnɛ mbɛt.
Fio ye nɛ̀ o woi-tua k’ɛɛ,
ye nɛnɛ sɛn kɔ̧ o de tua k’ɛɛ.
A̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓar o bem k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ mgbara kira nɛnɛ,
in o be-ŋgaiwi nɛ̀ bee-gara.
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jeremii,
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ wen kɔ‘m GASA WAN'e:
O wɔr gbisi mbɔɗɔnu sinɛ
hee mbɔra zao sɛn kpɛɛfɔ ga,
hee ŋma nyɔnɔ nɛ̀‘i gɔma a nù,
nɛ̀ wi-dɔra-a bo na ga.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ká wi-iŋ-mɔ ŋmaŋ tɛ zu iŋamɔ kɔ‘i na!
Ká wan-ŋgai ŋmaŋ tɛ zu ŋgai kɔ‘i na!
Ká wan-mbɔi ŋmaŋ tɛ zu mbɔi kɔ‘i na mbɛt!
Kà ŋma bíí á̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ,
a̧ a̧ ŋmáŋ tɛ-a wen nɛ̀ kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa gɔna mɛ iŋ am,
mi GASA WAN, nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ de-a,
nɛ̀
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ dee tɛ‘m a̧‘i.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
«Ŋma ŋgimbi, mi tɛ kifi er ha̧ o wi nɛ
Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in o be Egiptɛ, o be Juda, o be Edɔm, o be Amɔŋ, o be Mɔab, ká bá nɛ̀ o yàá-kpui-ká̧-yí nɛ̀ ɔ ŋga-gbárà mɛ, wen o dɔka tugun bíí lɛŋ
Ɛ́nɛ́, o be
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu'nɛ́'ɛ!
Wen n'aa tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk ɗoŋ mɔ ko o tugun bíí de nɛ̀ k’ɛnɛ na!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ mɛ yiwese na!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o tugun bíí a̧ dé kíì o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɛ̧.
Ɓɛɛ yuwar deemɔ ko o dukbíí sa̧ na;
wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gɔm te sɛn kɔ̧ kombo,
ɓɛɛ wi-sɛk-te sɛka;
wa yɔka ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi in lɔr,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ mgboi nɛ̀ o pɔndi ba zu̧ ŋgɔn,
n'aa beka fo tɛ na.
O géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i ya hee o nàá-nduŋ-tunyuŋ-ndak-nɔ̧́í̧,
nɛ̀‘i ga̧i̧ kpɛɛfɔ'ɛ ga.
Wa tɔ̧ wen na, wa nɛ nɔ na mbɛt,
kànà nɛ́ tuia wa.
Ká kíì dee'nɛ́ na,
wen ŋma ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ wa tɛ de sitɛ‘nɛ́ bo na,
kà bó nɛ̀ gbaka ɛnɛ na mbɛt.»
Ŋma bíí mɛ nyɛm ŋmaa
in'nɛɛ bo na, GASA WAN!
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ gasamɔ,
ɓɛɛ nin'nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔm gasamɔ mbɛt
wen ŋgai k’ɛnɛ!
Wan ko o tugun bíí,
nɛ́ o'o beka yu'nɛ́ na o?
Zɔnamɔ nɛ́ k’ɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mgbara o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ̀ ya
poo o tugun bíí in tɛ o mɔɔ-wan lɛŋ,
ŋma wi nɛ̀ nyɛma ŋmaa in'nɛɛ bo na.
O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ
nɛ́ o géé tum bíí,
zu-wa dam na,
wen nɛ̀ wa kpaa usamɔ kɔ-wa
tɛ mɔ ko géé-sɔ̧.
O géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i nɛ́ bu-mbɔi
nɛ‘i duia ba tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Tarsis,
ɓɛɛ lɔr tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ Ufaz mɛ,
nɛ̀ o wi-sɛk-mɔ in o wi-dui-mɔ ɗafa,
ɓɛɛ wa pi̧ o tu̧ laa in gbɛ̧ laa mbɛt tɛ wa.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ tom ko o kpasa wi-iŋ-tom.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasawen nɛ̀ mbetɛ;
a̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ́ duk kpasa,
wannu nɛ̀ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Kà a̧ de nyimsea, ɓɛɛ nù naka,
ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí
nyɛm mɛ ya ɗɔɔ tu̧u̧-see kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «O sɔ̧ nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wa a̧ dee yiwese in nù na’ɛ, a̧ yámbálí ɓɔn zu nù ɗɔɔ yiwese’ɛ.»
GASA WAN dee nù tɛ ŋgai kɔ‘i;
a̧ dee o mɔ zu nù lɛŋ
tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ tata o yiwese tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ à̧ à̧ ha̧ nú,
ɓɛɛ o yi mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn yiwese mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o tura-zan daŋa nɛ̀ ndaa-zan,
o pi̧i̧-kórò dee ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ,
ɓɛɛ o búk gbo nɛ̀ fara kɔ‘i mɛ tɛnɛ mbɛt.
O bíí lɛŋ sakala tɛ mɔ‘i,
wa iŋ mgbara-a na;
ziimɔ baa o wi-ɓu o géé-sɔ̧
zu o mɔ nɛ̀ wa dea,
wen o mɔɔ nɔ‘i bó nɛ́ kpasamɔ na,
wen nɛ̀
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ o géé tum-mɔ,
nɛ́ mɔɔ-mami;
ŋgimbi kita ko Sɔ̧, wa tɛ kum lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko Sɔ̧, Dua-see Jakob,
bo hee wa ga na;
a̧ nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ dee mɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧;
nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN,
wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí Jerusalɛm,
biro kɛra'nɛ́ kaɗi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r tui k’ɛnɛ.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Kinii mi tɛ pɛsi o bíí zu nù'ɛ a taŋ,
mi tɛ nasi wa ká mɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ yɔɔ zu wa.»
«Oee mi wa!
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ ge ŋgayamɔ ge!
Da̧i̧ kɔ‘m bo nɛ́ da̧i̧ wìì na.
Kɔ‘m mi'e: bɔnɛ kɔ‘m a̧‘i,
mi tɛ tui nɛ́ tuia-a.
Tua-laa kɔ‘m ɗaŋa!
O nyak-aa lɛŋ ŋmana yinɛ!
O bem kɔ‘m in o mɔ-dai kɔ‘m lɛŋ kuma;
ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ ba tua-laa kɔ‘m e ŋgɔn bo na,
ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ ɗafi fara-duk kɔ‘m woyo bo na mbɛt.»
O wi-dai-mɔ dee mgbélé mɔ;
wa kii GASA WAN na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa wa de tom kɔ-wa sa̧ na,
ɓɛɛ wa e o mɔ-dai yambali.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí ŋga nyɛrɛ mɔ'ɔ:
mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma ŋgamɔ a̧ de mɔ tɛnɛ
nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn
mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ o ye nù Juda lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti
kifi ŋga-gbárà,
fara-yaa kɔ o gba-toyo.
GASA WAN, mi iŋa,
bíí bó nɛ́ wan-zɔk-yuwar kɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɛ-wi na;
wi-nɛ-nyɛi̧a-nɔ̀ bó nɛ̀ ŋgai
mɛ zɔk naŋanɔ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ tɛ-wi nɛ̀ de-a na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí mɔ ha̧‘m, GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ̀ ga̧a̧-see,
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ sɛn tɛ nyimsea na,
wen ká‘m tɛɛ fe.
See'nɛ́ a̧ ɗáŋ zu o wi nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ́ na'i,
in zu o dukbíí nɛ̀ ɗafi'nɛ́ na mbɛt'i,
wen wa kɛra o bezaŋ Jakob kum nɛ̀ wa,
ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ o mɔɔ-nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ wen
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e ndé: GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko

‘i, mi nɔɔ so in o zɔmdaa k’ɛnɛ ŋgimbi n'am kaia so nɛ wa gbonɛ nɛ ŋga-fara-bɔnɛ nú Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ‘i; hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ kasi ha̧a̧nú n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, mi tɛ ha̧ nù nɛ̀ yibere in gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ ha̧ wa sɔsɔɔ.» Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú: «Mɔ a̧ dé hego GASA WAN!»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Mɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ nú-wen’ɛ dam o ye Juda gú nɛ̀ o mgbara kira Jerusalɛm lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii gba̧a̧ wen
Mi aia so nú ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ŋgimbi n'am kaia so nɛ̀ wa daŋnɛ nɛ̀ Egiptɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i ndé, wa a̧ zíí wen nú‘m. Mi mbɔi tɛ aia nú, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen'i ha̧ wa na.
Ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wa zia wen nú‘m na, wa yeŋ zer tɛ wen'i na mbɛt. Wa duka tɛ dee ɗaŋ ŋgazu kɔ-wa siti nɛnɛ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ mi dee ŋgamɔ in wa zu yuwar
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «O be Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm ee nú in o ŋmaa.
Wa sii ɗoŋ tɛ kale ɗaŋmɔ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa nɛ̀ bɛ̧ɛ̧ so zia wen nú‘m; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa mbɛt tɛɛ zik tɛ, nɛ́ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ̀ wa. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Kinii, mi tɛ fo ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ wa beka gbo ɗɔɔ-aa na pi̧ zu wa; wa tɛ sa'm mɛ gbak wa, ɓɛɛ mi beka pi̧ nú‘m tɛ-wa na.
O bíí saaye Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ai nú ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa ɗafi so, ɓɛɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgimbi-bɔnɛ‘i na.
Ho! Juda, o sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ dɔka nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧ Bal
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jeremii, ká mɛ́ ye ɗoŋ o wi nɔ'ɔ ɓɔna! Ká mɛ́ ai nú mɛ wen wa ɓɔna mbɛt! Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa bé tɛ̀ɛ́ sa'm tɛ ŋgimbi-bɔnɛ kɔ-wa, mi beka pi̧ nú‘m tɛ-wa na.»
GASA WAN'e:
«Nɛ́ ge a̧ o yaa-dua-see-am nɔ'ɔ
tɛ mɛ de kɔ̧́ Tua kɔ‘m ge?
Yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa ɔ yukuta!
O ha̧a̧nú in o kpoo-sɔ̧
nyɛma mɛ fo bɔnɛ yinɛ zu wa nde?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa tɛ yu nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ-aa nde?
Nin nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa nɛti nɛ́
‹De da̧a̧ te-nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ o waya-a
dé ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ gba demɔ.›
Ɓɛɛ tɛ zɔm giti mɔ,
mi pi̧i̧ wee tɛ da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ o gbaa-er-a gbin a nù.»
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, nɛ̀ guna mɛ́, a̧ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu mɛ wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ o be Juda in o be
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ GASA WAN wee nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ-wa ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ n'am zia mgbara mɔ‘i kaɗi, mi kpaa ndaa yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Mi duka so hee
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ɔ wan nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
zɔk nɛ̀ taamɔ ko o bíí;
mi tɛ zɔk kifa-er n’ɛnɛ tɛ kifi ha̧ wa,
wen mɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ, mi ee er'nɛ́.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ o bíí Anatot nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gbɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Kà mɛ e tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN duk na, mɛ tɛ fe er yɛ,» wó‘i, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in wa; o be-ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa tɛ fe nɛ́ fio gba-paa, ɓɛɛ o bem in o boko-bem kɔ-wa tɛ kum tɛ kaɓa.
Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋgamɔ zu o be Anatot ŋgimbi kita kɔ-wa mɛ kum wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ oi gun.»
K’ɛnɛ, GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ zu mɔ‘i, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ kànà mɛ ak mgbara mɔ.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ak mgbara mɔ in'nɛɛ:
wen ge sa mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ de-a yaknɛ ge?
Wen ge sa o wi-mbo-zu h’ɛnɛ na ya nɛ̀ de-a ge?
Ɛnɛ guna wa, nin-wa yee nù,
ɓɛɛ wa gasi wai;
nú-wa duk ɓɔn tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ see-wa ɔ nyɛi̧a nɛ̀ ɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ iŋa'm GASA WAN,
yí‘nɛ́ duk ɓɔn tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka'e o taamɔ kɔ‘m a̧a̧ yuwar k’ɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kái o wi-ɗaŋ a nɛ̀ mgbɔɔr hee o sami mɛ́ gɔn ga;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á wa pɛm nɛ̀ wese-gɔna-wa.

O mɔ mɛ zu nù lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kor kor’ɛ, o zɔ̧-zaŋbɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɔ̧k kor nɛnɛ'ɛ; mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ nduti mɛ gese ge? O saɗi in o nɔ̧́í̧ kum wen ɗaŋ ko o bíí tɛ nù'ɛ, nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e: «Sɔ̧ zɔk yuwar deemɔ k’ɛɛ na,» wó'ɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Kà mɛ nyɛm mɛ ma yì in o wi-a-yaa-gan-ŋmaa na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɛ a yaa-gan-ŋmaa in o nyaŋa hee ge?
Kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ de ga̧a̧ nù
wen duka-a sɛnɛ nɛ̀ de-a,
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ tɛ de hee ge kɔ̧ da̧a̧ kombo Jurdɛn ge?
«Íì, o nya-mɛ in o nàm kɔ-mɛ mbɛt, e nɛ ɗɔra tɛ mɛ; sa nɛ̀ o gba gíí bíí a ɗoŋ mɛ. Ká mɛ́ e ta nɛ̀ wa ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ gba de nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ mɛ‘i na.»
«Mi ee tua kɔ‘m duk;
mi pi̧i̧ mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m taŋ.
Mi siŋa wan n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna
pi̧ kɔ̧̀ er o wi-sɛn-a.
Mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m kifa duk hee dila-zaŋbɛɛ ga;
a̧ tuɓi nɛ da̧ a zu'm;
mi kɔ̧ a̧ ɓɔna.
«Mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m kifa nɛ́ ŋma
gba de be nɔ̧́í̧,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o ŋga nɔ̧́í̧-ba-mɔ mɔi̧a tik zu a̧
nɛ̀ fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ'ɛ nde?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔi o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ tɛnɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wa tɛnɛ tɛ gbaŋa!
O gíí wi-dai-mɔ tɛɛ ɗaŋ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
wa i̧sa fɔ kɔ‘m ɗaŋ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti,
kifi nɛ́ géé ŋgamɔ kotoro.
Wa dee ha̧ fɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ duk yí‘m’ɛ
mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù;
nù nɛ̀ oi-aa ɗaŋa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí mɛ ta mɔ sɛnɛ bo ɓɔna.
«O wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ gar nɛ̀ o yuwar mɛ ŋga-gbárà mɛ tɛnɛ;
gba-paa ko GASA WAN ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ zu nù hɔ nduti-a mɛ,
ŋma ga̧a̧mɔ bo wen ŋma bíí ɓɔna.
Kà‘i gun alkamaari,
ɓɛɛ wi ɓii nɛ́ nàákɔɓa;
kà‘i de ŋga tom,
ɓɛɛ wi kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa na.
Ziimɔ a̧ bá‘nɛ́ tɛ ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ tik zu'nɛ́,
zu ŋga wee-nyimsea ko GASA WAN.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mi tɛ zuɗi o ɗaŋ bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧
Ŋgimbi n'am bé tɛ̀ɛ́ fo o wi nɔ‘i yinɛ kaɗi, mi tɛ zɔk kó tɛ-wa woyo, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mgbɔ wa si ɗoŋ, kóó o ndé si fara kɔ‘i, in si nù kɔ‘i.

Ɓɛɛ kà wa yambi duka-a nɛ̀ mboozu hee ko dukbíí kɔ‘m ga, kan nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ nin-am tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹GASA WAN duk kpasa,› hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa usa so nɛ̀ kanamɔ nɛ̀ nin Bal ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m ga, wa tɛ kpa fara-duk mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ kà wa zii wen nú‘m na, mi tɛ ɗaŋ tugun bíí nɔ‘i yinɛ war kpɔk nɛ̀‘i beka iŋ oi wa ɓɔna.» Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hí̧fí kanda yɛ́m-yɛ́m zɔ̧-laa, a̧ mɛ̀ már guntir-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ pi̧ a̧ ɗɔɔ yì na.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am hi̧fa kanda nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mi mar guntir-am.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn Pɛrat nɛ̀ oi kanda nɛ̀ mɛ mara guntir-mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ hú̧sí kanda'i mgbara ta.»
Mi baa kanda'i nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si sɛn Pɛrat hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ga.
Ɗoŋ dɔka zɛ, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ sɛn Pɛrat, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá kanda n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ hu̧si hi̧i̧‘i.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am sii ɗoŋ si Pɛrat, fara n'am hu̧sa̧ so kanda'i sɛnɛ‘i mɛ ba. Ɓɛɛ kanda'i ɗaŋa mbɔr lɛŋ, ŋma mɔ nɛ̀‘i tɛ de nɛnɛ bo na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e:
«Wen kɔ‘m nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m tɛ ɗaŋ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-duk-tɛ ko Juda, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ zak-duk-tɛ ko Jerusalɛm mbɛt yinɛ.
O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ o gba wi-ŋgazu nɛ̀ zii wen nú‘m na, nɛ̀ ɓɔn tɛ dee ŋgazu, nɛ̀ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, gasi nɛ̀ wa, gu nɛ̀ nù ti wa. Wa à̧ kífí duk hee kanda’ɛ nɛ̀ beka de ŋma mɔ ɓɔna’ɛ ga!
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN, a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: Mi hɛra so o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e ndé: «Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí nù'ɛ lɛŋ mɛ gbɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧, gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o
Mi tɛ kai wa yo nɛ̀ ŋmaa, o dáà tɛ yo ŋmaa in o bem kɔ‘i; mi tɛ kum wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ ko beka de'm tɛ ɗaŋa wa yinɛ na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ:
k’ɛ́nɛ́ ŋmaŋ tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ e wen’ɛ tɛ geemɔ na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tú̧ tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ,
nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ tom tum tɛnɛ,
nɛti h’ɛnɛ mɛ kɔ̧ naŋ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ o kaya sɛn ti tum.
Ɛ́nɛ́ pɛ́m so nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpai sa̧a̧mɔ‘i nɛ̀ gba tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧,
kifi nɛ́ zɔm tum ŋga-kórò.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wen’ɛ na,
ɓɛɛ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a tɛ mbaŋ yí‘m
nɛ̀ war fara-duk kɔ‘m,
wen ŋmaŋa-tɛ k’ɛnɛ;
mi̧i̧kɔ̧a tɛ fok yí‘m,
wen wa tɛ kai dukbíí nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔ-dai
ko GASA WAN yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.»
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu in nàà kɔ‘i
mɛ zir zu damti-wan,
wen nɛ̀
Biro kpee o gasa ye mɛ nú Nɛgɛb lɛŋ,
ŋma bíí mɛ ye hi̧i̧ bo na!
Wa kaia o be Juda lɛŋ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro;
oi bíí kóó kpɔk duk na.»
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Jerusalɛm,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá yi'nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k biro nɛ̀ ba piinɛ
nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ tik'nɛ́‘i.
Mɔ-dai kɔ‘m n'am ee so'nɛ́ zu-wa’ɛ a̧a̧ déè?
O gba de sami k’ɛnɛ nɔ‘i a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè?
Nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ tɔ̧
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o gɔni-dùk n’ɛnɛ dee sɛm in wa
tɛ kur mɛ ɔ wan zu'nɛ́ ge?
Ŋgimbi'i mɔ tɛ ba tɛ‘nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɔ ba nɛ̀ tɛ okoo
tɛ ŋgimbi kóó bem’ɛ ga.
Jerusalɛm, mɛ tɛ ak tɛ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ‘e:
‹Wen ge sa mɔ'ɔ hɔɔ zu'm ge?›
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen gasa ɗaŋmɔ
a̧ wa ta̧i̧ nɛ̀ laa kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn
ɔ nɛnɛ in mɛɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai'i.
«Bíí
Gɔ̧ nyɛma so mɛ kpai dap-tɛ-wi nde?
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ hira tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma so mɛ de demɔ nde?
Mi tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ŋga hara-búk
kai nɛ̀ o zɔ̧ pɛsi yaknɛ'ɛ ga.
«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ!
War mɔ n'am ɗafa e, nɛ̀ tɛ kpa mɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Tɛ-mɛ bìí ɗoŋ-am,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ndaɗi in o géé tum-mɔ;
ɓɛɛ hegɔ, kɔ‘m, mi tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa tɛ-mɛ yinɛ,
wen ha̧ o bíí mɛ zɔk zim-tɛ-mɛ.
O ndaka ɗoŋ géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
o tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen tara-zu
dee dàlà kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ zan nɛ̀ foe de mɛ na!
Nɛ̀ zu o kaya in kpɛɛfɔ mbɛt,
mi zɔka o ndiŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ!
Ho Jerusalɛm!
Mɛ kɔ̧ mɛ
mɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-am na!
Nɛ́ ge ŋgimbi ge a̧ mɛ tɛ kaɗi
nɛ̀ dee o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ge?»
Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii
zu ŋga kaara nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Juda a̧a̧ tɛ zima-mɔ,
wen o ye kɔ̧-a̧ duk tɛ kuma-a nɛnɛ,
wa ya de na;
wa tira a nù,
wa ya hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ nù kɔ-wa:
O dita-bíí tom nɛ́ o wi-de-tom kɔ-wa
mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗu yì,
ɓɛɛ wa kpa yì na.
Wa nɛ, ɓɛɛ wa pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o géé nyɛk,
wa iŋ mɔ mɛ de na,
mɔ gana wa, ɓɛɛ wa ya sɛnɛ yelem géè.
O wi-wa-fɔ iŋ mɔ mɛ de na;
nù ku̧u̧ naŋ mbaŋa-a wen nɛ̀ kórò bo na,
ɓɛɛ wa ya sɛnɛ yelem géè mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ si zaŋbɛɛ mɛ, kà zambɛrɛ ko,
ɓɛɛ ee bem duk yak kɔ‘i,
wen nɛ̀ ŋma géé be ɓɔɔ-mɔ bo na.
O tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ yor nɛ̀ o zu kaya nɛnɛ,
de nɛ̀ pɛ̀r nɛ̀ ti búk hee o gba-toyo ga;
yí-wa mbɔia tɛ kia zɔ̧ nɛ̀ ti mɔ nɛnɛ
ɓɛɛ wa kpa na.»
«Kà o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ dee ɗaŋ sedaako zu yɛ,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛɛ wen nin'nɛ́.
Íì, ɛɛ kaɗi kafa'nɛ́ tɛ deemɔ k’ɛɛ na;
ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Mɔɔ-e-ta ko
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ wan-kpasi-bíí tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ,
wen ge s’ɛnɛ e tɛ‘nɛ́
hee ŋma gɛnɛ ga,
kóó hee ŋma wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɔ zɛ kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ kura kɔ‘i yak’ɛ ga,
sɛn tɛ nù k’ɛɛ ge?
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ e tɛ‘nɛ́
hee bíí nɛ̀ mɔ yeka a̧ ga, ge?
Kóó hee ŋgaŋa-wi nɛ̀ nyɛm
mɛ kpasi bíí kɔ‘i ɓɔna ga, ge?
Zu o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ mgbara yɛ,
nin'nɛ́ a̧a̧ zu yɛ.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e yɛ duk na.»

Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, o wi nɔ'ɔ kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ́ yambala-a nɛnɛ, wa zɔk ɗoŋ naŋanɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ de-a na.» Mɔ‘i de tɛ GASA WAN na; hegɔ, tɛ-a tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee bɔnɛ in wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: «Ká mɛ́ ai nú ha̧‘m wen o wi nɔ'ɔ na; ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ ta mɔ wen ŋma demɔ wen wa na mbɛt.
Kóó wa a̧ zim so nɛ́ yì, mi beka zii aia-nú kɔ-wa na; kóó wa
Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú‘e: «Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧! Nɛ́ o
GASA WAN kifa nú ha̧‘m zu mɔ‘i'e: «Wen nɛ̀ o
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa mi GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ndé: War ko o

Gba-paa in kaɓa tɛ kum o wi-zii-wen kɔ-wa ŋgoɗoso dam o be mgbara kira Jerusalɛm lɛŋ. Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ gun wa in o kóò kɔ-wa, o bem ká bá nɛ̀ o boko-bem kɔ-wa, beka bo na. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧‘m tɛ pi̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ kɔ-wa si ɗoŋ zu wa woyo.
«Mɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wa:
«Yí‘m ɓɔn fara fok nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a zɛ nɛ wese,
mi̧i̧kɔ̧a gɔn yí‘m na;
gba ŋgamɔ tika zu mgbák dukbíí kɔ‘m,
ŋgamɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ-kum-bíí.
Kà‘m gbo mɛ́ nɛ̀ kpɛɛfɔ,
ɓɛɛ o wɔr bíí nɛ̀ biro gbɛa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ;
kà‘m ye si saaye,
o wi nɛ kaɓa baa nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
O
ma nɛ yì dam fara lɛŋ,
wa iŋ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ yak na!»
«GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ siŋa Juda pi̧ taŋ nde?
Wɔ
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ gusa ɛɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a
ba gba̧a̧-tɛ-yɛ n’ɛɛ beka kpasi na’ɛ ge?
Ɛ́ɛ́ pɛma so nɛ́ haya-tɛ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma demɔ n’ɛɛ kpaa bo na;
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ zɛɛ k’ɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi so,
nɛ́ gasa kíì a̧ hɔa!
GASA WAN, ɛɛ iŋa ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ,
in yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdaa k’ɛɛ;
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
Wen hura-nin'nɛ́, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e yɛ duk na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ búù zu damti-gasamɔ k’ɛnɛ na;
tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ
k’ɛ́nɛ́ yai
Mgbara o géé-sɔ̧ ko o tugun bíí,
ŋma a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ nde?
So nɛ́ yiwese a̧ ha̧ kórò nde?
Bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ na nde?
Yí-ɛ́ɛ́ duk ɓɔn tɛ‘nɛ́
wen nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ de o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Kóó so nɛ́ o Moisɛ in Samuɛl a̧ yora so ti'm, mɛ ai nú ha̧‘m wen zu dukbíí'ɛ, mi beka pi̧ nú‘m tɛ wa na. Mɛ̀ ndák wa yinɛ ti'm; wa a̧ yák síɓí!
Ɓɛɛ kà wa ak mɛ‘e: ‹Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ nɛ si déè nde?› mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e, GASA WAN tɔ̧a'e:
Wi nɛ̀ tɛ fe nɛ́ géé fio a̧ fé nɛ́ kɔ‘i!
Wi nɛ tɛ fe nɛ́ fio-gba-paa a̧ fé nɛ́ kɔ‘i!
Wi nɛ tɛ fe nɛ́ fio-kaɓa a̧ fé nɛ́ kɔ‘i!
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ wa tɛ kai nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ a̧ nɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ‘i!»

«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: Mi tɛ tom o ŋgamɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ naar pii zu wa: gba-paa tɛ kum wa, o toyo tɛ tɛ mɛ gbur wɔr-wa a taŋ, ɓɛɛ o tama in o gbóò tɛ tɛ kɔ‘i mɛ nyɔŋ wɔr-wa gur yinɛ nɛ̀ oi-wa beka bo na.
Mi tɛ de mɔ‘i hegɔ wen zu Manase, wannu Juda, bem ko Ezekias, wen o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-sedaako nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o mɔɔ-wan zu nù lɛŋ.»
«Jerusalɛm, nɛ́ ge bíí ge
a̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ mɛ ge?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ usi ŋma be
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ɗaŋ kɔ‘i tɛ̀ mɛ́ ak mɔ wen mɛ o?
Nɛ́ mɛ a̧ ee am duk!
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mɛ a̧ zika ɗoŋ-mɛ e ha̧‘m ɛ̧!
Mi nyɛi̧a er-am sitɛ mɛ mɛ ɗaŋ mɛ,
wen deeko kɔ‘m zu mɛ gana'm kaɗi.
«Mi baa mɔɔ-pɛfi-mɔ
ɓɛɛ mi pɛfi wa dam zaŋnu lɛŋ;
mi kuma o bem er dukbíí kɔ‘m
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa kpai naŋanɔ kɔ-wa na.
Mi dee ha̧ o ko-gera mɛ dɔk mgbara wa
hee nyɛmɛ ka̧ ŋgere ga;
mi foo wi-ɗaŋ-bíí nɛ̀ ŋga bu-wese
pi̧ zu o nàà ko o daŋa wi-biro,
mi foo ŋga mɔɔ-kíì pi̧ zu wa yekseɗe.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ɗɛɗɛ nàá-wan-bem
nɛ̀ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo yɔa ŋmana,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔm hɔ ɗɔɔ ɓɔna;
wese yee zu a̧ nɛ̀ ŋga bu-wese,
ɓɛɛ ziimɔ ba a̧ tɛ kɔsa kɔ̧-a̧.
«Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e oi nda bíí
nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn er o wisɛn kɔ-wa
mɛ kum wa nɛ̀ gba-paa.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
Oee bɔnɛ kɔ‘m wa,
naaye, wen ge s’ɛnɛ kòò so'm ge?
O bíí zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ kii nɛ́ nú‘m,
kur nɛ̀ biro zu'm.
Ŋma bíí n'am nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpe mɔ er-a bo na;
bíí nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpe mɔ er-am mbɛt bo na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ tok nɛ́ ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu'm.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi kana mɔ,
oi mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a siti;
mi kana mɔ, mi tɛ de ha̧ o wi-sɛn-mɛ
mɛ kii gbaka mɔ er mɛ
tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ in ŋgimbi dita-see.
Wi nyɛma so mɛ gbin boi in ndɛrɛ
nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nde?»
Mi ee o mbɔi kɔ-mɛ in o demɔ kɔ-mɛ
ha̧ wa mɛ kai yaknɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ
nɛ̀ mɛ́ dee so zu nù kɔ-mɛ dam fara lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ mɛ ba mɛ nɛ̀ bara yaknɛ
si ŋma nù nɛ̀ mɛ iŋ na,
wen nyimsea kɔ‘m kura kaɗi,
see-am bia wee ɓɛɛ tu̧ zu mɛ.
GASA WAN, k’ɛnɛ,
ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ̀ yak lɛŋ!
Tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbáŋ ɗoŋ am,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er
ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ kii nú‘m.
Ká nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk siti ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi ɓɔna,
wen ká wa tɛɛ gbɛ‘m.
Ɛnɛ iŋa kànà‘e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu'nɛ́
a̧‘m nyɔŋ nɛ̀ nin-am tɛ da̧ra̧'ɛ.
Ŋgimbi n'am zia so o wen k’ɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi ba wen'i e kɔ̧́ see-am;
wen k’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ desee ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ pi̧‘m tɛ tortɛ.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
wa saa nin'nɛ́ zu'm.
Mi beka kii desee kɔ‘m
tɛ ndaka ɗoŋ o bíí-de-zɛŋ na;
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ er'nɛ́ dora'm ga,
mi wɛra tɛ‘m nɛ̀ wa,
wen deemɔ kɔ-wa duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛr tɛ‘m.
Wen ge sa bɔnɛ kɔ‘m kaɗi na’ɛ ge?
Wen ge sa da̧i̧ kɔ‘m wíí na’ɛ ge?
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ hɔ ŋmaa
in be-zér mɛ wan nɛ̀ fok ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi na ɓɛɛ gɔna’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kifi nú:
«Kà mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m,
mi tɛ kpɛk mɛ mɛ ha̧ tom ha̧ mɛ;
ɓɛɛ kà mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasawen,
mɛ́ è tɔ̧ɔ̧ géé tum-wen duk,
mɛ tɛ duk betom kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ o bíí a̧ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ mɛ ɛ̧,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mɛ a̧ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ́ wa na.
Mi tɛ de mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgeŋ-ndɛrɛ
nɛ̀ beka fo mɔ
kóó naka-a ti o wi nɔ'ɔ na;
wa tɛ bi mɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa beka de ŋma mɔ in mɛɛ na.
Mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ,
wen kpasa mɛ in gbaka mɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mi baa mɛ yinɛ er o wi-ɗaŋ,
mi zuɗa mɛ yinɛ
kɔ̧̀ er o wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ beka ba kóò na, mɛ beka ko o be-wiwii kà bó nɛ̀ o be-okoo sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ na.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu o bem in o boko-bem nɛ̀ wa kòò zu nù'ɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o dáà in o nàá-wan-bem nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Wa tɛ fe nɛ́ fio-kaɓa, nɛ̀ bíí beka gun wa na in bíí beka hi̧i̧ wa na mbɛt. Wa tɛ ɓuk kifi nɛ́ géé ɓukamɔ mbulɛɛ; biro in kaɓa tɛ kum wa, ɓɛɛ wɔr-wa tɛ duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o tama in o gbóò.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a ha̧‘m woyo: «Ká mɛ́ ye tua fara nɛ̀ wa mɔi ŋmaa sɛnɛ hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ fio na; ká mɛ́ nɛ hɔ tɛ o bíí fara-fio na; ká mɛ́ de ko in wa na, wen mi baa ga̧a̧mɔ, deako in
O gasa bíí in o geɗek bíí tɛ fe zu nù‘i, ɓɛɛ bíí beka gun wa na; wi beka hi̧i̧ wa na, tik nɛnɛ nɛ̀ ger na,
Wi beka ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wi nɛ̀ fio fee er-a mɛ ha̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧ na. Wi beka ha̧ mɔɔ-nɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧ na mbɛt, kóó nɛ́ dáà, kóó nɛ́ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ fea.
«Mɛ beka ye tua gbaŋa mɛ duk nyɔŋ nɛ̀ mɔ, nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ in wa na.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ ha̧ o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kà wa ak mɔ‘e: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN foo gasa ŋgamɔ pii zu yɛ ge, ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ́ ge? Nɛ́ ge yɔɔ-kaya ge ɛ́ɛ́ dee ti GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ge nde?›
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e: GASA WAN tɔ̧a: mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ ee am duk mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, gasi nɛ̀ wa, gu nɛ nù ti wa mbɛt; kɔ‘m, wa ee am duk, ɓɛɛ wa kasi usamɔ kɔ‘m na.
War k’ɛnɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a gan ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ. O ndé ɓɔn kànà nɛ́ zaŋ ŋgazu kɔ‘i, ɛnɛ zii wen nú‘m na.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ ndak'nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ nù'ɛ sitɛ ŋma nù nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ in o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ iŋ na; sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛnɛ tɛ gasi o ŋma sɔ̧ zɛ nɛ wese, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa gbakamɔ kɔ‘m ɓɔna.»
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: «O bíí kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin-am tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: GASA WAN nɛ̀ foo o be
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kan mɔ‘e ndé, GASA WAN nɛ̀ foo o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ tom o wi-ba-zoro nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba wa. Mi tɛ tom o wi-de-gia nɛ̀ dɔka-a mɛ ndak wa nɛ̀ zu o kaya lɛŋ, in o zu-tɔ̧ hɔ nɛnɛ mgbara o ta mbɛt.
Yí‘m ɓɔn kànà tɛ o naŋanɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ yɔɔ yí‘m bo na. Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa duk ɓɔn yí‘m.
Ɓɛɛ kuti mɔ n'am tɛ de, nɛ́ dea-a ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ in yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu wa war yiitoo, wen wa ɗaŋa nù kɔ‘m nɛ̀ o mbɔramɔ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa dun mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-nyɛr kɔ-wa mbɛt.»
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋgai kɔ‘m,
fara-ɔm-tɛ‘m in fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m wese-bɔnɛ!
Nɛ́ sɛn tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ o tugun bíí tɛ gar pii sɛnɛ
nɛ̀ nduti-nù dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧:
«O sɔ̧ nɛ̀ o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ a̧a̧ so nɛnɛ
nɛ́ o géé tum-mɔ nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-mɔ bo so tɛ-wa na.
O géé bíí nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ sɔ̧ na
nyɛma so mɛ de sɔ̧ nde?»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧:
«Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ, mi tɛ usi ŋgai kɔ‘m
in ŋgayamɔ kɔ‘m mbɛt ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e mi nɛ́ GASA WAN.»
«Wa yɔra yɔɔ-kɔya ko Juda nɛ̀ boi
nɛ nú-a nɛ́ diama̧a̧;
wen'i yɔra kɔ̧́ see-wa
in zu o zak zu
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ zu o bem kɔ-wa ga,
mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen
zu o
nɛ̀ duk katɛ o ɓɔɔ wa̧a̧-te,
zu o
Ɛnɛ o wi-gasi-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zu kaya nɛ̀ zaŋbɛɛ nɛnɛ'ɛ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí mɛ kai o mbɔi
in o demɔ k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ
wen zu ɗafa sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ nɛ̀ zu o
nɛ̀ dama zu nù k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ'ɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ e kànà nù
n'am ha̧a̧ so h’ɛnɛ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi duk;
mi tɛ e ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛnɛ mɛ kai'nɛ́ yaknɛ
nɛ̀ bara sitɛ ŋma nù n’ɛnɛ iŋ na,
wen ɛnɛ a̧ŋa nyimsea kɔ‘m a ŋgɔn
hee wee ga nɛ̀ beka bi na ndó-ndó-ndó.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Fom a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ bíí
nɛ̀ duk ɓɛɛ ká fea’ɛ;
ŋgai ko wi’ɛi nɛ́ geemɔ,
see-aa bo tɛ GASA WAN na.
Wi’ɛi tɛ duk hee ŋma be te
mɛ́ zu ndaɗa-nù ga;
ŋma be desee beka hɔ tɛ-a na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk ɓɔn fara sɔkɔr-ta,
sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ
nɛ̀ bíí nyɛm mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ na.
nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ GASA WAN;
GASA WAN nɛ́ wi-e-nɛ-ta kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ duk hee ŋma te nɛ̀‘i guna ka̧ yì,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kunin-a yee nù hɔ tɛ yì ga.
A̧ beka iŋ gbɛŋmɔ na,
wa̧a̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ̀ ɓɔa-a nɛnɛ;
kóó nɛ́ pɛ ŋga kaara a̧ hɔ,
ŋma mɔ beka de a̧ na,
a̧ beka nyaŋ nɛ̀ waya-a na.
See-wi nɛ́ mɔɔ-ɔr-wi
gan o ŋma mɔ lɛŋ;
O'o tɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ o?
«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ zɔk o taamɔ
ko o bíí hɔ nduti-a mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí,
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ naŋanɔ in yí-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ̀ kpa mbɔi nɛ̀ yuwar zuzu hɔɔ ŋmaa
in ŋma nana gbafɔ nɛ̀ sii gu zu gɔni kui
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Tɛ duka-a ko wi’ɛi siti n'aa tɛ sɔk na,
mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧‘i tɛ yɔ er-a,
ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa a̧ tɛ kifi duk
nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧-ta-a gɔn na.»
Sa̧a̧ fara-gasi-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ
hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma gba de damti
nɛ̀‘i dea e zu kaya nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ko
ziimɔ tɛ ba o wi nɛ̀ e'nɛ́ duk,
o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧r tɛ nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum,
wen wa ee GASA WAN
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kput-kput yì nɛ̀ ɔ̧si na duk.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ haya-tɛ ha̧‘m GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ tɛ‘m hai;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpás'am, ɓɛɛ ha̧‘m kpasi
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mɔɔ-zɔn kɔ‘m.
O bíí‘e:
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè?
Wen'i a̧ hɔ́ gba̧a̧ gɔ!»
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, bo nɛ mi'i ira'nɛ́
mɛ tom ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu wa na,
mi yeŋ ɗaŋ wese ha̧ wa na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa hegɔ, o wen nɛ̀ gboo nɛ̀ nú‘m,
ɛ́nɛ́ zia nɛ̀ zer'nɛ́.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ gasa kíì tɛ‘m na,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fara-hu̧si kɔ‘m tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ.
Foe a̧ bá o wi-de-bɔnɛ in am,
ká foe ba'm na;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ kíì tɛ-wa,
nɛ́ bó nɛ́ mi na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ŋga bɔnɛ pi̧ zu wa,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbɔ́lí wa war yiitoo.
GASA WAN'e: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ yor ká̧ nú garo ko o bíí fara nɛ̀ o wannu Juda ye nɛnɛ in nɛ̀ wa gbo nɛnɛ mbɛt, ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋma nú garo Jerusalɛm lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e: O wannu Juda, o bíí Juda in o bíí saaye Jerusalɛm, ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ o nú-garo nɔ'ɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN.
Gba̧a̧-wen ko GASA WAN'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ́nɛ́ túí tui wese-ɔm-tɛ na; k’ɛ́nɛ́ tui mɔ gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú-garo Jerusalɛm wese'i na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ tui mɔ gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ wese-ɔm-tɛ na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma tom wese'i na mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ̀ de-a hee mɔ'ɔ n'am usa so ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛnɛ ga.
Kɔ-wa, wa yeŋ zer tɛ wen kɔ‘m na, wa zii wen nú‘m na, ɓɛɛ wa bɛ̧ usamɔ kɔ‘m.
«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zia wen nú‘m, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tuia mɔ gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú garo saaye’ɛ wese-ɔm-tɛ na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zɔka wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ̀ de-a, mɛ de ŋma tom wese'i na mbɛt,
