ɓɛɛ o wannu Juda nɛ̀ duk zu damti-wan ko David, nɛ̀ daŋ o keekee in o nyaŋa, wa in o be-wan kɔ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ o be Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm mbɛt tɛ duk tɛ yea-a nɛ̀ o nú-garo ye’ɛ siti, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ ɔ tɛ ye’ɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.

O bíí tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ tɛ o ye wan mɛ nù ko Juda, in fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ zik Jerusalɛm, nù ko Bɛnjamin, in o ye wan mɛ si Bɔkɔ-nù hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o ye mɛ zu kaya mɛ, in mɛ nú Nɛgɛb; wa tɛ kai o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛnɛ, o wan mɛ dɔa-a, o wan mɛ gɔna-a, wan mɛ zu-nyɔnɔ, in o fuu-nyama, ká bá nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ-dee-osoko, pii kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN.

Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii wen nú‘m mɛ zɔk wese-ɔm-tɛ nɛ̀ de-a na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tui mɔ gbonɛ nɛ̀ o nú-garo Jerusalɛm wese-ɔm-tɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ o nú-garo nɔ‘i, nɛ̀ tɛ dɔ o de tua Jerusalɛm a nù, ɓɛɛ wee'i beka bi na.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ̀ kúr! Mɛ̀ zír nɛ̀ haya-a si tɛ̀ ko wi-ɓu-kpánà. Mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ sɛn hi̧i̧.»
Mi zira si tɛ̀ ko wi-ɓu-kpánà, ɓɛɛ mi hɔ kpa a̧ fara ɓu kpánà.
Kà a̧ yɔ kaya yuwar kpánà n'aa ɓu'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓuu mbe-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar-ɓuu-de-kpánà.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN e wen nú‘m:
«O be
Tɛ́ ŋma ŋgimbi mi taa mɔ mɛ yai ŋma tugun bíí, kóó ŋma mɔɔ-wan yinɛ.
Kà tugun bíí‘i nɛ́ ee yuwar ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ de ha̧ see-am mɛ tu̧‘i duk, ɓɛɛ mi beka de ŋgamɔ n'am taa so mɛ de in a̧‘i ɓɔna.
Ŋmana, mi taa so mɛ ba ŋma tugun bíí kóó nɛ́ ŋma mɔɔ-wan e ŋgɔn.
Kà wa zii wen nú‘m na, kà wa de mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ bɛ̧ dee demɔ n'am taa so mɛ de ha̧ wa'i.

Ɓɛɛ kinii, Jeremii, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm'e ndé, GASA WAN'e, war k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi ta nɛ́ mɔ mɛ pi̧ ŋgamɔ zu'nɛ́, mi taa mboɗa zu mɔ n'am tɛ de in'nɛɛ‘i kaɗi. Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, o ndé a̧ kpáí duka-a kɔ‘i. Kóó o ndé a̧ kpáí ɗaŋ yuwar duka-a in ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘i.»
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧: «Ŋma mɔ k’ɛɛ mɛ de tɛ mɔ‘i bo na. Ɛɛ tɛ ndak kànà nɛ́ ɗoŋ o taamɔ k’ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé tɛ ɓɔn kànà tɛ dee ɗaŋ ŋgazu kɔ‘i siti.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ mgbara o tugun bíí.
Ɛ́nɛ́ zia so pɛrti ŋma mɔ hegɔ dee so nɛti nde?
Zɔm ɓɔrɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ nyaŋ so zu kaya Libaŋ nde?
De gɛ̧ɛ̧ yì nɛ̀ fok
zir nɛ̀ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ‘i tɛ ɔ̧si so nde?
Ko dukbíí kɔ‘m, tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ-am,
ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi o géé yambala sɔ̧
nɛ̀ de ha̧ wa mɛ kɔ̧ naŋ tɛ yuwar duka-a kɔ-wa
in tɛ o gba̧‘a̧ mɔ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa;
ɓɛɛ wa ba nɛ́ o gɔɔ-war in o yuwar nɛ̀ sa̧ na.
Wa dee ha̧ nù kɔ-wa
mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ geemɔ kotoro
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-kíì.
O bíí nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ
yak nɛ̀ kíì, mii nɛ̀ zu.
Mi tɛ pɛsi wa ti o wisɛn kɔ-wa,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ búk mɛ daŋa-wese
pɛsi nɛ̀ fuunu’ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ zik ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ wa wese bɔnɛ kɔ-wa,
mi beka gbak wa na.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o bíí tɔ̧a: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ é zu mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de nɛ̀ Jeremii; o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mɛ usi mɔ h’ɛɛ, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mɛ usi yuwar deemɔ h’ɛɛ, sɛka o
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m, GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ̀ o wi-sɛn-am tɔ̧ zu'm’ɛ.
Wi tɛ kifi er demɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ nde?
Kɔ-wa, wa tui nɛ́ ɗaŋ pɛ́r ha̧‘m.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ yora-a n'am yora so ti'nɛ́
tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen zu wa,
wen ha̧ nyimsea k’ɛnɛ mɛ ga̧ zu wa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ kaɓa zu o bem kɔ-wa,
gba-paa a̧ kúm wa!
San-bem a̧ bá o kóò kɔ-wa,
fio a̧ kum o wíì kɔ-wa,
wen ha̧ wa mɛ ya o ko-gera,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa
a̧ kúm tɛ biro mbɛt.
A'i zíí nɛ́ o
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ fo nɛ̀ o ŋga bíí tɛnɛ a zu wa,
wen wa tui nɛ́ o pɛ́r zik nɛ‘m mɛ ba'm;
wa a nɛ́ o yɔk fara-nɛɛ kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ iŋa ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-wa pii zu'm;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ bi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa yinɛ na,
ká tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa na.
Wa a̧ tír a nù ti'nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ ŋmaa in wa tɛ ŋgimbi nyimsea k’ɛnɛ ɛ̧!
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hi̧fi ŋma kpánà, ɓɛɛ mɛ́ hók o ŋma gasawi mgbara dukbíí in o ŋma mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧;
mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ wa gbo nɛ̀ nú garo Gbara-Kpánà si kɔ̧̀ ɗɔŋgɔ Bɛn-Hinɔm, á̧ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ o wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i ha̧ wa.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, ɛ́nɛ́ o wannu Juda in o bíí Jerusalɛm, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

O be Juda ee am duk, ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋ fara’ɛ nɛ̀ dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ̀ o ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ ha̧ wa, in nɛ̀ de ŋma mɔ ha̧ o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa, kà bó nɛ̀ o wannu Juda na mbɛt. Wa duna fara’ɛ nɛ̀ tɔk-tɛ o bíí nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè.
Wa mboo
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ̀ bíí beka sa fara’ɛ‘e ‹Tafɛt› kóó ‹Ɗɔŋgɔ Bɛn-Hinɔm› ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ sa'e nɛ́ ‹Ɗɔŋgɔ-gbɛ-wi›.

Mi tɛ yaŋgi yuwar-tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen in deemɔ ko Juda in Jerusalɛm yinɛ sɛn fara’ɛ; mi tɛ de ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-wa nɛ̀ zɔk ko tɛ-wa na mɛ kum wa a nù nɛ̀ gba-paa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ wɔr-wa mɛ duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ye’ɛ mɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-kíì, ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir fara'i tɛ gɔn; wa bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk o mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa, wa tɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Ho! Oee zɔm mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa tɛ ye’ɛ wa!›
Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ mur-tɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in be okoo-a hee kpoo ga, nyɔŋ nɛ̀ ŋmaa in o ŋmaa mbɛt zaŋ dita-see in ŋga bɔnɛ, nɛ̀ o wisɛn kɔ-wa nɛ̀ zɔk ko tɛ-wa na, tɛ pi̧ zu wa'i.
«Mɛ̀ gbá kpánà'ɛ ɓɔn yí o wi nɛ̀ nɛ́ in mɛɛ‘i,

ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e ndé, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ ɗaŋ dukbíí'ɛ in ye’ɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i gba nɛ̀ kpánà nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ ɗafi woyo ɓɔna ga. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ fara-gun-bíí beka nyɛm na ga, wi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gun wa sɛn Tafɛt mɛ mbɛt.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a, mɔ n'am dee ha̧ Tafɛt'i, nɛ́ kalemɔ‘i a̧‘m tɛ de in ye’ɛ ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí mɛ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
O tua ye Jerusalɛm in o tua ko o wannu Juda, nɛ̀ wa dɔɔ o fuu-nyama zu wa ha̧ o geemɔ mɛ yiwese in nɛ̀ wa aa zɛzɛ zu wa ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧ lɛŋ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ o ndiŋ fara hee Tafɛt ga.»
Jeremii pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Tafɛt fara nɛ̀ GASA WAN toma a̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen oi nú-wi sɛnɛ‘i. A̧ yora nú-zala Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ dukbíí lɛŋ‘e ndé:
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Pasehur, bem ko Imɛr nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN zia wen nɛ̀ Jeremii tɔ̧a'i lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa gusa Jeremii,
Nɛ̀ mɔ sa̧a̧ kaɗi, Pasehur tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ bur a̧ tɛ te yinɛ, ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «GASA WAN beka sa mɛ‘e ‹Pasehur› siti ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ sa mɛ‘e ‹Mɔɔ-kíì-dam-fara-lɛŋ!›

Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ de mɛ nɛ̀ zɔm mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi wen mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ, in wen o sɛm kɔ-mɛ mbɛt. O wisɛn ko o sɛm kɔ-mɛ tɛ gbɛ wa nɛ̀ gba-paa ɓɔn yí-mɛ́. Mi ee o be Juda er wannu Babilɔŋ ha̧ a̧ mɛ kai o ŋma yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro si nù kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛɛ o ŋma yinɛ nɛ̀ gba-paa.
O nyɔnɔ mɛ kɔ̧́ dam saaye’ɛ lɛŋ, o kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, o demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ o mbɔi ko o wannu Juda lɛŋ, mi ee er o wisɛn kɔ-wa, ha̧ wa mɛ ɓar mɔ, kai yaknɛ lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war kɔ-mɛ, Pasehur, mɛ in o bíí nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧́ tua kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, wa tɛ kai'nɛ́ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro. Mɛ tɛ hɔ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ fe, nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wa tɛ gun mɛ, mɛ in o sɛm kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ dali so wen oi nú o géé-sɔ̧ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ ndela.»
GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa mgbélé tɛ‘m,
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi mgbela nyɛmna.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee mɔ in am nɛ̀ ŋgai,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ de hɔ sɔŋkur-aa.
Wese lɛŋ, o bíí zɛkɛɗi nɛ‘m,
wa lɛŋ mam nɛ‘m.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'am bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen,
mi tɛ ak gbakamɔ hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ‘e:
«Dee ŋgamɔ in ɗaŋa mɔ!»
Wese lɛŋ mi duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-dara,
in mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi wen wèn k’ɛnɛ n'am tɔ̧, GASA WAN.
Kà‘m tɔ̧‘e ndé:
«Mi beka ta mɔ wen wèn k’ɛnɛ ɓɔna,
mi beka tɔ̧ wen sa nɛ̀ nin'nɛ́ ɓɔna,» wó,
nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i, a̧ see-am duk gbɛŋ nɛnɛ hee wee ga,
ɓɛɛ baa ŋgai kɔ‘m lɛŋ yinɛ;
mi nyɔŋ nin-am tɛ mɔ‘i takaɗi!
Mi zii kànà nɛ́ ɗaŋa wen-tɛ‘m
nɛ̀ o bíí ɗaŋ nɛ̀ katɛ‘m nɛnɛ;
wa sa'm'e «Mɔɔ-kíì-dam-fara-lɛŋ!»
O ŋma bíí mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e:
«Ɛ̀ɛ̀ gbá ndaa-a!»
Ɓɛɛ o ŋma tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i'e:
«Ɛ̀ɛ̀ gbá ndaa-a ŋgaɓo!»
Kóó nɛ́ o gba de sɛm kɔ‘m mbɛt
kii nɛ́ o be gɔɔmɔ kɔ‘m,
ha̧ wa mɛ kpa ŋma be yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ sɛka wa tɔ̧a'e:
«Ɛ́ɛ́ baa a̧ kaɗi!
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé mɔ bá tɛ-a oi k’ɛɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ katɛ‘m
hee ŋga wi-biro ga;
o wi-nukur'am tɛ kɔ̧ naŋ,
ɓɛɛ wa beka de mɔ kɔ-wa hɔ sɔŋkur-aa na.
Foe tɛ de wa, wa beka de hɔ gba̧a̧ na;
kànà nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù a̧ tɛ duk zu wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Tɛ-wi beka bi ɗoŋ mɔ‘i na.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ zɔk wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ zɔk kɔ̧ see-wi in taamɔ ko bíí,
mi tɛ zɔk kifa-er k’ɛnɛ ha̧ wa,
wen mi ee mɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ er'nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bíí gima ha̧ GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́n GASA WAN,
wen nɛ́ a̧ a̧ kpasi o wisan
sɛn ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Fom a̧ bá wese nɛ̀ wa kòó nɛ‘m!
Ká Sɔ̧ tok de yoŋgo zu wese
nɛ̀ nàà kɔ‘m kòó nɛ‘m na.
Fom a̧ bá wi nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen koa'm ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m
ha̧ nɛ̀ desee ha̧ a̧‘e:
«Mɛ kpaa be-wiwii!»
Wi’ɛi a̧ dúk hee o ye nɛ̀ GASA WAN ɗaŋa,
nɛ̀‘i beka nyɛm mɛ ɗafi woyo ɓɔna ga.
Mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ a̧ a̧ zíí nɛ́ aia-nú ko bíí,
ɓɛɛ mɛ bu-wese a̧ a̧ zíí nɛ́ o gayamɔ-biro.
Wen ge Sɔ̧ de so ha̧‘m mɛ fe
ɓɔn kɔ̧́ zaŋ nàà kɔ‘m na ge?
Hegɔ‘i, nàà kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ duk so nɛ́ pɛsi-fio kɔ‘m,
bó nɛ́ zaŋ-aa tɛ̀ɛ́ sɔk ha̧ a̧ mɛ ko'm na.
Wen ge sa wa koa'm,
ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ bɔnɛ in dita-see,
in ha̧ ziimɔ mɛ ba'm ti o bíí wese lɛŋ ge?
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Sedesias toma nɛ̀ Pasehur bem ko Malkia in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sefania bem ko Masɛya mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ak mgbara mɔ zu yɛ in GASA WAN, wen Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ bi nɛ ɛɛ. Ŋmafara GASA WAN tɛ gbak yɛ nɛ̀ ŋma mɔɔ-kifi kɔ‘i, nɛ̀ tɛ de ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ gbin gbagari-biro yak.»
Jeremii kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sedesias nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
See-am tɛ kur, ɓɛɛ mi nɛ̀ tɛ‘m tɛ nyɛi̧ ŋga er-am mɛ bi'nɛ́ tɛ nyimsea in tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ kum o bíí tɛ ye'i, o bíí gú nɛ̀ o saɗi; nɛ́ ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa a̧ tɛ kum wa!

Nɛ́ mi, GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, mi tɛ e Sedesias wannu Juda in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí saaye’ɛ nɛ̀ zɛɛ-geŋa tɛ gbɛ wa ɓɛɛ wa fee fio gba-paa in kaɓa mbɛt’ɛ. Mi tɛ e wa er wannu Babilɔŋ, er o wisɛn kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kíí mɛ gbɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kum wa nɛ̀ ŋma be deako kóó tikiɗi beka bo yí-wa na.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ko o wi nɔ'ɔ, mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e ndé, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ e h’ɛnɛ mɛ hok mgbara fio in duka-kpasa.
Wi nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ ye’ɛ tɛ fe nɛ̀ fio zɛɛ-geŋa, gba-paa in kaɓa. Wi nɛ̀ tɛ gbo kɔ‘i sitɛ o be Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ kɛr'nɛ‘i tɛ kpasi, a̧ beka fe na.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ! Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi zik tɛ‘m sitɛ ye’ɛ, bo nɛ wen dee demɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen dee ŋgamɔ. Mi tɛ e a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ wee sɛnɛ.»
Ɛ́nɛ́ be nutua ko wannu Juda,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN.
Ɛ́nɛ́ be nútua ko David,
wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita nɛ̀ yuwar-a mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí wi-bɔnɛ
ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko wi-nyɔŋ-yí-wí!
Kà bó hegɔ na,
nyimsea kɔ‘m tɛ kur zu'nɛ́ hee wee ga,
nɛ̀ tɛ dar yaknɛ,
ŋma wi bia-a yinɛ beka bo na,
wen o ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mi tɛ ba zu'm dúk nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́,
o wi-ɔ tɛ hira-fara zu yɔka-ta nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e,
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ zir
mɛ ye si ɗoŋ‘nɛ bo na wó'ɛ.
Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in'nɛɛ
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom k’ɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ pi̧ wee kɔ̧ kombo
nɛ tɛ dɔ mɔ lɛŋ a nù.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɛ̀ zír si nutua ko wannu Juda,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ a̧‘e: Wannu Juda nɛ̀ duk zu damti-wan ko David, mɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN; mɛ́ in o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ ɓir nɛ̀ o nú tua nɔ'ɔ.

Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN h’ɛnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu o bíí nɛ̀ yuwar-a, de nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ de-a; ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí o wi-bɔnɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o wi-nyɔŋ-yí-wí; k’ɛ́nɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o gɛnɛ, o be-oi in o ko-gera na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ o bíí nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè sɛn fara’ɛ na mbɛt.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ o wan k’ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu damti-wan ko David siti, daŋ nɛ̀ o keekee in o nyaŋa; wa in o gasawi bá nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ-wa tɛ duk tɛ yea-a nɛ̀ o nú tua nɔ'ɔ siti.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii o wen nɔ'ɔ na, mi kana mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ‘m, tua’ɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ geemɔ.»
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu o be nútua ko wannu Juda:
«Kóó mɛ duka so yí‘m hee Galad,
kóó hee ŋma kaya Libaŋ ga,
mi kana mɔ‘e,
mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kifi nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí beka de ye sɛnɛ na.
Mi tɛ tom o ŋma bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ mɛ,
kóó o ndé nɛ̀ boi kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wa gɔma o gba de
pi̧ wee sɛnɛ bíí wee lɛŋ.
«Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí tɛ o tugun bíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ ɓir ká̧ ye'i, wa tɛ tɔ̧ sitɛ o ŋmaa'e: ‹Wen ge sa GASA WAN dee ɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔm mɔ'ɔ in gasa ye’ɛ hegɔ'ɛ ge?›
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kifi nú‘e: ‹Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa ee yuwar
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ hi̧i̧ wannu Josias nɛ̀ fea na!
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ko nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ wen zu a̧ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ wa ba yaknɛ‘i ɛ̧,
wen a̧ beka zɔk nù nɛ̀ wa kòó a̧ sɛnɛ woyo ɓɔna.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu Salum, bem ko Josias wannu Juda nɛ̀ ɔɔ so wan oi dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa baa so yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ beka pii ɗoŋ ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ fe ɓɔn fara nɛ̀ wa ba a̧ si sɛnɛ‘i, a̧ beka zɔk nù'ɛ nɛ̀ yí-a ɓɔna.»
«Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu wi nɛ̀ de tua-wan kɔ‘i nɛ̀ yuwar-ɔramɔ,
nɛ̀ de tua kɔ‘i zu ŋmaa nɛ̀ yuwar-nyɔŋa-yí-bíí,
nɛ̀ mɔi o ŋma-a de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ a̧ sɔɔ géè,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yoɓi mɔɔ-oi-tom ha̧ wa na.
Wi’ɛi'e ndé: wi de nɛ́ gasa tua kɔ‘i,
e nɛ̀ o bɛr-aa mɛ ŋgɔn nɛ̀ pɛsa-a;
wi a nɛ o woi-aa, ɗafi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ̀
sɔ̧ nɛ̀ gbɛ̧-mɔ ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt.
Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ usi'e mɛ nɛ́ wan,
tɛ hoka
Dáà kɔ-mɛ nyɔŋa so mɔ,
nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ, gɔn nɛ̀ kita nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
de nɛ̀ demɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa de duka-a.
A̧ yora so ɗoŋ o wi-bɔnɛ in o wisan,
ɓɛɛ mɔ duk nɛ̀ de-a.
Bíí nɛ̀ de mɔ hegɔ usi'e
wi’ɛi iŋa'm nɛ̀ de-a.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
O zɔkamɔ kɔ-mɛ in taamɔ kɔ-mɛ,
nɛ́ wen kpaa yí-mɔ kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ,
gbɛ nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ wen bo zu wa na nɛ̀ saka-yí,
de nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgai hee saɗi ga.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Yoyakim bem ko Josias wannu Juda nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Wi beka ai nú,
bíí nɛ̀ gima-fio zu a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Oee mi wa, nya'm!
Oee mi wa, boko-nya'm!› na.
Wi beka hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ zu a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Oee mi wa, wan kɔ‘m!
Oee mi wa, wannu!› na mbɛt.
Wi tɛ gun a̧
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i gun nɛ̀ tuifuu’ɛ ga,
wa tɛ gbur a̧ gbonɛ
nɛ̀ nú garo Jerusalɛm
pi̧ taŋ si zan mɛ.»
«Jerusalɛm, mɛ̀ dáŋ si zu kaya Libaŋ
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ,
mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ nɛ̀ hee ger si Basaŋ mɛ,
mɛ̀ híɗí mɔ̀ dam fara lɛŋ;
wen o wi-kɔ̧-mɛ kuma kaɗi.
Mi gaia so mɛ tɛ de ŋgimbi,
ɓɛɛ mɛ kɔ̧ zia-a na.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ mɛ dea nɛ̀ bem mɛ tɛnɛ:
mɛ zii so wen nú‘m na.
Gba-búk tɛ kai o wi-duk-zu-mɛ,
gú nɛ̀ o wi-kɔ̧-mɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ si gɔni-nù mɛ.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, foe in búù tɛ ba mɛ zu ɗaŋ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ̀ duk so mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ de-a zu Libaŋ mɛ‘i’ɛ,
nɛ̀ dee so yáá kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧́ gbatui,
mɛ tɛ gɔfi mɔ tɛ bɔnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ kpa mɛ,
hee bɔnɛ nɛ̀ okoo zɔk tɛ ŋgimbi kóó bem’ɛ ga.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, kà Konia bem ko Joakim wannu Juda duk so nɛ́ wele-pi̧-er-am mɛ wiiko, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpɔ̧i̧ a̧ pi̧ nù.
Mi ee mɛ er o wi nɛ̀ kíí mɛ gbɛ mɛ, o bíí wan nɛ̀ mɛ yu dɔ zu nɛ̀ wee'i; mi ee mɛ er Babilɔŋ in er Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ in o wi-biro kɔ‘i, o be Kaldee.
Mi tɛ ndak ɛnɛ in nàá nɛ kòò mɛ si ŋma nù nɛ wa ko'nɛ́ sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ fe sɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɔ̧ nyɛmna mɛ si ɗoŋ si nù k’ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgai-sii-ɗoŋ beka bo na!»
O bíí tɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Konia nɛ́ ŋma nyɛ́k nɛ̀ gbaa, nɛ̀‘i kɔ̧ ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀‘i beka de nɛ tom ɓɔna nde? Wen ge wi ndaka a̧ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ si ŋma nù nɛ wa iŋ na ge nde?»
Ho! Nù kɔ‘m, nù kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN.

Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ zu wi’ɛ hee bíí nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ bem ga na. A̧ nɛ́ ŋma bem nɛ̀ sɔnti ɗaŋa. Ŋma bezaŋ-aa nɛ̀ tɛ ɔ wan zu damti-wan ko David, sɛka bé dè ɓɛɛ ká a̧ ɔɔ wan zu nù ko Juda bo na.»
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: «Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o ɗaŋ wi-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ e o mɔ-dai kɔ‘m pɛsi yɔ nɛnɛ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ mɔi̧ o oi gíí mɔ-dai kɔ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ n'am pɛsa so wa si sɛnɛ; mi tɛ kai wa pii kɔ̧̀ ɓoramɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa tɛ nyɛɓi sɛnɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ e o wi-dai-mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ dai wa nɛ̀ de-a, nɛ̀ kíì beka de wa ɓɔna, wa beka zɔk bɔnɛ na, ŋma mgbara wa nɛ̀ beka kɔ̧ sara na beka bo na!»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ŋma ŋgimbi mi tɛ hok ŋma mgbák
ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɔ wan nɛ̀ de-a;
a̧ tɛ gɔn kita nɛ̀ de-a
in nɛ̀ yuwar-a tɛ nù'ɛ.
Ŋgimbi-wan kɔ̧-a̧, Juda tɛ kpasi,
ɓɛɛ
nin nɛ̀ wa tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wan'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
‹GASA WAN, wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a in yɛɛ!›
«Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. O bíí tɛ kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin-am tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹GASA WAN nɛ̀ foo o be
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kan mɔ‘e: ‹GASA WAN nɛ̀ foo o bezaŋ
See-am gɔna, tɛ‘m lɛŋ nak nak;
mi duk hee wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ baa ga,
wen GASA WAN,
wen zu o sa̧a̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Nù'ɛ duna nɛ̀ o wi-gasi-géé-sɔ̧;
mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ ɓɛɛ,
ŋgai tɛ-wa nɛ́ dee mɔ nɛ̀ nyɛm yí-mɔɔ-dee na;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ fom mɛ ba nù'ɛ;
gba̧a̧-mɔ nɛ̀ dee ha̧ mɔ mɛ kor
dam fara-dai-mɔ lɛŋ'ɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«O
in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ́ o wi-ɗaŋ;
mi zɔk kànà ɗaŋ kɔ-wa
hɔ kɔ̧́ Tua kɔ‘m mɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa yuwar kɔ-wa ba dɛ́rɛ́;
wa tɛ yɔ mɔ zaŋ tum, ɓɛɛ wa yoo nù.
Mi tɛ fo bɔnɛ pi̧ zu wa,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ kifi nú zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ;
o
n'am zɔka deemɔ kɔ-wa ha̧a̧ ɗaŋsee ha̧‘m nyɛmna:
wa duka mɛ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Bal,
mgbɔ nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ‘m
Ɓɛɛ tɛ̀ ko o
mi zɔka ŋma ŋgamɔ tɛ-wa.
Wa ndak nɛ́ ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧,
de nɛ̀ zɔm ndela ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
wa ir nɛ́ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ siti,
nɛ̀ wa nyɛm mɛ e ɗaŋ kɔ-wa duk na.
Kɔ‘m, deemɔ kɔ-wa yak ŋmaa in o bíí Sɔdɔm na;
o bíí saaye'i hɔɔ ŋmaa in bíí Gɔmɔr.»
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
zu o
«Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ paŋmɔ,
mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ ɔ̧nɔ̧
wen ɗaŋmɔ gboo nɛ̀ tɛ̀
o
pɛsi nɛnɛ zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«K’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛm nɛ́ wen
nɛ̀ o
Wa ɔr nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́,
mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ duk nɛ́ taamɔ kɔ-wa mɛ tɛ-wa;
bo nɛ wen nɔ‘i tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ̀‘m na.
Wa tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ e wen kɔ‘m tɛ geemɔ‘e:
‹Ŋma mɔɔ-de'nɛ́ bo na!›
Ɓɛɛ war ko o wi nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ dee ŋgazu siti,
wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e:
‹Ŋma ŋgamɔ mɛ hɔ zu'nɛ́ bo na!›
Nɛ́ o mgbara ó
a̧ zia mgbak wen mɛ nú‘m o?
Wi nɛ̀ zia wen kɔ‘m sa̧ zèr nɛ́ o?
Nɛ́ o'o yeŋa zèr tɛ wen kɔ‘m
ɓɛɛ ká zii mgbara-a o?»
Gba-búk ko GASA WAN,
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ hɔa;
ŋga búk'i a̧ ɓoɓi'i,
ɓoɓi nɛnɛ zu o wi nɛ̀ wen baa.
Nyimsea ko GASA WAN beka ga̧ na
hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa dee kànà mɔ n'aa taa so mɛ de'i.
Nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa'i tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ zii nɛ̀ mgbara-a.
«Mi tom kɔ‘m o
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ nɛ́ kɔ-wa'i;
mi tɔ̧ kɔ‘m ŋma wen ha̧ wa na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ tɔ̧ kɔ-wa wen yaknɛ‘i!
Kà wa a̧ zii so mgbák wen kɔ‘m gáà,
wa tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ so nɛ́ wen kɔ‘m'i ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Wa tɛ̀ɛ́ de so ha̧ wa mɛ e ɗaŋ naŋanɔ
in o ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa duk.»
«Mi nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ ɓɔn ti'm hɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓɛɛ nde?
Bo nɛ mi nɛ́ Sɔ̧,
Wan nɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧ na nde?
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
Kóó nɛ́ ŋma bíí a̧ hu̧si sɛn ŋma fara mɛ,
mi nyɛm mɛ zɔk a̧ na nde?
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Bo nɛ mi duna mbɔɗɔnu in yiwese mbɛt na nde?»
«Mi zia mɔ nɛ̀ o
Wa tɛ kaɗi ɔra dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ̀ géé wen mɛ gese ge? Nɛ́ ge taamɔ ge a̧ a̧a̧ zu o
Wa ta kɔ-wa'e ndé, o zu nɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o ŋmaa'i, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen dea-a ha̧ tɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m mɛ bi ɗoŋ-am, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ o dáà kɔ-wa bìì so nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nin-am wen zu Bal kɔ-wa ga.
Ka
«Ka'i zaŋ zɔ̧ nɛ̀ gba̧a̧ alkamaari na!»
GASA WAN'e ndé,
Wen kɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in wee
ká bá nɛ̀ dɔnɔ-mbaŋ-ta.
GASA WAN'e ndé: «Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in o
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in o
GASA WAN hee ndé: «Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in o
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Kà ŋma bíí mgbara o wi nɔ'ɔ, kóó nɛ́ ŋma
Kóó nɛ́
Wen nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ak ŋmaa sɛnɛ in o ŋmaa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Kifa-nú ko GASA WAN hee ge? Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ ge?›
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko tui ko GASA WAN, k’ɛ́nɛ́ sa nin mɔ‘i ɓɔna. Tui ko o ndé tɛ duk nɛ́ wen kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a, wen ɛnɛ ɗaŋ nɛ́ wen ko Sɔ̧ wan nɛ duk kpasa, GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧
GASA WAN'e: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu tui ko GASA WAN n'am dora'nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧a-a'i, nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ,
mi tɛ ba'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i ba nɛ̀ tui’ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ mi siŋa'nɛ́ pi̧ nù, ɛnɛ in ye n'am ha̧a̧ h’ɛnɛ in o dáà k’ɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ búù zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; ziimɔ k’ɛnɛ beka kaɗi na; ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi beka bi ɗoŋ-aa na mbɛt.»

GASA WAN dee ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk gɛsɛ waya-mbɔra yiitoo nɛ̀ ya katɛ ŋmaa ti Tua ko GASA WAN. Mɔ‘i dee so ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa so nɛ̀ Yekonia bem ko Joakim wannu Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm si nù kɔ‘i. A̧ kaia so Yekonia in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-dui-mɔ gú nɛ̀ o mgbák wi-iŋ-tom lɛŋ si sɛn Babilɔŋ.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ gɛsɛ kpɔk’ɛ duna so nɛ̀ o gba de ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ waya-mbɔra, ɓɛɛ ɓii ɛ̧ɛ̧ kpɔk’ɛ duna so kɔ‘i nɛ̀ o ɗaŋ waya-mbɔra nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ na.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ zɔk ge, Jeremii?»
Mi kifa nú: «Mi zɔk nɛ o waya-mbɔra,
o wan nɛ̀ duk nɛ̀ de-a nyɛmna,
in o wan nɛ̀ de na nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ na.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Yí‘m tɛ duk ɓɔn ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai wa pii ɗoŋ tɛ nù'ɛ. Mi tɛ mbo wa, ɓɛɛ mi beka gbin wa a nù ɓɔna. Mi tɛ gun wa, ɓɛɛ mi beka zuɗi wa yinɛ ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ wa, nɛ̀ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ am; mi nɛ́ GASA WAN, wa tɛ duk dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa. Wa tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m nɛ̀ see-wa lɛŋ.»

GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀‘i de nɛ̀ o ɗaŋ waya-te-mbɔra nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ na, nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧‘m tɛ de nɛ̀ Sedesias wannu Juda, o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ in oi bíí Jerusalɛm, in oi o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ nù'ɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o wan nɛ ɓɔna nú Egiptɛ mɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de mɔ ba nú-wa nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ fara lɛŋ n'am tɛ pɛsi wa si sɛnɛ, o bíí tɛ zɛkɛɗi wa, e nɛ̀ wa nɛ̀ tua-wen, ɓɛɛ o dɔka bíí tɛ da̧ ŋmaa, be nɛ̀ mɔ a zu o ŋmaa nɛ̀ nin-wa.
Mi tɛ pi̧ gba-paa zu wa, kaɓa tɛ ba wa, in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa tɛ kum wa yinɛ zu nù n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ wa in o dáà kɔ-wa mbɛt'i.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN ee nú Jeremii mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be Juda tɛ naar pɛ-wan ko Yoyakim bem ko Josias wannu Juda nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Duka nɛ́ kuti pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ.
Wen'i nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ Jeremii
ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ ɓu-zua-taar pɛ-wan ko Josias bem ko Amɔŋ wannu Juda hɔ sɔsɔɔ. «Kinii dee pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar a̧‘m tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN ee nú‘m mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ takaɗi, ɛ́nɛ́ zii na.
GASA WAN toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, o

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛnɛ‘e, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí ɗaŋ duka-a k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí ɗaŋ er deemɔ k’ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ nù nɛ̀ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ h’ɛnɛ in o dáà k’ɛnɛ nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya hi̧i̧ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o ŋma sɔ̧, mɛ gu nù ti wa gasi nɛ̀ wa na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ káɗí tu̧u̧ see-am nɛ̀ o ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi beka pi̧ ŋma ŋgamɔ zu'nɛ́ na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Ɛ́nɛ́ zii wen nú‘m na, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tu̧ nɛ́ see-am, dak nɛ̀ bɔnɛ pi̧ zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ o ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛnɛ.
«Nɛ́ zu mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧‘e: Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbo zu tɛ wen kɔ‘m na ga,

mi tɛ de ha̧ dukbíí mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, mɛ kur; ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ tik zu nù'ɛ gú nɛ̀ o bíí sɛnɛ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o tugun bíí nɛ̀ ya zik wa lɛŋ. Mi tɛ kum'nɛ́ in wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nù k’ɛnɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ ɓir fara'i tɛ e er nú tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: Ho! Ɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔ'ɔ nɛ́ gba gee! Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Wi beka zii géé gima-gbaŋa, kóó
Nù‘i nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi in ŋga-gbárà, ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ tɛ de tom-bara ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɔ‘i bé tɛ̀ɛ́ dam kaɗi, mi tɛ kifi er ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ in tugun bíí‘i ká bá nɛ̀ nù ko o be Kaldee zu o ɗaŋ gbɛɛ-zu kɔ-wa. Mi tɛ de ha̧ fara'i mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋgamɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ zu nù'ɛ. Wen'i lɛŋ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen'i a̧ Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu o tugun bíí lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o bíí Babilɔŋ, wa tɛ de bara ha̧ o ŋma zɔm gasa tugun bíí in o ŋma ŋga wannu; mi tɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋ tom nɛ̀ er-wa dea mɛ tik zu wa si ɗoŋ woyo.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Wa tɛ nɔ, zu-wa tɛ zik, ɓɛɛ naŋ-wa tɛ mbali ŋmaa tɛ zɔka gba-paa n'am tɛ pi̧ mgbara wa.»
Mi baa ɗele'i er GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mi nɛ́ɛ̀ ha̧ ha̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ n'aa toma'm sitɛ wa.

Mi ee dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i nú Jerusalɛm in o gasa ye nù Juda ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi lɛŋ, wen dea-a ha̧ nù kɔ-wa mɛ ɗaŋ kifi géé bɛɛ-oi, nɛ̀ tɛ de ha̧ o wi-ɓir-war nɛ̀ tɛ hɔ hi̧i̧ mɛ mbɛr yí-see nɛ̀ kíì; fara'i tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù nɛ̀ o bíí tɛ ba e tɛ mɔɔ-fom ŋmà-wí. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔk yi-ɛɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i!
Ɓɛɛ kalemɔ‘i tik zu o ŋma tugun bíí mbɛt: Faraɔŋ, wannu Egiptɛ, in o gasawi kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o be-wan in o bíí nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ;
o gɔni-dùk nɛ̀ zaŋa ŋmaa, o wannu Us lɛŋ, in o wannu Filistii lɛŋ, wannu Askelɔŋ, wannu Gaza, wannu Ekrɔŋ in o oi bíí Asdod;
o be Edɔm, o be Mɔab in o be Amɔŋ;
o wannu Tir in o wannu Sidɔŋ lɛŋ, o wannu mɛ kur gba-tɔp lɛŋ,
o be saaye Dedan, Tema, Buz in o wi-kpui-ka̧-yí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɔ ŋga-gbárà mɛ;
o wannu Arab lɛŋ in o wannu ko o gɔni-dùk nɛ̀ zaŋa ŋmaa nɛ̀ ɔ ŋga-gbárà mɛ;
o wannu Zimri, o wannu Elam in o wannu Mɛd lɛŋ;
o wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn lɛŋ, o wan nɛ̀ nyɛi na, in o wan nɛ̀ ɔ nyɛi̧a mbɛt, ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-wan zu nù lɛŋ hegɔ ɗoŋ ŋmaa, ɗoŋ ŋmaa nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wannu Sesak
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Kà wa nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ baa ɗele-dɔ̧ɔ̧'ɛ er-mɛ mɛ nɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a'e, ɛnɛ tɛ nɔ kànà.

GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a: Mi tɛ ku̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ ɗaŋa ye nɛ̀‘i saa so nin-am sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ‘e mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ yɔɔ zu'nɛ́? Bo na, ɛnɛ beka gbo ɗɔɔ-aa na, wen mi foo gba-paa pi̧ zu o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ kaɗi!
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ o wen nɔ'ɔ oi nú‘m lɛŋ si zu wa, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e ndé:
«GASA WAN mgbimgbi nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ;
a̧ duk kɔ̧̀ sa̧a̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tuɓi nɛnɛ.
A̧ a̧ tuɓi'i nɛ̀ mbetɛ,
a̧ a̧ tuɓi si zu nù kɔ̧-a̧‘i,
zu o bíí zu nù lɛŋ
hee gayamɔ ko o wi-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧
in o ŋmaa mɛ e see tɛ tom ga.
Gitimɔ‘i hɔɔ nduti-nù lɛŋ;
GASA WAN ku̧u̧ naŋ gɔna kita zu o tugun bíí;
a̧ gɔn nɛ kita zu mur-tɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ̀ kita tika tɛ fe nú gba-paa.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ŋgamɔ‘i tɛ́ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk dam lɛŋ;
gasa gba-búk kura nɛ̀ nduti-nù mɛ.»
Wese'i, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ zu-zan gɔm ndaa-zan mɛ, wi beka hi̧i̧ fio ko o bíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN kuma na, wi beka kai wa mɛ gun na mbɛt; wa tɛ ɓuk kifi nɛ́ géé ɓukamɔ mbulɛɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́fí mɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ o gasawi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ, ai nɛ̀ nú.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kín tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ nù, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-dai-mɔ!
Ŋgimbi k’ɛnɛ hɔɔ ha̧ wa mɛ gɔn'nɛ́ kaɗi;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ yambali ɗaŋ hee o gba de nyɛk
nɛ̀ tik nù ɓɛɛ ká gbaa ɗɛ́sɛ́-ɗɛ́sɛ́'ɛ ga.
Fara-hu̧sa-a bo wen o wi-dai-mɔ ɓɔna;
fara-yu-mɔ si sɛnɛ bo wen wa ɓɔna mbɛt.
Wi zii nɛ́
wen GASA WAN ɗaŋ nɛ́ fara-dai-mɔ kɔ-wa.
O ɓoramɔ nɛ̀ duna so nɛ̀ o mɔ-dai
ya sélélé ɗɔɔ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN.
Wi tɛ tɔ̧‘e mɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa
in ŋma dila nɛ̀ kura yak e di̧i̧ kɔ‘i duk ga.
Nù kɔ-wa ɗaŋa kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà
tɛ gba-paa nɛ̀ de ko na,
ɗɔɔ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN.
Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yoyakim, bem ko Josias ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan zu nù Juda, a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen’ɛ ha̧ Jeremii:

«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ mɛ: Mɛ̀ yór nú zala Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen lɛŋ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i zu o bíí saaye Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ́ tɛ̀ mɛ gu nù kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e ŋma wen kpɔk ɓɔn na.
Ŋmafara wa tɛ zii wen'i, ɓɛɛ kà wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ ee ɗaŋ yuwar nɛ̀ wa ba'i dúk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e taamɔ ŋgamɔ n'am taa so mɛ pi̧ zu wa'i dúk.
«Mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu tɛ usamɔ kɔ‘m h’ɛnɛ na,
k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m ná, o
mi tɛ gbin tua’ɛ a nù hee mɔ'ɔ n'am dee so in Silo ga, ɓɛɛ ye’ɛ tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù nɛ̀ o tugun bíí zu nù lɛŋ tɛ ba e tɛ mɔɔ-fom ŋmà-wí.»
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Jeremii kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ kaɗi, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o gasawi ko o bíí Juda zia mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa daŋ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ tua-wan si kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN, ba fara sɛn nú Mbe Nú Tua ko GASA WAN.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasawi in dukbíí lɛŋ: «Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tom am ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ wen n’ɛnɛ zia'i zu Tua’ɛ in zu ye’ɛ oi nú-a.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí yuwar duka-a k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é er ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛnɛ duk; ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí sara nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ sa nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ e ŋgamɔ n'aa taa so mɛ de in'nɛɛ‘i duk.
Kɔ‘m, kinii mi a̧a̧ er'nɛ́. Mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de nɛ‘m lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé, kà yuwar-a á̧ sa̧a̧ tɛ‘nɛ́.

Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ‘e ndé, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ gbɛa'm, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ in ye’ɛ gú nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ ɔ sɛnɛ lɛŋ tɛ tui tɔk tɛ-wi nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè, wen nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ toma'm tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘nɛ́ ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ wen nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ h’ɛnɛ mɛ zii nɛ̀ mbetɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o gasawi in dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o
O ŋma
«Michee be Mɔrɛsɛt nɛ̀ dee so tom tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi ko Ezekias wannu Juda tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ giiwi Juda lɛŋ‘e: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Jerusalɛm tɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi,
ɓɛɛ zu kaya nɛ̀ Tua ko GASA WAN duk sɛnɛ
tɛ kifi nɛ́ da̧a̧-mɔ.›

Ezekias wannu Juda in dukbíí kɔ‘i gbɛɛ so a̧? Bo nɛ wa yuu kíí GASA WAN nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ ga̧a̧-see ha̧ a̧ na nde? GASA WAN ee ŋgamɔ n'aa taa so mɛ de in wa'i duk. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́, k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛ wi’ɛ pi̧ nù sɔɔ géè, ɛɛ tɛ kpa bɔnɛ!»
Ŋma bíí mbɛt duka so tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen oi nú GASA WAN; nin-a nɛ́ Uria bem ko Semaya be Kiriat-Yearim. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen mbɛt zu ye Jerusalɛm in zu nù Juda hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Jeremii tɔ̧a'i ga.
Wannu Yoyakim in o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ gú nɛ̀ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ zia wen nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa kii mɛ gbɛ a̧. Nɛ̀ Uria zia mɔ‘i, kíì dee a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak si Egiptɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu Yoyakim toma Elnataŋ bem ko Akbɔr in o ŋma bíí nɛnɛ ɗoŋ-aa si Egiptɛ mɛ.
Wa baa Uria nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ, mgbɔ a̧ piinɛ ha̧ wannu Joakim, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ ba wɔr-aa pi̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ fara-gun o géé bíí.
Ɓɛɛ ko Jeremii, nɛ́ Ahikam bem ko Safaŋ a̧ yora ɗoŋ-aa, ɓɛɛ o bíí kpa yuwar mɛ gbɛ a̧ na.
Tɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɔɔ wan ko Sedesias bem ko Josias wannu Juda, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii.
Gba̧a̧-wen'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mɛ̀ ɓáɓí o gba̧a̧-pɛr in mɛ̀ sɛ́k o kpàŋá, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ káí a gun ger-mɛ.

Mɛ̀ tóm o ŋma kpàŋá nɔ‘i ha̧ wannu Edɔm, wannu Mɔab, in wannu ko o be Amɔŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ wannu Tir in Sidɔŋ mbɛt; mɛ̀ tóm mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ wa nɛ̀ o gasawi kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa toma pii tɛ Sedesias wannu Juda sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Mɛ tɛ e tom nú wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ o wan kɔ-wa'e ndé: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Nɛ́ mi a̧ dee nù in o bíí gú nɛ̀ o saɗi nɛ̀ ya zaŋ-aa tɛ zɔm ŋgai kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ wi nɛ̀ see-am kɔ̧a̧.
Kinii, mi ee o nú nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko wi-de-tom kɔ‘m Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ; kóó nɛ́ o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt, mi ee wa er-a ha̧ wa mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧.

O tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ de tom-bara ha̧ a̧, in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o be-koo-aa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ nɛ̀ nù kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o ŋma ŋga tugun bíí in o ŋma wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ mbɛt tɛ de tom ha̧ wa.»

GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Kà ŋma tugun bíí, kóó nɛ́ mɔɔ-wan bɛ̧ dee tom ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ, bɛ̧́ nɛ́ pí̧í̧ kpàŋà kɔ̧-a̧ ger-wi, mi tɛ de ŋmaa in wa nɛ̀ gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa, hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ kum wa lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛnɛ, wen nɛ̀ o
wen mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ‘i nɛ́ ndela; tɛ mɔ‘i, wa tɛ de h’ɛnɛ mɛ duk nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ̀ nù k’ɛnɛ. Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kuma lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Ɓɛɛ kà ŋma tugun bíí kpɛk mɛ pi̧ kpàŋà ko wannu Babilɔŋ ger-wi mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧, mi tɛ e a̧ mɛ duk tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ gɛ́ɗɛ́k; a̧ tɛ de tom tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ duka ɓɔn hi̧i̧.
«Ɓɛɛ ko Sedesias, wannu Juda, mɔ n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Ɛ́nɛ́ in dukbíí kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ kpàŋà ko wannu Babilɔŋ ger'nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé tom ha̧ a̧ in dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, h’ɛnɛ mɛ kpasi.
Wen ge mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kum, mɛ in dukbíí kɔ-mɛ ɗɔɔ gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so zu tugun bíí nɛ̀ tɛ bɛ̧ dee tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ ge?
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɛk wen ko o
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tom wa na, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ nin-am h’ɛnɛ‘i nɛ́ ndela. Hegɔ, mi tɛ pɛsi'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kum, ɛnɛ in o
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Wen n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o bíí nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɛk wen ko o
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpɛk wen kɔ-wa na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé k’ɛnɛ nɛ́ tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ kpásí. Wen ge ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ bɔɔ ha̧ ye’ɛ mɛ kifi nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi ge?
Kà o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ o kpasa
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ zu o mbiŋ-tua, zu gba-kpánà in zu o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà ká bá nɛ̀ oi o nyɛk lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɓɔna sɛn saaye’ɛ,

(zu o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ee so duk ŋgimbi n'aa kaia so nɛ̀ Yekonia bem ko Yoyakim wannu Juda ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi Juda in Jerusalɛm lɛŋ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm si Babilɔŋ), nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: Wa tɛ kai o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ si Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɓɔn hi̧i̧ hɔ wese n'am tɛ ta mɔ wen wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ fo wa daŋnɛ pii ɗoŋ pii fara’ɛ woyo.»
Tɛ kale pɛ‘i, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e tɛ naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias wannu Juda, tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, Hanania
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Pɛ yiitoo’ɛ beka kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ mi kaia o nyɛk kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ kaia so yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ‘i pii ɗoŋ fara’ɛ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo mbɛt: Mi tɛ kai Yekɔnia bem ko Joakim wannu Juda in o be Juda nɛ̀ wa kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ pii ɗoŋ, wen mi gbina kpàŋà ko wannu Babilɔŋ kaɗi.»
Jeremii
A̧ kifa nú tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Mɔ a̧ dé kànà hegɔ! GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ‘i! GASA WAN a̧ yór ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a'i ha̧ o nyɛk kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧, in o bíí nɛ̀ wa kaia so yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ mɛ pii ɗoŋ fara’ɛ woyo.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zíí war wen n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ in ha̧ dukbíí'ɛ lɛŋ:
O
Kà ŋma
Ɓɛɛ Hanania

oi nú Sɔ̧ Hanania tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ nɛ̀ yí dukbíí lɛŋ: «Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Nɛ́ hegɔ pɛ yiitoo’ɛ beka kaɗi na, mi tɛ gbin kpàŋà ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mi kpɔ̧i̧a yinɛ ger o tugun bíí lɛŋ.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Hanania'e, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ gbina kpàŋá-te yinɛ ga, mɛ̀ dé mbe-a nɛ̀ boi e oi-aa.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ‹Mi tɛ ndak mɛ zu nù yinɛ; mɛ tɛ fe mɛ pɛ'ɛ, wen nɛ́ mɛ́'ɛ usa yuwar dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN ha̧ o wi nɔ'ɔ.› »
Ɓɛɛ Hanania
Gba̧a̧-wen kalata nɛ̀
(Duka so nɛ́ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yekonia yuu nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm in nàà kɔ‘i, o kpàná, o gasawi Juda in Jerusalɛm, o wi-iŋ-dee-tom gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-nú tua yaka nɛnɛ‘i, á̧ Jeremii yɔra nɛ̀ kalata'i.)
A̧ ha̧a̧ kalata'i ha̧ Elɛasa bem ko Safaŋ in ha̧ Gɛmaria bem ko Hilkia nɛ̀ Sedesias wannu Juda toma so ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó o tua, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ́ sɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ wá o fɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ-aa.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá kóò, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kó o be-wiwii in o be-okoo. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí o boko-bem ha̧ o be-wiwii k’ɛnɛ mɛ ba nɛ̀ kóò; ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ o boko-bem k’ɛnɛ ha̧ o wíì ha̧ wa mɛ ko o bem mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kó dun nù fara n’ɛnɛ ya sɛnɛ‘i, k’ɛ́nɛ́ sir ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tá mɔ wen gasa-a ko ye n'am kaia'nɛ́ nɛ̀ bara a sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ́f'am wen-aa. Nɛ́ gasa-a k’ɛnɛ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ ye'i mɛ gasi siti mbɛt.
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a, o wen nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ nin-am'i nɛ́ ndela. Mi tom kɔ‘m wa na.
«Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ woyo'e: Kà pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo n'am gɔna ha̧ Babilɔŋ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ yak kaɗi, mi tɛ ta mɔ wen'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ

Kɔ‘m, mi iŋa o mɔ n'am ee zu-a mɛ de h’ɛnɛ. Mi ee zu mɔ ha̧ mɔɔ-nù k’ɛnɛ mɛ nɛ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ de-a, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ h’ɛnɛ mɛ zɔk nɛ́ bɔnɛ na. Mi tɛ de h’ɛnɛ mɛ kpa mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta, ɓɛɛ ha̧ mɔ mɛ ba nɛ̀ ɛnɛ tɛ duka-a k’ɛnɛ wan mɛ siti. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ sa sara pii tɛ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɛ mɛ kɔf'am am, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zii kɔfamɔ k’ɛnɛ.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kia'm, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpa'm, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kia'm nɛ̀ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e h’ɛnɛ mɛ hɔ kpa'm. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mi tɛ ɗafi'nɛ́ woyo, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai'nɛ́ piinɛ ɗoŋ pii fara n’ɛnɛ yaa so sɛnɛ yak nɛ̀ bara-biro'i.
«GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen’ɛ h’ɛnɛ wen ɛnɛ ta k’ɛnɛ‘e a̧ ha̧a̧ o
«Ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu nɛ̀ duk zu damti-wan ko David, in ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɔ saaye’ɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o nya'nɛ́ nɛ̀ wa kai nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ in'nɛɛ na nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.

Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Mi tɛ tom gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa pi̧ zu wa; mi tɛ de mɔ in wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i de nɛ̀ mɔ in waya-mbɔra nɛ̀ ɗaŋa ɓɛɛ nɛ̀‘i beka nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ na’ɛ ga.

Mi tɛ nasi wa yaknɛ nɛ̀ gba-paa, kaɓa, ká bá nɛ̀ ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa. Mɔ n'am tɛ de in wa'i tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o mɔɔ-wan zaŋnu lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ba wen tɛ-wa fom nɛ̀ o ŋmaa. Nù kɔ-wa tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ geemɔ nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o tugun bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí n'am tɛ pɛsi wa si mgbara wa'i tɛ e wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-da̧ nɛ̀ o ŋmaa,
wen wa zii wen kɔ‘m na. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mi toma so o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, o
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi n'am ndaka nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm si Babilɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN.
«Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Wa tɛ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-fom mgbara o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ wa kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ; wi tɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ in mɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee so in Sedesias bá nɛ̀ Akab nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ dɔɔ so yí wee’ɛ ga!›
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: Hegɔ, ŋgamɔ tɛ kpa wa zu mɔ nɛ̀ wa dea nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-zim mgbara o be
«Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛmaya be Nɛhalam nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ee mɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ duk oi Yehoyada wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ zɔk o mɔ kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧. Bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ ɗaŋ-a oi nú Sɔ̧, mɛ tɛ hɛr wa nɛ̀ nyak-boi, kóó pi̧i̧ káná-boi ger-wa.
Ɓɛɛ wen ge sa see-mɛ tu̧ zu Jeremii be Anatot nɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ mgbara'nɛ‘i na ge?
Wen a̧ yɔra kalata h’ɛɛ kinii sɛn Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ tɔ̧a'e, ɗoŋ duka-a k’ɛɛ tɛ bara-biro tɛ nyɛi, ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbó o tua, ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ́ sɛnɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ wá o fɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ mɔ-a.»
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Sɛfania tɔra kalata'i ha̧ Jeremii
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Mɛ̀ tóm tom’ɛ ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ wa kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro lɛŋ. Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN zu Sɛmaya be Nɛhalam nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ wen ɔr nɛ̀ ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká‘m tom kɔ‘m a̧ na ga,
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɛ kur zu a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa. Kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara o bii nútua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ nyɔŋ bɔtɛ n'am tɛ ha̧ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m bo na, wen a̧ usa ɗoŋ ŋgazu ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m. GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: Ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ ɗafi o be
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu
«Wi zii nɛ́ o
in gasa mɔɔ-kíì, ga̧a̧mɔ bo na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí mɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧‘i;
wiwii kòò so bem nɛti?
Mi zɔk o ŋga bíí lɛŋ a nɛ́ er zu zaŋ
hee okoo-ko-bem ga!
O saŋa-yí-wa duk fɛŋ nɛnɛ kpalili!
Oee ŋga bɔnɛ wa!
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ŋga ŋgimbi-bɔnɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ hɔa'i!
Ŋma wese nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in wese'i bo na.
War ko Jakob, nɛ́ ŋgimbi dita-see,
ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, wa tɛ kpasi wese'i.»
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a: «Wese'i, mi tɛ gbin kpàŋà ger-wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ŋman o nyak-hɛr-wa yinɛ mbɛt, nɛ̀ wa beka de bara ha̧ o gɛnɛ ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de tom ha̧‘m, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, in ha̧ David wannu n'am tɛ e mɛ ɔ wan zu wa.
Kɔ-mɛ Jakob wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
ká mɛ́ de kíì na,
ká mɛ́ e ha̧ tɛ-mɛ gbin na,
Mi tɛ kai'nɛ́ piiɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o nyɛi̧a fara,
mi tɛ gbo o bezaŋ‘nɛ́
tɛ́ nù nɛ̀ wa de bara sɛnɛ.
Jakob tɛ pii ɗoŋ,
nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ fo a̧ bo na;
a̧ tɛ duk mgbítíŋ,
ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ-a
beka bo na mbɛt.
Mi tɛ duk in'nɛɛ mɛ kpasi'nɛ́,
mi tɛ kum o tugun bíí lɛŋ
fara n'am pɛsa'nɛ́ dam sɛnɛ;
ɓɛɛ k’ɛnɛ, mi beka kum'nɛ́ na;
mi tɛ usi ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a h’ɛnɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ kpɔk beka yɔ‘nɛ́ na.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ!»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Gasa ŋgamɔ‘i beka yak zu'nɛ́ na;
o da̧i̧ k’ɛnɛ beka wíí na.
Ŋma bíí mɛ ye ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ bo na;
ŋma nyina nɛ̀ tɛ wìì gba-da̧i̧ k’ɛnɛ bo na mbɛt.
Tɛ o wi nɛ̀ de so wɔ-mɛ bìí ɗoŋ mɛ,
wa ta mɔ wen mɛ ɓɔna.
Mi gusa mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a ba nú-mɛ́,
hee nɛ́ ŋma wisɛn kɔ-mɛ a̧ gusa mɛ ga;
mi gaia mɛ zu o dɔka ɗaŋmɔ
in o yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ nɛ́ siti siti'i.
Zɔk, mɛ́ dúk hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ zu ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ kpaa mɛ;
da̧i̧ kɔ-mɛ beka wíí na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen o dɔka ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ
in wen o yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ nɛɛ siti siti'i
a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ fo ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu mɛ.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wa tɛ nyɔŋ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ nyɔŋa so mɛ;
wa tɛ kai o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara.
Wa tɛ ɗaŋ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa so mɛ;
mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ kai mɔ
er o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ kaia so mɔ er-mɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ ha̧ daama ha̧ mɛ
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai;
mi tɛ de ha̧ o da̧i̧ kɔ-mɛ mɛ wìì,
wen wa sa nin-mɛ‘e:
‹Ŋma okoo nɛ̀‘i ndaka pi̧ taŋ,›
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi tɛ ɗafi o tua-laa ko Jakob woyo,
ko de'm dee wen o fara-ɔɔ kɔ-wa.
Wa tɛ mbo o ye zu o kaya ɓɔn oi bɛɗɛ-wa,
o de tua lɛŋ tɛ duk tɛ de fara kɔ‘i woyo.
O bíí de nɛ́ mɔ zɔn nɛ̀ Sɔ̧;
wa gai nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ desee.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ dɔk siti,
nɛ̀ wa beka sir ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ́ kpasa bíí,
nɛ̀‘i beka e wa tɛ geemɔ ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ-wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa yaa so nɛti ga.
Wa tɛ mɔi kpa ŋmaa ti'm woyo,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ŋmaa in dukbíí nɛ̀ nasi wa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Nɛ́ ŋma bíí mɛ mgbara wa a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu wa,
nɛ́ ŋma bem nɛ̀ wa tɛ ko a̧ tɛ ɔ ɔɔ wan'i.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ‘m;
o'o tɛ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ‘m nɛ̀ ŋgai tɛ-wi o?
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ.»
Ŋga gba-búk ko GASA WAN
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ tuɓi,
ɓoɓi nɛnɛ zu o wi nɛ̀ wen a̧a̧ zu wa;
Ŋga wee nyimsea ko GASA WAN beka ga̧ na
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔɔ gba̧a̧;
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ mgbara-a nɛ̀ ɗoŋ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, mi tɛ duk nɛ́ Sɔ̧
ko o be nútua ko
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa tɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m.»
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mi tɛ zɔk dukbíí nɛ̀ gba-paa hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa
sɛn ŋga-gbárà mɛ‘i nɛ̀ de yí;
GASA WAN usa tɛ ha̧‘m
nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ
nɛ̀
nɛ́ zu
Mi tɛ ba mɛ e ŋgɔn,
ha̧ mɛ mɛ yor nɛ̀ de-a ɗɛŋgɛn woyo,
mɛ́, zɔŋa
mɛ tɛ kai o bi̧ɔ̧ a ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ mɛ daka o bíí a tɛ gbaŋa-tortɛ woyo.
Mɛ tɛ gun o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ zu o kaya Samarii woyo,
ɓɛɛ o wi-guna-a tɛ ɓi o waya-a.
Ŋma wese tɛ hɔ nɛ̀ o wi-pɛm-mɔ
tɛ hiɗi mɔ sa nɛ̀ mɔ si zu kaya Efraim tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr! Ɛ̀ɛ̀ dáŋ si
sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ!› »
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ súmbúrí Jakob nɛ̀ desee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k wan ko o tugun bíí nɛ̀ desee.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ súmbúrí a̧ nɛ̀ tortɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e,
GASA WAN gboo oi ndaa dukbíí kɔ‘i
Mi tɛ kai wa piinɛ
nɛ̀ nù mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ,
mi tɛ mɔi̧ wa piinɛ ɗoŋ
nɛ̀ o nduti-nù mɛ lɛŋ.
Mgbara wa'i, o wi-boma-yí,
o wi-kum, o nàá-zaŋ
ká bá nɛ̀ o nana-oi-kɔra mbɛt a̧a̧ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ mɔi ŋmaa tululu
nɔ ŋmaa sum-sum hegɔɔ piinɛ ɗoŋ.
Wa tɛ hɔ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ ŋgúr-ŋgúr hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ‘e:
‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛɛ!›
Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mgbɔ wa si kɔ̧́ gba de ga̧a̧ ɗɔŋgɔ,
nɛ̀ yuwar nɛ̀ wa beka kɔ̧ naŋ-wa sɛnɛ na.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi kifa duk nɛ́ dáà ko
ɓɛɛ Efraim kifi kɔ‘i duk nɛ́ kaya-bem kɔ‘m.
«O tugun bíí, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ wen'i ha̧ o bíí mɛ nyɛi̧a fara mɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, wi nɛ̀ pɛsa so
dam mgbii-zan naar mɔi̧ nɛ́ wa pii ɗoŋ;
a̧ pɛm nɛ̀ wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀
wi-dai-mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ o gii mɔ-dai kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
GASA WAN gɔna zu Jakob,
gbo nɛ̀ a̧ yinɛ er ŋma wan-ŋgai.
Wa tɛ bìì nɛ́ gima-tortɛ tɛ nɛnɛ
pii zu kaya
gar nɛnɛ pii tɛ o demɔ ko GASA WAN:
pii tɛ alkamaari, o ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o mbe nɔ̧́;
ká bá nɛ̀ o geɗek mɔ-dai in o gasa-a mbɛt.
Wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ de-a hee o nyɔnɔ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ
nɛ‘i a yì aa sɛnɛ ga;
wa beka ya nɛ̀ dita-see ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ o be-zɔŋa tɛ yɔ yɔyɛ,
tɛ-wa tɛ hai nɛ̀ tortɛ;
tɛ́ duk nɛ́ kalemɔ wen o be-ŋgaiwi in o sɔkawi mbɛt.
Mi tɛ kpai ɗaŋsee kɔ-wa nɛ̀ desee;
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa;
mi tɛ ga̧ see-wa tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ gbɛ o ŋmaŋa saɗi ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧;
ɓɛɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m tɛ sur nɛ̀ o demɔ kɔ‘m.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Wi zii nɛ́ aia-nú sɛn Rama mɛ,
in hi̧a-kɔ̧a̧-ɗaŋsee nyɛmna;
Rachɛl hi̧i̧ nɛ́ o bem kɔ‘i.
A̧ kɔ̧ ha̧ bíí mɛ gai a̧ na,
wen o bem kɔ̧-a̧ bo ɓɔna.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Nyɛma kaɗi, ká‘i áí nú ɓɔna.
Ká‘i hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ ɓɔna mbɛt,
mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Wa a̧ pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o nù ko o wisɛn tɛnɛ‘i.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Demɔ kɔ-mɛ wan mɛ siti a̧ pɛm mɛ‘i.
O bem kɔ-mɛ tɛ pii ɗoŋ nù kɔ-wa woyo.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi zia aia-nú ko Efraim nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e:
‹Ɛ́nɛ́ usa ŋga bɔnɛ ha̧‘m,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i usi nɛ̀ bɔnɛ
ha̧ ŋma ŋgazu daŋa be-wiwii ndai ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m pii ɗoŋ wen ha̧‘m mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.›
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi ee so ɛ́nɛ́ duk,
ɓɛɛ kinii mi duk nɛ̀ dita-see zu mɔ‘i;
ɛ́nɛ́ usa mgbara yɔɔ-kaya kɔ‘m ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi mbɛr nɛ́ yí-see-am,
gɔm nɛ̀ er ti'nɛ́ nɛ̀ foe;
ziimɔ baa'm zu mɔ n'am dea
tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m mɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Efraim nɛ́ yaa-dua-see-am,
wan-de mɔɔ-fe-see-am.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧,
mi tɛ sa kànà nin-a woyo,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ taamɔ kɔ‘m duk ɓɔn zu a̧.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧.
«Mɛ̀ é o mɔɔ-sedaako-mbaŋ-tɛ-wi yuwar kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ̀ gbín o wa̧a̧ a yuwar mɛ usi yuwar kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ̀ zɔ́k tɛ-mɛ tɛ yuwar nɛ̀ mɛ ba.
Mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ, be-zɔŋa
mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ pii saaye kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ tɛ pofi nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu hɔ déè,
zɔŋa yàà-ŋgazu’ɛ?
Ɓɛɛ kinii mi GASA WAN
mi iŋa dee ŋma mbe mɔ pi̧ zu nù'ɛ:
mbe mɔ‘i nɛ́ okoo a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen wiwii.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
‹GASA WAN a̧ tók de yoŋgo zu mɛ,
sa̧a̧ kaya
yuwar-kpasa-a!›
«Juda in o ye kɔ‘i tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa de ye kpɔk; o wi-wa-fɔ in o wi-dai-mɔ-dai tɛ duk kpɔk in o ŋmaa.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ o wi nɛ̀ mbɔia, mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ wɔ mɛ sur nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ.»
(Nɛ́ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ sa wa tɔ̧‘e: «Mi ɔɔ ya ɓɛɛ mi tun, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka'e yá n'am ɔa'i nɛ́ gba demɔ nyɛmna.»)
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Ŋma ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ dun nù ko

Nɛti, mi zika so ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ wa, zuɗi nɛ̀ wa a taŋ, ir nɛ̀ mɔ a nù, gbin nɛ̀ mɔ, ɗaŋ nɛ̀ mɔ, de nɛ̀ ŋgamɔ in wa; ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tɛ hɔ‘i, mi tɛ yor ɗoŋ wa tɛ báá mɔ e ŋgɔn woyo, in tɛ guna mɔ. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ hegɔ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wa beka tɔ̧‘e:
‹O dáà nyɔŋa waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbui-a,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ gba̧a̧-nin o bem kɔ-wa a̧ fea gbilili,› na.
«Bo a̧‘i̧ na! Kóó o ndé tɛ fe nɛ́ fio ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kà ŋma bíí nyɔŋ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbui-a, ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ gba̧a̧-nin wi’ɛi a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Ŋma ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ nɔ tɔk in o be
‘i beka hɔ ŋmaa in wan n'am nɔɔ so in o dáà kɔ-wa, ŋgimbi n'am kasa so nɛ̀ er-wa, kai nɛ̀ wa gbonɛ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ na. War kɔ-wa, wa gbina
tɔk n'am tɛ nɔ in o be

Wa beka usi mɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa, kóó nɛ́ sɛm, kóó nɛ́ o nya-wa, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yámbí iŋa GASA WAN!› ɓɔna, wen wa lɛŋ tɛ iŋ am, kóó so nɛ́ o geɗek-wi, kóó so nɛ́ gasawi mbɛt. Mi beka gɔn kita zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna; mi beka tɔ̧ wen zu yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa ɓɔna mbɛt.
«GASA WAN dee wese mɛ nyɛk mɛ wese,
a̧ dee nyaŋa-zɛ in o sɔra nɛ̀ yuwar-a mɛ nyɛk mɛ zɛ;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ gba-tɔp mɛ pɛŋi mbɛt;
nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
Kà‘m nɛ́ yɔɔ so kaya tɛ dee o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ
n'am dea mɛ nɛ̀ nɔ̀ nɛ̀ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ
hee tugun bíí ga sɛn ti'm.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Kà ŋma bíí a̧ nyɛm so mɛ we kusa yiwese si ŋgɔn mɛ,
in mɛ we ɗuka nù si ɗɔɔ mɛ hɔ ndaa-a gáà,
ɓɛɛ mi mbɛt, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ nyɛm so mɛ siŋ o bezaŋ
a taŋ wen zu o ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wese tɛ hɔ nɛ wa tɛ mbo gasa ye’ɛ woyo nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ wen am, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ tɛ kusa tua-pɛm-mɔ ko Hananɛl hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ nú garo mɛ mgbii-aa mɛ.
Wa tɛ e nduti ye'i nyɛm nɛ̀ war yee-wese, ba daŋnɛ yak nɛ̀ zu zu-tɔ̧ Garɛb, ɓɛɛ sɛka wa duka hi̧i̧ ba nɛnɛ si Gɔa mɛ.
Ɗɔŋgɔ-wɔr in ɗɔŋgɔ-bùk ká bá nɛ̀ bɛɛ-nù ká̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sɛdrɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ ka̧ mgbii nú garo ko o nyaŋa, nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ́
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii tɛ ɓu pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Sedesias wannu Juda nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Duka nɛ́ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr.
Ŋgimbi'i, o gíí wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ kɛra Jerusalɛm, ká wa kpee so Jeremii
Sedesias, wannu Juda kpee so nú a̧ e hi̧i̧ de nɛ̀ ŋmaa in a̧‘e: «Wen ge sa mɛ tɔ̧‘e, GASA WAN tɔ̧a'e: ‹Mi tɛ e ye’ɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko wannu Babilɔŋ, a̧ tɛ ba a̧!› ge?
Mɛ‘e, kóó nɛ́ Sedesias wannu Juda beka nyaŋ er o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee na; a̧ tɛ ye er wannu Babilɔŋ; a̧ tɛ zɔk nɛ̀ gbaayí ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ wen in a̧ mbɛt nɛ̀ tɛ-a, wen ge?

Mɛ‘e, GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧‘e, yàà-ŋgo-biro tɛ mgbɔ Sedesias si Babilɔŋ, a̧ tɛ duk hi̧i̧ hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ ta mɔ wen-aa. K’ɛ́ɛ́ ɗaŋ tɛ yɛ mɛ yor naŋ-biro in o be Kaldee géè na, wen ŋma mɔ n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ de in wa bo na.»
Nyɛrɛmɔ ko Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Hanameɛl, bem ko nya dáà kɔ-mɛ Salum, tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e ndé, mɛ̀ hí̧fí fɔ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ duk sɛn Anatot, wen mɛ́ nɛ́ mgbak kóó-wi kɔ‘i nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ wi-gɔn-zu fɔ‘i.

Hanameɛl bem ko nya dáà kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa'm sɛn kɔ̧́ bee-gara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gɔ́n zu fɔ kɔ‘m nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn Anatot nɛ̀ duk zaŋ nù ko Bɛnjamin, in wen mgbak wi mɛ ba mɔɔ-oi-am nɛ́ mɛ́ ɓɛɛ, nɛ́ mɛ'ɛ nyɛma mɛ gɔn zu fɔ'ɛ. Mɛ̀ gɔ́n nɛ́ gɔna zu fɔ'ɛ ɓɛɛ.› Ɓɛɛ mi iŋ‘e, nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN a̧ a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i.
Mi hi̧fa fɔ‘i nɛ̀ duk sɛn Anatot'i er Hanameɛl, bem ko nya dáà kɔ‘m tɛ kɔya sede ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo,
mi yɔra kalata zu mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mi e
Mi baa kalata fɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mi ba wan nɛ̀
ɓɛɛ mi ha̧ ha̧ Baruk, bem ko Nɛriya, bem ko Masɛya, nɛ̀ gbaayí Hanameɛl, bem ko nya dáà kɔ‘m in nɛ̀ gbaayí o wi-sedaako kalata fɔ‘i in nɛ̀ gbaayí o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so bee-gara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ Baruk nɛ̀ gbaayí wa lɛŋ‘e:
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɗoŋ n'am ha̧a̧ kalata ɗɔra fɔ‘i ha̧ Baruk bem ko Nɛria kaɗi, mi wora GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ dee yiwese in nù tɛ zɔm ŋgai k’ɛnɛ; ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaia gan'nɛ́ bo na!
Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dé kó ha̧ o bezaŋ nɛ̀ kòó ɗoŋ ŋmaa hɔ tɛ booro, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ bɔnɛ zu o bem oi ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà kɔ-wa. Nin'nɛ́ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ gasa, ŋga wi-biro, GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
Kpasa wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ in gasa wi-de-mɔ hɔ gba̧a̧ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́; yí‘nɛ́ a̧a̧ zu naŋanɔ ko bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa in nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Sɛn nú Egiptɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ usa tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ o mɔɔ-kifi nɛ̀‘i zɔk mɔɔ-oi-aa hɔ sɔsɔɔ'ɛ, ɓɛɛ nin'nɛ́ hu̧r sɛn
Ɛ́nɛ́ kaia dukbíí k’ɛnɛ o be
Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ nù'ɛ ha̧ wa, mɛ nɛ́ nù n’ɛnɛ ha̧a̧ so nɛ̀ kanamɔ ha̧ o dáà kɔ-wa, nù nɛ̀ yibere in nɔ̧́-gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ.
Wa yee tɛ nù'ɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ya sɛnɛ; mɔ kpɔk, wa zii tiger'nɛ́ na, wa nɛ́ ɗoŋ o usamɔ k’ɛnɛ na mbɛt; wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ dee mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ usa so ha̧ wa mɛ de. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ s’ɛnɛ fo o ŋgamɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ pi̧ zu wa.

«O yuwar nɛ̀ o be Babilɔŋ ɗafi tɛnɛ‘i hɛɗa yee ye kaɗi. Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa tika saaye’ɛ kaɗi ga, ye’ɛ tika kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee nɛ̀ kɛra a̧ kaɗi. Mɔ n’ɛnɛ ee zu-a hɔɔ gba̧a̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ zɔka-a ɓɛɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: ‹A̧‘m wé dita bu-mbɔi hi̧fi nɛ̀ fɔ, sa nɛ̀ o wi-sedaako tɛnɛ! Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko ye’ɛ, nɛ́ tika-a ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o be Kaldee ɓɛɛ nde?› »
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Mi, GASA WAN, mi nɛ́ Sɔ̧ ko o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya kpasa; ŋma mɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ ŋgai gan am nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɛ e ye’ɛ kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee in Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ.
Wa tɛ ba ye, ɓɛɛ a̧ bia wee in o tua nɛ̀ wa ɗafa so géé-sɔ̧ Bal sɛnɛ, a nɛ̀ zɛzɛ nù ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧, tu̧ nɛ̀ see-am.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, nɛ̀ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tɛnɛ, o be
Ye’ɛ a̧ŋa ɗaŋsee in nyimsea kɔ‘m a ŋgɔn, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ye’ɛ mɛ tɛnɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i. Mi tɛ fo a̧ yinɛ yí‘m,
wen zu ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o be
Wa zika ɗoŋ e ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ so ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk sɔnti-wa na; mi usa mɔ ha̧ wa takaɗi, wa zii na, wa kpɛk usamɔ kɔ‘m na mbɛt.
Wa kai nɛ́ o ndiŋmɔ a kɔ̧́ Tua kɔ‘m fara nɛ̀ nin-am a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, fɛŋ nɛ̀ Tua'i.

Wa mboo fara-ɗafi-Bal sɛn kɔ̧̀ ɗɔŋgɔ Bɛn-Hinɔm wen dɔɔ o bem in o boko-bem kɔ-wa ɗafi nɛ̀ Mɔlɛk. Bo nɛ mi'i aka wa mɛ de mɔ‘i na; i̧i̧ mɔ‘i bo so nɛ́ taamɔ kɔ‘m na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wa nɛ̀ ta-tɛ-wa a̧ dee gasa mɔɔ-búù‘i pi̧ nù, nɛ̀ dee ha̧ o be Juda mɛ yɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ kinii, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
«See-am nyima so nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a nyɛmna zu o bíí tɛ ye’ɛ, ɓɛɛ sa'm pɛsi wa dam zaŋnu fara lɛŋ. Kinii, mi tɛ mɔi wa pii ɗoŋ fara’ɛ nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ fo wa bo na.
Wa tɛ ya dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ ha̧ de taamɔ ha̧ wa lɛŋ in ha̧ o ŋmaa mɛ tu̧ tɛ‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ̀ desee yaknɛ hegɔɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ-wa mɛ.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in wa nɛ̀ nduti-a beka bo na, mi beka kaɗi dee demɔ in wa na, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ yu'm, nɛ̀ wa beka e'm duk na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ kpa desee tɛ dee demɔ in wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ duk tɛ nù'ɛ mgbítíŋ hegɔɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo; mi tɛ e see-am in kiitɛ‘m lɛŋ tɛ dee mɔ‘i.»
Ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e: «Hee mɔ'ɔ mɛ̀ nɛ́ mí á̧ dee ha̧ ŋgamɔ'ɛ mɛ tik zu dukbíí'ɛ ga, kale-a mbɛt hegɔ, mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ kpa demɔ n'am ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ wa wen-aa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ in o ŋmaa'e, nù'ɛ nɛ̀ o be Babilɔŋ baa so'i kifa duk nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ o bíí kà bó nɛ̀ saɗi bo sɛnɛ na; ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk, wi tɛ hi̧fi o fɔ tɛ nù'ɛ woyo.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wi tɛ we dita bu-mbɔi hi̧fi nɛ̀ o fɔ, wi tɛ de kalata-a, wi tɛ e
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii woyo ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so kànà nɛnɛ kɔ̧́ bee-gara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ mɛ.
«Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ dee nù, nɛ ɗafa a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk nɛ̀ nɔa-a, nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Mɛ̀ sá mɔ pii tɛ‘m, mi tɛ kifi nú ha̧ mɛ, mi tɛ usi o gasamɔ ha̧ mɛ, o gasa hu̧samɔ nɛ̀ mɛ iŋ na.
Mi GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, mi tɛ gbak wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i gbak nɛ̀ ŋma wan-da̧i̧'ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kpa haya-tɛ nɛ̀ de-a. Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ yaknɛ, nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ mɛ fo wa beka bo na.
Mi tɛ ɗafi Juda in
Mi tɛ
Mɔ‘i tɛ de ha̧ nin-am mɛ hu̧r, nɛ̀ tɛ duk nɛ́ zɔm gasa zɔnamɔ wen am, hee gba de mbɔi-tɛ ga sɛn ti o tugun bíí lɛŋ zaŋnu nɛ̀ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zii nyɛrɛ o de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ n'am tɛ de in Juda in ha̧

Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Fara’ɛ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ‘e nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi nɛ̀ bíí in o saɗi bo sɛnɛ na wó'ɛ, nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɔ da̧a̧ kpe nù ko Juda lɛŋ gú nɛ̀ o mgbara kira Jerusalɛm mbɛt, mɔ ya sélélé, géé foomɔ ko saɗi ká bá nɛ̀ ger bíí bo na. Ɓɛɛ mɔ kpɔk,
wi tɛ zii o
‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ gásí GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
wen a̧ ɔ dee,
ɓɛɛ a̧ yor ɗoŋ o
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ ɗafi nù'ɛ woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk hee a̧ duka so nɛti ga.»

Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Sɛn fara’ɛ nɛ̀ mɔ ɗaŋa lɛŋ kifi duk nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi géè'ɛ, nɛ̀ o bíí in saɗi bo sɛnɛ na’ɛ, in tɛ o ye kɔ-wa nɛ̀ ɗaŋa mbɛt’ɛ, wi tɛ gun bɔr-mɔ sɛnɛ woyo; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ fara'i a̧ o wi-dai-sami tɛ de ha̧ o sami kɔ‘i mɛ ɔm tɛ sɛnɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «O sami tɛ gbar woyo ti wi-tɔr-wa, tɛ o ye mɛ mgbara kaya, tɛ o ye bɔkɔ-nù hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o ye Nɛgɛb, tɛ nù ko Bɛnjamin mbɛt, ká bá nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm in tɛ o ye nù Juda lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wese tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ de ha̧
Tɛ kpɔk kale ŋgimbi'i, mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋma mgbák
Wese'i, Juda tɛ kpasi, ɓɛɛ Jerusalɛm tɛ duk nɛ̀ de-a, nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ beka fo a̧ na. Nin nɛ̀‘i tɛ sa nɛ ye'i nɛ́ ‹GASA WAN wi-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a in yɛɛ!› »
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Kànà nɛ́ o bezaŋ David a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu damti-wan ko o be
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kalemɔ mbɛt, wen o be Levii, kànà nɛ́ wa a̧ tɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ yor ti'm dɔ nɛ̀ o kpoo-sɔ̧ in o ha̧a̧mɔ ɗafi nɛ̀‘m mbɛt dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ.»
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii.
«Gba̧a̧-wen nɛ̀ mí GASA WAN tɔ̧a'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ ɗaŋ
ɓɛɛ

Mɔ nyɛm mɛ de hegɔ na. Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m in o be Levii nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ gasawi kɔ‘m mɛ dɔk hee o sɔra mɛ yiwese nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na, in nyɛmɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na ga mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Mɛ zɔka mbɛt, o wi nɔ'ɔ ta kɔ‘i'e ndé, mi GASA WAN pi̧i̧ o be nutua ko
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: «Mi n'am nɔɔ tɔk in wese in zɛ, in nɛ̀ ɗafa mɔ nɛ̀ de-a tɛ yuwar mɔ mɛ yiwese in mɛ mbɔɗɔnu,

ɛnɛ taa so k’ɛnɛ‘e, mi tɛ̀ɛ́ pi̧ so bezaŋ Jakob in bezaŋ David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m nù sɔɔ géè? Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ bɛ̧ so hoka wi nɛ̀ tɛ ɔ wan zu kpar Abraham, Izak, in Jakob mgbara o bezaŋ wa'i nde? Weyaa! Mi tɛ ɗafi wa woyo wen ko de'm dee ha̧ wa.»

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii woyo ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ‘i gú nɛ̀ o wi-biro ko o be wannu lɛŋ nɛ̀ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ tika Jerusalɛm in o ye nɛ̀ zik a̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ biro. Wen-aa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko

Kɔ-mɛ, mɛ beka gbo yak kɔ̧̀ er-a na. Wa tɛ ba mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ee mɛ er-a. Mɛ in wannu Babilɔŋ, yí‘nɛ́ tɛ to kànà ŋmaa zɔ̧i̧i̧; kóó hegɔ mbɛt, a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ mɛ nɛ̀ nú-a nɛti kaɗi, ɓɛɛ sɛka mɛ yaka si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
Kóó hegɔ mbɛt, Sedesias wannu Juda, mɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ: Mɛ beka fe fio gba-paa na.

Mɛ tɛ fe nɛ́ géé fio; wa tɛ dɔ fuu-nyama zu mɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa dɔɔ nɛnɛ zu o dáà kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ duka so zu damti-wan nɛ̀ ti ha̧ mɛ ga. Wa tɛ hi̧i̧ mɛ nɛ̀ gima-fio tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Oee, wannu fea!› » GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Nɛ mbetɛ, nɛ́ mi a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Jeremii
Ŋgimbi'i ká o wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ kpee so Jerusalɛm ká bá nɛ̀ Lakis in Azɛka, o gasa ye Juda e nù, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ o ye nɔ‘i yiitoo'i a̧ ɓɔna so nɛ́ o ye-ŋgárá sɛn nù Juda.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii woyo nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Sedesias ee nɛ nú in o bíí Jerusalɛm, wen gboo o bara yinɛ.
Kóó o ndé a̧ gbó o bara nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ o be Hebreu yinɛ; kóó wi’ɛi so nɛ́ okoo, kóó a̧ so nɛ́ wiwii; ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ de nya kɔ‘i be Juda nɛ̀ bara bo ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ, o gasawi lɛŋ in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ so nú wen gboo o bara kɔ-wa yinɛ, kóó so nɛ́ okoo, kóó nɛ́ wiwii, nɛ̀ wa beka e wa tɛ bara woyo ɓɔna, yora ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú kɔ-wa war kpɔk.
Duka siti ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi, ɓɛɛ wa kpai taamɔ kɔ-wa, zik tɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ kai o bara nɛ̀ wa gboo so a nù kaɗi'i, o wiwii in o okoo, kai wa a tɛ tom-bara, ɓɛɛ de wa nɛ̀ bara woyo.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Gba̧a̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko

ɗoŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé mgbara'nɛ́ tɛ gbo be Hebreu nɛ̀ ɗɔra so tɛ-wi ha̧ nya-wi; a̧ tɛ de tom-bara ha̧ mɛ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ, mɛ tɛ gbo a̧. Ɓɛɛ o zɔmdaa k’ɛnɛ zii mɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗoŋ zer, wa kpɛk na.

Bó nɛ́ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧a so nyɛi na n’ɛ́nɛ́ kpaa so nɛ̀ mbe taamɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ de mɔ nɛ̀ nyɛma yí‘m tɛ gboo o nya'nɛ́ o be Juda yinɛ tɛ bara. Ɛnɛ ee so nú mɛ de mɔ‘i ɓɔn yí‘m sɛn kɔ̧́ Tua n’ɛnɛ sa nin-am sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ zik tɛ‘nɛ́ si ɗoŋ fɛŋ nin-am, wen nɛ̀ kóó o ndé mgbara'nɛ́ sii ɗoŋ kai o bara kɔ‘i n'aa gboo so a nù kaɗi, o wiwii in o okoo, kai wa a tɛ tom-bara, ɓɛɛ de wa nɛ̀ bara woyo.

Nɛ́ hegɔ, ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e ndé: Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zii wen nú‘m mɛ gbo o nya'nɛ́ in o be-nù k’ɛnɛ na ga, kɔ‘m, mi tɛ gbo'nɛ́! Ɓɛɛ gboo'nɛ́ kɔ‘m'i, nɛ́ gba-paa, ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa in kaɓa ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kpa. Ɓɛɛ o wannu zaŋnu tɛ zii nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i nɛ kíì.
O kutiwi in o gasawi ko Juda in Jerusalɛm, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧ so nú kan nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ ka wa ɓir kpoo-sɔ̧ kɛ̧ tan see-a yiitoo, gbo nɛ̀ mgbara-a yak,
Mi ee o wiwii ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa, o wi nɛ̀ kii mɛ gbɛ wa. Wɔr-wa tɛ kifi nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o nɔ̧́í̧ in ko o saɗi.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Sedesias, wannu Juda in o gasawi kɔ‘i, mi ee wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa, o wi nɛ̀ kii mɛ gbɛ wa, o gíí wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ. Kóó o wi-biro nɔ‘i zika so tɛ si ɗoŋ e'nɛ́ duk,
mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ zu ye’ɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ bi'nɛ́, dɔ ye k’ɛnɛ'ɛ bíí wee kor-kor, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ o ye Juda mɛ ɗaŋ kifi nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà kotoro. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii ŋgimbi-wan ko Joakim bem ko Josias wannu Juda nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ o bezaŋ Rekab, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ wa, mɛ̀ mgbɔ́ wa si kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧, sɛn kɔ̧́ ŋma gɔna-bɛr-tua, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ há̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa nɔ́.»
Mi nɛ̀ɛ̀ kii Yazania bem ko Yirmɛya, bem ko Habasinia, o nya-a lɛŋ in o bem kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, be nú-gara ko o be Rekab nɛ̀ oi gun.

Mi mgbɔɔ wa si kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧, kɔ̧̀ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko bem ko Hanaŋ, bem ko Yigdalia bíí ko Sɔ̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ̀ duk ká̧ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko o gasawi, wan nɛ̀ duk zu gɔna-bɛr-tua ko Masɛya bem ko Salum wi-pɛm-nú-tua.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'am ee kpáná-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in ɗele-nɔa-a ti o be nú-gara ko Rekab, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́.»
Ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú: «Ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ k’ɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na. Zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ Yonadab bem ko Rekab bee so mɔ a zu yɛ‘e:
K’ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na ndó-ndó-ndó,
kóó nɛ́ ɛ́ɛ́, kóó nɛ́ o bezaŋ yɛ mbɛt.
K’ɛ́ɛ́ de tua na,
k’ɛ́ɛ́ gun o nyɔnɔ na,
k’ɛ́ɛ́ gun o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
o mɔɔ nɔ‘i beka duk nɛ́ o mɔ k’ɛɛ na.
Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ ɔ k’ɛɛ ɓɔn nɛ kɔ̧́ tua-laa
ŋgimbi duka-a k’ɛɛ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ ya nɛ̀ k’ɛɛ
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi zu nù n’ɛɛ ya sɛnɛ'ɛ.

«Ɛ́ɛ́ mboo zu tɛ o heembea nɔ‘i nɛ̀ zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ Yonadab, bem ko Rekab ha̧a̧ h’ɛɛ‘i. Ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ k’ɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na ndó-ndó-ndó, kóó nɛ́ ɛɛ nɛ̀ tɛ yɛ, kóó nɛ́ o kóò k’ɛɛ, kóó nɛ́ o bem k’ɛɛ in o boko-bem k’ɛɛ mbɛt.
Ɛ́ɛ́ de so k’ɛɛ o tua-ɔ-sɛnɛ na, ɛ́ɛ́ bo so k’ɛɛ nɛ̀ o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, kóó nɛ́ o ŋma fɔ na mbɛt.
Ɛ́ɛ́ ɔ k’ɛɛ ɓɔn kɔ̧̀ o tua-laa, ɛ́ɛ́ mbo zu nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a tɛ o heembea nɛ̀ zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ Yonadab ha̧a̧ so h’ɛɛ‘i.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ dee nɛ̀ biro ba nɛ̀ nù'ɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, gana so ɛ̀ɛ̀ yé Jerusalɛm, ɛ̀ɛ̀ kpásí er o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee in o be Aram nɔ'ɔ. Nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ́ɛ́ yee nɛnɛ Jerusalɛm ɓɔn nɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mbo zu tɛ heembea-nɔɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ Yonadab bem ko Rekab dora nú o bezaŋ wa. Wa nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i, mbo nɛ̀ zu tɛ usamɔ ko zɔmdáa kɔ-wa; ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɔ̧ wen h’ɛnɛ gbɔsi gbɔsi takaɗi, ɛnɛ zii wen nú‘m na.
Mi duka tɛ toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, o
War ko o bem ko Yonadab, wa mboo zu tɛ o usamɔ nɛ̀ zɔmdáa kɔ-wa usa ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ko dukbíí'ɛ, a̧ zii wen kɔ‘m na.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko
Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o be nú-gara ko Rekab: «Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
hegɔ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ Jeremii tɛ naar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Joakim, bem ko Josias wannu Juda:
«Mɛ̀ bá ŋma kara kalata a̧ mɛ̀ yɔ́r o wen lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ zu
Ŋmafara o be Juda tɛ ta mɔ zu ŋgamɔ lɛŋ n'am ta mɛ pi̧ zu wa, ɓɛɛ hegɔ, wi nɛ kpai ɗaŋ naŋanɔ kɔ‘i, mi tɛ e o ɗaŋmɔ in o yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa lɛŋ ha̧ wa.»
Jeremii pi̧i̧ tom sa Baruk bem ko Nɛriya, ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ o wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ lɛŋ ha̧ Baruk, ɓɛɛ Baruk yɔr wa zaŋ kalata.
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ Baruk: «Wa dora'm, mi nyɛm mɛ́ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧ na;

mɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ ŋma wese-zima-yì, ɓɛɛ sɛn hi̧i̧, mɛ̀ yór ti giiwi, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ́r o wen ko GASA WAN n'am saa nɛ̀ mɛ́ yɔra zaŋ kara kalata’ɛ ha̧ wa. Mɛ̀ tɔ́r ha̧ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ o saaye kɔ-wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ŋmafara aia-nú kɔ-wa tɛ hɔ tɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ ha̧ kóó o ndé mɛ kpai ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘i wen nyimsea ko GASA WAN zu o wi nɔ'ɔ ɔ gasa nyɛmna.»
Baruk bem ko Nɛriya dee mɔ nɛ̀ Jeremii
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Joakim bem ko Josias wannu Juda, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar fio-zɛ, wa saa o bíí Jerusalɛm in o be saaye Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ so Jerusalɛm, wen ha̧ wa mɛ zim yì ti GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ Baruk tɔr o wen ko Jeremii zaŋ kalata'i sɛn kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧, kɔ̧̀ gɔna-bɛr-tua ko Gɛmaria bem ko Safaŋ, wi-yɔr-mɔ, bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧́ a̧, ká̧ mbe nú Tua ko Sɔ̧. A̧ tɔra mɔ‘i ha̧ giiwi lɛŋ.
Mikaya bem ko Gɛmaria, bem ko Safaŋ zia wen ko GASA WAN lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra zaŋ kara kalata'i.

A̧ zira si kɔ̧́ tua-wan, si kɔ̧́ bɛr-tua ko wi-yɔr-mɔ. O gasawi mɔi̧a so ŋmaa lɛŋ sɛn hi̧i̧ wen baa keta: mɛ̀ nɛ́ gasawi Elisama, Delaya bem ko Semaya, Ɛlnataŋ bem ko Akbɔr, sɛka Gɛmaria bem ko Safaŋ, Sedesias bem ko Hanania in oi o gasawi lɛŋ.
Mikaya wee ɗoŋ o wen lɛŋ n'aa zia ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Baruk bem ko Nɛriya tɔra nɛ̀ kalata'i ha̧ giiwi ha̧ wa.

Nɛ̀ wa baa keta kaɗi, o gasawi toma Yehudi bem ko Nɛtania, bem ko Sɛlɛmia, bem ko Kusi sitɛ Baruk wen tɔ̧a-a ha̧ a̧‘e ndé, a̧ a̧ bá kara kalata n'aa tɔra ti giiwi'i tɛnɛ ha'i. Baruk bem ko Nɛriya baa kara kalata'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ́ wa.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ dúk nù, a̧ mɛ̀ tɔ́r kara kalata’ɛ h’ɛɛ!» Baruk dee hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧a ga.
Nɛ̀ wa zia o wen nɔ‘i lɛŋ kaɗi, gasa kíì baa wa. Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Baruk: «Tɛ yɛ beka bi ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ o wen nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ ha̧ wannu na.»
Wa aka a̧: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mgbara o wen nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata’ɛ h’ɛɛ zii. Nɛ́ Jeremii a̧ tɔ̧a nde?»
Baruk kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Nɛ́ a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ o wen nɔ'ɔ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi yɔr kɔ‘m nɛ́ yɔra wa nɛ̀ yí mɔɔ-yɔr-mɔ, zaŋ kalata’ɛ.»
O gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Baruk: «Mɛ̀ yák, mɛ̀ hú̧sí; Jeremii mbɛt! Ká ŋma bíí iŋ fara n’ɛnɛ hu̧sa̧ sɛnɛ na!»
Wa ee kara kalata'i ɓɔn kɔ̧́ bɛr-tua ko wi-yɔr-mɔ Elisama; wa yee si tɛ̀ ko wannu kɔ̧̀ o hu̧sa̧ bɛr-tua-duk kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.
Wannu toma Yehudi mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ba kara kalata'i; a̧ nɛ̀ɛ̀ ba kalata kɔ̧́ bɛr-tua ko wi-yɔr-mɔ Elisama, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔr ha̧ wannu in o gasawi lɛŋ nɛ̀ yor zik a̧ kpa nú ŋmaa.
Wannu duka so ɔ nɛ́ wee kɔ̧̀ bɛr-tua-ɔ-wee kɔ‘i, duka so nɛ́ zɛ Girwɔ, wee duka so nyɛk nɛnɛ sɛn ti a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yehudi tɔr yɔramɔ taar kóó naar, ɓɛɛ wannu baa be-paa ko wi-yɔr-mɔ ɓir nɛ̀ kalata'i a tɛ wee; wannu ɓira kalata'i ɗoŋ ŋmaa, ɗoŋ ŋmaa hegɔɔ kalata'i bíí nɛ̀ wee lɛŋ.
Tɛ zia o wen nɔ‘i lɛŋ, kíì de wa na, wa a̧k laa tɛ-wa a nù na mbɛt; kóó nɛ́ wannu, kóó nɛ́ ŋma wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛlnataŋ, Delaya in Gɛmaria dora wannu tɛ dɔɔ kara kalata'i takaɗi, a̧ zii wen nú wa na.
A̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ be-wan Jerameɛl, ha̧ Sɛraya bem ko Azriɛl in ha̧ Sɛlɛmia bem ko Abdeɛl, ha̧ wa mɛ ba wi-yɔr-mɔ Baruk in Jeremii
Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wannu dɔɔ nɛ̀ kara kalata nɛ̀ Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ Baruk mɛ yɔr, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ yɔr'i, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii:
«Mɛ̀ bá mbe kara kalata, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ yɔ́r o wen lɛŋ nɛ̀ duka so zaŋ kuti kalata nɛ̀ Joakim wannu Juda dɔɔ so yinɛ‘i sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Joakim wannu Juda hee ndé: GASA WAN tɔ̧a, mɛ kpaa ɗaŋsee zu'm, dɔ nɛ̀ kara kalata’ɛ, wen n'am yɔra'e ndé, wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ nù'ɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, kum nɛ̀ o bíí in o saɗi yinɛ.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu Joakim wannu Juda nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ duk oi-aa zu damti-wan ko David bo na. Wɔr-aa tɛ ɓɔn ti ŋga bu-wese in ŋga gɛ̧ɛ̧-zɛ.

Mi tɛ kifi er ha̧ a̧, in o bezaŋ-aa ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧, wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa; o gasa bɔnɛ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen-aa ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ ká wa zii so na'i, mi tɛ fo pi̧ zu wa, zu o bíí Jerusalɛm ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí Juda mbɛt.»

Jeremii baa ŋma mbe kara kalata, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ wi-yɔr-mɔ Baruk, bem ko Nɛriya. Baruk yɔra wen nɛ̀ Jeremii saa so ha̧ a̧ sɛnɛ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wen lɛŋ nɛ̀ yɔra so zaŋ kalata nɛ̀ Joakim wannu Juda dɔɔ so'i, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr o ŋma mbe-a nɛ̀ hɔɔ ŋmaa in kuti-a zaŋ-aa mbɛt.
Wannu Sedesias bem ko Josias ɔɔ wan oi Kɔnia, bem ko Joakim, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ a̧ baa a̧ pi̧ tɛ wan sɛn nù Juda.
Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ zia wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ nú Jeremii
Wannu Sedesias toma Yehukal bem ko Sɛlɛmia in Sɛfania wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bem ko Masɛya sitɛ Jeremii
Jeremii duk yar so nɛ́ mɔ kɔ‘i géè mgbara dukbíí. Wa ba so a̧ pi̧ zɔɓɔ tɛ ŋgimbi'i na.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro ko wannu Egiptɛ gboo Egiptɛ, ba nɛ́ biro tɛnɛ; o be Kaldee nɛ̀ kɛra so Jerusalɛm zia nyɛrɛmɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa kur yak e Jerusalɛm duk.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii
«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
O be Kaldee tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ bi ye’ɛ, wa tɛ ba, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧i̧ wee tɛ ye’ɛ.
Wen ko GASA WAN nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ́nɛ́ ɔr tɛ‘nɛ́ ta nɛnɛ‘e, o be Kaldee yaka yak wɔsɔsɔ tɛ̀ k’ɛnɛ na. Wa yak na.
Kóó ɛ́nɛ́ kuma so o gíí wi-biro Kaldee nɛ̀ bi'nɛ́'ɛ lɛŋ, kóó nɛ́ be oi o wan-da̧i̧ a̧ ɓɔna, wa tɛ kur nɛ̀ oi da̧i̧ kɔ̧́ tua-laa kɔ-wa, mɛ pi̧ wee tɛ ye’ɛ.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o gíí wi-biro Kaldee yaka e Jerusalɛm duk, ɓɛɛ gbin yak ti o gii wi-biro ko wannu Egiptɛ ga,
Jeremii kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ gbo Jerusalɛm mɛ nɛ si nù ko Bɛnjamin, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk mgbara mɔ zu mɔɔ-oi nútua kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ hɔɔ nú garo ye nɛ̀‘i sa'e Bɛnjamin, ɓɛɛ kpa ŋma wi-pɛm-mɔ, nin-wi’ɛi nɛ́ Yiria bem ko Sɛlɛmia, bem ko Hanania. Wi’ɛi dora Jeremii
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii kifi nú: «Nɛ́ ndela! Mi bó nɛ̀ taamɔ mɛ nɛ sitɛ o be Kaldee na.» Yiria kɔ̧ zia a̧ na. A̧ dɔra a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ si ti o gasawi.
Ɓɛɛ see o gasawi tu̧ zu Jeremii; wa gusa a̧, hɛr a̧ ba pi̧ kɔ̧ tua ko wi-yɔr-mɔ Yɔnataŋ nɛ̀ wa ee nɛ̀ tua-zɔɓɔ.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa baa nɛ̀ Jeremii pi̧ kɔ̧́ bɛr-tua wan mɛ ɗɔɔ nù mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk hi̧i̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi.
Ŋma wese wannu Sedesias toma sa a̧, ɓɛɛ ak a̧ nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a kɔ̧́ tua-wan kɔ‘i'e: «Ŋma mbe nú-tom ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nde?» Jeremii kifa nú: «Íì, nɛ̀ mbetɛ. Mɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧̀ er wannu Babilɔŋ.»
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Sedesias siti woyo: «Nɛ́ ge ɗaŋmɔ ge a̧‘m dee in'nɛ́ɛ, in o wi-de-tom k’ɛnɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ dukbíí'ɛ s’ɛnɛ baa nɛ̀‘m pi̧ nɛ̀‘m zɔɓɔ'ɛ ge?
O
Ɓɛɛ kinii, Nyaa wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧‘m. K’ɛ́nɛ́ tom am si ɗoŋ kɔ̧́ tua ko wi-yɔr-mɔ Yɔnataŋ ɓɔna; fara'i nɛ́ fara fio.»

Ɓɛɛ wannu Sedesias ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ dor Jeremii e ɓɔn kɔ̧́ bee gara-pɛm-mɔ, ɓɛɛ ha̧ wa mɛ duk tɛ baa brɛt fara-dɔa-a mɛ ha̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ wese kpɔk kpɔk hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ brɛt tɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ saaye'i. Hegɔ Jeremii ɓɔna beegara fara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ‘i.
Sɛfatia bem ko Mataŋ, Gedalia bem ko Pasehur, Yukal bem ko Selemia in Pasehur bem ko Malkia zia o wen nɛ̀ Jeremii duka tɛ wee ɗɔŋ-aa ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:

«Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Wi nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn saaye’ɛ tɛ fe nɛ́ fio gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa. Wi nɛ̀ tɛ gbo yak sitɛ o be Kaldee tɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk tɛ-a wen n'aa kpasa. Nɛ mbetɛ, wi’ɛi beka fe na.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: Ye’ɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧̀ er wannu Babilɔŋ, wa tɛ ba a̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ.»

O gasawi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Wa a̧ gbɛ́ wi’ɛ gbɛɛ yinɛ, wen n'aa gbin nɛ́ gba̧a̧-tɛ o oi wi-biro-pɛm ye’ɛ, gú nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ o wen nɔ‘i n'aa tɔ̧‘i. Bo nɛ a̧ kii nɛ́ de duka-a ko dukbíí na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kii nɛ́ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa.»
Wannu Sedesias kifa nú: «A̧ a̧a̧ kɔ̧̀ er'nɛ́; wannu bo nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ de ŋma mɔ yak zu'nɛ́ na.»
Wa baa Jeremii pi̧ kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì ko be-wan Malkia nɛ̀ duk mgbák beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ. Wa zira a̧ nɛ̀ nyak si kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì‘i. Yì bo so kɔ̧́ a̧ na, duka so nɛ́ ɓɔtɛ ɓɛɛ. Jeremii bina ɓɔtɛ duk sɛnɛ.
Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus, ŋma kpɔk mgbara o gasawi kɔ̧́ tua ko wannu zia'e, wa pi̧i̧ Jeremii kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi'i ká wannu duka so nú garo ko Bɛnjamin.
Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk gboo kɔ̧́ tua-wan ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen-aa ha̧ wannu.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e: «Nyaa wannu, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɔ wi nɔ'ɔ dee in Jeremii
Ɓɛɛ wannu ha̧ nú ha̧ Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ káí o bíí taar nɛnɛ in mɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dák Jeremii
Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk kaia o bíí in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ nú tua-wan; a̧ kaia o ŋma a̧ka̧ túí fara-a-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa kpo nú nyak pi̧ ha̧ Jeremii.
Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɛ̀ káí o a̧ka̧ túí nɔ'ɔ á ɗɔɔ ɓaa-mɛ ɗɔɔ o nyak.» Jeremii dee hegɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa dak Jeremii gbonɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì‘i nɛ̀ o nyak nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa e a̧ kɔ̧̀ bee-gara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
Wannu Sedesias pi̧i̧ tom sa Jeremii
Jeremii kifa nú ha̧ Sedesias hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Kà‘m tɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasawen h’ɛnɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ‘m; ɓɛɛ kà‘m tɔ̧ nɛ́ mbɔrɔ h’ɛnɛ mbɛt, ɛnɛ beka zii na!»
Ɓɛɛ wannu Sedesias kan mɔ ha̧ nɛ̀ nú nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a ha̧ Jeremii'e: «GASA WAN nɛ ha̧ duka-kpasa h’ɛɛ duk kpasa! Mi beka gbɛ mɛ ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ mi beka e mɛ er o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kii mɛ gbɛ mɛ'ɛ na mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ Sedesias: «Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ na, ye’ɛ tɛ ye kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ wee sɛnɛ; ɓɛɛ k’ɛnɛ, ɛnɛ beka kpasi er wa na.»
Wannu Sedesias kifa nú ha̧ Jeremii: «Mɔ nɛ̀ pi̧ kíì tɛ‘m nɛ́ o be Juda nɛ̀ yaka sitɛ o be Kaldee; ŋmafara mi tɛ tik er wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m pi̧ nɛ̀‘m nɛ̀ er ŋmaa.»
Jeremii tɔ̧a: «Ɛnɛ beka tik er wa na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí nɛ́ wen ko GASA WAN tɛ wen n'am tɔ̧'ɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ tɛ yak zu'nɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kpasi.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ bɛ̧ nɛa-a sitɛ o be Kaldee, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN usa ha̧‘m tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Wa tɛ kai o okoo lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya kɔ̧́ tua ko wannu Juda nɛnɛ ha̧ gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ o okoo nɔ‘i tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹O mgbák sɛm kɔ-mɛ nɔ‘i
ɔra so nɛ́ mɛ́!
Mɛ bina ɓɔtɛ,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, wa pɛsa e mɛ duk!›
«Wa tɛ mgbɔ o kóò kɔ-mɛ in o bem kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ o be Kaldee. Kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ mɛ, mɛ beka kpasi kɔ̧̀ er-wa na; wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ tik tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ye’ɛ tɛ bìì wee.»
Sedesias tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Ká ŋma bíí zii wen n’ɛɛ tɔ̧ in mɛɛ'ɛ na; kà bo hegɔ na, mɛ tɛ fe.
O gasawi tɛ zii'e ɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in ŋmaa; kà wa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m wen ká‘i tɛɛ gbɛ mɛ, ká mɛ hu̧si mɔ nɛ̀ wi na, ge mɔ ge a̧ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ge nde, wó,
mɛ̀ kífí nú ha̧ wa'e: ‹Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ zɔk nɛ́ wannu ha̧‘m mɛ ai nú ha̧ a̧ wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ tom am si ɗoŋ si kɔ̧́ tua ko Yɔnataŋ, wen ká‘m tɛɛ fe.› »
Zu mɔ‘i, o gasawi lɛŋ tɛɛ ak Jeremii; ɓɛɛ sɛn tɛ kifa nú kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ wannu tɔ̧a. Wa ir a̧ tɛ wen'i siti na; hegɔ, ŋma bíí kpa ndaa nyɛrɛ kɔ-wa'i na.
Jeremii ɓɔna kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ hɔ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm.

Mɔ nɛ̀ dea tɛ ŋgimbi tika-a ko Jerusalɛm nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias wannu Juda, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa kɛr ye.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be Babilɔŋ mbaŋa garo ye nɛnɛ si saaye.

O gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ ba fara sɛn gasa beegara: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro, Sin-Magir, Nebu-Sarsekim, gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, in Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr, gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi dɔka o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ.
Sedesias wannu Juda in o wi-biro kɔ‘i iŋa'e wa hɔɔ kaɗi, wa yuu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ be fɔ ko wannu, nɛ̀ ká̧ nú garo nɛ̀ gbo nɛ̀ mgbara o ŋgeŋ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa ba nɛ́ yuwar si Araba mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-biro Kaldee ndak ɗoŋ wa nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa Sedesias sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Jeriko. Wa baa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a̧ daŋnɛ pii Ribla, nù ko Hamat sitɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ gɔna kita zu a̧.
Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o bem ko Sedesias sɛn Ribla ɓɔn yí-a. Wannu Babilɔŋ gbɛɛ o gasawi Juda mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ a̧ o yí Sedesias, hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo wen baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko tua-wan in o tua-mbɔi, o be Kaldee pi̧i̧ wee sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa to o garo Jerusalɛm a nù.
Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i sɛn saaye in o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ sitɛ a̧ in o oi bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ.
A̧ ee o ŋma wisan ɓɔn tɛ nù‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ ha̧ wa.
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ha̧a̧ so heembea zu mɔ ko Jeremii, ha̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu'e:
«Mɛ̀ bá a̧, mɛ̀ zɔ́k a̧ nɛ̀ de-a; ká mɛ́ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpɔk in a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ ak, mɛ̀ dé ha̧ a̧.»
Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu, Nɛbusasbaŋ gasawi kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu, Nɛrgal-Sarɛsɛr gasawi ko o wi-biro ká bá nɛ̀ o oi gasa wi-biro ko wannu Babilɔŋ lɛŋ
toma ha̧ wa mɛ ba Jeremii sɛn beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ e a̧ er Gedelias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Jeremii ɓɔna nɛnɛ mgbara dukbíí.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa kpee so nɛ̀ a̧ e kɔ̧́ beegara ko o wi-pɛm-mɔ.
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ebɛd-Mɛlɛk be Kus hee ndé, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Wese'i, mi tɛ gbo mɛ er o wi nɛ̀ mɛ de kíí-wa.
Mi tɛ kpasi mɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɛ beka fe fio gba-paa na. Kà mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧‘m, mɛ tɛ duk nɛ̀ desee wen nɛ̀ mɛ kpasa. Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu gboo so nɛ̀ a̧ yinɛ sɛn Rama. Wa hɛra so Jeremii nɛ̀ nyak-boi pi̧ mgbara o bara-biro nɛ̀ wa kai yaknɛ nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm in nɛ̀ nù ko Juda si Babilɔŋ mɛ. Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Nɛbuzaradaŋ kpaa nɛ̀ a̧,
ba a̧ yinɛ mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so wen zu pɛrti bɔnɛ hegɔ mɛ tik fara’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN fo bɔnɛ‘i tɛnɛ, a̧ dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ sitɛ GASA WAN, wen n’ɛnɛ zii wen nú-a na, ɓɛɛ sa mɔ‘i hɔ.

Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ kinii'i, mi bura nyak zɔɓɔ er-mɛ yinɛ; kà mɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ in am si Babilɔŋ mɛ, mɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ yàk, mi tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ̀ de-a; ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ́ bɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛa-a in am si Babilɔŋ, ká mɛ́ tɛ na. Nù lɛŋ a̧a̧ ti mɛ, mɛ̀ hók fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ sɛnɛ.

«Kà mɛ kɔ̧ mɛ duk in am na, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ si katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ, nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee mɛ duk zu o ye Juda, a̧ mɛ̀ dúk in a̧ mgbara dukbíí; kóó mɛ nyɛma nɛa-a fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ hokamɔ kɔ-mɛ.» Gasawi ko o wi-pɛm-wannu ha̧a̧ o nyɔŋmɔ in ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ yak.
Hegɔ Jeremii nɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ Mispa katɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk in a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna tɛ nù‘i.

O gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɓɔna zaŋbɛɛ, wa in o bíí kɔ-wa zia'e ndé, wannu Babilɔŋ ee Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gasa wi-duk-zu nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ha̧ o wiwii, o okoo gú nɛ̀ o obem in o ŋma bíí tɛ nù‘i nɛ̀ wa kai nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ na, ha̧ a̧.
Wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias sɛn Mispa: mɛ̀ nɛ́ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, Yohanaŋ in Yɔnataŋ o bem ko Karea, Sɛraya bem ko Tanumɛt, o bem ko Ofai be Nɛtɔfa, Yezania bem ko be Maka; wa in o bíí kɔ-wa.
Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wa in o bíí kɔ-wa: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ yu kpɛka mɔ ko o be Kaldee na; ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ nù'ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó zu ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ nɛ nɛ̀ de-a h’ɛnɛ.

Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk sɛn Mispa wen o be Kaldee nɛ̀ tɛ́ tɛ̀ sɛn tɛ̀ k’ɛɛ; ɓɛɛ war k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓí o waya-te, in o waya-te-nɔ̧́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɔ́n tɛ o ye n’ɛnɛ tɛ ya sɛnɛ‘i.»

Kale-a mbɛt, o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn nú Mɔab mgbara o be Amɔŋ sɛn nú Edɔm in tɛ o nù lɛŋ zia'e, wannu Babilɔŋ ee o oi bíí sɛn Juda, ɓɛɛ a̧ e Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i.
Wa gara pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ o fara nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so wa si sɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ sɛn nù Juda katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa kaɗi, wa dee dɔ̧ɔ̧, wa ɓii o waya-te, wa mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ katɛ Gedalias sɛn Mispa, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ ɓɔna so zaŋbɛɛ
aka a̧: «Mɛ iŋ kɔ-mɛ‘e Bablis wannu ko o be Amɔŋ toma Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania mɛ gbɛ mɛ na nde?» Gedalias bem ko Ahikam bɛ̧ɛ̧ wen'i.

Ɓɛɛ Yehohanaŋ, bem ko Karea ak Gedalias sɛn Mispa nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ é ha̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ gbɛ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania nɛ̀ hu̧sa-a, nɛ̀ bíí beka iŋ na. Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ, a̧ a̧ gbɛ mɛ nde? O be Juda nɛ̀ mɔi̧ ya katɛ mɛ tɛ yambali, ɓɛɛ oi o be Juda tɛ kum lɛŋ.»
Gedalias bem ko Ahikam kifa nú ha̧ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea: «Ká mɛ de mɔ‘i na! Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ zu Yismaɛl nɛ́ ndela.»

Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, bem ko Elisama, ŋma be nutua-wan, ŋma mgbara o gasawi ko wannu tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa Gedalias bem ko Ahikam sɛn Mispa; a̧ in o bíí ɓu, ɓɛɛ sɛn Mispa'i, wa nyɔŋa mɔ in o ŋmaa.
Nɛ̀ haya-a Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtɛnia in o bíí ɓu nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ in a̧ kura gbɛ Gedalias bem ko Ahikam nɛ̀ gba-paa pi̧ nù. Nɛ́ hegɔ á̧ à̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ wi nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee nɛ̀ wi-duk-zu nù‘i yinɛ.
Nɛ́ kpɔk kalemɔ‘i mbɛt a̧ Yismaɛl gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in Gedalias sɛn Mispa, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so sɛn Mispa.
Zɛ yiitoo ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, nɛ̀ bíí tɛ iŋ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,

o bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ Sikɛm, nɛ̀ Silo in nɛ̀ Samarii; wa lɛŋ duka so nɛ́ o bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar. Wa kpuia zera, pi̧ nɛ̀ o a̧ka̧ laa zɛgbɛ-zɛgbɛ, gɔn nɛ̀ tɛ-wa mbɛt, wa tui so nɛ́ o ha̧a̧mɔ in fuu-nyama tɛnɛ pii kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kura sɛn Mispa we nɛ̀ ti wa, nɛ̀ hi̧a kɔ̧a̧; a̧ kpaa wa yuwar mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ zɔ́k Gedalias bem ko Ahikam.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa hɔɔ see ye kaɗi ga, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania in o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so in a̧ tika zu wa, kum wa, ɓɛɛ kai o wɔr-wa a kɔ̧̀ gɔna-yì.
Mgbara wa'i, o bíí ɓu a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Yismaɛl: «Ká mɛ́ gbɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ n’ɛɛ hu̧sa̧ zaŋbɛɛ: alkamaari, fon, nɔ̧́ in gɔrɔ.» Yismaɛl ee wa duk in o nya-wa.
Gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ Yismaɛl aa so o wɔr-bíí n'aa gbɛɛ so sɛnɛ‘i duka so nɛ́ gasa gɔna-kɔ̧́-yì nɛ̀ wannu Asa gɔna so ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Baɛsa wannu

ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o oi bíí saaye Mispa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ: o boko-be-wan in o oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna so kɔ‘i fara ɔa-a Mispa kaŋ, o wan nɛ̀ Nɛbuzaradaŋ wan ko o wi-pɛm-wannu aa so er Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia wa nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa nɛ̀ o be Amɔŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yohanaŋ, bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧‘i zia wen gbɛɛ-zu ko Yismaɛl, bem ko Natania,
o gasa wi-biro mɔi̧a o bíí kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania. Wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa a̧ ká̧ gba-tɔp sɛn Gabaɔŋ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in Yismaɛl zɔka Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧, wa kpaa desee.
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ Yismaɛl kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Mispa zika tɛ, ɓɛɛ si ɗoŋ sitɛ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea.
Ɓɛɛ war ko Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania, a̧ yuu mɔ yak in o bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea hɛɗa nɛnɛ pii tɛ-a'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ sitɛ o be Amɔŋ.

Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-biro nɛ̀ nɛ̀ɛ̀ so in a̧ kaia o oi bíí. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ o wan nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro sɛn Mispa ɗoŋ fio ko Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam: o wiwii, o wi-biro, o okoo, o obem in o bíí mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu nɛ̀ wa kaia tɛnɛ nɛ̀ Gabaɔŋ.
Wa baa yuwar yak, ɓɛɛ wa yor sɛn kɔ̧̀ gbagari Kimam ká̧ Bɛtlɛhɛm zu naŋ-wa, wen yaka-a si Egiptɛ.
Wa yuu so nɛ́ o be Kaldee nɛ̀ wa de kíí-wa, wen nɛ̀ Yismaɛl bem ko Nɛtania gbɛɛ so Gedalias, bem ko Ahikam, wi-duk-zu-nù nɛ̀ wannu Babilɔŋ ee so.
O gasa wi-biro lɛŋ, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in Azaria bem ko Hosaya in o bíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii katɛ
Jeremii
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ a̧ úsí yuwar n’ɛɛ tɛ ba in mɔ n’ɛɛ tɛ de h’ɛɛ.»
Jeremii
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ kɔ-wa ha̧ Jeremii hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «GASA WAN a̧ dúk nɛ́ kpasa wi-sedaako k’ɛɛ. Ɛɛ tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN k’ɛnɛ tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛɛ.
Kóó mɔ‘i a̧ dee tɛ yɛ, kóó de tɛ yɛ na, ɛɛ tɛ zii tiger GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ tom'nɛ́ sitɛ a̧‘i. Mɔ lɛŋ tɛ́ nɛ̀ nɛ̀ de-a wen n’ɛɛ tɛ zii wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.»
Ɗoŋ zɛ ɓu, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii.
Jeremii saa Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o gasa wi-biro lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ dukbíí lɛŋ, o gasawi in o geɗek-wi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛk mɛ duk tɛ nù'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ba'nɛ́ e ŋgɔn,
mi beka ɗaŋ‘nɛ́ yinɛ na;
mi tɛ gun'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi beka zuɗi'nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ ba ŋgamɔ n'am dee in'nɛɛ‘i yinɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ká kíí wannu Babilɔŋ de'nɛ́ na;
k’ɛ́nɛ́ yu a̧ ɓɔna,
wen mi a̧a̧ in'nɛɛ ha̧‘m mɛ gbo'nɛ́,
mi tɛ zuɗi'nɛ́ ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ko mɛ de a̧ h’ɛnɛ,
wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ e'nɛ́ ɓɔn zu nù k’ɛnɛ.
«Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ̧ zia wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛ́ɛ́ kɔ̧ mɛ ya tɛ nù'ɛ na,› na;

ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Weyaa, ɛ́ɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ yak si nú Egiptɛ mɛ, fara n’ɛɛ beka iŋ biro ɓɔna, n’ɛɛ beka zii dɔma zak wen biro ɓɔna, n’ɛɛ beka zɔk bɔnɛ-ɓana-nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔna; nɛ́ hi̧i̧ ɛ́ɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɓɔn sɛnɛ,› wó,
