nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ oi wi nɛ̀ ya kpasa sɛn Juda’ɛ! Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ba yuwar mɛ yak si Egiptɛ,
mɛ hu̧si tɛ‘nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ,
gba-paa n’ɛnɛ yu'i tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa'nɛ́ sɛn nú Egiptɛ‘i;
kaɓa n’ɛnɛ yu'i tɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ hɔ hi̧i̧;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kum.
O bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ba yuwar mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ hu̧si sɛn Egiptɛ
tɛ fe fio gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa.
Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ kpasi sɛn tɛ ŋga bɔnɛ
n'am tɛ fo pi̧ zu'nɛ́‘i bo na.»
Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo'e:
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo: «Ɛ́nɛ́ oi o bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna kpasa sɛn Juda’ɛ, GASA WAN hee ndé, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ si Egiptɛ na! Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ mbetɛ, sɔsɔɔ, mi nɛ́ wi-sedaako k’ɛnɛ.

Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ yɔ kɔya-tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ toma'm sitɛ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m'e, a̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ ai nú wen'nɛ́ ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ, a̧‘m tɔ̧́ mgbak mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ de.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ‘i h’ɛnɛ kinii, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ mbo zu ha̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ na; ɛ́nɛ́ zii gba̧a̧ mɔ n'aa ee nú‘m mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ na.
Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ iŋ nɛ̀ mbetɛ‘e, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ fe fio gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa sɛn fara n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ husi sɛnɛ‘i.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Jeremii kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ee nú-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ti dukbíí kaɗi,

Azaria, bem ko Hosaya, Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, in o wan-ŋgazu nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii: «Nɛ́ wen-ndela a̧ mɛ tɔ̧. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tom kɔ‘i mɛ́ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ dor yɛ tɛ nɛa-a mɛ hu̧si sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ na.
Nɛ́ Baruk bem ko Nɛriya a̧ ir mɛ mɛ dor yɛ. A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ e yɛ kɔ̧̀ er o be Kaldee, ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ yɛ, mɛ kai yɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ.»
Kóó nɛ́ Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea, kóó nɛ́ o gasawi ko o wi-biro, kóó nɛ́ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, zii tiger GASA WAN nɛ̀ sa wa mɛ ɓɔn tɛ nù Juda'i na.
Yohanaŋ bem ko Karea in o wi-duk-zu o wi-biro kaia o oi be Juda lɛŋ, o wan nɛ̀ pia so ɗoŋ pii Juda ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa pɛsa so nɛnɛ dam tɛ o nù katɛ wa.
Wa kaia o wiwii, o okoo, ká bá nɛ̀ o obem in o boko-be-wan gú nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ́ Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu ee so mɛ ya in Gedalias bem ko Ahikam, bem ko Safaŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ Jeremii
Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ zia wen ko GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ wa kai ŋmaa si Egiptɛ, nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ́ Dafne.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ wen ha̧ Jeremii sɛn Dafne hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ̀ káí o gasa ta, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ á ɗɔɔ naŋ, fara nɛ̀ wa yɔka nɛ̀ gua sɛn beegara nɛ̀ duk si war nú tua-wan ko wannu Egiptɛ sɛn Dafne. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ‘i nɛ gbaayi o ŋma be Juda,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa: Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr tɛ hɔ wen ɗaŋa nú Egiptɛ. Wi nɛ tɛ fe, tɛ fe; o wi nɛ wa tɛ kai nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, tɛ yak kɔ‘i nɛ́ bara-biro; o wi nɛ̀ tɛ fe nɛ́ fio gba-paa, tɛ fe kànà nɛ́ fio gba-paa'i!

Mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ tua ko o sɔ̧ Egiptɛ; Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr tɛ dɔ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ kai wa yaknɛ, a̧ tɛ kai o mɔ lɛŋ yinɛ sɛn nú Egiptɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wi-dai-mɔ gbɛ nɛ̀ o kpɛ̧ yinɛ tɛ laa kɔ‘i’ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ yak mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ yɔli.
A̧ tɛ gbin o ta-zu-nù kɔ̧́ tua ko sɔ̧-wese nɛ̀ duk sɛn Heliopolis sɛn nú Egiptɛ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ dɔ tua ko o sɔ̧ Egiptɛ a nù gbuɗuk.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ o be Juda lɛŋ nɛ̀ dee ye nú Egiptɛ sɛn Migdol, Dafne, Mɛmfis in nu Patros nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
«Gba̧a̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen o ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa dea; wa tu̧u̧ see-am tɛ dɔɔ o ha̧a̧mɔ, gasi nɛ̀ o ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ̀ de so ŋma mɔ ha̧ wa, kóó h’ɛnɛ, kóó ha̧ o dáà k’ɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Mi duka tɛ toma o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, o
wa zii wen nú‘m na, wa yeŋ zer tɛ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ́ kpai taamɔ tɛ ɗaŋ kɔ-wa in dɔɔ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧ na.
Hegɔ, ŋga nyimsea in tu̧u̧-see kɔ‘m tika zu wa, hee wee ga, dɔ o ye Juda in o be mgbara kira Jerusalɛm lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ fara'i kifi nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi kotoro. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a'i zɔk sɔsɔɔ.
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Tɛ mɔ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ tu̧ nɛ́ see-am tɛ o er deemɔ k’ɛnɛ. Ɛ́nɛ́ dɔ nɛ́ o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧ sɛn nú Egiptɛ n’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ hu̧si sɛnɛ‘i. Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ de ha̧ kpar'nɛ́ mɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí zu nù lɛŋ tɛ sa nin'nɛ́, fom nɛ̀ o ŋmaa, da̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa mbɛt.

Tɛ‘nɛ́ bìí ɗoŋ o ɗaŋ deemɔ ko o dáà k’ɛnɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ ko o wannu Juda in ko o kóò kɔ-wa nde? Tɛ‘nɛ́ bìí ɗoŋ o ɗaŋ deemɔ k’ɛnɛ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́ in ko o kóò k’ɛnɛ, n’ɛ̀nɛ́ dee sɛn nù Juda dam mgbara kira Jerusalɛm nde?
Hɔ nɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ ta mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i na; ɛ́nɛ́ tu̧ tɛ‘m na, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ nɔ̀ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o geŋa in o usamɔ n'am usa h’ɛnɛ in ha̧ o dáà k’ɛnɛ na.
«Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in oi o be Juda nɛ̀ kaia ŋmaa nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si sɛn nú Egiptɛ mɛ‘i. Wa tɛ kum lɛŋ, wa tɛ tir a nù sɛn nú Egiptɛ, nú gba-paa in kaɓa. Wa lɛŋ, o geɗek-wi in o gasawi tɛ fe nɛ́ fio gba-paa in kaɓa; wa tɛ kifi nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù, nɛ̀‘i tɛ sa nin-wa fom nɛ̀ o bíí, be nɛ̀ mɔ a zu ŋmaa, da̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in o wi nɛ̀ ɔ nú Egiptɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am dee so nɛ ŋmaa in Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ gba-paa, kaɓa in ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa’ɛ ga.

Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ yu mɔ yak mɛ́ kpasi mgbara o wi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so Juda, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ hu̧si nú Egiptɛ bo na; sɛka ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ́ si ɗoŋ si nù Juda nɛ̀ wa ta mɛ si ɗoŋ sɛnɛ‘i, beka bo na mbɛt. Wa beka si ɗoŋ sɛn hi̧i̧ ɓɔna, kà á̧ bòò nɛ́ o ŋma bíí nɛ̀ mɔ tɛ hɔ yɔɔ zu wa nde, ɛ̧.»
O wi nɛ̀ iŋa so'e o kóò kɔ‘i dɔɔ so o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧, ká bá nɛ̀ o gba gíí okoo nɛ̀ mɔi̧a wese'i, gú nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ dee so ye nú Egiptɛ sɛn Patros, kifa nú ha̧ Jeremii'e nde:
«Kóó wen'i nɛ̀ mɛ̀ tɔ̧ h’ɛɛ‘i, mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ̀ nin GASA WAN ndé, ɛɛ beka zii na.

Ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ de k’ɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛɛ taa mɛ de: dɔɔ o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Ko-wan mɛ yiwese, aa o zɛzɛ nù ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ dee so tɛ o ye nù Juda gú nɛ̀ o be mgbara kira Jerusalɛm ga. Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ yɛ dee mɔ‘i, o dáà k’ɛɛ, o wannu k’ɛɛ, gú nɛ̀ o gasawi k’ɛɛ mbɛt; ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ ya so nyɔŋ nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ fee-see, zaŋ yɛ sur, ɛ́ɛ́ iŋ so k’ɛɛ ŋma ŋgamɔ na.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ kaɗa nɛ̀ dɔɔ o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Ko-wan mɛ yiwese in aa-zɛzɛ nù ha̧ a̧, mɔ lɛŋ ɓan nɛ́ yɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ kum nɛ́ kuma-a nú gba-paa in kaɓa’ɛ.»

O okoo tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ kɔ‘i mbɛt'e: «Ŋgimbi n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ dɔ so nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ Ko-wan mɛ yiwese, bó nɛ́ o wíì k’ɛɛ iŋa so na nde? Bó nɛ́ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ɗɔɔ o makala n’ɛɛ gi so in aa-zɛzɛ n’ɛɛ a so nù ha̧ a̧ mbɛt na nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí lɛŋ, o wiwii in o okoo nɛ̀ kifa so nú ha̧ a̧:

«O ha̧a̧mɔ n’ɛnɛ duka dɔ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ ye o nù Juda in nɛ̀ o mgbara kira Jerusalɛm nɛnɛ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ‘nɛ́, in o dáà k’ɛnɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o wan k’ɛnɛ, o gasawi in o wanmbɔi k’ɛnɛ mbɛt, bó nɛ́ mɔ n’ɛnɛ dea'i duk ɓɔn tɛ taamɔ ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛ-a mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa'i na nde?
GASA WAN nyɛm so mɛ de munyal zu o yɔɔ-kaya in o ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ de'i ɓɔna; ɓɛɛ sa nù k’ɛnɛ kifi duk nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi kotoro, ɓɛɛ kifi nɛ́ mɔɔ-fom-ŋmaa nɛ̀ bíí bo sɛnɛ na. Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧‘i zɔk sɔsɔɔ‘i!

Ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ tika zu'nɛ́ kinii’ɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen zu dɔɔ o ha̧a̧mɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ dɔɔ so ha̧ o ŋma sɔ̧; mɔ‘i nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ ɛ́nɛ́ dea ti GASA WAN. Ɛ́nɛ́ mbo zu tɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ɗoŋ usamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kà bó nɛ̀ kasa o heembea in o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt. Nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi mɔ‘i a̧ tika zu'nɛ́ tɛ mɔ n’ɛɛ zɔk sɔsɔɔ'ɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Jeremii tɔ̧ ha̧ dukbíí lɛŋ, o wiwii gú nɛ̀ o okoo woyo: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn nú Egiptɛ'ɛ!
Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko

Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen ko GASA WAN, ɛ́nɛ́ o be Juda nɛ̀ de ye sɛn nú Egiptɛ. GASA WAN tɔ̧a'e: Mi kana mɔ nɛ̀ nin-am nɛ̀ ɔ gasa, nɛ̀ ŋma be Juda beka kan mɔ nɛ̀ nin-am sɛn nú Egiptɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, ‹GASA WAN dúk kpasa,› ɓɔna.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii’ɛ, mi bó ɗoŋ wa mɛ ha̧ de duka-a ha̧ wa ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ ŋgamɔ zu wa. O be Juda nɛ̀ ya nú Egiptɛ'ɛ lɛŋ tɛ kum nú gba-paa in kaɓa.

Ɓɛɛ o ŋma bíí mɛ mgbara'nɛ́ kpɔk kpɔk nɛ̀ gba-paa'i tɛ yak zu wa tɛ si ɗoŋ nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ si nù Juda, ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i nɛ̀ baa hu̧si so nú Egiptɛ mɛ‘i tɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ k’ɛɛ in'nɛɛ. Wen kɔ‘m a̧ dee kpasamɔ náà, kóó nɛ́ wen k’ɛnɛ a̧ dee dee kpasamɔ nde?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mɔɔ-usi-mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ́ usi h’ɛnɛ‘e, mi tɛ de ŋmaa in'nɛɛ sɛn fara’ɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.

Mi ee Hofra wannu Egiptɛ kɔ̧̀ er o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ kii mɛ́ gbɛ a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ee so nɛ̀ Sedesias wannu Juda kɔ̧̀ er wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ nɛ̀ kia so mɛ́ gbɛ a̧ ga. Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
Wen nɛ̀ Jeremii
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Mɛ̀ áí nú-mɛ‘e: ‹Oee bɔnɛ kɔ‘m wa! Taamɔ gana'm, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɛ̀ɛ̀ fo mbe bɔnɛ pi̧ zu'm’ɛ! Mi mbɔia nɛ̀ gɔfamɔ kaɗi, mi kpa ɔma-tɛ na!›
«Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ Baruk nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: GASA WAN tɔ̧a'e; Mɔ n'am mbo, kànà nɛ́ mi a̧ gbin gbina-a a nù;
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ́ kíí nɛ́ gasamɔ kɔ-mɛ! Ká mɛ́ kii o gasa mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɓɔna! Mi tɛ tom ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu bíí lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ́ tɛ́ kpasi fara lɛŋ nɛ̀ mɛ́ tɛ́ nɛ̀ sɛnɛ.»
Wen’ɛ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii

GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu Egiptɛ in zu o wi-biro ko Nɛko wannu Egiptɛ, ká a̧ duk so sɛn Karkɛmis ká̧ zaŋ yí Efrat, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ gana nɛ̀ a̧ nɛ̀ biro sɛn tɛ naar pɛ-wan ko Joakim bem ko Josias wannu Juda.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́k o ŋgee, o gasa-a in o geɗek-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbár yak si yí biro!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r o nyaŋa,
o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbár nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-gu-zu'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ a nú sɛ́ɛ̀ siti;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ o laa-boi tɛ‘nɛ́!
«Ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ ge?
Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m zɔk’ɛ ge?
Bele zara wa lɛŋ,
wa si nɛ́ ɗoŋ nɛ̀ ndaa.
Wa gɔma o ŋgaŋa-wi kɔ-wa zakati nɛ̀ nù,
wa yu nɛ́ mɔ nduɗɛɛ yaknɛ.
Wa zɔk géé zɔka mɔ si ɗoŋ ɓɔna;
mɔɔ-kíì dama fara lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ!
Kóó nɛ́ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nyɛm mɛ yu mɔ yak na;
kóó nɛ́ ŋgaŋa-wi nyɛm mɛ kpasi tɛ-wi na:
Nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ zaŋ Efrat,
wa kɔ̧́ nɛ́ naŋ tir nɛnɛ a nù.
«Nɛ́ o'o duk hee yì Nil ga nɛ̀ ha̧ daŋnɛ,
hee ŋma gasa nana-yì nɛ̀ yí-a kpa̧i̧ kpa̧i̧'ɛ ga o?
Nɛ́ Egiptɛ a̧ duk hee yì Nil nɛ̀ ha̧ daŋnɛ,
hee ŋma gasa nana-yì nɛ̀ yí-a kpa̧i̧ kpa̧i̧ ga.
Egiptɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so kɔ‘i'e, wi tɛ ha̧,
wi tɛ kpe zu nù, ɓɛɛ wi kuma o ye,
in o wi-ɔ-sɛnɛ lɛŋ.
O nyaŋa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m pamyala;
o keekee, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m nɛ̀ ŋgai;
o ŋgaŋa-wi a̧ gɔ́m siti:
o bíí Kus in o bíí Put,
o wan-zika-ŋgee, ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí Lud
o wi-pi̧-góò mbɛt!
Ɓɛɛ war ko GASA WAN,
Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
wese'i nɛ́ wese-kifa-er,
wen usa bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧;
gba-paa hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma ŋga saɗi-nyɔŋ-bíí,
nɛ̀ nyɔŋ bíí, ɓɛɛ ká zaŋ sura,
ɓɛɛ ká tɔk tɛ-wa gbɛɛ a̧ hee dɔ̧ɔ̧'ɛ ga.
Mɔ‘i duk nɛ́ ɗafa-sɔ̧ wen GASA WAN Sɔ̧,
wan ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
tɛ́ nù mɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ká̧ zaŋ yí Efrat mɛ.
«Egiptɛ, mɛ yàà-be-zɔŋa’ɛ,
mɛ̀ dáŋ si nú Galad,
á̧ mɛ̀ kíí nyina-ga̧-nyimmɔ.
O dɔka ɗafa-tɛ kɔ-mɛ‘i nɛ́ tom takaɗi,
wen ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ́ de ha̧ nyimmɔ kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ ga̧, bo na.
O tugun bíí zii nɛ́ nyɛrɛ mɔɔ-búù kɔ-mɛ,
wen
O ŋgaŋa-wi kɔ̧ nɛ́ naŋ nɛ̀ ŋmaa,
tir nɛnɛ a zu ŋmaa.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ mɔ'ɛ sɛn nú Egiptɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ wa mɛ zii wen’ɛ sɛn Migdol,
Mɛmfis in sɛn Dafne mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e: ‹Mɛ̀ kúr, mɛ̀ yór à̧ nɔ́!›
Gba-paa a̧ nyɔŋ katɛ mɛ‘i.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ gba ge? Apis
Wiwii ndai kɔ-mɛ yor géé yora-a na!
GASA WAN sɔmgba a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ si tik nù;
o bíí mbɛt yoo nù, tir a zu ŋmaa,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kúr,
ɛ̀ɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ mgbara dukbíí k’ɛɛ, si nù k’ɛɛ mɛ,
ɗoŋ yɛ a̧ nyɛ́í̧ nɛ̀ gba-paa nɛ́ de ko ha̧ bíí na!›
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n nin a zu wannu Egiptɛ‘e,
‹Wi-de-tua oi gɔna-kórò.›
«Wannu nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a:
Mi duk kpasa!
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kaya Tabɔr yor nɛnɛ
ɓɔn oi mgbara o dɔka kaya ga,
in hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kaya Karmɛl yor
ɓɔn oi ká̧ gba-tɔp’ɛ ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wisɛn k’ɛnɛ tɛ́ tɛ̀ nɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɛ́r o tùì k’ɛnɛ wen yaka-a si ŋma nù,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nú Egiptɛ;
Mɛmfis tɛ bìì wee korkor,
kifi nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà kotoro.
Egiptɛ duka so nɛ́ gba de daŋa zɔŋa-ndai,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ zi̧-ɓór-ɓór tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ zu̧ tɛ-a.
Kóó nɛ́ gɔni o wi-biro wan mɛ́ yoɓa-a
nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ mgbák nú Egiptɛ,
nɛ̀ yaa hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ o be daŋa wiwii-ndai
nɛ‘i zɔk nɛ̀ de-a’ɛ ga,
wa mbɛt zika ɗoŋ yu mɔ in o ŋmaa soŋkpooŋ,
wa yor géé yora-a na.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wese tika-a kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ tɛnɛ‘i,
nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ kifi nɛ̀ nú zu ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.
O wi-biro ko o bíí Egiptɛ zika tɛ
yu mɔ yak hee gɔ́k ga,
giti-wa bo na;
o wisɛn kɔ-wa gar wa nɛ̀ kpi̧i̧
hee wi-gɔm-te ga.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɔ́í wa a nù hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i pɔi nɛ̀ kombo’ɛ ga;
hee da̧a̧ kombo nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ́ ye sɛnɛ na ga!
O wisɛn nɔ‘i dɔka gan o gba-dɔya,
wi nyɛm mɛ́ tɔr wa na.
Ziimɔ baa Egiptɛ yàà-de be-zɔŋa’ɛ,
a̧ tika kɔ̧̀ er o bíí mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ.»
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ́ a wa kɔ̧̀ er o wi nɛ̀ kii mɛ gbɛ wa, kɔ̧̀ er Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ in o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
«Nɛ́ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i a̧ Egiptɛ tɛ́ kpa nɛ̀ duka-a nɛ̀ de-a hee kuti-a ga.»
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Jakob, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
ká mɛ́ de kíì na,
ká mɛ́ e ha̧ tɛ-mɛ mɛ́ mɔk na,
Mi tɛ́ kai'nɛ́ pii ɗoŋ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o nyɛi̧a fara,
mi tɛ́ gbo o bezaŋ‘nɛ́ tɛ nù nɛ̀ wa de bara sɛnɛ.
Jakob tɛ pii ɗoŋ,
nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ́ fo a̧ bo na.
A̧ tɛ duk mgbítíŋ,
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ-a beka bo na mbɛt.
Mɛ Jakob, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m,
ká mɛ́ de kíì na, mi a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Mi tɛ kum o tugun bíí lɛŋ
fara n'am pɛsa'nɛ́ dam sɛnɛ;
ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi beka kum'nɛ́ na;
mi tɛ́ usi ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a h’ɛnɛ,
nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ beka yɔ‘nɛ́ na!
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ!»
Wen’ɛ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii
A̧ tɔ̧a:
«O yì ha̧ ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ,
wa kifi nɛ́ o ŋga som-yì nɛ̀ fok nɛ̀ ŋgai.
Yì‘i ha̧a̧ kpe zu nù in o mɔ mɛ zu nù lɛŋ,
o ye in o bíí nɛ̀ ɔ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
O bíí ya hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ, ai nɛ̀ nú
wen ha̧ ŋma bíí mɛ gbak wa;
o bíí tɛ nù‘i lɛŋ ya hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a
wen giti naŋ o nyaŋa-war-yì
nɛ̀ wa zii fara kɔn ŋmaa tɛnɛ,
in giti naŋ o keekee fara nɔ̀ì̧ tɛnɛ.
Tɛ o dáà-wan-bem gbina,
ɓɛɛ see-wa bo tɛ o bem kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ wese’ɛ nɛ́ wese kuma-a ko o be Filistii lɛŋ,
ŋma oi nda bíí nɛ̀ tɛ duk
mɛ́ ye ɗoŋ o bíí Tir in Sidɔŋ bo na.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, GASA WAN kuma o be Filistii;
o be Filistii nɔ‘i nɛ́ oi ndaa
o bíí see-kisi Kaftɔr nɛ̀ ɓɔna so.
O wi Gaza kpuia zu zim nɛ̀ mɔ,
Askelɔŋ duk kɔ‘i wékéké.
Ɛ́nɛ́ oi o bíí bɔkɔ-nù nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu nɛ'ɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kaɗi aa da̧i̧ tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ gese ge?
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔm ŋgamɔ'ɛ ho!
Oee gba-paa ko GASA WAN wa,
mɛ beka ɔm tɛ-mɛ na nde?
Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ kɔ̧́ koɓo,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɔ́m tɛ-mɛ, mɛ̀ dúk kéɗéŋ.
Hee ge gba-paa tɛ ɔm tɛ-wi ge?
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ a̧,
tóm nɛ̀ a̧ si zu Askelɔŋ,
in si war ká̧ zaŋ gba-tɔp.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
«Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ ge ŋgamɔ ge nɛ̀ tika zu Nɛbo’ɛ ge!
Ye kɔ-wa ɗaŋa lɛŋ!
Foe baa Kiriataim, biro baa a̧;
foe baa gasa ye'i nɛ̀ gbina a nù.
Hura-nin ko Mɔab kaɗa;
sɛn Hɛsbɔŋ, wa ba nɛ́ o ɗaŋ keta zu a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbɔ́lí tugun bíí'ɛ yinɛ.›
Mɛ mbɛt Madmɛn, wa kpee nú mɛ,
gba-paa a̧a̧ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Wi zii nɛ́ saa sara wen gbakamɔ
nɛ̀ war Horonaim mɛ̀ tɛnɛ;
mɔ kuma kaɗi, mɔ ɗaŋa lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti.
Mɔ ko Mɔab hɔ oi mɔ ɓɔna,
wi zii nɛ́ tiger o bem kɔ̧-a̧ fara hiɗi mɔ ŋgúr-ŋgúr.
Wi daŋ kaya Luhit nɛ̀ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a;
tɛ̀ zira-a nɛ̀ Horonaim,
wi zii nɛ́ o
zu o mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ yak bee,
kóó o ndé à̧ má nɛ́ kɔ‘i!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ yá Arɔɛr ŋga-gbárà
hee tuifuu zaŋbɛɛ ga.
Mɔab, kɔ-mɛ, mɛ́ dúk tɛ-mɛ nɛ̀ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ,
in mbɔi kɔ-mɛ;
ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii'i, mɔ baa mɛ́ kaɗi.
Wa tɛ ba sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ Kɛmɔs yaknɛ si gɔni-nù mɛ,
in o wiɗaf'aa gú nɛ̀ o wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
Mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ ɗaŋa mɔ tɛ ye k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ;
ŋma ye kpɔk ɓɔn na,
o mɔ mɛ́ kɔ̧̀ ɗɔŋgɔ k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ ɗaŋa
hɔ nɛnɛ bɔkɔ-nù mɛ̀ mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó mɔɔ-sedaako-fio e nɛ̀ nin Mɔab,
wen ye kɔ̧-a̧ ɗaŋa kifi nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi,
nɛ̀ ŋma bíí beka ɔ sɛnɛ ɓɔna.
Fom a̧ bá bíí nɛ̀ de tom ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ tɛɛri,
in nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ ha̧ tok tɛ-wi mɛ fo nú gba-paa kɔ̧-a̧ na!
«Mɔab duka so tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ de-a
tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ‘i mɛ tɛnɛ;
ŋma ŋgamɔ fo so a̧ si ŋma fara na.
A̧ duka so oi-aa mgbítíŋ nɛ̀ ga̧a̧-a̧,
hee ŋma de mbiɗi-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Wa gbai so a̧ si kɔ̧́ ŋma nyɛk na.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna nɛnɛ tɛ-a,
ɓɛɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧-a̧a̧ duk ɓɔn oi-aa.»
GASA WAN'e, «Zu mɔ‘i, wese tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ tom o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbai wa a nù hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i gbai nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nù'ɛ ga; wa tɛ gbai mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ kɔ̧̀ kpánà lɛŋ a nù, ɓɛɛ wa gbaa kpánà‘i.
Gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ ba Mɔab wen zu Kɛmɔs hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa so nɛ̀ o be
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Mɔab,
hee ge ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧‘e,
ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o ŋgaŋa-wi,
o yaa-ŋgo-biro, ge?
Wannu nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a:
Wi-ɗaŋ-Mɔab a̧ daŋ tɛnɛ mɛ tik o ye kɔ̧-a̧‘i;
wa tɛ gbɛ o daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gbɛ nɛ̀ saɗi
sɛn fara-gɔn-ndai’ɛ ga.
«Mɔab hɛɗa ɗaŋa-a kaɗi,
ŋgamɔ duk dɔ̧́ɔ̧́ mɛ tik zu a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ tɛ-a,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nɛ ɔ katɛ a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o de sɛm kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e:
‹Ho! Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ gba ge ŋgayamɔ gèé?
Gba ye’ɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gbina a nù
nɛ̀ oi ŋgamɔ kɔ‘i lɛŋ'ɛ!›
«O bíí nú Dibɔŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zír zu damti-wan k’ɛnɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk zu buk-paa,
wen wan-ɗaŋ-Mɔab a̧ daŋ tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘nɛ́‘i;
a̧ tɛ́ gbin o ŋga fara k’ɛnɛ lɛŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Arɔɛr,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór yuwar ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́m mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ák o wi-yu-mɔ yak
in o wan nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa'e,
nɛ́ ge a̧ yak ge?
Búù baa Mɔab zu tika-a kɔ-wa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ,
ha̧ o bíí mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak'nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ si ká̧ zaŋ Arnɔŋ mɛ‘e ndé,
Mɔab ɗaŋa!
«Kita a̧ tɛ‘i, a̧ tɛ tik zu o wi-ɔ bɔkɔ-nù, Holɔŋ, Yasa, Mefat,
Dibɔŋ, Nɛbo, Bɛt-Diblataim,
Kiriataim, Bɛt-Gamul, Bɛt-Mɛɔŋ,
Kɛriot, Bɔsra, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧a'e, nú Mɔab nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ, o wan mɛ nyɛi̧a fara, in o wan nɛ̀ nyɛi̧ na mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ŋgai ko Mɔab lɛŋ gbina,
ɓaa Mɔab gbina,
ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ kaɗa.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́sí a̧ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen n'aa taa so'e, wi gana GASA WAN. A̧ tɛ kin tɛ-a nɛ̀ ɔ̧i̧ kɔ̧-a̧, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kifi nɛ́ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko bíí.
Mɔab, tɛ-mɛ a̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ duka-a nɛ̀ mɛ́ duka so zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o be Mɔab,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr yak tɛ o ye nɔ'ɔ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ya mgbara ta,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá hee o gbaku̧i̧ nɛ̀ de yáá kɔ‘i
tɛ o hu̧sa̧ fara nú di̧i̧'ɛ ga.
«Ɛ́ɛ́ zia nyɛrɛ ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko Mɔab;
a̧ so kànà nɛ́ wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ nɛ̀ mbetɛ!
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ ge ŋgazu in gasa zu ge
nɛ̀ duk tɛ-a’ɛ gèé?
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ ge ɗaŋ-nú-wen in duka-tɛ gèé?»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi iŋa ŋmaŋa-tɛ in ŋmaŋa-zaŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧; mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ bó nɛ́ kpasamɔ na.
«Mi ai nú wen zu Mɔab,
ɓɛɛ hegɔ‘i mi sa nɛ́ o bíí mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ gbak a̧;
mi gɔfi nɛ́ mɔ wen zu bɔnɛ ko o bíí Kir-Hɛrɛs.
Nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko Sibma,
mi hi̧a kɔ̧a̧ zù mɛ́ gan Yazɛr;
gbaa-er-mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ hɔ kur gba-tɔp,
hɔ nɛnɛ Yazɛr mɛ.
Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ tika zu nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ
in waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɔab, gasa tortɛ nɛ̀ ba so'nɛ́
zu nyɔnɔ in o nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛnɛ tɛ kaɗi;
mi tɛ de ha̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ ɔ̧si̧ kɔ̧̀ o kpánà k’ɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o ndikira gima-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ kaɗi mbɛt.
«Wi zii nɛ́ sara gbakamɔ nɛ wa sa si Hɛsbɔŋ hɔ nɛnɛ Eleale mɛ. Ger-wa kura nɛ̀ Sɔar hɔ nɛnɛ Yahas, Horonaim in Eglat-Selisaya, wen kóó nɛ́ o yì mɛ Nimrim ɔ̧sa lɛŋ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Mi tɛ kum o bíí Mɔab nɛ̀ mboo
«Hegɔ mi gɔfi nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee kɔ̧́ see-am zu Mɔab in zu o bíí Kir-Hɛrɛs hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i zii nɛ̀ giti fol-ɗaŋsee’ɛ ga, wen o mɔ nɛ̀ wa kpaa so lɛŋ yɔa.
Hegɔ, wa lɛŋ kpuia zu-wa in o zera kɔ-wa mbɛt. Wa ee da̧i̧ kɔ̧̀ er-wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa a bufu tɛ-wa zim nɛ̀ mɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a: «Aia-nú dama nɛ̀ zu o tua, in o bee-gara ko Mɔab lɛŋ. Mi tɛ gba Mɔab a nù hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i gba nɛ kpánà nɛ̀ de tɛ-wi na a nù'ɛ ga.
Ho! O'o Mɔab nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tika ɗaŋ lɛŋ'ɛ nde! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ a̧! A̧ zika ɗoŋ nɛ̀ foe, kifi duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù in mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o bíí mɛ katɛ a̧.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɔ hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma tama a̧ bu̧i̧, ɓɛɛ sa nyɛi̧ ɓaa-wi si zu Mɔab ga.
«Biro nyɔŋa o gasa ye mɛ́ nú Mɔab lɛŋ,
gú nɛ̀ o ŋga-fara-biro mbɛt.
«Yàà-ŋgo-biro tɛ kpa bɔnɛ hee okoo nɛ̀ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko bem ga.
«Mɔab ɗaŋa lɛŋ,
a̧ bó nɛ́ dukbíí ɓɔna,
wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e wi gana GASA WAN.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Gasa mɔɔ-kíì a̧ tík zu'nɛ́,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nú Mɔab!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tík kɔ̧̀ gboŋgo!
Yɔk a̧ bá‘nɛ́!
Wi nɛ̀ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ yu mɔ yak tik gasa mɔɔ-kíì‘i
à̧ tík kɔ̧̀ gboŋgo!
Wi nɛ̀ tɛ daŋ kɔ̧̀ gboŋgo'i a̧ bá yɔk.
Mi fo nɛ́ pɛ-bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ ko Mɔab pi̧ zu a̧.
O wi-yu-mɔ mbɔia tɔkɔrɔ
ɓɛɛ wa yor mɛ́ e zu-wa ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧ Hɛsbɔŋ;
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ leɓe-wee gboo nɛ̀ saaye'i
nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ kira-wan ko wannu Sihɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ bu̧i̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ tik zu nù ko wi-ari nɔ‘i,
bíí nɛnɛ nɛ̀ mgbara-nù mɛ hegɔɔ
yak nɛnɛ hɔ see nù kɔ-wa mɛ.
Oee bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ wa, Mɔab!
O bíí ko Kɛmɔs lɛŋ kuma.
Wa kaia o bem in o boko-bem kɔ-mɛ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara.
«Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ,
mi tɛ ba Mɔab e ŋgɔn woyo.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Sɔŋkur wen ko Sɔ̧ zu Mɔab kaɗa hegɔ.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu o be Amɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
A̧ bó nɛ̀ o wi-duk-oi-aa na nde?
Ɓɛɛ wen ge sa Milkɔŋ
ɓɛɛ sa dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ bɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o gasa ye nɔ'ɔ ge?»
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa GASA WAN tɔ̧‘e:
«Zu mɔ‘i, wese tɛ hɔ
n'am tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ gai mɔ-biro sɛn Raba,
zɔm ye ko o be Amɔŋ.
Ye'i tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà;
o be ye mɛ́ katɛ a̧ tɛ bìì wee,
ɓɛɛ
nɛ̀ wa kaia so.»
O be Hɛsbɔŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ kɔ̧a̧,
«Ai ɗaŋa lɛŋ!»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ híɗí mɔ,
ɛ́nɛ́ o be ye lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ka̧ Raba,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á bufu tɛ‘nɛ́!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yámbálí dam kɔ̧́ garo!
Wa baa Milkɔŋ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara si ŋma nù,
gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Wen ge mɛ́ duk ŋmaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ
zu ɗɔŋgɔ kɔ-mɛ ge, Raba,
zɔŋa yàà-ŋga-zu’ɛ?
Ɗɔŋgɔ kɔ-mɛ dea,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ mɛ̀ duk sɛnɛ duk nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ
zu o kpaa-mɔ kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«O'o tɛ ba zu dúk nɛ̀‘m o?»
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a:
«Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ fo gasa mɔɔ-kíì pi̧ zu'nɛ́,
nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ ɔ katɛ mɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ pɛsi, kóó o ndé ma nɛ́ kɔ‘i tan ti;
ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ mɔi̧ o wi-yu-mɔ, bo na.
«Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, mi tɛ ba Amɔŋ e ŋgɔn woyo.»
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ zu Edɔm nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ bo Teman ɓɔna nde?
O wi-ba-keta kɔ-wa bó nɛ̀ kpasa taamɔ na,
iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-wa yɔa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí Dedan,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ yak!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀.
Nɛ́ mi'i tɛ ɗaŋ o bezaŋ Esau.
Ŋgimbi hɔɔ ha̧ wa mɛ kifi nú
zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa kaɗi.
Kà o wi-ɓi-waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ,
wa beka e ŋma sikila-a kpɔk duk na.
Kà o wi-zuzu tɛ mɛ zɛ,
wa kai kànà nɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ wa nyɛma mɛ kai.
Nɛ́ mi nɛ̀ tɛ‘m à̧ tɛ kai mɔ er o bezaŋ Esau,
mi tɛ kai o mbɔi nɛ̀ wa hu̧sa̧ so'i a zan.
Wa nyɛm mɛ hu̧si tɛ-wa ɓɔna;
o bezaŋ-wa, o nya-wa
in o wi-ɔ katɛ wa tɛ kum,
ɓɛɛ ŋma oi ndaa bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ɓɔn mɛ tɔ̧‘e:
‹Ká mɛ́ ta mɔ wen o be-oi-mɛ na,
mi tɛ dai wa;
ɓɛɛ o ko-oi-mɛ nyɛma mɛ e ta nɛ‘m,› wó,
beka bo na.»

Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ai! O wi nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ so be-ɗele na, nɔɔ nɛ̀ doole, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ nyaŋ so zu mɛ nde? Weyaa, mɔ‘i beka hɔ yɔɔ zu mɛ na; mɛ tɛ nɔ kànà nɛ̀ mbetɛ.

GASA WAN tɔ̧a, nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi kàná mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ‘m, Bɔsra tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà, géé bɛɛ-oi; a̧ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ mɔ nɛ̀ o bíí tɛ́ ba da̧ nɛ̀ ŋmaa, be nɛ̀ mɔ a̧ zu ŋmaa mbɛt. O be ye nɛ̀ zii nɛ̀ a̧ lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Mi zia nú-tom nɛ̀ GASA WAN ee nú ŋma betom mɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ o tugun bíí hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ bi Edɔm!»
«Nɛ́ mbetɛ, mi tɛ de mɛ́ nɛ̀ geɗek-a
mgbara o tugun bíí;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zɔk mɛ hee geemɔ ga.
Mɛ́ dúk nɛ́ tɛ-mɛ tɛ kíì
nɛ̀ mɛ pi̧ tɛ o bíí;
mɛ́ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e mɛ gana o bíí lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ɔr nɛ́ tɛ-mɛ sɔɔ géè.
Mɛ́ ɔ́ nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ o di̧i̧-ta,
hak nɛnɛ nɛ̀ nú-zɔ̧ɔ̧ o kusa kaya.
Kóó mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ de so yáá kɔ-mɛ
zu kusa mɔ zaŋ kaya hee tama ga,
mi tɛ kɔti mɛ pi̧ nù.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Edɔm tɛ kifi ŋga-gbárà kotoro. O bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir yak nɛ̀ ká̧ fara'i bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk o mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa, wa tɛ hiɗi mɔ nɛ̀ gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ zu mɔ‘i.
GASA WAN hee ndé, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dee so tɛ ɗaŋa-a ko Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr ká bá nɛ̀ o ye nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so katɛ wa ga, ŋma bíí beka ɔ fara'i ɓɔna, ŋma bíí mɛ duk hi̧i̧ bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
«Mi tɛ daŋ tɛnɛ hee ŋma dila
nɛ̀ daŋ nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ da̧a̧ kombo Jurdɛn pii tɛ ɓoramɔ'ɛ ga;
mi tɛ ndak o bíí lɛŋ yinɛ fara'i hee gɔma-yí ga.
Mi tɛ fo o daŋa wi-biro pii zu wa.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ we zu nɛ‘m o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ba'm si ti kita o?
Nɛ́ ge wi-dai-mɔ ge a̧ tɛ yor ti'm ge?»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí ŋma mbe taamɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN ɗafa zu Edɔm.
Zu-wen n'aa ee wen dea-a in o bíí saaye Tɛman nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ nɛ̀ mbetɛ‘e,
wa tɛ ɔr wa kai yaknɛ hee o sami ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ nù kɔ-wa
wen zu deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Tɛ tika-a kɔ-wa'i, nù naka;
Ɔ hee mɛ̀ nɛ́ ŋma tama a̧ daŋ tɛnɛ nyar nɛ̀ ɓaa si zu Bɔsra ga. Wese'i o yaa-ŋgo-biro ko Edɔm tɛ kpa bɔnɛ hee okoo nɛ̀ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko bem’ɛ ga.
War ko Damas,
foe baa Hamat in Arpad;
mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ wa zia ŋma ɗaŋ nyɛrɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ wa pɛŋi hee gba-tɔp ga.
Mɔ'ɔ bɔɔ hee ge,
wa nyɛm mɛ́ duk mgbítíŋ na?
Ŋgai ko Damas gbina,
a̧ zika tɛ mɛ́ yu mɔ,
gba-gbánà baa a̧,
tu̧u̧-see in nyimmɔ baa a̧ hee okoo
nɛ̀ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko bem’ɛ ga.
Ho! Wa ee gasa ye’ɛ duk,
ye-ha̧-desee h’ɛnɛ'ɛ?
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɛ kpɔk wese'i, o daŋa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ yoo nù ɓɔn bee-gara ye'i. Wi zii ger o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ o garo Damas, ɓɛɛ tɛ bìì tua-wan ko Bɛn-Hadad.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu Kedar in zu o mɔɔ-wan ko Hasɔr nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ ɗaŋa so nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tík Kedar,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúm o bíí Kedɛm.
A'i káí o tua-laa in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa,
gú nɛ̀ o geɗek tua-laa fara-ɔm-tɛ,
in o mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
A'i káí o ŋgeloba kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ a'i gáí mɔ a zu wa'e ndé:
‹Kíì a̧ dé‘nɛ́ fara lɛŋ.› »
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ má yì nɛ̀ haya-a!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧sí kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀,
ɛ́nɛ́ o be Hasɔr,
wen Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ taa ɗaŋmɔ zu'nɛ́;
a̧ ɗafa ŋma yuwar nɛ̀ de na zu'nɛ́.»
GASA WAN'e,
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá biro
dúk nɛ̀ tugun bíí'ɛ nɛ̀ ta mɔ na,
nɛ̀ kíi ŋma mɔ de wa na’ɛ.
Wa bó nɛ̀ o kpar-nú tua,
kà bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-mana-a na mbɛt,
wen wa ya tɛ fara kɔ-wa mɛ gɛ́ɗɛ́k.
O wisɛn tɛ kai o ŋgeloba
in o gíí mɔ-dai kɔ-wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-biro,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pɛsi o yàá-kpui-ká̧-yí nɔ‘i dam ti zan;
mi tɛ pi̧ bɔnɛ zu wa tɛ fara lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Hasɔr tɛ kifi nɛ́ fara-duk ko o gba-toyo,
géé ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ tɛ́ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ŋma bíí beka ɔ fara'i ɓɔna,
ŋma bíí mɛ duk hi̧i̧ bo ɓɔna mbɛt.»
Wen’ɛ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jeremii
Gba̧a̧-wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧a nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ gbin kusaa-goo ko Elam
nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ kpasa ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧‘i ŋgɛrɛm-ŋgɛrɛm a nù.
Mi tɛ tom búk nɛ̀ war mgbii-zan naar pi̧ zu Elam.
Mi tɛ pɛsi wa dam fara lɛŋ,
ŋma nù nɛ̀ o be Elam beka pɛsi hɔ sɛnɛ na, bo na.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o be Elam ti o wisɛn kɔ-wa,
o wi nɛ̀ kíí mɛ gbɛ wa.
Mi tɛ tom ŋma ŋgamɔ pi̧ zu wa,
mɔ‘i nɛ́ nyimsea kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ e gba-paa ɗoŋ-wa
hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ kum nɛ wa lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ mbo damti-wan kɔ‘m sɛn Elam,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pɛsi wannu in o gasawi sɛnɛ yinɛ.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɛ́ ŋma ŋgimbi,
mi tɛ ba Elam e ŋgɔn woyo.
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu Babilɔŋ, nù ko o be Kaldee, nɛ̀ nú Jeremii,
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ'ɔ ha̧ o tugun bíí;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔɔ-usi-mɔ zu mɔ‘i ha̧ wa,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ wa,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si mɔ kpɔk nɛ̀ wa na!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e Babilɔŋ tika!
Kinii, ziimɔ in gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa;
nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ziimɔ baa Bɛl,
ɓɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ duk zu Marduk!
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ŋma tugun bíí mɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn
baa zu dúk nɛ̀ a̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tugun bíí‘i a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ nù kɔ̧-a̧
kifi géé ŋga-gbárà kotoro,
nɛ̀ bíí beka ɔ sɛnɛ ɓɔna.
Kóó nɛ́ bíí, kóó nɛ́ saɗi
beka duk fara'i ɓɔna,
wen o mɔ lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak e fara'i duk.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi'i, o be
in o be Juda tɛ pii ɗoŋ in o ŋmaa,
nɛ́ nɛ̀ nɔ̀, hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar,
kíí nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Wa ak nɛ́ yuwar mɛ nɛ̀ si
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ yuwar'i a̧ wa zika yí-wa si sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɔ̀ kɔ-wa'i mɛ nɛ́ wen ha̧ wa mɛ́ kpa ŋmaa
in GASA WAN tɛ
nɛ̀ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
nɛ̀ tɛ-wa beka bi ɗoŋ-aa na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m yaa so hee o
o wi-dai-wa dee so ha̧ wa mɛ yɔ.
Nɛ́ wa'i a̧ dee so ha̧ o sami mɛ pɛsi dam mgbara o kaya,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa yara nɛ̀ zu o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ wa iŋ oi fara-duk kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
O mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ kpaa so wa, nyɔŋ nɛ́ wa;
o wisɛn kɔ-wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e ndé,
o mɔ nɛ̀‘i de ha̧ wa bo nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ na,
wen nɛ́ wa a̧ dee déé ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN ɛ̧.
Yuwar deemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a in o mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta
ko o dáà kɔ-wa duka so nɛ́ GASA WAN!
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ yak nú Babilɔŋ,
nù ko o be Kaldee!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó yák!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúk nɛ̀ kpɔra-a hee ŋma bara-wiwii-saɗi
nɛ̀ duk ti ha̧ ŋma gíí saɗi’ɛ ga.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mi tɛ ir o gasa tugun bíí
tɛ́ nù si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn
mɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi Babilɔŋ.
Wa tɛ yor naŋ-biro in a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ba nù kɔ̧-a̧.
O góò kɔ-wa nyun mɔ na
hee ŋma ŋga wi-biro nɛ̀ píí nɛ̀ géé er na ga.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Wa tɛ ɓar mɔ ko o bíí nú Kaldee lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ tɛ kai mɔ kɔ-wa tɛ ya nɛ̀ desee.»
«Í̧ì̧ wa! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ̀ desee,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ̀ tortɛ,
ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ɗaŋ-mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘m!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hɔ́ zaŋgule hee o nyaŋa ga;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hìɗì mɔ hee o nyaŋa nɛ̀‘i dai
wen dɛma kpar-a’ɛ ga.
Foe in búù baa nàà k’ɛnɛ, wan-ko'nɛ́‘i.
Nù k’ɛnɛ tɛ sir de geemɔ ti o ŋma tugun bíí,
fara'i tɛ kifi nɛ́ géé ŋga fara kotoro.
«Tɛ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN,
bíí beka ɔ tɛ ye’ɛ ɓɔna.
A̧ tɛ kifi duk nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ oi-aa.
Kíì tɛ́ ba o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir nɛ̀ ká̧ Babilɔŋ yak.
Tɛ zɔka o mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋa tɛ ye'i,
wa tɛ mi̧i̧ zu, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen nɛ̀ ɗɔɔ nú yaknɛ.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o wan-ŋgaŋ-kusaa’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ́r Babilɔŋ kpa nú ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ sɛ́mbí a̧,
wen a̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáí mɔ-biro a zu a̧ nɛ̀ ge fara ge ndé lɛŋ,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɛi̧ er-a h’ɛnɛ.
O mbiŋ-tua kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ndur a nù,
gú nɛ̀ o garo kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Mɔ‘i nɛ́ kifa-er ko GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er ha̧ a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ kalemɔ n'aa dee so in o ŋma bíí‘i in a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúm o wi-gun-mɔ in o wi-mɔi̧-nyɔnɔ
mɛ nú Babilɔŋ lɛŋ yinɛ.
Kóó o ndé a̧ yú mɔ tá nɛ́ ɗoŋ dukbíí kɔ‘i si nù kɔ‘i,
ti gba-paa nɛ̀ de ko ha̧ bíí na'i.»
ɓɛɛ o dila duk so ndak nɛnɛ ga.
Nɛti nɛ́ wannu Asirii a̧ ku̧u̧ so naŋ nyɔŋa a̧, ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ nyɔŋ a̧ hegɔɔ hɔ tɛ gba̧a̧.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
«Mi tɛ mgbɔ
tɛ̀ de fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ yar nɛ̀ zu kaya Karmɛl in zu kaya Basaŋ,
nyɔŋ nɛ̀ mɔ zaŋ-aa sur
in nɛ̀ zu kaya Efraim in kaya Galad mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wi tɛ kii yɔɔ-kaya ko
ɓɛɛ wi beka kpa na.
Wi tɛ kii o ɗaŋmɔ ko Juda,
ɓɛɛ wi beka kpa na mbɛt.
Mi tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi n'am ee mɛ kpasi ha̧ wa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mɛ̀ bá biro dúk nɛ̀ nú Maratim!
Mɛ̀ bá biro dúk nɛ̀ a̧ in o bíí nú Pɛkod.
Mɛ̀ kúm wa ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ há̧ o oi bíí nɛ̀ ɓɔna ha̧‘m;
mɛ̀ dé mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Oee zɔm giti biro wa!
Oee o gba mɔ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ wa!
Ho! Zɔm dɔnɔ-gusi-nù'ɛ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gbina a nù nduku-nduku’ɛ!
Ho! Babilɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ kifa ŋga-gbárà
mgbara o tugun bíí'ɛ!
Mi tuia ŋma pɛ́r ha̧ mɛ,
nɛ̀ baa mɛ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ iŋ na.
Wa kpaa mɛ, ba mɛ
wen nɛ̀ mɛ baa zu-mɛ we nɛ̀ GASA WAN.
«GASA WAN hu̧i̧a fara-a-boi-biro kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ kai o boi gbonɛ zu nyimsea kɔ‘i.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
a̧ de mɔ zu nù ko o be Kaldee.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gár tɛnɛ nɛ̀ nduti-nù mɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yé kɔ̧ dam kɔ-wa,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o mɔ mɛ kɔ̧́ a̧ a kpɔk fara,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́ lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ŋma mɔ sɛn saaye'i ɓɔn na!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúm o ŋga wi-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí wa si fara-gɔn-saɗi mɛ.
Oee ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ tɛ kpa wa wa!
Ŋgimbi kɔ-wa hɔɔ kaɗi!
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ kifi nú
zu ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa hɔɔ kaɗi!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí ŋma gitimɔ nɛ̀ de mɔ‘i.
O wi-yu-mɔ in o wi nɛ̀ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa sɛn nú Babilɔŋ
tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii
zu kifa-er ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ.
Nɛ́ kifa-er nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o wan-góò lɛŋ mɛ bi Babilɔŋ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ́r a̧ zik kpa nú ŋmaa,
wen ká ŋma bíí kpɔk tɛ́ɛ̀ yu mɔ yak.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ́ kale mɔ n'aa de in o ŋma bíí‘i ha̧ a̧.
A̧ dee nɛ́ ŋgazu in GASA WAN,
Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
GASA WAN'e: «Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, kale wese'i, o daŋa wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yo nù ɓɔn bee-gara ye'i, wi beka zii ger o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Mɛ́ Babilɔŋ, yàà-ŋga-zu’ɛ,
mi a̧a̧ nɛ mɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ!
Wese kɔ-mɛ hɔɔ kaɗi,
nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ́ tɛ́ kifi nú
zu ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Yàà-ŋga-zu’ɛ tɛ́ kɔ̧ naŋ ɓɛɛ yoo nù;
ŋma bíí beka ba a̧ e ŋgɔn na.
Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋma wee zu o ye kɔ̧-a̧,
nɛ̀ tɛ dɔ o mɔ katɛ a̧ lɛŋ.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
«Wa dee ŋgamɔ in o be
gú nɛ̀ o be Juda;
wa kɛ̧ mgbara-a na.
O dáa-bara kɔ-wa kasi nɛ́ wa,
wa kɔ̧ mɛ ɗai er tɛ-wa na.
Ɓɛɛ wi-ye-ɗoŋ-wa ɔ ŋgaya:
nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN
nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ am mɔ zu wa nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,
ha̧ nù kɔ-wa mɛ kpa ga̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i,
in ha̧ ɗɛɗɛ o bíí saaye Babilɔŋ mɛ gɔn.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Gba-paa a̧ kúm o be Kaldee,
in o bíí saaye Babilɔŋ,
o gasawi in o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧!
Gba-paa a̧ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o wan-zɔk-mɔ,
wen wa nɛ́ o mgbelewi!
Gba-paa a̧ dúk ɗoŋ o ŋgaŋa-wi kɔ̧-a̧,
tɛ-wa a̧ gbín!
Gba-paa a̧ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o nyaŋa
in o keekee-biro kɔ̧-a̧;
gba-paa a̧ nɛ́ ɗoŋ o dukbíí nɛ̀ ye ɗoŋ-aa;
wa a̧ kifi duk nɛ́ géé okoo.
Gba-paa a̧ nɛ́ ɗoŋ fara-a-boi-biro kɔ̧-a̧,
o bíí a̧ ɓar o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ kai yaknɛ.
Gba-paa a̧ tík zu o yì kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ ɔ̧́sí̧ gɔ́n mgbot-mgbot,
wen nù kɔ̧-a̧ duna nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧;
nɛ́ o ɗaŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧ zik zu wa!
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen hegɔ sa gbaza
tɛ ɔ kpɔk fara'i in o gba-toyo;
o ndao tɛ ba fara sɛn hi̧i̧ mbɛt.
Ŋma bíí beka ɔ fara'i ɓɔna,
ŋma bíí beka duk hi̧i̧ na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ
hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ɗaŋa so nɛ̀ Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr
ká bá nɛ̀ o be ye nɛ̀ yaa so zik wa’ɛ ga.
Ŋma bíí beka ɔ fara'i ɓɔna,
ŋma bíí mɛ́ duk hi̧i̧ beka bo na mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Ŋma dukbíí a̧ tɛ́ nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ‘i,
ŋma gasa tugun bíí
in o gíí wannu mɛ nduti-nù a̧ gar tɛnɛ‘i.
Wa kai nɛ́ o góò in o sɛ́ɛ̀ tɛ nɛnɛ;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o ŋga bii nɛ̀ de ko ha̧ bíí na.
Giti-wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in mgbimgba-a ko gba-tɔp,
wa daŋ nɛ́ o nyaŋa.
Wa nɛka gbar nɛnɛ tɛnɛ hee o gíí wi-biro ga
mɛ́ bi mɛ Babilɔŋ, yàà-de-zɔŋa’ɛ.
Nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i aa zer wannu Babilɔŋ;
tɛ-a gbina ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa tu̧u̧-see mbɛt,
hee okoo nɛ̀ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko bem’ɛ ga.
Mi tɛ daŋ tɛnɛ hee dila
nɛ̀ daŋ nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ da̧a̧ kombo Jurdɛn pii tɛ ɓoramɔ'ɛ ga;
mi tɛ ndak o bíí lɛŋ yinɛ fara'i hee gɔma-yí ga.
Mi tɛ fo o daŋa wi-biro pii zu wa.
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ we zu nɛ‘m o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ ba'm si ti kita o?
Nɛ́ ge wi-dai-mɔ ge a̧ tɛ yor ti'm ge?»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí ŋma mbe taamɔ
nɛ̀ GASA WAN ɗafa zu Babilɔŋ.
Zu-wen n'aa ee wen dea-a in o be Kaldee nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Wa tɛ ɔr wa nɛnɛ sitɛ fio hee o
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɗaŋ nù kɔ-wa, wen zu wa.
Tɛ tika-a ko Babilɔŋ, nù naka.
Nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i pɛsa dam mgbara o tugun bíí.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo:
«Mi tɛ tom ŋma gasa búk-ɗaŋ-mɔ
pi̧ zu Babilɔŋ in o bíí tɛ ye'i lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ tom o gɛnɛ pii zu a̧ mɛ pɛfi a̧,
mɛ́ kai o mɔ tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yinɛ.
Wese bɔnɛ‘i, o bíí tɛ́ tɛ̀ nɛ̀ fara lɛŋ tik zu a̧.»
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e o wan-góò
in o wi-pi̧-laa-boi,
ká bá nɛ̀ o daŋa wi-biro mɛ yak géè na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ ha̧‘m.
O wi nɛ̀ baa da̧i̧ tɛ fé ɓɔn nù ko o be Kaldee,
ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ̀ wa toka tok sar
tɛ fe nɛ̀ mgbara kira kɔ-wa nɛnɛ.
Wen nù kɔ-wa duna nɛ̀ ɗaŋmɔ ti Sa̧a̧ Wi ko
ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́‘e GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
Sɔ̧ ko
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú mɔ gbo Babilɔŋ yak,
kóó o ndé a̧ kpásí tɛ-wi ŋgaɓo!
Kà bó hegɔ na, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧
bé tɛ̀ɛ́ tik zu a̧‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum.
Ŋgimbi'i tɛ duk nɛ́ ŋgimbi-kifa-er
ko GASA WAN ha̧ Babilɔŋ
nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Babilɔŋ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be ɗele-nɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧,
nɛ‘i dee so nɛ̀ lɔr,
nɛ̀ duka so kɔ̧̀ er Sɔ̧.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ kɔ̧́ a̧ gbɛ so nɛ́ o bíí zu nù lɛŋ;
o tugun bíí lɛŋ nɔɔ so dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i,
ɓɛɛ zu-wa zik ɗaŋ lɛŋ.
Ahai Babilɔŋ tika nù,
ɓɛɛ gba ɗɛ́sɛ́-ɗɛ́sɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú zu a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á nyina yí da̧i̧ kɔ̧-a̧,
ŋmafara o da̧i̧ nɔ‘i tɛ wìì.
Ɛ́ɛ́ wee mɛ kpasi Babilɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ zɛɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ŋgaia.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú katɛ a̧,
ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé a̧ sí ɗoŋ tɛ nù kɔ‘i,
wen mɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i hɔɔ mgbák yiwese mɛ.
GASA WAN kpasa yɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ tom
ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ sɛn

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bɛ́ŋ nú o góò k’ɛnɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí o ŋgee k’ɛnɛ. GASA WAN tuna taamɔ ko o wannu Mɛd mɛ́ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ Babilɔŋ yinɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ee-zu-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ kifa-er ko GASA WAN, kifa-er nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tutuwal-biro nɛ̀ ŋgɔn,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá zu'nɛ́ dúk nɛ̀ o garo Babilɔŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ á o wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ̀ dɔka-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á o wi-pɛm-mɔ mɛ zɔk mɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbá o mbaŋtol.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so
zu o bíí Babilɔŋ‘i,
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ a̧ ta, de nɛ̀ mɔ.
Babilɔŋ, mɛ́ wan-ɔ-ká̧ o gasa nana-yì'ɛ,
mɛ́ yàá-wanmbɔi’ɛ, sɔŋkur mɔ kɔ-mɛ hɔa,
mɛ kpaa o mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ kaɗi.
GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
kana mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
«Mi aa o bíí zu mɛ nɛ̀ dɔka-a
hee o gba-dɔya ga;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ bìì gima-ŋgan-mɔ
GASA WAN dee nù tɛ ŋgai kɔ‘i,
a̧ dee o mɔɔ zu nù lɛŋ tɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
in a̧ tata yiwese tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ nú,
ɓɛɛ o yì mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn yiwese mɛ,
ɓɛɛ o tura-zan daŋa nɛ̀ ndaa-zan,
o pi̧i̧-kórò dee ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ,
ɓɛɛ o búk gboo nɛ̀ fara kɔ‘i mɛ tɛnɛ mbɛt.
O bíí lɛŋ sakala tɛ mɔ‘i,
wa iŋ mgbara-a na;
ziimɔ baa o wi-nɔ̀ì̧ o géé-sɔ̧,
wen o mɔɔ nɔ‘i bó nɛ́ kpasamɔ na,
wen nɛ̀
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ o géé tum-mɔ,
nɛ́ mɔɔ-mami;
ŋgimbi kita ko Sɔ̧, wa tɛ kum lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Sɔ̧ ko Jakob,
bo hee wa ga na;
a̧ nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ dee mɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ
Nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN,
Wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Babilɔŋ, mɛ duka so nɛ́ dɔnɔ,
boi-biro kɔ‘m.
Mi too o tugun bíí a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́,
ɗaŋ nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-wan kɔ-wa.
Mi too o nyaŋa in o wi-daŋa-a,
ká bá nɛ̀ o keekee-nyaŋa
in wi-daŋa-a mbɛt a nù nɛ̀ mɛ.
Mi too o wiwii
in o okoo a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́;
mi too o sɔkawi
in o be-ŋgaiwi a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́.
Mi too o be-wiwii
in o be-okoo a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́.
Mi too o wi-dai-mɔ
in o gíí mɔ-dai kɔ-wa a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́,
mi too o wi-wa-fɔ
in o ndai-wa-fɔ kɔ-wa a nù nɛ̀ mɛ́.
Mi too o gasawi
in o wi-duk-zu-nù a nu nɛ̀ mɛ́.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋgamɔ mɛ tik zu Babilɔŋ
in o bíí Kaldee lɛŋ
oi o ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ wa dee in
ɓɔn gbaayí‘nɛ́.
Mɛ kaya yàá-ɗaŋ-mɔ'ɛ,
mi a̧a̧ nɛ̀ mɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ́ wan-ɗaŋ-nù lɛŋ'ɛ!
Mɛ̀ zɔ́k er-am n'am usi
si ɗɔɔ yí-mɛ́'ɛ!
Mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ ai
nɛ̀ zu kusa ta tik nù,
mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kifi zɔm yoŋgoŋgo wee.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi beka kpa ŋma ta-e-mgbii-tua,
kóó wan mɛ e nɛ̀ naŋ-tua tɛ-mɛ ɓɔna.
Mɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà hegɔɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tutuwal-biro e ŋgɔn zu nù,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia mgbara o tugun bíí.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o tugun bíí mɛ de biro in a̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá o ŋma mɔɔ-wan tɛnɛ pii zu a̧;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ Arara,
Mini in Askenaz.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é tom er o gasa wi-biro
mɛ́ ba biro duk nɛ̀ a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o nyaŋa ye ŋmaa hee gíí gba-dɔya ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ mɛ de biro in a̧;
o wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o wannu Mɛd,
o gasawi kɔ-wa,
o gasa wi-duk-zu nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ
in o mɔɔ-wan kɔ-wa nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Nù tɛ pi̧, ɓɛɛ duka nak nɛnɛ,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o ee-zu-mɔ ko GASA WAN
zu Babilɔŋ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ gba̧a̧;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ nú Babilɔŋ
mɛ́ kifi duk nɛ́ géé ŋga-gbárà
nɛ̀ o bíí beka duk sɛnɛ na!
O ŋgaŋa wi-biro Babilɔŋ bɛ̧ɛ̧ biro,
ɓɛɛ hu̧si nɛ̀ mgbii mɔ nɛnɛ.
Ŋgai gboo tɛ-wa,
wa kifa hee géé okoo ga.
O wisɛn tɛ̀ɛ̀ gbin o nú-garo ye kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ pi̧ wee tɛ o tua kɔ-wa.
O betom gbar ma nɛ̀ yì nɛnɛ
mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Wannu Babilɔŋ‘e ndé:
Wa baa ye kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
O yuwar kpea,
wee dama zu o ŋgárá,
o wi-biro pɛsa lɛŋ!»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko
«Babilɔŋ, yàà-de be-zɔŋa hɔɔ ŋmaa
in ŋma fara-gusi-alkamaari nɛ‘i a̧a̧ tɛ ɗafa-a.
Ɗoŋ-aa beka nyɛi̧ na,
ɓɛɛ wi mɔi̧a nyɔnɔ zu a̧.»
«Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ nyɔŋa'm,
a̧ nɔɔ tɔk-tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ e'm hee ŋma nyɛk nɛ̀‘i ndala kɔ̧́ a̧ ndal ga;
a̧ gura'm hee ndiɓa ga.
Zaŋ-aa sura nɛ̀ mbɔ-tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ a̧ siŋ am pi̧ nù zɔgbɔk.
O bíí
o bɔnɛ kɔ‘i in o ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ tika zu wi
a̧ tík zu Babilɔŋ!
Jerusalɛm tɔ̧a'e,
tɔk tɛ-wi a̧ tík zu o be Kaldee!»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, Jerusalɛm,
mi tɛ zɔk yuwar mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ̀ tɛ‘m,
ɓɛɛ mi kifa er oi nú-mɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ gba-tɔp kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ɔ̧si,
in ha̧ kpút-kpút-yì kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ɔ̧si mbɛt.
Babilɔŋ tɛ kifi nɛ́ o gbina-ŋgeŋ,
fara-ɔɔ ko o gba-toyo,
ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ mɔɔ-kíì,
nɛ̀ o bíí beka duk sɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ,
o be Babilɔŋ hiɗi nɛ́ mɔ hee bao-dila ga,
tuɓi nɛ̀ da̧ hee o be dila ga mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, tɛ ŋgimbi tortɛ kɔ-wa'i,
mi ɗafi kɔ‘m nɛ́ gasa nyɔŋmɔ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Mi tɛ nɔsi wa nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ̀ tɛ́ gbɛ wa a nù;
wa tɛ tir yá, nɛ̀ wa beka tun na.
Mi tɛ kai wa si fara-gɔn-saɗi
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀‘i kai nɛ̀ o sami,
o vala sami in o vala gbadua
si fara-gɔn-wa’ɛ ga.»
«Ho! Sesak,
zɔm gasa ŋgiri ye nɛ̀‘i duka so mɛ́ zɔn
dam zaŋnu fara lɛŋ'ɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ biro baa’ɛ!
Ho! Babilɔŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi
nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi kotoro géè sɛn mgbara o tugun bíí nɔɔ'ɛ!
Gba-tɔp hura Babilɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ pɛŋi kpe zu a̧ lɛŋ.
O ye kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nɛ́ géé bɛɛ-oi
in kora fara kotoro nɛ̀ bíí nyɛm mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ na;
ŋma bíí ɓir géé ɓira-a yak fara'i na mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ŋmaa in Bɛl sɛn Babilɔŋ,
mi tɛ ɓar mɔ n'aa nyɔŋ kɔ̧̀ nú-a'i yinɛ.
O tugun bíí beka nɛ sitɛ a̧ ɓɔna.
«Garo Babilɔŋ tɛ gbin,
ɛ́nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó tɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧;
kóó o ndé a̧ kíí mɛ́ kpasi tɛ-wi
ɗɔɔ ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN ŋgaɓo!

«Ká ɗɛɗɛ‘nɛ́ gɔn na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kii zu nyɛrɛ mɔɔ-nù'ɛ n’ɛnɛ zii’ɛ na. Pɛ nɛ̀ yak’ɛ lɛŋ, kànà nɛ́ o nyɛrɛmɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ a'i zii. Nyɛrɛ o ŋgamɔ zu nù'ɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, in nyɛrɛmɔ ko o ŋma ŋga wannu nɛ̀ bi ŋmaa a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wese tɛ hɔ
nɛ‘i tɛ de ŋmaa in o géé-sɔ̧ Babilɔŋ.
Nú Babilɔŋ lɛŋ beka duk nɛ̀ de-a na,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ̀ baa ɗaŋ da̧i̧ sɛn tɛ̀ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ fe.
Ɓɛɛ yiwese in nù gú nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ
tɛ ŋgan mɔ zu Babilɔŋ,
ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ tɛ́ tɛ nɛnɛ pii zu a̧
nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.»
War ko Babilɔŋ kuma so o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a
sɛn zaŋnu fara lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ kinii nɛ́ war kɔ̧-a̧
ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik oi o be
Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ gba-paa hɔɔ yɔɔ zu'nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák!
Kóò, wen nɛ̀ nù k’ɛnɛ biti nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ́fí Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ taamɔ wen Jerusalɛm a̧ píí ɗoŋ kɔ̧́ see'nɛ́.
«Ɛ́ɛ́ kpa desee tɛ zia dara
nɛ o bíí da̧ nɛ̀ yɛ na;
foe de yɛ dee.
O gɛnɛ yee kɔ̧̀ o
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wese tɛ hɔ n'am tɛ de ŋmaa
in o géé-sɔ̧ Babilɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ,
o wi nɛ̀ baa gasa da̧i̧ tɛ gɔfi mɔ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Kóó Babilɔŋ daŋa so nɛ́ yiwese mɛ,
nɛ́ɛ̀ de ŋga tua kɔ‘i sɛnɛ,
mi tɛ tom o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ a̧.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a:
«Wi zii nɛ́ saa-sara
wen gbakamɔ nɛ̀ Babilɔŋ mɛ tɛnɛ!
Gasa ŋgamɔ tika nù ko o be Kaldee!
Nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ ɗaŋ Babilɔŋ,
kpe nɛ̀ zu o gasa
Kóó giti gayamɔ ko o wisɛn nɔi̧a so
hee gasa som-yì
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ gitimɔ‘i mɛ kaɗi sélélé.
Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ a̧ tɛ pii zu Babilɔŋ‘i;
a̧ tɛ kai o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa nɛ̀ bara,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina o kusaa-góò kɔ̧-wa a nù.
GASA WAN nɛ́ Sɔ̧-kifi-er;
a̧ iŋa gusa bíí oi ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.»

Wen ko wannu nɛ̀ nin-a nɛ́ GASA WAN, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Mi tɛ e dɔ̧ɔ̧ nú o gasawi ko wannu, o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ká bá nɛ̀ o yaa-ŋgo-biro kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa tɛ tir yá nɛ̀ wa beka tun na.»
Wen nɛ̀ GASA WAN nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Zɔm ndota garo Babilɔŋ tɛ gbin a nù lɛŋ;
o gba kusa nú garo tɛ bìì wee lɛŋ.
Tom ko dukbíí tɛ duk nɛ́ tom takaɗi;
tom ko o tugun bíí tɛ bìì wee sɔɔ géè!»
Ha̧a̧nú nɛ Jeremii,
Jeremii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛraya:
«Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ mɛ bé tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk kalata’ɛ wen tɔra o wen nɛ̀ a̧a̧ zaŋ-aa lɛŋ ha̧ o bíí,

mɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧: ‹GASA WAN, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ baa keta zu fara’ɛ ndé, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin fara’ɛ a nù, nɛ̀ ŋma mɔ kóó kpɔk beka duk na, kóó nɛ́ o bíí, kóó nɛ́ o saɗi. Fara’ɛ tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoro kpoo nɛ kpoo.›
Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ á̧ tɔra kalata’ɛ kaɗi, mɛ̀ kún ta sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ pí̧ a̧ ɗɔɔ Efrat,
tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Babilɔŋ tɛ tik nɛnɛ, n'aa beka kur ɓɔna, wen zu o ŋgamɔ n'am ba tɛnɛ mɛ pi̧ zu a̧'ɛ.› »
«Tom ko o tugun bíí baa tɛ-wa.» Sɔŋkur wen ko Jeremii nɛ́ mɔ‘i.
Sedesias a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk ŋgimbi n'aa ɔɔ nɛ̀ wan kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk sɛn Jerusalɛm; nin nàà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ Hamutal, boko-bem ko Yirmɛya, be Libna.
A̧ de mɔ nɛ̀ de tɛ GASA WAN na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Joakim dee so ga.
Mɔ nɛ̀ dee so sɛn Jerusalɛm in sɛn Juda a̧ŋa gasa nyimsea ko GASA WAN pi̧ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ a wa taŋ nɛ̀ nyɛi̧a-a.
Duka, ɓɛɛ Sedesias kur zu wannu Babilɔŋ.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Sedesias, tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ hɔɔ nú Jerusalɛm, a̧ in o gíí wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Wa baa fara nú ye Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ wa mbo mɔ zik nɛnɛ.
Wa kpee ye'i e nù tɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-kpɔk tɛ ŋgimbi-wan ko wannu Sedesias.
Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, ŋgimbi'i gasa kaɓa a̧a̧ so saaye'i, nɛ̀ o wanmbɔi mbɛt bo so nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔna; tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ tɛ pɛ‘i,
garo mbaŋa, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro lɛŋ yu mɔ yak saaye mɛ zɛ nɛ̀ nú garo mgbara ŋgeŋ yiitoo, mgbák ka̧ be fɔ ko wannu, ká o be Kaldee a̧ pɛm so kànà mɔ zik ye'i, ɓɛɛ wa ba yuwar si nú Jurdɛn.
O wi-biro Kaldee ndaka pata wannu Sedesias, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa a̧ sɛn bɔkɔ-nù Jeriko mɛ. O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yuu mɔ yak e a̧ duk.
O be Kaldee baa a̧, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ daŋnɛ si Ribla nú Hamat, ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ mɛ́ tɔ̧ sɔŋkur wen zu a̧.
Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna ger o bem ko Sedesias nɛ̀ gbaayí-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn ger o mɔ-geŋa Juda lɛŋ sɛn Ribla mbɛt.
Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ oo yí Sedesias, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɛr a̧ nɛ̀ nyak-ndɛrɛ gbam ŋmaa yiitoo. Wannu Babilɔŋ baa a̧ si Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ a̧ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ hɔ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɛ ɓu ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ fio-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ̀ yá ɓɔn mgbák katɛ wannu hɔɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm.
A̧ pi̧i̧ wee tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧, in tɛ tua ko wannu gú nɛ̀ o tua sɛn saaye lɛŋ, gana gan o tua ko o gasawi Jerusalɛm.
War ko o garo Jerusalɛm, o wi-biro ko o be Kaldee gbina a nù lɛŋ sɛn ɗɔɔ
Nɛbuzaradaŋ gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o wanmbɔi nɛ̀ ɓɔna so saaye'i, o wi nɛ̀ yuu so mɔ si ɗoŋ wannu Babilɔŋ in o oi wi-iŋ tom-de-nɛ-er nɛtɛ nɛtɛ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ e oi o ŋma géé bíí ɓɔn hi̧i̧ mɛ wa o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋma fɔ mbɛt.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o mbiŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà, bá nɛ̀ gba-kpáná-ndɛrɛ nɛ duk kɔ̧́ Tua ko GASA WAN'i, o be Kaldee gbina wa a nù lɛŋ ndúkú-ndúkú, ɓɛɛ kai o ndɛrɛ-a lɛŋ si Babilɔŋ mɛ.
Wa kaia o nyɛk-a-bùk, o mɔɔ-kai-bùk in o paa, o be nyɛk-a-zɛzɛ, o be yee-nɔ-mɔ in o nyɛk-ndɛrɛ lɛŋ nɛ̀ ya wen dee tom kɔ̧́ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o gasa kpánà, o ɓii, o yee-a-zɛzɛ, o nyɛk-a-bùk, o

O mbiŋ yiitoo, gba-kpánà kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧, o ndai ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ nɛ̀ ya ɗɔɔ gba-kpánà‘i, in o mɔɔ-tui-kpánà nɛ̀ wannu Salomɔŋ dee so wen Tua ko Sɔ̧, wi nyɛm mɛ we dita ndɛrɛ-a in ndɛrɛ o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ na.
Kusa kuti mbiŋ duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar; yoo-ɔm-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ndota ndɛrɛ-a duka nɛ́ hee pɛsa kɔ̧ er-wi ga, kɔ̧́ a̧ duka so hoŋkoyoŋ géè.

Wa dee so gan-ndui-ndɛrɛ kpe nɛ̀ zu a̧, nɛ̀ kusa-a duka nɛ́ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ̀ reeta, ɓɛɛ wa a o waya-kóɓó-ndɛrɛ zu gan-ndui'i kar nɛ̀ zu-a nɛ̀ ndɛrɛ mbɛt. O mbiŋ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i kànà hee ŋmaa ga, gú nɛ̀ o dap sɛn tɛ-wa lɛŋ.
Wa ɓoo so ndɛrɛ hee o be waya kóɓò ga a zu o gan-ndui nɔ‘i; o wan mɛ ká̧ a̧ duka nɛ́ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ de gɔmŋmaa zu gan-ndui kpɔk kpɔk.
Gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu baa Sɛraya wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Sefania wi-hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, ká bà nɛ̀ o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ taar mbɛt.

A̧ baa ŋma mɔ-geŋa nɛ̀ duk zu o wi-biro, in bíí mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ yaa katɛ wannu sɛn saaye'i. A̧ baa wi-yɔr-kalata ko gasawi ko o wi-biro nɛ̀ wa ee so mɛ hok o wi-biro, in o ŋma bíí ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye'i mbɛt.
Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia wa nɛnɛ ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ sɛn Ribla.
Wannu Babilɔŋ gɔna kita fio zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ wa sɛn Ribla nú Hamat.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wa baa nɛ̀ Juda nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ nyɛi nɛ̀ nù kɔ‘i.
O dɔka be Juda nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ‘i nɛ́ bíí booro-taar-nɛ-ɓu-zua-taar.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, wa kaia o be Jerusalɛm gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo yaknɛ.

Sɔŋkur-aa, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ woyo, Nɛbuzaradaŋ, gasawi zu o wi-pɛm-wannu kaia o be Juda gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro. O bíí nɛ̀ wa kaia lɛŋ dee nɛ́ booro-naar-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.

Tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ baa Joakim wannu Juda yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara-biro, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ, tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, Ewil-Mɛrodak wannu Babilɔŋ dee ko ha̧ Joakim wannu Juda, ká a̧ yee wan nɛ̀ mbe-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbo a̧ yinɛ kɔ̧́ zɔɓɔ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ de-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ e a̧ tɛ gasa fara zu o dɔka wannu nɛ̀ yaa so in a̧ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
A̧ kpɔ̧i̧a o laa-zɔɓɔ tɛ Joakim yinɛ, ɓɛɛ Joakim nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in a̧ wese lɛŋ tɛ duka-a kɔ̧-a̧.
Duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ duka nɛ̀ de-a wese lɛŋ, wen wannu Babilɔŋ ɗafa yuwar mɔ ha̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ wese kpɔk kpɔk, hɔ nɛnɛ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Ho, Jerusalɛm!
Ye nɛ o bíí ya so sɛnɛ hegɔ tululu’ɛ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ duk ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓoree’ɛ!
A̧ duk ɛ̧ɛ̧ hee ko-gera ga ɓɛɛ gɔ!
Wi nɛ nin hu̧r so mgbara o gasa nù'ɛ,
nɛ duk so nɛ́ bem ko wannu mgbara o dɔka-a’ɛ,
nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ yee tɛ tom-bara’ɛ!
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii kànà nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧
a̧ a̧ hi̧i̧ mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ gbɛ̧ŋkɛ̧nyɛ̧ŋ,
ɓɛɛ o ɗɔɔ yí-a lɛŋ fok nɛ miikɔ̧a rɔtɛ-rɔtɛ;
o gbama-yari kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so a̧,
kóó ŋma kpɔk mɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧ bo na.
Wa lɛŋ kifa nɛ o wi-sɛn-a,
in o wan-e-ɗɔra tɛ-a.
Ɗoŋ tika-a ko Juda
in ɗoŋ tom nɛ wa pi̧i̧ zu a,
wa baa a̧ yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro;
a̧ duk mgbara o gɔni-duk mɛ,
mgbák fara duk kɔ̧-a̧ bo na.
O wi-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧ kɛra a̧,
ɓɛɛ fara-yu-mɔ si sɛnɛ bo na.
O yuwar
hee o be-oi-fio ga;
o bíí gar yɔyɛ ɓɔna,
o nú garo ya wékéké,
o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ lɛŋ gɔfi nɛ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ o be-zɔŋa ya kúrúm-kúrúm.
Oee tu̧u̧-see ko
O wisɛn gana a̧, ɓɛɛ ya nɛ desee;
wen GASA WAN usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧,
wen dee ŋgazu kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛmna.
O wisɛn gbina o bem kɔ̧-a̧ gbut yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro.
Tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ ko
nɛ duka so hee gba de be-zɔŋa ga, bo ɓɔna;
o be-wan ya hee o kɔɗɛ
nɛ kpa fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ na ga;
wa yuu mɔ nɛ oi gbina gba̧a̧-tɛ
ti o wan-ndak-wa.
Ŋgimbi bɔnɛ yambala-a'i,
tɛ́ Jerusalɛm mbaŋa ɗoŋ wese bɔtɛ mɛ ti;
ŋgimbi nɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ gana nɛ a̧,
ŋma bíí-gbak-a̧ bo na;
o wi-sɛn-a zɔka tika-a kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ zɛkɛɗi a̧ mam nɛnɛ.
Jerusalɛm dee ɗaŋmɔ nyɛm see na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi duk nɛ zuku-paa.
O bíí nɛ duka so mɛ zɔn a̧ nɛti fɛŋ nɛ a̧ kinii,
wen wa zɔk a̧ duk nɛ mgbii.
War kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ gɔfi nɛ mɔ,
zik nɛ ɗoŋ-aa e ha̧ wa.
Mɔɔ-búù kɔ̧-a̧‘i zakata tɛ laa kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ ta so mɔ zu mɔ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa a̧ nɛ ɗoŋ na.
Tika-a kɔ̧-a̧‘i gɔna ɗɛɗɛ bíí batɛ,
ɓɛɛ wi-ha̧-nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧ bo na.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔɔ-búù nɛ tika zu'm;
wisɛn kɔ‘m gana'm.»
O wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ kaia o demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ;
a̧ zɔka o gɔni-duk fara yee kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧:
mɛ nɛ o tugun bíí nɛ GASA WAN gɔna so geŋa'e,
ká wa ye zaŋ mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí kɔ‘i na.
Dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ gɔfi nɛ mɔ, kii nɛ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ;
wa ha̧ nɛ o demɔ kɔ-wa mɛ kpa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ
sɛka de ká wa kpasa.
«GASA WAN,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ea'm nɛ wa e tɛ geemɔ'ɛ.»
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ɓir-war nɔ'ɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧:
n’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk nɛnɛ'ɛ,
nɛ́ o a̧ zɔka ɛ̧ɛ̧ pɛrti bɔnɛ n'am zɔk,
nɛ̀ GASA WAN pi̧i̧ zu'm,
wese ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧'ɛ o?
A̧ pi̧i̧ wee nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ,
ye tɛ‘m, ba gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m;
a̧ tuia pɛr ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ ba naŋ-am yo'm nɛ nu.
A̧ dee ha̧ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ mɛ ba'm,
ɓɛɛ wese lɛŋ tɛ‘m diti diti ɗɔ́ŋ-ɗɔ́ŋ.
«A̧ hɛra kpáŋá ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m ger-am;
kpáŋá‘i nɛ́ a̧ a̧ dee nɛ̀ er-a,
ɓɛɛ ba ŋgai kɔ‘m lɛŋ yinɛ.
GASA WAN pi̧i̧ am er o bíí nɛ ŋgaia gan am.
«GASA WAN ndaka o ŋga wi-gbin-biro kɔ‘m
katɛ‘m yinɛ lɛŋ;
a̧ baa keta in o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧,
wen ɗaŋa o daŋa ŋgai wi-biro kɔ‘m yinɛ.
GASA WAN hɔna Juda nɛ hɔɔ so ŋmaa in gba de be-zɔŋa,
hee waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ‘i ɓar’ɛ ga.
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i a̧‘m hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ wen-aa;
yí‘m gar nɛ miikɔ̧a sususu gee,
wen ŋma wi-gai-am bo na,
ŋma wi-ha̧-nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m bo na mbɛt.
O bem kɔ‘m sakala hegɔ kúsúk,
wen o wisɛn ŋgaia gan wa.»
ɓɛɛ wi-ha̧-nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧ bo na.
GASA WAN foo o wisɛn fara lɛŋ a zu Jakob;
kà wa zɔk Jerusalɛm, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa gara u̧nunu.
«GASA WAN nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a;
nɛ́ mi'i yɔɔ kaya ti a̧ ɛ̧.
O dukbíí nɔ'ɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k bɔnɛ‘i nɛ ba tɛ‘m'i;
wa kaia o be-zɔŋa in o be-ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro.
«Mi saa o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so'm,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak am na.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m kuma saaye lɛŋ,
fara kii nyɔŋmɔ kpasi nɛ tɛ-wa.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋga bɔnɛ kɔ‘m, GASA WAN!
Tɛ‘m lɛŋ nɛ naka mɔ;
see-am ŋmana dun kɔ̧ nú‘m oi ŋgazu kɔ‘m!
Nɛ̀ zan wa gɔm nɛ o bem kɔ‘m nɛ gba-paa kum nɛ wa a nu,
nɛ̀ kɔ̧ tua nɛ gee fio hegɔ ŋgoɗoso mbɛt.
«Kànà nɛ́ giti gɔfamɔ kɔ‘m a̧‘i zii;
gee ŋma bíí mɛ ha̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m bo na!
O wisɛn kɔ‘m lɛŋ ya nɛ desee,
zu bɔnɛ kɔ‘m'i.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ dee ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ tik zu'm;
ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ mɔ‘i nɛ kpaa'm'i mɛ kpa wa mbɛt!
«Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ bɔnɛ zu wa
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ dee in am wen o dɔka ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m ga,
wen mi gɔfi nɛ mɔ nyɛmna;
gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m lɛŋ gbina.»
Ho! See GASA WAN ɗaŋa,
ɓɛɛ pi̧ tum zu
hee gba de be-zɔŋa ga.
A̧ siŋa gasamɔ ko
Wese nɛ see-aa tu̧u̧ nɛnɛ‘i,
tɛ-a mbaŋ ɗoŋ Tua kɔ̧-a̧
GASA WAN ɗaŋa o ye ko Jakob lɛŋ, ko de a̧ na;
tɛ ŋga nyimsea nɛ dea-a,
a̧ gbina o ŋgárá nu Juda lɛŋ.
A̧ ɗaŋa nutua wan kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ pi̧ búù zu nu'i in zu o gasawi tɛ nu'i lɛŋ.
Tɛ ŋga nyimsea nɛ dea-a,
a̧ gbina ŋgai ko
a̧ ye ɗoŋ wa ŋgimbi hɔa-a
ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa na;
a̧ pi̧i̧ wee zu nu ko Jakob,
ɓɛɛ dɔ mɔ lɛŋ a nu gbuɗuk.
A̧ ŋgaŋa kusaa kɔ̧-a̧ hee wisɛn ga,
ɓɛɛ er-a mɛ wiiko duk ɓɔn tɛ goo.
Hee wisɛn ga a̧ kuma o mɔ lɛŋ
nɛ‘i zɔk so hee gba demɔ ga.
A̧ dee ha̧ wee-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧
mɛ tik zu tua-laa ko
GASA WAN ɗaŋa
hee a̧ nɛ wisɛn kɔ-wa ga,
gbin nɛ o tua-wan in o ŋgárá kɔ-wa lɛŋ a nu;
mɔ‘i dee ha̧ aia-nú in gɔfamɔ ko o be Juda
mɛ gasi gan kuti-a.
GASA WAN ɗaŋa fɔ in gbaksak kɔ‘i;
a̧ ɗaŋa fara-kpa-ŋmaa in a̧,
a̧ dee ha̧ o wese-yɔyɛ in o wese-ɔm-tɛ
mɛ hɔ nduti sɛn
ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ tika zu wannu
gu nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
GASA WAN fɛŋa fara-ɗaf'a,
tua kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr sɛn tɛ-a;
a̧ dee ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ gbin o ŋgárá-pɛm-ye a nu,
ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ́ gayamɔ ŋgúr-ŋgúr kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧,
hee mɛ nɛ wese gbaŋa ga!
GASA WAN kɔ̧ɔ̧ kànà mɛ to ŋgárá
a̧ tɛ gbin mɔ a nu lɛŋ sɛka a̧ ɗaia er-a.
Ŋgárá in o ŋga fara ye'i gbina a zu ŋmaa,
ɓɛɛ nɛ hi̧a̧-fio a̧ baa fara'i.
O kpar-nú-garo lɛŋ ya ɗɔɔ gbina ŋgeŋ,
o mɔɔ-mana-a gbina a nu lɛŋ mbɛt.
Wannu in o be-wan kɔ‘i lɛŋ
yee kɔ̧ er o bíí nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na;
Heembea bo ɓɔna.
GASA WAN hɔ zu ha̧ o
O gasawi
nɛ̀ oi nú-wa.
Wa aa bùk zu wa,
pi̧ nɛ laa bufu.
O be-zɔŋa Jerusalɛm yá nɛ́ yáá-à zumɛɛ,
zum nɛ zu si mbɔɗɔnu.
Yí‘m pii nɛ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ rɔtɛ-rɔtɛ,
tɛ‘m lɛŋ nak nak;
ŋgai gboo tɛ‘m lɛŋ,
wen zu tika-a ko dukbíí kɔ‘m;
o be-zɔɗi in o geɗek bem tik nɛ ŋgata nɛ bee-gara nɛnɛ.
O bem nɔ‘i duka ak nɛ nàà kɔ-wa:
«Nyɔŋmɔ in o mɔɔ-nɔ a̧a̧ bɔɔ dee?»
Wa hɔ̧fa̧ tik nu nɛ bee-gara nɛnɛ
hee o wi-biro nɛ sap-da̧i̧ ba ga,
fe nɛnɛ yí-ŋguɗi nàà kɔ-wa.
Jerusalɛm, mɛ́ nɛ̀ duka so hee gba de be-zɔŋa ga’ɛ,
nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ ge?
Nɛ́ ge a̧‘m tɛ we nɛ́ mɛ ge?
mi tɛ we nɛ ɗoŋ ge ha̧ mɛ nɛ tɛ ga̧ see-mɛ ge,
wen tika-a kɔ-mɛ‘i nɛ ŋgiri-mɔ hee zɔm gba-tɔp ga,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ tɛ kpasi mɛ nɛ o?
O
gba̧a̧-mɔ bo so tɛ wen kɔ-wa na.
Kà wa a̧ usa so yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ,
bó nɛ́ mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ye so tɛ mɔɔ-bara na.
Wen nɛ wa duka so tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ
nɛ gee ya-zu-wen gee.
O wi-ɓir-war mbɛr nɛ er zu Jerusalɛm,
mii nɛ zu dɔm nɛ fɔ̧i̧, zɛkɛɗi nɛ kɔ‘i, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ye nɛ wa tɔ̧ so nɛnɛ‘e,
de-a nɛ́ ari,
nɛ duka so nɛ mɔɔ-tortɛ ko bíí lɛŋ'ɛ,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ hegɔ'ɛ!»
O wisɛn kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛ wen si zu mɛ;
wa sɔr nɛ mɔ nyɔŋ nɛ goko tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛ́ɛ́ dee mɔ ba nú-a!
Wese n’ɛɛ pɛma so'i, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hɔa'i;
wese'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zɔk nɛ yí-ɛɛ'ɛ!»
GASA WAN dee mɔ n'aa taa so mɛ de;
wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ɓeemɛ‘i hɔɔ gba̧a̧.
A̧ ɗaŋa mɔ, ko de a̧ na;
a̧ dee ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ mɛ kpa desee
tɛ mɔ nɛ tika zu mɛ‘i,
a̧ baa ŋgai kɔ-wa e ŋgɔn.
mɛ̀ áí nú ha̧ a̧.
Yí-mɛ a̧ mbaŋ zɛ nɛ wese
nɛ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ hee be-zer ga;
in ká yí-mɛ zɔm nɛ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ na mbɛt!
Mɛ́ ɗuka-zɛ in mɛ́ si gɔna ndaa-zan,
mɛ kúr, mɛ̀ gbá nú-mɛ tɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Mɛ̀ hú̧í̧ see-mɛ ha̧ GASA WAN,
hee nana-yì ga nɛ pɛsa-a ɗayuu.
Mɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er-mɛ sitɛ a̧,
ha̧ o bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ fe wɔ
nɛ mgbara kira nɛnɛ‘i mɛ kpasi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk, GASA WAN,
nɛ́ ò ɛ̀nɛ̀ usa pɛrti bɔnɛ'ɛ ha̧ a̧ kaɗi o?
N’ɛ̀nɛ̀ duk nɛnɛ‘i,
ɛ́nɛ́ zɔka ŋma fara nɛ nàá-wan-bem
gii bem kɔ‘i nɛ tɛ-wi nyɔŋ,
bem n'aa duka bɔŋgɔli dai nɛnɛ'ɛ kaɗi nde?
O bíí kaia o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o
tɛ́ɛ̀ gɔn kɔ̧ tua-wor-sɔ̧ kaɗi nde?
O be-zɔɗi in o gbɛ́rɛ́ yá nɛ̀ ká̧ yuwar ŋgoɗoso-ŋgoɗoso;
wa gɔma o be-ŋgaiwi in o be-zɔŋa
gbɛ a nu nɛ gba-paa lɛŋ.
Tɛ ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ kuma wa,
ɛ́nɛ́ gbɛ̀ɛ́ wa a nu, gee ko de'nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ saa o mɔɔ-kíì tɛnɛ pii zu'm,
hee gara gbaŋa ga.
Ŋma gee bíí kpɔk nɛ yuu mɔ,
kóó nɛ kpasa wese ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i, bo na.
O wisɛn kɔ‘m kuma o bem n'am koa dai nɛnɛ.
Mi nɛ wi nɛ zɔka
bɔnɛ nyasi ko GASA WAN.
A̧ baa'm pi̧ ti tum ha̧‘m mɛ nɛ nɔ sɛnɛ,
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ na.
Kànà nɛ mi ɛ̀n'am ɓɛɛ,
a̧ GASA WAN nukuri ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
A̧ sɛkɛra'm ɓɛɛ mi ɔ̧k ba gba̧a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gbin o gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m mbɛt.
A̧ ɔna'm;
a̧ zika'm e see-a nɛ bɔnɛ in tu̧u̧-see.
A̧ pi̧i̧ am ti tum
hee o gba̧a̧-fio nɛ̀ ɔ́ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ pɛ nɛ pɛ'ɛ ga.
A̧ dee garo zik am kpa nu ŋmaa, wen ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ yar;
a̧ saŋa'm sútúk pi̧ nu nɛ ŋga nyak-boi.
Nɛ oi
kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ zɔka mɔ yak zu aia-nú kɔ‘m.
A̧ kpee yuwar kɔ‘m nɛ o zɔm gasa ta,
ɓɛɛ yuwar kɔ‘m ɗaŋ lɛŋ.
A̧ pɛm am hee ŋga saɗi-nyɔŋ-wi
hee dila nɛ hu̧si ɗoŋ mɔ mɛ ba saɗi’ɛ ga.
A̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ yɔ yuwar kɔ‘m;
a̧ pi̧a'm tɛ bɔnɛ kpul, ɓɛɛ e'm ɓɔn hi̧i̧.
A̧ ŋgaŋa kusaa-goo kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ kpe'm e nu mɛ pi̧.
A̧ pi̧a'm tɛ guntir
nɛ góò kɔ̧ ɓaro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Mi kifa wi-bɔkɔ ti dukbíí kɔ‘m;
wese lɛŋ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ zɛkɛɗa'm mam nɛnɛ.
GASA WAN ha̧a̧ nɛ ɗaŋ paŋ wa̧a̧-te ha̧‘m nyɔŋ
in paŋ mɔ kpírírí ha̧‘m mɛ nɔ.
A̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ ŋger ŋga ta,
ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧‘m tɛ bùk.
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ baa ga̧a̧mɔ yinɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m;
mi iŋ oi bɔtɛ ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧:
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m a̧ kaɗa'i,
ŋma mɔ ha̧‘m mɛ e ta nɛ GASA WAN bo ɓɔna nde?»
Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ bɔnɛ in yambala-a kɔ‘m.
Mɔ‘i nɛ paŋ mɔ in ma̧a̧da̧!
Taamɔ kɔ‘m duk ɓɔn tɛ bɔnɛ nɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ see-am yeli kànà yeli lɛŋ.
Oi mɔ n'am tɛ ta wen kpaa nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Dee demɔ ko GASA WAN in bíí kaɗi na,
A̧ de demɔ in yɛɛ dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ.
GASA WAN, yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in bíí nɛ kpasamɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
«GASA WAN nɛ war mɔ kɔ‘m;
nɛ mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ sa'm e ta nɛ a̧.»
GASA WAN nɛ gba de-wi wen wi nɛ kii a̧,
in nɛ e see tɛ-a.
Duka-a nɛ̀ oi nú pɛm nɛ GASA WAN
mɛ kpasi wi ɔ dee.
Yambaya munyal nɛ̀ bem tɛnɛ
nɛ gba demɔ nyɛmna.
Kà GASA WAN úsí bɔnɛ há̧ bíí,
ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi a̧ duk ɛ̀nɛ̀-wí nɛ̀ oi-nú keɗeŋ.
A̧ a̧ ɔ nu zu fuunu,
ŋmafara Sɔ̧ tɛ gbak a̧!
A̧ a̧ e ká̧ yí-a ha̧ wi-mbɛr-aa,
a̧ a̧ nɔ ŋgiɗi tɛ da̧ra̧ ko bíí mbɛt.
Wen GASA WAN siŋ bíí pi̧ nu
hegɔ ɓɔn ndo-ndo-ndo na;
kà nɛ́ bòò nɛ́ see-aa a̧ nyima, a̧ tɛ de ko nɛ ɗoŋ,
wen
Wen bó nɛ́ a̧ kpa desee tɛ usa bɔnɛ
ɗaŋ nɛ see bíí sɔɔ gee na!
Ŋgimbi kaia o bara-biro nu kɔ-wa,
i̧si̧ nɛ wa nɛ naŋ,
ŋgimbi deemɔ in o bíí nɛ yuwar-a na
ti Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
ŋgimbi ɓira wen e nú bíí ti kita,
bó nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ zɔk'i na?
Nɛ o'o nyɛma tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ɓɛɛ mɔ dea o,
kà bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧'ɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ mɔ‘i mɛ de na o?
Bó nɛ́ kpɔk nú Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ
a̧ mɔɔ-ɗaŋsee in mɔɔ-desee gbo nɛnɛ na?
Bíí nɛ duk kpasa ai nú wen ge?
Bó nɛ́ zu ɗaŋmɔ n'aa de'i a̧ a̧ duk kànà kpasa'i na?
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí mɔ tɛ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛ̀ɛ̀ tá mɔ zu-a,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ nyɛi̧ er yɛ in ɛ̀ɛ̀ há̧ see yɛ
ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ duk yiwese mɛ.
K’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛ́ɛ́ dee ŋgazu, ɛ́ɛ́ mbo zu h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ e ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na!
Ŋga nyimsea baa'nɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ kúr, ndak nɛ yɛ,
kum nɛ yɛ, ko de'nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpee yí‘nɛ́ nɛ tura-zan,
wen ká kɔfa-sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ tɛɛ hɔ tɛ‘nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk hee fara-a-yɔsɛ
in mɔɔ-i̧si̧ nɛ naŋ ko o dukbíí ga.
O wisɛn k’ɛɛ lɛŋ
dɔk nɛ wen a zu yɛ.
War mɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ bele in ɗuka kɔ̧,
ká bá nɛ̀ zɔka bɔnɛ in tika-a.
Yí‘m mbaŋ nɛ miikɔ̧a
wen tika-a ko dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Yí‘m pii nɛ miikɔ̧a vamgba-vamgba gee;
yí‘m beka zɔm na wen bɔnɛ,
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ GASA WAN tɛ oŋgi
mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ.
Dita-see mɔ nɛ tika
zu o zɔŋa ye kɔ‘m,
O wi-sɛn-am gee ndaka'm
hee mi nɛ nɔ̧́í̧ ga;
wa pi̧i̧ am kɔ̧́ kɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ fe,
ɓɛɛ wa kpe nú‘m nɛ ta;
yì ha̧a̧ yak zu'm,
ɓɛɛ mi e nú‘m tɛ hiɗimɔ‘e: «Tɛ‘m yɔa!»
Nɛ̀ kɔ̧̀ ɗúká kɔ̧̀ mɛ̀,
mi saa nin'nɛ́, GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zíí
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kpe zer'nɛ́ tɛ gɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ‘m na!
Wese n'am sa nɛ ɛnɛ‘i, ɛnɛ ɗɔla pii ti,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́, «Ká kíì de mɛ na!»
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ ɗafa yuwar wen kɔ‘m,
ɛnɛ kpasa'm.
GASA WAN, bo nɛ ɛnɛ zɔka gɔɔmɔ nɛ wa de in am'i na?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita zu'm nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɛnɛ zɔka wan o ŋgamɔ
in o ɓira wen-ndela nɛ wa ɓira e nú‘m gɔ!
GASA WAN, ɛnɛ zia gɔna da̧ra̧ nɛ wa gɔna e tɛ‘m'i,
in ɓira wen kɔ-wa e nú‘m mbɛt'i.
O wi-sɛn-am fu̧i̧ nɛ wen
e nɛ ɗɔra tɛ‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wa: kóó wa yor nɛ ŋgɔn,
kóó wa ya nɛ nu, nin-am kifa nɛ gima-bìì kɔ-wa.
GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ de ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa mɛ tik zu wa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ́ ŋgai see-wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tok ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu wa.
Ŋga nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ wa,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ kum wa zu nu’ɛ yinɛ!
Ho! Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ gba ge?
Lɔr nɛ tok so tok zar-zar
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tok ɓɔna’ɛ!
O ta ŋgeŋ tua ko Sɔ̧,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ gbina pɛsi ya nɛ ka̧ war sinɛ'ɛ!
O bezaŋ
hee lɔr ga,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i zɔk hee gee kpáná-gìì,
nɛ wi-ɓu-kpánà ɓua ga’ɛ!
O gba-toyo iŋa ha̧a̧ bere dai nɛ o bem kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ ko o be-zɔŋa-dùk kɔ‘m bo hegɔ na;
wa kifa nɛ o ɗaŋ nàá-wan-bem hee ndao-ŋga-gbara ga.
Leɓe o be-zɔɗi kora lati kɔ̧ war ger-wa kpák-kpák;
o bem ai nɛ́ nú wen nyɔŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi-ha̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wa bo na.
O wi nɛ ya so tɛ bɔtɛ nyɔŋ nɛ de nyɔŋmɔ,
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ fe nɛ ká̧ war sinɛ'ɛ!
O wan nɛ wa daia so tɛ bɔtɛ
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɔ nɛ zu-buk-paa sinɛ'ɛ!
Ɗaŋmɔ nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m dea,
gana ko Sɔdɔm,
nɛ Sɔ̧ baa ɗaŋ so yinɛ hee gɔma-yí ga,
nɛ bo nɛ ŋma er-bíí a̧ foo na’ɛ.
O be-wan mɛ Jerusalɛm yaa so nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧
tok nɛnɛ lak-lak,
tɛ-wa nɛ bu-a ndáká-ndáká;
wa yaa so nɛ ŋga-tɛ,
nɛ ŋmaŋa-a zoɗoe.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, yí-wa tu̧u̧ tu̧u̧ ndir-ndir;
kà‘i kpa wa yuwar, wi iŋ yí-wa na.
Kànà nɛ́ ndàrá-tɛ-wa a̧ duk zu gba̧a̧,
wa ɔ̧ka̧ ɓak-ɓak hee kora gua ga.
Fio nu gba-paa war kpɔk,
dee gan fio-kaɓa,
nɛ‘i kpa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ na,
ɓɛɛ wi duka ɔ̧k nɛnɛ kpa fe nɛnɛ mbɛt'i.
Ŋgimbi nɛ ŋgamɔ tika nɛnɛ zu dukbíí kɔ‘m,
o nàá-wan-bem, nɛ oi kɔ̧ɔ̧ o bem kɔ‘i,
gii o bem kɔ‘i wen nyɔŋa-a.
Kiitɛ nyimsea ko GASA WAN nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hɔa'i;
a̧ pi̧i̧ ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu bíí.
A̧ pi̧i̧ wee zu ye
dɔ a̧ a nu gbuɗuk hɔ ndaa-a mɛ.
O wannu in o bíí zu nu lɛŋ ta so'e nde,
ŋma ŋgimbi wisɛn tɛ nyɛm mɛ ye nu garo Jerusalɛm na.
Mɔ dea hegɔ wen nɛ o
in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ dee ɗaŋmɔ;
wen wa gbaia tɔk tɛ o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a
a nu nɛ see ye nɛnɛ!
Wa yar nɛ yuwar nɛnɛ hee o wi-boma-yí ga;
tɛ-wa lɛŋ nɛ tɔk mgbɛzuɛ,
nɛ‘i beka tam laa kɔ-wa nɛ er na.
O bíí gai nɛ mɔ a zu wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú siɓi, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ o wi-simbo!
Ká‘i tam tɛ-wa na!»
Kóó wa yuu so nɛ mɔ si ŋma gɔni nu,
o bíí tɛ nu'i tɛ tɔ̧‘e nde:
«Ɛɛ kɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ duk mgbara yɛ siti na!»
GASA WAN nɛ tɛ-wi ndaka wa pɛsi sót-sót;
a̧ kɔ̧ zɔka wa nɛ yí-a ɓɔna.
Bíí tu̧ tɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɓɔna,
bíí zɔn o sɔkawi ɓɔna mbɛt.
War k’ɛɛ, yí-ɛɛ gbɛ̧ɛ̧ fara zɛm mɔ‘e nde,
ŋma bíí tɛ ye ɗoŋ yɛ wo, takaɗi!
Ɛɛ pɛma so mɔ ha̧ ŋma tugun bíí
nɛ nyɛm so mɛ kpasi yɛ na
mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpasi yɛ wo, ɓɛɛ yí-ɛɛ ɗuk.
Ko o wisɛn k’ɛɛ kànà nɛ́ mbaɗa naŋ yɛ,
ɛɛ kpa fara gbo si zan na;
ŋgimbi k’ɛɛ a̧ hɛɗi'i,
sɔŋkur wese k’ɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hɔɔ kaɗi'i!
Naŋ o wi-ndak-ɛɛ ɔ haya gan bu̧i̧a̧-a̧ ko o zua,
wa ndak yɛ nɛ zu kaya nɛnɛ,
gba nɛ mbaŋtol h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ ŋga-gbárà.
Wi-pɛm-ɔmi k’ɛ́ɛ́
tika lim nɛ wa gɔna.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ɛ́ɛ́ ee só nɛ̀ ta tɔ̧́ nɛnɛ‘e,
nɛ́ ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-a
ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa so yaa-a nɛ de-a mgbara tugun bíí.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Edɔm, nɛ̀ duk hee gba de be-zɔŋa ga’ɛ,
mɛ́, nɛ̀ duk tɛ nu Us’ɛ,
mɛ̀ kpíɗí nɛ desee, mɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ!
Mɔ‘i tɛ tik zu mɛ mbɛt;
dɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ gbɛ mɛ ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ sɔŋgɔɗɔ.
GASA WAN beka e ha̧ wa ba mɛ nɛ bara si gɔni nu ɓɔna.
Nɛ̀ kɔ-mɛ, Edɔm, a̧ tɛ usi mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ;
a̧ tɛ tati ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ yí bíí.
GASA WAN, tɛ‘nɛ́'ɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ kpaa yɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa da̧ nɛ yɛ ga.
O gɔni bíí kaia mɔɔ-oi
o bíí n’ɛɛ iŋ na baa tua k’ɛɛ.
Ɛɛ ya nɛ o be-oi, nɛ̀ dáà bo na;
o nàà k’ɛɛ ya hee o ko-gera ga.
Ɛɛ gɔn zu yi k’ɛɛ sɛk’ɛɛ nɔa;
gua k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ hi̧fi hi̧fi mbɛt sɛ.
O wan-nasi-ɛɛ dita zu yɛ, bo nɛ bɔnɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ zɔk ɓɔna;
hiɗi yɛ bo ɓɔna, ɛɛ kpa gee be ɔma-tɛ na.
Ɛɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ er yɛ si Egiptɛ
in Asirii wen kpaa be mɔɔ-nyɔŋ.
O dáà k’ɛɛ nɛ dee so ɗaŋmɔ‘i, wa bo ɓɔna, wa fee lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɛɛ a̧ zɔk bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
O bara ɔ nɛ wan zu yɛ;
wi-kai-ɛɛ er wa yinɛ, bo na.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ biro ɛ̀ɛ̀ de in o kpɔ̧i̧-gba̧a̧-nin ŋga-gbárà mɛ,
hee ɛɛ tɛ fe fee ga kaɗi, sɛk’ɛɛ kpaa nyɔŋmɔ.
Gee wɔ nɛ gbɛ yɛ nyɛmna,
ɓɛɛ tɛ yɛ ba nɛ wee fatiti gee.
Wa ba nɛ o okoo
in o be-zɔŋa nù Juda mbɛt.
Wa ga̧i̧a o be-wan tɛ te;
wen kɔ-wa bó nɛ̀ o sɔkawi na.
Wa kaia o ŋgaiwi mɛ gbur ta-hɔ̧n-mɔ;
o daŋa ŋgaiwi tika nu ɗɔɔ dita hɛra gua.
O sɔkawi mɔi̧ tɛ baa keta ɓɔna;
o ŋgaiwi bíí gima ɓɔna mbɛt.
See yɛ de ɓɔna,
yɔyɛ gbaŋa k’ɛɛ kifa nɛ hi̧a̧-fio.
Mɔɔ-wan k’ɛɛ tika nu er yɛ;
bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu yɛ wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ!
Kaya
kifi nɛ fara-yar ko o gba-toyo!
Nɛ́ hegɔ s’ɛɛ ɔ zɛɛ,
sa yí-ɛɛ to ɓurɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ GASA WAN, ɛnɛ nɛ wan ɓɔnsɛnɛ;
wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Ɛnɛ tɛ er yɛ hegɔ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧ wen ge?
Wen ge tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ bi ɗoŋ yɛ wese lɛŋ ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá ɛɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘nɛ́,
GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ pii ɗoŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ yuwar mɔ k’ɛɛ mɛ de,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ duka so nɛti ga.
Kóó ɛnɛ siŋa nɛ ɛɛ a taŋ war kpɔk nde?
See'nɛ́ busa tɛ yɛ lɛŋ nde?
Tɛ ɓu-taar pɛ, tɛ naar fio-zɛ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ, mi duka so mgbara o bara-biro ká̧ zaŋ Kebar mɛ. Yiwese hu̧i̧a̧, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ hɔ zu ha̧‘m.
Ŋgimbi'i, ɓɛɛ ká wannu Jɔakim duka bara-biro pɛ mɔɔrɔ kaɗi; ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ‘i,
a̧ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧‘m Ezekiɛl wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bem ko Buzi sɛn ká̧ zaŋ Kebar tɛ nu ko o be Kaldee. Nɛ fara'i a̧ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ yora nɛnɛ ɗoŋ-am.

Kà‘m tɛ zɔk mɔ wó, ɓɛɛ gba ŋga hara-búk nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɓoɓi nɛ war ŋgɔn mɛ‘i tɛnɛ'ɛ, in gba hama bu-zan in leɓe-wee nɛ sɔi in gba sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ duk kɔ‘i tok nɛnɛ lak-lak, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ hee yi wee-ndɛrɛ nɛ nɔ̧́í̧ ga, gbo nɛ see mɔ‘i daŋnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am zɔka ŋma mɔ naar nɛ gbo nɛ yi mɔ‘i tɛnɛ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in bíí.
Wa kpɔk kpɔk a̧a̧ nɛ saŋa-yí naar naar, in wɔr-ɓaa-wa naar naar mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ wa yor nɛ tana-a zeeŋ, sɔ̧ɔ̧ naŋ-wa duk hee sɔ̧ɔ̧ naŋ ndai ga nɛ̀ duk tok nɛnɛ ŋgol-ŋgol hee ndɛrɛ ga.
O er-wa hee er bíí ga a̧a̧ ɗɔɔ wɔr-ɓaa-wa, ɓɛɛ er-wa in ɓaa-wa ká bá nɛ̀ sɔnti-wa naar lɛŋ zika zɔk mɔ tan ti wa dam mgbii-zan naar.
Nú wɔr-ɓaa-wa hɔŋ nɛ nu ŋmaa; kà wa kur mɛ nɛ nɔ, wa zik tɛ na, kóó o ndé nɛ nɔ tan sɔnti wi fara n'aa e zu si sɛnɛ‘i.
Saŋa yí-wa mɛ ti hɔɔ ŋmaa in saŋa-yí bíí, wan mɛ wiiko hɔɔ ŋmaa in saŋa-yí dila, wan mɛ gale hɔɔ kɔ‘i ŋmaa in saŋa-yí ndai, ɓɛɛ wan mɛ ɗoŋ hɔ ŋmaa in saŋa-yí zua.
Wa kaia ɛ̧ɛ̧ ɓaa-wa yiitoo nɛ ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ ndɔŋ nu ɓaa-wa duɓi ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ oi ɓaa-wa yiitoo duk nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-tɛ-wa.
Kóó o ndé nɛ́ nɔ tan sɔnti wi, ba nɛ̀ yuwar nɛ taamɔ usa ha̧ a̧, wa gir tɛ-wa na.
Wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in o mɔ nɛ ya kpasa; ŋma mɔ gboo mgbara wa hee ŋga kɛ̧i̧-wee ga, nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in wee-kan, nɛ wee-aa duk pi̧ nɛnɛ hee pi̧i̧-kórò ga.
O saɗi nɔ‘i nɛ nɔ siti, ɓɛɛ wa tɛɛ nɛ nɔ si ɗoŋ mbɛt nɛ haya-a hee mbaŋa-kórò ga.
Mi zɔka o saɗi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk naŋ keekee fara yor katɛ wa kpɔk kpɔk tan sɔnti-wa naar lɛŋ.
O naŋ keekee nɔ‘i ya tok nɛ kɔ‘i bar-bar hee ŋma de ta ga. Wa naar lɛŋ duk hee ŋmaa ga, ɓɛɛ duk hee wi dee wa ha̧ wa mɛ ye kɔ̧ ŋmaa ga.
O naŋ keekee nɔ‘i kpɔk kpɔk nɛ nɔ tan ti-wi dam mgbii-zan naar lɛŋ, wa wɛr tɛ-wa na.
Kusa-wa nɛ mɔɔ-kíì, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ-wa lɛŋ tok tok.
Kà o saɗi nɔ‘i nɛ nɔ, ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee nɛɛ nɔ; kà o saɗi kur daŋ si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee kura daŋ si ŋgɔn mbɛt.
Wa nɛ si fara lɛŋ nɛ see-wa
Kà o saɗi nɛ nɔ siti, ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee nɛɛ kana in wa; kà o saɗi gbasi yor, ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee yora; kà o saɗi kur daŋ si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ o naŋ keekee kura daŋ si ŋgɔn mbɛt, wen nɛ́ kpɔk taamɔ
Ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in yiwese guu zu o saɗi nɔ‘i tok nɛnɛ hee bu ta ga.
O saɗi nɔ‘i nyɛi̧a ɓaa yiitoo si ɗɔɔ mɔ‘i nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in yiwese'i, ɓɛɛ oi ɓaa-wa yiitoo yiitoo ya mɛ kpe tɛ wa.

Ŋgimbi nɛ wa kur mɛ nɛ nɔ, mi zii nɛ giti ɓaa-wa fara gɔm ŋmaa hee giti ŋga som-yì ga, kóó hee tiger Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ga, hee giti naŋ o gba gii wi-biro ga; kà wa yor, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ mɔ̧i̧a ɓaa-wa si ɗɔɔ.
Ŋma tiger bíí tɛa nɛ fara nɛ mɔ hɔɔ ŋmaa in yiwese nɛ guu zu o saɗi nɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ wi zɔk ŋma mɔ hee tu̧ ta nɛ‘i sa'e safir ga nɛ ɗoŋ-aa hɔɔ ŋmaa in damti. Ŋma mɔ duka zu mɔ‘i woyo ŋgɔn mɛ hee bíí ga.
Mi zɔka mɔ‘i nɛ duk tok nɛnɛ lak-lak hee bu boi ga'i; ŋma mɔ hee wee ga zika ɗoŋ-aa kpa nu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ gɔn zik a̧ nɛ ŋgɔn hɔ ɗɔɔ.
Sa̧a̧mɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in dap ɓutu nɛ yɔr mɛ ɓar’ɛ ga; mɔ‘i nɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN. Mi zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mi yo nu, ba yí‘m gu nu, ɓɛɛ mi zii tiger ŋma bíí nɛ duka tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧‘m.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí,
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧‘m'i, a̧
A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ́ bíí, mi tom mɛ sitɛ o be
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ o wi-ŋgazu in o wi-ŋga-see. Mi tom mɛ sitɛ wa, mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e nde: ‹Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa nɛ mɔ'ɔ.›
Kóó wa a̧ zii wen nú-mɛ, kóó wa a̧ zii wen nú-mɛ na, wen wa nɛ o wi-ŋgazu, wa tɛ iŋ‘e, ŋma

«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Ezekiɛl, ká kíì wa de mɛ na, ká kíì ŋga wen kɔ-wa de mɛ na mbɛt. Wa tɛ yo wen e nú-mɛ. Tɛ duk hee mɛ duk mgbara o tɛn-dara in o tore ga; mɔ kpɔk, ká wen mɛ́ nú o wi-ŋgazu nɔ‘i in gbaayí-wa pi̧ kíì tɛ-mɛ na.
Mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ ha̧ wa; kóó wa a̧ zii, kóó wa a̧ zii na, oi ŋgazu kɔ-wa so a̧‘i̧.
«Kɔ-mɛ bíí'ɛ, ká mɛ de ŋgazu hee o wi nɔ‘i ga na; mɛ̀ zíí mɔ n'am tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ; mɛ hú̧í̧ nú-mɛ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ n'am tɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ kà‘m tɔ̧‘e ha̧‘m zɔk mɔ wó, er bíí nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyɛi̧ kara kalata tɛnɛ pii tɛ‘m’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ er'i bur kara kalata'i e ti'm. Wa yɔra mɔ sɛn zaŋ-aa nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ in ɗoŋ-aa nɛ zan mbɛt. O gba̧a̧ wen nɛ yɔra zaŋ-aa nɛ aia-nú, gɔfamɔ in o
Mi hu̧i̧a̧ nú‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ kara kalata'i kɔ̧ nú‘m, ɓɛɛ mi nyɔŋ.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ kara kalata n'am ha̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ, zaŋ-mɛ a̧ sur!» Mi nyɔŋa mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɔ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ nú‘m hee gɔrɔ ga.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ bá war mɛ̀ yák mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ wen kɔ‘m ha̧ o be
Mi tom mɛ sitɛ ŋma gɔni-duk nɛ tɔ̧ ŋma ŋga gɔni nú na, ɓɛɛ mi tom mɛ sitɛ o be
Mi tom mɛ sitɛ o gba dukbíí nɛ nú kɔ-wa ɔ ŋgaya na, nɛ nú kɔ-wa tɛ gan mɛ tɛ zia-a na; kóó kà‘m tom so mɛ sitɛ o pɛrti bíí nɔ‘i, wa tɛ̀ɛ́ nyeŋ zer tɛ wen kɔ-mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o be
Kinii, mi tɛ de ha̧ see-mɛ mɛ ŋgai in ha̧ zu-mɛ mɛ ŋgai hee kɔ-wa ga mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ zu-mɛ mɛ ŋgai hee diamaŋ ga, mɛ ŋgai gan ta; ká kíì-wa de mɛ na, ká mɛ yu mɔ ti o yaa-ŋga-zu nɔ‘i na.»
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m siti woyo: «Mɛ́ bíí'ɛ, mɛ̀ hú̧í̧ see-mɛ in zer-mɛ tɛ wen kɔ‘m, mɛ̀ kásí wa nɛ de-a.
Mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ sitɛ o bara-biro, o bezaŋ duk kɔ-mɛ nɛ ya gɔni nù mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Kóó wa a̧ kpɛk, kóó wa a̧ bɛ̧, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ wa.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ
Ɓɛɛ mi zii giti ɓaa o saɗi nɛ gɔm ŋmaa in giti naŋ o keekee nɛ ya katɛ wa mbɛt. Mɔ‘i duka nɛ gasa giti mɔ nyɛmna.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ
Mi hɔɔ tɛ o bara-biro nɛ ya sɛn Tɛl-Aviv ká̧ zaŋ Kebar, ɓɛɛ mi duk hi̧i̧ in wa zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ.
Ɗoŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ nɛ gee bíí, ɓɛɛ mi ee mɛ nɛ wi-pɛm-mɔ zu o be

Kà‘m tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ‘e, ‹Mɛ tɛ fe,› ɓɛɛ kà mɛ̀ mbaŋ tɛ-a na, kà mɛ̀ gai a̧ mɛ e yuwar ɗaŋ deemɔ duk na, kà wi’ɛi duk tɛ kale ɗaŋ yuwar kɔ̧-a̧‘i siti, wi’ɛi tɛ fe zaŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ wen-fio ko wi’ɛi tɛ duk zu mɛ.
Kà mɛ a̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa e ɗaŋ‘i duk na, a̧ tɛ fe zaŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ kpasi.

Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ boo nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa ee deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk mɛ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ, mi tɛ tui pɛr ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ fe; wen nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ a̧ na'i, a̧ tɛ fe zaŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ‘i beka ta mɔ wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a n'aa duka so de nɛti'i ɓɔna; ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ kana'e, mi tɛ ak tɔk tɛ wi’ɛi er mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ka mɛ mbaŋ tɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a'i'e, ká a̧ de ɗaŋmɔ na, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ bɛ̧ dea-a, a̧ tɛ kpasi, wen zu mbɔrɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ kpasa mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋgai ko GASA WAN baa'm woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ kúr mɛ̀ zír si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ mɛ hi̧i̧.»
Mi baa yuwar yak zir si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ mɛ, ɓɛɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN hee wan n'am zɔka so ká̧ Kebar mɛ‘i nɛti ga'i hɔ woyo; ɓɛɛ mi hɔ̧fi̧ ba sɔnti'm gu nu.
ko Sɔ̧ yee tɛ‘m ba'm e ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ yé kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ kpé nu tua e zu mɛ.
Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ zìì, wa tɛ hɛr mɛ nɛ nyak nɛ mɛ beka gbo si mgbara bíí ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ fo leɓe-mɛ lati war ger-mɛ; nú-mɛ́ tɛ kpe, nɛ mɛ beka gai o wi-ŋgazu nɔ‘i ɓɔna.

Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'am be tɛɛ tɔ̧ ŋma mbe wen ha̧ mɛ woyo, mi tɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ!› O wi nɛ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ zii, wa a̧ zii, ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ bɛ̧ zia-a, wa a̧ bɛ̧, wen wa nɛ o yaa-ŋgazu!»
Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ bá ŋma brik nɛ‘i dee nɛ gii e ti mɛ; mɛ̀ yɔ́r ye Jerusalɛm sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ɗáfí ɗoŋ-aa mɛ usi'e wa kɛra a̧ kpe e nu; wa za̧a̧ kɔ̧ zik a kpa nu ŋmaa, mbo nu nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, a o gbagari biro in gba mɔɔ-de-biro zik a̧ lɛŋ.
Mɛ̀ bá ŋma ndaɗala boi, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ é mgbara mɛ in ye'i mɛ duk hee garo ga. Mɛ̀ mbáɗí ye'i: mɛ̀ nɛ́ ye nɛ‘i kɛra, wen nɛ mɛ a̧ kɛra a̧ kpe e nu; mɔ‘i nɛ mɔɔ-mbaŋ tɛ o be
«Mɛ̀ ɔ́ nu nɛ war gale; ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ mɛ tɛ ɔ nu'i, mɛ tɛ tui nɛ ɗaŋmɔ ko o be

Kà mɛ a̧ kaɗa i̧i̧ zɛ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ ɔ nu nɛ war wii-er mɛ woyo, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ túí ɗaŋmɔ ko o be nutua ko Juda tɛ zɛ ɓu-naar. Mi gɔna zɛ ha̧ mɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ pɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa; pɛ kpɔk ba nɛ ɔɔ-zɛ kpɔk.
«Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ zík yí-mɛ́ zɔk mɔ si zu ye Jerusalɛm nɛ‘i kpee e nu'i; mɛ̀ nyɛ́í̧ er-mɛ si zu a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen a zu ye'i.
Mi tɛ hɛr mɛ nɛ ŋga nyak e ɓɔn hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ mɛ beka fo tɛ-mɛ, kà bó nɛ̀ zika tɛ-mɛ si mgbɔɔr na hɔ fara nɛ ŋgimbi-a tɛ dam.
Mɛ̀ bá fuu alkamaari pɛr-a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zaŋ nɛ ŋmaa in fuu fon, ká bá nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-wàr;
Mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ mɔ‘i tikiɗi tikiɗi
Mɛ tɛ we yi wee nɔ nɛnɛ, hee reeta litrɛ ga, wese kpɔk kpɔk.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk hee makala be-fon ga. Mɛ tɛ ye wee zu kora-ɗɔr ko bíí dɔ nɛ makala'i nɛ gbaayí o bíí lɛŋ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Nɛ hegɔ a̧ o be
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am hiɗa mɔ: «Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧, mi tɛ de ndiŋ hegɔ a tɛ‘m nɛti na! Nɛ̀ naa koo nɛ‘m mɛ‘i, mi tɛ nyɔŋ wɔr-saɗi, koo ŋma saɗi nɛ mɔ baa ɓɛɛ ka fe gee na. Ŋma ndiŋ kpoo tɛ ye nú‘m nɛti na.»
A̧ kifa nú ha̧‘m: «Mi zia wen kɔ-mɛ; kinii, mɛ̀ é gii nyɔŋmɔ nɛ ɗɔr ko bíí duk. Mi ee ɗɔr ndai oi ɗɔr ko bíí ha̧ mɛ mɛ gi nɛ nyɔŋmɔ.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo'e: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ zɔ̀k, mi tɛ ɗaŋ fara-kpa-nyɔŋmɔ ko o bíí Jerusalɛm yinɛ. Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ nɛ gasa bɔnɛ; ɓɛɛ see-wa tɛ diti zu mɔ‘i nyɛmna.
Nyɔŋmɔ in yi tɛ ɓan wa nyɛmna, zu-wa tɛ zik, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ziɓi kifi geemɔ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.»
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ bá ŋma tɔ̧ɔ̧ nu gba-paa hee pai ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kpúí mui̧-zu-mɛ gu nɛ zera kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ a nu. Mɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ mu̧i̧-zu-mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ kɛ̧́ duk-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ taar.

Mɛ̀ dɔ́ tua-a kpɔk see ye ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí be tɛ̀ɛ́ kɛr ye nɛ biro; mɛ̀ bá yiitoo tua-a mgbɔ nɛ yi gba-paa zik nɛ ye duk nu ŋmaa. Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ ŋmásí oi tua-a'i ha̧ búk kai pɛsi yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ dak gba-paa kɔ‘m duk ɗoŋ-aa.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá ŋma be mu̧i̧-zu-mɛ tikiɗi e kɔ̧ zibaa-laa kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ̀ káí ŋma be mu̧i̧-zu-mɛ woyo wen dɔa-a tɛ wee, ɓɛɛ wee-aa tɛ pɛsi de ŋmaa in o be
«Mi GASA WAN, mɔ n'am tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa Jerusalɛm, ye n'am ee so mgbara o tugun bíí, nɛ o gɔni-duk ɔɔ so ye zik a̧ e see-a, nɛ mɔ‘i.
O wi Jerusalɛm mbo zu tɛ o heembea in o
Mi GASA WAN, Sɔ̧, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e nde: Ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu gan o dɔka dukbíí nɛ ɔ zik'nɛ́. Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ‘m na, ɛnɛ mbo zu tɛ o
Ɓɛɛ sa'm tɔ̧‘e nde, mi tɛ ba zu'm duk nɛ ɛnɛ; mi tɛ gɔn ŋga kita zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi dee mɔ-aa mgbák saaye Jerusalɛm ha̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ mɛ zɔk.
Mɔ n'am tɛ de so nɛti na, a̧‘m tɛ de in'nɛ̀ɛ́, wen deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ ndiŋmɔ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ mi beka de pɛrti mɔ‘i woyo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Sɛn saaye, o dáa-wan-bem tɛ nyɔŋ o bem kɔ‘i, in o bem tɛ nyɔŋ o daa kɔ‘i mbɛt. Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋga bɔnɛ zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi pɛsa oi ndaa o bíí nɛ tɛ ɓɔn dam ti zan fara lɛŋ.
«Mɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpasa tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Ɛnɛ ɗaŋa war sa̧a̧ Tua kɔ‘m nɛ o deemɔ búù k’ɛ́nɛ́, in ɗafa o gee sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Hegɔ, mi tɛ kum'nɛ́ yinɛ, nɛ ko beka bo yí‘m na.
Ɛnɛ tɛ kɛ̧ tɛ fara taar: o ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ tɛ fe tɛ zɛɛ-geŋa kóó tɛ wɔ sɛn saaye’ɛ; o ŋma tɛ fe nɛ fio gba-paa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ pɛsi o oi ndaa bíí dam ti zan, mi tɛ duk ɗoŋ wa nɛ gba-paa yaknɛ sóróm.
Mi tɛ kifi er h’ɛ́nɛ́, mi tɛ de mɔ ba nú‘nɛ́ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m, ha̧ see-am mɛ ga̧. Mɛ nɛ ŋgimbi'i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ nɛnɛ nde, mi GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ zu'nɛ́ tɛ nyimsea kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk bɛɛ-oi in mɔɔ-búù ti o tugun bíí lɛŋ nɛ ya zik'nɛ́ ka ba nɛ o wi-ɓir-war mbɛt.

Mi tɛ de bɔnɛ in Jerusalɛm tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m tɔ̧ nɛ ŋga wen a zu a̧. Ye'i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-mami in mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗi ko o wi nɛ ɔ zik wa, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-mbaŋ tɛ-wa in mɔɔ-pi̧ kíì tɛ-wa; nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Mi be tɛɛ tom kaɓa pi̧ zu'nɛ́ mɛ kum'nɛ́, mɔ‘i tɛ pi̧ gasa bɔnɛ zu'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ góò ba nɛ wi’ɛ ga. Mi tɛ ɗaŋ o nyɔnɔ mɛ kɔ̧ dam k’ɛ́nɛ́ wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ fe wɔ.
Mi tɛ tom kaɓa in o ɗaŋ boko-nam pi̧ zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ kum o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́. Zɛɛ-geŋa, o ŋgamɔ, ka ba nɛ gba-paa tɛ kum'nɛ́; nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ si zu o kaya
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e: Ɛnɛ o kaya
O
Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o wɔr be
O gasa ye tɛ ɗaŋ lɔkɔti lɔkɔti gu nɛ o fara-ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; o kusi-sɔ̧ in o géé-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ gbin a nu ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ gu nɛ o kpáná-ɗafi-wa mbɛt. O tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ geemɔ.
O bíí mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ dɔka-a tɛ tir a nu nɛ fio, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
«Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o oi ndaa bíí mgbara'nɛ́, nɛ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa nu gba-paa ɓɛɛ nɛ pɛsa so dam mgbara o tugun bíí sitɛ o ŋma nu.

Ɓɛɛ tɛ oi o ndaa bíí mgbara'nɛ́, nɛ wa tɛ kai nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ si mgbara o tugun bíí mɛ‘i tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ am. Mi tɛ de ha̧ see-wa mɛ gɔn zu mɔɔ-dàlà kɔ-wa, in yí-wa nɛ duk ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧‘i mɛ́ kaɗi zɔka mɔ si ɗoŋ wa. Wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ̀ wa dea, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ demɔ na, nɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr ti'm.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ wa tɛ iŋ nɛnɛ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ géè a̧‘m tɔ̧ nɛ̀ ŋga wen-usa-bɔnɛ ha̧ wa na.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ mbɛ́r er-mɛ, mɛ̀ tó naŋ-mɛ nɛ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e, ‹Oee!› Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ o be nutua ko
Wi nɛ̀ duk ɓɔn oi-wi tɛ fe nu gba-paa, ɓɛɛ oi o bíí nɛ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa tɛ kum nɛ kaɓa; mi tɛ de mɔ ba nú-wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m.
Wɔr o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ a nu ti o géé-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kémbéŋ-kémbéŋ zik nɛ o
Mi tɛ nyɛi̧ er-am mɛ ɗaŋ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti. Fara-duk k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk nɛ bɛɛ-oi ŋga-gbárà mɛ hɔ nɛnɛ Dibla. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ nɛnɛ‘e, mi nɛ́ GASA WAN.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be
«Kinii
Ko beka bo yí‘m ha̧ mɛ na; mi beka de ko ha̧ mɛ na kóó tikiɗi; mi tɛ pi̧ wen zu mɛ oi ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ. Ɗaŋ ndiŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ hegɔ‘i ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
«Nɛ́ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: Ŋgamɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk nɛ ti na a̧ tɛ‘i.
Sɔŋkur mɔ a̧ hɛɗi tɛnɛ‘i! A̧ a̧ tɛ tik zu mɛ‘i! Hɔɔ katɛ mɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧! Hɔɔ hɔɔ kaɗi!
Sɔŋkur mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nu’ɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ hɛɗi tɛnɛ'ɛ. Ŋgimbi-a hɔa; wese-a a̧ nyɛm tɛnɛ‘i! Wese'i nɛ́ wese ŋga mɔɔ-kíì, nɛ̀ gima tortɛ in gima nyɛŋɛ nɛ̀ zu kaya mɛ beka bo ɓɔna.
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, mi tɛ mɛ pi̧ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m zu mɛ, mi tɛ de mɔ ba nú-mɛ́ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m. Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ dea; mi tɛ pi̧ wen zu mɛ zu o ɗaŋ ndiŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.

Ko beka bo yí‘m ha̧ mɛ ɓɔna, mi beka de ko ha̧ mɛ na kóó tikiɗi. Mi tɛ de mɔ in mɛɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ dea; o ɗaŋ ndiŋ deemɔ kɔ-mɛ‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ hegɔ‘i ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ‘e nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ qusi'nɛ́.
«Mɛ̀ zɔ́k wese ŋgamɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ tɛ‘i. Ŋgimbi kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hɔa'i. Nyasi nyafa tan nɛ̀ mɛ kaɗi; ŋmaŋa tɛ kɔ-mɛ‘i hɔɔ nduti.
Ŋgamɔ nɛ́ nyasi nɛ̀ nyafa mɛ́ gusi bíí‘i. Ŋma mɔ kɔ-wa bo ɓɔna; giti mɔ kà bó nɛ̀ gɔfa mɔ kɔ-wa bo ɓɔna: wa kpa gee kpaa ɔma-tɛ tɛ bɔnɛ na.
«Ŋgimbi hɔa, wese-a a̧ nyɛm tɛnɛ‘i. Ká o wi-hi̧fi̧-mɔ dé tortɛ gee na, ká o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ nyim tɛ na mbɛt, wen nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tɛ tik zu o bíí nu’ɛ lɛŋ.

Wan-ɗɔr-mɔ beka kpa mɔ n'aa ɗɔra woyo na, kóó a̧ ɓɔna so kpasa. Hɔɔ-zu nɛ usi sɔŋkur ɗaŋa-a ko dukbíí'ɛ lɛŋ‘i tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧. O wi nɔ‘i tɛ ɓɔn kana tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ siti; ŋma bíí mɛ kpasi tɛ-wi nɛ tɛ-wi bo na.
Wa mbɛr nɛ bi̧ɔ̧-biro wen mɔi̧a o bíí mɛ ɗafi mɔ, ɓɛɛ o wi-nɛ-biro bo na, wen nyimsea kɔ‘m tika zu o bíí lɛŋ, ŋma bíí mɛ yu ɗɔɔ-aa bo na.»
«Gba-paa nɛ̀ zan, zɛɛ-geŋa in kaɓa nɛ̀ kɔ̧ a̧: kóó o nde nɛ tɛ duk kpɛɛfɔ tɛ fe nu gba-paa, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ ya tɛ gasa ye, zɛɛ-geŋa in kaɓa tɛ kum wa.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-yu-ŋgamɔ tɛ yu mɔ, wa tɛ yu mɔ si zu kaya hee gbaku̧i kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ga, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kum wa kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Tɛ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ mɔk,
zugur-wa tɛ yɔmbi a zu ŋmaa;
wa tɛ mar bufu,
bele tɛ zar wa a nu;
zu-wa tɛ diti nɛ foe,
ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ tɛ kpui zu.
Wa tɛ kai o sede kɔ-wa a taŋ nɛ yuwar nɛnɛ,
lɔr kɔ-wa tɛ duk hee yɔsɛ ga sɛn yí-wa.
Wese nɛ nyimsea ko GASA WAN tɛ kur,
kóó nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, kóó lɔr beka kpasi wa na.
Wa beka kpa mɔɔ-gɔn nu wɔ-mɔ tɛ-wa na;
zaŋ-wa beka sur na mbɛt,
wen nɛ́ lɔr in bu-mbɔi a̧ pi̧i̧ so wa tɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Nɛ́ o gba de mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ a̧ dee so
ha̧ wa mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i a̧ wa kaia dui nɛ o géé-sɔ̧
nɛ duka nɛ gasa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Hegɔ mi tɛ de ha̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-búù zu wa.
Mi tɛ e ha̧ o gɔni-duk mɛ ɓar mɔ kɔ-wa,
ha̧ o wi-ɗaŋ zaŋnu’ɛ mɛ fɛŋ o mɔ kɔ-wa,
kai nɛnɛ yaknɛ nɛ mɔɔ-oi-biro.
Mi tɛ ba yí‘m tɛ-wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-zuzu tɛ ye Tua kɔ‘m,
mɛ kai o demɔ kɔ‘m yaknɛ;
o gɔni-bíí tɛ ye fara'i,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ fɛŋ
Mɛ̀ dúí nyak-zɔɓɔ,
wen nu’ɛ duna nɛ gbɛɛ-zu,
gasa ye duna nɛ dee ŋgamɔ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o ŋga ɗaŋ tugun bíí
mɛ tɛ mɛ ɓar o tua kɔ-wa ba;
mi tɛ gɔn ndaa ŋgayamɔ ko o ŋga-wi,
ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧ fara kɔ-wa tɛ fɛŋ.
Dita-see a̧ tɛ‘i!
Wa tɛ kii ga̧a̧mɔ takaɗi.
Ŋgamɔ zu ŋgamɔ tɛ kpa wa;
ɗaŋ nyɛrɛmɔ tɛ hɔ ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa yaknɛ.
Wa tɛ nɛ mɛ ak
mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'aa zɔka ha̧ wa takaɗi;
wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ beka iŋ mɔ mɛ usi ɓɔna,
o
Wannu tɛ zim mɔ,
gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ ba be-wan,
ɓɛɛ er o bíí tɛ nak.
Mi tɛ de bɔnɛ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ gɔna kita kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.»
Pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ reeta, nɛ ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ yaka tɛ pɛ bara, mi a̧a̧ so tɛ duka-a nu tua kɔ‘m in o gasawi nutua ko Juda nɛ yaa zik am, ɓɛɛ ŋgayamɔ ko GASA WAN duk zu'm.

Kà‘m tɛ ba yí‘m nɛ ŋgɔn wo, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in saŋa-yí bíí nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ duk’ɛ, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ duk hee golo-zaŋ-aa mɛ́ sí ɗɔɔ ga duk hee wee ga, ɓɛɛ golo-zaŋ-aa mɛ si ŋgɔn duk tok nɛnɛ hee gbɛ̧ boi ga.
