«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ hí̧í̧ gba duk gii bíí Egiptɛ; mɛ ir wa in o boko-bem ko o tugun bíí si kɔ̧ ɗuka fara mɛ. Wa a̧ ai nɛ oi déè kɔ-wa si ɗɔɔ nu mɛ ha̧ wa mɛ ya in o bíí fara'i.
Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e: ‹Ɛ́nɛ́ ta k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e bíí tɛ de ŋma ko h’ɛ́nɛ́ nde? Ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zír si ɗɔɔ nu mgbara o wi-mbii mɛ.›
«O bíí Egiptɛ tɛ tik nɛ ɗaŋa yi biro; gba-paa bɛŋa kaɗi! A̧ a̧ ndur Egiptɛ nɛ oi gba dukbíí kɔ‘i si kɔ̧ fio mɛ.
O gbin-biro in o ŋgaŋa-wi tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa nɛ fara ko o fio mɛ tɛnɛ‘e: ‹O wi-mbii nɛ fee so nu gba-paa a̧a̧ mgbara yɛ fara ko o fio’ɛ mbɛt.›
«Wannu Asirii in o wi-biro kɔ‘i ya fara'i, ɓɛɛ pɛsi-fio kɔ-wa kɛr wa e see-a. Wa kuma so lɛŋ nu gba-paa.

Wa ee pɛ̀sì ko wannu Asirii sɛn mgbák ndaa fara ko o fio mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛk o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ ɗoŋ ŋmaa nɛ yuwar-a zik pɛ̀sì kɔ̧-a̧ kpa nu ŋmaa; o wi nɔ‘i yaa so nɛ o bíí nɛ duka so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa kuma lɛŋ nu gba-paa.

«Pɛ̀sí-fio ko wannu Elam duka so fara'i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ pɛsi-fio ko gba duk wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ zik pɛ̀sì kɔ̧-a̧ e see-a; o wi nɔ‘i nɛ o wi nɛ fee so nu gba-paa, wa nɛ o wi-mbii nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu mɛ. O wi nɔ‘i yaa so nɛ o bíí nɛ duka so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ fee nɛ fio-foe hee o ŋma bíí nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu mɛ ga.

Wa ɗafa so fara ha̧ wannu Elam in o gba gii wi-biro kɔ‘i mgbara o bíí nɛ fee so nu gba-paa. O pɛ̀sì ko o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ zika pɛ̀sì kɔ̧-a̧ kpa nu ŋmaa. O wi-mbii nɔ‘i lɛŋ kuma nu gba-paa. Nɛti wa yaa so nɛ o bíí nɛ duka so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa fee nɛ fio-foe hee o ŋma bíí nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu mgbara o fio mɛ ga.

«Pɛ̀sì ko Mɛsɛk in Tubal a̧a̧ so hi̧i̧ mbɛt in o gba gii wi-biro kɔ-wa. O pɛ̀sì ko o wi-biro nɔ‘i zika pɛ̀sì ko o wannu kɔ-wa kpa nu ŋmaa. Wa lɛŋ nɛ o wi-mbii nɛ kuma nu gba-paa wen wa duka so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí.

Wa gun o wi nɔ‘i nɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ hee o kuti o yaa-ŋgo-biro mɛ ti ga na. Wa nɛ o wi-mbii nɛ zira si kɔ̧ fio nɛ oi o mɔɔ-biro kɔ-wa. Wa kaia o gba-paa kɔ-wa a ɗɔɔ zu-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kai o ŋgee kɔ-wa gu zu gba̧a̧-wa, wen wa yaa so nɛ o bíí nɛ duka so mɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ o bíí, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o yaa-ŋgo-biro de so ga.
«Ɓɛɛ mɛ mbɛt, mɛ tɛ fe in o wi-mbii kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gun mɛ mgbara o bíí nɛ kuma nu gba-paa.

«O be Edɔm in o wannu ká bá nɛ̀ o be-wan kɔ‘i a̧a̧ mgbara o bíí nɛ kuma nu gba-paa mbɛt; kóó nɛ oi o ŋgaŋamɔ nɛ wa dee so, wa ɔ kpɔk fara in o wi-mbii ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu fara ko o fio mɛ.

«O be-wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in o be Sidɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu in o bíí nɛ fea so a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ mbɛt. Wa nɛ o wi-mbii, ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ oi kíì nɛ wa duka so mɛ pi̧ tɛ o bíí‘i, ziimɔ baa wa zu o ŋgaŋamɔ nɛ wa dee so, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ nu mgbara o bíí nɛ kuma nu gba-paa. Wa fee nɛ fio-foe hee o ŋma bíí nɛ zira si ɗɔɔ nu mɛ ga.
«Wannu Egiptɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ see-aa tɛ ga̧ zu gba duk gii wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, wen a̧ nɛ tɛ-a gu nɛ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɛ fe nɛ fio gba-paa mbɛt. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«Mi ee so ha̧ wannu Egiptɛ mɛ pi̧ bele tɛ o bíí, ɓɛɛ kinii a̧ in gba o gii wi-mbii kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ɔ nu mgbara o wi-biro in o wi nɛ kuma nu gba-paa. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ o be
Kà wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ zɔka'e, biro a̧ tɛ mɛ bi nu kɔ-wa'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ dɔm zak mɛ mbaŋ tɛ o bíí.
Ŋma bíí nɛ́ zia dɔma zak'i nɛ ɗoŋ zer, ɓɛɛ kà a̧ ta mɔ zu-a na, nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ biro tɛ̀ɛ́ ba a̧ gbɛ, tɔk tɛ wi’ɛi tɛ si ɗoŋ zu a̧ nɛ tɛ-a.
A̧ zia dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak mɛ kpasi na; tɔk tɛ-a tɛ si ɗoŋ zu a̧ nɛ tɛ-a. Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ zia dɔma mɔ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa yuu mɔ yak tɛ kpasi kɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ kà bó nɛ́ wi-pɛm-mɔ a̧ zɔka biro fara tɛa-a, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mbaŋ tɛ o bíí na, kà biro'i ba ŋma bíí gbɛ, wi’ɛi tɛ fe wen nɛ wi-pɛm-mɔ mbaŋ tɛ-a na, ɓɛɛ wen fio ko wi’ɛi tɛ tik zu wi-pɛm-mɔ.
«Hegɔ, mɛ mbɛt, mɛ́ bíí, mi ee mɛ nɛ̀ wi-pɛm o be
Kà‘m nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ‘e: ‹Wi-ɗaŋ, mɛ tɛ fe,› ɓɛɛ kà mɛ tɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ‘i mɛ kpai er deemɔ kɔ‘i na, a̧ tɛ fe wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔk tɛ-a tɛ tik zu mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ e ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ duk, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ kɔ̧ mɛ kpai duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ na, a̧ tɛ fe wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ tɛ kpasi zu-mɛ.»
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ zii; mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be

Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e, mi kana mɔ nɛ tɛ‘m, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ duk kpasa ga; fio ko wi-ɗaŋ de tɛ‘m na. Mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ mɛ nɛ wen ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ mɛ kpai yuwar duka-a kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ kpasi. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é o ɗaŋ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk. Ɛ́nɛ́ kíí mɛ kum wen ge nde, o be
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ o be

Ɓɛɛ kà‘m nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a'e: ‹Mɛ tɛ kpasi,› ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a'i tika tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ, wi beka iŋ oi deemɔ n'aa duka so de nɛ yuwar-a'i ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɛ fe wen ɗaŋmɔ n'aa dea'i.
Ɓɛɛ kà‘m nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ‘e: ‹Mɛ tɛ fe,› ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗaŋ‘i kpai er deemɔ kɔ‘i mɛ e yuwar deemɔ nɛ ɗaŋ-a duk, de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ de-a,
kà a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧ ziŋina siɗoŋ ha̧ wi-ea-a, in kà a̧ nɛ baa mɔ n'aa zu̧u̧ so siɗoŋ ha̧ o wan-aa, kà a̧ nɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ kpasi bíí, e nɛ yuwar ɗaŋmɔ duk, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɛ kpasi, a̧ beka fe na.
Tɛ-wi tɛ bi ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ n'aa dee so; hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa duk tɛ kpasa yuwar deemɔ nɛ de-a, de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga, a̧ tɛ kpasi.
«O be-nu ko dukbíí kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Yuwar mɔ nɛ GASA WAN de in yɛɛ'ɛ nyɛm yi-mɔ na,› ɓɛɛ nɛ́ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ nyɛm yi-mɔ na ɛ̧.
Kà wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ ee deemɔ kɔ‘i nɛ yuwar-a duk mɛ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ, a̧ tɛ fe wen ɗaŋmɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ kà wi-ɗaŋ e dee ɗaŋmɔ duk mɛ de mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, a̧ tɛ kpasi wen mɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧́‘e, ‹Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN de’ɛ nyɛm yi-mɔ na.› Mi tɛ gɔn kita zu'nɛ́, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o be nutua ko

Pɛ n’ɛɛ duka nɛ bara-biro sɛn nu Babilɔŋ dee ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ko sɔŋkur zɛ tɛ pɛ‘i, a̧ bíí kpɔk mgbara o wi nɛ mɔ hɔɔ yɔɔ zu wa maa nɛ yi hɔ tɛ‘m, ba nɛ nyɛrɛ tika-a ko Jerusalɛm tɛnɛ ha̧‘m.
Ŋgai ko GASA WAN yee tɛ‘m nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ nɛti hɔa-a ko wi-ba-nyɛrɛmɔ tɛnɛ. GASA WAN hu̧i̧a̧ nú‘m nɛ kpee so'i, ɓɛɛ mi ku̧ naŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛti kaɗi sɛka wi-ba-nyɛrɛmɔ tɛnɛ‘i biti hɔ tɛ‘m.
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, o bíí nɛ ɔ bɛɛ-oi nu
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e nde, mɛ nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔ́ŋ kpoo nɛ̀ oi tɔk, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ baa yí‘nɛ́ sitɛ o gee sɔ̧, gbɛ nɛ o bíí. Mɛ nɛ zu mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e, wi baa nu?
K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ duk tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ gba-paa; o okoo, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dee ndiŋmɔ, o wiwii, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ baa kóò ko ŋma'nɛ ɔ nɛnɛ: Nɛ́ mɔ‘i ɛ́nɛ́ baa nù wen-aa?

«Mɛ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ wa: Mɛ nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mi kan mɔ nɛ tɛ‘m, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, gba-paa tɛ kum o bíí nɛ ɓɔna bɛɛ-oi'i. Mi tɛ pi̧ o bíí tɛ o geɗek ye ha̧ o boko-nam mɛ nyɔŋ wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kum o bíí kɔ̧ ta in kɔ̧ di̧i̧ nɛ ŋga zɛɛ-geŋa.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ ye'i mɛ kifi gee ŋga-gbárà nɛ bíí beka duk sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ ŋmaŋa-tɛ zu ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧‘i tɛ hɔ nduti. O kaya nu
Ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ de ha̧ nu'i mɛ kifi nɛ gee ŋga-gbárà wen zu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dea'i, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.

«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ́ bíí, o bezaŋ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ ya nɛ ɗɔɔ wɛɛ-tua in nɛ ká̧ nu tua ba nɛ nin-mɛ nɛnɛ, tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧ o ŋmaa'e: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ tɛnɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀ zíí mbe mɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́'ɛ.›

Ɓɛɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɛ mɔi̧ pii tɛ-mɛ nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ya nu ti mɛ zíí nɛ̀ wen nú-mɛ́; wa nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa beka de mɔ nɛ wa zii nú-mɛ́ na. Wa de nɛ mɔ nɛ see-wa kɔ̧a̧, kíí nɛ yi-mɔ kɔ-wa mɛ tɛ-wa.
Wa zɔk mɛ hee wi-bii gba de gima in wi-mbɛr de mɔɔ-mbɛr ha̧ wa ga. Wa zii mɔ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa zii, ɓɛɛ wa de mɔ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa na.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ ŋgamɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-aa be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ kaɗi, mɔ‘i nɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ tɛnɛ‘i; ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e nde,
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ŋga wen zu o wi-dai
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ nyɔŋa nɔ-kpoo o sami, pi̧ nɛ o laa-buma-a tɛ‘nɛ́, gbɛ nɛ ŋmaŋa be-a, ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dai wa de na.

Ɛnɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ gbaka o sami wan nɛ ziɓa, ɛnɛ de nyina ha̧ o wan nɛ ɔ zɛɛ na, kà bó nɛ̀ ɓara nyina a yi da̧i̧ ko o wan nɛ baa da̧i̧ na mbɛt. Ɛnɛ nɛ ɗoŋ o wan nɛ yɔɔ ɓɔŋ zaŋbɛɛ wen mgbɔɔ wa pii ɗoŋ saaye na, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ wa nɛ saka-yí de nɛ ŋgamɔ in wa.
Dee ŋgamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in wa dee ha̧ wa mɛ gba pɛsi a zaŋbɛɛ sót-sót, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ tik nɛ zu wa nyɔŋ nɛ kɔ‘i.
O mɔ-dai kɔ‘m yambala dam fara lɛŋ, nɛ zu o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́ nɛnɛ; mɔ-dai kɔ‘m pɛsa dam zu nu sót-sót. Ŋma bíí mɛ pɛm wa kà bó nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa mɛ kai wa pii ɗoŋ bo na.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-dai

GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, mi kana mɔ wen zu o mɔ-dai kɔ‘m nɛ pɛsi nɛ tɛ o mɔ nɛnɛ, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ nyɔŋ nɛ kɔ‘i, wen o wi-dai-wa de mɔ de na, wen wa zɔk duk o sami kɔ‘m nɛ de-a na; o wi-dai-sami dai nɛ tɛ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wa dai nɛ o sami kɔ‘m na.
O wi-dai-sami, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧‘e nde: Mi tɛ paŋ in o wi-dai
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧‘e, «Kinii, mi nɛ tɛ‘m tɛ zɔk o mɔ-dai kɔ‘m nɛ de-a, mi tɛ pɛm wa nɛ de-a.

Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-dai-sami yor nɛ nɔa-a ŋgimbi n'aa duk mgbara o sami nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ pɛsi ga, mɛ nɛ hegɔ a̧‘m tɛ yor nɛnɛ zu o sami kɔ‘m mbɛt. Mi tɛ kii wa dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai wa piinɛ ɗoŋ nɛ fara nɛ wa pɛsa so si sɛnɛ wese zɔm kutu in tum.
Mi tɛ kai wa yinɛ mgbara o dukbíí nɛ wa duk sɛnɛ. Mi tɛ mɔi̧ wa nɛ gɔni nu, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai wa siɗoŋ nu kɔ-wa. Mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ dai wa sɛn zu o kaya
Mi tɛ dai wa tɛ de fara mbɔɗi zɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa ɔ zu kaya
Nɛ́ mi nɛ tɛ‘m a̧ tɛ dai o sami kɔ‘m, nɛ́ mi'i tɛ ha̧ ɔma-tɛ ha̧ wa mbɛt; GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.

«Mi tɛ kii wan nɛ yɔa; mi tɛ mgbɔ wan nɛ yambala pii ɗoŋ, mi tɛ hɛr naŋ wan nɛ naŋ-a gbina, ɓɛɛ mi dee nyina ha̧ wan nɛ tɛ̀ nyim. Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ gbɛ o ŋmaŋa-a in o ŋgaŋa-a. Mi tɛ dai duk sami kɔ‘m nɛ yuwar-a.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o sami kɔ‘m, mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara o sami in o ŋmaa. Mi tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara o vala sami in vala gbadua.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpa desee tɛ nyɔŋa o gba de mbɔɗi zɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ s’ɛnɛ i̧si̧ oi-aa i̧si̧ nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́'ɛ nde? Ɛ́nɛ́ kpa desee tɛ nɔɔ de gɛɗa yi na, ɓɛɛ s’ɛnɛ ɓuti yi nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́'ɛ nde?
Ɓɛɛ nɛ hegɔ‘i a̧ o sami kɔ‘m nyɔŋ nɛ o zɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ i̧sa, nɔ nɛ yi nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́ ɓuta mbɛt.
«Ɓɛɛ sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧‘e, mi tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara o ŋmaŋa sami in o ɔ̧ka̧-a̧,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ gusa zu goto o wan nɛ ɔ̧ka̧, koŋgó ɓaa-wa in zak-wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ndak wa mgbara o dɔka-a yinɛ.
Mi tɛ tɛ mɛ kpasi o sami kɔ‘m, nɛ o ŋma bíí beka de ŋgamɔ in wa ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kɛ̧ mgbara o sami in ŋmaa.
Mi tɛ e ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ dai wa, wi’ɛi nɛ David wi-de-tom kɔ‘m; mɛ nɛ a̧‘i a̧ tɛ duk wi-dai-wa.
Mi GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David tɛ duk nɛ be-wan mgbara wa. Mɔ nɛ mi GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧ a̧‘i.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in wa ha̧ wa mɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ; mi tɛ kum o ɗaŋ boko-nam nù kɔ-wa yinɛ lɛŋ, wen ha̧ o mɔ-dai kɔ‘m mɛ yar nɛ zaŋbɛɛ, ɔ nɛ kɔ̧ kombo nɛ fee-see.
«Mi tɛ e ha̧ wa mɛ yar zik ká̧ naŋ sa̧a̧ kaya kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi-a; kórò‘i tɛ duk nɛ kórò de sɔnti.

O te tɛ gasi mɛ wai nɛ de-a, nyɔnɔ tɛ dɛm, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ‘m tɛ ya nɛ fee-see zu nu kɔ-wa, ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ gbin kpáŋá ger o bíí kɔ‘m, ha̧‘m mɛ gbo wa yinɛ er o wi nɛ de wa nɛ bara, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m beka duk nɛ mɔɔ-ɓar kai yaknɛ ko o tugun bíí ɓɔna, wa beka duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o boko-nam ɓɔna mbɛt. Wa tɛ ya fara kɔ-wa nɛ fee-see nɛ bíí mɛ nukuri wa beka bo na.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ nyɔnɔ mɛ dɛm kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, wan nɛ yor ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ o be
«Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o bíí kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ nɛ duk sami kɔ‘m n'am dai; mi nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́; GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ sitɛ kaya Sɛir, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ŋga wen zu a̧.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: Mi tɛ ba zu dúk nɛ̀ mɛ, kaya Sɛir, mi tɛ nyɛi̧ er-am si zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kifi gee ŋga-gbárà nɛ‘i beka duk sɛnɛ na.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ o ye kɔ-mɛ kifi geemɔ, fara kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ bɛɛ-oi keŋgeŋge; hegɔ mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
«Mɛ duka tɛ kasa sɛnmɔ in o be
Hegɔ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧; mi beka e mɛ géè tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mɛ dea'i na; mi tɛ kundi ari-a zu mɛ. Mi tɛ de ha̧ tɔk tɛ-wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ tɔk'i tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ kaya Sɛir mɛ kifi gee bɛɛ-oi, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ gbɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ tɛ ɓir nɛ fara'i.
Gba-paa tɛ duk ɗoŋ o bíí kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ wɔr tɛ dun nu dam nɛ zu o kaya nɔ'ɔ, in o zu-tɔ̧́ gu nɛ kɔ̧ o ɗɔŋgɔ hɔ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ gboŋgo mɛ lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ fara-duk kɔ-mɛ mɛ kifi gee zaŋbɛɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo; ŋma bíí mɛ duk tɛ o gasa ye kɔ-mɛ beka bo na mbɛt. Mɛ nɛ hi̧i̧ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
«Mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, mɛ tɛ kai o be

Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧, mi tɛ tik zu mɛ nɛ ŋgaya-a, mi tɛ de mɔ in mɛɛ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ŋga nyimsea in sɛnmɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ tika zu dukbíí kɔ‘m'i, wen ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ‘e, mi gusi mɛ zu mɔ nɛ mɛ dee in wa.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN. Mi zia dara lɛŋ nɛ mɛ da̧a̧ nɛ o kaya
Mi zia ɗaŋ dara n’ɛnɛ da̧a̧ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ zu'm'i.
«Wen mɔ‘i, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧‘e, wi tɛ ɗaŋ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti kifi gee zaŋbɛɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ tortɛ zu tika-a k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ dee tortɛ zu ɗaŋa-a ko dukbíí ko
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ o kaya
GASA WAN Sɔ̧‘e nde, o wisɛn mama ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹O gba̧‘a̧ kaya nɔ'ɔ kifa nɛ k’ɛɛ.›
«Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, wen nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: O tugun bíí nɛ ya zik'nɛ́ nukura'nɛ́, ɗaŋ‘nɛ́, ba'nɛ́ nɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa fɛŋ‘nɛ́ ɗaŋ nɛ nin'nɛ́ ti o tugun bíí.
Hegɔ o kaya

«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: Mi kana mɔ, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen’ɛ tɛ nyima see in ŋga nyimsea zu o tugun bíí, ɓɛɛ gan, nɛ zu Edɔm nɛ oi gun, yaa-saka-yí‘i nɛ duk nɛ desee wen nɛ‘i baa nu kɔ‘m e nɛ mɔɔ-oi kɔ‘i wo'i.
«Mi tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ nu
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧: Mi baa er-am nɛ ŋgɔn kan nɛ mɔ ti'nɛ́‘e, dara ko o tugun bíí nɔ'ɔ nɛ ya zik'nɛ́'ɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ zu wa.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o kaya
Mi si ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ ye ɗoŋ‘nɛ́, mi tɛ de ha̧ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ mɔk woyo wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gun nyɔnɔ sɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí nutua ko
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o bíí in o mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dɔk siti, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ dɛm gan kuti-a. Mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ de-a gan kuti-a, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
Mi tɛ kai dukbíí kɔ‘m
«GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: O ŋma bíí tɔ̧‘e, nu’ɛ nɛ nu-nyɔŋ o bíí, nɛ nyɔŋ nɛ o bem kɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a kinii hegɔɔ yak nɛnɛ siti, nu’ɛ beka nyɔŋ bíí sɛka bó nɛ̀ kuma o bem ɓɔna. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Nu’ɛ beka zii dara ko o tugun bíí ɓɔna, ziimɔ beka ba nu’ɛ ti o dukbíí ɓɔna, in nu’ɛ beka kum o bem kɔ‘i ɓɔna mbɛt. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ zíí, o be
Mi pi̧i̧ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m zu wa tɛ gbɛɛ o bíí nɛ wa gbɛɛ tɛ nu'i, in wen ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋa nu kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ mi de bɔnɛ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa. Tɛ mɔ‘i, mi pɛsa wa dam mgbara o tugun bíí hɔ nɛnɛ gɔni nu mɛ mbɛt.
Dukbíí fɛŋa nin-am mgbara o tugun bíí nɛ wa ya mgbara wa, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i de ha̧ dukbíí nu'i mɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹O wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí ko GASA WAN nɛ gboo e nù kɔ-wa duk yɛ́ɛ́ ɓɛɛ gɔ!›
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am yora ɗoŋ nin-am nɛ o be nutua ko
«Wen hegɔ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ ha̧ o be nutua ko
Mi tɛ de ha̧ nin-am n’ɛnɛ fɛŋa so mgbara wa'i mɛ hu̧r. Mi tɛ de mɔ‘i mgbara'nɛ́ ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk'e mi ɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Mi tɛ mɔi̧‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ mgbara o tugun bíí nɛ gɔni nu mɛ pii ɗoŋ nu k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ misi̧ de sa̧a̧ yi a tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ sa̧ zu ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ in o mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ dee so.
Mi tɛ ha̧ mbe see h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e mbe taamɔ tɛ‘nɛ́. Mi tɛ ba ŋga-see tɛ‘nɛ́ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ ha̧ mbe mɔka-see h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ e taamɔ kɔ‘m tɛ‘nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɛ nɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea kɔ‘m in h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kasi yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘m mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ duk ɓɔn zaŋnu n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i. Ɛnɛ tɛ duk nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi tɛ gbo'nɛ́ tɛ o ndiŋmɔ yinɛ lɛŋ. Mi tɛ de ha̧ alkamaari mɛ dɛm h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dɔka-a; hegɔ kaɓa beka ba'nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o te k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ wai nɛ dɔka-a gu nɛ o mɔ mɛ kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kaɓa beka ba'nɛ́ ha̧ ziimɔ mɛ ba'nɛ́ mgbara o tugun bíí ɓɔna.
Tɛ‘nɛ́ be tɛ̀ɛ́ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ duka-a in deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ de na, ɓɛɛ gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ tɛ ba'nɛ́ zu o ɗaŋmɔ in ndiŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ duka so de'i.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧, ɛnɛ o be nutua ko

«Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ woyo'e: Wese n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ zui'nɛ́ ha̧ war-tɛ‘nɛ́ mɛ sa̧ tɛ o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk tɛ o gasa ye k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kai o gbina-ŋgeŋ-tua bɛɛ-oi a ŋgɔn woyo.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ɓir nɛ ká̧ fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ yak tɛ zɔk'e ɛnɛ dee nyɔnɔ tɛ ŋga-gbárà nɛ duka so nɛ gee kpɛ̧ɛ̧-nu kotoro.

Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ-a yaknɛ‘e, fara’ɛ nɛ ɗaŋa so kifi nɛ gee ŋga-gbárà kotoro, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ɗafa kifi duk nɛ gba de fɔ Edɛn, in o gasa ye nɛ ɗaŋa so gbin a nu lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti’ɛ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ɗafa kifi nɛ o mbe ye-ŋgárá nɛ o bíí ya sɛnɛ mbɛt’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí nɛ biti yáà nɛ yi zik'nɛ́ tɛ iŋ‘e, nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ baa o gasa ye nɛ ɗaŋa so lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti'i e ŋgɔn, gun nɛ o mɔ nɛ ɗaŋa so woyo mbɛt. Wen mɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'i nɛ mɔ‘i a̧‘m dea'i.
«Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo'e, mi tɛ de mbe mɔ gan ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧; mi tɛ e ha̧ nutua ko

Ɓɛɛ o zɔm ye nɔ'ɔ nɛ ya nɛ bɛɛ-oi kinii’ɛ tɛ dun nɛ o bíí hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Jerusalɛm duka so mɛ dun nɛ gba duk-sami nɛ o bíí kai so tɛnɛ wen ɗafa sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi gbaŋa’ɛ ga. Nɛ tɛ mɔ‘i a̧ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.»
Ŋgai ko GASA WAN yee tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mgbɔɔ am yar zik nɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ‘i kpa nu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ zɔm gba̧a̧ fio bíí nɛ kora sɔgbɔrɔ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ gbìsì'ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí, o gba̧a̧ fio nɔ'ɔ tɛ kpasi woyo nde?» Ɓɛɛ mi kifi nú ha̧ a̧‘e: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧, nɛ́ ɛnɛ'ɛ tɛ iŋ i̧i̧ kifa nú‘i.»
Sa a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen sitɛ o gba̧a̧ fio nɔ‘i ai. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e: ‹ɛ́nɛ́ o kora gba̧a̧ fio nɔ'ɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧‘e nde: Mi tɛ ɔm
Mi tɛ a o ɗaɗi in mur-tɛ‘nɛ́ siɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ndàrá-tɛ‘nɛ́ kpee tɛ‘nɛ́ woyo. Mi tɛ ɔm a zu'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpasi; ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ mɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ'ɛ, mi nɛ GASA WAN.› »
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m. Ŋgimbi n'am ɓɔna fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i, mi zia ŋma gba gitimɔ nɛ nɔi̧a, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o gba̧a̧ fio a̧ ɗɔli duk nu ŋmaa ɗɛ́kɛ́t ɗɛ́kɛ́t.
Kà‘m tɛ zɔk mɔ wó, ɓɛɛ ɗaɗi ká bá nɛ̀ mur in ndara tɛ-wi nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ kpee tɛ bíí kpɔk kpɔk ɓɔn yí‘m’ɛ. Ɓɛɛ
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m woyo: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen sitɛ
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m ga.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m'e: «Mɛ́ bíí, o gba̧a̧ fio nɔ'ɔ nɛ o be nutua ko
Hegɔ, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen ha̧ wa'e nde, wen nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Mi tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ aŋ o pɛsi-fio k’ɛ́nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m gbonɛ a zan, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kai'nɛ́ si ɗoŋ nu
Ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ a̧ŋ o pɛ̀sì mɛ kai wɔr'nɛ́ nɛ wa guna so a zan, a̧ ɛ́nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m tɛ iŋ nɛnɛ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
Mi tɛ ɔm
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ bá ŋma gbaá-te,
Mɛ̀ káí o gbaá-te nɔ‘i yiitoo lɛŋ dúk nú ŋmaa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ kpɔk mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ tɛ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e nde, mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ usi ha̧ wa,
mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e, nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mi tɛ ba gbaá-te kpɔk nɛ duk nɛ
«Mɛ̀ káí o gbaá-te nɔ‘i yiitoo nɛ mɛ baa yɔr mɔ zu wa'i dúk nú ŋmaa e kɔ̧ er-mɛ e ti wa.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e nde, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɛ nɛ mɛ kai o be
Mi tɛ mɔi̧ wa a zu ŋmaa wen ha̧ wa mɛ duk nɛ kpɔk dukbíí zu o kaya
Wa beka yɔ war-tɛ-wa tɛ gasa o géé-sɔ̧ in dee o ndiŋmɔ ká bá nɛ̀ dee ŋgazu ɓɔna. Mi tɛ fo kita oi dee ŋgazu
Wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David tɛ ɔ wan zu wa, nɛ a̧‘i kpɔk ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ dai wa; wa tɛ mbo zu tɛ o heembea kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ‘m.

Wa tɛ duk tɛ nu n'am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Jakob wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, fara nɛ o zɔmdáa kɔ-wa yaa so sɛnɛ. Nu'i tɛ duk nɛ nu kɔ-wa hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ-wa mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi-de-tom kɔ‘m David a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in wa ha̧ wa mɛ ya tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo; mi tɛ ha̧ de fara ha̧ wa mɛ ya sɛnɛ, wa tɛ ko dun nu, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e Tua kɔ‘m mgbara wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mi tɛ de fara-duk kɔ‘m mgbara wa, mi tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ duk nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Ka'm be tɛ̀ɛ́ e Tua kɔ‘m mgbara o bíí kɔ‘m ha̧ Tua'i mɛ duk mgbara wa kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ o tugun bíí tɛ iŋ‘e, mi GASA WAN ee o be
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m:
«Mɛ̀ bíí, mɛ̀ zík tɛ-mɛ sitɛ Gɔg, gasa wannu ko o be Mɛsɛk in Tubal nu Magɔg. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ŋga wen zu a̧.
Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧‘e, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hee nde, mi GASA WAN, mi tɛ ba zu'm duk nɛ mɛ Gɔg gasa wannu wan ko Mɛsɛk in Tubal.

Mi tɛ kɔti mɛ yinɛ sɛn fara kɔ-mɛ, mi tɛ pi̧ káná nu mɛ ba yaŋgo-mɛ ŋgai keŋ, ɓɛɛ mi gbura mɛ yaknɛ nɛ oi gba mɔɔ-biro kɔ-mɛ, gu nɛ o nyaŋa nɛ oi o wi-daŋ-aa nɛ laa-biro tɛ-wa, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-biro kɔ-mɛ nɛ oi o ŋgee in o gba-paa mbɛt.
O wi-biro Pɛrsɛ, Etiopii ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí nu Libii tɛ mɔi̧ a zu'nɛ́, nɛ oi o ŋgee in o laasɔ̧i̧ kpáná-boi.
Gɔmɛr in gba gii wi-biro kɔ‘i, Bɛt-Togarma nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ nɛ oi o wi-biro kɔ‘i ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí ko o ŋma dukbíí nɛ ya zik'nɛ́ mbɛt tɛ to a zu'nɛ́.
Mɛ̀ ɗáfí mɔ, mɛ in gba giiwi nɛ̀ mɛ́ mɔi̧a zik mɛ́ nɛ̀ duk ɗɔɔ ŋgai kɔ-mɛ‘i.
Ɗoŋ zɛ gee nde, mɛ tɛ zii heembea kɔ‘m, wen o ŋma bíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ kpasa so nu gba-paa. Wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa nɛ mgbara o dukbíí mɛ́ pii ɗoŋ tɛ́ɛ̀ de ye tɛ gee bɛɛ-oi, mgbara o kaya
Mɛ in o wi-biro kɔ-mɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ gba zɔm dukbíí nɛ mɔi̧a a zu'nɛ́ tɛ daŋ tɛnɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi wa hee ŋga búk kórò ga, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpe zu nu kɔ-wa hee gba kutu ga.
«Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Gɔg nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Wese'i be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ, ɓɛɛ o taamɔ tɛ hɔ tɛ-mɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba ɗaŋ keta.
Mɛ tɛ kur mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi ŋma nu nɛ o bíí ya sɛnɛ nɛ fee-see, o wi nɛ kɔ̧ kɔ‘i biro na, nɛ mbo garo zik nɛ ye kɔ-wa na, in nɛ bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-man-nu tua na mbɛt.

Mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓar o mɔɔ-nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ kai yaknɛ pii tɛ kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ tɛ ɗaŋ ye kɔ-wa nɛ wa ɗafa kifi mbe-a'i, wen wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa pii ɗoŋ nɛ mgbara o tugun bíí nɛ wa pɛsa so si sɛnɛ; nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dɛm nɛ o mɔ-dai in o nyɔnɔ nɛ tɛ mɔ nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ fara-duk kɔ-wa nɛ mgbák bin-see-nù.

O bíí Seba, Dedaŋ in o wi-ɗɔr-mɔ nu Tarsis ká bá nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ katɛ wa tɛ ak mɛ‘e nde: ‹Gba o wi-biro nɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ mɔi̧a’ɛ, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen tika o wi nɔ'ɔ mɛ ɓar mɔ kɔ-wa kai yaknɛ nde? Mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen kaia o lɔr, bu-mbɔi in o mɔ-dai ká bá nɛ̀ o mbɔi kɔ-wa wen ha̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mɛ duk nɛ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-mɛ nde?›
«Hegɔ mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ Gɔg'e, nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: Ŋgimbi nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m
Mɛ tɛ kur nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ, mɛ in o gba wi-biro ko o dukbíí, nɛ oi o nyaŋa in o wi-daŋa-a mbɛt.
Mɛ tɛ bi dukbíí kɔ‘m,
«Mɛ nɛ wen zu mɛ Gɔg a̧‘m tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛti ɓeemɛ‘i nɛ nú o wi-de-tom kɔ‘m, o
«Wese nɛ mɛ Gɔg be tɛ̀ɛ́ bi
Mi kana mɔ tɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m, wese'i, nù tɛ nak nɛ ŋgaya-a sɛn
ɓɛɛ o zoro in o nɔ̧́í̧, o saɗi, in o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nu, ká bá nɛ̀ o bíí lɛŋ tɛ nak nɛ kíì, ɓɛɛ o kaya tɛ mbaŋ gbin a nu gu nɛ o kam-ta in o garo mbɛt.
Mi tɛ pi̧ ŋga mɔɔ-kíì zu mɛ Gɔg, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ. O bíí kɔ-mɛ tɛ a gba-paa zu ŋmaa in o ŋmaa kum nɛ ŋmaa a nu.
Mi tɛ pi̧ gba-paa in zɛɛ-geŋa zu mɛ Gɔg in o bíí kɔ-mɛ mɛ kum'nɛ́. Mi tɛ dak zɔm gba ndiɓa kórò in ɓɔrɔ, ká bá nɛ̀ wee in baraadu pi̧ zu o wi-biro in o gba dukbíí nɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛ nɛnɛ‘i.
Mi tɛ de mɔ‘i wen usa-a ha̧ o tugun bíí lɛŋ‘e nde, mi ɔ gasa in mi ɔ sa̧a̧. Nɛ́ tɛ mɔ‘i a̧ wa tɛ iŋ nɛnɛ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen a zu Gɔg. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́‘e nde, mi tɛ ba zu'm duk nɛ mɛ Gɔg wan ko o be Mɛsɛk in Tubal.
Mi tɛ kɔti mɛ yinɛ sɛn fara kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ mɛ bi o kaya
Mi tɛ gusi kusaa-góò kɔ̧ er-mɛ mɛ gale pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ o góò mɛ er-mɛ mɛ wiiko tɛ pɛsi a nu pamyala.
Mɛ in o wi-biro kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ kum zu kaya
Mɛ tɛ fe zaŋbɛɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m. Mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
Mi tɛ pi̧ wee zu ye ko Magɔg in o wi nɛ ɔ ye see-kisi nɛ fee-see mɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e nde, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ nin-am mɛ hu̧r mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m
«Zɔk, wese n'am tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘i a̧ tɛ‘i; mɔ tɛ de kana nyɛm oi nú‘m. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧a̧.
Ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ ɔ tɛ o gasa ye

Wi beka nɛ́ɛ̀ kii gua zaŋbɛɛ ɓɔna, wi beka nɛ́ɛ̀ gɔm gua kɔ̧ kombo mɛ ɓɔna mbɛt, wen wi tɛ ye wee nɛ o boi-biro. Wa tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɓar mɔ ko o wi nɛ ɓara so o mɔ kɔ-wa yaknɛ; wa tɛ kai o mɔ ko o wi nɛ kaia so o mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-oi-biro. GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.»
«Ŋgimbi nɛ o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ be tɛ̀ɛ́ de, mi tɛ ha̧ fara-gun Gɔg sɛn tɛ gba de kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o wi-ɓir-war nu
O bíí
O bíí tɛ nu'i lɛŋ tɛ ye tɛ guna o wɔr bíí, ɓɛɛ wi nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ tortɛ wese n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ usi gasamɔ kɔ‘m nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am tɔ̧a̧. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧a̧.
Wa tɛ hok o ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ duk yar nɛnɛ tɛ nu'i, wen guna o wɔr bíí nɛ ɓɔna zan. Nɛ́ ɗoŋ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo a̧ o wi nɔ‘i tɛ ku̧ nɛ naŋ tom kɔ‘i.

Tɛ yara-a ko o wi nɔ‘i, nɛ̀ wa á̧ kpaa ŋma gba̧a̧ bíí sɛn ŋma fara, ɓɛɛ wa dee be duk-ta e katɛ gba̧a̧ wi’ɛi, kà o wi-gun-fio a̧ hɔɔ fara'i, ɓɛɛ wa baa a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ gun kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ gun gba gii wi-biro ko Gɔg.
Ɓɛɛ wi tɛ sa nin ŋma ye nɛ Hamɔna, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧‘e ‹Giiwi›, ɓɛɛ war nu'i tɛ sa̧ woyo.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ sá o nɔ̧́í̧ in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ tɛnɛ mɛ nyɔŋ gba kpoo-sɔ̧ n'am ɗafa e ha̧ wa’ɛ. Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa'e: mɛ nɛ zɔm gbaŋa a'i tɛ de zu kaya ko
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mur-tɛ o wi-de-ŋgaŋamɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ nɔ tɔk-tɛ o be-wan zu nu’ɛ mbɛt. Wa duk hee o vala sami, o
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-sɔ̧ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ nɔ tɔk-aa gan ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ zɔm gbaŋa n'am dee h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zu fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ‘m zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur. Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ o nyaŋa gu nɛ o wi-daŋa-a, o ŋga-wi in o wi-de-ŋgaŋamɔ. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧.
«O tugun bíí tɛ zɔk gasamɔ kɔ‘m, ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ de ŋmaa in wa, tɛ gɔna-kita kɔ‘m zu wa.
Ɓɛɛ o be nutua ko
«O tugun bíí tɛ iŋ‘e, mɛ nɛ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ in ŋgazu ko o be nutua ko
Mi dee mɔ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dee ndiŋmɔ in ŋgazu kɔ-wa nɛ wa dea, ɓɛɛ mi zik ɗoŋ-am e ha̧ wa.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧‘e: «Kinii, mi tɛ de ko ha̧ o bezaŋ Jakob, mi tɛ de ha̧ yuwar mɔ ko o bíí nutua ko
Tɛ-wa tɛ bi ɗoŋ mɔɔ-foe in ŋgazu nɛ wa duka so de in am, ŋgimbi nɛ wa yaa so nɛnɛ nu kɔ-wa tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ŋma wi-nukuri-wa bo na'i.
Ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ mɔi̧ wa pii ɗoŋ nɛ tɛ nu nɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa kaia so wa pɛsi si sɛnɛ‘i, mi tɛ de mɔ mgbara wa mɛ usi ha̧ o tugun bíí‘e, mi ɔ sa̧a̧.
Ŋgimbi n'am be tɛ̀ɛ́ kai wa nɛ oi gun nɛ fara bara, nu ko o tugun bíí wen ha̧ wa mɛ si ɗoŋ nu kɔ-wa, wa tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ ha̧ ŋgai kɔ‘m ha̧ o bíí nutua ko
Pɛ yaka ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ a̧a̧ tɛ bara. Ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu tɛ kuti mbe zɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ká pɛ ɗaŋa-a ko Jerusalɛm dee ɓu-zua-naar kaɗi. Nɛ kale wese'i a̧ ŋgai ko GASA WAN yee nɛnɛ tɛ‘m.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa hɔɔ zu ha̧‘m, fara n'aa ba'm nɛnɛ si nu
A̧ mgbɔa'm nɛnɛ siti, kà‘m tɛ zɔk mɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ sɔnti-a tok hee ndɛrɛ ga nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ duk’ɛ; a̧ kasi nɛ nyak-we-mɔ in be te er-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ yor nu tua.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ nɛ de-a tɛ mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ'ɛ in mɛ̀ zɔ́k o mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ zɔk’ɛ lɛŋ nɛ de-a in nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧; nɛ mɔ‘i a'i baa mɛ tɛnɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ wen-aa. Mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka’ɛ lɛŋ ha̧ o be nutua ko
Mi zɔka Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ wa mboo garo zik. Wi’ɛi duka nɛ̀ kan-we-mɔ er, zi̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ taar. A̧ wee ndota garo, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa mɛtrɛ taar, in kusa-a dee nɛ mɛtrɛ taar mbɛt.
A̧ tɛɛ pii nu garo nɛ zɔk mɔ si war daŋa-wese, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si ŋgɔn nɛ gɔna-keɗe-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si kɔ̧ tua, ɓɛɛ a̧ we yuwar-yea-a, zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛtrɛ taar.

Zu-a'i, o be gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr in taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt; zi̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ taar in pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ taar mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ndota ŋgeŋ nɛ gɔna mgbara wa duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Yuwar yea-a si kɔ̧ bɛr-tua nɛ nú-a zɔka ŋmaa in Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ mɛtrɛ taar.
Wi’ɛi wee nu zala ye si dadaa-nu tua mɛtrɛ naar, ndota ŋgeŋ mɛ zan nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk. Gɔna bɛr-tua'i nɛ war kɔ̧ a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ na.
O gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ mɛ war daŋa-wese duka nɛ taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr in taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt; wa lɛŋ duka hee ŋmaa ga. Ndota o ŋgeŋ nɛ gɔna mgbara wa duka nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt lɛŋ.
A̧ wee pɛsa dadaa-nu tua ye si kɔ̧ tua, mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ reeta.
Nɛ ti ha̧ o gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ, be ŋgeŋ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, kusa-a duka nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ in ndota-a duka nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ mbɛt. O gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ nɔ‘i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ taar taar.
A̧ wee nu tua yea-a hɔ ndaa ɓii gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ, pɛsa-a duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta mgbara o ŋgeŋ nɛ zɔk ŋmaa.
A̧ wee nú-zala nɛ gbo si bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, mɛtrɛ ɓu; bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧‘i zika zala'i e see-a.
A̧ wee zi̧a̧ mgbara nú-zala mɛ zan in nú-zala mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
O woi-tua nɛ wa aa o fana-boi sɛnɛ duka zaŋ ŋgeŋ mɛ zan hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o ŋgeŋ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧. Pɛsa o woi-tua nɔ‘i duka pii kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa zik nu tua kpa ŋmaa. Wa gɔna so dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ zaŋ ŋgeŋ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm si bee-gara mɛ zan nɛ wa yɔka nɛ ta nɛ de-a. O be gɔna-bɛr-tua a̧a̧ hi̧i̧ ɓu-taar nɛ wa dea zaŋ ŋgeŋ.
Wa yɔka so bee-gara'i nɛ ta nɛ ká̧ o nu tua lɛŋ hɔ nduti-a mɛ; bee-gara mɛ zan'i hira benaŋ si ɗɔɔ e wan mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ be kusa-a tikiɗi.
Wi’ɛi wee mgbara nu garo mɛ zan in wan mɛ ye si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ. A̧ wee pɛsa wan mɛ si daŋa-wese in wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa wee pɛsa nu garo bee-gara mɛ zan, in zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.

O be gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ a̧a̧ so zaŋ ŋgeŋ, taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr, in taar nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt. Ndota o mbiŋ in gasa o tua-pɛm-mɔ nyɛma ŋmaa in o wan mɛ kuti nu garo. Zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, in pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Pɛsa bɛr-tua, o woi-tua in gɔna dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in wan mɛ nu garo mɛ si daŋa-wese. Wi daŋ si nu garo'i nɛ gɔna-keɗe-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Ŋma nu garo a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ ye si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ duk tan nɛ nu garo mɛ zan nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nɛ duk nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ in wan mɛ daŋa-wese. Wi’ɛi wee mgbara o nu garo nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm nɛnɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ e nu garo mɛ wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ. A̧ wee o be gɔna-bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ, o ŋgeŋ, in bɛr-tua; wa lɛŋ nyɛma ŋmaa in o wan mɛ kuti nu garo mɛ ti.
O woi-ŋgeŋ duka so zaŋ ŋgeŋ bɛr-tua'i in fara-yea-a zik kpa nu ŋmaa, hee o wan mɛ kuti nu garo ga. Zi̧a̧ fara'i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a nɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Gɔna kiɗi-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si fara'i duka nɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, nu zala duka nɛ war bee-gara si war kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa gɔna dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ tɛ o ŋgeŋ nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ war mgbɔɔr in nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
Nu garo ye si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ duka nɛ war hi̧i̧ mbɛt; ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa wee pɛsa mgbara nu garo mɛ kɔ̧ a̧‘i in wan mɛ zan nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm ye nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧; a̧ wee pɛsa nu garo'i, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a duka nɛ kalemɔ in o wan mɛ zan.

O be gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ, o ŋgeŋ nɛ gɔna mgbara wa, in bɛr-tua'i lɛŋ nyɛma ŋmaa in o wan mɛ nu garo mɛ zan. O woi-tua yaa tɛ bɛr-tua'i zik kpa nu ŋmaa. Zi̧a̧ fara'i nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta.
O bɛr-tua zika so ɗoŋ fara'i kpa nu ŋmaa, zi̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Nu bɛr-tua fara'i zɔka mɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ zan. Wa gɔna so dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ tɛ o ŋgeŋ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ gɔna-kiɗi-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si fara'i duka zu ŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm nɛ nu garo si war daŋa-wese si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧. A̧ wee pɛsa nu garo'i, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a nyɛma ŋmaa in o wan mɛ kuti-a.

O be gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ, o ŋgeŋ nɛ gɔna mgbara wa, in ɓɛr-tua'i nyɛma ŋmaa in o wan mɛ kuti-a. O woi-tua zika bɛr-tua'i in fara yea-a zik kpa nu ŋmaa. Zi̧a̧ fara'i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Nu bɛr tua fara'i zɔka mɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ zan. Wa gɔna dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ tɛ o ŋgeŋ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ war mgbɔɔr in nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ gɔna-keɗe-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si fara'i duka zu ŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm nɛ war nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn. A̧ wee mɔ, ɓɛɛ fara'i duk nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ hee o dɔka-a ga.

O be gɔna bɛr-tua-pɛm-mɔ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ in o ŋgeŋ nɛ gɔna mgbara wa, ká bá nɛ̀ bɛr-tua, ɓɛɛ o woi-tua zika fara'i kpa nu ŋmaa. Zi̧a̧ fara'i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Nu bɛr-tua fara'i zɔk mɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ zan. Wa gɔna dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ tɛ o ŋgeŋ nɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ war mgbɔɔr in war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ gɔna-kiɗi-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si fara'i duka zu ŋmaa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Ŋma nu bɛr-tua duka nu garo mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ zɔka mɔ si nu garo mɛ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn; nɛ fara'i a̧ wa fɔr o kpoo-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ.

O taŋge naar yaa so kɔ̧ bɛr-tua'i, yiitoo nɛ nú-a si mɛ‘i, in yiitoo nɛ nú-a pii hɛ̧ɛ̧; nɛ́ zu o taŋge nɔ‘i a̧ wa gɔn so o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ, o wan mɛ dɔa-a in o wan mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha'i.
O taŋge naar yaa so ɗɔɔ wɛɛ-tua nɛ war zan, nɛ war nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr, in yiitoo nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
O taŋge naar yaa nɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ o ŋma naar woyo ya kɔ‘i nɛ zan; wa lɛŋ dee nɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar nɛ wa gɔn so o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zu-a.

O taŋge naar nɛ wa dee so mɛ a o kpoo-sɔ̧ zu a'i, wa sɛka so nɛ ta de nɛnɛ, kusa-a duka nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ zi̧a̧-a̧ in pɛsa-a gana zu i̧i̧ tikiɗi. Nɛ fara'i a̧ wa a so o boi-gbɛ o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ.
Wa dee mɔɔ-kpe-ka̧-nú o taŋge nɔ‘i zik kpa nu ŋmaa, pɛsa-a hee pɛsa kɔ̧ er-wi ga. Nɛ́ o taŋge nɔ‘i a̧ wa a so o kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ zu-a.

Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧. Bɛr-tua yaa so hi̧i̧ yiitoo: Kpɔk duka ndaɗi ɗoŋ nu garo ye si bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nú-a zɔk mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ; ɓira-a duka ndaɗi ɗoŋ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ nú-a zɔk mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ zɔk mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ'ɛ nɛ bɛr-tua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ wan nɛ de tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ bɛr-tua mɛ́ wan nɛ̀ nú-a zɔk mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn’ɛ nɛ́ bɛr-tua ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom
Wi’ɛi wee bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, zi̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ mbɛt;
A̧ mgbɔa'm si fara yea-a si kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧; a̧ wee ndota o mbiŋ tua fara'i mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa fara-ye-mɔ‘i nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ndota o ŋgeŋ fara'i nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta.

Zi̧a̧ fara-ye-mɔ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu in pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk. Gɔna-keɗe-mɔɔ-daŋ-mɔ si kɔ̧ fara'i a̧a̧ sɛnɛ zu ŋmaa ɓu, ɓɛɛ o ŋma mbiŋ a̧a̧ ká̧ nu fara'i mbɛt, kpɔk nɛ ká̧-a̧ mɛ mgbɔɔr, in kpɔk nɛ ká̧-a̧ mɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm si kɔ̧ gasa bɛr-tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ we gasa fara'i. Ndota o mbiŋ-tua ká̧ fara-ye-mɔ nɛ mɛtrɛ taar,
pɛsa fara-ye-mɔ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta, ndota o ŋgeŋ fara'i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta mbɛt. A̧ wee zi̧a̧ bɛr-tua'i, mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo in pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ ɓu.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ ye si kɔ̧ bɛr-tua mɛ ndaa-a mɛ. Zi̧a̧ fara-ye-mɔ si hi̧i̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ kpɔk, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ taar, ɓɛɛ ndota o ŋgeŋ fara'i nɛ mɛtrɛ taar mbɛt.
A̧ wee kiitɛ bɛr-tua'i mbɛt, zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu in pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Fara’ɛ nɛ sa̧a̧ fara nyɛmna.»
A̧ wee ndota ŋgeŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧, mɛtrɛ taar, in pɛsa o bɛr-tua nɛ zik ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war zan, pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ yiitoo yiitoo.
O bɛr-tua nɔ‘i duka zu ŋmaa taar, ɓɛɛ o tua nɔ‘i zu ŋmaa taar'i, o bɛr-tua ɓu-taar ɓu-taar a̧a̧ kɔ̧ a̧ dam wa lɛŋ. O bɛr-tua nɔ‘i ndaɗa ŋgeŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war zan, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wa mboo wa zaŋ ŋgeŋ na.

Wa nyɛkɛ̧ɗa so ŋgeŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ ɗɔɔ daŋnɛ zik nɛ ɗoŋ-aa kpa nu ŋmaa; hegɔ, kà'ì daŋ si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ pɛsa o bɛr-tua nɔ‘i gasi gasi siti siti zu ŋmaa hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ sɔŋkur-aa mɛ. Wi daŋ so nɛ̀ kɔ̧ bɛr-tua mɛ ɗɔɔ hɔ tɛ wan mɛ see-a kaɗi, ɓɛɛ sɛka'i hɔɔ tɛ wan mɛ zu-a.
Mi zɔka wa mboo naŋ o bɛr-tua nɔ‘i zik Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpa nu ŋmaa, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ taar.
Ndota ŋgeŋ o be bɛr-tua mɛ zan duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta. Pɛsa fara nɛ duka mgbara o bɛr-tua nɛ ndaɗa Tua ko Sɔ̧
in o bɛr-tua wan mɛ zan duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu, zik Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpa nu ŋmaa. Fara'i duka nɛ fara-yar-sɛnɛ ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.

Nú o be bɛr-tua nɛ ndaɗa Tua ko Sɔ̧ duka zɔk mɔ si be fara-yar-nɛnɛ kɔ-wa'i. Nu tua kpɔk zɔka mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ kpɔk zɔk mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ. Ndota ŋgeŋ nɛ kpee ɗoŋ fara-yar-sɛnɛ‘i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Ŋma tua duka ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war yee-wese, ɓɛɛ nú-a zɔk mɔ si fara-yar-sɛnɛ‘i; zi̧a̧ tua'i nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-naar-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ ndota ŋgeŋ-a nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta.
Wi’ɛi wee Tua ko Sɔ̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ zi̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ; pɛsa fara-yar-sɛnɛ in tua nɛ a̧a̧ si yee-wese ká bá nɛ̀ o ŋgeŋ-a mbɛt nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Pɛsa ti ɗɔɔ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ nú-a a̧a̧ si daŋa-wese in o fara-yar-sɛnɛ mɛ ká̧ a̧ mbɛt duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ wee zi̧a̧ tua nɛ duk ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in o yuwar nɛ ɓir nɛ ká̧ a̧ nɛ mgbɔɔr nɛ mgbɔɔr, mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ mbɛt.
O ŋgeŋ mɛ fara-ye-mɔ si kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, o wan mɛ gasa bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧, in o wan mɛ bɛr-tua mɛ ndaa-a mɛ,

wa kpee ɗoŋ o ŋgeŋ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ de yɔka te nɛ ɗɔɔ daŋnɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o woi-tua zik kpa nu ŋmaa. Wa kpee ká̧ nu o woi-tua, in o ŋgeŋ wan mɛ o bɛr-tua nɛ zika ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war zan hee mɔ‘i ga mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa fan gba de yɔka mbaŋa-te ye ŋmaa zɛk-zɛk kpe nɛ o woi-tua. Wa gɔna so dap o
Kpɔk nɛ saŋa-yí bíí, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa nɛ saŋa-yí dila. Saŋa-yí bíí zɔka mɔ sitɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ'ɛ; ɓɛɛ saŋa-yí dila zɔk kɔ‘i mɔ sitɛ ɓii wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ‘i hegɔ zik bɛr-tua kpa nu ŋmaa.
Wa gɔna dap o
O ká̧ nu tua-ye si gasa bɛr-tua a̧a̧ so nɛ mgbii-aa naar.
Ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in
nɛ‘i dee nɛ te duka nú
Kpar-nú tua ye si kɔ̧ gasa bɛr-tua in sa̧a̧ fara duka zu ŋmaa yiitoo nɛ‘i hú̧í̧ ndaɗi ŋgeŋ.
Kpar-nú tua nɔ‘i duka katɛ ŋmaa yiitoo nɛ‘i hú̧í̧ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Wa gɔna so dap o
O woi-tua nɛ wa fana so mɔ kpe nɛnɛ in o gɔna dap wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ a̧a̧ so zaŋ o ŋgeŋ mɛ fara-ye-mɔ, ká bá nɛ̀ nu zala, in zaŋ ŋgeŋ wan mɛ o bɛr-tua nɛ yaa zik Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war zan mbɛt.
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm gbonɛ si bee-gara mɛ wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, nɛ́ɛ̀ ye kɔ̧ ŋma tua nɛ zɔka ŋmaa in fara-yar-sɛnɛ, nɛ duk tan nɛ tua nɛ duk ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Zi̧a̧ tua'i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in pɛsa-a, mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Nu tua'i zɔka mɔ si fara-yar-sɛnɛ ká̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, pɛsa fara'i duka nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu, ɗoŋ tua'i duka zɔk mɔ si bee-gara mɛ zan nɛ wa yɔka so nɛ ta; wa dee so o gɔna-bɛr-tua zu ŋmaa taar.
Pɛsa war tɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ in zi̧a̧-a̧ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ ɓira nɛ ti tua'i nɛ war bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧. Nu tua fara'i zɔka mɔ si war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
O gɔna bɛr tua mɛ ɗɔɔ duka so nɛ pɛsa-a gan o wan mɛ see-a, ɓɛɛ o wan mɛ zu-a duka nɛ mɔi̧a-a gan,
wen o bɛr-tua yaa so zu ŋmaa taar nɛ bo nɛ o mbiŋ-tua a̧ tɔn wa hee o ŋma bɛr-tua mɛ ká̧ bee-gara'i ga na. Mɛ nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ o bɛr-tua nɔ‘i mɛ mɔi̧ gan o wan mɛ see-a in mɛ ɗɔɔ.

Nɛ̀ war ɗoŋ tua si bee-gara mɛ zan, ŋgeŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ fara yiitoo; nu ŋgeŋ mɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ duka nɛ gee ŋgeŋ tɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa a̧a̧ so nɛ bɛr-tua tɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ. Ɓɛɛ ŋgeŋ mɛ ti tua nɛ zɔk mɔ sitɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧, bɛr-tua duka so sɛnɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ nɛ oi-aa.
Ɓɛɛ sɛn ɗɔɔ bɛr-tua nɔ‘i, ŋma nu tua duka so zɔk mɔ si war daŋa-wese nɛ ɓira si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ zan. Nɛ̀ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ,
Ŋma yuwar duka ɓir yak nɛ fara'i hee ko tua mɛ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn ga. O bɛr-tua tɛ tua'i, yuwar dea-a hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ɗafa o nú-a lɛŋ nyɛma ŋmaa in kuti tua.

Duka so nɛ kalemɔ in nu tua-ye-mɔ si kɔ̧ tua'i mbɛt. Ŋma yuwar ɓira yak ká̧ tua'i, ɓɛɛ ŋma fara-ye-mɔ a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ nu yuwar'i nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in garo nɛ kpee ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧. Wi ye si fara'i nɛ war daŋa-wese.
Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «O tua mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn nɔ'ɔ in wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ nɛ zɔk mɔ si bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧‘i nɛ sa̧a̧

Ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ ye hi̧i̧, wa beka gbo nɛ sa̧a̧ fara'i si bee-gara mɛ zan na; wa tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ o laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ e ɓɔn fara'i sɛka wa gboa, wen o laa nɔ‘i nɛ sa̧a̧ laa. Wa tɛ pi̧ ŋma laa nɛtɛ kaɗi sɛka wa gboo nɛ yuwar gboa-a sitɛ o bíí.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ wi’ɛi kaɗa wee o mɔ mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m gbonɛ si zan nɛ war nu garo mɛ daŋa-wese, ɓɛɛ a̧ we fara mɛ ɗoŋ-aa nɛ zan mbɛt.
A̧ wee ká̧ garo mɛ si daŋa-wese nɛ mɔɔ-we-mɔ, mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ, a̧ wee fara si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ wee mɔ nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa zika tɛ, we mɔ nɛ war yee-wese mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
A̧ wee o garo nɛ zika Tua ko Sɔ̧ kpa nu ŋmaa, zi̧a̧-a̧ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in pɛsa-a mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ mbɛt, wen kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm si nu garo mɛ war daŋa-wese,
ɓɛɛ mi zɔk gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ ko

Mɔ‘i duka so hee ŋma hɔɔ-zu ga, ɓɛɛ hɔɔ-zu'i dee ha̧ tɛ‘m mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ n'am zɔka so ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ so nɛnɛ mɛ ɗaŋ nɛ gasa ye Jerusalɛm, in mɔ n'am zɔka so ká̧ zaŋ Kebar mɛ. Ɓɛɛ mi gu nu, hikiɗi yí‘m nu.
Gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ yee tua nɛ nu garo wan mɛ daŋa-wese.
Ɓɛɛ
Wi’ɛi tɛ̀ɛ̀ dúk katɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zii ŋma tiger bíí nɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧‘m tɛnɛ nɛ kɔ̧ Tua mɛ‘e:
«Mɛ́ bíí, damti kɔ‘m nɛ mɔ'ɔ, fara-a-naŋ-am a̧a̧; mi tɛ duk ɓɔn mgbara o be

O wan kɔ-wa ee tua kɔ‘i ká̧ nu Tua kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa e nu tua kɔ-wa mgbák nu Tua kɔ‘m; nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa gɔna mgbara'm in wa nɛ be ŋgeŋ ɓɛɛ. Wa fɛŋa sa̧a̧ nin-am tɛ ndiŋ yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa; nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧ ŋga nyimsea kɔ‘m mɛ kum wa.
Kinii, wa beka duk tɛ gasa o géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa siti ɓɔna; wa tɛ kai wɔr o wannu kɔ-wa yinɛ ká̧ ɓaa Tua kɔ‘m mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk mgbara wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
«Nɛ kɔ-mɛ, bíí, mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ mɔɔ-tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧‘i ha̧ o be nutua ko

Kà foe nɛ baa wa zu ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa'i, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ yuwar dee Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dea'i ha̧ wa: o bɛr-tua nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, o fara-yea-a in gboa-a, ká bá nɛ̀ o heembea Tua'i, o yuwar tom-aa, in yuwar gasa Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Tua'i mbɛt. Mɛ̀ yɔ́r o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ɓɔn yí-wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ de mɔɔ-tɛ Tua'i lɛŋ nɛ yuwar-a.
Ɓɛɛ gasa heembea nɛ duk zu Tua'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ: zu kaya nɛ Tua'i yor sɛnɛ‘i, nɛ war mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ in nɛ war mɛ ɗoŋ-aa hɔ nɛnɛ zan lɛŋ nɛ
Wa wee

nɛ gun-aa zu nu mɛ hɔ tɛ gɔna-keɗe-a, nɛ kusa mɛtrɛ kpɔk, ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ́ɛ̀ nyɛkɛ̧ɗi si kɔ̧ a̧, reeta mɛtrɛ; báá fara'i daŋnɛ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ yiitoo gɔna-keɗe-a dee nɛ mɛtrɛ yiitoo, ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ́ɛ̀ nyɛ̧kɛ̧ɗi woyo tɛ reeta mɛtrɛ.
Báá-a nɛ fara'i daŋnɛ hɔ nɛnɛ mgbák zu
Zu

Nyɛkɛ̧ɗa mɔ, wan mɛ ŋgɔn dee nɛ mɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, pɛsa-a in zi̧a̧-a̧ hee ŋmaa ga zik kpa nu ŋmaa. Kusa ká̧ nú mboo-mɔ nɛ zika ɗoŋ-aa kpa nu ŋmaa'i duka hee ŋgɛɗɛ-er-wi ga, pɛsa kɔ̧ nɛ zika gun-aa kpa nu ŋmaa nɛ reeta mɛtrɛ, ɓɛɛ fara-daŋa-a si zu a̧ zɔka mɔ si war daŋa-wese.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí, wen nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Ŋgimbi nɛ
O bíí nɛ tɛ hɔ ti'm mɛ ɗaf'am nɛ o be nú-gara ko Levii, o bezaŋ Sadɔk. Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mɛ tɛ ha̧ be wiwii ndai ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen ea ɗaŋmɔ.
Mɛ tɛ duɓi tɔk-aa a zu zak naar nɛ duk mgbii
Ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ ba wiwii ndai-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ɛ̀ dɔ sɛn fara nɛ‘i ɗafa ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ zan mɛ.
Kà mɔ nɛ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá vala gbadua nɛ war-tɛ-a duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧, mɛ̀ gbɛ́ ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ. Mɛ̀ bá tɔk-aa ɗafi nɛ war-tɛ
«Kà mɛ nɛ dee mɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ bá be wiwii ndai in be daŋa vala sami nɛ war-tɛ-wa duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ yiitoo mbɛt.
Mɛ̀ káí wa tɛnɛ pii ti'm, mi GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ sɔ̧ tɔŋ tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa dɔɔ wa nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ ha̧‘m, mi GASA WAN.
«Mɛ tɛ gbɛ vala gbadua, wiwii ndai in be daŋa vala sami nɛ war-tɛ-wa duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m wen zu ɗaŋmɔ. Mɛ tɛ de hegɔ wese kpɔk kpɔk tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Wa tɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ wen fara'i tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen ha̧ fara'i mɛ sa̧, ɓɛɛ sɛka wa ee fara'i nɛ mɔ kɔ Sɔ̧.
Kà o zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɔ‘i be tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ hegɔɔ yak nɛnɛ, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ku̧ naŋ ɗafa sɔ̧ zu
Ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm gbonɛ si nu garo mɛ zan nɛ duk si war daŋa-wese; nu garo'i duka ɓɔn nɛ kpea-a.
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nu tua’ɛ tɛ duk kɔ‘i ɓɔn nɛ kpea-a hegɔ. Wi beka hú̧í̧ fara'i na; ŋma bíí beka ɓir nɛ fara'i yak na mbɛt, wen nɛ́ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko
Nɛ́ be-wan ɛ̀nɛ̀-wí ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ye mɔ nɛ nu garo'i si kɔ̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ ti GASA WAN wen nɛ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu o bíí. A̧ tɛ ye nɛ nu zala tua'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ gboo nɛ kale fara'i mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m ye nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn pii ti Tua ko Sɔ̧. Kà‘m ba yí‘m nɛ ŋgɔn wó, ɓɛɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ duna nɛ gasamɔ ko GASA WAN. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am guu nu ba sɔnti'm hikiɗi nu.

Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ-mɛ, mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ n'am tɛ usi ha̧ mɛ‘i sa̧ yí-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ sa̧ zer-mɛ mbɛt. Mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i nɛ yuwar ɗafa mɔ in o heembea kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN. Sɛn tɛ mɔ‘i, mɛ̀ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ de-a tɛ mɔ ko yee Tua'i in gboa-a mbɛt.
«Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mbɔrɔ ha̧ o wi-ŋgazu nɛ ya nutua ko
Ɛnɛ fɛŋa Tua kɔ‘m tɛ ea-a ha̧ o gɔni-duk, o wi-mbii nɛ mbo zu ha̧‘m na, mɛ ye kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧, ha̧ nɛ nɔ̧́-saɗi in tɔk-aa ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ‘m ɗaŋa yuwar
Ɛnɛ ee dee tom kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ Tua kɔ‘m duk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e tom'i er o be gɔni-duk.
«Ɓɛɛ wen kɔ‘m GASA WAN Sɔ̧ zu mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ ŋma wi-mbii nɛ̀ mbo zu ha̧‘m na mɛ ye kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m na, kóó nɛ ŋma be gɔni-duk nɛ a̧a̧ mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m
«Nɛ̀ war ko o be nutua ko Levii nɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ ɗoŋ o be
Nɛ́ wa'i a̧ tɛ de tom kɔ Tua kɔ‘m, pɛm nɛ nu Tua kɔ‘m. Nɛ́ wa'i a̧ tɛ gbɛ o saɗi-ɗɔɔ zu
Wen hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa duka so ti tɛ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧, de nɛnɛ ha̧ o be nutua ko
Wa beka hɛɗi katɛ‘m wen ɗafa sɔ̧ ti'm, kà bó nɛ̀ foo o sa̧a̧ nyɛk kɔ‘m nɛ er-wa na, kóó yea-a kɔ̧
Ɓɛɛ zu deemɔ kɔ-wa hegɔ‘i, mi tɛ e wa zu o ŋma be tom mɛ kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m.»
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko duk ko Levii, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bezaŋ Sadɔk, ŋgimbi nɛ o bezaŋ
Nɛ́ wa'i a̧ tɛ ye kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m, mɛ de tom ha̧‘m zu taŋge kɔ‘m, wen nɛ́ wa a̧ mboo so zu tɛ o geŋa kɔ‘m.

Ŋgimbi nɛ wa be tɛ̀ɛ́ ye mɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ pi̧ nɛ o gba de yɛm-yɛm laa. Wa nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ de tom sɛn bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧‘i, kóó kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ká wa pi̧ ndota laa-ulu tɛ-wa na.
Wa a̧ hɛr nɛ́ mɛtɛwol yɛm-yɛm laa zu wa, in wa a̧ pi̧ nɛ be yɛm-yɛm sir-laa ndaa-wa; ká wa hɛr zaŋ-wa na, wen ká sɔbɛɛ tɛɛ hɔ tɛ-wa.

Ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ gbo si mgbara dukbíí bee-gara mɛ zan mɛ, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ kpɔ̧i̧ o laa nɛ wa dee so nɛ tom tɛ-wa yinɛ, e ɓɔn kɔ̧ o bɛr-tua mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ pi̧ o ŋma laa nɛtɛ, wen ká wa tɛɛ gbo mgbara o bíí nɛ sa̧a̧ laa kɔ-wa'i.
«Ká o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kpui zu na, ká wa e ha̧ mui̧-zu-wa mɛ da̧ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ gɔn mui̧-zu-wa nɛ dɔ̧-a̧ yiɗiɗi.
Ká wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛti mɛ ye mɔ si kɔ̧ bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧ na.
Ká wa ba kóò nɛ gbii wíì, kóó ko-gera nɛ kóò na, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ba nɛ be-zɔŋa
«Wa tɛ usi kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara war mɔ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ in mɔɔ-zim, mɔɔ war-tɛ-wi nɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a in wan nɛ sa̧ na.
Kà ŋma wen a̧ kura mgbara'nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ gɔn kita zu'nɛ́ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea kɔ‘m. Wa tɛ de o gbaŋa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar o heembea kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ zɔk o wese-ɔm-tɛ kɔ‘m nɛ de-a.
«O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ beka hɔ ká̧ wɔr bíí na, wen ká simbo tɛɛ ba wa. Mɔ kpɔk, bíí n'aa nyɛma mɛ hɔ ká̧ wɔr-aa nɛ dáà, nàà in o bem kɔ̧-a̧, ká bá nɛ̀ o nya-a̧, in o boko-nya-a̧ mɛ wan nɛ tɛ ba wíì hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Ɗoŋ n'aa
sɛka a̧ yee si bee-gara Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧ wen bura war-tɛ-a; ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i a̧ nyɛma dee tom kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ siti woyo. Mɛ nɛ wen kɔ‘m, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧.
«O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ beka kpa ŋma mɔɔ-oi yak zu'm na. Mi nɛ mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa. K’ɛ́nɛ́ kɛ̧ ŋma nu
O ha̧a̧mɔ-zu-nyɔnɔ, o ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ in o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen ɗafa mgbara ŋmaa ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be

O zu-nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ gu nɛ o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ n’ɛnɛ a̧a̧ nɛnɛ mɛ ha̧ ha̧‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧. Gba de fuu k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ zu-a ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, wen ha̧ de yoŋgo mɛ duk zu tua k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ká o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nyɔŋ wɔr nɔ̧́í̧, kóó wɔr saɗi na, kóó nɛ́ wan nɛ̀ saɗi baa gbɛ na mbɛt.»

«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ be tɛ̀ɛ́ kɛ̧ nu wen ha̧ o bíí tɛ zuduk kpɔk kpɔk mɛ kpa war nu kɔ‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n ŋma nu e nɛtɛ wen GASA WAN, zi̧a̧-a̧ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, in pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ ɓu. Ɓɛɛ nu'i a̧ duk nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ ha̧ GASA WAN.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé mɔ see nu'i e wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɛ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, zi̧a̧-a̧ in pɛsa-a hee ŋmaa ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gɔn ŋma be fara zik ɗoŋ-aa kpa nu ŋmaa tɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Ɛnɛ we gbaagur fara'i, zi̧a̧-a̧ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn fara'i a̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧ fara nyɛmna tɛ duk sɛnɛ.
Gɔna nu'i tɛ duk nɛ mɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ duk wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧; hegɔ, wa tɛ kpa mgbák fara mɛ de tua kɔ-wa sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ oi gbaagur nu'i tɛ duk wen Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Ɛnɛ gɔn gbaagur nu'i, zi̧a̧-a̧, kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a; kilomɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ e wen o be Levii nɛ de tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧; nɛ́ fara'i a̧ wa tɛ de ye kɔ-wa sɛnɛ.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gɔn ŋma nu woyo, zi̧a̧-a̧ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta, ká̧ nu n’ɛnɛ gɔna ha̧ GASA WAN'i, ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ duk wen o be
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko o be-wan, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n nù ha̧ wa nɛ war ká̧ nu Tua ko Sɔ̧, in nɛ war ká̧ nù ko o gee bíí mbɛt, nɛ war yee-wese hɔ nu Gba-tɔp, in nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ mgbara nu ko
Gbaagur nu'i tɛ duk nɛ war fara ko o be-wan nu
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧:
«O be-wan
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ŋgamɔ n’ɛnɛ nukuri nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m duk.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ mɔ in wa nɛ yuwar-a,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ wuti wa,
ɓar nɛ mɔ er-wa na.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́!
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ o mɔɔ-we-mɔ mɛ duk kana nɛ mgbák mɔɔ-we-mɔ: efa a̧ duk nɛ
Ɛnɛ tɛ we o gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ efa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ wee o yi-mɔ nɛ bat. Wa yiitoo lɛŋ nyɛma ŋmaa; efa ɓu kóó bat ɓu de nɛ homɛr kpɔk, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ gun yuwar-wee-mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko sede, siklɛ kpɔk ba nɛ gɛra ɓu-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ siklɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk de nɛ minɛ kpɔk.
«Ɓɛɛ o mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ he mbéá-a ha̧ o bíí mɛ ha̧ zu-a ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: Kà wa nɛ mɔi̧a gba̧a̧ alkamaari dun daaro ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, wa tɛ ha̧ daaro kpɔk ha̧ Sɔ̧.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ kpaa dak nɔ gɔmŋmaa, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ha̧ ɓu ha̧ Sɔ̧. Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ we nɔ̧́ nɛ bat, ɓɛɛ bat ɓu tɛ de homɛr kpɔk, kóó nɛ́ kɔr kpɔk mbɛt.

Tɛ duk sami gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo nɛ ya fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kɔ-wa, ɛnɛ tɛ ba zu-a, sami kpɔk. O zu-mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ tɛ ba'i, ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ nɛ̀ ha̧a̧mɔ-zu-nyɔnɔ, nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧, nɛ mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, in wan mɛ ea-ɗaŋmɔ. Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hegɔ.
«O bíí tɛ nu’ɛ lɛŋ a̧ kai o zu-mɔ kɔ-wa nɛnɛ ha̧ be-wan
Nɛ́ be-wan a̧ tɛ ha̧ kpoo-sɔ̧, in ha̧a̧mɔ-zu-nyɔnɔ, in tɛna zu o mɔɔ-nɔ a nu wese-yɔyɛ-gasi-sɔ̧, wese gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ, o gbaŋa wese-ɔm-tɛ, gu nɛ oi o gbaŋa ko o be nutua ko
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɛ̀ bá be wiwii ndai nɛ war-tɛ-a ɔ sa̧a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gbɛ́ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ kuti wese-mbe-yi-zɛ, ga̧ nɛ war-tua ko Sɔ̧.
Wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ ba ŋma tɔk saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ zu nu Tua ko Sɔ̧, dam o mgbii
Mɛ tɛ de kale kpɔk mɔ tɛ kuti wese ko mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ zu o bíí nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ nɛ hɔɔ-kɔ-mɔ, kóó tɛ zɔka tɛ-wi nɛ de-a na. Mɛ nɛ hegɔ a̧ mɛ tɛ de ha̧ war-tua kɔ‘m mɛ sa̧.
«Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ku̧ naŋ gbaŋa
Wese'i, be-wan tɛ ha̧ wiwii ndai mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛ-a in wen ɗaŋmɔ ko o bíí lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ŋgimbi gbaŋa'i, be-wan tɛ ha̧ o wiwii ndai mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in vala sami mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ war-tɛ-wa ɔ sa̧a̧, dɔ nɛ oi kíí, zu
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko ha̧a̧mɔ-zu-nyɔnɔ, a̧ tɛ ha̧ kilo fuu alkamaari ɓu-taar in nɔ̧́ tɛ litrɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk dam ɗoŋ o wiwii ndai nɔ‘i; kale mɔ wen o vala sami kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt.
«Tɛ ŋgimbi gbaŋa wan mɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ko mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ,

GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nú-garo-ye-mɔ si bee-gara mɛ kɔ̧ a̧, nɛ zɔk mɔ tan daŋa-wese tɛ duk nɛ kpea-a, tɛ wese-tom tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa ee ha̧ a̧ duk nɛ hu̧i̧a̧-a̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ in wese mbe-yi-zɛ mbɛt.

Be-wan tɛ ye mɔ nɛ nú-zala nu garo mɛ zan, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ yor ɛk tɛ nɛ ká̧ nu tua, ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ mbɛt. Be-wan tɛ gu nu dadaa nu garo'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kura gbo kɔ̧-a̧ yak, ɓɛɛ wi beka kpe nu garo'i wese'i na hɔ nɛnɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wese-ɔm-tɛ in wese mbe-yi-zɛ lɛŋ, o gee bíí lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ gu nu nu garo'i wen gasa GASA WAN.
«Be-wan tɛ kai o
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ha̧ kilo fuu alkamaari ɓu-taar, wen vala sami kpɔk kpɔk dam; ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o
Tɛ wese mbe-yi-zɛ, a̧ tɛ ha̧ wiwii ndai kpɔk in o
A̧ tɛ ha̧ kilo fuu alkamaari ɓu-taar wen wiwii ndai in wen vala sami, in fuu nyɛm nɛ mɔ n'aa taa wen o
Ŋgimbi nɛ be-wan tɛ ye mɔ, a̧ a̧ ye mɔ nɛ nú-zala, ɓɛɛ a̧ gboo si zan nɛ kale kpɔk yuwar'i.

«Ŋgimbi nɛ o gee bíí tɛ nɛ mɛ gasi GASA WAN wese gbaŋa, ká'í gbo nɛ kale nu garo nɛ‘i yee nɛnɛ na; kóó o nde a̧ zɔk mɔ tan sɔnti-wi gbo nɛnɛ. O wan nɛ yee mɔ nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn a̧ gbo nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ yee mɔ nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, a̧ gbo nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn.
Be-wan tɛ ye mɔ tɛ kale kpɔk ŋgimbi in o dɔka bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbo zan tɛ kale kpɔk ŋgimbi in wa mbɛt.
«Mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ o wese yɔyɛ-gasi-sɔ̧ in oi o gbaŋa tɛ duk nɛ kilo fuu alkamaari ɓu-taar wen wiwii ndai kpɔk kpɔk dam, in wen o vala sami nɛ wa ha̧a̧ kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ nɛ war ko o

«Ŋgimbi nɛ be-wan kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ ta-tɛ-wi, kóó nɛ́ ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ, wa a̧ hú̧í̧ nu garo nɛ zɔk mɔ si daŋa-wese ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ dɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ in ɗafa-sɔ̧-gaŋmɔ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ wese-ɔm-tɛ'ɛ ga. Ɓɛɛ gboa-a kɔ̧-a̧ hegɔ, wa a̧ kpe nu garo ɓɔn ɗoŋ-aa.»
«Mɛ tutuyɛ dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, a'i ba
A'i ha̧ litrɛ nɔ̧́ yiitoo mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ, wen zaŋa-a nɛ ŋmaa in kilo fuu mɔɔrɔ. Yuwar ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN wese kpɔk kpɔk nɛ́ heembea nɛ̀ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
, fuu in nɔ̧́, nɛ mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN mɛ tutuyɛ lɛŋ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Kà be-wan gɔn ŋma nu kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bem kɔ‘i, nu'i tɛ duk nɛ war mɔɔ-oi ko bem’ɛi yak nɛnɛ hɔ tɛ o bezaŋ-aa mɛ.
A̧ kà be-wan gɔn ŋma nu kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma ŋgaiwi kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nu'i tɛ pii ɗoŋ ha̧ be-wan, wese nɛ wi’ɛi be tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa zu, wen nu nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi ko be-wan nɛ duk wen o bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Ká be-wan ɓar nu ko dukbíí kɔ‘m nɛ ŋgai na. Mɛ nɛ war nu kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ tɛ kɛ̧ ha̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ gɔni nu ko wan-aa na; hegɔ a̧ beka ndak dukbíí kɔ‘m yinɛ zu nu kɔ-wa na.»
Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm ye nɛ ɓii nu tua nɛ ye si kɔ̧ o bɛr-tua nɛ wa ɗafa so e ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, nɛ nú-a zɔk mɔ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn. A̧ usa ŋma be fara nɛ duk nɛ war yee-wese ha̧‘m,

ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Fara’ɛ nɛ fara nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ e kpoo-ɗafi-sɔ̧ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ, kóó bura war-tɛ-wi tɛ wee sɛnɛ, in fara nɛ wa tɛ gi o ha̧a̧mɔ sɛnɛ mbɛt. Wa beka kai o mɔɔ nɔ‘i gbo nɛnɛ si mgbara dukbíí bee-gara-mɛ́-zan mɛ na, wen ká o mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛɛ ɗafi war-tɛ o bíí.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mgbɔa'm gbonɛ si kɔ̧ bee-gara-mɛ́-zan, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m ɓir nɛ ka̧ mgbii o bee-gara naar: o be geɗek gɔna-bee-gara dama mgbii bee-gara nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
O geɗek bee-gara nɔ‘i, zi̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, dam o mgbii fara nɔ‘i naar lɛŋ.
Wa mboo so o ŋgeŋ nɛ ta dam mgbii mɔ kpɔk kpɔk, ká bá nɛ̀ o kusi-gi-mɔ zaŋ o ŋgeŋ nɔ‘i zik kpa nu ŋmaa.
Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ fara ko kusi-gi-mɔ nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɛ gi o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ dukbíí tɛ kai tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ sɛnɛ.»

Wi’ɛi mgbɔa'm ye nɛ mɔ si fara Tua ko Sɔ̧. Kà‘m zɔk mɔ wó, ɓɛɛ yì nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ fok nɛ ɗɔɔ dadaa nu Tua ko Sɔ̧ gbonɛ si war daŋa-wese’ɛ, wen nɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ duka so zɔk mɔ si fara'i. Yi'i duka fok gbonɛ nɛ tɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ war wiiko, ba nɛ ká̧
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mgbɔa'm gbonɛ nɛ nu garo mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m zik nɛ ɗoŋ Tua ko Sɔ̧ hɔ nu garo mɛ wan nɛ zɔk mɔ si war daŋa-wese, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk yi nɛ fok yak nɛ ká̧ nu garo nɛ war wii-er.
Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi ba nyak-we-mɔ kɔ‘i yak nɛ nyɛi̧a-a si war daŋa-wese, ɓɛɛ we mɔ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ‘m ku nɛ yi'i si kur mɛ. Mi yee ɗuka yi'i hɔ kpoi-naŋ-am.

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa wee mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m ku nɛ yi, ɓɛɛ ɗuka yi'i daŋ am hɔ zugur-am. A̧ wee mbe mɔ woyo, mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m ku nɛ yi woyo, ɓɛɛ ɗuka yi'i daŋ am hɔ guntir-am.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa wee mɔ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ yi'i kifi nɛ zɔm ŋga ɗuka yi n'am nyɛm mɛ ku ɓɔna, wen yi'i ha̧a̧ kifi zɔm nana-yì nɛ‘i tɛ zui zui sɛka'i kua.
Ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ́ bíí, mɛ zɔka mgbák mɔ'ɔ sa̧ yí-mɛ gɔ?»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ‘m wɛr benaŋ si mgbɔɔr.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'am pia ɗoŋ, mi tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpá nɛ o gba gii te nɛ dɔka-a nɛ ya nu ŋgere nɛ kur in nɛ kur mbɛt.

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Yi’ɛ nɛ mɛ zɔk’ɛ fok si war daŋa-wese zir nɛnɛ si ɗɔɔ Jurdɛn mɛ, ɓɛɛ duka hi̧i̧ fok nɛnɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ. Ɓɛɛ kà a̧ fok nɛɛ a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ gɛɗa ŋgúlúlú kifi gba de yi.
Fara lɛŋ nɛ yi’ɛ tɛ fok si sɛnɛ, o be mɔ fara'i lɛŋ tɛ ya nɛ tortɛ, o zoro tɛ dun ɗɔɔ-aa mbɛt. Wen yi’ɛ tɛ ɗafi fara lɛŋ n'aa tɛ fok a sɛnɛ; a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o mɔ fara'i lɛŋ mɛ kpasi.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-ba-zoro tɛ nɛk ká̧ ŋgere tɔp’ɛ pi̧ nɛ yɔk nɛ̀ Ɛn-Gedi hɔ Ɛn-Eglaim. O zoro mɛ ɗɔɔ-aa tɛ duk nɛ o pɛrti zoro mɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp nɛ dɔka-a nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ o be gɔna-yi in o yí-fuk mɛ ká̧ a̧ beka duk nɛ gɛɗa-a na; wa tɛ ɓɔn nɛ yí-tɔŋ.

O gba de te-nyɔŋ tɛ nɛk nu ŋgere yi'i nɛ kur in nɛ kur mbɛt; wa̧a̧-te nɔ‘i beka ai na, ɓɛɛ o te nɔ‘i tɛ wai tɛ fio-zɛ lɛŋ, wen yi nɛ fok a gun-wa, fok nɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ tɛnɛ. Waya o te nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ o wa̧a̧-a̧ duka nɛ́ nyina.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Gbìsí nu n’ɛnɛ tɛ kɛ̧ ha̧ o zuduk o be
Mi ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, mi tɛ ha̧ nù'ɛ ha̧ wa nɛ mɔɔ-oi; kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ nù'ɛ nyɛm ŋmaa.
mɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ ku̧ naŋ nɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp, ɓir nɛ yuwar Hetlɔŋ hɔ Hamat yak nɛnɛ si Zeda mɛ,
hɔ nɛnɛ Berota in Sibrayim nɛ duk
mɛ́ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ ku̧ naŋ ká̧ gba-tɔp nɛ war yee-wese hɔ Hasar-Enaŋ, e mgbara nu Damas in Hamat nɛ war ŋgɔn.
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko
«Ɓɛɛ nɛ wan mɛ si Nɛgɛb si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ,
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ nù'ɛ nɛ er ŋmaa dam'nɛ́ o be
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ nɛ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa nu nyɛm'nɛ́ in o gɔni-duk nɛ duk mgbara'nɛ́ mbɛt, ba nɛ o bem kɔ-wa, ha̧ wa mɛ kpa nù nɛ tɛ duk nɛ mgbák nù kɔ-wa. Kale mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ de in o be
Ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ war nù ko o gɔni-duk mgbara zuduk nɛ wa ya in wa. Nɛ mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
«Nin o zuduk be
War nu ko Asɛr tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Dan nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Nɛftalii tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Asɛr nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Manase tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Nɛftalii nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Efraim tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Manase nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Rubɛn tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Efraim nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
Ɓɛɛ war nu ko Juda ndaɗa ŋmaa in nu ko Rubɛn nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.»

«Ɗoŋ nu ko Juda, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n ŋma nu nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp; mɛ nɛ fara'i ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ e ha̧ GASA WAN; pɛsa-a tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, ɓɛɛ zi̧a̧-a̧ tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in war nu nɛ‘i gɔna ha̧ o bíí. Ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧ fara tɛ duk see-a.
«War nu n’ɛnɛ tɛ gɔn e ha̧ GASA WAN'i, zi̧a̧-a̧ tɛ duk kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, in pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ ɓu.

Ŋma nú fara'i tɛ duk wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧; zi̧a̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta. Nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ si war yee-wese, pɛsa-a nɛ ŋgɔn hɔ ɗɔɔ tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧ fara ko GASA WAN tɛ duk see-a.
Fara'i tɛ duk wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bezaŋ Sadɔk nɛ‘i ee so wen tom kɔ‘m, wen wa kasa so o geŋa kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa e'm duk mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ deemɔ ko o be
Hegɔ, wa tɛ kpa war nu kɔ-wa nɛ tɛ duk nɛ
O be Levii tɛ kpa nu hee ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ga: zi̧a̧-a̧ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ; war nu kɔ-wa in ko o bezaŋ Sadɔk tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa tɛ zi̧a̧-a̧ in tɛ pɛsa-a mbɛt.
War nu ko GASA WAN nɛ zɔm mɔ; wi beka ɗɔr nu'i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wi beka e ha̧ ŋma bíí mɛ gɔn zu nu'i kà bó nɛ̀ ea-a er ŋma bíí na mbɛt, wen nu'i nɛ ko GASA WAN.
«Oi zi̧a̧ nu'i kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, pɛsa-a kilomɛtrɛ yiitoo nɛ reeta tɛ duk sɔɔ gee. Mɛ nɛ fara'i a̧ o bíí tɛ de ye kɔ-wa sɛnɛ in fara-dai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa sɛnɛ. Ye'i tɛ duk tan see-a.
Pɛsa-a tɛ nyɛm ŋmaa in zi̧a̧-a̧ tɛ mɛtrɛ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ.
Ɓɛɛ pɛsa bɛɛ-mɔ mɛ ɗoŋ ye tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ zik kpa nu ŋmaa, wen ha̧ o mɔ-dai mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ.

Oi be oi nu tɛ duk ká̧ ye'i nɛ war mgbɔɔr in nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt, zi̧a̧-a̧ si war daŋa-wese nɛ kilomɛtrɛ mɔɔrɔ; pɛsa-a si war yee-wese nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ hegɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ fara'i tɛ duk nɛ fara-fɔ wen o bíí sɛn tɛ ye'i.
Fara'i tɛ duk nɛ fara-fɔ wen o be nutua ko
«Nu nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ, zi̧a̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, ɓɛɛ pɛsa-a tɛ duk nɛ kale mɔ mbɛt; war nu ko GASA WAN'i, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kɛ̧ tɛ fara naar, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ baa kɛ̧a̧-a̧ kpɔk e wen saaye.

«Ɓɛɛ oi nu nɛ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ duk wen be-wan, nɛ war ká̧ fara ko Sɔ̧ in nɛ war fara mɛ si saaye'i nɛ war mgbɔɔr in nɛ war mgbɔɔr mbɛt. Pɛsa nu ko be-wan tɛ duk nɛ kilomɛtrɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo nɛ reeta, ɓɛɛ gbaagur-a kpɔk tɛ nɛ hegɔɔ hɔ
Fara ko o be Levii in saaye mbɛt tɛ e nu ko Juda nɛ war ŋgɔn in nu ko Bɛnjamin nɛ war ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ war nu ko be-wan kpee ká̧ a̧ nɛ mgbɔɔr in nɛ mgbɔɔr mbɛt.»
«War nu nɛ‘i tɛ kɛ̧ ha̧ oi o zuduk be
War nu ko Simɛɔŋ tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Bɛnjamin ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Isakar tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in nu ko Simɛɔŋ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
War nu ko Zabulɔŋ tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa in ko Isakar ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
Ɓɛɛ war nu ko Gad ndaɗa ŋmaa in nu ko Zabulɔŋ, ku̧u̧naŋa-a nɛ war daŋa-wese hɔ nɛnɛ nu gba-tɔp.
«Nu n’ɛnɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ tani kɛ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o zuduk be
Nú garo-ye-mɔ si Jerusalɛm nɛ́ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ a nɛ́ nin o zuduk be
Zi̧a̧ garo wan mɛ si daŋa-wese tɛ duk nɛ́ mɛtrɛ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ nú-a tɛ ya nɛ́ taar, ko Jozɛf, ko Bɛnjamin in ko Dan.
Zi̧a̧ garo mɛ war Nɛgɛb, wan mɛ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ nú-a tɛ ya nɛ taar, ko Simɛɔŋ, ko Isakar in ko Zabulɔŋ.
Ɓɛɛ zi̧a̧ garo mɛ si war gba-tɔp tɛ duk nɛ mɛtrɛ booro-yiitoo-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, nú-a tɛ ya nɛ taar mbɛt, ko Gad, ko Asɛr, in ko Nɛftalii.
Zi̧a̧ garo nɛ tɛ zik ye'i kpa nú ŋmaa tɛ de nɛ mɛtrɛ booro-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ɓɛɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a sɔsɔɔ‘i hegɔɔ yak nɛnɛ, wi tɛ sa nin ye'i nɛ́ «GASA WAN a̧a̧ hi̧i̧»!
Ɗoŋ taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko Jɔakim wannu Juda, Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ tɛɛ kɛr Jerusalɛm e nu.
GASA WAN ee Jɔakim wannu Juda kɔ̧ er-a in o ŋma nyɛk mɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧. A̧ baa a̧ in o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ sɛn nu Sinɛar, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Aspɛnaz gasawi zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i mɛ kai o ŋma be

Wa tɛ ya nɛ o bíí nɛ yora ŋgaiwi; ká‘i zɔk wa ɓɛɛ ɔ dee tɛ-wi. Wa tɛ ya nɛ o haya wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ yamba mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa nyɛma wen dee tom tɛ ko wannu. Wi tɛ usi nú ko o be Kaldee ha̧ wa in yuwar yɔra-a mbɛt.

Wannu ha̧a̧ nú wen ha̧ wa mɛ ha̧ nɛ pɛrti nyɔŋmɔ n'aa nyɔŋ in pɛrti dɔ̧ɔ̧ n'aa nɔ ha̧ wa mɛ nɔ mbɛt. Wa tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ wa tɛ pɛ taar. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ sɛn ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i tɛ ye nɛnɛ tɛ tom ko wannu.
O bezaŋ Juda nɛ a̧a̧ so mgbara o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i nɛ Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria.
Wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ tua ko wannu gɔna mbe nin ha̧ wa. Ko Daniɛl nɛ Bɛltasar, ko Hanania nɛ Sadrak, ko Misaɛl nɛ Mɛsak, ɓɛɛ ko Azaria nɛ Abɛd-Nɛgo.
Daniɛl taa mɔ nɛ kɔ̧ see'e, wi beka ɗaŋ war-tɛ-wi tɛ nyɔŋmɔ in tɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔfi wi-duk-zu wa mɛ e a̧ wen ka a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ war-tɛ-a tɛ o nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ kpa desee zu Daniɛl, ɓɛɛ kpɛk akamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i.

Mɔ kpɔk, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Mɔ n'am yu nɛ́ dáà wannu, wen mɛ nɛ a̧ nɛ ha̧a̧ nú wen nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. A̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk'e tɛ‘nɛ́ dak dak mgbara o gbama-ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen tɛ tik zu'm, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɓira zu'm pi̧ nu wen zu'nɛ́.»
Daniɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ gasawi ee mɛ zɔk a̧ in Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé yɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn tɛ zɛ ɓu ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔk. Wa a̧ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo h’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɔŋ in gee yi h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ zɔk tɛ yɛ in ko o wi nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ ko wannu; hegɔ tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de nɛ mɔ in yɛɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ mɔ nɛ wa aka, ɓɛɛ a̧ we wa tɛ zɛ ɓu.
Ɗoŋ nɛ zɛ nɔ‘i ɓu'i dama kaɗi, wa zɔka saŋa-yí-wa ɔ dee in wa ɔ ŋmaŋa gan oi o dɔka bíí nɛ nyɔŋ kɔ‘i nɛ mɔ ko wannu.
Hegɔ wi-zɔk-wa ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu ha̧ wa na, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nɛ o wa̧a̧-kpoo ha̧ wa ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi nɔ‘i naar'i; a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ nú ko o wi nɔ‘i nɛ de-a in ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ war ko Daniɛl, a̧ iŋa tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-zu nɛ‘i ɔ in hɔɔ-zu mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr gɔna so ha̧ wa dama kaɗi, wi-duk-zu o wi-de-tom kaia o be-ŋgaiwi lɛŋ nɛnɛ ti a̧.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mgbara wa'i, a̧ kpa o ŋma hee Daniɛl, Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria ga na, ɓɛɛ wa ya kɔ-wa ɓɔn katɛ a̧.
Tɛ mɔ ko iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wannu ak nɛ wa'i, a̧ zɔka'e wa gana o wan-gbana in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi tɛ zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ war ɓu.
Daniɛl ɓɔna tɛ ko wannu hɔ tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko wannu Sirus.
Tɛ yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, a̧ ɔɔ ŋma zu; zu'i sakala taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ yá hɔ yi-a ɓɔna.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o wi-zɔk-mɔ in o wi-a-tani
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi ɔɔ zu, ɓɛɛ zu'i sakala'm; mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ zu'i.»
O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu nɛ nú Aram: «Dáà, wannu nɛ́ ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wannu kifa nú ha̧ o be Kaldee hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mi ha̧a̧ nú, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu'i tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na mbɛt, wa tɛ ɓir ɛnɛ sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa gbina tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ a nu.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ we ɗoŋ zu kɔ‘m, tɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ mbetɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ kpa mɔ er-am, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in zɔnamɔ mbɛt. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ wé ɗoŋ-aa in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt.»
Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Wannu a̧ tɔ̧ zu kɔ‘i ha̧ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.»
Wannu kifa nú ha̧ wa woyo ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi iŋa nɛ mbetɛ ɛnɛ ba nɛ ŋgimbi, wen ɛnɛ zɔka mi ha̧a̧ nú kaɗi.
K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧‘m na, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, ɛnɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa ba keta mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de ndela sɛn ti'm ɔr nɛ‘m ha̧ ŋgimbi mɛ yak, ɓɛɛ kpɔk

O be Kaldee kifa nú ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ŋma bíí kpɔk zu nu’ɛ nɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu ko wannu, bo na. Ŋma wannu nɛ ɔ gasa in ɔ ŋgaya nɛ aka pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti in o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana in o be Kaldee bo na.
Akamɔ nɛ wannu aka'i yaka zale, ŋma bíí kpɔk nɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ zu'i ha̧ wannu bo na; nɛ́ o sɔ̧ nɛ duk kɔ‘i mgbara bíí na a̧ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mgbara-a ɓɛɛ.»
Hegɔ see wannu ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt wen zu kifa-nú‘i; ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kum o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ yinɛ lɛŋ.
Wa hee mbéá‘e, wa tɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kii Daniɛl in o gbama-yari kɔ‘i mɛ gbɛ yinɛ mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen nɛ mboozu in nɛ yuwar-a ha̧ Ariɔk wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu nɛ gboo so mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ.
A̧ aka Ariɔk gasa wi-duk-zu o wi-pɛm-wannu'e: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ dee ha̧ wannu mɛ ha̧ ŋga heembea hegɔ‘i ge?» Ariɔk wee ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ Daniɛl.
Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ́ tɛ wannu mɛ ak a̧ mɛ e be ŋgimbi ha'i wen kia gba̧a̧ zu kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Daniɛl sii ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka ha̧ o gbama-yari kɔ‘i Hanania, Misaɛl in Azaria,
wen mbaŋa tɛ-wa ha̧ wa mɛ ai nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ yiwese zu hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i, wen ká‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ fe in wa gu nɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ mbɛt.
Mɛ zɛ, Sɔ̧ usa mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ‘i ha̧ Daniɛl tɛ hɔɔ-zu, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl zɔn Sɔ̧ yiwese tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
«Nin Sɔ̧ a̧ hu̧r ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo,
wen iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai nɛ ko Sɔ̧.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ o ŋgimbi mɛ kpai ŋmaa;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbo o wannu tɛ wan yinɛ,
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba o bíí e tɛ wan;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ iŋamɔ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ.
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ba mɔ nɛ‘i iŋ na
in mɔ nɛ ɔ hu̧sa̧ gbonɛ.
A̧ iŋa mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ tum,
ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ duk in a̧.
Mi zɔn nɛ ɛnɛ gasi nɛ ɛnɛ mbɛt, Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ‘m,
wen ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ in ŋgai ha̧‘m.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ mɔ n’ɛɛ aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ wen-aa mbɛt h’ɛ́ɛ́,
tɛ dea-a h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ nɛ sakali wannu.»

Daniɛl yee tua ɗoŋ Ariɔk wi nɛ wannu ha̧a̧ so heembea ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn Babilɔŋ; ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «K’ɛ́nɛ́ kúm o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn nú Babilɔŋ na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́‘m nɛnɛ tɛ wannu ha̧‘m tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu kɔ-wa ha̧ wa.»
Ariɔk mgbɔɔ Daniɛl nɛnɛ tɛ wannu nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Wannu, mi kpaa ŋma bíí mgbara o be Juda n’ɛɛ kaia so nɛ bara-biro, nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ wa sa so'e Bɛltasar: «Mɛ nyɛma mɛ we ɗoŋ zu n'am ɔɔ in gba̧a̧-a̧ mbɛt nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl kifi nú ha̧ a̧: «O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, o wan-gbana, o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi in o wi-zɔk-mɔ nyɛm mɛ we ɗoŋ hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
ɓɛɛ ŋma Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ yiwese nɛ ba hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan; nɛ́ a̧‘i a̧ usa mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr. Gba̧a̧ zu n’ɛnɛ ɔa in mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka ŋgimbi ɔɔ ya k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ ɔɔ nɛ nu gɔn gado k’ɛ́nɛ́, taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kura duk tɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ nɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ wi-ba-mɔ e zan usi mɔ nɛ tɛ de nɛ ɗoŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
War kɔ‘m, bo nɛ wen nɛ̀ iŋamɔ kɔ‘m gana ko o dɔka bíí sa Sɔ̧ usi nɛ ndaa mɔ'ɛ ha̧‘m na, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen ha'i mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧ wannu, in ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ see-wi nɛ tɛ-wi mbɛt.
«Wannu, mɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka tɛ ɔɔ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Ɛnɛ zɔka gasa ɓoo-bíí nɛ yor ti'nɛ́ tok nɛnɛ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bo so nɛ mɔ ha'i mɛ zɔk na.
Zu ɓoo-bíí‘i nɛ́ de sa̧a̧ lɔr, yí-ŋguɗi-a in o ɓaa-a nɛ́ bu-mbɔi, zaŋ-aa in o ku-a nɛ́ ndɛrɛ,
o ti-bee-a nɛ́ boi, reeta o naŋ-a nɛ́ boi, ɓɛɛ ɓii reeta-a nɛ́ dɔɔ gii.
Ɛnɛ ɓɔna fara zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋma ta ai nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ tɛ́ɛ̀ yo naŋ ɓoo-bíí nɛ naŋ-a duka so nɛ boi in dɔɔ gii'i gbin.

Boi, gii, ndɛrɛ, bu-mbɔi in lɔr lɛŋ gbina a nu, ɓɛɛ kifi nɛ pumyulu-mɔ hee sɛn fara-gusi-alkamaari ga. Búk kaia mɔ‘i lɛŋ yaknɛ, wi zɔk oi-aa na. War ko ta nɛ yoo mboo-bíí gbin'i kifa kɔ‘i nɛ gasa kaya nɛ kpee zu nu lɛŋ.
«Zu nɛ wannu ɔa'i nɛ mɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧ kinii'i.
Wannu, ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ gasa zu o dɔka wannu lɛŋ; nɛ́ ɛnɛ a̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan, ŋgayamɔ in gasamɔ ha̧ a̧;
o bíí, o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ, o nɔ̧́í̧ yiwese sɛn ge fara ge, Sɔ̧ ee wa lɛŋ er'nɛ́, h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ɔ wan zu wa. Ɓɛɛ zu bíí nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr'i nɛ ɛnɛ.
Ɗoŋ wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ŋma mbe wan tɛ kur nɛ beka nyɛm ŋmaa in k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ i̧i̧ wi’ɛi, ŋma taar wan tɛ hɔ nɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu nu lɛŋ; ndɛrɛ usi nɛ wi’ɛi.
Naar wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga; a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o kuti wan yinɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi to nɛ mɔ gbin a nu’ɛ ga.

O naŋ in o waza-naŋ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ‘i dee reeta-wa nɛ boi in ɓii reeta-wa nɛ dɔɔ gii'i usi nɛ wan nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo. Tɛ zu k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ zɔka'e boi in gii a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt; hegɔ, wan'i tɛ duk kana nɛ be ŋgai tikiɗi mbɛt.
War ko o waza-naŋ nɛ duk nɛ boi in gii'i, mɔ‘i usi nɛ kɛ̧a̧-a̧ ko wan nɛ tɛ kɛ̧ fara yiitoo: ŋma tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya-a hee boi ga, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa beka ŋgai kɔ‘i na hee gii ga.
Ɛnɛ zɔka boi nɛ‘i zaŋa nɛ gii; mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o wannu nɔ‘i tɛ ndaɗi ŋmaa tɛ̀ báá ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i beka ye ŋmaa nɛ de-a na, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ boi in gii ye ŋmaa duk kpɔk na’ɛ ga.
«Ŋgimbi ko o wannu nɔ‘i, Sɔ̧ yiwese tɛ e ŋma damti nɛ tɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, nɛ ŋma gɔni dukbíí beka ba na; a̧ tɛ gan zu o dɔka wan nɔ‘i, gbin nɛ ŋgai kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,

kana hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ ta fara kura-a nɛ ta-tɛ nɛ zu kaya mɛ tɛnɛ gbin nɛ boi, ndɛrɛ, gii, bu-mbɔi in lɔr a nu'i ga. Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa dee ha̧ wannu mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ. Zu'i bó nɛ́ ɔrmɔ na; gba̧a̧ zu'i mbɛt nɛ kpasamɔ.»
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr guu yí nu ti Daniɛl zɔn nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧, dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.
Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Nɛ́ kpasawen, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ Sɔ̧ ko o sɔ̧. A̧ nɛ wan ko o wannu, wi-ba-hu̧sa̧mɔ e zan, wen mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara hu̧sa̧mɔ'ɛ.»
Wannu baa Daniɛl e nɛ gasawi, a̧ ha̧a̧ o zɔm demɔ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ zu o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn zu nu Babilɔŋ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ.
Daniɛl aka wannu ha̧ a̧ mɛ e Sadrak, Mesak, in Abɛd-Nɛgo mɛ duk zu zika-nù Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ̀ zù ɓɔn kɔ‘i in wannu kɔ̧ kira kɔ̧-a̧.
Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mboo bíí nɛ lɔr, kusa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar, pɛsa-a nɛ mɛtrɛ taar, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba e ŋgɔn sɛn bɔkɔ-nu Dura, tɛ nu Babilɔŋ.

Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr pi̧i̧ tom wen mɔi̧a o wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita in o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de gbaŋa mboo-mɔ n'aa baa e ŋgɔn'i.

O wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk zu zika-nù, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, o wi-kasi-mbɔi, o wi-ha̧-heembea, o wi-gɔn-kita, o mɔ-geŋa tɛ nu'i lɛŋ mɔi̧a tɛnɛ wen dee gbaŋa mboo-mɔ nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa e ŋgɔn'i.
Wi-he-mbea tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ hee ger: «Ɛnɛ o dukbíí lɛŋ, in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e,
ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ zii dɔma zak, fol, kunde, koloŋ, be koloŋ, gba-zak gu nɛ o mɔɔ-de-gima lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbɛ́ zugur'nɛ́ nu mɛ gasi mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa e ŋgɔn.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ beka gu nu mɛ gasi mboo-mɔ‘i na, wi tɛ ba a̧ pi̧ kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk war kpɔk.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí lɛŋ zia giti wora-zak, fol, kunde, koloŋ, be koloŋ gu nɛ o mɔɔ-de-gima lɛŋ, o dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ guu nu gasi nɛ mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr nɛ wannu baa e ŋgɔn.
Ŋgimbi'i, o ŋma be Kaldee tɛa, ɓɛɛ gba ndaa o be Juif.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr'e: «Dáà, wannu nɛ́ ɛnɛ ɓɛɛ!
Bó nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ baa he so mbéá ha̧ bíí lɛŋ‘e, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i tɛ zii nɛ giti o zak, fol, kunde, koloŋ, be-koloŋ, gba-zak gu nɛ o mɔɔ-de-gima lɛŋ, a'i tɛ́ɛ̀ gu nu ti mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr mɛ gas'aa na nde?
Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ beka gu nu mɛ gasi mɔ‘i na, wi tɛ pi̧ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk na nde?
Zɔ́k, Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, o be Juif n’ɛnɛ kaia a zu o tom sɛn nu Babilɔŋ'ɛ kɔ̧ mboo zu tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ na; wa kɔ̧ gasa o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in mboo-mɔ n’ɛnɛ baa e ŋgɔn na.»
See wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɗaŋa nyɛmna ɓɛɛ tu̧ mbɛt; hegɔ a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mgbɔ Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧.
A̧ aka wa: «Sadrak, Mesak, Abɛd-Nɛgo, nɛ́ kpasawen a̧‘m zia'e, ɛ́nɛ́ de tom ha̧ o sɔ̧ kɔ‘m in ɛ́nɛ́ gasi mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr n'am baa e ŋgɔn na nde?

Kinii, ɛ́nɛ́ dúk zu naŋ‘nɛ́ wen nɛa-a mɛ gu nu ti mboo-mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr mɛ gas'aa ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ be tɛɛ zii giti o zak, fol, kunde, koloŋ, be-koloŋ, gba-zak gu nɛ o mɔɔ-de-gima lɛŋ nde? K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ de mɔ‘i na, wi tɛ pi̧‘nɛ sɛn kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk war kpɔk, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zɔk sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ gbo'nɛ́ er-am yinɛ‘i.»
Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo kifa nú ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr: «Ɛɛ kpa kifa nú mɛ ha̧‘nɛ́ tɛ wen'i na.
Kà Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ n’ɛɛ de tom ha̧ a̧‘i á̧ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ gbo yɛ yinɛ, a̧ tɛ gbo yɛ yinɛ sɛn kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk in er'nɛ́ mbɛt.
«Kóó kà a̧ nɛ dee hegɔ na mbɛt, ɛ̀nɛ̀ íŋ kana nɛ mbetɛ‘e, ɛ́ɛ́ beka de tom ha̧ o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ in gasa mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr n’ɛnɛ baa e ŋgɔn'i na mbɛt.»
Tɛ kifa-nú‘i, see wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɗaŋa batɛ, nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ kura zu Sadrak, Mesak ba nɛ Abɛd-Nɛgo. A̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ ye wee mɛ yoŋgi nɛ ŋgaya-a war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo gan kuti-a sɛn kɔ̧ lɔk,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú ha̧ o ŋga wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ hɛr Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, wen kaia wa a kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk'i.
Wa hɛra wa nɛ oi laa tɛ-wa lɛŋ: gba-laa, sir-laa, laa-gaɓi-tɛ in mɔɔ-gu-zu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa kai wa a sɛn kɔ̧ gasa wee kɔ̧ lɔk.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ heembea ko wannu ŋgaia so nyɛmna ga, wee kɔ̧ lɔk'i kpɔra so batɛ, ɓɛɛ leɓe-wee dɔ o wi nɛ kaia so Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo a tɛ wee'i, gbɛ wa a nu.
Ɓɛɛ war ko Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, wa tika yi wee nɛ̀ oi hɛra-a.
Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kura nɛ gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ, ɓɛɛ ak o wi-ba-keta kɔ‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Bó nɛ́ ɛɛ hɛra nɛ́ o bíí taar a yí-wee na?»
Wa kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Ii, nɛ mɔ‘i wannu.»
Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Nɛ́ bíí naar a̧‘m zɔk fara yara-a nɛ yi wee gee, ɓɛɛ ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa duk hee ŋma bem ko sɔ̧ ga.»
Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɗɔla pii ká̧ nu gasa lɔk-wee'i, ɓɛɛ sa mɔ: «Sadrak, Mesak, Abɛd-Nɛgo! O wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn mɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́!» Ɓɛɛ Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo gbo nɛ yí-wee mɛ tɛnɛ.

O wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk zu zika-nù in o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko wannu mɔi̧a ŋmaa mɛ zɔk o wi nɔ‘i taar nɛ gboo nɛ kɔ̧ wee'i. Wee dɔ ŋma mɔɔ-tɛ-wa na, mui̧-zu-wa bíí wee na, laa kɔ-wa ba so wee na, ŋma be pɛr zi-wee nun tɛ-wa na mbɛt.

Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr tɔ̧a̧: «Zɔnamɔ a̧ duk nɛ ko Sɔ̧ ko Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo nɛ toma betom kɔ‘i tɛnɛ mɛ gbo o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i nɛ e ta nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ta mɔ wen fea-a na, gbin nɛ heembea ko wannu wen wa kpɛk mɛ de tom ha̧ ŋma sɔ̧ nɛtɛ in mɛ gas'aa na, wen bo nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na.

«Hegɔ mi ha̧a̧ nú sɔsɔɔ ha̧ dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ŋma ɗaŋ wen sa nɛ nin Sɔ̧ ko Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo, wi tɛ gɔm a̧ ɓir sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́ a nu, ɓɛɛ wi tɛ gbin tua kɔ̧-a̧ a nu lɛŋ, wen ŋma Sɔ̧ nɛ nyɛma mɛ gbo bíí tɛ bɔnɛ hegɔ bo na.»
Ɓɛɛ wannu de ha̧ Sadrak, Mesak in Abɛd-Nɛgo mɛ ya nɛ o gasawi tɛ zika-nù Babilɔŋ.
Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr toma tɔ̧ ha̧ o dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zaŋnu lɛŋ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Gasa ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́!
«Mi tɛ we ɗoŋ o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi nɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ si ŋgɔn dee so ha̧‘m:
Oee zɔm o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ,
in o ŋga mɔɔ-kifi kɔ̧-a̧ wa!
Wan kɔ̧-a̧ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ ɔ wan zu o bezaŋ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧!
«Mi Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, mi duka so mɔ kɔ‘m nɛ de-a in nɛ desee kɔ̧ tua-wan kɔ‘m.
Ɓɛɛ mi ɔ zu nɛ̀ dèè kíì tɛ‘m nyɛmna. Zu n'am ɔa in mɔ n'am zɔka'i sakala taamɔ kɔ‘m batɛ.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn nú Babilɔŋ lɛŋ tɛnɛ ti'm, wen ha̧ wa mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧‘m.
Ɗoŋ nɛ o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wan-gbana, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ hɔɔ kaɗi, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu n'am ɔa'i ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ, Daniɛl n'am gɔna so nin ha̧ a̧‘e Bɛltasar nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ sɔ̧ kɔ‘m tɛa.
‹Bɛltasar, wan ko o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, mi iŋa'e
Mɔ n'am zɔka tɛ ɔɔ-zu kɔ‘m'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Mi zɔka ŋma gasa kusa te nɛ yor sɛn bɛɛ-nu see gara.
Te'i gasa, kpa ŋgai,
ɓɛɛ kusi si yiwese gan zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ gɔm nduti-nu mɛ lɛŋ,
wi nɛ zɔk a̧ na, bo na.
Wa̧a̧ te'i duka so nɛ de-a nyɛmna,
te'i waia so batɛ,
kóó o nde kpa so nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘i sɛnɛ.
O saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ ɔm so tɛ sɛn ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-a̧.
Poo wa̧a̧-a̧ duka so nɛ o fara-de-yaa ko o nɔ̧́í̧ mbɛt;
nɛ a̧ a̧ dai so mɔ lɛŋ.
« ‹Mi zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ŋgimbi n'am ɔ nɛ zu gɔn gado kɔ‘m. Sɛn tɛ ɔɔ zu'i mbɛt, mi zɔka ŋma sa̧a̧ wi-pɛm-mɔ fara zira-a tɛnɛ nɛ yiwese.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen nɛ hee-ger'e:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m te’ɛ pi̧ nu,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓír o gbaa-er-a,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ á̧k o wa̧a̧-a̧ yinɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kái waya-a a taŋ;
o saɗi a̧ yu ti ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-a̧,
o nɔ̧́í̧ a̧ yu tɛ o gbaa-er-a.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ŋginda-te'i
nɛ o kunin-a duk sɛnɛ‘i ɓɔn zaŋbɛɛ,
nɛ oi nyak-boi in ndɛrɛ
n’ɛnɛ tɛ hɛr nɛnɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ha̧ dɔmbɔrɔ mɛ a zu a̧
in ha̧ zɔ̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ kpɔk mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ̧-a̧ in o saɗi.
See-aa beka duk hee ko bíí ga ɓɔna;
taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ko saɗi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk hegɔ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
« ‹Mɔ‘i tɛ de hegɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ

Zu nɛ mi wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ɔa'i, nɛ mɔ‘i. Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ Bɛltasar, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, wen ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ sɛn tɛ nu kɔ‘m hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ mgbara zu'i ha̧‘m bo na, ɓɛɛ mi iŋa, mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ wen

Daniɛl nɛ‘i sa'e Bɛltasar zia wen'i, kíì dee a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ sakali. Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ́ sakali wen zu'i in gba̧a̧-a̧ na.» Bɛltasar kifa nú: «Gasa wan kɔ‘m, zu’ɛ a̧ duk wen o wi-sɛn'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-a̧ a̧ duk kɔ‘i wen o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Te n’ɛnɛ zɔka nɛ̀ gasa kusi si yiwese, kpa ŋgai, nɛ bíí zɔk hɔ nduti-nu naar lɛŋ,
nɛ wa̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔ nɛ de-a, nɛ waya-a ɔ dɔka, nɛ o mɔ lɛŋ kpa so mɔɔ-nyɔŋ sɛnɛ, nɛ o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ ɔ ti ɗɔɔ-aa in o nɔ̧́í̧ yiwese de yaa tɛ o gbaa-er-a'i,
nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ wannu, á̧ gasá, ɓɛɛ kpa ŋgai zu mɔ lɛŋ. Wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ gasa hegɔ hɔ yiwese, ɓɛɛ kpa ŋgai zu nu lɛŋ.

Nɛ̀ kó Sa̧a̧ Wi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ wannu zɔka fara zira-a nɛ yiwese, ɓɛɛ ká tɔ̧‘e: ‹Wa a̧ gɔm te'i pi̧ nu, wa a̧ ɓir a̧ a nu lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ e nɛ ŋginda-a in o ku̧nin-a nɛ‘i tɛ hɛr nɛ nyak-boi in ndɛrɛ ɓɔn zaŋbɛɛ, wa a̧ e ha̧ dɔmbɔrɔ mɛ ɓɔ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ é ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk kpɔk in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wo'i,
gba̧a̧ wen'i nɛ mɔ'ɔ. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ heembea nɛ̀ Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ toma tɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, Nyaa Wannu.

Wa tɛ ndak'nɛ́ yinɛ mgbara o bíí, ɓɛɛ fara k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kpɔk in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ; ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ zɔ̧ hee o ndai ga, dɔmbɔrɔ yiwese tɛ ɓɔ tɛ‘nɛ́ tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo hɔ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, nɛ́ Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔɔ-wan ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ wan ha̧ wi nɛ dee tɛ-a.
Ɓɛɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, a'i e ŋginda-te nɛ oi ku̧nin-a wo'i, nɛ mɔ nɛ usi'e, wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ pii ɗoŋ er'nɛ́ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ‘e nde, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ.›
«Hegɔ, Dáà, Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m; ɛ̀nɛ̀ é dee ɗaŋmɔ duk, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a; ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ duk, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko ha̧ o wisan wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ de-a ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧.»
O mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tika zu wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr.
Ɗoŋ pɛ kpɔk, sɛn tɛ yara-a n'aa yar nɛnɛ nɛ zu tua-wan saaye Babilɔŋ,
a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mɔ'ɔ bo nɛ mi a̧‘m mboo Babilɔŋ yaa-gásì tɛ ŋgai kɔ‘m ha̧‘m mɛ duk sɛnɛ, usi nɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m in gasi kɔ‘m na nde?»
Nú-a tɛ zɔm tɛ wen'i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii ŋma tiger nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ yiwese'e: «Wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, mɔɔ-wan yuu er-mɛ kaɗi.

Wa tɛ ndak mɛ mgbara o bíí yinɛ. Mɛ tɛ duk kpɔk in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ; mɛ tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ zɔ̧ hee o ndai ga. Mɛ tɛ duk hegɔ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, nɛ́ Wan nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔɔ-wan ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ a̧ a̧ ha̧ wan ha̧ wi nɛ dee tɛ-a.»
Tɛ kpɔk kale ŋgimbi'i, wen nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr hɔɔ gba̧a̧; wa ndaka a̧ yinɛ mgbara o bíí, a̧ nyɔŋ nɛ zɔ̧ duk nɛnɛ hee o ndai ga. Dɔmbɔrɔ ɓɔɔ tɛ-a lɛŋ, o mui̧-zu-a hɔ hee dɛ̀dɛ́ dila
«Nɛ̀ ŋgimbi kɔ‘m dama kaɗi, mi Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr hu̧i̧a̧ yí‘m si yiwese. Zu'm pia ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ mi zɔn Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ; mi dee osoko gasi nɛ Wan nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ:
A̧ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ duk zu o bezaŋ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧.
O bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ nɛ geemɔ;
a̧ de mɔ in o gii wi-biro mɛ yiwese
in o bíí zu nu hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ ga.
Ŋma wi nɛ tɛ dor a̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Ge a̧ mɛ de’ɛ ge?› bo na.

«Ɓɛɛ tɛ kale ŋgimbi'i, zu'm pia ɗoŋ; tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ in gasi kɔ‘m pia ɗoŋ ha̧ wan kɔ‘m mɛ ye tɛ gasamɔ woyo. O wi-ba-keta in o gasawi kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpɛk am, ɓɛɛ e'm tɛ wan woyo. Ɗoŋ-aa'i mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m gasa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ hu̧r gan kuti-a.

«Mi Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, n'am duk kinii’ɛ, mi de nɛ osoko ha̧ Wan mɛ yiwese, zɔn nɛ a̧, in gasi nɛ a̧ mbɛt, wen tom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ kpasamɔ, yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ tana, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai mɛ e o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ si ɗɔɔ.»
