Wannu Baltazar dee gasa gbaŋa ha̧ o gasawi nu kɔ‘i nɛ mɔi̧a tɛ bíí booro, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ sɛn ti wa.

Ŋgimbi nɛ wannu Baltazar nɔɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i, a̧ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ kai o nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, in nɛ bu-mbɔi nɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr baa kai so yinɛ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ̧-a̧.
Wa kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ wa kaia so yinɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm'i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wannu in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Wa nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ gasi nɛ o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, nɛ bu-mbɔi, nɛ ndɛrɛ, nɛ boi, nɛ te in nɛ ta.
Kà wa zɔk wo, er bíí nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔr mɔ zaŋ ŋgeŋ kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, ká̧ fara nɛ
yi wannu kpaia, zu-a zika, ku-a mɔka, ɓɛɛ o naŋ-a

Wannu pi̧i̧ tom ha̧ wa mɛ sa o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o be Kaldee in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ bee. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mɛ Babilɔŋ: «Wi nɛ tɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɛ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, wi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-a, wi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ ko wannu lɛŋ gara nɛ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ so tɔra yɔramɔ‘i kà bó nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧ wannu na mbɛt.
Zu wannu Baltazar zika tɛ mɔ‘i nyɛmna, yi-a kpaia, ɓɛɛ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ yaa nɛ kíì mbɛt.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, naa ko wannu yee tua fara nɛ wa de gbaŋa'i; tɛ zia ger wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki! Ká taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ sakali na, in ká see'nɛ́ tu̧ na mbɛt!
Ŋma bíí nɛ

Daniɛl, nɛ̀ wannu gɔna so nin Bɛltasar ha̧ a̧, a̧a̧ so nɛ ɗuka taamɔ nyɛmna, a̧ nɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ. A̧ ɔ haya, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ zu in sumgba ká bá nɛ̀ ɗafa-mgbara-mɔ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ mgbara mɔ‘i h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wa mgbɔɔ Daniɛl tɛnɛ ti wannu, ɓɛɛ wannu ak a̧: «Mɛ́ nɛ́ ŋma be Juda nɛ wa sa'e Daniɛl nɛ dáà kɔ‘m kaia so piinɛ nɛ nu kɔ-wa nde?
Mi zia'e
Wa mgbɔɔ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, in o wi-zɔk-mɔ tɛnɛ mɛ tɔr yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm na.

Mi zia'e mɛ nyɛma tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ in ɗafa mgbara-a mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kà mɛ nɛ nyɛma tɔra yɔramɔ'ɔ in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧-a̧ ha̧‘m mbɛt, mi tɛ pi̧ laa-wan tɛ-mɛ, mi tɛ pi̧ kísí-lɔr ger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋma gasawi kpɔk mgbara o dɔka-a taar tɛ nu kɔ‘m.»
Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu'e: «O ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i de ŋma mɔ tɛ‘m na, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́; koo ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ. Nɛ ko yɔramɔ, mi tɛ tɔr ɓɛɛ mi wee ɗoŋ-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
«Sɔ̧ nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wannu, ha̧a̧ wan, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ ha̧ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr.

Gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧‘i dee so ha̧ o dukbíí in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mɛ yu a̧. A̧ gbɛ so bíí hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga; ɓɛɛ a̧ ee o wi n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. A̧ ha̧ so gasi ha̧ o wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ foo o ŋma si ɗɔɔ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi n'aa ku̧u̧naŋ gasa zu-a, nɛ see-aa ŋgaia gan zu a, wa gboo a̧ yinɛ tɛ wan, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧-tɛ-a kaɗi.

Wa foo a̧ yinɛ mgbara bíí. Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kifa duk hee ko saɗi ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk kpɔk in o tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ. A̧ nyɔŋ so nɛ zɔ̧ hee ndai ga, ɓɛɛ dɔmbɔrɔ do tɛ-a hɔ wese n'aa iŋa nɛnɛ‘e, mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ si ŋgɔn a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔɔ-wan ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi n'aa kɔ̧a̧ a̧ a̧ ba e tɛ wan.
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, Baltazar, bem ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, mɛ́ mɔ́k see-mɛ si ɗɔɔ tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ mɛ iŋa so'i na.

Mɛ dee ŋgazu in GASA WAN mɛ yiwese. Mɛ kaia o nyɛk kɔ̧ Tua kɔ̧-a̧ a ti mɛ nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o gasawi, o okoo in o kó-bii-gima kɔ-mɛ, gasi nɛ nin o sɔ̧ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, bu-mbɔi, ndɛrɛ, boi, te in ta nɛ zɔk mɔ na, zii mɔ na, in nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na mbɛt; ɓɛɛ mɛ́ gásí Sɔ̧ nɛ kasi
Mɛ̀ nɛ́ Sɔ̧‘i a̧ toma er nɛ yɔra mɔ'ɛ.
«Tɔra-a nɛ: MƐNE, MƐNE, TƐKƐL in PARSIN.
Gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛ mɔ'ɔ: MƐNE nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi tɔra›; wen Sɔ̧ tɔra pɛ-wan kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ kaɗa kaɗi.
TƐKƐL nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi wea›; wen a̧ baa mɛ e zu mɔɔ-we-mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ diti na.
PƐRƐS mɛ nɛ mɔ nɛ tɔ̧‘e, ‹wi kɛ̧a̧›; wen wan kɔ-mɛ kɛ̧a̧ ha̧ o be Mɛdɛ in o be Pɛrsɛ.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Baltazar ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ pi̧ de laa-wan tɛ Daniɛl in kísí-lɔr ger-a, ɓɛɛ e a̧ mɛ duk nɛ taar gasawi mgbara o dɔka-a tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧.
Kale zaŋzɛ‘i, wa gbɛɛ Baltazar wannu ko o be Kaldee.
Darius be Mɛdɛ baa wan ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗɔŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiito.
Darius zɔka'e ɔ dee ha'i mɛ hok o wi-duk-zu-nu gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo mɛ ɔ wan in wii.
A̧ ee gasawi taar zu wa, ɓɛɛ Daniɛl nɛ ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa. O wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i tɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yak tɛ nu kɔ-wa ha̧ o gasawi nɔ‘i taar'i, wen ká ŋma mɔ tɛ́ɛ̀ sakali wannu.
Daniɛl iŋa so mgbara mɔ nyɛmna gan oi o gasawi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i ba nɛ o wi-duk-zu-nu mbɛt, hegɔ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ e a̧ nɛ gasawi zu nu kɔ‘i lɛŋ.

Tɛ mɔ‘i, oi gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu kia yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ tom ko Daniɛl tɛ nù yinɛ; mɔ kpɔk, wa kpa ŋma be gɔɔmɔ kóó yɔɔ-kaya ha̧ wa mɛ ɗɔ a sɛnɛ na, wen a̧ nɛ wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ ŋma wen mɛ tɔ̧ zu a tikiɗi bo na.
O wi nɔ‘i baa keta ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛɛ beka kpa ŋma yɔɔ-kaya tɛ Daniɛl mɛ ba a̧ nɛ wen sɛnɛ, kà bó nɛ́ tɛ́ Heembea ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na.»
O gasawi in o wi-duk-zu-nu nɔ‘i yaka sitɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu Darius, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki!

«O gasa wi-duk-zu-nu, o gasawi, o wi-duk-zu-nu, o wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ in o wi-duk-zu-zika-nù lɛŋ baa keta ha̧ wannu mɛ gɔn geŋa'e: tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-taar, wi nɛ beka gasi wannu na, nɛ tɛ gasi ŋma sɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, wi tɛ ba a̧ pi̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila.
Hegɔ kinii, wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n geŋa’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ e
Wannu Darius kpɛka wen kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ yɔr mɔ e

Ŋgimbi nɛ Daniɛl zia'e, wannu kpɛka heembea'i, e nɛ tumbal-wan kɔ‘i sɛnɛ, a̧ sii ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o woi-aa mɛ ŋgɔn zɔk so mɔ si Jerusalɛm; ɓɛɛ war taar tɛ wese kpɔk kpɔk, a̧ gbɛ so nɛ zugur-aa nu kɔfi nɛ Sɔ̧, zɔn nɛ a̧, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa de so nɛti ga.
O wi-sɛn-a tɛa, ɓɛɛ kpa a̧ fara aia nú kɔfi nɛ Sɔ̧.

Wa sii ɗoŋ nɛ haya-a nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wannu, bo nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ gɔna geŋa h’ɛ́ɛ́‘e, sɛn tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu-taar, wi nɛ tɛ gasi ŋma sɔ̧, kóó nɛ ŋma bíí nɛtɛ, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɛnɛ na, wi tɛ pi̧ a̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila na nde?» Wannu kifa nú ha̧ wa: «Nɛ mɔ‘i! Kana hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ heembea ko o be Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ kpai na’ɛ ga!»
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu: «Daniɛl ŋma be Juda nɛ wa baa so nɛ bara tɛnɛ, é nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ in heembea tɛ geemɔ. Wese lɛŋ, a̧ kɔfi nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ war taar.»
Nɛ wannu zia wen'i, see-aa ɗaŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ kii mɔ n'aa tɛ de mɛ fo nɛ wen zu Daniɛl yinɛ hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ, kii nɛ yuwar mɛ kpas'a.
O wi nɔ‘i pia ɗoŋ tɛ wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'e, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ heembea ko o be Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ tɔ̧ ga, wi beka kpai ŋma mɔ tɛ geŋa ko wannu na.»
Ɗoŋ wen'i, wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ ba Daniɛl pi̧ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila. Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Daniɛl: «Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ see kpɔk'i tɛ kpasi mɛ.»
Wa kina gasa ta kpe nɛ nu kɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ wannu e
Wannu sii ɗoŋ si kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i; a̧ nyɔŋ mɔ mɛ zɛ‘i na ɔ nɛnɛ, ŋma kóò kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ katɛ a̧ na, ya hɔ yi-a na mbɛt.
Mɔ tɛ gɔn na mɛ tutuyɛ sut, ká wannu hɔɔ so nú kɔ̧̀ ko o dila kaɗi.
A̧ hɔɔ nu kɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ sa Daniɛl nɛ dita-see, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Daniɛl, wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpasa, Sɔ̧ nɛ mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧ nɛ see kpɔk kpasa mɛ nú o dila nde?»
Ɓɛɛ Daniɛl kifi nú: «Wannu, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ hɔ tɛ sɔki!
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m toma betom kɔ‘i tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ kpe nu o dila lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in am na, wen ŋma ɗaŋmɔ n'am dee ti a̧ kóó sɛn ti'nɛ́ mbɛt, bo na.»
Wannu kpaa gasa desee, ɓɛɛ ha̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ dak Daniɛl gbonɛ. Wa daka Daniɛl gbonɛ, ɓɛɛ zɔk ŋma da̧i̧ tɛ-a na, wen n'aa ee so ta nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wannu hee mbéá ha̧ wa mɛ kai o wi nɛ ee ɗɔra tɛ Daniɛl a kɔ̧́ kɔ̧̀ ko o dila, gu nɛ o bem in o kóò kɔ-wa lɛŋ. Wa tɛ hɔ ndaa kɔ̧ na, ká o dila a̧ka̧ wa lɛŋ kaɗi.
Wannu Darius yɔra kalata ha̧ o dukbíí, in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ zu nu’ɛ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Gasa ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́!
«Nɛ mi a̧ gɔn geŋa’ɛ ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ a̧a̧ zu nu kɔ‘m. Ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yú kíì Sɔ̧ ko Daniɛl.
A̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ fe na;
a̧ duk kpasa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ŋma mɔɔ-ɗaŋ mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ bo na;
ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo!
Nɛ́ a̧ a̧ gbo bíí ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa bíí mbɛt;
nɛ́ a̧ a̧ de o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi,
sɛn yiwese in mbɔɗɔnu
wen nɛ a̧ a̧ kpasa Daniɛl nú o dila.»
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, Daniɛl duka nɛ de-a ŋgimbi-wan ko Darius in ko Sirus be Pɛrsɛ.
Tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko Baltazar wannu Babilɔŋ, Daniɛl ɔɔ zu ɓɔn gɔn gado kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔr zu'i, we nɛ ɗoŋ-aa mbɛt
hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Mɛ zɛ'ɛ, mi ɔɔ zu zɔk nɛ gba-búk-mgbiizan naar nɛ ɓoɓa gba-tɔp,
ɓɛɛ o ŋma zɔm saɗi naar nɛ hɔ ŋmaa na gbo nɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp'i.
Kuti saɗi hɔɔ ŋmaa in dila nɛ ɓaa-a hee ɓaa zua ga; ŋgimbi n'am zɔk nɛ mɔ‘i, wa ŋmana ɓaa-a yinɛ, ba a̧ e ŋgɔn, a̧ yora zu naŋ-a yiitoo hee bíí ga, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ taamɔ ko bíí ha̧ a̧.
«Yiitoo saɗi hɔɔ ŋmaa in baŋgiiɗoŋ,
«Hɔ-ɗoŋ i̧i̧, mi zɔka mɔ, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk ŋma saɗi woyo nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in gɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ wɔr-ɓaa naar hee ko nɔ̧́í̧ ga sɛn ɗoŋ, in zu naar, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ mɔɔ-wan ha̧ a̧.

«Tɛ zu n'am ɔɔ mɛ zɛ‘i, mi zɔka naar saɗi nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ mɔɔ tɔ̧ na: nɛ́ zɔm mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi, nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai nyɛmna. Gba̧a̧ nin-a lɛŋ nɛ boi, a̧ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ ŋgai, a̧k nɛnɛ a nu, i̧si̧ nɛnɛ. Zak-a a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ ɓu, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔ ŋmaa in o kuti saɗi na.
Ŋgimbi n'am mbaɗi nɛ o zak nɔ‘i, ŋma geɗek-a sɔia mgbara o dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ gbin o ŋma taar a nu. Gbaayí a̧a̧ so tɛ be zak'i hee gbaayí bíí ga, ɓɛɛ nú-a a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ mbɛt nɛ tɔ̧ nɛ kpoko-wen.
«Mi zɔk so nɛ mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa kai o damti tɛnɛ a nu, ɓɛɛ ŋma sɔkawi duk nu zu-a: laa kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ ndáká-ndáká, mui̧-zu-a ɔ fɛŋa hee buma sami ga, damti kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ leɓe-wee, o zika naŋ damti ɔ yoŋgoŋgo.
Ŋma zɔm wee gbo nɛ tɛ-a hee nana-yì a̧ fok ga. O bíí zu ŋmaa booro nɛ booro ya de nɛ tom ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ bíí booro-ɓu war booro-ɓu a̧a̧ so ti a̧. Wa hu̧i̧a̧ kalata, ɓɛɛ kita ku̧ naŋ.
«Mi duka zii nɛ o kpoko-wen nɛ zak saɗi'i tɔ̧‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'am zɔk nɛ saɗi'i, wa gbɛɛ a̧; ɓɛɛ wa a̧k a̧ kai a tɛ wee.
Wa dora ɔɔ-wan ko o dɔka saɗi, ɓɛɛ wa e ha̧ wa mɛ ya kpasa siti hɔ tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi nɛ‘i gɔna ha̧ wa.
«Tɛ zu n'am ɔ mɛ zɛ‘i, mi zɔka ŋma bíí nɛ zir nɛ yiwese nɛ mgbara bu-zan hee

Wa ee a̧ tɛ wan, ha̧ nɛ gasamɔ in mɔɔ-wan ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ o zuduk bíí, in o tugun bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nú nɛtɛ nɛtɛ de tom ha̧ a̧. Ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ beka kaɗi na kpoo nɛ kpoo; ŋma mɔɔ-ɗaŋ mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ bo na mbɛt.
«War kɔ‘m Daniɛl, see-am ŋmana, kíì dea'm nyɛmna tɛ zu'i n'am ɔɔ tɛ‘m'i.
Mi ɗɔla pii katɛ o ŋma bíí nɛ yaa so hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ mi ak ŋma kpɔk mɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧‘m. A̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i n'am zɔka'i ha̧‘m hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
‹O zɔm saɗi naar nɔ‘i nɛ o gasa wannu naar nɛ tɛ kur zu nu’ɛ;
ɓɛɛ o sa̧a̧-bíí ko Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ tɛ ɔ wan, ɓɛɛ wan'i tɛ duk er-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.›
«Mi aka mɔ woyo zu sɔŋkur naar ŋga saɗi nɛ hɔ ŋmaa in o dɔka-a na, nɛ gba̧a̧-nin-a nɛ boi, nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧-er-a nɛ ndɛrɛ, nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ ŋgai, a̧k nɛnɛ a nu, i̧si̧ nɛnɛ‘i;

mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ zu zak ɓu nɛ a̧a̧ zu saɗi'i, ɓɛɛ ká ŋma kpɔk sɔi gbonɛ ɓɛɛ gbin o ŋma kuti-a taar a nu, nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ gbaayí yiitoo in nú nɛ duk so tɔ̧ nɛ zɔm kpoko-wen'i; duk so hee zak'i gana o dɔka-a ga.
«Mi zɔka so zak'i fara dee biro in sa̧a̧-bíí, ɓɛɛ a̧ gan wa lɛŋ nɛ ŋgai,
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ sɔkawi hɔɔ ɓɛɛ wa gɔn kita nɛ de-a zu sa̧a̧-bíí ko Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ ha̧ nɛ wan ha̧ wa.
«Wi’ɛi tɔ̧a̧: ‹Naar saɗi nɛ́ naar wan zu nu’ɛ, nɛ̀ tɛ duk kɔ‘i nɛtɛ mgbara o dɔka wan lɛŋ. A̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nɛ duk zu nu lɛŋ, a̧k nɛnɛ a nu, i̧si̧ nɛnɛ.
War ko o zak ɓu, mɛ nɛ o wannu ɓu nɛ tɛ ba wan nɛ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ ŋma mbe-a tɛ ba wan nɛ ɗoŋ woyo; a̧ beka duk hee o kuti-a ga na, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛɛ wannu taar a nu.
A̧ tɛ tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen ha̧ Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ o sa̧a̧-bíí kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ tɛ kii mɛ kpai ŋgimbi in heembea, ɓɛɛ o sa̧a̧-bíí tɛ ya kɔ̧ er-a sɛn tɛ pɛ taar nɛ reeta.
Wa tɛ ɓa kita, ba nɛ wan yinɛ er-a, ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋa a̧ fo nɛ a̧ yinɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nɛ̀ war ko wan, mɔɔ-wan in gasamɔ zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ, wa tɛ ha̧ há̧ o sa̧a̧-bíí ko Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ. Wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo; o dɔka wan lɛŋ tɛ de tom mbo nɛ zu ha̧ a̧.›
«Wee-ɗoŋ-mɔ kɔ‘m kaɗa hɛ̧ɛ̧.
«War kɔ‘m Daniɛl, mi taa mɔ ɓɛɛ mi sakali nɛ dɔka-a, yí‘m kpaia, ɓɛɛ mi e mɔ‘i kɔ̧ see-am.»
«Tɛ taar pɛ-wan ko Baltazar, mi Daniɛl ɔɔ mbe zu ɗoŋ wan n'am ɔɔ so nɛti.
Tɛ ɔɔ zu'i, kà‘m zɔk wo, mi nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am duk tɛ ŋga ye Suzɛ tɛ zika-nù Elam mɛ‘i’ɛ. Mɛ ɗoŋ woyo, mi a̧a̧ nu yi Ulai.
Mi hu̧i̧a̧ yí‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk ŋma vala sami nɛ yor sɛn nu yi, zak-a yiitoo nɛ dura-a, ɓɛɛ ɓii-aa nɛ sɔia nɛ ɗoŋ zi̧i̧ gan kuti-a.

Mi zɔka vala sami'i yɛka zak si yee-wese, si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn in si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ. Ŋma saɗi nɛ nyɛma mɛ yor ti a̧ bo na, ŋma bíí nɛ nyɛma mɛ ɓar mɔ nú-a yinɛ bo na mbɛt; a̧ de so mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧ ga, gasi nɛnɛ siti.
«Mi ɓɔna fara ta mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋma vala gbadua hɔ nɛ yee-wese, a̧ zika nù kpa lɛŋ, naŋ-a ndɔ nu na, ŋma zak a̧a̧ so see-a mgbara gbaayi-a yiitoo.
A̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpe vala sami nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ zak yiitoo, n'am baa zɔk so sɛn nu yi'i e nu, ɓɛɛ ba a̧ nɛ biro.

A̧ hɔɔ kpa Vala sami'i, ɓɛɛ see-aa kur hee wee ga; a̧ too vala sami'i, gbin o zak-a yiitoo a nu, ɓɛɛ sami'i bo so nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ yor ti a̧ na. Vala gbadua'i visa a̧ pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ i̧s'a̧; ŋma bíí nɛ nyɛma mɛ ɓar vala sami'i ɗɔɔ-aa bo na.
«Vala gbadua'i gasa siti gan kere, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa kpa nɛ ŋgai nyɛmna'i, gasa zak-a'i gbina, ɓɛɛ mbe-a naar hɔ oi-aa dam nɛ mgbii-zan naar.
Sɛn tɛ ŋma zak nɔ‘i kpɔk, ŋma be geɗek-a sɔia, ɓɛɛ bɔ̧i̧ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, daŋa-wese in sitɛ gba de nù.
Zak'i gasa hegɔ hɔ tɛ o gii wi-biro yiwese mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo o ŋma gii wi-biro nɔ‘i in o ŋma sɔra a nu i̧si̧ nɛnɛ.
A̧ gasa siti hɔ tɛ Be wan-zu o gii wi-biro nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗaŋ ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i ɗafi so ha̧ a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ yinɛ, gbin nɛ tua ko Be-wan'i a nu mbɛt.
Tɛ mɔ n'aa de de na'i, a̧ kpaa ŋgai zu o gii wi-biro in zu ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i ɗafi so ɓɔnsɛnɛ. A̧ baa Kpasawen pi̧ taŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ n'aa de lɛŋ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧.
Mi zia ger ŋma betom fara tɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ ŋma woyo tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: ‹Mɔ nɛ zu tɔ̧a̧ tɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, tɛ ɗaŋamɔ, tɛ Tua, in tɛ mɔ ko gii wi-biro'i tɛ kaɗi mɛ gese ge?›
«Kuti betom kifa nú: ‹Wa tɛ mbo Tua ko Sɔ̧ woyo sɛn ɗoŋ tuyɛ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, in ga̧a̧mɔ hegɔ mbɛt.›
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m Daniɛl, ŋgimbi n'am zɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ zu, kii nɛ gba̧a̧-a̧, mi zɔka ŋma mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in bíí fara yora-a ti'm,
ɓɛɛ mi zii tiger bíí nɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ see yi Ulai mɛ‘e: ‹Gabriɛl, mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ gba̧a̧ zu'i ha̧ wi’ɛi.›
Gabriɛl tɛ̀ɛ̀ pii fara n'am duk sɛnɛ‘i, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ nɛnɛ‘i, kíì zara'm pi̧ nu. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ́ bíí,
Ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧‘m, hiɗ‘am gɔna, ɓɛɛ mi ɔ nu hee fio ga. A̧ foo tɛ‘m fara-ɔ-nu, ba'm e ŋgɔn,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: ‹Mi tɛ tɔ̧ gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ tɛ de ŋgimbi nɛ‘i gɔna, ŋgimbi nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ ha̧ mɛ.
Vala sami nɛ mɛ zɔka nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ zak yiitoo, usi nɛ o wannu Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ.
Vala gbadua nɛ mɛ zɔka nɛ buma-a ulɛ-ulɛ‘i, nɛ́ wannu Grɛk, ɓɛɛ gasa zak nɛ mɛ zɔka see-a mgbara o gbaayi-a, nɛ́ kuti wannu.
Mbe zak nɛ hɔɔ naar oi wan nɛ gbina'i usi nɛ wan naar nɛ tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ kpɔk zuduk bíí kpɔk, ɓɛɛ wa beka ŋgai hee ko kuti-a ga na.
Ŋgimbi kaɗa wan kɔ-wa, ŋgimbi nɛ deemɔ ko o ɗaŋwi be tɛ̀ɛ́ yak zale, ŋma kpɔra wan tɛ kur nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ-aa ɔ gɔna nyɛmna.
A̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai siti, ɓɛɛ ŋgai'i, bo nɛ a̧ kpa nɛ tɛ-a na. A̧ tɛ ɗaŋ mɔ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ mɔ n'aa tɛ de lɛŋ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧; a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai in o sa̧a̧ dukbíí mbɛt.

Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa a̧a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nyɛmna ga, a̧ tɛ iŋ ɔra bíí; a̧ tɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ a̧, kum nɛ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a nɛ e ta'e wi duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ. A̧ tɛ ba biro duk nɛ Be-wan nɛ duk zu o dɔka-a lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kaɗi, nɛ bo nɛ er bíí a̧ foo a̧ na.
Hɔɔ-zu tɛ mɔ ko o tuyɛ in o ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka so'i nɛ kpasamɔ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ é mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka'i kɔ̧ see-mɛ, wen ɗoŋ mɔ-aa ɔ nyɛi̧a.›
«Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m Daniɛl, gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina, gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa'm hɔ tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, mi kúra ɓɛɛ mi ye tɛ tom ko wannu woyo. Zu'i sakala so'm nyɛmna, wen mi zii so gba̧a̧-a̧ na.»

«Darius bem ko Asuerus tɛ dùk ko o be Mɛdɛ ɔɔ so wan zu nu ko o be Kaldee, ɓɛɛ tɛ kuti pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, mi Daniɛl zia gba̧a̧ yɔramɔ zaŋ sa̧a̧ kalata nɛ tɔ̧a̧‘e, Jerusalɛm tɛ duk nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi tɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧
Mi zika tɛ‘m sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧, wen ha̧‘m mɛ kɔf'aa, ai nɛ nú ha̧ a̧ nɛ zima-yì, pi̧ nɛ laa-bufu tɛ‘m, ɔ nɛ nu zu bùk.
Mi kɔfa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, gbar nɛ ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«Ho! GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa, nɛ‘i yu’ɛ, ɛnɛ nɛ wi nɛ yor ɗoŋ
«Ɛ́ɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɛ́ɛ́ yɔɔ kaya, ɛ́ɛ́ ee'nɛ́ dúk, de nɛ̀ ŋgazu in'nɛ̀ɛ́; ɛ́ɛ́ zika ɗoŋ yɛ e há̧ o heembea in o geŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ko o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ̀ yaa só nɛ́ o
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ k’ɛnɛ, GASA WAN, ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ nɛ foe a̧ gbɛ yɛ sɔsɔɔ, ɛɛ o be Juda, o bíí Jerusalɛm, o be
GASA WAN, foe baa yɛ in o wannu k’ɛɛ, o gasawi in o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ, wen ɛɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti'nɛ́.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, zu-a nɛ oi dee ŋgazu k’ɛɛ in'nɛ̀ɛ́‘i, ɛnɛ nɛ wan-de-ko in wan-e-ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɛ́ɛ́ zii so wen nú GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o heembea nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ o
O be
Ɛnɛ dee ha̧ wen n’ɛnɛ baa tɔ̧ so zu yɛ in zu o gasawi nɛ yaa so zu yɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧; ɛnɛ dee ha̧ o ŋgamɔ in o ŋga zɛɛ mɛ tik zu yɛ. Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ tɛ de zaŋnu hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dee sɛn Jerusalɛm ga na.
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tika zu yɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ ɛɛ ga̧a̧ see'nɛ́, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ee dea ɗaŋmɔ duk wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zii kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ dee kana ha̧ o ŋgamɔ nɔ‘i mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen tɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ de lɛŋ, ɛ́nɛ́ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ zii so wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.

«Ɓɛɛ kinii, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, tɛ ŋga er'nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ gboo dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nú Egiptɛ, de nɛnɛ ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ zɔk sɔsɔɔ'ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ k’ɛɛ, ɛɛ nɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ in o wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ‘nɛ́ na.

GASA WAN, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ nyimsea in ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yu zu Jerusalɛm nɛ duk nɛ ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ in sa̧a̧ kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen mɛ̀ nɛ́ zu ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ in yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ a̧ ziimɔ ba nɛ Jerusalɛm in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ ti o bíí nɛ ya zik yɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú kɔ‘m wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ de ha̧ saŋa-yí‘nɛ́ mɛ tok zu Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ɗaŋa'i, wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́, Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧í̧ yí‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k o mɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ ɗaŋa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ye nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ sɛnɛ! Bo nɛ wen deemɔ k’ɛɛ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̀ɛ̀ ai nɛ nú h’ɛ́nɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen zu gasa deako k’ɛ́nɛ́.

GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́! GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gá̧ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen see zu'nɛ́ nɛ tɛ‘nɛ́; ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ haya-a wen zu ye in dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ‘i sa nin'nɛ́ zu wa’ɛ!
«Mi ɓɔna fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, wor nɛ Sɔ̧, gbar nɛ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m in ko dukbíí kɔ‘m
ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Gabriɛl bíí n'am baa zɔk tɛ hɔɔ-zu kɔ‘m nɛti'i bu̧i̧a tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m nɛ haya-a ŋgimbi ɗafa-sɔ̧ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
A̧ wee ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧‘m tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Daniɛl, mi tɛɛ mɛ usi mgbara mɔ ha̧ mɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ aia nú mɛ, GASA WAN zia tiger-mɛ, ɓɛɛ e tom nú‘m mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ, wen mɛ dee tɛ-a nyɛmna. Mɛ̀ yéŋ zer-mɛ, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ hɔɔ-zu ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.

« ‹Wa gɔna pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ in sa̧a̧ ye kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ gbina heembea in dee ɗaŋmɔ mɛ kaɗi, ha'i mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ in ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Sɔ̧ mɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ; nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o hɔɔ-zu in o wen ko o

Kinii, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ íŋ‘e, ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ̀ heembea wen baa Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn woyo hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wan nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a tɛ hɔ, tɛ de pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo, wa tɛ ɗafi o bee-gara ye in o ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaya ŋgimbi.

Sɛn ɗoŋ pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo war ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo'i, wa tɛ gbɛ ŋma bíí nɛ‘i tɛna nɔ̧́ a zu-a yinɛ, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ wen ŋma mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tɛ-a na; ɓɛɛ war ko ye in Tua ko Sɔ̧, dukbíí ko ŋma wan nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, sɔŋkur mɔ ko wi’ɛi tɛ duk hee gba-zu a̧ gbina ga, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋamɔ beka kaɗi na hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi kaɗa-a ko biro.
Sɛn tɛ oi sɔŋkur pɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o dɔka bíí mɛ nɔ tɔk nɛ ŋgai in a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ dora ɗafa-sɔ̧ in aa-zɛzɛ tɛ reeta ŋgimbi'i. Wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ‘i
Tɛ taar pɛ-wan ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ, Sɔ̧ usa ŋma mɔ ha̧ Daniɛl nɛ‘i sa'e Bɛltasar. Mɔ‘i duka nɛ kpasawen nɛ usi nɛ mɔ zu ŋgamɔ nɛ tɛ tik zu nu. Daniɛl zia mgbara mɔ‘i sɛn tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ Sɔ̧ hɔɔ ha̧ a̧.
«Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, mi Daniɛl, zima mɔ tɛ alat taar.
Mi nyɔŋ so de nyɔŋmɔ na, kpoo in dɔ̧ɔ̧ ye nú‘m na, mi sɔ̧ nɔ̧́ tɛ‘m na mbɛt tɛ alat nɔ‘i taar'i.
«Tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, mi a̧a̧ so ká̧ nana-yì Tigrɛ.
Kà‘m ba yí‘m nɛ ŋgɔn wo, mi zɔka ŋma bíí nɛ pi̧i̧ ŋma yɛm-yɛm laa, nɛ hɛra zaŋ nɛ kanda lɔr mɛ nu Ufaz.
Tɛ-a duk so hee de toka ta ga, saŋa-yí-a tok hee pi̧i̧-kórò ga, o gbaayi-a ya hee leɓe-wee ga, o ɓaa-a in o naŋ-a hɔɔ ŋmaa in de yɔka ndɛrɛ. Tiger-a nɔ̧́í̧ hee gba giti ger giiwi ga.
«Nɛ́ mi Daniɛl ɛ̀n'am a̧ zɔka so mɔ‘i ɓɛɛ; o bíí n’ɛɛ yaa so in o ŋmaa'i zɔk so kɔ-wa na. Zu-a'i, kíì dee wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi yu mɔ yak nɛ́ɛ̀ hu̧si.
Mi ɓɔna hi̧i̧ ɛ̀n'am zɔk nɛ gasa mɔ‘i; gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina so lɛŋ, saŋa-yí‘m kpaia kifi nɛ ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ ŋgai gbo tɛ‘m.
Mi zia wen ko wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ tɛ wen'i, bele zara'm pi̧ nu, ɓɛɛ mi ba sɔnti'm gu nu.
Ŋma er bíí tama'm, ba'm e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mi gu zu naŋ-am nak nɛnɛ.
«Wi’ɛi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Daniɛl, wi nɛ dee tɛ Sɔ̧, mɛ̀ zíí gba̧a̧ wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ; mɛ̀ kúr mɛ̀ yór ŋgɔn wen mi a̧a̧ nɛ tom ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ.› Tɛ wen'i, mi kura yor nɛ naka-tɛ.
«A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ de kíì na, Daniɛl, wen ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ee so nɛ see-mɛ mɛ kii mgbara mɔ in nɛ mɛ mɔka nɛ see-mɛ ti Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, a̧ kpɛka kɔfamɔ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen mɔ‘i a̧‘m tɛ nɛnɛ.
Bem ko wannu Pɛrsɛ dee ŋgazu in am zɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-kpɔk, ɓɛɛ Michɛl ŋma kpɔk mgbara o gasa betom mɛ yiwese tɛɛ gbak am, ɓɛɛ mi ɓɔn kɔ‘m katɛ o wannu Pɛrsɛ hi̧i̧.
Mi tɛa mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-mɛ wen mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ ɗoŋ; mɔ nɛ mɛ zɔka tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i biti.›
«Ŋgimbi n'aa tɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧‘m'i mi zuma nɛ zu'm, duk nɛnɛ nɛ oi nú‘m,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ hee bíí ga tam ndàrá-nú‘m. Mi hu̧i̧a̧ nú‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ wen sitɛ wi nɛ yor ti'm'i'e: ‹Nyaa, zu n'am ɔa'i dee kíì pi̧ tɛ‘m nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m mɔk lɛŋ.
Mɔ nɛ wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa nɛ ŋgai mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen in'nɛ̀ɛ́ Nyaa, nɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ‘m gbina nɛnɛ in hiɗ‘am gɔna nɛnɛ mbɛt’ɛ nɛ ge mɔ ge?›
«Hegɔ wi nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in bíí‘i tama'm woyo, ɓɛɛ ŋgai pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m.

Wi’ɛi tɔ̧a̧: ‹Ká mɛ de kíì na, bíí nɛ dee tɛ Sɔ̧, ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ duk zu mɛ, mɛ̀ kpá ŋgai in mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi.› Tɛ wen nɔ‘i n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m'i, mi kpaa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: ‹Nyaa, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen, wen ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧‘m kaɗi.›

«Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‹Mɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ tɛ tɛ mɛ nde? Mi tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ we ɗoŋ gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ Kalata kpasawen ha̧ mɛ. Kinii, mi tɛ si ɗoŋ mɛ bi biro in be-wan Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ yak nɛ kɔ‘m kaɗi, a̧ be-wan Grɛk tɛ hɔ nɛ kɔ‘i. Ŋma bíí nɛ yee ɗoŋ-am tɛ biro in o wi nɔ‘i bo na, kana nɛ Michɛl be-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
« ‹Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m tɛ kuti pɛ-wan ko Darius be Mɛdɛ, mi yora so ɗoŋ Michɛl, ha̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧ a̧.

« ‹Kinii, mi tɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen ha̧ mɛ. Ŋma wannu Pɛrsɛ taar tɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ naar-a nɛ tɛ hɔ tɛ kpa mbɔi nɛ dɔka-a gan ko o wan mɛ ti, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mbɔi'i tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa ŋgai, a̧ tɛ ba biro duk nɛ nu Grɛk.
« ‹Mɔ kpɔk, ŋma ŋga wannu tɛ kur tɛ nu Grɛk; nu kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gasi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ de mɔ hee see-aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.

Ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ ŋgai a̧ wan'i tɛ ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ wa kɛ̧ɛ̧ dam mgbii-zan naar lɛŋ. Mɔɔ-wan'i tɛ ye nɛ er o ŋma bíí nɛtɛ nɛ beka kpa ŋgai hee nɛti ga na; mɔɔ-wan'i beka pii ɗoŋ er o bezaŋ-aa ɓɔna mbɛt.
« ‹Wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ kpa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ ŋma be-wan kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai woyo gan kɔ̧-a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ wan ko wi’ɛi tɛ duk nɛ gasa-a gan.

Pɛ tikiɗi tɛ yak, ɓɛɛ wa nɔɔ tɔk in o ŋmaa: boko-bem ko wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ ba ŋmaa in wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn, wen ɗafa mgbara ŋmaa. Mɔ kpɔk, ŋma bíí beka yor ɗoŋ boko-bem’ɛi na, hegɔ o bezaŋ-aa beka duk siti na, wen wa tɛ gbɛ kiitɛ boko-bem’ɛi in o wi nɛ mgbɔɔ so a̧ nɛnɛ, ba nɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧, in wi n'aa e só nɛ̀ ta
Ŋma kpɔk nyak-zaŋ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ba fara oi-aa, ɓɛɛ baa biro duk nɛ o wi-biro ko wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn si hɔ kɔ̧ ŋgárá kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ. A̧ tɛ bi wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina biro.
A̧ tɛ kai o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, o mboo-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ boi, gu nɛ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr nɛ mɔɔ-oi-biro yaknɛ si Egiptɛ. Ɗoŋ nɛ pɛ yaka nɛ dɔka-a nɛ biro bo na,
wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ bi wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ pia ɗoŋ tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧.

« ‹O bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ mɔi̧ gii bíí nyɛmna wen bíí biro. Mgbara o bem nɔ‘i, ŋma kpɔk tɛ ba biro kur yak in o wi-biro kɔ‘i nɛ ŋgai hee yi a̧ gbina gba-zu ga ye nɛ nu ko wisɛn kɔ-wa. A̧ tɛ bi biro piinɛ hɔ nu ŋgárá ko wisɛn'i.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, see wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ́ kur nɛ ŋgaya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ gboo ba biro duk nɛ wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn; a̧ tɛ gan zu zɔm o wi nɔ‘i.
Gasa-zu tɛ ye tɛ a̧; ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ oi gana zu wa n'aa gana nduk nɛ bíí nɛ dɔka-a'i, a̧ beka gbin biro na.
« ‹Wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ si ɗoŋ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔi̧ bíí nɛ dɔka-a woyo gan kuti-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafa mbe naŋ biro; mɛ ɗoŋ tɛ ŋma pɛ a̧ tɛ ba biro pii nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nɛ o zɔm mɔɔ-de-biro in o wi-biro nɛ dɔka-a.

Nɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i a̧ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ kur nɛnɛ zu wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ mgbara dukbíí kɔ-mɛ, Daniɛl, o ŋma wi-de-ŋgamɔ tɛ kur mbɛt wen ha̧ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ so tɛ ŋma hɔɔ-zu mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧. Mɔ kpɔk, wa beka de kpasa mɔ na.
Wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ tɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mboo nù hɔ zu garo ŋma ŋga ye, ba nɛnɛ. O wi-biro mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ beka yor ti wa na, kóó nɛ o wi-gbin-biro na mbɛt, wa beka kpa ŋgai mɛ yor ti wa na.
Wi nɛ tɛ ba biro tɛnɛ‘i tɛ de mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see kɔ̧a̧ ga. Ŋma wi nɛ tɛ yor ti a bo na. A̧ tɛ ba fara tɛ gba de nu,
Taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ tɛa-a nɛ oi ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ pii zu wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ boko-bem nɛ koo ha̧ a̧, nɔ nɛ tɔk in a̧ wen kia yuwar mɛ ɗaŋ a̧; ɓɛɛ gɔn-zaŋ kɔ̧-a̧‘i beka hɔ ti na.
Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, a̧ tɛ zik tɛ-a mɛ bi o bíí mɛ ká̧-zaŋ gba-tɔp, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa o ŋma nɛ dɔka-a, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma gasawi tɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i mɛ kaɗi wen ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-aa mɛ kpa a̧.
Wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ zik tɛ tík zu o ye nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgárá tɛ nu kɔ̧-a̧; naŋ-a tɛ mbali ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ a̧ yoo nu, nɛ‘i beka iŋ oi-aa ɓɔna.
« ‹Ŋma bíí tɛ ba wan oi-aa, ɓɛɛ toma wi-ndɛm-mɔ nɛ ŋgai mɛ kai mɔ kɔ̧ de be Tua
« ‹Ŋma bíí nɛ nyɛm yí bíí na tɛ ba wan oi-aa, nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ wi ha̧a̧ so nɛ wan ha̧ a̧ na. Wi’ɛi tɛ a wen ha̧ o bíí ba nɛ wan tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
A̧ tɛ bi o wi nɛ tɛ tik a nɛ biro gan nɛ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛɛ ŋma gasawi ko dukbíí nɛ Sɔ̧ nɔɔ tɔk in wa.
Mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ nɔɔ tɔk in o bíí wen ɔra wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbina biro nɛ o bíí tikiɗi ɓɛɛ.

A̧ tɛ ye tɛ de nu nɛ a̧a̧ zika-fara'i zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, de nɛ mɔ nɛ o dáà kɔ̧-a̧, koo o zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ de so nɛti na; a̧ tɛ kai o mbɔi in o mɔ ko o bíí fara nɔ‘i kɛ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ tɛ kii yuwar mɛ bi o ŋgárá mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i beka nyɛi̧ na.
« ‹A̧ tɛ e see-aa in ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mɛ kai dɔka wi-biro dúk nɛ̀ wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ; wannu'i tɛ bi biro nɛ zɔm gasa o ŋga wi-biro kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka de biro'i hɔ ti na, wen wa tɛ gɔn naŋ-a.
O wi nɛ nyɔŋ so mɔ in a̧ kpɔk tɛ ɗɔ a̧; o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kum nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ biro gana wa.
O wannu nɔ‘i yiitoo nɛ see duna nɛ ɗaŋ‘i tɛ ya nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ kpɔk, ɓɛɛ nyɛrɛ kɔ-wa sitɛ ŋmaa lɛŋ nɛ́ ndela; mɔ kɔ-wa beka hɔ gba̧a̧ na, wen sɔŋkur ŋgimbi tɛ hɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ kai mbɔi nɛ dɔka-a sinɛ tɛ nu kɔ‘i; ɓɛɛ ɗaŋmɔ n'aa ta mɛ de in dukbíí nɛ Sɔ̧ nɔɔ tɔk in wa'i, a̧ tɛ de kana kaɗi, sɛka a̧ sii ɗoŋ nu kɔ̧-a̧.
« ‹Mɛ́ ɗoŋ tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi, a̧ tɛ ba biro dúk nɛ̀ wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ woyo; mɔ kpɔk, mɔ beka duk hee mɔ nɛ yaka so nɛti ga na.
O kombon mɛ Kitim tɛ gbo biro sitɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ-a gbina; zu mɔ‘i, see-aa tɛ kur, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ŋgamɔ woyo in dukbíí nɛ Sɔ̧ nɔɔ tɔk in wa; a̧ tɛ ndaɗi in o bíí nɛ ee
O wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ ba sa̧a̧ ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ wa fɛŋa fara'i; wa tɛ dor ɗafa-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i ɗafi so wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ee ndiŋ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-mɔ oi-aa.
A̧ tɛ ɔr o bíí nɛ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ wa mɛ e
O wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ mgbara dukbíí tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ o dɔka bíí, ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi wa tɛ fe nu gba-paa in yi wee; o bíí tɛ zu̧ mɔ kɔ-wa, kai nɛ wa nɛ bara mbɛt.
Tɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ‘i, wa tɛ kpa gbakamɔ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ; o bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ gbin pii zu wa nɛ ɔrmɔ.
O ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɔ‘i tɛ fe, ɓɛɛ fio kɔ-wa tɛ de ha̧ war-tɛ dukbíí mɛ sa̧ nɛ de-a hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi, wen ŋgimbi'i tɛ hɔ kana.

« ‹Wannu'i tɛ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ see-aa kɔ̧a̧; a̧ tɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-a kɔn nɛ ŋguɗi-a zu o sɔ̧ lɛŋ, tɔ̧ nɛ kpoko-wen ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko o sɔ̧. Mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ tɛ hɔ, wen mɔ nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi tɛ de kana.
A̧ beka pi̧ nú-a tɛ o sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáa kɔ̧-a̧ in wan nɛ o okoo gasi na, kóó nɛ ge sɔ̧ ge; a̧ tɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-a zu mɔ lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ gasi kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ sɔ̧-ŋgara nɛ duk nɛ ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ o dáà kɔ̧-a̧ iŋ so kɔ‘i na; a̧ tɛ tu̧ tɛ sɔ̧‘i nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi ká bá nɛ̀ o de toka ta, in o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Gɔni sɔ̧‘i tɛ yor ɗoŋ-aa, ha̧ a̧ mɛ bi o ye nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgárá, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ gasi sɔ̧‘i, a̧ tɛ ha̧ gasi ha̧ wa; a̧ tɛ e wa zu o giiwi, kɛ̧ nɛ nu ha̧ wa wen mɔ‘i.

« ‹Tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi, wannu mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ tɛ kur nɛ biro in a̧, ɓɛɛ wan mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ tɛ nɛ o keekee, o nyaŋa in o kombon-biro bi nɛ a̧ nɛ ŋgai. A̧ tɛ ye tɛ o nu ɓir nɛnɛ yak hee yi a̧ gbina gba-zu ga.
A̧ tɛ ye tɛ gba de nu mbɛt, ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ kum; kana nɛ o be Edɔm, o be Mɔab in o kpasa o be Amɔŋ a̧ tɛ gbo ɗɔɔ er-a.
A̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu o nu nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ nu Egiptɛ mbɛt tɛ tik kɔ̧ er-a.
Lɔr, bu-mbɔi in o gba demɔ mɛ Egiptɛ lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ o be Libii, o be Etiopii tɛ zii nɛ̀ a̧ mbɛt.
Mɔ kpɔk, o nyɛrɛmɔ mɛ war daŋa-wese in mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn tɛ zik zu-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kur nɛ zɔm ŋga nyimsea wen ɗaŋa mɔ in wen kuma o bíí nɛ dɔka-a.
A̧ tɛ e tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara gba-tɔp in sa̧a̧ kaya tɛ gba de nu, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn fara'i a̧ fio tɛ kpa a̧ sɛnɛ, nɛ̀ ŋma wi-gbak-a beka bo na.› »

«Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, Michɛl gasa betom mɛ yiwese nɛ yor ɗoŋ dukbíí kɔ-mɛ tɛ tɛ. Mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ ŋgimbi gasa bɔnɛ, wen nɛ̀ tugun bíí duk nɛnɛ tɛnɛ‘i, wi tɛ zɔk pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti na, ɓɛɛ o bíí kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ nɛ nin-wa yɔra zaŋ Kalata tɛ kpasi.
O bíí nɛ dɔka-a nɛ ɔ nɛ ya ɗɔɔ nu tɛ tun: o ŋma tɛ tun kɔ‘i wen duka-kpasa kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ ko o ŋma nɛ́ wen foe in ziimɔ a̧ tɛ ba wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O wi nɛ yaa so nɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ tok hee yiwese ga, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ foo o giiwi á tɛ dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ tok hee sɔra ga ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
«War kɔ-mɛ Daniɛl, mɛ̀ é wen’ɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ, ká mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ ŋma bíí na in mɛ̀ látí nu kalata’ɛ nɛ de-a hɔ tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi. O bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ tɔr kalata’ɛ, ɓɛɛ wa kpaa gasa iŋamɔ
«Kà‘m zɔk wo, o ŋma bíí yiitoo nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ yor ká̧ ŋgere’ɛ, ɓii-wi duka so nɛ kur yi, ɓii-aa nɛ kur pii tɛ‘m.
Ɓii bíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wi nɛ pi̧i̧ nɛ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa nɛ yora so see yì: ‹O kpoko mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ tɛ kaɗi mɛ gese ge?›
«Ɓɛɛ mi zɔk wi-pi̧ yɛ́m-yɛ́m laa, nɛ yor so see yì fara nyɛi̧a er yiitoo lɛŋ si ŋgɔn, kan nɛ mɔ nɛ nin Wan nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ‘e: ‹Mɔɔ nɔ‘i tɛ de tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi, tɛ ŋma ŋgimbi yiitoo in tɛ ŋma reeta ŋgimbi
«Mi zia wen'i, ɓɛɛ mi iŋ mgbara-a na, sa'm ak mɔ: ‹Nyaa, mɔ‘i tɛ kaɗi hee ge?›
«A̧ kifa nú ha̧‘m: ‹Ká mɛ ta mɔ na, Daniɛl; o wen nɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ hu̧sa̧-a̧, in nɛ kpea-a hɔ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi.
War-tɛ bíí nɛ dɔka-a tɛ sa̧, nɛ de-a. O wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ de kana nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ, wa beka iŋ mgbara mɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ a̧ tɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ.
« ‹Tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ ɗafa-sɔ̧ wese lɛŋ tɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ in nɛ wa tɛ e nɛ ndiŋ mɔɔ-ɗaŋ-mɔ oi-aa, nɛ́ zɛ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-yiitoo-zua-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar a̧ tɛ yak.
Desee nɛ́ ko o wi nɛ tɛ pɛm mɔ nɛ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi tɛ zɛ booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-taar-nɛ-ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
« ‹Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ yór nɛ nɔa-a hɔ sɔŋkur-aa. Mɛ tɛ kpa ɔma-tɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kura wen kpaa mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-mɛ tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi.› »
Mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ zaŋ kalata’ɛ nɛ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Osee bem ko Beeri, ŋgimbi wan ko Ozias, Yotam, Ahaz in Ezɛkias nɛ ɔɔ so wan Juda. Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, nɛ́ Jeroboam bem ko Jɔas a̧ ɔ wan
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko GASA WAN, ŋgimbi n'aa ee nɛ wen nú
«Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kó-dàlà
a̧ mɛ̀ kó be-dàlà in a̧;
ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii nù'ɛ ea'm duk
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ kó-dàlà e nɛ wíì kɔ‘i duk’ɛ ga.»
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa nɛ̀ɛ́ ba Gɔmɛr, boko-bem ko Diblayim nɛ kóò, ɓɛɛ Gɔmɛr ba zaŋ ko nɛ̀ be-wiwii ha̧ a̧;
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Osee:
«Mɛ̀ á nin bem’ɛi nɛ Yizreɛl,
wen dekpaa mi tɛ kundi ari
ha̧ o bíí nutua ko Jɛhu
wen o bíí nɛ wa gbɛɛ so saaye Yizreɛl,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ yai mɔɔ-wan ko
Wese'i, mi tɛ gbin kusaa-goo ko
sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Yizreɛl.»
Gɔmɛr baa zaŋ woyo, ko nɛ̀ be-okoo, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Osee:
«Mɛ̀ á nin-a'e Pi̧i̧-Taŋ,
wen mi beka usi
ha̧ nutua
kà bó nɛ̀ ee ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wa na mbɛt.
«Ɓɛɛ war nutua ko Juda, mi tɛ usi
Pi̧i̧taŋ bɛ̧ɛ̧ bere, ɓɛɛ Gɔmɛr ba mbe zaŋ woyo ko nɛ̀ be-wiwii,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ Osee:
«Mɛ̀ á nin-a'e, Bɛ̧ɛ̧-pi̧-nù;
wen ɛnɛ bó nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ‘m ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ mi bó nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna mbɛt.»
Ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋgimbi, o be
hee nyɛmɛ ɗɔɔ gba tɔp ga,
nɛ‘i beka we dɔka-a
kà bó nɛ̀ tɔra-a pi̧ nù na.
O bíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e:
«Ɛnɛ bo nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m na.»
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wa tɛ tɔ̧‘e:
«Ɛnɛ nɛ o bem ko kpasa Sɔ̧.»
O be Juda in o be
tɛ mɔi̧ duk kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ hok wan kɔ-wa,
wa tɛ dɔk gan zu nù‘i,
ɓɛɛ wese'i tɛ duk nɛ gasa wese sɛn Yizreɛl.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá o nya'nɛ́ in o boko-nya'nɛ́‘e:
«Dukbíí kɔ‘m» in «Yaa-dua-see-am.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓá kita in nàà k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓá wen in a̧,
wen kinii, a̧ bo nɛ kóò kɔ‘m ɓɔna,
mi bo nɛ wíì kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɔna mbɛt.
A̧ a̧ fo o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ de dàlà yinɛ yí-a,
a̧ a̧ kai o mɔɔ nɔ‘i yinɛ sara ber-aa;
kà bo hegɔ na, mi tɛ kpɔ̧i̧ mɔ tɛ-a yinɛ
pi̧ a̧ zan nɛ mgbii,
hee wese nɛ nàá kòó nɛ a̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk
hee ŋga-gbárà in ŋga nù ga,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe wɔ yi.
Mi beka kɔ̧ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen wa nɛ o be-dàlà.
Nàà kɔ-wa kifa kɔ‘i
nɛ kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔdɔnu, fɛŋ nɛ tɛ,
wen a̧‘e, wi tɛ ma yi si ɗoŋ o dàlà kɔ‘i,
wen nɛ́ wa a̧ dai wi,
ha̧ nɛ laa-ulu in yɛm-yɛm laa ha'i,
ká bá nɛ̀ nɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ ŋgasi yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ tɛnmɔ,
mi tɛ kpe yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ ndiyɛ-ndiyɛ
n'aa beka kpa fara mɛ gbo nɛnɛ yak na.
Kóó a̧ ndaka so ɗoŋ o dàlà kɔ̧-a̧ yaknɛ,
a̧ beka kpa wa na.
A̧ tɛ kii wa dam fara lɛŋ takaɗi.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e nde,
wi tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ kuti wii kɔ‘i,
wen duka-a kɔ‘i mɛ ti dee gan ɛ̧ɛ̧ kinii.
Ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ‘e mɛ nɛ mi GASA WAN
a̧ ha̧ so alkamaari in nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ká bá nɛ̀ nɔ ha̧ a̧ na;
nɛ kpɔk mi’ɛ a̧ ha̧ bu sede in lɔr
nɛ dɔka-a ha̧ a̧ n'aa dui nɛ o géé-sɔ̧
nɛ‘i sa'e Bal.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ de ha̧ o alkamaari
in o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de nɛ zɔŋa sɔɔ gee;
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ́ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-ulu in yɛm-yɛm laa kɔ‘m
n'aa kpe so nɛ tɛ-a yinɛ.
Mi tɛ pi̧ búù zu a ti o dàlà kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ŋma wi-ɓar-a er-am yinɛ beka bo na.
Mi tɛ ba o mɔ nɛ ha̧ tortɛ ha̧ a̧ lɛŋ yinɛ:
o gbaŋa, o yɔyɛ mbe-yi-zɛ,
o wese-ɔm-tɛ in o gasa wese-de-nyɛŋɛ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
in o te mbɔra kɔ̧-a̧ a nù lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti,
wen n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e nde,
mɔɔ-oi dàlà nɛ‘i kpaa so nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o fɔ nɔ‘i mɛ kifi duk nɛ zaŋbɛɛ
fara nɛ o saɗi tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧
wen zu ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ n'aa ɗafa so
a nɛ o kana in wele tɛ,
ma nɛ yi si ɗoŋ o dàlà kɔ̧-a̧ e nɛ‘m duk'i.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Kóó nɛ oi mɔ n'aa dea'i, mi tɛ a wen tɛ a,
ɓɛɛ mi mgbɔɔ a yaknɛ si ŋga-gbárà mɛ, mɛ ga̧ see-aa.
Sɛn hi̧i̧, mi tɛ́ ha̧ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ siɗoŋ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ mi dee ha̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Akɔr
mɛ kifi nɛ fara e nɛ ta kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi'i, a̧ tɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ nú‘m
hee tɛ ŋgimbi zɔŋa kɔ̧-a̧
n'aa gboo so nɛnɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ mɛ ga.
Nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Wese'i, a̧ tɛ sa'm'e,
kpasa wíì kɔ̧-a̧;
a̧ beka sa'm'e Bal, wan kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ ba nin o géé-sɔ̧ Bal kɔ̧ nú-a yinɛ;
wi beka iŋ oi nin-wa ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi'i, mi tɛ de ha̧ dukbíí kɔ‘m
mɛ nɔ tɔk in o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ
ká bá nɛ̀ o nɔ̧́í̧ gu nɛ o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ-nɛ-nu mbɛt;
mi tɛ gbin o mɔɔ-de-biro,
kusaa-goo gu nɛ o gba-paa yinɛ zu nù'ɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ o be-nù'ɛ mɛ ɔ ya nɛ fee-see.
Mi tɛ ba mɛ nɛ kóò woyo;
mɛ tɛ duk kóò ko'm ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mbɔi-ɗoŋ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
deemɔ sa̧,
Mi tɛ ba mɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ iŋ‘e, mi nɛ GASA WAN.
Nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Wese'i, mi tɛ kifi nú ha̧ yiwese,
ɓɛɛ yiwese kifa kɔ‘i ha̧ nù,
ɓɛɛ nù tɛ kifi nú ha̧ alkamaari
in o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o te-nɔ,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i kifa nú ha̧ Yizreɛl.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ o be
mi tɛ kɔ̧ Pi̧i̧taŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ sa Bɛ̧ɛ̧-pi̧-nù‘e: «Dukbíí kɔ‘m»,
ɓɛɛ a̧ saa'm'e: «Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mɛ̀ bá kóò kɔ-mɛ nɛ yaka so mɛ e duk nɛ́ ɗoŋ dàlà kɔ‘i’ɛ, mɛ̀ kɔ̧́ a̧ woyo hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o be
Mi ha̧a̧ bu-mbɔi ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, in gba mgbɛɗɛ be-fon
«Kinii, mɛ̀ dúk nɛ̀ mboozu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ kɔ̧ tua-wíì kɔ-mɛ. Ká mɛ́ dúk in wiwii na; mi mbɛt, mi tɛ de kpɔk mɔ‘i, wen zu mɛ.»
Hegɔ o be
Ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be
Ɛnɛ o be
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧;
a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ wen in o bíí nù'ɛ.
«Kinii, kpasawen, kɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋma-wi,
ká bá nɛ̀ iŋa Sɔ̧ mbɛt nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ bo tɛ nù'ɛ ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ kànà nɛ kanamɔ ndela, gbɛɛ ŋmaa,
zuzu, dàlà in dee ŋgamɔ kum nɛ ŋmaa a̧ dɔk.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, kaara tɛ yor zu nù'ɛ;
o bíí hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ
in o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese lɛŋ tɛ ziɓi nɛ oi,
ɓɛɛ o zoro mɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp kuma mbɛt.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó ta'nɛ́ tɛ kia nú ŋmaa,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ e wen zu ŋmaa na mbɛt.
Wan-wen'i nɛ́ mɛ́, wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Mɛ tɛ tir yɔɔ-mɔ mɛ wese,
ɓɛɛ
Mi tɛ de ɓɛɛ wi beka zii
ger nàà kɔ-mɛ
Dukbíí kɔ‘m iŋ am na kum nɛnɛ;
mɛ mbɛt, mɛ baa bɛ̧ iŋa'm.
Wen mɔ‘i, mi tɛ bɛ̧ mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ beka duk nɛ́ wi-ɗaf'am ɓɔna.
Tɛ-mɛ bìí ɗoŋ usamɔ ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Hegɔ, mi mbɛt, tɛ‘m tɛ bi ɗoŋ o bem kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Zu dɔka wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i,
wa lɛŋ dee ɗaŋmɔ pii tɛ‘m;
hegɔ, mi tɛ kpai gasi kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-búù.
Zaŋ-wa sur wen zu nyɔŋa ɗaŋmɔ
nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m de,
ɓɛɛ wɔ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m de'i gbɛ nɛ wa lɛk-lɛk.
Hegɔ nɛ́ kale mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa dukbíí
a̧ tɛ kpa o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mbɛt.
Mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ naŋanɔ kɔ-wa;
mi tɛ de mɔ in wa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Wa tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, ɓɛɛ zaŋ-wa beka sur na.
Wa tɛ de dàlà, ɓɛɛ wa beka ko na,
wen wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ GASA WAN pi̧ nɛ tɛ-wa tɛ dàlà.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ mɔɔ-sakali taamɔ ko bíí.
Dukbíí kɔ‘m zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛ tani;
nɛ́ ɓira-te kɔ-wa a̧ usi mɔ ha̧ wa,
wen taamɔ-dàlà in dee dàlà ɔra wa
mɛ e Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa duk ndak nɛ ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧.
Wa ɗafi o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i zu o kaya in o zu-tɔ̧́,
dɔ nɛ kpoo-sɔ̧ nɛ ɗɔɔ o gasa te
wen gi̧ɔ̧ o te nɔ‘i dee tɛ-wa nyɛmna.
Mɛ nɛ zu mɔ‘i a̧ o boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́
yar nɛ mbɔɗɔnu fɛŋ nɛ tɛ nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o be-for'nɛ́ ya kɔ‘i de nɛ dàlà mbɛt.
Mi beka usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o boko-bem k’ɛ́nɛ́
zu ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa in ha̧ o be-for'nɛ́
zu dàlà kɔ-wa'i na mbɛt,
wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɓɔŋ nɛ tɛ
de nɛ mɔ in kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu,
ɓɛɛ wa ɗafi sɔ̧ in o kó-de-dàlà
wan mɛ
O bíí nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na nɛ kɔ‘i mɛ tik.
Ɓɛɛ
ká Juda pi̧ kɔ‘i tɛ sɛnɛ na.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ kai ŋmaa yak si Gilgal na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ daŋ si Bɛt-Avɛn
k’ɛ́nɛ́ kan mɔ‘e: «GASA WAN nɛ duk kpasa» na mbɛt.
Efraim ndaɗa in o géé-sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ é a̧ ha̧ a̧ dé!
Ɗoŋ gbɛɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ de nɛ mɔɔ-búù, ɓɛɛ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ fɛŋ nɛ tɛ.
Búk tɛ kai wa yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ búù tɛ ba wa nɛ oi mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Ɛnɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen n'am tɔ̧'ɛ:
Nutua ko
ɛnɛ o bíí nutua-wan mbɛt,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ nɛ de-a.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ kita tɛ tik'nɛ́,
wen ɛnɛ so nɛ o wi-gɔn-kita
nɛ duka nɛ pɛr-ba-naŋ sɛn Mispa,
in yɔk-ba-wi zu kaya Tabɔr.
Ɛnɛ yee tɛ yɔɔ-kaya bɔr ger'nɛ́.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ usi bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ lɛŋ.
Mi iŋa ndaa Efraim lɛŋ;
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ ko
Efraim, mɛ yee tɛ dee dàlà,
ɓɛɛ búù-a ba
Wa nyɛm mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na wen zu deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Wɔ dee dàlà ɔ ŋgaia tɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ wa iŋ GASA WAN ɓɔna.
Ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko
Efraim in
ɓɛɛ Juda tira yɔɔ-aa mbɛt in wa.
Nɛ̀ oi sami in ndai kɔ-wa nɛ wa kai nɛnɛ
mɛ kii nɛ GASA WAN'i,
wa beka kpa a̧ na,
wen a̧ yuu mgbara wa!
Wa dee mɔ ba tɛ GASA WAN,
wen o bem nɛ wa koa nɛ o be-dàlà.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, tɛ mbe-yi-zɛ wi beka iŋ oi wa
gu nɛ o fɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m zak sɛn Gibea,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia sɛn Rama,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbár biro ha̧ o wi Bɛt-Avɛn.
O be Bɛnjamin, mɔ a̧ hai'nɛ́ nɛ ɗoŋ tɛnɛ‘i!
Efraim tɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi
wese nɛ gasa bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu wa.
Wen’ɛ n'am tɔ̧ mgbara o duk be
O be-wan Juda nɛ o wi-ɗɔŋ-gbisi;
nyimsea kɔ‘m tɛ kai wa yaknɛ hee mbɛŋ ga.
Kita tika Efraim ɓɛɛ mɔ ba tɛ-a,
wen a̧ e ndaka ɗoŋ o gee tum mɔ duk na.
Wen zu mɔ‘i, mi tɛ duk hee zɛmɛ nɛ tɛ ɗaŋ Efraim ga,
ɓɛɛ mi duka hee dadaka nɛ tɛ ɗaŋ nutua ko Juda ga.
Efraim zɔka zɛ́ɛ́ kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ Juda zɔk da̧i̧ kɔ‘i mbɛt;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Efraim nɛ̀ɛ́ sitɛ Asirii,
ɓɛɛ tom o betom sitɛ gasa wannu.
Ɓɛɛ gasa wannu'i beka ha̧ daama h’ɛ́nɛ́ na,
kóó dea-a ha̧ da̧i̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ wii na mbɛt.
Wen nɛ́ mi GASA WAN a̧ tik zu Efraim hee dila ga,
ɓɛɛ mi tika zu nutua ko Juda hee daŋa-dila ga mbɛt;
mi tɛ a̧k kpoo-tɛ-wa a nù pɛ́sɛ́-pɛ́sɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi yaka kɔ‘m.
Mɔ n'am baa kaɗi,
wi-ɓara-a er-am yinɛ, bo na.
Mi tɛ yak mɔ kɔ‘m siɗoŋ si tɛ kɔ‘m,
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e wa dee ɗaŋmɔ
ha̧ wa mɛ kii am woyo,
wen mɛ nɛ zu bɔnɛ‘i a̧ wa tɛ kii nɛ‘m.
Ɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛɛ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN;
nɛ a̧ a̧ ee da̧i̧ tɛ yɛ,
ɓɛɛ kana nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ de ha̧ da̧i̧‘i mɛ wii;
nɛ a̧ a̧ gusa yɛ da̧i̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧ a̧ tɛ hɛr da̧i̧-a̧.
Zaŋ zɛ yiitoo a̧ tɛ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́ woyo,
ɓɛɛ tɛ taar-a, a̧ baa yɛ e ŋgɔn,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk in a̧.
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ há̧ ŋgai tɛ yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ iŋ GASA WAN.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wese nyaŋ nɛ daŋa-a na ga,
nɛ hegɔ a̧ GASA WAN tɛ tɛ nɛnɛ;
a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ yɛ hee mɛ nɛ kórò ga,
kóó hee wan mɛ nú-kórò nɛ hɔ a zu nù'ɛ ga.»
Ge mɔ ge a̧‘m tɛ de ha̧ mɛ ge, Efraim?
Ge a̧‘m tɛ de ha̧ mɛ ge, Juda?
Tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m
hɔɔ ŋmaa in kutu mɛ gɔna-ndaa-zan,
kóó hee mbɛŋ-tuyɛ nɛ duk ɓan na ɓɛɛ aia’ɛ ga.
Nɛ mɔ‘i a̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ qusi'nɛ́
nɛ̀ wen ko o
mi kuma'nɛ́ nɛ o wen mɛ nú‘m.
Kita kɔ‘m ɔ sa̧a̧ hee de gboo-ndaazan ga.
Nɛ́
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɗafa'm na;
nɛ́ iŋa Sɔ̧ a̧‘m kɔ̧a̧ gan
Ɛnɛ gbina
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Adam dee so ga.
Galad nɛ ɗaŋ ye-gbɛ-zu.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-kai-mɔ er-wi
gba nɛ mbaŋtol ha̧ wi-ɓir-war ga,
nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kum nɛ o bíí yuwar Sikɛm mɛ.
Mɔ nɛ wa de'i yaka zale.
Mɔ n'am zɔka nutua
mɛ nɛ fara'i a̧ Efraim de dàlà sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ búù-a ba
Mi gɔna ŋgimbi wen mɛ mbɛt, Juda;
ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ ɓɔna
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ mɔi̧ a̧ hee nyɔnɔ ga,
ha̧‘m mɛ kpai duka-a ko dukbíí kɔ‘m.
Ŋgimbi n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpasi
a̧ ɗaŋmɔ ko Efraim in ɗaŋ ko Samarii gboo nɛ zan.
Tom-dee kɔ-wa nɛ ɔra bíí kai nɛ mɔ kɔ-wa;
nɛ́ koma tua zu̧ nɛ mɔ,
in ɓara mɔ er bíí nɛ ŋgai nɛ zan nɛnɛ.
Ɗaŋ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ wa de lɛŋ‘i,
wa ta kɔ-wa'e mi iŋ na,
ɓɛɛ kinii, ɗaŋ tom nɔ‘i kɛra wa e see-a;
o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yɔ yí‘m na.
O wi nɔ‘i ba nɛ keta wannu in o be-wan
ɔr nɛ wa nɛ gɔna-kɔ̧-zaŋ,
ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ wa.
Wa lɛŋ nɛ o wi-de-dàlà.
Wa hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋga wee kɔ̧ lɔk
nɛ wi-dɔ-brɛt yea,
n'aa beka tusi nú gua na
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mbɔɗa fuu kura sɛ.
Wese gbaŋa ko wannu,
dɔ̧ɔ̧ á nɛ wee tɛ o be-wan,
ɓɛɛ wannu ee tɛ mɛ duk in o wi-ɔr-a.
Wa ɗɔla pii katɛ a̧ nɛ ŋga-see
hee wee kɔ̧ lɔk ga;
see-wa duna nɛ ɔramɔ.
Mɛ zɛ ɓɛɛ ŋga nyimsea kɔ-wa deŋa,
kà mɔ sa̧ ɓɛɛ misa̧ woyo.
Wa lɛŋ, tɛ-wa ɔ kpɔra
hee wee kɔ̧ lɔk ga.
Wa dɔɔ o gasawi kɔ-wa a nù gbuɗuk;
o wannu kɔ-wa tira a nu gbéyéŋ,
ŋma bíí kpɔk mɛ sa mɔ pii tɛ‘m bo na.
Efraim yee ŋmaa in o gɔni-duk;
Efraim nɛ makala nɛ‘i tɛ ha̧n wii na.
O gɛnɛ baa ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ,
a̧ iŋ kɔ̧-a̧ na;
mbui nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ hɔɔ zu-a lɛŋ, a̧ iŋ na!
Ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko
ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na;
ɓɛɛ zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ wa kii a̧ na mbɛt.
Efraim hɔɔ ŋmaa in mgbélé gbaku̧i nɛ ta mɔ ɗuk na;
a̧ sa mɔ si Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛɛ nɛa-a tɛ Asirii.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa a̧a̧ tɛ nɛa-a,
mi pi̧i̧ yɔk kɔ‘m zu wa
ba nɛ wa pi̧ nù hee nɔ̧́í̧ ga;
mi kaia wa ŋgimbi mɔi̧a ŋmaa kɔ-wa.
Ŋgamɔ a̧ kpa wa wen wa yu nɛ‘m!
Bɔnɛ a̧ tik zu wa wen ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ̀ɛ́ kpasi wa,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ dee ndela zu'm!
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa gɔfi nɛ mɔ gɔn gado kɔ-wa,
bo nɛ see kpɔk a̧ wa ai nɛ nú ha̧‘m na;
wa á nɛ da̧i̧ tɛ-wa
wen kpaa alkamaari in nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ wa de'i,
wa dé nɛ́ ŋgazu in am.
Nɛ́ mi a̧‘m ha̧a̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa,
ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ baa ɗaŋ keta zu'm.
Wa á̧ pia ɗoŋ ndé, bó nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m na.
Wa duk hee dɔ́mgbá kusaa ga;
o gasawi kɔ-wa tɛ kum nú gba-paa wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ-nú,
ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ zɛkɛɗi wa mam nɛnɛ sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m mbia!
Ŋgamɔ tika zu tua ko GASA WAN
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zua ɗum nɛnɛ'ɛ ga,
wen o be
bɛ̧ nɛ usamɔ kɔ‘m.
Wa saa mɔ pii tɛ‘m'e:
«Sɔ̧ ko
ɛɛ iŋa'nɛ!»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ
wisɛn à̧ nás’à.
Wa dee wan ha̧ o bíí, e nɛ o gasawi,
wa ak am na.
Wa kaia o bu-sede in lɔr kɔ-wa,
dui nɛ o géé-sɔ̧,
nɛ tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ yɔ sɔɔ gee.
Samarii, be ndai nɛ mɛ duia'i de tɛ‘m na;
see-am ɗaŋa zu mɛ.
Yuwar deemɔ ko o be
tɛ sa̧ bɔɔ mɛ gese ge?
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ gasi'i nɛ mɔɔ-er-Israɛl,
nɛ́ wi-dui-mɔ a̧ dea a̧;
Sɔ̧ bo a̧‘i na.
Be ndai ko Samarii'i tɛ mbaŋ a nù ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ.
Búk n’ɛnɛ kii'i, nɛ gba búk-kórò ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ kpa.
Alkamaari k’ɛ́nɛ́ beka de yi,
sɛ́k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpa nɛ fuu-aa na.
Kóó ɛnɛ kpaa so, o gɔni bíí tɛ kai er'nɛ́ yinɛ.
O gɔni-duk hu̧ra
ɓɛɛ
Wa yuu mɔ sitɛ Asirii nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa
in tuifuu-zaŋbɛɛ nɛ yar kɔ‘i ɛ̀nɛ̀'ɛ ga.
Efraim ɗɔra tɛ hee kó-dàlà ga,
kii nɛ bíí mɛ ye ɗoŋ-wi.
Kóó wa ha̧a̧ so mɔ ha̧ o gɔni-duk mɛ ye ɗoŋ-wa,
mi tɛ mɔi̧ wa kinii,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ɗoŋ tikiɗi,
wa tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko gasa wannu.
Dɔka o
wen baa ɗaŋmɔ yínɛ́'ɛ,
kifa duk nɛ fara-de-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
O heembea kɔ‘m booro n'am yɔra ha̧ wa,
wa zɔk hee ŋma gɔni bíí a̧ ha̧a̧ ga.
Ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mɛ nɛ wen gbɛɛ saɗi,
nyɔŋ nɛ kpoo-aa.
Wɔ mur mɔ nɛ gbɛ wa'i,
wa a̧ nyɔŋ nɛ nyɔŋa-a ɛ̧́!
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kpa desee
tɛ mɔ‘i nɛ wa de'i na;
tɛ-a bi ɗoŋ yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa'i na.
A̧ tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa zu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa de'i,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zik tɛ mɛ si ɗoŋ si Egiptɛ woyo!
Tɛ
a̧ dee o tua-wan a nù nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ Juda de kɔ‘i nɛ zɔm o ye-ŋgárá
Kɔ‘m, mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ o ye
in o tua-wan nɔ‘i bìí wee a nù gbuɗuk.
Ká mɛ de tortɛ na,
ká nyɛŋɛ pi̧ mɛ hee o ŋma dukbíí ga na,
wen mɛ ee Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ duk wen zu dàlà kɔ-mɛ.
Kpaa mɔɔ-oi ndiŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ
nɛ̀ fara-gusi-alkamaari nɛnɛ,
dee so tɛ-mɛ;
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa alkamaari mɛ gusi
in dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ vati ɓɔna,
sɛka bó nɛ̀ nyɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɔ na mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ beka duk tɛ nù ko GASA WAN ɓɔna.
Efraim tɛ zik tɛ siɗoŋ si Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ sɛn Asirii mɛ wa tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ ndiŋmɔ.
Wa beka tɛn zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ a nù
ha̧ GASA WAN ɓɔna;
ɗafa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa beka de tɛ-a na,
tɛ́ duk nɛ nyɔŋmɔ-simbo.
O bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɔŋ, simbo tɛ ba wa.
Nyɔŋmɔ‘i tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ wa;
mɔ kpɔk, beka ye kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN na.
Nɛ́ ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ de wese gbaŋa
ko GASA WAN nɛ duk nɛ gasa wese ge?
Wa yuu mɔ ká wa kum;
wa tɛ ye Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ Mɛmfis guna wa.
Mɔ tɛ da̧ hu̧r mbɔi kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ tɛn-dara kpee bɛɛ-oi kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Wese kpa mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ hɔɔ kaɗi;
dawa yee zu
gba gbana ba bíí ko Sɔ̧
wen zu gasa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ
in zɔm bɔnɛ nɛ tika zu mɛ.
ɓɛɛ wa tui nɛ pɛr ha̧ a̧ dam fara kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ
nasi nɛ a̧ hɔ kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ.
Nɛ́ mgbák gasa ɗaŋmɔ a̧ wa dea,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa dee so sɛn Gibea ga.
Tɛ GASA WAN bi ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dea'i na;
wa tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
hee mɛ nɛ waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ‘i kpa ŋga-gbárà ga.
O zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́ duka yí‘m
hee kuti waya mbɔ́ra ga,
ɓɛɛ hɔa-a kɔ-wa sɛn Bal-Pɛɔr, wa pi̧i̧ tɛ-wa tɛ mɔɔ-búù,
ɓɛɛ wa kifi nɛ mɔɔ-ndiŋ
hee o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ see-wa baa ga.
Gasamɔ ko Efraim tɛ bu̧i yak hee nɔ̧́í̧ ga;
o kóò kɔ-wa beka ba zaŋ,
kà bó nɛ̀ kóó bem ɓɔna.
À̧ nɛ́ kòò so o ŋma bem mɛ dai wa,
mi tɛ kai wa yinɛ er-wa nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ de bíí.
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ e o wi nɔ'ɔ duk,
oe bɔnɛ nɛ wa tɛ zɔk wa!
Tɛ zɔka mɔ kɔ‘m,
o bem ko Efraim duk yí-a
hee o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ n'aa e
ha̧ o bíí mɛ hai mɛ gbɛ wa ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ de, GASA WAN!
Ge ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ de in wa ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé há̧ o kóò kɔ-wa mɛ yar ndɔra.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ ber-wa mɛ ndaɗi!
Ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ gboo zan sɛn Gilgal mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧‘m ku̧u̧ nɛ naŋ sɛna wa.
Mi tɛ ndak wa kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m yinɛ,
wen ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa de'i;
mi beka kɔ̧ wa ɓɔna,
wen o gasawi kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ o wi-ŋgazu.
Mɔ baa tɛ Efraim kaɗi;
ku̧nin-a kora ɓɛɛ a̧ beka wai ɓɔna.
Kóó wa a̧ ko nɛ bem,
mi tɛ gbɛ o bem nɔ‘i nɛ ba see-wa hegɔ‘i.
Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m tɛ bɛ̧ wa
wen wa zii wen nú-a na;
wa tɛ yambali nɛ mgbara o gɔni-duk nɛnɛ.
Waya-a a̧ dɔk'i,
ɓɛɛ
tortɛ nù kɔ-wa nɛ ɓɔ‘i pi̧i̧ wa
tɛ ɗafa ta-zu-nù nɛ dee gan kuti-a.
Taamɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo;
kinii, wa tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ oi-aa,
wen GASA WAN tɛ ɗaŋ o
a̧ tɛ mbaŋ o sɛka-ta nɔ‘i yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧:
«Kinii'i, ɛɛ bó nɛ̀ wannu ɓɔna,
wen ɛɛ yu GASA WAN na.
Wannu tɛ̀ɛ́ de so nɛ ge h’ɛ́ɛ́ ge?»
Mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ gee tum wen
in kana mɔ nɛ ndela
ká bá nɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔk in o bíí nɛnɛ.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a duk yí-wa
hee ɗaŋ be ɓɔɔ-te kpɛɛfɔ ga.
Tɛ o bíí Samarii nak naki
wen be ndai nɛ wa duia so sɛn Bɛt-Avɛn.
Wa zim nɛ fio in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧-a mbɛt.
Ɛ̧ɛ̧ n'aa yɔɔ mgbara wa kaɗi’ɛ,
wa a̧ zɔn gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ gɔ!
Wa tɛ ba be ndai'i nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ nɛnɛ ha̧ gasa wannu;
ziimɔ tɛ tik zu Efraim
ɓɛɛ búù tɛ ba
wen o géé-sɔ̧ n'aa duia so.
Samarii kifa gee tum mɔ mbulɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ wannu Samarii kifi kɔ‘i duk
hee kɔ́k-wa̧a̧ zu yi ga.
O ɗaŋ
nɛ
tɛn in tɛn-dara tɛ hɔ
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋgimbi'i a̧ wa tɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o kaya'e nde:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpé zu yɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o zu-tɔ̧́‘e nde:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tír a zu yɛ!»
ɓɛɛ wa ɓɔn kana tɛ dea-a nɛnɛ.
Hegɔ, biro beka bi o ɗaŋwi nɔ‘i sɛn Gibea mɛ na nde?
Mi tɛ nɛ mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa.
Wen zu ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dee war yiitoo'i,
o dukbíí tɛ e nú mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa.
Efraim hɔɔ so ŋmaa in be-zɔŋa ndai
nɛ‘i usa tom-gusa-alkamaari ha̧ a̧ nɛ de-a;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'am pi̧i̧ kpáŋá tɛ bɔ̧i̧a̧ ger-a.
Juda duk kɔ‘i tɛ waa fɔ,
ɓɛɛ Jakob gbur kɔ‘i nɛ keekee-gbuti-nù.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gún nɛ mɔ nɛ duk nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ mɔi̧ demɔ oi-aa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m mbe fɔ,
wen kinii, nɛ́ ŋgimbi kia GASA WAN
ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɛ mɛ de demɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɔ n’ɛnɛ guna so nɛ́ ɗáŋ,
ɓɛɛ s’ɛnɛ mɔi̧ ɗaŋmɔ;
ɛnɛ nyɔŋa waya ndela k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ e ta nɛ keekee-biro,
in o gba gii wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ga,
biro tɛ bi o ye k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ o ŋgárá k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbin a nù lɛŋ
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Salmaŋ ɗaŋa so nɛ Bɛt-Arbɛl lɔkɔti-lɔkɔti’ɛ ga.
Ŋgimbi'i wa kuma o nàá-wan-bem in o bem kɔ-wa.
Nɛ́ kale mɔ‘i a̧ tɛ hɔ zu'nɛ́, o be
wen ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaka zale.
Mɔ be tɛ̀ɛ́ gɔn, ɓɛɛ wi beka iŋ oi wannu k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna.
«Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ so
ŋgimbi n'aa biti so nɛ geɗek-a;
mi saa bem kɔ‘m gbonɛ nɛ Egiptɛ mɛ.
Mi a̧‘m sa wa pii tɛ‘m'i,
ɓɛɛ wa yak kɔ-wa yak nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m;
wa yaka ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ Bal,
dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧.
Zu-a'i, nɛ mi a̧ usa so ɗoŋ pi̧i̧ naŋ ha̧ Efraim;
nɛ mi a̧ kasa so er-a mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ a̧ iŋ‘e, mɛ̀ nɛ́ mi a̧ dai a̧ na!
Mi dee mɔ in a̧ hee bíí ga nɛ
mi baa a̧ e yí-see-am
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de nɛnɛ in be zɔɗi’ɛ ga;
mi nyɛi̧a nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ mbɛt.
«Kinii, o be
ɓɛɛ nɛ Asirii a̧ tɛ ɔ wan zu wa, wen wa bɛ̧a̧‘m.
Gba-paa tɛ de ŋgamɔ ye kɔ-wa,
ɗaŋ nɛ ŋgárá kɔ-wa,
kum nɛ wa a nù
wen zu ɗaŋ baa keta kɔ-wa.
O bíí kɔ‘m ɓɔn kana tɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ am siti;
wi sa wa mɛ kur takaɗi.
«Efraim, mi tɛ e bɔɔ mɛ duk hee ge?
Mi tɛ de mɔ in mɛɛ hee mɔ n'am dee so
in o ye Adma in Seboyim ga hee ge?
See-am ɗaŋ ɗaŋ nyɛmna;
ko de'm dee batɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Mi beka pɛm nɛ nyima see-am na,
mi beka ta mɔ mɛ ɗaŋ Efraim yinɛ ɓɔna mbɛt,
wen mi nɛ Sɔ̧, mi bo nɛ gee bíí na.
Mi nɛ Sa̧a̧ Wi mgbara'nɛ́;
mi beka tɛ, mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ na.»
O wi nɛ yaka so
tɛ ndak pata GASA WAN.
A̧ tɛ mgbimgbi hee dila ga;
a̧ be tɛ̀ɛ́ tuɓi,
ɓɛɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ mɔi̧ tɛnɛ
nɛ gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ yee-wese mɛ.
Wa tɛ gar tɛnɛ hee soŋdɔya ga
nɛ Egiptɛ mɛ nɛ gɔna-ɗɛɗɛ;
wa tɛ tɛ hee o gbaku̧i ga nɛ Asirii mɛ mbɛt,
«ɓɛɛ mi kaia wa piinɛ ɗoŋ nù kɔ-wa woyo.»
Nɛ mi GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Efraim gɔna ɗoŋ-am nɛ ndela;
nutua
ɓɛɛ Juda ɓɔn kɔ‘i tɛ nɛɛ nɔ in Sɔ̧,
mbo nɛ zu ha̧ Wan nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧ nyɛmna.
Nyɔŋmɔ ko Efraim nɛ búk;
a̧ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ búk mɛ daŋa-wese hegɔ zɛ de nɛnɛ,
de nɛ dɔka ŋgamɔ nɛnɛ.
A̧ nɔɔ tɔk in Asirii,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kai nɔ nɛnɛ si Egiptɛ mɛ.
GASA WAN a̧a̧ nɛ wen in Juda;
a̧ tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ Jakob nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Jakob baa fara ko zɔmwi kɔ‘i
nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ-wa mɛ tɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ n'aa gasa kaɗi, a̧ bìí biro in Sɔ̧.
Jakob bìí biro in betom ko Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gan a̧;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ ai nɛ nú ha̧ a̧.
A̧ kpaa ŋmaa in Sɔ̧ sɛn Bɛtɛl,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wen ha̧ a̧.
Mɛ nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
mgbák nin-a nɛ‘i tɛ zɔn nɛ a̧,
nɛ́ GASA WAN.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
mɛ̀ dúk tɛ mboozu,
de nɛ mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
e nɛ ta nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Efraim hɔɔ ŋmaa in o be Kanaŋ
nɛ mɔɔ-we-mɔ kɔ-wa nyɛm sɛnɛ na,
nɛ wa zu̧ nɛ̀ bíí.
A̧‘e nde, wi kia kɔ‘i nɛ dɔka mbɔi,
ɓɛɛ wi kpa mɔ.
Tɛ tom nɛ‘i dee lɛŋ,
ŋma be yɔɔ-kaya ha̧ bíí mɛ tɔ̧ wen zu-a bo na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
nɛ̀ nú Egiptɛ mɛ tɛnɛ;
mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ ɔ kɔ̧ tua-laa woyo
hee ŋgimbi-kpaa-ŋmaa
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ o
mi tɛ hɔ zu ha̧ wa gan kuti-a,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e lizaŋ kɔ‘m sɛn nú-wa mbɛt.
Mɔ ko Galad lɛŋ nɛ ndela,
wa kifa nɛ geemɔ;
wa kaɗi gbɛɛ wiwii-ndai ɗafi nɛ géé-sɔ̧ sɛn Gilgal na;
o
ya hee yumba duk-ta sɛn kpɛɛfɔ ga.
Jakob yuu so mɔ si bɔkɔ-nú Aram mɛ;
sɛn hi̧i̧
GASA WAN toma ŋma
mgbɔ nɛ
nɛ́
Efraim dee mɔɔ-tu̧-see Sɔ̧ nɛ ɗaŋ-a,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kɔ̧-a̧ de
ha̧ simbo-gbɛɛzu ko Efraim'i mɛ si ɗoŋ zu a̧;
a̧ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-búù kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Efraim tɔ̧ so wen,
kíì dee o bíí lɛŋ sɛn
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee ɗaŋmɔ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ o géé-sɔ̧ Bal,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i gbɛ a̧.
Kinii’ɛ, wa de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ siti;
wa duia gee mɔ pi̧ nù mɛ gasi,
kai nɛ bu-mbɔi kɔ-wa ɓo nɛ géé-sɔ̧ mbɛt,
nɛ duk nɛ mɔ nɛ wi-iŋ-tom dea.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zu o wi nɔ‘i a̧ o bíí tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e,
wa ɗafi nɛ o be ndai nɛ wa ɓoa'i dui nɛ nú-wa!
Wen zu mɔ‘i, wa tɛ ya hee kutu mɛ gɔna mɔ ga,
wa tɛ duk hee mbɛŋ nɛ duk ɓan na, ɓɛɛ aia’ɛ ga,
wa tɛ ya hee pumyulu-alkamaari
nɛ búk kai pɛsi a taŋ'ɛ ga,
kóó hee zi-wee nɛ tur nɛ woi-tua fati̧i̧ gbonɛ'ɛ ga.
Mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ nɛ nú Egiptɛ mɛ tɛnɛ;
ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ mɛ iŋa gan am bo na;
ŋma wan-kpasi mɛ yak zu'm bo na mbɛt.
Mi iŋa mɛ́
fara nɛ gbɛ̧ŋmɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ hɔɔ kpa de fara-nyɔŋ-mɔ kaɗi,
ɛnɛ nyɔŋa mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur;
ɗoŋ nɛ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sura kaɗi,
ɛnɛ dee ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́ bi ɗoŋ-am!
Hegɔ, mi tɛ kpɔr in'nɛ̀ɛ́ hee dila ga;
mi tɛ mgbuti ká̧ war hee gɔ̧ ga mɛ ba'nɛ́.
Mi tɛ tik mgbara'nɛ́ hee ŋma nàá-koe-nam
nɛ‘i kai o bem kɔ̧-a̧ yaknɛ ga.
Mi tɛ ŋguɗi see'nɛ́ ŋman yinɛ;
mi tɛ nyɔŋ kpoo-tɛ‘nɛ ɓɔn kpɔk bɛɗɛ hee nana dila ga,
ɓɛɛ o boko-nam tɛ a̧k'nɛ́ a nù pɛ́sɛ́-pɛ́sɛ́.
Nɛ́ mi kpɔk a̧ nyɛma mɛ kpasi'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Wannu k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ tɛ́ɛ̀ kpasi'nɛ́ sɛn saaye k’ɛ́nɛ́ gɔ!
Wannu in o gasawi n’ɛnɛ ak so mɔ‘e
a'i ha̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ wo’ɛ a̧a̧ bɔɔ de?
Nɛ́ tɛ ɗaŋsee a̧‘m ha̧a̧ nɛ wannu h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ nyimsea a̧‘m ba nɛ a̧ yinɛ mbɛt.
Mi tɔra ɗaŋmɔ ko Efraim nɛ dama-a,
ɓɛɛ mi ba e.
Nyimmɔ tɛ kpa kana a̧ hee nyima-zaŋ-ko-bem ga,
ɓɛɛ bem n'aa de mɛ kɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋ mgbélé obem;
ŋgimbi hɔ̧fa̧-a̧ tik nù hɔɔ kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ gboa-a kɔ̧ zaŋ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, a̧‘m gɔn zu wa
ká wa ye fara ko o fio nde?
A̧‘m kpasi wa tɛ fio nde?
Fio, o zɛɛ-geŋa kɔ-mɛ a̧a̧ de?
Ye ko o fio, ŋga mɔɔ-gbɛ-bíí kɔ-mɛ a̧a̧ dee?
Ko bo yí‘m sitɛ wa ɓɔna!
Efraim duk nɛ de-a mgbara o nya-a̧, ɓɛɛ gbak a̧ na,
wen mi tɛ tom búk nɛ war yiwese pii zu a̧.
Mi GASA WAN, mi tɛ de
ha̧ búk kɔ‘m mɛ yu nɛ war ŋga-gbárà,
ɓɛɛ yì tɛ ɔ̧sa̧ kor tá̧í̧-tá̧í,
hegɔ wa tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kai demɔ lɛŋ yaknɛ.
O bíí Samarii tɛ zɔk kana bɔnɛ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa,
wen wa dee ŋgazu in Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Gba-paa tɛ gbɛ wa,
ɓɛɛ tɛ kum o be-zɔɗi bem kɔ-wa,
wa tɛ vuti zaŋ o nàá-zaŋ.
Hegɔ,
wen yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tir yɔɔ-mɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ tɛ GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen nɔ'ɔ ha̧ a̧:
«Nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ ba ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ yinɛ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɛ́k mɔ nɛ ɔ dee.
Wiwii-ndai n’ɛɛ ɗafi nɛ̀ ɛnɛ'ɛ
usi nɛ wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú yɛ.
Asirii nyɛm mɛ kpasi yɛ na,
ɛɛ beka sa mɔ nɛ er yɛ dea'e, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ ɓɔna.
Ɛnɛ nɛ wan-de-ko ha̧ o be-oi.»
Mi tɛ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgazu kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ kɔ̧ wa nɛ mbetɛ.
Mi tɛ fo nyimsea kɔ‘m yinɛ zu wa.
Mi tɛ duk tɛ-a hee mɛ nɛ mbɛŋ ga,
hegɔ a̧ tɛ ɓɔ nɛ de-a hee mɛ nɛ gba-dɛŋ ga,
ɓɛɛ ku̧nin-a yee nù nɛ ɗuka-a
hee kunin-te kɔ̧ kombo Libaŋ ga.
A̧ tɛ gba er-a nɛ gasa-a;
gba de tɛ-a tɛ duk hee te-nɔ́ ga,
ɓɛɛ pɛr tɛ-a kura ɓisisi
hee pɛr kɔ̧́ kombo Libaŋ mɛ ga.
O bíí nɛ yaa so ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ-a nɛti tɛ pii ɗoŋ;
wa tɛ dɛm alkamaari woyo,
wa tɛ do hee waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga,
ɓɛɛ nin-wa tɛ hu̧r hee dɔ̧ɔ̧ Libaŋ ga.
Efraim, nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ tɛ kii sitɛ o géé-sɔ̧ ɓɔ ge?
wen nɛ́ mi'i zii kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mi'i dai mɛ mbɛt.
Mi duk hee
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen zu'm a̧ nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ dɛm nɛnɛ.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ boa,
a̧ tɛ zii mgbara wen ko Osee.
Wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ tɛ iŋ mɔ‘i a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nde?
Yuwar ko GASA WAN ɔ tana;
o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ nɛ nɔ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ŋgazu tir kɔ‘i nɛ yɔɔ-aa.
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔɛl bem ko Pɛtuɛl nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Ɛnɛ o
ɛnɛ o bíí nu Juda lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yéŋ zer'nɛ́.
Pɛrti mɔ hegɔ hɔɔ tɛ ŋgimbi k’ɛ́nɛ́,
kóó tɛ ŋgimbi ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti kaɗi?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ nyɛrɛ mɔ'ɔ ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa,
ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ mɛ ɗoŋ.
Mɔ nɛ nàá-dɔɔsɔ̧ɔ̧ ea,
nàá-wazala nyɔŋa.
Mɔ nɛ nàá-wazala ea,
nɛ́ gba-dɔya a̧ nyɔŋa;
mɔ nɛ gba-dɔya ea,
nɛ́ ndondo-gba-dɔya a̧ nyɔŋa yinɛ lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tún, o wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ kɔ̧a̧;
ɛnɛ o wi-nɔ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú‘nɛ́
wen nɛ̀ mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ bo h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nɔ ɓɔna.
O gii gba-dɔya bi nɛ nu kɔ‘m,
wa ɔ ŋgaya, wi nyɛm mɛ tɔr wa na;
gba̧a̧-nin-wa nɛ́ nin dila,
o goko-wa nɛ́ goko nana dila.
Wa dee ha̧ fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘m mɛ kifi geemɔ,
wa ɓira o te-mbɔra kɔ‘m a nu sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́-sɛ́kɛ́ɗɛ́.
Wa ɗaŋa mɔ hús-hús,
ɓɛɛ gbaa-er-te fɛŋ buu.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɛ́ see'nɛ́ hee be-zɔŋa
nɛ pi̧i̧ laa-zim-fio hi̧i̧ nɛ fio wii-zɔŋa kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Aa-zɛzɛ nu in ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN bo ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ ya nɛ
o wi-de-tom ko GASA WAN hi̧i̧ nɛ fio.
Wa ɗaŋa o fɔ lɛŋ,
nù hí̧í̧ nɛ́ fio.
Wa ɗaŋa alkamaari, mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ bo ɓɔna,
mbe nɔ bo ɓɔna mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ yá nɛ ɗaŋsee, ɛnɛ o wi-wa-fɔ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú‘nɛ́ o wi-gun-waya-te
wen zu alkamaari in be-fon.
Nyɔnɔ sɛn kpɛɛfɔ ɗaŋa lɛŋ.
Nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kora lɛŋ,
do te-mbɔra ɗaŋa ai a nu,
kóɓò, ndɛŋgɛ, ndìà,
o te kpɛɛfɔ lɛŋ kora;
desee bo mgbara bíí ɓɔna.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ pí̧ laa-zim-fio, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ fio;
o wi-de-tom zu fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú‘nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ, o wi-de-tom ko Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ gáɓí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ bufu duk nɛnɛ mɔ sa̧,
wen ha̧a̧mɔ in aa-zɛzɛ bo kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbéá wen zima yi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá sara mɔi̧a-a wen gasa Sɔ̧,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o
si kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú sitɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Wese ko GASA WAN hɛɗa kaɗi,
wese nɛ Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ ba ɗaŋamɔ tɛnɛ.
Oee ɗaŋ wese kíì wa!
Bo nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ɓana nɛ yí yɛ na nde?
Bo nɛ tortɛ in nyɛŋɛ kaɗa kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN
nɛ yi yɛ mbɛt na nde?
O nyɔnɔ lɛŋ fee ɗɔɔ ŋga kora nu;
o fara-a-nyɔnɔ ɗaŋa,
o dam gbina wen alkamaari bo ɓɔna.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí gee dɔma-a nɛ o mɔ-dai dɔm;
ndai zɔk nɛ bɔnɛ
wen wa bó nɛ̀ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔna;
bɔnɛ tika zu o sami mbɛt.
Mi ai nɛ nú sitɛ‘nɛ́, GASA WAN,
wen wee dɔ nɛ zɔ̧ fara nɛ o ndai nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ;
leɓe-wee dɔɔ o te zaŋbɛɛ lɛŋ a nu.
O saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ zik nɛ tɛ pii tɛ‘nɛ́;
foka-yì ɔ̧sa̧ gɔn mgbót-mgbót.
Zɔ̧ fara nɛ o ndai nyɔŋ mɔ sɛnɛ bia wee lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m zak zu sa̧a̧ kaya
ɛnɛ o bíí nu’ɛ lɛŋ, tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ nak,
wese ko GASA WAN a̧ tɛ‘i,
wese'i hɛɗa kaɗi.
Wese'i nɛ wese ɗuka tum,
wese tu̧-zan in zɔm kutu.
O gii gba-dɔya a̧ tɛ‘i
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zɛ de nɛnɛ zu o kaya ga;
wa ɔ dɔka in wa ɔ ŋgaya.
Wi tɛ zɔk pɛrti mɔ hegɔ nɛti na,
in wi beka zɔk hegɔ woyo ɓɔna
hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o bezaŋ mɛ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Wa ɗaŋ nɛ o mɔ ti wa lɛŋ
hee wee nɛ bíí zɔ̧'ɛ ga;
nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-wa nɛ́ leɓe-wee a̧ ndar mɔ nɛnɛ.
Nɛti hɔa-a kɔ-wa, nu duka so nɛ́ de mbɔŋgi hee Fɔ Edɛn ga;
ɗoŋ yaka-a kɔ-wa, nu kifa nɛ gee ŋga-gbárà;
ŋma mɔ nɛ wa ee duk bo na.
Wa ya hee o nyaŋa ga;
wa ma yi hee o nyaŋa-biro ga.
Wa kpíɗí nɛ o zu kaya nɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ duk hee wi zii nɛ giti o keekee-biro
in hee tuɓa-a ko leɓe-wee nɛ bíí kora zɔ̧'ɛ ga.
Wa tɛ hee o ŋga dukbíí
nɛ nɛka wen biro ga.
Tɛ hɔa-a kɔ-wa, tɛ o dukbíí gbina gbɛlɛsuwɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ kíì dee ha̧ sɔnti-wa mɛ kpai.
O gba-dɔya tik biro hee o ŋga-wi ga,
wa daŋ garo hee o wi-biro ga,
kóó o nde ba nɛ yuwar kɔ‘i;
wa a̧r war na.
Wa gɔn ti ŋmaa na;
kóó o nde ba nɛ yuwar kɔ‘i tan ti.
Kɔ-wa nɛ yaka zu mɔ nɛ gɔn ti wa;
ŋma mɔ nyɛm mɛ dor wa na.
Kɔ-wa nɛ pɛsa-a dam saaye,
ma nɛ yi nɛ o zu ŋgeŋ, daŋ nɛ o tua,
ye nɛnɛ nɛ o woi-aa hee o wi-zuzu ga.
Ka wa nɛ siti ɓɛɛ nu nak nak ti wa;
duk hee yiwese tɛ bin bin ga.
Wese ba ɓɔna,
o sɔra in nyaŋa-zɛ tok ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ tiger GASA WAN mgbimgbi ti o wi-biro kɔ‘i;
o duk wi-biro nɛ zii wen nú-a ɔ dɔka in wa ɔ ŋgaya.
Wese ko GASA WAN tɛ duk nɛ ŋga wese
nɛ tɛ pi̧ kíì tɛ bíí.
Nɛ o'o tɛ kpasi wese'i o?
«Kinii nɛ ŋgimbi
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ.
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím yi, ɛ̀nɛ̀ hí̧í̧ kɔ̧a̧;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú ha̧‘m.
A̧ka̧ laa k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ŋma mɔ ha̧‘m na.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí nɛ duka-a k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̧́.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ pii tɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́;
a̧ nɛ́ yaa-de-demɔ in a̧ nɛ wi-de-ko;
see-aa nyim nɛ haya-a na
in a̧ e
Ɓan na a̧ ee dee ŋgamɔ in bíí duk kaɗi.
O'o iŋa o, ŋmafara GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpai taamɔ woyo,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ o demɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́;
hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ ha̧ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ aa zɛzɛ ha̧ a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́m zak sɛn
ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbéá wen zima yi,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá sara mɔi̧a-a wen gasa Sɔ̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ dukbíí
ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá sa̧a̧ giiwi mɛ mɔi̧ wen gasa Sɔ̧
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ o gbɛ́rɛ́, o be-ŋgaiwi
in o obem nú-bere mbɛt.
O wi nɛ baa ŋmaa nɛ mbe-a
a̧ e tua-ba-ŋmaa kɔ-wa duk,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ tɛ.
O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ de tom ha̧ GASA WAN
a̧ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN,
mgbara nú-zala in fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ wa a̧ ai nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
«GASA WAN, ɛɛ nɛ dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́!
Ɛɛ nɛ mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ mɔɔ-búù mɛ tik zu yɛ na!
K’ɛ́nɛ́ de ha̧ o ŋma gɔni bíí mɛ mam yɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
‹Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ bɔɔ dee nde?› na.»
See GASA WAN baa nù kɔ‘i nyɛmna;
a̧ dee ko ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi nú ha̧ wa tɛ kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa'e:
«Mi tɛ ha̧ alkamaari, mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ in mbe nɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ woyo;
ɛnɛ tɛ kpa o mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ dɔka-a.
Mi beka de ha̧ búù mɛ ba'nɛ́ ti o gɔni bíí ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ ndak o gba-dɔya
nɛ tɛ tɛ nɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn
nɛ nyɛi̧a-a si ŋga-gbárà mɛ.
Mi tɛ ndak o wí-nɛ̀-gɔ̀n-zù kɔ-wa
a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp-tɔŋ nɛ war daŋa-wese,
ɓɛɛ mi ndaka o wi-kpe-ndaa-gɔtɔ
a ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp Tɔŋ nɛ war yee-wese.
Pɛ̀r wɔr-wa tɛ nun nɛ ŋgaya-a,
ɓɛɛ zaŋa ŋmaa in búk ɓókólók.»
Nɛ mbetɛ, wa ɗaŋa so mɔ nyɛmna!
Kɔ-mɛ, nu’ɛ, ká mɛ de kíì na;
mɛ̀ kpá desee, mɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ
wen GASA WAN de nɛ o gasamɔ.
Ɛnɛ o saɗi, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kíì ɓɔna,
wen mbɔɗi zɔ̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɓɔa-a,
o te waia kaɗi,
o te-mbɔra in waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ yá zúk-zúk gee.
Ɛnɛ o wi nɛ ɔ sɛn
ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpá desee, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé nyɛŋɛ
wen zu GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ mɛ tiger-bɛɛ wen gbaka'nɛ́;
a̧ tɛ de ha̧ kórò tiger-bɛɛ
in wan mɛ nu kórò mɛ hɔ nɛ dɔka-a hee nɛti ga.
O fara-gusi-alkamaari tɛ dun;
o gba kpánà tɛ dun nɛ̀ mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧ in mbe nɔ̧́.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi tɛ ha̧ mbe mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́ woyo
oi o nyɔnɔ nɛ o ŋga wi-biro kɔ‘m,
o nàá-dɔɔsɔ̧ɔ̧, o nàá-wazala,
o gba-dɔya in o ndondo-gba-dɔya ɗaŋa,
wen nɛ́ mi a̧ toma so wa mɛ bi'nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ‘nɛ́ sur,
ɛnɛ tɛ gas'am, mi GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nɛ dee o gba demɔ wen'nɛ́;
hegɔ foe beka de dukbíí kɔ‘m woyo ɓɔna.
Hegɔ ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nde,
mi a̧a̧ sɛn mgbara'nɛ́, o be
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ mi nɛ zu'm,
ŋma bo na.
Hegɔ foe beka de dukbíí kɔ‘m woyo ɓɔna.»
Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ siti:
«Mi tɛ ha̧
o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-a
tɛ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧;
o gbɛ́rɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ zu,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ hɔ zu ha̧ o be-ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, kóó nɛ wi-de-tom, kóó nɛ kó-de-tom,
mi tɛ ha̧
«Mi tɛ de mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn yiwese in sɛn zu nu;
bíí tɛ zɔk tɔk in wee ká bá nɛ̀ tura zi-wee.
Wese tɛ ba tum,
ɓɛɛ nyaŋa-zɛ tɛ gbɛ̧ zóŋ-zóŋ hee tɔk ga
nɛti sɛka wese ko GASA WAN hɔa.
Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ gasa wese in wese-ŋgamɔ.»
Hegɔ ɓɛɛ kóó o nde nɛ tɛ sa nin GASA WAN tɛ kpasi;
o bíí nɛ GASA WAN tɛ hok tɛ kpasi tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i
sɛn zu kaya
hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Ŋgimbi'i,
mi tɛ ɗafi Juda in Jerusalɛm
e tɛ gba̧‘a̧ duka-a kɔ-wa.
Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o gɔni-duk lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ mi kaia wa si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ nɛ‘i sa'e,
‹GASA WAN gɔn nɛ kita.›
Mi tɛ ɓa kita in wa sɛn hi̧i̧,
wen mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa dee in
nɛ duk nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m in nu kɔ‘m;
wen wa pɛsa so wa a mgbara o gɔni bíí,
ɓɛɛ wa kɛ̧ nu kɔ‘m nɛ er ŋmaa.
Wa tana nɛ mɔ kɛ̧ nɛ dukbíí kɔ‘m;
wa ɗɔra o be-ŋgaiwi
mɛ ba nɛ o kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu,
wa ɗɔra o boko bem kɔ-wa nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧.
War k’ɛ́nɛ́, o gasa ye Tir in Sidɔŋ,
ɛnɛ o be-nu Filistii,
nɛ́ ge ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ zu'm ge?
Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kifi nɛ er ha̧‘m nde?
Kà taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ boo hegɔ,
mi tɛ kifi er h’ɛ́nɛ́ kinii kinii, hee gɔma-yí ga.
Ɛnɛ kaia o bu-mbɔi in lɔr kɔ‘m
nɛ duka nɛ o kpaamɔ kɔ‘m nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya,
wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kai si kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ̀ ko o be Juda in Jerusalɛm,
ɛnɛ ɗɔra wa ha̧ o be Grɛk
wen ha̧ wa mɛ ya nyɛi̧ nɛ nu kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ sa wa mɛ pii ɗoŋ
nɛ fara n’ɛnɛ ɗɔra so wa si sɛnɛ‘i,
ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ dee so in wa'i
mɛ pii ɗoŋ tik zu'nɛ́.
Mi tɛ ɗɔr o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́
mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a ha̧ o be Juda,
ɓɛɛ o be Juda tɛ ɗɔr kɔ‘i wa ha̧ o be Sabee
nɛ ɔ tɛ ŋma nu nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbéá tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o gɔni-duk'e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí war-tɛ‘nɛ́ wen biro,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́;
o wi-biro lɛŋ a̧ ye yuwar.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúí wara keekee-wa-fɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ gba-paa;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ dúí o boi-pɔi-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ sɛɛ.
Kóó nɛ o wi-kíì lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧‘e,
wi nɛ o ŋga wi-biro.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ haya-a, o tugun bíí nɛ ya zik nu’ɛ,
ɛ̀nɛ̀ mɔ́í̧ ŋmaa duk kpɔk kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ.»
GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ pii zu wa.
«O tugun bíí lɛŋ a̧ gbin ye yuwar,
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Wa a̧ nɛ si kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ nɛ‘i sa'e,
‹GASA WAN gɔn nɛ kita.›
Nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a̧‘m tɛ duk
ha̧‘m mɛ gɔn kita
zu o tugun bíí nɛ ya zik nu’ɛ lɛŋ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá mɔɔ-pɔi-mɔ ɛ̀nɛ̀ pɔ́í nɛ wa:
nyɔnɔ sɔka kaɗi.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ mbɔli waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧
nɛ duna mɔɔ-vati-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi'i;
o gba kpánà duna zɛ́rɛ́rɛ́.
Ɗaŋ kɔ-wa yaka zale!»
O bíí nɛ dɔka-a hɔɔ kɔ̧ Ɗɔŋgɔ-gɔn-kita
wen wese ko GASA WAN hɛɗa kaɗi.
Wese in nyaŋa-zɛ tok na,
o sɔra nyɛk ɓɔna.
GASA WAN mgbimgbi nɛ zu kaya
wi zii nɛ ger-a sɛn Jerusalɛm mɛ.
Nu in yiwese nak nak,
ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɛ pɛm dukbíí kɔ‘i.
A̧ nɛ fara-hu̧si ko o be
Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e:
«Ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nde,
mi nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nɛ ɔ sɛn
Jerusalɛm tɛ kifi duk nɛ fara kɔ‘m woyo,
ɓɛɛ o gɔni-duk beka ye hi̧i̧ ɓɔna.
«Ŋgimbi'i, ká̧ naŋ kaya tɛ dɛm waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a,
o mɔ-dai sɛn zu kaya tɛ ha̧ yibere nɛ dɔka-a.
Yì tɛ fok kɔ̧ o be-zer sɛn Juda lɛŋ;
ŋma gbar-gbar-yì tɛ gɔm nɛ kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN,
ɓɛɛ aa mgbara ɗɔŋgɔ Sitim.
Bíí beka bo Egiptɛ ɓɔna,
ɓɛɛ nu Edɔm tɛ kifi nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà mbɛt,
wen wa dee ŋgamɔ in o bem ko Juda,
wa gbaia tɔk tɛ o bíí nɛ de ŋma mɔ na a nu gee.
Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ nde, tɔk-tɛ-wa aa nu gee;
hegɔ, o bíí tɛ ɔ sɛn Juda
in Jerusalɛm ɓɔnsɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m GASA WAN,
mi tɛ duk sɛn
Kalata’ɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen ko Amɔs, ŋma wi-dai-sami sɛn Tɛkɔa. Mɛ nɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ GASA WAN hɔɔ ha̧ a̧ wen zu
Wen nɛ Amɔs tɔ̧a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
GASA WAN tuɓa nɛ
wi zii nɛ ger-a tɛnɛ nɛ Jerusalɛm.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ fara-dai-mɔ kifa ŋga-gbárà,
mɔ gbɛ̧ɛ̧ zu kaya Karmɛl ŋgaoo!
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m
zu o bíí Damas na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale;
wa mbɔla o be Galad lɔɛ-lɔɛ.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ pi̧ wee
tɛ nutua ko wannu Hazaɛl,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar tua-wan ko Bɛn-Hadad a nu;
mi tɛ gbin gasa boi nu garo Damas a nu,
mi tɛ ndak o bíí Bikeat-Avɛn lɛŋ
in o wi-kasi dɔ́rá-wan Bɛt-Edɛn;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai dukbíí Aram
nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ si sɛn Kir mɛ»,
nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m zu o bíí Filistii nu Gaza na,
wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna;
wa kaia o bíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ
nɛ́ɛ̀ ɗɔr sɛn Edɔm mɛ.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ garo Gaza,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan ye'i a nu gbuɗuk.
Mi tɛ ndak o bíí Asdod lɛŋ
in wi-kasi dɔ́rá-wan Askelɔŋ;
mi tɛ zik er-am mɛ gbɛ o bíí Ekrɔŋ,
ɓɛɛ oi ndaa bíí Filistii lɛŋ tɛ kum»,
nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
GASA WAN'e:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m
zu o bíí Edɔm na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna;
wa ndaka o nya-wa nɛ gba-paa,
gee be ko de wa ha̧ nya-wa na.
Hegɔ mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ garo Tir,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan ye'i a nu.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m zu o bíí Edɔm na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa;
wa ndaka o nya-wa nɛ gba-paa,
gee be ko de wa ha̧ nya-wa na.
Mɔ‘i duka nɛ gasa nyimsea nɛ kaɗi na;
wa kaɗi ee kiri in o nya-wa na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Hegɔ mi tɛ pi̧ wee tɛ ye Teman,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan Bosra a nu.»
GASA WAN'e:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m
zu o bíí Amɔŋ na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna;
wa vuta zaŋ o nàá-zaŋ sɛn Galad a nù,
gbakna nu kɔ‘i gasa.
Hegɔ mi tɛ du wee pi̧ tɛ garo Raba,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan a nu lɛŋ.
Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ wese biro nɛ
Wese'i tɛ duk hee wese gba búk ndiɓa-kórò a̧ yu yak ga.
Wa tɛ ba wannu in o be-wan kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ rutuk»,
nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
GASA WAN'e:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ
zu o bíí Mɔab na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna;
wa dɔɔ gba̧a̧-fio wannu Edɔm yinɛ.
Hegɔ mi tɛ pi̧ wee zu nu Mɔab,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan Keriyot a nu.
O bíí Mɔab tɛ kum wese'i zaŋ gasa gitimɔ,
zaŋ gayamɔ-biro in o giti dɔma zak.
Mi tɛ gbɛ wannu kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ;
ɓɛɛ mi kuma o be-wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ a nu war kpɔk»,
nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
GASA WAN'e:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m
zu o bíí Juda na,
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna;
wa baa usamɔ ko GASA WAN pi̧ taŋ,
wa kasi o geŋa kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ o dáà kɔ-wa nɛ̀ɛ̀ so ɗoŋ wa
dee ha̧ wa mɛ yɔ.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ pi̧ wee zu nu Juda,
ɓɛɛ wee'i tɛ ndar o tua-wan Jerusalɛm a nu.»
GASA WAN'e:
«Mi beka kpai taamɔ kɔ‘m zu
wen dee ŋgamɔ kɔ-wa yaka zale nyɛmna.
Wa ɗɔra wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a wen zu sede,
ɓɛɛ wa ɗɔr wisan nɛ kpa so sede
mɛ yoɓi nɛ ndárà n'aa kaia nɛ nyamandoi na.
Wa daŋ nɛ zu o geɗek-wi,
ɓɛɛ wa kai nɛ mɔ ko o wi-kɔsa.
Ŋgaiwi in dáà kɔ‘i
nɛ́ nɛ́ tɛ kpɔk zɔŋa-bara
ɗaŋ nɛ sa̧a̧ nin-am;
wa ɔ nɛ nu ká̧
zu o laa nɛ o wi-kɔsa ee er-wa nɛ ziŋina.
Wa ya kɔ̧ tua ko sɔ̧ kɔ-wa
nɔ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wa dora er o bíí.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi kuma so
o be Amɔr nɛ kusa so hee
nɛ zɔm nɔa-a hee ŋma gasa te
Mi ɗaŋa wa nɛ oi gun lɛŋ.
Mi mgbɔɔ‘nɛ́ daŋnɛ nɛ nu Egiptɛ,
ɓɛɛ mi duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́ pɛ ɓu-naar sɛn ŋga-gbárà,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ba nu ko o be Amɔr.
Mi dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa o
mgbara o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ mi hok o wi nɛ ha̧ tɛ
mgbara o be-ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Bo nɛ wen n'am tɔ̧‘i lɛŋ nɛ kpasawen na nde,
ɛnɛ o be
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
«Mɔ kpɔk, ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧
ha̧ o wi nɛ ha̧a̧ tɛ ha̧‘m,
nɛ nyɛm so mɛ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ na;
ɛnɛ dora o
ká wa tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ na.
«Kinii mi hɔɔ mɛ mbɔli'nɛ́ ɓɔn bɛɗɛ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ keekee nɛ duna nɛ alkamaari
mbɔli nɛ mɔ'ɛ ga.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ beka kpa fara yu mɔ yak na,
wi-nɔ-ŋgiɗi beka mɔi̧ ŋgai kɔ‘i na,
mɔ beka hɔ yɔɔ zu ŋgaŋa-wi na;
wi-pi̧-góò beka iŋ oi pi̧i̧ goo na,
wi-ma-yì beka yu mɔ yak na,
kóó nɛ wi-daŋ-nyaŋa mbɛt beka ma yi yak na;
o yaa-ŋgo-biro tɛ yu mɔ nɛ mgbii yak wese'i»,
nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Ɛnɛ o be
ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ zu'nɛ́.
Wen'i a̧ tɔ̧ zu o bíí
n'aa kaia so gbonɛ nɛ nu Egiptɛ lɛŋ:
«Nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̀nɛ̀‘nɛ́ a̧‘m iŋa mgbara o dukbíí zaŋnu lɛŋ;
nɛ hegɔ sa'm tɛ usi bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ.»
Wiwii yiitoo nyɛma kura nɔ in ŋmaa,
nɛ wa tɛ e zu nɔ‘i in ŋmaa nɛti na nde?
Dila tɛ hiɗi mɔ zaŋbɛɛ sɔɔ gee,
ɓɛɛ saɗi-nyɔŋ bo na nde?
Be dila tɛ de da̧ kɔ̧ di̧i̧ kɔ‘i sɔɔ gee,
kà a̧ nɛ baa saɗi na nde?
Kà ŋma mɔɔ-nyɔŋ bo yi pɛr na,
ɓɛɛ nɔ̧́í̧ tɛ zir nɛ yiwese tik sɛnɛ nde?
Mbala nyɛma so mɛ misi̧ sɔɔ gee
kà saɗi nyun a̧ pi̧ ŋgɔn na nde?
Wa dɔm zak saaye,
ɓɛɛ kíì beka de o bíí ye'i na nde?
Ŋma bɔnɛ tɛ tik zu ŋma ye
nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ GASA WAN a̧ dee mɔ‘i na nde?
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ de ŋma mɔ,
ɓɛɛ hu̧sa̧ ndaa-a nɛ o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i
nɛ duk nɛ o
Kà dila hiɗi mɔ, nɛ o'o beka de kíì na o?
Kà GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ wen,
nɛ ge bíí ge a̧ beka we ɗoŋ-aa na ge?
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hé mbéá ha̧ o bíí nutua-wan Asdod,
gu nɛ o bíí nutua-wan Egiptɛ mɛ;
ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wa mɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa kpa sɛn zu kaya Samarii,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k ŋgamɔ nɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa dun saaye'i!
O bíí nasi nɛ ŋmaa sɛn saaye'i nɛ ŋgaya-a.
«Wa iŋ yuwar deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɛn fara kɔ-wa na.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ:
«Tom dee kɔ-wa nɛ duna tua-wan kɔ-wa
nɛ o mɔ nɛ wa ɓara nɛ ŋgai
er o bíí in o mɔɔ-zuzu mbɛt.»
Nɛ hegɔ, sa GASA WAN Sɔ̧ tɔ̧‘e:
«O wisɛn tɛ kɛr nu,
wa tɛ gbin o ŋgárá kɔ-mɛ a nu,
ɓɛɛ wa kaia o mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ tua-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ yaknɛ!»
GASA WAN'e:
«Wi tɛ ɓar o be
fara ɔ nu gɔn de gado yinɛ,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi-dai-sami ɓar nɛ oi ɓira sami,
kóó oi ɓira zer-aa yinɛ nu dila’ɛ ga.»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧‘e: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ,
ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbáŋ tɛ o bíí nutua ko Jakob.»
GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ‘e:
«Wese n'am tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧
wen zu dee ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa,
mi tɛ ɗaŋ
O mgbii
Mi tɛ gbin o tua-ɓar,
gu nɛ o tua-bɛɛ lɛŋ a nu;
o tua-nin-fɔrɔ tɛ gbin a nu
gu nɛ o gasa tua mbɛt.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen’ɛ, o nana ndai Basaŋ
nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ zu kaya Samarii,
usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ o wi-kɔsa,
nyɔŋ nɛ yi o wisan tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o wii k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e:
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá tɛnɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ nɔ!»
GASA WAN kana mɔ nɛ tɛ-a'e:
«Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mi ɔ sa̧a̧ ga,
nɛ mbetɛ, ŋma wese tɛ hɔ,
nɛ wa tɛ kɔti'nɛ nɛ boi-kɔk-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ war ko o bezaŋ‘nɛ́,
wa tɛ kai wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i dak nɛ zoro nɛ gɛ̧i̧'ɛ ga.
Ɛnɛ tɛ gɔm nɛ gbáá-ŋgeŋ kpɔk kpɔk,
kóó o nde ta nɛ kɔ‘i.
Wa tɛ fo'nɛ́ si ká̧ kaya Hɛrmɔŋ.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ pii
ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɗáfí sɔ̧ mɛ tutuyɛ,
ɓɛɛ tɛ́ taar zɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dɔ́ brɛt nɛ hao bo sɛnɛ na
ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ de nɛ osoko ha̧ a̧.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ŋmáŋ tɛ zu ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ n’ɛnɛ ha̧‘m'i,
wen nɛ pɛrti deemɔ hegɔ ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧,
ɛ́nɛ́ o be
Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
«Mi ha̧a̧ nɛ ŋgó-nin h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ nyɔŋ
tɛ o gasa ye k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ;
brɛt ɓana ɛnɛ dam fara-yaa k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Nɛ mi'i dora so kórò
ká hɔ a zu nyɔnɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ na
fio-zɛ taar nɛti sɛka sɔka.
Mi dee ha̧ kórò mɛ hɔ zu o ŋma ye,
ɓɛɛ o ŋma ye kpa kɔ‘i kórò na.
Kórò hɔɔ a zu o ŋma fɔ,
ɓɛɛ fɔ nɛ kpa kórò na kor kɔ‘i.
O bíí ye yiitoo, kóó taar haia nɛnɛ
mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ kii yi tɛ ŋma ye,
ɓɛɛ wa kpa yi ha̧ yi see-wa mɛ ga̧ na.
Zu-a'i, ɛ́nɛ́ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na mbɛt.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Mi dee ha̧ laambam mɛ ba alkamaari k’ɛ́nɛ́;
mi a̧ dee mbɛt ha̧ o dɔk mɛ nyɔŋ o nyɔnɔ,
mɛ ye o waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧, o waya te-mbɔra,
in o waya-te-nɔ̧́ kpɛɛfɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Zu-a'i, ɛnɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Mi pi̧i̧ ŋga-zɛɛ zu'nɛ́
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dee so sɛn Egiptɛ nɛti ga;
mi kuma o daŋa ŋgaiwi k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ gba-paa,
kai nɛ o nyaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaknɛ.
Mi dee ha̧ pɛr mbɔra mɔ kɔ̧ gbagari k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ daŋ a zɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́.
Zu-a'i, ɛnɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
«Mi ɗaŋa'nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ɗaŋa so
nɛ Sɔdɔm in Gɔmɔr’ɛ ga;
oi'nɛ́ nɛ ɓɔna duk hee ŋginda-nu-gua
nɛ‘i daka nɛ yí-wee yinɛ ga,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘m na.»
Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ zu mɛ ga,
Wen ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k wi nɛ dee o kaya,
nɛ dee búk,
nɛ usi mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ bíí,
nɛ de tum in sa̧a̧mɔ,
nɛ nɛ́ nɔ zu o kusa kaya zu nù.
Nin wi’ɛi nɛ GASA WAN,
Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ!
Ɛnɛ zii wen n'am tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio zu'nɛ́,
nutua ko
«Be-zɔŋa
a̧ beka kur ɓɔna!
Mgbák zu nu kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ nyafi sɛnɛ,
ŋma wi ba a̧ e ŋgɔn bo na.»
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ye nɛ tɛ tom o wi-biro booro yaknɛ,
oi-aa nɛ tɛ pii nɛ́ gɔmŋmaa;
ɓɛɛ wan nɛ tɛ tom kɔ‘i gɔmŋmaa,
nɛ́ ɓu ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ pii.»
Wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧ nutua ko
«Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí am, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kpasa.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ɛ̀ kii am sɛn Bɛtɛl na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ɛ̀ kii am sɛn Gilgal na,
k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ sɛn Bɛrseba na mbɛt,
wen wa tɛ kai o bíí Gilgal nɛ bara-biro lɛŋ yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ Bɛtɛl mbɛt tɛ yambali.»
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí GASA WAN,
ɛ́nɛ́ o bíí nutua ko Jozɛf,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kpasa.
Ká bó hegɔ na,
a̧ tɛ tik zu'nɛ́ hee wee ga.
Wee'i tɛ dɔ o bíí Bɛtɛl,
ɓɛɛ ŋma wi-bia-a bo na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kpai nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ maada̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ siŋa deemɔ nɛ tana-a pi̧ nu!
Nɛ a̧ a̧ dee o Gbaayí-be-zɔŋa in Gɔm-ndaa,
nɛ a̧ a̧ kpai tum nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kpaia wese nɛ ɗuka-zɛ mbɛt.
Nɛ a̧ a̧ sa o yi nɛ ɗɔɔ gba-tɔp
mɛ pɛsi wa dam zu nu lɛŋ.
Nin-wi’ɛi nɛ GASA WAN.
Nɛ a̧ a̧ de ha̧ wa mɛ ɓar mɔ ko ŋga-bíí yaknɛ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ o ŋga ye mɛ tik
er o wi-ɓar-mɔ er-wi.
Ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn nɛ́ o bíí nɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen nɛ yuwar-a
in nɛ ɓa wen nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ ti kita.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ mbɔli nɛ o wi-kɔsa,
kai nɛ zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa ga,
o de tua-ta n’ɛnɛ dea'i,
ɛnɛ beka ɔ kɔ̧ a̧ na.
O de waya-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ guna'i,
ɛnɛ beka nɔ ɗɔɔ-aa na,
wen mi iŋa dɔka ŋgazu k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yaka zale nyɛmna,
ɛnɛ o wi-nasi o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɛnɛ o bíí nɛ wa ye'nɛ́,
ɛnɛ o bíí nɛ de ha̧ kita mɛ tik o wi-kɔsa.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ wi-kasi-zu, tɔ̧ wen tɛ ŋgimbi’ɛ na,
wen nɛ́ ŋgimbi ŋgamɔ!
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí nɛ́ demɔ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ na,
wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa;
hegɔ, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ duk in'nɛ̀ɛ́,
hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ ga.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sɛ́n ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ nɛ demɔ.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ pii ɗoŋ fara kita.
Ŋmafara, GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
tɛ de ko ha̧ oi nutua ko Jozɛf.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ sa GASA WAN kɔ‘m
nɛ duk nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧‘e:
«O bíí tɛ hi̧i̧ fio dam bee-gara lɛŋ;
o bíí tɛ ai nú dam o yuwar lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ sa o wi-wa-fɔ mbɛt mɛ tɛ mɛ hi̧i̧ fio
in o wi nɛ tom kɔ-wa nɛ hi̧a̧-fio.
Ɛnɛ tɛ hi̧i̧ fio nɛ kpɛɛfɔ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́nɛ́,
ŋgimbi n'am tɛ ɓir nɛnɛ mgbara'nɛ́.»
GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o wi nɛ pɛm wese ko GASA WAN!
Wese'i tɛ duk h’ɛ́nɛ́ hee ge?
Tɛ duk nɛ tum, nɛ bó nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ na.
Mɔ‘i tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in ŋma bíí nɛ yu mɔ ti dila,
ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ tík nɛ́ nú baŋgiiɗoŋ'ɛ
kóó hee bíí nɛ pii ɗoŋ kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i,
ha'i tam ŋgeŋ wó,
ɓɛɛ ká gɔ́k gɔma a̧'ɛ ga.
Bo nɛ wese ko GASA WAN
tɛ duk nɛ tum nɛ bó nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ na, na nde?
Wese'i tɛ duk nɛ tum,
nɛ mbulu sa̧a̧mɔ beka bo na.
«Mi sɛna o ɗafa-sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ mɔi̧ ɗafi nɛnɛ‘i;
o gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ de tɛ‘m na.
in o nyɔnɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧‘m'i de tɛ‘m na.
Mi beka kpɛk o ŋmaŋa saɗi
n’ɛnɛ ba tɛnɛ mɛ ɗafi nɛ‘m'i na mbɛt.
Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá o gima k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛi̧ nɛ‘m,
mi kɔ̧ mɛ zii o giti kunde na mbɛt.
Deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ duk mgbara'nɛ́ hee kpút-kpút ga;
deemɔ nɛ tana-a a̧ duk mgbara'nɛ́
hee foka-yì nɛ ɔ̧sa̧ na ga.
«O be
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tuia nɛ o géé-sɔ̧ n’ɛnɛ dea, Sikut nɛ duka hee wan ga, in Kiyun sɔ̧-sɔra k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Hegɔ, mi tɛ kai'nɛ́
nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ siɗoŋ Damas nɛ ɓi'i.»
Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ‘i sa nin-a'e
Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.
Bɔnɛ a̧a̧ zu o bíí nɛ̀ ya nɛ̀ ga̧a̧-see wen zu
in nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ kaya Samarii.
Wa nɛ́ o gasawi sɛn
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wa'i a̧ nutua ko
Wa'e ndé:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ si Kalne, ɛ́nɛ́ zɔ́k ye'i,
ɛ́nɛ́ kúr nɛ̀ hi̧i̧ sitɛ gasa ye Hamat,
ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ zira si Gat, ye ko o be Filistii mbɛt.
Mɔ‘i, o ye kɔ-wa gana o ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ nde?
Nù kɔ-wa gasa gan k’ɛ́nɛ́ nde?»
Ɛ́nɛ́ kíí mɛ fo wese bɔnɛ e siti,
ɓɛɛ deemɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɗɔl nɛ wese ŋgamɔ‘i pii ɗoŋ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ́ nɛ nu gɔn gado nin-fɔrɔ,
ya nɛ nu zu mɔɔ-duk-nu k’ɛ́nɛ́,
nyɔŋ nɛ o
nɛ‘i kaia tɛnɛ nɛ fara-dai-wa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛ́r nɛ kunde,
bíí nɛ gima, mɔ kaɗi, mɔ kaɗi,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ David dee so ga.
Ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ̧ o ɗele,
sɔ̧ nɛ de pɛr nyama tɛ‘nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ bó nɛ̀ ŋgamɔ
nɛ tɛ tik zu o bezaŋ Jozɛf na.
Mɛ nɛ wen hegɔ, wa tɛ kai nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ nɛti ha̧ o dɔka bíí,
ɓɛɛ bɔtɛ mɔi̧a ŋmaa k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i kaɗa.
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ
kana mɔ nɛ tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧:
«Mi sɛna ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko nutua ko Jakob,
ɓɛɛ mi sɛn tua-wan kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Hegɔ mi tɛ ha̧ ye kɔ-wa nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ ha̧ o wisɛn.»
Kà bíí ɓu nɛ́ ɓɔna kɔ̧ tua kpɔk, wa tɛ fe lɛŋ.

Ŋma bíí ko fio tɛ tɛ mɛ ba fio gbonɛ kɔ̧ tua wen dɔa-a, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ ak mɔ sitɛ ŋma bíí nɛ ɓɔna ndaa tua'e: «Ŋma bíí ɓɔna in mɛɛ woyo?» Wi’ɛi tɛ kifi nú: «Weyaa, bíí bo ɓɔna.» Ɓɛɛ kuti wi tɛ tɔ̧: «Ká'í tɔ̧ wen na. Bo nɛ ŋgimbi-sa-nin GASA WAN kinii na.»
Kà GASA WAN ha̧ nú,
ɓɛɛ o gasa tua tira a nu,
ɓɛɛ o geɗek-a gbina a nu mutu-mutu.
Wí ŋgán nyaŋa zu kam-ta nde,
wí wá fɔ nɛ ndai ɗɔɔ tɔp nde?
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ kpaia deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ maada̧,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ kpai deemɔ nɛ tana-a nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Nyɛŋɛ pi̧ nɛ ɛnɛ, wen n’ɛnɛ baa Lo-Dabar, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ duk tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Bó nɛ́ nɛ̀ ŋgai-tɛ yɛ ɛ́ɛ́ baa nɛ Karnayim na nde?»

Nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ: «Mi tɛ de ha̧ ŋma tugun bíí mɛ ba zu duk nɛ ɛnɛ, usi nɛ bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ Lebo-Hamat nɛ war ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn mɛ, hɔ nɛnɛ nu be-zer Raba nɛ a̧a̧ si ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ.»
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m usa ha̧‘m tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ mɔ'ɔ. A̧ dee ha̧ o gii gba-dɔya mɛ tik, ŋgimbi nɛ mbɔɗi zɔ̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ ɓɔa-a, ɗoŋ nɛ‘i gɔna zɔ̧-hoe ha̧ wannu kaɗi.

Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o gba-dɔya nɔ‘i nyɔŋa zɔ̧ tɛ nu'i lɛŋ yinɛ ga, mi tɔ̧a̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é ɗaŋmɔ ko nutua ko Jakob ha̧ a̧, wen kà bó hegɔ na, a̧ nyɛma so mɛ kpasi nde, a̧ n'aa duk kɔ̧-a̧ hee obem ga’ɛ?»
GASA WAN kpaia taamɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi beka de mɔ‘i ɓɔna.»
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m usa ha̧‘m tɛ hɔɔ-zu nɛ mɔ'ɔ. A̧ gɔna kita nɛ wee. Wee'i kpa̧i̧a̧ yi ɗɔɔ nu ɔ̧sa̧, ɓɛɛ ku̧ naŋ dea-a ha̧ mɔ mɛ zu nu mɛ kor mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mi aia nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yór, wen kà bó hegɔ na, nutua ko Jakob nyɛma so mɛ kpasi nde, a̧ n'aa duk kɔ̧-a̧ hee obem ga’ɛ?»
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m kpaia taamɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi beka de mɔ‘i ɓɔna mbɛt.»
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m usa ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk woyo nɛ mɔ'ɔ. A̧ kura yor zu ŋgeŋ ndɛrɛ
A̧ aka'm: «Ge a̧ mɛ zɔk ge, Amɔs?» Mi kifa nú: «Nɛ ndɛrɛ a̧‘m zɔk.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN kɔ‘m tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Mi tɛ mɛ pi̧ ndɛrɛ mgbara dukbíí kɔ‘m
Mi tɛ ɗaŋ o fara ɗafi géé-sɔ̧ ko Izak lɛŋ;
o sa̧a̧ fara
Mi tɛ gɔm o bíí nutua ko Jeroboam nɛ gba-paa gbɛ lɛŋ.»
Amasia wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn Bɛtɛl pi̧i̧ tom tɔ̧ ha̧ Jeroboam wannu
Wen n'aa tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
‹Jeroboam tɛ fe nɛ fio gba-paa;
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai o be
yaknɛ nɛ nyɛi̧a-a nɛ nu kɔ-wa.› »
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Amasia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Amɔs: «Wi-zɔk-mɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yák hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ si nu Juda mɛ, kii nɛ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ si hi̧i̧.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ sɛn Bɛtɛl hɛ̧ɛ̧ woyo ɓɔna, wen ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ sa̧a̧ fara ko wannu, fara n'aa gasi Sɔ̧ sɛnɛ.»
Ɓɛɛ Amɔs kifi nú ha̧ Amasia: «Mi bó só nɛ́
ɓɛɛ nɛ GASA WAN a̧ saa'm ɗoŋ mɔ-dai kɔ‘m, tom nɛ‘m'e a̧‘m nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen oi nú-wi ha̧
Mɛ‘e ká‘m tɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧ zu
wen n'aa tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
‹Kóò kɔ-mɛ tɛ kifi duk nɛ kó-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu saaye,
gba-paa tɛ kum o bem kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a.
Wa tɛ we nu kɔ-mɛ kɛ̧ nɛnɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ̀ zu mɛ‘i, mɛ tɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ fe tɛ ŋma gɔni nu,
fara nɛ o bíí ɗafi o géé-sɔ̧ sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai o be
nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ nyɛi̧ nɛ nu kɔ-wa.› »
Mɔ nɛ GASA WAN Sɔ̧ usa ha̧‘m tɛ hɔɔ-zu duka nɛ gɛsɛ gbɛ̧ waya-te.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa aka'm hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Ge a̧ mɛ zɔk ge, Amɔs?» Mi kifa nú‘e: «Mi zɔk nɛ gɛsɛ gbɛ̧ waya-te.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: «Dukbíí kɔ‘m
Mi beka kpe yi zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ woyo ɓɔna.
Wese'i,
o wɔr tɛ gbisi nɛ mbɔɗɔnu sinɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ tɛ duk selele.»
Ɛnɛ o wi nɛ de ŋgamɔ in o wisan,
nɛ fo o ga̧a̧-wi yinɛ tɛ nu’ɛ, ɛnɛ zii.
Wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
«Gbaŋa mbe-yi-zɛ a̧ kaɗi bee
h’ɛ́ɛ́ ɗɔr alkamaari k’ɛɛ!
Wese-ɔm-tɛ a̧ yak bee
h’ɛ́ɛ́ hú̧í̧ nu o dam k’ɛɛ,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ we mɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ na,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpai mɔɔ-we-dita-mɔ k’ɛɛ ká tɛɛ yor tan na,
