kórò beka hɔ a zu nù kɔ-wa na.
Kà o be Egiptɛ nɛ́ daŋa si hi̧i̧
wen dee Gbaŋa Tua-laa'i na,
ŋgamɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɛ pi̧
zu dɔka tugun bíí nɔ‘i
nɛ beka daŋ wen dee gbaŋa'i na'i
tɛ tik zu wa mbɛt.
Bɔnɛ nɛ tɛ tik zu Egiptɛ in zu dɔka tugun bíí lɛŋ
nɛ daŋ si Jerusalɛm wen dee Gbaŋa Tua-laa na, nɛ mɔ‘i.
Wese'i, yɔramɔ'ɔ:
«Mɔ nɛ‘i ee nɛtɛ ha̧ GASA WAN,»
tɛ duk ɗoŋ o mana
nɛ‘i kun ger nyaŋa,
ɓɛɛ o nyɛk-gi-mɔ sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko GASA WAN,
tɛ duk nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧ hee o yee-pi̧-gaŋmɔ
sɛn
O nyɛk-gi-mɔ wan mɛ Jerusalɛm in o wan mɛ Juda lɛŋ
tɛ duk nɛ ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ kóó o ndé nɛ tɛ́ tɛ̀ mɛ ɗafi sɔ̧
tɛ ba o kpánà nɔ‘i mɛ gi nɛ mɔ.
Ŋma wi-ɗɔr-mɔ beka duk kɔ̧ Tua
ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ wese'i na.
Wen ko GASA WAN nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Malachii

GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧‘e, nɛ́ tɛ́ ge a̧‘m kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wi ge? Bo nɛ Esau duka so nɛ baka ko Jakob na? Mi sɛna so Esau, ɓɛɛ mi kɔ̧ nɛ Jakob? Nɛ GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧. Mi ɗaŋa o ye ko o bezaŋ Esau sɛn mgbara kaya mɛ, ɓɛɛ nù kɔ-wa kifi nɛ fara-yaa ko o gbóò.»

O be Edɔm nɔ‘i nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Wa ɗaŋa ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ mbo o ye k’ɛɛ nɛ ɗaŋa so'i woyo.» Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ kifi nú: «Wa a̧ mbó o ye nɔ‘i woyo, mi tɛ gbin a nù lɛŋ. Wi tɛ gɔn nin a zu wa'e, ‹Nù ko o wi-ɗaŋ nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ duk zu wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.›
«Ɛnɛ o be

«Bem tu̧ nɛ tɛ dáà kɔ‘i; wi-de-tom yu nɛ wan kɔ‘i mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kà‘m duk nɛ dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m a̧a̧ de? Kà‘m duk nɛ wan k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ yuu kíí tɛ‘m a̧a̧ de? Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ ha̧ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧. Ɛ́nɛ́ e nin-am tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Nɛ tɛ ge mɔ ge ɛ̀ɛ̀ e nɛ nin'nɛ́ tɛ geemɔ ge?›
Mɛ nɛ wen n’ɛnɛ ba nɛ o ndiŋ nyɔŋmɔ e fara-ɗaf'am. Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo'e: ‹Ɛɛ ɗaŋa bɔɔ nin'nɛ́ tɛ ge mɔ ge?› Nɛ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧‘e: ‹Fara-e-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ́ geemɔ.›
O saɗi nɛ yí bo na, o wan nɛ nɛ́ kum, in o wan nɛ ɔ nɛ zɛɛ n’ɛnɛ ba nɛnɛ si
«Kinii, ɛ̀nɛ̀ áí nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ de ko h’ɛnɛ; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ ha̧ o pɛrti mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ a̧, a̧ tɛ kpɛk so ɛnɛ nde? GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Nyɛma so ha̧ ŋma bíí mgbara'nɛ́ mɛ kpe nú tua

Nɛ̀ war daŋa-wese hɔ yee-wese mɛ, nin-am nɛ zɔm mɔ mgbara o tugun bíí dam fara lɛŋ; wa dɔ nɛ fuu-nyama ha̧‘m, ha̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, wen nin-am ɔ gasa mgbara o tugun bíí. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ fɛŋ nɛ nin-am tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧‘e, ‹Fara-e-nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ́ ndiŋ fara, ɓɛɛ o nyɔŋmɔ nɛ‘i e zu-a'i nɛ geemɔ.›

Ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧: ‹Zɔk ŋma mɔɔ-nyɛr wa!› Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e'm tɛ geemɔ. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Ɛ́nɛ́ bá nɛ o saɗi-zuzu in o wan nɛ nɛ́ kum ká bá nɛ̀ o wan nɛ ɔ nɛ zɛɛ ha̧ ha̧‘m. Ɛnɛ taa k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e, mi tɛ kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ nɔ‘i k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i? GASA WAN a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.

Fom a̧ ba wi-de-saka-yí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋmaŋa saɗi mgbara o mɔ-dai kɔ̧-a̧ n'aa ha̧a̧ nú mɛ ha̧ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ba nɛ saɗi nɛ tɛ-a ɗaŋa mɛ gbɛ ɗafi nɛ‘m. Wen mi nɛ gasa wannu, nɛ̀ o tugun bíí de zɛŋ nɛ nin-am na. Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i.»
«Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, mgbák wen’ɛ nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́.

K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ zia na, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ ee see'nɛ́ wen zɔna nin-am na, mi tɛ fom'nɛ́, mi tɛ fom o de toka yoŋgo k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt. Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ. Mi tɛ fom'nɛ́ wen ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ kasi wen kɔ‘m na.
Mi tɛ de ŋgamɔ in o bezaŋ‘nɛ́; mi tɛ a̧r o ɗɔr saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ yo nɛ yí‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai'nɛ́ nɛ oi-aa a taŋ,
h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ‘e nde, nɛ mi a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i, wen ha̧
A̧ duka so mɛ usi nɛ́ kpasawen; ndela bó kɔ̧ nú-a na. A̧ nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ in am nɛ mboozu nɛ yuwar-a. A̧ dee ha̧ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a mɛ zik tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ duk.
Wen mɛ nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ o bíí tɛ iŋ nɛ yuwar ko Sɔ̧. Wí nɛ́ sɛn tɛ wa mɛ kpa yambamɔ wen wa nɛ o betom ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
«Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ a̧ra̧ tɛ yuwar kɔ‘m; usamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ o bíí nɛ dɔka-a mɛ kɔ̧ naŋ. Ɛnɛ ɗaŋa
Ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ ee yuwar kɔ‘m duk, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zɔk bíí hee ŋmaa ga na, mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ gee o fɛŋa bíí mgbara dukbíí
Bo nɛ ɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ bem ko kpɔk dáà na nde? Bo nɛ Sɔ̧ kpɔk a̧ dee yɛ na nde? Ɓɛɛ wen ge s’ɛɛ e kiri in o ŋmaa, ɗaŋ nɛ
Juda gbina
Wi nɛ de mɔ hegɔ, GASA WAN a̧ fo a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa lɛŋ yinɛ nutua ko Jakob in wi nɛ tɛ ɗafi GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ oi nú wi’ɛi mbɛt.
«Ŋma mɔ n’ɛnɛ de woyo nɛ mɔ'ɔ. O aia-nú, o gɔfamɔ in miikɔ̧a k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpee zu fara-ɗafi GASA WAN, wen n'aa kpɛk o mɔ n’ɛnɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧ nɛ de-a ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Wen ge a̧ kɔ̧ bɔɔ na ge nde› na? Wen GASA WAN zɔka
Bo nɛ Sɔ̧ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ kpɔk bíí tɛ kiitɛ in tɛ
GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko

Tɛ GASA WAN mbɔia tɛ zia wen nɔ‘i k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i kaɗi. Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ‘e nde: «Nɛ ge ɛɛ dee bɔɔ in GASA WAN mɛ mbɔi ge?» Mɔ‘i n’ɛnɛ dea'i nɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧‘e nde: «Kóó bíí dee so ɗaŋmɔ, GASA WAN zɔk a̧ hee de bíí ga, usi nɛ
Kifa-nú ko GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «Mi tom nɛ betom mɛ ɗafi yuwar ha̧‘m. Gasa Wan n’ɛnɛ kii'i tɛ ye kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘i kinii; betom n’ɛnɛ pɛm, nɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ
Nɛ o'o tɛ yor ti a wese n'aa tɛ tɛ nɛnɛ‘i o? Nɛ o'o tɛ duk ti a̧ wese nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk nɛ a̧ o? Wen a̧ tɛ duk hee wee-dɔra ko wi-dui-mɔ in sa̧-ndiŋ ko wi-fɔr-mɔ ga.
A̧ tɛ duk hee wi-nɔi̧-boi in wi-dui-mɔ ga. A̧ tɛ de ha̧ war-tɛ o bezaŋ Levii mɛ sa̧; wa tɛ ya hee lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ‘i nɔi̧a ga, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ha̧ ha̧a̧mɔ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ yuwar-a.
Hegɔ, ha̧a̧mɔ ko Juda in Jerusalɛm tɛ de tɛ GASA WAN hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dee so nɛti tɛ o kuti ŋgimbi ga.

«Mi tɛ ɗɔŋ pii katɛ‘nɛ́ wen gɔna kita; hɔa-a kɔ‘m hegɔ, mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen zu o wi-de-mɔɔ-kifi, o wi-de-dàlà in o wi-kan-mɔ nɛ ndela, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a zu o wi-nyɔŋ-sede-tom ko o wi-de-tom, zu o wi-ɓar-mɔ er o ko-gera in o be-oi, ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-de-ŋgamɔ in o gɛnɛ mbɛt. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yu'm na. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Kɔ‘m, mi GASA WAN, mi kpai na, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ kana nɛ mgbák bezaŋ Jakob hɔ kinii.

Tɛ ŋgimbi ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ra̧ nɛnɛ e nɛ o geŋa kɔ‘m duk, ɛ́nɛ́ kasi o geŋa nɔ‘i na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ píí ɗoŋ pii tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ hegɔ. Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi k’ɛ́nɛ́‘e nde: ‹Ɛɛ tɛ pii bɔɔ pia ɗoŋ‘i hee ge nde?›
Mi'e nde, bíí tɛ ɔr Sɔ̧ nde? Ɛ̧ɛ̧ n’ɛnɛ zu̧u̧ bɔɔ mi’ɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi tɔ̧‘e: ‹Ɛɛ ɔra'nɛ́ tɛ ge?› Ɛnɛ zu̧‘m tɛ ha̧a̧-zu-mɔ in ndɛma mɔ ha̧‘m.
Fom a̧a̧ zu'nɛ́ wen ɛnɛ ɔr nɛ‘m, ɛnɛ dukbíí'ɛ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ.

Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kai o zu-mɔ nɛ dama-a nɛnɛ a kɔ̧ Tua kɔ‘m, wen ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ mɛ dɔk kɔ̧ Tua'i ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ we'm tɛ mɔ‘i ɛnɛ zɔk; mi tɛ hú̧í̧ yiwese ha̧ nɛ de sɔnti h’ɛ́nɛ́. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Mi tɛ dor o kokoɗo-mɔ ká wa tɛɛ ɗaŋ o nyɔnɔ in o fɔ-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
O tugun bíí lɛŋ tɛ zɔn'nɛ́, wen nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ dun nɛ̀ demɔ. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.»
GASA WAN tɔ̧a̧: «Tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ pii tɛ‘m ɔ ŋgaya nyɛmna. Ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Nɛ ge ŋga wen ge ɛ́ɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zu'nɛ́ ge?›
Ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘e, tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ tom takaɗi; nɛ ge a'i tɛ kpa oi kasa geŋa in zima-mɔ ti GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ ge?
Ɛnɛ tɔ̧ mbɛt'e, o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ ya kɔ‘i nɛ desee, mɔ ko o wi-ɗaŋ, dɔk dɔk siti; wa we Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ de wa na.»
Nɛ hegɔ a̧ o wi-yu-sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ in o ŋmaa. GASA WAN yeŋa zer, ɓɛɛ zii mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧; nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa yɔra kalata nin o bíí lɛŋ nɛ yuu GASA WAN in nɛ zɔna nin-a ɓɔn ti a̧.

Ɓɛɛ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɔ̧: «Wese kɔ‘m n'am ɗafi'i be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ, o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ ya nɛ o mgbák bíí kɔ‘m. Mi tɛ ba ŋgamɔ zu wa yinɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ dáa-wan-bem ba nɛ ŋgamɔ yinɛ zu bem kɔ‘i, wan nɛ mbo zu ha̧ a̧'ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ mɔ‘i woyo, ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk war mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa wi-ɗaŋ in wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a, mɔ nɛ tɛ kpa wi-de-tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ in wi nɛ de tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ na.

«Wese'i nɛ tɛ‘i tɛ duk hee wee-dɔra ga; o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ in wi-ɗaŋ lɛŋ tɛ ya hee kora zɔ̧ ga. Wese'i nɛ tɛ‘i tɛ dɔ wa a nù kór-kór, nɛ‘i beka zɔk gee zɔka kunin-wa na. Nɛ́ GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-yu'm, ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ‘m nɛ tɛ tok zu'nɛ́ hee daŋa-wese-tuyɛ nɛ a tɛ-wi hai nɛ tɛ-wi’ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ hɔ zaŋgule hee be ndai nɛ gbo zan mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ'ɛ ga.
Wese n'am ɗafi tɛnɛ‘i be tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ, ɛnɛ tɛ i̧si̧ o wi-ɗaŋ hee bùk ga nɛ naŋ‘nɛ́. GASA WAN nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧ wen’ɛ.
«Tɛ‘nɛ́ a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ heembea ko Moisɛ, wi-de-tom kɔ‘m; mi ha̧a̧ so o heembea in o geŋa ha̧ a̧ zu kaya Hɔrɛb wen dukbíí
«Ɓɛɛ kinii, mi tɛ tom
A̧ tɛ ɗafi mgbara o bem in o dáà, wen ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗaŋ nù'ɛ.»
Kalata nɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛmɔ ko Tobit, bem ko Tobiɛl, bem ko Ananiɛl, bem ko Aduɛl, bem ko Gabaɛl, bem ko Rafaɛl, bem ko Raguɛl, lɛŋ nɛ o bezaŋ Ariɛl, zuduk ko Nɛftalii.

Tobit ɔɔ so sɛn saaye Tisbe, sɛn nu Nɛftalii, nu Galilee mɛ ŋgɔn, mgbara Kadɛs nɛ duk nɛ kazan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, in Hasɔr, nɛ duk nɛ war yee-wese, in Fogɔr nɛ duk nɛ kazan-mɛ-ɗɔɔ. Mɛ nɛ fara'i a̧ wa baa so a̧ nɛ bara-biro si sɛn nu Asirii, ŋgimbi wan ko Salmanazar.

Mi Tobit, mi ndaka pata yuwar kpasawen, ɓɛɛ mi de o demɔ in o bii, ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'am duka nɛ kpasa. Mi ha̧mɔ nɛ dɔkaa sɔɔgee ha̧ o nya kɔ‘m, in ha̧ o bíí zuduk kɔ‘m, nɛ wa kaia so nɛ bara in am si saaye Ninivɛ, sɛn nu Asirii mbɛt.

Tɛ ŋgimbi daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m, sɛn nu kɔ‘m, nu Israɛl, zuduk ko zɔmdáà kɔ‘m Nɛftalii lɛŋ kɛ̧a so tɛ nɛ nutua ko David, in nɛ Jerusalɛm, Jerusalɛm nɛ gasa ye nɛ wa hɔka so mgbara o zuduk Israɛl lɛŋ mɛ duk nɛ fara-ɗafi-Sɔ̧: nɛ sɛn fara'i a wa mboa so Sa̧-a̧ Tua nɛ Sɔ̧ duk sɛnɛ, Tua nɛ wa toka so de yoŋgo zu a, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ wen o pɛrnam nɛ tɛ tɛ nɛ ɗoŋ.
Sɛn zu o kaya Galilee lɛŋ, o nya kɔ‘m in o bíí nutua ko zɔmdáà Nɛftalii lɛŋ duka so mɛ ɗafi nɛ be ndai, hee sɔ̧ kɔ-wa̧ ga, be ndai nɛ Jeroboam wannu Israɛl dea so sɛn Dan.

Dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ mi ɛn'am a duka so mɛ nɛ sɛn Jerusalɛm, ŋgimbi o gbaŋa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea, nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧ha̧ o be-Israɛl lɛŋ wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Mi kai nɛ o zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ‘m, o kaya mɔdai kɔ‘m, o zu-mɔdai kɔ‘m lɛŋ, in kuti buma-sami nɛ‘i gɔn, si Jerusalɛm'i,

ɓɛɛ mi ha̧o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ o wiɗafisɔ̧, o bezaŋ Aarɔn, wen ea a zu taŋe-ɗafi-Sɔ̧. Mi ha̧o zu-dɔ̧ɔ̧, alkamaari, waya-te-nɔ́, waya dɔn, waya-te-mbɔ́rá, in zu o ŋma wayate nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ha̧ o bezaŋ Levi, nɛ yaa so de nɛ tom sɛn Jerusalɛm. Mi duka so mɛ kpai yiitoo zumɔ kɔ‘m lɛŋ nɛ sede, ɓɛɛ mi nɛɛ ɗaŋ sede'i sɛn Jerusalɛm, dam ɗoŋ pɛ lɛŋ.

Mi ha̧ taar zu mɔ kɔ‘m ha̧ o be-oi, o kogɛra, in o gɔni duk nɛ ya kpɔk in o be-Israɛl: dam ɗoŋ pɛ taar lɛŋ, mi ha̧o mɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ wa sɔɔgee. Ɓɛɛ ɛɛ nyɔŋa in wa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise, in dómɔ ko Debɔra, naa ko zómdáà kɔ‘m Ananiɛl, wen dáà kɔ‘m fee so, e'm nɛ be-oi.
Ɗoŋ n'am dee wiwii kaɗi, mi baa kóò zaŋ pɛrnam ko o dáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, mi koo bem in a̧, ɓɛɛ mi a nin bem’ɛi'e Tobia.
Ŋgimbi kaia o bíí nɛ bara si sɛn nu Asirii, wa baa'm nɛnɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mi ɔ sɛn saaye Ninivɛ. O nya'm lɛŋ in o bíí zuduk kɔ‘m lɛŋ yaa so mɛ nyɔŋ nyɔŋmɔ ko o bíí nɛ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, mi dora tɛ‘m tɛ nyɔŋa nyɔŋmɔ‘i.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ see-am lɛŋ duk so tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ga,
Wan mɛ ŋgɔn dea ha̧‘m mɛ demɔ nɛ dee tɛ Salmanazar, ɓɛɛ nɛ mi a hi̧fi so mɔ n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧.

Hegɔ, mi duka so mɛ nɛ sɛn nu Mɛdii, hi̧fi nɛ o mɔ ha̧ a̧, hɔ nɛnɛ ŋgimbi fio kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ hegɔ a'm aa nɛ o ŋgoɓo-sede, nɛ duna nɛ dita bu-kɔya-sede gɔmŋmaa taar, tɛ kɔ Gabaɛl, nya ko Gabri, sɛn saaye Ragɛs, sɛn nu Mɛdii mɛ.
Ɗoŋ fio ko Salmanazar, bem kɔ̧-a Sɛnakɛrib ɔɔ wan oi-aa. Ŋgimbi'i, o yuwar mɛ nɛ si nu Mɛdii sa̧-a̧ na, ɓɛɛ mi nyɛm mɛ nɛ si hi̧i̧ ɓɔ na.
Ŋgimbi wan ko Salmanazar, mi ha̧so mɔ sɔɔgee nɛ dɔkaa ha o zuduk kɔ‘m
mi kɛ̧a̧ brɛt kɔ‘m ha̧ o wi nɛ wɔ gbɛ, in o laa ha̧ o wan nɛ ya so nɛ mgbíí; ɓɛɛ, ka'm kpa wɔr ŋma bíí nu kɔ‘m, nɛ‘i pii taŋ, ɗoŋ garo saaye Ninivɛ, ɓɛɛ mi nɛɛ kai mɛ gun.

Mi guna o bíí nɛ Sɛnakɛrib gbɛa so mbɛt; wen Wan mɛ yiwese usa so ŋga bɔnɛ ha̧ Sɛnakɛrib, oi kpɔkɔ wen n'aa tɔ̧a̧ so pi tɛ wi. Tɛ yuu mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ pinɛ nɛ nu Judee, see-Sɛnakɛrib nyima, ɓɛɛ a gbɛɛ o be-Israɛl nɛ dɔkaa. Ɓɛɛ mi nɛɛ kai o wɔr-wa nɛ hu̧saa mɛ gun. Sɛnakɛrib toma o bíí mɛ kii wa takaɗi.
Ŋma be Ninivɛ nɛɛ ɗɔ‘m ha̧ wannu'e «nɛ mi am gun wa», ɓɛɛ mi nɛ hu̧si tɛ‘m. Ɗoŋ n'am zia'e nyɛrɛ tom kɔ‘m aa zer wannu kaɗi, in n'aa kii nɛ‘m mɛ gbɛ wo, kii dee am, ɓɛɛ mi yu mɔ yak.
Wa kaia o mbɔi kɔ‘m lɛŋ a zu ko wannu; kóó ŋma be mɔ kpɔk ɓɔn ha̧‘m na, Kana nɛ kóò kɔ‘m Anna, in bem kɔ‘m Tobia a̧ wa ee so ha̧‘m ɓɛɛ.

Zɛ ɓu-naar tɛ dam hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ o bem ko wannu yiitoo gbɛ a̧: wa yu mɔ yak si zu kaya Ararat. Ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ Asarhadɔn ɔɔ wan oi a. A ha̧tom zɔka nu wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, in mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mbɛt ha̧ Ahikar, bem ko nya'm Anaɛl.

Hegɔ Ahikar ama mɔ zu'm, ɓɛɛ mi si ɗoŋ si Ninivɛ. Nɛ mbetɛ, ŋgimbi wan ko Sɛnakɛrib wannu Asirii, Ahikar duka so zu o dɔ̧ɔ̧ ko wannu, in zu tumbal kɔ̧-a̧, gasa-wi-duk-zu-tom in zu sede. Asarhadɔn ea a siti zu o tom nɔ‘i woyo. Ahikar nɛ nam kɔ‘m, be nɔ-kɔ kɔ‘m.

Ŋgimbi wan ko Asarhadɔn, mi sia ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ koo kɔ‘m Anna in bem kɔ‘m Tobia ha̧‘m siɗoŋ woyo. Tɛ gbaŋa Pentekot k’ɛ́ɛ́ (nɛ‘i sa'e «gbaŋá ko o sa̧-a̧ alat mɔɔrɔ-zaŋ-a-yiitoo) wa gia de nyɔŋmɔ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ mi duk nu mɛ nyɔŋ,

ɓɛɛ wa ba taŋe-nyɔŋmɔ e ti'm, wa kaia o de nyɔ nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ‘m Tobia nde» Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ nɛ sɛn Ninivɛ, ɓɛɛ, mgbara o nya-ɛɛ, nɛ wa kaia nɛ bara si hi̧i̧, kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ kpaa ŋma wisan, nɛ tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, in nɛ e ta nɛ A̧ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ mɛ mgbɔ a̧ tɛnɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in yɛɛ. Mi tɛ zɛm mɔ hɔ ŋgimbi pia-ɗoŋ kɔ-mɛ.

Tobia yaka mɛ kii ŋma wisan mgbara o nya k’ɛ́ɛ́. A pia, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Dáà!», mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa: «Bem kɔ‘m, nɛ ge?» ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi: «Wa gbɛa ŋma zuduk k’ɛ́ɛ́, wa nɔkɔɗa nɛ́ ger-a gbɛ nɛ a, ɓɛɛ wa pi wɔr-a sɛn beegara mɛ‘i: a̧ ɓɔna hi̧i̧ hɔ kinii»
Mi kura nɛ hayaa, siŋ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘m e duk nɛ oi-aa, mɛ nɛɛ ba wɔr-a beegara yinɛ, nɛɛ hu̧si sɛn ŋma bɛrtua, pɛm nɛ yee-wese, sɛka'm guna a̧.
Ɗoŋ n'am sia tɛ kɔ‘m, mi zuia yì, ɓɛɛ mi nyɔŋ mɔ, zu ɗaŋsee,
ta nɛ mɔ, nɛ wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nu-Sɔ̧ Amɔs tɔ̧a̧ so zu Betɛl: «O gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kifi nɛ hi̧a̧-fio, ɓɛɛ o gima k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ tɛ kifi nɛ aia-nú», ɓɛɛ mi zu̧ nú‘m tɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Nɛ wese yee kaɗi, mi nɛɛ za̧ kɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mi gun a.
O wi nɛ ɔ katɛ‘m zɛkɛɗa'm, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Kii de a̧ ɓɔna; wa kia so a̧ mɛ gbɛ wen zu pɛr ti tom’ɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ yak. Ɛnɛ zɔ́k a̧, n'aa gun o wɔr woyo’ɛ!»
Mɛ zɛ‘i, mi zuia yì, mi gboa si beegara, ɓɛɛ mi ɔ nu mgbak ka̧ garo, mi gu mɔ yí‘m na, wen gbɛŋmɔ nyɛmna.

Mi iŋ so’é o somdea a̧a̧ nu-ngeŋ zu'm'i na. Nɛ ɗɔr-wa, nɛ wee-a kpororo, huia tik yí‘m, wii hɔɔ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ yí‘m kú̧ naŋ mbɔraa. Mi nɛa tɛ o widenyina. Aa nyina nɛ wa a sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wii tɛɛ gasi gasi siti. Nɛ hegɔ a̧ yi'm boma nɛnɛ, mi zɔk mɔ ɓɔ na. Tɛ pɛ naar, mi zɔk mɔ na, ɓɛɛ o nya'm lɛŋ kpa ɗaŋsee tɛ mɔ‘i. Ahikar gbaka'm tɛ dukaa kɔ‘m tɛ pɛ yiitoo, nɛti ha̧ a mɛ yak si sɛn Elimaid.
Sɛn ŋgimbi'i koo kɔ‘m Anna kpaa tom toka laa:
ka a ka̧i laa sinɛ ha̧ wan-tom ɓɛɛ wa yoɓa a̧. Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo zɛ, tɛ fiozɛ Dystros, a̧ kaɗa ŋma zɔ̧-laa kpɔk, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ o wan-a, wa yoɓa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ be gbaduá gee ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ.

Tɛ pia-ɗoŋ kɔ̧-a̧ píí katɛ‘m, be-gbadua ŋmaa nú tɛ hiɗi mɔ, mi saa koo kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi ak a̧: «Gbadua’ɛ tɛ nɛ dee nde? mafara wa zu̧ a̧ zu̧u̧, mɛ ba a̧ si nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ wan-a, ɛɛ nyɛm k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nyɔŋ mɔɔ-zu̧zu̧ na, kóó nɛ ge mɔ ge.»

Sa a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m’é: «Nɛ́ mɔ nɛ wa ha̧ha̧‘m gee, é zu mbɔi tom kɔ‘m wo. » Mi kɔ̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɗɔaa ha̧ a̧ na ndó-ndó-ndó, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ a̧‘a̧ ba a̧ sinɛ ha̧ o wan-a. See-am tu̧u̧ zu a̧ wen zu be-gbadua'i, ɓɛɛ koo kɔ‘m kifi nú ha̧‘m: «O ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ gee yaa dée? O dee deemɔ kɔ-mɛ ya bɔɔ dée nde? Mɔ nɛ kpaa mɛ'ɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ.»
Tɛ gasa ditasee kɔ‘m, mi yee tɛ pɛɛ see-am hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mi ku̧ naŋ kɔfa Sɔ̧, pɛ nɛ see-am, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Ɛnɛ nɛ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, Gasa Wan, o tom k’Ɛnɛ lɛŋ nyɛma sɛnɛ, o yuwar k’Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ deemɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ wen k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in kpasawen. Nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a gɔn kita zu nù.
Gasa Wan, tɛ-‘Nɛ́ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ am, Ɛnɛ zɔ́k mɔ pii tɛ‘m, k’Ɛ́nɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ in o yɔɔkaya kɔ‘m na, kóó wen zu o ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà kɔ‘m na mbɛt.

Wazika ɗoŋ wa ha̧ o heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́. Nɛ́ wen hegɔ, s’Ɛnɛ siŋ ɛɛ pi tɛ bɔnɛ: O wisɛn k’ɛɛ yaia mɔ zu nu k’ɛɛ lɛŋ, wa kaia ɛɛ nɛ bara, wa gbɛɛ ɛɛ, o dukbíí n’Ɛnɛ pɛsa ɛɛ a mgbara wa, mama yɛ, wa zɛkɛɗa yɛ, wa ɗaŋa nin yɛ.
Ii, gɔnakita k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma sɛnɛ, ŋgimbi n’Ɛnɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧‘m, nyɛm ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m in ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà kɔ‘m, wen ɛɛ kasi so o heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dea na, ɛɛ nɛ so nɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɛn ti'Nɛ́ na mbɛt.

Ɓɛɛ kinii, Ɛnɛ dé mɔ nɛ‘m hee mɔ'ɔ n’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧a ga. Ɛnɛ há nú‘Nɛ́ ha̧ɔmi kɔ‘m yak, ha̧‘m mɛ gbo zaŋnù hɛ̧ɛ̧ mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ fuunù. Gana so a'm fe ba nɛ duka kpasa, wen mi zia gee tum dara ɓɛɛ mi dúk nɛ ditasee nyɛmna. Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ ha̧ nú-‘Nɛ́ ha̧‘m gbo tɛ bɔnɛ'ɛ̧. Ɛnɛ é‘m, ha̧‘m yak si sɛn fara nɛ bíí ɔ sɛnɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧si yí-‘Nɛ́ nɛ‘m na. Ii, gana so a'm fe, ba nɛ dukaa kɔ‘m tɛ ditasee in tɛ zia ɗaŋ dara dam ɗoŋ ŋgimbi dukaa kɔ‘m zaŋnù'ɛ̧ lɛŋ.
Kale kpɔk wese'i, Sara bokobem ko Raguɛl, be Ekbatanɛ, sɛn nu Mɛdii, zia ɗaŋ dara nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú ŋma kodetom kɔ̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧.

Wen Sara baa so wii war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ kóó ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa duk in a̧ na. Ɗaŋsɔ̧ Asmɔdee gbɛɛ wa lɛŋ, ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa, nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ ɔ in a̧, hee mɔ nɛ wii de in koo ga. Sa kodetom tɔ̧ ha̧ Sara'e: «Nɛ́ mɛ́ a gbɛ o wii kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ. Wa mgbɔɔ mɛ ha̧ wii mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ kóó kpɔk duk in mɛɛ mɛ ha̧ nin ha̧ mɛ na.
O wii kɔ-mɛ fea, ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ mɛ usi bɔnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ sɔɔgee oi fio kɔ-wa wo’ɛ zu ge? Mɛ yak nɛ ɗoŋ wa ɛ̧, ɓɛɛ ka'i zɔk ŋma bezaŋ mɛ, kóó nɛ́ be-wiwii, kóó nɛ́ be-okóò, na!»

Wese'i, Sara kpaa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna: a̧ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a, ɓɛɛ a̧ daŋ si sɛn gɔna bɛrtua kɔ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ŋgɔn, ha̧ a̧ mɛ gai̧ tɛ-a nɛ nyak mɛ fe. Nɛ mɔɔ n'aa taa mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ sɛn kɔ̧ see-a: O bíí tɛ da̧ dáà kɔ‘m, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɗaŋ mɛ, nɛ mɛ duka so nɛ kpɔk bokobem, yaa-dua-see-mɛ, nɛ gbɛɛ tɛ wen zu ɗaŋ sɔnti kɔ̧-a̧'ɛ!» Weyaa, mi nyɛm mɛ ha̧ ɗaŋsee ha̧ dáà kɔ‘m tɛ sɔki kɔ̧-a̧, hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ fio mbɛt na. Gai̧a tɛ‘m nyɛm sɛnɛ na, ɔ dee gan ha̧‘m mɛ ai nú‘m ha̧ Gasa Wan mɛ é ha̧‘m mɛ fe, wen ka'm tɛɛ zii pɛrti dara hegɔ woyo, tɛ dukaa kɔ‘m.

Beebee mɔ‘i, Sara nyɛia er nɛ ŋgɔn, nɛ war wɔi-tua, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔfi Sɔ̧, hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «De toka yoŋgo nɛ́ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ Sɔ̧, yaa-de-ko! De toka yoŋgo nɛ nin-‘Nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo. O mɔ nɛ̀‘Nɛ́ dea lɛŋ, a zɔn'Nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Kinii, mi ba sɔnti'm nɛ ŋgɔn, si tɛ‘Nɛ́, mi zik yí‘m si tɛ‘Nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ dé ha'm gbo zaŋnù'ɛ̧, wen ká‘m tɛɛ zii pɛrti dara’ɛ hegɔ woyo.
Wanusimɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa, mi dúk nɛ sa̧-a̧, mi demɔɔ-ndiŋ in wiwii na.

Mi ɗaŋ nin-am, kóó nin dáà kɔ‘m sɛn fara nɛ wa baa'm nɛ bara si sɛnɛ na. Mi nɛ kpɔk bokobem ko dáà kɔ‘m, a̧ bó nɛ ŋma bem wen kaia mɔɔ-oi-aa na, a̧ bó nɛ ŋma nya-a, kóó ŋma nam kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ka̧ tɛ a̧ n'am nyɛma mɛ ba nɛ wii ɓɔna. Wíí fee er-am mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo kaɗi, sa'm dúk bɔɔ zaŋnu mɛ de ge ɓɔ ge? A k’ɛnɛ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ha̧‘m mɛ fe na, ɓɛɛ, Gasa Wan, ɛnɛ nyɛŋ zer'nɛ́ sitɛ dara nɛ da'm'i.
Kana nɛ́ tɛ kale kpɔk ŋgimbi'i a Sɔ̧ Wan gasamɔ zia nɛ kɔfamɔ kɔ-wa yiitoo'i,

ɓɛɛ a̧ tom Rafaɛl mɛ kpasi wa: ko Tobit, a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o wí nɛ kpee yí-a mɛ yu, ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ gba̧a̧yí-a; ko Sara, bokobem ko Raguɛl, a̧ tɛ ha̧ a̧ nɛ koo ha̧ Tobia bem ko Tobit; ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ndak Asmɔdee, ɗaŋ-sɔ, sɛn tɛ a̧ yinɛ: wen nɛ́ Tobia a tɛɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò nɛti ha̧ o dɔka wii-kɔfɛ. Tobit kura nɛ beegara si kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ Sara, bokobem ko Raguɛl, zir kɔ‘i nɛ gɔna bɛrtua mɛ ŋgɔn.
Wese'i, tɛ Tobit mbaŋa ɗoŋ mbɔi, n'aa ee so er Gabaɛl, sɛn Raguɛs nu Medii,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ta mɔ kɔ see-a: «Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am aka mɔ mɛ fe ga’ɛ, gana so a'm sa bem kɔ‘m Tobia mɛ tɔ̧ wen mbɔi'i ha̧ a̧, nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ fe.»

A̧ saa bem kɔ̧-a̧ Tobia pii ka̧ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ gun am, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ de ga. Mɛ tu̧ tɛ naa kɔ-mɛ. Ká mɛ siŋ a̧ pii nù ŋgimbi lɛŋ n'aa tɛ duk kpasa na. Mɛ de nɛ mɔ nɛ see-a kɔ̧a lɛŋ; ká mɛ demɔ nɛ tɛ ha̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧ a̧ na.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ bonɛ n'aa zɔka tɛ hakala mɛ zu zaŋ. Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ fe, mɛ gun a̧ ka̧ tɛ‘m kɔ̧ kpɔk kɔ̧.
Bem kɔ‘m, dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ Gasa Wan. Ká mɛ kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ dee ɗaŋmɔ na, ká mɛ gbin heembea ko Sɔ̧ na. Tɛ duka-a kɔ-mɛ zaŋnu, mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ yuwar-a, ká mɛ ndak pata yuwar gɔɔmɔ na.
Wen, nɛ́ o wi nɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a a tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ-wa.
Mɛ kɛ̧ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ gbak nɛ o bíí nɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a. Ká mɛ e yí-mɛ ɗɔŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ ha̧na. Ká mɛ zik ɗoŋ-mɛ ha̧ wisan na, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ beka zik ɗoŋ-wi ha̧ mɛ na mbɛt.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ. Kà mɛ nɛ́ a̧a̧ nɛ be mɔ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ, ká kíí de mɛ tɛ ha̧be tikiɗi mɔ‘i na.
Nɛ́ de be mbɔi a̧ mɛ mɔi̧, e nɛnɛ, pɛm nɛ ŋgimbi bɔnɛ,
wen, ha̧mɔ ha̧ wisan kpasi wi kpasi tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ dora wi tɛ nɛa-a zaŋ tum mbɛt.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ha̧mɔ ha̧ o bíí gbak nɛ wa, dúk nɛ gba demɔ nyɛmna sɛn yí Sɔ̧, Wan mɛ ŋgɔn.

Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ ba kóò nyɛm ɗoŋ heembea ko Sɔ̧; nɛti ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ, mɛ bá nɛ́ zuduk nam ko dáà kɔ-mɛ nɛ kóò. Ká mɛ ba kóò gɔni duk, nɛ bó nɛ duk ko dáà kɔ-mɛ na, na. Wen ɛɛ nɛ́ o bezaŋ wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nu Sɔ̧. Bem kɔ‘m, tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ o kuti zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́: Nɔe, Abraham, Izaak, in Jakɔb, wa lɛŋ wa baa kóò zaŋ nam kɔ-wa. Sɔ̧ toka de yoŋgo zu wa in o bezaŋ wa, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧ nú mɛ ha̧ nu Israɛl nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ wa.

Hegɔ, bem kɔ‘m, mɛ ndaɗi in o nya-mɛ. Ká mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-mɛ ti o nya-mɛ, o okóò in o wiwii zuduk nam kɔ-mɛ na. Ká mɛ bɛ̧ baa kóò sɛn mgbara wa na. Wen gɔɔtɛ de dee ha̧ bíí mɛ tik in ha̧ gba̧a̧-wi mɛ gbin. Hegɔ mbɛt tɛɛri de dee ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ mɛ tir si ɗɔɔ, hɔ tɛ gasa san, tɛɛri tui kaba tui pi zu bíí.

Ká mɛ zɛm sa̧a̧mɔ, sɛka mɛ yɔɓa mbɔi ko widetom kɔ-mɛ na, mɛ yɔɓ‘a nɛ hayaa ŋgaɓo. Ká mɛ nɛ dee tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ hee mɔ‘i ga, A̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔá-oi-aa ha̧ mɛ ɓɔn ŋgɔn. Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ hai nɛ̀ tɛ-mɛ tɛ dee o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ. Tɛ naŋanɔ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ usi'e mɛ nɛ kpasa bíí.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ na, ká mɛ demɔ‘i ha̧ bíí na mbɛt. Ká mɛ nɔ dɔ̀ɔ́ bɔkɔ na, ká mɛ hui nɛ yuwar kɔɗɔŋ kɔɗɔŋ na.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ ha̧ wi nɛ wɔ gbɛ, mɛ pi̧ laa tɛ wi nɛ duk nɛ sɔŋgɔɗɔ. Mɛ kɛ̧ mɔ nɛ mɛ kpaa gan zu mɛ ha̧ o wisan. Ká mɛ e yí-mɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ ha̧ha̧ bíí ɓɔna.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-nyɔŋ ha̧ o wi nɛ hi̧i̧ fio ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ ha̧ wen wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na.
Mɛ zíí mbɔrɔ ko wan-ɗuka-taamɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e mbɔro nɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ tɛ geemɔ na.

Mɛ gasi Sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ak A̧ mɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛnɛ tɛ tana war, mɛ kɔf'A mɛ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de lɛŋ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧. Wen ŋma dukbíí kpɔk nɛ duk zu ɗuka-taamɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀, bo na. Kana nɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀, a ha̧ o demɔ lɛŋ ha̧ bíí. A̧ gbɔsi wi n'A̧a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ si ɗɔɔ, hɔ sɛn fara-duk ko o fio mɛ. Kinii, bem kɔ‘m, mɛ kasi o mɔ nɔ'ɔ lɛŋ e zú-mɛ, ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ wa na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kinii, bem kɔ‘m mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e mi ee dita bu-kɔya-sede gɔmŋmaa taar er Gabaɛl, bem ko Gabri, sɛn saaye Raguɛs, nú Mɛdii mɛ.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká kíí de mɛ wen nɛ san tika zu yɛ na. Mɛ́ nɛ́ gasa wanmbɔi nɛ mbetɛ, kà mɛ nɛ yuu kii Sɔ̧, kà mɛ nɛ ee ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ dúk, in kà mɛ nɛ deemɔ nɛ de tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ.
Tobia kifa nú ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i Tobit, he mɔ'ɔ ga: «Dáà, mɔ nɛ̀‘Nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m lɛŋ, mi tɛ de;

ɓɛɛ mi tɛ de bɔɔ hee ge mɛ ba nɛ mbɔi'i er-a ge, wen ɛɛ in Gabaɛl, ɛɛ iŋ ŋmaa na? Ge mɔɔ-sedaako ge a̧‘m tɛ usi ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ nɛ‘m ge, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɗɔaa'e nɛ mi nɛ mbetɛ, in ha̧ a̧ mɛ ha̧ nɛ mbɔi'i ha̧‘m ge? Mi iŋ yuwar n'am tɛ ba mɛ hɔ nɛnɛ nu Mɛdii na mbɛt.»

Sa Tobit kifi nú ha̧bem kɔ‘i Tobia: «Ɛɛ in Gabaɛl, ɛɛ yɔra mɔɔ-sedaako wen zu mbɔi'i, ɓɛɛ mi kɛ̧ mɔɔ-sedaako'i fara yiitoo; mi baa war kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi e war kɔ̧-a̧ zu mbɔi'i. Kinii dee pɛ ɓu-yiitoo kaɗi n'am ee nɛ mbɔi'i sɛn er-a. Mɛ kíí nɛ́ mgbak bíí nɛ tɛ nɛɛ e mɛ. Ɛɛ tɛ ha̧ mbɔi tom kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ ŋgimbi pia-ɗoŋ kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ yak, mɛ nɛɛ́ ba mbɔi er Gabaɛl.»
Tobia gboo zan mɛ kíí ŋma bíí nɛ iŋa yuwar nu Mɛdii nɛ dea, mɛ nɛ in a̧. A gboa, a kpa yi ŋmaa in Rafaɛl fara yora-a zan, ɓɛɛ a iŋ‘e Rafaɛl nɛ betom ko Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese na.
Tobia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wi’ɛ, mɛ tɛ nɛ dée?» Betom Rafaɛl kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi nɛ be Israɛl, ŋma nya-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ mɛ kìì tom.» Tobia tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ iŋa yuwar mɛ nɛ si nu Mɛdii »

Rafaɛl kifa ha̧ a̧: «Ii, mi nɛ hi̧i̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, mi iŋa yuwar nɛ dea. Mi nɛɛ hi̧i̧ war ɔ dɔka, ɓɛɛ mi zir tɛ ko ŋma nya-ɛɛ Gabaɛl, nɛ ɔ sɛn Raguɛs. Kura Ekbatanɛ mɛ hɔ Raguɛs, wi de zɛ yiitoo yuwar: wen o ye nɔ‘i yiitoo'i ya sɛn mgbara kaya.»
Tobia tɔ̧a̧: «Wiɛ́, mɛ zɛm am hɛ̧ɛ̧, ha̧‘m nɛɛ mbaŋ tɛ dáà kɔ‘m sɛ, wen mi kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ nɛɛ e'm, mi tɛ ha̧ mbɔi tom kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ. »
Rafaɛl kifa: «Mi tɛ zɛm mɛ, ká mɛ ɓɔn na! »

Tobia sii ɗoŋ nɛɛ mbaŋ tɛ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi kpaa ŋma bíí mɛ e'm: nɛ́ nutua nam k’ɛ́ɛ́ Israɛl.» Tobit kifa: «Mɛ mgbɔ a tɛnɛ ha̧‘m, bem kɔ‘m, ha̧‘m iŋ tugun-a, in zuduk kɔ̧-a̧, in kà a̧ nɛ nyɛma mɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛnɛ. »

Tobia gboo, sa a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wiɛ́, dáà kɔ‘m sa mɛ.» Betom Rafaɛl yee tua, ɓɛɛ Tobit kpɛk a̧ ti. Rafaɛl kifa ha̧ a̧: «Ɛnɛ kpa de dukaa!» Tobit tɔ̧a̧: «Ge de duka-a ge a'm tɛ kpa bɔɔ ɓɔ ge nde? yi'm kpee yinɛ, mi zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ yiwese ɓɔ na, mi duk zaŋ tum, hee o fio nɛ beka zɔk sa̧a̧mɔ ɓɔ na ga. Mi duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ mi duk mgbara o fio. Mi zíí tiger o bíí, ɓɛɛ mi zɔk wa na.» Betom Rafaɛl tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi! Sɔ̧ duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpasi mɛ! mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi!» Tobit tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m kɔ̧a mɛ nɛ sɛn nú Mɛdii. Mɛ nyɛma mɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ hɔ fara'i nde, sɛm kɔ‘m? Mi tɛ ha̧ mbɔi tom kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ.» Rafaɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Mi nyɛma mɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ, mi iŋa o yuwar lɛŋ, mi nɛ sɛn nú ko o be Mɛdii dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧, mi yara nɛ o bɔkɔnu in o zu kaya lɛŋ, mi iŋa o yuwar nu'i lɛŋ nɛ dea.»
Tobit aka a̧: «Sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ nɛ ge zuduk ge? mɛ nɛ pɛrnam ko o? mɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen ha̧‘m, usɛni sɛm kɔ‘m.»
Rafaɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Gba̧a̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ pɛrnam kɔ‘m hee ge?» ɓɛɛ sa Tobit tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen ha̧‘m, mɛ nɛ mgbak bem ko o, in nin-mɛ hee ge?»
A̧ kifa nú ha̧ a̧: «Mi nɛ Azaria, bem ko Ananias gasa-a, ŋma nya-mɛ.»

Tobit tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ tɛɛ nɛ dea nde, sɛm kɔ‘m! Sɛm kɔ‘m, ká mɛ kpa ɗaŋsee wen n'am aka ndaa-mɛ na! Mɛ́ nɛ́ nya'm nɛ mbetɛ, tugun-mɛ ɔ dee nyɛmna. Mi iŋa Ananias in Natan, o bem ko Semelias gasaa yiitoo nɔ‘i nɛ dea: wa nɛ so Jerusalɛm in am, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ gasa nɛ Sɔ̧ in wa. Wa e yuwar ko Sɔ̧ dúk na.» O nya-mɛ nɛ o kpasa bíí, mɛ nɛ́ kpar de zuduk: «Mɛɛ ha̧ mɛ! mɛ tɛɛ nɛ dea nde? »
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo'e: «Mi tɛ ha̧ mbɔi-tom kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ, kɔya bu-sede kpɔk dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o ŋma nɛ tɛ kɔ̧, mi tɛ de ha̧ mɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'am de wen bem kɔ‘m ga.
A mɛ mgbɔ bem kɔ‘m nɛnɛ nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e mbe mɔ zu mbɔi-tom kɔ-mɛ.»

Ɓɛɛ betom tɔ̧: «Ii, mi tɛ mgbɔ a̧ nɛnɛ, k’ɛnɛ de kí na! Mɔ lɛŋ tɛ yak zu yɛ nɛ dea, tɛ nɛaa in tɛ piaa k’ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt, wen yuwar nɔ k’ɛɛ‘i ɔ sa̧-a̧.» Ɓɛɛ Tobit tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Sɔ̧ a tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, sɛm kɔ‘m», ɓɛɛ a̧ sa bem kɔ̧-a̧ «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ ɗafi mɔ wen nɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, á mɛ yak in nya-mɛ. Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese a̧ duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba'nɛ́ piinɛ, nɛ hayatɛ, kpa nɛ‘m! Betom kɔ̧-A̧ a nɛ́ yuwar in'nɛ́ɛ́, a̧ a̧ pɛm'nɛ́, bem kɔ‘m! » Tobia gboo zan mɛ yak, a̧ hɛra dáà kɔ̧-a̧ in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ war nɛ wa, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nɔ a bá nɛ ɛ́nɛ́!»
Nàà kɔ̧-a̧ zuu nú tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ Tobit: «Mɛ dee ha̧ bem kɔ‘m mɛ yak wen ge? A̧ bo nɛ́ dɔra-nɛnɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ na nde? a̧ n'aa duk zik nɛ ɛɛ'ɛ.
Ká mbɔi daŋ zu mbɔi na, gana so ɛɛ zɔk bem k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Pɛrti dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ Gasa Wan ha̧h’ɛɛ'ɛ, nyɛma so kɔ‘i.»

Tobit kifa ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ ta mɔ na! ká mɛ de kíí wen wa na, bokonya'm, mɔ lɛŋ tɛ yak nɛ dea zu bem k’ɛ́ɛ́, tɛ nɛaa in piaa kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt: yí-mɛ tɛ zɔk wese n'aa tɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ pii tɛ-mɛ, ŋma mɔ beka de a̧ na.
Ká mɛ ta mɔ na, bokonya'm, mɛ kaɗi dee kíí wen zu wa, ŋma de betom ko Sɔ̧ tɛ mgbɔ a nɛnɛ, nɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ, ŋma mɔ beka de a̧ na.»
Ɓɛɛ a̧ kaɗi hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a.
Be-ŋgaiwi yaka in betom Rafaɛl, ɓɛɛ toyo kɔ̧-a̧ ndak ɗoŋ wa. Wa kaia ŋmaa yak, ɓɛɛ tɛ kuti zɛ wa ɔɔ ka zaŋ yi «Tigrɛ».
Be-ŋgaiwi zira mɛ fɔr naŋ sɛn ɗɔɔ yì. Nɛ mɔ‘o nɛ gasa zoro ndɔra nɛ ɗɔɔ yi tik zan, ɓɛɛ kii mɛ nyɔŋ naŋ-a. Be-ŋgaiwi hiɗa mɔ,
ɓɛɛ betom tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ «Mɛ ba a̧, mɛ nɔkɔɗ ‘a!» Be-ŋgaiwi nɔkɔɗa zoro, ɓɛɛ zuɗi a̧ pi zan.
Betom tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Mɛ gbo zaŋ zoro, a̧ mɛ ba pa̧i̧-a, nyumu-a in see-a, mɛ kai wa a nɛtɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kai zaŋ-a a taŋ; wen pa̧i̧-a, nyumu-a in see-a nɛ mɔɔ-de-nyina.»
Be-ŋgaiwi gboo zaŋ zoro, ba pa̧i̧-a, nyumu-a in see-a, a̧ dɔ ŋma ɓira zoro'i nyoŋ, ɓɛɛ a tɔŋ tɛ oi-aa, ká tɛɛ mbɔr.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa, wa kaia ŋmaa mɛ nɛ nɔ kɔ-wa siti hɔ́ mgbak ka̧ nú Mɛdii.
Ɓɛɛ be-ŋgaiwi ak betom: «Nya'm Azaria, nɛ ge nyina ge a'i nyɛma mɛ de nɛ nyumu-zoro, in see-a, in pa̧i̧-a ge? »
Betom kifa ha̧ a̧: «Kóó, nɛ wiwii, kóó nɛ okóò, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ginaazi kóó ɗaŋ sɔ̧ sɛn tɛ, kà mɛ̀ dɔ nyumu in see-zoro sɛn ti wi’ɛi, zii-wee-a ndaka ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa.»
Nɛ kó pa̧i̧-a, mɛ tɛ sɔ̧ yi-a sɛn yí-bíí, nɛ wíì kpea'i, mɛ ufa, ɓɛɛ wíì‘i ɓara yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔka mɔ wéér.
Wa hɔɔ nú Mɛdii, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɛɗa ka̧ ye Ekbatanɛ,
Rafaɛl tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ be-ŋgaiwi: «Nya'm Tobia!» ɓɛɛ Tobia kifi nu: «Nɛ́ ge?» Betom tɔ̧ɔ̧: «Nɛ́ tɛ ko Raguɛl ɛɛ tɛ zir sɛnɛ sɔsɔɔ! a̧ nɛ ŋma dáà kɔ-mɛ. A̧ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋma be-okóò, nin-a nɛ Sara.

A bo nɛ ŋma be-wiwii kóó ŋma be-okóò yak zu be-okóò‘i na. Mɛ́ nɛ́ mgbak zuduk kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ́ mɛ́ a nyɛma so mɛ ba a̧ nɛ̀ kóò ti. Nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ nyɛma mɛ ba mbɔi oi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Sara nɛ ŋma de be-zɔŋa, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ mboozu in nɔɔŋgiɗi mbɛt, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kpasa bíí.

Mɛ nyɛma mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò. Mɛ zíí nú‘m, de sɛm kɔ‘m, ga̧a̧mɔ sɔsɔɔ'ɔ, mi tɛ tɔ̧ wen ko be-zɔŋa'i in dáà kɔ̧-a̧, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɗɔaa mɛ ha̧ a̧ nɛ kóò ha̧ mɛ. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́ bɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kur Raguɛs mɛ si tɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de gbaŋa baaŋmaa. Mi iŋa, Raguɛl nyɛm mɛ dɔ mɛ nɛ a̧ na, a̧ nyɛm mɛ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ ŋma mbe wii na mbɛt, wen wa nyɛma mɛ gbɛ a̧, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise, a̧ iŋa nɛ mbetɛ nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ nyɛma so mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò ti. Hegɔ, de sɛm kɔ‘m, ga̧a̧mɔ sɔsɔɔ, ɛɛ in Raguɛl, ɛɛ tɛ ba keta see zu be-zɔŋa'i, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ ɗafi mɔ wen baaŋmaa k’ɛ́nɛ́. Kura k’ɛ́ɛ́ Raguɛs wen siaa, ɛɛ tɛ mgbɔ a̧ si nɛnɛ, tɛ kɔ-mɛ.»

Tobia kifa ha̧ Rafaɛl: «Azaria nya'm, mi zia, wa mgbɔɔ so Sara ha̧ wii war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ o wii nɔ‘i lɛŋ fe wese sii tua; nɛ kalɛ kpɔk zaŋ zɛ nɛ wa si nɛ tua ɗoŋ a̧‘i a̧ wa fe nɛnɛ. Mi zia o ŋma bíí fara tɔ̧a̧a nde nɛ ŋma ɗaŋ-sɔ̧ a̧ gbɛɛ wa;

nɛ mɔ‘i, sa kíí de'm kinii mbɛt. Ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i de ɗaŋmɔ in kóò‘i na, ɓɛɛ, nɛ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wiwii nɛ si ka̧ tɛ a̧, a̧ ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i gbɛ nɛ a̧. Mi nɛ kpɔk bem ko dáà kɔ‘m. Ka'm fe, ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ‘m in nàà kɔ‘m tɛ fe fio gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ wen zu'm. Wa be nɛ ŋma bem nɛ tɛ gun wa na.»

Rafaɛl tɔɔ̧ ha̧ Tobia: «Tɛ-mɛ bii ɗoŋ mbɔrɔ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ nde? Bo nɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ ba kóò nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ na nde? De sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ zíí! ká mɛ ta mɔ wen ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i na; Mɛ ba Sara nɛ kóò. Mi iŋa'e wa tɛ mgbɔ a̧ ha̧ mɛ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ ye babir ɗoŋ a̧, mɛ ba ɓira see-zoro in nyumu-a, mɛ a zu kɛ̧i-wee: ŋgimbi nɛ pɛr-a tɛ dun kɔ babir, ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i tɛ zíí pɛr-aa: a̧ tɛ gɔm yak, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka pii ɗɔŋ ɓɔ na.

Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ iŋ tɛ in a̧, ɛnɛ kur yiitoo lɛŋ mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, ha̧ A̧ mɛ de ko h’ɛ́nɛ́ in ha̧ A̧ mɛ pɛm'nɛ́. Ká mɛ de kíí na! Sɔ̧ hoka Sara nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ ɓeemɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɛ́ a̧ tɛ kpasi a̧. A̧ tɛ yak in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɔ̧ nɛ kpasawen ha̧ mɛ: a̧ tɛ ko bem nɛ dɔkaa in mɛɛ: wa tɛ ya hee o nya-mɛ ga. Ká mɛ ta mɔ na.»
Ɗoŋ nɛ Tobia zia wen nɛ Rafaɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e Sara nɛ bokonya-a, pɛrnam ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ soɓee see-a kura dúk tɛ Sara, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ a̧ nɛ kpasaa.

Ngimbi nɛ wa hɔa Ekbatanɛ, Tobia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Rafaɛl: «Azaria, sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ mgbɔ‘m nɛnɛ zeeŋ tɛ ko nam kɔ‘m Raguɛl.» Rafaɛl mgbɔɔ a̧ nɛnɛ tɛ Raguɛl. Wa kpaa a̧ fara duk nù nú-beegara kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa fan a̧ ti. Raguɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya'm, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ nɛ dea nde? Mɛɛ, h’ɛ́nɛ́», ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ wa si kɔ̧ tua kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Ɛdna: «Oe, hɔɔ ŋmaa nɛ be-ŋgaiwi’ɛ hɔɔ nɛnɛ in nya'm Tobit wa!»
Sa, Ɛdna ak wa: «O nya'm, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ nɛ dée?» Wa kifa nú: «Ɛɛ nɛ o bezaŋ Nɛftali nɛ wa kaia so nɛ bara si Ninivɛ»
A aka wa woyo: «Ɛnɛ iŋa nya-ɛɛ Tobia nde?» Wa kifa: «Ii, ɛɛ iŋa a̧.»
A̧ aka mɔ woyo: «A̧ duk hee ge nde?» Wa kifa: «A̧ duk nɛ dea, a̧ ɓɔna nɛ kpasa kaŋ.» Ɓɛɛ Tobia tɔ̧ woyo: «Nɛ́ dáà kɔ‘m!»

Ziaa nɛ Raguɛl zia hegɔ, a̧ kura zalaŋ, hɛr a̧ ndaɗi yi-see, ɓɛɛ zu̧ nú tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧. Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Sɔ̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, bem kɔ‘m; dáà kɔ-mɛ nɛ kpasa bíí. Nɛ ge ɗaŋ sɔnti ge a kpaa dáà kɔ-mɛ, nɛ duka so nɛ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, in gasa wi-gbak-wisan, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kifi nɛ wan-bɔma-yí ge?» A̧ hɛra Tobia ɓɛɛ a̧ zu nú-a tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo.
Kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Ɛdna hi̧a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ta nɛ Tobit, bokobem kɔ-wa Sara hi̧a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt.
Raguɛl gɔna vala-sami kpɛk nɛ o gɛnɛ kɔ‘i.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa zuia yi, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dómɔ kɔ-wa, in nɛ wa yaa nu mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kaɗi, Tobia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Rafaɛl: «De sɛm kɔ‘m Azaria, mɛ ak Raguɛl a̧ a̧ ha̧ bokonya'm Sara ha̧‘m nɛ kóò.»

Raguɛl zia wen'i, bɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Tobia: «Mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, a̧ mɛ nɔ mɔ nɛ dea, mɛ ga̧ tɛ-mɛ, wen ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ ba bokobem Sara nɛ kóò, yak zu mɛ, bo ɓɔ na. Mi bo nɛ ŋgai mɛ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ ŋma mbe wii na, wen mɛ nɛ mgbak nam ko dáà kɔ‘m. Hegɔ‘i bem kɔ‘m, mi tɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen lɛŋ ha̧ mɛ.
Mi ha̧Sara nɛ kóò ha o nam k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɔárɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɗoŋ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ wa fea, ŋgimbi nɛ wa nɛɛ si ka tɛ a̧. Kinii, bem kɔ‘m, mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, mɛ nɔ mɔ, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ yor ɗoŋ‘nɛ́.»

Tobia tɔ̧a̧: «Mi beka nyɔŋ mɔ kóó nɔɔ mɔ na, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ gba nɛ mgbara wen’ɛ sɛ.» Raguɛl tɔ̧a̧: «Ii, mi tɛ de. Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am ha̧Sara ha̧ mɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise ga, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese a̧ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ mɛ. Mɛ ba bokonya-mɛ nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ. Ku̧u̧ naŋ-a sɔsɔɔ, a̧ nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ, mɛ nɛ wii kɔ̧-a̧. Gasa Wan mɛ yiwese tɛ de ha̧ mɔ mɛ yak zu'nɛ mɛ ze hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ dea, bem kɔ‘m. A̧ a̧ zɔk'nɛ́ nɛ ko, A̧ a̧ ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́.»

Raguɛl saa bokobem kɔ‘i Sara, ɓɛɛ Sara tɛ pii tɛ a̧. A̧ kasa er-a, a̧ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ Tobia, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise, nɛ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ mɛ‘i. Mɛ mgbɔ a̧ si tɛ kɔ dáà kɔ-mɛ. Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese a̧ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ sinɛ tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Raguɛl saa nàà ko Sara, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba mɔɔ-yɔr-mɔ tɛnɛ; A̧ yɔra mɔɔ-sedaakɔ-baaŋmaa, nɛ tɔ̧‘e, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise, Sara nɛ kóò ko Tobia. Ɓɛɛ wa ku̧ naŋ nyɔŋa mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ.»
Raguɛl sa kóò kɔ‘i Ɛdna, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bokonya'm, mɛ ɗafi ɓii gɔna bɛrtua, ɓɛɛ mɛ mgbɔ bem k’ɛ́ɛ́ si sɛnɛ.»
Ɛdna nɛɛ ɗafi gado kɔ gɔna-bɛrtua, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wii tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ mgbɔ Sara si sɛnɛ, a̧ zu̧u̧ nu-a tɛ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ta nɛ Sara, ɓɛɛ a̧ tur yí-a yinɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Mɛ nyɔŋ nin-mɛ, bem kɔ‘m, Gasa Wan mɛ yiwese a̧ kpai bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ desee, mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi, bem kɔ‘m», ɓɛɛ Ɛdna gbo.
Ɗoŋ nɛ wa kaɗa nyɔŋa mɔ in nɔɔ mɔ kaɗi, ŋgimbi ɔ nu hɔa, wa mgbɔa Tobia nɛnɛ si kɔ gɔna bɛrtua.
Tɛ Tobia mbaŋa ɗoŋ wen ko Rafaɛl. A̧ baa see-zoro in nyumu-a gbonɛ nɛ kɔ̧ ŋgɔɓɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai a zu kɛ̧i-wee.
Pɛr-a ndaka ɗaŋ-sɔ̧ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ-sɔ̧‘i gɔm, ye zaŋ búk, yak si nú Egyptɛ mɛ. Rafaɛl ndaka ɗoŋ a̧, nɔkɔɗi a̧, hɛr a̧ sɛn hi̧i̧.

O dáà in nàà ko Sara gboo kɔ tua, kpɛ nutua e sɛn zu Tobia in Sara. Tobia kura nɛ gɔn gado, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Sara: «Mɛ kur, bokonya'm, ɛɛ kɔfi Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ ai nú ha̧ A̧: A̧ a̧ de ko h’ɛ́ɛ́, A̧ a pɛm yɛ.»

Sara kura, ɓɛɛ wa ku̧ naŋ kɔfa Sɔ̧, ai nɛ nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ pɛm wa. Kɔfasɔ̧ ko Tobia nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ́ɛ́ gasi'Nɛ́, Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́. Nin-‘Nɛ́ a hu̧r kpoo nɛ kpoo. O mɔ mɛ yiwese in o mɔ mɛ zaŋnu, o mɔ nɛ‘Nɛ́ dea lɛŋ a zɔn'Nɛ́. »

Nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dee Adam, nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ dee kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Eva mɛ gbak a̧ in mɛ yor ɗoŋ a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ sɛn tɛ wa yiitoo'i a̧ kpar-bíí gboo nɛnɛ, nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a tɔ̧a̧: «Bo nɛ ɔ dee ha̧ wiwii mɛ duk ɛnɛ na, Mi tɛ de ŋma bíí nɛ tɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧ mɛ gbak a̧.»
Kinii, bo nɛ wɔ baakóò a̧ gbɛ‘m mɛ ba bokonya'm’ɛ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen mbɔɔ zu, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ zɔ́k ɛɛ yiitoo nɛ ko, hɔ ŋgimbi sɔki k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ nɛ tigɛr kpɔk: «Amɛn! Amɛn!»
Ɓɛɛ wa ɔ nu.
Raguɛl kura, ɓɛɛ sa o widetom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa nɛɛ za̧ kɔfio, wen a̧ taa so nde: «ŋmafara be-ŋgaiwi'i tɛ fe, ɓɛɛ o bíí tɛ mam yɛ, da̧ nɛ ɛɛ mbɛt!»
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa za̧a̧ kɔ̧ kaɗi, Raguɛl pia ɗoŋ pi kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘i, sa kóò kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ tom ŋma kodetom kɔ-mɛ nɛnɛ kɔ gɔna bɛrtua mɛ zɔk mɔ kà Tobia nɛ duka nɛ kpasa. Kà a̧ nɛ fea, h’ɛ́ɛ́ gun a̧ nɛ hu̧saa, ká ŋma bíí tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ.»
Wa foo kodetom nɛnɛ, wa ha̧ wee ha̧ a̧, wa hu̧i̧ nu gɔna bɛrtua, a̧ ye tua, kpa wa fara ɔ zɔm ya in ŋmaa.
A̧ gbɔa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «A̧ dúk kpasa, mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ nɛ dea!»
Wa dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɔ dee ha̧ o bíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ sa̧-a̧see mɛ zɔn'Nɛ́ ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
Osoko h’Ɛ́nɛ́ wen zɔm desee nɛ‘Nɛ́ ha̧ha̧‘m’ɛ, wen mɔ de hee wan n'am taa ga na; Ɛnɛ dee gba demɔ in yɛ tɛ gasa kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Osoko h’Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ dee ko ha̧ o kpɔk bem nɔ'ɔ yiitoo’ɛ. Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ zɔ́k wa nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ, Ɛnɛ pɛm wa, Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ wa mɛ kpa desee tɛ dukaa kɔ-wa siti.
Ɓɛɛ Raguɛl tɔ̧ ha̧ o widetom kɔ‘i mɛ kpe kɔ̧ nɛti ha̧ mɔ mɛ gɔn.
Raguɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ kóò kɔ‘i mɛ dɔ brɛt nɛ dɔkaa, ɓɛɛ a̧ ye poo o mɔdai kɔ̧ a̧ kai ndai yiitoo in vala sami náár, ha̧ ha̧ wa mɛ gi, ɓɛɛ wa ku̧ naŋ ɗafa mɔ wen gbaŋa.
A̧ saa Tobia, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ tɛ ɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧ zɛ ɓu-zu-a-náár, nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ mɔ, ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ bokobem kɔ‘m, oi bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧.

Kinii, mɛ bá reta mbɔi kɔ‘m, si nɛnɛ nɛ dea tɛ ko dáà kɔ-mɛ. Oi-a nɛ tɛ ɓɔn duk nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, oi fio k’ɛ́ɛ́ in kóò kɔ‘m. Mɛ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, bem kɔ‘m, mi nɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ Ɛdna nɛ nàà kɔ-mɛ. Ɛɛ a̧a̧ ka tɛ-mɛ in kóò kɔ-mɛ ku̧u̧-naŋ-a kinii, hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi!»
Tobia saa Rafaɛl, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:

«Azaria, de sɛm kɔ‘m, mɛ nɛ in widetom náár, á̧ mɛ ba ŋgeloba yiitoo, mɛ yak sɛn Raguɛs tɛ ko Gabaɛl, mɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-sedaako-mbɔi ha̧ a̧, mɛ bá mbɔi hi̧i̧ er-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ pii ɗoŋ in Gabaɛl wen gbaŋa-baaŋmaa.
Mɛ iŋa nɛ dea'e dáà kɔ‘m tɔr nɛ zɛ wen piaa kɔ‘m wese lɛŋ. Ka'm ɓɔn zɛ kpɔk, tɛ ha̧ ɗaŋsee ha̧ a̧ nyɛmna. Mɛ iŋa mbɛt Raguɛl kanamɔ‘e wi nyɛm mɛ e'm mɛ yak na: mi nyɛm mɛ yak zu ha̧a̧nú kɔ̧-a̧ na. »

Rafaɛl yaka in o widetom náár in ŋgeloba yiitoo sɛn Raguɛs, nú Mɛdii, wa ɔɔ tɛ ko Gabaɛl. Rafaɛl ha̧mɔɔ-sedaako-mbɔi ha̧ Gabaɛl. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen baakóò ko Tobia, bem ko Tobit, ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ tom sara wen gbaŋa-baakóò ha̧ a̧ mbɛt. Beebee mɔ‘i, Gabaɛl tɔra o ŋgoɓo-sede n'a̧a̧ ee so nɛ hɛraa, nɛ oi tumbal, ɓɛɛ kai wa a sɛn zu o ŋgeloba.

Ɓɛɛ wa kai ŋmaa, mɛ gɔna ndaazan, nɛ si fara gbaŋa-baakóò. Wa yee tɛ kɔ Raguɛl, ɓɛɛ wa kpaa Tobia ka̧ nyɔŋmɔ. Tobia kura nɛ ŋgai mɛ fan Gabaɛl; Gabaɛl ŋmaa nú tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tok nɛ de yoŋgo a zu a̧‘e: «Mɛ, de bem ko dewi, widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a in yaa-de-ko. Gasa Wan a̧ tok de yoŋgo nɛ yiwese pii sɛn zu mɛ in kóò ko-mɛ, pii sɛn zu dáà in nàà ko kóò kɔ-mɛ. Osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ dee ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk nya'm Tobia, nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in dáà kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛmna.»
Hegɔ‘i dam ɗɔŋ wese kpɔk kpɔk, Tobit tɔr nɛ zɛ nɛaa sɛn Raguɛs, in zɛ piaa. Zɛ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaka, ɓɛɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ pii hɔɔ na.
A taa mɔ: wa dora nɛ a̧ e hi̧i̧ ndé, ŋmafara Gabaɛl fe fee nde, kóó ŋma bíí bo wen ha̧sede'i ha̧ a̧ na ndé,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ku̧ naŋ kpaa ɗaŋsee.
Anna, kóò kɔ̧-a̧, tɔ̧̧: «Bem kɔ‘m fee kadi, bɛka'm kpa a̧ ɓɔ na.» A̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a, ai nɛ nú-a wen bem kɔ̧-a̧, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«Oe, bɔnɛ kɔ‘m wa, bem kɔ‘m! mɛ́ nɛ̀ mɛ̀ duk nɛ́ sa̧a̧mɔ yi'm, nɛ mɔ n'am ee mɛ mɛ yak’ɛ.»

Tobit tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ká mɛ tɔ̧ wen hegɔ na, kóò kɔ‘m! a̧ dúk nɛ dea. Nɛ ŋma mɔ a sakala wa. Sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ wa yaka in ŋmaa nɛ́ mgbak bíí, a̧ nɛ ŋma nya-ɛɛ. Ká mɛ ta mɔ na, bokonya'm. Mɛ tɛ zɔk a̧: a̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ. Dekpaa a̧ hɔɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧.»

Anna kifa: «Mɛ kpe nú-mɛ! mɛ́ ɔr nɛ‘m! bem kɔ‘m fee kaɗi!» Wese lɛŋ, a̧ gbo zan nɛ hayaa mɛ zɔk mɔ si yuwar nɛ bem baa so, wen a̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ zíí wen kɔ ŋma bíí na. Dam ɗoŋ ga̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ, tɛ yee-wese a̧ ye tua, a̧ kiŋgili tɛ-a nɛ nu zaŋ zɛ lɛŋ, hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a, yá hɔ yi a̧ na.

Ɗoŋ nɛ zɛ ɓu-zu-a-náár, nɛ Raguɛl gɔna so wen gbaŋa baakóò dama kaɗi, Tobia tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ for wi: «Ɛnɛ e ha̧‘m si, wen mi iŋa dáà kɔ‘m in nàà kɔ‘m bo nɛ taamɔ zɔka'm ɓɔ na. Hegɔ, dɛ́ kɔ‘m, mi ai nú‘m h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ e yuwar ha̧‘m mɛ si tɛ ko dáà kɔ‘m, wen mi baa tɔ̧ so nyɛrɛ dukaa, n'am e nɛ wa sɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́. »
Raguɛl tɔ̧ ha̧ Tobia: «Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ yak na! mɛ duk in am! Mi tɛ tom bíí mɛ tɔ nyɛrɛ dukaa kɔ-mɛ ha̧ dáà kɔ-mɛ.» Tobia tɔ̧a̧: «Weyaa! mi ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́! ɛnɛ é‘m mɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ dáà kɔ‘m!»
Wen'i nu'i, ɓɛɛ Raguɛl ha̧ kóò kɔ̧-a̧ Sara ha̧ a̧, in reta mbɔi kɔ-a̧ lɛŋ mbɛt: o wi-de-tom in o koo-de-tom, o ndai in o sami, o tuifuu in o ŋgeloba, o laa, o sede, o nyɛk, in o ŋma mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.

A̧ e ha̧ wa mɛ si nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ a̧ war Tobia, hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «De hayatɛ ha̧ mɛ, bem kɔ‘m, mɛ si nɛ dea. Gasa Wan mɛ yiwese a̧ duk ti h’ɛ́nɛ́, mɛ in kóò kɔ-mɛ Sara! A̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ fe! »

A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Sara: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɛ ko o for-mɛ, wen wa nɛ́ o dáà kɔ-mɛ kinii, hee ɛɛ n’ɛɛ́ koo mɛ ga. Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ nɛ́ ɗɔɔ ga̧a̧mɔ, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zíí nɛ́ nyɛrɛ demɔ kɔ-mɛ, ŋgimbi n’ɛɛ́ ɓɔna nɛ gbaayí-ɛɛ kaŋ.» A̧ wara wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ e wa yak.

Ɛdna mbɛt tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Tobia: «Yaa-dua-see'am, Gasa Wan a̧ mgbɔ mɛ sinɛ nɛ dea. A̧ a̧ de ha̧‘m mɛ zɔk o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ in Sara, nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ fe. Mi ha̧bokobem kɔ‘m ha̧ mɛ, nɛ nin Gasa Wan: mɛ kasi a̧ nɛ dea. Ká mɛ ha̧ tu̧u̧see ha̧ a̧ tɛ dukaa kɔ-mɛ zaŋnu’ɛ na! Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ nɛ ɗɔɔ ga̧a̧mɔ. Kinii mi nɛ nàà kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ Sara nɛ bokonya-mɛ. Sɔ̧ a̧ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kpa nɛ kpɔk desee tɛ dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ» Ɛdna hɛra wa yiitoo lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ e ha̧ wa mɛ yak nɛ gasa desee.

Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Tobia gboo nɛ tɛ ko Raguɛl si nɛ tortɛ in nɛ nyɛŋɛ, de nɛ osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan mɛ yiwese in zaŋnu, Wi nɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ, wen A̧ dea ha̧ nɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ ba nɛ a̧. Raguɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ woyo: «Sɔ̧ a̧ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpa desee, tɛ tu̧u̧ tɛ̧ o dáà kɔ-mɛ, wese lɛŋ tɛ duka-kpasa kɔ-wa.»
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa hɛɗa ka Kaserin ti Ninivɛ kaɗi ga, Rafaɛl tɔ̧a̧:
«Mɛ iŋa hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ́ ee nɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ ga.
Ɛɛ yak ti ha̧ kóò kɔ-mɛ, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nɛ ɗafi mɔ kɔ̧ tua, nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ hɔ in o dɔka bíí.»
Wa kaia ŋmaa yiitoo lɛŋ yaknɛ. (Rafaɛl baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ Tobia: «Mɛ kasi pa̧i-zoro er-mɛ»). Ɓɛɛ kó toyo ko Tobia, kana nɛ ndaka ɗoŋ wa.
Ŋgimbi'i, Anna dúk nɛ nu ka yuwar zɔk nɛ mɔ fara nɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ pii nɛnɛ.
A̧ zɔka a̧ fara piaa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Mɛ zɔk bem kɔ-mɛ nɛ pii in gbamayari kɔ‘i mɛ‘i’ɛ.»
Rafaɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Tobia, nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ hɔ katɛ dáà kɔ̧-a̧: «Mi iŋa'e yí-dɛ́ kɔ-mɛ tɛ hu̧i̧.
Mɛ a pa̧i-zoro yi-a̧; nyina tɛ fok, ɓɛɛ tɛ fo wíì yí-a yinɛ; ɓɛɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ sa̧-a̧, hee kuti-a nɛti ga.»
Anna maa yi hɛr bem kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi zɔka mɛ woyo, bem kɔ‘m, kinii mi nyɛma mɛ fe», ɓɛɛ a̧ zu nú-a̧ tɛ kɔ̧a̧.
Tobit kura, tam nɛ mɔ nɛk nɛk nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ gbo nɛ nutua mɛ beegara.
Tobia ɗɔŋa si ka tɛ dáà kɔ‘i, kasi nɛ pa̧i-zoro er, a̧ ufa si kɔ̧ yi-dɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ kasi nɛ a̧: «dɛ́ kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi!» A̧ aa nyina yí-a, kasi nɛ a̧ yor nɛnɛ.
Nɛ er-a yiitoo, a̧ wɛna yí-dɛ́ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wii hui a nu.
Tobit hɛra ger-a rɔɔm, híí nɛ kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mi zɔka mɛ woyo, bem kɔ‘m nɛ mɛ dúk nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ yí‘m.»

Ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧. Ɛɛ gasi nɛ sa̧-a̧ nin-A̧. Ɛɛ zɔn nɛ o sa̧a̧ betom kɔ̧-A̧ lɛŋ. Sɔ̧, nɛ nin-A̧ ɔ sa̧-a̧, a̧ pɛm yɛ! Ɛɛ zɔn nɛ o sa̧a̧ betom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ kpoo nɛ kpoo! Wen Gasa Wan ee so'm tɛ gasa bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ kinii mi zɔk nɛ bem kɔ‘m Tobia woyo

Tobia yee kɔ tua nɛ nyɛŋɛ, zɔn nɛ nin Sɔ̧ nɛ heeger. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ dáà kɔ̧-a̧‘e nɔ kɔ‘i baa nɛ wi, wi baa mbɔi piinɛ, in wi baa Sara, bem ko Raguɛl, nɛ kóò mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ siti'e: «A̧ hɛɗa hɔaa kaɗi, a̧ nyɛi̧ nɛ nu garo Ninivɛ na.»

Tobit nɛɛ nɛ desee gasi nɛ Sɔ̧, we ti for-a si war nu-garo Ninivɛ mɛ. Nɛ o bíí Ninivɛ be zɔk'a fara nɛ nɔ ɛnɛ-a, ŋma bíí duk ti ha̧ a̧ na, ɗɛɗɛ-wa gɔna nyɛmna. Tobit tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa'e Sɔ̧ zɔka wi nɛ ko, ɓɛɛ hu̧i̧ yi-wi.

A̧ hɔa katɛ Sara, kóò ko bem kɔ̧-a̧ Tobia, a̧ toka de yoŋgo a zu a̧, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e «Mɛ hɔa nɛ dea nde, bem kɔ‘m? Osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ, nɛ mgbɔɔ mɛ tɛnɛ hɔ tɛ k’ɛɛ'ɛ. Sɔ̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu dáà kɔ-mɛ, Sɔ̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu bem kɔ‘m Tobia, Sɔ̧ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ, bem kɔ‘m. Mɛ ye kɔ̧ tua kɔ-mɛ, mɛɛ, mɛɛ ha̧ mɛ! de yoŋgo in desee ha̧ mɛ, bem kɔ‘m! mɛ ye tua!»
Sen wese'i, o be-Juif nɛ a̧a̧ Ninivɛ lɛŋ kpaa desee.
Ahikar in Nadan, o be-nɔkɔ ko Tobit, tɛa nɛ desee tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ gbaŋa-baakóò kaɗa kaɗi, Tobit saa bem kɔ‘i Tobia, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ ha̧ sede-tom ko gbamayari kɔ-mɛ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ e mbe mɔ zu a ha̧ a̧ mbɛt.»
Tobia kifa ha̧ dáà kɔ‘i: «Dáà, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧ gee? Kóó mɛ kɛ̧ nɛ mbɔi nɛ ɛɛ baa piinɛ tan ka see-a ha̧ a̧, mi beka'm tik na.
A̧ mgbɔa’ m piinɛ, kóó ŋma mɔ kpa'm na; a̧ kpasa kóò kɔ‘m, a̧ baa mbɔi piinɛ in am, a̧ kpasa ‘nɛ́ mbɛt! Nɛ ge mɔ ge a̧‘m tɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧, oi mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ge?»
Tobit tɔ̧̧: «Bem kɔ‘m, nyɛma so ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba reta mɔ n'a̧a̧ ba piinɛ lɛŋ.»
Tobia sa a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ ba reta mɔ nɛ mɛ baa piinɛ lɛŋ. Nɛ́ mbɔi-tom kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ si ɗɔɔ ga̧a̧mɔ!»

Rafaɛl saa wa yiitoo benaŋ si mgbɔɔr, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɛnɛ hú̧r nin-A̧ sɛn ti bíí lɛŋ, wen demɔ n'A̧a dee in'nɛ́. O dee ha̧‘i mɛ gasi A̧, in mɛ zɔn nin-A̧. Ɛnɛ déà ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ mɛ iŋ o mɔ n'A̧a dea, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ ga. Ká tɛ-‘nɛ́ mbɔi tɛ zɔna A̧ na.
Ɔ dee ha̧‘i mɛ kasi hu̧samɔ ko wannu nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o tom nɛ Sɔ̧ dea, wi tɛ tɔ̧ kana nɛ nyɛrɛ-a, hu̧r nɛ nin-A wen a mbɛt, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ ga. Ɛnɛ dé demɔ, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ beka kpa ‘nɛ́ na.
Kɔfa Sɔ̧ nɛ kpasaa, in gbaka o wisan nɛ yuwar-a gana kpaa dɔka mbɔi nɛ rikisi. Gana so ha̧mɔ ha̧ wisan bá nɛ mɔi̧a̧ lɔr.
Ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ wisan gbo nɛ wi tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ fɔra ɗaŋmɔ tɛ wi yinɛ mbɛt. O wi nɛ gbak wisan tɛ duk nɛ dɔka zɛ zaŋnu.
O wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in gɔɔmɔ wa sɛn nɛ tɛ-wa.
Kinii mi tɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen lɛŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́, ŋma mɔ n'am tɛ hu̧si nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ bo na. Mi tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́ kinii nde'i: ɔ dee mɛ kasi hu̧samɔ ko wannu nɛ dea, in mɛ de ha̧ nyɛrɛ gasa tom ko Sɔ̧ mɛ hu̧r.
Hegɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ kɔfa nɛ Sɔ̧, mɛ in Sara, nɛ́ mi a̧‘m baa kɔfamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ti Gasa Wan; ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ duka so gun nɛ o fio mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ nik so naŋ-mɛ tɛ kuraa, e nɛ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ dúk mɛ nɛ gun fio na, mɛ nɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i a̧ Sɔ̧ toma so nɛ‘m mɛ́ we mɛ.
Kpɔk ŋgimbi'i mbɛt, Sɔ̧ toma so'm mɛ kpasi mɛ in be-for-mɛ Sara mbɛt.
Nɛ́ mi Rafaɛl, ŋma kpɔk mgbara o betom ko Sɔ̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, nɛ ya ti Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, Wan gasamɔ, in nɛ dúk dɔ̧́ɔ̧́ wen dea tom ha̧ A̧.»
Tobit in bem kɔ‘i yaa ɓeke-yeke, kii dee wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa ba yi-wa gu nù.
Rafaɛl tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «K’ɛnɛ de kii na! ga̧a̧mɔ a duk in'nɛ́! ɛnɛ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ ŋgimbi lɛŋ!
Ŋgimbi n'am duka in ‘nɛ́ɛ́, bo nɛ tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ‘m a'm duka nɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧. Nɛ́ A̧ ɛnɛ tɛ bii gima ha̧ A̧ gasi nɛnɛ dam ɗɔŋ wese lɛŋ.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ taa so mi nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ, bo nɛ mi nyɔŋ so nɛ mɔ na, nɛ gee búk-tɛ‘m.
Hegɔ, ɛnɛ gási Sɔ̧ sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ, ɛnɛ zɔn gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧. Ɓɛɛ kinii mi sia kɔ‘m ɗoŋ, si katɛ wi nɛ toma'm tɛnɛ. Ɛnɛ yɔr mɔ nɛ hɔa lɛŋ.» Ɓɛɛ Rafaɛl kur daŋ si tɛ Sɔ̧.
Wa baa zu-wa nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛm mɛ zɔk a̧ ɓɔ na.
Wa bia gima gasi nɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa zɔn A̧ wen o gasa mɔ n'A̧a dea: nɛ́ ŋma betom ko Sɔ̧ a usa tɛ ha̧ wa.
Ɓɛɛ Tobit tɔ̧:

«Ɛɛ zɔn Sɔ̧ nɛ duk kpasá, nɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo! Nɛ́ A̧ a̧ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ bíí, nɛ́ A̧ a de ko ha̧ bíí mbɛt. A zir bíí si fara ko o fio, sɛn ɗuka ɗɔɔ nu mɛ, A̧ gboo bíí tɛ gasa yɔɔmɔ mbɛt: ŋma mɔ nɛ yun er-A bona. »
Ɛnɛ o be Israɛl, ɛnɛ hú̧r nin-A sɛn ti dukbíí lɛŋ, n'A̧a pɛsa'nɛ́ si sɛnɛ.
Wen nɛ sɛn fara'i a A̧ usa gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ zɔ́n A̧ sɛn ti bíí lɛŋ nɛ duk kpasá, wen A̧ nɛ Gasa Wan k’ɛ́ɛ́, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, Dáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, A̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ kpoo nɛ kpoo
A̧ nɛ́ usa bɔnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ wen ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ de ko h’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ woyo, A̧ tɛ mɔi̧ ‘nɛ́ piinɛ ɗɔŋ nɛ mgbara o dukbíí lɛŋ, n'A̧a pɛsa ‘nɛ si sɛnɛ.
Wese n’ɛnɛ tɛ pii ɗɔŋ tɛ A̧, nɛ see'nɛ́ lɛŋ, in nɛ tɛ-‘nɛ́ lɛŋ, de nɛ tom ha̧ A̧ nɛ kpasaa, A̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ A̧ beka hu̧si sɔnti-A̧ nɛ ɛnɛ ɓɔ na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛnɛ zɔ́k mɔ n'A̧a dea wen ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ hú̧r nin-A̧ nɛ heeger, ɛnɛ zɔ́n Gasa Wan yaa-demɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɛnɛ gási Wannu nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo.

War kɔ‘m, mi hu̧r nɛ nin-A̧, sɛn nu nɛ wa baa'm nɛ bara si sɛnɛ, mi tɔ̧ nɛ nyɛrɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-A̧ in gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ zuduk-bíí-de-ɗaŋmɔ. Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, ɛnɛ píi ɗoŋ sɛn tɛ A̧, ɛnɛ dé mɔ nɛ yuwar-a sɛn ti A̧. O'o iŋa o, ŋmafara A̧ tɛ kpɛk ‘nɛ́ nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ zɔk ‘nɛ́ nɛ ko.
Mi hu̧r nɛ nin-Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, nɛ ɔ gasa, nyɛŋɛ pi̧ nɛ‘m wen zu Wan mɛ yiwese.
Bíí lɛŋ á gasi nɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, wa á̧ hur nɛ nin-A̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm! Jerusalɛm, sa̧-a̧ gasa ye, Sɔ̧ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ ko o bezaŋ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ o bezaŋ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a woyo.
Mɛ hú̧r nin Gasa Wan, nɛ heeger, mɛ gási Wannu nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo, wen ha̧ wa mbo Tua kɔ̧-A tɛ-mɛ woyo nɛ desee.
A̧ a̧ de ha̧ o wi nɛ wa kaia so nɛ bara mɛ kpa desee wen zu mɛ; A̧ a̧ kɔ̧ o wi-bɔnɛ lɛŋ, nɛ ɗoŋ mɛ, hegɔ tɛ pɛrnam ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa.

Gasa sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ nyɛk hɔ nduti nu mɛ. O dukbíí nɛ dɔkaa tɛ́ tɛ nɛ nyɛ́í̧á fara pii sɛn tɛ-mɛ, o bíí tɛ́ tɛ nɛ mgbiizan lɛŋ, hɔ tɛ-mɛ, er-wa duna nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ wen Wan mɛ yiwese; o pɛrnam ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa tɛ ha̧ desee ha̧‘m sɛn beegara kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ tɛ o pɛrnam mɛ ɗoŋ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ nin-mɛ, Jerusalɛm,

Fom a tik zu o wi nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ ŋga wen a zu mɛ! Fom a tik zu o wi nɛ tɛ yai mɛ yinɛ, nɛ tɛ gbin o garo kɔ-mɛ a nu, nɛ tɛ gɔm o kusa taŋgada-pɛm-mɔ kɔ-mɛ a nu, in nɛ tɛ dɔ o tua kɔ-mɛ a nu! Ɓɛɛ de yongo a duk zu o wi nɛ tɛ yu kii mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Mɛ nɛ, mɛ de yɛŋɛ wen zu o bezaŋ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, wen wa tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa lɛŋ woyo mɛ gasi Sɔ̧ nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo. Desee a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ! Desee a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ ga̧a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ de tɛ-wa.
Desee a̧ dúk in o wi nɛ tɛ ya nɛ ɗaŋsee wen zu o bɔnɛ nɛ tɛ tik zu mɛ. Desee kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ desee kɔ-wa. Wa tɛ ya nɛ desee in mɛɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Ii, mi tɛ zɔn nɛ Gasa Wan, mi tɛ zɔn gasa Wannu,

wen wa tɛ mbó Jerusalɛm woyo, ɓɛɛ Tua ko Gasa Wan tɛ yor ŋgɔn sɛnɛ kpoo nɛ̀ kpoo. Jerusalɛm, oé! desee n'am tɛ kpa, ka oi pɛrnam kɔ‘m tɛ zɔk gasamɔ kɔ-mɛ, in ka wa zɔn Wan mɛ yiwese wa! Wa tɛ mbó o nú-garo Jerusalɛm, nɛ de ta nɛ tok kɛn kɛn, nɛ‘i sa'e safir in emerod, wa tɛ mbo o ŋgɛŋ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ o de ta nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya, o taŋgada tɛ de nɛ lɔr, in o ŋgárá nɛ sa̧-a̧ lɔr. O yuwar mgbara kira tɛ de nɛ o gbɛ̧ ta «rubis» in o de ta «ofir».
Wa tɛ bii gima-desee sɛn nú-garo Jerusalɛm. Sɛn kɔ̧ tua lɛŋ wa tɛ bii «Aleluya! Ɛnɛ zɔ́n Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl», ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka tɛ zɔn sa̧-a̧ nin-A̧ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Nɛ hegɔ a̧ Tobit kaɗa nɛ̀ dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧.

Tobit fea zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, ka a̧ kpaa nɛ́ pɛ gɔmŋmaa nɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa gun a̧ sɛn Ninivɛ tɛ gasa ɓɔɔmɔ. Yí-a boma, ká a̧ a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-yiitoo. Ɗoŋ nɛ yí-a húi̧a woyo kaɗi, a̧ duka zaŋ kpaa dɔka mɔ, in ha̧mɔ nɛ dɔkaa ha̧ o wisan mbɛt. A̧ kaɗi dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ in hú̧ra nin-A̧ na mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi n'a̧a̧ hɛɗa fio kaɗi, a̧ saa bem kɔ̧-a̧ Tobia pii katɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ kai o bem kɔ-mɛ,

a̧ mɛ yak nɛ hayaa si sɛn nu Medii, wen mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧a̧ zu Ninivɛ, nɛ nu Nahum; mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ de, ɓɛɛ tɛ tik zu Asur in Ninivɛ: mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nu Sɔ̧, nɛ Sɔ̧ toma nɛnɛ si Israɛl tɔ̧a̧ tɛ hɔ. O wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ lɛŋ, kóó kpɔk beka tik nu gee na; o mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ hɔ sɛn ŋgimbi-a. Wi tɛ duk nɛ dea sɛn nú Mɛdii gan nú Asirii in Babilɔŋ. Wen mi iŋa, in mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔaa ndemɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧̧ lɛŋ tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, kóó ŋma wen kpɔk nɛ o wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ tɔ̧̧ beka tik nu gee na. Wa tɛ tɔr o nya-ɛɛ nɛ ɔ sɛn nú Israɛl lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kai wa nɛ bara yaknɛ, nyɛi̧ nɛ nu bɔtɛ‘i. Nu Israɛl lɛŋ tɛ kifi ŋgoyoro, Samarii in Jerusalɛm tɛ duk ŋgoyoro. Wa tɛ dɔ Tua ko Sɔ̧ a nu, tɛ kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi wen ŋma ŋgimbi.

«Sɔ̧ tɛ de ko ha̧ wa woyo, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ kai wa piinɛ sɛn nú Israɛl. Wa tɛ mbo tua kɔ̧-A̧ woyo, ɓɛɛ bo nɛ hee kuti-a ga na, hegɔ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ gɔna. Ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, o be Israɛl lɛŋ tɛ gbo tɛ bara, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ mbo Jerusalɛm nɛ gba dea woyo. Wa tɛ mbo Tua ko Sɔ̧ woyo, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-tɔ̧-wen oi nú Sɔ̧ baa tɔ̧ so ga.
O dukbíí lɛŋ tɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ kpasaa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yu A̧. Wa lɛŋ, wa tɛ e o geesɔ̧ nɛ dúka so mɛ ɔr wa dúk, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ gasi nɛ kpasa Sɔ̧ nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo, sɛn tɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ gbaayí-A̧

O be-Israɛl lɛŋ nɛ tɛ kpasi wese'i, wen nɛ tɛ-wa mbaŋa ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ nɛ mbetɛ, tɛ mɔ́i̧ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ nɛ Jerusalɛm. Wa tɛ ɔ sɛn nu ko Abraham nɛ dea, kpoo nɛ kpoo, ŋma mɔ beka nukuri wa na, nu'i tɛ duk nɛ kɔ-wa. O bíí nɛ tɛ kɔ̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ kpasaa tɛ ya nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in gɔɔmɔ tɛ yu zu nu’ɛ.

Ɓɛɛ kinii, o bem kɔ‘m, mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: ɛnɛ dé tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ kpasaa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ dé mɔ nɛ de tɛ-A̧. Ɛnɛ úsí ha̧ o bem k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a in mɛ gbak o wisan, tɛ-wa a̧ mbaŋ ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ: wa a̧ zɔn A̧ nɛ kpasaa, in nɛ ŋgai tɛ-wa lɛŋ. Ɓɛɛ, nɛ kɔ-mɛ, bem kɔ‘m, mɛ yu Ninivɛ, ka mɛ duk hɛ̧ɛ̧ na! Kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ guna naa kɔ-mɛ sɛn katɛ‘m kaɗi, ká mɛ de zɛ kpɔk oi-aa sɛn saaye’ɛ na. Wen mi zɔka gɔɔmɔ ɔ dɔka saaye’ɛ, wa yɔ kaya mɔ, ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa: foe de wa na.

Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ zɔ́k mɔ nɛ Nadan dea in Ahikar, dáà nɛ kasa a̧: bo nɛ a̧ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ zir kɔ̧́ kɔ̀ nɛ kpasa na nde? Sɔ̧ kifa er ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ Nadan nɛ gbaayí-a̧. Ahikar pia ɗoŋ tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ Nadan yee kɔ‘i zaŋ tum kpoo nɛ kpoo, wen a̧ kia so yuwar mɛ gbɛ Ahikar. Wen n'aa gbak so o wisan, Ahikar gboa tɛ pɛr nɛ Nadan tuia há̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ Nadan tik yi pɛr kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ fe.
Hegɔ, o bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ zɔk mɔ'ɔ-oi gbaka wisan, in mɔ'ɔ-oi dee gɔɔmɔ. Kinii, mi iŋa, ŋgimbi kɔ‘m hɔa kaɗi.» Wa baa a̧ e gɔn gado kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe. Wa guna a̧ tɛ gasa ɓɔɔmɔ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ nàà kɔ̧-a̧ fea, Tobia guna a̧ katɛ dáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ yak in kóò kɔ̧-a̧, si sɛn nú Mɛdii, a̧ nɛɛ ɔ ye sɛn Ekbatanɛ, katɛ for-aa Raguɛl
A̧ zɔka o for-aa nɛ dea tɛ sɔki kɔ-wa. A̧ guna wa sɛn Ekbatanɛ, sɛn nú Medii ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o mɔɔ-oi Raguɛl, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa kaia so nɛ ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Tobit ga.
A̧ fea, nɛ oi tu̧u̧-tɛ-mɔ, ká a̧ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ gɔmŋma nɛ pɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.

Nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe, a̧ zia nyɛrɛ yaiaa ko ye Ninivɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk o be Ninivɛ nɛ Syaxare, wan nú Mɛdii, kaia so nɛ bara, fara hɔaa sɛn nú Mɛdii. A̧ dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, wen mɔ n'A̧a dee in o be Ninivɛ in wan mɛ Asirii. Nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe, a̧ kpaa desee wen mɔ nɛ tika zu ye Ninivɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ de osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, nɛ nyɛma ha̧ bíí mɛ zɔn kpoo nɛ kpoo. Amɛn.
Mɔ'ɔ duka so nɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, nɛ ɔɔ so wan zu o bíí nu Asirii, sɛn gasa ye Ninivɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ Arfaxad ɔɔ so nɛ wan zu o be-Mɛdii sɛn saaye Ekbatanɛ.

Arpazad'i mboo kusa garo nɛ o gasa sɛka ta, zik nɛ Ekbatanɛ: pɛsa ko o sɛka ta nɔ‘i nɛ́ mɛtrɛ kpɔk nɛ reeta, zia̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ taar. Garo'i, kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar-zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a lɛŋ nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ.
Sɛn nú garo, a̧ mboa o kusa tua-pɛm-mɔ, kusa tua nɔ‘i nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ pɛsa gun-aa nɛ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar.
A̧ dea o kpar-nú-garo, kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-taar zua-mɔɔrɔ, pɛsa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo, wen gboa ko o gii widebiro, in wen gbara ko o widebiro nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ naŋ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi'i, wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr déè biro in wannu Arfaxad kɔ gasa bɔkɔnù mɛ zikanù Ragau.

O bíí lɛŋ nɛ ɔɔ so zu kaya in sɛn ɗoŋgɔ Efrat, Tigrɛ in Hydasp, ká bà nɛ o wan mɛ bokonù, nɛ Ariɔk wannu ko o be-Elyméé ɔɔ so wan zu wa, wa lɛŋ wa mɔi̧a ŋmaa in Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ de biro in o bezaŋ Babilɔŋ.

Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Asirii, toma o betom ha̧ o bíí nù Pɛrsɛ, in ha̧ o wan nɛ war yee-wese lɛŋ, o bíí nu Silisii in Damas, nu Liban in ka naŋ kaya Liban, ká bá nɛ o wan nɛ ya nɛ ka ŋgere gbatɔp Mediteranee
in ha̧ o dukbíí mɛ nù Karmɛl, in Galaad in Galiléé mɛ ŋgɔn, in gasa bɔkɔnù Ɛsdrɛlɔn,
ha̧ o bíí ye nù Samarii lɛŋ, in ha̧ o bíí mɛ kúr Jurdɛn hɔ sɛn Jerusalɛm, Batanéé, Keleus, Kadɛs, nanayì nu Ezypt, Tafnɛs, Ramsɛs, zikanu Gɔsɛn lɛŋ mbɛt,
hɔ ɗoŋ Tanis in Mɛmfis, in ha̧ o bíí nu Ezypt lɛŋ, hɔ nɛnɛ nduti nu Ethiopii mɛ.

Ɓɛɛ o bíí nu nɔ‘i lɛŋ baa wen ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu ko o be Asirii, e tɛ geemɔ, hegɔ wa mɔi̧ mɛ gbak a̧ tɛ biro na, wen wa yu a̧ na, wa dora tɛ-wa nɛ a̧ hee kpɔk wi ga, ɓɛɛ wa fɔ o betom kɔ̧-a̧ sinɛ nɛ gee er, e nɛ foe yi-wa.

Gasa nyimsea baa Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr zu o nù nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kán mɔ nɛ nin kiti-wan in nɛ nin nu-wan kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ‘i sitɛ o wi mgbíí nù Silisii, Damasɛn, Syrii, in mɛ gbɛ o wi nù Mɔab, o bezaŋ Ammɔn, in o wi nù Judéé in Ezypt lɛŋ, nɛ gbapaa hɔ nɛnɛ nduti o gbatɔp yiitoo.

Ɓɛɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr in o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧ ku̧u̧ naŋ biro in wannu Arfaxad tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧. Tɛ biro'i a̧ gana Arfaxad nɛ ŋgai, ɓɛɛ a̧ pɛsi o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧ sot sot, kpɔk in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa-biro, ká bá nɛ o keeke-biro kɔ-wa mbɛt.
A̧ ɓara o ye kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, hɔ sɛn Ekbatanɛ, a̧ baa o taŋaɗa-pɛm-ye, a̧ ɗaŋa o beegara saaye lɛŋ lakati lakati, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ gba de gasa ye'i mɛ kifi nɛ bɛɛ-oi,
Hɔɗoŋ-a a̧ kpaa Arfaxad sɛn mgbara o kaya Ragau, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok a sar nɛ sɛɛ gbɛ ɗak.
A̧ sia ɗoŋ si Ninivɛ in gba gii widebiro kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a duk hi̧i̧ in o gii widebiro nɔ‘i zɛ gɔmŋmaa nɛ ɓu-yiitoo, de nɛ sa, in nyoŋ nɛ gba de nyɔŋmɔ.
Tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, in wese ɓu-yiitoo-zua-yiitoo tɛ kuti zɛ, wa baa keta kɔ kira ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Asirii; mɛ kifi er daŋmɔ in o bíí nu lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú ko wannu.
A̧ saa o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛn, in o gasa wan-biro lɛŋ, a baa keta nɛ hu̧saa in wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧, nɛ nu-a, wi tɛ ɗaŋ nu ko o wi nɔ‘i.
Wa ee zua mbɛt mɛ gbɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ bɛ̧ a sara ko wannu mɛ ye biro’ɛ.
Hegɔ, ɗoŋ nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Asirii, kaɗa nɛ keta'i, a̧ saa Holofɛrn, gasa wan-de-biro kɔ̧-a̧, in gbama-ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:

«Wen ko gasa wannu, nɛ ɔ wan zu nu lɛŋ, nɛ mɔ'ɔ: mɛ yak, mɛ nɛ kai o ŋgaŋa widebiro in mɛ, hee bíí gɔmŋmaa nɛ bíí ɓu-yiitoo ga, in gba gíi nyaŋa-biro, ka ba nɛ o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa-biro booro ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ tik zikanu mɛ yee-wese nɛ biro wen wa bɛ̧a wen nú‘m.
Mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗafi nu in yì, wen nyimsea kɔ‘m tɛ tik zu wa, dap naŋ o widebiro kɔ‘m tɛ yɔk nu hi̧i̧ ɗɔi-ɗɔi, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e nu hi̧i̧ ha̧ wa mɛ ɗaŋ mɔ sɛnɛ lɛŋ kpaŋgala kpaŋgala.
O wanda̧i̧ kɔ-wa tɛ dun o gboŋgo kúuŋ. O gbór-gbór-yì in o nana-yì lɛŋ tɛ dun nɛ o wɔr-fio kɔ-wa fok nɛnɛ kumɓaŋ kumɓaŋ.
Mi tɛ kai o ŋma mgbara wa nɛ bara-biro yaknɛ hɔ nduti nù.
Mɛ nɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ nɛɛ ba o zikanù kɔ-wa lɛŋ ha̧‘m; wa tɛ ɔ nu ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kasi wa nɛ dea hɔ wese n'am tɛ gɔn kita zu wa;
O wan nɛ tɛ de ŋgazu, ka gba̧a̧yí-mɛ nɛ́ to wa, ka mɛ de ko ha̧ wa na, mɛ gbɛ wa yine lɛŋ, a mɛ ɗaŋ nu kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ mbɛt.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'am duk kpasa ga, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wan kɔ‘m kpa ŋgai ga, mi kanamɔ, mɔ nɛ nú‘m tɔ̧a̧, er-am tɛ de.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ e o ha̧a̧nú ko wan kɔ-mɛ dúk, kóó kpɔk na. Mɛ dé mɔ lɛŋ n'am tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ dé mɔ‘i nɛ hayaa.»
Holofern gboa kɔ̧ tua ko wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o be-wan, o wan-biro, in o gasa widebiro ko o bíí Asirii lɛŋ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wannu tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧ ga, a̧ mɔi̧a o ŋgaŋa widebiro, hee booro gɔmŋmaa nɛ ɓu-yiitoo ga, in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa nɛ oi boi de-biro kɔ-wa booro ɓu-zua-yiitoo.
A̧ kɛ̧a wa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i kɛ̧ nɛ o bíí wen dee biro’ɛ ga.
A̧ kaia o ŋgeloba, o tui-fuu in o alfadaari nɛ dɔkaa wen kaia o tui, ka ba nɛ o sami, o ndai in o gbadua, nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na, wen nyɔŋaa.
Bíí kpɔk kpɔk kpaa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ nɛ dɔkaa, wa kpaa lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ tɛ nɛ tɛ ko wannu nɛ dɔkaa mbɛt.
Holofɛrn kura in o widebiro kɔ‘i lɛŋ, a̧ yaka ti ha̧ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr mɛ kpe o zikanu mɛ war yee-wese lɛŋ, nɛ o keeke-biro, o nyaŋa-biro, in o ŋgaŋa widebiro kɔ̧-a̧.
Gba gii bíí nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na, gba dɔka bíí nyɛmna, hee gba-dɔya ga kóó hee nyɛmɛ zaŋnu’ɛ̧ ga, yaka in wa.
Wa kura Ninivɛ, wa nɛɛ nɔ zɛ taar yak si bɔkɔnù Bɛktilɛk ɓɛɛ wa kura Bɛktilɛk mɛ nɛ de gbaagari kɔ-wa sɛn ka kaya, nɛ duk nɛ war gale ko Silisii mɛ ŋgɔn.
Holofɛrn kura hi̧i̧ in o widebiro kɔ‘i lɛŋ, o wi nɛ nɛ nɛ naŋ, o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa in o keekee-nyaŋa, mɛ yak nɛ nyɛia̧ si mgbara kaya.
A̧ gana obe-Put, obe-Lut tɛ biro, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o mɔ ko o bezaŋ Rassis in Ismaɛl nɛ ya nù gbárà mɛ ndaá Keleɔn lɛŋ.
A̧ baa ku̧u̧ Efrat ɓir yak nɛ nu Mesopotamii, ɓɛɛ a̧ yai o ŋgaŋa ye nɛ yaa so ka zaŋ gbor-gbor-yì Abrona, hɔ nɛnɛ nú gbatɔp.
A̧ baa zikanu Silisii lɛŋ, gbɛ nɛ o wi nɛ ba zu duk nɛ a̧ lɛŋ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ hɔ mgbara-nu ko Jafɛt mɛ ɗɔɔ, tan nɛ nu Arabii.
A̧ kɛra o be Madian lɛŋ e see-a, a̧ dɔa o gbagari kɔ-wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o mɔdai kɔ-wa yak nɛnɛ.

Hɔɗoŋ-aa a̧ zira si bɔkɔnù Damas, ŋgimbi mɔi̧a alkamaari, ɓɛɛ a̧ dɔ o fɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'a̧a̧ kuma o gíí gedɛk in gasa mɔdai kɔ-wa lɛŋ gbuɗuk, kai nɛ o mbɔi gasa ye kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ ŋgai, ɗaŋ nɛ o fɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ, gbɛ nɛ o ŋgaiwi lɛŋ nɛ gbapaa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ gasa kii in bele baa o wi nɛ ɔ nú gbatɔp lɛŋ: o bíí Sidɔn in Tyr, o bíí Sur in Okina in Jamnia. Gasa kíí nyɛmna dee o bíí Azɔt in Askalɔn
O bíí toma o betom nɛ o sore-ga̧mɔ si tɛ Holofɛrn, wa tɔ̧̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Ɛɛ nɛ o widetom ko gasa wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, s’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛɛ ti'nɛ́'ɛ: Mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ lɛŋ, ɛnɛ dé nɛ ɛɛ.
O ɓɔramɔ ko o mɔdai k’ɛ́ɛ́, o nu k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ, o fɔ-alkamaari k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ, o giigeɗɛk in o gasa mɔdai k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ, o ɓoramɔ ko mɔdai ko o yara k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ, a̧ ti ‘nɛ́, ɛnɛ kái mɛ de nɛ mɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a.
O gasa ye k’ɛ́ɛ́, in o bíí zaŋ-a nɛ oi gun, nɛ́ o bara k’ɛ́nɛ́. Enɛ tɛ́, ɛnɛ yé sɛnɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ ga.»
O wi nɔ‘i tɛa tɛ Holofɛrn, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧́ ha̧ a̧ hee mɔ‘i ga.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'a̧a̧ zira si ka zaŋ gasa tɔp in o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧, a ea o wi-pem-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn tɛ o gasa ngaŋa ye lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai o wan-ŋgai mgbara wa, mɛ gbak o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧.
O wi saaye'i̧ lɛŋ in o bíí mɛ zikanu'i lɛŋ, wa ɗafa tɛ-wa nɛ demɔá-gu-zu, kpɛk nɛ a̧, mbɛr nɛ biɔ̧, yɔ nɛ yɛ ti a̧.

A̧ yaia o zikanu kɔ-wa lɛŋ ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔm o te-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a nu yinɛ mbɛt, wen, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nu ko wi nɛ toma a'i, a̧ tɛ yai o geesɔ̧ zu nu lɛŋ yinɛ, wen ha̧ o dukbíí lɛŋ mɛ gasi nɛ wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kpɔk ɓɛɛ, ha̧ leɓe-wi lɛŋ in o zuduk-bíí lɛŋ mɛ gasi a̧ hee sɔ̧ ga.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'a̧a̧ hɔɔ nù Ɛsdrɛlɔn, sɛn ka ye Dɔtaim, mgbak ka naŋ gasa diɔ̧-kaya nu Judéé
a dea gbagari kɔ̧-a̧ mgbara o gasa ye Gebai in Sytopolis, ɓɛɛ wa duka hi̧i̧, fiozɛ kpɔk, mɛ mɔi̧ o mbe tui wen o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧.

O be-Israɛl, nɛ ɔ nu Judéé, zia so nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ Holofɛrn, gasa wan-de-biro ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu Asirii, dea in o dukbíí nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, in hee mɔ'ɔ n'a̧a̧ kpɔi̧a nɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ sɛn kɔ tua-ko o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa yinɛ, in n'a̧a̧ ɗaŋa nɛ o tua nɔ‘i ga.
Gasa kíì dee wa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗɛ-wa ŋman nɛ ŋgaya wen Jerusalɛm in wen Tua ko gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.

Wen wa gboa so tɛ bara ɓan na, ɓɛɛ dukbíí mɛ nu Judéé lɛŋ mɔi̧a̧ ŋmaa, ɗoŋ-aa tɛ nyɛi hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, wa toka de yoŋgo zu Tua ko Sɔ̧, in o nyɛk nɛ ya sɛnɛ, in zu taŋge-ɗafi-Sɔ̧, ɗafi nɛ wa oi ɗaŋa nɛ wa ɗaŋa so wa, ɗoŋ-aa tɛ nyɛi hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
O be-Israɛl toma o betom dam zikanu Samarii lɛŋ, in zikanu Kona, Bɛt-Hɔrɔŋ, Abɛlmain, Jeriko, hɔ sɛn Kɔba, Aisɔr in sɛn bɔkɔnu Salɛm.

Wa baa fara mgbak ɓɛ̧i̧a̧ nu kaya nɛ gana o ŋmaa nɛ kusa, wa zika o ye zu kaya nɛ ŋgaya garo, ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧ o mɔɔ-nyoŋ in o mɔɔ-de-biro nɛ dɔkaa á sɛnɛ, wen o nyɔnɔ kpɛɛfɔ kɔ-wa'i nɛ mɔ nɛ wa mɔi̧a̧ kinɛ ɓɛɛ.
Joakim, nɛ duka so gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi'i, toma kalata ha̧ o be Betulii in Betomɛstaim: o ye nɔ‘i a̧a̧ tan nɛ́ Ɛsdrɛlɔn, si war bɔkɔnu Dotaim.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ pɛm o ɓɔtɔ-ɓɔtɔ yuwar kaya, wen mɛ nɛ o yuwar nɔ‘i a̧ wa ba mɛ yak nɛnɛ si nu Judéé. Dora o bíí tɛ ba o yuwar nɔ‘i beka ŋgai na, wen nɛ o mɔi̧a̧ yuwar wen bíí yiitoo ɓɛɛ.
O be Israɛl dea mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nu ko gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Joakim, in baketa ko o sɔka bem in ko dukbíí Israɛl sɛn Jerusalɛm lɛŋ.
O wiwii Israɛl lɛŋ hiɗa mɔ nɛ ŋgaya ger si tɛ Sɔ̧, zim nɛ yi nɛ kpasaa.
Wa lɛŋ, in o kóó kɔ-wa, o bem kɔ-wa, ka ba nɛ o mɔdai kɔ-wa lɛŋ, in o gɛnɛ nɛ a̧a̧ in wa lɛŋ, o widetom, in o bara, wa hɛra guntir-wa lɛŋ nɛ bufu.
O be-Israɛl mɛ Jerusalɛm lɛŋ, koo kɔ-wa in o bem kɔ-wa, wa guu nu sɛn nú-Tua ko Sɔ̧, zu-wa kpee nɛ bùk, nyɛi̧ nɛ́ er si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧.

Wa kaɓala taŋgé-ɗafi-Sɔ̧ nɛ laa-zim-fio mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa e nu-wa kpɔk hiɗi nɛ mɔ si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl'e: «ká Sɔ̧ e ha̧ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ kifi bara na, ká A̧ e ha̧ wa ɓar o koo kɔ-wa yinɛ na, ká A̧ e ha̧ o ye kɔ-wa, nɛ wa kpaa nɛ mɔɔ-oi, mɛ yai yinɛ na, ká A̧ e ha̧ sa̧a̧-Fara kɔ-wa mɛ ɗaŋ na, wen ka o gɔni-duk tɛɛ zɛkɛɗi tua'i.»
Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ zia tiger-wa, ɓɛɛ A̧ zɔk ŋga bɔnɛ nɛ wa ya sɛnɛ. Dukbíí Juif zima mɔ, zɛ nɛ dɔkaa, sɛn nu Judéé lɛŋ, in sɛn Jerusalɛm sɛn nú Tua ko Gasa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.

Gasa Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Joakim, o wiɗafisɔ̧ lɛŋ, in o widetom kɔ̧ Tua ko Gasa Wan lɛŋ, hɛra bufu guntir, ɓɛɛ wa do nɛ kpoo ha̧ Sɔ̧ ɗafi nɛ A̧, wa ha̧ o ɗafasɔ̧ oi ha̧a̧nú, in o ɗafasɔ̧ nɛ ta-tɛ ko dukbíí ha̧ A̧ mbɛt.
Wa aa bùk zu mɔɔ-gu-zu kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ai nu, nɛ ŋgai tɛ-wa lɛŋ, ha̧ Gasa Wan mɛ tɛɛ gbak o bíí nutua Israɛl lɛŋ.

Wa tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ Holofern, gasa wan-biro ko o bíí nu Asirii nde o be-Israɛl ɗafa mɔ wen biro kaɗi, wa kpɛa o ɓɔtɔ ɓɔtɔ yuwar mgbara kaya kaɗi, wa mbɔa o ŋgaya garo zik nɛ o ɓɛ̧i̧a̧ nú kusa kaya, ɓɛɛ wa ngasi o yuwar bɔkɔnu ɗɔɔ kaya.
Tɛ zia wen'i, see-Holofern ɗaŋa nyɛmna; a̧ saa o gasawi nu Mɔab lɛŋ, in o gasa widebiro mɛ nu Ammɔn, in o gasawi mɛ ka ŋgere gbatɔp lɛŋ.

A̧ aka nɛ wa: «Ɛnɛ o bíí nu Kanaan, ɛnɛ tɔ̧́ kpasawen ha̧‘m, nɛ́ ge dukbíí ge a ɔ see zu kaya ge? Wa ɔ sɛn ge ye ge? Wa a̧a̧ nɛ dɔka widebiro nde? Wa ɔ ken nde? Nɛ́ ge wannu ge a duk zu o widebiro kɔ-wa mgbɔ nɛ wa nɛnɛ ge nde?
Wen ge wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛa mɛ we ti'm, hee o doka bíí mɛ war yee-wese ga, ge?

Wi nɛ ɔ wan zu o be-Ammɔn lɛŋ, nin-a nɛ Akiɔr, tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ Holofɛrn: «Nyaa, ɛnɛ é war ha̧ widetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ wen in'nɛ́. Mi tɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen h’ɛ́nɛ́ zu dukbíí nɛ ɔ zu kaya hɛ̧ɛ̧, ka gbagari k’ɛ́nɛ́, ŋma ndela beka gbo nɛ kɔ nú widetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɗukbíí nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bezaŋ bíí nu Kaldee.
Wa kura so mɛ ɔ sɛn nu Mesopotamii nɛti, wen wa kɔ̧ so mɛ wor o sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà kɔ-wa nɛ ɓɔna sɛn nu Kaldee na,

wa kɛ̧a tɛ-wa nɛ yuwar ko o zɔmdáà kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, nɛ wa zɔk hee kpasa Sɔ̧ ga. Hegɔ, wa ndaka so wa nɛ nu ko o zɔmdáà, nɛ nu ko o gba̧‘a̧ sɔ̧ kɔ-wa yinɛ, wa yuu mɔ si nu Mesopotamii, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ hi̧i̧ pɛ nɛ dɔkaa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɔ̧̧ ha̧ wa mɛ kur fara nɛ wa yaa so sɛnɛ‘i mɛ yak si nu Kanaan. Wa ɔá ye sɛn hi̧i̧ ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧a̧ lɔr in sede in o gii mɔdai nɛ dɔkaa.
Hee mɔ‘o nɛ gasa kaɓa tika zu nu Kanaan ga, wa zira si sɛn nu Ezypt, wa ɔɔ hi̧i̧ kpa nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɛɛ wa kpasi. Wa nyɛɓa siti siti sɛn hi̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa kifi nɛ gasa dukbíí, nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na.
Nɛ mɔ nɛ see-wannu Ezypt kura zu wa, a̧ ɔra wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ fo wa nɛ ŋgai si tɛ ŋgaŋa tom daka brik. A pi̧i̧ foe tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ a e wa tɛ bara.
Wa hiɗa mɔ si tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, nɛ dea ha̧ gasa gɛŋa, nɛ nyina-a bo na, mɛ tik zu nu Ezypt lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o be-Egyptɛ ndak wa nyɛi nɛ wa.
Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ ku gbɛ̧ gbatɔp nɛ kora naŋ,
ɓɛɛ A̧ mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ si war kaya Sinai in Kadɛs-Barne; wa ndaka o bíí nɛ ɔɔ ŋga gbára'i lɛŋ yinɛ.
Wa baa fara sɛn nu ko o be-Amɔrit, ɓɛɛ wa kum o be Hɛchbɔn lɛŋ gbuɗuk a nù. Hɔɗoŋ-aa, wa kuu nanayi Jurdɛn, ɓɛɛ wa ba fara zaŋ kaya lɛŋ,
Wa ndaka o be-Kanaan, in o be-Perizit, o bɛ-Jebuséé, o be-Sikɛm in o be-Girgasit lɛŋ yinɛ ti wa, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛn hi̧i̧ zɛ nɛ dɔkaa.
Ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ wa de ɗaŋmɔ nɛ yí-Sɔ̧ na, wa duka tɛ gasa desee, wɛn Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa kɔ̧ gɔɔmɔ na.

Ɓɛɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ wa ea yuwar nɛ Sɔ̧ usa ha̧ wa duk, o wisɛn kɔ-wa kuma o ŋma mgbara wa tɛ biro, bɛɛ wa kai o ŋma nɛ bara-biro si sɛn gɔni nù. Wa yaia gasa Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ o gasa ye kɔ-wa tik er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.

Wa kifa see-wa si tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa woyo, ɓɛɛ wa pii ɗoŋ, nɛ nu nɛ wa pɛsa so si sɛnɛ pii tɛ nu kɔ-wa woyo. Wa dee ye kɔ-wa sɛn Jerusalɛm woyo, fara nɛ gasa Tua ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa duk sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ de ye zu o kaya kɔ-wa woyo, wen bíí bo sɛnɛ na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, nyaa, gasawi, kà o wi nɔ‘i e yuwar ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa duk, mɛ nɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ, in k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ iŋa wa dea nɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ mbetɛ, ɛɛ tɛ daŋ mɛ tík wa nɛ biro.
Ɓɛɛ, ka o wi nɔ‘i de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, nyaa, mi gɔm er h’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ e wa duk. Kà bo hegɔ na, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛ yor ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ o bíí zaŋnù lɛŋ tɛ zɛkɛɗi yɛ.»

Akiɔr tɔ̧̧ wen'i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ o bíí nɛ mɔi̧a̧ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ zik nɛ tua-laa ko gasa wan-biro ku̧u̧ naŋ kuia mɔ. O gasa widebiro ko Holofɛrn, in o wi mɛ ka ŋgere gbatɔp, ka ba nɛ o wi nu Mɔab kɔ̧a so mɛ mbɛr Akiɔr.
Wa tɔ̧̧: «Ɛɛ te de kii o be-Israɛl wen ge? Ɛnɛ zɔ́k, wa bo nɛ ŋgai na, wa nyɛm mɛ yor tɛ ŋga biro na.
Nyaa Holofɛrn, ɛɛ tík wa nɛ biro. Wa nɛ gee tumui mɔ ti o widebiro k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ ku̧i̧amɔ kaɗa mgbara o bíí nɛ mɔi̧a̧ wen baa keta'i kaɗi, Holofɛrn gasa wan-biro ko o be Asirii tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ Akiɔr, sɛn ti o gɛnɛ in o be-Mɔab:

«Mɛ, Akiɔr, mɛ nɛ o? mɛ in o bíí nɛ de tom tum-mɔ ha o be Israɛl, ɛnɛ nɛ o? wen ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ wen in yɛɛ, hee o witɔ̧wen oi nú-Sɔ̧ ga, in wen mɛ dor yɛ‘e: K’ɛ́ɛ́ de biro in o be-Israɛl na, wen Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tɛ yor nɛ nɔ̧a ɗoŋ wa. Ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ gana Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr so sɛnɛ nde? Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr tɛ tom o ŋgaŋa widebiro kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ kum o be-Israɛl lɛŋ gbuɗuk a nu: Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa beka kpasi wa na.»
Ɛɛ nɛ o widetom ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr. A tɛ kum wa war kpɔk gbuɗuk, wa beka yor ti o ŋgaŋa nyaŋa-biro k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.

Ɛɛ tɛ dɔ wa nɛ kpasa. Zaŋ kaya kɔ-wa tɛ fok ruɛ-ruɛ nɛ tɔk-tɛ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wɔr-wa tɛ dun o bɔkɔnu kɔ-wa lɛŋ kuuŋ. Wa beka nyɛm mɛ yor ti yɛ na; wa tɛ fe lɛŋ, ɛɛ tɛ kum wa lɛŋ, hee mɔ nɛ Nabukodonor, nɛ ɔ wan zu nu lɛŋ, ha̧nú h’ɛ́ɛ́ ga. A̧ tɔ̧̧ wen'i, ɓɛɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ beka tik nu gee na.
Ɓɛɛ, kɔ-mɛ, Akiɔr, mɛ́, bara ko o be-Ammɔn, mɛ tɔ̧ wen hee wi-e-ɗora ga, mɛ beka zɔk saŋayi'm ɓɔna, hɔ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ kifi nɛ er ha̧ o ɗaŋ wi nɔ‘i, nɛ gboa tɛ bara nu Ezypt yinɛ‘i.
Gbapaa ko o widebiro kɔ‘m, in sɛɛ ko o wan-biro kɔ‘m tɛ tɔk mɛ sar, mgbara o be-Israɛl, ŋgimbi n'am tɛ pii ɗoŋ.
Kinii o widetom kɔ‘m tɛ ba mɛ daŋ nɛnɛ si zu kaya; wa tɛ e mɛ sɛn ŋma ye zaŋ kaya, fara nɛ ɓɔtɔ ɓɔtɔ yuwar a̧a̧ sɛnɛ.
Mɛ beka fe nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ gbɛ mɛ in o be Israɛl na.
Mɛ ta kɔ-mɛ‘e wa beka tik er-yɛ na wó, ɓɛɛ mɛ kai sɔnti-mɛ nɛ ɗaŋsee hegɔ wen ge? Mi tɔ̧̧ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ ŋma wen kɔ‘m kpɔk beka tik nu gee na.»
Holofɛrn ha̧nú ha̧ o widetom kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ ya kɔ tua-laa in a̧‘i, mɛ ba Akiɔr nɛnɛ, in mɛ mgbɔ a̧ yaknɛ sɛn Betulii ha̧ o be-Israɛl.
Wa baa a̧, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a̧ gbonɛ nɛ kɔ yara si sɛn tɛ bɔkɔnu, sɛka wa baa war si zu kaya, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ tɛ kpuput-yi, ɗɔɔ ye Betulii.

Nɛ o wi saaye zu kaya zɔka o bíí ko Holofɛrn fara tɛaa, wa kaia o boe-de-biro kɔ-wa, wa gboo nɛ ye bɛɗɛzu zu kaya, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ birndiŋ pi nɛ o kii-ta si tɛ wa, mɛ dor wa tɛ daŋa zu kaya pii tɛ wa.
O wi nɔ‘i haia nɛ ka naŋ-kaya, wa hɛr Akiɔr sɛn hi̧i̧, wa siŋa a pi ka naŋ-kaya, ɓɛɛ wa si ɗoŋ si sɛn tɛ wannu kɔ-wa.
O be-Israɛl zira nɛ saaye kɔ-wa tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ kpa Akiɔr. Wa bura a̧, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ a nɛnɛ si saaye kɔ-wa Betulii, usi ha̧ o wanye kɔ-wa.
O wanye tɛ ŋgimbi'i duka so nɛ Ozias bem ko Mika, zuduk ko Simeɔŋ, Kabris bem ko Otoniel, in Karmis bem ko Mɛlkiɛl.
Wa mɔi̧a̧ o gasa wi saaye lɛŋ. O ŋgaiwi in o okóò gara tɛnɛ lɛŋ nɛ maayi si fara mɔi̧a̧ mbɛt. Wa mgbɔa Akiɔr e zaŋ gara, ɓɛɛ Ozias ak'a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ zii mɔ nɛ hɔa.

Tɛ kifanú kɔ Akiɔr, a̧ dala o wen nɛ wa tɔ̧̧ tɛ ba keta ko Holofɛrn lɛŋ ha̧ wa, in mɔ nɛ a̧, nɛ tɛ-a̧, tɔ̧̧ ha̧ o gasa wi mɛ nu Asirii. A̧ tɔ̧̧ o zɔm gasa kpokowen ko Holofɛrn see zu o be-Israɛl mbɛt.
Nɛ mɔ nɛ o bíí nɛ mɔi̧a̧ hi̧i̧ lɛŋ guu nu gasi nɛ Sɔ̧, wa hiɗa mɔ si tɛ Sɔ̧, wa tɔ̧̧:
«Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese, Ɛnɛ zɔ́k deemɔ-ŋgondo ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́, Ɛnɛ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́, dukbíí k’Ɛ́nɛ́, tɛ dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́ si ɗɔɔ. Ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ o bíí k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ zɔk mɔ pi tɛ ɛ́ɛ́ sɔsɔɔ!»
Wa ga̧a̧ see-Akiɔr, ha̧ nɛ nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ wa zɔn a̧ nyɛmna.
Ozias mgbɔa Akiɔr si tɛ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a de gasa dina ha̧ o kuti bíí saaye. Mɛ zaŋ zɛ‘i lɛŋ, wa aia nú ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl mɛ gbak wa.
Nɛ mɔ sa̧-a̧ kaɗi, Holofɛrn ha̧nú ha̧ o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, in ha̧ o gba gii bíí nɛ tɛa mɛ gbak a̧ lɛŋ mɛ kur ba nɛ yuwar Betulii, mɛ kpe o ɓɔtɔ ɓɔtɔ yuwar mgbara kaya in mɛ bi biro in o be-Israɛl.

Wese'i, o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai lɛŋ kura mɛ yak biro. Dɔkaa widebiro lɛŋ duka so nɛ́ bíí booro gɔmŋmaa nɛ booro ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ nɛ́ nɛ naŋ, in o wi-ɗaŋ-nyaŋa booro ɓu-zua-yiitoo, ka ba nɛ o tui, in o wi-tui-tui, nɛ gba gii-wa nyɛmna.
Wa dee bagari kɔ-wa tɛ́ bɔkɔnu, nyɛi nɛ Betulii na, ka kpukpút-yì; wa baa fara siti, dika Dɔtaim hɔ Bɛlbaim, in nɛ war mgbar dika Betulii hɔ Kyamɔn nɛ zɔk ŋmaa in Ɛsdrelɔn.

O be-Israɛl zɔka gba gíí-wa tululu, gasa kíí hɛra zaŋ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ si tɛ o ŋmaa: «O wí nɔ‘i wa tɛ yai mɔ zu nù lɛŋ yinɛ ɗɛsɛ-ɗɛsɛ: ŋma mɔ beka yor ti wa na, kóó nɛ o kusa kaya, kóó nɛ o ɗuka gbóŋgó, kóó nɛ zu-tɔ̧ mbɛt.»
Ko o nde kaia o boe-de-biro kɔ‘i, wa yee wee zu o kusa tua-pɛm-mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa ya tɛ pɛma mɔ mɛ zaŋ-zɛ‘i lɛŋ.
Nɛ mɔ sa̧-a̧ woyo, Holofɛrn dea ha̧ o wí-daŋ-nyaŋa mɛ gbo nɛ gba̧a̧yí o be-Israɛl nɛ a̧a̧ Betulii, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ mɛ zɔk o be war-ɗaŋ-kaya si Betulii,
A nɛɛ zɔk o kpúkpút-yì mbɛt, a̧ ee o bíí mɛ pɛm wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ kɔ gbagari kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ mɔ nɛ o be-wan ko o bezaŋ Ezau, in o wan ko o be-Mɔab, in o gasa wan-biro mɛ zikanu ka ŋgere gbatɔp, nɛa si ka̧ tɛ Holofɛrn, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Nyaa, k’ɛnɛ zíí taamɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó kpɔk, beka fe tɛ biro’ɛ na!
«O be-Israɛl e nɛ ta nɛ kusaa ko o kaya nɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ, nɛ bó nɛ ŋgai ko o boe-de-biro na, wen daŋa si zu kaya'i bó nɛ yɛkɓɛlɛk mɔ na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, nyaa, k’ɛnɛ bi biro in wa na, ɓɛɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, kóó kpɔk, beka fe na.
Ɛnɛ duk geɗɛk sɛn kɔ̧ yara k’ɛ́nɛ́ in o widebiro k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tóm o ŋma bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ pɛm kpukpút-yì nɛ gbo nɛ gun kaya,

wen mɛ nɛ fara hi̧i̧ a̧ o be-Betulii nɛɛ ɗu yì-nɔ sɛnɛ. Wɔ-yì tɛ gbɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e ye kɔ-wa er-‘nɛ́; ɓɛɛ, nɛ war k’ɛ́ɛ́ in o widebiro k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ daŋ ba nɛ fara si zu o ɓɛɗɛzu kaya, zik nɛ ye kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ pɛm mɔ hi̧i̧, wen ka ŋma bíí kɔ-wa tɛɛ gbo yaknɛ.
Wɔ tɛ kum o bíí saaye lɛŋ, wiwii, okóò in o obem: wɔr-wa tɛ gbísí makpara beegara kɔ-wa, nɛti ha̧ gbapaa mɛ fo tɛ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ demɔ ba tɛ-wa nɛ ŋgaya, oi ŋgazu kɔ-wa, in oi bɛ̧a tɛaa mɛ kpa ŋmaa in'nɛ́ɛ́ nɛ sore-ga̧mɔ.»
Holofɛrn in o wan-biro kɔ‘i lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔ wen nɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɔ̧̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧nú ha̧ wa mɛ demɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧‘i.
O widebiro ko o be Ammɔn kura in o be Asirii booro mɔɔrɔ, wa nɛɛ yara kɔ-wa ɗɔɔ kaya, ɓɛɛ wa ba o kpukpút-yì in o ŋma fara-ɗu-yì ko o be-Israɛl.

O be Edɔm in o be Ammɔn daŋa zu kaya, ɓɛɛ wa de gbagari kɔ-wa sɛn hi̧i̧ ti ye Dotaim, ɓɛɛ wa tom o ŋma bíí kɔ-wa si kazan mɛ ɗɔɔ, in si ndaazan, ti ye Egrebɛl, ka ye Kus, zu gbor-gbor-yi Mɔkmur. Oi o widebiro ko o be Asirii wa baa fara sɛn bɔkɔnù, ɓɛɛ wa kpɛ zu nù díɔ̧́m. O tua-laa in o tui kɔ-wa ya nɛ gba dɔka mɔ buraŋ buraŋ kɔ gbagari kɔ-wa: wa nɛ gba gíí-bíí nyɛmna, nyɛmna.
O be-Israɛl hiɗa mɔ si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, wen nɔɔŋgiɗi kɔ-wa kaɗa, tɛ zɔka o wisɛn nɛ kɛra wa lɛŋ, in fara-gboaa er-wa nɛ bo ɓɔna'i.
O gii widebiro ko o be Asirii kɛra wa, zɛ ɓu-taar-zua-náár: nɛ o wí nɛ̀ nɛ́ nɛ̀ naŋ, in o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa in o keekee-nyaŋa.
O bíí Betulii zɔka'e oi yì kɔ-wa kaɗa yinɛ e: o kpana-yi kɔ-wa kora kpá-kpá.
O gasa gɔna-yi kɔ-wa de mɛ kor yinɛ mbɛt. Yì dɔk ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ mɛ kpa mɔ nɛ tɛ nyɛm wa wen kpɔk wese ɓɔna: wa kɛ̧ yi kɛ̧ɛ̧.
O be-geɗɛk bem ziɓa kaɗi; ŋgai kaɗa tɛ o be-ŋgaiwi in o kóò mbɛt, wen wa kpa yi mɛ nɔ na: wa aia a nu kiŋdiŋ-kiŋdiŋ mgbara kira in nɛ yuwar gbo ye mbɛt.
O bíí saaye lɛŋ, o be-ŋgaiwi, in o kóò, ka ba nɛ o bem, mɔi̧a̧ ŋmaa kur zu Ozias in o wanye: wa hiɗa mɔ nɛ ŋgaya gɛr, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧, nɛ gba̧a̧yi o gasawi nugara:
«Sɔ̧ a̧ gɔn kita mgbara tɛ-‘nɛ́ in yɛɛ, wen ɛnɛ dea gasa ɗaŋmɔ in yɛ, sɛn tɛ bɛ̧a pia sore-ga̧mɔ mgbara ɛɛ in o be-Asirii.
Ɓɛɛ kinii ŋma wi-gbak-yɛ bo ɓɔna: Sɔ̧ ea ɛɛ er o wi nɔ‘i, ha̧ wɔ-yi mɛ kum yɛ, nɛ gbaayi-wa, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ fe lɛŋ.
Kinii, ɛnɛ sa Holofɛrn in o widebiro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e ye er-wa ha̧ wa mɛ yai yinɛ.
Gana so ɛɛ kifi nɛ o bara kɔ-wa, ɓa nɛ kumaa wen wɔ-yi, in zɔka fio ko o bezaŋ-yɛ, in o kóò k’ɛ́ɛ́, in o bem k’ɛ́ɛ́.

Ɛɛ ai nú h’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ nin yiwese in nù, in nɛ nin Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ usi bɔnɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋmɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́, in ɗaŋmɔ ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́; ɛnɛ dé mɔ n’ɛɛ́ ak ‘nɛ́ wen aa sɔsɔɔ, wen ka bɔnɛ tɛɛ tik zu yɛ.
Gii-wi lɛŋ hi̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ tɛ gasa aia-nú, ɓɛɛ wa hiɗi mɔ nɛ ŋgaya ger si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧.
Ozias tɔ̧̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya-ɛɛ, ɛnɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi! ɛɛ nyɔŋ nin-yɛ tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ woyo: Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ de ko h’ɛ́ɛ́ woyo: A beka e ɛɛ duk hɔ sɔŋkur-aa na.
Ɓɛɛ, ka o zɛ mɔɔrɔ‘i nɛ yaka kaɗi, in ka Sɔ̧ tɛ-mɛ gbak yɛ na, mi tɛ de hee mɔ n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ ga.
Ɓɛɛ a fo wa si nɛ ɗoŋ lɛŋ. O wiwii yaka mɛ pɛm mɔ nɛ zu garo in zu o kusa tua-pɛm-yé, ɓɛɛ wa fo o kóò in o bem si nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ-wa. Bíí lɛŋ sɛn saaye yaa nɛ gasa kíí in ɗaŋsee.

Ŋgimbi'i, nyɛrɛ o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ hɔɔ zer-Judith. Judith nɛ bokobem ko Merari, bem ko Ox, bem ko Josɛf, bem ko Oziɛl, bem ko Ɛlkia, bem ko Ananias, bem ko Gedeɔn, bem ko Rafain, bem ko Akitɔb, bem ko Elias, bem ko Kɛlkia, bem ko Eliab, bem ko Natanaɛl, bem ko Salamiɛl, bem ko Sarasadai, bem ko Israɛl.
Wi kɔ̧-a̧, Manasse, be-nutua kɔ̧-a̧ in zuduk kɔ̧-a̧, fea ŋgimbi mɔi̧a̧ nyɔnɔ alkamaari.

A duka so zɔk nɛ tom ko o wi-hɛr-sikila-alkamaari sɛn kpɛɛfɔ, ɓɛɛ kpɔra wese dɔa ɓɛɗɛzu-a; a nɛɛ ɔ nu, ɓɛɛ a̧ fe saaye kɔ̧-a̧ Betulii; wa guna a hi̧i̧ mgbara o nam kɔ̧-a̧, sɛn kpɛɛfɔ, mgbara Dɔtain in Balamɔn.
Judith kifa kogɛra, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ kɔ tua kɔ̧-a̧ pɛ taar nɛ fiozɛ naar.
A̧ ɗafa gɔna bɛrtua mɛ ŋgon zu tua kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ sɛnɛ. A mara laa-bufu guntir-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi nɛ laa-gɛra zu a.

A duka mɛ zim mɔ wese lɛŋ, ŋgimbi gɛra kɔ̧-a̧, ɓaa nɛ o wese-ɗafa-mɔ wen Sabbat, in wese Sabbat lɛŋ, o wese-ɗafa-mɔ wen mbe yi-zɛ, in wese mbe yi-zɛ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ o wese gbaŋa in o wese desee ko o be-Israɛl ɓɛɛ.
Judith yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna, gba de saŋayi-a nyɛmna mbɛt. Wii kɔ̧-a̧, Manasse, ee so o lɔr in bu mbɔi, o widetom in o kodetom, o gíí-mɔdai in o fɔ nɛ dɔkaa ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk so zu o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí kai ndaa-a na, wen a yú kíí Sɔ̧ nyɛmna.
A zia nyɛrɛ kú̧í̧á̧ mɔ ko o be-Israɛl si tɛ wanye kɔ-wa, nɛ ɓana-yì dea ha̧ nɔɔŋgiɗi kɔ-wa mɛ kaɗi, A zia nyɛrɛ kifanu ko Ozias mbɛt'e: «wi tɛ e yé er o be-Asirii ɗoŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ.»
A toma kodetom kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ duk zu o mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, mɛ nɛɛ sa o kutiwi saaye Ozias, Kabris in Karmis tɛnɛ.

Nɛ o wi nɔ‘i hɔa tɛ kɔ̧-a̧, Judith tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ, o wanye Betulii, ɛnɛ zíí mɔ n'am tɛ tɔ̧‘i: wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧̧ ha̧ dukbíí sɔsɔɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ na, in kanamɔ n’ɛnɛ kana mgbara ‘nɛ́ in Sɔ̧ hee ge nde: ɛnɛ tɛ e yé er o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́, ka Sɔ̧ tɛ-mɛ gbak'nɛ́ tɛ zɛ n’ɛnɛ gɔna ha̧ A̧ na wo'i, kanamɔ‘i nyɛm sɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛnɛ nɛ o'o h’ɛnɛ mɛ we Sɔ̧ sɔsɔɔ o? in h’ɛnɛ mɛ ba zu-‘nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn, mɛ ba fara oi nu'A mgbara o bíí zaŋnu, o?
Kinii, ɛnɛ we nɛ Gasa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka zíí ŋma mɔ na ndó-ndó-ndó ɓɔnsɛnɛ.

Ɛnɛ nyɛm mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ a̧a̧ sɛn kɔ ɗuka see-wi na, ɛnɛ nyɛm mɛ iŋ mgbara o taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ na mbɛt. Ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ ndaa-mɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ dea o mɔ lɛŋ, in taamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, in mɔ n'A̧a̧ kɔ̧a mɛ de lɛŋ, hee ge? Weyaa, o nya'm, k’ɛnɛ tu̧ see Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
Wen, kóó A̧ kɔ̧ mɛ kpasi yɛ zaŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ hɛ̧ɛ̧ na, A a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgai mɛ gbak yɛ ɗoŋ zɛ n'A̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧, kóó mɛ kum yɛ ɛɛ yinɛ ti o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́ mbɛt.
K’ɛnɛ ak Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ha̧ nu-A̧ h’ɛnɛ wen mɔ n'A̧a kɔ̧a mɛ de na. Wen Sɔ̧ bo nɛ bíí ka'i ɓil'A̧ na, A̧ bo nɛ bem ko bíí ka'i ɓa wen in A̧ na.
Wen hegɔ, pɛm nɛ wese n'A̧a tɛ kpasi yɛ, ɛɛ kɔf'A̧ mɛ gbak yɛ kaŋ; ka A̧ nɛ kɔ̧a, A̧ tɛ zíí aia-nú k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Mgbara o pɛrnam k’ɛ́ɛ́, in mgbara ɛɛ sosɔɔ, ŋma zuduk, ŋma nam, ŋma kpaar-nutua, kóó ŋma yé, nɛ gasi o geesɔ̧, nɛ‘i dee nɛ er, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ o bíí mɛ ɓeemɛ wa duka so mɛ de ga, bo na.
Nɛ wen mɔ‘i a̧ o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔka nɛ bɔnɛ biro gbapaa, in nɛ'ì yaia nɛ mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ, in nɛ wa lɛŋ kuma nɛnɛ ti o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ, nɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ iŋ ŋma Sɔ̧ gan zu A̧ na. Hegɔ, ɛɛ e ta nɛ A̧: A̧ beka e ɛɛ tɛ geemɔ na, A̧ beka kaɗi dee ko in kpasa zuduk k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
Wen, ka wa nɛ baa ɛɛ, wa tɛ ba nu Judee lɛŋ mbɛt, wa tɛ yai sa̧-a̧ Fara k’ɛ́ɛ́ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ ak yɛ oi ɗaŋa Tua kɔ̧-A̧‘i.

Kumaa ko o nya k’ɛ́ɛ́, baa nu k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ bara, yaiaa ko nu k’ɛ́ɛ́ ɗaŋ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ mɛ tik zu ɛɛ hee simbo ga, sen mgbara o gɔni duk n’ɛɛ́ tɛ ya bara sɛnɛ: ɛɛ tɛ ya nɛ mɔ-kɔ̧́ɔ̧́-náŋ ti o bíí nɛ tɛ ɔ wan zu ɛɛ, ɓɛɛ búu tɛ ba ɛɛ nɛ yi-wa.
Duka bara k’ɛ́ɛ́ beka de ha̧ o wan k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zɔk yɛ nɛ de yí na, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ tɛ pi̧i̧ foi tɛ ɛɛ, nɛ ɗoŋ aa.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, o nya'm, ɛɛ usi ha̧ o nya-ɛɛ nde kpasáá kɔ-wa a̧a̧ er-yɛ, in dukaa ko Sa̧a̧ Fara, dukaa ko Tua ko Sɔ̧ in ko Fara-ɗafi-Sɔ̧ a̧a̧ er-yɛ mbɛt.
Zua'i mbɛt, ɛɛ de osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ wee ɛɛ kinii. Hee mɔ n'A̧a̧ wea so o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ ga.
Tɛ‘nɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ n'A̧a dea so in Abraham lɛŋ, in hee mɔ'ɔ n'A̧a wea so nɛ see-Izaak ga, in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ kpaa so Jakɔb sɛn Mezopotamii nu Syrii, ŋgimbi n'a̧a̧ dai so nɛ o sami ko nɔkɔ kɔ̧-a̧ Laban.
Sɔ̧ wea so wa mɛ iŋ kɔ̧ see-wa, hegɔ bo nɛ kifa er ɗaŋmɔ a̧ Sɔ̧ de in yɛ na mbɛt, mɛ nɛ wen mbaŋa tɛ-mɔ, a̧ Gasa Wan usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ o wi nɛ ndaɗi ka tɛ-A̧ »
Ozias kifa ha̧ Judith: «O wen nɛ mɛ tɔ̧̧ lɛŋ duk nɛ yuwar-a, ŋma bíí beka si kafe sɛnɛ na.
Wen ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ-mɛ, bo nɛ mɔ sɔsɔɔ ɓɛɛ na; wen nɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ duka so nɛ be-zɔŋa tikiɗi, a o bíí lɛŋ zɔka nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-mɛ, in de wɔmɔ kɔ see-mɛ.
Nɛ gasa wɔ-yi nɛ gbɛɛ o bíí a̧ ira ɛɛ nɛ ŋgai mɛ demɔ n’ɛɛ́ ha̧nu-ɛɛ ha̧ wa mɛ de: ɛɛ kanamɔ hɛr nɛ tɛ-yɛ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ nyɛm mɛ bur na.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, nɛ mɛ duk nɛ kpasa wí-yu-Sɔ̧, mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ wen zu ɛɛ; bɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ tom koro tɛnɛ mɛ dun o gɔna-yi k’ɛ́ɛ́, bɛɛ ɛɛ beka ziɓi ɓɔ na.»
Judith tɔ̧̧ ha̧ wa: «Mi tɛ de ŋma mɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi, nɛ o bezaŋ-yɛ tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ-a tɛ o pɛrnam hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Nɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́, mɛ zaŋ-zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɛnɛ tɛ duk ka nu-garo saaye, mi tɛ gbo in kodetom kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ gɔna wen ea yé er o wisɛn bé tɛɛ́ hɔ, Gasa Wan tɛ tɛ-mɛ kpasi Israɛl nɛ war ko er-am.
K’ɛnɛ kii mɛ iŋ mɔ n'am tɛ de na, beka'm tɔ̧ h’ɛnɛ nɛti ha̧ mɔ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ na.»
Ozias in o wanye tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ duk zu mɛ! Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ a̧ mgbɔ mɛ yak ti, mɛ kifi er bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́!»
O gasawi gboa tɛ ko Judith, ɓɛɛ yak si fara pɛm-mɔ kɔ-wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa dɔɔ fuu-nyama mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ sɛn kɔ Tua ko Sɔ̧ sɛn Jerusalɛm, Judith guu sɔnti nu, a bùk zu, kpɔ̧i̧ laa-gɛra, e nɛ laa-bufu guntir ɓɛɛ, a̧ hiɗi mɔ nɛ ŋgaya ger si tɛ Gasa Wan, a̧ tɔ̧̧:
