«Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko zɔmdáà kɔ‘m Simeɔŋ, Ɛnɛ ee so gbapaa er-a mɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ o gɔni wi, nɛ baa so ŋma bokobem nɛ ŋgai, ɔ in a̧, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ a̧; wa kpɔ̧i̧a so laa tɛ-a̧ yinɛ pi̧i̧ nɛ foe tɛ a̧, wa ɗaŋa so zaŋ-a pi̧ nɛ búù zu a̧. Ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so: «wi nyɛm mɛ de pɛr ti mɔ hegɔ na», ɓɛɛ wa dea.

Hegɔ Ɛnɛ ea ha̧‘i mɛ gbɛ o wan kɔ o wi nɔ‘i yinɛ: tɔk-tɛ-wa aa nu gɔn mɔ, de nɛ ŋdiŋ sɛn fara nɛ wa baa ɗaŋ so tɛ dea ŋdiŋmɔ in bokobem’ɛi. Ɛnɛ mbɛra so o bara ka tɛ o ŋgaŋa wi, in o ŋgaŋa wi zu kiti-wan kɔ-wa.

Ɛnɛ ea ha̧‘i mɛ kai o kóò kɔ-wa yaknɛ, in mɛ kai o bokobem kɔ-wa nɛ bara. Ɛnɛ ea o mbɔi kɔ-wa lɛŋ er o bem k’Ɛnɛ, n’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna: wɔ dee tom k’Ɛnɛ gbɛa o bem nɔ‘i nyɛmna; mɔɔ-búù nɛ aa so ŋdiŋ tɛ tɔk-tɛ-wa dee tɛ-wa na mbɛt, wa saa so'Nɛ́ mɛ gbak wa. Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m, Ɛnɛ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m, mi n'am duk nɛ gee kóò oi.
Mɔ nɛ yaka, in mɔ mɛ kinii, in mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ, nɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ a de. Ɛnɛ taa mɔ wen mɔ mɛ kinii in mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ n’Ɛnɛ taa so ga hɔa kaɗi
O mɔ, n’Ɛnɛ dee so taamɔ mɛ de, hɔa, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧: «Ɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ!» Ɛnɛ ɗafa o yuwar k’Ɛnɛ lɛŋ, Ɛnɛ iŋa mɔ n’Ɛnɛ tɛ de lɛŋ kaɗi.

Zɔk, o be-Asirii tɛa nɛ gii, ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-wa wen o nyaŋa in wi-daŋ-nyaŋa kɔ-wa, go nɛ tɛ-wa wen ŋgai ko o widebiro kɔ-wa nɛ nɛ́ nɛ naŋ, e nɛ ta nɛ o ngee kɔ-wa, in o sɛɛ kɔ-wa, nɛ o kuusaa in o birndiŋ kɔ-wa; wa iŋ‘e Ɛnɛ nɛ gasa Wan gbin-biro na.

Nin'Nɛ́, nɛ́ Gasa Wan»! Ɛnɛ mbɔli ŋgai kɔ-wa nɛ ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ gbin ŋgaŋaa kɔ-wa nɛ nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wen wa ha̧nú mɛ ɗaŋ Sa̧a̧ Fara k’Ɛ́nɛ́, mɛ de ŋdiŋ a tɛ Tua-laa nɛ Gasamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ duk sɛnɛ, in mɛ gɔm Fara-ɗafi-‘Nɛ́ gbin a nu nɛ boe.
Ɛnɛ zɔ́k ŋmaŋa-tɛ kɔ-wa, Ɛnɛ tok ɗaŋ yoŋgo a zu wa tɛ nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ, mi n'am duk nɛ gee kóò-oi, Ɛnɛ e ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ à n'am e tɛ‘m kɔ er-am,
Nɛ war ko ɔramɔ mɛ kɔ nú‘m, Ɛnɛ mbɛ́r bara, kpɔk in wan kɔ‘i, Ɛnɛ mbɛ́r wan, kpɔk in widetom kɔ‘i mbɛt! Ɛnɛ gbín gɔɔ-tɛ kɔ-wa nɛ er okóò.

Ngai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ bo sɛn tɛ dɔkaa ko bíí na, bo sɛn tɛ ŋgaŋaa ko o bíí na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ ko o wi mɔkasee, Ɛnɛ nɛ Wi-gbak o wikɔsa, Ɛnɛ nɛ wi-tɔn o ɓɔsawi, in Fara-hu̧si-tɛ ko o wi nɛ ya ɛnɛ, Ɛnɛ nɛ Wi-kpasi o wi nɛ bo nɛ ee-ta ɓɔna.
Ii, ii, Sɔ̧ ko daa kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧ ko nù Israɛl, Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ wan zu yiwese in nù, Wan nɛ dea o yì, Ɛnɛ nɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ n’Ɛnɛ dea lɛŋ, Ɛnɛ zíí aia-nú kɔ‘m.

Ɛnɛ ha̧ yɔka wen-ɔr-bíí ha̧‘m mɛ e da̧i̧ tɛ o wi nɔ'ɔ, in ha̧‘m mɛ gbɛ wa; o wi nɔ'ɔ nɛ dee so taamɔ mɛ ɗaŋ nɔɔtɔk k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in Sa̧-a̧ Tua k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in Sa̧a̧ Kaya k’Ɛ́nɛ́ Siɔŋ, in tua nɛ duk nɛ ko o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ dukbíí lɛŋ in ha̧ o zuduk lɛŋ mɛ iŋ nde Ɛnɛ nɛ ŋgaŋa Sɔ̧, Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, in ŋma wi-pɛm o be-Israɛl nɛtɛ bo na, kana nɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.»
Doŋ nɛ Judith kaɗa hiɗa mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl, in tɔ̧a̧ wen kɔ̧-a̧,
a̧ kura yor ŋgɔn, sa kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ zir si kɔ bɛrtua kɔ̧-a̧, fara n'aa duk sɛnɛ, wese ɔmtɛ in wese gbaŋa lɛŋ.

A kpɔi̧a bufu n'aa mara guntir-a in o laa-gɛra kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ yinɛ, a nɛɛ zui yì, ɓɛɛ a sɔ̧ o de pɛr dita nɔ̧ tɛ a̧; a sara zu-a, hɛr nɛ salaabi, ɓɛɛ a pi nɛ o laa-gbaŋa, n'aa duka so mɛ mar, ŋgimbi nɛ wii kɔ̧-a̧ Manasse duka so nɛ yí.
A aa ndara naŋ-a, a pi̧i̧ o mɔɔ-gɛr, o kana, o wele, o mɔɔ-zer, in o demɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ lɛŋ: a kifa de boɗoe zɔŋa woyo, wen baa see-wiwii nɛ tɛ zɔk a.

A ha̧dak dɔ̧ɔ̧ in kpana nɔ̧ ha̧ kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tui; a aa fuu alkamaari dun ŋgoɓo kɔ̧-a̧, o makala waya te-mbɔra, o de sa̧-a̧ brɛt in nɔ̧ ber-ndai; a hɛra o mɔá nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tui mbɛt.
Wa kaia ŋmaa yak si yuwar nu-garo ye Betulii: wa kpaa Ozias in o gasawi saaye Kabris in Karmis, fara pɛma mɔ sɛn hi̧i̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa zɔka saŋa-yí Judith nɛ kpaia lɛŋ, in o de laa kɔ̧-a̧, ɗɛɗɛ-wa gɔna tɛ zɔka de yora zɔŋa kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ a̧ pɛm mɛ tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ̧-A̧! A a̧ de ha̧ mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a mɛ de mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, wen ha̧ o be-Israɛl mɛ kpa desee in ha̧ nin Jerusalɛm mɛ hu̧r.»
Judith gasa Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ tɔ̧́ wa a̧ hu̧i̧ nu-garo saaye ha̧‘m ɓɛɛ mi tɛ gbo mɛ demɔ n’ɛɛ́ ee so zu-a in'nɛ́ɛ́.» Wa ha̧ nú ha̧ o ŋgaiwi mɛ hu̧i̧ ha̧ a̧, hee mɔ n'aa aka ga.
Wa huia ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ Judith gbo in kodetom kɔ‘i. O wi saaye ya hi̧i̧ zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ-aa, hɔ ŋgimbi n'aa zira nɛ kaya hɔ tɛ ɓira nɛ ɗɔɔ kaya, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk a ɓɔ na.
Sɛn ɗɔɔ kaya, wa nɛa tan ti wa zeeŋ, ɓɛɛ o kuti wipɛmmɔ ko o be Asirii nɛɛ we ti wa.
Wa tika tɛ Judith, ɓɛɛ wa ak a̧: «Duk kɔ-mɛ nɛ ge? Mɛ tɛ nɛ de? Mɛ nɛ si de?» A kifa ha̧ wa: «Mi nɛ zɔŋa hébreu. Mi yu nɛ saaye kɔ-wa yak, wen dekpaa wa tika er'nɛ́.
Mi tɛa kɔ‘m tɛ gasa wan-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ Holofɛrn, ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ kpasawen ha a̧. Mi tɛ usi yuwar n'a̧a̧ tɛ ba ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɓar kaya lɛŋ er-wa, ɓɛɛ bii kɔ̧-a̧, kóó kpɔk, beka fe na.»
Tɛ zia wen kɔ Judith, in tɛ guɗa de saŋa-yí-a, a̧ yora zɔŋa yí-wa nyɛmna o bíí ko Holofɛrn tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧:
«Mɛ gɔna nu fio kɔ-mɛ tɛ ziraa tɛnɛ nɛ hayaa mɛ zɔk wan k’ɛ́ɛ́. Kinii mɛ nɛ kɔ tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧: o ŋma bíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ mgbɔ mɛ nɛnɛ e kɔ er-a.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ yor sɛn ti a̧, ká kii de mɛ na! Mɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧a̧ h’ɛɛ‘i ha̧ a̧: ɓɛɛ a tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ de yí.»
Wa hoka wiwii gɔmŋma mɛ mgbɔ a̧ in kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛnɛ hɔ sɛn kɔtua-laa ko Holofɛrn.
Nyɛrɛ tɛaa ko Judith pɛsa dam kɔ̧tua gbagari lɛŋ: ɓɛɛ bíí lɛŋ mɔí; wa kɛra a̧ zik e see-aa, ŋgimbi n'a̧a̧ yor nɛ zan ka tua ko Holofɛrn, zɛm nɛ sara kɔ̧-a̧, ɗoŋ nɛ wa tɛ mbaŋ nɛ tɛ-a.

Ɗɛɗɛ bíí lɛŋ gɔna tɛ zɔka de yora zɔŋa kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa zɔn nɛ o be-Israɛl lɛŋ wen zu a; wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ sitɛ o ŋmaa: «Wi tɛ e dukbíí nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛrti de okóò hego tɛ geemɔ hee ge? Bo nɛ ɔ dee mɛ e ha̧ kóó ɔ nde mgbara wa mɛ duk kpasa na, wen wa nyɛma mɛ ɔr o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ.»
O wi-pɛm Holofɛrn, in o gasawi-biro lɛŋ gboa, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔ Judith si kɔ̧ tua-laa.
Holofɛrn ɔm so kɔ‘i nɛ tɛ gɔn mɔ kɔ̧‘i ɗɔɔ nyɛm nyɛm gba de gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa-kpe-zifa nɛ‘i gɔna dap sɛnɛ nɛ garazi lɔr, in nɛ‘i fura o diama̧ in o de be yɔka ta sɛnɛ.
Wa mbaŋa tɛ-a wen tɛaa ko Judith, ɓɛɛ Holofɛrn gbo nu-zala tua kɔ̧‘i, o wi-tui mɔɔ-e-wee, nɛ wa dee nɛ bu-boe, duka ti ha̧ a̧.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Judith hɔa ti a, in ti o gasawi-biro kɔ̧-a̧, ɗɛɗɛ-wa lɛŋ gɔna tɛ zɔka de saŋa-yí -a. Judith gu sɔnti nu ti a, ɓɛɛ o widetom ko Holofɛrn ba a̧ ɛ ŋgɔn.
Holofɛrn tɔ̧̧ ha̧ Judith: «Kóò'ɛ, mɛ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, ka mɛ de kíí na! wen mi tɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ in bíí nɛ hoka mɛ de tom ha̧ Nabudonosor nɛ ɔ wan zu nu lɛŋ'ɛ na.
Ka dukbíí kɔ-mɛ nɛ ɔ zaŋ kaya’ɛ ee so'm tɛ geemɔ na, mi nyɛm so mɛ de biro in wa na: nɛ wa, nɛ zu-wa, a̧ kia mɔ‘i.
Kinii mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧‘m: mɛ yu mɔ nɛ tɛ kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ tɛ ɛɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ wen ge? Mɔ‘i kpasa mɛ nɛ mbetɛ! Mɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi! mɛ tɛ duk kpasa mɛ zaŋ zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧, in mɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt.
Ŋma bíí beka de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛ na, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ de demɔ in mɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i de in o wi nɛ de tom ha̧ gasa wan kɔ‘m Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ga.»
Judith tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Nyaa, ɛnɛ zíí wen kɔ‘m, mi n'am duk nɛ bara k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛnɛ é ha bara k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɔ̧ wen ti ‘nɛ́! beka'm tɔ̧ ndela ti gasa wan kɔ‘m mɛ zaŋ zɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ na.
K’ɛnɛ demɔ nɛ bara k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧ tɛ de nɛ gasa tom nɛ er-‘nɛ́, tom ko gasa wan kɔ‘m beka tik nu mbulɛɛ gee na.

Osoko ha̧ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr nɛ ɔ wan zu nu lɛŋ, nɛ toma ‘nɛ, nɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, mɛ de ha̧ o bíí lɛŋ mɛ ye tɛ tana war, osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt; wen see zu ‘nɛ in ŋgai-tɛ‘nɛ́, bo nɛ o bíí a̧ de tom ha̧ a̧ ɓɛɛ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ o bokonam, o mɔdai in o nɔi̧ mɛ yiwese tɛ duk kpasa wen a in o bíí nutua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mbɛt
Wen ɛɛ zia nyɛrɛ ɗuka taamɔ in iŋa mgbara mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Bíí zu nu lɛŋ iŋa'e sɛn nu ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr lɛŋ, kpɔk de wi in kpɔk wi-iŋ-mɔ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́, bíí nɛ wa zɔn tɛ biro hee ɛ́nɛ́ ga bo na.
Ɛɛ iŋa mɔ nɛ Akiɔr tɔ̧ɔ̧ so sɛn ti o wi-ba-keta k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen o be Betulii kpɛka Akiɔr, ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ o wen lɛŋ n'a̧a̧ tɔ̧a̧ ti nɛ́à ha̧ wa.

Wen hegɔ, wanusimɔ in gasa wan kɔ‘m, k’ɛnɛ é o wen ko Akiɔr tɛ geemɔ na, ɛnɛ kási wen kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ nɛ dea, wen mɛ nɛ kpasawen. Ŋma bíí nyɛm mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ dukbíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ na, gbapaa nyɛm mɛ kpa ŋgai zu wa na mbɛt, wa nɛ dea nɛ ɗaŋmɔ in Sɔ̧ sɛ́.

Ɓɛɛ, kinii, gasa wan, wa dea ɗaŋmɔ in Sɔ̧ kaɗi. Ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ wa dee ɗaŋmɔ, wa de ha̧ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ mɛ tik zu wa. Hegɔ, gasa wan kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ beka de biro in wa sɔɔgee na, wa nyɛm mɛ ndak ‘nɛ sinɛ na: fio tɛ gbɛ kana wa lɛŋ gbuɗuk.
Wa bo nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ɓɔ na, yi dɔk na mbɛt; hegɔ wa dee taamɔ mɛ gbɛ o mɔdai kɔ-wa: ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nyɔŋ o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ heembea ko Sɔ̧ dora wa tɛ nyɔŋa.
Wa tɔ̧a̧ wi tɛ nyɔŋ o zu-nyɔnɔ alkamaari, o zu-dɔ̧ɔ̧ in nɔ̧: nɛ mɔ nɛ wa ee nɛtɛ, wen ha̧ha̧ o wiɗafisɔ̧ nɛ yor ti Gasa Wan sɛn Jerusalɛm: ŋma gee bíí nyɛm mɛ fo gee foa o mɔ nɔ‘i, kóó nɛ er, na.
Zu-a'i woyo, wa toma o bíí si Jerusalɛm si tɛ o kutiwi mɛ ak wa mɛ e war ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ o mɔ nɔ‘i wen, kóó o bíí Jerusalɛm mbɛt dee nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ‘i.
Hegɔ, wese nɛ wa tɛ kpa kifanu, in nɛ wa tɛ nyoŋ o mɔ nɔ‘i, nɛ kale wese'i a̧ Sɔ̧ tɛ e nɛ wa er-‘nɛ́, h’ɛnɛ mɛ kum wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ kodetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ zia o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, mi yua mɔ nɛ ka tɛ wa yak, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ toma'm pii tɛ‘nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de o mɔ nɛ tɛ pi̧ kíí tɛ o bíí zaŋnu lɛŋ, nɛ tɛ zíí nyɛrɛ-a.

Kodetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ wi-yu-kíí-Sɔ̧, mi de tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ yiwese, zɛ nɛ wese. Ɓɛɛ kinii, gasa wan kɔ‘m, mi tɛ duk ka tɛ‘nɛ́. Mɔ kpɔk, zaŋ zɛ lɛŋ, kodetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ gbo mɛ nɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ ɗɔɔ kaya. Mi tɛ kɔf'A ha̧ A̧ mɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ŋgimbi nɛ o wi nɔ‘i tɛ de ɗaŋmɔ‘i.
Mi tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ mbaŋ tɛ-‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gbo in o widebiro k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ mɛ tik zu wa: kóó ŋma bíí kpɔk mgbara wa beka yor ti ‘nɛ́ na.

Hɔɗoŋ-aa, mi tɛ mgbɔ‘nɛ́ nɛnɛ ɓir nɛ nu Judee lɛŋ hɔ sɛn ti Jerusalɛm, mi tɛ e kiti-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn see-ye'i, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ, hee o sami nɛ bo nɛ wi-dai-wa na ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ beka kpa kóó ŋma toyo kpɔk, nɛ tɛ mgbu mɔ ti ‘nɛ́ bo na. Sɔ̧ mgbaŋa tɛ‘m wen o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛti, ɓɛɛ A̧ toma'm mɛ tɛ we ɗoŋ-a h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Wen'i dee tɛ Holofɛrn in o gasa widebiro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ: ɗɛɗɛ-wa lɛŋ gɔna wen ɗuka-taamɔ ko Judith, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧:
«Ŋma okóò nɛ yora zɔŋa in nɛ zíí mgbara mɔ, hee a̧ ga, bo zaŋnu lɛŋ na.»
Holofɛrn tɔ̧̧ ha̧ Judith: «Sɔ̧ dea demɔ tɛ toma mɛ tɛnɛ ti ha̧ dukbíí. Mɛ e ŋgai ɓɔn kɔ er-am, in mɛ kum o bíí nɛ siŋa gasa wan kɔ‘m e tɛ geemɔ.

«Ɓɛɛ, nɛ kɔ-mɛ, mɛ yora de zɔŋa nyɛmna; mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ yɔka wen nyɛmna mbɛt. Ka mɛ demɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen nɛ mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘i, Sɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ tɛ duk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m mbɛt, bɛɛ mɛ tɛ ɔ, kɔ-mɛ, kɔ kira-wan ko wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, ɓɛɛ nin-mɛ tɛ hu̧r dam zaŋnu lɛŋ.»
Holofɛrn ha̧nú mɛ mgbɔ Judith si sɛn kɔ tua kɔ‘i, sɛn fara nɛ o nyɛk bu-mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, in mɛ ha̧ o ŋma nyɔŋmɔ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i ha̧ a̧.
Ɓɛɛ Judith tɔ̧: «Mi beka nyɔŋ mɔ‘i na, wen ka'm tɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ: nyɔŋmɔ n'am kaia tɛnɛ tɛ nyɛm am.»
Holofɛrn tɔ̧̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɓɛɛ, ka nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ kaɗa, ɛɛ tɛ kpa pɛr ti nyɔŋmɔ‘i ha̧ mɛ sɛn de? wen ŋma bíí zuduk ko-mɛ bo mgbara ɛɛ na».
Judith kifa ha̧ a̧: «Nyaa, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ duk kpasa ga, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ tɛ de ha̧ mɔ n'Aa kɔ̧a̧ so mɛ de, nɛ er-am, mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, nɛti ha̧ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘m mɛ kaɗi »
O gasawi-biro ko Holofɛrn mgbɔa Judith nɛnɛ kɔ tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧, Judith ɔɔ ya hegɔ hɔ ɗuka zaŋ zɛ, sɛka a kur, nyɛm nɛ gbɛŋa-ti-ɗɛɗɛ.
A toma nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Holofɛrn: «Nyaa, ɛnɛ ha̧ nú wa a̧ e war ha̧ kodetom k’ɛnɛ mɛ gbo zan mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧.»
Holofɛrn ha̧nú ha̧ o wi-pɛm'a ka wa dor Judith tɛ gboo zan na. Judith ɔɔ zɛ taar kɔ gbagari. Mɛ zaŋ zɛ lɛŋ a zira ɗɔɔ kaya Betulii mɛ zui yì tɛ kpukput-yì, nɛ o widebiro pɛm.
Tɛ daŋaa kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ kɔfa Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl mɛ duk ti ha̧ a̧ gbak nɛ a mɛ kpasi dukbíí kɔ‘i.
Ka a pii kaɗi, in ka tɛ-a sa̧ mbɛt kaɗi, ɓɛɛ a duka kɔ tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ nɛ ŋgimbi nɛ wa tɛ ba nɛ nyɔŋmɔ tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Tɛ naar zɛ, Holofɛrn dea gasa gbaŋa ha̧ o gasa widetom kɔ̧-a̧; a sa ŋma bíí nɛtɛ tɛ gbaŋa'i na.
Ɓɛɛ a tɔ̧ ha̧ Bagoas, be kpana n'aa ee zu mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ: «Mɛ nɛ sa be-zoŋa hébreu nɛ duk tɛ kɔ-mɛ tɛnɛ, a mɛ tɔ̧ h'a̧ a̧ a̧ tɛ̧ nyɔŋ mɔ in nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in yɛɛ.
Wen, k’ɛ́ɛ́ e ha̧ pɛr ti de okóò hegɔ mɛ si ɗɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ iŋ a na, mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ gasa mɔɔ-foe nyɛmna wen yɛ; k’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɛm mɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa mɛ demɔ in yɛ na, a tɛ zɛkɛdi yɛ. »

Bagoas gboo nɛ tɛ kɔ Holofɛrn, ye tɛ ko Judith, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ka gba de zɔŋa’ɛ de kíí mɛ tɛ tɛ ko wan kɔ‘m na: a̧ tɛ kpa de zɔnamɔ ti a̧, a tɛ nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧-gbooyì nɛ desee in yɛɛ: a tɛ duk hee ŋma be-zɔŋa nu Asirii, nɛ ɔ kɔ kira ko gasa wannu Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr ga.»
Judith kifa ha̧ a̧: «Mi nɛ o'o ka'm bɛ̧ sara ko gasa wan kɔ‘m o? mɔ nɛ tɛ de tɛ-a lɛŋ, mi tɛ de nɛ hayaa: mɔ‘i tɛ duk nɛ gasa desee wen am, hɔ wese fio kɔ‘m. »

Judith kura, nɛɛ pi̧ o de laa-gbooyi kɔ‘i, a nɛ a o mɔ-ɗafi-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛn. Kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ yaka ti ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ tati o ndara-sami mbɔɗɔnù ti Holifɛrn: nɛ́ o ndara nɛ Bagoas ha̧so ha̧ Judith, ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ nù zu a wese lɛŋnyɔŋ nɛ mɔ.

Judith yee tua, ɓɛɛ nyafi ɔ nu gɔn ndara'i: see-Holofɛrn lɛŋ duk tɛ a, ɓɛɛ ɗɛɗ‘a gɔna nyɛmna tɛ zɔka a: wɔ tɛ-a gbɛ a nyɛmna mɛt ɔ in a, wen dika tɛ kuti wese n'aa zɔka nɛ a, Holofɛrn kia war mɛ ɔr a,
Holofɛrn tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «mɛ nɔ mɔ, mɛ de nyɛŋɛ in yɛ.»
Judith kifa ha̧ a̧: «Ii, nyaa, mi tɛ nɔ mɔ; wen sɔsɔɔ mi kpaa desee gan o dɔka wese lɛŋ n'am duka nɛnɛ.»
A nɔa mɔ, a nyɔŋa mɔ, nɛ kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ ɗafa so ha̧ a̧, nɛ gba̧a̧yí Holofɛrn.
Nyɛŋɛ gana zu Holofɛrn wenzu Judith, ɓɛɛ a nɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dɔkaa, yak zale, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa tɛ nɔ nɛti daka mɛ bem ga na.

Nɛ zɛ ɗuka kaɗi, o gasa widetom kɔ̧-a̧ gboa nɛ haya mɛ si tɛ kɔ-wa. Bagoas foa o bíí nɛ ɓɔna so katɛ wan kɔ‘i si zan, ɓɛɛ a kpɛe nutua-laa nɛ zan. Wa sia lɛŋ mɛ ɔ ya: tɛ-wa lɛŋ mbɔia wen dɔka dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ wa nɔa.
Judith ɓɔna ɛnɛ in Holofɛrn nɛ tika kat gɔn gado kɔ̧-a̧, wen dɔ̧ɔ̧ gbɛ a.
Judith tɔ̧̧ so ha̧ kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ yor zan, ka nutua, zɛm nɛ gboa kɔ̧-a̧, hee mɔ n'aa dee so wese lɛŋ ga. A tɔ̧a̧ so ha̧ a wi tɛ gbo zan mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧; a tɔ̧a̧ nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ‘i ha̧ Bagoas mbɛt.

O bíí pɛsa lɛŋ kaɗi: kóó kpɔk ɓɔn kɔ tua na, kóó nɛ geɗɛk-a kóó nɛ gasa mbɛt. Judith yor ŋgɔn ka naŋ-gado ko Holofɛrn, a kɔfi Sɔ̧, kɔ see-a, hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ tom mɛ er-am mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧ kinii, wen ha̧ nin Jerusalɛm mɛ hu̧r.
Ŋgimbi gbaka dukbíí k’Ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi, ŋgimbi kuma o wisɛn nɛ kura biro in yɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi: Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ tom, mɛ er-am, mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.»
Judith ɗɔla si ka zu-gado, fara nɛ Holofɛrn ee zu si sɛnɛ‘i, a ɓara gbapaa ko Holofɛrn,
a ɗɔla siti woyo, a kasi muizu-Holofern, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl, Ɛnɛ há ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧‘m sɔsɔɔ. »
A gɔma ger-Holofɛrn war yiitoo, nɛ ŋgai tɛ-a lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɓir zu-a yinɛ.
Nɛ mɔ n'aa kina wɔr-a si ɗɔɔ gado, ɓɛɛ ɓar laa-kpɛ-zifa yinɛ, ɗoŋ tikiɗi, a gbo zan, ba zu-Holofɛrn ha̧ ha̧ kodetom kɔ̧-a̧,

nɛ pi a kɔ ŋgɔɓɔ-nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo, wa kai ŋma yak, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa duka so mɛ de wese lɛŋ wen kɔfa Sɔ̧ ga. Wa ɓira nu gbagari si ɗɔɔ kaya, wa zika nɛ ka gbóŋgó, wa daŋ kaya si Betulii, ɓɛɛ wa hɔɔ nu-garo ye.
Judith hiɗa mɔ nɛ nyɛia̧ ha̧ o wi-pɛm nu-garo-ye: «Ɛnɛ húi, ɛnɛ húi nɛ hayaa, wen gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ a̧a̧ in yɛ, A̧ dea o gasa mɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-bíí sɛn Israɛl, A usa ŋgai kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́ sɔsɔɔ.
Nɛ o bíí saaye zia tiger-Judith, wa zira nɛ hayaa si nu-garo ye, ɓɛɛ wa saa o kutiwi saaye tɛnɛ.

O bíí lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-aa nɛ o bem hɔ tɛ o gasa bíí, wara yi gar nɛnɛ tɛnɛ, wen wa taa so, kɔ-wa, Judith beka pii ɗɔŋ ɓɔna! wa huia nu-garo, ɓɛɛ wa kpɛka o kóò nɔ‘i yiitoo nɛ dea, wa mɔi̧a̧ zik katɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yee wee mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ sa̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ Judith tɔ̧̧ ha̧ wa, nɛ heeger'e: «Ɛnɛ gási Sɔ̧, ɛnɛ gási A̧, ɛnɛ gási Sɔ̧, nɛ kaɗi dea ko ha̧ o be-Israɛl na, ɓɛɛ nɛ gbina ŋgai ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ ŋgai mɛ er'am, mɛ zaŋ-zɛ'ɛ̧.»

Nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'a̧a̧ ba zu-Holofɛrn gbo nɛ kɔ ŋgɔɓɔ kɔ̧-a̧, usi ha̧ wa, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Ɛnɛ zɔ́k zu-Holofɛrn, gasa wan-biro ko o be Asirii, ɛnɛ zɔ́k laa-kpe-zifa n'a̧a̧ ɔɔ so nu ɗɔɔ-a, ŋgimbi nɛ dɔɔ gbɛɛ a. Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ gusa a̧ nɛ er okóò.
Nɛ nin Gasa Wan, nɛ duk kpasa nɛ gbaka'm tɛ tom kɔ‘m, nɛ mbetɛ nɛ́ saŋayi'm a ɔra Holofɛrn pi̧ a tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ɗaŋmɔ in am pi̧‘m tɛ foe in mɔ-buu na.»
Tɛ zia wen'i, kíí dea o bíí lɛŋ, wa gu nù gasi nɛ Sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛm ŋmaa'e: «Osoko h’Ɛ́nɛ́, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, wen sɔsɔɔ Ɛnɛ kuma o wisɛn ko dukbíí k’Ɛ́nɛ́ kaɗi

Ozias baa wen, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ Judith: «Bokobem kɔ‘m, Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ gan zu o ŋma okóò zaŋnu lɛŋ. Osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, nɛ dee yiwese in nù, in nɛ mgbɔa mɛ nɛnɛ mɛ ɓir zu wan ko o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Tɛ o bíí beka bii ɗɔŋ ee-ta kɔ-mɛ nɛ Sɔ̧ na yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧, tɛ-wa tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ŋgai ko Sɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.

Sɔ̧ a̧ de ha̧ nin-mɛ mɛ hu̧r ɓɔnsɛnɛ, A a̧ ha̧ o dɔka demɔ kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ mɛ, wen nɛ mɛ yu kii fio mɛ kpasi dukbíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ wa ee so tɛ geemɔ na, in nɛ mɛ nɛɛ nɔ nɛ yuwar-a ti Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ̧, mɛ dor yɛ tɛ yɔamɔ. Ɓɛɛ dukbíí lɛŋ kifa nú: Amɛn! Amɛn!
Judith tɔ̧̧ ha̧ wa: «O nya'm, ɛnɛ zíí: ɛnɛ bá zu-wiù hɛ̧ɛ̧, ɛnɛ gái a nɛ ŋgɔn tɛ garo ye k’ɛ́nɛ́

Ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ, nyɛm nɛ sɛkɛ sɛkɛ wese, o nde lɛŋ a̧ kai o boi-biro kɔ‘i, o ŋgaŋa bíí lɛŋ ɛnɛ tɛ gbo nɛ saaye, ɛnɛ tɛ hok ŋma bíí mɛ ɔ wan zu ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ demɔ, hee ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ zir ɗɔɔ kaya sitɛ o wi-biro ko o be-Asirii ga, ɓɛɛ k’ɛnɛ zir na!

O be-Asirii ɗɔɔ kaya tɛ kai o boi-biro kɔ-wa yak si kɔ gbagari kɔ-wa, wa tɛ tun o gasawi-biro kɔ-wa, nɛ tɛ ma yi si sɛn kɔ tua ko Holofɛrn; wa beka kpa a na, ɓɛɛ gasa kíí tɛ hɛr zaŋ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ yu mɔ yak nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛnɛ.
Ɛnɛ, in o be-Israɛl lɛŋ, ɛnɛ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ wa, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ gbɛ wa fara yuu mɔ.
Nɛti, ɛnɛ tɛ nɛɛ sa Akiɔr be Ammɔn tɛnɛ sɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk, nɛ gbaayi'a, zu-wi nɛ tɔ̧̧ wen zu o be-Israɛl e nɛ wa tɛ geemɔ, zu-wi nɛ toma so a tɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe in yɛɛ.
Wa nɛɛ sa Akiɔr nɛ kɔ tua ko Ozias tɛnɛ. Akiɔr hɔa, a̧ zɔka zu-Holofɛrn, nɛ ŋma wiwii kasi nɛ er, ɓɛɛ bele zar a pi nù.

Wa baa Akiɔr e ngɔn, ɓɛɛ a hɔfi tik naŋ-Judith gu nù ti a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Toka de yoŋgo ko Sɔ̧ a̧ duk zu mɛ sɛn kɔ tua-laa ko o be Judéé lɛŋ, in mgbara o dukbíí zaŋnu lɛŋ, nɛ ɗɛɗɛ-wa tɛ gɔn tɛ zia saa nin-‘mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ ɓa ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ mɛ dea lɛŋ zaŋ o zɛ nɔ‘i ha̧‘m.» Judith yora poo dukbíí we ɗoŋ mɔ n'a̧a̧ dea lɛŋ, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ wese n'a̧a̧ gboo nɛ Betulii, hɔ ŋgimbi n'a̧a̧ tɔ̧ nɛ wen’ɛ̧.
A̧ kaɗa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ dukbíí gai mɔ nɛ héé gɛ́r, ɓɛɛ hee yili dam saaye lɛŋ.
Nɛ a̧ zia mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl dea'i lɛŋ, Akiɔr kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ ŋgai tɛ-a lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a kpɛk ha̧‘i mɛ gɔn bɔr-a. Nɛ hegɔ a̧ a yea nɛ mgbara o be-Israɛl hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Mɛ gɔna ndaazan, o be Betulii gai̧a zu-Holofɛrn ŋgɔn tɛ garo; o wiwii lɛŋ kaia o boi-biro kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kai nɛ ŋmaa zir si ɗɔɔ kaya.
Nɛ o be Asirii zɔka wa, wa toma o bíí mɛ mbaŋ tɛ o wan-biro kɔ-wa: o i̧i̧ nɔ‘i toma ha̧ o wi-duk zu wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Wa hɔa nutua ko Holofɛrn, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ wi-duk zu mɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘e: «Mɛ nɛɛ tun gasa wan-biro k’ɛ́ɛ́, wen o ɗaŋ bara nɔ'ɔ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi mɛ de biro in yɛɛ: wa a kíí h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ kum wa lɛŋ gbuɗuk'i.»
Bagoas yee tua, ɓɛɛ a mbɛr er-a nu-ɓaɓur, wen a taa so'e Holofɛrn ɔ nɛ nu in Judith.
Ɓɛɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ŋma kifanú bo na ga, a wɛna laa nu-ɓaɓur yinɛ, a ye mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa wɔr Holofɛrn mbɔɗɔnu ti gado, gɔ́ɔ́zu-a bo hi̧i̧ na.
Bagoas hiɗa mɔ nɛ heeger, hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a, gɔfi mɔ, he mɔ nɛ ŋgaya, a̧k laa tɛ.
A yee kɔ tua nɛ Judith ɔɔ so sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a kpa Judith na. A maa yi si poo gíí widebiro, hiɗi nɛ mɔ‘e:
«O bara nɔ'ɔ wa deemɔ yek nɛ ɛ́ɛ́: kóò hébreu kpɔk pi̧i̧ foe tɛ nutua ko Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr lɛŋ; Holofɛrn ɔ mbɔɗɔnu, gɔ́ɔ́zu-a bo na.»
Tɛ zia wen'i, o gasawi-ɓiro ko be-Asirii a̧ka̧ laa tɛ, ɗɛɗɛ-wa gɔna nɛ ɗaŋa nyɛmna, wa nɔi̧a o gɔfamɔ in o ŋgaya hiɗimɔ dam zaŋ gbagari lɛŋ.
Nɛ o wi nɛ ɔ kɔ tua-laa zia nyɛrɛmɔ‘i, bele zara wa te mɔ nɛ hɔa.
Gasa kii in naka-tɛ dee wa, wa nyɛm mɛ duk ka tɛ ŋmaa na, ɓɛɛ wa pɛsi lɛŋ yu nɛ mɔ, nɛ o yuwar zaŋ kaya in ɗɔɔ kaya.
O wan nɛ ɔ zaŋ kaya zik nɛ ye Betulii yuu mɔ yak mbɛt. O be-Israɛl, wan nɛ nyɛma so mɛ de biro lɛŋ, tika zu wa.
Ozias toma o betom si sɛn Betomɛstaim, in Bebai, Koba, Kola, in sɛn oi zikanù Israɛl lɛŋ, mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ nɛ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ wa, in mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wa mɛ máá yi ɗoŋ o wisɛn mɛ kum wa lɛŋ.

Nɛ o be-Israɛl zia tom'i, wa wara yi tik zu wa war kpɔk, gbɛ nɛ wa hegɔ hɔ Kɔba. O wi Jerusalɛm in o wi mɛ zaŋ kaya lɛŋ hɔa mbɛt, wen wa toma nɛ nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ hɔa sɛn gbagari ko o wisɛn ha̧ wa. O wi mɛ nu Galaad in mɛ nu Galiléé kura nɛ mgbɔɔr mɛ tik zu o wisɛn, ɓɛɛ ndak ɗoŋ wa, kum nɛ wa, hɔ nɛnɛ ka Damas in zikanu Damas.
O wi nɛ ɓɔna sɛn Betulii zira kaya tik zu gbagari ko o be-Asirii ɗɔɔ kaya, wa yaia mɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kai mbɔi kɔ-wa nɛ dɔkaa.
O ŋma be Israɛl nɛ daŋa biro kaia o oi mɔ. O wi mɛ gedɛk ye in mɛ gasa ye zu kaya in ɗɔɔ kaya kpaa, war kɔ‘i, nɛ dɔkaa mbɛt, wen mbɔi oi biro gbisi so gbisi.
Gasa Wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Joakim, in o kutiwi nu-gara ko o be-Israɛl, nɛ yaa so Jerusalɛm, tɛa mɛ zɔk o demɔ nɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ dea in Israɛl, mɛ zɔk Judith in mɛ fan a̧.
Wa yee tɛ kɔ Judith, ɓɛɛ wa ee nu-wa kpɔk mɛ zɔn a, wa tɔ̧̧: «Mɛ baa nin Jerusalɛm e ŋgɔn! mɛ nɛ mɔɔ-duk-tɛ kɔ o be Israɛl! mɛ nɛ mɔɔ-hu̧r-nin duk k’ɛ́ɛ́!

O mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ dea nɛ er-mɛ! mɛ dea demɔ nyɛmna in Israɛl, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ mɔ nɛ mɛ dea lɛŋ. Gasa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ a̧ tok de yoŋgo zu mɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo!». Ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa: «Amɛn! Amɛn!»

O be-Israɛl pɛa mɔ oi o be-Asirii sɛn gbagari kɔ-wa tɛ zɛ ɓu-taar. Wa ha̧tua-laa ko Holofɛrn ha̧ Judith, in o mɔ bu-boi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, o gado kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, o nyɛk in o mɔ kɔtua kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. Judith kaia o mɔ nɔ‘i hɛr zu alfadaari kɔ‘i, a mɔi̧a̧ oi mɔ kɔ o keekee-nyaŋa kɔ̧-a̧.
O okóò Israɛl lɛŋ wara yi tɛnɛ mɛ zɔk Judith in mɛ zɔn a; o ŋma poo wa nɛka zik kpa, yɔ nɛ yɛ, bii nɛ gima zɔn nɛ a̧.

Judith baa hɛra wa̧a̧-te kɔ er, ɓɛɛ ha̧ ha̧ o okóò nɛ yaa in a̧; wa gu o waa-te-nɔ zu wa, ɓɛɛ Judith duk ti ha̧ o dɔka okóò yɔ nɛ yɛ. O wiwii Israɛl lɛŋ kaia o boi-biro kɔ-wa, wa kara wa̧a̧ gu zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa nɛɛ ɗoŋ wa, bii nɛ gima in wa.
Ɓɛɛ Judith ŋma nu tɛ gima de nɛ osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, ti o be-Israɛl lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ ba gɛr gima in a:
«Ɛnɛ mbɛ́r biɔ̧ bii nɛ gima ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m,
ɛnɛ mbɛ́r kuŋge bii nɛ gima ha̧ Gasa Wan,
Ɛnɛ de gima mɛ zɔn A, ɛnɛ gás'A,
ɛnɛ kɔf'A sa nɛ nin-A.
Wen Gasa Wan nɛ Sɔ̧-gbin-biro,
A dee o gbagari kɔ̧-A̧ poo dukbii kɔ̧-A̧.
A ɓara'm er o wisɛn kɔ‘m yinɛ.
Asur tɛa nɛ zaŋ kaya mɛ ŋgɔn, a tɛa nɛ gba gii widebiro,
nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na, gii wi nɔ‘i gbisi gbisi,
kpɛ nɛ o gbor-gbor-yi lɛŋ,
o nyaŋa kɔ-wa kpɛ nɛ o zutɔ̧ lɛŋ diɔ̧m.
Wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ dɔ nu kɔ‘m gbuɗuk,
mɛ gbɛ o be-ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m nɛ gbapaa,
mɛ siŋ o be-zɔɗi bem kɔ‘m pi̧ nu,
mɛ kai o bem kɔ‘m nɛ bara,
in mɛ kai o bokobem kɔ‘m yaknɛ.
Nɛ mɔ nɛ Gasa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ dora wa nɛ er-okóò.
Wen bo nɛ o ŋgaiwi a̧ gbɛa wan kɔ-wa na,
bo nɛ obem ko ŋgaŋa wi a̧ mbɛra a na,
bo nɛ o gba kusa wi a̧ tika zu a na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ Judith, bokobem ko Merari,
mɛ nɛ de saŋayi-Judith a̧ dea ha̧ bele mɛ zar a pi̧ nu.
A kpɔia so o laa-gɛra kɔ̧-a̧ pi nu,
ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba o wibɔnɛ Israɛl e ŋgɔn.
A sɔ̧a de pɛr nɔ̧ tɛ saŋayi-a,
A hɛra muizu-a nɛ de salabi, a mara nɛ de goe wen mɛ ɔr a,
o de ndara naŋ-a dea ha̧ zu-a mɛ zik,
de saŋayi-a dea ha̧ gba-gbana bele mɛ zar a,
ɓɛɛ gbapaa ɓira zu-a yinɛ.
Nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ko Judith dee ha̧ tɛ o be Pɛrsɛ mɛ nak,
nyoŋa-nin kɔ̧-a̧ dea ha̧ bele mɛ dak o be Mɛdɛ pi nu.
O ga̧a̧wi mɛ dukbii kɔ‘m gaia mɔ,
ɓɛɛ kii hɛr zaŋ o wi nɔ‘i, o ɓɔsawi k’ɛ́ɛ́ hiɗa mɔ nɛ heeger,
ɓɛɛ tɛ o wi nɔ‘i nak; wa hiɗa mɔ nɛ ŋgayaa gan, ɓɛɛ zu o wi nɔ‘i daŋa.
Wa toka wa sar hee o bem ko gee okóò ga,
wa ɛɛ da̧i̧ tɛ wa hee tɛ o bem ko o wi-de-kii nɛ yu biro ga,
ɓɛɛ wa fee yi biro ko Gasa Wan kɔ‘m.
Mi tɛ bii nɛ mbe gima ha̧ Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m:
Gasa Wan, ɛnɛ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, gasamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛmna,
ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi, ŋma mɔ nyɛm mɛ gan'Nɛ́ na.
O mɔ n’Ɛnɛ dea lɛŋ a̧ de tom h’Ɛ́nɛ́,
wen Ɛnɛ tɔ̧a̧ so wen, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ de,
Ɛnɛ toma so Ɔmi k Ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧ zu wa, ɓɛɛ wa yor,
ŋma bíí kpɔk nyɛm mɛ yor ti'Nɛ́ na.
O naŋ kaya tɛ nak ɓɛɛ gbina tik ɗɔɔ yi, o kamta tɛ yeli ti ' nɛ́,
hee mbɔɗa sake gɔrɔ ga: ɓɛɛ, nɛ k’Ɛ́nɛ́,
Ɛnɛ beka kaɗi dee ko ha̧ o bíí nɛ yu kii'Nɛ́ na.
O mɔɔ-dafi'Nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ́ be-geɗɛk mɔ tikiɗi,
nɛ pɛr-a nun nɛ dea ti'Nɛ́ na,
o nɔ-kpoo nɛ wa dɔ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ wen ɗafa
Nɛ́ nɛ geemɔ gan, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan duk nɛ gasawi kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Bɔnɛ a̧ tik zu o zudukbii nɛ kur mɛ de biro in dukbii kɔ‘m:
Gasa Wan nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa sɛn wese gasa kita.
A tɛ de ha̧ wee in o dɔk mɛ ye tɛ kpoo-tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ tɛ nyimmɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.»
Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔa Jerualɛm, wa gasa Sɔ̧; ɓɛɛ, nɛ war tɛ dukbii ɗafa sa̧ kaɗi, wa dɔɔ kpoo ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧, wa ha̧o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, in o ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Judith ha̧so o mɔɔ-kɔtua kɔ Holofɛrn lɛŋ, nɛ dukbíí ha̧so ha̧ a̧, ha̧ Sɔ̧. A̧ ha̧zɔ-laa-ba-zifa, n'aa baa so kɔtua ko Holofɛrn, ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɓɛt.
Dukbíí hɔɔ zaŋgule ti sa̧-a̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, sɛn Jerusalɛm tɛ fiozɛ taar, ɓɛɛ Judith duk in wa.
Ɗoŋ nɛ gbaŋa yaka kaɗi, kóó o nde sia ɗoŋ tɛ kɔ‘i. Judith mbɛt sia ɗoŋ Betulii, ɓɛɛ a ɔ tɛ kɔ̧-a̧. Nin-a hu̧ra dam zikanu'i lɛŋ, hɔ wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.
O wiwii nɛ dɔkaa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ ba a nɛ koo, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ nɛ wii kɔ̧-a̧ Manasse pɛɛ see, ɓɛɛ si ɗoŋ kpa o zɔmdaa kɔ‘i, ŋma wiwii kpɔk iŋ na, hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Nin-a hu̧ra siti siti; a duka kɔ tua ko wii kɔ̧-a̧ sɔk nɛnɛ: a kpaa nɛ pɛ gɔmŋma nɛ pɛ mɔɔrɔ. A gboa kodetom kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ bara, ɓɛɛ a fe sɛn Betulii. Wa guna a kɔ di̧i̧ ko wii kɔ̧-a̧ Manasse.
Dukbíí Israɛl hi̧a̧ fio kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo. Nɛti ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe, a kɛ̧a so o mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o nam ko wii kɔ̧-a̧ Manasse, in o pɛrnam kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt.
Ŋgimbi ko Judith, in zaŋ pɛ nɛ dɔkaa ɗoŋ fio kɔ̧-a̧, ŋma bíí nɛ nɔɔ ŋgiɗi mɛ pi̧ kii tɛ o be-Israɛl bo ɓɔna.
[1a] Tɛ yitoo pɛ-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs Gasa-a̧, tɛ kuti wese ko fiozɛ «Nisan», Mardochee ɔɔ zu. Mardochee nɛ́ bem ko Yair, be-koo Simɛi, bezaŋ Kis, zika nutua ko Benjamin.
[2a] Mardochee nɛ́ be-Juif nɛ̀ ɔɔ so sɛn saaye Suzɛ. A̧ duka so nɛ́ dita bii nɛ̀ de tom sɛn nugara ko wannu.
[3a] A̧ a̧a̧ so mgbara o wi Jerusalɛm nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔzɔr wannu Babilɔŋ kaia so nɛ̀ bara-biro yaknɛ, kpɔk in Yekonia, wannu Juda.
[4a] Mardochee ɔɔ zu, hee mɔ'ɔ ga: a̧ zia o hiɗimɔ in o gba tigɛr-bii ɗiriri; dika-koro in naka-nù hɔɔ gbaŋayaŋa: mɔ lɛŋ kpaia si ɓii si ɓii’ɛ.
[5a] O gasa ndiɓa yiitoo ɗɔla pii ti yor gɛɗɛ-gɛɗɛ mɛ duk zu nɛ̀ ŋmaa. Wa pi̧i̧ gasa hiɗimɔ nù bél-bél.
[6a] Ɓɛɛ beebee mɔ‘i, o dukbii lɛŋ ɗafi nɛ́ mɔ wen bii ŋmaa in dukbii nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
[7a] Wese'i nɛ́ wese tum in gba-tum kpɔ̧ɔ̧-kpɔ̧ɔ̧, wese bɔnɛ in ditasee, wese kíì in bele dam zaŋ nù lɛŋ.
[8a] Tɛ dukbii nɛ̀ de mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a ku̧u̧ naŋ naka-a hɛrr, ta nɛ̀ bɔnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hɔ zu wa, pɛm nɛ̀ fio,
[9a] ɓɛɛ wa hiɗi mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧. Hiɗimɔ kɔ-wa'i duk hee be kpukput-yì nɛ̀ be-zer gbo sɛnɛ, kifi nɛ́ gasa nanayi nɛ̀ duna nú-ŋgere yɛtɛtɛ ga.
[10a] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧mɔ hɔa, ɓɛɛ wese daŋ; o ga̧a̧wi kpaa ŋgai, ɓɛɛ wa tik zù o wi-gɔtɛ kum nɛ̀ wa.
[11a] Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hi̧i̧ a Mardochee tuna nɛ̀ zu ya. Tɛ ɔɔ-zu n'aa zɔka, a̧ iŋa mɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de; a̧ kasa mɔ‘i e kɔ̧ see-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ ta mɔ sɛnɛ mɔ ga̧ nɛnɛ tu̧i̧, ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ gba̧a̧ zu'i.
[12a] Mardochee nɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ ɔm tɛ sɛn beegara ko wannu, kpɔk in Gabata ká bá nɛ̀ Tharra, o kpaná yiitoo nɛ̀ pɛm beegara ko wannu.
[13a] A̧ kpaa wa fara zaŋa wen, ɓɛɛ a̧ yéŋ zer-aa mɛ zii gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɔ̧‘i. A̧ kɔɓa'e wa e nɛ́ zua mɛ gbɛ wannu Artazɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ̀ɛ̀ gba ndàá-wa ha̧ wannu nɛ̀ hayaa.
[14a] Wannu aka o kpaná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i; wa kafi na, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛɛ wa.
[15a] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha'i mɛ yɔr mɔ‘i ba e, kà tɛ-wi mbaŋ ɗoŋ-aa. Mardochee mbɛt yɔra kpɔk mɔ‘i ba e.
[16a] Hegɔ wannu ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Mardochee mɛ duk sɛn tɛ nugara, de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ o mɔ nɛ̀ dɔkaa ha̧ a̧ géè wen zu mɔ n'aa dea'i.

[17a] Haman, nɛ̀‘i sa'e Bugaios, bem ko Hamadata, duka so nɛ́ ŋma gasa tu̧u̧-tɛ-bíí nɛ̀ wannnu zɔk nɛ̀ de yí. A̧ kia mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in Mardochee, ká bá nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen zu o kpaná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i.
[1] Duka so nɛ́ ŋgimbi ko wannu Artazɛrzɛs, nɛ̀ ɔa so wan zù o zikanù gɔmŋmaa nɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, dika Etiopii hɔ nɛnɛ Indɛ mɛ.
[2] Ŋgimbi'i, ɗoŋ n'aa baa wan kaɗi, a̧ tɛa duk zu kiti-wan mɛ gasa ye Suzɛ.

[3] Tɛ taar pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ dee gasa dina ha̧ o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧, in o widetom kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, wen o gasawi-duk-ti-biro ko o bíí Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ, ká bá nɛ̀ o be-wan in o gasawi nɛ̀ duk zù o zikanù nɛnɛ lɛŋ.
[4] Ɓɛɛ zaŋ fiozɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk a̧ usa gba dɔka mbɔi wan kɔ̧-a̧, in o zɔm demɔ nú-wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wa.
[5] Ɗoŋ o zɛ nɔ‘i, wannu dea gasa nyɔŋmɔ woyo sɛn beegara-wan tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, ha̧ o wi-saaye Suzɛ, dika tɛ o obem hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ o gasa bíí.

[6] Wa ɗafa so beegara-wan nɛ̀ o bu laa in o gbɛ̧ yɛm-yɛm zɔ̧-laa, nɛ̀‘i gai̧a tɛ o gbɛ̧ zóŋ-zóŋ nyak, nɛ̀ wa kuna tɛ kɔŋgi-lɔr in bu-mbɔi zaŋ mbiŋ-tua nɛ̀ wa dea nɛ̀ de bu yɔka-ta nɛ̀ dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ. Wa aa o gado nɛ̀‘i dea nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi zu ŋma zika fara nɛ̀‘i yɔka nɛ̀ o de kpɔ́yá ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ. O borgo nɛ̀ nú-a tok tok kɛn-kɛn a̧a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt, in o dó te nɛ̀‘i gbaia dam beegara.
[7] O bera nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀ wa dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, in ŋma bera kpɔk, gasa-a̧ nɛ̀‘i dea nɛ̀ ɓana-ta, nɛ̀ mbɔi-a ɔ dɔka. O de dɔ̧ɔ̧ ya so lata-lata, wannu nɛ̀ nɔ̧a-a mbɛt.
[8] Dɔ̧ɔ̧ fok so nɛ̀ mbɔɗɔnu nɛnɛ, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú ko wannu, ɓɛɛ bó so nɛ́ doole wen nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i na; wannu ha̧a̧ so nú ha̧ o widetom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ de mɔ héé mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see bíí kɔ̧a̧ ga.
[9] Ko-wan Astin dea so war gbaŋá kɔ‘i in o okóò sɛn kɔ̧ kira ko wannu Artazɛrzɛs mbɛt.

[10] Tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, héé mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧ pi̧i̧ tɔrtɛ tɛ wannu ga, a̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha Haman, Bazan, Tharra, Borazɛ, Zatolta, Abataza in Tharaba, o kpàná kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-doŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ ya kɔ‘i ka tɛ-a de nɛ̀ tom ha̧ a̧‘i,
[11] mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ sa ko-wan Astin tɛnɛ. A̧ kɔ̧a̧ so mɛ e a̧ zu kitiwan nɛ̀ oi mɔɔguzu ko ko-wan kɔ̧-a̧ zu-a, in mɛ usi déè kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o gasawi in o dukbíí lɛŋ, wen Astin yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
[12] Ɓɛɛ ko-wan Astin bɛ̧ sara nú o betom ko wannu. See-wannu tu̧a kús, ɓɛɛ ŋga nyimsea ba a̧.
[13] A̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ o wi-iŋ-heembea: «Nú-wen nɛ̀ Astin kifa a̧a̧! Tòò, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k mgbara-a, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́n kita-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea.»
[14] Arkesaios, Sarsataios in Malesear, o kuti gasawi ko o be Pɛrsɛ in ko o be Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ ya so ka tɛ wannu, nɛ̀ duk so nù nɛti ka tɛ-a, ɗɔŋa si ti.
[15] Wa tɔ̧a̧ mɔ nɛ wannu tɛ de in ko-wan Astin, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea, oi bɛ̧ɛ̧ sara ko wannu n'aa toma nɛ̀ o kpàná.
[16] Mukaios tɔ̧a̧ ti wannu in ti o gasawi: «Bo nɛ́ ko-wan Astin fɛ̧ŋa nɛ́ wannu ɛ̀nɛ̀-wi ɓɛ̀ɛ̀ na; a̧ fɛ̧ŋa nɛ́ o gasawi duk-zu-tom in o zuduk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ sɛn o zikanù lɛŋ mbɛt,
[17] wen wannu wee so ɗoŋ yuwar kifa nú-wen ko ko-wan, nɛ̀ bɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ̀ sara'i, ha̧ wa nɛti.

[18] Héé mɔ'ɔ n'aa kifa nɛ̀ nú ha̧ wannu Artazɛrzɛs ga, nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ o kóò ko o gasawi nù Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ tɛ de in o wíì kɔ-wa, pi̧ nɛ̀ búù tɛ wa, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa tɛ zii yuwar kifa nú ko ko-wan ha̧ wannu.

[19] Kà wannu nɛ́ kpɛka, wa'a há̧ nú ha̧‘i yɔr ŋma geŋga nɛ̀ beka kpai ɓɔna, é zaŋ o heembea ko o be-Mɛdɛ in o be-Pɛrsɛ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Ká Astin pii ɗoŋ tɛ wannu mɛ duk ko-wan ɓɔna.› Ɓɛɛ wannu a̧ bá nɛ́ ŋma mbe ko-wan nɛ̀ dee gan Astin, é oi-aa.
[20] Nyɛrɛ geŋga ko wannu a̧ pɛ́sí dam zu o zikanù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o okóò lɛŋ mɛ tu̧u̧ tɛ wíì kɔ‘i, dika tɛ o gasa-a̧ hɔ tɛ geɗɛk-a.»
[21] Wen'i dea tɛ wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak ɗoŋ taamɔ ko Mukaios'i.
[22] Wannu yɔra kalata tom dam nù kɔ‘i lɛŋ, si zikanù kpɔk kpɔk nɛnɛ, nɛ̀ mgbak nú kɔ-wa, wen ha̧ o wan-kóò lɛŋ mɛ ɔ wan zù kira kɔ‘i.
[1] Ɗoŋ-aa'i, nyimsea ko wannu ga̧a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ta mɔ si tɛ Astin ɓɔna. Tɛ-a duk nɛ́ ɗoŋ kifanú kɔ̧-a̧ in kita nɛ̀‘i gɔna zú a̧ ɓɛɛ.
[2] O gasa wibaketa nɛ̀ ya ka tɛ wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Ɛ̀ɛ̀ kíí nɛ́ o gba de be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ tɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na ha̧ wannu.

[3] Wannu a̧ hók o gasawi dam ɗoŋ o zikanù kɔ‘i lɛŋ mɛ́ kìì o be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ tɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, in nɛ̀ yora zɔŋa nyɛmna mɛ mɔi̧ wa si fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu, kɔ̧ kira-wan, sɛn Suzɛ mɛ. Wi é wa er kpàná-pɛm o kóò ko wannu, ɓɛɛ wi ha̧ o gba de nɔ̧-sɔ̧-tɛ in o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ ha̧ wa.
[4] Hegɔ, be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ see-wannu tɛ ba tɛ duk ko-wan oi Astin.» Mɔ‘i fee see-wannu, ɓɛɛ a̧ de hegɔ.
[5] Ŋma be Juif a̧a̧ so saaye Suzɛ, nin-a nɛ́ Mardochee. A̧ duka so nɛ́ bɛm ko Yair, be-koo Simei, bezaŋ Kis, zuduk ko Benjamin.
[6] A̧ duka so nɛ́ ŋma bara-biro. A̧ tɛa nɛ̀ Jerusalɛm, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ kaia so nɛ̀ o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaknɛ nɛ̀ bara.

[7] Mardochee duka so dai ŋma be-okóò, bem ko Aminadab, nya dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Nin bokobem'i nɛ́ Ɛstɛr. A̧ yora so zɔŋa batɛ, saŋa-yí-a̧ mbɛt dee so nyɛmna. Mardochee baa so a̧ mɛ dai dika ɗoŋ fio ko o dáà in nàà kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ, wen báá a̧ nɛ̀ kóò.
[8] Hegɔ, ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa zia heembea ko wannu, wa mɔi̧a̧ o gba gii zɔŋa si saaye Suzɛ, e er Gai. Wa mgbɔa Ɛstɛr e er Gai wi-pɛm o kóò ko wannu mbɛt.

[9] Bokobem'i dee tɛ-a̧ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ yí-a̧ lɛŋ ɓɔn tɛ a̧. Beebee mɔ‘i, Gai pɛa o mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ in o de nyɔŋmɔ nɛ nyɛma a̧ ha̧ a̧. A̧ hoka o bokobetua mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo mgbara o kodetom kɔ̧ kira-wan mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧. A̧ ɗafa mɔ ha̧ a̧ in o bokobetua kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dé-à sɛn fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu.
[10] Ɛstɛr tɔ̧́ so duk kɔ‘i kà bó nɛ̀ tugun-wi ha̧ ŋma bii na, wen Mardochee mgbee so nú-a sɛnɛ.
[11] Wese lɛŋ, Mardochee duka so yár nɛ̀ beegara, fara-yaa ko okóò mɛ zɔk mɔ zú Ɛstɛr.

[12] Kà ŋma be-zɔŋa de pɛ kpɔk kɔ̧ kira-wan kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nyɛma ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ nɛ̀ si ka tɛ wannu. O zɛ ɗafa mɔ yak hee mɔ'ɔ ga: fiozɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk a̧ a̧a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔ̧-nyama, ɓɛɛ oi fiozɛ mɔɔrɔ-doŋ-kpɔk a̧ sɔ̧ nɛ́ o gba de pɛr-nɔ in o nɔ̧-yɔk-tɛ ko o okóò.
[13] Hegɔ seka a̧ nɛa si ka tɛ wannu. Wi nɛ wannu tom nɛnɛ‘i tɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ be-zɔŋa'i mɛ́ nɛ̀ in a̧, nɛ̀ fara-yaa ko okóò si kɔ̧ tua-ɔɔ ko wannu.
[14] Mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ a̧ nɛa, ɓɛɛ mɛ tutuyɛɛ a̧ pia ɗoŋ nɛ́ si tɛ ɓii fara-yaa ko o okóò, wan nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Gai, kpàná-pɛm o okóò ko wannu. Ɓɛɛ, kà wannu tom sa a̧ na, a̧ nyɛm mɛ si ɗɔŋ ka tɛ-a ɓɔna.
[15] Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ zɛ ko Ɛstɛr, bem ko Aminadab, be-nɔkɔ ko Mardochee hɔa ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ nɛ̀ si ka tɛ wannu kaɗi, a̧ bɛ̧ ŋma be-wen nú Gai kpàná-pɛm o okóò na. Hegɔ Ɛstɛr baa see o wi nɛ zɔka a̧ lɛŋ.
[16] Ɛstɛr nɛa si ka tɛ wannu Artazɛrzɛs tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fiozɛ nɛ̀‘i sa'e «Adar», tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ wan kɔ̧-a̧.
[17] See-wannu baa Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ a̧ gan oi o dɔka be-zɔŋa lɛŋ. Hegɔ, a̧ baa mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan gu zu Ɛstɛr.
[18] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu dea gasa dina zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ha̧ o sɛm kɔ‘i in o gasawi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ de gbaŋa baa-ŋmaa kɔ̧-a̧ in Ɛstɛr. A̧ zira sede-garama ha̧ o widetom zù nú-wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
[19] Tɛ ŋgimbi'i Mardochee de so nɛ́ tom kɔ̧ kira ko wannu.

[20] Ɛstɛr tɔ̧ so tugun-wi ha̧ ŋma bii na, wen Mardochee mgbee so nú-a zú mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mbaŋ tɛ-a wen yuu-kíí Sɔ̧, in dea o mɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ̧-a̧, hee ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ in a̧ nɛti ga. Ɛstɛr kpai duka-a kɔ‘i na.
[21] O kpàná yiitoo nɛ̀ yaa so zù o wi-pɛm wannu'i zia nyɛrɛ gásì nɛ̀ Mardochee kpaa; see-wa tu̧a, ɓɛɛ wa kíí so nɛ́ yuwar mɛ gbɛ wannu Artazɛrzɛs.
[22] Mɔ kpɔk, Mardochee kɔɓa ee-zu-wen kɔ-wa. A̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ gbá ɗoŋ ɗaŋ keta'i ha̧ wannu.

[23] Wannu dikiɗa o kpàná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i; a̧ zia kpasawen, ɓɛɛ a̧ kai wa ga̧i̧ gbɛ. Hegɔ, a̧ há̧á̧ nú ha'i mɛ yɔr o mɔɔ nɔ‘i é zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu, wen zɔna Mardochee, in kà tɛ-wi mbáŋ ɗoŋ o de tom kɔ̧-a̧.
[1] Ɗoŋ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wannu Artazɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ gasa yí-tom ha̧ Haman Bugaios, bem ko Hamadata. A̧ ha̧a̧ mbe gásì ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ba a̧ e ti ha̧ o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
[2] O wi-ya-nú-garo ko wannu lɛŋ gu so nɛ́ nù ti Haman, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú ko wannu, ɓɛɛ Mardochee gu so kɔ‘i nù ti Haman na.
[3] O oi wi-ya-nú-garo ko wannu aka Mardochee: «Mɛ́ bɛ̧́ bɔɔ ha̧a̧nú ko wannu wen ge?»
[4] Wese lɛŋ, wa tɔ̧ so nɛ́ kpɔk wen'i ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii nú-wa na. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa wea ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ Haman'e Mardochee bɛ̧ɛ̧ ha̧a̧nú ko wannu. Mardochee tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e wi nɛ be-Juif.
[5] Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Haman zɔka'e Mardochee gu nù ti wi na, see-aa tu̧a nyɛmna,
[6] ɓɛɛ a̧ kan mɔ mɛ kum o Juif lɛŋ yinɛ zu nú-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs.

[7] A̧ ea wen zù gbɛa o Juif’ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ tani mɛ hók nɛ̀ ŋgimbi nɛ̀‘i tɛ kum nɛ̀ dukbíí ko Mardochee lɛŋ war kpɔk'i. Tani baa zu ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ ko fiozɛ «Adar».

[8] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Haman tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wannu Artazɛrzɛs: «Ŋma dukbii a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ̀ pɛsa dam mgbara o bíí nù k’ɛ́nɛ́. O heembea kɔ-wa hɔ ŋmaa in ko dɔka dukbíí na; wa kasi o heembea ko wannu na mbɛt. Ŋma gba̧a̧-a̧ nɛ̀ wannu tɛ e nɛ̀ wa mgbitiŋ bó na.
[9] Kà wannu nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nú ha'i kum wa yinɛ. Nɛ̀ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ mɔi̧ o kɔya-sede tɛ kilo booro gɔmŋmaa taar a kɔ̧ kuɓa mbɔi-de-tom-nù.»
[10] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu kpɔi̧a wele kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ba ha̧ Haman wen ea tumbal zu o kalata n'aa tɛ yɔr zu o be-Juif.
[11] Wannu tɔ̧a̧ ha Haman: «Ká mɛ ɗaŋ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ na. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ in dukbíí‘i.»

[12] Tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko kuti fiozɛ, wa saa o wi-yɔr-kalata ko wannu tɛnɛ. Ɓɛɛ wa yɔr mɔ nɛ̀ nin wannu Artazɛrzɛs, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko Haman, ha̧ o wi-ya-zu-wibiro, in o gasawi zù zikanù kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ, dika Indɛ hɔ Etiopii, sitɛ o zikanù gɔmŋmaaa nɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo zua mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo lɛŋ, in ha̧ o wi-ya-zú-dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ. A̧ yɔra mɔ‘i ha̧ ò ndé lɛŋ nɛ̀ mgbak nú kɔ‘i.
[13] Ɓɛɛ wa tom o betom nɛ̀ o kalata nɔ‘i dam nú-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs lɛŋ wen kuma pɛ́r o Juif lɛŋ kpɔk wese tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko fiozɛ nɛ̀‘i sa'e «Adar», in wen kaia o mbɔi kɔ-wa mbɛt.

[1b] Gba̧a̧ kalata ko wannu'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Nɛ́ mi gasa wannu Artazɛrzɛs a̧ yɔr mɔ hɛɛ̧ ha̧ o wi nɛ ɔ wan zù o zikanù gɔmŋmaa nɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo zua mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo in ha̧ o gasawi mɛ ɗɔɔ wa, dika Indɛ hɔ sɛn Etiopii mɛ.

[2b] «Kóó zú wan n'am ɔ zú gba dɔka tugunbíí, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ nù lɛŋ zíí nɛ‘m mbɛt'i, mi kɔ̧ so ha̧ o mɔ-wan mɛ zik zù‘m na. Mi ha̧a̧ tɛ‘m lɛŋ mɛ ɔ wan zaŋ mɔ̧ka-see in dee demɔ. Hegɔ, mi kia so ha̧ o bíí kɔ‘m mɛ ya ŋgimbi lɛŋ, ku̧i̧ ŋma be mɔ na; ha̧ nù kɔ‘m mɛ duk nɛ́ nù ko o wi-iŋ-mɔ, nɛ̀ o bii nyɛma mɛ yar zu-a hɔ nduti-a lɛŋ nɛ̀ kpee-see, in mɛ zir ga̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ wɔ-a gbɛ bíí lɛŋ'ɛ e zú nù kɔ‘m.

[3b] «Hegɔ mi aka o wibaketa kɔ‘m wen yuwar n'am tɛ de nɛnɛ ha̧ o mɔɔ nɔ‘i mɛ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧. Ŋma kpɔk mgbara wa, Haman, nɛ gana ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ, nɛ̀ ha̧ tɛ lɛŋ ha̧ tom kɔ‘i, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ wi-mbozu, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀‘i ea nɛ yiitoo gasawi zu wan'i,

[4b] tɔ̧a̧ h’ɛɛ‘e ŋma dukbíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɗaŋ taamɔ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ, nɛ̀ pɛsa dam mgbara zudukbíí zu nù'ɛ lɛŋ. O heembea kɔ-wa ye ŋmaa in ko o dɔka dukbíí na. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ́ o bíí nɛ̀ bɛ̧́ nɛ́ o heembea ko wannu ŋgimbi lɛŋ. Wa kɔ̧ ha̧ tom-wan n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ dé nɛ̀ yuwar-a wen mɔi̧a̧ zu mɔ lɛŋ mɛ́ hɔ gba̧a̧ na.

[5b] Ɛ́ɛ́ kɔɓa'e dukbíí‘i, nɛ̀ duk ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓɛ̀ɛ́‘i, bá nɛ́ zu duk nɛ̀ dɔka bíí. Wa a̧ra kɔ-wa duk nɛtɛ tɛ ndaka ɗɔŋ o heembea nɛ̀ o dɔka bíí iŋ na. Heembea kɔ‘m lɛŋ nyɛm yi-wa na. Wa de nɛ́ zɔm ɗaŋmɔ zu nù mbɛt, wen ká nù kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ duk zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.

[6b] Hegɔ mbɛt, mi ha̧a̧ nú ha̧‘i mɛ kum o wi nɛ̀ Haman nɛ̀ dúk nɛ́ ɓìì bíí zu nú-wan in yiitoo dáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, tɛ yɔr mɔ zu-a h’ɛnɛ‘i. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gɔ́m wa lɛŋ gbɛ nɛ̀ gbapaa ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa; wa lɛŋ, gu nɛ̀ o kóò in o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ ‹Adar› mɛ́ pɛ̀ hɛ̧ɛ̧. Ká‘i yɔ́k yí-wi, kà bó nɛ̀ dee kó ha̧ wa na.
[7b] Hegɔ, zira-a ko dukbíí nɛ̀ dea so ŋgazu mɛ mboyɛ'ɛ in sɔsɔɔ‘i nɛ ŋgaŋa si kɔ̧ fio nɛ̀ kale kpɔk wese, tɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya mgbitiŋ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
[14] O kalata nɔ‘i nɛa dam ɗoŋ o zikanu lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ nú ha̧ bíí lɛŋ mɛ ya gɛɗɛ-gɛɗɛ pɛ́m nɛ̀ zɛ́‘i.
[15] Nyɛrɛmɔ‘i yaka nɛ haya-a, kóó sɛn saaye Suzɛ mbɛt. Hegɔ, o wi saaye Suzɛ sakala bɔrɔŋ, ká wannu Artazɛrzɛs in Haman gbɛ so kɔ‘i nɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in ŋmaa.

[1] Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ o nyɛrɛ nɔ‘i aa zer Mardochee, a̧ a̧ka o laa tɛ-a̧ yinɛ, pi̧ nɛ̀ o laa-bufu, ɗu bùk a zu, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔm ye saaye hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ hee-gɛr nɛ̀ beegara nɛnɛ‘e: «Wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kum o wi nɛ ŋma ɗaŋmɔ bó zù na!»
[2] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa hɔa nú-garo ko wannu, ɓɛɛ yor ɓɔn zan, wen a̧ nyɛm so mɛ ye kɔ̧ kira nɛ̀ oi laa-bufu in bùk zu-a̧ na.
[3] Dam ɗoŋ o zikanù nɛ̀ o kalata nɔ‘i hɔa sɛnɛ lɛŋ, o be-Juif ai nɛ́ nú a nɛ̀ er gɛr, zim nɛ̀ mɔ. Wa lɛŋ wa pi̧a̧ nɛ́ o laa-zim-mɔ, ɔ nɛnɛ nɛ̀ zú bùk.
[4] O bokobetua in o kpaná ko ko-wan baa wen'i nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ gba kíì ba ko-wan. A̧ toma o laa nɛnɛ ha̧ Mardochee mɛ a tɛ, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ fo o bufu tɛ-a yinɛ. Ɓɛɛ Mardochee bɛ̧à.
[5] Hegɔ Ɛstɛr saa Akrataios, kpaná nɛ̀ duk ka tɛ-a̧ wen o be tom kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tóm a̧ si tɛ Mardochee mɛ ak mgbak mɔ nɛ̀ yak.
[7] Ɓɛɛ Mardochee ɓa o mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧, in nú nɛ̀ Haman ha̧a̧ ha̧ wannu mɛ gbai kɔya-sede booro gɔmŋmaa taar á kɔ̧ kuɓa mbɔi-de-tom-wan wen kuma o Juif.

[8] A̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma kalata heembea nɛ̀ wa toma dam saaye Suzɛ wen kuma o be-Juif ha Akrataios, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi ha̧ Ɛstɛr. A̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧ mbɛt'e: wi kɔ̧a̧ Ɛstɛr a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ kpá wannu. A̧‘a̧ kɔ́fí a̧, ha̧ a̧ mɛ de kó ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧. «Tɛ̀-mɛ́ à̧ mbáŋ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ duka so nɛnɛ tɛ san, ɓɛɛ ká‘m duk dai nɛ̀ mɛ. Wen Haman, yiitoo gasawi zu nu-wan’ɛ, ɗɔa yɛ́ ha̧ wannu mɛ kum yɛ́. Mɛ̀ kɔ́fí Gasa Wan Sɔ̧. Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen in wannu wen zù yɛ́. Ɓɛɛ mɛ̀ gbó yɛ́ yí fio na ndè?»
[9] Akrataios nɛ̀ɛ̀ we ɗoŋ o wen nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ Ɛstɛr.
[10] Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr e tom’ɛ nú Akrataios ha̧ Mardochee:

[11] «O bii nú-wan’ɛ lɛŋ iŋa nɛ̀ déà‘e kóó ò ndé, wiwii hee okóò ga, nɛ̀ tɛ ye nɛ́ɛ̀ kpá wannu sɛn bɛr-kira-wan mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ wannu a saa a̧ na, nyɛm mɛ gbo nɛ̀ kpasa na. Kànà nɛ̀ wi nɛ̀ wannu nyɛi̧ dɔra-lɔr kɔ‘i si tɛ-a a̧ nyɛma mɛ kpasi kɔ‘i ɓɛɛ. Ɓɛɛ war kɔ‘m, dee fiozɛ kpɔk kinii nɛ̀ wannu sa'm si ka tɛ na.»
[12] Akrataios nɛ̀ɛ we ɗoŋ o wen ko Ɛstɛr lɛŋ ha̧ Mardochee.
[13] Ɓɛɛ Mardochee kifi ha̧ Akrataios: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧́ wen’ɛ ha̧ Ɛstɛr'i nɛ sa̧a̧-a̧. Ká mɛ́ tá‘e, kɔ-mɛ, mɛ nyɛma mɛ kpasi ɛ̀nɛ̀-mɛ́ mgbara o Juif nú-wan’ɛ wen nɛ̀ mɛ a̧a̧ kɔ̧ kira-wan na.

[14] Wen, kà mɛ̀ mgbé zer-mɛ tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ yak kinii, mɛ̀ iŋ́‘e mɔ nɛ̀ tɛ gbak o be-Juif in nɛ̀ tɛ kpasi wa tɛ tɛ nɛ̀ ŋma fara; ɓɛɛ mɛ́ in o wi nútua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum lɛŋ. Kóó nɛ́ wen pɛrti ŋgimbi’ɛ a mɛ kifa nɛ̀ ko-wan ndè, ò‘ó iŋa o?»
[15] Ɛstɛr foo wi nɛ̀ wa toma so pii tɛ-a'i si nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, ɓɛɛ e tom’ɛ nú-a ha̧ Mardochee:

[16] «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔ́i̧ o be-Juif nɛ̀ a̧a̧ saaye Suzɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím yì wen am. K’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ na, nɔ́ yì na, zɛ nɛ wese, hegɔɔ tɛ zɛ taar. Mi in o bokobetua kɔ‘m ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ zim yì mbɛt. Hegɔ, kóó zù heembea'i, mi tɛ nɛ̀ kànà nɛ́ɛ̀ kpa wannu, kà a nɛ́ boo nɛ́ fio, ha̧‘m fe ɓɛɛ.»
[17] Mardochee yaka, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ de o mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr aka'i lɛŋ.
[1c] Mardochee kɔfa Gasa Wan, mbaŋ nɛ̀ tɛ-a̧ zu o tom nɛ̀ Gasa Wan dea,
[2c] ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧: «Gasa Wan, Gasa Wan, Wan nɛ̀ a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ! Mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nyɛm mɛ si kafɛ nú‘nɛ́, k’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧́ɔ̧ mɛ kpasi Israɛl, na.
[3c] Wen, nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ a dee yiwese in nù, in o gasa mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi nɛ ya zu nù lɛŋ.
[4c] Hegɔ, ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Wan zú mɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ŋma bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ba be zù nɛ̀ ŋgɔn ti'nɛ́ bó na, Gasa Wan.
[5c] K’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa mɔ lɛŋ, Gasa Wan, ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa nɛ̀ déà‘e bó nɛ́ ea ŋmaa tɛ geemɔ, kóó ŋmaŋa-tɛ, kóó ŋma gasa-zu, a dea ha̧‘m mɛ bɛ̧ guu nù ti Haman wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ na.
[6c] Wen mi nyɛma so mɛ ndal dukui naŋ-a nɛ̀ déà, kà bó nɛ́ wen kpasa Israɛl.
[7c] Ɓɛɛ mi dea mɔ‘i ká‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ gasi ŋma bíí zaŋnu gan Sɔ̧. Ŋma bíí n'am tɛ gu nù ti a̧ yak zu'nɛ́ bó na, kànà nɛ́ ti'nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, Gasa Wan kɔ‘m. Nɛ̀ bó nɛ́‘e mi ŋmaŋ nɛ́ tɛ‘m na.

[8c] «Ɓɛɛ kinii, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧, Wannu, Sɔ̧ ko Abraham, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen wa e nɛ́ yí tɛ yɛ́ mɛ kum yɛ́ yinɛ. See-wa gbɛŋ zɛk-zɛk mɛ kum dukbíí nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ mɛ‘i̧.
[9c] K’ɛ́nɛ́ é dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀‘nɛ́ ɓara yí bara nɛ̀ Egyptɛ'ɛ wɔkɔrɔ na.

[10c] Ɛnɛ yéŋ zer'nɛ́ pii tɛ kɔfasɔ̧ kɔ‘m. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ zɔ́k dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpái ɗaŋsee k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ desee. Hegɔ k’ɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɔ́n kpasa, k’ɛ́ɛ́ bia nɛ̀ o de gima zɔn nɛ̀ nin'nɛ, Gasa Wan. Ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ o wi-zɔn'nɛ́ mɛ kum na.»
[11c] O be-Israɛl lɛŋ saa sara si tɛ Gasa Wan nɛ̀ hee gɛr, wen wa zɔka'e fio duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ in wa.
[12c] Kíí fio sakala taamɔ ko ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ a̧ yu mɔ si ka tɛ Gasa Wan.

[13c] A̧ kpɔ̧i̧a o de laa-wan kɔ̧-a̧ a nù, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ nɛ́ o laa-ditasee in laa-zim-fio. Oi o de pɛ̀r nɔ̧-nyama a̧ ɗuu nɛ́ bùk in fuunu a tɛ-a̧. A̧ ɗɔsa tɛ-a̧ yak kere, ɓɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɗafi tɛ-a̧ bó na, a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kai nɛ́ o gaza-gózó muizu a sɛnɛ.
[14c] A̧ aia nú si tɛ Gasa Wan, Sɔ̧ ko o be Israɛl, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Gasa Wan kɔ‘m, Wannu k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am n'am duk ɛ̀n'ám, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ŋma wi-gbaka'm yak zu'nɛ́ bó na,
[15c] wen mi pi̧i̧ tɛ‘m yí-fio.

[16c] Kɔ‘m, Gasa Wan, nɛ́ dika kóá‘m a'm zia nɛnɛ nú o nàm ko o dáà kɔ‘m'e nde: ɛ́nɛ́ hoka Israɛl mgbara o oi dɔka dukbíí, in o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ mgbara o oi zuduk kɔ-wa ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpoo nɛ̀ kpoo. Ɛ́nɛ́ dea mɔ in wa nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen k’ɛ́nɛ́.
[17c] Zɔ́k kinii, ɛ́ɛ́ dea ɗaŋmɔ in'nɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ siŋ yɛ́ a kɔ̧ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́,
[18c] wen n’ɛɛ́ gasa o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa. Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ widemɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a, Gasa Wan.
[19c] Zu-a'i mbɛt, bɔnɛ bara n’ɛɛ́ zɔk'i nyɛm tɛ-wa na. Wa hɛra nú in o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa
[20c] mɛ de ha̧ ha̧a̧nú k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de geemɔ, mɛ bi zu mɔɔ-oi'nɛ́, mɛ kpe nú o wi nɛ̀ gasi'nɛ́, mɛ bi nin Tua k’ɛ́nɛ́ in fara-ɗafi'nɛ́,
[21c] mɛ hu̧i̧ nú o gɔni-duk wen gasa o geé tumui̧-mɔ, in wen zɔna ŋma wannu nɛ̀ tɛ fe fee.

[22c] «Gasa Wan, k’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ o géé kokoɗo-bíí mɛ ba dɔra-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́ na. Ká wa kpa yuwar zɛkɛɗa tika-a k’ɛ́ɛ́ na. Ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ wa ɗafa wen ɛ́ɛ́‘i si nɛ̀ ɗoŋ zu wa. Nɛ̀ ko wi-dak-biro'i pi̧ zu yɛ́‘i, ɛ̀nɛ̀ fó nɛ́ gasa bɔnɛ pi̧ zu a.
[23c] «Tɛ‘nɛ́ a mbáŋ ɗoŋ yɛ́, Gasa Wan. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí yí‘nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ŋgimbi bɔnɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧. Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, ɛ̀nɛ̀ há̧ nɔɔ-ŋgiɗi ha̧‘m, Wan nɛ̀ gana o geesɔ̧ lɛŋ, wi nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu o wannu.
[24c] Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é de nyɔɔ̧-wen kɔ̧ nú‘m ŋgimbi n’ am tɛ hɔ ti Artazɛrzɛs ŋga dila'i; ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpáí see-aa mɛ sɛn wi nɛ̀ nasi yɛ́, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ gbɛ wi’ɛi gu nɛ̀ o gbamawi-e-zu-mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
[25c] Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár yɛ́ yinɛ er-wa. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák am, mi n'am duk ɛ̀n'ám, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ e ta nɛ̀ ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ'ɛ, Gasa Wan. Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa mɔ lɛŋ.
[26c] Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa'e mi sɛna gásì nɛ̀ tɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ́ na; gado ko o gɔni-duk in o gɛnɛ de nɛ́ nyɛ̧r tɛ‘m mbɛt.
[27c] Ɛ́nɛ́ iŋa bɔnɛ n'am duk sɛnɛ: mɔɔ-gu-zu ko wan n'am gu gɛ-gɛ-gɛ wese gboa-a si mgbara bíí‘i de nɛ́ nyɛ̧r tɛ‘m nɛ̀ tɛ‘m, hee tui-zɔk-zɛ ga, ɓɛɛ mi gu a̧ géé ŋgimbi na ndo-ndo-ndo.
[28c] Mi kodetom k’ɛ́nɛ́, mi nyɔŋ mɔ zu taŋe ko Haman na. Mí nɛ́ gbaŋa ko wannu kà‘m nɔ nɛ̀ dɔ̧ɔ̧-ɗafi o geesɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ na.
[29c] Dika nɛ̀ duka-a ko kodetom k’ɛ́nɛ́ kpaia nɛnɛ hɔ kinii, desee kɔ‘m nɛ́ ka tɛ‘nɛ́ ɓɛɛ, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko Abraham.
[30c] Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu bíí lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí tigɛr o wi nɛ̀ bó nɛ̀ mɔɔ-e-ne-ta na. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár yɛ́ yinɛ er ɗaŋwi, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá kíì sɛn tɛ‘m pi̧ taŋ.»
[1d] Zɛ taar ɗoŋ mɔ‘i, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr kaɗa kɔfa Sɔ̧ kaɗi, a̧ kpɔ̧i̧a o laa-zimmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ a o laa-wan tɛ a̧.
[2d] Ɗoŋ n'aa ɗafa tɛ-a̧ kaɗi, a̧ aia nú si tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zɔk mɔ zu bíí lɛŋ in nɛ̀ kpasi bíí lɛŋ woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgbɔ o bokobetua yiitoo yak nɛnɛ in a̧.
[3-4d] A̧ ɛka tɛ-a̧ nɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ kpɔk’ɛ hee gba̧a̧ tɛ-a̧ bo na ga, ɓɛɛ ɓi-áà tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗoŋ, kasi nɛ̀ ndàá laa kɔ̧-a̧.
[5d] A̧ dee so zɔŋa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ be foe de nɛ a̧. Saŋa-yí-a gɔn so nɛ́ mami ɔr nɛ̀ bíí; gasa kíì baa a̧ kééŋ.

[6d] Ɗoŋ n'aa ɓira nú o garo yak lɛŋ kaɗi, Ɛstɛr hɔa ti wannu. A̧ duk nɛ́ nù zu kiti-wan wan kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ oi o ndilɛɛ laa-wan nɛ̀‘i gɔna dap-aa nɛ̀ lɔr in o ta nɛ̀ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaia. Zɔka a̧ ɓɛɛ bele zara wi.
[7d] A̧ baa zu-a nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mgbɛkɛkɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔk mɔ kpóróró. Tɛ ko-wan mɔka gbɛlɛsuɛɛ. Ŋgai kaɗa tɛ-a, saŋa-yi-a kpaia, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔk zu-a e zu koŋgo-ɓaa bokobetua nɛ̀ dúk ti ha̧ a̧‘i.

[8d] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kpaia see-wannu ha̧ a̧ mɛ mɔk tɛ-a̧. Ɗɛɗɛ-a̧ gɔna, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndɔr nɛ̀ zu kiti-wan kɔ̧-a̧ tik nù, hɛr Ɛstɛr rɔɔm e yí-see hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ tɛ-Ɛstɛr gbina nɛnɛ. A̧ tɔ̧a̧ o de nú-wen ga̧ nɛ̀ see-aa.
[9d] A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛstɛr, nɛ́ ge a yaka ge? Mi nɛ́ buinya-mɛ, mɛ̀ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi!
[10d] Mɛ beka fe na. Heembea k’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk nɛ́ o oi gee-bíí ‘ɛ̧.
[11d] Mɛ̀ ɗɔ́ŋ pii ti!»
[12d] Nɛ́ mɔɔ n'aa baa dɔra-lɔr kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgɔn, e zukuɓaa-Ɛstɛr, kɔŋgɔli gɛr-a, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ ba mɛ tɛnɛ ha̧‘m!»
[13d] A̧ kifa ha̧ a̧: «Wannu kɔ‘m, tɛ zɔka'nɛ́, mi taa kɔ‘m'e ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ ŋma betom ko Sɔ̧. Gásì k’ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ kíì tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ bele zar am pi̧ nù.
[14d] Wen ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɔ déè nyɛmna, gasa wannu; saŋa-yí‘nɛ́ duna nɛ̀ kó mbɛt!»
[15d] Nú-a̧ tɛ zɔm tɛ wen'i na, ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔk tik nù woyo mbɔɔfɔɔ.
[16d] Kíì dea wannu, ɓɛɛ o bíí nú-garo-wan lɛŋ ye tɛ zama Ɛstɛr.
[3] Ɓɛɛ wannu ak a̧: «Ɛstɛr, nɛ́ ge a mɛ kɔ̧a̧ ge? Mɛ́ tɛ́ mɛ ak nɛ́ ge? Kóó nɛ́ reeta nù kɔ‘m, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ.»
[4] Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ wese’ɛ sɔsɔɔ nɛ́ gasa wese nyɛmna wen am. Nya̧-a̧ a kɔ̧ so ga’ɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛa in Haman tɛ gbaŋa n'am ɗafa sɔsɔɔ‘i.»
[5] Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá Haman tɛnɛ nɛ̀ haya-a, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ nɛ̀ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr saa yɛ́ sɛnɛ‘i.» Wa kaia ŋmaa yiitoo lɛŋ nɛnɛ tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr saa wa wen-aa'i.
[6] Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔ kaɗi, wannu aka Ɛstɛr: «Ko-wan Ɛstɛr, mɛ kɔ̧a̧ nɛ́ ge? Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ ak lɛŋ, mɛ tɛ kpa.»
[7] A̧ kifa nú: «Mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpa ndé? Mɔ n'am kíí ndé?
[8] Kà wannu nɛ́ zɔka'm nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ n’ɛnɛ tɛ́ in Haman woyo sa̧a̧mɔ, tɛ mbe gbaŋa n'am tɛ ɗafi wen'nɛ́‘i. Ɓɛɛ mi tɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧‘i ha̧ wannu.»
[9] Wese'i Haman gboa kɔ̧ kira-wan nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ in nɛ̀ desee. Ɓɛɛ n'aa be zɔk Mardochee, be-Juif, nɛ̀ kur kóó nɛ̀ tɛ de nyìr ti a̧ sɛn beegara-wan na'i, see-aa tu̧a kurum.
[10] A̧ nɔɔ see-aa, ɓɛɛ a̧ si tɛ kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ saa o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ in koo kɔ̧-a̧ Zosara tɛnɛ.

[11] Haman ɓaa zɔm nyɛrɛ zu mbɔi kɔ‘i, o dɔka bem kɔ‘i, in gásì nɛ̀ wannu baa wi e zu-a'i ha̧ wa. A̧ ɓaa hee mɔ nɛ̀ wannu ea nɛ́ a̧ nɛ̀ yiitoo gasawi nú-wan ga, in hee mɔ n'aa ea nɛ̀ a̧ zu o tom-nù ga, ha̧ wa.
[12] Ɓɛɛ Haman tɔ̧ woyo: «Tɛ gbaŋa'i, nɛ́ mi in wannu a̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr saa ɓɛɛ. A̧ sa nɛ́‘m in wannu woyo sa̧a̧mɔ mbɛt.
[13] Mɔ kpɔk, ŋgimbi n'am zɔk Mardochee be-Juif'i fara duka-a nutua-wan, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ de tɛ‘m ɓɔna.»

[14] Ɓɛɛ Zosara kóò kɔ̧-a̧, in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «A'i gɔ́m ŋma kusa te, hee mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ ga ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ mɛ tutuyɛ mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ ha̧ wannu a'i gai̧ Madochéé nɛ̀ gɛr sɛnɛ. Hegɔ, mɛ nyɛma mɛ nɛ̀ gbaŋa ɗoŋ wannu nɛ̀ desee.» Wen'i dea tɛ Haman, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nú mɛ ɗafi te'i.
[1] Mɛ zaŋ zɛ‘i, Gasa Wan pi̧i̧ saŋa-seŋe yí wannu. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'a aka wiyɔrkalata kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ bá Kalata Nyɛrɛ-nù kɔ-a̧ tɛnɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔr ha̧‘i.
[2] A̧ kpaa fara nɛ̀ wa yɔra nyɛrɛ ko Mardochee sɛnɛ: héé mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee gbaa so nɛ́ ndàá o kpaná ko wannu yiitoo, nɛ̀ ee so zua mɛ gbɛ Artazɛrzɛs, ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa ɔɔ nɛ̀ va̧a̧ nutua kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
[3] Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Nɛ́ ge demɔ ge nɛ‘i dea in Mardochee, kóó nɛ́ ge gásì ge a'i ha̧a̧ ha̧ a̧ oi-aa ge?» O widetom ko wannu kifa ha̧ a̧:
«Ɛ́nɛ́ há̧ ŋma mɔ ha̧ a̧ na.»

[4] Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu ɓɔna so tɛ zia nyɛrɛ o dé tom nɛ̀ Mardochee dee so'i, ká Haman hɔa beegara-wan kaɗi. Wannu aka mɔ: «Nɛ́ o a̧a̧ beegara o?» Haman tɛa so mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu mɛ gai̧ Mardochee tɛ te n'aa ɗafa wen a̧‘i.
[5] O widetom ko wannu kifa ha̧ a̧: «Nɛ́ Haman a̧ yor beegara'i.» Wannu tɔ̧a̧: ««Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sá a̧ tɛnɛ.»
[6] Wannu aka Haman: «Nɛ́ ge a'm tɛ de ha̧ bíí n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn ge?» Haman taa mɔ‘e: «Ŋma bii nɛ̀ wannu tɛ zɔn nɛtɛ yak zu'm, nɛ́ o?»
[7] Ɓɛɛ a̧ kifi ha̧ wannu: «Ŋma bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧a̧ mɛ zɔn ndé?
[8] O widetom ko wannu a̧ bá ŋma de laa-wan nɛ̀ wannu pi̧i̧ tɛ kaɗi, in ŋma nyaŋa nɛ̀ wannu daŋa kaɗi.

[9] Wa'a a o mɔɔ nɔ‘i er ŋma gasa dita sɛm ko wannu; ɓɛɛ sɛm'i a̧ pi̧ laa'i tɛ wi nɛ̀ wannu hoka'i. A̧‘a̧ bá wi’ɛi mbɛt e zu nyaŋa, ɓɛɛ wi mgbɔ́ a̧ zu nyaŋa'i yar nɛ̀ gasa yuwar saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ ti a̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Nɛ́ hegɔ a'i tɛ́ de nɛnɛ in bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ zɔn!› »
[10] Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ Haman: «Wen kɔ-mɛ‘i nyɛma sɛnɛ. Mɛ̀ dé hego in Mardochee, be-Juif nɛ̀ de tom kɔ̧ kira-wan hɛ̧ɛ̧. Ká ŋma mɔ kpɔk tɛ wen nɛ̀ mɛ tɔ̧a̧‘i ɓɔn na!»

[11] Haman baa laa in nyaŋa. A̧ pi̧i̧ laa tɛ Mardochee, ɓɛɛ ba e zu nyaŋa. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa mgbɔa a̧ yar nɛ̀ gasa yuwar saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ ti a̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Nɛ́ hegɔ a'i tɛ de nɛnɛ in bíí nɛ̀ wannu kɔ̧a̧ mɛ zɔn!»
[12] Mardochee sia ɗoŋ si beegara-wan, ɓɛɛ Haman pii tɛ kɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee zum nɛ̀ zu ko foe.

[13] Haman ɓaa mɔ nɛ̀ kpaa wi'i ha̧ kóò kɔ‘i Zosara in ha̧ o sɛm kɔ‘i. O sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ in kóò kɔ̧-a̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Kà Mardochee nɛ́ boo nɛ́ bezaŋ Juif nɛ̀ mbetɛ, ɓɛɛ ku̧u̧naŋ tika-a kɔ-mɛ ti a̧ nɛ́ mɔ‘i. Takaɗi, mɛ tɛ tik kànà tik ti a̧ siti. Ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ de in a̧, kóó kpɔk, bo ɓɔna; wen ŋma Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kpasa a̧a̧ in a̧.»
[14] Wa ɓɔna so fara tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i, ɓɛɛ o kpàná hɔ, fo Haman nɛ̀ haya-a mɛ yak gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ɗafa.
[1] Wannu in Haman nɛɛ de gbaŋa tɛ ko ko-wan Ɛstɛr.

[2] Tɛ yiitoo zɛ‘i, ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔ kadi, wannu tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr: «Nɛ́ ge a̧ mɛ kɔ̧a̧ ge, ko-wan Ɛstɛr? Nɛ́ ge a mɛ kíí mɛ kpa ge? Akamɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ́ ge? Kóó a̧ boo nɛ́ reeta nù kɔ‘m, mi tɛ ha̧ ha̧ mɛ.»
[3] A̧ kifa nú: «Mɔ n'am kɔ̧a̧ in mɔ n'am ak, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ! Kà see-wannu nɛ́ baa'm, mi kɔ̧a̧ nɛ́ duka-kpasá kɔ‘m, in duka-kpasá ko dukbíí kɔ‘m: kɔfamɔ kɔ‘m a̧‘i!

[4] Wen wa ɗɔra so nɛ́ ɛ́ɛ́, mi in dukbíí kɔ‘m, ha̧ wa mɛ kum yɛ́ yinɛ, ha̧ wa mɛ kai o mɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ in mɛ de yɛ́ nɛ̀ bara, ɛɛ in o bem k’ɛ́ɛ́. Mi kpɛe so zer'am zu wen'i; wen nyɛm ha̧ pɛrti wi-ɓir-wen-ndela hegɔ mɛ duk beegara-wan na.»
[5] Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ o'o nyɔŋa nin de nɛ̀ pɛrti mɔ‘i o?»
[6] Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Nɛ́ ŋma wisɛn! Nɛ́ Haman, yaa-ɗaŋ'ɛ̧!» Tɛ-Haman ga̧a̧ ziŋ-ziŋ ti wannu in ko-wan.
[7] Wannu kura ka̧ nyɔŋmɔ mɛ yak si ɗɔɔ giɔ̧-te beegara-wan. Haman ɓɔna so kɔ‘i fara gɔma er ti ko-wan, wen a̧ zɔka'e wen tɛ-a ɗaŋa kaɗi.

[8] Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu pia ɗoŋ nɛ̀ ti giɔ̧, a̧ zɔka Haman nɛ̀ hɔ̧fa tik gɔn gado nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr duk sɛnɛ, gɔm nɛ er ha̧ a̧. Wannu nɛ́ ŋma nú tɛ hiɗimɔ: «Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ɔ in kóò kɔ‘m mgbak kɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m?» Haman zia wen'i ɓɛɛ wɛr yí si mgbɔɔr nɛ̀ foe.

[9] Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Bugatan, ŋma kpàná ko wannu tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧: «Wannu, Haman ɗafa so te mɛ gai̧ Mardochee, wi nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so de wen-kpasi'nɛ́'ɛ; te'i duk kɔ̧ kira ko Haman, kusa-a nɛ́ mɛtrɛ ɓu-yiitoo zua mɔɔrɔ.» Wannu tɔ̧a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ bá Haman gaí̧ tɛ te'i!»
[10] Wa gai̧a Haman tɛ te n'aa ɗafa so wen Mardochee'i, ɓɛɛ see-wannu ga̧.
[1] Kale kpók wese'i, wannu Artazɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ o kpaamɔ ko Haman wi-ɓir-wen-ndela ha̧ Ɛstɛr. Wannu toma sa Mardochee mbɛt, wen Ɛstɛr tɔ̧a̧ so ha̧ wannu'e Mardochee nɛ́ nàm kɔ‘i.
[2] Wannu baa wele n'aa kpɔi̧a so yinɛ er Haman’ɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ha̧ Mardochee. Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ee kɔ‘i Mardochee zu o mɔɔ-oi-Haman lɛŋ.
[3] Ɛstɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ wannu woyo. A̧ hɔ̧fa tik nù ti wannu, ai nɛ̀ nú-a ha̧ a̧ mɛ dor ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ Haman taa so mɛ de in o Juif.
[4] Wannu nyɛia̧ dɔra-lɔr kɔ‘i ha̧ Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ a̧ yor ka tɛ wannu.
[5] A̧ tɔ̧a̧: ««Kà nɛ́ dee tɛ‘nɛ́, in kà see'nɛ́ nɛ́ baa'm, o kalata nɛ Haman yɔra so tom wen kuma o Juif zu nú-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́, wa'a é tɛ geemɔ.
[6] Wen nɛ́ hee ge a'm tɛ́ zɔk bɔɔ nɛ̀ bɔnɛ nɛ̀ duk dɔ̧́ɔ̧́ in dukbíí kɔ́‘m nɛ̀ de yi'm ge? Nɛ́ hee ge a'm tɛ́ zɔk nɛ̀ kuma-a ko tugun-am, ɓɛɛ mi ɓɔna kɔ‘m kpasa ge?»
[7] Wannu kifa ha̧ Ɛstɛr: «Mi baa Haman gai̧ tɛ te wen n'aa kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ kum o be Juif. Mi ha̧a̧ o kpaamɔ kɔ-a̧ lɛŋ ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ́ ha̧ desee ha̧ mɛ́; ɓɛɛ kinii, nɛ́ ge a mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ woyo ge?

[8] Ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ wen o be Juif nɛ̀ nin-am hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ ga. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ é dap-wele kɔ‘m sɛnɛ nɛ̀ tumbal. Wen mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀‘i yɔra nɛ̀ nin wannu, ɓɛɛ nɛ‘i ee nɛ́ tumbal kɔ-a̧ sɛnɛ kaɗi, wi nyɛm mɛ́ bi ɓɔna.»

[9] Wa saa o wi-yɔr-kalata tɛnɛ kpɔk pɛ‘i, tɛ ɓu-yiitoo zua taar ɔɔ-zɛ kuti fiozɛ nɛ̀‘i sa'e «Nisan». Wa yɔra mɔ ha̧ o Juif, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ kpɔk wen nɛ̀‘i toma so ha̧ o gasawi in o wi-ya-zu zikanu gɔmŋmaa nɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, dika Indɛ hɔ Etiopii, ha̧ kóó ò ndé lɛŋ nɛ̀ mgbak nú kɔ‘i.
[10] Wa yɔra kalata'i nɛ̀ nin wannu, é dap-wele kɔ-a̧ nɛ̀ tumbal sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tom yaknɛ nɛ̀ o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa ko wannu.

[11] Kalata'i ha̧a̧ nɛ́ yuwar ha̧ o Juif mɛ́ yor ɗoŋ o mgbak heembea kɔ-wa sɛn ye nɛtɛ nɛtɛ leŋ, kóó mɛ́ yè ɗoŋ o ŋmaa, kóó mɛ́ de mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ wa kɔ̧a̧ in o wisɛn kɔ-wa, ka ba nɛ̀ o wi nɛ̀ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ́ ba zu dúk nɛ̀ wa.
[12] Heembea'i nɛ́ wen zɛ kpɔk nɛ̀‘i gɔna dam nú-wan ko Artazɛrzɛs lɛŋ, nɛ́ wen ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fiozɛ nɛ̀‘i sa'e «Adar».
[1e] Gba̧a̧ wen kalata'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Gasa wannu Artazɛrzɛs tom ha̧ o gasa wi-ya-zu o zikanu gómŋmaa nɛ̀ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, dika Indɛ hɔ Etiopii, fan nɛ̀ o bíí nɛ̀ a̧a̧ ɗoŋ-aa lɛŋ.
[2e] O bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a ŋmaŋ nɛ́ tɛ nyɛmna wen zɔm ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ̀ o wi-de-demɔ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa yak zale, zɔn nɛ̀ wa.
[3e] Dea ɗaŋmɔ in o bíí k’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɛm wa na; ɓɛɛ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ̀ wa kpa lɛŋ sur yí-wa na ga, wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ é nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ o widedemɔ in wa'i woyo.

[4e] Wa iŋ zɔna bíí na; gan woyo, mɔɔ-mgbele ŋmaŋa-tɛ ko o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ mgbara dee demɔ na ɔra wa. Wa ta kɔ-wa'e wi tá gbo ɗɔɔ kita ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ ɗaŋmɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ kɛ̧́ mgbara mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
[5e] Dɔ̧ɔ̧-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt, o bíí nɛ̀ dɔka-a nɛ̀‘i e zu tom, a mɔɔ-dee kɔ-wa lɛŋ er o sɛm-ɔr-wi nɛ̀ wa e nɛ tɛ-wa; hegó wa yea tɛ o ŋgaŋamɔ nɛ̀‘i nyɛm mɛ gbo wa yí-a na, hɔ tɛ gbɛɛ-zu gee mbɛt.
[6e] O sɛm nɔ‘i mbɛt tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ́ ɗaŋ yɔka-wen, ɔr nɛ̀ o wannu nɛ̀ yaa so kɔ‘i nɛ́ kpasa bíí-de-mɔ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
[7e] Ɓɛɛ, kà wi kíí hɔ tɛ o gba̧‘a̧ nyɛrɛmɔ na, ɛ̀ɛ̀ mbáɗí nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ̀ yak ka tɛ-yɛ́ kinii, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ zɔk o ɗaŋmɔ nɛ̀ o gɔɔ-wi nɛ̀ nyɛm yí o tom-wan na de.
[8e] Ɗoŋ-aa, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-yɛ́ lɛŋ ha̧ nù k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ duk mgbitiŋ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ wen bíí lɛŋ.
[9e] Hegɔ, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ kpai o ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ nyɛm sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara o wen nɛ̀ tɛ hɔ ti yɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
[10e] Wen nɛ́ hegɔ ɛ́ɛ́ kasa so nɛ̀ Haman, bem ko Hamadata nɛ̀ de-a. A̧ nɛ́ be-Masedoan, nɛ̀ tɔktɛ-yɛ́ be-Pɛrsɛ bo tɛ-a na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ iŋ dee demɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
[11e] Ɛ́ɛ́ usa kale kpɔk sɛm n’ɛ̀ɛ̀ de nɛ̀ see kpɔk in zudukbíí lɛŋ‘i ha̧ a̧, ha̧ ɛ́ɛ́ sa a̧‘e ‹Dáà›. A̧ kifa yiitoo gasawi nu-wan’ɛ, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ gu so nɛ́ nù ti a̧.
[12e] Mɔ kpɔk, wɔ-gásì kaɗi tɛ-a na; a̧ kia yuwar lɛŋ mɛ ba wan er-yɛ́ yinɛ in mɛ kum yɛ́.
[13e] Hegɔ, a̧ koo tɛ-a̧ ɔr nɛ̀ ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ gbɛ Mardochee, wi-kpasi-yɛ́ in yaa-de-demɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́, in Ástár kpasa ko-wan nɛ̀ de tom-nù in yɛ̀, gu nɛ̀ dukbíí kɔ-wa nɛ oi-aa.
[14e] Tɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ taa so kɔ-a̧‘e wi nyɛma mɛ e yɛ́ ɓoree, ɓɛɛ wi baa nù ko o be-Pɛrsɛ ha̧ o be-Masedoan.
[15e] Ɓɛɛ war k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛ́ɛ́ zɔka'e o be-Juif nɛ̀ gasa ɗaŋwi'i kɔ̧a̧ so mɛ kum wa yinɛ‘i bo nɛ o Wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na. Zua'i, wa ya nɛ́ ɗɔɔ o tana heembea ‘ɛ̧.
[16e] Wa nɛ o bem ko Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ duk kpasa, Wan nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, in nɛ̀ ɔ gasa nyɛmna, Wi nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu-yɛ́ in o zómdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ̀ de-a'i.
[17e] Hegó, k’ɛ́nɛ́ ba o kalata nɛ̀ Haman, bem ko Hamadata, yɔra tom nɛnɛ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘i de nɛ̀ tom na,
[18e] wen wa gai̧a wi-yɔr-kalata'i in o wi-nutua kɔ-a̧ gbɛ yinɛ tɛ te sɛn mgbak nú-ye Suzɛ kaɗi. Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ gɔna kita nɛ̀ haya-a zu-a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-a̧.
[19e] Ɛ̀nɛ̀ hú̧r gba̧a̧ kalata’ɛ dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ é yuwar ha̧ o be-Juif mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o dó-mɔ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ yɔli.
[20e] Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák wa tɛ gasa bele nɛ̀ tɛ ba wa mɛ ndak o wi nɛ̀ tɛ duk zù nɛ̀ wa, tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ ‹Adar›: nɛ́ zɛ nɛ wa hoka so mɛ kum nɛ̀ wa yinɛ.
[21e] Wen Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ kpaia zɛ nɛ̀ duka wen kuma dukbíí n'aa hoka nɛ̀ wese gasa desee.
[22e] Hegɔ, mgbara o gasa wese gbaŋa k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ é wese'i sɛnɛ, de nɛ̀ o saa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ desee. Gbaŋa'i tɛ duk nɛ́ wese mbaŋa tɛ‘nɛ́.
[23e] Dika kinii, hegɔ yak nɛnɛ, wese'i tɛ duk nɛ́ wese kpasa-a k’ɛ́ɛ́ in ko o sɛm ko o be-Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ duka nɛ́ zɛ mbaŋa ɗoŋ kuma-a ko o wi-e-zu-wen mɛ duk zù nɛ̀ ɛ́ɛ́.
[24e] O ye in o zikanu nɛ̀ beka kasi o heembea nɔ‘i na, ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ kum wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ sɛ́ɛ̀ in wee; bíí beka ɔ sɛnáɛ ɓɔna; o saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ in o nɔi̧ tɛ yu fara'i gɛr gbin mbɛt.
[13] «Wà à gaí̧ kalata wen-áa dam beegara nú-wan lɛŋ ha̧ o be-Juif lɛŋ mɛ ya gɛɗɛ-gɛɗɛ wese'i wen bíí biro in o wisɛn kɔ-wa.»
[14] Hegó o wi-daŋ-nyaŋa yaka nɛ̀ maa-yi mɛ pɛsi o ha̧a̧nu ko wannu; ɓɛɛ nyɛrɛ‘i nɛ dam fara lɛŋ, kóó sɛn gasa ye Suzɛ mbɛt.
[15] Mardochee gboa tɛ ko wannu, nɛ̀ laa-wan tɛ, in mɔɔ-gu-zu nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr; mɔ n'aa kaɓala nɛ̀ zu-a nɛ́ nyɛm-nyɛm zɔ̧-laa nɛ̀ gbɛ̧a̧. Tɛ zɔka a̧, o bíí Suzɛ lɛŋ kpiɗa nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ.
[16] Ko o be-Juif nɛ́ wese sa̧a̧mɔ in tortɛ.

[17] Sɛn tɛ ye in tɛ zikanù kpɔk kpɔk, nɛ̀ heembea'i hɔa sɛnɛ lɛŋ, fara nɛ̀‘i gai̧a o ha̧a̧nu nɔ‘i sɛnɛ lɛŋ, duka nɛ wese desee in nyɛŋɛ, wese gbaŋa in yoyɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ wen o be-Juif. O gɔni-duk nɛ̀ dɔka-a gɔna bɔr; wa yee tɛ o do-mɔ ko o Juif, wen wa dee nɛ́ kíì o Juif.
[1] Tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fiozɛ nɛ̀‘i sa'e «Adar», o kalata nɛ wannu yɔra'i hɔɔ dam fara-a lɛŋ.
[2] Kpɔk kale wese'i, o wisɛn ko o be-Juif kuma lɛŋ; ŋma bíí kpɔk yor ti o Juif na; bíí lɛŋ yuu so nɛ́ wa.
[3] O wi-ya-zu o zikanu, o be-wan, in o wi-yɔr-mɔ ko wannu lɛŋ tu̧u̧ tɛ o Juif, wen kíì Mardochee de so nɛ́ wa.
[4] Heembea ko wannu dee so ha̧ nin Mardochee mɛ hu̧r dam nú-wan lɛŋ.
[6] Sɛn saaye Suzɛ, o Juif gbɛɛ o bíí gɔmŋmaa mɔɔrɔ.
[7] Wa gbɛɛ Farsanɛstain, Dɛlfɔn, Fasga,
[8] Fardata, Barea, Sarbaka,
[9] Marmasim, Arufaios, Arsaios in Zabutaios mbɛt.
[10] O wi nɔ‘i ɓu'i nɛ́ o bem ko Haman Bugaios, bem ko Hamadata, nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ wi-sɛn-o Juif. Ɓɛɛ wa kai o mɔɔ-oi-wa lɛŋ.
[11] Kale kpɔk wese'i, wa tóra o bíí nɛ̀ wa gbɛa sɛn saaye Suzɛ ha̧ wannu.

[12] Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr: «Sɛn zaŋ ye Suzɛ hɛ̧ɛ̧, o Juif gbɛɛ o bíí gɔmŋmaa mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ tɛ taamɔ kɔ-mɛ, wa dee nɛ́ ge tɛ o oi zikanu ge? Kinii, mɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ ge woyo ɓɔ ge? Mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ ak woyo, mɛ tɛ kpa.»
[13] Ɛstɛr kifa ha̧ wannu: «Wì é yuwar ha̧ o Juif mɛ de kale kpɔk mɔ‘i sa̧a̧mɔ woyo, wen ha̧‘i mɛ gai̧ wɔr o bem ko Haman ɓu nɔ‘i tɛ te mbɛt.»
[14] Wannu ha̧a̧ nú‘e mɔ'ɔ dé hegɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ he mbea ha̧ o Juif saaye Suzɛ wen ha̧ wa mɛ gai̧ wɔr o bem ko Haman.
[15] O Juif saaye Suze mɔi̧a̧ ŋmaa tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ «Adar». Wa kuma o bíí gɔmŋmaa taar, ɓɛɛ wa kai mɔɔ-oi-wa na.

[16] Ɓɛɛ ko o ŋma Juif nɛ̀ a̧a̧ so nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o zikanù lɛŋ, wa mɔi̧a̧ ŋmaa, yé nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ŋmaa. Hegɔ o wi-nasi-wa ea ha̧ wa mɛ ɔm, wen tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar, wa kuma bíí booro ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ wa fo o mɔɔ-oi-wa na.
[17] Hegɔ, wa ɔma tɛ-wa tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar, ɓɛɛ wa ya wese'i de nɛ̀ gbaŋa nɛ̀ desee.
[18] O Juif mɛ saaye Suzɛ nɛ mɔi̧a̧ so ŋmaa tɛ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ ɔm tɛ na'i, dea kɔ‘i gbaŋa nɛ̀ desee tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ.

[19] Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa o Juif nɛ̀ pɛsa so dam zikanu lɛŋ nɛ̀ nyei̧a-a̧ baa kɔ‘i nɛ́ ɓu-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar e nɛ̀ wese gbaŋa, hɔ nɛ̀ zaŋgule, tom nɛ̀ ŋyɔŋmɔ ha̧ ó ŋmaa. Ɓɛɛ o wi ɔ-tɛ-gasa ye ɔm kɔ‘i tɛ zaŋ gbaŋa, hɔ nɛ̀ zaŋgule, tom nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa tɛ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar mbɛt.
[20] Mardochee yɔra o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ zaŋ ŋma kalata, ɓɛɛ tom dam o Juif nù ko Artazɛrzɛs lɛŋ, o wan nɛ̀ ɔ nyɛia̧ in o wan nɛ̀ duk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt,
[21] ha̧ wa mɛ de gbaŋa dam ɗoŋ ɓu-zua-naar in ɓu-zua-móóró ɔɔ-zɛ ko Adar lɛŋ,

[22] wɛn nɛ́ tɛ o zɛ nɔ‘i a̧ o Juif ɔma nɛ̀ bɔnɛ ko o wisɛn kɔ‘i. Nɛ́ tɛ fiozɛ Adar'i mbɛt a̧ mɔ kpaia nɛnɛ nɛ de-a wen wa: hi̧a̧ -fio kpaia nɛ̀ desee, ɓɛɛ ditasee kpai nɛ̀ tortɛ. Fiozɛ‘i nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ duk hee wese yoyɛ-baa-ŋmaa de nɛ̀ nyɛŋɛ ga, tom nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o sɛm in o wisan.
[23] O Juif kpɛka o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ Mardochee yɔra tom nɛnɛ ha̧ wa'i.
[24] A̧ wea ɗoŋ kia yuwar nɛ̀ Haman be-Masedoan, bem ko Hamadata, kia mɛ de nɛ̀ biro in wa, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa yɔra so nɛ̀ ŋma heembea, ɓɛɛ ká a̧ pi̧ so nɛ́ tani hok nɛ̀ wese kuma wa lɛŋ ga;
[25] in hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa nɛɛ nɛnɛ tɛ wannu mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘e wì bá Mardochee gai̧ ga. Ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋmɔ n'aa taa so mɛ dak a zu o Juif lɛŋ tika tika-a zu a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ wa gai̧ a̧ in o bem kɔ-a̧ lɛŋ.

[26] Nɛ́ wen hegɔ a̧ wa saa nɛ̀ o zɛ gbaŋa nɔ‘i'e «Purim» wen pi̧i̧ tani nɛ̀ wa pi̧a — nɛ̀ nú ko o Juif wi sa tani nɛ́ Purim. Wa saa hegɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ kalata ko Mardochee nɛ̀ tɔ̧a̧ wen o bɔnɛ nɛ̀ wa zɔka in o mɔ nɛ̀ kpaa wa lɛŋ.

[27] Mardochee baa o zɛ-gbaŋa'i e mgbara o dóka gbaŋa, ɓɛɛ o Juif lɛŋ kpɛk mɛ kasi o zɛ nɔ‘i wen wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa, wen o bezaŋ-wa in wen o bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ye yuwar do-mɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt. Ŋma mɔ nɛ̀ wa tɛ de nɛtɛ bona. O zɛ nɔ‘i tɛ ya nɛ́ zɛ nɛ̀ tɛ-wi tɛ duk sɛnɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ sɛn saaye kpɔk kpɔk, sɛn nutua kpɔk kpɔk, in sɛn zikanu kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ, dam ɗóŋ pɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧.
[28] Wi tɛ de gbaŋa zɛ Purim'i dam ɗoŋ pɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ gan batɛ, ká tɛ o bezaŋ bi ɗoŋ-aa na.
[29] Ko-wan Ɛstɛr, bokobem ko Aminadab, in be-Juif Mardochee yɔra o mɔ nɛ̀ wa dea lɛŋ yɔr, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ wen nɛ̀ ŋgaiaa zu kalata ko Purim'i.
[31] Mardochee in ko-wan Ɛstɛr ee so zɛ gbaŋa'i wen wa nɛ tɛ-wa, wen ha̧ tɛ-wa mɛ hai nɛ̀ ɗoŋ-aa.
[32] Ha̧a̧nu ko Ɛstɛr dea ha̧ gbaŋa'i mɛ de ti pɛ lɛŋ yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa yɔra gba̧a̧-wen-aa yɔr, kà tɛ-wi dúk sɛnɛ.
[1] Wannu Artazɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ heembea ha̧ o wi nù kɔ‘i lɛŋ, hɔ ka̧ zaŋ yì mɛ.
[2] Nyɛrɛ ŋgai in nɔɔ-see kɔ-a̧, nyɛrɛ mbɔi in hu̧ra-nin ko nù kɔ-a̧ yɔra lɛŋ zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ, kà tɛ̀-wì mbáŋ ɗoŋ-aa.

[3] Mardochee duka so nɛ́ yiitoo bíí sɛn nú-wan ɗoŋ Artazɛrzɛs. A̧ so nɛ́ ŋma dita-bíí zu nù‘i; o be-Juif lɛŋ gasi so nɛ́ a̧. Bíí nù kɔ-a̧ lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so a̧ nyɛmna; a̧ duka mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ wa.
[1f] Mardochee duka so tá nɛnɛ‘e: «O mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ tɛ́ Sɔ̧.
[2f] Yí‘m à̧ dúk tɛ o mɔ n'am zɔka so tɛ hɔɔ-zu'i. Mɔ lɛŋ hɔɔ gba̧a̧.
[3f] Mi zɔka ŋma geɗɛk kpukput nɛ̀ kifa nanayi, ɓɛɛ mi zɔka sa̧a̧mɔ in wese in gba dɔka yì tɔfɛɛ. Nanayi'i usi nɛ́ Ɛstɛr nɛ̀ wannu baa nɛ̀ kóò, ɓɛɛ é nɛ̀ ko-wan.
[4f] O ndiɓa yiitoo nɔ‘i nɛ́ mi in Haman.
[5f] O dukbíí nɛ́ ó wan nɛ̀ mɔi̧a̧ ŋmaa mɛ kum kpar o Juif.

[6f] War dukbíí kɔ‘m'i nɛ́ Israál; nɛ́ o wi nɛ̀ hiɗa mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ká kpasi'i. Gasa Wan kpasa dukbíí kɔ‘i. Gasa Wan gboo yɛ́ yí o ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ. Sɔ̧ dea o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ n'aa tɛ de so nɛti mgbara o gɔni-duk na.
[7f] Mɛ̀ nɛ́ hegɔ sa a̧ ɗafi mɔ tɛ fara yiitoo wen o bíí: kpɔk wen dukbíí ko Sɔ̧, ɓi-aa wen o gɔni-duk lɛŋ.
[8f] Ɓɛɛ o yuwar ɗafamɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i hɔɔ gba̧a̧ tɛ zɛ, in tɛ wese in ŋgimbi ɓaa-kita tí Sɔ̧ wen o dukbíí lɛŋ.
[9f] Tɛ-Sɔ̧ mbaŋa ɗoŋ dukbíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ de mɔ in war bíí kɔ-a̧ nɛ̀ yuwar-a.
[10f] Hegɔ, tɛ ɓu-zua-naar in ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ ɔɔ-zɛ ko fiozɛ Adar, o bezaŋ Israɛl ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa yaknɛ sɔi̧ tɛ mɔi̧ ŋmaa de nɛ̀ gbaŋa in nyɛŋɛ tí Sɔ̧.»

[11f] Tɛ naar pɛ-wan ko Ptoléméé in ko kóò kɔ-a̧ Kleopatrɛ, Dositos nɛ̀ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so'e wi nɛ́ wiɗafisɔ̧ in widetom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, baa kalata'i gbonɛ, kpɔk in bem kɔ-a̧ Ptoléméé. Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndé, mɛ̀ nɛ́ mgbak kalata heembea Purim, in ndé, nɛ́ Lizimak bem ko Ptoléméé, ŋma wi Jerusalɛm, a̧ kpaia kpaia kalata'i.
Ɛnɛ hɛr tɛ-‘nɛ nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ ɔ wan zu nù.
Ɛnɛ dé nɛ o de taamɔ zu Gasa Wan, ɛnɛ kii A̧ nɛ mɔkasee.
Wen, ɓán ná, A̧ ee ha̧ wi nɛ ba zu we nɛ A̧ na mɛ kpa A̧.
A̧ usi yí-A̧ usi ha̧ wi nɛ kɔɗɔaa ha̧ A̧.
O gɔɔ taamɔ fo nɛ bíí nyɛi̧ nɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ foe tɛ ba o mgbelewi
nɛ we Wan-ŋgaiamɔ‘i mbɛt.
Kpasa ɗuka-taamɔ ye kɔ̧ see ɗaŋwi na, a̧ dúk tɛ wi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ yuɓur a na
Wen Sa̧-a̧ Ɔmi nɛ yekeli bii yu nɛ dukaa nɛ see yiitoo,
A̧ wɛr nɛ tɛ-A nɛ o taamɔ bɔkɔ, see-A̧ nyɔŋ ŋgɔr-ŋgɔr mbɛt ŋgimbi lɛŋ
n'Aa zɔk nɛ ŋma gɔɔmɔ.
Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ ŋma ɔmi nɛ de kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ in bii, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka e wi-tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen
ha̧ Sɔ̧ nɛ yɔli na; wen Sɔ̧ nɛ́ sedaako mɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ kɔ̧ see-aa, in wi nɛ zɔk mɔ
nɛ kpasaa hɔ nduti taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ yéŋ nɛ́ zer zíí nɛ be mɔ nɛ gbo nɛ nú-a̧.
Nɛ mbetɛ, Ɔmi ko Gasa Wan kpee zu nù lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ héé mɛ nɛ A̧‘a ndaɗi mɔ
lɛŋ nɛ ŋmaa ga, A̧ iŋa be wen lɛŋ nɛ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nú bii mbɛt.
Hegɔ, wi-tɔ̧ ɗaŋ nú lɛŋ nyɛm mɛ hu̧si tɛ nɛ A̧ na, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ beka
nyun wi’ɛi na mbɛt.
Wi tɛ ɓa ndaa mɔ nɛ ɗaŋwi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de lɛŋ, giti wen kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ daŋ hɔ tɛ Gasa
Wan, nɛ sedaako o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Zer de gɔya zii mɔ lɛŋ, kóó be giti fui̧a-wen nyaŋ a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ e ku̧i̧amɔ sɔɔgee dúk, ɛnɛ dor leɓe'nɛ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen
wen kóó ŋma be ɓɛlɛk-wen tik nù ɓɔn mbulɛɛ na.
Ndara-nú wi-ɓir-wen ndela gbɛ nɛ wan-aa.
K’ɛ́nɛ́ e ha̧ yɔɔkaya k’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ dak fio pi zu'nɛ́ na, in ha̧ o tom mɛ er-‘nɛ́
mɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tik na.
Sɔ̧ de kɔ‘i fio na, ɓɛɛ A̧ bó nɛ desee zu fea ko bii na.
Wen A̧ dee o mɔ lɛŋ ha̧ wa mɛ ya kpasa, ɓɛɛ o mɔ n'Aa dee a zaŋnu lɛŋ,
nɛ́ wen duka kpasa ba nɛ kpara-a si ti. Ŋma ɔ̧na gbɛ fio bo tɛ o mɔ nɔ‘i na,
ɓɛɛ ŋgai ko Hadɛs (ye ko o fio) ɔ wan zu nu na mbɛt,
wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋwi aŋ nɛ er, sa nɛ fio; see-wa gbɛŋ zɛ̀k-zɛ̀k wen aa;
nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa baa a̧ nɛ sɛm, ɓɛɛ wa nɔ tɔk in a̧.
Nɛ mbetɛ, nyɛma so kana ha̧ wa mɛ ya o ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧.
Wen, tɛ o taamɔ-ndela kɔ-wa'i, nɛ hegɔ a wa tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o ŋmaa’é:
«Ɗoŋ duká-kpasá k’ɛ́ɛ́ nyɛi na, ditasee duna sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Ka ŋgimbi ko bii a hɔ kaɗi laŋ, ŋma nyina-a bo ɓɔna;
ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ iŋ ŋma bii nɛ pia ɗoŋ nɛ Hadɛs hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Ɛɛ́ hɔɔ zaŋnu nɛ kpandoe, ɓɛɛ, nɛ ɗoŋ fio k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ duk hee ɛ́ɛ́ ya so
nɛti na ga.
Ɔmi kɔ̧ zɔɔ-yɛ nɛ gee búk sɔɔgee, ɓɛɛ taamɔ nɛ gee mbul-wee nɛ gɔm
ŋgimbi toaa nɛ nyu̧mu̧-yɛ to nɛnɛ.
Kà taamɔ bo ɓɔna, kiitɛ-wi kifa gee bùk, ɓɛɛ ɔmi bu̧i̧ a yaknɛ,
hee gee be yuu-bùk ga.
Ɗoŋ tikiɗi, tɛ-wi tɛ bi ɗoŋ nin-yɛ, tɛ ŋma bii beka dúk tɛ o mɔ
n’ɛɛ́ dea so na. Dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́ zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ yak hee duule nɛ oi-aa bona’ɛ ga.
A̧ tɛ yɔ hee kútú nɛ naŋ wese pɛsi, ɓɛɛ ká gbɛŋmɔ yela a nu’ɛ ga.
Ŋgimbi dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́ zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in dukaa ko giɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ kà sɔŋkur ŋgimbi k’ɛ́ɛ́ hɔ kaɗi, ŋma mɔ nyɛm mɛ dor a̧ na.
Wen, ŋgimbi-a gɔna so kaɗi, ŋma mɔ'ɔ tɔ̧ zu-a woyo bo ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ‘i, ɛɛ nyɔŋ k’ɛ́ɛ́ o demɔ zaŋnu kinii ŋgaɓo,
ɛɛ nyɔŋ k’ɛ́ɛ́ zaŋnu ba nú-yɛ, hee ŋgimbi daŋa-ŋgai ga.
Ɛɛ nɔ o de ŋga dɔ̧ɔ̧, a nɛ o de si̧i̧-nyama tɛ yɛ. K’ɛ́ɛ́ nyaŋ ɓií de mbɔɗi mɔ'ɔ nú-koro na.
Ɛɛ ɗafi tɛ-yɛ nɛ o do-te ŋgaɓo, ká wa tɛ̀ɛ́ nyar zer.
Ká ŋma bíí kpɔk poo yɛ mbosi yɔyɛ-ari k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
Ɛɛ usi nyɛŋɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́ dam fara lɛŋ, wen nɛ war k’ɛ́ɛ́ a̧‘i̧.
Ɛɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wisan, kóó zu deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a'i,
k’ɛ́ɛ́ e kogɛra na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́ yu mbuizu sɔkawi mɛ tu̧ nɛ tɛ-a na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ deemɔ nɛ ŋgai a tɛ ba fara oi heembea k’ɛ́ɛ́,
wen nɛ ŋma mɔɔ-oi ɓɔsi bó na.
Ɛɛ tui pɛ́r ha̧ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a: a̧ mbár nɛ nú-yɛ, tɔn nɛ tigɛr-yɛ,
wor nɛ mɔ tɛ-yɛ wen zu gbina heembea n’ɛɛ́ gbin,
dɔk nɛ wen a zu yɛ mbɛt'e ɛ́ɛ́ ndak pata mɔ nɛ wa usa h’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
A̧ dúk nɛ tɛ-a'e wi iŋa Sɔ̧, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ mbɛt'e wi nɛ́ bem ko Gasa Wan.
A̧ kifa kana nɛ́ mgbak wi ɗaŋ o taamɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́,
ɓɛɛ gee zɔka a̧ sɔɔgee dúk nɛ́ zɔm tui.
Wen dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ ŋmaa in ko dɔka bíí na, yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt nɛtɛ.
Ɛɛ ya yí-a hee gee tum-mɔ ga, a̧ a̧r nyɛi̧ nɛ yuwar k’ɛ́ɛ́,
hee mɛ nɛ zukupaa ga mbɛt.
A̧ tɔ̧ nɛ hee-gɛr nɛnɛ‘e sɔŋkur mɔ ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ desee,
ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-a mbɛt'e Sɔ̧ nɛ dáà kɔ‘i.
Ɛɛ zɔk kà a̧ nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasawen, in hee mɔ n'aa tɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ ga.
Kà widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a boo nɛ bem ko Sɔ̧, Sɔ̧ tɛ ye ɗoŋ aa,
ɓɛɛ kpasa a̧ er o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛɛ da̧ a̧, usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧, mɛ we see-aa,
h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zɔk ga̧-a̧ kɔ̧-a̧ in nyɔŋa-nin kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɛɛ gɔn kita fio-foe zu a̧, ɛ́ɛ́ zɔk kà Sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ye ɗoŋ aa,
hee mɔ n'aa tɔ̧ ga.
Taamɔ kɔ-wa nɛ mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa ɔr nɛ́ tɛ-wa. Ɗaŋ kɔ-wa kpee yi-wa,
ɓɛɛ wa iŋ o hu̧sa ɗafamɔ ko Sɔ̧ na,
wa e ta nɛ mɔɔ-oi deemɔ nyɛm yí Sɔ̧ na,
wa e kɔ-wa nɛ́ gasi nɛ o wan-sa̧a̧-see tɛ kpa, tɛ geemɔ.
Zu-a'i, Sɔ̧ dee bii mɛ dùk kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ e ha̧ bii mɛ hɔ ŋmaa in A̧.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ aa-see-mɔ ko wan-ɗaŋmɔ a daka fio pi zaŋnu.
Hegɔ mbɛt, o wi nɛ ndak pata a̧ zɔk kana nɛ bɔnɛ fio'i.
Sɔ̧tɛ o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧-a̧ kɔ̧ er Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ŋma bɔnɛ beka hɔ zu wa ɓɔna
O mgbelewi zɔka kɔ‘i hee wa fea fee kaɗi ga,
ɓɛɛ yakaa kɔ-wa'i dúk so hee ŋma ŋgayamɔ ga,
Yakaa kɔ-wa nyɛi̧ nɛ ɛ́ɛ́ duk hee ŋgaŋamɔ ga.
Zu-a'i bó, wa ya kɔ-wa zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧.
Kóó nɛ tɛ zɔka mɔ ko o bii, nɛ́ bɔnɛ a tika zu wa'i,
ee-ta kɔ-wa yora so kana ndé wi beka fe na.
Ɗoŋ o be bɔnɛ nɛ wa zɔka'i, wa tɛ kpa nɛ o zɔm demɔ.
Sɔ̧ wee wa ɓɛɛ kpa'e wa nyɛma yí-wi.
A̧ wee wa hee mɔ nɛ lɔr ŋmai nɛnɛ kɔ̧ lɔk’ɛ ga.
A̧ kpɛka wa hee ŋma ɗafasɔ̧, nɛ‘i do nɛ oi-aa, nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ ga.
Ŋgimbi tɛa ko Sɔ̧, saŋa-yí-wa tɛ tok bàr bàr,
wa tɛ ndɔr hee mbul-wee a dár zɔ̧ nɛnɛ ga.
Wa tɛ gɔn kita zu o tugun bii, wa tɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbii
ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ dùk nɛ wan kɔ-wa kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O wi nɛ tɛ e ta nɛ A̧ tɛ zii mgbara kpasawen kɔ̧-A̧.
O wan nɛ kasa kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ nɛ nɔaa tɛ ya ka tɛ A̧.
Wen, Sɔ̧ ha̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, de nɛ ko mbɛt ha̧ o bii n'Aa hoka.
Nɛ ko o ɗaŋwi, wa tɛ zɔk nɛ́ bɔnɛ nyɛm ɗoŋ o taamɔ kɔ-wa,
wen wa ee widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ geemɔ, ɓɛɛ wa zik ɗoŋ ha̧ Gasa Wan.
Wen, bɔnɛ a̧-a̧ zu wi nɛ sɛ́n ɗuka-taamɔ in yuwar dukaa n'aa usi.
Ee-ta kɔ-wa nɛ́ tom-takaɗi, tom kɔ-wa nɛ́ gee tum-mɔ,
ɓɛɛ ŋma gba̧a̧ o mɔɔ-dee kɔ-wa bó na.
Koo kɔ-wa nɛ́ o mgbelewi, o bem kɔ-wa nɛ́ o wiɗaŋ, fom a̧-a̧ zu o bezaŋ-wa.
Ko-yar-ndɔra nɛ ndiŋ ba tɛ-a na, in nɛ gbin heembea ba ŋmaa na,
a dúk nɛ desee, wen a̧ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi wese gɔn kita.
Kpàná nɛ de ŋma ɗaŋmɔ na, in nɛ bó nɛ ɗaŋ taamɔ zu Gasa Wan na, a
dúk nɛ desee mbɛt, wen a̧ tɛ kpa gba demɔ oi yora ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ Sɔ̧‘i,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ dùk tɛ gba de fara kɔ̧ Tua ko Gasa Wan mɛ.
Wen mɔɔ-oi dee tom nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ kpaa gasi,
deemɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ Heembea duk hee kúnínte nɛ nyɛm mɛ fe na ga.
Ɓɛɛ dukaa ko o be-dala beka hɔ ti na, o bezaŋ be-dala tɛ kum lɛŋ mbɛt.
Kóó pɛ-wa a dɔk zaŋnu mbɛt, wi beka tɔr wa nɛ mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ e sɔki kɔ-wa tɛ geemɔ hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur wese kɔ-wa.
Kà wa fe nɛ hayaa, wa beka kpa ŋma mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta na,
kà bó nɛ mɔɔ-ga̧-see tɛ sɔŋkur kita na.
Oe ŋga bɔnɛ nɛ zɛm kpara wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi wa!
Gana so deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, bá nɛ koo bem, wen tɛ-wi tɛ duk
doŋ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kpoo nɛ kpoo, Sɔ̧ in o bii mbɛt kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ deemɔ
nɛ yuwar-a.
Kà a̧ dúk, wi zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, kà a̧ bó na, ɓɛɛ wi de wɔ-a.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa aa yaa-gan-ŋmaa nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ hɔ ti ga,
sɛn fara ko Sɔ̧ wa tɛ suk a̧ nɛ laasɔ̧i̧-wan
Ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ-oi gba dɔka bezaŋ o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na bó na. Wa nɛ́ o bezaŋ
be-dala nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋgina-te, nɛ nin-a̧ ye nu ɗúk na, ɓɛɛ nɛ gun-aa
nɔ nu na.
Kóó a̧ a gba er-a tɛ be ŋgimbi tikiɗi mbɛt, ɓán ná búk mbia a̧,
ɓɛɛ ŋga hara-búk zuɗa a̧ pi̧ nu, wen n'aa nɔ nu na.
O be gbaa-er-a tɛ gbin nɛ zɔɗi-a, o waya-a tɛ ai nɛ mbui gbílílí,
nɛ́‘i nyɛm mɛ nyɔŋ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ ŋma mɔ de nɛnɛ bó na mbɛt.
Wen wese ɓaa-wen, o bem nɛ́‘i ko ɗɔɔ heembea na tɛ ya sedaako
ɗaŋmɔ ko o dáà in nàà kɔ-wa.
Zu-a'i, Widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, kóó a̧‘a fe nɛ mbui mbɛt, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ́ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wen, de sɔki bó nɛ́ gbɛraa kúkúɗú na, wi wɛ a̧ nɛ dɔka pɛ na mbɛt.
Ɗuka-taamɔ nyɛma ŋmaa in hɔɔ mbui, deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɛma ŋmaa in dɔka pɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee yí Sɔ̧ ga, Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dúk so mgbara o ɗaŋwi ga, Sɔ̧ baa a̧ yaknɛ.
Sɔ̧ baa a̧ yinɛ, wen ká ɗaŋmɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpai taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in ká ɔrmɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpai see-a,
wen wɔ-geemɔ nɛ zár wi kpe nɛ zu o kpasa mɔ,
ŋga wɔ-mɔ nɛ zik zu wi mbɛt ɗaŋ nɛ́ de taamɔ.
Ɗoŋ be zɛ tikiɗi, a̧ deemɔ nyɛm yí Sɔ̧ ɓɔnti, hee ŋma wi nɛ dee dɔka pɛ zaŋnu ga.
Sɔ̧tɛ-a dee yí Gasa Wan, mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa a̧ gbo tɛ ndiŋ fara nɛ hayaa.
O bii zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa zíí mgbara-a na. Sɔ̧ ha̧ mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ bɛɛ A̧ de ko
ha̧ o bii n'Aa hoka, A̧ ye nɛ ɗoŋ o sa̧-a̧ bii kɔ̧-A mbɛt: Ɗuka hu̧samɔ‘i ye kɔ̧ tɛ o bíí na.
Fio ko o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a dak nɛ wen pi zu o ɗaŋwi nɛ ya kpasa,
ɓɛɛ fea ko de wi nɛ mbuí fóm nɛ́ dɔka pɛ dukaa ko ɗaŋwi.
Hegɔ, wa tɛ zɔk fio ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ wa beka zii mgbara mɔ
nɛ Gasa Wan kɔ̧a mɛ de in a̧, in gun baa a̧ n'Aa baa e tɛ ga̧-a̧ fara'i na.
Wa tɛ zɔk zɛkɛɗi nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ mám kɔ‘i nɛ wa.
Ɗoŋ tikiɗi, wa tɛ kifi nɛ́ ɗaŋ géé fio-mɔ, ŋma mɔɔ-búù nɛ tɛ dùk
mgbara o fio ɓɔnsɛnɛ, A̧ tɛ sɔmgbi wa nɛ gɛ́r a nu, ŋma kpɔk nyɛm
mɛ kifi nú-wen na. A̧ tɛ pɔkɔsi wa hɔ nduti ŋgai kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ A̧ ziɓa wa
wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Wa tɛ ya tɛ bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi tɛ bi ɗoŋ wa.
Ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ ak ndaa o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa, wa tɛ tɛ nɛ kíí, ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋmɔ
nɛ wa dee lɛŋ tɛ kur zu wa, mɛ de wen in wa.
Hegɔ, widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a tɛ yor nɛ nɔaa, in nɛ kpee-see,
ti o wi nɛ yaa so usi nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧, e nɛ o tom kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt tɛ geemɔ‘i.
Tɛ zɔka a̧, bele tɛ zár wa, wa tɛ ya ɓeke-yeke, wen n'aa kpasa yek nɛ wa.
Taamɔ tɛ diti see-wa, hiɗi-wa tɛ gɔn, ɓɛɛ wa aia nú tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha̧ o ŋmaa'e:
«Zɔ́k, mɛ nɛ wi n’ɛɛ́ yaa so mam nɛnɛ, k’ɛ́ɛ́ baa so nɛ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗɛ k’ɛɛ'ɛ.
Oe bɔkɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ wa! ɛ́ɛ́ baa k’ɛ́ɛ́ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ e tɛ mgbele-tom, zɔ́k nɛ fio kɔ̧-a̧ hee mɔɔ-búú ga.
Nɛ́ hee ge a'a̧ yee bɔɔ nɛ mgbara o bem ko Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ n'aa kpa nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ in o sa̧a̧-bíí'ɛ ge?
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ yambala so nyɛi̧ nɛ yuwar kpasawen. Sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ tɛ́
nɛ tɛ́ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɛk so zu yɛ na, wese daŋ wen ɛ́ɛ́ na mbɛt.
Ɛ́ɛ́ baa tɛ-yɛ pi̧ tɛ o yuwar daŋmɔ in yɔɔkaya, yambali nɛnɛ hɔ tɛ mɔɔ-nyɛ̧r;
ɛ́ɛ́ ɓira nɛ ŋga gbara nɛ yuwar bó sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ bɛ̧ baa yuwar ko Gasa Wan.
Gasazu gbaka ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ ge? Mɔɔ-oi mbɔi n’ɛɛ́ dúk so nɛ tɛ-yɛ‘i a̧-a̧ dée?
Mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ yaka hee géé giɔ̧ ga, hee ŋma tom nɛ‘i pi̧ yaknɛ ɓeleŋ'ɛ ga.
Hee mɔ nɛ gasa kombon mbaŋ nɛ pɛŋa-yì, ɓɛɛ ka'i nyɛm mɛ zɔk oi-aa,
ká bó nɛ fara n'aa ɓira nɛnɛ na’ɛ ga,
kána hee nɔi̧ nɛ bu̧ nɛ yiwese, ɓɛɛ nɛ‘i zɔk kóó géé be oi-aa na’ɛ ga,
wen wi zɔ́k oi fara n'aa gbá búk nɛ wɔr-ɓaa na, ká bó nɛ zɔka oi fara n'aa ɓira nɛnɛ na,
in hee goo nɛ‘i pi̧ si ŋma fara, ɓɛɛ beebeé-mɔ‘i̧, búk n'aa mbaŋa ɓir nɛnɛ
kpee ŋmaa, wi iŋ oi fara n'aa yaka nɛnɛ na’ɛ ga.
Nɛ hegɔ mbɛt ɛ́ɛ́ yɔɔ nɛnɛ dika tɛ koa ɛ́ɛ́ kasak, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ nyɛm mɛ usi nde
ŋma bɛɛ-oi deemɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ na. Ɗaŋ k’ɛ́ɛ́ gbɛɛ yɛ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ee-ta ko wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na, dúk hee púmyúlú gbafón nɛ búk pɛsi
yaknɛ, kóó hee be dúíá-tɔp nɛ gba-búk yai a taŋ'ɛ ga. A̧ bu̧ yak hee tura
ziwee zaŋ búk ga; a̧ kaɗi hee mɔ nɛ tɛ-wi bi nɛ ɗoŋ gɛnɛ-kpɔk-zɛ'ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ya kɔ‘i kpoo nɛ kpoo. Mɔɔ-oi tom kɔ-wa tɛ́
nɛ tɛ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ Wan mɛ ŋgɔn mɛ‘i kɔ́r nɛ wa.
Hegɔ mbɛt, wa tɛ kpa de laasɔ̧i̧-wan in gba de mɛtɛwol sɛn er Gasa Wan,
wen wíi-er-A tɛ pɛm wa, ɓɛɛ ɓaá-A̧ kpee ti wa hee ŋgee ga.
A̧ tɛ ba see-dee-gɔyá e ti nɛ boi-biro, ɓɛɛ A̧ kaia o mɔ n'Aa dea mɛ nasi nɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-A̧.
A̧ tɛ hɛr tɛ-A̧ nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, hee laa-biro ga,
laasɔ̧i̧-biro kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ́ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-wen nɛ sa̧-a̧ ɓɔnti.
Sa̧a̧-see kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ ŋma mɔ nyɛm mɛ gan na'i, tɛ dùk nɛ́ ŋgee-biro kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋga nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ŋma mɔɔ-ga̧-a̧‘a̧ bóna'i, tɛ dùk hee tɔ̧ɔ̧nú gbapaa ga,
ɓɛɛ o mɔɔ-zu-nu lɛŋ tɛ mɔi̧ ya ɗoŋ-aa mɛ dik a zu o mgbelewi.
O pi̧i̧-koro tɛ gɔm tɛnɛ zééŋ, nɛ zaŋ duule mɛ, si tɛ wa,
hee goo a'i ŋgaŋa kuusaa bereŋ pi̧ nɛnɛ ga.
A tɛ de ŋga nyimsea yo nɛ wa nɛ ɓɔrɔ hee o ta-birndíŋ ga.
O pɛŋa-yì bóŋgólóŋ tɛ de ŋmaa in wa, ɓɛɛ o nanayi hura wa lɛŋ liŋgɔm, kó bona.
Ŋma ŋgá búk tɛ ɓoɓori wa, ɓɛɛ pɛsa wa hee gba búk ga. Hegɔ, gɔɔmɔ tɛ
de ha̧ zaŋnu mɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi, ɓɛɛ kiti-wan ko o wan-ŋgai tɛ zik gu nu, wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ o wannu, ɛnɛ yéŋ zer-‘nɛ́, ɛnɛ zií. Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-gɔn-kita zu nu lɛŋ,
ɛnɛ e ha̧ wi-iŋ-mɔ mɛ usi ɗoŋ mɔ h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi nɛ ɔ wan zu o gíí bíí, ɓɛɛ n’ɛnɛ su nɛ tɛ-‘nɛ zu o dɔka dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ, ɛnɛ hu̧i̧ zer-‘nɛ́.
Nɛ́ Gasa Wan a ha̧ŋgai h’ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ́ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn mɛ a dee wan h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ A̧‘a tɛ zɔk o mgbak tom k’ɛ́nɛ́, mbaɗi nɛ o ee-zu-mɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt,
ka ɛ́nɛ́, o wi-de-tom wan kɔ̧-A̧, nɛ́ gɔna kita kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ yuwar-a na,
k’ɛnɛ nɛ́ kasa heembea na, in k’ɛnɛ nɛ́ deemɔ n'A̧a̧ kɔ̧a̧ na.
A̧ tɛ gɔm gbaŋa-nyaŋa nɛ nyimsea yor ti'nɛ́, wen kita ko o gasawi tɛ ŋgai nyɛmna.
Wi nyɛma mɛ de ko ha̧ geɗɛk bii, in mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o ŋgaŋawi, wi tɛ yor zu wen kɔ-wa nɛ ŋgaiá.
Ŋma bii, nɛ Wi nɛ ɔ wan zu bii lɛŋ tɛ pɛ̧ nɛ ndaa ti a̧ bó na;
gasi ko bii de ŋma mɔ tɛ-A̧ na mbɛt. Nɛ́ A̧‘a dee o gasa bíí in o geɗɛk-a,
ɓɛɛ A̧ kɛ̧ mgbara wa na, hakali nɛ wa lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o wan-ŋgai, A̧ tɛ kii mgbara mɔ nɛ wa dea nɛ sa̧-a̧.
Hegɔ, nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ o be-wan a'm tɔ̧ wen’ɛ, wen h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ yambi ɗuka-taamɔ,
in k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ̧ naŋ-‘nɛ́ nɛ mɔ.
Wen o wi nɛ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ o sa̧-a̧ heembea nɛ yuwar-a, wi tɛ zɔk wa
hee o sa̧a̧ bíí ga, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ tɛ yambi o heembea nɔ‘i tɛ kpa nú-wen kpasa tɛ.
Hegɔ, ɛnɛ dé wɔ zia wen kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ kɔ̧ wa nɛ ŋgaiaa, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ iŋ mɔ.
Ɗuka-taamɔ tok tok lak-lak, ɓɛɛ a̧ bi na; ɓán ná a̧ ee ha̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧
mɛ zɔk a̧, in ha̧ o wi nɛ kii a̧ mɛ kpa a̧.
A̧ yak ti ha̧ o wi nɛ de wɔ a̧, usi nɛ tɛ-a ti ha̧ wa.
Wi nɛ gbo tuyɛ kií nɛ a̧ beka mbɔi na. Wi’ɛi tɛ kpa a̧ fara duká nu, mgbak dadàá nútua kɔ‘i.
Ha̧-a̧ tɛ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧, nɛ́ kpasa kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ. Ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ beka ɓílí wi nɛ yaŋ yá kíí nɛ a̧ na.
Wen a̧ yár yar nɛ zu-a kíí nɛ o wi nɛ nyɛma yi-a̧, usi nɛ tɛ ha̧ wa,
sɛn yuwar kɔ-wa nɛ ko, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧-a̧ ti ha̧ taamɔ kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk lɛŋ.
Ku̧u̧naŋ ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ́ kia a̧ nɛ kpasaa, ha̧ a̧ mɛ de ha̧‘i mɛ iŋ mɔ,
kia a̧ ha̧‘i mɛ iŋ mɔ, nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ nɛ́ kasa o heembea kɔ̧-a̧,
kasa o heembea kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ iŋaa kana nde wi tɛ dùk kpasa kpoo nɛ kpoo,
ɓɛɛ dukaa kpoo nɛ kpoo ndaɗi nɛ́ wi in Sɔ̧.
Hegɔ, wɔ Ɗuka-taamɔ ba nɛ́ wi hɔ tɛ mɔɔwan.
Ɓɛɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbíí, kà wɔ kiti-wan in o dɔra-a
nɛ́ gbɛɛ‘nɛ́, n’ɛnɛ ba kpasa Ɗuka-taamɔ e ti, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ‘i nɛ́ ge? A̧ tɛ nɛ dée? Mi tɛ sar ndaa-a̧ lɛŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́,
ŋma mɔ tikiɗi n'am tɛ hu̧si bó na. Mi tɛ ɓa gun-aa h’ɛ́nɛ́ hɔ ɗɔɔkɔri-a.
Mi tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ ndaa-a̧ nɛ sa̧-a̧. Mi beka wɛr benaŋ tikiɗi nɛ ka̧ kpasa-wen na.
Mi beka ndak pata o ɗaŋ wɔ-mɔ nɛ gbɛ bii’ɛ na. Wen ŋma mɔɔ tɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ bó tɛ wa na.
Ɓɛɛ, nɛ́ dɔkaa ko o wan-ɗuka-taamɔ a kpasi o bíí zaŋnu; ɓɛɛ wannu nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ de dee ha̧ dukbii kɔ‘i mɛ kpa de dukaa.
Hegɔ, ɛnɛ zii o wen nu'm, ɓɛɛ tɛ gbak'nɛ́.
Mi mbɛt, mi nɛ fio hee o dɔka bii ga, bezaŋ kuti bii
nɛ wa ɓoo nɛ gii. Nɛ́ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa a murtɛ‘m mboɗa ŋmaa sɛnɛ.
Mi duka ɗɔɔ tɔk-zaŋ tɛ fiozɛ ɓu. Mi tɛɛ nɛ kparmɔ ko wiwii,
nɛ́ mɔɔ-oi bɔtɛ ɔaa ko wiwii in okóò in ŋmaa a de am.
Mi mbɛt, dika tɛ koa'm kasak, mi ɔma nɛ kpɔk ɔmi, nɛ o bii ɔm,
ɓɛɛ mi tik kana kpɔk zaŋnu bɔnɛ'ɛ. Kuti hiɗimɔ kɔ‘m duka nɛ kɔ̧a̧,
hee ko o dɔka obem ga.
Wa daia'm nɛ o goi, tɛ aia-nú.
Ŋma wannu nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ kɔ‘i zaŋnu nɛ ŋma yuwar nɛtɛ bó na.
Yuwar tɛaa zaŋnu in gboaa mbɛt nɛ́ kale kpɔk mɔ wen o bii lɛŋ.
Kale-a a'i n'am kɔfa nɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ mi kpa kɔ-ta kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ,
