mi aia nú‘m, ɓɛɛ ɔmi ɗuka-taamɔ ye tɛ‘m.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗuka-taamɔ gan o dɔ́rá in kiti-wan, mi baa mbɔi e tɛ geemɔ ti a̧.
De ta, nɛ gɛnɛ-a ŋgaia gan dɔkaa, hɔ́ gee hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧ na; wen o lɔr
zu nu lɛŋ nɛ́ gee nyɛmɛ ti a̧, bú-mbɔi mbɛt nɛ́ gee ɓɔtɛ sɛn ti a̧.
Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ gan hayatɛ in de saŋa-yí, mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ba a̧ hee sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘m ga,
wen n'aa kaɗi nyɛkaa ti'm na.
Nɛ́ mɔɔ n'aa tutura o demɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ lɛŋ tɛ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m; a̧ kaia o zɔm mbɔi nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ tɔr na, tɛ nɛnɛ ha̧‘m.
Mi nyɔŋa bɔtɛ o mbɔi nɔ‘i, wen nɛ́ ɗuka-taamɔ a ha̧wa ha̧‘m.
Zu-a'i, mi iŋ so'e o mɔ nɔ‘i tɛ nɛ tɛ-a na.
Mɔ n'am kpaa tɛ a̧, nɛ yuwar-a, mi tɛ usi lɛŋ h’ɛ́nɛ́. Mi beka gu nú‘m
zu ŋma be mɔ n'am kpaa nɛ ɗoŋ-a na.
Wen a̧ dúk wen o bii hee ŋma dɔka mbɔi nɛ beka kaɗi na ga. O wi nɛ kpaa a̧ dee nɛ sɛm in Sɔ̧, wen o demɔ nɛ wa kpaa tɛ yamba mɔ dee ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ kɔ̧ wa.
Sɔ̧ a de ha̧‘m mɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ yuwar-a, in ha̧‘m mɛ de taamɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ
o ha̧a̧mɔ n'Aa ha̧ha̧‘m, wen nɛ́ A̧‘a dúk ti ha̧ ɗuka-taamɔ. A̧ nɛ wi dúk zu o wan-ɗuka-taamɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ mbetɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ tɛ-yɛ, ɛ́ɛ́ ya lɛŋ kɔ̧ er-a, ɛ́ɛ́ gu nɛ o wen mɛ nú-yɛ,
iŋamɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́, in o yuwar deemɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mbɛt.
Hegɔ, A̧ dee ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ndaa o mɔ n'Aa dea nɛ sa̧-a̧. A̧ dee ha̧‘m
mɛ iŋ mgbara dukaa ko o mɔɔ-zaŋnu, in o tom kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk,
ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ku̧u̧naŋ ŋgimbi, kaɗa-a in bii-see-aa, ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ ŋgimbi
nɛ wese kóó zɛ gan nɛ ŋmaa nɛ duraa in ŋgimbi kpaia ŋmaa ko bɛɛ in ɓar,
ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ kpaia ŋmaa ko ŋgimbi zaŋ pɛ lɛŋ, in fara-yaa ko o mɔ nɛ nyɛk yi-zan.
Ha̧‘m mɛ iŋ yí o saɗi, in deemɔ ko o saɗi zaŋbɛɛ, ŋgai ko o ɗaŋ-sɔ̧,
in o taamɔ ko o bii, yí o te nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, in tom ko o ku̧-nin-te lɛŋ.
O mɔ nɛ‘i zɔk in o wan nɛ ya nɛ hu̧saa, mi iŋa, wen nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ
nɛ deemɔɔ zu nu lɛŋ a̧ usa wa ha̧‘m.
Wen, ɔmi-iŋamɔ a̧-a̧ tɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ‘i, ɔmi'i ɔ sa̧-a̧, a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ,
ɓɛɛ o yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɔ dɔka; a̧ kɔɓi mɔ nɛ hayaa, a̧ nɛ́ dam fara lɛŋ,
a̧ zii ndaa mɔ yɛkɓɛlɛk, ndiŋ bo tɛ a̧ na, a̧ ɔ nyɛka, tɛ-a de nyir na,
a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ demɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii mgbara mɔ nɛ haya;
ŋma mɔɔ dor a bó na, a̧ de nɛ demɔ in bii, a̧ de nɛ sɛm in bii;
a̧ ɔ nɔa, wi nyɛma mɛ e ta nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧-a̧ nɛ kpee-see mbɛt,
ŋma mɔ gan ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ na, ŋma mɔɔ yak yí-a na. A̧ ye tɛ o taamɔ ko bii lɛŋ,
o wan nɛ zii mɔ zii, o wan nɛ ɔ sa̧-a̧, in o wan nɛ kɔɓi mɔ nɛ hayaa gan mbɛt.
Hegɔ, Ɗuka-taamɔ hayá gan o mɔ nɛ fo mɔ lɛŋ; a̧ gɔm yɛ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ, wen n'aa zaŋ ŋmaa in ŋma mɔ na.
A̧ nɛ́ nú búk-ŋgai ko Sɔ̧, mgbak nú sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ gasamɔ
ko Wan nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgaiamɔ lɛŋ. Mɛ nɛ́ hegɔ sa ŋma be ndiŋmɔ ye tɛ a̧ na.
A̧ nɛ́ giɔ̧ sa̧a̧mɔ nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo'i, kpasa darngɛl-zɔk-tom ko Sɔ̧
nɛ sa̧-a̧, a̧ nɛ́ giɔ̧ dee demɔ kɔ̧-A̧ mbɛt.
Kóó n'aa dúk ɛnɛ-a ɓɛɛ‘i, a̧ nyɛma deemɔ lɛŋ. A̧ ɓɔn nɛ oi tɛ-a,
kpai nɛ mɔɔ-zaŋnu nɛ mbea, ye nɛ tɛ o sa̧a̧-bii dam ɗoŋ pɛ lɛŋ,
kifi nɛ wa nɛ o sɛm ko Sɔ̧, in o witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧.
Wen Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ o wi nɛ ndaɗi in Ɗuka-taamɔ ɓɛɛ.
A̧ toka gan wese, a̧ gana mɔ nɛ nyɛk yi-zan lɛŋ; ká‘i we a̧ nɛ sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ á̧ a gan ganaa:
wen, sa̧a̧mɔ e fara ee ha̧ tum, ɓɛɛ nɛ ko Ɗuka-taamɔ, ŋma ɗaŋmɔ nyɛm mɛ gan a̧ na.
Ŋgai ko Ɗuka-taamɔ dama zu nu lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ, tɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ.
Nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ a baa see-am, ɓɛɛ mi ki nɛ́ a̧ mbɛt, dika tɛ daŋa-ŋgai
kɔ‘m. Mi kia so mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò, ɓɛɛ mi ye tɛ dea mgbele dée kɔ̧-a̧.
Gasi kɔ̧-a̧ usi fara n'a̧-a̧ tɛ nɛnɛ‘i, wen a̧ kpaa kpɔk duka-kpasa in Sɔ̧
in Wi nɛ ɔ wan zu ɔ mɔ lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧.
Hee mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ usa ndaa iŋamɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ a̧ ga, nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ‘i mbɛt a̧ e zu
o mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ de.
Kà kpaa mbɔi a boó nɛ́ gasa demɔ nɛ‘i ki zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ ge mbɔi ge a gana Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ demɔ lɛŋ'ɛ ge?
Kà iŋamɔ ko bii nɛ dee ha̧ o tom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ
nɛ dee o mɔɔ zaŋnu lɛŋ‘i tɛ de kɔ‘i gan na nde?
Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ dúk nɛ wara nde? O yuwar dee demɔ lɛŋ gbo nɛ tɛ-a̧,
wen mɔ n'a̧-a̧ usi nɛ́ kasa-zu, hakilo, deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a a̧ in nɔɔŋgiɗi;
ɓɛɛ o mɔ, nɛ tɛ gbak bii gan tɛ dukaa zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i.
Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ dɔkaa si ti nde? Ɗuka-taamɔ iŋa o gba'a̧ mɔ nɛ yaka,
in o wan nɛ nyɛma mɛ hɔ. A̧ iŋa mgbara o tua-wen in tɔ̧ɔ̧ gba̧a̧ o sumgba.
A̧ iŋa o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔ-kifi lɛŋ nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ hɔ. A̧ iŋa o de pɛ in o de ŋgimbi mbɛt.
Hegɔ, mi hoka a̧ mɛ gbam in am tɛ dukaa kɔ‘m zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen mi iŋa nde
a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ dee demɔ ha̧‘m, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ha̧ nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧‘m, ŋgimbi sakalamɔ in ɗaŋsee.
Mi zɔka nde o giiwi tɛ zɔn am, wen zu a̧, ɓɛɛ kóó zu ŋgaiwi n'am ɓɔna sɛnɛ‘i, o dita-bii tɛ tu̧ tɛ‘m.
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ gɔn kita, bii tɛ kpa'e mi gboo yi-wen lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o gasawi tɛ yéŋ am.
Kà‘m kpe nú‘m, wa tɛ zɛm mɔ; kà‘m hu̧i̧ nú‘m, wa tɛ ya selele;
kà ɗoŋ wen kɔ‘m nyɛi̧, ɓɛɛ wa aa nɛ́ er nú-wa ɓeke-yeke.
A tɛ de ha̧ tɛ-bíí tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ am kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ tɛ o bíí nɛ tɛ tɛ
ɗoŋ am tɛ dùk tɛ‘m ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mi tɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbii, ɓɛɛ o zuduk tɛ ɔ nu ha̧‘m.
Tɛ o ŋgaŋa wannu tɛ nak wɛlɛ-wɛlɛ tɛ gee zia nin-am. Mi tɛ dùk nɛ dea poo o bii, ɓɛɛ mi duka nɛ hayatɛ yi biro.
Ŋgimbi n'am tɛ si tɛ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ ɔm tɛ‘m ka tɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ,
wen ɗaŋsee bó tɛ dukaa kpɔk in a̧ na, tu̧u̧see bó tɛ dee sɛm in a̧ na mbɛt,
kana nɛ́ bɔtɛ in desee ɓɛɛ.
Mi taa mɔ zu o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ see-am usi nde hɛra tɛ nɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ
ha̧ nɛ duká-kpasá kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Dee sɛm in a̧ ha̧ nɛ gasa bɔtɛ, ɓɛɛ o tom mɛ er-a de dee ha̧‘i mɛ kpa mbɔi
nɛ nyɛm mɛ kaɗi na. Gbamaa in a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ hu̧i̧ nɛ́ iŋamɔ ko bii, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ
in a̧ ba nɛ́ nin-wi e ŋgɔn. Hegɔ, mi nɛɛ dam fara lɛŋ, kii nɛ yuwar nɛ tɛ de
ha̧‘m mɛ ba a̧ nɛ kóò.
Mi duka so nɛ́ ŋma yaa-de-sɔnti, sɔ̧tɛ‘m mbɛt ɔ so dee.
Wen nɛ tɔ̧ nde hee mɔ n'am duka nɛ de wi ga, mi tɛa nɛ́ tɛ kpootɛ,
nɛ ndiŋ bo sɛnɛ na
Hegɔ, mi kɔɓa nde kà Sɔ̧ ha̧ so Ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧‘m na, mi nyɛm so
mɛ kpa a̧ na. Nɛ́ wi-kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ kpɔk ɓɛɛ a nyɛma mɛ iŋ wi
nɛ ha̧a̧mɔ‘i tɛ nɛnɛ. Nɛ́ hegɔ sa'm zik tɛ‘m sitɛ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ mi kɔfi nɛ A̧
nɛ see-am lɛŋ, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
“Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà, Gasa Wan Yaa-de-ko, n’Ɛnɛ deemɔ lɛŋ nɛ wen mɛ nú‘Nɛ́
Ɛnɛ dee nɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ tɛ ɗuka taamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ dee nɛ́ bii, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk zu o mɔ lɛŋ n’Ɛnɛ dea.
Ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu nu nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ in tanamɔ, in ha̧ a̧ mɛ gɔn kita nɛ wara.
Ɛnɛ há̧ Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ dúk kpɔk in'Nɛ́ɛ́ zu kiti-wan k’ɛ́nɛ́‘i ha̧‘m,
ɓɛɛ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ ndak am yinɛ mgbara o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Wen mi nɛ́ widetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́ in bem ko kodetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ŋma gee wi-ɓɔsa
nɛ ɗoŋ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ nyɛi na, ɓɛɛ nɛ zii kɔ‘i mgbara deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
in o heembea na.
Wen, kóó ŋma bii mgbara o bem ko bíí a dúk so nɛ widemɔ nyɛm sɛnɛ,
kà Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ tɛ nɛ tɛ-‘Nɛ́ bó tɛ a̧ na, a̧ nɛ́ geemɔ sɔɔgee.
Nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a hoka'm nɛ wannu ko dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in wigɔnkita zu o be-wiwii
in o bokobem k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ ha̧nú ha̧‘m mɛ mbo Tua zu sa̧-a̧ kaya k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in mɛ mbo fara-ɗafi ‘Nɛ́
saaye n’Ɛnɛ dee so fara-duk k’Ɛ́nɛ́ sɛnɛ, hee Tua-laa k’Ɛ́nɛ́ n’Ɛnɛ ɗafa so
dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ ɓeemɛ'ɛ ga.
Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ iŋa o deemɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ duka oi dea o mɔɔ-zaŋnu
n’Ɛnɛ dea’ɛ a̧-a̧ in'Nɛ́ɛ́. A̧ iŋa mɔ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ‘Nɛ́, in mɔ nɛ dúk nɛ wara,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ zír a̧ tɛnɛ nɛ́ sa̧a̧ fara k’Ɛ́nɛ́ yiwese mɛ, Ɛnɛ tóm a̧ nɛ́ tɛ sa̧a̧ fara-duk
mɛ gasamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛnɛ, ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk ka tɛ‘m gbak nɛ‘m tɛ bɔnɛ, in ha̧‘m
mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ-‘Nɛ́.
Wen a̧ iŋa mɔ lɛŋ, a̧ zii mgbara mɔ lɛŋ mbɛt, a̧ tɛ duk ti ha̧‘m nɛ yuwar-a
tɛ o tom kɔ‘m lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa'm e ɗɔɔ giɔ̧ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a.
Ɓɛɛ hegɔ, Ɛnɛ tɛ kpɛk o tom kɔ‘m lɛŋ, mi tɛ gɔn kita zu dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́
nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ nyɛm dukaa zu kiti-wan ko dáà kɔ‘m.
Nɛ́ ge bii ge a nyɛma mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de ge? Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ iŋ be-mɔ nɛ Gasa Wan kɔ̧a̧ o?
O taamɔ ko o bii ya siti-siɗoŋ, ta-zu-bii dúk tɛ mɔ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi na.
Kiitɛ-wi nɛ tɛ mbɔr mbɔr diti nɛ́ sɔ̧tɛ-wi,
ɓoo-gii'i nɛ gasa tui wen ɔmi ko bii, nɛ o taamɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nukuri.
Ɛ́ɛ́ iŋ o mɔɔ-zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧ yɛkɓɛlɛk na; kóó o wan nɛ ya dɔ̧́ɔ̧́ katɛ yɛ mbɛt,
nɛ́ bɔnɛ bɔnɛ ɛɛ zii nɛ mgbara-wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o'o zia mgbara o mɔ mɛ yiwese kaɗi, o?
K’Ɛnɛ ha̧ so Ɗuka-taamɔ tɛnɛ na, in k’Ɛnɛ tom so Sa̧-a̧ Ɔmi k’Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛnɛ
nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ na, nɛ́ ɔ'ɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ so mɔ n’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de o?
Nɛ́ hegɔ a'i kaia nɛ o wi-zaŋnu pii-nɛ-ɗoŋ zu tana war. Nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt
a o bii iŋa nɛ mgbara mɔ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ-‘Nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ká Ɗuka-taamɔ kpasi nɛ wa.
Ɗuka-taamɔ yora zu dáà ko o bii-zaŋnu, kuti bii nɛ Sɔ̧ ɓoo nɛ nù
kpɔk kerek ɛnɛ'ɛ. Nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ‘i a baa a̧ e ŋgɔn ɗoŋ tikaa kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ nɛ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ wese nɛ ŋma ɗaŋwi dee nɛ nyimsea zik nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ Ɗuka-taamɔ,
a̧ fee fio ŋgasee-dawa n'aa dee sitɛ nya a̧‘i.
Ha̧-a̧-yì ndiɓa-koro hura nù wen zu ɗaŋwi'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ
nɛ mgbɔɔ so tanawi nɛ gee kombon nɛ zu-yì nɛnɛ‘i, a kpasa nu'i woyo.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o zuduk lɛŋ yee nɛ tɛ dee o ɗaŋmɔ, wa zii nɛ nú o ŋmaa
ɓɔ na’ɛ, nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ a kpaa yí-tanawi. A̧ pɛma tanawi'i ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ de ɗaŋmɔ
ti Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa ŋgai gan zu kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ, n'aa de sitɛ bem kɔ̧-a.
Nɛ́ Ɗuka-taamɔ mbɛt a kpasa tanawi nɛ yuu so mɔ ti wee nɛ zira
nɛ yiwese mɛ, dɔ nɛ o gasa ye mɔɔrɔ a nù'ɛ.
O mɔɔ-sedaako ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ puturu-nù, nɛ ziwee daŋ sɛnɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ‘i,
o te nɛ o wayaa sɔk na ŋgimbi lɛŋ, in ŋma ɓɛ̧i̧a̧ ta-tɔŋ nɛ zu̧u̧ nù,
wen mbaŋa tɛ-wi zu mɔ nɛ kpaa so ŋma wi-si-kafɛ.
Bó nɛ́‘e o wi nɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ baa yuwar Ɗuka-taamɔ nyuna nɛ́ iŋa kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara
demɔ ɓɛɛ na, wa ee mɔɔ-oi mgbele kɔ-wa ha̧ o bezaŋ mbɛt, wen ká ndaa ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dee so'i tɛ̀ɛ́ tu̧.
Ɓɛɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ gboo o widetom kɔ‘i yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ.
Nɛ́ A̧‘a mgbɔɔ tanawi nɛ yuu so nyimsea ko zɔm-wi kɔ‘i’ɛ nɛ tɛ o de
yuwar nɛnɛ. A̧ usa wan ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ a̧, in o mɔ ko Sɔ̧ nɛ ya nɛ sa̧-a̧. A̧ dee ha̧ a̧
mɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi gbɛŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in ha̧ o mɔɔ-oi bɔnɛ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ dɔk.
A̧ gbaka wi’ɛi ti o wi-de-wɔ-mbɔi nɛ nukura a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa mɔ nɛ dɔkaa.
A̧ pɛma a̧ wen o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ye ɗoŋ-aa ti o wi-tui-pɛr ha̧ a̧.
Ɗuka-taamɔ dee ha̧ tanawi mɛ gbin ŋma ŋga biro, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ nde
ee-ta nɛ Sɔ̧ gana mɔ lɛŋ.
A̧ siŋ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ wa ɗɔra so’ɛ e duk ɛnɛ-a na,
ɓɛɛ a̧ dor a tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ.
Ɗuka-taamɔ zira in a̧ si kɔ̧ gɔna-yi, ɓɛɛ a̧ e a̧ duk ɛnɛ-a kɔ̧ zɔɓɔ na,
hɔ nɛnɛ wese n'a̧-a̧ ha̧nɛ dɔ́rá-wan ha̧ a̧, bá nɛ a̧ e zu o wi nɛ usa so bɔnɛ
ha̧ a̧. Hegɔ Ɗuka-taamɔ usa nde o wi nɛ ɓira so wen e nú-a̧ nɛ́ o wi-ndela,
ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ nin tanawi'i mɛ hu̧r kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɗuka-taamɔ gboo sa̧-a̧ dukbii, zuduk nɛ bó nɛ wen zu na, yinɛ er dukbii nɛ nasi so wa.
Ɗuka-taamɔ yee kɔ̧ see ŋma widetom ko Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ wi’ɛi de
o mɔɔ-kifi in o mɔɔ-usi-mɔ tɔn nɛ gɛr-ŋmaa in o ŋgaŋa wannu.
Ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-oi ŋga tom ko o sa̧-a̧ bii ha̧ wa. A̧ mgbɔɔ wa
nɛ ŋma yuwar gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ duk nɛ́ giɔ̧-kpe-zu wa mɛ wese,
in sɔra nɛ toka zu wa mɛ zaŋ-zɛ.
A̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ ku gbɛ̧ gbatɔp nɛ korá náŋ, a̧ mgbɔɔ wa ɓir
nɛ mgbara pɛŋa-yì.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o wisɛn kɔ-wa, nɛ yì a'a̧ timgba hur nɛ wa, sɛka a̧ ŋmai wa
nɛ ndaa yì mɛ́ gbonɛ.
Hegɔ o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kaia mɔɔ-oi ko o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na.
Gasa Wan, wa bia gima zɔn nɛ nin-‘Nɛ́, nɛ ɔ sa̧-a̧ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ gima zɔn nɛ ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yora ɗoŋ wa'i.
Wen Ɗuka-taamɔ hu̧i̧a̧ nú o mukɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bur leɓe o be-geɗɛk obem.
Ɗuka-taamɔ dee ha̧ tom kɔ-wa mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, wen zu ŋma sa̧-a̧ witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧.
Wa ɓira nɛ ŋma ŋga gbara nɛ bii ɔ sɛnɛ na, ɓɛɛ wa de o tua-laa kɔ-wa
sɛn ŋma fara nɛ bii tɛ hɔ sɛnɛ nɛti na.
Wa baa zu duk nɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ndak o wi-kur-zu-wa yaknɛ.
O be-Israɛl zɔka bɔnɛ wɔ-yi, ɓɛɛ wa ai nú h’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ gbak wa.
Hegɔ yì foka nɛ zaŋ ɗuka kamta tɛnɛ ha̧ wa, nyina-ga̧-wɔyi kɔ-wa
gboo nɛ tɛ go.
Hegɔ mbɛt, kale kpɔk mɔ nɛ usa so bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ-wa'i
kifa nɛ́ mɔɔ-kpasi wa, ŋgimbi sakalamɔ.
Mɛ́ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn nɛ ha̧so nú mɛ gbɛ o zɔɗi bem ko dukbii
k’Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ‘i, Ɛnɛ ɓuta yi nɛ beka gɔn na nɛ tɔk ha̧ wa. Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o be-Israɛl, Ɛnɛ ha̧nɛ dɔka yi nɛ wa ta so na ha̧ wa.
Nɛ́ tɛ wɔ-yi nɛ gbɛɛ wa'i, Ɛ́nɛ́ usa nɛnɛ ha̧ wa heege Ɛ́nɛ́ dee so
nɛ bɔnɛ in o wisen kɔ-wa nɛ kia yi-nɔ takaɗi’ɛ ga.
Tɛ bɔnɛ n’Ɛnɛ usa ha̧ o be Israɛl, n’Ɛnɛ gɔna kita nɛ ko zu wa, Ɛnɛ dee
ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ bɔnɛ n’Ɛnɛ usa ha̧ o ɗaŋwi tɛ gɔna kita-nyimsea zu wa.
War ko o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ usa bɔnɛ ha̧ wa, hee mɔ nɛ ŋma dáà mbaŋ
nɛ tɛ o bem’ɛ ga, ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o i̧i̧-wi-nɔ‘i, Ɛnɛ ɓaa ndaa mɔ kɔ-wa vɛ́r-vɛ́r,
hee ŋma wannu nɛ dúk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gɔn ɗaŋ kita zu bii’ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ kana nɛ kale bɔnɛ a nukura wa nɛ yí o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, in nɛ nyɛia̧a mbɛt.
Hegɔ ditasee kɔ-wa gbaia dan: aia nú, ta nɛ o gba'a mɔ nɛ yaka so,
in mbɛt, ŋgimbi nɛ wa zɔka nɛnɛ‘e kpɔk mɔ nɛ nukura wa tɛɛ kifi
nɛ́ zɔm demɔ wen o be-Israɛl wó, nɛ́ hí̧í̧ a wa iŋa nɛ ti tom ko Gasa Wan.
Wi nɛ wa siŋa so pi̧ ka̧ zaŋ yi ɓeemɛ, ɓɛɛ ká wa tɛ̀ɛ́ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ woyo
zɛkɛɗi nɛnɛ'ɛ, deemɔ yek nɛ wa nɛ ɗoŋ, wen wɔ-yì nɛ gbɛɛ wa nyɛm ŋmaa in war ko o bii ko Sɔ̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ gɔɔmɔ ko o wi-nɔ‘i baa so wa pi̧ tɛ taa o ɗaŋ mgbele-mɔ nɛ dee ha̧ wa
mɛ yɔ́ kɔ́yá tɛ-wa tɛ wora o saɗi-gbur-zaŋ nɛ nu, nɛ bo nɛ ŋma taamɔ na,
in o ŋma gee ɗaŋ kókóɗó saɗi. Hegɔ Ɛnɛ toma gba gii o be-saɗi nɛ bo nɛ taamɔ na mbɛt mɛ de ŋmaa in wa.
Wen ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ ndé nɛ kale kpɔk bɔnɛ ɗaŋmɔ nɛ‘i de a tik zu wi.
Ɛr-‘Nɛ́ nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgaiamɔ lɛŋ, nɛ baa nɛ́ gee kiŋɗiŋ-mɔ de nɛ o mɔɔ-
zaŋnu’ɛ, nyɛma so mɛ tom o gba dɔka baŋgiiɗoŋ kóó o ŋga dila, a zu wa,
kóó Ɛnɛ nyɛma so mbɛt mɛ de o ŋgaŋa ndiɓa, nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk nɛti na,
nɛ pɛ nɛ da̧, nɛ nyɛma mɛ ɔ̧i̧ wee, in mɛ pɛ nɛ́ o ɗaŋ pɛr ziwee,
kóó nɛ gba̧a̧yí du nɛ wee tom nɛnɛ a zu wa.
Bó nɛ‘e nɛ́ ɗaŋ ko o saɗi nɔ‘i a tɛ̀ɛ́ kum o wi nɔ‘i ɓɛɛ na; gee bele
zɔka o saɗi nɔ‘i sɔɔgee nyɛma so mɛ zar wa gbɛ a nu nɛnɛ mbɔlɔlɔ.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o ndiɓa nɔ‘i a bó so na mbɛt, Ɛnɛ nyɛma so mɛ ndur wa
a nu nɛ gee be búk nú-‘Nɛ́ gee, sóm nɛ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’Ɛ́nɛ́ ɗoŋ wa,
in mɛ pɛsi wa sót-sót nɛ ŋga búk k’Ɛ́nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ zu-a'i bó, Ɛnɛ ɗafa mɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ wara, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ gasaa, dɔkaa in ditaa.
Zɔm ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ dúk gɛɗɛ-gɛɗɛ wese lɛŋ mɛ de tom h’Ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o'o nyɛma mɛ yor ti ken ɓaa-‘Nɛ́ o?
Nɛ mbetɛ, zaŋnu nɛ oi-aa duk ti'Nɛ́, hee gee be ɗik-ɗik fuunu
nɛ de ha̧ kilo mɛ wɛr’ɛ ga, in hee mbɛŋ-tuyɛ nɛ zur a nu’ɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk bii lɛŋ nɛ ko, wen n’Ɛnɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai zu mɔ lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔk mɔ mbɛt zɔk yak zu ɗaŋmɔ ko o bii, wen ha̧ wa mɛ kpai taamɔ kɔ-wa.
Ɛ́nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ o mɔ nɛ ya lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ sɛn ŋma mɔ kpɔk n’Ɛnɛ dea na,
wen Ɛnɛ'ɛ sɛ́n so ŋma ga’ɛ, bó nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ de so a̧ dee na.
K’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ so na, nɛ́ tɛ ge yuwar ge a ŋma mɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ duk nɛnɛ zaŋnu ge?
Kóó nɛ́ hee ge a'a̧ tɛ ɓɔn nɛnɛ zu nu, k’Ɛnɛ hok so a̧ na ge?
Ɛ́nɛ́ yor zu wa lɛŋ za̧-a̧ nɛ ko, wen wa lɛŋ nɛ́ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Gasa Wan,
Ɛ́nɛ́à Wan nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ́ duká-kpasá'ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Ɔmi k’Ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo'i, a̧-a̧ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ya kpasa.
Hegɔ mbɛt, Gasa Wan, nɛ́ tikiɗi tikiɗi Ɛnɛ usi nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ o wi nɛ tik.
Ɛnɛ gai nɛ́ wa, gbo nɛ yí ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa; gbakna, wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wa mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa h’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Nɛ́ hegɔ Ɛ́nɛ́ dee nɛnɛ in o kuti bii nɛ ɔɔ tɛ sa̧a̧ nù k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ sɛna so wa wen zu o mɔɔ-sɛ̧ɛ̧ kɔ-wa: dee o mɔɔ-dua, in o ɗaŋ dó-ɗafasɔ̧ kɔ-wa,
gbɛɛ o obem nɛ saka-yí, dee dina nyɔŋ murtɛ in tɔktɛ o bii,
nɛ oi nyak-zaŋ-wa lɛ̧ŋ; o gasa kpáŋ-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ‘i baa fara de ndiŋmɔ‘i,
o dáà in nàà nɛ gbɛ so nɛ́ o bem nɛ bo nɛ ŋgai yee ɗoŋ wa na'i,
Ɛnɛ dee so ha̧ o dáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ gbɛ wa,
wen ha̧ zikanu̧ nɛ baa see'Nɛ́ gan o dɔkaa'i mɛ kpa nɛ́ mbe bii
nɛ tɛ ya nɛ́ o kpasa bem ko Sɔ̧.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o wi-nɔ‘i mbɛt, Ɛnɛ zɔka kana wa nɛ ko, wen nɛ wa nɛ́ o bii,
ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ tom nɛ́ o dɛnɛ-ŋgandi yak ti ha̧ o wi-biro k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wen kuma wa mɔktɛ mɔktɛ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, Ɛnɛ nyɛma so mɛ tui ŋma biro pi nù, kai nɛ o ɗaŋwi
ha̧ o tanawi, kóó mɛ fo o ŋga saɗi a zu wa, kóó mɛ tok o ɗaŋ yoŋgo kum nɛ wa yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ tɛ gɔna kita hai na'i, Ɛnɛ kii so nɛ́ yuwar ha̧ wa mɛ kpai see-wa.
Zua'i, Ɛnɛ iŋa so kana nɛ dea'e wa nɛ́ o ɗaŋ kpár, dika tɛ tugun-aa mɛ,
wa koo wa nɛ oi o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa, in mbɛt nde taamɔ kɔ-wa beka kpai na ndó-ndó-ndɔ́.
Wen, mɛ nɛ́ ŋma dukbii nɛ fom baa dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ.
Ɓó nɛ́‘e Ɛnɛ yuu nɛ́ ŋma bii, bi nɛ zu o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa sɔɔgee'i na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ o'o nyɛma bɔɔ benaŋ mɛ ak'Nɛ́ nde mɛ nɛ ge Ɛ́nɛ́ dea’ɛ ge nde o?
Nɛ́ o'o tɛ bɛ̧ gɔna kita k’Ɛ́nɛ́ o? Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ o'o tɛ de wen in'Nɛ́ɛ́ wen zu feaa ko
o dukbii n’Ɛnɛ dea o? Nɛ́ o'o tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de wen in'Nɛ́ɛ́, ye nɛ ɗoŋ o ɗaŋwi o?
Ŋma Sɔ̧ nɛ hakali mɔ lɛŋ gan zu ‘Nɛ́, ɓɛɛ n’Ɛnɛ tɛ kii mɛ usi ti a̧‘e
wi gɔna kita nyɛm sɛnɛ wo’ɛ, bó na.
Ŋma wannu, kóó ŋma wan nɛtɛ, nɛ nyɛma mɛ ba zu dúk nɛ Ɛ́nɛ́,
ye nɛ ɗoŋ o wi n’Ɛnɛ aa tɛ bɔnɛ, bó na mbɛt.
Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ nɛ́ tanawi, mɛ nɛ hegɔ s’Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ
nɛ yuwar-a. Ɓɛɛ gɔna ɗaŋ kita zu bii, nɛ bɔ nɛ wen zu na, yé ŋmaa
in ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Wen deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a k’Ɛ́nɛ́‘i gbo nɛ tɛ ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́,
ɓɛɛ wan n’Ɛnɛ ɔ zu mɔ lɛŋ‘i dee h’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ ko.
Kà ŋma bii si kafɛ ɔɔ-wan k’Ɛ́nɛ́ zu mɔ lɛŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ usa ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́
ha̧ a̧, kpe nɛ nú wi-fe-ndela in'Nɛ́ɛ́‘i,
ɓɛɛ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ n’Ɛnɛ a̧-a̧ ti ha̧ ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́'ɛ, Ɛnɛ gɔn k’Ɛ́nɛ́ kita nɛ ga̧-a̧-see, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ ɔɔ wan zu yɛ nɛ mɔkasee. K’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ deemɔ lɛŋ zu ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Tɛ deemɔ hegɔ‘i, Ɛnɛ usa ha̧ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nde widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
tɛ duk kana nɛ́ sɛm ko o bii; ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ dun see o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ee-ta siti,
wen n’Ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧i̧a̧ yuwar kpaia-see oi ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ wa.
Ɛnɛ usa bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn ko o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́, o wi nɛ nyak-fio hɛra so kaɗi'i,
nɛ mu̧nyal in ko, ha̧ nɛ ŋgimbi in yuwar ha̧ wa wen siŋa ɗaŋmɔ e dúk;
ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ ɗafi wen ko o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mu̧nyal gan, ɗoŋ n’Ɛ́nɛ́ kana
nɛ mɔ, nɔ nɛ tɔk in o dáà kɔ-wa, wen ha̧o gba demɔ ha̧ wa’ɛ.
Hegɔ, Ɛnɛ usa ɗoŋ mɔ h’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ gusa o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ mu̧nyal,
wen ha̧ tɛ-yɛ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ŋgimbi lɛŋ n’ɛɛ́ gɔn kita zu bii,
in h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ e ta nɛ deeko k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ŋgimbi n’Ɛnɛ gɔn nɛ kita zu yɛ.
Mɛ nɛ hegɔ s’Ɛnɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ o wi nɛ dee so mɔɔ-mgbele ba nɛ gɔɔ
yuwar'i, nɛ kale kpɔk o mɔɔ-buu kɔ-wa'i woyo.
Wen wa yambala so tɛ gɔɔ-yuwar ɗoŋ-wa nyɛi̧; wa ba so nɛ́ o gee
sɔŋkur saɗi-nyɛr in o tumu̧i-a hee o sɔ̧ ga, ɔr nɛ tɛ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa,
hee o geɗɛk obem nɛ kɔ-ta bo na ga.
Ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ fo ŋma bɔnɛ pi̧ zu wa wen zɛkɛɗa wa, hee mɔ nɛ‘i de nɛnɛ in o mgbele obem’ɛ ga.
Hegɔ o wi, nɛ zii so mgbara o be bɔnɛ tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ‘i na, tɛ̀ɛ́ zɔk bɔnɛ mgbak ŋga kita ko Sɔ̧.
See-wa ɗaŋa nyɛmna tɛ o bɔnɛ nɛ o saɗi nɔ‘i usi ha wa'i, ɓɛɛ nɛ wa be
zɔk'e nɛ́ o saɗi nɛ wa ba so hee o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ga a de wa nɛ bɔnɛ wo,
yi-wa hu̧i̧a̧, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ ti kpasa Sɔ̧ nɛ wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ so’ɛ. Mɛ nɛ hegɔ sa gasa fom tik zu wa.
O bii lɛŋ nɛ iŋa-Sɔ̧-na baa fara kɔ̧ see-wa nɛ́ o gee tum-bíí;
tɛ zɔka o mɔ nɛ ya nɛnɛ, wa nyɛm so mɛ iŋ ti Wi nɛ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ na.
Tɛ zɔka o tom nɛ déá, wa iŋ ti Wan-dea na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ o mɔ nɛ wa ba hee o sɔ̧ ga nɛ́ o wee, búk, kóó fɛ̀ɛ́-búk, o mɔɔ-yízan,
kóó o som-yì, in o sa̧a̧mɔ lɛŋ nɛ nyɛk ŋgɔn kɛ̧ nɛ mgbara ŋgimbi
Kà bó nɛ dèé ko o mɔ nɔ‘i a ɔr o wi nɔ‘i, mɛ ba nɛ wa hee o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ga,
wa'a iŋ hee mɔ nɛ Wan-de o mɔ nɔ‘i gana nɛ wa ga mbɛt,
wen nɛ́ Wi nɛ́ dúk nɛ tugun dèé, a dee wa.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ boo nɛ ŋgai in o tom ko o mɔ nɔ‘i a zik yí-wa, nɛ́ wa'a iŋ
hee mɔ nɛ Wi nɛ dee wa a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai gan wa ga.
Wen kà‘i mbaɗi gasi in dée ko o mɔ féé, ɓɛɛ wi iŋa ti Wi-de-wa.
Ɓɛɛ wi nyɛm mɛ dɔk wen a zu o wi nɔ‘i gan batɛ na mbɛt:
ŋmafara, wa yɔɔ kaya tɛ yuwar kia Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa mɛ kpa A̧‘i.
Tɛ dukaa mgbara o mɔ nɔ‘i, wa mbaɗa wa féé, ɓɛɛ o gee gi̧ɔ̧ mɔ nɔ‘i ɔr wa,
wen o mɔɔ zaŋnu ɔ dee nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ kóó hegɔ‘i mbɛt, wi beka e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa ha̧ wa na.
Wa yamba o mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ hegɔɔɔ, wa ye nɛ tɛ yamba o ɗɔɔkɔri mɔɔ-zaŋnu;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ge a dee bɔɔ ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ nɛ ti Wan-de o mɔ nɔ‘i nɛti na ge?
Ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ a̧-a̧ zu o wi nɛ ee ta nɛ o fio-mɔ‘i: wa baa o mɔɔ-de-nɛ-er
hee o sɔ̧ ga; mɔ nɛ wa dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi, nɛ‘i ɓoo nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ nɛ hɔɔ
ŋmaa in o saɗi, kóó ŋma gee ta nɛ ŋma bii sɛka so ɓeemɛ.
Hegɔ mbɛt ŋma wi-sɛk-te ɓira te nɛ diti na, a̧ gbɛra io-a lɛŋ yinɛ nɛ dea,
a̧ ɗafa ɗoŋ-a nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee nɛ nyɛk nɛ bii de nɛ tom wese lɛŋ.
Ɓɛɛ, nɛ ko o sɛɓɛla-a, a̧ kai wa a ɗɔ wee wen gii nyɔŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɔŋ mɔ zaŋ súr.
Oi-aa nɛ ɓon nɛ́ wan nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ de nɛ ŋma mɔ na, wen mɛ nɛ ŋma
gɔɔ-te nɛ duk kpóɗó-kpo-kpóɗó. A̧ ba ŋgona-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ sɛka ɗaŋ nɛ ŋgimbi.
A̧ gbɛr a̧ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ ŋgɔna te'i mɛ hɔ ŋmaa in bii,
kóó ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk hee ŋma gee tumui̧ saɗi ga. A̧ sɔ̧ kui tɛ te'i, a̧ gɔna dap
sɛnɛ nɛ gbɛ̧ mɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ yɔka tɛ-a kpɛɗɛ-kpɛɗɛ kpe zu o ɗaŋ dap-aa lɛŋ.
A̧ tɛ ɗafi de fara ha̧ a̧, a baa a̧ e zaŋ ŋgeŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ mgboia a̧ nɛ boi e sɛnɛ.
A̧ ɗafi mɔ lɛŋ hegɔ nɛti, ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔfi tik nu, wen n'a̧-a̧ iŋa nde te'i nyɛm
mɛ gbak tɛ nɛ tɛ na, wen mɛ nɛ́ ŋma gee sɛka-te nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nde wi tɔn a̧ tɔni.
Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'aa kɔfi mɔ wen kpaa mbɔi, baa koo in kpaa bem,
foe de a̧ tɛ aka mɔ er fio-mɔ‘i na. A̧ ak hayatɛ er mɔ nɛ bó nɛ ŋgai na.
A̧ kɔfi duká-kpasá sɛn er fio-mɔ, A̧ ai nú ha̧ ŋma mɔ nɛ nyɛm mɛ gbak
bii na mɛ pɛm a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee o nɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko ŋma mɔ nɛ nyɛm mɛ hu̧i̧ naŋ baɗúk na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ kpa mɔ nɛ tɛ kasi a̧, ha̧ tom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ nɛ siti, in mɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-tom
mɛ er-a, a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ kɔfi kɔfa ŋgai er mɔ nɛ bó nɛ gee gba̧a̧-er na.
Ŋma bii woyo kura kɔ‘i nɛ kombon mɛ yar nɛ zu o ŋga pɛŋa-yì gbatɔp,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ kɔfi nɛ gee te, nɛ ɓuka gan kombon nɛ ba a̧ yar nɛnɛ‘i.
Wen kombon'i, nɛ́ wɔ-mbɔi a dee ha̧‘i mɛ ta mɔ de nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ gɔna kɔ-ta ko wi-sɛk-te a dee a̧.
Mɔ kpɔk, nɛ́ ɗafamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Dáà, a̧ ba a̧ nɛ́ nɛ nɔ ɛ̧ wa. Ɛnɛ mbaŋa yuwar
zu gbatɔp, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ mbaŋ de bɔtɔ-ɓɔtɔ war nɛ poo o ŋga pɛŋa-yì,
mɛ usi nde Ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ kpasi bii tɛ ŋgaŋamɔ lɛŋ, kóó wi’ɛi a iŋ tom yi na, bá nɛ kombon mbɛt.
Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ ha̧ o tom ko Ɗuka-taamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ de geemɔ mbulɛɛ na.
Mɛ nɛ́ hegɔ sa bii ee nɛ ta nɛ gee be te, ɓɛɛ ká wa ku nɛ o ŋga pɛŋa-yì
gbatɔp nɛ zu gee saŋa-te, ŋma mɔ ndɔ wa na’ɛ.
Hegɔ mbɛt, tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a ɓeemɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ o gba kusa-wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ kuma
nɛnɛ, ɓɛ́ mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ko bii duka so nɛ́ zu gee saŋa-te, n’Ɛnɛ baa yar nɛ
zu yi, ɓɛɛ ká de nɛnɛ ha̧ mbe kpár o mɔɔ-zaŋnu mɛ ya nɛ kpasa siti’ɛ.
De yoŋgo a dúk zu saŋa-te nɛ dee ha̧ déémɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧‘i.
Ɓɛɛ fom a tik zu gee sɔ̧ nɛ bii dee nɛ er'i, in zu wi nɛ dee a̧ mbɛt:
ko wi’ɛi, nɛ́ wen n'aa sɛka a̧, ɓɛɛ, kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ́ wen n'aa nɛ́ geemɔ nɛ tɛ ɓuk ɓuk'i nɛ‘i tɛɛ sa'e sɔ̧‘i.
Wen Sɔ̧ sɛna ɗaŋwi in tom kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ wi tɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ widetom'i, gu nɛ mɔ n'aa dee mbɛt.
Sɔ̧ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ de ŋmaa in o geesɔ̧ ko o dukbii, wen wa kifa nɛ́ ŋma mɔɔ-nyɛr
mgbara o mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea, mɔɔ-ir-bii a tɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ŋma pɛ́r nɛ‘i tuia ɗɔɔ naŋ
o mgbele-wi.
Ku̧u̧naŋ ee kpasa Sɔ̧ dúk tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ tɛ taamɔ sɛka o gi̧ɔ̧ geesɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ o mbe tom nɛ wa foo gbɔnɛ‘i ɗáŋ dukaa ko o bii.
O giɔ̧ geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i ya so nɛti tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ mɛ na, ɓɛɛ wa beka ɓɔn yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧ na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ tumui̧ taamɔ ko o bii a dee ha̧ wa mɛ ye zaŋnu, hegɔ mbɛt kaɗaa kɔ-wa tɛ duk nɛ́ gee gɔma-yí.
Ŋma dáà wan bem nɛ see ɗaŋa wen zu bem nɛ fee nɛ mbui tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e
wa'a sɛk giɔ̧ tɛ bem kɔ‘i, nɛ fio baa nɛ haya'i. Ɓɛɛ kinii, a̧ tɛɛ gasi nɛ́ mɔ
nɛ duka so nɛ ge wɔr’ɛ, hee ŋma sɔ̧ ga. Hegɔ ɓɛɛ a̧ e nɛ ŋma yuwar ɗafa-sɔ̧‘i in o dó-a, ha̧ o bii kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ zɛ be dɔk, ɗaŋ yuwar dee dómɔ‘i baa fara tɛ-wi, hee ŋma heembea ga.
Nɛ́ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt in doole nɛ o wannu dee nɛ o bii mɛ gasi nɛ o sɛka-te’ɛ.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ ɗoŋ o wannu nɔ‘i ɔ so nyɛia̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ wa nyɛm so mɛ gasi wa
nɛ gba̧a̧yi-wa na ga, wa yaa nɛ nyɛia̧a ta nɛ dukaa kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa sɛk giɔ̧-tɛ
wannu nɛ wa gasi'i e ka tɛ wa, gɔm nɛ er ti bee-a, hee a̧ a̧-a̧ nɛ gba̧a̧yí-a sɛn hi̧i̧ ga.
Kóó o wi nɛ iŋ so wannu'i nɛti na tɛ gas'a̧ hu̧r nɛ nin-a̧ dam nu,
wen wɔ dee polamɔ ko wi-sɛk-mɔ‘i.
Wen, hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wi’ɛi kii so kana ha̧ wannu mɛ zɔk wi nɛ de yí zɔ̧i̧i̧ ga,
a̧ ha̧ŋgai tɛ-a lɛŋ ha̧ sɛkamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i mɛ poli gan kiitɛ saŋayí-wannu.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ gba de pólá tom'i baa see o bii, ɓɛɛ wa ye tɛ gasa wi
nɛ wa tu̧ so nɛ tɛ-a ɓɛɛ‘i, hee sɔ̧ ga.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a bii tika nɛnɛ yí pɛ́r, ŋgimbi nɛ o bɔnɛ zaŋnu in ŋgaŋamɔ
ko o wannu dee nɛnɛ ha̧ wa mɛ a nin nɛ‘i nyɛm mɛ sa ha̧ bii na
ha̧ mɔ nɛ wa dee nɛ ta in nɛ te.
Yɔɔkaya tɛ yuwar kia Sɔ̧‘i nyɛm wa na, ɓɛɛ zu iŋa mgbara mɔ kɔ-wa na
nɛ dak wen pi zu wa'i, wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ sa kɔ-wa o ɗaŋmɔ nɔ‘i'e mɔɔ-ha̧-ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wa gbɛ nɛ́ o obem ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧, wa dee nɛ́ o hu̧sa dómɔ.
Wa gbɛ nɛ́ o dɔ̧ɔ̧-dawa, de nɛ o kpokomɔ.
Hegɔ, wa de kii tɛ bii, kà bó nɛ kasa yuwar baaŋmaa ɓɔna.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ e nɛ́ ɗɔra tɛ wi’ɛ́ɛ́ gbɛ nɛ a̧, kóó baa nɛ́ koo kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dala.
Mɔ ya ɗutukui dam fara lɛŋ: tɔk in gbɛɛ-zu, zu̧zu̧ in deemɔ nɛ see
yiitoo, yee ŋmaa nɛ ti fu̧i̧, dee gɔɔmɔ, ɗaŋa mgbara bii, yora ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú kɔ‘i na,
zɔka mɔ lɛŋ a zu ŋmaa, zɔna mɔ na, ndiŋ-see, baa ŋmaa ko o wiwii
in o wiwii, o okóò in okóò, dee dala, in dee o ndiŋmɔ.
Wora o geesɔ̧ nɛ bó so nɛ nin na, nɛ́ ku̧u̧naŋ ɗaŋmɔ, gun-aa in gbɛɛ zu-a.
Ŋmafara, tortɛ pi̧ nɛ́ o wigasi o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i de nɛ nyɛŋɛ gan kere,
kóó wa dee ndela nɛ nin-Sɔ̧, kóó wa dee nɛ́ gɔɔmɔ, kóó wa yor nɛnɛ ɗoŋ kanamɔ kɔ-wa hɔ ti na.
Wen, hee mɔ nɛ wa e so ta nɛ o geesɔ̧ nɛ yaa nɛ fio-mɔ ga,
wa ta kɔ-wa'e ŋma ɗaŋmɔ beka tik zu wi wen zu kanamɔ-ndela kɔ‘i'i na.
Ɓɛɛ ŋga kita tɛ tik wa zu mɔ yiitoo: wen nɛ wa hɛra tɛ-wa nɛ o sɛka-te
e kpasa Sɔ̧ dúk, in wen nɛ wa gɔna tɛ-wa kan nɛ o mɔɔ-ndela de nɛ mɔŋgono.
Bó nɛ́ ŋgai ko o mɔ nɛ o ɗaŋwi kan a de ŋmaa in wa na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ bɔnɛ
nɛ dúk wen o ɗaŋwi'i a ndak ɗoŋ wa.
Ɓɛɛ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ dee, ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ yor ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nú k’Ɛ́nɛ́ yor,
Ɛnɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ munyal, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ko.
Kóó ɛɛ de ɗaŋmɔ, ɛɛ tɛ ɓɔn kana nɛ́ k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wen ɛ́ɛ́ iŋa'e Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Wan k’ɛ́ɛ́
ɓɛɛ, hee mɔ n’ɛɛ́ iŋa'e ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ́ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ ga, ɛ́ɛ́ beka de ɗaŋmɔ‘i na.
Iŋa'e Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ a mgbɔ nɛ bii sitɛ kpasa deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
ɓɛɛ iŋa'e Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ wan zu ɛɛ nɛ́ gun duká-kpasá kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O mbe ɗaŋ tom nɛ o bii foo gbonɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yɔ na; kóó tumui̧ tom
ko o wi-gɔn-dap nɛ de nɛ́ gi̧ɔ̧-bii gɔn nɛ dap zaŋa-nyaŋa sɛnɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ yɔ na mbɛt;
zɔka o mɔ nɔ‘i zik nɛ zu o mgbelewi mɛ kɔ̧ wa, ɓɛɛ dee ha̧ wa mɛ nyɛŋgí gee tumui̧ gi̧ɔ̧ fio-mɔ.
Ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ de o pɛrti mɔ nɔ‘i, o wi nɛ de wɔ wa, kóó nɛ gasi wa hee sɔ̧ ga,
nɛ́ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ nyɛma so kana ha̧ mɔɔ-oi pɛrti tumui̧ ee-ta'i mɛ kpa wa.
Ɛnɛ zɔk ŋma wi-ɓu-kpana nɛ va̧i̧ gii nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ ɓuu nɛ o yí-nyɛk nɛtɛ nɛtɛ
h’ɛ́ɛ́ wen dea tom k’ɛɛ'ɛ: nɛ́ kalɛ kpɔk gii'i a'a̧ ɓu nɛ o nyɛk wen dea o kpasa
tom, in o wan mɛ dea gee tom mbɛt, kana lɛŋ hee ŋmaa ga;
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi-ɓu-kpana'i a hok o tom nɛ‘i tɛ de nɛ wa kpɔk kpɔk.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa, a̧ yee tɛ dee ŋma ɗaŋ mgbele tom, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa kale kpɔk gii'i ɓó
nɛ́ ŋma ɗaŋ geesɔ̧. Zua'i, a̧ nɛ́ bii nɛ gboo nɛ tɛ nu, zɛ dɔk na, ɓɛɛ nɛ dekpaa
sia ɗoŋ sitɛ nu n'aa gboo nɛnɛ‘i, ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ ak nɛ ɔmi kɔ‘i er-a̧.
Ha̧ a̧ mɛ ta nɛ mɔ wen zu fio n'aa tɛ fe, in zu dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu,
nɛ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi na, bó na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba nɛ zu-a we nɛ o widuilɔr in bumbɔi,
zɔk nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ ko wi-kpai̧-ndɛrɛ; a̧ ŋmaŋ nɛ́ tɛ-a tɛ duia gee kókóɗó mɔ‘i.
See-a nɛ́ gee bùk, ee-ta kɔ̧-a̧ dee geemɔ gan fuunu, ɓɛɛ duká-kpasá kɔ̧-a̧ de nyɛr tɛ wi gan gii.
Wen a̧ iŋ ti Wi nɛ dee a̧ na, a̧ iŋ ti Wi nɛ ha̧ɔmi nɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ de tom,
ɔmi nɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk kpasa'i na mbɛt.
A̧ zɔk kɔ̧-a̧ duká-kpasá k’ɛ́ɛ́ hee mɔɔ-saa ga. Kɔ̧-A̧, dukaa zaŋnu nɛ́ ŋma
lumɔ ba mɔ nɛ ŋgai. A̧ hee ge nde, ɔ dee mɛ kpa mɔ, kóó nɛ ge yuwar ge nde
lɛŋ, kóó nɛ dea, kóó nɛ ɗaŋa mbɛt.
Wi’ɛi iŋa kana nɛ dea gan bii lɛŋ nde wi de nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ tɛ baa fuunu
mɛ ɓu nɛ o kɛsa-nyɛk in o geesɔ̧‘i.
Ɓɛɛ o wisɛn nɛ dee ŋga bɔnɛ nɛ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ usa'e wi nɛ o mgbelewi,
in o wi nɛ taamɔ ɗuk na, hee o geɗɛk obem ga.
Wa baa nɛ́ o geesɔ̧ ko o dukbii zaŋnu hee sɔ̧ kɔ-wa ga. Gba̧a̧yí-wa a̧-a̧
sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk mɔ na, kɔ̧zɔ-wa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa ɔm nɛnɛ na,
zer-wa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ ɓɛɛ wa zii mɔ na, waza-er-wa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tam mɔ na,
naŋ-wa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ba wa nɛ́ nɛ nɔ na.
Wen, nɛ́ ŋma bii a dee wa, nɛ́ bii nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ gɔni ɔmi a ɓoo wa. Zua'i bó,
ŋma bii zaŋnu nɛ nyɛma mɛ ɓo ŋma sɔ̧ nɛ tɛ hɔ ŋmaa in a̧ nɛ tɛ-a bó na.
A̧ nɛ́ fio, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ de nɛ ŋdiŋ er-a'i, nɛ́ gee fio-mɔ mbɛt.
A̧ nɛ tɛ-a, a̧ gana zu o mɔ n'aa gasi'i: kɔ̧-a̧, a kpaa kɔ̧-a̧ ɔmi, ɓɛɛ wa beka
kpa kɔ-wa gee ŋma be-ɔmi'i na ndó-ndó-ndó.
Wa gasi nɛ́ o gee ndiŋ saɗi-sɛ̧ɛ̧ hee sɔ̧ ga, o saɗi nɛ mgbela mgbeli gan o dɔkaa lɛŋ.
Ŋma gee be demɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ ba see-wi tɛ zɔka o saɗi nɔ‘i, hee sɛn tɛ
o ŋma saɗi ga bó na. Wa kpa ŋma be zɔnamɔ in de yoŋgo ko Sɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hegɔ sa Sɔ̧ de ha̧ o ŋma saɗi nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in o ndiŋ saɗi nɔ‘i mɛ usi
bɔnɛ ha̧ wa, in ha̧ gba gii kókóɗómɔ mɛ nukuri wa.
Ɓɛɛ war ko dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ de bɔnɛ in wa na, Ɛnɛ dee nɛ́ o demɔ in wa.
Ha̧ mɛ ga̧ nɛ nú nga wo kɔ-wa, Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧nɛ́ o kpaŋanaŋa nɛ ya nɛ́ o de nyɔɔ̧ mɔɔnyɔŋ ha̧ wa.
Hegɔ, kóó zu wɔ nɛ gbɛɛ so o be-Egyptɛ‘i, dika tɛ zɔka o ndiŋ saɗi
n’Ɛnɛ toma a zu wa'i, wɔ gboo tɛ wa.
Ɓɛɛ, nɛ ko o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ɗoŋ be zima-nú nɛ wa zima, Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧nɛ́ gba de nyɔɔ̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa.
Nyɛma so kana ha̧ gasa kaɓa mɛ tik zu o be-Egyptɛ, ɓɛɛ gee zɔka bɔnɛ nɛ
dikiɗi o wisɛn kɔ-wa'i nyɛma so kɔ‘i o be-Israɛl.
Ɓɛɛ kóó ŋgimbi nɛ ŋga nyimsea ko o saɗi-da̧ tika nɛnɛ zu o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́,
ká o dɔwɔ́k ŋga gɔ́k gɔm nɛ o ŋma mbɛt gbɛ'ɛ, nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́‘i ŋgai zu wa hɔ ti na.
Mɛ́ mbaŋ tɛ-wa, Ɛ́nɛ́ pi̧i̧ be kii tɛ wa tɛ be ŋgimbi tikiɗi, ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ e ŋma
mɔɔ-usi-yuwar-kpasa ti wa, wen ha̧ tɛ-wa mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ o geŋa Heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Wen wi nɛ zik so tɛ sitɛ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ‘i lɛŋ kpasá. Bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-usi-mɔ
n'aa zoka'i a kpasa a̧ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̧, Wan-kpasi-bíí lɛŋ.
Hegɔ‘i, Ɛ́nɛ́ usa ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛ́ɛ́ nde nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ a kpasi bii yi ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ.
O wisɛn nɔ‘i kuma lɛŋ wen zu da̧-nú o gba-doya in o gba-zí̧í̧, ŋma nyina
mɛ kpasi nɛ wa bó na, wen nyɛma so kana sɛnɛ ha̧ o pɛrti saɗi nɔ‘i mɛ usi bɔnɛ ha̧ wa.
Ɓɛɛ ko o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́, kóó gakɛ-nin o ŋga gɔ́k nyɛm so mɛ ziɓi wa na,
wen deako k’Ɛ́nɛ́ gbaka wa, ɓɛɛ kpasi wa.
Nyɔŋa wa nɛ gɔk nyɔŋa'i dee ha̧ tɛ-wa mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wen k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Mɔ kpɔk, Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasa wa nɛ hayaa, wen ká tɛ-wa tɛ̀ɛ́ bi ɗoŋ mɔ nyɛi,
ɓɛɛ ká wa tɛ̀ɛ́ gbo ɗɔɔ dee demɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Kóó ŋma zɔ̧ kóó ŋma nɔ̧ kpasi wa na, kana nɛ́ wen k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ kpasi mɔ lɛŋ'ɛ ɓɛɛ, Gasa Wan.
Ɛnɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai zu duká-kpasá in fio. Ɛ́nɛ́ zir bii si ye ko fio,
ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ baa a̧ daŋnɛ́ mbɛt.
Bíí nyɛma mɛ de ɗaŋ gbɛ nɛ ŋma wi. Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ fo ɔmi nɛ gboo kaɗi
piinɛ ɗoŋ woyo ɓɔ na, a̧ nyɛm mɛ ba sɔ̧tɛ nɛ yaka kaɗi piinɛ e oi-aa na.
Wi nyɛm mɛ gbo kɔ̧-ɛr-‘Nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ gusa o wi nɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ iŋa'Nɛ́ nɛ ŋgai mɛ wii-er-‘Nɛ́: o koro in o ɓɔrɔ
nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk nɛti na, in o ŋga ndiɓa-koro tika zu wa, ɓɛɛ wee kum wa gbuɗuk.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ yeka bii gan nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: nɛ́ sɛn ɗɔɔ yì nɛ bi mɔ bii’ɛ a wee tɛ̀ɛ̀
dár dar siti woyo, wen mɔɔ-zaŋnu lɛŋ de so nɛ biro zu widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a
Ŋma, leɓe-wee de ɓɛɛ ga̧-a̧ ká‘a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ dɔ o saɗi nɛ tika zu o wi-iŋ-Sɔ̧-na'i,
ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk mɛ iŋ nde nɛ́ kita ko Sɔ̧ a dikiɗi wa.
Ŋma mbɛt, mgbak ɗɔɔ yì‘i, leɓe-wee'i tɛɛ ɓoɓi dar nɛnɛ siti
gan deemɔ ko gee wee, mɛ dɔ o nyɔnɔ zu nù ko o wi-iŋ-Sɔ̧-na yinɛ.
Ɓɛɛ, nɛ ko dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛ́nɛ́ kɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o betom k’Ɛ́nɛ́
mɛ yiwese ha̧ wa; Ɛ́nɛ́ toma nɛ́ ŋma dɔ́ɔ́ brɛd, nɛ wa pi̧ er-wa tɛ tom-aa na,
ha̧ wa, nɛ yiwese mɛ. Mɛ nɛ́ ŋma brɛd nɛ nyɔ-aa gana kere,
ɓɛɛ nɛ ɔ so nyɔɔ̧ nú bii lɛŋ.
Nyɔŋmɔ, n’Ɛnɛ ha̧so ha̧ wa'i, usí nɛ́ deemɔkamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ sitɛ o bem
k’Ɛ́nɛ́. Ɓɛɛ a̧ kpai so kana nyɔɔ̧-a̧ nyɛm nɛ kɔ̧-nú o nde lɛŋ nɛ nyɔŋ a̧.
Kóó zua nɛ nyɔŋmɔ‘i dúk so hee dɔmbɔrɔ in ɓɔrɔ ga'i, a̧ ɓɔn so kana
nɛ ŋgaia ti wee, ɓɛɛ a̧ yeli na mbɛt. Hegɔ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ hee mɔ nɛ wee
nɛ dara nɛ poo ɓɔrɔ ká o pa̧i̧-a bu̧i̧ nɛ ɗɔ koro nɛnɛ‘i,
dɔɔ nɛ o nyɔnɔ ko o wisɛn yinɛ ga.
Ɓɛɛ ha̧ o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ kpa war mɔɔ-nyɔŋ kɔ-wa, kpɔk wee'i
iŋ so oi ŋgai dɔɔ-mɔ kɔ‘i ɓɔ na.
Mɔ n’Ɛ́nɛ́ dea nɛ dúk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de tom h’Ɛ́nɛ́, Wi-de-a̧‘i, daka zu wen usa
bɔnɛ ha̧ o ɗaŋwi, ɓɛɛ tɛ-mɛ de demɔ in o wi nɛ e ta nɛ Ɛ́nɛ́.
Kalea a̧‘i sa a̧ dúk dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpai nɛ mɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ; a̧ dee tom kpɔk in ha̧a̧mɔ
k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ ta-tɛ, dai nɛ o bii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ o nde kpɔk kpɔk kɔ̧ɔ̧.
Gasa Wan, sɛn tɛ mɔ‘i o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ n’Ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ nde, bó nɛ o nyɔnɔ
nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ‘i de a dai bii na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen k’Ɛ́nɛ́ a de dea ha̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔa h’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ya kpasa.
Mɔ nɛ wee dɔ na yeli so yelaa ɗɔɔ gee gbɛŋmɔ naŋ-wese,
wen ha̧‘i mɛ iŋ nde ɔ dee ha̧ bii mɛ gbo tuyɛ wen gasa Ɛ́nɛ́, in mɛ kpa'Nɛ́ tɛ daŋa-wese.
Ɓɛɛ ee-ta ko wi-zɔn-mɔ-ná tɛ yeli hee dɔmbɔrɔ ɓar ga, a̧ tɛ fok hee ŋma gee ɗaŋ ndiŋ yì ga.
Gasa Wan, o taamɔ k’ Ɛ́nɛ́ ɔ ɗuka, wi zii mgbara wa yɛkɓɛlɛk na mbɛt.
Kalɛa a̧‘i̧ sa o wi nɛ iŋ ŋma mɔ na yɔ kaya.
O wi nɔ‘i nɛ iŋ‘Nɛ́ na'i ta so nɛ mɔ mɛ gbɔsi sa̧-a̧ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ si ɗɔɔ.
Wa ɔ so nɛ nu ɗɔɔ tum, hee wi-zɔɓɔ ga; nyɛia̧ ɗoŋ zɛ hɛra wa hee o bara ga,
ɓɛɛ tum kpe wa e kɔ̧ tua; wa bó nɛ ɗɔɔ ɗafamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ ɓɔ na.
Wa ta so kɔ-wa'e ndaa o hu̧sa-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ̀ɛ́ tu̧, wen zu bii-ɗoŋ-tɛ-mɔ k
ko bii nɛ kpe zu mɔ hee laa-babir ga’ɛ. Gba kii nɛ hɛra zaŋ-wa pɛsa wa sót-sót
ɓɛɛ bele o ŋma mɔ nɛ wa zɔk so hee hɔɔ-tɛ-bíí ga zár wa.
Tum nɛ kpe zu wa hee di̧ ga dor wa tɛ dee kii na, o giti mɔɔ-pi-kii deemɔ
dam ka tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk so nɛ o ŋma mɔ nɛ ya nyara-nyiri hee o sɔ̧-fio ga.
Ŋma ŋga wee nɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɛk ee zu wa bo na, tokaa ko o sɔra zarara
nyɛm so mɛ ha̧ ŋma be sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i mɛ zaŋ-zɛ kii'i na.
Kana nɛ́ ŋma saŋa-wee nɛ ba nɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ kii tɛ bii a wa zɔk ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ wa zɔk mɔ‘i ɓɔna a bele zar nɛ wa siti, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ wa zɔk lɛŋ
tɛɛ pi̧ nɛ́ kii tɛ wa gan woyo.
O mɔɔkifi ko wan-gbana bo gee boaa nɛ ŋgai ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ duka-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧‘e
“wi iŋa mɔ nyɛmna wo'i” tɛɛ dak nɛ́ foe pi zu a̧.
O wi nɛ tɔ̧ so'e “wi nyɛma mɛ ndak zɛɛ-kii in o zɛɛ-sakalamɔ tɛ o bii wo’ɛ”,
tɛɛ tik nɛ gasa zɛɛ-kii nɛ dee ha̧ mami mɛ mam nɛ wa woyo.
Ɓɛɛ kóó ŋma mɔ-sakali-wi a ká bo kɔ‘i mɛ pi kii tɛ-wa na mbɛt,
gee giti naŋ o saɗi in dɔma fɔ̧i̧ ko o gɔ́k nyɛma so mɛ zar wa nɛ bele a nu.
Wa fe fee ko kii, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ gee kɔ̧ɔ̧ hu̧i̧a̧ yí-wa mɛ zɔk tum nɛ ŋma be yuwar yuu mɔ ti a̧ bo gee boaa ha̧ wa na mbɛt'i na.
Ɗaŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ-sedaako bele ko bii, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ dak nɛ wen pi̧ zu wi nɛ zu-wi
woyo. O taamɔ nɛ de biro kɔ̧ see-a̧ ŋmáŋ nɛ́ zaŋ o ŋgamɔ n'aa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ.
Wen, kà mbɔzu-wi gbak bii tɛ taamɔ ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ kii hɔa.
Kà bii e ta-wi nɛ gbakamɔ‘i batɛ ɓɔ na, ɓɛɛ kiaa mɛ iŋ ndaa mɔ nɛ ɓili wi'i
tɛɛ ŋgai ŋgai woyo.
Ɓɛɛ wa lɛŋ, wa ɔɔ nɛ́ kale kpɔk yá mɛ zaŋ-zɛ ŋmana-see nɛ daŋa nɛ ye-kii ko o fio mɛ‘i.
Ŋma, nɛ́ o zaka-ziki sɔ̧-fio a ndak so wa, ŋma mbɛt, nɛ́ tɛ-wa a mɔk
gbɛlɛ-suwɛɛ kár nɛ wa, wen nɛ kii tika zu wa gbaŋa-nyaŋa.
Hegɔ mbɛt, wi nɛ a̧-a̧ so hi̧i̧ lɛŋ tika nu, ɓɛɛ wa kpe wa, a̧ kɔ̧ ŋma tua-zɔɓɔ nɛ‘i ŋgasi nú-a na.
Kóó a bó nɛ́ wi-gɔm-fɔ, wi-kɔr-mɔdai, kóó ŋma bii nɛ de nɛ́ ŋga tom sɛn
ŋga gbara mɛ, nɛ́ kale kpɔk ŋgaŋamɔ a tika zu wa,
wen, nɛ́ kpɔk nyak-tum a hɛra wa lɛŋ. Giti búk, de gɛr gima ko o nɔi̧
poo o da̧-a̧ te, giti foka-yi nɛ demɔ nɛ ŋgai,
giti ta nɛ ai piinɛ nɛ zaŋ kaya mɛ, giti ndɔraa ko o ŋma saɗi nɛ‘i zɔk na,
bembaa ko o ŋga bokonam, kóó o yaŋgaya tigɛr nɛ demɔ tɛnɛ nɛ kɔ̧ kaya mɛ,
o mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ hɛra zaŋ-wa nɛ kii.
Wen sa̧a̧mɔ toka lak-lak dam zu nu lɛŋ, o nde lɛŋ de nɛ o tom kɔ‘i,
hee mɔ nɛ see kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Ŋga dik-dik tum tika tikaa zu wa ɓɛɛ, kana hee saa-nú tum nɛ zɛm wa'i ga. Mɔ kpɔk, nɛ́ tɛ-wa a tɛɛ diti ditaa woyo gan tum'i.
Gasa sa̧a̧mɔ a̧-a̧ so sɛnɛ wen o sa̧-a̧ bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ o be Egyptɛ zii so kɔ‘i nɛ́
gɛr-wa sɔɔgee, wa zɔk gee zɔka zizi-wa na. Wa tɔ̧ so tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e o be Israɛl ya nɛ
desee wen nɛ wa zɔk kɔ-wa bɔnɛ‘i mbɛt na'i.
O be-Egyptɛ zɔna wa wen nɛ wa kii so mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ oi bɔnɛ nɛ wa zɔka na
ɓɛɛ wa gɔm er ti wa, wen zu ŋgamɔ nɛ wa dee sitɛ wa'i.
Ɓɛɛ oi tum, Ɛ́nɛ́ toma nɛ́ nyɛka leɓe-wee ha̧ o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk ti ha̧ wa
si ŋma fara nɛ wa iŋ na, in ga̧-a̧ wese nɛ duka zu wa tɛ gasa gbina ye kɔ-wa.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o i̧i̧ wi nɔ‘i, nyɛma so kana sɛnɛ ha'i mɛ dor sa̧a̧mɔ tɛ nyɛkaa
zu wa in ha̧ tum mɛ kpe zu wa, wen wa kaia o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ bara,
o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ ba sa̧a̧mɔ Heembea nɛ bi na ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɛnɛ zaŋnu’ɛ.
Wa ee so nú-wa mɛ gbɛ o zɔɗi-bem ko o sa̧a̧ bii, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ŋma zɔɗi-bem
kpɔk, nɛ‘i baa so siŋ e kpɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ a kpasa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɛɛ mɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ‘i,
Ɛnɛ kaia gba gii o bem kɔ-wa yinɛ er-wa, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ kum wa lɛŋ gbuɗuk sɛn ɗɔɔ ŋga ŋmaia-yi.
O zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ iŋa so kɔ‘i zɛ‘i nɛti, wen kà tɛ-wa mbaŋ ɗoŋ o kanamɔ
kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ká wa dee nɛ́ nyɛŋɛ wese'i nɛ kpee-see.
Dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ zɛma zɛ‘i, hee wese kpasaa ko o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
in wese tikaa ko o wisɛn ga.
Hegɔ, kpɔk mɔ n’Ɛnɛ usa nɛ bɔnɛ ha̧ o wisɛn k’ɛɛ‘i tɛɛ kifi nɛ́ mɔɔ-hu̧r
nin-yɛ, wen n’Ɛnɛ sa so nɛ́ ɛ́ɛ́ sitɛ‘Nɛ́.
O sa̧-a̧ bezaŋ tanawi ɗafa Sɔ̧ nɛ ti-fu̧i̧, ɓɛɛ wa e nú-wa lɛŋ kpɔk,
kɔ̧ nɛ ɗɔɔ heembea ko Sɔ̧ nɛ tɔ̧ nde: “o sa̧a̧ bii tɛ iŋ kana nɛ kpɔk kale
o demɔ in o bɔnɛ mbɛt wɔ‘i”, ɓɛɛ wa ŋma nú-wa tɛ o gima-zɔn-Sɔ̧ ko o zɔmdáà.
Hiɗimɔ ko o wisɛn sɔia kpoowoyoo sitɛ wa, ɓɛɛ tigɛr o wi nɛ ai nú,
hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ bem yaŋgi yaknɛ sɔ̧i̧i̧.
Kale kpɔk bɔnɛ tika zu bara in dàá-bara, gee bii zɔk so nɛ́ kpɔk bɔnɛ in wannu.
Wa lɛŋ hee o ŋmaa ga, wa a̧-a̧ so nɛ gba dɔka wɔr nɛ‘i nyɛm so mɛ tɔr na,
nɛ fee nɛ́ kale kpɔk fio. Ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ ɓɔna kpasa nyɛm so gee nyɛmaa mɛ
gun wa na, wen o bezaŋ-wa, yaa-dua-see-wa, kuma lɛŋ gbuɗuk, hee gɔma-yí ga
Tɛ feaa ko o kaya bem kɔ-wa'i, wa nɛ o mɔɔdua mgbee so zer-wa mɛ bɛ̧
nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔɔwen’ɛ zɔka nɛ sa̧-a̧ nde dukbii'i nɛ́ o bem ko Sɔ̧.
Mɔ lɛŋ yaa selele, ká bindi-zɛ dee so kaɗi.
Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Wen k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgaiamɔ lɛŋ kura zu kiti-wan
mɛ yiwese mɛ, ɓɛɛ ndɔr hee ŋma ŋga wi-biro nɛ bó nɛ kó na ga,
tik zu nu nɛ fom baa'i;
A̧ kasa nɛ geŋa k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ nyɛm mɛ kpai na'i er-a̧, hee tɔ̧ɔ̧-nú gbapaa ga.
A̧ yora, ɓɛɛ a̧ gbɛ bii mbɔlɔlɔ dam fara lɛŋ. Ndɔŋ-zu-a̧ fo nɛ́ yiwese,
ɓɛɛ o naŋ-a̧ a̧-a̧ mbɔɗɔnu.
Soɓee o ŋga mɔ nɛ o bii ɔ zu zɔk nɛnɛ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ zika zu wa,
ɓɛɛ o gasa kii zár wa gbaŋa-nyaŋa.
Mɔ zára wa nɛ fio a nù kpɔk kpɔk nɛnɛ, kóó o nde lɛŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndɛ́ fio kɔ‘i,
wen o ɔɔ-zu nɛ sakala wa'i usa so mɔ‘i ha̧ wa nɛti, ká wa tɛ̀ɛ́ iŋ gun bɔnɛ kɔ-wa na, fe nɛnɛ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, bɔnɛ fio hɔɔ zu o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mbɛt, ɓɛɛ o ŋma nɛ dɔkaa
fe sɛn ŋga gbara mɛ. Mɔ kpɔk, nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na.
Wen ŋma bii, nɛ wen bó zu a̧ na, yee ɗoŋ wa nɛ hayaa. O boi-biro
n'aa kaia nɛ́ o mgbak wan mɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧: mɛ nɛ́ kɔfasɔ̧ in fuunyama nɛ‘i dɔ
ga̧ nɛ see-Sɔ̧'ɛ. A̧ baa zu-a̧ duk nɛ nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ ŋgaŋamɔ mɛ
kaɗi, usi nɛnɛ‘e wi nɛ́ widetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mbetɛ.
A̧ gana zu nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́, bó nɛ́ zu ŋgai mɛ tɛ-a, kóó zu ŋgai ko o boi-
biro na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ wen mɛ nú-a a'a̧ kpaa nɛ ŋgai zu wan-usi-bɔnɛ‘i,
tɛ mbaŋa tɛ-a n'aa mbaŋa zu o kanamɔ in o nɔɔtɔk n'aa dea in o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Ŋgimbi n'aa zɔka'e o wɔr ku̧u̧naŋ gbisaa nɛnɛ kembeŋ kembeŋ kaɗi,
a̧ yee mgbara wa, am nɛ mɔ, ga̧ nɛ nyimsea, ɓɛɛ a̧ gɔn ti a̧, ká‘a̧ tɛ̀ɛ́ hɔ
tɛ o oi-wi nɛ ɓɔna kpasa.
Dap foto-nù lɛŋ gɔna so tɛ zɔm ɗilɛɛ-laa-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧‘i. O nin ko
o zɔmdáà nɛ‘i gasi yɔra so zu o be sɛka ta nɛ‘i nɛka so tɛ fara naar zu laa'i,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-usi-gasi k’Ɛ́nɛ́ yɔr so tɛ-mɛtɛwol nɛ duk zu a̧.
Tɛ zɔka mɔ‘i, Wikumbii pɛa nɛ ndaa, ɓɛɛ kii hɛr zaŋ-aa. Gee be nú
nyimsea nɛ usa tɛ‘i nyɛma.
Ɓɛɛ nyimsea nɛ ko bó sɛnɛ na tika zu o wi-iŋ-Sɔ̧-na hɔ ndutia,
wen Sɔ̧ iŋa so mɔ nɛ wa tɛ̀ɛ́ de nɛ ɗoŋ woyo, dika eti.
A̧ iŋa so'e: ɗoŋ gboaa dukbii kɔ‘i yinɛ tɛ bara fo nɛ wa sinɛ nɛ hayaa,
o wi nɔ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ kpai taamɔ, ɓɛɛ ndaka ɗoŋ wa nɛnɛ woyo.
Wen wa ɓɔna so fara hi̧i̧ o fio kɔ-wa, ai nɛ nú nɛ ka̧ pɛsi ko o bii kɔ-wa,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mgbele taamɔ hɔ nɛnɛ kɔ̧ zu-wa: o wi nɛ wa aia so nɛ́ nú nde
wa'a yak wo’ɛ, wa yee tɛ ndaka pata wa, hee wa nɛ́ o wi-zu̧-zɔ̧ ga.
Mɔ nɛ ɗafa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa ira wa sitɛ i̧i̧ sɔŋkur tom'i,
de nɛnɛ ha̧ tɛ-wa mɛ bi ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yaka; wen ɔ so dee ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk kana
o bɔnɛ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ tik zu wa'i lɛŋ, hɔ sɔŋkur-a.
War ko o bii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wa tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ nɛ́ ŋma naŋanɔ yek nɛ bii,
ɓɛɛ nɛ war kɔ-wa bó, nɛ ŋma fio nɛ‘i tɛ zɔk nɛti na a tɛ̀ɛ́ tik zu wa.
Wen Ɛ́nɛ́ kpaia o mɔ n’Ɛ́nɛ́ dea lɛŋ in o yuwar dukaa kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ mbea:
wa lɛŋ wa zia nú-‘Nɛ́, wen ká ŋma ɗaŋmɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kpa o bem k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Wi zɔka ŋma tura-zan fara kpe zu gbagari, in kora nu kpàá kpàá
nɛ gboo oi yi. Gbɛ̧ gbatɔp kifa demɔka yuwar, o ŋga pɛŋa-yì kifa
nɛ́ ŋma bɔkɔnu nɛ kpee nɛ mbɔŋgɔ;
nɛ́ fara'i a dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ ɓira nɛnɛ, ɗɔɔ wii-er-‘Nɛ́,
wa mbaɗi nɛ o gasa mɔɔ-kifi k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Wa too hakaka hee o nyaŋa nɛ kii mbɔɗi ga, wa kpiɗa hee o be-sami ga,
gasi nɛ Ɛ́nɛ́, Gasa Wan n’Ɛnɛ kpasa wa’ɛ.
Wen yí-wa ɓɔna so tɛ o mɔ nɛ yaka ŋgimbi bara kɔ-wa sɛn gɔní nù,
hee mɔ nɛ o zifa mbaŋa nɛnɛ nɛ tɛ nù oi nú o saɗi’ɛ ga, in hee mɔ nɛ nanayi ɔ̧i̧a nɛ o gba dɔka gbazal oi nú o saɗi ɗɔɔ yi’ɛ ga.
Nɛ ɗoŋ mbɛt, wa zɔka ŋma mbe yaayí koa nɔi̧, ŋgimbi nɛ wɔ gbɛɛ
nɛ wa ká wa kɔfi nɛ o de nyɔɔ̧ nyɔŋmɔ,
bɛɛ ká o kpaŋanaŋa dáŋ nɛnɛ nɛ ɗɔɔ gbatɔp ha̧ wɔ kɔ-wa mɛ kaɗi nɛnɛ'ɛ
Ɓɛɛ o bɔnɛ tika zu o ɗaŋwi, bó nɛ́ hega gbaŋa-nyaŋa na, o ŋga pi̧i̧-koro
mbaŋa so tɛ-wa nɛti. Nɛ́ bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa a wa zɔka kana hegɔ nɛ war-a,
wen wa usa so ŋma ŋga ɗaŋ sɛnmɔ-fio sitɛ o gɛnɛ.
O ŋma, nɛ́ o gɔni bii nɛ hɔɔ tɛ kɔ-wa a wa kpɛk na. Ɓɛɛ, kɔ-wa, nɛ́ o
gɛnɛ nɛ de demɔ in wa a wa dee nɛ bara.
Ɓáá bo a̧‘i̧ ɓɛɛ na, ŋma kita zɛm nɛ o kuti wi mbɛt, wen nɛ wa kpɛk so nɛ́ o gɛnɛ nɛ ɗaŋa.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa, ɗoŋ nyɛŋɛ nɛ wa dee kpɛk nɛ o wi nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in wa
ɗɔɔ heembea'i, wa dikiɗa nɛ́ wa nɛ o ŋga tom-bɔnɛ woyo.
Yi-wa boma hee yí o wi nɛ yaa so ka̧ nutua ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ga:
gba tum hura so wa, ɓɛɛ wa tam yuwar nutua kɔ-wa takaɗi.
O mgbak mɔ nɛ kasi nù yee ŋmaa rɛk-rɛk, hee mɔ nɛ o nyak koloŋ kpai
nɛ naŋ yɔyɛ tɛ kpɔk tigɛr’ɛ ga. Mɔ‘i dúk nɛ sa̧-a̧ kà‘i zɔk o mɔ nɛ yaka so.
Wen o saɗi-zu-nu kifa o saɗi-ɗɔɔ-yi, o wan nɛ zui so nɛ yì yara nɛ náŋ zu nù.
Wee duka ɗɔɔ yi ɓɔbi nɛnɛ siti gan, ɓɛɛ yi kpa ŋgai bii wee ɓɔna.
O leɓe-wee mbɛt dɔ so o kókóɗó saɗi, nɛ yar so nɛ poo wa'i na.
Wa de so ha̧ mɔɔ-ŋyɔŋ nɛ tɛa nɛ yiwese, ɓɛɛ nɛ dúk hee ɓɔrɔ nɛ ɓán ná yela ga'i, mɛ yeli na.
Gasa Wan, tɛ mɔ lɛŋ, Ɛ́nɛ́ baa dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ e ŋgɔn, gasi nɛ a̧ mbɛt.
Ɛ́nɛ́ e gee ee a̧ wɔkɔrɔ na, Ɛ́nɛ́ gbaka nɛ́ a̧, ŋgimbi lɛŋ in fara lɛŋ.
Ɗuka-taamɔ lɛŋ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ a̧ dúk in A̧ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O nyɛmɛ ɗɔɔ gbatɔp, o naŋ-koro nɛ ai, o zɛ dika ɓeemɛ yak nɛnɛ́, o’ɔ nyɛma mɛ tɔr o?
Nɛ o’ɔ nyɛma mɛ iŋ ndaa kusá yizan, pɛsá nu in ndaa gba ɗuka fara o?
Ɗuka taamɔ dee nɛti ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ nɛ wara tɛ́ kɔ‘i dika ɓeemɛ.
Wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ tugun ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧ o? Nɛ́ o’ɔ iŋa ndaa o hu̧samɔ n'A̧a̧ dee o?
Ɓaa wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ, nɛ bii lɛŋ yú, nɛ́ wi nɛ dúk nu gɔn kiti-wan kɔ‘i, a kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ Gasa Wan, nɛ zu, a dee ɗuka-taamɔ‘i; A̧ zɔka a̧, A̧ wee dita-a̧.
A̧ zira a̧ a zú mɔ n'A̧a̧ dee lɛŋ, in o bii lɛŋ mbɛt nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dee demɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
A̧ ha̧a̧ há̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ A̧.
Yuu-kii Gasa Wan nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-gasi in mɔɔ-zɔn-tɛ, mɔɔ-ha̧-desee in mɔá-nyɛŋɛ.
Yuu-kii Gasa Wan ɔ̧́ nɛ nyɔɔ̧ kɔ̧ see-wi; a̧ há̧ nɛ desee, tɔrtɛ in duka-kpasa ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi.
Mɔ ko wiyukii Gasa Wan tɛ nɛ́ nɛ dea hɔ́ sɔŋkur-aa; a̧ tɛ kpa de toka yoŋgo wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Ku̧u̧-naŋ ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan; war ko o wimbozu, wa dee a̧ kpɔk in wa
dika kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ-wa.
A̧ dee fara-duk kɔ̧a̧-a̧ mgbara o bii, dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ fara mɛ́; a̧ tɛ duk in o bezaŋ-wa nɛ mboo-zu ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Sɔŋkur kpasa ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan; A̧ ha̧ o wayate kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o bii kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dɔkaa yak zale.
A̧ duná tua kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ wa kɔ̧a̧, ɓɛɛ dam kɔ-wa mbɛt tɛ dun nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Mgbak yi mɔɔ-usi ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ́ yuu kii Gasa Wan, nɛ de ha̧‘i mɛ kpa de-dukaa in de hayatɛ.
A̧ há̧ iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧a̧, nɛ zɔm dɔkaa; a̧ de dee ha̧ nin o wi n'a̧a̧ dúk tɛ wa mɛ hu̧r siti.
Ku̧nin ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ́ yuu kii Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ o gbaa-er-a̧ nɛ́ duka kpasa ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi.
Dee nyimsea gba̧a̧ bo na nyɛm sɛnɛ na, wen deemɔ ko Wan-nyima-see ir nɛ a̧ ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik.
Wi-munyal tɛ́ nyɔŋ nín zɛm nɛ de ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa, a̧ tɛ kpa gasa desee.
A̧ tɛ kasi taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kɔ̧ see-a zɛm nɛ de ŋgimbi; ndaranú-bii lɛŋ tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ̧a̧-a̧.
Mgbara o demɔ ko ɗuka-taamɔ lɛŋ, o tua-wen-ha̧-iŋamɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ́
ŋma mɔɔ-nyɛr tɛ ɗaŋwi.
Mɛ, nɛ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ɗuka-taamɔ'ɛ, mɛ kasí o heembea, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ ha̧ ɗuka-taamɔ‘i ha̧ mɛ́
Wen ɗuka-taamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ de ha̧‘i mɛ yu kii Gasa Wan; mɔ nɛ́ ɔ́ dee tɛ A̧,
nɛ mboo-zu in mɔkasee.
Ká mɛ ŋgai see-mɛ tɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan na, ká mɛ́ nɛ́ tɛ A̧ nɛ see yiitoo na.
Ká mɛ́ dúk nɛ see yiitoo ti bii na, ɓɛɛ mɛ hakali ndaranú-mɛ́.
Ká mɛ gasi zu-mɛ na, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ yo nu,
ɓɛɛ ká búù tɛɛ ba mɛ, wen Gasa Wan tɛ gba ndaa-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ A̧ pii búù zu mɛ sɛn mgbara bii, wen nɛ mɛ yú kii A̧ na
in wen nɛ see-mɛ duna nɛ ɔrmɔ.
Bem kɔ‘m, ka mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de tom ha̧ Gasa Wan, nɛ mɛ ɗafi tɛ-mɛ pɛm nɛ weamɔ.
Mɛ ɗafi see-mɛ nɛ tanaa, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɔ̧́ ŋgiɗi. Ká mɛ sakali zu-mɛ́ ŋgimbi ditasee na.
Mɛ ndaɗi in A̧; ká mɛ ár tɛ-mɛ nɛ A̧ na, hegɔ mɛ tɛ kpa gasi tɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi.
Mɛ kpɛk mɔ lɛŋ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu-mɛ. Mɛ dúk nɛ munyal tɛ ŋga mɔ nɛ tɛ tik zu mɛ.
Wen nɛ yí wee a'i we nɛ lɔr sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wi wee o wi nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka sɛn yí wee-bɔnɛ.
Mɛ e kɔ̧ɗɔa ha̧ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ gbak mɛ; mɛ bá nɛ tana war, ɓɛɛ mɛ e ta-mɛ nɛ A̧.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan’ɛ, ɛnɛ pɛm deako kɔ̧-A̧; k’ɛ́nɛ́ ar na, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛɛ tik.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan’ɛ, Ɛnɛ e ta'nɛ́ nɛ A̧, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom'i beka ɓan'nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ o wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan’ɛ, ɛnɛ zɛm o zɔm demɔ, in desee nɛ beka kaɗi na ɓɔnsɛnɛ in deako kɔ̧-A̧.
Ɛnɛ zɔk mɔ si sɛn tɛ o kuti bii ɓeemɛ: ŋma wi nɛ ee ta nɛ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ ka̧ búù bá nɛ o?
Wi nɛ hɛra tɛ nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ ka̧ Gasa Wan siŋ a̧ pi nu, nɛ́ o?
Wi nɛ kɔfa A̧, ɓɛɛ ká A̧ e a̧ tɛ geemɔ, nɛ o?
Wen Gasa Wan nɛ wi-kɛ̧-bɔnɛ in bii, in wi-de-ko. A̧ e ɗaŋmɔ ee, ɓɛɛ A̧ kpasa bii ŋgimbi ditasee mbɛt.
Bonɛ a̧-a̧ zu o wi nɛ see nɔ̧ na, o wi nɛ gba̧a̧ er bona, bonɛ a̧-a̧ zu o ɗaŋwi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ see yiitoo.
Bɔnɛ a̧-a̧ zu wi nɛ bó nɛ nɔɔŋgiɗi na, nɛ ee-ta mbɛt bo na. A̧ beka kpa wi-ye-ɗoŋ‘a̧ na.
Bɔnɛ a̧-a̧ zu'nɛ́, n’Ɛ́nɛ́ bo nɛ nyɔŋa-nin ɓɔna’ɛ.
Ɛnɛ tɛ de hee ge, ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan tɛ tɛɛ zɔk nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ ge?
O wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan bɛ̧ wen nu-A̧ na ndo-ndo-ndo; o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ A̧, ndak nɛ pata yuwar kɔ̧-A̧.
O wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan kii mɛ de nɛ́ mɔ nɛ ɔ́ dee tɛ-A̧.
Nyɔŋmɔ ko o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ A̧, nɛ heembea kɔ̧-A̧
See o wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan dúk nɛ ɓadaa ɓɔnsɛnɛ. Wa dúk si ɗɔɔ ti A̧, ɓɛɛ wa tɔ̧a̧:
«Gana so tika kɔ̧ er Gasa Wan, ɓa nɛ kɔ̧ er gee bii; deako kɔ̧-A̧ nyɛma ŋma in gasi kɔ̧-A̧.
O bem, ɛnɛ zii mbɔrɔ kó dáà k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ demɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ-a̧-a̧ ka de k’ɛnɛ kpasa.
Wen Gasa Wan zɔn dáà wen zu o bem kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ A̧ dea ha̧ nàà mɛ kpa ŋgai zu o bem kɔ‘i.
Wi nɛ tú̧ tɛ dáà kɔ‘i ɗafi nɛ wen ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i.
Wi nɛ gasi naa kɔ‘i mɔi̧ nɛ zɔm kpaamɔ.
Wi nɛ tú̧ tɛ dáà kɔ‘i tɛ kpa desee wen zu o mgbak bem kɔ‘i; wese n'a̧-a̧ tɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧, Sɔ̧ tɛ zii.
Wi nɛ gasi dáà kɔ‘i tɛ duk zu nu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi; wi nɛ mbo zu ha̧ Gasa Wan tɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ naa kɔ‘i.
A̧ tɛ de tom ha̧ o dáà in naa kɔ̧-a̧, hee wa nɛ o wan kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Mɛ tú̧ tɛ dáà kɔ-mɛ tɛ deamɔ in tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧wen kɔ-mɛ, ka de ká a̧ toka de yoŋgo zu mɛ.
Wen de yoŋgo ko dáà de dee ha̧ naŋ-tua ko o bem kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ yor nɛ nɔ̧-a̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ yoŋgo ko nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ gbin kɔ‘i nɛ naŋ-tua'i.
Ká mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-mɛ, wen nɛ búù baa dáà kɔ-mɛ na; búù ko dáà kɔ-mɛ bó nɛ ŋma mɔ
nɛ mɛ tɛ gasi zu-mɛ sɛnɛ́ na.
Tɛ bii tu̧ wen zu gasi ko dáà kɔ‘i; nàà nɛ‘i fɛŋ'ɛ pi nɛ foe tɛ o bem kɔ‘i.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ hakali dáà kɔ-mɛ ŋgimbi sɔki kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ ɗaŋ see-a̧ ŋgimbi duká-kpasá kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Koo taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a ziɓi, mɛ mu̧i ha̧ a̧; ká mɛ fɛŋ a̧ na, wen nɛ mɛ ɓɔna nɛ oi ŋgai tɛ-mɛ.
Wen demɔ nɛ mɛ de si tɛ dáà ko-mɛ beka tik nu gee na. A̧ tɛ gɔn zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Wese bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ, tɛ-Sɔ̧ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɛ; ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ yeli hee ɓɔrɔ ɗɔɔ wese ga.
Wi nɛ siŋ dáà kɔ‘i pi nu dúk hee wi nɛ toa̧ ɗaŋ wen ha̧ Sɔ̧ ga,
Gasa Wan fóm nɛ́ wi nɛ ɗáŋ see nàà kɔ‘i.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɔka see, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɔ́ dee tɛ-Sɔ̧ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ gasa gan bii, nɛ mɛ mɔk tɛ-mɛ si ɗɔɔ gan mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ de yí.
Wen ŋgayamɔ ko Gasa Wan ɔ́ gasa, ɓɛɛ nɛ o wan-mɔkasee a gasi gasa A̧.
Ká mɛ kii mɔ nɛ ɔ́ ŋgaya gan zu-mɛ na; ká mɛ kii ndaa-mɔ nɛ gana zu ŋgai kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ ta mɔ zu o heembea nɛ‘i ha̧ha̧ mɛ; mɛ bo nɛ haazi mɔ nɛ ɔ́ hu̧sa̧ na.
Ká mɛ há̧ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ tɛ dea mɔ nɛ gana zu-mɛ na,
wen mɔ nɛ wa usa ha̧ mɛ gana zu mɔ nɛ bii nyɛma mɛ iŋ kaɗi.
Wen o zɛlɛgbɛk taamɔ dea ha̧ o ŋma bii nɛ dɔkaa mɛ yo.
O ɗaŋ taamɔ kɔ-wa ɗaŋa mbozu-wa.
Wan-ŋgasee tɛ kaɗi kana zaŋ bɔnɛ. Wi nɛ kɔ̧ ŋgaŋga mɔ tɛ fe kana nɛ fio-a.
Bɔnɛ tɛ yuɓuri zu wan-ŋgasee. Wideɗaŋmɔ tɛ kusi kana nɛ ɗaŋmɔ zú ŋmaa.
Ŋma nyina-kpasi-zɛ́ɛ́ ko wigɔtɛ bo na, wen gun ɗaŋmɔ a̧-a̧ kɔ see-a.
Wi-iŋ mgbara-mɔ tá nɛ mɔ zu o tua-wen sɛn kɔ see-a̧.
Wan-ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ zèr-zii-mɔ.
Nɛ hee mɔ nɛ yi bí nɛ nyɛka-wee’ɛ ga a̧ ha̧mɔ ha̧ wisan bí nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Wi nɛ de demɔ in bii oi demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ɗafi nɛ mɔ wen sa̧a̧mɔ, ka a̧ de mɛ tik,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ kpa wi-toi a̧ e ŋgɔn.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ dor nyɔŋmɔ nú-wisan na, ká mɛ de ha̧ yí-wisan mɛ ɗuk na.
Ká mɛ e wi nɛ wɔ gbɛ tɛ bɔnɛ na, ká mɛ ɗaŋ see-bii nɛ mɔ ɓan na.
Ká mɛ ɗaŋ see-bii siti gan na; ká mɛ e ha̧ wi nɛ san ba mɛ zɛm mɔ na.
Ká mɛ ndak wikɔfimɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ tɛ bɔnɛ na; ká mɛ hu̧si̧ sɔnti-mɛ nɛ wikɔsa na.
Ká mɛ wɛr yí-mɛ nɛ wi nɛ mɔ ɓan na; ká mɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ fɔm mɛ na.
Wen, ka a̧ fɔm mɛ zaŋ tu̧u̧see kɔ̧-a̧‘i, Wi nɛ dee a̧ tɛ zii kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɛ de ha o bii mɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ de yí, mɛ zum zu-mɛ si ɗɔɔ ti gasawi.
Mɛ yéŋ zer-mɛ tɛ sara ko wisan, ɓɛɛ mɛ kifi nú-wen ha̧ a̧ nɛ ga̧-a̧.
Mɛ gbo bara sen er dɛ́-bara kɔ̧-a̧, ká mɛ de kii ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ gɔn kita na.
Nɛ ko o be-oi, mɛ duk hee daa kɔ-wa ga, in hee wi ko nàà kɔ-wa ga:
mɛ tɛ duk hee bem ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn ga; A̧ tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ gan nàà kɔ-mɛ.
Ɗuka-taamɔ ba nɛ nin o bem kɔ‘i e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ hakala o wi nɛ kii a̧.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ duká-kpasá; o wi nɛ kúr mɛ tutuyɛ sút wen zu a̧ tɛ kpa gasa desee.
Wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ tɛ kpa gasamɔ nɛ mɔɔ-oi.
Gasa Wan tok nɛ de yoŋgo zu a̧ fara n'a̧-a̧ nɛ́ lɛŋ.
O wi nɛ de tom ha̧ a̧ ɗafi nɛ Sa̧-a̧ Wi; o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, Gasa Wan kɔ̧ɔ̧ wa mbɛt.
Wi nɛ zii nu-a̧ tɛ gɔn gɛ́r-wen nɛ yuwar-a. Wi nɛ hɛr tɛ nɛ a̧ tɛ duk zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Wi nɛ e ta nɛ a̧ tɛ kpa a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi, ɓɛɛ o bezaŋ-a tɛ kpa kpɔk mɔɔ-oi'i mbɛt.
A̧ tɛ mgbɔ wi’ɛi nɛ tɛ o gɔŋga war-sɛ́, A̧ tɛ pi̧ kii in bele zaŋ-a.
A̧ tɛ sakali a̧ nɛ ŋgaya heembea kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi n'A̧a̧ tɛ e nɛ ta nɛ a̧.
A̧ tɛ we a̧ nɛ o ŋgaŋga gɛŋa kɔ̧-A̧.
Hoɗoŋ-aa A̧ tɛ pii ɗoŋ zééŋ tɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧desee ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ A̧ gbaa ndaa hu̧samɔ kɔ̧-a ha̧ a̧
ɓɛɛ, ka wi’ɛi yɔ yuwar, ɓɛɛ ɗuka-taamɔ tɛ siŋ a̧ pi nu, ɓɛɛ A̧ ee ha̧ a̧ mɛ tik.
Mɛ zɔk o mɔ nɛ yak, ɓɛɛ mɛ kasi zu-mɛ tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ de foe tɛ-mɛ́ nɛ tɛ-mɛ́ na.
Wen ŋma foe-ir-wi pi tɛ ɗaŋmɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ;
ŋma a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ tɛ de ha̧ bii mɛ gasi mɛ in mɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ dea.
Ká mɛ fɛŋ zu-mɛ́ nɛ zu-mɛ na, ká mɛ fe fio-foe na.
Ká mɛ yú tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ŋgimbi-a na.
Nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a'i tɛ iŋ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Nɛ́ tɛ wen mɛ nu-mɛ́ a'i tɛ iŋ nɛ iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ ar ndaa kpasawen na, mɛ dé nɛ́ foe iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ na ʼɛ̧́.
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ gbará ɗaŋmɔ kɔ mɛ na, ká mɛ we gɔna ti foka nanayi na.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ mgbelewi mɛ daŋ zu mɛ na. Ká mɛ zɔ́k ɗoŋ mɔ ko wan-ŋgai de nɛ kɔ-mɛ na.
Mɛ de biro wen kpasawen hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ tɛ fio, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ tɛ de biro zu mɛ.
Ká mɛ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ dúk nɛ wi-tɛɛri in wi nɛ de gba̧a̧mɔ-na,
tɛ deamɔ kɔ-mɛ na.
Ká mɛ duk nɛ dila sɛn tɛ kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ dúk nɛ wi-kii mgbara o widetom kɔ-mɛ, na.
Ká mɛ nyɛi er-mɛ wen baa mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɓurá ŋgimbi ha̧si nɛ ɗoŋ, na.
Ká mɛ dúk tɛ-mɛ nɛ o mbɔi kɔ-mɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «mɔ nyɛm am kaɗi» na.
Ká mɛ́ e ha̧ wɔmɔ kɔ-mɛ in ŋgai tɛ-mɛ mɛ́ ɔr mɛ́ mɛ ndak ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ see-mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «nɛ́ o a tɛ gan am o?» na, wen Gasa Wan tɛ usi kana bɔnɛ ha̧ mɛ zɔ̧i̧.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ de'm na» na, wen ɗoŋ munyal ko Gasa Wan ɔ nyɛia̧.
Ka mɛ nɛ kusa ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ zu ŋmaa, ká mɛ e ta-mɛ gan'e mɛ tɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ na.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Deako ko Gasa Wan ɔ́ gasá, A̧ tɛ e o gba zɔm dɔka ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m ha̧‘m» na,
wen deako a̧-a̧ tɛ A̧, in tu̧u̧-see mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nyimsea kɔ̧-A̧ tɛ tik nɛ zu o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Gasa Wan nɛ haia, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ fo zɛ-a siti siti na,
wen tu̧u̧-see ko Gasa Wan tɛ hɔ yekseɗe, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kifi gee mɔ, wese bɔnɛ-oi-ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ dúk tɛ-mɛ nɛ mbɔi-zu̧zu̧ na, wa beka gbak mɛ wese bɔnɛ na.
Ká mɛ pɛfi mɔ ti yuu-búk nɛ tum na, ká mɛ ba yuwar nɛ tum,
hee wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ tɔ̧ leɓe-wen yiitoo de nɛnɛ'ɛ ga na.
Mɛ kasi mɔ nɛ mɛ ta nɛ nɔa̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wen mɛ nu-mɛ́ a dúk nɛ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
Mɛ zii mɔ nɛ haia, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kifi nú nɛ haia na.
Ka mɛ nɛ boo nɛ ŋma taamɔ, mɛ kifi nú ha̧ ŋma-mɛ; ka nɛ boo na, nɛ mɛ kpe nú-mɛ́.
Gasi in mɔɔ-búù yá sɛn zaŋ nyɛrɛ, ɓɛɛ leɓe-wi nyɛma mɛ gbɛ wi mbɛt.
Ká mɛ de ha̧‘i mɛ ba mɛ nɛ wikaindaa-bii na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ tui pɛ́r ha̧ bii nɛ leɓe-wen
kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt, wen ka foe a tika zu wizu̧zu̧, ɓɛɛ kita-fio tik nɛ zú witɔ̧wen yiitoo.
Mɛ yú dee ɗaŋmɔ, koo nɛ gasa, koo nɛ geɗɛk-a, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kifi wisɛn ko sɛm kɔ-mɛ na,
Wen ɗaŋ hu̧ra-nin dak nɛ foe in zɛkɛɗɛ pii tɛ wi: mɔ nɛ zɛm wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ leɓe-wen yiitoo a̧‘i.
Ká mɛ gasi zu-mɛ tɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ de wɔ-a na, wen ká ŋgai tɛ-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ yai dɛsɛ́-ɗɛsɛ́,
(hee ko kalaldi ndai ga.)
Wen ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi hee kora te, nɛ o wa̧a̧ in wayaa aia a nu ga.
Ɗaŋ wɔ-mɔ gbɛ́ kana nɛ wan kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee ha̧ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ zɛkɛɗ‘a̧.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔɔ̧ wen nɛ mɔɔ dɔk sɛm. De leɓewen mbɛt de ha̧ bii mɛ kpɛk mɛ nɛ dea.
O wi-fan mɛ a dɔk, ɓɛɛ wi tɔ̧ mbɔrɔ ha̧ mɛ a dúk nɛ kpɔk mgbara bii booro.
Ka mɛ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ba sɛm, mɛ we a̧ sɛ́. Ká mɛ́ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧ a̧ bee bee na.
Ŋma bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ de kɔ‘i sɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka de sɛm'i ŋgimbi bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ na.
Ŋma sɛm nyɛma mɛ kifi wisɛn tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndaa k’ɛ́nɛ́, wen pii foe tɛ-mɛ.
Ŋma sɛm nyɔŋmɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ beka dúk ka tɛ-mɛ, wese bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ, na.
Tɛ ŋgimbi bɔtɛ kɔ-mɛ, a̧ duk hee kiitɛ-mɛ ga; a̧ tɛ usi ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ o widetom kɔ-mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ nɛ dea,
Mɔ kpɔk, ka mɛ de geemɔ, a̧ tɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ duk nɛ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ, a̧ tɛ hu̧si yi-a nɛ mɛ.
Ɗoŋ-mɛ a nyɛi nɛ o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ, mɛ kásí zu-mɛ́ nɛ osɛm kɔ-mɛ
De sɛm nɛ kpasa fara-hu̧si-tɛ, wi nɛ kpaa a̧ kpaa gasa mbɔi.
De sɛm bó nɛ mɔɔ-gɛnɛ na, wi nyɛm mɛ gɔn gɛnɛ-a̧ na.
De sɛm dúk nɛ nyina duká-kpasá. O wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan tɛ kpa a̧.
Wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan hok sɛm kɔ‘i nɛ dea, wen nɛ hee mɔ n'a̧-a̧ dúk nɛnɛ́ ga
a gbamayari kɔ̧-a̧ dúk nɛnɛ mbɛt.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ kpɛk iŋamɔ dika nɛ mɛ́ ɓɔna nɛ daŋa-ŋgaiwi hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ mbui
tɛ hɔ nɛnɛ́ zu mɛ́, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kpa ɗuka-taamɔ.
Hee mɛ nɛ wiwafɔ in wi-pɛ-kpar-nyɔnɔ ga, mɛ ɗɔ́l pii ka tɛ duka-taamɔ ɓɛɛ mɛ pɛ́m
nɛ o de waya-a; wen ŋgimbi waa fɔ-a, mɛ tɛ zɔk be bɔnɛ tikiɗi, ɓɛɛ dekpaa mɛ nyɔŋa waya-a.
Kpaa ɗuka-taamɔ ɔ ŋgaya wen o wi nɛ íŋ mɔ na, wi nɛ bó nɛ mbozu na beka ndaɗi in a̧ ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi na.
Ɗuka-taamɔ dúk hee ŋma dita ta nɛ we nɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ ga; ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi ha̧ a̧ mɛ́ siŋ a̧ pi nu na,
wen nin ko ɗuka-taamɔ‘i nyɛma sɛnɛ, o wi zɔk a̧ dɔ́k na.
Mɛ zii, bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mɛ kpɛk wen kɔ‘m, ká mɛ siŋ mbɔrɔ kɔ‘m pi taŋ na.
Mɛ pi̧ naŋ-mɛ́ kɔ̧ bolo-kana ko ɗuka-taamɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ pi̧ kpaŋa-a gɛr-mɛ́.
Mɛ wɛr koŋgoɓaa-mɛ́ si ɗɔɔ wen tuia a̧. Ká see-mɛ ɗáŋ wen n'a̧-a̧ yuɓura mɛ́ na.
Mɛ nɛ si tɛ a nɛ see-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ndak pata yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ.
Mɛ ɓá oi naŋ-a, mɛ kii a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ usi tɛ-a̧ ha̧ mɛ́. Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ tɛ kasi a̧ nɔ̧́ er-mɛ́,
ká mɛ́ ɗai er-mɛ sɛnɛ na.
Wen tɛ sɔŋkur-aa, a̧ tɛ duk nɛ fara-ɔmtɛ kɔ-mɛ; a̧ tɛ kifi dúk nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-desee ha̧ mɛ.
Hegɔ, o poka kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk nɛ ŋgaŋga ŋgee-biro kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaŋá kɔ̧-a̧ kifa nɛ laa-wan kɔ-mɛ.
Kpaŋá kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, ɓɛɛ nyak-hɛr-wi kɔ̧-a̧
nɛ gbɛ̧ zoŋ zoŋ zoa̧-laa-gaɓi-gɛr.
Mɛ tɛ pi a̧ tɛ-mɛ, hee laa-gbaŋá ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ hɛra a̧ zu-mɛ hee mɛtɛwol-nyɛŋɛ ga.
Bem kɔ‘m, ka mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a̧, mɛ tɛ iŋ mɔ, ɓɛɛ ka mɛ e see-mɛ sɛnɛ, mɛ tɛ kifi
wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ.
Ka mɛ kɔ̧́ zia mɔ, mɛ tɛ yambi mɔ. Ka mɛ yéŋ zer-mɛ́, mɛ́ tɛ kifi wan-ɗuka-taamɔ.
Mɛ dúk mgbara o sokawi, mɛ hɛr tɛ-mɛ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ-wa.
Mɛ zii wen nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ́-Sɔ̧ lɛŋ nɛ dea. Ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma de tua-wen kpɔk mɛ yak mɛ́ na.
Ka mɛ nɛ zɔka ŋma wi-iŋ-mɔ, nɛ mɛ war yi si tɛ a̧ mɛ tutuyɛ sút,
dap naŋ-mɛ́ a yɔk nutua kɔ-a̧.
Mɛ ta mɔ zu o ha̧a̧nu ko Gasa Wan. Mɛ e see-mɛ tɛ o heembea kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ nɔ̧a̧-a̧.
A̧ tɛ nɔ̧ see-mɛ, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧‘i ha̧ mɛ́.
Ká mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na, ɓɛɛ ŋma ɗaŋmɔ beka hɔ́ zu mɛ́ na.
Ɗoŋ-mɛ a nyɛi nɛ gɔɔmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ar tɛ-a nɛ mɛ́.
Ká mɛ pɛ kparmɔ zu taŋá ko gɔɔmɔ na, wen ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ mɔi̧ a̧ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo gan.
Ká mɛ kɔfi wan er Gasa Wan na; ká mɛ kɔfi kiti-wan er wannu na mbɛt.
Ká mɛ kpai tɛ-mɛ nɛ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ti Gasa Wan, koo nɛ wan-ɗuka-taamɔ ti wannu na
Ka mɛ́ nɛ nyɛma mɛ fo gɔɔmɔ yinɛ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kii mɛ duk wigɔnkita na,
wen ká kii tɛ̀ɛ̀ de mɛ ti ŋma gasawi, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ e tana war kɔ-mɛ dúk.
Ká mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ o gasawi-saaye na; ká mɛ fɛŋ zu-mɛ́ ti giiwi na.
Ká mɛ de kpɔk ɗaŋmɔ war yiitoo na, wen koo nɛ kuti-a'i ɓɛɛ nyɛma mɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ́.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk dɔká ha̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'am tɛ ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn a̧ tɛ kpɛk wa» na.
Ká gba̧a̧ tɛ-mɛ mɔk ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ na; ká mɛ de zɛŋ nɛ ha̧mɔ ha̧ wisan na.
Ká mɛ zɛkɛɗi wi nɛ a̧-a̧ zaŋ tu̧u̧see na, wen ŋma Wi nɛ gbɔsi wi si ɗɔɔ, ká baa wi e ŋgɔn mbɛt a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ.
Ká mɛ ɓir wen-ndela e nú nyá-mɛ́ na; ká mɛ de ŋma pɛrti mɔ‘i si tɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ na mbɛt.
Tɛ mɔ lɛŋ, mɛ bá zu-mɛ́ nɛ ndela, wen hɛra tɛ́ nɛnɛ́ gbak na.
Ká mɛ búr wen nɛ dɔkaa mgbara o kutiwi na; ká mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ kpɔk wen zaŋ kɔfasɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ na.
Ká mɛ sɛ́n ŋga tom, koo tom-fɔ na, wen nɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn a dee wa.
Ká mɛ mɔi̧ in o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na; tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ‘e ɗoŋ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ nyɛi na.
Mɛ mɔk tɛ-mɛ si ɗɔɔ wen bɔnɛ ko wi nɛ yú Gasa Wan na nɛ́ wee in o dɔk.
Ká mɛ bá sɛm kpai nɛ sede na, koo mgbak nya-mɛ́ kpai nɛ sa̧-a̧ lɔr hee wan mɛ Ofir ga na
Ká mɛ bɛ̧ baa de koo nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ na, wen demɔ kɔ̧-a̧ gana lɔr.
Ká mɛ de bɔnɛ nɛ widetom nɛ de tom nɛ dea na, koo widetom nɛ e see tɛ tom na.
See-mɛ a kɔ̧ widetom nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ iŋamɔ; ká mɛ ɓɛ̧ gboo a̧ tɛ bara na.
Mɛ nɛ boo nɛ o mɔdai, mɛ dai wa nɛ dea; ká mɛ́ nɛ́ kpáá mɔɔ oi-aa kpàà, nɛ mɛ kasi nɛ dea.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ boo nɛ o bem, mɛ usi mɔ ha̧ wa; mɛ há̧ mboozu ha̧ wa dika nɛ bem.
Mɛ́ nɛ́ boo nɛ o bokóbem, mɛ hakali ká wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗaŋ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ de zɛ̧ŋ in wa na.
Mɛ ha̧ bokóbem kɔ-mɛ ha̧ wii há̧ gba-búk-a yú á tɛ-mɛ; mɔ kpɔk, mɛ ha̧ a̧ ha̧ kpasa bii.
Mɛ nɛ boo nɛ ŋma koo, nɛ see-me baa, ká mɛ ndak a̧ na; ɓɛɛ ká mɛ há̧ tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ
ha̧ wan nɛ mɛ nyɛm mɛ kɔ̧ na na.
Mɛ gasi dáà kɔ-mɛ nɛ see-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ bɔnɛ ko nàà kɔ-mɛ na.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ aa nde nɛ wa a kòò mɛ́. Nɛ ge a mɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ wa oi mɔ nɛ wa dee in mɛ́ɛ́ ge?
Mɛ yu kii Gasa Wan nɛ see-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tu̧ tɛ o wiɗafi'A̧.
Mɛ́ kɔ̧ Wi nɛ ee mɛ́ nɛ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e o widetom kɔ̧-A̧ tɛ geemɔ na.
Mɛ yú kii Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ mɛ tu̧ tɛ wiɗafisɔ̧; mɛ há̧ war mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ a̧, hee mɔ nɛ yɔra ga:
zu-nyɔnɔ, ha̧a̧mɔ-ɗafi-war-tɛ, ɓaa-saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o sa̧-a̧ ɗafasɔ̧, in o zu-mɔ nɛ ɔ́ sa̧a̧.
Mɛ há̧ mɔ há̧ wisan wen kpaa toka de yoŋgo ko Sɔ̧.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ kɔ-mɛ a gbak o wi nɛ yá kpasa lɛŋ, koo nɛ o fio ká mɛ dɔ wa nɛ dee demɔ kɔ-mɛ na.
Ká mɛ zik ɗoŋ-mɛ ha̧ o wi nɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ na; mɛ kɛ̧ ɗaŋsee in o wi nɛ yá zaŋ ɗaŋsee.
Ká mɛ nik naŋ-mɛ tɛ zɔka o wizɛ́ɛ́ na, wen nɛ wen o pɛrti deamɔ nɔ‘i a bii tɛ kɔ̧ nɛ mɛ.
Tɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ de lɛŋ, mɛ ta nɛ sɔŋkur mɔ kɔ-mɛ, hegɔ mɛ beka de ɗaŋmɔ ɓɔna.
Ká mɛ duk zu-mɛ́ nɛ ŋgaŋa wi na, wen ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tik kɔ er-a̧.
Ká mɛ kpɛr in wanmbɔi na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa ŋgai zu mɛ́, wen lɔr dee ha̧ bii nɛ dɔkaa
mɛ yɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpai see o wannu mbɛt.
Ká mɛ kpɛr in wi-bur-wen na, ká mɛ a gua tɛ wee kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ká mɛ de zɛ̧ŋ in wi nɛ zu bóna na, wen ká dara tɛ̀ɛ̀ dá o zɔmdáà kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ dɔk wen a zu wi nɛ see gɔn wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i na; tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ‘e ɛɛ lɛŋ nɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ e ŋma bii tɛ geemɔ wen n'a̧-a̧ sɔka na, wen o ŋma bii mgbara yɛ sɔ́k sɔ́k mbɛt.
Ká mɛ kpa desee wen zú fio ko ŋma-mɛ na; tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ‘e ɛɛ tɛ fe kana fee lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ e nyɛrɛ ko wan-ɗuka-taamɔ tɛ geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ kii mɛ zii nɛ mgbara o tua-wen
kɔ-wa, wen nɛ er-wa a mɛ tɛ yambi iŋamɔ sɛnɛ́ in yuwar dee tom ha̧ o gasawi.
Ká mɛ siŋ nyɛrɛ ko o sɔkawi pi nu na, wen wa mbɛt wa kpaa o nyɛrɛ nɔ‘i nú o dáà kɔ-wa,
Nɛ sɛn tɛ wa a mɛ tɛ yambi nɛ zia mgbara mɔ in kpaa de kifanú tɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Ká mɛ tusi kɛ̧iwee ko ɗaŋwi na, wen ká leɓewee-a tɛ̀ɛ̀ dɔ́ mɛ.
Ká mɛ ba zu-mɛ dúk nɛ ŋmaa in wi-ŋgazu na, wen ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ bá nyak-wen kɔ-mɛ yuɓuri nɛ mɛ woyo.
Ká mɛ há̧ nyamandoe ha̧ wi nɛ gana mɛ nɛ ŋgai na; ka mɛ nɛ ha̧ha̧ a̧,
mɛ iŋ kana'e i̧i̧ sede'i yɔɔ ɓɔn kaɗi.
Ká mɛ duk ti há̧ bii bá nɛ ziŋgina nɛ gana zu kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ na,
wen ka mɛ a dea hegɔ mɛ iŋ kana'e wi tɛ yoɓi.
Ká mɛ de kita in wigɔnkita na, wen de wen lɛŋ tɛ duk nɛ kɔ̧-a̧ wen zu tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Ká mɛ nɛ́ nɔ in winɔ̧see na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ dak o ɗaŋmɔ a zu mɛ, wen a̧ tɛ demɔ
hee mɔ n'a̧-a̧ kɔ̧a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ mgbele kɔ̧-a̧ dee h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ fe kpɔk.
Ká mɛ kpa wen in wi-de-nyimsea na, ká mɛ ɓir nɛ ŋga gbara in a̧ na, wen tòk nɛ geemɔ
sɛn yi-a̧; a̧ nyɛma mɛ gbɛ́ mɛ sɛn fara nɛ wi ye ɗoŋ mɛ́ bo sɛnɛ na.
Ká mɛ ba keta in mgbelewi na, wen a̧ beka hu̧si ndaa wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ká mɛ de ŋma hu̧sa̧mɔ ti gɔni bii na, wen mɛ iŋ mɔ n'a̧-a̧ tɛ́ ko a zú mɔ‘i na.
Ká mɛ hu̧i̧ see-mɛ há̧ bii nɛ tum na, wen ŋma demɔ nɛ wa tɛ de oi-aa ha̧ mɛ bona.
Ká mɛ de gɔya okóò nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧ na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ de ŋma yɔɔkayamɔ si tɛ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ ha̧ okóò na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ daŋ zu mɛ́.
Ká mɛ kii koo-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗonu na, wen ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tik yi-yɔk kɔ̧-a̧.
Ká mɛ bá ŋgimbi ka̧ tɛ koo-mbɛr-koloŋ na, wen ká gɔna-yí kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔr mɛ́.
Ká mɛ e yí-mɛ tɛ ŋma be-zɔŋa na, wen ká mɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tik yi kpɔk nyak-zɔɓɔ in a̧.
Ká mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧ koo-de-mɔ nɛ mboɗonu na, wen ká mbɔi kɔ-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kaɗi lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ yar nɛ yuwar saaye kɛ̧i nɛ mɔ dam fara lɛŋ na; ká mɛ yambali nɛ fara nɛ o bii bo sɛnɛ na na.
Mɛ dak yí-mɛ tɛ de okóò; ká mɛ yéŋ gɔni dee na; o bii nɛ dɔkaa yɔa wen zu dee ko okóò;
kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ nyɛ́k si sɛnɛ hee wee ga.
Ká mɛ dúk nu ka̧ tɛ koo-wan-wii na ndo-ndo-ndo. Ká mɛ dúk ka tɛ a̧, nɔ̧́ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧
fara gbaŋá na, wen ká see-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ba a̧, ɓɛɛ ká wɔ-mɔ kɔ-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ de ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ tik.
Ká mɛ siŋ gba̧‘a̧ sɛm pi nu na, wen mbe sɛm hɛɗi ka tɛ-a̧ na.
Mbe sɛm hɔɔ ŋmaa in mbe dɔ̧ɔ̧; ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ be tɛ̀ɛ̀ paŋ, mɛ tɛ nɔ̧ a̧ nɛ desee.
Ká mɛ e see-mɛ tɛ kpaamɔ ko ɗaŋwi na, wen mɛ iŋ ɗaŋ kaɗaa kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ká mɛ de nyɛŋɛ kpaamɔ ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na; tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ‘e wa beka yá nɛ yɔli hɔ nɛnɛ́ wese fio na.
Mɛ yor nyɛi nɛ wi nɛ nyɛma mɛ gbɛ zu, ɓɛɛ kii fio beka de mɛ na. Ka mɛ nɛ ndaɗa
in a̧, ká mɛ demɔ nɛ tum na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ gbɛ mɛ. Mɛ iŋ‘e mɛ́ nɛ́ nɛ́ nɔ yi o pɛr,
ɓɛɛ mɛ yár nɛ zu o garo-pɛm-ye
Mɛ ndaɗi in o ŋma-mɛ, ka mɛ nɛ kpaa yuwar-a; mɛ bá keta in o wan-ɗuka-taamɔ.
Mɛ tɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ in o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ. Nyɛrɛ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ a dúk nɛ zu heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.
Mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kpɔk in o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a; nyɛŋɛ a pi mɛ́ wen zu yuu kii Gasa Wan.
Mɔ nɛ‘i zɔn er widemɔ nɛ er, nɛ tom kɔ̧-a̧; nɛ ko wan ko dukbii,
nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ gbó nɛ zaŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi-saaye yú wi-bur-wen yuu, ɓɛɛ wa sɛna wi-tɔ̧ hɔrɔp-hɔrɔ́p-wen, wen zu o wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Wan nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ usi nɛ yuwar de dukaa há̧ dukbii kɔ‘i.
Wan ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ nɔ̧ nɛ dea.
O be-wan hɔ́ nɛ́ wan kɔ‘i. O be-saaye hɔ́ kana nɛ wanye kɔ‘i.
Wannu nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na dúk nɛ nik-fio ko dukbii kɔ‘i;
ye ɓɔ́ wen zu iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko o wi nɛ ɔ́ wan zu a.
Wan zú nu a̧-a̧ kɔ̧ er Gasa Wan; A̧ tɛ hok wi nɛ nyɛma yi wan’ i tɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Kpaamɔ ko bii a̧-a̧ er Gasa Wan; A̧ tɛ e ga̧samɔ kɔ̧-a̧ zu o wi-yɔr-heembea.
Koo ŋma-mɛ dee nɛ ge gɔɔmɔ gee, ká mɛ e kiri in a̧ na; ká mɛ demɔ zaŋ nyimsea na.
Gɔɔtɛ de yí Gasa Wan na, de yí bii na mbɛt; gɔɔmɔ nɛ ŋma yɔɔkaya-mɔ yí o wi nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ.
Wan yú er ŋma zuduk si tɛ ŋma nɛtɛ, wen zu o gɔɔmɔ, o ŋgaŋgamɔ in wɔmɔ.
Wi nɛ dúk nɛ gee fuunu in bùk bɛɛ nɛ‘i iŋa'e,
tɛ duka kpasa kɔ̧-a̧ nyak-zaŋ-a lɛŋ nɛ gee mbɔrá mɔ, gɔ́ bòò kɔ‘i tɛ wen ge?
Ŋma nyɛia̧ ɗoŋ zɛ́ɛ́ gán wan-nyina gan, wi nɛ ɔ wan sɔsɔá tɛ fe fee mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ bii fe kaɗi, mɔɔ-oi-aa nɛ o kokoɗomɔ, o saɗi in o dɔk.
Ku̧u̧naŋ gɔɔtɛ ko bii nɛ ará tɛ nɛ Gasa Wan in dee ŋgazu in Wi nɛ dee a̧.
Ku̧u̧naŋ gɔɔtɛ nɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ hɛ́r tɛ nɛnɛ́ keŋ-keŋ yak nɛ dɔka mɔɔ-nyɛr a zu.
Kalea a̧‘i sa Gasa Wan fó gasa bɔnɛ pi zu wa, ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa A̧ tɛ kum wa lɛŋ a nu gbuɗuk.
Gasa Wan zuɗa kiti ko o be-wan gusi nɛ nu, ɓɛɛ A̧ kai nɛ o ga̧-a̧ wi a oi wa.
Gasa Wan zuɗa ku̧nin o wigɔtɛ a táŋ, ɓɛɛ A̧ gun nɛ o geewi oi wa.
Gasa Wan ɗaŋá nu ko o gɔni duk lɛŋ kpaŋgala-kpaŋgala hɔ nduti-a mɛ́.
A̧ foo wa yinɛ mgbara o bii, ɓɛɛ A̧ kum wa gbuɗuk. A̧ bii nin-wa zu nu yinɛ.
Gɔɔtɛ bo nɛ mɔ ko bii na, nyimsea mbɛt bó nɛ mɔ ko bezaŋ okóò na.
Nɛ ge duk ge a'i nyɛma mɛ gasi ge? Nɛ duk ko o bii.
Nɛ ge duk ge a'i nyɛma mɛ gasi ge? Nɛ o wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan.
Nɛ ge duk ge a'i nyɛma mɛ e tɛ geemɔ ge? Nɛ zuduk ko o bii.
Nɛ ge duk ge a'i nyɛma mɛ e tɛ geemɔ ge? Nɛ o wi-gbin o heembea.
Wi nɛ́ ɔ wan nɛ́ tu̧u̧-tɛ bii sɛn mgbara o nya-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tu̧ tɛ o wi yu kii Gasa Wan tu̧u̧ mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ pi̧ nyɛŋɛ tɛ wi-ndak-ɗoŋ-Sɔ̧ nɛ mbea, in gɛnɛ in wisan nɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan.
Ɛa wisan nɛ ndak pata heembea tɛ geemɔ, in zɔna wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, nyɛm sɛnɛ na.
O wi nɛ‘i zɔn nɛ o gasawi, in wigɔnkita, in be-wan. Mɔ kpɔk, ŋma mgbara wa
nɛ gasa gan wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan bona.
Bara nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ tɛ kpa o gee bii nɛ bo nɛ bara na mɛ de tom ha̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ wan-de-taamɔ tɛ ta zu mɔ‘i bona.
Ká mɛ sú tɛ-mɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ́ dea nɛ tom kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ na.
Ká mɛ gasi zu-mɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma mɔ ɓili mɛ na.
Gana so wi nɛ de tom, ɓɛɛ nɛ kpaa mɔ nɛ nyɛma a̧,
bá nɛ wi-kɔn-ŋguɗi nɛ bo mɔɔ-nyoŋ na.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ zɔn tɛ-mɛ yak zale na, mɛ zɔn tɛ-mɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-mɛ.
Nɛ o tɛ ye ɗoŋ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in tɛ-wi nɛ tɛ-wi o? Nɛ́ o tɛ zɔn wi nɛ fɛŋ zu o?
Wi nyɛma mɛ gasi wisan wen zu iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ wi gasa wanmbɔi wen mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɓɛɛ ka'i nɛ gasa ŋma bii zaŋ san, nɛ hee ge a'i tɛ de nɛnɛ́ in a̧ zaŋ kpaamɔ ge?
Á̧ ɓɛɛ ka'i nɛ ee a̧ tɛ geemɔ, ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ a̧-a̧ nɛ mbɔi,
nɛ hee ge a'i tɛ zɔk nɛ a̧ ŋgimbi san ge?
Ɗuka-taamɔ ko geɗɛk-wi bá zu-a baa e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ dea ha̧ a̧ mɛ duk mgbara o gasawi.
Ká mɛ zɔn ŋma bii wen zu dee kɔ̧-a̧ na; ká mɛ sɛ́n bii tɛ gee zɔka a̧ nɛ yí na.
Zi̧-gɔrɔ nɛ geɗɛk mɔ mgbara o mɔ nɛ bú̧i bu̧; mɔ kpɔk, mɔ n'a̧-a̧ de ɔɔ nyɔɔ̧ gan oi mɔ lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-mɛ wen zu gasa laa nɛ mɛ pi̧ na; wese kpa gasi kɔ-mɛ ká mɛ ŋmaŋ tɛ-mɛ na
wen o mɔ nɛ Gasa Wan dea ɔ́ dee nyɛmna, bɛɛ A̧ hu̧si nɛ o bii.
O ŋma ŋgaŋga wan ɔ dɔka tira a nu, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi nɛ‘i ta so mɔ si tɛ a̧ na a̧ hɛra mɛtɛwol-wan.
O ŋgaŋga wi ɔ dɔka tika mbulɛ̀ɛ̀ sɔɔgee, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ nin húr so nyɛmna tik er gɔni bii.
Nɛti ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ́ dɔk wen a zu bii, mɛ ak mgbara mɔ sɛ́;
mɛ ta mɔ nɛ dea nɛti sɛ́ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ wen a zu bii.
Ká mɛ kifi nú-wen nɛti nɛ mɛ tɛ zii gba̧a̧ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na na; ká mɛ́ gɔn nú-wen na.
Ká mɛ kpɛr in bii wen zu gɔni wen na; ká mɛ ye biro ko o ɗaŋwi na.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ á naŋ tom ɗulugbuk na, wen ka tom dɔ́k gan zu mɛ́, mɛ beka de
hɔ ti na; koo mɛ wara nɛ yi, mɛ beka nɛ́ hɔ́ ti na; bɛɛ yuu mɔ mbɛt beka kpasi mɛ́ na.
Ŋma bii tɛ de zɔm tom mbɔi nɛ tɛ-wi, nak nɛ tɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kpá ŋma mɔɔ-oi-aa na.
Ŋma wi-ɓɔsa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ wi-gbak-a bo na, ŋgai bo ɓɔna, gasa san mbɛt tika zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan zɔka a̧ nɛ de yí, gbó a̧ yinɛ ɗɔɔ san kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ baa a̧ e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ o bii nɛ dɔkaa yá hegɔ ɓeke-yeke gee.
O demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ, duka-kpasa in fio, san in kpaamɔ, mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ Gasa Wan.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ ko Gasa Wan dúk wen o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a; kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ̧-A̧ tɛ mgbɔ wa nɛ de yuwar.
Ŋma bii kifi wanmbɔi tɛ kasa zu in tɛ mɔi̧a̧ naŋ-mɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ'ɔ:
Ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi kpaa ɔmatɛ kaɗi, kinii mi tɛ nyɔŋ nɛ́ war mgbak mɔ kɔ‘m!»
a̧ iŋ oi ŋgimbi dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ fea e o mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ha̧ o ŋmaa bíí.
Mɛ kasi tom kɔ-mɛ nɛ nɔ̧a̧, mɛ há tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ sɛnɛ, mɛ sɔ́k yi-tom kɔ-mɛ.
Ká kii bá mɛ tɛ tom ko wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na; mɛ e ta-mɛ nɛ Gasa Wan,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ tom kɔ-mɛ siti, wen, há̧ Gasa Wan mɛ ha̧ kɔ‘i mɔ
ha̧ wisan nɛ gbaayi'i, dúk nɛ gee yɛkɓɛlɛk mɔ.
Mɔɔ-oi-tom ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ toka de yoŋgo ko Gasa Wan,
ɓɛɛ mɔɔ-oi toka de yoŋgo'i hɔ́ hee gee gɔma-yí ga.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «ŋma mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ ge ɓɔ ge? ŋma demɔ nɛ ɓan'am woyo nɛ ge?» na.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «mi a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ lɛŋ, ŋma ŋgayamɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ tik zu'm nɛ ge?» na
Wese bɔtɛ, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi bii ɗoŋ bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ wese bɔnɛ ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi bii ɗoŋ bɔtɛ.
Wen dúk yɛkɓɛlɛk ha̧ Gasa Wan mɛ kifi er ha̧ koo o nde, wese fio kɔ̧-a̧,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Ɗaŋ ŋgimbi de dee ha̧ tɛ-wi mɛ bi ɗoŋ de-dukaa; ɓɛɛ wi iŋ ndaa bii wese fio kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛti ha̧ fio ko bii, ká mɛ́ tɔ̧‘e a̧ nɛ́ wan-desee na, wen nɛ wese fio ko bii a'i iŋ nɛ ti a̧.
Ká mɛ kpɛk ha̧ bii nɛ tum mɛ ye tua kɔ-mɛ na, wen o pɛ́r ko wan-gona-kɔ̧-zaŋ ɔ dɔka.
See wigɔtɛ dúk hee kɛná nɛ‘i kun wen ɔrá o dokaa’ɛ ga;
a̧ zik nɛ mɛ hee wi-pɛm tikaa kɔ-mɛ ga.
A̧ tui pɛ́r kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ kpaia demɔ nɛ ɗaŋmɔ; ŋma dee kpɔk bo yi-a̧ na.
Nɛ be mbul-wee a ye gasa wee, ɓɛɛ o pɛ́r ko ɗaŋwi dee ha̧ tɔk mɛ fok a nu.
Mɛ hakali tɛ-mɛ nɛ wiɗaŋ wen a̧ bá nɛ keta ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛma mɛ ɗaŋ nin-mɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ka mɛ zir gɛnɛ tɛ ko-mɛ, a̧ tɛ pi̧ wen nu-mɛ, a̧ tɛ ɗaŋ mgbara mɛ in o bii kɔ̧ kira kɔ-mɛ.
Ka mɛ nɛ dee demɔ, mɛ iŋ wi nɛ mɛ de demɔ‘i ha̧ a̧‘i, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kpa de zɔnamɔ oi-aa.
Mɛ de demɔ si tɛ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa; koo mɛ kpa er-a̧ na,
mɛ tɛ kpa er Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.
Ŋma de-dukaa bó wen wi nɛ e see tɛ ɗaŋmɔ in nɛ bɛ̧ gbaka bii na.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ gbak wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na ndo-ndo-ndɔ.
Mɛ de demɔ si tɛ geɗɛk bii, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ́ ha̧ ŋma mɔ tikiɗi ha̧ wi nɛ e Sɔ̧ tɛ geemɔ na;
mɛ dɔ a̧ nɛ nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ ha̧ ŋma mɔ ha̧ a̧ na, wen ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa ŋgai zu mɛ;
a̧ tɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ war yiitoo oi demɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ.
Wen Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn sɛn o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ A kifa er ha̧ o wi nɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ A nyɛm nɛ ɗɔŋ mɔ nɛ wa dea.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ dewi, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ gbak wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na.
Bo nɛ ŋgimbi bɔtɛ a'i iŋ nɛ ti sɛm na; ŋgimbi bɔnɛ wisɛn husi tɛ na.
Ka ŋma bii duk zaŋ desee, ɓɛɛ see o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ tú̧ tu̧u̧;
ɓɛɛ ka bɔnɛ hɔ́ zu a, koo mgbak sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ wɛ́r tɛ wɛr nɛ a̧.
Ká mɛ há̧ tɛ-mɛ ha̧ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ na, wen ɗáŋ kɔ̧-a̧ dúk hee ndɛrɛ nɛ gbɛɛduamɔ kpee zu-a ga.
Koo a̧ a gbɛ nɛ tɛ-a si ɗɔɔ, gu nɛ nu nɛ́ nɛ nɔ, mɛ kasi zu-mɛ ɓɛɛ mɛ hakali tɛ-mɛ nɛ a̧.
Mɛ dúk kɔ-mɛ wen-aa hee wi-bɛŋ yi darŋgel ga, wen mɛ iŋ‘e a̧ beka ɓɔn nɛ oi gbɛɛduamɔ‘i ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.
Ká mɛ e a̧ ka tɛ-mɛ na, wen ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ir mɛ pi nu, mɛ ba fara kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ a̧ dúk nu nɛ war wii-er-mɛ na, wen ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ de sunu kiti ko-mɛ.
Nɛ́ nɛ ɗoŋ a mɛ tɛ iŋ nde mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ kpasawen, bɛɛ mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ta mɔ wen nɛ mɛ zii so nú‘m na.
Nɛ o a tɛ de kó ha̧ wi-ɔr-gɔk nɛ gɔk nyɔŋga, in o wi nɛ nɛ́ si ka̧ tɛ bokónam o?
Nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a wi nɛ gbam in wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ pi̧ tɛ tɛ́ o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ dúk nɛnɛ.
A̧ dúk karkoro tikiɗi in mɛ; mɔ kpɔk, ka mɛ si tara-ta-tara mɛ yo nù, nɛ hi̧i̧ a tɛ usi mgbak dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Wisɛn a̧-a̧ nɛ nyɔɔ̧-wen sɛn ndaranú, ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ see-a, a̧ kii mɛ ir nɛ mɛ́ pi kɔ́ kɔ̧.
Miikɔ̧a̧ nyɛma mɛ hɔ ɗɔɔ yí-wisɛn; ká̧ a̧ nɛ kpa ŋma be yuwar,
ɓɛɛ tɔk tɛ-mɛ nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ beka ba hiɗ‘a na.
Ka ŋma ŋgayamɔ kpa mɛ́, nɛ a̧ a tɛ hɔ fara-a ti ha̧ mɛ;
A̧ tɛ de hee a̧ gbak nɛ mɛ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ pi̧ naŋ sara ku-mɛ.
A̧ tɛ mi̧i̧ zu a, a̧ tɛ mbɛr er-a, a̧ tɛ zɛkɛɗi mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ usa mgbak dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ mɛ.
Wi nɛ fo sɔ̧ɔ̧-te, a̧ nɛ ŋdiŋ tɛ; wi nɛ ndaɗi in wigɔtɛ tɛ́ kifi hee a̧ ga.
Ká mɛ bá tui nɛ dita gan zu-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ gbam in wi nɛ gana mɛ́ nɛ ŋgai
koo nɛ mbɔi na. Nɛ hee ge a kpana-gii in kpana-boe tɛ nɛ́ nɛ nɔ kpɔk in ŋmaa ge?
ka wa tó tɛ-wa nɛ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ ɓiaa gbaa.
Wanmbɔi de gɔɔmɔ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kpá tu̧u̧see woyo. Ka'i de wen wén zu gɔɔmɔ in wisan,
ɓɛɛ nɛ a̧ a tɛ̀ɛ̀ gɔm gɔma er-a woyo.
Ka mɛ nɛ boo nɛ wi-de-gba̧a̧-mɔ a̧ tɛ kii yuwar wen zɔɓa mɛ,
ka san ba mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ siŋa mɛ pi nu.
Ka mɛ bo nɛ kpaamɔ, a̧ tɛ ndaɗi mɛ, a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɛ gu nu, ŋma wen kɔ̧-a̧ bona.
Ka a̧ nɛ boo nɛ haazi kɔ-mɛ, a̧ tɛ ɔr mɛ́, a̧ tɛ mam be mami in mɛ́ɛ̀, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋma nyɔɔ̧
wen-e-ta ha̧ mɛ; a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ de wen ha̧ mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ aka mɛ‘e: «Mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ am gbak mɛ nɛ ge?»
A̧ tɛ pi foe tɛ-mɛ tɛ saa mɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de dina in a̧, ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ er-mɛ gán gan war yiitoo
koo war taar, ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ zɛkɛɗi nɛ mɛ. Hɔɗoŋ-aa, ka a zɔk mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee mɛ
tɛ geemɔ mi̧i̧ nɛ zu-a tɛ wen kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ hakali zu-mɛ ka̧ bii tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔr mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ-mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ pi foe tɛ-mɛ.
Ka ŋma gasawi sa mɛ, mɛ mgbe zer-mɛ; a̧ tɛ a sara ha̧ mɛ woyo.
Ká mɛ nak tɛ-mɛ si ti na, wen ká wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ ndak mɛ,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ yor nɛ ɗoŋ batɛ na, wen ká tɛ-wa bi ɗon mɛ.
Ká mɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ tɔ̧ wen nyɛm ŋmaa in a̧ na,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e tɛ-mɛ tɛ zɔm doka wen kɔ̧-a̧ na,
wen nɛ wee mɛ a a̧ we tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ zɔm dɔka wen'i.
A̧ a mam mami si tɛ-mɛ‘i, tam nɛ zaŋ-mɛ.
Wi nɛ kasi wen kɔ-mɛ kɔ zaŋ na, bo nɛ kó na;
a̧ nyɛm mɛ fo ŋma ŋgaŋga mɔ, koo zɔɓɔ yinɛ zu mɛ na.
Mɛ kaŋ tɛ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kasi zu-mɛ, wen mɛ gbam kpɔk in mɔ nɛ tɛ yo mɛ nɛ nu.
Mɔ nɛ ɔm ɔm lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋmaa in wan nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a, ɓɛɛ bii kɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ ŋma wi
Mɔ nɛ ɔm ɔm lɛŋ ndaɗi ŋmaa nɛ zuduka-a, ɓɛɛ bii ndaɗi ŋmaa in wi nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧.
Nɛ hee ge a gbɔ́ò in be-sami tɛ zii nɛ ŋmaa ge?
Nɛ hegɔ a wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ in widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ya nɛnɛ.
Nɛ ge ga̧a̧mɔ ge a nyɛma mɛ duk mgbara ɓoŋgo in toyo ge?
Ɓɛɛ nɛ ge ga̧a̧mɔ ge a nyɛma mɛ duk mgbara wanmbɔi in wisan ge?
O tuifu-zaŋbɛɛ nɛ ya ŋga gbara nɛ kpoo ko o dila; hegɔ mbɛt o wisan nɛ nyɔŋmɔ ko o wanmbɔi.
Wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ sɛna dukaa si ɗɔɔ; hegɔ mbɛt wanmbɔi sɛna wisan.
Ka ŋma wanmbɔi de mɛ yo nu, nɛ o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ a tɔn a̧ e ŋgɔn;
ɓɛɛ ka wisan yo nu, ɓɛɛ o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ bɛ̧ɛ̧ a̧.
Ka ŋma wanmbɔi yɔkaya, ɓɛɛ o bii gár gar tɛnɛ nɛ dɔkaa mɛ gbak a̧.
Ka a̧ tɔ̧ ŋma ɓɔɗɔ́k-wen, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔɔ nú-a. Ka wisan yɔ kaya, bii lɛŋ dɔ́k nɛ wen
a zu a; ka a̧ tɔ̧ ŋma wen nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ yuwar-a, ŋma bii pi nú sɛnɛ na.
Ka ŋma wanmbɔi tɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ yaa nɛ oi-nú zɔn nɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ ɓɛɛ.
Ka ŋma wisan tɔ̧ wen, ɓɛɛ wa aka mɔ‘e: «ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ ɔ?»
Ɓɛɛ ka a to naŋ-a nɛ mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ sɔmgbi nɛ a̧ mɛ yo nu
Mbɔi ɔ dee ka ŋma ɗaŋmɔ a boo zu a na; ɓɛɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ko wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na, san nɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Nɛ mɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ kɔ see-bii a kpai saŋayi-a̧, koo nɛ dea, koo nɛ ɗaŋa.
Nu-wi nɛ gɔn mami’ɛ usi'e see-wi ɔ dee, ɓɛɛ kpaa o tua-wen ak nɛ zɔm gasa taamɔ.
Wi nɛ ŋma ɗaŋ wen gbo nɛ nú-a, ka de ká see gɔna wen zu yɔɔkaya kɔ‘i na a dúk nɛ desee.
Wi nɛ see ŋman zu ŋma mɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ n'a̧-a̧ e nɛ ta-a̧ lɛŋ hɔ nɛ gba̧a̧ a dúk nɛ desee.
Mbɔi bá nɛ wan-ŋga-er na. Ŋma mɔɔ-oi kpaa dɔka mbɔi ko wan-ŋga-er, nɛ́ ge?
Wi, nɛ mɔi̧ mbɔi, ɔ nɛ wɔ ka a̧, mɔi̧ mbɔi'i ha̧ ŋma bii nɛtɛ.
O ŋma bii tɛ kpa kɔ‘i de dukaa wen zu mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧.
Ka ŋma bii a dee ŋga er wen a̧ nɛ tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mɔk er-a si tɛ o?
A̧ beka iŋ gee iŋa bɔtɛ́ mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ ɗaŋa gan wi nɛ e tɛ tɛ́ bɔnɛ bona: mɔɔ oi ɗaŋ kɔ̧-a̧ a'i.
Koo a̧ de nɛ ŋma demɔ, bó nɛ a̧ a kɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur-aa ɗaŋ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gbo.
Wi-aa-see-mɔ nɛ wɛr si mgbaar e nɛ o bii tɛ geemɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋ bii.
Mɔ ko wi-aa-see-mɔ lɛŋ súr yi-a na, ɗaŋ wɔmɔ kor nɛ yisee-a.
Wan-ŋga-ér kɛ̧ nyɔŋmɔ in bii na, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpa gee wan n'a̧-a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ na mbɛt.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ hakali tɛ-mɛ nɛ dea, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ nyɛma yi Gasa Wan ha̧ A̧.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ‘e ɗoŋ fio nyɛi na, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ tɔ̧ ŋgimbi-a ha̧ mɛ na.
Nɛti ha̧ mɛ mɛ fe, mɛ de demɔ in sɛm kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ dɔkaa,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma desee tikiɗi mɛ nyaŋ mɛ na;
ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma mɔ nɛ mɛ de wɔ-a nɛ yuwar-a mɛ tik nu sɔɔgee na.
Mɛ beka e mɔɔ-oi-bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ o ŋma bii na nde?
koo o ŋma bii beka bi mɔɔ-oi-mbɔyaa kɔ-mɛ nɛ mbaɗi na nde?
Mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ bii, mɛ kpɛk mɔ er bii, ɓɛɛ mɛ ba ɗaŋsee kɔ-mɛ pi taŋ,
wen bo nɛ sɛn ye ko o fio a mɛ tɛ kpa desee sɛnɛ na.
Mɔ nɛ yá kpasa lɛŋ ɓúk ɓuk hee laa ga; nɛ heembea nɛ dúk wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ: «Mɛ tɛ fe kana»
Zɔ́k da̧-a̧ wa̧a̧te: o ŋma a ai'i, o ŋma ɓɔ́ kɔ‘i'i.
Nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a kpar-bii dúk nɛnɛ: o ŋma a fe'i, ko-aa a ko ko'i'i.
Mɔ nɛ mbɔ́r mbɔr lɛŋ yak yak, ɓɛɛ wi-dea yak yak in wa mbɛt.
Wi nɛ hɛr tɛ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ ba nɛ́ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘i ta nɛ mɔ,
in nɛ ta mɔ kɔ see-wi zu o yuwar ko ɗuka-taamɔ, kii nɛ ndaa hu̧sa̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧, a dúk nɛ desee.
A̧ war yi ɗoŋ a̧, hee widegia ga, a̧ yor nɛ gia sɛn yi-doe kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛ toro-tua kɔ̧-a̧: a̧ yéŋ nɛ zer-a ka nutua kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ ɔ mgbak ka tua kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ zu̧u̧ mbiŋ tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn zaŋ ŋgeŋ-tua.
A̧ dee tua-laa kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn mgbak ka tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ́ sɛn de fara-bɔtɛ‘i.
A̧ á o bem kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn ti ɗɔɔ ɓaa-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔɔ sɛn ɗɔɔ gbaa-er-a.
Nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ a kpe zu-a wen gbɛŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa a̧ e zaŋ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan de nɛ mɔ nɛ wara. Wi nɛ ha̧ tɛ ha̧ heembea tɛ kpa ɗuka-taamɔ.
Ɗukataamɔ tɛ we ti a hee naawanbem ga; a̧ tɛ kpɛk a̧, hee be-zɔŋa nɛ tɛ iŋ tɛ hɔ na ga n'aa ba nɛ koo
a̧ tɛ ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ nyɔŋ, in yì ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ nɔ.
A̧ tɛ ɛk tɛ-a nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ‘i; a̧ beka pi liki-liki na; a̧ tɛ hɛr tɛ-a̧ nɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ foe beka de a̧ na.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ gasi gan o wi nɛ a̧-a̧ in a̧; a̧ tɛ hu̧i̧ nú-a mɛ tɔ̧ wen sɛn mgbara gii bii.
Desee in nyɛŋɛ tɛ kpe zu-a hee mɛtɛwol-wan ga; nin-a tɛ hur kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ɓɛɛ o mgbelewi beka kpa a̧ na; o ɗaŋwi beka zɔk a̧ na ndo-ndo-ndo.
A̧ yór nyɛi nɛ o wi-ŋman-tɛ; tɛ o windela beka mbaŋ ɗoŋ a̧ na.
Gasa Sɔ̧ bá nɛ nú-wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na, wen gasa Sɔ̧‘i tɛ nɛ tɛ Gasa Wan na.
Nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ a de ha̧‘i mɛ gasi Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ Gasa Wan a ha̧ ha̧taamɔ gasá Sɔ̧‘i ha̧‘i.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e «Nɛ Gasa Wan a dea ha̧‘m mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ» na, wen mɔ n'A̧a̧ sɛna A̧ de na mbɛt
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e «Nɛ a̧, nɛ zu-A̧, a dee ha̧‘m mɛ yɔ kaya» na, wen ŋma mɔ kɔ-A̧ nɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ bo na.
Gasa Wan sɛna kɔ‘i o ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ yu kii A̧ sɛna ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt.
Nɛ A̧, nɛ zu-A̧, a dee bii dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ fara mɛ; ɓɛɛ A̧ e ha̧ bii mɛ demɔ nɛ see hoka.
Ka mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a, mɛ nyɛma mɛ kasi o heembea: mboo zu ha̧ a̧, nɛ mɔ nɛ zɔ́k mɛ.
A̧ baa wee in yi e ti mɛ: mɛ nyɛma mɛ nyɛi er-mɛ zú wan nɛ mɛ hoka.
Gasa Wan ee duka-kpasa in fio ti o bii: koo o nde tɛ kpa nɛ mɔ n'a̧-a̧ hoka.
Wen ɗuka-taamɔ ko Gasa Wan ɔ́ gasá; A̧ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai, A̧ kpaa ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ A̧ zɔk mɔ lɛŋ.
Zɔkamɔ kɔ-A̧ nɛ́ si tɛ o wi nɛ yú kii A̧; A̧, nɛ zu-A̧, iŋa dee-mɔ ko o bii lɛŋ.
A̧ há̧ nú ha̧ ŋma bii mɛ duk ɗaŋwi na; A̧ há̧ yuwar ha̧ ŋma bii mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ na.
Ká mɛ de wo gii-bem nɛ dé gba̧a̧mɔ na ná; ká mɛ de nyɛŋɛ tɛ o bem nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na na.
Koo nɛ oi dɔkaa kɔ-wa'i, ka wa nɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan na, ɓɛs ká mɛ de nyɛŋɛ tɛ wa na.
Ká mɛ ta'e zɛ-wa tɛ dɔk zaŋnu na, ká mɛ e ta-mɛ nɛ zɔm gíí wa'i na; wen gana so
bem kpɔk bá nɛ bem booro, ɓɛɛ gana so koo bem na fé nɛnɛ, bá nɛ koo o bem nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ kpɔk nyɛma dea ha̧ ye mɛ gasi; mɔ kpɔk, kpar o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ tir a nu.
Mi zɔka o ŋma pɛrti mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i nɛ dɔkaa, nɛ gba̧a̧yí‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zii nyɛrɛ o ŋma nɛ ɗaŋá ɗaŋ gan, nɛ zer-am.
Wee tika zu o giiwi-de-ɗaŋmɔ, nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ kura zu dukbii-de-ŋgazu.
A̧ e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ o kuti ŋgaŋa wi nɛ dea so ŋgazu wen zú ŋgai kɔ-wa’ɛ na.
A̧ e ye nɛ Lɔt ɔɔ so sɛnɛ na mbɛt, wen A̧ sɛna so gɔɔtɛ ko o wi-saaye'i.
A̧ de ko ha̧ zudukbii nɛ duka so dɔ̧ɔ̧ in fio, ɓɛɛ nɛ kuma wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa'i, na mbɛt.
Koo ha̧ o wibiro booro gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk nɛ mɔi̧a̧ so ŋmaa tɛ ŋgasee kɔ-wa’ɛ na mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ ban nɛ bo so nɛ bii kpɔk a̧ dee so ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i usi bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧ na wo, tɛɛ yek nɛ bii,
wen deako in nyimsea a̧-a̧ tɛ Gasa Wan. A̧ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai wen ea ɗaŋmɔ, bɛɛ A̧ nyɛma mɛ usi nyimsea mbɛt.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ deako kɔ̧-A̧ ɔ́ nɛnɛ gasá ga, a kita kɔ̧-A̧ ŋgai nɛnɛ mbɛt.
A̧ gɔn kita zu o bii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ-wa.
Ɗaŋwi beka yú mɔ yak nɛ oi mɔɔ-zu̧zu̧ kɔ‘i na, ɓɛɛ munyal ko widedemɔ beka tik nu gee na.
Demɔ nɛ‘i de si tɛ bii lɛŋ, wi tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa, ɓɛɛ koo o nde tɛ kpa mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ‘i.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi tɛ hu̧si tɛ‘m nɛ Gasa Wan. Nɛ tɛ́ o a̧ tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ am sɛn ŋgɔn mɛ o?
Ŋma bii nɛ tɛ iŋ kɔ‘i yí‘m sɛn mgbara giiwi bo na.
Mi nɛ ŋma ge mɔ ge sɛn mgbara zɔm mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea’ɛ ge?
Wen, kóó nɛ yizan, in o mɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ zu a nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ lɛŋ, kóó o ɗuka ndaa gbatɔp, in nu lɛŋ,
nak nak, ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan tɛ-mɛ zɔk nɛ wa.
O kaya in o gun-nu nak nàk, ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan zɔ́k mɔ si tɛ wa.
Ɓɛɛ wi ta gee taamɔ zú mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i na. Wi nɛ kii mɛ iŋ yuwar deemɔ ko Gasa Wan, nɛ o nde?
Hee mɔ nɛ‘i iŋ ŋgimbi tɛaa ko gbabúk ga na, nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a̧ dɔka deemɔ kɔ̧-A̧ yá nɛnɛ nɛ hu̧sa̧a̧ yí bii.
Nɛ́ o'o a̧ tɔ̧ wen deemɔ kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ yuwar-a o? Nɛ́ o'o a̧ zɛm wa o?
Ɗoŋ Nɔ̧ɔ̧-tɔk ɔ́ kɔ‘i nyɛia.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ wi, nɛ zu bo na, tá nɛ mɔ.
Mgbelewi in wi nɛ yɔɔkaya tá nɛ o mgbelemɔ ɓɛɛ.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ zii nu'm, ɓɛɛ mɛ kpa iŋamɔ; mɛ é see-mɛ lɛŋ tɛ o wen n'am tɛ tɔ̧.
Mi tɛ usi ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ mɛ mɔktɛ mɔktɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ usi mɔ ha̧ mɛ nɛ sa̧-a̧.
Tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a, ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan dea nɛ o mɔ kɔ‘i, tɛ dea wa'i a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ wa a nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
A̧ aa o mɔ n'A̧a̧ dea nɛ yuwar-a wen yaa kpoo nɛ kpoo, dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a yak nɛnɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧i̧.
Wa iŋ wɔ na, tɛ-wa mbɛt mbɔi na, wa siŋ tom kɔ-wa pi nu na.
Ŋma nɛ to ŋmaa in ɓii-aa bo na; wa bɛ̧ wen nú-A̧ na ndo ndo ndo.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa, Gasa Wan zɔka mɔ si tɛ nu, ɓɛɛ dún a̧ nɛ o demɔ kɔ‘i.
A̧ kpee zu nu nɛ o mɔ nɛ yá kpasa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, bɛɛ nɛ́ tɛ nu'i a̧ wa tɛ́ si ɗoŋ sɛnɛ.
Gasa Wan dee bii nɛ nu, ɓɛɛ fo a̧ si nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ nu'i woyo.
A̧ gɔna zɛ in ŋgimbi dukaa zaŋnu ha̧ o bii. A̧ dea ha̧ wa mɛ ɔ wan zu o mɔɔ-zaŋnu.
A̧ ha̧ŋgai ha̧ wa, hee kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ tɛ-A̧ ga; A̧ dee wa hɔ́ ŋmaa in A̧.
A̧ dea ha̧ o mɔ nɛ yá kpasa lɛŋ mɛ yu wa, wen ha̧ wa mɛ ɔ wan zu o saɗi zaŋbɛ̀ɛ̀ in o nɔi̧.
A̧ ha̧kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ, leɓe-tɔ̧-wen, o gba̧a̧yí-zɔk-mɔ, o zer-zii-mɔ, in see wen taa mɔ ha̧ wa mbɛt.
A̧ duna wa nɛ iŋamɔ in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ. A̧ usa mɔ nɛ ɔ dee in wan nɛ de na ha̧ wa.
A̧ ea sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-A̧ sɛn kɔ see-wa, wen usa gasi ko o mɔ n'A̧a̧ dea lɛŋ ha̧ wa,
wa tɛ zɔn sa̧-a̧ nin-A̧ wen ɓáá nyɛrɛ gasi ko o mɔ n'A̧a̧ dea.
A̧ ha̧iŋamɔ ha̧ wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧heembea duka-kpasa ha̧ wa sɔɔgee.
