A̧ dee nɔɔtɔk kpoo nɛ kpoo in wa, A̧ usa o gɛŋa kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ wa.
Gba̧a̧yi-wa zɔka zɔm gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, zer-wa zia ŋga tiger-A̧.
A̧ tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa'e: «Ɛnɛ kási zu-‘nɛ́ nɛ o gɔɔmɔ lɛŋ»,
bɛɛ A̧ ha̧heembea ha̧ wa kpɔk kpɔk wen zu yaa kɔ-wa in o ŋmaa.
O yuwar deemɔ kɔ-wa yá kɔ‘i ti A̧ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, wa beka yak yi-A̧ na.
A̧ hoka wan wen zuduk kpɔk kpɔk, ɓɛɛ Israɛl dúk nɛ́ war ko Gasa Wan.
Mɔ nɛ wa de lɛŋ yá ti A̧, hee wese ga; yi-A̧ dúk tɛ naŋanɔ kɔ-wa ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
O gɔɔmɔ kɔ-wa husi yi-A̧ na; o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ a̧-a̧ ti Gasa Wan.
Dee demɔ si tɛ bii dúk yi Gasa Wan, hee tumbal nɛ‘i e zu kalata’ɛ ga;
A̧ zɔ́k demɔ ko bii, hee tu̧-gba̧a̧yi-A̧ ga.
Sɔŋkur-a A̧ tɛ kur, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa ha̧ wa,
A̧ tɛ e mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa sɛn zu wa kpɔk kpɔk.
A̧ hui yuwar piaɗoŋ tɛ A̧ hui ha̧ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kpai sɛ,
A̧ ha̧ nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧ o wi nɛ bó nɛnɛ na.
Mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ dúk, mɛ ai nú ha̧ A̧ ɓɛɛ hegɔ mɛ kaŋ nú ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ Wan mɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mɛ zik ɗoŋ-mɛ ha̧ gɔɔmɔ, mɛ sɛ́n ɗaŋmɔ pi-er-mɛ tɛ wee.
Nɛ́ o'o a̧ tɛ gasi Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn sɛn ye ko o fio, oi nu o wi nɛ ya kpasa zɔn nɛ A̧, o?
Ŋgimbi nɛ bii fe, ɓɛɛ n'a̧-a̧ bo zaŋnu ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ zɔna Sɔ̧ bó ɓɔna mbɛt; nɛ́ ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ dúk
nɛ kpasa in nɛ hayatɛ, a̧ a nyɛma mɛ zɔn nɛ Gasa Wan.
Oe gee gasa deako ko Gasa Wan in ea-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ bii nɛ zik tɛ si tɛ A̧, wa!
Bíí bo nɛ ŋgai mɛ demɔ lɛŋ na, wen bezaŋ-bii dúk kpasa ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ tɔ́ka gan wese nɛ́ gé? Zua'i bó, a̧ bi bii ŋma ŋgimbi.
Ka bo bɔ nɛ bii nɛ wa dee nɛ mur in tɔk ndé, a a̧-a̧ nɛ wɔ ɗaŋmɔ.
Sɔ̧ pɛ́m o gii-mɔɔ-yizan pɛm, ɓɛɛ o bii bó nɛ́ gee fuunu in bùk sɔɔgee.
Nɛ́ wi nɛ dúk kpasa kpoo nɛ kpoo a̧ dea mɔ lɛŋ war kpɔk
Ɓaa wi nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ tɔ̧‘e nɛ́ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ́ Gasa Wan kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
A̧ ee war ha̧ ŋma bii kpɔk mɛ tɔ̧ mɔ n'A̧a̧ dea na. Nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ iŋ nda gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, o?
Nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ we zɔm ŋgai-wan kɔ̧-A̧, o? Wi nɛ tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ gasa deako kɔ̧-A̧, nɛ́ o?
Wi nyɛm mɛ fo ŋma mɔ sɛnɛ yinɛ, kóó ee ŋma mɔ zu-a na.
Wi nyɛm mɛ kpa ndaa gasamɔ ko Gasa Wan na.
Nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ bii tɔ̧‘e wi iŋa kaɗi wó, nɛ́ hi̧i̧ á̧‘a̧ a̧ kú̧ nɛ naŋ-a; ɓɛɛ ka a̧ yɔr, a̧ dúk ndeeŋ gee.
Bíí nɛ́ ge? Tom kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ ge? Demɔ, kóó ɗaŋmɔ n'a̧-a̧ de'i usi hee gé?
Ka a̧ kpa pɛ gɔmŋma zaŋnu, ɓɛɛ dɔka nyɛmna.
O be pɛ nɔ‘i dúk kɔ‘i hee gee be huia kɛɗɛŋ-yi-gbatɔp in gba̧a̧ zarande sɛn ti mɔ nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ ga.
Nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ de ha̧ Gasa Wan mɛ duk nɛ munyal in o bii, dé nɛ kó ha̧ wa'i.
A̧ zɔka ɓɛɛ A̧ iŋ mbɛt hee mɔ nɛ bɔnɛ tɛ ba nɛ tɛ-wa sɔŋkur ŋgimbi ga;
nɛ́ mɔ‘i a̧ de ha̧ ea-ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-A̧ mɛ dɔk nɛnɛ siti'i.
Bíí a̧-a̧ nɛ kó wen ŋma wi, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan a̧-a̧ nɛ kó wen o mɔ n'A̧a̧ dea lɛŋ. A̧ zɔk mgbara
mɔ nɛ ɔ dee in wan nɛ de na, ɓɛɛ A̧ usa yuwar dea ha̧ wa, A̧ usa mɔ ha̧ wa, A̧ mɔi̧ wa
a kpɔk fara, hee mɔ nɛ wi-dai-mɔ de nɛnɛ in mɔdai kɔ‘i nɛ pɛsa’ɛ ga.
A̧ de kó ha̧ o wi nɛ zii wen nu-A̧, in nɛ demɔ nyɛm ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nu kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ haya.
Bem kɔ‘m, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ha̧ mɔ, ká mɛ ku̧i̧ mɔ nɗoŋ a na, kóó tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-ziimɔ zu a̧ na.
Bo nɛ mbɛŋ ga̧ gbɛŋmɔ ga̧-a̧ na ndé? Hegɔ mbɛt, tɔ̧ɔ̧ de wen nyɛma mɛ gan ha̧mɔ ha̧ bii.
Bo nɛ de wen gana gasa ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ na nde? Kpasa widedemɔ gbár wa gbar nu ŋmaa.
Mgbelewi dɔ́k kɔ‘i nɛ wen sɔɔgee; ha̧a̧mɔ ko wan-ŋga-er de ha̧ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧ mɛ ai yí-wi.
Mɛ ak ndaa mɔ, sɛka mɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen; ɓɛɛ mɛ kii nyina tɛ-mɛ, nɛti ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ́ ɔ zɛ́ɛ́
Mɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ, nɛti ha̧ Sɔ̧ mɛ gɔn kita zu mɛ,
ka de ká mɛ kpaa ea-ɗaŋmɔ ŋgimbi n'A̧a̧ tɛ́ tɛ.
Mɛ iŋ yɔɔkaya kɔ-mɛ, nɛti ha̧ zɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ba mɛ; ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ,
mɛ usi'e mɛ kii nɛ yuwar kpaia dukaa kɔ-mɛ.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ kanamɔ zu-a, mɛ dé mɔ‘i ŋgimbi-a ŋgaɓo; ká mɛ zɛm wese fio, sɛka mɛ deemɔ‘i na.
Nɛti ha̧ mɛ mɛ ha̧ nu-mɛ ha̧ Sɔ̧, mɛ ta mɔ nɛ dea sɛ́; ká mɛ dúk hee bii nɛ we Gasa Wan ga na.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ nyimsea nɛ tɛ tik nu sɔŋkur ŋgimbi,
in bɔnɛ nɛ tɛ hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan tɛ zik nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ mɛ́.
Ŋgimbi nɛ nyɔŋmɔ yá lata-lata, tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ ŋgimbi kaɓá;
ŋgimbi kpaamɔ, tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ kɔsá in ɓanamɔ.
Dika gɔna-ndaazan hɔ nɛnɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, mɔ kpai kpai: mɔ yak yak nɛ haya ti Gasa Wan.
Wan-ɗuka-taamɔ dúk zu-naŋ tɛ mɔ lɛŋ; ŋgimbi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ bá nu, a̧ de yɔkɔrɔ mɔ na.
Bíí nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ zu iŋa ti ɗuka-taamɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zɔn wi nɛ kpaa ɗuka-taamɔ‘i zɔn.
Wen ko wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ usi nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ-wa;
wa tɔ̧ o de ɗuka tua-wen kɔ-wa, hee aia ko koro ga.
Ká mɛ e tɛ-mɛ mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ see-mɛ kɔ̧a na, mɛ dór tɛ-mɛ tɛ wɔmɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Ka mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ see-mɛ de wɔ-a, o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ tɛ zɛkɛɗi mɛ.
Ká mɛ e desee kɔ-mɛ wen dea yaka-yi-mɔ na, ká bɔnɛ tɛɛ tik zu mɛ oi-aa.
Ká mɛ pi̧ san zu mɛ tɛ dea gbaŋá nɛ gɔni sede na; zu-a'i, mɛ iŋa'e kóó dala bo kɔ ziɓa kɔ-mɛ na.
Widetom-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ beka kpa mbɔi na; wi nɛ bá o geɗɛk mɔ e tɛ geemɔ tɛ tik mbulɛɛ sɔɔgee.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ in okóò nɛ mɔ nɛ de ha̧ o wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ zu mɛ yɔ.
Wi nɛ ndaɗi in okóò-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu kifi nɛ gee-tum bii.
Mɔɔ-oi tum-tom kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ mbɔra in dɔk; foi kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔ.
Wi nɛ kpɛk mɔ nɛ wa tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ beebee bó nɛ kpasa taamɔ na.
Wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ bá nɛ bɔnɛ pi zu nɛ ta-tɛ.
Wi nɛ ha̧ tɛ tɛ́ dea ɗaŋmɔ, kita tɛ tik a̧.
Wi nɛ sɛ́n bura-wen gbo nɛ zu tɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ dali ŋma wen nɛ mɛ zia na; hegɔ, wen beka tik zu mɛ na.
Kóó nɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ wisɛn kɔ-mɛ mbɛt, ká mɛ tɔ̧ kɔ-mɛ ŋma wen kɔ̧-a̧ na,
ka mɛ nɛ iŋa'e dukaa kɔ-mɛ nɛ oi-nú beka de ŋma mɔ na,
Wen a̧ tɛ zii wen nɛ gbo nɛ nu-mɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka kpɛk nɛ dea na, sɔŋkur-aa a̧ sɛna mɛ.
Mɛ nɛ zia ŋma wen, nɛ mɛ fe nɛ oi-aa. Ká mɛ de kii na, ŋma mɔ de mɛ bo na.
Ŋma be wen tikiɗi, ɓɛɛ pi̧i̧ nyimmɔ tɛ mgbelewi, hee okóò nɛ zaŋ nyim wen koa bem’ɛ ga.
Wen dúk kɔ̧ zaŋ mgbelewi hee góò a zu̧u̧ tɛ mur ku-a ga.
Mɛ ak sɛm kɔ-mɛ sɛ́, ŋmafara a̧ de ŋma mɔ na. Ka a̧ nɛ dea, a̧ beka de ɓɔna.
Mɛ ak ŋma-mɛ sɛ́, ŋmafara a̧ tɔ̧ wen'i na; ka a̧ nɛ tɔ̧a̧, a̧ beka tɔ̧ ɓɔna.
Mɛ ak sɛm kɔ-mɛ sɛ́, wen ndela nɛ́ gba̧‘a̧ mɔ; ká mɛ ndak pata wen lɛŋ nɛ bii tɔ̧ na.
Bó nɛ bii a kɔ̧ mɛ tir yɔɔmɔ na; ŋma bii nɛ tɛ yɔ kɔ‘i kaya nú na, nɛ́ o?
Mɛ ak sɛm kɔ-mɛ, sɛka mɛ ɓila a̧, ɓɛɛ é ha̧ heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn de tom kɔ‘i.
Kpasa ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ́ yuu kii Gasa Wan; ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ́ kpɔk in kasa heembea.
Ɓɛɛ iŋa yuwar dee ɗaŋmɔ bó nɛ ŋma ɗuka taamɔ na.;
Hakala zu-wi mbɛt bó nɛ zia mbɔrɔ ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ na.
Ŋma yuwar iŋa-dee-mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dúk nɛ mɔɔ-nyɛr.
Wi nɛ bó nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ na bó nɛ zu na.
Gana so wi nɛ bó nɛ iŋamɔ dɔk na, ɓɛɛ nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan,
bá nɛ wi nɛ iŋa deemɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ gbin heembea.
Ŋma mgbak iŋa deemɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ nyɛma mɛ ir bii si tɛ gɔɔmɔ;
ɓɛɛ o ŋma bii de kɔ‘i gɔɔmɔ wen usa'e kpasawen nɛ kɔ‘i.
Ŋma bii nɛ́ nɔ zum nɛ zu, kai nɛ sɔnti wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ-a̧ a ɔ kɔ‘i gɔna.
A̧ hu̧si saŋayi-a ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa wan-mgbee-zer; ka'i e yi-wi si tɛ a̧ ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpaa ŋgai zu mɛ.
Ŋma bii de kɔ‘i ɗaŋmɔ na, wen nɛ ŋgai-a bo na; ka a̧ kpa be yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ de a.
Wi tɛ iŋ ti bii tɛ zɔka a̧; nɛ́ tɛ saŋayi a'i iŋ nɛ ti wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ zu.
Nɛ́ tɛ pii laa, in mami, in naŋanɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a'i iŋ nɛ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma dɔka-wen a zu bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ de na, ɓɛɛ dukaa nɛ oi-nú usi ndé wi a̧-a̧ nɛ zu.
Gana so tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen a zu bii, bá nɛ guu nú zu tu̧u̧see kɔ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ɗɔɔ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i tɛ gbo ɗɔɔ bɔnɛ.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de yuwar-mɔ nɛ ŋgai hɔɔ ŋmaa in wan-fee-bɔr nɛ gbɛŋ tɛ-mɛ ɗaŋ be-zɔŋa.
Nɛ́ bii nɛ dúk nɛ oi-nú a'i bá nɛ́ wan-ɗuka-taamɔ; o bii kɔ̧ wi-dɔk-wen na.
Ŋma bii dúk kɔ‘i nɛ oi-nú, wen n'aa bó nɛ ŋma mɔ mɛ tɔ̧ na; ŋma bii woyo kpe kɔ‘i nú,
wen n'a̧-a̧ iŋa de ŋgimbi-tɔ̧-wen.
Wan ɗuka-taamɔ dúk kana nɛ oi-nú hɔ tɛ de ŋgimbi, ɓɛɛ o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ in mgbelewi tɔ̧ kɔ‘i nɛ nú tum.
Wi nɛ dɔ́k wen dak nɛ sɛnmɔ pi zu, ɓɛɛ wa kɔ̧ wi nɛ dúk tɛ tɛ́ wen na.
Ŋma ŋgimbi, bɔnɛ gbak bii gbaki, ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋgimbi de sɔnti pi̧ bɔnɛ pi zu wi mbɛt.
Ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ beka gbak mɛ na a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ; mbɛt ɓɔ,
ŋma ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ nyɛma mɛ gbak mɛ war yiitoo gan kuti-a a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ.
Zɔna mɛ nɛ wa zɔn nyɛma mɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ dúk si ɗɔɔ,
ɓɛɛ dúka si dɔ̧ɔ kɔ-mɛ nyɛma mɛ ba mɛ e ŋgɔn
Ŋma bii hi̧fi̧ zɔm mɔ nɛ be sede tikiɗi; zua'i ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ yoɓi sede'i war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo woyo gán gan.
Nɛ́ gee tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen tikiɗi ko wan-ɗuka-taamɔ a de ha̧ o bii mɛ kɔ̧ a̧,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔka de wen ko mgbelewi nɛ tom takaɗi.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ ko mgbelewi beka gbak mɛ na, koo tikiɗi,
wen gba̧a̧yi-a zɛm nɛ wan nɛ mɛ tɛ ha̧ ha̧ a̧ gan kɔ̧-a̧‘i.
A̧ ha̧ mɔ tikiɗi, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ tɔ̧ wen gan zu a, a̧ ɓá nu-a̧ ɓoŋgoloo hee nú wi-he-mbea ga;
a̧ ha̧ mɔ sɔsɔɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛɛ ak mɛ sa̧a̧mɔ; bii kɔ̧ pɛrti wi nɔ‘i na.
Mgbelewi tɔ̧‘e ndé; «Mi bó nɛ sɛm na, ɓɛɛ ŋma wi-iŋ demɔ kɔ‘m mbɛt bo na»,
o wi nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ o wan-ɗaŋ-nú.
Bíí nɛ dɔkaa zɛkɛɗi nɛ a̧ dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧.
Gana so tóò naŋ nɛ ta, bá nɛ yɔɔ kaya wen; tikaa ko wi-ɗaŋ hó yekseɗe mbɛt.
Bíí nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na dúk hee ŋma nyɛrɛ nɛ‘i íŋ ndaa na, ɓɛɛ nɛ gbó nɛ nú o mgbelewi ɓɔnsɛnɛ ga.
Wi kpɛk tua-wen nɛ gbó nɛ kɔ̧ nu-mgbelewi na, wen n'aa tɔ̧ a̧ nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a na.
San dor o ŋma bii dór tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ka ŋgimbi ɔmtɛ kɔ-wa hɔ́, ŋma mɔ kpɔk nɛ wa tá bó na
O ŋma bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ yɔ́ wen zu foe nɛ de wa yí mgbelewi.
O ŋma bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ há nú ha̧ sɛm kɔ‘i wen zu foe dak nɛ sɛ́n pi zu sɔɔgee.
Ndela nɛ gasa mɔɔ-ndiŋ tɛ bii. Ndela'i gbó nɛ kɔ̧ nú o wi nɛ iŋ mɔ na ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Gana so wi-zu̧zu̧ bá nɛ gasa wi-ndela; mɔ kpɔk, wa yiitoo'i lɛŋ tɛ tik.
Naŋanɔ ko wi-ndela pi nɛ búù zu a, ɓɛɛ foi-aa dúk zu a ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ be mɔ tikiɗi a ir wan-ɗuka-taamɔ siti, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ zu ɔ dee yi o gasawi.
Wi nɛ wá fɔ kusi nɛ tua alkamaari kɔ‘i siti,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɔ dee yi o gasawi tɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ wen zu gɔɔmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ nɛ ti-fu̧i in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ bom nɛ yi wan-ɗuka-taamɔ,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i dór nɛ wi tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen hee kana nɛ‘i pi ndara-nu'i ga
Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ dúk nɛ hu̧sa̧a̧ in mbɔi nɛ‘i guna ɗɔɔ nu de nɛ ge?
Gana so wi nɛ hu̧si̧ mɔɔ-boko kɔ‘i bá nɛ wi nɛ hu̧si̧ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ‘i.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ? Ká mɛ de mbea na, ɓɛɛ mɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ ha̧ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ.
Mɛ yu mɔ ti ɗaŋmɔ, hee mɔ nɛ mɛ yú nɛ mɔ ti gɔk’ɛ ga, wen ka mɛ ndaɗi pii ka tɛ-a,
a̧ tɛ nyɔŋ mɛ; gba̧a̧nin-a dúk hee gba̧a̧nin-dila nɛ gbá bii’ɛ ga.
Gbina heembea dúk hee tɔ̧́ɔ̧́-nú gbapaa nɛ nu-a yiitoo ga; da̧i̧ n'aa e tɛ wi bó nɛ nyina-a na.
Dee ŋgayamɔ in gɔɔtɛ nɛ o mɔɔ-yai-kpaamɔ: nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a tua ko wigɔtɛ tɛ́ yai nɛ́nɛ.
Kɔ́famɔ ko wisan ye yee zer Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ ahai A̧ deemɔ n'a̧-a̧ kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Wi nɛ sɛ́n dɔka wen a zu-wi ndak nɛ pata wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan kpai nɛ dukaa kɔ̧‘i sɛn kɔ see.
Bíí iŋa wi-tɔ̧ yɔka-wen dam fara lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wan-de-taamɔ iŋa yɔɔkaya kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ de tua nɛ gɔni sede dúk hee a̧ kai nɛ ta mbo nɛ pɛsi-fio kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Mɔ̧i̧a̧ ko o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na dúk hee hɛra yuɗu ga; sɔŋkur mɔ ko-wa nɛ bia wee ɓɛɛ.
Yuwar ko o ɗaŋwi mboɗa kpɔk, ta bó sɛnɛ na, nduti-a nɛ ɗuká kɔ̧fio.
Wi nɛ ndak pata heembea ɔ́ nɛ wan zu wɔmɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ sɔŋkur yuu kii Gasa Wan nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ.
Wi nɛ iŋ yuwar deemɔ na beka yambi mɔ na, ɓɛɛ ŋma iŋa yuwar deemɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt nɛ kaɗi nɛ ɗaŋa.
Iŋamɔ ko wan-ɗuka-taamɔ ndɔr ndɔr hee ha̧a̧yi ga,
ɓɛɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧-mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ dúk hee kpuput yi duká-kpasa ga.
See-mgbelewi dúk hee gbaa kpana ga, a̧ nyɛm mɛ kasi mɔ n'a̧-a̧ yambi na.
Ka wi-iŋmɔ zii ŋma wen ɗuka-taamɔ, a̧ kpɛ́k kpɛk nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ a̧ kia mɛ tɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧
gan zú i̧i̧ woyo; ka wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ zii wen'i, de tɛ-a na, ɓɛɛ a̧ siŋa pi̧ nɛ kɔ́r-zu-a.
Nyɛrɛ ko wi-bɔkɔ dúk hee dita tui-nɛ́-gɛnɛ ga; ɓɛɛ nɛ ko wi-iŋmɔ, ndara-nú-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ gee nyɔɔ̧-wen.
Sɛn mgbara gii bii, wi kii mɛ zii nɛ wen ko hayawi, ɓɛɛ wi taa mɔ zu wen'i sɛn kɔ̧ see-wi.
Ɗuka-taamɔ dúk yi mgbelewi hee gee gboŋkoloŋ tua ga,
ɓɛɛ iŋamɔ ko wi-ɓɔkɔ nɛ gee wɔkɔlɔ́-wɔkɔlɔ́ wen.
Heembea dúk kɔ‘i yi mgbelewi hee poka-naŋ in aŋko-er ga.
Wi-bɔkɔ mam kɔ‘i mami nɛ hee gɛr bɛɛ hayawi ku̧í kɔ‘i ku̧i̧ nɛ hu̧sa̧a̧.
Heembea dúk yi hayawi hee ŋma wele-lɔr in kaná pi ɓaa-mɛ-wiiko ga.
Mgbelewi ye kɔ‘i tua ndurr, bɛɛ widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a yee kɔ‘i nɛ hɔn.
Mgbelewi dúk nɛ nutua guɗi nɛ mɔ si kɔ tua, ɓɛɛ kóó wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ, a̧ yor kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ zan.
Dukaa sɛn ka nutua yéŋ nɛ zer nɛ́ tom ko wi nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na,
ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i pi nɛ foe tɛ wi-iŋ-mgbar-mɔ.
Ndara-nú o wi-dɔk-wen dali nɛ kpɔk mɔ nɛ o ŋma bii tɔ̧ɔ̧ kaɗi,
ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mɔ wɛ́k kɔ‘i wen kɔ‘i wɛk sɛ́.
Taamɔ ko o wi-bɔkɔ dúk kɔ‘i kɔ̧ nu-wa, ɓɛɛ nú o wan-ɗuka-taamɔ dúk kɔ‘i kɔ̧ see-wa.
Ka wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na fóm wisɛn kɔ‘i, a̧ fóm nɛ zu-a nɛ zu-a woyo.
Wi-tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen tɛ bii, a̧ nɛ ndiŋ tɛ, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ yá ka tɛ a lɛŋ sɛ́n nɛ a̧.
Wi-tɛɛri hɔɔ ŋmaa in ta nɛ ɗɔr kpee ɗoŋ-aa; kóó o nde a nɛ sáp wen nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛr.
Wi-tɛɛri hɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋmaa in kina-ɗɔr: wi nɛ tam lɛŋ ŋmasi nɛ er.
Duká dáà o ɗaŋ bem, nɛ mɔɔ-foe, ɓɛɛ koa be-okóò mbɛt nɛ́ mɔɔ-wen.
Bokobem nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ tɛ kpa wii;
nɛ ko wan nɛ de nɛ́ mɔɔ-búù‘i há̧ nɛ ditasee ha̧ wi nɛ koo a̧.
Bokobem nɛ foe bo yi na pi̧ nɛ búù zu dáà in wii kɔ̧‘i; hegɔ wa nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ tɛ e a̧ tɛ geemɔ.
Dɔka wen nɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ na dúk hee ŋma gima-nyɛŋɛ ŋgimbi fio ga;
ɓɛɛ nyasi in mbɛri mbɛt gbak gbak ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
Usa mɔ ha̧ wi-bɔkɔ dúk hee latá gbaa dak nú-ŋmaa ga, dúk hee tuna wi o mgbelɛ-yá ga mbɛt.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen si tɛ wi-bɔkɔ nyɛma ŋmaa in tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen in wi-zur-ya: tɛ sɔŋkur mɔ, a̧ tɛ tɔ̧‘e:
«Nɛ́ ge boo ge?»
Mɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ wi nɛ fea wen n'a̧-a̧ ee sa̧a̧mɔ dúk. Mɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ wi-bɔkɔ mbɛt wen zu a bó ɓɔna.
Ká mɛ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ wi nɛ fea gan na, wen a̧ kpaa nɛ ɔmatɛ, ɓɛɛ duká-kpasá ko wi-bɔkɔ ɗaŋa gan fio.
Zɛ hi̧a̧ fio nɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; nɛ hi̧a̧ wi-bɔkɔ in wi nɛ yú Gasa Wan na,
kana nɛ wese lɛŋ nɛ wa ɓɔna nɛ kpasa kaŋ.
Ká mɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ dɔkaa in mgbelewi na, ká mɛ gbam in wi nɛ iŋ mgbara mɔ na na;
ká mɛ hɛr tɛ-mɛ nɛ a̧ na, wen ká sakalamɔ tɛɛ tik zu mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká ndiŋ a tɛ-mɛ,
ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ ŋmasi tɛ-a̧. Ka mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ duk kedéŋ, nɛ mɛ gbo wen kɔ̧-a̧,
wen ká mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ̧-a̧‘i tɛɛ sakali mɛ.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ dita gan sɔ̧ɔ̧-bɔi nɛ́ ge? Ŋma nin nɛ‘i tɛ sa nɛ a̧ yak zu wi-bɔkɔ‘i nɛ́ ge?
Nyɛmɛ, tɔ̧́ŋ in mboɗa boi ya kɛ́ŋfɛ́yɛ́ŋ gan tuia wi nɛ bo nɛ zu na.
Nakanu nyɛm mɛ yai te-ba-gɛr-tua nɛ‘i saŋa nɛ dea na; hegɔ mbɛt, wi nɛ taa mɔ nɛ dea,
ɓɛɛ nɛ ee see mɛ de ŋma mɔ kɔ‘i beka siŋ mɔ‘i pi nu ŋgimbi ŋgayamɔ na.
Ŋma hɛra-nú nɛ dúk zu de taamɔ dúk nɛ dea hee ŋma ŋgeraa dikira ŋgeŋ-tua ga.
O be ta nɛ‘i aa zu kusa garo nyɛm mɛ yor ti búk na; hegɔ mbɛt, see wi-kii nɛ tá
nɛ mɔɔ-bɔkɔ beka yor ti ŋma mɔɔ-kii na.
Ka'i mbɛr gbaayi-wi, ɓɛɛ miikɔ̧a̧ hɔɔ sɛnɛ; ɓɛɛ ka'i mbɛr yi-see-wi, ɓɛɛ wi foo o taamɔ a ŋgɔn.
Wi nɛ pi̧ ta si tɛ o nɔi̧ pɛsi nɛ wa; wi nɛ dɔk wen a zu sɛm kɔ‘i ɗáŋ nɛ yuwar sɛm'i.
Ka mɛ nɛ daka gbapaa si tɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ ta mɔ gan na; ɛ́nɛ́ nyɛma mɛ ɗafi mgbara ŋmaa woyo.
Ka mɛ nɛ ɗaŋa ŋmaa in sɛm kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ yu ŋma mɔ na; yuwar ɗafa ŋmaa k’ɛ́nɛ́
a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ; mɔ kpɔk, daa dara, ee wen kɔ̧ zaŋ na, aa bii tɛ geemɔ, ará naŋ ŋma wi,
nɛ́ o mɔɔ-pɛsi-sɛm ka tɛ wi.
Mɛ de há̧ see-sɛm kɔ-mɛ mɛ́ bá mɛ ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ a̧-a̧ zaŋ san, ka de ká mɛ nyɔŋa bɔtɛ
in a̧, ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ mbɔi. Mɛ ndak in a̧, ŋgimbi bɔnɛ, ka de ká mɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ kpɔk in a̧.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ gbɛŋmɔ in ziwee yak nɛnɛ ti ha̧ wee ga, a o dara yak nɛnɛ ti ha̧ tɔk.
Foe beka de'm tɛ gɔna zu sɛm kɔ‘m na, ɓɛɛ mi beka husi tɛ‘m yi-a̧ na mbɛt,
ɓɛɛ ka ŋma ɗaŋmɔ kpa'm wen zu a̧, o wi nɛ tɛ zii wen-a̧-a̧ lɛŋ tɛ yu a̧.
Wi nɛ tɛ dor nu'm, nɛ tɛ pi̧ kaná ndara-nú‘m,
wen ka'm tɛɛ tik wen zu wa, in ka leɓ‘am tɛɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ yɔ, nɛ o?
Gasa Wan, Dáà, in Wi nɛ ɔ wan zu duká-kpasá kɔ‘m, k’Ɛnɛ kpɛk ha̧‘m mɛ de nɛ o mɔ lɛŋ
nɛ o ndara-nú‘m kɔ̧a̧ na, ɓɛɛ k’Ɛnɛ kpɛk mbɛt ha̧ wa mɛ de ha̧‘m mɛ tik na.
Wi nɛ tɛ de ha̧ o taamɔ kɔ‘m mɛ tan, nɛ́ o? Wi nɛ tɛ de ha̧ see-am mɛ ndak nɛ ɗoŋ yuwar
ko ɗuka-taamɔ mbaŋ nɛ tɛ‘m zu yɔɔkaya kɔ‘m in ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m mbɛt, nɛ́ o?
Wen ká o yɔɔkaya kɔ‘m tɛɛ dɔk ɓɛɛ ká ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m tɛɛ daŋ zu ŋmaa;
wen ká‘m tɛɛ yɔ nu ti o wisɛn, ɓɛɛ ka wisɛn tɛɛ zɛkɛɗa'm.
Ho, Gasa Wan, Dáà in Sɔ̧ ko duká-kpasá kɔ‘m, k’Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ yi-ŋmaŋtɛ ha̧‘m na.
Ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ ir am nyɛi nɛ dee wɔ́mɔ.
Ká wɔ́mɔ in ŋgɛɗɛ́ o wan zu'm na, k’Ɛ́nɛ́ e há̧ ndiŋ wɔ́mɔ mɛ gbɛ‘m gan na.
O bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ zii hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i kasi nɛ nu-wi ga. Wi nɛ tɛ ndak pata usamɔ'ɛ beka kpa wen na.
Nɛ́ nu wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ a pi̧ wen zu a̧; wi-kai-ndaa-bii in wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ tɛ́ tik yi pɛ́r ko wen mɛ́ nu-wa.
Ká mɛ de mɛ kan mɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kan mɔ nɛ nin Sa̧-a̧ Wi ŋgimbi lɛŋ na.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ widetom nɛ‘i dúk ɗoŋ-aa ŋgimbi lɛŋ ba nɛ nyasi ga, hegɔ mbɛt wi nɛ kan mɔ
in nɛ sá nin Gasa Wan zu geemɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧ beka dúk ɗaŋmɔ bó zu a na na.
Wi nɛ kan mɔ nyɛmna gbin nɛ heembea nyɛmna mbɛt, ɓɛɛ ɗoŋ bɔnɛ beka nyɛi nɛ ka̧ tua
kɔ̧-a̧ na. Ka a̧ nɛ kaná mɔ nɛ nú tum, ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ si ɗoŋ zu a, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ nɛ kanamɔ
nɛ woi, a̧ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ zu ŋmaa woyo. Ka a̧ nɛ kaná mɔ zu ndelá, ɓaawen tɛ tik zu a̧,
ɓɛɛ o ŋgayamɔ tɛ tik zú tua kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma wen a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in fio: ka'i kpa wa mgbara o bezaŋ Jakɔb na,
wen kpasa bii ko Sɔ̧ yor kɔ‘i nɛ nyɛia ka̧ pɛrti o mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa kiŋgili tɛ-wa nɛ o ɗaŋmɔ na.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ ndiŋ wen mɛ gbo nɛ nu-mɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, wen o wén nɔ‘i fo nɛ wi pi tɛ ɗaŋmɔ.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ dáà kɔ-mɛ in naa kɔ-mɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ dúk mgbara o gasawi,
wen ká tá-zu-mɛ bi nde mɛ a̧-a̧ in wa, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ tɛɛ demɔ hee wi-bɔkɔ ga.
Mɛ nyɛma so mɛ tɔ̧‘e ka bo hegɔ ɓɛɛ gana so ka wa ko wi na, ɓɛɛ ma tɛ̀ɛ̀ fom wese nɛ wa koo nɛ mɛ‘i.
Wi nɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ laɓak wen yee tɛ-a kaɗi beka kpai dukaa kɔ‘i na ndo-ndo-ndo hɔ́ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur wese kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma zuduk bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ yiitoo nɛ mɔi̧ ɗaŋmɔ mɔi̧ a zu ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ taar-a dak kɔ‘i nɛ nyimsea
(ko Gasa Wan) pi zu: wɔ́mɔ nɛ dár dar hee wee ga nyɛm mɛ kaɗi n'a̧-a̧ tɛ bá nɛ hiɗi-wi na'i na.
Wi nɛ de ndiŋmɔ a tɛ beka siŋ ndiŋmɔ‘i pi nu, nɛti ha̧ wee-a mɛ dɔ a̧, na.
Nyɔŋmɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔɔ mɔ nú wi-ŋgɛɗɛ; tɛ-a beka mbɔi sɛnɛ na hɔ́ nɛnɛ tɛ fio.
Ŋma wiwii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt nɛ dúk in kpɔk koo kɔ‘i ɓɛɛ na; a̧ tɔ̧ nɛ tɛ-a'e: «ŋma wi nɛ nyɛma
mɛ zɔk am, nɛ́ o? Tum baa nu ka tɛ‘m kaɗi, o ŋgeŋ kpee yi'm, ŋma bii nɛ tɛ zɔk am bona.
Mi ɓili kɔ‘m zu'm wen ge? Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn beka tɔr o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘m na.»
Mɔ nɛ wi’ɛi yu nɛ gbaayi-bii, ɓɛɛ tɛ-a bii kɔ‘i nde gbaayi Gasa Wan toka war gɔmŋmaa-
gɔmŋmaa gan wese. A̧ zɔk naŋanɔ ko bii lɛŋ zɔ̀k, A̧ zɔk mɔ hɔ sakara-a lɛŋ
Nɛti ha̧ A̧ mɛ de o mɔ, A̧ iŋa so wa lɛŋ kaɗi; nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt ɗoŋ n'A̧a̧ dee nɛ wa kaɗi.
Wi’ɛi tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ oi tom kɔ‘i sɛn beegara saaye, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ sɛn fara n'a̧-a̧ tá so na a wa tɛ ba a̧ sɛnɛ.
Nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt in okóò nɛ siŋa wii kɔ‘i pi nu, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ kó be-dala in ŋma wiwii nɛtɛ
Nɛti, a̧ gbina heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn; hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, a̧ dee nɛ yɔɔkaya mɔ in wii kɔ̧-a̧,
taar-a, a̧ kifa koo-de-dala kó nɛ o be-dala á nu in ŋma wiwii nɛtɛ.
Wa tɛ ba a̧ e ti o giiwi, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ɓa ndaa o bem kɔ̧-a̧.
Naŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ beka nɔ̧́ nu na, ɓɛɛ o gbaa-ér-a̧ beka wai na.
Fom tɛ duk zu a̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ búù kɔ̧-a̧ beka bi na kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Hegɔ, o wi mɛ ɗoŋ tɛ iŋ nde ŋma mɔ nɛ gana yuu kii Gasa Wan bo na,
in ŋma mɔ nɛ ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔɔ hee ndaka ɗoŋ o heembea kɔ̧-A̧ ga bo na mbɛt.
Ɗuka-taamɔ zɔn nɛ tɛ-wi nɛ tɛ-wi. A̧ gasi nɛ zu-a sɛn mgbara dukbii kɔ̧-a̧.
A̧ hu̧i̧ nɛ nu-a̧ sɛn mgbara giiwi ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ gasi nɛ zu-a̧ sɛn ti ŋgayamɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
«Mi gboo nɛ kɔ̧ nú Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mi kpe zú nu hee kútú ga.
«Fara-duk kɔ‘m a̧-a̧ so yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ, ɓɛɛ kiti-wan kɔ‘m dúk so sɛn zu tura-zan.
«Mi zika yizan kpá nú ŋmaa ɛn'am, ɓɛɛ mi yar sɛn ɗɔɔ ɗuka ndaa gbatɔp.
«Mi ɔɔ wan zu o pɛŋa-yì gbatɔp in zu nu nɛ oi-aa, zu o bii in o zuduk lɛŋ.
«Mi kia fara ɔmtɛ mgbara wa nɔ‘i lɛŋ. Nɛ́ ge nu ge a'm té de yé sɛnɛ ge?
«Hegɔ, Wi nɛ dea mɔ lɛŋ ha̧nú ha̧‘m. Wi nɛ dee am'i usa mgbak fara-duk kɔ‘m ha̧‘m
«A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧‘m: ‘Mɛ de fara-duk kɔ-mɛ sɛn nu ko Jakɔb. Israɛl a dúk nɛ nu oi o dáà kɔ-mɛ.’
«A̧ dee am nɛti ɓeemɛ, dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
«Mi wora so A̧ kɔ sa̧-a̧ Tua-laa nɛ gbaayi-A̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hegɔ a'm dee nɛ fara-duk kɔ‘m sɛn Siɔn.
«A̧ dea ha̧‘m mɛ ɔm tɛ‘m sɛn saaye n'A̧a kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ mi de fara-ɔ-wan kɔ‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm.
«Mi za̧-a̧ kunin-am sɛn mgbara dukbii nɛ nin-a̧ ɔ hura. Mi duk tɛ kɔ‘m sɛn mgbak fara ko Gasa Wan.
«Mi gasa sɛnɛ hee
«Mi gasa hee te-ndɛŋɛ sɛn Ɛin-Gɛdi ga, hee ŋma be-te
hee ŋma de te-nɔ́ sɛn kɔ̧ hira-nu, hee ndia
Pɛ́r tɛ‘m daŋa si fara-duk kɔ-mɛ hee pɛr be-te nɛ‘i sa'e kanɛl
in o ŋma be-te nɛ pɛr-aa kúr kur ɓisisi ga, hee pɛr de sɔ̧ɔ̧-tɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ga,
hee zi-wer fuu-nyama nɛ‘i dɔ́ sɛn kɔ̧-tua ko Sɔ̧ ga.
Mi gbaa er-am hee ŋma gɔla
Mi ɓɔɔ kpɛlɛ-kpɛlɛ hee te-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, ɓɛɛ o do'm wai nɛ o de wayate nɛ dɔkaa.
Ɛnɛ tɛ pii tɛ‘m, ɛnɛ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ am’ɛ, ɓɛɛ zaŋ-‘nɛ́ a súr nɛ o waya'm.
Taa mɔ wen am ɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɔɔ gan gɔrɔ, ɓɛɛ kpaa'm dee gan yaa-bú-sap gɔrɔ.
O wi nɛ nyɔŋ am, wɔ nyɔŋa'm'i tɛ gbɛ wa woyo, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ nɔ‘m, wɔ nɔɔ‘m'i tɛ gbɛ wa woyo.
Wi nɛ zii nú‘m beka tik gee na, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ de tom in am beka yɔ kaya na.
O mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i, n’ɛɛ́ tɔra'i lɛŋ, nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ kalata nɔɔtɔk kɔ Sɔ̧ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn,
nɛ́ Heembea nɛ Mɔizɛ yɔra h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ dúk nɛ mɔɔ-oi wen o mɔi̧aa ko o bezaŋ Jakɔb.
Heembea duna nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ hee mɔ nɛ nanayi Pisɔn in Tigrɛ há̧ nɛnɛ mɛ ɗuka ɓar’ɛ ga.
Nɛ́ a̧ a de ha̧ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ mɛ fok yɛyɛyɛ, hee nanayi Efrat in hee Jurdɛn, ŋgimbi mɔi̧ nyɔnɔ ga.
Nɛ́ a̧ a fo usamɔ gbónɛ́ nɛ dɔkaa, hee ha̧a̧yi Nil in Gihɔn ŋgimbi bia waya nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga.
Wi nɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ tɔra kalata Heembea tɛ iŋ lɛŋ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na,
hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ sɔŋkur bii beka hɔ́ nɛnɛ tɛ ndaa-a̧ na mbɛt’ɛ ga.
Wen taamɔ nɛ gbó nɛ tɛ heembea pɛsa gan gbatɔp, ɓɛɛ o mɔ n'a̧-a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de ɗuka gan gba dir-yi.
Nɛ́ kɔ‘m, mi duka so hee be-for-yi nɛ tɛ nɛ ɗɔɔ nanayi ga,
in hee ŋma mbaŋga war-yi nɛ fók si see fo ga.
Hegɔ, mi tɔ̧ɔ̧: «Mi tɛ a yi tɛ kpɛɛfɔ kɔ‘m, mi tɛ a yi zu o taŋa kɔ‘m. »
Zɔ́k, kinii, be-for-yi kɔ‘m kifa gasa nanayi, ɓɛɛ nanayi kɔ‘m kifa gbatɔp.
Mi tɛ de ha̧ usamɔ mɛ tok hee gɔna ndaazan ga, ha̧ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ nyɛk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi.
Mi tɛ pɛsi usamɔ dam fara lɛŋ, hee ŋma wen oi-nu Sɔ̧ ga, ɓɛɛ mi ee a̧ ha̧ o wi mɛ ɗoŋ.
Ɛnɛ zɔ́k, bó nɛ wen zu'm ɛn'am a'm zɔká nɛ bɔnɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ wen zu o bíí lɛŋ nɛ kii ɗuka-taamɔ.
O ŋma mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ taar, nɛ see-am baa nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɔ dee yi Gasa Wan in yi bii.
O nya-wi nɛ zii nú ŋmaa nɛ dea,
dee sɛm ko o wi nɛ ya kpɔk fara,
koo in wii nɛ zii ŋmaa nɛ dea.
O ŋma bii a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ taar, nɛ see-am sɛna, ɓɛɛ nɛ deemɔ kɔ-wa há nɛ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m nyɛmna:
wisan maŋtɛ
wanmbɔi-de-ndela
sɔkawi-de-dala nɛ bó nɛ zu na.
Ka mɛ nɛ mɔi̧a̧ ŋma mɔ tɛ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ na, nɛ́ ge a mɛ tɛ kpa ŋgimbi sɔki kɔ-mɛ ge?
Oe, de gɔna kita nɛ baa nɛ o wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ mbui zu, in tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔro nɛ baa nɛ dita-wi mbɛt wa!
Ɗuka-taamɔ baa nɛ o sɔkawi, taamɔ in mbɔrɔ baa nɛ o tu̧u̧-tɛ-bii.
Iŋa yuwar deemɔ ko o sɔkawi dúk hee mɛtɛwol nɛ‘i kár zu-wi ga, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ há̧ gasi ha̧ wa nɛ́ yuu kii Gasa Wan.
O ŋma mɔ a̧-a̧ kɔ see-am mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar nɛ ɔ dee tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ e ɓu-a:
wi nɛ kpa desee nɛ ɗoŋ o bem kɔ‘i,
wi nɛ zɔk tikaa ko wisɛn kɔ‘i, ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna nɛ gbaayi.
Desee a̧-a̧ in wi nɛ dúk in okóò nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ zu. (Wi nɛ hɛr ndai kpɔ́k in tuifuu wa nɛ́ fɔ na.)
Desee a̧-a̧ in wi nɛ ŋma ɗaŋ wen gbó nɛ kɔ̧ nu-a̧ na.
Desee a̧-a̧ in wi nɛ tɛ de tom ha̧ ŋma wan-tom nɛ nyɛm yi-a na na.
Wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ de taamɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɔ̧ wen ha̧ mgbak zer-zii-mɔ a dúk nɛ desee.
Oe, gasi ko wi nɛ kpaa ɗuka-taamɔ wa! Mɔ kpɔk, wi nɛ gasa gan wi-yu-kii Gasa Wan bo na.
Yuu kii Gasa Wan gana zu mɔ lɛŋ, ŋma bii nɛ nyɛma ŋmaa in wi-yu-kii Gasa Wan bo na.
Gana so gee dɔka da̧i̧, bá nɛ da̧i̧ kɔ see; gana so gee ɗaŋ, bá nɛ ɗaŋ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ okóò.
Gana so gee bɔnɛ, bá nɛ bɔnɛ wen sɛnmɔ; gana so gee kifa-er, bá nɛ kifa-er ko wisɛn.
Ŋma ɗaŋ maada̧ nɛ gana maada̧ ko gɔ́k bo na; ŋma ɗaŋ nyimsea nɛ gana nyimsea ko okóò bó na.
Gana so a'm ɔ́ kpɔk kɔ̧ tua in dila koo in ndiɓa, bá nɛ ɔaa kpɔk in ɗaŋ okóò.
Ɗaŋ ko okóò kpai nɛ saŋayi-a, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ saŋayi-a mɛ tu̧, hee ko baŋgiiɗoŋ ga
Kóó wii kɔ̧-a̧ yuu mɔ si tɛ kɔ ŋma wi mbɛt, a̧ a̧-a̧ tɛ pɛ̧ɛ̧-see.
Oi ɗaŋ lɛŋ nɛ gee geɗɛk mɔ ti ɗaŋ ko okóò; mɔ lɛŋ nɛ tik zu wiɗeɗaŋmɔ a tik zu a mbɛt.
Ko-bur-wen dúk ti wiwii nɛ dɔ́k wen na, hee suia zarande sɛn ti ɗɔɔ naŋ gbɛ́rɛ́ ga.
Ka mɛ de ha̧ mɛ́ mɛ kɔ̧ okóò wen de saŋayi-a na; ká mɛ de wɔ okóò na.
Wiwii nɛ koo kɔ̧ a̧ demɔ lɛŋ ha̧ a̧, a iŋ nde tu̧u̧see, dɔka-wen, in gasa foe pɛm nɛ a̧.
Mɔ ko ko-de-daŋ nɛ́ nyimsea, kaia sɔnti in da̧i̧ ko see.
Mɔ ko wan nɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ wi kɔ‘i na nɛ́ mɔkaa-ɓaa in gbula-zugur.
Ɗaŋmɔ ku̧u̧ zu okóò ɓɛɛ kana nɛ dodom nɛ mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ́ kum nɛnɛ lɛŋ'ɛ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma nu yi kɔ-miɛ mɛ a nu na. Ká mɛ e yuwar ha̧ okóò-de-ɗaŋ mɛ tɔ̧ wen tikiɗi na mbɛt.
Kà a̧ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ zia nú-mɛ na láŋ, mɛ kɛ̧ tɛ-mɛ nɛ a̧ nɛ kaara, ɓɛɛ mɛ fo a̧ si nɛ ha̧ o bii kɔ̧-a̧.
Wiwii nɛ baá de koo a̧-a̧ nɛ desee; zɛ duká-kpasá kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ dɔk siti war yiitoo woyo.
Haya okóò ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ wii kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wii'i tɛ kaɗi pɛ kɔ‘i zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Baa de koo nɛ kpaa de sɔnti. Nɛ́ o wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan a kpaa a̧.
Koo a̧ nɛ wisan, koo nɛ wanmbɔi, see-a a̧-a̧ tɛ nyɛŋɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ saŋayi-a gɔn nɛ mami ŋgimbi lɛŋ.
O ŋma mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ taar nɛ see-am gɔ́n gɔn sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ naar-a pi̧ nɛ kii tɛ‘m:
kaia ndaa-wi,
gaiamɔ-ɗaŋsee,
ɓira wen ndela: o mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ɗaŋa gan fio.
Ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ'ɔ gbɛŋ ɗɛɗɛ in mɔ'ɔ ha̧ ŋga bɔnɛ, hee okóò de gɔyá ŋma wi, in nɛ a̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee mbɛt ga, bo na.
Okóò-de-ɗaŋ dúk hee kpaŋá gɛr ndai-wa-fɔ nɛ mi̧i̧ mi̧i̧ ga.
Kiaa ha̧ a̧ mɛ mbo zu dúk hee baa tore kɔ̧ er ga.
Okóò gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ dúk nɛ mɔɔ-búù; a̧ nyɛm mɛ diti yi-bii ɓɔ na.
Wi iŋ ti okóò nɛ foe bo yí ná tɛ zɔkamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, in tɛ gɔma-yí kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɛ yor nɛ nɔaa ti bokobem nɛ foe bo yí na: ka a̧ kpa ŋma be yuwar tikiɗi, a̧ tɛ demɔ lɛŋ n'a̧-a̧ kɔ̧a.
Mɛ hakali zɔka wál-wál mɔ kɔ̧-a̧. Ka mɛ ɔ́r tɛ-mɛ na, wen a̧ yɔk nɛ mɛ.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ wi-nɛ-gɛnɛ nɛ wɔ-yi gbɛ̀ɛ̀ hu̧i̧ nɛ nú nɔ́ nɛ kuti yi n'a̧-a̧ kpa ga,
a a̧ duk nɛ nu fara n'a̧-a̧ kpa lɛŋ, hu̧i̧ nɛ nu ɓaro kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o góò lɛŋ,
Nyɛma yi-bii ko okóò ha̧ nɛ desee ha̧ wii kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ iŋa yuwar deemɔ kɔ̧-a̧ há nɛ ŋgai in nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧ a̧ siti.
Okóò nɛ dɔ́k wen na dúk nɛ gba de ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ ko Gasa Wan,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ gana wan nɛ iŋa de yuwar dukaa bo na.
Okóò nɛ kasi zu dee yi-bii gán gan war yiitoo,
ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ baa see-bii gán wan nɛ tu̧-tɛ bo na.
Dee ko okóò nɛ mɔá-kutua kɔ̧-a̧ yá nɛ wara hɔɔ ŋmaa in wese nɛ tok ŋgol ŋgol sɛn yiwese ŋgɔn mɛ.
De saŋayi nɛ dúk tɛ de kpɛɗɛ-kpɛɗɛ tɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in wee-lamba
nɛ nyɛk zu dek-e-wee nɛ dúk kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
De duk-bee zu nɔ̧ɔ̧ dukui-naŋ hɔɔ ŋmaa in mbiŋ lɔr, nɛ gun-aa nɛ bu-mbɔi.
O ŋma mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ yiitoo nɛ tu̧ nɛ see-am, ɓɛɛ ŋma taar-a nyim nɛ see-am:
wanmbɔi nɛ san tika zu a̧,
o wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ‘i e wɔkɔrɔɔ,
wi nɛ e deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a dúk mɛ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ:
Gasa Wan tɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ fe yi gbapaa.
Ɔ ŋgayá ha̧ wiɗɔrmɔ mɛ ŋyɔn bii na,
ɓɛɛ wi-de-gɛnɛ mbɛt nyɛm mɛ duk ŋma ɗaŋmɔ bó zu a na na.
O bii nɛ dɔkaa dee ɗaŋmɔ wen wɔ kpaa mɔ nɛ dɔkaa,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kii yuwar mɛ kpa mbɔi zɔ́k mɔ si tɛ bii ɓɔ na.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ ɓɛ̧i̧a̧ nu-tɛ ye nɛnɛ mgbara gbaa ta’ɛ ga a̧ ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt ye nɛnɛ mgbara ɗɔramɔ in hi̧fa̧mɔ.
Ka ŋma bii hɛr tɛ nɛ nɔaa tɛ yuu Gasa Wan na, tua kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ gbin a nu nɛ hayaa.
Ka'i zɛk mɔ nɛ kpala, ɓɛɛ zak-a ɓɔna yi-a,
hegɔ mbɛt, nɛ tɛ wen mɛ nu-bii a'i iŋ nɛ be oi mɔ nɛ ɓɔna tɛ a̧.
Nɛ wee a'i we nɛ ŋgaiá kpana ko wiɓukpana,
hegɔ mbɛt, nɛ tɛ zia wen nɛ gbo nɛ nu-bii a'i iŋ nɛ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi iŋ ti te nɛ waya-a, hegɔ mbɛt nɛ wen mɛ nu-bii a usi ɗuka taamɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ kɔ̧ see-a.
Ká mɛ zɔn bii nɛti ha̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen kɔ̧-a̧ na, wen nɛ tɛ zia wen kɔ̧-a̧ a'i iŋ nɛ de dukaa kɔ̧-a̧.
Ka mɛ ndak ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a mɛ tɛ kpa a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ tɛ pi̧ a̧ tɛ-mɛ hee laa-gbooyi ga.
O nɔi̧ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa de yáá kɔ‘i kpɔk fara. Nɛ́ hegɔ a kpasawen pii nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ bii nɛ ba a de nɛ tom.
Dila gɛɗi nɛ nyɔŋmɔ kɔ‘i; kalea mbɛt, ɗaŋmɔ gɛɗi nɛ o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ.
Wen ko bii ko Sɔ̧ dúk kana nɛ kpasa ɗuka taamɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ mgbelewi bó kpai kɔ‘i kpai hee nyaŋa-zɛ ga.
Mɛ zɛm nɛ de ŋgimbi, sɛka mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ ko o mgbelewi.
Zɛ-mɛ a dɔk mgbara o wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ kpasa taamɔ.
Nyɛrɛ ko wi-bɔkɔ nɛ́ mɔɔ gba zu-wi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ndiŋ wen a de ha̧ wa mɛ mam mami.
Nú-wen ko wikanmɔ nɛ tum yai nɛ muizu wi kpɔk kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ kpɛri kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-kpe-zer sɛnɛ.
Kpɛri ko wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ kaɗi nɛ foka ko tɔk, ɓɛɛ dara kɔ̧-a̧ bó nɛ mɔɔ-zii na.
Wi nɛ tɔ̧ ndaa hu̧samɔ ɗaŋ nɛ yuwar de-dukaa, ɓɛɛ a̧ beka kpá kpasa sɛm bɔ na.
Mɛ kɔ̧́ sɛm kɔ-mɛ, ká mɛ siŋ a̧ pi̧ nù na; ɓɛɛ ka mɛ́ nɛ́ gbaa ndaa-a̧ ká mɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ a̧ ɓɔna.
Sɛm kɔ-mɛ in a̧ kaɗa, hee mɔ nɛ ŋma bii fe nɛnɛ er o bii kɔ‘i’ɛ ga.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ mɛ e nɛ ŋma nɔi̧ bu̧ er-mɛ yak’ɛ ga a mɛ ee nɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ yak, mɛ beka kpa a̧ ɓɔna.
Ká mɛ ndak ɗoŋ a̧ na, wen ɗoŋ-a̧-a̧ nyɛia kaɗi; hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ zamɓɛrɛ́ ŋman tɛ pɛr ga.
Wi nyɛma mɛ lati da̧i̧; ɗoŋ dáá dara, wi nyɛma mɛ kpa ea-ɗaŋmɔ;
mɔ kpɔk, ŋma mɔɔ-e-nɛ-ta ko wi gba ndaa hu̧sa̧mɔ bo na.
Wi nɛ nyɔŋ yí ha̧ ŋma wi kii nɛ yuwar mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in a̧; ɓɛɛ wi nɛ iŋa a̧ wɛ́r nɛ tɛ nɛ a̧.
Wen kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ ɔ́ nɛ nyɔɔ̧ sɛn yi-mɛ hee gɔrɔ ga, ɓɛ tortɛ bá nɛ a̧ tɛ zia wen kɔ-mɛ;
ka gbaayi-mɛ bo na, a̧ kpaia nu-a̧, ɓɛɛ war wen kɔ-mɛ kifa nɛ ɗaŋa lɛŋ.
O ŋma mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dɔkaa n'am sɛn, ɓɛɛ gbamgbaka gan nɛ pɛrti wi’ɛi.
Gasa Wan, nɛ zu, tɛ sɛn a̧ mbɛt.
Wi nɛ pi̧ ta si ŋgɔn yó nɛ zu nɛ zu, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ e ɗɔra tɛ ŋma wi e nɛ ɗɔra tɛ nɛ tɛ.
Wi nɛ za̧ lim tɛ tik kɔ̧-a̧ woyo. Wi nɛ tui pɛr tɛ tik yi pɛr kɔ‘i woyo.
Ɗaŋmɔ nɛ bii de si nɛ ɗoŋ zu a woyo, a̧ iŋ fara nɛ tɛ nɛnɛ na mbɛt.
Zɛkɛɗɛ in dara nɛ tom ko wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ; ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ kifa-er zɛm nɛ a̧, hee dila a yor gia ga.
O wi nɛ de nyɛŋɛ tikaa ko o bii ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ tɛ tik yi pɛr; nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ fe, wa tɛ ɓuk zaŋ bɔnɛ.
Kiri in tu̧u̧see nɛ o mɔ nɛ bii kɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ ɔɔ kɔ‘i wan zu a.
Wi nɛ kifi er ɗaŋmɔ, Gasa Wan tɛ kifi er ha̧ a̧.
A̧ tɛ gɔn ŋgaia kita zu a̧ wen zu ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ
Mɛ é ɗaŋmɔ nɛ ŋma-mɛ dea in mɛ̀ɛ̀ ha̧ a̧; hegɔ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ be tɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧,
A̧ tɛ e ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ mɛ mbɛt.
Ka ŋma bii dúk nɛ tu̧u̧see in ŋma wi, nɛ́ hee ge a a tɛ ak nɛnɛ‘e Gasa Wan a e ɗaŋmɔ ha̧‘i ge?
A̧ bo nɛ ŋma be deako tikiɗi wen bii nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧ na;
nɛ́ hee ge a a̧ tɛ kɔfi nɛ Sɔ̧ wen zu war ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ ge?
Ɓɛɛ a̧ n'aa dúk nɛ gee tum bii, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'a̧-a̧ kasi kiri kɔ see-a’ɛ, a̧ tɛ kpa ea ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ er o?
Mɛ ta mɔ zu sɔŋkur ŋgimbi kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ e sɛnmɔ dúk;
mɛ ta mɔ zu fio in mbɔraa kɔ-mɛ ɓɛɛ kasi heembea.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗɔŋ heembea, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kasi kiri in ŋma-mɛ na.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ dɔŋ nɔɔtɔk ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ mɛ e ɗaŋmɔ nɛ wa dee in mɛ̀ɛ̀ tɛ gee mɔ.
Ɗɔŋ-mɛ a nyɛi nɛ kpɛri, ɓɛɛ mɛ beka de ɗaŋmɔ dɔ́k na, wen wi nɛ see ɔ́ kura dak kpɛri dak pi nu.
Wideɗaŋmɔ yai nɛ sɛm pi̧ nɛ sɛnmɔ fara nɛ zia nu-ŋmaa a̧-a̧ so sɛnɛ.
Wee kúr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ gua nɛ‘i a yi-a; kpɛri mbɛt dar nyɛ́àm nɛ ɗoŋ kura-see:
see-bii kúr nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ tu̧u̧see kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt tɛ̀ɛ̀ kur nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma zaŋa wen nɛ‘i iŋ zu-a na dár nɛ wee, ɓɛɛ ŋma gbaŋanyaŋa kpɛri de dee ha̧ tɔk mɛ a nu.
Ka mɛ ufi fu̧u̧-wee, ɓɛɛ a̧ baa; ka mɛ a sap sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bia, ɓɛɛ o mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ gbo nɛ kɔ̧ nu-mɛ.
Fom a tik zu wi-dali-wen in wi-tɔ̧ nu-wen yiitoo; wa yaia o bii nɛ yaa so kpɔk zii nɛ ŋmaa.
Wen ko wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nú yiitoo dee ha̧ o bíí mɛ tik nɛ dɔkaa, hɔ tɛ pɛsa wa si gɔni
nu nɛtɛ nɛtɛ; a̧ yaia o ŋgaŋa ye, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ nutua ko o gasawi mɛ tik kpuul.
Wen ko wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ nú yiitoo dee ha̧ o wiwii mɛ ndak o kpasa okóò,
dór nɛ mɔɔ-oi-tom kɔ-wa er-wa.
Wi nɛ ee zer tɛ zia wen-ndela beka kpa ɔmaté na, a̧ beka dúk zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ na mbɛt.
Nyasi e nɛ ndɔla tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ ɗáŋ wen gbin kɔ‘i nɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ-wi.
Gbapaa gbɛɛ bii nɛ dɔkaa, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗáŋ-nu a gbɛɛ bii gan.
Desee a̧-a̧ in wi nɛ ɗáŋ-nú tik zu a na, nɛ iŋ tu̧u̧see kɔ̧-a̧ na, nɛ tui kpaŋá kɔ̧-a̧ na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ nyak kɔ̧-a̧ hɛr a̧ na.
Wen kpaŋá kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ kpaŋá-boi, ɓɛɛ nyak kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ nyak-ndɛrɛ.
Fio n'aa e zu wi nɛ́ ɗaŋ fio, ɓɛɛ ye-ko-fio dee gan a̧.
A beka kpa ŋgai zu o bii ko Sɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ leɓe-wee kɔ̧-a̧ beka dɔ́ a̧ na mbɛt.
O wi nɛ siŋ Gasa Wan pi nu tɛ tik kɔ̧ yi-wee kɔ̧-A̧; wee'i tɛ nyɛk tɛ-wa,
ɓɛɛ beka bi na kpoo nɛ kpoo; a̧-a̧ tɛ gɔm zu mgbara wa hee dila ga,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ a̧k wa sɛkɛ́ɗɛ́ sɛkɛ́ɗɛ́ hee gɔ̧ ga.
Mɛ zɔk, mɛ́ ɓór fɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ tɛn-tɛ;
mɛ̀ dé kpar-nu-mɛ in mɔɔ-gɔm-aa mbɛt.
Mɛ́ kásí sede in lɔr kɔ-mɛ keŋ keŋ;
mɛ̀ wé dita wen kɔ-mɛ mbɛt.
Mɛ kasi zu-mɛ, wen ká leɓɛ-mɛ tɛɛ ir mɛ to naŋ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ tɛɛ tik er wi nɛ gɛɗi mɛ.
Nɛ́ wi nɛ de ko a̧ há nyamandoe ha̧ ŋma wi, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ gbak a̧ kasi nɛ heembea.
Mɛ ha̧ nyamandoe ha̧ ŋma-mɛ ŋgimbi n'aa a̧-a̧ tɛ haazi, ɓɛɛ mɛ gbo nyamandoe
kɔ ŋma-mɛ mbɛt nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Mɛ yor ɗoŋ wen kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a in ŋma-mɛ;
hegɔ mɛ tɛ kpa mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧ dam ɗoŋ ŋgimbi lɛŋ
Bíí nɛ dɔkaa bá kɔ‘i nyamandoe hee ŋma kpaamɔ gee ga, pi̧ nɛ wi-gbak-wa'i tɛ bɔnɛ.
Nɛti ha̧‘i mɛ kpa mɔ er-bii, wi mbɔŋgɔli nɛ a̧, wi nɛɛ de nɛ ko nɛ tɛ-wi, tɔ̧ nɛ nyɛrɛ
mbɔi kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ka hɔ ŋgimbi gbo aa wo, ɓɛɛ wi daka dak ndɔntɔlɔŋ;
wi nyiŋiri nɛ zɔɔ-wi ŋgimbi ha̧si nɛ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e wi a̧-a̧ tɛ ŋgaia ŋgimbi.
Ka bo ha̧‘i mɛ gbo nyamandoe'i wo, nɛ bɔnɛ bɔnɛ seka wan-sede'i kpaa be retaa,
ɓɛɛ dúk nde a̧ nɛ wi-de-sɔnti. Ŋma má ɓɛɛ tɛɛ kifi kɔ‘i nɛ yuwar kaia mɔ er-a̧,
ɓɛɛ wan-nyamandoe tɛɛ kifi nɛ wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧ sɔɔgee: a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ fom in dara oi-aa.
Ha̧ wi’ɛi mɛ zɔn nɛ a̧ bó na, a̧ tɛ tɛɛ tɔ̧ nɛ ɓaɗi-wen ha̧ a̧ woyo.
Bíí nɛ dɔkaa bɛ̧ ha̧a̧ nyamandoi, bó nɛ wen zu ɗaŋ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ wen ká mɔ kɔ-wa bá tɛ-wa sɔɔgee.
Kóó hegɔ‘i, mɛ duk nɛ munyal in wisan, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɛm mɔɔ-er-mɛ ɗoŋ-a nyɛi na.
Mɛ gbak wisan wen zu heembea; nɛ mɔ a ba tɛ-a, ká mɛ e ha̧ a̧ si nɛ gee er-a na.
Gana so mɛ ɗaŋ sede wen zu nya-mɛ, koo sɛm kɔ-mɛ, bá nɛ eaa ha̧ mɛ ɓuk sɛn ɗɔɔ nu sɔɔgee.
Mɛ kɛ̧ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nu ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn; hegɔ mbɔi'i tɛ gbak mɛ gan lɔr.
Mɛ dun dam kɔ-mɛ nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ wen wa tɛ pɛm mɛ tɛ o bonɛ lɛŋ.
Wa tɛ de biro zu mɛ ti wisɛn kɔ-mɛ gán gan ndota ŋgee in dita sɛ́ɛ̀.
De wi nyɛma mɛ yor ɗoŋ ŋma-wi wen baa nyamandoe,
ɓɛɛ nɛ ko wi nɛ foe bo yi na a̧ nyɛma mɛ siŋ a̧ pi nu.
Ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗoŋ demɔ ko wi yor ɗoŋ mɛ na, a̧ ha̧tɛ-a nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ wen zu mɛ.
Wideɗaŋmɔ pɔkɔsi kɔ‘i nɛ mbɔi ko wi-yor-ɗoŋ-wi.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi nɛ zɔn bii na a siŋ kɔ‘i wi nɛ gbak a̧ siŋ pi nu.
Yoraa ɗoŋ bii dea ha̧ o wikpamɔ nɛ dɔkaa mɛ tik, ɓɛɛ pi̧ wa siɓi-siɓiɛ, hee gasa pɛŋa-yì
gbatɔp ga; a̧ dea ha̧ o ŋgaŋa wi mɛ pɛsi si ŋma nu nɛ doole,
de ha̧ wa mɛ yambali nɛ tɛ o gɔni nu nɛ́nɛ́.
Wideɗaŋmɔ nak tɛ-mɛ yor ɗoŋ ŋma wi, wen n'a̧-a̧ ta kɔ̧-a̧ nde wi tɛ kpa mɔɔ-oi-aa,
ɓɛɛ bó, nɛ o wen a a̧ dak pi̧ zu a woyo.
Mɛ gbak ŋma-mɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ŋgai kɔ-mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ kasi zu-mɛ ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tik yi pɛr.
O mgbak mɔ nɛ gbak wi tɛ duka-kpasá, nɛ́ yi, nyɔŋmɔ, laa in tua mɛ kpe siri kɔ‘i.
Gana so dukaa hee wisan ga sɛn kɔ̧ be gbaksak kɔ‘i,
bá nɛ nyɔŋa gba de nyɔŋmɔ nɛ kɔ̧ gɔni tua.
Koo mɛ kpa be mɔ tikiɗi, koo nɛ dɔkaa, mɛ kpa desee,
ɓɛɛ mɛ beka zii dara ɗaɗa tɛ-mɛ ko wan-tua na.
Ndɛna tua nɛ mɔɔ-búù: mɛ kpa nu tɔ̧ wen na, wen nɛ mɛ nɛ gɔni bii.
Koo nɛ nyɔŋmɔ, koo nɛ yi-nɔɔ, a mɛ há̧ ha̧ bii, ŋma demɔɔ-oi-aa bo na;
mɛ tɛɛ zii nɛ o ɓaɗi-wen nɔ'ɔ e zu a woyo:
«mɛ tɛ pii hɛ̧ɛ̧, gɔni bii, mɛ ɗafi zu taŋge-nyɔŋmɔ;
mɛ nɛ boo nɛ ŋma-mɔ, mɛ há̧ ha̧‘m nyɔŋ!
«mɛ yak siɓi, gɔni bii, mɛ e fara ha̧ kpasa bii. Nya kɔ‘m tɛ́ gɛnɛ tɛ‘m, mí kɔ̧ɔ̧ tua kɔ‘m»
Ŋma mɔɔ-gbin-gba̧a̧tɛ kpasa bii, hee ziaa'e wi nɛ gɔni bíí in wi-ba-nyamandoe ga bo na.
Wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ bem kɔ‘i gas'a gusi, wen ha̧a̧ mɛ kpa desee nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ bem'i.
Wi nɛ usi mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i nɛ dea tɛ kpa demɔɔ-oi-aa: a̧ tɛ duk nɛ gasa desee mgbara o wi-iŋ-aa.
Wi nɛ usi ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ‘i nɛ dea pi̧ nɛ gɔyá tɛ wisɛn kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ tortɛ tɛ pi̧ a̧ wen zu bem'i sɛn mgbara o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧.
Koo dàá fea so, dúk hee a̧ fe na ga, wen a ee ŋma bii nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧ sɛn oi-aa.
Ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ duka nɛ kpasa, a̧ dee so nyɛŋɛ tɛ zɔka a̧; ɓɛɛ tɛ ŋgimbi fio,
ŋma taamɔ ɗaŋsee kpɔk bo zu-a na.
A̧ ee ŋma bii nɛ tɛ ye biro zu a ti o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ duk nɛ wi de demɔ in o sɛm kɔ‘i oi demɔ nɛ wa dee in dáà kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ dɛli bem kɔ‘i tɛ hɛr da̧i̧ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ nyakzaŋ-a̧ tɛ gɔn yi tɛ be hiɗimɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tikiɗi.
Nyaŋa nɛ‘i usi ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ dea na tɛ de ŋgazu;
mbɛt obem nɛ demɔ ha̧ zu nɛ zu tɛ gan mbɔrɔ.
Ka mɛ dɛli bem, a̧ tɛ de ŋma yaka-yi-mɔ in mɛɛ; ka mɛ de saa in a̧, a̧ tɛ tu̧ see-mɛ.
Ká mɛ mam mami in a̧ na, wen ká mɛ tɛ zɔk bɔnɛ wen zu a̧;
wen sɔŋkur-aa mɛ tɛ ngɛr nɛ gokonin-mɛ.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ a̧ mɛ demɔ lɛŋ n'a̧-a̧ kɔ̧a̧ ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna nɛ daŋa-ŋgai na.
Mɛ ɗɛ́k a̧ nɔ̧́ kpɔk tɛ guntir, ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ ɓɔna nɛ bem,
wen ka zu-a̧ ŋgai kaɗi a̧ beka mbo zu ha̧ mɛ ɓɔ na.
Mɛ usi mɔ ha̧ bem kɔ-mɛ, mɛ ha̧ tɛ-mɛ lɛŋ wen usa ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ a̧,
wen ká ŋgazu kɔ̧-a̧ pii zu-mɛ woyo.
Gana so wisan nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ hayatɛ in nɛ dúk nɛ dea, bá nɛ wanmbɔi nɛ ɔ́ nɛ zɛɛ.
Kpasa hayatɛ gana lɔr zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ; de kpɔɔ-tɛ-bii gana dɔka mbɔi.
Ŋma mbɔi nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ we nɛ hayatɛ bo na,
ɓɛɛ ŋma de-dukaa nɛ gana desee sɛn kɔ̧ see-wi bo na mbɛt.
Gana so fio bá nɛ kɔsa; gana so ɔmatɛ kpoo nɛ kpoo bá nɛ zɛɛ nɛ kaɗi na.
Ee nyɔŋmɔ zu pɛsi-fio nɛ́ ha̧de nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wi nɛ nú kpee kaɗi.
Kalea mbɛt, ha̧mɔ nɛ‘i há̧ ha̧ geesɔ̧ gbak na, wen a nyɔŋ na in a zii pɛr-aa na mbɛt
Nɛ́ kpɔk mɔ mbɛt wen bii nɛ Gasa Wan pi zɛɛ zu a.
A̧ zɔk mɔ nɛ‘i ha̧ ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ pɛɛ see-a, hee mɔ nɛ kpaná hɛr nɛ be-zɔŋa pɛ́ nɛ see’ɛ ga.
Ká mɛ e ha̧ see-mɛ mɛ ɗaŋ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ ɓili zu-mɛ sɔɔgee na.
Kpaa desee kɔ̧ see nɛ́ mɔ nɛ de ha̧ bii mɛ duk kpasa siti,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ desee mbɛt a de ha̧ zɛ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu mɛ dɔk.
Mɛ de nyɛŋɛ, mɛ kpa desee, ɓɛɛ mɛ ir ɗaŋsee nyɛi nɛ mɛ, wen ɗaŋsee dea ha̧ o bii
nɛ dɔkaa mɛ yɔ, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔɔ-oi-aa bo na mbɛt.
Aa-see-mɔ in tu̧u̧see nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ de ha̧ zɛ duka-kpasa kɔ‘i mɛ de dɔ̧ɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ taamɔ-ɗaŋsee de ha̧ bii mɛ sɔk nɛ hayaa
Desee nɛ́ mɔɔ de ha̧ nyɔnmɔ mɛ ɔ nyɔɔ nu-wi; mɔ n'aa nyɔŋ ŋmáŋ nɛ a̧.
Nyaŋá yá nɛ‘i nyaŋ wen zu mbɔi ɔ̧́k wi ɔ̧k; taamɔ wen aa ndak nɛ yá yi-wi.
Taamɔ wen kpaa mɔɔ-nyɔŋ dór yá dor yi-wi, hee mɔ nɛ ŋga zɛ́ɛ́ dór nɛ yá yi-wi’ɛ ga.
Tɛ́-wanmbɔi gbɛ́ŋ wen mɔi̧a̧ kpaamɔ, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ ɔm tɛ-a, mɛ nɛ wen ŋyɔŋa bɔtɛ-a.
Tɛ-wisan gbɛ́ŋ mɛ kpa be mɔɔ-nyɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ ɔm tɛ-a, ɓɛɛ san tika zu a.
Wi nɛ de wɔ lɔr beka dúk gee, ɗaŋmɔ bo zu a na, na,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ kii mɛ de mbɔi tɛ yɔ kɔya-tɛ.
Bíí nɛ dɔkaa dee geemɔ wen zu wɔ lɔr, ɓɛɛ tikaa kɔ̧-wa tɛ́ nɛ gbaayi.
Mɔ‘i nɛ pɛ́r wen o wi nɛ gbɛ tɛ si sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o mgbelewi lɛŋ tik tik yi-a.
Desee a̧-a̧ in wanmbɔi nɛ ŋma wen bó zu a na, in nɛ gbɛ tɛ ɗoŋ lɔr na.
A̧, nɛ o'o h’ɛ́ɛ́ zɔn a̧ o? wen a̧ iŋa dukaa nɛ dea sɛn mgbara pɛrnam kɔ̧-a̧.
Wi nɛ pɛrti weamɔ‘i tika zu a̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ gboo ɗɔɔ a nɛ de tɛ, nɛ́ o?
A̧ nyɛma mɛ duk tɛ-a zu a. Ŋma bii nɛ nyɛma so mɛ gbin heembea, ɓɛɛ nɛ gbin na, nɛ́ o?
Ŋma bii nɛ nyɛma so mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ de na, nɛ́ o?
Hegɔ, kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ duk ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi, ɓɛ bii lɛŋ tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ o dee demɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ka mɛ nɛ duka ka̧ nyɔŋmɔ ko o gasawi, ká mɛ ɓɛ́ nu-mɛ ɓoŋgolo tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
«oe, zɔm nyɔŋmɔ wa» na.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ-a nde zɔka mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wɔ-a nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ. Mgbara mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea lɛŋ,
wan nɛ ɗaŋa gan gbaayi-de-wɔmɔ, nɛ ge? Mɔ nɛ de n'a̧-a̧ hi̧i̧ nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔ lɛŋ n'a̧-a̧ zɔk'i, a̧‘i.
Ká mɛ nyɛi er-mɛ si tɛ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ mɛ zɔk na.
Ká mɛ pi er-mɛ zu nyɔŋmɔ nyɛm ŋmaa in yí-mɛ na, wen ka mɛ tɛɛ́ to ŋma-mɛ.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧, ŋma-mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɛt. Mɛ ta mɔ kaɗi, sɛka mɛ dea.
Mɛ nyɔŋ nɛ mɔ nɛ wa e ti mɛ, hee kpasa bii ga,
wen ká bii tɛɛ́ sɛn mɛ wen hɔ̧k hɔ̧k nyɔŋa mɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ dúk nɛ kuti wi mɛ dak er-mɛ tɛ nyɔŋmɔ, ka mɛ a̧ boo nɛ wi iŋ mɔ,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ usi'e wi nɛ yaa-gbagurmɔ na, wen ká see o ŋma bii tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗaŋ.
K’ɛnɛ nɛ yaa nu ka̧ nyɔŋmɔ nɛ dɔkaa, ká mɛ pi̧ er-mɛ tɛ nyɔŋmɔ ti na.
Be mɔ tikiɗi ɓɛɛ nyɛma kɔ‘i wi nɛ iŋa de dukaa, hegɔ mbɛt hiɗi-a gɔ́n ŋgimbi ɔ nu na.
Wi nɛ nyɔŋ mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wɔ kɔ‘i ɔ́ yá nɛ dea; a̧ kur zu yá nɛ hayaa,
ɓɛɛ kpoo tɛ-a lɛŋ dúk nɛ dea. Ŋyaŋa-yá, ɔ̧i̧ in ɓaɓa-zaŋ nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ zɛm wi-ɗaɗa
Ka mɛ nɛ nyɔŋa mɔ nɛ dɔkaa zu doole,
mɛ kúr, mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔ̧i̧ nyɔŋmɔ‘i a nu, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɔma fɛmɛ̀ɛ̀.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ zíí nu'm, ká mɛ e'm tɛ geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ nɛ ɗɔŋ a mɛ tɛ zii nɛ o mgbara wen kɔ‘m.
Mɛ demɔ lɛŋ nɛ yuwar-a; hegɔ ŋma zɛ̀ɛ̀ beka kpa mɛ na.
Wi nɛ kpɛk bii nɛ dea sɛn tɛ ha̧nyɔŋmɔ nɛ dɔkaa, zɔnamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧-a̧ ndaranu-bii lɛŋ:
nɛ́ mgbak mɔɔ-sedaako dee demɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Bíí saaye lɛŋ ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ zu wan-ŋga-er. Nyɛrɛ ŋgoko kɔ̧-a̧ dama fara lɛŋ.
Ká mɛ ŋgai gba̧a̧tɛ-mɛ in dɔ̧ɔ̧ na, wen dɔɔ ɗaŋa bii nɛ dɔkaa.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ wee we nɛ boi’ɛ ga a dɔ̧ɔ̧ we nɛ see o wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ, ir nɛ wa mɛ kpɛr in o ŋmaa.
Kó o bii, dɔ̧ɔ̧ duk hee duka-kpasa ga, ka'i nɛ nɔɔ a̧ nɛ hɔ̧n. Nɛ ge de-dukaa ge a'i kpa
ka'i kpa dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ nɔ na ge? Wa dee dɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧desee ha̧ bii.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ mɔɔ ha̧ tortɛ in desee ha̧ bii ka'i nɛ nɔɔ a̧ tɛ ŋgimbi-a, nyɛm nɛ tam nu-wi.
Nɔɔ dɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛ dɔkaa, hɛra tɛ nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ in dúka tɛ tɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ́ o mɔɔ ɗaŋ bii.
Gbɛ́ɛ́ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋgai nɛ ɗaŋsee ko mgbelewi siti dak nɛ wen pi̧ zu a. A̧ kaɗi nɛ ŋgai kɔ̧-a̧ dak nɛ biro pi zu a.
Tɛ gbaŋá nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ya sɛnɛ lata lata, ká mɛ kii nu sɛm kɔ-mɛ na. Ká mɛ e a̧ tɛ geemɔ
ŋgimbi desee kɔ̧-a̧ na; ká mɛ tɔ̧ ɗaŋ wen ha̧ a̧ na, bɛɛ ká mɛ ɓili a̧ nɛ kpɛra nyamandoe na mbɛt.
Ka wa nɛ kɔka mɛ mɛ́ duk zu nyɔŋmɔ, ká mɛ ŋmaŋ nɛ zɔm tɛ-mɛ na,
mɛ duk hee o ŋma-mɛ ga. Mɛ demɔ lɛŋ ha̧ wa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ duk nu geɗɛk,
Ka mɛ nɛ dea war tom kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ ba fara kɔ-mɛ, wen ha̧ mɛ
mɛ kpa desee in wa, in ha̧ wa mɛ zɔn mɛ wen zu deemɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ yuwar-a.
Sɔkawi, mɛ tɔ̧ wen, wen i̧i̧ nɛ yuwar kɔ-mɛ: mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ mgbak yi-wen;
mɔ kpɔk, ká mɛ gɔn biɔ̧-yɔyɛ na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ bii yéŋ zer mɛ zii tiger biɔ̧ in gima, ká mɛ dɔk wen na;
ká mɛ usi iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ nú tum na.
Yɔyɛ-gbaŋá nɛ dɔ̧ɔ̧ ya sɛnɛ lata-lata hɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋmaa in de sɛka diama̧ nɛ dúk zu wele lɔr.
Tiger gima in biɔ̧ zu dɔ̧ɔ̧, nɛ́ ɔ́ paŋá duk hee de kina-ta nɛ dúk sɛn kɔ̧ ɓɔá-lɔr ga
Mɛ tɔ̧ wen, be-ŋgaiwi, ka nɛ tɛɛ́ gbak, ɓɛɛ ka wa nɛ aka mɛ, ká mɛ kifi nu gan war yiitoo na.
Mɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ dɔɔ; mɛ tɔ̧ wen nɛ dɔ̧ gboŋga, mɛ tɔ̧ wen kpɔk gɔn nɔ̧ zú oi-aa.
Mɛ usi'e wi zia wen nɛ yak, ɓɛɛ mɛ usi mbɛt'e wi dɔ́k ko'i wen na.
Ka mɛ nɛ duka mgbara o gasawi, ká mɛ bá zu-mɛ we nɛ wa na,
ɓɛɛ ka ŋma bii á tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, ká mɛ dɔ́k wen na.
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ pi̧i̧-koro yak nɛnɛ ti ha̧ mbaŋa-koro’ɛ ga,
a̧ zɔnamɔ yak nɛnɛ ti ha̧ wi nɛ dɔk wen na.
Ŋgimbi nɛ hɔa, mɛ kur zalaŋ, ká mɛ ɓɔn ɗoŋ na.
Mɛ war yi si kɔ̧ tua; ká mɛ gbur nan-mɛ nɛ yuwar na.
Sɛn hi̧i̧, mɛ nyɛma mɛ kpai taamɔ de nɛ mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a; mɔ kpɔk,
ká mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ hɔrɔp-hɔrɔp wen na,
Ɓɛɛ wen zu mɔ‘i, mɛ de osoko zɔn nɛ Wi nɛ dea mɛ, in nɛ ha̧a̧ o demɔ kɔ‘i yak zale.
Wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan kpɛk nɛ usamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ kii A̧ dika mɛ gɔna ndaazan,
A̧ tɛ kpɛk wa nɛ dea.
Wi nɛ ɓá ɗoŋ heembea tɛ kpa a̧ gan kere, ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ɔr tɛ in heembea tɛ tik.
O wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan tɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ dúk nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ o dee-demɔ kɔ-wa tɛ tok hee sa̧a̧mɔ ga.
Wideɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧ kɔ‘i dɔka wen a zu wi na, ɓɛɛ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ usi ndemɔ lɛŋ nɛ‘i de dúk nɛ yuwar-a.
Tɛ́ wan-gɔna-kɔ̧-tɛ bi ɗoŋ taamɔ na: ŋma mɔɔ pi̧ kii zaŋ wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ in wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na bo na.
Mɛ ta mɔ, seka mɛ deemɔ: hegɔ ŋma mɔ nɛ mɛ tɛ nyim tɛ-mɛ zu a bo na.
Ká mɛ nɛ́ nɔ nɛ ɗaŋ yuwar na, wen ká mɛ tɛɛ́ tó naŋ-mɛ nɛ ta.
Ká mɛ pem kɔ-mɛ nɛ yɔka yuwar na.
Kóó nɛ o mgbak bem kɔ-mɛ, mɛ kasi zu-mɛ nɛ wa mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ de lɛŋ, mɛ de nɛ yuwar-a. Nɛ hegɔ a mɛ tɛ kasi nɛ o heembea.
Wi nɛ hɛr tɛ nɛ heembea há nɛ tɛ-mɛ ndak ɗoŋ o gɛŋa, ɓɛɛ wii nɛ e ta nɛ Gasa Wan,
ŋma mɔ nɛ tɛ pi bɔnɛ zu a, koo tikiɗi, bo na.
Wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan beka iŋ bɔnɛ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ gbo ɗɔɔ o weamɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wan-ɗuka-taamɔ sɛ́n heembea na,
ɓɛɛ wi nɛ ndak ɗoŋ a̧ nɛ see yiitoo dúk hee kombon nɛ gba-búk bá ga.
Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ e tɛ́ tɛ Heembea; a̧ ndak ɗoŋ Heembea hee mɛ nɛ wen ko Sɔ̧ ga.
Ka mɛ nɛ kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ bii mɛ zii mɔ nɛ mɛ tɔ̧, mɛ ɗafi gba̧a̧ wen-aa nɛti sɛ́;
mɛ mɔi̧ iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ, sɛka mɛ ha̧kifanú.
Taamɔ ko wi-bɔkɔ zík zík hee naŋ-keeke ga,
ɓɛɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ kpai kpai hee wii-see naŋ-keeke ga.
Sɛm zɛkɛɗi-wi dúk hee wiwii-nyaŋá daŋ ŋmaa nɛ hiɗi mɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma bii dáŋ nɛ zu a ga.
Zɛ kpók kpɔ́k zaŋ pɛ lɛŋ kpá sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ‘i nɛ ɗoŋ wese,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ de bɔɔ ha̧ ŋma zɛ mɛ gan ɓi-aa, nɛ́ ge?
Nɛ́ Gasa Wan a kɛ̧ɛ̧ saŋa-tɛ-wa nɛ ŋmaa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ taamɔ kɔ̧-A̧;
A̧ n'A̧a̧ ee o ŋgimbi in o gbaŋá nɛtɛ nɛtɛ'ɛ.
A̧ dea o ŋma nɛ gasa sa̧-a̧ wese, ɓɛɛ A̧ e o oi-aa nɛ gee wese.
Bíí lɛŋ gboo nɛ tɛ fuu-nu, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ nu a'i dee nɛ Adam.
Gasa Wan dee wa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ de há̧ koo o nde mɛ́ nɛ nɔ sɛn tɛ yuwar kɔ‘i nɛtɛ nɛtɛ mbɛt.
A̧ toka de yoŋgo zu o ŋma ha̧ nɛ de sɔnti ha̧ wa; A̧ sa̧-a̧ war-tɛ o ŋma, ɓɛɛ kai wa ndaɗi nɛ tɛ-A̧;
A̧ toka ɗaŋ yoŋgo zu o ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ A̧ gbɔsi wa si ɗɔɔ; A̧ kpaia fara-duk kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Hee mɔ nɛ wiɓukpana va̧i̧ nɛ gii kɔ̧ er-a hee mɔ nɛ see-a kɔ̧a̧ ga, nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt
a o bii yá nɛnɛ́ kɔ̧ er-Wi nɛ dee wa: A̧ ha̧mɔɔ-oi-tom ha̧ wa, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ taamɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
Demɔ a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbaar, ɗaŋmɔ mbɛt nɛ mgbaar; duka-kpasá a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbaar, fio mbɛt
nɛ mgbaar. Hegɔ mbɛt, wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ a̧-a̧ nɛ mgbaar, widedemɔ nɛ mgbaar.
Mɛ mbaɗi o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn dea, nɛ gbam yiitoo yiitoo zɔk nɛ yi-ŋmaa.
Kɔ‘m, mi duka nɛ sɔŋkur bii mɛ de tom'i, hee wi-dɔr-oi nyɔnɔ, nɛ ɗoŋ wi-mɔi̧-nyɔnɔ ga.
Nɛ́ wen zu de yoŋgɔ ko Gasa Wan a'm kpaa nɛ zu'm, ɓɛɛ mi dun nɛ gɔŋgɔ kɔ‘m,
hee ko o ŋma wi-mɔi̧-wayate-de-dɔ̧ɔ̧́ ga.
Ɛnɛ zɔ́k! bó nɛ wen zu'm ɛn'am a'm zɔka nɛ bɔnɛ‘i na,
ɓɛɛ mɛ́ nɛ́ wen zu o bii lɛŋ nɛ kii iŋamɔ.
Ɛnɛ zíí! ɛnɛ o wi-duk-ti, in ɛ́nɛ́ o wi-ya-zu-giiwi, ɛnɛ yéŋ zer-‘nɛ́.
Kóó nɛ bem kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ kóò kɔ-mɛ, kóó nɛ nya-mɛ, kóó nɛ sɛm kɔ-mɛ,
ká mɛ kpɛk ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpa ŋgai zu mɛ, ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ɓɔna nɛ kpasa na.
Ká mɛ há̧ mbɔi kɔ-mɛ ha̧ ŋma bii nɛtɛ na, wen ká ŋma mbe taamɔ hɔ́ zu-mɛ,
bɛɛ ká mɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ak mɔ kɔ-mɛ woyo.
Ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ɓɔna nɛ gbaayi káŋ, in nɛ mɛ ɔ́m ɔm, ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma bii mɛ daŋ zu mɛ na.
Gana so o bem kɔ-mɛ a ak aka mɔ er-mɛ bá nɛ‘e mɛ kɔfi kɔfaa er wa.
Tɛ o mɔ kɔ-mɛ lɛŋ, mɛ dúk nɛ gasawi ɓonti, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e ha̧ ŋma be mɔ mɛ ɗaŋ hura-nin kɔ-mɛ na.
Nɛ́ sai nɛ sɔŋkur wese duka-kpasa kɔ-mɛ in ŋgimbi fio be hɔ̧, a̧ mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nɛ mɔ‘o oi mɛ.
Zɔ̧, ɓirate in dita tui nɛ mɔ ko tuifuu; nɛ war ko widetom nɛ́ kam, bɔnɛ-nyasi in tom.
Mɛ há̧ tom ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ mɛ ɔma; ka mɛ e a nɛ yɔli, a̧ tɛ kii mɛ yu mɔ yak.
Wi difi ger ndai nɛ kpaŋá in gba̧a̧-pɛ́r, nɛ ko ɗaŋ widetom nɛ́ bɔnɛ in nyasi.
Mɛ ir a̧ si yi tom, wen ka a̧ tɛɛ dúk sɔɔgee.
Wen dukaa gee ir bii mɛ de ɗaŋmɔ nɛ dɔkaa.
Mɛ há nɛ tom nɛ nyɛma er-a ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ ka a̧ nɛ mboo zu na, mɛ pi̧ poka naŋ-a̧.
Mɔ kpɔk, ka̧ mɛ de yaka-yi-mɔ si tɛ ŋma bii na, ɓɛɛ ka̧ mɛ de ŋma yɔɔkaya mɔ na mbɛt
Ka mɛ a boo nɛ widetom kpɔk ɓɛɛ, mɛ ba a̧ hee gbagurtɛ-mɛ ga, wen mɛ kpaa a
zu bɔnɛ in ŋgai tɛ-mɛ. Ka mɛ a boo nɛ widetom kpɔk ɓɛɛ, mɛ ba a̧ hee nya-mɛ ga,
wen mɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ hazi-a hee kiitɛ-mɛ ga.
A̧À ka mɛ́ nɛ́ usa bɔnɛ ha̧ a̧, nɛ mɔ'ɔ n'aa yuu mɔ yak ɓɛlɛm’ɛ,
mɛ tɛ nɛ́ɛ́ kii a si dee?
Gee ee-ta ɔ́r nɛ́ o mgbelewi, ɓɛɛ ɔɔ-zu há̧ nɛ gasa-zu ha̧ wi nɛ bo nɛ zu na.
Ndaka ɗoŋ ɔɔ-zu hɔɔ ŋmaa in kiaa mɛ ba giɔ̧, kóó ndaka ɗoŋ búk.
Ɔɔ-zu nɛ gee giɔ-mɔ, bo nɛ kpasa mɔ na; dúk hee saŋayi-wi sɛn yí darŋgel ga.
Nɛ ŋma ge sa̧a̧mɔ ge a'i nyɛma mɛ kpa tɛ ndiŋmɔ ge?
Mbɛt, nɛ ge kpasawen ge a̧ tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ ndela ge?
Zɔka ŋgálá, pi̧i̧ tani in ɔɔ-zu nɛ geemɔ, hee gee taamɔ ko okóò nɛ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko’ɛ ga.
Ka nɛ boo nɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn a toma wa mbáŋ nɛ tɛ-mɛ na, ká mɛ e see-mɛ si tɛ wa na.
Wen o ɔɔzu ɔra o bii nɛ dɔkaa, ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ ee so ta nɛ wa lɛn tika ɔrɔp.
Heembea tɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, ndela bo na. A̧ iŋa mgbara mɔ n'a̧-a̧ tɔ̧; mɔ n'a̧-a̧ tɔ̧, a̧ tɛ de.
Wi nɛ yara nu iŋa mɔ nɛ dɔkaa, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara mɔ tɔ̧ kɔ‘i wen nɛ yuwar-a.
Wi nɛ mɔ we na iŋ mɔ dɔ́k na.
Wi nɛ yara nu iŋa yuwar deemɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Mi zɔka mɔ nɛ dɔkaa zaŋ yara nu kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi zii mgbara mɔ nɛ dɔkaa, gan mɔ n'am tɔ̧.
Mi gboo ɗoɔ ŋgaŋa mɔɔ fio war ɔ dɔka, ɓɛɛ mi kpasi wen zu iŋa-mgbara-mɔ kɔ‘m.
O wi nɛ yu kii Gasa Wan tɛ ya kpasa, ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi.
Wen ee-ta kɔ-wa lɛŋ dúk zu Wi nɛ nyɛma mɛ kpasi wa.
Wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan de kii ŋma mɔ na; tɛ-a nak na ndo-ndo-ndo,
wen Gasa Wan nɛ yaa-e-nɛ-ta kɔ̧-a̧.
Desee a̧-a̧ in wi nɛ yú kii Gasa Wan.
Wi n'a̧-a̧ tɛɛ e nɛ tɛ-a̧ nɛ́ o? Wi nɛ tɛ ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧, nɛ́ o?
Yi Gasa Wan a̧-a̧ tɛ o wi nɛ kɔ̧ A̧, A̧ nɛ dúk nɛ ŋgaŋa wi-ye-ɗoŋ bii, nɔ̧ɔ̧ wi-gbak-wi,
fara-hu̧si-tɛ wen wee hara-búk, giɔ̧-ɔmtɛ ɗɔɔ wese bɛdɛ zu;
A̧ nɛ dúk ti ha̧ bii wen ŋgaŋamɔ, Wi-ye-ɗoŋ-wi wen yoo nu.
A̧ tɔi bii e ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ A̧ dee ha̧ saŋayi-wi mɛ tok, A̧ ha̧ hayatɛ, duka-kpasa in de yoŋgɔ.
Ɗafa Sɔ̧ nɛ mɔɔ-zu̧zu̧ nɛ́ zɛkɛɗa Sɔ̧ ɓɛɛ.
Sɔ̧ nyɛm mɛ kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ ko o wi nɛ gbin heembea kɔ̧-A̧ na.
Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ ko o ɗaŋwi na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ wen zu dɔka saɗi nɛ‘i gɔna A̧ a e nɛ ɗaŋmɔ na.
Baa ŋma mɔ ko wisan ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ dúk hee gɔna gɛr bem nɛ yi dáà kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Wisan kpa nyɔŋmɔ zú kɔfamɔ in bɔnɛ; ɓɛɛ wi nɛ dor nyɔŋmɔ‘i nu-a̧ nɛ́ wi-gbɛ-zu.
Ɓará mɔɔ-nyɔŋ ko ŋma-wi er-a yinɛ, nɛ́ gbɛɛ a̧.
Dorá mboi-oi-tom er widetom nɛ gbɛɛ fio.
Ŋma bii mbó, ɓɛɛ ɓi-aa gbina a nu: ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔɔ-oi-aa nɛ wa kpaa gan zu bɔnɛ nɛ́ ge?
Ŋma tók kɔ‘i nɛ de yoŋgɔ, ɓi-aa tɛɛ tok kɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋ yoŋgɔ.
Ɓɛɛ wi nɛ Gasa Wan tɛ zii tigɛr-a nɛ́ o?
Wi nɛ zui simbo wen n'a̧-a̧ foo wɔr-bii, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ fo wɔr-i woyo, ɓɛɛ zuia simbo'i gbaka a̧ nɛ́ ge?
Hegɔ mbɛt, wi nɛ zim mɔ wen o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ sii ɗoŋ nɛ́ɛ́ de kpɔk mɔ'ɔ nɔ‘i woyo.
O tɛ yéŋ zer tɛ kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, o ndé? Ŋma gba̧a̧ zimamɔ kɔ̧-a̧‘i nɛ́ ge?
Ndaka ɗoŋ heembea nyɛma ŋmaa in ha̧mɔ nɛ dɔkaa.
Hɛra tɛ nɛ o heembea nyɛma ŋmaa in ɗafa Sɔ̧ gaŋmɔ.
Dee osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ nyɛma ŋmaa in aa zɛzɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ha̧mɔ ha̧ bii nyɛma ŋmaa ha̧a̧mɔ-zɔn-Sɔ̧
Mɔ nɛ dee tɛ Gasa Wan nɛ zika ɗoŋ ha̧ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ yuu gɔɔmɔ nyɛma ŋmaa in ɗafasɔ oi ɗaŋmɔ.
Ká mɛ hɔ ti Gasa Wan nɛ gee er-mɛ na,
o ɗafasɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧a̧nu ko Gasa Wan, mɛ dé kana.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nyɛma sɛnɛ: nɔ-a ɓon zu taŋge-ɗafisɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ de ɓisisi pɛr-aa ɗáŋ ɗaŋ hɔ tɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.
Gasa Wan kpɛk ha̧a̧mɔ ko widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ dea, ɓɛɛ tɛ-A̧ beka bi ɗoŋ-aa na ndo-ndo-ndo.
Ká mɛ de ŋgoko ŋgimbi zɔna nin Gasa Wan na; ká mɛ kaŋ tɛ-mɛ ŋgimbi nɛ mɛ ha̧
zu-nyɔnɔ kɔ-mɛ ha̧ A̧ na mbɛt.
Saŋayi-mɛ a gɔn nɛ mami, ŋgimbi lɛŋ nɛ mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ Gasa Wan,
ɓɛɛ mɛ ha̧ zu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ nɛ desee.
Mɛ ha̧ mɔ ha̧ Wan-mɛ-ŋgon nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ n'A̧a̧ ha̧ha̧ mɛ, nɛ desee
in nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Wen Gasa Wan bó nɛ wi-ŋgoko na. A̧ tɛ ha̧ mɔ‘i pii nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ mɛ woyo,
war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Ká mɛ we be yee a̧ nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ gee na, A̧ beka kpɛk na.
Ká mɛ e tɛ-mɛ nɛ o mɔɔ-zu̧zu̧ ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ na; beka gbak mɛ na,
wen Gasa Wan nɛ wigɔnkita nɛ hok bii na.
A̧ e wisan wɔkɔrɔɔ na; A̧ zii kɔfamɔ ko wi ndɔ usi bɔnɛ ha a̧ zii.
A̧ e aia-nú ko be-oi tɛ geemɔ ka bo nɛ ko kogɛra na.
Mɔ‘i bo nɛ miikɔ̧a̧ ko kogɛra ai ai a zaɗa-a̧ na nde?
Ɓɛɛ bo nɛ hiɗimɔ kɔ̧-a̧ wuli nɛ wi de ha̧ a̧ mɛ hiɗi mɔ‘i na nde?
Gasa Wan kpɛ́k wi nɛ de tom ha̧ A̧ nɛ see kpók kpɛk, ɓɛɛ akamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔ́ hɔɔ yiwese mɛ.
Kɔfamɔ ko ga̧-a̧wi hɔ́ yiwese hɔɔ, ɓɛɛ ka kɔfamɔ‘i hɔ́ na, see-a gá̧ na;
ka Gasa Wan de ŋma mɔ na, tɛ-a̧ mbɔi na mbɛt,
hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi n'A̧a̧ tɛ de nɛ mɔ nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ in o widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a,
gɔ́n nɛ de kita; Gasa Wan beka nik naŋ mɔ na, A̧ beka de munyal in wa na
hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi n'A̧a̧ tɛ gbin nɛ gba̧a̧-ɔ́m o wi nɛ bó nɛ kó na.
A̧ tɛ kifi er ha̧ o gɔni zuduk, kum nɛ o wi-de-ŋgazu, in gbin nɛ o dɔra-wan ko o wi-de-gɔɔmɔ,
hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi n'A̧a̧ tɛ yoɓi nɛ bii, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa,
in ha̧a̧ mɔ ha̧ o bii nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom in mɔ nɛ wa tá mɛ de,
hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi n'A̧a tɛ gɔn nɛ kita zu dukbii kɔ̧-A̧, há nɛ desee ha wa, nɛ ɗoŋ deako kɔ̧-A̧.
Deako kɔ̧-A̧ tɛ ŋgimbi ditasee ɔ́ dee hee tɛaa ko nyiá-koro mɛ bɛ̀ɛ̀ ga.
Ɛnɛ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́, Gasa Wan, Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ o gɔni-nu lɛŋ mɛ yu kii'Nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ úsí er-‘Nɛ́ ɗɔɔ yí o gɔni duk, ha̧ wa mɛ zɔk ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Hee mɔ n’Ɛnɛ usa ha̧ wa'e war tɛ-‘Nɛ́ ɔ sa̧-a̧ tɛ mɔ n’Ɛnɛ dee in yɛɛ ga,
hegɔ mbɛt, Ɛnɛ usi gasi k’Ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ dea ŋga mɔ in wa,
ha̧ wa mɛ iŋ ti'Nɛ́, hee mɔ n’ɛɛ́ iŋa k’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛnɛ‘e ŋma Sɔ̧ bó yak zu'Nɛ́ na’ɛ, Gasa Wan.
Ɛnɛ dé o mbe mɔɔ-usi-mɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ woyo, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ ku̧ o mɔɔkifi k’Ɛ́nɛ́ woyo.
Ɛnɛ usi ŋgai mɛ er-‘Nɛ́ in ɓaa-‘Nɛ́ mɛ wiiko.
See'Nɛ́ a ŋgai siti, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ usi tu̧u̧see k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ kúm wi-ba-zu dúk nɛ Ɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ gbɛ wisɛn.
Tɛ-‘Nɛ́ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ o ha̧a̧nu k’Ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ dé mɔ nɛ hayaa,
wen ha̧ nyɛrɛ o gasamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r dam fara lɛŋ.
Wee-nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ a do o wi nɛ ɓɔna nɛ kpasa,
ɓɛɛ o wi nɛ dé dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ bɔnɛ a kum lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ hɔ́n zu o gasawi ko o wisɛn nɛ tɔ̧‘e: «Ŋma bii nɛ nyɛma in yɛɛ bo na.» wo'i.
Ɛnɛ mɔ́i o zudukbii ko Jakɔb lɛŋ,
b Ɛnɛ há̧ nu kɔ-wa si nɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ wa hee tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ ga.
Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ dé ko ha̧ dukbii nɛ‘i aa nin-‘Nɛ́ ha̧ a̧‘i. Ɛnɛ dé ko ha̧ Israɛl,
n’Ɛnɛ baa so hee kaya bem ga'i
Ɛnɛ dé ko ha̧ gasa ye nɛ sa̧a̧ Fara k’Ɛ́nɛ́ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, Jerusalɛm, fara-duk k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ dun ye Siɔn nɛ nyɛrɛ o ŋgaŋamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́. Ɛnɛ dun sa̧a̧ Fara k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ gasamɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ dé sedaako wen mɔ n’Ɛnɛ dea dika ku̧u̧naŋ fara mɛ.
Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ wen nɛ o witɔ̧wen oi nu-‘Nɛ́ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Ɛnɛ há̧ mɔɔ-oi ee-ta ha̧ o wi nɛ zɛm'Nɛ́,
Ɛnɛ dé ha̧ wen ko o witɔ̧wen oi nu-‘Nɛ́ mɛ duk nɛ kpasawen.
Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ kpɛ́k kɔfamɔ ko o widetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dee-demɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́
si tɛ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wen ha̧ o bii nɛ ya zaŋnu lɛŋ mɛ iŋ nde Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ Gasa Wan,
Sɔ̧ nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Gbazaŋ gur o nyɔŋmɔ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ; mɔ kpɔk, o ŋma nyɔŋmɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dee gan o ŋmaa
Nɛ́ hee mɔ nɛ war-gɛr iŋ nɛti kpoo-saɗi tɛ nyɔa̧-a̧'ɛ ga, a wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ iŋ nɛ ti o wen-ndela.
Gɔɔmɔ kɔ̧ see-wi ha̧ nɛ ɗaŋsee ha̧ wi, ɓɛɛ wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ tɛ iŋ kifa er ha̧ a̧.
okóò kpɛ́k kɔ‘i wi nɛ nu tum; mɔ kpɔk, o ŋma zɔŋa a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ nɛ dee gan o ŋmaa.
Dee ko okóò há̧ nɛ desee ha̧ wii, ɓɛɛ mɔ‘i gana zu mɔ lɛŋ nɛ wiwii kɔ̧a̧.
Ka a̧ nɛ boo nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ in nyɔɔ̧-wen, ɓɛɛ ŋma wan-desee hee wii kɔ̧-a̧ ga bo na.
Wi nɛ bá koo ku̧ nɛ naŋ dee mbɔi; a̧ kpaa wi-gbak-a̧ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in a̧, in wi-ɛk-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Fara nɛ ɓoramɔ bó sɛnɛ na dak nɛ o wi-ɗaŋ-mɔ.
Fara nɛ okóò bó sɛnɛ na, wiwii yár nɛ mbɔɗɔnu, nyim nɛ tɛ nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ tɛ e tɛ nɛ haya wizu̧zu̧ nɛ ndɛn nɛ tɛ o ye, nɛ́ o?
Nɛ́ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt in wiwii nɛ bó nɛ tua na, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɔ́ fara lɛŋ nɛ zɛ ba a̧ sɛnɛ.
Sɛm lɛŋ tɔ̧‘e: «Mi nɛ sɛm, mi mbɛt» mɔ kpɔk, pɛrti sɛm'i nɛ sɛm hur nin gee.
Ŋma mɔɔ-ziimɔ nɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ nyɛm ŋmaa in fio hee ŋma gbamayari in sɛm nɛ kpai nɛ wisɛn ga bó na.
Hó yaa-ta-ɗaŋmɔ, mɛ gboo nɛ dee, sá mɛ kpee nɛ zu nu nɛ ɔrmɔ'ɛ ge?
Ŋma gbamayari kpá nɛ kpɔk desee in sɛm kɔ‘i ŋgimbi bɔtɛ, ka ŋgimbi bɔnɛ hɔ́,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ bá zu dúk nɛ a̧.
Ŋma gbamayari zɔk bɔnɛ in sɛm kɔ‘i wen zu nyɔŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ ka ŋgimbi biro hɔ́,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ba nɛ ŋgee husi nɛ tɛ.
Ká tɛ-mɛ bi ɗɔŋ sɛm kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧ see-mɛ na,
ɓɛɛ ká ta-zu-mɛ bi ɗɔŋ a̧ ŋgimbi kpaa mɔ kɔ-mɛ na.
Wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ lɛŋ dúk tɛ nɛ war wen kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o ŋma tɔ̧ kɔ‘i mbɔrɔ wen zu wi nɛ zu wi.
Mɛ kasi zu-mɛ nɛ wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, mɛ kii ndaa mɔ n'aa kɔ̧a̧ sɛ́ — wen a̧ kii nɛ war mɔ
kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ́ zu-a sɛ́ — ŋma ɓɛɛ a̧ kii mɛ ɔr nɛ mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ mɛ‘e: «Yuwar deemɔ kɔ-mɛ ɔ dee»,
ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ yor nɛ nyɛia̧ mɛ zɔk nɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ zu mɛ.
Ká mɛ ak mbɔrɔ er wi nɛ e see tɛ-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ hu̧si mɔ nɛ mɛ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de lɛŋ
nɛ o wi nɛ a̧-a̧ see mɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Ká mɛ ak mbɔrɔ er ŋma okóò wen zu gɔya-a na,
koo wi-kii wen zu biro na,
koo wiɗɔrmɔ ŋgimbi hi̧fa̧ mɔ na,
koo wi-hifi-mɔ ŋgimbi ɗɔra mɔ na
koo wi-de-sunu wen zu dea osoko na,
koo wi-ŋga-er wen zu dee demɔ na,
koo wi-tɛɛri wen ŋma tom na,
koo wi-ba-sede-tom kpɔk wese wen zu kaɗa ko tom na,
koo wi-de-tɛɛri-tom wen zu ŋma gasa tom na,
Ká mɛ zii mbɔrɔ nú ŋma wi nɔ‘i kpɔk na.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ gbam in kpasa wiyukii Sɔ̧, nɛ mɛ iŋa'e ndak nɛ ɗoŋ heembea,
nɛ taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hɔɔ ŋmaa in kɔ-mɛ, in nɛ tɛ gbak mɛ, ŋgimbi tikaa kɔ-mɛ.
Mɛ yor zu mɔ nɛ see-mɛ usi ha̧ mɛ, wen ŋma bii nɛ demɔ nyɛm tɛ-mɛ hee see-mɛ‘i ga bo na.
Wen taamɔ ko bíí usi mɔ usi ha̧‘i nɛ sa̧-a̧ gan giiwi-pɛm-mɔ nɛ‘i aa zu kusa fara.
Zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ, mɛ ak mɔ er Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn ha̧ A̧ mgbɔ mɛ si tɛ kpasawen.
Ɛnɛ zii ŋmaa nɛti, seka mɛ ku̧u̧ tom; mɛ ta mɔ kaɗi seka mɛ ku̧u̧ naŋ ŋma mɔ.
Kunin o taamɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ see.
Gbaa-er-a gbái tɛ fara naar:
demɔ in ɗaŋmɔ, duka-kpasa in fio,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ leɓe-wi a kɛ̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara-a.
Tɛ ŋma bii ɔ́ kpɔra wen usa mɔ há̧ o ŋma-a̧, ɓɛɛ ŋma gba̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ wen tɛ-a̧ bo na.
Ŋma wibúrwen dak nɛ wen pii zu, a̧ beka kpa be nyɔŋmɔ na, koo tikiɗi.
Gasa Wan dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ de yi bii na, wen a̧ bo nɛ ŋma be ɗuka-taamɔ na, koo tikiɗi.
Ŋma bii a̧-a̧ nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ wen zu a ɓɛɛ; mɔɔ-oi iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ yá wen tɛ-a̧.
Wan-ɗuka-taamɔ usi mɔ usi ha̧ dukbii kɔ‘i,
ɓɛɛ wi nyɛma mɛ e te-wi nɛ mɔ nɛ gbó nɛ tɛ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Toka de yoŋgo hura wan-ɗuka-taamɔ dinyɔ́m,
ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ nɛ zɔk a̧ ŋgan nɛ mɔ‘e a̧ nɛ wan-desee.
Wi tɔ́r zɛ duka-kpasa ko bii tɔr, ɓɛɛ wi nyɛm mɛ tɔr war zɛ ko Israɛl na.
Wan-ɗuka-taamɔ tɛ duk nɛ yaa-e-nɛ-ta mgbara dukbii kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nin-a tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ we tɛ-mɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ tɛ dukaa kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ duk nɛ ɗaŋá wen mɛ, ɓɛɛ mɛ dor tɛ-mɛ sɛnɛ.
Wen bó nɛ mɔ lɛŋ a bá nɛ bii lɛŋ na, ɓɛɛ bó nɛ mɔ lɛŋ a ɔ dee tɛ bii lɛŋ na.
Ká mɛ de ɗaɗa mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ dee tɛ-mɛ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ nak tɛ-mɛ wen nyɔŋmɔ gan na.
Wen nyɔŋa mɔ gan zu-wi nɛ mɔɔ-ha̧-zɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɗaɗa nɛ mɔá-ha̧-zɛ́ɛ́ ɓaɓa-zaŋ.
Bíí nɛ dɔkaa fea wen zu ɗaɗa kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ kɔ wi nɛ kasi ko'i zu, zɛ-a tɛ dɔk zaŋnu.
Mɛ tu̧ tɛ wan nyina, wen zu o tom kɔ-a̧, wen a̧ mbɛt nɛ́ Gasa Wan a̧ dee a̧.
Kpasa bii tɛ zɛ́ɛ́ tɛ nɛ tɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Gasa Wan'i a ha̧ ŋgai-a ha̧ wan-nyina.
Iŋamɔ ko wan-nyina de dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ ba zu-a nɛ ŋgɔn; o gasawi mbɛt yéŋ nɛ a̧.
O nyina gbó nɛ tɛ nu; nɛ́ Gasa Wan a dee wa. Wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ e wa tɛ geemɔ na.
Ɛɛ iŋa nɛ mbetɛ nde nɛ́ ɓirate nɛ‘i pii ɗɔɔ páŋ yi ɓeemɛ a̧ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ kifi de yi-nɔɔ.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a'i zɔka nɛ ŋgai ko Sɔ̧.
A̧ ha̧iŋamɔ ha̧ o bii lɛŋ wen ha̧ wa mɛ zɔn A̧ wen zu kpɔraa ko o nyina kɔ-A̧.
Nɛ́ o nyina nɔ‘i a wi-gi-nyina zaŋ nɛ ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ dɔkta baa kpasi nɛ zɛ́ɛ́, gá̧ nɛ nyimmɔ mbɛt.
Hegɔ, tom ko Sɔ̧ kaɗi na, ɓɛɛ hayatɛ nɛ tɛ nɛ tɛ A̧ dama zaŋnu.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ dúk wɔkɔro ŋgimbi zɛ́ɛ́ kɔ-mɛ na; mɛ kɔfi Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ kpasi mɛ.
Mɛ siŋ o yɔákaya kɔ-mɛ pi nu, mɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a, mɛ fɔ́r see-mɛ tɛ ɗaŋmɔ lɛŋ.
Mɛ a fuu-nyama in zɛzɛ ha̧ Gasa Wan wen ha̧ tɛ-A̧ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɛ.
Mɛ há̧ kpasa mɔ ha̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ mɛ sá dɔkta, wen a̧ mɓɛt nɛ́ Gasa Wan a dee a̧; ɓɛɛ,
ká á nyɛi nɛ mɛ na, wen mɛ́ a̧-a̧ nɛ haazi kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋma ŋgimbi a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, nɛ yuwar kpaa hayatɛ kɔ-mɛ tɛ dúk kɔ er-wa.
Wen wa mbɛt, wa tɛ kɔfi Gasa Wan mɛ gbak wa, ha̧ wa mɛ ga̧ zɛ́ɛ́ ko-mɛ,
in mɛ kpa yi yina nɛ tɛ kpasi mɛ.
Wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ ti wi nɛ dee a̧ a tik kɔ̧ er dɔkta.
Bem kɔ‘m, mɛ hi̧i̧ bii nɛ fea. Mɛ ba gima-fio hee bii nɛ see ŋmana ga.
Mɛ gun a̧ nɛ dea ha̧ mɛ nyɛm sɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ e pɛsi kɔ̧-a̧ wɔkɔrɔɔ na.
Mɛ nyim tɛ-mɛ nɛ kpasaa, miikɔ̧a̧ a gbo yi-mɛ nɛ wee, mɛ nyaŋ fio kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ dea,
tɛ zɛ kpɔk koo yiitoo, wen ká bii tɔ̧́ ɗaŋ wen tɛ-mɛ; ɓɛɛ mɛ ga̧ see-mɛ zu gbɛŋa ɗɛɗɛ kɔ-mɛ.
Wen fio nyɛma mɛ tɛ nɛ tɛ gbɛŋa-ɗɛɗɛ, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋsee kaɗi ŋgai tɛ-wi kaɗi.
Ɗaŋsee a kaɗi wese zui yi-fio; bɔnɛ nɛ tik zu wi de ha̧‘i mɛ duk nɛ ɗaŋsee,
see-wi kɔ̧ duka nɛ ɗaŋsee ɓɔnsɛnɛ na.
Ká mɛ kpa ɗaŋsee gan batɛ na, mɛ wɛr a̧ e nɛ mgbaar, ɓɛɛ mɛ tá nɛ mɔ mɛ ɗoŋ.
Ká tɛ-mɛ bi na, piaɗoŋ bo na. Ɗaŋsee kɔ-mɛ‘i beka gbak fio na; a̧ tɛ pi̧ nɛ bɔnɛ zu mɛ woyo.
Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ndemɔ nɛ kpaa a'i tɛ kpa mɛ mbɛt: mboyɛɛ, nɛ́ kɔ‘m, sɔsɔɔ nɛ́ kɔ-mɛ.
Ka'i gun fio kaɗi, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wi a̧ bi ɗoŋ a̧; ɔmi kɔ̧-a̧ a yaka kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ tɛ-mɛ a gá̧.
Wi-usi-heembea kpa ɗuka-taamɔ wen zu dɔka ŋgimbi ɔmtɛ n'aa a̧-a̧ nɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ bó nɛ mɔɔ-dee dɔ́k na nyɛma mɛ kifi wan-ɗuka-taamɔ.
Nɛ́ hee ge a̧ wi-ba-wara-ndai tɛ kpa nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ ge? A̧ bá ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ wen gusa
ndai; ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ wen tom-ndai in tɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛrɛ zu o be-mɔdai ɓɛɛ.
See-a lɛŋ a̧-a̧ tɛ dee o taŋá, ɓɛɛ nyaŋa-ya kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ wen ha̧nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ o be-zɔŋa ndai kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt in o wi-duk-zu-zuduk-tom nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ de tom zɛ nɛ wese,
koo wi nɛ de o tumbal há̧ nɛ ŋgai-tɛ wen gɔna yaayi dap-aa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ:
a̧-a̧ ha̧ see-a lɛŋ ha̧ tom'i mɛ nyɛm yi-wan n'aa zɔka, ɓɛɛ nyaŋa-ya kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ wen ɗafa ɗoŋ tom'i.
Nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt wen kela nɛ dúk nu sɛn ka̧ mboɗa-boi: hakilo kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ
a̧-a̧ tɛ tom duia boi; gbɛŋmɔ-wee mɔk nɛ murtɛ-a, ɓɛɛ tɛ-a gbɛŋ gbɛŋ zɛk zɛk
sɛn ka̧ kusi-wee; giti boi-gusi-mɔ mgbe nɛ zer-a, ɓɛɛ yi-a ɓɔŋ za̧-a̧ tɛ yi-mɔ
n'aa dui'i. See-a lɛŋ nɛ́ wen ha̧ tom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ de, ɓɛɛ nyaŋa-ya-zɛ kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ wen yɔka ɗoŋ wa kpɛ́rɛ́rɛ́.
Nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ mbɛt in wiɓukpana, nɛ duk nu ka̧ tom kɔ‘i,
zik nɛ mɔɔ-ɓu-kpana nɛ naŋ; see-a lɛŋ a̧-a̧ tɛ gbɛŋaa wen tom kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ki ha̧ tom kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ nɛ́ nɛ́ɛ́ siti.
Gii, n'aa ŋmaa nɛ naŋ-a'i a̧ vai nɛ er-a'i, a̧ va̧i̧ nɛ er-a; see-a lɛŋ nɛ́ wen sɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗáŋ ɗoŋ-aa,
ɓɛɛ ɔ zɛ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ wen mbia fara-wee.
O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ e ta nɛ er-wa, ɓɛɛ koo o nde iŋa mgbara tom kɔ‘i.
Ka wa bó na, wi nyɛm mɛ de ye na, wi beka ɔ́ so sɛnɛ na, wi beka yar so sɛnɛ na;
mɔ kpɔk, tɛ fara ba keta ko bii, wi beka sa wa mɛ zii taamɔ kɔ-wa na;
ɓɛɛ, sɛn fara mɔi̧a̧, wa beka ba zu-wa nɛ ŋgɔn na; wa beka ya nu zu kiti ko wigɔnkita na:
wa iŋ kɔ-wa ŋma mɔ tɛ heembea na; wi zɔk iŋamɔ kɔ-wa ka bo nɛ iŋa o heembe na;
Wi beka kpa wa mgbara tɔ̧ o tua-wen na;
ɓɛɛ wa de dee ha̧ o mɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea so nɛtɛ ɓeemɛ mɛ nɛ́ɛ́ siti,
ɓɛɛ kɔfasɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ́ wen zu tom kɔ-wa.
Wár ko wi nɛ e kɔ‘i ta tɛ taa mɔ zu heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn nɛtɛ,
A̧ kii nɛ ndaa ɗuka-taamɔ ko o kuti wanusimɔ,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ wen taa mɔ zu o wen ko o witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧.
A̧ kasi o wen ko o wi nɛ nin ɔ hura kasi, ɓɛɛ a̧ sara ndaa wen ko o wan-ɗuka-taamɔ.
A̧ kii nɛ mgbak mgbara hu̧sá̧ gbaa tua-wen; A̧ zik gba̧a̧ ɗuka tua-wen si hɛ̧ɛ̧ si hɛ̧ɛ̧.
A̧ de nɛ tom tɛ kɔ̧ o gasawi, ɓɛɛ a̧ usa tɛ-a sɛn mgbara o wannu.
A̧ yár nɛ gɔngɛnɛ nu, wen a̧ iŋa mgbara mɔ nɛ dúk nɛ dea sɛn tɛ o bii in wan nɛ de na.
A̧ e see-a tɛ gboo tuyɛ sitɛ Gasa Wan nɛ dee a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ aia nú-a̧ ti Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.
A̧ hu̧i̧ nu-a wen kɔfa Sɔ̧, ɓɛa a̧ gɔma er-a wen o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ka Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa a kɔ̧a̧, A̧ tɛ dun a̧ nɛ ɔmi zia mgbara mɔ,
A̧ tɛ sɛ̧ wen ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ hee yikoro ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ zɔn Gasa Wan tɛ kɔfasɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ kɔ̧-a̧ in iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ ta mɔ zu o hu̧sa̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧.
A̧ tɛ de ha̧ o mɔ n'aa yamba mɛ tok tok, ɓɛ a̧ tɛ zɔn tɛ-a tɛ heembea nɔ̧ɔ̧-tɔk ko Gasa Wan.
Bíí nɛ dɔka tɛ zɔn iŋamɔ kɔ̧-a̧; tɛ-wa beka bi dɔŋ a̧ na. Tɛ-wi beka bi ɗoŋ a̧ na,
ɓɛɛ nin-a tɛ hur mgbara o bezaŋ yak nɛnɛ sɔ̧i̧.
O gɔni zuduk tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ o giiwi tɛ zɔn a̧.
Ka a duk zaŋnu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi, nin-a̧ tɛ hur gan o dɔkaa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ ka a̧ fe, ɓɛɛ i̧i̧ nyɛma kɔ‘i a̧.
Ɗoŋ n'am taa mɔ kaɗi, mi tɛ tɔ̧ mbe wen woyo, wen mi duna dɛrɛŋ hee nyaŋazɛ nɛ mbɛra biɔ̧ ga.
O sa̧-a̧ bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ zíí am, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ gásí hee de ɓɔɔ-te nɛ gbai sɛn ka zaŋ yi ga.
Ɛnɛ yá hee nyama nɛ pɛr-aa kur ɓisisi ga, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ ya hee gbadɛŋ nɛ dó nɛ dea’ɛ ga.
Ɛnɛ bá ger-‘nɛ́ nɛ ŋgɔn, ɛnɛ bii gima in o ŋmaa de nɛ osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan wen zu o mɔ lɛŋ n'A̧a dea.
Ɛnɛ gasi nin-A̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zɔn A̧ dam fara lɛŋ, ɛnɛ gái gima mbɛ́r nɛ koloŋ,
ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ zɔn A̧ hee mɔ'ɔ ga:
Oe gee gba demɔ nɛ Gasa Wan dea wa! ɓɛɛ o ha̧a̧nu kɔ-A lɛŋ hɔ́ gba̧a̧ nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Ka'i tɔ̧‘e: «i̧i̧ wen ge?» nde na, wen mɔ lɛŋ tɛ de tom nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a.
Tɛ wen mɛ nú-A̧, yi mɔi̧a̧ yor dɔŋgɔrɔá, ɓɛɛ o gbatɔp in o zer yor tɛ wen kɔ̧-A̧.
A̧ ha̧nu-A̧, ɓɛɛ mɔ lɛŋ de hee mɔ n'A̧a kɔ̧a̧ ga; ŋma bii kpɔk nɛ nyɛma mɛ dor A̧ tɛ kpasa bii bo na.
Tom ko o bii lɛŋ a̧-a̧ ti A̧; ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nyɛm mɛ yak yi-A̧ na.
A̧ zɔk mɔ dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur-aa, ɓɛɛ ŋma mɔ nɛ yek A̧ bo na.
Ka'i tɔ̧‘e: «i̧i̧ wen ge nde?» na, wen mɔ n'A̧a dea lɛŋ a̧-a̧ nɛ tom kɔ‘i.
De yoŋgo kɔ̧-A̧ duk hee ha̧nanayi nɛ hura nu lɛŋ ga, hee bɔ̧zɔ̧ŋ nɛ duk dɔŋgɔro zu nu ga.
Nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a tu̧u̧see kɔ̧-A̧ tɛ dam nɛnɛ zu o wi nɛ iŋ A̧ hee mɔ n'A̧a kpaia so nɛ demɔka nu nɛ ŋga nu tɔ̧ŋ'ɛ ga.
O yuwar kɔ̧-A̧ ya kɔ‘i nɛ tanaa wen o sa̧a̧ bii kɔ̧-A̧; ɓɛɛ nɛ ko o ɗaŋwi nɛ́ o mɔɔ-to-naŋ a duna sɛnɛ.
Dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ, Sɔ̧ dee o demɔ wen o de bii in o ɗaŋmɔ wen o ɗaŋwi.
Mgbak mɔ nɛ kasi bii tɛ dukaa kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: yì, wee, boi in tɔ́ŋ,
fuu alkamaari, yibere in gɔrɔ, dɔ̧ɔ̧-waya-nyak, nɔ̧́ in laa.
Mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ o demɔ wen wi-yu-kii Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi nɛ ɗaŋmɔ wen o ɗaŋwi.
Sɔ̧ dee o ŋma búk wen usa bɔnɛ ha̧ bii, ɓɛɛ ka see-A̧ nyim ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ŋgai kpɔri kɔ-wa ŋgai ŋgai siti,
ɗaŋ nɛ mɔ woyo. Nɛ ŋgimbi ɗaŋa mɔ a̧ wa kpɔ́r nɛnɛ siti, ga̧-a̧ nɛ see-Wi nɛ de wa.
Wee, ɓɔrɔ, kaɓa, fio, nɛ́ mɔá-usi-bɔnɛ ha̧ bii, oi ɗaŋmɔ.
O gake-nin o bokónam, o tore, o ŋga gɔk, gbapaa-kifi-er ha̧ o daŋwi wen zu yɔɔkaya kɔ-wa;
wa lɛŋ, wa kpɛk nɛ ha̧a̧nu kɔ̧-A̧, dɛ nɛ nyɛŋɛ mbo nɛ zú nɛ desee. Sen zu nu wa ya dɔ̧ɔ̧
zɛm nɛ tom n'A̧a tɛ usi; ɓɛɛ ka ŋgimbi-a hɔ, wa bɛ̧ wen nu-A̧ na.
O mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ duk so nɛ sa̧-a̧ wen am dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋ tom kɔ‘m; mi taa mɔ zu a, ɓɛɛ mi yɔr'e:
«O mɔ nɛ Gasa Wan dea lɛŋ ɔ́ dee. A̧ gbak bii gbak tɛ haazi lɛŋ, nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a;
«Ká‘i tɔ̧‘e «ɛ̧ɛ̧ mɔɔ ɗaŋa gan i̧i̧» na, wen mɔ lɛŋ tɛ dúk nɛ demɔ tɛ ŋgimbi-a;
ɓɛɛ kinii ɛnɛ bii gima nɛ See'nɛ́ lɛŋ, in nɛ hee-gɛr, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ zɔn nin Gasa Wan.»
Dukaa ko bii zaŋnu nɛ́ gasa bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ dita tui a̧-a̧ zu o bem ko Adam,
dika wese nɛ wa gboo nɛnɛ kɔ̧ zaŋ naa kɔ-wa,
hɔ́ nɛnɛ wese nɛ wa tɛ si nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ nu, nɛ dúk nɛ nàà ko bii lɛŋ.
Mɔ nɛ wa ta, mɔ nɛ ba fara kɔ̧ see-wa in nɛ pi̧ kii tɛ wa, nɛ́ wese fio kɔ-wa.
Dika tɛ wi nɛ dúk nu zu kiti-wan hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ gee bii nɛ duk nu zu fuunu in bùk,
Dika tɛ wi nɛ pi̧ nɛ gbɛ̧ laa-wan in mɛtɛwol hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ wi nɛ pi̧ nɛ gee fɛŋa zɔ̧-laa,
kana nɛ nyimsea, ee see tɛ ŋmaa, sakalamɔ in naka-tɛ, kii fio, kiri in kpɛri.
Ɓɛɛ ka ŋgimbi ɔm tɛ zu gado hɔ́, ɓɛɛ yá zɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kai nɛ́ o mbe sakalamɔ tɛnɛ woyo.
Dika tɛ be ɔɔ tɔŋ-ya wen ɔmatɛ, wen'i nu'i ɓɛɛ o zu-kii hɔɔ mɛ sakali wa, hee mɛ́ bu-wese ga.
Wa zɔk tɛ-wa zaŋ zu hee o wi-yu-kii feaa yi biro ga.
Ŋgimbi nɛ dúk hee wa a tɛ fe'i ga, ɓɛɛ wa tuna ɓɛlɛm ya nɛnɛ ɓekeyeke wen zu gee tum kii nɛ wa dea.
O ŋgaŋa mɔ nɔ'ɔ tɛ hɔ zu mɔ lɛŋ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea dika nɛ tɛ bii hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ saɗi,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ war ko o ɗaŋwi a tɛ ŋgai batɛ, war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
O ŋgaŋa mɔ nɔ‘i nɛ fio, tɔk, kpɛri, gbapaa, biro, kaɓa, ɗaŋamɔ, ŋga bɔnɛ.
O mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ dea wen o ɗaŋwi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wen zu wa mbɛt a gasa ha̧a̧yi hɔɔ so sɛnɛ.
Mɔ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ nu tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ nu, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ yi tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ gbatɔp.
Ha̧-a̧mɔ-ye-wi in gɔámɔ tɛ kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ kó yoraa ɗɔŋ nú tɛ duk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O mbɔi ko o gɔɔwi tɛ gɔn hee be-zer mɛ bɛ̀ɛ̀ ga, ɓɛɛ yaka hee ŋga mbaŋa-koro ŋgimbi ndiɓa-koro ga.
O wi nɛ huia er wen ha̧mɔ tɛ kpa desee, ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋwi tɛ tir kɔ‘i a nu.
O bezaŋ o ɗaŋwi beka gba er na, ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋ kunin-wa tɛ yá nɛ zu yɔɔ ta
Wi zuɗi toro nɛ hɔ́ ka̧ zaŋ yi ti ha̧ o gee zɔ̧ lɛŋ.
Dee demɔ in bíí bó dúk hee de ti-giɔ̧-ɔmtɛ ga, ɓɛɛ ha̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ ha̧ bíí tɛ́ duk yi-Sɔ̧ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wi nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ mɔ nyɛm er in widetom ya zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ,
ɓɛɛ nɛ́ wi kpaa gasa mbɔi a gana wa lɛŋ nɛ deseee
Koo o bem, in dee gasa ye nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ ha̧ hura nin,
ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ dee gan mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ nɛ́ okóò nɛ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a.
Dɔ̧ɔ̧ in biɔ̧ ha̧ nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧ nɛ desee gan
Fol in koloŋ ɗafi nɛ gɛr gima, ɓɛɛ de nu-wen gana mɔ nɔ‘i yiitoo'i lɛŋ.
Gbaayí kii kɔ‘i nɛ de ɓɔɗa-te in de saŋayi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ de ɓɔɔ-fɔ a dee gan wa lɛŋ.
Kpaa ŋmaa ko sɛm in ko gbamayari ɔ dee,
ɓɛɛ wan nɛ gana nɛ́ kpaa ŋmaa ko kóò in wii kɔ̧-a̧.
O nya-wi in wi-ye-ɗoŋ-wi gbak wi ŋgimbi bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ha̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ a kpasi wi.
Lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɛ́ o mɔ nɛ de ha̧‘i mɛ i̧si̧ nu mitak, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ de mbɔrɔ a gbak gan.
Mbɔi in ŋgai nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ-ha̧-nɔɔŋgiɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ yuu kii Gasa Wan a gana.
Ŋma mɔ ɓan wi-yu-kii Gasa Wan na; wi kii ŋma wi-gbak-wi nɛtɛ gan zu-a ɓɔna.
Yuu kii Gasa Wan nɛ de giɔ̧-ɔmtɛ, ɓɛɛ a gɔn zu wi gan kóó ge gasamɔ ge nde lɛŋ.
Bem kɔ‘m, ká mɛ dúk nɛ wikɔfimɔ er bii na; gana so feaa ba nɛ kɔfa mɔ er bíí.
Duka-kpasa ko wi-zɛm ɗɔɔ nu-bii bó nɛ kpasa duka-kpasa na. A̧ ɗáŋ nɛ wargɛr-a̧
nɛ gɔni nyɔŋmɔ; wi-iŋ-mɔ in wi-iŋ-de-dukaa beka de pɛrti mɔ‘i na.
Kó wi nɛ iŋ yuwar de-dukaa na, nyɔŋmɔ n'aa kɔfa er-bii ɔ nyɔɔ̧ ɔɔ nu-a;
mɔ kpɔk, ŋma wee tɛ gbɛŋ nyak-zaŋ-a̧.
Hó fio! oe gee tu̧u̧see nɛ wi nɛ dúk mɔ kɔ‘i gɛ́ɗɛ́k mgbara o mbɔi kɔ‘i,
nɛ ɗɛɗɛ gɔn mgbút na, nɛ mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ nɛ́ nɛ dea, in nɛ ɓɔna nɛ oi ŋgai-tɛ
wen dea o mɔ nɛ ɔ nyɔá̧ sɛn tɛ a̧, oe gee tu̧u̧see n'a̧-a̧ kpá tɛ taa mɔ wa!
Hó fio! gɔna-gɛr wen kɔ-mɛ ɔ́ dee wen wi nɛ a̧-a̧ tɛ san, nɛ bó nɛ ŋgai ɓɔ na;
wen wi nɛ sɔka kukuɗú, nɛ taamɔ gana zu, nɛ kpa ɗaŋsee wen sakalamɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ bó nɛ munyal ɓɔna!
Ká mɛ de kii fio na! Tɛ-mɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ o wi nɛ yaka ti ha̧ mɛ in o wan nɛ tɛ ndak ɗoŋ mɛ.
Nɛ́ heembea ko Gasa Wan wen mɔ lɛŋ nɛ ɔ́m ɔm. Ɓɛɛ wen ge sa'i tɛ bɛ̧ mɔ nɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn kɔ̧a̧ ge?
Kóó mɛ duk zaŋnu pɛ ɓu, kóó pɛ gɔmŋmaa, kóó pɛ booro, ŋma wen ko bii nɛ a̧-a̧ kɔ‘i ye ko fio bo na.
O bem ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ kifi kana nɛ o ɗaŋ bem nɛ ndɛ́n nɛ nutua ko o ɗaŋwi.
Mɔɔ-oi ko o bem ko o wi-de-ɗaŋmɔ si nɛ nu sɔɔgee. Gasa ziimɔ tɛ tik zu o bezaŋ-wa ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Dáà nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ zii ɗaŋ wen ko o bem kɔ‘i, wen nɛ́ a̧ a dak ziimɔ pi zu wa.
Bɔnɛ a̧-a̧ zu'nɛ́, o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na, n’ɛnɛ siŋa heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn pi nu’ɛ.
Wa ko'nɛ́ zu fom, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́nɛ́ fe, mɔɔ-oe k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ fom.
Mɔ, nɛ tɛ́ nɛ tɛ nu, tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ nu. Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na kur nɛnɛ nɛ yi fom si tɛ fio.
Murtɛ-bii nɛ gee mɔ; ɓɛɛ nin-wi duk ɗoɔ heembea beka bi na.
Mɛ hakali nin-mɛ, wen a̧ tɛ ɓɔn oe mɛ gan zɔm dɔka lɔr.
Zɛ de-dukaa dɔ́k na, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ de hura-nin a dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo.
O bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ kásí usamɔ kɔ‘m nɛ dea.
Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ dúk nɛ hu̧sa̧a̧ in gasa mbɔi nɛ‘i zɔk na, nɛ́ ge a'i tɛ kpaa sɛnɛ ge?
Gana so hu̧sa mgbele kɔ‘i ba nɛ hu̧sa̧ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ‘i.
Mi tɛ tɔ̧ mgbak mɔ nɛ‘i tɛ de foe sɛnɛ, wen de ha̧‘i mɛ de foe tɛ mɔ lɛŋ na,
ɓɛɛ mbɛt yi-bii lɛŋ zɔk mɔ hee ŋmaa ga na.
Foe a de'nɛ tɛ dee yaka-yi-mɔ yi dáà in naa k’ɛ́nɛ́,
tɛ dee ndela ti wanye in ti gasawi,
tɛ dee ɗaŋmɔ ti wigɔnkita in wi-ɓa-kita,
tɛ gbina heembea ti giiwi in ti dukbíí,
tɛ dee gɔɔmɔ ti gbamayari in ti sɛm kɔ‘i,
tɛ zu̧u̧ mɔ nɛ yi o wi nugara kɔ-mɛ;
mɛ ta kpasawen in nɔɔtɔk kɔ Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ foe a dé mɛ tɛ guaa zu nyɔŋmɔ, tɛ ha̧mɔ kóó tɛ baa mɔ sú nɛ tɛ,
tɛ bɛ̧ɛ̧ nú wi nɛ fan mɛ, tɛ kɛ̧i̧a̧ ko-duk-gee
tɛ ndaka be ye kɔ-mɛ,
tɛ baa mɔ ko bii, kóó ŋma mɔ nɛ wa ha̧ha̧ a̧, nɛ kɔ-mɛ,
tɛ mbaɗa gɔni koo ko wan-aa.
Ká mɛ ndaɗi in kodetom kɔ-mɛ batɛ na,
ɓɛɛ ká mɛ ndaɗi si ka gado kɔ̧-a̧ na.
Foe a de mɛ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ɓaɗi-wen ha̧ o sɛm kɔ-mɛ;
ka mɛ nɛ ha̧mɔ ha̧ bii kaɗi, ká mɛ pi foe tɛ a ɓɔ na.
Foe a de mɛ tɛ wee ɗoŋ wen nɛ mɛ zia
in tɛ gbaa ndaa hu̧sa̧mɔ;
hegɔ mɛ tɛ gan zu mgbak mɔɔ-foe, ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ tɛ zɔk mɛ nɛ de yí.
Ká foe mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ de mɛ na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ kpa war-a mɛ de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ na mbɛt.
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn in nɔɔtɔk kɔ̧-A̧ na,
koo tɛ gɔna de kita zu ɗaŋwi nɛ bo nɛ wen zu na na.
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ tɔra sede n’ɛnɛ ɗaŋa in sɛm kɔ-mɛ, koo in gbamayari kɔ-mɛ, nɛ damaa na
koo tɛ kɛ̧a mɔɔ-oi fio in o ŋmaa na;
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ nyɛmaa sɛnɛ ko kilo in o be-a na,
kóó tɛ kpaa mɔ nɛ dɔkaa koo tikiɗi zu gun sede kɔ-mɛ na.
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ kpaa mɔ nɛ wiɗɔrmɔ kpá zu mɔɔgɛnɛ kɔ‘i na,
koo tɛ gusa o bem ye tɛ-wa, koo tɛ ee da̧i̧ ɔm ɗaŋ widetom na.
Ka yí-koo kɔ-mɛ á ɔɔ kora, nɛ mɛ gɔm nu-mɔ kɔ̧́ tua gɔm;
fara nɛ bii ɔ dɔka sɛnɛ, mɛ man nu-mɔ kɔ-mɛ man nɛ nana-sɔtɛ.
Mɛ tɔr mɔ nɛ mɛ ha̧ ha̧ bíí mɛ ba e dúk ha̧ mɛ tɔr, ɓɛɛ mɛ we ditaa mbɛt.
Mɔ nɛ mɛ ha̧ in mɔ nɛ mɛ kpa, mɛ yɔ́r yɔr.
Ká foe de mɛ tɛ usa de yuwar ha̧ mgbelewi in wi-bɔkɔ
koo ha̧ sɔka gbɛrɛ nɛ de dala na;
nɛ́ hegɔ a mɛ tɛ usi nɛnɛ‘e mɛ́ nɛ́ kpasa wi-iŋ-mɔ, ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ tɛ zɔn mɛ.
Bokobem dúk nɛ ŋma hu̧sa̧ mɔá-gɔn-yá yi-dáà kɔ‘i, nɛ bii iŋ na.
Taamɔ n'aa tui pi nu'i dor nɛ ya yi-dáà kɔ̧-a̧,
wen ká ŋgimbi baa wii tɛ̀ɛ yak a̧ tɛ zɔŋa,
ka a̧ nɛ baa nɛ wi kaɗi, ká wii tɛ̀ɛ̀ sɛn a̧;
ŋgimbi n'aa tɛ iŋ wiwii na, ká wiwii tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɔr a̧, ɓɛɛ ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗaŋ sɛn nutua,
in ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ ba zaŋ kɔ̧ tua ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧;
ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ baa wii kaɗi, ka a̧ tɛɛ de dala
in wen ka a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ yar ndɔra kɔ̧ tua ko wi kɔ̧-a̧.
Mɛ yor mitak, ká tɛ bokobem de gɔna yi
wen ka̧ a̧ tɛɛ de ha̧ mɛ mɛ kifi nɛ mɔɔ-zɛkɛɗɛ ko o wisɛn kɔ-mɛ,
ká o wi-ssaye tɛ̀ɛ̀ mam mɛ suu suu de nɛnɛ, ha̧ bii mɛ mɔi̧ nduŋ nduŋ,
ɓɛɛ ká a̧ tɛ̀ɛ̀ pi foe tɛ-mɛ mgbara bii.
Ká mɛ e yí-mɛ tɛ dee ko ŋma bii kpɔk na, ɓɛɛ ká mɛ dúk nu mgbara o okóò na.
Wen zɛmɛ-nyɔŋ-laa gbo nɛ tɛ laa, ɓɛɛ ɗaŋ ko okóò gbo nɛ tɛ okóò.
Gana so ɗaŋ ko wiwii ba nɛ dee demɔ ko okóò;
okóò nyɛma mɛ dak foe in búù pi zu wi.
Kinii, mi tɛ mbaŋ tɛ-‘nɛ́ zu o mɔ lɛŋ nɛ Gasa Wan dea: mɔ n'am zɔka, mi tɛ ɓa h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Gasa Wan deemɔ lɛŋ tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ taamɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
Wese nɛ zár zɔk nɛ o mɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ mɔ nɛ Gasa Wan dea lɛŋ duna nɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
Wee ɗoŋ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ a̧-a̧ sɛn zaŋnu’ɛ lɛŋ gana o sa̧a̧ bii ko Gasa Wan,
o wan nɛ Wan-ŋgayamɔ dee e nu mgbip,
wen ha̧ zaŋnu nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ mɛ duk ɗɔɔ a mitak zaŋ gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧.
A̧ zɔk mɔ zɔk hɔ sɛn ndaa gbatɔp in kɔ̧ see-wi mbɛt: A̧ iŋa ndaa hu̧samɔ
nɛ wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de lɛŋ, wen Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgai mɛ iŋ mɔ lɛŋ;
yi-A̧ duk zaa sɛn tɛ o mɔɔ-usi-kpaiaa ko o ŋgimbi.
A̧ tɔ̧ nɛ wen zu mɔ nɛ yaka in mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ndaa o hu̧sa̧mɔ.
Ŋma taamɔ ko bii n'A̧a iŋ na bo na; ŋma wen kpɔk nɛ hu̧sa̧ nɛ A̧ bo na.
A̧ ɗafa o gasa demɔ, nɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ̧-A̧ usa ha̧ A̧ lɛŋ, á nɛ war-a,
wen A̧ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ dika ɛti, ɓɛɛ A̧ kpai na kpoo nɛ kpoo: ŋma mɔ daŋ zu A̧
kóó yuu A̧ bo na, ɓɛɛ A̧ bo so nɛ haazi ŋma wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ A̧ na mbɛt.
Ho! oe gee gba de o mɔ n'a̧-a̧ dea wa, hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ be sɔŋkur mbul-a nɛ‘i nyɛma mɛ zɔk.
Mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ ya nɛ kpasa, ɓɛɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo wen hazi lɛŋ, mbo nɛ zu tɛ mɔ lɛŋ mbɛt.
O mɔ lɛŋ gbam yiitoo yiitoo, ɓi-wi nyɛma ŋmaa in ɓii-aa, ɓɛɛ ŋma wan nɛ ɓɔna ŋgerɗek bo na.
Ɓii-wi ha̧ nɛ ŋgai ha̧ ɓi-aa. Nɛ́ o a̧ tɛ tɛ́ mbɔi tɛ zɔka gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ o nde?
Oe gba de gɛɗa yizan ŋgɔn mɛ‘i wa! oe ŋma demɔ‘e yiwese, tɛ zɔka gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ wa!
Daŋa ko wese usi nɛ mɔ nɛ Wan-gɔn-mɛ-ŋgɔn dea lɛŋ nɛ mɔɔ-ɗɛɗɛ-wi nyɛmna.
Ka a̧ hɔ bɛɗɛ-zu, ɓɛɛ nu zɔma. Nɛ́ o’ɔ a nyɛma mɛ yor ɗɔɔ kpɔraa kɔ̧-a̧, o?
Wi ufi wee nɛ ŋgaya wen o tom de nɛ wee, ɓɛɛ wese nɛ do o kaya kpɔra war taar
gan wee: buk-a yo wi hee wee ga, a̧ pɛ̧ nɛ mbul-wee zar nɛ yi-wi.
Wan nɛ dee wese ɔ gasa; nɛ́ wen mɛ nu-A̧ a̧ fo a nɛ́ nɛ nɔ nɛ hayaa.
Nyaŋazɛ mbɛt hɔ́ nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi-a usi nɛ fiozɛ in yakaa ko ŋgimbi.
Nɛ́ tɛ nyaŋazɛ a'i iŋ nɛ ŋgimbi gbaŋá, a̧ n'a̧-a̧ kɛn kɛn ɗoŋ n'a̧-a̧ tó ndaa nɛ nu kaɗi.
Fiozɛ kpa nin kɔ‘i, nɛ ɗɔŋ a̧. Oe, ŋma demɔ ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ hɔ mɛ daŋ nɛnɛ woyo wa!
a̧ nɛ́ widukti ko o gii sɔra nɛ yá yizan tok nɛnɛ ŋgol ŋgol.
Nɛ́ tokaa ko o sɔra a de ha̧ yiwese mɛ de; wa tók sɛn kusa fara ko Gasa Wan hee mɔɔ-ɗafi-tɛ ga.
Wa yor nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ fara nɛ Sa̧a̧-Wi ee wa sɛnɛ; ŋma kpɔk siŋ fara-pɛm-mɔ kɔ‘i e dúk na.
Mɛ zɔk ɓùtù, ɓɛɛ mɛ zɔ́n wi nɛ dee a̧;
ŋgimbi n'aa yɔr nɛnɛ, oe gba de gɔna dap-aa wa!
A̧ yɔr nɛ ŋma kirkiti-gasamɔ sɛn yiwese. Nɛ́ er Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn a bir a̧.
Nɛ tɛ ha̧a̧nu kɔ̧-A̧ a mbul-mbul ɓɔrɔ ai nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ A̧ toma nɛ o pi̧i̧-koro
wen ha̧ mɔ n'A̧a kɔ̧a̧ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Nɛ hegɔ a o nu dam kɔ̧-A̧ mɛ ŋgɔn hu̧i̧ nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ o duule bu̧a nɛnɛ hee o nɔi̧ ga.
Nɛ te ŋgayamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, A̧ a dee nɛnɛ ha̧ o duule mɛ kpai nɛ ŋgaya hee ta ga,
ɓɛɛ wa mbaŋa sɛ́kɛ́ sɛkɛ́ nɛ gba̧a̧ ɓɔrɔ a nu.
Nu nak nak tɛ zia giti dikaa kɔ̧-A̧,
o kaya pi̧i̧ liki liki tɛ zɔka A̧. Búk kazan mɛ dɔɔ yú ŋgimbi n'A̧a kɔ̧,
gú nɛ gbabúk kazan mɛ ŋgɔn in ŋga harabúk mbɛt.
A̧ sɛ̧ mbul ɓɔrɔ hee o gii nɔi̧ nɛ zir a nu ga, hee gba-dɔya nɛ ai nɛ yiwese ga.
Buaa kɔ̧-a̧ tal tal'i zar nɛ yi-wi bar-bar; ŋgimbi n'A̧a ai, bii lɛŋ de nɛ nyɛŋɛ.
A̧ gbai ɓɔrɔ kpe zu nu hee fuu tɔŋ ga: ka a̧ ŋgai ɓɛɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ kifi hee tɛnmɔ ga.
Ka gɛ̧ɛ̧ búk kazan mɛ ŋgɔn yú, ɓɛɛ zu yi kaŋa ŋgai hee ta ga; a̧ kpe zu gɔna yi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ guu wa lɛŋ hee ŋgee ga.
Búk ka̧-zan mɛ ɗɔɔ de ha̧ o kaya mɛ ba wee kpororo, dɔ́ nɛ ŋga gbara mbɛt:
a̧ ɗaŋ tɔr-mɔ hee wee a dɔ́ ga.
Haya nyina mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ kutu; mbɛŋ nɛ kpai ŋga gbɛŋmɔ bá nɛ desee pii nɛ ɗoŋ.
Nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗafamɔ kɔ̧-A̧, A̧ kpa ŋgai zu gbatɔp, ɓɛɛ A̧ aa o seekisi nɛ see a̧.
O wi nɛ yar zu gbatɔp nɛ gasa kombon tɔ̧ nɛ nyɛrɛ mɔɔ-kii kɔ̧-a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ ya yemsele gee.
O ŋma mɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ, nɛ‘i iŋ zu-a na, a̧-a̧ sɛn hi̧i̧: o yaayi saɗi ɗɔɔ yi nɛtɛ nɛtɛ, in o ndiɓa.
Ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ de dee ha̧ wi n'Aa tom mɛ nɛ́ nɔ hɔ ti, in mɔ lɛŋ nɛ́ nɛ wara,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen mɛ nú -A̧.
Ɛɛ nyɛma so mɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ mɔ nɔ‘i siti, nd’ɛ́ɛ́ beka kaɗi na mbɛt;
«Sɔ̧ nɛ́ mɔ lɛŋ», sɔŋkur gbɛ́ɛ́ zú wen k’ɛ́ɛ́ a̧‘i.
Ɛɛ tɛ kpa ŋgai gasi A̧ dee? Wen A̧ ɔ́ Gasa, A̧ gana mɔ lɛŋ n'A̧a dea.
Gasa Wan nɛ Wan-pi-kii tɛ wi, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɔ́ gasa nyɛmna,
A̧ nɛ ŋgaŋa-wi nyɛmna, bó nɛ mɔ'ɔ tɔ̧ na.
Ɛnɛ zɔ́n Gasa Wan, ɛnɛ ŋgan A̧, hee mɔ n’ɛnɛ nyɛma ga. A̧ gana zu mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ.
Ɛnɛ ŋgan A̧ nɛ ŋgai tɛ-‘nɛ́ lɛŋ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ mbɔi tɛ-‘nɛ́ na, wen ŋgana A̧ beka hɔ nduti na.
Wi nɛ zɔka A̧ kà nyɛm tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen-a̧-a̧ nɛ sa̧-a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ́ o?
Wi nɛ tɛ gasi A̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dukaa kɔ̧-A̧, nɛ́ o?
O ŋma mɔ nɛ ɔ́ hu̧sa̧, ɓɛɛ nɛ gasa gan ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɔ'ɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ,
wen o mɔ n'A̧a dea, nɛ́ tikiɗi ɛɛ zɔka ɓɛɛ.
Nɛ mbetɛ, nɛ́ Gasa Wan a dea o mɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧ ɗuka-taamɔ ha̧ o wi-yu-kii A̧.
Ɛnɛ zɔ́n o wi nɛ nin hura so, o zɔmdáà k’ɛɛ, o nde nyɛm nɛ ŋgimbi kɔ‘i.
Gasa Wan ha̧gasa hura-nin ha̧ wa, usi nɛ gasi kɔ‘i dika ɓeemɛ.
O ŋma ɔɔ so wan sɛn nu kɔ‘i, nin-wa hura wen ŋgai kɔ-wa.
Iŋa-mgbara-mɔ ko o ŋma dee ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ o kpasa wi-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ, tɔ̧́ nɛ wen zú mɛ nɛ tɛ hɔ.
O ŋma yaa nɛ o wi-usi-yuwar mɔ ha̧ o dukbii kɔ‘i, tɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ mbɔrɔ,
tɛ iŋa yuwar usa mɔ ha̧ o dukbii kɔ‘i,
in tɛ ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ gbo nɛ gbo nɛ usamɔ kɔ-wa.
O ŋma yaa so gbó nɛ o de gɛr-gima, yɔ́r nɛ o de ɗuka nyɔɔ nyɛrɛ.
O ŋma yaa nɛ o wanmbɔi, nɛ a̧-a̧ so nɛ ŋgai, ya nɛnɛ́ fara duk kɔ-wa zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Nin o wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ hura tɛ ŋgimbi kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ tortɛ bá so o bii ŋgimbi kɔ-wa wen zu wa.
O ŋma mgbara wa ee de nin, nɛ de ha̧‘i mɛ zɔn wa hɔ́ kinii.
O ŋma a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ, nɛ tɛ-wi bii ɗoŋ wa kaɗi. Wa yaka yi-bii, hee wa yá so kpasa ga na,
wa yá hee wa bo so nɛti na ga. Nɛ kale kpɔk mɔ wen o be-oi-wa mbɛt.
Ɓɛɛ zɔk o widedemɔ nɛ tɛ-wi bi ɗoŋ dee demɔ kɔ-wa na hɛ̧ɛ̧;
Oi demɔ kɔ-wa yá wen o bezaŋ-wa; mɔɔ-oi kɔ-wa yá wen o be-oi-wa.
O bezaŋ-wa yór ɗoŋ nɔɔtɔk nɛ nɔaa; o bé-koo-wa zok nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
O bezaŋ-wa tɛ ya kpoo nɛ kpɔá, ɓɛɛ hura-nin kɔ-wa beka kaɗi na.
Wa guna wa zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ nin-wa dúk kpasa pɛ nɛ pɛ.
O dukbii tɛ tɔ̧ nyɛrɛ ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ giiwi tɛ zɔn nin-wa.
Henɔk de yí Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan ba a̧ si ŋgɔn
A̧ nɛ wi-usi ɗoŋ kifa see ha̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧ o bezaŋ mɛ ɗoŋ.
Gasa Wan kpaa'e Nɔe nɛ kpasa widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a. Ŋgimbi tu̧u̧see ko Gasa Wan;
nɛ́ á̧ a̧ duka oi o bii nɛ kuma; nɛ́ wen zu a a be oi bii ɓɔna nɛnɛ́ zu nu,
ŋgimbi nɛ ha̧a̧yi ndiɓa-kòrò hɔɔ nɛ́nɛ.
Gasa Wan dee nɔɔtɔk nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo in a'e Wi beka kum o bii nɛ pɛrti ha̧a̧yi'i ɓɔna.
Abraham duka nɛ gasa zɔmdáà ko gba gii bii; ŋma bii nɛ nin-a̧ hura nyɛm ŋmaa in a̧ bona
A̧ ndaka pata heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ a̧ dee nɔɔtɔk in A̧,
A̧ dee nɔɔtɔk'i sɛn tɛ murtɛ-a̧; ŋgimbi nɛ Gasa Wan wee nɛ a̧, a̧ yora ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧.
Nɛ́ wen zu mɔ‘i a Sɔ̧ ha̧nɛ nú ha̧ a̧ tɛ kanamɔ mɛ tok de yoŋgo zu o dukbíí lɛŋ
nɛ ɗoŋ bezaŋ-aa; A̧ tɛ de ha̧ o bezaŋ-aa mɛ nyɛɓi hee fuunu ga,
A̧ tɛ tɔi wa e ŋgɔn hee o sɔra ga, mɛ ha̧ nu ha̧ wa mgbara o gbatɔp yiitoo,
dika tɛ gasa nanayi hɔ́ nɛnɛ́ nduti nu mɛ.
Nɛ́ kpɔk ha̧a̧nu'i a̧ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ Izaak wen zu dáà kɔ̧-a̧ Abraham.
De yoŋgo kɔ̧-A̧ zu o bii lɛŋ in nɔɔtɔk kɔ̧-A, Sɔ̧ e zu Jakɔb. A̧ tok de yoŋgo a zu a woyo,
ɓɛɛ ha̧ nu ha̧ a̧ nɛ mɔɔ-oi. A̧ kɛ̧a saŋa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ o zudukbii ɓu-zu-a-yiitoo.
Sɔ̧ foo ŋma widedemɔ gbónɛ́ nɛ tɛ Jakɔb, ɓɛɛ nɛ ɔ dee yi-bii lɛŋ; wi’ɛi nɛ́ Mɔisɛ,
nɛ Sɔ̧ in o bii kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ nɛ‘i tok nɛ de yoŋgo ha̧ a̧ ŋgimbi nɛ‘i ta mɔ wen a̧.
A̧ ha̧gasamɔ ha̧ a̧, hee ko o betom mɛ yiwese ga, ɓɛɛ A̧ há̧ ŋgai ha̧ a̧ pi nɛ kii tɛ o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧.
Sɔ̧ dora o mɔɔkifi nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Mɔise, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧ gasi ha̧ a̧ sɛn ti o wannu.
Sɔ̧ ha̧o heembea ha̧ a̧ wen dukbii kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ usi ŋma be nú-gasamɔ kɔ‘i ha̧ a̧.
Wen zu mboozu in mɔkasee kɔ̧-a̧, Sɔ̧ baa a̧ e nɛtɛ; A̧ hoka a̧ mgbara o dɔka bii;
A̧ dea ha̧ a̧ mɛ zii tigɛr-A̧, ɓɛɛ ba a̧ pi mgbara ŋmak ŋmak turazan;
A̧ ha̧heembea ha̧ a̧ gbaayi nɛ gbaayi, heembea duka-kpasa in iŋa-mgbara-mɔ
wen usa yuwar nɔɔtɔk ha̧ o bezaŋ Jakɔb? 1, in usa gɛŋa kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ o be Israɛl.
A̧ ha̧gasi ha̧ Aarɔn, ŋma sa̧a̧-bii hee Mɔisɛ ga, nya kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn nutua ko Levii.
Sɔ̧ dee nɔɔtɔk in a̧ wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ de a̧ nɛ wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ha̧ dukbii.
A̧ pi̧i̧ o de gasa laa-ha̧-desee tɛ a̧ gee, ɓɛɛ már dura laa-gbooyi sɛn guntir-a̧.
A̧ aa o de ɗilɛɛ laa tɛ a̧, ɓɛɛ A̧ ɗafi tɛ-a̧ nɛ o mɔɔwan kɔ̧-A̧: nɛ́ yɛm-yɛm laa mɛ ɗɔɔ,
dura laa, in laa-wor-sɔ̧ nɛ‘i sa'e Efod.
O be mɔ nɛ hɔɔ ŋmaa in koko, in o zɔm dɔka mana nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr, zika kpa naŋ-laa lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ giti-wa de so nɛ mɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ pii naŋ kɔ̧-a̧ si kɔ̧ tua ko Sɔ̧, mbaŋ nɛ tɛ o bii.
A̧ pi̧i̧ laaɗafisɔ̧ tɛ-a, laa nɛ witoklaa toka nɛ garaazi lɔr, gbɛ̧ zɔŋ zɔŋ zɔ̧-laa zili nɛ gbɛ̧a
kerere mbɛt; nɛ zu-a, A̧ pia laa-kpe-yiŋguɗi wen gɔna kita, nɛ‘i hɛra Urim in Tumin sɛnɛ;
o de kina-ta nɛ lɔr a̧-a̧ ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ wi-sɛk-ta sɛka hee tumbal ga, tók tòki zu laa'i mbɛt;
nin o dukbii Israɛl lɛŋ yɔra sɛnɛ: mɔ‘i duka nɛ wen ha̧ tɛ-Sɔ̧ mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wa.
A̧ pi̧i̧ kárà lɔr zu mɛtɛwol kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ‘i yɔra gba̧a̧ wen’ɛ sɛnɛ: «Ɛ̧ɛ̧ wi’ɛ nɛ ko Gasa Wan»:
mɔ‘i duka nɛ mɔɔ-usi-gasi, nɛ‘i ɗafa war-a nɛ dea mbɛt,
nɛ bá yi-bii lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ‘i gɔna dap-aa nɛ dea.
Nɛti ha̧ Aarɔn, ŋma mɔ nɛ dee so yi-wi hegɔ bó na; ŋma gee bii tɛ́ a pɛrti mɔɔ-dafi-tɛ
nɔ‘i tɛ nɛti na, kana nɛ o bem kɔ̧-a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa kpoo nɛ kpoo ɓɛɛ.
Dɔɔkposɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ bii wee kór kór war yiitoo dam ɗoŋ zɛ lɛŋ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ Mɔise a ea a̧ zu tom tɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧-a̧ nɔ̧ zu a. Mɔ‘i duka nɛ ŋma nɔɔtɔk nɛ beka kaɗi na
wen a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa, hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi, wen dee tom ha̧ Sɔ̧ in ɗafa A̧,
in wen toka de yoŋgo ha̧ dukbii kɔ̧-A̧, nɛ nin-A̧.
Sɔ̧ hoka a̧ sɛn mgbara o bii lɛŋ wen ɗafá Gasa Wan tɛ́ ha̧nyama in urdi, nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee,
wen mbaŋá tɛ Gasa Wan in ɗafa war tɛ-bii, oi ɗaŋmɔ.
