A̧ ha̧ŋgai tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara heembea ha̧ Aarɔn, wen usa mɔ nɛ Jakɔb tɛ de ha̧ A̧,
in wen usa mgbak yi heembea kɔ̧-A̧ ha̧ Israɛl.
O gɔni duk baa zu dúk nɛ ŋmaa in a̧, ɓɛɛ e yí tɛ a sɛn ŋga gbara, zaŋ gasa tu̧u̧see.
Duka nɛ o bii ko Datan, Abiram in o bii ɗɔŋ Koréé.
Gasa Wan zɔka mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ kpa ɗaŋsee nyɛmna: gasa ɗaŋsee'i dea ha̧ A̧ mɛ kum wa lɛŋ.
A̧ dee ŋma mɔá-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-bii in wa tɛ doo wa nɛ leɓe-wee.
A̧ ha̧gasi ha̧ Aarɔn siti woyo, ɓɛɛ A̧ ha̧ zu-nyɔnɔ nɛ mɔɔ-oi ha̧ a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa.
Mɔ‘i duka nɛ ku̧u̧naŋ ha̧nyɔŋmɔ-sur-zaŋ ha̧ wa,
wen nyɔŋmɔ kɔ-wa nɛ́ mɔ nɛ‘i ɗafi nɛ Gasa Wan; A̧ ha̧mɔɔ nɔ‘i ha̧ Aarɔn in o bezaŋ-aa.
Mɔ kpɔk, a̧ bó nɛ ŋma mɔɔ-oi sɛn nu Israɛl na; ŋma war mɔ kɔ̧-a̧ bó sɛn mgbara dukbii na
wen Gasa Wan tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ Aarɔn'e: «Mi nɛ tɛ‘M, Mi nɛ́ war mɔ in mɔɔ-oi kɔ-mɛ.»
Pinhas bem ko Eleazar, nɛ taar bii tɛ gasi, wen ha̧tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ tɛ yuu kii Gasa Wan,
in wen zu kpeesee kɔ̧-a̧; ŋgimbi dee ŋgazu ko dukbii, a̧ nɔ̧ɔ̧ see-a̧.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a a̧ kpaa nɛ ea-ɗaŋmɔ ko Sɔ̧ ha̧ Israɛl.
Kalea a̧‘i sá Sɔ̧ de nɔɔtɔk ga̧a̧mɔ in a̧, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔ wan zu Sa̧a̧-Fara ko Sɔ̧,
in zu dukbii kɔ̧-A̧, wen ha̧ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ duk nɛ́ a̧ in o bezaŋ-aa yak nɛnɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Ŋma nɔɔtɔk mbɛt dea so in David, bem ko Jɛssé, be-nutua ko Juda;
mɔɔ-oi wannu dúk wen ŋma bem kɔ̧-a̧ kpɔk ɓɛɛ.
(Nɛ́ k’ɛ́nɛ́, bezaŋ Aarɔn), Gasa Wan a e ɗuka-taamɔ kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ wen gɔna kita
zu dukbii kɔ̧-A̧ nɛ yuwar-a, wen ká war kpaamɔ in gasi k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Jozue, bem ko Nun, duka so nɛ ŋma hayatɛ wi biro.
Nɛ́ a̧ a duka oi Mɔisɛ wen tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen oi nú Sɔ̧,
ɓɛɛ nyɛm mɛ ɗoŋ gba̧a̧ wen nɛ nin-a̧ tɔ̧, a̧ kifa gasawi wen kpasa o bii nɛ Gasa Wan hoka,
wen dee bɔnɛ nɛ o wisɛn nɛ bá zu dúk nɛ A̧, in wen dea ha̧ Israɛl mɛ ba nu kɔ‘i.
Oe, gasi n'a̧-a̧ kpaa so ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ baa nɛ er-a nɛ ŋgɔn usi nɛ gbapaa si tɛ o gasa ye wa!
Ŋma bii nɛ nɔ̧ɔ̧ so see nɛti hee a̧ ga, nɛ́ o? Nɛ́ a̧ nɛ zu-a a duka so ti, bi nɛ biro ko Gasa Wan.
Bó nɛ a̧ a dora wese, ɓɛɛ ká kpɔk zɛ kifi hee zɛ yiitoo ga’ɛ na nde?
A̧ kɔfa Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, Wan-ŋgayamɔ, ŋgimbi nɛ o wisɛn nasi so nɛ a̧ dam fara lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan, nɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ, zii kɔfamɔ kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ sɛ́ ŋga kii-ɓɔrɔ a zu wa.
A̧ tika zú nu ko o wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ kúm o wisɛn tɛ zira kaya,
wen ha̧ o gɔní-duk mɛ iŋ ŋgai boe-biro kɔ̧-a̧;
biro'i wa de in Gasa Wan nɛ mbetɛ, wen a̧ ndak kana, kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ ɗoŋ Wan-ŋgayamɔ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Mɔise, a̧ usa so mboozu kɔ̧-a̧, kpɔk in Kalɛb, bem ko Yefunɛ:
tɛ dukaa mitak ti giiwi, wa dora dukbii tɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ in tɔ̧a̧ sɛkɛ́ sɛkɛ́ ɗaŋ wen.
Hegɔ, nɛ wa yiitoo ɓɛɛ a kpasa sɛn mgbara o wibiro boro-gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk,
wen yeaa tɛ nu, nɛ Gasa Wan ee ha̧ wa nɛ mɔ-oi, nu nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fók fok sɛnɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ Kalɛb, ŋgai nɛ gbaka a̧ hɔ tɛ sɔki, mɛ ba nɛ kusa fara tɛ nu'i,
nɛ bezaŋ-aa a tɛɛ kasi hee mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a o be Israɛl iŋa nɛnɛ‘e ndaka pata Gasa Wan ɔ́ dee.
O wigɔnkita mbɛt, nɛ nin-wa hura nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ tom kɔ‘i, nɛ há̧ see-wa ha̧ o geesɔ̧ na,
nɛ zik ɗoŋ-wa ha̧ Gasa Wan na mbɛt, de yoŋgo a dúk zu wa!
Gba̧a̧tɛ-wa a ɓɔ́ nɛ kɔ̧ pɛsi mɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ nin o gasawi nɔ‘i a hur woyo nɛ ɗoŋ o bem kɔ-wa.
Samuɛl nɛ wi nɛ Gasa Wan kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna. A̧ nɛ witɔ̧wen oi nú Gasa Wan,
nɛ ɗafa mɔɔwan, ɓɛɛ nɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧ sa̧-a̧ nɔ̧-wan tɛ o bii nɛ tɛ ya zu dukbii kɔ̧-A̧.
A̧ gɔna kita zu o bíí nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan ye ɗoŋ Jakɔb.
Tɛ yora ɗoŋ wen kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ usa'e wi nɛ kpasa witɔ̧wen oi nu Sɔ̧; ɓɛɛ wen n'aa tɔ̧a̧
dea ha̧‘i mɛ iŋ‘e a̧ nɛ kpasa wi-mgbaŋ-tɛ-bii zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ o wisɛn duka nasi nɛ a̧ dam fara lɛŋ, a̧ kɔfa Gasa Wan,
Wan-ŋgayamɔ, ɗafi nɛ A̧ nɛ be-sami.
Gasa Wan tuɓa da orop nɛ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ́, ɓɛɛ tigɛr-A̧ dík ɗiirr.
A̧ kuma o gasawi ko o wisɛn in o be-wan Filistii lɛŋ.
Nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi ya nɛ wa beka tun na mɛ hɔ, a̧ dee sedaako ti Gasa Wan,
in ti wi n'a̧-a̧ sɔ̧ɔ̧ nɔ̧ zu-a'e:
«Mi tɛ ba ŋma mɔ ko ŋma bii ka bo nɛ koo gee ndara kɔ̧-a̧ na»,
ɓɛɛ ŋma bii de wen in a̧ na.
Koo ɗoŋ n'a̧-a̧ fee kaɗi mbɛt, a̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ kana wen oi nu Sɔ̧, mbaŋ nɛ tɛ wannu zu fio n'a̧-a̧ tɛ fe.
Tigɛr-a gboo nɛ ɗɔɔ nu mɛ tɔ̧ nɛ wen oi nu Sɔ̧, wen bia ɗaŋmɔ ko dukbii yinɛ.
Hɔ ɗoŋ Samuɛl, nɛ́ Natan a hɔa mɛ tɔ̧ wen oi nu Sɔ̧, tɛ ŋgimbi ko David.
Tɛ ɗafa Sɔ̧ wen kpaa ga̧a̧mɔ, wi e de nɔ̧-kpoo wen Gasa Wan;
nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a'i hoka nɛ David e nɛtɛ mgbara o be Israɛl.
A̧ bá so o dila dé nɛ zɛŋ, hee o be dua ga, ɓɛɛ o baŋgiiɗoŋ ya ti a̧ hee o be-sami ga.
Ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ gbɛ́ so ŋgaŋa-wi na ndé?
A̧ yo so Goliat wi-ŋmaŋ-tɛ gbɛ nɛ kii-ta-birndiŋ gɔ́n nɛ foe yi-dukbii yinɛ na nde?
A̧ kɔfa so Gasa Wan, Wan nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ,
ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan'i ha̧ ŋgai ha̧ wii-er-a̧ mɛ gbɛ nɛ ŋgaŋa-widebiro.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ a baa nɛ nin ko dukbii kɔ̧-a̧ e ŋgɔn.
Hegɔ, wa gasa a̧ wen n'a̧-a̧ gbɛa wisɛn booro-ɓu;
wa zɔna a̧ de nɛ osoko ha̧ Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ wa kar mɛtɛwol-wan zu a̧.
Wen a̧ kuma o wisɛn zikanu'i lɛŋ, a̧ gbina gba̧a̧tɛ o be Filistii wisɛn kɔ̧-a̧,
ɓɛɛ a̧ kaɗi ŋgai kɔ-wa hɔ sɔsɔɔ.
Tɛ o zɔm mɔ n'a̧-a̧ dea lɛŋ, a̧ zɔna Sa̧a̧-Wi nɛ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, tɛ bia o gima gasi nɛ A̧,
a̧ bia o gima zɔn Gasa Wan, nɛ see-a lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧́ Wi nɛ dee a̧.
A̧ aa o wi-bii-gima ti fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ wa yá hi̧i̧ ku̧i̧ nɛ o de gɛr-gima.
A̧ dea ha̧ o gbooyi ko Gasa Wan mɛ ɓɔk, ɓɛɛ a̧ ɗafi ɗoŋ o gbaŋa nɛ dea tɛ zɔna
sa̧-a̧ Nin Gasa Wan. Nɛ́ dika gɔna-ndaazan a'i zii nɛ gima-zɔn-Sɔ̧ kɔ̧ Sa̧a̧ Tua.
Gasa Wan foo ɗaŋmɔ kɔ̧-a̧ yinɛ, ɓɛɛ de ha̧ wan kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ duk yaknɛ sɔ̧́i̧.
A̧ ee nú ha̧ o bezaŋ-a mɛ ba wan oi-aa, in ha̧ wan kɔ̧-a̧ zu Israɛl mɛ duk nɛ nɔ̧a̧ mitak
Hɔ ɗoŋ David, ŋma bem nɛ duna nɛ iŋamɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛ duka tɛ yɔli wen zu a duká oi a̧.
Salomɔŋ ɔɔ wan tɛ ŋgimbi ga̧a̧mɔ. Sɔ̧ dea ha̧ o mɔ mɛ́ ya mgbitiŋ tɛ zikanu kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ
kà de ká Salomɔŋ mboo Tua wen zɔna Nin-A̧ in ha̧ a̧ ɗafi Sa̧a̧-Fara ha̧ A̧ wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Ho Salomɔŋ! oe ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ mɛ́ duka nɛnɛ́ ŋgimbi ŋgaiwi kɔ-mɛ wa!
Mɛ́ duna so nɛ iŋamɔ hee ŋgere-yi ga.
Iŋamɔ kɔ-mɛ kpee zu nu lɛŋ; mɛ duna a̧ nɛ o lizaŋ in o sumgba;
Nin-mɛ́ hura hó sɛn tɛ nduti seekisi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bii lɛŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so mɛ,
wen nɛ mɛ pi̧i̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mgbara bii.
O gima kɔ-mɛ, o tua-wen kɔ-mɛ, o lizaŋ ko-mɛ, in o wee-ɗoŋ-mɔ kɔ-mɛ dea ha bii lɛŋ mɛ zɔn mɛ.
Mɛ kusa lɔr zu ŋmaa hee tuŋgu ga, ɓɛɛ mɛ mɔi̧ bu-mbɔi a zu ŋmaa,
hee ɓɔɗa-boe ga nɛ nin Gasa Wan, nɛ‘i sa'e Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl.
Mɛ ha̧tɛ-mɛ ha̧ o okóò, ɓɛɛ mɛ kifi bara kɔ-wa.
Mɛ aa ndiŋ tɛ gasi kɔ-mɛ. Mɛ ɗaŋa nin bezaŋ-mɛ, dak nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧
pi zu o bem kɔ-mɛ; mɔɔ-mgbele kɔ-mɛ pii bɔnɛ zu wa.
Wan kɛ̧a̧ tɛ fara yiitoo, ɓɛɛ ŋma ŋgazu dukbii gbo nɛ tɛ Efraim.
Mɔ kpɔk, Gasa Wan bɛ̧́ deako kɔ‘i na; A̧ e ha̧ ŋma wen kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik gee na.
A̧ bɛ̧ nyɛɓaa ko bezaŋ-wi n'a̧-a̧ hoka na. A̧ kum kpar wi nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so A̧ na.
A̧ ha̧ be oi-bem ha̧ Jakɔb, ɓɛɛ A̧ e ŋma bezaŋ nɛ tɛ gbo nɛ tɛ-a̧ ha̧ David.
Salomɔŋ fea, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ɛ̀ kpa o zɔmdáà kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ e ŋma bezaŋ-a oi aa, gasa mgbelewi
nɛ gana o dɔkaa lɛŋ; gee ŋma be iŋamɔ tikiɗi bó kɔ̧ zu-a na.
Nɛ́ Roboam nɛ o gɛŋa kɔ̧-a̧ ira o bii a tɛ dee ŋgazu.
Jeroboam, bem ko Nevat, foo dukbii Israɛl a tɛ ɗaŋmɔ, ɓɛɛ usi yuwar ɗaŋmɔ ha̧ o bíí ko Efraim.
Hegɔ ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa tɛ̀ɛ̀ dɔ́k dɔ̀k siti nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ wa kai wa nɛ bara si gɔni nu nɛ nyɛiaa.
Wa dea ɗaŋmɔ zɛkgbɛlɛk hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ Sɔ̧ foo nɛ bɔnɛ oi ɗaŋmɔ pi zu wa.
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Elii, witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧ kura hee wee ga, ɓɛɛ wen kɔ̧-a̧ dɔ́ wi dɔɔ hee kan-wee ga;
A̧ daka kaba pi zu wa, ɓɛɛ ha̧tɛ kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ Gasa Wan de ha̧ wa mɛ pii ɗɔŋ sɛgbɛrɛɛ.
Tɛ wen ko Gasa Wan, a dora koro, ɓɛɛ a̧ siŋ piikoro war taar pii mbɔɗɔnu.
Ho Elii, oe gee gasi nɛ mɛ kpaa tɛ dea o mɔɔkifi wa!
Wi nɛ tɛ duk tɛ‘e wi nyɛma ŋmaa in mɛ̀ɛ̀, nɛ́ o?
Tɛ wen mɛ nú Wan-mɛ-ngɔn, mɛ tuna so fio, ɓɛɛ mɛ gbo a̧ yinɛ ye ko o fio.
Mɛ dea ha o wannu mɛ tik, ɓɛɛ mɛ ir o gasa bii nɛ zu zɛ́ɛ́ kɔ-wa si tɛ fio.
Zu kaya Sinai, mɛ zia so tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Sɔ̧ nɛ ŋgai a zu mɛ,
zu kaya Horɛb mɛ zia gɔna ŋga kita kɔ̧-A̧ a zu mɛ.
Mɛ sɔ̧ so nɔ̧ zu o wannu wen gɔna kita, in zu o witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧ wen yaa oi mɛ.
Mɛ́, nɛ harabúk-wee baa so yaknɛ́ ɓɛlɛm, zu keeke nɛ o nyaŋa-wee gbur’ɛ;
Nɛti ha̧ nyimsea mɛ hɔ, yɔramɔ tɔ̧ɔ̧‘e nɛ mɛ a tɛ pii ɗoŋ mɛ́ ga̧ see Gasa Wan,
mɛ́ zik see-dáà si tɛ bem, in mɛ mɔi̧ o pɛrnam ko Jakɔb pii nɛ ɗɔŋ.
O wi nɛ tɛ zɔk mɛ́, in o wan nɛ tɛ fe zaŋ kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ ko Sɔ̧, a yá nɛ desee,
wen ɛɛ mbɛt, ɛɛ tɛ ya kpasá nɛ mbetɛ.
Ŋgimbi nɛ harabúk ɓoɓora Elii, Elizéé duna nɛ ɔmi kɔ̧-a̧.
Tɛ dukaa kɔ̧-a zaŋnu, ŋma wannu kpɔk nɛ pii kii tɛ a̧ bo na; ŋma bii kpa ŋgai zu a na.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ gana so a bona; kóó, zaŋ ɔɔ ya-fio mbɛt, a̧ ɓɔna kana nɛ witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧
Tɛ duka-kpasa kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ dea o mɔɔkifi; ɗoŋ fio mbɛt, a̧ duka de nɛ o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ-wi.
Zu mɔ‘i lɛŋ, dukbii kpai see na; wa e o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa duk na, hɔ nɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi
nɛ wa kaia nɛ wa yaknɛ́ nɛ bara si gɔni nu, pɛsi nɛ wa sót sót dam zaŋnu lɛŋ.
Nɛ́ be oi bii tikiɗi a ɓɔna so, in wan kpɔk sɛn nutua ko David ɓɛɛ.
O ŋma mgbara wa déè mɔ nɛ dee tɛ-Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ o ŋma tɛ̀ɛ̀ dɔk kɔ‘i nɛ ɗaŋmɔ siti.
Ezekias mboo garo zik nɛ gasa ye kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ ba yi si kɔ̧ a̧.
A ɗɔia zaŋ ta nɛ boi, ɓɛɛ a̧ de o gɔnayi sɛnɛ.
Tɛ ŋgimbi wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i, Senakerib baa zu nɛ ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ tom gasa wibiro Rabsakɛs,
nɛ nin-wi, mɛ nɛ́ɛ̀ tik Siɔn nɛ biro; a̧ ŋmaŋ nɛ tɛ-a kii nɛ wen.
Hegɔ, sɛn Jerusalɛm see-wa in er-wa naká, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk ŋga bɔnɛ,
hee okóò nɛ zaŋ nyim mɛ ko ga.
Wa kɔfa Gasa Wan, Yaa-de-ko, nyɛi nɛ er si tɛ A̧,
ɓɛɛ ahai Sa̧a̧-Wi kpɛk kɔfamɔ kɔ-wa nɛ yiwese mɛ.
A̧ gboo wa yinɛ, nɛ ɗoŋ er Isaii.
A̧ tika gbagari ko o be Asirii nɛ biro, ɓɛɛ betom kɔ̧-a̧ kum wa gbuduk,
wen Ezekias dee so mɔ nɛ dee tɛ Gasa Wan; a̧ ee see-a lɛŋ tɛ yuwar ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ David;
nɛ́ witɔ̧wen oi nú-Sɔ̧ Isaii, nɛ dúk gasawi in kpasawi tɛ hɔɔzu kɔ‘i, duka mɛ usi so ha̧ a̧.
Tɛ ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧, wese sii ɗoŋ nɛ kɔrzu wen ha̧ duká-kpasá ko wannu mɛ duk siti.
Ŋgai ko ɔmi ko Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ sɔŋkur ŋgimbi,
ɓɛɛ a̧ gá̧ see o be Siɔn, nɛ ya tɛ ɗaŋsee.
A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu mɔ nɛ tɛ hɔ, in o mɛ nɛ yá nɛ hu̧sa̧a̧, nɛti ha̧ wa mɛ hɔ, yak nɛnɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧i̧.
Taamɔ wen Jozias dúk hee ŋma de pɛr urdi nɛ wi-gi de pɛr mɔ zaŋá nɛ ŋmaa ga,
dúk hee nyɔɔ̧ gɔrɔ kɔ̧ nú-wi ga, dúk hee zia de giti biɔ̧-gbaŋa nɛ de dɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ ga.
A̧ baa de yuwar tɛ kpaia dukaa ko dukbii in tɛ dora yuwar ɗafa geesɔ̧.
A̧ zika see-a lɛŋ si tɛ Gasa Wan,
ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧ o bíí mɛ gasi Sɔ̧ tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o ɗaŋwi ee nɛ A̧ tɛ gee mɔ.
Bá David, Ezekias in Jozias yinɛ, o oi wannu lɛŋ kusa ɗaŋmɔ zu ŋmaa.
Wa siŋa heembea ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn pi nu. Sɔ̧ ee o wannu Judaa duk:
A̧a̧ ha̧ŋgai kɔ-wa ha̧ o ŋma bii, in gasi kɔ-wa mbɛt ha̧ o ŋma gɔni duk.
O wisɛn pii wee tɛ gasa ye nɛ Sɔ̧ hoka, ye nɛ Sa̧a̧-Tua dúk sɛnɛ,
ɓɛɛ o beegara kɔ̧-a̧ kifi bɛ́ɛ̀-oi,
wen wa usa so bɔnɛ ha̧ Jeremii, a̧ n'A̧a̧ hoka so nɛ́ witɔ̧wen oi nu-Wi,
dika kɔ zaŋ naa kɔ̧-a̧, wen zuɗa mɔ yinɛ, ɗaŋá mɔ in gbinaa a nu,
ɓɛɛ mbɛt wen mboo mɔ in guna mɔ.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa duka nɛ Ezekiɛl, nɛ zɔka gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ zaŋ hɔɔzu;
a̧ zɔka mɔ‘i zu keeke ko o keribim,
wen tɛ-a mbaŋá ɗoŋ o wisɛn sɛn zaŋ ndiɓa-kórò, ɓɛɛ a̧ de demɔ in o wi nɛ bá tana yuwar.
Nɛ war ko gba̧a̧tɛ o witɔ̧wen oi nú-Sɔ̧ ɓu-zu-a-yiitoo’ɛ,
wa a ɓɔ́ kpɛlɛ kpɛlɛ woyo daŋnɛ́ nɛ kɔ̧ pɛsi mɛ,
wen wa ha̧so nɔɔŋgiɗi ha̧ dukbii ko Jakɔb, ɓɛɛ wa kpasa a̧, wen nɛ tɛ-wa mbɔi tɛ ee ta nɛ Sɔ̧ na̧
A'i zɔn nin Zorobabɛl hee ge? A̧, n'aa duka hee wele-tumbal wii-er ga’ɛ?
Nɛ́ kpɔk in Jozué, bem ko Josedɛk mbɛt:
nɛ́ wa a baa so Sa̧a̧-Tua e ŋgɔn woyo tɛ ŋgimbi kɔ-wa,
wa mboo Sa̧a̧-Fara, nɛ‘i tɛ zɔn kpoo nɛ kpoo ha̧ Gasa Wan.
Nehemii mbɛt dee zɔm mɔ, nɛ tɛ-yɛ bi ɗoŋ aa na; a̧ baa so o gbina garo ye k’ɛ́ɛ́ e ŋgɔn,
a̧ ɗafa so o kpar-nutua in o mɔɔ-gɔm-aa, ɓɛɛ ka̧ a̧ ba so o tua k’ɛ́ɛ́ e ŋgɔn’ɛ.
Ŋma bii zu nu’ɛ, nɛ Sɔ̧ dea hɔ ŋmaa in Henɔk bo na,
a̧ n'A̧ baa so ɓɛlɛm, nɛ oi kiitɛ, yinɛ zu nu.
Ŋma bii woyo, hee Jozɛf ga, bo na; a̧ n'a̧-a̧ duka so nɛ wan ko o nya-a,
in sara-tɔn-mɔ ko dukbii kɔ̧-a̧. Wa ɗafa gba̧tɛ-a nɛ dea.
Sɛm in Sɛt kpaa gasi mgbara o bii; ɓɛɛ mgbara o wi nɛ yá zu o bii lɛŋ nɛ Sɔ̧ dea, nɛ́ Adam á a̧-a̧ ti.
Nɛ́ Simɔn, gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧, bem ko Onias, a̧ ɗafa Tua ko Sɔ̧, ŋgimbi n'aa duka nɛnɛ
nɛ gbaayi; nɛ́ kpɔk ŋgimbi'i a̧ a ɗafa nɛ ɗoŋ Sa̧a̧-Fara'i nɛ nɔ̧a siti.
Nɛ́ a̧ a ea naŋ ɓii kusa ŋgeŋ, nɛ wa mboo garo-zik-Tua ko Sɔ̧ zu a.
Nɛ́ tɛ kpɔk ŋgimbi kɔ̧-a̧‘i a̧ wa za̧-a̧ gasa gɔnayi, gba kɔ̧, nɛ pɛsa-a duk hee ko gbatɔp ga.
Tɛ taamɔ wen ká bɔnɛ tɛɛ tik zu dukbii kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mboo garo zik nɛ ye ɗɛkɛt, wen ka wisɛn tɛ̀ɛ̀ kɛr ye.
Oe zɔm gasi n'a̧-a̧ duk so sɛnɛ ŋmɛkɛkɛ, mgbara o bii kɔ̧-a̧, ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ gbo nɛnɛ
nɛ ɗoŋ gbabir-kpé-Sa̧a̧ Fara in n'aa zik nɛ Tua ko Sɔ̧ wa!
Dúk so hee sɔra-doke zaŋ duule ga, hee nyaŋazɛ nɛ to ndaa nɛ nù ga,
hee wese nɛ nyɛk zu Tua ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn ga; hee yɔra-ɓutu nɛ tok zaŋ duule ga,
hee gba de dote mɛ bɛ̀ɛ̀ ga, hee gbadɛŋ ka kpuput-yi ga, hee de bɔɔ-te Liban mɛ nukoro ga,
hee fuu-nyama nɛ wa dɔ Fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ga, hee de kpana-lɔr, nɛ‘i ɗafa ɗoŋ-a
nɛ o de kina-ta nɛ mbɔi-a ɔ dɔka ga,
hee te-nɔ́ nɛ wayá wɔsɔkɔɗɔ ga, hee gbatui nɛ kusi mɛ tɔn yiwese ga.
Nɛ́ hegɔ a̧ Simɔn duka so nɛnɛ, ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ daŋ so si Sa̧a̧ Fara-ɗafi-Sɔ̧,
nɛ oi o laa-gbooyi in o de laa-ɗafi-Sɔ̧ tɛ-a̧: Tua ko Sɔ̧ lɛŋ duna nɛ gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ ba so nɛ o ha̧a̧mɔ er o wiɗafisɔ̧ yor nɛnɛ, sɛn ka̧ kusiɗafisɔ̧,
o nya kɔ̧-a̧ zika a̧ kpa nú ŋmaa, hee be kɔmbɔ gbatui sɛn Liban ga;
wa yàá zik a̧ hee bɔnyá te-ndɛŋgɛ ga;
o bem ko Aarɔn lɛŋ, nɛ oi o laaɗafisɔ̧ kɔ‘i, yora ti giiwi Israɛl, nɛ oi ha̧a̧mɔ ko Gasa Wan kɔ̧ er-wa.
Simɔn duka ɗafi nɛ Sɔ̧ ká̧ taŋge-ɗafisɔ̧ há̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ tu̧tɛmɔ ha̧ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn, Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ.
A̧ nyɛi̧a er-a zu be-ɗele-dɔ̧ɔ̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ́n yi-dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɔktɛ á naŋ-faraɗafisɔ̧, hee de pɛr
nyama nɛ ɔ́ dee tɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn nɛ ɔɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ'ɛ ga.
Bɛɛ o bezaŋ ko Aarɔn á nú tɛ gaia mɔ, dɔ́m nɛ o gagaazi kɔ-wa ndɔ dee nɛ bu-mbɔi,
gɛr-wa sakari ha̧ tɛ Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn mɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ wa.
Ɓɛɛ o giiwi lɛŋ guu yi nu nyɛm ŋmaa mɛ gasi Gasa Wan, Wan-ŋgayamɔ, Sɔ̧ nɛ dúk ŋgɔn mɛ.
Ɓɛɛ o wi-bii-gima gasi nɛ A̧ nɛ heeger; giti gɛr-wa lɛŋ yee ŋmaa, ɓɛɛ ɔ̧́ nɛ nyɔɔ̧ tɛ zia-a.
Dukbii yaa ai nɛ nú ha̧ Gasa Wan nɛ dúk ŋgɔn mɛ́, kɔfi nɛ Yaa-de-ko
hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ zɔna Gasa Wan in mɔi̧a̧a kaɗa nɛnɛ.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa, Simɔn zira, ɓɛɛ nyɛi er zu o be Israɛl nɛ mɔi̧a̧, tɔk nɛ de yoŋgo nɛ nin
Gasa Wan zu wa, kpa nɛ́ yuwar sa nin-A̧.
Tɛ war yiitoo-a, wa lɛŋ guu nu wen kpaa de yoŋgo ko Wan-mɛ-ŋgɔn.
Ɓɛɛ kinii, ɛnɛ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧, nɛ ɔ wan zu mɔ lɛŋ, nɛ de gasa mɔ dam fara lɛŋ,
nɛ kasa ɛɛ tɛnɛ dika kɔ̧ zaŋ naa k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ nɛ demɔ in yɛɛ nɛ ko.
A̧‘a ha̧ desee h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ A̧‘a de ha̧ ga̧a̧mɔ mɛ hɔ sɛn Israɛl, tɛ ŋgimbi k’ɛ́ɛ́ kinii, yak nɛnɛ sɔ̧ɔ̧‘i.
Kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ kɔ̧-A̧ a duk in yɛɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ A̧‘a kpasi yɛ tɛ dukaa k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Zuduk a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ yiitoo nɛ see-am sɛna, ɓɛɛ taar-a bó nɛ ŋma kpasa zuduk na:
Nɛ́ o wi ya sɛn mgbara kaya Seir, o be Filistii, in o mgbele wi nɛ ɔ́ sɛn Sikɛm.
Nɛ́ Jezu, be Jerusalɛm, bem ko Sirak, bezaŋ Eleazar,
a yɔra o zɔm gasa iŋamɔ in usa-ɗoŋ-mɔ zaŋ kalata’ɛ.
A̧ sɛ̧ɛ̧ ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ duka kɔ̧ see-a a sɛnɛ hee kórò ga.
Wi nɛ tɛ hɛr tɛ nɛ o usamɔ nɔ'ɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ a dúk nɛ desee.
Wi nɛ tɛ kasi wen’ɛ kɔ̧ see tɛ kifi wan-ɗuka-taamɔ.
Ka a̧ ba wa de nɛ tom, a̧ tɛ kpa ŋgai zu mɔ lɛŋ,
wen sa̧a̧mɔ ko Gasa Wan tɛ nyɛk yuwar kɔ̧-a̧.
Mi kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de osoko h’Ɛnɛ, Gasa Wan, Wannu. Mi kɔ̧a̧ mɛ gasi'Nɛ́, Sɔ̧ Wankpasa'm.
Mi zɔn nɛ́ nin-‘Nɛ́, wen Ɛnɛ duka nɛ wi-ye-doŋ‘am, in wi-gbaka'm;
ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ e ha̧ war tɛ‘m mɛ yɔ na. Ɛnɛ gbo'm yi pɛ́r ko o wi-kai-ndaa in yi gɔna-tɛ ko o wi-ndela.
Ɛnɛ yee ɗoŋ am sɛn ti o wi nɛ nas'am, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ kpasa'm, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ
gasa dee-ko k’Ɛ́nɛ́ in hura nin-‘Nɛ́.
Ɛnɛ kpasa'm yi gba̧a̧-nin o wi nɛ yaa so dɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ gur'am,
in sɛn er o wi nɛ kia so mɛ gbɛ‘m.
Ɛnɛ daka'm yi o bɔnɛ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ.
Ɛnɛ dak am yi ŋma gbɛŋa-wee nɛ kɛra so'm,
in see ŋma wee n'am ye so na.
Ɛnɛ dak am nɛ ye ko fio ɗɔɔ mɛ‘i;
Ɛnɛ kpasa'm tɛ ɗaŋ wen in tɛ wen-ndela,
nɛ ɗaŋa wen tɛ‘m ti wannu.
Mi hɛɗa so fio kaɗi, ɓɛɛ naŋ-am míí so míí nu kɔ̧fio.
Wa kɛra sɔ‘m liŋgɔm, ɓɛɛ ŋma bii-gbaka'm bó so na;
mi kii so nɛ ŋma bii mɛ gbaka'm, ɓɛɛ mi kpá na.
Hegɔ, tɛ‘m mbaŋa ɗoŋ deako k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Gasa Wan, in gbaka bii n’Ɛnɛ gbak dika ɓee.
Ɛnɛ kpasi o wi nɛ e ta nɛ Ɛnɛ kpasi yi bɔnɛ, ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ gboo wa er o ɗaŋwi.
Mi dee ha̧ aia-nú kɔ‘m mɛ ɗaŋ hɔ́ tɛ-‘Nɛ́ ŋgɔn mɛ, ɓɛɛ mi kɔfa'Nɛ́ mɛ ba'm yinɛ yi fio.
Mi kɔfi mɔ: Gasa Wan, Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ dáà kɔ‘m; k’Ɛ́nɛ́ bɛ‘m? 3ŋ wese bɔnɛ kɔ‘m na,
ŋgimbi n'am duk yi o wi-gɔɔtɛ, ɓɛɛ wi-gbaka'm bo na.
Mi tɛ zɔn nin-‘Nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, mi tɛ bii gima de nɛ osoko h’Ɛ́nɛ́.
Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ kpɛka kɔfamɔ kɔ‘m. Ɛnɛ kpasa'm tɛ yɔa kɔ‘m,
ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ gboo'm yinɛ tɛ ŋgaya ŋgimbi.
Nɛ́ wen mɔ‘i sa'm kɔ̧a̧ mɛ de osoko h’Ɛ́nɛ́ in mɛ gasi'Nɛ́, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ zɔn nin Gasa Wan.
Ŋgimbi n'am ɓɔna so nɛ ŋgaiwi, nɛti ha̧‘m mɛ yar nɛnɛ, mi kia ɗuka-tamɔ zaŋ kɔfasɔ̧ kɔ‘m, mi hu̧si na.
Mi kɔfa Sɔ̧ sɛn nu Tua ko Gasa Wan wen kpaa a̧, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ kii kana a̧ hɔ nɛnɛ́ wese fio kɔ‘m.
Ŋgimbi n'a̧-a̧ mira nɛnɛ́ hee dóte a de mɛ wai ga, mi kpaa desee wen aa.
Mi nɛ̀ɛ̀ nɔ tɛ tana war, mi ndaka pata naŋ-a̧ dika tɛ ŋgaiwi kɔ‘m.
Yeŋa zer-am n'am yéŋa tikiɗi, mi kpaa a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ usi mɔ ha̧‘m nɛ dɔkaa.
Mi gasa siti wen zu a. Mi tɛ zɔn wi nɛ ha̧ɗuka-taamɔ‘i ha̧‘m,
wen mi ee see-am ha̧‘m mɛ ba a̧ de nɛ tom. Mi ha̧ŋgai tɛ‘m lɛŋ wen dee demɔ,
ɓɛɛ mi beka nyim tɛ‘m na ndo-ndo-ndo.
See-am gbɛŋa wen zu a, ɓɛɛ mi kasi Heembea nɛ nɔ̧aa. Mi nyɛia er-am si yiwese
ai nɛ nu'm wen o yɔɔkaya n'am dea si tɛ a̧.
Mi zika see-am lɛŋ si tɛ a̧, mi ɗafa war tɛ‘m, ɓɛɛ mi kpa a̧.
Mi kpaa iŋamɔ wen zu a dika tɛ ku̧u̧naŋmɔ mɛ.
Kalea a'i, sa a̧ beka siŋ am pi nu na ndo-ndo-ndo.
See-am duka tɛ a lɛ́k lɛ́k, hegɔ ɓɛɛ mi kpaa gba demɔ.
Gasa Wan ha̧iŋa-tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ha̧‘m nɛ oi-aa, ɓɛɛ nɛ wen'i a'm tɛ gasi nɛ A̧.
Ɛnɛ tɛ́ pii tɛ‘m, ɛ́nɛ́ n’ɛnɛ iŋ mɔ na’ɛ, ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ yambi ɗuka-taamɔ.
Wen ge s’ɛnɛ tɔ̧‘e wi kpa kɔ‘i a̧ na, ɓɛɛ nɛ wɔ-a gbɛ́ nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ lɛ́k lɛ́k’ɛ ge?
Mi tɔ̧ nɛ hee-gɛr h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e: ɛnɛ tɛ̀ɛ̀ bá sɔɔgee, bó nɛ́ nɛ sede na.
Ɛnɛ pi kpaŋa kɔ̧-a̧ ger-‘nɛ́ h’ɛnɛ mɛ kpa usamɔ kɔ̧-a̧; a̧ dúk ka tɛ‘nɛ́ dɔŋgɔɗɔɔ.
Ɛnɛ zɔk nɛ tɛ-‘nɛ́‘e mi zɔka bɔnɛ wen aa batɛ na; kinii mi kpaa ɔmatɛ.
Ɛnɛ pi̧ tɛ-‘nɛ́ tɛ usa ɗuka-taamɔ, kóó nɛ hi̧faa hifi nɛ dɔka sede mbɛt;
a̧ tɛ de h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ kpa lɔr nɛ dɔkaa.
Nyɛrɛ a pi̧ ‘nɛ́ wen zu deako ko Gasa Wan, ɓɛɛ ká foe de'nɛ́ tɛ zɔna A̧ na.
Ɛnɛ kaɗi tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛti ha̧ ŋgimbi-a, ɓɛɛ Gasa Wan tɛ ha̧ mɔɔ-oi-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ŋgimbi n'A̧a kɔ̧a̧.
Ɗuka-taamɔ ko Jezu bem ko Sirak, nɛ́ mɔ‘i!

Ɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛ́ kalata nɛ́ Baruk yɔra sɛn Babilɔŋ, tɛ mɔɔrɔ pɛ, in ɔɔ-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo tɛ fio-zɛ, tɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o be-Kaldee baa so nɛ Jerusalɛm, ká dɔ nɛ a̧'ɛ. Baruk'i nɛ́ bem ko Nerias, be-koo Maasias, nɛ gboo nɛ tɛ Helkias, nɛ ɗoŋ Asadias in Sedesias.
Baruk tɔra gba̧a̧-wen kalata'i ti Jekonias, wannu Juda, bem ko Joakim, in ti giiwi lɛŋ nɛ tɛa mɛ zii wen'i,
nɛ zer o gasawi, o be-wan, in o kutiwi, kana nɛ yi bii lɛŋ, dika tɛ o obem gu nɛ o gasa bii, nɛ zer o bii lɛŋ nɛ ɔ so Babilɔŋ, ka̧ zaŋ nanayi Sud.
Wa lɛŋ hi̧i̧ so nɛ kɔ̧a̧, zim nɛ yi, kɔfi nɛ Gasa Wan
Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa ndɛma mbɔi, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ ko bii kpɔk kpɔk,
ɓɛɛ tom yaknɛ si Jerusalɛm ha̧ Joakim wiɗafisɔ̧, bem ko Helkias, be-koo Salɔm, in ha̧ oi o wiɗafisɔ, gu nɛ o dukbii lɛŋ, nɛ a̧-a̧ so Jerusalɛm in a̧.

Nɛti, tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ ɓu ko fiozɛ Siwan, Baruk kaia so o mɔ kɔ̧ Tua ko Gasa Wan, o mɔ nɛ wa zu̧u̧ so kɔ̧ Tua'i, pii nɛ ɗoŋ nu ko Juda; duka so nɛ o mɔ, nɛ wannu Juda, nin-a nɛ Sedesias, bem ko Josias, dee so nɛ bu-mbɔi,
ɗoŋ nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔzɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, baa so nɛ Jekonias in o gasawi, o wi-iŋ-tom, o be-wan, ká bá nɛ dukbii lɛŋ, nɛ bara-biro, yaknɛ nɛ Jerusalɛm si Babilɔŋ.

O bara-biro nɔ‘i toma ha̧ o be Jerusalɛm'e: «Ɛ́ɛ́ toma nɛ sede h’ɛ́nɛ́: ɛnɛ bá, ɛnɛ hi̧fi̧ nɛ o saɗi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o ŋma wen dɔaa nɛ oi-aa, o ŋma wen bura war-tɛ, ɛnɛ hi̧fi̧ fuu-nyama mbɛt; ɛnɛ ha̧ o mɔ ha̧ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ zu taŋge ɗafi-A̧
Ɛnɛ kɔfi Sɔ̧ wen Nabukodonosɔr wannu Babilɔŋ, in wen bem kɔ̧-a̧ Baltazar, ha̧ zɛ dukaa kɔ-wa mɛ dɔk hee zɛ-dukaa ko yiwɛse zu nu ga.

Hegɔ Gasa Wan tɛ ha̧ ŋgai h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ hu̧i̧ yí-yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ ya ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ Nabukodonosɔr, wannu Babilɔŋ, in ɗɔɔ gi̧ɔ̧-tɛ bem kɔ̧-a̧ Baltazar; ɛɛ tɛ de tom ha̧ wa nɛ dɔka zɛ, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zɔk yɛ nɛ de yí.
Ɛnɛ kɔfi Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ wen zu-yɛ mbɛt, wen ɛɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ hɔ sɔsɔɔ tu̧u̧see in nyimsea ko Gasa Wan tɛ yu zu-yɛ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.»
Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ́r kalata n’ɛɛ́ tom h’ɛ́nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧, wen ha̧ o bii mɛ gbar o ɗaŋmɔ kɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Gasa Wan, wese gbaŋá Tua-laa, kóó ŋma ŋgimbi nɛ nyɛma sɛnɛ.
Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ tɔ̧:
«Dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ mɔ ko Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́; ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ́ foe a a̧-a̧ yí-yɛ́, hee sɔsɔɔ‘i ga! foe wen o be-Juda in o bii Jerusalɛm,
wen o wannu k’ɛ́ɛ́, o wi-duk-zu'yɛ, o wiɗafisɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, o witɔ̧wen oi nú Sɔ̧ in o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ lɛŋ.
Wen ɛɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ Gasa Wan,
ɛ́ɛ́ mbo zu ha̧ A̧ na; ɛ́ɛ́ zii tigɛr Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ tɔ̧a̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ba yuwar o heembea, n'Aa ee ti yɛ, na.
Dika wese nɛ Gasa Wan gboa nɛ o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ yinɛ nú Egyptɛ, hɔ sɔsɔɔ, ɛ́ɛ́ kaɗi dee ŋgazu in Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ e see-yɛ́ mɛ zii mɔ n'Aa tɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ na.

Hegɔ, hee mɔ n’ɛɛ́ zɔk sɔsɔɔ‘i ga, o bɔnɛ tika zu-yɛ́, in o ɗaŋ yoŋgo, nɛ Gasa Wan toka so a zu-yɛ́, nɛ nú Mɔise widetom kɔ̧-A̧, wese n'Aa kaia nɛ zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ nu Egyptɛ, si ŋma nù, nɛ yibere in gɔrɔ fok sɛnɛ lata lata.
A̧ toma so o witɔ̧wen oi nu-A̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ zii tigɛr Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ tɛ wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ h’ɛɛ‘i lɛŋ na.
Ɓɛɛ kóó o nde ndak so nɛ doŋ ɗaŋ wɔmɔ mɛ kɔ̧ see-a, de nɛ tom ha̧ o geesɔ̧, de nɛ o mɔ nɛ de tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́ na.
Hegɔ Gasa Wan dee ha̧ wen n'Aa beé so a zu yɛ in o wigɔnkita nɛ ɔɔ so wan zu Israɛl, o wannu k’ɛ́ɛ́, o wi-ya-zu-yɛ, o be-Israɛl in o be-Juda lɛŋ, mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Pɛrti mɔ nɛ hɔɔ Jerusalɛm, nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ heembea ko Mɔise’ɛ, tɛ hɔ zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧ nɛti hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Gana ŋgai, nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ nyɔŋ so, ŋma nɛ murtɛ be-wiwii kɔ‘i ŋma nɛ murtɛ be-koo kɔ‘i.
Gasa Wan ee wa ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko o be-nù nɛ zika yɛ, wen ha̧ wa mɛ zii tɛ dara, kifi nɛ geemɔ mgbara o zuduk, fara nɛ Gasa Wan pɛsa wa si sɛnɛ‘i,
ha̧ wa mɛ gan gana o wi nɔ‘i bo na, nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i a tɛ̀ɛ́ gan gana wa, wen n’ɛɛ́ dea ɗaŋmɔ si tɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, tɛ bɛ̧a wen nú-A̧.
Dee mɔ nɛ yuwar-a nɛ́ ko Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ k’ɛ́ɛ́ in o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ foe a a̧-a̧ zu-yɛ́, hee sɔsɔɔ‘i ga.
Bɔnɛ o fom nɛ Gasa Wan bee a zu yɛ lɛŋ baa yɛ́.
Ɓɛɛ ɛ́ɛ́ gɔm so er-yɛ ha̧ Gasa Wan, ha̧ A̧ mɛ de h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ zik ɗoŋ-yɛ ha̧ o ɗaŋ wɔmɔ kɔ̧ see-yɛ́ na.
Hegɔ Gasa Wan yora zu o ŋgaŋamɔ nɔ‘i mɛ tik zu yɛ, wen mɔ lɛŋ nɛ Gasa Wan tɔ̧ɔ̧ h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de duk nɛ wara.
Mɔ kpɔk, ɛ́ɛ́ zii tigɛr-A ŋgimbi n'Aa tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e ɛɛ kasi o heembea n'Aa ee ti yɛ‘i na.

Ɓɛɛ kinii, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl, Ɛ́nɛ́ mgbɔɔ dukbii k’Ɛ́nɛ́ gbonɛ nɛ Egyptɛ, nɛ tɛ ŋgai mɛ er-Nɛ, nɛ tɛ o ŋga mɔɔ-usi-mɔ in o mɔɔkifi, nɛ tɛ ŋgai ɔm-Nɛ́ in kin-ɓaa-Nɛ́; Ɛ́nɛ́ dee ha̧ nin-Nɛ́ mɛ hu̧r, hee mɔ'ɔ n’ɛɛ́ zɔk sɔsɔɔ‘i ga.
Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛ́ɛ́ dea ɗaŋmɔ, ɛ́ɛ́ iŋ‘Nɛ́ na, ɛ́ɛ́ demɔ nɛ yuwar-a na, ɛ́ɛ́ kasi heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́ na.
Ɛ́nɛ́ dé ha̧ tu̧u̧see k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ga zu-yɛ́, wen be oi ɛ́ɛ́ dɔk mgbara o bii, n’Ɛ́nɛ́ pɛsa ɛɛ si sɛnɛ‘i ɓɔ na.
Gasa Wan, Ɛ́nɛ́ zíí kɔfamɔ in aia-nú k’ɛ́ɛ́. Ɛ́nɛ́ kpasi yɛ́ zu hu̧ra nin-‘Nɛ́, Ɛ́nɛ́ dé ha̧ o bii nɛ kaia so ɛ́ɛ́ yaknɛ nɛ bara mɛ zɔk yɛ́ nɛ ko,
Hegó o bii zaŋnu lɛŋ tɛ iŋ‘e Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, in Israɛl nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nɛ́ o mgbak bii k’Ɛ́né.
«Gasa Wan, Ɛ́nɛ́ kɛ̧i̧ mɔ tɛ́nɛ́ nɛ tɛ sa̧a̧ fara duk k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ, ɓɛɛ Ɛ́nɛ́ tá mɔ wen ɛ́ɛ́; Ɛ́nɛ́ yéŋ zer-‘Nɛ́, Ɛ́nɛ́ zíí!
Ɛ́nɛ́ hu̧i̧ yí-‘Nɛ́, Ɛ́nɛ́ zɔ́k! Bo nɛ o bii ye-ko-fio, o wi nɛ bo nɛ ɔmi ɓɔ na a̧ tɛ gasi'Nɛ́, zɔn nɛ deemɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a na,
ɓɛɛ nɛ wi bɔnɛ ŋmana-see, wi nɛ zum nɛ zu nɛ́ nɛ nɔ in nɛ ziɓa lɛŋ, wi nɛ yí zik zik nduyɛɛ, in wi nɛ wɔ kas'a a̧ tɛ gasi'Nɛ́, zɔn nɛ deemɔ k’Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ yuwar-a ɛ̧!
Hegɔ, Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, bo nɛ́ wen zu deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko o zɔmdáà in o wannu k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛ́ɛ́ ai nɛ nu-yɛ ti'Nɛ́ na.
Wen Ɛ́nɛ́ dea ha̧ tu̧u̧see in nyimsea k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tik zu-yɛ́, hee mɔ'ɔ n’Ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú o witɔ̧wen oi nú-‘Nɛ́ ga: wen'i nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Gasa Wan tɔ̧a̧: Ɛ́nɛ́ gu nu si ɗɔɔ de nɛ tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk sɛn nu n'Am ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́nɛ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ, k’ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zíí wen nú Gasa Wan, nɛ tɔ̧ h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e ɛnɛ de tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ na,
Mi tɛ dor o hiɗimɔ desee in hɔ́ɔ́ zaŋgule, in gaia gima ko wii in kóó nɛ baa ŋmaa nɛ mbea, sɛn ye Juda lɛŋ in Jerusalɛm; nu'i nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɛ kifi bɛɛ-oi, bii bo sɛnɛ ɓɔ na.

Ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de tom ha̧ wannu Babilɔŋ, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ zii nú-‘Nɛ́ na. Hegɔ, Ɛnɛ dea ha̧ wen n’ɛnɛ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so h’ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ nú o widetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́, o witɔ̧wen oi nú-‘Nɛ'ɛ mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧, nɛ heé: wa tɛ̀ɛ́ kai so gba̧a̧tɛ o wannu in o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ gbɔnɛ nɛ kɔ̧ pɛsi.
Wi siŋa o gba̧a̧tɛ-wa a bú-wese in tɛ ŋga gɛ̧ɛ̧-zɛ; wa fea tɛ o ŋga bɔnɛ, tɛ kaɓa, gbapaa in ye bara.
Ɓɛɛ Ɛnɛ ee Tua k’Ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ duk hee mɔ n’ɛɛ́ zɔk sɔsɔɔ‘i ga, wen zu ɗaŋ ko nutua ko Israɛl in nutua ko Juda.
Zua'i mbɛt, Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ dea mɔ in yɛɛ nɛ wara, in tɛ gasa deako,
nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen n’Ɛ́nɛ́ tɔ̧a̧ nɛ nú Mɔise widetom k’Ɛ́nɛ́, wese n’Ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧nɛ nú ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr heembea k’Ɛ́nɛ́, nɛ yi o be-Israɛl, tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e:
K’ɛnɛ nɛ́ zia wen nu'M na, ɛnɛ iŋ‘e gba zɔm gii-ɛnɛ tululu tɛ pii ɗoŋ kifi sɛgbɛrɛ mgbara o dukbii n'Am tɛ pɛsi wa si sɛnɛ;
wen mi iŋa nɛ dea'e wa beka zii nú‘M na, wen wa nɛ́ o wi-ŋgazu, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ ta mɔ nɛ tatɛ-wa sɛn nu nɛ wa tɛ kai wa nɛ bara si sɛnɛ‘i.
Ɓɛɛ wa tɛ iŋ‘e Mi nɛ́ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa. Mi tɛ hu̧i̧ see-wa in zer-wa
Wa tɛ zɔn Am sɛn nu bara kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ nin-Am.
Wa tɛ siŋ ŋgazu in ɗaŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa e duk, wen tɛ-wa tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ kpaa so o zɔmdáà kɔ wa, nɛ dee so ɗaŋmɔ in Gasa Wan’ɛ.
Ɓɛɛ Mi tɛ kai wa pii nɛ ɗoŋ sɛn tɛ nù n'Am ha̧so nú‘M wen-aa ha̧ o zɔmdáà kɔ-wa Abraham, Isaak, in Jakɔb; wa tɛ ɔ wan zu a. Mi tɛ de ha̧ wa mɛ nyɛɓi, wa beka sir ɓɔna.
Mi tɛ nɔ tɔk nɛ tɛ dùk kpoo nɛ kpoo in wa, wen ha̧‘M mɛ dùk nɛ Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in ha̧ wa mɛ ya nɛ dukbii kɔ‘M. Mi beka ndak Israɛl dukbii kɔ‘M tɛ nù n'Am ha̧ha̧ wa ɓɔ na.
Gasa Wan nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl, nɛ́ wi nɛ bele daka pi nú, nɛ bo nɛ nɔɔŋgiɗi ɓɔ na a hiɗi mɔ sitɛ‘Nɛ́:
«Gasa Wan, Ɛnɛ yéŋ zer-‘Nɛ́, Ɛnɛ dé ko h’ɛ́ɛ́, wen ɛ́ɛ́ dee ɗaŋmɔ in'Nɛ́:
wen, k’Ɛ́nɛ́, Ɛnɛ ɔ wan kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ, k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɛɛ yɔɔ k’ɛ́ɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.

Gasa Wan nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ ŋgayamɔ lɛŋ, Sɔ̧ ko Israɛl, Ɛnɛ zíí aia-nú ko o be-Israɛl, nɛ hɛɗa kumaa kaɗi, aia-nú ko o bezaŋ o wi nɛ dee so ŋgazu in'Nɛ́ɛ́'ɛ: wa zii so nú Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa na, nɛ́ hegɔ á o ŋgamɔ ndaɗa nɛ ɛ́ɛ́.
Ká tɛ-‘Nɛ́ mbaŋ doŋ o ɗaŋmɔ ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́ na, ɓɛɛ kinii tɛ́‘Nɛ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ ŋgai k’Ɛ́nɛ́ in gasi k’Ɛ́nɛ́,
wen Ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ tɛ zɔn nin-‘Nɛ́, Gasa Wan.
Nɛ́ hegɔ s’Ɛnɛ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ tu̧ tɛ-‘Nɛ, wen h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ sa sara sitɛ‘Nɛ́; ɛɛ tɛ gasi'Nɛ́ sɛn nù-bara k’ɛ́ɛ́, wen ɛɛ a̧ra tɛ-yɛ nyɛi nɛ ŋgazu ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ dee so ɗaŋmɔ in'Nɛ́ɛ́'ɛ.
Zɔ́k yɛ kinii sɛn nù-bara, n’Ɛnɛ pɛsa ɛ́ɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i, wen zia dara in fóm in wen zɔka bɔnɛ oi ŋgazu ko o zɔmdáà k’ɛ́ɛ́, nɛ a̧ra tɛ nɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́.
Israɛl, mɛ zíí o heembea nɛ ha̧ duka-kpasa ha̧ bii; ɛnɛ yéŋ zer-‘Nɛ́ h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ iŋ kɛ̧ɛ̧ mgbara mɔ!
Nɛ́ ge a yak ge nde, Israɛl? Mɛ a̧-a̧ bɔɔ nú ko o wisɛn wen ge?
Mɛ sɔ́k sɛn gɔni nù wen ge?
Simbo fio baa mɛ, bii tɔr nɛ mɛ mgbara o wi nɛ ye fara ko o fio wen ge?
Nɛ́ wen nɛ mɛ ee kpukput ɗuka-taamɔ dúk.
Kà mɛ ba so yuwar ko Sɔ̧ ga'a, mɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ dùk zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Mɛ kíí mɛ iŋ fara nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧-mgbara-mɔ, ŋgai in iŋamɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ,
kà de ká mɛ iŋa fara nɛ dukaa zɛ dɔk zaŋnu in duka kpasa tɛ sa̧a̧mɔ
in zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ.
Nɛ́ o'o kpaa fara-duk ko ɗuka-taamɔ o? Nɛ́ o'o yee zaŋ o kpaamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ o?
O wi nɛ ɔ wan zu o dukbii zaŋ nú a̧-a̧ dée? O wi nɛ ɔ wan zu o saɗi zaŋbɛɛ
usi nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ ha̧ wa a̧-a̧ dée?
O wi nɛ usi ɗɔŋ mɔ ha̧ o nɔi̧ a̧-a̧ dée? O wi-kusi bu-mbɔi in lɔr,
nɛ o bii zaŋnu e nɛ ta, nɛ ndaa-mbɔi kɔ-wa gɔn na, wa a̧-a̧ dée?
O wi nɛ ha̧ tɛ lɛŋ ɓo nɛ mɔ nɛ bu-mbɔi, ɓɛɛ nɛ tom kɔ-wa'i gana
zu iŋamɔ ko bii, wa a̧-a̧ dée?
Wa kuma lɛŋ, wa zira si Ye ko o fio, ɓɛɛ o mbe bii ya oi wa.
O be ŋgai-a zɔka sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ wa ya zaŋnu mbɛt,
wa iŋ ti yuwar nɛ ba sitɛ ɗuka taamɔ na,
wa zɔk o be doé nɛ nɛ sitɛ a na, wa ta mɔ si sɛnɛ na mbɛt;
o obem yaa nyɛi nɛ yuwar ko o dáà kɔ‘i.
Wa zii nyɛrɛ kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn nú Kanaan, kà bó nɛ zɔka a̧ sɛn nu Teman na.
Kóó o bezaŋ Agar, nɛ kia so iŋa mgbara mɔ zu nù,
kóó o wiɗɔrmɔ saaye Madian in Teman, kóó o wi-tɔ̧-to in o wi-kíí-ndaa-mɔ,
wa lɛŋ, wa iŋ ti yuwar Ɗuka-taamɔ na, wa de taamɔ wen o be doé nɛ nɛ́
si tɛ a̧ na mbɛt.
Ho Israɛl! oe, geé gasa tua ko Sɔ̧ wa! oe pɛsa fara kɔ̧-A̧ wa!
A̧ ɔ gasa, ndutia bó na! A̧ ɔ kusa, mɔ-we-aa bó na!
Nɛ́ sɛn hi̧i̧ a wa koa so o ŋgaŋa kusa wi mɛ ɓeemɛ‘i sɛnɛ,
mɛ nɛ o kpokot bii, nɛ iŋa so war biro nyɛmna.
Ɓɛɛ bó nɛ o wi nɔ‘i a Sɔ̧ hoka na. A̧ usi yuwar kpaa iŋamɔ ha̧ wa na mbɛt.
Hegɔ wa kuma lɛŋ, wen nɛ wa bo so nɛ iŋamɔ na, wa fee nɛ fio mgbele
kɔ-wa.
O'o daŋa yiwese mɛ ba Duka-taamɔ zir nɛnɛ, nɛ mgbara o turazan mɛ, o?
O'o kuu gbatɔp nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa a̧, ká hi̧fi̧ a̧ nɛ ŋga gɛnɛ lɔr, ba piinɛ o?
Ŋma bii iŋ yuwar hɔaa tɛ a̧ na, ŋma bii nɛ tá mɛ ba yuwar kɔ̧-a̧ bɔ na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Wi nɛ iŋa mɔ lɛŋ a iŋa Duka-taamɔ; nɛ́ iŋamɔ kɔ̧-A̧ a dee ha̧ A̧
mɛ iŋ ti A̧. A̧ ɗafa o mɔɔ zu nu lɛŋ a nɛnɛ wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ dun nu'i nɛ o saɗi.
A̧ tom sa̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ sa̧a̧mɔ baa war: A̧ sa a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ mboo zu nak nɛnɛ tu-tu-tu.
O sɔra tok fara-yaa kɔ‘i nɛ desee.
A̧ sa wa, ɓɛɛ wa kifi nú ha̧ A̧‘e: «ɛ́ɛ́ nɛ mɔ'ɔ!» Wa tok nɛ desee
wen Wi nɛ dee wa.
A̧ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́ɛ́, ɓɛɛ wi beka kpa ŋma mbea nɛtɛ na.
A̧ kpaa o yuwar nɛaa sitɛ Ɗuka-taamɔ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ A̧ usi o yuwar nɔ‘i
ha̧ Jakɔb widetom kɔ̧-A̧, in ha̧ Israɛl yaa-dua-see-a.
Hɔɗoŋ-aa wi zɔka Ɗuka-taamɔ‘i zaŋnu, ɓɛɛ a̧ dúk mgbara o bii.
Ɗuka-taamɔ nɛ kalata o geŋga ko Sɔ̧: nɛ́ heembea nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo;
wi, nɛ hɛr tɛ nɛ a̧, tɛ duk kpasa, ɓɛɛ wi, nɛ siŋ a̧ pi̧ nù, tɛ fe.
Mɛ zík tɛ-mɛ, Jakɔb, mɛ kas'aa; mɛ nɛ́ nɔ si tɛ bòóŋ mɔ ɗɔɔ sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-a̧.
Ká mɛ ha̧ gasi kɔ-mɛ ha̧ ŋma bii nɛtɛ na. Ká mɛ ha̧ de sɔnti kɔ-mɛ
ha̧ ŋma gɔni zudukbii nɛtɛ na.
Ɛ́ɛ́ o be Israɛl, ɛɛ ya nɛ desee, wen ɛɛ nyɛma mɛ iŋ mɔ nɛ de tɛ Sɔ̧.
Ɛnɛ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, dukbii kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ n’ɛnɛ ba nin Israɛl e ŋgɔn’ɛ!
Wa ɗɔra ‘nɛ ha̧ o wi nɛ iŋ Sɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ bó so nɛ wen kuma ‘nɛ́ na,
ɓɛɛ, nɛ́ wen n’ɛnɛ tu̧u̧ so see Sɔ̧, sa'i e ‘nɛ́ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ;
wen ɛnɛ tu̧u̧see-Wi nɛ dee ‘nɛ́, tɛ ɗafa o geesɔ̧ e kpasa Sɔ̧ duk;
Tɛ-‘nɛ bii so ɗoŋ Sɔ̧ nɛ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ, nɛ daia ‘nɛ́; ɛnɛ ɗaŋa see-Jerusalɛm, náá nɛ daia ‘nɛ́ mbɛt.
Jerusalɛm zɔka nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ fara tika zu ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧:
«Ɛ́nɛ́, o ye ka̧ Siɔn, ɛnɛ zíí, Sɔ̧ pii zɔm ditasee zu'm,
wen mi zɔka hee mɔ nɛ Wan nɛ dúk kpoo nɛ kpoo foo nɛ o buibem,
in o bokobem kɔ‘m a yi bara ga;
Mi daia so wa nɛ desee, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zaŋ tu̧u̧see in ditasee a'M e nɛ mɛ mɛ yak.
Ká tortɛ pi̧i̧ ŋma bii kpɔk wen n'am kifa ko-oi, in wen o bii nɛ dɔkaa
ea'm duk na! Nɛ́ ɗaŋmɔ ko o bem kɔ‘m, nɛ kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ nɛ Heembea ko Sɔ̧,
a dee ha̧‘m mɛ duk ɛn'am.
Wa kasi o geŋa Heembea na, wa ndak pata o yuwar-a na, wa ba o tana war kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ wa usa ha̧ wa, na.
O ye ka̧ Siɔn, wa'a gar tɛnɛ! Tɛ-‘nɛ́ a mbaŋ ɗoŋ a nde Gasa Wan nɛ duk
ɓɔnsɛnɛ foo so o buibem in o bokobem k’ɛ́ɛ́ a tɛ bara.
Wen A̧ foo ŋma gɔni-duk nɛ tɛa nɛ nyɛi̧a fara a zu wa:
nɛ́ ŋma dukbii-de-sakayi nɛ‘i zií nú kɔ-wa na, nɛ tu̧ tɛ o sɔkawi, kà bó nɛ dea ko
ha̧ obem na.
Nɛ́ wa'a kaia o yaa-dua-see kógɛ́ra yaknɛ, ɓɛɛ e nɛ a̧ ɛnɛ-a̧, e ŋma bokobem kɔ̧-a̧
ha̧ a̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ hee ge a'm nyɛma mɛ gbak nɛ ɛnɛ ge?
Kana nɛ wi nɛ foo o ŋgamɔ nɔ‘i a zu ‘nɛ́‘i a tɛ ɓar ‘nɛ́ yinɛ er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɛɛ.
Ɛnɛ nɛ́, o bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ nɛ́! Mi tɛ ɓɔn kɔ‘m ɛn'am ɓɛɛ.
Mi kpɔi̧a zia̧ laa-gbooyi pi nù, pi̧ nɛ́ laa-zimmɔ. Tɛ dukaa kɔ‘m zaŋnu hɛ̧ɛ̧,
mi tɛ hiɗi nɛ mɔ, wese lɛŋ, sitɛ Gasa Wan nɛ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
O bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ nyɔŋ nin-‘nɛ́, ɛnɛ hiɗi mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧, ɓɛɛ A̧ tɛ ɓar ‘nɛ́ yi bɔnɛ
in er o wisɛn k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ.
Wen, kɔ‘m, mi e ta'm nde nɛ́ Gasa Wan a tɛ kpasi ‘nɛ́, nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a toma
desee’ɛ ha̧‘m. Mi iŋa'e dekpaa Wankpasi'nɛ dea ko h’ɛ́nɛ́.
Wen, nɛ́ zaŋ bɔnɛ in ditasee a'm ea nɛ ɛnɛ fara yakaa, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ fo ‘nɛ́
piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧‘m wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ, zaŋ yɔyɛ in yili.
Sɔsɔɔ, o ye ka̧ Siɔn zɔka'e ɛnɛ a̧-a̧ tɛ bara, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ zɔk kpasa ‘nɛ́
nɛ Gasa Wan Sɔ̧ k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kpasi tɛ zɔm gasamɔ in sa̧a̧mɔ kɔ̧-A̧‘i.
O bem kɔ‘m, ɛnɛ nyɔŋ kana nin'nɛ́ tɛ mɔɔ oi nyimsea ko Sɔ̧. Wisɛn de
nɛ ŋmaa in'nɛ́ɛ́. Dekpaa ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk tikaa kɔ̧-a̧, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ i̧sa gɛr-a mbɛt.
O bem kɔ‘m, n'am kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna, baa kpoɗo-kpoɗo war. Wa kaia ‘nɛ́
yaknɛ hee o mɔdai nɛ o wisɛn zu̧ yaknɛ ga.
Ɛnɛ nɔ ŋgiɗi, o bem kɔ‘m, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ hiɗi mɔ sitɛ Sɔ̧, wen tɛ-Wi nɛ daka
mɔ‘i pi zu ‘nɛ́‘i tɛ mbaŋ ɗoŋ ‘nɛ.
Hee mɔ nɛ taamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ ira'nɛ́ nyɛi̧ nɛ Sɔ̧ ga, k’ɛnɛ nɛ́ kpaia see-‘nɛ kaɗi
ɓɛɛ n’ɛnɛ ha̧ ŋgai tɛ-nɛ war ɓu war ɓu, mɛ kií nɛ A̧.
Wen wi nɛ foo o ŋgaŋamɔ nɔ‘i a zu ‘nɛ‘i tɛ kpasi ‘nɛ́, ha̧ nɛ desee h’ɛ́nɛ́
wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mɛ nɔ́ ŋgiɗi, Jerusalɛm! Wi nɛ aa nin mɛ‘i tɛ ga̧ see-mɛ.
Bɔnɛ aa zu o wi nɛ dea ɗaŋmɔ in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ dea nyɛŋɛ tikaa kɔ-mɛ!
Bonɛ aa zu o ye nɛ o bem kɔ-mɛ dea bara sɛnɛ! Bɔnɛ aa zu ye nɛ kpaa
o buibem kɔ-mɛ tɛ bara!
Wen, hee mɔ'ɔ n'aa dee nɛ nyɛŋɛ tikaa kɔ-mɛ ká tortɛ pi̧ nɛ a̧ wen zu
kumaa kɔ-mɛ ga, nɛ hegɔ mbɛt a̧‘a̧ tɛ kpa nɛ ɗaŋsee zu war yaiaa kɔ̧-a.
Gba gii-wi ye kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ ha̧ desee ha̧ a̧‘i, mi tɛ dor wa yinɛ,
ɓɛɛ ditasee tɛ kpai duka-tɛ kɔ̧-a̧.
Wen Gasa Wan nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ tɛ pi wee mɛ yai a̧ yinɛ nɛ dɔka zɛ,
ɓɛɛ o ɗaŋ-sɔ̧ tɛ ɔ sɛnɛ nɛ dɔka zɛ gan woyo.
Jerusalɛm, mɛ kɛ̧i̧ mɔ si war daŋa-wese, a mɛ zɔk desee nɛ Sɔ̧ ba tɛnɛ
ha̧ mɛ‘i.
Mɛ zɔk! waa pii ɗoŋ‘i! o bem kɔ-mɛ, nɛ mɛ zɔka so fara yaka tɛ bara.
Tigɛr Sa̧a̧-Wi mɔi̧a̧ wa, dika ndaazan hɔ zuzan; wa hɔ nɛ zaŋgule pii nɛnɛ ti gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧.
Jerusalɛm, mɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-zim-mɔ in laa-bɔnɛ kɔ-mɛ yinɛ,
a mɛ pi̧ nɛ de gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ tɛ mɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Mɛ pi̧ gasa laa tanamɔ ko Sɔ̧ tɛ mɛ́, a mɛ kar zu-mɛ́ nɛ mɛtɛwol gasamɔ
ko Gasa Wan nɛ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Wen Sɔ̧ tɛ usi gasi kɔ-mɛ ha̧ o bii dam zaŋnu lɛŋ,
ɓɛɛ nin nɛ Sɔ̧ tɛ a ha̧ mɛ wen ɓɔnsɛnɛ, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
«Ga̧a̧mɔ oi deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a» in «Gasi oi zɔna Sɔ̧»
Jerusalɛm, mɛ kur ŋgɔn, mɛ daŋ duk zu kusa fara, a mɛ kɛ̧i̧ mɔ
si daŋa wese! Mɛ zɔk o bem kɔ-mɛ, nɛ tigɛr Sa̧a̧-Wi mɔi̧a̧ lɛŋ dika ndaazan
hɔ zuzan'i, wa de nɛ nyɛŋɛ, wen tɛ-Sɔ̧ mbaŋa ɗoŋ wa.
Wa gboa tɛ kɔ-mɛ nɛ naŋ; nɛ́ o wisɛn a kaia so wa, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a fo wa
ŋgan nɛ mɔ piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧ mɛ, heé o be-wan ga'i.
Wen, Sɔ̧ ha̧nú ha̧ o kusa kaya in o dura zutɔ̧ lɛŋ mɛ hir.
A̧ duna o gboŋgo lɛŋ ha̧ nù mɛ nyɛm ŋmaa ɗɛrɛŋ, wen ha̧ Israɛl mɛ nɛ zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɗɔɔ gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧
Tɛ ha̧a̧nú ko Sɔ̧, o kombo in o te nɛ a̧-a̧ nɛ de pɛr-aa lɛŋ tɛ de gi̧ɔ̧ kpe nɛ zu Israɛl.
Wen Sɔ̧ tɛ mgbɔ Israɛl piinɛ, nɛ desee ɗɔɔ sa̧a̧mɔ gasamɔ kɔ̧-A̧,
zaŋ deako in deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a kɔ̧-A̧.
Nɛ́ wen ɗaŋmɔ n’ɛnɛ dee sitɛ Sɔ̧ a Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr, wannu ko be Babilɔŋ tɛ kai nɛ ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ bara-biro si Babilɔŋ.
K’ɛnɛ hɔ Babilɔŋ‘i kaɗi, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ya hi̧i̧ zɛ dɔ́k, pɛ gɔn mbɛt: ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ko nɛ o bezaŋ ɗoŋ ŋmaa ɗoŋ ŋmaa war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo; ɓɛɛ nɛ ɗoŋ, mi tɛ fo'nɛ́ gbonɛ ɗɔɔ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Sɛn Babilɔŋ‘i, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ zɔk o geesɔ̧ nɛ‘i duia nɛ bu-mbɔi in lɔr, kóó nɛ‘i sɛka nɛ te, nɛ o bii kai nɛ zukuɓaa, ɓɛɛ nɛ pi̧ nɛ kií tɛ o bii nɛ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na.
Hegɔ, ɛnɛ kási zu-‘nɛ́, wen k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̀ɛ́ kifi hɔ ŋmaa in o gɔni-duk.
Ŋgimbi n’ɛnɛ tɛ zɔk o bii fara gbɛ́ɛ́ zugur nù nɛ ti in nɛ ɗoŋ o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i, gasi nɛ wa, k’ɛ́nɛ́ dé kií na! Ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɔ̧ kɔ see'nɛ́‘e: “Gasa Wan, nɛ́ Ɛ́nɛ́ kpɔk a'i tɛ gasi ɓɛɛ!”
Wen betom kɔ‘m a̧-a̧ in ‘nɛ́ɛ́; nɛ́ á̧‘a̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ zu ‘nɛ́.
Wen, nɛ́ ŋma widuimɔ a bɛŋa leɓe o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i; nɛ mbetɛ, wi kpa̧i̧a nɛ́ lɔr in bu-mbɔi sɔ̧ tɛ wa, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ o gee mɔɔ-ɔr-mɔ, nɛ nyɛm mɛ tɔ̧ wen na.
Wa ba lɔr, ɓɛɛ wa kara gu zu o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa, hee mɔ nɛ‘i ɗafi nɛ tɛ ŋma bokobem nɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ de zɔŋa ga.
Ŋma ŋgimbi mbɛt, o wiɗafisɔ̧ zu̧ nɛ́ lɔr in bu-mbɔi tɛ o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɔ‘i wen o haazi kɔ‘i,
kóó wen ha̧ha̧ o ko-de-mɔ nɛ mbɔɗɔnu nɛ ya kɔ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɔ‘i. Wa pi̧ nɛ laa tɛ o geesɔ̧, nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, lɔr in te'i, hee mɛ nɛ o bii ga;
mɔ kpɔk, mɔ nɔ‘i dor wa tɛ gbɛɛ dua, kóó tɛ ɓukaa na.
Kà‘i pi̧ so o tóka gbɛ̧ zɔ̧-laa tɛ wa kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wi tura fuunu kɔ tua'i nɛ mboɗa saŋayi-wa'i yinɛ.
Ŋma geesɔ̧ kasi nɛ dɔ́rá-wan, hee ŋma wi-duk-zu zikanu ga; zu-a'i, a̧ nyɛm gee nyɛmaa mɛ gbɛ wi nɛ de ɗaŋmɔ in a̧ na;
a̧ kasi nɛ gbapaa kóó kpi̧i̧ nɛ wii-er; zu-a'i, a̧ nyɛm mɛ dor biro, kóó mɛ de ŋmaa in o wizu̧zu̧ na. Tɛ mɔ nɔ‘i, wi iŋa nɛ dea'e wa bó nɛ́ o sɔ̧ na: k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kií wa na!
O geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa, nɛ wa a kɔ o tua'i, nyɛma ŋmaa in ŋma gbaa nyɛk, nɛ de tom ɓɔna’ɛ. Fuunu-naŋ o wi nɛ tɛ-mɛ zɔk wa kpee saŋayi-wa ŋmak ŋmak.

Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i gɔm nɛ o nutua e zu wi nɛ da̧ wannu, wen mɛ mgbɔ a nɛnɛ mɛ gbɛ a̧'ɛ ga, nɛ́ hegɔ mbɛt a o wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i ŋgasi nɛ o nutua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa, saŋ nɛnɛ, gɔm nɛnɛ, dor nɛ o wizu̧zu̧ tɛ ɓɔŋa o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i:
Wa a wee tɛ o lamba mgbaŋalaa zu o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i gan zu kɔ-wa; zu-a'i, o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i nyɛm mɛ zɔk geé zɔka ŋma kpɔk na.
O geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i hɔɔ ŋmaa in kpaakpee tua kɔ-wa: zɔli-see-a ɓuka ɓuk lɛŋ; o zɛmɛ, nɛ gbo nɛ ɗɔɔ nù, nyɔŋa wa, kpɔk in o laa kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa iŋ gee iŋaa na.
Saŋayí-wa tu̧u̧ mbilo-mbilo nɛ ziwee nɛ tur nɛ kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa.
O besa̧i̧, o gbiiwara in o nɔi̧ nɛtɛ nɛtɛ bu̧ bu̧ nɛ tɛ-wa in zu-wa; o paturu a̧-a̧ sɛnɛ mbɛt.
Tɛ mɔ‘i, ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nde wa bó nɛ o kpasa sɔ̧ na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ de kií wa na.
Kà ŋma bii bɛŋ lɔr nɛ‘i kpa̧i̧a̧ ɗafi nɛ tɛ-wa'i na, wa nɛ tɛ-wa nyɛm mɛ de ha̧ a̧ mɛ tɔk na, wen wa iŋ gee iŋa ŋgimbi nɛ‘i kpa̧i̧a̧ nɛnɛ na.
O geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i nɛ ŋma gee ɔmi bó tɛ wa na, wa hi̧fi̧ nɛ gba zɔm sede.
Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ wa bo nɛ naŋ-wa mɛ nɛ nɔ na ga, wi tui nɛ wa e zukúɓaa-wi: wa usi nɛnɛ ha̧ o bii'e ŋma gba̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa bó na; foe ba nɛ o widetom kɔ-wa mbɛt

wen kà ŋma kpɔk mgbara o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa'i hɔfi̧ tik nù, nɛ́ wa'a tɛ ba a̧ e ŋgɔn kà‘i ba a e ŋgɔn kaɗi, a̧ nyɛm mɛ nɛ nɔ nɛ tatɛ-a na; kà a nɛ ɔɔ nù, a̧ nyɛm mɛ kur nɛ tɛ-a na mbɛt. Wi nɛ ɗafi o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk hee a̧ ɗafi nɛ fio ga.
O wiɗafisɔ̧ kai kɔ‘i nɛ o saɗi nɛ‘i ɗafi nɛ o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i ɗór nɛnɛ, nyɔŋ nɛ mbɔi-aa o koo kɔ-wa aa ŋma yi-gui mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wa kɛ̧ ŋma ha̧ o wisan in o wikúm na, kóó tikiɗi.
O ko-zɔk-zɛ in o nana-oi-kɔra fo nɛ tɛ o saɗi-ɗafisɔ̧ nɔ‘i mbɛt. O mɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ usi h’ɛ́nɛ́‘e wa bó nɛ o kpasa sɔ̧ na: k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kií wa na!
O sɔ̧-sɛka-te, o sɔ̧-lɔr in o sɔ̧-bu-mbɔi nɔ‘i, nɛ́ o okóò a ɗafi wa; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hee ge a'i tɛ sa nɛ wa'e o sɔ̧ ge?
Sɛn kɔ̧ tua ko o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i, o wiɗafi-wa ya nɛ nù, nɛ a̧ka laa, mui̧zu-wa in zera kpuia lɛŋ, wa gu mɔ zu-wa na mbɛt.
Wa bembi bembi, hiɗi nɛ mɔ ti o geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɔ‘i, hee mɔ nɛ o ŋma bii de nɛnɛ tɛ nyɔŋmɔ fio’ɛ ga.
O wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kpɔ̧i̧ nɛ o laa tɛ o sɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɔ‘i a nɛnɛ tɛ o koo in o bem kɔ‘i.
Kóó wi de nɛ ɗaŋmɔ kóó demɔ sitɛ o sɔ̧ nɔ‘i, wa nyɛm mɛ kifi er na; wa nyɛm mɛ ba ŋma bii e zu wan kà bó nɛ gboa a̧ yinɛ na.
Wa nyɛm mɛ ha̧ mbɔi ha̧ bíí, kà bó nɛ sede na. Kà ŋma bii ha̧ nú mɛ ha̧ ŋma mɔ ha̧ wa ɓɛɛ n'aa ha̧ na, wa nyɛm mɛ ak na.
Wa nyɛm mɛ kpasi bii yi fio kà bó nɛ ɓárá wiɓɔsa er wan-ŋgai na.
Wa beka hu̧i̧ yi wan-boma-yí na, wa nyɛm mɛ gbak bii yi bɔnɛ na mbɛt.
Wa beka de ko ha̧ ko-oi na, wa beka gbak o be-oi na mbɛt.
O sɛka-te nɔ‘i, nɛ‘i sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr in bu-mbɔi tɛ wa'i, hɔ̧ɔ̧ ŋmaa in o ta nɛ‘i za̧-a̧ zaŋ kaya: foe tɛ ba o wi nɛ de tom ha̧ wa.
Ɓɛɛ hee ge a'i tɛ ta nɛnɛ, kóó tɔ̧ɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e wa nɛ o sɔ̧ wo ge?
Ŋma mɔ woyo nɛ mɔ'ɔ, wen o be-Kaldee nɛ zu mbɛt pi nɛ foe tɛ wa: Kà wa kpa ŋma mukɛ̧ nɛ tɔ̧ wen na, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ sɔ̧ kɔ-wa Bɛl, kɔfi nɛ a̧ ha̧ mukɛ̧‘i mɛ tɔ̧ wen, hee Bɛl'i zií so mɔ ziì ga.
O wi nɔ‘i nyɛm gee nyɛmaa mɛ ta mɔ mɛ bɛ̧ o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i nɛ bo nɛ iŋa-mgbara-mɔ na'i na.
O okóò hɛr nɛ guntir nɛ gba̧a̧-pɛr, ɓɛɛ wa yaa ka̧ yuwar dɔ nɛ púmyúlú-mɔ.
Kà ŋma wi-ɓir-war sa ŋma mgbara wa, ɔ in a̧ nɛ dala nde, kóó‘i ye nɛ tɛ pi̧i̧ foe tɛ ŋma'a? I̧ nɛ kpa de sɔnti hee a̧ ga, ha̧ ŋma bii mɛ bur gba̧a̧-pɛr kɔ̧-a̧ na'i.
Mɔ nɛ‘i de sitɛ o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ o mɔ-ndela; ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hee ge a'i tɛ ta nɛnɛ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e wa nɛ́ o sɔ̧ wo ge?
Nɛ́ o wi-sɛk-te in o widuimɔ a dee wa: wa kpai yak zu mɔ nɛ o wi nɛ dee wa kɔ̧oa̧ ha̧ wa mɛ duk na.
O wi nɛ dee wa'i nɛ zu mbɛt beka ya zaŋnu ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ na.
Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ hee ge a o mɔ nɛ wa dee nɛ er-wa tɛ ya nɛ́ o sɔ̧ ge? Nɛ́ o mɔ'ɔ-ndela in o mɔ'ɔ-foe a o wi nɔ‘i e ha̧ o bezaŋ-wa.
Kà biro kóó ŋma ŋgaŋamɔ tik zu o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wiɗafi-wa mɔi̧a̧ ba keta mɛ zɔk fara nɛ wa tɛ hu̧si sɛnɛ in o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
O geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i nyɛm mɛ kpasi tɛ-wa nɛ tɛ-wa, tɛ ŋgimbi biro kóó ŋgimbi ŋgaŋamɔ na, ɓɛɛ heé ge a'i beka nyɛm mɛ zɔk'e wa bo nɛ o sɔ̧ wo na ge?

Mɛ nɛ o gee sɛkate nɛ‘i sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr in bu-mbɔi sɛnɛ; wi tɛ iŋ nɛ ɗoŋ nde wa nɛ o geé mɔɔ-ɔr-wi. O dukbii in o wannu lɛŋ tɛ zɔk nɛ sa̧-a̧‘e wa bo nɛ o sɔ̧ na, ɓɛɛ mɛ nɛ o mɔ nɛ bii dea nɛ er, ŋma mɔɔ tɛ sɔ̧ bó tɛ wa na.
Bíí nɛ zɔk nɛ sa̧-a̧‘e wa bó nɛ o sɔ̧ na na, nɛ́ o?
Wa nyɛm mɛ hok wan e zu ŋma nù, kà bó nɛ dea ha̧ koro mɛ hɔ a zu bii na.
Wa nyɛm mɛ gɔn kita kɔ-wa nɛ zu-wa, kà bó nɛ gboo bii nɛ zɔk bɔnɛ zu mɔ n'aa de na yinɛ na: ŋma gba̧a̧mɔ kɔ-wa bo na.

Wa ya hee o gba-kɔra nɛ bu̧i̧ yambali nɛ mgbara yizan’ɛ ga. Ɓɛɛ kà wee tik zu tua ko o geesɔ̧-sɛkatɛ nɛ wa kpa̧i̧a lɔr in bu-mbɔi sɔ̧ sɛnɛ‘i, o wiɗafi-wa tɛ gɔm kɔ‘i yak nɛ̀ɛ́ hu̧si, ŋma mɔ ndɔ wa na; ɓɛɛ wa tɛ bii kɔ-wa wee lɛŋ gbuɗuk hee ŋma kpaakpee-tua a wee baa ga.
Wa nyɛm mɛ yor ti ŋma wannu kóó ti ŋma wisɛn na.
Ɓɛɛ hee ge a'i tɛ ta, kóó tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e wa nɛ́ o sɔ̧ wo ge?
O geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i, nɛ‘i dee nɛ sɛkate, ɓɛɛ wi sɔ̧ lɔr in bu-mbɔi sɛnɛ‘i, nyɛm mɛ gɔm yak er o wizu̧zu̧ kóó er o kpɔ̧i̧-gba̧a̧nin na.
Kóó ŋma wan-ŋgai a tɛ̀ɛ́ gbɛr lɔr in bu-mbɔi tɛ-wa yinɛ, zu̧ nɛ laa, nɛ kpe tɛ-wa yak nɛnɛ, wa nyɛm mɛ de ŋma mɔ na.

Ɓɛɛ, ŋma wannu nɛ usi ŋgai kɔ‘i fara biro, kóó nyɛk nɛ duk kɔ tua, gbak nɛ wan-aa’ɛ, gana o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i; kpárnutua nɛ kpe zu mɔ nɛ a̧-a̧ kɔ tua, in mbiŋte nɛ tɔi gɛr-tua ko wannu e ŋgɔn’ɛ gana o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i mbɛt.
Wen wese, nyaŋazɛ in o sɔra nɛ tok, gbak nɛ o bii, wa mbo nɛ zu;
pi̧i̧koro mbɛt, nɛ́ gba de-mɔɔ-zɔk; búk nɛ yu dam fara lɛŋ ɔ dée mbɛt.
Kà Sɔ̧ ha̧ nú‘e o turazan a yar dam zu nù lɛŋ wo, wa de kana nɛ mɔ n'Aa tɔ̧.
Wee, nɛ Sɔ̧ tom nɛ ŋgɔn mɛ, dɔ nɛ o kaya in o kombo, de kana nɛ mɔ n'Aa tɔ̧. Kóó nɛ́ dée, kóó nɛ ŋgai, o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i hɔ gee hɔɔ ŋmaa in o mɔ nɔ‘i n’ɛɛ́ tɔra'i na.
Ɓɛɛ, tɛ o mɔ nɔ‘i, wi nyɛma mɛ ta in mɛ tɔ̧‘e wa bó nɛ́ o sɔ̧ na, wen nɛ wa nyɛm mɛ gɔn kita in mɛ gbak bii na.
Ɛnɛ iŋa kaɗi'e wa bó nɛ́ o sɔ̧ na. K’ɛ́nɛ́ de kií wa na.
Wen, wa nyɛm mɛ tok ɗaŋ yoŋgo, kóó dea, a zu o wannu na.
Wa nyɛm mɛ de o mɔɔkifi mɛ yizan nɛ yí o dukbii na. Wa nyɛm mɛ tok hee wese ga, ka̧ bó nɛ nyɛkaa hee nyaŋgazɛ ga na.
O saɗi-zaŋbɛɛ gana o geesɔ̧ nɔ‘i, wen wa nyɛma yuu mɔ husi, kpasi nɛ tɛ-wa.
Ŋma mɔ nɛ usi'e wa nɛ́ o sɔ̧ wo bó na, kóó tikiɗi: hegɔ, k’ɛ́nɛ́ de kii wa na!
Naá-nduŋ-tunyuŋ-ndak-nɔi̧ nú fɔ-gala nyɛm mɛ pɛm gala'i na. O geesɔ̧ kɔ-wa, nɛ‘i sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr in bu-mbɔi tɛ wa'i, ya hega mbɛt.
O geesɔ̧-sɛkate kɔ-wa, nɛ‘i sɔ̧ɔ̧ lɔr in bu-mbɔi sɛnɛ‘i, hɔɔ ŋmaa in ŋma tɛn-te nɛ duk kpɛɛfɔ; ɓɛɛ nɛ o nɔi̧ lɛŋ gu sɛnɛ, kóó in ŋma wɔr-bii nɛ‘i ba pi̧ taŋ kɔ̧́ kɔ̧'ɛ.
Tɛ o de gbɛ́ zɔ̧-laa-godo kɔ-wa nɛ ɓúk, ɛnɛ tɛ iŋ nɛ dea'e wa bó nɛ o sɔ̧ na. Sɔŋkur-aa, nɛ́ dadaka a tɛ dak wa haksak, ɓɛɛ wa pi̧i̧ nɛ bú zu o be nu.
Ɓɛɛ gana so widemɔ nɛ yuwar-a, nɛ bó kɔ‘i nɛ o geesɔ̧ na’ɛ: foe beka de a̧ na.
